01:01	bršyt brʔ ʔlhʔ yt šmyʔ wyt ʔrʕʔ
01:02	ʔrʕʔ hwt twh wbwh wḥšwkʔ ʕl ʔpy thwmʔ wrwḥh dʔlhʔ mrḥpʔ <hwt#3#> ʕl ʔpy myʔ
01:03	wʔmr ʔlhʔ nhwʔ nwhrʔ whwʔ nwhrʔ
01:04	wḥzʔ ʔlhʔ lnwhrʔ dšpyr wprš ʔlhʔ byt nwhrʔ lḥšwkʔ
01:05	wqrʔ ʔlhʔ lnwhrʔ ʔymmʔ wlḥšwkʔ qrʔ llyʔ whwʔ rmšʔ whwʔ ṣprʔ ywmʔ ḥd
01:06	wʔmr ʔlhʔ nhwʔ ʔrqyʕʔ bmṣʕt myʔ wnhwʔ prš byt myʔ lmyʔ
01:07	wʕbd ʔlhʔ ʔrqyʕʔ wprš byt myʔ dltḥt mn ʔrqyʕʔ wbyt myʔ dlʕl mn ʔrqyʕʔ whwʔ hknʔ
01:08	wqrʔ ʔlhʔ lʔrqyʕʔ šmyʔ whwʔ rmšʔ whwʔ ṣprʔ ywmʔ dtryn
01:09	wʔmr ʔlhʔ ntknšwn myʔ dltḥt mn šmyʔ/rqyʕʔ#3#/ lʔtrʔ ḥd wttḥzʔ ybyštʔ whwʔ hknʔ
01:10	wqrʔ ʔlhʔ lybyštʔ ʔrʕʔ wlknšʔ dmyʔ qrʔ ymmʔ wḥzʔ ʔlhʔ dšpyr
01:11	wʔmr ʔlhʔ tpq ʔrʕʔ tdʔʔ ʕsbʔ dmzdrʕ zrʕʔ lgnsh wʔylnʔ dpʔrʔ dʕbd pʔrʔ lgnsh dnṣbth bh ʕl ʔrʕʔ whwʔ hknʔ
01:12	wʔpqt ʔrʕʔ tdʔʔ ʕsbʔ dmzdrʕ zrʕʔ lgnsh wʔylnʔ dʕbd pʔrʔ dnṣbth bh lgnsh wḥzʔ ʔlhʔ dšpyr
01:13	whwʔ rmšʔ whwʔ ṣprʔ ywmʔ dtltʔ
01:14	wʔmr ʔlhʔ nhwwn nhyrʔ bʔrqyʕʔ dšmyʔ lmprš byt ʔymmʔ lllyʔ wnhwwn lʔtwtʔ wlzbnʔ wlywmtʔ wlšnyʔ
01:15	wnhwwn mnhryn bʔrqyʕʔ dšmyʔ lmnhrw ʕl ʔrʕʔ whwʔ hknʔ
01:16	wʕbd ʔlhʔ tryn nhyrʔ rwrbʔ nhyrʔ rbʔ lšwlṭnʔ dʔymmʔ wnhyrʔ zʕwrʔ lšwlṭnʔ dllyʔ wkwkbʔ
01:17	wyhb ʔnwn ʔlhʔ bʔrqyʕʔ dšmyʔ lmnhrw ʕl ʔrʕʔ
01:18	wlmšlṭ bʔymmʔ wbllyʔ wlmprš byt nwhrʔ lḥšwkʔ wḥzʔ ʔlhʔ dšpyr
01:19	whwʔ rmšʔ whwʔ ṣprʔ ywmʔ dʔrbʕʔ
01:20	wʔmr ʔlhʔ nrḥšwn myʔ rḥšʔ npšʔ ḥytʔ wprḥtʔ tprḥ ʕl ʔrʕʔ ʕl ʔpy ʔrqyʕʔ dšmyʔ
01:21	wbrʔ ʔlhʔ tnynʔ rwrbʔ wkl npšʔ ḥytʔ drḥšʔ dʔrḥšw myʔ lgnshwn wkl prḥtʔ dgpʔ lgnsh wḥzʔ ʔlhʔ dšpyr
01:22	wbrk ʔnwn ʔlhʔ wʔmr lhwn prw wsgw wmlw myʔ dbymmʔ wprḥtʔ tsgʔ bʔrʕʔ
01:23	whwʔ rmšʔ whwʔ ṣprʔ ywmʔ dḥmšʔ
01:24	wʔmr ʔlhʔ tpq ʔrʕʔ npšʔ ḥytʔ lgnsh bʕyrʔ wrḥšʔ wḥywtʔ dʔrʕʔ lgnsh whwʔ hknʔ
01:25	wʕbd ʔlhʔ ḥywtʔ dʔrʕʔ lgnsh wbʕyrʔ lgnsh wklh rḥšʔ dʔrʕʔ lgnswhy wḥzʔ ʔlhʔ dšpyr
01:26	wʔmr ʔlhʔ nʕbd ʔnšʔ bṣlmn ʔyk dmwtn wnšlṭwn bnwny ymʔ wbprḥtʔ dšmyʔ wbbʕyrʔ wbklh ḥywtʔ dʔrʕʔ wbklh rḥšʔ drḥš ʕl ʔrʕʔ
01:27	wbrʔ ʔlhʔ lʔdm bṣlmh bṣlm ʔlhʔ bryhy dkr wnqbʔ brʔ ʔnwn
01:28	wbrk ʔnwn ʔlhʔ wʔmr lhwn ʔlhʔ prw wsgw wmlw ʔrʕʔ wkwbšwh wšlṭw bnwny ymʔ wbprḥtʔ dšmyʔ wbbʕyrʔ wbklh \ḥywtʔ drḥšʔ /rḥšʔ drḥš#3/ ʕl ʔrʕʔ
01:29	wʔmr ʔlhʔ hʔ yhbt lkwn klh ʕsbʔ dzrʕʔ dmzdrʕ ʕl ʔpy klh ʔrʕʔ wkl ʔyln dʔyt bh pʔry ʔylnh dzrʕh mzdrʕ/dmzdrʕ#3#/ lkwn nhwʔ lmʔkwltʔ
01:30	wlklh ḥywtʔ ddbrʔ/dʔrʕʔ#3#/ wlklh prḥtʔ dšmyʔ wlkl drḥš ʕl ʔrʕʔ dʔyt bh npšʔ ḥytʔ wklh ywrqʔ dʕsbʔ lmʔkwltʔ whwʔ hknʔ
01:31	wḥzʔ ʔlhʔ kl dʕbd whʔ ṭb špyr whwʔ rmšʔ whwʔ ṣprʔ ywmʔ dštʔ
02:01	wšlmw šmyʔ wʔrʕʔ wklh ḥylhwn
02:02	wšlm ʔlhʔ bywmʔ štytyʔ ʕbdwhy dʕbd/klhwn#3#/ wʔttnyḥ bywmʔ šbyʕyʔ mn klhwn ʕbdwhy dʕbd
02:03	wbrk ʔlhʔ lywmʔ šbyʕyʔ wqdšh mṭl dbh ʔttnyḥ mn klhwn ʕbdwhy dbrʔ/dṣbʔ#3#/ ʔlhʔ lmʕbd
02:04	hlyn twldtʔ dšmyʔ wdʔrʕʔ kd ʔtbryw bywmʔ dʕbd/dbrʔ#3#/ mryʔ ʔlhʔ šmyʔ wʔrʕʔ
02:05	wklhwn ʔylnʔ dḥqlʔ ʕdkyl lʔ hww bʔrʕʔ wklh ʕsbʔ dḥqlʔ ʕdkyl lʔ ʔyʕʔ mṭl dlʔ ʔḥt mryʔ ʔlhʔ mṭrʔ ʕl <ʔpy/#3#> ʔrʕʔ wʔdm lyt lmplḥ bʔrʕʔ
02:06	wmbwʕʔ slq hwʔ mn ʔrʕʔ wmšqʔ hwʔ lkl ʔpy ʔrʕʔ
02:07	wgbl mryʔ ʔlhʔ lʔdm ʕprʔ mn ʔdmtʔ wnpḥ bʔpwhy nšmtʔ dḥyʔ whwʔ ʔdm lnpš ḥyʔ
02:08	wnṣb mryʔ ʔlhʔ prdysʔ bʕdn mn qdym wsm tmn lʔdm dgbl
02:09	wʔwʕy mryʔ ʔlhʔ mn ʔrʕʔ kl ʔyln dʔrgyg lmḥzʔ wšpyr lmʔkl wʔylnʔ dḥyʔ bmṣʕth dprdysʔ wʔylnʔ dydʕtʔ dṭbtʔ wdbyštʔ
02:10	wnhrʔ npq hwʔ mn ʕdn lmšqywth lprdysʔ wmn tmn prš whwʔ lʔrbʕʔ ršyn
02:11	šmh dḥd pyšwn hw dḥdr lklh ʔrʕʔ dḥwylʔ dtmn dhbʔ
02:12	wdhbh dʔrʕʔ hy ṭb tmn brwlḥʔ wkʔpʔ dbrwlʔ
02:13	wšmh dnhrʔ tnynʔ/trynʔ#3#/ gyḥwn hw dḥdr lklh ʔrʕʔ dkwš
02:14	wšmh dnhrʔ dtltʔ dqlt hw dʔzl lwqbl ʔtwr wnhrʔ dʔrbʕʔ hw prt
02:15	wdbr mryʔ ʔlhʔ lʔdm wšbqh bprdysʔ dʕdn dnplḥywhy wnṭrywhy
02:16	wpqd mryʔ ʔlhʔ lʔdm wʔmr lh mn klhwn ʔylnʔ dbprdysʔ mʔkl tʔkwl
02:17	wmn ʔylnʔ dydʕtʔ dṭbtʔ wdbyštʔ lʔ tʔkwl mnh mṭl dbywmʔ dtʔkwl mnh mwtʔ tmwt
02:18	wʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ lʔ špyr dnhwʔ ʔdm blḥwdwhy ʔʕbd lh mʕdrnʔ ʔkwth
02:19	wgbl mryʔ ʔlhʔ mn ʔrʕʔ klh ḥywtʔ ddbrʔ wklh prḥtʔ dšmyʔ wʔyty ʔnwn lwt ʔdm dnḥzʔ mnʔ qrʔ lhwn wkl dqrʔ lhwn ʔdm npšʔ ḥytʔ hw hw šmh
02:20	wqrʔ ʔdm šmhʔ lklh bʕyrʔ wlklh prḥtʔ dšmyʔ wlklh ḥywtʔ dʔrʕʔ/ddbrʔ#3#/ wlʔdm lʔ ʔštkḥ lh mʕdrnʔ ʔkwth
02:21	wʔrmy mryʔ ʔlhʔ šlyʔ ʕl ʔdm wdmk wnsb ḥdʔ mn ʔlʕwhy wʔwḥd bsrʔ ḥlpyh
02:22	wtqn/wʔtqn#3#/ mryʔ ʔlhʔ ʔlʕʔ dnsb mn ʔdm lʔnttʔ wʔytyh lʔdm
02:23	wʔmr ʔdm hnʔ zbnʔ grmʔ mn grmy wbsrʔ mn bsry hdʔ ttqrʔ ʔnttʔ mṭl dmn gbrʔ nsybʔ
02:24	mṭl hnʔ nšbwq gbrʔ lʔbwhy wlʔmh wnqp lʔntth wnhwwn tryhwn ḥd bsr
02:25	whww tryhwn ʕrṭlyyn ʔdm wʔntth wlʔ bhtyn
03:01	wḥwyʔ ʕrym hwʔ mn klh ḥywtʔ ddbrʔ dʕbd mryʔ ʔlhʔ wʔmr ḥwyʔ lʔnttʔ šryrʔyt ʔmr ʔlhʔ dlʔ tʔklwn mn kl ʔylny prdysʔ
03:02	wʔmrt ʔnttʔ lḥwyʔ dmn/mn#3#/ pʔry ʔylnʔ dbprdysʔ klhwn nʔkwl
03:03	wmn pʔry ʔylnʔ dbmṣʕth dprdysʔ ʔmr ʔlhʔ dlʔ tʔklwn mnh wlʔ ttqrbwn lh dlʔ tmwtwn
03:04	wʔmr ḥwyʔ lʔnttʔ lʔ mmt tmwtwn
03:05	mṭl dydʕ ʔlhʔ dbywmʔ dʔklyn ʔntwn mnh mtptḥn ʕynykwn whwytwn ʔyk ʔlhʔ ydʕy ṭbtʔ wbyštʔ
03:06	wḥzt ʔnttʔ dšpyr ʔylnʔ lmʔkl wrgtʔ hw lʕynʔ wrgyg ʔylnʔ lmḥr bh wnsbt mn pʔrwhy wʔklt wyhbt ʔp lbʕlh ʕmh wʔkl
03:07	wʔtptḥ ʕynʔ dtryhwn wydʕw dʕrṭlyyn ʔnwn wdbqw ṭrpʔ dtʔnʔ wʕbdw lhwn przwmʔ
03:08	wšmʕw qlh dmryʔ ʔlhʔ mhlk/dmhlk#3#/ bprdysʔ lpnyh/bpnyh#3#/ dywmʔ wʔtṭšyw ʔdm wʔntth mn qdm mryʔ ʔlhʔ bgw ʔylnʔ dbprdysʔ
03:09	wqrʔ mryʔ ʔlhʔ lʔdm wʔmr lh ʔykʔ ʔnt ʔdm
03:10	wʔmr qlk šmʕt bprdysʔ wḥzyt dʕrṭly ʔnʔ wʔtṭšyt
03:11	wʔmr lh mryʔ mnw ḥwyk dʕrṭly ʔnt hʔ mn ʔylnʔ dpqdtk dlʔ tʔkwl mnh ʔklt
03:12	wʔmr ʔdm ʔnttʔ dyhbt ʕmy hy yhbt ly mn ʔylnʔ wʔklt
03:13	wʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ lʔnttʔ mnw hnʔ dʕbdty wʔmrt ʔnttʔ ḥwyʔ ʔṭʕyny wʔklt
03:14	wʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ lḥwyʔ ʕl dʕbdt hdʔ lyṭ ʔnt mn klh bʕyrʔ wmn klh ḥywtʔ ddbrʔ wʕl krsk thlk wʕprʔ tʔkwl kl ywmy ḥyyk
03:15	wbʕldbbwtʔ ʔsym bynyk lʔnttʔ wbyt zrʕk lzrʕh hw ndwš ršk wʔnt tmḥywhy bʕqbh
03:16	wlʔnttʔ ʔmr msgyw ʔsgʔ kʔbyky wbṭnyky wbkʔbʔ tʔldyn bnyʔ wʕl bʕlky ttpnyn whw nštlṭ bky
03:17	wlʔdm ʔmr ʕl dšmʕt bqlh dʔnttk wʔklt mn ʔylnʔ dpqdtk wʔmrt lk dlʔ tʔkwl mnh lyṭʔ ʔrʕʔ mṭltk bkʔbʔ tʔklyh kl ywmy ḥyyk
03:18	kwbʔ wdrdrʔ twʕʔ lk wtʔkwl ʕsbʔ dḥqlʔ
03:19	wbdwʕtʔ dʔpyk tʔkwl lḥmʔ ʕdmʔ dthpwk lʔrʕʔ dmnh ʔtnsbt mṭl dʕprʔ ʔnt wlʕprʔ thpwk
03:20	wqrʔ ʔdm šmh dʔntth ḥwʔ mṭl dhy hwt ʔmʔ dkl dḥy
03:21	wʕbd mryʔ ʔlhʔ lʔdm wlʔntth kwtynytʔ dmškʔ wʔlbš ʔnwn
03:22	wʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ hʔ ʔdm hwʔ ʔyk ḥd mnn lmdʕ ṭbtʔ wbyštʔ hšʔ dlmʔ nwšṭ ʔydh wnsb ʔp mn ʔylnʔ dḥyʔ wnʔkwl wnḥʔ lʕlm
03:23	wšdrh mryʔ ʔlhʔ mn prdysʔ dʕdn lmplḥ ʔrʕʔ dʔtnsb mn tmn
03:24	wʔpqh mryʔ ʔlhʔ wʔkrk mn \mdnḥ lprdysʔ /mdnḥy prdysʔ#3#/ dʕdn krwbʔ wšnnʔ dḥrbʔ dmthpkʔ lmṭr ʔwrḥʔ dʔylnʔ dḥyʔ
04:01	wʔdm ḥkm lḥwʔ ʔntth wbṭnt wyldt lqʔyn wʔmrt qnyt gbrʔ lmryʔ
04:02	wʔwspt lmʔld lʔḥwhy hbyl whwʔ hbyl rʕʔ ʕnʔ wqʔyn hwʔ plḥ bʔrʕʔ/bʔwʕʔ#2#/
04:03	whwʔ mn btr ywmtʔ wʔyty qʔyn mn pʔrʔ dʔrʕh qwrbnʔ lmryʔ
04:04	whbyl ʔyty ʔp hw mn bwkrʔ dʕnh wmn šmynyhwn wʔṣṭby mryʔ bhbyl wbqwrbnh
04:05	wbqʔyn wbqwrbnh lʔ ʔṣṭby wʔtbʔš lqʔyn ṭb wʔtkmr ʔpwhy
04:06	wʔmr mryʔ lqʔyn lmnʔ ʔtbʔš lk wlmnʔ ʔtkmr ʔpyk
04:07	hʔ ʔn tšpr qblt wʔlʔ tšpr ʕl trʕʔ ḥṭhʔ rbyʕ ʔnt ttpnʔ lwth whw nštlṭ bk
04:08	wʔmr qʔyn lhbyl ʔḥwhy nrdʔ lpqʕtʔ whwʔ dkd hnwn bḥqlʔ/bpqʕtʔ#3#/ qm qʔyn ʕl hbyl ʔḥwhy wqṭlh
04:09	wʔmr mryʔ lqʔyn ʔykʔ hw hbyl ʔḥwk wʔmr lʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ nṭwrh ʔnʔ gyr dʔḥy
04:10	wʔmr \lh mryʔ /#3#/ \mnʔ ʕbdt /mnw hnʔ dʕbdt#3#/ qlʔ ddmh dʔḥwk gʕʔ lwty mn ʔrʕʔ
04:11	mkyl lyṭ ʔnt mn ʔrʕʔ dptḥt pwmh wqblt dmh dʔḥwk mn ʔydyk
04:12	kd tplwḥ bʔrʕʔ lʔ twsp dttl lk ḥylh zʔʕ wnʔd thwʔ bʔrʕʔ
04:13	wʔmr qʔyn lmryʔ rbʔ hy sklwty mn dlmšbq
04:14	hʔ ʔpqtny ywmnʔ mn ʔpy <klh#3#> ʔrʕʔ wmn qdmyk ʔtṭšʔ wʔhwʔ zʔʕ wnʔd bʔrʕʔ wkl mn dnškḥny nqṭlny
04:15	wʔmr lh mryʔ lʔ hknʔ kl qṭwlʔ <ntqṭl#3#> qʔyn ḥd bšbʕʔ ntprʕ wsm mryʔ ʔtʔ bqʔyn dlʔ nqṭlywhy kl mn dmškḥ lh
04:16	wnpq qʔyn mn qdm mryʔ wytb bʔrʕʔ dnwd mn mdnḥyh dʕdn
04:17	wḥkm qʔyn lʔntth wbṭnt wyldt lḥnwk whwʔ bnʔ qrytʔ wqrʔ šmh dqrytʔ ʕl šm brh ḥnwk
04:18	wʔtyld lḥnwk ʕydr wʕydr ʔwld lmḥwʔyl wmḥwʔyl ʔwld lmtwšyl wmtwšyl ʔwld llmk
04:19	\wlmk nsb lh /wnsb lh lmk#3#/ trtyn nšyn šmh dḥdʔ ʕdʔ \wšmh dʔḥrtʔ /wdʔḥrytʔ#3#/ ṣlʔ
04:20	wyldt ʕdʔ lybl hw hwʔ ʔbʔ lʕmry mšknʔ wqnyy/wlqnyy#3#/ qnynʔ
04:21	wšmʔ dʔḥwhy ywbl hw hwʔ ʔbʔ lkl dʔḥyd qytrʔ wknrʔ
04:22	wṣlʔ ʔp hy yldt ltwblqyn ʔwmn bkl ʕbd/ʕbd#3#/ dnḥšʔ wdprzlʔ wḥth dtwblqyn nʕmʔ
04:23	wʔmr lmk lnšwhy ʕdʔ wṣlʔ šmʕyn qly nšy lmk ṣwtyn lmʔmry mṭl dgbrʔ qṭlt bṣwlpty wṭlyʔ bšwqpy
04:24	mṭl dḥd`bšbʕʔ dḥd`bšbʕʔ ntprʕ qʔyn wlmk lšbʕyn wšbʕʔ
04:25	wḥkm ʔdm twb lḥwʔ ʔntth wbṭnt wyldt brʔ wqrt šmh šyt mṭl dyhb ly ʔlhʔ zrʕʔ ʔḥrnʔ ḥlp hbyl dqṭlh qʔyn
04:26	wlšyt ʔp lh ʔtyld lh/#3#/ brʔ wqrʔ šmh ʔnwš hydyn šry lmqrʔ bšmh dmryʔ
05:01	hnw spr twldth dʔdm bywmʔ dbrʔ ʔlhʔ lʔdm bdmwt ʔlhʔ bryhy
05:02	dkr wnqbʔ brʔ ʔnwn wbrk ʔnwn ʔlhʔ/#3#/ wqrʔ šmhwn ʔdm bywmʔ dbrʔ ʔnwn
05:03	wḥyʔ ʔdm mʔʔ wtltyn šnyn wʔwld bdmwth ʔyk ṣlmh wqrʔ šmh šyt
05:04	\wḥyʔ ʔdm /whww ywmwhy dʔdm#3#/ mn btr dʔwld lšyt tmnmʔʔ šnyn wʔwld bnyʔ wbntʔ
05:05	whww kl ywmwhy/ywmy ḥyhy#3#/ dʔdm dḥyʔ tšʕmʔʔ wtltyn šnyn wmyt
05:06	wḥyʔ šyt mʔʔ wḥmš šnyn wʔwld lʔnwš
05:07	wḥyʔ šyt mn btr dʔwld lʔnwš tmnmʔʔ wšbʕ šnyn wʔwld bnyʔ wbntʔ
05:08	whww kl ywmwhy dšyt tšʕmʔʔ wtrtʕsrʔ šnyn wmyt
05:09	wḥyʔ ʔnwš tšʕyn šnyn wʔwld lqynn
05:10	wḥyʔ ʔnwš mn btr dʔwld lqynn tmnmʔʔ wḥmšʕsrʔ šnyn wʔwld bnyʔ wbntʔ
05:11	whww kl ywmwhy dʔnwš tšʕmʔʔ wḥmš šnyn wmyt
05:12	wḥyʔ qynn šbʕyn šnyn wʔwld lmhllʔyl
05:13	wḥyʔ qynn mn btr dʔwld lmhllʔyl tmnmʔʔ wʔrbʕyn šnyn wʔwld bnyʔ wbntʔ
05:14	whww kwl/#3#/ ywmwhy dqynn tšʕmʔʔ wʕsr šnyn wmyt
05:15	wḥyʔ mhllʔyl štyn wḥmš šnyn wʔwld lyrd
05:16	wḥyʔ mhllʔyl mn btr dʔwld lyrd tmnmʔʔ wtltyn šnyn wʔwld bnyʔ wbntʔ
05:17	whww kl ywmwhy dmhllʔyl tmnmʔʔ wtšʕyn wḥmš šnyn wmyt

16:03	wdbrt sry ʔntth dʔbrm lhgr mṣrytʔ ʔmth mn btr ʕsr/ʕsryn#3#/ šnyn dytb ʔbrm bʔrʕʔ dknʕn wyhbth ʔnttʔ/sry#3#/ lʔbrm bʕlh
16:04	wʕl ʕl hgr wbṭnt wkd ḥzt dbṭnt zlt mrth bʕynyh
16:05	wʔmrt sry lʔbrm ʕwlbny ʕlyk ʔnʔ yhbt ʔmty bʕwbk wkd ḥzt dbṭnt zlt bʕynyh ndwn mryʔ byny wlk
16:06	wʔmr ʔbrm lsry ʔntth/#3#/ hʔ ʔmtky mšlmʔ bʔydyky ʕbdy lh mdm dšpyr/dšpr#3#/ bʕynyky wṣʕrth sry mrth/#3#/ wʕrqt mn qdmyh
16:07	wʔškḥh mlʔkh dmryʔ ʕl ʕynʔ/bʔrʔ#3#/ dmyʔ bmdbrʔ bʔwrḥʔ dgdr
16:08	wʔmr lh hgr ʔmth dsry mn/#3#/ ʔymkʔ ʔtyʔ ʔnty wlʔykʔ ʔzlʔ ʔnty wʔmrt mn qdm sry mrty ʕrqʔ ʔnʔ
16:09	wʔmr lh mlʔkh dmryʔ hpwky lwt mrtky wʔštʕbdy tḥyt ʔydh
16:10	wʔmr lh mlʔkh dmryʔ msgyw ʔsgʔ zrʕky wlʔ ntmnʔ mn swgʔh
16:11	wʔmr lh mlʔkh dmryʔ hʔ bṭnty wyldʔ ʔnty brʔ wtqryn šmh ʔyšmʕyl mṭl dšmʕ mryʔ/ʔlhʔ#3#/ bšwʕbdky
16:12	whw nhwʔ ʕrdʔ dbny ʔnšʔ ʔydh ʕl kl wʔydʔ dkl bh wʕl tḥwmʔ dklhwn ʔḥwhy nšrʔ
16:13	wqrt šmh dmryʔ dmll ʕmh wʔmrt ʔnt hw ʔlhʔ bḥzwʔ mṭl dʔmrt dhʔ ʔp ḥzwʔ ḥzyt mn btr dḥzny
16:14	mṭl hnʔ qrt lbrʔ hy/#3#/ brʔ dḥyʔ ḥzny hʔ hy byt rqm lbyt gdr
16:15	wyldt hgr lʔbrm brʔ wqrʔ ʔbrm šm brh \dʔtyld lh /#3#/ dyldt lh/#3#/ hgr ʔyšmʕyl
16:16	wʔbrm br tmnʔyn hwʔ wšt šnyn kd yldt hgr ʔyšmʕyl/lʔyšmʕyl#3#/ lʔbrm
17:01	whwʔ ʔbrm br tšʕyn wtšʕ šnyn wʔtgly mryʔ ʕl ʔbrm wʔmr lh ʔnʔ ʔnʔ ʔlšdy/#3#/ ʔlhʔ špr qdmy whwy dlʔ mwm
17:02	wʔtl qymy byny wlk wʔsgyk ṭb ṭb/#3#/
17:03	wnpl ʔbrm ʕl ʔpwhy wmll ʕmh ʔlhʔ wʔmr lh
17:04	ʔnʔ hʔ mqym ʔnʔ qymy ʕmk wthwʔ ʔbʔ lswgʔʔ dʕmmʔ
17:05	wlʔ ntqrʔ twb šmk ʔbrm ʔlʔ nhwʔ šmk ʔbrhm mṭl dʔbʔ lswgʔʔ dʕmmʔ yhbtk
17:06	wʔpryk/wʔprʕk#3#/ wʔsgyk ṭb ṭb/#3#/ wʔtlk lʕmmʔ/lswgʔʔ dʕmmʔ#3#/ wmlkʔ \mn ḥṣk /mnk#3#/ npqwn
17:07	wʔqym qymy byny wlk wbyt zrʕk mn btrk ldryhwn lqymʔ dlʕlm wʔhwʔ lk ʔlhʔ wlzrʕk mn btrk
17:08	wʔtl lk wlzrʕk mn btrk ʔrʕʔ dmʕmrk klh ʔrʕʔ dknʕn lywrtnʔ dlʕlm wʔhwʔ lhwn ʔlhʔ
17:09	wʔmr ʔlhʔ lʔbrhm ʔnt qymy ṭr ʔnt wzrʕk mn btrk ldryhwn
17:10	hnw qymy dtṭrwn byny wlkwn wbyt zrʕk mn btrk dtgzrwn kl dkrʔ
17:11	wtgzrwn bsrʔ dʕwrlwtkwn wthwʔ ʔtʔ dqymʔ byny wlkwn
17:12	wbr tmnyʔ ywmyn ngzwr mnkwn kl dkrʔ ldrykwn ylyd bytʔ wzbyn kspʔ mn kl br nwkryʔ dlʔ hwʔ mn zrʕk
17:13	mgzr ngzwr ylyd bytk wzbyn kspk wnhwʔ qymy bbsrkwn lqymʔ dlʕlm
17:14	wʕwrlʔ dkrʔ dlʔ ngzwr bsrʔ dʕwrlwth tʔbd npšʔ hy mn ʕmh qymy bṭlt
17:15	wʔmr ʔlhʔ lʔbrhm sry ʔnttk lʔ tqrʔ šmh sry mṭl dsrʔ šmh
17:16	wʔbrkyh wʔp ʔtl lk mnh brʔ wʔbrkywhy wnhwʔ lʕmmʔ wmlkʔ dʕmmʔ mnh nhwwn
17:17	wnpl ʔbrhm ʕl ʔpwhy wgḥk wʔmr blbh lbr mʔʔ šnyn ntyld brʔ ʔw srʔ brt tšʕyn šnyn tʔld
17:18	wʔmr ʔbrhm lʔlhʔ ʔštwp dyn ʔyšmʕyl nḥʔ qdmyk
17:19	wʔmr ʔlhʔ lʔbrhm/#3#/ šryrʔyt srʔ ʔnttk yldʔ lk brʔ wqrʔ ʔnt šmh ʔysḥq wʔqym qymy ʕmh lqymʔ dlʕlm wlzrʕh/wʕm zrʕh#3#/ mn btrh
17:20	wʕl ʔyšmʕyl šmʕtk hʔ brkth wʔsgyth wʔkbrth ṭb ṭb trʕsr rwrbnyn nwld wʔtlywhy lʕmʔ rbʔ
17:21	wqymy ʔqym ʕm/ʕl#2#/ ʔysḥq dtʔld lk srʔ lzbnʔ hnʔ lšntʔ ʔḥrtʔ
17:22	wkd šlm lmmllw ʕmh ʔtrym ʔlhʔ mn ʔbrhm
17:23	wdbr ʔbrhm lʔyšmʕyl brh wlkl ylydy byth wlkl zbyny ksph kl dkrʔ bʔnšy byt ʔbrhm wgzr bsrʔ dʕwrlwthwn bh bywmʔ hnʔ <gzr ʔbrhm lʔšmʕʔyl#3#> ʔyk dmll ʕmh ʔlhʔ
17:24	wʔbrhm br tšʕyn hwʔ wtšʕ šnyn kd gzr bsrʔ dʕwrlwth
17:25	wʔyšmʕyl brh br tltʕsrʔ hwʔ šnyn kd gzr bsrʔ dʕwrlwth
17:26	bh bywmʔ hnʔ gzr ʔbrhm lʔyšmʕyl brh
17:27	wlklhwn ʔnšy byth ylydy byth wzbyny ksph wʔp mn bny nwkryʔ gzr ʕmh
18:01	wʔtgly ʕlwhy mryʔ byt blwṭʔ dmmrʔ whw ytb <hwʔ#3#> btrʕʔ dmšknʔ kd ḥm ywmʔ
18:02	wʔrym ʕynwhy wḥzʔ whʔ tltʔ gbryn qymyn lʕl mnh wḥzʔ ʔnwn wrhṭ lʔwrʕhwn mn trʕʔ dmšknʔ wsgd ʕl ʔrʕʔ
18:03	wʔmr mryʔ ʔn ʔškḥt rḥmʔ bʕynyk lʔ tʕbr mn ʕbdk
18:04	ʔsb qlyl myʔ wʔšygw rglykwn wʔstmkw tḥyt ʔylnʔ/bṭmtʔ#3#/
18:05	wsbw pttʔ dlḥmʔ wsmwkw lbkwn wbtr kyn tʕbrwn mṭl dhknʔ ʕbrtwn ʕl ʕbdkwn wʔmrw hknʔ tʕbd ʔyk dʔmrt
18:06	wʔstrhb ʔbrhm wrhṭ/#3#/ lmšknʔ/#3#/ lwt srʔ wʔmr bʕgl tlt sʔyn qmḥʔ nšypʔ lwšy wʕbdy rʕpʔ
18:07	wlbqrʔ rhṭ ʔbrhm wnsb ʕglʔ ḥd dšmyn wṭb wyhbh lṭlyʔ wsrhb dnʕbdywhy/lmʕbdh#3#/
18:08	wnsb ḥʔwtʔ wḥlbʔ wʕglʔ dʕbd wsm qdmyhwn whw qʔm <hwʔ#3#> lʕl mnhwn tḥyt ʔylnʔ wʔklw
18:09	wʔmrw lh ʔykʔ hy srʔ ʔnttk wʔmr hʔ bmšknʔ
18:10	wʔmr lh/#3#/ mhpk ʔhpwk lwtk lzbnʔ hnʔ kd hy ḥyʔ wnhwʔ brʔ lsrʔ ʔnttk wsrʔ šmʕt btrʕʔ dmšknʔ whw bstrh
18:11	wʔbrhm wsrʔ \sʔbw wʕlw /ʕlw#3#/ bšnyʔ ʕbr mn dlmhwʔ lsrʔ ʔwrḥʔ dnšʔ
18:12	wgḥkt srʔ blbh wʔmrt <mn#2#> btr dblyt hwyʔ ly ʕlymwtʔ wmry sʔb
18:13	wʔmr mryʔ lʔbrhm lmnʔ gḥkt srʔ <blbh#3#> wʔmrt šryrʔyt ʔld ʔnʔ dsʔbt
18:14	rbʔ hy <hdʔ#3#> ṣbwtʔ mn mryʔ dlzbnʔ/dbzbnʔ#3#/ hnʔ ʔhpwk lwtk kd hy ḥyʔ wnhwʔ brʔ lsrʔ ʔnttk
18:15	wkprt srʔ wʔmrt lʔ gḥkt mṭl ddḥlt wʔmr <lh#3#> lʔ brm gḥkty

18:17	wmryʔ ʔmr mksʔ ʔnʔ mn ʕbdy ʔbrhm mdm dʕbd ʔnʔ
18:18	wʔbrhm mhwʔ nhwʔ lʕmʔ rbʔ wsgyʔʔ wntbrkwn bh klhwn ʕmmʔ dʔrʕʔ
18:19	mṭl dydʕ ʔnʔ lh dmpqd lbnwhy wlbny byth mn btrh dnṭrwn ʔwrḥth dmryʔ lmʕbd zdyqwtʔ wdynʔ mṭl dnytʔ mryʔ ʕl ʔbrhm mdm/kwl#3#/ dʔmr ʕlwhy
18:20	wʔmr mryʔ gʕtʔ dsdwm wdʕmwrʔ \ʕlt qdmy /sgyt#3#/ wḥṭhyhwn ṭb ʕšnw
18:21	ʔḥwt ʔḥzʔ ʔn ʔyk gʕtʔ dʕlt lwty/qdmy#3#/ ʕbdw wšmlyw wʔlʔ ʔdʕ
18:22	wʔtpnyw mn tmn gbrʔ wʔzlw lsdwm wʔbrhm ʕdkyl qʔm hwʔ qdm mryʔ/ʔlhʔ#3#/
18:23	wqrb ʔbrhm wʔmr bḥd rwgzʔ mwbd ʔnt zdyqʔ ʕm ḥṭyʔ
18:24	ʔn ʔyt ḥmšyn zdyqyn bgw qrytʔ brwgzʔ ḥd mwbd ʔnt wlʔ šbq ʔnt lʔtrʔ mṭl ḥmšyn zdyqyn dbgwh
18:25	ḥs lk dtʕbd <ʔyk#2#> ptgmʔ hnʔ dtqṭwl zkyʔ ʕm/ʔyk#3#/ ḥybʔ wnhwʔ zkyʔ ʔyk ḥybʔ ḥs lk dynʔ dklh ʔrʕʔ lʔ ntʕbd dynʔ hnʔ
18:26	wʔmr mryʔ ʔn ʔškḥ bsdwm ḥmšyn zdyqyn bgw qrytʔ ʔšbwq lklh ʔtrʔ mṭlthwn
18:27	wʕnʔ ʔbrhm wʔmr hʔ šryt lmmllw qdm mryʔ wʔnʔ ʕprʔ ʔnʔ wqṭmʔ
18:28	wʔn ḥsyryn mn ḥmšyn zdyqyn ḥmšʔ mḥbl ʔnt mṭl ḥmšʔ klh/lklh#3#/ qrytʔ wʔmr lʔ ʔḥbl ʔn ʔškḥ tmn ʔrbʕyn wḥmšʔ
18:29	wʔwsp twb ʔbrhm lmʔmr lh wʔn mštkḥyn tmn/#3#/ ʔrbʕyn wʔmr lʔ ʔḥbl ʔn ʔškḥ tmn ʔrbʕyn
18:30	wʔmr lʔ ntbʔš lmryʔ wʔmll wʔn mštkḥyn tmn tltyn wʔmr lʔ ʔḥbl ʔn ʔškḥ tmn tltyn
18:31	wʔmr <ʔbrhm#3#> hʔ šryt lmmllw qdm mryʔ wʔn mštkḥyn tmn ʕsryn wʔmr lʔ ʔḥbl mṭl ʕsryn
18:32	wʔmr lʔ ntbʔš lmryʔ wʔmll blḥwd zbntʔ hdʔ wʔn mštkḥyn tmn ʕsrʔ wʔmr lʔ ʔḥbl mṭl ʕsrʔ
18:33	wʔzl mryʔ kd šlm lmmllw ʕm ʔbrhm wʔbrhm hpk lʔtrh
19:01	wʔtw tryn mlʔkyn lsdwm brmšʔ wlwṭ ytb btrʕʔ dsdwm wḥzʔ ʔnwn lwṭ wqm lʔwrʕhwn wsgd ʕl ʔpwhy ʕl ʔrʕʔ
19:02	wʔmr bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnkwn mry sṭw <lwty#3#> lbyt ʕbdkwn wbwtw wʔšygw rglykwn wqdmw zlw lʔwrḥkwn wʔmrw lʔ bšwqʔ nbwt
19:03	wʔlṣ ʔnwn lwṭ/#3#/ ṭb wsṭw lwth wʕlw lbyth wʕbd lhwn mštyʔ wpṭyrʔ ʔpʔ lhwn wlʕsw
19:04	wʕdkyl lʔ dmkw wʔnšy qrytʔ ʔnšy sdwm ʔtkrkwhy lbytʔ mn ʕlymʔ wʕdmʔ lsbʔ wklh ʕmʔ mn skh
19:05	wqrw llwṭ wʔmrw lh ʔykʔ ʔnwn gbrʔ dʔtw lwtk bllyʔ ʔpq ʔnwn ln/lwtn#3#/ wndʕ ʔnwn
19:06	wnpq lwṭ lwthwn ltrʕʔ wtrʕʔ ʔḥdw btrh
19:07	wʔmr lhwn lwṭ/#3#/ lʔ tbʔšwn ʔḥy
19:08	hʔ ʔyt ly trtyn bnn dlʔ ydʕ ʔnyn gbr ʔpq ʔnyn lkwn wʕbdw lhyn ʔyknʔ/ʔyk#3#/ dšpyr/dšpr#3#/ bʕynykwn blḥwd lgbrʔ hlyn lʔ tʕbdwn mdm mṭl dʕlw lṭllʔ dqryty
19:09	wʔmrw prwq lhl wʔmrw <lh#3#> ḥd ʔtʔ lmttwtbw ʕmn whʔ dʔn ln dynʔ hšʔ nbʔš lk mn dlhwn wʔtktš ʕm gbrʔ lwṭ ṭb wqrbw lmtbr trʕʔ
19:10	wʔwšṭw gbrʔ ʔydyhwn wʔʕlw llwṭ lwthwn/#3#/ lbytʔ wtrʕʔ ʔḥdw
19:11	wgbrʔ dbtrʕʔ dbytʔ blʕw bšrgrgytʔ mn zʕwrʔ wʕdmʔ lrbʔ wlʔyw lmškḥw trʕʔ/ltrʕʔ#3#/
19:12	wʔmrw gbrʔ llwṭ mnʔ ʕbd ʔnt <mkyl#3#> hrkʔ ḥtnyk wbnyk wbntk wkl dʔyt lk bqrytʔ ʔpq mn ʔtrʔ hnʔ
19:13	mṭl dmḥblynn lh lʔtrʔ hnʔ mṭl dslqt gʕthwn qdm mryʔ wšdrn mryʔ lmḥblwth
19:14	wnpq lwṭ wmll ʕm ḥtnwhy nsby bnth wʔmr lhwn/#3#/ qwmw pwqw mn ʔtrʔ hnʔ mṭl dmḥbl lh mryʔ whwʔ ʔyk mgḥk bʕyny ḥtnwhy
19:15	wkd slq šprʔ/ṣprʔ#3#/ ʔlṣwhy mlʔkʔ llwṭ wʔmryn lh qwm dbr ʔnttk/lʔnttk#3#/ wtrtyn bntk dʔštkḥ dlmʔ tblʕ bḥṭhyh dqrytʔ
19:16	wʔštwḥr lwṭ wʔḥdw mlʔkʔ/gbrʔ#3#/ bʔydh wbʔydʔ dʔntth wbʔydʔ dtrtyn bnth mṭl dḥs mryʔ ʕlwhy wʔpqwhy wʔšrywhy lbr mn qrytʔ
19:17	wkd ʔpqw ʔnwn lbr ʔmryn lh plṭ npšk lʔ ttpnʔ lbstrk wlʔ tqwm bklh pqʕtʔ lṭwrʔ ʔtplṭ dlʔ tʔbd
19:18	wʔmr lhwn/#3#/ lwṭ/#3#/ bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnkwn mry
19:19	hʔ ʔškḥ ʕbdk rḥmʔ bʕynyk wsgyʔʔ hy ṭybwtk dʕbdt ʕmy lmḥyw npšy wʔnʔ lʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ <hšʔ#3#> lmtplṭw lṭwrʔ dlmʔ tdrkny byštʔ wʔmwt
19:20	hʔ qrytʔ hdʔ qrybʔ hy/ly#3#/#3#/ lmʕrq ltmn why/whʔ#3#/ zʕwryʔ hy/#3#/ ʔtplṭ ltmn hʔ zʕwryʔ hy wtḥʔ npšy
19:21	wʔmr lh hʔ nsbt bʔpyk ʔp bptgmʔ hnʔ dlʔ ʔhpwk qrytʔ dʔmrt
19:22	bʕgl ʔtplṭ ltmn mṭl dlʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ dʔʕbd mdm ʕdmʔ dʕʔl ʔnt ltmn mṭl hnʔ qrʔ šmh dqrytʔ <hy#3#> ṣʕr
19:23	šmšʔ npq ʕl ʔrʕʔ wlwṭ ʕl lṣʕr
19:24	wmryʔ ʔḥt ʕl sdwm wʕl ʕmwrʔ kbrytʔ wnwrʔ mn qdm mryʔ mn šmyʔ
19:25	whpk lqwryʔ hlyn wlklh pqʕtʔ wlklhwn ytby ʔrʕʔ/qwryʔ#3#/ wlmwʕyth dʔrʕʔ
19:26	wʔtpnyt ʔntth mn bstrh whwt qymtʔ dmlḥʔ
19:27	wqdm ʔbrhm bṣprʔ lʔtrʔ dqʔm hwʔ tmn qdm mryʔ
19:28	wḥr lʔpy sdwm wʕmwrʔ wlʔpy klh ʔrʕʔ dpqʕtʔ wḥzʔ whʔ slq tnnh dʔrʕʔ ʔyk tnnʔ dʔtwnʔ
19:29	whwʔ dkd ḥbl ʔlhʔ qwryʔ/lqwryʔ#3#/ dpqʕtʔ ʔtdkr ʔlhʔ/mryʔ#3#/ lʔbrhm wšdr llwṭ mn gw hpyktʔ kd hpk qwryʔ dytb hwʔ bhyn lwṭ
19:30	wslq lwṭ mn ṣʕr wytb bṭwrʔ hw wtrtyn bnth ʕmh mṭl ddḥl lmtb bṣʕr wytb bmʕrtʔ hw/#3#/ wtrtyn bnth
19:31	wʔmrt qšyštʔ lzʕwrtʔ hʔ ʔbwn sʔb wgbrʔ lyt bʔrʕʔ/bʔtrʔ#3#/ dnʕwl ʕlyn ʔyk ʔwrḥʔ dklh ʔrʕʔ
19:32	ty nšqʔ lʔbwn ḥmrʔ wndmk ʕmh wnqym mn ʔbwn zrʕʔ
19:33	wʔšqy bllyʔ hw lʔbwhyn ḥmrʔ wʕlt qšyštʔ wdmkt ʕm ʔbwh wlʔ ydʕ bmdmkh wbmqmh
19:34	whwʔ \lbtr ywmʔ /lbtrh dywmʔ#3#/ wʔmrt qšyštʔ lzʕwrtʔ hʔ dmkt brmšʔ ʕm ʔby nšqywhy ḥmrʔ ʔp bllyʔ hnʔ wʕwly dmky ʕmh wnqym mn ʔbwn zrʕʔ
19:35	wʔšqyyhy ʔp bllyʔ hw lʔbwhyn ḥmrʔ wʕlt zʕwrtʔ wdmkt ʕmh wlʔ ydʕ bmdmkh wbmqmh
19:36	wbṭn trtyhyn bnth dlwṭ mn ʔbwhyn
19:37	wyldt qšyštʔ brʔ wqrt šmh mwʔb hwyw ʔbwhwn dmwʔbyʔ ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
19:38	wzʕwrtʔ ʔp hy yldt brʔ wqrt šmh br ʕmy hwyw ʔbwhwn dbny ʕmwn ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
20:01	wšql mn tmn ʔbrhm lʔrʕʔ dtymnʔ wytb byt rqm \lbyt gdr /lgdr#3#/ wʕmr ʔbrhm bgdr
20:02	wʔmr ʔbrhm ʕl srʔ ʔntth dḥty hy wšdr ʔbymlk mlkʔ dgdr wdbrh lsrʔ
20:03	wʔtʔ ʔlhʔ ʕl ʔbymlk bḥlmʔ dllyʔ wʔmr lh hʔ mʔt ʔnt ʕl ʔpy ʔnttʔ ddbrt mṭl dʔntt gbrʔ hy
20:04	wʔbymlk lʔ qrb lh wʔmr ʔbymlk mryʔ <ʔlhʔ#3#> ʔp ʕmʔ zkyʔ qṭl ʔnt
20:05	hʔ hw ʔmr <ly#3#> dḥty hy wʔp hy ʔmrt dʔḥy hw \btmymwt lby /btmymwtʔ dlby#3#/ wbdkywtʔ dʔydy ʕbdt hdʔ

24:28	wrhṭt ṭlytʔ wḥwyt lbyt ʔbwh/ʔmh#3#/ mlʔ hlyn

24:30	kd ḥzʔ qdšʔ wšʔrʔ bʔydy ḥth wkd šmʕ mlyh drpqʔ ḥth dʔmrt dhknʔ ʔmr ly gbrʔ wʔtʔ lwt gbrʔ whʔ/whw#3#/ qʔm lwt gmlʔ ʕl brʔ/ʕynʔ#3#/
24:31	wʔmr lh/#3#/ ʕwl brykh dmryʔ lmnʔ qʔm ʔnt bšwqʔ wʔnʔ tqnt bytʔ wdwktʔ lgmlʔ

24:41	whydyn ttḥsʔ mn mwmty kd tʔzl lšrbty \wʔn lʔ /dʔlʔ#3#/ ntlwn lk hwyt mḥsy mn mwmty
24:42	wʔtyt ywmnʔ \lwt brʔ /lʕynʔ#3#/ wʔmrt mryʔ ʔlhh dmry ʔbrhm ʔn ʔtqnt ʔwrḥy dʔtyt/dʔzl ʔnʔ#3#/ ʕlyh
24:43	hʔ ʔnʔ/#3#/ qʔm ʔnʔ ʕl brʔ/ʕynʔ#3#/ dmyʔ wʕlymtʔ dnpqʔ lmmlʔ myʔ/#3#/ wʔmr lh ʔšqʔyny qlyl myʔ mn qwltky
24:44	wtʔmr ly ʔp/dʔp#3#/ ʔnt ʔšty ʔp lgmlyk ʔmlʔ hy hy ʔnttʔ/#3#/ dṭyb mryʔ lbr mry
24:45	wʔnʔ ʕdkyl lʔ šlmt/gmrt#3#/ lmmllw blby/#3#/ whʔ rpqʔ npqt wqwltʔ ʕl ktph wnḥtt lʕynʔ wmlt wʔmrt lh ʔšqʔyny \qlyl myʔ mn qwltky /#3#/
24:46	wʔstrhbt wʔḥtt qwlth mnh wʔmrt ly/#3#/ ʔšty wʔp lgmlyk ʔšqʔ wʔštyt wʔp lgmly ʔšqyt
24:47	wšʔlth wʔmrt lh brt mn ʔnty wʔmrt brt btwʔyl ʔnʔ br nḥwr dyldt lh mlkʔ wʔrmyt šʔrʔ bʔydyh wqdšʔ bʔdnyh
24:48	wqʕdt wsgdt lmryʔ wbrkt lmryʔ ʔlhh dmry ʔbrhm ddbrny bʔwrḥʔ dqwštʔ \lbyt ʔḥwhy dmry /#3#/ lmsb brt ʔḥwhy dmry lbrh
24:49	whšʔ ʔn ʕbdyn ʔntwn ṭybwtʔ wqwštʔ ʕm mry ḥwʔwny wʔlʔ ḥwʔwny wʔtpnʔ lymynʔ wlsmlʔ/ʔw lsmlʔ#3#/

27:01	whwʔ dkd sʔb ʔysḥq wyqr ʕynwhy lmḥzʔ qrʔ lʕsw brh rbʔ wʔmr lh bry wʔmr hʔ ʔnʔ

27:13	wʔmrt lh ʔmh ʕly lwṭtk bry blḥwd/brm#3#/ šmʕ bqly wzl sb ly
27:14	wʔzl nsb wʔyty lʔmh wʕbdt ʔmh bwšlʔ ʔyknʔ/ʔyk#3#/ drḥm ʔbwhy

27:17	wyhbt bwšlʔ wlḥmʔ dʕbdt lyʕqwb brh
27:18	wʔʕl lʔbwhy wʔmr ʔby wʔmr hʔ ʔnʔ wʔmr mn ʔnt bry
27:19	wʔmr yʕqwb lʔbwhy ʔnʔ hw brk/#3#/ bwkrk ʕsw ʕbdt ʔyk dʔmrt ly qwm tb wʔkwl mn ṣydy mṭl dtbrkny npšk
27:20	wʔmr ʔysḥq lbrh mnw hnʔ dbʕgl ʔškḥt bry wʔmr <lʔbwhy#3#> mdm dṭyb mryʔ ʔlhk qdmy
27:21	wʔmr <lh#3#> ʔysḥq lyʕqwb brh/#3#/ qrwb nʔ ʔmwšk bry ʔn ʔnt hw bry ʕsw ʔw lʔ
27:22	wqrb yʕqwb lwt ʔysḥq ʔbwhy wmšh wʔmr <ʔysḥq#3#> qlʔ dyʕqwb wgšt ʔydyʔ dʕsw
27:23	wlʔ ʔštwdʕh mṭl dhwy ʔydwhy ʔyk ʔydy ʕsw ʔḥwhy sʕrn wbrkh

27:30	wkd šlm/gmr#3#/ ʔysḥq lmbrkwth lyʕqwb wnpq yʕqwb mn lwt ʔysḥq ʔbwhy \whʔ ʕsw /wʕsw#3#/ ʔḥwhy ʔtʔ mn ṣydh
27:31	wʕbd ʔp hw bwšlʔ wʔʕl/wʔwbl#3#/ lʔbwhy wʔmr lʔbwhy nqwm ʔby wnlʕs mn ṣydʔ dbrh/dṣd brh#3#/ mṭl dtbrkny npšk

27:34	wkd šmʕ ʕsw mlwhy dʔbwhy ʔyll ʔylltʔ rbtʔ wmryrtʔ dṭb wʔmr lʔbwhy brkyny ʔp ly ʔby
27:35	ʔmr lh/#3#/ ʔbwhy/#3#/ ʕl ʔḥwk bnklʔ wqbl ʔnyn/#3#/ bwrktk

27:37	ʕnʔ ʔysḥq wʔmr lʕsw hʔ ršʔ ʕbdth lk ʔp klhwn ʔḥwhy yhbt lh ʕbdʔ wbʕbwrʔ wbḥmrʔ smkth wlk hkyl mnʔ ʔʕbd bry

27:39	ʕnʔ ʔysḥq ʔbwhy wʔmr lh hʔ bšwmnh dʔrʕʔ nhwʔ mwtbk wmn ṭlʔ dšmyʔ mn lʕl

27:42	wʔtʔmr lrpqʔ mlwhy dʕsw brh qšyšʔ wšdrt qrt lyʕqwb brh zʕwrʔ wʔmrt lh hʔ ʕsw ʔḥwk mtlḥm lk lmqṭlk
27:43	hšʔ bry šmʕ bqly wqwm zl lk/#2#/ lwt lbn ʔḥy lḥrn

27:46	wʔmrt rpqʔ lʔysḥq ʕqt ly bḥyy mn qdm bnt ḥyt ʔn nsb yʕqwb ʔnttʔ mn bnt ḥyt ʔyk hlyn bnt ʔrʕʔ lmnʔ ʔzlyn ly ḥyʔ

30:01	wḥzt rḥyl dlʔ yldʔ lyʕqwb wṭnt bḥth wʔmrt lyʕqwb hb ly bnyʔ wʔlʔ mytʔ ʔnʔ

30:17	wšmʕh ʔlhʔ llyʔ wbṭnt wyldt lyʕqwb brʔ dḥmšʔ

30:20	wʔmrt lyʔ zbdny ʔlhʔ zbdʔ ṭbʔ zbnʔ hnʔ ntnqp ly bʕly mṭl dyldt lh štʔ bnyn wqrt šmh zbwlwn
30:21	wbtrkn yldt brtʔ wqrt šmh dynʔ

30:26	hb ly nšy wbny dplḥtk bhwn wʔzl mṭl dʔnt ydʕ ʔnt pwlḥnʔ dplḥtk
30:27	wʔmr lbn lyʕqwb/#3#/ ʔn ʔškḥt rḥmʔ bʕynyk nsyt dbrkny mryʔ mṭltk
30:28	wʔmr <lh#3#> prwš ʔgrk ʕly wʔtl

30:30	mṭl/#3#/ dqlyl ʔyt hwʔ lk qdmy wsgy ṭb wbrkk mryʔ mṭlty/brgly#3#/ whšʔ mnʔ ʔʕbd wʔp ʔnʔ lbyty
30:31	ʔmr lh/#3#/ lbn/#3#/ mnʔ ʔtl lk ʔmr lh/#3#/ yʕqwb lʔ ttl ly mdm ʔn tʕbd ly/#3#/ ptgmʔ <hnʔ#23#> \dʔmr ʔnʔ lk /#3#/ ʔhpwk ʔrʕʔ ʕnk wʔṭr
30:32	ʔʕbr bklh ʕnk ywmnʔ wʔprwš ly/#3#/ mn tmn kl ʔmrʔ dqrḥ wpysky wkl ʔmrʔ dʔkm bḥwrtʔ wpysky wqrḥ bʕzʔ wnhwʔ ʔgry
30:33	wtshd ʕly zkwty ʔyk dywmnʔ dmḥr kd tʕwl ʕl ʔgry qdmyk kl dlʔ hwʔ qrḥ wpysky bʕzʔ wʔkm bḥwrtʔ gnybʔ hw ly
30:34	ʔmr lh/#3#/ lbn ʔyn nhwʔ ʔyk mltk
30:35	wprš bywmʔ hw tyšʔ qrḥʔ wpyskyʔ wklhyn ʕzʔ qrḥtʔ wpyskytʔ wkl dʔyt bhyn ḥwrʔ wkl dʔkm bḥwrtʔ wyhb byd bnwhy
30:36	wʕbd mrdʔ tltʔ ywmyn bynwhy llbn wyʕqwb rʕʔ <hwʔ#3#> ʕnh dlbn hy dʔštḥrt

30:38	wdʕṣ ʔnyn lzqtʔ dqlp brhṭʔ dmyʔ byt mštyʔ <dmyʔ#3#> kr dʔtyn ʕnʔ lmštʔ lwqbl ʕnʔ wḥmyn mʔ dʔtyn lmštʔ
30:39	wḥmn ʕnʔ ʕl zqtʔ wyldn ʕnʔ <ʔmrʔ#3#> qrḥʔ wpyskyʔ <wʔmrʔ#3#/brdʔ#3#>
30:40	wprš yʕqwb wyhb qdm ʕnʔ ʔmrʔ qrḥʔ wpyskyʔ/#3#/ wkl dʔkm bʕnh dlbn wʕbd lh gzrʔ blḥwdwhy wlʔ ḥlṭ ʔnwn bʕnh dlbn
30:41	wbkl šʕʔ/šnʔ#23#/zbnʔ#3#/ dḥmʔ ʕnʔ bkyrytʔ sʔm yʕqwb zqtʔ qdm ʕnʔ brhṭʔ dnḥmyn bzqtʔ

31:01	wšmʕ yʕqwb mlyhwn dbny lbn dʔmryn nsb yʕqwb kl dʔyt hwʔ lʔbwn wmn dʔbwn qnʔ hnʔ qnynʔ klh

31:06	wʔntyn ydʕn ʔntyn dbklh ḥyly plḥt lʔbwkyn

31:13	ʔnʔ ʔnʔ ʔlhʔ dbyt ʔyl dmšḥt ly tmn qymtʔ wndrt ly tmn ndrʔ hšʔ qwm pwq mn ʔrʕʔ hdʔ whpwk lʔrʕʔ dtwldtk

34:10	wʕmn tbw wʔrʕʔ hʔ qdmykwn tbw wʔttgrw wyrtw bh

37:36	wmdynyʔ zbnwhy bmṣryn lpwṭypr mhymnʔ rb dḥšʔ dprʕwn
38:01	whwʔ bzbnʔ hw wnḥt yhwdʔ mn lwt ʔḥwhy wsṭʔ lwt gbrʔ ʕrlmyʔ wšmh ḥyrʔ
38:02	wḥzʔ tmn/#3#/ yhwdʔ brt gbrʔ knʕnyʔ wšmh šwʕ wnsbh wʕl lwth
38:03	wbṭnt wyldt lh/#3#/ brʔ wqrʔ šmh ʕyr
38:04	wbṭnt twb wyldt brʔ wqrʔ šmh ʔwnn
38:05	wʔwspt twb wyldt brʔ wqrʔ šmh šlʔ wpsqt hwt kd yldth
38:06	wnsb yhwdʔ ʔnttʔ lʕyr bwkrh wšmh tmr
38:07	whwʔ ʕyr bwkrh dyhwdʔ byš qdm mryʔ wʔmyth mryʔ
38:08	wʔmr yhwdʔ lʔwnn brh/#3#/ ʕwl ʕl ʔntt ʔḥwk wybmyh wʔqym zrʕʔ lʔḥwk
38:09	wydʕ ʔwnn dlh lʔ hwʔ zrʕʔ wmʔ dʕʔl hwʔ ʕl ʔntt ʔḥwhy mḥbl hwʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ dlʔ nqym zrʕʔ lʔḥwhy
38:10	wʔtbʔš qdm mryʔ mdm dʕbd wʔmyth ʔp lh
38:11	wʔmr yhwdʔ ltmr klth tby bʔrmlwtʔ byt ʔbwky ʕdmʔ dnrbʔ šlʔ bry mṭl dʔmr dlmʔ nmwt ʔp hw ʔyk ʔḥwhy wʔzlt tmr wytbt byt ʔbwh
38:12	wsgyw ywmtʔ wmytt brt šwʕ ʔntth dyhwdʔ wʔtbyʔ yhwdʔ wslq lwt gzy ʕnh hw wḥyrʔ rḥmh ʕrlmyʔ ltmnt
38:13	wḥwyw/wʔtḥwy#3#/ ltmr wʔmrw lh hʔ ḥmwky slq ltmnt lmgz ʕnh
38:14	wʔʕbrt lbwšy ʔrmlwth mnh wʔtksyt bʔrdydʔ wʔṣṭbtt wytbt bplšt ʔwrḥtʔ dbʔwrḥʔ dtmnt mṭl dḥzt drbʔ šlʔ why lʔ mtyhbʔ lh <ʔnttʔ#3#>
38:15	wḥzh yhwdʔ wḥšbh ʔyk znytʔ mṭl dksyt ʔpyh
38:16	wsṭʔ lwth lʔwrḥʔ wʔmr lh/#3#/ ty ʔʕwl lwtky mṭl dlʔ ydʕ hwʔ dklth hy wʔmrt lh/#3#/ mnʔ yhb ʔnt <ly#3#> dʕʔl ʔnt lwty
38:17	wʔmr ʔnʔ ʔšdr gdyʔ dʕzʔ mn ʕnʔ wʔmrt ʔn ttl ly/#3#/ mšknʔ ʕdmʔ dmšdr ʔnt
38:18	wʔmr mnʔ mšknʔ ʔtl lky wʔmrt ʕzqtk wšwšpk wḥwṭrk dbʔydk wyhb lh wʕl lwth wbṭnt mnh
38:19	wqmt wʔzlt wʔʕbrt ʔrdydʔ mnh wlbšt lbwšy ʔrmlwth
38:20	wšdr yhwdʔ gdyʔ dʕzʔ byd rḥmh ʕrlmyʔ lmsb mšknʔ mn ʔydyh dʔnttʔ wlʔ ʔškḥh
38:21	wšʔl lʔnšy ʔtrʔ wʔmr ʔykʔ hy znytʔ dytbʔ bplšt ʔwrḥtʔ wʔmrw lyt hrkʔ znytʔ
38:22	whpk lwt yhwdʔ wʔmr lʔ ʔškḥth wʔp ʔnšy ʔtrʔ ʔmryn lyt hrkʔ znytʔ
38:23	wʔmr yhwdʔ tsb lh dlmʔ ʔhwʔ gwḥkʔ hʔ šdrt gdyʔ hnʔ \wʔnt lʔ /wlʔ#3#/ ʔškḥth
38:24	whwʔ mn/#3#/ btr tltʔ yrḥyn wʔtḥwy lyhwdʔ wʔmrw lh znyt tmr kltk whʔ mn znywtʔ bṭnʔ wʔmr yhwdʔ ʔpqwh wtʔqd
38:25	wkd hnwn mpqyn lh šlḥʔ lḥmwh <wʔmrʔ#3#> mn gbrʔ dhlyn dylh mnh bṭnʔ ʔnʔ wʔmrt ʔštwdʕ dmn hy ʕzqtʔ wšwšpʔ wḥwṭrʔ hlyn
38:26	whw ʔštwdʕ wʔmr yhwdʔ zkyʔ hy mny mṭl hnʔ lʔ yhbth lšlʔ bry wlʔ ʔwsp twb lmdʕh
38:27	whwʔ zbn mwldh whʔ tʔmʔ bkrsh
38:28	whwʔ dkd yldʔ yhb ʔydh wnsbt ḥytʔ ḥwṭʔ dzḥwrytʔ wqṭrt ʕl ʔydh wʔmrt hnʔ npwq qdmyt
38:29	wkd ʔhpk ʔydh npq ʔḥwhy wʔmrt mʔ ʔttrʕt ʕlyky twrʕtʔ wqrt šmh prṣ
38:30	wbtrkn npq ʔḥwhy dʕl ʔydh ḥwṭʔ dzḥwrytʔ wqrt šmh zrḥ
39:01	wlywsp ʔḥtwhy mdynyʔ lmṣryn wzbnh pwṭypr mhymnʔ rb dḥšʔ dprʕwn gbrʔ mṣryʔ mn ʔydʔ dʕrbyʔ dʔḥtwhy ltmn
39:02	whwʔ mryʔ ʕm ywsp whwʔ gbrʔ mṣlḥ byt mrh mṣryʔ
39:03	wḥzʔ mrh dmryʔ ʕmh wkl dʕbd mryʔ mṣlḥ bʔydh
39:04	wʔškḥ ywsp rḥmʔ bʕynwhy wšmšh wʔšlṭh ʕl byth wkl dʔyt lh yhb bʔydwhy
39:05	whwʔ mn zbnʔ dʔšlṭh ʕl byth wʕl kl dʔyt lh brk mryʔ lbyth dmṣryʔ mṭl ywsp whwt bwrkth dmryʔ bkl dʔyt lh bbytʔ wbḥqlʔ
39:06	wšbq klmdm/kl#3#/ dʔyt lh byd ywsp wlʔ ydʕ ʕmh mdm ʔlʔ ʔn lḥmʔ dʔkl hwʔ wywsp špyr hwʔ ḥzwh/bḥzwh#3#/ wyʔʔ hwʔ/#3#/ qwbllh
39:07	whwʔ mn btr ptgmʔ/mlʔ#3#/ hlyn ʔrmyt ʔntt mrh ʕynh ʕl ywsp wʔmrt lh dmk ʕmy
39:08	wlʔ ṣbʔ wʔmr lʔntt mrh hʔ mry lʔ ydʕ ʕmy mnʔ ʔyt bbyth wkl dʔyt lh ʔšlṭ bʔydy
39:09	wlyt drb bbytʔ hnʔ mny wlʔ ḥsk mny mdm ʔlʔ ʔn lky dʔntth ʔnty wʔyknʔ ʔʕbd byštʔ hdʔ rbtʔ wʔḥṭʔ lʔlhʔ
39:10	wkd ʔmrʔ hwt lh klywm <lywsp#3#> wlʔ šmʕ hwʔ lh lmdmk lwth wlmhwʔ ʕmh
39:11	whwʔ \bḥd mn /btr#3#/ ywmtʔ wʕl ywsp/#3#/ lbytʔ lmʕbd ʕbdʔ wlyt ʔnš mn ʔnšy bytʔ tmn bbytʔ
39:12	wʔḥdth blbšh wʔmrt lh/#3#/ dmk ʕmy wšbqh lbšh bʔydyh wʕrq npq lh lšwqʔ
39:13	whwʔ dkd ḥzt dšbqh lbšh bʔydyh wʕrq lšwqʔ
39:14	qrt lʔnšy byth wʔmrt lhwn ḥzw dʔyty ln ʕbdʔ ʕbryʔ lmgḥk ʕlyn ʕl ʕly lmdmk ʕmy wqʕyt bqlʔ rmʔ/rbʔ#3#/
39:15	wkd šmʕ dʔrymt qly wqʕyt/wqryt#3#/ šbqh lbšh lwty/bʔydy#3#/ wʕrq npq lh lšwqʔ
39:16	wsmth lbšh lwth ʕdmʔ dʕl mrh lbytʔ
39:17	wʔmrt lh ʔyk mlʔ hlyn ʕl ʕly ʕbdʔ ʕbryʔ dʔytyt ln lmgḥkw bn
39:18	wkd ʔrymt qly wqʕyt šbqh lbšh bʔydy wʕrq npq lh lšwqʔ
39:19	wkd šmʕ mrh mlyh dʔntth dʔmrt lh dʔyk mlʔ hlyn ʕbd ly ʕbdk ʔtḥmt rwgzh
39:20	wdbrh mrh <lywsp#3#> wʔrmyh byt ʔsyrʔ ʔtr dʔsyry mlkʔ ʔsyryn hww/#3#/ whwʔ tmn byt ʔsyrʔ
39:21	whwʔ mryʔ ʕm ywsp wʔrmy ʕlwhy ḥsdʔ wyhbh lrḥmʔ bʕyny rb byt ʔsyrʔ
39:22	wʔšlm rb <byt#3#> ʔsyrʔ byd ywsp klhwn ʔsyrʔ dbbyt ʔsyrʔ wkl dʕbdyn hww tmn hw ʕbd hwʔ
39:23	wrb <byt#3#> ʔsyrʔ lʔ ḥzʔ hwʔ mdm bʔydh mṭl dmryʔ <hwʔ#3#> ʕmh \wkl mdm /wmdm#3#/ dʕbd hwʔ mryʔ mṣlḥ
40:01	whwʔ mn btr ptgmʔ hlyn ḥṭw rb šqwtʔ dmlkʔ dmṣryn wrb nḥtwmʔ lmrhwn mlkʔ dmṣryn
40:02	wrgz prʕwn ʕl tryn mhymnwhy ʕl rb šqwtʔ \wʕl rb /wrb#3#/ nḥtwmʔ
40:03	wʔrmy ʔnwn byt ʔsyrʔ byt rb dḥšʔ <byt ʔsyrʔ#3#> bʔtrʔ dywsp ʔsyr <hwʔ#3#> tmn
40:04	wʔšlṭ rb dḥšʔ lywsp ʕlyhwn wšmš ʔnwn whww ywmtʔ byt ʔsyrʔ
40:05	wḥlmw ḥlmʔ tryhwn gbr ḥlmh bllyʔ ḥd gbr ʔyk pšr ḥlmh šqyʔ wnḥtwmʔ dmlkʔ dmṣryn dʔsyryn byt ʔsyrʔ
40:06	wʕl lwthwn ywsp bṣprʔ wḥzʔ ʔnwn whʔ kmyryn
40:07	wšʔl lmhymny prʕwn dʕmh bḥbwšyʔ byt mrh wʔmr lhwn/#3#/ lmnʔ kmyrn ʔpykwn ywmnʔ
40:08	wʔmrw lh ḥlmʔ ḥlmn wpšwrʔ lyt lh ʔmr lhwn ywsp hʔ dʔlhʔ ʔnwn pšrʔ ʔštʕw ly <gbr ḥlmh#3#>
40:09	wʔštʕy <lh#3#> rb šqwtʔ ḥlmh lywsp wʔmr lh bḥlmy hʔ gptʔ qdmy
40:10	wbgptʔ tlt šbštyn why kd prʕt yʕw ṭrpyh wbšlw sgwlyh hww ʕnbʔ
40:11	wksʔ dprʕwn bʔydy wnsbt ʕnbʔ wʕṣrt ʔnyn bksh dprʕwn wyhbt ksʔ \lʔydy prʕwn /lʔydh dprʕwn#3#/
40:12	ʔmr lh ywsp hnw pšrh dḥlmk/#3#/ tlt šbštyn tltʔ ʔnwn ywmyn
40:13	<mn#3#> btr tltʔ ywmyn ntdkrk prʕwn wnhpkk ʕl šdtk wttl ksʔ lprʕwn bʔydh ʔyk nmwsʔ qdmyʔ dmšqʔ hwyt lh
40:14	ʔlʔ ʔtdkryny ʕmk kd nṭʔb lk wʕbd ʕmy ṭybwtʔ wqwštʔ wʔtdkryny qdm prʕwn wʔpqyny mn byt ʔsyrʔ hnʔ
40:15	mṭl dmgnb gnyb ʔnʔ mn ʔrʕʔ dʕbryʔ wʔp hrkʔ mdm lʔ ʕbdt dʔrmywny bgwbʔ/byt ʔsyrʔ#3#/
40:16	wḥzʔ rb nḥtwmʔ dšpyr pšr wʔmr lywsp wʔp ʔnʔ bḥlmy whʔ tltʔ slʔ dḥwrtʔ ʕl ršy
40:17	wbslʔ ʕlyʔ mn kl mʔklh dprʕwn ʕbdʔ dnḥtwmʔ wḥywt knpʔ ʔklʔ lhwn mn slʔ mn lʕl mn ršy
40:18	ʕnʔ ywsp wʔmr lh/#3#/lrb nḥtwmʔ#2#/ hnw pšrh dḥlmk tltʔ slyn tltʔ ʔnwn ywmyn
40:19	<mn#3#> btr tltʔ ywmyn nsb prʕwn ršk mnk wnzqpk ʕl qysʔ wtʔkwl prḥtʔ bsrk mnk
40:20	whwʔ bywmʔ tlytyʔ bywmʔ dbyt yldh dprʕwn ʕbd prʕwn/#3#/ mštyʔ lklhwn ʕbdwhy wʔtdkr lrb šqwtʔ wlrb nḥtwmʔ bgw ʕbdwhy
40:21	wʔqym lrb šqwtʔ ʕl šdth wyhb ksʔ \ʕl ʔydy /lʔydy#3#/ prʕwn
40:22	wlrb nḥtwmʔ zqp ʔyk dpšr lhwn ywsp
40:23	wlʔ ʔtdkr rb šqwtʔ lywsp wṭʕyhy
41:01	whwʔ mn btr trtyn šnyn wprʕwn ḥlm ḥlmʔ/#3#/ whʔ qʔm ʕl nhrʔ
41:02	whʔ mn nhrʔ slqn šbʕ twrn špyrn bḥzwhyn wšmynn bbsrhyn wrʕyn bmrgʔ
41:03	whʔ šbʕ twrtʔ ʔḥrnytʔ slqn btrhyn mn nhrʔ byšn bḥzwhyn wmḥyln bbsrhyn wqm ʕl gnb twrtʔ ʕl spt nhrʔ
41:04	wʔkl twrtʔ dbyšn bḥzwhyn/#3#/ wmḥyln bbsrhyn lšbʕ twrtʔ dšpyrn bḥzwhyn wšmynn bbsrhyn wʔttʕyr prʕwn
41:05	wdmk wḥlm dtrtyn zbnyn whʔ šbʕ šblyn slqn bqnyʔ ḥd mlyn wṭbn
41:06	whʔ šbʕ šblyn <ʔḥrnyn#3#> qṭynn wšqypn lrwḥʔ dšwbʔ yʕyn btrhyn
41:07	wblʕ šblʔ qṭyntʔ lšbʕ šblʔ šmyntʔ wmlytʔ wʔtʕyr prʕwn whʔ ḥlmʔ hw
41:08	whwʔ bṣprʔ wʔtṭrpt rwḥh dprʕwn/#3#/ wšdr qrʔ lklhwn ḥršʔ wlklhwn ḥkymyh dmṣryn wʔštʕy lhwn prʕwn ḥlmwhy wlyt <ʔnš#3#> dpšr \lhwn lprʕwn /ḥlmwhy#3#/
41:09	wmll rb šqwtʔ qdm prʕwn wʔmr swrḥny mdkr ʔnʔ ywmnʔ
41:10	prʕwn rgz ʕl ʕbdwhy wʔrmyn byt ʔsyrʔ byt rb dḥšʔ ly wlrb nḥtwmʔ
41:11	wḥlmn ḥlmʔ bllyʔ ḥd ʔnʔ whw gbr ʔyk pšr ḥlmh ḥlmn
41:12	wtmn ʕmn ʕlymʔ ʕbryʔ ʕbdʔ <hw#3#> drb dḥšʔ wʔštʕyn lh wpšr ln ḥlmyn ʔnš ʔyk ḥlmh pšr
41:13	wʔyk/wʔyknʔ#3#/ dpšr ln hknʔ hwʔ ln/#3#/ ly ʔhpk \ʕl šdty/lšdty/#3#/ wlhw zqp
41:14	wšdr prʕwn wqryhy lywsp wʔrhṭwhy mn gwbʔ wgrʕ wḥlp nḥtwhy wʕl/qm#3#/ qdm prʕwn
41:15	wʔmr prʕwn lywsp ḥlmʔ ḥlmt wpšwrʔ lyt lh wʔnʔ šmʕt ʕlyk dšmʕ ʔnt ḥlmʔ wpšr ʔnt lh
41:16	ʕnʔ ywsp wʔmr lprʕwn dlmʔ sbr ʔnt dblʕd <mn#2#> ʔlhʔ nʕnʔ šlmʔ lprʕwn
41:17	wʔmr prʕwn lywsp bḥlmy hʔ qʔm ʔnʔ ʕl spt nhrʔ
41:18	whʔ mn nhrʔ slqn šbʕ twrtʔ šmynn/šmyn#3#/ bbsrhyn \wšpyr ḥzwhyn /wšpyrn bḥzwhyn#3#/ wrʕyn bmrgʔ
41:19	whʔ šbʕ twrn ʔḥrnyn slqn btrhyn bṣyrn \wbyš ḥzwhyn /wbyšn bḥzwhyn#3#/ wmḥyl bsrhyn ṭb wlʔ ḥzyt dbyšn ʔkwthyn bkwlh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
41:20	wʔkl twrtʔ mḥyltʔ wbyštʔ lšbʕ twrtʔ qdmytʔ šmyntʔ
41:21	wʕl lgwhyn wlʔ ʔtydʕ dʕl lgwhyn wḥzwhyn byš ʔyk dbqdmytʔ wʔttʕyrt
41:22	wtwb ḥzyt bḥlmy whʔ šbʕ šblyn slqn bqnyʔ ḥd mlyn wṭbn
41:23	whʔ šbʕ šblyn qṭynn wšqypn lrwḥʔ dšwbʔ yʕyn btrhyn
41:24	wblʕ šblʔ qṭyntʔ lšbʕ šblʔ ṭbtʔ wʔmrt lḥršʔ wlyt dmḥwʔ ly
41:25	wʔmr ywsp lprʕwn ḥlmʔ prʕwn ḥd hw mdm dʔlhʔ ʕbd ḥwy lprʕwn
41:26	šbʕ twrtʔ ṭbtʔ šbʕ ʔnyn šnyn wšbʕ šblʔ ṭbtʔ šbʕ ʔnyn šnyn ḥlmʔ ḥd hw
41:27	wšbʕ twrtʔ mḥyltʔ wbyštʔ dslqn btrhyn šbʕ ʔnyn šnyn wšbʕ šblʔ qṭyntʔ dšqypn lrwḥʔ dšwbʔ nhwyn šbʕ šnyn kpnʔ
41:28	hw ptgmʔ dʔmrt lprʕwn ʔylyn dʔlhʔ ʕbd ḥwy lprʕwn
41:29	hʔ/hšʔ#3#/ šbʕ šnyn ʔtyn sbʕʔ rbʔ bklh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
41:30	wnqwmn šbʕ šnyn dkpnʔ btrhyn wntṭʕʔ klh sbʕʔ dhwʔ \bkwlh ʔrʕʔ /bʔrʕʔ#3#/ dmṣryn wnsyp kpnʔ lʔrʕʔ
41:31	wlʔ ntydʕ sbʕʔ bʔrʕʔ mṭl kpnʔ hw dmn btrkyn dʕšyn hw ṭb
41:32	wdʔttny ḥlmʔ lprʕwn dtrtyn zbnyn dmṭyb ptgmʔ mn qdm ʔlhʔ wmsrhb ʔlhʔ lmʕbdh
41:33	hšʔ nḥzʔ prʕwn gbrʔ ḥkymʔ wskwltnʔ wnqymywhy ʕl ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
41:34	wnʕbr/wnʕbd#3#/ prʕwn wnqym šlyṭʔ/šlyṭnʔ#3#/ ʕl ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn/#3#/ wnsbwn ḥd mn ḥmšʔ bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn bšbʕ šnyʔ dsbʕʔ
41:35	wnknšwn klh ʕbwrʔ <dʔyt#3#> dšnyʔ \hlyn ṭbtʔ /ṭbtʔ hnyn#3#/ dʔtyn wnḥmlwn ʕbwrʔ <dʔyt#3#> tḥyt ʔydʔ dprʕwn ʕbwrʔ bqwryʔ nṭrwn
41:36	wnhwʔ ʕbwrʔ nṭyr lʔrʕʔ lšbʕ šnyʔ dkpnʔ dnhwyn bʔrʕʔ klh/#3#/ dmṣryn wlʔ tswp ʔrʕʔ bkpnʔ
41:37	wšpr ptgmʔ bʕyny prʕwn wbʕyny ʕbdwhy
41:38	wʔmr prʕwn lʕbdwhy mštkḥ ʔyk/dʔyk#3#/ hnʔ gbrʔ drwḥʔ dʔlhʔ ʔyt bh
41:39	wʔmr prʕwn lywsp mn btr dʔwdʕk ʔlhʔ <ʕl#3#> hdʔ klh lyt dḥkym wskwltn ʔkwtk
41:40	ʔnt thwʔ ʕl byty wʕl mlt pwmk nsb dynʔ klh ʕmy blḥwd kwrsyʔ ʔrb mnk
41:41	wʔmr prʕwn lywsp ḥzy dʔšlṭtk ʕl klh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
41:42	wšql prʕwn ʕzqth mn ʔydh wsmh bʔydh dywsp wʔlbšh lbwšʔ dbwṣʔ wʔrmy hmnykʔ ddhbʔ bṣwrh
41:43	wʔwtbh bmrkbtʔ/ʕl mrkbtʔ#3#/ ʔḥrtʔ dylh wqrʔ qdmwhy ʔbʔ wšlyṭʔ wʔšlṭh ʕl klh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
41:44	wʔmr prʕwn lywsp ʔnʔ prʕwn pqdt dblʕdyk ʔnš lʔ nrym ʔydh wrglh/ʔw rglh#3#/ bklh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
41:45	wqrʔ prʕwn šmh dywsp ṣpntpʕnḥ dksytʔ glyn lh wyhb lh lʔsyt brt pwṭyprʕ kwmrʔ dʔwn ʔnttʔ wnpq ywsp ʕl klh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
41:46	wywsp br tltyn hwʔ šnyn kd qm qdm prʕwn mlkʔ dmṣryn wnpq ywsp mn qdm prʕwn wʕbr bklh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
41:47	wḥmlt ʔrʕʔ bšbʕ šnyʔ dsbʕʔ bʔwṣrʔ
41:48	wḥml klh ʕbwrʔ dbšbʕ šnyʔ dsbʕʔ/#3#/ dhwy bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wyhb ʕbwrʔ bqwryʔ ʕbwrʔ dḥqltʔ dqrytʔ wdḥdryh ḥml bgwh
41:49	wḥml ywsp ʕbwrʔ ʔyk ḥlʔ dymʔ swgʔʔ dṭb ʕdmʔ dlʔy lmmnʔ dlʔ mnynʔ
41:50	wlywsp ʔtyldw lh tryn bnyn ʕdlʔ tʕwl šntʔ dkpnʔ dyldt lh/#3#/ ʔsyt brt pwṭyprʕ kwmrʔ dʔwn
41:51	wqrʔ ywsp šm brh/#3#/ bwkrh mnšʔ mṭl dʔnšyny ʔlhʔ klh/bklh#3#/ ʕmly wklh byt ʔby
41:52	wšmh dʔḥrnʔ qrʔ ʔprym mṭl dʔpryny ʔlhʔ bʔrʕʔ dšwʕbdy
41:53	wgmr šbʕ šnyʔ dsbʕʔ dhwy bʔrʕʔ/bkwlh ʔrʕʔ#3#/ dmṣryn
41:54	wšry šbʕ šnyʔ dkpnʔ lmʔtʔ ʔyk dʔmr ywsp whwʔ kpnʔ bklhyn ʔrʕtʔ wbklh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn lʔ hwʔ lḥmʔ
41:55	wkpnt klh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wmbgnyn <hww#3#> ʕmʔ ʕl prʕwn ʕl lḥmʔ wʔmr prʕwn lklhwn mṣryʔ zlw lwt ywsp wmdm dʔmr lkwn tʕbdwn
41:56	wkpnʔ hwʔ ʕl ʔpy klh ʔrʕʔ wptḥ ywsp ʔwṣrʔ wzbn lmṣryʔ wʕšn kpnʔ bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
41:57	wklh ʔrʕʔ ʔtw lmṣryn lmmr <ʕbwrʔ#3#> mn ywsp mṭl dʕšn kpnʔ bklh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn/#3#/
42:01	wḥzʔ/wšmʕ#3#/ yʕqwb dʔyt ʕbwrʔ bmṣryn wʔmr yʕqwb lbnwhy lʔ tdḥlwn
42:02	hʔ šmʕt dʔyt ʕbwrʔ bmṣryn ḥwtw ltmn wmwrw ln mn tmn wnḥʔ wlʔ nmwt
42:03	wnḥtw ʔḥwhy dywsp ʕsrʔ lmmr ʕbwrʔ mn mṣryn
42:04	wlbnymyn ʔḥwhy dywsp lʔ šdr yʕqwb ʕm ʔḥwhy mṭl dʔmr dlmʔ ngdš lh qʔrsʔ
42:05	wʔtw bny ʔysryl lmmr ʕm ʔylyn dʔzlyn mṭl dʕšn kpnʔ bʔrʕʔ dknʕn
42:06	wywsp hwyw šlyṭ ʕl ʔrʕʔ whw mmyr lklh ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ wʔtw ʔḥwhy dywsp wsgdw lh ʕl ʔpyhwn ʕl ʔrʕʔ <dmṣryn#3#>
42:07	wḥzʔ ywsp lʔḥwhy wʔštwdʕ ʔnwn wʔtnkl ʕlyhwn wmll ʕmhwn qšyʔyt wʔmr lhwn mn/#3#/ ʔymkʔ ʔntwn wʔmrw mn ʔrʕʔ dknʕn ʔtyn lmmr ʕbwrʔ
42:08	\wʔštwdʕ ywsp lʔḥwhy whnwn lʔ ʔštwdʕwhy /#3#/
42:09	wʔtdkr ywsp ḥlmʔ dḥlm lhwn wʔmr lhwn gšwšʔ ʔntwn wlmḥzʔ hw/#3#/ ṭbh dʔrʕʔ ʔtytwn
42:10	wʔmrw <lh#3#> lʔ mrn ʕbdyk ʔtw lmmr ʕbwrʔ
42:11	kln bny ḥd ḥnn gbr wkʔnʔ ḥnn wlʔ hww gšwšʔ ʕbdyk
42:12	ʔmr lhwn ywsp/#3#/ lʔ hwʔ/#3#/ hknʔ ṭbh hw dʔrʕʔ ʔtytwn lmḥzʔ
42:13	wʔmrw lh trʕsr ḥnn ʔḥʔ ʕbdyk bny gbrʔ ḥd bʔrʕʔ dknʕn wzʕwrʔ hʔ lwt ʔbwn hw ywmnʔ wḥd lytwhy
42:14	ʔmr lhwn ywsp/#3#/ hnw dʔmrt lkwn gšwšʔ ʔntwn
42:15	bhdʔ ttbqwn lʔ ḥywhy dprʕwn lʔ tpqwn mkʔ ʔlʔ ʔn ʔtʔ ʔḥwkwn zʕwrʔ lhrkʔ
42:16	šdrw ḥd mnkwn ndbr lʔḥwkwn wʔntwn ʔtʔsrw wntbqyn mlykwn ʔn bqwštʔ ʔmrtwn wʔlʔ ḥywhy dprʕwn ʔlʔ gšwšʔ ʔntwn
42:17	wʔrmy ʔnwn byt ḥbwšyʔ tltʔ ywmyn
42:18	wʔmr lhwn ywsp <lʔḥwhy#3#> bywmʔ tlytyʔ hdʔ ʕbdw wḥyw lʔlhʔ dḥl ʔnʔ
42:19	ʔn kʔnʔ ʔntwn ʔḥwkwn ḥd ntʔsr byt ḥbwšykwn wʔntwn zlw ʔwblw ʕbwrʔ lkpnʔ \dʔyt bbtykwn /dbbtyhwn#3#/
42:20	wlʔḥwkwn zʕwrʔ ʔytw lwty/ly#3#/ wnthymnn mlykwn wlʔ tmwtwn wʕbdw hknʔ
42:21	wʔmrw gbr lʔḥwhy šryrʔyt ḥybynn ʕl ʔḥwn dḥzyn bṭwrpʔ dnpšh kd mtkšp hwʔ ln wlʔ šmʕnyhy mṭl hnʔ ʔtt ʕlyn ʕqtʔ hdʔ
42:22	wʕnʔ rwbyl wʔmr lhwn/#3#/ lʔ ʔmrt lkwn dlʔ tḥṭwn bṭlyʔ wlʔ šmʕtwn wʔp dmh hʔ mttbʕ
42:23	whnwn lʔ ydʕyn hww dšmʕ ywsp mṭl dtrgmnʔ/dmtrgmnʔ#3#/ qʔm hwʔ bynthwn
42:24	wʔtpny mn lwthwn wbkʔ whpk lwthwn wmll ʕmhwn wdbr mnhwn lšmʕwn wʔsrh lʕnyhwn/lʕynyhwn#3#/
42:25	wpqd ywsp wmlw mʔnyhwn ʕbwrʔ wlmhpkw ksphwn gbr bsqh wlmtl lhwn zwdʔ lʔwrḥʔ wʕbdw lhwn hknʔ
42:26	wšqlw ʕbwrhwn ʕl ḥmrhwn wʔzlw mn tmn
42:27	wptḥ ḥd mnhwn sqh lmrmyw kstʔ lḥmrh byt bwtʔ wḥzʔ <whʔ#23#> ksph sym/dsym#3#/ bpwm ṭʕnh
42:28	wʔmr lʔḥwhy ʔtpny kspy whʔ hw bpwm ṭʕny wzʕ lbhwn wtmhw gbr bʔḥwhy wʔmrw mnʔ hy hdʔ dʕbd ln ʔlhʔ
42:29	wʔtw lwt yʕqwb ʔbwhwn lʔrʕʔ dknʕn wḥwywhy kl dgdš lhwn wʔmrw lh/#3#/
42:30	mll gbrʔ mrh dʔrʕʔ ʕmn qšyʔyt wḥšbn ʔyk gšwšʔ dʔrʕʔ
42:31	wʔmrn lh kʔnʔ/dkʔnʔ#3#/ ḥnn wlʔ hwyn gšwšʔ
42:32	trʕsr ḥnn ʔḥyn bny ʔbwn wḥd lytwhy wzʕwrʔ <hw#3#> lwt ʔbwn hw ywmnʔ bʔrʕʔ dknʕn
42:33	wʔmr ln gbrʔ mrh dʔrʕʔ bhdʔ ʔdʕ dkʔnʔ ʔntwn ʔḥwkwn ḥd šbwqw lwty wʕbwrʔ lkpnʔ dbbtykwn sbw wzlw
42:34	wʔytw lʔḥwkwn zʕwrʔ lwty wʔdʕ dlʔ hwytwn gšwšʔ ʔlʔ kʔnʔ ʔntwn wlʔḥwkwn ʔtl lkwn wbʔrʕʔ ttgrwn
42:35	whwʔ dkd hnwn msrqyn/mspqyn#3#/ sqyhwn hʔ ṣrrʔ dksph dgbrʔ bpwm ṭʕnh wḥzw ṣrry ksphwn hnwn wʔbwhwn wdḥlw
42:36	ʔmr lhwn yʕqwb ʔbwhwn ly gzytwn ywsp lytwhy wšmʕwn lytwhy wlbnymyn tdbrwn ʕly šlm klhyn
42:37	wʔmr rwbyl lʔbwhy ltryn bny tmyt ʔlʔ ʔytywhy lk \ʔšlmyhy ly /hbyhy ʕl ʔydy#3#/ wʔnʔ ʔhpkywhy lk
42:38	wʔmr lʔ nḥt bry ʕmkwn mṭl dʔḥwhy myt whw blḥwdwhy ʔštḥr lʔmh/#3#/ \wngdš lh /wnʔrʕywhy#3#/ qʔrsʔ/sqwblʔ#3#/ bʔwrḥʔ dtʔzlwn <bh#3#> wtḥtwn sybwty bdʔwwnʔ lšywl
43:01	wkpnʔ ʕšn bʔrʕʔ
43:02	wkd gmrw lmʔkl ʕbwrʔ dʔytyw mn mṣryn ʔmr lhwn yʕqwb ʔbwhwn ḥwtw mwrw ln qlyl ʕbwrʔ
43:03	ʔmr lh yhwdʔ mshdw shd bn gbrʔ wʔmr lʔ tḥzwn ʔpy ʔlʔ kd ʔḥwkwn ʕmkwn
43:04	ʔn mšdr ʔnt lʔḥwn ʕmn nḥwt wnmwr ln ʕbwrʔ
43:05	wʔn lʔ mšdr ʔnt lʔ nḥtynn mṭl dgbrʔ ʔmr ln dlʔ/lʔ#3#/ tḥzwn ʔpy ʔlʔ kd ʔḥwkwn ʕmkwn
43:06	ʔmr lhwn/#3#/ ʔysryl ʔbwhwn/#3#/ lmnʔ ʔbʔštwn ly wḥwytwn lgbrʔ ʔn ʔyt lkwn ʔḥʔ
43:07	wʔmrw mšʔlw šʔl gbrʔ ʕlyn wʕl šrbtn wʔmr ʕdkyl ʔbwkwn ḥy wʔyt lkwn ʔḥʔ wḥwynyhy mṭl mlʔ hlyn mdʕ <gyr#3#> ydʕyn hwyn dʔmr <ln#3#> ʔḥtw/ʔytw#3#/ lʔḥwkwn
43:08	wʔmr yhwdʔ lʔysryl ʔbwhy šdr ṭlyʔ ʕmn wnqwm wnʔzl wnḥʔ wlʔ nmwt ʔp ḥnn ʔp ʔnt ʔp yqrtn
43:09	ʔnʔ ʕrb ʔnʔ bh mn ʔydy tbʕyhy ʔn lʔ ʔytywhy lk wʔqymywhy qdmyk ʔḥṭʔ lʔby klhwn ywmtʔ
43:10	wʔp/#3#/ ʔlw lʔ ʔštwḥrn kbr dyn hpkn dtrtyn zbnyn
43:11	wʔmr lhwn ʔysryl ʔbwhwn ʔn hknʔ hw hdʔ ʕbdw sbw mn ṭwbh dʔrʕʔ bmʔnykwn wʔḥtw lgbrʔ qwrbnʔ qlyl ṣrwʔ wqlyl dbšʔ wʔrhṭnʔ wlṭmʔ wbṭmʔ wšgrʔ
43:12	wkspʔ ʔʕpʔ sbw bʔydykwn wkspʔ dhpk bpwm ṭʕnykwn ʔhpkw bʔydykwn dlmʔ ṭwʕyy hy
43:13	wlʔḥwkwn dbrw wqwmw whpwkw lwt gbrʔ
43:14	wʔylšdy ntlkwn lrḥmʔ qdm gbrʔ wnšdr ʕmkwn lʔḥwkwn ʔḥrnʔ wlbnymyn wʔnʔ ʔyk dgzyt gzyt
43:15	wnsbw gbrʔ qwrbnʔ hnʔ \wʔʕpʔ dkspʔ /wkspʔ ʔʕpʔ#23#/ nsbw bʔydyhwn wdbrw ʕmhwn lbnymyn \wqmw wnḥtw lmṣryn /#2#/ wqmw qdm ywsp
43:16	wḥzʔ ywsp ʕmhwn lbnymyn wʔmr lrbyth ʔʕl gbrʔ lbytʔ wkws nkstʔ wtqn mṭl dʕmy ʔklyn gbrʔ bṭhrʔ
43:17	wʕbd ʕbdʔ/gbrʔ#3#/ ʔyk dʔmr ywsp wʔʕl ʔnwn lgbrʔ lbyt ywsp
43:18	wdḥlw <gbrʔ#3#> kd mʕlyn lhwn lbyt ywsp wʔmrw mṭl kspʔ dhpk bṭʕnyn bqdmytʔ mʕlyn ln lmtrwrbw ʕlyn wlmtnklw ʕlyn dnʕbdwnn ʕbdʔ wlḥmrn
43:19	wqrbw lwt gbrʔ rbyth dywsp wmllw ʕmh btrʕʔ dbytʔ
43:20	wʔmrw lh/#3#/ bʕynn <mnk#3#> mrn mḥt nḥtn bqdmytʔ lmmr ʕbwrʔ
43:21	wkd ʔzln lbyt bwtʔ ptḥn ṭʕnyn whʔ ksph dgbrʔ bpwm ṭʕnh kspn bmtqlh ʔhpknyhy bʔydn
43:22	wkspʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔḥtn bʔydn lmmr ʕbwrʔ lʔ ydʕn mnw sm kspn bpwm ṭʕnyn
43:23	ʔmr lhwn šlm lkwn lʔ tdḥlwn ʔlhkwn/#3#/ ʔlhʔ dʔbwkwn sm lkwn symtʔ bṭʕnykwn kspkwn ʕl lwty wʔpq lwthwn lšmʕwn
43:24	wʔʕl ʕbdʔ gbrʔ/lgbrʔ#3#/ lbyt ywsp wyhb myʔ wʔšygw rglyhwn wʔrmy kstʔ lbʕyrhwn
43:25	wtqnw <gbrʔ#3#> qwrbnʔ ʕd ʕʔl ywsp bṭhrʔ mṭl dšmʕw dtmn ʔklyn lḥmʔ
43:26	wʕl ywsp <bṭhrʔ#3#> lbytʔ wʔytyw lh/#3#/ qwrbnʔ dbʔydyhwn lbytʔ wsgdw lh ʕl ʔrʕʔ
43:27	wšʔl bšlmhwn wʔmr lhwn/#3#/ šlm hw ʔbwkwn sbʔ dʔmrtwn ly/#3#/ ʕdkyl ḥy hw
43:28	wʔmrw šlm hw ʕbdk ʔbwn wʔmrw lh/#3#/ ʕdkyl ḥy hw wqʕdw wsgdw
43:29	wʔrym ʕynwhy wḥzʔ lbnymyn ʔḥwhy/#3#/ br ʔmh wʔmr lhwn/#3#/ hnw ʔḥwkwn zʕwrʔ dʔmrtwn ly wʔmr ʔlhʔ nrḥm ʕlyk bry
43:30	wʔstrhb ywsp mṭl dglw rḥmwhy ʕl ʔḥwhy wbʕʔ lmbkʔ wʕl ltwnʔ wbkʔ tmn
43:31	wʔšyg ʔpwhy wnpq wḥmsn wʔmr dnsymwn lhwn/#3#/ lḥmʔ
43:32	wsmw lh blḥwdwhy wlhwn blḥwdyhwn wlmṣryʔ dʔklyn ʕmh blḥwdyhwn mṭl dlʔ mškḥyn mṣryʔ lmʔkl lḥmʔ ʕm ʕbryʔ mṭl dṭmʔwtʔ hy lmṣryʔ
43:33	wʔstmkw qdmwhy qšyšʔ ʔyk qšyšwth wzʕwrʔ ʔyk zʕwrwth wtmhw gbrʔ gbr bḥbrh
43:34	wšqlw lhwn šqlʔ mn qdmwhy wsgy šqlh dbnymyn mn šqlʔ dklhwn ḥmš mnwn/zbnyn#3#/ wʔštyw wrwyw ʕmh
44:01	wpqd lrb byth wʔmr mly ṭʕnyhwn dgbrʔ ʕbwrʔ kmʔ/ʔyk#3#/ dmškḥyn lmšql wsym ksph dgbrʔ bpwm ṭʕnh
44:02	wsb ʔsqpʔ dyly/#3#/ dsʔmʔ/dkspʔ#3#/ wsym bpwm ṭʕnh dzʕwrʔ \wksp myrh /wkspʔ dmyrh#3#/ wʕbd ʕbdʔ/rbyth#3#/ ʔyk mlth dywsp <dʔmr#3#>
44:03	wkd hwʔ šprʔ/ṣprʔ#3#/ ʔštryw gbrʔ lmʔzl/#3#/ hnwn wḥmrhwn/wbʕyrhwn#3#/
44:04	hnwn npqw mn qrytʔ wlʔ ʔrḥqw wywsp ʔmr lrbyth qwm rdwp btr gbrʔ wʔdrk ʔnwn wʔmr lhwn lmnʔ prʕtwn byštʔ ḥlp ṭbtʔ
44:05	hnʔ ʔsqpʔ dštʔ bh mry wʔp mnḥšw mnḥš bh ʔbʔštwn bmdm dʕbdtwn
44:06	wʔdrk ʔnwn wʔmr lhwn ʔyk mlʔ hlyn
44:07	ʔmryn lh/#3#/ lʔ nʔmr mrn mlʔ hlyn ḥs lʕbdyk \lmʕbd ptgmʔ hnʔ /lmʕbd ʕbdʔ hnʔ#3# /dnʕbdwn hknʔ#3#/
44:08	hʔ kspʔ dʔškḥn bpwm ṭʕnyn ʔhpknyhy mn ʔrʕʔ dknʕn ʔyknʔ gnbyn hwyn mn byt mrk dhbʔ ʔw sʔmʔ/kspʔ#3#/
44:09	mn dnštkḥ lwth mn ʕbdyk nmwt wḥnn nhwʔ ʕbdʔ lmrn
44:10	ʔmr lhwn/#3#/ ʔp hšʔ ʔyk mltkwn hknʔ <nhwʔ#3#/nʕbd#3#/> mn dnštkḥ lwth hw/#3#/ nhwʔ ly ʕbdʔ wʔntwn thwwn zkyyn
44:11	wʔstrhbw wʔḥtw gbr ṭʕnh ʕl ʔrʕʔ wptḥw gbr ṭʕnh/sqh#3#/
44:12	wbṣw mn rbʔ šry wbzʕwrʔ šlm wʔštkḥ ʔsqpʔ bṭʕnh dbnymyn
44:13	wṣryw lbwšyhwn wšqlw gbr ʕl ḥmrh whpkw lqrytʔ
44:14	wʕl yhwdʔ wʔḥwhy lwt ywsp whw ʕdkyl tmn wnplw qdmwhy ʕl ʔrʕʔ
44:15	ʔmr lhwn ywsp mnw ʕbdʔ hnʔ dʕbdtwn lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn dmnḥšw mnḥš gbrʔ dʔkwty
44:16	wʔmr yhwdʔ mnʔ nʔmr lmry wmnʔ nmll wbmnʔ nzkʔ mn qdm <mryʔ#3#> ʔlhʔ ʔštkḥ ḥṭhʔ <hnʔ#3#> lʕbdyk hʔ <ʔp#3#> ḥnn ʕbdʔ lmry ʔp ḥnn ʔp mn dʔštkḥ ʔsqpʔ bʔydh/lwth#3#/
44:17	ʔmr lhwn/#3#/ ḥs ly dʔʕbd hdʔ gbrʔ dʔštkḥ ʔsqpʔ lwth/bʔydh#3#/ hw nhwʔ ly ʕbdʔ wʔntwn sqw bšlmʔ lwt ʔbwkwn
44:18	wqrb lwth yhwdʔ wʔmr bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnk mry nmll ʕbdk mltʔ qdmyk mry wlʔ ntḥmt rwgzk ʕl ʕbdk mṭl dʔnt/dmn dʔkwtk#3#/ ʔyk prʕwn <hw#3#>
44:19	mry šʔl lʕbdwhy wʔmr ʔyt lkwn ʔbʔ \ʔw ʔḥʔ /wʔḥʔ#3#/
44:20	wʔmrn lmry ʔyt ln ʔbʔ sbʔ wbrʔ br sybwtʔ zʕwrʔ wʔḥwhy myt whw blḥwdwhy ʔštḥr lʔmh wʔbwhy rḥm lh
44:21	wʔmrt lʕbdyk ʔḥtwhy lwty wʔsym ʕyny ʕlwhy
44:22	wʔmrn lmry lʔ mškḥ ṭlyʔ lmšbq lʔbwhy wʔn šbq lʔbwhy mʔt
44:23	wʔmrt lʕbdyk dʔn lʔ nḥt ʔḥwkwn zʕwrʔ ʕmkwn lʔ twspwn lmḥzʔ ʔpy
44:24	wkd slqn lwt ʕbdk ʔbwn wḥwynyhy ptgmwhy dmry
44:25	ʔmr ln/#3#/ ʕbdk/#3#/ ʔbwn hpwkw mwrw ln qlyl ʕbwrʔ
44:26	wʔmrn lʔbwn/#3#/ lʔ mškḥynn lmḥt ʔn nḥt ʔḥwn zʕwrʔ ʕmn nḥtynn mṭl dlʔ mškḥynn lmḥzʔ ʔpwhy dgbrʔ kd ʔḥwn zʕwrʔ lʔ hwʔ ʕmn
44:27	wʔmr ln ʕbdk ʔbwn ʔntwn ydʕyn ʔntwn dtryn yldt ly/#3#/ ʔntty
44:28	wnpq ḥd mn lwty wʔmrt dmqṭl qṭyl wlʔ ḥzyth ʕdmʔ lhšʔ
44:29	wdbryn ʔntwn ʔp lhnʔ/hnʔ#3#/ mn lwty wʔrʕ lh sqwblʔ wmḥtyn ʔntwn sybwty/lsybwty#3#/ bbyštʔ lšywl
44:30	whšʔ mʔ dʔzln lwt ʕbdk ʔbwn wṭlyʔ lʔ hwʔ ʕmn wnpšh ḥbybʔ lh ʔyk npšh
44:31	wmʔ dḥzʔ dlyt ṭlyʔ ʕmn mʔt <lh#3#> wmḥtyn ʕbdyk sybwth dʕbdk ʔbwn bdwwʔnʔ lšywl
44:32	mṭl dʕbdk ʕrb <bh#3#> bṭlyʔ mn lwt ʔbwn wʔmrt ʔn/dʔn#3#/ lʔ ʔytywhy lk/lwtk#3#/ ʔḥṭʔ lʔby klhwn ywmtʔ

45:01	wlʔ ʔškḥ ywsp lmḥmsnw mn kl dqymyn hww/#3#/ qdmwhy/lʕl mnh/#3#/ wʔmr ʔpqw lklnš mn lwty wlʔ qwy ʔnš lwth kd ʔtgly ywsp lʔḥwhy

45:17	wʔmr prʕwn lywsp ʔmr lʔḥyk hknʔ ʕbdw ʔṭʕnw/ṭʕnw#3#/ bʕyrkwn ʕbwrʔ/#3#/ wzlw ʔwblw lʔrʕʔ dknʕn

45:19	wʔnt hʔ/#3#/ mšlṭ ʔnt ʔmr lʔḥyk/lhwn#3#/ hknʔ ʕbdw dbrw lkwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn ʕgltʔ lnšykwn wlyqrtkwn wšqwlw lʔbwkwn wtw

48:01	whwʔ mn btr ptgmʔ hlyn ʔtʔmr lywsp dhʔ/hʔ#3#/ ʔbwk ʔtkrh wdbr ltryn bnwhy ʕmh lmnšʔ wlʔprym

48:14	wʔwšṭ ʔysryl ymynh wsmh ʕl ršh dʔprym hwyw zʕwrʔ wsmlh ʕl ršh dmnšʔ šḥlp ʔnyn ʔydwhy mṭl dmnšʔ hwʔ/#3#/ bwkrʔ
48:15	wbrk yʕqwb lywsp brh/#3#/ wʔmr ʔlhʔ dšprw qdmwhy ʔbhy ʔbrhm wʔysḥq ʔlhʔ dtrsyny mn ṭlywty wʕdmʔ lywmnʔ

03:06	wʔmr ʔnʔ ʔnʔ \ʔlhh dʔbwk ʔlhh dʔbrhm /ʔlhh dʔbwk ʔbrhm#3#/ ʔlhh dʔysḥq ʔlhh dyʕqwb wṭšy ʔnyn/ʔnwn#3#/ mwšʔ ʔpwhy mṭl ddḥl lmḥr lwt ʔlhʔ
03:07	wʔmr mryʔ mḥzʔ ḥzyt šwʕbdh dʕmy dbmṣryn wgʕthwn šmʕt mn qdm mšʕbdnyhwn mṭl dydʕ ʔnʔ lh lkʔbhwn
03:08	wnḥtt lmpṣywth mn ʔydʔ dmṣryʔ wlmsqwth mn ʔrʕʔ hy/hdʔ#3#/ lʔrʕʔ drwyḥʔ wṭbʔ lʔrʕʔ dmrdyʔ ḥlbʔ wdbšʔ lʔrʕʔ/lʔtrʔ#3#/ dknʕnyʔ wdḥtyʔ wdʔmwryʔ wdprzyʔ wdḥwyʔ wdybwsyʔ
03:09	whšʔ hʔ gʕtʔ dbny ʔysryl ʕlt lwty wʔp ḥzyt ʔwlṣnʔ \dmṣryʔ ʔlṣyn lhwn /dʔlṣyn lhwn mṣryʔ#3#/
03:10	hšʔ tʔ ʔšdrk lwt prʕwn wʔpq lʕmy bny ʔysryl mn mṣryn
03:11	wʔmr mwšʔ lʔlhʔ mn ʔnʔ dʔzl lwt prʕwn wʔpq/wʔsq#3#/ ldbyt ʔysryl mn mṣryn
03:12	wʔmr lh ʔlhʔ/#3#/ ʔnʔ ʔhwʔ ʕmk whdʔ ʔtʔ dʔnʔ šdrtk mʔ dʔpqt lʕmʔ mn mṣryn tplḥwn qdm ʔlhʔ ʕl ṭwrʔ hnʔ
03:13	wʔmr mwšʔ lʔlhʔ hʔ ʔnʔ ʔzl lwt bny ʔysryl wʔmr lhwn mryʔ/#3#/ ʔlhʔ dʔbhykwn šdrny ʕlykwn wnʔmrwn ly mn šmh mnʔ ʔmr lhwn
03:14	wʔmr ʔlhʔ lmwšʔ ʔhyh ʔšr ʔhyh wʔmr hknʔ tʔmr lbny/ldbyt#3#/ ʔysryl ʔhyh šdrny ʕlykwn
03:15	wʔmr twb ʔlhʔ lmwšʔ hknʔ tʔmr lbny ʔysryl mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbhykwn ʔlhh dʔbrhm ʔlhh dʔysḥq ʔlhh dyʕqwb šdrny ʕlykwn hnw šmy lʕlm whnw dwkrny ldrdryn
03:16	zl knš lsbʔ dbny ʔysryl wʔmr lhwn mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbhykwn \ʔtgly ʕly /ʔtḥzy ly#3#/ ʔlhh dʔbrhm wdʔysḥq wdyʕqwb/#3#/ lmʔmr mtdkrw ʔtdkrtkwn wmdm dʔtʕbd lkwn bmṣryn
03:17	wʔmrt dʔsqkwn mn šwʕbdʔ dmṣryʔ lʔrʕʔ dknʕnyʔ wdḥtyʔ \wdʔmwryʔ wdprzyʔ /#3#/ wdḥwyʔ wdybwsyʔ lʔrʕʔ dmrdyʔ ḥlbʔ wdbšʔ
03:18	wnšmʕwn lqlk wtʕwl ʔnt wsbʔ \dbny ʔysryl /dʔysryl#3#/ lwt mlkʔ dmṣryn wtʔmrwn lh mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʕbryʔ ʔtgly ʕlyn hšʔ nʔzl mrdʔ tltʔ ywmyn bmdbrʔ wndbḥ lmryʔ ʔlhn
03:19	wʔnʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ dlʔ šbq lkwn mlkʔ dmṣryn lmʔzl wlʔ hwʔ bʔydh tqyptʔ
03:20	wʔwšṭ ʔydy wʔmḥʔ lmṣryʔ bkl tdmrtʔ dʔʕbd bynthwn wbtrkn nšdrkwn
03:21	wʔtlywhy lʕmʔ lrḥmʔ bʕynyhwn dmṣryʔ wkd tʔzlwn lʔ tʔzlwn sryqʔyt
03:22	tšʔl ʔnttʔ mn šbbth wmn twtbt byth mʔnʔ ddhbʔ/dkspʔ#3#/ wmʔnʔ dsʔmʔ/ddhbʔ#3#/ wlbwšʔ wʔlbšw lbnykwn wlbntkwn wnpṣw lmṣryʔ
04:01	wʕnʔ mwšʔ wʔmr hʔ lʔ mhymnyn ly wlʔ šmʕyn lqly mṭwl dʔmryn lʔ/dlʔ#3#/ ʔtḥzy lk mryʔ
04:02	wʔmr lh mryʔ mnw hnʔ dbʔydk wʔmr ḥwṭrʔ
04:03	wʔmr ʔrmyhy bʔrʕʔ wʔrmyh bʔrʕʔ whwʔ ḥwyʔ wʕrq mwšʔ mn qdmwhy
04:04	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ ʔwšṭ ʔydk wʔḥwd bdwnbh wʔwšṭ ʔydh wḥmsn bh whwʔ ḥwṭrʔ bʔydh
04:05	mṭl dnhymnwn dʔtḥzy lk mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbhyhwn ʔlhh dʔbrhm ʔlhh dʔysḥq ʔlhh dyʕqwb
04:06	wʔmr lh mryʔ <lmwšʔ#23#> twb ʔʕl ʔydk lʕwbk wʔʕl ʔydh lʕwbh wʔpqh whʔ ʔydh mgrbʔ ʔyk tlgʔ
04:07	wʔmr lh mryʔ/#3#/ ʔhpk ʔydk lʕwbk wʔhpk ʔydh lʕwbh wʔpqh mn ʕwbh whwt lh ʔyk bsrh
04:08	wʔn lʔ nhymnwn wlʔ nšmʕwn lqlʔ dʔtʔ qdmytʔ nhymnwn lqlʔ dʔtʔ ʔḥrytʔ
04:09	wʔn lʔ nhymnwn lhlyn trtyhyn ʔtwtʔ wlʔ nšmʕwn lqlk sb mn myʔ dnhrʔ wʔšwd bybšʔ whnwn myʔ dnsb ʔnt \mn nhrʔ /#3#/ nhwwn dmʔ bybšʔ
04:10	wʔmr mwšʔ lmryʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnk mry lʔ hwyt gbrʔ dmmllʔ ʔp mn ʔtmly ʔp mn mntmly wʔp mn ʕdnʔ dmllt ʕm ʕbdk mṭwl dlʕg mmlly wʕṭl lšnʔ ʔnʔ
04:11	wʔmr lh mryʔ mnw ʕbd pwmʔ lʔnšʔ ʔw mnw ʕbd pʔqʔ ʔw ḥršʔ ʔw ptyḥʔ ʔw ʕwyrʔ lʔ hwʔ/#3#/ ʔnʔ/#3#/ mryʔ
04:12	whšʔ zl wʔnʔ ʔhwʔ ʕm pwmk wʔlpk mdm dtmll
04:13	wʔmr <lh#3#> mwšʔ/#3#/ bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnk mry šdr byd mn dmšdr ʔnt
04:14	wʔtḥmt rwgzh dmryʔ ʕl mwšʔ wʔmr lh/#3#/ hʔ ʔhrwn ʔḥwk lwyʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ <hw#3#> dmmllw mmll hw hʔ ʔp hw npwq lʔwrʕk wnḥzyk wnḥdʔ blbh
04:15	wtʔmr lh wtsym ptgmʔ/mlʔ#3#/ bpwmh wʔnʔ ʔhwʔ ʕm pwmk wʕm pwmh wʔlpkwn mdm dtʕbdwn
04:16	hw nmll lk ʕm ʕmʔ whw nhwʔ lk mtrgmnʔ wʔnt thwʔ lh lʔlh
04:17	wḥwṭrʔ hnʔ sb bʔydk dtʕbd bh ʔtwtʔ
04:18	whpk mwšʔ wʔzl lwt ytrwn ḥmwhy wʔmr lh ʔhpwk ʔzl lwt ʔḥy dbmṣryn wʔḥzʔ ʔn ʕdkyl/#3#/ ḥyyn wʔmr ytrwn lmwšʔ zl bšlmʔ
04:19	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ bmdyn hpwk zl lmṣryn mṭl dmytw lhwn klhwn gbrʔ dbʕyn hww npšk
04:20	wdbr mwšʔ lʔntth wlbnwhy wʔrkb ʔnwn ʕl ḥmrʔ whpk \lmʔzl lmṣryn /lʔrʕʔ dmṣryn#3#/ wnsb mwšʔ ḥwṭrʔ dʔlhʔ bʔydh
04:21	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ mʔ dhpkt lmʔzl lmṣryn ḥzy kl tdmrtʔ dʕbdt bʔydyk ʕbd ʔnyn qdm prʕwn wʔnʔ ʔʕšn lbh wlʔ nšdrywhy lʕmʔ
04:22	wʔmr lprʕwn hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ bry bwkry ʔysryl
04:23	ʔmrt lk dtšdr lbry wnplḥny wʔlʔ ṣbʔ ʔnt lmšdrw lbry/#3#/ hʔ qṭl ʔnʔ lbrk bwkrk
04:24	whwʔ mwšʔ/#3#/ bʔwrḥʔ byt bwtʔ wpgʕ bh mryʔ wbʕʔ lmqṭlh lmwšʔ
04:25	wnsbt ṣpwrʔ ṭrnʔ wgzrt ʕwrlwtʔ dbrh \wʔḥdt brglwhy /wqrbt lrglwhy#3#/ wʔmrt ḥtnʔ ddmʔ ʔyt/ʔnt/#Lm#/ ly
04:26	wʔrpy mnh hydyn ʔmrt ḥtnʔ ddmʔ lgzwrtʔ
04:27	wʔmr mryʔ lʔhrwn zl lʔwrʕh dmwšʔ ʔḥwk/#3#/ lmdbrʔ wʔzl wpgʕ bh bṭwrh dʔlhʔ bḥwryb/#3#/ wnšqh
04:28	wḥwy mwšʔ lʔhrwn klhwn ptgmwhy dmryʔ dšdrh wkl ʔtwtʔ dpqdh lmʕbd/#3#/
04:29	wʔzlw mwšʔ wʔhrwn wknšw lklhwn sbʔ dbny ʔysryl
04:30	wʔmr lhwn/#3#/ ʔhrwn klhwn ptgmʔ dʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ wʕbd ʔtwtʔ qdm ʕmʔ
04:31	whymnw ʕmʔ wšmʕw dʔtdkr mryʔ lbny ʔysryl wdḥzʔ šwʕbdhwn/bšwʕbdhwn#3#/ wqʕdw ʕmʔ/#3#/ wsgdw qdm mryʔ
05:01	wbtr hydyn ʕlw mwšʔ wʔhrwn wʔmrw lprʕwn hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl šdr lʕmy wnḥgwn ly bmdbrʔ
05:02	wʔmr prʕwn mnw mryʔ dʔšmʕ bqlh \lmšdrw lʔysryl /#3#/ lʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ lmryʔ \wʔp lʔysryl /wlʔysryl#3#/ lʔ mšdr ʔnʔ
05:03	wʔmrw mryʔ/#3#/ ʔlhʔ dʕbryʔ ʔtgly ʕlyn nʔzl mrdʔ tltʔ ywmyn bmdbrʔ/#3#/ wndbḥ lmryʔ ʔlhn dlmʔ nʔrʕn bḥrbʔ ʔw bmwtʔ
05:04	wʔmr lhwn mlkʔ dmṣryn lmnʔ mwšʔ wʔhrwn mbṭlyn ʔntwn lʕmʔ mn ʕbdhwn zlw lšwʕbdkwn
05:05	wʔmr lhwn/#3#/ prʕwn hʔ sgyʔyn hšʔ ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ wmbṭlyn ʔntwn lhwn mn ʕbdhwn
05:06	wpqd prʕwn bywmʔ hw lšlyṭnwhy dʕmʔ wlsprwhy wʔmr lhwn
05:07	lʔ twspwn lmtl tbnʔ lʕmʔ lmrmyw lbnʔ ʔyk dʔtmly wʔyk dmntmly hnwn nʔzlwn nqšwn lhwn tbnʔ
05:08	wḥwšbnʔ dlbnʔ dʕbdyn hww ʔyk dʔtmly/dmn ʔtmly#3#/ wʔyk dmntmly/dmn mntmly#3#/ trmwn ʕlyhwn wlʔ tbṣrwn mnhwn mṭl dbṭlʔ ʔnwn mṭl hnʔ mbgnyn wʔmryn nʔzl ndbḥ lʔlhn
05:09	tʕšn ʕbydtʔ ʕl gbrʔ wnrnwn bh wlʔ nrnwn bmlʔ sryqtʔ
05:10	wnpqw šlyṭwhy dʕmʔ wsprwhy wʔmrw lʕmʔ hknʔ ʔmr prʕwn lʔ yhb ʔnʔ lkwn tbnʔ
05:11	ʔntwn zlw sbw/qšw#3#/ lkwn tbnʔ \mn ʔymkʔ /ʔykʔ#3#/ dmškḥyn ʔntwn wmdm lʔ ntbṣr mn ʕbdkwn
05:12	wʔtbdrw ʕmʔ bklh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn lmqš qštʔ dtbnʔ
05:13	wšlyṭnʔ ʔlṣyn wʔmryn ʔšlmw/dʔšlmw#3#/ ʕbdkwn ʔyk dbklzbn/dklywm#3#/ ʔyk dmtyhb hwʔ lkwn tbnʔ
05:14	wʔtrdyw sprʔ dbny/dbyt#3#/ ʔysryl dʔqymw ʕlyhwn šlyṭwhy/šlyṭnwhy#3#/ dprʕwn wʔmryn \mṭl mnʔ /lmnʔ#3#/ lʔ ʔšlmtwn ḥwšbnkwn dlbnʔ ʔyk dʔtmly wʔyk dmntmly ʔp ʔtmly wywmnʔ
05:15	wʔtw sprʔ dbny ʔysryl wmbgnyn qdm prʕwn wʔmryn lmnʔ mtʕbd hknʔ lʕbdyk
05:16	tbnʔ lʔ mtyhb lʕbdyk wlbnʔ ʔmryn ln ʔrmw whʔ ʕbdyk blʕyn wḥṭʔ ʔnt ʕl ʕmk
05:17	wʔmr lhwn prʕwn mbṭl hw bṭlyn ʔntwn mṭl hnʔ ʔmryn ʔntwn nʔzl ndbḥ lmryʔ/lʔlhn#3#/
05:18	hšʔ zlw wʕbdw wtbnʔ lʔ ntyhb lkwn wḥwšbnʔ dlbnʔ ttlwn
05:19	wḥzw ʔnwn sprʔ lbny ʔysryl byšʔyt wʔmryn lhwn lʔ mbṣryn ʔntwn mn lbnykwn ʔlʔ <ʔn#3#> ʔyk dbklywm
05:20	wpgʕw bmwšʔ wbʔhrwn kd qymyn lwqblhwn kd npqw mn qdm prʕwn
05:21	wʔmrw lhwn nḥzʔ mryʔ ʕlykwn wndwn dʔbʔštwn lrwḥn bʕyny prʕwn wbʕyny ʕbdwhy lmtln lḥrbʔ bʔydyhwn lmḥrbn
05:22	whpk mwšʔ lwt mryʔ wʔmr mry lmnʔ ʔbʔšt lʕmʔ hnʔ wlmnʔ šdrtny
05:23	dmn šʕtʔ dʔtyt lwt prʕwn lmmllw bšmk bʔš lʕmʔ hnʔ wmprq lʔ prqt lʕmk
06:01	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ hšʔ tḥzʔ mdm dʔʕbd lprʕwn mṭl dbʔydʔ tqyptʔ nšdr ʔnwn wbdrʕʔ rmʔ npq/nsq#3#/ ʔnwn mn ʔrʕh
06:02	wmll mryʔ/ʔlhʔ#23#/ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
06:03	dʔtglyt lʔbrhm wlʔysḥq wlyʕqwb bʔylšdy ʔlhʔ wšm mryʔ lʔ ḥwyt ʔnwn
06:04	wʔp ʔqymt qymy ʕmhwn lmtl lhwn ʔrʕʔ dknʕn ʔrʕʔ dtwtbwthwn dʕmrw bh
06:05	wʔp ʔnʔ šmʕt ʔnqtʔ dbny ʔysryl dmṣryʔ mšʕbdyn lhwn wʔtdkrt qymy
06:06	mṭl hnʔ ʔmr lbny ʔysryl ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhʔ wmpq ʔnʔ lkwn mn šwʕbdʔ dmṣryʔ wmpṣʔ ʔnʔ lkwn mn ʕbdhwn wʔprwqkwn bʔydʔ tqyptʔ/ʕšyntʔ#3#/ wbdrʕʔ rmʔ wbdynʔ rwrbʔ
06:07	wʔsbkwn ly ʕmʔ wʔhwʔ lkwn ʔlhʔ wtdʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn dmpq ʔnʔ lkwn mn šwʕbdʔ dmṣryʔ
06:08	wʔytykwn lʔrʕʔ dʔrymt ʔydy lmtlh lʔbrhm wlʔysḥq wlyʕqwb wʔtlyh lkwn yrtwtʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
06:09	wʔmr hknʔ mwšʔ lbny ʔysryl wlʔ šmʕwhy lmwšʔ mn krywt rwḥʔ wmn šwʕbdʔ qšyʔ
06:10	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ lmʔmr
06:11	zl ʔmr lprʕwn mlkʔ dmṣryn wnšdr lbny ʔysryl mn ʔrʕh
06:12	wʔmr mwšʔ lmryʔ hʔ bny ʔysryl lʔ šmʕyn ly ʔyknʔ nšmʕny prʕwn dlʕg lšny
06:13	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʕm ʔhrwn wpqd ʔnwn lwt bny ʔysryl wlwt prʕwn mlkʔ dmṣryn lmpqw lbny ʔysryl mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
06:14	whlyn ryšʔ dbyt ʔbhyhwn bny rwbyl bwkrh dʔysryl ḥnwk wplw wḥṣrwn wkrmy hlyn šrbtʔ drwbyl
06:15	wbny šmʕwn ymwʔyl wymyn wʔhr wykyn wṣḥr wšʔwl br knʕnytʔ hlyn šrbtʔ dšmʕwn
06:16	whlyn šmhʔ dbny lwy lšrbthwn gršwn wqht wmrry wšnyʔ dḥyʔ lwy mʔʔ wtltyn wšbʕ šnyn
06:17	wbnwhy dgršwn lbny wšmʕy lšrbthwn
06:18	wbnwhy dqht ʕmrm wyṣhr wḥbrwn wʕwzyl wšnyʔ dḥyʔ qht mʔʔ wtltyn wtlt šnyn
06:19	wbnwhy dmrry mḥly wmwšy hlyn šrbtʔ dlwyʔ/dlwy#3#/ lšrbthwn
06:20	wnsb ʕmrm ʔnttʔ lywkbr brt ddh wyldt lh lʔhrwn wlmrym/#3#/ wlmwšʔ wšnyʔ dḥyʔ ʕmrm mʔʔ wtltyn wšbʕ šnyn
06:21	wbnwhy dyṣhr qwrḥ wnpg wzkry
06:22	wbnwhy dʕwzyl mnšʔyl/myšʔyl#3#/ wʔlyṣpn wstry
06:23	wnsb ʔhrwn lʔlyšbʕ brt ʕmyndb ḥth dnḥšwn ʔnttʔ wyldt <lh#3#> lndb wlʔbyhw wlʔlyʕzr wlʔytmr
06:24	wbny qwrḥ ʔsyr whlqnʔ wʔknsp hlyn šrbtʔ dqwrḥ
06:25	wʔlyʕzr br ʔhrwn nsb lh ʔnttʔ mn bnth/byth#3#/ dpnṭyl wyldt lh lpynḥs hlyn ryšʔ dšrbtʔ dlwyʔ lšrbthwn
06:26	hnw mwšʔ wʔhrwn dʔmr lhwn mryʔ ʔpqw lbny ʔysryl mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn kwl ḥylwthwn
06:27	hnwn ʔmrw lprʕwn mlkʔ dmṣryn lmpqw lbny ʔysryl mn mṣryn/ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn#3#/ mwšʔ wʔhrwn
06:28	whwʔ bywmʔ dmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
06:29	mll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔmr lprʕwn mlkʔ dmṣryn kl mdm/#3#/ dʔmr ʔnʔ lk
06:30	wʔmr mwšʔ lmryʔ dyly lʕg lšny ʔyknʔ nšmʕny prʕwn
07:01	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ ḥzy dyhbtk ʔlh lprʕwn wʔhrwn ʔḥwk nhwʔ nbyk
07:02	ʔnt tʔmr klmdm dmpqd ʔnʔ lk wʔhrwn ʔḥwk nʔmr lprʕwn wlbny ʔysryl nšdr mn ʔrʕh
07:03	wʔnʔ ʔqšʔ lbh dprʕwn wʔsgʔ ʔtwty wtdmrty bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
07:04	\wlʔ nšmʕkwn prʕwn /#3#/ wʔtl ʔydy \bmṣryn wʔpq ḥylwty wʕmy bny ʔysryl mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn /bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn#3#/ bdynʔ rwrbʔ
07:05	wndʕwn mṣryʔ dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ mʔ dʔrymt ʔydy ʕl mṣryʔ wʔpqt lbny ʔysryl mn bynthwn
07:06	wʕbdw mwšʔ wʔhrwn ʔyk dpqd ʔnwn mryʔ hknʔ ʕbdw
07:07	wmwšʔ br tmnʔyn hwʔ šnyn wʔhrwn br tmnʔyn hwʔ wtlt šnyn kd mllw ʕm prʕwn
07:08	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ wlʔhrwn
07:09	ʔn ʔmr lkwn prʕwn hbw ly ʔtʔ ʔmr lʔhrwn sb ḥwṭrk wʔrmʔ qdm prʕwn wnhwʔ tnynʔ
07:10	wʔtw mwšʔ wʔhrwn lwt/wqmw qdm#3#/ prʕwn wʕbdw hknʔ ʔyknʔ/ʔyk#3#/ dpqd ʔnwn mryʔ wʔrmy ʔhrwn ḥwṭrh qdm prʕwn wqdm ḥʔrwhy whwʔ tnynʔ
07:11	wqrʔ prʕwn lḥkymʔ wlḥršʔ wʕbdw ʔp hnwn ḥršʔ dmṣryn bḥršyhwn hknʔ
07:12	wʔrmyw gbr ḥwṭrh qdm prʕwn whww tnynʔ wblʕ ḥwṭrʔ dʔhrwn lḥwṭryhwn
07:13	wʔtʕšn lbh dprʕwn wlʔ šdr/ṣbʔ lmšdrw#3#/ ʔnwn ʔyknʔ dʔmr mryʔ
07:14	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ ʔtʕšn lbh dprʕwn wlʔ ṣbʔ lmšdrw lʕmʔ
07:15	zl lwt prʕwn bṣprʔ hʔ npq lmyʔ qwm lqwblh ʕl spth dnhrʔ wḥwṭrʔ dhwʔ ḥwyʔ sb bʔydk
07:16	wʔmr lh mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʕbryʔ šdrny lwtk wʔmr šdr lʕmy wnplḥny bmdbrʔ whʔ ʕdmʔ lhšʔ lʔ šmʕ ʔnt
07:17	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ bhdʔ tdʕ dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ hʔ mḥʔ ʔnʔ bḥwṭrʔ dbʔydy ʕl myʔ dbnhrʔ wnthpkwn wnhwwn dmʔ
07:18	wnwnʔ dbnhrʔ nmwtwn/nswpwn#3#/ wnsrʔ nhrʔ wntṭrpwn mṣryʔ lmštʔ myʔ mn nhrʔ
07:19	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ ʔmr lʔhrwn sb ḥwṭrk wʔrym ʔydk ʕl myʔ dmṣryʔ ʕl nhrwthwn wʕl qbythwn wʕl ʔgmyhwn wʕl rmʔ dmyyhwn wnhwwn dmʔ wnhwʔ dmʔ bklh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn bqysʔ wbkʔpʔ
07:20	wʕbdw hknʔ mwšʔ wʔhrwn ʔyknʔ/ʔyk#3#/ dpqd ʔnwn mryʔ wʔrym ʔhrwn ḥwṭrh/bḥwṭrh#3#/ <dbʔydh#3#> wmḥʔ lmyʔ dbnhrʔ lʕyn prʕwn wlʕyn ʕbdwhy whww lhwn klhwn myʔ dbnhrʔ dmʔ
07:21	wnwnʔ dbnhrʔ mytw wsry nhrʔ wlʔ ʔškḥw mṣryʔ lmštʔ myʔ mn nhrʔ whwʔ dmʔ bklh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
07:22	wʕbdw hknʔ ḥršʔ dmṣryn bḥršyhwn wʔtʕby lbh dprʕwn wlʔ šmʕ ʔnwn ʔyknʔ/ʔyk#3#/ dʔmr mryʔ
07:23	whpk prʕwn wʕl lbyth whdʔ lʔ ʔyty ʕl blh
07:24	wḥprw klhwn mṣryʔ ḥdrwhy dnhrʔ myʔ lmštʔ mṭl dlʔ mškḥyn hww lmštʔ \mn myʔ dnhrʔ /myʔ mn nhrʔ#3#/
07:25	wšlmw šbʕʔ ywmyn mn btr dmḥʔ mryʔ lnhrʔ
07:26	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ zl lwt prʕwn wʔmr lh hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ šdr lʕmy wnplḥny
07:27	wʔlʔ ṣbʔ ʔnt lmšdrw hʔ mḥʔ ʔnʔ lklh tḥwmk bʔwrdʕʔ
07:28	wnrḥš nhrʔ ʔwrdʕʔ wnsqn wnʕln lbytk wlqyṭwnk wlbyt mškbk wlʕrstk wbbyt ʕbdyk wbʕmk wbtʔwnyk wbʔṣwtk
07:29	wbk wbklh ʕmk nsqn ʔwrdʕʔ
08:01	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ ʔmr lʔhrwn ʔḥwk/#3#/ ʔrym ʔydk bḥwṭrk ʕl nhrwtʔ wʕl rmʔ wʕl ʔgmʔ wʔsq ʔwrdʕʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
08:02	wʔrym ʔhrwn ʔydh ʕl myʔ dmṣryʔ wslq ʔwrdʕʔ wksyh lʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
08:03	wʕbdw hknʔ ʔp/#3#/ ḥršʔ bḥršyhwn wʔsqw ʔwrdʕʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
08:04	wqrʔ prʕwn lmwšʔ wlʔhrwn wʔmr lhwn ṣlw qdm mryʔ wnprq ʔwrdʕʔ mny wmn ʕmy wʔšdr lʕmʔ wndbḥwn lmryʔ/qdm mryʔ#3#/
08:05	wʔmr mwšʔ lprʕwn šʔl lk zbnʔ lʔmty ʔṣlʔ ʕlyk wʕl ʕbdyk wʕl ʕmk wnprq ʔwrdʕʔ mnk wmn bytk <wmn ʕbdyk wmn ʕmk#3#>
08:06	wʔmr lh/#3#/ mḥr/lmḥr#3#/ wʔmr lh ʔyk mltk mṭwl dtdʕ dlyt ʔyk mryʔ ʔlhn
08:07	wnprqn ʔwrdʕʔ mnk wmn bytk wmn ʕbdyk wmn ʕmk blḥwd dbnhrʔ nštḥrn
08:08	wnpq mwšʔ wʔhrwn mn lwt prʕwn wṣly mwšʔ qdm mryʔ mṭl ʔwrdʕʔ dʔyty ʕl prʕwn

08:10	wknšw ʔnyn krwn krwn wsryt ʔrʕʔ
08:11	wḥzʔ prʕwn dhwt rwḥtʔ wʕby lbh wlʔ šmʕ ʔnwn/#3#/ ʔyk/ʔyknʔ#3#/ dʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ
08:12	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ ʔmr lʔhrwn ʔrym ḥwṭrk wmḥy lʕprʔ dʔrʕʔ wnhwʔ qlmʔ bklh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
08:13	wʕbd hknʔ wʔrym ʔhrwn \ʔydh bḥwṭrh /bḥwṭrʔ dbʔydh#3#/ wmḥʔ lʕprʔ dʔrʕʔ whwt qlmʔ bbny ʔnšʔ wbbʕyrʔ kwlh ʕprʔ dʔrʕʔ hwʔ lh qlmʔ bklh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
08:14	wʕbdw hknʔ ʔp ḥršʔ bḥršyhwn wlʔ ʔškḥw lmprqwth lqlmʔ whwt qlmʔ bbny ʔnšʔ wbbʕyrʔ
08:15	wʔmrw ḥršʔ lprʕwn ṣbʕh hy dʔlhʔ wʔtqšy lbh dprʕwn wlʔ šmʕ ʔnwn ʔyknʔ dʔmr mryʔ
08:16	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ qdm bṣprʔ wqwm qdm prʕwn hʔ npq lmyʔ wʔmr lh hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ šdr lʕmy wnplḥny
08:17	wʔlʔ ṣbʔ ʔnt lmšdrw lʕmy hʔ mšdr ʔnʔ ʕlyk wʕl ʕmk wʕl btyk ʕrwbʔ dkl gns wntmlwn btʔ dmṣryʔ ʕrwbʔ ʔyk ʔrʕʔ dhnwn ʕlyh
08:18	wʔprwš bywmʔ hw lʔrʕʔ dgšn dʕmy ytbyn bh dlʔ nhwʔ tmn ʕrwbʔ mṭl dtdʕ dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ bgwh dʔrʕʔ
08:19	wʔʕbd pwršnʔ byt ʕmy lʕmk wmḥr thwʔ ʔtʔ hdʔ
08:20	wʕbd mryʔ hknʔ wʔyty ʕrwbʔ dtqyp lbyt prʕwn wlbyt ʕbdwhy wbklh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wʔtḥblt ʔrʕʔ mṭl ʕrwbʔ
08:21	wqrʔ prʕwn lmwšʔ wlʔhrwn wʔmr lhwn zlw dbḥw qdm mryʔ ʔlhkwn bʔrʕʔ
08:22	wʔmr mwšʔ lʔ špyr lmʕbd/dnʕbd#3#/ hknʔ mṭl dmn ṭnpwtʔ dmṣryʔ mdbḥynn lmryʔ ʔlhʔ wʔn dbḥyn ḥnn dḥltʔ dmṣryʔ lʕnyhwn rgmyn ln
08:23	mrdʔ tltʔ ywmyn nʔzl bmdbrʔ/lmdbrʔ#3#/ wndbḥ lmryʔ ʔlhn ʔyk dnʔmr ln
08:24	wʔmr prʕwn ʔnʔ ʔšdrkwn wtdbḥwn lmryʔ/#3#/ ʔlhkwn/#3#/ bmdbrʔ/#3#/ blḥwd mrḥqw lʔ trḥqwn lmʔzl wṣlw ʔp ʕly
08:25	wʔmr mwšʔ lprʕwn hʔ npq ʔnʔ mn lwtk wʔṣlʔ qdm mryʔ wnprq ʕrwbʔ mn prʕwn wmn ʕbdwhy wmn ʕmh mḥr blḥwd lʔ nwsp prʕwn lmdglw dlʔ nšdr lʕmʔ wndbḥwn lmryʔ
08:26	wnpq mwšʔ mn lwt/qdm#3#/ prʕwn wṣly qdm mryʔ
08:27	wʕbd mryʔ ʔyk mlth dmwšʔ wprq ʕrwbʔ mn prʕwn wmn ʕbdwhy wmn ʕmh wlʔ ʔštḥr ʔp lʔ ḥd
08:28	wqšy prʕwn lbh ʔp bzbnʔ hnʔ wlʔ šdrh lʕmʔ
09:01	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ zl lwt prʕwn wʔmr lh hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʕbryʔ šdr lʕmy wnplḥny
09:02	wʔlʔ ṣbʔ ʔnt lmšdrw wʕdmʔ lhšʔ mḥmsn ʔnt bhwn
09:03	hʔ ʔydh dmryʔ hwyʔ bqnynk dbmdbrʔ brkšʔ wbḥmrʔ wbgmlʔ wbtwrʔ wbʕnʔ mwtnʔ dḥsyn ṭb
09:04	wnprwš mryʔ byt bʕyrʔ dʔysryl lbyt bʕyrʔ dmṣryʔ wlʔ nmwt mn kl bʕyrʔ \dbyt ʔysryl /dʔysryl#3#/ ʔp lʔ ḥd
09:05	wyhb mryʔ zbnʔ mḥr dnʕbd mryʔ ptgmʔ hnʔ bʔrʕʔ
09:06	wʕbd mryʔ ptgmʔ hnʔ <bʔrʕʔ#3#> lywmʔ dbtrh wmytt klh bʕyrʔ dmṣryʔ wmn bʕyrʔ dbyt ʔysryl lʔ myt ʔp lʔ ḥd
09:07	wšdr prʕwn wḥzʔ dlʔ myt mn bʕyrʔ dʔysryl/dbyt ʔysryl#3#/ ʔp lʔ ḥd wʔtqšy lbh dprʕwn wlʔ šdrh lʕmʔ
09:08	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ wlʔhrwn sbw mlʔ ḥwpnykwn qṭmʔ dʔtwnʔ wndrywhy mwšʔ lʔpy šmyʔ lʕnwhy dprʕwn
09:09	wnhwʔ ḥlʔ bklh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wnhwʔ ʕl bnynšʔ wʕl bʕyrʔ šwḥnʔ dnwpḥʔ dsgy bklh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
09:10	wnsbwhy lqṭmʔ dʔtwnʔ wqmw qdm prʕwn wdryhy mwšʔ lšmyʔ lʕnwhy dprʕwn whwʔ šwḥnʔ dnwpḥʔ wprḥ bbny ʔnšʔ wbbʕyrʔ
09:11	wlʔ ʔškḥw ḥršʔ lmqm qdm mwšʔ mṭl šwḥnʔ dsgy bḥršʔ wbklh mṣryn
09:12	wqšy mryʔ lbh dprʕwn wlʔ šmʕ ʔnwn ʔyk dʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ
09:13	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ qdm bṣprʔ wqwm qdm prʕwn wʔmr lh hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʕbryʔ šdr lʕmy wnplḥny
09:14	mṭl dbzbnʔ hnʔ mšdr ʔnʔ mḥwty ʕl lbk wʕl ʕbdyk wʕl ʕmk mṭl dtdʕ dlyt ʔkwty bklh ʔrʕʔ
09:15	mṭl dhšʔ mwšṭ ʔnʔ ʔydy wmḥʔ ʔnʔ lk wlʕmk bmwtnʔ wtʔbd mn ʔrʕʔ
09:16	wbrm mṭl hdʔ hw ʔqymtk mṭl dʔḥwyk/dʔḥwʔ bk#3#/ ḥyly wmṭl dntkrz šmy bklh ʔrʕʔ
09:17	wʕdmʔ/whʔ ʕdmʔ#3#/ lhšʔ mḥmsn ʔnt bh bʕmʔ wlʔ ṣbʔ ʔnt dtšdrywhy
09:18	mḥr bhnʔ ʕdnʔ mytʔ ʔnʔ brdʔ dtqyp ṭb dlʔ hwʔ ʔkwth bmṣryn mn ywmʔ dʔtbnyt wʕdmʔ lhšʔ
09:19	whšʔ šdr ḥmwl bʕyrk wkl mdm dʔyt lk bdbrʔ/bmdbrʔ#3#/ kl brnšʔ wbʕyrʔ dnštkḥ bdbrʔ wlʔ ntḥml bgw bytʔ nḥwt ʕlyhwn brdʔ wnmwtwn
09:20	ʔynʔ ddḥl mn mlth dmryʔ mn ʕbdwhy dprʕwn ḥml ʕbdwhy wbʕyrh bbytʔ
09:21	wdlʔ ʔyty mlth dmryʔ ʕl lbh/blh#3#/ šbq ʕbdwhy wbʕyrh bḥqlʔ
09:22	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ ʔrym ʔydk lʔpy šmyʔ wnhwʔ/wnḥwt#3#/ brdʔ bklh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn ʕl bnynšʔ wʕl bʕyrʔ wʕl klh ʕsbʔ dbdbrʔ dbʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
09:23	wʔrym mwšʔ ḥwṭrh lʔpy šmyʔ wmryʔ yhb qlʔ wbrdʔ wmhlkʔ hwt nwrʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ wʔḥt mryʔ brdʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
09:24	wnḥt hwʔ brdʔ wnwrʔ mtgwzlʔ hwt bgw brdʔ ḥsyn hwʔ ṭb dlʔ hwʔ ʔkwth bklh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn mn ywmʔ/#3#/ \dhwt lʕmʔ /dʔtbnyt#3#/
09:25	wmḥʔ brdʔ lklh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn lkl dʔyt bdbrʔ mn bnynšʔ wʕdmʔ lbʕyrʔ wklh ʕsbʔ dḥqlʔ ʔwbd brdʔ wklhwn ʔylnʔ dbḥqlʔ/dḥqlʔ#3#/ tbr
09:26	blḥwd bʔrʕʔ dgšn dytbyn hww bh bny ʔysryl dlʔ nḥt brdʔ
09:27	wšdr prʕwn wqrʔ lmwšʔ wlʔhrwn wʔmr lhwn ḥṭyt zbntʔ hdʔ mryʔ zdyq wʔnʔ wʕmy ršyʕyn
09:28	ṣlw qdm mryʔ wʔyt ʔtrʔ sgy qdmwhy dlʔ nhwwn qlwhy dʔlhʔ wbrdʔ wʔšdrkwn wlʔ twspwn lmpš
09:29	wʔmr \lh mwšʔ /mwšʔ lprʕwn#3#/ mʔ dnpqt mn qrytʔ ʔpšwṭ ʔydy lwt mryʔ qlʔ nprqwn wbrdʔ twb lʔ nḥwt mṭl dtdʕ ddmryʔ hy ʔrʕʔ
09:30	wʔnt wʕbdyk ydʕ ʔnʔ dʕdmʔ lhšʔ lʔ dḥltwn mn qdm mryʔ ʔlhʔ
09:31	wktnʔ wsʕrʔ ʔbdw mṭl dsʕrʔ mḥy knʔ wktnʔ kpt
09:32	wḥṭʔ wkwntʔ lʔ ʔbdw mṭwl dlqyšyyn hww
09:33	wnpq mwšʔ mn qrytʔ mn lwt prʕwn wprs ʔydwhy lšmyʔ lwt mryʔ wprqw qlʔ wbrdʔ wmṭrʔ lʔ smk lʔrʕʔ/ʕl ʔrʕʔ#3#/
09:34	wḥzʔ prʕwn dprq mṭrʔ wbrdʔ wqlʔ wʔwsp lmḥṭʔ wʔtqšy lbh dprʕwn wdʕbdwhy
09:35	wʔtʕby lbh dprʕwn wlʔ šdr lbny ʔysryl ʔyk dšlḥ mryʔ bʔydʔ dmwšʔ
10:01	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ zl lwt prʕwn mṭl dʔnʔ qšyt lbh wlbʔ dʕbdwhy mṭl dʔʕbd ʔtwtʔ hlyn bynthwn
10:02	wmṭl dtštʕʔ qdm brk wbr brk mdm dʕbdt bmṣryn/bmṣryʔ#3#/ wʔtwtʔ dʕbdt bhwn wtdʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
10:03	wʔtw mwšʔ wʔhrwn lwt prʕwn wʔmrw lh/#3#/ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʕbryʔ ʕdmʔ lʔmty lʔ ṣbʔ ʔnt lmdḥl mny šdr lʕmy wnplḥny
10:04	wʔlʔ ṣbʔ ʔnt lmšdrw lʕmy hʔ mytʔ ʔnʔ mḥr qmṣʔ ʕl klh tḥwmk
10:05	wnksʔ ʕynh dʔrʕʔ wlʔ nškḥ br ʔnšʔ lmḥzyh lʔrʕʔ wnʔkwl šrkʔ dmdm/dklmdm#3#/ dšbq lkwn brdʔ wnʔkwl klhwn ʔylnʔ ʔylyn dyʕw lkwn bḥqlʔ
10:06	wntmlwn/wnmlwn#3#/ btyk wbtyhwn dʕbdyk wbtyhwn dklhwn mṣryʔ dlʔ ḥzw ʔbhyk wʔbhʔ dʔbhyk hknʔ mn ywmʔ dhww ʕl ʔrʕʔ wʕdmʔ lywmnʔ whpkw npqw \mn qdm /mn lwt#3#/ prʕwn
10:07	wʔmrw lh ʕbdwhy lprʕwn ʕdmʔ lʔmty thwʔ ln hdʔ twqltʔ šdr lgbrʔ wnplḥwn lmryʔ/qdm mryʔ#3#/ ʔlhhwn ʕdmʔ lhšʔ lʔ ydʕ ʔnt dʔbdt lh <kwlh#3#> mṣryn
10:08	wʔhpkw ʔnwn lmwšʔ wlʔhrwn lwt prʕwn wʔmr lhwn zlw plwḥw qdm mryʔ ʔlhkwn ʔlʔ mn wmn ʔzlyn
10:09	ʔmr lh mwšʔ bʕlymyn wbqšyšyn nʔzl bbnyn wbbntn bʕnn wbtwryn nʔzl mṭl dʕdʕʔdʔ hw ln dmryʔ
10:10	wʔmr lhwn nhwʔ hknʔ mryʔ ʕmkwn mʔ <dyn#3#> dšdrtkwn wlʔyqrtkwn ḥzw dyn dlmʔ byštʔ lwqbl ʔpykwn
10:11	lʔ hknʔ zlw hšʔ gbrʔ wplwḥw qdm mryʔ mṭwl dnyḥtʔ hw bʕyn ʔntwn wʔpqw ʔnwn mn qdm ʔpwhy dprʕwn
10:12	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ ʔrym ʔydk ʕl ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn bqmṣʔ wnsq ʕl ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wnʔkwl ʕsbʔ dʔrʕʔ wklmdm dšbq brdʔ
10:13	wʔrym mwšʔ ḥwṭrh ʕl ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wmryʔ ʔpq rwḥʔ dšwbʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ klh ʔymmʔ hw wkwlh llyʔ šprʔ hwʔ wrwḥʔ dšwbʔ šqlt qmṣʔ
10:14	wslq qmṣʔ ʕl klh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wšrʔ bklh tḥwmʔ dmṣryʔ tqyp hwʔ ṭb wʔkwth lʔ hwʔ qmṣʔ <mn#3#> qdmwhy wʔp lʔ btrh nhwʔ ʔkwth
10:15	wksy ʕynh dklh ʔrʕʔ wḥškt ʔrʕʔ wʔkl klh ʕsbʔ dʔrʕʔ wklhwn pʔrʔ dʔylnʔ dšbq brdʔ wlʔ ʔštḥr ṭrpʔ bʔylnʔ ʔp lʔ ʕsbʔ bḥqlʔ bklh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
10:16	wsrhb prʕwn lmqrʔ lmwšʔ wlʔhrwn wʔmr lhwn ḥṭyt lmryʔ ʔlhkwn wlkwn
10:17	ʔp hšʔ šbwqw swrḥny hnʔ zbnʔ wṣlw qdm mryʔ ʔlhkwn wnprq mny mwtʔ/mwtnʔ#3#/ hnʔ
10:18	wnpq mwšʔ mn qdm prʕwn wṣly qdm mryʔ
10:19	whpk mryʔ ʔyty rwḥʔ mʕrbʔ dtqypʔ ṭb wšqlth lqmṣʔ wʔrmyth bymʔ dswp wlʔ ʔštḥr ʔp lʔ ḥd qmṣʔ bklh tḥwmʔ dmṣryʔ
10:20	wqšy mryʔ lbh dprʕwn wlʔ šdr lbny ʔysryl
10:21	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ ʔrym ʔydk lwt šmyʔ wnhwʔ ḥškʔ ʕl klh/#3#/ ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wnʕmṭ ḥškʔ
10:22	wʔrym mwšʔ ʔydh lšmyʔ/lwt šmyʔ#3#/ whwʔ ḥškʔ wʕmṭnʔ bklh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn tltʔ ywmyn
10:23	lʔ ḥzʔ ʔnš lʔḥwhy wlʔ qm ʔnš mn dwkth tltʔ ywmyn wlklhwn bny ʔysryl hwʔ nwhrʔ byt mwtbhwn
10:24	wqrʔ prʕwn lmwšʔ <wlʔhrwn#3#> wʔmr lh/lhwn#3#/ zlw plwḥw qdm mryʔ <ʔlhkwn#3#> blḥwd ʕnkwn wtwrykwn šbwqw wʔp ʔyqrtkwn tʔzl ʕmkwn
10:25	ʔmr lh mwšʔ <lprʕwn#3#> ʔp ʔnt ttl bʔydn dbḥʔ wʕlwtʔ wndbḥ lmryʔ ʔlhn
10:26	wʔp bʕyrn tʔzl ʕmn wlʔ tštḥr mnn ʔp lʔ ḥdʔ ṭprʔ tnn mṭl dmnh nsbynn lmplḥ qdm mryʔ ʔlhn wḥnn lʔ ydʕyn ḥnn mnʔ nplwḥ qdm mryʔ mʔ dmṭyn ltmn
10:27	wqšy mryʔ lbh dprʕwn wlʔ ṣbʔ dnšdr ʔnwn
10:28	wʔmr prʕwn lmwšʔ zl lk/#3#/ mn lwty ʔzdhr lʔ twsp twb/#3#/ dttḥzʔ ly mṭl dbywmʔ dmtḥzʔ ʔnt ly tmwt
10:29	ʔmr lh mwšʔ špyr ʔmrt twb lʔ mwsp ʔnʔ lmḥzʔ ʔpyk
11:01	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ twb mḥwtʔ ḥdʔ mytʔ ʔnʔ ʕl prʕwn wʕl mṣryʔ whydyn ʔšdrkwn mkʔ wmʔ dšdrtkwn klkwn pwqw lkwn mkʔ
11:02	wʔmr qdm ʕmʔ nšʔlwn ʔnš gbr mn ḥbrh wʔnttʔ mn ḥbrth mʔnʔ dsʔmʔ wmʔnʔ ddhbʔ
11:03	wyhb ʔnwn mryʔ lʕmʔ lrḥmʔ bʕynyhwn dmṣryʔ wʔp/dʔp#3#/ gbrʔ mwšʔ yqyr hwʔ ṭb bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn bʕyny ʕbdwhy dprʕwn wbʕyny ʕmʔ
11:04	wʔmr mwšʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ bplgh dllyʔ npq ʔnʔ bgw mṣryn
11:05	wnmwtwn klhwn bwkrʔ dʔrʕʔ/dbʔrʕʔ#3#/ dmṣryn mn bwkrh dprʕwn dytb ʕl kwrsyh wʕdmʔ lbwkrʔ dʔmtʔ dʔyt byt rḥyʔ wklhwn bwkrʔ dbʕyrʔ
11:06	wthwʔ ylltʔ rbtʔ bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn dʔkwth lʔ hwt wʔkwth lʔ thwʔ
11:07	wmn dbyt ʔysryl lʔ nhr/nhr#3#/ ʔp lʔ klbʔ blšnh ʔp lʔ bny ʔnšʔ ʔp lʔ bʕyrʔ mṭl dtdʕwn dprš mryʔ/ʔlhʔ#3#/ byt mṣryʔ ldbyt ʔysrʔyl
11:08	wnḥtwn klhwn ʕbdyk hlyn lwty wnsgdwn ly wnʔmrwn ly pwq ʔnt wʕmʔ hnʔ klh dʕmk whydyn ʔpwq wnpq mwšʔ mn qdm prʕwn bḥmtʔ rbtʔ
11:09	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ lʔ nšmʕkwn prʕwn mṭl dʔsgʔ pryšty bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
11:10	wmwšʔ wʔhrwn ʕbdw pryštʔ hlyn \qdm prʕwn /bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn#3#/ wqšy mryʔ lbh dprʕwn wlʔ šdr lbny ʔysryl mn ʔrʕh
12:01	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ wlʔhrwn bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
12:02	yrḥʔ hnʔ nhwʔ lkwn ryš yrḥʔ qdmy nhwʔ lkwn lklhwn yrḥʔ/ywmtʔ#3#/ dšntʔ
12:03	ʔmr lklh knwštʔ dbny ʔysryl bʕsrtʔ byrḥʔ hnʔ nhwwn nsbyn lhwn gbr ʔmrʔ lbytʔ wʔmrʔ lbyt ʔbwhy
12:04	wʔn zʕwr hw bytʔ dnpwq bh ʔmrʔ nsb hw wšbbh dqryb lbyth bmnynʔ dnpštʔ ʔnš mst mʔklh tmnwn ʕl ʔmrʔ
12:05	ʔmrʔ dlyt bh mwmʔ dkrʔ br šntʔ nhwʔ lkwn mn ʔmrʔ wmn gdyʔ tsbwn
12:06	wnhwʔ nṭyr lkwn ʕdmʔ lʔrbʕsrʔ byrḥʔ hnʔ wnkswnh kwlh ʕmʔ dknwštʔ dbny ʔysryl bmʕrby šmšʔ
12:07	wnsbwn mn dmh wnrmwn/wnrswn#3#/ ʕl tryhwn prwstdʔ wʕl ʔskptʔ wʕl btʔ dnʔklwnh bhwn
12:08	wnʔklwnh lbsrʔ bllyʔ/#2#/ hnʔ kd mṭwy bnwrʔ wpṭyrʔ/dpṭyrʔ#3#/ ʕm mrrʔ nʔklwnh
12:09	lʔ tʔklwn mnh kd ḥy ʔp lʔ kd mbšlw mbšl bmyʔ ʔlʔ kd mṭwy bnwrʔ wršh wkrʕwhy wgwyh
12:10	wlʔ twtrwn mnh lṣprʔ <mdm#3#> wmdm dytr/dytyr#3#/ mnh lṣprʔ/bṣprʔ#3#/ bnwrʔ twqdwnh
12:11	whknʔ tʔklwnh kd ḥṣykwn ʔsyryn wmsnykwn brglykwn wḥwṭrykwn bʔydykwn ʔwklwhy msrhbʔyt mṭl dpṣḥʔ hw lmryʔ
12:12	wʔʕbr bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn bllyʔ hnʔ wnmwtwn klhwn bwkrʔ dʔrʕʔ dmṣryn mn bny ʔnšʔ wʕdmʔ lbʕyrʔ wbklhyn dḥlthwn dmṣryʔ ʔʕbd dynʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
12:13	wnhwʔ lkwn dmʔ hnʔ lʔtʔ ʕl btʔ dʔntwn bhwn wʔḥzywhy ldmʔ wʔpṣḥ/dʔprḥ#3#/ ʕlykwn wlʔ nhwʔ bkwn mwtʔ/mwtnʔ#3#/ lmḥblw mʔ dmqṭl ʔnʔ bʔrʕʔʔ dmṣryn
12:14	wnhwʔ lkwn ywmʔ hnʔ ldwkrnʔ wʕwbdwhy ʕdʕʔdʔ lmryʔ ʕdʕʔdʔ ldrykwn nmwsʔ lʕlm hwytwn ʕbdyn lh
12:15	šbʕʔ ywmyn pṭyrʔ tʔklwn wmn ywmʔ qdmyʔ tbṭlwn ḥmyrʔ/ḥmyʕʔ#3#/ mn btykwn mṭl dkl/#3#/ dnʔkwl ḥmyʕʔ mn btykwn tʔbd npšʔ hy mn ʔysryl mn ywmʔ qdmyʔ wʕdmʔ lywmʔ šbyʕyʔ
12:16	wywmʔ qdmyʔ qrʔ wqdyš wywmʔ šbyʕyʔ qrʔ wqdyš nhwʔ lkwn wkl ʕbd lʔ ntʕbd bhwn ʔlʔ mdm dʔkl br ʔnšʔ blḥwd hw ntʕbd lkwn
12:17	wtṭrwn pṭyrʔ mṭl dbh bywmʔ hnʔ ʔpqt ḥylwtkwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wtṭrwn ywmʔ hnʔ ldrykwn nmwsʔ lʕlm
12:18	byrḥʔ qdmyʔ bʔrbʕsrʔ byrḥʔ brmšʔ tʔklwn pṭyrʔ wʕdmʔ lywm ḥd wʕsryn byrḥʔ brmšʔ/qdmyʔ#3#/
12:19	šbʕʔ ywmyn ḥmyʕʔ lʔ nštkḥ bbtykwn mṭl dkl dnʔkwl ḥmyʕʔ tʔbd npšʔ hy mn knwštʔ dʔysrʔyl mn bwknʔ wmn ʕmwrʔ dʔrʕʔ
12:20	kl ḥmyʕʔ lʔ tʔklwn bklh byt mʕmrkwn tʔklwn pṭyrʔ
12:21	wqrʔ mwšʔ lklhwn sbʔ dbny ʔysryl wʔmr lhwn bʕgl sbw lkwn ʕnʔ lšrbtkwn wkwsw pṣḥʔ
12:22	wtsbwn mʔsrtʔ dzwpʔ wtṣbʕwn bdmʔ dʔmrʔ wtrswn ʕl ʔskptʔ wʕl tryhwn prwstdʔ mn dmʔ dʔyt bmʔnʔ wʔntwn lʔ tpqwn ʔnš mn trʕ byth ʕdmʔ lṣprʔ
12:23	wnʕbr mryʔ lmmḥʔ lmṣryʔ wnḥzywhy ldmʔ dʕl ʔskptʔ wʕl tryhwn prwstdʔ wnpṣḥ mryʔ ʕl trʕʔ wlʔ nšbwq lmḥblnʔ dnʕwl lbtykwn wnḥbl
12:24	wtṭrwn ptgmʔ hnʔ wnmwsʔ hnʔ lkwn wlbnykwn ʕdmʔ lʕlm
12:25	wmʔ dʕltwn lʔrʕʔ dntl lkwn mryʔ ʔyk dʔmr tṭrwn pwlḥnʔ hnʔ
12:26	wnhwʔ kd/dkd#3#/ nʔmrwn lkwn bnykwn hnʔ pwlḥnʔ mnʔ hw
12:27	tʔmrwn lhwn ddbḥtʔ hw dpṣḥh dmryʔ dʔpṣḥ ʕl btʔ dbny ʔysryl bmṣryn kd mḥʔ lmṣryʔ wlbtyn pṣy wqʕdw ʕmʔ wsgdw lmryʔ
12:28	wʔzlw wʕbdw bny ʔysryl ʔyk/ʔyknʔ#3#/ dpqd mryʔ lmwšʔ wlʔhrwn hknʔ ʕbdw
12:29	whwʔ bplgh dllyʔ wmryʔ qṭl klhwn bwkrʔ dʔrʕʔ/dbʔrʕʔ#3#/ dmṣryn mn bwkrh dprʕwn dytb ʕl kwrsyh wʕdmʔ lbwkrʔ dšbyʔ dʔyt byt ʔsyrʔ wklhwn bwkrʔ dbʕyrʔ
12:30	wqm prʕwn bllyʔ hw wklhwn ʕbdwhy wklhwn mṣryʔ whwt ylltʔ rbtʔ bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn dlyt bytʔ dlʔ hwʔ bh mytʔ
12:31	wqrʔ prʕwn lmwšʔ wlʔhrwn bllyʔ hw wʔmr lhwn qwmw pwqw mn gw ʕmy wʔp ʔntwn wʔp bny ʔysryl wzlw plwḥw qdm mryʔ ʔyknʔ dʔmrtwn
12:32	ʔp ʕnkwn ʔp twrykwn dbrw \ʔyk dʔmrtwn /#3#/ wzlw wtbrkwn ʔp ly
12:33	wʔlṣw mṣryʔ lʕmʔ msrhbʔyt dnpqwn ʔnwn mn ʔrʕʔ mṭl dʔmryn dkln mytynn
12:34	wšqlw ʕmʔ lyšhwn kd lʔ ḥmʕ qryrhwn ṣryr bšwšpyhwn wrmʔ ʕl ktpthwn
12:35	wbny ʔysryl ʕbdw ʔyk mlth/ptgmʔ#3#/ dmwšʔ wšʔlw mn mṣryʔ mʔnʔ dsʔmʔ/ddhbʔ#3#/ wmʔnʔ ddhbʔ/dsʔmʔ#3#/ wlbwšʔ
12:36	wyhb ʔnwn mryʔ lʕmʔ lrḥmʔ bʕynyhwn dmṣryʔ wʔšʔlw ʔnwn wḥlṣw lmṣryʔ
12:37	wšqlw bny ʔysryl mn rʕmsys lskwt štmʔʔ ʔlpyn gbrʔ rglyʔ sṭr mn yqrtʔ
12:38	ʔp ʕrwbʔ sgyʔʔ slq ʕmhwn wʕnʔ wtwrʔ wqnynʔ dsgy ṭb
12:39	wʔpʔwhy llyšʔ dʔpqw ʔnwn mṣryʔ/mn mṣryn#3#/ rʕpʔ pṭyrʔ mṭl dlʔ ḥmʕ mṭl dʔpqw ʔnwn mṣryʔ wlʔ ʔškḥw lmtkrkw wʔp zwdʔ lʔ ʕbdw lhwn
12:40	wmwtbhwn dytbw bny ʔysryl bmṣryn/bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn#3#/ ʔrbʕmʔʔ wtltyn šnyn
12:41	whwʔ mn btr ʔrbʕmʔʔ wtltyn šnyn bh bywmʔ hnʔ/hw#3#/ npqw klhwn/#3#/ ḥylwth dmryʔ mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
12:42	llyʔ nṭyr hwʔ lmryʔ lmpqwthwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn hw llyʔ hnʔ lmryʔ nṭyr hwʔ lklhwn bny ʔysryl ldryhwn
12:43	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ wlʔhrwn hnw nmwsʔ dpṣḥʔ dkl/kl#3#/ br nwkryʔ lʔ nʔkwl mnh
12:44	wkl ʕbdʔ dgbrʔ zbyn kspʔ mʔ dgzrtyhy hydyn nʔkwl mnh
12:45	twtbʔ wʔgyrʔ lʔ nʔkwl mnh
12:46	bbytʔ ḥd ntʔkl wlʔ tpqwn mnh/#3#/ mn bsrʔ lbr mn bytʔ wgrmʔ lʔ ttbrwn bh
12:47	klh knwštʔ dʔysrʔyl/dbny ysryl#3#/ nʕbdwnh
12:48	wkd nʕmr ʕmkwn twtbʔ wnʕbd pṣḥʔ lmryʔ mʔ dgzr kl dkrʔ hydyn ntqrb lmʕbdh wnhwʔ ʔyk bwknʔ dʔrʕʔ wkwl ʕwrlʔ lʔ nʔkwl mnh
12:49	nmwsʔ ḥd nhwʔ lbwknʔ wlʕmwrʔ dʕmryn byntkwn
12:50	wʕbdw klhwn bny ʔysryl ʔyk dpqd mryʔ lmwšʔ wlʔhrwn hknʔ ʕbdw
12:51	whwʔ bh bywmʔ hnʔ ʔpq mryʔ \lbny ʔysryl /lʔysryl#3#/ mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn kwl ḥylwthwn
13:01	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ
13:02	qdš ly kl bwkrʔ dptḥ kl rḥmʔ dbny ʔysryl dʔnšʔ wdbʕyrʔ dyly ʔnwn
13:03	wʔmr mwšʔ lʕmʔ ʔtdkrw ywmʔ hnʔ dnpqtwn bh/#3#/ mn \mṣryn /ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn#3#/ mn byt ʕbdwtʔ mṭwl dbʔydʔ tqyptʔ ʔpqkwn mryʔ mkʔ wlʔ ntʔkl ḥmyʕʔ
13:04	bywmʔ hnʔ npqyn/dnpqyn#3#/ ʔntwn byrḥʔ dhbbʔ
13:05	wnhwʔ kd/dkd#3#/ nʕlkwn mryʔ lʔrʕʔ dknʕnyʔ wdḥtyʔ/#3#/ wdʔmwryʔ wdḥwyʔ wdybwsyʔ wdprzyʔ ʔyk/ʔyknʔ#3#/ dymʔ lʔbhykwn dntl/lmtl#3#/ lkwn/lk#3#/ ʔrʕʔ dmrdyʔ ḥlbʔ wdbšʔ tplḥwn pwlḥnʔ hnʔ bh byrḥʔ/bywmʔ#3#/ hnʔ
13:06	šbʕʔ ywmyn tʔklwn pṭyrʔ wbywmʔ šbyʕyʔ ʕdʕʔdʔ hw/#3#/ lmryʔ
13:07	pṭyrʔ tʔklwn šbʕʔ ywmyn wlʔ ntḥzʔ bkwn/#23#/ ḥmyʕʔ bklh tḥwmkwn
13:08	wtḥwwn lbnykwn bywmʔ hw dmṭl hnʔ ʕbd ly ʔlhy kd npqt mn mṣryn
13:09	wnhwʔ lk ʔtʔ ʕl ʔydk wdwkrnʔ byt/bynt#3#/ ʕynyk mṭl dnhwʔ nmwsh dmryʔ bpwmk mṭwl dbʔydʔ tqyptʔ ʔpqk mryʔ mn mṣryn
13:10	wṭr pwqdnʔ hnʔ wnmwsʔ hnʔ lzbnh mn ʕdn lʕdn
13:11	wkd/wnhwʔ kd#3#/ nʕlk mryʔ lʔrʕʔ dknʕnyʔ ʔyk/ʔyknʔ#3#/ dymʔ lk wlʔbhyk wntlyh lk
13:12	tprwš kl bwkrʔ ptḥ/dptḥ#3#/ rḥmʔ lmryʔ wkl ptḥ/dptḥ#3#/ rḥmʔ dbʕyrʔ <lmryʔ tpršywhy wmʔ#3#> dnhwʔ lk dkrʔ lmryʔ
13:13	wkl bwkrʔ dkrʔ/#3#/ dptḥ/ptḥ#3#/ rḥmʔ dbʕyrʔ bʔmrʔ tprqywhy wʔn lʔ tprqywhy <bʔrʕʔ#3#> tqṭlyhy wkl bwkrʔ dbrnšʔ/dbnynšʔ#3#/ dbnyk tprwq
13:14	wkd/wnhwʔ kd#3#/ nšʔlk brk mḥr wnʔmr lk mnw hnʔ tʔmr lh dbʔydʔ tqyptʔ ʔpqn mryʔ \mn mṣryn /#3#/ mn byt ʕbdwtʔ
13:15	wkd ʔtqšy prʕwn/lbʔ dprʕwn#3#/ lmšdrwtn qṭl mryʔ kl bwkrʔ dbʔrʕʔ/dʔrʕʔ#3#/ dmṣryn mn bwkrʔ dbrnšʔ wʕdmʔ lbwkrʔ dbʕyrʔ mṭl hnʔ mdbḥ ʔnʔ lmryʔ kl ptḥ rḥmʔ dkrʔ wkl bwkrʔ dbny <ʔysrʔyl#3#> ʔprwq
13:16	wnhwʔ lk/#3#/ ʔtʔ ʕl ʔydk wdwkrnʔ byt ʕynyk mṭl dbʔydʔ tqyptʔ ʔpqk mryʔ mn mṣryn
13:17	wkd šdr prʕwn lʕmʔ lʔ ʔwbl ʔnwn ʔlhʔ bʔwrḥʔ dʔrʕʔ dplštyʔ mṭl dqrybʔ hwt mṭl dʔmr ʔlhʔ dlmʔ ndḥlwn ʕmʔ mʔ dḥzw qrbʔ wnhpkwn lmṣryn
13:18	wdbr ʔlhʔ lʕmʔ bʔwrḥʔ dmdbrʔ/#3#/ dymʔ dswp wmzynyn slqw hww dbyt/bny#3#/ ʔysryl mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
13:19	wnsb mwšʔ grmwhy dywsp ʕmh mṭl dmwmyw ʔwmy ldbyt ʔysryl wʔmr mtdkrw mtdkr lkwn ʔlhʔ ʔsqw grmy mkʔ ʕmkwn
13:20	wšqlw mn skwt wšrw bʔtm/bʔlym#3#/ \dbswpy mdbrʔ /dbswpʔ dmdbrʔ#3#/
13:21	wmryʔ ʔzl qdmyhwn bʔymmʔ bʕmwdʔ dʕnnʔ lmšryw ʔnwn bʔwrḥʔ wbllyʔ bʕmwdʔ/bzhrʔ#3#/ dnwrʔ lmnhrw lhwn lmʔzl bʔymmʔ wbllyʔ
13:22	lʔ prq hwʔ ʕmwdʔ dʕnnʔ bʔymmʔ wʕmwdʔ dnwrʔ bllyʔ mn qdm ʕmʔ
14:01	\wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh /wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ#3#/
14:02	ʔmr ldbyt ʔysryl nhpkwn wnšrwn ʕl pwmh dḥrytʔ byt mgdwl lbyt ymʔ qdm bʕl ṣpwn lqwblh tšrwn/dtšrwn#3#/ ʕl ymʔ
14:03	wʔmr prʕwn ʕl bny ʔysryl dnwkryyn ʔnwn bʔrʕʔ ʔtḥd ʕlyhwn mdbrʔ
14:04	\wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ /#3#/ ʔnʔ/#3#/ ʔqšʔ lbh dprʕwn wnrdwp btrkwn wʔštbḥ bprʕwn wbklh ḥylh wndʕwn mṣryʔ dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ wʕbdw hknʔ
14:05	wʔtḥwy/wʔtḥzy#3#/ lmlkʔ dmṣryn dʔzl lh ʕmʔ wʔthpk lbh dprʕwn wdʕbdwhy ʕl ʕmʔ wʔmryn mnʔ ʕbdn dšdrn lʔysryl mn šwʕbdn
14:06	wpgd qrwkwhy wʕmh dbr/#3#/ ʕmh
14:07	wdbr štmʔʔ mrkbtʔ dgbyn wklhyn dmṣryʔ wgbrʔ ʕl klhyn
14:08	wqšy mryʔ lbh dprʕwn mlkʔ dmṣryn wrdp btr bny ʔysryl wbny ʔysryl npqw bʔydʔ rmtʔ/rbtʔ#3#/
14:09	wrdpw mṣryʔ btrhwn wʔdrkw ʔnwn kd šryn ʕl ymʔ kl rkšh dprʕwn wmrkbth wpršwhy wḥylh <kd#3#> šryn ʕl pwmh dḥrytʔ lwqbl bʕl ṣpwn
14:10	wqrb prʕwn wʔrymw dbyt ʔysryl ʕynyhwn wḥzw lmṣryʔ \kd ʔtyn /dʔtyn#3#/ btrhwn wdḥlw ṭb wṣlyw bny/dbyt#3#/ ʔysryl qdm mryʔ

18:21	wʔnt tḥzʔ \mn klh ʕmʔ /#3#/ gbrʔ dḥylʔ ddḥlyn \mn ʔlhʔ /lʔlhʔ#3#/ gbryn šryryn wsnyn šwḥdʔ wnklʔ wʔqym ʕlyhwn ryšy ʔlpʔ wryšy mʔwtʔ wryšy ḥmšyn wršy ʕsrʔ

19:01	byrḥʔ tlytyʔ btr mpqnʔ \dbny ʔysryl /dʔysryl#3#/ mn mṣryn bh bywmʔ hnʔ ʔtw lmdbrʔ dsyn/dsyny#3#/

22:06	wkd ntl gbrʔ lḥbrh kspʔ ʔw mʔnʔ lmṭr wntgnb mn byt gbrʔ ʔn nštkḥ gnbʔ nšlm ḥd tryn
22:07	wʔn lʔ nštkḥ gnbʔ nqrwb mrh dbytʔ lwt dynʔ ʔlʔ ʔwšb ʔydh bʕbydtʔ/bʕbdtʔ#3#/ dḥbrh
22:08	ʕl klmdm dḥṭʔ ʕl twrʔ wʕl ḥmrʔ wʕl ʔmrʔ wʕl lbwšʔ wʕl kl/#3#/ ʔbdtʔ dnʔmr hdʔ/dhdʔ#3#/ hy qdm dynʔ nʕln mlʔ dtryhwn wlmn dnḥybwn dynʔ nšlm ḥd tryn lḥbrh
22:09	wkd ntl gbrʔ lḥbrh ḥmrʔ ʔw twrʔ ʔw ʔmrʔ ʔw kl bʕyrʔ lmṭr wnmwt ʔw nttbr ʔw nštbʔ wlyt ʔnš dḥzʔ
22:10	mwmth dmryʔ thwʔ byt tryhwn ʔlʔ ʔwšb ʔydh bʕbydtʔ dḥbrh wnqbl mrhwn mwmtʔ wlʔ nšlm
22:11	wʔn mtgnbw ntgnb mnh nšlm lmrwhy
22:12	wʔn mttbrw nttbr wnytywhy lshdwtʔ dtbyrʔ lʔ nšlm
22:13	wkd nšʔl gbrʔ mn ḥbrh bʕyrʔ wnttbr ʔw nmwt wmrh lʔ hwʔ ʕmh mšlmw nšlm
22:14	wʔn mrh ʕmh lʔ nšlm wʔn ʔgyrʔ hw blʕ bʔgrh
22:15	wkd nšdl gbrʔ btwltʔ/lbtwltʔ#3#/ dlʔ hwt mkyrʔ wndmk ʕmh msb nsbyh lh ʔnttʔ

22:18	wkl mn dndmk ʕm bʕyrʔ mtqṭlw ntqṭl

22:24	wʔn kspʔ twzp <lmsknʔ#3#> bʕmy lmsknʔ dʕmk lʔ thwʔ lh ʔyk mrʔ ḥwbʔ wlʔ tsb mnh rbytʔ
22:25	wʔn tsb mšknʔ lbšh/lbwšh#3#/ dḥbrk mʕrby/bmʕrby#3#/ šmšʔ hbyhy lh

22:27	ldynʔ lʔ tṣḥʔ wlršʔ dʕmk lʔ tlwṭ
22:28	ryš ʕllth dʔdrk wryš mʕṣrtk lʔ tšwḥr/twḥr#3#/ bwkrʔ dbnyk ttl ly
22:29	whknʔ tʕbd ltwryk wlʕnk šbʕʔ ywmyn nhwʔ ʕm ʔmh wbywmʔ tmynyʔ/dtmnyʔ#3#/ ttlywhy ly

23:01	lʔ tšr šmʕʔ kdbʔ lʔ twšṭ ʔydk ʕm/ʕl#3#/ ḥybʔ lmhwʔ/dthwʔ#3#/ lh shdʔ kdbʔ
23:02	lʔ thwʔ btr sgyʔʔ lmbʔšw wlʔ tʕnʔ ʕl dynʔ/dynʔ#3#/ lmṣlʔ btr sgyʔʔ dṣlyn
23:03	wlmsknʔ lʔ tʕdr bdynh
23:04	wkd tpgʕ btwrʔ dbʕldbbk ʔw bḥmrh kd ṭʕyn mhpkw ʔhpk ʔnwn lh
23:05	wkd tḥzʔ ḥmrʔ dbʕldbbk drbyʕ tḥyt ṭʕnh wbʕʔ ʔnt dlʔ tšqwl ʕmh mšql šqwl ʕmh
23:06	lʔ tṣlʔ dynʔ dmsknʔ bdynh
23:07	wmn mltʔ kdbtʔ hwyt mrḥq wzkyʔ wzdyqʔ lʔ tqṭwl mṭl dlʔ mzkʔ ʔnʔ lḥybʔ
23:08	šwḥdʔ lʔ tsb mṭl dšwḥdʔ mʕwr ʕynyhwn dḥkymʔ bdynʔ wmhpk mlyhwn dzkyʔ
23:09	wlʕmwrʔ lʔ tʕyqwn ʔntwn gyr ydʕyn ʔntwn npšʔ dʕmwrʔ mṭl dʕmwrʔ hwytwn bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
23:10	št šnyn tzrwʕ ʔrʕk/zrʕk#3#/ wtḥmwl ʕllth
23:11	wbšbyʕytʔ tkrbyh wtšbqyh wnʔklwn msknʔ dʕmk wšrkhwn tʔkwl ḥywtʔ ddbrʔ whknʔ tʕbd lkrmyk wlzytyk
23:12	štʔ ywmyn tʕbd ʕbdk wbywmʔ šbyʕyʔ ttnyḥ mṭl dntnyḥ twrk wḥmrk wnttnyḥ br ʔmtk wʕmwrʔ dbqwryk
23:13	wkl mdm dʔmrt lkwn tzdhrwn wšm dḥltʔ ʔḥrnytʔ lʔ ttdkrwn wlʔ nsqn ʕl lbkwn
23:14	tlt zbnyn ʕbdw ly ʕdʕʔdʔ bšntʔ
23:15	ʕdʕʔdʔ dpṭyrʔ tṭr šbʕʔ ywmyn pṭyrʔ tʔkwl ʔyk dpqdtk byrḥʔ dhbbʔ mṭl dbyrḥʔ dhbbʔ npqtwn mn mṣryn wlʔ ttḥzwn qdmy sryqʔyt
23:16	wʕdʕʔdʔ dḥṣdʔ ryš ʕbwrkwn dtzrʕwn bḥqlʔ/bʔrʕʔ#3#/ wʕdʕʔdʔ dḥmlʔ bmpqh dšntʔ mʔ dknš ʔnt ʕlltk mn ḥqlʔ
23:17	tlt zbnyn bšntʔ ntḥzʔ kl dwkrnk qdm mryʔ ʔlhk
23:18	lʔ tdbḥ ʕl ḥmyʕʔ dmʔ ddbḥtʔ wlʔ nbwt trbʔ dʕdʕʔdʔ ʕdmʔ lṣprʔ
23:19	ryš ʕllth dʔrʕk tytʔ lbyth dmryʔ ʔlhk lʔ tbšl gdyʔ bḥlbʔ dʔmh
23:20	hʔ mšdr ʔnʔ mlʔkʔ qdmyk dnnṭrk bʔwrḥʔ wdnʕlk lʔrʕʔ dtqnt
23:21	ʔzdhr mnh wšmʕ bqlh lʔ ttḥrʔ lqwblh dlmʔ lʔ nšbwq lḥwbykwn mṭl dšmy ʕlwhy
23:22	wʔn mšmʕ tšmʕ bqlh wtʕbd klmdm dʔmr <ʔnʔ#3#> lk ʔsnʔ lsnʔyk wʔʕyq lbʕldbbyk
23:23	mṭl dnʔzl mlʔky qdmyk wnʕlk ʕl ʔmwryʔ wḥtyʔ wprzyʔ wknʕnyʔ wḥwyʔ wybwsyʔ wʔḥrwb ʔnwn
23:24	lʔ tsgwd lʔlhyhwn wlʔ tplwḥ ʔnwn wlʔ tʕbd ʔyk ʕbdyhwn ʔlʔ msḥpw sḥp ʔnwn wmtbrw tbr qymthwn
23:25	wtplḥwn lmryʔ ʔlhkwn wnbrk lḥmkwn wmykwn wnʕbr mḥwtʔ mn btykwn
23:26	wlʔ thwʔ dmgzyʔ wdʕqrʔ bʔrʕkwn wmnyn ywmtkwn ʔšlm
23:27	wdḥlty ʔšdr qdmyk wʔḥrwb lkl ʕmmʔ dtʔzl ʕlyhwn wʔtl lbʕldbbyk dnpnwn qdlhwn qdmyk
23:28	wʔšdr dbwrytʔ qdmyk wʔḥrwb lknʕnyʔ wlḥtyʔ mn qdmyk
23:29	lʔ ʔḥrwb ʔnwn mn qdmyk bšntʔ ḥdʔ dlʔ thwʔ ʔrʕʔ ḥrbʔ wtsgʔ ʕlyk ḥywt brʔ

23:32	lʔ tqym lhwn wldḥlthwn qymʔ

24:01	wlmwšʔ ʔmr sq lwt mryʔ ʔnt wʔhrwn wndb wʔbyhw wšbʕyn gbryn mn <bny#3#> sbʔ dʔysrʔyl wtsgdwn mn rwḥqʔ
24:02	wnqrwb mwšʔ blḥwdwhy qdm mryʔ whnwn lʔ nqrbwn wʕmʔ lʔ nsqwn ʕmh
24:03	wʔtʔ mwšʔ wʔštʕy lʕmʔ klhwn ptgmwhy dmryʔ wklhwn dynʔ wqʕʔ klh ʕmʔ bqlʔ ḥd wʔmrw klmdm/klhwn ptgmʔ#3#/ dʔmr mryʔ nʕbd
24:04	wktb mwšʔ klhwn ptgmwhy dmryʔ wqdm bṣprʔ wbnʔ mdbḥʔ \bšpwly ṭwrʔ /bšpwlwhy dṭwrʔ#3#/ wtrtʕsrʔ qymtʔ ltrʕsr šbṭʔ dʔysryl

24:08	wnsb mwšʔ dmʔ wrzp/wʔrzp#3#/wrs#3#/ ʕl ʕmʔ wʔmr hnw/hnʔ#3#/ dmʔ dqymʔ dʔqym mryʔ ʕmkwn ʕl klhwn ptgmʔ hlyn

24:10	wḥzw lʔlhʔ dʔysryl wtḥyt rglwhy ʔyk ʕbdʔ dlbtʔ dspylʔ wʔyk krwmʔ dšmyʔ bdkywtʔ

25:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh

25:11	wqrwmyh dhbʔ dkyʔ mn lbr wmn lgw tqrmyh wtʕbd lh klylʔ ddhbʔ kd ḥdrʔ

25:18	wʕbd tryn krwbʔ ddhbʔ dnsktʔ ʕbd ʔnwn mn tryn sṭrwhy dḥwsyʔ

25:20	wnhwwn krwbʔ \prysyn gpyhwn /prysn knpyhwn#3#/ lʕl wmksyn bknpyhwn ʕl ḥwsyʔ wʔpyhwn ḥd lwqbl ḥd lʕl mn ḥwsyʔ nhwyn ʔpyhwn dkrwbʔ
