25:22	wʔtwʕd lk tmn wʔmll ʕmk mn lʕl mn ḥwsyʔ mn bynt/byny#3#/ tryn krwbʔ dʔyt lʕl mn qbwtʔ dshdwtʔ kl mdm dmpqd ʔnʔ lk ʕl bny ʔysryl
25:23	wʕbd ptwrʔ dqysʔ dʔškrʕʔ trtyn ʔmyn ʔwrkh wʔmʔ <wplg#3#> ptyh wʔmʔ wplg rwmh
25:24	wqrwmyhy dhbʔ dkyʔ wʕbd lh klylʔ ddhbʔ kd ḥdr
25:25	wʕbd lh sptʔ dthwʔ rmʔ pšk kd ḥdr wʕbd <lh#3#> klylʔ ddhbʔ ʕl spth kd ḥdr
25:26	wʕbd lh ʔrbʕ zqzqn ddhbʔ wtʕbd zqzqtʔ ʔrbʕ ddhbʔ ʕl ʔrbʕ zwyth lʕl mn ʔrbʕ rglwhy
25:27	lwqbl spth nhwyn zqzqth ʔtrʔ lqwpʔ lmšqlh lptwrʔ
25:28	wʕbd qwpʔ dqysʔ dʔškrʕʔ wqrwm ʔnwn dhbʔ dnhwwn šqlyn bhwn ptwrʔ
25:29	wʕbd pylsʔ wkpʔ wzbwrʔ wmnqytʔ dmtnqʔ bhyn ddhbʔ/dhbʔ#3#/ dkyʔ tʕbd ʔnyn
25:30	wtsym ʕl ptwrʔ \lḥm ʔpʔ /lḥmʔ dʔpʔ#3#/ qdmy ʔmynʔyt
25:31	wʕbd mnrtʔ ddhbʔ dkyʔ dnsktʔ tʕbdyh lmnrtʔ bss dylh wqnyh wʔsqpyh wḥzwryh wšwšnyh mnh nhwwn
25:32	wštʔ qnyn dnpqyn mn sṭryh tltʔ qnyn mn sṭrh ḥd dmnrtʔ wtltʔ qnyn mn sṭrh ʔḥrnʔ
25:33	tltʔ ʔsqpyn qbyʕyn bqnyʔ ḥd wḥzwrʔ wšwšnʔ wtltʔ ʔsqpyn qbyʕyn bqnyʔ ḥd wḥzwrʔ wšwšnʔ hknʔ bštʔ qnyn dnpqyn mnh mn mnrtʔ
25:34	wbmnrtʔ nhwwn ʔrbʕʔ ʔsqpyn wḥzwrʔ wšwšnʔ
25:35	ḥzwrʔ tḥyt tryn qnyn dmnh wḥzwrʔ tḥyt tryn qnyn dmnh wḥzwrʔ tḥyt tryn qnyn dmnh hknʔ bštʔ qnyn dnpqyn mnh mn mnrtʔ
25:36	wḥzwryh wqnyh mnh nhwwn kwlh dnsktʔ ḥdʔ ddhbʔ dkyʔ
25:37	wʕbd šrgyh šbʕʔ wʔnhr šrgyh dnhwwn mnhryn/nhryn#3#/ lwqbl ʔpyh
25:38	\wʕbd mlqṭyh /dmlqṭyh#3#/ wmzmkyh ddhbʔ dkyʔ
25:39	mn kkrʔ ddhbʔ dkyʔ tʕbdyh lh wlklhwn mʔnʔ hlyn
25:40	wḥzy wʕbd bdmwtʔ hy dmḥwʔ ʔnʔ lk bṭwrʔ
26:01	wlmšknʔ tʕbd ʕsr yryʕn dbwṣʔ ʕzylʔ tkltʔ wʔrgwnʔ wṣwbʕʔ dzḥwrytʔ krwbʔ ʕbdʔ dʔwmnʔ tʕbd ʔnyn
26:02	ʔwrkh dyryʕtʔ ḥdʔ ʕsryn wtmnʔ ʔmyn wptyh ʔrbʕ ʔmyn dyryʕtʔ ḥdʔ mšwḥtʔ ḥdʔ lklhyn yryʕtʔ
26:03	ḥmš yryʕn nhwyn mdbqn ḥdʔ bḥdʔ wḥmš yryʕn nhwyn mdbqn ḥdʔ bḥdʔ
26:04	wʕbd tʔntʔ dtkltʔ ʕl spth dyryʕtʔ ḥdʔ bsṭrh ddbqʔ whknʔ tʕbd bsṭrh/bspth#3#/ dyryʕtʔ mn sṭrʔ ddbqʔ ʔḥrnʔ
26:05	ḥmšyn tnʔn tʕbd bspth dyryʕtʔ ḥdʔ wḥmšyn tnʔn tʕbd bspth ʔḥrtʔ dyryʕtʔ bdbqʔ ʔḥrnʔ wnhwyn tryṣn tʔntʔ ḥdʔ lwqbl ḥdʔ
26:06	wʕbd ḥmšyn qwrqsʔ ddhbʔ wdbq yryʕtʔ ḥdʔ bḥdʔ bqwrqsʔ wnhwʔ mšknʔ ḥd
26:07	wʕbd yryʕtʔ dsʕrʔ lprsʔ dmšknʔ/lmšknʔ#3#/ ḥdʕsrʔ yryʕn tʕbd ʔnyn
26:08	ʔwrkh dyryʕtʔ ḥdʔ mnhyn tltyn ʔmyn wptyh ʔrbʕ ʔmyn dyryʕtʔ ḥdʔ mšwḥtʔ ḥdʔ lklhyn yryʕtʔ hlyn ḥdʕsrʔ
26:09	wdbq ḥmš yryʕn ʔkḥdʔ wšt yryʕn ʔyk ḥdʔ wʔʕp yryʕtʔ štytytʔ lwqbl ʔpy mšknʔ
26:10	wʕbd ḥmšyn tnʔn ʕl spth dyryʕtʔ ḥdʔ mn sṭrh ddbqʔ wḥmšyn tnʔn <tʕbd#3#> ʕl spth dyryʕtʔ <ʔḥrtʔ#3#> bdbqʔ/ddbqʔ#3#/ ʔḥrnʔ
26:11	wʕbd qwrqsʔ dnḥšʔ ḥmšyn wʔʕl qwrqsʔ btʔntʔ wdbqyhy lmšknʔ wnhwʔ ḥd
26:12	wmdm dytr mn yryʕtʔ dmšknʔ plgh dyryʕtʔ dytr trmʔ/ntrmʔ#3#/ lbstrh dmšknʔ
26:13	wʔmtʔ mn ḥd gbʔ wʔmtʔ mn <ḥd#3#> gbʔ ʔḥrnʔ dytr bʔwrkʔ dyryʕtʔ dmšknʔ nhwʔ rmʔ ʕl sṭrwhy dmšknʔ mn hnʔ gbʔ wmn hnʔ lmksywth
26:14	wʕbd prsʔ lmšknʔ mškʔ ddkrʔ dʔspynyqʔ mškʔ ddkrʔ dssgwnʔ mn lʕl
26:15	wʕbd dpʔ lmšknʔ dqysʔ dʔškrʕʔ qymʔ
26:16	ʕsr ʔmyn ʔwrkh ddpʔ ḥd wʔmʔ wplg ptyh ddpʔ ḥd
26:17	wtrtyn ṣyrtʔ ldpʔ ḥd tryṣn ḥdʔ lwqbl ḥdʔ hknʔ tʕbd lklhwn dpwhy dmšknʔ
26:18	wʕbd dpʔ lmšknʔ ʕsryn dpyn lsṭrʔ drwḥʔ dtymnʔ
26:19	wʔrbʕyn smkʔ dsʔmʔ/dkspʔ#3#/ tʕbd tḥyt ʕsryn dpyn tryn smkyn tḥyt dpʔ ḥd ltrtyn ṣyrth wtryn smkyn tḥyt dpʔ ʔḥrnʔ ltrtyn ṣyrth
26:20	wlsṭrʔ ʔḥrnʔ dmšknʔ mn rwḥʔ dgrbyʔ ʕsryn dpyn
26:21	wʔrbʕyn smkyn dsʔmʔ tryn smkyn tḥyt dpʔ ḥd wtryn smkyn tḥyt dpʔ ʔḥrnʔ
26:22	wmn špwlwhy dmšknʔ mn mʕrbʔ ʕbd štʔ dpyn
26:23	wtryn dpyn tʕbd lzwytʔ dmšknʔ mn špwlyhwn
26:24	dnhwwn šwyn mn ltḥt wʔkḥdʔ nhwwn gpyn ʕl ršh ʕl zqzqtʔ ḥdʔ hknʔ ltryhwn smkʔ ltrtyn zwytʔ nhwwn
26:25	wnhwwn tmnyʔ dpyn wsmkyhwn dsʔmʔ/dkspʔ#3#/ šttʕsr tryn smkyn tḥyt dpʔ ḥd wtryn smkyn tḥyt dpʔ ʔḥrnʔ
26:26	wʕbd mwklʔ dqysʔ dʔškrʕʔ ḥmšʔ ldpʔ dsṭrh ḥd dmšknʔ
26:27	wḥmšʔ mwklyn ldpwhy dsṭrʔ ʔḥrnʔ dmšknʔ wḥmšʔ mwklyn ldpwhy dsṭrʔ ʔḥrnʔ <dmšknʔ#3#> mn špwlwhy dmšknʔ mn mʕrbʔ
26:28	wmwklʔ mṣʕyʔ bgw dpʔ mʕbr mn hnʔ gbʔ lhnʔ
26:29	wdpʔ qrwm dhbʔ wzqzqtʔ ʕbd ddhbʔ dwktʔ lmwklʔ wqrwm lmwklʔ dhbʔ
26:30	wʔqymyhy lmšknʔ bzdqh ʔyk dḥwytk bṭwrʔ
26:31	wʕbd prsʔ dtkltʔ wʔrgwnʔ wṣwbʕʔ dzḥwrytʔ wbwṣʔ ʕzylʔ ʕbdʔ dʔwmnʔ ʕbdyhy krwbʔ
26:32	wsymyhy ʕl ʔrbʕʔ ʕmwdʔ dʔškrʕʔ dqrymyn dhbʔ wqwbʕyhwn ddhbʔ/dhbʔ#3#/ ʕl ʔrbʕʔ smkʔ dsʔmʔ/dkspʔ#3#/
26:33	whb prsʔ tḥyt dpʔ wʔʕl ltmn lgw mn prsʔ qbwtʔ dshdwtʔ wtprws lkwn prsʔ byt qwdšʔ wbyt qdwš qwdšʔ
26:34	wtsym ḥwsyʔ ʕl qbwtʔ dshdwtʔ bqdwš qwdšʔ
26:35	wtsym ptwrʔ lbr mn prsʔ wmnrtʔ lwqbl ptwrʔ ʕl sṭrʔ dmšknʔ mn tymnʔ wptwrʔ tsym ʕl sṭrʔ dgrbyʔ
26:36	wʕbd prsʔ ltrʕʔ dmšknʔ tkltʔ wʔrgwnʔ wṣwbʕʔ dzḥwrytʔ wbwṣʔ ʕzylʔ ʕbdʔ dṣwrtʔ
26:37	wʕbd lprsʔ ḥmšʔ ʕmwdʔ dʔškrʕʔ wqrwm ʔnwn dhbʔ wqwbʕyhwn ddhbʔ/dhbʔ#3#/ wʕbd lhwn ḥmšʔ smkʔ dnḥšʔ
27:01	wʕbd mdbḥʔ dqysʔ dʔškrʕʔ ḥmš ʔmyn ʔwrkh wḥmš ʔmyn ptyh mrbʕ nhwʔ mdbḥʔ wtlt ʔmyn rwmh
27:02	wʕbd qrnth ʕl ʔrbʕ zwyth mnh nhwyn qrnth wqrwmyhy nḥšʔ
27:03	wʕbd qdswhy ltšmšth wʔyrwhy wqrdlwhy wmšlwth wpyrmwhy wklhwn mʔnwhy tʕbd dnḥšʔ
27:04	wʕbd qrql ʔyk ʕbdʔ dmṣydtʔ dnḥšʔ wʕbd ʕl qrql ʔrbʕ zqzqn dnḥšʔ ʕl ʔrbʕʔ sṭrwhy
27:05	hbyhy tḥyt/ʕl#3#/ špwlwhy dmdbḥʔ mn ltḥt wthwʔ qrql ʕdmʔ lplgh dmdbḥʔ
27:06	wʕbd qwpʔ lmdbḥʔ qwpʔ dqysʔ dʔškrʕʔ wqrwm ʔnwn nḥšʔ
27:07	wʔʕl qwpʔ bzqzqtʔ wnhwwn <qwpʔ#3#> ʕl tryn sṭrwhy dmdbḥʔ mʔ dšqlyn lh
27:08	ḥlylʔ ddpʔ tʕbdywhy ʔyk dḥwytk bṭwrʔ hknʔ nʕbdwn
27:09	wʕbd drtʔ lmšknʔ/dmšknʔ#3#/ lsṭr rwḥʔ dtymnʔ sdrʔ ddrtʔ dbwṣʔ ʕzylʔ mʔʔ ʔmyn ʔwrkh dsdrʔ ḥd
27:10	wʕmwdwhy ʕsryn wsmkyhwn ʕsryn dnḥšʔ wqwbʕyhwn dʕmwdʔ wqrmhwn dsʔmʔ/dkspʔ#3#/
27:11	whknʔ lsṭrʔ dgrbyʔ bʔwrkʔ sdrʔ mʔʔ ʔmyn wʕmwdwhy ʕsryn wsmkyhwn ʕsryn dnḥšʔ wqwbʕyhwn dʕmwdʔ wqrmhwn dsʔmʔ/dkspʔ#3#/
27:12	wptyh ddrtʔ lsṭrʔ dmʕrbʔ sdrʔ ḥmšyn ʔmyn ʕmwdyhwn ʕsrʔ wsmkyhwn ʕsrʔ
27:13	wptyh ddrtʔ \lsṭrʔ drwḥʔ dmdnḥʔ /lsṭr rwḥ mdnḥʔ#3#/ lsṭr rwḥʔ dmdnḥʔ#3#/ ḥmšyn ʔmyn
27:14	wḥmšʕsrʔ ʔmyn sdrʔ/lsdrʔ#3#/ dsṭrʔ/bsṭrʔ#3#/ ʕmwdyhwn tltʔ wsmkyhwn tltʔ
27:15	wlsṭrʔ tnynʔ ḥmštʕsr sdryn ʕmwdyhwn tltʔ wsmkyhwn tltʔ
27:16	wltrʕʔ ddrtʔ prsʔ ʕsryn ʔmyn tkltʔ wʔrgwnʔ wṣwbʕʔ dzḥwrytʔ wbwṣʔ ʕzylʔ ʕbdʔ dṣwrtʔ ʕmwdyhwn ʔrbʕʔ wsmkyhwn ʔrbʕʔ
27:17	klhwn ʕmwdʔ ddrtʔ kd ḥdrʔ qrymyn sʔmʔ/kspʔ#3#/ wqwbʕyhwn dsʔmʔ/dkspʔ#3#/ wsmkyhwn dnḥšʔ
27:18	wʔwrkh ddrtʔ mʔʔ ʔmyn wptyh ḥmšyn bḥmšyn wrwmh ḥmš ʔmyn dbwṣʔ ʕzylʔ wsmkyhwn dnḥšʔ
27:19	klhwn mʔnʔ dmšknʔ wklh pwlḥnh wklhyn skwhy wklhyn skʔ ddrtʔ dnḥšʔ
27:20	wʔnt pqd lbny ʔysryl wnsbwn/wnytwn#3#/ lk mšḥʔ dkyʔ dzytʔ ʕṣyrʔ lmnhrw šrgʔ ʔmynʔyt
27:21	bmškn zbnʔ lbr mn prsʔ dʕl shdwtʔ wnsdwr/wnsdr#3#/ ʔnwn ʔhrwn wbnwhy mn rmšʔ wʕdmʔ lṣprʔ qdm mryʔ nmwsʔ lʕlm ldrykwn mn lwt bny ʔysrʔyl
28:01	wʔnt qrb lk lʔhrwn ʔḥwk wlbnwhy ʕmh mn gw bny ʔysryl lmkhnw ly ʔhrwn wndb wʔbyhw wʔlyʕzr wʔytmr bny ʔhrwn
28:02	wʕbd lbwšy qwdšʔ lʔhrwn ʔḥwk lʔyqrʔ wltšbwḥtʔ
28:03	wʔnt ʔmr lklhwn ḥkymy lbʔ dmlyt ʔnwn rwḥʔ dḥkmtʔ wnʕbdwn lbwšy qwdšʔ lʔhrwn lmqdšwth lmkhnw ly
28:04	whlyn lbwšʔ dnʕbdwn lhwn przwmʔ wpdtʔ wprysʔ wkwtynʔ dbwṣʔ wmṣnptʔ whmynʔ wnʕbdwn lbwšy qwdšʔ lʔhrwn ʔḥwk wlbnwhy lmkhnw ly
28:05	whnwn nsbwn dhbʔ wtkltʔ wʔrgwnʔ wṣwbʕʔ dzḥwrytʔ wbwṣʔ <ʕzylʔ#3#>
28:06	wnʕbdwn pdtʔ ddhbʔ tkltʔ wʔrgwnʔ wṣwbʕʔ dzḥwrytʔ wbwṣʔ ʕzylʔ ʕbdʔ dʔwmnʔ
28:07	trtyn ktpn mdbqn nhwyn lh ʕl tryn sṭryh wndbq
28:08	hmynʔ dpdtʔ dʕlyh mnh nhwʔ ʔyk ʕbdh dhbʔ wtkltʔ wʔrgwnʔ wṣwbʕʔ dzḥwrytʔ wbwṣʔ ʕzylʔ
28:09	wsb trtyn kʔpʔ dbrwlʔ wglwp ʕlyhyn šmhʔ dbny ʔysrʔyl
28:10	štʔ mn šmhyhwn glwp ʕl kʔpʔ ḥdʔ wštʔ šmhʔ dʔštḥrw glwp ʕl kʔpʔ ʔḥrtʔ ʔyk twldthwn
28:11	ʕbdʔ dʔwmnʔ kʔpʔ glyptʔ glpʔ dḥtmʔ glwp trtyn/lk#2#/ kʔpʔ ʕl šmhʔ dbny ʔysryl mwḥdn wmšrn bdhbʔ ʕbd ʔnyn
28:12	wsym trtyn kʔpʔ ʕl ktpth dpdtʔ kʔpʔ ddwkrnʔ lbny ʔysryl wnhwʔ šql ʔhrwn šmhyhwn qdm mryʔ ʕl trtyn ktpth ldwkrnʔ
28:13	wʕbd mwḥdtʔ ddhbʔ
28:14	wtrtyn ššltʔ ddhbʔ dkyʔ mtʔmtʔ ʕbd ʔnyn ʕbdʔ gdylʔ wsym trtyn ššltʔ \mtʔmtʔ ʕl mwḥdtʔ /mwḥdtʔ ʕl mtʔmtʔ#3#/
28:15	wʕbd prysʔ ddynʔ ʕbdʔ dʔwmnʔ ʔyk ʕbdʔ dpdtʔ ʕbdyhy dhbʔ wtkltʔ wʔrgwnʔ wṣwbʕʔ dzḥwrytʔ wbwṣʔ ʕzylʔ ʕbdyhy
28:16	mrbʕ nhwʔ kd ʔʕyp zrt ʔwrkh wzrt ptyh
28:17	wtšlm bh šlmwtʔ dkʔpʔ ʔrbʕʔ sdryn dkʔpʔ sdrʔ qdmyʔ swmqʔ wzrgʔ wbrqʔ sdrʔ ḥd
28:18	wsdrʔ ʔḥrnʔ ṣdydʔ wspylʔ wnqʕtʔ
28:19	wsdrʔ tlytyʔ qnkynwn wqrkdnʔ wʕyn ʕglʔ
28:20	wsdrʔ ʔrbyʕyʔ tršyš wbrwlʔ wyšph mwḥdn wmšrn bdhbʔ <ʕbd ʔnyn#3#> nhwyn bšlmwthyn
28:21	wkʔpʔ nhwyn/ʕbd ʔnyn#3#/ ʕl šmhʔ dbny ʔysryl trtʕsrʔ ʕl šmhyhwn glypn glpʔ dḥtmʔ gbr ʕl šmh nhwyn ltrʕsr šbṭyn

28:26	wʕbd tryn qwrqsʔ ddhbʔ wsym ʔnwn ʕl tryn sṭrwhy dḥwsyʔ ʕl sṭrʔ dʕl spth dpdtʔ mn lgw
28:27	wʕbd tryn qwrqsʔ ddhbʔ wsym ʔnwn ʕl trtyn ktpth dpdtʔ mn ltḥt mn lwqbl ʔpyh lwqbl dbqh lʕl mn hmynʔ dpdtʔ
28:28	wndbqwnh lprysʔ mn zqzqth lzqzqth dpdtʔ/dprysʔ#3#/ bḥwṭʔ dtkltʔ lmhwʔ ʕl hmynʔ dpdtʔ dlʔ nhwʔ ʕbr prysʔ mn pdtʔ
28:29	wnhwʔ šql ʔhrwn šmhʔ dbny ʔysryl bprysʔ ddynʔ ʕl ḥdyh mʔ dʕʔl lqwdšʔ dwkrnʔ qdm mryʔ ʔmynʔyt
28:30	wsym ʕl prysʔ ddynʔ nhyrʔ wšlmʔ wnhwwn ʕl ḥdyh mʔ dʕʔl qdm mryʔ wnšqwl ʔhrwn dynʔ dbny ʔysryl ʕl ḥdyh qdm mryʔ ʔmynʔyt
28:31	wʕbd przwmʔ/prysʔ#3#/ dpdtʔ gmyrʔ dtkltʔ
28:32	wnhwʔ pwmh dršh bgwh sptʔ thwʔ lpwmh kd ḥdr ʕbdʔ zqyrʔ ʔyk pwm syrs nhwʔ lh dlʔ nṣṭrʔ
28:33	wʕbd ʕl špwlwhy rwmnʔ dtkltʔ wʔrgwnʔ wṣwbʕʔ dzḥwrytʔ ʕl špwlwhy kd ḥdr wzgʔ ddhbʔ bynthwn kd ḥdr
28:34	wzgʔ zgʔ ddhbʔ wrwmnʔ ʕl špwlwhy dprzwmʔ/dprysʔ#3#/ kd ḥdr
28:35	wnhwʔ ʕl ʔhrwn ltšmštʔ wnštmʕ qlh mʔ dʕʔl lqwdšʔ qdm mryʔ wmʔ dnpq dlʔ nmwt
28:36	wʕbd klylʔ ddhbʔ dkyʔ wglwp ʕlwhy glpʔ dḥtmʔ qwdšʔ/dqwdšʔ#3#/ lmryʔ

28:41	wʔlbš ʔnwn lʔhrwn ʔḥwk wlbnwhy ʕmh wmšwḥ ʔnwn wšmlʔ ʔydyhwn wqdš ʔnwn wnkhnwn ly
28:42	wʕbd lhwn przwmʔ dbwṣʔ lmksyw bsrʔ dʕrṭlywthwn mn ḥṣyhwn wʕdmʔ lʕṭmthwn nhwwn
28:43	wnhwwn ʕl ʔhrwn wʕl bnwhy mʔ dʕʔlyn lmškn zbnʔ wmʔ/ʔw mʔ#3#/ dqrbyn lmdbḥʔ lmšmšw bqwdšʔ dlʔ nqblwn ḥṭhʔ wnmwtwn nmwsʔ lʕlm lh wlzrʕh mn btrh
29:01	whknʔ ʕbd lhwn wqdš ʔnwn ly lkhnwtʔ wsb twrʔ ḥd br bqrʔ wdkrʔ tryn \dlʔ mwm /dlyt bhwn mwmʔ#3#/
29:02	wlḥmʔ pṭyrʔ ḥḥrtʔ pṭyrtʔ dpyln bmšḥʔ wlgnʔ pṭyrʔ dpylyn/dmšyḥyn#3#/ bmšḥʔ dnšypʔ dḥṭʔ tʕbd ʔnwn
29:03	wtsym ʔnwn bslʔ ḥd wtqrb ʔnwn bslʔ wltwrʔ wltryn dkryn
29:04	wlʔhrwn wlbnwhy qrb ltrʕʔ dmšknzbnʔ wʔsḥʔ ʔnwn bmyʔ
29:05	wsb lbwšʔ wʔlbš lʔhrwn kwtynʔ wprzwmʔ wmṣnptʔ/dpdtʔ#3#/ wpdtʔ wprysʔ wtqnyhy bhmynʔ dpdtʔ
29:06	wsym mṣnptʔ bršh wsym klylʔ dqwdšʔ ʕl mṣnptʔ

29:08	wqrb lbnwhy wʔlbš ʔnwn kwtynytʔ
29:09	wʔswr ʔnwn hmynʔ lʔhrwn wlbnwhy wsym lhwn klwʔ wthwʔ lhwn khnwthwn lqymʔ dlʕlm wtšmlʔ ʔydh dʔhrwn wʔydʔ dbnwhy
29:10	wqrb twrʔ qdm mšknzbnʔ wnsmkwn ʔhrwn wbnwhy ʔydyhwn ʕl ršh dtwrʔ
29:11	wkwsyhy ltwrʔ qdm mryʔ btrʕʔ dmšknzbnʔ
29:12	wsb mn dmh dtwrʔ wrws/wʔrzp#3#/ ʕl qrnth dmdbḥʔ bṣbʕk wklh dmʔ ʔšwd ʕl špwly mdbḥʔ
29:13	wsb klh ḥlbʔ dqrym lgwyʔ wḥṣr kbdʔ wtrtyn kwlyn wtrbhyn wʔsq lmdbḥʔ
29:14	wbsrh dtwrʔ wmškh wprth twqd bnwrʔ lbr mn mšrytʔ ḥṭhʔ hw
29:15	wdkrʔ ḥd tsb wnsmkwn ʔhrwn wbnwhy ʔydyhwn ʕl ršh ddkrʔ
29:16	wkwsyhy ldkrʔ wsb mn dmh wrws/wʔrzp#3#/ ʕl mdbḥʔ kd ḥdr
29:17	wdkrʔ pšḥ hdmwhy wʔšyg gwyh wkrʕwhy wttl ʕl hdmwhy wʕl ršh
29:18	wtsq klh dkrʔ lmdbḥʔ/ʕl mdbḥʔ#3#/ ʕltʔ hw lmryʔ lryḥ nyḥʔ qwrbnʔ lmryʔ
29:19	wtsb dkrʔ tnynʔ wnsmwk ʔhrwn wbnwhy ʔydyhwn ʕl ršh ddkrʔ
29:20	wkwsyhy ldkrʔ wsb/whb#3#/ mn dmh wrws/wʔrzp#3#/ ʕl ṭrpʔ dʔdnh dʔhrwn dymynʔ wʕl ṭrpʔ dʔdnʔ dbnwhy dymynʔ wʕl krwtʔ dʔydyhwn dymynʔ wʕl krwtʔ drglyhwn dymynʔ wtrws/wʔrzp#3#/ dmʔ ʕl mdbḥʔ kd ḥdr
29:21	wtsb mn dmʔ dʕl mdbḥʔ wmn mšḥʔ dmšyḥwtʔ wtrws ʕl ʔhrwn wʕl lbwšwhy wʕl bnwhy wʕl lbwšʔ dbnwhy ʕmh wntqdš hw wlbwšwhy wbnwhy wlbwšʔ dbnwhy ʕmh
29:22	wsb mn dkrʔ trbʔ/ḥlbʔ#3#/ wʔlytʔ wḥlbʔ dqrym lgwyʔ wḥṣr kbdʔ wtrtyn kwlyn wtrbʔ dʕlyhyn wšqʔ dymynʔ mṭl ddkrʔ hw dšwmlyʔ
29:23	wgryṣtʔ ḥdʔ dlḥmʔ wgryṣtʔ ḥdʔ dlḥmʔ dmšḥʔ wlgnʔ ḥd mn slʔ dpṭyrʔ dqdm mryʔ
29:24	wtsym klhwn <hlyn#3#> ʕl ʔydʔ dʔhrwn wʕl ʔydʔ dbnwhy wtprwš ʔnwn pwršnʔ qdm mryʔ
29:25	wtsb mn ʔydyhwn wtsq ḥdyʔ mn dkrʔ lmdbḥʔ/ʕl mdbḥʔ#3#/ lʕltʔ lryḥ nyḥʔ qdm mryʔ qwrbnʔ hw lmryʔ
29:26	wtsb ḥdyʔ mn dkrʔ dšwmlyʔ dʔhrwn wtpršywhy pwršnʔ qdm mryʔ wthwʔ lk mntʔ/lmntʔ#3#/
29:27	wqdš ḥdyʔ dpwršnʔ wšqʔ dpwršnʔ dʔtprš wʔttrym mn dkrʔ dšwmlyʔ mn dʔhrwn wmn dbnwhy
29:28	wnhwʔ lʔhrwn wlbnwhy qymʔ lʕlm mn lwt bny ʔysryl mṭl dpwršnʔ hw wpwršnʔ nhwʔ mn <lwt#3#> bny ʔysryl mn \dbḥy šlmyhwn /dbḥyhwn šlmʔ#3#/ dbḥy šlmwthwn#3#/ pwršnʔ lmryʔ
29:29	wlbwšy qwdšʔ dʔhrwn nhwwn lbnwhy mn btrh lmmšḥ bhwn wlmšmlyw bhwn ʔydyhwn
29:30	šbʕʔ ywmyn nlbš ʔnwn khnʔ btrh mn bnwhy dnʕwl lmšknzbnʔ lmšmšw bqwdšʔ
29:31	wdkrʔ dšwmlyʔ tsb wtbšl bsrh bʔtrʔ qdyšʔ
29:32	wnʔkwl ʔhrwn wbnwhy bsrʔ ddkrʔ wlḥmʔ dbslʔ btrʕʔ dmšknzbnʔ
29:33	wnʔklwn ʔnwn dmtḥsyn bhwn lmšmlyw ʔydyhwn wlmqdšw ʔnwn wnwkryʔ lʔ nʔkwl mṭl dqwdšʔ ʔnwn
29:34	wʔn nštḥr/nštwḥr#3#/ mn bsrʔ dšwmlyʔ wmn lḥmʔ ʕdmʔ lṣprʔ ʔwqdw mdm dmštḥr bnwrʔ wlʔ ntʔkl mṭl dqwdšʔ ʔnwn
29:35	wʕbd lʔhrwn wlbnwhy hknʔ ʔyknʔ dpqdtk šbʕʔ ywmyn tšmlʔ ʔydyhwn
29:36	wtwrʔ dḥṭhʔ tʕbd bywmʔ ʕl ḥwsyʔ wtrws ʕl mdbḥʔ mʔ dmḥsʔ ʔnt ʕlwhy wtmšḥywhy lmqdšwth
29:37	šbʕʔ ywmyn tḥsʔ ʕl mdbḥʔ wtqdšywhy wnhwʔ mdbḥʔ qdwš qwdšyn wkl dnqrwb lmdbḥʔ ntqdš
29:38	whknʔ tʕbd ʕl mdbḥʔ ʔmrʔ bny šntʔ tryn ʔmynʔyt bywmʔ
29:39	ʔmrʔ ḥd ʕbd bṣprʔ wʔmrʔ ʔḥrnʔ tʕbd ʕdn rmšʔ
29:40	wʕsrwnʔ dnšypʔ dpyl bmšḥʔ ʕṣyrʔ rwbʕh dhmynʔ wnwqyʔ rwbʕh dhmynʔ dḥmrʔ/ḥmrʔ#3#/ lʔmrʔ ḥd
29:41	wʔmrʔ tnynʔ tʕbd ʕdn rmšʔ ʔyk qwrbnʔ dṣprʔ wʔyk nwqyh tʕbd lh lryḥ nyḥʔ qwrbnʔ lmryʔ
29:42	ʕltʔ ʔmynʔyt ldrykwn btrʕʔ dmšknzbnʔ qdm mryʔ dʔtwʕd lkwn tmn lmmllw ʕmkwn <tmn#3#>
29:43	wʔtwʕd tmn lbny ʔysryl wʔtqdš bʔyqry
29:44	wʔqdš mšknzbnʔ wmdbḥʔ wlʔhrwn wlbnwhy ʔqdš ly lkhnwtʔ
29:45	wʔšrʔ bgw bny ʔysryl whwʔ lhwn ʔlhʔ
29:46	wndʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhhwn dʔpqt ʔnwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wʔšrʔ bynthwn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhhwn
30:01	wʕbd mdbḥʔ dmʕṭr ʕṭrʔ dqysʔ dʔškrʕʔ tʕbdywhy
30:02	ʔmʔ ʔwrkh wʔmʔ ptyh mrbʕ nhwʔ wtrtyn ʔmyn rwmh mnh nhwyn qrnth
30:03	wqrwmyhy dhbʔ dkyʔ ʔgrh wʔswhy kd ḥdr wqrnth wʕbd lh klylʔ ddhbʔ kd ḥdr
30:04	wtrtyn zqzqtʔ ddhbʔ tʕbd lh ltḥt/tḥt#3#/ mn klylh ʕl trtyn zwyth tʕbd <lh#3#> ʕl tryn sṭrwhy wnhwyn dwktʔ lqwpʔ lmšqlh bhwn
30:05	wʕbd qwpʔ dqysʔ dʔškrʕʔ wqrwm ʔnwn dhbʔ
30:06	wsymyhy qdm prsʔ dʕl qbwtʔ dshdwtʔ qdm ḥwsyʔ dʕl shdwtʔ wʔtwʕd lk tmn
30:07	wnhwʔ mʕṭr ʕlwhy ʔhrwn ʕṭrʔ dbsmʔ mn ṣpr lṣpr mʔ dmṭyb šrgʔ nʕṭrywhy
30:08	wmʔ dmdlq ʔhrwn šrgʔ byt šmšʔ/rmšʔ#3#/ nʕṭrywhy ʕṭrʔ ʔmynʔyt qdm mryʔ ldrykwn
30:09	lʔ tsqwn ʕlwhy ʕṭrʔ nwkryʔ wʕltʔ wqwrbnʔ wnwqyʔ lʔ tnqwn ʕlwhy
30:10	wnḥsʔ ʔhrwn ʕl qrnth dmdbḥʔ ḥdʔ bšntʔ mn dmʔ dḥṭhʔ dḥwsyʔ ḥdʔ bšntʔ nḥsʔ ʕlwhy ldrykwn qdwš qwdšyn hw lmryʔ
30:11	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
30:12	kd tqbl ḥwšbnʔ dbny ʔysrʔyl lmnynhwn ntlwn gbr pwrqn npšh lmryʔ mʔ dmnyt ʔnwn dlʔ nhwʔ bhwn mwtʔ/mwtnʔ#3#/ mʔ dmnyt ʔnwn
30:13	hknʔ ntlwn/tʕbd#3#/ kl dʕbr bmnynʔ plgwt mtqlʔ bmtqly qwdšʔ ʕsryn zwzyn mtqlʔ plgwt mtqlʔ pwršnʔ lmryʔ
30:14	kl dʕbr bmnynʔ mn br ʕsryn šnyn wlʕl ntl pwršnʔ lmryʔ
30:15	dʕtyr lʔ nsgʔ wdmskyn lʔ nzʕr mn plgwt mtqlʔ lmtl pwršnʔ lmryʔ lmḥsyw ʕl npštkwn
30:16	wtsb kspʔ dḥwsyʔ mn bny ʔysrʔyl wttl/whbyhy#3#/ lpwlḥnʔ dmškn zbnʔ wnhwʔ lbny ʔysryl dwkrnʔ/ldwkrnʔ#3#/ qdm mryʔ lmḥsyw ʕl npšthwn
30:17	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
30:18	ʕbd <lk#3#> lqnʔ dnḥšʔ wknh dnḥšʔ lšygtʔ wsymyh byt/qdm#3#/ mšknzbnʔ wbyt mdbḥʔ whb tmn myʔ
30:19	wnšygwn ʔhrwn wbnwhy mnh ʔydyhwn wrglyhwn
30:20	mʔ dʕʔlyn lmšknzbnʔ nšygwn bmyʔ/ʔydyhwn#3#/ wlʔ nmwtwn wmʔ dqrbyn lmdbḥʔ lmšmšw wlmʕṭrw qwrbnʔ lmryʔ
30:21	nšygwn ʔydyhwn wrglyhwn dlʔ nmwtwn wthwʔ lhwn lqymʔ/qymʔ#3#/ dlʕlm lh wlzrʕh ldryhwn
30:22	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
30:23	ʔnt sb lk bsmʔ ryšyʔ/ršʔ#3#/ mwrʔ dkyʔ ḥmšmʔʔ wqwnmwn bsmʔ plgwth mʔtyn wḥmšyn wqnyʔ dbsmʔ mʔtyn wḥmšyn
30:24	wqsyʔ ḥmšmʔʔ bmtqly qwdšʔ wmšḥʔ dzytʔ hmynʔ
30:25	wʕbdyhy mšḥʔ mšyḥwt qwdšʔ bsmʔ mbsmʔ ʕbd mbsm mšḥʔ dmšyḥwtʔ wqwdšʔ/dqwdšʔ#3#/wbqwdšʔ#3#/ nhwʔ
30:26	wtmšwḥ bh mškn zbnʔ wqbwtʔ dshdwtʔ
30:27	wptwrʔ wklhwn mʔnwhy wlmnrtʔ wlmʔnyh wlmdbḥʔ dʕṭrʔ

30:31	wʕm dbyt/bny#3#/ ʔysryl mll wʔmr mšḥʔ dmšyḥwtʔ lqwdšʔ/dqwdšʔ#3#/ nhwʔ ly hnʔ ldrykwn
30:32	ʕl bsrʔ dʔnšʔ lʔ ntšyp wbdmwth lʔ tʕbdwn <lkwn#3#> mṭl dqwdšʔ hw wqwdšʔ nhwʔ lkwn
30:33	wgbrʔ dnbsm ʔkwth wdntl mnh lnwkryʔ nʔbd mn ʕmh
30:34	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ sb lk bsmʔ nṭptʔ wṭprʔ wḥlbnytʔ bsmʔ wlbwntʔ dkytʔ mtql mtql nhwʔ
30:35	wʕbdyhy ʕṭrʔ dbsmʔ ʕbdʔ mbsmʔ pylʔ ddkyn lqwdšʔ
30:36	wšḥwq mnh wʔdq/wdwq#3#/ whb mnh qdm shdwtʔ \dmškn zbnʔ /bmšknzbnʔ#3#/ dbmškn zbnʔ#3#/ dʔtwʕd lk tmn/ltmn#3#/ qdwš qwdšyn nhwʔ lkwn
30:37	wʕṭrʔ dtʕbdwn bdmwth lʔ tʕbdwn lkwn qwdšʔ nhwʔ lk lmryʔ
30:38	wgbrʔ dnʕbd ʔkwth lmrḥw bh nʔbd mn ʕmh
31:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
31:02	ḥzy dqryt bšm lbṣlyʔyl br ʔwry br ḥwr mn šbṭʔ dyhwdʔ/dbny yhwdʔ#3#/
31:03	wmlyth rwḥʔ dʔlhʔ bḥkmtʔ wbbwynʔ wbʔydʕtʔ wbkl ʕbd
31:04	lmlpw ʔwmnwtʔ/bʔwmnwtʔ#3#/ lmʕbd bdhbʔ wbsʔmʔ/wbkspʔ#3#/ wbnḥšʔ
31:05	wbʔwmnwtʔ dkʔpʔ lmšlmw wbngrwtʔ dqysʔ lmʕbd kl ʕbd
31:06	wʔnʔ hʔ yhbt ʕmh lʔlyhb br ʔḥysmk mn šbṭʔ ddn wblbʔ dkl ḥkymy lbʔ yhbt ḥkmtʔ wnʕbdwn klmdm/kl mʔ#3#/ dpqdtk
31:07	mšknzbnʔ/bmšknzbnʔ#3#/ wqbwtʔ/wbqbwtʔ#3#/ dshdwtʔ wḥwsyʔ dʕlyh wkl mʔny mšknʔ
31:08	wptwrʔ wkl mʔnwhy wmnrtʔ dkytʔ wklhwn mʔnyh wmdbḥʔ dʕṭrʔ

31:11	wmšḥʔ dmšyḥwtʔ wʕṭrʔ dbsmʔ lqwdšʔ klmdm/kl mʔ#3#/ dpqdtk <hknʔ#3#> nʕbdwn
31:12	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ
31:13	ʔnt ʔmr lbny ʔysryl šbʔ hwytwn nṭryn mṭl dʔtʔ hy byny wlkwn ldrykwn dtdʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ <ʔlhkwn#3#> dmqdš ʔnʔ lkwn
31:14	ṭrw šbtʔ mṭl dqwdšʔ/dqdyšʔ#3#/ hy lkwn kl mn dnḥlyh mtqṭlw ntqṭl wkl mn dnʕbd bh ʕbdʔ nʔbd ʔnšʔ hw mn ʕmh
31:15	štʔ ywmyn tʕbdwn ʕbdʔ wbywmʔ šbyʕyʔ šbtʔ <hy#3#> nyḥʔ qwdšʔ hy lmryʔ kl mn dnʕbd ʕbdʔ bywmʔ dšbtʔ mtqṭlw ntqṭl
31:16	wnṭrwn bny ʔysryl šbtʔ lmryʔ lmʕbd šbtʔ ldryhwn qymʔ lʕlm/dlʕlm#3#/
31:17	byny ldbyt ʔysryl ʔtʔ hy lʕlm mṭwl dlštʔ ywmyn ʕbd mryʔ šmyʔ wʔrʕʔ wymmʔ wkl dʔyt bhwn wbywmʔ šbyʕyʔ šly wʔttnyḥ
31:18	wyhb lmwšʔ kd šlm/gmr#3#/ lmmllw ʕmh bṭwrʔ dsyny trtyn lwḥʔ dshdwtʔ lwḥʔ dkʔpʔ dktybn bṣbʕh dʔlhʔ
32:01	wḥzw ʕmʔ dʔwḥr mwšʔ dnḥwt mn ṭwrʔ wʔtknšw ʕmʔ ʕl ʔhrwn wʔmryn lh qwm ʕbd ln ʔlhʔ dnʔzlwn qdmyn mṭl dhnʔ gbrʔ mwšʔ dʔsqn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn lʔ ydʕynn mnʔ hwyhy
32:02	ʔmr lhwn ʔhrwn prqw qdšʔ ddhbʔ dʔyt bʔdnʔ dnyšykwn wdbnykwn wdbntkwn wʔytw ly
32:03	wprqw kwlh ʕmʔ qdšʔ <ddhbʔ#3#> dʔyt bʔdnyhwn wʔytyw lʔhrwn
32:04	wnsbh mnhwn wṣrh bṭwpsʔ wʕbdh ʕglʔ dnsktʔ wʔmrw hnw ʔlhk ʔysryl dʔsqk mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
32:05	wdḥl ʔhrwn wbnʔ mdbḥʔ qdmwhy wqrʔ ʔhrwn wʔmr ḥgʔ hw lmryʔ mḥr/lmḥr#3#/
32:06	wqdmw lywmʔ dbtrh wʔsqw ʕlwtʔ wdbḥw šlmʔ wqrbw qwrbnʔ wytbw ʕmʔ lmʔkl/lmlʕs#3#/ wlmštʔ wqmw lmgḥk wlmštʕyw
32:07	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ ḥwt zl lk mkʔ mṭl dḥbl ʕmk dʔpqt mn mṣryn
32:08	sṭw bʕgl mn ʔwrḥʔ dpqdt ʔnwn wʕbdw lhwn ʕglʔ dnsktʔ wsgdw lh wdbḥw lh wʔmrw hnw ʔlhk ʔysryl dʔsqk mn \ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn /mṣryn#3#/
32:09	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ ḥzyth lʕmʔ hnʔ whʔ ʕmʔ qšʔ qdlʔ hw
32:10	hšʔ šbwqyny wntqp rwgzy bhwn wʔḥrwb ʔnwn wʔʕbdk lʕmʔ rbʔ
32:11	wṣly mwšʔ qdm mryʔ ʔlhh wʔmr lʔ mryʔ lʔ ntqp rwgzk bʕmk dʔpqt mn mṣryn bḥylk rbʔ wbdrʕk rmʔ
32:12	wlʔ nʔmrwn mṣryʔ dlbyšthwn ʔpq ʔnwn dnqṭl ʔnwn byny ṭwrʔ wdnḥrwb ʔnwn mn ʔpy ʔrʕʔ ʔttnyḥ mn ḥmtʔ drwgzk wʔtrʕʔ ʕl byšth dʕmk
32:13	ʔtdkr lʔbrhm wlʔysḥq wlʔysryl/wlyʕqwb#3#/ ʕbdyk dymyt lhwn bk wʔmrt lhwn dʔsgʔ/ʔsgʔ#3#/ zrʕkwn ʔyk \kwkbʔ dbšmyʔ /kwkby šmyʔ#3#/ wklh ʔrʕʔ dʔmrt ʔtl lzrʕkwn wnʔrtwnh lʕlm
32:14	wʔtrʕy mryʔ ʕl byštʔ dʔmr lmʕbd lʕmh
32:15	wʔtpny mwšʔ wnḥt mn ṭwrʔ wtrtyn lwḥʔ dshdwtʔ bʔydh lwḥʔ dktybn mn tryhwn sṭryhyn mkʔ wmkʔ ktybn
32:16	wlwḥʔ ʕbdh ʔnyn dʔlhʔ wktbʔ ktbh hw dʔlhʔ ršym hwʔ ʕl lwḥʔ
32:17	wšmʕ yšwʕ qlh dʕmʔ kd mtktš wʔmr lmwšʔ qlʔ dqrbʔ bmšrytʔ
32:18	ʔmr lh mwšʔ lʔ qlʔ dmmllʔ dgnbrʔ ʔp lʔ qlʔ dḥlšʔ qlʔ dyn dḥṭytʔ šmʕ ʔnʔ/ʔnt#3#/
32:19	wkd qrb lmšrytʔ ḥzyhy lʕglʔ wlṣṣlʔ wʔtpyr mwšʔ wšdʔ mn ʔydh lwḥʔ/llwḥʔ#3#/ wtbr ʔnyn bšpwlwhy dṭwrʔ
32:20	wnsbh lʕglʔ dʕbdw wʔwqdh bnwrʔ wšph bšwpynʔ ʕdmʔ dʔtdqq ʔyk ʕprʔ wbzqh dqth \ʕl ʔpy /lpy#3#/ myʔ wʔšqy ldbyt ʔysryl
32:21	wʔmr mwšʔ lʔhrwn mnʔ ʕbd lk ʕmʔ hnʔ dʔytyt ʕlwhy ḥṭytʔ <hdʔ#3#> rbtʔ
32:22	wʔmr ʔhrwn lʔ ntḥmt rwgzh dmry ʔnt ydʕ ʔnt lh lʕmʔ hnʔ dbyš hw
32:23	wʔmrw ly ʕbd ln ʔlhʔ dnʔzlwn qdmyn mṭl dhnʔ mwšʔ dʔsqn mn \ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn /mṣryn#3#/ lʔ ydʕynn mnʔ hwyhy
32:24	wʔmrt lhwn mn dʔyt lh dhbʔ ʔytw ly wʔytyw ly wʔrmyth bnwrʔ whwʔ ʕglʔ hnʔ
32:25	wḥzʔ mwšʔ lʕmʔ dḥṭw lhwn dʔḥṭy ʔnwn ʔhrwn dnhwwn šmʔ sryʔ bʔḥrythwn
32:26	wqm lh mwšʔ btrʕʔ dmšknʔ/dmšrytʔ#3#/ wʔmr mnw mn mryʔ nʔtʔ lwty wʔtknšw lwth klhwn bnwhy dlwy
32:27	wʔmr lhwn mwšʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʔrmw ʔnš syph bḥṣwhy wʕbrw wtwbw mn trʕ ltrʕ bmšrytʔ wqṭwlw ʔnš lʔḥwhy wʔnš lḥbrh wʔnš lqrybh
32:28	wʕbdw bny lwy ʔyk mlth dmwšʔ wnplw mn ʕmʔ <by#3#> \bywmʔ hw /bhw ywmʔ#3#/ ʔyk tltʔ ʔlpyn gbryn
32:29	ʔmr lhwn mwšʔ mlw ʔydykwn ywmnʔ lmryʔ ʔnš bbrh wbʔḥwhy mṭl dtʔtʔ ʕlykwn bwrktʔ ywmnʔ
32:30	whwʔ lywmʔ dbtrh wʔmr mwšʔ lʕmʔ ʔntwn ḥṭytwn ḥṭytʔ hdʔ rbtʔ hšʔ ʔsq lwt mryʔ ṭk nšbwq lḥwbykwn/lḥṭhykwn#3#/
32:31	whpk mwšʔ lwt mryʔ wʔmr bbʕw mryʔ ʔlhʔ šryrʔyt ḥṭʔ ʕmʔ hnʔ ḥṭytʔ rbtʔ wʕbdw lhwn ʔlhʔ ddhbʔ
32:32	hšʔ ʔn šbq ʔnt lḥṭhyhwn wʔn lʔ ʕṭyny mn sprk dktbt
32:33	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ mn dḥṭʔ ly ʔʕṭywhy mn spry
32:34	hšʔ zl ʔwblyhy lʕmʔ hnʔ lʔykʔ dʔmr ʔnʔ lk whʔ mlʔky nʔzl qdmyk wbywmʔ dpwqdny ʔpqwd ʕlyhwn ḥṭhyhwn
32:35	wmḥʔ mryʔ lʕmʔ ʕl dplḥw lʕglʔ dʕbd ʔhrwn
33:01	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ sq zl <lk#3#> mkʔ ʔnt wʕmk dʔpqt mn mṣryn/ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn#3#/ lʔrʕʔ dymyt lʔbrhm wlʔysḥq wlyʕqwb wʔmrt lhwn dlzrʕkwn ʔtlyh
33:02	wʔšdr qdmyk mlʔkʔ wnḥrwb lknʕnyʔ wlʔmwryʔ wlḥtyʔ wlprzyʔ wlḥwyʔ wlybwsyʔ
33:03	lʔrʕʔ dmrdyʔ ḥlbʔ wdbšʔ mṭl dlʔ slq ʔnʔ byntkwn mṭl dʕmʔ ʔntwn qšʔ qdlʔ dlmʔ ʔwbdkwn bʔwrḥʔ
33:04	wšmʕw ʕmʔ ptgmʔ hnʔ byšʔ wkryt lhwn wlʔ šqlw gbr zynh ʕlwhy
33:05	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ ʔmr lbny/ldbyt#3#/ ʔysryl ʔntwn ʕmʔ ʔntwn qšʔ qdlʔ šʕtʔ/dšʕtʔ#3#/ ḥdʔ ʔsq byntkwn wʔwbdkwn hšʔ ʔʕbrw zynkwn mnkwn wʔdʕ mnʔ ʔʕbd lkwn
33:06	wšqlw bny ʔysryl zynhwn mnhwn mn ṭwrʔ dḥwryb
33:07	wmwšʔ nsb mšknh wnqšh lh lbr mn mšrytʔ ʔrḥqh mn mšrytʔ wqryhy mšknzbnʔ wkl mn dšʔl hwʔ mn mryʔ npq lmšknzbnʔ dlbr mn mšrytʔ
33:08	wmʔ dnpq mwšʔ lmšknʔ qymyn klh ʕmʔ wmtṭybyn ʔnš btrʕ mšknh wḥyryn btrh dmwšʔ ʕdmʔ dʕʔl lmšknʔ
33:09	wmʔ dʕl mwšʔ lmšknʔ nḥt ʕmwdʔ dʕnnʔ wqʔm btrʕʔ dmšknʔ wmtmll ʕm mwšʔ

33:12	wʔmr mwšʔ lmryʔ ḥzy dʔnt ʔmrt ly ʔsqyhy/dʔsqyhy#3#/ lʕmʔ hnʔ wʔnt lʔ ḥwytny mn dmšdr/mšdr#3#/ ʔnt ʕmy wʔnt ʔmrt <ly#3#> ydʕtk bšmʔ wʔp ʔškḥt rḥmʔ bʕyny
33:13	hšʔ ʔn ʔškḥt rḥmʔ bʕynyk ḥwny ʔwrḥk wʔdʕk/wʔwdʕk#3#/ mṭl dʔškḥ rḥmʔ bʕynyk wḥzy dʕmk hnʔ ʕmʔ hw rbʔ

33:18	wʔmr ḥwny šwbḥk
33:19	wʔmr ʔnʔ ʔʕbr klh ṭwby qdmyk wʔqrʔ bšmʔ mryʔ qdmyk wʔḥwn lmn dʔḥwn wʔrḥm lmn/ʕl mn#3#/ dʔrḥm
33:20	wʔmr <mryʔ lmwšʔ#3#> lʔ mškḥ ʔnt lmḥzʔ ʔpy mṭl dlʔ ḥzʔ ly brnšʔ wḥyʔ

34:01	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ pswl lk trtyn lwḥʔ dkʔpʔ ʔyk <lwḥʔ#3#> qdmytʔ wʔktwb ʕl lwḥʔ ptgmʔ dʔyt hww ʕl lwḥʔ qdmytʔ dtbrt

36:01	wʕbdw bṣlyʔyl wʔlyhb wkl gbr ḥkym lbʔ dyhb mryʔ ḥkmtʔ wswklʔ bhwn lmdʕ wlmʕbd ʕbdʔ dpwlḥnʔ dqwdšʔ ʔyk mʔ dpqd mryʔ

36:04	wʔytyw klhwn ḥkymʔ <lbʔ#3#> dʕbdyn ʕbdʔ dqwdšʔ ʔnš ʔnš mn ʕbdʔ dhnwn ʕbdyn

36:09	ʔwrkh dyryʕtʔ ḥdʔ ʕsryn wtmnʔ ʔmyn wptyh ʔrbʕ ʔmyn dyryʕtʔ ḥdʔ mšwḥtʔ ḥdʔ lklhyn yryʕtʔ

36:12	ḥmšyn tnʔn ʕbdw lyryʕtʔ ḥdʔ wḥmšyn tnʔn ʕbdw bsṭrh/bspth#3#/ dyryʕtʔ ḥdʔ bdbqʔ ʔḥrnʔ mqbln tʔntʔ ḥdʔ lwqbl ḥdʔ
36:13	wʕbdw ḥmšyn qwrqsʔ ddhbʔ wdbqw yryʕtʔ ḥdʔ bḥdʔ bqwrqsʔ whwʔ mšknʔ ḥd
36:14	wʕbdw yryʕtʔ dsʕrʔ lmprs ʕl mšknʔ ḥdʕsrʔ yryʕn ʕbdw ʔnyn
36:15	ʔwrkh dyryʕtʔ hdʔ tltyn ʔmyn wptyh ʔrbʕ ʔmyn dyryʕtʔ ḥdʔ mšwḥtʔ ḥdʔ lḥdʕsrʔ yryʕn
36:16	wdbqw ḥmš yryʕn ʔkḥdʔ wšt yryʕn ʔyk ḥdʔ
36:17	wʕbdw tʔntʔ ḥmšyn tnʔn \ʕl spth /mn sṭrh#3#/ dyryʕtʔ <ḥdʔ#3#> mn sṭrʔ ddbqʔ wḥmšyn tnʔn ʕbdw ʕl spth dyryʕtʔ bdbqʔ/ddbqʔ#3#/ ʔḥrnʔ
36:18	wʕbdw qwrqsʔ dnḥšʔ ḥmšyn lmdbqwth lmšknʔ dnhwʔ ḥd
36:19	wʕbdw prsʔ lmšknʔ mškʔ ddkrʔ dʔspynyqʔ wqrmʔ dmškʔ dssgwnʔ mn lʕl
36:20	wʕbdw dpʔ lmšknʔ/dmšknʔ#3#/ dqysʔ dʔškrʕʔ qymʔ
36:21	ʕsr ʔmyn ʔwrkh ddpʔ ḥd wʔmʔ wplgwt ʔmʔ ptyh ddpʔ ḥd
36:22	trtyn ṣyrn ldpʔ ḥd wtrtyn ṣyrn ldpʔ ḥd/ʔḥrnʔ#3#/ tryṣn ḥdʔ lwqbl ḥdʔ hknʔ ʕbdw lklhwn dpʔ dmšknʔ
36:23	wʕbdw dpʔ lmšknʔ ʕsryn dpyn drwḥʔ dtymnʔ
36:24	wʔrbʕyn smkʔ dsʔmʔ/dkspʔ#3#/ ʕbdw tḥyt ʕsryn dpyn tryn lsṭrʔ smkyn tḥyt dpʔ ḥd ltrtyn ṣyrth wtryn smkyn tḥyt dpʔ ḥd/ʔḥrnʔ#3#/ ltrtyn ṣyrth

36:26	wʔrbʕyn smkʔ dsʔmʔ/dkspʔ#3#/ tryn smkyn tḥyt dpʔ ḥd wtryn smkyn tḥyt dpʔ ʔḥrnʔ
36:27	wlšpwly mšknʔ mn mʕrbʔ ʕbdw štʔ dpyn
36:28	wtryn dpyn ʕbdw lzwytʔ dmšknʔ bšpwlyhwn
36:29	whww mtʔmyn mn ltḥt wʔkḥdʔ gpyn ršyhwn ʕl zqzqtʔ ḥdʔ hknʔ ʕbdw ltryhwn ltrtyn zwyn
36:30	whww tmnyʔ dpyn wsmkyhwn dsʔmʔ/dkspʔ#3#/ šttʕsr tryn smkyn tḥyt dpʔ ḥd wtryn smkyn tḥyt dpʔ ʔḥrnʔ
36:31	wʕbdw mwklʔ dqysʔ dʔškrʕʔ ḥmšʔ ldpy sṭrh ḥd dmšknʔ

36:35	wʕbdw prsʔ dtkltʔ wʔrgwnʔ wṣwbʕʔ dzḥwrytʔ wbwṣʔ ʕzylʔ ʕbdʔ dʔwmnʔ ʕbdh krwbʔ
36:36	wʕbdw lh ʔrbʕʔ ʕmwdʔ dʔškrʕʔ wqrmw ʔnwn dhbʔ wlqwbʕyhwn dhbʔ wʕbdw lhwn ʔrbʕʔ smkyn dsʔmʔ/dkspʔ#3#/
36:37	wʕbdw prsʔ ltrʕʔ dmšknʔ tkltʔ wʔrgwnʔ wṣwbʕʔ dzḥwrytʔ wbwṣʔ ʕzylʔ ʕbdʔ dṣwrtʔ
36:38	ʕmwdwhy ḥmšʔ wqwbʕyhwn ḥmšʔ wqrmʔ dršyhwn wqrmhwn ddhbʔ wsmkyhwn ḥmšʔ dnḥšʔ
37:01	wʕbd bṣlyʔyl qbwtʔ dqysʔ dʔškrʕʔ trtyn ʔmyn wplg ʔwrkh wʔmʔ wplg ptyh wʔmʔ wplg rwmh
37:02	wqrmh dhbʔ dkyʔ mn lgw wmn lbr wʕbd lh klylʔ ddhbʔ kd ḥdrʔ
37:03	wḥšl lh ʔrbʕ zqzqn ddhbʔ ʕl ʔrbʕ zwyth trtyn zqzqn ʕl sṭrh ḥd wtrtyn zqzqn ʕl sṭrh ʔḥrnʔ
37:04	wʕbd qwpʔ dqysʔ dʔškrʕʔ wqrm ʔnwn dhbʔ

37:07	wʕbd tryn krwbʔ ddhbʔ dnsktʔ ʕbd ʔnwn mn tryn sṭrwhy dḥwsyʔ

37:09	whww krwbʔ prysyn gpyhwn mn lʕl wmṭlyn bgpyhwn/bknpyhwn#3#/ ʕl ḥwsyʔ wʔpyhwn ḥd lwqbl ḥd ʕl ḥwsyʔ hwy ʔpyhwn dkrwbʔ

37:12	wʕbd lh sptʔ pšk kd ḥdr wʕbd lh klylʔ ddhbʔ ʕl spth kd ḥdr
37:13	wḥšl lh ʔrbʕ zqzqn ddhbʔ wyhb zqzqtʔ \ʕl ʔrbʕ /bʔrbʕ#3#/ zwyth \ʕl ʔrbʕ /bʔrbʕ#3#/lʕl mn ʔrbʕ#3#/ rglwhy
37:14	lwqbl spth hwy zqzqth dwktʔ lqwpʔ lmšqlh lptwrʔ

37:17	wʕbd mnrtʔ ddhbʔ dkyʔ dnsktʔ ʕbdh lmnrtʔ bss dylh wqnyh wʔsqpyh wḥzwryh wšwšnyh mnh hww
37:18	wštʔ qnyn dnpqyn mn sṭryh tltʔ qny mnrtʔ mn sṭrh ḥd wtltʔ qny mnrtʔ mn sṭrh ʔḥrnʔ
37:19	tltʔ ʔsqpyn qbyʕyn bqnyʔ ḥd wḥzwrʔ wšwšnʔ wtltʔ ʔsqpyn qbyʕyn bqnyʔ ḥd wḥzwrʔ wšwšnʔ hknʔ bštʔ/lštʔ#3#/ qnyn dnpqyn mnh mn mnrtʔ

38:24	klh dhbʔ/ʕbdʔ#3#/ dʔtʕbd lʕbdʔ bklh ʕbdʔ dqwdšʔ hwʔ dhbʔ dpwršnʔ ʕsryn wtšʕ kkryn wʔrbʕmʔʔ/wšbʕmʔʔ#3#/ wtltyn mtqlyn bmtqlʔ dqwdšʔ

39:01	wmn tkltʔ wmn ʔrgwnʔ wmn ṣwbʕʔ dzḥwrytʔ ʕbdw lbwšy tšmštʔ lmšmšw bqwdšʔ wʕbdw lbwšy qwdšʔ lʔhrwn ʔyk dpqd mryʔ lmwšʔ

39:30	wʕbdw klylʔ dnzyrwtʔ/klyl#3#/ dqwdšʔ/qwdšʔ#3#/ ddhbʔ dkyʔ wktbw ʕlwhy ktbʔ glpʔ dḥtmʔ qwdšʔ lmryʔ

05:01	wnpšʔ kd tḥṭʔ wtšmʕ qlʔ dmwmtʔ whw shd ʔw ḥzʔ ʔw ydʕ ʔlʔ nḥwʔ nqbl ḥṭhh

05:03	ʔw ʔn nqrwb/nqrb#3#/ bṭmʔwtʔ dʔnšʔ lkl ṭmʔwtʔ dntṭmʔ bh wnhmʔ mnh whw ydʕ dḥṭʔ

05:17	wʔn npšʔ tḥṭʔ wtʕbd/wtʕbr#3#/ ḥd mn kl/#3#/ pwqdnwhy dmryʔ dlʔ mtʕbdyn wlʔ ydʕ dḥṭʔ nqbl ḥṭhh

13:18	wbsrʔ ʔn nhwʔ šwḥnʔ bmškh wntʔsʔ

13:20	wnḥzʔ khnʔ ʔn ḥzwh mkyk mn mškʔ wsʕrh ʔthpk lmḥwr/dnḥwr#3#/lmḥwrw#3#/ nṭmʔyh khnʔ mṭl dmḥwtʔ hy dgrbʔ wbšwḥnʔ sgyt
13:21	wʔn nḥzʔ khnʔ dlyt bh sʕrʔ ḥwrʔ wlʔ hwt mkykʔ mn mškʔ ʔlʔ šwyʔ/šwḥnʔ#3#/ hy nsgryh khnʔ šbʕʔ ywmyn
13:22	wʔn mhlkw thlk bmškʔ nṭmʔyh khnʔ mṭl dmḥwtʔ hy dgrbʔ
13:23	wʔn bdwkth qmt bhqytʔ wlʔ hlkt šwmtʔ hy dšwḥnʔ ndkyh khnʔ
13:24	wbsrʔ ʔn nhwʔ bmškh kwyʔ dnwrʔ wthwʔ bšwmtʔ dkwyʔ bhqytʔ dḥwrʔ ʔw dswmqʔ ʔw dmḥwrʔ
13:25	nḥzʔ khnʔ ʔn ʔthpk sʕrʔ lmḥwr bbhqytʔ wḥzwh ʕmyq mn mškʔ grbʔ hw bkwyʔ prḥ nṭmʔyh khnʔ mṭl dmḥwtʔ hy dgrbʔ
13:26	wʔn nḥzʔ khnʔ dlyt bbhqytʔ sʕrʔ ḥwrʔ wlʔ hwt mkykʔ mn mškʔ ʔlʔ šwyʔ hy nsgryh khnʔ šbʕʔ ywmyn
13:27	wnḥzʔ khnʔ bywmʔ šbyʕyʔ ʔn hlkt bhqytʔ bmškʔ nṭmʔyh khnʔ mṭl dmḥwtʔ hy dgrbʔ
13:28	wʔn bdwkth qmt bhqytʔ wlʔ hlkt bmškʔ ʔlʔ šwyʔ hy šwmtʔ hy dkwyʔ ndkyh khnʔ mṭl dšwmtʔ hy dkwyʔ
13:29	wgbrʔ ʔw ʔnttʔ ʔn thwʔ bh mḥwtʔ/šwmtʔ#3#/ bršh hw bdqnh
13:30	nḥzyh khnʔ lmḥwtʔ ʔn ḥzwh ʕmyq mn mškʔ wʔn ʔyt bh sʕr šmšʔ qṭynʔ nṭmʔyh khnʔ mṭl dmḥwtʔ hy dgrbʔ dršʔ \ʔw ddqnʔ /wddqnʔ#3#/
13:31	wʔn nḥzyh khnʔ lmḥwtʔ dlʔ/wlʔ#2#/ hwʔ ʕmyq ḥzwh mn mškʔ wsʕrʔ ʔwkmʔ lyt bh nsgryh khnʔ lmḥwtʔ hy šbʕʔ ywmyn
13:32	wnḥzyh khnʔ lmḥwtʔ hy bywmʔ dšbʕʔ/šbyʕyʔ#3#/ ʔn lʔ hlkt mḥwtʔ wʔn lʔ hwʔ bh sʕr šmšʔ wḥzwh dmḥwtʔ lʔ hwʔ ʕmyq mn mškʔ
13:33	ngrwʕ sṭryh dmḥwtʔ wlh lʔ ngrwʕ wnsgryh khnʔ lmḥwtʔ šbʕʔ ywmyn ʔḥrnyn
13:34	wnḥzyh khnʔ lmḥwtʔ bywmʔ dšbʕʔ/šbyʕyʔ#3#/ ʔn lʔ hlkt mḥwtʔ bmškʔ wḥzwh lʔ hwʔ ʕmyq mn mškʔ ndkyh khnʔ wnḥll mʔnwhy wntdkʔ
13:35	wʔn mhlkw thlk mḥwtʔ bmškʔ mn btr dʔtdky
13:36	nḥzʔ khnʔ ʔn hlkt mḥwtʔ bmškʔ lʔ nšʔl khnʔ ʕl sʕr šmšʔ mṭl dṭmʔ hw
13:37	wʔn bdwkth qmt mḥwtʔ wsʕrʔ ʔwkmʔ yʕʔ bh mtʔsyʔ mḥwtʔ mṭl ddkyʔ hy ndkyh khnʔ
13:38	wgbrʔ ʔw ʔnttʔ ʔn thwʔ bmškʔ dbsrhwn bhqytʔ dmbhqʔ wḥwrʔ
13:39	nḥzʔ khnʔ ʔn ʔyt bmškʔ dbsrhwn bhqytʔ dḥwrʔ ʔw dswmqʔ qlpytʔ sgyt bmškʔ dkʔ hw
13:40	wgbrʔ ʔn/kd#3#/ ntr sʕrh wnqrḥ dkʔ hw
13:41	wʔn mn lwqbl ʔpwhy ntr sʕrh gbḥʔ hw dkʔ hw
13:42	wʔn thwʔ bqrḥwth ʔw bgbḥwth mḥwtʔ dḥwrʔ ʔw dswmqʔ grbʔ hw sgy bqrḥwth ʔw bgbḥwth
13:43	nḥzyh khnʔ lšwmtʔ dmḥwtʔ ʔn ḥwrt wʔn/ʔw#3#/ smqt bqrḥwth ʔw bgbḥwth ʔyk ḥzwʔ dgrbʔ dʔyt bmškʔ dbsrh
13:44	grbʔ hw gbrʔ hw wṭmʔʔ hw nṭmʔywhy khnʔ mṭl dmḥwtʔ bršh hy
13:45	wʔynʔ dgrb wʔyt bh mḥwtʔ mʔnwhy nhwwn mprmyn wršh nhwʔ pryʕ wʕl spwth ntʕṭp wṭmʔʔ nqrʔ npšh
13:46	kl ywmtʔ dʔyt bh mḥwtʔ nhwʔ ṭmʔ mṭl dṭmʔ hw blḥwdwhy ntb wlbr mn mšrytʔ nhwʔ mwtbh
13:47	wmrṭwṭʔ ʔn/kd#3#/ thwʔ bh mḥwtʔ dgrbʔ bmrṭwṭʔ dʕmrʔ ʔw bmrṭwṭʔ dktnʔ
13:48	ʔw bštyʔ ʔw bkrkʔ dktnʔ ʔw dʕmrʔ ʔw bmškʔ ʔw bkl/kl#3#/ ʕbd dmškʔ
13:49	wthwʔ mḥwtʔ ywrqʔ ʔw swmqʔ bmrṭwṭʔ ʔw bmškʔ ʔw bštyʔ ʔw bkrkʔ ʔw bkwl mʔnʔ dmškʔ mḥwtʔ hy dgrbʔ nḥwwnh lkhnʔ
13:50	wnḥzyh khnʔ lmḥwtʔ wnsgryh khnʔ lmḥwtʔ šbʕʔ ywmyn
13:51	wnḥzyh khnʔ lmḥwtʔ bywmʔ dšbʕʔ ʔn hlkt mḥwtʔ bmrṭwṭʔ ʔw bštyʔ ʔw bkrkʔ ʔw bmškʔ \ʔw bkl /wkl#3#/ mškʔ dmtʕbd lʕbdʔ mḥwtʔ hy dgrbʔ mryrʔ ṭmʔ hw
13:52	nwqdywhy <khnʔ#3#> lmrṭwṭʔ ʔw lštyʔ ʔw lkrkʔ dʕmrʔ ʔw dktnʔ ʔw lkl/dkl#3#/ mʔnʔ dmškʔ dthwʔ bh mḥwtʔ bnwrʔ nwqdywhy mṭl dgrbʔ hw mryrʔ
13:53	wʔn nḥzʔ khnʔ dlʔ hlkt mḥwtʔ bmrṭwṭʔ ʔw bštyʔ ʔw bkrkʔ ʔw bkl mʔn dmškʔ
13:54	npqwd khnʔ wnḥllwn mdm dʔyt bh mḥwtʔ wnsgryh khnʔ šbʕʔ ywmyn ʔḥrnyn
13:55	wnḥzyh khnʔ lmḥwtʔ mn btr dḥllwh lmḥwtʔ ʔlʔ ʔtḥlp ḥzwh dmḥwtʔ wmḥwtʔ lʔ ʔtḥlpt wlʔ hlkt ṭmʔ hw ʔwqdwhy bnwrʔ mḥwtʔ hy bḥdtwth ʔw bblywth
13:56	wʔn nḥzʔ khnʔ dšwyʔ hy mḥwtʔ mn btr dʔtḥll nqwd/npqwd#2#/ nšqlyh mn mrṭwṭʔ ʔw mn mškʔ ʔw mn štyʔ ʔw mn krkʔ
13:57	wʔn twb ttḥzʔ bmrṭwṭʔ ʔw bštyʔ ʔw bkrkʔ ʔw bkl mʔn dmškʔ \nwqdwnh bnwrʔ /bnwrʔ ʔwqdwhy#3#/ mṭl dsgyt bh mḥwtʔ
13:58	wmrṭwṭʔ ʔw štyʔ ʔw krkʔ ʔw kl mʔnʔ/mʔn#3#/ dmškʔ dmtḥll wprqʔ mnhwn mḥwtʔ ntḥll trtyn zbnyn wntdkʔ
13:59	hnʔ hw nmwsʔ dmḥwtʔ dgrbʔ dmrṭwṭʔ dʕmrʔ ʔw dktnʔ ʔw dštyʔ ʔw dkrkʔ ʔw dkl mʔnʔ dmškʔ dndkywhy ʔw dnṭmʔywhy
14:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh

14:04	npqwd khnʔ wnytwn lhw dmtdkʔ trtyn ṣpryn ḥytʔ dkytʔ wqysʔ dʔrzʔ wṣwbʕʔ dzḥwrytʔ wzwpʔ
14:05	wnpqwd khnʔ wnkswn ṣprʔ ḥdʔ bmʔnʔ dpḥrʔ ʕl mbwʕʔ dmyʔ

14:07	wnrws ʕl hw dmtdkʔ mn grbʔ šbʕ zbnyn wntdkʔ wnprḥyh lṣprʔ ḥytʔ lʔpy ḥqlʔ
14:08	wnḥll mʔnwhy hw dmtdkʔ wngrwʕ klh sʕrh wnsḥʔ bmyʔ wntdkʔ \wmn btrkn /wbtrkn#3#/ nʕwl lmšrytʔ wntb lbr mn mšknh šbʕʔ ywmyn
14:09	wbywmʔ dšbʕʔ ngrwʕ klh sʕrh ršh wdqnh wgbynwhy wklh sʕrh ngrwʕ wnḥll mʔnwhy \wnsḥʔ bsrh /wbsrh#3#/ bmyʔ wntdkʔ
14:10	wbywmʔ dtmnyʔ nsb tryn ʔmryn dlyt bhwn mwmʔ wprtʔ ḥdʔ brt šntʔ dlyt bh mwmʔ wtltʔ ʕsrwnyn nšypʔ smydʔ dpyl bmšḥʔ wmnqytʔ dmšḥʔ
14:11	wnqymwhy khnʔ dmdkʔ lhw gbrʔ dmtdkʔ wlhwn lhlyn qdm mryʔ btrʕʔ dmšknzbnʔ
14:12	wnsb khnʔ ʔmrʔ ḥd wnqrbywhy ḥlp ḥṭhʔ wlmnqytʔ dmšḥʔ wnprwš ʔnwn khnʔ pwršnʔ qdm mryʔ
14:13	wnksywhy lʔmrʔ bʔtrʔ dnks/dnkys#3#/ ḥṭhʔ wyqdʔ šlmʔ bʔtrʔ qdyšʔ mṭl dhw dḥlp ḥṭhʔ qwrbnʔ hw dkhnʔ wqdwš qwdšyn hw
14:14	wnsb khnʔ mn dmʔ dḥṭhʔ wnrws khnʔ ʕl ṭrpʔ dʔdnh dymynʔ dhw dmtdkʔ wʕl krtʔ dʔydh dymynʔ wʕl krtʔ drglh dymynʔ
14:15	wnsb khnʔ mnqytʔ ḥdʔ dmšḥʔ wnswk ʕl ʔydh dsmlʔ dkhnʔ
14:16	wnṣbwʕ khnʔ ṣbʕh dymynʔ mn <hw#3#> mšḥʔ dbʔydh dsmlʔ wnrws khnʔ mn mšḥʔ bṣbʕh šbʕ zbnyn qdm mryʔ
14:17	wmdm dytr mn mšḥʔ dbʔydh dkhnʔ nrws khnʔ ʕl ṭrpʔ dʔdnh dymynʔ dhw dmtdkʔ wʕl krtʔ dʔydh dymynʔ wʕl krtʔ drglh dymynʔ ʕl dwkt dmʔ dḥṭhʔ
14:18	wmdm dmštḥr mn mšḥʔ dbʔydh dkhnʔ nrmʔ bršh dhw dmtdkʔ wnḥsʔ ʕlwhy khnʔ qdm mryʔ
14:19	wnqrb khnʔ qwrbnʔ dḥlp ḥṭhʔ wnḥsʔ ʕlwhy dhw dmtdkʔ mn ṭmʔwth wbtrkyn nksywhy lyqdʔ šlmʔ
14:20	wnsq khnʔ yqdʔ šlmʔ wsmydʔ ʕl mdbḥʔ wnḥsʔ ʕlwhy khnʔ wntdkʔ
14:21	wʔn mskyn hw wlʔ spqʔ bʔydwhy nsb ʔmrʔ ḥd ḥlp ḥṭhʔ lpwršnʔ dntḥsʔ ʕlwhy wḥd mn ʕsrʔ lsʔtʔ nšypʔ dpyl bmšḥʔ lqwrbnʔ wmnqytʔ ḥdʔ dmšḥʔ
14:22	wtryn šwpnynyn ʔw tryn bny ywnʔ mdm dspqʔ bʔydwhy wnhwʔ ḥd ḥlp ḥṭhʔ wḥd lʕltʔ

14:29	wmdm dmštḥr mn mšḥʔ dbʔydh dkhnʔ nrws ʕl ršh dhw dmtdkʔ wnḥsʔ ʕlwhy qdm mryʔ

14:35	nʔtʔ mrh dbytʔ wnḥwʔ lkhnʔ wnʔmr lh ʔyk mḥwtʔ dgrbʔ ʔtḥzyt ly bbytʔ

14:37	wnḥzyh lmḥwtʔ whʔ mḥwtʔ bʔstʔ dbytʔ qlpʔ dywrqn ʔw dswmqn wḥzwhyn ʕmyq mn ʔstʔ
14:38	npwq lh khnʔ <lbr#3#> mn bytʔ wnqwm btrʕh wnsgrywhy <khnʔ#3#> lbytʔ hw šbʕʔ ywmyn

14:41	wbytʔ hw nqlpwnh mn lgw kd ḥdr wnšdwn ʕprʔ dqlpw lbr mn qrytʔ/mšrytʔ#3#/ bʔtrʔ ṭmʔʔ
14:42	wnsbwn kʔpʔ ʔḥrnytʔ wnʕlwn ḥlp kʔpʔ wʕprʔ ʔḥrnʔ nsbwn wnṭrwnh lbytʔ

14:44	nʕwl khnʔ wnḥzʔ ʔn hlkt mḥwtʔ bbytʔ grbʔ hw mryrʔ ʔyt bh bbytʔ ṭmʔʔ hw
14:45	nʕqrwnh lbytʔ lkʔpwhy wlqyswhy wlklh ʕprh wnpqwnh lbr mn qrytʔ lʔtrʔ ṭmʔʔ wnwqdwnh bnwrʔ
14:46	wmn dʕʔl lgwh dbytʔ kl ywmtʔ dsgyr nhwʔ ṭmʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ
14:47	wmn ddmk \bgwh dbytʔ /bgwh ddwktʔ#3#/ nḥll mʔnwhy wmn dʔkl \bgwh dbytʔ /bgwh ddwktʔ#3#/ nḥll mʔnwhy
14:48	wʔn nʕwl khnʔ wnḥzʔ dlʔ hlkt/slqt#3#/ mḥwtʔ bbytʔ mn btr dṭrʔwhy lbytʔ ndkywhy khnʔ lbytʔ hw mṭl dʔtʔsyt lh mḥwtʔ
14:49	wnsb lmdkywth lbytʔ trtyn ṣpryn ḥytʔ dkytʔ wqysʔ dʔrzʔ wzwpʔ wṣwbʕʔ dzḥwrytʔ wnpqwd khnʔ
14:50	wnkswn ṣprʔ ḥdʔ bmʔnʔ dpḥrʔ ʕl \mbwʕʔ dmyʔ /myʔ dmbwʕʔ#3#/
14:51	wnsb lṣprʔ/ṣprʔ#3#/ hy ḥytʔ ʔḥrtʔ wlqysʔ/wqysʔ#3#/ dʔrzʔ wzwpʔ/wlzwpʔ#3#/ wṣwbʕʔ/wlṣwbʕʔ#3#/ dzḥwrytʔ wnṣbwʕ ʔnwn lhlyn/hlyn#3#/ bdmʔ dṣprʔ hy dnkysʔ wbmyʔ ḥyʔ wnrws ʕl bytʔ hw šbʕ zbnyn
14:52	wndkywhy lbytʔ <hw#2#> bdmʔ dṣprʔ wbmyʔ ḥyʔ wbṣprʔ ḥytʔ wbqysʔ dʔrzʔ wbzwpʔ wbṣwbʕʔ dzḥwrytʔ
14:53	wnprḥyh lṣprʔ/ṣprʔ#3#/ ḥytʔ lbr mn qrytʔ lʔpy ḥqlʔ wnḥsʔ ʕl bytʔ wntdkʔ
14:54	hnʔ nmwsʔ nhwʔ lkl mḥwn dgrbʔ wlmḥwtʔ/wmḥwtʔ#3#/
14:55	dgrbʔ dmrṭwṭʔ wdbytʔ
14:56	wlšwmtʔ wlqlpytʔ wlbhqytʔ
14:57	wlmprš byt ṭmʔʔ ldkyʔ hnʔ <hw#3#> nmwsʔ dgrbʔ
15:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʕm ʔhrwn wʔmr lhwn
15:02	mllw ʕm bny ʔysrʔyl wʔmrw lhwn gbr gbr kd nhwʔ dʔb mn bsrh dwbh ṭmʔ hw
15:03	whdʔ thwʔ ṭmʔwtʔ ddwbh rdʔ bsrh ʕm dwbh ʔw ḥtym bsrh mn dwbh ṭmʔwth hy
15:04	wkl mškbʔ ddmk ʕlwhy dybʔ nhwʔ ṭmʔ wkl mʔnʔ dytb ʕlwhy nhwʔ ṭmʔ
15:05	wgbrʔ dnqrwb lmškbh nḥll mʔnwhy wnsḥʔ bmyʔ wnhwʔ ṭmʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ
15:06	wmn dytb ʕl mʔnʔ dytb ʕlwhy dybʔ nḥll mʔnwhy wnsḥʔ bmyʔ wnhwʔ ṭmʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ
15:07	wmn dnqrwb lbsrh ddybʔ nḥll mʔnwhy wnsḥʔ bmyʔ wnhwʔ ṭmʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ
15:08	wʔn nrwq hw mn ddʔb ʕl mn ddkʔ nḥll mʔnwhy wnsḥʔ bmyʔ wnhwʔ ṭmʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ
15:09	wkl mdm drkb ʕlwhy hw mn ddʔb nhwʔ ṭmʔ
15:10	wkl dnqrwb lklmdm dʔyt tḥwtwhy nhwʔ ṭmʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ wmn dnšqwl ʔnwn nḥll mʔnwhy wnsḥʔ bmyʔ wnhwʔ ṭmʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ
15:11	wkl dnqrwb lhw ʔynʔ ddʔb mʔ dlʔ ʔšyg ʔydwhy bmyʔ nḥll mʔnwhy wnsḥʔ bmyʔ wnhwʔ ṭmʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ
15:12	wmʔnʔ dpḥrʔ dqrb lh ʔynʔ ddʔb nttbr wkl mʔnʔ dqysʔ \ʔw dnḥšʔ /wdnḥšʔ#3#/ nttšyg bmyʔ
15:13	wʔn ntdkʔ ʔynʔ ddʔb mn dwbh nmnʔ lh šbʕʔ ywmyn wntdkʔ wnḥll mʔnwhy wnsḥʔ bsrh bmyʔ ḥyʔ wntdkʔ
15:14	wlywmʔ dtmnyʔ nsb lh tryn šwpnynyn ʔw tryn bny ywnʔ \wnytʔ ʔnwn /wnʔtʔ#3#/wnʕwl#3#/ qdm mryʔ ltrʕʔ dmšknzbnʔ wntl ʔnwn lkhnʔ
15:15	wnʕbd ʔnwn khnʔ ḥd lḥṭhʔ wḥd ldbḥʔ/lyqdʔ#3#/ šlmʔ wnḥsʔ ʕlwhy khnʔ mn dwbh qdm mryʔ
15:16	wgbrʔ ʔn npwq mnh zrʕʔ dmdmkʔ nsḥʔ bmyʔ klh bsrh wnhwʔ ṭmʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ
15:17	wkl mrṭwṭʔ \ʔw mškbʔ /wmškbʔ#3#/dmškbʔ#3#/ dnpl ʕlwhy zrʕʔ dmdmkʔ ntḥll bmyʔ wnhwʔ ṭmʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ
15:18	wʔnttʔ dndmk lwth gbrʔ mdmkʔ dzrʕʔ nsḥwn bmyʔ wnhwwn ṭmʔyn ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ
15:19	wʔnttʔ kd thwʔ dybʔ mn dmh nhwʔ dwbh bbsrh wšbʕʔ ywmyn ttb bkpsh wkl dnqrwb lh nhwʔ ṭmʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ
15:20	wklmdm dtdmk ʕlwhy bkpsh nhwʔ ṭmʔ wkl mdm dttb ʕlwhy nhwʔ ṭmʔ

15:22	wkl dnqrwb lkl mʔn dttb ʕlwhy nḥll mʔnwhy wnsḥʔ bmyʔ wnhwʔ ṭmʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ
15:23	wʔn lmdmkʔ ʔw lmʔnʔ dytbʔ ʕlwhy qrb nhwʔ ṭmʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ
15:24	wʔn ndmk lwth gbrʔ wnpl mn kpsh ʕlwhy nhwʔ ṭmʔ šbʕʔ ywmyn wkl mdmkʔ ddmk ʕlwhy nhwʔ ṭmʔ
15:25	wʔnttʔ kd ndwb \dwbʔ ddmh /dwbh#3#/ ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ dlʔ zbnʔ dkpsh ʔw ʔn tdwb ʕl kpsh kl ywmtʔ ddybʔ bṭmʔwth ʔyk ywmy kpsh nhwwn wthwʔ ṭmʔʔ
15:26	wkwl mdmkʔ dtdmk ʕlwhy kl ywmy dwbh ʔyk mdmkʔ dkpsh nhwʔ lh wkwl mʔnʔ dttb ʕlwhy nhwʔ ṭmʔ ʔyk ṭmʔwtʔ/ywmtʔ#3#/ dkpsh
15:27	wkl dnqrwb lhwn ntṭmʔ wnḥll mʔnwhy wnsḥʔ bmyʔ wnhwʔ ṭmʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ
15:28	wʔn dkyt mn dwbh tmnʔ lh šbʕʔ ywmyn wbtrkyn ttdkʔ/tdkʔ#3#/
15:29	wbywmʔ dtmnyʔ tsb lh tryn šwpnynyn ʔw tryn bny ywnʔ wtytʔ ʔnwn lwt khnʔ ltrʕʔ dmšknzbnʔ
15:30	wnʕbd ʔnwn khnʔ ḥd lḥṭhʔ wḥd lʕltʔ wnḥsʔ ʕlyh khnʔ mn dwbʔ/dmʔ#3#/ dṭmʔwth qdm mryʔ

15:33	wkpsnytʔ thwʔ bkpsh wmn ddʔb nhwʔ bdwbh dkrʔ ʔw nqbtʔ wgbrʔ dndmk ʕm ṭmʔtʔ
16:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ mn btr dmytw tryhwn bnwhy dʔhrwn kd qrbw nwrʔ nwkrytʔ qdm mryʔ wmytw
16:02	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ mll ʕm ʔhrwn ʔḥwk dlʔ nhwʔ ʕʔl bklzbn lqwdšʔ lgw mn ʔpy trʕʔ dqdm ḥwsyʔ dqbwtʔ dlʔ nmwt mṭl dbʕnnʔ mtḥzʔ ʔnʔ ʕl ḥwsyʔ
16:03	bhdʔ dyn nhwʔ ʕʔl ʔhrwn lqwdšʔ btwrʔ <ḥd#23#> br bqrʔ lḥṭhʔ wdkrʔ lyqdʔ šlmʔ
16:04	wkwtynʔ dbwṣʔ dqwdšʔ/lqwdšʔ#3#/ nlbš wmʔnʔ dbwṣʔ nhwwn ʕl bsrh wbhmynʔ dbwṣʔ ntḥzq wmṣnptʔ dbwṣʔ nsym bršh mṭl dlbwšʔ ʔnwn dqwdšʔ wnsḥʔ bmyʔ bsrh wnlbš ʔnwn
16:05	wmn knwštʔ dbny ʔysryl nsb tryn ṣpryyn dʕzʔ lḥṭhʔ wdkrʔ ḥd lʕltʔ
16:06	wnqrb ʕlwhy ʔhrwn twrʔ dḥṭhʔ dylh wnḥsʔ ʕl npšh wʕl byth

16:08	wnrmʔ ʔhrwn pṣʔ ʕl tryn ṣpryyn pṣtʔ ḥdʔ lmryʔ wpṣtʔ ḥdʔ lʕzzʔyl

16:11	wnqrb ʔhrwn twrʔ dḥṭhʔ dnpšh wnḥsʔ ʕl npšh wʕl byth wnksywhy ltwrʔ dḥṭhʔ
16:12	wnsb mlʔ pyrmʔ gwmrʔ dnwrʔ mn mdbḥʔ dqdm mryʔ wmlʔ ḥwpnwhy ʕṭrʔ dbsmʔ ṭbʔ wnʕwl lgw mn ʔpy trʕʔ
16:13	wnsym ʕṭrʔ ʕl nwrʔ qdm mryʔ wtksywhy ʕnnʔ dʕṭrʔ lḥwsyʔ dʕl shdwtʔ wlʔ/dlʔ#3#/ nmwt
16:14	wnsb mn dmʔ dtwrʔ wnrws bṣbʕh lʔpy ḥwsyʔ mn mdnḥyh wqdm/wʕl#3#/ ḥwsyʔ nrws šbʕ zbnyn mn dmʔ bṣbʕh
16:15	wnkws ṣpryʔ dḥṭhʔ dʕmʔ wnʕl dmh lgw mn ʔpy trʕʔ wnʕbd ldmh ʔyk dʕbd ldmʔ dtwrʔ wnrsywhy ʕl ḥwsyʔ wqdm ḥwsyʔ
16:16	wnḥsʔ ʕl qwdšʔ mn ṭmʔwtʔ dbny ʔysrʔyl wmn ʕwlhwn wmn klhwn ḥṭhyhwn whknʔ nʕbd lmšknzbnʔ dšrʔ ʕmhwn bgw ṭmʔwthwn
16:17	wkl ʔnš lʔ nhwʔ bmšknzbnʔ mʔ dʕʔl lmḥsyw bqwdšʔ ʕdmʔ dnpq wnḥsʔ ʕl npšh wʕl byth wʕl klh knwštʔ dbny ʔysryl nḥsʔ
16:18	wnpwq lwt mdbḥʔ dqdm/mn qdm#3#/ mryʔ wnḥsʔ ʕlwhy wnsb mn dmʔ dtwrʔ wmn dmʔ dṣpryʔ wnrws ʕl qrnth dmdbḥʔ kd ḥdr
16:19	wnrws ʕlwhy mn dmʔ bṣbʕh šbʕ zbnyn wndkywhy wnqdšywhy mn ṭmʔwtʔ dbny ʔysryl
16:20	wmʔ dšlm lmḥsyw ʕl qwdšʔ wʕl mšknzbnʔ wʕl mdbḥʔ nqrb ṣpryʔ ḥyʔ
16:21	wnsym ʔhrwn trtyhyn ʔydwhy ʕl ršh dṣpryʔ ḥyʔ wnwdʔ ʕlwhy kwlh sklwtʔ dbny ʔysryl wklh ʕwlhwn wklhwn ḥṭhyhwn wnsym ʔnwn ʕl ršh dṣpryʔ wnšdr byd gbrʔ dmṭyb lmdbrʔ
16:22	wnšqwl \ʕlwhy ṣpryʔ /ryšh dṣpryʔ#3#/ klh ʕwlhwn lʔrʕʔ byrtʔ wnšbqywhy lṣpryʔ bmdbrʔ/lʕzzʔl#3#/
16:23	wnʕwl ʔhrwn lmšknzbnʔ wnšlḥ lbwšʔ dbwṣʔ dlbš mʔ dʕʔl lqwdšʔ wnšbwq ʔnwn tmn/ltmn#3#/
16:24	wnsḥʔ bsrh bmyʔ bʔtrʔ qdyšʔ wnlbš mʔnwhy wnpwq wnqrb yqdh šlmʔ wyqdʔ šlmʔ dʕmʔ wnḥsʔ ʕl npšh wʕl ʕmʔ
16:25	wtrbʔ dḥṭhʔ nsq lmdbḥʔ/ʕl mdbḥʔ#3#/
16:26	whw dmšdr ṣpryʔ/lṣpryʔ#3#/ lʕzzʔyl nḥll mʔnwhy wnsḥʔ bmyʔ wbtrkn/wbtr#3#/ nʕwl lmšrytʔ
16:27	wtwrʔ dḥṭhʔ wṣpryʔ dḥṭhʔ dʕʔl mn dmhwn lmḥsyw bqwdšʔ npqwn lbr mn mšrytʔ wnwqdwn bnwrʔ mškyhwn wbsrhwn wprthwn
16:28	wmn dmwqd lhwn nḥll mʔnwhy wnsḥʔ bsrh bmyʔ whydyn nʕwl lmšrytʔ/lknwštʔ#3#/
16:29	wnhwʔ lkwn nmwsʔ lʕlm byrḥʔ dšbʕʔ bʕsrtʔ bh byrḥʔ mkkw npštkwn wkl ʕbd lʔ tʕbdwn ʔntwn wʔylyn dmtpnyn lwty dʕmryn byntkwn
16:30	mṭl dbywmʔ hnʔ ntḥsʔ ʕlykwn dttdkwn mn klhwn ḥṭhykwn qdm mryʔ ttdkwn

16:32	wnḥsʔ khnʔ dmtmšḥ wdmšmlʔ ʔydwhy lmšmšw btr ʔbwhy wnlbš lbwšʔ dbwṣʔ wmʔnʔ/wlbwšʔ#3#/ dqwdšʔ
16:33	wnḥsʔ ʕl qdwš qwdšʔ wʕl mšknzbnʔ wʕl/wkl#3#/ mdbḥʔ nḥsʔ wʕl khnʔ wʕl klh ʕmʔ dknwštʔ nḥsʔ
16:34	wnhwʔ lkwn hnʔ nmwsʔ lʕlm dntḥsʔ ʕl bny ʔysryl mn klhwn ḥṭhyhwn ḥdʔ bšntʔ wʕbdw ʔyknʔ/ʔyk#3#/ dpqd mryʔ lmwšʔ
17:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh

17:04	wltrʕʔ dmšknzbnʔ lʔ ʔytyh dnqrbywhy qwrbnʔ lmryʔ qdm mšknh dmryʔ dmʔ ntḥšb ʕl gbrʔ hw mṭl ddmʔ ʔšd wnʔbd gbrʔ hw mn gw ʕmh
17:05	mṭl dnhwwn mytyn bny ʔysryl dbḥyhwn ddbḥyn/ddbyḥyn#23#/ ʕl ʔpy ḥqlʔ wnytwn ʔnwn qdm mryʔ ltrʕʔ dmškn zbnʔ lwt khnʔ wndbḥwn ʔnwn dbḥʔ šlmʔ lmryʔ
17:06	wnrws khnʔ dmʔ ʕl mdbḥh dmryʔ btrʕʔ dmšknzbnʔ wnsq trbʔ lryḥ swtʔ/nyḥʔ#3#/ lmryʔ
17:07	wtwb lʔ ndbḥwn dbḥyhwn lšʔdʔ dṭʕyn btrhwn hnʔ nmwsʔ \nhwʔ lhwn lʕlm /lʕlm nhwʔ lhwn#3#/ ldryhwn
17:08	wʔmr lhwn gbr gbr mn byt/dbyt#2#/ ʔysryl wmn ʔylyn dmtpnyn lwty dʕmryn byntkwn/bʔysryl#2#/ dnsq yqdʔ šlmʔ ʔw dbḥʔ

17:10	wgbr gbr mn <bny#3#> ʔysryl wmn ʔylyn dmtpnyn lwty dʕmryn bʔysrʔyl/byntkwn#3#/ dnʔkwl <mn#3#> dmʔ ʔtl rwgzy bnpšʔ dʔklʔ dmʔ wʔwbdyh mn gw ʕmh
17:11	mṭl dnpšʔ dbsrʔ/dkl bsr#3#/ dmʔ hw \wʔnʔ yhbth lkwn /wyhbth lkwn ʔnʔ#3#/ ʕl mdbḥʔ lḥwsyʔ dnpštkwn mṭl ddmʔ hw mḥsʔ ʕl npšʔ
17:12	mṭl hnʔ ʔmrt lbny ʔysryl kl/dkl#3#/ npšʔ mnkwn lʔ tʔkwl dmʔ wʔylyn dmtpnyn lwty dʕmryn ʕmkwn/byntkwn#3#/ lʔ nʔklwn dmʔ
17:13	wgbr gbr mn bny ʔysryl wmn ʔylyn dmtpnyn lwty dʕmryn byntkwn dnṣwd ṣydʔ dḥywtʔ ʔw dprḥtʔ dmtʔklʔ nʔšwd dmh wnksywhy bʕprʔ
17:14	mṭl dnpšʔ dkl`bsr dmʔ hw wʔmr lbny ʔysryl dmʔ dkl bsr lʔ tʔklwn mṭl dnpšʔ dkl bsr dmʔ hw wkl mn dʔkl lh nʔbd
17:15	wkl npšʔ dtʔkwl pgrʔ ʔw dtbyr lḥywtʔ bkwn wbʔylyn dmtpnyn lwty dʕmryn byntkwn nḥll mʔnwhy wnsḥʔ bmyʔ wnhwʔ ṭmʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ wntdkʔ

18:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
18:02	mll ʕm bny ʔysryl wʔmr lhwn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn
18:03	ʔyk ʕbdʔ dʔrʕʔ dmṣryn dʕmrtwn bh lʔ tʕbdwn wʔyk ʕbdʔ dʔrʕʔ dknʕn dmʕl ʔnʔ lkwn ltmn lʔ tʕbdwn wbnmwsyhwn lʔ thlkwn
18:04	ʔlʔ ʕbdw dyny wṭrw pwqdny whlkw bhwn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn
18:05	ṭrw pwqdny wdyny dbrnšʔ dʕbd lhwn ḥyʔ bhwn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
18:06	gbr gbr ʕl kl qryb bsrh lʔ ttqrbwn lmglyw pwrsyʔ ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
18:07	pwrsyh dʔbwk wpwrsyh dʔmk lʔ tglʔ ʔmk hy lʔ tglʔ pwrsyh

18:09	pwrsyh dḥtk brt ʔbwk ʔw brt ʔmk dylydʔ mn ʔbwk ʔw mn gbr ʔḥryn lʔ tglʔ pwrsyh
18:10	pwrsyh dbrt brk ʔw dbrt brtk lʔ tglʔ pwrsyhyn mṭl dpwrsyk hw
18:11	pwrsyh dbrt ʔntt ʔbwk dylydʔ mn ʔbwk <lʔ tglʔ#3#> ḥtk hy lʔ tglʔ pwrsyh
18:12	pwrsyʔ dḥth dʔbwk lʔ tglʔ qrybth/mṭl dqrybth#2#/ hy gyr dʔbwk
18:13	pwrsyʔ dḥth dʔmk lʔ tglʔ mṭl dqrybth hy dʔmk
18:14	pwrsyh dʔntt ddk lʔ tglʔ wlʔntth lʔ ttqrb mṭl dʔntt ddk hy lʔ tglʔ pwrsyh
18:15	pwrsyh dkltk lʔ tglʔ mṭl dʔntt brk hy lʔ tglʔ pwrsyh
18:16	pwrsyh dʔntt ʔḥwk lʔ tglʔ pwrsyh hw gyr dʔḥwk
18:17	pwrsyʔ dʔnttʔ wdbrth lʔ tglʔ ʔw dbrt brh ʔw dbrt brth lʔ ttqrb lmglyw pwrsyhyn qrybn ʔnyn <lk#3#> wʕwlʔ hw
18:18	wʔnttʔ ʕl ḥth lʔ tsb wtʕyq lh wtglʔ pwrsyh ʕlyh bḥyyh
18:19	wlʔnttʔ bkpsʔ dṭmʔwth lʔ ttqrb lmglyw pwrsyh
18:20	wbʔntt ḥbrk lʔ trmʔ zrʕʔ dmdmkk wttṭmʔ bh
18:21	wmn zrʕk lʔ trmʔ lmbṭnw nwkrytʔ wlʔ tṭwš šmh dʔlhk ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
18:22	wʕm dkrʔ lʔ tdmk mdmkʔ dʔnttʔ mṭwl dṭmʔ hw
18:23	wbkl bʕyrʔ lʔ trmʔ zrʕk wttṭmʔ bh wʔnttʔ lʔ tqwm qdm bʕyrʔ dttrkb mnh mṭl dṭmʔwtʔ/dṭmʔtʔ#3#/ hy
18:24	lʔ ttṭmʔwn bhlyn klhyn mṭl dbhlyn klhyn ʔtṭmʔw ʕmmʔ dšdʔ ʔnʔ mn qdmykwn
18:25	wʔtṭnpt ʔrʕʔ wprʕt ʕwlh ʕlyh wsrqt ʔrʕʔ ʕmwryh
18:26	ṭrw qymy wdyny wlʔ tʕbdwn ḥd mn hlyn klhwn ḥṭhʔ lʔ ʔntwn wlʔ ʔylyn dmtpnyn lwty dʕmryn byntkwn
18:27	mṭl dhlyn klhwn ḥṭhʔ ʕbdw ʔnšy ʔtrʔ dmn qdmykwn wʔtṭnpt/wʔtṭmʔt#3#/ ʔrʕʔ
18:28	lʔ tṭmʔwnh lʔrʕʔ dlʔ tsrqkwn ʔyk/ʔyknʔ#3#/ dsrqt lʕmʔ dmn qdmykwn
18:29	mṭl dkl mn dʕbd ḥd mn hlyn klhwn ḥṭhʔ nʔbdn npštʔ dʕbdn mn gw ʕmhyn
18:30	ṭrw nṭwrty wlʔ tʕbdwn <ʔyk ḥd#3#> mn nmwsʔ dḥṭhʔ dʕbdw dqdmykwn wlʔ ttṭmʔwn bhwn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn
19:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
19:02	mll ʕm klh knwštʔ dbny ʔysryl wʔmr lhwn hww qdyšyn mṭl dqdyš ʔnʔ ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn
19:03	gbr mn ʔbwhy wmn ʔmh dḥlw wṭrw pwqdny mṭl dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn
19:04	lʔ ttpnwn btr šʔdʔ wʔlhʔ dnsktʔ lʔ tʕbdwn lkwn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn
19:05	wʔn dbḥyn ʔntwn dbḥʔ šlmʔ lmryʔ mqblʔ dbḥw
19:06	wbywmʔ dmtdbḥyn ntʔklwn wlywmʔ/wʔp lywmʔ#23#/ ʔḥrnʔ ntʔklwn wmdm dytr lywmʔ dtltʔ bnwrʔ nʔqd wlʔ ntʔkl
19:07	wʔn mtʔklw ntʔkl bywmʔ dtltʔ/tlytyʔ#3#/ msly hw wlʔ ntqbl/ntʔkl#3#/
19:08	wmn dʔkl mnh ḥṭhʔ nqbl mṭl dqwdšh <hw#3#> dmryʔ ṭwš wtʔbd npšʔ hy mn ʕmh
19:09	wmʔ dḥṣdyn ʔntwn ḥṣdʔ dʔrʕkwn lʔ tgmrwn sprʔ dḥqltkwn lmḥṣd wlqṭʔ dḥṣdkwn/dḥṣydytwn#3#/ lʔ tlqṭwn
19:10	wkrmykwn lʔ tbʕrwn wntrʔ dzytykwn lʔ tlqṭwn ʔlʔ šbwqw ʔnwn lmsknʔ wlʔylyn dmtpnyn lwty mṭl dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn
19:11	lʔ tgnbwn lʔ tkdbwn lʔ tdglwn ʔnš bḥbrh
19:12	lʔ tʔmwn bšmy bkdbwtʔ/bdglwtʔ#3#/ wtṭwšwn šmh dʔlhkwn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
19:13	lʔ tṭlwm lḥbrk wlʔ tdbrywhy bqṭyrʔ lʔ nbwt ʔgrʔ dʔgyrʔ lwtk ʕdmʔ lṣprʔ/lšprʔ#3#/
19:14	lʔ tṣḥʔ lḥršʔ wqdm ʕwyrʔ lʔ tsym twqltʔ ʔlʔ dḥl mn ʔlhk ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
19:15	lʔ tʕbdwn ʕwlʔ bdynʔ wlʔ tsb bʔpy msknʔ wʔp lʔ bʔpy rbʔ ʔlʔ bzdyqwtʔ dwn ḥbrk
19:16	lʔ tʔkwl qrṣʔ dʕmk wlʔ tqwm ʕl dmʔ dḥbrk mṭl dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
19:17	lʔ tsnʔ lʔḥwk blbk ʔlʔ/ʔlw#3#/ mksw ʔksyhy lḥbrk dlʔ mṭlth tqbl ḥṭhʔ
19:18	lʔ tṭr bʕldbbwtʔ lbny ʕmk ʔlʔ rḥm lḥbrk ʔyk npšk ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
19:19	ṭrw pwqdny bʕyrkwn lʔ trkbwn ḥlṭʔ wḥqltkwn lʔ tzrʕwn ḥlṭʔ wmrṭwṭʔ dḥlṭʔ dptykyn lʔ tlbšwn
19:20	wgbrʔ dndmk ʕm ʔnttʔ mdmkʔ dzrʕʔ wʔmth hy zbynʔ/dzbynʔ#3#/ lh lgbrʔ wmtprqw lʔ ʔtprqt wḥʔrwtʔ lʔ ʔtyhbt lh šʔwlʔ nhwwn ʕlyhwn wlʔ ntqṭlwn mṭl dlʔ hwt mḥrrʔ
19:21	wnytʔ qwrbnh lmryʔ ltrʕʔ dmškn zbnʔ dkrʔ dḥṭhʔ
19:22	wnḥsʔ ʕlwhy khnʔ bdkrʔ dḥṭhʔ qdm mryʔ ʕl ḥṭhʔ dḥṭʔ wnštbq lh ḥṭhʔ dḥṭʔ
19:23	wmʔ dʕltwn lʔrʕʔ wnṣbtwn kl ʔylnʔ dmʔkwltʔ šbwqw ʔnwn tlt šnyn wlʔ tʔklwn mn pʔryhwn
19:24	wbšntʔ dʔrbʕ nhwwn klhwn pʔryhwn qwdšʔ wšwbḥʔ lmryʔ
19:25	wbšntʔ dḥmš ʔkwlw pʔryhwn wnwspwn lkwn ʕllthwn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn
19:26	lʔ tʔklwn dmʔ lʔ tnḥšwn bḥywt knpʔ lʔ tqṣmwn
19:27	lʔ trbwn sʕrʔ dryšykwn wlʔ tḥblwn pʔtʔ ddqnykwn
19:28	wḥwrṭtʔ ʕl npšʔ lʔ tʕbdwn bbsrkwn/bkwn#3#/ wktbʔ dnwqdtʔ lʔ tʕbdwn bkwn/lkwn#3#/ ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ <ʔlhkwn#3#>
19:29	lʔ tps lbrtk dtznʔ dlʔ tznʔ ʔrʕʔ wttmlʔ ʔrʕʔ ḥṭytʔ
19:30	ʔlʔ ṭrw pwqdny wmn mqdšy dḥlw ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
19:31	lʔ tʔzlwn btr zkwrʔ wydwʕʔ wlʔ tšʔlwn ʔnwn dlʔ ttṭmʔwn bhwn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn
19:32	mn qdm sbʔ hwyt qʔm whwyt myqr lmn dqšyš mnk wdḥl mn ʔlhk ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ <ʔlhk#3#>
19:33	wkd nʕmr ʕmkwn ʔynʔ dmtpnʔ lwty lʔ tʕlbwnh
19:34	ʔlʔ ʔkwtkwn wmnkwn nhwʔ wʔylyn dmtpnyn lwty dʕmryn ʕmkwn/byntkwn#2#/ rḥmw ʔnwn ʔyk npškwn mṭl dʔp ʔntwn ʕmwrʔ hwytwn bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn
19:35	lʔ tʕbdwn ʕwlʔ bdynʔ bmʔstʔ wbmtqlʔ wbkyltʔ
19:36	msʔtʔ dqwštʔ wmtqlʔ dqwštʔ wkyltʔ dqwštʔ whmynʔ dqwštʔ nhwwn lkwn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn dʔpqtkwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
19:37	ṭrw klhwn pwqdny wklhwn dyny wʕbdw ʔnwn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
20:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
20:02	ʔmr lbny ʔysryl gbr gbr mn bny ʔysryl wmn ʔylyn dmtpnyn lwty dʕmryn bʔysryl dnrmʔ mn zrʕh bnwkrytʔ mtqṭlw ntqṭl gbrʔ hw wʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ nrgmwnh bkʔpʔ
20:03	wʔnʔ ʔtl rwgzy bgbrʔ hw wʔwbdywhy mn gw ʕmh ʕl dʔrmy mn zrʕh bnwkrytʔ dnṭmʔ mqdšy wnṭmʔ šmʔ dqwdšy
20:04	wʔn nrknwn ʕynyhwn ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ mn gbrʔ hw dʔrmy mn zrʕh bnwkrytʔ dlʔ/wlʔ#3#/ nqṭlwnh
20:05	ʔʕbd ʔnʔ rwgzy bgbrʔ hw wbšrbth wʔwbdywhy wlkl dṭʕyn btrh ʕl dṭʕyn btr nwkrytʔ mn gw ʕmhwn
20:06	wnpšʔ dtʔzl btr zkwrʔ wydwʕʔ wtṭʕʔ btrhwn ʔtl rwgzy bnpšʔ hy wʔwbdyh mn gw ʕmh
20:07	ʔtqdšw whww qdyšyn mṭl dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn
20:08	ṭrw pwqdny wʕbdw ʔnwn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ dmqdš ʔnʔ lkwn
20:09	wgbrʔ dnṣḥʔ lʔbwhy wlʔmh/ʔw lʔmh#3#/ mtqṭlw ntqṭl lʔbwhy wlʔmh ṣḥy dmh ʕlwhy/bryšh#3#/
20:10	wgbrʔ dngwr ʔntt gbrʔ wngwr ʔntt ḥbrh mtqṭlw ntqṭlwn <tryhwn#3#> gyrʔ wgyrtʔ
20:11	wgbrʔ dndmk ʕm ʔntt ʔbwhy pwrsyʔ dʔbwhy glʔ mtqṭlw ntqṭlwn tryhwn wdmhwn ʕlyhwn
20:12	wgbrʔ dndmk ʕm klth mtqṭlw ntqṭlwn tryhwn \mṭl dḥṭytʔ /ḥṭytʔ#3#/ ʕbdw dmhwn ʕlyhwn
20:13	wgbrʔ dndmk ʕm dkrʔ/gbrʔ#3#/ mdmkʔ dʔnttʔ ṭnpwtʔ ʕbdw tryhwn mtqṭlw ntqṭlwn <tryhwn#3#> wdmhwn ʕlyhwn
20:14	wgbrʔ dnsb ʔnttʔ wʔmh ḥṭytʔ hy bnwrʔ nwqdwnh lh wlhyn wlʔ thwʔ ḥṭytʔ byntkwn
20:15	wgbrʔ dndmk ʕm bʕyrʔ mtqṭlw ntqṭl wʔp hy bʕyrʔ ttrgm/ttqṭl#3#/
20:16	wʔnttʔ dttqrb lwt bʕyrʔ dttrkb mnh qṭwlw lʔnttʔ wʔp lbʕyrʔ mtqṭlw ntqṭlwn wdmhwn ʕlyhwn
20:17	wgbrʔ dnsb ḥth brt ʔbwhy ʔw brt ʔmh wnḥzʔ pwrsyh wʔp hy tḥzʔ pwrsyh ḥsdʔ hw nʔbdwn qdm bny ʕmhwn pwrsyʔ dḥth glʔ ʕwlhwn/ʕthwn#3#/ nqblwn
20:18	wgbrʔ dndmk ʕm ʔnttʔ kpsnytʔ wnglʔ pwrsyh mbwʕh glʔ why glt mbwʕʔ ddmh nʔbdwn tryhwn mn gw ʕmhwn
20:19	pwrsyʔ dḥth dʔmk wdḥth dʔbwk lʔ tglʔ mṭl dqrybn ʔnyn pwrsy ʕwlhwn nqblwn
20:20	wgbrʔ dndmk ʕm ʔntt ddh pwrsyʔ dddh glʔ ḥṭythwn nqblwn wdlʔ bnyn nmwtwn
20:21	wgbrʔ dnsb ʔntt ʔḥwhy glʔ hw mṭl dpwrsyʔ dʔḥwhy glʔ dlʔ bnyn nhwwn/nmwtwn#3#/
20:22	ṭrw klhwn pwqdny wdyny wʕbdw ʔnwn wlʔ tsrqkwn ʔrʕʔ dmʕl ʔnʔ lkwn lh lmtb bh
20:23	wlʔ thlkwn bnmwsʔ dʕmmʔ dšdʔ ʔnʔ mn qdmykwn mṭl dhlyn ʕbdw wʕqt ly bhwn
20:24	wʔmrt lkwn dʔntwn tʔrtwn ʔrʕhwn wʔnʔ ʔtlyh lkwn wtʔrtwnh ʔrʕʔ dmrdyʔ ḥlbʔ wdbšʔ ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn dprštkwn mn ʕmmʔ
20:25	prwšw byt bʕyrʔ dkytʔ lṭmʔtʔ wbyt prḥtʔ dkytʔ lṭmʔtʔ wlʔ tṭmʔwn npštkwn bbʕyrʔ wbprḥtʔ wbklh rḥšʔ dʔrʕʔ dpršt lkwn lṭmʔwtʔ
20:26	wthwwn <ly#3#> qdyšyn <ly#3#> mṭl dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ qdyš/dqdyš#3#/ ʔnʔ wprštkwn mn/byt#2#/ ʕmmʔ dthwwn ly
20:27	wgbrʔ ʔw ʔnttʔ dʔyt bhwn zkwrʔ ʔw ydwʕʔ mtqṭlw ntqṭlwn wbkʔpʔ nrgmwn ʔnwn wdmhwn ʕlyhwn
21:01	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ ʔmr lkhnʔ bny ʔhrwn dʕl npšʔ dmytʔ lʔ nhwwn mtṭmʔyn bʕmhwn
21:02	ʔlʔ ʔn bqrybh dqryb lh bʔbwhy wbʔmh wbbrh wbbrth wbʔḥwhy wbḥth
21:03	btwltʔ dqrybʔ lh dlʔ hwt lgbrʔ ntṭmʔʔ
21:04	lʔ ntṭmʔ brbʔ dʕmh dlʔ ntṭnp
21:05	wlʔ nqdḥwn qwdḥtʔ bršyhwn wpʔtʔ ddqnyhwn lʔ ngrʕwn wbbsrhwn lʔ nḥrṭwn ḥwrṭtʔ
21:06	ʔlʔ nhwwn qdyšyn lʔlhhwn wlʔ nṭnpwn šmʔ dʔlhhwn mṭl dqwrbnwhy dmryʔ lḥmʔ dʔlhhwn hnwn mqrbyn wnhwwn qdyšyn
21:07	ʔnttʔ znytʔ wmṭnptʔ lʔ nsbwn wʔnttʔ dšbyqʔ mn bʕlh lʔ nsbwn mṭl dqdyš hw lʔlhh
21:08	qdšyhy mṭl dlḥmʔ dʔlhk hwyw mqrb qdyš nhwʔ lk mṭl dqdyš hw ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ dmqdš ʔnʔ lkwn
21:09	wbrt gbrʔ khnʔ kd tšrʔ lmznyw lʔbwh hw mṭnpʔ bnwrʔ tʔqd
21:10	wkhnʔ rbʔ mn ʔḥwhy dmtnsk ʕl ršh mšḥʔ dmšyḥwtʔ wdmšmlʔ ʔydh lmlbš mʔnʔ ršh lʔ nprwʕ wmʔnwhy lʔ nṣrʔ
21:11	wʕl kl npšʔ dmytʔ lʔ nʕwl wbʔbwhy wbʔmh lʔ ntṭnp
21:12	wmn mqdšʔ lʔ npwq wlʔ nṭnp/nṭwš#3#/ mqdšʔ dʔlhh mṭl dklylʔ dmšḥʔ dmšyḥwtʔ dʔlhh ʕlwhy ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
21:13	whw hnʔ ʔnttʔ btwltʔ nsb
21:14	wʔrmltʔ wšbyqtʔ wdmṭnpʔ bznywtʔ ḥdʔ mn hlyn lʔ nsb ʔlʔ btwltʔ mn ʕmh nsb ʔnttʔ
21:15	wlʔ nṭwš zrʕh bʕmh mṭl dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ dmqdš lh/ʔnʔ lkwn#3#/
21:16	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
21:17	mll ʕm ʔhrwn wʔmr lh gbrʔ mn zrʕk ldrhwn dnhwʔ bh mwmʔ lʔ ntqrb lmqrbw lḥmʔ dʔlhh
21:18	mṭl dkl gbrʔ dʔyt bh mwmʔ lʔ ntqrb gbr dḥgyr ʔw ʕwyr ʔw srm ʔw dsryʕʔ/dsryḥʔ#3#/ ʔdnh
21:19	ʔw gbrʔ dʔyt bh tbrʔ drglʔ ʔw tbrʔ dʔydʔ
21:20	ʔw kpyp ʔw zʕwr/dzʕyr#3#/ ʔw ntyryn gbynwhy ʔw ghr ʔw ḥwrwrʔ ʔyt bʕynwhy ʔw ʔyt bh grbʔ ʔw kwstn ʔw \dḥdʔ ʔškh /šgtn#3#/
21:21	kl gbrʔ dʔyt bh mwmʔ mn zrʕh dʔhrwn khnʔ lʔ ntqrb lmqrbw qwrbnh/lḥmh#3#/ dmryʔ mṭl dmwmʔ bh llḥmʔ dʔlhh lʔ ntqrb lmqrbw
21:22	lḥmʔ dʔlhh \byt qdwš /bqwdš#3#/ qwdšʔ mn qwdšʔ <lʔ#23#> nʔkwl
21:23	brm dyn lgw mn ʔpy trʕʔ lʔ nʕwl wlmdbḥʔ lʔ ntqrb mṭl dmwmʔ ʔyt bh wlʔ nṭwš mqdšy mṭl dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ dmqdš ʔnʔ lhwn
21:24	wʔmr mwšʔ lʔhrwn wlbnwhy wlklhwn bny ʔysryl
22:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
22:02	ʔmr lʔhrwn wlbnwhy wntnzrwn mn qwdšʔ dbny ʔysryl wlʔ nṭnpwn šmʔ dqwdšy mṭl dmqdšyn ʔnwn ly ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
22:03	ʔmr lhwn ldryhwn kl gbrʔ dnqrwb mn klh zrʕkwn lqwdšʔ dmqdšyn bny ʔysryl lmryʔ \kd ṭnpwth /wṭnpwth#3#/ ʔyt ʕlwhy tʔbd npšʔ hy mn \qdm ʕyny /qdmy#3#/ ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
22:04	gbr gbr mn zrʕh dʔhrwn whw grb ʔw dʔb mn qwdšʔ lʔ nʔkwl ʕdmʔ dmtdkʔ wmn dnqrwb lklh ṭmʔwtʔ dnpšʔ ʔw gbrʔ dnpwq mnh zrʕʔ dmdmkʔ
22:05	ʔw gbrʔ dnqrwb lkl rḥšʔ dṭmʔ lh ʔw bʔnšʔ/dʔnšʔ#2#/ dṭmʔ lh bklh ṭmʔwth
22:06	<kl#3#> npšʔ dtqrwb lh thwʔ ṭmʔʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ lʔ nʔkwl mn qwdšʔ ʔlʔ ʔn ʔšyg bsrh bmyʔ
22:07	wbmʕrby šmšʔ ntdkʔ whydyn nʔkwl mn qwdšʔ mṭl dlḥmh hw
22:08	wpgrʔ dtbyr lḥywtʔ lʔ nʔkwl dlʔ/wlʔ#3#/ ntṭmʔʔ bh ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
22:09	wnṭrwn nṭwrty dlʔ nqblwn ʕlyhwn ḥṭhʔ wnmwtwn bhwn mṭl dṭwšw npšthwn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ dmqdš ʔnʔ lhwn
22:10	wkl nwkryʔ lʔ nʔkwl qwdšʔ twtbʔ dkhnʔ wʔgyrʔ lʔ nʔkwl qwdšʔ wkhnʔ kd nzbn npšʔ
22:11	zbyn ksph nʔkwl mn lḥmh wylydy byth hnwn nʔklwn mn lḥmh
22:12	wbrt khnʔ kd thwʔ lgbrʔ nwkryʔ ʔp hy mn pwršnʔ dqwdšʔ lʔ tʔkwl
22:13	wbrt khnʔ kd thwʔ ʔrmltʔ wšbyqtʔ wbnyʔ lyt lh wthpwk lbyt/lwt#3#/ ʔbwh ʔyk dbṭlywth mn lḥmʔ dʔbwh tʔkwl wkl nwkryʔ lʔ nʔkwl mnh
22:14	wgbrʔ dnʔkwl qwdšʔ bṭwʕyy nwsp ḥd mn ḥmšʔ ʕlwhy wntlywhy lkhnʔ qwdšʔ
22:15	wlʔ nṭwšwn bny ʔysryl qwdšʔ dmpršyn lmryʔ
22:16	wnšqlwn/wnqblwn#3#/ ʕlyhwn ʕwlʔ wḥṭhʔ mʔ dʔklyn mn qwdšyhwn mṭl dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ dmqdš <ʔnʔ#3#> lhwn
22:17	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
22:18	mll ʕm ʔhrwn wʕm bnwhy wʕm klhwn bny ʔysryl wʔmr lhwn gbr gbr mn byt/lbyt#3#/ ʔysryl wmn ʔylyn dmtpnyn lwty dʕmryn bʔysryl dnqrb qwrbnh mn kl ndryhwn wmn kl pwršnyhwn dmqrbyn lmryʔ
22:19	yqdʔ šlmʔ lqwblʔ dkrʔ dlyt bh mwmʔ mn twrʔ wmn ʔmrʔ wmn ʕzʔ
22:20	kl wʔyt bh mwmʔ lʔ tqrbwn mṭl dlʔ hwʔ lkwn lṣbynʔ
22:21	wgbrʔ dnqrb dbḥʔ šlmʔ lmryʔ lmprš/dnprwš#3#/ ndrʔ ʔw pwršnʔ mn twrʔ ʔw mn ʕzʔ mʔ dlyt bh mwmʔ ntqbl/ntqrb#3#/ ʔn kl mwm/mdm#3#/ lyt bh
22:22	dʕwyr ʔw dtbyr ʔw dḥzz ʔw dršl ʔw dgrb ʔw dqsdn lʔ tqrbwn ḥd mn hlyn lmryʔ wqwrbnʔ mn hlyn lʔ tsymwn/tsqwn#3#/ ʕl mdbḥʔ lmryʔ
22:23	wtwrʔ wʔmrʔ dsryʕʔ ʔdnh ʔw dkryʔ ʔlyth lpwršnʔ tʕbdywhy brm lndrʔ lʔ ntqbl
22:24	wdrṣyṣ wdpsyq wdqṭyʕ lʔ tqrbwn lmryʔ wlʔ tʕbdwn bʔrʕkwn
22:25	wmn yd br nwkryʔ lʔ tqrbwn lḥmʔ dʔlhkwn mn hlyn klhwn mṭl dmḥblyn ʔnwn wmwmʔ ʔyt bhwn lʔ mtqblyn mnkwn
22:26	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
22:27	twrʔ ʔw ʔmrʔ ʔw gdyʔ kd ntyld nhwʔ šbʕʔ ywmyn btr ʔmh wmn ywmʔ dtmnyʔ wlhl ntqbl qwrbnh qwrbnʔ lmryʔ
22:28	wtwrʔ ʔw ʕrbʔ lh wlbrh lʔ tkswn bywmʔ ḥd
22:29	wʔn tdbḥwn dbḥʔ dtwdytʔ lmryʔ lqwblʔ dwbḥwhy
22:30	wbh bywmʔ hw ntʔkl wlʔ twtrwn mnh lṣprʔ/lšprʔ#3#/ ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
22:31	ṭrw pwqdny wʕbdw ʔnwn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
22:32	wlʔ tṭnpwn/tṭmʔwn#3#/ šmʔ dqwdšy dʔtqdš bynt/bgw#3#/ bny ʔysryl ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ dmqdš <ʔnʔ#3#> lkwn
22:33	dʔpqtkwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn dʔhwʔ lkwn ʔlhʔ ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
23:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
23:02	mll ʕm bny ʔysryl wʔmr lhwn ʕdʕʔdwhy dmryʔ dtqrwn/tqrwn#3#/dtṭrwn#3#/ ʔnwn qryʔ wqdyšʔ hlyn ʔnwn ʕdʕʔdy
23:03	štʔ ywmyn tʕbdwn ʕbdʔ wywmʔ/wbywmʔ#3#/ šbyʕyʔ šbtʔ wnyḥʔ thwʔ qwdšʔ lmryʔ wkl ʕbd lʔ tʕbdwn šbtʔ hy lmryʔ bklh byt mʕmrkwn
23:04	hlyn ʕdʕʔdwhy dmryʔ qryʔ wqdyšʔ tqrwn/tṭrwn#3#/ ʔnwn bzbnyhwn
23:05	byrḥʔ qdmyʔ bʔrbʕsrʔ byrḥʔ byt rmšʔ pṣḥʔ lmryʔ
23:06	wbḥmšʕsrʔ bh byrḥʔ hnʔ ʕdʕʔdʔ dpṭyrʔ lmryʔ šbʕʔ ywmyn pṭyrʔ tʔklwn
23:07	ywmʔ qdmyʔ qrʔ wqdyš nhwʔ lkwn wkl ʕbd dpwlḥnʔ lʔ tʕbdwn
23:08	wqrbw qwrbnʔ lmryʔ šbʕʔ ywmyn wywmʔ dšbʕʔ nhwʔ qrʔ wqdyš wkl ʕbd dpwlḥnʔ lʔ tʕbdwn
23:09	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
23:10	mll ʕm bny ʔysrʔyl wʔmr lhwn mʔ dʕltwn lʔrʕʔ dyhb ʔnʔ lkwn wḥṣdtwn ḥṣdh ʔytw kpʔ dryš ḥṣdkwn lkhnʔ
23:11	wnpršyh lkpʔ qdm mryʔ lqwblʔ wbtr ywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ npršyh khnʔ
23:12	wtʕbdwn bywmʔ/bhw ywmʔ#3#/ dpršyn ʔntwn kpʔ ʔmrʔ br šntʔ dlyt bh mwmʔ yqdʔ šlmʔ lmryʔ
23:13	wqwrbnh tryn ʕsrwnyn mn trtyn sʔyn nšypʔ dpyl bmšḥʔ qwrbnʔ lmryʔ lryḥ swtʔ/nyḥʔ#23#/ wnwqyh ḥmrʔ rwbʕh dhmynʔ
23:14	wlḥmʔ wqlytʔ wpryktʔ lʔ tʔklwn ʕdmʔ lywmʔ hnʔ ʕdmʔ lywmʔ dmytyn ʔntwn qwrbnʔ lʔlhkwn nmwsʔ lʕlm ldrykwn bklh byt mʕmrkwn
23:15	wmnw lkwn mn btrh dywmʔ mn ywmʔ dmytyn ʔntwn kpʔ dpwršnʔ šbʕ šbwʕn šlmlmn nhwyn <lkwn#3#>
23:16	ʕdmʔ lbtr šbwʕtʔ šbyʕytʔ mnw ḥmšyn ywmyn wqrbw smydʔ mn ḥdtʔ lmryʔ
23:17	mn byt mʕmrkwn ʔytw lḥmʔ dpwršnʔ trtyn ḥḥrn mn tryn ʕsrwnyn dnšypʔ nhwyn wḥmyʕ ntʔpyn bkrʔ/lḥmʔ dbkrʔ#23#/ lmryʔ
23:18	wqrbw ʕl lḥmʔ šbʕʔ ʔmryn bny šntʔ dlyt bhwn mwmʔ wtwrʔ ḥd br bqrʔ wtryn dkryn nhwwn yqdʔ šlmʔ lmryʔ wsmydhwn wnwqyhwn qwrbnʔ lryḥ swtʔ/nyḥʔ#23#/ lmryʔ
23:19	wʕbd ṣpryʔ ḥd dʕzʔ ḥlp ḥṭhʔ wtryn ʔmryn bny šntʔ ldbḥʔ šlmʔ
23:20	wnprwš ʔnwn khnʔ ʕl lḥmʔ dbkrʔ pwršnʔ qdm mryʔ ʕl tryn ʔmryn qwdšʔ nhwwn qdm mryʔ lkhnʔ
23:21	wqrw lywmʔ hnʔ qryʔ wqdyšʔ wkl ʕbdʔ dpwlḥnʔ lʔ tʕbdwn nmwsʔ lʕlm ldrykwn bklh byt mʕmrkwn
23:22	wmʔ dḥṣdyn ʔntwn ḥṣdʔ dʔrʕkwn lʔ tgmrwn sprʔ dḥqltkwn bḥṣdkwn wlqṭʔ dḥṣdkwn lʔ tlqṭwn ʔlʔ lmsknʔ wlʔylyn dmtpnyn lwty šbwqw ʔnwn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn
23:23	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
23:24	mll ʕm bny ʔysryl wʔmr lhwn bḥd byrḥʔ byrḥʔ šbyʕyʔ nhwʔ lkwn nyḥʔ wdwkrnʔ dqrytʔ qryʔ wqdyšʔ nhwʔ lkwn
23:25	wkwl ʕbd dpwlḥnʔ lʔ tʕbdwn wqrbw qwrbnʔ lmryʔ
23:26	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh mll ʕm bny ʔysryl wʔmr lhwn
23:27	bʕsrtʔ byrḥʔ hnʔ dšbʕʔ ywmʔ hw dḥwsyʔ qryʔ wqdyšʔ nhwʔ lkwn wmkkw npštkwn wqrbw qwrbnʔ lmryʔ
23:28	wkl ʕbd lʔ tʕbdwn bh bywmʔ hnʔ mṭl dywmʔ hw dḥwsyʔ lmḥsyw ʕlykwn qdm mryʔ ʔlhkwn
23:29	mṭl dkl npšʔ dlʔ ttmkk bh bywmʔ hnʔ tʔbd mn ʕmh
23:30	wkl npšʔ dtʕbd kl ʕbd bh bywmʔ hnʔ \ʔwbdyh lnpšʔ /tʔbd npšʔ#3#/ hy mn gw ʕmh
23:31	wkl ʕbd lʔ tʕbdwn nmwsʔ lʕlm ldrykwn bklh byt mʕmrkwn
23:32	šbt šbʔ hy lkwn wmkkw npštkwn btšʕtʔ byrḥʔ brmšʔ byt rmšʔ mn rmšʔ wʕdmʔ lrmšʔ ʔšbtw šbykwn
23:33	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
23:34	mll ʕm bny ʔysryl wʔmr lhwn bḥmšʕsrʔ byrḥʔ hnʔ dšbʕʔ ʕbdw ʕdʕʔdʔ dmṭlʔ šbʕʔ ywmyn qdm mryʔ
23:35	ywmʔ qdmyʔ qryʔ/qrʔ#3#/ wqdyšʔ nhwʔ lkwn wkl ʕbd dpwlḥnʔ lʔ tʕbdwn
23:36	šbʕʔ ywmyn wqrbw qwrbnʔ lmryʔ wywmʔ dtmnyʔ qryʔ wqdyšʔ nhwʔ lkwn wqrbw qwrbnʔ lmryʔ whwytwn knšyn wkl ʕbd dpwlḥnʔ lʔ tʕbdwn
23:37	hlyn ʔnwn ʕdʕʔdwhy dmryʔ dtqrwn ʔnwn qryʔ wqdyšʔ \wtqrbwn bhwn /wbhwn#3#/ qwrbnʔ lmryʔ yqdʔ šlmʔ wsmydʔ wnwqyʔ wdbḥʔ zdqʔ dywmʔ bywmʔ
23:38	sṭr mn šbwhy dmryʔ wsṭr mn qwrbnykwn wsṭr mn mwhbtkwn wsṭr mn klhwn ndrykwn wsṭr mn klh pwršnkwn dyhbyn ʔntwn lmryʔ
23:39	brm dyn bḥmšʕsrʔ byrḥʔ/dyrḥʔ#3#/ dšbʕʔ mʔ dḥmlyn ʔntwn ʕlltʔ dʔrʕʔ ʕbdw ʕdʕʔdʔ lmryʔ šbʕʔ ywmyn bywmʔ qdmyʔ bṭlnʔ wbywmʔ dtmnyʔ nyḥʔ
23:40	sbw lkwn bywmʔ qdmyʔ pʔry ʔylnʔ špyrʔ ʔṭrwgʔ wlbwtʔ ddqlʔ wʔsʔ wʕrbʔ wḥdw qdm mryʔ ʔlhkwn šbʕʔ ywmyn klhwn dbyt ʔysrʔyl
23:41	wʕwbdwhy ʕdʕʔdʔ hnʔ lmryʔ šbʕʔ ywmyn bšntʔ nmwsʔ lʕlm ldrykwn byrḥʔ dšbʕʔ ʕwbdwhy
23:42	bmṭlʔ tbw šbʕʔ ywmyn klhwn dbyt ʔysryl ntbwn bmṭlʔ
23:43	dndʕwn drykwn dbmṭlʔ ʔwtbt lbny ʔysrʔyl kd ʔpqt ʔnwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn
23:44	wʔmr mwšʔ lbny ʔysryl ʕdʕʔdwhy dmryʔ
24:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
24:02	pqd lbny ʔysryl wnytwn lk mšḥʔ dkyʔ dzytʔ ʕṣyrʔ lmnhrw šrgʔ ʔmynʔyt
24:03	lbr mn ʔpy trʕʔ dshdwtʔ bmšknzbnʔ wnhwʔ sdr lhwn ʔhrwn mn rmšʔ wʕdmʔ lṣprʔ qdm mryʔ ʔmynʔyt nmwsʔ lʕlm ldrykwn
24:04	ʕl mnrtʔ rbtʔ nhwʔ sdr šrgʔ qdm mryʔ ʔmynʔyt
24:05	wsb nšypʔ wʔpy trtʕsrʔ ḥḥrn mn tryn ʕsrwnyn ḥḥwrtʔ ḥdʔ
24:06	wsdwr ʔnyn tryn sdryn št št bsdrʔ ʕl ptwrʔ dkyʔ qdm mryʔ
24:07	wsym/dsym#3#/ ʕl sdrʔ lbwntʔ dkytʔ qdm mryʔ wnhwʔ llḥmʔ dwkrnʔ wqwrbnʔ lmryʔ
24:08	bywmʔ dštʔ nhwʔ sdr lhwn ʔhrwn qdm mryʔ ʔmynʔyt mn lwt bny ʔysryl
24:09	qymʔ lʕlm nhwʔ lʔhrwn wlbnwhy wnʔklwnh bʔtrʔ qdyšʔ mṭl dqdwš qwdšyn hw lh mn qwrbnwhy dmryʔ nmwsʔ lʕlm
24:10	wnpq br ʔnttʔ ʔysrlytʔ whw br gbrʔ hwʔ mṣryʔ bynt bny ʔysryl wnṣw bmšrytʔ br ʔysrlytʔ wgbrʔ ʔysrlyʔ
24:11	wprš br ʔnttʔ ʔysrlytʔ šmʔ wṣḥy wʔytywhy lwt mwšʔ wšmʔ dʔmh šlwmyt brt dbry mn šbṭʔ ddn
24:12	wḥbšwhy byt nṭwrtʔ dntpšq lhwn mn pwmh dmryʔ
24:13	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
24:14	ʔpqwhy lhw dṣḥy lbr mn mšrytʔ wkl dšmʕwhy nsymwn ʔydyhwn ʕl ršh wnrgmwnh kwlh knwštʔ
24:15	wʕm bny ʔysryl mll wʔmr lhwn gbr gbr kd nṣḥʔ lʔlhh nqbl ḥṭhh
24:16	wmn dnprwš šmh dmryʔ mtqṭlw ntqṭl wmrgm nrgmwnh klh knwštʔ ʔynʔ dmtpnʔ lwty ʔw br ʔysryl mʔ dprš šmy ntqṭl
24:17	wgbrʔ ʔn nqṭwl kl npšʔ dbrnšʔ mtqṭlw ntqṭl
24:18	wdnqṭwl npšʔ dbʕyrʔ nprwʕ/ntl#3#/ npšʔ ḥlp npšʔ <dbʕyrʔ#3#>
24:19	wgbrʔ ʔn nʕbd mwmʔ bḥbrh ʔyk dʕbd <hw#3#> mwmʔ bḥbrh hknʔ ntʕbd lh
24:20	tbrʔ ḥlp tbrʔ ʕynʔ ḥlp ʕynʔ šnʔ ḥlp šnʔ ʔyk dʕbd mwmʔ bḥbrh hknʔ ntʕbd lh
24:21	wdnqṭwl bʕyrʔ nprʕyh wdnqṭwl npšʔ ntqṭl
24:22	dynʔ ḥd nhwʔ lkwn wlʔynʔ dmtpnʔ lwty wlbr ʔysryl hknʔ nhwʔ ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn
24:23	wʔmr mwšʔ lbny ʔysryl wʔpqwhy lhw dṣḥy lbr mn mšrytʔ wrgmwhy bkʔpʔ wmyt wʕbdw bny ʔysryl ʔyk dpqd mryʔ lmwšʔ
25:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ bṭwrʔ dsyny wʔmr lh
25:02	mll ʕm bny ʔysryl wʔmr lhwn mʔ dʕltwn lʔrʕʔ dyhb ʔnʔ lkwn ywrtnʔ tšbt ʔrʕʔ šbtʔ lmryʔ
25:03	št šnyn tzrʕwn ḥqltkwn wšt šnyn tksḥwn krmykwn wšt šnyn hwytwn ḥmlyn ʕlltkwn
25:04	wšntʔ/bšntʔ#3#/ dšbʕ šbt šbʔ thwʔ lʔrʕʔ wthwʔ lkwn šbtʔ lmryʔ ḥqltkwn lʔ tzrʕwn wkrmykwn lʔ tksḥwn
25:05	wkʔtʔ dḥṣdkwn lʔ tḥṣdwn wʕnbʔ dšbštykwn lʔ tqṭpwn šntʔ dšbtʔ thwʔ lʔrʕʔ
25:06	wthwʔ lkwn šbtʔ dʔrʕʔ lmʔkwltʔ lkwn wlʕbdykwn wlʔmhtkwn wlʔgyrykwn wltwtbʔ dʕmryn ʕmkwn
25:07	wlbʕyrkwn wlḥywtʔ dbʔrʕkwn thwʔ lkwn kwlh ʕlltʔ lmʔkwltʔ
25:08	wmnw lkwn šbʕ šnyn dšbʔ šbʕ šnyn ʕl šbʕ zbnyn wnhwwn lkwn ywmtʔ dšbʕ \šbʔ dšnyʔ /šnyʔ dšbʔ#3#/ ʔrbʕyn wtšʕ šnyn
25:09	wqrw bšypwrʔ dywbbʔ bʕsrtʔ byrḥʔ dšbʕʔ bywmʔ dḥwsyʔ qrw šypwrʔ bklh ʔrʕkwn
25:10	wqdšwh lšnt ḥmšyn šnyn wqrw ḥʔrwtʔ bʔrʕʔ <klh#3#> lklhwn ʕmwryh wpwnyʔ nhwʔ lkwn whpwkw ʔnš lyrtwth wʔnš lšrbth
25:11	wpwnyʔ bšnt ḥmšyn šnyn nhwʔ lkwn lʔ tzrʕwn ʔrʕkwn wlʔ/ʔp lʔ#2#/ tḥṣdwn kʔth wlʔ tqṭpwn šbštyh
25:12	mṭl dpwnyʔ hw wqwdšʔ nhwʔ lkwn wmn ḥqlʔ ʔkwlw ʕlltʔ
25:13	bšntʔ hdʔ dpwnyʔ whpwkw ʔnš lyrtwth
25:14	wʔn tzbn zbnʔ lḥbrk ʔw ʔn tzbn mn ḥbrk lʔ tʕlbwn gbr lʔḥwhy
25:15	bmnynʔ dšnyʔ btr pwnyʔ zbn mn ḥbrk wbmnynʔ dšnyʔ dʕlltʔ nzbn lk
25:16	lpwt swgʔʔ dšnyʔ tsgʔ zbynth wlpwt zʕwrwtʔ dšnyʔ tzʕr zbynth mṭl dbmnynʔ hw dʕlltʔ dšnyʔ mzbn lk
25:17	wlʔ tʕlbwn ʔnš lʔḥwhy wdḥl mn ʔlhk mṭl dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhk
25:18	ʕbdw pwqdny wṭrw dyny wʕbdw ʔnwn wtbw bʔrʕʔ bšlyʔ
25:19	wttl ʔrʕʔ pʔryh wtʔklwn wtsbʕwn wttbwn bh bšlyʔ
25:20	wʔn ʔmryn ʔntwn mnʔ nʔkwl bšntʔ dšbʕ dlʔ zrʕyn ḥnn/ʔnḥnn#3#/ wlʔ ḥmlynn ʕllth
25:21	ʔšdr lkwn bwrkty bšntʔ štytytʔ wtʕbd ʕlltʔ dtlt šnyn
25:22	wtzrʕwn bšntʔ tmynytʔ wtʔklwn mn ʕlltʔ ʕtyqtʔ ʕdmʔ lšntʔ tšyʕytʔ ʕdmʔ dʕʔlʔ ʕlltʔ hwytwn ʔklyn ʕtyqʔ
25:23	wʔrʕʔ bšrrʔ lʔ tzdbn lʕlm mṭl ddyly hy ʔrʕʔ wʕmwrʔ ʔntwn wtwtbʔ ʕmy
25:24	wbklh ʔrʕʔ dyrtwtkwn pwrqnʔ dʔrʕʔ hwytwn yhbyn
25:25	wʔn ntmskn ʔḥwk wnzbn mn yrtwth nʔtʔ qrybh dqryb lh nprwq zbnh dʔḥwhy
25:26	wʔn lyt mn dprq wnmṭʔ bʔydhy wnškḥ mst pwrqnh
25:27	nḥšwb šnyʔ dzbynth/dzbynwtʔ#3#/ wnpnʔ ytyrʔ lgbrʔ dzbn mnh wnhpwk lyrtwth
25:28	wʔlʔ mṭʔ bʔydwhy ʔyk dnprʕywhy thwʔ zbyntʔ šryrʔ lmn dzbnh ʕdmʔ lšntʔ dpwnyʔ wnpwq bpwnyʔ wnhpwk <hwʔ#3#> lyrtwth
25:29	wgbrʔ ʔn nzbn byt mʕmrʔ dqrytʔ dʔyt lh šwrʔ nhwʔ pwrqnh ʕdmʔ dšlmʔ šntʔ dzbynth mn ʕdn lʕdn nhwʔ pwrqnh
25:30	wʔn lʔ mtprq ʕdmʔ dšlmʔ/dmlyʔ#3#/ lh šntʔ šlmtʔ nqwm bytʔ dbqrytʔ dʔyt lh šwrʔ bšrrʔ lmn dzbnh wnhwʔ ldrwhy wlʔ npwq mnh bpwnyʔ
25:31	btʔ dyn dšṭḥʔ \dlʔ ḥdr lhwn šwrʔ /dḥdr lhwn šwrʔ#2#/ ʔyk ḥqlʔ dʔrʕʔ ntḥšbwn pwrqnʔ nhwʔ lhwn wbpwnyʔ npwq
25:32	wqwryʔ dlwyʔ btʔ dbqwryʔ dyrtwthwn pwrqnʔ lʕlm nhwʔ llwyʔ
25:33	wdnprwq pwrqnʔ mn lwyʔ npwq mn zbnh dbytʔ wqrytʔ dyrtwth bpwnyʔ mṭl dbtʔ dqwryʔ dlwyʔ hnwn ʔnwn yrtwthwn bynt bny ʔysryl
25:34	wḥqlʔ dbspry qwryhwn lʔ tzdbn mṭl dywrtnʔ hy lhwn lʕlm
25:35	wʔn ntmskn ʔḥwk wnrkn ʔydh ʕmk lʔ tʔḥdywhy ʔyk ʕmwrʔ wʔyk twtbʔ wnḥʔ ʕmk
25:36	lʔ tsb mnh qṣṣʔ wrbytʔ wdḥl mn ʔlhk wnḥʔ ʔḥwk ʕmk
25:37	kspk lʔ ttl lh bqṣṣʔ wbrbytʔ lʔ ttl mʔkwltk
25:38	ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn dʔpqtkwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn dʔtl lkwn ʔrʕʔ dknʕn wʔhwʔ lkwn ʔlhʔ
25:39	wʔn ntmskn ʔḥwk wnzdbn lk lʔ tplwḥ bh pwlḥnʔ dʕbdʔ
25:40	ʔyk ʔgyrʔ wʔyk twtbʔ nhwʔ/nplwḥ#3#/ ʕmk ʕdmʔ lšntʔ dpwnyʔ nhwʔ ʕmk
25:41	wnpwq mn lwtk hw wbnwhy ʕmh wnhpwk lšrbth wlyrtwtʔ dʔbwhy nhpwk
25:42	mṭl dʕbdy ʔnwn dʔpqt ʔnwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn lʔ nzdbnwn bzbnʔ dʕbdʔ
25:43	wlʔ tplḥywhy pwlḥnʔ qšyʔ wdḥl mn ʔlhk
25:44	wʕbdykwn wʔmhtkwn dnhwwn lkwn mn ʕmmʔ dbḥdrykwn mnhwn tzbnwn ʕbdʔ wʔmhtʔ
25:45	wʔp mn bny twtbʔ dʕmryn ʕmkwn mnhwn tqnwn wmn šrbthwn dʕmkwn dʔwldw bʔrʕkwn wnhwwn lkwn ywrtnʔ
25:46	wʔwrtw ʔnwn lbnykwn btrkwn lmʔrt ywrtnʔ wlʕlm bhwn tplḥwn wbʔḥykwn bny ʔysrʔyl gbr bʔḥwhy lʔ tplḥwn pwlḥnʔ qšyʔ
25:47	wʔn spqʔ bʔydwhy dʕmwrʔ wdtwtbʔ dʕmk wntmskn ʔḥwk ʕmh wnzdbn lʕmwrʔ wltwtbʔ dʕmk ʔw lʔylydʔ dšrbtʔ dʕmwrʔ dʕmk
25:48	mn btr dnzdbn pwrqnʔ nhwʔ lh ḥd mn ʔḥwhy nprqywhy
25:49	ʔw ddh ʔw br ddh nprqywhy mn qryb bsrh mn šrbth nprqywhy wʔn tspq bʔydwhy wntprq
25:50	nḥšwb ʕm zbwnh mn šntʔ dʔzdbn lh ʕdmʔ lšntʔ dpwnyʔ wnhwʔ kspʔ dzbnh bmnynʔ dšnyʔ ʔyk ywmtʔ dʔgyrʔ nhwʔ ʕmh
25:51	wʔn qymn twb swgʔʔ dšnyʔ lpwthyn nhpk/nhpwk#23#/ pwrqnh mn kspʔ dzbynth
25:52	wʔn qlyl nštḥr bšnyʔ ʕdmʔ lšntʔ dpwnyʔ nḥšwb/nḥšb#3#/ ʕmh wʔyk lpwt šnwhy nhpk pwrqnh
25:53	ʔyk ʔgyrʔ šnʔ bšnʔ nhwʔ ʕmh lʔ nplḥywhy qšyʔyt lʕnyk
25:54	wʔn lʔ ntprq bhlyn npwq bšntʔ dpwnyʔ hw wbnwhy ʕmh
25:55	mṭl dbny ʔysrʔyl dyly ʔnwn ʕbdʔ ʕbdy ʔnwn dʔpqt ʔnwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn

01:48	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh

01:50	ʔlʔ ʔšlṭ llwyʔ ʕl mšknʔ dshdwtʔ wʕl klhwn mʔnwhy wʕl kl mdm dʔyt bh hnwn nšqlwnh lmšknh \wlklhwn mʔnwhy /wlmʔnwhy#3#/ whnwn nšmšwnh dḥdr mšknʔ nhwwn šryn
01:51	wmʔ dšql mšknʔ nrknwnh lwyʔ wmʔ dšrʔ mšknʔ nqymwnh lwyʔ wnwkryʔ dqrb lh ntqṭl
01:52	wnšrwn bny ʔysryl gbr bmšryth wgbr bṭwlqh bḥylwthwn
01:53	wlwyʔ nhwwn šryn ḥdr mšknʔ dshdwtʔ wlʔ nhwʔ rwgzʔ ʕl <klh#3#> knwštʔ dbny ʔysryl wnṭrwn lwyʔ mṭrtʔ dmšknʔ dshdwtʔ
01:54	wʕbdw bny ʔysryl ʔyk/kl mdm#3#/ dpqd mryʔ lmwšʔ hknʔ ʕbdw
02:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʕm ʔhrwn wʔmr lhwn
02:02	gbr bṭwlqh bʔtrwtʔ dbyt ʔbhyhwn nšrwn bny ʔysryl mn qbwl/lwqbl#3#/ wḥdr /mšknzbnʔ/mšknʔ#3#/ nšrwn
02:03	wdšryn lwqdm mn mdnḥʔ ṭwlqʔ dmšrytʔ dyhwdʔ lḥylhwn wršʔ dbny yhwdʔ nḥšwn br ʕmyndb
02:04	wmnynʔ dḥylh šbʕyn wʔrbʕʔ ʔlpyn wštmʔʔ
02:05	wdšryn lwth šbṭʔ dʔyskr wršʔ dbny ʔyskr ntnyʔyl br ṣwʕr
02:06	wmnynʔ dḥylh ḥmšyn wʔrbʕʔ ʔlpyn wʔrbʕmʔʔ
02:07	wšbṭʔ dzbwlwn wršʔ dbny zbwlwn ʔlyb br ḥlwn
02:08	wmnynʔ dḥylʔ ḥmšyn wšbʕʔ ʔlpyn wʔrbʕmʔʔ
02:09	klh mnynʔ dmšrytʔ dyhwdʔ mʔʔ wtmnyn wʔštʔ ʔlpyn wʔrbʕmʔʔ lḥylwthwn qdmʔyt hnwn nhwwn šqlyn
02:10	wṭwlqʔ wmšrytʔ drwbyl mn tymnʔ lḥylhwn wršʔ dbny rwbyl ʔlyṣwr br šdʔwr
02:11	wmnynʔ dḥylh ʔrbʕyn wštʔ ʔlpyn wḥmšmʔʔ
02:12	wdšryn lwth šbṭʔ dšmʕwn wršʔ dbny šmʕwn šlmwʔyl br ṣwryšdy
02:13	wmnynʔ dḥylh ḥmšyn wtšʕʔ ʔlpyn wtltmʔʔ
02:14	wšbṭʔ dgd wršʔ dbny gd ʔlyʔsp br rʕwʔyl
02:15	wmnynʔ dḥylh ʔrbʕyn wḥmšʔ ʔlpyn wštmʔʔ wḥmšyn
02:16	klh mnynʔ dmšrytʔ drwbyl mʔʔ wḥmšyn wḥd ʔlpyn wʔrbʕmʔʔ wḥmšyn lḥylhwn btr qdmyʔ hww šqlyn
02:17	wšqlyn mšknzbnʔ mšrytʔ dlwyʔ bgw mšrytʔ ʔyk dšryn hknʔ hww šqlyn ʔnš ʕm ṭwlqh lḥylwthwn
02:18	wṭwlqʔ dmšrytʔ dʔprym lḥylhwn mn mʕrbʔ wršʔ dbny ʔprym ʔlyšmʕ br ʕmyhwd
02:19	wmnynʔ dḥylh ʔrbʕyn ʔlpyn wḥmšmʔʔ
02:20	\wdšryn lwth /wlwth#3#/ šbṭʔ dmnšʔ wršʔ dbny mnšʔ gmlyʔyl br prṣwr
02:21	wmnynʔ dḥylh tltyn wtryn ʔlpyn wmʔtyn
02:22	wšbṭʔ dbnymyn wršʔ dbny bnymyn ʔbydn br gdʕwny
02:23	wmnynʔ dḥylh tltyn wḥmšʔ ʔlpyn wʔrbʕmʔʔ
02:24	klh mnynʔ dmšrytʔ dʔprym mʔʔ wtmnyʔ ʔlpyn wmʔʔ lḥylhwn btr tryn <nhwwn#3#> nšqlwn
02:25	ṭwlqʔ dmšrytʔ ddn mn gbrʔ lḥylhwn wršʔ dbny dn ʔḥyʕzr br ʕmyšdy
02:26	wmnynʔ dḥylh štyn wtryn ʔlpyn wšbʕmʔʔ/wštmʔʔ#3#/
02:27	wdšryn/wšryn#3#/ lwth šbṭʔ dʔšyr wršʔ dbny ʔšyr pgʕʔyl br ʕkrn
02:28	wmnynʔ dḥylh ʔrbʕyn wḥd ʔlpyn wḥmšmʔʔ
02:29	wšbṭʔ dnptly wršʔ dbny nptly ʔḥydʕ br ʕynn
02:30	wmnynʔ dḥylh ḥmšyn wtltʔ ʔlpyn wʔrʕbmʔʔ
02:31	klh mnynʔ dmšrytʔ ddn mʔʔ wḥmšyn wšbʕʔ ʔlpyn wštmʔʔ bʔḥryt ṭwlqʔ nhwwn šqlyn
02:32	hlyn mnynʔ dbny ʔysryl lbyt ʔbhyhwn klhwn mnynʔ dmšrytʔ lḥylhwn štmʔʔ wtltʔ ʔlpyn wḥmšmʔʔ wḥmšyn
02:33	wlwyʔ wšbṭʔ dʔbhyhwn lʔ ʔtmnyw byt/bynt#3#/ bny ʔysryl ʔyk dpqd mryʔ lmwšʔ
02:34	wʕbdw bny ʔysryl kl/ʔyk#3#/ dpqd mryʔ lmwšʔ hknʔ ʕbd whknʔ šqlyn hww bṭwlqyhwn whknʔ šryn hww ʔnš bmšryth ʕl byt ʔbwhy
03:01	whlyn twldth dʔhrwn wdmwšʔ bywmʔ dmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ bṭwrʔ dsyny
03:02	whlyn šmhʔ dbny ʔhrwn bwkrh ndb wʔbyhw wʔlyʕzr wʔytmr
03:03	hlyn šmhʔ dbny ʔhrwn khnʔ dʔtmšḥw wšmlyw ʔydyhwn lkhnwtʔ

03:05	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
03:06	qrb lšbṭʔ dlwy wʔqymyhy qdm ʔhrwn khnʔ wnšmšwnh/wnšmʕwnh#3#/

03:11	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
03:12	hʔ ʔnʔ nsbt llwyʔ mn gw bny ʔysryl ḥlp kl bwkrʔ dptḥ kl mrbʕʔ/rḥmʔ#3#/ mn bny ʔysrʔyl dnhwwn ly lwyʔ
03:13	mṭl ddyly hw kl bwkrʔ bywmʔ dqṭlt kl bwkrʔ dbʔrʕʔ/bʔrʕʔ#3#/ dmṣryn qdšt ly kl bwkrʔ \dbny ʔysryl /dʔysrʔyl#3#/ mn ʔnšʔ wʕdmʔ lbʕyrʔ ly nhwwn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
03:14	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ bmdbrʔ dsyny wʔmr lh
03:15	mny lbny lwy lbyt ʔbhyhwn lšrbthwn kl dkrʔ mn br yrḥʔ wlʕl tmnʔ ʔnwn
03:16	wmnʔ ʔnwn mwšʔ bmlt pwmh dmryʔ ʔyk dʔtpqd
03:17	whww hlyn bny lwy bšmhyhwn gršwn wqht wmrry
03:18	whlyn šmhʔ dbny gršwn lšrbthwn lbny wšmʕy <wbny qht lšrbthwn lbny wšmʕy#2#>
03:19	wbny qht lšrbthwn ʕmrm wyṣhr wḥbrwn wʕwdyl
03:20	wbny mrry lšrbthwn mḥly wmwšy hlyn ʔnyn šrbtʔ dlwyʔ lbyt ʔbhyhwn
03:21	lgršwn šrbtʔ dlbny wšrbtʔ dšmʕy hlyn ʔnyn šrbtʔ dgršwn
03:22	wmnynhwn bmnynʔ dkl/kl#3#/ dkrʔ mn br yrḥʔ wlʕl šbʕʔ ʔlpyn wḥmšmʔʔ

03:24	wršʔ dbyt ʔbhʔ dgršwn ʔlyʔsp br ʔlyʔb
03:25	wmṭrtʔ dbny gršwn bmškn zbnʔ mšknʔ wʔpy trʕʔ wprsh wprsʔ dtrʕʔ dmškn zbnʔ
03:26	wglgʔ/wglglʔ#3#/ ddrtʔ wprsʔ dtrʕʔ ddrtʔ dʕl mšknʔ wʕl mdbḥʔ kd ḥdr wṭwnbwhy wklhwn pwlḥnwhy
03:27	wlqht šrbtʔ dʕmrm wšrbtʔ dyṣhr wšrbtʔ dḥbrwn wšrbtʔ dʕwzyl hlyn ʔnyn šrbtʔ dqht
03:28	wmnynhwn bmnynʔ dkl dkrʔ mn br yrḥʔ wlʕl tmnyʔ ʔlpyn wštmʔʔ/wtltmʔʔ#3#/ nṭry mṭrtʔ dqwdšʔ
03:29	wšrbtʔ dbyt/dbny#3#/ qht nšrwn ʕl špwlwhy dmšknʔ mn tymnʔ
03:30	wršʔ dbyt ʔbhʔ dšrbtʔ dqht ʔlyṣpn br ʕwzyl
03:31	wmṭrthwn qbwtʔ wptwrʔ wmnrtʔ wmdbḥʔ wmʔny qwdšʔ dmšmšyn bhwn wʔpy trʕʔ wkwlh pwlḥnh
03:32	wršʔ dršʔ dlwyʔ ʔlyʕzr brh dʔhrwn khnʔ dšlyṭ ʕl nṭry mṭrtʔ dqwdšʔ

03:37	wʕmwdʔ ddrtʔ kd ḥdryn wṭwnbyhwn wsmkyhwn wglgyhwn/wgyglyhwn#23#/
03:38	wdšryn qdm mšknʔ mn mdnḥʔ qdm mškn zbnʔ mn mdnḥʔ mwšʔ wʔhrwn wbnwhy dnṭryn mṭrtʔ dqwdšʔ ʕl mṭrtʔ dbny ʔysryl wnwkryʔ dqrb ntqṭl
03:39	klhwn mnynʔ dlwyʔ dmnʔ mwšʔ bmlt pwmh dmryʔ kl dkrʔ mn br yrḥʔ wlʕl ʕsryn wtryn ʔlpyn
03:40	\wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh /wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ#3#/ mny kl bwkrʔ dkrʔ/ddkrʔ#3#/ dbny ʔysryl mn br yrḥʔ wlʕl wqbl <lk#3#> mnynʔ dšmhyhwn
03:41	wtqrb ʔnwn ly llwyʔ ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ḥlp klhwn bwkrʔ dbny ʔysryl wbʕyrʔ/wdbʕyrʔ#3#/ dlwyʔ ḥlp klhwn bwkrʔ dbʕyrʔ dbny ʔysryl

03:44	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh

03:46	wpwrqnʔ/wlpwrqnʔ#3#/ dmʔtyn wšbʕyn wtltʔ dytyryn ʕl lwyʔ bwkrʔ dbny ʔysryl

04:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʕm ʔhrwn wʔmr lhwn
04:02	qblw ḥwšbnʔ dbny qht mn gw bny lwy lšrbthwn lbyt ʔbhyhwn
04:03	mn br tltyn šnyn wlʕl wʕdmʔ lbr ḥmšyn šnyn kwl dʔtʔ bḥylʔ lmʕbd ʕbdʔ bmšknzbnʔ
04:04	hnʔ hw pwlḥnʔ dbny qht dbmšknzbnʔ/bmšknzbnʔ#3#/ qdwš qwdšʔ
04:05	wnʕwl ʔhrwn wbnwhy mʔ dšqlʔ mšrytʔ wnḥtwn/nytwn#3#/ ʔpy trʕʔ dprys/dprsʔ#3#/ wnkswn bh lqbwtʔ/qbwtʔ#3#/ dshdwtʔ
04:06	wnprswn ʕlyh qrmʔ dmškʔ dssgwnʔ wnprswn nḥtʔ gmyrʔ dtkltʔ mn lʕl wnsymwn qwpyh
04:07	wʕl ptwrʔ dʔpʔ nprswn/nsymwn#3#/ nḥtʔ dtkltʔ wnrmwn bh mgsʔ wkpʔ wmnqytʔ wṭrwlʔ dnwqyʔ wlḥmʔ ʔmynʔyt ʕlwhy nhwʔ
04:08	wnprswn ʕlwhy nḥtʔ dzḥwrytʔ wnkswnh bqrmʔ dmškʔ dssgwnʔ dnsymwn qwpwhy
04:09	wnsbwn nḥtʔ dtkltʔ wnkswn mnrtʔ dmnhrʔ wšrgyh wmlqṭyh wkpyh wklhwn mʔnʔ dmšḥʔ/dmšknʔ#3#/ dmšmšyn lh bhwn
04:10	wnrmwnyh/wnqrmwnh#3#/ wlklhwn mʔnyh bqrmʔ dmškʔ dssgwnʔ wnrmwn ʕl qwpyh
04:11	wʕl mdbḥʔ ddhbʔ nprswn nḥtʔ gmyrʔ dtkltʔ wnkswnh bqrmʔ/bksyʔ#3#/ dmškʔ dssgwnʔ wnrmwn/wnsymwn#3#/ qwpwhy
04:12	wnsbwn klhwn \mʔnʔ dtšmštʔ /mʔny tšmšth#3#/ dmšmšyn bhwn bqwdšʔ/bmqdšʔ#3#/ wnrmwn/wnsymwn#3#/ ʔnwn bnḥtʔ dtkltʔ wnkswn ʔnwn bksyʔ/bqrmʔ#3#/ dmškʔ dssgwnʔ wnrmwn ʕl qwpʔ
04:13	wnprqwnh lmdbḥʔ wnprswn ʕlwhy nḥtʔ dʔrgwnʔ
04:14	wnrmwn ʕmh klhwn mʔnwhy dmšmšyn bhwn ʕlwhy pyrmʔ wmšlwtʔ wmgrwpytʔ wšḥlʔ wkwlhwn mʔnʔ dmdbḥʔ wnprswn ʕlwhy qrmʔ dmškʔ dssgwnʔ wnrmwn qwpwhy
04:15	wmʔ dšlm ʔhrwn wbnwhy lmksyw qwdšʔ wklhwn mʔnʔ dqwdšʔ mʔ dšqlʔ mšrytʔ hydyn nʕlwn bny qht lmšql dlʔ nqrbwn lqwdšʔ wnmwtwn hlyn ʔnwn mšqlnʔ/mšqlʔ#3#/ dbny qht dbmškn zbnʔ
04:16	wšwlṭnh dʔlyʕzr brh dʔhrwn khnʔ mn mšḥʔ dmnhryn wʕṭrʔ dbsmʔ wsmydʔ ʔmynʔ wmšḥʔ dmšyḥwtʔ šlyṭ ʕl kwlh mšknʔ wʕl kl mdm dʔyt bh wbqwdšʔ wbmʔnwhy
04:17	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʕm ʔhrwn wʔmr lhwn
04:18	lʔ twbdwn šbṭʔ dšrbtʔ/bšrbtʔ#3#/ dqht mn gw lwyʔ
04:19	ʔlʔ hdʔ ʕbdw lhwn wnḥwn dlʔ nmwtwn mʔ dʕʔlyn/dqrbyn#3#/ lqdwš qwdšʔ ʔhrwn wbnwhy nʕlwn wnšlṭwn ʔnwn ʔnš ʔnš ʕl pwlḥnh wʕl mšqlnh/mšqlh#3#/
04:20	wlʔ nʕlwn lmḥzʔ kd mtksʔ qwdšʔ dlʔ/wlʔ#3#/ nmwtwn
04:21	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
04:22	qbl ḥwšbnʔ dbny gršwn ʔp dylhwn/lhwn#3#/ lbyt ʔbhyhwn lšrbthwn
04:23	mn br tltyn šnyn wlʕl wʕdmʔ lbr ḥmšyn šnyn tmnʔ ʔnwn kl dʔtʔ lmtḥylw bḥylʔ wlmplḥ pwlḥnʔ bmškn zbnʔ
04:24	hnw pwlḥnʔ dšrbtʔ dgršwn lmplḥ wlmšql
04:25	nšqlwn yryʕtʔ dmšknʔ wmšknzbnʔ wʔpy trʕh wprsʔ dssgwnʔ dʔyt ʕlwhy mn lʕl wʔpy trʕʔ dmšknzbnʔ
04:26	wglgʔ/wskʔ#3#/wskʔ wglglʔ#3#/ ddrtʔ wprsʔ dmʕlnʔ dtrʕʔ ddrtʔ dʕl mšknʔ wʕl mdbḥʔ kd ḥdr wṭwnbyhwn wklhwn mʔnʔ dpwlḥnhwn kl mdm dʕbdyn wplḥyn
04:27	bmlt pwmh dʔhrwn wdbnwhy nhwʔ kwlh pwlḥnʔ dbny gršwn lkwlh šqwlthwn/šqwlwthwn#3#/ wlklh pwlḥnhwn wtšlṭwn ʕlyhwn mṭrtʔ ʕl klh šqwlthwn
04:28	hnʔ hw pwlḥnʔ dšrbtʔ dbny gršwn dbmšknzbnʔ wmṭrthwn bʔydʔ dʔytmr brh dʔhrwn khnʔ
04:29	wbny mrry lšrbthwn lbyt ʔbhyhwn tmnʔ ʔnwn
04:30	mn br tltyn šnyn wlʕl wʕdmʔ lbr ḥmšyn šnyn tmnʔ ʔnwn kl dʔtʔ lmtḥylw bḥylʔ wlmplḥ pwlḥnʔ /bmšknzbnʔ/dmšknzbnʔ#3#/
04:31	whdʔ hy mṭrtʔ dšqwlthwn/dšqwlwthwn#3#/dšqwlhwn#2#/ wdklh pwlḥnhwn bmškn zbnʔ dpwhy dmšknʔ wmwklwhy wʕmwdwhy wsmkwhy
04:32	wʕmwdʔ ddrtʔ kd ḥdrʔ wsmkyhwn wskyhwn wṭwnbyhwn wklhwn mʔnyhwn wkwlh pwlḥnhwn bšmhʔ mnw mʔnʔ dmṭrtʔ dšqwlthwn/wdklh šqwlthwn#3#/
04:33	hnw pwlḥnʔ dšrbtʔ dbny mrry wklh pwlḥnhwn bmškn zbnʔ bʔydʔ dʔytmr brh dʔhrwn khnʔ
04:34	wmnʔ mwšʔ wʔhrwn wrwrbnʔ dknwštʔ lbny qht lšrbthwn lbyt ʔbhyhwn
04:35	mn br tltyn šnyn wlʕl wʕdmʔ lbr ḥmšyn šnyn kwl dʔtʔ bḥylʔ lpwlḥnʔ dmšknzbnʔ

04:37	hlyn mnynʔ dšrbtʔ dqht kl dplḥ bmšknzbnʔ dmnʔ mwšʔ wʔhrwn bmlt pwmh dmryʔ bʔydʔ dmwšʔ
04:38	wmnynʔ dbny gršwn lšrbthwn lbyt ʔbhyhwn
04:39	mn br tltyn šnyn wlʕl wʕdmʔ lbr ḥmšyn šnyn kwl dʔtʔ bḥylʔ lpwlḥnʔ dmšknzbnʔ

04:41	hlyn mnynʔ dšrbtʔ dbny gršwn kl dplḥ bmšknzbnʔ dmnʔ mwšʔ wʔhrwn bmlt pwmh dmryʔ

04:43	mn br tltyn šnyn wlʕl wʕdmʔ lbr ḥmšyn šnyn kwl dʔtʔ bḥylʔ lpwlḥnʔ dmškn zbnʔ

04:47	mn br tltyn šnyn wlʕl wʕdmʔ lbr ḥmšyn šnyn kwl dʔtʔ bḥylʔ lmʕbd ʕbdʔ bpwlḥnʔ/dpwlḥnʔ#3#/ wpwlḥnʔ dšqwltʔ bmšknzbnʔ

05:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh

05:07	wnwdwn ḥṭhyhwn dʕbdw wnhpwk ḥṭhh ʕl ryšh \wḥd mn ḥmšʔ /wḥwmšʔ#3#/ nwsp ʕlwhy wnpnʔ lmn/lmnw#3#/ ddylh hw ḥṭhʔ

05:11	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh

05:13	wndmk gbrʔ ʕmh mdmkʔ dzrʕʔ wksyʔ hy mn ʕyny bʕlh wmṭšyʔ why mṭmʔʔ hy wshdʔ lyt ʕlyh why lʔ ʔttḥdt
05:14	wtʔtʔ ʕl bʕlh rwḥʔ dṭnnʔ wnṭn bʔntth kd hy mṭmʔʔ ʔw tʔtʔ ʕlwhy rwḥʔ dṭnnʔ wnṭn bʔntth kd hy lʔ hwt mṭmʔʔ/ṭmʔʔ#3#/
05:15	nytʔ gbrʔ \qwrbnh lwt khnʔ /lʔnttʔ lwt khnʔ wnytʔ qwrbnh ʕlyh#3#/ ḥd mn ʕsrʔ lsʔtʔ qmḥʔ dsʕrʔ wlʔ nswk ʕlwhy mšḥʔ wlʔ nsym ʕlwhy lbwntʔ mṭl dsmydʔ hw dṭnnʔ smydʔ hw ddwkrnʔ dmdkr ḥṭhʔ
05:16	nqrbyh khnʔ wtqwm qdm mryʔ
05:17	wnsb khnʔ myʔ qdyšʔ bmʔnʔ dpḥrʔ wmn ʕprʔ dʔyt bšpwlwhy dmdbḥʔ/dmšknʔ#3#/ <dmšknʔ#3#> nsb khnʔ wnrmʔ bmyʔ
05:18	wnqymyh khnʔ lʔnttʔ qdm mryʔ wnprwʕ/wngrwʕ#3#/ ršh dʔnttʔ wnsym ʕl ʔydyh smydʔ ddwkrnʔ smydʔ dṭnnʔ dbʔydʔ dkhnʔ nhwwn myʔ mryrʔ <myʔ#3#> bḥrʔ
05:19	wnwmyh khnʔ lʔnttʔ wnʔmr lh ʔn lʔ dmk gbrʔ ʕmky wlʔ/wʔlʔ#3#/ šṭyty \wlʔ ʔtṭmʔty /wʔtṭmʔty#3#/ lbr mn bʕlky ʔtḥsy mn hlyn myʔ mryrʔ bḥrʔ
05:20	ʔn dyn šṭyty lbr mn bʕlky wʔtṭnpty/wʔtṭmʔty#3#/ wdmk gbrʔ lwtky lbr mn bʕlky
05:21	nwmyh khnʔ lʔnttʔ bmwmtʔ dlwṭtʔ wnʔmr khnʔ lʔnttʔ ntlky mryʔ llwṭtʔ wlmwmtʔ bgw ʕmky nmsʔ mryʔ ʕṭmtky npwḥ krsky
05:22	wnʕlwn hlyn myʔ bḥrʔ bkrsky wnpḥwn mʕyky wnmswn ʕṭmtky wtʔmr ʔnttʔ hy ʔmyn ʔmyn

06:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh

07:51	wtwrʔ ḥd br bqrʔ wdkrʔ ḥd wʔmrʔ ḥd br šntʔ lʕltʔ

07:53	wldbḥʔ šlmʔ twrʔ tryn wdkrʔ ḥmšʔ wgdyʔ ḥmšʔ wʔmrʔ bny šntʔ ḥmšʔ hnw qwrbnh dʔlyšmʕ br ʕmyhwd
07:54	wbywmʔ dtmnyʔ qrb ryš šbṭʔ dmnšʔ gmlyʔyl br prṣwr
07:55	qwrbnʔ pylsʔ ḥd dsʔmʔ mn mʔʔ wtltyn mtqlh wšḥlʔ ḥd dsʔmʔ mn šbʕyn mtqlyn bmtqlʔ dqwdšʔ tryhwn kd mlyn smydʔ/nšypʔ#3#/ dpyl bmšḥʔ lqwrbnʔ
07:56	wkptʔ ḥdʔ mn ʕsrʔ ddhbʔ wmlyʔ/dmlyʔ#3#/ bsmʔ
07:57	wtwrʔ ḥd br bqrʔ wdkrʔ ḥd wʔmrʔ ḥd br šntʔ lʕltʔ
07:58	wṣpryʔ ḥd dʕzʔ lḥṭhʔ/ḥlp ḥṭhʔ#3#/lʕltʔ#3#/
07:59	wldbḥʔ šlmʔ twrʔ tryn wdkrʔ ḥmšʔ wgdyʔ ḥmšʔ wʔmrʔ bny šntʔ ḥmšʔ hnw qwrbnh dgmlyʔyl br prṣwr
07:60	wbywmʔ dtšʕʔ qrb ryš šbṭʔ dbnymyn ʔbydn br gdʕwny
07:61	qwrbnh pylsʔ ḥd dsʔmʔ mn mʔʔ wtltyn mtqlh wšḥlʔ ḥd dsʔmʔ mn šbʕyn mtqlyn bmtqlʔ dqwdšʔ tryhwn kd mlyn smydʔ/nšypʔ#3#/ dpyl bmšḥʔ lqwrbnʔ

07:71	wldbḥʔ šlmʔ twrʔ tryn wdkrʔ ḥmšʔ wgdyʔ ḥmšʔ wʔmrʔ bny šntʔ ḥmšʔ hnw qwrbnh dʔḥyʕzr br ʕmyšdy
07:72	wbywmʔ dḥdʕsr qrb ryš šbṭʔ dʔšyr pgʕʔyl br ʕkrn

07:78	wbywmʔ dtrʕsr qrb ryš šbṭʔ dnptly ʔḥydʕ br ʕynn

07:84	hnw qwrbnʔ dḥwdtʔ dmdbḥʔ bywmʔ dʔtmšḥ mn lwt rwrbnʔ dʔysryl pylsʔ trʕsr dsʔmʔ wšḥlʔ trʕsr dsʔmʔ wkpʔ trtʕsrʔ ddhbʔ
07:85	mʔʔ wtltyn hwʔ mtqlh dpylsʔ ḥd dsʔmʔ wšbʕyn dšḥlʔ ḥd klh sʔmʔ dmʔnʔ tryn ʔlpyn wʔrbʕmʔʔ bmtqlʔ dqwdšʔ
07:86	wkpʔ ddhbʔ trtʕsrʔ wmlyn/dmlyn#3#/ bsmʔ mn ʕsrʔ ʕsrʔ mtqlyn hwyʔ hwt kptʔ <ḥdʔ#3#> bmtqlʔ dqwdšʔ klh dhbʔ dkpʔ mʔʔ wʕsryn
07:87	wklhwn twrʔ lʕltʔ trʕsr wdkrʔ trʕsr wʔmrʔ bny šntʔ trʕsr wnšyphwn wṣpryʔ dʕzʔ trʕsr lḥṭhʔ
07:88	wklhwn twrʔ ldbḥʔ šlmʔ ʕsryn wʔrbʕʔ wdkrʔ štyn wgdyʔ štyn wʔmrʔ bny šntʔ štyn hnw ḥwdth dmdbḥʔ mn btr dʔtmšḥ
07:89	wkd ʕl mwšʔ /lmšknzbnʔ/lmšknʔ#3#/ šmʕ qlʔ dmmll ʕmh mn ḥwsyʔ dlʕl mn qbwtʔ dshdwtʔ mn bynt tryn krwbyn mll ʕmh
08:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
08:02	mll ʕm ʔhrwn wʔmr lh mʔ dmnhr ʔnt šrgʔ lwqbl ʔpy mnrtʔ nhwwn mnhryn šbʕʔ šrgyn
08:03	wʕbd hknʔ ʔhrwn šbʕʔ šrgyn lwqbl ʔpy mnrtʔ wʔnhr šrgyh ʔyk dpqd mryʔ lmwšʔ
08:04	whnw ʕbdh dmnrtʔ dnsktʔ/nsktʔ#3#/ hy ddhbʔ mn knh wʕdmʔ lryšh dnsktʔ hy ʔyk ḥzwʔ dḥwy mryʔ lmwšʔ hknʔ ʕbdh lmnrtʔ
08:05	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
08:06	dbr llwyʔ mn gw bny ʔysryl wdkʔ ʔnwn

08:08	wnsbwn twrʔ ḥd br bqrʔ wqwrbnh pylsʔ ḥd kd mlʔ smydʔ dpyl bmšḥʔ wtwrʔ ʔḥrnʔ br bqrʔ qrb lḥṭhʔ
08:09	wqrb llwyʔ qdm mšknzbnʔ wknš lklh knwštʔ dbny ʔysryl

08:13	wʔqym llwyʔ qdm ʔhrwn \wqdm bnwhy /wbnwhy#3#/ wprwš ʔnwn pwršnʔ lmryʔ/qdm mryʔ#3#/

08:16	mṭl dmwhbtʔ ʔnwn yhybyn ly mn gw bny ʔysrʔyl ḥlp kl ptḥ rḥmʔ bwkrʔ/bdkrʔ#3#/ dklhwn bny ʔysryl qrbt ʔnwn ly
08:17	mṭl ddyly ʔnwn kl bwkrʔ dbny ʔysryl mn bny ʔnšʔ wʕdmʔ lbʕyrʔ bywmʔ dqṭlt kl bwkrʔ dbʔrʕʔ dmṣryn qdšt ʔnwn ly
08:18	wqrbt/dqrbt#3#/ llwyʔ ḥlp bwkrʔ dbny ʔysryl
08:19	wyhbt ʔnwn llwyʔ mwhbtʔ lʔhrwn wlbnwhy mn gw bny ʔysryl lmplḥ pwlḥnʔ dbny ʔysryl bmškn zbnʔ wlmḥsyw ʕl bny ʔysryl wlʔ nhwʔ bbny ʔysryl mwtʔ/mwtnʔ#3#/ dmn šly mʔ dqrbw bny ʔysrʔyl lqwdšʔ
08:20	wʕbdw mwšʔ wʔhrwn wklh knwštʔ dbny ʔysryl llwyʔ ʔyk dpqd mryʔ lmwšʔ ʕl lwyʔ hknʔ ʕbdw lhwn bny ʔysryl
08:21	wʔtdkyw lwyʔ wḥllw mʔnyhwn wprš ʔnwn ʔhrwn llwyʔ pwršnʔ qdm mryʔ wḥsy ʕlyhwn ʔhrwn wdky ʔnwn

08:23	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh

09:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ bmdbrʔ dsyny bšnt trtyn kd npqw bny ʔysryl mn mṣryn byrḥʔ qdmyʔ wʔmr lh
09:02	nʕbdwn bny ʔysryl pṣḥʔ bzbnh

09:05	wʕbdw pṣḥʔ bʔrbʕsrʔ byrḥʔ qdmyʔ byt rmšʔ bmdbrʔ dsyny ʔyk dpqd mryʔ lmwšʔ hknʔ ʕbdw bny ʔysryl

09:11	bʔrbʕsrʔ byrḥʔ dtryn byt rmšʔ nʕbdwnh ʕl pṭyrʔ wmrrʔ nʔklwnh

09:13	wgbrʔ ddkʔ hw wlʔ hwʔ bʔwrḥʔ wlʔ <hwʔ#3#> ʕbd pṣḥʔ bzbnh tʔbd npšʔ hy mn ʕmh ʕl dlʔ qrb qwrbnh dmryʔ bzbnh ḥṭhʔ nqbl gbrʔ hw
09:14	wkd nʕmr ʕmkwn ʔynʔ dmtpnʔ lwty wnʕbd pṣḥʔ lmryʔ ʔyk pwqdnʔ dpṣḥʔ wʔyk dynwhy hknʔ nʕbd nmwsʔ/pwqdnʔ#3#/ ḥd nhwʔ lkwn wlʔynʔ dmtpnʔ lwty wlʕmwrʔ dʔrʕʔ
09:15	wbywmʔ dqm mšknʔ ksyt ʕnnʔ /lmšknzbnʔ/lmšknʔ#3#/ \wlʔpy trʕʔ dshdwtʔ /wshdwtʔ#3#/ wbrmšʔ hwʔ hwʔ ʕl mšknʔ ʔyk ḥzwʔ dnwrʔ ʕdmʔ lṣprʔ

09:17	wʔmty dslqʔ ʕnnʔ mn mšknʔ btrkn šqlyn bny ʔysryl wbʔtrʔ dšryʔ <hwt#3#> bh ʕnnʔ tmn šryn bny ʔysryl
09:18	bmlt pwmh dmryʔ šqlyn bny ʔysryl wbmlt pwmh dmryʔ šryn klhwn ywmtʔ dšryʔ ʕnnʔ ʕl mšknʔ šryn
09:19	wmʔ dmgrʔ ʕnnʔ ʕl mšknʔ ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ nṭryn ʔysrʔyl mṭrth dmryʔ wlʔ šqlyn

09:22	ʔw ywmtʔ ʔw yrḥʔ ʔw ʕdn bʕdn kmʔ dmgrʔ ʕnnʔ lmšrʔ ʕl mšknʔ hknʔ šryn bny ʔysryl wlʔ šqlyn wmʔ dslqt ʕnnʔ šqlyn
09:23	bmlt pwmh dmryʔ šryn wbmlt pwmh dmryʔ šqlyn wmṭrth/wbmṭrth#3#/ dmryʔ nṭryn ʔyk mlt pwmh dmryʔ bʔydʔ dmwšʔ
10:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
10:02	ʕbd lk trtyn qrntʔ dsʔmʔ dnsktʔ ʕbd ʔnyn wnhwyn lk lmqrʔ knwštʔ wlmšqlw mšrytʔ
10:03	wnqrwn bhyn wntwʕdwn lwtk kwlh knwštʔ ltrʕʔ dmšknzbnʔ
10:04	wʔn bḥdʔ nqrwn ntwʕdwn lwtk rwrbnʔ wršy ʔlpʔ dʔysryl
10:05	wnybbwn bqrnʔ wnšqln mšrytʔ dšryn mn mdnḥʔ
10:06	wnybbwn bqrnʔ dtrtyn wnšqln mšrytʔ dšryn mn tymnʔ bqrnʔ/bywbbʔ#3#/ nqrwn bmšqlnyhwn
10:07	wmʔ dknšyn ʔntwn knwšyʔ hwytwn qryn wlʔ mybbyn

10:10	wbywmʔ dḥdwtkwn wdʕdʕʔdykwn wdryš yrḥykwn qrw bqrntʔ ʕl yqdykwn wʕl dbḥykwn šlmʔ wnhwyn lkwn ldwkrnʔ qdm <mryʔ#3#> ʔlhkwn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn
10:11	whwʔ bšnt trtyn bʕsrtʔ byrḥʔ dtryn slqt ʕnnʔ mn <ʕlwhy#3#> mšknʔ dshdwtʔ
