10:15	wrb ḥylʔ dšbṭʔ dbny ʔyskr ntnyʔyl br ṣwʕr
10:16	wrb ḥylʔ dšbṭʔ dbny zbwlwn ʔlyb br ḥlwn
10:17	wʔḥtwhy lmšknʔ wšqlw bny gršwn wbny mrry šqly mšknʔ
10:18	wšqlw ṭwlqʔ dmšrytʔ drwbyl wḥylhwn/lḥylhwn#3#/ wrb ḥylʔ ʔlyṣwr br šdʔwr
10:19	wrb ḥylʔ dšbṭʔ dbny šmʕwn šlmwʔyl br ṣwryšdy
10:20	wrb ḥylʔ dšbṭʔ dbny gd ʔlyʔsp br rʕwʔyl
10:21	wšqlyn bny qht šqly mšknʔ wmqymyn lh lmšknʔ ʕd ʔtyn
10:22	wšql ṭwlqʔ dmšrytʔ dʔprym/dbny ʔprym#3#/ lḥylhwn wrb ḥylʔ ʔlyšmʕ br ʕmyhwd
10:23	wrb ḥylʔ dšbṭʔ dmnšʔ gmlyʔyl br prṣwr
10:24	wrb ḥylʔ dšbṭʔ dbnymyn ʔbydn br gdʕwny
10:25	wšql ṭwlqʔ dmšrytʔ dbny dn wmknš lklhyn mšrytʔ wlḥylhwn wrb ḥylʔ dšbṭʔ dbny dn ʔḥyʕzr br ʕmyšdy
10:26	wrb ḥylʔ dšbṭʔ dʔšyr pgʕʔyl br ʕkrn
10:27	wrb ḥylʔ dšbṭʔ dnptly/dbny nptly#3#/ ʔḥydʕ br ʕynn
10:28	hlyn mšqlnʔ dbny ʔysryl lḥylwthwn <wšqlyn hww#3#>
10:29	wʔmr mwšʔ lḥwbb br rʕwʔyl mdynyʔ ḥmwhy dmwšʔ šqlynn lʔtrʔ dʔmr mryʔ lh ʔtl lkwn tʔ ʕmn wnṭʔb lk mṭl dmryʔ mll ṭbtʔ ʕl ʔysryl
10:30	wʔmr lh lʔ ʔzl ʔnʔ ʔlʔ lʔrʕy ʔzl ʔnʔ lʔykʔ dʔylyd ʔnʔ
10:31	ʔmr lh mwšʔ lʔ tšbqn mṭl dʔnt ydʕ ʔnt byt mšryn dbmdbrʔ whwʔ ʔnt ln ʕynʔ
10:32	wʔn tʔzl ʕmn mn hy ṭbtʔ dmṭʔb ln mryʔ nṭʔb <ʔp#3#> lk
10:33	wšqlw mn ṭwrh dmryʔ mrdʔ tltʔ ywmyn wqbwtʔ dqymh dmryʔ/dʔlhʔ#3#/ šqlt mn qdmyhwn mrdʔ \ywmʔ ḥd /tltʔ ywmyn#3#/ dtṭyb lhwn byt mšryʔ
10:34	wʕnnh dmryʔ lʕl mnhwn bʔymmʔ mʔ dšqlyn mn mšrytʔ
10:35	whwʔ dkd šqlt qbwtʔ ʔmr mwšʔ qdm mryʔ wnttbrwn/wntbdrwn#3#/ snʔyk wnʕrqwn bʕldbbyk mn qdmyk
10:36	wkd šrt ʔmr ʔtpny mryʔ ʕl rbwtʔ wʕl ʔlpʔ dʔysryl
11:01	wkd rṭnw hww ʕmʔ ʔtbʔš qdm mryʔ wšmʕ mryʔ wʔtḥmt rwgzh wspt bhwn nwrh dmryʔ wʔklt bḥdryh dmšrytʔ
11:02	wgʕw ʕmʔ ʕl mwšʔ wṣly mwšʔ qdm mryʔ wšlyt nwrʔ
11:03	wqrʔ šmh dʔtrʔ hw yqdnʔ mṭl dspt bhwn nwrh dmryʔ
11:04	wḥlwṭʔ dʔyt hww bynthwn rgw rgtʔ whpkw ʔbkyw ʔp lbny ʔysryl wʔmryn mn dyn ʔwkln bsrʔ
11:05	ʔtdkrn nwnʔ dʔklyn hwyn bmṣryn mgn wqṭyʔ wpṭyḥʔ wkrtʔ wbṣlʔ wtwmʔ
11:06	whšʔ hʔ nḥbʔ npšn wlyt mdm ʔlʔ ʔn hnʔ mnnʔ dqdm ʕynyn
11:07	wmnnʔ ʔyk zrʕʔ hwʔ dkwsbrtʔ/dkwzbrtʔ#3#/ wʕynh ʔyk ʕynʔ dbrwlḥʔ
11:08	wmtkrkyn ʕmʔ wlqṭyn lh wṭḥnyn lh brḥyʔ ʔw dqyn lh bmdktʔ wmbšlyn lh bqdrʔ wʕbdyn mnh rʕpʔ whwʔ ṭʕmh ʔyk ṭʕmʔ dlyš bmšḥʔ
11:09	wmʔ dnḥt ṭlʔ ʕl mšrytʔ bllyʔ nḥt ʕlwhy mnnʔ
11:10	wšmʕ mwšʔ lʕmʔ kd bkyn bšrbthwn ʔnš btrʕ mšknh wʔtḥmt rwgzh dmryʔ wʔp bʕynwhy dmwšʔ ʔtbʔš
11:11	wʔmr mwšʔ lmryʔ mry lmnʔ ʔbʔšt lʕbdk wlmnʔ lʔ ʔškḥt rḥmʔ bʕynyk/qdmyk#3#/ dʔrmytyhy ʕly kwlh ṭʕnh dʕmʔ hnʔ
11:12	dlmʔ ʔnʔ bṭnth lhnʔ kwlh ʕmʔ ʔw dlmʔ ʔnʔ ʔyldth dʔmr ʔnt ly šqlyhy bʕwbk ʔyk dmšql mrbynʔ lylwdʔ/ylwdʔ#3#/ lʔrʕʔ dymyt lʔbhyhwn
11:13	ʔymkʔ ly bsrʔ dʔtl lhnʔ klh ʕmʔ dbkyn ʕly wʔmryn hb/dhb#3#/ ln bsrʔ nʔkwl/dnʔkwl#3#/
11:14	lʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ dʔsybr blḥwdy lhnʔ klh ʕmʔ mṭl dʕšyn hw mny
11:15	ʔn hknʔ ʕbd ʔnt ly/ʕmy#3#/ qṭwlyny mqṭl ʔn ʔškḥt rḥmʔ bʕynyk wlʔ ʔḥzʔ bbyšty
11:16	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ knš ly šbʕyn gbryn mn sbʔ dʔysryl ʔylyn/lʔylyn#3#/ dydʕ ʔnt dhnwn/whnwn#3#/ ʔnwn ršwhy dʕmʔ wsprwhy/wdsprwhy#3#/ wdbr ʔnwn lmšknzbnʔ wntṭybwn tmn ʕmk
11:17	wʔḥwt wʔmll ʕmk tmn wʔbṣwr mn rwḥʔ dʕlyk wʔsym ʕlyhwn wnšqlwn ʕmk bṭʕnh dʕmʔ hnʔ wlʔ tšqwl ʔnt blḥwdyk
11:18	wʔmr mwšʔ lʕmʔ ʔtqdšw mḥr/lmḥr#3#/ dtʔklwn bsrʔ mṭl dbkytwn qdm mryʔ wʔmrtwn mn dyn ʔwkln bsrʔ mṭl dṭb hwʔ ln bmṣryn wntl lkwn mryʔ bsrʔ dtʔklwn
11:19	lʔ ḥd ywm tʔklwnh wlʔ tryn ywmyn wlʔ ḥmšʔ ywmyn wʔp lʔ ʕsrʔ ywmyn wlʔ ʕsrʔ ywmyn
11:20	ʕdmʔ lyrḥ ywmyn tʔklwnh <ʔlʔ#3#> ʕdmʔ dnpwq <lkwn#3#> mn nḥyrykwn wthwʔ lkwn ʔptrʔ ʕl dʔslytwn lmryʔ dbkwn wbkytwn qdm mryʔ wʔmrtwn lmnʔ gyr npqn mn mṣryn
11:21	wʔmr mwšʔ qdm mryʔ štmʔʔ ʔlpyn gbrʔ rglyʔ ʕmʔ dʔnʔ bynthwn wʔnt ʔmrt dbsrʔ ʔtl lhwn wnʔklwn yrḥ ywmyn
11:22	ʔn ʕnʔ wtwrʔ mtnksyn lhwn mnʔ ʕbdyn lhwn wʔn klhwn nwnʔ dymʔ mttṣydyn lhwn lʔykʔ mmlyn lhwn
11:23	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ ʔydh dmryʔ mmlyʔ hšʔ tḥzʔ ʔn hwyʔ mlty ʔw lʔ
11:24	wnpq mwšʔ wʔmr lʕmʔ ptgmwhy dmryʔ wknš šbʕyn gbryn mn sbʔ dʕmʔ/dʔysryl#3#/ wʔqym ʔnwn ḥdrwhy dmšknʔ
11:25	wnḥt mryʔ bʕnnʔ \wmll ʕmh /wqm ʕmh tmn#3#/ wbṣr mn rwḥʔ dʕlwhy wyhb ʕl šbʕyn gbryn sbʔ wkd šrt/šryt#3#/ ʕlyhwn rwḥʔ ʔtnbyw wlʔ ʔwspw
11:26	wʔštḥrw tryn gbryn bmšrytʔ šmh dḥd ʔldd wšmh dʔḥrnʔ mydd wšrt/wšryt#3#/ ʕlyhwn rwḥʔ wʔp hnwn ktybyn hww wlʔ ʔtw lmšknʔ wʔtnbyw bmšrytʔ
11:27	wrhṭ ʕlymʔ wḥwy lmwšʔ wʔmr lh ʔldd wmydd hʔ mtnbyn bmšrytʔ
11:28	wʕnʔ hwšʕ/yšwʕ#3#/ brnwn mšmšnh dmwšʔ mn ṭlywth wʔmr lh mry mwšʔ kly ʔnwn
11:29	ʔmr lh mwšʔ lʔ tṭnny mn dyn ʕbd klh ʕmh dmryʔ nbyʔ mṭl dyhb mryʔ rwḥh ʕlyhwn
11:30	wʕl mwšʔ lmšrytʔ hw wsbʔ dʔysryl
11:31	wrwḥʔ šqlt mn qdm mryʔ wʔsqt slwy mn ymʔ wʔrmyt ʕl mšrytʔ mrdʔ ywmʔ lkʔ wmrdʔ ywmʔ lkʔ ḥdryh dmšrytʔ wʔyk trtyn ʔmyn ʕl ʔpy ʔrʕʔ
11:32	wqm ʕmʔ klh ʔymmʔ hw wklh llyʔ wklh ʔymmʔ dbtrh wknšwh lslwy ʔynʔ dʔzʕr knš ʕsrʔ krwn wšṭḥw lhwn mšṭḥʔ ḥdryh dmšrytʔ
11:33	bsrʔ ʕdkyl byt šnyhwn wʕdlʔ ʕbr tqp rwgzh dmryʔ ʕl ʕmʔ wmḥʔ mryʔ lʕmʔ/bʕmʔ#3#/ mḥwtʔ dṭb rbʔ

11:35	wmn qbrʔ drgtʔ šqlw ʕmʔ lḥṣrwt \whww /whwʔ ʕmʔ#3#/ bḥṣrwt
12:01	wmllt mrym wʔhrwn bmwšʔ ʕl ṣbwtʔ dʔnttʔ kwšytʔ dnsb mṭl dʔnttʔ kwšytʔ nsb
12:02	wʔmryn dlmʔ ʕm mwšʔ hw blḥwd mll mryʔ hʔ ʔp ʕmn mll wšmʕ mryʔ

12:06	wʔmr lhwn mryʔ šmʕw hšʔ ptgmy ʔn thwʔ nbywtkwn ʔnʔ mryʔ bḥzwʔ mtglʔ ʔnʔ ʕlykwn wbḥlmʔ mmll ʔnʔ ʕmkwn

12:08	mn pwm lpwm mmll ʔnʔ ʕmh bḥzwʔ wlʔ bdmwtʔ wšwbḥh dmryʔ ḥzʔ mṭl mnʔ lʔ dḥltwn lmmllw bʕbdy mwšʔ
12:09	wʔtḥmt rwgzh dmryʔ ʕlyhwn wʔzl

12:11	wʔmr ʔhrwn lmwšʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnk mry lʔ tḥšwb ʕlyn ḥṭhʔ ʕl dʔskln wʕl dḥṭyn
12:12	wlʔ nhwʔ ʔyk mytʔ dnpq mn krsʔ dʔmh wʔkyl plgh dbsrh
12:13	wgʕʔ mwšʔ lwt mryʔ wʔmr bbʕw ʔlhʔ ʔsh
12:14	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ ʔlw ʔbwh mrq rq bʔpyh wlʔ hwʔ lh dtbht šbʕʔ ywmyn ttb šbʕʔ ywmyn lbr mn mšrytʔ whydyn tʕwl

13:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
13:02	šdr gbrʔ ngšwn/dngšwn#3#/ ʔrʕʔ dknʕn dyhb ʔnʔ lbny ʔysryl ḥd ḥd gbrʔ mn šbṭʔ dʔbhwhy šdr kl ršʔ dʔyt bhwn
13:03	wšdr ʔnwn mwšʔ mn mdbrʔ dprn bmlt pwmh dmryʔ klhwn gbrʔ ršʔ ʔnwn dʔysryl

13:18	wḥzw lʔrʕʔ mnʔ hy wlʕmʔ dytbyn bh ʔn ʕšyn hw ʔw ḥlš ʔw zʕwr hw ʔw sgy
13:19	wmnʔ hy ʔrʕʔ dytbyn bh
13:20	ʔn šmynʔ hy ʔw <ʔn#3#> ʔyt bh ʔylnʔ ʔw lʔ wʔtḥylw wsbw mn pʔrʔ dʔrʕʔ wywmtʔ ywmy bkrʔ dʕnbʔ
13:21	wslqw wgšwh lʔrʕʔ mn mdbrʔ dṣyn wʕdmʔ lrḥwb dbmʕlnʔ dḥmt
13:22	wslqw ltymnʔ wʔtw ʕdmʔ lḥbrwn wtmn hww ʔḥymn wšyšy wtwlmy bny gnbrʔ wḥbrwn šbʕ šnyn ʔtbnyt qdm ṣʕn dbmṣryn
13:23	wʔtw ʕdmʔ lnḥlʔ dsgwlʔ wpsqw mn tmn šbwqʔ wsgwlʔ ḥd dʕnbʔ wšqlwhy bqwpʔ byt tryn wmn rwmnʔ wmn tʔnʔ

13:26	wʔtw lwt mwšʔ wlwt ʔhrwn wlwt klh knwštʔ dbny ʔysryl lmdbrʔ dprn lrqm wʔtybwhy ptgmʔ lh wlklh knwštʔ wḥwyw ʔnwn pʔrʔ dʔrʕʔ
13:27	wʔštʕyw lh wʔmrw ʔzln lʔrʕʔ dšdrtn wmrdyʔ ḥlbʔ wdbšʔ whlyn pʔryh
13:28	brm dyn ʕšyn ʕmʔ dytbyn bʔrʕʔ wqwryʔ <dṭb#3#> ʕšynn wṭb rwrbn wʔp bny gnbrʔ ḥzyn tmn
13:29	ʕmlyq ytb bʔrʕʔ dtymnʔ wḥtyʔ wybwsyʔ wʔmwryʔ ytbyn bṭwrʔ wknʕnyʔ ytbyn ʕl yd ymʔ wʕl yd ywrdnn
13:30	wštq klb ʕmʔ mn mwšʔ wʔmr msq nsq wnʔrtyh mṭl dmṣynn ḥylh
13:31	wgbrʔ dslqw ʕmh ʔmryn lʔ mškḥynn lmsq ʕl ʕmʔ mṭl dʕšyn hw mnn
13:32	wʔpqw ṭbh dʔrʕʔ hnwn dgšwh lbny ʔysryl wʔmrw lhwn ʔrʕʔ dʕbrn bh wgšnh ʔrʕʔ ʔklt ʕmwryh hy wkl ʕmʔ dḥzyn bgwh gbrʔ ʔnwn dmšwḥtʔ
13:33	wtmn ḥzyn gnbrʔ bny gnbrʔ dmn gnbrʔ whwyn bʕynyhwn ʔyk qmṣʔ hknʔ hwyn bʕynyhwn
14:01	wʔrybt/wʔrymt#3#/ kwlh knwštʔ wʔrymw qlhwn bbktʔ wbkʔ ʕmʔ bllyʔ hw <bktʔ rbtʔ#3#>
14:02	wrṭnw <ʕmʔ#3#> <bywmʔ hw#3#> ʕl mwšʔ wʕl ʔhrwn klhwn bny ʔysryl wʔmrw lhwn klh knwštʔ ʔštwp dyn mytn/bʔydʔ dmryʔ#3#/ bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn ʔw bmdbrʔ hnʔ ʔštwp dyn mytn
14:03	lmnʔ mʕl ln mryʔ lʔrʕʔ hdʔ dnpl bḥrbʔ wnšyn wyqrtn nhwyn lbztʔ/lbzḥʔ#3#/ pqḥ hwʔ ln kd ytbyn hwyn bmṣryn
14:04	wʔmrw gbr/ʔnš#3#/ lʔḥwhy tw nʕbd ln ršʔ wnhpwk lmṣryn
14:05	wnplw mwšʔ wʔhrwn ʕl ʔpyhwn qdm klh knšʔ dknwštʔ \dbny ʔysryl /dʔysryl#3#/
14:06	wyšwʕ brnwn wklb br ywpnʔ mn gšwšʔ dʔrʕʔ ṣryw nḥtyhwn
14:07	wʔmrw lklh knwštʔ dbny ʔysryl ʔrʕʔ dʕbrn bh lmgšh ṭbʔ hy ʔrʕʔ ṭb
14:08	ʔn ṣbʔ bn mryʔ wmʕl ln lʔrʕʔ hdʔ wyhb lh ln ʔrʕʔ hy dmrdyʔ ḥlbʔ wdbšʔ
14:09	blḥwd ʕl mryʔ lʔ tmrdwn wʔntwn lʔ tdḥlwn mn ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ mṭl dlḥmn ʔnwn ʕbr lh gyr ʕwšnhwn mnhwn wmryʔ ʕmn hw lʔ tdḥlwn mnhwn
14:10	wʔmrw kwlh knwštʔ lmrgm ʔnwn bkʔpʔ wšwbḥh dmryʔ ʔtgly bʕnnʔ bmšknzbnʔ lʕyn klhwn bny ʔysrʔyl
14:11	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ ʕdmʔ lʔmty mrgzyn ly ʕmʔ hnʔ wʕdmʔ lʔmty lʔ mhymnyn ly bkwlhyn ʔtwtʔ dʕbdt bynthwn
14:12	ʔmḥʔ ʔnwn bmwtnʔ wʔwbd ʔnwn wʔʕbdk lʕmʔ drb wʕšyn mnhwn
14:13	wʔmr mwšʔ lmryʔ nšmʕwn mṣryʔ dʔsqt bḥylk lʕmʔ hnʔ mn bynthwn
14:14	wnʔmrwn ʕmwryh dʔrʕʔ hdʔ dšmʕw dʔnt hw mryʔ bgwh dʕmʔ hnʔ dʕyn bʕyn ʔtḥzyt mryʔ wʕnnk qymʔ lʕl mnhwn wbʕmwdʔ dʕnnʔ ʔzlt qdmyhwn bʔymmʔ wbʕmwdʔ dnwrʔ bllyʔ
14:15	wmʔ dqṭltyhy lʕmʔ hnʔ ʔyk ḥd gbr nʔmrwn ʕmmʔ dšmʕw šmʕk/lšmk#3#/šmk#3#/
14:16	mṭl dlʔ ʔškḥ mryʔ dnʕlywhy lʕmʔ <hnʔ#3#> lʔrʕʔ dymʔ lhwn/lʔbhyhwn#3#/ ʕl hw hw nks ʔnwn bmdbrʔ
14:17	whšʔ nʔrb ḥylk mryʔ ʔyk dmllt wʔmrt
14:18	mryʔ ngyrʔ <hy#3#> rwḥk wsgyʔʔ ṭybwtk wšbq ʔnt lʕwlʔ wlḥṭytʔ wmzkyw lʔ mzkʔ ʔnt pqd ʔnt ḥwbʔ dʔbhʔ ʕl bnyʔ wʕl bny bnyʔ ʕl tltʔ wʕl ʔrbʕʔ dryn
14:19	šbwq hšʔ lʕwlh dʕmʔ hnʔ ʔyk swgʔʔ dṭybwtk wʔyk dšbqt lhwn mn mṣryn wʕdmʔ lhšʔ
14:20	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ šbqt lhwn ʔyk mltk
14:21	brm dyn ḥy ʔnʔ wʔtmly šwbḥh dmryʔ bʔrʕʔ klh
14:22	wklhwn gbrʔ dḥzw šwbḥy wʔtwtʔ dʕbdt bmṣryn wbmdbrʔ wnsywny hʔ ʕsr/ʕsryn#3#/ zbnyn wlʔ šmʕw bqly
14:23	ʔn nḥzwnh lʔrʕʔ dʔymyt <lmtl#3#> lʔbhyhwn kl mrgzny lʔ nḥzwnh
14:24	wʕbdy klb ḥlp dhwt rwḥy ʕmh wšmly btry ʔʕlywhy lʔrʕʔ dʕl ltmn wzrʕh nʔrtyh
14:25	wʕmlqyʔ wknʕnyʔ ytbyn bṭwrʔ mḥr/lmḥr#3#/ ʔtpnw wšqwlw lkwn lmdbrʔ lʔwrḥʔ dymʔ dswp
14:26	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʕm ʔhrwn wʔmr lhwn
14:27	ʕdmʔ lʔmty knwštʔ hdʔ byštʔ rṭnyn qdmy rṭnʔ drṭnyn qdmy bny ʔysryl šmʕt
14:28	ʔmr lhwn ḥy ʔnʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlʔ ʔyk dʔmrtwn qdmy hknʔ ʔʕbd lkwn
14:29	bmdbrʔ hnʔ npln šldykwn wklh mnynkwn wklh ḥwšbnkwn mn br ʕsryn šnyn wlʕl ʕl drṭntwn ʕly
14:30	lʔ tʕlwn lʔrʕʔ dʔrymt ʔydy lmšrywtkwn bh ʔlʔ ʔn klb br ywpnʔ wyšwʕ brnwn
14:31	wyqrtkwn dʔmrtwn lbztʔ thwʔ wbnykwn dlʔ ydʕw ywmnʔ ṭbtʔ wbyštʔ/ʔw byštʔ#3#/ hnwn nʕlwn lʔrʕʔ wʔytʔ ʔnwn wndʕwnh lʔrʕʔ dʔslytwn
14:32	wšldykwn dylkwn npln bmdbrʔ hnʔ
14:33	wbnykwn nhwwn rʕyn bmdbrʔ hnʔ ʔrbʕyn šnyn wnqblwn znywtkwn ʕdmʔ dnswpn šldykwn bmdbrʔ hnʔ
14:34	bmnynʔ dywmtʔ dgštwnh lʔrʕʔ ʔrbʕyn ywmyn ywmʔ lšntʔ tqblwn ʕwlkwn ʔrbʕyn šnyn wtdʕwn dʕl drṭntwn qdmy
14:35	ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔmrt dhknʔ ʔʕbd lh lklh knwštʔ hdʔ byštʔ dʔtwʕdtwn qdmy bmdbrʔ hnʔ nswpwn wtmn nmwtwn
14:36	wgbrʔ dšdr mwšʔ lmgš ʔrʕʔ hpkw ʔrṭnw ʕlwhy klh knwštʔ dnpqwn ṭbʔ byšʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ
14:37	wmytw gbrʔ dʔpqw ṭbʔ byšʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ bmwtnʔ dmn šlyʔ qdm mryʔ
14:38	wyšwʕ brnwn wklb br ywpnʔ ḥyw mn gbrʔ hnwn dʔzlw lmgš ʔrʕʔ
14:39	wʔmr mwšʔ ptgmʔ hlyn lklhwn bny ʔysryl wytbw ʕmʔ bʔblʔ rbʔ
14:40	wqdmw bṣprʔ wslqw lryš ṭwrʔ wʔmrw hʔ slqynn lʔtrʔ dʔmr ln mryʔ ʕl dḥṭyn
14:41	wʔmr lhwn mwšʔ lmnʔ ʕbrtwn ʕl mlt pwmh dmryʔ mṭl hnʔ lʔ msqyn ʔntwn lryš
14:42	lʔ <dyn#3#> tsqwn mṭl dlʔ hwʔ ʕmkwn mryʔ dlʔ ttbrwn qdm bʕldbbykwn
14:43	mṭl dknʕnyʔ wʕmlqyʔ ʔyt tmn qdmykwn wtplwn bḥrbʔ ʕl dhpktwn mn btr mryʔ wlʔ nhwʔ mryʔ ʕmkwn
14:44	wšryw lmsq lryš ṭwrʔ wqbwtʔ dqymh dmryʔ wmwšʔ lʔ prqw mn gw mšrytʔ
14:45	wnḥtw ʕmlqyʔ wknʕnyʔ dytbyn bṭwrʔ hw wḥrbw ʔnwn wrdpw ʔnwn ʕdmʔ lḥrmʔ
15:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
15:02	mll ʕm bny ʔysryl wʔmr lhwn mʔ dʕltwn lʔrʕʔ dbyt mʕmrkwn dyhb ʔnʔ lkwn ywrtnʔ
15:03	qrbw qwrbnʔ lmryʔ ʕltʔ ʔw dbḥʔ prwšw ndrʔ ʔw pwršnʔ ʔw bʕdʕʔdykwn wʕbdw ryḥʔ dnyḥʔ/dswtʔ#3#/ lmryʔ mn twrʔ wmn ʕnʔ/ʕzʔ#3#/
15:04	wnqrb hw dmqrb qwrbnh lmryʔ/dmryʔ#3#/ smydʔ nšypʔ ʕsrwnʔ dpyl brwbʕh dhmynʔ dmšḥʔ
15:05	wḥmrʔ lnwqyʔ rwbʕh dhmynʔ qrb ʕl ʕltʔ ʔw ldbḥʔ/ʕl dbḥʔ#3#/ dʔmrʔ/lʔmrʔ#3#/ ḥd
15:06	\ʔw ldkrʔ /wldkrʔ#3#/ ḥd ʕbdw qwrbnʔ nšypʔ tryn ʕsrwnyn dpylyn bmšḥʔ twlth dhmynʔ
15:07	wḥmrʔ lnwqyʔ twlth dhmynʔ qrbw ryḥʔ dswtʔ lmryʔ
15:08	wʔn mqrb ʔnt br bqrʔ yqdʔ šlmʔ <lmryʔ#3#> ʔw dbḥʔ lmprš ndrʔ/yqdʔ#3#/ ʔw šlmʔ lmryʔ
15:09	qrb ʕl br bqrʔ qwrbnʔ nšypʔ tltʔ ʕsrwnyn dpylyn bmšḥʔ plgh dhmynʔ
15:10	wḥmrʔ qrb lnwqyʔ plgh dhmynʔ qwrbnʔ lryḥʔ/dryḥʔ#3#/ dnyḥʔ/dswtʔ#3#/ lmryʔ
15:11	hknʔ ʕbdw ltwrʔ ḥd wldkrʔ ḥd ʔw lʔmrʔ <ḥd#3#> mn ʔmrʔ ʔw mn ʕzʔ
15:12	ʔyk mnynʔ dʕbdyn ʔntwn hknʔ ʕbdw lḥd ḥd bmnynhwn
15:13	klhwn dbyt ʔysryl nʕbdwn wnqrbwn qwrbnʔ lryḥʔ dswtʔ lmryʔ
15:14	wʔn nʕmr ʕmkwn ʔynʔ dmtpnʔ lwty ʔw byntkwn/dbyntkwn#3#/ ldrykwn wnʕbd qwrbnʔ dryḥʔ dswtʔ lmryʔ ʔyk dʕbdyn ʔntwn hknʔ nʕbd
15:15	nmwsʔ ḥd nhwʔ lkwn wlʔynʔ dmtpnʔ lwty dʕmr ʕmkwn nmwsʔ lʕlm ldrkwn ʔynʔ dmtpnʔ lwty ʔkwtkwn nhwʔ qdm mryʔ
15:16	nmwsʔ ḥd wdynʔ ḥd nhwʔ lkwn wlʔylyn dmtpnyn lwty dʕmryn ʕmkwn/byntkwn#3#/
15:17	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
15:18	mll ʕm bny ʔysryl wʔmr lhwn mʔ dʕltwn lʔrʕʔ \dmʕl ʔnʔ lkwn ltmn /dyhb ʔnʔ lkwn lmʔrth#3#/
15:19	mʔ dʔklyn ʔntwn mn lḥmʔ dʔrʕʔ prwšw pwršnʔ lmryʔ
15:20	mn ryš ʔṣwtkwn ḥḥwrtʔ/ḥḥrtʔ#3#/ prwšw pwršnʔ lmryʔ ʔyk pwršnʔ dʔdrʔ hknʔ pwršwh/prwšw#3#/ <lmryʔ#3#>
15:21	ryš ʔṣwtkwn hbw pwršnʔ lmryʔ ldrykwn
15:22	wʔn tṭʕwn wlʔ tʕbdwn hlyn klhwn pwqdnʔ dmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ
15:23	klmdm dpqd mryʔ lwtkwn bʔydʔ dmwšʔ mn ywmʔ dpqd mryʔ wlhl ldrykwn
15:24	wʔn mn qdm ʕynyh dknwštʔ ʔtʕbdt ṭwʕyy nqrbwn klh knwštʔ twrʔ ḥd br bqrʔ lʕltʔ lryḥʔ dswtʔ lmryʔ wsmydh wnwqyh ʔyk zdqh wṣpryʔ ḥd dʕzʔ lḥṭhʔ
15:25	wnḥsʔ khnʔ ʕl klh knwštʔ dbny ʔysryl wnštbq lhwn mṭl dṭwʕyy hy whnwn ʔytyw qwrbnyhwn qwrbnʔ lmryʔ wdḥlp ḥṭhyhwn qwrbnʔ lmryʔ ʕl sklwthwn
15:26	wnštbq lhwn lklh knwštʔ dbny ʔysryl wlʔylyn dmtpnyn lwty dʕmryn bʔysryl mṭl ddklh hy ʕmʔ ṭwʕyy
15:27	wʔn npšʔ ḥdʔ tḥṭʔ bṭwʕyy tqrb ʕzʔ <ḥd#3#> brt šntʔ ḥlp ḥṭhʔ
15:28	wnḥsʔ khnʔ ʕl npšʔ dḥṭt bḥṭhʔ dṭwʕyy/bṭwʕyy#3#/ qdm mryʔ wntḥsʔ ʕlwhy wnštbq lh
15:29	wlbny ʔysryl wlʔylyn dmtpnyn lwty dʕmryn byntkwn/lwty#3#/ nmwsʔ ḥd nhwʔ lkwn lmn dʕbd/dʕbr#3#/ bṭwʕyy
15:30	wnpšʔ dtʕbd bʔydʔ rmtʔ mnkwn wmn ʔylyn dmtpnyn lwty qdm mryʔ gdp tʔbd npšʔ hy mn ʕmh
15:31	mṭl dšṭ ptgmwhy dmryʔ wlpwqdnwhy bṭl tʔbd npšʔ hy <mn ʕmh#3#> wʕwlh ʕlyh
15:32	whww bny ʔysryl bmdbrʔ wʔškḥw gbrʔ ḥd kd lqṭ qysʔ bywmʔ dšbtʔ
15:33	wqrbwhy hnwn dʔškḥwhy kd lqṭ qysʔ lwt mwšʔ wlwt ʔhrwn wlwt klh knwštʔ
15:34	wḥbšwhy byt nṭwrtʔ mṭl dlʔ ʕdkyl ʔtpšq mnʔ ntʕbd lh
15:35	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ mtqṭlw ntqṭl gbrʔ mrgm nrgmwnh klh knwštʔ bkʔpʔ lbr mn mšrytʔ
15:36	wʔpqwhy klh knwštʔ lbr mn mšrytʔ wrgmwhy bkʔpʔ wmyt ʔyk dpqd mryʔ lmwšʔ
15:37	\wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh /wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ#3#/
15:38	mll ʕm bny ʔysryl wʔmr lhwn wnʕbdwn lhwn ṣwṣytʔ ʕl knpʔ dmrṭwṭyhwn ldryhwn wnʕbdwn bṣwṣytʔ dknpyhwn ḥwṭʔ dtkltʔ
15:39	wnhwyn lkwn ṣwṣytʔ dtḥzwn ʔnyn wttdkrwn klhwn pwqdnwhy dmryʔ ʔlhkwn wtʕbdwn ʔnwn wlʔ tṭʕwn btr lbykwn wbtr rʕynykwn dṭʕyn ʔntwn btrhwn
15:40	wttdkrwn wtʕbdwn klhwn pwqdny wthwwn qdyšyn lʔlhkwn
15:41	ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn dʔpqtkwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn lmhwʔ/dʔhwʔ#3#/ lkwn ʔlhʔ ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn
16:01	wʔtplg qwrḥ br yṣhr br qht br lwy wdtn wʔbyrm bny ʔlyb wʔwn br plt bny rwbyl
16:02	wqmw qdm mwšʔ wgbrʔ mn bny ʔysryl mʔtyn wḥmšyn ršʔ dknwštʔ dmtqryn lzbnʔ gbrʔ dšmhtʔ
16:03	wʔtknšw ʕl mwšʔ wʕl ʔhrwn wʔmrw lhwn lʔ kdw lkwn dklh knwštʔ klhwn qdyšyn wmryʔ bhwn ʔlʔ dtštqlwn ʕl kwlh knwštʔ dmryʔ
16:04	wšmʕ mwšʔ wnpl ʕl ʔpwhy
16:05	wmll ʕm qwrḥ wʕm klh knwšth wʔmr lhwn bṣprʔ nḥwʔ mryʔ mn ddylh hw wdqdyš/wqdyš#3#/ ntqrb/dntqrb#3#/ lwth wʔynʔ/wlʔynʔ#3#/ dgbʔ lh nqrb/ntqrb#3#/ lwth
16:06	hknʔ ʕbdw sbw lkwn pyrmʔ ʔnt qwrḥ wklh knwštk
16:07	wsymw bhwn nwrʔ wsymw bhwn bsmʔ qdm mryʔ mḥr wgbrʔ dgbʔ lh mryʔ hw nhwʔ qdyš kdw lkwn bny lwy
16:08	wʔmr mwšʔ lqwrḥ šmʕw twb bny lwy
16:09	lʔ kdw lkwn dprškwn ʔlhʔ dʔysryl mn klh knwštʔ dʔysryl wqrbkwn lwth lmplḥ pwlḥnʔ dmšknh dmryʔ wlmqm qdm knwštʔ lmšmšw ʔnwn
16:10	wqrbk lk wlklhwn ʔḥyk bny lwy ʕmk ʔlʔ bʕyn ʔntwn ʔp khnwtʔ
16:11	mṭl hnʔ ʔnt wklh knwštk ʔtwʕdw qdm mryʔ mḥr wʔhrwn mnw drṭnyn ʔntwn ʕlwhy
16:12	wšdr mwšʔ lmqrʔ ldtn wlʔbyrm bny ʔlyb wʔmrw <lh#3#> lʔ slqyn ḥnn
16:13	lʔ kdw lkwn dʔsqtwnn mn ʔrʕʔ dmrdyʔ ḥlbʔ wdbšʔ lmqṭlwtn bmdbrʔ ʔlʔ mtrwrbyn ʔntwn ʕlyn ʔp mtrwrbw
16:14	wlʔrʕʔ dmrdyʔ ḥlbʔ wdbšʔ lʔ ʔʕltn wlʔ yhbt ln yrtwtʔ dḥqltʔ wdkrmʔ ʔn ʕynyn mʕwr ʔnt lʔ slqynn
16:15	wʔtbʔš ṭb lmwšʔ wʔmr lmryʔ/qdm mryʔ#3#/ lʔ ttpnʔ ʕl qwrbnyhwn mṭl dlʔ ḥmrʔ dḥd mnhwn dbrt ʔp lʔ ʔbʔšt lḥd mnhwn
16:16	wʔmr mwšʔ lqwrḥ ʔnt wkwlh knwštk hww qdm mryʔ ʔnt whnwn wʔhrwn mḥr
16:17	sbw gbr pyrmh wsymw bhwn nwrʔ wsymw bhwn bsmʔ wqrbw qdm mryʔ gbr pyrmh mʔtyn wḥmšyn pyrmyn wʔnt wʔhrwn gbr pyrmh
16:18	wnsb gbr pyrmh wsmw bhwn nwrʔ wsmw bhwn bsmʔ wqmw qdm mšknzbnʔ mwšʔ wʔhrwn
16:19	wknš ʕlyhwn qwrḥ lkwlh knwštʔ ltrʕʔ dmšknzbnʔ wʔtgly šwbḥh dmryʔ ʕl klh knwštʔ
16:20	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʕm ʔhrwn wʔmr lhwn
16:21	ʔtpršw mn gw knwštʔ hdʔ wʔwbd ʔnwn bḥdʔ šʕʔ
16:22	wnplw ʕl ʔpyhwn wʔmrw ʔyl ʔlhʔ drwḥtʔ dkl`bsr gbrʔ ḥd nḥṭʔ wʕl kwlh knwštʔ nhwʔ rwgzʔ
16:23	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
16:24	mll ʕm klh knwštʔ wʔmr lhwn ʔtpršw mn ḥdrwhy dmšknʔ dqwrḥ wddtn wdʔbyrm
16:25	wqm mwšʔ wʔzl lwt dtn wʔbyrm wʔzlw btrh sbʔ dʔysryl
16:26	wmll ʕm klh knwštʔ wʔmr lhwn ʔtprqw/ʔtpršw#3#/ mn mšknyhwn dgbrʔ hlyn ḥṭyʔ wlʔ ttqrbwn lkl/lwt#3#/ mdm dʔyt lhwn dlʔ tblʕwn bḥṭhyhwn
16:27	wʔtprqw mn mšknʔ dqwrḥ wddtn wdʔbyrm wdtn wʔbyrm npqw kd qymyn btrʕʔ dmšknyhwn wnšyhwn wbnyhwn wʔyqrthwn
16:28	wʔmr mwšʔ bhdʔ tdʕwn dmryʔ šdrny lmʕbd hlyn klhwn ʕbdʔ wlʔ hwʔ mn rʕyny
16:29	ʔn ʔyk mwtʔ dklnš nmwtwn hlyn wpwqdnʔ ʔyk \dʕl klnš /dkl ʔnš#3#/ ntpqd ʕlyhwn lʔ hwʔ mryʔ šdrny
16:30	wʔn brytʔ nbrʔ mryʔ wtptḥ ʔrʕʔ pwmh wtblʕ ʔnwn lhwn wlkl mdm dʔyt lhwn wnḥtwn hnwn wkl mdm dʔyt lhwn kd ḥyyn lšywl tdʕwn dʔrgzw gbrʔ hlyn lmryʔ
16:31	wkd šlm mwšʔ lmʔmr hlyn klhwn ptgmʔ ʔtpḥtt/ʔtptḥt#3#/ ʔrʕʔ dtḥwtyhwn
16:32	wptḥt ʔrʕʔ pwmh wblʕt ʔnwn lhwn wlbtyhwn wlklhwn bnynšʔ dʕm qwrḥ wlklh qnynhwn
16:33	wnḥtw hnwn wklmdm dʔyt lhwn kd ḥyyn lšywl wʔtksyt lʕl mnhwn ʔrʕʔ wʔbdw mn gw knwštʔ
16:34	wklhwn bny ʔysryl dbḥdryhwn ʕrqw mn qlhwn wʔmryn dlmʔ tblʕn ʔrʕʔ

17:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
17:02	ʔmr lʔlyʕzr br ʔhrwn khnʔ sb pyrmʔ mn bynt mwqdʔ wnwrʔ šdy lhl mṭl dʔtqdšw
17:03	pyrmyhwn dḥṭyʔ hlyn bnpšthwn wʕbd ʔnwn ṭsʔ rqyqʔ qrmʔ lmdbḥʔ mṭwl dqrbw ʔnwn qdm mryʔ wʔtqdšw wnhwwn lʔtʔ bbny/lbny#3#/ ʔysryl
17:04	wnsb ʔlyʕzr khnʔ pyrmʔ dnḥšʔ dqrbw mwqdʔ wʔrq ʔnwn ṭsʔ lmdbḥʔ
17:05	dwkrnʔ lbny ʔysryl dlʔ nhwʔ qrb gbrʔ nwkryʔ ʔynʔ dlʔ hwʔ mn zrʕh dʔhrwn lmsm ʕṭrʔ dbsmʔ qdm mryʔ wlʔ nhwʔ ʔyk qwrḥ wʔyk kwlh knwšth <dptḥt ʔrʕʔ pwmh wblʕt ʔnwn#3#> ʔyk dʔmr/dpqd#3#/ mryʔ bʔydʔ dmwšʔ
17:06	wrṭnw klh knwštʔ dbny ʔysryl btr ywmʔ ʕl mwšʔ wʕl ʔhrwn wʔmrw lhwn ʔntwn qṭltwn lʕmh dmryʔ
17:07	wkd ʔtknšt klh knwštʔ <dbny ysryl#3#> ʕl mwšʔ wʕl ʔhrwn ʔtpnyw lmšknzbnʔ wḥzw dksyth ʕnnʔ wʔtgly šwbḥh dmryʔ
17:08	wʔtʔ mwšʔ wʔhrwn \qdm mškn zbnʔ /lmškn zbnʔ#3#/
17:09	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʕm ʔhrwn wʔmr lhwn
17:10	ʔtpršw mn gw knwštʔ hdʔ wʔwbd ʔnwn bḥdʔ šʕʔ wnplw ʕl ʔpyhwn
17:11	wʔmr mwšʔ lʔhrwn sb pyrmʔ <bʔydk#3#> wsym bh nwrʔ wsym bh bsmʔ wʔwbl bʕgl lknwštʔ/lmšrytʔ#3#/ wḥsʔ ʕlyhwn/ʕl ʕmʔ#3#/ mṭl dnpq rwgzʔ mn qdm mryʔ wšry mwtnʔ dmn šlyʔ bʕmʔ
17:12	wʕbd/wnsb#3#/ ʔhrwn ʔyk dʔmr lh mwšʔ wrhṭ lgw/lwt#3#/ mšrytʔ/knwštʔ#3#/ wḥzʔ dšry mwtnʔ dmn šlyʔ bʕmʔ wsm bsmʔ wḥsy \ʕl ʕmʔ /ʕlyhwn#3#/
17:13	wqm byt mytʔ lḥyʔ wʔtkly mwtnʔ dmn šlyʔ
17:14	whww dmytw bmwtnʔ dmn šlyʔ ʔrbtʕsr ʔlpyn wšbʕmʔʔ sṭr mn dmytw bplgwth dqwrḥ
17:15	whpk ʔhrwn lwt mwšʔ ltrʕʔ \dmškn zbnʔ /dmšknʔ#3#/ \wmwtnʔ dmn šlyʔ ʔtkly /wʔtkly mwtnʔ dmn šlyʔ#3#/
17:16	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
17:17	mll ʕm bny ʔysryl wsb mnhwn šbṭʔ šbṭʔ lbyt ʔbhʔ mn lwt kwl rwrbnyhwn lbyt ʔbhyhwn trʕsr šbṭyn wgbr šmh ktwb ʕl šbṭh
17:18	wšmʔ dʔhrwn ktwb ʕl šbṭʔ dlwy mṭl dḥd ḥd šbṭʔ lbyt ʔbhyhwn
17:19	wsym ʔnwn bmšknzbnʔ qdm shdwtʔ dmtwʕd ʔnʔ lkwn tmn
17:20	wnhwʔ gbrʔ dʔṣṭbʔ bh nwʕʔ šbṭh wʔprq mny rṭnʔ dbny ʔysryl dmrṭnyn ʕlykwn
17:21	wʔmr mwšʔ lbny ʔysryl wyhbw lh kwlhwn rwrbnyhwn šbṭʔ šbṭʔ lršʔ lklhwn lbyt/byt#3#/dbyt#3#/ ʔbhyhwn trʕsr šbṭyn wšbṭʔ dʔhrwn bgw šbṭyhwn
17:22	wsm ʔnwn mwšʔ lšbṭʔ qdm mryʔ bmšknʔ/bgw mšknʔ#3#/bgw mšknzbnʔ#3#/ dshdwtʔ
17:23	wlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʕl mwšʔ lmšknʔ dshdwtʔ wḥzʔ dʔprʕ šbṭʔ dʔhrwn dbyt lwy wʔpq ṭrpʔ wkpt lwzʔ
17:24	wʔpq ʔnwn mwšʔ lklhwn šbṭʔ mn \qdm mryʔ /mšknzbnʔ#3#/ lwt klhwn bny ʔysryl wḥzw wnsbw ʔnš šbṭh
17:25	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ ʔhpk šbṭʔ dʔhrwn qdm shdwtʔ dntnṭr lʔtʔ lbnyʔ mmrmrnʔ dngmr rṭnhwn mny wlʔ nmwtwn
17:26	wʕbd mwšʔ ʔyk dpqdh mryʔ hknʔ ʕbd
17:27	wʔmrw bny ʔysryl lmwšʔ hʔ spn wʔbdn wkwln gmrn
17:28	wkl dmtqrb lmšknh dmryʔ mʔt whʔ ʔp ḥnn ʔqpn lmsp
18:01	wʔmr mryʔ lʔhrwn ʔnt wbnyk wbyt ʔbwk ʕmk šqwlw ʕwlh dmqdšʔ wʔnt wbnyk ʕmk šqwlw ʕwlʔ dkhnwtkwn
18:02	wʔp ʔḥyk šbṭʔ dlwy šbṭʔ dʔbwk tqrb ʕmk wntlwwn lk wnšmšwnk wʔnt wbnyk ʕmk qdm mšknʔ/mšknzbnʔ#3#/ dshdwtʔ
18:03	wnṭrwn mṭrtk wmṭrtʔ dklh mšknʔ brm lmʔny qwdšʔ wlmʔny mdbḥʔ lʔ nqrbwn/ntqrbwn#3#/ dlʔ nmwtwn ʔp hnwn wʔp ʔntwn
18:04	wntlwwn lk wnṭrwn mṭrtʔ dmšknzbnʔ wdklh pwlḥnʔ dmšknʔ wnwkryʔ lʔ ntqrb lwtkwn
18:05	wṭrw mṭrtʔ dqwdšʔ wmṭrtʔ dmdbḥʔ wtwb lʔ nhwʔ rwgzʔ ʕl bny ʔysryl
18:06	wʔnʔ hʔ qrbt lʔḥykwn lwyʔ mn gw bny ʔysryl mwhbtʔ yhybyn lmryʔ lmplḥ pwlḥnʔ dmšknzbnʔ
18:07	wʔnt wbnyk ʕmk ṭrw khnwtkwn wklhwn ʔskmwhy dmdbḥʔ wlgw mn ʔpy trʕʔ plwḥw pwlḥnʔ mwhbtʔ dyhbt lkhnwtkwn wnwkryʔ dqrb ntqṭl
18:08	wʔmr mryʔ lʔhrwn hʔ ʔnʔ yhbt lk mṭrtʔ dpwršny wklhwn qwdšʔ dbny ʔysryl lk yhbt ʔnwn lmšyḥwtʔ lk wlbnyk ʕmk nmwsʔ lʕlm
18:09	hnʔ nhwʔ <lk#3#> \mqdšʔ dqwdšʔ /mn qdwš qwdšʔ#3#/ mn nwrʔ klh qwrbnhwn wklh smydhwn wklhwn ḥṭhyhwn wklhwn qwrbnyhwn dmqrbyn ly qdwš qwdšyn ʔnwn lk wlbnyk
18:10	bqdwš qwdšʔ tʔklwnh kl dkrʔ nʔklywhy qwdšʔ nhwʔ lk
18:11	whnʔ hw pwršnʔ dmwhbtkwn wklhwn pwršnʔ dbny ʔysryl lk yhbt ʔnwn wlbnyk wlbntk ʕmk nmwsʔ lʕlm kl mn ddkʔ bbytk nʔklywhy
18:12	klh šwmnʔ dmšḥʔ wklh šwmnʔ dʕbwrʔ wdḥmrʔ/wḥmrʔ#3#/ wršythwn dyhbyn lmryʔ lk yhbt ʔnyn/ʔnwn#3#/
18:13	bkrʔ klh dbʔrʕhwn dmytyn lmryʔ lk nhwʔ wkl mn ddkʔ bbytk nʔklywhy
18:14	wkl ḥrmʔ bʔysryl lk nhwʔ
18:15	wkl ptḥ mrbʕʔ dkl bsrʔ dmqrbyn lmryʔ dʔnšʔ wdbʕyrʔ lk nhwʔ brm dyn mprq tprwq bwkryhwn dʔnšʔ wbwkryhwn dbʕyrʔ ṭmʔtʔ tprwq
18:16	wpwrqnh mn br yrḥʔ wlʕl tprwq bdmyʔ dkspʔ ḥmšyn mtqlyn bmtqlʔ dqwdšʔ ʕsryn <dyn#3#> mʕyn/mnyn#3#/ hwʔ mtqlʔ
18:17	brm dyn bwkrʔ dtwrʔ wbwkrʔ dʔmrʔ wbwkrʔ dʕzʔ lʔ tprwq mṭl dqwdšʔ ʔnwn wdmhwn rws ʕl mdbḥʔ wtrbhwn ʔsq qwrbnʔ lmdbḥʔ lryḥ swtʔ lmryʔ
18:18	wbsrhwn nhwʔ lk ʔyk ḥdyʔ dpwršnʔ wʔyk šqʔ dymynʔ lk nhwʔ
18:19	kwlh pwršnʔ dqwdšʔ dpršyn/dmpršyn#3#/ bny ʔysryl lmryʔ yhbt lk wlbnyk wlbntk ʕmk nmwsʔ lʕlm/dlʕlm#3#/ qymʔ hw dmlḥʔ dʕlm qdm mryʔ lk wlzrʕk ʕmk
18:20	wʔmr mryʔ lʔhrwn bʔrʕhwn lʔ tʔrt wplgwtʔ lʔ thwʔ lk bynthwn ʔlʔ plgwtk wyrtwtk bynt bny ʔysryl pwršnwhy dmryʔ wqwdšwhy
18:21	wlbny lwy hʔ yhbt klhwn mʕsrʔ dbny ʔysryl lywrtnʔ ḥlp pwlḥnhwn dhnwn plḥyn pwlḥnʔ \bmšknzbnʔ /dmšknzbnʔ#3#/
18:22	wtwb lʔ ntqrbwn bny ʔysryl lmšknzbnʔ dlʔ nqblwn ḥṭhʔ wnmwtwn
18:23	wnplḥwn lwyʔ pwlḥnʔ dmškn zbnʔ whnwn nqblwn ʕwlhwn nmwsʔ lʕlm ldryhwn wbynt bny ʔysryl lʔ nʔrtwn ywrtnʔ
18:24	mṭl dmʕsrʔ/dpwršnʔ#3#/ dpršyn bny ʔysryl lmryʔ yhbt llwyʔ ywrtnʔ mṭl hnʔ ʔmrt lhwn dbynt bny ʔysryl lʔ nʔrtwn ywrtnʔ
18:25	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
18:26	mll ʕm lwyʔ wʔmr lhwn mʔ dnsbyn ʔntwn mn bny ʔysryl mʕsrʔ dyhbt lkwn mnhwn ywrtnʔ prwšw mnh pwršnʔ lmryʔ mʕsrʔ mn mʕsrʔ
18:27	wntḥšb lkwn pwršnkwn ʔyk ʕbwrʔ mn ʔdrʔ wʔyk pwršnʔ mn mʕṣrtʔ
18:28	hknʔ prwšw ʔp ʔntwn \pwršnʔ lmryʔ /pwršnh dmryʔ#3#/ mn klhwn mʕsrykwn dnsbyn ʔntwn mn bny ʔysryl whbw mnhwn pwršnʔ lmryʔ lʔhrwn khnʔ wlbnwhy
18:29	mn kwlhyn mwhbtkwn prwšw klh pwršnʔ lmryʔ/dmryʔ#3#/ mn kwlh šwmnʔ mqdšh mnh
18:30	wʔmr lhwn mʔ dpršyn ʔntwn šwmnh mnh ntḥšb llwyʔ ʔyk ʕlltʔ dʔdrʔ wʔyk ʕlltʔ dmʕṣrtʔ
18:31	wʔwklwhy bkwl ʔtr ʔntwn wʔnšy btykwn mṭl dhnʔ hw ʔgrkwn ḥlp pwlḥnkwn dbmškn zbnʔ/dmškn zbnʔ#3#/
18:32	wlʔ tqblwn ʕlwhy ḥṭhʔ mʔ dpršyn ʔntwn šwmnh mnh wqwdšʔ dbny ʔysryl lʔ tṭwšwn dlʔ tmwtwn
19:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʕm ʔhrwn wʔmr lhwn
19:02	hnw pwqdnʔ dnmwsʔ dpqd mryʔ wʔmr ʔmr lbny ʔysryl nytwn lk twrtʔ swmqtʔ šlmtʔ dlyt bh mwmʔ dlʔ npl ʕlyh nyrʔ
19:03	whbwh lʔlyʕzr khnʔ wnpqyh lbr mn mšrytʔ wnksyh qdmwhy
19:04	wnsb ʔlyʕzr khnʔ/dmʔ#3#/ mn dmh bṣbʕh wnrws lwqbl ʔpy mškn zbnʔ mn dmh šbʕ zbnyn
19:05	wnwqdyh ltwrtʔ qdmwhy wmškh wdmh wbsrh ʕm prth nwqd
19:06	wnsb khnʔ qysʔ dʔrzʔ wzwpʔ wṣwbʕʔ dzḥwrytʔ wnrmʔ bgw yqdnh dtwrtʔ
19:07	wnḥll mʔnwhy khnʔ wnsḥʔ bsrh bmyʔ whydyn nʕwl lmšrytʔ wnhwʔ ṭmʔ khnʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ
19:08	wmn dmwqd lh ltwrtʔ nḥll mʔnwhy <bmyʔ#3#> wnsḥʔ bsrh bmyʔ wnhwʔ ṭmʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ
19:09	wnknwš gbrʔ ddkʔ qṭmh dtwrtʔ wnrmywhy lbr mn mšrytʔ bʔtrʔ ddkʔ wnhwʔ nṭyr \lklh knwštʔ /lknwštʔ#3#/ dbny ʔysryl lmṭrtʔ/bmṭrtʔ#3#/ lmyʔ/dmyʔ#3#/ drssʔ mṭl dḥṭhʔ hw
19:10	wnḥll mʔnwhy hw dknš qṭmh dtwrtʔ wnhwʔ ṭmʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ wnhwʔ lbny ʔysryl wlʔylyn dmtpnyn lwty dʕmryn byntkwn nmwsʔ lʕlm
19:11	wmn dqrb lmytʔ dkl npšʔ dʔnšʔ nhwʔ ṭmʔ šbʕʔ ywmyn
19:12	wnrws ʕlwhy bywmʔ dtltʔ wbywmʔ dšbʕʔ wntdkʔ wʔlʔ nrws ʕlwhy bywmʔ dtltʔ wbywmʔ dšbʕʔ lʔ ntdkʔ
19:13	wkwl dnqrwb lmytʔ dkl npšʔ dʔnšʔ dnmwt wlʔ nrws ʕlwhy lmšknh dmryʔ ṭmʔ tʔbd npšʔ hy mn ʔysryl mṭwl dmyʔ drssʔ lʔ rs ʕlwhy twb nhwʔ ṭmʔ wṭmʔwth bh
19:14	hnw nmwsʔ dʔnšʔ kd nmwt bmšknʔ kl dʕʔl lmšknʔ wkl dbmšknʔ hw nhwʔ ṭmʔ šbʕʔ ywmyn
19:15	wkl mʔnʔ dptyḥ wlʔ hwʔ <nhwʔ#3#> šyʕ ṭmʔ hw
19:16	wkl dnqrwb lʔpy ḥqlʔ lqṭylʔ dḥrbʔ ʔw lmytʔ ʔw lgrmʔ dʔnšʔ ʔw lqbrʔ nhwʔ ṭmʔ šbʕʔ ywmyn
19:17	wnsbwn lʔynʔ dṭmʔ mn ʕprʔ dyqdnʔ dḥṭhʔ wnrmwn ʕlwhy myʔ ḥyʔ ʕl mʔnʔ
19:18	wnsb zwpʔ wnṣbwʕ bmyʔ gbrʔ ddkʔ wnrws ʕl mšknʔ wʕl <kwlhwn#3#> mʔnʔ wʕl kl npštʔ dʔyt hwy tmn wʕl <kwl#3#> mn dqrb lgrmʔ ʔw lqṭylʔ ʔw lmytʔ ʔw lqbrʔ
19:19	nrws <dmʔ#3#> dkyʔ ʕl ṭmʔʔ bywmʔ dtltʔ wbywmʔ dšbʕʔ wnrws ʕlwhy bywmʔ dšbʕʔ wnḥll mʔnwhy wnsḥʔ bmyʔ wntdkʔ brmšʔ
19:20	wgbrʔ dnhwʔ ṭmʔ wlʔ ntrss ʕlwhy tʔbd npšʔ hy mn gw knwšth mṭl dmqdšh dmryʔ ṭmʔ myʔ drssʔ lʔ rs ʕlwhy ṭmʔ hw
19:21	wnhwʔ lkwn nmwsʔ lʕlm wmn drʔs myʔ drssʔ nḥll mʔnwhy wmn dqrb lmyʔ drssʔ nhwʔ ṭmʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ
19:22	wkl dnqrwb lh ṭmʔʔ nhwʔ ṭmʔ wnpšʔ dtqrwb lh thwʔ ṭmʔʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ
20:01	wʔtw bny ʔysryl kwlh knwštʔ lmdbrʔ dṣyn byrḥʔ qdmyʔ wytbw ʕmʔ brqm wmytt tmn mrym wʔtqbrt tmn
20:02	wlyt hwʔ myʔ \lʕmʔ dnštʔ /lknwštʔ#3#/ wʔtknšw ʕmʔ ʕl mwšʔ wʕl ʔhrwn
20:03	wnṣw ʕmʔ ʕm mwšʔ <wʕm ʔhrwn#3#> wʔmrw lh/lhwn#3#/ ʔštwp dyn mytn bmwtnʔ dʔḥyn qdm mryʔ
20:04	lmnʔ ʔytytwn knwšth dmryʔ lmdbrʔ hnʔ dnmwt tnn ḥnn wbʕyrn
20:05	wlmnʔ ʔsqtwnn mn <ʔrʕʔ#3#> mṣryn/dmṣryn#3#/ wʔytytwnn lʔtrʔ hnʔ byšʔ lʔ ʔtrʔ dbyt zrʕʔ wʔp lʔ dgwpnʔ wtʔnʔ wrwmnʔ wʔp lʔ myʔ lmštʔ
20:06	wʔtw mwšʔ wʔhrwn mn qdm knwštʔ ltrʕʔ dmšknzbnʔ wnplw ʕl ʔpyhwn wʔtgly ʕlyhwn šwbḥh dmryʔ
20:07	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
20:08	sb lk šbṭʔ wknwš knwštʔ ʔnt wʔhrwn ʔḥwk wmll ʕl/ʕm#3#/ kʔpʔ lʕnyhwn wttl myh wʔpq lhwn myʔ mn kʔpʔ wʔšqʔ lknwštʔ wlbʕyrhwn
20:09	wnsb mwšʔ šbṭʔ mn qdm mryʔ ʔyk dpqdh
20:10	wknš mwšʔ wʔhrwn \lkwlh knwštʔ /lknwštʔ#3#/ lwt kʔpʔ wʔmr lhwn šmʕw hšʔ mmrmrnʔ mn hdʔ kʔpʔ npq lkwn myʔ
20:11	wʔrym mwšʔ ʔydh wmḥh lkʔpʔ bšbṭh trtyn zbnyn wnpqw myʔ sgyʔʔ wʔštyw ʕmʔ klh wbʕyrhwn
20:12	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ wlʔhrwn ʕl dlʔ hymntwn by lmqdšwtny qdm bny ʔysryl mṭl hnʔ lʔ tʕlwh lknwštʔ hdʔ lʔrʕʔ dyhbt lhwn
20:13	hlyn ʔnwn myʔ dmṣwtʔ dnṣw bny ʔysryl qdm mryʔ wʔtqdš bhwn
20:14	wšdr mwšʔ ʔyzgdʔ mn rqm lwt mlkʔ dʔdwm hknʔ ʔmr ʔḥwk ʔysryl ʔnt ydʕ ʔnt klh lʔwtʔ dʔdrktn
20:15	wnḥtw ʔbhyn lmṣryn/bmṣryn#3#/ wytbn bmṣryn ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ wʔbʔšw ln mṣryʔ wlʔbhyn
20:16	wṣlyn qdm mryʔ wšmʕ bqln wšdr mlʔkʔ wʔpqn mn mṣryn whʔ ḥnn brqm qrytʔ dbswp tḥwmk
20:17	hšʔ nʕbr bʔrʕk lʔ nʕbr bḥqlʔ wbkrmʔ/ʔw bkrmʔ#3#/ wlʔ nštʔ <mn#3#> myʔ dgwbʔ ʔlʔ bʔwrḥ mlkʔ nʔzl wlʔ nsṭʔ lʔ lymynʔ wlʔ lsmlʔ ʕdmʔ dnʕbr tḥwmk
20:18	wʔmr lh ʔdwm lʔ tʕbr btḥwmy dlʔ bḥrbʔ ʔpwq lʔwrʕk
20:19	wʔmrw lh bny ʔysryl bšbylʔ nsq wʔn mn myk nštʔ ḥnn wbʕyrn ntl dmyhwn blḥwd brglyn nʕbr
20:20	wʔmr <lhwn#3#> ʔdwm lʔ tʕbrwn wnpq ʔdwm lʔwrʕhwn bʕmʔ ʕšynʔ wbʔydʔ tqyptʔ
20:21	wlʔ ṣbʔ ʔdwm lmšbq \lbny ʔysryl /lʔysryl#3#/ lmʕbr btḥwmh wsṭʔ lh ʔysryl mnh
20:22	wšqlw mn rqm wʔtw \bny ʔysryl klh knwštʔ /klh knwštʔ dbny ysryl#3#/ lhwr ṭwrʔ
20:23	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ wlʔhrwn bhwr ṭwrʔ btḥwmʔ dʔrʕʔ dʔdwm
20:24	ntknš ʔhrwn lwt ʕmh mṭl dlʔ nʕwl lʔrʕʔ/lʔtrʔ#3#/ dyhbt lbny ʔysryl ʕl dmrmrtwn mlt pwmy bmyʔ dmṣwtʔ wlʔ qdštwnny bmyʔ lʕnyhwn
20:25	dbr lʔhrwn wlʔlyʕzr brh wʔsq ʔnwn lhwr ṭwrʔ
20:26	wʔšlḥ lʔhrwn nḥtwhy wʔlbš ʔnwn lʔlyʕzr brh wʔhrwn ntknš wnmwt tmn
20:27	wʕbd mwšʔ ʔyk dpqdh mryʔ wslqw lhwr ṭwrʔ lʕyn kwlh knwštʔ
20:28	wʔšlḥ mwšʔ lʔhrwn nḥtwhy wʔlbš ʔnwn lʔ ʔlyʕzr brh wmyt tmn ʔhrwn bhwr ṭwrʔ wnḥt mwšʔ wʔlyʕzr mn ṭwrʔ
20:29	wḥzw klh knwštʔ dmyt ʔhrwn wbkw ʕl ʔhrwn tltyn ywmyn klhwn dbyt ʔysryl
21:01	wšmʕ knʕnyʔ mlkʔ dgdr dʕmr btymnʔ dʔtʔ/wʔtʔ#3#/ ʔysryl bʔwrḥʔ dgšwšʔ \wʔtktš ʕm /wʔtknš ʕl#3#/ ʔysryl wšbʔ mnhwn šbytʔ
21:02	wndr ʔysrʔyl ndrʔ lmryʔ wʔmr ʔn mšlmw tšlm ʕmʔ hnʔ bʔydy ʔḥrm ʔnyn qwryhwn
21:03	wšmʕ mryʔ bqlh dʔysryl wʔšlm ʔnwn lknʕnyʔ bʔydyhwn wḥrbw ʔnwn wʔḥrmw ʔnwn wlqwryhwn wqrw šmh dʔtrʔ hw ḥrmʔ
21:04	wšqlw mn hwr ṭwrʔ bʔwrḥʔ dymʔ dswp lmtkrkwth lʔrʕʔ dʔdwm wʔtʕyqt npšh dʕmʔ bʔwrḥʔ
21:05	wrṭnw ʕmʔ ʕl ʔlhʔ wʕl mwšʔ wʔmrw lmnʔ ʔsqtn mn mṣryn dnmwt bmdbrʔ mṭl dlyt lḥmʔ wlʔ/wlyt#3#/ myʔ wnpšn ʕqt blḥmʔ zʕwrʔ
21:06	wšdr mryʔ ʕl ʕmʔ ḥwwtʔ ḥrmnʔ wnktwhy lʕmʔ wmytw ʕmʔ sgyʔʔ mn ʔysryl
21:07	wʔtw ʕmʔ lwt mwšʔ <qdm mryʔ#3#> wʔmrw lh ḥṭyn ʕl drṭnn ʕl mryʔ wʔp ʕlyk ṣlʔ qdm mryʔ wnprq mnn ḥwwtʔ wṣly mwšʔ ʕl ʕmʔ
21:08	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ ʕbd lk ḥwyʔ ḥrmnʔ dnḥšʔ wsymyhy lʔtʔ wkl mn dnkt lh ḥwyʔ nḥzywhy wnḥʔ
21:09	wʕbd mwšʔ ḥwyʔ dnḥšʔ wsmh lʔtʔ wmʔ dnkt <hwʔ#3#> ḥwyʔ lgbrʔ ḥʔr bḥwyʔ dnḥšʔ wḥyʔ
21:10	wšqlw bny ʔysryl wšrw bʔbwt
21:11	wšqlw mn ʔbwt wšrw bʕynʔ dʕbryʔ bmdbrʔ dqdm mwʔb mn mdnḥʔ mn mdnḥy šmšʔ
21:12	wmn tmn šqlw wšrw bnḥlʔ dzrd
21:13	wmn tmn šqlw wšrw bʕbrʔ dʔrnwn bmdbrʔ dnpq mn tḥwmʔ dʔmwryʔ mṭl dʔrnwn tḥwmʔ hw dmwʔbyʔ byt mwʔbyʔ lbyt ʔmwryʔ
21:14	mṭl hnʔ mtʔmr bspr qrbwhy dmryʔ šlhbytʔ bʕlʕlʔ wbnḥlʔ dʔrnwn
21:15	wʔtqn nḥlʔ dṣlyn hww lytbʔ dʕd/dʕbd#3#/ wsmkyn/wmsmkyn#3#/ hww ʕl tḥwmʔ dmwʔbyʔ
21:16	wtmn brʔ hy brʔ dʔmr mryʔ/ʔlhʔ#3#/ lmwšʔ knš ly ʕmʔ/lʕmʔ#3#/ wʔtl lhwn myʔ/ʔgmʔ#3#/
21:17	hydyn šbḥ ʔysryl tšbwḥtʔ hdʔ sqy brʔ ʕnw lh
21:18	brʔ dḥprwh rwrbnʔ wḥṭwh šlyṭnʔ dʕmʔ wbdqwh bḥwṭryhwn wmn mdbrʔ ʔtyhbt lmtnʔ
21:19	wmn mtnʔ lnḥlʔyl wmn nḥlʔyl lbmwt
21:20	wmn bmwt dnḥlʔ dbḥqlʔ dmwʔb lryš rmtʔ dmtḥzyʔ lwqbl ʔšymwn
21:21	wšdr ʔysryl ʔyzgdʔ lwt syḥwn mlkʔ dʔmwryʔ wʔmr lh
21:22	ʔʕbr bʔrʕk wlʔ nsṭʔ bḥqlʔ wbkrmʔ wlʔ nštʔ mn myʔ dgwbʔ ʔlʔ bʔwrḥ mlkʔ nʔzl ʕdmʔ dnʕbr tḥwmk
21:23	wlʔ šbq syḥwn lʔysryl dnʕbr btḥwmh wknš syḥwn lkwlh ḥylh/ʕmh#3#/ wnpq lʔwrʕʔ dʔysryl lmdbrʔ wʔtʔ lyhṣ wʔtktš ʕm ʔysryl
21:24	wmḥyhy ʔysryl bpwmʔ dsypʔ/dḥrbʔ#3#/ wyrtw ʔrʕh mn ʔrnwn wʕdmʔ lybq wʕdmʔ lbny ʕmwn mṭwl dʕšyn hwʔ tḥwmʔ dbny ʕmwn
21:25	wnsb ʔysryl hlyn klhyn qwryʔ wytb ʔysrʔyl bklhyn qwryʔ dʔmwryʔ bḥšbwn wbklhwn kprwnyh
21:26	mṭl dḥšbwn qryth hy dsyḥwn mlkʔ dʔmwryʔ whw ʔtktš ʕm mlkʔ dmwʔb qdmyʔ/qdmʔ#3#/ wnsb klh ʔrʕh mn tḥwmh wʕdmʔ lʔrnwn
21:27	mṭl hnʔ ʔmryn bmtlʔ ʕwlw lḥšbwn ttbnʔ wttqn/wttb#3#/ qryth dsyḥwn
21:28	mṭl dnwrʔ npqt mn ḥšbwn wšlhbytʔ mn krkʔ dsyḥwn wʔklt lʕd dmwʔb wlplḥy ʕlwtʔ dʔrnwn
21:29	wy lk ʔrnwn wy lk mwʔb ʔbdt ʕmʔ dkmwš yhb bnwhy bhmyrʔ wbnth bšbyʔ lsyḥwn mlkʔ dʔmwryʔ
21:30	wḥqltʔ/wšwlṭnʔ#3#/ dḥšbwn ʔbd ʕdmʔ lrybwn wṣdy ʕdmʔ lnkḥ dbmdbrʔ
21:31	wytb ʔysryl bʔrʕʔ dʔmwryʔ
21:32	wšdr mwšʔ lmgš lyʕzyr wkbš kprwnyh wʔwbd lʔmwryʔ dtmn
21:33	whpkw slqw lʔrʕʔ dmtnyn wnpq ʕwg mlkʔ dmtnyn lʔwrʕhwn hw wklh ʕmh lqrbʔ bʔrdʕy
21:34	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ lʔ tdḥl mnh mṭl dbʔydyk mšlm ʔnʔ lh wlkwlh ʕmh wlklh ʔrʕh wʕbd lh ʔyk dʕbdt lsyḥwn mlkʔ dʔmwryʔ dytb hwʔ bḥšbwn
21:35	wḥrbwhy lh wlbnwhy wlklh ʕmh wlʔ šbqw lh srydʔ wyrtw ʔrʕh
22:01	wšqlw bny ʔysryl wšrw bʕrbwt mwʔb \dbʕbrʔ dywrdnn /dʕl ywrdnn#3#/ dʔyryḥw
22:02	nbywth dblʕm wḥzʔ blq br ṣpwr kwl dʕbd ʔysryl lʔmwryʔ
22:03	wdḥlw mwʔbyʔ mn qdm ʕmʔ ṭb mṭl dsgy hwʔ ṭb wʕqt lhwn lmwʔbyʔ mn qdm bny ʔysryl
22:04	wʔmr mwʔb lsbʔ dmdyn mkyl rʕyn knšʔ hnʔ lklhwn dḥdryn ʔyk drʕʔ twrʔ lywrqʔ dḥqlʔ wblq hwʔ br ṣpwr mlkʔ dmwʔbyʔ bzbnʔ hw
22:05	wšdr ʔyzgdʔ lwt blʕm br bʕwr pšwrʔ dʕl nhrʔ lʔrʕʔ dbny ʕmwn lmqryh wlmʔmr lh hʔ ʕmʔ npq mn mṣryn wksy ʔpyh dʔrʕʔ whʔ šryn lwqbly
22:06	mkyl tʔ lwṭyhy ly lʕmʔ hnʔ mṭl dʕšyn hw mny kbr nškḥ nḥrwb mnh wnwbdywhy mn ʔrʕʔ mṭl dydʕ ʔnʔ dlmn dbrk ʔnt bryk hw wlmn/wmn#3#/ dlʔṭ ʔnt lyṭ hw
22:07	wʔzlw sbʔ dmwʔb wsbʔ dmdyn wqṣmyhwn bʔydyhwn wʔtw lwt blʕm wʔmrw lh mlwhy dblq
22:08	wʔmr lhwn bwtw hrkʔ bllyʔ <hnʔ#3#> wʔtl lkwn ptgmʔ ʔyk dʔmr ly mryʔ wpšw rwrbnʔ dmwʔb lwt blʕm
22:09	wʔtʔ ʔlhʔ ʕl/lwt#3#/ blʕm wʔmr lh mn ʔnwn hlyn gbrʔ dʕmk
22:10	wʔmr blʕm lʔlhʔ blq br ṣpwr mlkʔ dmwʔb šdr ʕly wʔmr ly
22:11	hʔ ʕmʔ npq mn mṣryn wksy ʔpyh dʔrʕʔ hšʔ tʔ lwṭyhy ly kbr ʔškḥ lmtktšw/ʔtktš#3#/ ʕmh wʔwbdywhy
22:12	wʔmr ʔlhʔ lblʕm lʔ tʔzl ʕmhwn wlʔ tlwṭyhy lʕmʔ mṭl dbryk hw
22:13	wqm blʕm bṣprʔ wʔmr lrwrbnʔ dblq zlw lʔrʕkwn/lʔwrḥkwn#3#/ mṭl dlʔ ṣbʔ mryʔ lmšbqny dʔzl ʕmkwn
22:14	wqmw rwrbnʔ dmwʔb wʔtw lwt blq wʔmryn lh lʔ ṣbʔ blʕm lmʔtʔ ʕmn
22:15	whpk twb blq wšdr ʔyzgdʔ drwrbyn wyqyryn mn hlyn
22:16	wʔtw lwt blʕm wʔmrw lh hknʔ ʔmr blq br ṣpwr lʔ ttklʔ lmʔtʔ lwty
22:17	mṭl dmyqrw ʔyqrk ṭb wkl dtʔmr ly ʔʕbd <lk#3#> wtʔ lwṭ ly lʕmʔ hnʔ
22:18	wʕnʔ blʕm wʔmr lʕbdwhy/lʔyzgdwhy#3#/ dblq ʔn ntl ly blq mlʔ byth sʔmʔ \ʔw dhbʔ /wdhbʔ#3#/ lʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ dʔʕbr ʕl mlt pwmh dmryʔ ʔlhy lʔ ʕl dzʕwryʔ wlʔ ʕl drbʔ
22:19	mkyl pwšw ʔp ʔntwn hrkʔ bllyʔ wʔdʕ mnʔ mwsp mryʔ lmmllw ʕmy
22:20	wʔtʔ ʔlhʔ ʕl blʕm bllyʔ wʔmr lh ʔn lmqryk ʔtw hlyn gbrʔ qwm zl ʕmhwn blḥwd ptgmʔ dʔmr ʔnʔ lk hw <hw#3#> ʕbd
22:21	wqm blʕm bṣprʔ wʔrmy ʕl ʔtnh/ḥmrh#3#/ wʔzl ʕm rwrbnʔ dmwʔb/dblq#3#/
22:22	wʔtḥmt rwgzh dʔlhʔ/dmryʔ#3#/ ʕlwhy ʕl dʔzl wqm mlʔkh dmryʔ bʔwrḥʔ dnhwʔ lh sṭnʔ whw rkyb ʕl ḥmrh wtryn ʕlymwhy ʕmh
22:23	wḥzt ʔtnʔ lmlʔkh dmryʔ dqʔm/qʔm#3#/ bʔwrḥʔ wsyph šmyṭ wʔḥyd bʔydh wsṭt ʔtnʔ mn ʔwrḥʔ wʔzlt bḥqlʔ wmḥh blʕm lʔtnʔ <hy#3#> lmsṭywth lʔwrḥʔ
22:24	wqm mlʔkh dmryʔ bšbylʔ dkrmʔ dsygʔ mkʔ wsygʔ mkʔ
22:25	wḥzt ʔtnʔ lmlʔkh dmryʔ wʔtḥbṣt bʔstʔ wḥbṣth rglh/lrglh#3#/ dblʕm bʔstʔ wʔwsp <twb#3#> lmmḥyh
22:26	wʔwsp mlʔkh dmryʔ wʕbr wqm bʔtrʔ ʔlyṣʔ ʔtr dlyt ʔwrḥʔ lmsṭʔ lʔ lymynʔ wlʔ lsmlʔ
22:27	wḥzt ʔtnʔ lmlʔkh dmryʔ wrbʕt tḥyt blʕm wʔḥmt rwgzh dblʕm wmḥh lʔtnʔ bḥwṭrʔ
22:28	wptḥ mryʔ pwmh dʔtnʔ wʔmrt lblʕm mnʔ ʕbdt lk dmḥytny hʔ tlt zbnyn
22:29	wʔmr blʕm lʔtnʔ ʕl dbzḥt by wʔlw ʔyt hwʔ sypʔ bʔydy hšʔ qṭl hwyt lky
22:30	wʔmrt ʔtnʔ lblʕm lʔ hwyt ʔnʔ ʔtnk drkyb ʔnt ʕly mn ṭlywtk wʕdmʔ lywmnʔ dlmʔ mmtwm ʕbdt lk hknʔ ʔmr lh lʔ
22:31	wglʔ mryʔ ʕynwhy dblʕm wḥzʔ lmlʔkh dmryʔ qʔm/dqʔm#3#/ bʔwrḥʔ wsyph šmyṭ wʔḥyd bʔydh wqʕd wsgd ʕl ʔpwhy
22:32	wʔmr lh mlʔkh dmryʔ lmnʔ mḥyt ʔtnk hʔ tlt zbnyn hʔ ʔnʔ npqt dʔhwʔ lk sṭnʔ ʕl dtrṣʔ ʔwrḥʔ lwqbly
22:33	wḥztny ʔtnʔ wsṭt mn qdmy hʔ tlt zbnyn wʔlw lʔ sṭt mn qdmy hšʔ lk qṭl hwyt wlh mḥʔ hwyt
22:34	wʔmr blʕm lmlʔkh dmryʔ ḥṭyt lʔ ydʕ hwyt dʔnt qʔm lwqbly bʔwrḥʔ hšʔ ʔn byš bʕynyk ʔhpwk ly
22:35	wʔmr mlʔkh dmryʔ lblʕm zl ʕm gbrʔ blḥwd ptgmʔ dʔmr ʔnʔ lk hw <hw#3#> ʕbd wʔzl blʕm ʕm rwrbnʔ dblq
22:36	wšmʕ blq dʔtʔ blʕm wnpq lʔwrʕh lqrytʔ dmwʔb dbtḥwmʔ dʔrnwn dbspry tḥwmʔ
22:37	wʔmr blq lblʕm hʔ šdrt ʕlyk/lwtk#3#/ lmqryk ʔykw lʔ ʔtyt lwty kbr ʔmr hwyt dlʔ/lʔ#3#/ mṣʔ ʔnʔ bḥylʔ lmyqrwtk
22:38	wʔmr blʕm lblq hʔ ʔtyt lwtk hšʔ dlmʔ mškḥw mškḥ ʔnʔ dʔmr mdm ʔlʔ <hw#3#> ptgmʔ dsʔm ʔlhʔ bpwmy hw hw ʔmr ʔnʔ
22:39	wʔzl blʕm ʕm blq wʔʕlh lqwryt ḥṣrwt
22:40	wnks blq twrʔ wʕnʔ wšdr lblʕm wlrwrbnʔ dʕmh
22:41	wkd hwʔ ṣprʔ dbr blq lblʕm wʔsqh lbmwt bʕlʔ wḥzʔ mn tmn skh dʕmʔ
23:01	wʔmr blʕm lblq bny ly hrkʔ šbʕʔ mdbḥyn wṭyb ly hrkʔ šbʕʔ twryn wšbʕʔ dkryn
23:02	wʕbd blq ʔyk dʔmr lh blʕm wʔsq blʕm wblq twrʔ wdkrʔ ʕl mdbḥʔ
23:03	wʔmr blʕm lblq qwm hrkʔ lwt ʕlwtk wʔnʔ ʔzl ṭk nqrʔ mryʔ lʔwrʕy wptgmʔ dmḥwʔ ly ʔḥwywhy lk wʔzl špyʔyt
23:04	wʔtgly ʔlhʔ ʕl blʕm wʔmr lh šbʕʔ mdbḥyn ṭybt wʔsqt twrʔ wdkrʔ ʕl mdbḥʔ
23:05	wsm mryʔ mltʔ bpwmh dblʕm wʔmr lh zl lwt blq whknʔ mll
23:06	wʔtʔ lwth whw qʔm lwt ʕlwth hw wklhwn rwrbnʔ dmwʔb
23:07	wʔrym bmtlh wʔmr mn ʔrm/ʔdwm#3#/ dbrny blq mlkʔ dmwʔbyʔ mn ṭwry mdnḥʔ wʔmr ly tʔ lwṭ ly lyʕqwb wtʔ ʔwbd ly lʔysryl
23:08	mnʔ ʔlwṭywhy dlʔ lṭh ʔlhʔ wmnʔ ʔwbdywhy dlʔ ʔwbdh mryʔ
23:09	mṭl dmn ršʔ dṭwrʔ ḥzyth wmn rmtʔ ḥrth hʔ ʕmʔ blḥwdwhy šrʔ wbʕmmʔ lʔ mtḥšb
23:10	mnw mškḥ lmmnʔ ʕkrh/ʕqrh#3#/ dyʕqwb wmnynʔ drwbʕh dʔysryl tmwt npšy mwtʔ dtryṣyhwn wthwʔ ḥrty ʔkwthwn
23:11	wʔmr blq lblʕm mnʔ ʕbdt ly lmlṭ bʕldbby/lbʕldbby#3#/ qrytk whʔ mbrkw mbrk ʔnt lhwn
23:12	wʕnʔ blʕm wʔmr hʔ/hw#3#/ mdm dsʔm mryʔ bpwmy hw hw nṭr ʔnʔ lmmllw
23:13	wʔmr lh blq tʔ ʕmy lʔtrʔ ʔḥrnʔ dtḥzywhy/wtḥzywhy#3#/ mn tmn brm dyn ḥrth tḥzʔ wklh lʔ tḥzʔ wlwṭyhy ly mn tmn
23:14	wdbrh lḥql dwqʔ lryš rmtʔ wbnʔ šbʕʔ mdbḥyn wʔsq twrʔ wdkrʔ ʕl mdbḥʔ
23:15	wʔmr blʕm lblq qwm hrkʔ lwt ʕlwtk wʔnʔ ʔmṭʔ ʕdmʔ lhrkʔ
23:16	wʔtgly mryʔ/ʔlhʔ#3#/ ʕl blʕm wsm mltʔ bpwmh wʔmr lh zl lwt blq whknʔ ʔmr lh
23:17	wʔtʔ lwth whw qʔm hwʔ lwt ʕlwth wrwrbnʔ dmwʔb ʕmh wʔmr lh blq mnʔ ʔmr mryʔ
23:18	wʔrym bmtlh wʔmr qwm blq wšmʕ wṣwt lshdwty br ṣpwr
23:19	lʔ hwʔ gbrʔ ʔlhʔ dndgl/dnkdb#3#/ wʔp lʔ brnšʔ dntmlk hw ʔmr wʕbd/whww#3#/ wmlth qymʔ lʕlmyn
23:20	hʔ lmbrkw ʔtdbrt wbwrktʔ lʔ ʔhpk
23:21	lʔ ḥzʔ ʔnʔ ʕwlʔ byʕqwb wlʔ ḥʔr ʔnʔ ʕlyʔ bʔysryl mryʔ ʔlhh ʕmh wtšbwḥtʔ dmlkh bh
23:22	ʔlhʔ dʔpq ʔnwn mn mṣryn bʕwšnh wbrwmh
23:23	mṭl dlʔ nḥšʔ byʕqwb/byt yʕqwb#3#/ wʔp lʔ qṣmʔ bʔysryl ʔyk dbzbnʔ hnʔ ntʔmr lyʕqwb wlʔysryl mnʔ ʕbd ʔlhʔ
23:24	hʔ ʕmʔ ʔyk ʔryʔ qʔm wʔyk ʔryʔ mštql lʔ ndmk ʕdmʔ dnʔkwl tbrʔ wdmʔ dqṭylʔ nštʔ
23:25	wʔmr blq lblʕm lʔ mlṭ tlwṭywhy wʔplʔ mbrkw/lmbrkw#3#/ tbrkywhy
23:26	wʕnʔ blʕm wʔmr lblq lʔ ʔmrt lk dkl dʔmr ly mryʔ hw hw ʕbd ʔnʔ
23:27	wʔmr blq lblʕm tʔ ʔdbrk lʔtrʔ ʔḥrnʔ kbr nšpr bʕyny ʔlhʔ wlwṭyhy ly mn tmn
23:28	wdbr blq lblʕm lryš pʕwr dmtḥzʔ lwqbl ʔšymwn
23:29	wʔmr blʕm lblq bny ly hrkʔ šbʕʔ mdbḥyn wṭyb ly hrkʔ šbʕʔ twryn wšbʕʔ dkryn
23:30	wʕbd blq ʔyk dʔmr lh blʕm wʔsq twrʔ wdkrʔ ʕl mdbḥʔ
24:01	wḥzʔ blʕm dšpyr hw bʕyny mryʔ lmbrkwth lʔysryl wlʔ ʔzl ʔyk dbkl šʕʔ lmdʕ nḥšʔ wsm lmdbrʔ ʔpwhy
24:02	wʔrym blʕm ʕynwhy wḥzʔ lʔysryl kd šryn šbṭyn šbṭyn whwt ʕlwhy rwḥh dʔlhʔ
24:03	wʔrym bmtlh wʔmr ʔmr blʕm brh dbʕwr ʔmr gbrʔ dglyʔ ʕynh
24:04	ʔmr dšmʕ mʔmrʔ dʔlhʔ wḥzwʔ dʔlhʔ ḥzʔ kd rmʔ wptyḥn ʕynwhy
24:05	mʔ špyr mšknk yʕqwb wmšknyk ʔysryl
24:06	ʔyk nḥlʔ drdyn wʔyk prdysʔ dʕl nhrʔ wʔyk mšknʔ dnṣb mryʔ wʔyk ʔrzʔ dʕl myʔ
24:07	npwq gbrʔ mn bnwhy wzrʕh bmyʔ sgyʔʔ wnttrym mn ʔgg mlkʔ wttrym mlkwth
24:08	ʔlhʔ dʔpq ʔnwn mn mṣryn bʕwšnh wbrwmh nʔkwl ʕmmʔ snʔwhy wgrmyhwn ntbr wḥṣyhwn npsq/npswq#3#/
24:09	\rbʕ wdmk /brk wrbʕ#2#/ ʔyk ʔryʔ wʔyk gwryʔ dʔryʔ wmnw nqymywhy brkyk brykyn wlyṭyk lyṭyn
24:10	wʔḥmt rwgzh dblq ʕl blʕm wṭrp ʔydwhy wʔmr blq lblʕm lmlṭ bʕldbby qrytk whʔ mbrkw mbrk ʔnt lhwn hʔ tlt zbnyn
24:11	hšʔ pwq zl lk ʔtrk ʔmrt dmyqrw ʔyqrk whʔ klk mryʔ mn ʔyqrʔ
24:12	\wʕnʔ blʕm wʔmr /wʔmr blʕm#3#/ lblq hʔ ʔp lʔyzgdyk dšdrt lwty ʔmrt
24:13	dʔn yhb/ntl#3#/ ly blq mlʔ byth sʔmʔ \ʔw dhbʔ /wdhbʔ#3#/ lʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ dʔʕbr ʕl mlt pwmh dmryʔ wʔʕbd mn lby ṭbtʔ ʔw byštʔ ʔnʔ <ʔlʔ#3#> mdm dʔmr ly mryʔ hw hw mmll ʔnʔ
24:14	hšʔ hʔ ʔzl ʔnʔ ly lʔrʕy tʔ dyn ʔmlkk mdm dʕbd ʕmʔ hnʔ lʕmk bḥrtʔ dywmtʔ
24:15	wʔrym bmtlh wʔmr ʔmr blʕm brh dbʕwr ʔmr gbrʔ dglyʔ ʕynh
24:16	ʔmr dšmʕ mʔmrʔ dʔlhʔ wydʕ mdʕʔ dmrymʔ wḥzwʔ dʔlhʔ ḥzʔ kd ʔrmʔ wptyḥn ʕynwhy
24:17	ḥzyth wlʔ mn kdw wḥrth wlʔ hwʔ qryb ndnḥ kwkbʔ mn yʕqwb wnqwm ršʔ mn ʔysryl wnwbd lgnbrʔ dmwʔb wnšʕbd lklhwn bny šyt
24:18	wthwʔ ʔdwm yrtwth wsʕyr yrtwtʔ dbʕldbbwhy thwʔ dylh/yrtwth#3#/ wʔysryl nqnʔ ḥylʔ
24:19	wnḥwt mn yʕqwb wnwbd lʔynʔ dmštwzb mn qrytʔ
24:20	wḥzʔ lʕmlyq wʔrym bmtlh wʔmr ryš ʕmmʔ ʕmlyq wḥrth tʔbd lʕlmyn
24:21	wḥzʔ lqynyʔ wʔrym bmtlh wʔmr ʕšyn mwtbk wsym bšqypʔ qnk
24:22	ʔn nhwʔ lbwʕrʔ qyn ʕdmʔ lʔtwr nšbwnk
24:23	wʔrym bmtlh wʔmr wy mnw nḥʔ mʔ dsʔm hlyn ʔlhʔ
24:24	wlgywnʔ npqn mn ʔrʕʔ dktyʔ wnšʕbdwn/wnštʕbdwn#3#/ lʔtwr wnšʕbdwn/wnšmšwn#3#/ ʔp lʕbryʔ wʔp hnwn nʔbdwn lʕlmyn
24:25	wqm blʕm whpk ʔzl lʔtrh wʔp blq ʔzl <lh#3#> lʔwrḥh
25:01	wytb ʔysryl bsṭym wšry ʕmʔ lmznyw bbnt mwʔb
25:02	wqry lʕmʔ ldbḥʔ dʔlhyhyn wʔklw ʕmʔ wsgdw lʔlhyhyn
25:03	wʔštmly ʔysryl bbʕl pʕwr wʔtḥmt rwgzh dmryʔ ʕl bny ʔysryl
25:04	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ dbr lklhwn ršʔ dʕmʔ wprsʔ ʔnwn qdm/lwqbl#3#/ mryʔ lwqbl šmšʔ wthpwk ḥmtʔ drwgzh mn \bny ʔysryl /dʔysryl#3#/
25:05	wʔmr mwšʔ ldynʔ dʔysryl qṭwlw ʔnš gbrwhy ʔylyn dʔštmlyw bbʕl pʕwr
25:06	whʔ gbrʔ mn bny ʔysryl ʔtʔ wqrb qdm ʔḥwhy wʕl ʕl mdynytʔ lʕyn mwšʔ wlʕyn klh knwštʔ dbny ʔysryl whnwn bkyn hww btrʕʔ dmšknzbnʔ
25:07	wḥzyhy pynḥs br ʔlyʕzr br ʔhrwn khnʔ wqm mn gw knwštʔ wnsb rwmḥʔ bʔydh
25:08	wʕl btr/ʕl#3#/ gbrʔ br ʔysrʔyl lqlytʔ wdqr ʔnwn ltryhwn lgbrʔ br ʔysryl wlʔnttʔ bkrsh bqlytʔ wʔtkly mwtnʔ dmn šlyʔ mn ʔysryl
25:09	whww dmytw bmwtnʔ dmn šlyʔ ʕsryn wʔrbʕʔ ʔlpyn
25:10	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh

25:12	mṭl hnʔ ʔmrt dhʔ/hʔ#3#/ yhb ʔnʔ lh qymʔ dšlmʔ

26:01	ʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ wlʔlyʕzr br ʔhrwn khnʔ

26:11	wbny qwrḥ lʔ mytw

26:28	wbny ywsp lšrbthwn mnšʔ wʔprym

26:32	šmydʕ šrbtʔ dšmydʕ ḥpr šrbtʔ dḥpr
26:33	wlṣlpḥd br ḥpr lʔ hww lh bnyʔ ʔlʔ bntʔ wšmhʔ dbnth dṣlpḥd mḥlʔ wyʕʔ wḥglʔ wmlkʔ wtrṣʔ
26:34	whlyn šrbtʔ dmnšʔ wmnynhwn/wlmnynhwn#3#/ ḥmšyn wtryn ʔlpyn wšbʕmʔʔ

27:01	wqrb bnth dṣlpḥd br ḥpr br glʕd br mkyr br mnšʔ mn šrbtʔ dmnšʔ br ywsp whlyn šmhʔ dbnth mḥlʔ wyʕʔ wḥglʔ wmlkʔ wtrṣʔ
27:02	wqm qdm mwšʔ wqdm ʔlyʕzr khnʔ wqdm rwrbnʔ wqdm klh knwštʔ btrʕʔ dmšknzbnʔ wʔmrn

28:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
28:02	pqd lbny ʔysryl wʔmr lhwn qwrbny wlḥmʔ dqwrbny wryḥʔ dswtʔ nhwwn nṭryn wmqrbyn ly bzbnyhwn
28:03	wʔmr lhwn hnʔ qwrbnʔ dthwwn mqrbyn lmryʔ ʔmrʔ bny šntʔ dlyt bhwn mwmʔ tryn bywmʔ lyqdʔ šlmʔ ʔmynʔyt
28:04	ʔmrʔ ḥd qrb bṣprʔ wʔmrʔ ʔḥrnʔ qrb byt rmšʔ

28:09	wbywmʔ dšbtʔ ʔmrʔ tryn bny šntʔ dlyt bhwn mwmʔ wtryn ʕsrwnyn nšypʔ dqwrbnʔ dpyl bmšḥʔ wnwqyh

28:11	wbryš yrḥykwn qrbw yqdʔ šlmʔ lmryʔ twrʔ bny bqrʔ tryn wdkrʔ ḥd wʔmrʔ bny šntʔ šbʕʔ dlyt bhwn mwmʔ
28:12	wtltʔ ʕsrwnyn nšypʔ dqwrbnʔ dpyl bmšḥʔ ltwrʔ ḥd wtryn ʕsrwnyn nšypʔ dpyl bmšḥʔ ldkrʔ ḥd
28:13	wʕsrwnʔ ḥd nšypʔ dqwrbnʔ dpyl bmšḥʔ lmryʔ ḥd yqdʔ šlmʔ lryḥ/dryḥ#3#/ swtʔ lmryʔ
28:14	wnwqyhwn ḥmrʔ plgh dhmynʔ nhwʔ ltwrʔ wtwlth dhmynʔ nhwʔ ldkrʔ wrwbʕh dhmynʔ nhwʔ lʔmrʔ hnʔ hw yqdʔ šlmʔ dryš yrḥʔ byrḥʔ/bklhwn yrḥʔ#3#/ dšntʔ
28:15	wṣpryʔ ḥd dʕzʔ ḥlp ḥṭhʔ lmryʔ ʕl yqdʔ šlmʔ ʔmynʔyt ntʕbd hw wnwqyh
28:16	wbʔrbʕsrʔ byrḥʔ qdmyʔ pṣḥʔ hw lmryʔ
28:17	wbḥmšʕsrʔ bh byrḥʔ ʕdʕʔdʔ <lmryʔ#3#> šbʕʔ ywmyn pṭyrʔ ntʔkl
28:18	ywmʔ qdmyʔ qryʔ wqdyšʔ wkl ʕbd dpwlḥnʔ lʔ tʕbdwn <bh#3#>
28:19	wqrbw qwrbnʔ yqdʔ šlmʔ lmryʔ twrʔ bny bqrʔ tryn wdkrʔ ḥd wʔmrʔ bny šntʔ šbʕʔ dlyt bhwn mwmʔ nhwwn lkwn
28:20	wqwrbnhwn nšypʔ dpyl bmšḥʔ tltʔ ʕsrwnyn ltwrʔ wtryn ʕsrwnyn ldkrʔ tʕbdwn
28:21	wʕsrwnʔ ḥd lʔmrʔ ḥd hknʔ ʕbdw lšbʕtyhwn ʔmrʔ

28:24	hlyn hwytwn ʕbdyn bkl ywm šbʕʔ ywmyn qwrbnʔ dlḥmʔ <ʔmynʔ#3#> lryḥʔ dswtʔ lmryʔ ʕl/ʕm#3#/ yqdʔ šlmʔ ʔmynʔ/ʔmynʔyt#3#/ ntʕbd hw wnwqyh
28:25	wywmʔ dšbʕʔ qryʔ wqdyšʔ nhwʔ lkwn wkl ʕbd dpwlḥnʔ lʔ tʕbdwn
28:26	wbywmʔ dbkrʔ mʔ dmqrbyn ʔntwn smydʔ mn ḥdtʔ lmryʔ bšbwʕykwn qryʔ wqdyšʔ nhwʔ lkwn wkl ʕbd dpwlḥnʔ lʔ tʕbdwn
28:27	wqrbw yqdʔ šlmʔ lryḥ swtʔ lmryʔ twrʔ bny bqrʔ tryn wdkrʔ ḥd wʔmrʔ bny šntʔ šbʕʔ

28:31	sṭr mn yqdʔ šlmʔ ʔmynʔ wsmydh hwytwn ʕbdyn dlyt bhwn mwmʔ wnwqyhwn
29:01	wbḥd byrḥʔ byrḥʔ dšbʕʔ qryʔ wqdyšʔ nhwʔ lkwn wkl ʕbd dpwlḥnʔ lʔ tʕbdwn ywmʔ dywbbʔ nhwʔ lkwn
29:02	wʕbdw yqdʔ šlmʔ lryḥʔ dswtʔ lmryʔ twrʔ ḥd br bqrʔ wdkrʔ ḥd wʔmrʔ bny šntʔ šbʕʔ dlyt bhwn mwmʔ
29:03	wqwrbnhwn nšypʔ dpyl bmšḥʔ tltʔ ʕsrwnyn ltwrʔ ḥd wtryn ʕsrwnyn ldkrʔ ḥd
29:04	wʕsrwnʔ ḥd lʔmrʔ ḥd hknʔ lšbʕtyhwn ʔmrʔ
29:05	wṣpryʔ ḥd dʕzʔ lḥṭhʔ lmḥsyw ʕlykwn
29:06	sṭr mn yqdʔ šlmʔ dryš yrḥʔ wsmydh yqdʔ šlmʔ ʔmynʔ wsmydhwn wnwqyhwn ʔyk zdqhwn lryḥ swtʔ qwrbnʔ lmryʔ
29:07	wbʕsrtʔ byrḥʔ/dyrḥʔ#2#/ hnʔ dšbʕʔ qryʔ wqdyšʔ nhwʔ lkwn wkl ʕbd dpwlḥnʔ lʔ tʕbdwn
29:08	wqrbw yqdʔ šlmʔ \lmryʔ lryḥʔ dswtʔ /lryḥ swtʔ lmryʔ#3#/ twrʔ ḥd br bqrʔ wdkrʔ ḥd wʔmrʔ bny šntʔ šbʕʔ dlyt bhwn mwmʔ
29:09	wqwrbnhwn nšypʔ dpyl bmšḥʔ tltʔ ʕsrwnyn ltwrʔ wtryn ʕsrwnyn ldkrʔ
29:10	wʕsrwnʔ ḥd lʔmrʔ ḥd hknʔ lšbʕtyhwn ʔmrʔ
29:11	wṣpryʔ ḥd dʕzʔ ḥlp ḥṭhʔ sṭr mn yqdʔ dḥwsyʔ yqdʔ šlmʔ ʔmynʔ wsmydhwn wnwqyhwn
29:12	wbḥmšʕsrʔ byrḥʔ hnʔ dšbʕʔ qryʔ wqdyšʔ nhwʔ lkwn wkl ʕbd dpwlḥnʔ lʔ tʕbdwn wʕbdw ʕdʕʔdʔ lmryʔ šbʕʔ ywmyn
29:13	wqrbw yqdʔ šlmʔ qwrbnʔ lryḥʔ/dryḥʔ#3#/ dswtʔ lmryʔ twrʔ bny bqrʔ tltʕsr wdkrʔ tryn wʔmrʔ bny šntʔ ʔrbtʕsr dlyt bhwn mwmʔ
29:14	wqwrbnhwn nšypʔ dpyl bmšḥʔ tltʔ ʕsrwnyn ltwrʔ ḥd hknʔ ltltʕsr twryn wtryn ʕsrwnyn ldkrʔ ḥd hknʔ ltryn dkryn
29:15	wʕsrwnʔ ḥd lʔmrʔ ḥd hknʔ lʔrbtʕsr ʔmryn
29:16	wṣpryʔ ḥd dʕzʔ lḥṭhʔ/ḥlp ḥṭhʔ#3#/ sṭr mn yqdʔ šlmʔ ʔmynʔ wsmydh wnwqyh
29:17	wbywmʔ dtryn twrʔ bny bqrʔ trʕsr wdkrʔ tryn wʔmrʔ bny šntʔ ʔrbtʕsr dlyt bhwn mwmʔ
29:18	wsmydhwn wnwqyhwn dtwrʔ wddkrʔ wdʔmrʔ bmnynhwn ʔyk zdqhwn

30:01	wʔmr mwšʔ lbny ʔysryl kwl dpqd mryʔ lmwšʔ
30:02	wmll mwšʔ ʕm ršʔ dšbṭʔ dbny ʔysryl wʔmr lhwn hnʔ hw ptgmʔ dpqd mryʔ
30:03	gbrʔ kd ndwr ndrʔ lmryʔ wnʔmʔ bmwmtʔ wnʔswr ʔsrʔ/ʔswrʔ#3#/ ʕl npšh lʔ nbṭl mlth kl mdm dnpq/dʔmr#3#/ mn pwmh nʕbd
30:04	wʔnttʔ kd tdwr ndrʔ lmryʔ wtʔswr ʔsrʔ/ʔswrʔ#3#/ ʕl npšh bṭlywth byt ʔbwh
30:05	wnšmʕ ʔbwh ndrʔ wʔsrʔ dʔsrt ʕl npšh wnštwq lh ʔbwh ntqymwn klhwn ndrʔ \wklhwn ʔsrʔ /wʔsrʔ#3#/ dʔsrt ʕl npšh
30:06	wʔn nbṭl ʔnwn ʔbwh bywmʔ dšmʕ klhwn ndrʔ wklhwn ʔsrʔ dʔsrt ʕl npšh lʔ ntqymwn <lh#3#> wmryʔ nšbwq lh mṭl dbṭl ʔnwn ʔbwh
30:07	wʔn thwʔ lgbrʔ wndryh ʕlyh ʔw pwršnʔ dspwth dʔsrt ʕl npšh
30:08	wnšmʕ bʕlh bywmʔ dšmʕ wnštwq lh ntqymwn klhwn ndrʔ wʔsrʔ dʔsrt ʕl npšh ntqymwn
30:09	wʔn bywmʔ dšmʕ bʕlh bṭl ʔnwn nbṭlwn ndrʔ wpwršnʔ dspwth dʔsrt ʕl npšh wmryʔ nšbwq lh
30:10	wndrʔ dʔrmltʔ wdšbyqtʔ kwl dʔsrʔ ʕl npšh ntqym ʕlyh
30:11	wʔn byt bʕlh ndrt ʔsrt ʔsrʔ ʕl npšh bmwmtʔ
30:12	wnšmʕ bʕlh wnštwq lh wlʔ nbṭl ʔnwn ntqymwn klhwn ndrʔ wklhwn ʔsrʔ dʔsrt ʕl npšh ntqymwn
30:13	wʔn mbṭlw nbṭl ʔnwn bʕlh bywmʔ dšmʕ kl mdm dnpq mn spwth lndryh wlʔsrʔ \dʔsrt ʕl npšh /dnpšh#3#/ lʔ ntqymwn mṭl dbʕlh bṭl ʔnwn wmryʔ nšbwq lh
30:14	klhwn ndrʔ wklhyn mwmytʔ/mwmtʔ#3#/ dʔsrʔ dmsgpyn/dmsgpn#3#/ npšʔ bʕlh nqym ʔnwn wbʕlh nbṭl ʔnwn
30:15	wʔn mštq nštwq lh bʕlh mn ywm lywm ntqymwn klhwn ndrʔ \wklhwn ʔsrʔ /wʔsrʔ#3#/ dʔsrt ʕl npšh <ntqymwn#3#> mṭwl dštq lh bʕlh bywmʔ dšmʕ
30:16	wʔn mbṭlw nbṭl ʔnwn mn btr dšmʕ nqbl ḥṭhh

31:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
31:02	ʔttbʕ ʕyrtʔ dbny ʔysryl mn mdynyʔ whydyn ttknš lwt ʕmk
31:03	\wʔmr mwšʔ lʕmʔ /wmll mwšʔ ʕm ʕmʔ wʔmr lhwn#3#/ zynw mnkwn gbrʔ lḥylʔ wnhwwn ʕl mdynyʔ wntbʕwn tbʕth dmryʔ mn mdynyʔ
31:04	ʔlp ʔlp mn šbṭʔ mn klhwn šbṭʔ dbny ʔysryl šdrw bḥylʔ

31:06	wšdr ʔnwn mwšʔ ʔlp <ʔlp#3#> mn šbṭʔ trʕsr ʔlpyn dmzynyn lhwn wlpynḥs br ʔlyʕzr khnʔ bḥylʔ wmʔnʔ dqwdšʔ wqrntʔ dywbbʔ bʔydh
31:07	wʔtḥylw ʕl mdyn ʔyk dpqd mryʔ lmwšʔ wqṭlw kl dkrʔ
31:08	wlmlkʔ dmdyn qṭlw ʕm qṭylyhwn lʔwy wlrqm wlṣwr wlḥwr wlrbʕ ḥmšʔ mlkʔ mdynyʔ/dmdynyʔ#3#/ wlblʕm br bʕwr qṭlw bḥrbʔ

31:11	wdbrw lklh šbytʔ wlklh dbrtʔ dbny ʔnšʔ wdbʕyrʔ
31:12	wʔytywh lwt mwšʔ wlwt ʔlyʕzr khnʔ wlwt klh knwštʔ dbny ʔysryl šbytʔ wdbrtʔ wbztʔ lmšrytʔ lʕrbwt mwʔb dʕl ywrdnn dʔyryḥw
31:13	wnpq mwšʔ wʔlyʕzr khnʔ wklhwn rwrbnʔ dknwštʔ lʔwrʕhwn lbr mn mšrytʔ

31:17	hšʔ qṭlw klhwn ṭlyʔ dkrʔ wkl ʔnttʔ dydʕʔ mdmkʔ ddkrʔ qṭwlw

31:21	wʔmr ʔlyʕzr khnʔ lgbrʔ dḥylʔ dʔtw mn qrbʔ/ḥylʔ#3#/ hnʔ pwqdnʔ dnmwsʔ dpqd mryʔ lmwšʔ

31:30	wmn plgwtʔ dbny ʔysryl sb ḥd mn ḥmšyn mn ʔnšʔ wmn ḥmrʔ wmn twrʔ wmn ʕnʔ wmn klh bʕyrʔ whb ʔnwn llwyʔ dnṭryn mṭrtʔ dmšknh dmryʔ

31:49	wʔmrw lmwšʔ ʕbdyk qblw ḥwšbnʔ dḥylʔ dgbrʔ ʕbdy qrbʔ dʕmn wlʔ ṭʕʔ mnn gbr
31:50	wqrbn qwrbnh dmryʔ gbrʔ dʔškḥ mʔnʔ ddhbʔ ʔqlnʔ wšʔrʔ wʕzqtʔ wqdšʔ whmnykʔ dnḥsʔ ʕl npštn qdm mryʔ
31:51	wnsb mwšʔ wʔlyʕzr khnʔ dhbʔ mnhwn klhwn mʔnʔ dʕbdʔ
31:52	whwʔ klh dhbʔ dpwršnʔ dʔpršw/dpršw#3#/ lmryʔ šttʕsr ʔlpyn wšbʕmʔʔ wḥmšyn mtqlyn mn ryšy ʔlpʔ wmn ryšy mʔwtʔ
31:53	gbrʔ dyn dḥylʔ bzw lhwn ʔnš lnpšh
31:54	wnsbw mwšʔ wʔlyʕzr khnʔ dhbʔ mn ryšy ʔlpʔ wmn ryšy mʔwtʔ wʔytywhy lmškn zbnʔ dwkrnʔ lbny ʔysryl qdm mryʔ
32:01	wqnynʔ rbʔ hwʔ lbny rwbyl wlbny gd wṭb/dṭb#3#/ ʕšyn wḥzʔwh lyʕzyr wlʔrʕʔ dglʕd ʔtrʔ dʔzl lbyt qnynʔ
32:02	wʔtw bny rwbyl wbny gd wʔmrw lmwšʔ wlʔlyʕzr khnʔ wlrwrbnʔ dknwštʔ
32:03	ʕṭrwt wrybwn wyʕzyr wnmrʔ wḥšbwn wʔlʕlʔ wšbʔ wnbw wbʕwn
32:04	ʔrʕʔ dḥrb mryʔ qdm bny ʔysryl ʔrʕʔ hy dʔzlʔ lbyt qnynʔ wlʕbdyk ʔyt qnynʔ
32:05	wʔmrw ʔn ʔškḥn rḥmʔ qdmyk/bʕynyk#3#/ ttyhb ʔrʕʔ hdʔ lʕbdyk ywrtnʔ wlʔ tʕbrn ywrdnn
32:06	wʔmr mwšʔ lbny rwbyl wlbny gd ʔḥykwn npqyn lqrbʔ wʔntwn ytbyn ʔntwn hrkʔ
32:07	lmnʔ tbryn ʔntwn lbʔ \dbny /dʔḥykwn bny#3#/ ʔysryl dlʔ nʕbrwn lʔrʕʔ dyhb lhwn mryʔ
32:08	hknʔ ʕbdw ʔbhykwn kd šdrt ʔnwn mn rqm dgyʔ lmgš ʔrʕʔ
32:09	wslqw ʕdmʔ lnḥlʔ dsgwlʔ wḥzʔwh/wgšwh#3#/ lʔrʕʔ wtbrw lbʔ dbny ʔysryl dlʔ nʕlwn lʔrʕʔ dyhb lhwn mryʔ
32:10	wʔtḥmt ʕlyhwn rwgzh dmryʔ bywmʔ hw wymʔ wʔmr
32:11	dlʔ nḥzwn gbrʔ dslqw mn mṣryn mn br ʕsryn šnyn wlʕl ʔrʕʔ dymyt lʔbrhm wlʔysḥq wlyʕqwb mṭl dlʔ šmlyw btry
32:12	ʔlʔ ʔn klb br ywpnʔ qnzyʔ wyšwʕ br nwn dšmlyw btr mryʔ
32:13	wʔtḥmt rwgzh dmryʔ ʕl ʔysryl wʔṭʕy ʔnwn bmdbrʔ ʔrbʕyn šnyn ʕdmʔ dspw klh drʔ dgbrʔ dʕbdw byštʔ qdm mryʔ
32:14	whʔ qmtwn ʔp ʔntwn ywmnʔ ḥlp ʔbhykwn trbytʔ dgbrʔ ḥṭyʔ dtwspwn twb rwgzh dmryʔ ʕl ʔysryl
32:15	wʔn thpkwn <twb#3#> mn mryʔ nwsp twb lmṭʕywtkwn bmdbrʔ wmḥblyn ʔntwn ʕl hnʔ klh ʕmʔ
32:16	wqrbw lwth wʔmrw ṭyrʔ dʕnʔ nbnʔ lqnynn hrkʔ wqwryʔ lyqrtn
32:17	wḥnn nzdyn/nrdʔ#3#/ wnʔzl qdm bny ʔysryl ʕdmʔ dnʕl ʔnwn lʔtrhwn wyqrtn ttb bqwryʔ ʕšyntʔ mn qdm ʕmwryh dʔrʕʔ
32:18	lʔ nhpwk lbtyn ʕdmʔ dnʔrtwn bny ʔysryl ʔnš yrtwth
32:19	wlʔ nʔrt ʕmhwn mn ʕbrʔ dywrdnn wlhl mṭl dqbln yrtwtn mn ʕbrʔ dywrdnn mn mdnḥʔ
32:20	wʔmr lhwn mwšʔ ʔn ʕbdyn ʔntwn ptgmʔ hnʔ wmzdynyn ʔntwn qdm mryʔ lqrbʔ
32:21	wʕbryn ʔntwn ywrdnn klkwn kd mzynyn/mzdynyn#3#/ ʔntwn qdm mryʔ lqrbʔ ʕdmʔ dnwbd bʕldbbwhy mn qdmwhy
32:22	wttkbš ʔrʕʔ qdm mryʔ hydyn thpkwn wttḥswn mn mryʔ wmn <bny#3#> ʔysrʔyl wthwʔ lkwn ʔrʕʔ hdʔ lyrtwtʔ qdm mryʔ
32:23	wʔn lʔ ʕbdyn ʔntwn hknʔ ḥṭyn ʔntwn lmryʔ wdʕw dḥṭhykwn mdrkyn lkwn
32:24	bnw lkwn qwryʔ lyqrtkwn wṭyrʔ lʕnkwn wmdm dnpq mn pwmkwn ʕbdw
32:25	wʔmrw bny rwbyl wbny gd lmwšʔ ʕbdyk nʕbdwn ʔyk dmrn pqd
32:26	yqrtn wnšyn <wbnyn#3#> wqnynn wklh bʕyrn nhwwn bqwryʔ dglʕd
32:27	wʕbdyk nʕbrwn kd mzynyn bḥylʔ qdm mryʔ lqrbʔ ʔyk dmrn ʔmr
32:28	wpqd ʕl klhwn mwšʔ lʔlyʕzr khnʔ wlyšwʕ br nwn wlršʔ dšbṭʔ dʔbhʔ dbny ʔysryl
32:29	wʔmr lhwn mwšʔ ʔn ʕbryn bny rwbyl wbny gd ʕmkwn ywrdnn kd mzynyn <bḥylʔ#3#> qdm mryʔ lqrbʔ wttkbš ʔrʕʔ qdmykwn ttlwn lhwn ʔrʕʔ dglʕd ywrtnʔ
32:30	wʔn lʔ nʕbrwn ʕmkwn kd mzynyn nʔrtwn ʕmkwn bʔrʕʔ dknʕn
32:31	wʕnw bny rwbyl wbny gd wʔmrw lmwšʔ ʔyk dʔmr mryʔ lʕbdyk hknʔ nʕbd
32:32	ḥnn nʕbr kd mzynynn qdm mryʔ lqrbʔ lʔrʕʔ dknʕn wdyln ʔwḥdnʔ dyrtwtn bʕbrʔ dywrdnn
32:33	wyhb lhwn mwšʔ lbny rwbyl wlbny gd wlplgh dšbṭʔ dmnšʔ br ywsp mlkwth dsyḥwn mlkʔ dʔmwryʔ wmlkwth dʕwg mlkʔ dmtnyn ʔrʕʔ klh wqwryh btḥwmyh wqwryʔ dʔrʕʔ dḥdyrn lh
32:34	wbnw bny gd lrybwn wlʕṭrwt wlʕdwʕyr
32:35	wlʕṭrwt šwpn/šwpm#3#/ wlyʕzyr wlybghʔ/wlygbhʔ#3#/
32:36	wlbyt nmrʔ wlbyt hrn qwryʔ ʕšyntʔ wṭyrʔ dʕnʔ
32:37	wbny rwbyl bnw lḥšbwn wlʔlʕlʔ wlqwrytym
32:38	wlnbw wlbʕlmwn dnsybn hwy šmʔ wlsbmʔ wqrw šmhyhyn ʕl šmhʔ dqwryʔ dbnw
32:39	wʔzlw bny mkyr br mnšʔ lglʕd wkbšwh wʔwbdw lʔmwryʔ dbh
32:40	wyhbh mwšʔ lglʕd lmkyr br mnšʔ wytb bh
32:41	wyʔyr br mnšʔ ʔzl wkbš kprwnyhyn wqrʔ ʔnyn kprwnʔ dyʔyr ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
32:42	wnkḥ ʔzl wkbš lqyt wlkprwnyh wqrh bšmh nkḥ
33:01	whlyn mšqlnʔ dbny ʔysryl dnpqw mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn lḥylwthwn bʔydʔ dmwšʔ wdʔhrwn
33:02	wktb mwšʔ mpqnyhwn wmšqlnyhwn bmlt pwmh dmryʔ whlyn mšqlnyhwn wmpqnyhwn
33:03	wšqlw mn rʕmsys bḥmšʕsrʔ byrḥʔ qdmyʔ mn btr pṣḥʔ npqw bny ʔysryl mn mṣryn bʔydʔ rmtʔ/rbtʔ#3#/dmryʔ#3#/ lʕyn klhwn mṣryʔ
33:04	wmṣryʔ qbryn hww lbwkrʔ dqṭl bhwn mryʔ wbʔlhyhwn ʕbd mryʔ dynʔ
33:05	wšqlw bny ʔysryl mn rʕmsys wšrw bskwt
33:06	wšqlw mn skwt wšrw bʔtm dbswpy mdbrʔ
33:07	wšqlw mn ʔtm wšrw ʕl pwm ḥʔrytʔ dqdm bʕlṣpwn wšrw qdm mgdwl
33:08	wšqlw mn pwm ḥʔrytʔ wʔzlw bgw ymʔ lmdbrʔ/bmdbrʔ#3#/ wʔzlw mrdʔ tltʔ ywmyn bmdbrʔ dʔtm wšrw bmwrt
33:09	wšqlw mn mwrt wʔtw lʔlym wbʔlym ʔyt hwy trtʕsrʔ ʕyntʔ dmyʔ wšbʕyn dqlyn wšrw tmn ʕl myʔ
33:10	wšqlw mn ʔlym wšrw ʕl yd ymʔ dswp
33:11	wšqlw mn yd ymʔ dswp wšrw bmdbrʔ dsyn
33:12	wšqlw mn mdbrʔ dsyn wšrw brpqʔ
33:13	wšqlw mn rpqʔ wšrw bʔlwš
33:14	wšqlw mn ʔlwš wšrw brpydyn wlyt hww tmn myʔ lʕmʔ dnštwn
33:15	wšqlw rpydyn wšrw bmdbrʔ dsyny
33:16	wšqlw mn mdbrʔ dsyny wšrw bqbrʔ drgy rgtʔ
33:17	wšqlw mn qbrʔ drgy rgtʔ wšrw bḥṣrwt
33:18	wšqlw mn ḥṣrwt wšrw brtmʔ
33:19	wšqlw mn rtmʔ wšrw brmwn prṣ
33:20	wšqlw mn rmwn prṣ wšrw blbnʔ
33:21	wšqlw mn lbnʔ wšrw brsʔ

33:23	wšqlw mn qhlt wšrw bṭwrʔ dšpr
33:24	wšqlw mn ṭwrʔ dšpr wšrw bḥddʔ
33:25	wšqlw mn ḥddʔ wšrw bmqhlwt
33:26	wšqlw mn mqhlwt wšrw btḥt
33:27	wšqlw mn tḥt wšrw btrḥ
33:28	wšqlw mn trḥ wšrw bmtqʔ
33:29	wšqlw mn mtqʔ wšrw bḥšmwnʔ
33:30	wšqlw mn ḥšmwnʔ wšrw bmsrwt

33:32	wšqlw mn bny yʕqn wšrw bḥdgdgd
33:33	wšqlw mn ḥdgdgd wšrw byṭbt
33:34	wšqlw mn yṭbt wšrw bʕkrwnʔ
33:35	wšqlw mn ʕkrwnʔ wšrw bʕṣynwgbr
33:36	wšqlw mn ʕṣynwgbr wšrw bmdbrʔ dṣyn dhy hy qdš
33:37	wšqlw mn qdš wšrw bhwr ṭwrʔ dbswpy ʔrʕʔ dʔdwm
33:38	wslq ʔhrwn khnʔ lhwr ṭwrʔ bmlt pwmh dmryʔ wmyt tmn bšnt ʔrbʕyn dnpqw bny ʔysryl mn \ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn /mṣryn#3#/ byrḥʔ qdmyʔ/dḥmšʔ#3#/ bḥd byrḥʔ
33:39	wʔhrwn br mʔʔ hwʔ wʕsryn wtlt šnyn kd myt bhwr ṭwrʔ
33:40	wšmʕ knʕnyʔ mlkʔ dgdr dʕmr/dytb#3#/ btymnʔ bʔrʕʔ dknʕn kd ʔtw bny ʔysryl
33:41	wšqlw mn hwr ṭwrʔ wšrw bṣlmwnʔ
33:42	wšqlw mn ṣlmwnʔ wšrw bpynwn
33:43	wšqlw mn pynwn wšrw bʔbwt
33:44	wšqlw mn ʔbwt wšrw bʕynʔ dʕbryʔ btḥwmʔ dmwʔb
33:45	wšqlw mn ʕynʔ dʕbryʔ wšrw brybwn gd
33:46	wšqlw mn rybwn gd wšrw bʕlmwn dbltym
33:47	wšqlw mn bʕlmwn dbltym wšrw bṭwrʔ dʕbryʔ dqdm/qdm#3#/ nbw
33:48	wšqlw mn ṭwrʔ dʕbryʔ wšrw bʕrbwt mwʔb dʕl ywrdnn dʔyryḥw
33:49	wšrw ʕl ywrdnn mn byt ʔšymwn wʕdmʔ lʔbl dsṭym dbʕrbwt mwʔb
33:50	\wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ /wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ#3#/ bʕrbwt mwʔb dʕl ywrdnn dʔyryḥw
33:51	mll ʕm bny ʔysryl wʔmr lhwn ʔntwn ʕbryn ʔntwn ywrdnn lʔrʕʔ dknʕn
33:52	wtwbdwn klhwn ʕmwryh dʔrʕʔ mn qdmykwn wtwbdwn klhyn sgdthwn wklhwn ṣlmʔ dnskthwn twbdwn/ttbrwn#3#/ wklhyn ʕlwthwn/ʕllthwn#3#/ tʕqrwn
33:53	wtʔrtwnh lʔrʕʔ wttbwn bh mṭl dlkwn yhbth ʔrʕʔ <hdʔ#3#> lmʔrth
33:54	wyrtw ʔrʕʔ bpṣʔ dšrbtkwn lsgyʔʔ tsgwn yrtwtʔ wlzʕwrʔ tzʕrwn yrtwtʔ mn dslqʔ lh pṣtʔ lšbṭʔ dʔbhyhwn nʔrtwn
33:55	wʔn lʔ twbdwn lʕmwrʔ dʔrʕʔ mn qdmykwn hnwn dmštḥryn mnhwn nhwwn skʔ bʕynykwn wlwlytʔ bṣdʕykwn wnʕyqwn lkwn bʔrʕʔ dʕmryn ʔntwn bh
33:56	wʔyknʔ/wdʔyknʔ#3#/wʔyk#3#/ dʔtḥšbt dʔʕbd lhwn ʔʕbd lkwn
34:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
34:02	pqd lbny ʔysryl wʔmr lhwn ʔntwn ʕʔlyn ʔntwn lʔrʕʔ dknʕn hdʔ ʔrʕʔ ttplg/dttplg#3#/ lkwn bywrtnʔ ʔrʕʔ dknʕn btḥwmyh
34:03	wnhwʔ lkwn sṭrʔ dtymnʔ mn mdbrʔ dṣyn ʕl tḥwmʔ dʔdwm wnhwʔ lkwn tḥwmʔ dtymnʔ mn swp ymʔ dmlḥʔ mn mdnḥʔ
34:04	wnhwʔ krk tḥwmkwn mn tymnʔ lmsqnʔ dsprwym wnhwʔ ʕbr lṣyn wnhwwn mpqnwhy mn tymnʔ lrqm dgyʔ wnpwq ʕl/mn#3#/ ḥṣr ʔdr wnʕbr lʕṣmwn
34:05	wntkrk tḥwmʔ mn ʕṣmwn lnḥlʔ dmṣryn wnhwwn mpqnwhy lymʔ
34:06	wtḥwmʔ dymʔ nhwʔ lkwn ymʔ rbʔ wtḥwmh hnʔ nhwʔ lkwn tḥwmʔ dymʔ
34:07	whnʔ nhwʔ lkwn tḥwmʔ dgrbyʔ wmn ymʔ rbʔ ttḥmwn lkwn lhwr ṭwrʔ
34:08	wmn hwr ṭwrʔ ttḥmwn lmʕlnʔ dḥmt wnhwwn mpqnwhy dtḥwmʔ lṣdd
34:09	wnhwʔ npq tḥwmʔ lzprwn wnhwwn mpqnwhy lḥṣr ʕynn hlyn nhwwn lkwn tḥwmʔ dgrbyʔ
34:10	wttḥmwn lkwn ltḥwmʔ dmdnḥʔ mn ḥṣr ʕynn lšpm
34:11	wnhwʔ nḥt tḥwmʔ mn špm ldblt mn mdnḥ lʕyn wnhwʔ nḥt tḥwmʔ wnhwʔ smk lsṭrʔ dymʔ dknrt mn mdnḥʔ
34:12	wnhwʔ nḥt tḥwmʔ lywrdnn wnhwwn mpqnwhy lymʔ dmlḥʔ hdʔ thwʔ lkwn ʔrʕʔ btḥwmyh kd ḥdrʔ
34:13	wpqd mwšʔ lbny ʔysryl wʔmr lhwn hdʔ hy ʔrʕʔ dtplgwn bpṣʔ dpqd mryʔ lmtl ltšʕʔ šbṭyn \wlplgwt šbṭʔ /wlplgwtʔ ltryn#3#/
34:14	mṭl dnsbw šbṭʔ dbny rwbyl lbyt ʔbhyhwn wšbṭʔ dbny gd lbyt ʔbhyhwn wplgh dšbṭʔ dmnšʔ qblw yrtwthwn
34:15	tryn šbṭyn wplgwt šbṭʔ qblw yrtwthwn mn ʕbrʔ dywrdnn dʔyryḥw qdmyt tmn mn mdnḥʔ
34:16	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
34:17	hlyn šmhʔ dgbrʔ dmwrtyn lkwn ʔrʕʔ ʔlyʕzr khnʔ wyšwʕ br nwn
34:18	wḥd ḥd ršʔ mn šbṭʔ dbrw dnplgwn lkwn ʔrʕʔ
34:19	whlyn šmhʔ \dršʔ dgbrʔ /dgbrʔ ršnʔ#2#/ mn šbṭʔ dyhwdʔ klb br ywpnʔ
34:20	mn šbṭʔ dšmʕwn šlmwʔyl br ʕmyhwd
34:21	mn šbṭʔ dbnymyn ʔldd br kslwn
34:22	mn šbṭʔ ddn bqy br ygly
34:23	mn šbṭʔ dywsp mn šbṭʔ dmnšʔ nḥlʔyl br ʔpwd
34:24	mn šbṭʔ dʔprym qmwʔyl br špṭʔ
34:25	mn šbṭʔ dzbwlwn ʔlyṣpn br prnk
34:26	mn šbṭʔ dʔyskr pṭʔyl br ʕzwr
34:27	mn šbṭʔ dʔšyr ʔḥyhwd br šlwmy
34:28	mn šbṭʔ dnptly pdʔyl br ʕmyhwd
34:29	lhlyn pqd mryʔ dnwrtwn lbny ʔysryl bʔrʕʔ dknʕn
35:01	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ bʕrbwt mwʔb dʕl ywrdnn dʔyryḥw wʔmr lh
35:02	pqd lbny ʔysrʔyl wntlwn llwyʔ mn ywrtnʔ dʔwḥdnhwn qwryʔ lmtb wʔgwrsʔ dqwryʔ dbḥdryhwn ntlwn llwyʔ
35:03	wnhwyn lhwn qwryʔ lmtb wʔgwrsyhyn nhwwn lbʕyrhwn wlqnynhwn wlklh ḥywthwn
35:04	wʔgwrsʔ dqwryʔ dttlwn llwyʔ mn ʔstʔ dqrytʔ wlbr ʔlp ʔmyn kd ḥdrʔ
35:05	wmšwḥ \mn lbr lqrytʔ /lbr mn qrytʔ#3#/ lsṭrʔ dmdnḥʔ tryn ʔlpyn ʔmyn wlsṭrʔ dtymnʔ tryn ʔlpyn ʔmyn wlsṭrʔ dmʕrbʔ/dgrbyʔ#3#/ tryn ʔlpyn ʔmyn wlsṭrʔ dgrbyʔ/dmʕrbʔ#3#/ tryn ʔlpyn ʔmyn wqrytʔ bmṣʕtʔ hnʔ nhwʔ lkwn šṭḥʔ dqwryʔ
35:06	wqwryʔ dyhbyn ʔntwn llwyʔ št qwryʔ dbyt gwsʔ nhwyn lkwn dnhwʔ ʕrq ltmn qṭwlʔ dqṭl lḥbrh dlʔ bṣbynh wʕlyhyn ʔrmw ʔrbʕyn wtrtyn qwryʔ
35:07	klhyn qwryʔ dyhbyn ʔntwn llwyʔ ʔrbʕyn wtmnʔ qwryʔ hnyn wšṭḥyhyn
35:08	wqwryʔ dyhbyn ʔntwn mn yrtwtʔ dbny ʔysryl mn sgyʔʔ tsgwn wmn zʕwrʔ tzʕrwn ʔnš ʔyk lpwt yrtwtʔ dyrt ntl mn qwryh llwyʔ
35:09	wmll mryʔ ʕm mwšʔ wʔmr lh
35:10	mll ʕm bny ʔysryl wʔmr lhwn mʔ dʕbrtwn ywrdnn lʔrʕʔ dknʕn
35:11	ṭybw lkwn qwryʔ dbyt gwsʔ/lbyt gwsʔ#3#/ dnhwyn lkwn dnʕrwq ltmn qṭwlʔ ʔynʔ dnqṭwl npšʔ bṭwʕyy
35:12	wnhwyn lkwn hlyn qwryʔ lbyt gwsʔ mn tbʕ ʕyrtʔ ddmʔ wlʔ ntqṭl qṭwlʔ ʕdmʔ dqʔm qdm knwštʔ bdynʔ
35:13	wqwryʔ dyhbyn ʔntwn št qwryʔ dbyt gwsʔ nhwyn lkwn
35:14	tlt qwryʔ hbw bʕbrʔ dywrdnn wtlt qwryʔ hbw bʔrʕʔ dknʕn qwryʔ dbyt gwsʔ nhwyn
35:15	lbny ʔysryl \wlʔynʔ dmtpnʔ /wlʔylyn dmtpnyn#3#/ lwty wlʔylyn dʕmryn byntkwn wnhwyn lkwn hlyn št qwryʔ lbyt gwsʔ dnʕrwq lhyn kl dqṭl/dnqṭwl#3#/ npšʔ bṭwʕyy
35:16	wʔn bmʔnʔ dprzlʔ mḥyhy ʔyk dnmwt wmyt qṭwlʔ hw mtqṭlw ntqṭl qṭwlʔ hw
35:17	wʔn bkʔpʔ bʔydʔ mḥyhy ʔyk dnmwt wmyt qṭwlʔ hw mtqṭlw ntqṭl
35:18	wʔn bmʔnʔ dqysʔ bʔydʔ mḥyhy ʔyk dnmwt wmyt qṭwlʔ hw mtqṭlw ntqṭl <qṭwlʔ#3#>
35:19	tbʕ ʕyrtʔ ddmʔ hw nqṭlywhy lqṭwlʔ mʔ dpgʕ bh
35:20	wʔn bsnʔtʔ mḥyhy ʔw šdʔ bh bnklʔ wmyt qṭwlʔ hw
35:21	<wʔn#3#> bbʕldbbwtʔ mḥyhy bʔydh ʔyk dnmwt wmyt qṭwlʔ hw mtqṭlw ntqṭl tbʕ ʕyrtʔ ddmʔ hw nqṭlywhy lqṭwlʔ mʔ dpgʕ bh
35:22	wʔn mn šlyʔ dlʔ bʕldbbwtʔ mḥyhy ʔw šdʔ bh kl mʔn dlʔ bnklʔ
35:23	ʔw bkl kʔp dqṭlʔ dkd lʔ ḥzʔ šdʔ ʕlwhy wmyt wlʔ hwʔ bʕldbbh wlʔ ṣbʔ hwʔ lbyšth/bbyšth#3#/
35:24	tdwn knwštʔ byt qṭwlʔ ltbʕ ʕyrtʔ ddmʔ ʕl dynʔ hlyn
35:25	wtpṣywhy knwštʔ lqṭwlʔ mn tbʕ ʕyrtʔ ddmʔ wtšdrywhy knwštʔ lqrytʔ dbyt gwsʔ dʕrq hwʔ lh <wnʔzl#3#> wntb bh ʕdmʔ dnmwt khnʔ rbʔ dʔtmšḥ bmšḥʔ dqwdšʔ
35:26	wʔn npwq qṭwlʔ lbr mn tḥwmʔ dqrytʔ dbyt gwsʔ dʕrq lh
35:27	wnškḥwhy tbʕ ʕyrtʔ ddmʔ lbr mn tḥwmʔ dqrytʔ dbyt gwsʔ wnqṭwl tbʕ ʕyrtʔ ddmʔ lqṭwlʔ lyt lh ʕyrtʔ
35:28	mṭl hnʔ bqrytʔ dbyt gwsʔ ntb ʕdmʔ dnmwt khnʔ rbʔ wmʔ dmyt khnʔ rbʔ nhpwk qṭwlʔ lʔrʕʔ dyrtwth
35:29	wnhwwn lkwn hlyn nmwsʔ lʕlm ldrykwn bklh byt mʕmrkwn
35:30	kl dnqṭwl npšʔ ʕl pwm shdʔ ntqṭl qṭwlʔ wshdʔ ḥd lʔ nshd ʕl npšʔ dtmwt
35:31	wlʔ tqblwn šwḥdʔ ʕl npšʔ dqṭwlʔ dḥyb mwtʔ ʔlʔ mtqṭlw ntqṭl
35:32	wlʔ tsbwn šwḥdʔ dnʕrwq lqrytʔ dbyt gwsʔ wnʔzl wntb bʔrʕʔ ʕdmʔ dnmwt khnʔ rbʔ
35:33	wlʔ tṭnpwnh lʔrʕʔ dʕmryn ʔntwn bh/ʕlyh#3#/ mṭl ddmʔ hw mṭnp lʔrʕʔ wʔrʕʔ ddmʔ ʔšyd bh lʔ ntḥsʔ ʕlyh ʔlʔ ʔn ʔtʔšd bh dmʔ \dhw mn /dmn#3#/ dʔšdh
35:34	wlʔ tṭmʔwnh lʔrʕʔ dʕmryn ʔntwn bh dšrʔ ʔnʔ bgwh mṭl dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ dšrʔ ʔnʔ bynt bny ʔysryl
36:01	wqrbw ryšy ʔbhʔ dšrbtʔ dbny glʕd br mkyr br mnšʔ mn šrbtʔ \dmnšʔ br ywsp /dywsp#3#/ wmllw qdm mwšʔ wqdm ʔlyʕzr khnʔ wqdm rwrbnʔ dknwštʔ ršʔ dʔbhʔ dbny ʔysryl
36:02	wʔmrw lmrn pqd mryʔ lmtl ʔrʕʔ lywrtnʔ/dywrtnʔ#3#/ bpṣʔ lbny ʔysryl wmrn ʔtpqd mn mryʔ dntl/lmtl#3#/ yrtwth dṣlpḥd ʔḥwn lbnth
36:03	wʔn nhwyn lḥd mn šbṭʔ \dbny ʔysryl /dʔysrʔyl#3#/ nšʔ ttbṣr yrtwthyn mn yrtwtʔ dʔbwhyn wttwsp ʕl yrtwtʔ dšbṭʔ dnhwyn lhwn wmn pṣtʔ dyrtwtn ttbṣr
36:04	wʔn nhwʔ pwnyʔ lbny ʔysryl ttwsp yrtwthyn ʕl yrtwtʔ dšbṭʔ dnhwyn lhwn wmn yrtwtʔ dšbṭʔ dʔbwhyn ttbṣr yrtwthyn
36:05	wpqd mwšʔ lbny ʔysryl mn mlt pwmh dmryʔ wʔmr kʔnʔyt mmllyn šbṭʔ dbny ywsp
36:06	hnʔ/hnw#3#/ ptgmʔ dpqd mryʔ ʕl bnth dṣlpḥd wʔmr dlmn dšpr/dšpyr#3#/ bʕynyhyn nhwyn nšʔ brm lšbṭʔ dšrbtʔ dʔbwhyn nhwyn
36:07	wlʔ ttkrk yrtwtʔ \dbny ʔysrʔyl /dʔysrʔyl#3#/ mn šbṭʔ lšbṭʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔlʔ gbr byrtwtʔ dšbṭʔ dʔbwhy ntnqpwn bny ʔysryl
36:08	wkl brtʔ dyrtʔ ywrtnʔ mn šbṭʔ dbny ʔysryl lḥd mn \šrbtʔ dšbṭʔ /šbṭʔ dšrbtʔ#3#/ dʔbwh thwʔ ʔnttʔ dnʔrtwn bny ʔysryl ʔnš yrtwtʔ dʔbwhy
36:09	wlʔ ttkrk yrtwtʔ mn šbṭʔ lšbṭʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔlʔ gbr byrtwth ntnqpwn šbṭʔ dbny ʔysryl
36:10	wʔyk/wʔyknʔ#3#/ dpqd mryʔ lmwšʔ hknʔ ʕbd bnth dṣlpḥd
36:11	whwy mḥlʔ wtrṣʔ wḥglʔ wmlkʔ wyʕʔ \bnt ṣlpḥd /bnwhy dṣlpḥd#3#/ lbny ddyhyn
36:12	lšrbtʔ dbny mnšʔ br ywsp hwy nšʔ whwt yrtwthyn ʕl šbṭʔ dšrbtʔ dʔbwhyn
36:13	hlyn pwqdnʔ wnmwsʔ wdynʔ dpqd mryʔ bʔydʔ dmwšʔ ʕl bny ʔysryl bʕrbwt mwʔb dʕl ywrdnn dʔyryḥw
01:01	whlyn ptgmʔ dʔmr/dpqd#3#/ mwšʔ lklh <byt#3#> ʔysryl bʕbrʔ dywrdnn bmdbrʔ /bʕrbʔ/bʕbrʔ#2#/ lwqbl swp byt prn wbyt tpl wlbnn wḥṣrwt wrzhb/wzrhb#3#/wdzhb#3#/
01:02	mrdʔ ḥdʕsr ywmyn mn ḥwryb lṭwrʔ dsʕyr wʕdmʔ lrqm dgyʔ
01:03	whwʔ bšnt ʔrbʕyn byrḥʔ dḥdʕsr bḥd byrḥʔ mll mwšʔ ʕm bny ʔysryl kl mdm dpqdh mryʔ ʕlyhwn
01:04	mn btr dqṭl lsyḥwn mlkʔ dʔmwryʔ dytb hwʔ bḥšbwn wlʕwg mlkʔ dmtnyn dytb hwʔ bʕstrwt wbʔrdʕy
01:05	bʕbrʔ dywrdnn bʔrʕʔ dmwʔb šry mwšʔ mpšq nmwsʔ hnʔ wʔmr
01:06	mryʔ ʔlhn ʔmr ln bḥwryb sgy lkwn dytbtwn bṭwrʔ hnʔ
01:07	ʔtpnw wšqwlw lkwn wʕwlw lṭwrʔ dʔmwryʔ wlkl ḥdrwhy lʕrbʔ/lʕbrʔ#3#/ wlṭwrʔ wlšplʔ wltymnʔ wlspry ymʔ ʔrʕʔ dknʕnyʔ wlbnn ʕdmʔ lnhrʔ rbʔ nhrʔ prt
01:08	ḥzw dyhbt qdmykwn ʔrʕʔ ʕwlw wyrtw ʔrʕʔ dymʔ mryʔ lʔbhykwn lʔbrhm wlʔysḥq wlyʕqwb lmtl lhwn wlzrʕhwn btrhwn
01:09	wʔmrt lkwn bh bzbnʔ hw lʔ/dlʔ#2#/ mškḥ ʔnʔ blḥwdy dʔsybrkwn
01:10	mryʔ ʔlhkwn ʔsgykwn wʔytykwn ywmnʔ swgʔʔ ʔyk kwkbʔ dbšmyʔ
01:11	mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbhykwn nwsp ʕlykwn ʔkwtkwn ʔlp zbnyn wnbrkkwn/wnkbrkwn#3#/ ʔyknʔ/ʔyk#3#/ dʔmr lkwn
01:12	ʔyknʔ/ʔymkʔ#3#/ hkyl mškḥ ʔnʔ dʔsybr blḥwdy ʔyqrtkwn wṭʕnykwn wdynykwn
01:13	gbw lkwn gbrʔ dḥkymyn wskwltnyn wydyʕyn lšbṭykwn wʔqym ʔnwn bryškwn
01:14	wʕnytwn wʔmrtwn ly špyr ptgmʔ dʔmrt lmʕbd
01:15	wdbrt ršʔ <ršʔ#2#> dšbṭykwn gbrʔ ḥkymʔ wydyʕʔ wʕbdt ʔnwn ršʔ ʕlykwn ršy ʔlpʔ wršy mʔwtʔ wršy ḥmšyn wršy ʕsrʔ wsprʔ lšbṭykwn
01:16	wpqdt ldynykwn bzbnʔ hw wʔmrt lhwn hwytwn šmʕyn byt ʔḥykwn \wdynyn qwštʔ /dynʔ dqwštʔ#3#/ byt gbrʔ lʔḥwhy wltwtbh
01:17	lʔ tsbwn bʔpʔ bdynʔ lzʕwrʔ ʔyk rbʔ hwytwn šmʕyn lʔ tdḥlwn mn qdm gbrʔ mṭl ddynʔ dʔlhʔ hw wptgmʔ dhwʔ qšʔ mnkwn qrbwhy lwty wʔšmʕywhy
01:18	wpqdtkwn bzbnʔ hw kl ptgmʔ dtʕbdwn/dtpqdwn#2#/
01:19	wšqln mn ḥwryb whlkn bklh hw mdbrʔ rbʔ wdḥylʔ dḥzytwn bʔrʕʔ dṭwrʔ dʔmwryʔ ʔyk dpqdn mryʔ ʔlhn wʔtyn ʕdmʔ lrqm dgyʔ
01:20	wʔmrt lkwn ʔtytwn ʕdmʔ lṭwrʔ dʔmwryʔ dmryʔ ʔlhn yhb ln
01:21	ḥzw dyhb mryʔ ʔlhkwn qdmykwn ʔrʕʔ sqw wyrtw ʔrʕʔ ʔyknʔ/ʔykn#2#/ʔyk#3#/ dʔmr lkwn mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbhykwn lʔ tdḥlwn wlʔ ttrhbwn
01:22	wqrbtwn lwty klkwn wʔmrtwn <ly#3#> nšdr gbrʔ qdmyn ngšwn ln ʔrʕʔ wntlwn ln ptgmʔ wnḥwwnn/wnḥwwn ln#3#/ ʔwrḥʔ dnʔzl/lmʔzl#3#/ bh wqwryʔ dnʕwl lhyn
01:23	wšpr ptgmʔ bʕyny wdbrt mnkwn trʕsr gbryn ḥd ḥd gbrʔ mn šbṭʔ
01:24	wʔtpnyw wslqw lṭwrʔ wslqw ʕdmʔ lnḥlʔ dsgwlʔ wgšwh lʔrʕʔ
01:25	wnsbw bʔydyhwn mn pʔryʔ dʔrʕʔ wʔytyw ln wʔtybwn ptgmʔ wʔmrw ln ṭbʔ hy ʔrʕʔ dyhb ln mryʔ ʔlhn
01:26	wlʔ ṣbytwn lmsq ʔlʔ mrmrtwn mlt pwmh dmryʔ ʔlhn
01:27	wrṭntwn mn mšknykwn wʔmrtwn mṭl dsnʔ hw ln mryʔ ʔpqn mn \ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn /mṣryn#3#/ dnšlmn bʔydʔ dʔmwryʔ dnwbdwnn
01:28	lʔykʔ/lʔ#3#/ slqynn ʔḥyn tbrw lbn wʔmrw ln dʕmʔ rb wrm wʕšyn mnn wqwryʔ rwrbn wkrykn ʕdmʔ lšmyʔ ʔp bny gnbrʔ ḥzyn tmn
01:29	wʔmrt lkwn lʔ tdḥlwn wlʔ tzwʕwn mnhwn
01:30	mryʔ ʔlhkwn ʔzl qdmykwn whw mtktš ḥlpykwn kl dʕbd ʕmkwn bmṣryn lʕnykwn
01:31	wbmdbrʔ dḥzytwn dtrsykwn mryʔ ʔlhkwn ʔyk dmtrsʔ gbrʔ lbrh bklh ʔrʕʔ dʔzltwn ʕdmʔ dʔtytwn lʔtrʔ hnʔ
01:32	wbptgmʔ hnʔ lʔ mhymnyn ʔntwn bmryʔ ʔlhkwn
01:33	dʔzl qdmykwn bʔwrḥʔ lmtqnw lkwn ʔtrʔ dtšrwn bh bnwrʔ bllyʔ ḥwykwn ʔwrḥʔ dtʔzlwn bh wbʕnnʔ bʔymmʔ
01:34	wšmʕ mryʔ qlʔ dmlykwn wrgz wʔymʔ wʔmr
01:35	dlʔ nḥzwn ḥd mn gbrʔ hlyn drʔ hnʔ byšʔ ʔrʕʔ ṭbtʔ dymyt lmtl lʔbhykwn
01:36	ʔlʔ ʔn klb br ywpnʔ hw nḥzyh wlh ʔtl ʔrʕʔ dhlk bh wlbnwhy ḥlp dšmly btr mryʔ
01:37	wʔp ʕly rgz mryʔ mṭwltkwn wʔmr ly wʔp ʔnt lʔ tʕwl ltmn
01:38	ʔlʔ ʔn yšwʕ brnwn dqʔm qdmyk hw nʕwl ltmn lh ḥyl mṭl dhw nwrtyh lʔysryl
01:39	wyqrtkwn dʔmrtwn lbztʔ thwʔ wbnykwn dlʔ ydʕw ywmnʔ ṭbtʔ wbyštʔ hnwn nʕlwn ltmn wlhwn ʔtlyh whnwn nʔrtwnh
01:40	wʔntwn ʔtpnw lkwn wšqwlw lmdbrʔ lʔwrḥʔ dymʔ dswp
01:41	wʕnytwn wʔmrtwn ly ḥṭyn qdm mryʔ ʔlhn ḥnn nsq wntktš ʔyk dpqdn mryʔ ʔlhn wʔzdyntwn gbr bmʔny qrbh wʔtgrgtwn lmsq lṭwrʔ
01:42	wʔmr ly mryʔ ʔmr lhwn lʔ tsqwn wlʔ ttktšwn mṭl dlʔ hwyt byntkwn dlʔ ttbrwn qdm bʕldbbykwn
01:43	wʔmrt lkwn wlʔ šmʕtwn wmrmrtwn mlt pwmh dmryʔ wʔmrḥtwn wslqtwn lṭwrʔ
01:44	wnpqw ʔmwryʔ dʕmryn bṭwrʔ hw lʔwrʕkwn wrdpwkwn ʔyk dbwrʔ mtnnʔ wṭrdwkwn mn sʕyr wʕdmʔ lḥrmʔ
01:45	wytbtwn wbkytwn/wbkntwn#2#/ qdm mryʔ wlʔ šmʕ mryʔ bqlkwn wlʔ ṣtkwn
01:46	wytbtwn brqm ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ ʔyk ywmtʔ dytbtwn
02:01	wʔtpnyn wšqln lmdbrʔ bʔwrḥʔ dymʔ dswp ʔyk/ʔyknʔ#3#/ dʔmr ly mryʔ wʔtkrknyhy lṭwrʔ dsʕyr ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ
02:02	wʔmr ly mryʔ
02:03	sgy lkwn hʔ mn dmtkrkyn ʔntwn ṭwrʔ hnʔ ʔtpnw lkwn lgrbyʔ
02:04	wlʕmʔ pqd wʔmr lhwn ʔntwn ʕbryn ʔntwn btḥwmʔ dʔḥykwn bny ʕsw dytbyn bsʕyr wndḥlwn mnkwn ʔzdhrw ṭb
02:05	wlʔ ttgrwn bhwn mṭl dlʔ yhb ʔnʔ lkwn ywrtnʔ mn ʔrʕhwn byt mdrk pstʔ drglʔ mṭl dywrtnʔ lʕsw yhbt ṭwrʔ dsʕyr
02:06	ʕbwrʔ zbnw mnhwn bkspʔ wʔkwlw wʔp myʔ zbnw mnhwn bkspʔ wʔštw
02:07	mṭl dmryʔ ʔlhkwn brkkwn bklh ʕbdʔ dʔydykwn wydʕ lmdbrwtkwn bmdbrʔ hnʔ <rbʔ#3#> hʔ ʔrbʕyn šnyn mryʔ ʔlhkwn ʕmkwn wlʔ ḥsr lkwn mdm
02:08	wʕbrn mn lwt ʔḥyn bny ʕsw dytbyn bsʕyr wmn ʔwrḥʔ dʕrbʔ wmn ʔylt wmn ʕṣynwgbr wʔtpnyn wʕbrn ln \lʔwrḥʔ dmdbrʔ /mdbrʔ lʔwrḥʔ#3#/ dmwʔb
02:09	wʔmr ly mryʔ lʔ tʔlwṣ lmwʔbyʔ wlʔ ttgrʔ ʕmhwn lqrbʔ mṭl dlʔ yhb ʔnʔ lk mn ʔrʕhwn ywrtnʔ mṭl dlbny lwṭ yhbth ywrtnʔ
02:10	ʔmnʔ mn lwqdm ytbw bh ʕmʔ drb wsgy wrm ʔyk gnbrʔ
02:11	gnbrʔ ʔnwn wmtḥšbyn ʔp hnwn ʔyk gnbrʔ wmwʔbyʔ qryn lhwn ʔmnʔ
02:12	wbsʕyr ytbw ḥwryʔ mn lwqdm wbny ʕsw yrtw ʔnwn wʔwbdw ʔnwn mn qdmyhwn wytbw bʔrʕhwn ʔyk dʕbd ʔysryl lʔrʕʔ dyrtwth dyhb lhwn mryʔ
02:13	mkyl qwmw ʕbrw nḥlʔ dzrd wʕbrn nḥlʔ dzrd
02:14	wywmtʔ dhlkn mn rqm dgyʔ ʕdmʔ dʕbrn nḥlʔ dzrd tltyn wtmnʔ šnyn ʕdmʔ dsp kwlh drʔ dgbrʔ qrbtnʔ mn gw mšrytʔ ʔyk/ʔyknʔ#3#/ dymʔ lhwn mryʔ

02:16	wkd gmrw klhwn gbrʔ ʕbdy qrbʔ lmmt mn gw ʕmʔ
02:17	mll ʕmy mryʔ wʔmr ly
02:18	ʔnt ʕbr ʔnt ywmnʔ ltḥwmʔ dmwʔb wlʕd
02:19	wttqrb lwqbl bny ʕmwn lʔ tʔlwṣ ʔnwn wlʔ ttgrʔ bhwn mṭl dlʔ yhb ʔnʔ lk ywrtnʔ mn ʔrʕʔ dbny ʕmwn mṭl dlbny lwṭ yhbth ywrtnʔ
02:20	ʔrʕʔ dgnbrʔ mtḥšbʔ ʔp hy gnbrʔ ʔytbw bh mn lwqdm wʕmwnyʔ qryn lhwn zmzmyn
02:21	ʕmʔ drb wsgy wrm ʔyk gnbrʔ wʔwbd ʔnwn mryʔ mn qdmyhwn wyrtw ʔnwn wytbw bʔrʕhwn
02:22	ʔyk dʕbdw bny ʕsw dytbyn bsʕyr dʔwbdw lḥwryʔ mn qdmyhwn wyrtw ʔnwn wytbw bʔrʕhwn ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
02:23	wʕwyʔ dytbyn bḥṣrym wʕdmʔ lʕʔzʔ qpwdqyʔ/qpwṭqyʔ#3#/ dnpqw mn qpwdqy ʔwbdw ʔnwn wytbw bʔrʕhwn
02:24	mkyl qwmw šqwlw wʕbrw nḥlʔ dʔrnwn ḥzy dʔšlmt bʔydyk lsyḥwn mlkʔ dḥšbwn ʔmwryʔ wlʔrʕh šrʔ lmwbdwth wʔtgrʔ ʕmh lqrbʔ
02:25	ywmnʔ ʔšrʔ lmtl dḥltk wzwʕtk ʕl ʔpy ʕmmʔ dtḥyt šmyʔ dnšmʕwn šmʕk wnzwʕwn wndḥlwn mn qdmyk
02:26	wšdrt ʔyzgdʔ mn mdbrʔ dqrmwt lwt syḥwn mlkʔ dḥšbwn bmlʔ dšlmʔ lmʔmr lh
02:27	nʕbr bʔrʕk bʔwrḥʔ ʔwrḥʔ nʔzl wlʔ nsṭʔ lymynʔ wlsmlʔ
02:28	ʕbwrʔ bkspʔ zbnw ln wnʔkwl wmyʔ bkspʔ zbnw ln wnštʔ blḥwd brglyn nʕbr
02:29	ʔyk dʕbdw ln bny ʕsw dytbyn bsʕyr wmwʔbyʔ dytbyn bʕd ʕdmʔ dnʕbr ywrdnn lʔrʕʔ dyhb ln mryʔ ʔlhn
02:30	wlʔ ṣbʔ syḥwn mlkʔ dḥšbwn dnʕbrn btḥwmh mṭl dqšy mryʔ ʔlhkwn rwḥh wʔʕšn lbh dnšlmywhy bʔydykwn ʔyk dywmnʔ
02:31	wʔmr ly mryʔ ḥzy dšryt lmšlmw bʔydyk lsyḥwn <mlkʔ dʔmwryʔ#3#> wlʔrʕh šrʔ lmwbdwth wlmʔrt ʔrʕh wnpq syḥwn lʔwrʕn hw wklh ʕmh lqrbʔ lyhṣ
02:33	wʔšlmh mryʔ ʔlhn qdmyn wḥrbnyhy lh wlbnwhy wlklh ʕmh
02:34	wkbšn klhyn qwryh bzbnʔ hw wʔwbdn klhyn qwryʔ lgmr wnšʔ wyqrtʔ wlʔ šbqn mnhwn srydʔ
02:35	blḥwd bʕyrʔ bzn ln wbztʔ dqwryʔ dkbšn
02:36	mn ʕdwʕyr dʕl sptʔ dnḥlʔ dʔrnwn wqrytʔ dbnḥlʔ wʕdmʔ lglʕd lʔ hwt qrytʔ dʕšnt mnn klhyn ʔšlm ʔnyn mryʔ ʔlhn qdmyn
02:37	blḥwd lʔrʕʔ dbny ʕmwn dlʔ ʔtqrbtwn kl/ʕl#3#/ yd nḥlʔ dybq wqwryʔ dṭwrʔ wkl dpqdn mryʔ ʔlhn
03:01	wʔtpnyn wslqn lʔwrḥʔ dmtnyn wnpq ʕwg mlkʔ dmtnyn lʔwrʕn hw wklh ʕmh lqrbʔ bʔrdʕy
03:02	wʔmr ly mryʔ lʔ tdḥl mnh mṭl dbʔydyk ʔšlmth wlklh ʕmh wlʔrʕh wʕbd lh ʔyk dʕbdt lsyḥwn mlkʔ dʔmwryʔ dytb hwʔ bḥšbwn
03:03	wʔšlm mryʔ ʔlhn bʔydn ʔp lʕwg mlkʔ dmtnyn wlklh ʕmh wḥrbnyhy wlʔ šbqn lh srydʔ
03:04	wkbšn klhyn qwryh bzbnʔ hw wlʔ šbqn qrytʔ dlʔ nsbnh mnhwn štyn qwryʔ klh ḥbl ʔrgwb byt mlkwth dʕwg dbmtnyn
03:05	klhyn hlyn qwryʔ dʕšynyn šwryhyn wrmyn trʕyhyn wmwklyhyn sṭr/lbr#3#/ mn qwryʔ dšṭḥʔ dṭb sgyʔn
03:06	wḥrbn ʔnyn ʔyk dʕbdn lsyḥwn mlkʔ dḥšbwn dḥrbn klhyn qwryh lgmr wnšʔ wyqrtʔ
03:07	wklh bʕyrʔ wbztʔ dqwryʔ bzn ln
03:08	wnsbnh bzbnʔ hw lʔrʕʔ mn ʔydʔ dtryhwn mlkʔ dʔmwryʔ dbʕbrʔ dywrdnn mn nḥlʔ dʔrnwn wʕdmʔ lṭwrʔ dḥrmwn
03:09	ṣydnyʔ qryn lḥrmwn srywn wʔmwryʔ qryn lh snyr/sʕyr#2#/
03:10	wklhyn qwryʔ dpqʕtʔ wklh glʕd wklh mtnyn ʕdmʔ lslkʔ wlʔrdʕy kwlhyn qwryʔ dmlkwth dʕwg dbmtnyn
03:11	mṭl dʕwg mlkʔ dmtnyn blḥwdwhy ʔštḥr mn šrkʔ dgnbrʔ ʕrsh ʕrsʔ hy dprzlʔ whʔ brbt hy dbny ʕmwn tšʕ ʔmyn ʔwrkh wʔrbʕ ʔmyn ptyh bʔmtʔ dgnbrʔ
03:12	wʔrʕʔ hdʔ yrtn bzbnʔ hw mn ʕdwʕyr dʕl sptʔ dnḥlʔ dʔrnwn wplgh dṭwrʔ dglʕd wqwryh yhbt lrwbyl wlgd
03:13	wšrkʔ dglʕd wklh mtnyn byt mlkwth dʕwg yhbt lplgh dšbṭʔ dmnšʔ klh ḥbl ʔrgwb wklh mtnyn hy hy mtqryʔ ʔrʕ gnbrʔ
03:14	wyʔyr br mnšʔ nsb lh klh ḥbl ʔrgwb ʕdmʔ ltḥwmʔ dgšwr wdmʕkt wqrʔ ʔnyn ʕl šmh mtnyn wkprwnʔ dyʔyr ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
03:15	wlmkyr yhbt glʕd
03:16	wlrwbyl wlgd yhbt mn glʕd wʕdmʔ lnḥlʔ dʔrnwn wgwh dnḥlʔ wtḥwmh wʕdmʔ lybq dnḥlʔ dtḥwmʔ dbny ʕmwn
03:17	wʕrbʔ wywrdnn wtḥwmʔ mn knrt wʕdmʔ lymʔ dʕrbʔ ymʔ dmlḥʔ dtḥyt ʔšdwd wpsgʔ dbrmtʔ mn/dmn#2#/ mdnḥʔ
03:18	wpqdtkwn bh bzbnʔ hw wʔmrt lkwn mryʔ ʔlhkwn yhb lkwn ʔrʕʔ hdʔ lmʔrth kd mzynyn ʔntwn ʕbrw qdm ʔḥykwn bny ʔysryl klkwn gnbry ḥylʔ
03:19	blḥwd nšykwn wyqrtkwn wbʕyrkwn/wbnykwn#3#/ šbwqw ydʕ ʔnʔ gyr dqnynʔ sgyʔʔ ʔyt lkwn ntbwn bqwrykwn dyhbt lkwn
03:20	ʕdmʔ dnnyḥ mryʔ lʔḥykwn ʔkwtkwn wnʔrtwn ʔp hnwn ʔrʕʔ dyhb lkwn mryʔ ʔlhkwn bʕbrʔ dywrdnn why dyn thpkwn ʔnš lyrtwth dyhbt lkwn
03:21	wlyšwʕ pqdt bzbnʔ hw wʔmrt ʕynyk ḥzy kl/mdm#3#/ dʕbd mryʔ ʔlhkwn lhlyn tryn mlkyn hknʔ nʕbd mryʔ \lhlyn klhyn /lkwlhyn hlyn#2#/ mlkwtʔ dʕbryn ʔntwn lhyn
03:22	lʔ tdḥlwn mnhwn mṭwl dmryʔ ʔlhkwn hw/hwyw#2#/ mtktš \ʕl ʔpykwn /ḥlpykwn#3#/
03:23	wʔtkšpt qdm mryʔ bzbnʔ hw wʔmrt
03:24	bbʕw mryʔ ʔlhʔ ʔnt šryt lmḥwyw lʕbdk rbwtk wʔydk tqyptʔ wdrʕk rmʔ ʔynʔ hw gyr ʔlhʔ ʔyt bšmyʔ ʔw bʔrʕʔ dnʕbd ʔyk ʕbdyk wʔyk gnbrwtk
03:25	ʔʕbr hšʔ ʔḥzʔ ʔrʕʔ <hdʔ#3#> ṭbtʔ dbʕbrʔ dywrdnn ṭwrʔ hnʔ ṭbʔ wlbnn
03:26	wrgz ʕly mryʔ mṭltkwn wlʔ šmʕny wʔmr ly mryʔ spq lk lʔ twsp twb lmmllw qdmy ptgmʔ hnʔ
03:27	sq lryš rmtʔ wʔrym ʕynyk lmdnḥʔ wlmʕrbʔ wlgrbyʔ wltymnʔ wḥzyh bʕynyk wlʔ tʕbr ywrdnn hnʔ
03:28	wpqd lyšwʕ wḥylyhy wʕšnyhy mṭl dhw nʕbr qdm ʕmʔ hnʔ whw nwrt ʔnwn ʔrʕʔ dtḥzʔ
03:29	wytbn bnḥlʔ lwqbl byt pʕwr
04:01	mkyl ʔysryl šmʕ nmwsʔ wdynʔ dmlp ʔnʔ lkwn ywmnʔ lmʕbd dtḥwn wtʕlwn wtʔrtwn ʔrʕʔ dyhb lkwn mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbhykwn
04:02	lʔ twspwn ʕl pwqdnʔ dmpqd ʔnʔ lkwn wlʔ tbṣrwn mnh ʔlʔ ṭrw pwqdnh dmryʔ ʔlhkwn dmpqd ʔnʔ lkwn
04:03	ʕynykwn ḥzy kl mdm dʕbd mryʔ/ʔlhʔ#3#/ lbʕl pʕwr mṭl dkl gbrʔ dʔzl btr bʕl pʕwr ʔwbdh mryʔ ʔlhkwn mn byntkwn
04:04	wʔntwn dʔtnqptwn lmryʔ ʔlhkwn hʔ ḥyyn ʔntwn klkwn ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
04:05	ḥzw dʔlptkwn nmwsʔ wdynʔ ʔyknʔ dpqdny mryʔ ʔlhy dtʕbdwn ʔnwn bʔrʕʔ dʕʔlyn ʔntwn lh lmʔrth
04:06	wtṭrwn wtʕbdwn ʔnwn dhy hy ḥkmtkwn/ḥmtkwn#2#/ wswklkwn lʕyn ʕmmʔ dnšmʕwn hlyn klhwn nmwsʔ wnʔmrwn dḥkym hw wskwltn ʕmʔ hnʔ rbʔ
04:07	ʔynw gyr ʕmʔ rbʔ dqryb lh <mryʔ#3#> ʔlhh ʔyk mryʔ ʔlhn bkl dqrynn lh
04:08	wʔynw ʕmʔ rbʔ dʔyt lh nmwsʔ wdynʔ zdyqʔ ʔyk kwlh nmwsʔ hnʔ dyhb ʔnʔ qdmykwn ywmnʔ
04:09	blḥwd ʔzdhrw ṭb wṭrw npštkwn dlʔ tṭʕwn kl ptgmʔ dḥzy ʕynykwn wlʔ nʕbrwn mn lbkwn klhwn ywmy ḥyykwn wʔwdʕw ʔnwn lbnykwn wlbny bnykwn
04:10	ywmʔ dqmtwn qdm mryʔ ʔlhkwn bḥwryb kd ʔmr ly mryʔ knš qdmy lʕmʔ/lklh ʕmʔ#2#/ wʔšmʕ ʔnwn ptgmy wnʔlpwn lmdḥl qdmy klhwn ywmtʔ dḥyyn bʔrʕʔ wlbnyhwn nlpwn
04:11	wqrbtwn wqmtwn bšpwly ṭwrʔ wṭwrʔ mtgwzl hwʔ bnwrʔ ʕdmʔ llbʔ dšmyʔ wḥšwkʔ wʕnnʔ wʕrplʔ
04:12	wmll mryʔ ʕmkwn bṭwrʔ mn gw nwrʔ qlʔ dmmllʔ šmʕyn hwytwn wdmwtʔ lʔ ḥzyn hwytwn ʔlʔ ʔn qlʔ blḥwd
04:13	wḥwykwn qymh wpqdkwn dtʕbdwn ʕsrʔ ptgmyn wktb ʔnwn ʕl trtyn lwḥʔ dkʔpʔ
04:14	wly pqdny mryʔ bzbnʔ hw dʔlpkwn nmwsʔ wdynʔ dtʕbdwn ʔnwn bʔrʕʔ dʕbryn ʔntwn ltmn lmʔrth
04:15	ʔzdhrw ṭb bnpškwn mṭl dlʔ ḥzytwn dmwtʔ bywmʔ dmll mryʔ ʕmkwn bḥwryb mn gw nwrʔ
04:16	dlʔ tḥblwn wtʕbdwn lkwn ṣlmʔ wdmwtʔ dkl gns/ṣlm#3#/ dmwtʔ ddkrʔ ʔw dnqbtʔ
04:17	dmwtʔ dkl bʕyrʔ dʔyt bʔrʕʔ dmwtʔ dkl prḥtʔ dgpʔ dprḥʔ bšmyʔ
04:18	dmwtʔ dkl rḥšʔ dʔrʕʔ dmwtʔ dkl nwnʔ dbymʔ dltḥt mn ʔrʕʔ
04:19	wdlʔ trymwn ʕynykwn lšmyʔ wtḥzwn šmšʔ wshrʔ wkwkbʔ wklhwn ḥylwtʔ dšmyʔ wtṭʕwn <btrhwn#2#> wtsgdwn lhwn wtplḥwn ʔnwn dplg ʔnwn mryʔ ʔlhkwn lklhwn ʕmmʔ dtḥyt šmyʔ
04:20	wlkwn qrb mryʔ wʔpqkwn mn kwrʔ dprzlʔ mn mṣryn dthwwn lh ʕmʔ wyrtwtʔ ʔyk dywmnʔ
04:21	wrgz ʕly mryʔ mṭl ptgmykwn wymʔ dlʔ ʔʕbr ywrdnn hnʔ wlʔ ʔʕwl lʔrʕʔ ṭbtʔ dyhb lkwn mryʔ ʔlhkwn ywrtnʔ
04:22	mṭl dʔnʔ mʔt ʔnʔ bʔrʕʔ hdʔ wlʔ ʕbr ʔnʔ ywrdnn hnʔ ʔntwn dyn ʕbryn ʔntwn wyrtyn ʔntwn ʔrʕʔ hdʔ ṭbtʔ <dyhb lkwn mryʔ ʔlhkwn#3#>
04:23	ʔzdhrw dlʔ/dlmʔ#3#/ tṭʕwn qymh dmryʔ ʔlhkwn dʔqym ʕmkwn <wtḥblwn#3#> wtʕbdwn lkwn ṣlmʔ wdmwtʔ dkl mdm dpqdkwn mryʔ ʔlhkwn
04:24	mṭl dmryʔ ʔlhkwn nwrʔ hw ʔkltʔ wʔlhʔ hw ṭnnʔ
04:25	wkd twldwn bnyʔ ʔw bny bnyʔ wnʕtqwn bʔrʕʔ wtḥblwn wtʕbdwn ṣlmʔ wdmwtʔ dkl mdm wtʕbdwn dbyš qdm mryʔ ʔlhkwn wtrgzwnh
04:26	shdt bkwn ywmnʔ šmyʔ wʔrʕʔ dmʔbd ʔbdyn ʔntwn bʕgl mn ʔrʕʔ dʕbryn ʔntwn ywrdnn <ywmnʔ#3#> lmʔrth wlʔ tsgwn bh ywmtʔ ʔlʔ mʔbd tʔbdwn

04:28	wtplḥwn tmn lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʕbd ʔydyʔ dbny ʔnšʔ dqysʔ wdkʔpʔ dlʔ ḥzyn wlʔ šmʕyn wlʔ ʔklyn wlʔ mryḥyn
04:29	wtbʕwnh tmn lmryʔ ʔlhkwn wtškḥwnh kd tʕqbwn ʕlwhy mn klh lbkwn wmn klh npškwn
04:30	mʔ dʕqt lkwn wmṭykwn hlyn klhwn ptgmʔ bḥrtʔ dywmtʔ wttpnwn lwt mryʔ ʔlhkwn wtšmʕwn bqlh
04:31	mṭl dʔlhʔ hw mrḥmnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn lʔ nḥblkwn wlʔ nšbwqkwn wlʔ nṭʕʔ qymʔ dymʔ lʔbhykwn
04:32	ʔlʔ šʔlw ʕl ywmtʔ qdmyʔ dhww qdmykwn mn ywmʔ <qdymʔ#3#> dbrʔ ʔlhʔ lʔnšʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ mn swpy šmyʔ wʕdmʔ lswpy šmyʔ ʔn hwʔ ʔyk hnʔ ptgmʔ rbʔ ʔw ʔštmʕ ʔkwth
04:33	ʔn šmʕ ʕmʔ ʔḥrnʔ qlh dʔlhʔ dmmll mn gw nwrʔ ʔyk dšmʕtwn ʔntwn wḥyytwn
04:34	ʔw nsyw lʔlhʔ dʔzl wnsb lh ʕmʔ mn gw ʕmʔ bnsywnʔ wbʔtwtʔ wbtdmrtʔ wbqrbʔ wbʔydʔ tqyptʔ wbdrʕʔ rmʔ wbḥzwnʔ rwrbʔ kl dʕbd mryʔ ʔlhkwn lmṣryʔ lʕnykwn
04:35	ʔntwn ḥzytwn wydʕtwn dmryʔ hw ʔlhʔ wlyt twb lbr mnh
04:36	mn šmyʔ ʔšmʕkwn qlh lmlpwtkwn wʕl ʔrʕʔ ḥwykwn nwrh rbtʔ wptgmwhy ʔšmʕkwn mn gw nwrʔ
04:37	wbdrḥm lʔbhykwn gbʔ lzrʕhwn/ldrhwn#3#/ btrhwn wʔpqkwn bprṣwph bḥylʔ rbʔ mn mṣryn
04:38	lmwbdw mn qdmykwn ʕmmʔ drwrbyn wʕšynyn mnkwn dnʕlkwn wntl lkwn ʔrʕhwn ywrtnʔ ʔyk dywmnʔ
04:39	wtdʕwn ywmnʔ wtpnwn lbkwn mṭl dmryʔ hw ʔlhʔ bšmyʔ mn lʕl wʕl ʔrʕʔ mn ltḥt wlyt twb lbr mnh
04:40	ṭrw nmwswhy wpwqdnwhy dmpqd ʔnʔ lkwn ywmnʔ dnṭʔb lkwn wlbnykwn <mn#3#> btrkwn wtsgwn ywmtʔ bʔrʕʔ dyhb lkwn mryʔ ʔlhkwn klhwn ywmtʔ
04:41	hy dyn prš mwšʔ tlt qwryʔ bʕbrʔ dywrdnn mn mdnḥy šmšʔ
04:42	dnʕrwq ltmn qṭwlʔ dnqṭwl lḥbrh dlʔ bṣbynh wlʔ snʔ hwʔ lh mn ʔtmly wmn mntmly wnʕrwq lḥdʔ mn hlyn qwryʔ wnḥʔ
04:43	ḥdʔ mnhyn bwṣr/bṣwr#2#/ dbmdbrʔ bʔrʕʔ dpqʕtʔ drwbyl wʔḥrtʔ rmt glʕd dgd wgwln dbmtnyn dmnšʔ
04:44	hnʔ nmwsʔ dsm mwšʔ qdm bny ʔysryl

04:47	wyrtw ʔrʕh wʔrʕʔ dʕwg mlkʔ dmtnyn tryn mlkʔ dʔmwryʔ dbʕbrʔ dywrdnn mn mdnḥy šmšʔ
04:48	mn ʕdwʕyr dʕl sptʔ dnḥlʔ dʔrnwn wʕdmʔ lṭwrʔ dsrywn dhwyw ḥrmwn
04:49	wklh ʕrbʔ dbʕbrʔ dywrdnn mn mdnḥʔ wʕdmʔ lymʔ dʕrbʔ dtḥyt ʔšdwd wpsgʔ
05:01	wqrʔ mwšʔ lklh ʔysryl wʔmr lhwn šmʕ ʔysryl nmwsʔ wdynʔ dʔmr ʔnʔ qdmykwn ywmnʔ dtʔlpwn ʔnwn wtṭrwn ʔnwn wtʕbdwn ʔnwn
05:02	mryʔ ʔlhn ʔqym ʕmn qymʔ bḥwryb
05:03	lʔ hwʔ ʕm ʔbhyn <blḥwd#3#> ʔqym mryʔ qymʔ hnʔ ʔlʔ <ʔp#3#> ʕmn ḥnn dhrkʔ ḥnn ywmnʔ wkln ḥyyn ḥnn
05:04	ʔpyn lwqbl ʔpyn mll mryʔ ʕmkwn bṭwrʔ mn gw nwrʔ

05:06	ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhk dʔpqtk mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn mn byt ʕbdwtʔ
05:07	lʔ nhwʔ lk ʔlh ʔḥryn lbr mny
05:08	lʔ tʕbd lk kl ṣlm wkl dmw dʔyt bšmyʔ mn lʕl wdʔyt bʔrʕʔ mn ltḥt wdʔyt bmyʔ ltḥt mn ʔrʕʔ
05:09	lʔ tsgwd lhwn wlʔ tplwḥ ʔnwn mṭl dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhk ʔlhʔ ṭnnʔ prʕ ḥwbʔ dʔbhʔ ʕl bnyʔ ltltʔ wlʔrbʕʔ dryn lsnʔy
05:10	wʕbd ʔnʔ ṭybwtʔ \lʔlpy drʔ /lʔlpʔ ddrʔ#2#/ lrḥmy wlnṭry pwqdny
05:11	lʔ tʔmʔ bšmh dmryʔ ʔlhk bdglwtʔ mṭl dlʔ mzkʔ mryʔ lmn dymʔ bšmh bdglwtʔ
05:12	ṭr ywmʔ dšbtʔ wqdšyhy ʔyk dpqdk mryʔ ʔlhk
05:13	štʔ ywmyn tplwḥ wtʕbd kl ʕbdk
05:14	wywmʔ dšbʕʔ šbtʔ lmryʔ ʔlhk lʔ tʕbd bh kl ʕbd ʔnt wbrk wbrtk wʕbdk wʔmtk wtwrk wḥmrk wkwlh bʕyrk wʕmwrʔ/wʕbwrʔ#3#/ dʔyt bqwryk dnttnyḥ ʕbdk wʔmtk ʔkwtk
05:15	wʔtdkr dʕbdʔ hwyt bmṣryn wʔpqk mryʔ ʔlhk mn tmn bʔydʔ tqyptʔ wbdrʕʔ rmʔ mṭl hnʔ pqdk mryʔ ʔlhk lmṭr ywmʔ dšbtʔ

05:22	hlyn <klhwn#3#> ptgmʔ mll mryʔ ʕm klh knwštʔ bṭwrʔ mn gw nwrʔ bʕnnʔ wbʕrplʔ wbqlʔ rbʔ/rmʔ#3#/ dlyt lh skʔ wktb ʔnwn ʕl trtyn lwḥʔ dkʔpʔ wyhb ʔnwn ly
05:23	wkd šmʕtwn qlʔ mn gw ḥšwkʔ wṭwrʔ mtgwzl hwʔ bnwrʔ qrbtwn lwty klkwn ryšʔ dšbṭykwn wsbykwn
05:24	wʔmrtwn hʔ ḥwyn mryʔ ʔlhn šwbḥh wrbwth wqlh šmʕn mn gw nwrʔ ywmnʔ ḥzyn dmll ʔlhʔ/mryʔ#3#/ ʕm ʔnšʔ wḥyʔ

05:26	mnw gyr br bsrʔ dʔkwtn dšmʕ qlh dʔlhʔ ḥyʔ dmmll mn gw nwrʔ wḥyʔ
05:27	qrwb ʔnt wšmʕ klmdm dʔmr lk mryʔ ʔlhn wʔnt ʔmr ln kl mdm dʔmr lk mryʔ ʔlhn wnšmʕ wnʕbd
05:28	wšmʕ mryʔ qlʔ dptgmykwn ʔyk dʔmrtwn ly wʔmr ly mryʔ šmʕt qlh dʕmʔ hnʔ wptgmʔ dʔmrw lk špyr klmdm dmllw
05:29	ʔštwp dyn nhwʔ lhwn lbʔ hnʔ lmdḥl qdmy wlmṭr klhwn pwqdny klhwn ywmtʔ dnṭʔb lhwn wlbnyhwn lʕlm
05:30	zl wʔmr lhwn ʔtpnw lkwn lmšknykwn
05:31	wʔnt hrkʔ qwm qdmy wʔmr lk klhwn pwqdny wnmwsy wdyny dtlp ʔnwn wnʕbdwn bʔrʕʔ dyhb ʔnʔ lhwn lmʔrth
05:32	ṭrw wʕbdw ʔyk/ʔyknʔ#3#/ dpqdkwn mryʔ ʔlhkwn wlʔ tsṭwn lʔ lymynʔ wlʔ lsmlʔ
05:33	bklh ʔwrḥʔ dpqdkwn mryʔ ʔlhkwn zlw dtḥwn wnṭʔb lkwn wtsgwn ywmtʔ bʔrʕʔ dtʔrtwn
06:01	hlyn pwqdnʔ wnmwsʔ wdynʔ dpqdny mryʔ ʔlhkwn dʔlpkwn dtʕbdwn bʔrʕʔ dʕʔlyn ʔntwn lh lmʔrth
06:02	wtdḥlwn mn mryʔ ʔlhkwn wtṭrwn klhwn pwqdnwhy wnmwswhy wdynwhy dmpqd ʔnʔ lk <ywmnʔ#2#> ʔnt wbrk wbr brk klhwn ywmy ḥyyk dnsgwn ywmtk
06:03	\šmʕ ʔysryl wṭr wʕbd /šmʕw ʔysrʔyl wṭrw wʕbdw#2#/ dnṭʔb lk wtsgʔ ṭb ʔyk dʔmr lk mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbhyk dntl lk ʔrʕʔ dmrdyʔ ḥlbʔ wdbšʔ
06:04	šmʕ ʔysryl mryʔ ʔlhn mryʔ ḥd hw
06:05	rḥm lmryʔ ʔlhk mn klh lbk <wmn klh ḥylk#3#> wmn klh npšk <wmn kwlh ḥylk#3#> wmn klh qnynk
06:06	wnhwwn hlyn ptgmʔ dmpqd ʔnʔ lk ywmnʔ ʕl lbk
06:07	wtnʔ ʔnwn lbnyk wmll bhwn mʔ dytb ʔnt bbytk wmʔ dʔzl ʔnt bʔwrḥʔ wmʔ ddmk ʔnt wmʔ dqʔm ʔnt
06:08	wqṭwr ʔnwn ʔtʔ ʕl ʔydk wnhwwn rwšmʔ byt ʕynyk
06:09	wktwb ʔnwn ʕl ʔskptʔ dbtyk wʕl trʕyk
06:10	wmʔ dʔʕlk mryʔ ʔlhk lʔrʕʔ dymʔ lʔbhyk lmtl lhwn lʔbrhm wlʔysḥq wlyʕqwb lmtl lk qwryʔ drwrbn wṭbn dlʔ bnyt
06:11	wbtʔ dmlyn kl ṭbtʔ dlʔ mlyt wgwbʔ ḥpyrʔ dlʔ ḥprt wkrmʔ wzytʔ dlʔ nṣbt wtʔkwl wtsbʕ
06:12	ʔzdhr dlʔ/dlmʔ#2#/ tṭʕʔ lmryʔ ʔlhk dʔpqk mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn mn byt ʕbdwtʔ
06:13	lmryʔ ʔlhk dḥl wlh plwḥ wbšmh ymy
06:14	lʔ tʔzlwn btr ʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ dʕmmʔ dbḥdrykwn
06:15	mṭl dʔlhʔ hw ṭnnʔ mryʔ ʔlhk bgwk dlʔ ntḥmt rwgzh dmryʔ ʔlhk ʕlyk wnwbdk mn \ʔpyh dʔrʕʔ /ʔpy ʔrʕʔ#2#/
06:16	lʔ tnswn lmryʔ ʔlhkwn ʔyk dnsytwn bnsywnʔ
06:17	ʔlʔ ṭrw pwqdnwhy dmryʔ ʔlhkwn wshdwth wnmwswhy dpqdk
06:18	wʕbd dšpyr wtryṣ qdm mryʔ ʔlhk dnṭʔb lk wtʕwl wtʔrt ʔrʕʔ ṭbtʔ dʔymʔ mryʔ lʔbhyk
06:19	wntbr lklhwn bʕldbbyk mn qdmyk ʔyk dʔmr mryʔ
06:20	wkd nšʔlk brk mḥr wnʔmr lk mnʔ hy shdwtʔ wnmwsʔ wdynʔ dpqdkwn mryʔ ʔlhn
06:21	ʔmr lbrk dʕbdʔ hwyn dprʕwn bmṣryn wʔpqn mryʔ mn mṣryn bʔydʔ tqyptʔ
06:22	wʕbd mryʔ ʔtwtʔ wtdmrtʔ rwrbtʔ wbyštʔ/wʕšyntʔ#2#/wpryštʔ#3#/ bmṣryn bprʕwn wbklh ḥylh/byth#3#/ lʕynyn
06:23	wln ʔpqn mryʔ mn tmn/mṣryn#3#/ dnʕln wntl ln ʔrʕʔ dymʔ lʔbhyn
06:24	wpqdn mryʔ <ʔlhn#3#> lmʕbd hlyn klhwn nmwsʔ lmdḥl mn qdm mryʔ ʔlhn dnṭʔb ln klhwn ywmtʔ wnḥyn ʔyk dywmnʔ
06:25	wzdyqwtʔ thwʔ ln mʔ dnṭrn wʕbdn klh hnʔ pwqdnʔ qdm mryʔ ʔlhn ʔyk dpqdn
07:01	wmʔ/wmn#3#/ dʔʕlk mryʔ ʔlhk lʔrʕʔ dʕʔl ʔnt ltmn lmʔrth wnwbd ʕmmʔ sgyʔʔ mn qdmyk ḥtyʔ wgrgwsyʔ wʔmwryʔ wknʕnyʔ wprzyʔ wḥwyʔ wybwsyʔ šbʕʔ ʕmmyn dsgyʔyn wʕšynyn mnk
07:02	wnšlm ʔnwn mryʔ ʔlhk qdmyk wtmḥwn ʔnwn wmḥrmw tḥrmwn ʔnwn lʔ tqymwn ʕmhwn qymʔ wlʔ trḥmwn ʕlyhwn
07:03	wlʔ ttḥtnwn lhwn bntkwn lʔ ttlwn lbnyhwn wbnthwn lʔ tsbwn lbnykwn
07:04	dlʔ nsṭyn lbnykwn mny wnplḥwn lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ wntḥmt rwgzh dmryʔ ʕlykwn wnwbdkwn bʕgl
07:05	ʔlʔ hknʔ ʕbdw lhwn mdbḥyhwn ʕqrw wqymthwn tbrw wḥšlthwn gdmw wglypyhwn ʔwqdw bnwrʔ
07:06	mṭl dʕmʔ ʔnt qdyšʔ lmryʔ ʔlhk wlk gbʔ mryʔ ʔlhk dthwʔ lh ʕmʔ ḥbybʔ mn klhwn ʕmmʔ dʕl ʔpy <klh#3#> ʔrʕʔ
07:07	lʔ hwʔ mṭl dsgyʔyn ʔntwn mn klhwn ʕmmʔ \ṣbʔ bkwn mryʔ wgbkwn mṭl dʔntwn zʕwryn ʔntwn mn klhwn ʕmmʔ /#2#/
07:08	ʔlʔ mṭl drḥm lkwn mryʔ wdnqym mwmtʔ dymʔ lʔbhykwn ʔpqkwn mryʔ bʔydh tqyptʔ wprqkwn mn byt ʕbdwtʔ mn ʔydh dprʕwn mlkʔ dmṣryn
07:09	wtdʕ dmryʔ ʔlhk hwyw ʔlhʔ ʔlhʔ mhymnʔ nṭr qymʔ wṭybwtʔ lrḥmwhy/ldḥlwhy#3#/ wlnṭry pwqdnwhy lʔlp dryn
07:10	wprʕ lsnʔwhy bḥyyhwn prʕ lhwn dnwbd ʔnwn lʔ nṭr lsnʔwhy ʔlʔ bḥyyhwn prʕ lhwn
07:11	ṭrw pwqdnʔ wnmwsʔ wdynʔ dmpqd ʔnʔ lkwn ywmnʔ wʕbdw ʔnwn
07:12	ʔn tšmʕwn dynʔ hlyn wtṭrwn ʔnwn wtʕbdwn ʔnwn nṭr lk mryʔ ʔlhk qymʔ wṭybwtʔ dymʔ lʔbhyk
07:13	wnrḥmk wnbrkk wnsgyk wnbrk pʔrʔ dkrsk wpʔrʔ dʔrʕk wʕbwrk wḥmrk wmšḥk wbqrʔ dtwryk wgzrʔ dʕnk bʔrʕʔ dymʔ lʔbhyk lmtl lk
07:14	bryk thwʔ mn kl ʕmmyn lʔ nhwʔ bk dʕqr wdʕqrʔ wʔplʔ bbʕyrk
07:15	wnʕbr mryʔ mnk kl kʔb wkwlhyn mḥwtʔ byštʔ dmṣryʔ dydʕ ʔnt lʔ nytʔ ʔnyn ʕlyk ʔlʔ nytʔ ʔnyn ʕl klhwn snʔyk
07:16	wtʔkwl lklhwn ʕmmʔ dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk wlʔ tḥws ʕynk ʕlyhwn wlʔ tplwḥ lʔlhyhwn mṭl dpḥʔ ʔnwn lk
07:17	wʔn tʔmr blbk dsgyʔyn ʔnwn hlyn ʕmmʔ mny ʔyknʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ dʔwbd ʔnwn
07:18	lʔ tdḥl mnhwn ʔlʔ ʔtdkr kl mdm dʕbd mryʔ ʔlhk lprʕwn wlklh mṣryn
07:19	nsywnʔ rwrbʔ dḥzy ʕynyk ʔtwtʔ wtdmrtʔ wʔydʔ tqyptʔ wdrʕʔ rmʔ wʔpqk mryʔ ʔlhk hknʔ nʕbd mryʔ ʔlhk lklhwn ʕmmʔ ddḥl ʔnt mn qdmyhwn
07:20	wʔp dbwrytʔ ngrʔ mryʔ ʔlhk bhwn ʕdmʔ dnʔbdwn wʔylyn dmštḥryn wʔylyn dṭšyn mn qdmyk
