07:25	glypʔ dʔlhyhwn twqdwn bnwrʔ wlʔ trg sʔmʔ wdhbʔ dʔnt bhwn wtsb lk dlʔ ttṭmʔ bh mṭl dmsly hw qdm mryʔ ʔlhk
07:26	lʔ tʕl ṭnpwtʔ lbytk dlʔ thwʔ ḥrm ʔkwth ʔlʔ mslyw ʔslyhy wmṭnpw ṭnpyhy mṭl dḥrmʔ hw
08:01	klhwn pwqdnʔ dmpqd ʔnʔ lkwn ywmnʔ ṭrw wʕbdw ʔnwn \dtḥwn wtsgwn /wtsgwn wtʔḥwn#2#/ wtʕlwn wtʔrtwn ʔrʕʔ dymʔ mryʔ lʔbhykwn
08:02	wttdkrwn klh ʔwrḥʔ ddbrkwn mryʔ ʔlhkwn hʔ ʔrbʕyn šnyn bmdbrʔ dnmkkwn wnnsykwn wdndʕ mʔ dʔyt blbkwn ʔn nṭryn ʔntwn pwqdnwhy wʔn/ʔw#3#/ lʔ
08:03	wmkkk wʔkpnk wʔwklk mnnʔ dlʔ ydʕt wlʔ ydʕwhy ʔbhyk dnḥwyk dlʔ hwʔ blḥmʔ blḥwd ḥyʔ br ʔnšʔ ʔlʔ bkl mdm dmpq pwmh dmryʔ ḥyʔ ʔnšʔ

09:01	šmʕ ʔysryl ʔnt ʕbr ywmnʔ ywrdnn lmʔzl lmwbdw ʕmmʔ drwrbyn wʕšynyn mnk wqwryʔ drwrbn wʕšynn wkrykn ʕdmʔ lšmyʔ

09:03	wdtdʕ ywmnʔ dmryʔ ʔlhk hw \ʕbr qdmyk /ʕbd qrbk#3#/ nwrʔ hw ʔkltʔ whw nwbd ʔnwn whw ntbr ʔnwn mn qdmyk wtḥrwb ʔnwn wtwbd bʕgl ʔyk dʔmr lk mryʔ
09:04	lʔ tʔmr blbk mʔ dtbr ʔnwn mryʔ ʔlhk mn qdmyk dbzdyqwty ʔʕlny mryʔ lmʔrt ʔrʕʔ hdʔ mṭl dbḥṭhyhwn hw gyr dʕmmʔ hlyn mwbd lhwn mryʔ mn qdmyk

09:06	wdtdʕ dlʔ hwʔ bzdyqwtk yhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk ʔrʕʔ hdʔ ṭbtʔ lmʔrth mṭl dʕmʔ ʔnt qšʔ qdlʔ
09:07	ʔtdkr wlʔ tṭʕʔ dʔrgzt lmryʔ ʔlhk bmdbrʔ mn ywmʔ dnpqtwn mn mṣryn wʕdmʔ dʔtytwn lʔtrʔ hnʔ mmrmrnʔ hwytwn qdm mryʔ

09:15	wʔtpnyt wnḥtt mn ṭwrʔ wṭwrʔ mtgwzl hwʔ bnwrʔ wtrtyn lwḥʔ dqymʔ btrtyhyn ʔydy
09:16	wḥzyt dḥṭytwn lmryʔ ʔlhkwn wʕbdtwn lkwn ʕglʔ dnsktʔ wsṭytwn bʕgl mn ʔwrḥʔ dpqdkwn mryʔ ʔlhkwn

10:04	wktb ʕl lwḥʔ ʔyk ktbʔ qdmyʔ ʕsrʔ ptgmyn dmll mryʔ ʕmkwn bṭwrʔ mn gw nwrʔ bywmʔ dknwšyʔ wyhb ʔnyn ly mryʔ

10:09	mṭl hnʔ lyt hwt llwy plgwtʔ wyrtwtʔ ʕm ʔḥwhy mryʔ hw gyr yrtwth ʔyk dʔmr lh mryʔ ʔlhk
10:10	wʔnʔ qmt qdm mryʔ bṭwrʔ ʔyk ywmtʔ qdmyʔ ʔrbʕyn ʔymmyn wʔrbʕyn lylwn wšmʕny mryʔ ʔp bzbnʔ hw wlʔ ṣbʔ mryʔ <ʔlhk#3#> dnḥblk

10:13	wtṭr pwqdnwhy dmryʔ ʔlhk wnmwswhy dmpqd ʔnʔ lk ywmnʔ wnṭʔb lk

10:16	gzwrw ʕwrlwtʔ dlbkwn wqdlkwn twb lʔ tqšwn
10:17	mṭl dmryʔ ʔlhkwn hwyw ʔlh ʔlhyn wmrʔ mrwtʔ ʔlhʔ rbʔ wgnbrʔ wdḥylʔ dlʔ nsb bʔpʔ wlʔ mqbl šwḥdʔ
10:18	wʕbd dynʔ dytmʔ wdʔrmltʔ wrḥm lʔynʔ dmtpnʔ lwth wyhb lh lḥmʔ wtksytʔ
10:19	rḥmw lʔylyn dmtpnyn lwth mṭl dtwtbʔ/dʕmwrʔ#2#/ hwytwn bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
10:20	mn mryʔ ʔlhk dḥl wlh plwḥ wlh ʔtnqp wbšmh/wbh#3#/ ymy
10:21	dhwyw tšbwḥtk whwyw ʔlhk dʕbd ʕmk rwrbtʔ wdḥyltʔ dḥzy ʕynyk

11:01	rḥm lmryʔ ʔlhk wṭr nṭwrth wnmwswhy wdynwhy wpwqdnwhy klhwn ywmtʔ
11:02	wtdʕwn ywmnʔ dlʔ hwʔ lbnykwn dlʔ ydʕw wlʔ ḥzw mrdwth dmryʔ ʔlhkwn wrbwth wʔydh tqyptʔ wdrʕh rmʔ
11:03	wʔtwth wʕbdwhy dʕbd bmṣryn lprʕwn mlkʔ dmṣryn wlklh ʔrʕh
11:04	wdʕbd lḥylʔ dmṣryn lrkšʔ wlmrkbtʔ wlrkbyhyn dʔṭyp myʔ dymʔ dswp ʕl ʔpyhwn kd rdpw btrkwn wʔwbd ʔnwn mryʔ ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
11:05	wkl dʕbd lkwn bmdbrʔ ʕdmʔ/lywmnʔ#3#/ dʔtytwn lʔtrʔ hnʔ
11:06	wmdm dʕbd ldtn wlʔbyrm bny ʔlyb brh drwbyl dptḥt ʔrʕʔ pwmh wblʕt ʔnwn lhwn <wlnšyhwn#3#> wlbnyhwn wlmšknyhwn wlkl mdm dʔyt hwʔ lhwn dqymyn hww ʕl rglyhwn \bynt klh ʔysryl /bklh ʔysrʔyl#3#/
11:07	ʔlʔ ʕynykwn hw ḥzy lklhwn ʕbdwhy dmryʔ rwrbʔ dʕbd
11:08	ṭrw klhwn pwqdnʔ dmpqd ʔnʔ lkwn ywmnʔ dttḥylwn wtʕlwn wtʔrtwn ʔrʕʔ dʕbryn ʔntwn lh lmʔrth
11:09	wtsgwn ywmtʔ bʔrʕʔ dymʔ mryʔ lʔbhykwn lmtl lhwn wlzrʕhwn ʔrʕʔ dmrdyʔ ḥlbʔ wdbšʔ
11:10	mṭwl dʔrʕʔ dʕʔlyn ʔntwn lh lmʔrth lʔ hwt ʔyk ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn dnpqtwn mnh dzrʕyn ʔntwn zrʕkwn wmšqyn ʔntwn brglykwn ʔyk prdysʔ dšqyʔ
11:11	ʔrʕʔ dyn dʕbryn ʔntwn lh lmʔrth ʔrʕʔ hy dṭwrʔ wdpqʕtʔ wmn mṭrʔ hw dšmyʔ štyʔ myʔ
11:12	ʔrʕʔ dmryʔ ʔlhk tbʕ lh ʔmynʔyt ʕynwhy dmryʔ ʔlhk bh mn ršh dšntʔ wʕdmʔ lḥrth dšntʔ
11:13	wʔn tšmʕwn lpwqdnʔ dmpqd ʔnʔ lkwn ywmnʔ wtrḥmwn lmryʔ ʔlhkwn wtplḥwnh mn klh lbkwn wmn klh npškwn
11:14	ʔtl mṭrʔ dʔrʕkwn bzbnh bkyryʔ wlqyšyʔ wtḥmwl ʕbwrk wḥmrk wmšḥk
11:15	wʔtl ʕsbʔ bḥqlk lbʕyrk wtʔkwl wtsbʕ
11:16	ʔzdhrw dlʔ nštdl lbkwn wtsṭwn/wtṭrwn#2#/ wtplḥwn lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ wtsgdwn lhwn
11:17	wntḥmt rwgzh dmryʔ ʕlykwn wnklʔ šmyʔ dlʔ nhwʔ/ntlwn#3#/ mṭrʔ wʔrʕʔ lʔ ttl ʕllth wtʔbdwn bʕgl mn ʔrʕʔ ṭbtʔ dyhb lkwn mryʔ ʔlhkwn
11:18	wtsymwn hlyn pwqdnʔ blbkwn wbnpškwn wqṭwrw ʔnwn ʔtʔ ʕl ʔydykwn wnhwwn rwšmʔ byt ʕynykwn
11:19	wʔlpw ʔnwn lbnykwn dnmllwn bhwn mʔ dytbyn ʔntwn bbtykwn wmʔ dʔzlyn ʔntwn bʔwrḥʔ wmʔ ddmkyn ʔntwn wmʔ dqymyn ʔntwn
11:20	wktwbw ʔnwn ʕl ʔskptʔ dbtykwn wʕl trʕykwn
11:21	dnsgwn ywmykwn/ywmtkwn#2#/ wywmy bnykwn bʔrʕʔ dymʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn lʔbhykwn lmtl lhwn ʔyk ywmy šmyʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ
11:22	wʔn tṭrwn hlyn klhwn pwqdnʔ/ptgmʔ#3#/ dmpqd ʔnʔ lkwn ywmnʔ wtʕbdwn ʔnwn wtrḥmwn lmryʔ ʔlhkwn wthlkwn bklhyn ʔwrḥth wttnqpwn lh
11:23	nwbd mryʔ lhlyn klhwn ʕmmʔ mn qdmykwn wtʔrtwn lʕmmʔ drwrbyn wʕšynyn mnkwn
11:24	kl ʔtrʔ dtdrwk bh pstʔ drglkwn lkwn nhwʔ mn mdbrʔ wlbnn wmn nhrʔ lnhrʔ/rbʔ#2#/ prt wʕdmʔ lymʔ ʔḥryʔ nhwʔ tḥwmkwn
11:25	wlʔ nqwm ʔnš qdmykwn wdḥltkwn wzwʕtkwn ntl mryʔ ʔlhkwn ʕl ʔpy klh ʔrʕʔ dtdrkwn bh ʔyk/ʔyknʔ#3#/ dʔmr lkwn mryʔ
11:26	ḥzw dyhb ʔnʔ qdmykwn ywmnʔ bwrktʔ wlwṭtʔ
11:27	bwrktʔ ʔn tšmʕwn pwqdnwhy dmryʔ ʔlhkwn dmpqd ʔnʔ lkwn ywmnʔ
11:28	wlwṭtʔ ʔn lʔ tšmʕwn pwqdnwhy dmryʔ ʔlhkwn wʔn tsṭwn mn ʔwrḥʔ dmpqd ʔnʔ lkwn ywmnʔ wtʔzlwn btr ʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ dlʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn lhwn
11:29	wkd nʕlk mryʔ ʔlhk lʔrʕʔ dʕʔl ʔnt ltmn lmʔrth hb bwrktʔ ʕl ṭwrʔ dgrzym wlwṭtʔ ʕl ṭwrʔ dgbl
11:30	hʔ hnwn bʕbrʔ dywrdnn bstr ʔwrḥʔ bmʕrby šmšʔ bʔrʕʔ dknʕnyʔ dytbyn bʕrbʔ/bʕbrʔ#3#/ lwqbl glglʔ wlwqbl byt blwṭʔ dmmrʔ
11:31	mṭl dʕbryn ʔntwn ywrdnn lmʕl lmʔrt ʔrʕʔ dyhb lkwn mryʔ ʔlhkwn wtʔrtwnh wttbwn bh
11:32	wtṭrwn wtʕbdwn kwlhwn nmwsʔ/pwqdnʔ wnmwsʔ#3#/ wdynʔ dyhb ʔnʔ qdmykwn ywmnʔ
12:01	hlyn nmwsʔ wdynʔ dtṭrwn wtʕbdwn bʔrʕʔ dyhb lkwn mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbhykwn lmʔrth klhwn ywmtʔ dḥyyn ʔntwn bʔrʕʔ
12:02	ʔwbdw klhwn ʔtrwtʔ dplḥw tmn ʕmmʔ dyrtyn ʔntwn lhwn wlʔlhyhwn ʕl ṭwrʔ rmʔ wʕl rmtʔ wtḥyt kl ʔyln dmṭl
12:03	wtʕqrwn mdbḥyhwn wttbrwn qymthwn wḥšlthwn twqdwn bnwrʔ wʔlhyhwn glypʔ ttbrwn wtwbdwn šmhwn mn ʔtrʔ hw
12:04	wʔntwn lʔ tʕbdwn hknʔ lmryʔ ʔlhkwn
12:05	ʔlʔ bʔtrʔ dgbʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn mn kwl šbṭykwn lmsm šmh tmn lbyt mšryh hwytwn mʕqbyn wʔzlyn ltmn
12:06	wʔwblw ltmn yqdykwn šlmʔ wdbḥykwn wmʕsrykwn wpwršnʔ dʔydykwn wndrykwn wqwrbnykwn wbwkrʔ dtwrykwn wdʕnkwn
12:07	wʔkwlw tmn qdm mryʔ ʔlhkwn wḥdw bkl mdm dmwšṭyn ʔntwn ʔydykwn ʔntwn wʔnšy btykwn dbrkkwn mryʔ ʔlhkwn
12:08	wlʔ tʕbdwn ʔyk dʕbdynn hrkʔ ywmnʔ ʔnš ʔyk dšpyr bʕynwhy
12:09	mṭl dlʔ ʕdkyl mṭytwn <ʕdmʔ#2#> lbyt mšryʔ wlyrtwtʔ dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk
12:10	wʕbrw ywrdnn wtbw <bh#3#> bʔrʕʔ dmwrt lkwn mryʔ ʔlhkwn wmnyḥ lkwn mn klhwn bʕldbbykwn dḥdyryn lkwn wtbw bsbrʔ
12:11	wʔtrʔ dngbʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn dnšrʔ bh šmh ltmn ʔytw kl mdm dmpqd ʔnʔ lkwn <ywmnʔ#3#> yqdykwn šlmʔ wdbḥykwn wmʕsrykwn wpwršnʔ dʔydykwn wklh gbyʔ dndrykwn dndryn ʔntwn lmryʔ
12:12	wḥdw qdm mryʔ ʔlhkwn ʔntwn wbnykwn wbntkwn wʕbdykwn wʔmhtkwn wlwyʔ dbqwrykwn <lʔ tšbqwnh#3#> mṭl dlyt lhwn yrtwtʔ wplgwtʔ ʕmkwn
12:13	ʔzdhr dlʔ tsq yqdyk šlmʔ bkl ʔtr dṣbʔ ʔnt
12:14	ʔlʔ ʔn bʔtrʔ dngbʔ mryʔ bḥd mn šbṭyk tmn tsq yqdyk šlmʔ wtmn tʕbd kl mdm dmpqd ʔnʔ lk
12:15	blḥwd bkl rgtʔ dnpšk kws wʔkwl bsrʔ ʔyk bwrktʔ dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk bklhyn qwryk dṭmʔ wddkʔ nʔklwn ʔyk ṭbyʔ wʔyk ʔylʔ
12:16	blḥwd dmʔ lʔ tʔklwn ʔlʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ ʔšwdyhy ʔyk myʔ
12:17	lʔ tštlṭ lmʔkl bqwrykwn mʕsrʔ dʕbwrkwn wdḥmrkwn wdmšḥkwn wbwkrʔ dtwrykwn wdʕnkwn wkwl ndrykwn dtdrwn wqwrbnykwn wpwršnʔ dʔydykwn
12:18	ʔlʔ qdm mryʔ ʔlhk tʔklywhy <\dšnʔ bšnʔ#3# /šnʔ bšnʔ#2#> bʔtrʔ dngbʔ lh mryʔ ʔlhk ʔnt wbrk wbrtk wʕbdk wʔmtk wlwyʔ dbqwryk wtḥdʔ qdm mryʔ ʔlhk bkwl mdm dmwšṭ ʔnt ʔydk
12:19	ʔzdhr dlʔ tšbwq llwyʔ klhwn ywmyk bʔrʕʔ
12:20	wkd nrwḥ mryʔ ʔlhk tḥwmk ʔyk dʔmr lk wtʔmr ʔkwl bsrʔ mṭl drgʔ npšk lmʔkl bsrʔ bkwlhyn ʔrgygtʔ dnpšk tʔkwl bsrʔ
12:21	wʔn rḥyq hw mnk ʔtrʔ dngbʔ mryʔ ʔlhk dnsym šmh tmn kws mn twryk wmn ʕnk dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk ʔyk dpqdk wʔkwl bqwryk bkwlhyn ʔrgygtʔ dnpšk
12:22	brm dyn ʔyk dmtʔkl ṭbyʔ wʔylʔ hknʔ tʔklywhy dṭmʔ wddkʔ ʔyk ḥdʔ tʔklwnh
12:23	blḥwd ʔtḥyl dlʔ tʔkwlw dmʔ mṭl ddmʔ npšʔ hw lʔ tʔkwl npšʔ ʕm bsrʔ
12:24	lʔ tʔklywhy ʔlʔ ʔšwdyhy ʕl ʔrʕʔ ʔyk myʔ
12:25	lʔ tʔklywhy dnṭʔb lk wlbnyk mn btrk kd tʕbd dšpyr qdm mryʔ ʔlhk
12:26	blḥwd qwdšyk dnhwwn lk wndryk šqwl wtʔ lʔtrʔ dgbʔ mryʔ <ʔlhk#2#>
12:27	wʕbd yqdk šlmʔ bsrʔ wdmʔ ʕl mdbḥh dmryʔ ʔlhk wdmʔ ddbḥyk ntʔšd ʕl mdbḥh dmryʔ ʔlhk wbsrʔ ʔkwl
12:28	ṭr wšmʕ/wʕbd#3#/ hlyn klhwn pwqdnʔ/ptgmʔ#3#/ dmpqd ʔnʔ lk ywmnʔ dnṭʔb lk wlbnyk mn btrk lʕlm kd tʕbd dṭb wdšpyr qdm mryʔ ʔlhk
12:29	wkd nwbd mryʔ ʔlhk ʕmmʔ dʔzl ʔnt lwthwn wnwbd ʔnwn mn qdmyk wtʔrt ʔnwn wttb bʔrʕhwn
12:30	ʔzdhr dlʔ tṭʕʔ btrhwn mn btr dmwbd lhwn mryʔ mn qdmyk wlʔ tšʔl ʕl ʔlhyhwn wtʔmr ʔyknʔ plḥyn hww ʕmmʔ hlyn lʔlhyhwn dʔʕbd ʔp ʔnʔ ʔkwthwn
12:31	ʔnt dyn lʔ tʕbd hknʔ lmryʔ ʔlhk mṭl dkl dʔsly wsnʔ mryʔ ʕbdw lʔlhyhwn ʔp bnyhwn wbnthwn ʔwqdw bnwrʔ lʔlhyhwn
13:01	kl ptgmʔ dmpqd ʔnʔ lk lh ṭr wʕbd lʔ twsp ʕlwhy wlʔ/wʔplʔ#3#/ tbṣr mnh
13:02	wkd nqwm byntkwn nbyʔ ʔw ḥlm ḥlmʔ wntl lk ʔtʔ wtdmwrtʔ
13:03	wthwʔ ʔtʔ wtdmwrtʔ dʔmr lk wnʔmr lk tʔ nʔzl btr ʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ dlʔ ydʕ ʔnt lhwn wnplwḥ ʔnwn
13:04	lʔ tšmʕ lptgmwhy dnbyʔ hw ʔw dḥlm ḥlmʔ hw mṭl dmnsyw mnsʔ lkwn mryʔ ʔlhkwn dndʕ ʔn rḥmyn ʔntwn lh lmryʔ ʔlhkwn mn kwlh lbkwn wmn kwlh npškwn
13:05	btr mryʔ ʔlhkwn zlw wlh dḥlw wpwqdnwhy ṭrw wlh šmʕw wlh plwḥw wlh ʔtnqpw
13:06	wnbyʔ hw ʔw ḥlm ḥlmʔ hw ntqṭl ʕl dmll ʕwlʔ qdm mryʔ ʔlhkwn dʔpqkwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wprqkwn mn byt ʕbdwtʔ dnṭʕyk mn ʔwrḥʔ dpqdk mryʔ ʔlhk lmʔzl bh wbʕr byštʔ mn gwk
13:07	wʔn ngrgk ʔḥwk br ʔmk ʔw brk ʔw brtk ʔw ʔntt qymk ʔw rḥmk dʔyk npšk bstrʔ wnʔmr lk tʔ nʔzl nplwḥ lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ dlʔ ydʕt ʔnt wʔbhyk
13:08	mn ʔlhʔ dʕmmʔ dbḥdrykwn dqrybyn lkwn ʔw drḥyqyn mnkwn mn swpyh dʔrʕʔ wʕdmʔ lswpyh dʔrʕʔ
13:09	lʔ ttṭpys mnh wlʔ tšmʕywhy wlʔ tḥws ʕynk ʕlwhy wlʔ trḥm wlʔ tksʔ ʕlwhy
13:10	ʔlʔ mqṭl qṭwlyhy ʔydk tšrʔ bh lwqdm lmqṭlh wʔydʔ dklh ʕmʔ bʔḥrytʔ
13:11	wrwgmwhy bkʔpʔ wnmwt ʕl/mṭl#3#/ dbʕʔ lmṭʕywtk mn mryʔ ʔlhk dʔpqk mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn mn byt ʕbdwtʔ
13:12	wklhwn dbyt ʔysryl nšmʕwn wndḥlwn wlʔ nwspwn lmʕbd ʔyk ptgmʔ hnʔ byšʔ byntkwn
13:13	wkd tšmʕ bḥdʔ mn qwryk dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk lmtb bh wnʔmrwn lk
13:14	npqw gbrʔ bny ḥṭʔ mn gwk wʔṭʕyw lʔnšʔ dqrythwn wʔmrw nʔzl nplwḥ lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ dlʔ ydʕtwn
13:15	tbʕ wbṣy wšʔl špyr ʔn šryrʔyt ʔytwhy ptgmʔ wʔtʕbdt ṭnpwtʔ hdʔ bgwk
13:16	ḥrwb lʕmwryh dqrytʔ hy bpwmʔ dsypʔ/dḥrbʔ#3#/ ḥrwbyh wlkl dʔyt bh wlbʕyrh bpwmʔ dḥrbʔ
13:17	wklh bzth knš lgw šṭḥh wʔwqdyh lqrytʔ bnwrʔ wlklh bzth lgmr qdm mryʔ ʔlhk wthwʔ tllʔ lʕlm wtwb lʔ ttbnʔ
13:18	wlʔ ndbq \bʔydk mdm /mdm bʔydk#2#/ mn ḥrmʔ dntpnʔ mryʔ mn ḥmtʔ drwgzh wntl lk rḥmʔ wnrḥm ʕlyk wnrḥmk wnsgyk ʔyk dymʔ lʔbhyk
13:19	ʔn tšmʕ bqlh dmryʔ ʔlhk wtṭr pwqdnwhy dmpqd/dmpšq#3#/ ʔnʔ lk ywmnʔ wtʕbd dšpyr qdm mryʔ ʔlhk
14:01	bnyʔ ʔntwn dmryʔ ʔlhkwn lʔ ttʕrdwn wlʔ tʕbdwn qwdḥtʔ byt ʕynykwn ʕl mytʔ
14:02	mṭl dʕmʔ ʔnt qdyšʔ lmryʔ ʔlhk wlk gbʔ mryʔ ʔlhk dthwʔ lh ʕmʔ ḥbybʔ ṭb mn klhwn ʕmmʔ dʕl ʔpy ʔrʕʔ
14:03	lʔ tʔklwn kwl dṭmʔ
14:04	whdʔ ḥywtʔ dtʔklwn twrʔ wʔmrʔ wnqyʔ wʕzʔ
14:05	wʔylʔ wṭbyʔ wyḥmwrʔ wyʕlʔ wrymʔ wdyṣʔ wʔrnʔ
14:06	kl bʕyrʔ dṣryʔ prsth wplygʔ ltryn wmtgwrrʔ hy ʔkwlw
14:07	hlyn dyn lʔ tʔklwn mn ʔylyn dmtgwrryn wmn ʔylyn dṣryn prsthwn ṣlpn ṣlpn gmlʔ wʔrnbʔ wḥgsʔ mtgwrryn wprsthwn lʔ ṣryn ṭmʔyn ʔnwn lkwn
14:08	wḥzyrʔ dṣryʔ prsth wlʔ mtgwrr ṭmʔ hw lkwn mn bsrhwn lʔ tʔklwn wlpgryhwn lʔ ttqrbwn
14:09	whlyn ʔkwlw mn kl dʔyt bmyʔ kl dʔyt lh gpʔ wqlpʔ ʔkwlw
14:10	wkl dlyt lh gpʔ wqlpʔ lʔ tʔklwn ṭmʔ hw lkwn
14:11	wkl prḥtʔ ddkyʔ ʔkwlw
14:12	whlyn lʔ tʔklwn mnhwn nšrʔ
14:13	wdytʔ
14:14	wnʕbʔ bgnsyhwn

14:17	wšlʔ nwnʔ
14:18	wḥwrbʔ wʔnpʔ bgnsyhwn wtrngwl brʔ wṭwsʔ
14:19	wklh yldʔ dprḥtʔ hdʔ ṭmʔ hw lkwn lʔ ntʔklwn
14:20	wkwl prḥtʔ ddkyʔ ʔkwlw
14:21	wlʔ tʔklwn kl dṭmʔ ʔlʔ lʕmwrʔ dbqwryk hbyhy nʔklywhy ʔw zbnyhy lnwkryʔ mṭl dʕmʔ ʔnt qdyšʔ lmryʔ ʔlhk lʔ tbšl gdyʔ bḥlbʔ dʔmh
14:22	mʕsrw ʕsrw klh ʕlltʔ dzrʕkwn dmpqʔ ḥqlʔ/ʔrʕkwn#3#/ šnʔ bšnʔ
14:23	wʔkwl qdm mryʔ ʔlhk bʔtrʔ dgbʔ lmšryw šmh tmn mʕsrʔ dʕbwrk wdḥmrk wdmšḥk wbwkrʔ dtwryk wdʕnk wtʔlp lmdḥl qdm mryʔ ʔlhk klhwn ywmtʔ
14:24	wʔn sgyʔʔ hy mnk ʔwrḥʔ wlʔ mškḥ ʔnt lmšqlh mṭl drḥyq hw mnk ʔtrʔ dgbʔ mryʔ ʔlhk lmšryw šmh tmn mʔ dbrkk/dbrk#3#/ mryʔ ʔlhk
14:25	zbnyhy bkspʔ wṣwr kspʔ bʔydk wzl lʔtrʔ dgbʔ mryʔ ʔlhk
14:26	wzbn bkspʔ kl drgʔ npšk mn twrʔ wmn ʕnʔ wmn ḥmrʔ wmn škrʔ wmn kl dšʔlʔ lk npšk wʔkwl tmn qdm mryʔ ʔlhk wḥdy ʔnt wbytk/wbnyk wbntk#2#/
14:27	wlwyʔ dbqwryk lʔ tšbqywhy mṭl dlyt lh plgwtʔ wyrtwtʔ ʕmk
14:28	wmn btr tlt šnyn ʔpq klh mʕsrʔ dʕlltk bšntʔ hy šbwq bqwryk
14:29	wnʔtʔ lwyʔ dlyt lh plgwtʔ wyrtwtʔ ʕmk wʔynʔ dmtpnʔ lwty wytmʔ wʔrmltʔ dbqwryk wnʔklwn wnsbʕwn wnbrkk mryʔ ʔlhk bklh ʕbdʔ dʔydyk dtʕbd
15:01	wbtr šbʕ šnyn ʕbd šwbqnʔ
15:02	whnw zdqh dšwbqnʔ nšbwq kl gbrʔ mrʔ ḥwbʔ dḥyb lh ḥbrh lʔ ntbʕ mn ḥbrh wmn ʔḥwhy mṭl dʔtqry šwbqnʔ lmryʔ
15:03	wmn nwkryʔ tbʕ wmdm dʔyt lk lwt ʔḥwk šbwq
15:04	dlʔ nhwʔ byntkwn msknʔ mṭl dmbrkw nbrkk mryʔ ʔlhk bʔrʕʔ dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk lmʔrth
15:05	wʔn tšmʕ bqlh dmryʔ ʔlhk wtṭr wtʕbd hnʔ kwlh pwqdnʔ dmpqd ʔnʔ lk ywmnʔ
15:06	nbrkk mryʔ ʔlhk ʔyk dʔmr lk twzp lʕmmʔ sgyʔʔ wʔnt lʔ tʔzp wtštlṭ bʕmmʔ sgyʔʔ wbk lʔ nštlṭwn
15:07	wʔn nhwʔ byntkwn msknʔ ḥd mn ʔḥykwn bḥdʔ mn qwrykwn bʔrʕʔ dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk lʔ tʕšn lbk wlʔ tʔḥwd ʔydk mn ʔḥwk msknʔ
15:08	ʔlʔ ptḥ lh ʔydk wʔwzpyhy mdm dḥsyr lh
15:09	ʔzdhr dlmʔ/dlʔ#2#/ nhwʔ ptgmʔ dʕwlʔ blbk wtʔmr dqrbt šntʔ dšwbqnʔ šntʔ dšbwʕʔ wtbʔš ʕynk bʔḥwk msknʔ wlʔ ttl lh wnqrʔ ʕlyk lmryʔ wnhwʔ ʕlyk ḥṭhʔ
15:10	ʔlʔ hb lh wlʔ nbʔš lbk mʔ dyhb ʔnt lh dmṭl ptgmʔ hnʔ nbrkk mryʔ ʔlhk bklhwn ʕbdyk wbkl mdm dmwšṭ ʔnt ʔydk
15:11	lʔ gyr gmr msknʔ mn gw ʔrʕʔ mṭl hnʔ mpqd ʔnʔ lk wʔmr ʔnʔ lk dtptḥ ʔydk lʔḥwk msknʔ wlbyšʔ dbʔrʕk/dʕmk#3#/
15:12	wkd nzdbn lk ʔḥwk ʕbryʔ wʕbrytʔ/ʔw ʕbrytʔ#3#/ št šnyn nplḥk wlšntʔ dšbʕ šbwqyhy br ḥʔrʔ mn lwtk
15:13	wmʔ dšbq ʔnt lh br ḥʔrʔ mn lwtk lʔ tšbwqywhy sryqʔyt
15:14	ʔlʔ prwš whb lh mn ʕnk wmn twryk wmn ʔdrk wmn mʕṣrtk wmn mdm dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk hb lh
15:15	wʔtdkr dʕbdʔ hwyt bmṣryn wprqk mryʔ ʔlhk mṭl hnʔ mpqd ʔnʔ lk ptgmʔ hnʔ ywmnʔ
15:16	wʔn nʔmr lk dlʔ npq ʔnʔ mn lwtk mṭwl drḥmtk wlbytk wpqḥ ly ʕmk
15:17	sb mqbʔ wqwb ʔdnh ʕl trʕʔ wnhwʔ lk ʕbdʔ lʕlm wʔp lʔmtk hknʔ tʕbd lh
15:18	wlʔ ntbʔš bʕynyk mʔ/ʕl#3#/ dšbq ʔnt lh br ḥʔrʔ mn lwtk mṭl dḥd tryn bʔgrʔ dʔgyrʔ plḥk št šnyn wnbrkk mryʔ ʔlhk bkl mdm dʕbd ʔnt
15:19	wkl bwkrʔ dmtyld <lk#2#> btwryk wbʕnk dkrʔ qdš lmryʔ ʔlhk lʔ tplwḥ bbwkrʔ dtwryk wlʔ tgwz bwkrʔ dʕnk
15:20	ʔlʔ qdm mryʔ ʔlhk ʔkwlyhy dšnʔ bšnʔ bʔtrʔ dgbʔ mryʔ <ʔlhk#3#> ʔnt wbytk
15:21	wʔn nhwʔ bh mwmʔ \wntḥgr ʔw ntʕwr /ntʕwr ʔw ntḥgr#3#/ ʔw kl mdm/mwm#3#/ dsnʔ lʔ tqrbywhy lmryʔ ʔlhk
15:22	ʔlʔ bqwryk ʔkwlyhy dṭmʔ wddkʔ ʔkḥdʔ ʔyk ṭbyʔ wʔyk ʔylʔ tʔklywhy
15:23	blḥwd dmʔ lʔ tʔklwn ʔlʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ ʔšwdyhy ʔyk myʔ
16:01	ṭr yrḥʔ dhbbʔ wʕbd pṣḥʔ lmryʔ ʔlhk mṭl dbyrḥʔ dhbbʔ ʔpqk mryʔ ʔlhk mn mṣryn bllyʔ
16:02	wkws pṣḥʔ lmryʔ ʔlhk mn ʕnʔ wmn twrʔ bʔtrʔ dgbʔ mryʔ ʔlhk lmšryw šmh tmn
16:03	lʔ tʔkwl ʕlwhy ḥmyʕʔ ʔlʔ šbʕʔ ywmyn ʔkwl ʕlwhy pṭyrʔ lḥmʔ mmkkʔ mṭl dbswrhbʔ npqtwn mn mṣryn dthwʔ mtdkr ywmʔ dnpqt bh mn mṣryn klhwn ywmy ḥyyk
16:04	wlʔ ntḥzʔ ḥmyʕʔ/ḥmyrʔ#2#/ bkwlh tḥwmk šbʕʔ ywmyn wlʔ nbwt mn bsrʔ dnks ʔnt brmšʔ bywmʔ qdmyʔ lṣprʔ
16:05	lʔ šlyṭ lk lmks pṣḥʔ bḥdʔ mn qwryk dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk
16:06	ʔlʔ bʔtrʔ dngbʔ mryʔ ʔlhk lmšryw šmh tmn kws pṣḥʔ brmšʔ/lmryʔ#3#/ bmʕrby šmšʔ ʔyk zbnʔ dnpqt <bh#3#> mn mṣryn
16:07	wbšl wʔkwl bʔtrʔ dgbʔ lh mryʔ ʔlhk whpwk bṣprʔ zl lmšknk
16:08	štʔ ywmyn tʔkwl pṭyrʔ wywmʔ dšbʕʔ knwšyʔ hw lmryʔ ʔlhkwn lʔ tʕbdwn bh <kl#3#> ʕbdʔ
16:09	šbʕʔ šbwʕyn tmnʔ lk mʔ dmšrʔ ʔnt mglʔ bqymtʔ šrʔ lmmnʔ šbʕʔ šbwʕyn
16:10	wʕbd ʕdʕʔdʔ dšbwʕʔ lmryʔ ʔlhk mst pwršnʔ dʔydyk dprš ʔnt ʔyk/ʔyknʔ#3#/ dbrkk mryʔ ʔlhk
16:11	wḥdy qdm mryʔ ʔlhk ʔnt wbrk wbrtk wʕbdk wʔmtk wlwyʔ dbqwryk wʕmwrʔ wytmʔ wʔrmltʔ dbgwk bʔtrʔ dgbʔ mryʔ ʔlhk lmšryw šmh tmn
16:12	wʔtdkr wʕbdʔ hwyt bmṣryn ṭr wʕbd hlyn klhwn nmwsʔ
16:13	ʕdʕʔdʔ dmṭllʔ ʕbd lk šbʕʔ ywmyn mʔ dḥml ʔnt mn ʔdrʔ wmn mʕṣrtʔ
16:14	wḥdy bʕdʕʔdk ʔnt wbrk wbrtk wʕbdk wʔmtk wlwyʔ wytmʔ wʔrmltʔ wʕmwrʔ dbqwryk
16:15	šbʕʔ ywmyn ʕbd ʕdʕʔdʔ lmryʔ ʔlhk bʔtrʔ dgbʔ mryʔ <ʔlhk#3#> dnbrkk mryʔ ʔlhk bklh ʕlltk wbklh ʕbdʔ dʔydyk wthwʔ ḥdʔ
16:16	tlt zbnyn bšntʔ ntḥzwn <kwl#3#> dwkrnyk qdm mryʔ ʔlhk bʔtrʔ dgbʔ <mryʔ#3#> bʕdʕʔdʔ dpṭyrʔ wbʕdʕʔdʔ dšbwʕʔ wbʕdʕʔdʔ dmṭllʔ wlʔ ttḥzʔ qdm mryʔ ʔlhk sryqʔyt
16:17	ʔlʔ ʔnš ʔyk mwhbtʔ dʔydh ʔyk bwrktʔ dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk
16:18	dynʔ wsprʔ ʕbd lk bklhyn qwryk dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk lšbṭyk wndwnwn lʕmʔ dynʔ dzdyqwtʔ
16:19	wlʔ tṣlʔ dynʔ wlʔ tsb bʔpʔ wlʔ tqbl šwḥdʔ mṭl dšwḥdʔ mʕwr ʕynyhwn dḥkymʔ bdynʔ wmhpk mlyhwn dzkyʔ
16:20	ʔlʔ bzdyqwtʔ dwn ḥbrk dtḥʔ wtʕwl wtʔrt ʔrʕʔ <hy#3#> dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk
16:21	lʔ tṣwb lk štltʔ dkl ʔyln ʕl gnb mdbḥʔ dmryʔ ʔlhk dtʕbd lk
16:22	wlʔ tqym lk qymtʔ mdm dsnʔ mryʔ ʔlhk
17:01	lʔ tkws lmryʔ ʔlhk twrʔ ʔw ʔmrʔ dʔyt bh mwmʔ kl mdm dsnʔ mṭl dṭmʔ hw qdm mryʔ ʔlhk
17:02	wʔn nštkḥ byntkwn bḥdʔ mn qwrykwn dyhb lkwn mryʔ ʔlhkwn gbrʔ ʔw ʔnttʔ dnʕbd dbyš qdm mryʔ ʔlhk wnʕbr ʕl qymh
17:03	wnʔzl wnplwḥ lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ wnsgwd lhwn ʔw lšmšʔ ʔw lshrʔ ʔw lkl ḥylwtʔ dšmyʔ dlʔ pqdt
17:04	wnḥwwnk wtšmʕ wtʕqb špyr ʔn šryrʔ hy mltʔ wʔtʕbdt hdʔ ṭnpwtʔ bʔysrʔyl
17:05	ʔpqyhy lgbrʔ hw ʔw lʔnttʔ hy dʕbdw ptgmʔ hnʔ byšʔ bqwrykwn ʔn gbrʔ hw ʔw ʔnttʔ wrgwmw ʔnwn bkʔpʔ wnmwtwn
17:06	ʕl pwm tryn shdyn ʔw ʕl pwm tltʔ shdyn ntqṭl mn dḥyb mwtʔ lʔ ntqṭl ʕl pwm shdʔ ḥd
17:07	wʔydʔ dshdʔ \tšrʔ bh bqdmytʔ /thwʔ bh lwqdm#3#/ lmqṭlh wʔydʔ dklh ʕmʔ bʔḥrytʔ wʔwbdw ʕbdy byštʔ mn byntkwn
17:08	wkd ntksʔ mnkwn ptgmʔ ddynʔ/hnʔ#3#/ byt dmʔ ldmʔ wbyt dynʔ ldynʔ wbyt mḥwtʔ dgrbʔ lbyt mḥwtʔ dgrbʔ <kl#2#> ptgmʔ dḥrynʔ bqwrykwn tqwm wtʔzl lʔtrʔ dngbʔ lh mryʔ ʔlhk
17:09	wtʔzl lwt khnʔ wlwt/ʔw lwt#3#/ lwyʔ ʔw lwt dynʔ dnhwʔ bywmtʔ hnwn wtšʔl wnḥwwnk ptgmʔ ddynʔ
17:10	wtʕbd mn pwm ptgmʔ dnḥwwnk mn ʔtrʔ hw ʔyk dʔmr mryʔ wtṭr wtʕbd ʔyk dnlpwnk
17:11	mn pwm nmwsʔ dnḥwwnk wmn pwm dynʔ dnʔmrwn lk tʕbd wlʔ tsṭʔ mn pwm ptgmʔ dnḥwwnk lʔ lymynʔ wlʔ lsmlʔ
17:12	wgbrʔ dnʕbd/dnʕbr#3#/ bmrḥwtʔ wlʔ nšmʕ lkhnʔ dqʔm lmšmšw tmn qdm mryʔ ʔlhk ʔw ldynʔ ntqṭl gbrʔ hw wʔwbdw ʕbdy byštʔ mn ʔysrʔyl/byntkwn#3#/
17:13	wklh ʕmʔ nšmʕwn wndḥlwn wtwb lʔ nmrḥwn
17:14	wkd tʕwl lʔrʕʔ dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk wtʔrtyh wttb bh wtʔmr ʔqym ʕly mlkʔ ʔyk hlyn ʕmmʔ dbḥdry
17:15	mqmw ʔqym ʕlyk mlkʔ ʔynʔ dgbʔ lh mryʔ ʔlhk mn bynt ʔḥyk ʔqym ʕlyk mlkʔ lʔ šlyṭ lk dtqym ʕlyk gbrʔ nwkryʔ ʔynʔ dlʔ hwʔ mn ʔḥyk
17:16	blḥwd dyn lʔ nsgʔ lh rkšʔ dlʔ nhpkywhy lʕmʔ lmṣryn kd nsgwn lh rkšʔ wmryʔ ʔmr lkwn dlʔ twspwn twb lmhpk bʔwrḥʔ hdʔ
17:17	wlʔ nsgʔ lh nšʔ dlʔ nsṭyn/nšṭyn#3#/ lbh wsʔmʔ/wkspʔ#3#/ wdhbʔ lʔ nsgʔ/nhwʔ#3#/ lh ṭb
17:18	wmʔ dytb ʕl kwrsyʔ dmlkwth nktwb lh pršgnh dnmwsʔ hnʔ bsprʔ mn qdm khnʔ wlwyʔ
17:19	wnhwʔ ʕmh wnhwʔ qrʔ bh kl ywmy ḥywhy dnʔlp lmdḥl mn qdm mryʔ ʔlhh wnṭr klhwn ptgmwhy/pwqdnwhy#3#/ dnmwsʔ hnʔ wpwqdnʔ hlyn wnʕbd ʔnwn
17:20	dlʔ nttrym lbh mn ʔḥwhy wlʔ nsṭʔ mn pwqdnʔ lʔ lymynʔ wlʔ lsmlʔ dnsgʔ ywmtʔ dmlkwth hw wbnwhy bynt bny ʔysryl
18:01	lʔ thwʔ lkhnʔ wllwyʔ plgwtʔ wyrtwtʔ bynt bny ʔysryl ʔlʔ qwrbnwhy dmryʔ wyrtwth nʔklwn
18:02	wyrtwtʔ lʔ thwʔ lh bynt/byt#3#/ ʔḥwhy mryʔ hw gyr yrtwth ʔyk/ʔyknʔ#3#/ dʔmr lh
18:03	whnʔ nhwʔ zdqh dkhnʔ mn ʕmʔ mn nksy nkstʔ ʔn twrʔ hw ʔw ʔmrʔ ntl lkhnʔ drʕʔ wpkʔ wʕnwytʔ
18:04	ryš ʕbwrk wḥmrk wmšḥk wryš gzʔ/gzrʔ#2#/ dʕnk hb lh
18:05	mṭl dlh gbʔ mryʔ ʔlhk mn klhwn šbṭyk wnqwm wnšmš bšmh dmryʔ ʔlhk hw wbnwhy klhwn ywmtʔ
18:06	wʔn/wkd#3#/ nʔtʔ lwyʔ ḥd mn ʔḥyk mn klh ʔysrʔyl mn ʔtr dʕmr nʔtʔ bkwl rgt npšh lʔtrʔ dgbʔ mryʔ
18:07	wnšmš bšmh dmryʔ ʔlhh ʔyk klhwn ʔḥwhy lwyʔ dqymyn tmn qdm mryʔ
18:08	mntʔ šwyʔyt nʔklwn sṭr mn zbnʔ dʔbhʔ
18:09	wmʔ dʕlt lʔrʕʔ dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk lʔ tʔlp lmʕbd ʔyk ʕbdyhwn dʕmmʔ hnwn/hlyn#3#/
18:10	lʔ nštkḥ bk dmʕbr brh ʔw brth bnwrʔ wdqṣm qṣmʔ wdmʔḥd ʕynʔ wdmnḥš wdḥrš
18:11	wdʔšp bʔšpʔ wdšʔl mn zkwrʔ wmn ydwʕʔ wšʔl lmytʔ
18:12	mṭl dṭmʔ hw qdm mryʔ ʔlhk kl mn dʕbd hlyn wmṭwl ṭnpwtʔ hlyn mwbd lhwn mryʔ ʔlhk mn qdmyk
18:13	hwyt tmym qdm mryʔ ʔlhk
18:14	mṭl dʕmmʔ hlyn dyrt ʔnt lhwn lzkwrʔ wlqṣwmʔ šmʕyn ʔnt dyn lʔ hwʔ hknʔ yhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk
18:15	nbyʔ mn gwk mn ʔḥyk ʔkwty nqym lh mryʔ ʔlhk lh hwytwn šmʕyn
18:16	ʔyk dšʔlt mn qdm mryʔ ʔlhk bḥwryb bywmʔ dknwšyʔ wʔmrt dlʔ ʔwsp lmšmʕ qlh dmryʔ ʔlhy whdʔ nwrʔ rbtʔ twb lʔ ʔḥzʔ dlʔ ʔmwt
18:17	wʔmr ly mryʔ špyr kl mdm dmllw
18:18	nbyʔ ʔqym lhwn mn gw ʔḥyhwn ʔkwtk wʔtl ptgmy bpwmh wnʔmr lhwn kl mdm dʔpqdywhy
18:19	wgbrʔ dlʔ nšmʕ lptgmy dnmll bšmy ʔnʔ ʔtbʕ mnh
18:20	brm dyn nbyʔ <ʔynʔ#3#> dnmrḥ lmmllw mltʔ bšmy dlʔ pqdth dnʔmr wdnmll bšm ʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ ntqṭl nbyʔ hw
18:21	wʔn tʔmr blbk ʔyknʔ ʔdʕywhy lptgmʔ dlʔ ʔmrh mryʔ
18:22	mʔ dmll nbyʔ bšmh dmryʔ wlʔ hwʔ ptgmʔ <hw#3#> wlʔ ʔtʔ hw hw ptgmʔ lʔ mll mryʔ bmrḥwtʔ mllh/hw mmllh#3#/ nbyʔ lʔ tdḥlwn mnh
19:01	wkd nwbd mryʔ ʔlhk ʕmmʔ dmryʔ ʔlhk yhb lk ʔrʕhwn wtʔrt ʔnwn wttb bqwryhwn wbbtyhwn
19:02	tlt qwryʔ prwš lk bgw ʔrʕk dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk ywrtnʔ
19:03	ṭyb ʔwrḥʔ wtlt tḥwmʔ dʔrʕʔ dmwrt lk mryʔ ʔlhk dnhwʔ ʕrq ltmn kl qṭwlʔ
19:04	whnw zdqh dqṭwlʔ dqṭl lḥbrh wḥyʔ mʔ dqṭl lḥbrh dlʔ bṣbynh wlʔ snʔ hwʔ lh mn ʔtmly wmn mntmly
19:05	wmn dnʕwl ʕm ḥbrh lʕbʔ dqysʔ lmpsq wnrym ʔydh bnrgʔ lmpsq qysʔ wnštmṭ przlʔ/nrgʔ#3#/ mn qysʔ wnmḥʔ lḥbrh wnmwt hnʔ nʕrwq lḥdʔ mn hlyn qwryʔ wnḥʔ
19:06	dlʔ kd nrdwp tbʕ ʕyrtʔ ddmʔ btr qṭwlʔ bḥmymwtʔ dlbh wndrkywhy kd thwʔ sgyʔʔ ʔwrḥʔ wnqṭlywhy kd lʔ ḥyb dynʔ dmwtʔ lʔ gyr snʔ hwʔ lh mn ʔtmly wmn mntmly
19:07	mṭl hnʔ mpqd ʔnʔ lk wʔmr ʔnʔ lk dtprwš lk tlt qwryʔ
19:08	wkd nrwḥ mryʔ ʔlhk tḥwmk ʔyk dymʔ lʔbhyk wntl lk klh ʔrʕʔ <ʔyk#3#> dymʔ lʔbhyk
19:09	ʔn tṭr klhwn pwqdnʔ hlyn wtʕbd ʔnwn dmpqd ʔnʔ lk ywmnʔ dtrḥm lmryʔ ʔlhk wthlk bʔwrḥth kwlhwn ywmtʔ twsp lk twb tlt qwryʔ ʕl hlyn tlt
19:10	dlʔ ntʔšd dmʔ zkyʔ bgw ʔrʕk dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk wntḥšb ʕlyk dmʔ <zkyʔ#3#>
19:11	wʔn nhwʔ gbrʔ snʔ lḥbrh wnkmn lh wnqwm ʕlwhy wnmḥywhy wnmwt wnʕrwq lḥdʔ mn hlyn qwryʔ
19:12	nšdrwn sbʔ dqryth wndbrwnh mn tmn wnšlmwnh byd tbʕ ʕyrtʔ ddmʔ wnqṭlywhy
19:13	wlʔ tḥws ʕynk ʕlwhy dtqṭlywhy wʕqb dmʔ zkyʔ mn ʔysryl wnṭʔb lk
19:14	lʔ tšnʔ tḥwmʔ dmn ʕlm dtḥmw qdmyʔ byrtwtk dtʔrt bʔrʕʔ dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk lmʔrth
19:15	lʔ nqwm shdʔ ḥd ʕl gbrʔ ʕl kl sklwtʔ wʕl kl ḥṭhʔ bkl ḥṭhʔ dnḥṭʔ ʕl pwm tryn shdyn ʔw \ʕl pwm tltʔ shdyn /tltʔ#3#/ ttqym mltʔ
19:16	wʔn nqwm shdʔ dglʔ/dʕwlʔ#3#/ ʕl gbrʔ wnshd ʕlwhy ʕwlʔ
19:17	nqwmwn tryhwn gbrʔ dʔyt lhwn dynʔ qdm mryʔ wqdm khnʔ wdynʔ dnhwwn bywmtʔ hnwn
19:18	wnʕqbwn dynʔ špyr wnḥzwn ʔn shdwtʔ dgltʔ bʕʔ hwʔ dnshd ʕl ʔḥwhy
19:19	ʕbdw lh ʔyk dʔtḥšb lmʕbd lʔḥwhy wbʕrw byštʔ mn byntkwn
19:20	wʔylyn dmštḥryn nšmʕwn wndḥlwn wlʔ nwspwn twb lmʕbd/lmdḥl#2#/ <ʔyk#3#> ptgmʔ hnʔ byšʔ byntkwn
19:21	lʔ tḥws ʕynk ʔlʔ npšʔ ḥlp npšʔ ʕynʔ ḥlp ʕynʔ šnʔ ḥlp šnʔ ʔydʔ ḥlp ʔydʔ rglʔ ḥlp rglʔ
20:01	wkd tpwq lqrbʔ ʕl bʕldbbyk wtḥzʔ rkšʔ wmrkbtʔ ʕmʔ dsgy mnk lʔ tdḥl mnhwn mṭwl dmryʔ ʔlhk ʔzl ʕmk dʔsqk mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
20:02	wmʔ dqrbtwn lqrbʔ nqrwb khnʔ wnʔmr lʕmʔ
20:03	šmʕ ʔysryl ʔntwn qrbyn ʔntwn ywmnʔ lqrbʔ ʕl bʕldbbykwn lʔ nttbr lbkwn wlʔ tdḥlwn wlʔ tzwʕwn wlʔ ttrhbwn mn qdmyhwn
20:04	mṭl dmryʔ ʔlhk ʔzl ʕmk dʔsqk mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn whw ntktš ʕl ʔpykwn ʕm bʕldbbykwn wnprwqkwn
20:05	wnʔmrwn sprʔ lʕmʔ mnw gbrʔ dbnʔ bytʔ ḥdtʔ wlʔ ḥdth nhpwk nʔzl lbyth dlmʔ ntqṭl bqrbʔ wgbrʔ ʔḥrnʔ nḥdtywhy
20:06	wmnw gbrʔ dnṣb krmʔ wlʔ ʕṣr mnh nhpwk nʔzl lbyth dlmʔ ntqṭl bqrbʔ wgbrʔ ʔḥrnʔ nʕṣrywhy
20:07	wmnw gbrʔ dmkr ʔnttʔ wlʔ nsbh nhpwk nʔzl lbyth dlmʔ ntqṭl bqrbʔ wgbrʔ ʔḥrnʔ nsbyh
20:08	wnwspwn sprʔ wnʔmrwn lʕmʔ mnw gbrʔ ddḥyl wrtyt lbh nhpwk nʔzl lbyth dlmʔ ntbr lbʔ dʔḥwhy ʔyk dylh/lbh#3#/
20:09	wmʔ dšlmw sprʔ lmʔmr lʕmʔ nqwmwn ryšy ḥylwtʔ bryš ʕmʔ
20:10	wmʔ dqrb ʔnt lqrytʔ lmtktšw ʕlyh ʔkrz ʕlyh šlmʔ
20:11	wʔn šlmʔ tʕnyk wtptḥ lk kl ʕmʔ dmštkḥ bh nhwwn lk ʕbdʔ msqy mdʔtʔ wnplḥwnk
20:12	wʔn lʔ tšlm lk wtʕbd ʕmk qrbʔ ʔlwṣyh
20:13	wnšlmyh mryʔ ʔlhk bʔydyk wqṭl klhwn dkryh bpwmʔ dḥrbʔ
20:14	blḥwd nšʔ wʔyqrtʔ wbʕyrʔ wkl dʔyt bqrytʔ wkl bztʔ bwz lk wʔkwl mn bztʔ dbʕldbbyk dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk
20:15	hknʔ ʕbd lklhyn qwryʔ drḥyqn mnk ṭb dlʔ hwy mn qwryʔ dʕmmʔ hlyn
20:16	blḥwd mn qwryʔ dhlyn ʕmmʔ dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk ywrtnʔ lʔ tḥʔ kl nšmʔ
20:17	ʔlʔ mḥrb ḥrwb ʔnwn lḥtyʔ wlʔmwryʔ wlknʕnyʔ wlprzyʔ wlḥwyʔ wlybwsyʔ ʔyk dpqdk mryʔ ʔlhk
20:18	dlʔ nlpwnk lmʕbd ʔyk klh ṭnpwthwn dʕbdyn hww lʔlhyhwn wtḥṭwn qdm mryʔ ʔlhkwn
20:19	wkd tʔlṣyh lqrytʔ ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ lmtktšw ʕlyh wlmkbšh lʔ tḥbl ʔylnyh wlʔ trmʔ ʕlyhwn przlʔ mṭl dmnhwn ʔkl ʔnt wlhwn psq ʔnt mṭl dʔylnʔ dḥqlʔ lʔ hwʔ ʔyk brnšʔ dnʕrwq mn qdmyk bʔwlṣnʔ
20:20	blḥwd dyn ʔylnʔ ʔynʔ dydʕ ʔnt dlʔ hwʔ ʔylnʔ dmʔkwltʔ lh ḥbl wpswq wbny qlqwmʔ ʕl qrytʔ dʕbdʔ{} ʕmk qrbʔ<> ʕdmʔ dtkbšyh
21:01	wkd nštkḥ qṭylʔ bʔrʕʔ dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk lmʔrth dʔrmʔ bḥqlʔ wlʔ ydyʕ mnw qṭlh
21:02	npqwn sbyk wdynyk wnmšḥwn qwryʔ dḥdrwhy dqṭylʔ
21:03	wqrytʔ dqrybʔ lqṭylʔ ndbrwn sbʔ dqrytʔ hy ʕgltʔ dtwrʔ dlʔ ʔtdbr bh wlʔ ngdt bnyrʔ/bʕyrʔ#3#/
21:04	wnḥtwnh/wnytwnh#3#/ sbʔ dqrytʔ hy lʕgltʔ lnḥlʔ byrʔ dlʔ ʔtplḥ bh wlʔ ʔzdrʕ wnkswnh tmn lʕgltʔ bnḥlʔ
21:05	wnqrbwn khnʔ bny lwy dlhwn gbʔ mryʔ ʔlhk lmšmšwth wlmbrkw bšmh dmryʔ wʕl mlt pwmhwn nhwʔ kl dynʔ wkl mḥwtʔ
21:06	wklhwn sbʔ dqrytʔ hy dqrybyn lqṭylʔ nšygwn ʔydyhwn lʕl mn ʕgltʔ dnkysʔ bnḥlʔ
21:07	wnʕnwn wnʔmrwn ʔydn lʔ ʔšdt dmʔ hnʔ wʕynyn lʔ ḥzy
21:08	ḥsʔ ʕl ʕmk ʔysryl dprqt mryʔ wlʔ tḥšwb dmʔ zkyʔ ʕl ʕmk ʔysryl wntḥsʔ lhwn ʕl dmʔ
21:09	wʔnt ʕqb dmʔ zkyʔ mn gwk wʕbd dšpyr qdm mryʔ ʔlhk
21:10	wkd tpwq lqrbʔ ʕl bʕldbbyk wnšlm ʔnwn mryʔ ʔlhk bʔydyk wtšbʔ mnhwn šbytʔ
21:11	wtḥzʔ bšbytʔ ʔnttʔ dšpyrʔ bḥzwh wtṣṭbʔ bh dtsbyh lk ʔnttʔ
21:12	wtʕlyh lgw bytk tgrwʕ ryšh wtsb ṭpryh
21:13	wtšlḥ mʔnʔ dšbyth mnh wttb bbytk wtbkʔ ʕl ʔbwh wʕl ʔmh yrḥ ywmyn wbtrkn tʕwl lwth wtsbyh wthwʔ lk ʔnttʔ
21:14	wʔn lʔ ṣbʔ ʔnt bh šbwqyh lnpšh wbkspʔ lʔ tzbnyh wlʔ ttgr bh ḥlp dṣʕrth
21:15	wkd nhwyn lgbrʔ trtyn nšyn ḥdʔ ʔrḥwmtʔ wḥdʔ snwʔtʔ wnʔldn lh bnyʔ ʔrḥwmtʔ wsnwʔtʔ wnhwʔ brʔ bwkrʔ lsnwʔtʔ
21:16	bywmʔ dmwrt lbnwhy mdm dʔyt lh lʔ šlyṭ lh dnqšš lbr ʔrḥwmtʔ qdm br snwʔtʔ
21:17	ʔlʔ bwkrʔ br snwʔtʔ wlʔ lh dnsb trtyn mnwn bklmdm dmštkḥ lh mṭl dhwyw ryš yldh wlh hw zdqʔ bwkrwtʔ
21:18	wkd nhwʔ lgbrʔ brʔ mrwdʔ wmmrmrnʔ wlʔ šmʕ lql ʔbwhy wlql ʔmh wrdyn lh wlʔ šmʕ lhwn
21:19	nʔḥdwnh ʔbwhy wʔmh wnpqwnh lwt sbʔ dqrytʔ wltrʕʔ dʔtrh
21:20	wnʔmrwn lsbʔ dqryth brn hnʔ mrwd wmmrmrn wlʔ šmʕ lqln wʔswṭ wrwy
21:21	nrgmwnh klhwn ʔnšʔ dqryth bkʔpʔ wnmwt wbʕrw byštʔ mn byntkwn wklh ʔysrʔyl nšmʕwn wndḥlwn
21:22	wʔn ḥyb gbrʔ ḥlp ḥṭhʔ dynʔ dmwtʔ wnzdqp ʕl qysʔ wntqṭl
21:23	lʔ tbwt šldh ʕl qysʔ ʔlʔ qwbrwhy bywmʔ hw mṭl dmn dmṣḥʔ lʔlhʔ nzdqp wlʔ tṭmʔ ʔrʕk dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk ywrtnʔ
22:01	lʔ tḥzʔ twrh dʔḥwk ʔw nqyh kd ṭʕyn wthmʔ mnhwn ʔlʔ mhpkw ʔhpk ʔnwn lʔḥwk/lh#3#/
22:02	wʔn lʔ qryb lk ʔḥwk wlʔ ydʕ ʔnt lh ʔʕl ʔnwn \lgw bytk /lbytk#3#/ wnhwwn lwtk ʕdmʔ dtbʕ lhwn ʔḥwk wpnʔ ʔnwn lh
22:03	hknʔ ʕbd ltwrh wlḥmrh wltksyth whknʔ ʕbd lkl ʔbdtʔ dʔbdʔ mnh wmškḥ ʔnt lh lʔ šlyṭ lk dthmʔ
22:04	lʔ tḥzʔ ḥmrh dbʕldbbk/dʔḥwk#3#/ ʔw twrh kd ʔrmyn bʔwrḥʔ wthmʔ mnhwn ʔlʔ mqmw ʔqym ʔnwn ʕmh
22:05	lʔ nhwwn mʔnʔ dgbrʔ ʕl ʔnttʔ wlʔ nlbš gbrʔ mʔnʔ dʔnttʔ mṭl dṭmʔ hw qdm mryʔ ʔlhk kl mn dʕbd hlyn
22:06	wkd tškḥ qnʔ dṣprʔ qdmyk bʔwrḥʔ bkl ʔyln ʔw ʕl ʔrʕʔ prwgʔ ʔw bntʔ wʔmʔ qpypʔ ʕl prwgʔ ʔw ʕl bntʔ lʔ tsb ʔmʔ ʕm bnyh
22:07	ʔlʔ mprḥw ʔprḥyh lʔmʔ wbnyh sb lk dnṭʔb lk wnsgwn ywmtk
22:08	wmʔ dbnʔ ʔnt bytʔ ḥdtʔ ʕbd tykʔ lʔgrk dlʔ/dlmʔ#3#/ npl mnh ʔnšʔ wnhwʔ/wtʕbd#3#/ dmʔ bbytk
22:09	lʔ tzrwʕ krbk ḥlṭʔ dlʔ ttqdš ʕllth dzrʕʔ dzrʕ ʔnt wʕllth dkrmʔ
22:10	lʔ tdbr pdnʔ btwrʔ wbḥmrʔ ʔkḥdʔ
22:11	lʔ tlbš ptkʔ dʕmrʔ wdktnʔ ʔyk ḥdʔ
22:12	gdyltʔ ʕbd lk ʕl ʔrbʕ knpwhy dmrṭwṭk dmtksʔ ʔnt
22:13	wkd nsb gbrʔ ʔnttʔ wnʕwl lwth wnsnyh
22:14	wngwr btrh ʕltʔ bmlʔ wnpq ʕlyh šmʔ byšʔ wnʔmr ʔnttʔ hdʔ nsbt wdmkt lwth wlʔ ʔškḥt lh btwlʔ
22:15	nsb ʔbwh dṭlytʔ wʔmh wnpqwn ʔnwn lbtwlyh dṭlytʔ lwt sbʔ dqrytʔ ltrʕʔ
22:16	wnʔmr ʔbwh dṭlytʔ lsbʔ brty yhbt lgbrʔ hnʔ ʔnttʔ wsnh
22:17	whʔ gʔr btrh ʕltʔ bmlʔ wʔmr dlʔ ʔškḥt btwlʔ lbrtk whlyn btwlʔ dbrty nprswn šwšpʔ qdm sbʔ dqrytʔ
22:18	wndbrwnh sbʔ dqrytʔ lgbrʔ hw wnrdwnh
22:19	wnḥsrwnh mʔʔ dkspʔ wntlwn lʔbwh dṭlytʔ ʕl dʔpq šmʔ byšʔ ʕl btwltʔ brt ʔysryl wlh thwʔ ʔnttʔ wlʔ nštlṭ lmšbqh klhwn ywmwhy
22:20	wʔn mn qwštʔ hwt mltʔ hdʔ wlʔ ʔštkḥw btwlʔ lṭlytʔ
22:21	npqwnh lṭlytʔ ltrʕʔ dbyt ʔbwh wnrgmwnh bkʔpʔ ʔnšy qrytʔ wtmwt ʕl dʕbdt bhttʔ bʔysryl wznyt byt ʔbwh wbʕrw byštʔ mn byntkwn
22:22	wkd nštkḥ gbrʔ ddmk ʕm ʔntt gbrʔ mtqṭlw ntqṭlwn tryhwn gbrʔ ddmk ʕmh ʔp hy ʔnttʔ wbʕrw byštʔ mn ʔysryl
22:23	wʔn thwʔ ʕlymtʔ btwltʔ dmkyrʔ lgbrʔ wnškḥyh gbrʔ ʔḥrnʔ bqrytʔ wndmk ʕmh
22:24	ʔpqw ʔnwn ltryhwn ltrʕʔ dqrytʔ hy wrgwmw ʔnwn bkʔpʔ wnmwtwn ʕl dlʔ bgnt hy ʕlymtʔ bqrytʔ whw gbrʔ ʕl dṣʕr ʔntt ḥbrh wbʕrw byštʔ mn byntkwn
22:25	wʔn bḥqlʔ ʔškḥ gbrʔ ʕlymtʔ dmkyrʔ wʔḥdh bqṭyrʔ wdmk ʕmh ntqṭl gbrʔ ddmk ʕmh blḥwdwhy
22:26	wlʕlymtʔ lʔ tʕbdwn lh mdm mṭl dlʔ ḥybʔ ʕlymtʔ ḥṭhʔ dmwtʔ ʔyk dqʔm gyr gbrʔ ʕl ḥbrh wqṭl lh hknʔ hy ṣbwtʔ hdʔ

22:28	wʔn/wkd#2#/ nškḥ gbrʔ ʕlymtʔ btwltʔ dlʔ hwt mkyrʔ wnʔḥdyh wndmk ʕmh wnštkḥwn

23:01	lʔ nsb gbrʔ ʔntt ʔbwhy \wlʔ nglʔ /wnglʔ#3#/ knpʔ dʔbwhy
23:02	lʔ nʕwl gyrʔ lknwšth dmryʔ

23:04	lʔ nʕwl ʕmwnyʔ wmwʔbyʔ lknwšth dmryʔ ʔp lʔ ldrʔ ʕsyryʔ nʕlwn lknwšth dmryʔ lʕlm
23:05	ʕl dlʔ qrbw lkwn lḥmʔ wmyʔ bʔwrḥʔ kd npqtwn mn mṣryn wʕl dʔgr ʕlyk lblʕm br bʕwr mn pytwr dʔrm nhryn lmlṭk
23:06	wlʔ ṣbʔ mryʔ ʔlhk lmšmʕh lblʕm wʔhpk ʔnyn mryʔ ʔlhk lwṭth lbwrktʔ mṭl drḥmk mryʔ ʔlhk

23:09	bnyʔ dmtyldyn lhwn bdrʔ tlytyʔ nʕlwn lknwšth dmryʔ

23:14	wsktʔ thwʔ lk ʕl/ʕm#3#/ zynk wmʔ dytb ʔnt lmy rglyk hwyt ḥpr bh whwyt mksʔ tbtk

23:16	lʔ tšlm ʕbdʔ lmrh dʕrq lwtk mn mrh
23:17	ʔlʔ ʕmk ntb bʔtrʔ dṣbʔ bḥdʔ mn qwryk ʔtr dšpyr lh wlʔ tʕlbywhy
23:18	lʔ thwʔ znytʔ mn bnt/byt#3#/ ʔysryl wʔp lʔ nhwʔ dmznʔ mn bny/byt#3#/ ʔysryl
23:19	lʔ tʕl ʔgr znytʔ wdmy klbʔ lbyth dmryʔ ʔlhk lkl ndr mṭl dṭmʔyn ʔnwn qdm mryʔ ʔlhk tryhwn
23:20	lʔ trbʔ ʕl ʔḥwk rbytʔ dkspʔ wrbytʔ dʕbwrʔ wrbytʔ dkl mdm drbʔ
23:21	ʕl nwkryʔ rbʔ wʕl ʔḥwk lʔ trbʔ dnbrkk mryʔ ʔlhk bkwl mdm dmwšṭ ʔnt ʔydk bʔrʕʔ dʕʔl ʔnt lh lmʔrth
23:22	wʔn ndr ʔnt ndrʔ lmryʔ ʔlhk lʔ tšwḥr/twḥr#3#/ lmprʕh mṭwl dmtbʕ tbʕ lh mryʔ mnk whwʔ ʕlyk ḥṭhʔ
23:23	wʔn lʔ ṣbʔ ʔnt lmdr lʔ hwʔ ʕlyk ḥṭhʔ

23:26	wmʔ dʕʔl ʔnt lqymtʔ dḥbrk mlwg šblʔ bʔydk wmglʔ lʔ tnyp ʕl qymtʔ dḥbrk
24:01	wʔn nsb gbrʔ ʔnttʔ wndmk ʕmh ʔlʔ ʔškḥt rḥmʔ qdmwhy ʕl dʔškḥ bh ṣbwtʔ dmprsyʔ nktwb lh ktbʔ dšwbqnʔ wntl lh wnšryh <mn byth#3#>
24:02	wtpwq mn byth wʔn tʔzl wthwʔ lgbrʔ ʔḥrnʔ
24:03	wnsnyh gbrʔ ʔḥrnʔ wnktwb lh ktbʔ dšwbqnʔ wntl lh wnšryh mn byth ʔw ʔn nmwt gbrʔ ʔḥrnʔ dnsbh
24:04	lʔ šlyṭ lh lbʕlh qdmyʔ dšbqh dnḥdr nsbyh <mn#3#> btr dʔtṭmʔt mṭl dṭmʔʔ hy qdm mryʔ wlʔ tḥṭʔ lʔrʕʔ dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk ywrtnʔ
24:05	wkd nsb gbrʔ ʔnttʔ ḥdtʔ lʔ npwq bḥylʔ wlʔ nʔzl lkl ṣbw ʔlʔ nhwʔ bbyth šntʔ ḥdʔ wnḥdʔ ʕm ʔnttʔ dnsb
24:06	lʔ tsb rḥyʔ wrkbh mšknʔ npšʔ hw gyr mʕyq ʔnt
24:07	wʔn nštkḥ gbrʔ mn bny ʔysryl dngnwb npšʔ mn ʔḥwhy mn bny ʔysryl dnttgr bh wnzbnyh mtqṭlw ntqṭl gbrʔ hw wbʕrw byštʔ mn byntkwn
24:08	ṭrw mḥwtʔ dgrbʔ wʔzdhrw ṭb wʕbdw ʔyk/ʔyknʔ#3#/ dmlpyn lkwn khnʔ wlwyʔ ʔyk dpqdt ʔnwn nṭrwn wnʕbdwn
24:09	wʔtdkr mdm dʕbd mryʔ ʔlhk lmrym bʔwrḥʔ kd npqtwn mn mṣryn
24:10	wʔn nḥwb lk ḥbrk ḥwbtʔ dmdm lʔ tʕwl lbyth lmsb mšknh
24:11	ʔlʔ qwm/qdm#2#/ bšwqʔ wgbrʔ hw dḥyb lk hw npqywhy lk mšknʔ lšwqʔ
24:12	wʔn gbrʔ hw msknʔ lʔ tdmk <lk#3#> bmrṭwṭh
24:13	ʔlʔ pnyhy lh mšknh mʔ dʕrbt šmšʔ wndmk bmrṭwṭh wnbrkk wthwʔ lk zdyqwtʔ qdm mryʔ ʔlhk
24:14	lʔ tṭlwm ʔgrʔ dmsknʔ wdbyšʔ mn ʔḥyk ʔw mn ʕmwrʔ dbqwryk
24:15	ʔlʔ br ywmh hb lh ʔgrh wlʔ tʕrb ʕlwhy šmšʔ mṭl dmsknʔ hw wʕl ʔpy ʔgrh hw mšlm lk npšh dlʔ nqrʔ ʕlyk \qdm mryʔ /lmryʔ#3#/ wnhwʔ ʕlyk ḥṭhʔ
24:16	lʔ nmwtwn ʔbhʔ ʕl ʔpy bnyhwn wbnyʔ lʔ nmwtwn ʕl ʔpy ʔbhyhwn ʔlʔ <kl#2#> ʔnš bḥṭhwhy nmwt
24:17	lʔ tṣlʔ dynʔ dʕmwrʔ wdytmʔ wlʔ tsb mšknʔ mrṭwṭh dʔrmltʔ
24:18	wʔtdkr dʕbdʔ hwyt bmṣryn wprqk mryʔ ʔlhk mn tmn mṭl hnʔ mpqd ʔnʔ lk wʔmr ʔnʔ lk dtʕbd ptgmʔ hnʔ
24:19	wmʔ dḥṣd ʔnt ḥṣdʔ dḥqlk wṭʕʔ ʔnt kpʔ lʔ thpwk tsbyh ʔlʔ thwʔ lʕmwrʔ wlytmʔ wlʔrmltʔ <mṭl#2#> dnbrkk mryʔ ʔlhk bkwlh ʕbdʔ dʔydyk
24:20	wmʔ dḥbṭ ʔnt zytyk lʔ tplʔ bstrk ʔlʔ lʕmwrʔ wlytmʔ wlʔrmltʔ nhwʔ
24:21	wmʔ dqṭp ʔnt krmk lʔ tbʕr bstrk ʔlʔ lʕmwrʔ wlytmʔ wlʔrmltʔ nhwʔ
24:22	wʔtdkr dʕbdʔ hwyt bmṣryn mṭl hnʔ mpqd ʔnʔ lk dtʕbd ptgmʔ hnʔ
25:01	wʔn nhwʔ dynʔ byt gbrʔ lḥbrh nqrbwn lwt dynʔ wndwnwn ʔnwn wnzkwn lzkyʔ wnḥybwn lḥybʔ
25:02	wʔn ḥyb mrdwtʔ ḥybʔ nrmywhy dynʔ wnngdwnh qdmwhy ʔyk zdqʔ dsklwth
25:03	bmnynʔ ʔrbʕyn nngdwnh wlʔ nwspwn dlʔ kd nwspwn nngdwnh ytyr ʕl/mn#2#/ hnʔ ngdʔ ntqlʔ ʔḥwk lʕnyk
25:04	lʔ tblwm twrʔ bdrktʔ
25:05	wkd/wlʔ#2#/ ntbwn ʔḥʔ ʔyk ḥdʔ wnmwt ḥd mnhwn wlyt lh brʔ lʔ thwʔ ʔntth dmytʔ lgbrʔ nwkryʔ ʔlʔ ybmh nsbyh wthwʔ lh ʔnttʔ wnybmyh
25:06	wbwkrʔ dyldʔ nštmʔ ʕl šmʔ dʔḥwhy mytʔ dlʔ ntṭʕʔ šmh mn ʔysryl
25:07	wʔn lʔ ṣbʔ gbrʔ dnsb ʔntt ʔḥwhy tsq ʔntt ʔḥwhy ltrʕʔ lwt sbʔ wtʔmr lʔ ṣbʔ ybmy dnqym lʔḥwhy šmʔ bʔysryl wlʔ ṣbʔ lmsbny
25:08	nqrwnh sbʔ dqryth wnmllwn ʕmh wʔn nqwm wnʔmr dlʔ nsb ʔnʔ lh
25:09	tqrwb ʔybmth lwth qdm sbʔ wtšrʔ msnh mn rglh wtrwq bʔpwhy wtʔmr hknʔ ntʕbd lgbrʔ dlʔ nbnʔ bytʔ lʔḥwhy
25:10	wntqrʔ šmh bʔysryl/byt ʔysrʔyl#3#/ byt šrʔ msnʔ
25:11	wkd nṣwn gbrʔ wʔḥwhy ḥd ʕm ḥd wtqrwb ʔntt ḥd mnhwn lmpṣyw bʕlh mn ʔydy mn dmtktš ʕmh wtwšṭ ʔydh wtʔḥwd bḥnh
25:12	pswq ʔydh wlʔ tḥws ʕynk ʕlyh
25:13	lʔ nhwʔ lk bmrswpk mtqlʔ wmtqlʔ rbʔ wzʕwrʔ
25:14	lʔ thwʔ lk bbytk kyltʔ wkyltʔ rbtʔ wzʕwrtʔ
25:15	mtqlʔ šlmʔ dzdyqwtʔ nhwʔ lk wkyltʔ tryṣtʔ dzdyqwtʔ thwʔ lk dnsgwn ywmyk bʔrʕʔ dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk
25:16	mṭl dṭmʔ hw qdm mryʔ ʔlhk kl mn dʕbd hlyn wkl mn dʕbd ʕwlʔ
25:17	ʔtdkr kwl mdm dʕbd lk ʕmlyq bʔwrḥʔ kd npqtwn mn mṣryn
25:18	dʔrʕkwn bḥrbʔ wqṭl bkwn kl dpš btrkwn wʔnt mṭrp <ʔnt#3#> wlʔʔ wlʔ dḥl mn qdm mryʔ ʔlhk
25:19	wmʔ dʔnyḥ lk mryʔ ʔlhk mn klhwn bʕldbbyk dbḥdryk bʔrʕʔ dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk ywrtnʔ ʕṭy dwkrnh dʕmlyq mn tḥyt šmyʔ wlʔ tṭʕʔ
26:01	wmʔ dʕlt lʔrʕʔ dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk ywrtnʔ wyrtth wytbt bh
26:02	sb mn ryš kwlhwn pʔrʔ dʔrʕʔ dmʕl ʔnt mn ʔrʕʔ dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk <ywrtnʔ#3#> wsym bmsntʔ wqwm zl lʔtrʔ dgbʔ mryʔ ʔlhk dnšrʔ šmh tmn
26:03	wtʔ lwt khnʔ dnhwʔ bywmtʔ hnwn wʔmr lh ḥwyt ywmnʔ lmryʔ ʔlhk dʔtyt lʔrʕʔ dymʔ mryʔ lʔbhyn lmtl ln
26:04	wnsb khnʔ msntʔ mn ʔydk wnsymyh qdm mryʔ ʔlhk
26:05	wʕny wʔmr qdm mryʔ ʔlhk lʔrm ʔtdbr ʔby wnḥt lmṣryn wʕmr tmn zbnʔ zʕwrʔ whwʔ tmn lʕmʔ rbʔ/sgyʔʔ#2#/ <wsgyʔʔ#3#> wʕšynʔ
26:06	wʔbʔšw ln mṣryʔ wmkkwn wsmw ʕlyn pwlḥnʔ qšyʔ
26:07	wgʕyn lwt mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbhyn wšmʕ mryʔ qln wḥzʔ mwkkn wʕmln wʔwlṣnyn
26:08	wʔpqn mryʔ mn mṣryn bʔydʔ ʕšyntʔ/tqyptʔ#3#/ wbdrʕʔ rmʔ wbḥzwʔ rbʔ wbʔtwtʔ wbtdmrtʔ
26:09	wʔtyn lʔtrʔ hnʔ wyhb ln mryʔ ʔrʕʔ hdʔ ʔrʕʔ dmrdyʔ ḥlbʔ wdbšʔ
26:10	whšʔ hʔ ʔytyt ršytʔ dpʔrʔ/mn pʔrʔ#2#/ dʔrʕʔ dyhb ly mryʔ wsymyh qdm mryʔ ʔlhk wsgwd tmn qdm mryʔ ʔlhk
26:11	wḥdy bkwl ṭbtʔ dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk wlbytk ʔnt wlwyʔ wʕmwrʔ dbgwk
26:12	wmʔ dšlmt lmʕsrw klh mʕsrʔ dʕlltk bšntʔ dtlt dhy hy šnt mʕsrʔ hb llwyʔ wlʕmwrʔ wlytmʔ wlʔrmltʔ wnʔklwn bqwryk wnsbʕwn
26:13	wʔmr qdm mryʔ ʔlhk bṣyt qwdšʔ mn bytʔ wyhbt llwyʔ wlʕmwrʔ wlytmʔ wlʔrmltʔ ʔyk klhwn pwqdnʔ dpqdtny lʔ ʕbrt mn pwqdnyk wlʔ ṭʕyt
26:14	wlʔ ʔklt bʔbly mnh wlʔ bṣyth kd ṭmʔ ʔnʔ wlʔ smt mnh lmytʔ ʔlʔ šmʕt bqlh dmryʔ ʔlhy wʕbdt ʔyk/ʔyknʔ#3#/ dpqdtny
26:15	ḥzy mn mʕmrʔ dqwdšk mn šmyʔ wbrk lʕmk ʔysryl wlʔrʕʔ dyhbt ln ʔyk dymyt lʔbhyn ʔrʕʔ dmrdyʔ ḥlbʔ wdbšʔ
26:16	ywmnʔ mryʔ ʔlhk mpqd lk dtʕbd nmwsʔ hlyn wdynʔ ṭr wʕbd ʔnwn mn kwlh lbk wmn klh npšk
26:17	lmryʔ ʔmrt ywmnʔ dnhwʔ lk ʔlhʔ wthlk bʔwrḥth wtṭr nmwswhy wdynwhy wpwqdnwhy wtšmʕ bqlh
26:18	wmryʔ ʔmr lk ywmnʔ dthwʔ lh ʕmʔ ḥbybʔ ʔyk dʔmr lk wtṭr <wtʕbd#3#> klhwn pwqdnwhy
26:19	wnʕbdk lʕl mn klhwn ʕmmʔ dʕbd ltšbwḥtʔ wlšmʔ wlʔyqrʔ wthwʔ ʕmʔ qdyšʔ lmryʔ ʔlhk ʔyk/ʔyknʔ#3#/ dʔmr lk
27:01	wpqd mwšʔ wsbʔ dʔysryl lʕmʔ wʔmr lhwn ṭrw klhwn pwqdnʔ dmpqd ʔnʔ lkwn ywmnʔ
27:02	bywmʔ dʕbryn ʔntwn ywrdnn lʔrʕʔ dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk ʔqym lk kʔpʔ rwrbtʔ wʔklš ʔnyn bklšʔ
27:03	wktwb ʕlyhyn kwlhwn ptgmʔ dnmwsʔ hnʔ mʔ dʕbrt <ywrdnn#3#> dtʕwl lʔrʕʔ dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk ʔrʕʔ dmrdyʔ ḥlbʔ wdbšʔ ʔyk/ʔyknʔ#3#/ dʔmr lk mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbhyk
27:04	wmʔ dʕbrtwn ywrdnn ʔqym kʔpʔ hlyn dmpqd ʔnʔ lkwn ywmnʔ bṭwrʔ dgbl wʔklš ʔnyn bklšʔ
27:05	wbny tmn mdbḥʔ lmryʔ ʔlhk mdbḥʔ dkʔpʔ wlʔ trmʔ ʕlyhyn przlʔ
27:06	ʔlʔ bkʔpʔ šlmlmtʔ bny mdbḥh dmryʔ ʔlhk wʔsq ʕlwhy yqdʔ šlmʔ \qdm mryʔ /lmryʔ#2#/ ʔlhk
27:07	wdbḥ šlmʔ wʔkwl tmn wḥdy qdm mryʔ ʔlhk
27:08	wktwb ʕl kʔpʔ <hlyn#3#> klhwn ptgmʔ dnmwsʔ hnʔ wprš ʔnwn ṭb
27:09	wʔmr mwšʔ wkhnʔ wlwyʔ lklh/lklhwn bny#3#/ ʔysryl ṣwt wšmʕ ʔysryl ywmnʔ hwʔ ʔnt ʕmʔ lmryʔ ʔlhk
27:10	šmʕ bqlh dmryʔ ʔlhk <wṭr#2#> wʕbd/wṭrw#3#/ pwqdnwhy wnmwswhy dmpqd ʔnʔ lk ywmnʔ
27:11	wpqd mwšʔ lʕmʔ bywmʔ hw wʔmr lhwn
27:12	hlyn nqwmwn ʕl ṭwrʔ dgrzym lmbrkwth lʕmʔ mʔ dʕbrtwn ywrdnn šmʕwn wlwy wyhwdʔ wʔyskr wywsp wbnymyn
27:13	whlyn nqwmwn lmlṭ bṭwrʔ dgbl rwbyl wgd wʔšyr wzbwlwn wdn wnptly
27:14	wnʕnwn wnʔmrwn lklh ʕmʔ dʔysryl bqlʔ rmʔ
27:15	lyṭ hw gbrʔ dnʕbd glypʔ wnsykʔ dṭmʔyn ʔnwn qdm mryʔ ʕbd ʔydyʔ dngrʔ/dʔnšʔ#2#/ wnsym bstrʔ wnʕnwn klh ʕmʔ wnʔmrwn ʔmyn
27:16	lyṭ hw mn dnṣḥʔ lʔbwhy wlʔmh wnʔmr klh ʕmʔ ʔmyn
27:17	lyṭ hw mn dnšnʔ tḥwmʔ dḥbrh wnʔmr klh ʕmʔ ʔmyn
27:18	lyṭ hw mn dnṭʕʔ ʕwyrʔ bʔwrḥʔ wnʔmr klh ʕmʔ ʔmyn
27:19	lyṭ hw kwl/mn#3#/ dnṣlʔ dynʔ dʕmwrʔ wdytmʔ wdʔrmltʔ wnʔmr kwlh ʕmʔ ʔmyn
27:20	lyṭ hw kl <mn#2#> dndmk ʕm ʔntt ʔbwhy wnglʔ knpʔ dʔbwhy wnʔmr klh ʕmʔ ʔmyn
27:21	lyṭ hw kl dndmk ʕm kl bʕyrʔ wnʔmr klh ʕmʔ ʔmyn
27:22	lyṭ hw kl dndmk ʕm ḥth brt ʔbwhy ʔw brt ʔmh wnʔmr klh ʕmʔ ʔmyn
27:23	lyṭ hw kl dndmk ʕm ḥmth wnʔmr kwlh ʕmʔ ʔmyn
27:24	lyṭ hw kwl dnmḥʔ lḥbrh bstrʔ wnʔmr klh ʕmʔ ʔmyn
27:25	lyṭ hw kl dnsb šwḥdʔ lmqṭl npšʔ ddmʔ zkyʔ wnʔmr klh ʕmʔ ʔmyn
27:26	lyṭ hw kl dlʔ nqym ʕl ptgmwhy dnmwsʔ hnʔ wnʕbd ʔnwn wnʔmr kwlh ʕmʔ ʔmyn
28:01	wʔn tšmʕ bqlh dmryʔ ʔlhk wtṭr wtʕbd klhwn pwqdnwhy dmpqd ʔnʔ lk ywmnʔ nʕbdk mryʔ ʔlhʔ lʕl mn klhwn ʕmmʔ dʔrʕʔ
28:02	wnʔtyn ʕlyk hlyn kwlhyn bwrktʔ wndrknk kd tšmʕ bqlh dmryʔ ʔlhk
28:03	bryk ʔnt bqrytʔ bryk ʔnt bḥqlʔ
28:04	brykyn pʔrʔ dkrsk wpʔrʔ dʔrʕk wyldʔ dbʕyrk wbqrʔ dtwryk wgzrʔ dʕnk
28:05	bryk slk wʔṣwtk
28:06	bryk ʔnt bmʕlk bryk ʔnt bmpqk
28:07	wnšlm mryʔ lbʕldbbyk dqymyn ʕlyk qdmyk kd tbyryn bʔwrḥʔ ḥdʔ npqwn ʕlyk wbšbʕ ʔwrḥn nʕrqwn mn qdmyk
28:08	npqwd mryʔ bwrktʔ bʔwṣryk wbkl mdm dmwšṭ ʔnt ʔydk wnbrkk bʔrʕʔ dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk
28:09	nqymk lh mryʔ ʕmʔ qdyšʔ ʔyk dymʔ lk ʔn tṭr kwlhwn pwqdnwhy dmryʔ ʔlhk wthlk bʔwrḥth
28:10	wnḥzwn klhwn ʕmmʔ dʔrʕʔ dšmh dmryʔ ʔtqry ʕlyk wndḥlwn mnk
28:11	wnwtrk mryʔ lṭbtʔ bpʔrʔ dkrsk wbyldʔ dbʕyrk wbpʔrʔ dʔrʕk bʔrʕʔ dymʔ mryʔ lʔbhyk lmtl lk
28:12	nptḥ lk mryʔ ʔwṣrh ṭbʔ šmyʔ wntl mṭrʔ dʔrʕk bzbnh wnbrk klhwn ʕbdʔ dʔydyk twzp lʕmmʔ sgyʔʔ wʔnt lʔ tʔzp wtštlṭ bʕmmʔ sgyʔʔ wbk lʔ nštlṭwn
28:13	nʕbdk mryʔ ryšʔ wlʔ dnwbtʔ/dwnbtʔ#3#/ wthwʔ lʕl wlʔ thwʔ ltḥt kd tšmʕ pwqdnwhy dmryʔ ʔlhk dmpqd ʔnʔ lk ywmnʔ wtṭr wtʕbd ʔnwn
28:14	wlʔ tsṭʔ mn klhwn pwqdnʔ dmpqd ʔnʔ lk ywmnʔ lʔ lymynʔ wlʔ lsmlʔ wlʔ tʔzl btr ʔlhʔ dʕmmʔ wtplwḥ/wlʔ tplwḥ#3#/ ʔnwn
28:15	wʔn lʔ tšmʕ bqlh dmryʔ ʔlhk wlʔ tṭr wlʔ tʕbd kwlhwn pwqdnwhy wnmwswhy dmpqd ʔnʔ lk ywmnʔ nʔtyn ʕlyk hlyn kwlhyn lwṭtʔ wndrknk
28:16	lyṭ ʔnt bqrytʔ lyṭ ʔnt bḥqlʔ
28:17	lyṭ slk wʔṣwtk
28:18	lyṭyn pʔrʔ dkrsk wpʔrʔ dʔrʕk wbqrʔ dtwryk wgzrʔ dʕnk
28:19	lyṭ ʔnt bmʕlk lyṭ ʔnt bmpqk
28:20	nšdr ʕlyk/ʕmk#3#/ mryʔ ḥwsrnʔ wdlwḥyʔ wkʔtʔ bkl mdm dmwšṭ ʔnt ʔydk dtʕbd ʕdmʔ dnwbdk wʕdmʔ dnsypk bʕgl mṭl byšwtʔ dʕbdyk dšbqtny
28:21	nšdr ʕlyk mryʔ mwtnʔ ʕdmʔ dnwbdk mn ʔrʕʔ dʕʔl ʔnt <lh#3#> ltmn lmʔrth
28:22	nmḥyk mryʔ btmhʔ wbqlpytʔ wbyqdnʔ \wbšlhbytʔ wbyrqnʔ wbḥrbʔ /wbḥrbʔ wbšlhbytʔ wbyqdnʔ#2#/ wbrwḥʔ dšwbʔ wnrdpwnk ʕdmʔ dnwbdwnk
28:23	wnhwwn šmyʔ dlʕl mn ryšk nḥšʔ wʔrʕʔ dtḥwtyk przlʔ
28:24	ntl mryʔ mṭrʔ dʔrʕk ʔbqʔ wʕprʔ mn šmyʔ nḥt ʕlyk ʕdmʔ dnwbdk
28:25	ntbrk mryʔ qdm bʕldbbyk bʔwrḥʔ ḥdʔ tpwq ʕlyhwn wbšbʕ ʔwrḥn tʕrwq mn qdmyhwn wthwʔ lzwʕtʔ lklhyn mlkwtʔ dʔrʕʔ
28:26	wthwʔ šldk mʔkwltʔ lprḥtʔ dšmyʔ wlḥywtʔ dʔrʕʔ wlyt dmkš
28:27	nmḥyk mryʔ bšwḥnʔ dmṣryʔ wbṭḥwrʔ wbgrbʔ wbnḥbʔ dlʔ tškḥ lmtʔsyw
28:28	nmḥyk mryʔ bkmhwtʔ wbʕwrʔ wbtmhʔ dlbʔ
28:29	whwyt mʔš bṭhrʔ ʔyk/ʔyknʔ#2#/ dmʔš ʕwyrʔ bḥšwkʔ wlʔ tsq ʔwrḥk lryš whwyt dbyr bqṭyrʔ <wʔlyṣ#2#> wṭlym klhwn ywmtk wlʔ nhwʔ mn dprq lk
28:30	ʔnttʔ tmkwr wgbrʔ ʔḥrnʔ nsbyh bytʔ tbnʔ wlʔ ttb bh krmʔ tṣwb wlʔ tʕṣwr mnh/ḥmrh#3#/
28:31	twrk ntnks qdmyk wlʔ tʔkwl mnh wḥmrk ntdbr mnk bqṭyrʔ wlʔ ntpnʔ lk ʕnk tštlm lbʕldbbyk wlyt dmpṣʔ
28:32	bnyk wbntk nštlmwn lʕmʔ ʔḥrnʔ wʕynyk nḥzyn wtdwʔ ʕlyhwn klh ywmʔ wlʔ tspq bʔydyk
28:33	pʔrʔ dʔrʕk wklh lʔwtk nʔkwl ʕmʔ dlʔ ydʕ ʔnt lh whwyt ṭlym wʔlyṣ klhwn ywmtk
28:34	whwyt kmh mn ḥzwʔ dʕynyk dḥzʔ ʔnt
28:35	nmḥyk mryʔ bšwḥnʔ byšʔ ʕl bwrkyk wʕl šqyk dlʔ tškḥ lmtʔsyw mn pstʔ drglk wʕdmʔ lmwḥk
28:36	ndbrk mryʔ lk wlmlkk dʔqymt ʕlyk lwt ʕmʔ dlʔ ydʕt ʔnt wʔbhyk wtplwḥ tmn lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ dqysʔ wdkʔpʔ
28:37	wthwʔ ltmhʔ wlmtlʔ wlrnyʔ bkwlhwn ʕmmʔ dnbdrk mryʔ <ʔlhk#2#> ltmn
28:38	zrʕʔ sgy tpq ḥqlk wqlyl tḥmwl mṭl dnʔklywhy qmṣʔ
28:39	krmʔ tṣwb wtplwḥ wḥmrʔ lʔ tštʔ wlʔ tḥmwl mṭl dʔklʔ lh twlʕʔ
28:40	zytʔ nhwwn lk bklh tḥwmk wmšḥʔ lʔ tmšwḥ mṭwl dntrwn zytyk
28:41	bnyʔ wbntʔ twld wlʔ nhwwn dylk mṭl dbšbyʔ nʔzlwn
28:42	klhwn ʔylnyk wpʔrʔ dʔrʕk nʔkwl ʔnwn ṣrṣwrʔ
28:43	wʕmwrʔ dbgwk nttrym ʕlyk lʕl wʔnt tḥwt ltḥt
28:44	hw nwzpk wʔnt lʔ twzpywhy hw nhwʔ ryšʔ wʔnt thwʔ dnwbtʔ/dwnbtʔ#3#/
28:45	wnʔtyn ʕlyk hlyn kwlhyn lwṭtʔ wndrknk wnrdpnk ʕdmʔ dnwbdnk mṭl dlʔ šmʕt bqlh dmryʔ ʔlhk wlʔ nṭrt pwqdnwhy wnmwswhy dpqdk
28:46	wnhwyn bk ʔtwtʔ wtdmrtʔ wbzrʕk lʕlm
28:47	ʕl dlʔ plḥt lmryʔ ʔlhk bḥdwtʔ wbṭbwt lbʔ mn swgʔʔ dkl mdm
28:48	wtplwḥ lbʕldbbyk dnšdr ʔnwn mryʔ ʕlyk bkpnʔ wbṣhyʔ wbʕrṭlywtʔ wbḥwsrnʔ dkl mdm wntl nyrʔ dprzlʔ ʕl ṣwrk ʕdmʔ dnwbdk
28:49	nytʔ ʕlyk mryʔ ʕmʔ mn rwḥqʔ mn swpyh dʔrʕʔ ʔyk dṭʔs nšrʔ ʕmʔ dlʔ šmʕ ʔnt lšnh
28:50	ʕmʔ dḥṣypn ʔpwhy dlʔ bht mn ʔpy sbʔ wʕl ṭlyʔ lʔ mrḥm
28:51	wnʔkwl yldʔ dbʕyrk wpʔrʔ dʔrʕk ʕdmʔ dnwbdk wlʔ nšbwq lk lʔ ʕbwrʔ wlʔ ḥmrʔ wlʔ mšḥʔ wlʔ bqrʔ dtwrʔ wlʔ gzrʔ dʕnʔ ʕdmʔ dnwbdk
28:52	wnʔlṣk bkwlhyn qwryk ʕdmʔ dnkbwš šwryk rmʔ wʕšynʔ dtkyl ʔnt ʕlyhwn bklh ʔrʕk wnʔlṣk bkwlhyn qwryk bklh ʔrʕʔ dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk
28:53	wtʔkwl pʔrʔ dkrsk bsrʔ dbnyk wdbntk dyhb lk mryʔ ʔlhk tʔkwl ʔnwn bʔwlṣnʔ wbʕqtʔ dnʕyq lk bʕldbbk
28:54	gbrʔ dmʕdn bk wmpnq bk tḥwr ʕynh bʔḥwhy wbʔntt qymh wbšrkʔ dbnwhy dmštḥryn
28:55	wlʔ ntl lḥd mnhwn mn bsrʔ dbnwhy dʔkl mṭl dlʔ nštbq lh mdm bʔwlṣnʔ wbʕqtʔ dnʕyq lk bʕldbbk bkwlhyn qwryk
28:56	ʔydʔ dmʕdnʔ bk wmpnqʔ <bk#3#> dlʔ nsyt pstʔ drglh lmqm ʕl ʔrʕʔ mn ʕwdnh wmn pwnqh tḥwr ʕynh bbʕlh wbbrh wbbrth
28:57	bšlyth dnpqʔ mn byt rglyh wbbrh dtʔld kd tʔkwl ʔnwn mʔ dḥsr lh kl bʔwlṣnʔ wbʕqtʔ dnʕyq lk bʕldbbk bklhyn qwryk
28:58	ʔlʔ tṭr wtʕbd kwlhwn ptgmʔ dnmwsʔ hnʔ dktybyn bktbʔ hnʔ wtdḥl mn šmʔ hnʔ mšbḥʔ wdḥylʔ dmryʔ ʔlhk
28:59	wnprwš mryʔ mḥwtk wmḥwtʔ dzrʕk mḥwtʔ drwrbn wmhymnn wkʔbʔ dbyšyn wmhymnyn
28:60	wnytʔ ʕlyk <mryʔ#2#> kwlhyn/hlyn#3#/ mḥwtʔ dmṣryʔ ddḥl ʔnt mn qdmyhyn wndbqn bk
28:61	wkwl kwrhn wkl mḥwn dlʔ ktybn bktbʔ hnʔ dnmwsʔ nytʔ ʔnyn mryʔ ʕlyk ʕdmʔ dnwbdk
28:62	wtštḥrwn qlyl bmnynʔ dsgytwn hwytwn <ṭb#3#> ʔyk kwkbʔ dbšmyʔ ʕl/mṭl#3#/ dlʔ šmʕt bqlh dmryʔ ʔlhk
28:63	wʔyk/wʔyknʔ#3#/ dḥdy mryʔ ʕlykwn dnṭʔb lkwn wnsgykwn hknʔ nḥdʔ mryʔ ʕlykwn \kd nwbdkwn /dnwbdkwn#3#/ wngmrkwn wtštqlwn mn ʔrʕʔ dʕʔl ʔnt ltmn lmʔrth
28:64	wnbdrk mryʔ bklhwn ʕmmʔ mn swpyh dʔrʕʔ wʕdmʔ lswpyh dʔrʕʔ wtplwḥ tmn lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ dqysʔ wdkʔpʔ dlʔ ydʕt ʔnt/ʔnwn#2#/ wʔbhyk
28:65	wbʕmmʔ/wʔp bʕmmʔ#2#/ hnwn/hlyn#3#/ lʔ tšlʔ wlʔ nhwʔ nyḥʔ lpst rglk ʔlʔ ntl lk mryʔ tmn lbʔ zyʕʔ wḥškʔ dʕynʔ wdwybʔ dnpšʔ/dlbʔ#3#/
28:66	wnhwwn ḥyyk tlyn mn qbwl wthwʔ dḥl bʔymmʔ wbllyʔ wlʔ thymn bḥyyk
28:67	bṣprʔ tʔmr ʔmty dyn hwʔ rmšʔ wbrmšʔ tʔmr ʔmty dyn hwʔ ṣprʔ mn dḥltʔ dlbk ddḥl ʔnt wmn ḥzwʔ dʕynyk dḥzʔ ʔnt
28:68	wnhpkk mryʔ lmṣryn bʔlpʔ bʔwrḥʔ dʔmr lk <mryʔ#2#> dlʔ twsp twb lmḥzyh wtzdbnwn tmn lbʕldbbykwn lʕbdʔ wlʔmhtʔ wlyt dzbn
28:69	hlyn ptgmʔ dqymʔ dpqd mryʔ lmwšʔ lmqmw ʕm bny ʔysryl bʔrʕʔ dmwʔb sṭr mn qymʔ dʔqym ʕmhwn bḥwryb
29:01	wqrʔ mwšʔ lklh ʔysryl wʔmr lhwn ʔntwn ḥzytwn klmdm dʕbd mryʔ lʕnykwn bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn lprʕwn wlklhwn ʕbdwhy wlklh ʕmh/ḥylh#2#/ wlklh ʔrʕh
29:02	nsywnʔ rwrbʔ dḥzy ʕynykwn ʔtwtʔ wtdmrtʔ <rwrbtʔ#3#> hlyn dḥzytwn
29:03	wlʔ yhb lkwn mryʔ lbʔ lmdʕ wʕynʔ lmḥzʔ wʔdnʔ lmšmʕ ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
29:04	wdbrtkwn ʔrbʕyn šnyn bmdbrʔ lʔ blyw nḥtykwn mnkwn wmsnykwn lʔ blyw mn rglykwn
29:05	wlḥmʔ lʔ ʔkltwn wḥmrʔ wškrʔ lʔ ʔštytwn mṭl dtdʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn
29:06	wʔytytkwn lʔtrʔ hnʔ wnpq syḥwn mlkʔ dḥšbwn wʕwg mlkʔ dmtnyn lʔwrʕn lqrbʔ/lmdbrʔ#3#/ wḥrbn ʔnwn
29:07	wnsbn ʔrʕhwn wyhbnh ywrtnʔ lrwbyl wlgd wlplgh dšbṭʔ dmnšʔ
29:08	ṭrw pwqdnwhy/ptgmwhy#3#/ dnmwsʔ hnʔ wʕbdw ʔnwn dhwytwn msqyn lryš kl mdm dʕbdyn ʔntwn
29:09	ʔntwn qymyn ʔntwn ywmnʔ qdm mryʔ ʔlhkwn klkwn ryšy šbṭykwn wsbykwn wsprykwn klhwn gbrʔ dʔysryl
29:10	wyqrtkwn wnšykwn wʕmwrʔ dbgw mšrytk mn lqṭ qysyk wʕdmʔ lmlʔ myk
29:11	dlʔ tʕbrwn ʕl qymh dmryʔ ʔlhkwn wʕl mwmth dmryʔ ʔlhkwn dʔqym ʕmkwn ywmnʔ
29:12	mṭl dnqymk lh \ywmnʔ ʕmʔ /ʕmʔ ywmnʔ #3#/ whw nhwʔ lk ʔlhʔ ʔyk dʔmr lk wʔyk dymʔ lʔbhyk lʔbrhm wlʔysḥq wlyʕqwb
29:13	lʔ hwʔ ʕmkwn blḥwdykwn mqym ʔnʔ qymʔ hnʔ ʔw mwmtʔ hdʔ
29:14	ʔlʔ ʕm kl mn \dhrkʔ hw /dʔytwhy hrkʔ#3#/ wʕmn qʔm ywmnʔ qdm mryʔ ʔlhn wʕm kl mn dlʔ hwʔ/ʔytwhy#3#/ ʕmn hrkʔ ywmnʔ
29:15	mṭl dʔntwn ydʕyn ʔntwn dʕmrn bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wʕbrn byt ʕmmʔ dʕbrtwn
29:16	wḥzytwn ṭnpwthwn wdḥlthwn dqysʔ wdkʔpʔ \wdsʔmʔ wddhbʔ /wddhbʔ wdsʔmʔ#2#/ dqrymyn
29:17	dlmʔ ʔyt bkwn gbrʔ ʔw ʔnttʔ ʔw šrbtʔ ʔw šbṭʔ dsṭʔ lbh ywmnʔ mn mryʔ ʔlhn lmʔzl lmplḥ lʔlhʔ dʕmmʔ hnwn dlmʔ ʔyt bkwn ʕqrʔ dmwʕʔ mʔrtʔ wgddʔ
29:18	wmʔ dšmʕ ptgmʔ dmwmtʔ hdʔ ntḥšb blbh wnʔmr šlmʔ nhwʔ ly dbṣbyn lby ʔzl ʔnʔ dnwsp rwywtʔ ʕl ṣhywtʔ
29:19	lʔ nṣṭbʔ mryʔ lmšbq lh ʔlʔ hydyn nʕšn rwgzh dmryʔ wṭnnh bgbrʔ hw wtʔtʔ ʕlwhy klh lwṭtʔ dktybʔ bktbʔ hnʔ wnʕṭʔ mryʔ šmh mn tḥyt šmyʔ
29:20	wnpršywhy mryʔ lbyštʔ mn klhwn šbṭʔ dʔysryl ʔyk klhyn lwṭtʔ dqymʔ dktybn bktbʔ dnmwsʔ hnʔ
29:21	wnʔmr drʔ ʔḥrnʔ bnykwn dnqwmwn btrkwn wnwkryʔ dnʔtwn mn ʔrʕʔ rḥyqtʔ wnḥzwn mḥwth dʔrʕʔ hy wkwrhnyh dʔyty mryʔ ʕlyh
29:22	kbrytʔ wmlḥʔ yqydtʔ/yqyrtʔ#2#/ klh ʔrʕʔ lʔ tzdrʕ wlʔ twʕʔ wlʔ nsq bh kl ʕsb ʔlʔ thwʔ ʔyk sdwm wʔyk ʕmwrʔ wʔyk ʔdmʔ wʔyk ṣbwʔym dhpk ʔnyn mryʔ brwgzh wbḥmth
29:23	wnʔmrwn klhwn ʕmmʔ ʕl mnʔ ʕbd mryʔ hknʔ lʔrʕʔ hdʔ wʕl mnʔ ʔtḥmt rwgzh hnʔ rbʔ
29:24	wnʔmrwn ʕl dšbqw qymh dmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbhyhwn dʔqym ʕmhwn kd ʔpq ʔnwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
29:25	wʔzlw wplḥw lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ wsgdw lhwn ʔlhʔ dlʔ ydʕw ʔnwn wlʔ ʔtplgw lhwn
29:26	wʔtḥmt rwgzh dmryʔ <rbʔ#3#> ʕl ʔrʕʔ hy dnytʔ ʕlyh klhyn lwṭtʔ dktybn bktbʔ hnʔ
29:27	wnʕqwr ʔnwn mryʔ mn ʔrʕhwn/ʔtrhwn#3#/ \brwgzʔ wbḥmtʔ /bḥmtʔ#3#/ wbrwgzʔ rbʔ wnšdʔ/ʕdmʔ dšdʔ#3#/ ʔnwn lʔrʕʔ ʔḥrtʔ ʔyk dywmnʔ
29:28	styrtʔ dmryʔ ʔnyn ʔlhn wglytʔ dyln wdbnyn lʕlm dnṭr wnʕbd <ʔyk#2#> klhwn ptgmwhy dnmwsʔ hnʔ
30:01	wnhwʔ dkd nʔtwn ʕlyk hlyn klhwn ptgmʔ bwrktʔ wlwṭtʔ dyhbt qdmyk wttḥšb blbk bklhwn ʕmmʔ dnbdrk mryʔ ʔlhk ltmn
30:02	wttpnʔ lwt mryʔ ʔlhk wtšmʕ bqlh ʔyk kl mdm dmpqd ʔnʔ lk ywmnʔ ʔnt wbnyk mn klh lbk wmn klh npšk
30:03	nhpk mryʔ ʔlhk šbytk wnrḥm ʕlyk wntwb/wnhpk#3#/ wnknšk mn klhwn ʕmmʔ dbdrk bhwn mryʔ ʔlhk
30:04	wʔn nhwwn mbdryk ʔysryl rḥyqyn bswpy šmyʔ mn tmn nknšk mryʔ ʔlhk wmn tmn nqrbk
30:05	wnytyk mryʔ ʔlhk lʔrʕʔ dyrtw ʔbhyk wtʔrtyh wnṭʔb lk wnsgyk ṭb mn ʔbhyk
30:06	wngzwr mryʔ ʔlhk lbk wlbʔ dzrʕk lʕlm wtrḥm lmryʔ ʔlhk mn klh lbk wmn klh npšk mṭl dnḥyk/dḥyḥk#3#/
30:07	wntl mryʔ ʔlhk klhyn hlyn lwṭtʔ ʕl bʕldbbyk wʕl snʔyk drdpwk
30:08	wʔnt ttpnʔ wtšmʕ bqlh dmryʔ ʔlhk wtʕbd klhwn pwqdnwhy dmpqd ʔnʔ lk ywmnʔ
30:09	wnwtrk/wnwrtk#2#/ mryʔ ʔlhk bklh ʕbdʔ dʔydyk bpʔrʔ dkrsk wbyldʔ dbʕyrk wbpʔrʔ dʔrʕk lṭbtʔ \mṭl dntpnʔ /hknʔ ntpnʔ#3#/ mryʔ lmḥdʔ ʕlyk lṭbtʔ ʔyk dḥdy ʕl ʔbhykwn
30:10	kd/ʔn#3#/ tšmʕ bqlh dmryʔ ʔlhk wtṭr pwqdnwhy wnmwswhy dktybyn bktbʔ hnʔ wttpnʔ lwt mryʔ ʔlhk bklh/mn klh#3#/ lbk wbklh/wmn klh#3#/ npšk
30:11	mṭl dpwqdnʔ hnʔ dmpqd ʔnʔ lk ywmnʔ lʔ hwʔ ksʔ mnk \ʔp lʔ /wlʔ#3#/ hwʔ rḥyq
30:12	lʔ hwʔ bšmyʔ hw dtʔmr mnw nsq ln lšmyʔ wnsbywhy ln wnšmʕ wnʕbdywhy
30:13	wlʔ hwʔ bʕbrʔ dymʔ/dywrdnn#3#/ dtʔmr mn nʕbr ln lʕbrʔ dymʔ wnsbywhy ln wnšmʕ wnʕbdywhy
30:14	ʔlʔ qryb hw lk ptgmʔ ṭb bpwmk wblbk lmʕbdh
30:15	ḥzy dyhbt qdmyk ywmnʔ ḥyʔ wmwtʔ wṭbtʔ wbyštʔ
30:16	dmpqd ʔnʔ lk ywmnʔ dtrḥm lmryʔ ʔlhk wthlk bʔwrḥth wtṭr pwqdnwhy wnmwswhy wdynwhy wtḥʔ wtsgʔ ṭb wnbrkk mryʔ ʔlhk bʔrʕʔ dʕʔl ʔnt ltmn/lh#3#/ lmʔrth
30:17	wʔn nsṭʔ lbk wlʔ tšmʕ wtṭʕʔ wtsgwd lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ wtplwḥ ʔnwn
30:18	ḥwytkwn ywmnʔ dmʔbd ʔbdyn ʔntwn wlʔ tsgwn/tgrwn#3#/ ywmtʔ bʔrʕʔ dʕbryn ʔntwn ywrdnn lmʕl ltmn lmʔrth
30:19	shdt bkwn ywmnʔ šmyʔ wʔrʕʔ ḥyʔ wmwtʔ yhbt qdmyk bwrktʔ wlwṭtʔ gby lk ḥyʔ dtḥʔ ʔnt wzrʕk
30:20	kd trḥm lmryʔ ʔlhk wtšmʕ bqlh wttnqp lh mṭl dhwyw ḥyyk wnwgrʔ dywmtk dttb bʔrʕʔ dymʔ mryʔ lʔbhyk lʔbrhm wlʔysḥq wlyʕqwb lmtl lk
31:01	wʔzl mwšʔ wmll \hlyn klhwn ptgmʔ /klhwn ptgmʔ hlyn#3#/ ʕm klh ʔysryl
31:02	wʔmr lhwn br mʔʔ ʔnʔ wʕsryn šnyn ywmnʔ wlʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ twb lmpq wlmʕl wmryʔ ʔmr ly dlʔ tʕbr ywrdnn hnʔ
31:03	mryʔ ʔlhk hw ʕbr qdmyk whw nwbd ʕmmʔ hlyn mn qdmyk wtʔrt ʔnwn yšwʕ hw ʕbr qdmyk ʔyk/ʔyknʔ#3#/ dʔmr mryʔ
31:04	wnʕbd lhwn mryʔ ʔyk dʕbd lsyḥwn wlʕwg mlkʔ dʔmwryʔ wlʔrʕhwn dʔwbd ʔnwn
31:05	wnšlm ʔnwn mryʔ qdmykwn wʕbdw lhwn ʔyk klh pwqdnʔ dpqdtkwn
31:06	ʔtḥylw wʔtʕšnw lʔ tdḥlwn wlʔ tzwʕwn <wlʔ ttrhbwn#3#> mn qdmyhwn mṭl dmryʔ ʔlhk hw ʔzl ʕmk/qdmyk#3#/ lʔ nrpyk wlʔ nšbqk
31:07	wqrʔ mwšʔ lyšwʕ wʔmr lh lʕyn/qdm#3#/ klh ʔysryl ʔtḥyl wʔtʕšn mṭl dʔnt mʕl ʔnt lh lʕmʔ hnʔ lʔrʕʔ dymʔ mryʔ lʔbhyhwn lmtl lhwn wʔnt twrtyh lhwn
31:08	wmryʔ hw ʔzl qdmyk whw nhwʔ ʕmk lʔ nrpyk wlʔ nšbqk lʔ tdḥl wlʔ tzwʕ wlʔ ttrhb
31:09	wktb mwšʔ nmwsʔ hnʔ wyhbh lkhnʔ bny lwy dšqylyn qbwtʔ dqymh dmryʔ wlklhwn sbʔ \dbny ʔysryl /dʔysryl#2#/
31:10	wpqd ʔnwn mwšʔ wʔmr lhwn mn btr šbʕ šnyn bzbnʔ dšntʔ dšwbqnʔ bʕdʕʔdʔ dmṭllʔ
31:11	mʔ dʔtʔ kwlh ʔysrʔyl lmtḥzyw qdm mryʔ ʔlhk bʔtrʔ dgbʔ qry nmwsʔ hnʔ qdm kwlh ʔysryl bʔdnyhwn
31:12	knšyhy lʕmʔ gbrʔ wnšʔ wʔyqrtʔ wʕmwrʔ dbqwryk mṭl dnšmʕwn wnʔlpwn wndḥlwn lmryʔ ʔlhhwn wnṭrwn wnʕbdwn klhwn ptgmwhy dnmwsʔ hnʔ
31:13	wbnyhwn dlʔ ydʕw nšmʕwn wnʔlpwn lmdḥl mn mryʔ ʔlhhwn klhwn ywmtʔ dḥyyn ʔntwn bʔrʕʔ dʕbryn ʔntwn ywrdnn <ltmn#3#> lmʔrth
31:14	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ hʔ qrbw ywmyk lmmt qry lyšwʕ wqwm <qdmy#3#> bmškn zbnʔ wʔpqdywhy wʔzlw mwšʔ wyšwʕ wqmw bmškn zbnʔ
31:15	wʔtgly mryʔ bmškn zbnʔ bʕmwdʔ dʕnnʔ wqm ʕmwdʔ dʕnnʔ btrʕʔ dmšknʔ/dmšknzbnʔ#2#/
31:16	wʔmr mryʔ lmwšʔ hʔ ʔnt škb ʔnt ʕm ʔbhyk wqʔm ʕmʔ hnʔ wṭʕʔ btr ʔlhʔ nwkryʔ dʔrʕʔ dhw ʕʔl ltmn bynthwn wšbq ly wmbṭl qymy dʔqymt ʕmh
31:17	wmtḥmt rwgzy ʕlwhy bywmʔ hw wʔšbwq ʔnwn wʔhpk ʔpy mnhwn wnhwʔ lmʔkwltʔ wtmṭywhy byštʔ sgyʔtʔ wʕqtʔ wnʔmr bywmʔ hw mṭwl dlyt ʔlhy bgwy ʔrʕny hlyn klhyn byštʔ
31:18	wʔnʔ mhpkw ʔhpk ʔpy mnhwn bywmʔ hw mṭl/ʕl#3#/ kwlhyn byštʔ dʕbdw ʕl dsṭw btr ʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ
31:19	mkyl ktwb lhwn tšbwḥtʔ hdʔ wʔlpyh lbny ʔysryl wsymyh bpwmhwn mṭl dthwʔ ly tšbwḥtʔ hdʔ lshdwtʔ bbny ʔysrʔyl
31:20	mṭl dmʕl ʔnʔ lhwn lʔrʕʔ dymyt lʔbhyhwn <ʔrʕʔ#3#> dmrdyʔ ḥlbʔ wdbšʔ wʔklyn wsbʕyn wmtpnqyn wsṭyn btr ʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ wplḥyn lhwn wmrgzyn ly wmbṭlyn qymy
31:21	wmʔ/wlmʔ#2#/ dmṭy ʔnwn byštʔ sgyʔtʔ wʕqtʔ tqrʔ tšbwḥtʔ hdʔ qdmyhwn lshdwtʔ dlʔ ttṭʕʔ mn pwmʔ dzrʕhwn mṭl dydʕ ʔnʔ yṣrhwn wkl dʕbdyn hrkʔ ywmnʔ ʕd lʔ ʔʕl ʔnwn lʔrʕʔ dymyt lʔbhyhwn
31:22	wktb mwšʔ tšbwḥtʔ hdʔ bywmʔ hw wʔlph lbny ʔysryl
31:23	wpqd lyšwʕ brnwn wʔmr lh ʔtḥyl wʔtʕšn mṭl dʔnt mʕl ʔnt lbny ʔysryl lʔrʕʔ dymyt lhwn/lʔbhyhwn#2#/ wʔnʔ ʔhwʔ ʕmk
31:24	wkd šlm mwšʔ lmktb/lmʔmr#2#/ ptgmwhy dnmwsʔ hnʔ ʕl sprʔ ʕdmʔ dšlmw
31:25	pqd mwšʔ llwyʔ dšqylyn qbwtʔ dqymh dmryʔ wʔmr lhwn
31:26	sbw sprʔ/ktbʔ#3#/ hnʔ dnmwsʔ wsymwhy bsṭrʔ dqbwtʔ dqymh dmryʔ ʔlhkwn wnhwʔ lkwn tmn shdʔ
31:27	mṭl dʔnʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ mmrmrnwtkwn wqdlkwn qšyʔ whʔ ʕd ʔnʔ ḥy <ʔnʔ#2#> ʕmkwn ywmnʔ mrmrtwn lmryʔ wʔp mn btr dmʔt ʔnʔ
31:28	ʔtknšw lwty \klkwn ryšʔ /klhwn sbʔ#3#/ dšbṭykwn wsprykwn \wʔmr lkwn /wʔmll qdmykwn#3#/ hlyn ptgmʔ wʔshd bkwn šmyʔ wʔrʕʔ
31:29	mṭl dydʕ ʔnʔ dmn btr mwty mḥblw mḥblyn ʔntwn wsṭyn ʔntwn mn ʔwrḥʔ dpqdtkwn wʔrʕʔ lkwn byštʔ bḥrtʔ dywmtʔ mʔ dʕbdtwn byšʔ qdm mryʔ wʔrgztwnyhy \bʕbdʔ dʔydykwn /bʕbd ʔydykwn#2#/

01:17	wʔyknʔ dšmʕyn hwyn lmwšʔ hknʔ nšmʕk blḥwd mryʔ ʔlhk nhwʔ ʕmk ʔyknʔ dhwʔ ʕm mwšʔ
01:18	wkl ʔnš dntḥrʔ ʕmk wlʔ nšmʕ mltk lkl mdm dpqd ʔnt lh ntqṭl blḥwd ʔtḥyl wʔtʕšn
02:01	wšdr yšwʕ br`nwn mn sṭym tryn gbryn dydʕyn bʔrʕʔ wʔmr lhwn zlw ḥzw/gwšw#3#/ lʔrʕʔ/ʔrʕʔ#3#/ dʔyryḥw wʔzlw wʕlw lwt ʔnttʔ znytʔ dšmh rḥb wbtw tmn
02:02	wʔtʔmr lmlkʔ dʔyryḥw dhʔ gbrʔ ʔtw lhrkʔ bllyʔ mn/dmn#3#/ bny ʔysryl lmgš ʔrʕʔ
02:03	wšdr mlkʔ dʔyryḥw lwt rḥb wʔmr lh ʔpqy <ly#3#> gbrʔ dʕlw lwtky bllyʔ mṭl dlmgš ʔrʕn ʔtw
02:04	wdbrt ʔnttʔ ltryhwn gbrʔ wṭšyt ʔnwn wʔmrt šryrʔyt ʔtw lwty gbrʔ wlʔ ydʕt mn ʔymkʔ ʔnwn
02:05	wkd hwʔ zbnʔ dmttḥd trʕʔ brmšʔ npqw lhwn wlʔ ydʕt lʔykʔ ʔzlw pwqw ʕgl btrhwn mṭl dmdrkyn ʔntwn lhwn
02:06	why ʔsqt ʔnwn lʔgrʔ wṭšyt ʔnwn byt krsbnʔ dktnʔ dsymyn hww lh ʕl ʔgrʔ
02:07	wgbrʔ npqw btrhwn bʔwrḥʔ dywrdnn ʕl/dʕl#3#/ mʕbrtʔ wtrʕʔ ʔḥdw mn btr dnpqw rdwpʔ btr hnwn gšwšʔ
02:08	whnwn/whnwn#3#/ ʕdmʔ lhšʔ lʔ škbw hww why slqt lwthwn lʔgrʔ
02:09	wʔmrt lgbrʔ ydʕt dʔšlmh lkwn mryʔ lʔrʕʔ wnplt dḥltkwn ʕlyn wʔp dḥlw kwlhwn/lhwn#3#/ ʕmwryh dʔrʕʔ mn qdmykwn
02:10	mṭl dšmʕn dʔwbš mryʔ myʔ dymʔ dswp mn qdmykwn kd npqtwn mn mṣryn wmdm dʕbdtwn ltryn mlkʔ dʔmwryʔ lsyḥwn wlʕwg dḥrbtwn ʔnwn
02:11	wkd šmʕn zʕ lbn wlʔ ʔštḥrt rwḥʔ/npšʔ#3#/ bʔnš mnn mn qdmykwn mṭwl dmryʔ ʔlhkwn hwyw ʔlhʔ bšmyʔ mn lʕl wbʔrʕʔ mn ltḥt
02:12	mkyl ʔymw ly bmryʔ mṭl dʕbdt bkwn ṭybwtʔ wʕbdw ʔp ʔntwn by wbbyt ʔby ṭybwtʔ whbw ly ʔtʔ dqwštʔ
02:13	dʔḥw ly wlʔby wlʔmy wlʔḥy wlʔḥwty wlkl dʔyt ln wpṣw npštn mn mwtʔ
02:14	wʔmrw lh gbrʔ npštn dyln yhbynn ḥlpykwn lmwtʔ ʔlʔ dyn mḥwyn ʔntwn mltʔ hdʔ wmʔ dyhbh ln mryʔ lʔrʕʔ hdʔ ʕbdynn ʕmky ṭybwtʔ wqwštʔ
02:15	wʔḥtt ʔnwn bḥblʔ mn kwtʔ mṭl dbyth bʔstʔ hwʔ dšwrʔ wʕl šwrʔ ytbʔ hwt
02:16	wʔmrt lhwn bṭwrʔ ṭwrʔ zlw dlmʔ npgʕwn bkwn hnwn dnpqw btrkwn wʔtṭšw tmn tltʔ ywmyn ʕdmʔ dhpkyn whydyn tʔzlwn bʔwrḥkwn
02:17	wʔmrw lh gbrʔ mḥsyn ḥnn mn mwmtʔ hdʔ dʔwmytyn
02:18	hʔ ḥnn ʕʔlynn lʔrʕʔ ḥwṭʔ dyn dzḥwrytʔ qṭwry bkwtʔ dʔḥttyn mnh wlʔbwky wlʔmky wlʔḥyky <wlʔḥwtky#3#> wlklh byt ʔbwky ʔʕly lwtky lgw bytʔ
02:19	wkl mn dnpq mn trʕʔ dbytky lbr dmh bryšh wʔḥnn mpṣynn mn ʕyrth wkl mn dnhwʔ ʕmky \bgw bytʔ /bbytʔ#3#/ dmh bryšn wḥnn ḥybynn ʕyrth ʔn ʔnš nhrywhy
02:20	wʔn tḥwyn mltʔ hdʔ hwyn mḥsyn <ḥnn#3#> mn mwmtʔ <hdʔ#3#> dʔwmytyn
02:21	wʔmrt lhwn ʔyk mltkwn hknʔ nhwʔ wšdrt ʔnwn wʔzlw wqṭrt ḥwṭʔ dzḥwrytʔ bkwtʔ
02:22	wʔzlw lṭwrʔ wʔytbw tmn tltʔ ywmyn ʕdmʔ dhpkw hnwn dʔzlw btrhwn lmʔtʔ wbʕw ʔnwn hnwn dnpqw btrhwn bklh ʔwrḥʔ wkd lʔ ʔškḥw ʔnwn
02:23	hpkw lhwn whnwn tryn gšwšyn nḥtw mn ṭwrʔ wʕbrw wʔzlw lwt yšwʕ br`nwn wʔštʕyw lh klmdm dgdš lhwn
02:24	wʔmrw lh lyšwʕ ʔšlmh mryʔ bʔydyn lklh ʔrʕʔ wʔp dḥlw klhwn ʕmwryh dʔrʕʔ mn qdmyn
03:01	wqdm yšwʕ bṣprʔ wšqlw mn sṭym wʔtw ʕdmʔ lywrdnn klhwn dbyt/bny#3#/ ʔysryl wbtw tmn wlʔ ʕbrw
03:02	wmn btr tltʔ ywmyn ʕbrw šlyṭnʔ bgw mšrytʔ
03:03	wpqdw lʕmʔ wʔmrw lhwn mʔ dḥzytwn lqbwtʔ/qbwtʔ#3#/ ddytyqʔ dmryʔ ʔlhkwn wkhnʔ/wlkhnʔ#3#/ wlwyʔ dšqylyn lh hydyn šqwlw mn ʔtrkwn wzlw btrh
03:04	wnhwʔ rḥyq bynykwn wlqbwtʔ ʔyk tryn ʔlpyn ʔmyn blḥwd bmšwḥtʔ lʔ ttqrbwn lwth mṭl dtdʕwn ʔwrḥʔ dtʔzlwn bh mṭl dlʔ ʕbrtwn bʔwrḥʔ/bʔrʕʔ#3#/ mn ʔtmly wmn mntmly
03:05	wʔmr yšwʕ lʕmʔ ʔtqdšw mṭl dmḥr ʕbd mryʔ tdmwrtʔ byntkwn
03:06	wʔmr yšwʕ lkhnʔ šqwlw/dšqwlw#3#/ qʔbwtʔ ddytqʔ <dmryʔ#3#> wʕbrw qdm ʕmʔ wšqlw qʔbwtʔ ddytyqʔ wʕbrw/wʔzlw#3#/ qdm ʕmʔ
03:07	wʔmr mryʔ lyšwʕ mn ywmnʔ ʔšrʔ lmwrbwtk bʕyny/byny#3#/ klh ʔysryl dndʕwn/wndʕwn#3#/ dʔyknʔ dhwyt ʕm mwšʔ ʔhwʔ ʔp ʕmk
03:08	wʔnt pqd lkhnʔ \dšqylyn qʔbwtʔ /dšqlyn lqbwtʔ#3#/ ddytyqʔ dmryʔ wʔmr lhwn mʔ dmṭytwn lryš/ryš#3#/ myʔ dywrdnn bh bywrdnn qwmw
03:09	wʔmr yšwʕ lbny ʔysryl qrwbw lhrkʔ wšmʕw mlwhy dmryʔ ʔlhkwn
03:10	wʔmr yšwʕ bhdʔ hwytwn ydʕyn \dʔlhʔ ḥyʔ /dmryʔ ʔlhʔ#3#/ bkwn wḥrb mn qdmykwn lḥtyʔ wlknʕnyʔ wlḥwyʔ wlprzyʔ wlgrgwsyʔ wlʔmwryʔ wlybwsyʔ
03:11	dhʔ qʔbwtʔ ddytyqʔ dmryʔ mrh dklh ʔrʕʔ qdmykwn bywrdnn
03:12	mkyl dbrw lkwn trʕsr gbryn mn klhwn šbṭʔ dʔysryl/dbny ʔysryl#3#/ ḥd ḥd gbrʔ mn šbṭʔ
03:13	wmʔ dʔttnyḥy pstʔ/prstʔ#3#/ drglyhwn dkhnʔ dšqylyn qʔbwtʔ ddytyqʔ dmryʔ mrh dklh ʔrʕʔ bmyʔ dywrdnn myʔ dywrdnn ntplgwn myʔ dnḥtyn mn lʕl nqwmwn ʔyk dbzqʔ ḥdʔ lsṭrʔ ḥd
03:14	wkd šqlw ʕmʔ mn mšknyhwn lmʕbr ywrdnn khnʔ dšqylyn hww qʔbwtʔ ddytyqʔ <dmryʔ#3#/ ʔzlyn hww qdm ʕmʔ
03:15	wkd mṭyw šqyly qʔbwtʔ ʕdmʔ lywrdnn rglyhwn dkhnʔ dšyqylyn hww qʔbwtʔ ʔṣṭbʕ bspry myʔ <dywrdnn#3#> wywrdnn mlʔ hwʔ spʔ bspʔ klhwn ywmtʔ dḥṣdʔ
03:16	wqmw myʔ dnḥtyn/wnḥtyn#3#/ hww mn lʕl qmw ʔyk dbzqʔ ḥdʔ lsṭrʔ ḥd ʔrḥqw ṭb mn ʔrm qrytʔ dʔyt ʕl gnb ṣrtm wdnḥtyn lymʔ dmʕrbʔ ymʔ dmlḥʔ gmrw wʔtplgw ʕmʔ dyn ʕbrw lwqbl ʔyryḥw
03:17	wqmw khnʔ dšqylyn <hww#3#> qʔbwtʔ ddytyqʔ dmryʔ bybšʔ bgw ywrdnn wʔtṭybw klhwn dbyt ʔysryl ʕbryn bybšʔ ʕdmʔ dšlmw klh ʕmʔ lmʕbr ywrdnn
04:01	wkd šlmw klh ʕmʔ lmʕbr ywrdnn ʔmr mryʔ lywšʕ
04:02	dbrw lkwn mn ʕmʔ trʕsr gbryn ḥd ḥd gbrʔ mn šbṭʔ
04:03	wpqd ʔnwn wʔmr lhwn sbw lkwn mkʔ mn gw ywrdnn mn tḥyt rglyhwn dkhnʔ ṭybw trtʕsrʔ kʔpyn wʔʕbrw ʔnyn ʕmkwn wsymw ʔnyn byt bwtʔ dbytyn ʔntwn bh bllyʔ
04:04	wqrʔ yšwʕ ltrʕsr gbryn hnwn dṭybw mn bny ʔysryl ḥd ḥd gbrʔ mn šbṭʔ
04:05	wʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʕbrw qdm qʔbwth dmryʔ ʔlhkwn bgw ywrdnn wsymw gbr kʔph ʕl ktph bmnynʔ dšbṭʔ dbny ʔysryl
04:06	mṭl dthwʔ ʔtʔ hdʔ byntkwn dkd/wkd#3#/ nšʔlwnkwn bnykwn mn mḥr wnʔmrwn lkwn mnʔ/dmnʔ#3#/ ʔnyn kʔpʔ hlyn
04:07	ʔmrw lhwn dʔtplgw myʔ dywrdnn mn qdm qʔbwtʔ ddytyqʔ dmryʔ kd ʕbrn bywrdnn/ywrdnn#2#/ ʔtplgw myʔ dywrdnn whwy hlyn kʔpʔ dwkrnʔ lbny ʔysryl lʕlm
04:08	wʕbdw hknʔ bny ʔysryl ʔyk dpqd ʔnwn yšwʕ wšqlw trtʕsrʔ kʔpyn mn gw ywrdnn ʔyk dʔmr mryʔ lyšwʕ bmnynʔ dšbṭʔ dbny ʔysryl wʔʕbrw ʔnyn ʕmhwn lbyt bwtʔ wšbqw ʔnyn tmn
04:09	trtʕsrʔ kʔpyn ʔqymw dnsbw <ʔnyn#3#> mn gw ywrdnn mn tḥyt rglyhwn dkhnʔ dšqylyn <hww#2#> qʔbwtʔ ddytyqʔ <dmryʔ#3#> whwy tmn ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
04:10	wkhnʔ dšqylyn hww qʔbwtʔ qymyn hww bgw ywrdnn ʕdmʔ dšlmw klhwn ptgmʔ dpqd mryʔ lyšwʕ lmʔmr lʕmʔ ʔyknʔ dpqdh mwšʔ lyšwʕ wʔstrhbw ʕmʔ wʕbrw
04:11	wkd ʕbrw kwlh ʕmʔ mšmlyʔyt wʕbrt qbwth dmryʔ wkhnʔ qdm ʕmʔ
04:12	wʕbrw bny rwbyl wbny gd wplgh dšbṭʔ dmnšʔ kd mzynyn qdm bny ʔysryl ʔyknʔ dʔmr lhwn mwšʔ
04:13	ʔrbʕyn ʔlpyn kd mzynyn bḥylʔ ʕbrw qdm mryʔ lqrbʔ bpqʕtʔ dʔyryḥw
04:14	bh bywmʔ hw ʔwrb mryʔ lyšwʕ bʕyny/byny#3#/ klh ʔysryl wdḥlw mnh ʔyknʔ ddḥlyn hww mn mwšʔ klhwn ywmtʔ dḥywhy
04:15	wʔmr mryʔ lyšwʕ
04:16	pqd lkhnʔ dšqylyn qʔbwtʔ dshdwtʔ wnsqwn/dnsqwn#3#/ mn gw ywrdnn
04:17	wpqd yšwʕ lkhnʔ wʔmr lhwn sqw mn gw ywrdnn
04:18	wkd slqw hww khnʔ dšqylyn qbwtʔ ddytqʔ dmryʔ mn gw ywrdnn smk pstʔ/prstʔ#3#/ drglyhwn dkhnʔ bybšʔ whpkw myʔ dywrdnn ldwkthwn whlkw ʔyk dmn qdym ʕl klhwn sprwhy dywrdnn
04:19	wʕmʔ slqw mn gw ywrdnn bʕsrtʔ byrḥʔ qdmyʔ wšrw bglglʔ bswpy mdnḥyh dʔyryḥw
04:20	wtrtʕsrʔ kʔpyn hlyn dnsbw mn gw ywrdnn ʔqym ʔnyn yšwʕ bglglʔ
04:21	wʔmr <yšwʕ#3#> lbny ʔysryl kd nšʔlwnkwn bnykwn mn mḥr wnʔmrwn lkwn mnʔ ʔnyn kʔpʔ hlyn
04:22	ḥww ʔnyn lbnykwn wʔmrw lhwn dbybšʔ ʕbrw bny ʔysryl ywrdnn hnʔ
04:23	wʔwbš/dʔwbš#2#/ mryʔ ʔlhhwn myʔ dywrdnn <hnʔ#3#> mn qdmyhwn ʕdmʔ dʕbrw ʔyk dʕbd mryʔ ʔlhkwn lymʔ dswp dʔwbšh/wʔwbšw#3#/ mn qdmyn ʕdmʔ dʕbrn
04:24	dndʕwn klhwn ʕmmʔ dʔrʕʔ ʔydh/dʔydh#3#/ dmryʔ dḥyltnyʔ/ḥyltnyʔ#3#/ hy wtdḥlwn lmryʔ ʔlhkwn klhwn ywmtʔ
05:01	wkd šmʕw klhwn mlkʔ dʔmwryʔ dbʕbrʔ dywrdnn dbmʕrbʔ wklhwn mlkʔ dknʕn dʕl yd ymʔ dʔwbš mryʔ myʔ dywrdnn mn qdm bny ʔysryl ʕdmʔ dʕbrw zʕ lbhwn wlʔ ʔštḥrt bhwn npšʔ mn qdm bny ʔysryl
05:02	bh bzbnʔ hw ʔmr mryʔ lyšwʕ ʕbd lk spsrʔ dṭrnʔ whpwk gzwr ʔnwn lbny ʔysryl tnynwt
05:03	wʕbd lh yšwʕ spsrʔ dṭrnʔ wgzr ʔnwn lbny ʔysryl tnynwt brmtʔ/bdmwtʔ#3#/ dʕwrlʔ
05:04	whlyn ʔnwn dgzr yšwʕ lkl yldʔ dʕmʔ dnpqw mn mṣryn dkrʔ mṭl dklhwn gbrʔ ʕbdy qrbʔ mytw bmdbrʔ bʔwrḥʔ kd npqw mn mṣryn
05:05	mṭl dgzyryn/dlʔ gzyryn#3#/ hww kl ʕmʔ dnpqw wkl ʕmʔ dʔtyldw bmdbrʔ dʔwrḥʔ \kd npqw /dnpqw#3#/ mn mṣryn lʔ gzrw
05:06	mṭl dʔrbʕyn šnyn hlkw bny ʔysryl bmdbrʔ ʕdmʔ dspw klh ʕmʔ dgbrʔ ʕbry qrbʔ dnpqw mn mṣryn ʕl dlʔ šmʕw bqlh dmryʔ ʔlhhwn wʔymʔ lhwn mryʔ dlʔ \nḥwʔ ʔnwn /nḥzwn#3#/ ʔrʕʔ dʔymʔ lʔbhyhwn lmtl lhwn ʔrʕʔ dmrdyʔ ḥlbʔ wdbšʔ
05:07	wlbnyhwn dhww mn btrhwn lhwn gzr yšwʕ mṭl dʕwrlyn hww wlʔ gzyryn hww
05:08	wkd gmrw klh ʕmʔ lmtgzrw/lmgzrw#3#/ ʔytbw <hww#3#> bdwkythwn bmšrytʔ/bgw mšrytʔ#3#/ ʕdmʔ dʔtʔsyw
05:09	wʔmr mryʔ lyšwʕ ywmnʔ ʔʕbrt ḥsdʔ dmṣryʔ mnkwn wqrʔ šmh dʔtrʔ hw glglʔ ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
05:10	wšrw bny ʔysryl bglglʔ wʕbdw pṣḥʔ bʔrbʕsrʔ byrḥʔ qdmyʔ brmšʔ bpqʕtʔ dʔyryḥw
05:11	wʔklw mn ʕbwrʔ dʔrʕʔ mn btr pṣḥʔ pṭyrʔ wqlytʔ ʔklw bh bywmʔ hnʔ
05:12	wʔštql mnnʔ mn btr ywmʔ kd ʔklw mn ʕbwrʔ dʔrʕʔ wlʔ hwʔ twb mnnʔ lbny ʔysryl wʔklw mn ʕllth dʔrʕʔ dknʕn/hy#3#/ bh bšntʔ hy
05:13	wkd hwʔ yšwʕ bpqʕtʔ dʔyryḥw ʔrym ʕynwhy wḥzʔ gbrʔ ḥd qʔm/dqʔm#3#/ lqwblh wsyph šmyṭ wʔḥyd bʔydh wʔzl yšwʕ lwth wʔmr lh mnn ʔnt ʔw mn bʕldbbyn
05:14	ʔmr lh ʔnʔ rb ḥylwth ʔnʔ dmryʔ whšʔ ʔtyt wnpl yšwʕ ʕl ʔpwhy ʕl ʔrʕʔ wsgd wʔmr mnʔ ʔmr mry lʕbdh
05:15	wʔmr rb ḥylwth dmryʔ lyšwʕ šry msnyk mn rglyk mṭl ddwktʔ dqʔm ʔnt bh qdyšʔ hy wʕbd yšwʕ hknʔ
06:01	wʔyryḥw ʔḥydʔ hwt mn qdm bny ʔysryl wlyt hwʔ dnpq wlʔ dʕʔl
06:02	wʔmr mryʔ lyšwʕ ḥzy/mʔ#3#/ dʔšlmt bʔydyk lʔyryḥw wlmlkh wlklh/wlgnbry#3#/ ḥylh
06:03	ḥwdrwh lmdyntʔ klhwn gbrʔ ʕbdy qrbʔ wʔtkrkwh lmdyntʔ zbntʔ ḥdʔ bywmʔ ḥd hknʔ ʕbdw štʔ ywmyn
06:04	wšbʕʔ khnʔ nšqlwn qrntʔ wnybbwn qdm qbwtʔ wlywmʔ dšbʕʔ ʔtkrkwh lmdyntʔ šbʕ zbnyn wkhnʔ nqrwn bqrntʔ
06:05	wmʔ dybbw bqrntʔ wšmʕtwn qlʔ dqrnʔ nqʕwn klh ʕmʔ qʕtʔ rbtʔ wnpl šwrʔ dmdyntʔ ʕl dwkth wnsqwn ʕmʔ ʔnš lqwblh
06:06	wqrʔ yšwʕ br`nwn lkhnʔ wʔmr lhwn šqwlw qbwtʔ ddytqʔ dmryʔ wšbʕʔ khnyn nšqlwn šbʕ qrnn wnybbwn qdm qbwth dmryʔ
06:07	wʔmr lʕmʔ ʕbrw wʔtkrkw lmdyntʔ wʔylyn dmzynyn nʕbrwn qdm qʔbwth dmryʔ
06:08	wʔyk dʔmr yšwʕ lʕmʔ šbʕʔ khnyn šqylyn/šqlyn#3#/ hww šbʕ qrnn wmybbyn hww qdm qbwth dmryʔ wqryn hww bqrntʔ wqbwtʔ ddytqʔ dmryʔ ʔtyʔ hwt btrhwn
06:09	wdmzynyn hww ʔzlyn hww qdm khnʔ dqryn hww bqrntʔ wdmknšyn ʔzlyn/ʔtyn#3#/ hww btr qbwtʔ wmhlkyn hww wqryn/wqʕyn#3#/ hww bqrntʔ
06:10	wlʕmʔ pqd yšwʕ wʔmr lʔ tqʕwn wlʔ tšmʕwn qlkwn wmlʔ lʔ tpwq mn pwmkwn ʕdmʔ lywmʔ dʔmr lkwn dqʕw whydyn tqʕwn
06:11	wʔtkrkt qbwth dmryʔ lmdyntʔ zbntʔ ḥdʔ wʔtw lmšrytʔ wbtw bmšrytʔ
06:12	wqdm yšwʕ bšprʔ/bṣprʔ#3#/ wšqlw khnʔ qbwth dmryʔ
06:13	wšbʕʔ khnyn šqylyn hww šbʕ qrnn wʔzlyn hww qdm qbwth dmryʔ wmhlkyn hww wqryn <hww#3#> bqrntʔ wʔylyn dmzynyn hww ʔzlyn hww qdmyhwn wdmknšyn hww ʔzlyn hww btr qbwth dmryʔ wqryn hww bqrntʔ
06:14	wʔtkrkwh lmdyntʔ hy bywmʔ dtryn zbntʔ ḥdʔ whpkw lhwn lmšrytʔ hknʔ ʕbdyn hww šttyhwn ywmtʔ
06:15	wbywmʔ dšbʕʔ qdmw bšprʔ/bṣprʔ#3#/ wʔtkrkwh lmdyntʔ ʔyk nmwsʔ hnʔ šbʕ zbnyn blḥwd dyn bh bhw ywmʔ ʔtkrkwh šbʕ zbnyn
06:16	wbzbntʔ hy dšbʕ qrw khnʔ bqrntʔ wʔmr yšwʕ lʕmʔ qʕw mṭl dʔšlmh lkwn mryʔ lmdyntʔ
06:17	wthwn mdyntʔ hdʔ wkl dʔyt bh ḥrmʔ lmryʔ blḥwd lrḥb znytʔ ʔḥw lh wlkl dʔyt <lh#3#> ʕmh bbytʔ mṭwl dṭšyt \lhnwn gšwšʔ /gšwšʔ hnwn#3#/ dšdrn
06:18	ʔntwn dyn hwytwn zhyryn mn ḥrmʔ dlʔ tṭšwn wtsbwn mn ḥrmʔ wtʕbdwnh lmšrytʔ dʔysryl ḥrmʔ wtdlḥwnh
06:19	kl sʔmʔ wdhbʔ wmʔnʔ dnḥšʔ wdprzlʔ qdyšyn ʔnwn lmryʔ lbyt gzh dmryʔ nʕlwn
06:20	wqʕʔ ʕmʔ wqrw bqrntʔ wkd šmʕw ʕmʔ qlʔ dqrntʔ qʕʔ <klh#3#> ʕmʔ qʕtʔ rbtʔ dṭb wnpl šwrʔ ʕl dwkth wslqw ʕmʔ lmdyntʔ ʔnš lqwblh wkbšwh lmdyntʔ
06:21	wḥrbw lkl dʔyt bh mn gbrʔ wʕdmʔ lnšʔ wmn ṭlyʔ wʕdmʔ lqšyšʔ wʕdmʔ ltwrʔ wʕdmʔ lʕnʔ wlḥmrʔ ḥrbw bpwmʔ dsypʔ
06:22	wltryn gbryn hnwn/hlyn#3#/ dgšwh lʔrʕʔ ʔmr <lhwn#3#> yšwʕ ʕwlw lbyt ʔnttʔ hy znytʔ wʔpqwh mn tmn lh lʔnttʔ wlkl dʔyt lh/ʕmh#3#/ ʔyknʔ dʔymytwn lh
06:23	wʔzlw gšwšʔ <hnwn#3#> wʔpqwh lrḥb wlʔbwh wlʔmh wlʔḥyh wlkl dʔyt lh wlklh šrbth ʔpqw wʔšryw ʔnwn lbr mn mšrytʔ dʔysryl
06:24	wlmdyntʔ ʔwqdwh bnwrʔ wlkl dʔyt bh blḥwd ldhbʔ wlsʔmʔ wlmʔnʔ dnḥšʔ wdprzlʔ ʔytyw <ʔnwn#3#> lbyt gzh dmryʔ
06:25	wlrḥb znytʔ wlbyt ʔbwh wlkl dʔyt lh ʔḥy yšwʕ wytbt bgw bny ʔysryl ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ mṭl dṭšyt gšwšʔ dšdr yšwʕ lmgš/lmgšw#3#/ lʔyryḥw
06:26	wʔymʔ yšwʕ bzbnʔ/bh bywmʔ#3#/ hw wʔmr lyṭ hw gbrʔ qdm mryʔ dnqwm wnbnyh lmdyntʔ hdʔ ʔyryḥw bbwkrh nbnyh wbzʕwrh nqym trʕyh
06:27	whwʔ mryʔ ʕm yšwʕ wšmʕh ʔzl hwʔ bklh ʔrʕʔ
07:01	wʔʕlyw bny ʔysryl ʕwlʔ bḥrmʔ wnsb ʕkr br krmy br zbdy br zrḥ mn šbṭʔ dyhwdʔ wnsb mn ḥrmʔ wṭšy wʔtḥmt rwgzh dmryʔ ʕl bny ʔysryl
07:02	wšdr yšwʕ gbrʔ mn ʔyryḥw lʕy dʕl gnb byt ʔwn mn mdnḥʔ dbyt ʔyl/lbyt ʔyl#2#/ wʔmr lhwn sqw gwšw ʔrʕʔ wslqw gbrʔ wgšwh lʕy
07:03	whpkw <ʔtw#3#> lwt yšwʕ wʔmryn lh lʔ nsq klh ʕmʔ ʔlʔ ʔyk tryn tltʔ ʔlpyn gbryn nsqwn nḥrbwnh lʕy lʔ tšdr lklh ʕmʔ mṭl dzʕwryn ʔnwn
07:04	wslqw mn ʕmʔ ltmn ʔyk tltʔ ʔlpyn gbryn wʕrqw lhwn mn qdm ʔnšyh dʕy
07:05	wḥrbw ʔnšyh dʕy mn ʔysrʔyl tltyn wštʔ gbryn wrdpw ʔnwn <mn#3#> qdm trʕʔ ʕdmʔ dʔttbrw wmḥw bhwn mḥwtʔ wzʕ lbh dʕmʔ whww ʔyk myʔ
07:06	wṣry yšwʕ lbwšwhy wnpl ʕl ʔpwhy ʕl ʔrʕʔ qdm qbwth dmryʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ hw wqšyšʔ dʔysryl wʔrmyw ʕprʔ ʕl ryšyhwn
07:07	wʔmr yšwʕ ʔwn mryʔ ʔlhʔ lmnʔ ʔʕbrtyhy lʕmʔ hnʔ ywrdnn dtšlmn bʔydʔ dʔmwryʔ ʔlw ʔytbn hwyn ln ky bʕbrʔ dywrdnn
07:08	wmnʔ mkyl ʔmr dʔpny ʔysryl qdlh qdm bʕldbbwhy
07:09	wnšmʕwn knʕnyʔ wklhwn ʕmwryh dʔrʕʔ wntknšwn ʕlyn wnwbdwn šmn mn ʔpy ʔrʕʔ wmnʔ ʕbd ʔnt dyn lšmk rbʔ
07:10	wʔmr mryʔ lyšwʕ qwm lk lmnʔ ʔrmʔ ʔnt ʕl ʔpyk ʕl ʔrʕʔ
07:11	ḥṭʔ ʔysryl wʕbrw ʕl pwqdnʔ dpqdt ʔnwn wnsbw/wsmw#3#/ mn ḥrmʔ ʔp gnbw ʔp kdbw wṭšyw bmnyhwn
07:12	wlʔ nškḥwn twb bny ʔysryl lmqm qdm bʕldbbyhwn ʔlʔ qdlhwn npnwn qdm bʕldbbyhwn mṭl dhww lḥrmʔ wtwb lʔ ʔhwʔ ʕmhwn ʔlʔ ʔn ʔprqtwn ḥrmʔ mn byntkwn
07:13	qwm zmnyhy lʕmʔ hnʔ wʔmr ʔzdmnw mḥr mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ḥrmʔ bgwk ʔysryl twb lʔ mškḥ ʔnt lmqm qdm bʕldbbyk ʕdmʔ dtprqwn ḥrmʔ mn byntkwn
07:14	wbṣprʔ qrbw šbṭykwn wšbṭʔ dnʔḥdywhy mryʔ ntqrb lšrbtʔ wšrbtʔ dnʔḥdyh mryʔ ttqrb lbtyn wbytʔ dnʔḥdywhy mryʔ ntqrb lgbryn
07:15	wmn dmttḥd bh bḥrmʔ nʔqd bnwrʔ hw wklmdm dʔyt lh ʕl dʕbr ʕl pwqdnh dmryʔ wʕl dʕbd ʕwlʔ bʔysryl
07:16	wqdm yšwʕ bṣprʔ wqrbh lʔysryl lšbṭyn wʔttḥd šbṭʔ dyhwdʔ
07:17	wqrb šbṭʔ/lšbṭʔ#3#/ dyhwdʔ lšrbtʔ wʔttḥdt šrbtʔ dzrḥ wqrb šrbtʔ dzrḥ lbtyn wʔttḥd zbdy
07:18	wqrb byth lgbryn wʔttḥd ʕkr br krmy br zbdy br zrḥ mn šrbtʔ dyhwdʔ
07:19	wʔmr yšwʕ lʕkr hb rbwtʔ lmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl whb lh twdytʔ wḥwʔ mdm dʕbdt wlʔ tṭšʔ mny
07:20	ʕnʔ ʕkr wʔmr lyšwʕ šryrʔyt ʔnʔ ḥṭyt lmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl whknʔ ʕbdt
07:21	ḥzyt bbztʔ ʔmlʔ ḥdʔ bblytʔ wšpyrʔ hwt wmʔtyn mtqlyn dsʔmʔ wlšnʔ ḥd ddhbʔ dtql ḥmšyn mtqlyn wrgt ʔnwn wnsbt ʔnwn whʔ ṭmyryn ly bʔrʕʔ bmškny wsʔmʔ mn ltḥt
07:22	wšdr yšwʕ gbrʔ wrhṭw lmšknh wḥzw dṭmyryn bmšknh wsʔmʔ mn ltḥt
07:23	wnsbw ʔnwn mn mšknh wʔytyw ʔnwn lwt yšwʕ wlwt klh ʔysryl wsm ʔnwn qdm mryʔ
07:24	wdbrh yšwʕ lʕkr br zrḥ wnsb lsʔmʔ wlʔmlʔ wllšnʔ ddhbʔ wdbr lbnwhy wlbnth wltwrwhy wlḥmrh wlʕnh wlmšknh wlkl mdm dʔyt lh wlklh ʔysryl ʕmh wʔsq ʔnwn lʕwmqʔ dʕkr
07:25	wʔmr lh yšwʕ lmnʔ dlḥtn ndlḥk mryʔ bywmʔ hnʔ wrgmwhy bkʔpʔ klh ʔysryl lh wlkl <mdm#3#> dʔyt lh wʔwqdw ʔnwn bnwrʔ
07:26	wʔqymw ʕlwhy ygrʔ dkʔpʔ rwrbtʔ ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ wʔttnyḥ mryʔ mn ḥmtʔ drwgzh mṭl hnʔ ʔtqry šmh dʔtrʔ hw ʕwmqʔ dʕkr ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
08:01	wʔmr mryʔ lyšwʕ lʔ tdḥl wlʔ tzwʕ dbr ʕmk lklh ʕmʔ wʕbd qrbʔ wqwm sq lʕy mṭl dʔšlmth bʔydyk lmlkʔ dʕy wlʕmh wlmdynth wlʔrʕh
08:02	wʕbd lʕy wlmlkh ʔyk/ʔyknʔ#3#/ dʕbdt lʔyryḥw wlmlkh blḥwd dyn bztʔ wbʕyrʔ bwzw lkwn wʔkmnw lkwn kmʔnʔ mn bstrh dmdyntʔ
08:03	wqm yšwʕ wklh ʕmʔ ʕbdy qrbʔ lmsq lʕy wgbʔ yšwʕ tltʔ ʔlpyn gbryn dgnbryn bḥylhwn wšdr ʔnwn bllyʔ
08:04	wpqd ʔnwn wʔmr lhwn ḥzw mʔ dkmnyn ʔntwn ʕl mdyntʔ mn bstrh dmdyntʔ lʔ trḥqwn ṭb mnh mn mdyntʔ whwytwn mṭybyn klkwn
08:05	wʔnʔ wʕmʔ dʔyt ʕmy ntqrb lmdyntʔ wmʔ dnpqw lʔwrʕn ʔyk dbqdmytʔ hʔ ʕrqynn <ln#3#> mn qdmyhwn
08:06	wnpqyn btrn wrdpyn ln mn mdyntʔ mṭl dʔmryn dʕrqyn ʔnwn mn qdmyn ʔyk dbqdmytʔ wḥnn hʔ ʕrqynn mn qdmyhwn
08:07	wʔntwn qwmw mn kmʔnkwn wḥwrbwh lmdyntʔ wnšlmyh mryʔ ʔlhkwn bʔydykwn
08:08	wmʔ dʔḥdtwnh lmdyntʔ ʔwqdwh bnwrʔ wʔyk mlth dmryʔ ʕbdw wḥzw dyn dpqdtkwn
08:09	wšdr yšwʕ wʔzlw lbyt kmʔnʔ wʔytbw bynt byt ʔyl lʕy mn mʕrbyh dmdyntʔ wbt yšwʕ bllyʔ hw bgw ʕmʔ
08:10	wqdm yšwʕ bṣprʔ wmnyhy lʕmʔ wslq hw wsbʔ dʔysryl lʕy qdm ʕmʔ
08:11	wklhwn gbrʔ qrbtnʔ dʕmh slqw wqrbw lqwblh dmdyntʔ wšrw mn grbyyh dʕy wnḥlʔ ʔyt hwʔ bynthwn lʕy
08:12	wdbr yšwʕ ḥmšʔ ʔlpyn gbryn wʔwtb ʔnwn bkmʔnʔ bynt byt ʔyl lʕy mn mʕrbyh dmdyntʔ
08:13	wʕbdh lʕmh wlklh mšryth mn grbyyh dmdyntʔ wnṭry ʕqbʔ mn mʕrbyh dmdyntʔ wʔzl yšwʕ bllyʔ hw bgw ʕmʔ
08:14	wkd ḥzʔ mlkʔ dʕy ʔstrhb wqmw npqw ʔnšyh dmdyntʔ lʔwrʕh dʔysryl whww klh ʕmʔ dʕy bpqʕtʔ wʕmʔ lʔ ydʕ hwʔ dkmʔnʔ ʔyt hwʔ lhwn mn \bstrh dmdyntʔ /bstr mdyntʔ#3#/
08:15	wʔtbdr yšwʕ wklh ʔysryl mn qdmyhwn lmʕrq bʔwrḥʔ dmdbrʔ
08:16	wqʕʔ klh ʕmʔ dʕy lmrdp btrhwn wrdpw btr yšwʕ wʔst{r}<d>qw lhwn mn mdyntʔ
08:17	wlʔ ʔštḥr ʔnš bʕy wbbyt ʔyl dlʔ npqw btr ʔysryl wšbqwh lmdyntʔ kd ptyḥʔ wrdpw btr ʔysryl
08:18	wʔmr mryʔ lyšwʕ ʔrym bnyzkʔ dbʔydk ʕl ʕy mṭl dbʔydyk ʔšlmth wʔrym yšwʕ bnyzkʔ dʔḥyd hwʔ bʔydh ʕl mdyntʔ
08:19	wkmʔnʔ qm msrhbʔyt mn dwkth wrhṭw ḥpyṭʔyt ʔyk mpnʔ ʔydʔ wʕlw lmdyntʔ wʔḥdwh wʔstrhbw wʔwqdwh lmdyntʔ bnwrʔ
08:20	wʔtpnyw ʔnšʔ dʕy lbstrhwn wḥzw dslq tnnh dmdynthwn ʕdmʔ lšmyʔ wlʔ ʔwpyw lmʕrq/lmʕrqw#3#/ lkʔ wlkʔ wʕmʔ dʔysryl dʕrq hwʔ bmdbrʔ ʔthpk ʕl rdwpwhy
08:21	wyšwʕ wklh ʔysryl ḥzw dkbšh kmʔnʔ lmdyntʔ wslq tnnh dmdyntʔ whpkw ḥrbw ʔnwn lʔnšyh dʕy
08:22	whlyn npqw mn mdyntʔ lʔwrʕhwn whww lhwn ʔnšyh dʕy bmṣʕth dʔysryl whlyn mkʔ whlyn mkʔ wḥrbw ʔnwn wsrydʔ lʔ šbqw lhwn
08:23	wlmlkʔ dʕy ʔḥdwhy kd ḥy wqrbwhy lwt yšwʕ
08:24	wkd gmr ʔysryl lmḥrb lklhwn ʕmwryh dʕy bḥqltʔ wbmdbrʔ rdpyn hww lhwn wnplw klhwn bpwmʔ dḥrbʔ ʕdmʔ dgmrw whpkw klh ʔysryl lʕy wḥrbwh bpwmʔ dḥrbʔ
08:25	wklhwn dnplw bywmʔ hw mn gbrʔ wʕdmʔ lnšʔ trʕsr ʔlpyn klhwn ʔnšʔ dʕy
08:26	wyšwʕ lʔ ʔhpk ʔydh dʔrym hwʔ bnyzkʔ ʕdmʔ dḥrb ʔnwn lklhwn ʕmwryh dʕy
08:27	blḥwd bʕyrʔ wbztʔ dmdyntʔ hy bzw lhwn bny ʔysryl ʔyk mlth dmryʔ dpqd/dʔmr#3#/ lyšwʕ
08:28	wʔwqdh yšwʕ lʕy wʕbdh tllʔ ḥrbʔ <ʕdmʔ#3#> lʕlm ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
08:29	wlmlkh/wmlkh#3#/ dʕy zqph ʕl qysʔ ʕdmʔ lzbnʔ drmšʔ wkd ʕrbt šmšʔ pqd yšwʕ wʔḥtwh/wʔḥdwh#3#/ lšldʔ mn qysʔ wʔrmywh bmʕlnʔ dtrʕʔ dmdyntʔ/dqrytʔ#3#/ wʔqymw/wʔrmyw#3#/ ʕlwhy ygrʔ dkʔpʔ rwrbtʔ ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
08:30	hydyn bnʔ yšwʕ mdbḥʔ lmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl bṭwrʔ dgbl
08:31	ʔyk dpqd mwšʔ ʕbdh dmryʔ lbny ʔysryl ʔyk dktyb bsprʔ dnmwsʔ dmwšʔ mdbḥʔ dkʔpʔ šlmlmtʔ dlʔ npl ʕlyhyn przlʔ wqrbw ʕlwhy/klhwn#3#/ yqdʔ šlmʔ lmryʔ wdbḥw dbḥtʔ
08:32	wktb tmn ʕl kʔpʔ hlyn dmdbḥʔ pršgnʔ dnmwsh dmwšʔ dktb qdm bny ʔysrʔyl
08:33	wklh ʔysryl wqšyšwhy wsprwhy wdynwhy qymyn mkʔ wmkʔ mn tryhwn sṭryh dqbwtʔ lwqbl khnʔ wlwyʔ dšqylyn qbwtʔ ddytqʔ dmryʔ plghwn lwqbl ṭwrʔ dgrzym wplghwn lwqbl ṭwrʔ dgbl ʔyknʔ dpqd mwšʔ ʕbdh dmryʔ lmbrkw lʔysryl/lbny ʔysryl#3#/ ʔyk dmn qdym
08:34	wmn btrkn qrʔ yšwʕ klhwn ptgmwhy dnmwsʔ bwrktʔ wlwṭtʔ klhwn dktybn bsprʔ dnmwsʔ
08:35	lʔ šbq ḥdʔ mltʔ mn kl dpqd mwšʔ dlʔ qrʔ yšwʕ qdm klh knwštʔ dʔysryl wqdm nšʔ wqdm ṭlyʔ wqdm twtbʔ dbynthwn
09:01	wkd šmʕw klhwn mlkʔ dʔyt bʕbrʔ dywrdnn bṭwrʔ wbpqʕtʔ wbklhwn \sprwhy dymʔ /spry ymʔ#3#/ rbʔ dlwqbl lbnn ḥtyʔ wʔmwryʔ wknʕnyʔ wprzyʔ wḥwyʔ wybwsyʔ
09:02	ʔtknšw ʔkḥdʔ lmʕbd qrbʔ ʕm yšwʕ wʕm ʔysryl mn ḥd pwm
09:03	wʕmwrʔ dgbʕwn šmʕw mdm dʕbd yšwʕ lʕy wlʔyryḥw
09:04	wʕbdw ʔp hnwn bʕrymwtʔ wʔzlw ʔzdwdw wʔrmyw sqʔ blyʔ ʕl ḥmrhwn wzqʔ dḥmrʔ dblyn wmbzʕn wmṣrrn
09:05	wmsnʔ dblyyn wṭrmysytʔ sʔynyn hww brglyhwn wnḥtʔ blyʔ lbyšyn hww wlḥmʔ dzwdyhwn ybšw whwʔ lh pgwrʔ
09:06	wʔtw lwt yšwʕ lmšrytʔ lglglʔ wʔmrw lh wldbyt ʔysrʔyl mn ʔtrʔ rḥyqʔ ʔtyn hšʔ hbw ln ymynʔ
09:07	wʔmryn dbyt ʔysryl lḥwyʔ ʔn lwtn ʕmryn ʔntwn lmnʔ hwyʔ lkwn ymynʔ
09:08	wʔmrw lyšwʕ ʕbdyk ḥnn ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔymkʔ ʔntwn wmn ʔymkʔ ʔtytwn
09:09	wʔmrw lh mn ʔrʕʔ mn ʔtrʔ drḥyq ṭb ʔtw ʕbdyk lšmh/lšmʕh#3#/ dmryʔ ʔlhk mṭl dšmʕn šmh wkl mdm dʕbd bmṣryn
09:10	wkl dʕbd ltryhwn mlkʔ dʔmwryʔ dbʕbrʔ dywrdnn lsyḥwn mlkʔ dḥšbwn wlʕwg mlkʔ dmtnyn dytb hwʔ bʕstrwt/bʕsrwt#2#/
09:11	wʔmrw ln qšyšyn wklhwn ʕmwryh dʔrʕn sbw ʕmkwn/lkwn#2#/ zwdʔ lʔwrḥʔ wzlw lʔwrʕhwn wʔmrw lhwn dʕbdykwn ḥnn mkyl hbw ln ymynʔ
09:12	wʔmrw lyšwʕ hnʔ lḥmn kd ḥmym ʔzdwdnyhy mn btyn bywmʔ dnpqn lmʔtʔ lwtkwn whšʔ hʔ ʔybš whwʔ <lh#3#> pgwrʔ
09:13	whlyn zqʔ dḥmrʔ mlyn ʔnyn kd ḥdtn whʔ ʔtbzʕ whlyn nḥtyn wmsnyn kd ḥdtyn nsbn ʔnwn ln whʔ blyw mṭl dṭb sgyʔʔ hwt ʔwrḥʔ
09:14	wnsbw gbrʔ hlyn mn zwdyhwn wʔzlw wmn pwmh dmryʔ lʔ šʔlw
09:15	wʕbd lhwn yšwʕ šlmʔ wyhb lhwn ymynʔ lḥyyhwn wʔymw lhwn rwrbnʔ dknwštʔ
09:16	wmn btr tltʔ ywmyn mn btr dyhb lhwn ymynʔ šmʕw dqrybyn ʔnwn lhwn wbynthwn šryn
09:17	wšqlw bny ʔysryl wʔtw lqwryhwn bywmʔ dtltʔ wšmhʔ dqwryhwn gbʕwn wkpyrʔ wʕyrwt wqwryt nʕryn
09:18	wlʔ qṭlw ʔnwn bny ʔysryl mṭwl dʔymw lhwn rwrbnʔ dknwštʔ bmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl wrṭnyn hww wrybyn klh knwštʔ ʕl rwrbnʔ
09:19	wʔmryn rwrbnʔ dknwštʔ ḥnn ʔymyn lhwn bmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl mkyl lʔ mškḥynn lmhrw ʔnwn
09:20	hknʔ dyn ʕbdynn wmḥynn lhwn dlʔ nhwʔ ʕlyn rwgzʔ mṭl mwmtʔ dʔymyn <ḥnn#3#> lhwn

13:02	hdʔ <hy#3#> ʔrʕʔ dʔštḥrt bkwlh glylʔ dplštyʔ wbklh/wklh#3#/ ʔtrʔ dʕyndwr
13:03	mn šyḥwr dqdm mṣryn wʕdmʔ ltḥwmʔ dʕqrwn dbgrbyʔ dknʕnyʔ mtḥšbʔ wḥmšʔ ṭrwnyhwn dplštyʔ gztyʔ wʔšdwdyʔ wʔšqlwnyʔ wgtyʔ wʕqrwnyʔ wʕwyʔ
13:04	dmn tymnʔ wklh ʔrʕʔ dknʕnyʔ wmʕrtʔ dṣydnyʔ ʕdmʔ lʔpq wʕdmʔ ltḥwmʔ dʔmwryʔ
13:05	wʔrʕʔ dgbl wklh lbnn mn mdnḥy šmšʔ dbglʕd dtḥyt ṭwrʔ dḥrmwn/ḥrmwn#3#/ ʕdmʔ lmʕlnʔ dḥmt

13:08	mṭl drwbyl wgd wplgh dšbṭʔ dmnšʔ qblw yrtwthwn dyhb lhwn mwšʔ bʕbrʔ dywrdnn mn mdnḥʔ ʔyknʔ dyhb lhwn ʕbdy mwšʔ

13:12	klh mlkwth dʕwg dbmtnyn dʔmlk/wʔmlk#3#/ bʕstrwt wbʔrdʕy whw/whw#3#/ ʔštḥr mn šrkʔ/šrbtʔ#3#/ dgnbrʔ dqṭl ʔnwn mwšʔ wʔyrtw ʔrʕhwn

17:01	whwt glʕd mntʔ dšbṭʔ dmnšʔ mṭl dhwyw hwʔ bwkrh dywsp wlmkyr bwkrh dmnšʔ ʔbwhy dglʕd mṭl dhw hwʔ bwkrʔ gbrʔ qrbtnʔ whwt dylh glʕd wmtnyn

17:03	wlṣlpḥd br ḥpr br glʕd br mkyr br mnšʔ lʔ hww lh bnyʔ ʔlʔ ʔn bntʔ whlyn šmhʔ dbnth mḥlʔ wyʕʔ wḥglʔ wmlkʔ wtrṣʔ
17:04	wqrb qdm ʔlyʕzr khnʔ wqdm yšwʕ br`nwn wqdm rwrbnʔ dʔysryl wʔmrn mryʔ pqd lmwšʔ dntl ln yrtwtʔ bynt/byt#3#/ ʔḥyn wyhb ln ʕl mlt pwmh dmryʔ bynt ʔḥʔ dʔbwn whšʔ hb ln yrtwtʔ bynt ʔḥʔ dʔbhyn wyhb lhyn yšwʕ yrtwtʔ wplgwtʔ bynt ʔḥʔ dʔbwhyn

17:07	whwʔ/whnʔ#3#/ tḥwmʔ dbny mnšʔ mn tḥwmʔ dmʕkt dʔyt ʕl ymynʔ dytby ʕyn tpwḥ
17:08	whwt ʔrʕhwn btpwḥ/tpwḥ#3#/ wptḥ whwʔ tḥwmʔ lbny mnšʔ br ywsp wlbyt bny ʔprym
17:09	wnḥt tḥwmhwn lnḥlʔ dymʔ mn tymnʔ dnḥlʔ dqwryʔ hlyn dʔprym lbyt qwryʔ dmnšʔ wtḥwmʔ dmnšʔ mn grbyʔ dnḥlʔ whww mpqnwhy lmʕrbʔ
17:10	wtymnʔ lʔprym wgrbyʔ lmnšʔ wymʔ tḥwmhwn wbʔšyr pgʕyn mn grbyʔ wbʔyskr mn mdnḥʔ
17:11	whwt dmnšʔ lqwblh dʔyskr byt yšn wkprwnyh wnblʕm wkprwnyh wʕyn dwr wkprwnyh wtʕnk wkprwnyh wmgdw wkprwnyh tlt zwyn
17:12	wlʔ ḥrbw bny ʔysrʔyl lqwryʔ hlyn mṭl dʔṭpysw knʕnyʔ lmtb bqwryʔ hlyn
17:13	wkd ʕšnw bny ʔysrʔyl kbšw ʔnwn lknʕnyʔ bmdʔtʔ wmḥrb lʔ ḥrbw ʔnwn
17:14	wʔmrw bny ywsp lyšwʕ lmnʔ yhbt ln yrtwtʔ mntʔ ḥdʔ wḥblʔ ḥd wḥnn ʕmʔ ḥnn sgyʔʔ ʕdmʔ hw lhrkʔ brkn mryʔ
17:15	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔn ʕmʔ ʔntwn sgyʔʔ sqw lkwn lgbʔ dṭwrʔ wgbw lkwn tmn bʔrʕʔ dprzyʔ wdgnbrʔ mṭl dʔlyṣ hw lkwn ṭwrʔ dʔprym
17:16	wʔmrw bny ywsp lʔ spq ln ṭwrʔ wmdyntʔ dprzyʔ mṭl dknʕnyʔ ytbyn bʔrʕʔ dʕwmqʔ wbbyt yšn/wbyt yšn#3#/ wbkprwnyh wbʕwmqʔ dʔyzrʕyl
17:17	wʔmr yšwʕ lbyt ywsp lbny ʔprym wmnšʔ ʕmʔ sgyʔʔ ʔntwn wḥylʔ rbʔ ʔyt lkwn ʔlʔ spqʔ lkwn mntʔ ḥdʔ
17:18	gbw lkwn ṭwrʔ wspq lkwn wgbwhy dṭwrʔ nhwwn lkwn mpqnwhy wḥrwbw lknʕnyʔ wlprzyʔ mṭl dmrkbtʔ rwrbtʔ dʕšynn dprzlʔ ʔyt lhwn wʕšynyn ʔnwn
18:01	wʔtknšw klh knwštʔ dbny ʔysryl lšylw wʔšryw tmn mšknzbnʔ wʔrʕʔ ʔtkbšt qdmyhwn
18:02	wʔštḥrw mn bny ʔysryl dlʔ plgw yrtwthwn šbṭʔ šbʕʔ
18:03	wʔmr yšwʕ lbny ʔysryl ʕdmʔ lʔmty mtrpyn ʔntwn lmʕl lmʔrt ʔrʕʔ dyhb lkwn mryʔ \ʔlhʔ dʔbhykwn /ʔlhkwn#3#/
18:04	gbw lkwn tltʔ tltʔ gbryn mn šbṭʔ wʔšdr ʔnwn wnqwmwn wnhlkwn bʔrʕʔ wnktbwnh lpwt yrtwthwn wnʔtwn lwty
18:05	wnplgwnh lʔrʕʔ lšbʕ plgwn wyhwdʔ nqwm ʕl tḥwmh mn tymnʔ wdbyt ywsp nqwmwn ʕl tḥwmhwn mn grbyʔ
18:06	wʔntwn kwtbwh lʔrʕʔ lšbʕ plgwn wʔytʔwh lwty lhrkʔ wʔḥwykwn mntʔ dgbyʔ qdm mryʔ ʔlhn
18:07	mṭl dlyt plgwtʔ llwyʔ byntkwn mṭl dkhnwth hw/hy#3#/ dmryʔ yrtwthwn gd wrwbyl \wplgwt šbṭʔ /wplgh dšbṭʔ#3#/ dmnšʔ qblw yrtwthwn bʕbrʔ dywrdnn mn mdnḥʔ dyhb lhwn mwšʔ ʕbdh dmryʔ
18:08	wqmw gbrʔ wʔzlw wpqd yšwʕ lhnwn dʔzlw lmktbh lʔrʕʔ wʔmr lhwn zlw hlkw bʔrʕʔ wkwtbwh wtw lwty lhrkʔ wʔrmʔ lkwn mnwtʔ qdm mryʔ bšylw
18:09	wʔzlw gbrʔ wʕbrw bʔrʕʔ wktbw ʔnyn lqwryʔ šbʕ plgwn ʕl mgltʔ wʔtw lwt yšwʕ lšylw mdyntʔ
18:10	wʔrmy lhwn pṣʔ bšylw qdm mryʔ wplgh tmn yšwʕ lʔrʕʔ lbny ʔysryl bplgwtʔ/lšbṭyhwn#3#/
18:11	wslqt pṣtʔ dšbṭʔ dbny bnymyn lšrbthwn wnpq tḥwmʔ dyrtwthwn lbyt bny yhwdʔ wlbyt bny ywsp
18:12	whwʔ tḥwmhwn lsṭrʔ dgrbyʔ mn ywrdnn wslq tḥwmʔ lsṭrʔ dʔyryḥw mn grbyʔ wslq bṭwrʔ lmʕrbʔ whwyn mpqnwhy lmdbrʔ dbyt ʔwn
18:13	wʕbr mn tmn tḥwmʔ llwz ʕl sṭrʔ dlwz mn tymnʔ hy/dhy#3#/ hy byt ʔyl wnḥt tḥwmʔ lʕṭrwt ʔdr ʕl ṭwrʔ dmn tymnʔ dbyt ḥwrn tḥtytʔ
18:14	wḥʔr tḥwmʔ lsṭrʔ dymʔ mn tymnʔ mn ṭwrʔ dlʔpy byt ḥwrn btymnʔ whwyn mpqnwhy ʕl qwryt bʕl dhy hy qwryt nʕryn mdyntʔ dbny/dbyt#3#/ yhwdʔ hnʔ hw sṭrʔ dymʔ
18:15	wsṭrʔ dtymnʔ mn swpʔ dqwryt nʕryn wnpq tḥwmʔ lymʔ wnpq lmbwʕʔ dmyʔ dnptly
18:16	wnḥt tḥwmʔ \ʕl swph /lswph#2# /ʕl sṭrʔ#3#/ dṭwrʔ lʔpy/dlʔpy#3#/ nḥlʔ dbr`hnwm dʔyt bʕwmqʔ dgnbrʔ dmn/mn#3#/ grbyʔ wnḥt tḥwmʔ dbr`hnwm ʕl sṭrʔ dybwsyʔ mn tymnʔ wnḥt lʕyn dwgl
18:17	wḥʔr mn grbyʔ wnpq lmbwʕʔ dšmš wnpq ʕl glylʔ dlwqbl msqnʔ drmyn wnḥt llbn/llbnn#2#/ wlbhn dbrh drwbyl
18:18	wʕbr ʕl sṭrʔ dlwqbl pqʕtʔ mn grbyʔ wnḥt lpqʕtʔ
18:19	wʕbr tḥwmʔ ʕl sṭrʔ dbyt ḥglʔ mn/dmn#23#/ grbyʔ whwyn mpqnwhy dtḥwmʔ ʕl lšnʔ dymʔ dmlḥʔ mn grbyʔ wʕl sprwhy dywrdnn mn tymnʔ hnʔ hw tḥwmʔ dtymnʔ
18:20	wdywrdnn btḥwmwhy lsṭrʔ dmdnḥʔ hdʔ hy yrtwtʔ <dšbṭʔ#23#> dbny bnymyn btḥwmyh kd ḥdrʔ lšrbthwn
18:21	whwy qwryʔ dšbṭʔ dbny bnymyn lšrbthwn ʔyryḥw wzbyt wḥglʔ wʕmq wqṣṣ/wqṣyn#2#/
18:22	wbyt ʕrbʔ wṣmrym wbyt ʔyl

18:26	wmṣpʔ wkpyrʔ wmṣʔ

18:28	wṣlʕ wgbyrʔ/dgnbrʔ#3#/ wybws dhy hy ʔwršlm wgbʕt wqwrytym qwryʔ ʔrbʕsrʔ wʔgwrsyhyn hdʔ hy yrtwtʔ dšbṭʔ dbny bnymyn lšrbthwn
19:01	wnpqt pṣtʔ dtrtyn lšbṭʔ/dšbṭʔ#3#/ dbny šmʕwn lšrbthwn whwt yrtwthwn bgw yrtwtʔ dbny yhwdʔ

19:05	wṣnqlg wbyt mrkbwt wḥṣr swsʔ

19:08	wklhwn ʔgwrsʔ dḥdyryn lhyn lqwryʔ hlyn ʕdmʔ lbʕt byt rmtʔ dbtymnʔ hdʔ hy yrtwtʔ dšbṭʔ dbny/dbyt#3#/ šmʕwn lšrbthwn
19:09	mn ḥblʔ dbny yhwdʔ hwt yrtwtʔ dbny šmʕwn mṭl dsgyʔʔ hwt plgwthwn dbny yhwdʔ dʔwyrtw bny šmʕwn mn yrtwthwn
19:10	wslqt/wnpqt#3#/ pṣtʔ dtlt lbny/dbny#3#/ zblwn lšrbthwn whwʔ tḥwmʔ dyrtwthwn ʕdmʔ lʔšdwd

19:13	wmn tmn ʕbr qdmyt mn mdnḥʔ lgt wlḥpr wlʕtʔ wlqṣyn wnpq lrmwn wlmtwʔ wlʕwʔ
19:14	wḥdr lh tḥwmʔ mn grbyʔ dḥdytwn whwyn mpqnwhy lnḥlʔ dkptnʔyl/dkptʔyl#2#/

19:29	whpk tḥwmʔ lrmtʔ wʕdmʔ lṣwr mdyntʔ ʕšyntʔ whpk tḥwmʔ lḥs whwyn mpqnwhy <lʕrbʔ#3#> lmʕrbʔ mn nḥlʔ dyrb
19:30	wʕwmqʔ wʔpq wrḥwb qwryʔ ʕsryn wtrtyn wʔgwrsyhyn

19:32	wnpqt pṣtʔ dšt dbny nptly lšrbthwn <qwryʔ hlyn#3#>
19:33	whwʔ tḥwmhwn mn ḥlpʔ wmn ʔlwn wmn ṣnʕm wʔdmʔ wnqb wnbʔyl ʕdmʔ llqwm whwʔ mpqnhyn lywrdnn
19:34	whpk tḥwmʔ lmʕrbʔ lʔznwtbwz wnpq mn tmn lḥqyq wpgʕ bzblwn mn tymnʔ wbʔšyr pgʕ mn mʕrbʔ wbyhwdʔ bywrdnn mn mdnḥy šmšʔ
19:35	wbmdyntʔ/wʔp bmdyntʔ#3#/ rwrbtʔ bṣwr wbṣydn wbḥmt/wbḥmty#2#/ wqryt wknrt

19:37	wqdš wʔrdʕy wʕyn ṣwr

19:40	wnpqt pṣtʔ dšbʕ/dšbṭʔ#3#/ dbny dn lšrbthwn
