19:47	wnpq tḥwmʔ dbnwhy ddn mnhwn slqw bny dn wʕbdw qrbʔ ʕm ʔnšʔ dʔynw wkbšwh wḥrbwh bpwmʔ dsypʔ wyrtwh wʔytbw bh wqrʔwh lʔynw dn ʕl šm dn ʔbwhwn
19:48	hdʔ hy yrtwtʔ dšbṭʔ \dbny dn /ddn#3#/ lšrbthwn mdyntʔ hlyn wqwryʔ wʔgwrsyhyn
19:49	wšlmw/wgmrw#3#/ lmʔrth lʔrʕʔ btḥwmyh wyhbw bny ʔysrʔyl yrtwtʔ lyšwʕ br`nwn bynthwn
19:50	ʕl mlt pwmh dmryʔ yhbw lh qrytʔ dšʔl ltmntsrḥ dbṭwrʔ dʔprym wbnh lqrytʔ wʔytb bh
19:51	hlyn yrtwtʔ dʔwrt ʔlyʕzr khnʔ wyšwʕ br`nwn wršʔ dʔbhtʔ \dšbṭʔ dʔysryl /dbny ʔysryl#3#/ bpṣʔ bšylw qdm mryʔ btrʕʔ dmškn zbnʔ wšlmw/wgmrw#3#/ lmplgwth lʔrʕʔ
20:01	wʔmr mryʔ lyšwʕ
20:02	ʔmr lbny ʔysryl šbwqw lkwn qwryʔ lmšwzbwtʔ ʔyknʔ dʔmrt lkwn bʔydʔ dʕbdy mwšʔ
20:03	<mṭl#3#> dnʕrwq ltmn qṭwlʔ ʔynʔ dnqṭwl npšʔ mn šlyʔ kd lʔ ydʕ wnhwyn lkwn lmšwzbwtʔ mn tbʕ ʕyrtʔ ddmʔ
20:04	wnʕrwq lḥdʔ mn hlyn qwryʔ wnqwm bmʕlnʔ dtrʕʔ dqrytʔ wnmll qdm qšyšʔ dqrytʔ hy wnʔmr mlwhy wnḥmlwnh lwthwn bqrytʔ wntlwn lh dwktʔ lmʕmr ʕmhwn
20:05	kd nrdwp tbʕ ʕyrtʔ ddmʔ btrh wlʔ nšlmwnh bʔydwhy lqṭwlʔ/dqṭwlʔ#3#/ mṭl dkd lʔ ydʕ <hwʔ#3#> mḥyhy lḥbrh wlʔ snʔ hwʔ lh mn qdm ywmtʔ
20:06	wntb bqrytʔ hy ʕdmʔ dqʔm qdm knwštʔ bdynʔ ʕdmʔ dnmwt khnʔ rbʔ dnhwʔ bywmtʔ hnwn whydyn nhpwk qṭwlʔ wnʔtʔ lbyth wlqryth wlmdyntʔ dʕrq mnh
20:07	hydyn pršw qwryʔ hlyn lbyt gwsʔ lrqm dbglylʔ dbṭwrʔ dnptly wlškym dbṭwrʔ dʔprym wlqwryt ʔrbʕ dhy hy ḥbrwn dbṭwrʔ dyhwdʔ
20:08	wbʕbrʔ dywrdnn dʔyryḥw mn mdnḥʔ yhbw bwṣr dbmdbrʔ dytbʔ bpqʕtʔ mn šbṭʔ drwbyl wrmt glʕd mn šbṭʔ dgd wgwln dbmtnyn mn šbṭʔ dmnšʔ
20:09	hlyn ʔnyn qwryʔ dšwwzbʔ wdbyt gwsʔ lklhwn bny ʔysryl wlʕmwrʔ dʕmryn bynthwn dnhwʔ ʕrq ltmn kl mn dqṭl npšʔ mn šlyʔ dlʔ/wlʔ#3#/ nštlm bʔydʔ dtbʕ ʕyrtʔ ddmʔ ʕdmʔ dnqwm qdm knwštʔ bdynʔ
21:01	wqrbw ryšʔ dkhnʔ wlwyʔ lwt ʔlyʕzr khnʔ wlwt yšwʕ br`nwn wlwt ryšʔ dʔbhtʔ dšbṭʔ dʔysryl/dbny ʔysryl#3#/
21:02	wʔmrw lhwn bšylw bʔrʕʔ dknʕn mryʔ pqd bʔydʔ dmwšʔ dntlwn ln qwryʔ lmʕmr bhyn wʔgwrsyhyn lbʕyrn
21:03	wyhbw bny ʔysrʔyl llwyʔ mn yrtwthwn ʕl mlt pwmh dmryʔ qwryʔ hlyn wʔgwrsyhyn
21:04	wnpqt pṣtʔ dšrbtʔ dqht wbny ʔhrwn khnʔ mn lwyʔ wyhbw lhwn mn šbṭʔ dyhwdʔ wmn šbṭʔ dšmʕwn wmn šbṭʔ dbnymyn bpṣtʔ qwryʔ tltʕsrʔ
21:05	wlbnwhy dqht dʔštḥrw yhbw lhwn mn šbṭʔ dʔprym wmn šbṭʔ ddn wmn \plgh dšbṭʔ /plgwt šbṭʔ#2#/ dmnšʔ qwryʔ ʕsr
21:06	wlbnwhy dgršwn yhbw lhwn mn šbṭʔ/šrbtʔ#3#/ dʔyskr wmn šbṭʔ dʔšyr wmn šbṭʔ dnptly wmn plgh dšbṭʔ dmnšʔ bmtnyn/dbmtnyn#3#/ bpṣtʔ qwryʔ tltʕsrʔ
21:07	wlbnwhy dmrry lšrbthwn yhbw lhwn mn šbṭʔ drwbyl wmn šbṭʔ dgd wmn šbṭʔ dzblwn qwryʔ trtʕsrʔ/tltʕsrʔ#23#/
21:08	wyhbw bny ʔysryl llwyʔ qwryʔ hlyn wʔgwrsyhyn bpṣʔ ʔyknʔ dpqd mryʔ lmwšʔ
21:09	whlyn šmhʔ dqwryʔ dyhbw <lhwn#3#> mn šbṭʔ dyhwdʔ wmn šbṭʔ dšmʕwn qwryʔ bšmhyhyn/wšmhyhyn#3#/
21:10	whwy lbnwhy dʔhrwn mn šrbtʔ dqht mn bnwhy dlwy mṭl ddylhwn hwt pṣtʔ qdmytʔ
21:11	wyhbw lhwn lqwryt ʔrbʕ/qwryt ʔrbʕ#2#/ dʔbwhwn dgnbrʔ dhy hy ḥbrwn dbṭwrʔ dyhwdʔ wlʔgwrsyh/wʔgwrsyh#2#/ kd ḥdryn lh
21:12	wlḥqlth dqrytʔ wlšrkʔ dʔgwrsyh yhbw lklb br ywpnʔ byrtwth
21:13	wlbny ʔhrwn khnʔ yhbw qrytʔ dmšwzbʔ mn qṭylʔ/qṭwlʔ#3#/ lḥbrwn wlʔgwrsyh wllbnʔ wlʔgwrsyh
21:14	wlyrt wlʔgwrsyh wlʔštmwʕ wlʔgwrsyh
21:15	wlḥlw wlʔgwrsyh wldbyr wlʔgwrsyh
21:16	wlʕyn wlʔgwrsyh wlʕṭʔ wlʔgwrsyh wlbyt šmš wlʔgwrsyh qwryʔ tšʕ mn šbṭʔ dyhwdʔ wdšmʕwn
21:17	wmn šbṭʔ dbnymyn gbʕwn wʔgwrsyh wgbʕ wʔgwrsyh
21:18	wʕntwt wʔgwrsyh wʕlmwn wʔgwrsyh mdyntʔ ʔrbʕ
21:19	klhyn qwryʔ dbny ʔhrwn khnʔ tltʕsrʔ <qwryʔ#3#> wʔgwrsyhyn
21:20	wlšrbtʔ dlwyʔ dbny qht dʔštḥrw mn bny qht hwy qwryʔ dpṣyhwn mn šbṭʔ dʔprym
21:21	wyhbw lhwn qrytʔ dbyt mšwzbwtʔ/šwwzbʔ#3#/ dqṭwlʔ lškym dbṭwrʔ dʔprym wlʔgwrsyh wlgdr wlʔgwrsyh
21:22	wlqbṣym wlʔgwrsyh wlbytr ḥwrn wlʔgwrsyh/wʔgwrsyh#3#/ qwryʔ ʔrbʕ wʔgwrsyhyn
21:23	wmn šbṭʔ ddn ʔtlqʔ wʔgwrsyh wgbtwn wʔgwrsyh
21:24	wʔlwn wʔgwrsyh wgtrmwn wʔgwrsyh qwryʔ ʔrbʕ wʔgwrsyhyn
21:25	wmn \plgh dšbṭʔ /plgwt šbṭʔ#3#/ dmnšʔ tʕnk wʔgwrsyh wgtrmwn wʔgwrsyh qwryʔ trtyn wʔgwrsyhyn
21:26	klhyn qwryʔ wmdyntʔ ʕsr wʔgwrsyhyn hwy lšrbtʔ dbnwhy dqht dʔštḥrw
21:27	wlbnwhy dgršwn mn šrbtʔ dlwyʔ hwy qwryhwn mn plgh dšbṭʔ dmnšʔ mn qrytʔ dbyt šwwzbʔ dqṭwlʔ gwln dbmtnyn wʔgwrsyh wʕstrwt wʔgwrsyh qwryʔ trtyn wʔgwrsyhyn
21:28	mn šbṭʔ dʔyskr qšyn wʔgwrsyh wrbt wʔgwrsyh
21:29	wyrmwt/wʔyrmwt#2#/ wʔgwrsyh wʕyn gd wʔgwrsyh qwryʔ ʔrbʕ wʔgwrsyhyn
21:30	wmn šbṭʔ dʔšyr mšʔyl wʔgwrsyh wʕkrwn wʔgwrsyh
21:31	wḥlqwt/wḥlqt#2#/ wʔgwrsyh wrḥwb wʔgwrsyh qwryʔ ʔrbʕ wʔgwrsyhyn
21:32	wmn šbṭʔ dnptly qrytʔ dbyt šwwzbʔ dqṭwlʔ rqm dbglylʔ wʔgwrsyh wḥmrwd wʔgwrsyh wqrtn wʔgwrsyh qwryʔ tlt wʔgwrsyhyn
21:33	klhyn qwryʔ dšrbtʔ dbny gršwn qwryʔ tltʕsrʔ wʔgwrsyhyn
21:34	wlšrbtʔ dbny mrry llwyʔ dʔštḥrw
21:36	hwy/mn#3#/ qwryhwn mn šbṭʔ drwbyl yhṣ wʔgwrsyh
21:37	wqrmwt wʔgwrsyh wqrytym wʔgwrsyh wʔḥšmwt wʔgwrsyh qwryʔ ʔrbʕ wʔgwrsyhyn
21:35	wrmn wʔgwrsyh wyhlʔ wʔgwrsyh qwryʔ ʔrbʕ wʔgwrsyhyn
21:38	wmn šbṭʔ dgd qrytʔ dšwwzbʔ/dbyt šwwzbʔ#3#/ dqṭwlʔ rmt glʕd wʔgwrsyh wmḥnym wʔgwrsyh
21:39	wḥšbwn wʔgwrsyh wyʕzyr wʔgwrsyh qwryʔ ʔrbʕ wʔgwrsyhyn
21:40	hlyn qwryʔ dbny mrry lšrbthwn dʔštḥrw mn šrbtʔ dlwyʔ wslq bpṣthwn qwryʔ trtʕsrʔ wʔgwrsyhyn
21:41	wklhyn qwryʔ hlyn dlwyʔ bgw yrtwtʔ ʔnyn dbny ʔysryl whwy qwryʔ dlwyʔ ʔrbʕyn wtmnʔ wʔgwrsyhyn
21:42	ytbn hwy dyn qwryʔ wmdyntʔ hlyn qrytʔ qrytʔ wʔgwrsyhyn ḥdyryn/ḥdryn#3#/ lhyn wklhyn qwryʔ hlyn wmdyntʔ hknʔ
21:43	wyhb mryʔ lʔysryl klh ʔrʕʔ dʔymʔ lmtl lʔbhyhwn wyrtwh wʔytbw bh
21:44	wʔnyḥ lhwn mryʔ mn klhwn ḥdryhwn/dḥdryhwn#3#/ ʔyk dʔymʔ lʔbhyhwn wʔnš mn bʕldbbyhwn lʔ qm qdmyhwn ʔlʔ ʔšlm ʔnwn mryʔ lklhwn bʕldbbyhwn bʔydyhwn
21:45	wlʔ bṭlt ḥdʔ mn klhyn mlʔ ṭbtʔ dʔmr mryʔ ldbyt ʔysryl ʔlʔ klhyn hwy
22:01	hydyn qrʔ yšwʕ lbny rwbyl wlbny gd wlplgh dšbṭʔ dmnšʔ
22:02	wʔmr lhwn ʔntwn nṭrtwn kl mdm \dʔmr lkwn /dpqdkwn#3#/ mwšʔ ʕbdh dmryʔ wšmʕtwn bqly/lqly#3#/ lkl/kl#3#/ mdm dpqdtkwn
22:03	wlʔ šbqtwn lʔḥykwn hʔ ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ wnṭrtwn pwqdnwhy dmryʔ ʔlhkwn
22:04	whšʔ hʔ ʔnyḥ mryʔ ʔlhʔ lʔḥykwn ʔyknʔ dʔmr lhwn mkyl ʔtpnw wzlw lqwrykwn wlʔrʕʔ dyrtwtkwn/dyrttwn#3#/ dyhb lkwn mwšʔ ʕbdh dmryʔ bʕbrʔ dywrdnn mn mdnḥʔ
22:05	blḥwd dyn ʔzdhrw ṭb <wṭrw#3#> wʕbdw pwqdnʔ wnmwsʔ/wlnmwsʔ#3#/ dpqdkwn mwšʔ ʕbdh dmryʔ lmrḥm lmryʔ ʔlhkwn wlmṭr pwqdnwhy wlmtnqpw lh wlmplḥh bklh lbkwn wbklh npškwn
22:06	wbrk ʔnwn yšwʕ wšdr ʔnwn wʔzlw lqwryhwn
22:07	wlplgh dšbṭʔ dmnšʔ yhb mwšʔ bmtnyn wlplgh yhb yšwʕ ʕm ʔḥyhwn bʕbrʔ dywrdnn mn mʕrbʔ wšdr ʔnwn yšwʕ wʔzlw lqwryhwn wbrk ʔnwn
22:08	wʔmr lhwn bnksʔ sgyʔʔ hpwkw lqwrykwn wlʔrʕʔ dyrtwtkwn wbqnynʔ dṭb sgy bsʔmʔ wbdhbʔ wbnḥšʔ wbprzlʔ/wprzlʔ#3#/ wbnḥtʔ dsgyʔyn ṭb wplgw bztʔ dbʕldbbykwn ʕm ʔḥykwn
22:09	whpkw wʔzlw bny rwbyl wbny gd wplgh dšbṭʔ dmnšʔ mn lwt bny ʔysryl mn šylw dbʔrʕʔ/bʔrʕʔ#3#/ dknʕn lmʔzl lʔrʕʔ dglʕd lʔrʕʔ dyrtwthwn dʔyrtw bh ʕl mlt pwmh dmryʔ bʔydʔ dmwšʔ
22:10	wʔtw lglglʔ dʕl gnb ywrdnn dbʔrʕʔ dknʕn wbnw tmn bny rwbyl wbny gd \wplgwt šbṭʔ /wplgh dšbṭʔ#3#/ dmnšʔ mdbḥʔ ʕl gnb ywrdnn mdbḥʔ rbʔ dḥzwʔ
22:11	wšmʕw bny ʔysryl dbny rwbyl wbny gd wplgwt šbṭʔ dmnšʔ bnw mdbḥʔ lwqbl ʔrʕʔ dknʕn bglglʔ dʕl gnb ywrdnn bʔrʕʔ dbny ʔysryl
22:12	<wšmʕw bny ʔysryl#3#> wʔtknšw kwlh knwštʔ \dbny ʔysryl /dʔysryl#3#/ lšylw lmsq ʕlyhwn lqrbʔ
22:13	wšdrw bny ʔysryl lwt bny rwbyl wlwt bny gd wlwt plgh dšbṭʔ dmnšʔ lʔrʕʔ dglʕd lpynḥs br ʔlyʕzr khnʔ
22:14	wʕsrʔ rwrbnyn ʕmh ḥd ḥd rbʔ mn klhwn šbṭʔ ʔysryl whnwn/whnwn#2#/ gbrʔ hlyn ryšʔ hww dḥylwtʔ dʔysryl
22:15	wʔtw lwt bny rwbyl wlwt bny gd wlwt plgh dšbṭʔ dmnšʔ lʔrʕʔ dglʕd wmllw ʕmhwn wʔmrw lhwn
22:16	hknʔ ʔmryn klh knwštʔ dmryʔ mnʔ hy kdbwtʔ hdʔ dkdbtwn bʔlhʔ dʔysryl whpktwn mn btrh dmryʔ wbnytwn lkwn mdbḥʔ dtprqwn/dttprqwn#3#/ mn dḥlth dmryʔ
22:17	lʔ kdw ln ḥṭytʔ dpʕwr dlʔ ʔtdkyn mnh ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ whwʔ mwtnʔ bknwšth dmryʔ
22:18	wʔntwn mʔ dhpktwn ywmnʔ mn dḥlth dmryʔ mn mḥr ʕl kwlh knwštʔ dʔysryl hwʔ rwgzʔ
22:19	brm dyn ʔn mṭwšʔ hy ʔrʕʔ dyrtwtkwn ʕbrw lkwn lʔrʕʔ dyrtwth dmryʔ ʔykʔ dšrʔ mšknh dmryʔ wʔyrtw ʕmn wbdḥlth dmryʔ lʔ tbswn wʕlyn lʔ tmrdwn mṭl dbnytwn lkwn mdbḥʔ lbr mn mdbḥh dmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl
22:20	lʔ ḥzytwn dʕkr br krmy/zrḥ#3#/ drg/ddrg#3#/ hwʔ wnsb mn ḥrmʔ wʕl klh <hw#3#> knwštʔ dʔysryl hwʔ rwgzʔ whw/whw#3#/ ḥd hwʔ gbr wkln blʕn bḥṭyth
22:21	wʕnw bny rwbyl wbny gd wplgh dšbṭʔ dmnšʔ wmllw ʕm pynḥys br ʔlyʕzr khnʔ wʕm ryšʔ dḥylwtʔ dʔysryl wʔmrw lhwn
22:22	mryʔ hw ʔlhʔ dʔlhʔ ʔlh ʔlhyn mryʔ hw/hwyw#2#/ whwyw ʔlhn wlʔysryl hw ydʕ wln hw ydʕ ʔn dnprwq mnh wʔn/ʔw#3#/ dnʕlʔ/dnklʔ#3#/ hw bdḥlth dmryʔ ʕbdn hknʔ <wʔlʔ#3#> lʔ nprqn ywmnʔ
22:23	ʔn bnyn ln mdbḥʔ dnhpwk mn dḥlth dmryʔ ʔw dnqrb ʕlwhy dbḥtʔ \ʔw pwlḥn /lpwlḥn#3#/ ʔḥryn mryʔ ntbʕ bʔydn
22:24	ʔlʔ hwʔ mn dḥlth ʕbdnh hdʔ wdlʔ nʔmrwn mn mḥr bnykwn lbnyn mnʔ ʔyt lkwn lwt mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl
22:25	bny rwbyl wbny gd dhʔ tḥwmʔ yhb mryʔ bynyn wlkwn ywrdnn hnʔ mkyl lyt lkwn mntʔ bmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl wnbṭlwn bnykwn mn mḥr lbnyn dlʔ ndḥlwn lmryʔ
22:26	mṭl hnʔ hw ʔmrn dnʕbd ln ʔtrʔ wnbnʔ ln mdbḥʔ lʔ ldbḥtʔ wlʔ lqwrbnʔ
22:27	ʔlʔ <ʔn#3#> lshdwtʔ bynyn wlkwn wbyt dryn mn btrn wḥnn wdryn/wʔḥyn#3#/ mn btrn pwlḥnh hw dmryʔ plḥynn qdmwhy bʕlwtn wbdbḥyn wbqwrbnyn bʔtrʔ dgbʔ mryʔ lmšryw šmh tmn wdlʔ/wlʔ#23#/ nʔmrwn bnykwn mn mḥr lbnyn lyt lkwn mntʔ bmryʔ
22:28	wʔmrn mʔ dʔmrw ln wldryn mn mḥr/btrn#3#/ nʔmrwn lhwn ḥzw dmwtʔ dmdbḥh dmryʔ dʕbdw <ln#3#> ʔbhyn lʔ lyqdʔ šlmʔ wlʔ ldbḥtʔ ʔlʔ dnhwʔ shdʔ bynyn wlkwn
22:29	ḥs ln dnslʔ dḥlth dmryʔ/dʔlhʔ#3#/ wnhpwk mn dḥlth dmryʔ wnbnʔ ln mdbḥʔ lyqdʔ šlmʔ wlqwrbnʔ wldbḥtʔ lbr mn mdbḥh dmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl dʔyt qdm mšknh
22:30	wšmʕ pynḥys br ʔlyʕzr khnʔ wrwrbnʔ dknwštʔ ryšʔ dḥylwtʔ dʔysrʔyl dʕmh mlʔ dmllw bny rwbyl wbny gd wplgh dšbṭʔ dmnšʔ wšpr bʕynyhwn
22:31	wʔmr pynḥys br ʔlyʕzr khnʔ lbny rwbyl wlbny gd \wlbny mnšʔ /wlplgh dšbṭʔ dmnšʔ#3#/ ywmnʔ ʔydʕn dbyntn hw mryʔ dlʔ dgltwn bmryʔ dglwtʔ hdʔ mkyl ʔntwn pṣytwn lbny ʔysryl dlʔ thwʔ bhwn ʔydh dmryʔ lrwgzʔ
22:32	whpk pynḥys br ʔlyʕzr khnʔ wrwrbnʔ dʕmh mn lwt bny rwbyl wmn lwt bny gd wmnšʔ mn ʔrʕʔ dglʕd lʔrʕʔ dknʕn lwt bny ʔysryl wʔtybw ʔnwn ptgmʔ
22:33	wšpr ptgmʔ bʕyny bny ʔysryl wbrkw bny ʔysryl lʔlhʔ wlʔ ʔmrw dnsqwn ʕlyhwn lqrbʔ lmḥrbwth lʔrʕʔ dbny rwbyl wdbny gd wdbny/wbny#3#/ mnšʔ dytbyn bh
22:34	wqrw bny rwbyl wbny gd wbny mnšʔ lmdbḥʔ dʕbdw mdbḥʔ dshdwtʔ mṭl dshdwtʔ hw bynthwn wmryʔ hw blḥwd ʔlhʔ
23:01	wmn btr ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ ʔnyḥ mryʔ lʔysryl mn klhwn bʕldbbyhwn dkrykyn lhwn wyšwʕ qš wʕl bšnyʔ
23:02	wqrʔ yšwʕ lklh ʔysryl lqšyšwhy wlryšwhy wldynwhy wlsprwhy wʔmr lhwn ʔnʔ sʔbt wʕlt bšnyʔ
23:03	wʔntwn ḥzytwn kl <mdm#3#> dʕbd mryʔ ʔlhkwn lklhwn ʕmmʔ hlyn dʔwbd/wʔwbd#3#/ ʔnwn mn qdmykwn wmryʔ ʔlhkwn hwyw ʕbd qrbkwn
23:04	ḥzw dyn dlʔ plgt lkwn ʕmmʔ hlyn dʔštḥrw byrtwtʔ dšbṭykwn mn ywrdnn wklhwn ʕmmʔ dḥrbt wymʔ rbʔ bmʕrby/dʕl mʕrby#3#/ šmšʔ plgt lkwn
23:05	mryʔ ʔlhkwn hw ntbr ʔnwn wnḥrwb ʔnwn mn qdmykwn wtʔrtwn ʔrʕhwn ʔyk dʔmr lkwn mryʔ ʔlhkwn
23:06	blḥwd ʔtḥylw ṭb wṭrw wʕbdw kl dktyb \bsprʔ dnmwsʔ /bnmwsh#3#/ dmwšʔ ʕbdh dmryʔ wlʔ tsṭwn mnh lʔ lymynʔ wlʔ lsmlʔ
23:07	wlʔ ttḥlṭwn bʕmmʔ hlyn dʔštḥrw byntkwn wšmʔ dʔlhyhwn lʔ ttdkrwn wlʔ tʔmwn bhwn wlʔ tplḥwn ʔnwn wlʔ tsgdwn lhwn
23:08	ʔlʔ lmryʔ ʔlhkwn ʔtnqpw ʔyknʔ dʕbdtwn ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
23:09	wḥrb mryʔ mn qdmykwn ʕmmʔ rwrbʔ wʕšynʔ wʔnš lʔ qm lwqblkwn ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
23:10	gbrʔ ḥd mnkwn nrdwp lʔlpʔ/ʔlp#3#/ mṭl dmryʔ ʔlhkwn ʕmkwn whw ʕbd qrbkwn ʔyknʔ dʔmr lkwn
23:11	ʔzdhrw ṭb bnpškwn lmdḥl/lmplḥ#3#/ lmryʔ ʔlhkwn
23:12	ʔn dyn thpkwn wttnqpwn bšrkʔ/lšrkʔ#3#/ dhlyn ʕmmʔ dʔštḥrw byntkwn wthwwn lhwn ḥtnʔ wttḥlṭwn bhwn whnwn bkwn
23:13	hwytwn ydʕyn dtwb lʔ mwsp mryʔ ʔlhkwn lmḥrb lhlyn/hlyn#3#/ ʕmmʔ mn qdmykwn wnhwwn lkwn lpḥʔ wltwqltʔ wlwlytʔ bṣdʕykwn wṣnrytʔ bʕynykwn ʕdmʔ dtʔbdwn mn ʔrʕʔ ṭbtʔ dyhb lkwn mryʔ ʔlhkwn
23:14	ʔnʔ dyn hʔ ʔzl ʔnʔ bʔwrḥʔ dklh ʔrʕʔ ʔntwn dyn ydʕyn ʔntwn bklh lbkwn wbkwlh npškwn dlʔ bṭlt mltʔ hdʔ mn klhyn mlʔ ṭbtʔ dʔmr mryʔ ʔlhkwn ʕlykwn <ʔlʔ#3#> klhyn ʔty ʕlykwn wlʔ bṭlt mltʔ ḥdʔ
23:15	wʔyknʔ dyn dʔty ʕlykwn klhyn mlʔ ṭbtʔ dʔmr lkwn mryʔ ʔlhkwn hknʔ nʔtyn ʕlykwn klhyn lwṭtʔ ʕdmʔ dnwbdkwn mn ʔrʕʔ hdʔ ṭbtʔ dyhb lkwn
23:16	ʔn <dyn#3#> tʕbrwn ʕl dytqʔ dmryʔ ʔlhkwn wʕl pwqdnʔ dʔtpqdtwn wtʔzlwn wtplḥwn lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ wtsgdwn lhwn ntḥmt rwgzh dmryʔ ʔlhkwn ʕlykwn wtʔbdwn bʕgl mn ʔrʕʔ ṭbtʔ dyhb lkwn
24:01	wknš yšwʕ lklhwn šbṭʔ dʔysryl lškym wqrʔ lqšyšʔ dʔysryl wlryšyhwn wldynyhwn wlspryhwn wqm qdm mšknzbnʔ qdm ʔlhʔ
24:02	wʔmr yšwʕ lklh ʕmʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl bʕbrʔ dnhrʔ ytbw hww ʔbhykwn mn ʕlm trḥ ʔbwhy dʔbrhm wʔbwhy dnḥwr wplḥyn hww tmn ʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ
24:03	wdbrt lʔbrhm ʔbwkwn mn ʕbrʔ dnhrʔ whlkth bklh ʔrʕʔ dknʕn wʔsgyt zrʕh wyhbt lh lʔysḥq
24:04	wyhbt lʔysḥq lyʕqwb wlʕysw wyhbt lʕsw ywrtnʔ/lywrtnʔ#3#/yrtwtʔ#3#/ ṭwrʔ/lṭwrʔ#3#/ dsʕyr wyʕqwb wbnwhy nḥtw lmṣryn
24:05	wšdrt lmwšʔ wlʔhrwn wmḥyt lmṣryʔ wtdmrtʔ ʕbdt bynthwn wmn btr hydyn ʔpqtkwn
24:06	wʔpqt lʔbhykwn mn mṣryn wʔytyt ʔnwn lymʔ wrdpw mṣryʔ btr ʔbhykwn bqrwkʔ wbpršʔ lymʔ dswp
24:07	wgʕw ʔbhykwn lwt/qdm#2#/ mryʔ wʕbd ḥšwkʔ bynyhwn/bynthwn#3#/ lmṣryʔ wplg mryʔ \ymʔ /lymʔ#3# /myʔ#2#/ dswp wʔʕbr lʔbhykwn bgwh wʔytyh lymʔ ʕl mṣryʔ wksy/wḥpy#3#/ ʔnwn wḥzy ʕynykwn mdm dʕbdt lmṣryʔ wʔytytkwn lmdbrʔ wʔytbtwn bmdbrʔ ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ
24:08	wʔtytkwn/wʔytykwn#3#/ lʔrʕʔ dʔmwryʔ dytbyn bʕbrʔ dywrdnn wʔtktšw ʕmkwn wʔšlmt ʔnwn bʔydykwn wʔwbdt ʔnwn mn qdmykwn wʔyrttwn ʔrʕhwn
24:09	wqm btq br ṣpwr mlkʔ dmwʔbyʔ wʔtktš ʕm ʔysryl wšdr qrʔ lblʕm br bʕwr lmlṭkwn
24:10	wlʔ ṣbyt lmšmʕh lblʕm <br bʕwr#3#> wmbrkw brktkwn wpṣytkwn mn ʔydwhy
24:11	wʕbrtwn ywrdnn wʔtytwn lʔyryḥw wʔtktšw ʕmkwn gbrʔ dʔyryḥw wʔmwryʔ wknʕnyʔ wprzyʔ wḥtyʔ wgrgwsyʔ wḥwyʔ wybwsyʔ wʔšlmt ʔnwn bʔydykwn
24:12	wšdrt qdmykwn dbwrytʔ wʔwbdt mn qdmykwn tryn mlkyhwn dʔmwryʔ lʔ bsypykwn ʔplʔ bqšttkwn
24:13	wyhbt lkwn ʔrʕʔ dlʔ lʔytwn bh wqwryʔ dlʔ bnytwn wʔytbtwn bhyn wkrmʔ wzytʔ dlʔ nṣbtwn hʔ ʔklyn ʔntwn
24:14	mkyl dḥlw mn mryʔ wpwlḥwhy btmymwtʔ wbqwštʔ wʔʕbrw mn lbkwn ʔlhʔ nwkryʔ dplḥw ʔbhykwn bʕbrʔ dnhrʔ wbmṣryn wʔntwn plwḥw lmryʔ
24:15	wʔn byš hw bʕynykwn lmplḥ lmryʔ gbw lkwn ywmnʔ lmn plḥyn ʔntwn ʔn lʔlhʔ dplḥw ʔbhykwn bʕbrʔ dnhrʔ wlʔ lʔlhʔ dʔmwryʔ dʕmryn ʔntwn bʔrʕhwn ʔnʔ dyn/gyr#3#/ wbny byty lmryʔ hw ʔlhʔ plḥynn
24:16	wʕnw kwlh ʕmʔ wʔmrw ḥs ln dnšbwq lmryʔ wnplwḥ lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ
24:17	mṭl dmryʔ hw ʔlhn hw/whwyw#3#/ dʔsqn/ʔsqn#3#/ mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn mn byt ʕbdwtʔ wʕbd qdmyn hlyn ʔtwtʔ rwrbtʔ wnṭrn bklh ʔwrḥʔ dhlkn bh wbklhwn ʕmmʔ dʕbrn bynthwn
24:18	wʔwbd ʔnwn mryʔ ʔlhn lklhwn ʕmmʔ hlyn wlʔmwryʔ dʕmryn ḥnn bʔrʕhwn ʔwbd ʔnwn mryʔ mn qdmyn mṭl hnʔ lmryʔ hw <ʔlhʔ#3#> plḥynn mṭl dhwyw ʔlhʔ blḥwdwhy whwyw ʔlhn

24:30	wqbrwhy btḥwmʔ dyrtwth btmntsrḥ dbṭwrʔ dʔprym mn grbyʔ lṭwrʔ/dṭwrʔ#3#/ dgʕš

24:32	wlgrmwhy dywsp dʔsqw bny ʔysryl mn mṣryn qbrw bškym bplgwtʔ/bpqʕtʔ#3#/ dḥqlʔ/dḥblʔ#3#/ dzbn yʕqwb mn ḥmwr ʔbwhy dškym bmʔʔ nqwn whwt yrtwtʔ lbny ywsp

01:01	whwʔ gbrʔ ḥd mn rmtʔ ddwqʔ mn ṭwrʔ dʔprym wšmh hlqnʔ br yrḥwm br ʔlyhw br tḥw br ṣwp ʔprtyʔ
01:02	wʔyt hwy lh trtyn nšyn šmh dḥdʔ ḥnʔ wšmh dʔḥrtʔ pnnʔ whww lpnnʔ bnyʔ wlḥnʔ lyt lh bnyʔ
01:03	wslq hwʔ gbrʔ hw mn qryth mn ʕdn lʕdn lmsgd wlmdbḥw lmryʔ "ṣbʔwt" bšylw wtmn ʔyt hww tryn bnwhy dʕly ḥpny wpynḥys khnʔ lmryʔ

01:08	wʔmr lh hlqnʔ bʕlh ḥnʔ lmnʔ bkyʔ ʔnty wʔykw lʔ lʕsty wlmnʔ byš lbky hʔ ʔnʔ ṭb ʔnʔ lky mn ʕsrʔ bnyn

01:16	lʔ tḥšbyh lʔmtk qdmyk brt ḥṭhʔ mṭwl dmn swgʔʔ hw dʕqty wdrwgzy mllt ʕdmʔ lhšʔ

01:24	wʔsqth ʕmh kd ḥslth btwrʔ twltʔ wsʔtʔ ḥdʔ dqmḥʔ wgrbʔ ḥd dḥmrʔ wʔytyth lbyth dmryʔ lšylw wṭlyʔ ṭlʔ hwʔ

02:00	ṣlwth dḥnʔ
02:01	wṣlyt ḥnʔ wʔmrt ʕšn lby bmryʔ wʔttrymt qrny <bʔlhy#2#> wʔtptḥ pwmy ʕl bʕldbby mṭl dḥdytny bpwrqnk

03:21	wʔwsp twb mryʔ lmtglyw bšylw bptgmwhy
04:01	whwʔ ptgmh dšmwʔyl \ʕl klh /bklh#3#/ ʔysryl wnpq ʔysryl lʔwrʕʔ dplštyʔ lqrbʔ wšrw ʕl kʔpʔ dʕwdrnʔ wplštyʔ šrw bʔpq
04:02	wʔstdrw plštyʔ lwqbl ʔysryl whwʔ qrbʔ wʔttbr ʔysrʔyl qdm plštyʔ wʔtqṭlw bsdrʔ bḥqlʔ ʔyk ʔrbʕʔ ʔlpyn gbryn
04:03	wʔtʔ ʕmʔ lmšrytʔ wʔmrw sbʔ dʔysryl lmnʔ tbrn mryʔ ywmnʔ qdm plštyʔ/bʕldbbyn#3#/ ndbr ln mn šylw qbwtʔ/lqbwtʔ#3#/ dqymh dmryʔ "ṣbʔwt" wtʔzl byntn wtprqn mn ʔydʔ dbʕldbbyn
04:04	wšdrw ʕmʔ lšylw wšqlw mn tmn qbwtʔ/lqbwtʔ#3#/ dqymh dmryʔ "ṣbʔwt" ytb <ʕl#3#/ krwbʔ wtmn tryn bnwhy dʕly ʕm qbwtʔ dqymh dmryʔ ḥpny wpynḥys
04:05	whwʔ dkd ʔtt qbwtʔ dqymh dmryʔ lmšrytʔ ybbw klh ʔysryl ywbbʔ rbʔ wʔštgšt ʔrʕʔ
04:06	wšmʕw plštyʔ qlʔ dywbbʔ wʔmrw mnw qlʔ hnʔ dywbbʔ bmšrytʔ dʕbryʔ wydʕw dqbwth dmryʔ ʔtt lmšrytʔ
04:07	wdḥlw plštyʔ mṭl dʔmryn ʔtʔ/dʔtʔ#3#/ ʔlhʔ lmšrytʔ wʔmrw wy ln dlʔ hwt ʔyk hdʔ mn ʔtmly wmn mntmly
04:08	wy ln mnw npṣyn mn ʔydy ʔlhʔ ʕšynʔ hnw ʔlhʔ dmḥʔ \lklh mṣryn /lklhwn mṣryʔ#3#/ bkwl mḥwn bmdbrʔ
04:09	ʔtḥylw whww gbrʔ plštyʔ dlmʔ tplḥwn lʕbryʔ ʔyk dplḥwkwn whww gbrʔ wʔtktšw ʕmhwn
04:10	wʔtktšw plštyʔ ʕm ʔysryl wʔttbr ʔysryl wʕrqw ʔnš lmšknh whwt mḥwtʔ rbtʔ dṭb bʔysryl wnplw mn ʔysryl bywmʔ hw tltyn ʔlpyn rglyyn
04:11	wqbwth dmryʔ ʔtdbrt wtryn bnwhy dʕly mytw ḥpny wpynḥys
04:12	wrhṭ gbrʔ mn dbyt bnymyn mn sdrʔ wʔtʔ lšylw bywmʔ hw kd mṣryn nḥtwhy wʔdmtʔ bryšh
04:13	wʕly ytb hwʔ ʕl kwrsyʔ ʕl yd ʔwrḥʔ wḥʔr hwʔ mṭl dzʔʕ hwʔ lbh ʕl qbwth dʔlhʔ wgbrʔ ʔtʔ lmḥwyw bqrytʔ wʔyllt klh qrytʔ
04:14	wšmʕ ʕly qlʔ dʔylltʔ wʔmr mnw qlʔ ddlwḥyʔ hnʔ wgbrʔ srhb wʔtʔ wḥwy lʕly
04:15	wʕly br šbʕyn hwʔ wtmnʔ šnyn wʕynwhy ʔyqr/yqyrn hwy#3#/ wlʔ mškḥ hwʔ lmḥzʔ
04:16	wʔmr gbrʔ hw lʕly ʔnʔ ʔtyt mn sdrʔ wʔnʔ mn sdrʔ ʕrqt ʔtyt ywmnʔ wʔmr lh mnw ptgmʔ bry
04:17	wʕnʔ msbrnʔ wʔmr ʕrq ʔysryl mn qdm plštyʔ wʔp mḥwtʔ rbtʔ hwt bʕmʔ wʔp tryn bnyk mytw ḥpny wpynḥs wqbwth dʔlhʔ ʔtdbrt
04:18	whwʔ dkd ʔtdkrh ʕly lqbwth dʔlhʔ npl mn kwrsyʔ lbstrh ʕl yd trʕʔ wʔttbrt prqth wmyt mṭl dsʔb hwʔ gbrʔ wyqr whw dn lʔysryl ʔrbʕyn šnyn
04:19	wklth ʔntt pynḥys bṭnʔ hwt wqrybʔ hwt lmʔld wkd šmʕt šmʕʔ dʔtdbrt qbwth dʔlhʔ wmyt/wdmyt#3#/ ḥmwh wbʕlh brkt wyldt mṭl dʔthpkw ʕlyh ḥblyh
04:20	wbšʕtʔ dmwth ʔmr ʔylyn dqymn lʕl mnh lʔ tdḥlyn mṭl ddkrʔ yldty wlʔ ʕnt wlʔ ʔytyt ʕl blh
04:21	wqrt šmh dṭlyʔ ywkbr wʔmrt ʕbr ʔyqrʔ mn ʔysryl mṭl dʔtdbrt qbwth dʔlhʔ/dmryʔ#3#/ wʕl ḥmwh wʕl bʕlh
04:22	wʔmrt ʕbr ʔyqrʔ mn ʔysrʔyl mṭl dʔtdbrt qbwth dmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl
05:01	wplštyʔ dbrw qbwth dʔlhʔ wʔytywh mn kʔpʔ dʕwdrnʔ lʔšdwd
05:02	wdbrw plštyʔ lqbwth dʔlhʔ wʔytywh lbyt dgwn wʔqymwh ʕl gnb dgwn
05:03	wqdmw ʔšdwdyʔ lywmʔ dbtrh wʔškḥwhy ldgwn kd rmʔ ʕl ʔpwhy ʕl ʔrʕʔ qdm qbwth dʔlhʔ wnsbwhy ldgwn wʔtqnwhy ʕl dwkth
05:04	wqdmw bṣprʔ lywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ whʔ dgwn rmʔ ʕl ʔpwhy ʕl ʔrʕʔ qdm qbwth dmryʔ wryšh ddgwn wtrtyhyn psʔ dʔydwhy/drglwhy#3#/ psyqn ʕl ʔskwptʔ dtrʕʔ wgwšmh ddgwn ʔštḥr
05:05	mṭl hnʔ lʔ drkyn kwmrʔ ddgwn wkl dʕʔlyn ʕl ʔskwptʔ ddgwn bʔšdwd ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
05:06	wʕšnt ʔydh dmryʔ ʕl ʔšdwdyʔ wḥrb ʔnwn wmḥʔ ʔnwn bṭḥwryhwn/bḥwṭryhwn#2#/ lʔšdwd wltḥwmyh
05:07	wḥzw bny ʔšdwd dhknʔ ʔnwn wʔmrw lʔ ttb qbwth \dmryʔ ʔlhʔ /dʔlhʔ#3#/ dʔysryl ʕmn mṭl dʕšnt ʔydh ʕlyn wʕl dgwn ʔlhn
05:08	wšdrw wknšw lklhwn ṭrwnʔ dplštyʔ lwthwn wʔmrw mnʔ nʕbd lqbwth dmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl wʔmrw lgt thpwk qbwth dmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl wʔhpkwh lqbwth dmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl
05:09	wmn btr dʔhpkwh hwt ʔydh dmryʔ bqrytʔ mḥwtʔ \drbʔ ṭb /rbtʔ dṭb#3#/ wmḥʔ lʔnšyh dqrytʔ mn zʕwrʔ wʕdmʔ lrbʔ wʔsttrw ʕlyhwn ṭḥwryhwn
05:10	wšdrwh lqbwth dʔlhʔ lʕqrwn wʔyllw ʕqrwnyʔ wʔmrw ʔhpkw ʕlyn qbwth/lqbwth#3#/ dʔlhʔ/dmryʔ ʔlhʔ#2#/ dʔysryl dtqṭln ln wlʕmn
05:11	wšdrw wknšw lklhwn/klhwn#3#/ ṭrwnʔ dplštyʔ wʔmrw šdrwh lqbwth dʔlhʔ/dmryʔ ʔlhʔ#3#/ dʔysryl wthpwk ldwkth dlʔ tqṭln ln wlʕmn mṭl dhwt šgyštʔ dmwtʔ bklh qrytʔ wʕšnt ṭb ʔydh dʔlhʔ/dmryʔ#3#/ tmn
05:12	wʔnšʔ dlʔ mytw ʔtmḥyw bṭḥwryhwn wslqt gntʔ dqrytʔ ʕdmʔ lšmyʔ
06:01	whwt qbwth dmryʔ bḥqlʔ dplštyʔ šbʕʔ yrḥyn
06:02	wqrw plštyʔ lkwmrʔ wlṭrwnʔ wʔmrw mnʔ nʕbd lqbwth dmryʔ ḥwʔwn bmnʔ nšdryh ldwkth
06:03	wʔmrw ʔn mšdryn ʔntwn lqbwth dmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl lʔ tšdrwnh sryqʔyt ʔlʔ mytyw ʔytw lh qwrbnʔ whydyn ttʔswn wntydʕ lkwn dlmʔ/dlmnʔ#3#/ lʔ thpwk ʔydh dmryʔ mnkwn
06:04	wʔmrw mnʔ qwrbnʔ nytʔ lh wʔmrw mnynʔ dṭrwnʔ dplštyʔ ḥmšʔ ṭḥwryn ddhbʔ wḥmšʔ ʕwqbryn ddhbʔ mṭwl dmḥwtʔ ḥdʔ hy lkwn wlṭrwnykwn
06:05	wtʕbdwn ṣlmʔ dṭḥwrykwn wṣlmʔ dʕwqbrykwn dmḥblyn lʔrʕʔ wttlwn lʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʔyqrʔ ṭk nql ʔydh mnkwn wmn ʔlhkwn wmn ʔrʕkwn
06:06	wlʔ tʕšnwn lbkwn ʔyk dʔʕšnw mṣryʔ wprʕwn lbhwn wʔyk dbzḥw bhwn wlʔ šdrw ʔnwn wʔzlw
06:07	hšʔ sbw wʕbdw ʕgltʔ ḥdʔ ḥdtʔ wtrtyn twrn dmynqn dlʔ npl ʕlyhyn nyrʔ wʔswrw twrtʔ bʕgltʔ wʔhpkw bnyhyn mn btrhyn lbytʔ
06:08	wsbw qbwth dmryʔ wsymw bʕgltʔ wmʔnʔ ddhbʔ dʔytytwn lh qwrbnʔ symw bʔrgztʔ mn sṭrh wšdrwh wtʔzl
06:09	wḥzw ʔn bʔwrḥʔ dtḥwmʔ dslq šmš ʔzlʔ mryʔ hw ʕbd ln hdʔ byštʔ rbtʔ wʔlʔ ndʕ dlʔ hwʔ ʔydh qrbt ln ʔlʔ swqblʔ/sqwblʔ#3#/ hw hwʔ ln
06:10	wʕbdw gbrʔ hknʔ wdbrw trtyn twrn dmynqn wʔsrw ʔnyn bʕgltʔ wbnyhyn ḥbšw bbytʔ
06:11	wsmwh lqbwth dʔlhʔ bʕgltʔ wlʔrgztʔ wlʕwqbrʔ ddhbʔ wlṣlmʔ dṭḥwryhwn
06:12	wʔštdr twrtʔ bʔwrḥʔ \dʕl tḥwmʔ /dtḥwmʔ#3#/ dbyt šmš bšbylʔ ḥd \mhlkn wʔzln /ʔzln wmhlkn#3#/ wgʕyn wlʔ sṭyn lymynʔ wlsmlʔ wṭrwnʔ dplštyʔ ʔzlyn btrhyn ʕdmʔ ltḥwmʔ dbyt šmš
06:13	wʔnšʔ dqrytʔ dbyt šmš ḥṣdyn hww ḥṣdʔ dḥṭʔ bʕwmqʔ wʔrymw ʕynyhwn wḥzʔwhy lʔrwnʔ wḥdyw kd ḥzʔwhy
06:14	wʕgltʔ ʔtt lḥqlh dyšwʕ dmn/mn#3#/ byt šmš wqmt tmn wtmn kʔpʔ rbtʔ wṣlḥw qysʔ dʕgltʔ wtwrtʔ ʔsqw ʕltʔ lmryʔ
06:15	wlwyʔ ʔḥtw lʔrwnh dmryʔ wlʔrgztʔ dʕmh dʔyt bh mʔny dhbʔ wsmw ʕl kʔpʔ rbtʔ wʔnšʔ dbyt šmš ʔsqw ʕltʔ wdbḥw dbḥʔ bywmʔ hw lʔlhʔ
06:16	wḥmšʔ ṭrwnʔ dplštyʔ ḥzw whpkw lʕqrwn bywmʔ hw
06:17	whlyn ṭḥwrʔ ddhbʔ dʔytyw plštyʔ qwrbnʔ lʔlhʔ dʔšdwd ḥd wdʕʔzʔ ḥd wdʔšqlwn ḥd wdgt ḥd wdʕqrwn ḥd
06:18	wḥd ḥd ʕwqbrʔ ddhbʔ mnynʔ dklhyn qwryʔ dplštyʔ wḥmšʔ/wdḥmšʔ#3#/ ṭrwnʔ mn mdyntʔ ʕšyntʔ wʕdmʔ lkprʔ dprzyʔ wʕdmʔ lʔbl rbtʔ wsmw ʕlyh ʔrwnh dmryʔ ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ bḥqlh dyšwʕ dmn byt šmš
06:19	wmḥʔ mryʔ lʔnšʔ dbyt šmš ʕl ddḥlw bʔrwnh dmryʔ wmḥʔ mryʔ bʕmʔ ḥmšʔ ʔlpyn wšbʕyn gbryn wʔtʔblw ʕmʔ ʕl dmḥʔ mryʔ bʕmʔ mḥwtʔ rbtʔ
06:20	wʔmrw ʔnšʔ dbyt šmš mnw mškḥ lmqm qdm mryʔ ʔlhʔ qdyšʔ hnʔ wmnw nsqywhy mnn lʔrwnʔ <hnʔ#3#>
06:21	wšdrw ʔyzgdʔ lwt ytby qwryt nʕryn wʔmrw ʔhpkw plštyʔ lʔrwnh dmryʔ ḥwtw ʔsqwhy lwtkwn
07:01	wʔtw ʔnšy qwryt nʕryn wʔsqwhy lʔrwnh dmryʔ wʔytywhy lbyt ʔbyndb dbgbʕtʔ wqdš lʔlyʕzr brh wnṭr ʔrwnh dmryʔ
07:02	whwʔ mn <btr#3#> ywmʔ dytb ʔrwnʔ bqwryt nʕryn wsgyw ywmtʔ whwy/dhwy#3#/ ʔyk ʕsryn šnyn wʔšdyw klhwn dbyt/bny#3#/ ʔysryl btr/qdm#3#/ mryʔ
07:03	wʔmr šmwʔyl lklh ʔysryl ʔn bklh/mn klh#3#/ lbkwn mtpnyn ʔntwn lwt mryʔ ʔʕbrw ʔlhʔ nwkryʔ mn byntkwn wgnytʔ wʔtqnw lbkwn lwt mryʔ wpwlḥwhy lh blḥwdwhy wnpṣykwn mn ʔydʔ dplštyʔ
07:04	wʔʕbrw bny ʔysryl bʕlʔ wgnytʔ wplḥw lmryʔ blḥwdwhy
07:05	wʔmr šmwʔyl knšw lklh/klh#3#/ ʔysryl lmṣpyʔ/bmṣpyʔ#3#/ wʔṣlʔ ʕlykwn qdm mryʔ
07:06	wʔtknšw lmṣpyʔ wmlw myʔ wʔšdw qdm mryʔ wṣmw bywmʔ hw wʔmrw mṭl dḥṭyn lmryʔ wdn šmwʔyl lbny ʔysrʔyl bmṣpyʔ
07:07	wšmʕw plštyʔ dʔtknšw bny ʔysrʔyl lmṣpyʔ wslqw ṭrwnʔ dplštyʔ ʕl ʔysrʔyl wšmʕw bny ʔysryl wdḥlw qdm plštyʔ
07:08	wʔmrw bny ʔysryl lšmwʔyl lʔ tštwq mnn lmṣlyw ʕlyn qdm mryʔ ʔlhn dnprqn mn ʔydʔ dplštyʔ
07:09	wnsb šmwʔyl ʔmrʔ ḥd dḥlbʔ wʔsqh ʕltʔ/lʕltʔ#3#/ gmyrtʔ lmryʔ wṣly šmwʔyl qdm mryʔ ʕl bny ʔysryl wʕnyhy mryʔ
07:10	whwʔ šmwʔyl msq ʕltʔ wplštyʔ qrbw lmtktšw ʕm bny ʔysryl wrʕm mryʔ bqlʔ rmʔ bywmʔ hw ʕl plštyʔ wdlḥ/wdḥl#3#/ ʔnwn wʔttbrw qdm ʔysryl
07:11	wnpqw ʔnšʔ dʔysryl mn mṣpyʔ wrdpw lplštyʔ wḥrbw ʔnwn ʕdmʔ ltḥt mn byt yšn
07:12	wnsb šmwʔyl kʔpʔ ḥdʔ wsm byt mṣpyʔ lbyt yšn wqrʔ šmh kʔpʔ dʕwdrnʔ wʔmr ʕdmʔ lhrkʔ ʕdrn mryʔ
07:13	wʔttbrw plštyʔ wlʔ ʔwspw twb plštyʔ lmʔtʔ ltḥwmʔ dʔysryl whwt ʔydh dmryʔ bplštyʔ klhwn ywmth dšmwʔyl
07:14	wʔhpkw/wʔthpkw#3#/ qwryʔ dnsbw plštyʔ mn ʔysryl lʔysryl mn ʕqrwn wʕdmʔ lgt wtḥwmyhyn/wltḥwmyhyn#3#/ wpṣy mryʔ lʔysryl mn ʔydʔ dplštyʔ whwʔ šlmʔ byt ʔysryl lʔmwryʔ
07:15	wdn šmwʔyl \lbny ʔysryl /lʔsryl#3#/ kwl ywmy ḥywhy
07:16	wʔzl hwʔ mn šnʔ lšnʔ wmtkrk lbyt ʔyl wlglglʔ wlmṣpyʔ wdʔn lʔysryl wlklhwn ʔtrwtʔ hlyn
07:17	whpk hwʔ lrmtʔ mṭl dtmn hwʔ byth wtmn dʔn hwʔ lʔysryl wbnʔ tmn mdbḥʔ lmryʔ
08:01	whwʔ dkd sʔb šmwʔyl ʕbd lbnwhy dynʔ ʕl ʔysryl
08:02	whwʔ šm brh bwkrh ywʔyl wšm tnynh ʔbyʔ dynʔ bbršbʕ
08:03	wlʔ hlkw bnwhy bʔwrḥth wʔṣṭlyw btr nklʔ wnsbw šwḥdʔ wṣlw dynʔ
08:04	wʔtknšw klhwn sbʔ dbny ʔysryl wʔtw lwt šmwʔyl lrmtʔ
08:05	wʔmrw lh hʔ ʔnt sʔbt wbnyk lʔ mhlkyn bʔwrḥtk hšʔ hb ln mlkʔ dndwnn ʔyk klhwn ʕmmʔ
08:06	wʔtbʔš/wʔtʔbš#2#/ ptgmʔ bʕynwhy dšmwʔyl kd ʔmrw lh hb ln mlkʔ dndwnn ʔyk klhwn ʕmmʔ wṣly šmwʔyl qdm mryʔ
08:07	wʔmr mryʔ lšmwʔyl šmʕ bqlh dʕmʔ lkl dʔmryn lk mṭl dlʔ hwʔ lk ʔslyw ʔlʔ ly ʔslyw dlʔ ʔmlk ʕlyhwn
08:08	ʔyk kl ʕbdʔ dʕbdw mn ywmʔ dʔsqt ʔnwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wʕdmʔ lywmnʔ wšbqwny wplḥw lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ hknʔ hnwn ʕbdyn wʔp lk
08:09	whšʔ šmʕ bqlhwn brm mshdw shd bhwn wḥwʔ ʔnwn nmwsh dmlkʔ dmmlk ʕlyhwn
08:10	wʔmr šmwʔyl klhwn ptgmwhy dmryʔ lʕmʔ dšʔlw mnh mlkʔ
08:11	wʔmr hnʔ nhwʔ nmwsh dmlkʔ dmmlk ʕlykwn bnykwn ndbr wnʕbd lh bmrkbth wbpršwhy wnrhṭwn qdm mrkbth
08:12	wnʕbd lh rby ʔlpʔ wrby mʔwtʔ wrby ḥmšyn wrby ʕsrʔ wndbrwn dbrh wnḥṣdwn ḥṣdh wnʕbdwn mʔny qrbh wmʔny mrkbth
08:13	wbntkwn ndbr lzqrtʔ wlṭḥntʔ wlʔpytʔ
08:14	wḥqltkwn wkrmykwn wzytykwn ṭbʔ nsb wntl lʕbdwhy
08:15	wzrʕkwn wkrmykwn nʕsr wntl lmhymnwhy wlʕbdwhy
08:16	wʕbdykwn wʔmhtkwn wgdwdykwn/wgzrykwn#3#/ špyrʔ wḥmrkwn ndbr wnʕbd ʕbdh
08:17	wʕnkwn nʕsr wʔntwn thwwn lh ʕbdʔ
08:18	wtyllwn bywmʔ hw mn qdm mlkkwn dgbytwn lkwn wlʔ nʕnykwn mryʔ bywmʔ hw
08:19	wlʔ ṣbw ʕmʔ lmšmʕ bqlh dšmwʔyl wʔmrw lh lʔ hknʔ ʔlʔ mlkʔ nhwʔ ʕlyn
08:20	wnhwʔ ʔp ḥnn ʔyk kwlhwn ʕmmʔ wndwnn mlkn wnpwq qdmyn wntktš tktwšn
08:21	wšmʕ šmwʔyl klhyn mlwhy dʕmʔ wmll ʔnyn qdm mryʔ
08:22	wʔmr mryʔ lšmwʔyl šmʕ bqlhwn wʔmlk lhwn mlkʔ wʔmr šmwʔyl lʔnšʔ dʔysryl zlw ʔnš lqryth
09:01	whwʔ gbrʔ ḥd mn bnymyn wšmh qyš br ʔbyl br ṣrwd br bkrwt br ʔpyḥ gbrʔ mn bnymyn gnbr ḥylʔ
09:02	wlh hwʔ brʔ wšmh/dšmh#3#/ šʔwl gbr wṭb wlyt <hwʔ#3#> gbrʔ mn bny ʔysryl dṭb mnh wmn ktph wlʕl rm hwʔ mn klh ʕmʔ
09:03	wʔbd ʔtnʔ dqyš ʔbwhy dšʔwl wʔmr qyš lšʔwl brh dbr ʕmk lḥd mn ṭlyʔ wqwm zl bʕy ʔtnʔ wqm šʔwl wʔzl wdbr ʕmh ḥd/lḥd#3#/ mn ṭlyʔ wʔzl lmbʕʔ ʔtnʔ dʔbwhy
09:04	wʕbr bṭwrʔ dʔprym wʕbr bʔrʕʔ dgwmrʔ/dʕmwrʔ#3#/ wlʔ ʔškḥ wʕbr bʔrʕʔ dtʕlʔ wlyt wʕbr bʔrʕʔ dbnymyn wlʔ ʔškḥ
09:05	wʔtw lhwn lʔrʕʔ dṣwr wʔmr šʔwl lṭlyʔ dʕmh tʔ nhpwk dlmʔ nšbwq ʔby rnyʔ dʔtnʔ wndḥl ʕlyn
09:06	wʔmr lh ṭlyh wʔ gbrʔ ḥd dʔlhʔ bqrytʔ hwʔ wgbrʔ yqyr bʕyny ʕmʔ wkl dʔmr mʔtʔ ʔtʔ hšʔ <tʔ#3#> nʔzl ltmn ṭk nḥwyn ʔwrḥʔ dʔtyn ʕlyh
09:07	wʔmr šʔwl lṭlyh hʔ ʔzlynn mnʔ nwbl lgbrʔ dʔlhʔ mṭl dlḥmʔ ṭlq mn mʔnyn wzwdʔ lyt dnwbl lgbrʔ dʔlhʔ mṭl dlyt ln
09:08	wʔwsp ṭlyʔ wʕnʔ lmrh wʔmr hʔ ʔštkḥ bʔydy rwbʕh dmtqlʔ dkspʔ ntl lgbrʔ dʔlhʔ wnḥwyn ʔwrḥn
09:09	mṭl dmn lwqdm bʔysryl hknʔ ʔmr hwʔ gbrʔ mʔ dʔzl hwʔ lmbʕʔ mn ʔlhʔ tw nʔzl ʕdmʔ lḥzyʔ mṭl dnbyʔ dywmnʔ mn qdym ḥzyʔ mtqrʔ hwʔ
09:10	wʔmr šʔwl lṭlyh ṭb ptgmk tʔ nʔzl wʔzlw lqrytʔ dtmn gbrʔ dʔlhʔ
09:11	hnwn slqyn bmsqnʔ dqrytʔ wʔškḥw ʕlymtʔ dnpqn lmmlʔ myʔ wʔmr lhyn šʔwl ʔyt hrkʔ ḥzyʔ
09:12	wʕny wʔmrn ʔyt hʔ qdmyk sqw hšʔ bʕgl mṭl dywmnʔ ʔtʔ lqrytʔ mṭl ddbḥtʔ ywmnʔ lʕmʔ bbym
09:13	wmʔ dʕltwn lqrytʔ hknʔ tškḥwnh ʕdlʔ slq lbym lmlʕs mṭl dlʔ lʕs ʕmʔ ʕdmʔ dʔtʔ mṭl dhw mbrk dbḥʔ wbtrkn ʔklyn dqryn whšʔ sqw mṭl dywmnʔ/dlh ywmnʔ#3#/ mškḥyn ʔntwn lh
09:14	wslqw lqrytʔ hnwn ʕʔlyn bmʕlnʔ dqrytʔ whʔ šmwʔyl npq lʔwrʕhwn lmsq lbym
09:15	wmryʔ ʔmr lšmwʔyl ywmʔ ḥd <mn#2#> qdm dnʔtʔ šʔwl lmʔmr
09:16	lzbnʔ dmḥr ʔšdr lwtk gbrʔ mn ʔrʕʔ dbnymyn mšwḥyhy lmdbrnʔ ʕl ʕmy ʔysryl wnprqywhy lʕmy mn ʔydʔ dplštyʔ mṭl dḥzyth lʕmy wʕlt gʕthwn lwty
09:17	wšmwʔyl ḥzyhy lšʔwl dmryʔ gbyhy wmryʔ ʔmr lšmwʔyl hʔ gbrʔ dʔmrt lk hnʔ nʔḥwd bʕmy
09:18	wqrb šʔwl lwt šmwʔyl bgw trʕʔ wʔmr ḥwny ʔykw byt ḥzyʔ
09:19	wʕnʔ šmwʔyl wʔmr lšʔwl ʔnʔ hw ḥzyʔ sq qdmy lbym wʔkwl ʕmy ywmnʔ wʔšdrk bṣprʔ wkl dblbk ʔḥwyk
09:20	wʕl ʔtnʔ dʔbd lk ywmnʔ hʔ tltʔ ywmyn lʔ tsym lbk ʕlyhyn mṭl dʔštkḥ wdmn hy klh rgtʔ dbyt ʔysryl ʔlʔ ʔn dylk wdbyt ʔbwk
09:21	wʕnʔ šʔwl wʔmr lšmwʔyl hʔ br bnymyn ʔnʔ mn zʕwrʔ dšbṭʔ dʔysryl wšrbty zʕwryʔ hy mn klhyn šrbtʔ dšbṭʔ dbnymyn wlmnʔ/wʕl mnʔ#23#/ ʔmrt ly mltʔ hdʔ
09:22	wdbr šmwʔyl lšʔwl wlṭlyh wʔʕl ʔnwn lbytʔ wyhb lhwn dwktʔ \bryš qryʔ /bryšʔ dmzmnʔ#3#/ whnwn ʔyk tltyn gbryn
09:23	wʔmr šmwʔyl lṭbḥʔ hb mntʔ dyhbt lk wʔmrt lk sym lwtk
09:24	wʔrym ṭbḥʔ šqʔ wʕlytʔ wsm qdm šʔwl wʔmr hʔ dʔštḥr sym qdmyk wʔkwl mṭl dmn zbnʔ nṭyr <hwʔ#3#> lk wʔkl šʔwl ʕm šmwʔyl bywmʔ/bzbnʔ#3#/ hw
09:25	wnḥt mn bym lqrytʔ wmll ʕm šʔwl ʕl ʔgrʔ
09:26	wqdm hwʔ kd slq šprʔ/ṣprʔ#3#/ wqrʔ šmwʔyl lšʔwl lʔgrʔ wʔmr qwm ʔšdrk wqm šʔwl wnpqw tryhwn hw wšmwʔyl lbr
09:27	hnwn nḥtyn bswph dqrytʔ wšmwʔyl ʔmr lšʔwl ʔmr lṭlyʔ dnʕbr qdmyn wʔnt qwm ʔyk dywmnʔ/ywmnʔ#3#/ wʔšmʕk ptgmh dʔlhʔ
10:01	wnsb šmwʔyl qrnʔ dmšḥʔ wnsk bryšh wnšqh wʔmr lh hʔ mšḥk mryʔ ʕl yrtwth lmdbrnʔ
10:02	wmʔ dʔzlt ywmnʔ mn lwty hʔ mškḥ ʔnt tryn gbryn ʕl qbrh drḥyl btḥwmʔ dbnymyn bṣlṣḥ wnʔmrwn lk ʔštkḥ ʔtnʔ dʔzlt lmbʕʔ whʔ šbq ʔbwk rnyʔ dʔtnʔ wdḥʔ ʕlykwn wʔmr mnʔ ʔʕbd lbry
10:03	wmʔ dʕbrt twb lhl wmṭyt bṭmtʔ/lbṭmtʔ#3#/ dtbwr hʔ mškḥ ʔnt tmn tltʔ gbryn slqyn lwt ʔlhʔ lbyt ʔyl ḥd šqyl tltʔ gdyn wḥd šqyl tlt gryṣn dlḥmʔ wḥd šqyl grbʔ dḥmrʔ
10:04	wnšʔlwn bšlmk wntlwn lk trtyn dlḥmʔ wtsb mn ʔydyhwn
10:05	wbtrkn tʔtʔ lrmtʔ dʔlhʔ dtmn qymtʔ dplštyʔ wmʔ dmṭyt ltmn lqrytʔ hʔ pgʕ ʔnt bḥblʔ dnbyʔ dnḥtyn mn bym wqdmyhwn qytrʔ wknrʔ wplgʔ wrbyʕʔ whnwn mtnbyn
10:06	wtṣlḥ ʕlyk rwḥh dmryʔ wttnbʔ ʕmhwn wtštgnʔ ʔyk gbrʔ ʔḥrnʔ
10:07	wnhwʔ kd/dkd#3#/ nʔtyn ʕlyk/lk#3#/ ʔtwtʔ hlyn ʕbd lk mdm dspqʔ bʔydyk mṭl dʔlhʔ ʕmk
10:08	wḥwt qdmy lglglʔ whʔ whʔ ʔnʔ nḥt ʔnʔ lwtk lmsqw ʕlwtʔ lmdbḥ dbḥʔ šlmʔ šbʕʔ ywmyn <wtmn#3#> tktr ʕdmʔ dʔtʔ ʔnʔ lwtk wʔwdʕk mdm dtʕbd
10:09	whwʔ dkd/kd#3#/ ʔpny ktph lmʔzl mn šmwʔyl šḥlp lh ʔlhʔ lbʔ ʔḥrnʔ wʔty/wʔyty#3#/ klhyn ʔtwtʔ hlyn bywmʔ hw
10:10	wʔtʔ ʕdmʔ lrmtʔ whʔ ḥblʔ dnbyʔ ʔrʕh wʔṣlḥt ʕlwhy rwḥh dʔlhʔ/dmryʔ#3#/ wʔtnby bynthwn
10:11	whwʔ dkl dydʕ hwʔ lh mn ʔtmly wmn mntmly ḥzw nbyʔ mtnbʔ wʔmrw ʕmʔ gbr lḥbrh mnw hnʔ dhwʔ lbr qyš dhʔ ʔp šʔwl bnbyʔ
10:12	wʕnʔ gbrʔ mn tmn wʔmr mnw ʔbwhy mṭwl hnʔ hwt lmtlʔ dhʔ ʔp šʔwl bnbyʔ
10:13	wgmr lmtnbyw wʔtʔ šʔwl mn bym
10:14	wʔmr lh ddh lšʔwl wlṭlyh lʔykʔ ʔzltwn wʔmr <lh#3#> lmbʕʔ ʔtnʔ wḥzyn dlyt wʔtyn lwt šmwʔyl
10:15	wʔmr lh ddh lšʔwl ḥwny mnʔ ʔmr lkwn šmwʔyl
10:16	wʔmr <lh#3#> šʔwl lddh mḥwyw ḥwyny dʔštkḥ ʔtnʔ wṣbwtʔ dmlkwtʔ lʔ ḥwyh dʔmr lh šmwʔyl
10:17	wknš šmwʔyl lʕmʔ qdm mryʔ lmṣpyʔ/bmṣpyʔ#3#/
10:18	wʔmr lbny ʔysryl hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʔnʔ ʔsqt lʔysryl mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wpṣytkwn mn ʔydʔ dplštyʔ wmn ʔydʔ dklhyn mlkwtʔ dʔlṣn lkwn
10:19	wʔntwn ywmnʔ ʔslytwn lʔlhkwn dhw prq lkwn mn klhyn byštkwn wʕqtkwn wʔmrtwn lʔ hknʔ ʔlʔ mlkʔ ʔqym ʕlyn hšʔ nqwmwn qdm mryʔ šbṭykwn wʔlpykwn
10:20	wqrb šmwʔyl lklhwn šbṭʔ dʔysryl wʔttḥd šbṭʔ dbnymyn
10:21	wqrb šbṭʔ dbnymyn lšrbtʔ wʔttḥdt šrbtʔ dmṭry wʔttḥd šʔwl br qyš wbʕʔwhy wlʔ ʔštkḥ
10:22	wšʔl twb šmwʔyl bmryʔ wʔmr ʔykw gbrʔ hnʔ wʔmr mryʔ lšmwʔyl hʔ hw mtṭšʔ byt mʔnʔ
10:23	wrhṭw wdbrwhy mn tmn wqm bgw ʕmʔ wrm hwʔ mn klh ʕmʔ mn ktph wlʕl
10:24	wʔmr šmwʔyl lklh ʕmʔ ḥzytwn dṣbʔ bh/bhnʔ#3#/ ʔlhʔ mṭl dlyt ʔkwth bklh ʕmʔ wybbw klh ʕmʔ wʔmrw nḥʔ mlkʔ
10:25	wʔmr šmwʔyl lʕmʔ nmwsh dmlkʔ wktb bsprʔ wsm qdm mryʔ wšdr šmwʔyl lklh ʕmʔ wʔzlw ʔnš lbyth
10:26	wʔp šʔwl ʔzl lbyth lrmtʔ wʔzl ʕmh ḥylʔ dʔtqrb ʔlhʔ blbhwn
10:27	wbny ḥṭʔ ʔmryn bmnʔ nprqn hnʔ wšṭwhy wlʔ ʔytyw lh qwrbnʔ whw ʔyk štyq
11:01	wslq nḥš ʕmwnyʔ wšrʔ ʕl lkyš dglʕd wʔmrw klhwn ʔnšʔ dlkyš lnḥš ʔqym ln qymʔ wnplḥk
11:02	wʔmr lhwn nḥš ʕmwnyʔ bhdʔ ʔqym lkwn qymʔ mʔ dʕwrtwn kl ʕynkwn dymynʔ wʔʕbdywhy ḥsdʔ ʕl klh ʔysryl
11:03	wʔmrw lh sbʔ dlkyš ʔrpʔ ln šbʕʔ ywmyn wnšdr ʔyzgdʔ bklh tḥwmʔ dʔysryl wnḥzʔ ʔn ʔyt ln prwqʔ wʔlʔ hydyn npwq lwtk
11:04	wʔtw ʔyzgdʔ lrmtʔ dšʔwl wmllw mlʔ hlyn qdm ʕmʔ wʔrymw klh ʕmʔ qlhwn wbʕw
11:05	whʔ šʔwl ʔtʔ btr twrʔ mn ḥqlʔ wʔmr šʔwl mʔ lh lʕmʔ dbkyn wʔštʕyw lh mlʔ dʔnšy lkyš
11:06	wʔṣlḥt rwḥh dʔlhʔ/dmryʔ#3#/ ʕl šʔwl kd šmʕ mlʔ hlyn wʔtḥmt rwgzh ṭb
11:07	wnsbh lpdnʔ/pdnʔ#3#/ dtwrʔ wpšḥ ʔnwn wšdr bklh tḥwmʔ dʔysryl byd ʔyzgdʔ lmʔmr kl/dkl#3#/mn#3#/ dlʔ npq btr šʔwl wbtr šmwʔyl hknʔ ntʕbd ltwrwhy wnplt dḥlth dʔlhʔ ʕl ʕmʔ wnpqw klhwn ʔyk gbrʔ ḥd
11:08	wmnʔ ʔnwn bbzq whww bny ʔysryl tltmʔʔ ʔlpyn wgbrʔ dyhwdʔ tltyn ʔlpyn
11:09	wʔmrw lʔyzgdʔ dʔtw mn lkyš ʔmrw lgbrʔ dlkyš wdglʕd mḥr nhwʔ lkwn pwrqnʔ mʔ dḥm šmšʔ wʔtw/wʔzlw#3#/ ʔyzgdʔ wḥwyw lʔnšy lkyš wḥdyw
11:10	wʔmrw ʔnšy lkyš <lnḥš#3#> mḥr npwq lwtkwn wtʕbdwn ln kwl/mdm#3#/ dšpyr bʕynykwn
11:11	whwʔ lywmʔ dbtrh wplg šʔwl lʕmʔ ltltʔ ršyn wʕl bgw mšrytʔ bmṭrtʔ dṣprʔ wḥrb lbny ʕmwn ʕdmʔ dḥm ywmʔ wdʔštḥrw ʔtbdrw wlʔ ʔštkḥw bhwn tryn ʔyk ḥdʔ
11:12	wʔmrw ʕmʔ lšmwʔyl mnw ʔmr dšʔwl lʔ nmlk ʕlyn hb ln gbrʔ nmyt/dnmyt#3#/ ʔnwn
11:13	wʔmr šʔwl lʔ ntqṭl gbr/gbrʔ#1#/ bywmʔ/bzbnʔ#3#/ hnʔ mṭl dywmnʔ ʕbd mryʔ pwrqnʔ lʔysryl
11:14	wʔmr šmwʔyl lʕmʔ tw nʔzl lglglʔ wnḥdt tmn mlkwtʔ
11:15	wʔzlw/wʔtw#3#/ klh ʕmʔ lglglʔ wʔmlkw tmn lšʔwl qdm mryʔ bglglʔ wdbḥw tmn dbḥʔ šlmʔ qdm mryʔ wḥdyw tmn šʔwl wklhwn ʔnšʔ dʔysryl ṭb
12:01	wʔmr šmwʔyl lklh ʔysrʔyl hʔ šmʕt bqlkwn/lqlkwn#3#/ kwl/bkl#3#/lkl <mdm>#3#/ dʔmrtwn ly wʔmlkt ʕlykwn mlkʔ
12:02	whšʔ hʔ mlkʔ qdmykwn wʔnʔ sʔbt wqšt wbny hʔ ʕmkwn wʔnʔ hlkt qdmykwn mn ṭlywty wʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
12:03	hʔ qʔm ʔnʔ qdmykwn shdw by qdm mryʔ wqdm mšyḥh twrʔ dmn dbrt wḥmrʔ dmn dbrt/nsbt#3#/ ʔw lmn ṭlmt ʔw lmn ʔlṣt ʔw mn ʔydʔ dmn nsbt šwḥdʔ wʔṣdt ʕyny bh ʔmrw ly wʔnʔ ʔprwʕkwn
12:04	ʔmryn lh lʔ ṭlmtn wlʔ ʔlṣtn wlʔ nsbt mn ʔnš mnn <šwḥdʔ#3#> mdm
12:05	ʔmr lhwn shd bkwn ʔlhʔ wshd bkwn mšyḥh ywmnʔ dlʔ ʔškḥtwn bʔydy mdm wʔmryn shd
12:06	wʔmr šmwʔyl lʕmʔ mryʔ hw blḥwd ʔlhʔ dʕbd lmwšʔ wlʔhrwn wʔsq lʔbhtn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
12:07	qwmw hšʔ wʔdwnkwn qdm mryʔ bklh zdyqwth dʕbd ʕmkwn wʕm ʔbhykwn
12:08	kd ʕl yʕqwb lmṣryn wṣlyw ʔbhykwn qdm mryʔ wšdr mryʔ lmwšʔ wlʔhrwn wʔsq lʔbhykwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wʔwtb ʔnwn bʔtrʔ hnʔ
12:09	wṭʕw lmryʔ ʔlhhwn wʔšlm ʔnwn bʔydʔ dsysrʔ rb ḥylʔ dḥṣwr wbʔydʔ dplštyʔ wbʔydʔ dmlkʔ dmwʔb wʔtktšw ʕmhwn
12:10	wṣlyw qdm mryʔ wʔmrw ḥṭyn ʕl dšbqn lmryʔ ʔlhn wplḥn lbʕlʔ wlgnytʔ whšʔ pṣn mn ʔydʔ dbʕldbbyn wnplḥk
12:11	wšdr mryʔ ldbwrʔ wlbrq wlgdʕwn wlnptḥ wlšmšwn wpṣykwn mn ʔydʔ dbʕldbbykwn dmn ḥdrykwn wytbtwn bšlyʔ
12:12	wḥzytwn lnḥš mlkʔ dbny ʕmwn dʔtʔ ʕlykwn wʔmrtwn lʔ hknʔ ʔlʔ mlkʔ nmlk ʕlyn wmryʔ ʔlhkwn mlkkwn
12:13	whšʔ hʔ mlkʔ dgbytwn wšʔltwn hʔ yhb lkwn mryʔ mlkʔ
12:14	wʔn tdḥlwn mn mryʔ wtplḥwnh wtšmʕwn bqlh wlʔ tmrmrwnh thwwn ʔp ʔntwn ʔp/ʔyk#3#/ mlkʔ dʔmlk ʕlykwn btr mryʔ ʔlhkwn
12:15	wʔlʔ tšmʕwn bqlh dmryʔ ʔlhkwn wtmrmrwnh thwʔ ʔydh dmryʔ bkwn/ʕmkwn#3#/ ʔyk dhwt bʔbhykwn/ʕm ʔbhykwn#3#/
12:16	whšʔ ʔtṭybw wḥzw ptgmʔ hnʔ rbʔ dʕbd mryʔ ʕlykwn/ʕmkwn#3#/
12:17	hʔ ḥṣdʔ hw dḥṭʔ ywmnʔ ʔqrʔ lmryʔ wntl qlʔ wmṭrʔ wdʕw wḥzw dbyštkwn rbʔ hy dšʔltwn lkwn mlkʔ
12:18	hydyn qrʔ šmwʔyl lmryʔ wyhb mryʔ qlʔ wmṭrʔ bʔtrʔ hw wdḥlw kwlh ʕmʔ ṭb mn mryʔ wmn šmwʔyl
12:19	wʔmrw kwlh ʕmʔ lšmwʔyl ṣlʔ ʕl ʕbdyk qdm mryʔ ʔlhk wlʔ nmwt mṭl dʔwspn ʕl klhwn ḥṭhyn byštʔ <hdʔ#3#> rbtʔ dšʔln ln mlkʔ
12:20	wʔmr šmwʔyl lʕmʔ lʔ tdḥlwn ʔntwn ʕbdtwn hdʔ klh byštʔ brm lʔ tsṭwn mn btrh dmryʔ ʔlʔ pwlḥwhy lmryʔ bklh/mn klh#3#/ lbkwn
12:21	wlʔ tsṭwn btr sryqtʔ dlʔ tmwtwn wlʔ mpṣyn lkwn mṭwl dsryqtʔ ʔnyn
12:22	mṭl dlʔ šbq mryʔ lʕmh mṭwl šmh rbʔ mṭl dʔtṭpys lmʕbdkwn lh ʕmʔ
12:23	wʔnʔ ḥs ly dʔḥṭʔ lmryʔ wlʔ ʔṣlʔ ʕlykwn wʔlpkwn ʔwrḥʔ ṭbtʔ wtryṣtʔ
12:24	ʔlʔ dḥlw lmryʔ wpwlḥwhy bqwštʔ bklh lbkwn wbklh npškwn wḥzw dmwrb ʕmkwn
12:25	wʔn mbʔšw tbšwn ʔp ʔntwn ʔp mlkkwn tmwtwn
13:01	wkd šntʔ ḥdʔ wtrtyn ʔmlk šʔwl bmlkwth ʕl ʔysryl
13:02	gby lh šʔwl tltʔ ʔlpyn <gbryn#3#> mn ʔysrʔyl whww ʕm šʔwl tryn ʔlpyn bmkms wbṭwrʔ dbyt ʔyl wʔlp hww ʕm ywntn brh brmtʔ dbnymyn wšrkh dʕmʔ šrʔ ʔnwn ʔnš lbyth
13:03	wmḥʔ ywntn lqymʔ dplštyʔ bgbʕ wšmʕw plštyʔ wšʔwl qrʔ bšypwrʔ bklh ʔrʕʔ lmʔmr nšmʕwn ʕbryʔ
13:04	wklh ʔysryl dmḥʔ šʔwl lqymʔ dplštyʔ wḥsn ʔysrʔyl lplštyʔ wʔtknšw ʕmʔ btr šʔwl lglglʔ
13:05	wplštyʔ ʔtknšw lmtktšw ʕm ʔysryl tltʔ ʔlpyn mrkbn wštʔ ʔlpyn pršyn wʕmʔ ʔyk ḥlʔ dʕl spt ymʔ swgʔʔ dṭb wslqw wšrw bmkms mn mdnḥyh dbyt ʔyl
13:06	wḥzw gbrʔ dʔysryl wdḥlw wʔtṭšyw lhwn bmʕrʔ wbḥllʔ wbšqypʔ wbpʕrʔ wbgwbʔ
13:07	wʕbryʔ ʕbrw ywrdnn lʔrʕʔ dgd wdglʕd wšʔwl ʕdkyl bglglʔ hwʔ wklh ʕmʔ ʕmh/dʕmh#3#/
13:08	wpš šbʕʔ ywmyn lzbnʔ dšmwʔyl wlʔ ʔtʔ šmwʔyl lglglʔ wʔtbdr ʕmʔ mn lwt šʔwl
13:09	wʔmr šʔwl qrbw ly ʕltʔ wʔsq dbḥʔ šlmʔ lʕltʔ
13:10	wkd šlm lmsqw ʕltʔ ʔtʔ šmwʔyl wnpq šʔwl lʔwrʕh lmbrkwth
13:11	wʔmr <lh#3#> šmwʔyl mnʔ ʕbdt wʔmr šʔwl ḥzyt dʔtbdr lh ʕmʔ mny wʔnt lʔ ʔtyt lzbnʔ dywmtʔ wplštyʔ knyšyn bmkms
13:12	wʔmrt dlmʔ nḥtwn plštyʔ ʕly lglglʔ wʔpy mryʔ lʔ ḥzyt wʔmrḥt wʔsqt ʕltʔ
13:13	wʔmr šmwʔyl lšʔwl ʔsklt dlʔ nṭrt pwqdnh dmryʔ ʔlhk dpqdk mṭl dhšʔ ʔtqn mryʔ ʔlhk mlkwtk ʕl ʔysryl wʔmr dntqnk ʕdmʔ lʕlm
13:14	mkyl mlkwtk lʔ tqwm mṭl dgbʔ lh mryʔ gbrʔ ʔyk lbh wpqdh mryʔ lmdbrw lʕmh mṭl dlʔ nṭrt kl dpqdk mryʔ ʔlhk
13:15	wqm šmwʔyl wslq mn glglʔ lrmtʔ dbnymyn wmnʔ šʔwl lʕmʔ dʔštkḥ ʕmh ʔyk štmʔʔ gbryn
13:16	wšʔwl wywntn brh ytbyn bgbʕtʔ dbnymyn wplštyʔ šryn bmkms
13:17	wnpqw mḥblnʔ mn mšrytʔ dplštyʔ tltʔ ryšyn ryšʔ ḥd mnhwn ʔzl lʔwrḥʔ dʕpr ʕl ʔrʕʔ dšgwʔyl
13:18	wryšʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔzl lʔwrḥʔ dbyt ḥwrn wryšʔ ʔḥrnʔ pnʔ lʔwrḥʔ dtḥwmʔ dḥʔr lnḥlʔ dṣbʕwn wlmdbrʔ
13:19	wʔwmnʔ lʔ ʔštkḥ bklh ʔrʕʔ dʔysryl mṭl dʔmrw plštyʔ dlʔ nʕbdwn ʕbryʔ sypʔ wmwrnytʔ

13:22	wbywmʔ dqrbʔ lʔ ʔštkḥ sypʔ ʔw mwrnytʔ bʔydʔ dklh ʕmʔ dʕm šʔwl wʕm ywntn <brh#3#> wʔštkḥ lšʔwl wlywntn brh
13:23	wnpqw qymʔ dplštyʔ lʕbrʔ dmkms
14:01	whwʔ ywmʔ wʔmr ywntn br šʔwl lṭlyʔ dšqyl mʔnwhy tʔ nʕbr lqymʔ dplštyʔ lʕbrʔ dlhl wlʔbwhy lʔ ḥwy
14:02	wšʔwl ytb bswpʔ drmtʔ tḥyt rwmnʔ dbgbʕwn wʕmʔ ʔyt hwʔ ʕmh ʔyk/dʔyk#3#/ štmʔʔ gbryn
14:03	wʔḥyʔ br ʔḥyṭwb ʔḥwhy dywkbr br pynḥys br ʕly khnʔ dmryʔ dbšylw wšql pdtʔ wʕmʔ lʔ ydʕ dʔzl ywntn
14:04	lbyt mʕbrtʔ wbʕʔ dnʕbr lqymʔ dplštyʔ wšnʔ dkʔpʔ mn ʕbrʔ mkʔ wšnʔ ʔḥrtʔ dkʔpʔ mkʔ šmh dḥdʔ bṣwṣ wšmh dʔḥrtʔ syʕʔ
14:05	šnʔ ḥdʔ ngdʔ mn grbyʔ lwqbl mkms wʔḥrtʔ mn tymnʔ lwqbl gbʕ
14:06	wʔmr ywntn lṭlyʔ dšqyl mʔnwhy tʔ nʕbr lqymʔ dʕwrlʔ hlyn ṭk nʕdrn mryʔ mṭl dlyt klytʔ lmryʔ lmprq bsgy ʔw bzʕwr

14:09	ʔn hknʔ nʔmrwn ln štwqw ʕd nmṭʔ lwtkwn nqwm bdwktn wlʔ nsq ʕlyhwn
14:10	wʔn hknʔ nʔmrwn ln sqw lwtn nsq mṭl dʔšlm ʔnwn mryʔ ʔlhn bʔydn hdʔ ln ʔtʔ
14:11	wʔtglyw tryhwn ʕl qymʔ dplštyʔ wʔmrw plštyʔ hʔ ʕbryʔ npqyn mn ḥllʔ dʔtṭšyw tmn
14:12	wʕnw ʔnšy qymʔ lywntn wlšql mʔnwhy wʔmrw sqw lwtn wnwdʕkwn ptgmʔ wʔmr ywntn lšql mʔnwhy sq btry mṭl dʔšlm ʔnwn mryʔ bʔydʔ dʔysryl
14:13	wslq ywntn ʕl ʔydwhy wʕl rglwhy wšql mʔnwhy btrh wnpl qymʔ dplštyʔ qdm ywntn wšql mʔnwhy mqṭl hwʔ btrh
14:14	whwt mḥwtʔ qdmytʔ dmḥʔ ywntn wšql mʔnwhy ʔyk ʕsryn gbryn ʔyk pswlʔ wʔyk dbry pdnʔ bḥqlʔ
14:15	whwt zwʕtʔ mn mšrytʔ dbḥqlʔ wbklh ʕmʔ dqʔm wmḥblnʔ zʕw wʔp hnwn wzʕt ʔrʕʔ whwt ʕlyhwn dḥlth dmryʔ/dʔlhʔ#3#/

14:18	wʔmr šʔwl lʔḥyʔ qrb ʔrwnh dʔlhʔ/dmryʔ#3#/ mṭl dtmn hwʔ ʔrwnh dmryʔ bywmʔ hw ʕm bny ʔysryl
14:19	whwʔ dkd ʔmr šʔwl lkhnʔ ḥylʔ dbmšrytʔ dplštyʔ ʔzl swgʔʔ wʔmr šʔwl lkhnʔ knwš ʔydk
14:20	wqʕʔ šʔwl wklh ʕmʔ dʕmh wʔtw ʕdmʔ lqrbʔ whʔ hwt tmn ḥrbh dgbrʔ bḥbrh šgyštʔ rbtʔ dṭb
14:21	ʕbryʔ wplštyʔ ʔyk dʔtmly wʔyk dmntmly wslqw ʕmhwn lmšrytʔ wḥdyryn ʔp hnwn lmhwʔ ʕm bny ʔysryl wʕm šʔwl wywntn/wʕm ywntn#3#/
14:22	wklhwn gbrʔ dʔysryl dmṭšyn bṭwrʔ dʔprym šmʕw dʕrqw plštyʔ mn qdm bny ʔysryl wʔzdynw ʔp hnwn btrhwn lqrbʔ
14:23	wprq mryʔ lʔysryl bywmʔ hw wqrbʔ ʕbd lhwn byt ʔwn

14:27	wywntn lʔ šmʕ kd ʔwmy ʔbwhy lʕmʔ wʔwšṭ hw bryš ḥwṭrʔ dbʔydh wṭmšh bkkrytʔ ddbšʔ wʔhpk ʔydh lpwmh wnhr ʕynwhy
14:28	wʕnʔ gbrʔ mn ʕmʔ wʔmr lywntn mwmyw ʔwmy ʔbwk lʕmʔ wʔmr lyṭ hw gbrʔ dnʔkwl lḥmʔ ywmnʔ wʔtṭrp ʕmʔ

14:33	wḥwyw lšʔwl wʔmrw lh hʔ ʕmʔ ḥṭw lmryʔ wʔklyn ʕl dmʔ wʔmr šʔwl ʔʕlytwn gzwrw ly ywmnʔ kʔpʔ rbtʔ

14:35	wbnʔ tmn šʔwl mdbḥʔ lmryʔ wšry lmbnʔ mdbḥʔ lmryʔ wʔmr šʔwl nḥwt btr plštyʔ wnbwz bhwn ʕdmʔ dnhr ṣprʔ wlʔ nšbwq mnhwn gbr wʔmrw kl dšpyr bʕynyk nʕbd
14:37	wʔmr šʔwl lʔlhʔ ʔḥwt btr plštyʔ mšlm ʔnt lhwn bʔydʔ dʔysryl wlʔ ʕnyhy mryʔ bywmʔ hw

14:39	mṭl dḥy mryʔ dprq lʔysryl dʔn ʔyt bywntn bry ʔlʔ mmt nmwt wlyt dʕnyhy mn klh ʕmʔ
14:40	wʔmr <šʔwl#23#> lklh ʔysrʔyl ʔntwn hww bsṭrʔ ḥd wʔnʔ wywntn bry nhwʔ bsṭrʔ ḥd wʔmrw ʕmʔ lšʔwl kl dšpyr bʕynyk lmʕbd ʕbd
14:41	wʔmr šʔwl mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl hb šlmwtʔ wʔttḥd šʔwl wywntn <brh#3#> wnpqw ʕmʔ

15:01	wʔmr šmwʔyl lšʔwl ly šdr mryʔ lmmšḥk dtmlk ʕl ʔysryl ʕmh hšʔ šmʕ lql ptgmwhy dmryʔ

15:03	hšʔ zl ḥrwb \lḥṭyʔ ʕmlyq /lʕmlyq#3#/ wʔwbd lkl dʔyt lhwn wlʔ tḥws ʕlyhwn wqṭl/wqṭwl#3#/ mn gbrʔ wʕdmʔ lnšʔ wmn ʕlymʔ wʕdmʔ lylwdʔ wmn twrʔ/gmlʔ#3#/ wʕdmʔ lʔmrʔ/lḥmrʔ#3#/ wmn gmlʔ/twrʔ#3#/ wʕdmʔ lḥmrʔ/lʔmrʔ#3#/
15:04	wʔšmʕ šʔwl lklh ʕmʔ lqrbʔ wmnʔ ʔnwn bṭlyʔ mʔtyn ʔlpyn rglyʔ wʕsrʔ ʔlpyn ʕm/mn#3#/ gbrʔ dyhwdʔ
15:05	wʔtʔ šʔwl ʕdmʔ lqrytʔ dʕmlyq wdn bnḥlʔ

15:07	wmḥʔ šʔwl lʕmlyq mn ḥwylʔ dbmʕlnʔ dšwd/dgšwr#3#/ dqdm mṣryn

15:09	wḥs šʔwl wʕmʔ ʕl ʔgg mlkʔ wʕl šwprʔ dʕnʔ wdtwrʔ wdšmynʔ wdmpṭmʔ wʕl klh ṭbtʔ wlʔ ṣbw dnḥrbwn ʔnwn wklh ʕbydtʔ dšyṭʔ wmslyʔ bʕynyhwn lh ʔwbdw
15:10	whwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕl šmwʔyl lmʔmr
15:11	ʔttwyt dʔmlkt lšʔwl mlkʔ dhpk mn btry wmly lʔ ʔqym wʔtbʔš lšmwʔyl wṣly qdm mryʔ klh llyʔ
15:12	wqdm šmwʔyl bṣprʔ lʔwrʕh dšʔwl wʔtḥwy lšmwʔyl dʔtʔ šʔwl lkrmlʔ whʔ mtqn lh ʔtrʔ wʔtpny wʕbr wnḥt lglglʔ

15:15	wʔmr šʔwl mn ʕmlyq ʔytyw ʔnwn <mṭl#23#> dḥs ʕmʔ ʕl šwprʔ dʕnʔ wdtwrʔ wʔytyw <ʔnwn#3#> dndbḥwn lmryʔ ʔlhk wšrkʔ ḥrbn

15:17	wʔmr šmwʔyl lšʔwl hʔ ʔn zʕwrʔ ʔnt bʕynyk ryš šbṭʔ ʔnt dʔysryl wmšḥk mryʔ dtmlk ʕl ʔysryl
15:18	wšdrk mryʔ bʔwrḥʔ wʔmr zl ḥrwb lḥṭyʔ ʕmlyq wʔtktš ʕmhwn ʕdmʔ dtgmr ʔnwn

15:20	wʔmr šʔwl lšmwʔyl šmʕt bqlh dmryʔ wʔzlt bʔwrḥʔ dšdrny wʔytyt lʔgg mlkʔ dʕmlyq wlʕmlqyʔ ʔwbdt
15:21	wdbr ʕmʔ mn bztʔ ʕnʔ wtwrʔ ršytʔ ḥrmʔ dndbḥwn lmryʔ ʔlhk bglglʔ
15:22	wʔmr šmwʔyl lʔ ṣbʔ mryʔ bʕlwtʔ wbdbḥʔ ʔyk mn dšmʕ bqlh hʔ šmʕʔ mn dbḥʔ ṭb wlmṣt mn trbʔ ddkrʔ
15:23	mṭwl dḥṭyth dqṣmʔ mmrmrnwtʔ wqṣmʔ ʕwlʔ mʕšnʔ ʕl dʔslyt mlth dmryʔ nslyk mn mlkwtʔ
15:24	wʔmr šʔwl lšmwʔyl ḥṭyt ʕl dʕbrt ʕl mlt pwmh dmryʔ wʕl mlyk mṭl ddḥlt mn ʕmʔ wšmʕt bqlhwn
15:25	hšʔ šbwq lḥṭyty whpwk ʕmy ʔsgwd lmryʔ
15:26	wʔmr šmwʔyl lšʔwl lʔ ʔhpwk ʕmk ʕl dʔslyt mlth dmryʔ ʔslyk mryʔ dlʔ thwʔ mlkʔ ʕl ʔysryl
15:27	wʔtpny šmwʔyl lmʔzl wʔḥd šʔwl bknpʔ dprysh wṣryhy
15:28	wʔmr lh šmwʔyl ṣrh mryʔ mlkwtʔ dʔysryl mnk ywmnʔ wyhbh lḥbrk/lʕbdk#3#/ dṭb mnk

15:30	wʔmr šʔwl ḥṭyt hšʔ yqryny/{nqryny#2#}/ qdm sbʔ dʕmy wqdm ʔysryl whpwk ʕmy ʔsgwd lmryʔ ʔlhk
15:31	whpk šmwʔyl btr šʔwl wsgd šʔwl lmryʔ
15:32	wʔmr šmwʔyl qrbyhy ly lʔgg mlkʔ dʕmlyq wʔmr ʔgg šryrʔyt mryr mwtʔ
15:33	wʔmr šmwʔyl ʔyknʔ dgzyt nšʔ ḥrbk hknʔ tgzʔ ʔmk mn nšʔ wpšḥ šmwʔyl lʔgg mlkʔ qdm mryʔ bglglʔ
15:34	wʔzl šmwʔyl lrmtʔ wšʔwl slq lbyth lrmtʔ dšʔwl
15:35	wlʔ ʔwsp twb šmwʔyl lmḥzyh lšʔwl ʕdmʔ lywmʔ dmyt mṭl dʔtʔbl šmwʔyl ʕl šʔwl wmryʔ ʔttwy ʕl dʔmlk lšʔwl ʕl ʔysryl
16:01	wʔmr mryʔ lšmwʔyl ʕdmʔ lʔmty mtʔbl ʔnt ʕl šʔwl wʔnʔ ʔslyth dlʔ nmlk ʕl ʔysryl mly qrnk mšḥʔ wtʔ ʔšdrk lwt ʔyšy dmn byt lḥm mṭl dḥzyt ly bbnwhy mlkʔ
16:02	wʔmr šmwʔyl ʔyknʔ ʔzl wnšmʕ šʔwl wnqṭlny wʔmr mryʔ lšmwʔyl ʕgltʔ dtwrʔ ʔḥwd bʔydk wʔmr lmdbḥw lmryʔ ʔtyt
16:03	wqry lʔyšy <wlbnwhy#3#> ldbḥʔ/lmdbḥʔ#3#/ wʔnʔ ʔḥwyk mdm dtʕbd wmšwḥ ly lmn dʔmr lk
16:04	wʕbd šmwʔyl ʔyk/ʔyknʔ#3#/ dpqdh mryʔ wʔtʔ lbyt lḥm dyhwdʔ wnpqw sbʔ dqrytʔ lʔwrʕh <dšmwyl#3#>
16:05	wʔmrw <lh#3#> šlm mʔtyk/mʔtytk#3#/ wʔmr šlm lmdbḥw lmryʔ/lʔlhʔ#3#/ ʔtyt ʔtqdšw wtw ʕmy ldbḥʔ/lmdbḥʔ#3#/ wqdš lʔyšy wlbnwhy wqrʔ ʔnwn ldbḥʔ/lmdbḥʔ#3#/

18:27	wqm dwyd wʔzl hw wgbrwhy/wḥbrwhy#3#/ wqṭl mn plštyʔ mʔtyn gbryn wʔyty dwyd ʕwrlwthwn wqrb ʔnyn lmlkʔ dnhwʔ ḥtnʔ lmlkʔ wyhb lh šʔwl lmlkl brth ʔnttʔ

18:30	wnpqw rwrbnʔ dplštyʔ whwʔ bzbnʔ dnpqw ʔṣlḥ dwyd mn klhwn ʕbdwhy dšʔwl wʔtyqr šmh ṭb

19:02	wḥwy ywntn ldwyd wʔmr lh bʕʔ šʔwl ʔby lmqṭlk ʔzdhr wtb bṭwšyʔ wʔtṭšʔ
19:03	wʔnʔ hʔ npq ʔnʔ wqʔm ʔnʔ ʕl gnb ʔby bḥqlʔ dʔnt bh wʔnʔ ʔmr ʕlyk lʔby wʔḥzʔ mnw br ʕynh wʔḥwyk
19:04	wʔmr ywntn ʕl dwyd ṭbtʔ lšʔwl ʔbwhy wʔmr lh lʔ nḥṭʔ mlkʔ bʕbdh dwyd mṭl dlʔ ḥṭʔ lk wʔp ʕbdwhy spqyn lk
19:05	dsm npšh bʔydyk wqṭl lplštyʔ wʕbd mryʔ pwrqnʔ rbʔ lklh ʔysryl bʔydh wḥzyt wḥdyt whšʔ lmnʔ ḥṭʔ ʔnt bdmʔ zkyʔ wqṭl ʔnt lh ldwyʔ mgn
19:06	wšmʕ šʔwl bqlh dywntn brh wʔymʔ šʔwl wʔmr ḥy hw mryʔ ʔn nmwt
19:07	wqrʔ ywntn ldwyd wḥwyh klhyn mlʔ hlyn wʔʕlh lwt šʔwl whwʔ lwth ʔyk dʔtmly wʔyk dmntmly
19:08	wʔwsp <twb#2#> qrbʔ lmhwʔ wnpq dwyd wʔtktš ʕm plštyʔ wmḥʔ bhwn mḥwtʔ rbtʔ wʕrqw mn qdmwhy
19:09	whwt rwḥh dmryʔ byštʔ ʕl šʔwl whw ytb bbyth wmwrnyth bʔydh wdwyd nqš qdmwhy
19:10	wbʕʔ šʔwl lmmḥyh lmwrnytʔ bdwyd wbʔstʔ wʕrq lh mn qdm šʔwl wmḥh lmwrnytʔ bʔstʔ wdwyd ʕrq wʔštwzb bllyʔ hw
19:11	wšdr šʔwl ʔyzgdʔ lbyth ddwyd lmṭrh wlmqṭlh bṣprʔ wḥwyt ldwyd mlkl ʔntth wʔmrt lh dʔn lʔ mpṣʔ ʔnt npšk mḥr mʔt ʔnt
19:12	wʔḥtth mlkl ldwyd mn kwtʔ wʕrq wʔzl wʔtpṣy
19:13	wnsbt mlkl ṣlmʔ wʔrmyt bʕrsʔ wmškʔ dʕzʔ smt ʔsdwhy wksyt bmrṭwṭʔ
19:14	wšdr šʔwl ʔyzgdʔ lmdbrh ldwyd wʔmrt kryh hw
19:15	wšdr šʔwl ʔyzgdʔ lmḥzyh/lmbʕyh#3#/ ldwyd wʔmr ʔsqwhy lwty bʕrsʔ lmqṭlh
19:16	wʔtw ʔyzgdʔ whʔ ṣlmʔ bʕrsʔ wmškʔ dʕzʔ/dsʕrʔ#3#/ ʔsdwhy wḥwyw lšʔwl
19:17	wʔmr šʔwl lmlkl lmnʔ hknʔ/hkyl#3#/ nkltyny wšdrty bʕldbby wʔtplṭ wʔmrt mlkl lšʔwl hw ʔmr ly šdryny/dšdryny#3#/ dlʔ ʔqṭlky
19:18	wdwyd ʕrq wʔtplṭ wʔtʔ lwt šmwʔyl lrmtʔ wḥwyh kl dʕbd lh šʔwl wʔzl hw wšmwʔyl wytbw bywnt dbrmtʔ
19:19	wḥwyw lšʔwl wʔmrw lh hʔ/dhʔ#3#/ dwyd bywnt dbrmtʔ
19:20	wšdr šʔwl ʔyzgdʔ lmdbrh ldwyd wḥzw knšʔ dnbyʔ dmtnbyn wšmwʔyl qdm ʕlyhwn whwt <ʔp#3#> ʕl ʔyzgdwhy dšʔwl rwḥh dʔlhʔ wʔtnbyw ʔp hnwn
19:21	wḥwyw lšʔwl wšdr twb <wʔp#3#> ʔyzgdʔ ʔḥrnʔ wʔtnbyw wʔp hnwn wʔwsp twb šʔwl wšdr ʔyzgdʔ tlytyʔ wʔtnbyw wʔp hnwn
19:22	wʔzl ʔp hw lrmtʔ wmṭy lgwbʔ rbʔ dbswpʔ wšʔwl ʔmr ʔykw šmwʔyl wdwyd wʔmrw lh hʔ bywnt dbrmtʔ
19:23	wʔzl ltmn lywnt dbrmtʔ whwt ʔp ʕlwhy rwḥh dʔlhʔ wʔzl mʔzl wmtnbʔ ʕdmʔ dmṭʔ lywnt dbrmtʔ
19:24	wšlḥ ʔp hw mʔnwhy wʔtnby qdm šmwʔyl wnpl ʕrṭl klh ʔymmʔ hw wklh llyʔ mṭl hnʔ/hdʔ#3#/ ʔmryn dhʔ/hʔ#3#/ ʔp šʔwl bnbyʔ
20:01	wʕrq dwyd mn ywnt dbrmtʔ wʔtʔ wʔmr qdm ywntn mnʔ ʕbdt wmnʔ hy sklwty wmnʔ hw swrḥny qdm ʔbwk dbʕʔ npšy
20:02	wʔmr lh ywntn ḥs lk lʔ tmwt hʔ lʔ ʕbd ʔby mltʔ rbtʔ wmltʔ/ʔw mltʔ#3#/ zʕwrtʔ dlʔ glʔ ly mṭl mnʔ ṭšy ʔby mny mltʔ hdʔ lyt hdʔ
20:03	wʔymʔ lh dwyd wʔmr mṭl dydʕ ʔbwk dʔškḥt rḥmʔ bʕynyk ʔmr dlʔ/lʔ#3#/ ndʕ ywntn bhdʔ dlʔ tkrʔ lh brm ḥy hw mryʔ wḥyʔ hy npšk ʔlʔ kn psʕtʔ hwt byny lmwtʔ
20:04	wʔmr ywntn ldwyd <kl#3#> mʔ dʔmrʔ npšk <lmʕbd#3#> ʔʕbd lk
20:05	wʔmr dwyd lywntn hʔ ryš yrḥʔ hw mḥr wʔnʔ mstmkw mstmk ʔnʔ qdm ʔbwk lmlʕs wtšdrny lmṭšʔ bḥqlʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ tlytyʔ
20:06	ʔn mpqd/mpqdw#23#/ npqdny ʔbwk ʔmr lh mštʔlw ʔštʔl mny dwyd dnʔzl lbyt lḥm qryth mṭl ddbḥʔ dywmtʔ tmn lklh šrbtʔ
20:07	ʔn hknʔ nʔmr ṭb špyr šlmʔ hw lʕbdk wʔn \mtbʔšw ntbʔš /mtʔbšw ntʔbš#23#/ lh dʕ dgrmt byštʔ mn lwth
20:08	wʕbd ṭybwtʔ hdʔ ʕm ʕbdk mṭl dbqymh dmryʔ ʔʕlt lʕbdk ʕmk wʔn ʔyt ly sklwtʔ qṭwlyny ʔnt wlwt ʔbwk lʔ twblny
20:09	wʔmr ywntn ḥs lk mṭl dʔn mdʕ ʔdʕ dgrmt <lh#3#> byštʔ mn lwt/qdm#3#/ ʔby ʔtʔ ʕlyk/lwtk#3#/ wʔḥwyk
20:10	wʔmr dwyd lywntn mnʔ nḥwyny dlmʔ nʕnyk ʔbwk qšyʔyt
20:11	wʔmr lh ywntn ldwyd tʔ npwq lḥqlʔ wnpqw tryhwn lḥqlʔ
20:12	wʔmr ywntn ldwyd nshd mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʔlʔ ʔbdqywhy lʔby ʔyk zbnʔ hnʔ mḥr ltlt šʕyn ʔn ṭb lk why dyn ʔšlwḥ lk wʔglʔ lk
20:13	hknʔ nʕbd mryʔ lywntn whknʔ nwsp lh dʔn/ʔn#3#/ ʔṭb mn ʔby byštʔ dʕlyk/ʕlyk#3#/ ʔglʔ lk wʔšdrk wtʔzl bšlmʔ wnhwʔ mryʔ ʕmk ʔyk dhwʔ ʕm ʔby
20:14	wlwy dyn kd ʔnʔ ḥy ʔlʔ ʕbd ʕmy ṭybwth dʔlhʔ ʕdlʔ ʔmwt
20:15	wlʔ tʕnd ṭybwtk mn byty <ʕdmʔ#3#> lʕlm wkd nwbd mryʔ lbʕldbbwhy ddwyd mn ʔpy ʔrʕʔ
20:16	nqwm ywntn ʕm dbyt dwyd wnttbʕ/wntbʕ#3#/wntprʕ#3#/ mryʔ mn bʕldbbwhy ddwyd
20:17	wʔwsp ywntn <twb#3#> lmwmywth ldwyd bdrḥm hwʔ lh mṭl drḥmtʔ dnpšh rḥmh
20:18	wʔmr lh ywntn mḥr ryš yrḥʔ hw wmtpqd ʔnt mṭl dmtpqd mwtbk
20:19	wltlt/wtlt#3#/ šʕyn mtbʕʔ ʔnt ṭb wtʔtʔ ldwktʔ dṭšyt tmn bywmʔ dmḥr wtb ʕl gnb kʔpʔ hy
20:20	wʔnʔ hʔ trṣ ʔnʔ tltʔ gʔryn lmšdʔ lmrmyw nyšʔ/lnyšʔ#3#/
20:21	whʔ mšdr ʔnʔ ṭlyʔ ʔzl lqṭ gʔrʔ ʔn ʔmr lṭlyʔ dhʔ/hʔ#3#/ gʔrʔ mnk wlkʔ sb ʔnwn wtʔ dʕ wḥzy dšlm lk wlyt mlʔ byšʔ ḥy hw mryʔ
20:22	wʔn hknʔ ʔmr lṭlyʔ dhʔ gʔrʔ mnk wlhl zl mṭl dšdrk mryʔ
20:23	bptgmʔ dmlln ʔnʔ wʔnt hʔ mryʔ ʔlhʔ byny wlk ʕdmʔ lʕlm
20:24	wʔtṭšy dwyd bḥqlʔ whwʔ ryš yrḥʔ wʔstmk mlkʔ ʕl lḥmʔ lmlʕs
20:25	wʔstmk mlkʔ ʕl smkh ʔyk dbklzbn ʕl gnb ʔstʔ wqm ywntn wʔstmk wʔbnyr ʕl gnb šʔwl wʔtpqdt dwkth ddwyd
20:26	wlʔ ʔmr šʔwl mdm bywmʔ hw mṭl dʔmr dgdšʔ hw dlmʔ dkʔ \hw ʔw dlmʔ lʔ hwʔ dkʔ /ʔw lʔ dkʔ#3#/
20:27	whwʔ lywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ dryš yrḥʔ wʔtpqdt dwkth ddwyd wʔmr šʔwl lywntn brh mṭl mnʔ lʔ ʔtʔ br ʔyšy lʔ ʔtmly wlʔ ywmnʔ llḥmʔ
20:28	wʕnʔ ywntn wʔmr lšʔwl ʔbwhy mštʔlw ʔštʔl mny dwyd ʕdmʔ lbyt lḥm <qryth#3#/
20:29	wʔmr šdryny mṭwl ddbḥtʔ dšrbtʔ ʔyt ln bqrytʔ wpqdny wʔmr ly ʔḥy ʔn ʔškḥt rḥmʔ bʕynyk ʔzl ʔḥzʔ lʔḥy mṭl hnʔ lʔ ʔtʔ lptwrʔ dmlkʔ
20:30	wʔtḥmt rwgzh dšʔwl ʕl ywntn wʔmr lh br ḥsyrt mrdwtʔ lʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ dṣbʔ ʔnt bbrh dʔyšy lbhttk wlbhtt pwrsyh dʔmk
20:31	mṭl dklhwn ywmtʔ dbr ʔyšy ʕl ʔrʕʔ lʔ ttqn ʔnt wmlkwtk hšʔ ʔšdr ʔdbrywhy ly mṭl dbr mwtʔ hw
20:32	wʕnʔ ywntn wʔmr lšʔwl ʔbwhy ʕl mnʔ mʔt mnʔ ʕbd
20:33	wʔrym šʔwl mwrnytʔ ʕlwhy lmmḥyh wywntn dgrmt mn lwt ʔbwhy lmqṭlh ldwyd
20:34	wqm ywntn mn ptwrʔ bḥmtʔ ʕšyntʔ wlʔ ʔkl \bywmʔ hw /bhw ywmʔ#3#/ dtryn dryš yrḥʔ mṭl dkryt lh ʕl dwyd dgrmh ʔbwhy ʕlwhy <byštʔ#3#>
20:35	whwʔ ṣprʔ wnpq lḥqlʔ lʔwrʕh ddwyd wṭlyʔ zʕwrʔ ʕmh
20:36	wʔmr lṭlyʔ hrṭ gʔrʔ dšdʔ ʔnʔ ṭlyʔ rhṭ whw šdʔ gʔrʔ lmʕbrwth
20:37	wmṭʔ ṭlyʔ ʕdmʔ ldwkth dgʔrʔ dšdʔ ywntn wqrʔ ywntn lṭlyʔ wʔmr hʔ gʔrʔ mnk wlhl
20:38	wqrʔ ywntn \btr ṭlyʔ /lṭlyʔ#3#/ wʔmr ʔstrhb bʕgl wlʔ tqwm wlqṭ ṭlyʔ dywntn gʔrʔ wʔyty lmrh
20:39	wlʔ ydʕ ṭlyʔ mdm ʔlʔ <ʔn#3#> ywntn wdwyd dydʕyn hww ptgmʔ
20:40	wyhb ywntn mʔnwhy lṭlyh wʔmr lh zl ʔʕl lqrytʔ
20:41	ṭlyʔ ʕl wdwyd qm mn lwt kʔpʔ wʔtʔ lwt ywntn wnpl ʕl ʔpwhy ʕl ʔrʕʔ wsgd tlt zbnyn wnšqw gbr lḥbrh wbkw gbr ʕl ḥbrh brm dwyd ʔsgy
20:42	wʔmr ywntn ldwyd zl bšlmʔ ymynn dyn tryn bšmh dmryʔ lmʔmr mryʔ byny wlk wbyt/wbynt#3#/ zrʕy lzrʕk ʕdmʔ lʕlm
21:01	wqm ywntn wʕl lqrytʔ
21:02	wʔtʔ dwyd lnkḥ lwt ʔḥymlk khnʔ wtwh ʔḥymlk lʔwrʕh ddwyd wʔmr lh mnw dʔnt blḥwdyk ʔtyt wʔnš lyt ʕmk
21:03	wʔmr dwyd lʔḥymlk khnʔ mlkʔ pqdny ptgmʔ wʔmr ly dʔnš lʔ ndʕ mdm dmšdr ʔnʔ lk wmpqd ʔnʔ lk wlṭlyʔ ḥwyt ʔtrʔ dgnʔ wmṭšy
21:04	whšʔ mnʔ ʔyt tḥyt ʔydk ḥmš dlḥmʔ hb bʔydy ʔw mdm dmštkḥ
21:05	wʕnʔ khnʔ ldwyd wʔmr lh lyt lḥmʔ šryʔ tḥyt ʔydy ʔlʔ lḥmʔ dqwdšʔ ʔyt ʔn nṭrw ṭlyʔ mn qwrbnʔ
21:06	wʕnʔ dwyd wʔmr lkhnʔ qwrbnʔ mšlṭ hw ln mn ʔtmly wmn mntmly kd npqt whʔ mʔnʔ dṭlyʔ qdyšyn why ʔwrḥʔ šryʔ wʔp ywmnʔ ʔtqdš bmʔnʔ
21:07	wyhb lh khnʔ qwdšʔ mṭl dlʔ hwʔ tmn lḥmʔ ʔlʔ ʔn lḥmʔ dʔpʔ dmʕbryn mn qdm mryʔ lmsm lḥmʔ ḥmymʔ bywmʔ dmtnsb
21:08	wtmn gbrʔ <ḥd#23#> mn ʕbdʔ dšʔwl bywmʔ hw klʔ qdm mryʔ wšmh dwʔg ʔdwmyʔ ʕšynʔ drʕwtʔ dšʔwl
21:09	wʔmr dwyd lʔḥymlk lyt hrkʔ tḥyt ʔydk sypʔ ʔw mwrnytʔ mṭl dʔp sypy wʔp mwrnyty lʔ nsbt bʔydy mṭl dhwʔ ptgmh dmlkʔ msrhb
21:10	wʔmr <lh#3#> khnʔ <ʔḥymlk#3#> syph dgwlyd plštyʔ hw dqṭlt bʕwmqʔ dbṭmtʔ whʔ kryk bšwšpʔ <wsym#3#> bstr pdtʔ ʔnhw dnsb ʔnt lh sb mṭl dlyt lbr mnh ʔḥryn hrkʔ wʔmr dwyd lyt ʔkwth hbyhy ly
21:11	wqm dwyd wʕrq bywmʔ hw mn qdm šʔwl wʔtʔ lwt ʔkyš mlkʔ dgt
21:12	wʔmrw lh ʕbdwhy lʔkyš hnw mlkʔ dʔrʕʔ dʔysrʔyl lhnʔ <hw#3#> msgyn hwy bnt ʔysryl wʔmrn qṭl šʔwl bʔlpʔ wdwyd brbwtʔ
21:13	wsm dwyd mlʔ hlyn blbh wdḥl ṭb mn qdm ʔkyš mlkʔ dgt
21:14	wšny ṭʕmh bʕynwhy wʔštkr bʕynyhwn wytb ʕl ʔskwptʔ dtrʕʔ wʔrmy ryrh ʕl dqnh
21:15	wʔmr ʔkyš lʕbdwhy hʔ ḥzytwn gbrʔ/lgbrʔ#3#/ dšnyʔ hw lmnʔ ʔytytwnyhy lwty
21:16	ḥsyr ṭʕmʔ ʔnʔ dʔytytwn hnʔ dšṭʔ ʕly hnʔ nʕwl lbyty
22:01	wʔzl dwyd mn tmn wʔtplṭ lmʕrt ʕrlm wšmʕw ʔḥwhy wklh byt ʔbwhy wnḥtw lwth ltmn
22:02	wʔtknšw lwth kl gbrʔ dmʕq wkl gbrʔ dʔyt lh mrʔ ḥwbʔ wkl gbrʔ mryr npšʔ whwʔ ʕlyhwn ryšʔ/rbʔ#3#/ whww ʕmh ʔyk ʔrbʕmʔʔ gbryn
22:03	wʔzl dwyd mn tmn lmṣpyʔ dmwʔb wʔmr lmlkʔ dmwʔb ntb ʔby wʔmy ʕmkwn ʕdmʔ dʔdʕ mnʔ ʕbd ly ʔlhʔ
22:04	wšbq ʔnwn lwt mlkʔ dmwʔb wytbw ʕmh kl ywmtʔ dhwʔ dwyd bmṣpyʔ
22:05	wʔmr gd nbyʔ ldwyd lʔ ttb bmṣpyʔ zl ʕwl lk lʔrʕʔ dyhwdʔ wʔzl dwyd ʕl lh lʕbʔ dḥzywt
22:06	wšmʕ šʔwl dʔtgly dwyd wgbrʔ dʕmh wšʔwl ytb hwʔ bgbʕ tḥyt lwzʔ dbrmtʔ wmwrnyth bʔydh wklhwn ʕbrwhy qymyn lʕl mnh
22:07	wʔmr šʔwl lʕbdwhy dqymyn lʕl mnh šmʕw bny bnymyn hʔ lklkwn ntl br ʔyšy ḥqltʔ wkrmʔ wlklkwn nʕbd \rwrbny ʔlpʔ wmʔwtʔ /rby ʔlpʔ wrby mʔwtʔ#3#/
22:08	mṭl dmrdtwn klkwn ʕly wlyt dglʔ ly bqymʔ dbry dʕm br ʔyšy wlyt <mn#3#> dkʔb lh mnkwn ʕly wglʔ ly mṭl dʔqym bry lʕbdy ʕly kmʔnʔ ʔyk dywmnʔ
22:09	wʕnʔ dwʔg ʔdwmyʔ whw qʔm ʕl ʕbdwhy dšʔwl wʔmr ḥzyth ldwyd dʔtʔ lwt ʔḥymlk br ʔḥyṭwb khnʔ
22:10	wšʔl lh bʔlhʔ wmʔnʔ wzwdʔ yhb lh wsyph dgwlyd plštyʔ yhb lh
22:11	wšdr mlkʔ lmqrʔ lʔḥymlk br ʔḥyṭwb khnʔ wlklh byt ʔbwhy khnʔ dbnkḥ wʔtw klhwn lwt mlkʔ
22:12	wʔmr šʔwl šmʕ nʔ br ʔḥyṭwb wʔmr hʔ ʔnʔ mry
22:13	wʔmr lh šʔwl lmnʔ ʔtnkltwn ʕly ʔnt wbr ʔyšy kd yhbt lh lḥmʔ wsypʔ wšʔlt lh bʔlhʔ dtqym ʕly kmʔnʔ ʔyk dywmnʔ
22:14	wʕnʔ ʔḥymlk khnʔ lmlkʔ wʔmr mnw bklhwn ʕbdyk ʔyk dwyd dmhymn wḥtnʔ dmlkʔ wnṭr pwqdnyk wyqyr bbytk
22:15	ywmnʔ hw šryt lmšʔl lh bʔlhʔ ḥs ly lʔ nsym mlkʔ ʕl ʕbdh mltʔ hdʔ wʕl byt ʔby mṭl dlʔ ydʕ ʕbdk bklh hnʔ ptgmʔ rbʔ wzʕwrʔ
22:16	wʔmr mlkʔ mmt tmwt ʔḥymlk ʔnt wklh byt ʔbwk
22:17	wʔmr mlkʔ lrhṭʔ dqymyn lʕl mnh ʔtkrkw wqṭlw lkhnwhy dʔlhʔ mṭl dʔydyhwn ʕm dwyd wydʕw dʕryq hwʔ wlʔ glw ly wlʔ ṣbw \ʕbdy mlkʔ /ʕbdwhy dmlkʔ#3#/ dnwšṭwn ʔydyhwn wnhrwn lkhnwhy dʔlhʔ
22:18	wʔmr mlkʔ ldwʔg <ʔdwmyʔ#3#> ʔtkrk ʔnt wpgʕ bhwn bkhnʔ wpgʕ dwʔg bkhnʔ wʔmyt bywmʔ hw tmnʔyn wḥmšʔ gbryn dšqyln hww pdtʔ dbwṣʔ
22:19	wyhb lh qrytʔ dkhnʔ wqṭl bpwmʔ dḥrbʔ mn gbrʔ wʕdmʔ lʔnttʔ wmn ʕlymʔ wʕdmʔ lylwdʔ wtwrʔ wʕnʔ bpwmʔ dḥrbʔ
22:20	wʔtplṭ brʔ ḥd lʔḥymlk br ʔḥyṭwb wšmh ʔbytr wʕrq lh btr dwyd
22:21	wḥwy ʔbytr ldwyd dqṭl ʔnwn šʔwl lkhnwhy dʔlhʔ
22:22	wʔmr dwyd lʔbytr ydʕ hwyt bywmʔ hw dtmn hwʔ dwʔg ʔdwmyʔ dmḥwyw mḥwʔ lšʔwl wʔnʔ ʔtḥybt bklh npšʔ dbyt ʔbwk
22:23	tb lwty wlʔ tdḥl mṭl dmn dbʕʔ npšy/lnpšy#2#/ bʕʔ ʔp npšk mṭl dnṭwrʔ ʔyt/ʔnt#3#/ ʕmy
23:01	wḥwyw ldwyd wʔmrw lh hʔ plštyʔ mtktšyn bqʕylʔ whnwn bzyn ʔdrʔ
23:02	wšʔl dwyd bmryʔ wʔmr ʔzl ʔḥrwb lplštyʔ/plštyʔ#3#/ hlyn wʔmr lh mryʔ zl ḥrwb lplštyʔ wprwq lqʕylʔ
23:03	wʔmrw lh ʔnšwhy ldwyd mn mḥr ḥnn hrkʔ ḥnn dḥlyn ḥnn ʔyknʔ nʔzl lqʕylʔ lsdrʔ dplštyʔ
23:04	wʔwsp twb dwyd lmšʔl bʔlhʔ wʕnyhy mryʔ wʔmr lh qwm ḥwt lqʕylʔ mṭl dʔnʔ ʔnʔ lhwn lplštyʔ bʔydyk
23:05	wʔzl dwyd wgbrwhy lqʕylʔ wʔtktš ʕm plštyʔ wdbrw bʕyrhwn wmḥʔ bhwn/ʔnwn#23#/ mḥwtʔ rbtʔ wprq dwyd lʕmwryh dqʕylʔ
23:06	wkd ʕrq ʔbytr br ʔḥymlk lwt dwyd lqʕylʔ pdtʔ <dbwṣʔ#3#> nḥtt bʔydh
23:07	wḥwyw lšʔwl dʕl dwyd lqʕylʔ wʔmr šʔwl ʔšlmh ʔlhʔ bʔydy mṭl dʔttḥd dʕl lqrytʔ dtrʕʔ wdswkrʔ/wswkrʔ#3#/
23:08	wʔšmʕ šʔwl lklh ʕmʔ lqrbʔ lmḥt lqʕylʔ lmḥbš ldwyd wlgbrʔ dʕmh
23:09	wydʕ dwyd dḥšl šʔwl ʕlwhy byštʔ wʔmr lʔbytr khnʔ qrb ly pdtʔ
23:10	wʔmr dwyd mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl mšmʕ šmʕ ʕbdk dbʕʔ šʔwl lmʔtʔ lqʕylʔ lmḥblw lqrytʔ mṭlty
23:12	mšlmyn ly mryh dqrytʔ wlgbrʔ dʕmy bʔydh dšʔwl wʔmr mryʔ mšlmyn lk qdm pwq mn qrytʔ/qʕylʔ#3#/
23:13	wqm dwyd wgbrʔ dʕmh ʔyk štmʔʔ gbryn wnpqw mn qʕylʔ whpkw wḥwyw lšʔwl dʕrq dwyd mn qʕylʔ wpš lh mn dlmpq <btrh#3#>
23:14	wytb dwyd bmdbrʔ/bpqʕtʔ#3#/ dmṣrwt wytb bṭwrʔ bmdbrʔ/dmdbrʔ#3#/ dzyp wbʕyhy šʔwl klhwn ywmtʔ wlʔ ʔšlmh ʔlhʔ bʔydh
23:15	wḥzʔ dwyd dnpq šʔwl lmbʕʔ npšh wdwyd bmdbrʔ dzyp bʕbʔ
23:16	wqm ywntn br šʔwl wʔzl lwt dwyd lʕbʔ wḥmsn ʔydwhy bʔlhʔ
23:17	wʔmr lh lʔ tdḥl mṭl dlʔ mškḥʔ lk ʔydh dšʔwl ʔby wʔnt tmlk ʕl ʔysryl wʔnʔ ʔhwʔ ʕmk wtḥʔ wʔp šʔwl ʔby ydʕ dhknʔ hw
23:18	wʔqymw tryhwn qymʔ qdm mryʔ ytb <ʕl#3#> krwbʔ bʕwmqʔ wywntn ʔzl lbyth
23:19	wslqw zypyʔ lwt šʔwl lgbʕ wʔmrw lh hʔ dwyd mtṭšʔ ʕmn bmṣrwt bʕbʔ bgbʕwt bnḥlʔ dmn ymynʔ dʔšymwn
23:20	whšʔ ʔyk kl rgtʔ dnpšk ḥwt ʕlyn wḥnn nšlmywhy bʔydʔ dmlkʔ
23:21	wʔmr lhwn šʔwl brykyn ʔntwn lʔlhʔ dḥstwn ʕly
23:22	zlw tbw ṭbw ytbh wdʕw wḥzw dwkth dthwʔ rglh dmn dḥzyhy tmn mṭl dʔmrw ly dmʕrmw mʕrm
23:23	wdʕw wḥzw mn kwlhyn mṭšytʔ dmṭšy tmn whpwkw lwty lmtqnwtny wʔzl ʕmkwn dʔn ʔytwhy bʔrʕʔ ʔbṣywhy bklhwn ʔlpʔ dyhwdʔ
23:24	wqmw wʔzlw lzyp qdm šʔwl wdwyd wgbrwhy bmdbrʔ dmʕwn bʕrbʔ/bʕbʔ#3#/ ʕl gnb ʔšymwn
23:25	wʔzl šʔwl wʕbdwhy lmbʕyh ldwyd wḥwyw ldwyd wnḥt lh lslʕ wytb bmdbrʔ dmʕwn wšmʕ šʔwl wrdp btr dwyd lmdbrʔ dmʕwn
23:26	wʔzl šʔwl mn gbh dṭwrʔ wdwyd wgbrwhy mn gbh ʔḥrnʔ whwʔ dwyd mstrhb lmʕrq mn qdm šʔwl wšʔwl wʕbdwhy/wgbrwhy#3#/ mtkrkyn ʕl dwyd wʕl gbrwhy/ḥbrwhy#3#/ʕbdwhy#3#/ lmʔḥd ʔnwn
23:27	wʔyzgdʔ ʔtʔ lwt šʔwl wʔmr lh bʕgl tʔ mṭl dšrw plštyʔ bkwlh ʔrʕʔ
23:28	whpk šʔwl mn btr dwyd wʔzl lʔwrʕʔ/lʔrʕʔ#3#/ dplštyʔ mṭl hnʔ qrʔwh lʔrʕʔ hy snʕr plgwtʔ
24:01	wslq dwyd mn tmn wytb bmṣrwt dbgbʕwt
24:02	whwʔ dkd hpk šʔwl mn btr plštyʔ ḥwywhy wʔmrw lh hʔ dwyd bmṣrwt dbgbʕwt
24:03	wdbr šʔwl tltʔ ʔlpyn gbrʔ gbyʔ mn klh ʔysryl wʔzl lmbʕyh ldwyd wlgbrwhy ʕl ʔpy ṭwrʔ ddyṣʔ
24:04	wʔtʔ lmrbʕʔ dʕnʔ dbʔwrḥʔ wtmn ʔyt <hwt#3#> mʕrtʔ wʕl šʔwl lmʕrtʔ wdmk tmn wdwyd wgbrwhy bšpwly mʕrtʔ ytbyn
24:05	wʔmrw lh gbrwhy ldwyd hnw ywmʔ dʔmr lk mryʔ hʔ mšlm bʕldbbk bʔydyk ʕbd lh ʔyknʔ/ʔyk#3#/ dšpyr bʕynyk wqm dwyd wpsq knpʔ dprysh dšʔwl rkykʔyt
24:06	wmn btrkn twyhy lbh ldwyd ʕl dpsq knpʔ dprysh dšʔwl
24:07	wʔmr dwyd lgbrʔ dʕmh ḥs ly mn mryʔ ʔn ʔʕbd ptgmʔ hnʔ lmry lmšyḥh dmryʔ dʔwšṭ/wʔwšṭ#3#/ ʔydy bh mṭwl dmšyḥh hw dmryʔ
24:08	wtwy/wʔtwy#3#/ dwyd lgbrʔ dʕmh bmlʔ hlyn wlʔ šbq ʔnwn lmqm ʕl šʔwl wšʔwl qm mn mʕrtʔ wʔzl bʔwrḥʔ
24:09	wqm dwyd mn btrkn wnpq mn mʕrtʔ wqrʔ btr šʔwl wʔmr mry mlkʔ wʔtpny šʔwl lbstrh wnpl dwyd ʕl ʔpwhy ʕl ʔrʕʔ wsgd
24:10	wʔmr dwyd lšʔwl lʔ tšmʕ mlʔ dʔnšʔ dʔmryn dhʔ dwyd bʕʔ lbyštk/npšk#3#/
24:11	hʔ ḥzy ywmnʔ bʕynyk dʔšlmk mryʔ bʔydy ywmnʔ bmʕrtʔ wʔmrw gbrʔ dʕmy lmqṭlk wḥst ʕlyk wʔmrt lʔ ʔwšṭ ʔydy bmry mṭl dmšyḥh hw dmryʔ
24:12	wʔtpny wḥzy ʔp knpʔ dprysk bʔydy mṭl dkd psqt knpʔ dprysk lʔ qṭltk dʕ wḥzy dlyt bʔydy byštʔ wsklwtʔ wlʔ ḥṭyt lk wʔnt mṣyd ʔnt lmsb npšy
24:13	ndwn mryʔ byny wlk wntbʕny mryʔ bʔydyk wʔydy lʔ thwʔ bk
24:14	ʔyk dʔmyr bmtlʔ qdmyʔ dmn ršyʕʔ npwq rwšʕʔ wʔydy lʔ thwʔ bk
24:15	btr mnw npqt mlkʔ dʔysryl wbtr mnw rdp ʔnt btr klbʔ mytʔ wbtr pwrtʕnʔ ḥd
24:16	nhwʔ mryʔ dynʔ wndwn byny wlk wnḥzʔ wndwn dyny wntbʕny bʔydyk
24:17	wkd gmr dwyd lmʔmr mlʔ hlyn lšʔwl ʔmr lh šʔwl qlk hw hnʔ bry dwyd wʔrym šʔwl qlh wbkʔ
24:18	wʔmr šʔwl ldwyd zdyq ʔnt mny mṭl dʔnt prʕtny ṭbtʔ wʔnʔ prʕtk byštʔ
24:19	wʔnt ḥwyt ywmnʔ dʕbdt ly ṭbtʔ dʔšlmny mryʔ <ywmnʔ#3#> bʔydyk wlʔ qṭltny
24:20	wkd nškḥ gbrʔ lbʕldbbh wnšdrywhy bʔwrḥʔ ṭbtʔ mryʔ nprʕyhy ṭbtʔ nprʕk mryʔ ṭbtʔ ḥlpy ywmnʔ dʕbdt ly
24:21	whšʔ hʔ ydʕt dmmlkw mmlk ʔnt wmtqymʔ bʔydyk mlkwtʔ dʔysryl
24:22	ymy ly bmryʔ dlʔ twbd zrʕy mn btry wlʔ/dlʔ#3#/ twbd šmy mn byt ʔby
24:23	wymʔ dwyd lšʔwl wʔzl šʔwl lbyth wdwyd wgbrʔ dʕmh slqw lmṣpyʔ
25:01	wmyt šmwʔyl wʔtknšw kwlh ʔysryl wʔrqdw ʕlwhy wqbrwhy bqbrh brmtʔ wqm dwyd wnḥt lmdbrʔ dprn
25:02	wgbrʔ ʔyt hwʔ bmʕwn/bʕmwn#3#/ wʕbdh bkrmlʔ wgbrʔ rb hwʔ ṭb wʔyt hwʔ lh ʕnʔ tltʔ ʔlpyn wʔlp ʕzyn whwʔ dkd/kd#3#/ gʔz ʕnh bkrmlʔ
25:03	wšmh dgbrʔ nbl wšmh dʔntth ʔbygl wʔnttʔ špyr hwʔ ḥzwh wqwbllh wgbrʔ nbl qšʔ hwʔ wbyš bṣnʕth wklb
25:04	wšmʕ dwyd bmdbrʔ dgʔz nbl ʕnh
25:05	wšdr dwyd ʕsrʔ ʕlymyn wʔmr dwyd lʕlymʔ sqw lkrmlʔ wzlw lwt nbl wšʔlw bšlmh bšmy
25:06	wʔmrw lh hknʔ mn dnhwʔ ḥy wʔnt šlm wbytk
25:07	rʕwtʔ dylk hww ʕmn wlʔ ʔhrn ʔnwn wlʔ ṭʕʔ lhwn mdm kl ywmtʔ dhww bmdbrʔ
25:08	šʔl lʕbdyk wnḥwwnk whšʔ nškḥwn ʕlymʔ rḥmʔ bʕynyk mṭl dʕl ywmʔ ṭbʔ ʔtyn hb mdm dṣbʔ ʔnt lʕbdyk wlbrk dwyd
25:09	wʔtw ʕlymwhy/ʕbdwhy#3#/ ddwyd wʔmrw lnbl klhyn mlʔ hlyn bšmh ddwyd
25:10	wʕnʔ nbl wʔmr lʕbdwhy ddwyd mnw dwyd wmnw brh dʔyšy ywmnʔ sgyw ʕbdʔ dmrydyn ʔnš mn qdm mrh
25:11	lḥmy wmy wnkst lgzwzy wʔtl lgbrʔ dlʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ <lhwn#3#> mn ʔymkʔ ʔnwn
25:12	whpkw ʕlymwhy ddwyd lʔwrḥhwn wḥwyw ldwyd <ʕl#3#> klhyn mlʔ hlyn
25:13	wʔmr dwyd lgbrʔ dʕmh ʔswrw ʔnš syph wʔsrw sypyhwn wʔp dwyd ʔsr syph wslqw btr dwyd ʔyk ʔrbʕmʔʔ gbryn wmʔtyn <gbryn#3#> pšw lwt mʔnʔ
25:14	wlʔbygl ʔntth dnbl ḥwy ṭlyʔ ḥd mn ʕlymʔ wʔmr šdr dwyd ʔyzgdʔ mn mdbrʔ lmbrkwth lmrn wmʔnt lh bhwn
25:15	wgbrʔ ṭbyn hww ln ṭb wlʔ ʔhrwn wlʔ ʔṭʕyw ln mdm kl ywmtʔ dhlkn ʕmhwn kd hwyn bmdbrʔ
25:16	šwrʔ hww ʕlyn/ln#3#/ ʔp bllyʔ wʔp bʔymmʔ kl ywmtʔ dhwyn ʕmhwn wrʕyn hwyn ʕnʔ
25:17	hšʔ dʕy wḥzy mnʔ ʕbdʔ ʔnty mṭwl dgrmt byštʔ ʕl mrn wʕl klh byth wnbl lwt rʕwtʔ hwʔ
25:18	wʔstrhbt ʔbygl wnsbt mʔtyn dlḥmʔ wtryn grbyn dḥmrʔ wḥmš ʕnʔ kd mtqnn wḥmš sʔyn qlytʔ wmʔʔ gwbnyn wmʔtyn dblyn wsmt ʕl ḥmrʔ
25:19	wʔmrt lʕlymʔ ʕbrw qdmy hʔ ʔnʔ btrkwn ʔtyʔ ʔnʔ wlnbl bʕlh lʔ ḥwyt
25:20	why ytbʔ hwt ʕl ḥmrʔ wnḥtʔ bgnyʔ dṭwrʔ wdwyd wgbrwhy/wgbrʔ dʕmh#3#/ slqyn lʔwrʕh wpgʕt bhwn
25:21	wdwyd ʔmr dglʔyt nṭrn kl dʔyt hwʔ lh bmdbrʔ wlʔ ʔṭʕyn mdm mn kl dʔyt hwʔ lh <bmdbrʔ#3#> wprʕn byštʔ ḥlp ṭbtʔ
25:22	hknʔ nʕbd mryʔ \lʕbdh dwyd /ldwyd ʕbdh#3#/ whknʔ nwsp lh ʔn nštbq <mn#3#> mdm dʔyt lh ʕdmʔ lṣprʔ dmtqn bʔstʔ
25:23	wḥzt ʔbygl ldwyd wʔstrhbt wnḥtt mn ḥmrʔ wnplt qdm dwyd ʕl ʔpyh wsgdt <lh#23#> ʕl ʔrʕʔ
25:24	wnplt ʕl rglwhy wʔmrt bʕyʔ ʔnʔ mnk mry ʕly mry sklwtʔ tmll ʔmtk qdmyk ʕl gbrʔ hnʔ nbl mṭl dʔyk šmh hknʔ hw nbl šmh wmṣʕrnwth ʕmh wʔnʔ ʔmtk lʔ ḥzyt lʕlymʔ dšdr mry
25:26	hšʔ mry ḥy hw mryʔ wḥyʔ hy npšk dylk mry dlʔ/lʔ#3#/ ttqrb ldmʔ wprqk mryʔ hšʔ mry nhwwn bʕldbbyk ʔyk nbl wdbʕyn lk byštʔ
25:27	hšʔ bwrktʔ hdʔ ʔytyt ʔmtk lmry bwrktʔ hb lʕlymʔ dmhlkyn lrgl mry
25:28	wšbwq swrḥnʔ lʔmtk mṭl dmʕbd ʕbd mryʔ lmry bytʔ mhymnʔ mṭl dtktwšwhy dmryʔ mry mtktš wbyštʔ lʔ ʔštkḥt bk mn ywmyk
25:29	wbrnšʔ sm lmrdpk wlmbʕʔ npšk whwt npšh dmry ṣryrʔ bṣrrʔ dḥyʔ ʕm mryʔ ʔlhk wnpšʔ dbʕldbbyk nšdyh mryʔ bgw kptʔ dqlʕʔ
25:30	wnhwʔ dkd nʕbd mryʔ lmry ṭbtʔ ʕlyk wnpqdk lmdbrnʔ ʕl ʔysryl
25:31	lʔ thwʔ lk hdʔ lzwʕtʔ wltwqltʔ dlbk lmʔšd dmʔ dmgn wkd nṭʔb lk mryʔ ʔtdkryh lʔmtk
25:32	wʔmr dwyd lʔbygl bryk hw mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl dšdrky ywmnʔ lʔwrʕy
25:33	bryk <hw#3#> ṭʕmky wbrykʔ ʔnty dklytyny ywmnʔ lmʕl bdmʔ wprqty ʔydy ywmnʔ mn dmʔ
25:34	brm ḥy hw mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl dklny dlʔ ʔbʔš lky ʔlw/dʔlw#3#/ lʔ ʔstrhbty ʔtyty lʔwrʕy ʔn/lʔ#3#/ ʔštḥr lnbl ʕdmʔ \lnwhrʔ dṣprʔ /dnhr ṣprʔ#3#/ dmtqn bʔstʔ
25:35	wnsb dwyd mn ʔydyh mdm dʔytyt wlh ʔmr sqy lbytky bšlmʔ ḥzy dšmʕt bqlky wnsbt bʔpyky
25:36	wʔtt ʔbygl lwt nbl whʔ ʔyt lh mštyʔ bbyth ʔyk mštyʔ dmlkʔ wlbh dnbl ṭb ʕlwhy whw ʔrwʔ ṭb wlʔ ḥwyth ptgmʔ ʕdmʔ dnght
25:37	whwʔ dkd nght wnpṣh ḥmrh ḥwyth ʔntth ptgmʔ hlyn wmyt lbh bgwh whwʔ ʔyk kʔpʔ
25:38	whww ʔyk ʕsrʔ ywmyn wmḥʔ mryʔ lnbl wmyt
25:39	wšmʕ dwyd dmyt nbl wʔmr bryk hw mryʔ <ʔlhʔ#3#> ddn dynʔ dḥsdy mn ʔydy nbl wlʕbdh ḥsk mn byštʔ wbyšth dnbl ʔhpk mryʔ bryšh wšdr dwyd wmll bʔbygl dnsbyh lh ʔnttʔ
25:40	wʔtw/wʔzlw#3#/ ʕbdwhy ddwyd lwt ʔbygl lkrmlʔ wʔmrw lh dwyd šdrn ʕlyky dnsbky lh ʔnttʔ
25:41	wqmt wsgdt ʕl ʔpyh ʕl ʔrʕʔ wʔmrt hʔ ʔmtk lʔmtʔ lmšgw rglʔ dʕbdwhy dmry
25:42	wʔstrhbt wqmt ʔbygl wytbt ʕl ḥmrʔ wḥmš ʕlymth ʔzln lrglh wʔzlt ʕm mlʔkwhy ddwyd whwt lh ʔnttʔ
25:43	wlʔḥynʕm nsb dwyd mn ʔyzrʕyl whwy lh trtyhyn nšʔ
25:44	\wšʔwl yhb /wyhb šʔwl#3#/ lmlkl brth \ʔntt dwyd /ʔntth ddwyd#3#/ lplṭy br lyš dmn/mn#3#/ glym
26:01	wʔtw zypyʔ lwt šʔwl lgbʕ wʔmrw lh hʔ dwyd mtṭšʔ bgbʕwt ḥgylʔ dwyd ʔšymwn
26:02	wqm šʔwl wnḥt lmdbrʔ dzyp wʕmh tltʔ ʔlpyn gbrʔ gbyʔ dʔysryl lmbʕʔ ldwyd bmdbrʔ dzyp
26:03	wšrʔ šʔwl bgbʕwt ḥwylʔ dqdm ʔšymwn bʔwrḥʔ wdwyd ytb bmdbrʔ wḥzʔ <dwyd#3#> dʔtʔ šʔwl btrh lmdbrʔ
26:04	wšdr dwyd gšwšʔ wydʕ dʔtʔ šʔwl btrh
26:05	wqm dwyd wʔtʔ lʔtrʔ dšrʔ tmn šʔwl wḥzʔ dwyd dwktʔ ddmk tmn šʔwl wʔbnyr br nyr rb ḥylh dšʔwl dmk bšbylʔ wʕmʔ šrʔ ḥdrwhy
26:06	wʕnʔ dwyd wʔmr lʔḥymlk ḥtyʔ wlʔbyšy br ṣwryʔ ʔḥwhy dywʔb wʔmr mn nḥt ʕmy lwt šʔwl lmšrytʔ wʔmr ʔbyšy ʔnʔ nḥt <ʔnʔ#3#> ʕmk
26:07	wʔtʔ dwyd wʔbyšy lwt ʕmʔ bllyʔ whʔ šʔwl dmk bšbylʔ wmwrnyth symʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ ʔsdwhy wʔbnyr wʕmʔ dmkyn ḥdrwhy
26:08	wʔmr ʔbyšy ldwyd ʔšlm ywmnʔ ʔlhk bʕldbbk bʔydyk hšʔ ʔmḥywhy bmwrnytʔ hdʔ dbʔrʕʔ zbntʔ ḥdʔ wlʔ ʔtnywhy
26:09	wʔmr dwyd lʔbyšy lʔ tḥbl mṭl dlyt dmwšṭ ʔydh ʕl mšyḥh dmryʔ wzkʔ
26:10	wʔmr dwyd ḥy hw mryʔ ʔlʔ ʔn mryʔ nmḥywhy ʔw ywmh nʔtʔ wnmwt ʔw bqrbʔ nblʕ wnmwt
26:11	ḥs ly mn mryʔ dʔwšṭ ʔydy bmšyḥh dmryʔ hšʔ sb mwrnytʔ dʔsdwhy wqwqtʔ dmyʔ wnʔzl ln
26:12	wnsb dwyd mwrnytʔ wqwqtʔ <dmyʔ#3#> mn ʔsdwhy dšʔwl wʔzlw lhwn wʔnš lʔ ḥzʔ wlʔ ydʕ wlʔ ʔttʕyr mṭl dklhwn dmkyn hww wšntʔ dmryʔ nplt ʕlyhwn
26:13	wʕbr dwyd mn lwt šʔwl wqm ʕl ryšh dṭwrʔ mn rwḥqʔ sgyʔʔ
26:14	wqrʔ dwyd lmlkʔ wlʔbnyr br nyr wʔmr lʔ ʕnʔ ʔnt ʔbnyr wʕnʔ ʔbnyr wʔmr mn ʔnt dqrʔ ʔnt lmlkʔ
26:15	wʔmr dwyd lʔbnyr hʔ gnbrʔ ʔnt wmnw ʔkwtk bklh ʔysryl ʔykw lʔ nṭrt lmrk mlkʔ dʔtʔ ḥd ywmnʔ/ywmʔ#3#/ dnḥblywhy lmlkʔ mrk
26:16	lʔ špyr ʕbdt ḥy hw mryʔ dbny mwtʔ ʔntwn dlʔ nṭrtwn lmrkwn lmšyḥh dmryʔ hšʔ ḥzy ʔykʔ hy mwrnyth dmlkʔ wqwqtʔ dmyʔ dʔsdwhy

26:21	wʔmr šʔwl ldwyd ḥṭyt hpwk br dwyd mṭl dlʔ ʔbʔš lk twb ḥlp dyqrt npšy bʕynyk ywmnʔ hʔ ʔsklt wsklt wḥṭyt ṭb sgy

27:01	wʔmr dwyd blbh hšʔ ʔn npl ʔnʔ ḥd ywm bʔydwhy dšʔwl lyt ly ṭbtʔ ʔlʔ ʔtplṭ ly lʔrʕʔ dplštyʔ wnlʔʔ lmbʕyny twb bklh tḥwmʔ dʔysrʔyl wʔštwzb mn ʔydwhy

31:01	wplštyʔ mtktšyn <hww#3#> ʕm ʔysryl wʕrqw ʔnšʔ dʔysryl mn qdm plštyʔ wnplw qṭylʔ bṭwrʔ dglbwʕ
31:02	wʔdrkw plštyʔ lšʔwl wlbnwhy wqṭlw plštyʔ lywntn wlyšwy wlmlkyšwʕ bnwhy dšʔwl
31:03	wʕšn qrbʔ ʕl šʔwl wʔdrkwhy qštʔ bqšttʔ wdḥl ṭb mn <qdm#23#> qštʔ
31:04	wʔmr šʔwl lšql mʔnwhy šmwṭ sypk wdqwryny bh dlʔ nʔtwn ʕwrlʔ hlyn nqṭlwnny wnbzḥwn by wlʔ ṣbʔ šql mʔnwhy mṭl ddḥl ṭb wnsb šʔwl syph wnpl ʕlwhy
31:05	wḥzʔ šql mʔnwhy dmyt šʔwl wnpl ʔp hw ʕl syph wmyt

31:08	wlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔtw/ʔzlw#3#/ plštyʔ lmšlḥw qṭylʔ wʔškḥw lšʔwl wltltʔ bnwhy kd ʔrmyn \ʕl ṭwrʔ /bṭwrʔ#3#/ dglbwʕ
31:09	wpsqw ryšh wšlḥw/wʔšlḥw#3#/ mʔnwhy wšdrw lmsbrw bʔrʕʔ dplštyʔ wbʕmʔ wbyt ptkryhwn

05:01	wʔtw/wʔtknšw#3#/ kwlhwn šbṭʔ dbyt ʔysryl lwt dwyd lḥbrwn wʔmrw/wʔmryn#3#/ lh hʔ bsrk ḥnn wgrmk
05:02	ʔp mn ʔtmly ʔp mn mntmly kd šʔwl hwʔ mlkʔ ʕlyn ʔnt hw mpq hwyt wmʕl lʔysryl wʔmr lk mryʔ dʔnt trʕʔ lʕmy ʔysryl wʔnt thwʔ mdbrnʔ ʕl ʕmy ʔysryl

09:07	ʔmr lh dwyd lʔ tdḥl mṭl dʕbd ʔnʔ ʕmk ṭybwtʔ mṭl ywntn ʔbwk wmpnʔ ʔnʔ lk klhyn ḥqltʔ dšʔwl ʔbwk wʔnt thwʔ ʔkl lḥmʔ ʕl ptwry ʔmynʔyt

10:01	wmn btrkyn myt mlkʔ dbny ʕmwn wʔmlk ḥnwn brh btrh

10:05	wḥwyw ldwyd wšdr lʔwrʕhwn mṭl dhww ʔnšʔ bhytyn ṭb ʔmr lhwn mlkʔ tbw bʔyryḥw ʕdmʔ dnʔʕwn dqnykwn why dyn tʔtwn

12:00	<mksnwth dntn nbyʔ ldwyd#3#>
12:01	wšdr mryʔ lntn nbyʔ lwt dwyd wʔtʔ lwth wʔmr lh tryn ʔnšyn ʔyt hww bqrytʔ ḥdʔ ḥd ʕtyr wḥd mskyn

13:00	<sklwth dḥmnwn wḥṭyth ddmk ʕm ḥth#3#>
13:01	wmn btrkn ʔyt hwt ḥtʔ lʔbšlwm br dwyd wšmh tmr wrḥmh ḥmnwn br dwyd

13:03	wlḥmnwn ʔyt hwʔ rḥmʔ wšmh ywndb br šmʔ ʔḥwhy ddwyd wywndb gbrʔ hwʔ ḥkymʔ dṭb
13:04	ʔmr lh lḥmnwn br mlkʔ mnw dhknʔ ʔzl ʔnt mn \ṣpr lṣpr /ṣprʔ lṣprʔ#3#/ lʔ ʔmr ʔnt ly ʔmr lh ḥmnwn ltmr ḥth dʔbšlwm ʔḥy rḥm ʔnʔ

13:06	wdmk ḥmnwn wʔtkrh wʔtʔ mlkʔ <dwyd#3#> lmḥzyh ʔmr lh ḥmnwn lmlkʔ tʔtʔ lwty tmr ḥty wtʕbd lʕny tryn lbwtʔ wʔlʕs/dʔlʕs#3#/ mn ʔydyh

13:09	wnsbt lbwtʔ wsmt qdmwhy wlʔ ṣbʔ lmʔkl ʔmr ḥmnwn npqwn ʔnšʔ klhwn mn lwty wnpqw klhwn ʔnšʔ mn lwth
13:10	ʔmr lh ḥmnwn ltmr ʔʕly ly mʔkwltʔ lqyṭwnʔ wʔlʕs/dʔlʕs#3#/ mn ʔydyky wnsbt tmr lbwtʔ dʕbdt wʔʕlt lḥmnwn ʔḥwh lqyṭwnʔ
13:11	wqrbt lh lmlʕs wʔḥdh wʔmr lh ty dmk ʕmy ḥty
13:12	ʔmrʔ lh lʔ ʔḥy lʔ tṣʕrny lʔ wlʔ dntʕbd hknʔ bʔysryl/byt ʔysryl#3#/
13:13	ʔnʔ lʔykʔ ʔwbl ḥsdy wʔnt dyn mtḥšb ʔnt bʔysryl ʔyk ḥd mn šṭyʔ/šyṭʔ#3#/ hšʔ ʔmr lmlkʔ wlʔ klʔ ly mnk
13:14	wlʔ ṣbʔ lmšmʕh wʔḥdh wḥsnh wdmk ʕmh wṣʕrh
13:15	wsnh ḥmnwn <ltmr#3#> snʔtʔ rbtʔ wsgyt snʔtʔ dsnh ytyr mn rḥmtʔ drḥmh ʔmr lh ḥmnwn qwmy zly
13:16	ʔmrʔ lh mkyl dʕbdt by byštʔ hdʔ mšdr ʔnt ly wlʔ ṣbʔ lmšmʕh
13:17	wqrʔ lṭlyʔ mšmšnh wʔmr lh ʔpqyh lhdʔ mn lwty lbr wʔḥwd trʕʔ bʔpyh
13:19	wnsbt tmr qṭmʔ wʔrmyt bryšh wkwtynʔ mḥṭbtʔ/mḥṭptʔ#3#/ dlbyšʔ hwt sdqt wsmt ʔydyh ʕl ryšh wmyllʔ wʔzlʔ
13:20	ʔmr lh ʔbšlwm ʔḥwh ḥmnwn ʔḥwky dmk lwtky hšʔ ḥty štwqy lky ʔḥwky hw lʔ tʔtʔ ʕl blky hdʔ ʕbydtʔ wytbt tmr wtmyhʔ hwt byt ʔbšlwm ʔḥwhy
13:21	wdwyd mlkʔ šmʕ bklhyn mlʔ hlyn wʔtʔbš lh ṭb
13:22	wlʔ ʔmr ʔbšlwm lḥmnwn lʔ ṭbtʔ wlʔ byštʔ mṭl dsnyhy ʔbšlwm lḥmnwn ʕl dṣʕr ltmr ḥth
13:23	wlʕdn bʕdn hww gzwzʔ lʔbšlwm bbʕl ḥṣwr dʕm ʔprym wzmn <ʔnwn#3#> ʔbšlwm lklhwn bny mlkʔ
13:24	wʔtʔ ʔbšlwm lwt mlkʔ <dwyd#3#> wʔmr lh gzwzʔ ʔyt lʕbdk nʔzl mlkʔ wʕbdwhy ʕm ʕbdk
13:25	ʔmr lh lʔ bry lʔ nʔzl kln dlʔ nʔqr ʕlyk wʔlṣh wlʔ ṣbʔ <mlkʔ#3#> dnʔzl ʕmh wbrkh <mlkʔ dwyd lʔbyšlwm#3#>
13:26	ʔmr lh ʔbšlwm wmʔ dlʔ nʔzl ʕmy ḥmnwn ʔḥy ʔmr lh mlkʔ lmnʔ ʔzl ʕmk
13:27	wʔlṣh ʔbšlwm wšdr ʕmh lḥmnwn/ḥmnwn#3#/ wlklhwn bny mlkʔ
13:28	wpqd <ʔnwn#3#> ʔbšlwm lʕbdwhy wʔmr lhwn mʔ dšpr lbh dḥmnwn bḥmrʔ wʔmrt lkwn mḥʔwhy lḥmnwn wqwṭlwhy lʔ tdḥlwn ʔnʔ hw pqdtkwn ʔtḥylw whww gbrʔ
13:29	wʕbdw ʕbdwhy dʔbšlwm ʔyk/ʔyknʔ#3#/ dpqd ʔnwn ʔbšlwm wqmw klhwn bny mlkʔ wrkbw gbr ʕl kwdnyh wʕrqw
13:30	wʕd hnwn bʔwrḥʔ mṭʔ ṭbʔ ldwyd dqṭl ʔnwn ʔbšlwm lklhwn bny mlkʔ wlʔ šbq mnhwn ʔnš
13:31	wqm mlkʔ wsdq lbwšwhy wdmk/wytb#3#/ ʕl ʔrʕʔ wklhwn ʕbdwhy qymyn kd msdqyn lbwšyhwn
13:32	wʕnʔ ywndb br šmʔ ʔḥwhy ddwyd wʔmr lh lʔ nsbr mry mlkʔ dklhwn bny mlkʔ mytw mṭl dḥmnwn hw blḥwdwhy myt symʔ hwt gyr brʕynh dʔbšlwm mn ywmʔ dṣʕr ltmr ḥth
13:33	wʔp hšʔ lʔ nsbr mry mlkʔ dklhwn bny mlkʔ mytw mṭl dḥmnwn hw blḥwdwhy myt
13:34	wʕrq lh ʔbšlwm wʔrym dwqʔ ʕynwhy wḥzʔ ʔnšʔ sgyʔʔ dʔtyn bʔwrḥʔ mn gbʔ dṭwrʔ
13:35	ʔmr lh ywndb lmlkʔ hʔ bny mlkʔ ʔtw ʔyknʔ dʔmr ʕbdk hknʔ hwʔ
13:36	wkd šlm lmmllw ʔtw bny mlkʔ wʔrymw qlhwn wbkw wʔp mlkʔ wklhwn ʕbdwhy bkw bktʔ/bbktʔ#3#/ rbtʔ
13:37	wʔbšlwm ʕrm wʔzl lwt twlmy br ʕmyhwd mlkʔ dgšwr wytb dwyd bʔblʔ ʕl brh ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ
13:38	wʔbšlwm ʕrm wʔzl lgšwr whwʔ tmn tlt šnyn
13:39	wʔhmy/wʔttwš#3#/wʔttwy#3#/ mlkʔ dwyd lmpq btr/ʕl#3#/ ʔbšlwm mṭl dʔtbyʔ ʕl ḥmnwn dmyt
14:01	wydʕ ywʔb br ṣwryʔ dʔtrʕy lbh \ddwyd mlkʔ /dmlkʔ#3#/ lʔbšlwm
14:02	wšdr ywʔb ltqwʕ wdbr mn tmn ʔnttʔ ḥkymtʔ wʔmr lh ʔtʔbly wlbšy lbwšʔ dʔblʔ wlʔ tmšḥyn mšḥʔ whwy ʔyk ʔnttʔ dhʔ ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ mtʔblʔ ʕl mytʔ
14:03	wʕwly lky lwt mlkʔ wʔmr lh mlkʔ hdʔ wtqn mlʔ wsm bpwmh
14:04	wʕlt ʔnttʔ tqwʕytʔ lwt mlkʔ wnplt ʕl ʔpyh ʕl ʔrʕʔ wsgdt <lmlkʔ#3#> wʔmrt prwqyny mry mlkʔ
14:05	ʔmr lh mlkʔ mʔ lky ʔmrʔ lh šryrʔyt ʔnttʔ ʔnʔ ʔrmltʔ bʕly myt lh
14:06	wlʔmtk ʔyt hww tryn bnyn wnṣw tryhwn bdbrʔ wlʔ ʔyt hwʔ mpṣynʔ bynthwn wḥsn ḥd lḥbrh wqṭlh
14:07	whʔ qmt lh klh šrbtʔ ʕl ʔmtk wʔmryn hbywhy ln lhw dqṭl lʔḥwhy wnqṭlywhy ʕl ʔpy ʔḥwhy dqṭl wbʕyn dnwbdwnh lyrwtʔ/lyrtʔ#3#/ wbʕyn dndʕkwn gmwrtʔ dʔštḥrt ly dlʔ nšbqwn lʔbwhy/lʔḥwhy#3#/ šmʔ wšrbtʔ ʕl ʔpy ʔrʕʔ
14:08	ʔmr lh mlkʔ zly lbytky ʔnʔ ʔpqwd ʕlyky
14:09	ʔmrʔ <lh hy#3#> ʔnttʔ tqwʕytʔ lmlkʔ mry mlkʔ hdʔ skltʔ ʕly wʕl byt ʔby wmlkʔ wkwrsyh mpṣy
14:10	ʔmr lh mlkʔ mn dʔmr lky mdm ʔytʔywhy lwty wtwb lʔ mtqrb lky
14:11	<ʕnt twb#3#> wʔmrt ntdkr mry mlkʔ dmryʔ ʔlhk bswgʔʔ dḥwdtʔ ddmʔ lʔ mḥbl lʔ nwbdwn lbry ʔmr lh mlkʔ ḥy hw mryʔ ʔlhʔ ʔn npl mn sʕrʔ dryšh dbrky ʕl ʔrʕʔ
14:12	wʔmrt ʔnttʔ tʔmr ʔmtk mlkʔ lmlkʔ ʔmr lh mlkʔ ʔmry
14:13	ʔmrʔ lh ʔnttʔ lmnʔ ʔtḥšbt hdʔ ʕl ʕmh dʔlhʔ wlmnʔ ʔmrt mlkʔ ʔyk ḥybʔ wlʔ mhpk ʔnt mlkʔ ṭʕyk
14:14	mmt/dmmt#3#/ mytynn wʔyk myʔ ḥnn dmtʔšdyn bʔrʕʔ wlʔ mtknšyn wlʔ šql ʔlhʔ npšʔ wmtḥšb mḥšbtʔ dlʔ nṭʕʔ mnh ʔnš
14:15	hšʔ hʔ ʔmrt lmry mlkʔ mltʔ hdʔ dlḥwny gyr ʕmʔ wʔmrt ʔmtk ʔnʔ ʔmr lmlkʔ/lmry mlkʔ#3#/
14:16	kbr npṣʔ lʔmth mn ʔydy ʔnšʔ dlʔ nwbdwnny ly wlbry mn yrtwth dʔlhʔ
14:17	wʔmrt ʔmtk tšr mlth dmry mlkʔ wthwʔ qwrbnʔ mṭl dʔyk mlʔkh dʔlhʔ hknʔ mry mlkʔ lmšmʕ ṭb wbyš wmryʔ ʔlhk nhwʔ ʕmk
14:18	wʕnʔ mlkʔ wʔmr lh lʔnttʔ lʔ tṭšyn mny mdm dšʔl ʔnʔ lky ʔmrʔ lh ʔnttʔ ʔmr mry mlkʔ
14:19	ʔmr lh mlkʔ ʔydh dywʔb ʔyt ʕmky bhlyn klhyn wʕnt ʔnttʔ wʔmrt lh ḥyʔ hy npšk mry mlkʔ dlʔ lymynʔ wlʔ lsmlʔ sṭyt mn kl mdm dʔmr mry mlkʔ ʕbdk hw ywʔb pqdny whw sm bpwmh dʔmtk kwlhyn mlʔ hlyn
14:20	mṭl dtʕbd bʔpy mṭl hw ʕbd ʕbdk ywʔb hknʔ wmry ḥkym ʔyk ḥkmtʔ dmlʔkwhy dʔlhʔ lmdʕ kl dʔyt bʔrʕʔ
14:21	ʔmr lh mlkʔ lywʔb hʔ ʕbdt ʔyk dʔmrt zl ʔytyhy ly lʔbšlwm ṭlyʔ
14:22	wnpl ywʔb ʕl ʔpwhy ʕl ʔrʕʔ wsgd lmlkʔ wʔmr ywʔb ywmnʔ ydʕ ʕbdk dʔškḥt rḥmʔ bʕynyk mry mlkʔ dʕbd mlkʔ mltʔ dʕbdh
14:23	wqm ywʔb wʔzl lgšwr wʔytyh lʔbšlwm lʔwršlm
14:24	wʔmr mlkʔ nʔzl lbyth wqdmy lʔ ntḥzʔ wʔzl ʔbšlwm lbyth \wʔpy mlkʔ /wʔpwhy dmlkʔ#3#/ lʔ ḥzʔ
14:25	wʔyk ʔbšlwm lyt hwʔ gbrʔ bʔysryl dmštbḥ ṭb mn pstʔ drglh wʕdmʔ lmwḥh lyt hwʔ bh mwmʔ
14:26	wmʔ dmspr hwʔ ryšh mn ʕdn lʕdn mspr hwʔ mṭl dʕšn hwʔ ʕlwhy mspr hwʔ lh wtql hwʔ sʕrʔ dryšh mʔtyn mtqlyn bmtqlʔ dmlkʔ
14:27	wʔtyldw lʔbšlwm tltʔ bnyn wbrtʔ ḥdʔ wšmh tmr wʔp hy hwt ʔnttʔ špyrt bḥzwʔ/ḥzwʔ#23#/
14:28	wytb ʔbšlwm bʔwršlm trtyn šnyn wʔpy mlkʔ lʔ ḥzʔ
14:29	wšdr ʔbšlwm ʕl ywʔb dnšdrhy lwt mlkʔ wlʔ ṣbʔ dnʔtʔ/lmʔtʔ#3#/ wšdr twb dtrtyn zbnyn wlʔ ṣbʔ lmʔtʔ/dnʔtʔ#3#/
14:30	wʔmr ʔbšlwm lʕbdwhy ḥzw ḥqlʔ ʔykʔ dʔyt lywʔb ʕl gnby dḥṭʔ ʔw dsʕrʔ zlw ʔwqdwh bnwrʔ wʔwqdw ʕbdwhy dʔbšlwm lḥqlh/ḥqlh#3#/ dywʔb
14:31	wqm ywʔb wʔzl lbyth dʔbšlwm wʔmr lh ywʔb lʔbšlwm lmnʔ/mṭl mnʔ#3#/ ʔwqdw ʕbdyk ḥqly bnwrʔ
14:32	ʔmr lh ʔbšlwm lywʔb hʔ šdrt ʕlyk/lwtk#3#/ wʔmrt <lk#3#> dtʔtʔ/dtʔ#3#/ <lwty#3#> ʔšdrk lwt mlkʔ lmnʔ ʔtyt mn gšwr pqḥ hwʔ ly kd ʔnʔ tmn whšʔ ṣbʔ ʔnʔ dʔtḥzʔ qdm mlkʔ ʔn ʔyt ly sklwtʔ nqṭlny
14:33	wʔtʔ ywʔb qdm mlkʔ <wsgd ʔpwhy#3#> wḥwyh mlwhy dʔbšlwm wqryhy lʔbšlwm wʕl ʔbšlwm qdm mlkʔ wsgd ʕl ʔpwhy ʕl ʔrʕʔ qdm mlkʔ wnšqh mlkʔ lʔbšlwm
15:00	<mwth dʔbšlwm wbyštʔ mn byth ʔyk dqmt ʕl dwyd dʔmr lh gd nbyʔ#3#>
15:01	wmn btrkn ʕbd lh ʔbšlwm mrkbtʔ wpršʔ wḥmšyn ṭblryn/ṭblrʔ#3#/ drhṭyn/rhṭyn#3#/ hww qdmwhy
15:02	wʔqdm hwʔ ʔbšlwm wqʔm hwʔ ʕl gnb trʕʔ dmlkʔ wkl gbrʔ dʔyt hwʔ lh dynʔ lmdn qdm mlkʔ qrʔ hwʔ lh ʔbšlwm lwth wʔmr lh mn ʔydʔ ʔnt qrytʔ ʔmr lh ʕbdk ʔnʔ mn ḥd mn šbṭʔ dʔysryl/dbny ʔysryl#3#/
15:03	ʔmr lh ʔbšlwm hʔ ḥzʔ ʔnʔ mlyk/dmlyk#3#/ špyrn wtryṣn wšmwʕʔ lyt lk mn lwt mlkʔ
15:04	wʔmr <lh#3#> ʔbšlwm mn dyn ʕbdny dynʔ bʔrʕʔ wlwty dyn ʔtʔ <hwʔ#3#> kl gbrʔ dʔyt lh dynʔ wtbʕtʔ wmzkʔ hwyt lh
15:05	wmʔ dqʔm hwʔ gbrʔ lmsgd lh ʔḥd hwʔ <lh#3#> bʔydh wnšq hwʔ lh
15:06	wʕbd hwʔ ʔbšlwm hknʔ lkwlh ʔysryl dʔtyn hww lmdn qdm mlkʔ wʔsṭyh ʔbšlwm lbʔ \dklhwn bny /dklh#3#/ ʔysryl
15:07	wmn btr ʔrbʕ šnyn ʔmr ʔbšlwm lmlkʔ ʔzl ʔšlm ndry dndrt lmryʔ bḥbrwn
15:08	ndrʔ gyr ndr ʕbdk kd ytb hwyt bgšwr wbʔdwm dʔn mhpkw nhpkny mryʔ lʔwršlm ʔplwḥ lmryʔ
15:09	ʔmr lh mlkʔ zl bšlmʔ wqm ʔzl lḥbrwn
15:10	wšdr ʔbšlwm gšwšʔ bklhwn šbṭʔ dʔysryl wpqd dmʔ dšmʕtwn qlʔ dšypwrʔ ʔmrw dʔmlk/ʔmlk#3#/ ʔbšlwm bḥbrwn
15:11	wʕm ʔbšlwm ʔzlw mʔtyn gbryn mn ʔwršlm wʔzlw tmymʔyt lʔ ydʕyn mdm
15:12	wšdr ʔbšlwm ʕl ʔḥytwpyl glywnyʔ mlk mlkh ddwyd wdbrh mn qryth mn glyw kd dbḥ dbḥtʔ wmrdʔ ʔzl hwʔ wʕšn wʕmʔ ṭb sgʔ hwʔ ʕl gnb ʔbšlwm
15:13	wʔtʔ msbrnʔ lwt dwyd wʔmr lh ʔštwy lbhwn dbny ʔysryl btr ʔbšlwm
15:14	wʔmr dwyd lklhwn ʕbdwhy dʕmh bʔwršlm qwmw nʕrwq ln dlmʔ lʔ nškḥ lmtplṭw mn qdm <mry#3#> ʔbšlwm bʕgl nʔzl ln dlmʔ nstrhb wndrkn wndḥʔ ʕlyn byštʔ wnmḥyh lqrytʔ bpwmʔ dḥrbʔ
15:15	wʔmrw ʕbdwhy dmlkʔ lmlkʔ klmdm dṣbʔ ʔnt mrn mlkʔ hknʔ ʕbdyn ʕbdyk
15:16	wnpq mlkʔ wklhwn bny byth lrglh wšbq mlkʔ ʕsr nšʔ/nšyn#3#/ drwktʔ dnṭrn byth
15:17	wnpq mlkʔ wklh ʕmʔ lrglh wqmw brwḥqʔ
15:18	wklhwn ʕbdwhy ʕbryn ʕlwhy wkwlhwn ḥʔrwhy wklhwn plḥwhy wklhwn gtyʔ dʔtw lrglh mn gt ʕbryn qdm mlkʔ
15:19	ʔmr lh mlkʔ lʔty gtyʔ lmnʔ ʔzl ʔnt ʔp ʔnt ʕmn pwš lk mn mlkʔ mṭl dnwkryʔ ʔnt wʔp mglyw glyt mn ʔtrk
15:20	ʔtmly ʔtyt wywmnʔ nzyʕk dtʔzl ʕmn wʔnʔ ʔzl ʔnʔ lkr dʔzl ʔnʔ pwš wʔwtb lʔḥyk špyr
15:21	wʕnʔ ʔty <gtyʔ#3#> wʔmr lmlkʔ ḥy hw mryʔ wḥyʔ hy npšk mlkʔ ʔlʔ bʔtrʔ dnhwʔ/dhwʔ#3#/ mry mlkʔ ʔw lmwtʔ ʔw lḥyʔ ʔlʔ tmn nhwʔ ʕbdk
15:22	wʔmr dwyd lʔty ʕbr zl lk wʕbr ʔty gtyʔ wklhwn ʔnšwhy wklh yqrtʔ dʕmh
15:23	wklh ʔrʕʔ bkyn bktʔ rbtʔ wklh ʕmʔ ʕbryn wmlkʔ ʕbr bnḥlʔ dqdrwn wklh ʕmʔ ʕbryn ʕl ʔpy ʔwrḥʔ dmdbrʔ
15:24	whʔ/whwʔ#3#/ ʔp ṣdwq khnʔ wklhwn lwyʔ dʕmh šqylyn lqbwtʔ/bqbwth#3#/qbwtʔ#3#/ dʔlhʔ wslq ʔbytr ʕdmʔ dšlm klh ʕmʔ lmʕbr mn qrytʔ
15:25	wʔmr mlkʔ <dwyd#3#> lṣdwq ʔhpkyh lqbwth dʔlhʔ lqrytʔ ṭk ʔšbḥ rḥmʔ bʕyny mryʔ wnhpkny wnḥwyny lh wldyrh
15:26	wʔn hknʔ nʔmr lʔ ṣbʔ ʔnʔ bk hʔ qʔm ʔnʔ nʕbd ly ʔyk dšpyr bʕynwhy
15:27	wʔmr mlkʔ <dwyd#3#> lṣdwq khnʔ hpwk zl <lk#3#> lqrytʔ bšlmʔ ʔnt wʔḥymʕṣ brk wntn br ʔbytr tryhwn bnykwn ʕmkwn
15:28	wḥzw hʔ ʔnʔ mštwḥr ʔnʔ bpqʕtʔ dmdbrʔ ʕdmʔ dʔtʔ ʔnš mn lwtkwn wmḥwʔ ly
15:29	wʔhpkw ṣdwq <khnʔ#3#> wʔbytr khnʔ lʔrwnʔ dʔlhʔ lʔwršlm wytbw tmn
15:30	wdwyd slq bmsqnʔ dzytʔ bkʔ wslq wmhlk wryšh mḥpy wklh ʕmʔ dʕmh mḥpyn ryšyhwn wbkyn wslqyn
15:31	wḥwywhy ldwyd wʔmrw lh dmrd lh ʔḥytwpyl ʕm ʔbšlwm wʔmr dwyd wʔmr nbṭlyh trʕyth/ltrʕyth#3#/ dʔḥytwpyl
15:32	wdwyd mṭʔ ldwktʔ ḥdʔ ʔtr dsgd hwʔ lʔlhʔ wʔtʔ lwth ḥwšy ʔrkyʔ ṣryʔ kwtynh wʕprʔ rmʔ bryšh
15:33	ʔmr lh dwyd ʔn ʕbr ʔnt ʕmy hwʔ ʔnt ly ṭʕnʔ
15:34	ʔlʔ hpwk lqrytʔ <wzl lwt ʔbyšlwm#3#> wʔmr lʔbšlwm/lh#3#/ ʕbdk ʔnʔ mlkʔ wʕbdh dʔbwk mn qdym whšʔ ʔnʔ mlkʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnk zl bṭl trʕyth dʔḥytwpyl
15:35	hʔ ʔyt tmn lwtk ṣdwq wʔbytr khnʔ kl mltʔ dšmʕ ʔnt mn byt mlkʔ ḥwʔ lṣdwq wlʔbytr khnʔ
15:36	hʔ ʔyt tmn tryn bnyhwn ʔḥymʕṣ brh dṣdwq wntn br ʔbytr šlwḥw ly bʔydyhwn kwl mdm dšmʕyn ʔntwn
15:37	wʔzl ḥwšy rḥmh ddwyd lqrytʔ wʔbšlwm ʕl lʔwršlm
16:01	wdwyd prq qlyl mn dwktʔ ʔtr dsgd hwʔ wṣybʔ ṭlyh dmpybšt ʔtʔ lʔwrʕh wʔyty ʕmh tryn ḥmryn kd ṭʕynyn wʔyt ʕlyhwn mʔtyn gryṣn wmʔʔ dblyn wmʔʔ gwbnyn wzqʔ dḥmrʔ
16:02	ʔmr lh mlkʔ lṣybʔ hlyn mn ʔymkʔ lk ʔmr lh ṣybʔ <lmlkʔ#3#> ḥmrʔ dnšqlwn ṭʕwntʔ dbyt mlkʔ wlḥmʔ wlḥmʔ wgwbnʔ dnʔklwn ṭlyʔ wḥmrʔ dnštwn ʔylyn dmṭrpyn bmdbrʔ
16:03	wʔmr lh mlkʔ ʔykw br mryk ʔmr lh ṣybʔ hʔ ytb bʔwršlm wʔmr npnwn ly bny ʔysryl mlkwth dšʔwl ʔby
16:04	ʔmr lh dwyd lṣybʔ yhyb lk klmdm/mdm#3#/ dʔyt lmpybšt wʔmr <lh#3#> ṣybʔ sgy ʔyt ly wʔnʔ ʔškḥt rḥmʔ bʕynyk mry mlkʔ
16:05	wʔtʔ mlkʔ dwyd ʕdmʔ lbyt ḥwrym wnpq mn tmn gbrʔ ḥd mn šrbtʔ dbyt šʔwl wšmh šmʕy br gʔrʔ npq wmṣḥʔ/wmṣʕr#3#/ <hwʔ#3#> lh ldwyd
16:06	wrgm lh bkʔpʔ lh wlklhwn ʕbdwhy wlklh ʕmʔ wlklhwn ʕbdwhy dmn smlh

16:08	nprʕk mryʔ dbyt šʔwl dʔmlkt btrh wnšlmyh mryʔ mlkwtk/lmlkwtk#3#/ bʔydh dʔbšlwm brk whʔ ʔtprʕt byštk mṭwl dgbrʔ ʔnt ʔšd dmʔ
16:09	ʔmr lh ʔbyšy br ṣwryʔ ldwyd lmnʔ mṣḥʔ hnʔ klbʔ mytʔ lmry mlkʔ ʔʕbr ʔsbywhy ryšh
16:10	ʔmr lh mlkʔ dwyd mʔ ly wlkwn bny ṣwryʔ šwbqwhy mṣḥʔ mryʔ hw ʔmr lh dṣḥʔ ldwyd mn dyn ʔmr ly lmnʔ hwny hknʔ
16:11	ʔmr lh dwyd lʔbyšy wlklhwn ʕbdwhy hʔ bry dnpq mn mʕy bʕʔ dnsb npšy <mny#3#> wʔp hšʔ bny ymyny šwbqwhy mṣḥʔ ʔlhʔ/mryʔ#3#/ hw ʔmr lh <dṣḥʔ ldwyd#3#>

16:14	wʔtʔ mlkʔ wklh ʕmʔ dʕmh kd mṭrpyn wʔttnyḥw tmn
16:15	wʔbšlwm wklh ʕmʔ dʕmh wkwlh ʔysryl ʔtw lʔwršlm wʔḥytwpyl ʕmh
16:16	wkd ʔtʔ ḥwšy ʔrkyʔ rḥmh ddwyd lwt ʔbšlwm ʔmr lh ḥwšy lʔbšlwm ḥyy mlkʔ ḥyy mlkʔ

16:18	ʔmr lh ḥwšy lʔbšlwm lʔ hwʔ ʕm mn dgbʔ mryʔ wʕmʔ hnʔ wklh ʔysryl dylh ʕmh ʔtb
16:19	wdylh ʔhwʔ wdtrtyn zbnyn dmn ʔnʔ ʕbdʔ lʔ hwt bʔydy ʔyk/hdʔ dʔyk#3#/ dplḥt qdm ʔbwk hknʔ ʔplwḥ qdmyk
16:20	ʔmr <lh#3#> ʔbšlwm lʔḥytwpyl mlwkyny mnʔ ʔʕbd
16:21	ʔmr lh ʔḥytwpyl lʔbšlwm ʕwl ʕl drwkth dʔbwk dšbq dnṭrn byth wmʔ dšmʕ klh ʔysryl dhwyt ʕm drwkth dʔbwk mtḥyln ʔydʔ dkl mn dʕmk
16:22	wnqšw lh lʔbšlwm mšknʔ ʕl ʔgrʔ wʕl ʔbšlwm ʕl drwkth dʔbwhy lʕyn klh ʔysryl
16:23	wmlkʔ dmlk hwʔ ʔḥytwpl bywmtʔ hnwn ʔyk ʔnš dnšʔl bmlth dʔlhʔ hknʔ kwlhwn mlkwhy dʔḥytwpyl ʔp ldwyd wʔp lʔbyšlwm

17:09	hšʔ mtṭšʔ hw/hwʔ#3#/ bḥd mn ʔtrwtʔ ʔw bḥdʔ mn dwkytʔ wmʔ dnpln bhwn ʔyk dbqdmytʔ wšmʕ ṭbʔ dhwt mḥwtʔ bʕmʔ \dbtr ʔbšlwm /dbyt ʔbšlwm#3#/

17:11	mlk ʔnʔ dmʔ dʔtknš klh ʔysryl lwtk mn dn wʕdmʔ lbršbʕ wʔnt ʔzl bmṣʕtʔ

17:13	wʔn lqrytʔ nʕwl nrmwn bh klh ʔysryl ḥblʔ wngdwnh ʕdmʔ lnḥlʔ wlʔ nšbwq tmn ʔp lʔ ṣṣrʔ
17:14	ʔmr ʔbšlwm wklh ʔysryl ṭb hw mlkh dḥwšby ʔrkyʔ mn mlkh dʔḥytwpyl wmryʔ pqd lmbṭlw mlkh ṭbʔ dʔḥytwpyl mṭl dnytʔ mryʔ ʕl ʔbšlwm byštʔ

17:16	hšʔ šdrw bʕgl ḥww ldwyd wʔmrw lh lʔ tbwt bllyʔ <hnʔ#3#> bpqʕtʔ dmdbrʔ ʔlʔ ʕbr lk dlʔ tʔbd ʔnt wklh ʕmʔ dʕmk
17:17	wntn wʔḥymʕṣ qymyn <hww#3#> ʕl gnb ʕynʔ dqṣrʔ wʔzlt/wʔtt#3#/ ʔmtʔ ḥwyt ʔnwn wʔzlw wḥwyw lmlkʔ dwyd mṭwl dlʔ ʔškḥw lmtḥzyw wlmʕl lqrytʔ
17:18	wḥzʔ ʔnwn ṭlyʔ wḥwy lʔbšlwm wʔzlw tryhwn wʕlw <lqrytʔ#3#> lbyth dgbrʔ ḥd mn byt ḥwrym wʔyt hwt/hwʔ#3#/ lh brʔ bdrth wnḥtw lh

17:20	wʔtw ʕbdwhy dʔbšlwm lbyth dʔnttʔ wʔmryn ʔykw ʔḥymʕṣ wntn ʔmrʔ lhwn ʔnttʔ ʕbrw lhwn mkʔ mṭl dmyʔ bʕw wlʔ ʔškḥw whpkw lhwn lʔwršlm
17:21	wmn btr dʔzlw lhwn slqw hnwn/lhwn#3#/ mn brʔ wʔzlw ḥwyw lmlkʔ dwyd wʔmrw lh qwm bʕgl wʕbr myʔ mṭl dhknʔ mlk ʕlykwn ʔḥytwpyl
17:22	wqm/wqdm#3#/ dwyd wklh ʕmʔ dʕmh wʕbrw ywrdnn wkd slq šprʔ lʔ pš ʔnš dlʔ ʕbr wrdnn
17:23	wʔḥytwpyl ḥzʔ dlʔ šr mlkh wʔrmy ʕl ḥmrh wqm ʔzl lbyth wlqryth wpqd ʕl byth wḥnq npšh wmyt wʔtqbr bqbrʔ dʔbwhy

18:01	wmnʔ dwyd lʕmʔ dʕmh wʔqym ʕlyhwn rby ʔlpʔ wrby mʔwtʔ

18:03	ʔn mʕrq ʕrqynn lʔ symyn ʕlyn blbhwn hšʔ kdw ln ʕsrʔ ʔlpyn ṭb ln dnhwwn ln mʕdrnʔ mn qwryʔ wʔmrw lh ʕbdwhy ldwyd ḥnn npwq wnstrhb lmtktšw ʕmhwn

18:14	ʔmr lh ywʔb lʔ hknʔ ʔnʔ ʔšrʔ qdmyk wnsb ywʔb tltʔ šbṭyn bʔydh wmḥʔ ʔnwn blbh dʔbšlwm wʕdkyl ḥy hwʔ wtlʔ bʔyltʔ

18:16	wqrʔ ywʔb bšypwrʔ whpk <lh klh#3#> ʕmʔ drdp hwʔ btr ʔysrʔyl mṭl dklyhy ywʔb lʕmʔ
18:17	wnsbwhy lʔbšlwm wʔrmywhy bgwbʔ bgwmṣʔ rbʔ wʔqymw ʕlwhy ygrʔ dkʔpʔ rwrbtʔ wklh ʔysryl ʕrqw ʔnš lmšknh
18:18	\wʔbšlwm ʕd hw ḥy /wʕd ḥy ḥy hwʔ ʔbyšlwm#3#/ wʔbšlwm kd hw ḥy#3#/ nsb hwʔ wʔqym <hwʔ#3#> lh ṣlmʔ bʕwmqʔ dmlkʔ mṭl dʔmr hwʔ dlyt ly mn dnʕbd šmy wqryhy lṣlmʔ ʕl šmh wʔtqryt ʔydh dʔbšlwm ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
18:19	wʔḥymʕṣ br ṣdwq ʔmr <lywʔb#3#> ʔrhṭ ʔsbrywhy lmlkʔ ddnh mryʔ <ywmnʔ#3#> mn ʔydʔ dbʕldbbwhy

18:25	wqrʔ dwqʔ wḥwy lmlkʔ wʔmr mlkʔ ʔn blḥwdwhy hw sbrtʔ bpwmh whlk \ʔtʔ wqrb /dwqʔ wqrb wʔtʔ#3#>

18:28	wqrʔ lʔḥymʕṣ ʔmr lh mlkʔ ʔtyt bšlm wsgd lmlkʔ ʕl ʔpwhy ʕl ʔrʕʔ wʔmr bryk hw mryʔ ʔlhk dʔšlm ʔnwn lʔnšʔ dʔwšbw ʔydyhwn ʕl mry mlkʔ
18:29	ʔmr lh mlkʔ šryr hw ṭlyʔ ʔbšlwm ʔmr lh ʔḥymʕṣ ḥzyt ḥylʔ rbʔ dsdr/dsdyr#3#/dḥdyr#3#/ \ʕl ywʔb /lywʔb#3#/ ʕbdh dmry mlkʔ wlʕbdk lʔ ydʕt mnʔ hwyhy/hwy#3#/
18:30	ʔmr lh mlkʔ qdm hrkʔ wʔthpk wqm
18:31	whʔ kwšy ʔtʔ wʔmr nstbr mry mlkʔ ddnh mryʔ ywmnʔ mn ʔydʔ dkl mn dqymyn ʕlwhy
18:32	ʔmr lh mlkʔ lkwšy šryr hw ʔbšlwm ṭlyʔ ʔmr kwšy nhwwn bʕldbbyk ʔyk ṭlyʔ mry mlkʔ wkl dqmw ʕlyk lbyštk
19:01	wʔtmrmr mlkʔ wslq lqyṭwnʔ wbkʔ wkd bkʔ hknʔ ʔmr hwʔ bry ʔbšlwm bry bry ʔbšlwm mn dyn ʔmytny ḥlpyk ʔbšlwm bry
