19:03	whwʔ \bhw ywmʔ /bywmʔ hw#3#/ ʔblʔ <rbʔ#3#> lklh ʕmʔ mṭl dšmʕw ʕmʔ bhw ywmʔ dkryt lmlkʔ ʕl brb
19:04	wʔtṭšyw ʕmʔ lmʕl lqrytʔ bhw ywmʔ ʔyk dmtṭšyn ʕmʔ dbhtyn mʔ dʕrqyn mn qrbʔ
19:05	wmlkʔ ḥpy ʔpwhy wʔyll <mlkʔ#3#> bqlʔ rmʔ wʔmr bry ʔbšlwm bry bry ʔbšlwm
19:06	wʕl ywʔb lwt mlkʔ <lbytʔ#3#> wʔmr lh ʔbhtt ywmnʔ ʔpʔ dklhwn ʕbdyk dplṭw ywmnʔ wnpšʔ dbnyk wdbntk wnpšʔ dnšyk wnpšʔ ddrwktk
19:07	wrḥmt snʔyk wsnyt rḥmyk wḥwyt ywmnʔ dlyt lk lʔ ḥʔrʔ wlʔ ʕbdʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ ywmnʔ dʔlw ʔbšlwm ḥy hwʔ kln mytyn hwyn wšpyr hwʔ bʕynyk
19:08	hšʔ qdm pwq wmll ʕm ʕbdyk mṭl dbmryʔ ymyt dʔn lʔ npq ʔnt lʔ bʔt ʔnš lwtk bllyʔ hnʔ wbʔšʔ lk hdʔ mn klhyn byštʔ dʔty/dʔyty#3#/ ʕlyk <mryʔ#3#> mn ṭlywtk wʕdmʔ lhšʔ/lywmnʔ#3#/
19:09	wqm mlkʔ wytb btrʕʔ wḥwyw lklh ʕmʔ wʔmrw dhʔ/hʔ#3#/ mlkʔ ytb btrʕʔ wʔtʔ klh ʕmʔ qdm mlkʔ wʔysryl ʕrqw ʔnš lmšknh
19:10	whwʔ klh ʕmʔ rnyn bklhwn šbṭʔ dʔysryl wʔmryn mlkʔ pṣyn mn ʔydʔ \dklhwn bʕldbbyn /dbʕldbbyn#3#/ whw plṭn mn ʔydʔ dplštyʔ hšʔ tw nʕrwq ln mn ʔrʕʔ mn btr ʔbšlwm
19:11	ʔbšlwm gyr dmšḥn wʔqymn ʕlyn <mlkʔ#3#> myt lh bqrbʔ wʔmrw gbr lḥbrh lmnʔ mkyl mttwšyn ʔntwn \dthpkwn ʕm /dnhpwk lwt#3#/ mlkʔ
19:12	tw nhpkywhy lbyth mlktʔ dkwlhwn bny ʔysryl ʕlt qdm mlkʔ
19:13	wʔmr/wmlkʔ dwyd šlḥ lwt ṣdwq wlwt ʔbytr khnʔ lmʔmr mlw ʕm sbʔ dyhwdʔ wʔmrw#3#/ lhwn <mlkʔ#3#> ʔḥy ʔntwn wbsry wgrmy lmnʔ hwytwn/hwyn ʔntwn#3#/ ʔḥryʔ dthpkwn ʕm mlkʔ <lbyth wmltʔ dklh ʔysryl mṭt lwt mlkʔ#3#>
19:14	wʔmr lʕmsʔ hʔ bsry ʔnt wgrmy hknʔ nʕbd ly ʔlhʔ whknʔ nwsp ly ʔlʔ <ʔn#3#> rb ḥylʔ/rbn ḥylʔ#3#/ thwʔ qdmy klhwn ywmtʔ ḥlp ywʔb
19:15	wʔsty/dʔsty#3#/ lbʔ dklhwn dbyt/bny#3#/ yhwdʔ ʔyk gbrʔ ḥd wšlḥw lmlkʔ wʔmrw lh hpwk ʔnt wkwlhwn ʕbdyk
19:16	whpk mlkʔ wʔtʔ ʕdmʔ lywrdnn wyhwdʔ ʔtʔ <ʕdmʔ#3#> lglglʔ lmʔzl lʔwrʕʔ dmlkʔ lmʕbrwth ywrdnn lmlkʔ
19:17	wʔstrhb šmʕy br gʔrʔ br/mn#3#/ bnymyn wnḥt ʕm gbrʔ dyhwdʔ lʔwrʕh dmlkʔ dwyd
19:18	wṣybʔ ṭlyh dšʔwl/dmpybšt#3#/ wḥmštʕsr bnwhy wʕsryn ʕbdwhy ʕmh ʕbrw wgšrw ywrdnn qdm mlkʔ <dwyd#3#>
19:19	wʕbdw mʕbrnʔ dnʕbrwn ldbyt mlkʔ wdnʕbdwn/wnʕbdwn#3#/ mdm dšpyr bʕynwhy wšmʕy br gʔrʔnpl qdm mlkʔ kd ʕbr ywrdnn
19:20	wʔmr lh lmlkʔ lʔ tḥšwb ly mry sklwtʔ wlʔ ttdkr/tdkr#3#/ ly mdm dʔskl hwʔ ʕbdk ywmʔ/bywmʔ#3#/ dnpq hwʔ mry mlkʔ mn ʔwršlm lʔ nytʔ mry mlkʔ ʕl blh
19:21	ydʕ ʔnʔ ʔnʔ ʕbdk dḥṭyt whʔ ʔtyt ʔnʔ ywmnʔ qdmy mn klhwn dbyt ywsp wnḥtt lʔwrʕh dmry mlkʔ
19:22	ʕnʔ ʔbyšy br ṣwryʔ wʔmr wʔp lʔ mṭl hdʔ nmwt šmʕy dṣḥy lmšyḥh dmryʔ
19:23	ʔmr dwyd mʔ ly wlkwn bny ṣwryʔ dhwyn ʔntwn ly ywmnʔ sṭnʔ ywmnʔ lʔ nmwt ʔnš bʔysryl lʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ ywmnʔ dmlkʔ ʔnʔ bʔysryl
19:24	ʔmr lh mlkʔ lšmʕy lʔ mʔt/myt#3#/ ʔnt wymʔ lh mlkʔ
19:25	wmpybšt br ywntn br šʔwl nḥt lʔwrʕh dmlkʔ wlʔ spr dqnh/ryšh#3#/ wlʔ šḥlp mʔnwhy mn ywmʔ dʔzl mlkʔ wʕdmʔ lywmʔ dʔtʔ mlkʔ bšlmʔ
19:26	wkd ʔtʔ lʔwršlm lʔwrʕh dmlkʔ ʔmr lh mlkʔ mpybšt/lmpybšt#3#/ lmnʔ lʔ ʔzlt ʕmy
19:27	ʔmr lh mpybšt mry mlkʔ ʕbdy nklny ʔmrt lh gyr ʔrmʔ/dʔrmʔ#3#/ ly ʕl ḥmrʔ ʔrkb ʕlwhy wʔzl ʕm mry mlkʔ mṭl dḥgyr hw ʕbdk
19:28	wdgl by ʕbdy mry mlkʔ wʔnt mry mlkʔ ʔyk mlʔkh ʔnt dʔlhʔ ʕbd mdm dšpyr bʕynyk
19:29	mṭl dklh byt ʔby ḥybyn hww mwtʔ lk mry mlkʔ wḥšbtyhy lʕbdk mn ʔkly ptwrk mkyl lʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ dʔzkʔ ʔplʔ dʔmll qdm mry mlkʔ
19:30	ʔmr lh mlkʔ kdw ʔmrt mlyk ʔmrt dbynyk wlṣybʔ ntplgn ḥqltʔ
19:31	ʔmr lh mpybšt lmlkʔ ʔp klh ʕbdʔ nsb mkyl dʔtʔ mry mlkʔ bšlmʔ lbyth
19:32	wbrzly glʕdyʔ nḥt mn dwblyn wʕbr ʕm mlkʔ ywrdnn dnšrywhy/dnšdrywhy#3#/ mn tmn
19:33	wbrzly sʔb hwʔ ṭb wbr tmnʔyn hwʔ šnyn whw trsy hwʔ lmlkʔ kd ytb hwʔ bmḥnym mṭl dgbrʔ hwʔ rbʔ
19:34	ʔmr lh mlkʔ lbrzly ʔp ʔnt ʕbr ʕmy wʔtrsyk ʕmy bʔwršlm
19:35	ʔmr <lh#3#> brzly lmlkʔ kmʔ ʔnyn šnyʔ dḥyy dʔsq ʕm mlkʔ lʔwršlm
19:36	br tmnʔyn ʔnʔ šnyn ywmnʔ wlʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ byt ṭb lbyš wmdm dʔkl ʕbdk wmdm dštʔ lʔ mtṭʕm lh ʔp lʔ twb mškḥ ʔnʔ dʔšmʕ bql \ḥdʔ wʔḥrtʔ /ḥʔrʔ wḥʔrtʔ#3#/ lmnʔ twb hwʔ ʕbdk yqrtʔ lmry mlkʔ

19:38	npwš ʕbdk ʔmwt bqryty ʕl gnb qbrʔ dʔby wdʔmy hʔ ʔnt ʕmk ʕbdk bry bmhm nʕbr ʕmk mry mlkʔ wʕbd lh <kl#3#> mdm dšpyr bʕynyk
19:39	wʔmr mlkʔ ʕmy nʕbr bmhm wʔnʔ ʔʕbd lh kl mdm dšpyr bʕyny wkl dbʕyt mny ʔʕbd lk
19:40	wʕbr ʕmʔ klh ywrdnn wʔp mlkʔ ʕbr wnšqh mlkʔ lbrzly whpk lʔtrh/lʔrʕh#3#/
19:00	<pwlgh dʕmʔ ʕl dwyd wmrdh dšmwʕ br bkry#3#>
19:41	wʕbr mlkʔ lglglʔ wʕbr bmhm ʕmh wklh ʕmʔ dyhwdʔ ʕm/qdm#3#/ mlkʔ wʔp plgh dʕmʔ dʔysryl
19:42	wklh ʔysryl ʔtw \lwt mlkʔ /lwth#3#/ wʔmryn lh lmlkʔ lmnʔ ʔṭšywk/ʔṭʕywk#3#/ ʔḥyn ʔnšʔ dyhwdʔ wʔʕbrwk ywrdnn lk mlkʔ wlklhwn bny bytk wlklhwn dbyt yhwdʔ ʕmk
19:43	wʕnw klhwn dbyt yhwdʔ wʔmryn ldbyt ʔysryl mṭl dqryb ln mlkʔ lmnʔ ʔtbʔš lkwn ʕl hdʔ mltʔ dlmʔ mʔkl ʔkln mn mlkʔ ʔw mwhbtʔ ʔtyhbt ln mnh
19:44	ʕnw dbyt ʔysryl wʔmryn ldbyt yhwdʔ ʕsr mnwn ʔyt ln bmlkʔ wʔp bdwyd ytyr mnkwn lmnʔ ʔzltwn/ʔtytwn#3#/ ln hw gyr wlʔ hwʔ dnhwʔ qdmyʔ dnhpk/wnhpk#3#/ lmlkʔ wʕšnt mltʔ dbyt yhwdʔ mn mltʔ dbyt ʔysryl
20:01	wʔštwry tmn gbrʔ ʕwlʔ wšmh šmwʕ br bkry mn bnymyn wqrʔ bšypwrʔ wʔmr lyt ln plgwtʔ ʕm dwyd ʔp lʔ yrtwtʔ ʕm brh dʔyšy zlw ʔnš lmšknh
20:02	wpšw/wpnw#3#/ klhwn bny/dbyt#3#/ ʔysryl mn btr dwyd wʔzlw btr šmwʕ br bkry wbny yhwdʔ nqpw lmlkhwn mn ywrdnn wʕdmʔ lʔwršlm
20:03	wʔtʔ dwyd lbyth lʔwršlm wdbr ʔnyn mlkʔ lʕsr drwktʔ dšbq hwʔ dnṭrn byth wḥbš ʔnyn bbytʔ dntnṭrn wtrsy ʔnyn wlʔ ʕl ʕlyhyn whwy bʔwlṣnʔ ʕdmʔ lywmʔ dmyt whwy ʔrmltʔ
20:04	wʔmr mlkʔ <dwyd#3#> lʕmsʔ wʕd ly ldbyt yhwdʔ ltltʔ ywmyn wʔnt hrkʔ qdm
20:05	wʔzl ʕmsʔ lmwʕdw ldbyt yhwdʔ wʔwḥr mn wʕdʔ dwʕdh <mlkʔ dwyd#3#>
20:06	wʔmr dwyd lywʔb hšʔ bʔš ln \šmwʕ br bkry /šmʕy#3#/ mn ʔbšlwm ʔlʔ dbr ʕmk lʕbdʔ/mn ʕbdʔ#3#/ dmrk wzl btrh dlmʔ nškḥ lh qwryʔ dʕšynn wnqwm bhyn wnḥṭṭ ʕynyn
20:07	wnpqw btrh ḥbrwhy dywʔb ḥʔrʔ wplḥʔ wklhwn gbrʔ wnpqw mn ʔwršlm wʔzlw btr šmwʕ br bkry
20:08	hnwn mṭyw lkʔpʔ rbtʔ dbgbʕwn wʕmsʔ ʕl qdmyhwn wywʔb mḥzq <hwʔ#3#> blbwšʔ dzynh wspsrʔ mṣmdʔ hwt wrmyʔ bḥṣwhy ʔyk glbʔ whw npq wnplt ʔydh ʕl spsrh
20:09	ʔmr lh ywʔb lʕmsʔ šlm lk ʔḥy wnplt ʔydh dywʔb ʕl dqnh dʕmsʔ wnšqh
20:10	wʕmsʔ lʔ ʔzdhr mn spsrʔ dbʔydh dywʔb wmḥyhy bh ʕl plgh wnplw mʕwhy ʕl ʔrʕʔ wlʔ tnyhy wmyt wywʔb wʔbyšy ʔzlw btr šmwʕ br bkry
20:11	wgbrʔ ḥd ʔzl wqm ʕlwhy mn ʕbdwhy dywʔb wʔmr lh mn mn ʔnt mn dwyd dbtr ywʔb
20:12	wʕmsʔ mplpl hwʔ bdmh wrmʔ bšbylʔ wkd ḥzʔ gbrʔ dqm lh klh ʕmʔ lmḥzʔ grh lʕmsʔ mn šbylʔ wʔrmyh bḥqlʔ wʔrmy ʕlwhy mrṭwṭʔ kd ḥzʔ dkl mn dʕbr ʕlwhy qʔm lh
20:13	wkd grh mn šbylʔ ʕbr klnš \btrh dywʔb /btr ywʔb#23#/ wʕbrw/wʔzlw#3#/ btr šmwʕ br bkry lmʔzl ʕlwhy
20:14	wʕbrw bklhwn šbṭʔ dʔysryl/dbny ʔysryl#3#/ bʔbl wbbyt mʕkʔ wbkl bryn wʔzlw btrh
20:15	wʕlw wšrw ʕlwhy bʔbl wbbyt mʕkʔ wʔkmnw kmʔnʔ ʕl qrytʔ wqmt bʔwlṣnʔ wklh ʕmʔ dʕm ywʔb mgrgyn dnrmwnh šwrʔ/lšwrʔ#3#/
20:16	wqrt ʔnttʔ ḥdʔ ḥkymtʔ mn šwrʔ <dqrytʔ#3#> wʔmrʔ šmʕw šmʕw wʔmrw lywʔb qrwb lkʔ wʔmr lk
20:17	wqrb lwth wʔmrʔ lh ʔnt hw ywʔb wʔmr lh ʔnʔ hw ʔmrʔ lh šmʕ mly ʔmtk ʔmr šmʕ ʔnʔ
20:18	ʔmrʔ <lh#3#> ʔnttʔ wʔmr ʔmryn hww mn qdym dmšʔl šʔlyn hww bnbyʔ whydyn mwbdyn <hww#3#>
20:19	ʔnʔ prʕt ḥwblʔ ʔnʔ dʔysryl dbʕʔ ʔnt lmqṭl lṭlyʔ/ṭlyʔ#3#/ wlʔmh/wʔmh#3#/ bʔysryl \lʔ tṭbʕ /wtṭbʕ#3#/ yrtwth dmryʔ
20:20	ʕnʔ ywʔb wʔmr lh ly lʔ ʔṭbʕ wlʔ ʔḥbl
20:21	lʔ hwʔ hknʔ ʔlʔ gbrʔ ḥd mn ṭwrʔ dʔprym šmwʕ br bkry šmh ʔwšb ʔydyʔ ʕl mlkʔ dwyd hbwhy/hbywhy#3#/ ly blḥwdwhy wʔzl ly mn qrytʔ ʔmrʔ lh ʔnttʔ lywʔb hšʔ nhwʔ šdʔ lk ryšh mn šwrʔ
20:22	wʔzlt ʔnttʔ lwt kwlh ʕmʔ bḥkymwth wnsbwhy ryšh dšmwʕ br bkry wšdʔwhy mn šwrʔ lywʔb wqrʔ ywʔb bšypwrʔ wprqw lhwn mn qrytʔ wʔzlw/wʔtw#3#/ ʔnš lmšknh whpk ywʔb lʔwršlm lwt mlkʔ <dwyd#3#>

20:26	wʔp ʕʔzʔ dmn ytyr hwʔ khnʔ ldwyd
21:01	whwʔ kpnʔ bywmth ddwyd tlt šnyn šntʔ btr šntʔ wbʕʔ dwyd mn mryʔ wʔmr mryʔ mṭl šʔwl wmṭl bytʔ ddmʔ ʕl dqṭl lgbʕwnyʔ
21:02	wqrʔ mlkʔ lgbʕwnyʔ wʔmr lhwn wgbʕwnyʔ lʔ hww mn bny ʔysryl ʔlʔ mn šrkʔ ʔnwn dʔmwryʔ wbny ʔysryl ymw lhwn wbʕʔ šʔwl dnqṭl/dnqṭwl#3#/ ʔnwn kd ṭn dnḥṭʔ \lbny ʔysryl /lʔysryl#3#/ wlbny yhwdʔ

21:06	ntlwn ln šbʕʔ ʔnšyn mn bnwhy wndbḥ ʔnwn qdm mryʔ brmth dšʔwl ʔmr lhwn mlkʔ <dwyd#3#> ʔnʔ ʔtl
21:07	wḥs mlkʔ ʕl mpybšt br ywntn br šʔwl mṭl mwmth dmryʔ dhwt bynthwn byt dwyd lywntn br šʔwl

21:09	wʔšlm ʔnwn lgbʕwnyʔ wdbḥw ʔnwn bṭwrʔ qdm mryʔ wnplw šbʕtyhwn ʔkḥdʔ whnwn ʔtqṭlw bywmyʔ dḥṣdʔ bryš ḥṣdʔ dsʕrʔ
21:10	wnsbt rṣpʔ brt ʔnʔ sqʔ wprst lh ʕl šwʕʔ/ʔrʕʔ#3#/ mn ryš ḥṣdʔ ʕdmʔ dnḥtw ʕlyhwn myʔ mn šmyʔ wlʔ šbqt lprḥtʔ dšmyʔ dtškn/tškn#23#/ ʕlyhwn bʔymmʔ ʔp lʔ lḥywtʔ ddbrʔ bllyʔ

21:15	whwʔ twb qrbʔ lplštyʔ ʕm ʔysryl wnḥt dwyd wʕbdwhy ʕmh lmtktšw ʕm plštyʔ wdḥl dwyd
21:16	wywʔb wʔbyšy mn gnbrʔ/gbrʔ#3#/ dmtqlʔ dšrynh tltmʔʔ mtqlyn dnḥšʔ whw ʔsyr hwʔ spsrʔ ḥdtʔ wʔmr lmqṭlh ldwyd
21:17	wʕdrh ʔbyšy br ṣwryʔ lplštyʔ wqṭlh hydyn ymw lh ʕbdwhy ldwyd wʔmryn lh lʔ tpwq ʕmn lqrbʔ wlʔ tdʕk šrgh dʔysryl
21:18	mn btr hydyn hwʔ twb qrbʔ bgt \ʕm plštyʔ /lplštyʔ#3#/ hydyn qṭl sbky ḥwšyʔ lspr dmn bny gnbrʔ
21:19	whwʔ twb qrbʔ lʔysryl ʕm plštyʔ wqṭl ʔlḥnn br mlp zqwrʔ dmn byt lḥm lgwlyt plštyʔ wšwyʔ dnyzkh ʕbʔ hwʔ ʔyk nwlʔ dgrdyyʔ
21:20	whwʔ twb qrbʔ bgt whwʔ tmn gbrʔ gnbrʔ dṣbʕtʔ dʔydwhy wṣbʕtʔ drglwhy št št ʕsryn wʔrbʕ bmnynʔ ʔp hw ʔtyld lgnbrʔ

22:00	<tšbwḥth ddwyd#3#>

22:17	šdr mn mrwmʔ wdbrny wšlny mn myʔ sgyʔʔ

22:19	wqdmwny bywmʔ dʔwlṣny whwʔ ly mryʔ msyʕnʔ
22:20	wʔpqny lʔrwḥtʔ wpṣyny mṭl dṣbʔ by
22:21	wprʕny mryʔ ʔyk zdyqwty wʔyk dkywtʔ dʔydy pny ly

22:23	mṭl dklhwn dynwhy lwqbly wnmwswhy lʔ ʔʕbrt mny
22:24	whwyt ʕmh dlʔ mwm wʔzdhrt mn ḥṭhʔ

22:34	ʕbd rgly ʔyk dʔylʔ wʕl rwmy ʔqymny
22:35	ʔlp/dʔlp#3#/ ʔydy lqrbʔ/qrbʔ#3#/ wšrr ʔyk qštʔ dnḥšʔ drʕy

22:37	ʔrwḥt psʕty tḥwty dlʔ nzwʕwn qwrṣly

23:01	hlyn mlwhy ddwyd ʔḥrytʔ ʔmr dwyd br ʔyšy ʔmr gbrʔ dʔqym nyrʔ dmšyḥh wʔlhh dyʕqwb mbsm zmyrth dʔysryl
23:02	rwḥh dmryʔ mllt by wmlth ʕl lšny
23:03	ʔmr ʔlhʔ dʔysryl wly ʔmr tqypʔ dʔysryl dšlyṭ bʔnšʔ zdyqʔ dšlyṭ bdḥlʔ dʔlhʔ
23:04	ʔyk nwhrʔ dṣprʔ/dšprʔ#3#/ mʔ ddnḥ šmšʔ ṣprʔ dlʔ ʕnnʔ mn nwghʔ wmn mṭrʔ dmšwḥ ʔrʕʔ
23:05	lʔ hwʔ hknʔ byty ʕm ʔlhʔ wqymʔ dʕlmʔ sm ly wmṭyb kl mdm wnṭyr mṭl dklh ṣbyny wklh pwqdny/pwrqny#3#/ hwyw mšlm
23:06	wʕwlʔ ʔyk kwbʔ qšyʔ klhwn mṭl dlʔ hwʔ bʔydʔ mtnsbyn kwlhwn
23:07	wgbrʔ mʔ dqrb lhwn bšwyʔ hw dnrgʔ wbprzlʔ mknš lhwn wyqdyn bnwrʔ lnyḥtʔ
23:08	whlyn šmhʔ dgbrʔ ddwyd ytb bmwtbʔ qdmyʔ bdrgʔ tlytyʔ šmh gdḥw gbrʔ dnḥt wqṭl tmnmʔʔ qṭylyn/gbryn#3#/ bšʕtʔ ḥdʔ
23:09	btrh ʔlyʕzr br ʔḥwhy dʔbwhy kd nḥt btltʔ gbryn ʕm dwyd kd ḥsdw ʔnwn plštyʔ wʔtknšw tmn lmʕbd qrbʔ wslqw gbrʔ dʔysrʔyl
23:10	whw qm wḥrb bplštyʔ ʕdmʔ dlʔyt ʔydh wdbqt ʔydh bʔstqʔ dsyph wʕbd mryʔ pwrqnʔ bywmʔ hw wʕmʔ hpk btrh lmḥlṣw qṭylʔ
23:11	btrh qm šmʔ br ʔgʔ mn ṭwr mlkʔ kd ʔtknšw plštyʔ lmbz ḥywtʔ whwt tmn ʔškrʔ ḥdʔ dzryʕʔ ṭlpḥʔ wʕmʔ ʕrqw mn qdm plštyʔ
23:12	\wqm hw /whw qm#3#/ bgw ḥqlʔ wpṣy ḥywtʔ wḥrb lplštyʔ wʕbr mryʔ pwrqnʔ rbʔ bʔydh
23:13	wnḥtw tltʔ mn gbrʔ wʔtw bzbnʔ dḥṣdʔ lwt dwyd lmʕrtʔ dʕrlm wḥywtʔ dplštyʔ šryʔ hwt bpqʕtʔ dgnbrʔ
23:14	wdwyd šrʔ hwʔ hydyn bmṣrwt wrwrbnʔ dplštyʔ šryn hww byt lḥm/bbyt lḥm#3#/
23:15	wʔtrgrg dwyd wʔmr ṣbʔ hwyt mn dnšqyny myʔ mn gwbʔ rbʔ \dʔyt byt lḥm /dbbyt lḥm#3# /dʔyt bbyt lḥm#3#/ qrytʔ
23:16	wbzʕw tltʔ gbryn mšrythwn dplštyʔ wmlw myʔ mn gwbʔ rbʔ dʔyt byt lḥm qrytʔ wšqlw wʔytyw ldwyd wlʔ ṣbʔ lmštʔ ʔnwn wnsk/wʔšd#3#/ ʔnwn qdm mryʔ
23:17	wʔmr ḥs ly mn qdm mryʔ dʔʕbd hdʔ ʕl dmʔ dnpšthwn ʔzlw gbrʔ hlyn wlʔ ṣbʔ dnštʔ ʔnwn hlyn ʕbdw tltʔ gbryn
23:18	wʔbyšy ʔḥwhy dywʔb br ṣwryʔ hw hwʔ ryšʔ dtltyn gbryn whw šmṭ rwmḥʔ ʕl tltmʔʔ qṭylyn <whw hwʔ ryšʔ dtltyn#3#>
23:19	wmn tltyn myqr hwʔ whwʔ ʕlyhwn ryšʔ wnṣḥnʔ ʔyk tltyn ʕbd hwʔ
23:20	bnyʔ br ywydʕ gbrʔ gnbr ḥylʔ dšpyryn hww ʕbdwhy mn qbṣyl whw qṭl ltryn <gbryn#3#> gnbryn dmwʔbyʔ whw nḥt wqṭl lʔryʔ/ʔryʔ#3#/ bgw ʕbʔ bywmʔ dtlgʔ
23:21	whw qṭl lgbrʔ/gbrʔ#3#/ mṣryʔ lgbrʔ špyr ḥzwʔ wbʔydh dmṣryʔ ʔyt hwt rwmḥʔ wnḥt ʕlwhy hw bḥwṭrʔ wnsbh lrwmḥʔ mn ʔydh dmṣryʔ wqṭlh brwmḥh

24:01	wʔwspt ḥmth dmryʔ lmtqp bʔysryl wgry bhwn ldwyd wʔmr lh zl mny lʔysryl wlyhwdʔ
24:02	wʔmr dwyd lywʔb \wlrby ḥylʔ /wlklhwn rby ḥylʔ#3#/ dʕmh hlkw bklhwn šbṭʔ dʔysryl mn dn wʕdmʔ lbršbʕ wmny ly ʕmʔ wʔytʔ ly mnynhwn wḥwšbnh dʕmʔ
24:03	wʔmr ywʔb lmlkʔ nwsp mryʔ ʔlhk ʕl ʕmʔ ʔkwthwn mʔʔ/ʔlp#3#/ zbnyn wʕynwhy dmry mlkʔ nḥzyn wmry mlkʔ lmnʔ hw ṣbʔ bptgmʔ hnʔ
24:04	wʕšnt mlth dmlkʔ ʕl ywʔb wʕl rby ḥylʔ <dʕmh#3#> wnpq ywʔb wrwrbny ḥylʔ mn qdm mlkʔ lmmnʔ lʕmʔ dʔysryl
24:05	wʕbrw ywrdnn wʔtw lšrwb dbymynʔ dqrytʔ dʔyt \bgw nḥlʔ /bnḥlʔ#2#/ dgd wdʔlyʕzr
24:06	wʔtw ʕdmʔ lṣwr wlṣydn lʔrʕʔ dknʕnyʔ \wlʔrʕʔ dḥtyʔ /wdḥtyʔ#3#/ wlʔrʕʔ dybwsyʔ whlkw bkwlh ʔrʕʔ wʔtw lʔrʕʔ dyhwdʔ ltltyn/tltyn#3#/ wtmnyʔ ywmyn wʔtw ldn wʔtkrkw lṣydwn
24:08	whlkw bklh ʔrʕʔ wʔtw ltšʕʔ yrḥyn ywmyn lʔwršlm
24:09	wʔyty ywʔb mnynʔ wḥwšbnʔ/dḥwšbnʔ#3#/ dʕmʔ lmlkʔ whwʔ mnynʔ dbyt ʔysryl tmnmʔʔ ʔlpyn gbrʔ gnbry ḥylʔ šmṭy sypʔ wʔnšy yhwdʔ hwyn ḥmšmʔʔ ʔlpyn gbryn
24:10	whwʔ dwyd mṭrp/mtṭrp#3#/ mn btr dmnʔ lʕmʔ wʔmr dwyd qdm mryʔ ḥṭyt bmdm dʕbdt wʔp hšʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnk dʔsklt ṭb
24:11	wqdm dwyd bṣprʔ wmlth dmryʔ hwt ʕl gd nbyʔ wʔmr lh
24:12	zl ʔmr ldwyd hknʔ/dhknʔ#3#/ ʔmr mryʔ tlt byšn mytʔ ʔnʔ ʕlyk gby lk wʔʕbd lk
24:13	wʔtʔ gd nbyʔ lwt dwyd wʔmr lh mḥwtʔ qdmytʔ dʔtyʔ ʕlyk hwyn šbʕ šnyn kpnʔ bʔrʕk ʔw tltʔ yrḥyn ttmsr qdm bʕldbbk whw nhwʔ rdp lk ʔw dnhwwn tltʔ ywmyn mwtnʔ bʔrʕk wʔp hšʔ ḥzy mnʔ ptgmʔ mtyb/mpnʔ#3#/ ʔnt lwt mn dšdrny lwtk
24:14	ʕnʔ dwyd wʔmr lgd nbyʔ ʕqt ly ṭb pqḥ ln dntmsr bʔydwhy dmryʔ ʔlhn dsgyʔyn rḥmwhy wbʔydʔ dbny ʔnšʔ lʔ ntmsr
24:15	wyhb mryʔ mwtnʔ bʔysryl mn ṣprʔ wʕdmʔ lšt šʕyn wmytw mn dn wʕdmʔ lbršbʕ šbʕyn/šbʕ#3#/ ʔlpyn gbryn
24:16	wʔwšṭ ʔydh mlʔkʔ lʔwršlm lmḥblwth wmryʔ klʔ lmlʔk mwtʔ dhwʔ ḥrb lʕmʔ wʔmr lh sgy ḥrbt qpws ʔydk wmlʔkh dmryʔ \qʔm hwʔ /hwʔ qʔm#3#/ lwt ʔdrh dʔrn ybwsyʔ
24:17	wʔmr dwyd qdm mryʔ kd ḥzʔ lmlʔkʔ dḥrb lʕmʔ/ʕmʔ#3#/ ʕnʔ wʔmr lh lmlʔkʔ hw ʔnʔ ḥṭyt wʔrgzt hlyn ʕnʔ tmymtʔ mnʔ ʕbd thwʔ lh ʔydk by wbbyt ʔby
24:18	wʔtʔ gd nbyʔ lwt dwyd bh bywmʔ hw wʔmr lh sq bny mdbḥʔ lmryʔ bʔdrh dʔrn ybwsyʔ
24:19	wslq dwyd bmlth dgd ʔyk dʔmr lh mryʔ
24:20	wʔtpny ʔrn ybwsyʔ wḥzʔ lmlkʔ dwyd wlʕbdwhy/wlrwrbnwhy#3#/ kd ʕbryn bʔwrḥʔ \wnpl ʔrn wsgd /wqm ʔrn wnpl#3#/ ʕl ʔpwhy ʕl ʔrʕʔ qdm mlkʔ <dwyd#3#>
24:21	wʔmr mṭl mnʔ ʔtʔ mry mlkʔ lwt ʕbdh wʔmr/ʔmr lh#3#/ dwyd lmzbn mnk ʔdrʔ lmbnʔ mdbḥʔ lmryʔ wntklʔ mwtnʔ mn ʕmʔ
24:22	wʔmr ʔrn ldwyd nsb mry mlkʔ whʔ twrʔ lʕltʔ wqqnʔ wnyrʔ lqysʔ
24:23	hnʔ klh yhb ʔrn lmlkʔ dwyd wʔmr ʔrn lmlkʔ dwyd mryʔ ʔlhk nbrkk
24:24	wʔmr dwyd lʔrn mzbn zbn ʔnʔ mnk bdmyʔ wlʔ mqrb ʔnʔ lmryʔ ʔlhy ʕltʔ dmgn wzbn dwyd ʔdrʔ dgntʔ wtwrʔ bḥmšyn ʔstryn
24:25	wbnʔ tmn dwyd mdbḥʔ lmryʔ wqrb ʕlwtʔ wšlmʔ wʔtgly mryʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ wʔtkly mwtnʔ mn byt ʔysryl
24:XX	\šlm lmktb nbywth dšmwʔyl /šlmt nbywth dšmwʔyl nbyʔ#3# /šlm šmwʔyl nbyʔ#3# /šlm ktbʔ dšmwʔyl#3# /šlm sprʔ dtryn dmlkwtʔ dbny ysrʔyl#3# /šlm ktbʔ dšmwʔyl nbyʔ bswyʕh dmrn#3# /šlm ktbʔ hnʔ dmtnbʔ dšmwʔyl nbyʔ dʔytw ptgmʔ tltʔ ʔlpyn wʔrbʕmʔʔ wtltyn wštʔ#3#/
01:01	wmlkʔ dwyd sʔb wʕl bšnyʔ wmksyn hww lh blbwšʔ wlʔ šḥn
01:02	wʔmrw lh ʕbdwhy hʔ ʕbdyk qdmyk nbʕwn lmrn/lmry#3#/ mlkʔ ʕlymtʔ btwltʔ wtqwm qdm mlkʔ wthwʔ lh mšmšnytʔ wtškb bʕwbk wnšḥn lmrn mlkʔ
01:03	wbʕw ʕlymtʔ dšpyrʔ bklh tḥwmʔ dʔysryl wʔškḥw lʔbyšg šylwmytʔ wʔytywh lmlkʔ
01:04	wʕlymtʔ špyrʔ hwt bḥzwh ṭb whwt lmlkʔ mšmšnytʔ wmšmšʔ lh wmlkʔ lʔ ydʕh
01:05	wʔdwnyʔ br ḥgyt mtrwrb <hwʔ#3#> wʔmr ʔnʔ ʔmlk wʕbd lh mrkbtʔ wpršʔ wḥmšyn gbryn drhṭyn hww qdmwhy
01:06	wlʔ kʔʔ bh ʔbwhy mn ywmwhy wʔmr lh mṭl mnʔ hknʔ ʕbd ʔnt wʔp hw špyr hwʔ bḥzwh ṭb wlh yldt btr ʔbšlwm
01:07	whww ptgmwhy ʕm ywʔb br ṣwryʔ wʕm ʔbytr khnʔ wmʕdryn <hww#3#> btr ʔdwnyʔ
01:08	wṣdwq khnʔ wbnyʔ br ywydʕ wntn nbyʔ wšmʕy wdʕy wgnbrʔ ddwyd lʔ hww btr ʔdwnyʔ
01:09	wdbḥ ʔdwnyʔ ʕnʔ wtwrʔ wmpṭmʔ ʕl kʔpʔ rbtʔ dʕl gb ʕyn qṣrʔ wqrʔ lklhwn ʔḥwhy bny mlkʔ wlklhwn dbyt yhwdʔ wlʕbdy mlkʔ
01:10	wlntn nbyʔ wlbnyʔ br ywydʕ wlgnbrʔ ddwyd wlšlymwn ʔḥwhy lʔ qrʔ
01:11	wʔmr ntn nbyʔ lbtšbʕ ʔmh dšlymwn lʔ šmʕty dʔmlk ʔdwnyʔ <br ḥgyt#3#> wmrn dwyd/mlkʔ#3#/ lʔ ydʕ
01:12	hšʔ/mkyl#3#/ ty ʔmlkky ml#kʔ wplṭy npšy wnpšʔ dbrky šlymwn
01:13	zly ʕwly lwt mlkʔ dwyd wʔmry lh lʔ ʔnt mry mlkʔ ymyt lʔmtk <wʔmrt#3#> dšlymwn brky nmlk btry whw ntb/ytb#3#/ ʕl kwrsy mṭl mnʔ ʔmlk ʔdwnyʔ
01:14	wʕd/wkd#3#/ ʔnty mmllʔ tmn qdm mlkʔ ʔnʔ ʔtʔ btrky wʔšmlʔ mlyky
01:15	wʕlt btšbʕ lwt mlkʔ dwyd lqyṭwnʔ wmlkʔ sʔb ṭb wʔbyšg šylwmytʔ mšmšʔ hwt lmlkʔ/lh#3#/
01:16	wbrkt btšbʕ wsgdt lmlkʔ ʔmr lh mlkʔ mʔ lky btšbʕ
01:17	ʔmrʔ lh mry mlkʔ ʔnt ʔymyt bmryʔ ʔlhk lʔmtk dšlymwn brky nmlk <mn#3#> btry whw ntb/ytb#3#/ ʕl kwrsy
01:18	whšʔ hʔ ʔdwnyʔ ʔmlk wʔnt mry mlkʔ lʔ ydʕt
01:19	wdbḥ twrʔ wmpṭmʔ wʕnʔ swgʔʔ wqrʔ lklhwn bny mlkʔ wlʔbytr khnʔ wlywʔb rb ḥylʔ wlntn nbyʔ wlbnyʔ br ywydʕ wlšlymwn ʕbdk lʔ qrʔ
01:20	wʔnt mry mlkʔ ʕynwhy dklh ʔysryl ʕlyk hw dtḥwʔ ʔnwn m^n ntb/ytb#3#/ ʕl kwrsyh dmry mlkʔ mn btrh
01:21	wmʔ dškb mry mlkʔ lwt ʔbhwhy bšlmʔ ʔhwʔ ʔnʔ wbry šlymwn ḥṭyyn
01:22	wʕd hy mmllʔ tmn qdm mlkʔ wntn nbyʔ ʔtʔ
01:23	wḥwyw lmlkʔ wʔmrw lh dhʔ/hʔ#3#/ ntn nbyʔ ʔtʔ wʕl qdm mlkʔ wnpl ʕl ʔpwhy ʕl ʔrʕʔ wsgd

03:26	wʔmrt hy ʔnttʔ dbrh ḥy lmlkʔ mṭl dʔthpkw rḥmyh ʕl brh bʕyʔ ʔnʔ mnk mry hbwhy lh lṭlyʔ kd ḥy wmqṭl lʔ tqṭlwnh/nqṭlwnh#3#/ why ʔmrʔ lʔ ly ʔp lʔ lky nhwʔ pwsqwhy

04:01	whwʔ šlymwn mlkʔ ʕl klh ʔysryl

05:01	wšlymwn šlyṭ hwʔ bklhyn mlkwtʔ mn nhrʔ dʔrʕʔ dplštyʔ wʕdmʔ ltḥwmʔ dmṣryn/dʔrʕʔ dmṣryʔ#3#/ wmqrbyn qwrbnʔ wplḥyn <lmlkʔ#3#> lšlymwn/šlymwn#3#/ kl ywmy ḥywhy

06:01	whwʔ bšnt ʔrbʕmʔʔ wtmnʔyn šnyn lmpqtʔ dbny ʔysryl mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn bšntʔ rbyʕytʔ byrḥʔ ʔyr/dʔyr#3#/ dhwyw yrḥʔ tnynʔ dʔmlk šlymwn ʕl ʔysryl šry lmbnʔ \byth dmryʔ /bytʔ lmryʔ#3#/

07:07	wʔsṭwʔ dkwrsyʔ/lkwrsyʔ#3#/ ddʔn hwʔ tmn ʔsṭwʔ ldynʔ ʕbd wqrmh bʔrzʔ mn štʔswhy wʕdmʔ lšmwhy
07:08	wbyth dytb hwʔ tmn bdrtʔ ʔḥrtʔ lgw mn ʔsṭwʔ ʔyk ʕbdʔ hnʔ ʕbd wbytʔ ʕbd lbrt prʕwn dnsb šlymwn ʔyk ʕbdʔ hnʔ
07:09	klhyn hlyn kʔpʔ ṭbtʔ ʔyk mšwḥtʔ dpsyltʔ dngydʔ bṭwrns mn lgw wmn lbr wmn štʔswhy wʕdmʔ lʕl wmn lbr wʕdmʔ ldrtʔ dbytʔ

07:13	wšdr mlkʔ šlymwn wʔyty lḥyrm mn/dmn#3#/ ṣwr
07:14	whw br ʔnttʔ hwʔ ʔrmltʔ mn šbṭʔ dnptly wʔbwhy gbr ṣyr wʔwmn bnḥšʔ wʔtmly ḥkmtʔ wbwynʔ wʔydʕtʔ lmʕbd kl ʕbd dnḥšʔ wʔtʔ lwt mlkʔ šlymwn wʕbd klh ʕbdʔ
07:15	wṣr tryn ʕmwdʔ dnḥšʔ rwmh dʕmwdʔ ḥd tmnʕsrʔ ʔmyn wḥwṭʔ dtrtʕsrʔ ʔmyn krk lh whknʔ lʕmwdʔ/ʕmwdʔ#3#/ ʔḥrnʔ
07:16	wtrtyn krmtʔ ʕbd lmsm ʕl ryšʔ dʕmwdʔ dnsktʔ dnḥšʔ ḥmš ʔmyn rwmh dkrmtʔ ḥdʔ wḥmš ʔmyn rwmh dkrmtʔ ʔḥrtʔ
07:17	whlqʔ ʕbd hlqʔ gdylʔ wʕbd ššltʔ lkrmtʔ/dkrmtʔ#3#/ dʕl ryš ʕmwdʔ šbʕ lkrmtʔ ḥdʔ wšbʕ lkrmtʔ ʔḥrtʔ
07:18	wʕbd ʕmwdʔ/rwmnʔ#3#/ wtryn sdryn kd ḥdrʔ ʕl hlqʔ/hlqnʔ#3#/ ḥd lmksyw krmtʔ dʕl ryš ʕmwdʔ whknʔ ʔp lʕmwdʔ ʔḥrnʔ
07:19	wkrmtʔ/wlkrmtʔ#3#/ dʕl ryš ʕmwdʔ ʕbdʔ/ʕbd#3#/ dšwšntʔ wʕbd bʔsṭwʔ/ʔsṭwʔ#3#/ ʔrbʕ ʔmyn
07:20	wkrmtʔ dʕl tryn ʕmwdʔ ʔp mn lʕl mn lwqbl gbʔ dlwqbl hlqʔ wrwmnʔ mʔtyn tryn sdryn kd ḥdrʔ <ʕl kl#3#> krmtʔ ḥdʔ whknʔ <ʕbd#3#> krmtʔ/lkrmtʔ#3#/ ʔḥrtʔ

08:63	wdbḥ šlymwn dbḥʔ šlmʔ \qdm mryʔ /ddbḥ lmryʔ#3#/ twrʔ ʕsryn wtryn ʔlpyn wʕnʔ mʔʔ wʕsryn ʔlpyn wḥdtw lbyth dmryʔ mlkʔ wklhwn bny ʔysryl
08:64	bywmʔ hw qdš mlkʔ lgwh ddrtʔ dqdm byth dmryʔ mṭl dʕbd tmn ʕlwtʔ wqwrbnʔ wtrbʔ dšlmʔ mṭl dmdbḥʔ dnḥšʔ dqdm mryʔ zʕwr hwʔ lmsybrw ʕlwtʔ wqwrbnʔ wtrbʔ dšlmʔ
08:65	wʕbd šlymwn bywmʔ hw ḥgʔ wklh ʔysryl ʕmh knyšyn mn mʕlnʔ dḥmt ʕdmʔ lmʕlnʔ dnḥlʔ dmṣryn qdm mryʔ ʔlhn šbʕʔ ywmyn wšbʕʔ ywmyn ʔrbtʕsr ywmyn
08:66	wbywmʔ dtmnyʔ/tmynyʔ#3#/ šdrw ʕmʔ wbrkw lmlkʔ wʔzlw lmšknyhwn kd ḥdyn wšpyr lbhwn ʕl/mn#3#/ klhyn ṭbtʔ dʕbd mryʔ ldwyd ʕbdh wlʕmh ʔysryl
09:01	wkd šlm šlymwn lmbnʔ byth dmryʔ wbyth/wlbyth#3#/ dmlkʔ wklh ṣbynh dšlymwn dṣbʔ lmʕbd
09:02	hydyn ʔtgly mryʔ ʕl šlymwn dtrtyn zbnyn ʔyk dʔtgly ʕlwhy bgbʕwn
09:03	wʔmr lh mryʔ šmʕt ṣlwtk wbʕwtk dbʕyt mn qdmy wqdšt ly lbytʔ/bytʔ#3#/ hnʔ dbnyt lmsm šmy tmn ʕdmʔ lʕlm wnhwyn ʕyny wlby tmn klhwn ywmtʔ
09:04	wʔnt ʔn thlk qdmy ʔyk dhlk dwyd ʔbwk btmymwt lbʔ wbtryṣwtʔ lmʕbd ʔyk dpqdtk wqymy wdyny tṭr
09:05	ʔqym kwrsyʔ dmlkwtk ʕl ʔysryl lʕlm ʔyk dʔmrt ldwyd ʔbwk dlʔ nʕnd lk gbrʔ mn kwrsyʔ dʔysryl
09:06	wʔn mhpk thpkwn mn btry ʔntwn wbnykwn wlʔ tṭrwn pwqdny wqymy dyhbt qdmykwn wtʔzlwn wtplḥwn lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ wtsgdw lhwn
09:07	ʔwbd lʔysryl mn ʔpy ʔrʕʔ dyhbt lhwn wbytʔ dqdšt lšmy ʔʕqrywhy mn qdmy wnhwʔ ʔysryl lmtlʔ wltwnyʔ bkwlhwn ʕmmʔ
09:08	wbytʔ hnʔ nhwʔ ḥrb wkl dnʕbr ʕlwhy ntmh/ntdmr#3#/ wnšrq wnʔmrwn ʕl mnʔ ʕbd mryʔ hknʔ lʔrʕʔ hdʔ wlbytʔ hnʔ
09:09	wnʔmrwn ʕl dšbqw lmryʔ ʔlhhwn dʔpq/wʔpq#3#/ <ʔnwn#3#> lʔbhyhwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wʔḥdw bʔlhʔ dʕmmʔ ʔḥrnʔ wplḥw ʔnwn wsgdw lhwn mṭl hnʔ ʔyty ʕlyhwn mryʔ byštʔ hdʔ klh
09:10	whwʔ mn btr ʕsryn šnyn dbnʔ šlymwn tryn btyn byth dmryʔ wbyt mlkʔ
09:11	wḥyrm mlkʔ dṣwr trsy lšlymwn bqysʔ dʔrzʔ wbqysʔ dšrwynʔ wbdhbʔ ʔyk dṣbʔ hydyn yhb mlkʔ šlymwn lḥyrm ʕsryn qwryʔ bʔrʕʔ/dbʔrʕʔ#3#/ dglylʔ

09:13	wʔmr <lh#3#> mnʔ ʔnyn hlyn qwryʔ dyhbt ly ʔḥy wqrʔ ʔnyn ʔrʕʔ dkbwly ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ

09:15	whnʔ/whnw#3#/ pwsqnʔ wmdʔtʔ dʔsq mlkʔ šlymwn lmbnʔ byth dmryʔ wbyth wbnʔ šwrʔ dʔwršlm wmlw wḥṣwr wmgdw wgzr
09:16	wprʕwn mlkʔ dmṣryn slq hwʔ wkbšh lgzr wʔwqdh bnwrʔ wlknʕnyʔ dytbyn bqrytʔ qṭl wyhbh mwhbtʔ lbrth ʔntt šlymwn

09:20	wklh ʕmʔ dʔštḥrw mn ʔmwryʔ wḥtyʔ wprzyʔ wḥwyʔ wybwsyʔ dlʔ hww mn bny ʔysryl
09:21	bnyhwn dʔštḥrw mn btrhwn wlʔ/dlʔ#3#/ ʔškḥw bny ʔysryl lmwbdw ʔnwn ʕbd ʔnwn šlymwn ʕbdʔ msqy mdʔtʔ ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
09:22	wmn bny ʔysryl lʔ yhb šlymwn ʕbdʔ/gbrʔ#3#/ mṭl dhnwn ʔnwn gbrʔ qrbtnʔ wʕbdwhy wrwrbnwhy wgnbrwhy wrwrbny mrkbth wpršwhy
09:23	hlyn ʔnwn/rwrbnʔ#3#/ qywmʔ dʕl ʕbdʔ dšlymwn ḥmšmʔʔ wḥmšyn dšlyṭyn/šlyṭyn#23#/ ʕl ʕmʔ wmʕbdyn bʕbdʔ

09:25	wmsq hwʔ šlymwn tlt zbnyn bšntʔ ʕlwtʔ wšlmʔ ʕl mdbḥʔ dqdm/qdm#3#/ mryʔ wsʔm <hwʔ#3#> ʕlwhy bsmʔ qdm mryʔ wšlmh lbytʔ
09:26	wʕbd spyntʔ mlkʔ šlymwn bʕṣynwgbr dʕm/ʕm#3#/dʕl#3#/ ʔlwt ʕl spt ymʔ dswp bʔrʕʔ dʔrwd
09:27	wšdr mlkʔ ḥrym lʕbdwhy bspyntʔ gbrʔ spnʔ dydʕyn ymʔ/bymʔ#3#/ ʕm ʕbdwhy dšlymwn
09:28	wʔtw lʔwpyr wnsbw mn tmn dhbʔ ʔrbʕmʔʔ wʕsryn kkryn wʔytʔw lmlkʔ šlymwn
10:01	wmlkt šbʔ šmʕt šmʕh dšlymwn wšmh dmryʔ wʔtt lmnsywth bʔwḥdtʔ
10:02	wʔtt lʔwršlm bḥylʔ sgyʔʔ/swgʔʔ#3#/ dṭb wgmlʔ dṭʕynyn/kd ṭʕynyn#3#/ bsmʔ wdhbʔ swgʔʔ dṭb/ṭb#3#/ wkʔpʔ ṭbtʔ wʔtt lwt mlkʔ šlymwn wnsyth bkl mdm dʔyt hwʔ blbh

10:04	wḥzt mlkt šbʔ klh ḥkmth dšlymwn wbytʔ dbnʔ
10:05	wmʔkl ptwrh wmwtb ʕbdwhy wqym mšmšnwhy \wlbwšyhwn wšqwth /wlbwšʔ dšqwth#3#/ wlbwšyhwn/#3#/ wʕlwth dmsq hwʔ bbyth dmryʔ wlʔ ʔštḥrt bh twb rwḥʔ
10:06	wʔmrt lmlkʔ šryrʔyt hwʔ ptgmʔ dšmʕt bʔrʕy ʕl ptgmyk wʕl ḥkmtk
10:07	wlʔ hymnt lptgmʔ ʕdmʔ dʔtyt wḥzy ʕyny whʔ ly ḥwyw ly plgʔ ʔwspt ḥkmtʔ wṭbtʔ ʕl ṭbʔ dšmʕt

10:09	nhwʔ mryʔ ʔlhk bryk dṣbʔ bk wʔwtbk/lmwtbwtk#3#/ ʕl kwrsyʔ dʔysryl mṭl drḥm mryʔ lʔysryl lʕlm ʕbdk mlkʔ dtʕbd dynʔ wzdyqwtʔ
10:10	wyhbt lmlkʔ šlymwn mʔʔ wʕsryn kkrʔ ddhbʔ wbsmʔ swgʔʔ/sgyʔʔ#3#/ dṭb wkʔpʔ ṭbtʔ wlʔ ʔtw ʔyk bsmʔ hnwn twb/bswgʔʔ#3#/ dyhbt mlkt šbʔ \lmlkʔ šlymwn /lšlymwn#3#/
10:11	wʔp spynʔ dḥyrm ṭʕn dhbʔ mn ʔwpyr wʔyty mn ʔwpyr qysʔ dqswtʔ swgʔʔ dṭb wkʔpʔ ṭbtʔ
10:12	wʕbd mlkʔ šlymwn qysʔ dqswtʔ tṣbytʔ lbyth dmryʔ wlbyt mlkʔ wknrʔ wqytrʔ lmšbḥnʔ lʔ ʔtw ʔyk hnwn qysʔ dqswtʔ wlʔ ʔtḥzyw ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
10:13	wmlkʔ šlymwn yhb lmlkt šbʔ klmdm dṣbt wšʔlt sṭr mn mdm dyhb lh ʔyk ʔydʔ dmlkʔ wʔtpnyt wʔzlt lʔrʕh hy wʕbdyh
10:14	whwʔ mtql dhbʔ dʕʔl hwʔ lšlymwn bšntʔ ḥdʔ štmʔʔ wštyn wšt kkrʔ ddhbʔ/dhbʔ#3#/
10:15	sṭr mn ʔnšʔ ʔwmnʔ wtʔgrtʔ/wtʔgwrtʔ#3#/ dtgrʔ wklhwn mlkʔ dʕrbyʔ wšlyṭnʔ dʔrʕʔ
10:16	wʕbd mlkʔ šlymwn mʔtyn skryn ddhbʔ snynʔ wštmʔʔ mnyn ddhbʔ ʔsq ʕl skrʔ ḥdʔ
10:17	wtltmʔʔ mgnyn ddhbʔ snynʔ wtltmʔʔ mnyn ddhbʔ ʔsq ʕl mgnʔ ḥdʔ wsm ʔnyn mlkʔ byt ʕbʔ dlbnn
10:18	wʕbd mlkʔ kwrsyʔ dšnʔ rbʔ wqrmh dhbʔ mn ʔwpyr
10:19	wʕbd lkwrsyʔ štʔ drgyn wryšh dkwrsyʔ glyl mn bstrh wʔydhtʔ mkʔ wmkʔ bdwktʔ/bdmwtʔ#2#/ dmwtbʔ wtryn ʔrywn qymyn mkʔ wmkʔ
10:20	wtrʕsr ʔrywn qymyn ʕl gb štʔ drgyn mkʔ wmkʔ lʔ ʔtʕbd hknʔ lklhyn mlkwtʔ
10:21	wklhwn mʔnʔ dtšmšth dmlkʔ šlymwn ddhbʔ wklhwn mʔnʔ dbyt ʕbʔ dlbnn ddhbʔ snynʔ wkspʔ lʔ ḥšyb hwʔ bywmwhy dšlymwn mdm
10:22	mṭl dspynʔ dtršyš ʔyt hwy lmlkʔ bymʔ ʕm spynʔ dḥyrm ḥdʔ ltlt šnyn ʔtyʔ spyntʔ mn tršyš wṭʕynʔ kspʔ wdhbʔ wpylʔ wqwpʔ wṭwsʔ

10:25	wmytyn/whnwn mytyn#23#/ gbr qwrbnh mʔnʔ ddhbʔ wmʔnʔ dkspʔ wlbwšʔ wzynʔ wbsmʔ wrkšʔ wqrwkʔ wkwdnwtʔ kl/bkl#3#/ šnʔ bšnʔ
10:26	wknš mlkʔ šlymwn mrkbtʔ wpršʔ whwy lh ʔlp wʔrbʕmʔʔ mrkbtʔ wtrʕsr ʔlpyn pršyn wšbq ʔnyn lmrkbtʔ bqwryʔ wmnhyn ʕm mlkʔ bʔwršlm
10:27	wyhb <hwʔ#3#> mlkʔ šlymwn kspʔ bʔwršlm ʔyk kʔpʔ wʔrzʔ yhb ʔyk šqmʔ dbpqʕtʔ swgʔʔ/sgyʔyn#3#/
10:28	wmpqnʔ drkšʔ dšlymwn mn mṣryn wʔgrʔ dtgrʔ dmlkʔ nsbyn zbnʔ bdmyʔ

11:01	wmlkʔ šlymwn rḥm nšʔ sgyʔtʔ nwkrytʔ wlbrt prʕwn wʕmwnytʔ wmwʔbytʔ wʔdwmytʔ wṣydnytʔ wḥtytʔ
11:02	mn ʕmmʔ wʔmr mryʔ lbny ʔysryl lʔ ttḥlṭwn bhwn whnwn lʔ ntḥlṭwn bkwn dlmʔ nsṭyn lbkwn btr ʔlhyhyn bhyn ʔtdbq šlymwn wʔḥd wrḥm
11:03	whwy lh nšʔ ḥʔrtʔ šbʕmʔʔ wdrwktʔ tltmʔʔ wʔsṭy nšwhy lbh
11:04	whwʔ lzbnʔ dsybwth dšlymwn nšwhy ʔsṭy lbh btr ʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ wlʔ hwʔ lbh šlm ʕm mryʔ ʔlhh ʔyk lbʔ ddwyd ʔbwhy
11:05	wʔzl šlymwn btr ʕstrwt ʔlhtʔ dṣydnyʔ wbtr kmwš dḥltʔ dmwʔbyʔ wbtr mlkwm ʔlhʔ dbny ʕmwn

11:08	whknʔ ʕbd lklhyn nšwhy nwkrytʔ dsymn hwy bsmʔ wmdbḥn <hwʔ#3#> lʔlhyhyn
11:09	wrgz mryʔ ʕl šlymwn ʕl dsṭʔ lbh mn mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl dʔtgly ʕlwhy trtyn/dtrtyn#3#/ zbnyn

11:11	wʔmr mryʔ lšlymwn ḥlp dhwt hdʔ ʕmk wlʔ nṭrt qymy wdyny wpwqdny dpqdtk mṣrʔ ʔṣryh lmlkwtʔ \mn ʔydk /mnk#3#/ wʔtlyh lʕbdk

11:13	brm/blḥwd#3#/ klh mlkwtʔ lʔ ʔṣrʔ šbṭʔ ḥd ʔtl lbrk mṭl dwyd ʕbdy wmṭl ʔwršlm qrytʔ dgbyt

11:17	wʕrq hdd hw wʔnšʔ ʔdwmyʔ mn ʕbdwhy dʔbwhy lmʕl lmṣryn whdd ṭlyʔ hwʔ zʕwrʔ
11:18	wqmw mn mdyn wʕlw lprn/lpdn#3#/ wdbrw gbrʔ ʕmhwn mn prn/pdn#3#/ wʕlw lmṣryn lwt prʕwn mlkʔ dmṣryn wyhb lh bytʔ wlḥmʔ wʔmr lh tb lwty wʔrʕʔ yhb lh

11:20	wyldt lh ḥth dtḥpys lgbwt brh wḥslth tḥpys <lgbwt brh#3#> bgw byt prʕwn whwʔ gbwt byt prʕwn bynt bnwhy dprʕwn
11:21	whdd šmʕ bmṣryn dškb dwyd ʕm ʔbhwhy wdmyt ywʔb rb ḥylʔ whdd ʔmr lprʕwn šdryny ʔzl lʔrʕy
11:22	ʔmr lh prʕwn mnʔ gyr ḥsrt lwty dhʔ bʕʔ ʔnt dtʔzl lk lʔrʕk ʔmr lh lʔ ʔlʔ mšdrw šdryny
11:23	wʔqym lh mryʔ sṭnʔ lhdrwn br ʔlydʕ dʕrq mn lwt hdrʕzr mlkʔ dṣwbʔ mrh
11:24	wknšw ʕlwhy gbrʔ whwʔ rb gysʔ wkd qṭl ʔnwn dwyd ʔzlw ldrmswq wytbw bh wʔmlk hdd bdrmswq
11:25	whwʔ sṭnʔ lʔysryl klhwn ywmth dšlymwn ʕl byštʔ dʕbd whdd ʔʕyq lbny ʔysryl wʔmlk ʕl ʔdwm
11:26	wywrbʕm br nbṭ ʔprtyʔ mn ṣddʔ wšmʔ dʔmh ṣrwbʔ ʔnttʔ ʔrmltʔ ʕbdʔ dšlymwn wʔrym ʔydʔ \ʕl mlkʔ /bmlkʔ#3#/ šlymwn
11:27	whnʔ ptgmʔ dʔrym ʔydʔ bmlkʔ šlymwn kd bnʔ lmlw wskr twrʕtʔ dqryth ddwyd <ʔbwhy#3#>
11:28	wgbrʔ ywrbʕm gnbr ḥylʔ hwʔ wḥzyhy mlkʔ šlymwn lṭlyʔ dgnbr ḥylʔ hw wʔšlṭh ʕl klh ʕbdʔ dbyt ywsp
11:29	whwʔ bzbnʔ hw wywrbʕm npq mn ʔwršlm wʔškḥh ʔḥyʔ nbyʔ šylwnyʔ bʔwrḥʔ wʔḥyʔ/whw#3#/ mksy hwʔ blbwšʔ ḥdtʔ wtryhwn hww blḥwd bḥqlʔ
11:30	wʔḥd ʔḥyʔ blbwšʔ ḥdtʔ dʕlwhy wṣryhy ltrʕsr ṣrwn
11:31	wʔmr lywrbʕm sb lk ʕsrʔ ṣrwn mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl hʔ ṣrʔ ʔnʔ mlkwtʔ mn ʔydh dšlymwn wʔtl lk ʕsrʔ šbṭyn
11:32	wšbṭʔ ḥd nhwʔ lh mṭl dwyd ʕbdy wmṭl ʔwršlm qrytʔ dṣbyt bh mn klhwn šbṭʔ dʔysryl
11:33	ʕl dšbqny wsgd lʕstrwt ʔlhtʔ dṣydnyʔ wlkmwš ʔlhʔ/dḥltʔ#3#/ dmwʔbyʔ wlmlkwm ʔlhʔ dbny ʕmwn wlʔ hlk bʔwrḥty wlʔ ʕbd dšpyr qdmy wlʔ nṭr qymy wdyny ʔyk dwyd ʔbwhy
11:34	wlʔ ʔsb klh mlkwtʔ mn ʔydwhy ʔlʔ rbʔ ʔʕbdywhy kl ywmy ḥywhy mṭl dwyd ʕbdy dgbyth dnṭr pwqdny wqymy
11:35	wʔsb mlkwtʔ mn ʔydy brh wʔtl lk ʕsrʔ šbṭyn
11:36	wlbrh ʔtl šbṭʔ ḥd mṭl dnhwʔ šrgʔ lʕbdy dwyd klhwn ywmtʔ qdmy bʔwršlm qrytʔ dgbyt ly lmsm šmy tmn/lʕlm#3#/
11:37	wlk ʔtl wtmlk ʔyk dṣbyʔ npšk wthwʔ mlkʔ ʕl ʔysryl
11:38	wʔn tšmʕ kwl dpqdtk wthlk bʔwrḥty wtʕbd <kl#3#> dšpyr qdmy wtṭr qymy wpwqdny ʔyk dʕbd dwyd ʕbdy ʔhwʔ ʕmk wʔbnʔ lk bytʔ mhymnʔ ʔyk dbnyt ldwyd ʕbdy wʔtl lk lʔysryl
11:39	wʔmkk zrʕh ddwyd mṭl hdʔ brm <dyn#3#> lʔ klhwn ywmtʔ
11:40	wbʕʔ šlymwn lmqṭlh lywrbʕm wqm ywrbʕm wʕrq lmṣryn lwt šyšq mlkʔ dmṣryn whwʔ bmṣryn/tmn#3#/ ʕdmʔ dmyt šlymwn
11:41	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy dšlymwn wkl mdm dʕbd wḥkmth hʔ ktybyn bspr ptgmwhy dšlymwn

12:02	wkd šmʕ ywrbʕm br nbṭ whw ʕdkyl bmṣryn hwʔ dʕrq mn qdm mlkʔ šlymwn wytb ywrbʕm bmṣryn

12:11	ʔby ʔʕšn ʕlykwn nyrʔ ʕšynʔ ʔnʔ ʔwsp ʕl nyrkwn ʔby rdkwn bšwṭʔ wʔnʔ ʔrdykwn bmrgnʔ

12:15	wlʔ šmʕ mlkʔ/mlkʔ#3#/ mn ʕmʔ mṭl dhwt mgrynwtʔ mn qdm mryʔ mṭl dnqym mryʔ ptgmwhy dmll bʔydʔ dʕbdh ʔḥyʔ nbyʔ šylwnyʔ ʕl/ʕm#3#/ ywrbʕm br nbṭ
12:16	wḥzʔ klh ʔysryl dlʔ šmʕ lhwn mlkʔ wʔtybw ʕmʔ ptgmʔ lmlkʔ wʔmrw lh lʔ plgwtʔ/mntʔ#3#/ ʔyt ln ʕm dwyd ʔplʔ yrtwtʔ ʕm brh dʔyšy <mkyl#3#> lmšknyk ʔysryl mkyl ḥzy bytk dwyd wʔzlw bny ʔysryl kl ʔnš lqryth

13:01	whʔ nbyʔ dʔlhʔ ʔtʔ mn yhwdʔ bptgmh dmryʔ lbyt ʔyl/bbyt ʔyl#3#/ wywrbʕm qʔm hwʔ ʕl mdbḥʔ lmsm bsmʔ <bksʔʔ bh byrḥʔ ʔyk ḥgʔ dbyhwdʔ wʔsq ʕl mdbḥʔ bsmʔ#2#>
13:02	wqrʔ ʕl mdbḥʔ ptgmh/bptgmh#3#/ dmryʔ wʔmr <hʔ#3#> mdbḥʔ mdbḥʔ šmʕ ptgmh dmryʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hʔ brʔ mtyld ldbyt/lbyt#3#/ dwyd ywšyʔ šmh wndbḥ ʕlyk kwmrʔ dʕlwtʔ dsymyn ʕlyk bsmʔ wgrmʔ dʔnšʔ nwqd ʕlyk
13:03	wyhb bywmʔ hw ʔtʔ wʔmr hdʔ ʔtʔ dmryʔ šdrny hʔ mdbḥʔ mṣṭrʔ wmtʔšd qṭmʔ dʕlwhy
13:04	wkd šmʕ mlkʔ mlwhy dnbyh dʔlhʔ dqrʔ ʕl mdbḥʔ dbbyt ʔyl/dbyt ʔyl#3#/ ʔwšṭ mlkʔ/ywrbʕm#3#/ ʔydh mn mdbḥʔ wʔmr ʔwḥdwhy wybšt ʔydh dʔwšṭ ʕlwhy wlʔ ʔškḥ dnhpkyh lwth
13:05	wmdbḥʔ ʔṣṭry wʔtʔšd qṭmʔ dʕlwhy/mn mdbḥʔ#3#/ ʔyk ʔtʔ dyhb nbyh dʔlhʔ bptgmh dmryʔ
13:06	wʕnʔ mlkʔ <ywrbʕm#3#> wʔmr lnbyh/nbyh#3#/ dʔlhʔ ṣlʔ ʕly qdm mryʔ ʔlhk wbʕy ʕly dthpwk/wthpwk#3#/ ʔydy lwty wṣly nbyh dʔlhʔ qdm mryʔ whpkt ʔydh dmlkʔ lwth whwt ʔyk dmn qdym

13:09	mṭl dhknʔ pqdny bptgmʔ mryʔ wʔmr ly lʔ/dlʔ#3#/ tʔkwl lḥmʔ wlʔ tštʔ myʔ wlʔ thpwk bʔwrḥʔ dʔtyt bh

13:22	whpkt wʔklt lḥmʔ wʔštyt myʔ bʔtrʔ dʔmrt lk <mryʔ#3#> dlʔ tʔkwl <tmn#3#> lḥmʔ wlʔ tštʔ myʔ mṭl hnʔ lʔ tʕwl šldk lqbrʔ dʔbhyk

13:25	whʔ ʔnšʔ ʕbryn wḥzw šldʔ \kd rmyʔ /drmyʔ#3#/ bʔwrḥʔ wḥmrʔ qʔm <hwʔ#3#> ʕl gbh wʔryʔ qʔm ʕl gb šldʔ wʔtw wʔmrw bqrytʔ dnbyʔ sbʔ ytb bh
13:26	wšmʕ nbyʔ <hw#3#> dʔhpkh mn ʔwrḥʔ wʔmr nbyh hw dʔlhʔ ʕl dšḥlp mlt pwmh dmryʔ yhbh mryʔ lʔryʔ wtbrh wqṭlh ʔyk ptgmh dmryʔ dʔmr lh

14:01	bh bzbnʔ hw ʔtkrh ʔbyʔ brh dywrbʕm

14:06	wkd šmʕ ʔḥyʔ ql/lql#3#/ rglyh dʕʔlʔ btrʕʔ ʔmr lh ʕwly ʔntth dywrbʕm lmnʔ mštgnyʔ ʔnty wʔnʔ šlyḥ ʔnʔ ʕlyky qšytʔ
14:07	zly wʔmr lywrbʕm hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʔnʔ ʔrymtk mn ʕmʔ wʕbdtk mdbrnʔ ʕl ʕmy ʔysryl
14:08	wṣryt mlkwtʔ mn dbyt/byt#3#/ dwyd wyhbt lk wlʔ hwyt ʔyk dwyd ʕbdy dnṭr pwqdny whlk btry bklh lbh lmʕbd dšpyr/špyr#3#/ qdmy
14:09	wʔnt ʔbʔšt lmʕbd mn kl dhww qdmyk wʔzlt wʕbdt lk ʔlhʔ <ʔḥrnʔ#3#> nsykʔ lmrgzwtny wly šdyt lbstr/bstr#3#/ gwšmk
14:10	mṭl hnʔ hʔ mytʔ ʔnʔ byštʔ ʕl byt/dbyt#3#/ ywrbʕm wʔwbd lywrbʕm kl dtʔn bʔstʔ wdʔsr/wʔsr#3#/ wšrʔ bʔysryl wʔbʕr btr byt ywrbʕm ʔyk dmtbʕrn gwpny krmʔ mʔ dgmr qṭpʔ
14:11	dnmwt lywrbʕm bqrytʔ nʔklwn klbʔ wdnmwt lh bdbrʔ tʔkwl prḥtʔ dšmyʔ mṭl dmryʔ mll
14:12	wʔnty qwmy wzly lbytky wmʔ dʕly rglyky <lgw#3#> lqrytʔ/qrytʔ#3#/ nmwt ṭlyʔ
14:13	wnrqdwn ʕlwhy klh ʔysryl wnqbrwnh mṭl dhnʔ blḥwdwhy nʕwl lywrbʕm lqbrʔ ḥlp dʔštkḥ bh ptgmʔ ṭbʔ qdm mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl bbyth dywrbʕm
14:14	wnqym lh mryʔ mlkʔ ʕl ʔysryl wnwbd ldbyt ywrbʕm mn ywmnʔ wmnʔ mkyl
14:15	wnmḥʔ mryʔ lʔysryl ʔyk dnʔd qnyʔ brwḥʔ wnʕqrywhy lʔysryl mn ʔrʕʔ ṭbtʔ dyhb lʔbhyhwn wndrʔ ʔnwn bʕbr nhrʔ ḥlp dʕbdw lhwn dḥltʔ wmrgzyn lmryʔ
14:16	wnšlmywhy lʔysryl mṭl ḥṭhwhy dywrbʕm dḥṭʔ wʔḥṭy lʔysryl
14:17	wqmt ʔntth dywrbʕm wʔzlt wʕlt ltrṣʔ hy ʕʔlʔ btrʕʔ dbyth wṭlyʔ myt
14:18	wʔrqdw ʕlwhy klh ʔysryl wqbrwhy ʔyk ptgmh mryʔ dmll bʔydʔ dʕbdh ʔḥyʔ nbyʔ šylwnyʔ
14:19	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy dywrbʕm wdʔtktš wdʔmlk hʔ ktybyn bspr dbrymyn dmlkʔ dʔysryl
14:20	wywmtʔ dʔmlk ywrbʕm ʕl ʔysryl ʕsryn wtrtyn šnyn wškb ywrbʕm ʕm ʔbhwhy wʔmlk ndb brh btrh
14:21	wrḥbʕm br šlymwn ʔmlk ʕl yhwdʔ br ʔrbʕyn <hwʔ#3#> wḥdʔ šnyn rḥbʕm kd ʔmlk wšbʕsrʔ šnyn ʔmlk bʔwršlm qrytʔ dgbʔ mryʔ mn klhwn šbṭʔ dʔysryl lmsm šmh tmn wšmʔ dʔmh nʕmʔ ʕmwnytʔ
14:22	wʕbd yhwdʔ dbyš qdm mryʔ wʔṭnwhy bklmdm dʕbdw ʔbhyhwn wbḥṭhyhwn dḥṭw
14:23	wbnw lhwn ʔp hnwn ʕlwtʔ wqymtʔ wdḥltʔ ʕl kl rmtʔ drmʔ wtḥyt kl ʔyln dʕbyṭ
14:24	wʔp znywtʔ hwt bʔrʕʔ wʕbdw ʔyk klh ṭnpwtʔ dʕmmʔ dʔwbd mryʔ mn qdm bny ʔysryl
14:25	whwʔ bšntʔ ḥmyšytʔ dmlkʔ rḥbʕm slq šyšq mlkʔ dmṣryn ʕl ʔwršlm
14:26	wnsb gzʔ dbyth dmryʔ wgzʔ dbyt mlkʔ <wklmdm nsb#3#> wnsb klhyn skrʔ ddhbʔ dʕbd <mlkʔ#3#> šlymwn
14:27	wʕbd mlkʔ rḥbʕm ḥlpyhyn skrʔ dnḥšʔ wʔšlm ʔnyn bʔydʔ drwrbnʔ wdrhṭʔ dnṭryn btrʕʔ dbyt mlkʔ

18:10	ḥy hw <gyr#3#> mryʔ ʔlhk ʔn ʔyt ʕmʔ ʔw mlkwtʔ dlʔ šdr mry lmbʕyk tmn wʔmryn lyt wʔwmy lmlkwtʔ wlʕmmʔ dʔn lʔ ʔškḥwk
18:11	whšʔ ʔmr ʔnt ly zl/dzl#3#/ ʔmr lmrk dhʔ ʔlyʔ
18:12	wkd ʔnʔ ʔzl mn lwtk rwḥh dmryʔ/dʔlhʔ#3#/ tšqlk wtwblk lʔyknʔ dlʔ ʔdʕ wʔzl lmḥwyw lʔḥb wlʔ nškḥk wnqṭlny wʕbdk dḥl mn mryʔ mn ṭlywth
18:13	wlʔ ḥwyt lmry mdm dʕbdt kd qṭlt ʔyzbl lnbywhy dʔlhʔ dbrt mn nbywhy dmryʔ mʔʔ gbryn wṭšyt ʔnwn ḥmšyn ḥmšyn gbryn bmʕrtʔ wtrsyt ʔnwn blḥmʔ wbmyʔ
18:14	whšʔ ʔmr ʔnt ly zl/dzl#3#/ ʔmr lmrk dhʔ ʔlyʔ wnqṭlny
18:15	wʔmr ʔlyʔ ḥy hw mryʔ ḥyltnʔ dqmt qdmwhy ʔlʔ ywmnʔ ʔtḥzʔ lh
18:16	wʔzl ʕwbdyʔ lʔwrʕh dʔḥb wḥwyh lʔḥb wʔtʔ ʔḥb lʔwrʕh dʔlyʔ
18:17	wkd ḥzyhy ʔḥb lʔlyʔ ʔmr lh <ʔḥb lʔlyʔ#3#> ʔnt hw hnʔ dlwḥh dʔysryl
18:18	ʔmr lh ʔlyʔ <ʔnʔ#3#> lʔ dlḥt lʔysryl ʔlʔ ʔnt wbyt ʔbwk dšbqtwn pwqdnwhy dmryʔ/lmryʔ#3#/ wʔzltwn btr bʕlʔ
18:19	whšʔ šdr knš ly lkwlh ʔysryl lṭwrʔ dkrmlʔ wlnbyy bʕlʔ ʔrbʕmʔʔ wḥmšyn <wly#2#> wlnbyy dḥltʔ ʔrbʕmʔʔ wḥmšyn <gbryn#3#> dʔklyn <mn#3#> ptwrh dʔyzbl
18:20	wšdr ʔḥb ʕl klhwn bny ʔysryl wknš ʔnwn lgbrʔ lṭwrʔ dkrmlʔ
18:21	wqrb ʔlyʔ <nbyʔ#3#> lwt klh ʕmʔ wʔmr ʕdmʔ lʔmty plygyn ʔntwn ltrtyn plgwn ʔn mryʔ hw ʔlhʔ zlw btrh wʔn bʕlʔ hw zlw btrh wlʔ yhbw lh ʕmʔ ptgmʔ
18:22	wʔmr ʔlyʔ <lʕmʔ#3#> ʔnʔ hw blḥwdy/#3#/ ʔštḥrt nbyʔ lmryʔ <blḥwdy#3#> wnbyy bʕlʔ ʔrbʕmʔʔ wḥmšyn gbryn
18:23	ntlwn ln tryn twryn wngbwn lhwn ḥd twrʔ wnpšḥwn wnsymwn ʕl qysʔ wnwrʔ lʔ nsymwn wʔnʔ ʔʕbd ḥd twrʔ wʔpšḥ wʔsym ʕl qysʔ wnwrʔ lʔ ʔsym
18:24	wqrw bšm ʔlhykwn wʔnʔ ʔqrʔ bšmh dmryʔ ʔlhy wʔynʔ ʔlhʔ dʕnʔ bnwrʔ hw hw ʔlhʔ wʕnw klh ʕmʔ wʔmrw špyr ʔmrt
18:25	wʔmr ʔlyʔ lnbyy bʕlʔ gbw lkwn ḥd twrʔ wʕbdw qdmyt mṭl dʔntwn sgyʔyn <wqrw bšm ʔlhykwn wnwrʔ lʔ tsymwn#3#>
18:26	wnsbwhy ltwrʔ/lrmšʔ#3#/ dʔtyhb lhwn wʕbdwhy whww qryn bšmh dbʕlʔ mn ṣprʔ wʕdmʔ lṭhrʔ bʕlʔ ʕnyn wlyt ql ʔp lʔ dʕnʔ wʔtktšw ʕl mdbḥʔ dʕbdw
18:27	wkd hwʔ ṭhrʔ mgḥk <hwʔ#3#> bhwn ʔlyʔ wʔmr qrw bqlʔ rmʔ mṭl dʔlhʔ hw dlmʔ rnyʔ <hw#3#> ʔyt lh ʔw dlmʔ ṣbw sʕr ʔw dlmʔ ʔwrḥʔ ʔyt lh ʔw dlmʔ dmk hw wnttʕyr
18:28	wqrw bqlʔ rmʔ wʔtktšw ʔyk nmwshwn bḥrbʔ wbrwmḥʔ ʕdmʔ dʔtʔšd dmhwn ʕlyhwn
18:29	wkd ʕbr ṭhrʔ hww mtnbyn ʕdmʔ lzbnʔ dslq qwrbnʔ wlyt ql ʔp lʔ dʕnʔ ʔplʔ dṣʔt wʔmr ʔlyʔ lnbyy dḥltʔ/bʕlʔ#3#/ šnw mn hšʔ wʔp ʔnʔ ʔʕbd yqdy šlmʔ wšnyw wʔzlw
18:30	wʔmr ʔlyʔ lklh ʕmʔ qrwbw lwty wqrbw klh ʕmʔ lwth wtrsy mdbḥʔ dmryʔ dmsḥp hwʔ
18:31	wnsb ʔlyʔ trtʕsrʔ kʔpyn ʔyk mnynʔ dšbṭʔ dbny yʕqwb hw dhwʔ ʕlwhy ptgmh dmryʔ wʔmr lh ʔysryl nhwʔ šmk
18:32	wbnʔ ʔnyn lkʔpʔ <hlyn#3#> mdbḥʔ bšmh dmryʔ wʕbd ḥʔrytʔ ʔyk byt sʔtyn zrʕʔ wʔkrkh lmdbḥʔ
18:33	wkšʔ qysʔ wpšḥh ltwrʔ wsmh lʕl mn qysʔ
18:34	wʔmr mlw \ʔrbʕ qwlyn /ʔnyn qwlʔ#3#/ myʔ wswkw ʕl ʕltʔ wʕl qysʔ wʔmr tnw wtnw wʔmr tltw wtltw
18:35	whlkw myʔ ḥdrwhy dmdbḥʔ wʔp lh lḥʔrytʔ mlʔwh myʔ

18:37	ʕnyny mryʔ ʕnyny wndʕwn klh ʕmʔ hnʔ dʔnt hw mryʔ ʔlhʔ wʔnt ʔpnyt lbhwn hpykʔ

18:40	wʔmr lhwn ʔlyʔ ʔḥwdw ʔnwn lnbyy bʕlʔ wʔnš lʔ ntplṭ mnhwn wʔḥdw ʔnwn wʔḥt ʔnwn ʔlyʔ lnḥlʔ dqyšwn wnks ʔnwn tmn
18:41	wʔmr ʔlyʔ lʔḥb sq lʕs wʔšty mṭl dqlʔ drgwšyʔ dmṭrʔ
18:42	wslq ʔḥb lmlʕs wlmštʔ wʔlyʔ slq lryš krmlʔ wʔtghn ʕl ʔrʕʔ wsm ʔpwhy byt bwrkwhy
18:43	wʔmr ltlmydh sq ḥwr lʔwrḥʔ dymʔ/dtymnʔ#3#/ wslq wḥr wʔmr lyt mdm ʔmr lh hpwk šbʕ zbnyn
18:44	wbzbntʔ šbyʕytʔ ʔmr <lh#3#> ḥzyt whʔ ʕnnʔ zʕwrtʔ ʔyk pstʔ dʔydʔ <dgbrʔ#3#> slqʔ mn ymʔ wʔmr lh sq ʔmr lʔḥb rkb wḥwt ʕdlʔ nklyk mṭrʔ
18:45	wʕd hw mtpnʔ lkʔ wlkʔ šmyʔ ʔtkbnw ʕnnʔ wrwḥʔ whwʔ mṭrʔ rbʔ wrkb ʔḥb wʔzl lʔyzrʕyl
18:46	wʔydh/wrwḥh#3#/ dmryʔ hwt ʕl ʔlyʔ wʔsr ḥṣwhy wrhṭ qdm ʔḥb ʕdmʔ dʕl lʔyzrʕyl
19:01	wḥwy ʔḥb lʔyzbl klmdm dʕbd ʔlyʔ wdqṭl ʔnwn lklhwn nbyy bʕlʔ wdḥwgbʔ bḥrbʔ
19:02	wšlḥt ʔyzbl byd mlʔkʔ lʔlyʔ wʔmrt hknʔ nʕbdwn ly ʔlhʔ whknʔ nwspwn ly ʔlʔ mḥr/lmḥr#3#/ bhnʔ zbnʔ ʔʕbdyh lnpšk/npšk#3#/ ʔyk npšʔ dḥd mnhwn

19:04	whw hlk bmdbrʔ mrdʔ ywmʔ ḥd wytb tḥyt bṭmtʔ ḥdʔ wšʔl mwtʔ lnpšh wʔmr sgy ly hšʔ mryʔ sb npšy mny mṭl dlʔ hwyt ṭb ʔnʔ mn ʔbhy
19:05	wškb wṭbʕ tḥyt bṭmtʔ <ḥdʔ wḥzʔ#3#> whʔ mlʔkʔ qrb lh/lwth#3#/ wʔmr lh qwm ʔkwl

19:08	wqm ʔkl wʔšty whlk bḥylʔ dmʔkwltʔ hy ʔrbʕyn ʔymmyn wʔrbʕyn lylwn ʕdmʔ lṭwrh dʔlhʔ lḥwryb
19:09	wʕl ltmn/tmn#3#/ lmʕrtʔ wbt tmn whwʔ ʕlwhy ptgmh dmryʔ wʔmr lh mnʔ ʕbd ʔnt hrkʔ ʔlyʔ
19:10	wʔmr <lh#3#> mṭn ṭnt lmryʔ ʔlhʔ ḥyltnʔ dšbqw qymk bny ʔysryl mdbḥk sḥpw wnbyyk qṭlw bḥrbʔ wʔštḥrt ʔnʔ blḥwdy whʔ bʕyn lmsb npšy/lnpšy#3#/ <mny#3#>
19:11	wʔmr lh pwq wqwm bṭwrʔ qdm mryʔ whʔ mryʔ ʕbd/ʕbr#3#/ rwḥʔ rbtʔ wtqyptʔ mprqʔ ṭwrʔ wmtbrʔ šwʕʔ qdm mryʔ lʔ hwʔ brwḥʔ mryʔ wbtr rwḥʔ zwʕʔ lʔ hwʔ bzwʕʔ mryʔ
19:12	wbtr zwʕʔ nwrʔ lʔ hwʔ bnwrʔ mryʔ wbtr nwrʔ qlʔ dmmllʔ rkykʔ
19:13	wkd šmʕ ʔlyʔ krk <ʔnyn#3#> ʔpwhy bmʕprh wnpq wqm lh bpwmh/btrʕʔ#3#/ dmʕrtʔ whwʔ ʕlwhy qlʔ wʔmr lh mnʔ ʕbd ʔnt hrkʔ ʔlyʔ
19:14	wʔmr mṭn ṭnt lmryʔ ʔlhʔ ḥyltnʔ dšbqw qymk bny ʔysryl mdbḥk sḥpw wnbyyk/wlnbyyk#3#/ qṭlw bḥrbʔ wʔštḥrt ʔnʔ blḥwdy whʔ bʕyn lmsb npšy/lnpšy#3#/
19:15	wʔmr lh mryʔ hpwk zl <lk#3#> lʔwrḥk lmdbrʔ ddrmswq wzl mšwḥ lḥzʔyl dnmlk ʕl ʔdwm
19:16	wlyhw br ymšy dnmlk ʕl ʔysryl wlʔlyšʕ br špṭ dmn/mn#3#/ ʔbl mḥwlʔ mšwḥ dnhwʔ nbyʔ ḥlpyk
19:17	wmn dntplṭ mn ḥrbʔ dḥzʔyl nqṭlywhy yhw wmn dntplṭ mn ḥrbʔ dyhw nqṭlywhy ʔlyšʕ
19:18	wʔwtr mn ʔysryl šbʕʔ ʔlpyn kl bwrkʔ dlʔ brkw lbʕlʔ wkl pwmʔ dlʔ nšqh
19:19	wʔzl mn tmn wʔškḥ lʔlyšʕ br špṭ ddbr hwʔ pdnʔ wtrtʕsrʔ pdnyn qdmwhy whw ḥd mn trʕsr hwʔ wʕbr ʔlyʔ ʕlwhy wšdʔ mʕprh ʕlwhy
19:20	wšbqh lpdnʔ dtwrʔ wʔzl/wrhṭ#3#/ btr ʔlyʔ wʔmr lh ʔzl ʔšwq lʔby wlʔmy wʔtʔ btrk ʔmr lh hpwk zl lk mnʔ gyr ʕbdt lk
19:21	whpk mn btrh wnsbh lpdnʔ dtwrʔ wdbḥ ʔnwn wbmʔnʔ dtwrʔ bšl bsrʔ wyhb lʕmʔ wʔklw wqm ʔzl btr ʔlyʔ nbyʔ wšmšh
20:01	wbrhdd mlkʔ dʔdwm knš klh ḥylh wtltyn wtryn mlkyn dʕmh wrkšʔ wmrkbtʔ wslq wšrʔ ʕl šmryn wʔtktš ʕmh
20:02	wšdr ʔyzgdʔ lwt ʔḥb mlkʔ dʔysryl <lqrytʔ#3#>

20:04	wʕnʔ mlkʔ dʔysryl wʔmr ʔyk ptgmk mry mlkʔ dylk ʔnʔ wkl dʔyt ly
20:05	whpkw ʔyzgdʔ wʔmrw hknʔ ʔmr brhdd dšlḥt lk bqdmytʔ dkspk wdhbk wnšyk wbnyk ttl ly
20:06	mḥr/lmḥr#3#/ lhnʔ ʕdnʔ/zbnʔ#3#/ ʔšdr ʕbdy lwtk wnbṣwn btyk wbtʔ dʕbdyk wkl rgtʔ dʕynyhwn nsbwn bʔydyhwn wnʔtwn
20:07	wqrʔ mlkʔ dʔysryl lklhwn sbʔ dʔrʕʔ wʔmr lhwn dʕw wḥzw dbyštʔ hw bʕʔ hnʔ dšlḥ ly ʕl nšy wʕl bny wʕl kspy wʕl dhby wlʔ klyt mnh
20:08	wʔmrw lh kwlhwn sbʔ wklh ʕmʔ lʔ tšmʕ wlʔ ttṭpys
20:09	wʔmr lʔyzgdʔ dbrhdd ʔmrw lmry mlkʔ kl dšlḥt lʕbdk bqdmytʔ ʔʕbd wptgmʔ hnʔ lʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ dʔʕbd wʔzlw ʔyzgdʔ wʔtybwhy ptgmʔ
20:10	wšlḥ lh brhdd wʔmr <lh#3#> hknʔ nʕbdwn ly ʔlhʔ whknʔ nwspwn ly ʔn/dʔn#3#/ nspq ʕprh dšmryn šwʕlʔ šwʕlʔ lʕmʔ dʕmy
20:11	wʕnʔ mlkʔ dʔysryl wʔmr mllw lʔ nštkḥ mn dʔsr ʔyk mn dšrʔ
20:12	wkd šmʕ ptgmʔ hnʔ whw štʔ hwʔ wmlkʔ bmṭllʔ wʔmr lʕbdwhy symw msm ʕl qrytʔ
20:13	whʔ nbyʔ ḥd qrb lwt ʔḥb mlkʔ dʔysryl wʔmr lh hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥzʔ ʔnt lh lhnʔ klh ḥylʔ rbʔ hʔ mšlm ʔnʔ lh bʔydyk ywmnʔ wtdʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
20:14	wʔmr ʔḥb bmn wʔmr lh bʕlymʔ wbrwrbnʔ dmdyntʔ wʔmr lh mnw/mn#3#/ nsdwr qrbʔ lwqdm ʔmr lh ʔnt
20:15	wmnʔ lʕlymʔ wlrwrbnʔ dmdyntʔ whww mʔtyn wtltyn wtryn wbtrhwn mnʔ lklh ʕmʔ wlklhwn bny ʔysrʔyl šbʕʔ ʔlpyn
20:16	wnpqw bṭhrʔ wbrhdd štʔ hwʔ ʕtyqʔ bmṭllʔ hw wmlkʔ tltyn wtryn dʔtw lmʕdrwth
20:17	wnpqw ʕlymʔ wrwrbnʔ dmdyntʔ bqdmytʔ wšdr <lwt#3#> brhdd wḥwywhy wʔmrw lh hʔ gbrʔ npqw mn šmryn
20:18	wʔmr ʔn lšlmʔ npqw ʔḥwdw ʔnwn kd ḥyyn wʔn lqrbʔ npqw kd ḥyyn ʔḥwdw ʔnwn
20:19	whlyn npqw mn mdyntʔ/qrytʔ#3#/ ʕlymʔ wrwrbnʔ dmdyntʔ wḥylʔ btrhwn/dbtrhwn#3#/
20:20	wqṭlw gbr gbrh wʕrq ʔdwm wrdp ʔnwn ʔysryl wʔtplṭ brhdd mlkʔ dʔdwm ʕl mrkbtʔ wpršʔ
20:21	wnpq mlkʔ dʔysryl wḥrb rkšʔ wmrkbtʔ wmḥʔ bʔdwm mḥwtʔ rbtʔ dṭb
20:22	whʔ nbyʔ dʔlhʔ qrb lwt ʔḥb mlkʔ dʔysryl wʔmr lh zl ʔtḥyl wdʕ ḥzy \mdm dʕbd /mnʔ ʕbd#3#/ ʔnt mṭl dlhpktʔ dšntʔ mlkʔ dʔdwm slq ʕlyk
20:23	wʕbdwhy dmlkʔ dʔdwm ʔmryn lh ʔlhʔ hw dṭwrʔ ʔlhhwn mṭl hnʔ hw zkʔwn brm ntktš ʕmhwn bpqʕtʔ ʔlʔ nzkʔ ʔnwn
20:24	wptgmʔ hnʔ ʕbd ʔʕbr mlkʔ gbr mn ʔtrh wʔqym šlyṭnʔ ḥlpyhwn/ʕlyhwn#3#/
20:25	wʔnt mny lk ḥylʔ ʔyk ḥylʔ dnpl mnk wrkšʔ ʔyk rkšʔ wrkbʔ ʔyk rkbʔ wntktš ʕmhwn bpqʕtʔ ʔlʔ <nzkʔ ʔnwn#3#> nʕšn mnhwn wšmʕ lqlhwn wʕbd hknʔ
20:26	whwʔ lhpktʔ dšntʔ pqd brhdd lʔdwm wslq lʔpq lmtktšw ʕm ʔysryl
20:27	wbny ʔysryl ʔtmnyw wʔstdrw/wʔttrsyw#3#/ wqmw lwqblhwn ʔyk tryn gzryn dṣpryʔ dʕzʔ wʔdwmyʔ mlʔwh lʔrʕʔ
20:28	wqrb nbyʔ dʔlhʔ lwt ʔḥb mlkʔ dʔysryl wʔmr lh hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʕl dʔmrw ʔdwmyʔ dʔlhʔ hw dṭwrʔ mryʔ wlʔ hwʔ ʔlhʔ dʕwmqʔ ʔšlmywhy lhnʔ klh ḥylʔ rbʔ bʔydyk wtdʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
20:29	wšrw \hlyn lwqbl hlyn /lhwn lwqblhwn#3#/ šbʕʔ ywmyn whwʔ bywmʔ šbyʕyʔ wʔqrbw qrbʔ wqṭlw bny ʔysryl mn ʔdwm mʔʔ ʔlpyn gbryn rglyyn bywmʔ ḥd/hw#3#/
20:30	wʕrqw dʔštḥrw lʔpq mdyntʔ wnpl šwrʔ ʕl ʕsryn wšbʕʔ/wḥmšʔ#3#/ ʔlpyn gbryn dʔštḥrw wbrhdd ʕrq wʕl bgw/lgw#3#/ qrytʔ twn bgw twn
20:31	wqrbw ʕbdwhy wʔmryn lh hʔ šmʕn dmlkʔ dʔysryl mlkʔ ʔnwn ṭbʔ nʔswr sqʔ bryšyn wḥblʔ bḥṣyn wnpwq lwt mlkʔ dʔysryl ṭk nḥʔ npšn
20:32	wʔsrw sqʔ bryšyhwn wḥblʔ bḥṣyhwn wʔtw lwt mlkʔ dʔysryl wʔmrw lh ʕbdk brhdd ʔmr <lk#3#> tḥʔ npšy wʔmr ʕdkyl qym hw ʔḥy hw
20:33	wgbrʔ nḥšʔ hwʔ brhdd wgbrʔ {rḥšw}<nḥšw> wʔstrhbw wplṭwhy mnh wʔmrw ʔḥwk brhdd wʔmr zlw dwbrwhy wnpq lwth brhdd wʔwtbh ʕmh bqrwkʔ
20:34	wʔmr lh qwryʔ dnsb ʔby mn ʔbwk ʔpnʔ lk wšwqʔ ʔʕbd lk bdrmswq ʔyk dʕbd ʔby bšmryn wʔnʔ bqymʔ ʔšdrk wʔqym lh qymʔ wšdrh
20:35	wgbrʔ ḥd mn bny nbyʔ ʔmr lḥbrh bptgmh dmryʔ mḥyny wlʔ ṣbʔ gbrʔ dnmḥywhy
20:36	ʔmr lh ʕl dlʔ šmʕt bqlh dmryʔ ʔlhk hʔ ʔzl ʔnt mn lwty wqṭl lk ʔryʔ wʔzl mn lwth wʔškḥh ʔryʔ wqṭlh
20:37	wʔškḥ gbrʔ ʔḥrnʔ wʔmr lh mḥyny wmḥyhy gbrʔ hw wṣlph
20:38	wʔzl nbyʔ wqm qdm mlkʔ ʕl yd ʔwrḥʔ wḥpy bqṭmʔ ʔpwhy
20:39	whʔ mlkʔ ʕbr/ʕbd#3#/ whw mzʕq qdm mlkʔ wʔmr ʕbdk npq bgw qrbʔ whʔ gbrʔ sṭʔ wʔyty ly gbrʔ wʔmr ly ṭryhy lgbrʔ hnʔ wʔn mṭʕʔ nṭʕʔ thwʔ npšk ḥlp npšh ʔw kkrʔ dkspʔ ttqwl
20:40	wʕbdk ʕd/kd#3#/ mtpnʔ lkʔ wlkʔ hw lytwhy ʔmr lh mlkʔ dʔysryl hknʔ hw dynk ʔnt psqt
20:41	wʔstrhb wʔʕbr qṭmʔ mn ʔpwhy wʔštwdʕh mlkʔ dʔysryl dmn nbyʔ hw
20:42	wʔmr lh hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʕl/ḥlp#3#/ dšdrt lgbrʔ ḥrmʔ mn ḥdʔ thwʔ npšk ḥlp npšh wʕmk ḥlp ʕmh
20:43	wʔzl mlkʔ dʔysryl lbyth kd kryʔ lh wzʕyp wʕl lšmryn
21:01	whwʔ mn btr ptgmʔ hlyn krmʔ ʔyt hwʔ lnbwt ʔyzrʕlyʔ bʔyzrʕyl ʕl gb hyklʔ dʔḥb mlkʔ dšmryn
21:02	wʔmr ʔḥb lnbwt hb ly krmk wnhwʔ/dnhwʔ#3#/ ly lgnt yrqʔ mṭl dhw qryb ʕl gb byty wʔtl lk krmʔ ḥlpwhy dṭb mnh ʔw ʔn špyr bʕynyk ʔtl lk kspʔ dmwhy
21:03	wʔmr nbwt lʔḥb ḥs ly mn mryʔ dʔtl lk yrtwtʔ dʔbhy
21:04	wʔzl/wʕl#3#/ ʔḥb lbyth kd kryʔ lh wzʕyp ʕl ptgmʔ dʔmr lh nbwt ʔyzrʕlyʔ dlʔ yhb ʔnʔ lk yrtwtʔ dʔbhy wškb ʕl ʕrsh wʔpny ʔpwhy wlʔ ʔkl/lʕs#3#/ lḥmʔ
21:05	wʔtt lwth ʔyzbl ʔntth wʔmrʔ lh mnw kryʔ lh lrwḥk wlʔ ṣbʔ ʔnt lmʔkl lḥmʔ
21:06	ʔmr lh ʕl dʔmrt <lh#3#> lnbwt ʔyzrʕlyʔ hb ly krmk bkspʔ wʔn ṣbʔ ʔnt ʔtl lk krmʔ ḥlpwhy dṭb mnh wʔmr ly lʔ yhb ʔnʔ lk krmy
21:07	ʔmrʔ lh ʔyzbl ʔntth ʔnt tkšr dthwʔ mlkʔ ʕl ʔysryl qwm ʔkwl lḥmʔ wnṭʔb lk ʔnʔ ʔtl lk krmh dnbwt ʔyzrʕlyʔ
21:08	wktbt ʔygrtʔ/ktbʔ#3#/ bšmh dʔḥb wḥtmth bʕzqth wšdrt ʔygrtʔ lsbʔ wlḥʔrʔ dytbyn bqrytʔ ʕm nbwt
21:09	wktbt bʔygrtʔ dgzwrw ṣwmʔ wʔwtbw lnbwt bryš ʕmʔ
21:10	wʔytw/wʔwtbw#3#/ tryn gbryn bny ʕwlʔ wʔwtbw lqwblh wnshdwn bh wnʔmrwn dṣḥy nbwt lʔlhʔ wlmlkʔ wʔpqwhy wrwgmwhy <bkʔpʔ#3#> wnmwt
21:11	wʕbdw ʔnšʔ dqryth sbʔ wḥʔrʔ dytbyn bqrytʔ ʕm nbwt ʔyk dšlḥt lhwn ʔyzbl ʔyk dktyb bʔgrtʔ dšlḥt/dšdrt#3#/ lhwn
21:12	gzrw ṣwmʔ wʔwtbwhy lnbwt bryš ʕmʔ
21:13	wʔytw tryn gbryn bny ʕwlʔ wʔwtbw lqwblh wʔshdw gbrʔ hnwn ʕl nbwt wʔmrw dṣḥy/ṣḥy#3#/ nbwt lʔlhʔ wlmlkʔ wʔpqwhy lbr mn qrytʔ wrgmwhy bkʔpʔ wmyt
21:14	wšlḥw lʔyzbl dʔtrgm nbwt wmyt

21:16	wkd šmʕ ʔḥb dmyt nbwt qm ʔḥb lmḥt lkrmh dnbwt ʔyzrʕlyʔ lmʔrth/dnʔrtywhy#3#/
21:17	whwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕl ʔlyʔ dmn tšby lmʔmr

21:19	wʔmr lh hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hʔ qṭlt whʔ yrtt <ʔmr lh#3#> hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ bdwktʔ dlʕw klbʔ dmh dnbwt nlʕwn klbʔ ʔp dmk dylk

21:21	hʔ mytʔ ʔnʔ ʕlyk byštʔ wʔbʕr btrk wʔwbd lʔḥb dtʔn bʔstʔ wdʔsr/wʔsr#3#/ wšrʔ bʔysryl
21:22	wʔʕbdywhy lbytk ʔyk byt ywrbʕm br nbṭ wʔyk byt bʕšʔ br ʔḥyʔ ʕl rwgzʔ dʔrgzt wʔḥṭyt lʔysryl

21:29	ḥzyt dbht ʔḥb mn qdmy ḥlp dbht <ʔḥb#3#> mn qdmy lʔ ʔytʔ byštʔ bywmwhy bywmy brh ʔytʔ byštʔ ʕl byth

22:04	wʔmr lywšpṭ ʔzl ʔnt ʕmy lqrbʔ lrmt glʕd wʔmr ywšpṭ <mlkʔ dyhwdʔ#3#> ʔzl ʔnʔ ʔkwtk wʕmy ʔyk ʕmk wrkšy ʔyk rkšk

22:11	wʕbd lh ṣdqyʔ br knʕnytʔ qrntʔ dprzlʔ wʔmr hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ bhlyn tdqr ʔnwn lʔdwmyʔ ʕdmʔ dtgmr ʔnwn

22:16	ʔmr lh mlkʔ ʕdmʔ lkmʔ zbnyn mwmʔ ʔnʔ lk dlʔ tʔmr ly ʔlʔ ʔn šryrtʔ bšmh dmryʔ

22:31	wmlkʔ dʔdwm pqd lrwrbny mrkbtʔ/rkbʔ#3#/ dylh tltyn wtryn <gbryn#3#> wʔmr lʔ ttktšwn lʔ ʕm zʕwrʔ wlʔ ʕm rbʔ ʔlʔ ʕm mlkʔ dʔysryl blḥwd

22:35	wʕšn qrbʔ bywmʔ hw wmlkʔ qʔm hwʔ bmrkbtʔ lwqbl ʔdwm wmyt brmšʔ wrdʔ dmʔ dmḥwth bḥnh dmrkbth
22:36	wkrwzʔ qrʔ bmšrytʔ kd ʕrbt šmšʔ wʔmr zlw ʔnš lqryth/lbyth#3#/ wʔnš lʔrʕh

22:50	hydyn ʔmr ʔḥzyʔ br ʔḥb lywšpṭ nʔzlwn ʕbdy ʕm ʕbdyk bʔlpʔ wlʔ ṣbʔ ywšpṭ

22:53	wʕbd dbyš qdm mryʔ whlk bʔwrḥth dʔbwhy wbʔwrḥth dʔmh wbʔwrḥth dywrbʕm br nbṭ dʔḥṭy lʔysryl
22:54	wplḥ lbʕlʔ wsgd lh wʔrgz qdm mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʔyk dʕbd ʔbwhy
01:01	wmrd mwʔb ʕl mlkʔ dʔysryl/ʔysrʔyl#3#/ mn btr dmyt ʔḥb
01:02	wnpl ʔḥzyʔ mn kswsṭrwn dʕlyth dbšmryn wʔtkrh wšdr ʔyzgdʔ wʔmr lhwn zlw šʔlw mn bʕlzbwb ʔlhʔ dʕqrwn ʔn mtḥlm ʔnʔ mn kwrhny hnʔ
01:03	wmlʔkh dmryʔ ʔmr lʔlyʔ dmn tšby qwm ḥwt/sq#3#/ lʔwrʕʔ dʔyzgdwhy dmlkʔ dšmryn wʔmr lhwn mn bly dlyt ʔlhʔ bʔysryl ʔzlyn ʔntwn lmšʔl mn bʕlzbwb ʔlhʔ dʕqrwn
01:04	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʕrsʔ dslqt lh lʔ tḥwt mnh ʔlʔ mmt tmwt wʔzl ʔlyʔ
01:05	whpkw ʔyzgdʔ lwt ʔḥzyʔ wʔmr lhwn ʔḥzyʔ mnʔ/lmnʔ#3#/ hpktwn
01:06	ʔmryn lh gbrʔ ḥd slq lʔwrʕn wʔmr ln hpwkw zlw lwt gbrʔ dšdrkwn wʔmrw lh mn bly dlyt ʔlhʔ bʔysryl šdrt lmšʔl mn bʕlzbwb ʔlhʔ dʕqrwn mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʕrsʔ dslqt lh lʔ tḥwt mnh ʔlʔ mmt tmwt
01:07	ʔmr lhwn mnw ḥzwh dgbrʔ dslq lʔwrʕkwn wʔmr lkwn mlʔ hlyn
01:08	ʔmryn lh gbrʔ sʕr wqmrʔ dmškʔ ʔsyr bḥṣwhy ʔmr lhwn ʔlyʔ hw dmn tšby
01:09	wšdr ʕlwhy rbʔ dḥmšyn wḥmšyn dʕmh wslqw lwth whw ytb <hwʔ#3#> ʕl ryš ṭwrʔ wʔmr lh nbyh dʔlhʔ mlkʔ ʔmr ḥwt
01:10	wʕnʔ ʔlyʔ wʔmr lrbʔ dḥmšyn ʔn nbyh ʔnʔ dʔlhʔ tḥwt nwrʔ mn šmyʔ wtʔklk lk wlḥmšyn dʕmk wnḥtt nwrʔ mn šmyʔ wʔklth lh wlḥmšyn dʕmh
01:11	whpk wšdr ʕlwhy rbʔ dḥmšyn ʔḥrnyn wḥmšyn dʕmh wʕnʔ wʔmr lh nbyh dʔlhʔ hknʔ ʔmr mlkʔ bʕgl ḥwt
01:12	wʕnʔ ʔlyʔ wʔmr lh ʔn nbyh ʔnʔ dʔlhʔ tḥwt nwrʔ mn šmyʔ wtʔklk lk wlḥmšyn dʕmk wnḥtt nwrʔ dʔlhʔ mn šmyʔ wʔklth lh wlḥmšyn dʕmh
01:13	wšdr ʕlwhy rbʔ dḥmšyn dtlt zbnyn wḥmšyn/wlḥmšyn#3#/ dʕmh wslq rbʔ dḥmšyn wbrk ʕl bwrkwhy qdm ʔlyʔ wmtkšp <hwʔ#3#> lh wʔmr lh nbyh dʔlhʔ ttyqr npšy wnpšʔ dʕbdyk hlyn ḥmšyn dqymyn qdmyk
01:14	dhʔ nḥtt nwrʔ mn šmyʔ wʔklt ltryn rwrbnyn dḥmšyn wlḥmšyn ḥmšyn dʕmhwn whšʔ ttyqr npšy bʕynyk
01:15	wʔmr mlʔkh dmryʔ/dʔlhʔ#3#/ lʔlyʔ ḥwt ʕmh wlʔ tdḥl mnh wqm wnḥt ʕmh lwt mlkʔ
01:16	wʔmr lh hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥlp dšdrt ʔyzgdʔ lmšʔl/dtšʔl#3#/ mn bʕlzbwb ʔlhʔ dʕqrwn mn bly dlyt ʔlhʔ bʔysryl lmšʔl ptgmh mṭl hnʔ ʕrsʔ dslqt lh lʔ tḥwt mnh ʔlʔ mmt tmwt
01:17	wmyt ʔyk ptgmh dmryʔ dʔmr ʔlyʔ wʔmlk ywrm ʔḥwhy btrh bšnt trtyn dywrm br ywšpṭ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ mṭl dlʔ hwʔ lh brʔ
01:18	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy dʔḥzyʔ wkl mdm dʕbd hʔ ktybyn bspr dbrymyn dmlkʔ dʔysryl
02:01	whwʔ dkd msq mryʔ lʔlyʔ bʕlʕlʔ lšmyʔ wʔzlw ʔlyʔ wʔlyšʕ mn glglʔ
02:02	wʔmr <lh#3#> ʔlyʔ lʔlyšʕ ktr ly hrkʔ mṭl dmryʔ šdrny lbyt ʔyl wʔmr ʔlyšʕ ḥy hw mryʔ wḥyʔ hy npšk dlʔ ʔšbqk wnḥtw lbyt ʔyl
02:03	wnpqw bny nbyʔ dbyt ʔyl lwt ʔlyšʕ wʔmryn lh lʔ ydʕ ʔnt dywmnʔ nsb <lh#3#> mryʔ lmrk mn ryšk wʔmr ʔp ʔnʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ štwqw
02:04	wʔmr ʔlyʔ lʔlyšʕ ktr ly hrkʔ mṭl dmryʔ šdrny lʔyryḥw wʔmr ḥy hw mryʔ wḥyʔ hy npšk dlʔ ʔšbqk wʔzlw lʔyryḥw
02:05	wqrbw bny nbyʔ dbʔyryḥw lwt ʔlyšʕ wʔmryn lh <lʔ#3#> ydʕ ʔnt dywmnʔ nsb mryʔ lmrk mn ryšk wʔmr ʔp ʔnʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ štwqw
02:06	wʔmr ʔlyʔ lʔlyšʕ/lh#3#/ ktr ly hrkʔ mṭl dmryʔ šdrny lywrdnn wʔmr <ʔlyšʕ#3#> ḥy hw mryʔ wḥyʔ hy npšk dlʔ ʔšbqk wʔzlw/wʔtw#3#/ tryhwn
02:07	wḥmšyn gbryn mn bny nbyʔ ʔzlw wqmw mn qbwl mn rwḥqʔ wtryhwn qmw ʕl spth dywrdnn
02:08	wnsb ʔlyʔ mʕprh/lmʕprh#3#/ wkrkh wmḥʔ ʔnwn lmyʔ dywrdnn wʔtplgw plgʔ lkʔ wplgʔ lkʔ wʕbrw tryhwn bybšʔ
02:09	wkd ʕbrw ʔmr ʔlyʔ lʔlyšʕ šʔl mnʔ ʔʕbd lk ʕdlʔ ʔtdbr mnk wʔmr ʔlyšʕ nhwʔ ḥd tryn brwḥk ʕly
02:10	wʔmr ʔsgyt šʔlt ʔn yḥzyny kd mtdbr ʔnʔ mnk nhwʔ lk hknʔ wʔn lʔ lʔ nhwʔ <lk#3#>
02:11	whwʔ dkd hnwn mmllyn wmhlkyn <ʔkḥdʔ#3#> whʔ mrkbtʔ dnwrʔ wrkšʔ dnwrʔ wpršw byt tryhwn wslq ʔlyʔ bʕlʕlʔ lšmyʔ
02:12	wʔlyšʕ ḥzʔ whʔ/hwʔ#3#/ myll wʔmr ʔby ʔby rkbh/rkšh#3#/ dʔysryl wpršwhy wtwb lʔ ḥzyhy wʔḥd blbwšwhy wṣry ʔnwn ltryn ṣrwn
02:13	wʔrym mʕprh dʔlyʔ dnpl mnh whpk wqm lh ʕl spth dywrdnn
02:14	wqrʔ lmryʔ <wnsbh lmʕprh dʔlyʔ dnpl mnh wmḥʔ lmyʔ#3#> wʔmr ʔwn mryʔ ʔlhh dmry ʔlyʔ wʔp hw mḥʔ lmyʔ dywrdnn wʔtplgw plgʔ lkʔ wplgʔ lkʔ wʕbr ʔlyšʕ
02:15	wḥzw bny nbyʔ dbʔyryḥw mn qbwl wʔmrw šrt rwḥh dʔlyʔ ʕl ʔlyšʕ wʔtw lʔwrʕh wsgdw lh ʕl ʔrʕʔ
02:16	wʔmrw lh hʔ ʔyt hrkʔ ʕm ʕbdyk ḥmšyn gbryn gnbry ḥylʔ nʔzlwn nbʕwnh lmrk dlmʔ šqlth rwḥh dmryʔ wʔrmyth bḥd mn ṭwrʔ ʔw bḥd mn nḥlʔ wʔmr lʔ tšdrwn
02:17	wʔtktšw ʕmh ʕdmʔ dbht mnhwn wʔmr šdrw wšdrw ḥmšyn gbryn wbʕʔwhy tltʔ ywmyn wlʔ ʔškḥwhy
02:18	wʔtw lwth whw ytb bʔyryḥw wʔmr lhwn lʔ ʔmrt lkwn dlʔ tʔzlwn
02:19	wʔmrw ʔnšy qrytʔ lʔlyšʕ hʔ mwtbh dqrytʔ špyr ʔyk dmrn ḥzʔ wmyʔ byšyn wʔrʕʔ mgzyʔ
02:20	wʔmr ʔytw ly qwqtʔ/qwltʔ#3#/ ḥdʔ ḥdtʔ wʔrmw bh mlḥʔ wʔytyw lh
02:21	wnpq lh lmbwʕʔ dmyʔ wʔrmy tmn mlḥʔ wʔmr hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔsyt lmyʔ hlyn wtwb lʔ nhwʔ tmn dmʔt wdmgzʔ
02:22	wʔtʔsyw myʔ hlyn ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ ʔyk ptgmh dʔlyšʕ dʔmr
02:23	wslq mn tmn lbyt ʔyl whw slq bʔwrḥʔ wṭlyʔ <zʕwrʔ#3#> dqdqʔ npqw mn qrytʔ wmbzḥyn bh wʔmryn <lh#3#> sq qrḥʔ sq qrḥʔ
02:24	wʔtpny lbstrh wḥzʔ ʔnwn wlṭ ʔnwn bšmh dmryʔ wnpq trtyn dbyn mn ʕbʔ wprt mnhwn ʔrbʕyn wtryn ṭlyyn
02:25	wʔzl mn tmn lṭwrʔ dkrmlʔ wmn tmn twb lšmryn
03:01	wywrm br ʔḥb ʔmlk ʕl ʔysryl bšmryn bšnt tmnʕsrʔ lywšpṭ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wʔmlk trtʕsrʔ šnyn
03:02	wʕbd dbyš qdm mryʔ brm lʔ ʔyk ʔbwhy wʔyk ʔmh wʔʕbr qymtʔ dbʕlʔ dʕbd ʔbwhy
03:03	blḥwd bḥṭhwhy dywrbʕm br nbṭ dʔḥṭy lʔysryl ʔtdbq wlʔ sṭʔ <hwʔ#3#> mnhwn
03:04	wmyšʕ mlkʔ dmwʔb nqdʔ hwʔ wmsq hwʔ lmlkʔ dʔysryl mʔʔ ʔlpyn šmynʔ dʕnʔ wmʔʔ ʔlpyn dkrʔ dʕmrʔ

03:10	wʔmr mlkʔ dysryl ʔwh ʕl hdʔ ky qrʔ mryʔ ltltʔ mlkyn hlyn dnšlm ʔnwn <mryʔ#3#> bʔydʔ dmwʔb
03:11	wʔmr ywšpṭ lyt hrkʔ nbyʔ dmryʔ dnšʔl ptgmh dmryʔ mnh wʕnʔ ḥd mn ʕbdwhy dmlkʔ dʔysryl wʔmr ʔyt hrkʔ ʔlyšʕ br špṭ dnsk hwʔ myʔ ʕl ʔydwhy dʔlyʔ
03:12	wʔmr ywšpṭ ʔyt hw ʕmh ptgmh dmryʔ wnḥtw lwth mlkʔ dʔysryl wmlkʔ/wywšpṭ mlkʔ#3#/ dyhwdʔ wmlkʔ dʔdwm
03:13	wʔmr ʔlyšʕ lmlkʔ dʔysryl mʔ ly wlk zl lwt nbywhy dʔbwk wlwt nbyyh dʔmk ʔmr lh mlkʔ dʔysryl ʕl hdʔ ky qrʔ mryʔ ltltʔ mlkyn hlyn dnšlm ʔnwn bʔydʔ dmwʔb
03:14	wʔmr ʔlyšʕ ḥy hw mryʔ ḥyltnʔ dqmt qdmwhy ʔlw lʔ mn ʔpwhy dywšpṭ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ mtḥmṣ ʔnʔ/hwyt#3#/ ʔn ʔdyqt lwtk wʔn ḥzytk

03:18	wbṣyrʔ/wqlylʔ#3#/ hy hdʔ bʕyny mryʔ wnšlm <ʔnwn#3#> lmwʔbyʔ bʔydykwn
03:19	wtḥrbwn kwl qwryʔ ʕšyntʔ wkl qwryʔ dgbyn wkl ʔylnʔ dšpyryn trmwn wkl mbwʕʔ dmyʔ tṭmmwn wkl yrtwtʔ dšpyrʔ tmlwnh kʔpʔ
03:20	whwʔ bṣprʔ kd slq qwrbnʔ whʔ myʔ ʔtyn mn ʔwrḥʔ dʔdwm wʔtmlyt ʔrʕʔ myʔ
03:21	wklhwn mwʔbyʔ ḥzw/šmʕw#3#/ dslqw mlkʔ lmtktšw ʕmhwn wʔkrzw mn kwl ʔsr sypʔ wlʕl wqmw ʕl tḥwmʔ

03:23	wʔmrw dmʔ hw hnʔ mtḥrbw ʔtḥrbw mlkʔ wqṭlw gbr ḥbrh/lḥbrh#3#/ mkyl lbztʔ mwʔb
03:24	wʔtw lmšrytʔ dʔysryl wqmw bny ʔysryl wḥrbw lmwʔbyʔ wʕrqw mn qdmyhwn wʕlw bhwn wḥrbwhy lmwʔb
03:25	wqwryʔ sḥpw wkl yrtwtʔ dšpyrʔ šdw gbr kʔph wmlʔwh wkl mʕynʔ dmyʔ ṭmmw wkl ʔylnʔ dšpyryn ʔrmyw ʕdmʔ dʔštbq kʔpʔ bʔstʔ kd msḥpn wʔtkrkwh dšdyn bqlʕʔ wḥrbwh
03:26	wḥzʔ mlkʔ dmwʔb dʕšn lh mnh qrbʔ wdbr ʕmh šbʕmʔʔ gbryn šmṭy sypʔ dntplṭ lwt mlkʔ wʔdwm wlʔ ʔškḥ
03:27	wnsb lbrh bwkrh dhw mmlk btrh wʔsqh ʕltʔ ʕl šwrʔ whwʔ rwgzʔ rbʔ ʕl ʔysryl wšqlw mnh whpkw lʔtrhwn/lʔrʕhwn#3#/
04:01	wʔnttʔ ḥdʔ mn nšy bny nbyʔ mzʕqʔ qdm ʔlyšʕ wʔmrʔ ʕbdk bʕly myt wʔnt ydʕ ʔnt dʕbdk dḥl hwʔ mn mryʔ wmrʔ ḥwbʔ ʔtʔ lmdbr <lh#3#> tryn bny lh ʕbdʔ
04:02	wʔmr lh ʔlyšʕ mnʔ ʔʕbd lky ḥwʔyny mnʔ ʔyt lky bbytʔ wʔmrt lyt lʔmtk mdm bbytʔ ʔlʔ ʔn msrwḥytʔ dmšḥʔ
04:03	wʔmr lh zly šʔly lky mʔnʔ mn šwqʔ mn klhwn šbbyky mʔnʔ spyqʔ/sryqʔ#3#/ lʔ tzʕryn
04:04	wʕwly wʔḥwdy trʕʔ bʔpyky wbʔpy bnyky wswky bhlyn klhwn mʔnʔ myʔ wmʔnʔ dmlʔ ʔsqy ly

04:07	wʔtt ḥwyt lnbyh dʔlhʔ wʔmr lh zly zbny mšḥʔ wprwʕy ḥwbtky wʔnty wbnyky ḥyy mn mdm dytr
04:08	whwʔ mn btr/lbtr#3#/ ywmʔ wʔtʔ ʔlyšʕ wʕbr lšylw/bšylw#3#/ wtmn ʔyt hwt ʔnttʔ rbtʔ wʔḥdth dnʔkwl lḥmʔ wmʔ dʕbr sṭʔ ltmn lmʔkl/dnʔkwl#3#/ lḥmʔ

04:23	ʔmr lh mnʔ/lmnʔ#3#/ ʔzlʔ ʔnty lwth ywmnʔ dlʔ/lʔ#3#/ ryš yrḥʔ wlʔ šbtʔ wʔmrt šylwmytʔ

04:25	wʔzlt lwt nbyh dʔlhʔ lṭwrʔ dkrmlʔ wkd ḥzh nbyh dʔlhʔ mn qbwl ʔmr lgḥzy tlmydh hʔ šylwmytʔ hdʔ <ʔtyʔ#3#>

04:29	wʔmr lgḥzy ʔswr ḥṣyk wsb ḥwṭry bʔydk wzl ʔn tškḥ gbrʔ/lgbrʔ#3#/ lʔ tbrkywhy wʔn nbrkk gbrʔ/ʔnš#3#/ lʔ tʕnywhy wsym ḥwṭry ʕl ʔpwhy dṭlyʔ

04:35	whpk whlk bbytʔ ḥdʔ lkʔ wḥdʔ lkʔ wslq wʔtghn ʕlwhy wʔtpwq ṭlyʔ šbʕ zbnyn wptḥ ṭlyʔ ʕynwhy
04:36	wqrʔ lgḥzy wʔmr lh qryh lšylwmytʔ hdʔ wqrh wʕlt lwth wʔmr lh šqwly brky

04:38	wʔlyšʕ hpk lglglʔ wkpnʔ ʔyt bʔrʕʔ wbny nbyʔ ytbyn qdmwhy wʔmr ltlmydh tpy qdsʔ rbʔ wbšl bwšlʔ lbny nbyʔ
04:39	wnpq ḥd lḥqlʔ lmlqṭ rwʕnʔ wʔškḥ gptʔ bḥqlʔ/dḥqlʔ#3#/ wlqṭ mnh pqwʕʔ ddbrʔ mlʔ lbšh wʔtʔ ʔrmy bqdsʔ dbwšlʔ mṭl dlʔ ydʕ
04:40	wnsk lhwn lgbrʔ lmʔkl wkd ʔklw mn bwšlʔ ʔmryn mwtʔ ʔyt bqdsʔ nbyh dʔlhʔ wlʔ ʔškḥw dnʔklwn
04:41	wʔmr sbw qmḥʔ ʔrmw bqdsʔ wʔmr swkw lʕmʔ wnʔklwn wlʔ hwʔ mdm bqdsʔ
04:42	wgbrʔ ʔtʔ mn mdynt gnbrʔ wʔyty lnbyh dʔlhʔ lḥmʔ dbkrʔ ʕsryn dlḥmʔ dsʕrʔ wpryktʔ bsdwnʔ wʔmr hbw lʕmʔ wnʔklwn
04:43	wʔmr lh mšmšnh mnʔ ʔtl hnʔ/lhnʔ#3#/ qdm mʔʔ gbryn wʔmr lh ʔlyšʕ hb lʕmʔ wnʔklwn mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ nʔklwn/dnʔklwn#3#/ wnwtrwn
04:44	wsm qdmyhwn wʔklw wʔwtrw ʔyk ptgmh dmryʔ
05:01	wnʕmn rb ḥylʔ dmlkʔ dʔdwm gbr hwʔ rb qdm mrh wšbyḥ bʔpʔ mṭl dbh ʕbd mryʔ pwrqnʔ lʔdwm wgbrʔ nʕmn gnbr ḥylʔ hwʔ wgrb
05:02	wʔdwmyʔ npqw bgysʔ wšbw mn ʔrʕʔ dʔysryl ʕlymtʔ zʕwrtʔ whwt qdm ʔntth dnʕmn

05:04	wʕlw wḥwyw lmrh wʔmrw lh hknʔ/dhknʔ#3#/ whknʔ ʔmrt ʕlymtʔ dmn ʔrʕʔ dʔysryl
05:05	wʔmrw lh mlkʔ dʔdwm tʔ zl ʔnʔ ʔšdr ʔygrtʔ lmlkʔ <lwt mlkʔ#3#> dʔysryl wʔzl wnsb bʔydh ʕsr kkryn dkspʔ wštʔ ʔlpyn ddhbʔ wʕsrʔ zwgyn dnḥtʔ/nḥtʔ#3#/

08:09	wʔzl ḥzʔyl lʔwrʕh wšql qwrbnʔ bʔydh/ʕmh#3#/ mn kl ṭwbʔ ddrmswq ṭʕn ʔrbʕyn gmlyn wʔtʔ wqm qdmwhy wʔmr lh brk brhdd mlkʔ dʔdwm šdrny lwtk wʔmr ʔn ḥyʔ ʔnʔ mn kwrhny hnʔ

08:12	wʔmr ḥzʔyl mṭl mnʔ bkʔ <ʔnt#3#> mry wʔmr lh ʔlyšʕ ydʕ ʔnʔ byštʔ dʕbd ʔnt lbny ʔysryl krkyhwn mwqd ʔnt bnwrʔ wgdwdyhwn bḥrbʔ mqṭl ʔnt wylwdyhwn mšqp ʔnt wbṭnthwn mprt ʔnt

11:04	wbšntʔ šbyʕytʔ šdr ywydʕ khnʔ wdbr lrby/rby#3#/ mʔwtʔ wlrhṭʔ wlṭblrʔ wʔʕl ʔnwn lwth lbyth dmryʔ wʔqym ʔnwn bbyth dmryʔ wʔqym lhwn qymʔ wymʔ ʕmhwn mwmtʔ \wḥwy ʔnwn /wḥzw ʕmh#3#/ lbrh dmlkʔ
11:05	wpqd ʔnwn wʔmr lhwn hnʔ ptgmʔ dtʕbdwn/tʕbdwn#3#/ twltʔ mnkwn nhwwn nṭryn bmʕly šbtʔ bmṭrtʔ dbyt mlkʔ
11:06	wtwltʔ btrʕʔ dqrsʔ wtwltʔ btrʕʔ dbyt rhṭʔ wṭrw mṭrtʔ dbytʔ mn swrḥnʔ
11:07	wtrtyn mnwn mnkwn bkl mpqy šbtʔ wṭrw mṭrtʔ \dbyt mryʔ /dmryʔ#3#/ ʕm dbyt mlkʔ
11:08	wʔtkrkwhy lmlkʔ gbrʔ wzynh bʔydh wmn dʕʔl lsdrʔ nmwt whww ʕm mlkʔ bmpqh wbmʕlh
11:09	wʕbdw rby mʔwtʔ ʔyk dpqd ʔnwn ywydʕ khnʔ wdbr gbrʔ <gbr#3#> ʔnšwhy bmʕly šbtʔ ʕm mpqy šbtʔ wʔtw lwt ywydʕ khnʔ
11:10	wyhb khnʔ lrby mʔwtʔ mwrnytʔ wšlṭʔ dmlkʔ dwyd dbbyth/bbyth#3#/ dmryʔ
11:11	wqmw rhṭʔ gbrʔ wzynh bʔydh mn sṭrʔ dbytʔ mn ymynʔ wʕdmʔ lsṭrʔ dbytʔ mn smlʔ wʔtkrkw ʕl mdbḥʔ \wʕl byt /wlbyt#3#/ mlkʔ
11:12	wʔpqw lbrh dmlkʔ wsmw klylʔ bryšh dshdwtʔ wmšḥwhy wʔmlkwhy wnqšw kpʔ wʔmrw nḥʔ mlkʔ
11:13	wšmʕt ʕtlyʔ ql rwbʔ dʕmʔ wʕmʔ kd ḥdyn wʔtt lwt ʕmʔ lbyth dmryʔ
11:14	wḥzt mlkʔ <kd#3#> qʔm ʕl ʕmwdʔ ʔyk nmwsʔ dmlkʔ wrwrbnʔ wqryy bqrntʔ/qrntʔ#3#/ qymyn qdm mlkʔ wklh ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ ḥdyn wqryn bqrntʔ/qrntʔ#3#/ wṣryt ʕtlyʔ lbwšyh wqrt mrdʔ mrdʔ
11:15	wpqd ywydʕ khnʔ lrby mʔwtʔ šlyṭy ḥylʔ wʔmr lhwn ʔpqwh lbr mn sdrʔ wkl mn dʕʔl btrh ntqṭl bḥrbʔ mṭl dʔmr khnʔ lʔ ttqṭl bbyth dmryʔ
11:16	wtqn lh dwktʔ wʕlt bʔwrḥʔ dmʕlnʔ drkšʔ dmlkʔ wmytt tmn
11:17	wʔqym ywydʕ khnʔ qymʔ byt mryʔ <lmlkʔ#3#> wlʕmʔ dnhwwn ʕmʔ lmryʔ dbyt mlkʔ wʕmʔ
11:18	wʕlw klh ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ lbyt bʕlʔ wʕqrw mdbḥwhy wṣlmwhy tbrw wlmtn kwmrʔ dbʕlʔ qṭlw qdm mdbḥʔ wʔqym <ywydʕ#3#> khnʔ pqwdʔ ʕl byth dmryʔ
11:19	wdbr lrby mʔwtʔ wlrhṭʔ wlṭblrʔ wlklh/wklh#3#/ ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ wʔḥtwhy lmlkʔ mn byth dmryʔ wʕl bʔwrḥʔ dtrʕʔ drhṭʔ dbyt mlkʔ wytb ʕl kwrsyʔ dmlkʔ
11:20	wḥdyw klh ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ wqrytʔ šlyt wlʕtlyʔ qṭlw bḥrbʔ <bbyt mlkʔ#3#>
12:01	br šbʕ hwʔ šnyn ywʔš kd ʔmlk
12:02	bšnt šbʕ lyhw ʔmlk ywʔš wʔrbʕyn šnyn ʔmlk bʔwršlm wšmʔ dʔmh ṣwbʔ mn bršbʕ
12:03	wʕbd ywʔš dšpyr qdm mryʔ kl ywmwhy dmlp hwʔ lh ywydʕ khnʔ
12:04	brm ʕlwtʔ lʔ ʔʕbr wʕdkyl ʕmʔ mdbḥyn hww wmʕṭryn ʕl ʕlwtʔ
12:05	wʔmr ywʔš lkhnʔ kl kspʔ dqwdšʔ dʕʔl lbyth dmryʔ kspʔ dyhb gbrʔ lpwrqnʔ/pwrqnʔ#3#/ dnpšh kl kspʔ dmtrʕʔ gbrʔ blbh dnʕl lbyth dmryʔ
12:06	nsbwn lhwn khnʔ gbrʔ mn mn dmtrʕʔ whnwn nhwwn mpqyn ʕl bdqʔ dbytʔ ʔykʔ dmštkḥ bh bdqʔ
12:07	wbšnt ʕsryn wtlt šnyn lmlkʔ ywʔš lʔ bdqw khnʔ bdqʔ dbytʔ
12:08	wqrʔ mlkʔ ywʔš lywydʕ khnʔ wlkhnʔ wʔmr lhwn mṭl mnʔ lʔ bdqyn ʔntwn bdqʔ dbytʔ hšʔ lʔ tsbwn kspʔ mn ʔylyn dyhbyn lkwn lbdqʔ dbytʔ hbwhy
12:09	wʔtṭpysw khnʔ dlʔ nsbwn kspʔ mn ʕmʔ wlʔ nbdqwn bdqʔ dbytʔ <dmryʔ#3#>
12:10	wnsb ywydʕ khnʔ ʔrwnʔ ḥd wnqb nqbʔ btrʕh wsmh ʕl gb mdbḥʔ mn ymynʔ ʔykʔ dʕʔl gbrʔ lbyth dmryʔ wrmyn tmn khnʔ nṭry trʕʔ klh kspʔ dʕʔl lbyth dmryʔ
12:11	wkd ḥzw dsgy lh kspʔ bʔrwnʔ slq sprʔ dmlkʔ wkhnʔ rbʔ wslqw wmnw wṣrw kspʔ dʔštkḥ bbyth dmryʔ
12:12	wyhbwhy lkspʔ/kspʔ#3#/ kd ṣryr lʕbdy ʕbdʔ dmšlṭyn bbyth dmryʔ wyhbwhy lngrʔ wlʔrgwblʔ dʕbdyn bbyth dmryʔ
12:13	wlʔrdklʔ wlpsly kʔpʔ lmzbn qysʔ wkʔpʔ psyltʔ lmbdq bdqʔ dbyth dmryʔ wlkwl mdm dnpq ʕl bytʔ lmšrrwth/lmšrwth#23#/
12:14	wlʔ ʔtʕbd bbyth dmryʔ lʔ lqnʔ dkspʔ wlʔ šḥlʔ wlʔ qṭrwqʔ wlʔ qrntʔ wlʔ kl mʔn ddhbʔ ʔw mʔnʔ dkspʔ mn kspʔ dʕʔl lbyth dmryʔ
12:15	ʔlʔ lʕbdy ʕbdʔ yhbwhy wbdqyn bh <bdqʔ#3#> byth/dbyth#3#/ dmryʔ
12:16	wlʔ ḥšbyn ʕm gbrʔ dyhbyn lhwn kspʔ dntlwn lʕbdy ʕbdʔ mṭl dbhymnwtʔ yhbyn kspʔ dbdqʔ
12:17	wkspʔ dqwrbnʔ wkspʔ dḥlp ḥṭhʔ lʔ ʕʔl lbyth dmryʔ ʔlʔ lkhnʔ hwʔ
12:18	hydyn slq ḥzʔyl mlkʔ dʔdwm wʔtktš ʕm gt wkbšh wsm ḥzʔyl ʔpwhy lmsq ʕl ʔwršlm
12:19	wnsb ywʔš mlkʔ dyhwdʔ <klhwn#3#> qwdšʔ dqdš ywšpṭ wywrm wʔḥzyʔ ʔbhwhy mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wqwdšwhy wklh dhbʔ dʔštkḥ byt gzʔ dbyth dmryʔ wbbyt mlkʔ wšdr lḥzʔyl mlkʔ dʔdwm wʔtʕly/wʔtkly#3#/ mn ʔwršlm
12:20	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy dywʔš wkl mdm dʕbd hʔ ktybyn bspr dbrymyn dmlkʔ dyhwdʔ
12:21	wqmw ʕbdwhy dywʔš wmrdw mrdʔ wqṭlwhy lywʔš bbyt/byt#3#/ mlw \kd nḥt /dnḥt#3#/ lslʕ
12:22	ywzkr br šmʕyt wywzbr br šmyr ʕbdwhy mḥʔwhy wmyt wʔtqbr ʕm ʔbhwhy bqrytʔ ddwyd wʔmlk ʔmwṣyʔ brh btrh
13:01	bšnt ʕsryn wtlt šnyn lywʔš br ʔḥzyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ ʔmlk yhwʔḥz br yhw ʕl ʔysryl bšmryn šbʕsrʔ šnyn
13:02	wʕbd dbyš qdm mryʔ whlk <btr#3#> bḥṭhwy/ḥṭhwy#3#/ dywrbʕm br nbṭ dʔḥṭy lʔysryl wlʔ sṭʔ mnhwn
13:03	wʔtḥmt rwgzh dmryʔ ʕl ʔysrʔyl wʔšlm ʔnwn bʔydʔ dḥzʔyl mlkʔ dʔdwm wbʔydʔ dbrhdd br ḥzʔyl klhwn ywmtʔ
13:04	wṣly yhwʔḥz qdm mryʔ wšmʕh mryʔ mṭl dḥzʔ ʔwlṣnh dʔysryl dʔlṣ ʔnwn mlkʔ dʔdwm
13:05	wyhb mryʔ prwqʔ lʔysryl wnpqw mn tḥyt ʔydʔ dʔdwm wytbw bny ʔysryl bšlyʔ bmšknyhwn ʔyk dʔtmly wʔyk dmntmly
13:06	brm dyn lʔ ʕbrw mn ḥṭhwhy dywrbʕm br nbṭ dʔḥṭy lʔysrʔyl wbhwn hlkw wʔp dḥltʔ qymʔ hwt bšmryn
13:07	wlʔ ʔštbq hwʔ lh lyhwʔḥz ʕmʔ ʔlʔ ʔn ḥmšyn pršyn wʕsryn/wʕsr#3#/ mrkbn wʕsrʔ ʔlpyn rglyyn mṭl dʔwbd ʔnwn mlkʔ dʔdwm wʕbd ʔnwn ʔyk ʕprʔ lmdš
13:08	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy dyhwʔḥz wklmdm dʕbd wgnbrwth hʔ ktybyn bspr dbrymyn dmlkʔ dʔysryl
13:09	wškb yhwʔḥz ʕm ʔbhwhy wʔtqbr bšmryn wʔmlk yhwʔš brh btrh
13:10	bšnt tltyn wšbʕ šnyn lywʔš mlkʔ dyhwdʔ ʔmlk yhwʔš br yhwʔḥz br yhw ʕl ʔysryl bšmryn tltʕsrʔ/trtʕsrʔ#3#/ šnyn
13:11	wʕbd dbyš qdm mryʔ wlʔ sṭʔ mn kwlhwn ḥṭhwhy dywrbʕm br nbṭ dʔḥṭy lʔysryl ʔlʔ bhwn hlk
13:12	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy dyhwʔš wkl mdm dʕbd wgnbrwth/wklh gnbrwth#3#/ wdʔtktš ʕm ʔmwṣyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ hʔ ktybyn bspr dbrymyn dmlkʔ dʔysryl
13:13	wškb yhwʔš ʕm ʔbhwhy wywrbʕm brh ytb ʕl kwrsyh wʔtqbr yhwʔš bšmryn ʕm mlkʔ dʔysryl
13:14	wʔlyšʕ ʔtkrh kwrhnʔ dmʔt bh wnḥt lwth yhwʔš mlkʔ dʔysrʔyl wbkʔ ʕl ʔpwhy wʔmr ʔby ʔby mrkbth dʔysryl wpršwhy
13:15	wʔmr lh ʔlyšʕ sb qštʔ wgʔrʔ wnsb qštʔ wgʔrʔ
13:16	wʔmr lmlkʔ dʔysryl ʔrkb ʔydk ʕl qštʔ wʔrkb ʔydh wsm ʔlyšʕ ʔydwhy ʕl ʔydwhy dmlkʔ
13:17	wʔmr ptḥ kwtʔ lmdnḥʔ wptḥ wʔmr lh ʔlyšʕ šdy wšdʔ gʔrʔ wʔmr gʔrʔ dpwrqnʔ lmryʔ wgʔrʔ dpwrqnʔ bʔdwm wtmḥʔ lʔdwmyʔ bʔpq ʕdmʔ dtgmr ʔnwn
13:18	wʔmr lh sb gʔrʔ wnsb wʔmr <lh#3#> mḥy bʔrʕʔ wmḥʔ tlt zbnyn wqm
13:19	wrgz ʕlwhy nbyh dʔlhʔ wʔmr lmmḥʔ ḥmš ʔw št zbnyn whydyn tmḥʔ lʔdwmyʔ ʕdmʔ dtgmr ʔnwn mn hšʔ tlt zbnyn tmḥʔ lʔdwm
13:20	wmyt ʔlyšʕ wqbrwhy wgysʔ dmwʔb ʔtw ʕl ʔrʕʔ <hy#3#> bh bšntʔ hy
13:21	wkd hnwn qbryn gbrʔ ḥzw gysʔ wʔrmywhy lgbrʔ bqbrh dʔlyšʕ wʔzl gbrʔ qrb lgrmwhy dʔlyšʕ wḥyʔ wqm ʕl rglwhy
13:22	wḥzʔyl mlkʔ dʔdwm ʔlṣ lʔysryl klhwn ywmwhy dyhwʔḥz
13:23	wḥn ʔnwn mryʔ wrḥm ʕlyhwn wʔtpny ʕlyhwn mṭl qymh dʕm ʔbrhm wʕm ʔysḥq wʕm yʕqwb wlʔ ṣbʔ mryʔ dnḥbl ʔnwn wlʔ šdʔ ʔnwn mn qdmwhy ʕdmʔ lhydyn
13:24	wmyt ḥzʔyl mlkʔ dʔdwm wʔmlk brhdd brh btrh
13:25	whpk yhwʔš br yhwʔḥz wnsb qwryʔ mn brhdd br ḥzʔyl dnsb mn yhwʔḥz ʔbwhy bqrbʔ tlt šnyn mḥyh yhwʔš wʔhpk ʔnyn qwryʔ/lqwryʔ#3#/ lʔysryl
14:01	bšnt trtyn lyhwʔš br yhwʔḥz mlkʔ dʔysryl ʔmlk ʔmwṣyʔ br ywʔš mlkʔ dyhwdʔ
14:02	br ʕsryn hwʔ wḥmš šnyn kd ʔmlk wʕsryn wtšʕ šnyn ʔmlk bʔwršlm wšmʔ dʔmh yhwʕdn mn ʔwršlm
14:03	wʕbd dšpyr qdm mryʔ brm lʔ ʔyk dwyd ʔbwhy ʔyk dʕbd ywʔš ʔbwhy ʕbd

14:06	wlbny qṭwlʔ lʔ qṭl ʔyk dktyb bsprʔ dnmwsh dmwšʔ dpqd mryʔ wʔmr lʔ nmwtwn ʔbhʔ ʕl ʔpy bnyʔ wbnyʔ lʔ nmwtwn ʕl ʔpy ʔbhyhwn ʔlʔ ʔnš bḥṭhwhy nmwt
14:07	whw ḥrb lʔdwm bgmlḥ ʕsryn ʔlpyn wḥrbh lslʕ bqrbʔ wqrʔ šmh nqtʔyl ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
14:08	hydyn šdr ʔmwṣyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ ʔyzgdʔ lwt yhwʔš br yhwḥz br yhw mlkʔ dʔysryl wʔmr tʔ nqbl ʔpʔ ḥd dḥd
14:09	wšlḥ yhwʔš mlkʔ dʔysryl lʔmwṣyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wʔmr ḥwḥʔ dblbnn šlḥ lʔrzʔ dblbnn hb brtk lbry ʔnttʔ wʕbrt ḥywtʔ dblbnn wdšth lḥwḥʔ
14:10	mḥrb ḥrbt lʔdwm wʔrymk lbk ʔtyqr wtb bbytk lʔ ttgrʔ lbyštʔ wtpl ʔnt wyhwdʔ ʕmk
14:11	wlʔ šmʕh ʔmwṣyʔ wslq yhwʔš mlkʔ dʔysryl wʔmwṣyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wʔqblw ʔpʔ dḥddʔ bbyt šmš/byt šmš#23#/ dyhwdʔ hw wʔmwṣyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ
14:12	wʔttbr yhwdʔ mn qdm ʔysryl wʕrqw ʔnš lmšknh
14:13	wlʔmwṣyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ ʔḥdh yhwʔš mlkʔ dʔysryl bbyt šmš wʕl lʔwršlm wtrʕ bšwrʔ dʔwršlm mn trʕʔ dʔprym ʕdmʔ ltrʕʔ dzwytʔ ʔrbʕmʔʔ ʔmyn
14:14	wnsb klh dhbʔ wkspʔ wklhwn mʔnʔ dʔštkḥw/dʔštḥrw#3#/ bbyth dmryʔ wbbyt/wbyt#3#/ gzʔ dmlkʔ wbny ʕrwbʔ whpk lšmryn
14:15	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy dyhwʔš wkl mdm dʕbd wgnbrwth wdʔtktš ʕm ʔmwṣyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ hʔ ktybyn bspr dbrymyn dmlkʔ dʔysryl
14:16	wškb yhwʔš ʕm ʔbhwhy wʔtqbr bšmryn ʕm/ʕl#3#/ mlkʔ dʔysryl wʔmlk ywrbʕm brh btrh
14:17	wḥyʔ ʔmwṣyʔ br ywʔš mlkʔ dyhwdʔ mn btr dmyt yhwʔš br yhwʔḥz mlkʔ dʔysryl ḥmšʕsrʔ šnyn
14:18	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy dʔmwṣyʔ hʔ ktybyn bspr dbrymyn dmlkʔ dyhwdʔ

14:21	wdbrw klh ʕmʔ dyhwdʔ lʕwzyʔ whw br šttʕsrʔ hwʔ šnyn wʔmlkwhy ḥlp ʔmwṣyʔ ʔbwhy
14:22	whw bnʔ lʔylt wʔwtbh lyhwdʔ mn btr dškb mlkʔ ʕm ʔbhwhy
14:23	bšnt ḥmšʕsrʔ lʔmwṣyʔ br ywʔš mlkʔ dyhwdʔ ʔmlk ywrbʕm br yhwʔš br yhwʔḥz mlkʔ dʔysryl bšmryn ʔrbʕyn wḥdʔ šnyn
14:24	wʕbd dbyš qdm mryʔ wlʔ sṭʔ mn klhwn ḥṭhwhy dywrbʕm br nbṭ dʔḥṭy lʔysryl wbhwn hlk
14:25	whw ʔhpk tḥwmʔ lʔysryl mn mʕlnʔ dḥmt wʕdmʔ lymʔ dʕrbʔ ʔyk ptgmh dmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl dmll bʔydʔ dʕbdh ywnn br mty nbyʔ dmn gdḥpr
14:26	mṭl dḥzʔ mryʔ šwʕbdh dʔysryl dmryr ṭb wlyt dʔsr wlʔ dšrʔ wʔplʔ dmʕdr lʔysryl
14:27	wlʔ ʔmr mryʔ lmʕṭʔ šmh dʔysryl mn tḥyt šmyʔ wprq ʔnwn bʔydh dywrbʕm br yhwʔš br yhwʔḥz <mlkʔ dʔysrʔyl#3#>
14:28	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy dywrbʕm wkl mdm dʕbd wgnbrwth wdʔtktš wʔhpk drmswq wḥmt lʔysryl hʔ ktybyn bspr dbrymyn dmlkʔ dʔysryl
14:29	wškb ywrbʕm ʕm ʔbhwhy wʔtqbr ʕm ʔbhwhy ʕm mlkʔ dʔysryl wʔmlk zkryʔ brh btrh
15:01	bšnt ʕsryn wšbʕ šnyn lywrbʕm mlkʔ dʔysryl ʔmlk ʕwzyʔ br ʔmwṣyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ
15:02	br šttʕsrʔ hwʔ šnyn kd ʔmlk wḥmšyn wtrtyn šnyn ʔmlk bʔwršlm wšmʔ dʔmh yknyʔ mn ʔwršlm
15:03	wʕbd dšpyr qdm mryʔ ʔyk ʔmwṣyʔ ʔbwhy
15:04	brm dyn ʕlwtʔ lʔ ʔʕbr wʕdkyl ʕmʔ mdbḥyn hww wsymyn bsmʔ ʕl ʕlwtʔ
15:05	wmḥyhy mryʔ lmlkʔ whwʔ grbʔ ʕdmʔ lywmʔ dmyt wytb bbytʔ mṭšyʔyt wywtm br mlkʔ rbytʔ dʔn hwʔ lʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ
15:06	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy dʕwzyʔ wklmdm dʕbd hʔ ktybyn bspr dbrymyn dmlkʔ dyhwdʔ
15:07	wškb ʕwzyʔ ʕm ʔbhwhy wqbrwhy ʕm ʔbhwhy bqrytʔ ddwyd wʔmlk ywtm brh btrh
15:08	bšnt tltyn wtmnʔ šnyn lʕwzyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ ʔmlk zkryʔ br ywrbʕm ʕl ʔysryl bšmryn štʔ yrḥyn
15:09	wʕbd dbyš qdm mryʔ ʔyk dʕbd ʔbwhy wlʔ sṭʔ mn klhwn ḥṭhwhy dywrbʕm br nbṭ dʔḥṭy lʔysryl
15:10	wmrd ʕlwhy šlwm br ybyš wmḥyhy lwqbl ʕmʔ wqṭlh wʔmlk btrh
15:11	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy dzkryʔ hʔ ktybyn bspr dbrymyn dmlkʔ dʔysryl
15:12	wšlmt mlth dmryʔ dʔmr lyhw dbnyʔ ʔrbyʕyʔ ntbwn lk ʕl kwrsyʔ dʔysryl whwʔ hknʔ
15:13	wšlwm br ybyš ʔmlk bšnt tltyn wtšʕ šnyn lʕwzyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wʔmlk yrḥ ywmyn bšmryn
15:14	wslq mḥnym br gdy mn trṣʔ wʕl lšmryn wmḥyhy lšlwm br ybyš bšmryn wqṭlh wʔmlk btrh
15:15	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy dšlwm wmrdʔ dmrd hʔ ktybyn bspr dbrymyn dmlkʔ dʔysryl
15:16	hydyn mḥʔ mḥnym ltpsḥ wlkl dʔyt bh wltḥwmyh mn trṣʔ ʕl dlʔ ptḥw lh trʕʔ wḥrbh wlklhyn bṭnth prt
15:17	bšnt tltyn wtšʕ šnyn lʕwzyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ ʔmlk mḥnym br gdy ʕl ʔysryl bšmryn ʕsr šnyn
15:18	wʕbd dbyš qdm mryʔ wlʔ sṭʔ mn <klhwn#3#> ḥṭhwhy dywrbʕm br nbṭ dʔḥṭy lʔysryl kwlhwn/bkwlhwn#3#/ ywmwhy
15:19	wʔtʔ pwl mlkʔ dʔtwr ʕl ʔrʕʔ wyhb mḥnym lpwl ʔlp kkryn dkspʔ dthwʔ ʔydh ʕmh wnʔḥwd mlkwtʔ bʔydh
15:20	wʔrmy mḥnym ʕl ʔysryl kspʔ ʕl klhwn ʕtyrʔ dʔrʕʔ dntl lmlkʔ dʔtwr ḥmšyn mtqlyn dkspʔ ʕl gbrʔ ḥd whpk/whlk#3#/ mlkʔ dʔtwr wlʔ qm tmn bʔrʕʔ
15:21	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy dmḥnym wkl mdm dʕbd hʔ ktybyn bspr dbrymyn dmlkʔ dʔysryl
15:22	wškb mḥnym ʕm ʔbhwhy wʔmlk pqḥyʔ brh btrh
15:23	bšnt ḥmšyn šnyn lʕwzyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ ʔmlk pqḥyʔ br mḥnym ʕl ʔysrʔyl bšmryn trtyn šnyn
15:24	wʕbd dbyš qdm mryʔ wlʔ sṭʔ mn ḥṭhwhy dywrbʕm br nbṭ dʔḥṭy lʔysryl
15:25	wmrd ʕlwhy pqḥ br rwmlyʔ gnbrh wqṭlh bšmryn bsḥrtʔ dbyt mlkʔ wdbr lrgʔwb wlʔny wʕmh ḥmšyn gbryn mn bny glʕd wqṭlh wʔmlk btrh
15:26	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy dpqḥyʔ wklmdm dʕbd hʔ ktybyn bspr dbrymyn dmlkʔ dʔysryl
15:27	bšnt ḥmšyn wtrtyn šnyn lʕwzyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ ʔmlk pqḥ br rwmlyʔ ʕl ʔysryl bšmryn ʕsryn šnyn
15:28	wʕbd dbyš qdm mryʔ wlʔ sṭʔ mn ḥṭhwhy dywrbʕm br nbṭ dʔḥṭy lʔysryl
15:29	wbywmwhy dpqḥ mlkʔ dʔysryl ʔtʔ tgltplsr mlkʔ dʔtwr wdbr lʕywn wlʔbl mḥwlʔ wlkl byt mʕkʔ wlnyḥ wlqdš wlḥṣwr wlglʕd wlglylʔ wlklh ʔrʕʔ dnptly wgly ʔnwn lʔtwr
15:30	wmrd mrdʔ hwšʕ br ʔlʔ ʕl pqḥ br rwmlyʔ wmḥyhy wqṭlh wʔmlk btrh bšnt trtyn lywtm/dywtm#2#/ br ʕwzyʔ
15:31	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy dpqḥ wklmdm dʕbd hʔ ktybyn bspr dbrymyn dmlkʔ dʔysryl
15:32	bšnt trtyn dpqḥ br rwmlyʔ mlkʔ dʔysryl ʔmlk ywtm br ʕwzyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ
15:33	br ʕsryn hwʔ wḥmš šnyn kd ʔmlk wšttʕsrʔ šnyn ʔmlk bʔwršlm wšmʔ dʔmh yrwšʔ brt ṣdwq
15:34	wʕbd dšpyr qdm mryʔ ʔyk dʕbd ʕwzyʔ ʔbwhy
15:35	brm ʕlwtʔ lʔ ʔʕbr wʕdkyl ʕmʔ mdbḥyn hww wsymyn hww bsmʔ ʕl ʕlwtʔ whw bnʔ trʕʔ ʕlyʔ dbyth dmryʔ
15:36	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy dywtm wkl mdm dʕbd hʔ ktybyn bspr dbrymyn dmlkʔ dyhwdʔ
15:37	bywmtʔ hnwn šry mryʔ lmgryw byhwdʔ lrṣn mlkʔ dʔrm/dʔdwm#3#/ wlpqḥ br rwmlyʔ mlkʔ dʔysryl
15:38	wškb ywtm ʕm ʔbhwhy wʔtqbr ʕm ʔbhwhy bqrytʔ ddwyd wʔmlk ʔḥz brh btrh
16:01	bšnt tmnʕsrʔ šnyn lpqḥ br rwmlyʔ mlkʔ dʔysryl ʔmlk ʔḥz br ywtm mlkʔ dyhwdʔ
16:02	br ʕsryn hwʔ šnyn ʔḥz kd ʔmlk wšttʕsrʔ šnyn ʔmlk bʔwršlm wlʔ ʕbd dšpyr qdm mryʔ ʔlhh ʔyk dwyd ʔbwhy
16:03	whlk bʔwrḥʔ dmlkʔ dʔysryl ʔp brh ʔʕbr bnwrʔ ʔyk nmwsʔ dʕmmʔ dʔwbd mryʔ mn qdm bny ʔysryl
16:04	wdbḥ wʔʕṭr ʕl ʕlwtʔ wʕl rmtʔ wtḥyt kl ʔyln dʕbyṭ
16:05	hydyn slq rṣn mlkʔ dʔrm/dʔdwm#3#/ wpqḥ br rwmlyʔ mlkʔ dʔysryl lʔwršlm lmtktšw ʕmh wlʔ ʔškḥw dntktšwn ʕlyh
16:06	bzbnʔ hw ʔhpk rṣn mlkʔ dʔrm lʔylt lʔrm wʔpq lyhwdʔ mn ʔylt wʔrmyʔ ʔtw lʔylt wytbw tmn ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
16:07	wšdr ʔḥz ʔyzgdʔ lwt tgltplsr mlkʔ dʔtwr wʔmr <lh#3#> ʕbdk ʔnʔ wbrk sq wprwqyny mn ʔydwhy dmlkʔ dʔrm wmn ʔydwhy dmlkʔ dʔysryl dqymyn ʕly
16:08	wnsb ʔḥz kspʔ wdhbʔ dʔštkḥ bbyth dmryʔ wbbyt gzʔ dmlkʔ wšdr lmlkʔ dʔtwr qwrbnʔ
16:09	wšmʕh mlkʔ dʔtwr wslq mlkʔ dʔtwr ʕl drmswq wʔḥdh wglyh lqyr wlrṣn qṭl
16:10	wʔzl mlkʔ ʔḥz lʔwrʕh dtgltplsr mlkʔ dʔtwr ldrmswq wḥzʔ mdbḥʔ dbdrmswq wšdr mlkʔ ʔḥz lʔwryʔ khnʔ dmwth dmdbḥʔ wbnynh wklh ʕbdh
16:11	wʕbd ʔwryʔ khnʔ mdbḥʔ ʔyk dšdr mlkʔ ʔḥz mn drmswq hknʔ ʕbd ʔwryʔ khnʔ ʕdlʔ nʔtʔ ʔḥz mlkʔ mn drmswq
16:12	wʔtʔ mlkʔ mn drmswq wḥzʔ ʔḥz mlkʔ mdbḥʔ wqrb mlkʔ lwt mdbḥʔ wslq lʕl mnh
16:13	wʔsq ʕlwhy ʕlwtʔ wqwrbnʔ wnqy nwqyʔ wrs dmʔ dšlmʔ dylh ʕl mdbḥʔ
16:14	wmdbḥʔ dnḥšʔ dqdm/qdm#3#/ mryʔ qrbh mn qdm ʔpy byth mn byt mdbḥʔ wmn byt mryʔ wsmh ʕl gb mdbḥʔ mn grbyʔ
16:15	wpqd mlkʔ ʔḥz lʔwryʔ khnʔ wʔmr lh ʕl mdbḥʔ rbʔ ʔsq ʕltʔ dṣprʔ wqwrbnʔ drmšʔ wʕltʔ dmlkʔ wqwrbnh wʕltʔ dklh ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ wqwrbnyhwn wnwqyhwn wklh dmʔ dʕltʔ wkl dmʔ ddbḥʔ ʕlwhy rws wmdbḥʔ dnḥšʔ nhwʔ ly lšwʔlʔ
16:16	wʕbd ʔwryʔ khnʔ ʔyk \dpqdh mlkʔ /pwqdnh dmlkʔ#3#/ ʔḥz
16:17	wpsq mlkʔ ʔḥz gdnpʔ dmtqnʔ wʔprq mnhwn lqnʔ wymʔ \ʔḥt mn /mn tḥyt#3#/ twrʔ dnḥšʔ wsmh ʕl rṣpʔ dkʔpʔ
16:18	wbyt šbtʔ dbnʔ bbyth dmryʔ wmʕlnʔ dtrʕʔ bryʔ ʔkrk lbyth dmryʔ mn qdm mlkʔ dʔtwr
16:19	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy dʔḥz wkl mdm dʕbd hʔ ktybyn bspr dbrymyn dmlkʔ dyhwdʔ
16:20	wškb ʔḥz ʕm ʔbhwhy wʔtqbr ʕm ʔbhwhy bqrytʔ ddwyd wʔmlk ḥzqyʔ brh btrh
17:01	bšnt trtʕsrʔ <šnyn#3#> lʔḥz mlkʔ dyhwdʔ ʔmlk hwšʕ br ʔlʔ ʕl ʔysryl bšmryn tšʕ šnyn
17:02	wʕbd dbyš qdm mryʔ brm lʔ ʔyk mlkʔ dʔysryl dhww qdmwhy
17:03	ʕlwhy slq šlmnʕsr mlkʔ dʔtwr whwʔ lh hwšʕ ʕbdʔ wʔyty lh qwrbnʔ
17:04	wʔškḥ mlkʔ dʔtwr bhwšʕ mrdʔ wšdr ʔyzgdʔ lwt sʔw mlkʔ dmṣryn wlʔ ʔsq qwrbnʔ lmlkʔ dʔtwr ʔyk dbkl šnʔ wklyhy mlkʔ dʔtwr wʔsrh byt ʔsyrʔ
17:05	wslq mlkʔ dʔtwr ʕl klh ʔrʕʔ wslq lšmryn/ʕl šmryn#3#/ wšrʔ ʕlyh tlt šnyn
17:06	wbšntʔ tšyʕytʔ lhwšʕ kbš mlkʔ dʔtwr lšmryn wgly lbny ʔysryl lʔtwr wʔwtb ʔnwn bḥlḥ wbḥbr nhr gwzn qwryʔ dmdy
17:07	whwʔ dkd ḥṭw bny ʔysryl lmryʔ ʔlhhwn dʔpq ʔnwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn mn tḥyt ʔydʔ dprʕwn mlkʔ dmṣryn wdḥlw lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ
17:08	whlkw bnmwsʔ dʕmmʔ dʔwbd mryʔ mn qdm bny ʔysryl
17:09	wʔmrw bny ʔysryl mlʔ dlʔ špyrn ʕl mryʔ ʔlhhwn hnwn wmlkyhwn wbnw lhwn ʕlwtʔ bkl qwryhwn mn mgdl nṭwrʔ wʕdmʔ lqrytʔ ʕšyntʔ
17:10	wʔqymw lhwn qymtʔ wdḥltʔ ʕl kl rmtʔ drmʔ wtḥyt kwl ʔyln dʕbyṭ
17:11	wsmw tmn bsmʔ ʕl ʕlwtʔ ʔyk ʕmmʔ dʔwbd/dgly#3#/ mryʔ mn qdmyhwn wʕbdw ptgmʔ dbyšyn lmrgzw qdm mryʔ
17:12	wplḥw ldḥltʔ/dḥltʔ#3#/ dʔmr/wʔmr#3#/ lhwn mryʔ lʔ tʕbdwn ptgmʔ hnʔ
17:13	wʔshd mryʔ bʔysryl wbyhwdʔ bʔydʔ dklhwn ʕbdwhy nbyʔ wkl ḥzyʔ wʔmr twbw mn ʔwrḥtkwn byštʔ wṭrw pwqdny wqymy ʔyk nmwsʔ dpqdt lʔbhykwn wʔyk dšlḥt lhwn bʔydʔ dʕbdy nbyʔ
17:14	wlʔ šmʕw wqšyw qdlhwn mn/ʔyk#3#/ qdlʔ dʔbhyhwn wlʔ hymnw bmryʔ ʔlhhwn
17:15	wʔslyw qymy wpwqdny dpqdt lʔbhyhwn wshdwtʔ dʔshdt bhwn wʔzlw btr lʔ mdm wmdm lʔ ʔytrw ʔlʔ ʔzlw btr ʕmmʔ dpqd ʔnwn mryʔ dlʔ/lʔ#3#/ tʕbdwn ʔkwthwn
17:16	wšbqw klhwn pwqdnwhy dmryʔ ʔlhhwn wʕbdw lhwn nsykʔ tryn ʕglʔ wʕbdw \dbḥʔ ldḥltʔ /dbḥtʔ wdḥltʔ#3#/ wsgdw \lkl ḥylʔ /lḥylʔ#3#/ dšmyʔ wplḥw lbʕlʔ
17:17	wʔʕbrw bnyhwn wbnthwn bnwrʔ wqṣmw qṣmʔ wnḥšw wʔtḥšbw lmʕbd kl dbyš qdm mryʔ lmrgzwth
17:18	wrgz mryʔ ṭb ʕl ʔysryl wʔʕbr ʔnwn mn qdmwhy wlʔ ʔštḥr ʔlʔ ʔn šbṭʔ dyhwdʔ blḥwd
17:19	wʔp bny yhwdʔ lʔ nṭrw pwqdnwhy dmryʔ ʔlhhwn whlkw bnmwsh dʔysryl dʕbdw dbyš qdm mryʔ wʔrgzwhy klhwn ywmtʔ
17:20	wʔsly mryʔ lklh zrʕh dʔysryl wṣʕr ʔnwn wʔšlm ʔnwn bʔydʔ dbzwzʔ ʕdmʔ dšdʔ ʔnwn mn qdm ʔpwhy
17:21	mṭl dprqw \dbyt ʔysryl /lʔysrʔyl#3#/ mn btr/byt#3#/ dwyd wʔmlkw ʕlyhwn lywrbʕm/ywrbʕm#3#/ br nbṭ wʔṭʕy ywrbʕm lʔysryl mn btr mryʔ wʔḥṭy ʔnwn ḥṭhʔ rwrbʔ
17:22	whlkw bny ʔysryl bklhwn ḥṭhwhy dywrbʕm dʕbd wlʔ sṭw mnhwn
17:23	ʕdmʔ dʔʕbr mryʔ lʔysryl mn qdmwhy ʔyk dʔmr mryʔ bʔydʔ dklhwn nbyʔ wgly \ʔnwn lbny ʔysryl /lʔysrʔyl#3#/ mn ʔrʕhwn lʔtwr ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
17:24	wʔyty mlkʔ dʔtwr mn bbl wmn kwt wmn ʕwʔ wmn ḥmt wmn sprwym wʔwtb ʔnwn bqwrrʔ dšmryn ḥlp bny ʔysryl wʔyrtw lšmryn wytbw bqwryh
17:25	wmn ršytʔ kd ytbw tmn lʔ dḥlw lmryʔ wšdr mryʔ ʕlyhwn ʔrywtʔ/lʔrywtʔ#3#/ whww mqṭlyn bhwn
17:26	wḥwyw lmlkʔ dʔtwr wʔmrw lh ʕmmʔ dglyt wʔwtbt bqwrrʔ dšmryn lʔ ydʕyn dynʔ dʔlhh dʔrʕʔ wšdr ʕlyhwn ʔrywtʔ whʔ/whww#3#/ mqṭlyn bhwn mṭl dlʔ ydʕyn dynʔ dʔlhh dʔrʕʔ
17:27	wpqd mlkʔ dʔtwr wʔmr ʔwblw ltmn ḥd/lḥd#3#/ mn khnʔ dglytwn mn tmn wnʔzl wntb tmn wnlp ʔnwn dynʔ dʔlhh dʔrʕʔ
17:28	wʔtʔ ḥd mn khnʔ dgly mn šmryn wytb bbyt ʔyl whwʔ mlp lhwn ʔyknʔ ndḥlwn/dndḥlwn#2#/ lmryʔ
17:29	whww plḥyn ʕm ʕm ʔlhh wšbqw btʔ dʕlwtʔ dʕbdw bšmryn ʕm ʕm bqwryhwn/qwryhwn#3#/ kr/kd#3#/ dhnwn/hnwn#3#/ ytbyn <hww#3#>
17:30	wʔnšy bbl plḥyn lskwt bnwt wʔnšy kwt plḥyn lnrgl wʔnšy ḥmt plḥyn lʔšymʔ
17:31	wʕwyʔ plḥyn lybzḥ wltrtq wsprwyʔ mwqdyn bnyhwn bnwrʔ lʔrdmlk wlʕmlyq ʔlhʔ dsprwym
17:32	whww dḥlyn lmryʔ wʕbdw lhwn mnhwn kwmrʔ dʕlwtʔ whww plḥyn lhwn bbyt ʕlwtʔ
17:33	lmryʔ dḥlyn hww wlʔlhyhwn plḥyn hww ʔyk nmwsʔ dʕmmʔ \wglyw bny ʔysryl mn ʔrʕhwn /dglyw ʔnwn mn tmn#3#/
17:34	ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ ʕl dšbqw lmryʔ wʕbdyn ʔyk \nmwsʔ dʕmmʔ /nmwsyhwn qdmyʔ#3# /ṭnpwtʔ dʕmmʔ#3#/ wlʔ dḥlyn lmryʔ wlʔ ʕbdyn ʔyk qymʔ wʔyk dynʔ wʔyk nmwsʔ wʔyk pwqdnʔ dpqd mryʔ lbny yʕqwb dšmy šmh ʔysrʔyl
17:35	wʔqym mryʔ qymʔ ʕmhwn wpqd ʔnwn wʔmr <lhwn#3#> lʔ tdḥlwn lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ wlʔ tsgdwn lhwn wlʔ tplḥwn ʔnwn wlʔ tdbḥwn lhwn
17:36	ʔlʔ plwḥw lmryʔ dʔsqkwn/dʔpqkwn#3#/ mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn bḥylʔ rbʔ wbdrʕʔ rmʔ lh plwḥw wlh sgwdw wlh dbḥw
17:37	wqymʔ wdynʔ wnmwsʔ wpwqdnʔ dktb lkwn ṭrw wʕbdw klhwn ywmtʔ lʔ tdḥlwn lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ
17:38	wqymʔ dʔqymt ʕmkwn lʔ tṭʕwn wlʔ tdḥlwn lʔlhʔ dʕmmʔ
17:39	ʔlʔ lmryʔ ʔlhkwn dḥlw whw mpṣʔ lkwn mn ʔydʔ dklhwn bʕldbbykwn
17:40	wlʔ šmʕw ʔlʔ ʔyk nmwshwn qdmyʔ ʕbdyn hww
17:41	whww ʔp ʕmmʔ hlyn dytbw bšmryn dḥlyn lmryʔ wlglypyhwn plḥyn hww ʔp bnyhwn ʔp bny bnyhwn wʔyk dʕbdw ʔbhyhwn ʕbdyn hww ʔp hnwn ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
18:01	bšnt tlt lhwšʕ br ʔlʔ mlkʔ dʔysryl ʔmlk ḥzqyʔ br ʔḥz mlkʔ dyhwdʔ
18:02	br ʕsryn hwʔ wḥmš šnyn kd ʔmlk wʕsryn wtšʕ šnyn ʔmlk bʔwršlm wšmʔ dʔmh ʔky brt zkryʔ
18:03	wʕbd dšpyr qdm mryʔ ʔyk dʕbd dwyd ʔbwhy
18:04	whw ʔʕbr ʕlwtʔ wtbr qymtʔ wpsq dḥltʔ wpsq ḥwyʔ dnḥšʔ dʕbd mwšʔ mṭl dṭʕw bny ʔysryl btrh wsymyn hww lh bsmʔ ʕdmʔ/dʕdmʔ#3#/ lywmtʔ hnwn wqrʔwhy nḥštn
18:05	wbmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl sbr wbtrh lʔ hwʔ ʔkwth bklhwn mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wʔp lʔ bdhww qdmwhy
18:06	wʔtdbq bmryʔ wlʔ sṭʔ mn btrh wnṭr pwqdnwhy ʔyk dpqd mryʔ lmwšʔ
18:07	whwʔ mryʔ ʕmh wlʔykʔ dʔzl/dnpq#3#/ hwʔ zkʔ hwʔ wmrd ʕl mlkʔ dʔtwr wlʔ plḥh
18:08	whw mḥʔ lplštyʔ ʕdmʔ lʕʔzʔ wltḥwmyh mn mgdl nṭwrʔ wʕdmʔ lqrytʔ ʕšyntʔ
18:09	wbšntʔ rbyʕytʔ lmlkʔ ḥzqyʔ hy hy šntʔ šbyʕytʔ lhwšʕ br ʔlʔ mlkʔ dʔysryl slq šlmnʕsr mlkʔ dʔtwr ʕl šmryn wšrʔ ʕlyh
18:10	wkbšh mn btr tlt šnyn bšnt št lḥzqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ hy hy šnt tšʕ lhwšʕ <br ʔlʔ#3#> mlkʔ dʔysryl ʔtkbšt šmryn
18:11	wgly mlkʔ dʔtwr lʔysryl/lbny ysryl#3#/ lʔtwr wʔšry ʔnwn bḥlḥ wbḥbr nhr gwzn qwryʔ dmdy
18:12	ʕl dlʔ šmʕw bqlh dmryʔ ʔlhhwn wʕbrw ʕl qymh wkwl dpqd ʔnwn mwšʔ ʕbdh dmryʔ lʔ šmʕw wlʔ ʕbdw
18:13	wbšnt ʔrbʕsrʔ <šnyn#3#> lmlkʔ ḥzqyʔ slq snḥryb mlkʔ dʔtwr ʕl klhyn qwryʔ dyhwdʔ ʕšyntʔ wʔḥd ʔnyn
18:14	wšlḥ ḥzqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ lmlkʔ dʔtwr llkyš wʔmr lh ḥṭyt hpwk mny wmdm drmʔ ʔnt ʕly šql ʔnʔ wʔrmy mlkʔ dʔtwr ʕl ḥzqyʔ <mlkʔ dyhwdʔ#3#> tltmʔʔ kkryn dkspʔ wtltyn kkryn ddhbʔ/dhbʔ#3#/

21:09	wlʔ šmʕw wʔṭʕy ʔnwn mnšʔ wʕbd dbyš mn ʕmmʔ dʔwbd mryʔ mn qdm bny ʔysryl

21:11	ʕl dʕbd mnšʔ br ḥzqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ ʕbdʔ hlyn wʔbʔš mn kl dʕbdw ʔmwryʔ dqdmwhy wʔḥṭy lyhwdʔ bptkrwhy/bptgmwhy#3#/
21:12	mṭlhnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl hʔ mytʔ ʔnʔ byštʔ ʕl yhwdʔ wʕl ʔwršlm dkl dnšmʕyh nṣln trtyhyn ʔdnwhy
21:13	wʔrmʔ ʕl ʔwršlm ḥwṭʔ dšmryn wmtqwltʔ dbyt ʔḥb wʔmḥyh lʔwršlm wʔwbdyh mṭl klh ṭnpwtʔ/byštʔ#3#/ dʕbd mnšʔ byhwdʔ
21:14	wʔšbwq šrkʔ dyrtwty wʔšlm ʔnwn bʔydʔ dbʕldbbyhwn wnhwwn lbztʔ wldyšʔ lkwlhwn bʕldbbyhwn
21:15	ʕl dʕbdw byštʔ qdmy whww mrgzyn ly mn ywmʔ dnpqw ʔbhyhwn mn mṣryn/ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn#3#/ wʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
21:16	wʔp dmʔ zkyʔ ʔšd mnšʔ swgʔʔ dṭb ʕdmʔ dmlh lʔwršlm spʔ bspʔ sṭr mn ḥṭhwhy dʔḥṭy lyhwdʔ wʕbd dbyš qdm mryʔ
21:17	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy dmnšʔ wkl mdm dʕbd wḥṭhʔ dḥṭʔ hʔ ktybyn bspr dbrymyn dmlkʔ dyhwdʔ

22:02	wʕbd dšpyr qdm mryʔ whlk bklh ʔwrḥʔ \dhlk dwyd /ddwyd#3#/ ʔbwhy wlʔ sṭʔ lymynʔ/mn#3#/ wlsmlʔ

22:13	zlw šʔlw mn mryʔ ʕly wʕl klh ʕmʔ wʕl klh yhwdʔ ʕl ptgmʔ dsprʔ hnʔ dʔštkḥ mṭl drb hw rwgzh dmryʔ drgz ʕlyn ʕl dlʔ šmʕw ʔbhyn mlwhy dsprʔ hnʔ lmʕbd ʔyk dktyb bh/ʕlyn#3#/

22:17	ʕl dšbqwhy wsmw bsmʔ lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ wʔrgzwny bʕbd ʔydyhwn nsp rwgzy bʔtrʔ hnʔ ʔmr mryʔ wʔwbdkwn

22:19	ḥlp dʔtkrh lbk wʔttzyʕt mn qdm mryʔ kd šmʕt mdm dʔmrt ʕl ʔtrʔ hnʔ wʕl ʕmwrwhy dnhwʔ ltmhʔ wllwṭtʔ wṣryt lbwšyk wbkyt qdmy wʔp ʔnʔ šmʕt ʔmr mryʔ

23:01	wšdr mlkʔ wʔtknšw lwth klhwn sbʔ dyhwdʔ wdʔwršlm
23:02	wslq mlkʔ lbyth dmryʔ wklhwn dbyt yhwdʔ wklhwn ʕmwryh dʔwršlm ʕmh wkhnʔ wnbyʔ <ʕmh#3#> wklh ʕmʔ mn zʕwrʔ wʕdmʔ lrbʔ wqrʔ qdmyhwn klhwn ptgmʔ dsprʔ dqymʔ dʔštkḥ bbyth dmryʔ
23:03	wqm mlkʔ ʕl ʕmwdʔ wʔqym qymʔ qdm mryʔ lmhlkw btr mryʔ lmṭr pwqdnwhy wshdwth wqymwhy <wdynwhy#3#> bklh lbhwn wbklh npšhwn dnqymwn ptgmʔ dqymʔ hnʔ dktybyn bsprʔ/ʕl sprʔ#3#/ hnʔ wqmw/wʕlw#3#/ kwlh ʕmʔ bqymʔ
23:04	wpqd mlkʔ lḥlqyʔ khnʔ rbʔ wlkhnʔ dbtrh wlnṭry trʕʔ lmpqw mn byth dmryʔ mʔnʔ klhwn dʕbydyn lbʕlʔ wldḥltʔ wlklh ḥylʔ dšmyʔ wʔwqdw ʔnwn lbr mn ʔwršlm bšdmwʔyt qdrwn wšqlh lʕprhwn lbyt ʔyl
23:05	wqṭl kwmrʔ ʔylyn dʔqymw mlkʔ dyhwdʔ lmsm/wsmw#3#/ bsmʔ ʕl ʕlwtʔ bqwryʔ dyhwdʔ/ddwyd#3#/ wbḥdryh dʔwršlm wdsymyn hww bsmʔ lbʕlʔ wlšmšʔ wlshrʔ wlkwkbʔ/wlmwzltʔ#3#/ wlklh ḥylʔ dšmyʔ

23:13	wʕlwtʔ dqdm ʔwršlm <ʕqr#3#> dmn ymynʔ dṭwrʔ mḥblnʔ dbnʔ šlymwn mlkʔ dʔysryl lʕstrwt ʔlhtʔ dṣydnyʔ wlkmwš dḥltʔ dmwʔb wlmlkwm dḥltʔ dbny ʕmwn ʕqr mlkʔ ywšyʔ

23:15	wʔp lmdbḥʔ/mdbḥʔ#3#/ dbbyt ʔyl/dbyt ʔyl#3#/ wʕlwtʔ/wlʕlwtʔ#3#/ dʕbd ywrbʕm br nbṭ dʔḥṭy lʔysrʔyl wʔp lh lmdbḥʔ hw wlʕltʔ ʕqr wʔwqdh lʕltʔ wdqqw ʔyk ʕprʔ wʔwqd dḥltʔ
23:16	wʔtpny ywšyʔ wḥzʔ qbrʔ tmn bṭwrʔ wšdr wnsb grmʔ mn qbrʔ wʔwqd ʕl mdbḥʔ wṭmʔh ʔyk ptgmh dmryʔ dʔmr/dqrʔ#3#/ nbyh dʔlhʔ dqrʔ hwʔ ptgmʔ hlyn

23:21	wpqd mlkʔ lklh ʕmʔ wʔmr ʕbdw pṣḥʔ lmryʔ ʔlhkwn ʔyk dktyb bsprʔ dqymʔ hnʔ

23:30	wšqlwhy ʕbdwhy kd myt mn mgdw wʔwblwhy lʔwršlm wqbrwhy tmn bqbrh wdbrw ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ lyhwʔḥz br ywšyʔ wmšḥwhy wʔmlkwhy ḥlp ʔbwhy
23:31	br ʕsryn hwʔ wtlt šnyn yhwʔḥz kd ʔmlk wtltʔ yrḥyn ʔmlk bʔwršlm wšmh dʔmh ḥmṭwl brt ʔrmyʔ mn lbnʔ

23:35	wkspʔ wdhbʔ yhb ywyqym lprʕwn brm kspʔ wdhbʔ ʔrmy ʕl ʔrʕʔ ʕl mlt pwmh dprʕwn ʔnš ʔyk zdqh mqrb hwʔ kspʔ wdhbʔ mn ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ ʕl mlt pwmh dprʕwn ḥgyrʔ
23:36	br ʕsryn hwʔ wḥmš šnyn ywyqym kd ʔmlk wḥdʕsrʔ šnyn ʔmlk bʔwršlm wšmʔ dʔmh zbydʔ brt pryʔ mn rmtʔ
23:37	wʕbd dbyš qdm mryʔ ʔyk \dʕbdw ʔbhwhy /dʕbd mnšʔ#3#/
24:01	bywmwhy slq nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl \ʕl ʔwršlm /lʔwršlm#3#/ whwʔ lh ywyqym ʕbdʔ tlt šnyn whpk wmrd ʕlwhy
24:02	wgry bh mryʔ gysʔ dkldyʔ wgysʔ dʔdwm wgysʔ dmwʔb wgysʔ dbny ʕmwn wgry ʔnwn byhwdʔ dnwbdwn ʔnwn ʔyk ptgmh dmryʔ dmll bʔydʔ dʕbdwhy nbyʔ
24:03	mn pwmh dmryʔ whwʔ rwgzʔ rbʔ ʕl yhwdʔ dnʕbr ʔnwn mn qdmwhy mṭl ḥṭhwhy dmnšʔ wkl mdm dʕbd
24:04	wdmʔ/wʔp dmʔ#3#/ʔp dmʔ#3#/ zkyʔ dʔšd wmlh lʔwršlm dmʔ zkyʔ wlʔ ṣbʔ mryʔ lmšbq

24:08	br tmnʕsrʔ hwʔ šnyn ywykyn kd ʔmlk wtltʔ yrḥyn ʔmlk bʔwršlm wšmʔ dʔmh nḥštʔ brt ʔlytn mn ʔwršlm
24:09	wʕbd dbyš qdm mryʔ ʔyk dʕbd ʔbwhy

24:11	wʔtʔ nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl ʕl ʔrʕʔ/qrytʔ#3#/ wʕbdwhy šryn \ʕl qrytʔ /ʕlyh#3#/
24:12	wnpq ywykyn mlkʔ dyhwdʔ lwt mlkʔ dbbl hw wʔmh wʕbdwhy \wrwrbnwhy /wʔp rwrbnwhy#3#/ wmhymnwhy wdbrh ʕmh mlkʔ dbbl bšnt tmnʔ dmlkwth
24:13	wʔpq mn tmn klh gzʔ dbyth/bhyklh#3#/ dmryʔ wgzʔ dbyt mlkʔ wpsq klhwn mʔnʔ ddhbʔ dʕbd šlymwn mlkʔ dʔysryl lbyth dmryʔ ʔyk dʔmr mryʔ
24:14	wgly lklh ʔwršlm wlklhwn/wklhwn#3#/ rwrbnʔ wlklhwn/wklhwn#3#/ gnbry ḥylʔ ʕsrʔ ʔlpyn bglwtʔ wklhwn dḥšʔ wklhwn rhṭʔ wlʔ šbq ʔlʔ ʔn msknʔ dʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ
24:15	wgly lywykyn lbbl wlʔmh dmlkʔ wlnšwhy dmlkʔ wlmhymnwhy wlrwrbnʔ dʔrʕʔ wʔwbl ʔnwn bglwtʔ mn ʔwršlm lbbl
24:16	wklhwn/wlklhwn#3#/ gbrʔ ḥyltnʔ šbʕʔ ʔlpyn wdḥšʔ wrhṭʔ ʔlp wklhwn gbrʔ ʕbdy qrbʔ ʔyty ʔnwn mlkʔ dbbl bglwtʔ lbbl
24:17	wʔmlk mlkʔ dbbl lmtnyʔ ddh ḥlpwhy wšmy šmh ṣdqyʔ
24:18	br ʕsryn hwʔ wḥdʔ šnyn ṣdqyʔ kd ʔmlk wḥdʕsrʔ šnyn ʔmlk bʔwršlm wšmʔ dʔmh ḥmṭwl brt ʔrmyʔ mn lbnʔ

16:02	wnhwʔ ʔyk prḥtʔ dmšnyʔ qnh wbnt mwʔb šbyqtʔ nhwyn bmʕbrtʔ/bmʕrtʔ#3#/ dʔrnwn/#3#/
16:03	ʔytʔ trʕytʔ wʕbdy/wʕqdy#3#/ twgnʔ symy ʔyk llyʔ ṭllky mṣʕt ṭhrʔ ṭšy ldṭʕyn wldmbdryn/wdmbdryn#3#/ lʔ tglyn
16:04	nʕmrwn bky mbdrʔ dmwʔb hwy lhwn strʔ mn qdm bzwzʔ mṭl dgmr dḥyḥʔ wsp bzwzʔ wgmr dywšʔ mn ʔrʕʔ
16:05	wntqn kwrsyʔ bṭybwtʔ/bṭybw#3#/ wntb ʕlwhy bqwštʔ bmšknh ddwyd dynʔ wmʕqb dynʔ wmsrhb zdyqwtʔ
16:06	šmʕn gʔywth dmwʔb dṭb ʔtgʔy gʔywth wrmwth wʔlmh lʔ hwʔ hknʔ bdqw ʕlwhy qṣwmwhy
16:07	mṭl hnʔ nyll mwʔb wʕl mwʔb klh nyll ʕl ʔšytʔ dšwrʔ/dṭwrʔ#3#/ dmthgmn tnhmwn ʔyk kryhʔ
16:08	mṭl dḥqltʔ dḥšbwn ḥrb gptʔ dsbmʔ gnbrʔ dʕmmʔ gmw šbwqyh wʕdmʔ lyʕzyr/lymʔ dyʕzyr#3#/ mṭw wṭʕw bmdbrʔ ʕnqyh ngdw wʕbrw ymʔ
16:09	mṭl hnʔ ʔbkyky bbktʔ dyʕzyr gptʔ dsbmʔ ʔrwyky mn dmʕtky ḥšbwn wʔlʕlʔ mṭl dʕl ḥṣdky wʕl qṭpky dywšʔ npl
16:10	wtʕbr ḥdwtʔ wdyṣʔ mn krmlʔ wbkrmlʔ lʔ nḥdwn wlʔ nʕṣrwn ḥmrʔ bmʕṣrtʔ wlʔ ndwš dywšʔ mṭl dldywšʔ ʔbṭl

16:14	whšʔ mll mryʔ wʔmr btlt šnyn ʔyk šnyʔ dʔgyrʔ nṣṭʕr ʔyqrh dmwʔb ʕl swgʔʔ dʕmh wnštḥr qlyl zʕwr wlʔ sgy
17:01	mšqlʔ ddrmswq hʔ drmswq mʕbrʔ mn qrytʔ wthwʔ lḥwrbʔ wlmpwltʔ

17:03	wntbṭl/wnbṭl#3#/ ʕwšnʔ mn ʔprym wmlkwtʔ mn drmswq wšrkʔ dʔprym ʔyk ʔyqrʔ/šrkʔ#2#/ dbny ʔysryl nhwwn ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ
17:04	wnhwʔ bywmʔ hw ntmskn ʔyqrh dyʕqwb wšwmnʔ dbsrh ntrzʔ
17:05	wnhwʔ ʔyk hw dknš ḥṣdʔ dqymtʔ wdrʕh šblʔ ḥṣd wnhwʔ ʔyk hw dmlqṭ šblʔ bʕwmqʔ drpʔym
17:06	wnštḥr bh bwʕrʔ ʔyk zytʔ dḥbyṭ wtryn tltʔ zytyn bryš knʔ bswkwhy wʔrbʕʔ wḥmšʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl

17:09	bh bywmʔ hw nhwyn qwryʔ dʕwšnh ʔyk gwbʔ dḥrš wdʔmyr dʔštbq mn qdm bny ʔysryl whwyty lḥblʔ
17:10	wṭʕyty lʔlhʔ prwqky wltqypʔ mʕšnnky lʔ ʔtdkrty mṭl hnʔ tṣbyn nṣbtʔ yʔytʔ bšbwqʔ/bšwqʔ#3#/ nwkryʔ tzrʕynh
17:11	bywmʔ dtṣbynh npwq smdrʔ wbṣprʔ zrʕky tprʕyn ʔyk nyrʔ dqṭpʔ bywmʔ kryʔ wʔyk kʔpʔ dʔnšʔ
17:12	wy lḥylʔ dʕmmʔ sgyʔʔ dʔzl qlhwn ʔyk qlʔ dymmʔ wrgwšyʔ dʔmwtʔ ʔyk qlʔ dmyʔ sgyʔʔ <dgrpyn#3#>
17:13	ngʕwr bh wnʕrwq lrwḥqʔ wnrhṭ ʔyk dḥyḥʔ dṭwrʔ qdm rwḥʔ wʔyk glʔ qdm ʕlʕlʔ
17:14	bzbnʔ drmšʔ whʔ ḥwṭpʔ/ḥṭwpyʔ#3#/ ʕdlʔ hwʔ ṣprʔ wlʔ nštḥr hdʔ hy plgwtʔ ddywšn wmntʔ dbzwzn
18:01	wy lʔrʕʔ dṭllʔ dknpʔ dbʕbr nhrwtʔ dkwš
18:02	dmšdr hmyrʔ bymʔ wbmʔnʔ/wmʔnʔ#2#/ dppyrwn ʕl ʔpy myʔ ʔzlw ʔyzgdʔ qlylʔ lwt ʕmʔ dmlyg wʕqyr lwt ʕmʔ dḥylʔ mnh wlhl ʕmʔ dmškr wdyš dbzw nhrwtʔ ʔrʕh
18:03	klhwn ʕmwryh dtbyl dšryn bʔrʕʔ mʔ dšqlw ʔtʔ ṭwrʔ tḥzwn wmʔ dqrʔ šypwrʔ tšmʕwn
18:04	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr ly mryʔ ʔšlʔ wḥwr bṭwyby ʔyk ḥwmʔ ṣḥyḥʔ dʕl nhrʔ wʔyk ʕnnʔ dṭlʔ bywmʔ dḥṣdʔ

18:06	wnštbqwn ʔkḥdʔ lṭyrʔ dṭwrʔ wlḥywtʔ dʔrʕʔ/ddbrʔ#3#/ wtknš ʕlwhy ṭyrʔ wklh ḥywtʔ dʔrʕʔ ʕlwhy trgz

19:01	mšqlʔ dmṣryn hʔ mryʔ rkyb ʕl ʕnnʔ qlyltʔ wʕʔl lmṣryn wnzwʕwn ptkrʔ dmṣryn mn qdmwhy wlbh dmṣryʔ ntmsʔ bgwh
19:02	wʔgrʔ mṣryʔ bmṣryʔ wntktš gbrʔ ʕm ʔḥwy wgbrʔ ʕm ḥbrh mdyntʔ ʕm/ʕl#3#/ mdyntʔ wmlkwtʔ ʕm mlkwtʔ
19:03	wttpsq rwḥh dmṣryʔ bgwh wtrʕyth ʔṭbʕ wnšʔlwn mn ptkrʔ wmn mgwšʔ wmn zkwrʔ wmn ydwʕʔ
