19:08	wnʔlwn/wnʔzlwn#3#/ ṣydʔ wntbwn bʔblʔ drmyn ṣnrytʔ/mṣydtʔ#3#/ bnhrʔ wdprsyn mṣydtʔ ʕl ʔpy myʔ ʔtkrhw

19:15	wlʔ nhwʔ lmṣryʔ gbrʔ dnʕbd ryšʔ wdnwbtʔ/wdwnbtʔ#3#/ wdnwbtʔ/wdwnbtʔ#3#/ wryšʔ <bywmʔ hw#3#>

19:18	bywmʔ hw nhwyn ḥmš qwryʔ bʔrʕʔ/dbʔrʕʔ#3#/ dmṣryn dmmlln blšnʔ knʕnyʔ wymyn bmryʔ ḥyltnʔ wḥdʔ mnhyn hrs ttqrʔ

19:20	wthwʔ lʔtʔ wlshdwtʔ lmryʔ ḥyltnʔ bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn mṭl dngʕwn qdm mryʔ mn qdm ʔlwṣʔ/ʔwlṣnʔ#3#/ wnšdr lhwn prwqʔ wdynʔ wnpṣʔ ʔnwn

20:03	wʔmr mryʔ ʔyknʔ dhlk ʕbdy ʔšʕyʔ ḥpyy wʕrṭl hknʔ nhwyn ʔtwtʔ wtdmrtʔ tlt šnyn ʕl mṣryn wʕl kwš

21:01	mšqlʔ dmdbrʔ dymʔ ʔyk ʕlʕlʔ mn tymnʔ trhṭ mn mdbrʔ wtʔtʔ mn ʔrʕʔ rḥyqtʔ

21:15	mṭl dmn qdm spsrʔ ʔtbdrw wmn qdm ḥrbʔ dlṭyšʔ wmn qdm qštʔ dmlyʔ wmn qdm ʕwšnʔ dqrbʔ

22:14	glyʔ hy <hdʔ#3#> bʔdny mryʔ ḥyltnʔ wʔmr lʔ tsbwn lkwn ḥṭytʔ hdʔ ʕdmʔ dtmwtwn ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ ḥyltnʔ

22:18	nʔlṣk bʔwlṣnʔ ʔyk ʔwlṣnʔ dʔsprʔ bʔrʕʔ ʔrwḥtʔ dʔydyʔ tmn tmwt wtmn mrkbtʔ dʔyqrk ṣʕrʔ dbyt mrk
22:19	wʔhgmk mn ʔyqrk wʔsḥpk mn qymk

22:25	bywmʔ hw ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ttʕqr sktʔ dnqyšʔ/dnqšyʔ#2#/ bʔtrʔ mhymnʔ wtstḥp wtpl wnʔbd šqlʔ dsym ʕlyh mṭl dmryʔ mll
23:01	mšqlʔ dṣwr/dtršyš#3#/ ʔyllyn ʔlpʔ dtršyš mṭl dʔtbzz mn bytʔ mytynʔ wmn ʔrʕʔ dktym ʔtgly ln
23:02	štwqw ʕmwrʔ dgzrtʔ tgrʔ dṣydn dʕbr bymʔ/bmyʔ#3#/ mlʔwk
23:03	bmyʔ sgyʔʔ zrʕʔ dtgrʔ ḥṣdʔ dnhrʔ ʕllth hwt tʔgwrtʔ lʕmmʔ
23:04	bhty ṣydn mṭl dʔmr ymʔ wʕwšnh dymʔ lʔ ḥblt wlʔ rbyt yldt wlʔ gdwdʔ ʔplʔ rmrmt btwltʔ

24:01	hʔ mryʔ mḥbl ʔrʕʔ/lʔrʕʔ#3#/ wmtrʕ lh wsḥp ʔpyh wmbdr ʕmwryh

24:03	mtḥblw ttḥbl ʔrʕʔ wmtbzzw ttbzz mṭl dmryʔ mll ptgmʔ hnʔ

29:01	wy ʔryl ʔryl qrytʔ dšrʔ/dšdʔ#2#/ dwyd ʔwspw šntʔ ʕl šntʔ ʕdʕʔdʔ/dʕdʕʔdʔ#3#/ ntʕbdwn

33:24	wlʔ nʔmr ʕmwrʔ dkryh ʔnʔ ʕmʔ dytb bh qbl ḥṭhʔ ʔtrʔ ddynʔ <wdtbʕtʔ#3#>
34:01	qrwbw ʕmmʔ lmšmʕ wṣwtyn ʔmwtʔ tšmʕ ʔrʕʔ bmlʔh tbyl wklhwn ʕmwryh
34:02	mṭl drwgzh dmryʔ ʕl klhwn ʕmmʔ wḥmth ʕl klh ḥylhwn dnḥrwb ʔnwn wnšlm ʔnwn lqṭlʔ
34:03	wnštdwn qṭylyhwn wnmḥʔ ryḥʔ dšldyhwn wntmswn ṭwrʔ mn dmhwn

36:01	whwʔ bšnt ʔrbʕsrʔ dḥzqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ slq snḥryb mlkʔ dʔtwr ʕl klhyn mdyntʔ ʕšyntʔ dyhwdʔ wʔḥd ʔnyn

39:01	bzbnʔ hw šdr mrwdk bldn br bldn mlkʔ dbbl ʔygrtʔ wqwrbnʔ lḥzqyʔ mṭl dšmʕ dʔtkrh wḥsn wʔtḥlm

48:18	lwy dyn ṣʔt ʔnt pwqdny whwʔ šlmk ʔyk nhrʔ wzdyqwtk ʔyk gllʔ dymʔ
48:19	\whwʔ zrʕk /wzrʕk#3#/ ʔyk ḥlʔ wyldʔ dmʕyk ʔyk ḥṣṣwhy wlʔ nswp wlʔ nʔbd šmh mn qdmy
48:20	pwqw mn bbl ʕrwqw mn kldyʔ bqlʔ dtšbwḥtʔ ḥww hdʔ wʔšmʕwh wʔpqwh ʕdmʔ lswpyh dʔrʕʔ wʔmrw prq mryʔ lyʕqwb ʕbdh
48:21	bḥrbtʔ hlk ʔnwn wmyʔ mn ṭrnʔ ʔrdy lhwn bzʕ kʔpʔ wrdw myʔ
48:22	lyt šlmʔ lršyʕʔ ʔmr mryʔ
49:01	štwqyn/šmʕyn#3#/ dzrtʔ wṣwtyn ʔmwtʔ mn rwḥqʔ mryʔ qrny wmn mrbʕʔ wmn krsh wʔmy dkr šmy
49:02	ʕbd pwmy ʔyk sypʔ ḥrypʔ wbṭllʔ dʔydh ṭšyny ʕbdny ʔyk gʔrʔ gbyʔ wbqṭrqh strny
49:03	wʔmr ly ʕbdy ʔnt ʔysryl dbk mštbḥ ʔnʔ
49:04	wlʔ ʔmrt lzrʕh dyʕqwb dsryqʔyt lʔyt wyhbt ḥyly lsryqwtʔ šryrʔyt dyny qdm mryʔ <hw#3#> wʕbdy qdm ʔlhy
49:05	hšʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ dgblny bmrbʕʔ dʔhwʔ lh ʕbdʔ wʔpnʔ/dʔpnʔ#3#/ lyʕqwb lwth wlʔysryl ʔknš ʔštbḥt qdm mryʔ wʔlhy hwʔ ʕwšny
49:06	wʔmr zʕwryʔ hy dthwʔ ly ʕbdʔ wtqym šbṭʔ dyʕqwb wtpnʔ nwrbh dʔysrʔyl yhbtk nwhrʔ lʕmmʔ dthwʔ pwrqny ʕdmʔ lswpyh dʔrʕʔ
49:07	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ \qdyšʔ dʔysryl wprwqh /qdyšʔ prwqh dysryl#3#/ ldmstlyʔ npšh ldmsly mn ʕmʔ wmn ʕbdʔ dšlyṭnʔ mlkʔ nḥzwn wnqwmwn wšlyṭnʔ nsgdwn lh mṭl mryʔ/dmryʔ#3#/ dmhymn qdyšʔ dʔysryl dgbk
49:08	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ bzbnʔ dṣbynʔ ʕnytk wbywmʔ dpwrqnʔ ʕdrtk wgbltk wyhbtk qymʔ lʕmʔ wnwhrʔ lʕmmʔ dtqym ʔrʕʔ wtʔrt yrtwtʔ dḥrbtʔ
49:09	wtʔmr lʔsyrʔ dpwqw wlḥbyšʔ dʔtglw ʕl/ʕl yd#3#/ ʔwrḥtʔ nrʕwn wbklhwn šbylʔ mrʕythwn
49:10	lʔ nkpnwn wlʔ nṣhwn wlʔ nkʔ ʔnwn šwbʔ wšmšʔ mṭl dmrḥmnhwn ndbr ʔnwn wlmbwʕʔ dmyʔ nytʔ ʔnwn
49:11	ʔʕbd klhwn ṭwrʔ ʔwrḥtʔ wšbylʔ nttrymwn
49:12	hlyn nʔtwn mn rwḥqʔ whlyn <nʔtwn#3#> mn grbyʔ whlyn <nʔtwn#3#> mn ymʔ wmn/whlyn mn#3#/ ymʔ dsnym
49:13	šbḥw šmyʔ wdwṣy ʔrʕʔ ʔtpṣḥw ṭwrʔ btšbwḥtʔ mṭl dbyʔ mryʔ lʕmh wrḥm ʕl byšwhy
49:14	wʔmrt <brt#3#> ṣhywn dšbqny mryʔ wmryʔ ṭʕny
49:15	ʔn ṭʕyʔ ʔnttʔ ʕwlh wlʔ mrḥmʔ/mrḥpʔ#3#/ ʕl br mʕyh ʔpn hlyn nṭʕyn ʔnʔ lʔ ʔṭʕyky
49:16	hʔ ʕl psʔ dʔydy ršmtky wšwryky lwqbly ʔnwn ʔmynʔyt
49:17	bʕgl bnyky msḥpnyky wmḥrbnyky mnky npqwn
49:18	ʔrymy ʕynyky lḥdryky wḥzy dklhwn/klhwn#3#/ mtknšyn wʔtyn lky ḥy ʔnʔ ʔmr mryʔ dklhwn ʔyk ṣbtʔ tlbšyn wttkllyn ʔyk kltʔ
49:19	mṭl dḥrbtky wṣdytky wʔrʕʔ dsḥypwtky/dsḥpwtky#3#/ mkyl ttʔlṣ mn ytbʔ wnʕrqwn blwʕyky
49:20	twb nʔmrwn bʔdnyky bny mgzywtky ʔlyṣ hw ln ʔtrʔ ʔtqrb/dʔtqrby#3#/lʔ ʔtqrby#3#/ ln <ʔtrʔ#3#> ntb <ʔkḥdʔ#3#>
49:21	wtʔmryn blbky mnw yld ly hlyn \dhʔ ʔnʔ /dʔnʔ#3#/ mgzytʔ ʔnʔ wmšwḥdtʔ glytʔ wmdwdtʔ hlyn mn rby \ʔn ʔnʔ /ʔnʔ ʔnʔ#3#/ ʔnʔ dyn#3#/ hʔ ʔštḥrt blḥwdy hlyn ʔykʔ hww
49:22	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ hʔ mrym ʔnʔ ʔydy ʕl ʕmmʔ wlʕmmʔ/wʕl ʕmmʔ#3#/ ʔrym ʔtʔ wnytwn lbnyky ʕl ʔydyhwn wlbntky ʕl ktpthwn nšqlwn
49:23	wnhwwn mlkʔ mrbynyky wrwrbnythwn mynqnytky wʕl ʔpyhwn ʕl ʔrʕʔ nsgdw lky wʕprʔ drglyky nlḥkwn/nlkḥwn#3#/ wtdʕyn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ dlʔ bhtyn ʔylyn dmskyn ly
49:24	lmʔ mtdbrʔ dbrth dgnbrʔ ʔw šbyth dʕšynʔ mtpṣyʔ
49:25	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ddbrth/dbrth#3#/ dgnbrʔ ttdbr/ttbr#3#/ wšbyth dʕšynʔ/dzdyqʔ#3#/ ttpṣʔ wdynyky ʔnʔ ʔdwn wlbnyky ʔnʔ ʔprwq
49:26	wʔwkl lʔlwṣyky bsrhwn wʔyk mʔrytʔ nrwwn mn dmhwn wndʕwn kl bsr dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ prwqky wmsyʕnky/wmpṣynky#3#/ tqyph dyʕqwb
50:01	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔynw ktbʔ dšwbqnʔ dšbqt lʔmkwn ʔw mnw mrʔ ḥwbty dzbntkwn lh hʔ bḥṭhykwn ʔzdbntwn wbʕwlkwn ʔštbqt ʔmkwn
50:02	lmnʔ ʔtyt wlyt ʔnš wqryt wlyt dʕnʔ ḥṣdʔ ḥṣdt ʔydy wpdt ʔw lyt by ḥylʔ lmpṣyw hʔ bkʔty mḥrb ʔnʔ ymʔ wʕbd ʔnʔ nhrwtʔ ʔyk mdbrʔ wsryn nwnyhwn mn bly myʔ wmytyn
50:03	wmlbš ʔnʔ lšmyʔ ḥšwkʔ wsqʔ ʕbd ʔnʔ tksythwn
50:04	mryʔ ʔlhʔ yhb ly lšnʔ dywlpnʔ dʔwdʕ wʔḥwʔ lmṭrpʔ mltʔ ʔʕyr bṣprʔ bṣprʔ nʕbd ly ʔdnʔ lmšmʕ ywlpnʔ
50:05	mryʔ ʔlhʔ ptḥ ly ʔdnʔ wʔnʔ lʔ hpkt lbstry ʔp lʔ qmt bḥrynʔ
50:06	gwšmy yhbt lmḥwtʔ wpky lšwqpʔ wʔpy lʔ ʔpnyt/ʔhpkt#3#/ mn bhttʔ wmn rwqʔ
50:07	wmryʔ ʔlhʔ ʕdrny mṭl hnʔ lʔ bhtt mṭl hnʔ ʕbdt ʔpy ʔyk kʔpʔ wydʕt dlʔ bht ʔnʔ
50:08	dqryb hw mzdqny <hʔ mryʔ ʔlhʔ mzdq ly mnw mḥyb ly#3#> mnw dʔn/ddʔn#3#/ ʕmy nqwm ʔkḥdʔ ʔw mnw bʕl dyny ntqrb/dntqrb#3#/ lwty/ʔkḥdʔ#3#/
50:09	hʔ mryʔ ʔlhʔ mʕdr ly mnw mḥyb ly hʔ klhwn ʔyk lbwšʔ blyn wssʔ nʔkwl ʔnwn
50:10	mnw <ʔyt#3#> bkwn ddḥl mn mryʔ nšmʕ bqlʔ dʕbdh dmhlk bḥšwkʔ wlyt lh/bh#3#/ nwhrʔ nsbr bšmh dmryʔ wntprq bʔlhh
50:11	hʔ klkwn šbqy nwrʔ ʔntwn wmgwzly šlhbytʔ/bšlhbytʔ#3#/ zlw bzhrʔ dnwrkwn wbšlhbytʔ dgwzltkwn mn ʔydy hwtkwn hdʔ dbkrywtʔ tdmkwn
51:01	šwmʕwny drhṭyn bzdyqwtʔ wbʕyn <npšhwn#3#> lmryʔ ḥwrw lṭwrʔ dʔtgzrtwn mnh wlgwbʔ dʔtnqrtwn mnh
51:02	ḥwrw lʔbrhm ʔbwkwn wlsrʔ dbṭntkwn dḥd hwʔ wqryth wbrkth wʔsgyth
51:03	mṭl dbnʔ/dbyʔ#3#/ mryʔ lṣhywn wmbnʔ/wmbyʔ#3#/ lklhyn ḥrbth wʕbd mdbrh/sbrh#3#/ ʔyk ʕdn wpqʕth ʔyk prdysh dmryʔ/dʔlhʔ#3#/ dyṣʔ wḥdwtʔ nštmʕ bgwh/bqlh#3#/ twdytʔ wqlʔ dzmrʔ
51:04	šwmʕwny ʕmmʔ wṣwtnny ʔmwtʔ mṭwl dnmwsʔ mn qdmy npq wdyny nwhrʔ hw lʕmmʔ
51:05	qrbt zdyqwty wnpq pwrqny wbdrʕy ʕmmʔ ntdynwn ly nskyn gzrtʔ wldrʕy nsbrn
51:06	ʔrymw ʕynykwn lšmyʔ wḥwrw ʔp ltḥt bʔrʕʔ mṭl dšmyʔ ʔyk tnnʔ nʕbrwn wʔrʕʔ ʔyk lbwšʔ tblʔ wʕmwryh ʔkwth nhwwn wpwrqny lʕlm nhwʔ wzdyqwty lʔ tʕbr
51:07	šwmʕwny ydʕy zdyqwtʔ ʕmʔ dnmwsy blbhwn lʔ tdḥlwn mn ḥsdʔ dʔnšʔ wmn gwdphwn lʔ tzwʕwn
51:08	mṭl dʔyk dlʕmrʔ wʔyk dllbwšʔ nʔkwl ʔnwn ssʔ wzdyqwty lʕlm thwʔ wpwrqny ldrdryn
51:09	ʔttʕyry ʔttʕyry wlbšy ʕwšnʔ ddrʕh/drʕh#3#/ dmryʔ ʔttʕyry ʔyk dbywmtʔ qdmyʔ wʔyk drʔ dmn ʕlmyn ʔnty ʔnty dpsqty psqʔ rbʔ wbṭlty/wqṭlty#3#/ ltnynʔ
51:10	ʔnty hy dʔḥrbty ymʔ wmyʔ dthwmʔ rbʔ wbʕwmqʔ dmyʔ ʕbdty ʔwrḥʔ dnʕbrwn/wnʕbrwn#3#/ pryqʔ
51:11	pryqwhy dmryʔ wntpnwn/nhpkwn#3#/ wnʕlwn lṣhywn bšwbḥʔ wlʕlmyn thwʔ ḥdwtʔ ʕl ršyhwn bwsmʔ wḥdwtʔ ndrkwn wnʕrqwn dwwnʔ wtʔnḥtʔ
51:12	ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mbyʔnkwn ʔmr mryʔ mn ʔnty ddḥlty mn ʔnšʔ dmʔt wmn br ʔnšʔ dʔyk ʕmyrʔ ybš
51:13	wṭʕyty lmryʔ dʕbdky dmtḥ šmyʔ wʔtqn štʔsyh dʔrʕʔ wdḥlty ʔmynʔyt kl ywm mn qdm ḥmth dʔlwṣʔ dmṭyb hwʔ lmḥblw ʔykʔ hy ḥmth dʔlwṣʔ
51:14	dmsrhb hwʔ ʕšynʔ lmḥblw lʔ nmwtwn lḥblʔ wlʔ nḥsr lḥmh
51:15	ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhky dkʔʔ bymʔ wšlyn gllwhy mryʔ ḥyltnʔ šmh
51:16	dsmt mly bpwmky wbṭllʔ dʔydy ksytky bhy dmtḥt šmyʔ wʔtqnt štʔsyh dʔrʕʔ wʔmrt lṣhywn dʕmy ʔnty
51:17	ʔttʕyry ʔttʕyry wqwmy ʔwršlm dʔštyty mn ʔydh dmryʔ ksʔ drwgzh wʔštyty wʔmṣyty ksʔ drʕlʔ
51:18	wlyt dmbyʔ lh mn klhwn bnyʔ dyldt wlyt dʔḥd bʔydh <wmqym lh#3#> mn kwlhwn bnyʔ drbyt
51:19	trtyn ʔnyn mṭyky lmn tkrʔ ʕlyky bztʔ wtbrʔ wkpnʔ wḥrbʔ/dḥrbʔ#3#/ mn nbyʔky
51:20	bnyky twyryn wdmkyn bryš kwlhwn šwqʔ ʔyk slqʔ dkmyr/dkmyd#23#/ wmlyn rwgzh dmryʔ wkʔth dʔlhky
51:21	mṭl hnʔ šmʕy hlyn mmkktʔ/mmkrtʔ#3#/ drwyʔ lʔ mn ḥmrʔ
51:22	hknʔ ʔmr mrky mryʔ wʔlhky ndwn lʕmh hʔ nsbt mn ʔydyky ksʔ drʕlʔ wksʔ drwgzy lʔ twspyn twbl mštyh
51:23	wʔsymywhy byd mmkknyky dʔmrw lnpšky ʔtmkky wnʕbr/wnʕbd#3#/ wʕbdty lʕmky ʔyk ʔrʕʔ wʔyk šwqʔ ldʕbryn
52:01	ʔttʕyry ʔttʕyry ṣhywn wlbšy lbwšʔ dtšbwḥtʔ ʔwršlm qrytʔ qdyštʔ mṭl dlʔ nwsp twb lmʕl lky ʕwrlʔ wṭmʔʔ
52:02	ʔtnpṣy mn ʕprʔ wqwmy tby ʔwršlm šry/šdy#3#/ nyrʔ mn ṣwrky šbytʔ brt ṣhywn
52:03	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ mgn ʔzdbntwn wlʔ bkspʔ ttprqwn
52:04	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ lmṣryn nḥt ʕmy bqdmytʔ lmʕmr tmn wʔtwryʔ bqṭyrʔ dbrh
52:05	whšʔ mʔ ly hrkʔ ʔmr mryʔ dʔtdbr ʕmy mgn šlyṭyhwn myllyn ʔmr mryʔ wʔmynʔyt kl ywm ʕl šmy mgdpyn
52:06	mṭl hnʔ ndʕ ʕmy šmy bywmʔ hw mṭl dʔnʔ hw mmll wʔyty
52:07	mʔ yʔyn ʕl ṭwrʔ rglwhy <dhw#3#> dmsbr/msbr#3#/ šlmʔ wdmsbr ṭbtʔ wdmšmʕ pwrqnʔ dʔmr lṣhywn ʔmlk ʔlhky
52:08	qlʔ ddwqyky ʔrymw qlʔ wʔkḥdʔ mšbḥyn mṭl dʕyn bʕyn nḥzwn kd mpnʔ mryʔ lṣhywn
52:09	dwṣyn wšbḥyn ʔkḥdʔ ḥrbtʔ dʔwršlm mṭl dbyʔ/dbnʔ#3#/ mryʔ lʕmh wprq lʔwršlm <mṭl dbnʔ mryʔ lʕmh wprq lʔwršlm#3#>
52:10	glʔ mryʔ drʕh qdyšʔ lʕyn klhwn ʕmmʔ wnḥzwn klhwn ʕbryh/ʕmmʔ#3#/ʕmwryh#3#/ dʔrʕʔ pwrqnh dʔlhn
52:11	ʕbrw ʕbrw pwqw mn tmn wlṭmʔʔ lʔ ttqrbwn pwqw mn gwh wʔtgbw šqyly mʔnwhy dmryʔ
52:12	mṭl dlʔ <hwʔ#3#> bswrhbʔ tpqwn wbʕrwqyʔ lʔ tʔzlwn/tʔtwn#3#/ mṭl dmryʔ ʔzl qdmykwn wmknšnkwn ʔlhh dʔysryl
52:13	hʔ mstkl ʕbdy wmttrym wmštql wmtʕlʔ/wmštʕlʔ#3#/ ṭb
52:14	ʔyk dntmhwn ʕlwhy sgyʔʔ hknʔ mḥbl ḥzwh mn dgbrʔ wqwbllh mn dbny ʔnšʔ/bny ʔnšʔ#3#/
52:15	hnʔ/hknʔ#3#/ mdkʔ ʕmmʔ/lʕmmʔ#3#/ sgyʔʔ wʕlwhy nʔḥdwn mlkʔ pwmhwn mṭl ddlʔ ʔtʔmr lhwn ḥzw wdlʔ šmʕw ʔstklw
53:01	mn hymn lšmʕn wdrʕh dmryʔ lmn/ʕl mn#3#/ ʔtgly
53:02	slq ʔyk ylwdʔ qdmwhy wʔyk ʕqrʔ mn ʔrʕʔ ṣhytʔ lyt hwʔ lh ḥzwʔ wlʔ zywʔ wḥzynyhy dlyt hwʔ lh ḥzwʔ/zywʔ#3#/ wdglnyhy
53:03	šyṭʔ wmkykʔ dʔnšʔ gbrʔ hw dkʔbʔ wydʕ ḥšʔ ʔpnyn ʔpyn mnh wšṭnyhy wlʔ ḥšbnyhy
53:04	šryrʔyt ḥšyn hw sybr wkʔbyn hw sbl wḥnn ḥšbnyhy ktyšʔ wmmḥyʔ dʔlhʔ wmmkkʔ
53:05	hw mtqṭl mṭl ḥṭhyn/ʕwln#3#/ wmtmkk mṭl ʕwln/ḥṭhyn#3#/ mrdwtʔ dšlmn ʕlwhy wbšwmth ntʔsʔ
53:06	kln ʔyk ʕnʔ ṭʕyn wʔnš lsṭrh pnyn wmryʔ ʔpgʕ bh ḥṭhʔ dkln
53:07	qrb wʔtmkk wlʔ ptḥ pwmh ʔyk ʔmrʔ lnkstʔ ʔtdbr wʔyk nqyʔ qdm gzwzʔ štyq hwʔ wlʔ ptḥ pwmh <bmwkkh#3#>
53:08	mn ḥbwšyʔ wmn dynʔ ʔtdbr wdrh mnw nštʕʔ mṭl dʔtgzr mn ʔrʕʔ dḥyʔ wmn ʕwlʔ dʕmy qrbw lh
53:09	yhb ršyʕʔ qbrh wʕtyrʔ bmwth ʕl dlʔ ʕbd ʕwlʔ/lʕwlʔ#3#/ wlyt nklʔ bpwmh
53:10	wmryʔ ṣbʔ dnmkkywhy wnḥšywhy ʔttsym ḥṭhʔ bnpšh dnḥzʔ/nḥzʔ#3#/ zrʕʔ wngr/wnṭr#3#/ ywmtʔ wṣbynh dmryʔ bʔydh nṣlḥ
53:11	wmn ʕmlʔ dnpšh nḥzʔ wnsbʕ bydʕtʔ wnzkʔ lzdyqʔ ʕbdʔ hw dsgyʔʔ wḥṭhyhwn hw nsbwl
53:12	mṭl hnʔ ʔplgywhy bsgyʔʔ wlʕšynʔ nplg bztʔ ḥlp dšdʔ npšh lmwtʔ wʕm ʕwlʔ ʔtmny whw ḥṭhʔ dsgyʔʔ šql wbʕwlʔ pgʕ
54:01	šbḥy ʕqrtʔ dlʔ yldt wʔtpṣḥy btšbwḥtʔ wdwṣy dlʔ ḥblt mṭl dsgyw bnyh dṣdytʔ ytyr mn bnyh dbʕyltʔ ʔmr mryʔ
54:02	ʔpty ʔtrʔ dmšknyky wyryʕtʔ dmšknyky mtwḥy wlʔ tḥwsyn ʔwrky ṭwnbyky wskyky šrry
54:03	mṭl dlymynʔ wlsmlʔ tsgyn wzrʕky nʔrt ʕmmʔ wqwryʔ dṣdyn nwtbwn
54:04	lʔ tdḥlyn mṭl dlʔ bhtty wlʔ ttksyn mṭl dlʔ mḥprty mṭwl dbhttʔ dṭlywtky tṭʕyn wḥsdʔ dʔrmlwtky twb lʔ ttdkryn
54:05	mṭl dmrky ʕbd lky hknʔ mryʔ ḥyltnʔ šmh wprwqky qdyšʔ dʔysryl ʔlhʔ dklh ʔrʕʔ ntqrʔ
54:06	mṭl dʔyk dlʔnttʔ šbyqtʔ wʕyyqt rwḥʔ qrky mryʔ wʔyk ʔntt ṭlywtʔ dmštbqʔ ʔmr ʔlhky
54:07	brwgzʔ zʕwrʔ šbqtky wbrḥmy sgyʔʔ ʔknšky
54:08	brwgzʔ rbʔ ʔpnyt ʔpy mnky wbrḥmy dlʕlm rḥmt ʕlyky ʔmr mryʔ prwqky
54:09	hdʔ ʔyk ywmtʔ hy ly dnwḥ dymyt dlʔ nʕbrwn twb myʔ dnwḥ ʕl ʔrʕʔ hknʔ ʔymyt dlʔ ʔrgz ʕlyky wlʔ ʔkʔʔ bky
54:10	mṭl dṭwrʔ ntmkkwn wrmtʔ ntrknn wṭybwty mnky lʔ tʕbr wqymʔ dšlmky lʔ nʕbr ʔmr mryʔ mrḥmnʔ
54:11	mmkktʔ wmʕlʕltʔ dlʔ ʔtbyʔt hʔ ʔnʔ ʕbd ʔnʔ kʔpyky brwlʔ wʔtqn štʔsyky bkʔpʔ dspylʔ
54:12	wʔbnʔ ʔsyky bkʔpʔ dʔyspwn wtrʕyky bkʔpʔ dqrwsṭlws wtḥwmyky bkʔpʔ gbytʔ

55:02	lmnʔ/mnʔ#3#/ tqlyn ʔntwn kspʔ dlʔ llḥmʔ wlʔwtkwn dlʔ lmsbʕ šwmʕwny mšmʕ wtʔklwn ṭbtʔ wttpnq/wttprq#3#/ npškwn bdwhnʔ

60:14	wnʔtwn lky kd mmkkyn bny mmkknyky wnsgdwn lpsʔ drglyky klhwn mrgznyky wnqrwnky ṣhywn qryth dmryʔ qdyšʔ dʔysryl
60:15	ḥlp dhwyty šbyqtʔ wsnyʔtʔ mn bly dʕbr ʔʕbdky ʔyqrʔ lʕlm wḥdwtʔ ldrdryn
60:16	wtʔnqyn ḥlbʔ dʕmmʔ wbztʔ dmlkʔ tʔnqyn wtdʕyn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ prwqky wmpṣynky/wmḥynky#3#/ tqyph dyʕqwb
60:17	ḥlp nḥšʔ ʔytʔ dhbʔ wḥlp przlʔ ʔytʔ sʔmʔ wḥlp qysʔ nḥšʔ wḥlp kʔpʔ przlʔ wʔʕbd šlmʔ pqwdky wšlyṭky zdyqwtʔ
60:18	wlʔ nštmʕ twb ʕwlʔ bʔrʕky wbztʔ wtbrʔ btḥwmyky wnqrwn šwryky pwrqnʔ wtrʕyky tšbwḥtʔ
60:19	wlʔ nhwʔ lky twb šmšʔ lnwhrʔ dʔymmʔ wnwhrh dshrʔ lʔ nnhr lky mṭl dnhwʔ lky mryʔ nwhrʔ/zwhrʔ#3#/ lʕlm
60:20	wnšlmwn ywmtʔ dʔblky
60:21	wklh ʕmky zdyqʔ lʕlm nʔrtwn ʔrʕʔ nwrbʔ dnṣbt ʕbd ʔydy nštbḥ
60:22	zʕwrʔ nhwʔ bʔlpʔ wbṣyrʔ bʕmʔ ʕšynʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ lzbnh ʔṭrywhy
61:01	rwḥh dmryʔ ʔlhʔ ʕly ḥlp dmšḥny mryʔ wšdrny dʔsbr lmkykʔ wʔʕṣwb ltbyrʔ lbʔ wʔqrʔ ḥʔrwtʔ lšbyʔ wšryʔ lʔsyrʔ
61:02	wʔqrʔ šntʔ dṣbynʔ lmryʔ wywmʔ dpwrqnʔ lʔlhn lmbyʔw lklhwn ʔbylʔ
61:03	lmtl lʔbylʔ dṣhywn šwbḥʔ ḥlp qṭmʔ mšḥʔ bsymʔ/dbsymʔ#3#/dbsmʔ#3#/ ḥlp ʔblʔ ʕṭpʔ dtšbwḥtʔ ḥlp rwḥʔ mkʔbtʔ ntqrwn dkrʔ dzdyqwtʔ nṣbth dmryʔ mšbḥtʔ
61:04	wnbnwn ḥrbtʔ dmn ʕlm wṣdytʔ dmn ršytʔ nqymwn wnḥdtwn qwryʔ ḥrbtʔ wṣdytʔ ddrdryn
61:05	wnqwmwn nwkryʔ wnrʕwn ʕnhwn wbny nwkryʔ nhwwn lhwn ʔkrʔ wkrmʔ
61:06	wʔntwn kwmrwhy dmryʔ ttqrwn wmšmšnwhy dʔlhn ntʔmr lkwn nksyhwn dʕmmʔ tʔklwn wbʔyqrhwn tštbḥwn/tšbḥwn#3#/
61:07	ḥlp bhttkwn wḥlp ḥprkwn ywrtnʔ/ywtrnʔ#3#/ tnynʔ/dtnynʔ#3#/ tʔrtwn bʔrʕhwn wtštbḥwn/wtšbḥwn#3#/ bplgwthwn ḥdwtʔ lʕlm thwʔ lkwn
61:08	mṭl dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ drḥm ʔnʔ dynʔ wsnʔ ʔnʔ ḥṭwpyʔ wʕwlʔ wʔtl ʕmlkwn bqwštʔ wqymʔ dʕlm/dlʕlm#3#/ ʔqym lkwn
61:09	wntydʕ zrʕkwn bʕmmʔ wzrʕʔ dzrʕkwn bʔmwtʔ kl ḥzyykwn nštwdʕwnkwn dzrʕʔ/zrʕʔ#3#/ ʔntwn dbrk mryʔ
61:10	mtbsmw ʔtbsm bmryʔ wtdwṣ npšy bʔlhy mṭwl dʔlbšny lbwšʔ dpwrqnʔ wʔʕṭpny prysʔ dzdyqwtʔ ʔyk ḥtnʔ šbyḥʔ wʔyk kltʔ mṣbttʔ
61:11	wʔyk ʔrʕʔ dmpqʔ ʕwpyʔ wʔyk gntʔ dmwʕyʔ zrʕʔ hknʔ nwʕʔ mryʔ ʔlhʔ zdyqwtʔ wtšbwḥtʔ qdm klhwn ʕmmʔ
62:01	mṭl ṣhywn lʔ ʔštwq wmṭl ʔwršlm lʔ ʔšlʔ ʕdmʔ dtpwq zdyqwth ʔyk nwhrʔ wpwrqnh ʔyk lmpʔdʔ ndlq
62:02	wnḥzwn ʕmmʔ zdyqwtky wklhwn mlkʔ ʔyqrky wntqrʔ lky šmʔ ḥdtʔ dpwmh dmryʔ nsymywhy
62:03	wthwyn klylʔ dtšbwḥtʔ bʔydh dmryʔ wtgʔ dmlkwtʔ bʔydh dʔlhky
62:04	wtwb lʔ ttqryn šbyqtʔ wʔrʕky twb lʔ ttqrʔ ṣdytʔ ʔlʔ ttqryn ṣbyny wʔrʕky bʕyltʔ mṭl dṣbʔ bky mryʔ wʔrʕky ttbʕl
62:05	mṭl dʔyk dbʕl gdwdʔ lbtwltʔ hknʔ nbʕlwnky bnyky wʔyk dḥdʔ ḥtnʔ bkltʔ <hknʔ#3#> nḥdʔ bky ʔlhky
62:06	ʕl šwryky ʔwršlm ʔqymt nṭwrʔ kl ywm bʔymmʔ wbllyʔ ʔmynʔyt dlʔ nštqwn wlʔ nšlwn mdkrnʔ qdm mryʔ
62:07	wlʔ ttlyn lhwn šlyʔ ʕdmʔ dntqnky wʕdmʔ dnʕbdky ʔwršlm tšbwḥtʔ bʔrʕʔ
62:08	ymʔ mryʔ bymynh wbdrʕh ʕšynʔ dlʔ ʔtl twb ʕbwrky mʔkwltʔ lbʕldbbyky wlʔ nštwn bny nwkryʔ ḥmrky wlʔyty bh
62:09	ʔlʔ mknšnwhy nʔklwnh wnšbḥwn lmryʔ wmknšnwhy nštwnh bdry qdyštʔ
62:10	ʕbrw ʕbrw btrʕʔ/bʔrʕʔ#3#/ pnw ʔwrḥʔ lʕmʔ/lmryʔ#3#/ drwšw šbylʔ wqwlw kʔpwhy ʔrymw ʔtʔ lʕmmʔ
62:11	hʔ mryʔ ʔšmʕ lswpyh dʔrʕʔ ʔmrw lbrt ṣhywn hʔ/dhʔ#3#/ ʔtʔ prwqky hʔ ʔgrh ʕmh wʕbdh qdmwhy
62:12	wnqrwn ʔnwn ʕmʔ qdyšʔ pryqwhy dmryʔ wʔnty ttqryn tbyʕtʔ qrytʔ dlʔ ʔštbqt
63:01	mnw hnʔ dʔtʔ mn ʔdwm wswmqyn nḥtwhy mn bwṣr whdyr blbwšwhy wʕšyn bswgʔʔ dḥylh ʔnʔ mmll bzdyqwtʔ wmsgʔ lmprq
63:02	lmnʔ swmqyn nḥtyk wlbwšyk ʔyk hw dʕṣr bmʕṣrtʔ/mʕṣrtʔ#3#/
63:03	mʕṣrtʔ dšt blḥwdy wʔnš mn ʕmmʔ lyt/lʔ#3#/ hwʔ ʕmy ʕṣrt ʔnwn brwgzy wdšt ʔnwn bḥmty wndʔ/wrdʔ#3#/ dmhwn ʕl lbwšy wklhwn nḥty plplt
63:04	mṭl dywmʔ dtbʕtʔ blby wšntʔ dpwrqny mṭt
63:05	ḥrt wlyt dmʕdr wʔtdmrt wlyt dsmk wprqny drʕy wḥmty hy smktny
63:06	dšt ʕmmʔ brwgzy wʔdwyt/wdwyt#3#/ ʔnwn bḥmty wʔḥtt lʔrʕʔ ʕwšnhwn
63:07	ṭybwth dmryʔ ʔtdkr wtšbwḥth dmryʔ ʕl kl dprʕny mryʔ wʔsgy/dʔsgy#3#/ ṭybwth ʕl dbyt ʔysryl dprʕny ʔyk rḥmwhy wʔyk swgʔʔ dṭybwth
63:08	wʔmr dʕmy ʔnwn bnyʔ dlʔ mdglyn whwʔ lhwn prwqʔ
63:09	bkwl ʔwlṣnyhwn lʔ ʔlṣ ʔnwn wmlʔkʔ dʔpwhy prq ʔnwn bmrḥmnwth wbrwḥph prq ʔnwn wʔrym ʔnwn wšql ʔnwn kwlhwn ywmtʔ dʕlmʔ
63:10	whnwn mrmrw wʔkʔbw/wʔbʔšw#3#/ lrwḥʔ dqwdšh whpk hwʔ lhwn bʕldbbʔ whw ʔtktš ʕmhwn
63:11	wʔtdkr ywmtʔ dʕlm/dmn ʕlm#3#/ dmwšʔ ʕbdh ʔyk dʔsq mn ymʔ lrʕyʔ dʕnh wʔyk dsm bgwh rwḥʔ dqwdšh
63:12	mdbr lymynh dmwšʔ drʕʔ dtšbwḥth trʕ ymʔ mn qdmyhwn wʕbd lhwn šmʔ lʕlm
63:13	dbr ʔnwn bthwmʔ ʔyk swsyʔ bmdbrʔ wlʔ ʔttqlw
63:14	ʔyk bʕyrʔ dnḥtʔ bpqʕtʔ rwḥh dmryʔ dbrt ʔnwn hknʔ dbrt ʔnwn lʕmk wʕbdt lk šmʔ mšbḥʔ
63:15	ḥwr mn šmyʔ <mryʔ#3#> wḥzy mn mdyryk qdyšʔ wmšbḥʔ ʔykw ṭnnk wgnbrwtk whwpkʔ/whwpk#3#/ dmʕyk/ddmʕyk#3#/ wdrḥmyk dʔthpkw ʕlyn
63:16	mṭl dʔnt hw ʔbwn ʔbrhm lʔ ydʕn wʔysryl lʔ ʔštwdʕn ʔnt hw mryʔ ʔbwn wprwqn wmn ʕlm šmk
63:17	lmnʔ ʔṭʕytn mryʔ mn ʔwrḥk wqšyt lbn mn dḥltk ʔtpny mṭl ʕbdyk šbṭʔ dyrtwtk
63:18	qlyl nʔrt ʕmʔ dqwdšk/qwdšk#3#/ ʔlwṣyn dšw mqdšk
63:19	hwyn mn ʕlm ʕdlʔ ʔštlṭt ʕlyhwn wlʔ ʔtqry šmk ʕlyhwn lʔ ptḥt šmyʔ wnḥtt wmn qdmyk dlw ṭwrʔ
64:01	wʔtpšrw ʔyk dmtpšrʔ šʕwtʔ mn qdm nwrʔ wtwqd nwrʔ lbʕldbbyk wntydʕ šmk lbʕldbbyk wntdlḥwn ʕmmʔ mn qdmyk
64:02	kd ʕbdt dḥyltʔ/dḥltʔ#3#/ lʔ skyn lk nḥtt wmn qdmyk dlw ṭwrʔ
64:03	mn ʕlm lʔ ṣtw wlʔ šmʕw wʕyn lʔ ḥzt ʔlh lbr mnk dʕbd ʔnt lʔylyn dmskyn lk
64:04	wpgʕ ʔnt bbwsmʔ bʔylyn dʕbdyn zdyqwtʔ wbʔwrḥtk ntdkrwnk hʔ ʔnt rgzt wḥṭyn bhyn bʕlm ntprq
64:05	dhwyn ʔyk ṭmʔʔ kwln wʔyk ʔwrqʕtʔ dkpsnytʔ klh zdyqwtn ntrn ʔyk ṭrpʔ kln wʔyk ʕlʕlʔ šqlwn ḥṭhyn
64:06	wlyt dqrʔ bšmk wdʕhd lmḥmsnw bk mṭl dʔhpkt ʔpyk mnn wʔšlmtn byd ḥṭhyn
64:07	hšʔ mryʔ ʔbwn ʔnt ḥnn ṭynʔ wʔnt gbwln wʕbd ʔydyk ḥnn kln
64:08	lʔ trgz mryʔ ṭb lʕlm wlʔ ttdkr/tdkr#3#/ lʕlm ḥṭhyn ḥzy dʕmk ḥnn kln
64:09	qwryʔ dqwdšk hwy mdbrʔ wṣhywn hwt mdbrʔ wʔwršlm ḥrbtʔ
64:10	byt qwdšn wtšbwḥtn dšbḥwk ʔbhyn hwʔ lyqdnʔ dnwrʔ wklh/wlklh#3#/ rgtn hwt lḥwrbʔ
64:11	ʕl hlyn ḥmsnt mryʔ wštqt wmkktn ṭb
65:01	ʔtbʕyt lʔylyn dlʔ šʔlwny wʔštkḥt lʔylyn dlʔ bʕʔwny ʔmrt hʔ ʔnʔ hʔ ʔnʔ lʕmʔ dlʔ qrʔ šmy
65:02	pšṭt ʔydy ywmʔ klh ʕl ʕmʔ dlʔ mtṭpys dmhlkyn/wmhlkyn#3#/ \btr trʕythwn /btrʕythwn#3#/ bʔwrḥʔ dlʔ špyrʔ
65:03	ʕmʔ dmrgzyn ly ʔmynʔyt dbḥyn bgnʔ wsymyn bsmʔ/bsmnʔ#3#/ ʕl ʔbnʔ/ʔbbnʔ#3#/
65:04	wytbyn bqbrʔ wbytyn bmʕrʔ wʔklyn bsrʔ dḥzyrʔ wmṭwšyn/wmwšṭyn#3#/ bšldʔ mʔnyhwn lmšrʔ nmwsʔ wlmṭmʔw qymʔ qdyšʔ dnrgzwn lmryʔ
65:05	wʔmryn prwq lhl lʔ ttqrb ly mṭl dmqdš ʔnʔ hlyn hwy tnnʔ brwgzy wnwrʔ dyqdʔ bkl ywm
65:06	hʔ ktybʔ qdmy lʔ ʔštwq <ʔnwn#3#> ʕdmʔ dʔprwʕ ʔnwn ʔʕpʔ bʕwbhwn
65:07	ḥṭhyhwn wḥṭhʔ dʔbhyhwn ḥšqbwl ʔnwn <qdmy#3#> ʔmr mryʔ dsmw bsmʔ ʕl ṭwrʔ wʕl rmtʔ ḥsdwny ʔmšwḥ ʕbdyhwn lwqdm bʕwbhwn
65:08	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔyk dmštkḥʔ ṭwṭytʔ bsgwlʔ wʔmr ʔnš lḥbrh lʔ tḥblywhy mṭl dbwrktʔ ʔyt bh hknʔ ʔʕbd mṭl ʕbdy wlʔ ʔḥbl lklhwn
65:09	wʔpq zrʕʔ mn yʕqwb wmn yhwdʔ yrtʔ dṭwry/dqwdšy#3#/ wnʔrtwnh gbyy wʕbdy nʕmrwn tmn
65:10	wnhwʔ šrwnʔ dyrʔ/ldyrʔ#3#/ lʕnʔ/dʕnʔ#3#/ wʕwmqʔ dʕkr lmrbʕʔ dbqrʔ lʕmy dbʕʔwny
65:11	wʔntwn dšbqtwn lmryʔ wṭʕytwn ṭwrh/lṭwrh#3#/ qdyšʔ wmlytwn ptwrʔ lgdʔ/lgddʔ#3#/ wmzgtwn lhwn ʔgnʔ
65:12	ʔmnykwn/ʔmḥykwn#3#/ bḥrbʔ wklkwn bqṭlʔ tbrkwn ʕl/mṭl#3#/ dqryt wlʔ ʕnytwn wmllt wlʔ šmʕtwn wʕbdtwn dbyš qdmy wgbytwn mdm dlʔ ṣbʔ ʔnʔ
65:13	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ hʔ ʕbdy nʔklwn wʔntwn tkpnwn hʔ ʕbdy nštwn wʔntwn tṣhwn hʔ ʕbdy nḥdwn wʔntwn tbkwn
65:14	hʔ ʕbdy nšbḥwn/nštbḥwn#3#/ mn ṭbtʔ dlbhwn wʔntwn tbgnwn mn kʔbh dlbkwn wmn tbrh drwḥkwn <tyllwn#3#>
65:15	wtšbqwn šmkwn mwmtʔ/mwhbtʔ#3#/ lgbyy wnmytk mryʔ ʔlhʔ wlʕbdwhy nqrʔ šmʔ ʔḥrnʔ
65:16	dmtbrk bʔrʕʔ mtbrk bʔlhʔ ʔmyn wdymʔ bʔrʕʔ ymʔ bʔlhʔ ʔmyn mṭl dntṭʕyn ʕqtʔ qdmytʔ wntksyn mn qdmy
65:17	mṭwl dhʔ ʔnʔ brʔ ʔnʔ šmyʔ ḥdtʔ wʔrʕʔ ḥdtʔ wlʔ ntdkrwn qdmytʔ wlʔ nsqn ʕl lbʔ
65:18	ʔlʔ nḥdwn wndwṣwn lʕlm ʕlmyn dbrʔ ʔnʔ mṭl dhʔ <ʔnʔ#3#> brʔ ʔnʔ lʔwršlm dyṣʔ wbh ʔḥdʔ
65:19	wʔḥdʔ bʔwršlm wʔdwṣ bʕmy wtwb lʔ nštmʕ bh qlʔ dbktʔ wqlʔ dylltʔ
65:20	wtwb lʔ nhwʔ tmn ṭlʔ ywmtʔ wsbʔ dlʔ nmlʔ ywmth mṭl dṭlyʔ br mʔʔ šnyn nmwt wʔynʔ dḥṭʔ br mʔʔ šnyn ntlyṭ
65:21	wnbnwn btʔ wntbwn wnṣbwn krmʔ wnʔklwn <mn#3#> pʔryhwn
65:22	lʔ nbnwn wʔḥrnʔ ntbwn wlʔ nṣbwn wʔḥrnʔ nʔklwn mṭl dywmth dʕmy ʔyk ywmtʔ ʔnwn wʔylnʔ wʕbd ʔydyhwn nʔklwn gbyy
65:23	lʔ nlʔwn/nʔlwn#3#/ lsryqwtʔ wlʔ nwldwn llwṭtʔ mṭl dzrʕʔ ʔnwn brykh dmryʔ hnwn wbnyhwn ʕmhwn
65:24	wʕd lʔ nqrwn ʔʕnʔ ʔnwn wʕdlʔ nmllwn ʔšmʕ ʔnwn
65:25	dʔbʔ wʔmrʔ ʔkḥdʔ nrʕwn wʔryʔ ʔyk twrʔ nʔkwl tbnʔ wḥwyʔ ʕprʔ lḥmh wlʔ nbʔšwn wlʔ nḥblwn bklh \ṭwry qdyšʔ /ṭwrʔ dqwdšy#3#/ ʔmr mryʔ
66:01	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ šmyʔ kwrsy wʔrʕʔ kwbšʔ drgly/dtḥyt rgly#23#/ ʔynw bytʔ dbnyn ʔntwn ly ʔw ʔynw ʔtrʔ dnyḥty
66:02	hlyn klhyn ʔydy ʕbdt wdyly ʔnyn hlyn klhyn ʔmr mryʔ wbmn ʔḥwd wʔʕmr ʔlʔ bnyḥʔ wbmkyk rwḥʔ dzʔʕ mn mlty
66:03	dnks twrʔ ʔyl hw dqṭl gbrʔ ddbḥ ʔmrʔ ʔyk hw dqṭl klbʔ dmqrb smydʔ ʔyk dmʔ dḥzyrʔ dmqrb lbwntʔ ʔyk hw dmbrk lptkrʔ ʔp hnwn ʔtrʕyw bʔwrḥthwn wṣbt npšhwn bptkryhwn
66:04	ʔp ʔnʔ ʔṣbʔ bbwzḥhwn wʔprwʕ ʔnwn ʕbdyhwn ʕl dqryt wlyt dʕnʔ wmllt wlʔ šmʕw wʕbdw dbyš qdmy wgbw mdm dlʔ ṣbyt
66:05	šmʕw ptgmh dmryʔ ʔylyn dzyʕyn mn mlth ʔmrw lʔḥykwn snʔykwn mslynykwn mṭl šmy nštbḥ mryʔ wnḥdʔ bḥdwtkwn whnwn nbhtwn
66:06	qlʔ ddlwḥyʔ mn qrytʔ wqlʔ mn hyklʔ qlh dmryʔ dprʕ pwrʕnʔ lbʕldbbwhy
66:07	ʕdlʔ tḥbl dyldʔ wʕdlʔ nmṭwn ḥblyh wtplṭ dkrʔ
66:08	mn šmʕ ʔyk hdʔ wmn ḥzʔ ʔyk hlyn dmḥblʔ ʔrʕʔ bywmʔ ḥd wmtyld ʕmʔ bšʕtʔ ḥdʔ mṭl dḥblt wyldt ṣhywn lbnyh
66:09	ʔnʔ yhbt swkyʔ/swknʔ#2#/ hnʔ wlʔ/dlʔ#3#/ mwld ʔnʔ ʔmr mryʔ dlmʔ lʔ hwʔ ʔnʔ mwld ʔnʔ wklʔ ʔnʔ ʔmr ʔlhky
66:10	ḥdw bʔwršlm wdwṣw bh kwl rḥmyh ʔtbsmw ʕmh bbwsmʔ kl dhww bʔblʔ ʕlyh
66:11	wtʔnqwn/dtʔnqwn#3#/ wtsbʕwn mn tdʔ/tdʔʔ#23#/ dbwyʔh wtʔnqwn wttpnqwn mn ʕwšnʔ dʔyqrh
66:12	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hʔ rmʔ ʔnʔ ʕlyh šlmʔ ʔyk nhrʔ wʔyk nḥlʔ dgrp ʔyqrʔ dʕmmʔ tʔnqwn wʕl prywtʔ tštqlwn wʕl bwrkʔ ttrbwn
66:13	ʔyk gbrʔ dmbyʔʔ lh ʔmh hknʔ ʔnʔ ʔbyʔkwn wbʔwršlm ttbyʔwn
66:14	wtḥzwn/wtḥdwn#3#/ wnḥdʔ lbkwn wgrmykwn ʔyk tdʔʔ nrwzwn wttydʕ ʔydh dmryʔ ʕl ʕbdwhy wtwbd/wtwqd#3#/ lbʕldbbwhy
66:15	mṭl dhʔ mryʔ/ywmtʔ dmryʔ#3#/ bnwrʔ ʔtʔ wʔyk ʕlʕlʔ mrkbth dnhpwk/wnhpwk#3#/ bḥmtʔ/ḥmtʔ#3#/ drwgzh wkʔth šlhbytʔ dnwrʔ
66:16	mṭl dbnwrʔ dʔn mryʔ \wbḥr bh /wbḥrbh#3#/ lkl bsr wnsgwn qṭylwhy dmryʔ
66:17	dmtqdšyn wmtdkyn bgnʔ/sgyʔʔ#3#/ ḥd btr ḥd bmṣʕtʔ wʔklyn bsrʔ dḥzyrʔ wšrṣʔ wʕwqbrʔ ʔkḥdʔ nswpwn/nwspwn#3#/ ʔmr mryʔ
66:18	wʔnʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ ʕbdyhwn wtrʕyhwn mʔ dʔtyt lmknšw lklhwn ʕmmʔ wllšnʔ wnʔtwn wnḥzwn ʔyqry
66:19	wʔsym bhwn ʔtʔ wʔšdr mnhwn mšwzbʔ/mšwzbnʔ#3#/ lʕmmʔ ltršyš wlpwl wllwd dngdyn bqštʔ wltwbyl wlywn wlgzrtʔ/gzrtʔ#3#/ rḥyqtʔ dlʔ šmʕw šmy wlʔ ḥzw ʔyqry wnḥwwn ʔyqry bʕmmʔ
66:20	wnytywn lklhwn ʔḥykwn mn klhwn ʕmmʔ qwrbnʔ lmryʔ brkšʔ wbmrkbtʔ wbqrwkʔ/wbqwrwkʔ#23#/ lṭwrʔ dqwdšy lʔwršlm ʔmr mryʔ ʔyk dmytyn bny ʔysryl smydʔ bmʔnʔ dkyʔ lbyth dmryʔ
66:21	wʔp mnhwn ʔsb lkhnʔ wllwyʔ ʔmr mryʔ

66:24	wnpqwn wnḥzwn šldyhwn dgbrʔ dʔʕlyw by dlʔ mytʔ twlʕhwn wnwrhwn lʔ dʕkʔ wnhwwn dwmrʔ lkl bsr
99:99	šlm lmktb nbywth dʔšʕyʔ nbyʔ mšbḥʔ dnbyʔ
01:00	twb ktbʔ ʔḥrnʔ dʔrmyʔ nbyʔ
01:01	ptgmwhy dʔrmyʔ br ḥlqyʔ mn khnʔ dbʕntwt dbʔrʕʔ dbnymyn

01:03	whwʔ bywmwhy dywyqym br ywšyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ ʕdmʔ dšlm ḥdʕsrʔ šnyn lṣdqyʔ br ywšyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ ʕdmʔ dʔštbyt ʔwršlm byrḥʔ ḥmyšyʔ
01:04	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
01:05	ʕdlʔ ʔṣwrk bkrsʔ ʔydʕtk wʕdlʔ tpwq mn mrbʕʔ qdštk wnbyʔ lʕmmʔ yhbtk

01:10	ḥzy dʔšlṭtk ywmnʔ ʕl ʕmmʔ wʕl mlkwtʔ lmʕqr wlmstr wlmsḥpw wlmwbdw wlmbnʔ wlmṣb
01:11	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr mnʔ ḥzyt ʔrmyʔ wʔmrt ḥwṭrʔ dlwzʔ ḥzʔ ʔnʔ

01:16	wʔmll dyny ʕmhwn mṭl klhyn byšthwn dšbqwny wsmw bsmʔ lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ wsgdw lʕbd ʔydyhwn
01:17	wʔnt ʔswr ḥṣyk wqwm ʔmr lhwn klmdm dmpqd ʔnʔ lk lʔ tdḥl mnhwn dlmʔ ʔtbrk qdmyhwn
01:18	wʔnʔ hʔ ʕbdtk ywmnʔ ʔyk qrytʔ tqyptʔ wʔyk ʕmwdʔ dprzlʔ wʔyk šwrʔ dnḥšʔ ʕl klh ʔrʕʔ ʕl mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wʕl rwrbnyhwn wʕl khnyhwn wʕl nbyyhwn wʕl klh ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ

02:01	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
02:02	zl wʔkrz bʔdny ʔwršlm wʔmr hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔtdkrt lky ṭybwtʔ dṭlywtky rḥmtʔ dmsybrnwtky kd hlkty btry bmdbrʔ bʔrʕʔ dlʔ mzdrʕʔ
02:03	qdš ʔysryl lmryʔ ryš ʕllth kwl ʔkwlyhwn ntḥybwn byštʔ tʔtʔ ʕlyhwn ʔmr mryʔ

02:06	wlʔ ʔmrw dʔykʔ hw mryʔ dʔsqn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wdbrn bmdbrʔ bʔrʕʔ ḥrbtʔ wšhytʔ bʔrʕʔ ṣdytʔ dṭlly mwtʔ bʔrʕʔ dlʔ ʕbr bh gbr wlʔ ytb br ʔnš tmn

02:16	ʔp bny mps wtḥpys nrʕwnky ryšʔ ryšʔ

02:19	trdyky byštky wtybwtky tksky wdʕy wḥzy dbyš wmryr ʕl dšbqty lmryʔ ʔlhky wlʔ dḥlty mny ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ ḥyltnʔ
02:20	mṭl dmn ʕlm tbrt nyrky wpsqt ḥnqyky wʔhrty dtwb lʔlh ʔḥryn lʔ ʔplwḥ whʔ ʕl kwl rmtʔ drmʔ wtḥyt kl ʔyln dʕbyṭ ʔnty ṭʕyʔ wmznyʔ
02:21	wʔnʔ nṣbtky šbwqʔ dklh zrʕʔ dqwštʔ wʔyknʔ ʔthpkty ʕly wmrdty ʔyk gptʔ nwkrytʔ

02:25	kly rglyky mn ḥpyywtʔ wggrtky mn ṣhyʔ wʔmrty ʔtḥylt lʔ ṣbyʔ ʔnʔ mṭl drḥmt nwkryʔ wbtrhwn ʔzl

02:35	wʔmrty dmḥsyʔ ʔnʔ mṭl hnʔ ʔhpk rwgzh mny hʔ dʔn ʔnʔ lky ʕl dʔmrty lʔ ḥṭyt

03:01	ʔn nšbwq gbrʔ ʔntth wtʔzl mn lwth wthwʔ lgbrʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔn mtpnʔ lwth twb hʔ mtṭnpw {ttṭnpw}<ttṭnp> ʔrʕʔ hy wʔnty znyty brʕwtʔ sgyʔʔ twby lwty ʔmr mryʔ

03:19	wʔnʔ ʔmrt dʔḥšbk bbnyʔ wʔtl lk ʔrʕʔ gbytʔ wyrtwtʔ dḥylʔ dḥylwtʔ dʕmmʔ wʔmrt ʔby tqrwnny wmn btry lʔ thpkwn

04:01	ʔn ttwb ʔysryl ʔmr mryʔ lwty ttwb wʔn tʕbr ṭnpwtk mn qdmy lʔ tzwʕ

04:04	gzwrw lmryʔ wʔʕbrw ʕwrlwtʔ dlbkwn gbrʔ dyhwdʔ wʕmwryh dʔwršlm dlmʔ tpwq ʔyk nwrʔ ḥmty wtwqd wlyt dmdʕk mṭl byšwtʔ dʕbdykwn

04:10	wʔmrt bbʕw mryʔ ʔlhʔ šryrʔyt mṭʕyw ʔṭʕyt lʕmʔ hnʔ wlʔwršlm dʔmrt šlmʔ nhwʔ lkwn whʔ qrbt ḥrbʔ ʕdmʔ lnpšʔ
04:11	bh bzbnʔ hw ntʔmr lʕmʔ hnʔ wlʔwršlm ʔyk rwḥʔ ṭʕytʔ dbšbylʔ dmdbrʔ ʔwrḥh dbrt ʕmy lʔ lmdrʔ wlʔ lmḥml
04:12	rwḥʔ dmlyʔ mn hlyn tʔtʔ ly mkyl ʔp ʔnʔ ʔmll dyny ʕmhwn
04:13	hʔ ʔyk ʕnnʔ nsq wʔyk ʕlʕlʔ mrkbth qlylyn mn nšrʔ rkšh wy ln dʔtbzzn
04:14	ʔšyg lbky mn byštʔ ʔwršlm mṭwl dttprqyn ʕdmʔ lʔmty nbwt bgwky mḥšbtky byštʔ
04:15	mṭl dqlʔ dmḥwʔ mn dn wmšmʕ kʔbʔ mn ṭwrʔ dʔprym
04:16	ʔtdkrw lʕmmʔ wʔšmʕw lʔwršlm hʔ knšʔ ʔtyn mn ʔrʕʔ rḥyqtʔ wnrymwn qlhwn ʕl qwryʔ dyhwdʔ
04:17	ʔyk nṭry ḥqltʔ hww ʕlyh mn ḥdryh mṭl dly mrmrt ʔmr mryʔ
04:18	ʔwrḥtky wʕbdyky ʕbdw lky hlyn hdʔ hy byštky dmrt wqrbt ʕdmʔ llbky
04:19	mʕy mʕy kybyn ly wtlwty lby mšwr lby wlʔ štq mṭl dqlʔ dšypwrʔ šmʕt npšy wywbbʔ dqrbʔ
04:20	tbrʔ ʕl tbrʔ nʔtʔ mṭl dʔtbzt klh ʔrʕʔ mn šly ʔtbzz mškny wnpl yryʕty
04:21	ʕdmʔ lʔmty ʔḥzʔ ldʕrq wʔšmʕ qlʔ dšypwrʔ
04:22	mṭl dšṭw ʕmy wly lʔ ydʕw bnyʔ ʔnwn sklʔ wlʔ hww ḥkymʔ ḥkymyn ʔnwn lbyštʔ wṭbtʔ lʔ ydʕyn
04:23	ḥrt bʔrʕʔ whʔ twh wbwh wlšmyʔ wlyt nwhrhwn
04:24	ḥzyt ṭwrʔ whʔ zyʕyn wklhyn rmtʔ ʔtprq
04:25	ḥrt whʔ lyt brnš wklh prḥtʔ dšmyʔ prdt
04:26	ḥzyt whʔ krmlʔ ḥrb ʔyk mdbrʔ wkwlhyn qwryh ʔtʕbr mn qdm mryʔ wmn qdm ḥmtʔ drwgzh
04:27	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ lḥblʔ thwʔ klh ʔrʕʔ wgmwryʔ lʔ ʔʕbd
04:28	mṭl hlyn ttʔbl ʔrʕʔ wnḥškwn šmyʔ mn lʕl kl dmllt wʔtrʕyt lʔ ʔttwʔ wlʔ ʔhpk mnh
04:29	mn qlʔ dpršʔ wdšdyn bqštʔ ʕrqt klh qrytʔ ʕlw bʕbʔ wbšqypʔ slqw klhyn qwryʔ ʔštbq wlyt br ʔnš dytb bhyn
04:30	wʔnty bzyztʔ mnʔ tʕbdyn kd tlbšyn zḥwrytʔ kd tṣṭbtyn btṣbytʔ ddhbʔ kd tkḥlyn bṣdydʔ ʕynyky lsryqwtʔ hw mṣṭbtʔ ʔnty šbqwky ḥbryky wnpšky bʕyn
04:31	mṭl dqlʔ ʔyk kryhtʔ šqmty wʕqtʔ ʔyk ʔnttʔ dmḥblʔ lmʔld qlʔ dbrt ṣhywn dmtṭrpʔ wmprsʔ ʔydyh wʔmrʔ wy ly dʔtṭrpt npšy ʕl qṭyly
05:01	ʔtkrkw bšwqyh dʔwršlm wḥzw wdʕw wbʕw bplṭwth ʔn tškḥwn gbrʔ ʔn ʔyt dʕbd dynʔ wbʕʔ hymnwtʔ ʔšbwq lh
05:02	wʔn ḥy mryʔ nʔmrwn šryrʔyt bdglwtʔ ymyn
05:03	mryʔ ʕynyk ʕl hymnwtʔ mḥyt ʔnwn wlʔ ʔtkrhw gmrt ʔnwn wlʔ ṣbw lmqblw mrdwtʔ qšyw ʔpyhwn mn kʔpʔ wlʔ ṣbw lmtb
05:04	wʔnʔ ʔmrt mṭl dmskynyn ʔnwn sṭw mṭl dlʔ ydʕw ʔwrḥh dmryʔ wdynʔ dʔlhhwn
05:05	ʔzl ly lwt rwrbnʔ wʔmll ʕmhwn mṭl dhnwn ydʕw ʔwrḥh dmryʔ wdynʔ dʔlhhwn šryrʔyt klhwn ʔyk ḥdʔ tbrw nyrʔ wpsqw ḥnqʔ
05:06	mṭl hnʔ ntbr ʔnwn ʔryʔ mn ʕbʔ wdʔby rmšʔ nbzʕwn ʔnwn nmrʔ nkmn ʕl qwryhwn kl dnpwq mnhwn nttbr mṭl dsgyw ḥwbyhwn wʕšnw dlʔ ntwbwn
05:07	ʕl ʔydʔ ʔšbwq lky bnyky šbqwky wʔymw bʔylyn dlʔ hww ʔlhʔ wsbʕt ʔnwn wgrw wbyt znytʔ ʔtktšw
05:08	ʔyk rkšʔ ʔwšnʔ ʕhrʔ hww gbr ʕl ʔntt ḥbrh ṣhlyn hww
05:09	ʕl hlyn lʔ ʔpqwd ʔmr mryʔ wbʕmʔ dhknʔ lʔ ttnqm npšy
05:10	sqw bšwryh wʕqwrw wgmwryʔ lʔ tʕbdwn šbwqw štʔsyh mṭl ddmryʔ ʔnyn
05:11	mṭl dmdglw dglw by bny ʔysryl wbny yhwdʔ ʔmr mryʔ
05:12	dglw bmryʔ wʔmryn lʔ hwʔ hw lʔ tʔtʔ ʕlyn byštʔ wḥrbʔ wkpnʔ lʔ nḥzʔ
05:13	wnbyʔ nhwwn lʕlʕlʔ wʔylyn dmltʔ lyt lhwn hknʔ ntʕbd lhwn
05:14	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ ḥyltnʔ ḥlp dmlltwn mltʔ hdʔ hʔ yhb ʔnʔ ptgmy bpwmk nwrʔ wʕmʔ hnʔ qysʔ wtʔkwl ʔnwn
05:15	hʔ mytʔ ʔnʔ ʕlykwn byt ʔysryl ʕmʔ mn rwḥqʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʕmʔ hw ʕšynʔ ʕmʔ hw dmn ʕlmʔ ʕmʔ dlʔ tdʕy lšnh wlʔ tšmʕ mdm dmmll
05:16	ggrth ʔyk qbrʔ ptyḥn wklhwn gnbryn
05:17	nʔkwl ḥṣdk wlḥmk wnʔkwl bnyk wbntk nʔkwl ʕnk wtwryk nʔkwl gwpnyk wtʔnyk nmskn qwryʔ dtwqpk dʔnt tkyl ʕlyhyn bḥrbʔ
05:18	wʔp bywmtʔ hnwn ʔmr mryʔ lʔ ʔsypkwn
05:19	wnhwʔ kd tʔmrwn mṭl mnʔ ʕbd ln mryʔ ʔlhn hlyn klhyn tʔmr lhwn hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʕl dšbqtwnny wplḥtwn lʔlhʔ nwkryʔ bʔrʕkwn hknʔ tplḥwn lnwkryʔ bʔrʕʔ dlʔ dylkwn
05:20	ḥww hdʔ bbyt yʕqwb wʔšmʕwh byhwdʔ wʔmrw
05:21	šmʕw hdʔ ʕmʔ sklʔ dlyt bh lbʔ dʕynʔ ʔyt lhwn wlʔ ḥzyn wʔdnʔ ʔyt lhwn wlʔ šmʕyn
05:22	mny lʔ tdḥlwn ʔmr mryʔ wmn qdmy lʔ tzwʕwn dsmt ḥlʔ tḥwmʔ lymʔ nmwsʔ lʕlm wlʔ ʕbr lh wmtktš wlʔ mškḥ wmttrymyn gllwhy wlʔ ʕbryn lh
05:23	wlʕmʔ hnʔ hwʔ lbʔ mrwdʔ wmmrmrnʔ sṭw wʔzlw
05:24	wlʔ ʔmrw blbhwn dndḥl lmryʔ ʔlhn dyhb mṭrʔ bkyryʔ wlqyšyʔ bzbnh wʕlltʔ dqyṭʔ lstwʔ nṭr ln
05:25	ḥwbykwn ṣlw ʕlykwn hlyn wḥṭhykwn klw ṭbtʔ mnkwn
05:26	mṭl dʔštkḥw bʕmy ḥṭyʔ wʔqymw pḥʔ ʔyk sygʔ dnttḥdwn bhwn bny ʔnšʔ
05:27	wʔyk ʔqlwbyʔ dmlʔ prḥtʔ hknʔ btyhwn mlyn nklʔ mṭl hnʔ yrbw wʕtrw
05:28	wʕbrw ʕl dynʔ dynʔ lʔ dnw wdynʔ dytmʔ lʔ trṣw wdynʔ dbyšʔ lʔ dnw
05:29	ʕl hlyn lʔ ʔpqwd ʔmr mryʔ wbʕmʔ dhknʔ lʔ ttnqm npšy
05:30	tmhʔ wšṭywtʔ hwʔ bʔrʕʔ
05:31	nbyʔ ʔtnbyw šwqrʔ wkhnʔ ʔḥdw ʔydyhwn wʕmy rḥm hknʔ wmnʔ tʕbdwn lḥrtʔ
06:01	gzw bny bnymyn mn gw ʔwršlm wbqlʔ qryw šypwrʔ wʕl byt krm šqlw ʔtʔ mṭl dbyštʔ mytʔ ʔnʔ mn grbyʔ wtbrʔ rbʔ
06:02	lmʕdntʔ wlmpnqtʔ dmyty brt ṣhywn
06:03	ʕlyh nʔtwn rʕwtʔ wgzryhwn ʔyk ḥdʔ wnqšwn ʕlyh mšknyhwn kd ḥdrʔ wnrʕwn gbr lgbh
06:04	ṭybw ʕlyh qrbʔ wnʔmrwn qwmw nsq bṭhrʔ wy ln dpnʔ ywmʔ wrknw ṭlly rmšʔ
06:05	qwmw nsq ʕlyh bllyʔ wnḥbl sḥrth
06:06	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ pswqw qysyh wʔkmnw ʕl ʔwršlm kmʔnʔ hy qrytʔ dʔtpqdt wklh ʕwšqh bgwh
06:07	ʔyk dknš gwbʔ mwhy hknʔ knšt byšth ḥṭwpyʔ wbztʔ mštmʕ bh qdm ʔpy ʔmynʔyt
06:08	bkʔbʔ wbmḥwtʔ ʔtrdy ʔwršlm dlmʔ tnd npšy mnky dlmʔ ʔʕbdky lḥwrbʔ ʔyk ʔrʕʔ dlʔ ʔtytbt
06:09	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ mtbʕrw ntbʕrwn ʔyk gptʔ šrkh dʔysryl ʔhpk ʔydk ʔyk qṭwpʔ ʕl bwʕrʔ
06:10	lmn ʔmr wʔshd dnšmʕwn hʔ ʔdnyhwn ʕwrln wlʔ mškḥyn lmṣt hʔ ptgmh dmryʔ hwʔ lhwn lḥsdʔ wlʔ ṣbyn bh
06:11	wʔnty ḥmth dmryʔ ʔtmlyty wlʔyty ʔkyly wʔšwdy ʕl ṭlyʔ bšwqʔ wʕl knwštʔ dgdwdʔ ʔkḥdʔ mṭl dʔp gbrʔ ʕm nšʔ nttḥdwn wsbʔ ʕm ṭlʔ ywmtʔ
06:12	ntyhbwn btyhwn lʔḥrnʔ wḥqltʔ wnšʔ ʔkḥdʔ mṭl dmrym ʔnʔ ʔydy ʕl ʕmwryh dʔrʕʔ ʔmr mryʔ
06:13	mṭl dmn zʕwrhwn wʕdmʔ lrbhwn klhwn nklyn nklʔ wmn nbyʔ dglʔ wʕdmʔ lkhnʔ klhwn ʕbdyn šwqrʔ
06:14	wmʔsyn tbrh dbrt ʕmy bbzḥʔ wʔmryn šlmʔ šlmʔ wlyt šlmʔ
06:15	bhtw mṭl dṭnpwtʔ ʕbdw wbhytʔ lʔ bhtyn wlmttksw lʔ ydʕyn mṭl hnʔ nplwn ʕm nplʔ wbzbnʔ dmtpqdyn nstḥpwn ʔmr mryʔ
06:16	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ qwmw ʕl ʔwrḥtʔ wḥzw wšʔlw ʕl šbyly ʕlmʔ wḥzw ʔydʔ ʔwrḥʔ špyrʔ zlw bh wʔškḥw nyḥʔ lnpštkwn wʔmrw lʔ ʔzlyn ḥnn
06:17	wʔqymt ʕlykwn dwqʔ dtšmʕwn lql šypwrʔ wʔmryn ʔntwn lʔ šmʕyn ḥnn
06:18	mṭl hnʔ šmʕw ʕmmʔ wdʕy ʕdtʔ dbhwn
06:19	šmʕy ʔrʕʔ hʔ mytʔ ʔnʔ byštʔ ʕl ʕmʔ hnʔ ʔyk pʔry mḥšbthwn dlptgmy lʔ šmʕw wlnmwsy ʔslyw
06:20	lmnʔ hwyʔ ly lbwntʔ dmytyn ʔntwn mn šbʔ wqnyʔ dbsmʔ mn ʔrʕʔ rḥyqtʔ bʕlwtkwn lʔ ṣbyt wdbḥykwn lʔ bsmw ly
06:21	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hʔ yhb ʔnʔ lʕmʔ hnʔ twqltʔ wnttqlwn bhyn ʔbhʔ wbnyʔ ʔkḥdʔ wšbbʔ wrḥmh nʔbdwn
06:22	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hʔ ʕmʔ ʔtʔ mn ʔrʕʔ dgrbyʔ wʕmʔ rbʔ ndwl mn swpyh dʔrʕʔ
06:23	bqšttʔ wbnyzkʔ mzynyn byšyn ʔnwn wlʔ mrḥmnyn qlhwn ʔyk ymʔ dmtktš wʕl rkšʔ rkybyn wmṭybyn ʔyk gnbrʔ lqrbʔ ʕlyky brt ṣhywn
06:24	šmʕn šmʕhwn wʔtrpy ʔydyn wʕqtʔ ʔḥdtn wḥblʔ ʔyk dyldtʔ
06:25	lʔ tpqwn lḥqlʔ wbʔwrḥʔ lʔ tʔzlwn mṭl ḥrbʔ dbʕldbbʔ dkrykʔ mn ḥdryky
06:26	brt ʕmy ʔtkbny sqʔ wʔtplply bqṭmʔ ʔblʔ ʔyk dʕl ʔyḥydyʔ ʕbdy lky wmrqwdtʔ mryrtʔ mṭl dmn šlyʔ nʔtwn ʕlyky bzwzʔ
06:27	bḥwrʔ yhbtk bʕmy ʕšynʔ dtdʕ wtbḥn ʔwrḥthwn
06:28	klhwn šlyṭnyhwn mrwdyn wmhlkyn bnklʔ wʔyk nḥšʔ wprzlʔ klhwn mḥblnyn
06:29	grdy mpwḥʔ mn nwrhwn wʔbrʔ wsryqʔyt ṣrp ṣrwpʔ wbyšthwn lʔ gmrʔ
06:30	kspʔ mslyʔ qrw ʔnwn mṭl dʔsly ʔnwn mryʔ
07:01	ptgmʔ dhwʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ mn qdm mryʔ lmʔmr
07:02	qwm btrʕ byth dmryʔ wqry tmn ptgmʔ hnʔ wʔmr šmʕw ptgmh dmryʔ klhwn dbyt yhwdʔ dʕʔlyn btrʕʔ hlyn lmsgd lmryʔ
07:03	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʔṭʔbw ʔwrḥtkwn wʕbdykwn wʔšrykwn bʔtrʔ hnʔ
07:04	wlʔ ttklwn lkwn ʕl ptgmʔ dšwqrʔ dʔmryn lkwn hyklh dmryʔ hyklh dmryʔ hyklh ʔntwn dmryʔ
07:05	ʔn tšprwn ʔwrḥtkwn wʕbdykwn wʔn tʕbdwn dynʔ byt gbrʔ lḥbrh
07:06	wlʕmwrʔ wlytmʔ wlʔrmltʔ lʔ tʕlbwn wlʔ tṭlmwn wdmʔ zkyʔ lʔ tʔšdwn bʔtrʔ hnʔ wbtr ʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ lʔ tʔzlwn dnbʔš lkwn
07:07	wʔšrykwn bʔtrʔ hnʔ bʔrʕʔ dyhbt lʔbhykwn mn ʕlm wʕdmʔ lʕlm
07:08	whʔ ʔntwn mttklyn ʕl ptgmʔ dšwqrʔ dlʔ mwtryn
07:09	gnbyn ʔntwn wqṭwlyn ʔntwn wgyryn ʔntwn wymyn ʔntwn bšmy bšwqrʔ wsymyn ʔntwn bsmʔ lbʕlʔ wʔzlyn ʔntwn btr ʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ dlʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn
07:10	wʔtyn ʔntwn wqymyn ʔntwn qdmy bbytʔ hnʔ dʔtqry šmy ʕlwhy wʔmryn ʔntwn pṣn wʕbdyn ʔntwn hlyn klhyn byštʔ
07:11	dlmʔ mʕrtʔ dgnbʔ hwʔ bytʔ hnʔ dʔtqry šmy ʕlwhy bʕynykwn wʔp ʔnʔ hʔ ḥzyt ʔmr mryʔ
07:12	mṭl hnʔ zlw lʔtry dbšylw dʔšryt šmy tmn bqdmytʔ wḥzw mdm dʕbdt lh mṭl byšwth dʕmy ʔysrʔyl
07:13	whšʔ ḥlp dʕbdtwn ʕbdʔ hlyn klhwn ʔmr mryʔ wqdmt wʔmrt lkwn wlʔ šmʕtwn wqryt lkwn wlʔ ʕnytwn
07:14	ʔʕbdywhy lbytʔ hnʔ dʔtqry šmy ʕlwhy dʔntwn tkylyn ʕlwhy wlqrytʔ dyhbt lkwn wlʔbhykwn ʔyk dʕbdt lšylw
07:15	wʔšdykwn mn qdm ʔpy ʔyk dšdyt lklhwn ʔḥykwn lklh zrʕh dʔprym
07:16	wʔnt lʔ tṣlʔ ʕl ʕmʔ hnʔ wlʔ tbʕʔ ʕlyhwn wlʔ tbʕʔ mny mṭl dlʔ šmʕ ʔnʔ lk
07:17	lʔ ḥzʔ ʔnt mdm dʕbdyn bqwryʔ dywhdʔ wbšwqyh dʔwršlm
07:18	bnyʔ mlqṭyn qysʔ wʔbhʔ mwqdyn nwrʔ wnšʔ lyšn lyšʔ lmʕbd zwtrʔ lpwlḥn šmyʔ wlmnqyw nwqyʔ lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ dnrgzwnny
07:19	lʔ hwʔ ly mrgzyn ʔmr mryʔ ʔlʔ lnpšhwn dnbhtn ʔpyhwn
07:20	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ hʔ rwgzy wḥmty mttnyḥyn ʕl ʔtrʔ hnʔ ʕl bny ʔnšʔ wʕl bʕyrʔ wʕl ʔylnʔ ddbrʔ wʕl pʔrʔ dʔrʕʔ wtwqd wlʔ tdʕk
07:21	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʕlwthwn ʔwspw ʕl dbḥyhwn wʔklw bsrʔ
07:22	dlʔ ʔmrt lʔbhyhwn wlʔ pqdt ʔnwn bywmʔ dʔpqt ʔnwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn lʔ ʕl ʕltʔ wlʔ ʕl dbḥʔ
07:23	ʔlʔ ʔnʔ hnʔ ptgmʔ pqdt ʔnwn wʔmrt šmʕw bqly wʔhwʔ lkwn ʔlhʔ wʔntwn thwwn ly ʕmʔ whlkw bkl ʔwrḥʔ dmpqd ʔnʔ lkwn dnṭʔb lkwn
07:24	wlʔ šmʕw wlʔ ʔrknw ʔdnhwn lmšmʕ ʔlʔ ʔzlw btr trʕythwn wbtr ṣbyy lbhwn byšʔ whpkw lbstrhwn wlʔ lqdmyhwn
07:25	mn ywmʔ dnpqw ʔbhyhwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wʕdmʔ lywmnʔ wšdrt lwthwn klhwn ʕbdy nbyʔ bklywm qdmt wšdrt
07:26	wlʔ šmʕw wlʔ ʔrknw ʔdnhwn lwty wqšyw qdlhwn ṭb mn ʔbhyhwn
07:27	wtʔmr lhwn hlyn klhwn ptgmʔ wlʔ nšmʕwnk wqrʔ ʔnt lhwn wlʔ ʕnyn lk
07:28	ʔbdt hymnwtʔ wgzt mn pwmhwn
07:29	gwzy sʕrky wšdy wšqwl ʕl šbylʔ ʔwlytʔ drgz mryʔ wšbqh ldrʔ ʕbwrʔ
07:30	mṭl dʕbdw bny yhwdʔ dbyš qdmy ʔmr mryʔ smw ṭnpwthwn bbytʔ dʔtqry šmy ʕlwhy wṭnpwhy
07:31	wbnw ʕlwtʔ btpt dbnḥlʔ dbrhnwm lmwqdw bnyhwn wbnthwn bnwrʔ dlʔ pqdt ʔnwn wlʔ slqt ʕl lby
07:32	mṭl hnʔ hʔ ywmtʔ ʔtyn ʔmr mryʔ wlʔ ntʔmr twb tpt wnḥlʔ dbrhnwm ʔlʔ ʔn nḥlʔ dqṭylʔ wnqbrwn btpt mn bly ʔtrʔ
07:33	wnhwyn šldyhwn dʕmʔ hnʔ mʔkwltʔ lprḥtʔ dšmyʔ wlḥywtʔ dʔrʕʔ wlyt mpṣynʔ
07:34	wʔbṭl mn qwryʔ dyhwdʔ wmn šwqyh dʔwršlm qlʔ ddyṣʔ wqlʔ dḥdwtʔ qlʔ dḥtnʔ wqlʔ dkltʔ mṭl dlḥwrbʔ thwʔ klh ʔrʕʔ
08:01	bzbnʔ hw ʔmr mryʔ npqwn grmʔ dmlkʔ dyhwdʔ wgrmʔ drwrbnyhwn wgrmʔ dkhnyhwn wgrmʔ dnbyyhwn wgrmʔ dʕmwryh dʔwršlm mn qbryhwn
08:02	wnšṭḥwn ʔnwn lšmšʔ wlshrʔ wlkwl ḥylwtʔ dšmyʔ drḥmw ʔnwn wplḥw ʔnwn wʔzlw btrhwn wšʔlw bhwn wsgdw lhwn lʔ ntknšwn wlʔ ntqbrwn ʔlʔ ʔyk zblʔ ʕl ʔpy ʔrʕʔ nhwwn
08:03	wngbwn lhwn mwtʔ mn ḥyʔ kl šrkʔ dʔštḥrw mn šrbtʔ hdʔ byštʔ bkl ʔtrwtʔ dbdrt ʔnwn ltmn ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ
08:04	wtʔmr lhwn hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ nplwn wlʔ nqwmwn wʔn ntwbwn lʔ ntwbwn
08:05	mṭl mnʔ tb ʕmʔ hnʔ lʔwršlm tybwtʔ ḥṣyptʔ ḥmsnw bnklʔ wlʔ ṣbw lmtb
08:06	ʔṣtt wšmʕt wlʔ hwʔ kʔnʔyt mmllyn lyt gyr dnttwʔ ʕl byšth wnʔmr mnʔ ʕbdt klhwn mhlkyn bṣbynhwn ʔyk swsyʔ dngd bqrbʔ
08:07	ʔp ḥwrbʔ bšmyʔ ydʕʔ zbnh wšwpnynʔ wkwrkyʔ wsnwnytʔ nṭryn zbnʔ dmʕlhwn wʕmy lʔ ydʕw dynh dmryʔ
08:08	ʔyknʔ ʔmryn ʔntwn dḥkymʔ ḥnn wnmwsh dmryʔ ʕmn šryrʔyt ldglwtʔ ʕbyd qnyʔ dglʔ lsprʔ
08:09	bhtw ḥkymʔ wʔttbrw wʔttḥdw mṭl dptgmh dmryʔ ʔslyw wḥkmtʔ lʔ hwt bhwn
08:10	mṭl hnʔ ʔtl nšyhwn lʔḥrnʔ wḥqlthwn lbztʔ mṭl dmn zʕwrhwn wʕdmʔ lrbhwn klhwn nklyn nklʔ wmn nbyʔ dglʔ wʕdmʔ lkhnʔ klhwn ʕbdyn šwqrʔ
08:11	wmʔsyn tbrh dbrt ʕmy bbzḥʔ wʔmryn šlmʔ šlmʔ wlyt šlmʔ
08:12	bhtw mṭl dṭnpwtʔ ʕbdw wbhytʔ lʔ bhtyn wlmttksw lʔ ydʕyn mṭl hnʔ nplwn ʕm nplʔ wbzbnʔ dmtpqdyn nstḥpwn ʔmr mryʔ
08:13	mspw ʔsyp ʔnwn ʔmr mryʔ lyt ʕnbʔ bgptʔ wlʔ tʔnʔ bttʔ wṭrpʔ ntrw wyhbt lhwn wʕbrw ʔnwn
08:14	wnʔmrwn ʕl mnʔ ytbyn ḥnn ʔtknšw wnʕwl lqwryʔ ʕšyntʔ wnštwq tmn mṭl dmryʔ ʔlhn štqn wʔšqyn myʔ mryrʔ ʕl dḥṭyn lmryʔ
08:15	skyn lšlmʔ wlyt ṭbtʔ wlzbnʔ dʔsywtʔ whwt lh ʕqtʔ
08:16	mn dn ʔštmʕ ṣhlʔ drkšh mn qlʔ dmmllʔ dgnbrwhy zʕt klh ʔrʕʔ wʔtw wʔklw ʔrʕʔ wmlʔh qrytʔ wʕmwryh
08:17	mṭl dhʔ mšdr ʔnʔ ʕlykwn ḥwwtʔ ḥrmnʔ dlʔ mqblyn lwḥštʔ wnnktwnkwn ʔmr mryʔ
08:18	blyt bʕqty wlby dwʔ ʕly
08:19	hʔ ql gʕth dbrt ʕmy mn ʔrʕʔ rḥyqtʔ dʔmryn mryʔ lyt bṣhywn ʔw mlkh lyt bh mṭwl dʔrgzwny bglypyhwn wbdḥltʔ nwkrytʔ
08:20	ʕbr ḥsdʔ wgmr qṭpʔ wḥnn lʔ ʔtprqn
08:21	ʕl tbrh dbrt ʕmy ʔtkmrt wtmhʔ ʔḥdny
08:22	šʕwtʔ lyt bglʕd ʔw ʔsyʔ lyt tmn mṭl mnʔ lʔ slqt ʔsywth dbrt ʕmy
08:23	mn dyn yhb ryšy myʔ wʕyny mbwʕʔ ddmʕtʔ wbkyt dyn bʔymmʔ wbllyʔ ʕl qṭylʔ dbrt ʕmy
09:01	mn dyn šbqny bmdbrʔ byt bwtʔ dʕbry ʔwrḥʔ wšbqt lʕmy wʔzlt ly mn lwthwn mṭl dklhwn gyryn wknwštʔ ʔnwn ddglʔ
09:02	wšdw lšnhwn ʔyk dbqšthwn bšwqrʔ wlʔ bhymnwtʔ ʕšnw bʔrʕʔ mṭl dmn byštʔ lbyštʔ npqw wly lʔ ydʕw ʔmr mryʔ
09:03	gbr mn ḥbrh ʔzdhrw wʕl kl ʔḥy lʔ ttklwn mṭl dkl ʔḥy mnkl nkl wkl rḥmʔ bnklʔ mhlk
09:04	wgbr bḥbrh mdglyn wqwštʔ lʔ mmllyn ʔlpw lšnhwn lmmllw šwqrʔ wʔtṭrpw wlʔyw
09:05	mwtbk bgw nklʔ bnklhwn lʔ ṣbw lmdʕny ʔmr mryʔ
09:06	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ hʔ ṣrp ʔnʔ lhwn wbḥr ʔnʔ lhwn mṭl dʔyknʔ ʔʕbd mn qdm brt ʕmy
09:07	ʔyk gʔrʔ šnynʔ lšnhwn wnklʔ mmll bpwmh šlmʔ gbr ʕm ḥbrh mmll wbgwh kmyn kmʔnʔ
09:08	ʕl hlyn lʔ ʔpqwd ʔmr mryʔ wbʕmʔ dhknʔ lʔ ttnqm npšy
09:09	ʕl ṭwrʔ šqwlw bktʔ wʔwlytʔ wʕl dyrʔ dmdbrʔ ʔwlytʔ dṣdy mn bly ʔnš dʕbr wlʔ šmʕ qlʔ dqnynʔ mn prḥtʔ dšmyʔ wʕdmʔ lbʕyrʔ ʔtbdrw wʔzlw
09:10	wʔʕbdyh lʔwršlm ḥrbtʔ mʕmrʔ lyrwrʔ wqwryʔ dyhwdʔ ʔtl lḥwrbʔ mn bly dytb
09:11	mnw gbrʔ dḥkym nstkl hdʔ wdmlt pwmh dmryʔ ʕlwhy nḥwyh ʕl mnʔ ʔbdt ʔrʕʔ wṣdt ʔyk mdbrʔ mn bly dʕbr
09:12	wʔmr mryʔ ʕl dšbqw nmwsy dyhbt lhwn wlʔbhyhwn wlʔ šmʕw bqly wlʔ hlkw bh
09:13	wʔzlw btr ṣbyny lbhwn byšʔ wbtr ptkrʔ dʔlpw ʔnwn ʔbhyhwn
09:14	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl hʔ mwkl ʔnʔ lhwn lʕmʔ hnʔ mrrʔ wʔšqʔ ʔnwn myʔ mryrʔ
09:15	wʔbdr ʔnwn bʕmmʔ dlʔ ydʕw ʔnwn hnwn wʔbhyhwn wʔšdr btrhwn ḥrbʔ ʕdmʔ dʔgmr ʔnwn
09:16	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ qrw lʔlytʔ wnʔtyn wʕl ḥkymtʔ šdrw wnʔtyn
09:17	wnstrhbn wnšqln ʕlyn ʔwlytʔ wnḥtn ʕynyn dmʕʔ wbbtn nrdyn myʔ
09:18	mṭl dqlʔ dʔwlytʔ ʔštmʕ mn ṣhywn dʔmr ʔyknʔ ʔtbzzn bhtn ṭb ṭb mṭl dšbqn ʔrʕʔ wnplw mšknyn
09:19	mṭl hnʔ šmʕyn nšʔ ptgmh dmryʔ wnqbln ʔdnykyn mlt pwmh wʔlpyn bntkyn ʔwlytʔ wʔnttʔ lḥbrth qyntʔ
09:20	mṭl dslq mwtʔ lkwyn wʕl bsḥrtn lmwbdw ṭlyʔ mn šwqʔ wʕlymʔ mn plṭwtʔ
09:21	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ npln šldyhwn dbnynšʔ ʔyk zblʔ ʕl ʔpy ḥqlʔ wʔyk ʕmyrʔ btr ḥṣwdʔ wlyt mknšnʔ
09:22	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ lʔ nštbhr ḥkymʔ bḥkmth wlʔ nštbhr gnbrʔ bgnbrwth wlʔ nštbhr ʕtyrʔ bʕwtrh
09:23	ʔlʔ bhdʔ nštbhr mn dmštbhr mn dmstkl wydʕ ly dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʕbd ṭybwtʔ wdynʔ wzdyqwtʔ bʔrʕʔ wbhlyn ṣbyt ʔmr mryʔ
09:24	hʔ ywmtʔ ʔtyn ʔmr mryʔ wʔpqwd ʕl kl dgzr bʕwrlwtʔ
09:25	ʕl mṣryʔ wʕl yhwdyʔ wʕl ʔdwm wʕl bny ʕmwn wʕl mwʔb wʕl kl qṣyṣy pʔtʔ dytbyn bmdbrʔ mṭl dklhwn ʕmmʔ ʕwrlyn bbsrhwn wklhwn dbyt ʔysryl ʕwrlyn blbhwn
10:01	šmʕw ptgmʔ dʔmr mryʔ ʕlykwn dbyt ʔysryl
10:02	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔwrḥʔ dʕmmʔ lʔ tʔlpwn wmn ʔtwtʔ dšmyʔ lʔ tdḥlwn mṭl dʕmmʔ hw dḥlyn mnhyn
10:03	mṭl ddḥltʔ dʕmmʔ lʔ mdm ʔnyn mṭl dqysʔ mn ʕbʔ psyq ʕbd ʔydy ngrʔ bʕšpʔ
10:04	bkspʔ wbdhbʔ qrymyn bqplwṭʔ wbṣṣʔ mšdryn lhwn dlʔ ntprqwn
10:05	ʔyk dqlʔ zqypyn wlʔ mmllyn mšql šqlyn lhwn mṭl dlʔ mhlkyn lʔ tdḥlwn mnhwn mṭl dlʔ mbʔšyn ʔplʔ mṭʔbyn
10:06	lyt ʔkwtk mryʔ drb ʔnt wrb šmk bgnbrwtʔ
10:07	mn lʔ ndḥl lk mlkʔ dklhwn ʕlmʔ dlk hw yʔyʔ mlkwtʔ mṭl dbklhwn ḥkymʔ dʕmmʔ wbklh mlkwthwn lyt ʔkwtk
10:08	wʔkḥdʔ nʔbdwn wnswpwn ywlpnʔ sryqʔ ddḥltʔ dqysʔ
10:09	sʔmʔ ṭbʔ mn tršyš ʔtʔ wdhbʔ mn ʔwpyr ʕbd ngrʔ wʔydy qynyʔ tkltʔ wʔrgwnʔ lbwšhwn zqwrʔ dḥkymʔ
10:10	wmryʔ ʔlhʔ dqwštʔ hwyw ʔlhʔ dḥyʔ wmlkʔ dʕlmʔ mn rwgzh zyʕʔ ʔrʕʔ wlʔ mḥmsnyn ʕmmʔ rwgzh
10:11	hknʔ ʔmr lhwn ʔlhʔ dšmyʔ wʔrʕʔ lʔ ʕbdw nʕbdwn mn ʔrʕʔ wmn tḥyt šmyʔ hlyn
10:12	mryʔ ʕbd ʔrʕʔ bḥylh wʔtqn tbyl bḥkmth wbtrʕyth mtḥ šmyʔ
10:13	yhb qlʔ dʔrgwšyʔ dmyʔ bšmyʔ msq ʕnnʔ mn swpyh dʔrʕʔ wbrqʔ lmṭrʔ ʕbd mpq rwḥʔ mn ʔwṣrwhy
10:14	šṭʔ kl brnš mn ydʕtʔ bhtw kl ʕbdy dhbʔ mn glypʔ dʕbdw mṭl dšwqrʔ nskw wrwḥʔ lyt bhwn
10:15	lʔ mdm ʔnwn wʕbdʔ ʔnwn šṭyʔ bzbnʔ dmtpqdyn nʔbdwn
10:16	lʔ ʔyk dhlyn mnth dyʕqwb mṭl dmn dbrʔ kwl hwyw mnthwn wʔysryl šbṭʔ dyrtwth mryʔ ḥyltnʔ šmh
10:17	knšy mn ʔrʕʔ ṣʕrky ytbt bʔwlṣnʔ
10:18	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hʔ mʕrql ʔnʔ lʔmwryh dʔrʕʔ hdʔ bzbnʔ hnʔ dnbʕwnny wnškḥwnny
10:19	wy ly ʕl tbry kybʔ hy mḥwty wʔnʔ ʔmrt hnw kʔby ʔsybrywhy
10:20	mškny ʔtbzz wkwlhwn ṭwnbwhy ʔtpsqw bny npqw mny wlyt ʔnwn lyt dnqš twb mškḥ wmqym yryʕty
10:21	mṭl dšṭw rʕwtʔ wlmryʔ lʔ bʕw mṭl dlʔ ʔkšrw kwlh mrʕythwn ʔtbdrt
10:22	qlʔ dšmwʕtʔ hʔ ʔtʔ wzwʕʔ rbʔ mn ʔrʕʔ dgrbyʔ lmʕbd qwryʔ dyhwdʔ lḥwrbʔ mʕmrʔ lyrwrʔ
10:23	ydʕ ʔnʔ dʔwrḥth dmryʔ lʔ hwy ʔyk dbrnšʔ wlʔ ʔyk gbrʔ dʔzl wmtqn ṣbwth
10:24	rdny mryʔ bdynʔ wlʔ brwgzk dlmʔ tzʕrny
10:25	ʔšwd ḥmtk ʕl ʕmmʔ dlʔ ydʕwk wʕl šrbtʔ dbšmk lʔ qry dʔklwhy lyʕqwb ʔklwhy wgmrwhy wdyrh ʔḥrbw
11:01	ptgmʔ dhwʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ mn qdm mryʔ lmʔmr
11:02	šmʕw ptgmy qymʔ hnʔ wʔmr lgbrʔ dyhwdʔ wlʕmwryh dʔwršlm
11:03	ʔmr lhwn hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl lyṭ hw gbrʔ dlʔ nšmʕ ptgmy qymʔ hnʔ
11:04	dpqdt lʔbhykwn bywmʔ dʔpqt ʔnwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn mn kwrʔ dprzlʔ wʔmrt šmʕw bqly wtʕbdwn ʔntwn kl dʔpqdkwn wthwwn ly ʕmʔ wʔnʔ ʔhwʔ lkwn ʔlhʔ
11:05	wʔqym mwmtʔ dymyt lʔbhykwn lmtl lkwn ʔrʕʔ dmrdyʔ ḥlbʔ wdbšʔ ʔyk dywmnʔ wʕnyt wʔmrt ʔmyn mryʔ
11:06	wʔmr ly mryʔ qry kwlhwn ptgmʔ hlyn bqwryʔ dyhwdʔ wbšwqyh dʔwršlm {wʔmrw}<wʔmr> šmʕw ptgmʔ ddytqʔ hdʔ wtʕbdwn ʔnwn
11:07	mṭl dmshdw shdt bʔbhykwn bywmʔ dʔsqt ʔnwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wʕdmʔ lywmnʔ qdmt wšdrt wʔmrt šmʕw bqly
11:08	wlʔ šmʕw wlʔ ʔrknw ʔdnhwn whlkw gbr bṣbyny lbhwn byšʔ wʔytyt ʕlyhwn kl ptgmy qymʔ hnʔ dpqdt lmšmʕ wlʔ šmʕw
11:09	wʔmr ly mryʔ ʔštkḥ mrdʔ bgbrʔ dyhwdʔ wbʕmwryh dʔwršlm
11:10	tbw lḥṭhʔ dʔbhyhwn qdmyʔ wlʔ ṣbw lmšmʕ ptgmy whnwn ʔzlw btr ʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ lmplḥ ʔnwn wbṭlw bny ʔysryl wbny yhwdʔ dytqʔ dyly dʔqymt ʕm ʔbhyhwn
11:11	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ hnʔ mytʔ ʔnʔ ʕlyhwn byštʔ dlʔ nškḥwn lmpq mnh wngʕwn lwty wlʔ ʔšmʕ ʔnwn
11:12	wnʔzln qwryʔ dyhwdʔ wʕmwryh dʔwršlm wngʕwn lwt ʔlhʔ dsymyn hww lhwn bsmʔ wmprq lʔ nprqwn ʔnwn bzbnʔ dbyšthwn
11:13	mṭl dʔyk mnynʔ dqwryk hww ʔlhyk yhwdʔ mnynʔ dšwqʔ dʔwršlm smtwn mdbḥʔ lbhttʔ mdbḥʔ lmsm bsmʔ lbʕlʔ
11:14	wʔnt lʔ tṣlʔ ʕl ʕmʔ hnʔ wlʔ tbʕʔ ʕlyhwn bʕwtʔ wṣlwtʔ mṭl dlʔ šmʕ ʔnʔ bzbnʔ dqryn ly bzbn byšthwn
11:15	lmnʔ ḥbybty bbyty ʕbdty ṭnpwtʔ sgyʔtʔ wbsr qwdšʔ nʕbrwn mnky mṭl byštky dʕšnt
11:16	zytʔ ʕbyṭʔ špyr pʔrʔ wšpyr ḥzwʔ qrʔ mryʔ šmky lqlʔ dgzyrtʔ rbtʔ šbwqw nwrʔ ʕlyh wtḥbl swkyh
11:17	wmryʔ ṣbʔwt dnṣbky mll ʕlyky byštʔ mṭl byšwtʔ dbyt ʔysryl wdbyt yhwdʔ dʕbdw lhwn lmrgzwtny lmsm bsmʔ lbʕlʔ
11:18	mryʔ ḥwny wʔdʕ šryrʔyt ḥwytny ʕbdyhwn
11:19	wʔnʔ ʔyk ʔmrʔ bryrʔ dmtdbr lnkstʔ wlʔ ydʕt dʕly ʔtḥšbw mḥšbtʔ wʔmrw nḥbl qysʔ blḥmh wnwbdywhy mn ʔrʕʔ dḥyʔ wšmh twb lʔ ntdkr
11:20	wmryʔ ḥyltnʔ dynʔ dqwštʔ bḥr kwlytʔ wlbʔ ʔḥzʔ pwrʕnk mnhwn mṭl dlk glyt dyny
11:21	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʕl ʔnšy ʕntwt dbʕyn npšk wʔmryn lʔ ttnbʔ bšmh dmryʔ dlʔ tmwt bʔydyn
11:22	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ṣbʔwt hʔ pqd ʔnʔ ʕlyhwn ʕlymʔ nmwtwn bḥrbʔ wbnyhwn wbnthwn nmwtwn bkpnʔ
11:23	wḥrtʔ lʔ thwʔ lhwn mṭl dmytʔ ʔnʔ byštʔ ʕl ʔnšy ʕntwt šntʔ dpwqdnhwn
12:01	zdyq ʔnt mryʔ dʔdwn ʕmk brm dynʔ mmll ʔnʔ qdmyk mṭl mnʔ ʔwrḥh dršyʕʔ mṣlḥʔ wkhynyn klhwn šqrʔ
12:02	nṣbt ʔnwn wʔšrw ʕqryhwn qnw wʔp ʕbdw pʔrʔ qryb ʔnt bpwmhwn wrḥyq ʔnt mn kwlythwn
12:03	wʔnt mryʔ ydʕtny wḥzytky wbḥrt lby qdmyk ṭyb ʔnwn ʔyk ʕnʔ lnkstʔ wzmn ʔnwn lywm qṭlʔ
12:04	ʕdmʔ lʔmty ttʔbl ʔrʕʔ wʕsbʔ klh dḥqlʔ ybš mn byštʔ dʕmwryh spt bʕyrʔ wprḥtʔ dʔmrw lʔ nḥzʔ ḥrtn
12:05	hʔ ʕm rglyʔ rhṭt wʔlʔywk wʔyknʔ mtḥrʔ ʔnt ʕm rkšʔ wbʔrʕʔ dšlmʔ tkyl ʔnt wʔyknʔ ʕbr ʔnt bʕwšnh dywrdnn
12:06	mṭl dʔp ʔḥyk wbyt ʔbwk ʔp hnwn dglw bk ʔp hnwn ʔmrw btrk mlʔ lʔ thymn ʔnwn kd nmllwn ʕlyk ṭbtʔ
12:07	šbqt byty šbqt yrtwty yhbt ḥbybt npšy bʔydʔ dbʕldbbyh
12:08	hwt ly yrtwty ʔyk ʔryʔ bʕbʔ ʔrymt ʕly bqlh mṭl hnʔ snyth
12:09	ṭyrʔ mṣyrtʔ hwt ly yrtwty wṭyrʔ ḥdrʔ lh zlw knšw klh ḥywtʔ ddbrʔ ʔytw lmʔklh
12:10	rʕwtʔ sgyʔʔ ḥblw krmy dšw plgwty ʕbdw plgwtʔ drgty ʔyk mdbrʔ ḥrbʔ
12:11	ʔṣdyw wʔḥrbwh ʔtʔblt ʕly ḥrbtʔ ṣdt klh ʔrʕʔ mṭl dlyt ʔnš dmytʔ ʕl blh
12:12	ʕl klhwn šbylʔ dmdbrʔ ʔtw bzwzʔ mṭl dḥrbh dmryʔ ʔklʔ mn swpyh dʔrʕʔ wʕdmʔ lswpyh dʔrʕʔ wlyt šlmʔ lkl bsr
12:13	zrwʕw ḥṭʔ wḥṣwdw kwbʔ wlʔw wmdm lʔ mwtryn ʔntwn wbhtw mn ʕlltkwn mṭl ḥmtʔ drwgzh dmryʔ
12:14	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʕl klhwn šbby rʕwtʔ dqrbw byrtwtʔ dʔwrtt lʕmy ʔysrʔyl hʔ ʕqr ʔnʔ lhwn mn ʔtrhwn wldbyt yhwdʔ ʔʕqwr mn bynthwn
12:15	wmn btr dʔʕqwr ʔnwn ʔtwb wʔrḥm ʕlyhwn wʔhpk ʔnwn gbr lyrtwth wgbr lʔrʕh
12:16	wʔn nlpwn ʔwrḥty lʕmy dnʔmwn bšmy ḥy hw mryʔ ʔyk dʔlpw lʕmy dnʔmwn bbʕlʔ ntbwn bgw ʕmy
12:17	wʔn lʔ nšmʕwn ʔʕqrywhy lʕmʔ hnʔ mʕqr wmwbdw ʔmr mryʔ
13:01	hknʔ ʔmr ly mryʔ zl zbn lk swdrʔ dktnʔ wʔswryhy bḥṣyk wbmyʔ lʔ tṣbʕywhy
13:02	wzbnt swdrʔ ʔyk ptgmh dmryʔ wʔsrt bḥṣy
13:03	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ dtrtyn zbnyn wʔmr
13:04	sb swdrʔ dzbnt dbḥṣyk wqwm zl lprt wṭmwryhy tmn bṣryʔ dkʔpʔ
13:05	wʔzlt wṭmrth bprt ʔyk dpqdny mryʔ
13:06	wmn btr ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ ʔmr lʔ mryʔ qwm zl lprt wsb mn tmn swdrʔ dpqdtk dtṭmrywhy tmn
13:07	wʔzlt lprt wḥprt wnsbth lswdrʔ mn kr dṭmrth whʔ ʔtḥbl swdrʔ wlmdm lʔ kšr
13:08	whwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕly wʔmr
13:09	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl hknʔ ʔḥbl lgʔyʔ dyhwdʔ wlgʔyʔ dʔwršlm sgyʔʔ
13:10	ʕmʔ hnʔ byšʔ dlʔ ṣbw lmšmʕ ptgmy dmhlkyn bṣbynʔ dlbhwn wʔzlw btr ʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ lmplḥ ʔnwn wlmsgd lhwn nhwwn ʔyk swdrʔ hnʔ dlmdm lʔ kšr
13:11	mṭl dʔyknʔ dnqp swdrʔ lḥṣwhy dgbrʔ hknʔ ʔqpt ly lklh byt ʔysryl wlklh byt yhwdʔ ʔmr mryʔ dnhwwn ly lʕmʔ wlšmʔ wlʔyqrʔ wltšbwḥtʔ wlʔ šmʕw
13:12	wʔmr lhwn ptgmʔ hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl kl grb ntmlʔ ḥmrʔ hʔ ʔmryn lk mdʕ gyr lʔ ydʕyn ḥnn dklhwn grbʔ mtmlyn ḥmrʔ
13:13	ʔmr lhwn hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hʔ mlʔ ʔnʔ lklhwn ʕmwryh dʔrʕʔ hdʔ wlmlkʔ dytbyn ʕl kwrsyh ddwyd wlkhnʔ wlnbyʔ wlklhwn ʕmwryh dʔwršlm rwywtʔ
13:14	wʔbdr ʔnwn gbr mn lwt ʔḥwhy wʔbhʔ wbnyʔ ʔkḥdʔ ʔmr mryʔ lʔ ʔrḥm wlʔ ʔrḥp wlʔ ʔḥws lmḥblw ʔnwn
13:15	šmʕw wṣwtw wlʔ ttrymwn mṭl dmryʔ mll
13:16	hbw lmryʔ ʔlhkwn ʔyqrʔ ʕd lʔ nḥšk wʕdlʔ nttbrn rglykwn ʕl ṭwrʔ bḥšwkʔ wtskwn lnwhrʔ wnʕbdywhy ḥšwkʔ wṭlly mwtʔ
13:17	wʔn lʔ tšmʕwnh mṭšyʔyt tbkʔ npšy mn qdm ʕqtʔ wmdmʕw ʔdmʕ wnšḥln ʕyny dmʕʔ ʕl dʔštby gzrh dmryʔ
13:18	ʔmrw lmlkʔ wlrwrbnʔ ʔtmkkw wtwbw mṭl dnpl mn ryškwn klylʔ dtšbwḥtkwn
13:19	qwryʔ dtymnʔ ʔttḥd wlyt dptḥ ʔštbyt yhwdʔ klh šbytʔ šlmtʔ
13:20	ʔrymw ʕynykwn wḥzw ldʔtyn mn grbyʔ ʔynʔ hw gzrʔ dʔtyhb lky ʕnʔ dtšbwḥtky
13:21	mnʔ tʔmryn kd npqwd ʕlyky wʔnty ʔlpty ʔnwn ywlpnʔ dnhwwn ldyšʔ hʔ ḥblʔ nʔḥdwnky ʔyk ʔnttʔ dmḥblʔ lmʔld
13:22	wʔn tʔmryn blbky dʕl mnʔ gdš ly hlyn bswgʔt ḥwbyky ʔtglglw špwlyky wʔtgly ʕqbyky
13:23	wʔyk dlʔ mškḥ hndwyʔ dnšḥlp mškh wnmrʔ kklth ʔp ʔntwn lʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn lmṭʔbw mṭl dʔylptwn byštʔ
13:24	wʔbdr ʔnwn ʔyk glʔ dʕbr qdm rwḥʔ bmdbrʔ
13:25	hdʔ hy pṣtky wmntʔ dyrtwtky mn qdmy ʔmr mryʔ ʕl dṭʕytyky wʔttklty ʕl šwqrʔ
13:26	wʔp ʔnʔ ʔglg špwlyky wʔrmʔ ʕl ʔpyky wntḥzʔ ṣʕrky
13:27	wgwrky wṣhlky wznywth dznywtky ʕl rmtʔ bmdbrʔ ḥzyt ṭnpwtky wy lky ʔwršlm dlʔ ttdkyn ʕdmʔ lʔmty twby
14:01	whwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ ʕl bṣyrwt mṭrʔ
14:02	ʔtʔblt yhwdʔ wtrʕyh ṣdw wnplw bʔrʕʔ wṣwḥtʔ dʔwršlm slqt
14:03	rwrbnyhwn šdrw bṣyryhwn lmyʔ ʔtw lgwbʔ wlʔ ʔškḥw myʔ hpkw mʔnyhwn sryqʔyt bhtw wʔttksw wḥpyw ryšyhwn
14:04	mṭl ʕbdyh dʔrʕʔ lʔ hwʔ mṭrʔ bhtw ʔkrʔ wḥpyw ryšyhwn
14:05	wʔp ʔyltʔ bdbrʔ ʔyld wšbq bnyhyn mṭl dlʔ hwʔ tdʔʔ
14:06	wʕrdʔ qmw ʕl šbylʔ sqw rwḥʔ ʔyk yrwrʔ ḥšk ʕynyhwn mṭl dlyt ʕsbʔ
14:07	ʔn ḥṭhyn shdw bn mryʔ ḥws mṭl šmk mṭl dsgyʔʔ hy ṭybwtk wlk ḥṭyn
14:08	sbrh dʔysrʔyl wprwqh bzbnʔ dʔwlṣnʔ lʔ thwʔ ʔyk twtbʔ bʔrʕʔ wʔyk ʔrḥʔ dsṭʔ lmbt
14:09	lʔ thwʔ ʔyk gbrʔ bṣyrʔ wʔyk gbrʔ dlʔ mškḥ lmprq wʔnt mryʔ bgwn ʔnt wšmk ʔtqry ʕlyn lʔ tšbqn
14:10	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ lʕmʔ hnʔ hnwn rḥmw lmzʕ rglyhwn lʔ ḥskw wmryʔ lʔ ṣbʔ bhwn mkyl ntdkr ʕwlhwn wnpqwd ḥṭhyhwn
14:11	wʔmr ly mryʔ lʔ tṣlʔ ʕl ʕmʔ hnʔ lṭbtʔ
14:12	mṭl dʔn ṣymyn lʔ šmʕ ʔnʔ ṣlwthwn wʔn msqyn yqdʔ wqwrbnʔ lʔ ṣbʔ ʔnʔ bhwn mṭl dbḥrbʔ wbkpnʔ wbmwtnʔ ʔnʔ mgmr ʔnʔ lhwn
14:13	wʔmrt bbʕw mryʔ ʔlhʔ hʔ nbyʔ hw ʔmryn lhwn lʔ tḥzwn ḥrbʔ wkpnʔ lʔ nhwʔ lkwn ʔlʔ šlmʔ wqwštʔ ʔtl lkwn bʔtrʔ hnʔ
14:14	wʔmr ly mryʔ bdglwtʔ nbyʔ mtnbyn bšmy dʔnʔ lʔ šdrt ʔnwn wlʔ pqdt ʔnwn wlʔ ʔmrt lhwn ḥzwnʔ dglʔ wqṣmʔ wnḥšʔ nklʔ dlbhwn hnwn mtnbyn lkwn
14:15	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʕl nbyʔ dmtnbyn bšmy dʔnʔ lʔ šdrt ʔnwn whnwn ʔmryn dḥrbʔ wkpnʔ lʔ nhwʔ bʔrʕʔ hdʔ bḥrbʔ wbkpnʔ nswpwn nbyʔ hnwn
14:16	wʕmʔ dhnwn mtnbyn lhwn nhwwn rmyn bšwqyh dʔwršlm mn qdm ḥrbʔ wkpnʔ wmwtnʔ wlyt lhwn qbwr hnwn wnyšyhwn wbnyhwn wbnthwn wʔšwd ʕlyhwn byšwthwn
14:17	wʔmr lhwn ptgmʔ hnʔ nšḥln ʕyny dmʕʔ bʔymmʔ wbllyʔ wlʔ nštqn mṭl dtbrʔ rbʔ ʔttbrt btwltʔ brt ʕmy mḥwtʔ wkybʔ ṭb
14:18	ʔn npqt ldbrʔ hʔ qṭyly ḥrbʔ wʔn ʕlt lqrytʔ hʔ mṭrpy kpnʔ mṭl dʔp nbyʔ wʔp khnʔ ḥdrw bʔrʕʔ wlʔ ʔydʕw
14:19	mslyw ʔslyt lyhwdʔ ʔw bṣhywn gʕṣt npšk mṭl mnʔ mḥytn wlyt ln ʔsywtʔ skyn lšlmʔ wlyt ṭbtʔ wlzbnʔ dʔsywtʔ whʔ dḥltʔ
14:20	ydʕynn mryʔ ḥṭhyn wḥṭhʔ dʔbhyn mṭl dḥṭyn lk
14:21	lʔ trgz mṭl šmk wlʔ tṣʕr kwrsyʔ dʔyqrk ʔtdkr wlʔ tbṭl qymk dʕmn
14:22	lʔ gyr mškḥn dḥltʔ dʕmmʔ dnḥtn mṭrʔ wʔp lʔ šmyʔ dntlwn ʔrsysʔ ʔlʔ ʔnt hw mryʔ ʔlhn wnskʔ lk dʔnt ʕbd ʔnt hlyn klhyn
15:01	wʔmr ly mryʔ ʔn nqwm mwšʔ wšmwʔyl qdmy lʔ ṣbyʔ npšy bʕmʔ hnʔ ʔpq ʔnwn mn qdm ʔpy wnpqwn
15:02	wʔn nʔmrwn lk lʔykʔ npwq ʔmr lhwn hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ dlmwtʔ lmwtʔ wdlḥrbʔ lḥrbʔ wdlkpnʔ lkpnʔ wdlšbyʔ lšbyʔ
15:03	wʔpqwd ʕlyhwn ʔrbʕ mḥwn ʔmr mryʔ ḥrbʔ lmqṭl wklbʔ lmgr wprḥtʔ dšmyʔ wḥywtʔ dʔrʕʔ lmʔkl wlmḥblw
15:04	wʔtl ʔnwn lzwʕtʔ bynt klhyn mlkwtʔ dʔrʕʔ mṭwl ḥwbwhy dmnšʔ br ḥzqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ ʕl kwl mdm dʕbd bʔwršlm
15:05	mnw nḥws ʕlyky ʔwršlm wlmn tkrʔ ʕlyky wmnw nsṭʔ lmšʔl bšlmky
15:06	ʔnty šbqtyny ʔmr mryʔ wlbstrky ʔzlt wʔrym ʔydy ʕlyky wʔḥblky wtwb lʔ ʔšbwq lhwn
15:07	wʔdrʔ ʔnwn bmdryʔ bqwryh dʔrʕʔ gzyt wʔwbdt ʕmy wmn ʔwrḥthwn lʔ tbw
15:08	sgy ʔrmlthwn mn ḥlʔ dymʔ ʔytyt ʕlyhwn ʕl ʔmʔ wʕl ʕlymʔ bzwzʔ bṭhrʔ ʔrmyt ʕlyhwn mn šlyʔ dlwḥyʔ wrtytʔ
15:09	ʔlt yldt šbʕʔ npḥt krsh ʕrbt šmšh bplgwt ywmyh bhtt wʔḥprt šrkhwn lḥrbʔ ʔšlm qdm bʕldbbyhwn ʔmr mryʔ
15:10	wy ly ʔmy dyldtyny gbr dyn wgbr mksn bklh ʔrʕʔ lʔ ḥyb ʔnʔ wlʔ ḥybyn ly wklhwn mṣḥyn ly
15:11	ʔmr mryʔ lʔ ʔšbqk bṭbtʔ ʔlʔ ʔpgʕ bk bʕldbbʔ mn grbyʔ bzbnʔ dʔwlṣnʔ bzbnʔ dbyštʔ
15:12	dqšʔ ʔyk przlʔ wʔyk nḥšʔ
15:13	nksyk wgzyk wkwlh tḥwmk lbztʔ ʔtl mṭl ḥṭhyk
15:14	wʔšʕbdk lbʕldbbyk bʔrʕʔ dlʔ ydʕ ʔnt mṭl dnwrʔ qdḥt brwgzy ʕlykwn tʔqd
15:15	ʔnt mryʔ ydʕ ʔnt ʔtdkryny wprwqyny wʔtnqm ly mn rdwpy lʔ bngyrwt rwḥk tdbrny dʕ dqblt ʕl ʔpyk ḥsdʔ
15:16	wnṭrt pwqdnyk wʕbdt ʔnwn whwʔ ly ptgmk lbwsmʔ wlḥdwth dlby mṭl dʔtqry šmk ʕly mryʔ ʔlhʔ ḥyltnʔ
15:17	lʔ ytbt bknwštʔ dmbzḥnʔ ʔlʔ dḥlt mn qdm ʔydk wblḥwdy ytbt mṭl drwgzʔ mlytny
15:18	lmnʔ hwʔ kʔby ʕšyn wmḥwty ḥsynʔ wlʔ ṣbyʔ lmtʔsyw whwyt ly ʔyk myʔ kdbʔ dlʔ mthymnyn
15:19	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔn ttwb ʔpnyk wqdmy tqwm wʔn tpq yqyrʔ mn zlylʔ ʔyk pwmy thwʔ wntpnwn hnwn lwtk wʔnt lʔ ttpnʔ lwthwn
15:20	yhbtk lʕmʔ hnʔ ʔyk šwrʔ ʕšynʔ dnḥšʔ wntktšwn ʕmk wlʔ nzkwnk mṭl dʕmk ʔnʔ lmprqk wlmpṣywtk ʔmr mryʔ
15:21	wʔpṣyk mn ʔydʔ dbyšʔ wʔprqk mn ʔydʔ dʕšynʔ
16:01	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
16:02	lʔ tsb lk ʔnttʔ wlʔ nhwwn lk bnyʔ wbntʔ bʔtrʔ hnʔ
16:03	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʕl bnyʔ wʕl bntʔ dmtyldyn bʔtrʔ hnʔ wʕl ʔmhthwn dyldn lhwn wʕl ʔbhyhwn dmwldyn lhwn bʔtrʔ hnʔ
16:04	mwtʔ dmṭrpy kpnʔ nmwtwn lʔ nrqdwn ʕlyhwn wlʔ ntqbrwn ʔlʔ ʔyk zblʔ ʕl ʔpy ʔrʕʔ nhwwn wbḥrbʔ wbkpnʔ nswpwn wnhwyn šldyhwn mʔkwltʔ lprḥtʔ dšmyʔ wlḥywtʔ dʔrʕʔ
16:05	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ lʔ tʔzl lbyt mrqwdtʔ wlʔ tʔzl lmrqdw wlʔ tnwd ʕlyhwn mṭl dʔʕbrt šlmy mn ʕmʔ hnʔ ʔmr mryʔ wṭybwtʔ wrḥmʔ
16:06	wnmwtwn rwrbʔ wdqdqʔ bʔrʕʔ hdʔ lʔ ntqbrwn wlʔ nrqdwn ʕlyhwn wlʔ nyllwn wlʔ nqdḥwn ʕlyhwn
16:07	wlʔ nqṣwn ʕlyhwn bʔblʔ dntbyʔwn ʕl mytʔ wlʔ nšqwn ʔnwn ksʔ dbwyʔʔ ʕl ʔbhyhwn wʕl ʔmhthwn
16:08	wlbyt mštyʔ lʔ tʕwl lmtb ʕmhwn lmlʕs wlmštʔ
16:09	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl hʔ mbṭl ʔnʔ mn ʔtrʔ hnʔ lʕnykwn wbywmtkwn qlʔ ddyṣʔ wqlʔ dḥdwtʔ qlʔ dḥtnʔ wqlʔ dkltʔ
16:10	wʔn tḥwʔ lʕmʔ hnʔ hlyn klhwn ptgmʔ nʔmrwn lk mṭl mnʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʕlyn klh hdʔ byštʔ rbtʔ mnʔ ḥbn wmnʔ hy ḥṭytn dḥṭyn lmryʔ ʔlhn
16:11	ʔmr lhwn ʕl dšbqwny ʔbhykwn ʔmr mryʔ wʔzlw btr ʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ wplḥw ʔnwn wsgdw lhwn wly šbqw wnmwsy lʔ nṭrw
16:12	wʔntwn ʔbʔštwn lmʕbd ytyr mn ʔbhykwn whʔ ʔzlyn ʔntwn gbr btr ṣbyny lbkwn byšʔ dlʔ tšmʕwnny
16:13	wʔšdykwn mn ʔrʕʔ hdʔ lʔrʕʔ dlʔ ydʕtwn ʔntwn wʔbhykwn wtplḥwn tmn lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ bʔymmʔ wbllyʔ wlʔ ʔtlkwn lrḥmʔ
16:14	mṭl hnʔ hʔ ywmtʔ ʔtyn ʔmr mryʔ wlʔ ntʔmr twb ḥy hw mryʔ dʔsq ldbyt ʔysryl mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
16:15	ʔlʔ ḥy hw mryʔ dnsq wnytʔ ldbyt ʔysryl mn ʔrʕʔ dgrbyʔ wmn kl ʔtrwtʔ ddḥqt ʔnwn ltmn wʔhpk ʔnwn lʔrʕhwn dyhbt lʔbhyhwn
16:16	hʔ mšdr ʔnʔ lṣydʔ sgyʔʔ ʔmr mryʔ wnṣwdwn ʔnwn wbtrkn ʔšdr lṣydʔ sgyʔʔ wnṣwdwn ʔnwn mn kl ṭwr wmn kl rmʔ wmn nqʕʔ dšqypʔ
16:17	mṭl dʕyny ʕl kwlhyn ʔwrḥthwn wlʔ ṭšyn mn qdmy wlʔ mtṭšʔ ʕwlhwn mn qdm ʕyny
16:18	wʔprwʕ ʔnwn qdmyt ḥd tryn ḥwbyhwn wḥṭhyhwn ʕl dṭwšw ʔrʕy bdbḥʔ dptkryhwn wbṭnpwthwn mlw yrtwty
16:19	mryʔ ḥyly wmʕdrny wbyt gwsy bywmʔ dʔwlṣnʔ lwtk ʕmmʔ nʔtwn mn swpyh dʔrʕʔ wnʔmrwn šryrʔyt ptkrʔ ddglwtʔ dʔwrtwn ʔbhyn lʔ mdm ʔnwn wlyt bhwn ywtrn
16:20	hʔ bny ʔnšʔ ʕbdyn lhwn ʔlhʔ whnwn lʔ hww ʔlhʔ
16:21	mṭl hnʔ hʔ mḥwʔ ʔnʔ lhwn wbzbnʔ hnʔ ʔwdʕ ʔnwn ʔydy wgnbrwty wndʕwn dmryʔ šmʕy
17:01	ḥṭyth dyhwdʔ ktybʔ bqnyʔ dprzlʔ wbṭprʔ dšmyrʔ wršymʔ ʕl lwḥʔ dlbhwn wʕl qrntʔ dmdbḥyhwn
17:02	mʔ dmtdkryn blbhwn mdbḥyhwn wdḥlthwn tḥyt kwl ʔyln dʕbyṭ wʕl kl rmtʔ drmʔ
17:03	wbṭwrʔ wbdbrʔ nksyk wklhwn gzyk wtḥwmyk lbztʔ ʔtl mṭl ḥṭhyk
17:04	wʔʕbrk mn yrtwtk dyhbt lk wʔšʕbdk lbʕldbbyk bʔrʕʔ dlʔ ydʕ ʔnt mṭl dnwrʔ ʔqdḥtwn brwgzy ʕdmʔ lʕlm tʔqd
17:05	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ lyṭ hw gbrʔ dnttkl ʕl brnšʔ wnʕbd br bsrʔ drʕh wmn mryʔ nsṭʔ lbh
17:06	nhwʔ ʔyk ʕqrʔ bpqʕtʔ wlʔ nḥzʔ kd tʔtʔ ṭbtʔ wnšrʔ bḥwlnʔ bmdbrʔ bʔrʕʔ mlḥtʔ dlʔ ʔtytbt
17:07	bryk hw gbrʔ dnttkl ʕl mryʔ wnhwʔ mryʔ twklnh
17:08	nhwʔ ʔyk ʔylnʔ dnṣyb ʕl myʔ wʕl yblʔ mšdr ʕqrwhy wlʔ ndḥl kd nʔtʔ ḥwmʔ wnhwwn ṭrpwhy rwzyn wbšntʔ dbṣyr bh mṭrʔ lʔ ndḥl wlʔ ntbṣr mn dlmʕbd pʔrʔ
17:09	ʕšyn lbʔ mn kl ʔnšʔ hw mnw ydʕ lh
17:10	ʔnʔ mryʔ bṣʔ lbʔ wbḥr kwlytʔ wyhb lgbrʔ ʔyk ʔwrḥth wʔyk pʔry ʕbdwhy
17:11	ʔyk ḥglʔ dqrʔ lʔylyn dlʔ yld hknʔ mn dqnʔ ʕwtrʔ dlʔ bdynʔ bplgwt ywmwhy nšbqywhy wḥrth thwʔ mṣʕrʔ
17:12	kwrsyʔ dʔyqrʔ dʔttrym mn lwqdm mn ʔtrʔ dmqdšn
17:13	sbrh dʔysryl mryʔ hw kl dšbqwk nbhtwn wmrwdʔ bʔrʕʔ ntktbwn mṭl dšbqw lmryʔ mbwʕʔ dmyʔ ḥyʔ
17:14	ʔsny mryʔ wʔtʔsʔ prwqyny wʔtprq mṭl dtšbwḥty ʔnt hw
17:15	hʔ hnwn ʔmryn ly ʔykʔ hw ptgmh dmryʔ nʔtʔ hšʔ
17:16	wʔnʔ bbyštʔ lʔ pšt mnk ʔnt ydʕ ʔnt dywmh dbrnšʔ lʔ rgt wmdm dnpq mn spwty qdm ʔpyk hwʔ
17:17	lʔ thwʔ ly ltbrʔ ʔlʔ ʔgn ʕly bywmʔ byšʔ
17:18	nbhtwn rdwpy wlʔ ʔbht ʔnʔ nttbrwn hnwn wlʔ ʔttbr ʔnʔ ʔytʔ ʕlyhwn ywmʔ dbyštʔ wḥd tryn tbrʔ tbr ʔnwn
17:19	hknʔ ʔmr ly mryʔ zl qwm btrʕʔ dbny ʕmʔ dʕʔlyn bh mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wdnpqyn bh wbklhwn trʕyh dʔwršlm
17:20	wʔmr lhwn šmʕw ptgmh dmryʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wklh byt yhwdʔ wklhwn ʕmwryh dʔwršlm dʕʔlyn btrʕʔ hlyn
17:21	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔzdhrw bnpškwn wlʔ tšqlwn šqwltʔ bywmʔ dšbtʔ wtʕlwn btrʕyh dʔwršlm
17:22	wlʔ tpqwn šqwltʔ mn btykwn bywmʔ dšbtʔ wkl ʕbd lʔ tʕbdwn wtqdšwn ywmʔ dšbtʔ ʔyk dpqdt lʔbhykwn
17:23	wlʔ šmʕw wlʔ ʔrknw ʔdnhwn lmšmʕ wqšyw qdlhwn dlʔ nšmʕwn wlʔ nqblwn mrdwtʔ
17:24	wʔn mšmʕ tšmʕwnny ʔmr mryʔ dlʔ tʕlwn šqwltʔ btrʕʔ dqrytʔ hdʔ bywmʔ dšbtʔ wtqdšwn ywmʔ dšbtʔ wlʔ tʕbdwn bh kl ʕbd
17:25	nʕlwn btrʕyh dqrytʔ hdʔ mlkʔ wrwrbnʔ dytbyn ʕl kwrsyh ddwyd kd rkybyn bmrkbtʔ wbrkšʔ hnwn wrwrbnyhwn wgbrʔ dyhwdʔ wʕmwryh dʔwršlm wttb qrytʔ hdʔ lʕlm
17:26	wnʔtwn mn qwryʔ dyhwdʔ wmn ḥdry ʔwršlm wmn ʔrʕʔ dbnymyn wmn pqʕtʔ wmn ṭwrʔ wmn tymnʔ dmytyn dbḥʔ wqwrbnʔ wlbwntʔ wmytyn twdytʔ lbyth dmryʔ
17:27	wʔlʔ tšmʕwnny lmqdšw ywmʔ dšbtʔ dlʔ tšqlwn šqwltʔ wtʕlwn btrʕyh dʔwršlm bywmʔ dšbtʔ ʔšbwq nwrʔ btrʕyh wtʔkwl sḥrth dʔwršlm wlʔ tdʕk
18:01	ptgmʔ dhwʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ mn qdm mryʔ lmʔmr
18:02	qwm ḥwt lbyt pḥrʔ wtmn ʔšmʕk ptgmy
18:03	wnḥtt lbyt pḥrʔ ʔyk ptgmh dmryʔ whʔ hw ʕbd ʕbdʔ ʕl sdnʔ
18:04	wʔtḥbl hwʔ mʔnʔ dṭynʔ dʕbd hwʔ bʔydh dpḥrʔ whpk wʕbdh mʔnʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔyk dṣbʔ
18:05	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
18:06	ʔyk pḥrʔ hnʔ lʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ dʔʕbd lkwn byt ʔysryl ʔmr mryʔ hʔ ʔyk ṭynʔ bʔydy pḥrʔ hknʔ ʔntwn bʔydy byt ʔysryl
18:07	ʔn mn šlyʔ ʔmr ʕl ʕmʔ wʕl mlkwtʔ lmʕqr wlmstr wlmsḥpw wlmwbdw
18:08	wntwb ʕmʔ hw mn byšth ʔhpk mnh byštʔ dʔtḥšbt lmʕbd lh
18:09	wʔn ʔmr ʕl ʕmʔ wʕl mlkwtʔ lmbnʔ wlmṣb
18:10	wnʕbd dbyš qdmy wlʔ nšmʕ bqly ʔhpk mnh ṭbtʔ dʔmrt lmṭʔbw lh
18:11	whšʔ ʔmr lgbrʔ dyhwdʔ wlʕmwryh dʔwršlm hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hʔ brʔ ʔnʔ ʕlykwn byštʔ wmtḥšb ʔnʔ ʕlykwn mḥšbtʔ twbw wʔtpnw gbr mn ʔwrḥh byštʔ wʔṭʔbw ʔwrḥtkwn wʕbdykwn
18:12	wʔmrw hnwn ntḥyl wbtr mḥšbtn nʔzl wʔnš ṣbyny lbh byšʔ nʕbd
18:13	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ šʔlw byt ʕmmʔ mnw ʕbd ʔyk hlyn šṭywtʔ rbtʔ ʕbdt btwltʔ dʔysryl
18:14	ʔn ʕnd mn ṭwr tdyʔ tlgʔ wmn lbnn wʔn mtklyn myʔ qryrʔ nwkryʔ drdyn
18:15	mṭwl dṭʕʔwny ʕmy wlsryqwtʔ smw bsmʔ wʔttqlw bʔwrḥthwn bšbylʔ dʕlm lmʔzl bšbylʔ bʔwrḥʔ dlʔ dryšʔ
18:16	lmʕbd ʔrʕhwn ltmhʔ wlmšrwqytʔ lʕlm wkl dnʕbr ʕlyh ntmh wnnyd bryšh
18:17	ʔyk rwḥʔ dšwbʔ ʔbdr ʔnwn qdm bʕldbbʔ qdlʔ wlʔ ʔpʔ ʔḥwʔ ʔnwn bywmʔ dʕqthwn
18:18	wʔmrw tw ntḥšb mḥšbtʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ dlʔ nʔbd nmwsʔ mn khnʔ wtrʕytʔ mn ḥkymʔ wmltʔ mn nbyʔ tw nmḥywhy blšnh wlʔ nṣwt kwlhwn ptgmwhy
18:19	ṣwtyny mryʔ wšmʕ ql ʕwlbny
18:20	ʔtprʕ byštʔ ḥlp ṭbtʔ dḥprw gwmṣʔ lnpšy ʔtdkr dqmt qdmyk wmllt ʕlyhwn ṭbtʔ lmhpkw ḥmtk mnhwn
18:21	mṭl hnʔ hb bnyhwn lkpnʔ wʔšlm ʔnwn lʔydy ḥrbʔ nhwyn nyšyhwn mgzyn wʔrmln wgbryhwn nhwwn qṭyly mwtʔ wʕlymyhwn qṭyly ḥrbʔ bqrbʔ
18:22	tštmʕ ʔylltʔ mn btyhwn kd tytʔ ʕlyhwn gysʔ mn šlyʔ mṭl dḥprw gwmṣʔ lnpšy lmʔḥdny wpḥʔ ṭmrw lrgly
18:23	wʔnt mryʔ ydʕ ʔnt kl dʔtrʕyw ʕly lmwtʔ lʔ tḥsʔ ʕl ʕwlhwn wḥṭhyhwn mn qdmyk lʔ tʕṭʔ nhwwn rmyn qdmyk wbzbn rwgzk ʕbr bhwn
19:01	hknʔ ʔmr ly mryʔ zl wzbn bgbwgʔ dpḥrʔ wdbr ʕmk mn sbʔ dʕmʔ wmn sbʔ dkhnʔ
19:02	wpwq lnḥlʔ dbrhnwm dbmʕlnʔ dtrʕʔ dḥdsyt wʔkrz tmn ptgmʔ dʔmr lk
19:03	wʔmr šmʕw ptgmh dmryʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wʕmwryh dʔwršlm hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl hʔ mytʔ ʔnʔ byštʔ ʕl ʔtrʔ hnʔ dkl dnšmʕyh nṣln ʔdnwhy
19:04	ʕl dšbqwny wṭnpwhy lʔtrʔ hnʔ wsmw bh bsmʔ lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ dlʔ ydʕw ʔnwn hnwn wʔbhyhwn wmlkʔ dyhwdʔ wmlʔwhy lʔtrʔ hnʔ dmʔ zkyʔ
19:05	wmlw ʕlwtʔ lbʕlʔ lmwqdw bnyhwn bnwrʔ yqdʔ lbʕlʔ dlʔ pqdt wlʔ ʔmrt wlʔ slqt ʕl lby
19:06	mṭl hnʔ hʔ ywmtʔ ʔtyn ʔmr mryʔ wlʔ ntqrʔ twb ʔtrʔ hnʔ tpt wnḥlʔ dbrhnwm ʔlʔ ʔn nḥlʔ dqṭylʔ
19:07	wʔbṭl trʕytʔ dyhwdʔ wdʔwršlm bʔtrʔ hnʔ wʔrmʔ ʔnwn bḥrbʔ qdm bʕldbbyhwn bʔydʔ dʔylyn dbʕyn npšhwn wʔtl šldyhwn mʔkwltʔ lprḥtʔ dšmyʔ wlḥywtʔ dʔrʕʔ
19:08	wʔʕbdyh lqrytʔ hdʔ ltmhʔ wlmšrwqytʔ wkl mn dnʕbd ʕlyh ntmh wnšrq ʕl klhyn mḥwth
19:09	wʔwkl ʔnwn bsrʔ dbnyhwn wdbnthwn wgbr bsr ḥbrh nʔklwn bʔwlṣnʔ wbʕqtʔ dnʕyqwn lhwn bʕldbbyhwn wʔylyn dbʕyn npšhwn
19:10	wtbryhy lbgbwgʔ lʕyn gbrʔ dʔzlyn ʕmk
19:11	wʔmr lhwn hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ hknʔ ʔtbrywhy lʕmʔ hnʔ wlqrytʔ hdʔ ʔyk dʔttbr mʔnʔ hnʔ dpḥrʔ dtwb lʔ mškḥ lmtʔsyw wbtpt nqbrwn mn bly ʔtrʔ lmqbr
19:12	hknʔ ʔʕbd lʔtrʔ hnʔ wlʕmwrwhy ʔmr mryʔ wʔʕbdyh lqrytʔ hdʔ ʔyk tpt
19:13	wnhwwn btʔ dʔwršlm wbtʔ dmlkʔ dyhwdʔ ʔyk ʔtrʔ dtpt mṭmʔyn kl btʔ dsmw bsmʔ ʕl ʔgryhwn lkl ḥylwtʔ dšmyʔ wnqyw nwqyʔ lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ
19:14	wʔtʔ ʔrmyʔ mn tpt dšdrh mryʔ lmtnbyw tmn wqm bdrtʔ dbyth dmryʔ wʔmr lklh ʕmʔ
19:15	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl hʔ mytʔ ʔnʔ ʕl mdyntʔ hdʔ wʕl kwlhyn qwryh klh byštʔ dʔmrt ʕlyh ʕl dqšyw qdlhwn dlʔ nšmʕwn ptgmy
20:01	wšmʕ pšḥwr br ʔmryʔ hknʔ whw pqwdʔ hwʔ wšlyṭʔ bbyth dmryʔ lʔrmyʔ nbyʔ kd mtnbʔ ptgmʔ hlyn
20:02	wmḥyhy pšḥwr lʔrmyʔ nbyʔ wʔrmyh bḥdrtʔ dbtrʕʔ dbyt bnymyn ʕlyʔ dbbyth dmryʔ
20:03	whwʔ lbtr ywmʔ wʔpqh pšḥwr lʔrmyʔ mn ḥdrtʔ wʔmr lh ʔrmyʔ lʔ hwʔ pšḥwr qrʔ mryʔ šmk ʔlʔ twtbʔ wḥdwrʔ
20:04	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hʔ ʕbd ʔnʔ lk twtbʔ lk wlklhwn rḥmyk wnplwn bḥrbʔ dbʕldbbyhwn wʕynyk nḥzyn wlklh yhwdʔ ʔšlm bʔydʔ dmlkʔ dbbl wnšbʔ ʔnwn lbbl wnqṭl ʔnwn bḥrbʔ
20:05	wʔšlm klhwn ḥsny qrytʔ hdʔ wklh lʔwth wklh ʔyqrh wklhwn gnʔ dmlkʔ dyhwdʔ ʔšlm bʔydʔ dbʕldbbyhwn wnšbwn ʔnwn wnbzwn ʔnwn wnwblwn ʔnwn lbbl
20:06	wʔnt pšḥwr wklhwn ytby bytk tʔzlwn bšbyʔ wlbbl tʔzl wtmn tmwt wtmn ttqbr ʔnt wklhwn rḥmyk dʔtnbyt lhwn bšwqrʔ
20:07	šdltny mryʔ wʔštdlt ḥsntny wzkytny hwyt gwḥkʔ klywm wkwlhwn mmyqyn by
20:08	wbzbn dmmll hwyt wmzʕq ʕl ḥṭwpʔ wʕl bzwzʔ qrʔ hwyt mṭl dhwʔ ly ptgmh dmryʔ lḥsdʔ wlmwyqʔ bkl ywm
20:09	wʔmrt dlʔ ʔtdkrywhy wlʔ ʔmll twb bšmh whwʔ blby ʔyk nwrʔ dyqdʔ wḥbʔ bgrmy wbʕyt lmsybrw wlʔ ʔškḥt
20:10	mṭl dšmʕt rnyʔ dsgyʔʔ dmtknšyn mn ḥdry wʔmryn klhwn dšʔlyn bšlmy bpwmhwn wsnyn ly blbhwn ḥwʔwhy ln nqwm ʕlwhy kbr nštdl ln wntbʕ ʕyrtn mnh
20:11	wmryʔ ʕmy ʔyk gnbrʔ ʕšynʔ mṭl hnʔ klhwn rdwpy nbhtwn wlʔ nštkḥwn bhtw ṭb mṭl dlʔ ʔstklw bhttʔ dʕlm dlʔ mtṭʕyʔ
20:12	wmryʔ ḥyltnʔ bḥr zdqʔ ḥzʔ kwlytʔ wlbʔ ʔḥzʔ pwrʕnk mnhwn mṭl dlk glyt dyny
20:13	šbḥw lmryʔ šbḥw lmryʔ dpṣy npšh dmsknʔ mn ʔydʔ dmbʔšnʔ
20:14	lyṭ hw ywmʔ dʔtyldt bh ywmʔ dʔtyldtny ʔmy lʔ nhwʔ bryk
20:15	lyṭ hw gbrʔ dsbr lʔby wʔmr lh dʔtyld lk brʔ dkrʔ wsbr dmḥdyw ḥdyh
20:16	nhwʔ gbrʔ hw ʔyk qwryʔ dhpk mryʔ wlʔ ʔtrʕy lhyn nšmʕ ylltʔ bṣprʔ wywbbʔ bṭhrʔ
20:17	dlʔ ʔmytny bmrbʕʔ whwt ly dyn ʔmy qbrʔ wbmrbʕʔ bṭnwty lʕlm
20:18	lmnʔ npqt mn mrbʕʔ lmḥzʔ ʕmlʔ wdʔwwʔnʔ wgmrw bbhttʔ ywmy
21:01	ptgmʔ dhwʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ mn qdm mryʔ kd šdr lwth ṣdqyʔ mlkʔ lpšḥwr br mlkyʔ wlṣpnyʔ br mʕsyʔ khnʔ lmʔmr
21:02	bʕy ʕlyn mn mryʔ mṭl nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl mtktš ʕmn ṭk nʕbd ʕmn mryʔ ʔyk klhyn tdmrth wnprqywhy mnn
21:03	wʔmr lhwn ʔrmyʔ hknʔ tʔmrwn lṣdqyʔ mlkʔ
21:04	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ ḥyltnʔ dʔysryl hʔ mhpk ʔnʔ mʔny qrbʔ dbʔydykwn dmtktšyn ʔntwn bhwn ʕm mlkʔ dbbl wʕm kldyʔ dkrykyn lkwn lbr mn qrytʔ wʔknš ʔnwn lgw qrytʔ hdʔ
21:05	wʔtktš ʔnʔ ʕmkwn bʔydʔ tqyptʔ wbdrʕʔ rmʔ brwgzʔ wbḥmtʔ wbrwgzʔ rbʔ
21:06	ʔmḥʔ lytby qrytʔ hdʔ bny ʔnšʔ wbʕyrʔ bmwtʔ rbʔ nmwtwn
21:07	wbtrkn ʔmr mryʔ ʔšlmywhy lṣdqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wlʕbdwhy wlʕmʔ dʔštḥrw bqrytʔ hdʔ mn ḥrbʔ wmn kpnʔ wmn mwtnʔ ʔšlm bʔydʔ dnbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl wbʔydʔ dbʕldbbyhwn wbʔydʔ dʔylyn dbʕyn npšhwn wnmḥʔ ʔnwn bpwmʔ dḥrbʔ wlʔ nḥws ʕlyhwn wlʔ nrḥp wlʔ nrḥm ʕlyhwn
21:08	wlʕmʔ hnʔ ʔmr hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hʔ yhb ʔnʔ qdmykwn ʔwrḥʔ dḥyʔ wʔwrḥʔ dmwtʔ
21:09	mn dytb bqrytʔ hdʔ nmwt bḥrbʔ wbkpnʔ wbmwtnʔ wmn dnpq lwt kldyʔ dkrykyn lkwn ḥyʔ wmšwzb npšh
21:10	mṭl dsmt ʔpy bqrytʔ hdʔ lbyštʔ wlʔ lṭbtʔ ʔmr mryʔ wbʔydh dmlkʔ dbbl tštlm wnwqdyh bnwrʔ
21:11	wlbyt mlkʔ dyhwdʔ
21:12	šmʕw ptgmh dmryʔ dbyt dwyd hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ dwnw bṣprʔ dynʔ wpṣw lṭlymʔ mn mn dṭlm lh dlmʔ tpwq ʔyk nwrʔ ḥmty wtwqd wlyt dmdʕk mṭl byšwtʔ dʕbdykwn
21:13	hʔ ʔnʔ ʕlyky ytbt bʕwmqʔ ʕmyqt pqʕtʔ ʔmr mryʔ dʔmryn mn nʔtʔ ʕlyn wmnw nʕwl lmʕmrn
21:14	ʔpqwd ʕlykwn ʔyk pʔry ʕbdykwn ʔmr mryʔ wʔšbwq nwrʔ bqwryh wtʔkwl klhwn ḥdryh
22:01	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥwt lbyt mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wmll tmn ptgmʔ hnʔ
22:02	wʔmr šmʕw ptgmh dmryʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ dytb ʕl kwrsyh ddwyd ʔnt wʕbdyk wʕmk dʕʔlyn btrʕʔ hlyn
22:03	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʕbdw dynʔ wzdyqwtʔ wpṣw lṭlymʔ mn mn dṭlm lh wlʕmwrʔ wlytmʔ wlʔrmltʔ lʔ tʕlbwn wlʔ tṭlmwn wdmʔ zkyʔ lʔ tʔšdwn bʔtrʔ hnʔ
22:04	wʔn mʕbd tʕbdwn ptgmʔ hnʔ nʕlwn btrʕwhy dbytʔ hnʔ mlkʔ dytbyn ʕl kwrsyh ddwyd kd rkybyn bmrkbtʔ wbrkšʔ hw wʕbdwhy wʕmh
22:05	wʔlʔ tšmʕwn ptgmʔ hnʔ by ʔymyt ʔmr mryʔ dlḥwrbʔ nhwʔ bytʔ hnʔ
22:06	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʕl byt mlkʔ dyhwdʔ glʕd ʔnt hw ryš lbnn ʔlʔ ʔʕbdk mdbrʔ ʔyk qwryʔ dlʔ ʔtytb
22:07	wʔṭyb ʕlyk mḥblnʔ gbrʔ wnrgh bʔydh wnpsqwn gbyʔ dʔrzyk wnrmwn bnwrʔ
22:08	wnʔbdwn ʕmmʔ sgyʔʔ ʕl qrytʔ hdʔ rbtʔ nʔmrwn gbr lḥbrh ʕl mnʔ ʕbd mryʔ hknʔ lqrytʔ hdʔ rbtʔ
22:09	wnʔmrwn ʕl dšbqw qymh dmryʔ ʔlhhwn wsgdw lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ wplḥw ʔnwn
22:10	lʔ tbkwn ʕl mytʔ wlʔ tnwdwn ʕlwhy bkw mbkʔ ʕl mn dʔzl wtwb lʔ hpk wlʔ ḥzʔ ʔrʕʔ dʔtyld bh
22:11	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʕl šlwm br ywšyʔ dʔmlk ḥlp ywšyʔ ʔbwhy dnpq mn ʔtrʔ hnʔ lʔ nhpwk ltmn twb
22:12	ʔlʔ bʔtrʔ dʔštby tmn nmwt wʔrʕʔ hdʔ twb lʔ nḥzʔ
22:13	wy ldbnʔ byth dlʔ bzdqʔ wʕlyth dlʔ bdynʔ ḥbrh plḥ lh mgn wʔgrh lʔ yhb lh
22:14	dʔmr ʔbnʔ ly bytʔ dmwšḥtʔ wʕlytʔ mrwḥtʔ wptḥ lhyn kwʔ wmṭll lhyn bʔrzʔ wṣʔr lhyn ṣwrtʔ
22:15	mmlk ʔnt dʔnt mtḥdʔ bʔrzʔ ʔbwk ʔkl wʔšty wʕbd dynʔ wzdyqwtʔ mṭl hnʔ ʔṭʔbt lh
22:16	dn dynʔ dmsknʔ wdbyšʔ wʕbd dšpyr mn dhlyn ʕbd ydʕ ly ʔmr mryʔ
22:17	dylk dyn ʕynyk wlbk lyt ʕl mdm ʔḥrn ʔlʔ ʕl qnynk wʕl dmʔ zkyʔ lmʔšd wʕl ʕšwqyʔ wʕl ṭlwmyʔ lmʕbd
22:18	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʕl ywyqym br ywšyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ lʔ nrqdwn ʕlwhy wlʔ nʔmrwn wy ʔḥy wy ʔḥy wlʔ nrqdwn ʕlwhy wy mrʔ wy mrʔ
22:19	qbwrt ḥmr ntqbr wngrwn wnšdwnh lhl mn trʕyh dʔwršlm
22:20	sqy llbnn wʔzʕqy wbmtnyn ʔrymy qlky wʔzʕqy mn ʕbry ymʔ dʔttbrw klhwn rḥmyky
22:21	wʔmrt lky bkhynwtky wʔmrty lʔ ʔšmʕ hdʔ hy ʔwrḥky mn ṭlywtky wlʔ šmʕty bqly
22:22	lklhwn rʕwtky trʕʔ ʔnwn rwḥʔ wrḥmyky bšbyʔ nʔzlwn why dyn tbhtyn wttksyn mn klhyn byštky
22:23	ytbt blbnn mqnt bʔrzʔ mnʔ mttnḥty kd nʔtwn ʕlyky ḥblʔ wzwʕtʔ ʔyk dyldtʔ
22:24	ḥy ʔnʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ ʔn nhwʔ ywknyʔ br ywyqym mlkʔ dyhwdʔ ḥtmʔ ʕl ʔydy dymynʔ ʔlʔ mn tmn ʔʕqrk
22:25	wʔšlmk byd ʔnšʔ ʔylyn dbʕyn npšk wbyd ʔylyn ddḥl ʔnt mn qdmyhwn bʔydʔ dnbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl wbʔydʔ dkldyʔ
22:26	wʔšdyk lk wlʔmk dyldtk lʔrʕʔ ʔḥrtʔ dlʔ ʔtyldtwn tmn wtmn tmwtwn
22:27	wlʔrʕʔ dsbrn npštkwn lmhpk ltmn lʔ thpkwn
22:28	bsyrʔ wšyṭʔ gbrʔ hnʔ ywknyʔ ʔyk mʔnʔ dlyt bh ḥšḥw mṭl hnʔ ʔštql hw wzrʕh wʔštdyw lʔrʕʔ dlʔ ydʕyn
22:29	ʔrʕʔ ʔrʕʔ ʔrʕʔ šmʕy ptgmh dmryʔ
22:30	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ kwtbwhy lgbrʔ hnʔ mkrzʔ dlʔ bnyn mṭl dgbrʔ bywmth lʔ nṣlny mn zrʕh gbrʔ dytb ʕl kwrsyh ddwyd wmštlṭ twb byhwdʔ
23:01	ʔw rʕwtʔ dmwbdyn wmbdryn ʕnʔ dmrʕyty ʔmr mryʔ
23:02	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʕl rʕwtʔ drʕyn lʕmy ʔntwn bdrtwn lʕny wʔṭʕytwn ʔnyn wlʔ pqdtwn ʔnyn hʔ pqd ʔnʔ ʕlykwn ʔyk byšwt ʕbdykwn ʔmr mryʔ
23:03	wʔnʔ ʔknš šrkʔ dʕny mn klhwn ʔtrwtʔ dbdrt ʔnwn ltmn wʔhpk ʔnwn ldyrhwn wnkbrwn wnsgwn
23:04	wʔqym ʕlyhwn rʕwtʔ wnrʕwn ʔnwn wlʔ ndḥlwn twb wlʔ ntbdrwn wlʔ nṭʕwn ʔmr mryʔ
23:05	hʔ ywmtʔ ʔtyn ʔmr mryʔ wʔqym ldwyd ṣmḥʔ dzdyqwtʔ wnmlk bmlkwtʔ wnstkl wnʕbd dynʔ wzdyqwtʔ bʔrʕʔ
23:06	bywmwhy ntprq yhwdʔ wʔysryl nšrʔ bšlyʔ whnw šmh dnqrwnh mryʔ zdqn
23:07	mṭl hnʔ hʔ ywmtʔ ʔtyn ʔmr mryʔ wlʔ ntʔmr twb ḥy hw mryʔ dʔsq ldbyt ʔysryl mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
23:08	ʔlʔ ḥy hw mryʔ dnsq wnytʔ ldbyt ʔysryl mn ʔrʕʔ dgrbyʔ wmn klhwn ʔtrwtʔ dʔtbdrw bhwn wntbwn bʔrʕhwn
23:09	ʕl nbyʔ ʔttbr lby bgwy wzʕw klhwn grmy hwyt ʔyk gbrʔ rwyʔ wʔyk gbrʔ dʕbrh ḥmrh mn qdm mryʔ wmn qdm ptgmy qwdšh
23:10	mṭl dgyrʔ wḥṭwpʔ ʔtmlyt ʔrʕʔ mṭl hlyn ʔtʔblt ʔrʕʔ wybš dyrʔ dmdbrʔ whwʔ rhṭnhwn byš wbgnbrwthwn lʔ ʔkšrw
23:11	mṭl dʔp nbyʔ ʔp khnʔ ʔtḥnpw ʔp bbyty ʔškḥt byšwthwn ʔmr mryʔ
23:12	mṭl hnʔ nhwyn lhwn ʔwrḥthwn mšrwʕytʔ wlḥšwkʔ ntdḥwn wnplwn bhyn mṭl dmytʔ ʔnʔ ʕlyhwn byštʔ šntʔ dpwqdnhwn ʔmr mryʔ
23:13	wbnbyy šmryn ḥzyt dglwtʔ ʔtnbyw bbʕlʔ wʔṭʕyw lʕmy ʔysryl
23:14	wbnbyy ʔwršlm ḥzyt šṭywtʔ gyryn wmhlkyn bšwqrʔ wmḥmsnyn ʔydyhwn mn rḥmyhwn dlʔ nhpkwn gbr mn ʔwrḥh byštʔ whww ly klhwn ʔyk sdwm wytbyh ʔyk ʕmwrʔ
23:15	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ṣbʔwt ʕl nbyʔ hʔ mwkl ʔnʔ lhwn mrrʔ wʔšqʔ ʔnwn myʔ mryrʔ mṭl dmn lwt nbyʔ dʔwršlm npqt ḥnpwtʔ bklh ʔrʕʔ
23:16	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ṣbʔwt lʔ tšmʕwn lptgmʔ dnbyʔ dglʔ dmtnbyn lkwn wmṭʕyn lkwn ḥzwʔ hw dlbhwn mmllyn wlʔ hwʔ mn pwm mryʔ
23:17	wʔmryn lʔylyn dmrgzyn bptgmh dmryʔ šlmʔ nhwʔ lkwn wkl dmhlk bṣbynʔ dlbh ʔmryn lh lʔ tʔtʔ ʕlykwn byštʔ
23:18	mnw gyr qm bʔrzh dmryʔ wḥzyhy wšmʕ ptgmh ʔw mnw ṣt ptgmh wšmʕh
23:19	hʔ swʕrnh dmryʔ brwgzʔ npq wswʕrnʔ mtgwzl ʕl ryšʔ dršyʕʔ nttnyḥ
23:20	lʔ thpwk ḥmtʔ drwgzh ʕdmʔ dnʕbd wʕdmʔ dnqym trʕytʔ dlbh bʔḥryt ywmtʔ ttbnwn bh
23:21	lʔ šdrt lnbyʔ whnwn ʔzlw wlʔ ʔmrt lhwn whnwn ʔtnbyw
23:22	wlʔ qmw bʔrzy wʔšmʕw ptgmy lʕmy wʔtybw ʔnwn mn ʔwrḥthwn byštʔ wmn byšwt ʕbdyhwn
23:23	ʔlhʔ ʔnʔ dmn qwrbʔ ʔmr mryʔ wlʔ hwyt ʔlhʔ dmn rwḥqʔ
23:24	ʔn nṭšʔ gbrʔ bṭwšyy ʔnʔ lʔ ḥzʔ ʔnʔ lh ʔmr mryʔ hʔ šmyʔ wʔrʕʔ mny mlyn ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ
23:25	šmʕt mdm dʔmrw nbyʔ dmtnbyn bšmy bdglwtʔ wʔmryn ḥlmʔ ḥlmt
23:26	ʕdmʔ lʔmty ʔnt bpwmhwn dnbyʔ dglʔ nbywtʔ dgltʔ nbywtʔ dnklʔ dlbhwn
23:27	dmtḥšbyn lmṭʕyw bšmy lʕmy bḥlmyhwn dmštʕyn gbr lḥbrh ʔyk dṭʕw ʔbhyhwn šmy wplḥw lbʕlʔ
23:28	nbyʔ dḥzʔ ḥlmʔ nštʕʔ ḥlmʔ wdptgmy ʕmh nmll ptgmy bqwštʔ lmnʔ ḥlṭyn ʔntwn tbnʔ bʕbwrʔ ʔmr mryʔ
23:29	hʔ ptgmy ʔyk nwrʔ npqyn ʔmr mryʔ wʔyk przlʔ dgzr kʔpʔ
23:30	mṭl hnʔ hʔ ʔnʔ ʕl nbyʔ ʔmr mryʔ dmgnbyn ptgmy ʔnš mn ḥbrh
23:31	hʔ ʔnʔ ʕl nbyʔ ʔmr mryʔ dmhpkyn lšnyhwn wʔmryn mryʔ ʔmr hknʔ
23:32	hʔ ʔnʔ ʕl nbyʔ dḥzyn ḥlmʔ dglʔ ʔmr mryʔ wmštʕyn lhwn wmṭʕyn lʔmy bdglwthwn wbpḥzwthwn wʔnʔ lʔ šdrt ʔnwn wlʔ pqdt ʔnwn wmdm lʔ mwtryn lʕmʔ hnʔ
23:33	wkd nšʔlk ʕmʔ hnʔ ʔw nbyʔ ʔw khnʔ wnʔmr lk mnw ptgmh dmryʔ ʔmr lhwn ʔnt hnʔ hw ptgmh dmryʔ dʔʕqwrkwn ʔmr mryʔ
23:34	wnbyʔ ʔw khnʔ ʔw ʕmʔ dnʔmr ptgmh dmryʔ ʔpqwd ʕl gbrʔ hw wʕl byth
23:35	hknʔ tʔmrwn gbr lḥbrh wgbr lʔḥwhy mnʔ ʕnʔ mryʔ wmnʔ mll mryʔ
23:36	wptgmh dmryʔ lʔ ttdkrwn twb mṭl dptgmʔ nhwʔ lgbrʔ nbywth whpkyn ʔntwn ptgmwhy dʔlhʔ ḥyʔ mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhn
23:37	hknʔ tʔmrwn lgbrʔ mnʔ ʕnk mryʔ wmnʔ mll mryʔ
23:38	wʔn ptgmh dmryʔ tʔmrwn hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʕl dʔmrtwn ptgmʔ hnʔ wšlḥt lkwn dlʔ tʔmrwn
23:39	mṭl hnʔ ʔšqwlkwn mšql wʔšdykwn wlqrytʔ dyhbt lkwn wlʔbhykwn mn qdm ʔpy
23:40	wʔtl ʕlykwn ḥsdʔ dʕlm wbhttʔ dlʕlm dlʔ mtṭʕyʔ
24:01	ḥwyny mryʔ trtyn msnʔ dtʔnʔ symn qdm hyklh dmryʔ mn btr dšbʔ nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl lywknyʔ br ywyqym mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wlʔwmnʔ wldḥšʔ mn ʔwršlm wʔwbl ʔnwn lbbl
24:02	msntʔ ḥdʔ dtʔnʔ dṭbn ṭb ʔyk tʔnʔ bkrtʔ wmsntʔ ʔḥrtʔ dtʔnʔ dbyšn ṭb dlʔ mtʔkln mn byšwthyn
24:03	wʔmr ly mryʔ mnʔ ḥzyt ʔrmyʔ wʔmrt tʔnʔ dṭbn ṭbn ṭb wdbyšn byšn ṭb dlʔ mtʔkln mn byšwthyn
24:04	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
24:05	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʔyk tʔnʔ ṭbtʔ hlyn hknʔ ʔštwdʕyh lšbytʔ dyhwdʔ dšdrt mn ʔtrʔ hnʔ lʔrʕʔ dkldyʔ lṭbtʔ
24:06	wʔsym ʕyny ʕlyhwn lṭbtʔ wʔhpk ʔnwn lʔtrʔ hnʔ wʔbnʔ ʔnwn wlʔ ʔsḥwp wʔṣwb ʔnwn wlʔ ʔʕqwr
24:07	wʔtl lhwn lbʔ dndʕwnny dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ wnhwwn ly ʕmʔ wʔnʔ ʔhwʔ lhwn ʔlhʔ kd ntwbwn lwty mn klh lbhwn
24:08	wʔyk tʔnʔ byštʔ dlʔ mtʔkln mn byšwthyn hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hknʔ ʔšlmywhy lṣdqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wlrwrbnwhy wlšrkʔ dʕmʔ dʔštḥr bqrytʔ hdʔ wdytbyn bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
24:09	wʔtl ʔnwn lzwʕtʔ wlnydʔ wlbyštʔ bynt klhyn mlkwtʔ dʔrʕʔ lḥsdʔ wlmtlʔ wltwnyʔ wllwṭtʔ bklhwn ʔtrwtʔ dʔbdr ʔnwn ltmn
24:10	wʔšdr btrhwn ḥrbʔ wkpnʔ wmwtnʔ ʕdmʔ dʔgmr ʔnwn mn ʔrʕʔ dyhbt lhwn wlʔbhyhwn
25:01	ptgmʔ dhwʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ ʕl klh ʕmʔ dyhwdʔ bšntʔ rbyʕytʔ dywyqym br ywšyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ hy hy šntʔ qdmytʔ dnbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl
25:02	dʔmr ʔrmyʔ nbyʔ ʕl klh ʕmʔ dyhwdʔ wʕl klhwn ʕmwryh dʔwršlm lmʔmr
25:03	mn tltʕsrʔ šnyn lywšyʔ br ʔmwn mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wʕdmʔ lywmʔ hnʔ hʔ ʕsryn wtlt šnyn hwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ wʔmrt lkwn qdmt kl ywm wʔmrt wlʔ šmʕtwn
25:04	wšdr mryʔ lwtkwn klhwn ʕbdwhy nbyʔ qdm wšdr wlʔ šmʕtwn wlʔ ʔrkntwn ʔdnkwn lmšmʕ
25:05	wlmʔmr twbw gbr mn ʔwrḥh byštʔ wmn byšwt ʕbdykwn wtbw bʔrʕʔ dyhb lkwn mryʔ wlʔbhykwn mn ʕlm wʕdmʔ lʕlm
25:06	wlʔ tʔzlwn btr ʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ lmplḥ ʔnwn wlmsgd lhwn wlʔ trgzwnny bʕbd ʔydykwn dlʔ ʔbʔš lkwn
25:07	wlʔ šmʕtwnny ʔmr mryʔ wʔrgztwnny bʕbd ʔydykwn dnbʔš lkwn
25:08	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ṣbʔwt ʕl dlʔ šmʕtwn ptgmy
25:09	hʔ mšdr ʔnʔ wdbr ʔnʔ lklhyn šrbtʔ dmlkwtʔ dgrbyʔ ʔmr mryʔ wlnbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl ʕbdy wʔytʔ ʔnwn ʕl ʔrʕʔ hdʔ wʕl ʕmwryh wʕl ʕmmʔ hlyn dbḥdryh wʔḥrwb ʔnwn wʔʕbd ʔnwn ltmhʔ wlmšrwqytʔ wlḥwrbʔ lʕlm
25:10	wʔwbd mnhwn qlʔ ddyṣʔ wqlʔ dḥdwtʔ qlʔ dḥtnʔ wqlʔ dkltʔ qlʔ drḥyʔ wnwhrʔ dšrgʔ
25:11	wthwʔ ʔrʕʔ hdʔ kwlh lḥwrbʔ wltmhʔ wnplḥwn ʕmmʔ hlyn lmlkʔ dbbl šbʕyn šnyn
25:12	wmʔ dšlm šbʕyn šnyn ʔpqwd ʕl mlkʔ dbbl wʕl ʕmh ḥwbyhwn ʔmr mryʔ wʕl ʔrʕʔ dkldyʔ wʔʕbdyh ltmhʔ lʕlm
25:13	wʔytʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ hy klhwn ptgmʔ dʔmrt ʕlyh kl mdm dktyb bsprʔ hnʔ dʔtnby ʔrmyʔ ʕl klhwn ʕmmʔ
25:14	mṭl dšʕbdw ʔnwn ʔp lhwn ʕmmʔ sgyʔʔ wmlkʔ rwrbʔ wʔprwʕ ʔnwn ʔyk pʕlhwn wʔyk ʕbdʔ dʔydyhwn
25:15	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl sb ksʔ dḥmrʔ dḥmtʔ hdʔ mn ʔydy wʔšqyhy lklhwn ʕmmʔ ʔylyn dmšdr ʔnʔ lk ʕlyhwn
25:16	nštwn wntwrwn wntṭrpwn mn qdm ḥrbʔ dmšdr ʔnʔ bynthwn
25:17	wnsbt ksʔ mn ʔydh dmryʔ wʔšqyt lklhwn ʕmmʔ dšdrny mryʔ ʕlyhwn
25:18	lʔwršlm wlqwryʔ dyhwdʔ wlmlkyh wlrwrbnyh lmʕbd ʔnwn lḥwrbʔ wltmhʔ wlmšrwqytʔ ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
25:19	lprʕwn mlkʔ dmṣryn wlklhwn ʕbdwhy wlrwrbnwhy wlklh ʕmh
25:20	wlklhwn tḥwmwhy wlklhwn mlkʔ dʕwṣ wlklhwn mlkʔ dʔrʕʔ dplštyʔ wlʔšqlwn wlʕʔzʔ wlʕqrwn wlšrkʔ dʔšdwd
25:21	wlʔdwm wlmwʔb wlbny ʕmwn
25:22	wlklhwn mlkʔ dṣwr wlklhwn mlkʔ dṣydn wlmlkʔ dgzrtʔ dbʕbrʔ dymʔ
25:23	wldrn wltymnʔ wlbwz wlklhwn qṣyṣy pʔtʔ
25:24	wlklhwn mlkʔ dmtḥmyn ḥd ʕm ḥd wlklhwn mlkʔ dʕrbyʔ dšryn bmdbrʔ
25:25	wlklhwn mlkʔ dzmrn wlklhwn mlkʔ dʕylm wlklhwn mlkʔ dmdy
25:26	wlklhwn mlkʔ dgrbyʔ drḥyqyn wdqrybyn gbr lḥbrh wlklhyn mlkwtʔ dʔyt ʕl ʔpy ʔrʕʔ klh wmlkʔ ʔrškyʔ nštʔ btrhwn
25:27	wʔmr lhwn hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʔštw wrww wʔtṭrpw wplw wlʔ tqwmwn mn qdm ḥrbʔ dmšdr ʔnʔ byntkwn
25:28	wʔn lʔ nṣbwn lmsb ksʔ mn ʔydk lmštʔ ʔmr lhwn hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl mštʔ tštwn
25:29	mṭl dhʔ qrytʔ dʔtqry šmy ʕlyh mnh mšrʔ ʔnʔ lmbʔšw lh wʔntwn mzkʔ tzkwn lʔ tzkwn mṭl dḥrbʔ qrʔ ʔnʔ ʕl klhwn ʕmwryh dʔrʕʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ
25:30	wʔnt ttnbʔ ʕlyhwn klhwn ptgmʔ hlyn wtʔmr lhwn mryʔ mn mrwmʔ nnhm wmn mʕmrʔ dqwdšh ntl qlh mnhm nnhm ʕl dyrh yhy yhy ʔyk ʕṣwrʔ nʕnʔ ʕl klhwn ʕmwryh dʔrʕʔ
25:31	mṭʔ ʔrgwšyʔ ʕdmʔ lswpyh dʔrʕʔ mṭl ddynʔ lmryʔ ʕm ʕmmʔ dʔn hw lkl bsr wršyʕʔ ʔšlm ʔnwn lḥrbʔ ʔmr mryʔ
25:32	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl hʔ byštʔ npqʔ mn ʕmʔ lʕmʔ wʕlʕlʔ rbtʔ tdwl mn swpyh dʔrʕʔ
25:33	wnhwwn qṭylwhy dmryʔ bywmʔ hw mn swpyh dʔrʕʔ wʕdmʔ lswpyh dʔrʕʔ lʔ nyllwn wlʔ nrqdwn wlʔ nbkwn ʕlyhwn wlʔ ntknšwn wlʔ ntqbrwn ʔlʔ ʔyk zblʔ ʕl ʔpy ʔrʕʔ nhwwn
25:34	ʔyllw rʕwtʔ wʔzʕqw wʔtplplw ʕšyny ʕnʔ dmlw ywmtkwn lqṭlʔ wttbrwn wtplwn ʔyk mʔny rgtʔ
25:35	wnʔbd byt ʕrwqyʔ mn rʕwtʔ wpwlṭʔ mn dkrʔ dʕnʔ
25:36	ql zʕqtʔ drʕwtʔ wylltʔ ddkrʔ dʕnʔ dbz mryʔ mrʕythwn
25:37	wnttbrn dyrʔ dšlmʔ mn qdm ḥmtʔ drwgzh dmryʔ
25:38	mṭl dšbq dyrh ʔyk ʔryʔ dšbq mrbwʕyth mṭl dhwt ʔrʕhwn lḥwrbʔ mn qdm rwgzh dmryʔ wmn qdm ḥmtʔ drwgzh
26:01	bryš mlkwth dywyqym br ywšyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ hwʔ ptgmʔ hnʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ mn qdm mryʔ wʔmr
26:02	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ qwm bdrtʔ dbyth dmryʔ wʔmr lklhyn qwryʔ dyhwdʔ dʔtyn lmsgd bbyth dmryʔ kwlhwn ptgmʔ dpqdtk lmʔmr lhwn lʔ tbṣr ʔp lʔ ḥdʔ mlʔ
26:03	ṭk nšmʕwn wntwbwn gbr mn ʔwrḥh byštʔ wʔšlʔ mn byštʔ dʔtḥšbt lmʔbd lhwn mṭl byšwtʔ dʕbdyhwn
26:04	wʔmr lhwn hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlʔ tšmʕwnny wthlkwn bnmwsy dyhbt qdmykwn
26:05	wtšmʕwn lptgmʔ dʕbdy nbyʔ dʔnʔ mšdr lwtkwn qdmt klywm wšdrt wlʔ šmʕtwn
26:06	ʔʕbdywhy lbytʔ hnʔ ʔyk šylw wlqrytʔ hdʔ ʔtl llwṭtʔ lklhwn ʕmmʔ dʔrʕʔ
26:07	wšmʕw khnʔ wnbyʔ dglʔ wklh ʕmʔ lʔrmyʔ nbyʔ kd mmll ptgmʔ hlyn bbyth dmryʔ
26:08	wkd šlm ʔrmyʔ lmʔmr kl mdm dpqdh mryʔ lmʔmr lklh ʕmʔ ʔḥdwhy khnʔ wnbyʔ dglʔ wklh ʕmʔ wʔmrw ntqṭl
26:09	dʔtnby bšmh dmryʔ wʔmr dʔyk šylw nhwʔ bytʔ hnʔ wqrytʔ hdʔ tḥrb mn bly dytb wʔtknšw klh ʕmʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ bbytʔ dmryʔ
26:10	wšmʕw rwrbnʔ dyhwdʔ ptgmʔ hlyn wslqw mn byt mlkʔ lbyth dmryʔ wytbw bmʕlnʔ dtrʕʔ ḥdtʔ dbyth dmryʔ
26:11	wʔmrw khnʔ wnbyʔ dglʔ lrwrbnʔ wlklh ʕmʔ lmʔmr dynʔ dmwtʔ ḥyb gbrʔ hnʔ dʔtnby ʕl qrytʔ hdʔ wʕl ʕmwryh ʔyk mdm dšmʕtwn bʔdnykwn
26:12	wʔmr ʔrmyʔ lklhwn rwrbnʔ wlklh ʕmʔ mryʔ hw šdrny lmtnbyw ʕl bytʔ hnʔ wʕl qrytʔ hdʔ klhwn ptgmʔ dšmʕtwn
26:13	whšʔ ʔṭʔbw ʔwrḥtkwn wʕbdykwn wšmʕw bqlh dmryʔ ʔlhkwn wnttnyḥ mryʔ mn byštʔ dʔmr ʕlykwn
26:14	wʔnʔ hʔ bʔydykwn ʔnʔ ʕbdw ly ʔyk dṭb wʔyk dšpyr bʕynykwn
26:15	brm mdʕ tdʕwn dʔn qṭlyn ʔntwn ly dmʔ hw zkyʔ ḥšbyn ʔntwn ʕlykwn wʕl qrytʔ hdʔ wʕl ʕmwryh mṭl dbqwštʔ šdrny mryʔ ʕlykwn dʔmr bʔdnykwn klhwn ptgmʔ hlyn
26:16	wʔmrw rwrbnʔ wklh ʕmʔ lkhnʔ wlnbyʔ dglʔ lʔ ḥyb gbrʔ hnʔ mwtʔ mṭl dbšmh hw dmryʔ ʔlhn {ʔmrw}<ʔmr> ln
26:17	wqmw gbrʔ mn sbʔ dʔrʕʔ wʔmrw lklh knšʔ dʕmʔ
26:18	mykʔ mʔršyʔ ʔtnby hwʔ bywmwhy dḥzqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wʔmr lkwlh ʕmʔ dyhwdʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ṣbʔwt ṣhywn ḥqlʔ ttdbr wʔwršlm ḥrbtʔ thwʔ wṭwr bytʔ lbyt ʕbʔ
26:19	dlmʔ mqṭl qṭlh hwʔ ḥzqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wklh yhwdʔ ʔlʔ dḥlw mn mryʔ wṣlyw qdmwhy wʔttnyḥ mryʔ mn byštʔ dʔmr ʕlyhwn wḥnn dyn bʕyn ḥnn lmʕbd byštʔ rbtʔ ʕl npštn
26:20	wʔp gbrʔ ʔyt hwʔ dmtnbʔ bšmh dmryʔ ʔwryʔ br šmʕyʔ mn qwryt nʕryn wʔtnby ʕl qrytʔ hdʔ wʕl ʔrʕʔ hdʔ ʔyk klhwn ptgmwhy dʔrmyʔ
26:21	wšmʕ mlkʔ ywyqym wklhwn ʕbdwhy wkwlhwn rwrbnwhy ptgmwhy wbʕʔ mlkʔ lmqṭlh wšmʕ ʔwryʔ wdḥl wʕrq wʔzl lmṣryn
26:22	wšdr mlkʔ ywyqym lʔnšʔ mṣryʔ lʔlytn br ʕbkwr wʔnšʔ ʕmh lmṣryn
26:23	wʔpqwhy lʔwryʔ mn mṣryn wʔytywhy lwt mlkʔ ywyqym wqṭlh bḥrbʔ wʔrmy šldh ʕl qbrʔ dbny ʕmʔ
26:24	brm ʔydh dʔḥyqm br špn hwt ʕl ʔrmyʔ dlʔ nšlmywhy bʔydʔ dʕmʔ lmqṭlh
27:01	bryš mlkwth dṣdqyʔ br ywšyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ hwʔ ptgmʔ hnʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ mn qdm mryʔ wʔmr
27:02	hknʔ ʔmr ly mryʔ ʕbd lk nyrʔ wḥnqʔ wʔrmʔ ʔnwn bṣwrk
27:03	wšdr ʔnwn lmlkʔ dʔdwm wlmlkʔ dmwʔb wlmlkʔ dbny ʕmwn wlmlkʔ dṣwr wlmlkʔ dṣydn bʔydʔ dʔyzgdʔ dʔtyn lʔwršlm lwt ṣdqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ
27:04	wpqd ʔnwn dnʔmrwn lmryhwn hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl hknʔ tʔmrwn lmrykwn
27:05	ʔnʔ ʕbdt ʔrʕʔ wbnynšʔ wbʕyrʔ dʕl ʔpy ʔrʕʔ bḥyly rbʔ wbdrʕy rmʔ wyhbth lmn dšpr bʕyny
27:06	whšʔ ʔnʔ yhbt klhyn ʔrʕtʔ hlyn lmplḥ lnbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl ʕbdy wnplḥwnh ʔp ḥywtʔ ddbrʔ yhbt lh lmplḥh
27:07	wnplḥwnh ʕmmʔ lh wlbrh wlbr brh ʕdmʔ dnmṭʔ zbnʔ dʔrʕh ʔp dylh wnplḥwnh ʕmmʔ sgyʔʔ wmlkʔ rwrbʔ
27:08	wʕmʔ wmlkwtʔ dlʔ nplḥwnh l<n>bwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl wmn dlʔ nʕl ṣwrh bnyrh dmlkʔ dbbl bḥrbʔ wbkpnʔ wbmwtnʔ ʔpqwd ʕl ʕmʔ hw ʔmr mryʔ ʕdmʔ dʔšlm ʔnwn bʔydh
27:09	wʔntwn lʔ tšmʕwn lnbyykwn dglʔ wlqṣwmykwn wlḥlmykwn wlnḥšykwn wlḥršykwn dhnwn ʔmryn lkwn lʔ tplḥwn lmlkʔ dbbl
27:10	mṭl dšwqrʔ hnwn mtnbyn lkwn dʔdḥwqkwn mn ʔrʕkwn dʔdḥwqkwn wtʔbdwn
27:11	wʕmʔ dnʕl ṣwrh bnyrh dmlkʔ dbbl wnplḥywhy nšbqywhy bʔrʕh ʔmr mryʔ wnplḥyh wntb bh
27:12	wlṣdqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ ʔmrt ʔyk klhwn ptgmʔ hlyn wʔmrt ʔʕlw ṣwrkwn bnyrh dmlkʔ dbbl wpwlḥwhy lh wlʕmh wḥyw
27:13	wlʔ tmwtwn ʔnt wʕmk bḥrbʔ wbkpnʔ wbmwtnʔ ʔyk dʔmr mryʔ ʕl ʕmʔ dlʔ nplḥwn lmlkʔ dbbl
27:14	wʔntwn lʔ tšmʕwn lptgmʔ dnbyʔ dglʔ dʔmryn lkwn lʔ tplḥwn lmlkʔ dbbl mṭl dšwqrʔ hnwn mtnbyn lkwn
27:15	lʔ šdrt ʔnwn ʔmr mryʔ whnwn mtnbyn bšmy bšwqrʔ dʔdḥwqkwn wtʔbdwn ʔntwn wnbyʔ dmtnbyn lkwn
27:16	wlkhnʔ wlklh ʕmʔ hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ lʔ tšmʕwn lptgmʔ dnbyykwn dmtnbyn lkwn wʔmryn hʔ mʔnʔ dbyth dmryʔ hpkyn mn bbl bʕgl mṭl dšwqrʔ hnwn mtnbyn lkwn
27:17	lʔ tšmʕwn ʔnwn ʔmr mryʔ plwḥw lmlkʔ dbbl wḥyw wlʔ thwʔ qrytʔ hdʔ ḥrbtʔ
27:18	wʔn nbyʔ ʔnwn wʔyt ptgmh dmryʔ bhwn nbʕwn mn mryʔ ḥyltnʔ dlʔ nʔzlwn mʔnʔ dʔštḥrw bbyth dmryʔ wbbyt mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wbʔwršlm lbbl
27:19	mṭwl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʕl ʕmwdʔ wʕl ymʔ wʕl mgsʔ wʕl šrkʔ dmʔnʔ dʔštḥrw bqrytʔ hdʔ
27:20	dlʔ nsb ʔnwn nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl kd šbʔ lywknyʔ br ywyqym mlkʔ dyhwdʔ mn ʔwršlm lbbl wlklhwn rwrbnʔ dyhwdʔ wdʔwršlm
27:21	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʕl mʔnʔ dʔštḥrw bbyth dmryʔ wbbyt mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wbʔwršlm
27:22	lbbl nʔzlwn wtmn nhwwn ʕdmʔ lywmʔ dʔpqwd ʔnwn ʔmr mryʔ wʔsq ʔnwn wʔhpk ʔnwn lʔtrʔ hnʔ
28:01	whwʔ bšntʔ hy bryš mlkwth dṣdqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ bšntʔ ʔrbyʕytʔ byrḥʔ dḥmšʔ ʔmr ly ḥnnyʔ br ʕzwr nbyʔ dglʔ dmn gbʕwn bbyth dmryʔ lʕyn khnʔ wlʕyn klh ʕmʔ
28:02	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl tbrt nyrh dmlkʔ dbbl
28:03	mkʔ ltrtyn šnyn mhpk ʔnʔ lʔtrʔ hnʔ kwlhwn mʔnʔ dbyth dmryʔ dnsb nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl mn ʔtrʔ hnʔ wʔwbl ʔnwn lbbl
28:04	ʕm ywknyʔ br ywyqym mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wlklh šbytʔ dyhwdʔ dʔzlw lbbl mhpk ʔnʔ lʔtrʔ hnʔ ʔmr mryʔ mṭl dtbr ʔnʔ nyrh dmlkʔ dbbl
28:05	wʔmr ʔrmyʔ nbyʔ lḥnnyʔ nbyʔ dglʔ lʕyn khnʔ wlʕyn klh ʕmʔ dqymyn bbyth dmryʔ
28:06	wʔmr ʔrmyʔ ʔmyn hknʔ nʕbd mryʔ nqym mryʔ ptgmʔ dʔtnbyt lmhpkw mʔnʔ dbyth dmryʔ wklh šbytʔ mn bbl lʔtrʔ hnʔ
28:07	brm šmʕ ptgmʔ hnʔ dʔmr ʔnʔ qdmyk wqdm klh ʕmʔ hnʔ
28:08	nbyʔ dhww qdmy wqdmyk mn ʕlm wʔtnbyw ʕl ʔrʕtʔ sgyʔtʔ wʕl mlkwtʔ rwrbtʔ lqrbʔ wlbyštʔ wlmwtnʔ
28:09	nbyʔ dmtnbʔ šlmʔ mʔ dhwʔ ptgmh dnbyʔ ʔtydʕ nbyʔ hw dšdrh mryʔ bqwštʔ
28:10	wnsb ḥnnyʔ nbyʔ dglʔ ḥnqʔ mn ṣwrh dʔrmyʔ nbyʔ wtbr ʔnwn
28:11	wʔmr ḥnnyʔ lʕyn klh ʕmʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hknʔ ʔtbrywhy lnyrh dnbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl mkʔ ltrtyn šnyn mn ṣwrʔ dklhwn ʕmmʔ wʔzl ʔrmyʔ nbyʔ lʔwrḥh
28:12	whwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ nbyʔ mn btr dtbr ḥnnyʔ nbyʔ dglʔ ḥnqʔ mn ṣwrh dʔrmyʔ nbyʔ
28:13	zl wʔmr lḥnnyʔ nbyʔ dglʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥnqʔ dqysʔ dtbrt ʕbd ḥlpyhwn nyrʔ dprzlʔ
28:14	mṭwl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ṣbʔwt ʔlhʔ dʔysryl nyrʔ dprzlʔ yhbt ʕl ṣwrʔ dklhwn ʕmmʔ hlyn lmplḥ lnbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl wnplḥwnh wʔp ḥywtʔ ddbrʔ yhbt lh lmplḥh
28:15	wʔmr ʔrmyʔ nbyʔ lḥnnyʔ nbyʔ dglʔ šmʕ ḥnnyʔ lʔ šdrk mryʔ wʔnt ʔtkltyhy lʕmʔ hnʔ ʕl šwqrʔ
28:16	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hʔ šdʔ ʔnʔ lk mn ʔpy ʔrʕʔ šntʔ hdʔ mʔt ʔnt mṭl dʕwlʔ mllt qdm mryʔ
28:17	wmyt ḥnnyʔ nbyʔ dglʔ bšntʔ hy byrḥʔ dšbʕʔ
29:01	whlyn ptgmy ʔgrtʔ dšdr ʔrmyʔ nbyʔ mn ʔwršlm lbbl lwt šrkʔ dsbʔ dšbytʔ wlwt khnʔ wlwt nbyʔ dglʔ wlwt klh ʕmʔ dšbʔ nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl mn ʔwršlm lbbl
29:02	mn btr dnpq ywknyʔ mlkʔ wmlktʔ wmhymnʔ wrwrbnʔ dyhwdʔ wdʔwršlm wʔwmnʔ wdḥšʔ mn ʔwršlm
29:03	byd ʔlʕsʔ br špn wgmryʔ br ḥlqyʔ dšdr ṣdqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ lwt nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl lbbl
29:04	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ṣbʔwt ʔlhʔ dʔysryl lklh šbytʔ dʔštbyt mn ʔwršlm lbbl
29:05	bnw btʔ wtbw wṣwbw gnʔ wʔkwlw pʔryhyn
29:06	sbw nšʔ wʔwldw bnyʔ wbntʔ sbw lbnykwn nšʔ wbntkwn hbw lgbrʔ wnwldwn bnyʔ wbntʔ wsgw tmn wlʔ tzʕrwn
29:07	wšʔlw bšlmʔ dqrytʔ dšbytkwn tmn wṣlw ʕlyh qdm mryʔ dbšlmh nhwʔ lkwn šlmʔ
29:08	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl lʔ nṭʕwnkwn nbyʔ dbyntkwn wqṣwmykwn wlʔ tšmʕwn lḥlmykwn dʔntwn ḥlmyn
29:09	mṭl dšwqrʔ hnwn mtnbyn lkwn bšmy wʔnʔ lʔ šdrt ʔnwn ʔmr mryʔ
