29:10	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔmty dmlyn lbbl šbʕyn šnyn ʔprwqkwn wʔqym ʕlykwn ptgmʔ ṭbʔ lmhpkwtkwn lʔtrʔ hnʔ
29:11	mṭl dʔnʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ mḥšbtʔ dmtḥšb ʔnʔ ʕlykwn ʔmr mryʔ mḥšbtʔ dšlmʔ wlʔ dbyštʔ lmtl lkwn lḥrtʔ sbrʔ
29:12	wtqrwnny wtṣlwn qdmy
29:13	wkd tbʕwnny mn klh lbkwn
29:14	tškḥwnny ʔmr mryʔ wʔhpk šbytkwn wʔknškwn mn kl ʕmmʔ wmn kwl ʔrʕtʔ dbdrtkwn ltmn ʔmr mryʔ wʔhpkkwn lʔtrʔ dʔšbytkwn mn tmn
29:15	mṭl dʔmrtwn dʔqym ln mryʔ nbyʔ bbbl
29:16	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʕl mlkʔ dytb ʕl kwrsyh ddwyd wʕl klh ʕmʔ dytb bqrytʔ hdʔ ʔḥykwn ʔylyn dlʔ npqw ʕmkwn bšbytʔ
29:17	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ hʔ mšdr ʔnʔ ʕlyhwn ḥrbʔ wkpnʔ wmwtnʔ wʔʕbd ʔnwn ʔyk tʔnʔ byštʔ dlʔ mtʔkln mn byšwthyn
29:18	wʔrdwp btrhwn bḥrbʔ wbkpnʔ wbmwtnʔ wʔtl ʔnwn lzwʕtʔ lkwlhyn mlkwtʔ dʔrʕʔ ltmhʔ wllwṭtʔ wlḥsdʔ wlmšrwqytʔ bklhwn ʕmmʔ dbdrt ʔnwn ltmn
29:19	ʕl dlʔ šmʕw ptgmy wšdrt lwthwn klhwn ʕbdy nbyʔ qdmt wšdrt wlʔ šmʕw ʔnwn ʔmr mryʔ
29:20	wʔntwn šmʕw ptgmh dmryʔ klh šbytʔ dʔštbyt mn ʔwršlm lbbl
29:21	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʕl ʔḥb br qwlyʔ wʕl ṣdqyʔ br mʕsyʔ dmtnbyn lkwn bšmy bšwqrʔ hʔ mšlm ʔnʔ lhwn bʔydʔ dnbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl wnqṭl ʔnwn bḥrbʔ lʕnykwn
29:22	wnhwwn llwṭtʔ lkwlh šbytʔ dyhwdʔ dbbbl wnʔmrwn ʕbdk mryʔ ʔyk ṣdqyʔ wʔyk ʔḥb dṭgn ʔnwn mlkʔ dbbl bnwrʔ
29:23	ʕl dʕbdw ʕwlʔ bʔysryl wgrw nšy ḥbryhwn wmllw ptgmʔ bšmy bšwqrʔ dlʔ pqdt ʔnwn wʔnʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ wshd ʔnʔ ʔmr mryʔ
29:24	wšmʕyʔ nḥmlyʔ ʔmr
29:25	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl wšdr bšmh ʔgrtʔ lklh ʕmʔ dbʔwršlm wlṣpnyʔ br mʕsyʔ khnʔ wlkhnʔ
29:26	mryʔ ʔqymk khnʔ ḥlp ywydʕ khnʔ dthwʔ pqwdʔ bbyth dmryʔ ʕl kwl ʔnš dmštṭʔ wmtnbʔ bdglwtʔ wtrmywhy byt ʔsyrʔ wbḥbwšyʔ
29:27	whšʔ lmnʔ lʔ kʔʔ ʔnt bʔrmyʔ dmn ʕntwt dmtnbʔ lkwn
29:28	mṭl dhʔ šlḥ ln lbbl dnwgrʔ hwyn ʔntwn tmn bnw btʔ wtbw wṣwbw gnʔ wʔkwlw pʔryhyn
29:29	wqrʔ ṣpnyʔ khnʔ ʔgrtʔ hdʔ bʔdnwhy dʔrmyʔ nbyʔ
29:30	whwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ lmʔmr
29:31	šlwḥ lklh šbytʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ lšmʕyʔ nḥmlyʔ ʕl dʔtnby lkwn šmʕyʔ mdm dʔnʔ lʔ šdrth wʔtklkwn ʕl šwqrʔ
29:32	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hʔ pqd ʔnʔ ʕl šmʕyʔ nḥmlyʔ wʕl zrʕh dlʔ nhwʔ lh gbrʔ dytb bgw ʕmʔ hnʔ wlʔ nḥzʔ bṭbtʔ dʕbd ʔnʔ lʕmy ʔmr mryʔ mṭl dʕwlʔ mll ʕl mryʔ
30:01	ptgmʔ dhwʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ mn qdm mryʔ wʔmr
30:02	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ktwb lk klhwn ptgmʔ dʔmrt lk ʕl sprʔ
30:03	mṭl dhʔ ywmtʔ ʔtyn ʔmr mryʔ wʔhpk šbytʔ dʕmy ʔysrʔyl wdyhwdʔ ʔmr mryʔ wʔhpk ʔnwn lʔrʕʔ dyhbt lʔbhyhwn wnʔrtwnh
30:04	whlyn ptgmʔ dʔmr mryʔ ʕl ʔysrʔyl wʕl yhwdʔ
30:05	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ qlʔ dzwʕtʔ šmʕn dḥltʔ wlyt šlmʔ
30:06	šʔlw wḥzw ʔn yld dkrʔ mṭl mnʔ ḥzyt kl gbr symn ʔydwhy ʕl gswhy ʔyk yldtʔ wʔthpk klhyn ʔpʔ lyqdnʔ
30:07	wy drb hw ywmʔ hw wlyt ʔkwth wzbn ʕqtʔ hw lyʕqwb wmnh ntprq
30:08	wnhwʔ bywmʔ hw ʔmr mryʔ ṣbʔwt ʔtbr nyrh mn ṣwrk wḥnqyk ʔpsq wlʔ nšʕbdwn ʔnwn twb nwkryʔ
30:09	ʔlʔ nplḥwn lmryʔ ʔlhhwn wldwyd mlkhwn dʔqym lhwn
30:10	wʔnt lʔ tdḥl ʕbdy yʕqwb ʔmr mryʔ wlʔ ttbr ʔysryl dhʔ prq ʔnʔ lk mn rwḥqʔ wlzrʕk mn ʔrʕʔ dšbythwn wntb yʕqwb wnšlʔ wnškt wnttnyḥ wlʔ nhwʔ lh mhrnʔ wʔnt lʔ tdḥl ʕbdy yʕqwb ʔmr mryʔ
30:11	mṭl dʕmk ʔnʔ lmprqk ʔmr mryʔ mṭl dʔʕbd gmwryʔ bklhwn ʕmmʔ dbdrtk tmn wlk lʔ ʔʕbd gmwryʔ wʔrdyk bdynʔ wmzkyw lʔ ʔzkyk
30:12	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ kʔb hw tbrky wḥsynʔ hy mḥwtky
30:13	wlyt ddʔn dynky dnʕdrky wnʔsyky
30:14	klhwn rḥmyky ṭʕʔwky wnpšky bʕyn mṭl dmḥwtʔ dbʕldbbʔ mḥytky wmrdwtʔ tqyptʔ ʕl dsgyw ḥwbyky wʕšnw ḥṭhyky dlʔ ttwbyn
30:15	mnʔ myllty ʕl tbrky kʔb hw kʔbky ʕl swgʔt ḥwbyky wdʕšnw ḥṭhyky ʕbdt lky hlyn
30:16	mṭl hnʔ kwl ʔkwlyky ntʔklwn wklhwn bʕldbbyky bšbyʔ nʔzlwn wnhwwn dywšyky ldyšʔ wkwlhwn bzwzyky ʔtl lbztʔ
30:17	mṭl dʔsq lky ʔsywtʔ wmn mḥwtky ʔsyky ʔmr mryʔ mṭl ddḥyqtʔ qrʔwky ṣhywn hy dtbwʕʔ lyt lh
30:18	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hʔ mhpk ʔnʔ šbytʔ dmšknh dyʕqwb wʕbd ʔnʔ lh ʔyk dmn qdym wʕl mšknwhy ʔrḥm wttbnʔ qrytʔ ʕl tlh wnwsʔ bzdqh ntqn
30:19	wtpwq mnhwn twdytʔ wqlʔ dmšbḥnʔ wʔsgʔ ʔnwn wlʔ nzʕrwn wʔʕšn ʔnwn wlʔ nbṣrwn
30:20	wnhwwn bnyhwn ʔyk dmn qdym wʕdthwn qdmy ttqn wʔpqwd ʕl klhwn ʔlwṣyhwn
30:21	wnhwʔ mlkhwn mnhwn wšlyṭhwn mn bynthwn npwq wʔqrbywhy wntqrb lwty mṭl dʔpny lbh lwty ʔmr mryʔ
30:22	wthwwn ly ʕmʔ wʔnʔ ʔhwʔ lkwn ʔlhʔ mnw gyr ʔpny lbh ldḥlty wʔnʔ dḥqth ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ
30:23	hʔ ʕlʕlh dmryʔ bḥmtʔ npqʔ wʕlʕlʔ mtgwzlʔ ʕl ryšʔ dršyʕʔ ttnyḥ
30:24	lʔ thpwk ḥmtʔ drwgzh dmryʔ ʕdmʔ dnʕbd wʕdmʔ dnqym trʕytʔ dlbh bʔḥryt ywmtʔ ttbynwn bh
31:01	bzbnʔ hw ʔmr mryʔ ʔhwʔ ʔlhʔ lklhyn šrbtʔ dʔysryl whnwn nhwwn ly ʕmʔ
31:02	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔškḥ rḥmʔ bmdbrʔ ʕmʔ dʔtpṣy mn ḥrbʔ ʔzl bšbyʔ ʔysryl
31:03	mn rwḥqʔ mryʔ ʔtḥzy ly wʔmr ly rḥmtʔ dʕlmʔ rḥmtky mṭl hnʔ ngdtky lṭybwtʔ
31:04	twb ʔbnyky wttbnyn btwltʔ dʔysryl twb tṣṭbtyn btṣbytʔ wtpqyn bknwštʔ dmšbḥnʔ
31:05	twb tṣbyn krmʔ bṭwrʔ dšmryn ṣwby nṣbtʔ wšbḥy
31:06	mṭl dʕtyd hw ywmʔ dnqrwn nṭwrʔ bṭwrʔ dʔprym wnʔmrwn qwmw nsq lṣhywn lwt mryʔ ʔlhn
31:07	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ šbḥw dbyt yʕqwb bḥdwtʔ wdwṣw bryš ʕmmʔ ʔšmʕw wšbḥw wʔmrw prwq mryʔ lʕmk lšrkh dʔysryl
31:08	hʔ mytʔ ʔnʔ lhwn mn ʔrʕʔ dgrbyʔ wʔknš ʔnwn mn swpyh dʔrʕʔ wʔp ʕwyrʔ wḥgyrʔ dʔyt bhwn wdbṭnʔ wdyldʔ ʔyk ḥdʔ knšʔ rbʔ nhpkwn lhrkʔ
31:09	bbktʔ nʔzlwn wbtḥnntʔ nʔtwn ʔdbr ʔnwn ʕl šbylʔ dmyʔ bʔwrḥtʔ tryṣtʔ dlʔ nttqlwn bhyn mṭl dhwyt lʔysryl lʔbʔ wʔprym hwʔ bwkry
31:10	šmʕw ptgmh dmryʔ ʕmh wḥww bgzrtʔ rḥyqtʔ wʔmrw mn dbdrh lʔysryl nknšywhy wnnṭrywhy ʔyk rʕyʔ lgzrh
31:11	mṭl dprq mryʔ lyʕqwb ʕbdh wpṣyh mn ʔydy mn dʕšyn mnh
31:12	wnʔtwn wnšbḥwn brwmh dṣhywn wntbsmwn mn ṭbth dmryʔ mn ʕbwrʔ wmn ḥmrʔ wmn mšḥʔ wmn bny ʕnʔ wtwrʔ wthwʔ npšhwn ʔyk gnt šqyʔ wlʔ nwspwn twb lmstrqw
31:13	hy dyn tḥdʔ btwltʔ bḥdwtʔ wgdwdʔ wsbʔ ʔkḥdʔ nḥdwn wʔhpk ʔblhwn lḥdwtʔ wʔbyʔ ʔnwn wʔḥdʔ ʔnwn mn dʔwnhwn
31:14	wʔrwʔ npšʔ dkhnʔ dwhnʔ wʕmy mn ṭwby nsbʕwn ʔmr mryʔ
31:15	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ qlʔ brmtʔ ʔštmʕ ʔlyʔ wbktʔ mryrtʔ rḥyl bkyʔ ʕl bnyh wlʔ ṣbyʔ lmtbyʔw mṭl dlyt ʔnwn
31:16	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ kly qlky mn bkyʔ wʕynyky mn dmʕtʔ mṭl dʔyt ʔgrʔ ldmʕyky ʔmr mryʔ wnhpkwn mn ʔrʕʔ dbʕldbbʔ
31:17	wʔyt sbrʔ lḥrtky ʔmr mryʔ wnhpkwn bnyʔ ltḥwmhwn
31:18	mšmʕ šmʕt lʔprym dʔlʔ wʔmr rdytky mryʔ wʔtrdyt ʔyk ʕglʔ hwyt dlʔ mkbš ʔtybyny wʔtwb mṭwl dʔnt hw mryʔ ʔlhy
31:19	mṭl dmn btr dtbt ʔtbyʔyt wmn btr dydʕt ʔttnḥt bhtt wʔp ʔttkst dqblt ḥsdʔ dṭlywty
31:20	brʔ hw yqyrʔ ly ʔprym wyldʔ ḥbybʔ mṭl dbzbnʔ dmmll ʔnʔ bh mtdkr ʔnʔ lh mṭl hnʔ hww rḥmy ʕlwhy wʔrḥm ʕlwhy ʔmr mryʔ
31:21	ʔqym lky ʔtʔ wtby bmdbrʔ hby lbky lʔwrḥʔ tryṣtʔ twby btwltʔ dʔysryl ʔmr mryʔ wtby bqwryyky hlyn
31:22	ʕdmʔ lʔmty mtplgty brtʔ tybtʔ mṭl dbrʔ mryʔ ḥdtʔ bʔrʕʔ nqbtʔ tḥbb gbrʔ
31:23	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl mkyl nʔmrwn ptgmʔ hnʔ bʔrʕʔ dyhwdʔ wbqwryh mʔ dmhpk ʔnʔ šbythwn nbrkk mryʔ dyrʔ zdyqʔ ṭwrʔ qdyšʔ
31:24	wntbwn bh yhwdʔ wklhyn qwryh ʔkḥdʔ ʔkrʔ wrʕyy gzrʔ
31:25	mṭl dʔrwyt npšʔ dṣhyʔ wkl npšʔ dkpnʔ sbʕt
31:26	mṭl hnʔ ʔttʕyrt wḥzyt wšnty bsmt ly
31:27	hʔ ywmtʔ ʔtyn ʔmr mryʔ wʔzrwʕ ldbyt ʔysryl wldbyt yhwdʔ zrʕʔ dbny ʔnšʔ wzrʕʔ dbʕyrʔ
31:28	wʔyk dʔtrʕyt ʕlyhwn lmʕqr ʔnwn wlmstr wlmsḥpw wlmwbdw wlmbʔšw hknʔ ʔʕhd ʕlyhwn lmbnʔ wlmṣb ʔmr mryʔ
31:29	bywmtʔ hnwn lʔ nʔmrwn twb ʔbhʔ ʔklw bsrʔ wšnʔ dbnyʔ qhyn
31:30	ʔlʔ ʔnš bḥṭhwhy nmwt kl brnšʔ dʔkl bsrʔ šnwhy dylh nqhyn
31:31	hʔ ywmtʔ ʔtyn ʔmr mryʔ wʔqym ldbyt ʔysrʔyl wldbyt yhwdʔ dytqʔ ḥdtʔ
31:32	lʔ ʔyk hy dytqʔ dʔqymt lʔbhyhwn bywmʔ dʔḥdt bʔydhwn wʔpqt ʔnwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn mṭl dhnwn bṭlw dytqʔ dyly wʔp ʔnʔ bsyt bhwn ʔmr mryʔ ʔlʔ hdʔ dytqʔ
31:33	dʔsym ldbyt ʔysryl btr ywmtʔ hnwn ʔmr mryʔ ʔtl nmwsy bgwhwn wʕl lbwthwn ʔktbywhy wʔhwʔ lhwn ʔlhʔ whnwn nhwwn ly ʕmʔ
31:34	wlʔ nlpwn twb gbr lʔḥwhy wgbr lḥbrh wnʔmrwn ddʕw lmryʔ mṭl dklhwn ndʕwnny mn zʕwrhwn wʕdmʔ lqšyšhwn ʔmr mryʔ mṭl dʔšbwq lḥwbyhwn wḥṭhyhwn twb lʔ ʔtdkr
31:35	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ dyhb šmyʔ lnwhrʔ dʔymmʔ wdwbrʔ dshrʔ wdkwkbʔ lnwhrʔ dllyʔ dkʔʔ bymʔ wšlyn gllwhy mryʔ ḥyltnʔ šmh
31:36	ʔn nʕbrwn dwbrʔ hlyn mn qdmy ʔmr mryʔ ʔp zrʕʔ dʔysryl nbṭlwn dlʔ nhwwn ʕmʔ qdmy klhwn ywmtʔ
31:37	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔn ntmšḥwn šmyʔ mn lʕl wntbdqn štʔsyh dʔrʕʔ mn ltḥt ʔp ʔnʔ ʔslʔ lklh zrʕh dʔysryl ʕl kl mdm dʕbdw ʔmr mryʔ
31:38	hʔ ywmtʔ ʔtyn ʔmr mryʔ wttbnʔ qrytʔ lmryʔ mn mgdlʔ dḥnnʔyl ʕdmʔ ltrʕʔ dzwytʔ
31:39	wnpwq twb ḥwṭʔ dmšwḥtʔ lqwblh ʕl rmtʔ dgrb wntkrk lrmtʔ
31:40	wkwlh ʕwmqʔ dšdyn bh prtʔ wqṭmʔ ʕdmʔ lnḥlʔ dqdrwn wʕdmʔ lzwytʔ dtrʕʔ drkšʔ mdnḥyʔ qwdšʔ lmryʔ lʔ ntʕqr wlʔ nstḥp twb lʕlm
32:01	ptgmʔ dhwʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ mn qdm mryʔ bšntʔ ʕsyrytʔ dṣdqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ hy hy šnt tmnʕsrʔ lnbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl
32:02	whydyn ḥylʔ dmlkʔ dbbl krykyn lʔwršlm wʔrmyʔ nbyʔ klʔ hwʔ bdrt mṭrtʔ dbyt mlkʔ dyhwdʔ
32:03	dklyhy ṣdqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wʔmr mṭl mnʔ mtnbʔ ʔnt wʔmr ʔnt hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hʔ mšlm ʔnʔ lh lqrytʔ hdʔ bʔydwhy dmlkʔ dbbl wnkbšyh
32:04	wṣdqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ lʔ ntplṭ mn ʔydʔ dkldyʔ mṭl dmštlmw nštlm bʔydwhy dmlkʔ dbbl wnmll pwmh ʕm pwmh wʕynwhy lʕynwhy nḥzyn
32:05	wlbbl nwblywhy lṣdqyʔ wtmn nhwʔ ʕdmʔ lywmʔ dpqd ʔnʔ lh ʔmr mryʔ mṭl dttktšwn ʕm kldyʔ wlʔ tzkwn
32:06	whwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ lmʔmr
32:07	hʔ nḥmʔyl br šlwm ddk ʔtʔ lwtk wʔmr zbn lk ḥqly dbʕntwt dbʔrʕʔ dbnymyn mṭl dlk zdqʔ yrtwtʔ lmzbn
32:08	wʔtʔ lwty nḥmʔyl br ddy ʔyk ptgmh dmryʔ ldrt mṭrtʔ wʔmr ly zbn lk ḥqly dbʕntwt dbʔrʕʔ dbnymyn mṭl dlk zdqʔ yrtwtʔ wlk wlyʔ zbnyh lk wydʕt dptgmh hw dmryʔ
32:09	wzbnt ḥqlʔ mn nḥmʔyl br ddy dbʕntwt wtqlt lh kspʔ šbʕʔ mtqlyn wʕsrʔ dkspʔ
32:10	wktbt ʔšṭrʔ wḥtmt wshdt shdʔ wtqlt kspʔ bmsʔtʔ
32:11	wnsbt šṭrʔ dzbyntʔ dḥtym bpwqdnʔ wbnmwsʔ wdlʔ mḥtm
32:12	wyhbt šṭrʔ dzbyntʔ lbrwk br nryʔ br mʕsyʔ lʕyn nḥmʔyl br ddy wlʕyn shdʔ dktybyn bšṭrʔ dzbyntʔ wlʕyn klhwn yhwdyʔ dytbyn bdrt mṭrtʔ
32:13	wpqdt lbrwk lʕynyhwn
32:14	wʔmrt hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl sb šṭrʔ hlyn šṭrʔ hnʔ dzbyntʔ dmḥtm wšṭrʔ hnʔ dlʔ mḥtm wʔrmʔ ʔnwn bmʔnʔ dpḥrʔ dntnṭrwn ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ
32:15	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ṣbʔwt ʔlhʔ dʔysryl mkyl nzdbnwn btʔ dḥqltʔ wkrmʔ bʔrʕʔ hdʔ
32:16	wṣlyt qdm mryʔ mn btr dyhbt šṭrʔ dzbyntʔ lbrwk br nryʔ wṣlyt qdm mryʔ wʔmrt
32:17	bbʕw mryʔ ʔlhʔ hʔ ʔnt ʕbdt šmyʔ wʔrʕʔ bḥylk rbʔ wbdrʕk rmʔ wlʔ ṭšʔ mn qdmyk kl ptgm
32:18	ʕbd ṭybwtʔ lʔlpʔ ddrʔ prʕ ḥṭhʔ dʔbhʔ lʕwbʔ dbnyhwn btrhwn ʔlhʔ rbʔ wgnbrʔ wdḥylʔ mryʔ ḥyltnʔ šmh
32:19	drbʔ trʕyth wsgyʔyn ʕbdwhy wʕynwhy ptyḥn ʕl klhyn ʔwrḥthwn dbny ʔnšʔ dttl lgbrʔ ʔyk ʔwrḥth wʔyk pʔry ʕbdwhy
32:20	dʕbdt ʔtwtʔ wtdmrtʔ rwrbtʔ bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ lʔysryl byt bnynšʔ wʕbdt lk šmʔ ʔyk dywmnʔ
32:21	wʔpqt lʕmk ʔysryl mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn bʔtwtʔ wbtdmrtʔ wbʔydʔ tqyptʔ wbdrʕʔ rmʔ wḥzwʔ rbʔ
32:22	wyhbt lhwn ʔrʕʔ hdʔ dymyt lʔbhyhwn lmtl lhwn ʔrʕʔ dmrdyʔ ḥlbʔ wdbšʔ
32:23	wʔtw wyrtwh wlʔ šmʕw bqlk wbnmwsk lʔ hlkw wkl dpqdt ʔnwn lmʕbd lʔ ʕbdw wmṭyt ʔnwn klh hdʔ byštʔ
32:24	hʔ kmʔnʔ ʔtw ʕl qrytʔ hdʔ lmʔḥdh wqrytʔ ʔštlmt bʔydʔ dkldyʔ dmtktšyn ʕlyh mn qdm ḥrbʔ wkpnʔ wmwtnʔ wmdm dʔmrt hwʔ whʔ ḥzyt
32:25	wʔnt ʔmrt ly mryʔ ʔlhʔ ḥyltnʔ zbn lk ḥqlʔ bkspʔ wshd shdʔ whʔ qrytʔ ʔštlmt lh bʔydʔ dkldyʔ
32:26	whwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ lmʔmr
32:27	ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhʔ dkl bsr dlmʔ mn qdmy ṭšʔ mdm
32:28	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ hʔ mšlm ʔnʔ lh lqrytʔ hdʔ bʔydʔ dkldyʔ bʔydʔ dnbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl wnkbšyh
32:29	wnʔtwn kldyʔ wnʕbdwn qrbʔ ʕl qrytʔ hdʔ wnʕqrwnh lqrytʔ hdʔ wnwqdwnh bnwrʔ wbtʔ dsmw bsmʔ ʕl ʔgryhwn lbʕlʔ wnqyw nwqyʔ lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ dnrgzwnny
32:30	mṭl dhww bny ʔysryl wbny yhwdʔ ʕbdyn dbyš qdmy mn ṭlywthwn mṭl dbny ʔysryl mrgzyn ly bʕbd ʔydyhwn ʔmr mryʔ
32:31	wmṭlthwn hwʔ rwgzy wḥmty ʕl qrytʔ hdʔ mn ywmʔ dbnʔwh wʕdmʔ lywmnʔ lmʕbrwth mn qdm ʔpy
32:32	ʕl klhyn byštʔ dbny ʔysryl wdbny yhwdʔ dʕbdw lmrgzwtny hnwn wmlkyhwn wrwrbnyhwn wkhnyhwn wnbyyhwn gbrʔ dyhwdʔ wʕmwryh dʔwršlm
32:33	wʔpnyw ly qdlhwn wlʔ ʔpyhwn wʔlpt ʔnwn qdmt wʔlpt wlʔ šmʕyn lmqblw mrdwtʔ
32:34	wsmw ṭnpwthwn bbytʔ dʔtqry šmy ʕlwhy wṭmʔwhy
32:35	wbnw ʕlwtʔ lbʕlʔ btpt dbnḥlʔ dbrhnwm lmwqdw bnyhwn wbnthwn lʔmlk dlʔ pqdt ʔnwn wlʔ slqt ʕl lby dnʕbdwn ṭnpwtʔ hdʔ wnḥṭwn lyhwdʔ
32:36	hšʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʕl qrytʔ hdʔ dʔmryn ʔntwn ʔštlmt bʔydh dmlkʔ dbbl bḥrbʔ wbkpnʔ wbmwtnʔ
32:37	hʔ mknš ʔnʔ lhwn mn klhyn ʔrʕtʔ dbdrt ʔnwn ltmn brwgzy wbḥmty brwgzʔ rbʔ wʔhpk ʔnwn lʔtrʔ hnʔ wʔwtb ʔnwn bšlyʔ
32:38	wnhwwn ly ʕmʔ wʔnʔ ʔhwʔ lhwn ʔlhʔ
32:39	wʔtl lhwn lbʔ ḥd wrwḥʔ ḥdʔ lmdḥl qdmy klhwn ywmtʔ wnṭʔb lhwn wlbnyhwn btrhwn
32:40	wʔqym lhwn qymʔ dʕlm dlʔ ʔhpwk mnhwn lmṭʔbw lhwn wdḥlty ʔtl blbhwn dlʔ nsṭwn mny
32:41	wʔḥdʔ ʔnwn wnṭʔb lhwn wʔṣwb ʔnwn bʔrʕʔ hdʔ bqwštʔ bklh lby wbklh npšy
32:42	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔyk dʔytyt ʕl ʕmʔ hnʔ klh byštʔ hdʔ rbtʔ hknʔ mytʔ ʔnʔ ʕlyhwn klh ṭbtʔ dʔmr ʔnʔ ʕlyhwn
32:43	wnzdbnn ḥqltʔ bʔrʕʔ hdʔ dʔmryn ʔntwn ḥrbʔ hy mn bny ʔnšʔ wbʕyrʔ wʔštlmt bʔydʔ dkldyʔ
32:44	ḥqltʔ bkspʔ nzbnwn wnktbwn šṭrʔ wnḥtmwn wnshdwn shdʔ bʔrʕʔ dbnymyn wbḥdryh dʔwršlm wbqwryʔ dyhwdʔ wbqwryʔ dṭwrʔ wbqwryʔ dpqʕtʔ wbqwryʔ dtymnʔ wʔhpk šbythwn ʔmr mryʔ
33:01	whwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ nbyʔ dtrtyn zbnyn kd hw klʔ hwʔ ʕdkyl bdrt mṭrtʔ wʔmr
33:02	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ dʕbdk wgblk wʔtqnk mryʔ šmh
33:03	qryny wʔʕnyk wʔḥwyk rwrbtʔ wʕšyntʔ dlʔ ʔydʕtwn
33:04	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʕl btʔ dqrytʔ hdʔ btʔ dmlkʔ dyhwdʔ dʕqrw ʔnwn gysʔ bḥrbʔ
33:05	dʔtw lmtktšw ʕm kldyʔ wlmmlʔ ʔnwn pgrʔ dbny ʔnšʔ dqṭlt brwgzy wbḥmty wʔhpkt ʔpy mn qrytʔ hdʔ ʕl klh byštʔ dʕbdw qdmy
33:06	hʔ msq ʔnʔ lh lnwgrʔ ʔsyʔ wʔsʔ ʔnwn wʔglʔ lhwn šbylʔ dšlmʔ wdhymnwtʔ
33:07	wʔhpk šbytʔ dyhwdʔ wšbytʔ dʔysryl wʔbnʔ ʔnwn ʔyk dmn qdym wʔṭʔb lhwn ʔyk dmn ršytʔ
33:08	wʔdkʔ ʔnwn mn klh ʕwlhwn dḥṭw ly wʔšbwq lklhwn ḥwbyhwn dḥṭw ly wdʔʕlyw by
33:09	wthwʔ ly lšmʔ wlbwsmʔ wlḥdwtʔ wlšwbhrʔ lklhwn ʕmmʔ dʔrʕʔ wnšmʕwn klh ṭbtʔ dʕbd ʔnʔ ʕmhwn wndḥlwn wnrgzwn ʕl klh ṭbtʔ wʕl klh šlmʔ dʕbd ʔnʔ lhwn
33:10	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ twb nštmʕ bʔtrʔ hnʔ dʔmryn ʔntwn ḥrb hw mn bny ʔnšʔ wmn bly bʕyrʔ bqwryʔ dyhwdʔ wbšwqyh dʔwršlm dḥrbyn mn bnynšʔ wmn bly dytb wmn bly bʕyrʔ
33:11	qlʔ ddyṣʔ wqlʔ dḥdwtʔ qlʔ dḥtnʔ wqlʔ dkltʔ qlʔ dʔmryn ʔwdw lmryʔ ḥyltnʔ dṭb hw mryʔ wbsym hw wlʕlm ṭybwth wmytyn twdytʔ lbyth dmryʔ mṭl dʔhpk šbyth dʔrʕʔ ʔyk dbqdmytʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ
33:12	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ mkyl nhwʔ bʔtrʔ hnʔ dḥrb mn bny ʔnšʔ wʕdmʔ lbʕyrʔ wbklhyn qwryh dyrʔ drʕwtʔ wmrbʕʔ dʕnʔ
33:13	bqwryʔ dṭwrʔ wbqwryʔ dpqʕtʔ wbqwryʔ dtymnʔ wbʔrʕʔ dbnymyn wbḥdryh dʔwršlm wbqwryʔ dyhwdʔ mkyl tʕbr ʕnʔ ʕl ʔydy mnyʔ ʔmr mryʔ
33:14	hʔ ywmtʔ ʔtyn ʔmr mryʔ wʔqym ptgmʔ ṭbʔ dʔmrt ʕl dbyt ʔysryl wʕl dbyt yhwdʔ ʔmr mryʔ
33:15	bywmtʔ hnwn wbzbnʔ hw ʔṣmḥ ldwyd ṣmḥʔ dzdyqwtʔ wnmlk bmlkwtʔ wnstkl wnʕbd dynʔ wzdyqwtʔ bʔrʕʔ
33:16	bywmtʔ hnwn ntprq yhwdʔ wʔwršlm tšrʔ bšlyʔ whnw šmh dnqrwnh mryʔ zdqn
33:17	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ lʔ nʕnd ldwyd brʔ dytb ʕl kwrsyʔ dbyt ʔysrʔyl
33:18	wlkhnʔ wllwyʔ lʔ nʕnd gbrʔ mn qdmy dmsq ʕltʔ wʕbd dbḥtʔ wsʔm bsmʔ klhwn ywmtʔ
33:19	whwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ lmʔmr
33:20	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔn mškḥyn ʔntwn lmbṭlw dwbry dʔymmʔ wdwbry dllyʔ dlʔ nhwʔ ʔymmʔ wllyʔ bzbnhwn
33:21	ʔp qymy dmlkt ldwyd ʕbdy ntbṭl dlʔ nhwʔ lh brʔ dnmlk ʕl kwrsyh wlkhnʔ wllwyʔ mšmšny
33:22	ʔyk dlʔ mtmnʔ ḥylʔ dšmyʔ wlʔ mttkyl ḥlʔ dymʔ hknʔ ʔsgʔ zrʕh ddwyd ʕbdy wdlwyʔ dmšmšyn ly
33:23	whwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ lmʔmr
33:24	lʔ ḥzʔ ʔnt mdm dʔmryn ʕmʔ dtrtyn šrbn dgbʔ mryʔ ʔsly ʔnyn wlʕmy mrgzyn dlʔ nhwʔ ʕmʔ qdmy
33:25	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlʔ hwʔ qymy dʔymmʔ wdllyʔ wnmwsʔ dšmyʔ wdʔrʕʔ lʔ smt
33:26	ʔp zrʕh dyʕqwb wddwyd ʕbdy ʔslʔ dʔsb mn zrʕh šlyṭʔ ʕl byth dʔbrhm wdʔysḥq wdyʕqwb kd ʔhpk šbythwn wʔrḥm ʕlyhwn
34:01	ptgmʔ dhwʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ mn qdm mryʔ wnbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl wklh ḥylh wkwlhyn mlkwtʔ dʔrʕ šwlṭn ʔydh wklhwn ʕmmʔ mtktšyn ʕl ʔwršlm wʕl klhyn qwryh
34:02	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl zl wʔmr lṣdqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hʔ mšlm ʔnʔ lh lqrytʔ hdʔ bʔydh dmlkʔ dbbl wnwqdyh bnwrʔ
34:03	wʔnt lʔ ttplṭ mn ʔydwhy ʔlʔ mttḥdw ttḥd wbʔydwhy tštlm wʕynyk lʕynwhy dmlkʔ dbbl nḥzyn wpwmk ʕm pwmh nmll wlbbl tʔzl
34:04	brm šmʕ ptgmh dmryʔ ṣdqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʕlyk lʔ tmwt bḥrbʔ
34:05	ʔlʔ bšlmʔ tmwt wʔyk dʔrqdw ʕl ʔbhyk mlkʔ qdmyʔ dhww qdmyk hknʔ nrqdwn ʕlyk wy mrʔ nrqdwn ʕlyk mṭl dptgmʔ hnʔ mllt ʔmr mryʔ
34:06	wʔmr ʔrmyʔ nbyʔ lṣdqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ klhwn ptgmʔ hlyn bʔwršlm
34:07	wḥylʔ dmlkʔ dbbl mtktšyn ʕl ʔwršlm wʕl kwlhyn qwryʔ dyhwdʔ dʔštḥr ʕl lkyš wʕl ʕzqʔmṭl dhnyn ʔštḥr bqwryʔ dyhwdʔ qwryʔ ʕšyntʔ
34:08	ptgmʔ dhwʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ mn qdm mryʔ lmʔmr mn btr dʔqym mlkʔ ṣdqyʔ qymʔ ʕm klh ʕmʔ dbʔwršlm dntqrwn mḥrrʔ
34:09	dnšbwq gbr ʕbdh wgbr ʔmth ʕbryʔ wʕbrytʔ bny ḥʔrʔ dlʔ nšʕbdwn gbr lʔḥwhy yhwdyʔ
34:10	wšmʕw kwlhwn rwrbnʔ wklh ʕmʔ wqblw ʕlyhwn dnšbwq gbr ʕbdh wgbr ʔmth bny ḥʔrʔ dlʔ nplḥwn ʔnwn twb wḥrrw ʔnwn
34:11	whpkw mn btrkn wšʕbdw ʔnwn lmḥrrʔ wʕbdw ʔnwn ʕbdʔ
34:12	whwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ lmʔmr
34:13	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʔnʔ ʔqymt qymʔ ʕm ʔbhykwn bywmʔ dʔpqt ʔnwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn mn byt ʕbdwtʔ lmʔmr
34:14	mn btr šbʕ šnyn tšbqwn gbr lʔḥwhy ʕbryʔ dnzdbn lk wnplḥk št šnyn wtšbqywhy br ḥʔrʔ mn lwtk wlʔ šmʕwny ʔbhykwn wlʔ ṣlw ʔdnhwn lwty
34:15	whpktwn ʔntwn ywmnʔ wʕbdtwn mdm dšpyr bʕyny lmqrʔ ḥʔrwtʔ gbr lḥbrh wʔqymtwn qymʔ qdmy bbytʔ dʔtqry {{šmy}} šmy ʕlwhy
34:16	whpktwn wṭwštwn šmy wʔhpktwn gbr ʕbdh wgbr ʔmth dšbqtwn bny ḥʔrʔ lnpšhwn wkbštwn ʔnwn dnhwwn lkwn ʕbdʔ wʔmhtʔ
34:17	mṭwl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʔntwn lʔ šmʕtwnny lmqrʔ ḥʔrwtʔ gbr lḥbrh hʔ qrʔ ʔnʔ lkwn ḥʔrwtʔ lḥrbʔ wlkpnʔ wlmwtnʔ ʔmr mryʔ wʔtlkwn lzwʕtʔ lklhyn mlkwtʔ dʔrʕʔ
34:18	wʔtl lgbrʔ dʕbrw ʕl qymy dlʔ ʔšrw ptgmy qymʔ dʔqymw qdmy ʕglʔ dpsqw ltryn wʕbrw byt plgwhy
34:19	rwrbnʔ dyhwdʔ wdʔwršlm wmhymnʔ wkhnʔ wklh ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ dʕbrw byt plgwhy dʕglʔ
34:20	wʔšlm ʔnwn bʔydʔ dbʕldbbyhwn wbʔydʔ dʔylyn dbʕyn npšhwn wnhwyn šldyhwn mʔkwltʔ lprḥtʔ dšmyʔ wlḥywtʔ dʔrʕʔ
34:21	wlṣdqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wlrwrbnwhy ʔšlm bʔydʔ dbʕldbbyhwn wbʔydʔ dʔylyn dbʕyn npšhwn wbyd ḥylh dmlkʔ dbbl dslqyn ʕlyhwn
34:22	hʔ ʔnʔ pqd ʔnʔ ʔmr mryʔ wʔhpk ʔnwn lqrytʔ hdʔ wntktšwn ʕlyh wnkbšwnh wnwqdwnh bnwrʔ wlqwryʔ dyhwdʔ ʔtl lḥwrbʔ mn bly dytb
35:01	ptgmʔ dhwʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ mn qdm mryʔ bywmwhy dywyqym br ywšyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ lmʔmr
35:02	zl lbyt bny rkbym wmll ʕmhwn wʔʕl ʔnwn lbyth dmryʔ lḥdʔ mn ḥnwtʔ wʔšqʔ ʔnwn ḥmrʔ
35:03	wdbrt lyznyʔ br ʔmryʔ br ḥbṣnyʔ wlʔḥwhy wlklhwn bnwhy wlklh byt rkbym
35:04	wʔʕlt ʔnwn lbyth dmryʔ wlbytʔ dbny ḥnn br gdlyʔ nbyh dʔlhʔ dqryb byth lrwrbnʔ dytbyn lʕl mn byth dmʕsyʔ br šlwm nṭr trʕʔ
35:05	wsmt qdm bny byt rkbym ʔgnʔ dmlyn ḥmrʔ wksʔ wʔmrt lhwn ʔštw ḥmrʔ
35:06	wʔmrw lʔ štynn ḥmrʔ mṭl dywndb br rkb ʔbwn pqdn wʔmr ln lʔ tštwn ḥmrʔ ʔntwn wbnykwn ʕdmʔ lʕlm
35:07	wbtʔ lʔ tbnwn lkwn wzrʕʔ lʔ tzrʕwn wkrmʔ lʔ tṣbwn wlʔ nhwʔ lkwn ʔlʔ bmšknʔ ttbwn klhwn ywmtʔ mṭl dtḥwn ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ ʕl ʔpy ʔrʕʔ dʕmryn ʔntwn bh
35:08	wšmʕn pwqdnh dywndb br rkb ʔbwn kl dpqdn dlʔ nštʔ ḥmrʔ klhwn ywmtn lʔ ḥnn wlʔ nšyn wlʔ bnyn wlʔ bntn
35:09	wlʔ nbnʔ btʔ lmwtbn wkrmʔ wḥqltʔ wzrʕʔ lʔ nhwʔ ln
35:10	wytbn bmšknʔ wšmʕn wʕbdn kl dpqdn ywndb br rkb ʔbwn
35:11	wkd slq nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl ʕl ʔrʕʔ ʔmrn dnʕwl lʔwršlm mn qdm ḥylʔ dkldyʔ wmn qdm ḥylʔ dʔdwm wytbn bʔwršlm
35:12	whwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ lmʔmr
35:13	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ṣbʔwt ʔlhʔ dʔysryl zl ʔmr lgbrʔ dyhwdʔ wlʕmwryh dʔwršlm lʔ mqblyn ʔntwn mrdwtʔ lmšmʕ ptgmy ʔmr mryʔ
35:14	šrw ptgmwhy dyhwdʔ dywndb br rkb dpqd lbnwhy dlʔ nštwn ḥmrʔ wlʔ ʔštyw ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ mṭl dšmʕw pwqdnʔ dʔbwhwn wʔnʔ ʔmrt lkwn qdmt wʔmrt wlʔ šmʕtwn
35:15	wšdrt lwtkwn lklhwn ʕbdy nbyʔ qdmt wšdrt wʔmrt twbw gbr mn ʔwrḥh byštʔ wʔṭʔbw ʕbdykwn wlʔ tʔzlwn btr ʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ lmplḥ ʔnwn wtbw bʔrʕʔ dyhbt lkwn wlʔbhykwn wlʔ ṣlytwn ʔdnkwn wlʔ šmʕtwnny
35:16	hʔ ʔšrw bnwhy dywndb br rkb pwqdnʔ dʔbwhwn dpqd ʔnwn wʕmʔ hnʔ lʔ šmʕwny
35:17	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl hʔ mytʔ ʔnʔ ʕl yhwdʔ wʕl klhwn ʕmwryh dʔwršlm kwlh byštʔ dʔmrt ʕlyhwn ʕl dʔmrt lhwn wlʔ šmʕw wqryt lhwn wlʔ ʕnʔwny
35:18	wlbyt rkbym ʔmr ʔrmyʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ḥlp dšmʕtwn pwqdnʔ dywndb ʔbwkwn wnṭrtwn klhwn pwqdnwhy wʕbdtwn klmdm dpqdkwn
35:19	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl lʔ nʕnd gbrʔ lywndb br rkb dqʔm qdmy klhwn ywmtʔ
36:01	whwʔ bšntʔ ʔrbyʕytʔ dywyqym br ywšyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ hwʔ ptgmʔ hnʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ mn qdm mryʔ lmʔmr
36:02	sb lk mgltʔ dsprʔ wktwb ʕlyh klhwn ptgmʔ dʔmrt lk ʕl ʔysrʔyl wʕl yhwdʔ wʕl klhwn ʕmmʔ mn ywmʔ dʔmrt lk mn ywmwhy dywšyʔ wʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
36:03	ṭk nšmʕwn dbyt yhwdʔ klh byštʔ dmtḥšb ʔnʔ lmʕbd lhwn wnhpkwn gbr mn ʔwrḥh byštʔ wʔšbwq lḥwbyhwn wlḥṭhyhwn
36:04	wqrʔ ʔrmyʔ lbrwk br nryʔ wktb brwk mn pwmh dʔrmyʔ klhwn ptgmwhy dmryʔ dʔmr lh ʕl mgltʔ dsprʔ
36:05	wpqd ʔrmyʔ lbrwk br nryʔ wʔmr lh ʔnʔ klʔ ʔnʔ wlʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ dʔʕwl lbyth dmryʔ
36:06	ʕwl ʔnt wqry bmgltʔ dktbt mn pwmy ptgmwhy dmryʔ qdm ʕmʔ bbyth dmryʔ bywmʔ dṣwmʔ wʔp qdm klh ʕmʔ dyhwdʔ dʔtyn mn qwryhwn tqrʔ ʔnwn
36:07	ṭk tpl bʕwthwn qdm mryʔ wnhpkwn gbr mn ʔwrḥh byštʔ wnšlʔ mryʔ mn byštʔ dʔmr ʕlyhwn mṭl drb hw rwgzʔ wḥmtʔ dmll mryʔ ʕl ʕmʔ hnʔ
36:08	wʕbd brwk br nryʔ kwl dpqdh ʔrmyʔ nbyʔ lmqrʔ bsprʔ ptgmwhy dmryʔ bbyth dmryʔ
36:09	whwʔ bšntʔ ḥmyšytʔ dywyqym br ywšyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ byrḥʔ dtšʕʔ gzrw ṣwmʔ qdm mryʔ klh ʕmʔ dbʔwršlm wqrʔ brwk qdm klh ʕmʔ dʔtyn mn qwryʔ dyhwdʔ lʔwršlm
36:10	wqrʔ brwk sprʔ ptgmwhy dmryʔ dʔmr ʔrmyʔ bbyth dmryʔ bḥnwth dgmryʔ br špn sprʔ bdrtʔ ʕlytʔ bmʕlnʔ dtrʕʔ ḥdtʔ dbyth dmryʔ qdm klh ʕmʔ
36:11	wšmʕ mykʔ br gmryʔ br špn klhwn ptgmwhy dmryʔ mn sprʔ
36:12	wnḥt mn byt mlkʔ lḥnwth dsprʔ wḥzʔ tmn klhwn rwrbnʔ ytbyn ʔlyšmʕ sprʔ wdlyʔ br šmʕyʔ wʔlytn br ʕbkwr wgmryʔ br špn wṣdqyʔ br ḥnnyʔ wklhwn rwrbnʔ
36:13	wḥwy ʔnwn mykʔ klhwn ptgmʔ dšmʕ kd qrʔ brwk sprʔ bʔdnwhy dʕmʔ
36:14	wšdrw klhwn rwrbnʔ lwt brwk lyhwdy br ntnyʔ br šlmyʔ br kwšy wʔmrw lh mgltʔ dqryt bh qdm ʕmʔ sbyh bʔydk wtʔ wnsb brwk br nryʔ mgltʔ bʔydh wʔtʔ lwthwn
36:15	wʔmrw lh rwrbnʔ tb wqryh qdmyn wqrh brwk qdmyhwn
36:16	wkd šmʕw ptgmʔ twhw gbr ʕl ḥbrh wʔmrw lbrwk mḥwynn lmlkʔ klhwn ptgmʔ hlyn
36:17	wlbrwk šʔlwhy wʔmrw lh ḥwn ʔyknʔ ktbt klhwn ptgmʔ hlyn mn pwmh
36:18	wʔmr lhwn brwk mn pwmh ʔmr hwʔ ly ʔrmyʔ kwlhwn ptgmʔ hlyn wʔnʔ ktb hwyt ʕl sprʔ bdywtʔ
36:19	wʔmrw rwrbnʔ lbrwk zl wʔtṭšʔ ʔnt wʔrmyʔ wʔnš lʔ ndʕ ʔykʔ ʔntwn
36:20	wʔtw lwt mlkʔ ldrtʔ wmgltʔ smwh bḥnwth dʔlyšmʕ sprʔ wḥwyw qdm mlkʔ klhwn ptgmʔ hlyn
36:21	wšdr mlkʔ lyhwdy dnytyh lmgltʔ wnsbh mn ḥnwth dʔlyšmʕ sprʔ wqrh yhwdy qdm mlkʔ wqdm kwlhwn rwrbnʔ dqymyn qdm mlkʔ
36:22	wmlkʔ ytb hwʔ byt stwʔ byrḥʔ dtšʕʔ wnwrʔ symyn hww qdmwhy
36:23	wkd qrʔ yhwdy tlt pṣyn wʔrbʕ ṣrh bzmlyʔ dsprʔ wšdh bgwmrʔ dnwrʔ wyqdt klh mgltʔ bnwrʔ dʕl qmynʔ
36:24	wlʔ dḥlw wlʔ ṣryw lbwšyhwn mlkʔ wklhwn ʕbdwhy kd šmʕw klhwn ptgmʔ hlyn
36:25	wʔp ʔlytn wgmryʔ wdlyʔ bʕw mn mlkʔ dlʔ nwqdyh lmgltʔ bnwrʔ wlʔ šmʕ ʔnwn
36:26	wpqd mlkʔ lbr ḥmʔyl br mlkʔ wlšryʔ br ʕzrʔyl wlšlmyʔ br ʕbdʔyl lmʔḥd lʔrmyʔ nbyʔ wlbrwk sprʔ wṭšy ʔnwn mryʔ
36:27	whwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ nbyʔ mn btr dʔwqd mlkʔ mgltʔ wptgmʔ dktb brwk mn pwmh dʔrmyʔ lmʔmr
36:28	hpwk sb lk mgltʔ ʔḥrtʔ wktwb ʕlyh klhwn ptgmʔ qdmyʔ dʔyt hww ʕl mgltʔ dʔwqd ywyqym mlkʔ dyhwdʔ
36:29	wlywyqym mlkʔ dyhwdʔ tʔmr hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔnt ʔwqdt mgltʔ hdʔ wʔmrt mṭl mnʔ ktbt ʕlyh dnʔtʔ mlkʔ dbbl wnḥrbyh lʔrʕʔ hdʔ wnbṭl mnh bny ʔnšʔ wbʕyrʔ
36:30	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʕl ywyqym mlkʔ dyhwdʔ lʔ nhwʔ lh gbrʔ dytb ʕl kwrsyh ddwyd wšldh thwʔ rmyʔ bšwbʔ bʔymmʔ wbglydʔ bllyʔ
36:31	wʔpqwd ʕlwhy wʕl zrʕh wʕl ʕbdwhy ʕwlhwn wʔytʔ ʕlyhwn wʕl klhwn ʕmwryh dʔwršlm wʕl ʔnšʔ dyhwdʔ klh byštʔ dʔmrt ʕlyhwn ʕl dlʔ šmʕw bqly
36:32	wʔrmyʔ nsb mgltʔ ʔḥrtʔ wyhbh lbrwk br nryʔ sprʔ wktb ʕlyh mn pwmh dʔrmyʔ klhwn ptgmʔ dktybyn hww bsprʔ dʔwqd ywyqym mlkʔ dyhwdʔ bnwrʔ wtwb ʔwsp ʕlyhwn ptgmʔ dsgyʔyn ʔkwthwn
37:01	wʔmlk ṣdqyʔ mlkʔ br ywšyʔ ḥlp ywknyʔ br ywyqym dʔmlk nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl bʔrʕʔ dyhwdʔ
37:02	wlʔ šmʕ hw wʕbdwhy wʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ ptgmwhy dmryʔ dʔmr byd ʔrmyʔ nbyʔ
37:03	wšdr mlkʔ ṣdqyʔ lywkl br šlmyʔ wlṣpnyʔ br mʕsyʔ khnʔ lwt ʔrmyʔ nbyʔ lmʔmr ṣlʔ ʕlyn qdm mryʔ ʔlhk
37:04	wʔrmyʔ ʕʔl hwʔ wnpq bgw ʕmʔ wlʔ ʔrmywhy byt ʔsyrʔ
37:05	wḥylh dprʕwn npq mn mṣryn wšmʕw kldyʔ dkrykyn lʔwršlm šmʕhwn wšnyw lhwn mn ʔwršlm
37:06	whwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ nbyʔ lmʔmr
37:07	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl hknʔ tʔmrwn lmlkʔ dyhwdʔ dšdrkwn lwty dtbʕwn mny hʔ ḥylh dprʕwn dnpq lmʕdrwtkwn hpk lʔrʕh lmṣryn
37:08	wnhpkwn kldyʔ wntktšwn ʕm qrytʔ hdʔ wnkbšwnh wnwqdwnh bnwrʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ lʔ tsbrwn bnpškwn wtʔmrwn dʔzlyn mnn kldyʔ mṭl dlʔ ʔzlyn
37:10	mṭl dʔn tḥrbwn klh ḥylʔ dkldyʔ dmtktšyn ʕmkwn wnštḥrwn bhwn ʔnšʔ dmmḥyn gbr mn mšknh nqwmwn wnwqdwnh lqrytʔ hdʔ bnwrʔ
37:11	wšny lh ḥylʔ dkldyʔ mn ʔwršlm mn qdm ḥylh dprʕwn
37:12	wnpq ʔrmyʔ mn ʔwršlm lmʔzl lʔrʕʔ dbnymyn lmplgw tmn mntʔ ʕm ʕmʔ
37:13	wkd qʔm hwʔ btrʕʔ dbnymyn ʔyt hwʔ tmn gbrʔ pqwdʔ wšmh nryʔ br šlmyʔ br ḥnnyʔ wʔḥdh lʔrmyʔ nbyʔ wʔmr lh lwt kldyʔ ʕrq ʔnt
37:14	wʔmr lh ʔrmyʔ mdgl ʔnt lʔ ʕrq ʔnʔ lwt kldyʔ wlʔ šmʕh wʔḥdh nryʔ lʔrmyʔ wʔytyh lwt rwrbnʔ
37:15	wrgzw rwrbnʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ wngdwhy wʔrmywhy byt ʔsyrʔ byt ywntn sprʔ mṭl dlh ʕbdw rb ʔsyrʔ
37:16	wʔrmywhy lʔrmyʔ mn kwt gwbʔ lgwbʔ whwʔ tmn ʔrmyʔ ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ
37:17	wšdr mlkʔ ṣdqyʔ wʔsqh wšʔlh mlkʔ bbytʔ mṭšyʔyt wʔmr lh npq ptgmʔ mn qdm mryʔ wʔmr ʔrmyʔ npq wʔmr mlkʔ ʔyknʔ npq wʔmr dbʔydwhy dmlkʔ dbbl tštlm
37:18	wʔmr ʔrmyʔ lmlkʔ ṣdqyʔ mnʔ ḥṭyt lk wlʕbdyk wlʕmʔ hnʔ dʔrmytwnny byt ʔsyrʔ
37:19	wʔykʔ ʔnwn nbyykwn dmtnbyn hww lkwn wʔmryn dlʔ ʔtʔ mlkʔ dbbl ʕlykwn wʕl ʔrʕʔ hdʔ
37:20	hšʔ šmʕyny mry mlkʔ wtpl bʕwty qdmyk wlʔ thpkny lbyt ywntn sprʔ dlʔ ʔmwt tmn
37:21	wpqd mlkʔ ṣdqyʔ wšbqwhy lʔrmyʔ nbyʔ bdrtʔ dbyt ʔsyrʔ wyhbyn lh gryṣtʔ dlḥmʔ bywmʔ mn šwqʔ dnḥtwmʔ ʕdmʔ dgmr klh lḥmʔ mn qrytʔ wytb ʔrmyʔ bdrtʔ dbyt ʔsyrʔ
38:01	wšmʕ špṭyʔ br mtn wgdlyʔ br pšḥwr wywkl br šlmyʔ wpšḥwr br mlkyʔ ptgmʔ dʔmr ʔrmyʔ lklh ʕmʔ
38:02	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ mn dytb bqrytʔ hdʔ nmwt bḥrbʔ wbkpnʔ wbmwtnʔ wmn dnpq lwt kldyʔ ḥyʔ wmšwzb npšh
38:03	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ tštlm qrytʔ hdʔ bʔydʔ dḥylh dmlkʔ dbbl wnkbšyh
38:04	wʔmrw rwrbnʔ lmlkʔ ntqṭl gbrʔ hnʔ mṭl dhwyw mrpʔ ʔydyʔ dgbrʔ ʕbdy qrbʔ dʔštḥrw bqrytʔ hdʔ wʔydyʔ dklh ʕmʔ dʔmr lhwn ptgmʔ hnʔ mṭl dgbrʔ hnʔ lʔ ṣbʔ šlmʔ lʕmʔ hnʔ ʔlʔ ʔn byštʔ
38:05	wʔmr mlkʔ ṣdqyʔ hʔ mšlm bʔydykwn mṭl dmlkʔ lʔ mškḥ lmʔmr lkwn mdm
38:06	wdbrwhy lʔrmyʔ wʔrmywhy bgwbʔ dmlkyʔ br mlkʔ bdrtʔ dbyt ʔsyrʔ wšbwhy lʔrmyʔ bḥblʔ lgwbʔ wbgwbʔ lyt myʔ ʔlʔ ʔn synʔ wṭbʕ ʔrmyʔ bsynʔ
38:07	wšmʕ ʕbdmlk kwšyʔ gbrʔ mhymnʔ whw bbyt mlkʔ hwʔ dʔrmywhy lʔrmyʔ bgwbʔ wmlkʔ ytb hwʔ btrʕʔ dbnymyn
38:08	wnpq ʕbdmlk mn byt mlkʔ wʔmr lmlkʔ
38:09	mry byš ʕbdw gbrʔ hlyn mdm dʕbdw lʔrmyʔ nbyʔ dʔrmywhy bgwbʔ whʔ mʔt lkpnʔ mṭl dlyt lḥmʔ bqrytʔ
38:10	wpqd mlkʔ lʕbdmlk kwšyʔ wʔmr lh dbr ʕmk mkʔ tltyn gbryn wzl ʔsqyhy lʔrmyʔ mn gwbʔ ʕdlʔ nmwt
38:11	wdbr ʕbdmlk kwšyʔ gbrʔ ʕmh wʕl lbyt gzʔ dltḥt mn byt mlkʔ wnsb mn tmn blyʔ dsḥwtʔ wblyʔ drwqʕʔ wšb ʔnwn lʔrmyʔ lgwbʔ bḥblʔ
38:12	wʔmr ʕbdmlk kwšyʔ lʔrmyʔ blyʔ dsḥwtʔ wdrwqʕʔ sym tḥyt šḥwtk ltḥt mn ḥblʔ wʕbd ʔrmyʔ hknʔ
38:13	wngdwhy lʔrmyʔ bḥblʔ wʔsqwhy mn gwbʔ wytb ʔrmyʔ bdrtʔ dbyt ʔsyrʔ
38:14	wšdr mlkʔ ṣdqyʔ wdbrh lʔrmyʔ nbyʔ lwth lgw mn tltʔ mʕlnyn dbyth dmryʔ wʔmr mlkʔ lʔrmyʔ šʔl ʔnʔ lk mltʔ lʔ tksʔ mny mltʔ
38:15	wʔmr ʔrmyʔ lṣdqyʔ ʔn mḥwʔ ʔnʔ lk hʔ qṭl ʔnt ly wʔn mlk ʔnʔ lk lʔ šmʕ ʔnt ly
38:16	wʔymʔ mlkʔ ṣdqyʔ lʔrmyʔ bbytʔ mṭšyʔyt wʔmr ḥy hw mryʔ dʕbd bn npšʔ dlʔ ʔqṭlk wlʔ ʔšlmk byd ʔnšʔ ʔylyn dbʕyn npšk
38:17	wʔmr ʔrmyʔ lṣdqyʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʔn tpwq lwt rwrbnʔ dmlkʔ dbbl mḥʔ ʔnt npšk wqrytʔ hdʔ lʔ yqdʔ bnwrʔ wḥyʔ ʔnt wbytk
38:18	wʔlʔ npq ʔnt lwt rwrbnʔ dmlkʔ dbbl mštlmʔ qrytʔ hdʔ bʔydʔ dkldyʔ wmwqdyn lh bnwrʔ wʔnt lʔ ttplṭ mn ʔydyhwn
38:19	wʔmr mlkʔ ṣdqyʔ lʔrmyʔ dḥl ʔnʔ mn yhwdyʔ dʔpwq lwt kldyʔ dlmʔ nšlmwnny bʔydyhwn wnbzḥwn by
38:20	wʔmr ʔrmyʔ lʔ mšlmyn lk šmʕ dyn mltʔ dmryʔ dʔmr ʔnʔ lk dnṭʔb lk wtḥʔ npšk
38:21	wʔn lʔ ṣbʔ ʔnt lmpq hnw ptgmʔ dḥwyny mryʔ
38:22	dklhyn nšʔ dʔštḥr bbyth dmlkʔ dyhwdʔ npqn lwt rwrbnʔ dmlkʔ dbbl whnyn ʔmrn ʔṭʕywk wzkʔwk ʔnšʔ dšʔlyn hww bšlmk wṭbʕw bsynʔ rglyk whpkw lbstrhwn
38:23	wklhyn nšyk wbnyk mpqyn lwt kldyʔ wʔnt lʔ ttplṭ mn ʔydyhwn ʔlʔ bʔydwhy dmlkʔ dbbl tštlm wqrytʔ hdʔ tʔqd bnwrʔ
38:24	wʔmr ṣdqyʔ lʔrmyʔ ʔnš lʔ ndʕ bhlyn mlʔ dlʔ tmwt
38:25	wkd nšmʕwn rwrbnʔ dmllt ʕmk wnʔtwn lwtk wnʔmrwn lk ḥwn mnʔ mllt ʕm mlkʔ wmnʔ ʔmr lk mlkʔ lʔ tksʔ mnn dlʔ nqṭlk
38:26	ʔmr lhwn mbʕʔ bʕyt mn mlkʔ dlʔ nhpkny lbyt ywntn sprʔ dlʔ ʔmwt tmn
38:27	wʔtw klhwn rwrbnʔ lwt ʔrmyʔ wšʔlwhy wḥwy ʔnwn klhyn mlʔ dpqdh mlkʔ wštqw lhwn mnh mṭl dlʔ ʔštmʕt mltʔ
38:28	wytb ʔrmyʔ bdrtʔ dbyt ʔsyrʔ ʕdmʔ lywmʔ dʔtkbšt ʔwršlm
39:01	bšntʔ dtšʕ dṣdqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ byrḥʔ dʕsrʔ ʔtʔ nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl hw wklh ḥylh lʔwršlm wšrw ʕlyh
39:02	wbšnt ḥdʕsrʔ dmlkʔ ṣdqyʔ byrḥʔ ḥmyšyʔ btšʕtʔ bh byrḥʔ ʔttrʕt qrytʔ
39:03	wʔtw klhwn rwrbnʔ dmlkʔ dbbl wytbw btrʕʔ mṣʕyʔ nrgl šrʔṣr wsmgdnbw wsrskym rb mhymnʔ wnrgl šrʔṣr rbmg wklhwn rwrbnʔ dmlkʔ dbbl
39:04	wkd ḥzʔ ʔnwn ṣdqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wklhwn gbrʔ qrbtnʔ ʕrqw wnpqw mn qrytʔ bllyʔ bʔwrḥʔ dgntʔ dmlkʔ btrʕʔ dbyt šwrʔ wnpqw bʔwrḥʔ dpqʕtʔ
39:05	wrdpw ḥylʔ dkldyʔ btrhwn wʔdrkwhy lṣdqyʔ bpqʕtʔ dʔyryḥw wkwlh ḥylh ʔtbdr mnh wdbrwhy wʔsqwhy lwt nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl ldblt bʔrʕʔ dḥmt wmll ʕmh dynʔ
39:06	wnks mlkʔ dbbl lbnwhy dṣdqyʔ bdblt lʕnwhy wlklhwn ḥʔrʔ dyhwdʔ nks mlkʔ dbbl
39:07	wʕynwhy dṣdqyʔ ʕwr wʔsrh bššltʔ lmwblwth lbbl
39:08	wlbyt mlkʔ wlbtʔ dʕmʔ ʔwqdw kldyʔ bnwrʔ wlšwrʔ dʔwršlm kd ḥdrʔ {ʕrqw}<ʕqrw>
39:09	wšrkh dʕmʔ dʔštḥrw bqrytʔ wʔnšʔ dʕrqw lwth wšrkh dʕmʔ dʔštḥrw šbʔ nbwzrdn rb dḥšʔ wʔwbl ʔnwn lbbl
39:10	wmn ʕmʔ msknʔ dlyt lhwn mdm šbq nbwzrdn rb dḥšʔ bʔrʕʔ dyhwdʔ wyhb lhwn krmʔ wpwlḥnʔ bywmʔ hw
39:11	wpqd nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl ʕl ʔrmyʔ lnbwzrdn rb dḥšʔ wʔmr lh
39:12	dbryhy lʔrmyʔ wʕynyk nhwyn ʕlwhy wlʔ tʕbd lh mdm dbyš wkwl mdm dʔmr lk ʕbd lh
39:13	wšdr nbwzrdn rb dḥšʔ wnbwšzbn rb mhymnʔ wnrgl šrʔṣr rbmg wklhwn rwrbnʔ dmlkʔ dbbl
39:14	šdrw dbrwhy lʔrmyʔ mn drtʔ dbyt ʔsyrʔ wʔšlmwhy lgdlyʔ br ʔḥyqm br špn lmpqwth lbyth wytb bgw ʕmʔ
39:15	wʕl ʔrmyʔ hwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ kd klʔ hwʔ bdrt mṭrtʔ
39:16	zl wʔmr lʕbdmlk kwšyʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl hʔ mytʔ ʔnʔ ptgmʔ ʕl qrytʔ hdʔ lbyštʔ wlʔ lṭbtʔ wnhwwn qdmyk bywmʔ hw
39:17	wʔpṣyk bywmʔ hw ʔmr mryʔ wlʔ tštlm bʔydʔ dgbrʔ ddḥl ʔnt mnhwn
39:18	wʔpṣyk wbḥrbʔ lʔ tpl wtšwzb npšk ʕl dʔttklt ʕly ʔmr mryʔ
40:01	ptgmʔ dhwʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ mn qdm mryʔ mn btr dšdrh nbwzrdn rb dḥšʔ mn rmtʔ kd dbrh kd ʔsyr bššltʔ bgw klh šbytʔ dʔwršlm wdyhwdʔ dʔštbyw lbbl
40:02	wdbrh rb dḥšʔ lʔrmyʔ wʔmr lh mryʔ ʔlhk ʔmr byštʔ ʕl ʔtrʔ hnʔ
40:03	wʔyty wʕbd mryʔ ʔyk dʔmr ʕl dḥṭytwn lmryʔ wlʔ šmʕtwn bqlh hwʔ lkwn ptgmʔ hnʔ
40:04	lk dyn hʔ šrytk ywmnʔ mn ššltʔ dbʔydyk ʔn ṣbʔ ʔnt lmʔtʔ ʕmy lbbl tʔ wthwʔ ʕyny ʕlyk wʔlʔ ṣbyt lmʔtʔ ʕmy lbbl pwš hʔ klh ʔrʕʔ qdmyk kr dṭb wkr dšpyr bʕynyk lmʔzl ltmn zl
40:05	wʔmr lh ʔn pʔš ʔnt tb lwt gdlyʔ br ʔḥyqm br špn bgw ʕmʔ hw dʔšlṭh mlkʔ dbbl bqwryʔ dyhwdʔ ʔw kr dšpyr bʕynyk lmʔzl zl wyhb lh nbwzrdn rb dḥšʔ mwhbtʔ bʔwrḥʔ wšryhy
40:06	wʔtʔ ʔrmyʔ lwt gdlyʔ br ʔḥyqm br špn lmṣpyʔ wytb lwth bgw ʕmʔ dʔštḥrw bʔrʕʔ
40:07	wšmʕw kl rby ḥylʔ dbqwryʔ hnwn wgbrʔ dʕmhwn dʔšlṭ mlkʔ dbbl lgdlyʔ br ʔḥyqm bʔrʕʔ wdʔšlm lh gbrʔ wnšʔ wṭlyʔ wmn msknʔ dʔrʕʔ ʔylyn dlʔ ʔštbyw lbbl
40:08	wʔtw lwt gdlyʔ lmṣpyʔ ʔyšmʕʔyl br ntnyʔ wywḥnn wywntn bny qwrḥ wšryʔ br tnḥmt wbny ʕypy dmn nṭwpt wyznyʔ br mʕkt hnwn wgbryhwn
40:09	wʔymʔ lhwn gdlyʔ br ʔḥyqm br špn wlgbrʔ dʕmhwn wʔmr lʔ tdḥlwn lmplḥ lkldyʔ tbw bʔrʕʔ wplwḥw lmlkʔ dbbl wnṭʔb lkwn
40:10	wʔnʔ hʔ ytb ʔnʔ bmṣpyʔ lmqm qdm kldyʔ dʔtyn ʕlyn wʔntwn ḥmwlw ʕbwrʔ wḥmrʔ wmšḥʔ wʔbʔ dqyṭʔ wʔrmw bmʔnykwn wtbw bqwrykwn dʔḥdtwn
40:11	ʔp klhwn yhwdyʔ dʔyt bʔdwm wbmwʔb wbbny ʕmwn wbklhyn ʔrʕtʔ šmʕw dšbq mlkʔ dbbl šrknʔ lyhwdyʔ wdʔšlṭ ʕlyhwn lgdlyʔ br ʔḥyqm br špn
40:12	whpkw klhwn yhwdyʔ mn klhwn ʔtrwtʔ dʔtbdrw ltmn wʔtw lʔrʕʔ dyhwdʔ lwt gdlyʔ lmṣpyʔ wḥmlw ḥmrʔ wʕlltʔ dqyṭʔ swgʔʔ dṭb
40:13	wywḥnn br qwrḥ wklhwn rby ḥylʔ dbqwryʔ ʔtw lwt gdlyʔ lmṣpyʔ
40:14	wʔmrw lh lʔ ydʕ ʔnt dblʕys mlkʔ dbny ʕmwn šdr lʔyšmʕyl br ntnyʔ lmqṭlk wlʔ hymn ʔnwn gdlyʔ br ʔḥyqm
40:15	wywḥnn br qwrḥ ʔmr lgdlyʔ mṭšyʔyt bmṣpyʔ ʔzl ʔqṭlywhy lʔyšmʕyl br ntnyʔ wʔnš lʔ ndʕ dlmʔ nqṭlk wntbdrwn klhwn dbyt yhwdʔ dmtknšyn lwtk wnʔbd šrknʔ dyhwdyʔ
40:16	wʔmr gdlyʔ br ʔḥyqm lywḥnn br qwrḥ lʔ tʕbd ptgmʔ hnʔ mṭl ddglwtʔ mllt ʕl ʔyšmʕyl
41:01	wbyrḥʔ dšbʕʔ ʔtʔ ʔyšmʕyl br ntnyʔ br ʔyšmʕyl mn zrʕʔ dmlkwtʔ wrwrbny mlkʔ wʕsryn gbryn ʕmh lwt gdlyʔ br ʔḥyqm lmṣpyʔ wʔklw tmn lḥmʔ ʔkḥdʔ bmṣpyʔ
41:02	wqm ʔyšmʕyl br ntnyʔ hw wʕsryn gbryn dʔtw ʕmh wmḥʔwhy lgdlyʔ br ʔḥyqm br špn bḥrbʔ wqṭlwhy hw dʔšlṭh mlkʔ dbbl bʔrʕʔ
41:03	wlklhwn yhwdyʔ dʔyt hww ʕmh ʕm gdlyʔ bmṣpyʔ wlkldyʔ dʔštkḥw tmn wʔp lgbrʔ qrbtnʔ qṭl ʔyšmʕyl
41:04	wʔnš lʔ šmʕ wbywmʔ dtryn mn btr dtqṭl gdlyʔ
41:05	ʔtw gbrʔ mn škym wmn šylw wmn šmryn tmnʔyn gbryn gryʕyn dqnyhwn wmṣryn lbwšyhwn wmtktšyn wqwrbnʔ wlbwntʔ bʔydyhwn lmʕlw lbyth dmryʔ
41:06	wnpq ʔyšmʕyl br ntnyʔ lʔwrʕhwn mn mṣpyʔ mhlk wʔzl wbkʔ wkd pgʕ bhwn ʔmr lhwn tw lwt gdlyʔ br ʔḥyqm
41:07	wkd ʕlw lgw qrytʔ nks ʔnwn ʔyšmʕyl br ntnyʔ wʔrmy ʔnwn bgwbʔ hw wgbrʔ dʕmh
41:08	wʕsrʔ gbryn ʔštkḥw bhwn wʔmryn lʔyšmʕyl lʔ tqṭln mṭl dʔyt ln ḥdwtʔ bḥqlʔ dḥṭʔ wdsʕrʔ wmšḥʔ wdbšʔ wšbq ʔnwn wlʔ qṭl ʔnwn ʕm ʔḥyhwn
41:09	wgwbʔ dšdʔ bh ʔyšmʕyl klhyn šldʔ dgbrʔ dqṭl ʕm gdlyʔ hw hw dʕbd ʔsʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ mn qdm bʕšʔ mlkʔ dʔysryl lh lgwbʔ hw mlyhy ʔyšmʕyl br ntnyʔ qṭylʔ
41:10	wšbʔ ʔyšmʕyl klh šrkʔ dʕmʔ dbmṣpyʔ dʔšlm nbwzrdn rb dḥšʔ lgdlyʔ br ʔḥyqm wšbʔ ʔnwn ʔyšmʕyl br ntnyʔ wʔzl lʕbrʔ dbny ʕmwn
41:11	wšmʕ ywḥnn br qwrḥ wkwlhwn rby ḥylʔ dʕmh ʕl klh šbytʔ ddbr ʔyšmʕyl br ntnyʔ
41:12	wdbr klhwn gbrʔ wʔzlw lmtktšw ʕm ʔyšmʕyl br ntnyʔ wʔškḥwhy ʕl myʔ sgyʔʔ dʔyt bgbʕwn
41:13	wkd ḥzʔ klh ʕmʔ dʕm ʔyšmʕyl lywḥnn br qwrḥ wlklhwn rby ḥylʔ dʕmh ḥdyw
41:14	whpkw klh ʕmʔ dšbʔ ʔyšmʕyl mn mṣpyʔ wʔtw lwt ywḥnn br qwrḥ
41:15	wʔyšmʕyl br ntnyʔ ʔštwzb btmnyʔ ʔnšyn mn qdm ywḥnn {wʔzlw}<wʔzl> lwt bny ʕmwn
41:16	wdbr ywḥnn br qwrḥ wklhwn rby ḥylʔ dʕmh kl šrkʔ dʕmʔ dʔhpk mn lwt ʔyšmʕyl br ntnyʔ mn mṣpyʔ mn btr dqṭl ʔyšmʕyl lgdlyʔ br ʔḥyqm wdbr gbrʔ qrbtnʔ wnšʔ wṭlyʔ wmhymnʔ dʔhpk mn gbʕwn
41:17	wʔzl wytb bʔdrʔ dbmhm dʕl gnb byt lḥm lmʔzl lmʕl lmṣryn
41:18	mn qdm kldyʔ ddḥlw mnhwn ʕl dqṭl ʔyšmʕyl br ntnyʔ lgdlyʔ br ʔḥyqm hw dʔšlṭh mlkʔ dbbl bʔrʕʔ dyhwdʔ
42:01	wqrbw klhwn rby ḥylʔ wywḥnn br qwrḥ wyznyʔ br hwšʕyʔ wklh ʕmʔ mn zʕwrʔ wʕdmʔ lqšyšʔ
42:02	wʔmrw lʔrmyʔ bʕyn ḥnn mnk ṣlʔ ʕlyn qdm mryʔ ʔlhk mṭl dʔštḥrn qlyl mn swgʔʔ ʔyk dʕynyk ḥzyn ln
42:03	wnḥwyn mryʔ ʔlhk ʔwrḥʔ dnʔzl bh wptgmʔ dnʕbd
42:04	wʔmr lhwn ʔrmyʔ nbyʔ šmʕt hʔ mṣlʔ ʔnʔ qdm mryʔ ʔlhkwn ʔyk ptgmykwn wkl ptgmʔ dnʕnykwn mryʔ ʔlhkwn ʔḥwykwn wlʔ ʔṭšʔ mnkwn mlʔ
42:05	whnwn ʔmrw lʔrmyʔ nhwʔ bn mryʔ shdʔ šryrʔ wmhymnʔ ʔlʔ ʔyk ptgmʔ dnšdrk mryʔ ʔlhk lwtn hknʔ nʕbd
42:06	ʔn dṭb wʔn dbyš bqlh dmryʔ ʔlhn nšmʕ dmšdrynn lk lwth wnṭʔb ln kd nšmʕ bqlh dmryʔ ʔlhn
42:07	wmn btr ʕsrʔ ywmyn hwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ nbyʔ
42:08	wqrʔ lywḥnn br qwrḥ wlklhwn rby ḥylʔ dʕmh wlklh ʕmʔ mn zʕwrʔ wʕdmʔ lqšyšʔ
42:09	wʔmr lhwn hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl dšdrtwnny lwth lmrmyw bʕwtkwn qdmwhy
42:10	ʔn ttbwn bʔrʕʔ hdʔ ʔbnykwn wlʔ ʔsḥwpkwn wʔṣwbkwn wlʔ ʔʕqwrkwn wʔšlʔ mn byštʔ dʕbdt lkwn
42:11	wlʔ tdḥlwn mn qdm mlkʔ dbbl dʔntwn dḥlyn mnh lʔ tdḥlwn mnh ʔmr mryʔ mṭl dʕmkwn ʔnʔ ʔmr mryʔ lmprqkwn wlmpṣywtkwn mn ʔydwhy
42:12	wʔtl ʕlykwn rḥmʔ wʔrḥmkwn wʔwtbkwn bʔrʕkwn
42:13	wʔn ʔmryn ʔntwn lʔ ytbynn bʔrʕʔ hdʔ mṭl dlʔ tšmʕwn bqlh dmryʔ ʔlhkwn
42:14	wʔmrtwn lʔ hknʔ lʔrʕʔ dmṣryn nʕwl dlʔ nḥzʔ qrbʔ wqlʔ dšypwrʔ lʔ nšmʕ wllḥmʔ lʔ nkpn wtmn ntb
42:15	hšʔ šmʕw ptgmh dmryʔ šrkʔ dyhwdʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʔn ʔntwn tsymwn ʔpykwn lmʕl lmṣryn wtʕlwn lmʕmr tmn
42:16	hy ḥrbʔ ddḥlyn ʔntwn mnh tmn tdrkkwn bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wkpnʔ dʔntwn dḥlyn mnh tmn nrdwp btrkwn lmṣryn wtmn tmwtwn
42:17	wnhwwn klhwn gbrʔ dsmw ʔpyhwn lmʕl lmṣryn lmʕmr tmn nmwtwn bḥrbʔ wbkpnʔ wbmwtnʔ wlʔ nhwʔ lhwn srydʔ dmštwzb mn qdm byštʔ dmytʔ ʔnʔ ʕlyhwn
42:18	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʔyk dʔttnyḥ rwgzy wḥmty ʕl ʕmwryh dʔwršlm hknʔ ttnyḥ ḥmty ʕlykwn mʔ dʕltwn lmṣryn wthwwn lmwmtʔ wltmhʔ wllwṭtʔ wlḥsdʔ wlʔ tḥzwn twb ʔtrʔ hnʔ
42:19	ʔmr mryʔ ʕlykwn šrkʔ dyhwdʔ lʔ tʕlwn lmṣryn wdʕw dshdt bkwn ywmnʔ
42:20	dʔntwn ʔṭʕytwn bnpškwn wšdrtwnny lwt mryʔ ʔlhkwn wʔmrtwn ṣlʔ ʕlyn qdm mryʔ ʔlhn wklmdm dʔmr lk mryʔ ʔlhn ḥwn wnʕbd
42:21	wḥwytkwn ywmnʔ wlʔ šmʕtwn bqlh dmryʔ ʔlhkwn wʕl kwl dšdrny lwtkwn lʔ ʕbdtwn
42:22	hšʔ dʕw dbḥrbʔ wbkpnʔ wbmwtnʔ tmwtwn bʔtrʔ dṣbytwn lmʕl lh lmʕmr tmn
43:01	wkd šlm ʔrmyʔ lmʔmr lklh ʕmʔ klhwn ptgmwhy dmryʔ ʔlhhwn dšdrh mryʔ ʔlhhwn lwthwn lmʔmr lhwn ptgmʔ hlyn
43:02	ʔmr yznyʔ br hwšʕyʔ wywḥnn br qwrḥ wklhwn gbrʔ ršyʕʔ ʔmrw lʔrmyʔ dglʔyt ʔmrt lʔ šdrk mryʔ ʔlhn dtʔmr ln dlʔ tʕlwn lmṣryn lmʕmr tmn
43:03	mṭl dbrwk br nryʔ mgrʔ lk bn dnšlmn bʔydʔ dkldyʔ dnqṭlwnn wnšbwnn lbbl
43:04	wlʔ šmʕ ywḥnn br qwrḥ wklhwn rby ḥylʔ wkwlh ʕmʔ bqlh dmryʔ dntbwn bʔrʕʔ dyhwdʔ
43:05	wdbr ywḥnn br qwrḥ lklhwn rby ḥylʔ wlklh šrkʔ dʔštḥrw mn dbyt yhwdʔ
43:06	lgbrʔ wlnšʔ wlṭlyʔ wlbyt mlkʔ kwlhyn npštʔ dšbq nbwzrdn rb dḥšʔ lwt gdlyʔ br ʔḥyqm br špn wlʔrmyʔ nbyʔ wlbrwk br nryʔ
43:07	wʔtw lʔrʕʔ dmṣryn mṭl dlʔ šmʕw bqlh dmryʔ wʔtw ʕdmʔ ltḥpys
43:08	whwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ btḥpys lmʔmr
43:09	sb bʔydk kʔpʔ rwrbtʔ wṭmwr ʔnyn bmlṭʔ bmlbnʔ btrʕʔ dbyt prʕwn btḥpys lʕyn gbrʔ dyhwdʔ
43:10	wʔmr lhwn hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl hʔ mšdr ʔnʔ wdbr ʔnʔ lnbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl ʕbdy wnrmʔ kwrsyh lʕl mn kʔpʔ hlyn dṭmrt wnšqwl zynh ʕlyhyn
43:11	wnʔtʔ wnmḥyh lʔrʕʔ dmṣryn dlmwtʔ lmwtʔ wdlšbyʔ lšbyʔ wdlḥrbʔ lḥrbʔ
43:12	wnšbwq nwrʔ bbtʔ dʔlhʔ dmṣryʔ wnwqd ʔnwn wnšbʔ ʔnwn wntʕṭpyh lʔrʕʔ ʔyk dmtʕṭp rʕyʔ lgwlth wnpwq mn tmn bšlmʔ
43:13	wntbr qymtʔ dbyt šmš dbʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wbtʔ dʔlhʔ dmṣryʔ nwqd bnwrʔ
44:01	ptgmʔ dhwʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ mn qdm mryʔ dntnbʔ ʕl klhwn yhwdyʔ dytbyn bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wdytbyn bmgdwl wbtḥpys wbmps wbʔrʕʔ dptrws
44:02	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʔntwn ḥzytwn klh byštʔ dʔytyt ʕl ʔwršlm wʕl kwlhyn qwryʔ dyhwdʔ whnyn ḥrbn ywmnʔ wlyt bhyn ʔnš dytb
44:03	mṭl klh byštʔ dʕbdw wʔrgzwny wʔzlw wsmw bsmʔ lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔylyn dlʔ ydʕw ʔnwn hnwn wʔbhyhwn
44:04	wšdrt lwthwn lklhwn ʕbdy nbyʔ qdmt wšdrt wʔmrt lʔ tʕbdwn ṭnpwtʔ hdʔ dsnyt
44:05	wlʔ šmʕw wlʔ ṣlw ʔdnhwn dnhpkwn mn byšthwn dlʔ nsymwn bsmʔ lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ
44:06	wʔttnyḥ rwgzy wḥmty wʔḥdt nwrʔ bqwryʔ dyhwdʔ wbšwqyh dʔwršlm whwy lḥwrbʔ wltmhʔ ʔyk dywmnʔ
44:07	whšʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl lmnʔ ʕbdyn ʔntwn byštʔ rbtʔ ʕl npštkwn dtwbdwn mnkwn gbrʔ wnšʔ wʕlymʔ wylwdʔ mn gw yhwdʔ dlʔ tšbqwn lkwn ḥrtʔ
44:08	mṭl dʔrgztwnny bʕbd ʔydykwn wsmtwn bsmʔ lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn dʕltwn lmʕmr tmn dʔwbdkwn wthwwn llwṭtʔ wlḥsdʔ bklhwn ʕmmʔ dʔrʕʔ
44:09	lmʔ ṭʕytwn byštʔ dʔbhykwn wbyštʔ dmlkʔ dyhwdʔ wbyštʔ dnšyhwn dʕbdw bʔrʕʔ dyhwdʔ wbšwqyh dʔwršlm
44:10	wlʔ ʔtdkyw ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ wlʔ dḥlw wlʔ plḥwny wlʔ hlkw bnmwsy wbqymy dyhbt lhwn wlʔbhyhwn
44:11	mṭwl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl hʔ sʔm ʔnʔ ʔpy bkwn lbyštʔ wlmwbdw lklhwn dbyt yhwdʔ
44:12	wʔtbr šrkʔ dyhwdʔ dsmw ʔpyhwn lmʕl lmṣryn lmʕmr tmn nswpwn klhwn bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wnmwtwn bḥrbʔ wbkpnʔ wbmwtnʔ wnhwwn lmwmtʔ wltmhʔ wllwṭtʔ wlḥsdʔ
44:13	wʔpqwd ʕl dytbyn bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn ʔyk dpqdt ʕl ʔwršlm bḥrbʔ wbkpnʔ wbmwtnʔ
44:14	wlʔ nhwʔ lhwn plyṭʔ wsrydʔ lšrkʔ dyhwdʔ dʕʔlyn lmʕmr tmn bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wlmhpk lʔrʕʔ dyhwdʔ dhnwn sbryn bnpšhwn lmhpk ltmn lʔ nhpkwn ʔlʔ ʔn zʕwrʔ
44:15	wʕnw wʔmrw lʔrmyʔ kl gbrʔ dydʕyn hww dsymn hwy nšyhwn bsmʔ lʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ wklhyn nšʔ dqymn knšʔ rbʔ wklh ʕmʔ dytbyn bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wbptrws wʔmrw lh
44:16	ptgmʔ dʔmrt ln bšm mryʔ lʔ šmʕyn ḥnn lk
44:17	ʔlʔ ʕbdynn kwl ptgmʔ dnpq mn pwmn lmsm bsmʔ lpwlḥn šmyʔ wlmnqyw lh nwqyʔ ʔyk dʕbdn ḥnn wʔbhyn wmlkyn wrwrbnyn bqwryʔ dyhwdʔ wbšwqyh dʔwršlm wsbʕyn hwyn lḥmʔ wṭb hwʔ ln wbyštʔ lʔ ḥzyn
44:18	whʔ mn dpšn mn dlmsm bsmʔ lpwlḥn šmyʔ wlmnqyw lh nwqyʔ ḥsr ln kl mdm wbḥrbʔ wbkpnʔ spn wʕny klhyn nšʔ wʔmrn
44:19	kd ḥnn symn hwyn bsmʔ lmlkt šmyʔ wmnqyn hwyn lh nwqyʔ lʔ hwʔ blʕd mn gbryn ʕbdn lh zwtrʔ wnqyn lh nwqyʔ
44:20	wʔmr ʔrmyʔ lklh ʕmʔ lgbrʔ wlnšʔ wlklh ʕmʔ dʔmrw lh mlʔ hlyn
44:21	hw ʕṭrʔ dbsmʔ dsmtwn bqwryʔ dyhwdʔ wbšwqyh dʔwršlm ʔntwn wʔbhykwn wmlkykwn wrwrbnykwn wʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ lh hw ʔtdkr mryʔ wslq ʕl lbh
44:22	wlʔ mškḥ twb mryʔ lmšbq lkwn mṭl byšwtʔ dʕbdykwn wmṭl ṭnpwtʔ dʕbdtwn whwt ʔrʕkwn ltmhʔ wllwṭtʔ wlḥwrbʔ mn bly dytb ʔyk dywmnʔ
44:23	ʕl dsmtwn bsmʔ wḥṭytwn lmryʔ wlʔ šmʕtwn bqlh dmryʔ wbnmwsh wbqymh wbshdwth lʔ hlktwn mṭl hnʔ ʔdrktkwn byštʔ hdʔ ʔyk dywmnʔ
44:24	wʔmr ʔrmyʔ lklh ʕmʔ lgbrʔ wlnšʔ šmʕw ptgmh dmryʔ klh yhwdʔ dbʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
44:25	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysrʔyl ʔntwn wnšykwn ʔmrtwn bpwmkwn wbʔydykwn šlmyn ʔntwn wʔmrtwn nšr ndryn dndrn lmsm bsmʔ lpwlḥn šmyʔ wlmnqyw lh nwqyʔ ʔšrtwn mwmtkwn wʕbdtwn ndrykwn
44:26	mṭl hnʔ šmʕw ptgmh dmryʔ klh yhwdʔ dytbyn bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn hʔ ʔnʔ ymyt bšmy rbʔ ʔmr mryʔ dlʔ nhwʔ twb šmy bpwmhwn dbyt yhwdʔ dbklh ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wlʔ nʔmrwn ḥy hw mryʔ ʔlhʔ
44:27	ʔnʔ gyr msrhb ʔnʔ ʕlyhwn byštʔ ʔmr mryʔ wnswpwn klhwn gbrʔ dyhwdʔ dbʔrʕʔ dmṣryn bḥrbʔ wbkpnʔ wbmwtnʔ ʕdmʔ dʔgmr ʔnwn
44:28	wplyṭy ḥrbʔ nhpkwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn lʔrʕʔ dyhwdʔ qlyl bmnynʔ wndʕwn klh šrkʔ dyhwdʔ dʔzlw lmʕmr bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn ptgmʔ dmn nšr dyly ʔw dylhwn
44:29	whdʔ ʔtʔ lkwn ʔmr mryʔ dpqd ʔnʔ ʕlykwn bʔtrʔ hnʔ dtdʕwn dšrn mly ʕlykwn lbyštʔ
44:30	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hʔ mšlm ʔnʔ lh lprʕwn ḥgyrʔ mlkʔ dmṣryn bʔydʔ dbʕldbbwhy wbʔydʔ dʔylyn dbʕyn npšh ʔyk dʔšlmt lṣdqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ bʔydʔ dnbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl bʕldbbh wbʕʔ npšh
45:01	ptgmʔ dʔmr ʔrmyʔ lbrwk br nryʔ kd ktb ptgmʔ hlyn ʕl sprʔ mn pwmh dʔrmyʔ bšntʔ rbyʕytʔ dywyqym br ywšyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ lmʔmr
45:02	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʕlyk brwk
45:03	ʔmrt wy dʔwsp mryʔ dʔwwʔnʔ ʕl kʔby lʔyt btnḥty wnyḥʔ lʔ ʔškḥt
45:04	hknʔ ʔmr lh hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hʔ mdm dbnyt ʔnʔ sḥp wmdm dnṣbt ʔnʔ ʕqr wlklh ʔrʕʔ mḥrb ʔnʔ
45:05	wʔnt dyn dbʕyt lk rwrbtʔ lʔ tbʕʔ dmytrn mnk mṭl dhʔ mytʔ ʔnʔ byštʔ ʕl kl bsr ʔmr mryʔ wʔtl lk dtšwzb npšk bkwlhwn ʔtrwtʔ dtʔzl ltmn
46:01	ʕl mṣryn whwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ nbyʔ dntnbʔ ʕl ʕmmʔ
46:02	wʕl mṣryʔ wʕl ḥylh dprʕwn ḥgyrʔ mlkʔ dmṣryn dšrʔ hwʔ ʕl nhrʔ prt bkrkmwš dqṭl nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl bšntʔ rbyʕytʔ dywyqym br ywšyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ lmʔmr hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl
46:03	šqwlw zynʔ wskrʔ wqrwbw lqrbʔ
46:04	pgdw rkšʔ ʔrkbw pršʔ symw snwrtʔ mrwqw rwmḥʔ lbšw šrynʔ
46:05	mṭl dḥzyt dhnwn mttbryn whpkyn lbstrhwn wgnbryhwn ʔtmḥyw wʕrqw wlʔ ʔtpnyw mṭl dkrykyn hww lhwn mn ḥdryhwn ʔmr mryʔ
46:06	lʔ nʕrwq ʔynʔ dqlyl wlʔ ntplṭ ʔynʔ dgnbr bgnbrʔ ʕl yd nhrʔ prt ʔttqlw wnplw klhwn
46:07	mnw hnʔ dʔyk nhrʔ slq wʔyk nhrwtʔ mtrgšy mwhy
46:08	mlkʔ dmṣryn ʔyk nhrʔ slq wʔyk nhrwtʔ mtrgšyn mwhy wʔmr ʔsq wʔksʔ lʔrʕʔ wʔwbd qrytʔ wʕmwryh
46:09	rkbw rkšʔ ʔštbḥw bmrkbtʔ npqwn gbrʔ kwšyʔ wpwṭyʔ ʔḥydy skrʔ wlwdyʔ dydʕyn lmšdʔ bqštʔ
46:10	wnhwʔ ywmʔ hw lmryʔ ḥyltnʔ ywmʔ dpwrʕnʔ dprʕ lbʕldbbwhy wtʔkwl ḥrbʔ wtsbʕ wtrwʔ mn dmhwn mṭwl dḥrbʔ nʕbd mryʔ ḥyltnʔ bʔrʕʔ dgrbyʔ ʕl nhrʔ prt
46:11	sqy lglʕd wsby ʔrhṭnʔ btwltʔ brt mṣryn ʔyqʔ ʔsgyty ʔsywtʔ wʕwdrnʔ lʔ hwʔ lky
46:12	šmʕw ʕmmʔ ṣʕrky wʔylltky ʔtmlyt ʔrʕʔ mṭl dgbrʔ bgbrʔ ʔtṭry wtryhwn bḥrbʔ nplw
46:13	ptgmʔ dʔmr mryʔ lʔrmyʔ nbyʔ dnʔtʔ nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl wnḥrbyh lʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
46:14	ḥww bmṣryn wʔšmʕw bmgdwl wʔšmʕw bmps wbtḥpys ʔmrw ʔtṭybw wʔttqnw mṭl dʔklt ḥrbʔ ḥdryky
46:15	mṭl mnʔ ʔstḥpw ʕšynyky wnplw wlʔ qmw mṭl dmryʔ sḥp ʔnwn
46:16	swgʔhwn ʔstḥpw ʔp npl gbrʔ ʕl ḥbrh wʔmrw qwmw nhpwk lʕmn wlʔrʕʔ dʔtyldn bh mn qdm ḥrbʔ dmdwyʔ
46:17	wqrw tmn šmh dprʕwn ḥgyrʔ mlkʔ dmṣryn dlwḥʔ wmʕbr zbnʔ
46:18	ḥy ʔnʔ ʔmr mryʔ mlkʔ ṣbʔwt šmh ʔlʔ npl prʕwn ʔyk tbrʔ dṭwrʔ wʔyk krmlʔ bgw ymʔ
46:19	mʔnʔ dšbytʔ ʕbdy lky btwltʔ brt mṣryn mṭl dmps thwʔ lḥwrbʔ wtṣdʔ mn bly dytb
46:20	mṣryn ʕgltʔ špyrtʔ mṣyrtʔ ḥylʔ mn grbyʔ ʔtʔ ʕlyh
46:21	ʔgyryh bgwh ʔyk ʕglʔ dpṭmʔ wʔp hnwn ʔtpnyw wʕrqw ʔkḥdʔ wlʔ qmw mṭwl dywmʔ dtbrhwn ʔtʔ ʕlyhwn zbnʔ dpwqdnhwn
46:22	qlh dḥylʔ ʔyk ḥwyʔ dršp mṭl dʕl ḥylʔ nʔzlwn wbkwlbʔ nʔtwn ʕlyh ʔyk psqy qysʔ
46:23	pswqw ʕbyh ʔmr mryʔ mṭl dskʔ lyt lhwn mṭl dsgyʔyn mn qmṣʔ wlyt lhwn mnyn
46:24	bhtt brt mṣryn wʔštlmt byd ʕmʔ dgrbyʔ
46:25	ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl hʔ ʔnʔ pqd ʔnʔ ʕl ʔmwn dmyʔ wʕl prʕwn wʕl mṣryn wʕl ʔlhyh wʕl ḥylh wʕl mlkyh wʕl prʕwn wʕl kl dtkylyn ʕlwhy
46:26	wʔšlm ʔnwn bʔydʔ dbʕldbbyhwn wbʔydʔ dʔylyn dbʕyn npšhwn bʔydʔ dnbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl wbʔydʔ dʕbdwhy wbtrkn tšrʔ ʔyk ywmtʔ dmn qdym ʔmr mryʔ
46:27	wʔnt lʔ tdḥl ʕbdy yʕqwb ʔmr mryʔ wlʔ ttbr ʔysryl dhʔ prq ʔnʔ lk mn rwḥqʔ wlzrʕk mn ʔrʕʔ dšbythwn wntb yʕqwb wnšlʔ wnškt wntnyḥ wlyt mn dmhr lh
46:28	wʔnt lʔ tdḥl ʕbdy yʕqwb ʔmr mryʔ mṭl dʕmk ʔnʔ mṭl dʔʕbd swpnʔ bklhwn ʕmmʔ dbdrtk tmn wlk lʔ ʔsyp wʔrdyk bdynʔ wmzkyw lʔ ʔzkyk
47:01	ʕl plšt whwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ nbyʔ dntnbʔ ʕl plštyʔ ʕdlʔ nmḥʔ prʕwn lʕʔzʔ
47:02	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hʔ mytʔ ʔnʔ ʕlymʔ mn grbyʔ wnhwwn ʔyk nḥlʔ dgrp wngrpwn ʔrʕʔ wmlʔh qrytʔ wʕmwryh wnbgnwn bny ʔnšʔ wnyllwn klhwn ʕmwryh dʔrʕʔ
47:03	mn qlʔ dhlktʔ dprstʔ dgnbrwhy wmn zwʕʔ dmrkbth wmn qlʔ dgyglwhy lʔ ʔtpnyw ʔbhʔ ʕl bnyʔ mṭl dʔtrpy ʔydyhwn
47:04	hʔ ywmʔ ʔtʔ lmbz lklhwn plštyʔ wlmwbdw lṣwr wlṣydn wlkl dʔštḥrw lmʕdrw mṭl dḥrb mryʔ lplštyʔ lšrkʔ dgzrtʔ dqpwdqyʔ
47:05	mṭt mḥwtʔ lʕʔzʔ ʔttbrt ʔšqlwn wkwl dʔštḥr bytbhwn
47:06	ʔw spsrh dmryʔ ʕdmʔ lʔmty lʔ tšlyn wlʔ ttnyḥyn lmḥrb ʔtḥmly bḥltky ʔtḥmly wšly
47:07	ʔyknʔ tšlʔ dmryʔ pqdh ʕl ʔšqlwn wʕl spry ymʔ tmn ʔšlṭh
48:01	ʕl mwʔb hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl wy lnbw dʔtbzzt bhtt wʔḥprt qwrytym bht ʕwšnh wʔtbdr
48:02	wlyt twb tšbwḥtʔ lmwʔb bḥšbwn ʔtḥšbw {ʕly}<ʕlyh> byštʔ wʔmrw tw nwbdyh mn ʕmʔ ʔpn mštq ʔn tštqyn btrky tʔzl ḥrbʔ
48:03	ql ʔylltʔ mn ḥwrnym bztʔ wtbrʔ rbʔ
48:04	ʔttbrt mwʔb ʔšmʕw ʔylltʔ msknyh
48:05	bmsqnʔ dlwḥyt kd bkyn nsqwn wbmḥttʔ dḥwrnym ʔwlṣnʔ wgʕtʔ dtbrʔ nʕbdwn šmʕw
48:06	wʕrwqw wpṣw npškwn whww ʔyk ʕqrʔ bmdbrʔ
48:07	ʕl dʔttklty ʕl ḥsnyky wʕl gzyky ʔp ʔnty ttḥdyn wnpwq kmwš bšbytʔ wkwmrwhy wrwrbnwhy ʔkḥdʔ
48:08	wnʔtʔ bzwzʔ ʕl klhyn qwryyky wlʔ ntpṣyn wnʔbd ʕwmqʔ wtḥrb pqʕtʔ ʔyknʔ dʔmr mryʔ
48:09	hbw klylʔ lmwʔb mṭwl dmḥrb ḥrbʔ wklhyn qwryh nhwyn lḥwrbʔ mn bly dytb
48:10	lyṭ hw mn dnʕbd ʕbdh dmryʔ bnklʔ wlyṭ hw mn dnklʔ ḥrbh mn dmʔ
48:11	šlyn mwʔbyʔ mn ṭlywthwn wškwtyn ʕl tṭryhwn wlʔ srqw mn mʔnʔ lmʔnʔ wbšbytʔ lʔ ʔzlw mṭl hnʔ qym ṭʕmhwn bhwn wryḥhwn lʔ pg
48:12	mṭl hnʔ hʔ ywmtʔ ʔtyn ʔmr mryʔ wʔšdr ʕlyhwn bzwzʔ wnbzwn ʔnwn wmʔnyhwn nsrqwn wgrbyhwn nšḥqwn
48:13	wnbht mwʔb mn kmwš ʔyk dbhtw dbyt ʔysryl mn byt ʔyl twklnhwn
48:14	ʔyknʔ ʔmryn ʔntwn dgnbrʔ ḥnn wgbrʔ ḥyltnʔ lqrbʔ
48:15	ʔtbzz mwʔb wqwryh slq wgbyʔ dgnbrwhy ʔštlmw lqṭlʔ ʔmr mlkʔ mryʔ ʔlhʔ ḥyltnʔ šmh
48:16	qryb hw tbrh dmwʔb lmʔtʔ wbyšth msrhbʔ ṭb
48:17	ʔtdlḥw wzʕw kwl dḥdrwhy wkl dydʕyn šmh ʔmrw ʔyknʔ ʔttbr ḥwṭrʔ ʕšynʔ wgwzʕʔ dtšbwḥtʔ
48:18	ḥwty mn ʔyqrʔ wtby bṣʕrʔ ʕmwrtʔ dbrt rybwn mṭl dbzwzʔ dmwʔb slq ʕlyky wḥrb krkyky
48:19	ʕl ʔwrḥtʔ qwmy wḥwry ʕmwrtʔ dʕdwʕyr šʔl ldʕrq wldmtplṭ ʔmr mnʔ hwʔ
48:20	bht mwʔb mṭl dʔttbr ʔyllw wʔzʕqw bʔrnwn mṭwl dʔttbr mwʔb
48:21	wdynʔ ʔtʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ dmšwr wʕl ḥlwn wʕl yhṣ wʕl mpyʕt
48:22	wʕl rybwn wʕl nbw wʕl byt dbltym
48:23	wʕl qwrytym wʕl byt gmwl wʕl byt mʕwn
48:24	wʕl qrywt wʕl bwṣr wʕl klhyn qwryʔ dʔrʕʔ dmwʔb drḥyqn wdqrybn
48:25	ʔtgdmt qrnh dmwʔb wdrʕh ʔttbr ʔmr mryʔ
48:26	dwʔwhy mṭl dʕl mryʔ ʔttrym wntṭrp mwʔb btybth wnhwʔ lgwḥkʔ ʔp hw
48:27	wʔlʔ hwʔ lgwḥkʔ hwʔ lk ʔysryl wbgnbʔ ʔštkḥ kd ʕbd hwyt ʕmh qrbʔ
48:28	šbwqw qwryʔ wšrw bšqypʔ ytby mwʔb whww ʔyk ywnʔ dmqnʔ bgdnpʔ
48:29	šmʕn rwrbnʔ dmwʔb dmtgʔyn ṭb gʔywthwn wrmwthwn wrmwt lbhwn
48:30	ʔnʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʕbdyhwn dlʔ hww kʔnyn wqṣwmwhy lʔ hwʔ hknʔ bdqw ʕlwhy
48:31	mṭl hnʔ ʕl mwʔb ʔyllw wʕl mwʔb klh mn kwl ʔtr qʕw wʕl ʔnšʔ dʕmryn bbyth byštʔ nhwwn rnyn
48:32	mn bktʔ dyʕzyr ʔbkyky gptʔ dsbmʔ šbwqyky ʕbrw ymʔ wʕdmʔ lymʔ dyʕzyr mṭw mṭl dʕl ḥṣdky wʕl qṭpky bzwzʔ npl
48:33	wtʕbr ḥdwtʔ wdyṣʔ mn ʔrʕʔ dkrmlʔ wmn ʔrʕʔ dmwʔb wḥmrʔ mn mʕṣrtʔ nbṭl lʔ nʕṣrwn ʕṣwrʔ wlʔ nʕnwn wlʔ nʔmrwn yhy yhy
48:34	mn ʔylltʔ dḥšbwn ʕdmʔ lʔlʕlʔ wʕdmʔ lyhṣ ʔrymw qlhwn mn ṣʕr wʕdmʔ lḥwrnym wʕdmʔ lkrkʔ dʔls ʕgltʔ twltʔ mṭl dmyʔ dnmrym ngwzwn
48:35	wʔbṭl mn mwʔb ʔmr mryʔ dmsq ʕltʔ wsʔm bsmʔ lʔlhh
48:36	mṭl hnʔ lby ʕl mwʔb ʔyk knrʔ nmll mṭl dbyštʔ ʕbdw wʔbdw
48:37	ršyhwn gyr mspryn wdqnyhwn gryʕyn wʕl klhyn ʔydyhwn mrqdtʔ wʕl ḥṣʔ sqʔ
48:38	wʕl kwl ʔgrʔ dmwʔb wbšwqʔ klhwn mrqdtʔ mṭwl dtbrt lmwʔb ʔyk mʔnʔ dlyt bh ḥšḥw ʔmr mryʔ
48:39	ʔyknʔ ʔttbrw wʔyllw wʔyknʔ ʔpny qdlh mwʔb wbht wnhwʔ mwʔb lgwḥkʔ wltbrʔ lklhwn ʕmmʔ
48:40	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hʔ ʔyk nšrʔ nsq wnṭws wnprws gpwhy ʕl mwʔb
48:41	ʔttḥdt qrywt wmṣrwt ʔtkbšt wnhwʔ lbhwn dgnbry mwʔb bywmʔ hw ʔyk lbʔ dʔnttʔ dmḥblʔ lmʔld
48:42	wnʔbd mwʔb mn ʕmʔ mṭl dʕl mryʔ ʔttrym
48:43	dḥltʔ wgwmṣʔ wpḥʔ ʕlyk ʕmwrʔ dmwʔb ʔmr mryʔ
48:44	wmn dnʕrwq mn qlʔ ddḥltʔ npl bgwmṣʔ wmn dnsq mn gw gwmṣʔ nttḥd bpḥʔ mṭl dmytʔ ʔnʔ hlyn ʕl mwʔb šntʔ dpwqdnhwn ʔmr mryʔ
48:45	mṭl dnwrʔ npqt mn ḥšbwn wšlhbytʔ mn krkʔ dsyḥwn wtʔkwl pʔth dmwʔb wršnʔ dbny šʔwn
48:46	wy lk mwʔb ʔbdt ʕmʔ dkmwš dʔtbdrw bnyk wbntk bšbyʔ
48:47	wʔhpk šbyth dmwʔb bʔḥryt ywmtʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʕdmʔ lhrkʔ dynh dmwʔb
49:01	ʕl bny ʕmwn hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ bnyʔ lyt lʔysryl ʔw yrwtʔ lyt lh mṭl mnʔ yrt mlkwm lgd wʕmh bqwryh ytb
49:02	mṭl hnʔ hʔ ywmtʔ ʔtyn ʔmr mryʔ wʔšmʕ ʕl rbt dbny ʕmwn qlʔ dqrbʔ wthwʔ ltlʔ ḥrbʔ wkprwnyh bnwrʔ nʔqdwn wnʔrt ʔysryl lyrwtwhy ʔmr mryʔ
49:03	tyll ḥšbwn mṭl dʔttbrt ʕy bgnw kprwnyh drbt ʔtkbnw sqʔ ʔrqdw wʔtktšw bḥddʔ mṭl dmlkwm nʔzl bšbytʔ wkwmrwhy wrwrbnwhy ʔkḥdʔ ʔmr mryʔ
49:04	mnʔ mštbḥty bʕwmqyky wtkylty ʕl ʔwlwnyky brtʔ ḥbybtʔ dtkylʔ ʕl gzyh wʔmrʔ mnw nʔtʔ ʕly
49:05	hʔ mytʔ ʔnʔ ʕlyky dḥltʔ mn klhwn ḥdryky ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ wʔbdr ʔnwn gbr lgbh wlyt dmknš lmbdrʔ
49:06	wbtrkn ʔhpk šbytʔ dbny ʕmwn ʔmr mryʔ
49:07	ʕl ʔdwm hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ lyt twb ḥkmtʔ btymn ʔbd mlkʔ mn skwltnʔ ʔštqlt ḥkmthwn
49:08	ʕrqw wʔthpkw wʕmqw lmtb ʕmwrʔ ddrn mṭwl dtbrh dʕsw ʔytyt ʕlwhy zbnʔ dpwqdnh ʔmr mryʔ
49:09	ʔn qṭwpʔ ʔtw ʕlyk lʔ šbqyn hww bwʕrʔ wʔn gnbʔ bllyʔ ḥblw ʔyk dṣbw
49:10	ʔnʔ gyr bṣyt lʕsw wglyt mstrth wʔtṭšy wlʔ ʔštkḥ wʔtbdr zrʕh wʔḥwhy wšbbwhy wlyt ʔnwn
49:11	šbwq ytmyk ʔnʔ ʔḥʔ wʔrmltk ʕly nttkln
49:12	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hʔ dlʔ zdq hwʔ lhwn lmštʔ ksʔ ʔštyw wʔnt sbrt dtzkʔ lʔ tzkʔ ʔlʔ ʔp ʔnt tštʔ ksʔ
49:13	mṭl dby ʔymyt ʔmr mryʔ dltmhʔ wlḥwrbʔ wlḥsdʔ wllwṭtʔ thwʔ bwṣr wklhyn qwryh lḥwrbʔ nhwyn lʕlm
49:14	ṭbʔ šmʕt mn qdm mryʔ wʔyzgdʔ lʕmmʔ ʔštlḥ qwmw nsq ʕlyh lqrbʔ
49:15	mṭl dhʔ zʕwrʔ yhbtk bʕmmʔ wšyṭʔ byt bny ʔnšʔ
49:16	ʕwlk ʔṭʕyk wšwbhrh dlbk dšrʔ bšqypʔ dkʔpʔ wʔḥyd brwmʔ drmtʔ wʔmr blbh mnw nḥtny lʔrʕʔ ʔn byt kwkbʔ tsym qnk wʔn trym ʔyk nšrʔ qnk mn tmn ʔḥtk ʔmr mryʔ
49:17	wthwʔ ʔdwm lḥwrbʔ wkl dnʕbr ʕlyh ntmh wnšrq ʕl klhyn mḥwth
49:18	wtthpk ʔyk dhpk ʔlhʔ lsdwm wlʕmwrʔ ʔmr mryʔ lʔ ntb tmn gbr wlʔ nʕmr tmn br ʔnš
49:19	hʔ ʔyk ʔryʔ nsq mn ʕwšnʔ dywrdnn ldyrʔ dʔtn wbʕgl ʔrdwp ʔnwn mnh wgdwdʔ ʕlyh ʔpqwd mnw gyr ʔkwty ʔw mnw nshdny ʔw ʔynw rʕyʔ dnqwm qdmy
49:20	mṭl hnʔ šmʕw trʕyth dmryʔ dʔtrʕy ʕl ʔdwm wmḥšbth dʔtḥšb ʕl ytby tymn dngrwn ʔnwn bṣyrʔ dʕnʔ wnṣdwn ʕlyhwn dyrhwn
49:21	mn qlʔ dmpwlthwn zʕt ʔrʕʔ ʔyllth mn ymʔ dswp ʔštmʕ qlh
49:22	hʔ ʔyk nšrʔ nsq wnṭws wnprws gpwhy ʕl bwṣr wnhwʔ lbhwn dgnbry ʔdwm bywmʔ hw ʔyk lbʔ dʔnttʔ dmḥblʔ lmʔld
49:23	ʕl drmswq bhtt ḥmt wrpd mṭwl dšmwʕtʔ byštʔ šmʕw wʔttbrw bymʔ dḥlth wnyḥʔ lʔ ʔškḥt
49:24	ʔtrpyt drmswq wʔtpnyt lmʕrq wʔrtytʔ ʔḥdh wʕqtʔ wḥblʔ ʔḥdwh ʔyk dyldtʔ
49:25	ʔyknʔ lʔ ʔštbqt qrytʔ dtšbwḥtʔ qrytʔ dḥdwtʔ
49:26	mṭl hnʔ nplwn gdwdyh bšwqyh wklhwn gbryh qrbtnʔ nšttqwn bywmʔ hw ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ
49:27	ʔšbwq nwrʔ bšwqyh ddrmswq wtʔkwl sḥrth dbrhdd
49:28	ʕl qdr wʕl mlkwtʔ dḥṣwr dqṭl nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ qwmw sqw ʕl qdr wbwzw lbny mdnḥʔ
49:29	mšknyhwn wʕnhwn nsbwn wyryʕthwn wklhwn mʔnyhwn wgmlyhwn ndbrwn lhwn wnqrwn ʕlyhwn mgrynʔ mn ḥdryhwn
49:30	ʕrqw wndw wʕmqw lmtb ytby ḥṣwr ʔmr mryʔ mṭl dʔtmlk ʕlyhwn nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl wʔtḥšb ʕlyhwn mḥšbtʔ wʔmr
49:31	qwmw sqw ʕl ʕmʔ khynʔ dytb bšlyʔ ʔmr mryʔ dlʔ trʕʔ wlʔ swkrʔ lh wblḥwdwhy ytb
49:32	wnhwyn gmlyhwn lbztʔ wswgʔt qnynhwn ldbrtʔ wʔdrʔ ʔnwn lkl rwḥ byt qṣṣy pʔtʔ wmn klhwn ʕbryhwn ʔytʔ tbrhwn ʔmr mryʔ
49:33	wthwʔ ḥṣwr mʕmrʔ lyrwrʔ wḥwrbʔ ʕdmʔ lʕlm lʔ ntb tmn gbr wlʔ nʕmr tmn br ʔnš
49:34	ʕl ʕylm ptgmh dmryʔ dhwʔ ʕl ʔrmyʔ nbyʔ dntnbʔ ʕl ʕylm bryš mlkwth dṣdqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ
49:35	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ hʔ tbr ʔnʔ qšth dʕylm ryš gnbrwthwn
49:36	wʔytʔ ʕl ʕylm ʔrbʕ rwḥʔ mn ʔrbʕ zwyt šmyʔ wʔbdr ʔnwn bklhyn rwḥtʔ hlyn wlʔ nhwʔ ʕmʔ dlʔ nhwwn tmn mbdrʔ dʕylm
49:37	wʔtbr lʕylm qdm bʕldbbyhwn wqdm ʔylyn dbʕyn npšhwn wʔytʔ ʕlyhwn byštʔ ḥmtʔ drwgzy ʔmr mryʔ wʔšdr bhwn ḥrbʔ ʕdmʔ dʔgmr ʔnwn
49:38	wʔrmʔ kwrsy bʕylm wʔwbd mn tmn mlkʔ wšlyṭnʔ ʔmr mryʔ
49:39	wbʔḥryt ywmtʔ ʔhpk šbyth dʕylm ʔmr mryʔ
50:01	ʕl bbl ptgmʔ dʔmr mryʔ ʕl bbl wʕl ʔrʕʔ dkldyʔ bʔydh dʔrmyʔ nbyʔ
50:02	ḥww bʕmmʔ wʔšmʕw wšqwlw ʔtʔ ʔšmʕw wlʔ ttkswn ʔmrw ʔttḥdt bbl npl byl wʔḥpr mrwdk bhtw ptkryh wʔttbrw glypyh
50:03	mṭl dslq ʕlyh ʕmʔ mn grbyʔ hw nʕbd ʔrʕh lḥwrbʔ wlʔ nhwʔ bh dytb mn bny ʔnšʔ wʕdmʔ lbʕyrʔ ndw wʔzlw
50:04	bywmtʔ hnwn wbzbnʔ hw ʔmr mryʔ nʔtwn bny ʔysryl hnwn wbny yhwdʔ ʔkḥdʔ mhlkyn wbkyn wlmryʔ ʔlhhwn bʕyn
50:05	ʕl ʔwrḥth dṣhywn nšʔlwn bʔpyhwn tw ntlwʔ lmryʔ qymʔ dlʕlm dlʔ mtṭʕʔ
50:06	ʔyk ʕnʔ ʔbydtʔ hwʔ ʕmy rʕwthwn ʔṭʕyw ʔnwn wʕl ṭwrʔ bdrw ʔnwn mn ṭwrʔ lrmtʔ ʔzlw wṭʕw mrbʕhwn
50:07	kl mn dʔškḥ ʔnwn ʔkl ʔnwn wbʕldbbyhwn ʔmryn lʔ nšbwq ʔnwn ʕl dḥṭw lmryʔ wldyrh zdyqtʔ wsbrʔ dʔbhyhwn mryʔ hw
50:08	ʕrwqw mn gw bbl wmn ʔrʕʔ dkldyʔ pwqw whww ʔyk tyšʔ qdm ʕnʔ
50:09	mṭl dhʔ mdyl ʔnʔ wmsq ʔnʔ ʕl bbl knšʔ dʕmmʔ sgyʔʔ mn ʔrʕʔ dgrbyʔ wnstdrwn ʕlyh wmn tmn ttḥd gʔryhwn ʔyk gbrʔ dmṣlḥ wlʔ hpk sryqʔyt
50:10	wthwʔ ʔrʕʔ dkldyʔ lbztʔ wklhwn bzwzyh nsbʕwn ʔmr mryʔ
50:11	mṭl dtḥdwn wmṭl dtdwṣwn ryš yrtwty wtdwṣwn ʔyk ʕglʔ dpṭmʔ wtrqdwn ʔyk dkrʔ dʕnʔ
50:12	bhtt ʔmkwn ṭb wʔḥprt yldtkwn hʔ ḥrtʔ dʕmmʔ ʔyk mdbrʔ ḥrbʔ wṣdyʔ
50:13	mn rwgzh dmryʔ lʔ ttb wthwʔ ṣdyʔ klh wkl dnʕbr ʕl bbl ntmh wnšrq ʕl klhyn mḥwth
50:14	ʔstdrw ʕl bbl kl ʔylyn dydʕyn lmšdʔ bqštʔ šdw ʕlyh lʔ tḥwswn ʕl gʔrʔ mṭl dlmryʔ ḥṭt
50:15	ybbw ʕlyh mn ḥdryh yhbt ʔydh npl štʔsyh ʔstḥpw šwryh mṭl dpwrʕnh hw dmryʔ ʔtnqmw bh ʔyk dʕbdt ʕbdw bh
50:16	wʔwbdw zrwʕʔ mn bbl wʔḥd mglʔ bzbnʔ dḥṣdʔ mṭl ḥrbʔ dmdwyʔ ʔnš lʕmh ntpnwn wgbr lʔrʕh nʕrqwn
50:17	nqyʔ ṭʕytʔ ʔysryl {rywtʔ}<ʔrywtʔ> ʔṭʕyw ʔnwn qdmyʔ ʔklh mlkʔ dʔtwr whnʔ ʔḥryʔ ʕšn mnh nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl
50:18	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl hʔ pqd ʔnʔ ʕl mlkʔ dbbl wʕl ʔrʕh ʔyk dpqdt ʕl mlkʔ dʔtwr
50:19	wʔhpk lʔysryl ldyrhwn wnrʕwn bkrmlʔ wbmtnyn wbṭwrʔ dʔprym wbglʕd wtsbʕ npšhwn
50:20	bywmtʔ hnwn wbzbnʔ hw ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ntbʕʔ ʕwlh dʔysryl wlytwhy wḥṭyth dyhwdʔ wlʔ tštkḥ mṭl dʔšbwq lšrkʔ dʔštḥrw mnhwn
50:21	sqw ʕl ʔrʕʔ mmrmrnytʔ sqw ʕlyh wʕl ʕmwryh ʔttʕyry ḥrbʔ wḥrwb ʔnwn ʔmr mryʔ wʕbdy ʔyk dpqdtky
50:22	qlʔ dqrʔ bʔrʕʔ wtbrʔ rbʔ
50:23	ʔyknʔ ʔttbrt wʔštqlt tqyptʔ dklh ʔrʕʔ ʔyknʔ hwt ltmhʔ bbl bʕmmʔ
50:24	ʔttqlt bbl ʔp ʔttḥdt wlʔ ydʕt dlwqbl mryʔ qmt
50:25	ptḥ mryʔ ʔwṣrh wʔpq mʔnʔ drwgzh mṭl dʕbdʔ hw lmryʔ ʔlhʔ ḥyltnʔ bʔrʕʔ dkldyʔ
50:26	tw ʕlyh mn ḥdryh ptḥw trʕyh bṣʔwh ʔyk ʕrṭlytʔ wḥwrbwh wlʔ tšbqwn lh ḥrtʔ
50:27	ḥwrbwh wkwlhwn pʔryh nštlmw lqṭlʔ wy ʕlyhwn dmṭy ywmhwn zbnʔ dpwqdnhwn
50:28	qlʔ dʕrqyn wdmtplṭyn mn ʔrʕʔ dbbl lmḥwyw bṣhywn nqmth dmryʔ ʔlhn wnqmtʔ dhyklh
50:29	ʔšmʕw ʕl bbl sgyʔʔ kl dydʕyn lmšdʔ bqštʔ šdw ʕlyh mn ḥdryh wlʔ tšbqwn lh ḥrtʔ pwrʕwh ʔyk ʔgrh kl dʕbdt ʕbdw lh mṭl dʕl mryʔ ʔmrḥt ʕl qdyšʔ dʔysryl
50:30	mṭl hnʔ nplwn gdwdyh bgwh wklhwn gbryh qrbtnʔ nšttqwn bywmʔ hw
50:31	hʔ ʔnʔ ʕlyk mrḥʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ ḥyltnʔ mṭl dmṭʔ ywmk zbnʔ dpwqdnk
50:32	wnstḥp mrḥʔ wnpl wlyt mn dmqym lh wʔšbwq nwrʔ bqwryh wtʔkwl klhwn ḥdrwhy
50:33	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ṣbʔwt ṭlymyn bny ʔysryl wbny yhwdʔ ʔkḥdʔ wkl dšbw ʔnwn ḥmsnw bhwn wlʔ ṣbyn lmšdrw ʔnwn
50:34	prwqhwn tqyp hw mryʔ ḥyltnʔ šmh mdn ndwn dynhwn wnšlʔ lʔrʕʔ wnrgz lklhwn ʕmwryh dtbyl
50:35	ḥrbʔ ʕl kldyʔ ʔmr mryʔ wʕl klhwn ʕmwryh dbbl wʕl rwrbnyh wʕl ḥkymyh
50:36	ḥrbʔ ʕl qṣwmyh wntṭrpwn ḥrbʔ ʕl gnbryh wnttbrwn
50:37	ḥrbʔ ʕl rkšh wʕl mrkbth wʕl klhwn twtbʔ dbgwh wnhwwn ʔyk nšʔ ḥrbʔ ʕl gzyh wntbzwn
50:38	ḥrbʔ ʕl myh wnʔbšwn mṭl dʔrʕʔ hy dglpy ṣlmʔ wbptkrʔ mštbhryn
50:39	mṭwl hnʔ nʕmrn bh syrns ntbn bh bnt nʕmʔ lʔ ttb lʕlm wlʔ tšrʔ ldrdryn
50:40	wthwʔ ʔyk sdwm wʔyk ʕmwrʔ dhpk ʔnyn ʔlhʔ wlʕmwryhyn lʔ ntb tmn gbr wlʔ nʕmr tmn brnš
50:41	hʔ ʕmʔ ʔtʔ mn grbyʔ ʕmʔ rbʔ wmlkʔ sgyʔʔ ndwlwn mn swpyh dʔrʕʔ
50:42	bqšttʔ wbnyzkʔ mzynyn byšyn ʔnwn wlʔ mrḥmnyn qlhwn ʔyk ymʔ dmtktš wʕl rkšʔ rkybyn wmṭybyn ʔyk nwrʔ lqrbʔ ʕlyky brt bbl
50:43	šmʕ mlkʔ dbbl šmʕhwn wʔtršl ʔydwhy wʕqtʔ ʔḥdth wḥblʔ ʔyk dyldtʔ
50:44	hʔ ʔyk ʔryʔ nsq mn ʕwšnʔ dywrdnn ldyrʔ dʔtn mṭl dbʕgl ʔrdwp ʔnwn mnh wgdwdʔ ʔpqwd ʕlyh mnw gyr ʔkwty ʔw mnw dntṭrʔ by ʔw ʔynw rʕyʔ dnqwm lwqbly
50:45	mṭl hnʔ šmʕw trʕyth dmryʔ dʔtrʕy ʕl bbl wmḥšbth dʔtḥšb ʕl ʔrʕʔ dkldyʔ dngrwn ʔnwn bṣyrʔ dʕnʔ wnṣdwn ʕlyhwn dyrhwn
50:46	mn qlʔ dʔttḥdt bbl zʕt ʔrʕʔ wyllth bʕmmʔ ʔštmʕt
51:01	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ ḥyltnʔ hʔ mdyl ʔnʔ ʕl bbl wʕl ʕmwryh lbʔ qšyʔ wrwḥʔ mḥblnʔ
51:02	wʔšdr ʕl bbl bzwzʔ wnbzwnh wndwšwn ʔrʕh wntknšwn ʕlyh mn ḥdryh bywmʔ dbyštʔ
51:03	lʔ nšlʔ mn dšdʔ bqštʔ wlʔ nšlḥ šrynh qrbtnʔ wlʔ tḥwswn ʕl gdwdyh ḥrwbw klh ḥylh
51:04	wnplwn qṭylʔ bʔrʕʔ dkldyʔ wdmmḥyn bšwqyh
51:05	mṭl dlʔ ʔrml ʔysryl wyhwdʔ mn ʔlhhwn mn mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhhwn mṭl dʔrʕhwn ʔtmlyt ʕwlʔ qdm qdyšʔ dʔysrʔyl
51:06	ʕrwqw mn gw bbl wpṣw gbr npšh lʔ tblʕwn bḥṭhyh mṭl dzbnʔ hw dpwrʕnh mn mryʔ ʔyk ʕbdyh hw prʕ lh
51:07	ksʔ ddhbʔ bbl bʔydh dmryʔ dmrwʔ lklh ʔrʕʔ mn ḥmrh ʔštyw klhwn ʕmmʔ wʔtṭrpw
51:08	mn šlyʔ nplt bbl wʔttbzzt ʔyllw ʕlyh sbw smmnʔ lkʔbyh ṭk ttʔsʔ
51:09	ʔsynh lbbl wlʔ ʔtʔsyt nšbqyh wnʔzl gbr lʔrʕh mṭl dqrb ʕdmʔ lšmyʔ dynh wʔttrym ʕdmʔ lʕnnʔ
51:10	ʔpq mryʔ zkwtn tw nštʕʔ bṣhywn ʕbdwhy dmryʔ ʔlhn
51:11	knšw šlṭʔ mlw gʔrʔ ʔdyl mryʔ rwḥʔ dmlkʔ dmdy mṭl dʕl bbl trʕyth lmḥblwth mṭl dpwrʕnh hw dmryʔ wtbʕtʔ dhyklh
51:12	ʕl šwrʔ dbbl šqwlw ʔtʔ ʔqymw mṭrtʔ wṭbʕwh bmyʔ mṭl dʕbd mryʔ mdm dʔtrʕy bbbl
51:13	dšryʔ hwt bmyʔ sgyʔʔ sgyʔyn gzyky mṭʔ qṣky wʕšnt mḥwtky
51:14	ʔymʔ mryʔ ḥyltnʔ bnpšh dʔmlyky ʔnšʔ ʔyk qmṣʔ wnʕnwn ʕlyky wnʔmrwn hwy hwy
51:15	mryʔ ʕbd ʔrʕʔ bḥylh wʔtqn tbyl bḥkmth wbswklh mtḥ šmyʔ
51:16	yhb qlʔ drgwšyʔ dmyʔ bšmyʔ msq ʕnnʔ mn swpyh dʔrʕʔ wbrqʔ lmṭrʔ ʕbd mpq rwḥʔ mn ʔwṣrwhy
51:17	šṭʔ kl brnš mn ydʕtʔ bhtw kl qynyʔ mn glypʔ dʕbdw mṭl ddglwtʔ nskw wlyt bhwn rwḥʔ
51:18	lʔ mdm ʔnwn wʕbdʔ ʔnwn šṭyʔ bzbnʔ dmtpqdyn nʔbdwn
51:19	lʔ ʔyk dhlyn mnth dyʕqwb ʔlʔ mn dbrʔ kl hwyw mnthwn wšbṭʔ dyrtwthwn mryʔ ḥyltnʔ šmh
51:20	ṭybw ly mʔnʔ dqrbʔ ʔbdr bky ʕmmʔ wʔḥbl bky mlkwtʔ
51:21	wʔbdr bky rkšʔ wrkbyhwn wʔbdr bky mrkbtʔ wrkbyhyn
51:22	wʔbdr bky gbrʔ wnšʔ wʔbdr bky sbʔ wʕlymʔ wʔbdr bky gdwdʔ wbtwltʔ
51:23	wʔbdr bky rʕyʔ wgzrh wʔbdr bky ʔkrʔ wpdnh wʔbdr bky ṭrwnʔ wšlyṭnʔ
51:24	wʔprwʕ lbbl wlklhwn ʕmwrʔ dkldyʔ klh byštʔ dʕbdw bṣhywn lʕnykwn ʔmr mryʔ
51:25	hʔ ʔnʔ ʕlyk ṭwrʔ mḥblnʔ ʔmr mryʔ dḥbl lklh ʔrʕʔ wʔrym ʔydy ʕlyk wʔqlk mn kʔpʔ wʔʕbdk lṭwrʔ yqydʔ
51:26	wlʔ nsbwn mnk kʔpʔ lzwytʔ wkʔpʔ lštʔstʔ ʔlʔ lḥwrbʔ lʕlm thwʔ ʔmr mryʔ
51:27	šqwlw ʔtʔ bʔrʕʔ qrw šypwrʔ bʕmmʔ ṭybw ʕlyh ʕmmʔ ʔšmʕw ʕlyh mlkwtʔ dʔrdṭ wdʔrmny wdʔšknz pqwdw ʕlyh ʔbdnʔ ʔsqw rkšʔ ʔyk zḥlʔ ṭybw
51:28	ʕlyh ʕmmʔ lmlkʔ dmdy wlḥʔrwhy wlklhwn šlyṭnwhy
51:29	wtzwʕ ʔrʕʔ wttwr mṭl dqmt ʕl bbl mḥšbth dmryʔ lmḥrbw ʔrʕʔ dbbl mn bly dytb
51:30	spw gbrʔ dbbl lmtktšw ʕm ytby mṣrwt ʔttbrt gnbrwthwn whww ʔyk nšʔ ʕqwrw mšknyh tbrw trʕyh
51:31	drhṭ lwqbl drhṭ nrhṭ wdmḥwʔ lwqbl dmḥwʔ lmḥwyw lmlkʔ dbbl dʔttḥdt mdynth mn ḥdryh
51:32	wmʕbrth ʔttḥd wʔgmyh ʔyqdw bnwrʔ wklhwn gbryh qrbtnʔ ʔtdlḥw
51:33	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl brt bbl ʔyk ʔdrʔ dmṭʔ zbn drkth ʕd qlyl wmṭʔ qṭph
51:34	ʔmrt ʔwršlm ʔklny wbzny nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl ʔqymny ʔyk mʔnʔ sryqʔ blʕny ʔyk tnynʔ mlʔ krsh mn ʕwdny wʔṭʕyny
51:35	bzty wqnyny lbbl ʔštby wdmy ʕl ʕmwrʔ dkldyʔ tʔmr ʔwršlm
51:36	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hʔ dʔn ʔnʔ dynky wmtnqm ʔnʔ nqmtky wʔḥrb ymʔ dbbl wʔwbš mbwʕwhy
51:37	wthwʔ bbl ḥrbtʔ mʕmrʔ lyrwrʔ wltmhʔ wlmšrwqytʔ mn bly dytb bh
51:38	ʔyk ʔrywtʔ nnhmwn wnʕrwn ʔyk {gdyʔ}<gwryʔ> dʔrywtʔ
51:39	bḥmtʔ ʔʕbd mštyhwn wʔrwʔ ʔnwn wnttbrwn wndmkwn šntʔ lʕlm wlʔ nttʕyrwn ʔmr mryʔ
51:40	wʔšlm ʔnwn ʔyk mpṭmʔ lqṭlʔ wʔyk dkrʔ wgdyʔ lnkstʔ
51:41	ʔyknʔ ʔttḥdt ʔrškytʔ tšbwḥtʔ dkwlh ʔrʕʔ ʔyknʔ hwt ltmhʔ bbl bʕmmʔ
51:42	slq ʕl bbl ymʔ wbswgʔʔ dgllwhy ʔtksyt
51:43	hwy qwryh ltmhʔ ʔyk ʔrʕʔ ḥrbtʔ wṣdytʔ lʔ ntb bhyn gbr wlʔ nʕmr bhyn brnš
51:44	wʔpqwd ʕl byl bbbl wʔpq zwtrwhy mn pwmh wlʔ ndḥlwn lh twb ʕmmʔ wʔp šwryh dbbl ʔrwyḥʔ nplwn
51:45	pwqw mn gwh ʕmy wplṭw gbr npšh mn ḥmtʔ drwgzh dmryʔ
51:46	dlmʔ nttbr lbkwn wtdḥlwn mn ṭbʔ dmštmʕ bʔrʕʔ wnʔtʔ bh bšntʔ hy ṭbʔ wbtrh dšntʔ ṭbʔ ʔḥrnʔ wnhwʔ ḥṭwpyʔ bʔrʕʔ nqwm šlyṭʔ ʕl šlyṭʔ
51:47	mṭl hnʔ hʔ ywmtʔ ʔtyn ʔmr mryʔ wʔpqwd ʕl glypyh dbbl wklh ʔrʕʔ tʔbd wklhwn qṭylyh nplwn bgwh
51:48	wnḥdwn ʕl bbl šmyʔ wʔrʕʔ wkl dbhwn mṭl dmn grbyʔ nʔtwn ʕlyh bzwzʔ ʔmr mryʔ
51:49	wʔp bbbl nplwn qṭylʔ dʔysryl wʔp mn bbl nplwn qṭylʔ bklh ʔrʕʔ
51:50	ʔylyn dʔtplṭw mn ḥrbʔ zlw wlʔ tqwmwn ʔtdkrw mn rwḥqʔ lmryʔ wʔwršlm tsq ʕl lbkwn wnʔmrwn dbyt ʔysryl
51:51	bhtn ṭb mṭl dšmʕn ḥsdʔ wksyt bhttʔ lʔpyn mṭl dʕlw nwkryʔ lmqdšh dmryʔ
51:52	mṭl hnʔ hʔ ywmtʔ ʔtyn ʔmr mryʔ wʔpqwd ʕl bbl wʕl glypyh wbkwlh ʔrʕʔ nplwn qṭylyh
51:53	ʔn tsq bbl lšmyʔ wʔn tsym brwmʔ ʕwšnh mn qdmy nʔtwn ʕlyh bzwzʔ ʔmr mryʔ
51:54	qlʔ dylltʔ mn bbl wtbrʔ rbʔ mn ʔrʕʔ dkldyʔ
51:55	mṭl dbz mryʔ lbbl wʔwbd mnh bny ʔnšʔ wbʕyrʔ qlʔ rbʔ ʔyk myʔ sgyʔʔ dʔzl qlhwn
51:56	mṭl dʔtw ʕl bbl bzwzʔ wʔttḥdw gnbryh wʔttbr qštthwn mṭl dʔlhʔ prwʕʔ mryʔ mprʕ nprwʕ ʔnwn
51:57	wʔrwʔ rwrbnyh wḥkymyh wḥʔryh wšlyṭnyh wgnbryh wndmkwn šntʔ lʕlm wlʔ nttʕyrwn ʔmr mlkʔ mryʔ ḥyltnʔ šmh
51:58	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ šwryh dbbl ʔrwyḥʔ mtʕqrw ntʕqrwn wtrʕyh rmʔ bnwrʔ nʔqdwn wnlʔwn ʕmmʔ sryqʔyt wʔmwtʔ bnwrʔ ntṭrpn
51:59	ptgmʔ dpqd ʔrmyʔ nbyʔ lšryʔ br nryʔ br mʕsyʔ kd ʔzl ʕm ṣdqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ lbbl bšnt ḥdʕsrʔ dmlkwth wšryʔ rb mšrytʔ hwʔ
51:60	wktb ʔrmyʔ klh byštʔ dʔtyʔ ʕl bbl bsprʔ ḥd klhwn ptgmʔ hlyn dktybyn ʕl bbl
51:61	wʔmr ʔrmyʔ lšryʔ mʔ dʕlt lgw bbl qry wḥzy kwlhwn ptgmʔ hlyn
51:62	wʔmr mryʔ ʔnt ʔmrt ʕl ʔtrʔ hnʔ lmwbdwth dlʔ nhwʔ bh dytb mn bny ʔnšʔ wʕdmʔ lbʕyrʔ mṭl dlḥwrbʔ lʕlm nhwʔ
51:63	wmʔ dšlmt lmqrʔ bsprʔ hnʔ qṭwr bh kʔpʔ wšdywhy bprt
51:64	wʔmr hknʔ tpl bbl wlʔ tqwm mn qdm byštʔ dmytʔ ʔnʔ ʕlyhwn wntṭrpwn
52:01	ʕdmʔ lhrkʔ ptgmwhy dʔrmyʔ br ʕsryn wḥdʔ šnyn ṣdqyʔ kd ʔmlk wḥdʕsrʔ šnyn ʔmlk bʔwršlm wšmʔ dʔmh ḥmṭwl brt ʔrmyʔ mn lbnʔ
52:02	wʕbd dbyš qdm mryʔ ʔyk dʕbd ywyqym
52:03	mṭl hlyn hwʔ rwgzh dmryʔ ʕl ʔwršlm wʕl yhwdʔ ʕdmʔ dšdʔ ʔnwn mn qdm ʔpwhy wmrd ṣdqyʔ mlkʔ ʕl nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl
52:04	wbšntʔ dtšʕ lmlkwth byrḥʔ dʕsrʔ bh byrḥʔ hnʔ ʔtʔ nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl hw wklh ḥylh ʕl ʔwršlm wšrw ʕlyh wbnw ʕlyh qlqwmʔ kd ḥdrʔ
52:05	wʕlt qrytʔ bʔwlṣnʔ ʕdmʔ lšnt ḥdʕsrʔ lmlkʔ ṣdqyʔ
52:06	wbyrḥʔ dšbʕʔ btšʕtʔ bh byrḥʔ ʕšn kpnʔ bqrytʔ wlyt hwʔ lḥmʔ lʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ
52:07	wʔttrʕt qrytʔ wklhwn gbrʔ qrbtnʔ ʕrqw wnpqw mn qrytʔ bllyʔ bʔwrḥʔ dtrʕʔ dbyt šwrʔ dʕl gnb gntʔ dmlkʔ wkldyʔ krykyn ʕl qrytʔ wʔzlw bʔwrḥʔ dpqʕtʔ
52:08	wrdpw ḥylʔ dkldyʔ btr mlkʔ wʔdrkwhy lṣdqyʔ bpqʕtʔ dʔryḥw wklh ḥylh ʔtbdr mnh
52:09	wʔḥdwhy lmlkʔ wʔsqwhy lwt mlkʔ dbbl ldblt bʔrʕʔ dḥmt wmll ʕmh dynʔ
52:10	wnks mlkʔ dbbl lbnwhy dṣdqyʔ lʕynwhy wlklhwn ḥʔrʔ dyhwdʔ ḥrb bdblt
52:11	wʕynwhy dṣdqyʔ ʕwr wʔsrh bššltʔ wʔwblh mlkʔ dbbl lbbl wʔšlmh byt nṭwrtʔ ʕdmʔ lywmʔ dmyt
52:12	wbyrḥʔ dḥmšʔ bʕsrtʔ bh byrḥʔ hy hy šnt tšʕsrʔ lnbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl ʔtʔ nbwzrdn rb dḥšʔ wqm qdm mlkʔ dbbl bʔwršlm
52:13	wʔwqd lbyth dmryʔ wlbyt mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wlkwlhwn btʔ dʔwršlm wlklhwn btʔ drwrbnʔ ʔwqdw bnwrʔ
52:14	wlklhwn šwryh dʔwršlm kd ḥdrʔ ʕqrw klh ḥylʔ dkldyʔ dʕm rb dḥšʔ
52:15	wmn msknʔ dʕmʔ wšrkʔ dʕmʔ dʔštḥrw bqrytʔ whnwn dʕrqw lwt mlkʔ dbbl wšrkʔ dʕmʔ šbʔ nbwzrdn
52:16	wmn msknʔ dʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ šbq nbwzrdn rb dḥšʔ lkrmʔ wlpwlḥnʔ wʕmwdʔ dnḥšʔ wʔgnʔ wymʔ dnḥšʔ dbbyth dmryʔ tbrw kldyʔ wšqlw klh nḥšhwn wʔwblwhy lbbl
52:18	wqdsʔ wʔyrʔ wqrdlʔ wšḥlʔ wkpʔ wklhwn mʔnʔ dnḥšʔ dmšmšyn bhwn nsbw
52:19	wqṭrwqʔ wpyrmʔ wmšlwtʔ wqdsʔ wmzmkʔ wmnrtʔ wkpʔ wmnqytʔ ddhbʔ wdsʔmʔ wnsb rb dḥšʔ
52:20	ʕmwdʔ tryn dnḥšʔ wymʔ ḥd wtwrʔ trʕsr dnḥšʔ dtḥyt gswhy dymʔ dʕbd mlkʔ šlymwn lbyth dmryʔ wlyt hwʔ mtqlʔ lnḥšhwn dmʔnʔ hlyn
52:21	wʕmwdʔ hnwn tryn tmnʕsrʔ ʔmyn rwmh dʕmwdʔ ḥd mnhwn wḥwṭʔ dtrtʕsrʔ ʔmyn krk lh kd ḥdr wʕbyh ʔrbʕ ṣbʕyn wḥlyl gwh
52:22	wʔgnʔ ʕlwhy dnḥšʔ wrwmh dʔgnʔ ḥdʔ ḥmš ʔmyn wmṣydtʔ wrwmnʔ ʕl ʔgnʔ kd ḥdrʔ wklh dnḥšʔ wʔyk hlyn lʕmwdʔ ʔḥrnʔ wrwmnʔ
52:23	whww rwmnʔ tšʕyn wštʔ klhwn rwmnʔ mʔʔ ʕl mṣydtʔ kd ḥdrʔ
52:24	wdbr rb dḥšʔ lšryʔ khnʔ rbʔ wlṣpnyʔ khnʔ dbtrh wltltʔ nṭry trʕʔ
52:25	wmn qrytʔ dbr mhymnʔ ḥd dhw mšlṭ hwʔ ʕl gbrʔ qrbtnʔ wšbʕʔ gbryn ydyʕʔ dmtḥzyn hww qdm mlkʔ dʔštḥrw bqrytʔ wsprʔ wrb ḥylʔ dʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ wštyn gbryn mn ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ dʔštkḥw bgw qrytʔ
52:26	wdbr ʔnwn nbwzrdn rb dḥšʔ wʔwbl ʔnwn lwt mlkʔ dbbl ldblt bʔrʕʔ dḥmt
52:27	wmḥʔ ʔnwn mlkʔ dbbl wqṭl ʔnwn bdblt bʔrʕʔ dḥmt wʔštby yhwdʔ mn ʔrʕh
52:28	hnw ʕmʔ dšbʔ {nbwzrdn}<nbwkdnṣr> mlkʔ dbbl bšnt šbʕ dmlkwth yhwdyʔ tltʔ ʔlpyn wʕsryn wtltʔ
52:29	wbšnt tmnʕsrʔ dmlkwth dnbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl šbʔ mn ʔwršlm npštʔ tmnmʔʔ wtltyn wtrtyn
52:30	wbšnt ʕsryn wtlt dnbwkdnṣr šbʔ nbwzrdn rb dḥšʔ yhwdyʔ npštʔ šbʕmʔʔ wʔrbʕyn wḥmš klhyn npštʔ ʔrbʕʔ ʔlpyn wštmʔʔ
52:31	bšnt tltyn wšbʕ dšbyth dywykyn mlkʔ dyhwdʔ byrḥʔ dtrʕsr bḥmšʔ wʕsryn bh byrḥʔ ʔrym ʔwl mrwdk mlkʔ dbbl bšntʔ dmlkwth bryšh dywykyn mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wʔpqh mn byt ʔsyrʔ
52:32	wmll ʕmh špyrtʔ wʔrmy kwrsyh lʕl mn kwrswtʔ dmlkʔ dʔyt ʕmh bbbl
52:33	wḥlp lbwšʔ dʔswrh wʔkl lḥmʔ ʔmynʔyt qdmwhy kwl ywmy ḥywhy
52:34	wšqlh npq hwʔ mn qdm mlkʔ dbbl kl ywm ʔmynʔyt ʕdmʔ lywmʔ dmyt klhwn ywmy ḥywhy
01:01	whwʔ bšnt tltyn bḥmštʔ byrḥʔ rbyʕyʔ wʔnʔ bgw šbytʔ hwyt ʕl nhr`kbr wʔtptḥw šmyʔ wḥzyt ḥzwʔ dʔlhʔ
01:02	bḥmštʔ byrḥʔ bšnt ḥmš dšbyth dywykyn mlkʔ dyhwdʔ
01:03	hwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕl ḥzqyʔyl br bwzy khnʔ bʔrʕʔ dkldyʔ ʕl nhr`kbr whwt ʕly tmn ʔydh dmryʔ
01:04	wḥzyt whʔ rwḥʔ dʕlʕlʔ ʔtyʔ mn grbyʔ ʕnnʔ rbtʔ wnwrʔ dmtgwzlʔ wmzhrʔ ḥdryh wmn gwh ʔyk ḥzwʔ mn gw nwrʔ

01:17	ʕl ʔrbʕʔ gbyhyn ʔzln hwy wlʔ mthpkn hwy wlʔtrʔ dpnyʔ hwt ršythyn lmʔzl btrh ʔzln hwy wlʔ mthpkn hwy

01:19	wkd ʔzln hwy ḥywtʔ ʔzln hwy gyglʔ ʕmhyn wmʔ dšqln hwy ḥywtʔ mn ʔrʕʔ šqln hwy gyglʔ ʕmhyn
01:20	wlʔtr dʔzlʔ hwt rwḥʔ ʔzln hwy wgyglʔ šqln hwy ʕmhyn mṭl drwḥʔ ḥytʔ ʔyt hwʔ bgyglʔ
01:21	wmʔ dʔzln hwy ʔzln hwy wmʔ dqymn hwy qymn hwy wmʔ dšqln hwy mn ʔrʕʔ šqln hwy gyglʔ ʕmhyn mṭl drwḥʔ ʔyt hwt bgyglʔ
01:22	wmtyḥ lʕl mn ryšʔ dḥywtʔ ʔyk \dmwtʔ dḥzwʔ /ḥzwʔ#3#/ dqrwsṭlws dḥylʔ

05:05	hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ hdʔ ʔwršlm bynt/byt#3#/ ʕmmʔ smth wklhyn mdyntʔ ḥdyrn lh

05:07	mṭl hlyn hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ ʕl dʔtḥšbtwn mn ʕmmʔ dḥdyryn lkwn wbpwqdny lʔ hlktwn wdyny lʔ ʕbdtwn wʕbdtwn dynʔ dʕmmʔ dḥdyryn lkwn
05:08	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ hʔ ʔnʔ ʕlyky wʔʕbd bgwky dynʔ lʕyn klhwn ʕmmʔ
05:09	wʔʕbd bky mdm dlʔ ʕbdt wmdm dlʔ ʔʕbd/ʔtʕbd#3#/ twb ʔkwth mṭl klh ṭnpwtky

05:11	mṭl hnʔ ḥy ʔnʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ ʕl dṭnpty mqdšy bkl ṭnpwtky wbklh ṭmʔwtky ʔp ʔnʔ ʔdḥqky wlʔ tḥws ʕyny ʕlyky wlʔ ʔrḥm
05:12	ḥdʔ mntky wmwtʔ nmwtwn wbkpnʔ nswpwn bgwky wʔḥrtʔ bḥrbʔ nplwn ḥdryky wdtlt lkl rwḥ ʔdrʔ wsypʔ nḥrwb btrhwn
05:13	wʔšmlʔ rwgzy wʔnyḥ ḥmty bhwn wʔtbyʔ wndʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ dmllt bṭnny mʔ dšmlyt bhwn rwgzy
05:14	wʔtlky lḥrbʔ wlḥsdʔ bʕmmʔ dḥdyryn lky qdm kl dʕbr
05:15	wthwyn lḥsdʔ wlgwdpʔ wlmrdwtʔ wltmhʔ bʕmmʔ/lʕmmʔ#3#/ dḥdyryn lky mʔ dʕbdt bky dynʔ brwgzʔ wbḥmtʔ wbmksnwtʔ <drwgzʔ#3#> ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔmrt
05:16	mʔ dšdrt ʕlykwn gʔry byšʔ dkpnʔ dhww lḥblʔ dʔšdr ʔnwn lmḥblwtkwn wkpnʔ ʔwsp ʕlykwn wʔtbr qnyʔ dʕbwrkwn
05:17	wʔšdr ʕlykwn kpnʔ wḥywtʔ byštʔ wʔwbdkwn wmwtnʔ wdmʔ nʕbr bkwn wḥrbʔ ʔytʔ ʕlykwn ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔmrt
06:01	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
06:02	brnšʔ sym ʔpyk lṭwrʔ dʔysryl wʔtnbʔ ʕlyhwn
06:03	wʔmr ṭwrʔ dʔysryl šmʕw ptgmh dmrʔ mrwtʔ hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ lṭwrʔ wlrmtʔ wlnḥlʔ wlpṣydʔ hʔ <ʔnʔ#3#> mytʔ ʔnʔ ʕlykwn ḥrbʔ wʔwbd prkykwn
06:04	wnṣdwn mdbḥykwn wnttbrwn ptkrykwn wʔrmʔ ḥrybykwn qdm dḥltkwn
06:05	wʔmrʔ šldʔ dbyt/dbny#3#/ ʔysryl qdm ptkryhwn wʔdrʔ grmykwn ḥdr mdbḥykwn
06:06	wmdyntʔ dklh ytbkwn nḥrbn wprkʔ nṣdyn mṭl dnḥrbwn wnṣdwn mdbḥykwn wnttbrwn wntbṭlwn ptkrykwn wntgdmwn glypykwn wntʕṭwn/wntṭʕwn#3#/ ʕbdykwn
06:07	wnplwn ḥrybʔ byntkwn wtdʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ

06:12	drḥyq nmwt bmwtnʔ wdqryb bḥrbʔ npl wdmštḥr wdmtpṣʔ bkpnʔ nmwt wʔšmlʔ rwgzy bhwn

06:14	wʔrym ʔydy ʕlyhwn wʔʕbdyh lʔrʕʔ lḥblʔ wltmhʔ mn mdbrʔ ddblt wklh byt mʕmrhwn wndʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
07:01	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr

07:03	mkyl qṣʔ ʕlyky wʔšwd/wʔšdr#3#/ ʕlyky rwgzy wʔdwnky ʔyk ʔwrḥtky wʔytʔ ʕlyky klh ṭnpwtky
07:04	wlʔ tḥws ʕyny ʕlyky wlʔ ʔrḥm mṭl dʔwrḥtky ʕlyky ʔtl wṭnpwtky bgwky nhwyn wtdʕyn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ

08:01	whwʔ bšntʔ štytytʔ bḥmštʔ byrḥʔ štytyʔ ʔnʔ ytb hwyt bbyty wsbʔ dyhwdʔ ytbyn hww qdmy wnplt ʕly tmn ʔydh dmrʔ mrwtʔ
08:02	wḥzyt whʔ dmwtʔ ʔyk ḥzwʔ dnwrʔ mn ḥzwʔ dḥṣwhy wltḥt nwrʔ wmn ḥṣwhy wlʕl ḥzyt ʔyk ḥzwʔ dzhrʔ wʔyk ḥzwʔ dʔlhʔ

09:01	wqrʔ bʔdny bqlʔ rmʔ wʔmr qrwbw prwʕyh dmdyntʔ wʔnš \mʔnʔ dpwrʕnh /mʔny pwrʕnh#3#/ bʔydh

11:01	wšqltny rwḥʔ wʔytytny ltrʕʔ mdnḥyʔ dbyth dmryʔ dḥʔr lmdnḥʔ wḥzyt bmʕlnʔ dtrʕʔ ʕsryn wḥmšʔ gbryn <qymyn#3#> wḥzyt bynthwn lyʕznyʔ br ʕzwr wlplṭyʔ br bnyʔ rwrbnʔ dʕmʔ
11:02	wʔmr ly mryʔ brnšʔ hlyn ʔnwn gbrʔ dmtḥšbyn ʕtʔ wmlkyn mlkʔ byšʔ bmdyntʔ hdʔ

11:04	mkyl ʔtnbʔ ʕlyhwn ʔtnbʔ br ʔnšʔ
11:05	wnplt ʕly rwḥh dmryʔ wʔmr ly ʔmr hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ/mrʔ mrwtʔ#3#/ hknʔ rḥmtwn bny ʔysryl wtrʕytʔ drwḥkwn ʔnʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ lhyn

11:11	why lʔ thwʔ lkwn qdsʔ wʔntwn lʔ thwwn bh bsrʔ wʕl tḥwmʔ dʔysryl ʔdwnkwn
11:12	wtdʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ dbpwqdny lʔ hlktwn wdyny lʔ ʕbdtwn wʔyk dynʔ dʕmmʔ dḥdrykwn ʕbdtwn
11:13	wkd ʔtnbyt myt plṭyʔ br bnyʔ wnplt ʕl ʔpy wʔyllt bqlʔ rmʔ wʔmrt ʔwh mrʔ mrwtʔ swpnʔ ʕbd ʔnt lšrkh dʔysrʔyl
11:14	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
11:15	brnšʔ ʔḥyk ʔḥyk ʔnšʔ dšbytk wklhwn dbyt ʔysryl nswpwn dʔmrw lhwn ʕmwryh dʔwršlm ʔtrḥqw mn mryʔ ln hw gyr ʔtyhbt ʔrʕʔ lyrtwtʔ
11:16	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ ʔdḥwq ʔnwn bʕmmʔ wʔbdr ʔnwn bʔrʕtʔ wʔhwʔ lhwn lmqdšʔ zʕwrʔ bʔrʕtʔ dʔzlw lhyn
11:17	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ ʔknškwn mn ʕmmʔ wʔqrbkwn mn ʔrʕtʔ dʔtbdrtwn bhyn wʔtl lkwn ʔrʕʔ dʔysryl
11:18	wnʕlwn lh wnʕbrwn klhyn dḥlth wklhyn ṭnpwth mnh
11:19	wʔtl lhwn lbʔ ḥdtʔ wrwḥʔ ḥdtʔ ʔtl bhwn/lhwn#3#/ wʔʕbr lbʔ dkʔpʔ mn bsrhwn wʔtl lhwn lbʔ dbsrʔ
11:20	wnhlkwn bpwqdny wnṭrwn dyny wnʕbdwn ʔnwn wnhwwn ly ʕmʔ wʔnʔ ʔhwʔ lhwn ʔlhʔ
11:21	brʕynʔ gyr dptkryhwn wdṭnpwthwn ʔzl hwʔ lbhwn ʔwrḥthwn bryšhwn ʔprwʕ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ 
11:22	wʔrymw krwbʔ gpyhwn wgyglʔ ʕmhwn wšwbḥh dʔlhʔ dʔysryl lʕl mnhwn
11:23	wʔttrym šwbḥh dmryʔ mn gw mdyntʔ wqm ʕl ṭwrʔ dbmdnḥyh dmdyntʔ
11:24	wrwḥʔ šqltny wʔytytny lʔrʕʔ dkldyʔ lšbytʔ bḥzwʔ wbrwḥʔ dʔlhʔ wprq lh mny ḥzwʔ dḥzyt
11:25	wmllt ʕm šbytʔ kwlhwn ptgmwhy dmryʔ dḥwyny 
12:01	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
12:02	brnšʔ bgw bytʔ mmrmrnʔ ytb ʔnt dʕynʔ ʔyt lhwn wlʔ ḥzyn wʔdnʔ ʔyt lhwn wlʔ šmʕyn mṭl dbytʔ ʔnwn mmrmrnʔ
12:03	ʔnt dyn brnšʔ ʕbd lk mʔnʔ dšbytʔ wʔštby bʔymmʔ lʕnyhwn mn ʔtrk lʔtrʔ ʔḥrnʔ dnḥzwn mṭl dbytʔ ʔnwn mmrmrnʔ
12:04	wʔpq mʔnyk ʔyk mʔnʔ dšbytʔ bʔymmʔ lʕnyhwn wʔnt pwq brmšʔ ʔyk dbšbyʔ
12:05	wtrwʕ ʔstʔ lʕnyhwn wpwq bh
12:06	wšqwl šqwltʔ ʕl ktpk wpwq bʕmṭnʔ wksʔ ʔpyk dlʔ/wlʔ#3#/ tḥzʔ lʔrʕʔ mṭl dʔtʔ yhbtk ldbyt ʔysryl
12:07	wʕbdt hknʔ ʔyk/ʔyknʔ#3#/ dpqdny mʔny ʔpqt bʔymmʔ ʔyk mʔnʔ dšbytʔ wʔstʔ trʕt brmšʔ wbʕmṭnʔ npqt wʕl ktpy šqlt lʕnyhwn 
12:08	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ bṣprʔ lmʔmr
12:09	brnšʔ ʔn/ʔyn#3#/ ʔmryn lk dbyt ʔysryl bytʔ mmrmrnʔ mnʔ ʕbd ʔnt
12:10	ʔmr lhwn hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ rbʔ nšqwl šqwltʔ hdʔ bʔwršlm wklhwn dbyt ʔysryl ʕmh
12:11	wʔmr lhwn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ ʔtkwn ʔyk dʕbdt hknʔ ntʕbd lkwn wbšbytʔ tʔzlwn
12:12	wrbʔ dbkwn ʕl ktph nšqwl wbʕmṭnʔ npwq wntrwʕ ʔstʔ wnpwq bh wnḥpʔ ʔpwhy dlʔ nḥzyh lʔrʕʔ
12:13	wʔprws mṣydty ʕlwhy wnttṣyd/wnttḥd#3#/ bh wʔytywhy lbbl lʔrʕʔ dkldyʔ wlʔ nḥzyh wtmn nmwt
12:14	wklhwn dḥdyryn lh wmʕdryn lh wmʕšnyn lh ʔdrʔ lkl rwḥ wḥrbʔ ʔšdr btrhwn
12:15	wndʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ dbdrt ʔnwn byt ʕmmʔ wdryt/wdrt#2#/ ʔnwn bʔrʕtʔ
12:16	wʔwtr mnhwn gbrʔ bmnynʔ mn ḥrbʔ wmn kpnʔ wmn mwtnʔ dnštʕwn kwlh ṭnpwthwn byt ʕmmʔ dʔzlw lwthwn wndʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ 
12:17	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
12:18	brnšʔ lḥmk bzwʕtʔ tʔkwl wmyk bzwʕtʔ wbdḥltʔ tštʔ
12:19	wʔmr lʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ <ʔdḥwq#3#> lʕmwryh dʔwršlm wlʔrʕʔ dʔysryl lḥmhwn bdḥltʔ nʔklwn wmyhwn <bdḥltʔ#3#> btmhʔ nštwn mṭl dḥrbʔ ʔrʕʔ bmlʔh mn ʕwlʔ dklhwn ʕmwryh
12:20	wmdyntʔ dytbn nḥrbn wʔrʕʔ lḥblʔ thwʔ wtdʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
12:21	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
12:22	brnšʔ mnʔ hw mtlʔ hnʔ dmmtlyn ʕlykwn bʔrʕʔ dʔysryl wʔmryn ngrwn ywmtʔ wnʔbd klh ḥzwʔ
12:23	mṭl hnʔ ʔmr lhwn hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ mbṭl ʔnʔ lh lmtlʔ hnʔ wlʔ nmtlwnh twb bʔysryl ʔlʔ ʔmr lhwn nqrbwn ywmtʔ wnhwʔ klh ḥzwʔ

12:25	mṭl dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔmrt wʔmr ʔnʔ mltʔ wʕbd ʔnʔ lh wlʔ mšwḥr ʔnʔ wbywmtkwn bytʔ mmrmrnʔ ʔmr mltʔ wʔʕbdyh ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ 
12:26	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
