12:28	mṭl hnʔ ʔmr lhwn hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ twb lʔ nhwʔ pwšʔ lmly mltʔ dʔmr ʔnʔ ʕbd ʔnʔ lh ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ 
13:01	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
13:02	brnšʔ ʔtnbʔ ʕl nbyʔ dʔysryl dmtnbyn lhwn wʔmr lʔylyn dmtnbyn mn lbhwn šmʕw ptgmh dmrʔ mrwtʔ
13:03	hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ wy lnbyʔ šṭyʔ dʔzlyn btr rwḥhwn dlʔ ḥzw ḥzwʔ
13:04	ʔyk tʕlʔ bḥrbtʔ hww nbyyk ʔysryl
13:05	lʔ slqtwn btwrʕtʔ ʔp lʔ sgtwn sygʔ ʕl dbyt ʔysryl lmqm bqrbʔ bywmh dmryʔ
13:06	dʔmryn hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ wmryʔ lʔ šdr ʔnwn wšryw lmqmw mltʔ dgltʔ
13:07	ḥzwʔ <hw#3#> sryqʔ ḥzytwn wqṣmʔ dglʔ ʔmrtwn wʔmryn ʔntwn ʔmr mryʔ wʔnʔ lʔ ʔmrt
13:08	mṭl hnʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ ʕl dḥzytwn sryqwtʔ wmlltwn/wqṣmtwn#3#/ dglwtʔ hʔ ʔnʔ ʕlykwn ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ
13:09	wthwʔ ʔydy ʕl nbyʔ dḥzyn sryqwtʔ wqṣmyn dglwtʔ bgw ʕmy lʔ nhwwn wbktbʔ dbyt ʔysryl lʔ ntktbwn wlʔrʕʔ dʔysryl/dbyt ysryl#3#/ lʔ nʕlwn wtdʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mrʔ mrwtʔ
13:10	ʕl dʔṭʕyw lʕmy wʔmrw šlmʔ wlyt šlmʔ whw bnʔ hwʔ ʔstʔ whnwn ṭryn <hww#3#> lh dtpl
13:11	ʔmr lhnwn dṭryn lh dtpl hʔ <ʔnʔ#3#> yhb ʔnʔ mṭrʔ dgrp wkʔpʔ ddḥrʔ npln wrwḥʔ dʕlʕlʔ
13:12	wttrʕ wtpl ʔstʔ wntʔmr lkwn ʔykʔ hw ṭryʔ dṭrytwn
13:13	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ ʔšb rwḥʔ dʕlʕlʔ bḥmty wmṭrʔ dgrp nhwʔ brwgzy wkʔpʔ ddḥrʔ bḥmty/brwgzy#3#/ nwbdn
13:14	wʔsḥpyh lʔstʔ dṭrytwn wtpl wʔrmyh bʔrʕʔ wntglyn štʔsyh wtplwn wtswpwn/wtstḥpwn#3#/ bgwh wtdʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
13:15	wʔšmlʔ rwgzy bʔstʔ wbʔylyn dṭryn hww lh kd tpl wntʔmr lkwn ʔykʔ hy ʔstʔ wʔykʔ ʔnwn hnwn dṭryn hww lh
13:16	hlyn ʔnwn nbyʔ dʔysryl dmtnbyn <hww#2#> ʕl ʔwršlm wḥzyn lh ḥzwʔ dšlmʔ wlyt šlmʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ 
13:17	wʔzt brnšʔ sym ʔpyk ʕl bnt ʕmk dmtnbyn mn lbhyn wʔtnbʔ ʕlyhyn wʔmr lhyn
13:18	hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ wy ldḥyṭn bsdwtʔ lyṣylʔ dʔydyʔ wʕbdn tksytʔ lkl ryš wlkl qwmʔ lmṣd npštʔ npšth dʕmy ṣydn ʔntyn wnpštkyn dylkyn mḥyn ʔntyn
13:19	wṭwštnyhy lʕmy bḥwpnʔ dsʕrʔ wbqṣyʔ dlḥmʔ lmqṭl npštʔ ʔylyn/dʔylyn#3#/ dlʔ ḥybn hwy lmmt wlmḥyw npštʔ ʔylyn dlʔ ḥybn hwy lmḥʔ wkdbtyn lʕmʔ dšmʕ kdbwtʔ
13:20	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ hʔ ʔnʔ ʕl bsdwtkyn dṣydn ʔntyn bhwn npštʔ wʔṣrʔ ʔnwn mn drʕykyn wʔšrʔ npštʔ ʔylyn dṣydn ʔntyn wʔprḥ/wʔpšḥ#3#/ ʔnyn
13:21	wʔṣrʔ mʔnykyn wʔpṣʔ lʕmy mn ʔydykyn wtwb lʔ nštlmwn bmṣydtʔ bʔydykyn wtdʕn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
13:22	ʕl dmḥytyn lbh dzdyqʔ bdglwtʔ wʔnʔ lʔ ʔkʔbth wḥmsntyn ʔydyʔ dʕwlʔ nhpkwn mn ʔwrḥthwn byštʔ wnḥwn
13:23	mkyl sryqwtʔ lʔ tḥzyn wtwb qṣmʔ lʔ tqṣmn wʔpṣʔ lʕmy mn ʔydykyn wtdʕn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
14:01	wʔtw lwty gbrʔ mn sbʔ dʔysryl lmšʔl/lmšʔlw#3#/ mn mryʔ wytbw qdmy
14:02	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
14:03	brnšʔ gbrʔ hlyn ʔsqw dḥlthwn ʕl lbhwn wtwqltʔ dʕwlhwn smw lwqbl ʔpyhwn ʔʕbd pwrʕnʔ/pwrqnʔ#3#/ mnhwn
14:04	mkyl <zl#2#> mll ʕmhwn wʔmr lhwn hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ gbr gbr mn byt ʔysryl dnsq/wnsq#3#/ dḥlth ʕl lbh wtwqltʔ dʕwlh nsym lwqbl ʔpwhy wnʔtʔ lwt nbyʔ <lmšʔlwth#3#> ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔhwʔ lh shdʔ bhyn bswgʔʔ ddḥlth
14:05	mṭl dʔḥwr ldbyt ʔysryl blbhwn dprqw mny bklhyn dḥlthwn
14:06	mkyl ʔmr ldbyt ʔysryl hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ twbw wʔtpnw mn klhyn dḥltkwn wmn kwlh ṭnpwtkwn ʔpnw ʔpykwn
14:07	mṭl dgbrʔ mn ʔysryl wmn ʔylyn dmtpnyn lwty dʕmryn bʔysryl/byt ysrʔyl#3#/ dnhpwk mny wnsq dḥlth ʕl lbh wtwqltʔ dʕwlh nsym lwqbl ʔpwhy wnʔtʔ lwt nbyʔ lmšʔlwth ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔhwʔ lh shdʔ
14:08	wʔtl rwgzy ʕl gbrʔ hw wʔʕbdywhy lʔtʔ wlmtlʔ wʔwbdywhy mn gw ʕmy wtdʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
14:09	wnbyʔ kd nṭʕʔ wnmll/dnmll#3#/ mltʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔṭʕyth lnbyʔ hw wʔrym ʔydy ʕlwhy wʔwbdywhy mn gw ʕmy ʔysryl
14:10	wnšqlwn ʕwlhwn ʕwlh dhw dmšʔl ʔyk ʕwlh dnbyʔ nhwʔ
14:11	wtwb lʔ nṭʕwn dbyt ʔysryl mny wtwb lʔ ntṭnpwn bklh ʕwlhwn ʔlʔ nhwwn ly ʕmʔ wʔnʔ ʔhwʔ lhwn ʔlhʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ 
14:12	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
14:13	brnšʔ ʔrʕʔ ʔn tḥṭʔ ly wtʕbd ʕwlʔ qdmy ʔrym ʔydy ʕlyh wʔtbr bh kpnʔ wʔwbd mnh bnynšʔ wbʕyrʔ
14:14	wʔn nhwwn bh hlyn tltʔ gbryn nwḥ wdnyʔyl wʔywb hnwn bzdyqwthwn npṣwn npšhwn ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ
14:15	wʔn ʔytʔ ḥywtʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ <hy#3#> wtwbdyh wthwʔ lḥblʔ mn bly dʕbr mn ḥywtʔ
14:16	whlyn tltʔ gbryn ʔyt bh ḥy ʔnʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ dlʔ npṣwn lʔ lbnyʔ wlʔ lbntʔ ʔlʔ hnwn blḥwd ntpṣwn wʔrʕʔ thwʔ lḥblʔ
14:17	wʔn ʔytʔ ḥrbʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ hy wʔmr dtʕbr/dtʕbd#2#/ ḥrbʔ bʔrʕʔ <hy#3#> wʔwbd mnh bnynšʔ wbʕyrʔ
14:18	whlyn tltʔ gbryn ʔyt bh ḥy ʔnʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ dlʔ npṣwn lʔ lbnyʔ wlʔ lbntʔ ʔlʔ hnwn blḥwdyhwn ntpṣwn
14:19	wʔn ʔšdr mwtnʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ hy wʔšwd ḥmty ʕlyh bdmʔ wʔwbd mnh bnynšʔ wbʕyrʔ
14:20	wnwḥ wdnyʔyl wʔywb ʔyt bgwh ḥy ʔnʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ dlʔ brʔ wlʔ brtʔ npṣwn ʔlʔ hnwn bzdyqwthwn npṣwn npšhwn
14:21	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ ʔrbʕʔ dynyn byšyn šdrt ʕl ʔwršlm ḥrbʔ wkpnʔ wḥywtʔ byštʔ wmwtnʔ wʔwbd mnh bny ʔnšʔ wbʕyrʔ
14:22	wnštḥrwn bh ʔylyn dmtpṣyn dmpqyn bnyʔ wbntʔ whnwn npqwn lwtkwn wtḥzwn ʔwrḥthwn wṣnʕthwn wttbyʔwn mn byštʔ dʔytyt ʕl ʔwršlm wkl mdm dʔytyt ʕlyh
14:23	wnbyʔwnkwn kd tḥzwn ʔwrḥthwn wṣnʕthwn wtdʕwn dlʔ hwʔ mgn ʕbdt <bh#3#> kl dʕbdt bh ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ 
15:01	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
15:02	brnšʔ mnʔ nhwʔ lqysʔ dgptʔ mn kl qys šbštʔ dhwt bqysʔ dʕbʔ
15:03	dlmʔ mtnsb mnh qysʔ lmʕbd mnh/bh#3#/ ʕbdʔ ʔw nsbyn mnh sktʔ lmtlʔ bh mʔnʔ
15:04	ʔlʔ ʔtyhbt mʔkwltʔ lnwrʔ wtrtyn swkyh ʔklt nwrʔ wgwh ḥrb dlmʔ ʔzlʔ lʕbdʔ
15:05	wkd ddlʔ mwm hwt lʔ ʔzlʔ hwt lʕbdʔ hšʔ dʔklth nwrʔ wḥrbt ʔynʔ ʔzlʔ lʕbdʔ
15:06	mṭl \hnʔ hknʔ /dhknʔ#3#/ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ ʔyk dyhbt qysʔ dgptʔ mn klhwn qysʔ dʕbʔ mʔkwltʔ lnwrʔ hknʔ yhbt lʕmwryh/ʕmwryh#3#/ dʔwršlm <lnwrʔ#3#>
15:07	wʔtl rwgzy bhwn mn nwrʔ npqw wnwrʔ tʔkwl ʔnwn wtdʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ mʔ dsmt rwgzy ʕlyhwn
15:08	wʔtlyh lʔrʕʔ lḥblʔ wltmhʔ ʕl dʕbdw ʕwlʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ 
16:01	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
16:02	brnšʔ ʔwdʕyh lʔwršlm ṭnpwth
16:03	wʔmr hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ lʔwršlm ʕqrky wmwldky mn ʔrʕʔ dknʕn ʔbwky ʔmwryʔ wʔmky ḥtytʔ
16:04	wmwldnytky bywmʔ dyldtky lʔ psqt šrky wbmyʔ lʔ ʔsḥytky wbmlḥʔ/wmlḥʔ#3#/ lʔ mlḥtky wbʕzrwrʔ lʔ krktky
16:05	wlʔ ḥst ʕlyky ʕynh dtʕbd lky ḥdʔ mn hlyn wtrḥq ʕlyky ʔlʔ ʔštdyty bdbrʔ/bmdbrʔ#3#/ bʕšyqwth dnpšky bywmʔ dyldtky
16:06	wʕbrt ʕlyky wḥzytky dmplplty bdmky wʔmrt lky bdmky ḥyy
16:07	wsgy ʔyk mwʕytʔ dḥqlʔ wsgyty wrbyty wʕlty lmdyntʔ tdyky qmw wsʕrky yʕʔ whwyty ʕrṭl wʕryt
16:08	wʕbrt ʕlyky wḥzytky wḥzyt zbnky zbnʔ dʕzrrtʔ wprst ʔydy ʕlyky wksyt pwrsyky wymyt lky wʕlt ʕmky bqymʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ whwyty ly
16:09	wʔsḥytky bmyʔ wʔšygt dmky mnky wmšḥtky mšḥʔ
16:10	wʔlbštky ptkʔ wʔsʔntky msnʔ wʔsrt bḥṣyky bwṣʔ wksytky ḥlʔ
16:11	wṣbttky ṣbtʔ wʔrmyt šʔrʔ bʔydyky whmnykʔ bṣwrky
16:12	wbrwlʔ byt ʕynyky wqdšʔ bʔdnyky wklylʔ dšwbḥʔ bršky
16:13	wʔṣṭbtty bdhbʔ wbḥmwrtʔ wʔtlbšty bwṣʔ wtkltʔ wptkʔ wnšypʔ wdbšʔ wmšḥʔ ʔklty wšprty ṭb ṭb wʔṣlḥty bmlkwtʔ
16:14	wnpq šmʔ lšwprky bʕmmʔ mṭl klylʔ dšwbḥy dsmt ʕlyky ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ
16:15	wʔttklty ʕl šwprky wznyty ʕl šmky wʔšdty znywtky ʕl kl dʕbr
16:16	wnsbty mn lbwšy wʕbdty lky qnytʔ wznyty bhyn lʔ tʕlyn wlʔ nhwyn dylky
16:17	wnsbty mʔnʔ dšwbḥky mn dhbʔ wmn sʔmʔ dyhbt lky wʕbdty lky ṣlmʔ dkrʔ/ddkrʔ#3#/ wznyty bhwn
16:18	wnsbty mʔnʔ dṣbtky wksyty ʔnwn wmšḥy wbsmy smty qdmyhwn
16:19	wlḥmʔ dyhbt lky nšypʔ wdbšʔ wmšḥʔ lmʔkwltʔ smtywhy qdmyhwn lryḥʔ dswtʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ
16:20	wnsbty bnyky wbntky dyldty ly wdbḥty lhwn lmʔkwltʔ sṭr mn znywtky
16:21	wnksty bny wyhbty lhwn kd ʔštrḥty/ʔtrʕyty#3#/ bhwn
16:22	wbklh ṭnpwtky wznywtky lʔ ʔtdkrty ywmtʔ dṭlywtky kd ʕrṭlyʔ hwyty wʕryʔ wmplplʔ bdmʔ
16:23	wmn btr hlyn klhyn byštky wy lky wy lky ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ
16:24	bnyty lky bytʔ dgybʔ wʕbdty lky ʕlwtʔ bkl šwq
16:25	wbkl ryš ʔwrḥtʔ bnyty prkyky wṭnpty šwprky wpšṭty rglyky ʕl kl dʕbr wʔsgyty znywtky
16:26	wznyty bbny mṣryn šbbyky rwrby bsrʔ wʔsgyty znywtky wʔrgztyny
16:27	wʔrymt ʔydy ʕlyky wʔwbdt pwqdnyky wʔšlmtky byd snʔtky bnt plštyʔ dtksn hwy lky mn ʔwrḥtky dznywtʔ
16:28	wznyty bbny ʔtwr wlʔ sbʕty
16:29	wʔsgyty znywtky ʕl ʔrʕʔ dknʕn wdkldyʔ/wkldyʔ#3#/ wʔp bhlyn lʔ sbʕty
16:30	mnʔ ʔdwn lbrtky ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ dʕbdty hlyn klhwn ʕbdʔ dʔnttʔ znytʔ wmrḥtʔ
16:31	kd bnyty gybyky bkl ryš ʔwrḥtʔ wʕlwtky bkl šwq wlʔ hwyty ʔp lʔ ʔyk znytʔ dmknšʔ ʔgrʔ
16:32	ʔp lʔ ʔyk ʔntt gbrʔ gyrtʔ dnsbʔ mn nwkryʔ
16:33	lklhyn znytʔ yhbyn ʔgrʔ wʔnty yhbty ʔgrʔ lklhwn rḥmyky wšḥdty ʔnwn bznywtky dnʔtwn lwtky mn klhwn ḥdryky
16:34	ʔtpršty mn nšʔ bznywtky bhy dyhbʔ hwyty ʔgrʔ wʔgrʔ yhbw lky
16:35	mṭl hnʔ znytʔ šmʕy ptgmh/mlth#3#/ dmryʔ
16:36	hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ ʕl dyhbty nḥšky wglyty pwrsyky bznywtky ʕl rḥmyky wʕl klhwn ptkrʔ ṭnpwtky/dṭnpwtky#3#/ wdmʔ dbnyky yhbty lhwn
16:37	mṭl hnʔ hʔ mknš ʔnʔ lklhwn rḥmyky dṣbyty bhwn wlkl drḥmty ʕm dsnyty wʔknš ʔnwn ʕlyky mn ḥdryky wʔglʔ pwrsyky lʕnyhwn wnḥzwn kwlh pwrsyky
16:38	wʔdwnky dynʔ dgyrtʔ wdynʔ dʔylyn dʔšdn dmʔ wʔtlky ldmʔ wlḥmtʔ wlṭnnʔ
16:39	wʔšlmky bʔydyhwn wnsḥpwn byt gybyky wnʕqrwn ptkyky wnšlḥwn lbwšyky wnsbwn mʔnʔ dšwbḥky wnšbqwnky ʕrṭl
16:40	wnsqwn ʕlyky knšʔ wnrgmwnky bkʔpʔ wnmḥwnky bsypyhwn
16:41	wnwqdwnky bgw nwrʔ wnʕbdwn mnky dynʔ lʕyn nšʔ sgyʔtʔ wʔbṭlky mn znywtʔ wtwb lʔ ttlyn ʔgrʔ
16:42	wʔnyḥ ḥmty ʕlyky wnʕbr ṭnny mnky wʔttnyḥ wlʔ ʔrgz twb
16:43	ʕl dlʔ ʔtdkrty ywmtʔ dṭlywtky wʔrgztyny bhlyn klhyn ʔp ʔnʔ hʔ prʕt ʔwrḥtky bršky ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ ʕl dʕbdty ṭnpwtʔ wznywtʔ
16:44	wkl mn dmmtl mtlʔ ʕlyky nmtl wnʔmr brtʔ ʔyk ʔmh
16:45	brt ʔmky ʔnty šbqt bʕlh wbnyh wḥtʔ ʔnty dʔḥwtʔ dšbq gbryhyn wbnyhyn ʔmkyn ḥtytʔ wʔbwkyn ʔmwryʔ
16:46	wḥtky qšyštʔ šmryn hy wbnth dytbʔ mn smlky wḥtky zʕwrtʔ dytbʔ mn ymynky sdwm <hy#3#> wbnth
16:47	wlʔ hwʔ ʔyk ʔwrḥthyn hlkty wlʔ <hwʔ#3#> ʔyk ṭnpwthyn ʕbdty ʕd qlyl wytyr mnhyn ḥblty bklhyn ʔwrḥtky
16:48	ḥy ʔnʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ dlʔ ʕbdt sdwm ḥtky hy wbnth ʔyk dʕbdty ʔnty wbntky
16:49	hnw ʕwlʔ dsdwm ḥtky gʔytʔ dsbʕʔ hwt lḥmʔ wytbʔ <hwt#3#> bšlyʔ hy wbnth wbʔydʔ dbyšʔ wdmsknʔ lʔ ʔḥd
16:50	ʔlʔ ʔttrym wʕbd byštʔ qdmy wkd hlyn ḥzyt bhyn hpkt ʔnyn
16:51	šmryn ʔyk plgʔ dḥṭhyky lʔ ḥṭt ʔsgyty ṭnpwtky mnhyn wzkyty lʔḥwtky bklh ṭnpwtky dʕbdty
16:52	wʔp ʔnty qbly bhttky dzkyty lʔḥwtky bḥṭhyky wʔtṭnpty/dʔtṭnpty#3#/ ytyr mnhyn whnyn ʔzddq ytyr mnky wʔp ʔnty bhty wqbly ḥprky dʔzddq ʔḥwtky ytyr mnky
16:53	wʔhpk šbythyn šbytʔ dsdwm wdbnth wšbytʔ dšmryn wdbnth wʔšbʔ šbytky bynthyn
16:54	dtqblyn bhttʔ wtḥpryn bklmdm dʕbdty dtrgzynny
16:55	wḥtky sdwm wbnth ntqnn ʔyk dmn qdym wšmryn wbnth ntqnn ʔyk dmn qdym wʔnty wbntky thwyn ʔyk dmn qdym
16:56	wlʔ hwt sdwm ḥtky lṭbʔ bpwmky bywmʔ dgʔywtky
16:57	mn qdm dttglʔ byštky ʔyk ḥsdʔ dbnt ʔdwm wklhyn bnt plštyʔ dḥdyrn <hwy#3#> lh wšyṭn hwy lh
16:58	wḥṭhyky wṭnpwtky ʔnty šqlty ʔnwn ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ 
16:59	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ/ḥy ʔnʔ#3#/ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ ʕbd/dʕbd#3#/ ʔnʔ lky ʔyk dʕbdty ʕl dšṭty mwmty wbṭlty qymy
16:60	ʔnʔ dyn ʔtdkr qymy dʕmky dbywmtʔ dṭlywtky wʔqym lky qymʔ dʕlm/lʕlm#3#/
16:61	wtʕhdyn ʔwrḥtky wtbhtyn dnsbt lʔḥwtky lqšyštʔ wlzʕwrtʔ wyhbt ʔnyn lky bntʔ lʔ mn qymky
16:62	wʔqym ʔnʔ qymy ʕmky wtdʕyn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
16:63	mṭl dttdkryn/dtdkryn#3#/ wtbhtyn wtwb lʔ tptḥyn pwmky mn bhttky mʔ dšbqt lky klmdm dʕbdty ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ 
17:01	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
17:02	brnšʔ ʔḥwd ʔwḥdtʔ wʔmtl mtlʔ ʕl dbyt ʔysryl
17:03	wʔmr hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ nšrʔ rbʔ drwrbyn gpwhy wʔrykyn glpnwhy wmlyn ṭprwhy wʕbyṭ mlgh ʔtʔ llbnn wnsb gbyʔ dʕrqʔ
17:04	wqṭm ryš mrbyth wʔytyh lʔrʕʔ dknʕn wsmh bmdyntʔ dtgrʔ
17:05	wnsb mn zrʕʔ dʔrʕʔ wʔrmy bmdbrʔ nṣbtʔ ʕl myʔ sgyʔʔ wsmh ldwqʔ
17:06	wyʕt whwt gptʔ mrʕtʔ mkykt qwmtʔ dntḥzwn šbwqyh ʕlwhy wʕqryh nhwwn tḥwtwhy whwt gptʔ wʕbdt šbwqʔ wpšṭt ʕnqyh
17:07	whʔ nšrʔ ʔḥrnʔ rbʔ drwrbyn gpwhy wsgyʔn ṭprwhy wgptʔ hdʔ ʔkrkt ʕqryh ʕlwhy wdlyth ʔrmyt ʕlwhy dnšqyh mn mdrʔ dnṣbth
17:08	bḥqlʔ špyrtʔ wbmyʔ sgyʔʔ nṣybʔ dtʕbd ṭrpʔ wtṭʕn pʔrʔ wthwʔ gptʔ šbyḥtʔ
17:09	ʔmr hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ lʔ tkšr ʔlʔ ʕqryh ntpsqwn wpʔryh ntmswn wnʔbšwn wklhwn ṭrpʔ dmwʕyth nʔbšwn wlʔ bdrʕʔ rmʔ wlʔ bʕmmʔ sgyʔʔ nʕqryh mn ʕqrh
17:10	hʔ nṣybʔ ʔlʔ lʔ tkšr wmʔ dnšbt bh rwḥʔ dšwbʔ ybšʔ bmdrʔ dmwʕyth
17:11	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
17:12	<brnšʔ#3#> ʔmr lbytʔ mmrmrnʔ lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn mnʔ ʔnyn hlyn ʔmr lhwn hʔ ʔtʔ mlkʔ dbbl lʔwršlm wdbr lmlkh wlrwrbnyh wmwbl lhwn lbbl
17:13	wnsb mn zrʕʔ dmlkwtʔ wmqym ʕmh qymʔ wʕʔl ʕmh bmwmtʔ wdbr lšlyṭʔ/lšlyṭnʔ#3#/ dʔrʕʔ dlʔ nttrymwn
17:14	ʔlʔ thwʔ mlkwthwn mkykʔ wnṭrwn qymh wnqymwn ʕmh
17:15	wnmrd ʕlwhy wnšdr ʔyzgdwhy lmṣryn dntlwn lh rkšʔ wʕmʔ sgyʔʔ lʔ nkšr wlʔ ntpṣʔ mn dhknʔ ʕbd
17:16	ḥy ʔnʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ dbʔtrʔ/bʔtrʔ#3#/ dʔqymywhy mlkʔ wšṭ mwmty wbṭl qymy bgw bbl nmwt
17:17	wlʔ bḥylʔ rbʔ ʔplʔ brkšʔ sgyʔʔ nʕbd ʕmh prʕwn qrbʔ ʔlʔ bkmʔnʔ wbdwqʔ nwbd npštʔ sgyʔtʔ
17:18	ʕl dšṭ mwmtʔ wbṭl qymʔ nšlm ʔydh wlʔ ntpṣʔ ʕl dʕbd hlyn klhyn
17:19	mṭl hlyn hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ ḥy ʔnʔ ʕl dšṭ mwmty wbṭl qymy ʔsqyh bryšh
17:20	wʔprws mṣydty ʕlwhy wnttḥd bh wʔwblywhy lbbl lʔrʕʔ dkldyʔ wʔdwnywhy tmn ʕl ʕwlʔ dʔʕly by
17:21	wklhwn ḥʔrwhy wklhwn qrybwhy nplwn bḥrbʔ wʔylyn dmštḥryn ntdrwn lkl rwḥ wtdʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ mllt 
17:22	hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ ʔsb mn gbyʔ dʕrqʔ rmʔ wmn ryšh ʔqṭwm lbh wʔṣwb ʕl ṭwrʔ rmʔ wmʕlyʔ
17:23	bṭwrʔ dʔysryl ʔṣbywhy wnṭʕn ṭrpʔ wnʕbd pʔrʔ wnhwʔ ʔrzʔ šbyḥʔ wtškn bh klh prḥtʔ dgpʔ wbṭllʔ dswkwhy nšknwn
17:24	wndʕwn klhwn ʔylnʔ ddbrʔ dʔnʔ mryʔ ʔmkt qysʔ rmʔ wʔrymt qysʔ mkykʔ wʔwbšt qysʔ rṭybʔ wʔwʕyt qysʔ ybyšʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ mllt wʕbdt 
18:01	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr brnšʔ
18:02	lmnʔ mmtlyn ʔntwn mtlʔ hnʔ bʔrʕʔ dʔysrʔyl wʔmryn ʔntwn ʔbhʔ ʔklw bsrʔ wšnʔ dbnyʔ qhyn
18:03	ḥy ʔnʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ ʔn nhwʔ twb <mn#3#> dmmtl mtlʔ hnʔ bʔysryl
18:04	mṭl dklhyn npštʔ dyly ʔnyn npšʔ dʔbʔ wnpšʔ dbrʔ dyly ʔnyn npšʔ dḥṭyʔ hy tmwt
18:05	wgbrʔ ʔn nhwʔ zdyq wnʕbd dynʔ wzdyqwtʔ
18:06	wʕl ṭwrʔ lʔ ʔkl wlʔ ʔrym ʕynwhy lptkrʔ wldḥltʔ dbny ʔysryl wlʔntt ḥbrh lʔ ṭnp wlʔnttʔ bkpsh lʔ ʔtqrb
18:07	wlʔnš lʔ ṭlm wlʔnš lʔ tk wpny mšknʔ dnsb wyhb lḥmh lkpnʔ wlʕrṭlyʔ ʔlbš tksytʔ
18:08	wbrbytʔ lʔ ʔwzp wbqṣṣʔ lʔ yhb wmn ʕwlʔ ʔhpk ʔydh wdn dynʔ dqwštʔ/bqwštʔ#3#/ byt gbrʔ lḥbrh
18:09	wbpwqdny hlk wdyny nṭr wʕbd qwštʔ mn dhknʔ ʕbd zdyqʔ hw wmḥʔ nḥʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ 
18:10	wʔn nwld brʔ ʕwlʔ ʔšd dmʔ wnʕbd ḥdʔ mn hlyn
18:11	wnʔkwl ʕl ṭwrʔ wnṭnp ʔtt ḥbrh
18:12	wnṭlwm lmsknʔ wlbyšʔ wntwk lḥbrh wlʔ npnʔ mšknʔ lmrwhy wlptkrʔ nrym ʕynwhy wnʕbd ṭnpwtʔ
18:13	wbrbytʔ nwzp wbqṣṣʔ nsb dlmʔ ḥyʔ/nʔḥʔ#3#/ lʔ nḥʔ mṭl dhlyn klhyn byštʔ ʕbd ʔlʔ mmt nmwt wdmh ʕlwhy nhwʔ
18:14	wʔn nwld brʔ wnḥzʔ klhwn ḥṭhʔ dʕbd ʔbwhy wlʔ nʕbd ʔkwthwn
18:15	wʕl ṭwrʔ lʔ nʔkwl wlʔ nrym ʕynwhy lptkrʔ dbny/dbyt#3#/ ʔysryl wlʔntt ḥbrh lʔ nṭnp
18:16	wlʔnš lʔ nṭlwm wmšknʔ dʔnš lʔ nšqwl wtwkʔ lʔ ntwk wlḥmh ntl lkpnʔ wlʕrṭlyʔ nlbš
18:17	wmn msknʔ lʔ nhpk ʔydh wrbytʔ lʔ nšqwl wytyrʔ lʔ nsb wdyny nʕbd wbpwqdny nhlk lʔ nmwt bʕwlh dʔbwhy ʔlʔ mḥʔ nḥʔ
18:18	ʔbwhy dyn ʕl dṭlm ṭlwmyʔ wtk twkʔ lʔḥwhy wmdm dšpyr lʔ ʕbd bʕmh myt bḥṭhwhy
18:19	wʔn ʔmryn ʔykw lʔ mtprʕ brʔ ḥṭhʔ/bḥṭhʔ#3#/ dʔbwhy ʔmr lhwn mṭl dʕbd brʔ dynʔ wzdyqwtʔ wnṭr kwlhwn pwqdny mḥʔ nḥʔ
18:20	npšʔ <dyn#3#> dḥṭyʔ hy tmwt lʔ ntprʕ brʔ ḥṭhʔ dʔbwhy ʔplʔ ʔbʔ ntprʕ ḥṭhʔ dbrh zkwth/zkywtʔ#3#/ dzkyʔ ʕlwhy thwʔ wḥṭyth dḥṭyʔ ʕlwhy thwʔ
18:21	ʕwlʔ dyn ʔn nhpwk mn klhwn ḥṭhwhy dʕbd wnṭr pwqdny wnʕbd dynʔ wzdyqwtʔ mḥʔ nḥʔ wlʔ nmwt
18:22	wklhwn ḥṭhwhy dʕbd lʔ ntdkrwn lh ʔlʔ bzdyqwtʔ dʕbd nḥʔ
18:23	lʔ ṣbʔ ʔnʔ bmwth dḥṭyʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ ʔlʔ dnhpwk mn ʔwrḥh byštʔ wnḥʔ
18:24	wʔn nhpwk zdyqʔ mn zdyqwth wnʕbd ʕwlʔ wṭnpwtʔ ʔyk hlyn dʕbd ḥṭyʔ klh zdyqwth dʕbd lʔ ttdkr lh ʔlʔ bʕwlʔ dʕbd wbḥṭhʔ dḥṭʔ bhwn nmwt
18:25	wʔmrtwn/wʔmryn ʔntwn#3#/ lʔ špyrn <ʔlʔ#3#> ʔwrḥth dmryʔ šmʕw hkyl dbyt ʔyšryl ʔwrḥty dyly špyrn ʔnyn ʔwrḥtkwn hw dylkwn lʔ špyrn
18:26	wʔn nhpwk zdyqʔ mn zdyqwth wnʕbd ʕwlʔ bh bʕwlʔ dʕbd nmwt
18:27	wʔn nhpwk ʕwlʔ mn ʕwlwth wnʕbd dynʔ wzdyqwtʔ nḥʔ npšh
18:28	wʔn nḥzʔ wnhpwk mn klhwn ḥṭhwhy dʕbd mḥʔ nḥʔ wlʔ nmwt
18:29	wʔmryn dbyt ʔysryl lʔ špyrn ʔwrḥth dmryʔ ʔwrḥty dyly špyrn ʔnyn dbyt ʔysryl ʔlʔ ʔwrḥtkwn hw dylkwn lʔ špyrn
18:30	mṭl hnʔ ʔnš ʔyk ʔwrḥth ʔdwnkwn byt/dbyt#3#/ ʔysrʔyl ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ twbw wʔtpnw mn klh ʕwlkwn wlʔ thwʔ lkwn twqltʔ lḥṭhykwn
18:31	wšdw mnkwn klh/lklh#3#/ ʕwlʔ dʕbdtwn wʕbdw lkwn lbʔ ḥdtʔ wrwḥʔ ḥdtʔ wlʔ tmwtwn dbyt ʔysryl
18:32	mṭl dlʔ ṣbʔ ʔnʔ bmwth dmytʔ/dḥṭyʔ#3#/ <ḥṭyʔ#3#> ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ ʔlʔ twbw wḥyw 
19:01	ʔnt dyn br ʔnšʔ šqwl ʔwlytʔ ʕl rwrbnʔ dʔysryl
19:02	wʔmr mnʔ wy ʔmk gwryʔ dʔryʔ dbynt ʔrywtʔ rbyʕʔ wbynt ʔrywtʔ rbyt gryh
19:03	wrbʔ ḥd mn gryh whwʔ ʔryʔ wylp lmtbr tbrʔ wʔkl brnšʔ
19:04	wšmʕw ṭbh ʕmmʔ wbmṣydthwn ʔttḥd wʔytywly bblmʔ lʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
19:05	wkd ḥzt ʔmh dʔtkrht wʔbd lh sbrh nsbt ḥd mn gryh wʕbdth ʔryʔ
19:06	whlk bynt ʔrywtʔ whwʔ ʔryʔ wylp lmtbr tbrʔ wʔkl brnšʔ
19:07	whlk bʕwšnh wmdyntʔ ʔḥrb wḥbl ʔrʕʔ bmlʔh bqlʔ dnhmth
19:08	wʔtknšw ʕlwhy ʕmmʔ mn mdyntʔ dḥdrwhy wprsw ʕlwhy mṣydthwn wbh ʔttḥd
19:09	wḥbšwhy bnmrtʔ wʔwblwhy lmlkʔ dbbl wʔʕlh lbyt ḥbwšyʔ dtwb lʔ nštmʕ qlh bṭwrʔ dʔysryl
19:10	ʔmk ʔyk gptʔ bdmk ʕl myʔ nṣybʔ pʔryh wʕwpyh hww bmyʔ sgyʔʔ
19:11	whww lh ḥwṭrʔ ʕšynʔ ʕl šbṭʔ drwrbnʔ wʔttrymt qwmthwn mn bynt nwrbyh wʔtḥzyw brwmhwn wbswgʔʔ ddlythwn
19:12	wʔtʕqrw bḥmtʔ wbʔrʕʔ ʔštdyw <bḥmtʔ#3#> wrwḥʔ dšwbʔ ʔwbšt pʔryh wʔtprqw wybšw ḥwṭrʔ dʕwšnh wnwrʔ ʔklth
19:13	mkyl ʔtnṣbt bmdbrʔ bʔrʕʔ ṣhytʔ wṣdytʔ
19:14	wnpqt nwrʔ mn ḥwṭryh gbyʔ wʔklt pʔryh wlʔ ʔštkḥ bh twb ḥwṭrʔ ʕšynʔ ʔw šbṭʔ dnhwʔ šlyṭʔ ʔwlytʔ hy wthwʔ lʔwlytʔ
20:01	whwʔ bšntʔ šbyʕytʔ bʕsrtʔ byrḥʔ/bywmʔ#3#/ ḥmyšyʔ ʔtw gbrʔ mn sbʔ dʔysryl lmšʔl mn mryʔ wytbw qdmy
20:02	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr

20:07	wʔmrt lhwn ʔʕbrw ʔnš ptkrh mn ʕynwhy wbdḥltʔ dmṣryn lʔ ttṭnpwn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn

20:13	wmrmrwny dbyt/byt#3#/ ʔysryl bmdbrʔ wbpwqdny lʔ hlkw wdyny ʔslyw dʔn ʕbd lhwn/ʔnwn#3#/ brnšʔ ḥyʔ/nḥʔ#3#/ bhwn wšby ṭwšw wʔmrt dʔšwd rwgzy ʕlyhwn bmdbrʔ wʔwbd ʔnwn
20:14	wḥst mṭl šmy dlʔ ntṭwš lʕyn ʕmmʔ dʔpqt ʔnwn lʕnyhwn

26:17	wnʔlwn ʕlyky ʔwlytʔ wnʔmrwn lky ʔyknʔ ʔbdty ʕmwrtʔ dymmʔ mdyntʔ ʕšyntʔ dʕšynʔ hwt bymʔ hy wʕmwryh wʔttbrw klhwn ʕmwryh
26:18	mkyl nzwʕn gzrtʔ bywmʔ dmpwltky wntdlḥn gzrtʔ bywmʔ dmpwltky
26:19	hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ lṣwr mʔ dʕbdtky mdyntʔ ḥrbtʔ ḥrbtʔ ʔyk mdyntʔ dlʔ ʔtytb msq ʔnʔ ʕlyky thwmʔ wnkswnky myʔ sgyʔʔ
26:20	wʔḥtky ʕm nḥty gwbʔ lwt ʕmʔ dʕlm wʔwtbky bʔrʕʔ tḥtytʔ bḥrbtʔ dmn ʕlm ʕm nḥty gwbʔ wlʔ ttytbyn wlʔ ʔʕbd qymky bʔrʕʔ dḥyʔ

27:01	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
27:02	ʔnt dyn br ʔnšʔ ʔly ʔwlytʔ ʕl ṣwr
27:03	wʔmr lṣwr dytbʔ bmʕlnʔ dymʔ tʔgwrtʔ dʕmmʔ wdgzrtʔ/wgzrtʔ#3#/ sgyʔtʔ hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ ṣwr ʔnty ʔmrty dʔnʔ ʔnʔ klylʔ dšwbḥʔ
27:04	tḥwmyky blbʔ dymmʔ wbnyky škllw šwprky
27:05	ʕrqʔ wdpʔ ʔytyw lky mn snyr wʔrzʔ mn lbnn nsbw dnʕbdwn lky {ʕdrʔ}<ʕrdʔ>
27:06	wmn blwṭʔ dbyšn ʕbdw lqyky wdpyky ʕbdw dšnʔ dpylʔ mn gzrtʔ dktyʔ
27:07	wqrmʔ dbwṣʔ dṣbtky ʔytyw mn mṣryn dnhwʔ lky ʔtʔ tkltʔ wʔrgwnʔ ʔytyw lky mn gzrtʔ dʔls ltksytky

27:10	prsyʔ wlwdyʔ wpwṭyʔ gbrʔ qrbtnʔ hww bḥylyky skrʔ wsnrtʔ tlw bky whww lky šwbḥʔ
27:11	bny ʔrwd wḥylyky qymyn hww ʕl šwryky wnṭryn mgdlyky/bmgdlyk#3#/ šlṭyhwn tlw ʕl šwryky kd ḥdryn wšmlyw šwprky

27:15	bny drn tgryky wgzrtʔ sgyʔtʔ byt tʔgwrtʔ dʔydyky qrntʔ dmšḥʔ wlbwntʔ ʔytyw lky qwrbnʔ
27:16	ʔdwm byt tʔgwrtky wswgʔʔ dʕbdyky ʔrgwnʔ wbwṣʔ wptkʔ wtkltʔ wšryʔ wptwtkʔ ʔytyw lky lzbnʔ
27:17	yhwdʔ wʔrʕʔ dʔysrʔyl hnwn ʔnwn tgryky ḥṭʔ wrwzʔ wdwḥnʔ wdbšʔ wmšḥʔ wrhṭnʔ/wʔrhṭnʔ#3#/ ʔytyw lky lzbnʔ
27:18	drmswq byt tʔgwrtky wswgʔʔ dʕbdyky wswgʔʔ dʕwtrky bḥmrʔ šmynʔ wbʕmrʔ/wʕmrʔ#3#/ ḥwrʔ

28:01	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr

29:10	mṭl hnʔ hʔ ʔnʔ ʕlyk wʕl nhrk wʔtlyh lʔrʕʔ dmṣryn lḥblʔ wlḥwrbʔ mn mgdlʔ dswnʔ wʕdmʔ ltḥwmʔ dkwš
29:11	lʔ tʕbr bh rglʔ dbrnšʔ wʔplʔ prstʔ dbʕyrʔ wlʔ ttb ʔrbʕyn šnyn
29:12	wʔtlyh lʔrʕʔ dmṣryn lḥblʔ bynt mdyntʔ dṣdyn wnhwyn mdynth lḥblʔ ʔrbʕyn šnyn bynt mdyntʔ dḥrbn wʔbdryh lmṣryn bʕmmʔ wʔdrʔ ʔnwn bmdyntʔ

30:14	wʔbṭlyh lʔrʕʔ dptrws wʔšbwq nwrʔ bṣʕn wʔʕbd dynʔ bnw
30:15	wʔšwd rwgzy ʕl syn ʕwšnh dmṣryn wʔwbd ʕwtrh dnw
30:16	wʔšbwq nwrʔ bmṣryn wntdlḥ syn wnw ttrʕ wmps thwʔ lmpwltʔ
30:17	wʔyk myʔ nhwwn gdwdʔ dmpybst/dmpkwd#3#/ wbsypʔ/wbḥrbʔ#3#/ nplwn wbšbyʔ nʔzlwn
30:18	wbtḥpys nʕrb ywmʔ mʔ dtbrt tmn ḥwṭrh dmṣryn wbṭl mnh šwbḥʔ dʕwšnh wtksyh ʕnnʔ wbnth nʔzln bšbyʔ
30:19	wʔʕbd dynʔ bmṣryn wndʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ 
30:20	bšnt ḥdʕsrʔ bšbʕtʔ byrḥʔ qdmyʔ hwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
30:21	brnšʔ drʕh dprʕwn mlkʔ dmṣryn tbrt wlʔ mtʕṣb dthwʔ lh ʔsywtʔ wlʔ nttsym ʕlwhy mlgmʔ wlʔ ntʕṣb wlʔ ntḥlm dnʔḥwd sypʔ
30:22	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ hʔ ʔnʔ ʕl prʕwn mlkʔ dmṣryn wʔtbr drʕwhy ʕšynʔ wʔrmʔ sypʔ mn ʔydwhy
30:23	wʔbdryh lmṣryn bʕmmʔ wʔdrʔ ʔnwn bmdyntʔ
30:24	wʔḥyl drʕwhy dmlkʔ dbbl wʔtl sypy bʔydwhy wnpswq/wnpsq#23#/ drʕwhy dprʕwn wnttnḥ tʔnḥtʔ dqṭylʔ qdmwhy
30:25	wʔʕšn drʕwhy dmlkʔ dbbl wdrʕwhy dprʕwn nplwn wndʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ mʔ dyhbt sypy bʔydwhy dmlkʔ dbbl wšmṭh ʕl ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
30:26	wʔbdryh lmṣryn bʕmmʔ wʔdrʔ ʔnwn bmdyntʔ wndʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ 
31:01	bšnt ḥdʕsrʔ byrḥʔ tlytyʔ bḥd byrḥʔ hwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
31:02	brnšʔ ʔmr lprʕwn mlkʔ dmṣryn wlʕwšnh lmn dmyt brbwtk
31:03	hʔ ʔtwryʔ ʔrzʔ dlbnn dšpyrn swkwhy wʕbyṭ ṭllh wrmʔ qwmth wbynt ʕbyṭʔ hwt mwʕyth
31:04	myʔ rbywhy wthwmʔ ʔrymh wʕl nhrwtʔ ḥdrt nṣbth wswkwhy ʔrmy ʕl klhwn ʔylnʔ ddbrʔ
31:05	mṭwl hnʔ ʔttrymt qwmth ṭb mn klhwn ʔylnʔ ddbrʔ wsgy srʕpyth wʔyrk swkwhy mn swgʔʔ dmyʔ drbywhy
31:06	bswkwhy ʔqnt klh prḥtʔ dšmyʔ wtḥyt ʕwpwhy yldt klh ḥywtʔ ddbrʔ wbṭllh ytbw ʕmmʔ sgyʔʔ
31:07	wšpyr hwʔ brbwth wbswgʔʔ dswkwhy mṭl dhww ʕqrwhy bmyʔ sgyʔʔ
31:08	ʔrzʔ lʔ ʕbrwhy bprdysh dʔlhʔ wʕrqʔ lʔ dmw lswkwhy wdwlbʔ lʔ hww ʔyk ʕwpwhy wkwl ʔyln bprdysh dʔlhʔ lʔ dmʔ lh bšwprh
31:09	špyrʔ ʕbdth bswgʔʔ dswkwhy wṭnw bh klhwn ʔylnʔ dʕdn prdysh/bprdysh#3#/ dʔlhʔ 
31:10	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ ʕl dʔttrym bqwmth wšwḥt mwʕyth bynt ʕbyṭʔ wʔttrym lbh brmwth
31:11	ʔšlmywhy byd tqypʔ dʕmmʔ wnʕbd lh ʔyk ḥṭyth wnwbdywhy
31:12	wnwbdwnh nwkryʔ ʕšynʔ dʕmmʔ wnrmwnh bṭwrʔ wbklhwn nḥlʔ npln swkwhy wnttbrn srʕpyth bklhwn nḥlʔ dʔrʕʔ wnḥtwn mn ṭllh klhwn ʕmmʔ dʔrʕʔ wnšbqwnh
31:13	wmʔ dnpl tškn ʕlwhy klh prḥtʔ dšmyʔ wtḥyt srʕpyth thwʔ klh ḥywtʔ ddbrʔ
31:14	dlʔ nttrymwn bqwmthwn klhwn ʔylnʔ dmyʔ wlʔ nšwḥn mwʕythwn bynt ʕbyṭʔ wlʔ nqwmwn wlʔ nhwwn ʔkwthwn kl dštyn myʔ mṭl dkwlhwn lmwtʔ ʔštlmw bʔrʕʔ tḥtytʔ bynt bnynšʔ dnḥtyn lgwbʔ
31:15	hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ bywmʔ dnḥt lšywl ʕbdt ʔblʔ wksyt ʕlwhy thwmʔ wklyt nhrwth wʔtklyw myʔ sgyʔʔ wʔkmrt ʕlwhy llbnn wklhwn ʔylnʔ ddbrʔ ʔtʕypw
31:16	mn qlʔ dmpwlth ʔttzyʕt ʔrʕʔ wkd ʔḥtth lšywl ʕm nḥty gwbʔ ʔtbyʔw bʔrʕʔ tḥtytʔ klhwn ʔylnʔ dʕdn wgbyʔ špyrʔ dlbnn dštyn myʔ
31:17	ʔp hnwn nḥtw ʕmh lšywl lwt qṭyly sypʔ wzrʕh ytbh bṭllh bynt/byt#3#/ ʕmmʔ
31:18	lʔynʔ mn ʔylnʔ dʕdn ʔtdmyt bšwbḥʔ wbrbwtʔ wnḥtt ʕm ʔylnʔ dʕdn lʔrʕʔ tḥtytʔ bynt ʕwrlʔ tškb ʕm ʔylyn dqṭylyn bsypʔ hnʔ hw prʕwn wklh ḥylh ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ 
32:01	bšnt ḥdʕsrʔ byrḥʔ dtrʕsr bḥd byrḥʔ hwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
32:02	brnšʔ ʔly ʔwlytʔ ʕl prʕwn mlkʔ dmṣryn wʔmr lh lʔryʔ dʕmmʔ ʔtdmyt wʔnt ʔyk tnynʔ ʔnt dymmʔ dqrt bnhrwtk wdlḥt myʔ brglyk wdšt nhrwthwn 
32:03	hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ hʔ prs ʔnʔ mṣydty ʕlyk bknwšyʔ dʕmmʔ sgyʔʔ wnsqwnk bmṣydty
32:04	wʔšdyk bʔrʕʔ wʕl ʔpy ḥqlʔ ʔsḥpk wʔškn ʕlyk klh prḥtʔ dšmyʔ wʔsbʕ mnk klh ḥywtʔ dʔrʕʔ

32:09	wʔ<t>ḥmt lbʔ dʕmmʔ sgyʔʔ mʔ dʔytyt tbrk byt ʕmmʔ wbmdyntʔ dlʔ ydʕ ʔnt lhyn
32:10	wʔtmh ʕlyk ʕmmʔ sgyʔʔ wmlkyhwn ndḥlwn mʔ dʔbrqt sypy ʕl ʔpyhwn wndḥlwn wntrhbwn ʔnš bnpšh bywmʔ dmpwltk

32:13	wʔwbd bʕyrh mn myʔ sgyʔʔ wtwb rglʔ dbrnšʔ lʔ tdlḥ ʔnwn ʔp lʔ prstʔ dbʕyrʔ

32:16	ʔwlytʔ hy wbnthwn dʕmmʔ ʔlyn lh ʕl mṣryn wʕl klh ʕwtrh nʔlynh ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ

32:19	mn myʔ bsymʔ ḥwt wdmk ʕm ʕwrlʔ

32:21	nmllwn ʕm gdwdyhwn šlyṭnʔ/šlyṭʔ#3#/ dʕmmʔ mn gw šywl wnḥtwn wnškbwn ʕwrlʔ ʕm qṭyly sypʔ
32:22	tmn ʔtwr wklh knšh/ḥylh#3#/ ḥdr qbrh klhwn qṭylʔ dnplw bsypʔ
32:23	dʕbdw qbrh bšpwly gwbʔ whwʔ knšh ḥdr qbrh klhwn qṭylʔ dnplw bsypʔ ʕl dʕbdw tbrʔ bʔrʕʔ dḥyʔ
32:24	tmn ʕylm wklh ḥylh ḥdr qbrh klhwn qṭylʔ dnplw bsypʔ wnḥtw ʕwrlʔ lʔrʕʔ tḥtytʔ ʕl dʕbdw tbrʔ bʔrʕʔ dḥyʔ wqblw ṣʕrhwn ʕm nḥty gwbʔ
32:25	wbynt/wbyt#3#/ qṭylʔ ʕbdw lh mškbʔ mṣʕt ḥylh wḥdyryn lqbrh kwlhwn ʕwrlʔ dqṭylyn bsypʔ ʕl dʕbdw tbrʔ bʔrʕʔ dḥyʔ wqblw ṣʕrhwn ʕm nḥty gwbʔ wbynt qṭylʔ ʔtḥšbw/ʔtḥbšw#3#/
32:26	tmn mšk wtwbyl wkwlh ḥylh ḥdr qbrh kwlhwn ʕwrlʔ dqṭylyn bsypʔ ʕl dʕbdw tbrʔ bʔrʕʔ dḥyʔ
32:27	lʔ nškbwn ʕm gnbrʔ dnplyn mn ʕwrlʔ dnḥtw lšywl bmʔny qrbhwn wsmw sypyhwn tḥyt ryšyhwn whwʔ ʕwlhwn ʕl grmyhwn ʕl dʕbdw bgnbrwthwn tbrʔ bʔrʕʔ dḥyʔ
32:28	ʔnt dyn bynt/byt#3#/ ʕwrlʔ tškb wtdmk ʕm qṭyly sypʔ

34:13	wʔpq ʔnyn mn ʕmmʔ wʔknš ʔnyn mn mdyntʔ wʔytʔ ʔnyn lʔrʕhyn wʔrʕʔ ʔnyn bṭwrʔ dʔysryl wbnḥlʔ wbklh ytbʔ dʔrʕʔ
34:14	byt rʕyʔ ṭbʔ ʔrʕʔ ʔnyn wbṭwrʔ rmʔ dʔysryl nhwʔ dyrhyn tmn nrbʕn bdyrʔ ṭbʔ wrʕyʔ šmynʔ nrʕyn bṭwrʔ dʔysryl

34:16	dʔbydʔ ʔbʕʔ wdṭʕyʔ ʔhpk wdtbyrʔ ʔʕṣwb wdkryhʔ ʔḥyl wdšmynʔ wdʕšynʔ ʔṭr wʔrʕʔ ʔnyn bdynʔ
34:17	lkyn dyn ʕny hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ hʔ dʔn ʔnʔ byt nqyʔ lnqyʔ wbyt dkrʔ ldkrʔ
34:18	lʔ spq lkwn rʕwtʔ rʕyʔ ṭbʔ drʕyn ʔntwn wšrkʔ drʕykwn dyšyn ʔntwn brglykwn wmyʔ štyn ʔntwn wšrkʔ dmwtryn ʔntwn dlḥyn ʔntwn brglykwn
34:19	wʕny rʕy dwšʔ drglykwn wʔšty myʔ ddlḥ rglykwn
34:20	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ hʔ dʔn ʔnʔ byt nqyʔ šmyntʔ lnqyʔ mḥyltʔ
34:21	ʕl dsḥpn hwy bgbyhyn wbktpthyn wbqrnthyn mdqrn hwy lklhyn kryhtʔ ʕdmʔ dbdr ʔnyn lbr
34:22	wʔprqyh lʕny wtwb lʔ thwʔ lhwn lbztʔ wʔdwn byt nqyʔ lnqyʔ wbyt dkrʔ ldkrʔ
34:23	wʔqym ʕlyhyn rʕyʔ wnrʕʔ ʔnyn dwyd ʕbdy hw nrʕʔ ʔnyn whw nhwʔ lhyn rʕyʔ
34:24	wʔnʔ mryʔ ʔhwʔ lhwn ʔlhʔ wdwyd ʕbdy nhwʔ šlyṭʔ bynthwn
34:25	wʔqym lhwn qymʔ dšlmʔ wʔbṭl ḥywtʔ byštʔ mn ʔrʕʔ wnʕmrwn bmdbrʔ bšlyʔ wndmkwn bʕbʔ
34:26	wʔtl lhwn bwrkty ḥdr rmty wʔḥt mṭrʔ bzbnh wnhwʔ mṭrʔ dbwrktʔ
34:27	wʔylnʔ dʔrʕʔ nʕbdwn pʔrʔ wʔrʕʔ ttl ʕllth wntbwn bʔrʕhwn bsbrʔ wndʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ mʔ dtbrt nyrhwn wpṣyt ʔnwn mn ʔydʔ dmšʕbdnyhwn
34:28	wtwb lʔ nhwwn bztʔ lʕmmʔ ʔp lʔ tʔkwl ʔnwn ḥywt brʔ wntbwn bsbrʔ wlʔ nhwʔ lhwn mhrnʔ
34:29	wʔqym lhwn nṣbtʔ dšlmʔ wtwb lʔ nštnqwn bkpnʔ bʔrʕʔ wtwb lʔ nqblwn ḥsdʔ dʕmmʔ
34:30	wndʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhhwn whnwn ʔnwn ʕmy dbyt ʔysryl ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ
34:31	ʔntyn dyn ʕny ʕnʔ dmrʕyty bny ʔnšʔ ʔntyn wʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkyn ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ 
35:01	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr
35:02	brnšʔ sym ʔpyk lṭwrʔ dsʕyr wʔtnbʔ ʕlwhy
35:03	wʔmr lh hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ hʔ ʔnʔ ʕlyk ṭwrʔ dsʕyr wʔrym ʔydy ʕlyk wʔʕbdk lḥblʔ wltmhʔ

35:05	ʕl dhwt lk bʕldbbwtʔ lʕlm wʔšlmt lbny ʔysryl lʔydʔ dsypʔ bzbnʔ dʕqthwn wbzbnʔ dʕwlʔ dqṣhwn
35:06	mṭl hnʔ ḥy ʔnʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ dlmʔ ʔʕbdk wdmʔ nrdpk dmʔ dsnyt hw dmʔ nrdpk

35:10	ʕl dʔmrt dtryn ʕmmyn/mlkyn#3#/ wtrtyn mlkwn dyly ʔnyn wʔnʔ ʔrt ʔnyn wmryʔ tmn hwʔ
35:11	mṭl hnʔ ḥy ʔnʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ dʔʕbd lk ʔyk rwgzk wʔyk bʕldbbwtk dʕbdt wsnyt ʔnwn wʔtglʔ bhwn mʔ ddʔn ʔnʔ lk
35:12	wtdʕ dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ šmʕt kwlh gwdpk dʔmrt ʕl ṭwrʔ dʔysryl dḥrbyn ʔnwn wmʔkwltʔ ʔnwn dyln
35:13	wʔwrktwn ʕly pwmkwn wʔsgytwn ʕly mlykwn wʔnʔ šmʕt

35:15	ʕl dḥdyt lyrtwtʔ dbyt ʔysryl dḥrbt hknʔ ʔʕbd lk lḥblʔ thwʔ ṭwrʔ dsʕyr wʔdwm klh wndʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ
36:01	wʔnt <dyn#3#> br ʔnšʔ ʔtnbʔ ʕl ṭwrʔ dʔysryl wʔmr lṭwrʔ dʔysrʔyl šmʕw ptgmh \dmrʔ mrwtʔ /dmryʔ#3#/
36:02	hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ ʕl dʔmr ʕlykwn bʕldbbʔ ʔḥny wʔmr drmtʔ/rmtʔ#3#/ dmn ʕlm dyln ʔnyn ywrtnʔ/ywtrnʔ#3#/
36:03	mṭl hnʔ ʔtnbʔ wʔmr hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ ʕl dʔṣṭʕrtwn wʔtḥrbtwn wʔtgdptwn mn ʔylyn dḥdyryn lkwn whwytwn ywrtnʔ lšrkʔ dʕmmʔ wnpltwn bmmllʔ dlšnʔ wbrnyʔ dʕmmʔ
36:04	mṭl hnʔ šmʕw ptgmh dmrʔ mrwtʔ ṭwrʔ dʔysrʔyl hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ lṭwrʔ wlrmtʔ wlnḥlʔ wlʕwmqʔ wlḥrbtʔ dṣdyn wlmdyntʔ dʔštbq whwy/dhwy#3#/ lbztʔ wlmwyqʔ lšrkʔ dʕmmʔ dḥdyryn lhwn
36:05	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ bnwrʔ dṭnny mllt ʕl šrkʔ dʕmmʔ wʕl klh ʔdwm ʕl dʕbdw lhwn ʔrʕy lywrtnʔ/ywrtnʔ#3#/ bḥdwtʔ dlbhwn ṣʕrw npštʔ dnšbwn ʔnyn wnbzwn ʔnyn
36:06	mṭl hnʔ ʔtnbʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ dʔysryl wʔmr lṭwrʔ wlrmtʔ wlnḥlʔ wlʕwmqʔ hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ hʔ ʔnʔ mllt bṭnny wbḥmty ʕl dqbltwn ḥsdʔ dʕmmʔ
36:07	mṭl hnʔ hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ <hʔ#3#> ʔnʔ ʔrymt ʔydʔ ʕl ʕmmʔ dḥdyryn lkwn dnqblwn ḥsdhwn

36:16	whwʔ ʕly ptgmh dmryʔ lmʔmr

37:19	ʔmr lhwn hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ hʔ <ʔnʔ#3#> nsb ʔnʔ qysʔ dywsp dbʔydh dʔprym wšbṭʔ dʔysryl/dbny ʔysryl#3#/ ḥbrwhy wʔtl ʔnwn ʕm/ʕl#3#/ qysʔ dyhwdʔ wʔʕbd ʔnwn ḥd qys wnhwwn ḥd bʔydy

37:21	wʔmr lhwn hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ hʔ nsb ʔnʔ lbny ʔysryl mn bynt ʕmmʔ dʔzlw lwthwn/btrhwn#3#/ wʔknš ʔnwn wʔytʔ ʔnwn lʔrʕhwn

38:12	dtšbʔ šbytʔ wtbwz bztʔ wthpk/wthpwk#3#/ ʔydk ʕl ḥrbtʔ dʔtytb wʕl ʕmʔ dʔtknš mn ʕmmʔ dqnw bʕyrʔ wqnynʔ wytbyn ʕl šwprh dʔrʕʔ
38:13	šbʔ wdrn wtgrʔ dtršyš wklhyn qwryʔ nʔmrn lk ʔtyt lmšbʔ šbytʔ wlmbz bztʔ wknšt knwšyk dtšqwl/lmšql#3#/ sʔmʔ wdhbʔ wtsb bʕyrʔ wqnynʔ wtdbr dbrtʔ rbtʔ
38:14	mṭl hnʔ ʔtnbʔ brnšʔ wʔmr lgwg hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ bh bywmʔ dntb ʕmy ʔysryl bšlyʔ tdʕ
38:15	wtʔtʔ mn ʔtrk mn špwly grbyʔ wʕmmʔ sgyʔʔ dʕmk klhwn rkby rkšʔ knwšyʔ rbʔ wḥylʔ sgyʔʔ
38:16	wtsq ʕl ʕmy ʔysryl ʔyk ʕnnʔ dmksyʔ lʔrʕʔ lḥrtʔ dywmtʔ tʔtʔ wʔytyk lʔrʕy dndʕwnny/wndʕwnny#3#/ ʕmmʔ mʔ dʔtqdšt bk lʕnyhwn
38:17	hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ ʔnt hw dʔmrt ʕlyk bywmtʔ qdmyʔ bʔydʔ dʕbdy nbyʔ dʔysryl dmtnbyn hww bywmtʔ hnwn wbšnyʔ hlyn dʔytyk ʕlyhwn

39:01	wʔnt brnšʔ ʔtnbʔ ʕl gwg wʔmr hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ hʔ ʔnʔ ʕlyk gwg mdbrnʔ wryšʔ dmšk wdtwbyl

40:01	bšnt ʕsryn wḥmš <šnyn#3#> dšbytn bryš šntʔ bʕsrtʔ byrḥʔ bšnt ʔrbʕsrʔ btr dʔtḥrbt mdyntʔ bh bywmʔ hnʔ hwt ʕly ʔydh dmryʔ

40:03	wʔytyny ltmn wḥzyt gbrʔ wḥzwh ʔyk ḥzwʔ dnḥšʔ wšwytʔ dktnʔ bʔydh wqnyʔ dmšwḥtʔ wqʔm hwʔ btrʕʔ

40:47	wmšḥ ldrtʔ ʔwrkh mʔʔ ʔmyn wptyh mʔʔ ʔmyn mrbʕʔyt wmdbḥʔ ʔyt hwʔ qdm bytʔ
40:48	wʔytyny lʔskwpth dbytʔ wmšḥ lʔskwptʔ ḥmš ʔmyn mkʔ wḥmš ʔmyn mkʔ wptyh dtrʕʔ tlt ʔmyn mkʔ wtlt ʔmyn mkʔ

41:01	wʔʕlny lhyklʔ wmšḥh lprwstdʔ št ʔmyn ptyh mkʔ wšt ʔmyn ptyh mkʔ wptyh dmšknʔ

41:03	wʕl lgw wmšḥh ltrʕʔ/lprwstdʔ dtrʕʔ#3#/ trtyn ʔmyn wtrʕʔ št ʔmyn wptyh šbʕ ʔmyn

41:12	wbnynʔ dqdm gzyrtʔ dbtrʕʔ mʕrbyʔ ptyh šbʕyn/šbʕ#3#/ ʔmyn wʔsth dbnynʔ ḥmš ʔmyn ptyʔ kd ḥdr wʔwrkʔ tšʕyn ʔmyn

41:17	wkwʔ mksyn lʕl mn trʕʔ dbytʔ gwyʔ wlbr lklhyn ʔsʔ kd ḥdr mšḥ mn lbr wmn lgw

41:20	\mn ʔrʕʔ wʕdmʔ lʕl /wmn trʕʔ wlʕl#3#/ mn trʕʔ krwbʔ wdqlʔ ʕbydyn
41:21	wʔsth dhyklʔ mʕrbʔ/mrbʕʔ#3#/ hwt wʔpy qwdšʔ dḥzwʔ
41:22	ʔyk ḥzwh dmdbḥʔ dqysʔ tlt ʔmyn rwmh wʔwrkh trtyn ʔmyn wqrntʔ ʔyt lh wʔwrkh wtykwhy dqysʔ wʔmr ly hnw ptwrʔ dqdm mryʔ
41:23	wtryn tryn trʕyn lmrbbʔ
41:24	tryn lmrbbʔ ḥd wtryn lmrbbʔ ʔḥrnʔ
41:25	wʕbyd ʕlyhwn ʕl trʕʔ dhyklʔ krwbʔ wdqlʔ ʔyk <hlyn#3#> dʕbydyn bʔsʔ wʔpwhy dprwstdʔ qrymn qysʔ mn lbr
41:26	wkwʔ šṭypn wdqlʔ ʔyt mkʔ wmkʔ ʕl sṭrwhy dprwstdʔ wdpnth dbytʔ qrymn dpʔ
42:01	wʔpqny ldrtʔ brytʔ lʔwrḥʔ dgrbyʔ wʔʕlny lʔksdrʔ dlwqbl gzyrtʔ wlwqbl bnynʔ grbyyʔ
42:02	lwqbl ʔwrkʔ dʔmʔ dtrʕʔ grbyyʔ wptyʔ ḥmšyn ʔmyn
42:03	lwqbl trʕʔ ddrtʔ gwytʔ wlwqbl drgʔ ddrtʔ brytʔ dbnyn ḥd ʕl ḥd ʕl tltʔ dryn
42:04	wqdm ʔksdrʔ byt hlktʔ ʕsr ʔmyn ptyʔ wʔwrkʔ mʔʔ ʔmyn wtrʕʔ dbyt hlktʔ lgrbyʔ
42:05	wʔksdrʔ ʕlytʔ zʕwryn hwy mṭl dʕʔlyn hww bhyn drgʔ
42:06	mtltn hwy gyr wlyt hww lhyn ʕmwdʔ ʔyk ʕmwdʔ ddrtʔ
42:07	mṭl hnʔ zʕwryn hwy mn tḥtytʔ wmn mṣʕytʔ wbʔstʔ dlbr dlwqbl ʔksdrʔ ʔwrkʔ ḥmšyn ʔmyn

42:09	wtrʕʔ dʔksdrʔ dmʕlnʔ mdnḥyʔ dʕʔl ldrtʔ brytʔ
42:10	bptyh dʔstʔ ddrtʔ mʕlnʔ/bmʕlnʔ#23#/ mdnḥyʔ qdm gzyrtʔ wqdm bnynʔ dʔksdrʔ
42:11	wʔwrḥʔ qdmyhyn wḥzwʔ dʔksdrʔ dbʔwrḥʔ dgrbyʔ ʔwrkhyn ʔyk ptyhyn wklhwn mpqnyhyn wmʕlnyhyn wḥzwhyn wtrʕyhyn
42:12	ʔyk trʕʔ dʔksdrʔ dbʔwrḥʔ dtymnʔ trʕʔ bryš ʔwrḥʔ ʔwrḥʔ bʔpy ʔstʔ dbʔwrḥʔ dnḥlʔ mdnḥyʔ ʔyk dʔtʔ
42:13	wʔmr ly ʔksdrʔ dgrbyʔ wʔksdrʔ dtymnʔ dqdm gzyrtʔ hlyn ʔnyn ʔksdrʔ ʔtr/dʔtr#3#/ dʔklyn khnʔ dmqrbyn lmryʔ qdwš qwdšʔ tmn symyn qdwš qwdšʔ wsmydʔ wtdkytʔ dḥṭhʔ mṭl dʔtrʔ hw qdyšʔ
42:14	wmʔ dʕʔlyn khnʔ lʔ npqyn mn qwdšʔ ldrtʔ brytʔ ʔlʔ tmn symyn mʔnyhwn hnwn dmšmšyn bhwn mṭwl dqwdšʔ ʔnwn wlbšyn mʔnʔ ʔḥrnʔ wmqrbyn qwrbnʔ ḥlp ʕmʔ
42:15	wšlm mwšḥth dbytʔ gwyʔ wʔpqny lʔwrḥʔ dtrʕʔ dḥʔr lmdnḥʔ wmšḥh kd ḥdr

43:01	wʔwblny ltrʕʔ dḥʔr lmdnḥʔ
43:02	whʔ šwbḥh dʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʔtʔ mn ʔwrḥʔ dmdnḥʔ wqlh ʔyk qlʔ dmyʔ sgyʔʔ wʔrʕʔ nhrt mn šwbḥh
43:03	ʔyk ḥzwʔ dḥzyt kd ʔtyt lmḥblw lmdyntʔ wʔyk ḥzwʔ dḥzyt ʕl nhr`kbr wnplt ʕl ʔpy

43:07	wʔmr ly br ʔnšʔ ʔtrʔ dkwrsy wʔtrʔ dprstʔ drgly dšrʔ ʔnʔ bynt/byt#3#/ bny ʔysryl lʕlm wtwb lʔ ntṭnpwn dbyt ʔysryl wtwb lʔ nṭnpwn šmʔ dqwdšy hnwn wmlkyhwn bznywthwn wbšldʔ dmlkyhwn wbptkryhwn
43:08	dʕbdyn hww trʕyhwn ʕl gnb trʕy wspyhwn ʕl gnb spy wʔstʔ hwt byny wlhwn wṭnpw šmʔ dqwdšy bʕwlʔ dʕbdw wʔsypt ʔnwn brwgzy
43:09	mkyl nrḥqwn znywthwn wšldʔ dmlkyhwn mn qdmy wʔšrʔ bynthwn lʕlm 
43:10	wʔnt dyn brnšʔ ḥwyhy lbytʔ hnʔ lbyt/ldbyt#3#/ ʔysryl wnttkswn mn ʕwlhwn dʔʕlyw by wnmšḥwnh ldmwth
43:11	wʔn ʔttksw mn mdm dʕbdw ṣwrth dbytʔ wṭwybh wmʕlnwhy wmpqnwhy wkwlh ṣwrth wklhwn nmwswhy wklhyn ṣwrth ḥwʔ ʔnwn wršwm lʕnyhwn dnṭrwn klhyn ṣwrth wkwlh rwšmh wnʕbdwn ʔnwn
43:12	hnw ḥzwʔ dbytʔ ʕl/dʕl#3#/ ryš ṭwrʔ wklhwn tḥwmwhy kd ḥdryn qdwš qwdšʔ ʔnwn
43:13	hlyn mwšḥth dmdbḥʔ bʔmtʔ dʔmʔ wpšk ʕwbh dʔmtʔ ʔmʔ wtykʔ ʔyt lspth zrt kd ḥdr whknʔ bgbh
43:14	wmn ʔrʕʔ wʕdmʔ ltykʔ tḥtyʔ trtyn ʔmyn wptyh ʔmtʔ ḥdʔ wmn tykʔ tḥtyʔ wʕdmʔ lʕlyʔ ʔrbʕ ʔmyn wptyʔ ʔmʔ

43:19	wʔtl lkhnʔ wllwyʔ dmn zrʕh dṣdwq dmtqrbyn lwty ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ lmšmšwtny twrʔ br bqrʔ <dlyt bh mwmʔ#3#> ltdkytʔ dḥṭhʔ

44:01	wʔhpkny lʔwrḥʔ dtrʕʔ bryʔ dmqdšʔ dḥʔr lmdnḥʔ wḥzyth dʔḥyd

45:03	wmn hdʔ mšwḥtʔ ʔwrkʔ ʕsryn wḥmšʔ ʔlpyn wptyʔ ʕsrʔ ʔlpyn wbh nhwʔ qdwš qwdšʔ
45:04	wqwdšʔ dʔrʕʔ nhwʔ lkhnʔ dmšmšyn bmqdšh/lmqdšh#3#/ dmryʔ wmtqrbyn lmšmšwth lmryʔ wnhwʔ lhwn ʔtrʔ lbtʔ wmqdšʔ lmqdšʔ

45:08	nhwʔ ywrtnʔ lbny ʔysryl wtwb lʔ nhrwn ʔnwn mdbrnʔ dʕmy wʔrʕʔ ntlwn lbny ʔysryl lšrbthwn 
45:09	hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ kdw lkwn rwrbnʔ dʔysryl ʔʕbrw mnkwn ḥṭwpyʔ wbztʔ wʕbdw dynʔ wzdyqwtʔ wʔprqw šwʕbdkwn mn ʕmy ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ
45:10	msʔtʔ dqwštʔ wkyltʔ/wkylʔ#3#/ dqwštʔ wmtqlʔ dqwštʔ nhwwn lkwn
45:11	kyltʔ wmtqlʔ tqnw dthwwn šqlyn mʕsrʔ ḥd mn ʕsrʔ šwyʔyt
45:12	wmtqlʔ nhwwn ʕsryn mtqlʔ mnhwn ʕsryn wḥmš mʕyn wmtqlʔ dḥmštʕsr nhwʔ lkwn mnyʔ
45:13	hnʔ pwršnʔ prwšw ḥdʔ mn št mnwth dkwrʔ dḥṭʔ wḥdʔ mn št mnwth dkwrʔ dsʕrʔ
45:14	wmšḥʔ mn ʕsr kyln dhwʔ/whwʔ#3#/ kwrʔ nsbwn mʕsrʔ kyltʔ/dkyltʔ#3#/ ḥdʔ
45:15	wḥdʔ <ḥdʔ#3#> nqyʔ mn mʔtyn ʕnʔ dʔysrʔyl lsmydʔ wlqwrbnʔ wlyqdʔ šlmʔ dndkʔ/wndkʔ#2#/ ʔnwn ʔmr \mrʔ mrwtʔ /mryʔ#3#/
45:16	klh ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ npršwn pwršnʔ hnʔ lmdbrnʔ dʔysryl
45:17	wdmdbrnʔ nhwwn yqdʔ šlmʔ wsmydʔ wnwqyʔ bryš yrḥʔ wbšbʔ wbklhwn ʕdʕʔdʔ/ʕʔdʔ#3#/ dbyt ʔysryl hw nqrb tdkytʔ dḥṭhʔ wsmydʔ <wnwqyʔ#3#> wyqdʔ šlmʔ qwrbnʔ dmdkʔ lbny ʔysryl
45:18	hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ bḥd byrḥʔ qdmyʔ sb twrʔ <ḥd#3#> br bqrʔ dlyt bh mwmʔ wdkyhy lmqdšʔ
45:19	wnsb khnʔ mn dmʔ dtdkytʔ wnrws ʕl ʔskpth dbytʔ wʕl ʔrbʕ zwyth dmdbḥʔ wʕl ʔskwptʔ <gwytʔ#3#> dtrʕʔ ddrtʔ gwytʔ/#3#/
45:20	whknʔ nhwʔ ʕbd bšbʕtʔ byrḥʔ gbrʔ dšṭʔ wṭʕʔ wndkwnh lbytʔ
45:21	wbʔrbʕsrʔ byrḥʔ qdmyʔ nhwʔ lkwn pṣḥʔ wʕdʕʔdʔ wšbʕʔ ywmyn pṭyrʔ tʔklwn
45:22	wnqrb mdbrnʔ bh bywmʔ hw ʕl ʔpy npšh wʕl ʔpy klh ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ twrʔ <br bqrʔ#3#> ltdkytʔ dḥṭhʔ
45:23	wšbʕʔ ywmwhy dʕdʕʔdʔ nqrb yqdʔ šlmʔ lmryʔ šbʕʔ twryn wšbʕʔ dkryn dlyt bhwn mwmʔ ltdkytʔ dḥṭhʔ wṣpryʔ dʕzʔ bywmʔ
45:24	wsmydʔ sʔtʔ ltwrʔ wsʔtʔ ldkrʔ wmšḥʔ hmynʔ lsʔtʔ
45:25	wbḥmšʕsrʔ byrḥʔ dšbʕʔ nʕbd ʕdʕʔdʔ ʔyk hlyn šbʕʔ ywmyn ʔyk tdkytʔ dḥṭhʔ wʔyk yqdʔ šlmʔ wʔyk smydʔ wʔyk mšḥʔ
46:01	hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ trʕʔ ddrtʔ gwytʔ dḥʔr lmdnḥʔ nhwʔ ʔḥyd štʔ ywmyn dmtʕbd bhwn ʕbdʔ wbywmʔ dšbtʔ/dšbʕʔ#3#/ ntptḥ wbywmʔ dryš yrḥʔ ntptḥ
46:02	wnʕwl mdbrnʔ bmʕlnʔ dʔskwptʔ dtrʕʔ mn lbr wnqwm ʕl ʔskwpth dtrʕʔ wnqrbwn khnʔ yqdwhy šlmʔ wqwrbnwhy wnsgwd bʔskwptʔ dtrʕʔ wnpwq wtrʕʔ lʔ nttḥd ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ
46:03	wnsgdwn ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ bmʕlnh dtrʕʔ hw bšbʔ dbryš yrḥʔ qdm mryʔ
46:04	wyqdʔ šlmʔ dmqrb mdbrnʔ qdm mryʔ bywmʔ dšbtʔ štʔ ʔmryn dlyt bhwn mwmʔ wdkrʔ dlyt bh mwmʔ
46:05	wsmydʔ nʕbd sʔtʔ ltwrʔ wsʔtʔ ldkrʔ wlʔmrʔ ʔyk dmṭʔ bʔydwhy mšḥʔ dyn hmynʔ lsʔtʔ
46:06	wbywmʔ dryš yrḥʔ twrʔ dlyt bh mwmʔ wštʔ ʔmryn dlyt bhwn mwmʔ wdkrʔ dlyt bh mwmʔ
46:07	wsmydʔ nʕbd sʔtʔ ltwrʔ wsʔtʔ ldkrʔ wlʔmrʔ ʔyk dmṭʔ bʔydwhy mšḥʔ dyn hmynʔ lsʔtʔ
46:08	wmʔ dʕʔl mdbrnʔ bʔskwpth dtrʕʔ nʕwl wbh npwq
46:09	wmʔ dʕʔlyn ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ qdm mryʔ bzbnʔ dʕdʕʔdʔ mn wʕʔl btrʕʔ grbyyʔ lmsgd npwq lh btrʕʔ tymnyʔ wmn dʕʔl btrʕʔ tymnyʔ npwq lh btrʕʔ grbyyʔ wlʔ nhpwk btrʕʔ dʕʔl ʔlʔ lqwblh npwq
46:10	mdbrnʔ dyn dbynthwn btrʕʔ dʕʔl bh npwq
46:11	wbzbnʔ dʕdʕʔdʔ nhwʔ smydʔ sʔtʔ ltwrʔ wsʔtʔ ldkrʔ wlʔmrʔ ʔnš ʔyk dmṭʔ bʔydwhy mšḥʔ dyn hmynʔ lsʔtʔ
46:12	wmʔ dmqrb mdbrnʔ yqdʔ šlmʔ ʔw qwrbnʔ pwršnʔ lmryʔ ntptḥ/nptḥ#3#/ lh \trʕʔ dḥʔr lmdnḥʔ /trʕʔ dmdnḥʔ#3#/ dʔḥyd wnqrb yqdwhy šlmʔ wqwrbnwhy wnʔḥdywhy ltrʕʔ whydyn npwq ʔyk dʕbd bywmʔ dšbtʔ
46:13	wʔmrʔ br šntʔ dlyt bh mwmʔ nhwʔ mqrb bywmʔ yqdʔ šlmʔ lmryʔ mn ṣpr lṣpr
46:14	wsmydʔ nqrb ʕlwhy mn ṣpr lṣpr ḥd mn štʔ lsʔtʔ wmšḥʔ ḥdʔ mn tlt mnwth dhmynʔ lmplh lsmydʔ lmryʔ nmwsʔ lʕlm ʔmynʔyt
46:15	wnqrbwn ʔmrʔ wsmydʔ wmšḥʔ mn ṣpr lṣpr yqdʔ šlmʔ ʔmynʔyt
46:16	hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ mdbrnʔ kd ntl mwhbtʔ lḥd mn bnwhy yrtwth lbnwhy thwʔ
46:17	wkd ntl mwhbtʔ mn yrtwth/ywrtnh#3#/ lḥd mn ʕbdwhy thwʔ lh ʕdmʔ lšntʔ dmtḥrr wthwʔ lh lmdbrnʔ yrtwtʔ dyn dbnwhy lhwn thwʔ
46:18	wlʔ nsb mdbrnʔ mn yrtwth dʕmʔ wlʔ nʕlwb ʔnwn mn ywrtnhwn/yrtwthwn#3#/ ʔlʔ mn yrtwth nwrt lbnwhy dlʔ/wlʔ#3#/ ntbdrwn ʕmy ʔnš mn ywrtnh/yrtwth#3#/
46:19	wʔʕlny bmʕlnʔ dʕl gnb trʕʔ dʔksdrʔ gwytʔ dqwdšʔ dkhnʔ dḥyrʔ lgrbyʔ wḥzyt dʔyt tmn ʔtrʔ bšpwlyh \mn mʕrbʔ /dmʕrbʔ#3#/
46:20	wʔmr ly <brnšʔ#3#> hnw ʔtrʔ dmbšlyn bh khnʔ tdkytʔ dḥṭhʔ wʔpyn bh smydʔ dlʔ npqwn ldrtʔ brytʔ wnqdšwnh lʕmʔ
46:21	wʔpqny ldrtʔ brytʔ wʔʕbrny ʕl ʔrbʕʔ sṭryh ddrtʔ wḥzyt drtʔ bsṭr drtʔ wdrtʔ ʔḥrtʔ bsṭrʔ ʔḥrnʔ ddrtʔ
46:22	bʔrbʕʔ sṭryh ddrtʔ drʔ dqdqtʔ ʔrbʕyn ʔmyn ʔwrkhyn wtltyn <ʔmyn#3#> ptyhyn
46:23	wʔksdrʔ ḥdrn <hwy#3#> lʔrbʕtyhyn
46:24	wʔmr ly hnw byt ṭbḥʔ dmbšlyn bh dbḥtʔ dʕmʔ mšmšnwhy dbytʔ 
47:01	wʔhpk/whpk#3#/ ʔʕlyny/wʔʕlyny#3#/ ltrʕh/btrʕʔ#3#/ dbytʔ wḥzyt myʔ dnpqyn mn tḥyt ʔskwptʔ mdnḥytʔ dbytʔ whnwn myʔ nḥtyn mn sṭrh dbytʔ mn tymnyh dmdbḥʔ
47:02	wʔpqny btrʕʔ grbyyʔ wʔkrkny mn lbr ʕl trʕʔ ddrtʔ dḥʔr lmdnḥʔ wḥzyt myʔ dnpqyn sṭrh dymynʔ
47:03	wkd npq gbrʔ mšbḥ/mšyḥ#3#/ wmšwḥtʔ bʔydh wmšḥ ʔlp ʔmyn wʔʕbrny bmyʔ ʕdmʔ lqwrṣlʔ
47:04	wmšḥ ʔlp ʔmyn wʔʕbrny bmyʔ ʕdmʔ lbwrkʔ wmšḥ ʔlp ʔmyn wʔʕbrny bmyʔ ʕdmʔ lḥṣʔ
47:05	wmšḥ ʔlp ʔmyn ʔrgltʔ dlʔ ʔnš mškḥ lmʕbrh mṭl dsgyw myʔ wʕšnt ʔrgltʔ wlʔ ʔnš mškḥ lmʕbrh
47:06	wʔmr ly ḥzʔ ʔnt brnšʔ wʔwblny wʔwtbny ʕl spth drgltʔ
47:07	wkd ytbt hḥyt ʕl spth dʔrgltʔ ʔylnʔ dṭb sgyʔyn mkʔ wmkʔ
47:08	wʔmr ly myʔ hlyn dnpqyn lglylʔ/lgyglʔ#3#/ dbmdnḥʔ/dlmdnḥʔ#3#/ wnḥtyn lgrbyʔ wnplyn bymʔ bmyʔ sryʔ wbsmyn myʔ
47:09	wkl npšʔ ḥytʔ dmwldʔ ʔtr dʔyt myʔ drgltʔ ḥyyn whwyn nwnʔ sgyʔʔ mṭl myʔ hnwn dnplyn tmn/ltmn#3#/ wbsmyn myʔ
47:10	wqymyn ʕlwhy ṣydʔ mn ʕyn gd wʕdmʔ lʕyn ʕglyn mšṭḥʔ lmṣydtʔ nhwʔ wnhwwn bh nwnʔ sgyʔʔ ʔyk dymʔ rbʔ
47:11	wmpqnwhy wmʕlnwhy lʔ nbsmwn ʔlʔ nhwwn mlḥʔ
47:12	wbh bʔrgltʔ nšwḥwn ʕl spryh mkʔ wmkʔ kl ʔyln dmʔkwltʔ lʔ ntrwn ṭrpyhwn wlʔ ngmrwn pʔryhwn wbkl ryš yrḥʔ nhwwn mbkryn mṭl dmyʔ dštyn mn mqdšʔ npqyn nhwwn pʔryhwn lmʔkl/lmʔkwltʔ#3#/ wṭrpyhwn lʔsywtʔ
47:13	hknʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ nḥlʔ dtḥwmʔ dyrtyn lh lʔrʕʔ ltrʕsr šbṭʔ dʔysryl wdywsp lḥblʔ
47:14	dtʔrtwnh ʔnš mn ʔḥwhy dʔrymt ʔydy lmtlh lʔbhykwn wttplg lkwn ʔrʕʔ lywrtnʔ
47:15	whnʔ hw tḥwmʔ dʔrʕʔ lgrbyʔ mn ymʔ rbʔ ʔwrḥʔ dḥtrwn dʕʔlʔ lṣdd
47:16	wḥmt wbrwt wsprwym dbynt tḥwmʔ ddrmswq wbynt tḥwmʔ dḥmt wḥṣr mṣʕytʔ dbtḥwmʔ dḥwrn
47:17	wnhwʔ tḥwmʔ mn ymʔ lḥṣr ʕynn dbtḥwmʔ ddrmswq wṣpwn dbgrbyʔ dbtḥwmʔ dḥmt hdʔ hy rwḥʔ dgrbyʔ
47:18	wmn rwḥʔ dmdnḥʔ mn byt/bynt#3#/ ḥwrn wmn byt drmswq wmn byt glʕd wmn byt ʔrʕʔ dʔysryl wywrdnn mtḥm ʕl/ʕm#3#/ ymʔ mdnḥyʔ/dmdnḥyʔ#3#/ dtmr hdʔ hy rwḥʔ dmdnḥʔ
47:19	wrwḥʔ dtymnʔ mn tmr wʕdmʔ lmy mrybt qdyš ywrtnh dymʔ rbʔ
47:20	wmtḥm ʕdmʔ lnkḥ dʔyt bmʕlnʔ dḥmt hdʔ hy rwḥʔ dmʕrbʔ
47:21	wtplgwnh lʔrʕʔ hdʔ lšrbtʔ dʔysrʔyl
47:22	wmʔ dplgtwnh yrtwtʔ/ywrtnʔ#3#/ lkwn wlʔylyn dmtpnyn lwty dʕmryn byntkwn wʔwldw bnyʔ byntkwn wnhwwn ʔyk bny ʔysryl wʕmkwn nplgwn yrtwtʔ bynt šrbtʔ dʔysryl
47:23	wšrbtʔ dʔyt bh ʔynʔ dmtpnʔ lwty bh ntlwn lh yrtwtʔ ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ 
48:01	whlyn šmhʔ dšbṭʔ mn ḥrtʔ dgrbyʔ ʕl yd ʔwrḥʔ dḥtrwn dbmʕlnʔ/dmʕlnʔ#3#/ dḥmt wdḥṣr ʕynn wtḥwmʔ ddrmswq dbgrbyʔ dʕl yd ḥmt hdʔ hy rwḥʔ dmdnḥy/dbmdnḥy#3#/ ymʔ ddn
48:02	wʕl tḥwmʔ ddn mn rwḥʔ dmdnḥʔ wʕdmʔ lrwḥʔ dmʕrbʔ dʔšyr
48:03	wʕl tḥwmʔ dʔšyr mn rwḥʔ/tḥwmʔ#3#/ dmdnḥʔ wʕdmʔ lrwḥʔ dmʕrbʔ dnptly
48:04	wʕl tḥwmʔ dnptly mn rwḥʔ dmdnḥʔ wʕdmʔ lrwḥʔ dmʕrbʔ dmnšʔ
48:05	wʕl tḥwmʔ dmnšʔ mn rwḥʔ dmdnḥʔ wʕdmʔ lrwḥʔ dmʕrbʔ drwbyl
48:07	wʕl tḥwmʔ drwbyl mn rwḥʔ dmdnḥʔ wʕdmʔ lrwḥʔ dmʕrbʔ dyhwdʔ
48:08	wʕl tḥwmʔ dyhwdʔ mn rwḥʔ dmdnḥʔ wʕdmʔ lrwḥʔ dmʕrbʔ nhwʔ pwršnʔ dpršyn ʔntwn ptyʔ ʕsryn wḥmšʔ ʔlpyn wʔwrkʔ ʔyk ḥdʔ mn mnwtʔ wmn rwḥʔ dmdnḥʔ wʕdmʔ lrwḥʔ dmʕrbʔ nhwʔ mqdšʔ bgwh
48:09	pwršnʔ dpršyn ʔntwn lmryʔ ʔwrkʔ ʕsryn wḥmšʔ ʔlpyn wptyʔ ʕsrʔ ʔlpyn
48:10	wlkhnʔ nhwʔ pwršnʔ dqwdšʔ lgrbyʔ ʕsryn wḥmšʔ ʔlpyn wptyʔ ʕsrʔ ʔlpyn wlmʕrbʔ ʕsrʔ ʔlpyn wlmdnḥʔ ʕsrʔ ʔlpyʔ wtymnʔ ʕsryn wḥmšʔ ʔlpyn wnhwʔ mqdšh dmryʔ bgwh
48:11	wnhwʔ lkhnʔ dmtqdšyn mn bny ṣdwq dnṭrw nṭwrty/nṭwrwty#3#/ wlʔ ṭʕw ʔyk dṭʕw bny ʔysryl wʔyk dṭʕw lwyʔ
48:12	wnhwʔ lhwn pwršnʔ mn pwršnh dʔrʕʔ qdwš qwdšʔ btḥwmʔ dlwyʔ
48:13	wlwyʔ lwqbl tḥwmʔ dkhnʔ ʔwrkʔ ʕsryn wḥmšʔ ʔlpyn wptyʔ ʕsrʔ ʔlpyn wklh ʔtrhwn ʕsryn wḥmšʔ ʔlpyn wptyʔ ʕsrʔ ʔlpyn
48:14	lʔ nzbnwn mnh wlʔ nḥlpwn wlʔ nʕbrwn ršytʔ dʔrʕʔ mṭl dqwdšh hw dmryʔ
48:15	wḥmšʔ ʔlpyn dmštḥr ʕl pwm ʕsryn wḥmšʔ ʔlpyn dwktʔ hy lmdyntʔ/dmdyntʔ#3#/ lytbʔ wlšṭḥʔ dthwʔ mdyntʔ bgwh
48:16	whlyn mwšḥtʔ lrwḥʔ dgrbyʔ ʔrbʕʔ ʔlpyn wḥmšmʔʔ wlmdnḥʔ ʔrbʕʔ ʔlpyn wḥmšmʔʔ wltymnʔ ʔrbʕʔ ʔlpyn wḥmšmʔʔ wlmʕrbʔ ʔrbʕʔ ʔlpyn wḥmšmʔʔ
48:17	wnhwʔ šṭḥh dmdyntʔ lgbrʔ mʔtyn wḥmšyn wltymnʔ mʔtyn wḥmšyn wlmdnḥʔ mʔtyn wḥmšyn wlmʕrbʔ/wlmdnḥʔ#3#/ mʔtyn wḥmšyn
48:18	wdmštḥr lwqbl pwršnʔ dqwdšʔ ʕsrʔ ʔlpyn lmdnḥʔ/bmdnḥʔ#3#/ wʕsrʔ ʔlpyn lmʕrbʔ nhwʔ lwqbl pwršnʔ dqwdšʔ wthwʔ ʕllth mʔkwltʔ lʔylyn dplḥyn lmdyntʔ
48:19	wʔynʔ dplḥ lmdyntʔ ntplḥ mn klhyn šrbtʔ dʔysryl
48:20	klh pwršnʔ ʕsryn wḥmšʔ ʔlpyn bʕsryn wḥmšʔ ʔlpyn wprwšw pwršnʔ dqwdšʔ mn ywrtnʔ dmdyntʔ
48:21	wdmštḥr nhwʔ lmdbrnʔ dmdyntʔ wmn pwršnʔ dqwdšʔ wmn ywrtnʔ/ywtrnʔ#3#/ dmdyntʔ ltḥwmʔ dmdnḥʔ ʕsryn wḥmšʔ ʔlpyn wlmʕrbʔ ʕsryn wḥmšʔ ʔlpyn btḥwmʔ/wtḥwmʔ#2#/ dmʕrbʔ lwqbl plgwth dmdbrnʔ wnhwʔ pwršnʔ dqwdšʔ wmqdšh dbytʔ bgwh
48:22	wmn yrtwtʔ dlwyʔ wmn yrtwtʔ dmdyntʔ mnth dmdbrnʔ thwʔ bmdyntʔ bynt tḥwmʔ dyhwdʔ ltḥwmʔ dbnymyn
48:23	šrkʔ dyn dšbṭʔ mn rwḥʔ dmdnḥʔ wʕdmʔ lrwḥʔ dmʕrbʔ dbnymyn
48:24	wʕl tḥwmʔ dbnymyn mn rwḥʔ dmdnḥʔ wʕdmʔ lrwḥʔ dmʕrbʔ dšmʕwn
48:25	wʕl tḥwmʔ dšmʕwn mn rwḥʔ dmdnḥʔ wʕdmʔ lrwḥʔ dmʕrbʔ dʔyskr
48:26	wʕl tḥwmʔ dʔyskr mn rwḥʔ dmdnḥʔ wʕdmʔ lrwḥʔ dmʕrbʔ dzbwlwn
48:27	wʕl tḥwmʔ dzbwlwn mn rwḥʔ dmdnḥʔ wʕdmʔ lrwḥʔ dmʕrbʔ dgd
48:28	wʕl tḥwmʔ dgd mn rwḥʔ dtymnʔ nhwʔ tḥwmʔ mn tmr ʕdmʔ lmy mrybt qdyš ywrtnh/ywtrnh#3#/ ʕl/ʕl yd#3#/ ymʔ rbʔ
48:29	hdʔ hy ʔrʕʔ dtplgwn yrtwtʔ lšbṭʔ dʔysryl whlyn ʔnyn plgwthwn ʔmr mrʔ mrwtʔ
48:30	whlyn mpqnyh dmdyntʔ mn rwḥʔ dgrbyʔ mšwḥtʔ ʔrbʕʔ ʔlpyn wḥmšmʔʔ
48:31	wtrʕyh dmdyntʔ ʕl šmhʔ dšbṭʔ dbny ʔysryl bgrbyʔ tltʔ trʕyn ḥd drwbyl wḥd dyhwdʔ wḥd dlwy
48:32	wbmdnḥʔ mšwḥtʔ ʔrbʕʔ ʔlpyn wḥmšmʔʔ wtltʔ trʕyn ḥd dywsp wḥd dbnymyn wḥd ddn
48:33	wbtymnʔ mšwḥtʔ ʔrbʕʔ ʔlpyn wḥmšmʔʔ wtltʔ trʕyn ḥd dšmʕwn wḥd dʔyskr wḥd dzbwlwn
48:34	wbmʕrbʔ mšwḥtʔ ʔrbʕʔ ʔlpyn wḥmšmʔʔ wtltʔ trʕyn ḥd dgd wḥd dʔšyr wḥd dnptly
48:35	wḥdryh tmntʕsr ʔlpyn wšmh dmdyntʔ mn ywmyh mryʔ šmhh
01:01	ptgmh dmryʔ dhwʔ ʕl hwšʕ br bry bywmwhy dʕwzyʔ wdywtm/wywtm#3#/ wdʔḥz wdḥzqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wbywmwhy dywrbʕm br ywʔš mlkʔ dʔysrʔyl
01:02	ryš ptgmh dmryʔ dhwʔ ʕl hwšʕ ʔmr mryʔ lhwšʕ zl sb lk ʔnttʔ dmznyʔ wbnyʔ dmznyn mṭl dmznyw tznʔ ʔrʕʔ mn btrh dmryʔ
01:03	wʔzl wnsb lh lgmr brt dblym wbṭnt wyldt lh brʔ
01:04	wʔmr lh mryʔ qry šmh ʔyzrʕyl mṭl dʕd qlyl tbʕ ʔnʔ dmh dʔyzrʕyl ʕl bytʔ dyhw wʔbṭl mlkwtʔ dbyt ʔysryl
01:05	bh bywmʔ hw ʔtbryh lqštʔ dʔysryl bʕwmqʔ dʔyzrʕyl
01:06	wbṭnt twb wyldt brtʔ wʔmr ly mryʔ qry šmh lʔ ʔtrḥmt mṭl dlʔ mwsp ʔnʔ twb lmrḥmw ʕl dbyt ʔysryl ʔlʔ mšql šql ʔnʔ lhwn
01:07	ʕl bytʔ dyn dyhwdʔ ʔrḥm wʔprwq ʔnwn bmryʔ ʔlhhwn lʔ bqštʔ ʔprwq ʔnwn \ʔp lʔ /wlʔ#3#/ bsypʔ ʔp lʔ bqrbʔ wlʔ brkšʔ ʔp lʔ bpršʔ
01:08	wḥslt ldlʔ ʔtrḥmt wbṭnt twb wyldt brʔ
01:09	wʔmr ly mryʔ qry šmh lʔ ʕmy mṭl dʔntwn lʔ ʕmy ʔntwn wʔnʔ lʔ ʔhwʔ lkwn <ʔlhʔ#3#>
02:01	wʔn nhwʔ mnynʔ dbny ʔysryl ʔyk ḥlʔ dymʔ/dbymʔ#2#/ dlʔ mttkyl wlʔ mtmnʔ wnhwʔ bʔtrʔ dʔtʔmr lhwn lʔ ʕmy ʔntwn tmn ntqrwn bnyʔ lʔlhʔ ḥyʔ
02:02	wntknšwn bny yhwdʔ wbny ʔysryl ʔyk ḥdʔ wnʕbdwn lhwn ryšʔ ḥd wnsqwn mn ʔrʕʔ mṭl drb hw ywmʔ dʔyzrʕyl
02:03	qrw lʔḥykwn ʕmy wlʔḥwtkwn rḥymtʔ/ʔrḥymtʔ#2#/
02:04	dwnw ʕm ʔmkwn dwnw mṭl dhy lʔ hwt ʔntty wʔnʔ lʔ hwyt bʕlh tʕbr znywth mn ʔpyh wgwrh mn bynt tdyh
02:05	dlʔ ʔšlḥyh ʕrṭl wʔšbqyh ʔyk ywmʔ dylydʔ bh wʔʕbdyh ʔyk mdbrʔ wʔyk ʔrʕʔ ṣhytʔ wʔmytyh bṣhyʔ
02:06	wʕl bnyh lʔ ʔrḥm mṭl dbny znytʔ ʔnwn
02:07	mṭl dznyt ʔmhwn wbhtt yldthwn wʔmrt ʔzl btr rḥmy yhby lḥmy wmy wnḥty wktny wmšḥy wkl dmtbʕʔ ly
02:08	mṭl hlyn hʔ sʔg ʔnʔ ʔwrḥth bdrdrʔ wʔswg šbylyh wʔwrḥʔ lʔ tškḥ
02:09	wtʔzl btr rḥmyh wlʔ tdrk ʔnwn wtbʕʔ ʔnwn wlʔ tškḥ ʔnwn wtʔmr ʔhpwk ʔzl ly lwt bʕly qdmyʔ mṭl dṭb hwʔ ly hy dyn mn dhšʔ
02:10	hy dyn lʔ ydʕt dʔnʔ yhbt lh ʕbwrʔ wḥmrʔ wmšḥʔ wsʔmʔ wdhbʔ ʔsgyt lh wmnh ʕbdw bʕlʔ
02:11	mṭl hnʔ ʔhpwk ʔsb ʕbwry bzbnh wḥmry bzbnh wʔsb ʕmry wktny dyhbt lh dtksʔ pwrsyh

02:13	wʔbṭl klh ḥdwth ʕdʕʔdyh wryš yrḥyh wšbth wklhwn ʕʔdyh
02:14	wʔḥrb gwpnyh wtʔnyh dʔmrt dmwhbtʔ ʔnyn dyhbw ly rḥmy wʔʕbd ʔnyn ʕbʔ wtʔkwl ʔnyn ḥywt brʔ
02:15	wʔpqwd ʕlyh ywmtʔ dbʕlʔ dsymʔ hwy bhwn bsmʔ wšqlt qdšyh wmrgnyth wʔzlt btr rḥmyh wly ṭʕt ʔmr mryʔ
02:16	mṭl hlyn hʔ mšdl ʔnʔ lh wmwbl ʔnʔ lh lmdbrʔ wʔmlʔ blbh
02:17	wʔtl lh krmyh mn tmn wʕwmqʔ dʕkr dntptḥ swklh wttmkk tmn ʔyk ywmy ṭlywth wʔyk ywmʔ dslqt bh mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn
02:18	wnhwʔ bywmʔ hw ʔmr mryʔ tqryny gbry wlʔ twb tqryny bʕly

03:01	wʔmr ly mryʔ twb zl rḥm ʔnttʔ gyrtʔ drḥmʔ byštʔ ʔyk drḥm mryʔ lbny ʔysryl whnwn ʔtpnyw btr ʔlhʔ ʔḥrnʔ wrḥmw dbwšʔ dʔpštʔ

03:03	wʔmrt lh dywmtʔ sgyʔʔ ttbyn ly lʔ tznyn wlʔ thwyn lgbr wʔnʔ ʔhwʔ lwtky
03:04	mṭl dywmtʔ sgyʔʔ ntbwn bny ʔysryl dlʔ mlkʔ wdlʔ šlyṭʔ wdlʔ dbḥtʔ wdlʔ mdbḥʔ wdlʔ lbš ʔpwdʔ wsʔm bsmʔ

04:01	šmʕw ptgmh dmryʔ bny ʔysryl mṭl ddynʔ lmryʔ ʕm ʕmwryh dʔrʕʔ ʕl dlyt qwštʔ ʔp lʔ ṭybwtʔ ʔp lʔ ydʕth dʔlhʔ bʔrʕʔ
04:02	lwṭtʔ/mṭl dlwṭtʔ#3#/ wdglwtʔ wqṭlʔ wgnbwtʔ wgwrʔ sgyw wdmʔ bdmʔ ḥlṭw
04:03	mṭl hnʔ ttb bʔblʔ ʔrʕʔ wnʔlwn klhwn ʕmwryh wḥywtʔ ddbrʔ wprḥtʔ dšmyʔ wʔp nwnʔ dbymʔ/dymʔ#3#/ nswpwn

04:06	štq ʕmy mṭl dlyt bh ydʕtʔ ʔnt gyr ʔslyt ydʕtʔ wʔslyk mn khnwtʔ wṭʕyt nmwsh dʔlhk ʔp ʔnʔ ʔṭʕʔ lbnyk

04:13	ʕl ryšy ṭwrʔ dbḥw wʕl rmtʔ smw bsmʔ tḥyt blwṭʔ wḥwrʔ wbṭmtʔ dšpyr ṭllh mṭl hnʔ nznyn bntkwn wklltkwn ngwrn
04:14	lʔ ʔsʕwr bntkwn kd nznyn wʔp lʔ klltkwn kd ngwrn mṭl dhnyn ʕm znyʔ ḥlyṭn whnwn ʕm npqt šwqʔ mdbḥyn ʕmʔ dlʔ mstkl ʕpq
04:15	znytʔ ʔnt dyn ʔysryl lʔ tḥyb lyhwdʔ wlʔ tʔzlwn lglglʔ wlʔ tsqwn lbyt ʔwn wlʔ tʔmwn/tʔmrwn#3#/ ḥy hw mryʔ
04:16	mṭl dʔyk twrtʔ dmrdt mn nyrʔ hknʔ \mrd ʔysryl /mrdw bny ʔysryl#3#/ wmkyl nrʕʔ ʔnwn mryʔ ʔyk ʔmrʔ brwḥtʔ

05:01	šmʕw hdʔ khnʔ wṣwtw byt/dbyt#3#/ ʔysryl wbyt mlkʔ šmʕw mṭl ddylkwn hw dynʔ dpḥʔ hwytwn ldwqʔ wmṣydtʔ dprysʔ ʕl tbwr

05:04	lʔ šbqn lhwn ṣnʕthwn dntpnwn lwt ʔlhhwn mṭl drwḥʔ dznywtʔ bgwhwn wlmryʔ lʔ ydʕw

09:01	lʔ tḥdʔ ʔysryl wlʔ tdwṣ ʔyk ʕmmʔ mṭl dṭʕyt mn ʔlhk wrḥmt mwhbtʔ mn kwl ʔdrʔ

09:03	lʔ ntbwn bʔrʕh dmryʔ ʔlʔ nhpwk ʔprym lmṣryn wbʔtwr ṭnpwtʔ nʔklwn

09:05	mnʔ tʕbdwn lywmʔ dʕʔdʔ wlywmʔ dʕdʕʔdh dmryʔ
09:06	mṭl dhnwn ʔzlw bbztʔ wmṣryn tknš ʔnwn wmps tqbwr ʔnwn rgtʔ dsʔmhwn \nwkryʔ nʔrtwnh /ʔbdnʔ nʔrtywhy#3#/ wkwbʔ bmšknyhwn
09:07	mṭyw ywmtʔ dtbʕtʔ qrbw ywmtʔ dpwrʕnʔ ndʕ ʔysryl sklʔ nbyʔ šṭyʔ gbrʔ dlbyšʔ bh rwḥʔ dšṭywtʔ mn swgʔʔ dʕwlk ʔtytrt šryḥwtk
09:08	dwqʔ ʔprym ʕm ʔlhy nbyʔ pḥʔ dtwqltʔ ʕl klhyn ʔwrḥth wšryḥwtʔ bbyth dʔlhʔ

09:15	klhyn byšthwn bglglʔ mṭl dtmn snyt ʔnwn bbyšwtʔ/bbyštʔ#3#/ dṣnʕthwn mn byty ʔpq ʔnwn wlʔ ʔwsp <twb#23#> lmrḥmw ʕlyhwn klhwn šlyṭnyhwn mrwdyn

10:01	gptʔ dšbwqʔ ʔysryl dʕbdt pʔrʔ ʔyk swgʔʔ dpʔryh ʔsgyw mdbḥʔ wʔyk ṭwbʔ dʔrʕhwn bnw ʕlwtʔ
10:02	ʔtplg lbhwn wmn hšʔ ntḥybwn hw nsḥwp mdbḥyhwn wnbwz ʕlwthwn
10:03	mṭwl dmkyl nʔmrwn lyt ln mlkʔ mn mryʔ lʔ dḥln mlkʔ mnʔ nʕbd ln
10:04	mllw mlʔ dʕlltʔ dgltʔ psqw dytqʔ wprʕw dynʔ ʔyk yʕrʔ bḥqlʔ dʔrʕʔ byrtʔ
10:05	lʕglʔ dbyt ʔwn nhwwn twtbʔ ʕmwrʔ dšmryn mṭl dytbw ʕlwhy bʔblʔ ʕmh wkwmrwhy wʕlwhy nḥdwn wʕl ʔyqrh dʕbr mnh

10:07	šdt šmryn mlkh ʔyk glʔ ʕl ʔpy myʔ
10:08	wnḥrbn prkʔ dʔwn ḥṭyth dʔysryl kwbʔ wdrdrʔ nʔʕwn bmdbḥyhwn wnʔmrwn lṭwrʔ dksʔwn wlrmtʔ dnpln ʕlyhwn
10:09	mn ywmtʔ drmtʔ ḥṭyt ʔysryl tmn nqwmwn wlʔ ndrk ʔnwn qrbʔ brmtʔ ʕl bnyʔ dʕwlʔ
10:10	bkʔty ʔrdʔ ʔnwn wntknšwn ʕlyhwn ʕmmʔ mʔ dmtrdyn ʕl trtyhyn sklwthwn
10:11	ʔprym ʕgltʔ mlptʔ drḥmʔ lmdrkw wʔnʔ ʕbrt ʕl ṣwrh ʔrkb lʔprym wndrk yhwdʔ wnbwz yʕqwb
10:12	zrwʕw lkwn zdyqwtʔ wḥṣwdw pwmh dṭybwtʔ ʔnhrw lkwn šrgʔ mṭwl dzbnʔ hw lmbʕyh lmryʔ ʕd ʔtʔ wmḥwʔ lkwn zdyqwth
10:13	dbrtwn ḥṭytʔ wʕwlʔ wḥṣdtwn wʔkltwn pʔrʔ ddglwtʔ mṭl dʔttkltwn bʔwrḥtkwn wbswgʔʔ dgnbrwtkwn
10:14	nqwm ʔbdnʔ bʕmk wklhwn krkyk ntbzwn ʔyk bztʔ dšlmʔ mn byt ʔyl bywmʔ dqrbʔ ʔmʔ ʕl bnyh šqpw
10:15	hknʔ ʕbdw lkwn byt ʔyl mn qdm byšwt byšwtkwn bšprʔ/bṣprʔ#3#/ twr wbht mlkʔ dʔysryl
11:01	mṭl dkd ṭlʔ hwʔ ʔysryl rḥmth wmn mṣryn qryth bry
11:02	ʔyk dqrw ʔnwn hknʔ ʔzlw mn qdmy wlbʕlʔ/lʕglʔ#3#/ dbḥw wlglypʔ smw bsmʔ

12:01	ḥdrny bdglwtʔ ʔprym wbyt ʔysrʔyl wyhwdʔ bnklʔ ʕdmʔ dnḥt ʕmh dʔlhʔ ʕmʔ qdyšʔ wmhymnʔ
12:02	ʔprym rʕʔ rwḥʔ wrdp ʕlʕlʔ ywmʔ klh dglwtʔ wbztʔ ʔsgyw wdytqʔ ʕm ʔtwryʔ psqw wmšḥʔ lmṣryn ʔwblw
12:03	wdynʔ ʔyt lmryʔ ʕm/ʕl#3#/ yhwdʔ wntbʕ lyʕqwb ʔyk ʔwrḥth wʔyk ṣnʕth nprʕywhy

12:11	wmllt/wʔnʔ mllt#3#/ ʕm nbyʔ wʔnʔ ḥzwny ʔsgyt wbʔydʔ dnbyʔ ʔtdmyt

13:03	mṭl hnʔ nhwwn ʔyk ʕnnʔ dṣprʔ wʔyk ṭlʔ dmqdm wʕbr wʔyk glʔ dprḥ mn ʔdrʔ wʔyk tnnʔ mn kwtʔ

13:09	ḥbltk ʔysrʔyl mnw nʕdrk

13:14	mn yd šywl ʔprwq ʔnwn wmn mwtʔ ʔpṣʔ ʔnwn ʔykʔ hy hkyl zkwtk mwtʔ ʔw ʔykw ʕwqsky šywl bwyʔʔ ṭšʔ mn ʕyny

14:01	ttḥyb šmryn ʕl dmrmrt lʔlhh <ʕlymʔ#3#> bḥrbʔ nplwn wylwdyhwn nštqpwn wbṭnthwn ntprtn

14:09	wnʔmr ʔprym mʔ ly twb wlptkrʔ ʔnʔ <nʔ#3#> mkkth wʔnʔ ʔškḥywhy ʔyk qṭrqʔ/qṭyrqʔ#2#/ ʕbyṭʔ/ʕbyṭtʔ#2#/ wmny ʔštkḥw pʔryky
14:10	mnw/mn#3#/ dḥkym nstkl hlyn wdmtbyn nštwdʕ ʔnyn dtryṣn ʔwrḥth dmryʔ wzdyqʔ mhlkyn bhyn wʕwlʔ mttqlyn bhyn
99:99	\šlmt nbywth dhwšʕ <nbyʔ#3#> /šlm hwšʕ#3#/
01:01	ptgmh dmryʔ dhwʔ ʕl ywʔyl br btwʔyl
01:02	šmʕw hdʔ qšyšʔ wṣwtw kwl ʕmwryh dʔrʕʔ ʔn hwt ʔyk hdʔ bywmykwn ʔw bywmy ʔbhykwn
01:03	ʔštʕw ʕlyh lbnykwn wbnykwn lbnyhwn wbnyhwn ldrʔ ʔḥrnʔ
01:04	dmdm dʔwtr mšwṭʔ ʔkl qmṣʔ prḥʔ wmdm dʔwtr qmṣʔ prḥʔ ʔkl qmṣʔ zḥlʔ wmdm dʔwtr <qmṣʔ#2#> zḥlʔ ʔkl ṣrṣwrʔ
01:05	ʔttʕyrw rwyʔ wbkw wʔyllw kwl štyy ḥmrʔ ʕl ḥmrʔ dʕbr mn pwmkwn
01:06	mṭl dʕmʔ slq lʔrʕy ʕšyn wlyt lh mnyn šnwhy ʔyk šnʔ dʔryʔ wnybwhy ʔyk nybʔ dgwryʔ dʔryʔ
01:07	ʕbd gpty lḥwrbʔ wtty lpwšḥʔ pšḥh wšdh wḥwr swkyh
01:08	ʔly ʔyk btwltʔ dkbynʔ sqʔ ʕl bʕl ṭlywth
01:09	ʕbr smydʔ wnwqyʔ mn byth dmryʔ ytbw mlkʔ bʔblʔ wkhnʔ wmšmšyn lmryʔ
01:10	ʔtbzt ḥqlʔ wytbt bʔblʔ ʔrʕʔ mṭl dʔtbzz ʕbwrʔ wybš ḥmrʔ wḥrbw zytʔ
01:11	bhtw ʔkrʔ wʔyllw krmʔ ʕl ḥṭʔ wʕl sʕrʔ dʕbr ḥṣdʔ dḥqlʔ
01:12	gptʔ ybšt wttʔ ḥrbt wrwmnʔ wdqlʔ wḥzwrʔ wklhwn ʔylnʔ dḥqlʔ ybšw mṭl dbṭlt ḥdwtʔ mn bny ʔnšʔ
01:13	khnʔ ʔtkbnw sqʔ wʔrqdw wʔyllw mšmšny mdbḥʔ ʕwlw bwtw bsqʔ wnwqyʔ
01:14	qdšw ṣwmʔ qrw knwšyʔ ʔtknšw qšyšʔ wklhwn ʕmwryh dʔrʕʔ lbyth dmryʔ ʔlhkwn gʕw lwt mryʔ ʔlhkwn wʔmrw
01:15	ʔwh ʔwh lywmʔ <mṭl#2#> dqryb hw ywmh dmryʔ wbztʔ mn ʔlhʔ tʔtʔ
01:16	hʔ lwqbl ʕynyn ʕbr mʔkltʔ mn byth dʔlhn wḥdwtʔ wdyṣʔ

01:18	lmnʔ mttnḥʔ bʕyrʔ wbkyn bqrʔ dtwrʔ dlyt lhyn rʕyʔ ʔp gzrʔ dʕnʔ spw
01:19	lwtk mryʔ ʔqrʔ mṭl dʔklt nwrʔ ldyrʔ dmdbrʔ wšlhbytʔ ʔwqdt lklhwn ʔylnʔ ddbrʔ
01:20	ʔp ḥywtʔ ddbrʔ gʕyʔ lwtk mṭl dybšw pṣydʔ dmyʔ wʔklt nwrʔ ldyrʔ dmdbrʔ
02:01	qrw šypwrʔ bṣhywn wqʕw bṭwrʔ dqwdšy nzwʕwn kwlhwn ʕmwryh dʔrʕʔ mṭl dmṭʔ ywmh dmryʔ wqrb
02:02	ywmʔ dḥšwkʔ wdʕmṭnʔ ywmʔ dʕnnʔ wdʕrplʔ ʔyk šprʔ dprys ʕl ṭwrʔ ʕmʔ sgyʔʔ wʕšynʔ dʔkwth lʔ hwʔ mn ʕlm wbtrh lʔ nhwʔ ʕdmʔ lšny drdryn
02:03	qdmwhy ʔklʔ nwrʔ wbtrh mwqdʔ šlhbytʔ ʔyk prdysʔ dʕdn ʔrʕʔ qdmwhy wbstrh mdbrʔ ḥrbʔ wlyt dmštwzb mnh
02:04	ʔyk ḥzwʔ drkšʔ ḥzwh wʔyk pršʔ hknʔ rhṭyn

02:06	mn qdmwhy nzwʕwn ʕmmʔ wkl ʔpyn nʔkmn ʔyk šwḥrʔ dqdrʔ
02:07	ʔyk gnbrʔ nrhṭwn wʔyk gbrʔ qrbtnʔ nsqwn bšwrʔ wgbr bʔwrḥh nʔzlwn wlʔ nsṭwn mn ʔwrḥthwn

02:09	bmdyntʔ nsqwn wʕl šwrʔ nrhṭwn wʕl btʔ nsqwn wmn kwʔ nʕlwn ʔyk gnbʔ
02:10	qdmwhy ʔtdlḥt ʔrʕʔ wzʕw šmyʔ šmšʔ wshrʔ ḥškw wʕrb nwhrʔ dkwkbʔ
02:11	wmryʔ yhb qlh qdm ḥylh mṭwl dsgyʔʔ hy ṭb mšryth wʕšyn ʕbdʔ dptgmh mṭl drb hw ywmh dmryʔ wdḥyl ṭb wmnw mškḥ msybr lh
02:12	mkyl ʔmr mryʔ ʔtpnw lwty mn klh lbkwn bṣwmʔ wbbktʔ wbmrqdtʔ
02:13	wṣrw lbykwn wlʔ nḥtykwn wʔtpnw lwt mryʔ ʔlhkwn mṭl dmrḥmnʔ hw wmrḥpnʔ wngyrʔ rwḥh wsgyʔʔ ṭybwth wmhpk byštʔ
02:14	mn ydʕ ʔn mtpnʔ wmrḥm ʕlyn wmwtr bʔtrh bwrktʔ wsmydʔ wnwqyʔ lmryʔ ʔlhkwn
02:15	qrw šypwrʔ bṣhywn qdšw ṣwmʔ qrw knwšyʔ
02:16	knwšw ʕmʔ qdšw ʕdtʔ knwšw sbʔ wknwšw ʕlymʔ wynqy tdyʔ npwq ḥtnʔ mn qyṭwnh wkltʔ mn byt gnwnh
02:17	byny qsṭrwmʔ lmdbḥʔ nbkwn khnʔ mšmšnwhy dmryʔ wnʔmrwn ḥws mryʔ ʕl ʕmk wlʔ ttl yrtwtk lḥsdʔ wlšwlṭnʔ dʕmmʔ dlʔ nʔmrwn ʕmmʔ ʔykw ʔlhhwn
02:18	wṭn mryʔ bʔrʕh wḥs ʕl ʕmh
02:19	wʕnʔ mryʔ wʔmr lʕmh hʔ mšdr ʔnʔ lkwn ʕbwrʔ wḥmrʔ wmšḥʔ dtsbʕwn wlʔ ʔtlkwn twb lḥsdʔ dʕmmʔ
02:20	wlgrbyyʔ ʔdḥwq/ʔrḥwq#5#/ mnkwn wʔdḥqywhy lʔrʕʔ ṣhytʔ wḥrbtʔ ʔpwhy lymʔ qdmyʔ wḥrth lymʔ ʔḥryʔ wnmḥʔ ryḥh wtsq swth ʕl dʔttrym mryʔ lmʕbd
02:21	lʔ tdḥlyn ʔrʕʔ dwṣy wḥdy mṭl dʔttrym mryʔ lmʕbd
02:22	lʔ tdḥlyn ḥywtʔ ddbrʔ mṭl dyʕʔ tdʔʔ bdyrʔ dmdbrʔ wʔylnʔ yhb pʔrwhy wgptʔ wttʔ yhb ḥylhwn
02:23	bny ṣhywn dwṣw wḥdw bmryʔ ʔlhkwn dyhb lkwn mʔkwltʔ dzdyqwtʔ wmḥt lkwn mṭrʔ ʔrbyʕyʔ wlqyšyʔ ʔyk dmn lwqdm
02:24	wntmlwn ʔdrʔ ʕbwrʔ wnšpʕn mʕṣrtʔ ḥmrʔ wmšḥʔ
02:25	wʔprwʕkwn šnyʔ dʔkl qmṣʔ prḥʔ wzḥlʔ wṣrṣwrʔ wmšwṭʔ ḥyly rbʔ dšdrt ʕlykwn
02:26	wtʔklwn wtsbʕwn wtšbḥwn lšmh dmryʔ ʔlhkwn dʕbd ʕmkwn tdmrtʔ wlʔ nbht ʕmy lʕlm
02:27	wtdʕwn dbgw ʔysryl ʔnʔ ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn wlyt twb lbr mny wlʔ nbht ʕmy lʕlm
03:01	wmn btrkn ʔšwd rwḥy ʕl klbsr wntnbwn bnykwn wbntkwn wsbykwn ḥlmʔ nḥlmwn wʕlymykwn ḥzwnʔ nḥzwn
03:02	wʔp ʕl ʕbdʔ wʕl ʔmhtʔ ʔšwd rwḥy bywmtʔ hnwn
03:03	wʔʕbd tdmrtʔ bšmyʔ wbʔrʕʔ dmʔ wnwrʔ wʕṭrʔ dtnnʔ
03:04	šmšʔ nthpk lḥšwkʔ wshrʔ ldmʔ qdm dnʔtʔ ywmh dmryʔ rbʔ wdḥylʔ
03:05	wkl dnqrʔ šmh dmryʔ ntpṣʔ mṭl dbṭwrʔ dṣhywn wbʔwršlm thwʔ mšwzbwtʔ ʔyk dʔmr mryʔ lmšwzbʔ dqrʔ mryʔ
04:01	mṭl dbywmtʔ hnwn wbzbnʔ hw dmhpk ʔnʔ šbytʔ dyhwdʔ wdʔwršlm
04:02	ʔknš lklhwn ʕmmʔ wʔḥt ʔnwn lnḥlʔ dywšpṭ wʔdwn ʕmhwn tmn ʕl ʔpy ʕmy wʕl ʔpy ʔysryl yrtwty dʔtbdrw byt ʕmmʔ ʕl dplgw ʔrʕy
04:03	wʕl ʕmy ʔrmyw pṣʔ wyhbw ṭlyʔ bʔgr znytʔ wṭlytʔ zbnw bḥmrʔ wʔštyw
04:04	mnʔ ḥšybn ʔntyn ly ṣwr wṣydn wklh glylʔ wplšt dlmʔ pwrʕnʔ prʕyn ʔntwn ly wʔn ḥwblʔ rmyn ʔntwn ʕly bʕgl wmsrhbʔyt ʔhpk pwrʕnkwn bryškwn
04:05	ʕl dnsbtwn kspy wdhby wmʔny špyrʔ ʔʕltwn lhyklykwn
04:06	wbny yhwdʔ wbny ʔwršlm zbntwn lbny ywnyʔ dtrḥqwn ʔnwn mn tḥwmhwn

04:04	wʔmr ly mryʔ ṭb kryt lk
04:05	wnpq ywnn lbr mn mdyntʔ wytb lh bmdnḥyh dmdyntʔ wʕbd lh mṭltʔ tmn wytb tḥwtyh bṭllʔ dnḥzʔ mnʔ gdš lh lmdyntʔ
04:06	wpqd mryʔ lšrwrʔ dqrʔʔ wyʕʔ wslq lʕl mn ywnn whwʔ ṭllʔ ʕl ryšh wʔrwḥ lh mn byšth wḥdy ywnn bh bšrwrʔ dqrʔʔ ḥdwtʔ rbtʔ
04:07	wlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ pqd mryʔ ʔlhʔ ltwlʕʔ bmsqy šprʔ wmḥth lšrwrʔ dqrʔʔ wqṭmth
04:08	wkd dnḥt šmšʔ pqd mryʔ ʔlhʔ lrwḥʔ dšwbʔ wʔwbšth lqrʔʔ/lšrwrʔ#3#/ wṣḥt šmšʔ bryšh dywnn wʔtṭrp wšʔl mwtʔ lnpšh wʔmr mṭʔ bʔydyk mryʔ lmsb npšy mny mṭl dlʔ hwyt ṭb/dṭb#3#/ ʔnʔ mn ʔbhy
04:09	wʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ lywnn ṭb kryt lk ʕl šrwrʔ dqrʔʔ wʔmr ywnn ṭb kryt ly ʕdmʔ lmwtʔ
04:10	ʔmr lh mryʔ ʔnt ḥst ʕl šrwrʔ dqrʔʔ dlʔ lʔyt bh wlʔ rbythy dbr llyh yʕʔ wbr llyh ybš
04:11	ʔnʔ dyn lʔ ʔḥws ʕl nynwʔ mdyntʔ rbtʔ dʔyt bh ytyr mn trtʕsrʔ rbwn bnynšʔ/dbnynšʔ#3#/ dlʔ ydʕyn byt ymynhwn lsmlhwn/mn smlhwn#3#/ wswgʔʔ dbʕyrʔ
99:99	\šlmt nbywth dywnn nbyʔ /šlm ywnn#3# /šlmt krwzwth dywnn nbyʔ#3#/
01:01	ptgmʔ dmryʔ dhwʔ ʕl mykʔ mʔršyʔ bywmwhy dywtm wdʔḥz wdḥzqyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ dḥzʔ ʕl šmryn wʕl ʔwršlm
01:02	šmʕw klkwn ʕmmʔ wṣwty ʔrʕʔ bmlʔh wnhwʔ bkwn mrʔ mrwtʔ shdʔ mryʔ mn hyklʔ dqwdšh
01:03	mṭl dhʔ mryʔ npq mn ʔtrh wnḥt wdrk ʕl rwmh dʔrʕʔ
01:04	wntpšrwn ṭwrʔ tḥwtwhy wʕwmqʔ nttlḥwn ʔyk šʕwtʔ <dmtpšrʔ#3#> mn qdm nwrʔ wʔyk myʔ dndryn bmḥttʔ
01:05	hlyn klhyn mṭl ʕwlh dyʕqwb wmṭl ḥṭhʔ dbyt ʔysryl mnʔ hw ʕwlh dyʕqwb ʔlʔ ʔn šmryn wmnʔ/wmn#3#/ hy ḥṭyth dyhwdʔ ʔlʔ ʔn ʔwršlm
01:06	wʔʕbdyh lšmryn byt/ʔyk dbyt#3#/ dbrʔ dḥqlʔ wnṣbtʔ dkrmʔ wʔkšʔ kʔpyh bygrʔ wʔglʔ štʔsyh
01:07	wklhwn glypyh mttbrw nttbrwn wklhyn dḥlth nʔqdn bnwrʔ wklhwn ptkryh ʔʕbd lḥblʔ mṭl dmn ʔgrʔ dznytʔ ʔtknšw wlʔgrʔ dznytʔ nhpkwn
01:08	ʕl hlyn ʔrqdy wʔylly whlky ḥpyy wʕrṭl wʕbdy mrqwdtʔ ʔyk dyrwrʔ wʔblʔ ʔyk dbrt yrwrʔ
01:09	mṭl dkybʔ hy mḥwth wmṭt lyhwdʔ wqrbt ʕdmʔ ltrʕh dʕmy lʔwršlm
01:10	bgt lʔ tḥdwn wmbkʔ lʔ tbkwn bbtʔ dʕwprʔ ʔtplplw bʕprʔ
01:11	ʕbdy lky ʕmwrtʔ dšpyr ʕrṭl npqt wlʔ bhtt ʕmwrtʔ dṣʕn mrqwdtʔ dbyt ʔwṣyl tsq mnkwn mḥwth
01:12	mṭl dʔtkrht lṭbtʔ ʕmwrtʔ dmrdt ʕl dnḥtt byšth mn qdm mryʔ ʕl trʕyh dʔwršlm
01:13	pgdt mrkbtʔ drkšʔ ʕmwrtʔ dlkyš ryš ḥṭytʔ hy lbrt ṣhywn mṭl dbky ʔštkḥw ḥṭhwhy dʔysryl
01:14	mṭl hnʔ/hdʔ#3#/ ttlyn šwbqnʔ lyrtwtʔ dgt btʔ dsryqwtʔ hww lsryqwtʔ lmlkʔ dʔysryl
01:15	ʔytʔ lky twb yrwtʔ ʕmwrtʔ dmʔršʔ ʕdmʔ lʕlm nʕlʔ ʔyqrh dʔysryl
01:16	mrwṭy wgwzy ʕl bny mpnqwtky ʔsgy mrṭky ʔyk dnšrʔ mṭl dʔštbyw mnky
02:01	wy lʔylyn dmtḥšbyn ʕtʔ wʕbdyn byštʔ ʕl mškbhwn wmqdmyn bṣprʔ wʕbdyn mdm dʔtḥšbw wšqlyn ʔydyhwn lwt ʔlhʔ
02:02	wrgyn ḥqltʔ wbtʔ wnsbyn lhwn bqṭyrʔ wṭlmyn lgbrʔ bqnynh wbyrtwth
02:03	mṭl hlyn hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhʔ hʔ mtḥšb ʔnʔ byštʔ ʕl šrbtʔ hdʔ dlʔ trymwn mnh ṣwrkwn wlʔ thlkwn bqwmtʔ pšyṭtʔ mṭl dzbnʔ hw dbyštʔ
02:04	bh bywmʔ hw nšqwl ʕlykwn mtlʔ wbqyntʔ nʔlʔ ʔwlytʔ wnʔmr bzwzʔ/dbzwzʔ#3#/ nbzn wplgwth dʕmy bšwytʔ nplg wlyt dmhpk ḥqltn bšwytʔ
02:05	mṭl hnʔ lʔ nhwʔ lk dmšḥ bšwytʔ wmplg bpṣʔ bknwšth dmryʔ
02:06	lʔ tdmʕwn dmʕʔ wlʔ tdmʕwn ʕl hlyn dlʔ ndrkkwn ḥsdʔ
02:07	dʔmyr ʕl byth dyʕqwb dʔrgz rwḥh dmryʔ bhlyn ṣnʕth hʔ mly mṭʔbn ʕm tryṣʔ dʔzl
02:08	wʔtmly ʕmy ʔyk gnbʔ qʔm hwʔ lwqbl šlmh mškh tšṭwn dtʕbrwn sbrh wthpkwn qrbʔ
02:09	nšʔ dʕmy tšdwn/tšrwn#3#/ mn byt pwnqyhyn wmn ylwdyhyn tsbwn šwbḥʔ lʕlm
02:10	qwmw zlw mṭl dlʔ hwt hdʔ nyḥtʔ mṭl dṭnpwtʔ/dlṭnpwtʔ#3#/ tḥbl ḥblʔ wḥblh nʕšn
02:11	gbrʔ dmhlk brwḥʔ dglʔyt wkdbʔyt ʔṭp lk ḥmrʔ wrwywtʔ wthwʔ mn mṭwpyth dʕmʔ hnʔ
02:12	mknšw ʔknšk lklk yʕqwb wmqrbw ʔqrbk šrkh dʔysrʔyl ʔkḥdʔ wʔʕbdywhy ʔyk ʕnʔ bʔwlṣnʔ wʔyk gzrʔ bgw rbʕh dmgny mn ʔnšʔ
02:13	slq trwʕʔ qdmyhwn trʕ twrʕtʔ wʕbrw wnpqw bh wʕbr mlkhwn qdmyhwn wmryʔ bryšhwn
03:01	wʔmr šmʕw hkyl hlyn ryšʔ dbyt yʕqwb wšlyṭnʔ dbyt ʔysryl lʔ hwʔ lkwn wlʔ lmdʕ dynʔ
03:02	snyy ṭbtʔ wrḥmy byštʔ dḥṭpyn ʔntwn mškhwn mnhwn wbsrhwn mn grmyhwn
03:03	dʔklw bsrh dʕmy wmškhwn mnhwn ʔšlḥw wgrmyhwn tbrw wʔrmyw ʔyk dbqdsʔ wʔyk bsrʔ bqdrʔ
03:04	hy dyn ngʕwn/nqʕwn#5#/ lwt mryʔ wlʔ nʕnʔ ʔnwn wnhpk ʔpwhy mnhwn bzbnʔ hw ʕl dʔbʔšw ʕbdyhwn
03:05	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ/mrʔ mrwtʔ#3#/ ʕl nbyʔ dmṭʕyn lʕmy dnktyn bšnyhwn wmkrzyn šlmʔ wmn dlʔ rmʔ bpwmhwn mkrzyn ʕlwhy qrbʔ
03:06	mṭl hnʔ llyʔ lkwn mn ḥzwʔ wtḥšk lkwn mn qṣmʔ wtʕrb šmšʔ ʕl nbyʔ wnʕmṭ ʕlyhwn ywmʔ
03:07	wnbhtwn ʔylyn dḥzyn ḥzwnʔ wnḥprwn qṣwmʔ wntʕṭpwn klhwn ʕl spwthwn mṭl dlʔ ʕnʔ lhwn ʔlhʔ
03:08	brm dyn ʔnʔ mlʔ ʔnʔ ḥylʔ drwḥh dmryʔ wdynʔ wgnbrwtʔ dʔḥwʔ lyʕqwb ʕwlh wlʔysryl ḥṭyth
03:09	šmʕw hkyl hdʔ ryšʔ dbyt yʕqwb wšlyṭnʔ dbyt ʔysryl dmslyn dynʔ wmʕqmyn klhyn tryṣtʔ
03:10	dbnyn lṣhywn bdmʔ wlʔwršlm bʕwlʔ
03:11	ršyh bšwḥdʔ dynyn wkhnyh bʔgrʔ mlpyn wnbyyh bkspʔ qṣmyn wʕl mryʔ mttklyn wʔmryn hʔ mryʔ byntn lʔ ʔtyʔ ʕlyn byštʔ
03:12	mkyl mṭltkwn ṣhywn ḥqlʔ ttdbr wʔwršlm ḥrbtʔ thwʔ wṭwr bytʔ lbyt ʕbʔ
04:01	wnhwʔ bywmtʔ ʔḥryʔ ṭwr byth dmryʔ mtqn bryš ṭwrʔ wrm mn rmtʔ wntknšyn lh klhwn ʕmmʔ
04:02	wnʔzlwn ʕmmʔ sgyʔʔ wnʔmrwn tw nsq lṭwrh dmryʔ wlbyt ʔlhh dyʕqwb wnlpn mn ʔwrḥth wnhlk bšbylwhy mṭl dmn ṣhywn npq nmwsʔ wmlth/wptgmh#23#/ dmryʔ mn ʔwršlm
04:03	wtdwn byt ʕmmʔ wtks lʕmmʔ ʕšynʔ dbrwḥqʔ wnrʕwn spsryhwn lsky pdnʔ wrwmḥyhwn/wnyzkyhwn#23#/ lmglʔ wlʔ nšqwl ʕmʔ ʕl ʕmʔ sypʔ wtwb lʔ nʔlpwn qrbʔ
04:04	wntbwn ʔnš tḥyt gwpnwhy wtḥyt tʔnwhy wlʔ nhwʔ dmhr lhwn mṭl dpwmh dmryʔ ḥyltnʔ mll
04:05	mṭwl dklhwn ʕmmʔ nhlkwn ʔnš bšm ʔlhh wḥnn nhlk bšmh dmryʔ ʔlhn lʕlm wlʕlm ʕlmyn
04:06	bh dyn bywmʔ hw ʔmr mryʔ ʔknš lrḥyqʔ wlmbdrʔ ʔqrb lʔylyn dʔbʔšt lhwn
04:07	wʔʕbd ḥrtʔ lmbdrʔ wrḥyqʔ lʕmʔ ʕšynʔ wnmlk mryʔ ʕlyhwn bṭwrʔ dṣhywn wbʔwršlm mkyl wʕdmʔ lʕlm
04:08	ʔnt dyn mgdlʔ rʕyʔ ʕmwṭʔ dbrt ṣhywn zbnk mṭy wʔtʔ šlyṭʔ qdmyʔ dmlkwtʔ dbrt ʔwršlm
04:09	mkyl lmnʔ ʕbdty byštʔ dlmʔ mlkʔ lyt bky ʔw mlwkyky ʔbdw dʔḥdwky ḥblʔ ʔyk dyldtʔ
04:10	ḥbly wḥsny brt ṣhywn ʔyk yldtʔ mṭl dmkyl tpqyn mn mdyntʔ wtšryn bdbrʔ/bmdbrʔ#3#/ wtʔzlyn ʕdmʔ lbbl wtmn ttpṣyn wtmn nprqky mryʔ mn ʔydʔ dbʕldbbyky
04:11	mkyl ntknšwn ʕlyky ʕmmʔ sgyʔʔ ʔylyn dʔmryn hww ttṭnp ṣhywn wtḥzʔ bh ʕynn
04:12	hnwn dyn lʔ ydʕw mḥšbth dmryʔ wlʔ ʔstklw trʕyth dknš ʔnwn ʔyk šblʔ lʔdrʔ
04:13	qwmy wʔdrky/drwky#3#/ ʔnwn brt ṣhywn mṭwl dqrntky ʔʕbd dprzlʔ wprstky dnḥšʔ wtdqyn ʕmmʔ sgyʔʔ wtḥrmyn qnynhwn lmryʔ wnksyhwn lmrʔ dklh ʔrʕʔ
04:14	mkyl tpqyn bgysʔ brt gysʔ ʕšynʔ dqmw ʕlyn wmḥw bšbṭʔ ʕl pkh lrʕyʔ dʔysryl
05:01	ʔnty dyn byt lḥm ʔprtʔ <lʔ#3#> zʕwryʔ ʔnty dthwyn bʔlpʔ dyhwdʔ mnky npwq šlyṭʔ dnhwʔ ʕl <ʕmy#3#> ʔysryl wmpqh mn ryšytʔ mn ywmy ʕlmʔ
05:02	mkyl nšlm ʔnwn ʕdmʔ lzbnʔ dyldʔ yldtʔ wšrkʔ dʔḥwhy ntpnwn lwt bny ʔysryl
05:03	wnqwm wnrʕʔ bʕwšnh dmryʔ wbʔyqrʔ dšmh dmryʔ ʔlhh wntpnwn <lwth#3#> mṭl dmkyl nʔrb ʕdmʔ lswpyh dʔrʕʔ
05:04	wnhwʔ šlmʔ wʔtwryʔ mʔ dʔtʔ lʔtrn wdrk bsḥrtn nqym ʕlwhy šbʕʔ rʕwtʔ wtmnyʔ rwrbnʔ dʔnšʔ
05:05	wnʔrʕwn lʔrʕʔ dʔtwr bḥrbʔ wlʔrʕʔ dnmrwd brwgzh wnpṣyn mn ʔtwryʔ dlʔ nʔtʔ lʔtrn wlʔ ndrwk btḥwmyn
05:06	wnhwʔ šrkʔ dyʕqwb bʕmʔ bynt ʕmmʔ sgyʔʔ ʔyk ṭlʔ mn qdm mryʔ wʔyk rsysʔ dʕl ʕsbʔ dlʔ mqwʔ lgbr wlʔ mktr lbr ʔnš
05:07	wnhwʔ šrkh dyʕqwb bʕmʔ bynt ʕmmʔ sgyʔʔ ʔyk ʔryʔ bḥywtʔ dʕnʔ wʔyk gwryʔ dʔryʔ bgzrʔ dʕnʔ dmʔ dprš wpsq tbr wlyt dmpṣʔ
05:08	ttrym ʔydk ʕl snʔyk wklhwn bʕldbbyk nʔbdwn
05:09	bh dyn bywmʔ hw ʔmr mryʔ ʔwbd rkšk mn gwk wʔwbd mrkbtk

05:14	wʔʕbd brwgzʔ wbḥmtʔ pwrʕnʔ mn ʕmmʔ ʔylyn dlʔ šmʕw
06:01	šmʕw mkyl mdm dʔmr mryʔ qwm dwn ʕm ṭwrʔ wnšmʕn qlk rmtʔ
06:02	šmʕw ṭwrʔ dynh dmryʔ wʕwmqʔ dštʔsyh dʔrʕʔ ddʔn mryʔ ʕm ʕmh wlʔysryl mks
06:03	ʕmy mnʔ ʕbdt lk ʔw bmnʔ ʔkryt lk ʔshdyny
06:04	lʔ ʔsqtk mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wmn byt ʕbdwtʔ prqtk wšdrt qdmyk lmwšʔ wlʔhrwn wlmrym
06:05	ʕmy ʔtdkr hkyl mnʔ ʔtrʕy ʕlyk blq mlkʔ dmwʔb wmnʔ ʕnyhy blʕm br bʕwr mn sṭym wʕdmʔ lglgl mṭl dydʕ zdyqwth dmryʔ
06:06	bmnʔ ʔqdm lmryʔ wʔšpr lʔlhʔ mrymʔ ʔqdmywhy byqdʔ šlmʔ ʔw bʕglʔ bny šntʔ
06:07	lʔ mṣṭbʔ mryʔ bʔlpʔ ddkrʔ ʔp lʔ brbwtʔ dḥylʔ dmwšḥʔ ʔn ʔtl bwkry ʕwlʔ hw ly wpʔrʔ dkrsy ḥṭytʔ ʔnwn dnpšy
06:08	ḥwytk br ʔnšʔ mdm dmʕdr dtbʕ lk mryʔ dtʕbd dynʔ wtrḥm ṭybwtʔ wthwʔ ʕtyd lmʔzl btr <mryʔ#23#> ʔlhk
06:09	qlh dmryʔ ʕl mdyntʔ mkrz ywlpnʔ ldḥly šmh šmʕ šbṭʔ mn nshd
06:10	dtwb nwrʔ bbyth dʕwlʔ wʔwṣrʔ dʕwlʔ wkyltʔ zʕwrtʔ dʕtʔ
06:11	ʔyknʔ nzddqwn bmsʔtʔ dʕwlʔ wbmrswpʔ dmtqlʔ dnklʔ
06:12	dʕtyryh mlyn ʕtʔ wʕmwryh mmllyn dglwtʔ wlšnhwn nkyl bpwmhwn
06:13	ʔp ʔnʔ ʔšrʔ lmmḥyk wʔḥblk mṭl ḥṭhyk
06:14	wtʔkwl wlʔ tsbʕ wʕbrtʔ thwʔ bgwk wtdrk wlʔ tpṣʔ wmdm dtpṣʔ lḥrbʔ ʔšlm
06:15	ʔnt tzrwʕ wlʔ tḥṣwd ʔnt tʕṣwr zytʔ wlʔ tmšwḥ mšḥʔ wtʕṣwr ḥmrʔ wlʔ tštʔ
06:16	ʕl dnṭrt pwqdnwhy dʕmry wklhwn ʕbdʔ dbyt ʔḥb whlktwn btrʕythwn mṭl hnʔ yhbth btmhʔ wʕmwryh bmšrwqytʔ wḥsdh dʕmy tqblwn
07:01	wy ly dhwyt ʔyk lqṭʔ dqyṭʔ wʔyk bwʕrʔ dqṭpʔ lyt sgwlʔ lmʔkl wlbkrtʔ rgt npšy
07:02	ʔbd ḥsyʔ mn ʔrʕʔ wlyt dtryṣ bbny ʔnšʔ klhwn kmʔnʔ kmnyn wgbr lʔḥwhy ṣydyn lʔbdnʔ
07:03	ʔydyhwn mṭybn lbyštʔ wlʔ mṭʔbyn šlyṭʔ šʔl dhb wdynʔ ʔmr šḥwd wrbʔ mmll ṣbynʔ dnpšh wʔslyw
07:04	ṭbthwn ʔyk ʔwrqʕtʔ dʔkl ssʔ ywmʔ ddwqyky wdpwrqnky ʔtʔ mkyl nhwʔ byt bkyhwn
07:05	lʔ thymnwn lrḥmykwn wlʔ ttklwn ʕl qrybykwn wmn ʔnttk ṭr mly pwmk
07:06	mṭl dbrʔ mṣʕr lʔbwhy wbrtʔ qymʔ lwqbl ʔmh wkltʔ lwqbl ḥmth wbʕldbbwhy dgbrʔ bny byth
07:07	ʔnʔ dyn lmryʔ ʔḥwr wʔskʔ lʔlhʔ prwqy wnšmʕny ʔlhy
07:08	lʔ tḥdyn ly bʕldbbty wnplt twb qymʔ ʔnʔ wdytbt bḥšwkʔ mryʔ mnhr ly
07:09	mḥwth dmryʔ ʔsybr ʕl dḥṭyt lh ʕdmʔ dndwn dyny wnʕbd tbʕty wnpqny lnwhrʔ wʔḥzʔ bzdyqwth
07:10	wtḥzʔ bʕldbbty wtksyh bhttʔ dʔmrʔ hwt ly ʔykw mryʔ ʔlhky ʕyny nḥzyn bh mkyl thwʔ ldyšʔ ʔyk synʔ dšwqʔ
07:11	ywmʔ hw lmbnʔ sygyky ywmʔ hw dtštqlyn
07:12	ywmʔ hw dzbnky nʔtʔ dmn ʔtwr wmn mdyntʔ ʕšyntʔ wmn ṣwr wʕdmʔ lnhrʔ wmn ymʔ wʕdmʔ lymʔ wʕdmʔ lhwr ṭwrʔ
07:13	wthwʔ ʔrʕʔ lḥblʔ lʕmwryh mṭwl pʔrʔ dʕbdyhwn
07:14	rʕy lʕmk bšbṭk wlʕnʔ dyrtwtk nšrwn blḥwdyhwn ʔyk ʕnʔ bgw krmlʔ nrʕwn bmtnyn wbglʕd ʔyk ywmtʔ dmn ʕlm
07:15	wʔyk ywmʔ dnpqw bh mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn ʔḥwʔ ʔnwn tdmrtʔ
07:16	wnḥzwn ʕmmʔ wnbhtwn mn klh gnbrwthwn nsymwn ʔydyhwn ʕl pwmhwn wʔdnyhwn ntḥršn
07:17	wnlḥkwn ʕprʔ ʔyk ḥwyʔ wʔyk ḥwldy ʔrʕʔ nrgzwn mn šbylyhwn wmn mryʔ ʔlhn nzwʕwn wndḥlwn

01:16	ywmʔ hw dqrnʔ wdqʕtʔ ʕl mdyntʔ ʕšyntʔ wʕl zwytʔ rmtʔ
01:17	wʔlṣ lbny ʔnšʔ dnhlkwn ʔyk ʕwyrʔ ʕl dḥṭw lmryʔ wntʔšd dmhwn ʔyk ʕprʔ wbsrhwn ʔyk kbyʔ
01:18	wdhbhwn wsʔmhwn lʔ nškḥ lmpṣyw ʔnwn bywmʔ drwgzh dmryʔ wbnwrʔ dṭnnh ttʔkl klh ʔrʕʔ mṭl ddlwḥyʔ wswpnʔ ʕbd mryʔ ʕl/ʕm#3#/ klhwn ʕmwryh dʔrʕʔ
02:01	ʔtknšw wʔtʔsrw ʕmʔ dlʔ rdʔ/ʔrdʔ#3#/
02:02	ʕdlʔ thwwn ʔyk ʕwrʔ dʕbr wʕdlʔ tʔtʔ ʕlykwn ḥmtʔ drwgzh dmryʔ wʕdlʔ nʔtʔ ʕlykwn ywmʔ drwgzh dmryʔ
02:03	bʕʔwhy lmryʔ klkwn mkykyh dʔrʕʔ wʕbdw dynʔ wbʕw zdyqwtʔ wmkykwtʔ kbr tsttrwn bywmʔ drwgzh dmryʔ
02:04	mṭl dʕʔzʔ šbyqtʔ thwʔ wʔšqlwn lḥblʔ lʔšdwd bṭhrʔ ndbrwn wʕqrwn ttʕqr
02:05	wy ldʕmryn bḥbl ymʔ wlʕmʔ dqrṭʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕlykwn knʕn wʔrʕʔ dplštyʔ wʔwbdkyn mn ytbʔ
02:06	wnhwʔ ḥbl ymʔ dyrʔ wqrṭʔ byt mrʕytʔ lgzrʔ dʕnʔ
02:07	wnhwʔ ḥbl ymʔ lšrkʔ dbyt yhwdʔ wbhyn nrʕwn wbbtʔ dʔšqlwn brmšʔ nrbʕwn mṭl dnpqwd ʔnwn mryʔ ʔlhhwn wnpnʔ šbythwn
02:08	šmʕt ḥsdʔ dmwʔb wgwdpʔ dbny ʕmwn dḥsdw lʕmy wʔtrwrbw ʕl tḥwmhwn
02:09	mṭl hlyn/hnʔ#3#/ ḥy ʔnʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl dmwʔb ʔyk sdwm thwʔ wbny ʕmwn ʔyk ʕmwrʔ dʔtḥblt nṣbthyn wʔbd mlwḥhyn whwy ḥblʔ/lḥblʔ#3#/ lʕlm šrkh dʕmy nbzwn ʔnyn wmdm dʔštḥr mn ʕmy nʔrtwn ʔnyn
02:10	hdʔ thwʔ lhwn ḥlp gʔywthwn ʕl dḥsdw wʔtrwrbw ʕl ʕmh dmryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʕl ʔysryl
02:11	ʔtgly mryʔ ʕlyhwn dnwbd lklhwn mlkyh dʔrʕʔ wnsgdwn lh ʔnš mn ʔtrh klhyn gzrtʔ dymmʔ/dʕmmʔ#3#/
02:12	ʔp ʔntwn kwšyʔ qṭyly ḥrbʔ <ʔntwn#2#>
02:13	wnrym ʔydh ʕl grbyyʔ/ʕmmʔ#3#/ wnwbd lʔtwryʔ wnʕbdyh lnynwʔ lḥblʔ wlṣdyʔ ʔyk mdbrʔ
02:14	wnrbʕwn bgwh gzrʔ wklhyn ḥywtʔ dʕmmʔ ʔp qqʔ wqwpdʔ bbtyh nbwtwn wḥywtʔ nnhmn bgwh wḥrbʔ btrʕyh mṭwl dʕqrh ʔtprsy
02:15	hdʔ hy mdyntʔ ʕšyntʔ dytbʔ hwt bšlyʔ wʔmrʔ hwt blbh ʔnʔ/dʔnʔ#3#/ ʔnʔ wlyt twb ʔkwty ʔyknʔ hwt lḥblʔ wbyt mrbʕʔ lḥywtʔ kl mn dnʕbr ʕlyh ntmh wnšrq wnnyp bʔydh wnʔmr
03:01	ʔwy mdyntʔ ydyʕtʔ wpryqtʔ mdynth dywnn
03:02	dlʔ šmʕt bqlʔ wlʔ qblt mrdwtʔ wbmryʔ lʔ sbrt wlwt ʔlhh lʔ qrbt
03:03	rwrbnyh bgwh ʔyk ʔrywtʔ nhmyn wdynyh ʔyk dʔbʔ drmšʔ wlʔ mktryn lṣprʔ
03:04	nbyyh pḥzyn wgbrʔ ʔnwn ʕwlʔ khnyh ṭwšw mqdšʔ wḥṭpw nmwsʔ
03:05	wmryʔ zdyqʔ bgwh wlʔ ʕbd ʕwlʔ bṣprʔ wbṣprʔ dynwhy yhb bnwhrʔ wlʔ mšwḥr wʕwlʔ lʔ ydʕ bhttʔ
03:06	ʔwbdt ʕmmʔ wʔtḥblt {dwytʔ}<zwytʔ> ʔḥrbt šwqyhwn mn bly dʕbr ṣdy mdynthwn mn bly ʔnš wmn bly dytb
03:07	ʔmrt dly tdḥlwn wmny tqblwn mrdwtʔ wlʔ nʔbd mn <qdm#3#> ʕynyh klmdm dpqdt ʕlyh ʔtṭybw wqrwbw wḥblw klhyn ṣnʕthwn
03:08	mkyl skw ly ʔmr mryʔ lywmʔ dqʔm ʔnʔ lshdwtʔ mṭl dmṭy dyny lmknšw ʕmmʔ/lʕmmʔ#3#/ wlmqrbw mlkwtʔ lmʔšd ʕlyhwn rwgzy wklh ḥmtʔ drwgzy mṭl \dbnwrʔ dṭnny /dbṭnny#3#/ ttʔkl klh ʔrʕʔ
03:09	whydyn ʔhpk ʕl ʕmmʔ sptʔ gbytʔ dnqrwn klhwn bšmh dmryʔ wnplḥwnh bnyrʔ ḥd
03:10	mn ʕbr nhrwtʔ dkwš nytwn ly dbḥʔ
03:11	bywmʔ hw lʔ tbhtyn mn kwlhyn ṣnʕtky dʔʕlyty by whydyn ʔʕbr mnky ʕwšnʔ dgʔywtky wlʔ twspyn twb lmtrwrbw ʕl ṭwrʔ dqwdšy
03:12	wʔwtr bgwky ʕmʔ msknʔ wmkykʔ wnsbrwn bšmh dmryʔ
03:13	wʔylyn dʔštḥrw/dʔštwḥrw#3#/ mn dbyt ʔysryl lʔ nʕbdwn ʕwlʔ wlʔ nmllwn dglwtʔ wlʔ nštkḥ bpwmhwn lšnʔ dnklʔ mṭl dhnwn nrʕwn wnrbʕwn wlʔ nhwʔ lhwn mhrnʔ
03:14	šbḥy brt ṣhywn wybb ʔysryl ḥdy wdwṣy bklh lbky brt ʔwršlm
03:15	ʔʕbr mryʔ dynyky wʔprq mnky bʕldbbyky mlkh dʔysryl mryʔ bgwky twb lʔ tḥzyn byštʔ
03:16	bh bywmʔ hw ntʔmr lʔwršlm lʔ tdḥlyn wlṣhywn lʔ ntrpyn ʔydyky
03:17	mryʔ ʔlhky bgwky gnbrʔ wprwqʔ nbsmky bḥdwtʔ wnḥdtky bḥwbh wndyṣky btšbwḥtʔ
03:18	ʔyk dbywmʔ dʕdʕʔdʔ wʔʕbr mnky ʔylyn dmmllyn hww ʕlyky ḥsdʔ
03:19	hʔ ʕbd ʔnʔ lklhwn/lhwn#3#/ kd mmkkyn bgwky bzbnʔ hw wʔprwq lkbyštʔ wlrḥyqtʔ ʔknš wʔʕbd ʔnwn lšmʔ wltšbwḥtʔ bklh ʔrʕʔ dbhtthwn
03:20	bh bzbnʔ hw ʔytykwn wbh bzbnʔ hw ʔknškwn wʔtlkwn lšmʔ wltšbwḥtʔ bklhwn ʕmmʔ dʔrʕʔ mʔ dmhpk ʔnʔ šbytkwn lʕnyhwn/lʕynykwn#3#/ ʔmr mryʔ
99:99	\šlmt nbywth dṣpnyʔ /šlm ṣpnyʔ#3#/
01:01	bšnt trtyn ddrywš mlkʔ byrḥʔ štytyʔ bḥd byrḥʔ hwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ byd ḥgy nbyʔ ʕl zwrbbl br šltʔyl rbʔ dyhwdʔ wʕl yšwʕ br ywzdq khnʔ rbʔ lmʔmr
01:02	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʕmʔ hnʔ ʔmryn lʔ mṭy zbnʔ dntbnʔ byth dmryʔ
01:03	whwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ byd ḥgy nbyʔ lmʔmr
01:04	zbnʔ hw lkwn hnʔ dʔntwn ytbyn ʔntwn bbtykwn kd mṭllyn wbytʔ hnʔ ḥrb
01:05	mkyl hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ symw lbwtkwn ʕl ʔwrḥtkwn
01:06	dzrʕyn ʔntwn sgy wḥmlyn ʔntwn qlyl wʔklyn ʔntwn wlʔ sbʕyn ʔntwn wštyn ʔntwn wlʔ rwyn ʔntwn wlbšyn ʔntwn wlʔ šḥnyn ʔntwn wʔynʔ dʔyt bkwn dmttgr mttgr lṣrrʔ nqybʔ
01:07	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ symw lbwtkwn ʕl ʔwrḥtkwn
01:08	sqw lṭwrʔ ʔytw qysʔ wbnw bytʔ hnʔ wʔṣṭbʔ bh wʔštbḥ bh ʔmr mryʔ
01:09	ḥyryn ʔntwn bswgʔʔ whwʔ lh qlyl wmʕlyn ʔntwn lgw bytʔ wnpḥ ʔnʔ bh wʕl mnʔ hlyn ʔmr mryʔ ʕl dḥrb byty wʔntwn rhṭyn ʔntwn ʔnš lbyth
01:10	mṭltkwn ʔtklyw šmyʔ mn ṭlʔ wʔrʕʔ klt pʔryh
01:11	wqryt ḥrbʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ wʕl ṭwrʔ wʕl ʕbwrʔ wʕl ḥmrʔ wʕl mšḥʔ wʕl kl mdm dmpqʔ ʔrʕʔ wʕl bnynšʔ wʕl bʕyrʔ wʕl klh lʔwtʔ dʔydykwn
01:12	wšmʕ zwrbbl br šltʔyl wyšwʕ br ywzdq khnʔ rbʔ wklh šrkʔ dʕmʔ bqlh dmryʔ ʔlhhwn wlptgmwhy dḥgy nbyʔ dšdrh mryʔ ʔlhhwn lwthwn wdḥlw ʕmʔ mn qdm mryʔ
01:13	wʔmr ḥgy mlʔkh dmryʔ bmlʔkwth dmryʔ lʕmʔ ʔnʔ ʕmkwn ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ
01:14	wʔʕyr mryʔ rwḥh dzwrbbl br šltʔyl rbʔ dyhwdʔ wrwḥh dyšwʕ br ywzdq khnʔ rbʔ wrwḥʔ dklh šrkh dʕmʔ wʔzlw wʕbdw ʕbdʔ bbyth dmryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhhwn
01:15	bywm ʔrbʕʔ wʕsryn byrḥʔ štytyʔ bšnt trtyn ddrywš mlkʔ
02:01	wbyrḥʔ šbyʕyʔ bḥd wʕsryn hwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ byd ḥgy nbyʔ lmʔmr
02:02	ʔmr lzwrbbl br šltʔyl rbʔ dyhwdʔ wlyšwʕ br ywzdq khnʔ rbʔ wlklh šrkh dʕmʔ
02:03	mnw ʔštḥr bkwn dḥzyhy lbytʔ hnʔ bšwbḥh qdmyʔ whšʔ ʔyknʔ ḥzyn ʔntwn lh lʔ hwʔ ʔyk lʔ mdm ḥšyb bʕynykwn
02:04	mkyl ʔtḥyl zwrbbl ʔmr mryʔ wʔtḥyl yšwʕ br ywzdq khnʔ rbʔ wʔtḥylw klh ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ ʔmr mryʔ wʕbdh mṭl dʔnʔ ʕmkwn ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ
02:05	ptgmʔ dʔqymt ʕmkwn/ʕlykwn#3#/ kd npqtwn mn mṣryn/ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn#3#/ rwḥy qymʔ byntkwn lʔ tdḥlwn
02:06	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ twb ḥdʔ zbn mzyʕ ʔnʔ šmyʔ wʔrʕʔ wymʔ wybšʔ
02:07	wʔzyʕ lklhwn ʕmmʔ wnytwn rgtʔ dklhwn ʕmmʔ wʔmlywhy lbytʔ hnʔ šwbḥʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ
02:08	dyly hw sʔmʔ wdyly hw dhbʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ
02:09	wnhwʔ rb šwbḥh dbytʔ hnʔ ʔḥryʔ ṭb mn qdmyʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ wbʔtrʔ hnʔ ʔtl šlmy ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ
02:10	wbʔrbʕʔ wʕsryn byrḥʔ tšyʕyʔ bšnt trtyn ddrywš hwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ byd ḥgy nbyʔ lmʔmr
02:11	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ šʔlw ʕl nmwsʔ mn khnʔ
02:12	ʔn šql gbrʔ bsrʔ dqwdšʔ bknpʔ dmrṭwṭh wqrb bknph llḥmʔ wlbwšlʔ wlḥmrʔ wlmštʔ wlkwl mʔklʔ dlmʔ mškḥ mtqdš ʕnw khnʔ wʔmryn lʔ
02:13	ʔmr ḥgy ʔn qrb ʔynʔ dṭmʔʔ npšh lhlyn klhyn lʔ mstyb ʕnw khnʔ wʔmryn lh mstyb
02:14	ʕnʔ ḥgy wʔmr hknʔ hw ʕmʔ hnʔ whknʔ hy šrbtʔ hdʔ qdmy ʔmr mryʔ whknʔ ʔnwn klhwn ʕbdʔ dʔydyhwn wmdm dmqrbyn tmn msyb hw
02:15	mkyl symw lbkwn mn ywmʔ hnʔ wlhl ʕdlʔ ʔttsymt kʔpʔ ʕl kʔpʔ bhyklh dmryʔ
02:16	kd ʕʔlyn hwytwn ʕl kryʔ dʕsryn whwʔ <lh#2#> ʕsrʔ wʕʔlyn ʔntwn/hwytwn#23#/ ʕl mʕṣrtʔ dḥmšyn whwyn lhwn ʕsryn
02:17	mḥytkwn bšwbʔ wbyrqnʔ wbbrdʔ lklh ʕbdʔ dʔydykwn wlʔ ʔtpnytwn lwty ʔmr mryʔ
02:18	mkyl šʕbdw lbwtkwn mn ywmʔ hnʔ wlhl mn ywm ʔrbʕʔ wʕsryn byrḥʔ <hnʔ#3#> dtšʕʔ mn ywmʔ dʔttsymt štʔstʔ dhyklh dmryʔ <ḥyltnʔ lmtbnyw#3#> symw lbkwn/blbkwn#3#/
02:19	dlyt zrʕʔ bʔdrʔ wgptʔ wttʔ wrwmnʔ wʔylnʔ dzytʔ lʔ ṭʕnw wmn ywmnʔ brk ʔnʔ lhwn ʔmr mryʔ
02:20	whwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕl ḥgy dtrtyn zbnyn bʔrbʕʔ wʕsryn byrḥʔ lmʔmr
02:21	ʔmr lzwrbbl rbʔ dyhwdʔ ʔnʔ ʔzyʕ šmyʔ wʔrʕʔ
02:22	wʔhpk kwrsyʔ dmlkwtʔ wʔwbd ʕwšnʔ dmlkwtʔ dʕmmʔ wʔhpk mrkbtʔ ʕl rkbyhyn wnplyn rkšʔ wrkbyhwn gbr bspsrʔ dʔḥwhy
02:23	bh bywmʔ hw ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔsbk zwrbbl br šltʔyl ʕbdy ʔmr mryʔ ʔsymk ʔyk ḥtmʔ mṭl dlk gbyt ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ
99:99	\šlmt nbywth dḥgy <nbyʔ#3#> /šlm ḥgy#3#/
01:01	byrḥʔ dtmnyʔ bḥd byrḥʔ bšnt trtyn ddrywš hwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕl zkryʔ br brkyʔ br ʕdw nbyʔ lmʔmr
01:02	rgz mryʔ ʕl ʔbhykwn rwgzʔ <rbʔ#3#>
01:03	ʔmr lhwn hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔtpnw lwty ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ wʔtpnʔ ʕlykwn ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ
01:04	wlʔ thwwn ʔyk ʔbhykwn dʔkrzw ʕlyhwn nbyʔ qdmyʔ wʔmrw hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔtpnw mn ʔwrḥtkwn byštʔ wmn ʕbdykwn byšʔ wlʔ šmʕw wlʔ ṣtwny ʔmr mryʔ <ḥyltnʔ#23#>
01:05	ʔykʔ ʔnwn ʔbhykwn wnbyy dlmʔ lʕlm ḥyyn
01:06	lptgmy dyn wlpwqdny dpqdt lʕbdy nbyʔ ʔtdkrw ʔnwn ʔbhykwn wʔtrʕyw wʔmrw ʔyk dʔtrʕy mryʔ ḥyltnʔ/ʔlhʔ#3#/ lmʕbd ln ʔyk ʔwrḥtn wʔyk ṣnʕtn hknʔ ʕbd ln
01:07	bywm ʔrbʕʔ wʕsryn byrḥʔ dḥdʕsr dhw šbṭ bšnt trtyn ddrywš hwʔ ptgmh dmryʔ ʕl zkryʔ br brkyʔ br ʕdw nbyʔ lmʔmr
01:08	ḥzyt bllyʔ gbrʔ drkyb ʕl swsyʔ swmqʔ wqʔm bynt/byt#3#/ ʔylnʔ dmṭllyn wbtrh rkšʔ swmqʔ wpyskyʔ wḥwrʔ
01:09	wʔmrt mnʔ ʔnwn hlyn mry ʕnʔ mlʔkʔ dmmll by wʔmr ly ʔnʔ ʔḥwyk mnʔ ʔnwn hlyn
01:10	ʕnʔ gbrʔ dqʔm bynt ʔylnʔ wʔmr ly hlyn ʔnwn dšdr mryʔ lmhlkw bʔrʕʔ
01:11	wʕnw wʔmrw lmlʔkh dmryʔ dqʔm bynt ʔylnʔ hlkn bʔrʕʔ wklh ʔrʕʔ ytbʔ wšlyʔ
01:12	wʕnʔ mlʔkh dmryʔ wʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʕd ʔmty lʔ mrḥm ʔnt ʕl ʔwršlm wʕl mdyntʔ dyhwdʔ drgzt ʕlyhwn hʔ šbʕyn šnyn
01:13	wʕnʔ mryʔ lmlʔkʔ dmmll by mlʔ špyrtʔ wptgmʔ dbwyʔʔ
01:14	wʔmr ly mlʔkʔ dmmll by ʔkrz wʔmr hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ṭnt bʔwršlm wbṣhywn ṭnnʔ rbʔ
01:15	wrwgzʔ rbʔ rgz ʔnʔ ʕl ʕmmʔ dmtrgšyn ʔnʔ gyr rgzt qlyl whnwn ʕdrw lbyštʔ
01:16	mṭl hlyn hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔtpnyt ʕl ʔwršlm brḥmyn wbyty yhb ʔnʔ bgwh ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ wšwytʔ ttmtḥ ʕl ʔwršlm
01:17	twb ʔkrz wʔmr hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ mkyl nstrqn mdyntʔ mn ṭbtʔ wnbnʔ twb mryʔ lṣhywn wngbʔ twb lʔwršlm
02:01	wʔrymt ʕyny wḥzyt whʔ ʔrbʕ qrnn
02:02	wʔmrt lmlʔkʔ dmmll by mnʔ ʔnyn hlyn mry wʔmr ly hlyn ʔnyn qrntʔ dbdr lyhwdʔ wlʔysryl wlʔwršlm
02:03	wḥwyny mryʔ ʔrbʕʔ ngrʔ
02:04	wʔmrt mnʔ ʔtyn hlyn lmʕbd wʔmr ly hlyn qrntʔ dbdr lyhwdʔ ʔyk pwmh dgbrʔ dlʔ ʔrym ryšh wʔtw hlyn dnzyʕwn ʔnyn wnʕqrwn qrntʔ dʕmmʔ dmrymyn hww qrnʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ dyhwdʔ lmbdrwth
02:05	wʔrymt ʕyny wḥzyt gbrʔ wbʔydh šwytʔ dmšwḥtʔ
02:06	wʔmrt lh lʔykʔ ʔzl ʔnt wʔmr ly dʔmšḥyh lʔwršlm wʔḥzʔ kmʔ ʔwrkh wkmʔ ptyh
02:07	wnpq mlʔkʔ dmmll by wmlʔkʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔtʔ lʔwrʕh
02:08	wʔmr lh hrṭ wʔmr lʕlymʔ hw ʔgwrsʔ ttb ʔwršlm mn swgʔʔ dbny ʔnšʔ wdbʕyrʔ/wbʕyrʔ#2#/ dbgwh
02:09	wʔnʔ ʔhwʔ bgwh ʔmr mryʔ ʔyk šwrʔ dnwrʔ wltšbwḥtʔ ʔhwʔ bgwh
02:10	ʔw ʔw ʕrwqw mn ʔrʕʔ dgrbyʔ ʔmr mryʔ mṭl dlʔrbʕ rwḥy šmyʔ bdrtwn ʔmr mryʔ
02:11	ʔw ṣhywn ʔštwzby ʕmwrtʔ dbrt bbl
02:12	mṭl dhknʔ ʔmr mryʔ <ʔlhʔ#3#> ḥyltnʔ btr ʔyqrʔ šdrny ʕl ʕmmʔ dbzyn lkwn wmn dqrb lkwn lbbtʔ hw dʕynh qrb
02:13	mṭl dhʔ ʔnʔ mrym ʔnʔ ʔydy ʕlyhwn wnhwwn lbztʔ ʕbdyhwn wtdʕwn dmryʔ ḥyltnʔ šdrny
02:14	šbḥy wḥdy brt ṣhywn mṭl dhʔ ʔnʔ ʔtʔ ʔnʔ wšdʔ ʔnʔ bgwky ʔmr mryʔ

03:01	wḥwyny lyšwʕ khnʔ rbʔ kd qʔm qdm mlʔkh dmryʔ wsṭnʔ qʔm hwʔ mn ymynh dnkywhy
03:02	wʔmr mlʔkʔ dmryʔ lsṭnʔ sṭnʔ ngʕwr bk mryʔ ngʕwr bk mryʔ dgbh lʔwršlm hnw ʔwdʔ dʔtplṭ mn nwrʔ
03:03	wyšwʕ lbyš hwʔ mʔnʔ ṣʔʔ wqʔm hwʔ qdm mlʔkh dmryʔ

03:08	šmʕ yšwʕ khnʔ rbʔ ʔnt wḥbryk hlyn dqymyn/dytbyn#2#/ qdmyk mṭl dgbrʔ ʔntwn dtdmwrtʔ dhʔ mytʔ ʔnʔ lʕbdy dnḥʔ
03:09	mṭl dhʔ kʔpʔ dyhbt qdm yšwʕ ʕl kʔpʔ ḥdʔ šbʕ ʕynyn hʔ ptḥ ʔnʔ trʕyh ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ wʔmwš ʕwlh dʔrʕʔ hy bywmʔ hw

04:01	whpk mlʔkʔ dmmll by wʔʕyrny ʔyk gbrʔ dmttʕyr mn šnth
04:02	wʔmr ly mnʔ ḥzyt wʔmrt mnrtʔ ddhbʔ wkptʔ ʕl ryšh wšbʕʔ šrgyn ʕlyh wšbʕʔ šbʕʔ pwmyn lšrgʔ dʔyt bryšh
04:03	wtryn zytyn ʔyt ʕlyh ḥd mn ymynh dkptʔ wḥd mn smlh

04:11	ʕnyt wʔmrt lh wmnʔ ʔnwn hlyn tryn zytyn dmn ymynh dkʔpʔ wmn smlh

05:01	wʔrymt/whpkt ʔrymt#3#/ ʕyny wḥzyt mgltʔ dprḥʔ

05:03	wʔmr ly hdʔ hy lwṭtʔ dnpqʔ ʕl/mn#3#/ ʔpyh dklh ʔrʕʔ mṭl dkl dgnb mnh ʔkwth zkʔ wkl dymʔ mnh ʔkwth zkʔ

09:15	wmryʔ ḥyltnʔ ngn ʕlyhwn wnʔklwn wnkbšwn kʔpʔ bqlʕʔ wnštwn dlwḥyʔ ʔyk ḥmrʔ wntmlwn ʔyk mzgʔ wʔyk zwytʔ dmdbḥʔ
09:16	wnprwq ʔnwn mryʔ ʔlhhwn bywmʔ hw lʕmh ʔyk ʕnʔ mṭl dkʔpʔ hwy qdyštʔ dšdyn hwy bʔrʕh

10:01	šʔlw mṭrʔ mn mryʔ bzbnʔ lqyšyʔ wmryʔ ʕbd rsysʔ wmṭrʔ bkyryʔ ntl lkwn dnrbʔ ʕsbʔ bdbrʔ
10:02	mṭl dydwʕʔ mllw ʕwlʔ wqṣwmʔ ḥzw dglwtʔ wḥlmʔ dglʔ mllw wbyʔw bsryqwtʔ mṭl hnʔ šqlw ʔyk ʕnʔ wʔtmkkw dlyt lhwn rʕyʔ
10:03	ʕl rʕwtʔ ʔtḥmt rwgzy wlgzrʔ ʔpqwd mṭl dpqd mryʔ ḥyltnʔ lgzrh ldbyt yhwdʔ wʕbd ʔnwn ʔyk swsyʔ dzhʔ bqrbʔ
10:04	mnhwn zwytʔ wmnhwn sktʔ wmnhwn qštʔ bqrbʔ wmnhwn npqwn klhwn šlyṭnyhwn ʔyk ḥdʔ
10:05	wnhwwn ʔyk gbrʔ ddyšyn synʔ bšwqʔ bqrbʔ ntktšwn mṭl dmryʔ ʕmhwn wnbhtwn rkby rkšʔ
10:06	wʔḥyl ldbyt yhwdʔ wʔprwq ldbyt ywsp wʔpnʔ ʔnwn mṭl dmrḥm ʔnʔ ʕlyhwn wnhwwn ʔyk dlʔ ṭʕyt ʔnwn mṭl dʔnʔ mryʔ ʔlhʔ ʔʕnʔ ʔnwn
10:07	wnhwwn ʔyk gnbrʔ dʔprym wnḥdʔ lbhwn ʔyk dmn ḥmrʔ wbnyhwn nḥzwn wnḥdwn wnrwz lbhwn bmryʔ
10:08	ʔšrq lhwn wʔknš ʔnwn mṭl dprq ʔnʔ lhwn wnsgwn ʔyk dsgyʔyn hww
10:09	wʔzrwʕ ʔnwn bʕmmʔ wbʔtrwtʔ rḥyqʔ nšbḥwnny wntrswn lbnyhwn wnhpkwn
10:10	wʔhpk ʔnwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wmn ʔtwr ʔknš ʔnwn wlʔrʕʔ dglʕd wllbnn/wdlbnn#3#/ ʔytʔ ʔnwn wlʔ nmlyn lhwn
10:11	wnʕbr bymʔ ʔwlṣnʔ wnhpk bymʔ gllʔ wnbhtwn klhwn ʕwmqwhy/ʕmwrwhy#3#/ dnhrʔ wtbṭl gʔywth dʔtwryʔ wšwlṭnh dmṣryʔ nʕbr
10:12	wʔḥyl ʔnwn bmryʔ wlšmh nsbrwn ʔmr mryʔ
11:01	ptḥ lbnn trʕyk wtʔkwl nwrʔ lʔrzyk
11:02	nyll šrwynʔ mṭl dnpl ʔrzʔ wʕšynʔ ʔtbzzw nyllwn blwṭʔ dbyšn <mṭl#3#> dnpl ʕbʔ ʕšynʔ
11:03	qlʔ dylltʔ drʕwtʔ dʔtbzt rbwthwn qlʔ dʔrywtʔ dnhmyn dʔtbzz ʕwšnh dywrdnn
11:04	hknʔ ʔmr <ly#3#> mryʔ ʔlhy rʕy lʕnʔ qṭyntʔ/qṭyltʔ#5#/
11:05	dzbwnyhyn qṭlyn lhyn wlʔ mtḥybyn wmzbnnyhyn ʔmryn bryk <hw#3#> mryʔ dʔʕtrn wrʕwthyn lʔ ḥysyn ʕlyhwn
11:06	mṭl dlʔ ḥʔs ʔnʔ twb ʕl ʕmwryh dʔrʕʔ ʔmr mryʔ whʔ mšlm ʔnʔ lhwn lbny ʔnšʔ ʔnš byd ḥbrh wbyd mlkh wnplgwnh lʔrʕʔ wlʔ ʔpṣyh mn ʔydyhwn
11:07	wrʕyt lʕnʔ qṭyntʔ/qṭyltʔ#5#/ mṭl knšʔ dʕnʔ wnsbt ly tryn ḥwṭryn lḥd qryt bsymʔ wlʔḥrnʔ ḥblʔ wrʕyt lʕnʔ <qṭyntʔ#23#>
11:08	wʔwbdt tltʔ rʕwtʔ byrḥʔ ḥd wmʔnt npšy bhwn wʔp npšthwn ʕwy ʕly
11:09	wʔmrt dlʔ ʔrʕykwn dmytʔ tmwt wdʔbdʔ tʔbd wʔydʔ dmštḥrʔ tʔkwl bsrʔ dḥbrth

11:11	wbṭl by bywmʔ hw wydʕw mkykʔ dʕnʔ dnṭryn/dnṭyryn#3#/ hww ly dptgmh hw/hwʔ#3#/ dmryʔ
11:12	wʔmrt lhwn ʔn špyr bʕynykwn hbw ly ʔgry ʔw ṭlmyn ʔntwn ly wtqlwhy lʔgry tltyn/dtltyn#3#/ dkspʔ
11:13	wʔmr ly mryʔ ʔrmyhy byt gzʔ šwbḥʔ dʔyqrʔ dʔwqrt/dʔwbdt#3#/ mnhwn wnsbt tltyn/ltltyn#3#/ dkspʔ wʔrmyt ʔnwn byt gzʔ bbyth dmryʔ
11:14	wtbrt lḥblʔ ḥwṭry ʔḥrnʔ dʔbṭl ʔwywtʔ dʔyt hwt byt yhwdʔ lʔysyrl

11:16	mṭl dhʔ ʔnʔ mqym ʔnʔ rʕyʔ bʔrʕʔ dʔbdn lʔ npqwd wdṭʕyn lʔ nbʕʔ wdtbyrn lʔ nʕṣwb wdkryhn lʔ nʔsʔ wdqymn lʔ ntrsʔ wbsrʔ dšmyntʔ nʔkwl wkrʕyhwyn nʕrq

12:01	ḥzwʔ dptgmwhy dmryʔ ʕl ʔysryl ʔmr mryʔ dmtḥ šmyʔ wʔtqn štʔsyh dʔrʕʔ wbrʔ rwḥh dbrnšʔ bgwh
12:02	hʔ ʔnʔ ʕbd ʔnʔ lh lʔwršlm trʕʔ drʕlʔ lklhwn ʕmmʔ dḥdyryn/dḥdryn#3#/ lh ʔp ʕl yhwdʔ nhwʔ ʔwlṣnʔ ʕm ʔwršlm
12:03	wnhwʔ bh bywmʔ hw ʔʕbdyh lʔwršlm kʔpʔ ddyšʔ lklhwn ʕmmʔ wklhwn dywšyh mstrṭw nstrṭwn wntknšwn ʕlyh klhwn ʕmmʔ dʔrʕʔ
12:04	bh bywmʔ hw ʔmr mryʔ ʔmḥʔ lklhwn rkšʔ btmhʔ wrkbyhwn btwrʔ wʕl dbyt yhwdʔ ʔptḥ ʕyny wklhwn rkšʔ dʕmmʔ ʔmḥʔ bʕwrʔ
12:05	wnʔmrwn rwrbnʔ dyhwdʔ blbhwn ʕšnw mnn ʕmwryh dʔwršlm bmryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhhwn
12:06	bh bywmʔ hw ʔʕbr lrwrbnʔ dyhwdʔ ʔyk gmwrtʔ dnwrʔ bqysʔ wʔyk lmpʔdʔ dnwrʔ bḥbtʔ wnʔklwn lymynʔ wlsmlʔ lklhwn ʕmmʔ dḥdyryn lhwn wttb ʔwršlm twb bdwkth bʔwršlm
12:07	wnpqwd mryʔ lmšknʔ dyhwdʔ ʔyk dmn lwqdm mṭwl dlʔ tsgʔ tšbwḥtʔ dbyt dwyd wtšbwḥtʔ dʕmwryh dʔwršlm ʕl dbyt yhwdʔ
12:08	bh bywmʔ hw ngn mryʔ ʕl ʕmwryh dʔwršlm wnhwʔ kryhʔ dbhwn bywmʔ hw ʔyk dwyd wbyt/wdbyt#3#/ dwyd ʔyk ʔlhʔ ʔyk mlʔkh dmryʔ dqdmyhwn
12:09	wnhwʔ bh bywmʔ hw <ʔmr mryʔ#2#> ʔbʕʔ lmwbdw lklhwn ʕmmʔ dʔtyn ʕl ʔwršlm
12:10	wʔšwd ʕl dbyt dwyd wʕl <klhwn#23#> ʕmwryh dʔwršlm rwḥʔ drwḥpʔ wdrḥmʔ wnḥwrwn \lwty bmn /lwt mn#3#/ ddqrw wnrqdwn ʕlwhy ʔyk dmrqdyn ʕl yḥydʔ wnttbrwn ʕlwhy ʔyk dmttbryn ʕl bwkrʔ
12:11	bh bywmʔ hw tsgʔ mrqwdtʔ bʔwršlm ʔyk mrqwdtʔ dbr ʔmwn dbpqʕt mgdw
12:12	wtrqd ʔrʕʔ šrbn šrbn ʔyk ḥdʔ šrbtʔ dbyt dwyd ʔkḥdʔ wnšyhwn ʔkḥdʔ šrbtʔ dbyt ntn/šmʕwn#3#/ ʔkḥdʔ wnšyhwn ʔkḥdʔ

13:03	wʔn twb ntnbʔ gbrʔ nʔmrwn lh ʔbwhy wʔmh lʔ tḥʔ mṭl ddglwtʔ mllt bšmh dmryʔ wnʔsrwnh ʔbwhy wʔmh dyldwhy mʔ dʔtnby
13:04	bh bywmʔ hw nbhtwn nbyʔ dglʔ ʔnš mn ḥzwʔ dnbywth wlʔ ntkbnwn mškʔ dsʕrʔ mṭl dkdbw
13:05	wnʔmr lʔ hwyt nbyʔ ʔlʔ gbrʔ ʔnʔ dplḥ bʔrʕʔ/ʔrʕʔ#3#/ wbrnšʔ ʔṭnny mn ṭlywty
13:06	wnʔmrwn lh mnʔ ʔnyn hlyn mḥwtʔ dbʔydyk wnʔmr hlyn mḥwtʔ dblʕt byt/mn#3#/ rḥmy
13:07	sypʔ ʔttʕyr ʕl rʕyʔ dyly wʕl gbrʔ rḥmy ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ mḥy lrʕyʔ wttbdr ʕnh wʔhpk ʔydy ʕl ʕlnʔ
