14:01	hʔ ywmʔ dmryʔ ʔtʔ wttplg bztky bky
14:02	wʔknš lklhwn ʕmmʔ lʔwršlm lqrbʔ wttḥd mdyntʔ wntbzwn btʔ wnšʔ nṣṭʕrn wnpwq plgh dmdyntʔ bšbyʔ wplgh dʕmʔ lʔ nʔbd mn mdyntʔ
14:03	wnpwq mryʔ wntktš ʕm ʕmmʔ hnwn ʔyk ywmʔ dʔtktš bywmʔ dqrbʔ
14:04	wnqwmn rglwhy ʕl ṭwrʔ dzytʔ dlwqbl/lwqbl#3#/ ʔwršlm bmdnḥyh/bmdnḥh#3#/ wntplg ṭwrʔ dzytʔ plgh lmdnḥʔ wplgh lmʕrbʔ wnhwʔ bh nḥlʔ dṭb rb/rm#3#/ wnštbq plgh dṭwrʔ lgrbyʔ wplgh ltymnʔ
14:05	wtʕrqwn lnḥlʔ dṭwrʔ mṭl dnmṭʔ nḥlhwn dṭwrʔ lʔwlṣnʔ wtʕrqwn ʔyk dʕrqtwn mn qdm zwʕʔ dhwʔ bywmwhy dʕwzyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wnʕwl mryʔ ʔlhy wklhwn qdyšwhy ʕmh
14:06	bh bywmʔ hw lʔ nhwʔ nwhrʔ ʔlʔ ʕryʔ wglydʔ
14:07	wnhwʔ ywmʔ ḥd wywmʔ hw ntydʕ lmryʔ lʔ llyʔ wlʔ ʔymmʔ wlʕdn rmšʔ nhwʔ nwhrʔ
14:08	bh bywmʔ hw npqwn myʔ ḥyʔ mn ʔwršlm plghwn lymʔ mdnḥyʔ wplghwn lymʔ mʕrbyʔ qyṭʔ wstwʔ
14:09	wnhwʔ mryʔ mlkʔ ʕl klh ʔrʕʔ bh bywmʔ hw nhwʔ mryʔ ḥd wšmh ḥd
14:10	wnḥdryh lkwlh ʔrʕʔ ʔyk pqʕtʔ dmn/mn#3#/ gbʕ wʕdmʔ lrmwn dbtymnyh/dbtymnh#3#/ dʔwršlm wttrym wttb bdwkth mn trʕʔ/ʔrʕʔ#3#/ dbnymyn wʕdmʔ lʔtrʔ/lʔtrʔ#3#/ dtrʕʔ qdmyʔ wʕdmʔ ltrʕʔ dzwytʔ wmn mgdlʔ dḥnnʔyl wʕdmʔ lmʕṣrtʔ dmlkʔ
14:11	ntbwn bh wtwb ḥrmʔ/ḥrbʔ#3#/ lʔ nhwʔ wttb ʔwršlm bšlyʔ
14:12	whdʔ thwʔ mḥwtʔ dnmḥʔ mryʔ lklhwn ʕmmʔ dmtḥylyn ʕl ʔwršlm ntmsʔ bsrhwn kd qymyn ʕl rglyhwn wʕynyhwn ntmsyn bdwkythyn wlšnhwn ntmsʔ bpwmhwn
14:13	bh bywmʔ hw thwʔ bhwn twhtʔ rbtʔ dmryʔ wnʔḥdwn ʔnš lḥbrh wtdbq ʔydh bʔydʔ dḥbrh
14:14	wʔp yhwdʔ ntktš bʔwršlm wnknš qnynʔ dklhwn ʕmmʔ dḥdyryn lh dhbʔ wsʔmʔ wnḥtʔ dṭb sgyʔyn
14:15	whknʔ thwʔ mḥwtʔ dswsyʔ wdkwdnyʔ wdgmlʔ wdḥmrʔ wdkwlh bʕyrʔ dthwʔ bmšrytʔ hlyn ʔyk mḥwtʔ hdʔ
14:16	wnhwʔ kl <mn#23#> dmštḥr mn klhwn ʕmmʔ dʔtyn ʕl ʔwršlm nsqwn mn šnʔ lšnʔ lmsgd \lmlkʔ mryʔ /lmryʔ#3#/ ḥyltnʔ wlmʕbd ʕdʕʔdʔ dmṭllʔ
14:17	wnhwʔ mn dlʔ nsq mn klhyn šrbtʔ dʔrʕʔ lʔwršlm lmsgd lmlkʔ mryʔ ḥyltnʔ lʔ nḥwt ʕlyhwn mṭrʔ
14:18	wʔn šrbtʔ dmṣryn lʔ tsq wlʔ tʔtʔ ʔp ʕlyhwn thwʔ mḥwtʔ dnmḥʔ mryʔ lʕmmʔ ʔylyn dlʔ slqyn lmʕbd ʕdʕʔdʔ dmṭllʔ
14:19	whdʔ thwʔ ḥṭyth dmṣryn wḥṭytʔ dklhwn ʕmmʔ ʔylyn dlʔ slqyn lmʕbd ʕdʕʔdʔ dmṭlʔ
14:20	bh bywmʔ hw nhwʔ ʕl pgwdth dswsyʔ qwdšʔ lmryʔ wnhwwn qdsʔ dbbyth dmryʔ ʔyk pylsʔ dqdm mdbḥʔ
14:21	wnhwʔ kl qdsʔ dbyhwdʔ wbʔwršlm qwdšʔ lmryʔ ḥyltnʔ wnʔtwn kwl dmdbḥyn nsbwn mnhwn wnbšlwn bhwn wlʔ nhwʔ twb knʕnyʔ bbyth dmryʔ ḥyltnʔ bywmʔ hw
99:99	\šlmt nbywth dzkryʔ /šlm zkryʔ#3# /šlm zkryʔ nbyʔ#3#/
01:01	ḥzwʔ dptgmwhy dmryʔ ʕl ʔysryl byd mlʔky
01:02	rḥmtkwn ʔmr mryʔ wʔmryn ʔntwn bmnʔ rḥmtn dlmʔ ʕsw lʔ hwʔ ʔḥwhy dyʕqwb ʔmr mryʔ drḥmt lyʕqwb
01:03	wlʕsw snyt ʕbdt ṭwrwhy lḥblʔ wyrtwth ldyrʔ dmdbrʔ
01:04	wʔn nʔmrwn ʔdwmyʔ ʔtmsknn nhpwk nbnʔ ḥrbtʔ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ <ḥyltnʔ#2#> hnwn nbnwn wʔnʔ ʔsḥwp wnqrwn ʔnwn tḥwmʔ dḥṭytʔ wʕmʔ drgz ʕlwhy mryʔ lʕlm
01:05	wʕynykwn nḥzyn ʔntwn dyn tʔmrwn nʔrb mryʔ lʕl mn tḥwmʔ dʔysryl
01:06	brʔ myqr lʔbwhy wʕbdʔ lmrh ʔn ʔbʔ ʔnʔ ʔykw dmyqryn ʔntwn ly wʔn mrʔ/mryʔ#3#/ ʔnʔ ʔykw hw ddḥlyn ʔntwn mny ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ lkwn khnʔ dbzyn ʔntwn šmy wʔn ʔmryn ʔntwn bmnʔ ʔbzn šmk
01:07	ʕl dmqrbyn ʔntwn ʕl mdbḥy lḥmʔ ṭnpʔ wʔn ʔmryn ʔntwn bmnʔ ṭnpnk bdʔmryn ʔntwn dšyṭ hw ptwrh dmryʔ
01:08	wdmqrbyn ʔntwn ʕwyrʔ lmdbḥʔ dlmʔ lʔ byš wdmqrbyn ʔntwn ḥgyrʔ wkryhʔ dlmʔ lʔ byš qrbyhy nʔ lšlyṭk dlmʔ rʕʔ lk ʔw nsb bʔpyk ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ
01:09	mkyl ṣlw qdm mryʔ wnrḥm ʕlyn dbʔydykwn hwt hdʔ lʔ ʔsb bʔpykwn ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ
01:10	mnw ʔyt bkwn dnʔḥwd trʕy wlʔ tqrbwn ʕl mdbḥy dmgn lʔ ṣbʔ ʔnʔ bkwn ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ wqwrbnʔ lʔ ʔqbl mnkwn
01:11	mṭl dmn mdnḥwhy dšmšʔ wʕdmʔ lmʕrbwhy rb hw šmy bʕmmʔ wbkl ʔtr symyn bsmʔ wmqrbyn lšmy qwrbnʔ dkyʔ mṭl drb hw šmy bʕmmʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ
01:12	wʔntwn mṭnpyn ʔntwn lh bdʔmryn ʔntwn dptwrh/ptwrh#3#/ dmryʔ mṭnp hw wšyṭn ʔnyn mʔklth
01:13	wʔmryn ʔntwn hnʔ mn dwwnn hw wnpḥt bhyn/bhwn#3#/ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ dmytyn ʔntwn mn ḥṭwpyʔ qwrbnʔ ḥgyrʔ wkryhʔ lʔ mqbl ʔnʔ lhwn mn ʔydykwn ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ
01:14	wlyṭ hw mn dʔyt lh bgzrh dkrʔ wndr wmdbḥ dkryh lmryʔ mṭl dmlkʔ ʔnʔ rbʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ wšmy dḥyl <hw#3#> bʕmmʔ
02:01	mkyl pwqdnʔ hnʔ ʕlykwn hw/ʔw#3#/ khnʔ
02:02	ʔlʔ tšmʕwn wʔlʔ tsymwn blbkwn lmtl ʔyqrʔ lšmy ʔmr mryʔ/mrʔ#3#/ ḥyltnʔ ʔšdr ʕlykwn lwṭtʔ wʔlwṭ bwrktkwn mṭl dlʔ symyn ʔntwn blbkwn
02:03	hʔ gyr ʔnʔ bzrʕʔ dʔrʕʔ wʔdrʔ prtʔ ʕl ʔpykwn wprtʔ ʕl ʕdʕʔdykwn wʔšqwlkwn bh
02:04	wtdʕwn dšdrt lkwn pwqdnʔ hnʔ dthwʔ dytqʔ ʕm lwy ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ
02:05	qymy hwʔ ʕmh ḥyʔ wšlmʔ yhbt ʔnwn lh dḥltʔ dḥl mny wmn qdm šmy/ʔpy#3#/ zʔʕ hwʔ
02:06	nmwsʔ dqwštʔ hwʔ bpwmh wʕwlʔ lʔ ʔštkḥ bspwth bšlmʔ wbtryṣwtʔ hlk ʕmy wsgyʔʔ ʔhpk mn ʕwlʔ
02:07	mṭl dspwth dkhnʔ nṭrn ʔydʕtʔ wnmwsʔ šʔlyn mn pwmh mṭl dmlʔkh/dmlʔkʔ#3#/ hw dmryʔ ḥyltnʔ
02:08	ʔntwn dyn sṭytwn mn ʔwrḥʔ wʔkšltwn lsgyʔʔ mn nmwsʔ wḥbltwn qymʔ dlwy ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ
02:09	ʔp ʔnʔ yhbtkwn šyṭyn wmkykyn/wmmkkyn#3#/ bkl ʕm/ʕmy#3#/ ʕl dlʔ nṭrtwn ʔwrḥty wnsbtwn bʔpʔ bnmwsʔ
02:10	dlmʔ lʔ hwʔ ḥd ʔbʔ lkln ʔw lʔ hwʔ ḥd ʔlhʔ brn lmnʔ mdglynn gbr bʔḥwhy wmṭnpynn qymʔ dʔbhyn
02:11	dgl yhwdʔ wṭnpwtʔ ʔtʕbdt bʔysryl wbʔwršlm mṭl dṭnp yhwdʔ qwdšh dmryʔ ḥyltnʔ wrḥm wplḥ lʔlhʔ nwkryʔ
02:12	nwbd mryʔ lgbrʔ dnʕbd hdʔ wlbrh wlbr brh mn mšknh dyʕqwb wlʔ nhwʔ lh dmqrb qwrbnʔ lmryʔ ḥyltnʔ
02:13	whdʔ ʔḥrtʔ dʕbdtwn ksyt dmʕtʔ lbyth dmryʔ wbktʔ wtnḥtʔ mṭl dlʔ mtpnʔ ʕl qwrbnykwn wlʔ mqbl lh lṣbynʔ mn ʔydykwn
02:14	wʔn ʔmryn ʔntwn ʕl mnʔ ʕl dʔshd mryʔ bynyk lʔntt ṭlywtk dʔnt dglt bh why šwtptk wʔntt qymk
02:15	dlmʔ lʔ hwʔ ḥd gbr wšrkʔ drwḥtʔ dylh hw ḥd bʕʔ zrʕʔ mn ʔlhʔ ʔzdhrw brwḥkwn wʔnš/dʔnš#3#/ bʔntt ṭlywth lʔ ndgl
02:16	ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl wʕwlʔ bmrṭwṭh lʔ nksʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔzdhrw brwḥkwn wlʔ tdglwn
02:17	ʔlʔytwn lmryʔ bptgmykwn wʔn ʔmryn ʔntwn bmnʔ ʔlʔynyhy bdʔmryn ʔntwn dkl dʕbd dbyš špyr <hw#2#> bʕyny mryʔ wbhwn hw ṣbʔ wʔlʔ ʔykw ʔlhʔ ddʔn dynʔ
03:01	hʔ ʔnʔ mšdr ʔnʔ mlʔky wnšpʔ/dnšpʔ#3#/ ʔwrḥʔ qdmy wmn šlyʔ nʔtʔ lhyklh dmryʔ dmskyn ʔntwn lh wmlʔkʔ dqymʔ dṣbyn ʔntwn bh hʔ ʔtʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ
03:02	mnw msybr ywmʔ dʔtʔ bh ʔw mnw mškḥ lmqm ʔmty/mʔ#3#/ dmtglʔ mṭl dʔyk nwrʔ hw dṣrpʔ wʔyk kbrytʔ dmḥwrʔ
03:03	dnhpwk lmṣrp wlmdkyw ʔyk sʔmʔ wndkʔ lbnwhy dlwy wngbʔ ʔnwn ʔyk dhbʔ wʔyk sʔmʔ wnhwwn mqrbyn qwrbnʔ lmryʔ bzdyqwtʔ
03:04	wnbsm lmryʔ qwrbnʔ dyhwdʔ wdʔwršlm ʔyk ywmtʔ dmn ʕlm wʔyk šnyʔ dmn qdym
03:05	wʔqrwb ʕlykwn bdynʔ wʔhwʔ shdʔ msrhbʔ bḥršʔ wbgyrʔ wbʔylyn dymyn <bšmy#3#> bdglwtʔ wbʔylyn dṭlmyn ʔgrʔ dʔgyrʔ wdʕmwrʔ \wdytmʔ wdʔrmltʔ /wdʔrmltʔ wdytmʔ#3#/ wṣlyn ʕl ʔynʔ dmtpnʔ lwty wlʔ dḥlw mny ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ
03:06	mṭl dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mryʔ wlʔ ʔtḥlpt wʔntwn bny yʕqwb lʔ ʕbrtwn mn ʕwlkwn

03:08	dlmʔ ṭlm brnšʔ lʔlhʔ ʔyk dʔntwn ṭlmyn ʔntwn ly wʔn ʔmryn ʔntwn bmnʔ ṭlmnk bmʕsrʔ wbršytʔ

03:11	wʔkʔʔ bʔklʔ dlʔ nḥbl pʔrʔ/pʔryh#3#/ dʔrʕʔ wlʔ tḥrb lkwn ʔp lʔ ḥdʔ gptʔ bʔrʕʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ

022:019	wplgw nḥty bynthwn wʕl lbwšy ʔrmyw psʔ/pṣʔ#3#/
022:020	wʔnt mryʔ lʔ trḥq mny ʔyl ʔyl lʕwdrny ktr
022:021	wpṣh mn ḥrbʔ lnpšy wmn ʔydʔ dklbʔ yḥydwty

034:009	ṭʕmw wḥzw dṭb hw mryʔ wṭwbyhwn lkl dtkylyn ʕlwhy

06:09	ʕdmʔ lʔmty dmk ʔnt ḥbnnʔ ʔmty mn šntk tqwm
06:10	qlyl tnwm wqlyl tdmk wqlyl tsym ʔydk ʕl ḥdyk

12:01	drḥm mrdwtʔ rḥm ydʕtʔ wdsnʔ mksnwtʔ sklʔ hw

12:03	lʔ ntqn br ʔnšʔ bʕwlh wʕqrʔ dzdyqʔ lʔ nzwʕ
12:04	ʔnttʔ gbrnytʔ klylʔ hy dbʕlh wʔyk blṭytʔ wtwlʕʔ bqysʔ hknʔ mwbdʔ lgbrʔ ʔnttʔ ʕbdt byštʔ

12:08	lpwmʔ skwltnʔ mšbḥyn bny ʔnšʔ wdḥsyr rʕynh nttšyṭ/ntšyṭ#2#/

30:04	ʔmr ly mnw slq lšmyʔ wnḥt wmnw ʔḥd/ʔḥyd#2#/ rwḥʔ bḥwpnwhy wmnw/wmn#3#/ ṣr myʔ bšwšpʔ wmnw ʔqym klhwn ʕbryh dʔrʕʔ ʔynw šmh wʔynw/ʔw ʔynw#3#/ šmʔ dbrh ʔn ydʕ ʔnt

30:11	ldrʔ dʔbhwhy nṣḥʔ wlʔmh lʔ nbrk

30:13	drʔ mʔ drmn ʕynwhy wtmrwhy mšql

30:17	ʕynʔ dgḥkʔ ʕl ʔbwh wšyṭʔ sybwtʔ dʔmh nḥṣwnh ʕwrbʔ dnḥlʔ wnʔklwnh bny nšrʔ
30:18	tlt ʔnyn dksyn mny wdʔrbʕ lʔ ydʕt ʔnyn
30:19	ʔwrḥʔ dnšrʔ bšmyʔ wʔwrḥʔ dḥwyʔ ʕl šwʕʔ wʔwrḥʔ dʔlpʔ blbh dymʔ wʔwrḥʔ dgbrʔ bʕlymwth
30:20	hknʔ hy ʔwrḥh dʔnttʔ gyrtʔ ʔklʔ wmkprʔ pwmh wʔmrʔ mdm lʔ ʕbdt

31:02	yy bry wyy br krsy wyy br ndry

31:14	hwt ʔyk ʔlpʔ dtgrʔ dmn rwḥqʔ ʔtyʔ tʔgwrth

31:16	wḥrt bpwlḥnʔ wzbnth wmn pʔrʔ dʔydyh nṣbt krmʔ

31:22	tšwytʔ ʕbdt lh wnḥtʔ dbwṣʔ wdʔrgwnʔ

31:26	pwmh ptḥt bḥkmtʔ wnmwsʔ drḥmʔ ʕl lšnh

01:01	whwʔ bywmy dynʔ hwʔ kpnʔ bʔrʕʔ wʔzl gbrʔ mn byt lḥm dyhwdʔ lmʕmr bʔrʕʔ dmwʔb hw wʔntth wbnwhy mṭl dʕšn kpnʔ bʔrʕʔ
01:02	wšmh lgbrʔ ʔlymlk wšmh dʔntth nʕmy wšmhʔ dbnwhy mlywn wklywn ʔprtyʔ mn byt lḥm dyhwdʔ wʔtw lʔrʕʔ dmwʔb lmʕmr tmn
01:03	wmyt ʔlymlk bʕlh dnʕmy wʔštḥrt hy wtryn bnyh
01:04	wnsbw lhwn nšʔ mwʔbytʔ šmh dḥdʔ ʕrpʔ wšmh dʔḥrtʔ rʕwt wʕmrw tmn ʔyk šnyʔ ʕsr
01:05	wmytw tryhwn bnyh mlywn wklywn wʔtgzyt ʔnttʔ mn bʕlh wmn tryhwn bnyh
01:06	whpkt hy wtrtyn <kllth ʕmh> mn ʔrʕʔ dmwʔb mṭl dšmʕw bʔrʕʔ dmwʔb dsʕr mryʔ lʕmh lmtl lhwn mzwnʔ
01:07	wnpq mn ʔrʕʔ dmʕmrhyn hy wtrtyn klth ʕmh lmhpk wlmʔzl lʔrʕʔ dyhwdʔ
01:08	wʔmrt nʕmy lklth hpwkyn zlyn lʔtrkyn wlbyt ʔnšykyn wmryʔ nʕbd ʕmkyn rḥmʔ ʔyk dʕbdtyn ʕmy wʕm tryhwn bny dmytw
01:09	wntlkyn mryʔ lrḥmʔ wtškḥyn nyḥʔ byt ʔbhykyn wnšqt ʔnyn wʔrym qlhyn wbkyy

01:11	wʔmrt lhyn nʕmy hpwkyn bnty mnʔ ʔzln ʔntyn ʕmy ddlmʔ twb nhwwn ly bnyʔ wʔtlkyn lhwn
01:12	hpwkyn bnty mṭl dʔnʔ sʔbt ly mn dlmhwʔ lgbrʔ dʔmr dtwb nhwʔ ly sbrʔ wʔhwʔ lgbrʔ wʔwld bnyʔ
01:13	wʔntyn tskyn lhwn ʕdmʔ dnʔrbwn wttʕkrn mn dlmhwʔ lgbrʔ lʔ bnty mṭl dmrt ly ṭb ʕlykyn wly mryrʔ ytyr mnkyn mṭl dʔydh dmryʔ npqt btry
01:14	wʔrym twb qlhyn wbky wnšqt ʕrpʔ lḥmth whpkt wʔzlt rʕwt dyn nqpth
01:15	wʔmrt lh ḥmth hʔ ybmtky hpkt lʕmh wlbyt ʔnšyh hpwky ʔp ʔnt btr ybmtky
01:16	wʔmrt lh rʕwt ḥs ly dʔhpwk mn lwtky wʔšbqky mṭl dlʔtr dtʔzlyn ʔzl wʔykʔ dtʕmryn ʔʕmr ʕmky ʕmy wʔlhky ʔlhy
01:17	wʔtr dtmwtyn ʔmwt ʔp ʔnʔ wʔtqbr hknʔ nʕbd ly ʔlhʔ whknʔ nwsp ly ʔlʔ ʔn mwtʔ blḥwd dnprwš byny wlky
01:18	kd ḥzt dyn nʕmy dšryrʔyt ʔṣṭbyt lmʔzl ʕmh šlyt mn dlmʔmr lh lmʔzl
01:19	wʔty ʔkḥdʔ ʕdmʔ lbyt lḥm dyhwdʔ whwʔ dkd ʔty lbyt lḥm ḥdyt bhyn kwlh mdyntʔ wʔmryn hdʔ hy nʕmy
01:20	wʔmrt lhyn lʔ tqrynny nʕmy ʔlʔ qrynny mryrt npšʔ mṭl dʔlšdy mrmrny ṭb
01:21	mlyʔyt gyr ʔzlt mkʔ wmryʔ ʔhpkny sryqʔyt wlmnʔ mkyl qryn ʔntwn ly nʕmy dmryʔ mkkny wmn dmṭʔ bʔydwhy ʔbʔš ly
01:22	whpkt nʕmy wrʕwt mwʔbytʔ klth ʕmh dʔṣṭbyt lmhpk ʕmh blbʔ šlmʔ wʔty mn ʔrʕʔ dmwʔb bryš ḥsdʔ dsʕrʔ
02:01	wlnʕmy ʔyt hwʔ gbrʔ ḥd mwdʕtʔ mn šrbth dʔ{b}<l>ymlk bʕlh gbrʔ ydyʕʔ wšmh bʕz
02:02	wʔmrt rʕwt mwʔbytʔ lnʕmy ḥmth ʔzl lḥqlʔ wʔlqwṭ lqṭʔ btr pʕlʔ dmn dʔškḥ rḥmʔ bʕynwhy wʔmrt lh ḥmth zly brty
02:03	wʔzlt rʕwt lmlqṭ lqṭʔ btr ḥṣwdʔ wʔstqblt bplgwtʔ dḥqlh dbʕz br šrbth dʔ{b}<l>ymlk
02:04	whʔ bʕz ʔtʔ mn byt lḥm wʔmr lḥṣwdʔ šlmʔ ʕmkwn ʔmryn lh mryʔ nbrkk
02:05	wʔmr bʕz lṭlyʔ dqʔm ʕl pʕlʔ mʔ ṭbh dʕlymtʔ hdʔ
02:06	wʕnʔ ṭlyʔ wʔmr lh ʔnttʔ hy mwʔbytʔ hy dʔtt ʕm nʕmy mn ʔrʕʔ dmwʔb
02:07	wʔmrʔ ʔlqwṭ lqṭʔ btr ḥṣwdʔ wlqṭt mn ṣprʔ ʕdmʔ lnyḥtʔ
02:08	wʔmr bʕz lrʕwt brty lʔ šmyʕ lky bmtlʔ dbḥqlʔ dlʔ dylk lʔ tlqwṭ mṭl hnʔ qwy whwyt tnn ʕm ṭlyty
02:09	whwyty ḥzyʔ ʔykʔ ḥṣdyn whwyty ʔzlʔ btrhwn hʔ pqdt lṭlyʔ dʔnš lʔ nhrky wʔn zhnty zly wʔšty mn mʔnʔ dmlyn ṭlyʔ
02:10	wnplt ʕl ʔpyh ʕl ʔrʕʔ wsgdt lh wʔmrt mṭl dʔškḥt rḥmʔ bʕynyk lmdʕny dʔksnytʔ ʔnʔ
02:11	ʔmr lh bʕz mtʔmrw ʔtʔmr ly mdm dʕbdty ʕm ḥmtky mn btr dmyt bʕlky dšbqty ʔbwk wʔmky wšrbtky wʔtyt lʕmʔ dlʔ ydʕʔ hwyt mn ʔtmly wmn mntmly
02:12	nprʕky mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl wntl ʔgrky hw dʔtyt lmsttrw tḥyt knpwhy
02:13	wʔmrt lh mṭl dʔškḥt rḥmʔ bʕynyk mry wbyʔtny wmlyt blbh dʔmtk wʔnʔ ʔhwʔ ʔyk ḥdʔ mn ʔmhtk
02:14	wʔmr lh bʕz bʕdnʔ dšrwtʔ qrwby wʔkwl ʕmy lḥmʔ wʔwtbh ʕl gb ḥṣwdʔ wyhb lh šḥtytʔ wṣbʕ lḥmʔ bḥ<l>bʔ wʔrmy ptʔ dpryktʔ wyhb lh wʔklt wsbʕt wʔwtrt
02:15	wqmt lmlqṭ wpqd bʕz lʕbdwhy wʔmr tlqwṭ mn bynt kpʔ wlʔ thrwnh
02:16	wšbqwh lqṭʔ mn bynt kpʔ wlʔ ʔhrwh
02:17	whwt lqṭʔ bḥqlʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ wḥbṭt ʔnyn wʔškḥt bhyn ʔyk mlʔ kylʔ dsʕrʔ
02:18	wšqlt ʔnyn wʕlt lmdyntʔ wḥwyt lḥmth lqṭʔ dlqṭt wyhbt lh mn hw mʔ dlʕst wʔwtrt
02:19	wʔmrt lh ḥmth ʔykʔ lqṭʔ hwyt ywmnʔ wʔtr dhwyt nhwʔ bryk whw mn dʔškḥty rḥmʔ bʕynwhy wʔštʕyt lḥmth ʔykʔ hwt wʔmrʔ lh bʕz šmh lgbrʔ dlqṭʔ hwyt bḥqlh ywmnʔ
02:20	wʔmrt nʕmy lklth bryk hw mryʔ dlʔ ʔʕbr ḥsdh mn ḥyʔ wmn mytʔ wʔmrt lh nʕmy qrybn hw gbrʔ wmn tbʕ ʕyrtn hw
02:21	wʔmrt rʕwt lḥmth wʔmr ly twb ddbq lʕbdy ʕdmʔ dngmr ḥṣdʔ klh
02:22	wʔmrt nʕmy lrʕwt klth ṭwbyky brty ddbqt lʕlymth wlʔ ʔnš nhrky bḥqlʔ dlʔ ydʕty
02:23	ʔlʔ nqpty lʔmhth dbʕz lmlqṭ ʕdmʔ dnšlm ḥṣdʔ dsʕrʔ wdḥṭʔ
03:01	wytbt rʕwt ʕm ḥmth wʔmrt lh nʕmy brty lʔ ʔbʕʔ lky nyḥʔ wnṭʔb lky
03:02	whʔ bʕz mḥkwmtn hw hw dhwyty ʕm ʕlymth whʔ bhnʔ llyʔ ʔdrʔ dsʕrʔ kšʔ
03:03	sḥy hkyl wmšwḥy wʔṣṭbt blbwšyky wḥwt lʔdrʔ wlʔ ttḥzyn lh ʕdmʔ dlʕs wštʔ
03:04	wnhwʔ mʔ ddmk tsymyn lblky bdwktʔ ddmk bh wtqrbyn wtdmkyn lwt rglwhy whw nʔmr lky mʔ dtʕbdyn
03:05	wʔmrt lh kl mʔ dʔmrty ly ʔʕbd
03:06	wnḥtt lʔdrʔ wʕbdt kl mʔ dpqdth ḥmth
03:07	wkd ʔkl bʕz wʔšty wṭʔb lbh ʔtʔ wdmk bgbh dʔdrʔ wbmḥlyʔ dšntʔ kd dmk bʔdrʔ ʔtt hy bṭwšyʔ wglt knpʔ dmrṭwṭh wnplt lwt rglwhy
03:08	whwʔ bplgh dllyʔ nd gbrʔ mn šnth wtwh dḥzʔ ʔnttʔ ddmkʔ lwt rglwhy
03:09	wʔmr lh mʔ ṭbky wʔmrt lh ʔnʔ ʔnʔ rʕwt ʔmtk ʔlʔ ksʔ lʔmtk bknpʔ dmrṭwṭk mṭl dʔnt hw tbʕ yrtwtʔ
03:10	wʔmr lh bʕz brykʔ ʔnt lʔlhʔ brty mṭwl dʔṭʔbt ḥsdky ʔḥryʔ ṭb mn qdmyʔ dlʔ ʔzlty btr ʕlymʔ dʕtyryn ʔw dmsknyn
03:11	whšʔ brty lʔ tdḥlyn mṭl dkl dtʔmryn ly ʔʕbd lky ydʕʔ gyr klh šrbtʔ dʕmn dʔnttʔ ʔnty dʕwšnʔ
03:12	whšʔ bqwštʔ ʔnʔ ʔnʔ tbʕ yrtwtʔ brm dyn ʔyt hw ʔḥrnʔ dtbʕ yrtwtʔ dhw qryb ytyr mny
03:13	whšʔ ktry ywmnʔ wbwty ʕd nghʔ wnhwʔ bṣprʔ ʔn tbʕky špyr ntbʕ wʔn dyn lʔ nṣbʔ dntbʕky ḥy hw mryʔ dʔn hw dlʔ ntbʕky ʔlʔ ʔnʔ ʔtbʕky wʔmr lh dmk ʕd ṣprʔ
03:14	wdmkt lwt rglwhy ʕdmʔ dnght wqmt bṣprʔ kd ʕmwṭ ʕd lʔ ʔnš ndʕ lḥbrh wʔmrt lh dlʔ ʔnš ndʕ dnḥtt lwtk lʔdrʔ
03:15	ʔmr lh bʕz prwsy mrṭwṭky wprst wʔkyl ʔrmy lh štʔ kylyn dsʕrʔ wʔrym ʕlyh wšqlt wʔtt lmdyntʔ
03:16	wʕlt lwt ḥmth ʔmrʔ lh ḥmth mn ʔnt brty ʔmrʔ lh ʔnʔ ʔnʔ rʕwt wʔmrt lh kl mʔ dʕbd lh bʕz
03:17	wdyhb lh štʔ kylyn dsʕrʔ wdʔmr lh dlʔ tʕlyn lwt ḥmtky sryqʔyt
03:18	ʔmrʔ lh ḥmth tby brty ʕd tḥzyn lʔ gyr šlʔ gbrʔ ʕdmʔ dmqrb lh dynʔ ywmnʔ
04:01	wslq bʕz wytb ʕl trʕʔ dmdyntʔ whʔ tbʕ ʕyrtʔ ʕbr hw dʔmr ʕlwhy bʕz wʔmr lh tʔ tb hrkʔ hw dyn ʔmr lh mnw wytb lwth
04:02	wgbʔ lh ʕsrʔ gbryn mn sbʔ dmdyntʔ wʔwtb ʔnwn lwth
04:03	wʔmr ltbʕ yrtwtʔ plgwtʔ dḥqlʔ dʔḥwn ʔlymlk zbnt ly nʕmy
04:04	wʔnʔ ʔmrt dʔglʔ wʔwdʕk wʔmr lk dqny ʔnt qdm hlyn dytbyn wʔnʔ ʔnʔ dḥwyt npšy lmʔmr wlmqnʔ qdm hlyn sbʔ dʕmy dytbyn whšʔ ʔn hw dtbʕ ʔnt tbʕ wʔn lʔ tbʕ ʔnt ʔmr ly wʔdʕ dlʔ hwyt tbwʕʔ wʔnʔ ʔtbʕ wʔmr tbʕ ʔnʔ
04:05	wʔmr bʕz bywmʔ dzbn ʔnt ḥqlʔ mn nʕmy wmn ʔrʕwt mwʔbytʔ ʔntth dhw dmyt qny ʕdmʔ dtqym šmh dmytʔ ʕl yrtwth
04:06	wʔmr tbwʕʔ lʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ dʔtbʕ dlmʔ ʔḥbl yrtwty tbʕ ʔnt mṭl ḥsyrwt hymnwty dyly dlʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ dʔtbʕ
04:07	whdʔ tbʕtʔ hʔ qwdmt bny ʔysryl wšwḥlpʔ dtbʕtʔ lmqmw šrʔ gbrʔ msnh wyhb lḥbrh whdʔ hy shdwtʔ bʔysryl
04:08	wʔmr hw tbwʕʔ lbʕz qny npšk wšrʔ mn rglwhy
04:09	wʔmr bʕz lsbʔ wlklh ʕmʔ ʔntwn shdyn ywmnʔ dqnyt kl mʔ dʔyt hwʔ lʔlymlk wkl mʔ dʔyt hwʔ lmlywn wlklywn mn ʔydʔ dnʕmy
04:10	wlky rʕwt mwʔbytʔ ʔntt mlywn nsbtky ly ʔnttʔ lmqmw šmh dmytʔ ʕl yrtwth dlʔ ntṭʕʔ {šmh dmytʔ dlʔ ntṭʕʔ} dwkrnh dmytʔ mn bynt ʔḥwhy wmn šrbth ʔntwn shdyn ywmnʔ
04:11	wʕnw sbʔ wklh ʕmʔ dbtrʕʔ dqrytʔ wʔmryn shdynn wbrkwhy wʔmrw lh nʕbd mryʔ ʔnttʔ hdʔ qdmyk ʔyk rḥyl wʔyk lyʔ hlyn dhnyn trtyhyn bny bytʔ lʔysrʔyl wʕbd ḥylʔ bʔprtʔ wqry šmh byt lḥm
04:12	wnhwʔ bytk ʔyk byth dprṣ hw dyldt tmr lyhwdʔ wntl lk mryʔ zrʕʔ mn ʔnttʔ hdʔ
04:13	wnsbh bʕz lrʕwt whwt lh ʔnttʔ wʕl lwth wyhb lh mryʔ wbṭnt wyldt brʔ
04:14	wʔmrn nšʔ lnʕmy bryk hw mryʔ dlʔ ʔʕnd tbwʕʔ ywmnʔ wtqryn šmh bʔysryl
04:15	wnhwʔ mbyʔnʔ lnpšky wmtrsynʔ lmdyntky mṭl dkltky dʔḥbtky yldth hy dṭʔbty bʕynyky ytyr mn šbʕʔ bnyn
04:16	wšqlth nʕmy lṭlyʔ wsmth bḥnh whwt lh mrbynytʔ
04:17	wʔmr šbbth ʔtyld brʔ lnʕmy wqry šmh ʕwbd hwyw ʔbwhy dʔyšy ʔbwhy ddwyd
04:18	whlyn twldth dprṣ prṣ ʔwld lḥṣrwn

04:23	šlm ktbʔ dʔrʕwt
01:01	\tšbḥt tšbḥtʔ dšlymwn <br dwyd mlkʔ dʔysryl dʔytyh zmyrt zmyrtʔ wmtqryʔ ʕbrʔyt šʔrt šʔryn#2#> /tšbḥt tšbḥtʔ dšlymwn#3# /šʔrt šʔryn dmtpšqʔ tšbḥt tšbḥtʔ#3# /twb šʔrt šyryn dmtpšqʔ tšbḥt tšbḥtʔ#3# /twb šʔrt šyryn dʔytyh tšbḥt tšbḥtʔ#3# /twb ktbʔ dšrt šʔryn dʔytwhy pwšqh tšbḥt tšbḥtʔ#3# /twb ḥkmt ḥkmtʔ dylh dšlymwn ktbʔ dmtqryʔ ʕbrʔyt šʔrt šʔryn#3#/

04:17	ṭr/dṭr#3#/ rglk mʔ dʔzl ʔnt lbyt ʔlhʔ wqrwb lmšmʕ ṭb mn mwhbtʔ \ddbḥʔ dsklʔ /dsklʔ dbḥʔ#3#/ mṭl dlʔ ydʕyn lmʕbd dṭb
05:01	lʔ tstrhb bpwmk wlbk lʔ nstrhb lmpqw mltʔ qdm ʔlhʔ mṭl dʔlhʔ bšmyʔ wʔnt bʔrʕʔ mṭl hnʔ nhwwn ptgmyk zʕwryn
05:02	mṭl dʔtʔ ḥlmʔ bswgʔt/bsgyʔwt#3#/ ʕnynʔ wqlh dsklʔ bswgʔt/bsgyʔwt#3#/ ptgmʔ
05:03	ʔmty dndr ʔnt <dyn#3#> ndrʔ lʔlhʔ lʔ tštwḥr lmšlmwth mṭl dlyt ṣbynʔ bsklʔ ʔnt <dyn#3#> mdm dndr ʔnt prwʕ
05:04	ṭb <hw#3#> dlʔ tdwr mn dtdwr wlʔ tšlm
05:05	lʔ ttl pwmk lmḥṭyw bsrk wlʔ tʔmr qdm ʔlhʔ dṭwʕyy hy dlmʔ nrgz ʔlhʔ ʕl qlk wnḥbl ʕbdʔ dʔydyk
05:06	mṭl dbswgʔt/dbsgyʔwt#3#/ ḥlmʔ whblʔ wptgmʔ sgyʔʔ <dṭwʕyy#3#> ʔnt lʔlhʔ dḥl
05:07	wʔn ʕwlbnʔ dmsknʔ wḥṭwpyʔ wdynʔ tḥzʔ bmdyntʔ lʔ ttmh bh bṣbwtʔ mṭl drmʔ lʕl mn rmʔ nṭr wrmyn ʕlyhwn
05:08	wywtrnʔ dʔrʕʔ bkl hw mlkʔ lḥqlʔ mplḥ
05:09	drḥm kspʔ lʔ nsbʕ kspʔ wdrḥm mmwnʔ lʔ nqdywhy wʔp hnʔ hblʔ
05:10	bswgʔʔ dṭbtʔ sgyw ʔkwlyh \wmnʔ ywtrnʔ /whwt kšyrʔ#3#/ lqnyh ʔlʔ ʔn ḥztʔ dʕynwhy
05:11	ḥlyʔ šntʔ lplḥʔ ʔn zʕwr wʔn sgy ʔkl wsbʕʔ lʕtyrʔ lʔ šbq lh lmdmk
05:12	\ʔyt kwrhnʔ dbyštʔ /ʔyt gyr byštʔ lbyšth#3#/ dḥzyt tḥyt šmšʔ ʕwtrʔ dmtnṭr lmrh lbyšth
05:13	wʔbd ʕwtrʔ hw bʕnynʔ byšʔ dʔwld brʔ \wlʔ ʔyt /wlyt#3#/ bʔydh mdm
05:14	ʔyknʔ dnpq mn krsʔ dʔmh ʕrṭl nhpwk lmʔzl ʔyk dʔtʔ wmdm lʔ nsb bʕmlh dnʔzl bʔydh
05:15	wʔp hnʔ <hblʔ hw #3#> kwrhnʔ byšʔ ʔyknʔ gyr dʔtʔ hknʔ ʔzl wmnʔ ywtrnʔ bkl dʕml lrwḥʔ
05:16	wʔp ʕl ywmwhy bḥšwkʔ ʔkl wbrwgzʔ sgyʔʔ wbḥmtʔ wbʔblʔ wbkwrhnʔ wbḥmtʔ
05:17	hnʔ mdm dḥzyt ʔnʔ qwhlt ṭb hw wšpyr lmʔkl wlmštʔ wlmḥzʔ ṭbtʔ bkl ʕmlh dʕml/dhw ʕml#3#/ tḥyt šmšʔ mnyn \ywmtʔ dḥywhy /ywmy ḥywhy#3#/ dyhb lh mryʔ mṭl dhwyw mnth
05:18	wʔp kl ʔnš dyhb lh mryʔ ʕwtrʔ wnksʔ wʔšlṭh lmʔkl mnh wlmsb mnth wlmḥdʔ bʕmlh ʔp hdʔ mwhbtʔ hy dʔlhʔ
05:19	mṭl dlw sgy nʕhd ywmtʔ dḥywhy mṭl dʔlhʔ mʕnʔ lh bḥdwtʔ dlbh
06:01	ʔyt byštʔ dḥzyt tḥyt šmšʔ wsgyʔʔ hy ʕl bny ʔnšʔ
06:02	gbrʔ dntl lh ʔlhʔ ʕwtrʔ wnksʔ wʔyqrʔ wlʔ ḥsyr lnpšh mdm mn kl mʔ drʔg wlʔ ʔšlṭh ʔlhʔ lmʔkl mnh ʔlʔ gbr nwkry nʔklywhy mn btrh hnʔ hblʔ wkrywth/wkryhwtʔ#3#/ hy
06:03	ʔn nwld gbrʔ mʔʔ wšnyn sgyʔn nḥʔ wnsgwn ywmtʔ dšnwhy wnpšh lʔ tsbʕ mn ṭbtʔ wʔp qbwrtʔ lʔ thwʔ lh ʔmrt dṭb hw mnh yḥṭʔ
06:04	mṭl dbhblʔ ʔtʔ wbḥšwkʔ nʔzl wbḥšwkʔ šmh ntksʔ
06:05	\ʔp šmšʔ /wšmšʔ#3#/ lʔ ḥzʔ wlʔ ydʕ nyḥ lhnʔ ṭb mn dlhnʔ
06:06	wʔlw ḥyʔ ʔlp šnyn dtrtyn zbnyn wṭbtʔ lʔ ḥzʔ dlmʔ lʔ hwʔ lḥd ʔtrʔ ʔzl kwlʔ
06:07	kl dʕml ʔnšʔ bpwmh wnpšh lʔ mlyʔ
06:08	mṭl dʔyt ywtrnʔ lḥkymʔ mn dlsklʔ lmnʔ dmsknʔ ydʕ lmʔzl lḥyʔ
06:09	ṭb ḥzwʔ dʕynʔ mn hlktʔ dnpšʔ wʔp hdʔ/hnʔ#3#/ hblʔ wṭwrpʔ dnpšʔ/drwḥʔ#3#/
06:10	mdm dhwʔ \mn qdym /mndryš#3#/ ʔtqry šmh wʔtydʕ dhw brnšʔ wlʔ/dlʔ#3#/ mškḥ lmdn ʕm mn dtqyp mnh
06:11	mṭl dʔyt ptgmʔ sgyʔʔ dmsgyn hblʔ mnʔ ywtrnʔ <ʔyt#3#> lbrnšʔ
06:12	mṭl dmnw ydʕ mnʔ ṭb lbrnšʔ bḥywhy mnyn ywmy ḥyy hblh wʕbr ʔnwn ʔyk ṭllʔ mnw nḥwʔ lbrnšʔ mnʔ nhwʔ mn btrh tḥyt šmšʔ
07:01	ṭb šmʔ <ṭbʔ#3#> mn mšḥʔ ṭbʔ wywmʔ dmwtʔ ṭb mn ywmʔ dʔylydwtʔ
07:02	ṭb lmʔzl lbyt bkʔ mn dlmʔzl lbyt mštwtʔ mṭl dhdʔ hy ḥrtʔ dklhwn bny ʔnšʔ wdḥy yhb ṭbtʔ llbh
07:03	ṭb rwgzʔ mn gwḥkʔ mṭl dbbyšwt ʔpʔ nṭʔb lbʔ
07:04	lbʔ dḥkymʔ bbyt/byt#3#/ ʔblʔ wlbʔ dsklʔ byt ḥdwtʔ
07:05	ṭb lmšmʕ kʔtʔ dḥkymʔ mn gbrʔ dšmʕ zmrʔ dsklʔ
07:06	\mṭwl dʔyk /ʔyk#3#/ qlʔ dkwbʔ tḥyt qdsʔ hknʔ gwḥkhwn dsklʔ wʔp hnʔ hblʔ
07:07	mṭwl dʕšwqyʔ mwbd lḥkymʔ wmwbdʔ llbʔ/lbʔ#3#/ mwhbtʔ/dyhwbh#3#/
07:08	ṭbʔ hy ʔḥryth dptgmʔ mn qdmyth wṭbʔ hy ngyrwt rwḥʔ mn rmwt rwḥʔ
07:09	lʔ tstrhb brwḥk lmrgz mṭl \drwgzʔ bʕwbʔ dsklʔ /drwgzhwn dsklʔ bʕwbhwn#3#/ nttnyḥ
07:10	lʔ tʔmr mnʔ hwʔ dywmtʔ qdmyʔ ṭbyn hww mn hlyn mṭl dlʔ hwʔ bḥkmtʔ šʔl ʔnt ʕl hlyn
07:11	ṭbʔ hy ḥkmtʔ mn mʔny zynʔ wytyr lḥzyy šmšʔ
07:12	mṭl dṭllʔ dḥkmtʔ ʔyk ṭllʔ dkspʔ wytyrwtʔ dʔydʕtʔ dḥkmtʔ tḥʔ mrh
07:13	ḥzy ʕbdʔ dʔlhʔ mṭl dmn hw mškḥ lmtqnw lmn dmdwd hw
07:14	bywmʔ dṭbtʔ hwy bṭb wbywmʔ dbyštʔ ḥzy npšk ʔp hnʔ lwqbl hnʔ ʕbd ʔlhʔ ʕl mmllʔ dlʔ nškḥ brnšʔ mdm btrh
07:15	kl mdm ḥzyt bywmy hbly ʔyt zdyqʔ dʔbd bzdyqwth wʔyt ršyʕʔ dʔgr bbyšth/bbyšwth#3#/
07:16	lʔ thwʔ zdyq sgy wlʔ ttḥkm ytyr dlʔ ttmh
07:17	lʔ tršʕ sgy dlʔ tstnʔ sgy lʔ thwʔ skl dlmʔ tmwt dlʔ bzbnk
07:18	ṭb dtʔḥwd bhnʔ wʔp mn hnʔ lʔ trpʔ ʔydk mṭl dmn ddḥl lʔlhʔ nqp lklhyn
07:19	ḥkmtʔ mʕšnʔ lḥkymʔ ṭb mn ʕsrʔ šlyṭnyn dʔyt bmdyntʔ
07:20	mṭl dlyt ʔnš dzdyq bʔrʕʔ dnʕbd dṭb wlʔ nḥṭʔ
07:21	wʔp lkwl ptgmyn dnmllwn ršyʕʔ lʔ ttl lbk lʔ tšmʕ lʕbdk dmṣḥʔ lk
07:22	mṭl dzbnyn sgyʔn ydʕ lbk dʔp ʔnt ṣḥyt lʔḥrnyn/lʔḥryn#3#/
07:23	klhyn hlyn nsyt bḥkmtʔ ʔmrt dʔtḥkm why rḥyqʔ hy mny
07:24	ytyr mn kl dhwʔ rwḥqʔ wʕwmqʔ dʕwmqʔ mn nškḥywhy
07:25	ʔtkrkt ʔnʔ wlby lmdʕ wlmsʕr wlmbʕʔ ḥkmtʔ wḥwšbnʔ wlmdʕ ršyʕwth dsklʔ wsklwtʔ wmtʕbrnwtʔ
07:26	wʔškḥt dmryr mn mwtʔ ʔnttʔ dhy ʔytyh pḥʔ wmṣydtʔ lbh ʔsrt ʔydyh mn dṭb mn dṭb qdm ʔlhʔ mštwzb mnh wmn dḥṭʔ mttḥd bh
07:27	ḥzy hnʔ dʔškḥt ʔmr/lmʔmr#3#/ qwhlt ḥdʔ lḥdʔ lmškḥw mḥšbtʔ
07:28	wtwb bʕt npšy wlʔ ʔškḥt ʔnšʔ ḥd mn ʔlpʔ ʔškḥt wʔnttʔ bklhyn lʔ ʔškḥt
07:29	brm ḥzy hnʔ dʔškḥt dʕbd ʔlhʔ lʔnšʔ tryṣʔ whnwn bʕw mḥšbtʔ sgyʔtʔ
08:01	\mnw ʔyk ḥkymʔ /mn ydʕ lḥkymʔ#3#/ wmn ydʕ pšrh dmltʔ ḥkmth dgbrʔ tnhr ʔpwhy wdḥṣypn ʔpwhy nstnʔ
08:02	pwmh dmlkʔ ṭr wʕl mlt mwmtʔ dʔlhʔ
08:03	lʔ tstrhb mn qdmwhy zl wlʔ tqwm bptgm byš mṭl dkl dnṣbʔ nʕbd
08:04	ʔyknʔ dmmll mlkʔ šlyṭ wmnw nʔmr/dnʔmr#3#/ lh mnʔ ʕbd ʔnt
08:05	dnṭr pwqdnʔ lʔ ydʕ mltʔ byštʔ wzbnʔ wdynʔ ydʕ lbh dḥkymʔ
08:06	mṭl dlkl ṣbw ʔyt zbnʔ wdynʔ mṭl dbyšth dbrnšʔ sgyʔʔ ʕlwhy
08:07	mṭl dlyt dydʕ lmʔ dhwʔ wmnʔ nhwʔ <lh#3#> mn btrh mnw mḥwʔ lh
08:08	lyt ʔnš dšlyṭ brwḥʔ lmklʔ rwḥʔ wlyt šwlṭnʔ bywmʔ dmwtʔ wlyt pwlṭʔ bywmʔ dqrbʔ wlʔ mšwzb rwšʕʔ lmrwhy
08:09	wyt kl hnʔ ḥzyt wyhbt lby lmdʕ kl ʕbd dmtʕbd tḥyt šmšʔ wzbnʔ dʔštlṭ br ʔnšʔ bbrnšʔ lmbʔšw lh
08:10	whydyn ḥzyt ršyʕʔ dqbyryn wʔtyn wmn ʔtrʔ dqwdšʔ ʔzlw wʔtṭʕyw bmdyntʔ dhknʔ ʕbdw wʔp hnʔ hblʔ
08:11	mṭl dlʔ mtʕbdʔ tbʕtʔ mn ʕbdy byštʔ bʕgl <lswkyʔ#3#> mṭl \hnʔ ʔtmly /dʔtmly#3#/ lbʔ dbnynšʔ bhwn lmʕbd dbyš
08:12	mn dḥṭʔ ʕbd byštʔ mʔʔ wmgr lh wydʕ ʔnʔ dnhwʔ ṭb ldḥlwhy dmryʔ dndḥlwn/wndḥlwn#3#/ mn qdmwhy
08:13	wṭbtʔ lʔ thwʔ lršyʕʔ wlʔ ngr ywmtʔ ʔyk ṭllʔ mṭwl dlʔ ʔytwhy dḥl mn qdm ʔlhʔ
08:14	ʔyt hblʔ dʔtʕbd/dʕbyd#3#/ ʕl ʔrʕʔ mṭl dʔyt zdyqʔ dmṭʔ lwthwn ʔyk ʕbdʔ dršyʕʔ wʔyt ršyʕʔ dmṭʔ lwthwn ʔyk ʕbdʔ dzdyqʔ wʔmrt dʔp hnʔ hblʔ
08:15	wšbḥt ʔnʔ yt ḥdwtʔ dlyt dṭb/ṭb#3#/ lbrnšʔ tḥyt šmšʔ ʔlʔ lmʔkl wlmštʔ wlmḥdʔ whw lwʔ lh bʕmlh kl ywmy ḥywhy dyhb lh ʔlhʔ tḥyt šmšʔ
08:16	mṭl hnʔ yhbt lby lmdʕ ḥkmtʔ wlmḥzʔ ʕnynʔ dʔtʕbd ʕl ʔrʕʔ mṭl dbʔymmʔ wbllyʔ šntʔ bʕynwhy lʔ ḥzʔ
08:17	wḥzyt ʔnʔ kl ʕbdʔ dʔlhʔ mṭl dlʔ ntmṣʔ brnšʔ yt ʕbdʔ dʔtʕbd/dʕbyd#3#/ tḥyt šmšʔ kl dʕml brnšʔ dnbʕʔ lʔ nškḥ wkl dnʔmr ḥkymʔ lmdʕ lʔ ntmṣʔ lmškḥw
09:01	mṭl dyt kl hlyn yhbt blby wlby ḥzʔ yt kl hnʔ dzdyqʔ wḥkymʔ wʕbdyhwn/bʕbdyhwn#3#/ bʔydʔ dʔlhʔ ʔp rḥmtʔ ʔp snʔtʔ lʔ ydʕ brnšʔ kl dqdmwhy hblʔ
09:02	kl/bkl#3#/ ʔyk <hlyn#3#> dlkl gdšʔ ḥd lzdyqʔ wlršyʕʔ lṭbʔ wlbyšʔ ldkyʔ wlṭmʔʔ ldmdbḥ wldlʔ mdbḥ ʔyk ṭbʔ ʔp ḥṭyʔ ʔyk ymyʔ <ʔp#3#> hw dmn mwmtʔ dḥl
09:03	hdʔ byšʔ bkl mʔ dʔtʕbd tḥyt šmšʔ mṭl dgdšʔ ḥd lklhwn wʔp lbʔ dbrnšʔ ʔtmly byštʔ wphywtʔ byštʔ blbhwn wbḥyyhwn wḥrthwn lwt mytʔ
09:04	kl dnštwtp lkl ḥyʔ ʔyt twklnʔ mṭl dklbʔ dḥy ṭb hw mn ʔryʔ dmyyt
09:05	mṭl dḥyʔ ydʕyn dmytyn wmytʔ lʔ ydʕyn mdm wlyt lhwn twb ʔgrʔ mṭl dʔtṭʕy dwkrnhwn
09:06	ʔp rḥmthwn ʔp snʔthwn wʔp qnʔthwn mn kdw ʔbdt wmntʔ lyt lhwn twb lʕlm bkl mʔ dʔtʕbd tḥyt šmšʔ
09:07	tʔ ʔkwl bḥdwtʔ lḥmk wʔšty blbʔ ṭbʔ ḥmrk mṭwl dʔṣṭby ʔlhʔ bʕbdyk
09:08	bkl ʕdn nḥtyk nhwwn ḥwryn wmšḥʔ mn ryšk lʔ nḥsr
09:09	wḥzy ḥyʔ ʕm ʔnttʔ drḥmt kl ywmy ḥyy hblk mṭl dhy hy mntk bḥyʔ wbʕmlk dʔnt ʕml tḥyt šmšʔ
09:10	kl dtškḥ ʔydk lmʕbd bḥylk ʕbd mṭl dlyt ʕbdʔ wmḥšbtʔ wʔydʕtʔ wḥkmtʔ bšywl dʔnt ʔzl ʔnt ltmn
09:11	hpkt wḥzyt tḥyt šmšʔ dlʔ lqlylʔ rhṭʔ wlʔ lgnbrʔ qrbʔ wlʔ lḥkymʔ lḥmʔ wlʔ lswkltnʔ ʕwtrʔ wlʔ lydwʕtnʔ šwbḥʔ mṭwl dzbnʔ wpgʕʔ/wgdšʔ#3#/ gdš lklhwn/lhwn#3#/
09:12	mṭl dlʔ ydʕ brnšʔ zbnh ʔyk nwnʔ dmttḥdyn/dmttṣydyn#3#/ bmṣydtʔ byštʔ wʔyk ṣprʔ dmttḥdn bpḥʔ hknʔ mttḥdyn bny ʔnšʔ bzbnʔ byšʔ dnpl ʕlyhwn mn šly
09:13	ʔp hdʔ ḥzyt ḥkmtʔ tḥyt šmšʔ wrbʔ hy lwty
09:14	mdyntʔ zʕwrtʔ wbny ʔnšʔ dbh zʕwryn wʔtʔ ʕlyh mlkʔ rbʔ wḥdrh wbnʔ ʕlyh qlqwmʔ
09:15	wʔštkḥ bh gbrʔ msknʔ ḥkymʔ wšwzb hw msknʔ mdyntʔ bḥkymwth/bḥkmth#3#/ wʔnš lʔ ʕhd lgbrʔ hw msknʔ
09:16	wʔmrt ʔnʔ <blby#3#> dṭbʔ/ṭbʔ#3#/ hy ḥkmtʔ mn gnbrwtʔ wḥkmth dmsknʔ šyṭʔ/mslyʔ#3#/ hy wptgmwhy lʔ mštmʕyn
09:17	mly ḥkymʔ bnyḥʔ mštmʕn <ṭb#3#> mn zʕqtʔ dšlyṭʔ bsklʔ/sklʔ#3#/
09:18	ṭbʔ hy ḥkmtʔ mn mʔny qrbʔ wḥṭytʔ ḥdʔ mwbdʔ ṭbtʔ sgyʔtʔ
10:01	<ʔyk#3#> dbbʔ dmytyn msryn mʔnʔ dmšḥʔ bsymʔ/dbsymʔ#3#/ yqyrʔ <hy#3#> mn ḥkmtʔ wmn swgʔt/sgyʔwt#3#/ tšbwḥtʔ sklwtʔ qlyl/rbtʔ#3#/
10:02	lbh dḥkymʔ lymynh/bymynh#3#/ wlbh dsklʔ lsmlh/bsmlh#3#/
10:03	wʔp sklʔ mʔ dʔzl bʔwrḥʔ lbh ḥsyr wkl wmtḥšb sklwtʔ hy
10:04	ʔn rwḥʔ dšlyṭʔ tsq ʕlyk ʔtrk lʔ tšbwq mṭwl \dmrpywtʔ ʕbdʔ /dʔsywtʔ šbqʔ#3#/ ḥṭhʔ sgyʔʔ
10:05	ʔyt byštʔ dḥzyt tḥyt šmšʔ ʔyk ṭwʕyy dnpqt qdm šlyṭʔ
10:06	dytb sklʔ brwmʔ ʕšynʔ wʕtyrʔ bmwkkʔ ntbwn
10:07	ḥzyt ʕbdʔ ʕl rkšʔ wšlyṭnʔ dmhlkyn ʔyk ʕbdʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ
10:08	dḥpr gwmṣʔ bh npl wdtrʕ sygʔ nktywhy ḥwyʔ
10:09	dmšnʔ kʔpʔ ntkʔb/nttkb#3#/ bhyn wdmṣlḥ qysʔ \lʔʔ bhwn /trbh nhwʔ#3#/
10:10	ʔn qhʔ przlʔ whw ʔpʔ dlḥ wqṭylʔ msgʔ wywtrnʔ lkšyrʔ ḥkmtʔ
10:11	wʔn nkt ḥwyʔ dlʔ lwḥštʔ lyt ywtrn blḥwšʔ
10:12	mly pwmh dḥkymʔ tšbwḥtʔ wspwth dsklʔ mṭbʕn lh
10:13	ryš mly pwmh sklwtʔ wḥrtʔ dpwmh pwrsyʔ byšʔ
10:14	wsklʔ msgʔ mlyn lʔ ydʕ brnšʔ mʔ dhwʔ wmʔ dnhwʔ mn btrh mnw mḥwʔ lh
10:15	ʕmlhwn dsklʔ mlʔʔ lhwn mṭl/mʔ#3#/ dlʔ ydʕw lmʔzl lmdyntʔ
10:16	wy lky mdyntʔ dmlkky ṭlʔ wrwrbnyky bṣprʔ ʔklyn
10:17	ṭwbyky mdyntʔ dmlkky br ḥʔryn wrwrbnyky bʕdnhwn ʔklyn bkšyrwtʔ wlʔ bmštyʔ
10:18	bšplwtʔ ntmkk tṭlylʔ wbšplwt ʔydyʔ ndlp bytʔ
10:19	lḥdwtʔ ʕbydyn lḥmʔ wḥmrʔ wmšḥʔ dnḥdwn lḥyʔ wkspʔ mmkk wmṭʕʔ lhwn bkl
10:20	wʔp bmdʕk lmlkʔ lʔ tṣḥʔ wbqyṭwn mškbk lʔ tṣḥʔ lʕtyrʔ mṭwl dʕwpʔ dšmyʔ nwbl qlk wmrʔ ʕwpʔ nḥwʔ ptgmyk
11:01	šdr lḥmk/dlḥmk#3#/ ʕl ʔpy myʔ mṭl dlswgʔt/dlsgyʔwt#3#/ ywmtʔ tškḥywhy
11:02	hb mntʔ lšbʕʔ ʔp ltmnyʔ mṭl dlʔ tdʕ mnʔ byštʔ thwʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ
11:03	ʔn nmlyn ʕnny mṭrʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ nʔšdn wʔn npl qysʔ btymnʔ ʔw bʔtrʔ dgrbyʔ ʔtr dnpl qysʔ tmn nhwʔ
11:04	dnṭr lrwḥʔ lʔ zrʕ wdḥʔr lʕnnʔ lʔ ḥṣd
11:05	mṭl dlʔ ydʕ ʔnt mnʔ hy/thwʔ#3#/ ʔwrḥʔ drwḥʔ ʔyk znʔ <gyr#3#> dbṭntʔ dbṭnʔ hknʔ lʔ tdʕ ʕbdwhy dmryʔ kl dnʕbd
11:06	kl bṣprʔ zrwʕ zrʕk wbrmšʔ lʔ tšbwq ʔydk mṭl dlʔ ydʕ ʔnt ʔynʔ nkšr ʔw hnʔ ʔw hnʔ wʔn tryhwn ʔyk ḥd ṭbyn
11:07	ḥlʔ nwhrʔ wṭb lʕynʔ lmḥzʔ/wytyr lḥzyy#3#/ šmšʔ
11:08	mṭl dʔn šnyn sgyʔn nḥʔ br ʔnšʔ bklhyn nḥdʔ wntdkr ywmy ḥšwkʔ mṭl dsgyʔʔ nhwwn kl dʔtʔ hblʔ
11:09	bywmy ʕlymwtk ḥdy ʕlymʔ wnṭʔb lk whlk bʔwrḥtʔ dlbk wbḥzwʔ dʕynyk wdʕ dbhlyn klhyn mʕl lk mryʔ bdynʔ
11:10	ʔʕbr rwgzʔ mn lbk wʔprq byštʔ mn bsrk mṭl <dʕlymwtʔ#3#> dṭlywtʔ wlʔ ʔydʕtʔ hblʔ
12:01	wʕhd lbryk bywmy ʕlymwtk ʕdlʔ nʔtwn ywmy byštʔ wnqrbn šnyʔ dtʔmr dlyt ly bhyn ṣbyny
12:02	ʕdlʔ nḥšk šmšʔ wnwhrʔ dshrʔ wkwkbʔ/wdkwkbʔ#3#/ wnthpkn ʕnnʔ btr mṭrʔ
12:03	bywmʔ dntzyʕwn nṭwry bytʔ wntdwdwn mry ḥylʔ wntbṭln ṭḥntʔ mṭl dzʕr wnḥškn ḥzytʔ bkwʔ
12:04	wnttḥdwn trʕʔ bšwqʔ/dšwqʔ#2#/ bšplwtʔ dqlʔ dṭḥntʔ wnqwm lqlʔ dṣprʔ wntmkkn kl bnt šwbḥʔ
12:05	wʔp mn rwmʔ ndḥl wntzyʕ bʔwrḥth wnbʕ ʕlwhy šhrʔ <ʔyk qmṣʔ#23#> \wnprʕ šrdʔ wnsgʔ qmṣʔ wttbdr qpr /wnprʕ šrdʔ wtbṭn šwšntʔ#3#/ wtbṭl/wttbṭl#3#/ byšnwtʔ/byštʔ#23#/ mṭl dʔzl brnšʔ \lbyt ʕmlh /byt ʕlmh#3#/ wʔtkrkw bšwqʔ mrqdnʔ <ʕdlʔ nprʕ šrdʔ wtšwḥ šwšntʔ wttbdr qpr#23#>
12:06	ʕdlʔ ntpsq ḥbl kspʔ wnštḥq ḥzwr dhbʔ wttbr qwltʔ ʕl mbwʕʔ wtrhṭ gyglʔ ʕl brʔ
12:07	wnhpwk ʕprʔ lʔrʕʔ ʔyk dhwʔ wrwḥʔ thpwk lwt mryʔ dyhbh
12:08	hbl hblyn ʔmr qwhlt hbl hblyn kl mdm hblʔ
12:09	wytyr dhwʔ qwhlt ḥkymʔ dmlp hwʔ ʔydʕtʔ lʕmʔ wṣt wbdq wʔtqn mtlʔ sgyʔʔ
12:10	sgy bʕʔ qwhlt lmškḥw ptgmʔ dṣbynʔ wktb šrrʔ/bšrrʔ#3#/bqwštʔ#3#/ ptgmy qwštʔ
12:11	mly ḥkymʔ ʔyk zqwtʔ wʔyk skʔ dqbyʕn mry ʔskptʔ ʔtyhbw mn rʕyʔ ḥd
12:12	wytyrʔyt mnhwn bry ʔzdhr lmktb sprʔ sgyʔʔ lyt swp wmmllʔ sgyʔʔ lʔwtʔ hy dbsrʔ
12:13	ʔḥryth dptgmʔ bskh kl šmʕ/dšmʕ#3#/ wmn mdm mryʔ dḥl wpwqdnwhy ṭr mṭl dhnʔ hw dmn ʔwmnʔ ḥd ʔtyhb kl/lkl#3#/ ʔnš
12:14	mṭl dlkl/dkl#3#/ ʕbdʔ mryʔ mʕl bdynʔ ʕl kl dksʔ wglʔ ʔn dṭb/ṭb#3#/ wʔn dbyš/byš#3#/
01:01	ʔyknʔ ytbt blḥwdyh mdyntʔ sgyʔt bʕmʔ hwt ʔyk ʔrmltʔ sgyʔt bʕmmʔ ryšʔ dmdyntʔ hwt lmdʔtʔ
01:02	bkt bllyʔ wdmʕyh šḥl ʕl pkyh wlyt lh mbyʔnʔ mn klhwn rḥmyh klhwn rḥmyh dglw bh whww lh bʕldbbʔ
01:03	glyt yhwdʔ mn šwʕbdʔ wmn swgʔt ʕbdwtʔ hy ytbt byt ʕmmʔ wlʔ ʔškḥt lh nyḥʔ klhwn rdwpyh ʔdrkwh byt ʔwlṣnʔ
01:04	ʔwrḥth dṣhywn bʔblʔ mn bly dʔtyn lʕdʕdʔ klhwn trʕyh ṣdyn wkhnyh mttnḥyn wbtwlth mmkkn why mryr lh
01:05	hww ʔlwṣyh lryš wbʕldbbyh šlyw mṭl dmryʔ mkkh ʕl swgʔt ḥṭhyh wylwdyh ʔzlw bšbyʔ qdm ʔlwṣʔ
01:06	wnpq mn brt ṣhywn klh hdrh hww rwrbnyh ʔyk ʔylʔ wlʔ ʔškḥw mrʕytʔ wʔzlw dlʔ ḥylʔ qdm rdwpʔ
01:07	ʔtdkrt ʔwršlm ywmy šwʕbdh wmrdwth wklhyn rgygth dhwy mn ywmtʔ qdmyʔ kd npl ʕmh byd ʔlwṣʔ wlyt lh mʕdrnʔ ḥzwh ʔlwṣyh wgḥkw ʕl tbrh
01:08	ḥṭhʔ ḥṭt ʔwršlm mṭl hnʔ hwt ndtʔ klhwn myqrnyh ṣʕrwh mṭl dḥzw pwrsyh ʔp hy ʔttnḥt whpkt lbstrh
01:09	ṭmʔwth bšpwlyh wlʔ ʔtdkrt ḥrth wnḥtt tšbwḥth wlyt lh mbyʔnʔ ḥzy mryʔ šwʕbdy dʔttrym bʕldbbʔ
01:10	ʔydwhy prs ʔlwṣʔ ʕl klhyn rgygth wḥzyt ʕmmʔ dʕlw lmqdšk dpqdt dlʔ nʕlwn bknwštk
01:11	klh ʕmʔ mttnḥyn wbʕyn lḥmʔ yhbw rgthwn bmʔkwltʔ lmpnyw npšʔ ḥzy mryʔ wḥwr dhwyt zlyltʔ
01:12	lʔ lkwn kl ʕbry ʔwrḥʔ ʔstklw wḥzw ʔn ʔyt kʔbʔ ʔyk kʔby dʕbd ly mryʔ wmkkny mryʔ bywmʔ dḥmtʔ drwgzh
01:13	mn mrwmʔ šdr nwrʔ bgrmy wʔḥtny prs mṣydtʔ lrgly wʔhpkny lbstry wyhbny lḥrbʔ wkl ywm dwyʔ ʔnʔ
01:14	ʔttʕyrw ʕly ḥṭhy wbʔydwhy ʔstrgw nyrwhy ʕl ṣwry wʔtkrh ḥyly wʔšlmny mryʔ bʔydʔ dmn dlʔ mṣyʔ ʔnʔ ḥylh
01:15	kbš klhwn ʕšyny mryʔ bgwy qrʔ ʕly ʕdʕdʔ lmwbdw gdwdy mʕṣrtʔ dš mryʔ lbtwltʔ brt yhwdʔ
01:16	ʕl hlyn bkyʔ ʔnʔ wʕyny mrdyn myʔ dʔrḥq mny mbyʔnʔ mpnʔ npšy hww bny šqmyn mṭl dʕšn bʕldbbʔ
01:17	prst ṣhywn ʔydyh wlyt lh mbyʔnʔ pqd mryʔ ʕl yʕqwb wḥdrwhy ʔlwṣwhy hwt ʔwršlm ndtʔ bynthwn
01:18	zdyq hw mryʔ dlh mrmrt šmʕw klkwn ʕmmʔ wḥzw kʔby btwlty wgdwdy ʔzlw bšbyʔ
01:19	qryt lrḥmy whnwn nklwny khny wqšyšy bgw spw dbʕw lhwn mʔkwltʔ dnpnwn npšhwn wlʔ ʔškḥw
01:20	ḥzy mryʔ dʕqt ly wmʕy ʔtdlḥw ʔthpk lby bgwy mṭl dmmrmrw mrmrt mn lbr ʔwbdt ḥrbʔ wdbbytʔ mwtʔ
01:21	šmʕ dmttnḥʔ ʔnʔ wlyt ly mbyʔnʔ klhwn bʕldbby šmʕw bbyšty wḥdyw dʔnt ʕbdt ly ʔytʔ ywmʔ dqryt wnhwwn ʔkwty
01:22	tʕwl klh byšwthwn qdmyk ṭrp ʔnwn ʔyknʔ dṭrptny ʕl klhwn ḥṭhy mṭl dsgy tnḥty wlby dwʔ
02:01	ʔyknʔ ʔʕyb mryʔ brwgzh lbrt ṣhywn ʔrmy mn šmyʔ lʔrʕʔ tšbwḥth dʔysryl wlʔ ʔtdkr kwbšʔ drglwhy bywmʔ dḥmtʔ drwgzh
02:02	ṭbʕ mryʔ wlʔ ḥs lklh dyrh dyʕqwb sḥp bḥmth lkrkʔ dbrt yhwdʔ ʔrmy ʕl ʔrʕʔ qṭylyh mlkyh wrwrbnyh
02:03	grm bḥmtʔ drwgzh klh qrnh dʔysryl ʔhpk ymynh lbstrh mn qdm bʕldbbʔ wšbq nwrʔ byʕqwb wšlhbytʔ ʔklt ʔydwhy
02:04	mlʔ qšth ʔyk ʔlwṣʔ ʔqym ymynh ʔyk bʕldbbʔ wqṭl kl rgt ʕynʔ bmšknʔ dbrt ṣhywn wʔšd ʔyk nwrʔ rwgzh
02:05	hwʔ mryʔ ʔyk bʕldbbʔ wṭbʕh lʔysrʔyl wṭbʕ klhyn sḥrth wḥbl krkwhy wʔsgy bbrt yhwdʔ twnyʔ wʔwlytʔ
02:06	wʕqr ʔyk gntʔ mṭlth wḥbl ʕdʕʔdyh ʔṭʕy mryʔ mn ṣhywn ʕdʕdʔ wšbtʔ wʔsly bḥmtʔ drwgzh mlkʔ wkhnʔ
02:07	ṭʕʔ mryʔ mdbḥh ʔslyʔ mqdšh ʔšlm bʔydʔ dbʕldbbʔ šwrʔ dsḥrth qlʔ yhbw bbyth dmryʔ ʔyk dbywmʔ dʕdʕdʔ
02:08	ʔtḥšb mryʔ lmḥblw šwryh dbrt ṣhywn ʔrmy ḥwṭʔ wlʔ ʔhpk ʔydh mn ṭwbʕh wʔwtb bʔblʔ ḥylh wšwryh ʔkḥdʔ ṣdw
02:09	ṭbʕw bʔrʕʔ trʕyh wʔwbdw wtbrw swkryh mlkyh wrwrbnyh bʕmmʔ lyt nmwsʔ ʔp nbyyh lʔ ʔškḥw ḥzwʔ mn mryʔ
02:10	ytbw bʔrʕʔ wštqw qšyšʔ dbrt ṣhywn ʔrmyw ʕprʔ bryšyhwn wʔtkbnw sqʔ smk lʔrʕʔ ryšyhyn btwltʔ dʔwršlm
02:11	ḥšk bdmʕʔ ʕyny wʔtdlḥw mʕy ʔthpk lʔrʕʔ ʔyqry ʕl tbrh dbrt ʕmy kd ʔtṭrpw ṭlyʔ wylwdʔ bšwqyh dqrytʔ
02:12	lʔmhthwn ʔmryn ʔykw ʕbwrʔ wḥmrʔ wmšḥʔ kd ʔtṭrpw ʔyk qṭylʔ bšwqyh dqrytʔ kd ʔtʔšd npšthwn bʕwbʔ dʔmhthwn
02:13	mnʔ ʔshdky wmn ʔdmʔ lky brt ʔwršlm mn ʔpḥm lky wʔbyʔky btwltʔ brt ṣhywn dsgy ʔyk ymʔ tbrky mnw nskwr
02:14	nbyyky ḥzw lky dglwtʔ wmṭʕynwtʔ wlʔ glw lky ʕl ḥṭhyky dttwbyn wʔhpk šbytky wḥzw lky nbywtʔ dgltʔ wmṭʕynytʔ
02:15	ṭrpw ʕlyky ʔydyhwn kl ʕbry ʔwrḥʔ ʔšrqw wʔnyrw ryšyhhwn ʕl brt ʔwršlm wʔmrw hdʔhy qrytʔ dʔmryn hww gmyrt šwprʔ wḥdwtʔ dklh ʔrʕʔ
02:16	ʕbd mryʔ mdm dʔtḥšb wšmly mlth ʔyk dpqd mn ywmtʔ qdmyʔ sḥph wlʔ ḥs wʔḥdy ʕlyky bʕldbbʔ wʔrym qrnʔ dʔlwṣyky
02:17	ptḥw ʕlyky pwmhwn klhwn bʕldbbyky ʔšrqw wḥrqw šnyhwn wʔmryn blʕnh brm hnw ywmʔ dskyn ʔškḥn wḥzyn
02:18	gʕʔ lbhwn lwt mryʔ dšwrʔ dbrt ṣhywn ʔrdy ʔyk nḥlʔ dmʕtʔ bʔymmʔ wbllyʔ lʔ ttlyn lky pwygʔ wlʔ tšlʔ bbt ʕynky
02:19	qwmy šbḥy bllyʔ bryš mṭrtʔ wʔšwdy ʔyk myʔ lbky lwqbl ʔpy mryʔ ʔrymy lwth ʔydyky ʕl npšʔ dylwdyky dmtṭrpyn lkpnʔ bryš klhwn šwqʔ
02:20	ḥzy mryʔ wḥwr lmn ʕbdt hknʔ ʔyk nʔkln nšʔ pʔryhyn ylwdʔ dmštqpyn ʔyn ntqṭl bmqdšh dmryʔ khnʔ wnbyʔ
02:21	škbw ʕl ʔrʕʔ bšwqʔ ṭlyʔ wsbʔ btwlty wgdwdy nplw bḥrbʔ qṭlt bywmʔ drwgzk ṭbḥt wlʔ ḥst
02:22	qryt ʔyk ywmʔ dʕdʕdʔ bʕldbby mn ḥdry wlʔ hwʔ bywmʔ drwgzh dmryʔ plyṭʔ wsrydʔ dšqlt wrbyt bʕldbby gmrw ʔnwn

04:01	ʔyknʔ mstlʔ dhbʔ ṭbʔ wšnʔ ṣwbʕʔ špyrʔ wmštdyn kʔpʔ dqwdšʔ bryš klhwn šwqʔ
04:02	bny ṣhywn yqyrʔ dmytryn hww mn kʔpʔ ṭbtʔ ʔyknʔ ʔtḥšbw ʔyk mʔnʔ dḥṣpʔ ʕbd ʔydyʔ dpḥrʔ
04:03	gly ʔyk yrwrʔ tdyhyn wʔynq gryhyn hwt brt ʕmy lmḥwtʔ dlyt lh ʔsywtʔ wʔyk nʕmʔ bmdbrʔ
04:04	dbq lšnh dylwdʔ lšmy ḥkh bṣhyʔ ṭlyʔ šʔlw lḥmʔ wlyt dqṣʔ yhb lhwn
04:05	hnwn dʔklyn hww pwnqʔ hʔ symyn bšwqʔ dʔtrbyw ʕl zḥwrytʔ hʔ dmkyn bqqltʔ
04:06	wsgy ʕwlh dbrt ʕmy mn ḥṭyth dsdwm dʔthpkt mn šlyʔ wlʔ lʔy bh ʔydyʔ
04:07	dkyw nzyryh mn tlgʔ wḥwrw mn ḥlbʔ bmrʕythwn smqw grmyhwn mn srdwn wmn spylʔ gwšmhwn
04:08	ḥšk mn šwḥrʔ ḥzwhwn wlʔ ʔtydʕw bšwqʔ qpwd mškhwn ʕl grmyhwn ybš whwʔ ʔyk qysʔ
04:09	ṭbyn hww qṭyly ḥrbʔ mn qṭyly kpnʔ ddbw ʔyk hnwn dmmḥyn wšdyn bḥqlʔ
04:10	ʔydy nšʔ mrḥmnytʔ bšl bnyhyn whww lhyn lmʔkwltʔ btbrh dbrt ʕmy
04:11	šmly mryʔ ḥmth wʔšd ḥmtʔ drwgzh wšbq nwrʔ bṣhywn \wšlhbytʔ#1#/ ʔklt štʔsyh
04:12	wlʔ hymnw mlkʔ dʔrʕʔ wklhwn ʕmwryh dtbyl dʔtʔ wʕʔl bʕldbbʔ wʔlwṣʔ btrʕyh dʔwršlm
04:13	mṭl ḥṭhʔ dnbyyh wʕwlʔ dkhnyh dʔšdw bgwh dmʔ dzdyqʔ
04:14	ndw rwrbnyh bšwqyh wʔtplplw bdmʔ wlʔ ʔškḥw dnqrbwn llbwšyhwn
04:15	prwšw mnhwn wṭmʔʔ qrw ʔnwn ʕbrw ʕbrw wlʔ ttqrbwn lhwn mṭl dʔrgzw ʔp ʔtṭrpw ʔmrw byt ʕmmʔ dtwb lʔ nwspwn lmʕmr
04:16	ʕd qymyn ḥnn ḥšk ʕynyn mn ʕwdrnn sryqʔyt dqw dwqyn lwt ʕmʔ dlʔ prq
04:17	prṣwph dmryʔ plg ʔnwn wlʔ nwsp lmḥr bhwn bʔpy khnʔ lʔ nsbw wʕl sbʔ lʔ rḥmw
04:18	ṣdw lddqdqyn ldmhlkyn bšwqʔ qrb qṣn mlw ywmyn mṭl dʔtʔ ʕdnn
04:19	qlyln hww rdwpyn mn nšry šmyʔ ʕl ṭwrʔ rdpwn wbmdbrʔ ʔtkmnw ln
04:20	rwḥʔ dʔpyn mšyḥh dmryʔ ʔttḥd bgwmṣhwn hw dʔmrn dbṭllh nḥʔ byt ʕmmʔ
04:21	dwṣy wḥdy brt ʔdwm dytbʔ bʔrʕʔ dʕwṣ ʔp lky nmṭʔ ksʔ wtrwyn wttṭrpyn
04:22	gmrw ḥṭhyky brt ṣhywn twb lʔ nwsp lmglywtky ʔtpqdw ḥwbyky brt ʔdwm ʔtglyw ḥṭhyky
05:01	ʔtdkr mryʔ mnʔ hwʔ ln ḥwr wḥzy ḥsdn
05:02	yrtwtn ʔthpkt lnwkryʔ wbtyn lnwkryʔ
05:03	ytmʔ hwyn dlʔ ʔbʔ wʔmhtn ʔyk ʔrmltʔ
05:04	myn bkspʔ ʔštyn wqysyn bdmyʔ
05:05	ʔtw ʕl ṣwrn ʔtrdpn wlʔyn wlʔ ʔttnyḥn
05:06	mṣryʔ yhbw ʔydʔ wʔtwryʔ lmsbʕw lḥmʔ
05:07	ʔbhyn ḥṭw wlyt ʔnwn wḥnn ḥṭhyhwn sbln
05:08	ʕbdʔ ʔštlṭw bn wlyt dprq ln mn ʔydyhwn
05:09	bnpšn nʕl lḥmʔ mn qdm ḥrbʔ dbmdbrʔ
05:10	mškyn ʔyk dmn tnwrʔ ʔtqpdw wqnʔw mn qdm ṭwrpʔ dkpnʔ
05:11	nšʔ bṣhywn ṣʕrw wbtwltʔ bqwryʔ dyhwdʔ
05:12	rwrbnʔ bʔydyhwn ʔttlyw wʔpy sbʔ lʔ yqrw
05:13	gdwdʔ ṭḥnw rḥyʔ wʕlymʔ bqysʔ ʔttqlw
05:14	sbʔ mn trʕʔ bṭlw wgdwdʔ mn ḥdwthwn
05:15	bṭlt ḥdwtʔ dlbn ʔthpkt lʔblʔ ḥdwtn
05:16	npl klylʔ dryšn wy ln ʕl dḥṭyn
05:17	mṭl hnʔ hʔ dwʔ lbn wmṭl hnʔ hʔ ḥšwkn ʕynyn
05:18	ʕl ṭwrʔ dṣhywn dḥrb wtʕlʔ hlkw bh
05:19	wʔnt mryʔ lʕlm ʔytyk wkwrsyk ldrdryn
05:20	lʔ lʕlm tšbqn wtṭʕyn nwgrʔ dywmtʔ
05:21	ʔpnn mryʔ lwtk wntpnʔ ḥdt ywmtn ʔyk dmn qdym
05:22	mṭl dmslyw ʔslytn wrgzt ʕlyn ṭb
01:01	whwʔ bywmwhy dʔḥšyrš hw brh dʔḥšyrš dʔmlk mn hwd wʕdmʔ lkwš ʕl mʔʔ wʕsryn mdynn
01:02	bywmtʔ hnwn kd ytb hwʔ mlkʔ ʔḥšyrš ʕl kwrsyʔ dmlkwth dbšwšn byrtʔ
01:03	bšnt tlt dmlkwth ʕbd mštyʔ rbʔ lklhwn rbrbnwhy wʕbdwhy ḥylʔ prsyʔ wmdyʔ wprtwyʔ wrbrbnʔ dmlkʔ qdmwhy wrbrbnʔ dmdyntʔ
01:04	kd ḥwy ʕwtrʔ wʔyqrʔ dmlkwth wʔyqrʔ dtšbwḥtʔ drbwth ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ mʔʔ wtmnyn ywmyn
01:05	wkd šlmw ywmtʔ hnwn ʕbd mlkʔ lkl ʕmʔ dʔštkḥ bšwšn byrtʔ mn zʕwrʔ wʕdmʔ lrbʔ mštyʔ šbʕʔ ywmyn bdrt gnt bytwnʔ dmlkʔ
01:06	wngydn wʔlʔ dʕmr kwbʔ wtkltʔ wmtyḥn bḥblʔ dbwṣʔ wdʔrgwnʔ ʕl gyglʔ dkspʔ wʕl ʕmwdʔ dʔškrʕʔ wʕrstʔ ddhbʔ wdsʔmʔ rmyn ʕl rṣyptʔ dšyšʔ wtšwytʔ dbwṣʔ wdšryʔ
01:07	wmšwyn bmʔnʔ ddhbʔ wmʔnʔ mn mʔnʔ pryšyn wḥmrʔ dmlkwtʔ sgy ʔyk ʔydʔ dmlkʔ
01:08	wmštyʔ bnmwsʔ wlyt dʔlṣ mṭldhknʔ pqd mlkʔ lkl drb bbyth dnʕbdwn ṣbynʔ dklnš
01:09	wšty mlktʔ ʔbdt mštyʔ rbʔ lklhyn nšʔ byt mlkwth dmlkʔ ʔḥšyrš
01:10	wbywmʔ šbyʕyʔ kd špr lbh dmlkʔ bḥmrʔ ʔmr lmhymnʔ lbztʔ wlrḥbwnʔ wlbgtʔ wlʔgbwtʔ wltrš wlztr wlbrkš šbʕʔ mhymnʔ dmšmšyn qdm mlkʔ ʔḥšyrš
01:11	lmʕlw lwšty mlktʔ qdm mlkʔ btgʔ dmlkwth lmḥwyw lʕmmʔ wlrbrbnʔ šwprh mṭldšpyr hwʔ ḥzwh
01:12	wlʔ ṣbt wšty mlktʔ lmʕl bptgmʔ dšdr ʕlyh mlkʔ bʔydʔ dmhymnʔ wrgz mlkʔ ṭb wḥmth mtgwzlʔ hwt
01:13	wʔmr mlkʔ lḥkymʔ bny ydʕy zbnʔ mṭldhknʔ hwʔ nmwsh dmlkʔ ʔmr hwʔ qdm kl dydʕyn hww nmwsʔ wdynʔ
01:14	wldqrybyn lh brnšy wʔštr wʔrmwt wrmws wtršyš wmsryʔ wmʕwkn rwrbnʔ dprs wdmdy dytbyn qdm mlkʔ wmtḥzyn qdmwhy btrʕʔ dmlkwtʔ
01:15	ʔmrw mnʔ wlʔ lmʕbd lh lmlktʔ wšty ʕl dlʔ ʕbdt mlth dmlkʔ ʔḥšyrš dšlḥ bʔydʔ dmhymnʔ
01:16	wʔmr mʕwkn qdm mlkʔ wqdm rwrbnʔ lʔ hwʔ ʕl mlkʔ blḥwd bsrt wšty mlktʔ ʔlʔ ʕl klhwn rbrbnʔ wʕl klhwn ʕmmʔ dbklhyn mdyntʔ dmlkʔ ʔḥšyrš
01:17	wkd npwq ṭʔbʔ mltʔ hdʔ ʕl klhyn nšʔ nhwyn šyṭn wbsrn gbryhyn bʕynyhyn wnhwyn ʔmrn dmlkʔ ʔḥšyrš pqd lmʕlw lwšty mlktʔ qdmwhy wlʔ ʕlt
01:18	ywmnʔ nʔmrwn rwrbnʔ dprs wdmdy dšmʕw ptgmh dmlktʔ mn klhwn rwrbnʔ dmlkʔ wklh bsyrwtʔ wrwgzʔ
01:19	ʔn ʕl mlkʔ špyr npwq ptgmʔ dmlkwtʔ mn qdmwhy wntktb bnmws mdy wprs dlʔ ʕbr wtwb lʔ tʕwl wšty mlktʔ lwt mlkʔ ʔḥšyrš wmlkwth ntl mlkʔ lḥbrth dṭbʔ mnh
01:20	wnštmʕ ptgmʔ dmlkʔ wnʕbd bklh mlkwtʔ mṭl drbʔhy wklhyn nšʔ nʕbdn ʔyqrʔ lgbryhyn mn rbʔ wʕdmʔ lzʕwrʔ
01:21	wšpr ptgmʔ hnʔ bʕynwhy dmlkʔ wdrbrbnwhy wʕbd mlkʔ ʔyk ptgmh dmʕwkn
01:22	wšdr ʔgrtʔ lklhyn mdynth dmlkʔ lmdyntʔ ʔyk ktbh wlʕmʔ ʔyk lšnh lmhwʔ kl gbr šlyṭ bbyth wmmll ʔyk lšn ʕmh
02:01	wbtr mlʔ hlyn kd ʔttnyḥt ḥmth dmlkʔ ʔḥšyrš ʔtdbrh lwšty mlktʔ wlklmdm dʕbdt wlklmdm dpsq ʕlyh
02:02	wʔmrw lh ʕlymwhy dmlkʔ wmšmšnwhy nbʕwn lmlkʔ ʕlymtʔ dšpyrn bḥzwhyn
02:03	wnpqwd mlkʔ bklhyn mdyntʔ wnknšwn klhyn ʕlymtʔ btwltʔ dšpyrn bḥzwhyn lbyt nšʔ lwt hgy mhymnʔ nṭr nšʔ wntl tṣbythyn
02:04	wʕlymtʔ dtšpr qdm mlkʔ tmlk ḥlp wšty wšprt mltʔ bʕyny mlkʔ wʕbd hknʔ
02:05	wgbrʔ ywdyʔ ʔyt hwʔ bšwšn byrtʔ wšmh mwrdky br yʔyr br šmʕy br qyš mn šbṭʔ dbnymyn
02:06	dgly mn ʔwršlm ʕm glwtʔ dglyt ʕm ywknyʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ dgly nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbyl
02:07	whwʔ mrbʔ lhds dhy ʔstyr brt ddh mṭl dlyt hwʔ lh ʔbʔ wʔmʔ wʕlymtʔ špyr hwʔ ḥzwh wšpyr hw ʔqwblh wkd mytw ʔbwh wʔmh nsbh mwrdky brtʔ
02:08	wkd ʔštmʕ ptgmʔ dmlkʔ wpwqdnh wkd mtknšn btwltʔ sgyʔtʔ lšwšn byrtʔ lwt hgy mhymnʔ ʔtdbrt ʔp ʔstyr lbyt mlkʔ lwt nṭr nšʔ
02:09	wšprt ʕlymtʔ bʕynwhy wšqlt ḥsdʔ qdmwhy wsrhb ʕl tṣbyth wʕl mnwth lmtl lh wlšbʕ ʕlymth dzdyqn hwy lmtl lh mn byt mlkʔ wprš lh wlʕlymth ṭb mn klhyn nšʔ
02:10	wlʔ ḥwyt ʔstyr šmh wšrbth mṭl dmwrdky pqdh hwʔ dlʔ tḥwyn
02:11	wklywm mwrdky mhlk hwʔ qdm drt nšʔ lmdʕ šrbʔ dʔstyr wmnʔ wtʕbd lh
02:12	wmʔ dmṭʔ hwʔ zbnʔ dḥdʔ mn ʕlymtʔ lmʕl qdm mlkʔ ʔḥšyrš mʔ dšlmw lh trʕsr ywmtʔ ʔyk nmwsʔ dnšʔ mṭldhknʔ šlmyn ywmy tṣbythyn štʔ ywmyn dmšḥʔ dmwrʔ wštʔ ywmyn dbsmʔ wbtṣbytʔ dnšʔ
02:13	whknʔ ʕʔlʔ ʕlymtʔ qdm mlkʔ wkl mdm dʔmrʔ mtyhb lh lmʕl ʕmh mn byt nšʔ wʕdmʔ lbyt mlkʔ
02:14	brmšʔ ʕʔlʔ wbṣprʔ hpkʔ lbyt nšʔ ʕl yd šngšgyr mhymnʔ dmlkʔ nṭr drwktʔ wtwb lʔ ʕʔlʔ qdm mlkʔ ʔlʔ ʔn ṣbʔ bh mlkʔ wqrh bšmh
02:15	wkd mṭʔ zbnh dʔstyr brt ʔbyḥl ddh dmwrdky dnsbh lh brtʔ lmʕl qdm mlkʔ lʔ bʕt mdm ʔlʔ mdm dʔmr hgy mhymnʔ nṭr nšʔ whwt ʔstyr šqlʔ ḥsdʔ bʕyny kl dḥzyyh
02:16	wʕlt ʔstyr qdm mlkʔ ʔḥšyrš lbyt mlkʔ byrḥʔ dʕsrʔ dhw knwn ʔḥry bšnt ʔrbʕ lmlkwth
02:17	wrḥmh mlkʔ lʔstyr ṭb mn klhyn nšʔ wšqlt ḥsdʔ mn qdmwhy mn klhyn btwltʔ wqblt tʔgʔ dmlkwtʔ bryšh wʔmlkt ḥlp wšty
02:18	wʕbd mlkʔ mštyʔ rbʔ lklhwn rbrbnwhy wʕbd mštyʔ lʔstyr wnyḥʔ lmdyntʔ ʕbd wyhb mwhbtʔ ʔyk ʔydʔ dmlkʔ
02:19	wkd mtknšn btwltʔ dtrtyn zbnyn mwrdky ytb hwʔ btrʕʔ dmlkʔ
02:20	wlʔ mḥwyʔ ʔstyr šrbth wʕmh ʔyk dpqdh mwrdky wpwqdnh dmwrdky ʔstyr ʕbdʔ hwt ʔyk dhwt bhymnwtʔ ʕmh
02:21	wbywmtʔ hnwn mwrdky ytb hwʔ btrʕʔ dmlkʔ wrgzw bgtn wtrš tryn mhymnwhy dmlkʔ nṭry trʕʔ wbʕw lmwšṭw ʔydyʔ lmlkʔ ʔḥšyrš
02:22	wʔtglyt mltʔ lmwrdky wglh lʔstyr mlktʔ wʔmrt ʔstyr lmlkʔ bšm mwrdky
02:23	wʔtʕqbt mltʔ wʔštkḥt wʔzdqpw tryhwn ʕl zqypʔ wlʔ ktbw bspr ywmtʔ qdm mlkʔ
03:01	wbtr mlʔ hlyn ʔwrb mlkʔ ʔḥšyrš lhmn br hmdt ʔggyʔ wʔrym kwrsyh lʕl mn klhwn rwrbnʔ dʕmh
03:02	wklhwn ʕbdʔ dmlkʔ dbtrʕʔ dmlkʔ brkyn hww wsgdyn lhmn mṭldhknʔ pqd ʕlwhy mlkʔ wmwrdky lʔ brk hwʔ wsgd
03:03	wʔmryn ʕbdʔ dmlkʔ btrʕʔ dmlkʔ lmwrdky lmnʔ ʕbd ʔnt ʕl pwqdnʔ dmlkʔ
03:04	wkd ʔmryn hww bkl ywm wlʔ šmʕ hwʔ lhwn ḥwyw lhmn dndʕwn ʔn šryrn mlwhy dmwrdky mṭl dḥwy ʔnwn dywdyʔ hw
03:05	wḥzʔ hmn dmwrdky lʔ brk hwʔ wsgd lh wʔtmly hmn ḥmtʔ ʕl mwrdky
03:06	wbṣyrʔ hwt ʕbydtʔ dnwšṭ ʔydh ʕl mwrdky blḥwdwhy mṭldḥwywhy ʕmh dmwrdky wbʕʔ hmn lklhwn ywdyʔ dbklh mlkwth dʔḥšyrš ʕmh dmwrdky
03:07	byrḥʔ qdmyʔ dhw nysn bšnt trtʕsrʔ dmlkʔ ʔḥšyrš ʔrmy pṣʔ whwy pṣʔ qdm hmn mn ywm lywm wmn yrḥ lyrḥ byrḥʔ dtrʕsr dhw ʔdr
03:08	ʔmr hmn lmlkʔ ʔḥšyrš ʔyt ʕmʔ mbdr wmbzq bklhyn mdynth dmlkʔ ʔḥšyrš nmwsyhwn pryšyn mn kl ʕm wnmwsʔ dmlkʔ lʔ ʕbdyn wlmlkʔ lʔ wlʔ dnšbwq ʔnwn
03:09	ʔn ʕl mlkʔ lʔ špyr nktwb dnʔbdwn wʕsrʔ ʔlpyn kkrʔ dkspʔ ʔtqwl ʕl ʔydʔ dʕbdy ʕbdʔ lmʕlw lgzʔ dmlkʔ
03:10	šql mlkʔ ʕzqtʔ mn ʕydh wyhb lhmn br hmdt ʔggyʔ bʕldbbʔ dywdyʔ
03:11	wʔmr mlkʔ kspk yhyb lk wʕmʔ lmʕbd lh kl mdm dšpyr bʕynyk
03:12	wʔtqry sprʔ dmlkʔ bywmʔ hw byrḥʔ qdmyʔ btltʕsrʔ bh byrḥʔ ʔtktb klmdm dpqd hmn lrbḥylʔ dmlkʔ wlmrwtʔ dbkl mdynʔ wmdynʔ wlrbrbny ʕmmʔ mdyntʔ ʔyk ktbh wlʕmʔ ʔyk lšnh bšm mlkʔ ʔḥšyrš ʔtktb wʔtḥtm bʕzqtʔ dmlkʔ
03:13	wʔštdr ʔgrtʔ byd rhṭʔ lklhyn mdyntʔ dmlkʔ lmḥrb wlmqṭl wlmwbdw lklhwn ywdyʔ mn ʕlymʔ wʕdmʔ lsbʔ wṭlyʔ wnšʔ bḥd ywm btlt ʕsrʔ byrḥʔ ʔdr wnksyhwn lbztʔ bḥd ywm byrḥ ʔdr btlt ʕsrʔ ʔtktb
03:14	wpršgnh dktbʔ ʔtyhb bkl mdynʔ wmdynʔ wpqd lklhwn ʕmmʔ dnhwwn mṭybʔ lywmʔ hnʔ
03:15	wrhṭʔ npqw msrhbyn bpwqdnʔ dmlkʔ wptgmʔ ʔtpqd bšwšn byrtʔ wmlkʔ whmn ʔstmkw lmštʔ ʔkḥdʔ wmdyntʔ šwšn ʔštgšt
04:01	wmwrdky ydʕ klmdm dʔtʕbd wṣry mwrdky lbwšwhy wʔtkbn sqʔ wʔttpyl bqṭmʔ wnpq myll bgw mdyntʔ ylltʔ rbtʔ wmryrtʔ
04:02	wʔtʔ ʕdmʔ ltrʕʔ dmlkʔ wlyt hwʔ nmwsʔ dʔnš nlbš sqʔ wnʔtʔ ltrʕʔ dmlkʔ
04:03	wbkl mdynʔ kd dmṭy ptgmʔ dmlkʔ hwʔ ʔblʔ rbʔ lywdyʔ wṣwmʔ wbktʔ wmrqdtʔ wsqʔ wqṭmʔ mkk lsgyʔʔ
04:04	wʕlw mhymnyh dylh dʔstyr wḥwywh wʔttzyʕt mlktʔ ṭb wšdrt mʔnʔ lmlbšwth lmwrdky wlmšlḥw sqʔ mnh wlʔ qbl
04:05	wqrt ʔstyr lhtn mhymnʔ mn mhymnʔ dmlkʔ dqʔm qdmyh wpqdth lwt mwrdky dtdʕ dmnʔhy hdʔ wʕl mnʔ
04:06	wnpq htn lwt mwrdky lšwqʔ dmdyntʔ qdm trʕʔ dmlkʔ
04:07	wḥwyh mwrdky klmdm dgdš lh wḥwšbnʔ dkspʔ dʔmr hmn lmtql lmʕlw lbytgzʔ ʕl ywdyʔ dnʔbdwn
04:08	wpršgnʔ dsym bšwšn byrtʔ yhbh lh dnḥwʔ lʔstyr wnpqdyh dtʕwl lwt mlkʔ wtbʕʔ mnh wttkšpy lh ʕl ʕmʔ
04:09	wʕl htn wʔmr lʔstyr mlwhy dmwrdky
04:10	wʔmrt ʔstyr lhtn wpqdth lwt mwrdky lmʔmr
04:11	klhwn ʕbdʔ dmlkʔ ydʕyn dkl gbrʔ ʔw ʔnttʔ dʕʔl qdm mlkʔ ldrtʔ gwytʔ ʔynʔ dlʔ mtpqd ḥdʔhy ʔtʔ dʔtʔ lmtqṭlw lbr mn mn dmwšṭ lh mlkʔ šbṭʔ ddhbʔ wḥyʔ wʔnʔ lʔ ʔtqryt lmʕl qdm mlkʔ hʔ tltʔ ywmyn
04:12	wḥwy lmwrdky mlyh dʔstyr
04:13	wʔmr mwrdky ʔmr lh lʔstyr lʔ tsbry bnpšky dkd byt mlkʔ ʔnty mtplṭʔ ʔnty mn klhwn ywdyʔ
04:14	ʔn tštqyn bzbnʔ hnʔ rwḥtʔ wpwrqnʔ hwʔ lywdyʔ mn dwkʔ ʔḥrnʔ wʔnty wbyt ʔbwky ʔbd ʔnty wmnw ydʕ ʔn mṭlhnʔ zbnʔ ʔtqryty wʔtqrbty lmlkwtʔ
04:15	wʔmrt ʔstyr ʔmr lmwrdky
04:16	zl knš lklhwn ywdyʔ dʔyt bšwšn byrtʔ wṣwmw ʕly wlʔ tʔklwn wlʔ tštwn tltʔ ywmyn llyʔ wʔymmʔ wʔp ʔnʔ wʕlymty ʔṣwm hknʔ hydyn ʔʕwl qdm mlkʔ dlʔ bnmwsy wʔn ʕbdt ʕbdt
04:17	wʔzl mwrdky wʕbd klmdm dšlḥt lh ʔstyr
05:01	wbywmʔ tlytyʔ lbšt ʔstyr lbwšʔ dmlkwtʔ wqmt bdrtʔ gwytʔ dbyt mlkʔ lwqbl byt mlkʔ wmlkʔ ytb hwʔ bkwrsyʔ dmlkwtʔ lwqbl trʕʔ dbytʔ
05:02	wkd ḥzʔ mlkʔ lʔstyr mlktʔ dqymʔ bdrtʔ wšqlt ḥsdʔ qdmwhy wʔwšṭ mlkʔ ʕl ʔstyr šbṭʔ ddhbʔ dbʔydh wqrbt ʔstyr wʔḥdt bryšh dšbṭʔ ddhbʔ
05:03	wʔmr lh mlkʔ mʔ lky ʔstyr mlktʔ wmnʔhy bʕwtky ʕdmʔ lplgh dmlkwty ttyhb lky
05:04	wʔmrt ʔstyr ʔn ʕl mlkʔ špyr nʔtʔ mlkʔ whmn lmštyʔ dʕbdt lh
05:05	wʔmr mlkʔ bʕgl ḥzw lhmn nʕbd ʔyk dʔmrʔ ʔstyr wʔtʔ mlkʔ wmhn lmštyʔ
05:06	wʔmr mlkʔ lʔstyr bmštyʔ dḥmrʔ mnʔ šʔltky ttyhb lky wmnʔhy bʕwtky ʕdmʔ lplgh dmlkwtʔ ttyhb lky
05:07	wʕnt ʔstyr wʔmrt šʔlty wbʕwty
05:08	ʔn ʔškḥt rḥmʔ bʕynyk mlkʔ wʔn ʕlyk mlkʔ špyr dttl ly šʔlty wtʕbd ly bʕwty nʔtʔ mlkʔ whmn lmštyʔ dʔʕbd lhwn mḥr ʔyk ptgmʔ dmlkʔ
05:09	wnpq hmn bywmʔ hw ḥdʔ wpṣyḥ blbh wkd ḥzyhy hmn lmwrdky dytb btrʕʔ dmlkʔ wlʔ qm wlʔ ʔttzyʕ mnh ʔtmly hmn ḥmtʔ ʕl mwrdky
05:10	wʔttpyr hmn wʔzl lbyth wšdr ʔytyw lklhwn rḥmwhy wlzrš ʔntth
05:11	wʔštʕy lhwn hmn ʔyqrʔ dʕwtrh wswgʔʔ dbnwhy wdʔwrbh mlkʔ wʔqymh ʕl rwrbnʔ wʕl kl ʕbdy mlkʔ
05:12	wʔmr hmn wʔplʔ lʔnš ʔʕlt ʔstyr ʕm mlkʔ ʔlʔ ʔn ly wʔp mḥr mzmn ʔnʔ lh ʕm mlkʔ
05:13	whnʔ klh lʔ šwʔ ly bkl šʕtʔ dḥzʔ ʔnʔ lh lmwrdky ywdyʔ dytb btrʕʔ dmlkʔ dlʔ zʔʕ mn qdmy
05:14	wʔmrt lh zrš ʔntth wklhwn rḥmwhy nʕbdwn qysʔ drwmh ḥmšyn ʔmyn wbṣprʔ ʔmr lmlkʔ wntlwnyhy lmwrdky ʕlwhy wʕwl lmštyʔ ʕm mlkʔ kd ḥdʔ ʔnt wšprt mltʔ bʕynwhy dhmn ṭb wʕbd qysʔ
06:01	wbllyʔ hw prdt šnth dmlkʔ wʔmr lmʕlw spr ʕwhdnʔ dmlʔ dywmtʔ whww qryn qry qdm mlkʔ
06:02	wʔštkḥ dktyb dḥwy mwrdky ʕl bgtn wtrš tryn mhymnʔ dmlkʔ nṭry trʕʔ dbʕw dnwšṭwn ʔydyhwn ʕl mlkʔ ʔḥšyrš
06:03	wʔmr mlkʔ mnʔ ʔtʕbd ʔyqrʔ wrbwtʔ lmwrdky ʕl hdʔ ʔmryn lh ʕbdwhy lmlkʔ wmšmšnwhy lʔ ʔtʕbd lh mdm
06:04	wʔmr mlkʔ mnw bdrtʔ whmn ʔtʔ lbyt mlkʔ ldrtʔ brytʔ dnʔmr lmlkʔ dntlʔ lmwrdky ʕl qysʔ dʔtqn lh
06:05	wʔmryn lh ʕlymwhy lmlkʔ hʔ hmn qʔm bdrtʔ wʔmr mlkʔ nʕwl
06:06	wʕl hmn wʔmr lh mlkʔ mnʔ wlʔ lmʕbd lgbrʔ dmlkʔ ṣbʔ bʔyqrh wʔmr hmn blbh lmnw ṣbʔ mlkʔ lmʕbd ʔyqrʔ ytyr mn dyly
06:07	wʔmr hmn lmlkʔ lgbrʔ dmlkʔ ṣbʔ bʔyqrh
06:08	nytwn lbwšʔ dmlkwtʔ dlbš mlkʔ wswsyʔ drkb ʕlwhy mlkʔ kd ʔttsym tsym tgʔ dmlkwtʔ bryšh
06:09	wntyhb lbwšʔ wswsyʔ lḥd mn ḥʔrʔ dmlkʔ prtwyʔ wnlbšywhy lgbrʔ dmlkʔ ṣbʔ bʔyqrh wnrkbwnh ʕl swsyʔ wnḥdrwnh bšwqʔ wnqrwn qdmwhy hknʔ ntʕbd lgbrʔ dmlkʔ ṣbʔ bʔyqrh
06:10	wʔmr mlkʔ lhmn bʕgl sb lbwšʔ wdbr swsyʔ ʔyk dʔmrt wʕbd hknʔ lmwrdky ywdyʔ dytb btrʕʔ dmlkʔ wlʔ tbṣr mltʔ mn kl mdm dʔmrt
06:11	wnsb hmn lbwšʔ wdbr swsyʔ wlbšh lmwrdky wʔkrkh bšwqʔ dmdyntʔ wqrʔ qdmwhy hknʔ ntʕbd lgbrʔ dmlkʔ ṣbʔ bʔyqrh
06:12	wʔtʔ mwrdky ltrʕʔ dmlkʔ whmn ʔzl lbyth kd ʔbyl wmḥpy ryšh

07:01	wʕl mlkʔ whmn lmštyʔ dʕbdt ʔstyr mlktʔ
07:02	wʔmr lh mlkʔ lʔstyr ʔp bh bywmʔ hw dmštyʔ dḥmrʔ mnʔ hy šʔltky wbʕwtky ʕdmʔ lplgh dmlkwty ntʕbd lky
07:03	wʕnt ʔstyr wʔmrt ʔn ʔškḥt rḥmʔ bʕynyk mlkʔ wʔn ʕl mlkʔ špyr ttyhby npšy bšʔlty wʕmy bbʕwty
07:04	mṭl dʔzdbnn ʔnʔ wʕmy lqṭlʔ wlḥrbʔ wlʔbdnʔ wʔlw dntqnʔ ʕbdʔ wʔmhtʔ ʔzdbnn štqʔ hwyt lʔ gyr šlʔ bʕldbbʔ dnhr lmlkʔ
07:05	wʕnʔ mlkʔ ʔḥšyrš wʔmr lʔstyr mlktʔ mnw hnʔ ʔw ʔynw dʔttrym lbh dnʕbd hknʔ
07:06	wʔmrt ʔstyr gbrʔ ʔlwṣʔ wbʕldbbʔ hmn hw hnʔ byšʔ whmn ʔttzyʕ mn qdm mlkʔ wmlktʔ
07:07	wmlkʔ qm bḥmth mn mštyʔ dḥmrʔ lmpq lgnt bytwnʔ whmn qm dnbʕʔ ʕl npšh mn ʔstyr mlktʔ mṭl dḥzʔ dgrmt lh ʕlwhy byštʔ mn mlkʔ
07:08	wmlkʔ hpk mn gntʔ bytwnʔ lbyt mštyʔ dḥmrʔ whmn rmʔ ʕl ʕrsʔ wʔstyr ytbʔ ʕlyh wʔmr mlkʔ wʔp lmṣʕrw lmlktʔ ʕmy bgw bytʔ wmltʔ npqt mn pwmh dmlkʔ wʔpwhy dhmn ʔtḥpy
07:09	wʕnʔ rḥbwnʔ ḥd mn mhymnwhy dmlkʔ wʔmr qdm mlkʔ hʔ ʔp qysʔ tqn hwʔ hmn lmtlʔ lmwrdky ʕlwhy ʕl dʔmr špyrtʔ ʕl mlkʔ wqʔm bbyth dhmn rwmh ḥmšyn ʔmyn wʔmr mlkʔ tlʔwhy ʕlwhy
07:10	wtlʔwhy lhmn ʕl qysʔ dtqn lh lmwrdky wḥmth dmlkʔ ʔttnyḥt
08:01	bywmʔ hw wyhb mlkʔ ʔḥšyrš lʔstyr mlktʔ byth dhmn bʕldbbʔ dywdyʔ wmwrdky ʕl qdm mlkʔ mṭl dglt ʔstyr mnʔ hwʔ lh

08:04	wʔwšṭ mlkʔ lʔstyr šbṭʔ ddhbʔ wqrbt lh ʔstyr

08:06	ʔyknʔ gyr mṣyʔ ʔnʔ dʔḥzʔ bbyštʔ dtgdš lʕmy wʔyknʔ mškḥʔ ʔnʔ dʔḥzʔ bʔbdnʔ dšrbty
08:07	wʔmr mlkʔ ʔḥšyrš lʔstyr mlktʔ hʔ byth dhmn yhbt lky wlh tlw ʕl qysʔ ʕl dʔwšṭ ʔydʔ bywdyʔ
08:08	wʔntwn ʕl ywdyʔ ʔyk dšpyr bʕynykwn bšmʔ dmlkʔ ḥtwmw bʕzqtʔ dmlkʔ bktbʔ dmtktb bšm mlkʔ wmtḥtm bʕzqth dmlkʔ dlʔ hpk
08:09	wʔtqryw sprʔ dmlkʔ bzbnʔ hw byrḥʔ tlytyʔ dhw ḥzyrn btltʔ wʕsryn bh byrḥʔ wktbw kl mdm dktb mwrdky ʕl ywdyʔ lrby ḥylʔ wlmrwtʔ wlrbrbnʔ dmdyntʔ mn hwd wʕdmʔ lkwš mʔʔ wʕsryn wšbʕ mdynn mdyntʔ ʔyk ktbh wlʕmʔ ʔyk lšnh wlywdyʔ ʔyk ktbhwn wʔyk lšnhwn
08:10	wʔtktbw bšm mlkʔ ʔḥšyrš wʔtḥtm bʕzqtʔ dmlkʔ wšdr ʔgrtʔ byd rhṭʔ wbyd ʔspwkʔ rkby rkšʔ bny rmkʔ

09:01	wbyrḥʔ dtrʕsr dhw ʔdr btltʕsrʔ kd mṭy zbnʔ dptgmʔ dmlkʔ wpwqdnh lmtʕbdw lbʕldbbyhwn ʔštḥlpt ʕbydtʔ dnštlṭwn ywdyʔ bsnʔyhwn
09:02	wʔtknšw ywdyʔ bqwryhwn wbklhyn mdyntʔ dmlkʔ ʔḥšyrš dnwšṭwn ʔydʔ bʕbdy byšthwn wʔnš lʔ qm qdmyhwn mṭl dnplt dḥlthwn ʕl klhwn ʕmmʔ

09:30	wšdrw ʔgrtʔ lklhwn ywdyʔ lmʔʔ wʕsryn wšbʕ mdynn dbmlkwth dʔḥšyrš mlkʔ mlʔ dšrrʔ wdšlmʔ
09:31	dnšrwn ywmtʔ dpwryʔ hlyn bzbnhwn ʔyk dʔšrw ʕlyhwn mwrdky ywdyʔ wʔstyr mlktʔ ʔyk dʔšrwn hnwn ʕlyhwn wʕl bnyhwn pwqdnʔ wṣwmhwn wṣlwthwn

10:03	mṭl dmwrdky ywdyʔ tnynʔ hwʔ dmlkʔ ʔḥšyrš whwʔ rbʔ ʕl ywdyʔ wṣbʔ hwʔ ṭbtʔ lʕmh wmmll hwʔ ʕl klh zrʕh

00100:00	<twb ktbʔ ddnyʔyl nbyʔ /nbywth ddnyʔyl#3# /nbywth ddnyʔyl nbyʔ#3# /twb nbywth ddnyʔyl#3#/>
00101:01	bšnt tlt dmlkwth dywyqym mlkʔ dyhwdʔ ʔtʔ nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl lʔwršlm wḥdrh
00101:02	wʔšlmh mryʔ bʔydh wlywyqym mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wlmʔnʔ dbyth dmryʔ wmn mʔnʔ dbyth dmryʔ ʔwbl ʔnwn lʔrʕʔ dsnʕr lbyt ptkrh wmʔnʔ ʔʕl lbyt gzʔ dptkrh
00101:03	wʔmr mlkʔ lʔšpz rb mhymnʔ dnytʔ mn bny ʔysryl wmn zrʕ mlkwtʔ wmn prtwyʔ
00101:04	ṭlyʔ dmwmʔ lyt bhwn ʔylyn dšpyryn bḥzwhwn wskwltnyn bḥkmtʔ wydʕy ydʕtʔ wmtbyny bmdʕʔ ʔylyn dmṣyn bḥylʔ lmqm bhyklʔ dmlkʔ lmšmšwth wlmlpw ʔnwn sprʔ wlšnʔ dkldyʔ
00101:05	wʔqym lhwn mlkʔ qymtʔ dywmʔ mn pṭbgʔ dmlkʔ wmn ḥmrʔ dštʔ wlmrbyw ʔnwn šnyn tlt whydyn nqwmwn qdm mlkʔ
00101:06	whww bhwn mn bny yhwdʔ/šbytʔ dyhwd#2#/ dnyʔyl wḥnnyʔ wmyšʔyl wʕzryʔ

00101:08	wsm dnyʔyl brʕynh dlʔ nʔkwl mn pṭbgʔ dmlkʔ wlʔ nštʔ mn ḥmrʔ dštʔ wbʕʔ mn rb mhymnʔ dlʔ nwklywhy
00101:09	wyhb ʔlhʔ ṭybwtʔ wrḥmʔ ldnyʔyl qdm rb mhymnʔ
00101:10	wʔmr rb mhymnʔ ldnyʔyl dḥl ʔnʔ mn mry mlkʔ dpqd ʕl mʔkwltkwn wʕl mštykwn dlmʔ nḥzʔ ʔpykwn mkʔrn mn dṭlyʔ bny šnkwn wnpswq ryšy mlkʔ
00101:11	wʔmr dnyʔyl lmnṣr hw dʔšlṭh rb mhymnʔ ʕl dnyʔyl wʕl ḥnnyʔ wʕl myšʔyl wʕl ʕzryʔ

00103:34	lʔ tšlmn ʕdmʔ lḥrtʔ mṭl šmk wlʔ tbṭl dytqʔ dylk
00103:35	wlʔ trḥq \rḥmyk wṭybwtk /rḥmʔ dṭybwtk#3#/ mnn mṭwl ʔbrhm rḥmk wmṭwl ʔysḥq ʕbdk wmṭwl ʔysryl qdyšk

00103:88	brkw ḥnnyʔ wʕzryʔ wmyšʔyl lmryʔ šbḥwhy wrmrmwhy lʕlm mṭl dšwzbn mn mwtʔ wmn ʔydy šywl ʔḥyn wpṣyn mn šlhbytʔ dyqdʔ wmn mṣʕt nwrʔ ʔpqn

00104:01	ʔnʔ nbwkdnṣr šlʔ hwyt bbyty wnyḥ bhykly
00104:02	wḥlmʔ ḥzyt wʔtdlḥt wḥzwʔ dryšy dlḥwny

00104:05	ʕdmʔ dʕl qdmy dnyʔyl hnʔ dšmh blṭšṣr ʕl šm ʔlhy drwḥ ʔlhyn qdyšyn ʔyt bh wḥlmʔ qdmwhy ʔmrt

00104:10	ḥzʔ hwyt bḥzwʔ dršy dʕl mškby ʕyrʔ wqdyšʔ dnḥt mn šmyʔ

00104:12	ʕqr šršwhy dyn bʔrʕʔ šbwqw bʔsr przlʔ wnḥšʔ btdʔʔ dbrʔ wmn ṭlʔ dšmyʔ nṣṭbʕ wʕm ḥywt brʔ mʕmrh bʕsbʔ dʔrʕʔ

00104:34	mkyl ʔnʔ nbwkdnṣr mšbḥ wmrmrm wmhdr lmlkʔ dšmyʔ dkwlhwn ʕbdwhy bqwštʔ/qwštʔ#3#/ wʔwrḥth dynʔ wlʔylyn dmhlkyn bgʔywtʔ mškḥ dnmkk
00105:01	blṭšṣr mlkʔ ʕbd lḥmʔ rbʔ lʔlp rwrbnwhy wlwqbl ʔlpʔ ḥmrʔ štʔ hwʔ
00105:02	wʔmr blṭšṣr bṭʕm ḥmrh lmytyw mʔnʔ ddhbʔ wdsʔmʔ/wmʔnʔ dsʔmʔ#2#/ dʔpq nbwkdnṣr ʔbwhy mn hyklʔ <dʔlhʔ#2#> dbʔwršlm dnštwn bhwn mlkʔ wrwrbnwhy wnšwhy wdrwkth

00105:04	ʔštyw ḥmrʔ wšbḥw lʔlhʔ ddhbʔ wdsʔmʔ wdnḥšʔ wdprzlʔ wdqysʔ wdkʔpʔ

00105:07	wqrʔ mlkʔ bḥyl <wʔmr#3#> lmʕlw lʔšwpʔ wlkldyʔ wlmgwšʔ wlḥkymʔ ʕnʔ mlkʔ wʔmr lḥkymʔ dbbl klnš dnqrʔ ktbʔ hnʔ wpšrh nḥwyny ʔrgwnʔ nlbš whmnykʔ ddhbʔ bṣwrh wtwltʔ bmlkwtʔ nšlṭ

00105:10	wmlktʔ mṭl mly mlkʔ wrwrbnwhy lbyt mštyʔ ʕlt ʕnt wʔmrʔ lmlkʔ mlkʔ lʕlm ḥyy rʕynyk lʔ ndlḥwnk wzywyk lʔ nštnwn
00105:11	ʔyt gbrʔ bmlkwtk drwḥ ʔlhyn qdyšyn ʔyt bh wbywmy ʔbwk nhyrwtʔ wswklʔ wḥkmtʔ sgyʔtʔ ʔyk ḥkmt ʔlhyn ʔštkḥt bh wmlkʔ nbwkdnṣr ʔbwk rb ḥršʔ wʔšwpʔ wmgwšʔ wkldyʔ ʔqymh
00105:12	mṭwl drwḥʔ wmdʕʔ wswklʔ ytyrʔ ʔštkḥ bh pšr ḥlmyn wʔḥd ʔwḥdn wšrʔ qṭryn dnyʔyl dmlkʔ šmy šmh blṭšṣr mkyl dnyʔyl ntqrʔ wpšrʔ nḥwʔ
00105:13	hydyn dnyʔyl ʕl qdm mlkʔ ʕnʔ mlkʔ wʔmr ldnyʔyl ʔnt hw dnyʔyl mn bny šbytʔ dyhwd dʔyty ʔby mlkʔ mn yhwd
00105:14	šmʕt ʕlyk drwḥ ʔlhyn qdyšyn ʔyt bk wnhyrwtʔ wswklʔ wḥkmtʔ ytyrtʔ ʔštkḥt bk
00105:15	wʔʕlw/wʕlw#3#/ qdmy ʔšwpʔ <wkldyʔ#3#> dktbʔ hnʔ nqrwn wpšrh nḥwwnny/nwdʕwnny#23#/ wlʔ ʔškḥw pšrh dmltʔ lmwdʕwtny
00105:16	wʔnʔ šmʕt ʕlyk dmškḥ ʔnt pšryn lmpšr wqṭryn lmšrʔ ʔn tškḥ ktbʔ hnʔ lmqrʔ wpšrh lmwdʕwtny ʔrgwnʔ tlbš whmynʔ ddhbʔ bṣwrk wtwltʔ bmlkwtʔ tšlṭ/tštlṭ#3#/
00105:17	hydyn ʕnʔ dnyʔyl wʔmr lmlkʔ mwhbtk lk/lʔ#2#/ nhwyn wʔyqr bytk lʔḥrnyn hb brm ktbʔ ʔnʔ ʔqrʔ lmlkʔ wpšrh ʔḥwywhy
00105:18	ʔnt mlkʔ ʔlhʔ mrymʔ mlkwtʔ wrbwtʔ wʔyqrʔ wšwbḥʔ yhb lnbwkdnṣr ʔbwk

00108:24	wtqyp ḥylh wlʔ bḥylʔ dnpšh wtdmrtʔ nḥbl wnṣlḥ wnʕbr wnḥbl ʕšynʔ wʕmʔ dqdyšʔ/qdyšʔ#3#/

00108:26	wḥzwʔ dṣprʔ wdrmšʔ dʔtʔmr qwštʔ hw wʔnt dyn dnyʔyl ksywhy lḥzwʔ hnʔ mṭl dlywmtʔ hw sgyʔʔ
00108:27	wʔnʔ dnyʔyl zʕt wʔtdlḥt ywmtʔ <sgyʔʔ#3#> wqmt wsʕrt ʕbydtʔ dmlkʔ wʔtdmrt bḥzwʔ wlyt dmtbyn
00109:01	bšnt ḥdʔ ddrywš br ʔḥšyrš mn zrʕʔ dmdyʔ dʔmlk bmlkwtʔ dkldyʔ

00109:05	ḥṭyn wʔskln wʔršʕn wmrdn wsṭyn mn pwqdnyk wmn dynyk
00109:06	wlʔ šmʕn lʕbdyk nbyʔ dmllw bšmk ʕl mlkyn wʕl rwrbyn wʕl ʔbhyn wʕl klh ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ

00109:12	wʔqym mlwhy dmll ʕlyn wʕl dynyn ddnwn lmytyw ʕlyn byštʔ rbtʔ dlʔ ʔtʕbdt ʔkwth tḥyt šmyʔ ʔyk dʔtʕbdt bʔwršlm
00109:13	ʔyk dktyb bnmwsʔ dmwšʔ kwlh byštʔ hdʔ ʔtt ʕlyn wlʔ ṣlyn qdm mryʔ ʔlhn dntwb mn ʕwln wnstkl hymnwtk/bhymnwtk#3#/
00109:14	wʔʕyr mryʔ byštʔ wʔytyh ʕlyn mṭl dzdyq hw mryʔ ʔlhn bklhwn ʕbdwhy dʕbd wlʔ šmʕn bqlh
00109:15	mkyl mryʔ ʔlhn dʔpqt <ln#3#> lʕmk mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn bʔydʔ ʕšyntʔ wʕbdt lk šmʔ ʔyk dywmnʔ ḥṭyn wʔršʕn
00109:16	mryʔ ʔyk klh zdyqwtk dʕbdt ʕmn nhpwk rwgzk wḥmtk mn mdyntk ʔwršlm wmn ṭwrk qdyšʔ mṭl dbḥṭhyn wbʕwlʔ dʔbhyn ʕmk ʔtbdr bkl ʔtr hwt ʔwršlm ḥsdʔ lklhwn ʕmmʔ
00109:17	mkyl šmʕ ʔlhʔ bṣlwth dʕbdk wbtkšptn wʔnhr ʔpyk bmqdšk dḥrb mṭl šmk mryʔ
00109:18	ʔrkn \ʔlhy ʔdnk /ʔdnk mryʔ ʔlhy#3#/ wšmʕ wptḥ ʕynyk wḥzy ḥrbtn wṣdytn wmdyntʔ dʔtqry šmk ʕlyh lʔ hwʔ gyr ʕl zdyqwtn/zdyqwtʔ dyln#3#/ tkylynn wmṣlyn ḥnn qdmyk ʔlʔ ʕl rḥmyk sgyʔʔ
00109:19	mryʔ šmʕ mryʔ ḥsn mryʔ ṣwt wʕbd wlʔ twḥr mṭl šmk ʔlhy mṭl dšmk <mryʔ#3#> ʔtqry ʕl mdyntk wʕl ʕmk
00109:20	wʕd ʔnʔ mṣlʔ wmwdʔ ḥwby wḥwby ʕmy ysryl wrmʔ ʔnʔ tkšpty qdm mryʔ ʔlhʔ ʕl ṭwrh qdyšʔ dʔlhy
00109:21	wʕd ʔnʔ mmll bṣlwtʔ wgbrʔ gbryʔyl dḥzyt bḥzwʔ mn qdym prḥ mprḥ wṭs wʔtʔ mn šmyʔ wqrb lwty bzbnʔ dqwrbnʔ drmšʔ
00109:22	wʔtʔ wmll ʕmy wʔmr ly dnyʔyl hšʔ npqt dʔlpk dtstkl/dtštwzyb#3#/

00109:24	šbʕyn šbwʕyn nttnyḥwn ʕl ʕmk wʕl qrytʔ/mdyntʔ#3#/ dqwdšk wlmšlm ḥwbʔ wlmgmr ḥṭhʔ lšwbqn ʕwlʔ wlmytyw zdqʔ dmn ʕlmʔ wlmšlm ḥzwʔ wnbyʔ wlmšyḥʔ qdwš qwdšyn

00109:27	wnʕšn dytqʔ lsgyʔʔ šbwʕʔ ḥd wplgwt šbwʕʔ wnbṭl dbḥtʔ wqwrbnʔ wʕl knpyh dṭnpwtʔ ḥblʔ ʕdmʔ lgmwryʔ dpsyqtʔ ttnyḥ ʕl ḥblʔ
00110:01	bšnt tlt dkwrš mlkʔ dprs ptgmʔ ʔtgly ldnyʔyl dʔtqry šmh blṭšṣr wšryr ptgmʔ wbḥylʔ rbʔ mtbyn ptgmʔ/bptgmʔ#3#/ wʔstkl bh bḥzwʔ

00110:14	wʔnʔ ʔtyt lmḥwywtk mdm dgdš lʕmk bḥrtʔ dywmtʔ mṭl dtwb ḥzwʔ lswp ywmtʔ

00110:17	wʔyknʔ mškḥ ʕbdh dmry hnʔ lmmllw ʕm mry hnʔ dhʔ lyt by ḥylʔ wnšmtʔ/dnšmtʔ#3#/ lʔ ʔštḥrt by
00110:18	wʔwsp qrb ly ʔyk ḥzwʔ dʔnšʔ wḥylny
00110:19	wʔmr ly lʔ tdḥl gbrʔ drgtʔ šlm lk ʔtḥyl wʔtʕšn wkd mmll ʕmy ʔtḥylt wʔmrt nmll mry mṭl dʔtḥylt
00110:20	wʔmr ly ydʕ ʔnt lmnʔ ʔtyt lwtk hšʔ ʔhpwk lmʕbd qrbʔ ʕm šlyṭʔ dprs wʔnʔ npqt whʔ šlyṭʔ dywnyʔ ʔtʔ
00110:21	brm ʔḥwyk mdm dršym bktbʔ dqwštʔ wlyt dmʕdr hwʔ ly bhlyn klhyn ʔlʔ ʔn mykʔyl šlyṭkwn
00111:01	wʔnʔ bšnt ḥdʔ ddrywš mdyʔ qm lmḥylwtny wlmʕšnwtny

00111:45	wnqwš lh mšknh bʔtrʔ špyʔ byt/bynt#2#/ ymʔ lṭwrʔ wnṭr qwdšh wnmṭʔ ʕdn qṣh wlʔ nhwʔ lh mʕdrnʔ
00112:01	bh bzbnʔ hw nqwm mykʔyl mlʔkʔ rbʔ dpqyd ʕl bny ʕmk wnhwʔ zbnʔ dʔwlṣnʔ dlʔ hwʔ ʔkwth mn ywmt ʕlmʔ wbh bzbnʔ hw nštwzb mn bny ʕmk kl dnštkḥ dktyb bsprʔ
00112:02	wsgyʔʔ ʔylyn ddmkyn bʕprʔ nttʕyrwn hlyn lḥy ʕlmʔ whlyn lʔbdnʔ wlḥsdʔ dḥbryhwn lʕlm
00112:03	wʕbdy ṭbtʔ wskwltnʔ nnhrwn ʔyk nwhrh drqyʕʔ wʔylyn dmzkyn lsgyʔʔ nhwwn mzhryn/wmnhryn#23#/ wqymyn ʔyk kwkbʔ lʕlm wlʕlm ʕlmyn
00112:04	wʔnt dyn dnyʔyl ḥtwm ptgmʔ hlyn wštwq wḥtwm sprʔ hnʔ ʕd ʕdn qṣʔ nbʕwn/dnbʕwn#3#/ sgyʔʔ wtsgʔ ydʕtʔ

02:68	mn ryšy ʔbhtʔ kd ʕlw lbytʔ dmryʔ dbʔwršlm ʔtrʕyw lbytʔ dmryʔ wqmw

02:70	whpkw kwmrʔ wlwyʔ wmn ʕmʔ wmn mšmšnʔ wmn trʕʔ wntnyʔ wʔylyn dyhybyn hww bqwryhwn wkwlh ʔysryl bqwryhwn
03:01	wmṭy yrḥʔ šbyʕyʔ wbny ʔysryl bqwryhwn wʔtknšw ʕmʔ ʔyk gbrʔ ḥd lʔwršlm
03:02	wqm yšwʕ br ywzdq wʔḥwhy kwmrʔ wzwrbbl br šltʔyl wʔḥwhy wbnw mdbḥʔ lʔlhʔ dʔysrʔyl lmsqw ʕlwhy ʕlwtʔ ʔyknʔ dktyb bnmwsʔ dmwšʔ nbyʔ dʔlhʔ
03:03	wʔttqn mdbḥʔ ʕl mtqnh mṭl ddḥltʔ {ddḥltʔ} rbtʔ hwt ʕlyhwn mn ʕmmʔ dʕmryn bmdyntʔ wʔsqw ʕlwhy ʕltʔ lmryʔ ʕltʔ lṣprʔ wlrmšʔ
03:04	wʕbdw ʕdʕdʔ dmṭlʔ ʔyk dktyb wʕlwtʔ ywm bywm bmnynʔ ʔyk nmwsʔ ḥwšbn ywm bywmh
03:05	wbtrkn ʕltʔ ʔmyntʔ lyrḥʔ wlkwl ʕdʕdwhy dmryʔ mqdšʔ wlkl mn dṣbʔ ṣbynʔ dmryʔ
03:06	mn ḥd byrḥʔ šbyʕyʔ šryw lmsqw ʕltʔ lmryʔ whyklʔ dmryʔ ʕdmʔ lhšʔ lʔ ʔtgmr
03:07	wyhbw kspʔ lpswlʔ wlngrʔ wlmʔklʔ wlmštyʔ wmšḥʔ lṣwryʔ wlṣydnyʔ lmytyw qysʔ dʔrzʔ mn lbnn lymʔ lywpʔ ʔyknʔ dktb kwrš mlkʔ dprs ʕlyhwn
03:08	bšntʔ dtrtyn kd ʕlw lbytʔ dmryʔ dbʔwršlm byrḥʔ dtryn šdr zwrbbl br šltʔyl wyšwʕ br ywzdq wšrkʔ dʔḥyhwn wkwmrʔ wlwyʔ wkl dʕlw mn šbytʔ lʔwršlm wʔqymw llwyʔ mn bny ʕsryn šnyn wlʕl lmhwʔ qywmʔ ʕl ʕbydtʔ dbytʔ dmryʔ
03:09	wqm yšwʕ wʔḥwhy wbnwhy wqdmyʔ wbnwhy wbny hwdyʔ ʔkḥdʔ dnhwwn ʕbdyn ʕbydtʔ dbyth dmryʔ bny hndr wbnyhwn wʔḥyhwn lwyʔ
03:10	wʔrmyw štʔstʔ dbnynʔ dhyklʔ dmryʔ wqmw khnʔ kd mlbšyn wʔḥdyn qrntʔ ddkrʔ wqryn bhyn wlwyʔ bny ʔsp bšypwrʔ lmšbḥw lmryʔ ʕl ʔydwhy ddwyd mlkʔ dʔysryl
03:11	wbrkw btwdytʔ wbtšbḥtʔ lmryʔ mṭl dṭb hw wlʕlm ṭybwth ʕl ʔysrʔyl wklh ʕmʔ ybbw bywbbʔ rbʔ btšbḥtʔ lmryʔ ʕl šwkllʔ dbyth dmryʔ
03:12	wsgy mn kwmrʔ wlwyʔ ryšy ʔbhtʔ qšyšʔ dḥzw lbytʔ hnʔ bʔyqrh qdmyʔ kd gmr bytʔ hnʔ bkw bqlʔ rmʔ wsgyʔyn dmrymyn hww qlhwn bqrntʔ wbḥdwtʔ
03:13	wlyt ʕmʔ dšmʕyn qlʔ dqrntʔ mṭl qlʔ dbkyʔ rbʔ dʕmʔ mṭl dʕmʔ qryn hww bqrntʔ bqlʔ rmʔ wqlʔ dbkyʔ mštmʕ hwʔ lrwḥqʔ
04:01	wšmʕw snʔy yhwdʔ wbnymyn dbny šbytʔ bnyn hyklʔ lmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl
04:02	wqrbw lwt zwrbbl wlwt ryšy ʔbhtʔ wʔmryn lhwn nbnʔ ʔp ḥnn ʕmkwn mṭl dʔkwtkwn nbnʔ lʔlhkwn wlh hw dbḥyn ḥnn hrkʔ mn ywmth dsrḥdwm mlkʔ dʔtwr dʔsqn lhrkʔ
04:03	wʔmrw lhwn zwrbbl wyšwʕ wšrkʔ dryšy ʔbhtʔ dʔysryl dlʔ lkwn wln lmbnʔ bytʔ lʔlhn mṭl dḥnn ʔkḥd nbnʔ bytʔ lmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʔyknʔ dpqdn kwrš mlkʔ prsyʔ
04:04	whww ʕmmʔ dʔrʕʔ mrpyn ʔydyhwn dʕmʔ dyhwd wmblhyn lhwn dlʔ nbnwn
04:05	wʔgryn ʕlyhwn mlwkʔ dnbṭlwn mlkyhwn kwl ywmy kwrš mlkʔ prsyʔ ʕd mlkwt drywš mlkʔ dprs
04:06	wbmlkwt ʔḥšyrš mlkʔ bryš mlkwth ktb ḥṭynʔ ʕl ʕmwryh dyhwd wdʔwršlm
04:07	bywmy ʔrṭḥššt ktb šʔl bšlm mhrdt wṭbʔyl wšrkʔ dʔkwth ʕl ʔrṭḥššt mlkʔ dprs wktbʔ dʔgrtʔ ktyb ʔrmʔyt wmttrgm ʔrmʔyt
04:08	ʔrḥwm bʕl ṭgmʔ wšmšy sprʔ ktb ʔgrtʔ hdʔ ʕl ʔwršlm lʔrṭḥššt mlkʔ ʔyk nmwsʔ
04:09	hydyn ʔrḥwm bʕl ṭgmʔ wšmšy sprʔ wšrkʔ dʔkwthwn dynʔ wʔspryʔ ṭrplyʔ wʔprsyʔ ʔrkyʔ bblyʔ šwšnkyʔ dhyʔ ʕlymyʔ
04:10	wšrkʔ dʔmwtʔ dšbʔ ʔspyrn rbʔ wyqyrʔ wʔwtb ʔnwn bqwryʔ dšmryʔ wšrkʔ dʕbr nhrʔ ʔyk ʕnt
04:11	whnʔ pršgnʔ dʔgrtʔ dšdrw ʕlwhy ʕl ʔrṭḥššt mlkʔ ʕbdyk ʔnšy ʕbr nhrʔ wknʕt/wʔkʕnt#4#/wʔknʕt#5#/
04:12	ydyʕ nhwʔ lmlkʔ dyhwdyʔ dslqw mn lwtk ʕlyn ʔtw lʔwršlm qrytʔ mrwdtʔ wbyštʔ bnyn wšwryh škllw wštʔsyh šrrw
04:13	hknʔ nhwʔ ydʕ mlkʔ dʔn hw dqrytʔ hy ttbnʔ wšwryh nštkllwn mntʔ lyt lk wprws lʔ yhbyn lk ʔp hy mlkyn tzyʕ
04:14	wmkyl dmn mlḥʔ dhyklʔ mlḥn ṣʕrʔ dmlkʔ lʔ wlʔ ln lmḥzʔ mṭl hnʔ šdrn wʔwdʕn
04:15	dtqrʔ ktb ʕwhdnʔ dʔbhyk wtškḥ bspr ʕwhdnʔ wtdʕ dmdyntʔ hdʔ mdyntʔ hy mrwdtʔ wmhrt mlkʔ wmdyntʔ wtktwšʔ rwrbʔ ʕbydyn bgwh mn ywmt ʕlmʔ mṭl hnʔ mdyntʔ hy dḥrbt
04:16	mwdʕynn lmlkʔ dʔn hy mdyntʔ ttbnʔ wšwryh nttrymwn mṭl hnʔ šwlṭnʔ bʕbr nhrʔ lyt lk
04:17	wmlkʔ šlḥ ptgmʔ lwt ʔrḥwm bʕl ṭgmʔ wlwt šmšy sprʔ wlwt šrkʔ dʔkwthwn dytbyn bšmryn wšrkʔ dytbyn bʕbr nhrʔ šlm \wknʕt /wkd mnʕt#45#/
04:18	ʔgrtʔ dšdrtwn lwty šryrʔyt qrw qdmy
04:19	wmn qdmy ʔttsym dyṭgmʔ wqrw wʔškḥw dhy mdyntʔ mn ywmt ʕlmʔ ʕl mlkʔ mttrymʔ wmrdʔ wtktwšʔ rbʔ ʔtʕbd bgwh
04:20	wmlkʔ ʕšynʔ hww ʕl ʔwršlm wšlyṭyn bkl ʕbr nhrʔ wlmlkʔ qdmyʔ bmdm lʔ ḥšbw ʔnwn
04:21	mkyl symw nmwsʔ lmbṭlw lgbrʔ hnwn wqrytʔ hy lʔ ttbnʔ ʕdmʔ dmn qdmy nhwʔ pwqdnʔ
04:22	whwytwn zhyryn ʕl ʕbydtʔ hdʔ dlmʔ dyn tsgʔ hrtʔ lmhrw lmlkʔ
04:23	hydyn kd ʔtʔ pršgnʔ dʔgrtʔ dʔrṭḥššt mlkʔ qrʔwhy qdm ʔrḥwm bʕl ṭgmʔ wšmšy sprʔ wqdm ʔylyn dʔkwthwn hydyn ʔtw bbhlʔ ʕl yhwdyʔ lʔwršlm wbṭlw ʔnwn bḥylʔ ʕšynʔ
04:24	hydyn bṭlt ʕbydtʔ mn bytʔ dʔlhʔ dbʔwršlm whwt bṭlʔ ʕdmʔ lšnt trtyn \{lšnt drywš} /lmlkwth ddrywš#4#/ mlkʔ prsyʔ
05:01	wʔtnby ḥgy nbyʔ wzkryʔ br ʕdw nbyʔ ʕl yhwdyʔ dʔyt bʔwršlm wbyhwd bšmʔ dʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʕlyhwn
05:02	hydyn qm zwrbbl br šltʔyl wyšwʕ br ywzdq wšryw lmbnʔ bytʔ dʔlhʔ bʔwršlm wʕmhwn nbyʔ dʔlhʔ mʕdryn lhwn
05:03	bh dyn bzbnʔ ʔtʔ ʕlyhwn ttny šlyṭʔ dʕbr nhrʔ wʔštnbwzn wdʔkwthwn whknʔ ʔmryn lhwn lšrkʔ mnw pqd lkwn bytʔ hnʔ lmbnʔ wšwrʔ hnʔ lmrmw
05:04	hydyn ʔyk nmwsʔ ʔmrw lhwn mn ʔnwn šmhʔ dgbrʔ hlyn dhnʔ bnynʔ bnyn
05:05	wʕynʔ dʔlhʔ hwt ʕl šbytʔ dyhwdʔ wlʔ bṭlw ʕdmʔ dptgmʔ ldrywš nʔzl whydyn ntybwn ptgmʔ ʕl hdʔ
05:06	pršgnʔ dʔgrtʔ dšdr ttny šlyṭʔ dbʕbr nhrʔ wʔštnbzwn wḥbrwhy dbʕbr nhrʔ ʕl drywš mlkʔ
05:07	ptgmʔ šdrw lwth whknʔ ktyb bh ldrywš mlkʔ šlm
05:08	nhwʔ dyn ydʕ mlkʔ dʔzln lyhwd mdyntʔ dʔlhʔ rbʔ why mtbnyʔ bkʔpʔ rwrbtʔ wʕrqʔ swgʔʔ qṭyrn bʔsyh wʕbydtʔ rwrbtʔ mtʕbdn tmn wʕbdʔ rbʔ slq wʔzl lryš bʔydyhwn
05:09	hydyn šʔln ʔnwn lqšyšʔ hnwn whknʔ ʔmrn lhwn mnw pqd lkwn bytʔ hnʔ lmbnʔ wšwrʔ hnʔ lmrmw
05:10	wʔp šmhyhwn šʔln ʔnwn dnwdʕk dnktwb šmhʔ dgbrʔ dbršhwn
05:11	whknʔ ʔtybwn ptgmʔ wʔmryn ln ḥnn ʔnwn ʕbdwhy dʔlh šmyʔ wʔrʕʔ wbnynʔ dbytʔ hnʔ dbnynn bnʔ hwʔ mn qdm šnyʔ sgyʔtʔ dmlkʔ/wmlkʔ#4#/ dʔysryl wrwrbnyhwn škllwhy
05:12	ʔlʔ mṭl dʔrgzw ʔbhyn lʔlh šmyʔ yhb ʔnwn bʔydʔ dnbwkdnṣr mlkʔ kldyʔ wbytʔ hnʔ strh wʕmʔ šbʔ lbbl
05:13	brm bšnt ḥdʔ {ldrywš}/lkwrš#4#/ mlkʔ dprs kwrš mlkʔ sm nmwsʔ dbyt ʔlhʔ hnʔ lmbnʔ
05:14	wʔp mʔnʔ ddhbʔ wdsʔmʔ dbyt ʔlhʔ dʔpq hwʔ nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ mn hyklʔ dbʔwršlm wʔwbl ʔnwn lbbl lhyklh ʔpq ʔnwn kwrš mlkʔ mn hyklʔ dbbl wyhb ʔnwn lššmṣr šmh mṭl dšlyṭʔ ʕbdh
05:15	wʔmr lh dhlyn mʔnʔ šqwl zl ʔwbl sym ʔnwn bhyklʔ dbʔwršlm whw hw bytʔ bʔtrh ntbnʔ
05:16	hw dyn ššmṣr ʔtʔ wʔrmy štʔstʔ dbytʔ dbʔwršlm wmn hydyn wʕdmʔ lhšʔ mtbnʔ wlʔ gmr
05:17	mkyl ʔn špyr qdm mlkʔ nbṣʔ bktbʔ dʔyt byt gzʔ dmlkʔ dbbl ʔn ʔytwhy wmn kwrš mlkʔ pqyd dntbnʔ bytʔ hnʔ dʔlhʔ dbʔwršlm wṣbynʔ dmlkʔ ʕl hdʔ nšdr lwtn
06:01	hydyn drywš mlkʔ pqd wqrʔ bktbʔ dʔyt byt gzʔ tmn bbbl
06:02	wʔškḥ bʔḥmtn mdyntʔ dʔyt bmdy mdyntʔ mgltʔ ḥdʔ whknʔ ktyb bgwh dkrkʔ
06:03	bšnt ḥdʔ lkwrš mlkʔ kwrš mlkʔ sm nmwsʔ wpqd dbytʔ dʔlhʔ dʔyt bʔwršlm ntbnʔ ʔtrʔ ddbḥʔ dbḥyn bh wštʔswhy rmn rwmh ʔmyn štyn wptyh ʔmyn ʕsryn
06:04	mrbbʔ dkʔpʔ tltʔ wtrʕʔ dqysʔ ḥdtʔ wnpqtʔ mn byt mlkʔ mtyhbʔ
06:05	wʔp mʔnʔ dbyt ʔlhʔ ddhbʔ wdsʔmʔ dʔpq nbwkdnṣr mn hyklʔ dbʔwršlm wʔwbl ʔnwn lbbl ʔtyhbw wʔtw ldwkthwn lhyklʔ dbʔwršlm lʔtrhwn wʔtḥmlw bbytʔ dʔlhʔ
06:06	mkyl ttny šlyṭʔ dbʕbr nhrʔ wʔštnbwzn wḥbrwhy šlyṭʔ dbʕbr nhrʔ rḥyqyn mn tmn
06:07	šbwqw lʕbydtʔ dbyt ʔlhʔ dnʕbdwnh yhwdyʔ wlšbytʔ dyhwdyʔ dbyt ʔlhʔ ntbnʔ ʕl ʔtrh
06:08	wmn qdmy sym nmwsʔ lmʔ dyn thrwn ʕm šbytʔ dyhwdyʔ hnwn lmbnʔ bytʔ dʔlhʔ hw wmn nksy mlkʔ wmdtʔ dbʕbr nhrʔ thwʔ npqtʔ npqʔ wmtyhbʔ lgbrʔ hlyn wʕbdʔ lʔ nhwwn mbṭlyn
06:09	wmdm dṣbyn hbw lhwn wmdm lʔ tḥsrwn lhwn bny twrʔ wdkrʔ wʔmrʔ lʕltʔ lʔlh šmyʔ ḥṭʔ wmlḥʔ wḥmrʔ wmšḥʔ ʔyknʔ dpqdyn kwmrʔ dbʔwršlm nhwwn mytyn lhwn kl ywm bywm wlʔ nhwwn ṭʕyn
06:10	whnwn nhwwn mqrbyn qwrbnʔ lʔlh šmyʔ wmṣlyn ʕl mlkʔ wbnwhy
06:11	wmn qdmy sym nmwsʔ dkl ʔnš dnšnʔ ptgmʔ hnʔ nštmṭ qysʔ mn byth wnʕbdwn lh zqypʔ wnzqpwnh ʕlwhy wbyth lbztʔ ntyhb mṭl hdʔ
06:12	wʔlhʔ dʔškḥn šmh tmn nʕbd/nʕmr#4#/ wkl mlkʔ wʕmʔ dnwšṭ ʔydh lmšnyw wlmḥblw bytʔ hnʔ dʔlhʔ dbʔwršlm ʔnʔ drywš smt nmwsʔ dbʕgl nʔbd
06:13	hydyn ttny šlyṭʔ dbʕbr nhrʔ wʔštnbwzn wḥbrwhy mdm dšlḥ ʔyk nmwsʔ bʕgl ʕbdw
06:14	wšbytʔ dyhwdyʔ ʕbdyn wmsqyn lryš bnbywth dḥgy nbyʔ wdzkryʔ br ʕdw wbnw wškllw mn nmwsʔ dʔlhʔ dʔysryl wmn nmwsʔ dkwrš wddrywš wmn nmwsʔ dʔrṭḥššt mlkʔ dprs
06:15	wgmr bytʔ hnʔ bywm tltʔ bʔyrḥ ʔdr hy hy šnt št lmlkwth ddrywš mlkʔ
06:16	wʕbdw bny ʔysrʔyl kwmrʔ wlwyʔ wšrkʔ dbny yhwdʔ ʕʔdʔ lbytʔ hnʔ dbyt ʔlhʔ hnʔ bḥdwtʔ
06:17	wqrbw lʕʔdʔ dbytʔ dʔlhʔ twrʔ mʔʔ wdkrʔ mʔtyn ʔmrʔ ʔrbʕmʔʔ ṣpryʔ dʕzʔ lmšbq ḥṭhʔ dʔysryl trʕsr bmnynʔ dšbṭʔ dʔysryl
06:18	wʔqymw lkwmrʔ btšmšthwn wllwyʔ btšmšthwn ʕl ʕbydtʔ dbytʔ dʔlhʔ dbʔršlm ʔyk dktyb bktbʔ dnmwsʔ dmwšʔ
06:19	wʕbdw bny šbytʔ psk ʔrbʕsrʔ byrḥʔ qdmyʔ
06:20	mṭwl dʔtdkyw kwmrʔ wlwyʔ ʔkḥdʔ wʔtdkyw kwlhwn wqṭlw ʔmrʔ bpṣḥʔ lkl bny šbytʔ wlʔḥyhwn kwmrʔ wʔp lhwn
06:21	wʔklw bny ʔysryl ʔylyn dslqw mn šbytʔ dbbl kl dprš mn ṭmʔwtʔ dʕmmʔ dʔrʕʔ lmṣlyw qdm mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl
06:22	ʕbdw ʕʔdʔ dpṭyrʔ šbʕʔ ywmyn bḥdwtʔ mṭwl dḥdy ʔnwn mryʔ wʔhpk lbʔ dmlkʔ dʔtwr lwthwn lmḥzqw ʔydyhwn bʕbdʔ dbytʔ dmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl
07:01	btr klhyn mlʔ hlyn bmlkwtʔ dʔrṭḥššt mlkʔ dprs {ʕzryʔ}/ʕzrʔ#4#/ br sryʔ br ʕzryʔ br ḥlqyʔ
07:02	br šlwm br ṣdwq br ʔḥyṭwb
07:03	br ʔmryʔ br ʕzryʔ br mrywt
07:04	br zrḥyʔ br ʕdy br bqy
07:05	br ʔbyšwʕ br pynḥs br ʔlyʕzr br ʔhrwn khnʔ
07:06	ršʔ hwʔ ʕzrʔ dslq mn bbl hw hwʔ sprʔ ḥkymʔ bnmwsʔ dmwšʔ dyhb lh mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl wyhb lh mlkʔ mwhbtʔ dʔyknʔ dṣbʔ nhlk bnmwsh dmryʔ
07:07	wslqw mn bny ʔysryl wmn kwmrʔ wlwyʔ hlyn mšmšnʔ wmn trʕʔ wntnyʔ mn ʔylyn dslqw lʔwršlm bšnt šbʕ lʔrṭḥššt mlkʔ
07:08	wʔtw lʔwršlm byrḥʔ dḥmšʔ hy hy šnt šbʕ lmlkʔ
07:09	mṭl dbyrḥʔ qdmyʔ šryw lmsq mn bbl wbḥd byrḥʔ dḥmšʔ ʔtw lʔwršlm ʔyk ʔydʔ dʔlhʔ dʔṭʔbt lhwn
07:10	mṭl dʕzrʔ ʔtqn lbh lmʕbd nmwsh dmryʔ wlmʕbd wlmlpw bʔysrʔyl nmwsʔ wdynʔ
07:11	whnʔ pršgnʔ dʔgrtʔ dyhb mlkʔ ʔrṭḥššt lʕzrʔ kwmrʔ sprʔ dptgmʔ wpwqdnwhy dmryʔ wnmwswhy ʕl klh ʔysryl
07:12	ʔrṭḥššt mlkʔ mlk mlkʔ lʕzrʔ kwmrʔ sprʔ spr nmwsʔ dʔlh šmyʔ šlm
07:13	ʔnʔ pqdt wsmt nmwsʔ dkl mn dṣbʔ bmlkwty mn ʕmʔ dʔysryl wmn kwmrʔ wmn lwyʔ dnʔzlwn ʕmk nʔzlwn
07:14	ʔnʔ pqdt wsmt nmwsʔ wšdrt mn qryby lmšʔlw ʕl yhwd wʕl ʔwršlm wʔp lmšʔlw ʕl nmwsʔ dʔlhk dbʔydyk
07:15	lmwblw kspʔ wdhbʔ dmlkʔ dʔnʔ mn ṣbwt rʕyny qrbt lbytʔ dmryʔ dbʔwršlm mšknʔ hw
07:16	dkwl kspʔ wdhbʔ dʔštkḥ bkl mdynt bbl ʕmk nʔzl wkwmrʔ wlwyʔ wʔylyn dṣbyn lmʔzl ʕmk nʔzlwn lbytʔ dʔlhʔ dbʔwršlm
07:17	wmkyl yṣypʔyt tzbn bkspʔ hnʔ twrʔ wdkrʔ wʔmrʔ qwrbnyhwn wnwqyhwn wtqrb ʔnwn ʕl mdbḥʔ dʔlhkwn dbʔwršlm
07:18	wmdm dšpyr lk wlʔḥyk bšrkʔ dkspʔ hnʔ lmʕbd ʔyk ṣbynh dʔlhkwn tʕbdwn
07:19	wmʔnʔ dmtyhbyn lk lpwlḥnʔ dbyth dʔlhk ʔšlm ʔlhʔ dbʔwršlm
07:20	wšrkʔ dmʔnʔ dmtbʕyn lk ltšmštʔ dbyt ʔlhk tsb wttl mn byt gzh dmlkʔ
07:21	ʔnʔ ʔrṭḥššt mlkʔ smt nmwsʔ lklhwn gzbrʔ dʔyt bʕbr nhrʔ dkwl mdm dnšʔlkwn ʕzrʔ kwmrʔ sprʔ spr nmwsʔ dʔlh šmyʔ ḥpyṭʔyt tʕbdwn
07:22	ʕdmʔ lkspʔ kkrʔ mʔʔ ʕdmʔ lḥṭʔ kwrʔ mʔʔ ʕdmʔ lḥmrʔ rbʕʔ mʔʔ ʕdmʔ lmšḥʔ rbʕʔ mʔʔ wmlḥʔ dlʔ ktb
07:23	wkl mdm bpṭqʔ ntyhb whbw lh ʔyk nmwsʔ dʔlhh nmwsʔ dʔlh šmyʔ nsb wnʕbd wlʔ nhwʔ rwgzʔ ʕl mlkwt mlkʔ wbnwhy
07:24	wlkwn mwdʕynn dlkl kwmrʔ wlwyʔ wqryy bqrntʔ wlplḥy byt ʔlhʔ lʔ šlyṭ lkwn lmʔmr lhwn mdm
07:25	wʔnt ʕzrʔ sprʔ ʔyk ḥkmtʔ dʔlhk yhb lk ʕbd rwrbnyn wdynyn dnhwwn dynyn lklh ʕmʔ bʕbr nhrʔ lkl ydʕy nmwsʔ dʔlhk mn dlʔ ydʕ twdʕywhy
07:26	wkwl dlʔ nhwʔ ʕbd nmwsʔ dʔlhk wnmwsh dmlkʔ ḥyṣʔyt/yṣypʔyt#4#/ nhwʔ mtʕbd mnh dynʔ ʔn lmwtʔ wʔn lḥyʔ wʔn lḥwsrnʔ dnksʔ wʔn lbyt ʔsyrʔ
07:27	bryk ʔnt mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbhyn dyhb mltʔ hdʔ blbʔ dmlkʔ lmšbḥw bytʔ dmryʔ dbʔwršlm
07:28	wʕly ʔrmy ḥsdʔ qdm mlkʔ wqdm kl rwrbny mlkʔ gnbrʔ wʔnʔ ʔtʕšnt ʔyknʔ dhwt ʕly ʔydh dmryʔ ʔlhy wgbyt mn ʔysrʔyl ʔnšʔ ršʔ dnsqwn ʕmy
08:01	whlyn šmhʔ dršʔ dʔbhyhwn dʔštrbw wslqw ʕmy bmlkwt ʔrṭḥššt mlkʔ mn bbl
08:02	mn bny pynḥs gršwm mn bny {trm}/tmr#4#/ dnyʔyl mn bny dwyd ḥṭwš
08:03	mn bny šknyʔ wmn bny prʕš zkryʔ wʕmh ʔštrbw dkrʔ mʔʔ wḥmšyn
08:04	mn bny šwlṭn mwʔb ʔlyʔ wḥnny br zrḥyʔ wʕmh mʔtyn dkrʔ
08:05	mn bny šknyʔ <gdw#4#> br yḥzyʔyl wʕmh tltmʔʔ dkrʔ
08:06	mn bny ʕzwn ʕbdw br ywntn wʕmh ḥmšyn dkrʔ
08:07	mn bny ʕylm ʔšʕyʔ br ntnyʔ wʕmh šbʕyn dkrʔ
08:08	mn bny šbṭyʔ zkryʔ br mykʔyl wʕmh tmnʔyn dkrʔ
08:09	mn bny ywʔb ʕwbdyʔ br nḥʔyl wʕmh mʔtyn wtmntʕsr dkrʔ
08:10	mn bny slmwt br ywspyʔ wʕmh mʔtyn wštyn dkrʔ
08:11	mn bny bby zkryʔ br bby wʕmh ʕsryn wtmnyʔ dkrʔ
08:12	mn bny ʕzgr ywḥnn br zkryʔ wʕmh mʔʔ wʕsrʔ dkrʔ
08:13	mn bny ʔrnqwm ʔḥdyʔ whlyn šmhyhwn ʔlyplṭ nʕʔyl šmʕyʔ wʕmhwn štyn dkrʔ
08:14	mn bny bgwy ʕwty wzkwr wʕmhwn štyn dkrʔ
08:15	wknšt ʔnwn lnhrʔ dʔtʔ lhwʔ wšryn tmn ywmtʔ tltʔ wʔstklt bʕmʔ wbkwmrʔ mn bny lwy wlʔ ʔškḥt tmn
08:16	wšlḥt llʕzr wlʔrnyʔ wlšmʕyʔ wlʔntn wlyrb wlʔlytn wlntn wlzkryʔ wlmšlwm ršʔ wlywndb wlʔlytn hlyn kwlhwn ršʔ
08:17	wpqdt ʔnwn lwt ʔdy ryšʔ dylhwn dbkspyʔ ʔtrʔ wsmt bpwmhwn ptgmʔ lmmllw ʕm hdy ʔḥwn dšryn hww bkspyʔ ʔtrʔ lmytyw ln mšmšnʔ lbytʔ dʔlhn
08:18	wʔytyw ln ʔyk ʔydʔ dʔlhʔ dʔṭʔbt ʕlyn lgbrʔ ḥd ḥkymʔ mn bny mḥly br lwy br ʔysrʔyl wšryʔ wʔḥwhy wbnwhy trʕsr
08:19	wḥšbyʔ wʕmh ʔšʕyʔ mn bny mrry wʔḥwhy wbnwhy ʕsryn
08:20	mn gbrʔ dyhb dwyd lpwlḥnʔ dlwyʔ dyhbyn mʔtyn wʕsryn klhwn ʔtqryw bšmhyhwn
08:21	wqryt wpqdt ʔnwn ʕl nhr hwʔ lmtʕnyw qdm ʔlhn wlmbʕʔ mnh ʔwrḥ tryṣʔ ln wlṭpln wlklh qnynn
08:22	mṭl dbhtt dʔšʔl mn mlkʔ ḥylʔ wpršʔ dnʕdrwnn mn bʕldbbyn bʔwrḥʔ mṭl dʔmrn hwyn lmlkʔ dʔydʔ dʔlhʔ hwyʔ ʕm kl dbʕyn lh lṭb wʕwšnh wḥmth ʕl kl mn dšbqyn lh
08:23	wnṣwm wnbʕʔ mn ʔlhʔ ʕl hdʔ wmštmʕ ln
08:24	wgbyt mn qšyšy kwmrʔ trʕsr wlšrbyʔ wlḥšbyʔ wʕmhwn mn ʔḥyhwn ʕsrʔ
08:25	wmnyt lhwn kspʔ wdhbʔ wmʔnʔ ršytʔ lbytʔ dʔlhn dyhb mlkʔ wḥʔrwhy wrwrbnwhy wklh ʔysryl dʔštkḥ tmn
08:26	wmnyt ʕlyhwn kspʔ kkrʔ mʔʔ wḥmšyn wmʔny kspʔ mʔʔ wdhbʔ mʔʔ kkryn

08:28	wʔmrt lhwn ʔntwn qdyšyn wmʔnʔ qdyšyn wkspʔ wdhbʔ qwrbnʔ lmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbhykwn
08:29	ʔzdhrw wṭrw ʕdmʔ dtšlmwnh qdm rby kwmrʔ wlwyʔ wryšy ʔbhʔ dʔysryl bʔwršlm bhyklʔ dbyt mryʔ
08:30	wqblw kwmrʔ wlwyʔ ʕlyhwn dnšlmwn bmtqlʔ kspʔ wdhbʔ wmʔnʔ lmʕlw lʔwršlm lbytʔ dʔlhn
08:31	wšqln mn nhr hwʔ btrʕsrʔ byrḥʔ qdmyʔ lmʔzl lʔwršlm wʔydʔ dʔlhʔ hwt ʕlyn wprqn mn ʔydʔ dbʕldbbyn wʔp mn dwqʔ dʔyt bʔwrḥʔ
08:32	wʔtyn lʔwršlm wytbn tmn ywmtʔ tltʔ
08:33	wbywmʔ dʔrbʕʔ tqln kspʔ wdhbʔ wmʔnʔ bbytʔ dʔlhn wʔšlmn ʔnwn lmrmwt br ʔwryʔ khnʔ wʕmh lʕzr br pylḥs wʕmhwn yhwzbr br yšwʕ wywdʕyʔ br bgwy lwyʔ
08:34	bmnynʔ bmtqlʔ lkl mdm wʔtktb klh mtqlʔ bzbnʔ hw
08:35	whlyn ʔylyn dʔtw mn šbyʔ mn bny glwtʔ wqrbw ʕlwtʔ lʔlhʔ dʔysryl twrʔ trʕsr ʕl kwlh ʔysrʔyl dkrʔ tšʕyn wštʔ ʔmrʔ šbʕyn wšbʕʔ ṣpryʔ lšwbqn ḥṭhʔ trʕsr hlyn kwlhyn ʕlwtʔ lmryʔ
08:36	wyhb dyṭgmʔ dmlkʔ lrwrbny mlkʔ wlšlyṭy ʕbrʔ dnhrʔ wmyqryn hww lʕmʔ wlbyth dʔlhʔ
09:01	wkd šlm klhyn hlyn qrbw lwty qšyšʔ wʔmryn lʔ ʔtprš ʕmʔ dʔysryl wkwmrʔ gyr wlwyʔ mn ʕmmʔ dmdyntʔ wṭmʔwthwn wknʕnyʔ wḥtyʔ wʕmwnyʔ wprzyʔ wybwsyʔ wmṣryʔ wmwʔbyʔ wʔmwryʔ
09:02	mṭl dnsbw mn bnthwn lhwn wlbnyhwn wʔtḥlṭ zrʕʔ qdyšʔ bʕmmʔ dmdyntʔ wʔydʔ dqšyšʔ wdlwyʔ hwt bʕwlʔ hnʔ qdmyt
09:03	hydyn kd šmʕt mltʔ hdʔ sdqt nḥty wklmydy wmlgt mn sʕrʔ dryšy wddqny wytb hwyt wtmyh
09:04	wʔtknšw lwty kl ʔylyn dbṭyl hwʔ lhwn ʕl mltʔ dʔlhʔ dʔysryl ʕl ʕwlʔ dʔʕlyw bny šbytʔ wʔnʔ ytb hwyt wtmyh ʕdmʔ ltšʕ šʕyn
09:05	wbʕdnʔ dtšʕ šʕyn qmt mn ʕqty wmn swdq nḥty wbrkt ʕl bwrky wprst ʔydy bṣlwtʔ qdm mryʔ ʔlhʔ
09:06	wʔmrt ʔlhy bhtynn lmrmw ʔpyn lwtk ʔlhn mṭwl dḥwbyn sgyw lʕl mn ryšn wḥṭhyn rwrbʔ slqw ʕdmʔ lšmyʔ
09:07	wmn ywmy ʔbhtn ḥnn ʔštkḥn bḥṭhʔ rwrbʔ ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ mṭl dʔsgyn lmḥṭʔ \{ʕdmʔ dywmnʔ mṭwl dʔsgyn lmḥṭʔ}/#4#/ ḥnn wʔbhyn wmlkyn wkwmryn mṭl hnʔ ʔštlmn lḥrbʔ wlšbyʔ wlbztʔ wlbhttʔ dʔpʔ bʔydʔ dmlkʔ dmdyntʔ wbʔydʔ dbʕldbbyn ʔyk dywmnʔ
09:08	wmkyl ʕd qlyl zʕwr nhwwn rḥmyn mn qdm mryʔ ʔlhn lmwtrw mnn šrknʔ wlmtl ln dwktʔ bʔtrʔ dqwdšh wlmnhrw ʕynyn ʔlhn wlmtl ḥyʔ qlyl bʕbdwtn
09:09	mṭwl dʕbdʔ ḥnn wbʕbdwtn lʔ ʔštbqn mn ʔlhn wyhbn ʔlhn lrḥmʔ qdm mlkʔ dprs wyhb ln pwrnsn dywmnʔ wnrmrm lbytʔ dʔlhn wnqym ḥrbth wntl ln sygʔ bʔyhwd wbʔwršlm
09:10	wmkyl mnʔ nʔmr btr hlyn klhyn mṭl dšbqn pwqdnyk
09:11	dpqdtn bʔydʔ dʕbdyk nbyʔ wʔmrt ln ʔrʕʔ dʕʔlyn ʔntwn lh lmʔrth ṭmʔʔ hy bṭmʔwtʔ dʕmmʔ wmdyntʔ bṭmʔwthwn dmlwʔh mn spʔ lspʔ wbʕbdyhwn snyʔ mlʔwh
09:12	wmkyl bntkwn lʔ ttlwn lbnyhwn wbnthwn lʔ tsbwn lbnykwn wlʔ ttrʕwn lšlmhwn wlṭbthwn ʕdmʔ lʕlm mṭwl dttʕšnwn wtʔklwn ṭbth dʔrʕʔ wtwrtwn lbnykwn wnʔrtwn ʕdmʔ lʕlm
09:13	wbtr hlyn klhyn dʔty ʕlyn bʕbdyn byšʔ wbḥṭhyn rwrbʔ mṭl dʔnt ʔlhn ʔtḥšbt lmšbq ln ḥṭhyn wttl ln šrknʔ bʕlmʔ
09:14	wḥnn ʔthpkn wʕbrn ʕl pwqdnyk wʔzln ʔtdbqn bhlyn ʕmmʔ ṭmʔʔ wʕbdn ʔyk ʕbdyhwn wʔnt rḥmtnʔ ʔnt lʔ trgz ʕlyn šbwq lḥwbyn mn qdmyk mṭl drḥmtnʔ ʔnt šbwq ln twtrʔ bʕlmʔ mṭwl dlyt ʔkwtk wlʔ nʔbd
09:15	mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl zdyq ʔnt mṭl dšbqt mnn šrknʔ ʔyk dywmnʔ hʔ ḥnn qymynn wmwdynn qdmyk ʕl ḥṭhyn mṭl dlyt lmʔmr qdmyk mlʔ ʕl hdʔ
10:01	wkd ṣly ʕzrʔ wkd ʔtydy rmʔ hwʔ wbkʔ qdm byth dmryʔ wʔtknšw lwth mn ʔysryl knšʔ rbʔ dṭb gbrʔ wnšʔ wṭlyʔ mṭl dbkyn hww ṭlyʔ bkyʔ rbʔ dṭb
10:02	wʕnʔ šknyʔ br nḥʔyl mn bny ʕylm wʔmr lʕzrʔ sprʔ ḥnn kdbn bmryʔ ʔlhn wʔwtbn nšʔ nwkrytʔ mn ʕmmʔ dʔrʕʔ mkyl ʔyt sbrʔ lʔysryl mṭl hdʔ
10:03	wmkyl nʔmr mwmtʔ qdm ʔlhn lmpqw kwl nšʔ nwkrytʔ wʔylyn dʔtyldw mnhyn wʔyk mlkʔ dmryʔ wʔylyn ddḥlyn mn nmwsʔ dʔlhn ʕbdw

10:06	wqm ʕzrʔ sprʔ mn qdm bytʔ dmryʔ wʔzl lʔksdrʔ dywḥnn br ʔlyšb wytb tmn lḥmʔ lʔ ʔkl wmyʔ lʔ ʔšty mṭl dkryʔ hwt lh ʕl ʕwlh dʕmʔ

10:09	wʔtknšw kl ʔnšy yhwdʔ wbnymyn lʔršlm ltltʔ ywmyn byrḥʔ dtšʕʔ bʕsrtʔ byrḥʔ wknšw klh ʕmʔ dmryʔ bšwq hyklʔ dmryʔ zyyʕyn wrtytyn ʕl mltʔ

10:11	mkyl hbw twdytʔ lmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbhykwn wʕbdw ṣbynh wʔtpršw mn ʕmmʔ dʔrʕʔ wmn nšʔ nwkrytʔ
10:12	wʕnw klh ʕmʔ wʔmryn lʕzrʔ bqlʔ rmʔ špyryn ptgmyk ʕlyn wmqbl klmdm dʔmr ʔnt ʕlyn lmʕbd bšryrtʔ
10:13	hšʔ dyn ʕmʔ sgy wʕdnʔ dmṭrʔ hw wlyt bn ḥylʔ lmqm bšwqʔ wʕbydtʔ lʔ hwt dḥd hy wlʔ dtryn mṭl dsgyʔyn ʔnwn ḥṭhyn bptgmʔ hnʔ
10:14	mkyl nqwmwn qšyšyn wklh ʕmʔ wkl dʔyt bqwryʔ dyln ʔylyn dʔwtbw nšʔ nwkrytʔ wnʔtwn lʕdnʔ dṣlwtʔ wʕmhwn qšyšʔ dqwryʔ wqwryʔ wdynyhyn ʕdmʔ dnhpkwn ḥmtʔ drwgzh dʔlhn mnn mṭl mwmtʔ hdʔ
10:15	brm ywntn br ʕmwʔyl wnḥzyʔ br tqwʔ wmšlm qmw ʕl hdʔ mltʔ wmty lwyʔ ʕdwrhwn
10:16	whknʔ ʕbdw bny šbytʔ wprš ʕzrʔ khnʔ ʕsrʔ gbrʔ ršʔ dʔbhtʔ lbyt ʔbhyhwn wkwlhwn bšmhʔ ʔtqrw wytbw bywm ḥd byrḥʔ dʕsrʔ lmtbʕh lh lptgmʔ
10:17	wgmrw kwlhwn gbrʔ dʔwtbw nšʔ nwkrytʔ ʕdmʔ lywm ḥd byrḥʔ qdmyʔ
10:18	wʔštkḥw mn bny kwmrʔ dʔwtbw nšʔ nwkrytʔ mn bnwhy dyšwʕ br ywzdq wʔḥwhy mʕsyʔ wʔlyʕzr wywndb wgdlyʔ
10:19	wʔtṭpysw wʔp hnwn dnpqwn nšyhwn wqrbw dkrʔ dʕnʔ ʕl ḥṭhyhwn
10:20	mn bny ʔmyr ḥnny wzkryʔ

10:37	mtnyʔ mtny ʕwty
10:38	wbny wbnwhy wšmʕy
