10:41	wʕdrʔyl wšmryʔ
10:42	wšlwm wʔmryʔ wywsp
10:43	mn bny nbw nbʔyl wmtytʔ wzkwr wzbynʔ wywʔyl wbnyʔ
10:44	kwlhwn hlyn nsbw nšʔ nwkrytʔ ʔyt dyn ʔnšʔ dʔwldw bnyʔ
01:01	whwʔ byrḥ knwn bšnt ʕsryn ʔnʔ qʔm hwyt bšwšn byrtʔ
01:02	wʔtʔ ḥnny ḥd mn ʔḥy hw wgbrʔ yhwdyʔ wšʔlt ʔnwn ʕl yhwdyʔ ʔylyn dytrw mn šbyʔ wʔp ʕl ʔwršlm mdyntʔ
01:03	wʔmryn ly hlyn ʔnšʔ dšʔlt ʔnwn hnwn ʔnšʔ ʔylyn dplṭw mn šbyʔ hʔ tmn ʔnwn bmdyntʔ bbyštʔ rbtʔ šryn wbḥsdʔ sgyʔʔ whʔ šwrh dʔwršlm tryʕ wtrʕyh yqydyn bnwrʔ
01:04	hydyn kd šmʕt mlʔ hlyn ytb hwyt wbkʔ wmtʔbl ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ whwyt ṣʔm wmṣlʔ qdm ʔlhʔ dšmyʔ
01:05	wʔmr hwyt bʕʔ ʔnʔ mn qdmyk mryʔ ʔlhʔ dšmyʔ ʔlhʔ gnbrʔ wrbʔ wdḥylʔ nṭr šrrʔ wṭybwtʔ lrḥmwhy wlnṭry pwqdnwhy
01:06	nhwyn mkyl ʕynyk ptyḥn wʔdnyk ṣytn lmšmʕ ṣlwtʔ dʔnʔ ʕbdk mṣlʔ qdmyk bʔymmʔ wbllyʔ ʕl bny ʔysryl ʕbdyk wʔnʔ mwdʔ ʔnʔ ʕl ḥṭhʔ dbny ʔysryl dḥṭw lk wʔnʔ wbyt ʔby ḥṭynn ḥnn qdmyk
01:07	wlʔ nṭrn pwqdnʔ wnmwsʔ dpqdt lmwšʔ ʕbdk
01:08	ʔtdkr ptgmʔ dpqdt lmwšʔ ʕbdk wʔmrt lh dʔntwn tkdbwn by wʔnʔ ʔbdrkwn byt ʕmmʔ
01:09	wtthpkwn lwty wtṭrwn nmwsy wtʕbdwn ʔnwn wʔn nhwwn mbdrykwn bswpy šmyʔ mn tmn ʔqrbkwn wʔytykwn lʔtrʔ dgbyt lmšryw šmy tmn
01:10	whnwn ʕbdyk wʕmk dprqt bḥylk rbʔ wbʔydk tqyptʔ
01:11	bbʕw mn qdmyk mryʔ thwʔ ʔdnk ṣytʔ lṣlwth dʕbdk wlṣlwtʔ dʔylyn dṣbyn lmdḥl lšmk wprwqyhy lʕbdk ywmnʔ whbyhy brḥmʔ qdm gbrʔ hnʔ wʔnʔ hwyt šqyʔ lmlkʔ
02:01	whydyn byrḥ nysn bšnt ʕsryn lʔrṭḥššt mlkʔ ḥmrʔ mšqʔ hwyt qdm mlkʔ wšqlt ḥmrʔ wyhbt lmlkʔ wlʔ hwyt byš qdmwhy
02:02	wʔmr ly mlkʔ mṭl mnʔ ʔpyk byšn wʔnt lʔ hwyt kryh lyt hnʔ ʔlʔ ʔn byšwt lbʔ wdḥlt sgy ṭb
02:03	wʔmrt lmlkʔ mlkʔ lʕlm ḥyy mṭl mnʔ lʔ nbʔšn ʔpy dmdyntʔ dbyt mlkwtʔ dʔbhy ḥrbʔ wtrʕyh mwqdyn bnwrʔ
02:04	wʔmr ly mlkʔ mṭl hdʔ bʕyt wṣlyt qdm ʔlhʔ dšmyʔ
02:05	wʔmrt lmlkʔ ʔn ʕl mlkʔ \špyr ʔnʔ ʔnʔ /ṭb wʔn špr ʔnʔ#4#/ ʕbdk qdmyk tšdrny lyhwd mdynth ddwyd lbyt qbwrʔ dʔbhy wʔbnyh
02:06	wʔmr ly mlkʔ šṭyʔ ʕd ʔmty ʔzl ʔnt wʔtʔ wšpr qdm mlkʔ wšdrny wyhb ly zbnʔ
02:07	wʔmrt lmlkʔ ʔn ʕl mlkʔ špyr nktbn ly ʔgrtʔ lwt šlyṭʔ dbʕbr nhrʔ dnʕdrwnny ʕdmʔ dʔzl lyhwd
02:08	wʔgrtʔ lwt ʔsp nṭr prdysʔ dmlkʔ dntl ly qysʔ lmʕbd trʕy bytʔ wdbtʔ wdšwrʔ dmdyntʔ wlbytʔ dʕʔl ʔnʔ lh wyhb ly mlkʔ ʔyk ʔydh dʔlhy dʔṭʔbt ly
02:09	wʔtyt lwt šlyṭʔ dbʕbr nhrʔ wyhbt lh ʔgrtʔ dmlkʔ wšdr ʕmy mlkʔ rby ḥylʔ wpršʔ
02:10	wšmʕ smblyṭ ḥwrnyʔ wṭwbyʔ gbrʔ ʕmwnyʔ wʔtʔbšt lhwn byšʔyt ʕl dʔtʔ brnšʔ lmbʕʔ ṭbtʔ ʕl bny ʔysryl
02:11	wʔtyt lʔwršlm whwyt tmn ywmtʔ tltʔ
02:12	wqmt bllyʔ ʔnʔ wgbrʔ hnwn dʔyt hww ʕmy wlʔ ḥwyt lʔnš mdm dʔrmy ʔlhy blby lmʕbd lʔwršlm wbʕyrʔ lyt hwʔ ʕmy ʔlʔ ʔn bʕyrʔ drkyb hwyt ʕlyh
02:13	wnpqt btrʕʔ dnḥlʔ bllyʔ lʔpy ʕyn tnyn wltrʕʔ dʔspwt whwyt skr bšwryh dʔwršlm dmtrʕyn hww wtrʕʔ yqydyn hww bnwrʔ
02:14	wʕbrt ʕl trʕʔ dnḥlʔ wlʔmʔ dmlkʔ wlyt hwʔ ʔtrʔ lbʕyrʔ lmʕbr tmn
02:15	whwyt slq bnḥlʔ bllyʔ whwyt skr bšwrʔ wʔtʔ wʕlt btrʕ nḥlʔ whpkt
02:16	wšlyṭʔ lʔ ydʕw lʔykʔ ʔzlt wmnʔ ʕbd ʔnʔ wlyhwdyʔ wlkhnʔ wlšlyṭnʔ wlsprʔ wlšrkʔ dʕbdy ʕbydtʔ ʕdmʔ lhšʔ lʔ ḥwyt
02:17	wʔmrt lhwn ʔntwn ḥzyn byštʔ dḥnn bhyn dhʔ ʔwršlm ḥrbʔ wtrʕyh yqydyn bnwrʔ tw nbnʔ šwrʔ dʔwršlm wlʔ nhwʔ mkyl ḥsdʔ
02:18	wglyt lhwn ʔydʔ dʔlhy dhwt ʕmy lṭb ʔp mly mlkʔ dʔtʔmr ly wʔmryn qymynn wbnyn wʕšnw ʔydyhwn lmʕbd dṭb
02:19	wšmʕ smblyṭ ḥwrnyʔ wṭwbyʔ gbrʔ ʕmwnyʔ wgšwm ʕrbyʔ wgḥkw ʕlyn wmyqw bn wʔmryn mnʔ hy mltʔ hdʔ dʕbdyn ʔntwn dlmʔ ʕl mlkʔ ʔntwn mrdyn
02:20	wʔtybt ʔnwn ptgmʔ wʔmrt lhwn ʔlhʔ dšmyʔ hw prqn wḥnn ʕbdyn wqymyn wbnyn wlkwn lyt lkwn zdqʔ wdwkrnʔ wmntʔ bʔwršlm
03:01	wqm ʔlyšb kwmrʔ rbʔ wʔḥwhy kwmrʔ wbnwhy ʕl trʕʔ dʕnʔ wʔqymw trʕwhy wqwdšwhy wʕdmʔ lmgdl mʔʔ hnwn qdšwhy ʕdmʔ lmgdlʔ dḥnnʔyl
03:02	wʕdmʔ ltḥwmʔ dʔnšʔ dʔyryḥw wʕdmʔ ltḥwmʔ dbny zbwr <bny#4#> ʔmry
03:03	wtrʕʔ dṣydʔ bnʔwhy bny snʔʔ whnwn ʔtqnwhy wʔqymw trʕwhy wswkrwhy wmwklwhy
03:04	wʕdmʔ ltḥwmʔ tqp mrmwt br ʔwryʔ br ʔqwṣ wʕdmʔ ltḥwmʔ tqp mšlm br knyʔ br mšyzkl wʕdmʔ ltḥwmʔ tqp zdwq br bʕnʔ
03:05	wʕdmʔ ltḥwmʔ tqpw tqwʕyʔ wšlyṭnyhwn wlʔ ʔʕlw ṣwrhwn bpwlḥnʔ dmryhwn
03:06	wtrʕʔ dtryn tqp ywydʕ br pṣḥ wmšlm br bsryʔ whnwn ʔtqnwhy wʔqymw trʕwhy wswkrwhy wmwklwhy
03:07	wʕdmʔ ltḥwmʔ tqp mlṭyʔ gbʕwnyʔ wndwn mrtyʔ ʔnšʔ dgbʕwn wdmṣpyʔ ʕbdw kwrsyʔ lšlyṭ ʕbr nhrʔ
03:08	wtḥwmʔ tqp ʕzʔyl br ḥdyʔ br ṣrpyʔ wtḥwmʔ tqp ḥnnyʔ br qdḥyʔ wšbqw ʔwršlm kd šwrh ʔrwyḥ
03:09	wtḥwmʔ tqp ʔrmyʔ br ḥwr šlyṭʔ dʔwršlm
03:10	wtḥwmʔ tqp ḥdyʔ br ḥdwmpy wrbʔ dbyth wtḥwmʔ tqp ḥṭwš br ḥšbnyʔ
03:11	wmšwḥtʔ dtrtyn tqp mlkyʔ br ḥrm wḥšwm br rbʔ dmwʔb wmgdlʔ dʔštḥr
03:12	wʕdmʔ ltḥwmʔ tqp šlwm br ḥlwš šlyṭʔ dʔwršlm hw wbnwhy
03:13	wtrʕʔ dpqʕtʔ tqp ḥnwn ʕmwrʔ dzywḥ hnwn bnʔwhy wʔqymw trʕwhy wswkrwhy <wmwklwhy#4#> wʔlp ʔmyn hwʔ bšwrʔ ʕdmʔ ltrʕʔ dʔspwt
03:14	wtrʕʔ dʔspwt tqp mlkyʔ br rkb šlyṭʔ dbyt krmʔ hnwn bnʔwhy wʔqymw trʕwhy wswkrwhy wmwklwhy
03:15	wtrʕʔ dʕynʔ tqp šlwm br ḥzʔ šlyṭʔ dmṣpyʔ hnwn bnʔwhy wṭllwhy wʔqymw trʕwhy wswkrwhy wmwklwhy wšwrʔ dpsqyn dmpqʔ myʔ lgnt mlkʔ wʕdmʔ lmsqtʔ dnḥtʔ mn qryth ddwyd
03:16	btrh tqp nḥmyʔ br ḥzbwq šlyṭʔ dbyt ṣwr ʕdmʔ lšbylʔ dqbrh ddwyd wʕdmʔ lpsqyn dʕbydʔ wʕdmʔ lbyt gnbrʔ
03:18	btrh ʕšnw ʔḥyhwn bwzy br ḥdr šlyṭʔ dqlyʕʔ
03:19	wʕšn ʕdmʔ ltḥwmʔ dʕzr br yšwʕ šlyṭʔ dmṣpyʔ mšwḥtʔ dtrtyn mn lwqbl msqtʔ dʔzlʔ lqmṣwʕ
03:20	wmn btrh ʔḥd wʕšn brwk br zky mšwḥtʔ dtrtyn ʕdmʔ lqmṣwʕ wʕdmʔ ltrʕʔ dbyt ʔlyšb khnʔ rbʔ
03:21	btrh ʕšn mrmwt br ʔwryʔ mn ʔqwṣ mšwḥtʔ dtrtyn mn trʕʔ dbyt ʔlyšb wʕdmʔ lswpʔ dbyt ʔlyšb
03:22	btrh ʕšnw khnʔ ʔnšʔ dpqʕtʔ
03:23	btrh ʔʕšn bnymyn wḥšwb rbʔ dbyth btrh ʔʕšn ʕzryʔ br mʕsyʔ br ʕnnyʔ bstr byth
03:24	btrh ʔʕšn bzwy br nḥdr mšwḥtʔ dtrtyn mn byt ʕzryʔ ʕdmʔ lmṣwʕ wʕdmʔ lpnytʔ
03:25	dplʔ br ʔzy mn lwqbl mqṣwʕ wʕdmʔ lmgdlʔ dpqʕtʔ dnpq mn byt mlkʔ ʕlyʔ wʕdmʔ ldrtʔ dbyt ʔsyrʔ btrh pryʔ br prʕš
03:26	wntnyʔ dhww ytbyn bpʕl ʕdmʔ ltrʕʔ dmyʔ lmdnḥʔ wmgdlʔ dmpqnʔ
03:27	btrh ʕšnw tqwʕyʔ mšwḥtʔ dtrtyn mn lwqbl mgdlʔ rbʔ dmpqnʔ wʕdmʔ lšwrʔ ʕšynʔ
03:28	mn mʕlnʔ dtrʕʔ drkšʔ ʔʕšnw khnʔ ʔnš lwqbl byth
03:29	btrh ʔʕšn ṣdwq br ʔmyr lwqbl byth btrh ʔʕšn šmʕyʔ br šknyʔ nṭr trʕʔ mdnḥyʔ
03:30	btrh ʔʕšn ḥnnyʔ br šlmyʔ wḥnwn br ṣlp štytyʔ mšwḥtʔ dtrtyn btrh ʔʕšn mšlwm br brkyʔ lwqbl byth btrh ʔʕšn bnwn br nḥdr mšwḥtʔ dtrtyn
03:31	btrh ʔʕšn mlkyʔ br ṣrpyʔ ʕdmʔ lbyt ntnyʔ wdklyʔ/wrklyʔ#4#/ lwqbl trʕʔ dmpqnʔ wʕdmʔ lmsqnʔ dpnytʔ
03:32	dbyt msqtʔ dpnyʔ ltrʕʔ dgdš/dʕnʔ/ ʕšnw \ṣrpyʔ wdklyʔ /ṣrpyʔ wrklyʔ#4#/
03:33	wkd šmʕ smblyṭ dbnynn šwrʔ kryt lh wsgy rwgzh wmyq ʕlyhwn ʕl yhwdyʔ
03:34	wʔmr lʔḥwhy wlḥylʔ dšmryʔ mnʔ ʕbdyn yhwdyʔ wmštbhryn šbwqw lhwn mdbḥyn wʔklyn bywmʔ dʔqymw kʔpʔ hlyn mn qqltʔ dʕprʔ wyqydn ʔnyn
03:35	wṭwbyʔ ʕmwnyʔ qʔm hwʔ lwth wʔmr kmʔ dhnwn bnyn ydʕ ʔnʔ dslq tʕlʔ wʕqr kʔpʔ dšwryhwn
03:36	šmʕ ʔlhn mṭl dhwyn gwḥkʔ wʔhpk ṣʕrhwn bršhwn whb ʔnwn lbztʔ bʔrʕʔ dšbythwn
03:37	lʔ tšbwq lḥwbyhwn wḥṭhyhwn mn qdmyk lʔ ntʕṭwn mṭl drgzw lwqbl bnynʔ dbnyn
03:38	wḥnn nbnywhy lšwrʔ wbnʔwhy wgmr šwrʔ ʕdmʔ lplgh hydyn ʔtptḥ pwmʔ dkwlh ʕmʔ lmʕbd
04:01	hydyn kd šmʕ smblyṭ wṭwbyʔ wʕrbyʔ wʕmwnyʔ wʔšdwdyʔ dʔtyhb zbnʔ lšwrʔ dʔwršlm lmtbnyw wšry twrʕtʔ lmstkrw kryt lhwn ṭb
04:02	wʔtḥšbw klhwn ʔkḥdʔ lmʔtʔ lmtktšw bʔwršlm wlmʕbd lhwn twqltʔ
04:03	wṣlyn qdm ʔlhʔ dnqym ʕlyn nṭwrʔ bʔymmʔ wbllyʔ mn qdmyhwn
04:04	wʔmryn yhwdyʔ bṣr lh ḥylʔ mn qwpyʔ wʕprʔ sgy ṭb wḥnn lʔ mškḥyn ḥnn lmbnʔ šwrʔ
04:05	wʔmryn snʔyn dlʔ ndʕwn wlʔ nḥzwn ʕdmʔ dnpl ʕlyhwn wnqṭl ʔnwn wnbṭl ʕbdhwn
04:06	wʔtw yhwdyʔ dytbyn lwthwn wʔmryn ln hʔ mkyl ʕsr zbnyn ʔtw lmtktšw ʕmkwn mn kwlhwn ʔtrwtʔ ʔylyn dšdyn hww bhwn
04:07	wʔtw wqmw mn bstr šwrʔ lmtktšw ʕmkwn bgʔryhwn wplgwhy lḥylʔ bḥylʔ lṭwhmʔ ʕm sypyhwn wrwmḥʔ wqšttʔ
04:08	wdḥlt wqmt wʔmrt lrwrbnʔ wlšlyṭnʔ wlšrkʔ dʕmʔ lʔ tdḥlwn mn qdmyhwn lmryʔ rbʔ wdḥylʔ ʔtdkrw wʔtktšw ʕl ʔpy ʔḥykwn wʕl ʔpy bnykwn wbntkwn
04:09	hydyn kd šmʕw bʕldbbyn dʔtydʕt ln mltʔ wbṭl mryʔ mwlknyhwn wʔthpkn kwln wslqn lšwrʔ wʕbdyn hwyn kln gbr bʕbdh
04:10	wplgʔ dʕlymʔ mn ywmʔ hw wlhl plghwn dʕmʔ ʕbdyn ʕbdʔ wplghwn ʔḥydyn rwmḥʔ wskrʔ wqšttʔ wšrynʔ wmšmšnʔ qymyn bstr yhwdyʔ
04:11	wbnyn šwrʔ wdšqylyn bqwpʔ šqylyn bḥdʔ ʔydh ʕbd ʕbdʔ wbḥdʔ šqyl zynʔ
04:12	wʔrdklʔ ʔḥyd gbr sypʔ wqʔm wbnʔ wdqrʔ bqrnʔ qʔm bstrh
04:13	wʔmrt lrwrbnʔ wlšlyṭnʔ wlšrkʔ dʕmʔ ʕbydtʔ sgyʔʔ wʔrwyḥʔ wḥnn pryšyn wqymynn ʕl šwrʔ wpryqyn ḥnn gbr mn ʔḥwhy
04:14	wbdwktʔ dyn dšmʕytwn qlʔ dqrnʔ ltmn ttqrbwn lwtn wʔlhn ntktš ʕl ʔpyn
04:15	wḥnn nhwʔ ʕbdyn bʕbdn wplgn nhwwn ʔḥydyn rwmḥʔ mn msqy šprʔ ʕdmʔ dnpqyn kwkbʔ
04:16	ʔp bh bzbnʔ hw ʔmrt lʕmʔ dgbrʔ wṭlyh nhwwn bytyn bgw šwqʔ dʔwršlm wnhwwn nṭryn lh bllyʔ wbʔymmʔ wnhwwn ʕbdyn ʕbdʔ
04:17	wʔnʔ wʔḥy wṭlyy wʔnšʔ nṭwrʔ dbtry lʔ šlḥynn nḥtyn yrḥʔ dywmtʔ ʔnš dmṭʔ lh
05:01	whydyn ʔyllw ʕmʔ wnšyhwn ylltʔ rbtʔ ʕl ʔḥyhwn yhwdyʔ
05:02	wʔyt dʔmryn bnyn wbntn wʔḥyn sgyʔyn nsb ʕbwrʔ wnʔkwl wnḥʔ
05:03	wʔyt dʔmryn ḥqltn wbtyn wkrmyn mzbnynn wnsbynn ʕbwrʔ bkpnʔ wḥyyn ḥnn
05:04	wʔyt dʔmryn nʔzp kspʔ mn mdʔtʔ dmlkʔ wnplwḥ ḥqltn wkrmyn wnḥʔ
05:05	wʔyt dʔmryn mkyl ʔyk bsrʔ dʔḥyn hknʔ ʔp bsrn wʔyk bnyhwn hknʔ ʔp bnyn hʔ mkyl kbšynn bnyn wbntn lʕbdyn wʔyt mn bntn dmtkbšn lʔmhtʔ wlʔ mrymyn qdm ʔlhʔ ʔydyhwn wḥqltn wkrmyn wnksyn mtyhbyn lʔḥrnʔ
05:06	wkryt ly ṭb kd šmʕt ʔyllthwn wmlʔ hlyn
05:07	wʔttbr lby bgwy wʔgrt rwḥy wmllt ʕm qšyšʔ wʕm rwrbnʔ
05:08	wʔmrt lhwn dḥnn qnyn ḥnn lʔḥyn yhwdyʔ dmzdbnyn lʕmmʔ hnwn wbnyhwn gbrʔ lʔḥwhy šqlyn ʔntwn mṭl hnʔ yhbt ʕlyhwn qlʔ wʔmrt lhwn ʔp ʔntwn tzbnwn lʔḥykwn wštqw wlʔ yhbw ly ptgm
05:09	wʔmrt lhwn lʔ špyr ptgmʔ dʔntwn ʕbdyn mkyl bdḥltʔ dʔlhn lʔ mhlkyn ʔntwn mṭl dʕbdyn ʔntwn ʔyk ʕbdʔ dʕmmʔ dbḥdryn
05:10	wʔp ʔnʔ wbny wʔḥy nsb kspʔ nzbn ʕbwrʔ wnšbwq lmsknʔ dʔyt bʕmn
05:11	wnpnʔ lhwn ḥqlthwn wkrmyhwn wzytyhwn wbtyhwn wkspʔ wʕbwrʔ wḥmrʔ wmšḥʔ nšbwq lšrkʔ dʕmʔ
05:12	wʔmryn ly hknʔ nʕbd ʔyk dʔnt ʔmr wqryt lkwmrʔ wʔmrt lhwn dhknʔ wlʔ lmʕbd wʔwmyt ʔnwn lmʕbd ʔyk ptgmʔ hnʔ
05:13	wʔp lṭlyʔ dqdqʔ wʔmryn dhknʔ nzyʕ ʔlhʔ lkl gbr dlʔ nqym ʕl mltʔ hdʔ mn byth wmn lʔwth hknʔ nhwʔ mzyʕ wryqn wʔmryn ʕmʔ klh ʔmyn wqmw ʕmʔ kwlh wšbḥw lmryʔ wʕbdw kwlh ʕmʔ ʔyk ptgmʔ hnʔ
05:14	ʔp mn ywmʔ dpqdny lmhwʔ šlyṭʔ bʔrʕʔ dyhwd mn šnt <ʕsryn wʕdmʔ lšnt#4#> tltyn wtrtyn lʔrṭḥššt mlkʔ šnyn trtʕsrʔ ʔnʔ wʔḥy hwyt lhwn ršʔ wlʔ ḥmrʔ dḥd mnhwn dbrt wʔplʔ ʔhrt lʔnš mnhwn
05:15	wšlyṭʔ dqdmy šʕbdwhy lʕmʔ wnsbw mnhwn ḥmrʔ wlḥmʔ wkspʔ sgyʔʔ lmdʔtʔ ʕdmʔ lslʕyn ʔrbʕyn ʔp ʕbdyhwn ʔšlṭw ʕl ʕmʔ wʔštlṭw ʕlyhwn wʔštndw bhwn wʔnʔ lʔ ʕbdt hknʔ mn qdm dḥlth dʔlhʔ
05:16	ʔp bʕbdʔ dšwrʔ hnʔ ṭb ʔtʕšnt wḥqltʔ lʔ zbnt wklhwn ṭlyʔ bny yhwdyʔ ʔtknšw wqmw tmn ʕl ʕbdʔ
05:17	wrwrbnʔ wšlyṭnʔ mʔʔ wḥmšyn gbryn wdʔtyn lwtn mn ʕmmʔ dḥdryn ʔtyn lwtn ʔnš bptwrh
05:18	wgbrʔ dʕbd hwʔ lḥmʔ mytʔ hwʔ lʕbdʔ dʕbdyn twrʔ ḥd wʕnʔ št šmyntʔ wṣpryʔ ʔtʕbdw ln wḥdʔ lʕsrʔ ywmyn ḥmrʔ sgy wʕm hdʔ lḥmʔ dšlyṭwtʔ lʔ bʕyt mṭl dʕšn ʕbdʔ ʕl ʕmʔ hnʔ
05:19	ʔtdkr ly ʔlhy lṭb klmdm dʕbdt ḥlp ʕmʔ hnʔ
06:01	hydyn kd ʔštmʕt mltʔ lsmblyṭ wlṭwbyʔ wlgšwm ʕrbyʔ wlšrkʔ dbʕldbbyn dbnynyhy lšwrʔ wlʔ bh twrʕtʔ wʕdmʔ lh lzbnʔ hw prwstdʔ dtrʕʔ ʕdkyl lʔ ʔqymyn
06:02	wšdrw lwty smblyṭ wgšwm wʔmryn ly tʔ nʔzl ʔkḥdʔ wnšrʔ ʔyk gysʔ bpqʕtʔ dʔynw whnwn mtrʕyn hww lmʕbd ly byštʔ
06:03	wšdrt lwthwn mlʔkʔ wʔmrt lhwn ʕbdʔ rbʔ ʕbd ʔnʔ wlʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ lmḥt dlmʔ nbṭl kd ʔrpʔ wʔḥwt lwtkwn
06:04	wšdrw lwty ʔyk ptgmʔ hnʔ ʔrbʕ zbnyn wʔtybt ʔnwn ʔyk ptgmʔ hnʔ
06:05	wšdrw lwty smblyṭ ʔyk ptgmʔ hnʔ bzbntʔ ḥmyšytʔ lʕlymh wʔgrtʔ bʔydh
06:06	wktyb bh bʕmmʔ ʔštmʕ wgšwm ʔmr ʔnt wyhwdyʔ mtrʕyn lmmrd mṭl hnʔ ʔnt bnʔ šwrʔ wʔnt hwʔ lhwn mlkʔ ʔyk ptgmʔ hlyn
06:07	ʔp nbyʔ ʔqymt lmtnbyw ʕlyk bʔwršlm wʔmryn dhʔ ʔmlk ʕzrʔ byhwd wmkyl ʔštmʕ lmlkʔ ʔyk mlʔ hlyn mkyl tw ntmlk ʔkḥdʔ
06:08	wšdrt lwth wʔmrt lh lʔ špyr dnhwyn ʔyk mlʔ hlyn dʔnt ʔmr mṭl dmn lbk ʔnt ʔmr lhyn
06:09	mṭl dkwlhwn mdḥlyn ln wʔmryn mtrpn ʔydyhwn mn ʕbydtʔ wʔmryn ln dlʔ tʕbdwn mkyl ʔʕšn ʔydy
06:10	wʔnʔ ʕlt lbyt šmʕyʔ br dlyʔ br mhṭbʔyl whw klʔ hwʔ wʔmr ly tʔ ntwʕd lbyth dmryʔ lgw hyklʔ wnʔḥwd trʕʔ dhyklʔ mṭl dʔtyn lmqṭlk wbllyʔ ʔtyn lmqṭlk
06:11	wʔmrt gbrʔ dʔkwty nʕrwq ḥs ly dʔʕrwq wʔʕwl lhyklʔ
06:12	ḥkm ʔnʔ dyn dlʔ hwʔ ʔlhʔ šdrh ʕly wʔplʔ byd nbyʔ ʔtʔmr ly dqṭl ly ṭwbyʔ wsmblyṭ wḥbrwhy ʔgrw wšdrwhy ʕly lmqṭlny
06:13	mṭl dʔgyrʔ hw mṭl dʔdḥl wʔʕbd hknʔ wʔḥṭʔ wʔhwʔ lhwn lšmʔ byšʔ mṭl dnḥsdwnny
06:14	ʔtdkr ʔlhy lṭwbyʔ wlsmblyṭ wlḥbrwhy ʔyk ʕbdyhwn hlyn snyʔ ʔp lywdʕyʔ nbyʔ ʔp lšrkʔ dnbyʔ dhww mdḥlyn ly mnhwn
06:15	wšlm šwrʔ bḥmšʔ wʕsryn bʔylwl lḥmšyn wtryn ywmyn
06:16	hydyn kd šmʕw klhwn bʕldbbyn dḥlw kwlhwn ʕmmʔ dḥdryn wzʕw ṭb mn qdmyn wydʕw dmn qdm ʔlhʔ ʔtʕbdt ʕbydtʔ hdʔ
06:17	ʔp bywmtʔ hnwn msgyn hww rwrbnʔ dyhwdyʔ ʔgrthwn wʔzlt hwy lwt ṭwbyʔ wʔgrth dṭwbyʔ ʔtyn hwy lwthwn
06:18	mṭl dsgyʔʔ hww byhwd ʔnšʔ dymw lh dlʔ nhrwnh mṭl dḥtnʔ hwʔ dšknyʔ br ʔrḥ wywḥnn brh nsb lbrt mšlwm br brkyʔ
06:19	ʔp mlwhy ṭbtʔ ʔmryn hww qdmy wmltʔ dʔmr hwyt ʔmryn hww lh wʔgrtʔ mšdr hwʔ hw ṭwbyʔ lmdḥlwtny
07:01	hydyn kd ʔtbny šwrʔ wqm trʕʔ wʔtqymw prwstdʔ wʔštkllw trʕʔ wmšmšnʔ wlwyʔ
07:02	pqdt lḥnny ʔḥy wlḥnnyʔ šlyṭʔ dbyrtʔ dʔwršlm mṭl dhw hwʔ gbrʔ tryṣʔ wdḥl mn ʔlhʔ wsṭʔ mn dbyš
07:03	wʔmrt lhwn lʔ ntptḥwn trʕʔ dʔwršlm ʕdmʔ dslq ywmʔ wʕd ywmʔ qym ntgypwn trʕʔ wnttḥdwn wnqwmwn bmṭrtʔ ʕmwryh dʔwršlm gbr bmṭrth wgbrʔ lwqbl byth
07:04	wmdyntʔ rbʔ wptyʔ wʕmʔ zʕwr hwʔ bgwh wlyt hwʔ lhwn btʔ dbnyn
07:05	wʔrmy ʔlhy blby wknšt lḥʔrʔ wlrwrbnʔ dʕmʔ lšrbthwn wʔškḥt sprʔ dšrbtʔ dslqw bh bqdmytʔ wʔškḥt dktyb bh
07:06	hlyn bny mdyntʔ dslqw mn šbyʔ dglwtʔ dgly nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl whpkw lʔwršlm wlyhwd gbrʔ lqryth
07:07	dslqw ʕm zwrbbl yšwʕ nḥmyʔ wʕzryʔ ʔrʕmyʔ nḥmyʔyl mwrdky blyšn msprwt bgwy nḥtwm bʕnʔ mnynʔ dʔnšʔ dʕmʔ dʔysryl
07:08	bny prʕš tryn ʔlpyn wmʔʔ wšbʕyn wtryn
07:09	bny špṭyʔ tltmʔʔ wšbʕyn wtryn

07:12	bny ʕylm ʔlp wmʔtyn wḥmšyn wʔrbʕʔ
07:13	bny ztyʔ tmnmʔʔ wḥmšyn wʔrbʕʔ
07:14	bny zky šbʕmʔʔ wštyn
07:15	bny bny štmʔʔ wʔrbʕyn wʔrbʕʔ

07:25	bny gbʕwn tšʕyn wḥmšʔ

07:28	ʔnšy byt ʕrmwt ʔrbʕyn wtryn

07:31	ʔnšy mkms mʔʔ wʕsryn wtryn

07:61	hlyn dslqw mn tlmlḥʔ ltlʕbʔ wlkwrb hlyn ʔmrw wlʔ ʔškḥw lmḥwyw šrbtʔ dʔbhyhwn wzrʕythwn ʔlʔ dmn ʔysrʔyl ʔnwn
07:62	bny bny bny dlyʔ bny ṭwbyʔ bny dqwrʔ štmʔʔ wʔrbʕyn wtryn
07:63	wmn kwmrʔ bny ḥnnyʔ bny hqwṣ bny brzly dnsb mn bnt brzly glʕdyʔ ʔnttʔ wʔtqry ʕl šmhwn
07:64	hlyn bʕw bktbʔ dšrbthwn wlʔ ʔškḥw wʕbrw lhwn mn kwmrwtʔ
07:65	wʔmrw lhwn qšyšʔ dkwmrʔ dlʔ nʔklwn mn qdwš qwdšʔ ʕdmʔ dnqwm khnʔ rbʔ wnšʔl wnḥzʔ
07:66	kwlh knwštʔ ʔkḥdʔ ʔrbʕ rbwn wtryn ʔlpyn wʔrbʕmʔʔ wšbʕyn
07:67	lbr mn ʕbdyhwn wʔmhthwn hlyn šbʕʔ ʔlpyn wtltmʔʔ wtltyn wtltʔ klhwn mšmšnʔ wmšmšnytʔ mʔtyn wʔrbʕyn wḥmšʔ
07:68	gmlʔ ʔrbʕmʔʔ wtltyn wḥmšʔ ḥmrʔ štʔ ʔlpyn wšbʕmʔʔ wʕsryn
07:69	wmn ryšʔ dʔbhtʔ dyhbw lʕbdʔ dbytʔ qšyšʔ dkwmrʔ yhbw lbyt gzʔ dhbʔ drykwnʔ ʔlpʔ ḥd pṭqʔ ḥmšyn kwtynytʔ lkwmrʔ ḥmšmʔʔ wtltyn
07:70	wmn ryšy ʔbhtʔ yhbw lgzʔ dʕbydtʔ dhbʔ drykwnʔ trtyn rbwn kspʔ mnyn tryn ʔlpyn wmʔtyn
07:71	wyhbw šrkʔ dʕmʔ dhbʔ drykwnʔ trtyn rbwn wkspʔ mnyn tryn ʔlpyn wkwtynytʔ lkwmrʔ ʔštyn wšbʕ
07:72	whpkw kwmrʔ wlwyʔ wtrʕʔ wmšmšnʔ wmn ʕmʔ wntnyʔ wkwlh ʔysrʔyl lqwryhwn wkd mṭʔ yrḥʔ šbyʕyʔ wbny ʔysryl bqwryhwn
08:01	wʔtknšw ʕmʔ klh ʔyk gbrʔ ḥd lšwqʔ dʔyt qdm trʕʔ dmyʔ wʔmryn lʕzrʔ sprʔ lmytyw sprʔ dnmwsʔ dmwšʔ dpqd mryʔ ʕl ʔysryl
08:02	wʔyty ʕzrʔ khnʔ sprʔ dnmwsʔ qdm ʕmʔ mn gbrʔ wʕdmʔ lnšʔ wkl mn dʔtṭyb lmšmʕ bḥd byrḥʔ šbyʕyʔ
08:03	wqrʔ sprʔ bšwqʔ dtrʕʔ dmyʔ mn ṣprʔ wʕdmʔ lplgh dywmʔ qdm gbrʔ wnšʔ wqdm ʔylyn dšmʕyn wʔdnyhwn dʕmʔ ṣlyn hwy wṣytyn lpwqdnʔ dnmwsʔ
08:04	wqm ʕzrʔ sprʔ ʕl mgdlʔ dqysʔ dʕbd dnhwʔ mmll ʕlwhy wqm mtytʔ lwth wšmwʕ wʕnnyʔ wʔwryʔ wḥlqyʔ wmʕsyʔ qmw mn ymynh wmn smlh qmw pryʔ wmšʔyl wmlkyʔ wḥšwm wḥšbyʔ wzkryʔ wmšlwm
08:05	wptḥ ʕzrʔ sprʔ ktbʔ dnmwsʔ lʕyn klh ʕmʔ mṭl drm hwʔ mn klh ʕmʔ wkd ptḥ qm klh ʕmʔ
08:06	wbrk ʕzrʔ lmryʔ ʔlhʔ rbʔ wʕnw klh ʕmʔ wʔmryn ʔmyn wʔmyn wkd ʔrymw ʔydyhwn qʕdw wsgdw qdm mryʔ ʕl ʔpyhwn ʕdmʔ lʔrʕʔ
08:07	wyšwʕ wbnwhy wsrbyʔ wymyn wʕqwp wšbty whwdyʔ wmʕsyʔ wqlṭyʔ wʕzryʔ wywzbr wḥnny wpnyʔ wlwyʔ dmšmšyn lʕmʔ bnmwsʔ wʕmʔ qymyn ʕl dwkthwn
08:08	wqrw bktbʔ dnmwsʔ dmryʔ kd prys wʔtṭpysw bh wʔstklw bqrynh
08:09	wʔmr nḥmyʔ ryšʔ dkwmrʔ wʕzrʔ kwmrʔ sprʔ wlwyʔ ʔylyn dmšmšyn hww lʕmʔ wʔmryn lkwlh ʕmʔ ywmnʔ qdyš hw qdm mryʔ ʔlhkwn lʔ tkrʔ lkwn wlʔ tbkwn mṭl dbkyn hww kwlh ʕmʔ kd šmʕyn hww ktbʔ dnmwsʔ
08:10	wʔmr lhwn zlw ʔkwlw wʔštw wšdrw mʔkwltʔ lmn dlʔ mṭyb lh mṭwl dqdyš hw ywmnʔ qdm mryʔ lʔ tkrʔ lkwn mṭl dywmʔ hw dḥdwtʔ dmryʔ whw nhwʔ ʕdwrkwn
08:11	wlwyʔ mštqyn lklh ʕmʔ wʔmryn štwqw mṭl dywmnʔ mqdš hw wlʔ tbkwn
08:12	wʔzlw kwlh ʕmʔ lmʔkl wlmštʔ wlmšdrw mʔkwltʔ wlmʕbd ḥdwtʔ rbtʔ wʔtṭpysw bmlʔ ʔylyn dʔwdʕw ʔnwn
08:13	wbywmʔ dtryn ʔtknšw ryšy ʔbhtʔ dkwlh ʕmʔ wkwmrʔ wlwyʔ lwt ʕzrʔ sprʔ lmtṭpsw mnh kl ktbʔ dnmwsʔ
08:14	ʔškḥw bktbʔ dnmwsʔ dpqd mryʔ lmwšʔ dntbwn bny ʔysrʔyl bmṭlʔ bʕʔdʔ byrḥʔ dtšry
08:15	wdnšmʕwn ʔqryw krwzʔ bklhyn qwryyhwn wbʔwršlm wʔmryn sqw lṭwrʔ ʔytw qysʔ dzytʔ wqysʔ dgwzʔ wṭrpʔ ddqlʔ wṭrpʔ dʔṭrwgʔ wswkʔ dʕrbʔ wʕbdw mṭllʔ ʔyknʔ dktyb bktbʔ dnmwsʔ dmwšʔ
08:16	wnpqw ʕmʔ wʔytyw wʕbdw lhwn mṭlʔ gbr ʕl ʔgrh wbdryhwn wbdrtʔ dbytʔ dmryʔ wbšwqʔ dtrʕʔ dmyʔ wbšwqʔ dtrʕʔ dʔprym
08:17	wʕbd klh ʕmʔ dhpk mn šbyʔ mṭlʔ wytbw bmṭlʔ mṭl dlʔ ʕbdw bny ʔysryl hknʔ mn ywmth dyšwʕ brnwn ʕdmʔ lh lywmʔ hnʔ whwt ḥdwtʔ rbtʔ dṭb
08:18	wqryn hww bktbʔ dnmwsh dmryʔ kwl ywm bywm mn ywmʔ qdmyʔ ʕdmʔ lywmʔ ʔḥryʔ wʕbdw ʕʔdʔ šbʕʔ ywmyn wbywmʔ dtmnyʔ ʔtknšw ʔyknʔ dktyb lhwn
09:01	wbywmʔ dʔrbʕʔ wʕsryn bh byrḥʔ hnʔ ʔtknšw bny ʔysryl bṣwmʔ wbsqʔ wʔrmyw qṭmʔ ʕlyhwn
09:02	wʔtprš zrʕʔ dʔysryl mn kwlhwn ʕmmʔ wqmw wʔwdyw ʕl ḥṭhyhwn wʕl ḥṭhʔ dʔbhyhwn
09:03	wqmw ʕl dwkthwn wqryn hww bktbʔ dnmwsʔ dmryʔ ʔlhhwn rwbʕh dywmʔ qryn wrwbʕh dywmʔ mwdyn wsgdyn qdm mryʔ ʔlhhwn
09:04	wqm ršʔ ʕl lwyʔ yšwʕ wbny qdmʔyl bny ḥšbyʔ wbny šrbyʔ wbny kbny wṣlyw qdm mryʔ ʔlhhwn bqlʔ rmʔ
09:05	wʔmryn lwyʔ yšwʕ wqdmʔyl bny ḥšbyʔ wšrbyʔ whwdyʔ wšknyʔ wptḥyʔ qmw wbrkw lmryʔ ʔlhhwn mn ʕlm wʕdmʔ lʕlm wbryk šmʔ dʔyqrh wmrmrm ʕl kwl brytʔ wtšbḥtʔ
09:06	ʔnt hw mryʔ blḥwdyk ʔnt ʕbdt šmyʔ wšmy šmyʔ wkl ḥylwthwn wʔrʕʔ wkwl mdm dʔyt ʕlyh wmyʔ wkl mdm dʔyt bhwn wʔnt hw dmḥʔ lklhwn wḥylwtʔ dšmyʔ lk hw sgdyn
09:07	ʔnt hw mryʔ ʔlhʔ dgbyt lʔbrm wʔpqtyhy mn ʔwr dkldyʔ wšḥlpt šmh ʔbrhm
09:08	wʔškḥt lbh dkʔ qdmyk wymyt lh mwmtʔ lmtl lh ʔrʕʔ dknʕnyʔ wdḥtyʔ wdʔmwryʔ wdprzyʔ wdḥwyʔ wdybwsyʔ wdgrgwsyʔ lmtl lzrʕh wʔšrt mlyk ʕmh mṭl dzdyq ʔnt
09:09	wḥzyt šwʕbdʔ dʔbhyn dbmṣryn wšmʕt yllthwn ʕl ymʔ dswp
09:10	wʕbdt ʔtwtʔ wtdmrtʔ bprʕwn wbklh ḥylh wbklh ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ mṭl dydʕt dʔʕlyw bhwn bʕmk wʕbdt lk šmʔ ʔyk dywmnʔ
09:11	wymʔ trʕt qdmyhwn wʕbrw bgw ymʔ bybšʔ wlrdwpyhwn ṭbʕt bʕwmqwhy dymʔ ʔyk dṭbʕʔ kʔpʔ bmyʔ ʕšynʔ
09:12	wbʕmwdʔ dʕnnʔ dbrt ʔnwn bʔymmʔ wbʔsṭwnʔ dnwrʔ bllyʔ lmnhrw lhwn ʔwrḥʔ lmhlkw bh
09:13	wʕl ṭwrʔ dsyny nḥtt wmllt ʕmhwn mn šmyʔ wyhbt lhwn dynʔ tryṣʔ wnmwsʔ dšrrʔ wqymʔ wpwqdnʔ dṭbyn
09:14	wšbtʔ dqwdšk ʔwdʕt ʔnwn wpwqdnʔ wqymʔ wnmwsʔ dpqdt ʔnwn bʔydʔ dmwšʔ ʕbdk
09:15	lḥmʔ mn šmyʔ yhbt lhwn lkpnhwn wmyʔ mn kʔpʔ yhbt lhwn lṣhyhwn wʔmrt lhwn lmʕl wlmʔrt ʔrʕʔ dʔtqnt ʔydk lmtl lhwn
09:16	hnwn dyn wʔbhyhwn ʔʕlyw wqšyw qdlhwn wlʔ šmʕw lpwqdnyk
09:17	wlʔ ṣbw lmšmʕ wlʔ ʔtdkrw tdmrtk dʕbdt lhwn whpk lbhwn lʕbdyhwn byšʔ wʔnt ʔlhʔ šbwqʔ wrḥmtnʔ wḥnnʔ rḥyq rwgzʔ wqryb bʕwtʔ lʔ šbqt ʔnwn
09:18	mṭl dhnwn ʕbdw ʕglʔ dnsktʔ wʔmryn hnw ʔlhk ʔysryl dʔsqk mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wʕbdw byštʔ rwrbtʔ
09:19	wʔnt brḥmyk sgyʔʔ lʔ šbqt ʔnwn bmdbrʔ wʕmwdʔ dʕnnʔ lʔ ʕbr mnhwn bʔymmʔ lmdbrw ʔnwn bʔwrḥʔ wʔsṭwnʔ dnwrʔ bllyʔ lmnhrw lhwn ʔwrḥʔ dnʔzlwn bh
09:20	wrwḥk ṭbtʔ yhbt lmlpw ʔnwn wmnnʔ lʔ klyt mn pwmhwn wmyʔ yhbt lhwn lṣhyhwn
09:21	wʔrbʕyn šnyn mdm lʔ ḥsrt lhwn bmdbrʔ nḥtyhwn lʔ blyw wmsnyhwn lʔ ʔtbzʕw

13:06	wbklhyn hlyn lʔ hwyt bʔwršlm mṭl dbšnt tltyn wtrtyn lʔrṭḥššt mlkʔ dbbl ʔtyt lwt mlkʔ wbḥrtʔ dywmtʔ ʔštʔlt mn mlkʔ

15:16	wʔmr dwyd lqšyšʔ dlwyʔ lmqmw lʔḥyhwn lʔylyn dmšmšyn/dḥyyn#3#/ wmšbḥyn bmʔny tšbḥtʔ byblʔ/bplgʔ#3#/ wbknrʔ wbṣṣlʔ dnhwwn mšmʕyn lmrmw qlhwn bḥdwtʔ
15:17	wʔqymw lwyʔ/llwyʔ#2#/ lhmn br ywʔyl wmn ʔḥwhy lʔsp brkyʔ wmn bny mrry ʔḥwhwn ʔtn br qyšhw
15:18	wʕmhwn ʔḥwhwn tnynʔ zkryʔ br nʕʔyl wywḥʔyl wʔlyb wbnyʔ wʔsʔ wmtytʔ wʔlyplhw wmqyhw wʕwbr ʔdwm wyʕwʔyl hlyn klhwn dqymyn ʕl trʕʔ
15:19	wmšbḥyn hmn wʔsp wʔtn hlyn klhwn mšbḥyn/dmšbḥyn#3#/ btšbḥtʔ dmʔny nḥšʔ lmšmšw
15:20	ʕzryʔ ʕzʔyl wywḥʔyl wʕny wʔlyb wmʕsyʔ wbnyʔ wdmšbḥyn btšbḥtʔ
15:21	mtytʔ wmqyhw wʕwbr ʔdwm wʕwzyl wʕwzyʔ hlyn mšmšyn/mšbḥyn#3#/ bknrʔ/qdm mryʔ#3#/ klywm bywm bšʕyn tlt wbšt wbtšʕ
15:22	wbnyʔ rbʔ dlwyʔ šql klywm bmṭlʔ/bmṭwlʔ#3#/ mṭl ddwktʔ mtqnʔ hwt lh
15:23	wbrkyʔ whlqnʔ sʕryn hww lqbwtʔ/lʔrwnʔ#3#/ mdm dmtbʕʔ lh
15:24	wšbnʔ wywšpṭ wntnyʔyl wʕmšy wzkryʔ wbnyʔ wʔlyʕzr hlyn khnʔ dqryn hww bqrntʔ qdm qbwth dmryʔ wʕwbr ʔdwm wʔḥyʔ sʕryn hww lqbwtʔ
15:25	whwʔ dwyd wqšyšʔ dʔysryl wrwrbnʔ dʔlp ʔzlyn lmsqw qbwtʔ ddytqʔ dmryʔ mn byth dʕwbr ʔdwm lqryth ddwyd bḥdwtʔ rbtʔ
15:26	whwʔ dkd ʕdr mryʔ llwyʔ dšqylyn qbwtʔ dʔyt bh dytqʔ dmryʔ dbḥw šbʕʔ twryn wšbʕʔ dkryn
15:27	wdwyd lbyš <hwʔ#3#> nḥtʔ dbwṣʔ wklhwn lwyʔ dšqylyn qbwtʔ/lqbwtʔ#3#/ lbyšyn ʔp hnwn nḥtʔ dbwṣʔ wlʕl mn nḥtwhy ddwyd dbwṣʔ lbyš hwʔ pdtʔ dbwṣʔ
15:28	wdwyd wklhwn dbyt ʔysryl msqyn lqbwtʔ dʔyt bh dytqʔ dmryʔ btšbḥtʔ wbqlʔ dqrntʔ pšyṭtʔ wkpyptʔ wmʕšnyn/wmšmʕyn#3#/ qlhwn ʕdmʔ lmrwmʔ
15:29	whwʔ dkd mṭyt qbwtʔ dʔyt bh dytqʔ dmryʔ wʕlt wmṭt/wqrbt#3#/ ldwkth lqryth ddwyd mlkl brt šʔwl ʔdyqt mn kwtʔ wḥzth lmlkʔ dwyd dḥdʔ/ḥdʔ#3#/ wmštʕʔ/dmštʕʔ#3#/ wʔšyṭt/wʔšṭyt#3#/ ʕlwhy blbh
16:01	wʔytywh lqbwth dmryʔ wsmwh bdwkth bgw mšknʔ dnqš lh dwyd wqrbw ʕlwtʔ wšlmʔ qdm qbwth dmryʔ
16:02	wkd šlm dwyd lmqrbw ʕlwtʔ wšlmʔ <qdm qbwth dmryʔ#3#> brk lʕmʔ dʔysryl bšmh dmryʔ ḥyltnʔ
16:03	wplg lklh ʕmʔ lklhwn dbyt ʔysryl mn gbrʔ wʕdmʔ lnšʔ wmn gdwdʔ wʕdmʔ lynqy tdyʔ/ḥlbʔ#3#/ lkl gbr wgbr gryṣtʔ dlḥmʔ ḥdʔ wmntʔ ḥdʔ wsnrqʔ/wnqsʔ#3#/ ḥd wʔzlw klh ʕmʔ ʔnš lbyth
16:04	wyhb qdm lwyʔ dmšmšyn \qdm mryʔ /lmryʔ#3#/ wmdkryn wmwdyn wmšbḥyn lmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysrʔyl
16:05	ʔsp ršhwn tnynʔ zkryʔ wywʕʔyl wywḥʔyl wmtytʔ wʔlyb wbnyʔ wʔsp wʕmyndb/wʕwbd ʔdwm#3#/ wʔsp wnḥzʔyl wʔsp
16:06	hlyn klhwn khnʔ dqryn bqrntʔ ʔmynʔyt qdm qbwth dmryʔ
16:07	hydyn ptḥ pwmh dwyd bywmʔ hw hw wryšy klhwn khnʔ wlwyʔ lmšbḥw lmryʔ ʕl ṭyrʔ dʔsp wdʔḥwhy whlyn ršʔ dtšbḥtʔ dʔmr dwyd qdm qbwth dmryʔ bywmʔ hw
16:08	ʔwdw lmryʔ wqrw šmh ʔwdʕw byt ʕmmʔ ʕbdwhy
16:09	\šbḥw lh /šbḥwhy#3#/ wʔwdw lh ʔštʕw klhyn gbrwth
16:10	ʔštbḥw bšmʔ dqwdšh nḥdʔ lbʔ dkwl dbʕyn lmryʔ

16:30	wtzwʕ mn qdmwhy klh ʔrʕʔ wttqn tbyl dlʔ tzwʕ

16:36	bryk hw mrʔ mrwtʔ dʔysryl mn ʕlmʔ wʕdmʔ lʕlmʔ wnʔmr klh ʕmʔ ʔmyn bpwmʔ bsymʔ wdkyʔ nšbḥwn lʔlhhwn

16:38	wʕwbr ʔdwm wʔḥwhy štyn wtmnyʔ wʕwbr ʔdwm zʕwrʔ brh dyrtwm wḥsw hlyn klhwn klhwn nṭry trʕʔ bryʔ
16:39	wḥṣrwn khnʔ wʔḥwhy khnʔ hlyn klhwn khnʔ dmšmšyn qdm mšknh dmryʔ bbwmsʔ/bbwsmʔ#3#/ rbʔ dʔyt bqwryt gbʕwn
16:40	lmqrbw ʕlwtʔ lmryʔ ʕl mdbḥʔ dʕltʔ ʔmynʔyt bṣprʔ wbrmšʔ wlmʕbd kl mʔ dktyb bnmwsʔ dmryʔ dyhb ʕl ʔydʔ dmwšʔ lmlpw lbny ʔysryl
16:41	whlyn šmhʔ dgbrʔ dqymyn btšbḥtʔ hmn wʔrytwn wšrkʔ dʔnšʔ zdyqʔ ʔylyn dʔtksyw šmhyhwn lmwdyw lmryʔ mṭwl dlʕlm ṭybwth
16:42	whnwn hlyn ʔnšʔ zdyqʔ mšbḥyn hww lʔ hwʔ bmʔny tšbḥtʔ wlʔ bplgʔ wlʔ brbyʕʔ wlʔ bqrntʔ kpyptʔ wʔp lʔ bpšyṭtʔ wʔp lʔ bṣṣlʔ mšbḥyn hww ʔlʔ bpwmʔ bsymʔ wbṣlwtʔ dkytʔ wmšmlytʔ/wbmšmlywtʔ#3#/ wbkʔnwtʔ wbtmymwtʔ lmryʔ ʔlhʔ ḥyltnʔ mrh dʔysryl mrʔ dklhwn/klhwn#3#/ ʕbdʔ
16:43	wšrʔ dwyd lʕmʔ wʔzlw <klh#3#> ʕmʔ ʔnš ʔnš lbyth whpk dwyd lbyth lmbrkw lbny/bny#3#/ byth
17:01	whwʔ dkd ytb dwyd bbyth wʔmr dwyd lntn nbyʔ ḥzy dʔnʔ ytb bbytʔ dmṭll bqrytʔ dʔrzʔ wqbwth dmryʔ šryʔ bgw mšknʔ dsʕrʔ
17:02	wʔmr ntn ldwyd kl mʔ dblbk zl wʕbd mṭl dmryʔ ʕmk
17:03	whwʔ bllyʔ hw wmlth dmryʔ hwt ʕl ntn nbyʔ wʔmr lh
17:04	zl whknʔ tʔmr lʕbdy dwyd hknʔ/dhknʔ#3#/ ʔmr mryʔ ʔnt lʔ tbnʔ ly bytʔ lmtb bh
17:05	mṭl dlʔ ytbt bbytʔ mn ywmʔ dʔsqt lʔysryl mn \ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn /mṣryn#3#/ wʕdmʔ lywmnʔ whwyt mšnʔ mn mšknʔ lmšknʔ
17:06	hʔ kmʔ dmhlk hwyt bklhwn bny ʔysryl dlmʔ mltʔ ʔmrt lḥd mn dynʔ dbny ʔysryl dpqdt lmdn lʕmy ʔysryl wʔmrt lhwn dlmnʔ lʔ bnytwn/bnyn ʔntwn#3#/ ly bytʔ dmṭll bʔrzʔ
17:07	ʔp hšʔ hknʔ tʔmr lʕbdy dwyd hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ḥyltnʔ ʔnʔ dbrtk mn dyrʔ mn bstr/btr#3#/ ʕnʔ lmhwʔ mlkʔ ʕl ʔysryl ʕmy
17:08	whwyt ʕmk bkl ʔtr dʔzlt wʔwbdt lklhwn bʕldbbyk mn qdmyk wʕbdt lk šmʔ rbʔ ʔyk šmʔ drwrbnʔ dʔyt bʔrʕʔ
17:09	wʔṣwb dwktʔ lʕmy ʔysryl wʔšrywhy wntb bdwkth wlʔ nzwʕ twb wlʔ nwspwn <twb#3#> bny ʕwlʔ lmglywth ʔyk dbqdmytʔ
17:10	mn ywmʔ dʕbdtk/dpqdtk#3#/ dynʔ ʕl ʕmy ʔysryl wʔnyḥt lk mn klhwn bʕldbbyk wḥwyk mryʔ dmlkwtʔ qymʔ hy lk ʕdmʔ lʕlm
17:11	wkd nšlmwn ywmy ḥyyk wtʔzl wttknš lwt ʔbhyk ʔqym zrʕk mn btrk dnpq mn ḥṣk wʔtqnyh lmlkwth
17:12	whw nbnʔ <ly#3#> bytʔ lšmy wʔtqn kwrsyʔ dmlkwth lʕlm
17:13	ʔnʔ ʔhwʔ lh lʔbʔ whw nhwʔ ly lbrʔ wṭybwty lʔ nʕbrn mn lwth ʔyk dʔʕbrt mn šʔwl dhwʔ mn qdmyk
17:14	wʔšlṭywhy bbyty wbmlkwty lʕlm ʕlmyn wkwrsyʔ dmlkwth nhwʔ mṭyb lh lʕlm
17:15	ʕl klhwn ptgmʔ hlyn wʕl klh ḥzwʔ hnʔ hknʔ mll ntn nbyʔ ʕm dwyd
17:16	wʔtʔ mlkʔ dwyd wytb qdm mryʔ wʔmr mnʔ ḥšyb ʔnʔ qdmyk mrʔ mrwtʔ wmnw byty dmṭytny ʕdmʔ lhrkʔ
17:17	wzʕwryʔ hy hdʔ bʕynyk mrʔ mrwtʔ dmllt ʕl byth dʕbdk mn lqwdmyn wklhwn bnynšʔ dʕbdyn dḥltk bklh lbhwn mpq ʔnt lhwn mn ḥšwkʔ lnhyrʔ mrʔ mrwtʔ
17:18	wmnʔ nštbhr twb dwyd ʕbdk lmmllw qdmyk lk glyn ʕbdwhy dʕbdk mrʔ mrwtʔ
17:19	mṭl dyrʕ ʔnt mnʔ ʔyt blbh dʕbdk ʕbdt lh klhyn rwrbtʔ hlyn lmwdʕw/lmwrbw#3#/ lʕbdk
17:20	mṭl hnʔ ydʕt/ydʕ ʔnt#3#/ mrʔ mrwtʔ mṭl dlyt ʔkwtk wlyt ʔlh/ʔlhʔ#3#/ ʔlʔ ʔn/#3#/ ʔnt ʔyk kl mʔ dšmʕn bʔdnyn
17:21	wmnw ʔyt <lk#3#> ʔyk ʕmk ʔysryl ʕmʔ ḥd bʔrʕʔ dʔtglyt mn šmyʔ wprqt ʔnwn wmṭlthwn ʕbdt nsywnʔ rwrbʔ wdḥylʔ wmḥwtʔ rwrbtʔ ʕl mṣryʔ ʕdmʔ lʔykʔ dʔpqt ʔnwn mn bynthwn
17:22	wʔtqnt lk lʕmk ʔysryl lmhwʔ lk ʕmʔ ʕdmʔ lʕlm ʕlmyn wʔnt mryʔ hwyt lhwn ʔlhʔ
17:23	mkyl mryʔ mltʔ dʔmrt ʕl ʕbdk wʕl bny byth qym lʕlm wʕbd ʔyknʔ dʔmrt
17:24	wnštrrwn ʕbdyk lʕlm wnštbḥ šmk <lʕlm#3#> bgw ʕlmʔ wnhwwn ʔmryn mryʔ ḥyltnʔ mrʔ mrwtʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl wbyth ddwyd ʕbdk nhwʔ mtqn qdmyk lʕlm
17:25	mṭl dʔnt ʔlhy glyt rʔzʔ lʕbdk wʔmrt lh dbytʔ bny ly mṭl hnʔ sdr ʕbdk blbh lmṣlyw qdmyk ṣlwtʔ hdʔ
17:26	mkyl mryʔ ʔnt hw ʔlhy wkl mlyk tryṣtʔ ʔylyn/ʔnyn#3#/ dmllt \lʕbdk ṭbtʔ /ʕmk ṭbtʔ#3#/ ʔnyn/hlyn#3#/
17:27	wmkyl ʔtgly lmbrkw lbyth/byth#3#/ dʕbdk dnhwʔ qdmyk lʕlm ʕlmyn mṭl dʔnt hw mryʔ mrʔ mrwtʔ mllt wmn bwrktk mtbrkyn btyhwn dzdyqʔ lʕlm
18:01	whwʔ mn btr hlyn wḥrb dwyd lplštyʔ wʔwbd ʔnwn wnsb dwyd ḥwṭʔ dmšwḥtʔ mn ʔydʔ dplštyʔ wnsb lgt wlkprwnyh hlyn dqdqʔ dḥdyryn hww lh mn plštyʔ
18:02	wḥrb lmwʔbyʔ whww mwʔbyʔ/ʔdwmyʔ#3#/ ʕbdʔ šqyly/šqly#3#/msqy#3#/ mdʔtʔ/qwrbnʔ#3#/
18:03	wqṭl/wḥrb#3#/ dwyd lhdrʕzr mlkʔ dnṣybyn kd ʔzl sm tḥwmʔ bnhrʔ prt
18:04	wʔḥd dwyd mnh ʔlp zwgyn wšbʕʔ ʔlpyn pršyn wʕqr dwyd lklhwn zwgʔ wšbq mnhwn mʔʔ zwgyn
18:05	wʔtw \ʔnšy ʔdwm /ʔnšʔ dʔdwm#3#/ wdrmswq lmʕdrw lhdrʕzr mlkʔ dnṣybyn wqṭl dwyd mn ʔdwm ʕsryn wtryn ʔlpyn gbryn
18:06	wʔqym dwyd šlyṭnʔ/šlyṭʔ#3#/ bdrmswq whww drmwsqyʔ/drmswqyʔ#2#/ ʕbdʔ ldwyd šqyly/šqly#3#/msqy#3#/ mrʔtʔ wprq mryʔ ldwyd bkl/lkl#3#/ dwkʔ/dwktʔ#3#/ dʔzl <hwʔ#3#>
18:07	wšql/wnsb#3#/ dwyd šlṭʔ ddhbʔ dhww tlyn ʕl rkšʔ dʕbdwhy dhdrʕzr
18:08	wmn ṭbḥ wmn brwty qwryʔ dhdrʕzr nsb dwyd nḥšʔ dsgy ṭb wmnh ʕbd dwyd ymʔ dnḥšʔ wʔsṭwnʔ dnḥšʔ wtwrʔ dnḥšʔ wmʔny nḥšʔ swgʔʔ dṭb
18:09	wšmʕ pwl mlkʔ dʔnṭywkyʔ dḥrb dwyd ḥylwtʔ dhdrʕzr mlkʔ dnṣybyn
18:10	wšdr lywrm brh lwt mlkʔ dwyd lmšʔl bšlmh wlmbrkwth ʕl dʔtktš ʕm hdrʕzr wqṭlh mṭl dgbrʔ hwʔ qrbtnʔ hw hdrʕzr wbʔydh dywrm hww mʔny kspʔ wmʔny dhbʔ wmʔny nḥšʔ
18:11	wʔp mnhwn qdš mlkʔ dwyd lmryʔ ʕm kspʔ wdhbʔ dnsb mn klhwn ʕmmʔ dkbš mn ʔdwmyʔ wmn bny ʕmwn wmn mwʔbyʔ wmn plštyʔ wmn ʕmlyqyʔ
18:12	wʔbyšy br ṣwryʔ ʔḥwhy dywʔb hw ḥrb lʔdwmyʔ bnḥlʔ/bḥqlʔ#3#/ dmlḥʔ tmntʕsr ʔlpyn gbryn
18:13	wʔqym dwyd ʕl ʔdwmyʔ šlyṭʔ/šlyṭnʔ#3#/ whww klhwn ʔdwmyʔ ʕbdʔ ldwyd wprq mryʔ ldwyd bkl/lkl#3#/ dwkʔ dʔzl hwʔ
18:14	wʔmlk dwyd ʕl klh ʔysryl whwʔ dwyd ʕbd dynʔ wzdyqwtʔ lklh ʕmʔ
18:15	wywʔb br ṣwryʔ šlyṭ <hwʔ#3#> ʕl klhwn ḥylwtʔ wyhwšpṭ br ʔḥylwd dmdkr/mdbrnʔ#3#/
18:16	wṣdwq br ʔḥyṭwb wʔḥymlk br ʔbytr khnʔ wšryʔ sprʔ
18:17	wbnyʔ br ywydʕ ʕl qštʔ wʕl qlʕʔ wbnwhy ddwyd rwrbyn hww
19:01	whwʔ mn btr hlyn wmyt nḥš mlkʔ dbny ʕmwn wʔmlk ḥnwn brh btrh
19:02	wʔmr dwyd mʕbd ʔʕbd ḥsdʔ/ṭybwtʔ#3#/ ʕm/ʕl#3#/ ḥnwn br nḥš ʔyknʔ dʕbd ʔbwhy ʕmy ḥsdʔ wšdr dwyd ʔyzgdʔ lmbyʔwth ʕl ʔbwhy wʔtw ʕbdwhy ddwyd lʔrʕʔ dbny ʕmwn lwt ḥnwn lmbyʔwth <ʕl ʔbwhy#3#>
19:03	wʔmryn rwrbnʔ dbny ʕmwn lḥnwn mrhwn myqrw myqr hwʔ dwyd lʔbwk bḥywhy mṭl dhʔ šdr lk mbyʔnʔ mṭl dlmgš mdyntʔ wlmdʕ mpqnʔ wmʕlnʔ šdr dwyd ʕbdwhy/lʕbdwhy#3#/ lwtn
19:04	wdbr ḥnwn lʕbdwhy ddwyd wgrʕ plgwt dqnyhwn wplgwt ršyhwn wqdd kwtynythwn ʕdmʔ lknwtšryhwn wšdr ʔnwn
19:05	wḥwyw ldwyd wšdr lʔwrʕhwn \dgbrʔ mṭl dbhytyn hww /mṭl dhww gbrʔ bhytyn#3#/ ṭb wʔmr lhwn mlkʔ tbw bʔyryḥw ʕdmʔ lʔykʔ dnʔʕwn dqnykwn wthpkwn
19:06	wḥzw bny ʕmwn dʔsklw bʕbdwhy ddwyd wšdr ḥnwn wbny ʕmwn lmʔgr lhwn bʔlp kkryn dkspʔ/kspʔ#3#/ mn ʔrm nhryn wmn ḥrn wmn nṣybyn wmn ʔdwm zwgʔ wpršʔ
19:07	wʔgrw lhwn tltyn wtryn ʔlpyn pršyn/zwgʔ wpršʔ dʔgrw#3#/ wlmlkʔ dḥrn wlmlkʔ dʔdwm wlmlkʔ dʔrm nhryn wlmlkʔ dnṣybyn wlḥylwthwn wʔtw wšrw qdm mdʔbʔ wbny ʕmwn ʔtknšw mn qwryhwn wʔtw lqrbʔ
19:08	wšmʕ dwyd wšdr lywʔb wlkl ḥylwtʔ dgnbrʔ
19:09	wnpqw bny ʕmwn wʕbdw qrbʔ qdm trʕʔ whlyn <tltʔ#3#> mlkʔ hnwn wḥylwthwn šryn hww blḥwdyhwn bḥqltʔ
19:10	wḥzʔ ywʔb dʕšn ʕlwhy qrbʔ mn qdmwhy/qwdmwhy#3#/ wmn bstrh wgbʔ lh mn klhwn gnbrʔ dʔysryl wʕbdw qrbʔ lwqbl ʔdwm
19:11	wšrkʔ dʕmʔ ʔšlm lʔbyšy ʔḥwhy wsdr lwqbl bny ʕmwn
19:12	wʔmr lh ʔnhw dntqp mny ʔdwm tʔtʔ tpṣyny wʔn bny ʕmwn ntqpwn mnk ʔtʔ wʔpṣyk mnhwn
19:13	tqp wʔttqp wntktš ʕl ʔpy ʕmn wʕl ʔpy qwryʔ dʔlhn wmryʔ nʕbd mdm dšpyr bʕynwhy
19:14	wqrb ywʔb wʕmʔ dʔyt ʕmh lmtktšw ʕm ʔdwmyʔ wʕrqw mn qdmwhy
19:15	wbny ʕmwn ḥzw dʕrqw ʔdwmyʔ wʕrqw ʔp hnwn mn qdm ʔbyšy ʔḥwhy wʔtw lqrytʔ whpk ywʔb lʔwršlm
19:16	wḥzw ʔdwmyʔ dʔttbrw qdm bny ʔysryl wšdrw ʔyzgdʔ wʔpqw lʔdwmyʔ dʔyt mn ʕbr nhrʔ wʔtw lḥylm wšwbk rb ḥylh dhdrʕzr qdmyhwn
19:17	wḥwyw ldwyd wknš lklh ʔysryl wʔtʔ ʕlyhwn wsdr dwyd lwqbl ʔdwmyʔ qrbʔ wʔtktšw ʕmhwn
19:18	wʕrqw ʔdwmyʔ mn qdm bny ʔysryl wḥrb dwyd bʔdwmyʔ šbʕʔ ʔlpyn zwgyn wʔrbʕʔ/wʔrbʕyn#3#/ ʔlpyn gbrʔ rglyʔ wšwbk rb ḥylh dhdrʕzr ʔtqṭl tmn
19:19	wḥzw ʕbdwhy dhdrʕzr dʔttbrw qdm bny ʔysryl wʔšlmw/wšlmw#3#/ ldwyd wplḥwhy wlʔ ṣbw ʔdwmyʔ lmʕdrw twb lbny ʕmwn
20:01	whwʔ lšntʔ ʔḥrtʔ lzbnʔ dmpqnʔ dmlkʔ wknš ywʔb ḥylwtʔ wʔtʔ wšrʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ dbny ʕmwn wʔḥd bh wšrʔ ʕl rbt mdynthwn rbtʔ wdwyd ytb hwʔ bʔwršlm wʔḥd ywʔb lrbt mdynthwn <dbny ʕmwn#3#> wʕqrh
20:02	wnsb dwyd tgʔ dmlkhwn mn ryšh wtqlh wʔškḥ bh \mtqlʔ dkkrʔ /mtql kkrʔ#3#/ ddhbʔ \wʔyt hww bh /wbh hww#3#/ ṭbʕʔ ṭbʔ wsmh dwyd bršh wšbytʔ dmdyntʔ ʔpq swgʔʔ/sgy#3#/ dṭb
20:03	wʕmʔ dʔyt hwʔ bh ʔpq ʔnwn wʔsr ʔnwn bššltʔ wbqwlrʔ/wbqlwdʔ#3#/ dprzlʔ wbqwplʔ wbṣmtʔ wʔmr ʔnwn lklhwn whknʔ ʕbd lklhwn bnynšʔ dʔštkḥw/dʔškḥ#3#/ bqwryʔ dbny ʕmwn wlʔ qṭl ʔnš mnhwn wʔzl wʔwtb ʔnwn bqwryʔ \dʔrʕʔ dʔysryl /dbny ʔysrʔyl#3#/ whpk dwyd wkl \dʕmh /ʕmʔ dʔyt ʕmh#3#/ lʔwršlm
20:04	wmn btr hlyn hwʔ twb qrbʔ bʕʔzʔ ʕm plštyʔ hydyn qṭl sbky dmn ḥšmt lswpy dmn bnyʔ dgdpʔ mḥsdnytʔ
20:05	dhwʔ ʔḥwhy dgwlyd gnbrʔ dmn gt wšnnʔ/wšwyʔ#3#/ dnyzkh ʕbʔ hwʔ ʔyk nwlʔ dgrdyyʔ
20:06	whwʔ twb qrbʔ gbt whwʔ tmn gbrʔ ḥd gnbrʔ dmšwḥtʔ wṣbʕtʔ/dṣbʕtʔ#3#/ dʔydwhy wdrglwhy <hwy#3#> št št ʕsryn wʔrbʕ bmnynʔ wʔp hw ʔtyld lmḥsdnwtʔ
20:07	wmḥsd hwʔ lʔysrʔyl wqṭlh ywntn br šmʔ ʔḥwhy ddwyd

21:01	wqm sṭnʔ lʔysrʔyl wsrhb ldwyd lmmnʔ lʔysryl
21:02	wʔmr dwyd lywʔb br ṣwryʔ wlrwrbnwhy dʔmʔ zlw wmnw lʕmʔ dʔysryl mn br šbʕ wʕdmʔ ldn wtw lwty wʔdʕ mnynh dʕmʔ
21:03	wʔmr ywʔb ldwyd mlkʔ nwsp mryʔ ʔlhk ʕl ʕmh ʔkwthwn wʔkwthwn mʔʔ zbnyn wʕynwhy dmry mlkʔ nḥzyn mṭl dklhwn ʕbdwhy ʔnwn wmrn mlkʔ lmnw ʔṣṭby bh bmltʔ hdʔ
21:04	wmlth dmlkʔ ʕšnt ʕl ywʔb wnpq ywʔb whlk bklh ʔysryl whpk ʔtʔ lʔwršlm
21:05	wyhb ywʔb mnynʔ wḥwšbnʔ dʕmʔ ldwyd whwʔ ḥwšbnʔ dbny ʔysryl ʔlp ʔlpyn wmʔʔ ʔlpyn \gbrʔ rglyʔ /rglyyn#3#/ šmṭy sypʔ wšbṭʔ dbyt yhwdʔ hww bmnynʔ ʔrbʕmʔʔ wšbʕyn ʔlpyn gbrʔ šmṭy/šlpy#3#/ sypʔ
21:06	wlwyʔ wkhnʔ wšbṭʔ dbyt bnymyn lʔ ʔtmny ʕmhwn mṭl dʔsly ywʔb mlth dmlkʔ wlʔ ṣbʔ ywʔb lmmnʔ ʔnwn
21:07	wʔtbʔš/wʔtʔbš#2#/ ptgmʔ bʕyny mryʔ ʕl dmnʔ dwyd lʔysryl
21:08	wʔmr dwyd lmryʔ ḥṭyt ṭb bmdm dʕbdt bptgmʔ/ptgmʔ#3#/ hnʔ wʔp hšʔ ʔʕbr ḥwbwhy dʕbdk mṭl dʔsklt ṭb
21:09	wqdm dwyd bṣprʔ wmlth dmryʔ hwt ʕl gd nbyʔ wʔmr lh
21:10	zl wʔmr ldwyd hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ tlt byšn mytʔ ʔnʔ ʕlyk gby lk ḥdʔ mnhyn wʔʕbd lk
21:11	wʔtʔ gd nbyʔ lwt dwyd wʔmr lh hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ qbl lk
21:12	ʔw tlt šnyn kpnʔ bʔrʕk ʔw tltʔ yrḥyn ttmsr/dttmsr#3#/ qdm bʕldbbk whw nhwʔ rdp lk whw nhwʔ šlyṭ bk ʔw tltʔ ywmyn ḥrbh dmryʔ bʔysryl wʔp hšʔ dʕ wḥzy mnʔ yhb ʔnt ptgmʔ \lwt mn /lmn#2#/ dšdrny lwtk
21:13	wʔmr dwyd lgd ʕqt ly ṭb nštlm/pqḥ ln dnštlm#3#/ bʔydwhy dmryʔ dsgyʔyn rḥmwhy ṭb wbʔydʔ dbnynšʔ lʔ nštlm
21:14	wyhb mryʔ mwtnʔ bʔysryl wnplw mn ʔysrʔyl šbʕyn ʔlpyn gbrʔ
21:15	wšdr mryʔ mlʔkʔ/lmlʔkʔ#2#/ lʔwršlm lmḥblwth wkd mḥbl lh ḥzyhy mryʔ wʔtbyʔ mn byštʔ wʔmr lmlʔkʔ dmḥbl sgy ḥblt mkyl qpws ʔydk wmlʔkh dmryʔ šrʔ hwʔ lwt ʔdrh dʔrn ybwsyʔ
21:16	wʔrym dwyd ʕynwhy wḥzʔ lmlʔkh/mlʔkh#3#/ dmryʔ qʔm byt šmyʔ lʔrʕʔ wsyph šmyṭ wʔḥyd bʔydh wqʔm lʕl mn ʔwršlm wnpl dwyd wqšyšʔ dʔyt hww ʔmh mksyn/dmksyn#3#/ hww sqʔ wnplw ʕl ʔpyhwn
21:17	wʔmr dwyd lmryʔ ʔnʔ hw dʔmrt dʔmnʔ lʕmʔ/ʕmʔ#3#/ wʔnʔ hw ḥṭyt wṭb rbʔ hy sklwtʔ dʔsklt hlyn dyn ʕnʔ tmymtʔ mnʔ ʕbdw mryʔ ʔlhy thwʔ lh ʔydk by wbbyt ʔby wmn ʕmʔ ntklʔ mwtnʔ
21:18	wmlʔkh dmryʔ ʔmr lgd nbyʔ sq ʔmr ldwyd slq bnʔ mdbḥʔ lmryʔ bʔdrh dʔrn ybwsyʔ
21:19	wslq dwyd ʔyk ptgmh dgd dʔmr bšmh dmryʔ
21:20	wḥzʔ dwyd lmlʔkʔ dmḥbl bʕmʔ dqps ʔydh wlʔ ḥbl twb
21:21	wʔtʔ dwyd lwt ʔrn wʔtpny ʔrn wḥzʔ \lmlkʔ dwyd /ldwyd#3#/ wsgd ldwyd ʕl ʔpwhy \ʕdmʔ lʔrʕʔ /ʕl ʔrʕʔ#3#/ wnpq ʔrn mn ʔdrh
21:22	wʔmr dwyd lʔrn hb ly dwktʔ dʔdrʔ hnʔ wʔbnʔ bh mdbḥʔ lmryʔ bkspʔ wbdmyʔ ṭbʔ hbyh ly wntklʔ mwtnʔ mn ʕmʔ
21:23	wʔmr ʔrn ldwyd sb lk mry mlkʔ wnʕbd mry mlkʔ mdm dšpyr bʕynwhy wʔnʔ yhb ʔnʔ twrʔ lʕltʔ wgrgrʔ lqysʔ wḥṭʔ lqwrbnʔ wkl mdm dmtbʕʔ ʔnʔ yhb <ʔnʔ#3#>
21:24	wʔmr mlkʔ dwyd lʔrn ḥs ly mzbn zbn ʔnʔ mnk bkspʔ wbdmyʔ ʔyk dšwʔ mṭl dlʔ nsb ʔnʔ dylk wmsq ʔnʔ lmryʔ ʕltʔ dmgn
21:25	wzbn dwyd mn ʔrn dwktʔ hy dʔdrʔ bḥmšyn ʔstryn
21:26	wbnʔ dwyd tmn mdbḥʔ lmryʔ wqrb ʕlwtʔ wšlmʔ ʔmrʔ wṣly qdm mryʔ wʕnyhw wnḥtt nwrʔ mn šmyʔ wʔklt ʕlwtʔ dʔyt hwy ʕl mdbḥʔ
21:27	wʔmr mryʔ lmlʔkʔ kd ḥzʔ ʔhpk sypk lḥlth

21:30	bh bzbnʔ hw dḥl hwʔ <ṭb#2#> dwyd ṭb wlʔ mškḥ hwʔ lmʔzl lmṣlyw qdm mryʔ mṭl ddḥl hwʔ mn qdm ḥrbʔ dmlʔkh dmryʔ
22:01	wʔmr dwyd dhnw byth dmryʔ ʔlhʔ whnʔ hw mdbḥʔ dʕlwtʔ dʔysryl/bʔysryl#3#/
22:02	wʔmr dwyd lmknšw lklhwn gywrʔ dʔyt hww bʔrʕʔ dʔysryl wnʕbdwn mnhwn pswlʔ wnpsqwn kʔpʔ lbyth dmryʔ
22:03	wlmʕbd mnhwn qynyʔ ʕbdy przlʔ lmʕbd pdwʕʔ wʔksydʔ wmwklʔ dprzlʔ tqn dwyd wnḥšʔ sgyʔʔ dlyt lh mtqlʔ
22:04	wqysʔ dʔrzʔ dlyt lhwn mnynʔ mṭl dʔytyw ṣwryʔ wṣydnyʔ qysʔ dʔrzʔ swgʔʔ dṭb ldwyd
22:05	wʔmr dwyd šlymwn bry ʕdmʔ lhšʔ ṭlyʔ hw zʕwrʔ wʕlwhy hw ʔmyr bktbʔ dnbnʔ bytʔ lmryʔ dnwrbywhy lʕl lšmʔ/lšmyʔ#2#/ wlrbwtʔ wltšbwḥtʔ lklhyn mdyntʔ ʔṭyb lh ʔnʔ kwl mdm dmtbʕʔ lh mn ḥyy wṭyb dwyd klw mdm dmtbʕʔ hwʔ lh lbytʔ wmdm lʔ ḥsr
22:06	wqrʔ lšlymwn brh wʔmr lh ʔnt tbnʔ bytʔ lmryʔ ʔlhʔ mrʔ mrwtʔ dʔysryl
22:08	mṭl dšdr ʕly \bʔydʔ dnbyʔ /bnbyʔ#3#/ wʔmr ly dmʔ sgyʔʔ ʔšdt wqʔrsʔ rwrbʔ ʕbdt ʔnt lʔ tbnʔ bytʔ lšmy mṭl ddmʔ sgyʔʔ ʔšdt ʕl ʔrʕʔ qdmy
22:09	brʔ dyn dmtyld lk hw nhwʔ <lk#3#> gbrʔ dnyḥʔ wʔnyḥ lh mn klhwn bʕldbbwhy dḥdyryn lh wšlymwn nhwʔ šmh wšlmʔ wnyḥʔ nhwʔ \ʕl klh /lklh#3#/ ʔysryl bywmth
22:10	whw nbnʔ bytʔ lšmy whw nhwʔ ly ʔyk brʔ wʔnʔ ʔhwʔ lh ʔyk ʔbʔ wʔtqn kwrsyʔ dmlkwth ʕl ʔysryl lʕlm ʕlmyn
22:11	wʔp hšʔ bry nhwʔ mryʔ ʕmk wtkšr wtbnʔ bytʔ dmryʔ ʔhlk ʔyknʔ dʔmr lk
22:12	whw ntl lk ḥkmtʔ wnbywtʔ wnpqdk ʕl ʔysryl wtṭr nmwswhy/pwqdnwhy wnmwswhy#3#/ dmryʔ ʔlhk ʔyknʔ dpqdny
22:13	whydyn tkšr wʔn hw dtṭr/dtkšr#3#/ wtʕbd pwqdnʔ hlyn wnmwsʔ wdynʔ ʔyknʔ dpqd mryʔ lmwšʔ lmlpw lʔysryl hydyn ʔtʕšn wʔtgbr wlʔ tdḥl wʔplʔ/wlʔ#2#/ tzwʕ
22:14	wklmdm hʔ ʔnʔ ṭybt lk klmdm dmtbʕʔ lbnynʔ dbyth/lbyth#3#/ dmryʔ ṭybt lk kkrʔ ddhbʔ mʔʔ ʔlpyn ṭybt lk sʔmʔ bmnynʔ/mnynʔ#23#/ ʔlp ʔlpyn kkryn wnḥšʔ wprzlʔ ṭybt lk \dlʔ ʔyt /dlyt#3#/ lh mnynʔ wkl bny ʔnšʔ dmhlkyn ʕl ʔrʕʔ lʔ ydʕyn lmḥšb skʔ dlyṭrwhy mṭl dsgy/dsgyʔʔ#3#/ hw wqysʔ wkʔpʔ ṭybt lk wʕlyhyn twsp

22:17	wpqd dwyd lkwlhwn qšyšʔ dʔysryl wʔmr lhwn ʕdrw lšlymwn bry
22:18	mṭl dhʔ mryʔ ʔlhkwn ʕmkwn wmʕdr lkwn wmsyʕ lkwn mn kwlhwn ḥdrykwn whʔ ʔšlm qdmykwn klhwn ʕmwryh dʔrʕʔ wttkbš ʔrʕʔ qdm mryʔ wqdm ʕmh
22:19	wʔp hšʔ ʔtqnw lbkwn wnpškwn lmṣlyw qdm mryʔ ʔlhkwn wqwmw wbnw mqdšʔ dmryʔ/lmryʔ#2#/ ʔlhʔ wʔʕlw ltmn qbwtʔ dbh symʔ dytqʔ dmryʔ ʔlhn wmʔny qwdšʔ dmryʔ ʔlhn wbnw bytʔ mṭl šmh rbʔ dʔtqry ʕlyn
23:01	wdwyd qš wsbʕ ywmth wʔqym lšlymwn brh bmlkwtʔ ʕl ʔysryl
23:02	wknš klhwn qšyšʔ dkhnʔ wdlwyʔ
23:03	wʔtmnyw lwyʔ mn br tltyn šnyn wlʕl whwʔ mnynʔ dgbrʔ lryš ʔnš tltyn wtmnyʔ ʔlpyn
23:04	wʔqym mnhwn dwyd šlyṭʔ ʕl ʕbydtʔ dbyth dmryʔ ʕsryn wʔrbʕʔ gbryn/ʔlpyn#3#/ ʕl ʔlp wdynʔ wsprʔ štʔ štʔ gbryn ʕl mʔtʔ dnhwwn ḥzyn bnynʔ wqymyn wrhṭyn bḥylhwn wbmrhṭyhwn wbʕbydthwn wbḥwšbnyhwn wbnksyhwn wbzdqtʔ dnhwwn mprnsyn lmsknʔ/msknʔ#3#/ wʔqym dwyd ʕl msknʔ wʕl byšʔ mprnsnʔ wqywmʔ dnhwwn zynyn wmprnsyn msknʔ ḥd ʕsrʔ wmdm lʔ mḥsryn lhwn
23:06	wʔqym ʔnwn dwyd lkwlhwn bšwlṭnyhwn lbnwhy dlwy gršwn wqht wmrry
23:07	lgršwn lʕdn wšmʕy
23:08	bnwhy dlʕdn qšyšh nḥnʔyl ywtm ywʔyl tltʔ
23:09	bnwhy dšmʕyʔ slmwt wḥzʔyl wʔrn tltʔ hlyn ršy ʔbhtʔ dšmʕy
23:10	bnwhy dšmʕy nḥt zbydʔ yʕwš bryʕʔ hlyn bnwhy dšmʕy ʔrbʕʔ
23:11	whwʔ nḥt qšyšh wzbydʔ tnynʔ wyʕwš wbryʕʔ wbryʕʔ lʔ ʔsgy lh bnyʔ whwʔ lbyt ʔbwhwn lšrbtʔ/šrbtʔ#3#/ ḥdʔ
23:12	bnwhy qht ʕmrm wyṣhr wḥbrwn wʕzwʔyl ʔrbʕʔ
23:13	bnwhy dʕmrm ʔhrwn wmwšʔ wʔtgby ʔhrwn lmšmšw bqdwš qwdšʔ hw wbnwhy ʕdmʔ lʕlm lmqrbw qdm mryʔ qṭrwqʔ dbsmʔ lmšmšwth wlmbrkw bšmh ʕdmʔ lʕlm
23:14	wmwšʔ nbyʔ dmryʔ ʔtqry mn šbṭʔ dbyt lwy

23:17	whww bnwhy dʔlyʕzr rḥmyʔ qšyšh wlʔ hww lʔlyʕzr bnyʔ ʔḥrnʔ wbnwhy drḥmyʔ ryby qšyšh
23:18	wbnwhy dyṣhr slmwt qšyšh
23:19	wbnwhy dḥbrwbm ywdʔ qšyšh ʔmryʔ tnynʔ nḥzʔyl tlytyʔ nqmʔym rbyʕyʔ
23:20	bnwhy dʕzʔyl mykʔ qšyšh šwḥ tnynʔ
23:21	bnwhy dmrry mḥly wmwšy bnwhy dmḥly ʔlyʕzr wqyš

02:17	wʕbd mnhwn mlkʔ šlymwn šbʕyn ʔlpyn šqly qwpʔ wtmnʔyn ʔlpyn pswlʔ bṭwrʔ wtltʔ ʔlpyn wštmʔʔ qywmʔ dmʕbdyn lʕmʔ

03:14	wʕbd pwrktʔ/prwktʔ#3#/ dtkltʔ/tkltʔ#3#/ wʔrgwnʔ/wdʔrgwnʔ wdṣwbʕʔ#3#/ wzḥwrytʔ/dzḥwrytʔ ṭbtʔ#3#/ wbwṣʔ wʔsq ʕlyh krwbʔ wsm bgwh qbwtʔ
03:15	wʕbd qdmwhy dbytʔ rbʔ ʔsṭwnʔ/ʔsṭwʔ#2#/ tryn ʔwrkhwn ʔmyn \tmnʕsrʔ wḥtʔ dʕl ršyhwn ḥmš ʔmyn rwmhyn /tltyn wḥmš wḥtʔ dʕl ryšhwn rwmh ḥmš ʔmyn#3#/

03:17	wʔqym ʔsṭwnʔ tryn qdm hyklʔ ḥd mn ymynʔ wḥd mn smlʔ wqrʔ šmh dhw dʔqym mn ymynʔ ykyn wšmh dhw \dmn smlʔ/dsmlʔ#3#/ bʕz
04:01	wʕbd mdbḥʔ dnḥšʔ ʕsr/ʕsryn#3#/ ʔmyn ʔwrkh wʕsr/wʕsryn#3#/ ʔmyn ptyh wʕsr ʔmyn rwmh
04:02	wʕbd ymʔ dnsktʔ ʕsr ʔmyn/ʔmʔ#3#/ mn spth lspth mrbʕ/mrbʕʔ#3#/ kd ḥdr wḥmš ʔmyn rwmh wḥwṭʔ dtltyn ʔmyn ḥdr lh mn klhwn gbwhy
04:04	whw qʔm ʕl trʕsr twryn tltʔ pnyn lgrbyʔ wtltʔ pnyn ltymnʔ/lmʕrbʔ#3#/ wtltʔ pnyn lmʕrbʔ/ltymnʔ#3#/ wtltʔ pnyn lmdnḥʔ wymʔ lʕl mnhwn mn lʕl wklhyn ʔḥrythwn mn lgw

05:01	wšlmt/wšlmh#3#/ klh ʕbydtʔ dʔbd šlymwn bbyth dmryʔ wʔyty šlymwn qwdšʔ ddwyd ʔbwhy kspʔ wdhbʔ wmʔnʔ knš ʔnwn wʔʕl qps ʔnwn byt gzʔ dmryʔ
05:02	hydyn knš hwʔ šlymwn kwlhwn qšyšʔ dʔysryl ryšy šbṭʔ \wrwrbny ʔbhtʔ wrwrbnʔ dmʔwtʔ#3#/ dbny ʔysrʔyl wʔtw lwt mlkʔ šlymwn lʔwršlm lmsqw lqbwtʔ dʔyt bh dytqʔ dmryʔ mn qryth ddwyd dhy hy <hy#3#> ṣhywn/ḥbrwn#3#/

06:29	kwl ṣlwtʔ wbʕwtʔ dthwʔ lklhwn bnynšʔ lkwlh ʕmk ʔysryl dnsybrwn gbr/gyr#2#/ kʔbʔ dlbh wnʔtʔ wnprws ʔydwhy bbytʔ hnʔ

07:05	wdbḥ mlkʔ šlymwn dbḥtʔ twrʔ ʕsryn wtryn ʔlpyn wʕnʔ mʔʔ wʕsryn ʔlpyn wḥdtw byth dmryʔ mlkʔ šlymwn wklh ʔmʔ
07:06	wkhnʔ qymyn hww ʕl tšmšthwn wlwyʔ bmʔnʔ dtšbḥtʔ mšbḥyn hww qdm mryʔ whknʔ/wkhnʔ#2#/ ʔmryn hww btšbḥthwn ʔwdw lmryʔ dṭb hw wlʕlm ṭybwth btšbḥtʔ ddwyd wkhnʔ mšbḥyn hww bqrntʔ kpyptʔ wpšyṭtʔ wklh ʕmʔ dʔysryl qʔm <hwʔ#3#>
07:07	wqdš šlymwn gwh ddrtʔ dʔyt qdm byth dmryʔ mṭl dʔsq ltmn dbḥʔ wtrbʔ dšlmʔ mṭl dmdbḥʔ dnḥšʔ dʕbd šlymwn zʕwr hwʔ wlʔ mškḥ hwʔ lmsybrw dbḥʔ wnšypʔ wtrbʔ dšlmʔ

12:14	wʕbd dbyš qdm mryʔ wlʔ ʔtqn lbh ldḥlth dmryʔ lmtbʕh/lmbʕyh#3#/ bklh lbh

13:01	bšnt tmnʕsrʔ lmlkwth dywrbʕm br nbṭ qm bmlkwtʔ ʔbyʔ ʕl šbṭʔ dbyt yhwdʔ
13:02	wtlt/wtltyn#3#/ šnyn ʔmlk bʔwršlm wšmʔ dʔmh mʕkʔ brt ʔwryl mn rmtʔ
13:03	wʔsr ʔbyʔ gbrʔ ʕbdy qrbʔ ʔrbʕmʔʔ ʔlpyn gbrʔ ʕlymʔ ʕdmʔ dqblw ʕlyhwn dnʔzlwn wnʕbdwn qrbʔ ʕm ywrbʕm br nbṭ wywrbʕm br nbṭ knš lh ḥylʔ wʔtʔ dnʕbd qrbʔ btmnmʔʔ ʔlpyn gbrʔ ʕlymʔ gnbry ḥylʔ
13:04	wqm ʔbyʔ ʕl/mn#3#/ ṭwrʔ dṣmrym dʔyt btḥwmʔ dṭwrʔ dʔprym wʔmr šmʕ ywrbʕm br nbṭ wklh ʔysryl
13:05	kbr ydʕyn hwytwn dmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl yhb mlkwtʔ ldwyd ʕl <klh#3#> ʔysryl lʕlm lh wlbnwhy qymʔ dmlkʔ/dmlḥʔ#3#/
13:06	wqm ywrbʕm br nbṭ ʕbdh dšlymwn \brh ddwyd /br dwyd#3#/ wmrd ʕl mrh
13:07	wknš lwth gbrʔ ršyʕʔ bny ʕwlʔ wʔtʕšn ʕl rḥbʕm \brh dšlymwn /br šlymwn#3#/ wrḥbʕm ṭlyʔ hwʔ wṭlʔ ywmyn wlʔ ydʕ hwʔ mdm lmʔmr/dnʔmr#3#/ wlʔ byʔh lʕmʔ ʕl šwʕbdʔ dšʕbd hwʔ ʔnwn šlymwn ʔbwhy
13:08	wʔp hšʔ mnʔ ʔmryn ʔntwn ʔzltwn ʔprqtwn mnkwn mlkwtʔ dbyt dwyd wʔzltwn wplḥtwn lʔlhʔ mytʔ wʔnʔ ʕl šbṭʔ ḥd qʔm ʔnʔ bmlkwtʔ wʔntwn <ʕl#2#> šbṭʔ sgyʔʔ wbyntkwn ʔyt ʕglʔ ddhbʔ dʕbd lkwn ywrbʕm br nbṭ
13:09	wʔntwn ʔprqtwn lkhnʔ bnwhy dʔhrwn wllwyʔ wʕbdtwn lkwn kwmrʔ mn ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ kl mn dʕʔl lmqrbw qwrbnʔ šqlyn hwytwn mnh twrʔ br bqrʔ wdkrʔ šbʕʔ whwʔ hwʔ kwmrʔ ldlʔ ʔlhyn
13:10	wḥnn lmryʔ ʔlhn lʔ šbqn wkhnʔ dmšmšyn lmryʔ bnwhy ʔnwn dʔhrwn wlwyʔ bʕbydthwn
13:11	wmsqyn hww lmryʔ dbḥʔ bkl ṣpr wṣpr/lṣpr#2#/ wbkl rmš wrmš wqṭrwqʔ dbsmʔ wsdrʔ dlḥmʔ ʕl ptwrʔ dkyʔ wmnrtʔ ddhbʔ wšrgyhyn wṭlyʔ šrgtnʔ \mnhr lhyn /mnhrnyhyn#3#/ bkl rmš wrmš wḥnn nṭryn nṭwrtʔ/nṭwrwth#3#/ dmryʔ ʔlhn wʔntwn dyn šbqtwnyhy wʔzltwn btr ʔlhʔ mytʔ wplḥtwn ʔnwn wsgdtwn lhwn wšbqtwn lmryʔ
13:12	ʔlhʔ dʔbhykwn wʔp ʔntwn lʔ tkšrwn bʕlmʔ
13:15	whwʔ dkd ʔrymw qlhwn gbrʔ dbyt yhwdʔ wmryʔ tbr lywrbʕm br nbṭ wlʔysryl qdm yhwdʔ wqdm ʔbyʔ
13:16	wʕrqw bny ʔysryl mn qdm bny yhwdʔ
13:17	wḥrb ʔnwn/bhwn#3#/ ʔbyʔ ḥrbʔ rbtʔ/rbʔ#3#/ wnplw gbrʔ mn ʔysryl ḥmšmʔʔ ʔlpyn gbrʔ ʕlymʔ
13:18	wʔttbrw bny ʔysryl <bh#3#> bzbnʔ hw wʔtgbrw/wʔtgnbrw#3#/ bny yhwdʔ mṭwl dʔmryn swmknn ʕl mryʔ hw ʔlhʔ dʔbhtn
13:19	wrdp ʔbyʔ btr ywrbʕm wkbš mnh qwryʔ rwrbtʔ byt ʔyl wmʔklth šlʔ wmʔklth wʕprwn wmʔklth
13:20	wzʕr lh ḥylʔ lywrbʕm twb bywmth dʔbyʔ wmḥyhy mryʔ lywrbʕm wmyt
13:21	wʔtgbr ʔbyʔ wnsb lh nšʔ ʔrbʕsrʔ wʔtyldw lh bnyʔ dkrʔ ʕsryn wštʔ wbntʔ nqbtʔ šttʕsrʔ
13:22	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy dʔbyʔ wʔwrḥth/wdʔwrḥth wdgnbrwth#3#/ hnwn/hʔ#3#/ ktybyn bmdršʔ dʕdw nbyʔ
13:23	wškb ʔbyʔ ʕm ʔbhth wqbrwhy bqrytʔ ddwyd wqm bmlkwtʔ ʔsʔ brh btrh bywmwhy ʔtnyḥt ʔrʕʔ mn qʔrsʔ/qrbʔ#3#/ ʕsryn šnyn
14:01	wʕbd ʔsʔ dṭb wdšpyr/wšpyr#3#/ qdm mryʔ ʔlhh
14:02	wʕqr mdbḥʔ dʔlhʔ nwkryʔ wbwmsʔ wtbr qymtʔ wpsq ʔndrynṭʔ
14:03	wʔmr lyhwdʔ tw nṣlʔ qdm mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbhtn
14:04	wʕqr/wʔʕbr#3#/ mn klhyn qwryʔ dbyt yhwdʔ ʕlwtʔ/bwsmʔ#3#/ wptkrʔ wʔtnyḥt mlkwth bywmth wbʕldbbʔ lʔ hwʔ lh mn klhwn bʕly tḥwmh
14:05	wbnʔ qwryʔ ʕšyntʔ bʔrʕʔ dyhwdʔ mṭl dʔtnyḥt ʔrʕʔ wlʔ ʔyt hwʔ ʔnš dʕbd <hwʔ#3#> ʕmhwn qrbʔ šnyʔ/bšnyʔ#3#/ hlyn mṭwl dʔnyḥh hwʔ mryʔ
14:06	wʔmr ldbyt yhwdʔ tw nbnʔ qwryʔ hlyn wnkrk/wnḥdr#3#/ ʔnyn šwrʔ wmgdlʔ wtrʕʔ wswkrʔ ʕd šlyʔ ʔrʕʔ mn qʔrsʔ/qrbʔ#3#/ mṭl dbʕyn lmryʔ ʔlhn wʔp hw bʕn wʔnyḥn/wḥnn#3#/ mn klhwn dḥdryn wbyʔn/wbnn#3#/ wpṣyn
14:07	whww lʔsʔ gbrʔ gnbry ḥylʔ šqly/šqyly#3#/ skrʔ/sypʔ#3#/ wrwmḥʔ mn byt/dbyt#3#/ yhwdʔ tltmʔʔ ʔlpyn wmn dbyt bnymyn lbyšy/lbšy#3#/ šrynʔ wmtḥy qštʔ mʔtyn wtmnʔyn ʔlpyn klhwn hlyn gnbry ḥylʔ
14:08	wnpq lwthwn zrḥ hndwyʔ bḥylʔ sgyʔʔ <lʔwrʕh dʔsʔ#3#> ʔlp ʔlpyn <ḥylʔ#3#> wbzwgʔ/wzwgʔ#3#/ tltyn ʔlpyn wʔtw wmṭw ʕdmʔ lmʔršʔ
14:09	wnpq ʔsʔ lqwblh/lwqblhwn#3#/ wʕbd ʕmh qrbʔ bnḥlʔ dmʔršʔ
14:10	wṣly ʔsʔ qdm mryʔ ʔlhh wʔmr ʔnt hw mrn ʕdwrh dʕmk kd tšlm ḥylʔ sgyʔʔ bʔydy zʕwrʔ hydyn ndʕwn klhwn ʕmwrwhy dʕlmʔ dšpyr mttklyn ḥnn ʕlyk ʕdryn mryʔ ʔlhn <ʕdryn#3#> mṭl dbšmk ʔtyn ʕl ḥylʔ hnʔ rbʔ mryʔ ʔlhʔ lʔ tšwḥr/tštwḥr#3#/ gnbrwtk mnn whydyn kd gmr ʔsʔ lmṣlyw ṣlwth
14:11	tbr mlʔkʔ dmryʔ lhndwyʔ qdm ʔsʔ wqdm yhwdʔ wʕrqw hndwyʔ
14:12	wrdp ʔnwn ʔsʔ wʕmʔ dʕmh ʕdmʔ lgdr wnplw mn hndwyʔ dlʔ mnyn mṭl dʔttbrw qdm mryʔ wqdm ḥylwth wnsbw wšbw šbytʔ swgʔʔ dṭb
14:13	wḥrbw klhyn qwryʔ dʔyt ḥdry gdr mṭwl dhwt dḥlth dmryʔ ʕlyhwn wbnw klhyn qwryʔ mṭl dbztʔ sgyʔtʔ <ʔyt#3#> hwt bhyn
14:14	wʔp mšknʔ dʕrbyʔ ʔytyw wšbw ʕnʔ swgʔʔ dṭb wgmlʔ wʔwblw lʔwršlm
15:01	wʕzryʔ br ʕzwr šrt ʕlwhy rwḥʔ mn qdm mryʔ
15:02	wnpq qdm ʔsʔ wʔmr lh šmʕyny ʔsʔ wklh yhwdʔ wbnymyn mryʔ ʕmkwn hw lʕlm ʕlmyn ʔn tbʕwnyhy nštkḥ lkwn wʔn tšbqwnh nšbwqkwn
15:03	ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ lʔysryl/dʔysrʔyl#3#/ dlʔ/lʔ#3#/ plḥw lʔlhhwn bqwštʔ wlʔ qblw mn khnyhwn wlʔ šmʕw <mn#3#> nmwsyhwn wʔštlmw lʔydʔ dbʕldbbʔ
15:04	wkd ʕqt lhwn ṣlyw qdm mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl wbʕʔwhy wʔštkḥ lhwn
15:05	wbzbntʔ hlyn qdmytʔ kd lʔlhn lʔ dḥlyn hwyn lʔ ʔyt hwʔ šlm lʔ lmn dnpq wlʔ lmn dʕʔl mṭl dbyštʔ rbtʔ ʔtt hwt ʕl klhwn ʕmwryh dʔrʕʔ/dmdyntʔ#3#/
15:06	wʔtbdrn bkl ʕm wʕm wbynt/wbyt#3#֯ qwryʔ wbynt/wbyt#3#/ mdyntʔ mṭl dšbqn hwyn lmryʔ ʔlhn wlʔ ṣbyn hwyn lmšmʕ bqlʔ dʕbdwhy nbyʔ
15:07	wʔp hw prʕn ʔgrʔ dʕbdyn
15:08	wkd šmʕ ʔsʔ ptgmʔ hlyn dʕzryʔ br ʕzwr nbyʔ ʔtʕšn wʔʕbr ṣlmʔ mn klh ʔrʕʔ dyhwdʔ wdbnymyn/wbnymyn#3#/ wmn qwryʔ dʔḥd bʔrʕʔ dʔprym wḥdt mdbḥʔ dmryʔ dhwʔ qdm srwgʔ
15:09	wknš klhwn/lklhwn#3#/ dbyt yhwdʔ wbny/wdbyt#3#/ bnymyn wmn qwryʔ dʔḥd bʔrʕʔ dʔprym wgywrʔ dbhwn/dʕmh#3#/ mn dbyt ʔprym wmn dbyt mnšʔ wmn dbyt šmʕwn mṭl dʔtknšw wʔtw lwth mn dbyt ʔysryl swgʔʔ kd ḥzw dmryʔ ʔlhh ʕmh
15:10	wʔtknšw bʔwršlm byrḥʔ tlytyʔ bšnt ḥmš ḥmšʕsrʔ dmlkwth/lmlkwth#3#/ dʔsʔ
15:11	wdbḥw lmryʔ dbḥʔ bywmʔ hw mn bztʔ dʔytyw twrʔ šbʕmʔʔ wʕnʔ štʔ ʔlpyn
15:12	wʔymw mwmtʔ dnṣlwn qdm mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbhyhwn bklh lbhwn wbklh npšhwn
15:13	wkl mn dlʔ nṣlʔ qdm mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl nmwt mn zʕwrʔ wʕdmʔ lrbʔ wmn gbrʔ wʕdmʔ lnšʔ
15:14	wʔymw lmryʔ bqlʔ rmʔ bqrntʔ kpyptʔ wpšyṭtʔ
15:15	wḥdyw klhwn dbyt yhwdʔ ʕl ṭbʔ hnʔ dšmʕw mṭl dmn klh lbhwn bʕʔwhy wmn klh npšhwn ṣlyw qdmwhy wʔštkḥ lhwn wpṣy ʔnwn mn kl bʕly tḥwmyhwn
15:16	wʔp lmʕkʔ ʔmh dʔsʔ ʔʕbrh mn mlkwth ʕl dʕbdt ʕʔdʔ lṣlmyh wpsq ʔsʔ lṣlmyh wʔwqd ʔnwn bnḥlʔ dqdrwn
15:17	wmdbḥʔ lʔ prqw mn ʔysryl \brm lbh /mṭl dlbh#3#/ dʔsʔ šlm hwʔ ldḥlth \dmryʔ ʔlhh /dʔlhʔ#3#/ klhwn ywmtʔ dḥywhy
15:18	wʔyty qwdšʔ dʔbwhy \wqwdšwhy lbyth /wqwdšʔ dbyth#3#/ dmryʔ kspʔ wdhbʔ wmʔnʔ
15:19	wqrbʔ hwʔ bšnt tltyn wḥmš dmlkwth dʔsʔ
16:01	wbšnt tltyn wšt šnyn lmlkwth dʔsʔ slq bʕšʔ mlkʔ dʔysryl ʕl dbyt yhwdʔ wbnʔ lrmtʔ/rmtʔ#3#/ mṭl dlʔ šbqyn hww \lmʕl wlmpq /lmpq wlmʕl#3#/ lʔsʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ/dbyt yhwdʔ#3#/
16:02	wʔpq ʔsʔ kspʔ wdhbʔ mn byt gzʔ dmryʔ wmn byt mlkʔ wšdr lbrhdd mlkʔ dʔdwm dytb bdrmswq wʔmr lh
16:03	mwmtʔ ʔyt byny wlk/wbynyk#3#/ wbyt ʔby \wbyt ʔbwk /lʔbwk#3#/ hʔ šdrt lk kspʔ wdhbʔ zl bṭl mwmtʔ dymyt ʕm bʕšʔ mlkʔ dʔysryl mtʕlʔ mny
16:04	wšmʕ brhdd lmlkʔ ʔsʔ wšdr lrwrbny ḥylʔ \dʔyt lh /dylh#3#/ wʔtw wšrw ʕl qwryʔ dʔysryl wʔḥdw lʕywn wlʔbl byt mʕkʔ wlklhwn ʔwṣrʔ dqwryʔ dbyt nptly
16:05	hydyn kd šmʕ bʕšʔ prq hwʔ \mn dlmbnʔ lrmtʔ /lh lmbnʔ rmtʔ#3#/ wbṭlh hwʔ klh bnynh
16:06	wʔsʔ mlkʔ knš hwʔ lklhwn dbyt yhwdʔ wnsbw/wnsb hwʔ#3#/ lkʔpyh drmtʔ wlqysyh dmṭybyn hww dnbnwnh lbʕšʔ wbnʔ bhwn mlkʔ ʔsʔ rmtʔ dbnymyn wmṣpyʔ qrytʔ
16:07	wbh bzbnʔ hw ʔtʔ ḥnn nbyʔ lwt ʔsʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ wʔmr lh ḥlp dʔttklt ʕl mlkʔ dʔdwm wlʔ ʔttklt ʕl mryʔ ʔlhk mṭl hnʔ nʕrwq ḥylʔ dʔdwm mnk
16:08	wnʔzlwn wntḥylwn hnwn whndwyʔ wmlkʔ dʔyt ʕmhwn wnhwwn lḥylʔ wlzwgʔ wlpršʔ swgʔ dṭb wkd tbʕʔ mn mryʔ ʔlhʔ nšlm ʔnwn bʔydyk
16:09	mṭl dʕynwhy dmryʔ ḥyrn bklh ʔrʕʔ wʔtʕšnw wnhwʔ lbkwn šlm ldḥlth wʔstklw bkwlhyn tdmrth mṭwl dmryʔ ʔlhkwn ʕbd lkwn qrbʔ
16:10	wrgz ʔsʔ ʕl dwqʔ wyhbh byt ʔsyrʔ mṭl dmdm dlʔ ḥzʔ hwʔ mštʕʔ hwʔ wmzyʕ hwʔ lbh dʕmʔ mṭl hnʔ/hlyn#3#/ rhṭ ʔsʔ bzbnʔ hw mn ʕmʔ
16:11	whʔ ptgmwhy dʔsʔ qdmyʔ wʔḥryʔ hʔ hnwn ktybyn ʕl sprʔ dmlkʔ dyhwdʔ wdʔysryl
16:12	wʔtktš/wʔtkrh#3#/ ʔsʔ bšnt tltyn wtšʕ lmlkwth wʔtkrh mn rglwhy wnpl bgw byth
16:13	wškb ʔsʔ ʕm ʔbhth <wmyt#3#> wʔtqbr bqbwrth/bqryth#3#/ wmyt bšnt ʔrbʕyn wḥdʔ lmlkwth
16:14	wʔtqbr bqbrh ddwyd wʔrmywhy bʕrsʔ dmlyʔ bsmʔ wʔwqdw yqdʔ rbʔ dṭb
17:01	wqm bmlkwtʔ yhwšpṭ brh btrh wʔtʕšn ʕl ʔysryl
17:02	wʔšlṭ gbrʔ gnbry ḥylʔ bklhyn qwryʔ dbyt yhwdʔ ʕšyntʔ wʔqym šlyṭʔ/šlyṭnʔ#3#/ bʔrʕʔ dyhwdʔ wbʔrʕʔ dʔprym dʔḥd ʔsʔ ʔbwhy
17:03	whwʔ mryʔ ʕm yhwšpṭ mṭl dhlk bʔwrḥth ddwyd ʔbwhy qdmytʔ wlʔ ṣly lṣlmʔ
17:04	mṭl dlmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbwhy ṣly wbpwqdnwhy hlk wnmwswhy nṭr wlʔ ʕbd ʔyk ʕbdʔ dʔysryl
17:05	wʔtqn mryʔ mlkwtʔ bʔydh wyhbw lh klhwn dbyt yhwdʔ qwrbnʔ lyhwšpṭ whwʔ lh ʕwtrʔ wʔyqrʔ swgʔʔ dṭb
17:06	wʔtḥyl lbh <bmryʔ ʔlhh whlk#3#> bʔwrḥth dmryʔ wtwb ʕqr mdbḥʔ wʕlwtʔ dhww btḥwmʔ dbyt yhwdʔ
17:07	wbšnt tlt lmlkwth šdr qrʔ lrwrbnwhy wlrby ḥylʔ/wrby ḥylʔ#3#/ lʕwbdyʔ wlzkryʔ wlmtnʔyl wlmlkyʔ lmlpw bqwryʔ dyhwdʔ
17:08	wʕmhwn/dʕmhwn#3#/ hww lwyʔ šmʕyʔ mtnyʔ zkryʔ ʕšʔyl nṭwrʔ ywntn ʔdwnyʔ ṭwbyʔ hlyn kwlhwn lwyʔ wʕmhwn hwʔ ʔlyšmʕ wyhwrm khnʔ
17:09	wmlpyn hww bʔrʕʔ dyhwdʔ klh wʕmhwn hwʔ sprʔ dnmwsh dmryʔ wmtkrkyn hww bklhyn qwryʔ dyhwdʔ wmlpyn hww lʕmʔ
17:10	whwt dḥlth dmryʔ ʕl klhyn mlkwtʔ dmdyntʔ dhwy ḥdry yhwdʔ wlʔ ʔtktšw <hww#3#> ʕm yhwšpṭ
17:11	wmn mdyntʔ dplštyʔ mytyn hww lyhwšpṭ kspʔ wqwrbnʔ wksp ršʔ wʔp ʕrbyʔ mytyn hww ʕnʔ dkrʔ šbʕʔ ʔlpyn wšbʕmʔʔ wtyšʔ šbʕʔ ʔlpyn wšbʕmʔʔ bšntʔ ḥdʔ
17:12	whwʔ yhwšpṭ ʔzl wʕtr ʕdmʔ dʕtr ṭb wbnʔ byhwdʔ byrtʔ wqwryʔ dqpsʔ
17:13	wʕbydtʔ/wʕbdtʔ#3#/ rbtʔ hwt lh bʔrʕʔ dyhwdʔ wgbrʔ qrbtnʔ gnbry ḥylʔ bʔwršlm
17:14	whnʔ <hw#3#> mnynhwn lbyt ʔbhyhwn dbyt yhwdʔ wrwrbnʔ dʔlpʔ gdynw gnbrʔ wlh mšmšyn/mšlmyn#3#/ <hww#3#> gnbrʔ ḥyl tltmʔʔ ʔlpyn
17:15	wywḥnn rbʔ wlh mšmšyn/mšlmyn#3#/ <hww#3#> gnbry ḥylʔ mʔtyn wtmnʔyn ʔlpyn
17:16	wmn btrh šmʕy br zrḥ dšpr lmryʔ wʕmh mʔtyn ʔlpyn ḥyltnʔ dḥylʔ
17:17	wmn dbyt bnymyn gnbry ḥylʔ ʔlydʕ šmh wlh mšmšyn/mšlmyn#3#/ hww gbrʔ šdyy bqštʔ wʔḥydy skrʔ mʔtyn ʔlpyn
17:18	wyhwzbr gnbrʔ wlh mšmšyn/mšlmyn#3#/ hww mʔʔ wtmnʔyn ʔlpyn ʕbdy qrbʔ
17:19	hlyn klhwn dmšmšyn lmlkʔ yhwšpṭ sṭr mn dʔšlṭ/dšlṭ#3#/ mlkʔ bqwryʔ dtwqpʔ bklh ʔrʕʔ dyhwdʔ
18:01	whwʔ lyhwšpṭ ʕwtrʔ wʔyqrʔ dsgy/sgy#3#/ ṭb wʔtqrb lwt ʔḥb
18:02	wnḥt btr trtyn šnyn lwt ʔḥb lšmryn wdbḥ lh <ʔp#3#> ʔḥb ʕnʔ wtwrʔ \swgʔʔ dṭb /dsgy ṭb#3#/ wlḥylwtʔ dʕmh wmlkh dnsq lrmt glʕd
18:03	wʔmr ʔḥb mlkʔ dʔysryl lyhwšpṭ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ \dʕmy tsq /tsq ʕmy#3#/ lrmt glʕd wʔmr lh slq/dslq#3#/ ʔnʔ ʔkwtk wʕmy ʔyk ʕmk wrkšy ʔyk rkšk wʕmk ʔzl ʔnʔ lqrbʔ
18:04	wʔmr yhwšpṭ lmlkʔ dʔysryl šʔl nʔ ʔyk ywmnʔ ptgmh dmryʔ
18:05	wknš mlkʔ dʔysryl nbyʔ/gbrʔ#3#/ <dglʔ#3#> ʔyk ʔrbʕmʔʔ gbryn wʔmr lhwn nʔzl lqrbʔ lrmt glʕd ʔw lʔ/npwq#3#/ wʔmrw lh sq wmryʔ nšlm bʕldbbyk bʔydyk <mlkʔ#3#>
18:06	wʔmr lkʔ yhwšpṭ dlmʔ ʔyt hrkʔ nbyʔ dqwštʔ dmryʔ dnšʔl/wnšʔl#3#/ mnh
18:07	wʔmr mlkʔ dʔysryl lyhwšpṭ twb ʔyt gbrʔ ḥd lmšʔl mlth dmryʔ mnh wʔnʔ snʔ ʔnʔ lh dlʔ mtnbʔ ʕly ṭbtʔ ʔlʔ ʔn byštʔ mykʔ br ymlʔ šmh wʔmr yhwšpṭ lʔ nʔmr mlkʔ hknʔ
18:08	wqrʔ mlkʔ dʔysryl lmhymnʔ ḥd wʔmr lh srhb ʔytʔ <ly#3#> lmykʔ br ymlʔ
18:09	wmlkʔ dʔysryl wyhwšpṭ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ ytbyn <hww#3#> gbr ʕl kwrsyh wlbyšyn lbwšʔ brdʔ wytbyn btrʕʔ dšmryn wklhwn nbyʔ dglʔ mtnbyn hww qdmyhwn
18:10	wʕbd lh ṣdqyʔ br knʕnytʔ qrntʔ dprzlʔ wʔmr lh hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ bhlyn tdqr ʔnwn lʔdwmyʔ ʕdmʔ dtgmr ʔnwn wʕdmʔ lʔykʔ dtwbd ʔnwn
18:11	wklhwn nbyʔ mtnbyn <hww#3#> hknʔ wʔmryn sq lrmt glʕd wzkyh/wʔkšr#3#/ wnšlm mryʔ bʕldbbyk/lbʕldbbyk#3#/ bʔydyk mlkʔ
18:12	wʔyzgdʔ dʔzl lmqrʔ lmykʔ mll ʕmh wʔmr lh hʔ mlyhwn dnbyʔ dglʔ/kdbʔ#3#/ šwyn ʔnyn lmmllw ʔkḥd ṭbtʔ qdm mlkʔ nhwwn ptgmyk bsymyn ʔyk dḥd/ḥd#3#/ mnhwn wttnbʔ ʔp ʔnt ṭbtʔ
18:13	wʔmr mykʔ ḥy hw mryʔ ʔlhʔ ʔlʔ mdm dnrmʔ ʔlhy blby hw ʔmll
18:14	wʔzl lwt mlkʔ wʔmr lh mlkʔ mykʔ nʔzl lrmt glʕd ʔw lʔ wʔmr lh sq wzkyh/wʔkšr#3#/ wnštlmwn <bʕldbbyk#3#> bʔydyk
18:15	wʔmr lh mlkʔ ʕl kmʔ zbnyn ʔnʔ mwmʔ ʔnʔ lk dlʔ tmll ʕmy ʔlʔ ʔn tryṣtʔ bšmh dmryʔ
18:16	wʔmr ḥzʔ hwyt lh lklh ʔysryl mbdryn/dmbdryn#3#/ byt ṭwrʔ wdmyn lʕnʔ dlyt lh rʕyʔ wʔmr mryʔ lyt mlkʔ lhlyn nhpwk gbr lbyth bšlmʔ
18:17	wʔmr mlkʔ dʔysryl lyhwšpṭ lʔ ʔmrt lk dlʔ mtnbʔ ʕly hnʔ ṭbtʔ ʔlʔ ʔn byštʔ
18:18	wʔmr mykʔ \mṭl hnʔ /mṭlhdʔ#3#/ šmʕ ptgmh dmryʔ ḥzyt lmryʔ ytb ʕl kwrsyh wkl ḥylwtʔ dšmyʔ qymyn mn ymynh wmn smlh
18:19	wʔmr mryʔ mnw nšdlywhy lʔḥb mlkʔ dʔysryl dnsq wntqṭl brmt glʕd ḥd ʔmr ʔnʔ mšdl ʔnʔ lh wʔḥrnʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ mšdl ʔnʔ lh
18:20	wnpq rwḥʔ wqm qdm mryʔ wʔmr ʔnʔ/dʔnʔ#3#/ mšdl ʔnʔ lh wʔmr lh mryʔ bmnʔ
18:21	wʔmr <lh#3#> ʔnʔ ʔpwq wʔhwʔ rwḥʔ kdbʔ bpwmʔ dklhwn nbywhy wʔmr lh mryʔ mšdl ʔnt <lh#3#> wʔp mškḥ ʔnt pwq wʕbd ʔyknʔ dʔmrt
18:22	wʔp hšʔ hʔ yhb mryʔ rwḥʔ kdbʔ bpwmʔ dklhwn nbyyk hlyn wmryʔ psq ʕlyk byštʔ
18:23	wqrb ṣdqyʔ br knʕnytʔ/knʕnyʔ#3#/ wmḥyhy lmykʔ ʕl pkh wʔmr lh mn ʔmty wlkʔ ʕbrt rwḥh dmryʔ mny lmmllw ʕmk

18:25	wʔmr mlkʔ dʔysryl dbrw lmykʔ wzlw klʔwhy byt ʔmwn šlyṭʔ dqrytʔ wbbyth dywʔš br mlkʔ
18:26	wtʔmrwn hknʔ ʔmr mlkʔ ʔrmʔwhy lhnʔ byt ʔsyrʔ wʔwklwhy lḥmʔ lmṭr npš wʔšqʔwhy myʔ lmṭr npš ʕdmʔ lʔykʔ dʔhpwk/dʔtʔ#3#/ bšlmʔ
18:27	wʔmr mykʔ ʔn mhpk \hpk ʔnt /thpwk#3#/ wʔtʔ ʔnt bšlmʔ lʔ mll mryʔ ʕmy wʔmr šmʕw ʕmmʔ kwlkwn

18:29	wʔmr mlkʔ dʔysryl lyhwšpṭ ʔzdyn wʔtʔ wʔqwm bsdrʔ dqrbʔ wʔnt lbš mʔny zynk wʔzdyn mlkʔ dʔysryl wʕl qm bsdrʔ dqrbʔ
18:30	wmlkʔ dʔdwmyʔ/dʔdwm#3#/ pqd lšlyṭnʔ dzwgʔ dʔyt lh tltyn wtryn wʔmr lhwn lʔ ttktšwn/ttkšlwn#3#/ lʔ ʕm zʕwrʔ wlʔ ʕm rbʔ ʔlʔ ʕm mlkʔ dʔysryl blḥwd
18:31	whwʔ dkd ḥzw šlyṭnʔ/šlyṭʔ#3#/ dzwgʔ lyhwšpṭ <hnwn#3#> ʔmryn mlkʔ dʔysryl hnw wʔtw ʕlwhy lmtktšw ʕmh wʔyll yhwšpṭ wmryʔ ʕdrh wʔprq ʔnwn mnh
18:32	whwʔ dkd ḥzw šlyṭnʔ/šlyṭʔ#3#/ dzwgʔ lyhwšpṭ dlʔ hwʔ <hw#3#> mlkʔ dʔysryl hpkw lhwn mn bstrh/btrh#3#/
18:33	wgbrʔ šdʔ hwʔ bqštʔ tmymʔyt lqwblh wmḥyhy lmlkʔ dʔysryl byt dbqʔ/prqʔ#3#/ dšrynh wʔmr lmrkbnh ʔhpk ʔydk wʔpqyny lbr mn mšrytʔ mṭwl dmḥwtʔ dmwtʔ mḥʔ ʔnʔ
18:34	wʕšn qʔrsʔ/qrbʔ#3#/ bywmʔ hw wmlkʔ dʔysryl ytb hwʔ bzwgʔ wmtktš hwʔ ʕm ʔdwmyʔ ʕdmʔ lrmšʔ wmyt ʕdn mʕrby šmšʔ
19:01	whpk yhwšpṭ <mlkʔ#3#> lʔpy rmšʔ lbyth bšlmʔ dʔwršlm
19:02	wnpq lʔwrʕh br ḥnn ḥzyʔ wʔmr lmlkʔ yhwšpṭ lmʕdrw lršyʕʔ ʔzlt wlsnʔwhy dmryʔ rḥmt mṭwl hnʔ rgz mryʔ ʕlyk
19:03	ʔlʔ mhymn ʔnʔ dptgmʔ ṭbʔ ʔštmʕw mnk mṭl ddmʔ zkyʔ lʔ ʔšdt bʔrʕʔ wʔtqnt lbk lmṣlyw qdm mryʔ bqwštʔ
19:04	wytb yhwšpṭ bʔwršlm whpk wnpq mn bršbʕ mdyntʔ wmṭy lṭwrʔ dʔprym wʔhpk ʔnwn lmdḥl qdm mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbhthwn
19:05	wʔqym dynʔ bʔrʕʔ bklhyn qwryʔ dyhwdʔ ʕšyntʔ wbqwryʔ/wqwryʔ#3#/ gnbrtʔ
19:06	wʔmr ldynʔ ḥzw mnʔ \ʕbdyn ʔntwn /ʔntwn ʕbdyn mṭl#3#/ dlʔ hwʔ lbny ʔnšʔ dynyn ʔntwn ʔlʔ lmryʔ ʔlhn wʔtʕšnw wdwnw dynʔ dqwštʔ wnhwʔ mryʔ ʕmkwn lʕlm
19:07	wṭrw wʕbdw mṭl dlyt qdm mryʔ ʔlhn ʕwlʔ wmsb bʔpʔ wqwblʔ dšwḥdʔ
19:08	wʔp bʔwršlm ʔqym yhwšpṭ mn lwyʔ wmn khnʔ wmn ryšʔ dʔbhtʔ dbny ʔysryl ldynʔ dmryʔ whpk lʔwršlm
19:09	wpqd ʔnwn wʔmr lhwn hknʔ tʕbdwn ldḥlth dmryʔ bhymnwtʔ wblbʔ šlmʔ
19:10	kl dynʔ dʔtʔ lwtkwn mn ʔḥykwn dytbyn bqwrykwn byt dmʔ ldmʔ wbyt nmwsʔ lpwqdnʔ wldynʔ wtzhrwn ʔnwn dlʔ nḥwbwn qdm mryʔ wnrgz ʕlyhwn wʕl ʔḥyhwn hknʔ tʕbdwn wlʔ tḥwbwn
19:11	ʔqymt ʕlykwn khnʔ dndwnwn dynʔ dqwštʔ wdynʔ dhymnwtʔ ʔyk pwqdnh dmryʔ wzkryʔ br šmʕyʔ ḥwy lklhwn dbyt yhwdʔ kwlhwn pwqdnwhy dmlkʔ wḥwy lsprʔ wllwyʔ/wlwyʔ#3#/ wkl mdm qdmyhwn tny/tny#3#/ wʔmr lhwn ʔtʕšnw wʕbdw wnhwʔ mryʔ bʕdrkwn/bʕwdrnkwn#2#/ lʕlm
20:01	whwʔ mn btr hlyn ʔtw bny mwʔb wbny ʕmwn wʕmhwn gbrʔ qrbtnʔ lmʕbd qrbʔ ʕm yhwšpṭ
20:02	wʔtw wḥwyw lyhwšpṭ wʔmryn lh ʔtʔ ʕlyk ḥylʔ sgyʔʔ mn ʕbrʔ dymʔ swmqʔ whʔ hnwn šryn bʔyryḥw hy hy ʕyn gd
20:03	wdḥl/wḥzʔ ʔnwn#3#/ wʔrym yhwšpṭ ʔpwhy lmṣlyw qdm mryʔ wgzr ṣwmʔ ʕl klhwn dbyt yhwdʔ wʔmr lhwn ʔtʕšnw/ʔtknšw#3#/ wtw nbʕʔ mn mryʔ ʔlhn

20:06	wṣly \whknʔ ʔmr /hknʔ wʔmr#3#/ mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbhtn ʔnt hw ʔlhʔ bšmyʔ wʔnt šlyṭ <ʔnt#3#> bklhyn mlkwtʔ dʕlmʔ wdylk hw ḥylʔ wgnbrwtʔ wʔnʔ qʔm ʔnʔ qdmyk wmṣlnʔ
20:07	wʔnt hw ʔlhn ʔwbdt ʕmwryh dʔrʕʔ hdʔ mn qdm ʕmk ʔysryl wyhbth lzrʕh dʔbrhm rḥmk lʕlm
20:08	wytb bh wbnw bh mqdšʔ lšmk wʔmryn
20:09	dmkyl/mkyl#3#/ dmqdšʔ ʔyt byntn lʔ ʔtyʔ ʕlyn byštʔ wʔp lʔ ḥrbʔ wʔplʔ dynʔ wʔplʔ mwtnʔ wʔplʔ kpnʔ wnʔtʔ wnqwm qdm bytʔ hnʔ wqdmyk mṭl dšmk ʔtqry bbytʔ/ʕl bytʔ#3#/ hnʔ <wnʔtʔ#3#> wnṣlʔ qdmyk \bbytʔ hnʔ /ʕl ʕqtn#3#/ wtšmʕ bqlʔ dṣlwtn wtprqn
20:10	wʔp hšʔ hʔ bny ʕmwn wṭwrʔ dgbl wmwʔb dlʔ yhbt ʔnwn lʔysryl lmtḥlṭw ʕmhwn mṭl dmn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn ʔpqt ʔnwn wʔprqt šwʕbdʔ dmṣryʔ mnhwn

20:12	mryʔ ʔlhn ʔtgly wdwn ʔnwn mṭl dlyt bn ḥylʔ lmqm qdmyhwn ʔytʔ ʕlyhwn ḥrbʔ ddynk wḥnn lʔ ydʕyn ḥnn mnʔ nʕbd mṭl dʕynyn ʕlyk/hw lwtk#3#/ šqyln
20:13	wklhwn dbyt yhwdʔ qymyn hww qdm mryʔ wʔp ṭlyyhwn wnšyhwn wbnyhwn wbnthwn
20:14	wḥzʔyl br zkryʔ br bnyʔ br ywydʕ br mtnyʔ lwyʔ mn bnwhy dʔsp šrt ʕlwhy rwḥʔ dgnbrwtʔ mn qdm mryʔ whw qʔm hwʔ qdm/bgw#3#/ ʕmʔ dʔysryl
20:15	wʔmr šmʕw klh ywhdʔ wʕmwryh dʔwršlm wmlkʔ yhwšpṭ hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhkwn/lkwn#3#/ ʔntwn lʔ tdḥlwn wlʔ tzwʕwn/ttzyʕwn#3#/ mn qdm ḥylʔ sgyʔʔ hnʔ mṭl dlʔ hwʔ dylkwn qrbʔ dmryʔ hw gyr qrbʔ
20:16	<whšʔ#3#> ʔstrhbw wḥwtw ʕlyhwn hʔ hnwn slqyn bmsqnʔ dṣprʔ wtškḥwn ʔnwn bšqypʔ dnḥlʔ qdm mdbrʔ
20:17	hnwn slqyn lmtktšw ʕmkwn wbhy/why#2#/ šʕtʔ qwmw wḥzw pwrqnʔ dʕbd mryʔ ʕmkwn dbyt yhwdʔ wʕmwryh dʔwršlm lʔ tdḥlwn ʔplʔ tzwʕwn mḥr pwqw qdmyhwn \wʔdwny mrʔ mrwtʔ /wmryʔ#3#/ nhwʔ bʕwdrnkwn/bʕdrkwn#3#/

20:19	wqmw lwyʔ mn bny qht wmn bny qwrḥ lmšbḥw lmryʔ/qdm mryʔ#3#/ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl bqlʔ rmʔ/{dmʔ}#2#/
20:20	wqdmw bṣprʔ wnpqw lmdbrʔ dtqwʕ wkd npqw qm/qdm#2#/ yhwšpṭ wʔmr šwmʕwny dbyt yhwdʔ wʕmwryh dʔršlm whymnw bmryʔ ʔlhkwn wtthymnwn whymnw bnbywhy wttprqwn
20:21	wqm bmṣʕt ʕmʔ wʔmr tw nwdʔ lmryʔ wnšbḥ lhdrʔ dqdyšwth kd npq qdm ḥylwtn wʕbd ln qrbʔ ʕm bʕldbbyn wʔmryn ʔwdw lmryʔ \dṭb hw wlʕlm /dlʕlm#3#/ ṭybwth rmtʔ šry mšbḥn wṭwrʔ šryw dyṣyn
20:24	wyhwdʔ ʔtʔ lh \lṭwrʔ ddwqʔ /ldwqʔ#3#/ dmdbrʔ wḥzw whʔ klhwn pgryhwn mytyn wrmyn ʕl ʔrʕʔ wlʔ ʔyt ʔnš dplṭ mnhwn
20:25	wʔtʔ yhwšpṭ wʕmʔ dʔysryl lmbz bzthwn wʔškḥw bhwn bztʔ swgʔʔ/sgyʔtʔ#2#/ dṭb wqnynʔ wpgwdʔ drkšʔ/wrkšʔ#3#/ wmʔnʔ drgtʔ wšqlw lhwn mdm dṣbw whwʔ/whʔ#3#/ mn btr tltʔ ywmyn kd bzw bztʔ mṭwl dsgyʔʔ hwt ṭb

20:29	wnplt dḥlth dmryʔ ʕl kwlhyn mdyntʔ wʕl mlkwthyn kd šmʕw dmryʔ <hw#3#> mtktš ʕm bʕldbbwhy dʔysryl
20:30	wʔttnyḥt mlkwth dyhwšpṭ mn qʔrsʔ/qrbʔ#3#/ wʔnyḥh ʔlhʔ mn klhwn bʕly tḥwmh

20:32	whlk bklhyn ʔwrḥth dʔsʔ ʔbwhy wlʔ hpk mnhyn lmʕbd dšpyr qdm mryʔ
20:33	blḥwd ʕlwtʔ lʔ ʔʕbr/ʔtʕqry#3#/ ʕdmʔ lhšʔ wʕmʔ lʔ ʔtqnw lbhwn lʔlhʔ dʔbhthwn
20:34	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy dyhwšpṭ qdmyʔ wʔḥryʔ hʔ hnwn ktybyn bptgmwhy dyhw br ḥnn dktyb bspr mlky ʔysryl
20:35	wbtr hlyn ʔtqrb yhwšpṭ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ lwt/ʕm#3#/ ʔḥzyʔ mlkʔ dʔysryl/dhww bʔysrʔyl#3#/ hw ršyʕʔ dʔsgy lmʕbd byštʔ mn kwlhwn mlkʔ dʔysryl

21:01	wškb yhwšpṭ ʕm ʔbhth wʔtqbr lwt/ʕm#3#/ ʔbhth bqrytʔ ddwyd wqm bmlkwtʔ yhwrm brh btrh
21:02	wlh ʔyt hww ʔḥʔ \bny yhwšpṭ /bnwhy dyhwšpṭ#3#/ whlyn šmhyhwn ʕzryʔ nḥwʔyl zkryʔ ʕzryʔ mlkʔyl šbṭyʔ hlyn klhwn bnwhy dyhwšpṭ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ
21:03	wyhb lhwn ʔbwhwn mwhbtʔ sgy kspʔ/sʔmʔ#3#/ wdhbʔ wmwhbtʔ sgyʔtʔ wqwryʔ ʕšyntʔ dyhwdʔ wmlkwtʔ ʔtyhbt lyhwrm mṭl dhwyw hwʔ brh qšyšʔ
21:04	wqm yhwrm \ʕl mlkwtʔ /bmlkwtʔ#3#/ dʔbwhy wʔtgbr/wʔtgnbr#3#/ wqṭl lklhwn ʔḥwhy bqrbʔ/bqʔrsʔ#3#/ wʔp mn qšyšʔ dʔysryl qṭl/ḥrb#3#/
21:05	br tltyn hwʔ wtrtyn šnyn <ywrm#3#> kd qm bmlkwtʔ wtmnʔ šnyn ʔmlk bʔwršlm
21:06	whlk bʔwrḥtʔ dmlkʔ dysryl ʔyknʔ dʕbdw dbyt ʔḥb mṭl dḥth/dbrth#3#/ dʔḥb hwt lh ʔnttʔ wʔbd dbyš qdm mryʔ
21:07	wlʔ ṣbʔ mryʔ \lmḥblw byth /dnḥbl lbyth#3#/ ddwyd mṭl mwmtʔ dymʔ ldwyd lmtl lh šrgʔ nhyrʔ wlbnwhy klhwn ywmtʔ
21:08	bywmth mrdw ʔdwmyʔ mn tḥyt ʔydʔ dyhwdʔ wʔqymw ʕlyhwn mlkʔ
21:09	wʕbr yhwrm ʕm rwrbnwhy wklhwn zwgwhy ʕmh whwʔ dkd qm bllyʔ ḥrbw lʔdwmyʔ wʔtw lwth rwrbnʔ dzwgʔ
21:10	wmrdw ʔdwmyʔ mn tḥyt ʔydʔ dyhwdʔ ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ hydyn mrdw ʔdwmyʔ dytbyn/dʕmryn#3#/ blbnʔ bzbnʔ hw mn tḥyt ʔydh mṭl dšbq lmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbhth

22:02	br ʕsryn hwʔ wtrtyn šnyn ʔḥzyʔ kd qm bmlkwtʔ wšntʔ ḥdʔ ʔmlk bʔwršlm wšmh dʔmh ʕtlyʔ brt ʕmry

25:11	wʔmwṣyʔ ʔtgbr/ʔtgnbr#3#/ wdbr ʕmh wʔzl/wʔʕl#2#/ lnḥlʔ dmlḥʔ wqṭl wḥrb lbny ṭwrʔ dgbl/{rgbl}#2#/ ʕsrʔ ʔlpyn
25:12	wʕsrʔ ʔlpyn kd ḥyyn ʔḥdw ʔnwn bny yhwdʔ wʔyty ʔnwn lryš kʔpʔ wklhwn ʔtw kd ʔsyryn bššltʔ

29:31	wʕnʔ ḥzqyʔ <mlkʔ#3#> wʔmr mkyl dʔtqrbtwn/ʔtqrbtwn#3#/ lʔwrḥh dmryʔ qrwbw/wqrbw#3#/ wʔytw ly dbḥʔ wtwdytʔ lbyth dmryʔ wʔytyw ʕmʔ dbḥʔ wtwdytʔ wkl mdm/mʔ#3#/ dṣbʔ hwʔ lbhwn mytyn hww

32:14	mnw ʔyt bklhwn ʔlhyhwn dʕmmʔ hlyn dḥrbw ʔbhy dʔškḥw lmpṣyw mdynthwn mn ʔydy dmškḥ mryʔ lmpṣywtkwn mn ʔydy
32:15	wʔp hšʔ lʔ nṭʕykwn ḥzqyʔ wlʔ ntklkwn ʕl hdʔ lʔ thymnwnyhy mṭl dlʔ mškḥ ʔlhkwn lmpṣywtkwn mn ʔydy kl ʕmmʔ wmlkwtʔ/dmlkwtʔ#3#/ lʔ ʔškḥw lmpṣyw mdynthwn mn ʔydy wmn ʔydʔ dʔbhy wʔp ʔlhkwn lʔ mškḥ lmpṣywtkwn mn ʔydy

32:18	wqrw bqlʔ rmʔ blšnʔ yhwdyʔ lʕmʔ dytbyn ʕl šwrʔ dʔwršlm dndḥlwn ʔnwn wnzyʕwn ʔnwn mṭwl dnʔḥdwn šwrʔ dmdyntʔ
32:19	wmllw bʔlhʔ dʕmmʔ dʔrʕʔ wʔp bʔlhʔ dšlyṭ bʔwršlm dhw/whw#3#/ nprwʕ ʔnwn ʕbdʔ dʔydyhwn
32:20	wṣly ḥzqyʔ wʔšʕyʔ br ʔmwṣ nbyʔ mṭl hdʔ wšmʕ mryʔ bqlʔ dṣlwthwn
32:21	wšdr mryʔ mlʔkʔ mn qdmwhy wḥrb klhwn gnbry ḥylʔ wmlkʔ/wmlʔkʔ#3#/ wšlyṭnʔ dhww bmšryth dmlkʔ dʔtwr whpk mlkʔ dʔtwr kd bhytn ʔpwhy lmdynth wʔtʔ lbyt ʔlhwhy wbnwhy dnpqw mn mʕwhy tmn qṭlwhy bḥrbʔ
32:22	wprq mryʔ lḥzqyʔ/lmdbḥʔ dʔwršlm wlḥzqyʔ#3#/ wlklhwn ʕmwryh dʔwršlm mn ʔydwhy dsnḥyryb mlkʔ dʔtwr wmn ʔydʔ dkl bʕly tḥwmhwn
32:23	wsgyʔʔ mn bny ʔysryl mytyn/dmytyn#3#/ hww qwrbnʔ lmryʔ lʔwršlm wyhbyn hww mwhbtʔ lḥzqyʔ mlkʔ dbyt yhwdʔ wʔttrym lʕl mn klhwn ʕmmʔ wmn btr hlyn
32:24	bywmtʔ hnwn ʔtkrh ḥzqyʔ ʕdmʔ lmwtʔ/lmmt#3#/ wṣly qdm mryʔ wʔmr <lh#3#> gbrwtʔ/tdmrtʔ#3#/ sgyʔtʔ ʕbdt ly/ʕmy#3#/
32:25	wlʔ <hwʔ#3#> ʔyk ʕbd ʔydy ʔhpkt ly whnʔ dʔtkrh ḥzqyʔ mṭl dʔttrym lbh whwʔ ʕlwhy rwgzʔ wʕl dbyt yhwdʔ wʕl ʕmwryh dʔwršlm
32:26	wʔtkrh ḥzqyʔ brmwtʔ dlbh hw wʕmwryh dʔršlm wlʔ ʔtʔ ʕlyhwn rwgzh dmryʔ bywmwhy dḥzqyʔ
32:27	whwʔ lḥzqyʔ ʕwtrʔ wʔyqrʔ swgʔʔ dṭb wʔwṣrʔ ʕbd lh lkspʔ wldhbʔ wlkʔpʔ ṭbtʔ wlbsmʔ wlmrgnytʔ/wlmgnʔ#3#/wlmgdʔ#3#/ wlmʔny rgt/kl#3#/ rgtʔ
32:28	wʔwṣrʔ \lʕlltʔ dʕbwrʔ /ʕbd lʕbwrʔ#3#/ wdḥmrʔ/wlḥmrʔ#3#/ wmšḥʔ/wdmšḥʔ#3#/wlmšḥʔ#3#/ wʔwrwtʔ lklh bʕyrʔ
32:29	wqwryʔ lbʕyrʔ wlʕnʔ wltwrʔ wlḥywtʔ mṭl dyhb lh mryʔ qnynʔ swgʔʔ dṭb
32:30	whw ḥzqyʔ ṭmr mpqnʔ \dmyʔ dʕynʔ /dymʔ dymtʔ#3#/ ʕlytʔ wšdʔ ʔnwn lgbʔ/lgwbʔ#3#/ mʕrbyʔ/mdnḥyʔ#2#/ lqryth/dqryth#3#/ ddwyd wʔṣlḥ/wʔkšr#3#/ ḥzqyʔ bklhwn ʕbdwhy

32:32	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy dḥzqyʔ wṭybwth wʔwrḥth špyrtʔ hʔ hnwn ktybyn bnbywth dʔšʕyʔ br ʔmwṣ nbyʔ wʔp bsprʔ dmlkʔ dyhwdʔ wdʔysryl
32:33	wškb ḥzqyʔ ʕm ʔbhth wqbrwhy bqrytʔ/bqbwrth#3#/ ddwyd wʔyqrʔ rbʔ ʕbdw lh bmwth klhwn dbyt yhwdʔ whpkw lʔwršlm wʔmlk mnšʔ brh btrh
33:01	br trtʕsrʔ/tltʕsrʔ#3#/ hwʔ šnyn mnšʔ kd qm bmlkwtʔ wḥmšyn wḥmš šnyn ʔmlk bʔwršlm

33:07	wsmh lṣlmʔ dʔrbʕ ʔpyn dʕbd bbyth dmryʔ dʔmr mryʔ ldwyd wlšlymwn brh bbytʔ hnʔ bʔwršlm dgbyt ly mn klhwn šbṭʔ dʔysryl ʔšrʔ/dʔšrʔ#3#/ škynty/mškny#3#/ lʕlm
33:08	wlʔ ʔwsp twb lmpqw lʔysryl mn ʔrʕʔ hdʔ dyhbt lʔbhyhwn blḥwd ʔnhw dnṭrwn lmʕbd klmdm dpqdt ʔnwn wlklh nmwsʔ wlqymwhy wldynwhy dpqd ʔnwn ʕbdy mwšʔ

33:13	wṣly qdm mryʔ wšmʕ bqlh wqbl ṣlwth/bʕwth#3#/ wʔhpkh lʔwršlm lmlkwth wydʕ mnšʔ dmryʔ hw ʔlhʔ

34:03	wbtmnʔ šnyn lmlkwth ʕdmʔ lhšʔ hw ṭlyʔ hwʔ zʕwrʔ wšry hwʔ lmṣlyw lʔlhh/lmryʔ ʔlhh#2#/ ddwyd ʔbwhy wbšnt trtʕsrʔ šnyn šry hwʔ lmdkyw lyhwdʔ wlʕmwryh dʔwršlm wšry hwʔ lmʕqr ʕlwtʔ wptkrʔ/dptkrʔ#3#/ wnmrʔ wḥwgbʔ wʕqʔ wzgʔ

34:21	zlw ṣlw qdm mryʔ/ʔlhʔ#2#/ ʕly wʕl ʕmʔ dʔysryl wʕl yhwdʔ ʕl ptgmwhy dsprʔ hnʔ dʔštkḥ mṭl dsgyʔʔ hy ḥmth dmryʔ \dhy ʔtyʔ /dʔtyʔ#2#/ ʕly wʕl ʕmʔ dʔysryl wʕl yhwdʔ ʕl ptgmwhy dsprʔ hnʔ dʔštkḥ mṭl dsgyʔʔ hy ḥmth dmryʔ dhy ʔtyʔ ʕlyn ʕl dlʔ šmʕw ʔbhyn lptgmwhy dmryʔ lmʕbd kl mʔ dktyb ʕlyn bsprʔ hnʔ

34:24	hknʔ ʔmr mryʔ hʔ mytʔ ʔnʔ byštʔ ʕl ʔtrʔ hnʔ wʕl ʕmwrwhy klhyn lwṭtʔ \dktybn ʕl sprʔ /dktyb bsprʔ#2#/ dqrw qdm mlkʔ dyhwdʔ

34:27	ḥlp dʔttbr lbk wzʕt mn qdm mryʔ kd šmʕt ptgmʔ hlyn dmytʔ ʔnʔ ʕl ʔtrʔ hnʔ wʕl ʕmwrwhy wʔttbrt qdmy wsdqt nḥtyk wbkyt qdmy wʔp ʔnʔ šmʕt ʔmr mryʔ

34:32	wqdm kl mn dʔštkḥ bʔwršlm wbbnymyn/wbnymyn#3#/ wʕbrw ʕmwrʔ dʔwršlm bqymʔ dmryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbhthwn
34:33	wʔʕbr ywšyʔ ʕbdʔ snyʔ dʔwbd/dʔmr#3#/ mryʔ mn qdm bny ʔysryl wʕbdw/wʕbrw#2#/ <lmwbdw#3#> kwlh ʕmʔ \dʔštkḥ bʔysryl /dʔysryl#2#/ wplḥw lmryʔ ʔlhhwn wlʔ sṭw mn btr <mryʔ#3#> ʔlhʔ dʔbhthwn
35:01	wʕbd ywšyʔ bʔwršlm ʕʔdʔ lmryʔ wʕbd ʕʔdʔ bʔrbʕsrʔ byrḥʔ qdmyʔ

35:04	wʔtqnw lbkwn wlbʔ dʔbhtkwn ʔyknʔ dktb dwyd mlkʔ dʔysryl wʔyknʔ dktb šlymwn brh

35:06	wkwsw pṣḥʔ wʔtqdšw wʔtqnw lbʔ dʔḥykwn \dnʕbdwn ʔyknʔ /nʕbdwn mn#3#/ dmll mryʔ ʕm ʔḥykwn/mwšʔ#3#/
35:07	wprš ywšyʔ lbny ʕmʔ ʕnʔ <wtwrʔ#3#> wʔmrʔ wṣpryʔ dʕzʔ hlyn klhwn lpṣḥʔ lkl dʔštkḥ bmnynʔ tltyn ʔlpyn wtwrʔ tltʔ ʔlpyn hlyn mn qnynʔ dmlkʔ
35:08	wdrwrbnwhy/wrwrbnwhy#3#/ pršw lʕmʔ lkhnʔ wllwyʔ pršw ḥlqyʔ/lḥlqyʔ#3#/ wzkryʔ wnḥʔyl rwrbny byth dmryʔ lkhnʔ wyhbw lpṣḥʔ <ʕnʔ#3#> ʔlpʔ tryn wštmʔʔ wʕnʔ/wtwrʔ#3#/ tltmʔʔ
35:09	wknʕyʔ wšmʕyʔ br ʔḥwhy wḥšbyʔ wydʕʔyl ʔpršw llwyʔ lpṣḥʔ ʕnʔ ḥmšʔ ʔlpyn wtwrʔ ḥmšmʔʔ

35:11	wnksw pṣḥʔ ʔyk pwqdnʔ dmlkʔ wʔrzpw khnʔ mn dmʔ wlwyʔ nšṭyn
35:12	wyhbyn ʕlwtʔ lplgwtʔ dʔbhyhwn dbny ʕmʔ lmqrbw lmryʔ ʔyk/ʔyknʔ#3#/ dktyb bnmwsʔ/bsprʔ#3#/bsprʔ dnmwsʔ#3#/ dmwšʔ whknʔ mqrbyn hww bkl ṣpr wṣpr
35:13	wbšlw pṣḥʔ bnwrʔ ʔyknʔ/ʔyk#3#/ dmtbʕʔ lh wqwdšh bšlw bnwrʔ bqdsʔ wʔyrʔ/wbʔyrʔ#3#/ wqrdlʔ/wbqrdlʔ#3#/ wrhṭw kl bny ʕmʔ
35:14	wmn btr hlyn ṭybw khnʔ lhwn dylhwn mṭl dkhnʔ bnwhy dʔhrwn hww wmsqyn hww ʕlwtʔ wtrbʔ ʕdmʔ llwyʔ wlwyʔ ṭybw lhwn wlkhnʔ bnwhy dʔhrwn
35:15	dmšmšyn/wmšmšyn hww#3#/ bnwhy dʔsp ʕl dwkthwn ʔyk pwqdnh ddwyd wknš hmn wyrytwn ḥzwyʔ/ḥnwyʔ#3#/ dmlkʔ wnṭry trʕʔ dbkl trʕ wtrʕ dlyt lhwn mdm lmbṭlw/lmbṭl#3#/ mn kl ʕbydthwn mṭl dʔḥyhwn ṭybw lhwn
35:16	wʔtṭybt klh ʕbydtʔ dmryʔ bywmʔ hw lmʕbd pṣḥʔ wʕlwtʔ qrbw ʕl mdbḥh dmryʔ ʔyk pwqdnh dmlkʔ ywšyʔ
35:17	wʕbdw bny ʔysryl dʔštkḥw pṣḥʔ bh bzbnʔ/bywmʔ#2#/ hw wʕʔdʔ/wʕbdw ʕʔdʔ#3#/ dpṭyrʔ šbʕʔ ywmyn
35:18	dlʔ/wlʔ#3#/ ʔtʕbd ʕʔdʔ bʔysryl ʔyk hw mn ywmwhy dšmwʔyl nbyʔ wkl mlkʔ dʔysryl lʔ ʕbdw ʔyk hw pṣḥʔ dʕbd ywšyʔ wkhnʔ wlwyʔ wklh yhwdʔ wʔysrʔyl dʔštkḥw \hww bʔršlm /hpkw lʔwršlm#3#/
35:19	wbtmnʕsrʔ šnyn lmlkwth dywšyʔ ʔtʕbd ʕʔdʔ hnʔ
35:20	btr klhyn hlyn dʔtqn ywšyʔ ṣbwth dbytʔ slq prʕwn ḥgyrʔ mlkʔ dmṣryn lmtktšw ʕl mbwg dʕl prt wnpq ywšyʔ lʔwrʕh
35:21	wšdr lwth ʔyzgdʔ wʔmr lh mnʔ ʔyt ly ʕmk mlkʔ dyhwdʔ lʔ hwʔ ʕlyk ʔtʔ ʔnʔ ywmnʔ mlkʔ dyhwdʔ mṭl dlʔ hwʔ ʕlyk/ʕmk#3#/ ʔtʔ ʔnʔ lmtktšw mryʔ ʔmr lk lmdḥlwtny/lmdḥlwty#2#/ prwq lk mny ʔlhʔ dʕmy lʔ/dlʔ#2#/ nḥblk
35:22	wlʔ ʔpny ʔpwhy mnh ywšyʔ mṭl dlmtktšw wlmʕbd qrbʔ ʔzl hwʔ wlʔ šmʕ lptgmwhy/ptgmwhy#3#/ dprʕwn ḥgyrʔ wlʔ ydʕ hwʔ ywšyʔ dmn qdm mryʔ hwt wnpq <hwʔ#3#> lmtktšw ʕmh bpqʕtʔ dmgdw
35:23	wmḥʔ prʕwn ḥgyrʔ lywšyʔ tryn gʔryn wʔmr mlkʔ lʕbdwhy ʔʕbrwny/dʔʕbrwny#2#/ mṭl dmḥwtʔ dmwtʔ mḥʔ ʔnʔ
35:24	wʔʕbrwhy ʕbdwhy mn mrkbtʔ/zwgʔ#2#/ wʔwtbwhy bqrwkʔ/bzwgʔ#3#/ dmlkwtʔ dylh wʔwblwhy lʔwršlm wmyt wqbrwhy bqbrʔ dʔbhth wkwlhwn dbyt yhwdʔ wʕmwryh dʔwršlm nṭryn hww ʔblʔ ʕl ywšyʔ
35:25	wʔlʔ ʔrmyʔ ʕl ywšyʔ wʔmr kl zdyqʔ wzdyqtʔ bʔwlytkyn ʕl/dʕl#3#/ ywšyʔ bkyyn wʕdmʔ lywmnʔ yhb ʔnyn lqymʔ dʔysryl whnyn/whlyn#3#/ ktybn bspr ʔwlytʔ
35:26	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy wywšyʔ wṭybwth ʔyk dktyb bnmwsh dmryʔ
35:27	wptgmwhy qdmyʔ wʔḥry <hʔ#3#> hnwn ktybyn bspr/ʕl spr#3#/ mlkʔ \dʔysryl wdyhwdʔ /dyhwdʔ wdʔysrʔyl#3#/
36:01	wdbrw ʕmʔ dʔrʕʔ lyhwʔḥz br ywšyʔ wʔqymwhy bmlkwtʔ btr ʔbwhy bʔwršlm
36:02	br ʕsryn/trtʕsrʔ#3#/ hwʔ wtlt/#3#/ šnyn yhwʔḥz kd qm bmlkwtʔ wtltʔ yrḥyn ʔmlk <hwʔ#3#> bʔwršlm
36:03	wʔʕbrh mlkʔ dmṣryn
36:04	wʔqym lʔlyqym ʔḥwhy ʕl dbyt yhwdʔ wʕl ʕmwryh dʔwršlm wšmy šmh ywyqym wlyhwʔḥz ʔḥwhy dbr prʕwn ḥgyrʔ wʔwblh lmṣryn wmyt tmn
36:05	br ʕsryn <hwʔ#2#> wḥmš šnyn ywyqym kd qm bmlkwtʔ wḥdʕsrʔ šnyn ʔmlk bʔwršlm wʕbd dbyš qdm mryʔ ʔlhh
36:06	ʕlwhy slq nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl wʔsrh bššltʔ lmwblwth lbbl

36:08	wšrkʔ dptgmwhy dywyqym wsnytʔ dʕbd \hʔ hnyn ktybn /hnwn ktybyn#3#/ ʕl sprʔ dmlkʔ \dʔysryl wdyhwdʔ /dyhwdʔ wdʔysrʔyl#3#/ wʔmlk ywykyn brh btrh
36:09	br tmnʕsrʔ hwʔ šnyn ywykyn kd qm bmlkwtʔ wmʔʔ ywmyn ʔmlk bʔwršlm wʕbd dbyš qdm mryʔ
36:10	wlḥdth dšntʔ šdr/slq#3#/ ʕlwhy nbwkdnṣr mlkʔ dbbl wʔytyh lbbl lh wlmʔny rgtʔ dhww/dʔyt#3#/ bbyth dmryʔ wʔqym/wʔmlk#3#/ lṣdqyʔ ddh bmlkwtʔ ʕl yhwdʔ wʕl ʔwršlm
36:11	br ʕsryn hwʔ wḥdʔ šnyn ṣdqyʔ kd qm bmlkwtʔ wḥdʕsrʔ šnyn ʔmlk bʔwršlm
36:12	wʕbd dbyš qdm mryʔ ʔlhh wlʔ dḥl mn ʔrmyʔ nbyʔ dmtnbʔ hwʔ ʔyk dmn pwmh dmryʔ
36:13	wʔp ʕl/bmlkʔ#3#/ nbwkdnṣr mrd dymʔ hwʔ lh bšmh dmryʔ wqšy qdlh wqšy lbh wlʔ ṣbʔ lmṣlyw qdm mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔysryl
36:14	wʔp <kl#3#> qšyšʔ dkhnʔ wdlwyʔ wdʕmʔ ʔsgyw lmkdbw kdbwtʔ ʔyk klhwn ʕbdʔ dʕmmʔ wṭmʔw byth dmryʔ qdyšʔ dbʔwršlm
36:15	wšdr mryʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbhyhwn ʕlyhwn bʔydʔ dmlʔkwhy mqdmyn wmḥškyn mṭl dḥs ʕl ʕmh wʕl ʕnʔ dgbʔ/dmryʔ#3#/
36:16	whww gḥkyn ʕl mlʔkwhy dmryʔ wmbsryn/wmmsryn#3#/ ʕl mlyhwn wgḥkyn ʕl nbywhy ʕdmʔ dslqt ḥmth dmryʔ bʕmh ʕdmʔ lʔykʔ dlʔ hwt lhwn ʔsyw
36:17	wʔsq ʕlyhwn lmlkʔ dkldyʔ wqṭl ʕlymyhwn bḥrbʔ byt mqdšhwn wlʔ ḥs ʕl gdwdʔ wʕl btwltʔ wʕl qšyšʔ ʔp lʔ ʕl ynqy ḥlbʔ/tdyʔ#3#/ klhwn ʔšlm bʔydh
36:18	wkwl mʔny byth dmryʔ rwrbʔ wdqdqʔ wgzʔ dbyth dmryʔ wgzʔ dmlkʔ wdšlyṭnwhy klh ʔwbl lbbl
36:19	wʔwqdh lbyth dmryʔ wʕqr šwryh/lšwrʔ#3#/ dʔwršlm wklhyn sḥrth ʔwqd bnwrʔ wkl mʔnʔ drgtʔ ḥbl
36:20	wʔpq bšbyʔ lʔylyn/ʔylyn#3#/ dplṭw mn ḥrbʔ lbbl whww lh ʕbdʔ wlbnwhy ʕdmʔ lʔykʔ dʔšlm mlkwtʔ lprsyʔ
36:21	dtšlm mlth dmryʔ dmll hwʔ ʔrmyʔ nbyʔ ʕdmʔ dttnyḥ ʔrʕʔ bšbyh kl ywmtʔ dtṣdʔ/tṣdʔ#3#/ lmšlm šbʕyn šnyn
36:22	bšnt ḥdʔ lkwrš mlkʔ prsyʔ/dprs#3#/ dtšlm mlth dmryʔ bpwmh dʔrmyʔ nbyʔ ʔʕyr mryʔ rwḥh dkwrš mlkʔ prsyʔ/dprsyʔ#3#/ wʔʕbr qlʔ bklh mlkwth wʔp bktbʔ ʔmyr hwʔ šmh
36:23	hknʔ ʔmr <hwʔ#3#> kwrš mlkʔ prsyʔ/dprs#3#/ kwl mlkwtʔ dʔrʕʔ yhb ly mryʔ ʔlhʔ dšmyʔ/qrbtnʔ#2#/ whw pqd ʕly dʔbnʔ lh bytʔ bʔwršlm dbyhwd mnw ʔyt bkwn mn klh ʕmʔ dmryʔ ʔlhh ṣbʔ bh nsq nʔtʔ lwty
99:99	\šlm ktbʔ dspr dbrymyn wdyhwdʔ /šlm ktbʔ dspr dwbr ywmtʔ dmlkʔ dyhwdʔ dmtqrʔ spr dbrymyn#3#/ šlm spr dbrymyn#3#/
01:01	ktbʔ dylydwth dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ brh ddwyd brh dʔbrhm
01:02	ʔbrhm ʔwld lʔysḥq ʔysḥq ʔwld lyʕqwb yʕqwb ʔwld lyhwdʔ wlʔḥwhy
01:03	yhwdʔ ʔwld lprṣ wlzrḥ mn tmr prṣ ʔwld lḥṣrwn ḥṣrwn ʔwld lʔrm
01:04	ʔrm ʔwld lʕmyndb ʕmyndb ʔwld lnḥšwn nḥšwn ʔwld lslmwn
01:05	slmwn ʔwld lbʕz mn rḥb bʕz ʔwld lʕwbyd mn rʕwt ʕwbyd ʔwld lʔyšy
01:06	ʔyšy ʔwld ldwyd mlkʔ dwyd ʔwld lšlymwn mn ʔntth dʔwryʔ
01:07	šlymwn ʔwld lrḥbʕm rḥbʕm ʔwld lʔbyʔ ʔbyʔ ʔwld lʔsʔ
01:08	ʔsʔ ʔwld lyhwšpṭ yhwšpṭ ʔwld lywrm ywrm ʔwld lʕwzyʔ
01:09	ʕwzyʔ ʔwld lywtm ywtm ʔwld lʔḥz ʔḥz ʔwld lḥzqyʔ
01:10	ḥzqyʔ ʔwld lmnšʔ mnšʔ ʔwld lʔmwn ʔmwn ʔwld lywšyʔ
01:11	ywšyʔ ʔwld lywknyʔ wlʔḥwhy bglwtʔ dbbl
01:12	mn btr glwtʔ dyn dbbl ywknyʔ ʔwld lšltʔyl šltʔyl ʔwld lzwrbbl
01:13	zwrbbl ʔwld lʔbywd ʔbywd ʔwld lʔlyqym ʔlyqym ʔwld lʕzwr
01:14	ʕzwr ʔwld lzdwq zdwq ʔwld lʔkyn ʔkyn ʔwld lʔlywd

01:16	yʕqwb ʔwld lywsp gbrh dmrym dmnh ʔtyld yšwʕ dmtqrʔ mšyḥʔ
01:17	klhyn hkyl šrbtʔ mn ʔbrhm ʕdmʔ ldwyd šrbtʔ ʔrbʕsrʔ wmn dwyd ʕdmʔ lglwtʔ dbbl šrbtʔ ʔrbʕsrʔ wmn glwtʔ dbbl ʕdmʔ lmšyḥʔ šrbtʔ ʔrbʕsrʔ

01:19	ywsp dyn bʕlh kʔnʔ hwʔ wlʔ ṣbʔ dnprsyh wʔtrʕy hwʔ dmṭšyʔyt nšryh
01:20	kd hlyn dyn ʔtrʕy ʔtḥzy lh mlʔkʔ dmryʔ bḥlmʔ wʔmr lh ywsp brh ddwyd lʔ tdḥl lmsb lmrym ʔnttk hw gyr dʔtyld bh mn rwḥʔ hw dqwdšʔ

02:01	kd dyn ʔtyld yšwʕ bbyt lḥm dyhwdʔ bywmy hrwds mlkʔ ʔtw mgwšʔ mn mdnḥʔ lʔwršlm

02:17	hydyn ʔtmly mdm dʔtʔmr byd ʔrmyʔ nbyʔ dʔmr
02:18	qlʔ ʔštmʕ brmtʔ bkyʔ wʔlyʔ sgyʔʔ rḥyl bkyʔ ʕl bnyh wlʔ ṣbyʔ lmtbyʔw mṭl dlʔ ʔytyhwn 
02:19	kd myt dyn hrwds mlkʔ ʔtḥzy mlʔkʔ dmryʔ bḥlmʔ lywsp bmṣryn
02:20	wʔmr lh qwm dbr lṭlyʔ wlʔmh wzl lʔrʕʔ dʔysrʔyl mytw lhwn gyr hnwn dbʕyn hww npšh dṭlyʔ
02:21	wywsp qm dbr lṭlyʔ wlʔmh wʔtʔ lʔrʕʔ dʔysrʔyl

02:23	wʔtʔ ʕmr bmdyntʔ dmtqryʔ nṣrt ʔyk dntmlʔ mdm dʔtʔmr bnbyʔ dnṣryʔ ntqrʔ
03:01	bhwn dyn bywmtʔ hnwn ʔtʔ ywḥnn mʕmdnʔ wmkrz hwʔ bḥwrbʔ dyhwd
03:02	wʔmr twbw qrbt lh mlkwtʔ dšmyʔ
03:03	hnw gyr hw dʔmyr byd ʔšʕyʔ nbyʔ qlʔ dqrʔ bḥwrbʔ ṭybw ʔwrḥh dmryʔ wʔšww lšbylwhy
03:04	hw dyn ywḥnn ʔytwhy hwʔ lbwšh dsʕrʔ dgmlʔ wʔsr ḥṣʔ dmškʔ ʕl ḥṣwhy wmʔkwlth qmṣʔ wdbšʔ dbrʔ

03:08	ʕbdw hkyl pʔrʔ dšwyn ltybwtʔ
03:09	wlʔ tsbrwn wtʔmrwn bnpškwn dʔbʔ ʔyt ln ʔbrhm ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn gyr dmškḥ ʔlhʔ mn hlyn kʔpʔ lmqmw bnyʔ lʔbrhm
03:10	hʔ dyn nrgʔ sym ʕl ʕqrʔ dʔylnʔ kl ʔylnʔ hkyl dpʔrʔ ṭbʔ lʔ ʕbd mtpsq wnpl bnwrʔ
03:11	ʔnʔ mʕmd ʔnʔ lkwn bmyʔ ltybwtʔ hw dyn dbtry ʔtʔ ḥsyn hw mny hw dlʔ šwʔ ʔnʔ msnwhy lmšql hw mʕmd lkwn brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ wbnwrʔ
03:12	hw drpšʔ bʔydh wmdkʔ ʔdrwhy wḥṭʔ knš lʔwṣrwhy wtbnʔ mwqd bnwrʔ dlʔ dʕkʔ
03:13	hydyn ʔtʔ yšwʕ mn glylʔ lywrdnn lwt ywḥnn dnʕmd mnh
03:14	hw dyn ywḥnn klʔ hwʔ lh wʔmr ʔnʔ snyq ʔnʔ dmnk ʔtʕmd wʔnt lwty ʔtyt
03:15	hw dyn yšwʕ ʕnʔ wʔmr lh šbwq hšʔ hknʔ gyr yʔʔ ln dnmlʔ klh kʔnwtʔ whydyn šbqh
03:16	kd ʕmd dyn yšwʕ mḥdʔ slq mn myʔ wʔtptḥw lh šmyʔ wḥzʔ rwḥʔ dʔlhʔ dnḥtʔ ʔyk ywnʔ wʔtt ʕlwhy
03:17	whʔ qlʔ mn šmyʔ dʔmr hnw bry ḥbybʔ dbh ʔṣṭbyt
04:01	hydyn yšwʕ ʔtdbr mn rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ lmdbrʔ dntnsʔ mn ʔklqrṣʔ
04:02	wṣm ʔrbʕyn ywmyn wʔrbʕyn lylwn ʔḥryt dyn kpn
04:03	wqrb hw dmnsʔ wʔmr lh ʔn brh ʔnt dʔlhʔ ʔmr dhlyn kʔpʔ nhwyn lḥmʔ
04:04	hw dyn ʕnʔ wʔmr ktyb dlʔ hwʔ blḥmʔ blḥwd ḥyʔ brnšʔ ʔlʔ bkl mlʔ dnpqʔ mn pwmh dʔlhʔ
04:05	hydyn dbrh ʔklqrṣʔ lmdynt qwdšʔ wʔqymh ʕl knpʔ dhyklʔ
04:06	wʔmr lh ʔn brh ʔnt dʔlhʔ šdy npšk ltḥt ktyb gyr dlmlʔkwhy npqd ʕlyk wʕl ʔydyhwn nšqlwnk dlʔ ttql bkʔpʔ rglk
04:07	ʔmr lh yšwʕ twb ktyb dlʔ tnsʔ lmryʔ ʔlhk
04:08	twb dbrh ʔklqrṣʔ lṭwrʔ dṭb rm wḥwyh klhyn mlkwtʔ dʕlmʔ wšwbḥhyn
04:09	wʔmr lh hlyn klhyn lk ʔtl ʔn tpl tsgwd ly
04:10	hydyn ʔmr lh yšwʕ zl lk sṭnʔ ktyb gyr dlmryʔ ʔlhk tsgwd wlh blḥwdwhy tplwḥ
04:11	hydyn šbqh ʔklqrṣʔ whʔ mlʔkʔ qrbw wmšmšyn hww lh
04:12	kd šmʕ dyn yšwʕ dywḥnn ʔštlm šny lh lglylʔ
04:13	wšbqh lnṣrt wʔtʔ ʕmr bkprnḥwm ʕl yd ymʔ btḥwmʔ dzbwlwn wdnptly
04:14	dntmlʔ mdm dʔtʔmr byd ʔšʕyʔ nbyʔ dʔmr
04:15	ʔrʕʔ dzbwlwn ʔrʕʔ dnptly ʔwrḥʔ dymʔ ʕbrwhy dywrdnn glylʔ dʕmmʔ
04:16	ʕmʔ dytb bḥšwkʔ nwhrʔ rbʔ ḥzʔ wʔylyn dytbyn bʔtrʔ wbṭllʔ dmwtʔ nwhrʔ dnḥ lhwn
04:17	mn hydyn šry yšwʕ lmkrzw wlmʔmr twbw qrbt lh gyr mlkwtʔ dšmyʔ
04:18	wkd mhlk ʕl yd ymʔ dglylʔ ḥzʔ tryn ʔḥyn šmʕwn dʔtqry kʔpʔ wʔndrʔws ʔḥwhy drmyn mṣydtʔ bymʔ ʔytyhwn hww gyr ṣydʔ
04:19	wʔmr lhwn yšwʕ tw btry wʔʕbdkwn dthwwn ṣydʔ dbny ʔnšʔ
04:20	hnwn dyn mḥdʔ šbqw mṣydthwn wʔzlw btrh
04:21	wkd ʕbr mn tmn ḥzʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔḥʔ tryn yʕqwb br zbdy wywḥnn ʔḥwhy bʔlpʔ ʕm zbdy ʔbwhwn dmtqnyn mṣydthwn wqrʔ ʔnwn
04:22	hnwn dyn mḥdʔ šbqw lʔlpʔ wlʔbwhwn wʔzlw btrh
04:23	wmtkrk hwʔ yšwʕ bklh glylʔ wmlp hwʔ bknwšthwn wmkrz sbrtʔ dmlkwtʔ wmʔsʔ kl kʔb wkwrhn bʕmʔ
04:24	wʔštmʕ ṭbh bklh swryʔ wqrbw lh klhwn ʔylyn dbyš byš ʕbydyn bkwrhnʔ mšḥlpʔ wʔylyn dʔlyṣyn btšnyqʔ wdywnʔ wdbr ʔgrʔ wmšryʔ wʔsy ʔnwn
04:25	wʔzlw btrh knšʔ sgyʔʔ mn glylʔ wmn ʕsrt mdyntʔ wmn ʔwršlm wmn yhwd wmn ʕbrʔ dywrdnn 
05:01	kd ḥzʔ dyn yšwʕ lknšʔ slq lṭwrʔ wkd ytb qrbw lwth tlmydwhy
05:02	wptḥ pwmh wmlp hwʔ lhwn wʔmr
05:03	ṭwbyhwn lmsknʔ brwḥ ddylhwn hy mlkwtʔ dšmyʔ
05:04	ṭwbyhwn lʔbylʔ dhnwn ntbyʔwn
05:05	ṭwbyhwn lmkykʔ dhnwn nʔrtwn lʔrʕʔ
05:06	ṭwbyhwn lʔylyn dkpnyn wṣhyn lkʔnwtʔ dhnwn nsbʕwn
05:07	ṭwbyhwn lmrḥmnʔ dʕlyhwn nhwwn rḥmʔ
05:08	ṭwbyhwn lʔylyn ddkyn blbhwn dhnwn nḥzwn lʔlhʔ
05:09	ṭwbyhwn lʕbdy šlmʔ dbnwhy dʔlhʔ ntqrwn
05:10	ṭwbyhwn lʔylyn dʔtrdpw mṭl kʔnwtʔ ddylhwn hy mlkwtʔ dšmyʔ
05:11	ṭwbykwn ʔmty dmḥsdyn lkwn wrdpyn lkwn wʔmryn ʕlykwn kl mlʔ byšʔ mṭlty bdglwtʔ
05:12	hydyn ḥdw wrwzw dʔgrkwn sgy bšmyʔ hknʔ gyr rdpw lnbyʔ dmn qdmykwn
05:13	ʔntwn ʔnwn mlḥh dʔrʕʔ ʔnhw dyn dmlḥʔ tpkh bmnʔ ttmlḥ lmdm lʔ ʔzlʔ ʔlʔ dtštdʔ lbr wttdyš mn ʔnšʔ
05:14	ʔntwn ʔnwn nwhrh dʕlmʔ lʔ mškḥʔ dtṭšʔ mdyntʔ dʕl ṭwrʔ bnyʔ
05:15	wlʔ mnhryn šrgʔ wsymyn lh tḥyt sʔtʔ ʔlʔ ʕl mnrtʔ wmnhr lkl ʔylyn dbbytʔ ʔnwn
05:16	hknʔ nnhr nwhrkwn qdm bnynšʔ dnḥzwn ʕbdykwn ṭbʔ wnšbḥwn lʔbwkwn dbšmyʔ
05:17	lʔ tsbrwn dʔtyt dʔšrʔ nmwsʔ ʔw nbyʔ lʔ ʔtyt dʔšrʔ ʔlʔ dʔmlʔ
05:18	ʔmyn gyr ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dʕdmʔ dnʕbrwn šmyʔ wʔrʕʔ ywd ḥdʔ ʔw ḥd srṭʔ lʔ nʕbr mn nmwsʔ ʕdmʔ dkl nhwʔ
05:19	kl mn hkyl dnšrʔ ḥd mn pwqdnʔ hlyn zʕwrʔ wnlp hknʔ lbnynšʔ bṣyrʔ ntqrʔ bmlkwtʔ dšmyʔ kl dyn dnʕbd wnlp hnʔ rbʔ ntqrʔ bmlkwtʔ dšmyʔ
05:20	ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn gyr dʔlʔ tʔtr kʔnwtkwn ytyr mn dsprʔ wpryšʔ lʔ tʕlwn lmlkwtʔ dšmyʔ
05:21	šmʕtwn dʔtʔmr lqdmyʔ lʔ tqṭwl wkl dnqṭwl mḥyb hw ldynʔ
05:22	ʔnʔ dyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dkl mn dnrgz ʕl ʔḥwhy ʔyqʔ mḥyb hw ldynʔ wkl dnʔmr lʔḥwhy rqʔ mḥyb hw lknwštʔ wmn dnʔmr llʔ mḥyb hw lghnʔ dnwrʔ
05:23	ʔn hw hkyl dmqrb ʔnt qwrbnk ʕl mdbḥʔ wtmn ttdkr dʔḥyd ʕlyk ʔḥwk ʔktʔ mdm
05:24	šbwq tmn qwrbnk qdm mdbḥʔ wzl lwqdm ʔtrʕʔ ʕm ʔḥwk whydyn tʔ qrb qwrbnk
05:25	hwyt mtʔwʔ ʕm bʕl dynk ʕgl ʕd ʕmh ʔnt bʔwrḥʔ dlmʔ bʕldynk nšlmk ldynʔ wdynʔ nšlmk lgbyʔ wtpl byt ʔsyrʔ
05:26	wʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lk dlʔ tpwq mn tmn ʕdmʔ dttl šmwnʔ ʔḥryʔ
05:27	šmʕtwn dʔtʔmr dlʔ tgwr
05:28	ʔnʔ dyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dkl mn dḥzʔ ʔnttʔ ʔyk dnrgyh mḥdʔ grh blbh
05:29	ʔn dyn ʕynk dymynʔ mkšlʔ lk ḥṣyh wšdyh mnk pqḥ lk gyr dnʔbd ḥd hdmk wlʔ klh pgrk npl bghnʔ
05:30	wʔn ʔydk dymynʔ mkšlʔ lk pswq šdyh mnk pqḥ lk gyr dnʔbd ḥd mn hdmyk wlʔ klh pgrk npl bghnʔ
05:31	ʔtʔmr dmn dšrʔ ʔntth ntl lh ktbʔ ddwllʔ
05:32	ʔnʔ dyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dkl mn dšrʔ ʔntth lbr mn mltʔ dznywtʔ ʕbd lh dtgwr wmn dšql šbyqtʔ gʔr
05:33	twb šmʕtwn dʔtʔmr lqdmyʔ dlʔ tdgl bmwmtk tšlm dyn lmryʔ mwmtk
05:34	ʔnʔ dyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn lʔ tʔmwn sk lʔ bšmyʔ dkwrsyʔ hw dʔlhʔ
05:35	wlʔ bʔrʕʔ dkwbšʔ hy dtḥyt rglwhy ʔplʔ bʔwryšlm dmdynth hy dmlkʔ rbʔ
05:36	ʔplʔ bršk tʔmʔ dlʔ mškḥ ʔnt lmʕbd bh mntʔ ḥdʔ dsʕrʔ ʔwkmtʔ ʔw ḥwrtʔ
05:37	ʔlʔ thwʔ mltkwn ʔyn ʔyn wlʔ lʔ mdm dmn hlyn ytyr mn byšʔ hw
05:38	šmʕtwn dʔtʔmr dʕynʔ ḥlp ʕynʔ wšnʔ ḥlp šnʔ
05:39	ʔnʔ dyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dlʔ tqwmwn lwqbl byšʔ ʔlʔ mn dmḥʔ lk ʕl pkk dymynʔ ʔpnʔ lh ʔp ʔḥrnʔ
05:40	wmn dṣbʔ dndwn ʕmk wnšqwl kwtynk šbwq lh ʔp mrṭwṭk
05:41	mn dmšḥr lk mylʔ ḥd zl ʕmh tryn
05:42	mn dšʔl lk hb lh wmn dṣbʔ dnʔzp mnk lʔ tklywhy
05:43	šmʕtwn dʔtʔmr drḥm lqrybk wsny lbʕldbbk
05:44	ʔnʔ dyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn ʔḥbw lbʕldbbykwn wbrkw lmn dlʔṭ lkwn wʕbdw dšpyr lmn dsnʔ lkwn wṣlw ʕl ʔylyn ddbryn lkwn bqṭyrʔ wrdpyn lkwn
05:45	ʔyknʔ dthwwn bnwhy dʔbwkwn dbšmyʔ hw dmdnḥ šmšh ʕl ṭbʔ wʕl byšʔ wmḥt mṭrh ʕl kʔnʔ wʕl ʕwlʔ
05:46	ʔn gyr mḥbyn ʔntwn lʔylyn dmḥbyn lkwn mnʔ ʔgrʔ ʔyt lkwn lʔ hʔ ʔp mksʔ hy hdʔ ʕbdyn
05:47	wʔn šʔlyn ʔntwn bšlmʔ dʔḥykwn blḥwd mnʔ ytyr ʕbdyn ʔntwn lʔ hʔ ʔp mksʔ hy hdʔ ʕbdyn
05:48	hww hkyl ʔntwn gmyrʔ ʔyknʔ dʔbwkwn dbšmyʔ gmyr hw 
06:01	ḥwrw dyn bzdqtkwn dlʔ tʕbdwnh qdm bny ʔnšʔ ʔyk dttḥzwn lhwn wʔlʔ ʔgrʔ lyt lkwn lwt ʔbwkwn dbšmyʔ
06:02	ʔmty hkyl dʕbd ʔnt zdqtʔ lʔ tqrʔ qrnʔ qdmyk ʔyk dʕbdyn nsby bʔpʔ bknwštʔ wbšwqʔ ʔyk dnštbḥwn mn bny ʔnšʔ wʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dqblw ʔgrhwn
06:03	ʔnt dyn mʔ dʕbd ʔnt zdqtʔ lʔ tdʕ smlk mnʔ ʕbdʔ ymynk
06:04	ʔyk dthwʔ zdqtk bksyʔ wʔbwk dḥzʔ bksyʔ hw nprʕk bglyʔ
06:05	wmʔ dmṣlʔ ʔnt lʔ thwʔ ʔyk nsby bʔpʔ drḥmyn lmqm bknwštʔ wbzwytʔ dšwqʔ lmṣlyw dntḥzwn lbny ʔnšʔ wʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dqblw ʔgrhwn
06:06	ʔnt dyn ʔmty dmṣlʔ ʔnt ʕwl ltwnk wʔḥwd trʕk wṣlʔ lʔbwk dbksyʔ wʔbwk dḥzʔ bksyʔ nprʕk bglyʔ
06:07	wmʔ dmṣlyn ʔntwn lʔ hwytwn mpqqyn ʔyk ḥnpʔ sbryn gyr dbmmllʔ sgyʔʔ mštmʕyn
06:08	lʔ hkyl tdmwn lhwn ʔbwkwn gyr ydʕ mnʔ mtbʕʔ lkwn ʕdlʔ tšʔlwnyhy
06:09	hknʔ hkyl ṣlw ʔntwn ʔbwn dbšmyʔ ntqdš šmk
06:10	tʔtʔ mlkwtk nhwʔ ṣbynk ʔyknʔ dbšmyʔ ʔp bʔrʕʔ
06:11	hb ln lḥmʔ dswnqnn ywmnʔ
06:12	wšbwq ln ḥwbyn ʔyknʔ dʔp ḥnn šbqn lḥybyn
06:13	wlʔ tʕln lnsywnʔ ʔlʔ pṣn mn byšʔ mṭl ddylk hy mlkwtʔ wḥylʔ wtšbwḥtʔ lʕlm ʕlmyn
06:14	ʔn gyr tšbqwn lbnynšʔ sklwthwn nšbwq ʔp lkwn ʔbwkwn dbšmyʔ
06:15	ʔn dyn lʔ tšbqwn lbnynšʔ ʔplʔ ʔbwkwn šbq lkwn sklwtkwn
06:16	ʔmty dyn dṣymyn ʔntwn lʔ thwwn kmyrʔ ʔyk nsby bʔpʔ mḥblyn gyr prṣwpyhwn ʔyk dntḥzwn lbnynšʔ dṣymyn wʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dqblw ʔgrhwn
06:17	ʔnt dyn mʔ dṣʔm ʔnt ʔšyg ʔpyk wmšwḥ ršk
06:18	ʔyk dlʔ ttḥzʔ lbnynšʔ dṣʔm ʔnt ʔlʔ lʔbwk dbksyʔ wʔbwk dḥzʔ bksyʔ hw nprʕk
06:19	lʔ tsymwn lkwn symtʔ bʔrʕʔ ʔtr dssʔ wʔklʔ mḥblyn wʔykʔ dgnbʔ plšyn wgnbyn
06:20	ʔlʔ symw lkwn symtʔ bšmyʔ ʔykʔ dlʔ ssʔ wlʔ ʔklʔ mḥblyn wʔykʔ dgnbʔ lʔ plšyn wlʔ gnbyn
06:21	ʔykʔ gyr dʔytyh symtkwn tmn hw ʔp lbkwn
06:22	šrgʔ dpgrʔ ʔytyh ʕynʔ ʔn ʕynk hkyl thwʔ pšyṭʔ ʔp klh pgrk nhyr hw
06:23	ʔn dyn ʕynk thwʔ byšʔ klh pgrk ḥšwkʔ nhwʔ ʔn hkyl nwhrʔ dbk ḥšwkʔ hw ḥšwkk kmʔ nhwʔ
06:24	lʔ ʔnš mškḥ ltryn mrwn lmplḥ ʔw gyr lḥd nsnʔ wlʔḥrnʔ nrḥm ʔw lḥd nyqr wlʔḥrnʔ nšwṭ lʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn lʔlhʔ lmplḥ wlmmwnʔ
06:25	mṭl hnʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn lʔ tʔṣpwn lnpškwn mnʔ tʔklwn wmnʔ tštwn wlʔ lpgrkwn mnʔ tlbšwn lʔ hʔ npšʔ ytyrʔ mn sybrtʔ wpgrʔ mn lbwšʔ
06:26	ḥwrw bprḥtʔ dšmyʔ dlʔ zrʕyn wlʔ ḥṣdyn wlʔ ḥmlyn bʔwṣrʔ wʔbwkwn dbšmyʔ mtrsʔ lhwn lʔ hʔ ʔntwn mytryn ʔntwn mnhwn
06:27	mnw dyn mnkwn kd yṣp mškḥ lmwspw ʕl qwmth ʔmtʔ ḥdʔ
06:28	wʕl lbwšʔ mnʔ yṣpyn ʔntwn ʔtbqw bšwšnʔ ddbrʔ ʔyknʔ rbyn dlʔ lʔyn wlʔ ʕzln
06:29	ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dyn dʔplʔ šlymwn bklh šwbḥh ʔtksy ʔykḥdʔ mnhyn
06:30	ʔn dyn lʕmyrʔ dḥqlʔ dywmnʔ ʔytwhy wmḥr npl btnwrʔ ʔlhʔ hknʔ mlbš lʔ sgy ytyr lkwn zʕwry hymnwtʔ
06:31	lʔ hkyl tʔṣpwn ʔw tʔmrwn mnʔ nʔkwl ʔw mnʔ nštʔ ʔw mnʔ ntksʔ
06:32	klhyn gyr hlyn ʕmmʔ hw bʕyn lhyn ʔbwkwn dyn dbšmyʔ ydʕ dʔp lkwn mtbʕyn hlyn klhyn
06:33	bʕw dyn lwqdm mlkwth dʔlhʔ wzdyqwth wklhyn hlyn mttwspn lkwn
06:34	lʔ hkyl tʔṣpwn dmḥr hw gyr mḥr yṣp dylh spq lh lywmʔ byšth
07:01	lʔ tdwnwn dlʔ ttdynwn
07:02	bdynʔ gyr ddynyn ʔntwn ttdynwn wbkyltʔ dmkylyn ʔntwn mttkyl lkwn
07:03	mnʔ dyn ḥzʔ ʔnt glʔ dbʕynh dʔḥwk wqrytʔ dbʕynk lʔ bḥr ʔnt
07:04	ʔw ʔyknʔ ʔmr ʔnt lʔḥwk šbwq ʔpq glʔ mn ʕynk whʔ qrytʔ bʕynk
07:05	nsb bʔpʔ ʔpq lwqdm qrytʔ mn ʕynk whydyn ntbḥr lk lmpqw glʔ mn ʕynh dʔḥwk
07:06	lʔ ttlwn qwdšʔ lklbʔ wlʔ trmwn mrgnytkwn qdm ḥzyrʔ dlmʔ ndwšwn ʔnyn brglyhwn wnhpkwn nbzʕwnkwn
07:07	šʔlw wntyhb lkwn bʕw wtškḥwn qwšw wntptḥ lkwn
07:08	kl gyr dšʔl nsb wdbʕʔ mškḥ wlʔynʔ dnqš mtptḥ lh
07:09	ʔw mnw mnkwn gbrʔ dnšʔlywhy brh lḥmʔ lmʔ kʔpʔ mwšṭ lh
07:10	wʔn nwnʔ nšʔlywhy lmʔ ḥwyʔ mwšṭ lh
07:11	wʔn hkyl ʔntwn dbyšʔ ʔntwn ydʕyn ʔntwn mwhbtʔ ṭbtʔ lmtl lbnykwn kmʔ ytyrʔyt ʔbwkwn dbšmyʔ ntl ṭbtʔ lʔylyn dšʔlyn lh
07:12	kl mʔ dṣbyn ʔntwn dnʕbdwn lkwn bny ʔnšʔ hknʔ ʔp ʔntwn ʕbdw lhwn hnw gyr nmwsʔ wnbyʔ 
07:13	ʕwlw btrʕʔ ʔlyṣʔ dptʔ hw trʕʔ wʔrwyḥʔ ʔwrḥʔ ʔydʔ dmwblʔ lʔbdnʔ wsgyʔʔ ʔnwn ʔylyn dʔzlyn bh
07:14	mʔ qṭyn trʕʔ wʔlyṣʔ ʔwrḥʔ dmwblʔ lḥyʔ wzʕwrʔ ʔnwn ʔylyn dmškḥyn lh
07:15	ʔzdhrw mn nbyʔ dglʔ dʔtyn lwtkwn blbwšʔ dʔmrʔ mn lgw dyn ʔytyhwn dʔbʔ ḥṭwpʔ
07:16	mn pʔryhwn dyn tdʕwn ʔnwn lmʔ lqṭyn mn kwbʔ ʕnbʔ ʔw mn qwrṭbʔ tʔnʔ
07:17	hknʔ kl ʔylnʔ ṭbʔ pʔrʔ špyrʔ ʕbd ʔylnʔ dyn byšʔ pʔrʔ byšʔ ʕbd
07:18	lʔ mškḥ ʔylnʔ ṭbʔ pʔrʔ byšʔ lmʕbd wlʔ ʔylnʔ byšʔ pʔrʔ ṭbʔ lmʕbd
07:19	kl ʔylnʔ dlʔ ʕbd pʔrʔ ṭbʔ mtpsq wbnwrʔ npl
07:20	mdyn mn pʔryhwn tdʕwn ʔnwn
07:21	lʔ hwʔ kl dʔmr ly mry mry ʕʔl lmlkwtʔ dšmyʔ ʔlʔ mn dʕbd ṣbynh dʔby dbšmyʔ
07:22	sgyʔʔ nʔmrwn ly bhw ywmʔ mry mry lʔ bšmk ʔtnbyn wbšmk šʔdʔ ʔpqn wbšmk ḥylʔ sgyʔʔ ʕbdn
07:23	whydyn ʔwdʔ lhwn dmn mtwm lʔ ydʕtkwn ʔrḥqw lkwn mny plḥy ʕwlʔ
07:24	kl hkyl dšmʕ mly hlyn wʕbd lhyn ntdmʔ lgbrʔ ḥkymʔ hw dbnʔ byth ʕl šwʕʔ
07:25	wnḥt mṭrʔ wʔtw nhrwtʔ wnšb rwḥʔ wʔtṭryw bh bbytʔ hw wlʔ npl štʔswhy gyr ʕl šwʕʔ symn hwy
07:26	wkl mn dšmʕ mly hlyn wlʔ ʕbd lhyn ntdmʔ lgbrʔ sklʔ dbnʔ byth ʕl ḥlʔ
07:27	wnḥt mṭrʔ wʔtw nhrwtʔ wnšb rwḥʔ wʔtṭryw bbytʔ hw wnpl whwt mpwlth rbʔ
07:28	whwʔ dkd šlm yšwʕ mlʔ hlyn thyryn hww knšʔ ʕl ywlpnh
