07:29	mlp hwʔ lhwn gyr ʔyk mšlṭʔ wlʔ ʔyk spryhwn wpryšʔ
08:01	kd nḥt dyn mn ṭwrʔ nqpwhy knšʔ sgyʔʔ
08:02	whʔ grbʔ ḥd ʔtʔ sgd lh wʔmr mry ʔn ṣbʔ ʔnt mškḥ ʔnt lmdkywty
08:03	wpšṭ ʔydh yšwʕ qrb lh wʔmr ṣbʔ ʔnʔ ʔtdkʔ wbh bšʕtʔ ʔtdky grbh
08:04	wʔmr lh yšwʕ ḥzy lmʔ lʔnš ʔmr ʔnt ʔlʔ zl ḥwʔ npšk lkhnʔ wqrb qwrbnʔ ʔyk dpqd mwšʔ lshdwthwn
08:05	kd ʕl dyn yšwʕ lkprnḥwm qrb lh qnṭrwnʔ ḥd wbʕʔ hwʔ mnh
08:06	wʔmr mry ṭlyy rmʔ bbytʔ wmšry wbyšʔyt mštnq
08:07	ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔnʔ ʔtʔ wʔsywhy
08:08	ʕnʔ qnṭrwnʔ hw wʔmr mry lʔ šwʔ ʔnʔ dtʕwl tḥyt mṭlly ʔlʔ blḥwd ʔmr bmltʔ wntʔsʔ ṭlyy
08:09	ʔp ʔnʔ gyr gbrʔ ʔnʔ dtḥyt šwlṭnʔ wʔyt tḥyt ʔydy ʔsṭrṭywṭʔ wʔmr ʔnʔ lhnʔ dzl wʔzl wlʔḥrnʔ dtʔ wʔtʔ wlʕbdy dʕbd hdʔ wʕbd
08:10	kd šmʕ dyn yšwʕ ʔtdmr wʔmr ldʔtyn ʕmh ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dʔp lʔ bʔysrʔyl ʔškḥt ʔyk hdʔ hymnwtʔ
08:11	ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dyn dsgyʔʔ nʔtwn mn mdnḥʔ wmn mʕrbʔ wnstmkwn ʕm ʔbrhm wʔysḥq wyʕqwb bmlkwtʔ dšmyʔ
08:12	bnyh dyn dmlkwtʔ npqwn lḥšwkʔ bryʔ tmn nhwʔ bkyʔ wḥwrq šnʔ
08:13	wʔmr yšwʕ lqnṭrwnʔ hw zl ʔyknʔ dhymnt nhwʔ lk wʔtʔsy ṭlyh bh bšʕtʔ
08:14	wʔtʔ yšwʕ lbyth dšmʕwn wḥzʔ lḥmth drmyʔ wʔḥydʔ lh ʔštʔ
08:15	wqrb lʔydh wšbqth ʔštʔ wqmt wmšmšʔ hwt lh
08:16	kd hwʔ dyn rmšʔ qrbw qdmwhy dywnʔ sgyʔʔ wʔpq dywyhwn bmltʔ wlklhwn ʔylyn dbyšʔyt ʕbydyn hww ʔsy ʔnwn
08:17	ʔyk dntmlʔ mdm dʔtʔmr byd ʔšʕyʔ nbyʔ dʔmr dhw nsb kʔbyn wkwrhnyn nṭʕn
08:18	kd ḥzʔ dyn yšwʕ knšʔ sgyʔʔ dḥdyryn lh pqd dnʔzlwn lʕbrʔ
08:19	wqrb sprʔ ḥd wʔmr lh rby ʔtʔ btrk lʔtr dʔzl ʔnt
08:20	ʔmr lh yšwʕ ltʕlʔ nqʕʔ ʔyt lhwn wlprḥtʔ dšmyʔ mṭllʔ brh dyn dʔnšʔ lyt lh ʔykʔ dnsmwk ršh
08:21	ʔḥrnʔ dyn mn tlmydwhy ʔmr lh mry ʔps ly lwqdm ʔzl ʔqbwr ʔby
08:22	yšwʕ dyn ʔmr lh tʔ btry wšbwq lmytʔ qbryn mytyhwn
08:23	wkd slq yšwʕ lspyntʔ slqw ʕmh tlmydwhy
08:24	whʔ zwʕʔ rbʔ hwʔ bymʔ ʔyknʔ dʔlpʔ ttksʔ mn gllʔ hw dyn yšwʕ dmyk hwʔ
08:25	wqrbw tlmydwhy ʔʕyrwhy wʔmryn lh mrn pṣn ʔbdyn ḥnn
08:26	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ lmnʔ dḥwltnyn ʔntwn zʕwry hymnwtʔ hydyn qm wkʔʔ brwḥʔ wbymʔ whwʔ šlyʔ rbʔ
08:27	ʔnšʔ dyn ʔtdmrw wʔmryn mnw hnʔ drwḥʔ wymʔ mštmʕyn lh
08:28	wkd ʔtʔ yšwʕ lʕbrʔ lʔtrʔ dgdryʔ ʔrʕwhy tryn dywnʔ dnpqyn mn byt qbwrʔ byšʔ dṭb ʔyk dlʔ ʔnš nškḥ nʕbr bhy ʔwrḥʔ
08:29	wqʕw wʔmryn mʔ ln wlk yšwʕ brh dʔlhʔ ʔtyt lkʔ qdm zbnʔ dtšnqn
08:30	ʔyt hwʔ dyn lhl mnhwn bqrʔ dḥzyrʔ sgyʔʔ drʕyʔ
08:31	hnwn dyn šʔdʔ bʕyn hww mnh wʔmryn ʔn mpq ʔnt ln ʔps ln dnʔzl lbqrʔ dḥzyrʔ
08:32	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ zlw wmḥdʔ npqw wʕlw bḥzyrʔ wklh bqrʔ hy trṣt lʕl lšqypʔ wnplw bymʔ wmytw bmyʔ 
08:33	hnwn dyn drʕyn hww ʕrqw wʔzlw lmdyntʔ wḥwy wkl mdm dhwʔ wdhnwn dywnʔ
08:34	wnpqt klh mdyntʔ lʔwrʕh dyšwʕ wkd ḥzʔwhy bʕw mnh dnšnʔ mn tḥwmyhwn
09:01	wslq lʔlpʔ wʕbr ʔtʔ lmdynth
09:02	wqrbw lh mšryʔ kd rmʔ bʕrsʔ wḥzʔ yšwʕ hymnwthwn wʔmr lhw mšryʔ ʔtlbb bry šbyqyn lk ḥṭhyk
09:03	ʔnšʔ dyn mn sprʔ ʔmrw bnpšhwn hnʔ mgdp
09:04	yšwʕ dyn ydʕ mḥšbthwn wʔmr lhwn mnʔ mtḥšbyn ʔntwn byštʔ blbkwn
09:05	mnʔ gyr pšyq lmʔmr dšbyqyn lk ḥṭhyk ʔw lmʔmr qwm hlk
09:06	dtdʕwn dyn dšwlṭnʔ ʔyt lbrh dʔnšʔ bʔrʕʔ lmšbq ḥṭhʔ ʔmr lhw mšryʔ qwm šqwl ʕrsk wzl lbytk
09:07	wqm ʔzl lbyth
09:08	kd ḥzw dyn knšʔ hnwn dḥlw wšbḥw lʔlhʔ dyhb šwlṭnʔ dʔyk hnʔ lbnynšʔ
09:09	wkd ʕbr yšwʕ mn tmn ḥzʔ gbrʔ dytb byt mksʔ dšmh mty wʔmr lh tʔ btry wqm ʔzl btrh
09:10	wkd smykyn bbytʔ ʔtw mksʔ wḥṭyʔ sgyʔʔ ʔstmkw ʕm yšwʕ wʕm tlmydwhy
09:11	wkd ḥzw pryšʔ ʔmryn ltlmydwhy lmnʔ ʕm mksʔ wḥṭyʔ lʕs rbkwn
09:12	yšwʕ dyn kd šmʕ ʔmr lhwn lʔ snyqyn ḥlymʔ ʕl ʔsyʔ ʔlʔ ʔylyn dbyšʔyt ʕbydyn
09:13	zlw ylpw mnw ḥnnʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ wlʔ dbḥtʔ lʔ gyr ʔtyt dʔqrʔ lzdyqʔ ʔlʔ lḥṭyʔ
09:14	hydyn qrbw lh tlmydwhy dywḥnn wʔmryn lmnʔ ḥnn wpryšʔ ṣymyn ḥnn sgy wtlmydyk lʔ ṣymyn
09:15	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ dlmʔ mškḥyn bnwhy dgnwnʔ lmṣm kmʔ dḥtnʔ ʕmhwn ʔtyn dyn ywmtʔ kd nštql mnhwn ḥtnʔ whydyn nṣwmwn
09:16	lʔ ʔnš rmʔ ʔwrqʕtʔ ḥdtʔ ʕl nḥtʔ blyʔ dlʔ ttwp mlywth mn hw nḥtʔ wnhwʔ bzʕʔ ytyrʔ
09:17	wlʔ rmyn ḥmrʔ ḥdtʔ bzqʔ blytʔ dlʔ mṣṭryn zqʔ wḥmrʔ mtʔšd wzqʔ ʔbdn ʔlʔ rmyn ḥmrʔ ḥdtʔ bzqʔ ḥdttʔ wtryhwn mtnṭryn
09:18	kd dyn hlyn mmll hwʔ ʕmhwn ʔtʔ ʔrkwnʔ ḥd qrb sgd lh wʔmr brty hšʔ mytt ʔlʔ tʔ sym ʔydk ʕlyh wtḥʔ
09:19	wqm yšwʕ wtlmydwhy wʔzlw btrh
09:20	whʔ ʔnttʔ drdʔ hwʔ dmh šnyn trtʕsrʔ ʔtt mn bstrh wqrbt lqrnʔ dlbwšh
09:21	ʔmrʔ hwt gyr bnpšh ʔpn blḥwd lmʔnh qrbʔ ʔnʔ mtʔsyʔ ʔnʔ
09:22	yšwʕ dyn ʔtpny ḥzh wʔmr lh ʔtlbby brty hymnwtky ʔḥytky wʔtʔsyt ʔnttʔ hy mn hy šʕtʔ
09:23	wʔtʔ yšwʕ lbyth dʔrkwnʔ wḥzʔ zmrʔ wknšʔ dmštgšyn
09:24	wʔmr lhwn prwqw lkwn ṭlytʔ gyr lʔ mytt ʔlʔ dmkʔ hy wgḥkyn hww ʕlwhy
09:25	wkd ʔpq lknšʔ ʕl ʔḥdh bʔydh wqmt ṭlytʔ
09:26	wnpq ṭbʔ hnʔ bklh ʔrʕʔ hy
09:27	wkd ʕbr yšwʕ mn tmn dbqwhy smyʔ tryn dqʕyn wʔmryn ʔtrḥm ʕlyn brh ddwyd
09:28	wkd ʔtʔ lbytʔ qrbw lh hnwn smyʔ ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ mhymnyn ʔntwn dmškḥ ʔnʔ hdʔ lmʕbd ʔmryn lh ʔyn mrn
09:29	hydyn qrb lʕynyhwn wʔmr ʔyknʔ dhymntwn nhwʔ lkwn
09:30	wmḥdʔ ʔtptḥ ʕynyhwn wkʔʔ bhwn yšwʕ wʔmr ḥzw lʔ ʔnš ndʕ
09:31	hnwn dyn npqw ʔṭbwhy bklh ʔrʕʔ hy
09:32	wkd npq yšwʕ qrbw lh ḥršʔ dʔyt ʕlwhy dywʔ
09:33	wmn dnpq dywʔ mll hw ḥršʔ wʔtdmrw knšʔ wʔmryn lʔ mtwm ʔtḥzy hknʔ bʔysrʔyl
09:34	pryšʔ dyn ʔmryn hww bršʔ ddywʔ mpq dywʔ
09:35	wmtkrk hwʔ yšwʕ bmdyntʔ klhyn wbqwryʔ wmlp hwʔ bknwšthwn wmkrz sbrtʔ dmlkwtʔ wmʔsʔ kl kwrhnyn wkl kʔbyn
09:36	kd ḥzʔ dyn yšwʕ lknšʔ ʔtrḥm ʕlyhwn dlʔyn hww wšryn ʔyk ʕrbʔ dlyt lhwn rʕyʔ
09:37	wʔmr ltlmydwhy ḥṣdʔ sgy wpʕlʔ zʕwryn
09:38	bʕw hkyl mn mrʔ ḥṣdʔ dnpq pʕlʔ lḥṣdh
10:01	wqrʔ ltrʕsr tlmydwhy wyhb lhwn šwlṭnʔ ʕl rwḥʔ ṭnptʔ dnpqwn wlmʔsyw kl kʔb wkwrhn
10:02	dylhwn dyn dtrʕsr šlyḥʔ šmhʔ ʔytyhwn hlyn qdmyhwn šmʕwn dmtqrʔ kʔpʔ wʔndrʔws ʔḥwhy wyʕqwb br zbdy wywḥnn ʔḥwhy
10:03	wpylypws wbr twlmy wtʔwmʔ wmty mksʔ wyʕqwb br ḥlpy wlby dʔtkny tdy
10:04	wšmʕwn qnnyʔ wyhwdʔ skrywṭʔ hw dʔšlmh 
10:05	lhlyn trʕsr šdr yšwʕ wpqd ʔnwn wʔmr bʔwrḥʔ dḥnpʔ lʔ tʔzlwn wlmdyntʔ dšmryʔ lʔ tʕlwn
10:06	zlw lkwn dyn ytyrʔyt lwt ʕrbʔ dʔbdw mn byt ysryl
10:07	wkd ʔzlyn ʔntwn ʔkrzw wʔmrw dqrbt mlkwtʔ dšmyʔ
10:08	kryhʔ ʔsw wgrbʔ dkw wdywʔ ʔpqw mgn nsbtwn mgn hbw
10:09	lʔ tqnwn dhbʔ wlʔ sʔmʔ wlʔ nḥšʔ bkysykwn
10:10	wlʔ trmlʔ lʔwrḥʔ wlʔ trtyn kwtynyn wlʔ msnʔ wlʔ šbṭʔ šwʔ hw gyr pʕlʔ sybrth
10:11	lʔydʔ dyn mdyntʔ ʔw qrytʔ dʕʔlyn ʔntwn lh šʔlw mnw šwʔ bh wtmn hww ʕdmʔ dnpqyn ʔntwn
10:12	wmʔ dʕʔlyn ʔntwn lbytʔ šʔlw šlmh dbytʔ
10:13	wʔn hw dšwʔ bytʔ šlmkwn nʔtʔ ʕlwhy ʔn dyn lʔ šwʔ šlmkwn ʕlykwn npnʔ
10:14	mn dlʔ dyn mqbl lkwn wlʔ šmʕ mlykwn kd npqyn ʔntwn mn bytʔ ʔw mn qrytʔ hy pṣw ḥlʔ mn rglykwn
10:15	wʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dlʔrʕʔ dsdwm wdʕmwrʔ nhwʔ nyḥ bywmʔ ddynʔ ʔw lmdyntʔ hy
10:16	hʔ ʔnʔ mšdr ʔnʔ lkwn ʔyk ʔmrʔ byny dʔbʔ hww hkyl ḥkymʔ ʔyk ḥwwtʔ wtmymʔ ʔyk ywnʔ
10:17	ʔzdhrw dyn mn bnynšʔ mšlmyn lkwn gyr lbyt dynʔ wbknwšthwn nngdwnkwn
10:18	wqdm hgmwnʔ wmlkʔ mqrbyn lkwn mṭlty lshdwtʔ dylhwn wdʕmmʔ
10:19	ʔmty dyn dnšlmwnkwn lʔ tʔṣpwn ʔyknʔ ʔw mnʔ tmllwn mtyhb lkwn gyr bhy šʕtʔ mʔ dtmllwn
10:20	lʔ hwʔ gyr ʔntwn mmllyn ʔlʔ rwḥʔ dʔbwkwn mmllʔ bkwn
10:21	nšlm dyn ʔḥʔ lʔḥwhy lmwtʔ wʔbʔ lbrh wnqwmwn bnyʔ ʕl ʔbhyhwn wnmytwn ʔnwn
10:22	wthwwn snyʔyn mn klnš mṭl šmy ʔynʔ dyn dnsybr ʕdmʔ lḥrtʔ hw nḥʔ
10:23	mʔ drdpyn lkwn dyn bmdyntʔ hdʔ ʕrwqw lkwn lʔḥrtʔ ʔmyn gyr ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dlʔ tšlmwn ʔnyn klhyn mdyntʔ dbyt ʔysryl ʕdmʔ dnʔtʔ brh dʔnšʔ
10:24	lyt tlmydʔ dytyr mn rbh wlʔ ʕbdʔ mn mrh
10:25	spq lh ltlmydʔ dnhwʔ ʔyk rbh wlʕbdʔ ʔyk mrh ʔn lmrh dbytʔ qrw bʕlzbwb ḥd kmʔ lbny byth
10:26	lʔ hkyl tdḥlwn mnhwn lyt gyr mdm dksʔ dlʔ ntglʔ wdmṭšy dlʔ ntydʕ
10:27	mdm dʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn bḥšwkʔ ʔwmrwhy ʔntwn bnhyrʔ wmdm dbʔdnykwn šmʕyn ʔntwn ʔkrzw ʕl ʔgrʔ
10:28	wlʔ tdḥlwn mn ʔylyn dqṭlyn pgrʔ npšʔ dyn lʔ mškḥyn lmqṭl dḥlw dyn ytyrʔyt mn mn dmškḥ dlnpšʔ wlpgrʔ nwbd bghnʔ
10:29	lʔ trtyn ṣpryn mzdbnn bʔsr wḥdʔ mnhyn blʕd mn ʔbwkwn lʔ nplʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ
10:30	dylkwn dyn ʔp mnʔ drškwn klhyn mnyn ʔnyn
10:31	lʔ hkyl tdḥlwn mn ṣprʔ sgyʔtʔ mytryn ʔntwn
10:32	klnš hkyl dnwdʔ by qdm bnynšʔ ʔwdʔ bh ʔp ʔnʔ qdm ʔby dbšmyʔ
10:33	mn dyn dnkpwr by qdm bnynšʔ ʔkpwr bh ʔp ʔnʔ qdm ʔby dbšmyʔ
10:34	lʔ tsbrwn dʔtyt dʔrmʔ šynʔ bʔrʕʔ lʔ ʔtyt dʔrmʔ šynʔ ʔlʔ ḥrbʔ
10:35	ʔtyt gyr dʔplwg gbrʔ ʕl ʔbwhy wbrtʔ ʕl ʔmh wkltʔ ʕl ḥmth
10:36	wbʕldbbwhy dgbrʔ bny byth
10:37	mn drḥm ʔbʔ ʔw ʔmʔ ytyr mn dly lʔ šwʔ ly wmn drḥm brʔ ʔw brtʔ ytyr mn dly lʔ šwʔ ly
10:38	wkl dlʔ šql zqyph wʔtʔ btry lʔ šwʔ ly
10:39	mn dʔškḥ npšh nwbdyh wmn dnwbd npšh mṭlty nškḥyh
10:40	mn dmqbl lkwn ly mqbl wmn dly mqbl lmn dšlḥny mqbl
10:41	mn dmqbl nbyʔ bšm nbyʔ ʔgrʔ dnbyʔ nsb wmn dmqbl zdyqʔ bšm zdyqʔ ʔgrʔ dzdyqʔ nsb
10:42	wkl dmšqʔ lḥd mn hlyn zʕwrʔ ksʔ dqryrʔ blḥwd bšmʔ dtlmydʔ ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dlʔ nwbd ʔgrh
11:01	whwʔ dkd šlm yšwʕ lmpqdw ltrʕsr tlmydwhy šny mn tmn lmlpw wlmkrzw bmdynthwn
11:02	ywḥnn dyn kd šmʕ byt ʔsyrʔ ʕbdwhy dmšyḥʔ šdr byd tlmydwhy
11:03	wʔmr lh ʔnt hw hw dʔtʔ ʔw lʔḥryn hw mskyn ʔnḥnn
11:04	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn zlw ʔštʕw lywḥnn ʔylyn dšmʕyn ʔntwn wḥzyn
11:05	smyʔ ḥzyn wḥgyrʔ mhlkyn wgrbʔ mtdkyn wḥršʔ šmʕyn wmytʔ qymyn wmsknʔ mstbryn
11:06	wṭwbwhy lʔynʔ dlʔ ntkšl by
11:07	kd dyn ʔzlw šry yšwʕ lmʔmr lknšʔ ʕl ywḥnn mnʔ npqtwn lḥwrbʔ lmḥzʔ qnyʔ dmn rwḥʔ mttzyʕ
11:08	wʔlʔ mnʔ npqtwn lmḥzʔ gbrʔ dnḥtʔ rkykʔ lbyš hʔ ʔylyn drkykʔ lbyšyn byt mlkʔ ʔnwn
11:09	wʔlʔ mnʔ npqtwn lmḥzʔ nbyʔ ʔyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn wytyr mn nbyʔ
11:10	hnw gyr dʕlwhy ktyb dhʔ ʔnʔ mšdr ʔnʔ mlʔky qdm prṣwpk dntqn ʔwrḥʔ qdmyk 
11:11	ʔmyn ʔmrnʔ lkwn dlʔ qm bylydy nšʔ drb mn ywḥnn mʕmdnʔ zʕwrʔ dyn bmlkwt šmyʔ rb hw mnh
11:12	mn ywmy ywḥnn dyn mʕmdnʔ wʕdmʔ lhšʔ mlkwtʔ dšmyʔ bqṭyrʔ mtdbrʔ wqṭyrnʔ mḥṭpyn lh
11:13	klhwn gyr nbyʔ wʔwrytʔ ʕdmʔ lywḥnn ʔtnbyw
11:14	wʔn ṣbyn ʔntwn qblw dhwyw ʔlyʔ dʕtyd lmʔtʔ
11:15	mn dʔyt lh ʔdnʔ dnšmʕ nšmʕ
11:16	lmn dyn ʔdmyh lšrbtʔ hdʔ dmyʔ lṭlyʔ dytbyn bšwqʔ wqʕyn lḥbryhwn
11:17	wʔmryn zmrn lkwn wlʔ rqdtwn wʔlyn lkwn wlʔ ʔrqdtwn
11:18	ʔtʔ gyr ywḥnn dlʔ ʔkl wlʔ štʔ wʔmryn dywʔ ʔyt bh
11:19	ʔtʔ brh dʔnšʔ ʔkl wštʔ wʔmryn hʔ gbrʔ ʔkwlʔ wštʔ ḥmrʔ wrḥmʔ dmksʔ wdḥṭyʔ wʔzddqt ḥkmtʔ mn ʕbdyh
11:20	hydyn šry yšwʕ lmḥsdw mdyntʔ ʔylyn dhww bhyn ḥylwhy sgyʔʔ wlʔ tbw
11:21	wʔmr hwʔ wy lky kwrzyn wy lky byt ṣydʔ dʔlw bṣwr wbṣydn hww ḥylʔ ʔylyn dhww bkyn kbr dyn bsqʔ wbqṭmʔ tbw
11:22	brm ʔmr ʔnʔ lkyn dlṣwr wlṣydn nhwʔ nyḥ bywmʔ ddynʔ ʔw lkyn
11:23	wʔnty kprnḥwm hy dʕdmʔ lšmyʔ ʔttrymty ʕdmʔ lšywl ttḥtyn dʔlw bsdwm hww ḥylʔ ʔylyn dhww bky qymʔ hwt ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
11:24	brm ʔmrnʔ lky dlʔrʕʔ dsdwm nhwʔ nyḥ bywmʔ ddynʔ ʔw lky
11:25	bhw zbnʔ ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr mwdʔ ʔnʔ lk ʔby mr<y>ʔ dšmyʔ wdʔrʕʔ dksyt hlyn mn ḥkymʔ wskwltnʔ wglyt ʔnyn lylwdʔ
11:26	ʔyn ʔby dhknʔ hwʔ ṣbynʔ qdmyk
11:27	kl mdm ʔštlm ly mn ʔby wlʔ ʔnš ydʕ lbrʔ ʔlʔ ʔn ʔbʔ ʔplʔ lʔbʔ ʔnš ydʕ ʔlʔ ʔn brʔ wlmn dṣbʔ brʔ dnglʔ
11:28	tw lwty klkwn lʔyʔ wšqyly mwblʔ wʔnʔ ʔnyḥkwn
11:29	šqwlw nyry ʕlykwn wylpw mny dnyḥ ʔnʔ wmkyk ʔnʔ blby wmškḥyn ʔntwn nyḥʔ lnpštkwn
11:30	nyry gyr bsym hw wmwbly qlylʔ hy
12:01	bhw zbnʔ mhlk hwʔ yšwʕ bšbtʔ byt zrʕʔ wtlmydwhy kpnw wšryw mlgyn šblʔ wʔklyn
12:02	pryšʔ dyn kd ḥzw ʔnwn ʔmryn lh hʔ tlmydyk ʕbdyn mdm dlʔ šlyṭ lmʕbd bšbtʔ
12:03	hw dyn ʔmr lhwn lʔ qrytwn mnʔ ʕbd dwyd kd kpn wʔylyn dʕmh
12:04	ʔyknʔ ʕl lbytʔ dʔlhʔ wlḥmʔ dptwrh dmryʔ ʔkl hw dlʔ šlyṭ hwʔ lh lmʔkl wlʔ lʔylyn dʕmh ʔlʔ ʔn lkhnʔ blḥwd
12:05	ʔw lʔ qrytwn bʔwrytʔ dkhnʔ bhyklʔ mḥlyn lh lšbtʔ wdlʔ ʕdly ʔnwn
12:06	ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dyn drb mn hyklʔ ʔyt hrkʔ
12:07	ʔlw dyn ydʕyn hwytwn mnw ḥnnʔ ṣbʔ ʔnʔ wlʔ dbḥtʔ lʔ mḥybyn hwytwn lʔylyn ddlʔ ʕdly ʔnwn
12:08	mrh gyr dšbtʔ ʔytwhy brh dʔnšʔ
12:09	wšny mn tmn yšwʕ wʔtʔ lknwšthwn
12:10	wgbrʔ ḥd ʔyt hwʔ tmn dybyšʔ ʔydh wmšʔlyn hww lh wʔmryn dʔn šlyṭ bšbtʔ lmʔsyw ʔyk dnʔklwn qrṣwhy
12:11	hw dyn ʔmr lhwn mnw mnkwn gbrʔ dʔyt lh ʕrbʔ ḥd wʔn npl bḥbrʔ bywmʔ dšbtʔ lʔ ʔḥd wmqym lh
12:12	kmʔ dyn ytyr brnšʔ mn ʕrbʔ mdyn šlyṭ hw bšbtʔ lmʕbd dšpyr
12:13	hydyn ʔmr lhw gbrʔ pšwṭ ʔydk wpšṭ ʔydh wtqnt ʔyk ḥbrth
12:14	wnpqw pryšʔ wmlkʔ nsbw ʕlwhy ʔyk dnwbdwnyhy
12:15	yšwʕ dyn ydʕ wšny lh mn tmn wʔzlw btrh knšʔ sgyʔʔ wʔsy lklhwn
12:16	wkʔʔ bhwn dlʔ nglwnyhy
12:17	dntmlʔ mdm dʔtʔmr byd ʔšʕyʔ nbyʔ dʔmr
12:18	hʔ ʕbdy dʔṣṭbyt bh ḥbyby dswḥt bh npšy rwḥy ʔsym ʕlwhy wdynʔ lʕmmʔ nkrz
12:19	lʔ ntḥrʔ wlʔ nqʕʔ wlʔ ʔnš nšmʕ qlh bšwqʔ
12:20	qnyʔ rʕyʕʔ lʔ ntbr wšrgʔ dmṭpṭp lʔ ndʕk ʕdmʔ dnpq dynʔ lzkwtʔ
12:21	wbšmh ʕmmʔ nsbrwn
12:22	hydyn qrbw lh dywnʔ ḥd dḥrš wʕwyr wʔsyh ʔyknʔ dḥršʔ wsmyʔ nmll wnḥzʔ
12:23	wmtdmryn hww klhwn knšʔ wʔmryn dlmʔ hnw brh ddwyd
12:24	pryšʔ dyn kd šmʕw ʔmryn hnʔ lʔ mpq šʔdʔ ʔlʔ bbʕlzbwb ršʔ ddywʔ
12:25	yšwʕ dyn ydʕ mḥšbthwn wʔmr lhwn kl mlkw dttplg ʕl npšh tḥrb wkl by wmdynʔ dntplg ʕl npšh lʔ nqwm
12:26	wʔn sṭnʔ lsṭnʔ mpq ʕl npšh ʔtplg ʔyknʔ hkyl qymʔ mlkwth
12:27	wʔn ʔnʔ bbʕlzbwb mpq ʔnʔ dywʔ bnykwn bmnʔ mpqyn lhwn mṭl hnʔ hnwn nhwwn lkwn dynʔ
12:28	wʔn brwḥʔ dʔlhʔ ʔnʔ mpq ʔnʔ dywʔ qrbt lh ʕlykwn mlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ
12:29	ʔw ʔyknʔ ʔnš mškḥ dnʕwl lbyt ḥsynʔ wmʔnwhy nbwz ʔlʔ ʔn lwqdm nʔsrywhy lḥsynʔ whydyn byth nbwz
12:30	mn dlʔ hwʔ ʕmy lwqbly hw wmn dlʔ knš ʕmy mbdrw mbdr 
12:31	mṭl hnʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dkl ḥṭhyn wgwdpyn nštbqwn lbnynšʔ gwdpʔ dyn dʕl rwḥʔ lʔ nštbq lbnynšʔ
12:32	wkl mn dnʔmr mltʔ ʕl brh dʔnšʔ nštbq lh kl dyn dʕl rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ nʔmr lʔ nštbq lh lʔ bʕlmʔ hnʔ wlʔ bʕlmʔ dʕtyd
12:33	ʔw ʕbdw ʔylnʔ špyrʔ wpʔrwhy špyrʔ ʔw ʕbdw ʔylnʔ byšʔ wpʔrwhy byšʔ mn pʔrwhy hw gyr mtydʕ ʔylnʔ
12:34	yldʔ dʔkdnʔ ʔyknʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn ṭbtʔ lmmllw dbyšʔ ʔntwn mn twtry lbʔ gyr mmll pwmʔ
12:35	gbrʔ ṭbʔ mn symtʔ ṭbtʔ mpq ṭbtʔ wgbrʔ byšʔ mn symtʔ byštʔ mpq byštʔ
12:36	ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn gyr dkl mlʔ bṭlʔ dnʔmrwn bny ʔnšʔ ntlwn ptgmh bywmʔ ddynʔ
12:37	mn mlyk gyr tzddq wmn mlyk ttḥyb
12:38	hydyn ʕnw ʔnšʔ mn sprʔ wmn pryšʔ wʔmryn lh mlpnʔ ṣbyn ḥnn dnḥzʔ mnk ʔtʔ
12:39	hw dyn ʕnʔ wʔmr lhwn šrbtʔ byštʔ wgyrtʔ ʔtʔ bʕyʔ wʔtʔ lʔ ttyhb lh ʔlʔ ʔth dywnn nbyʔ
12:40	ʔyknʔ gyr dhwʔ ywnn bkrsh dnwnʔ tltʔ ywmyn wtltʔ lylwn hknʔ nhwʔ brh dʔnšʔ blbh dʔrʕʔ tltʔ ʔymmyn wtltʔ lylwn
12:41	gbrʔ nynwyʔ nqwmwn bdynʔ ʕm šrbtʔ hdʔ wnḥybwnh dhnwn tbw bkrwzwth dywnn whʔ drb mn ywnn tnn
12:42	mlktʔ dtymnʔ tqwm bdynʔ ʕm šrbtʔ hdʔ wtḥybyh dʔtt mn ʕbryh dʔrʕʔ dtšmʕ ḥkmth dšlymwn whʔ dytyr mn šlymwn hrkʔ
12:43	ʔmty dyn drwḥʔ ṭnptʔ tpwq mn brnšʔ mtkrkʔ bʔtrwtʔ dmyʔ lyt bhwn wbʕyʔ nyḥʔ wlʔ mškḥʔ
12:44	hydyn ʔmrʔ ʔhpwk lbyty mn ʔykʔ dnpqt wʔtyʔ mškḥʔ dsryq wḥmym wmṣbt
12:45	hydyn ʔzlʔ dbrʔ ʕmh šbʕ rwḥʔ ʔḥrnyn dmnh byšn wʕʔln wʕmrn bh whwyʔ ḥrth dgbrʔ hw byšʔ mn qdmyth hknʔ nhwʔ lh lšrbtʔ hdʔ byštʔ
12:46	kd hw dyn mmll lknšʔ ʔtw ʔmh wʔḥwhy qymyn lbr wbʕyn dnmllwn ʕmh
12:47	ʔmr lh dyn ʔnš hʔ ʔmk wʔḥyk qymyn lbr wbʕyn dnmllwn ʕmk
12:48	hw dyn ʕnʔ wʔmr lmn dʔmr lh mn hy ʔmy wmn ʔnwn ʔḥy
12:49	wpšṭ ʔydh lwt tlmydwhy wʔmr hʔ ʔmy whʔ ʔḥy
12:50	klnš gyr dʕbd ṣbynh dʔby dbšmyʔ hwyw ʔḥy wḥty wʔmy
13:01	bhw dyn ywmʔ npq yšwʕ mn bytʔ wytb ʕl yd ymʔ
13:02	wʔtknšw lwth knšʔ sgyʔʔ ʔyk dnsq ntb lh bʔlpʔ wklh knšʔ qʔm hwʔ ʕl spr ymʔ
13:03	wsgy mmll hwʔ ʕmhwn bplʔtʔ wʔmr hʔ npq zrwʕʔ dnzrwʕ
13:04	wkd zrʕ ʔyt dnpl ʕl yd ʔwrḥʔ wʔtt prḥtʔ wʔklth
13:05	wʔḥrnʔ npl ʕl šwʕʔ ʔykʔ dlyt hwʔ mdrʔ sgyʔʔ wbr šʕth šwḥ mṭl dlyt hwʔ ʕwmqʔ dʔrʕʔ
13:06	kd dnḥ dyn šmšʔ ḥm wmṭl dlyt hwʔ lh ʕqrʔ ybš
13:07	wʔḥrnʔ npl byt kwbʔ wslqw kwbʔ wḥnqwhy
13:08	wʔḥrnʔ npl bʔrʕʔ ṭbtʔ wyhb pʔrʔ ʔyt dmʔʔ wʔyt dštyn wʔyt dtltyn
13:09	mn dʔyt lh ʔdnʔ dnšmʕ nšmʕ
13:10	wqrbw tlmydwhy wʔmryn lh lmnʔ bplʔtʔ mmll ʔnt ʕmhwn
13:11	hw dyn ʕnʔ wʔmr lhwn dlkwn hw yhyb lmdʕ ʔrzʔ dmlkwtʔ dšmyʔ lhnwn dyn lʔ yhyb
13:12	lmn gyr dʔyt lh ntyhb lh wntytr lh
13:13	wlmn dlyt lh whw dʔyt lh nštql mnh mṭl hnʔ bplʔtʔ mmll ʔnʔ ʕmhwn mṭl dḥzyn wlʔ ḥzyn wšmʕyn wlʔ šmʕyn wlʔ mstklyn
13:14	wšlmʔ bhwn nbywth dʔšʕyʔ dʔmr dšmʕʔ tšmʕwn wlʔ tstklwn wmḥzʔ tḥzwn wlʔ tdʕwn
13:15	ʔtʕby lh gyr lbh dʕmʔ hnʔ wbʔdnyhwn yqyrʔyt šmʕw wʕynyhwn ʕmṣw dlʔ nḥzwn bʕynyhwn wnšmʕwn bʔdnyhwn wnstklwn blbhwn wntpnwn wʔsʔ ʔnwn
13:16	dylkwn dyn ṭwbyhyn lʕynykwn dḥzyn wlʔdnykwn dšmʕn
13:17	ʔmyn gyr ʔmrnʔ lkwn dsgyʔʔ nbyʔ wzdyqʔ ʔtrgrgw dnḥzwn mdm dḥzyn ʔntwn wlʔ ḥzw wlmšmʕ mdm dšmʕyn ʔntwn wlʔ šmʕw
13:18	ʔntwn dyn šmʕw mtlʔ dzrʕʔ
13:19	kl dšmʕ mltʔ dmlkwtʔ wlʔ mstkl bh ʔtʔ byšʔ wḥṭp mltʔ dzryʕʔ blbh hnw hw dʕl yd ʔwrḥʔ ʔzdrʕ
13:20	hw dyn dʕl šwʕʔ ʔzdrʕ hw hw dšmʕ mltʔ wbr šʕth bḥdwtʔ mqbl lh
13:21	lyt lh dyn ʕqrʔ bh ʔlʔ dzbnʔ hw wmʔ dhwʔ ʔwlṣnʔ ʔw rdwpyʔ mṭl mltʔ ʕgl mtkšl
13:22	hw dyn dbyt kwbʔ ʔzdrʕ hw hw dšmʕ mltʔ wrnyʔ dʕlmʔ hnʔ wṭwʕyy dʕwtrʔ ḥnqyn lh lmltʔ wdlʔ pʔrʔ hwyʔ
13:23	hw dyn dʕl ʔrʕʔ ṭbtʔ ʔzdrʕ hw hw dšmʕ mlty wmstkl wyhb pʔrʔ wʕbd ʔyt dmʔʔ wʔyt dštyn wʔyt dtltyn 
13:24	ʔḥrnʔ mtlʔ ʔmtl lhwn wʔmr dmyʔ mlkwtʔ dšmyʔ lgbrʔ dzrʕ zrʕʔ ṭbʔ bqryth
13:25	wkd dmkw ʔnšʔ ʔtʔ bʕldbbh wzrʕ zyznʔ bynt ḥṭʔ wʔzl
13:26	kd dyn yʕʔ ʕsbʔ wʕbd pʔrʔ hydyn ʔtḥzyw ʔp zyznʔ
13:27	wqrbw ʕbdwhy dmrʔ bytʔ wʔmrw lh mrn lʔ hʔ zrʕʔ ṭbʔ zrʕt bqrytk mn ʔymkʔ ʔyt bh zyznʔ
13:28	hw dyn ʔmr lhwn gbrʔ bʕldbbʔ ʕbd hdʔ ʔmryn lh ʕbdwhy ṣbʔ ʔnt nʔzl ngbʔ ʔnwn
13:29	hw dyn ʔmr lhwn dlmʔ kd mgbyn ʔntwn zyznʔ tʕqrwn ʕmhwn ʔp ḥṭʔ
13:30	šbwqw rbyn tryhwn ʔkḥdʔ ʕdmʔ lḥṣdʔ wbzbnʔ dḥṣdʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lḥṣwdʔ gbw lwqdm zyznʔ wʔswrw ʔnwn mʔsrytʔ dnʔqdwn ḥṭʔ dyn knšw ʔnyn lʔwṣry
13:31	ʔḥrnʔ mtlʔ ʔmtl lhwn wʔmr dmyʔ mlkwtʔ dšmyʔ lprdtʔ dḥrdlʔ dnsb gbrʔ zrʕh bqryth
13:32	why zʕwryʔ hy mn klhwn zrʕwnʔ mʔ dyn drbt rbʔ hy mn klhwn yrqwnʔ whwyʔ ʔylnʔ ʔyk dtʔtʔ prḥtʔ dšmyʔ tqn bswkyh
13:33	ʔḥrnʔ mtlʔ ʔmr lhwn dmyʔ mlkwtʔ dšmyʔ lḥmyrʔ hw dšqlt ʔnttʔ ṭmrt btlt sʔyn dqmḥʔ ʕdmʔ dklh ḥmʕ
13:34	hlyn klhyn mll yšwʕ bplʔtʔ lknšʔ wdlʔ plʔtʔ lʔ mmll hwʔ ʕmhwn
13:35	ʔyk dntmlʔ mdm dʔtʔmr byd nbyʔ dʔmr ʔptḥ pwmy bmtlʔ wʔbʕ ksytʔ dmn qdm trmyth dʕlmʔ
13:36	hydyn yšwʕ šbq lknšʔ wʔtʔ lbytʔ wqrbw lwth tlmydwhy wʔmryn lh pšq ln mtlʔ hw dzyznʔ wdqrytʔ
13:37	hw dyn ʕnʔ wʔmr lhwn hw dzrʕ zrʕʔ ṭbʔ ʔytwhy brh dʔnšʔ
13:38	wqrytʔ ʔytyh ʕlmʔ zrʕʔ dyn ṭbʔ bnyh ʔnwn dmlkwtʔ zyznʔ dyn ʔytyhwn bnwhy dbyšʔ
13:39	bʕldbbʔ dyn dzrʕ ʔnwn ʔytwhy sṭnʔ ḥṣdʔ dyn ʔytwhy šwlmh dʕlmʔ ḥṣwdʔ dyn mlʔkʔ
13:40	ʔyknʔ hkyl dmtgbyn zyznʔ wyqdyn bnwrʔ hknʔ nhwʔ bšwlmh dʕlmʔ hnʔ
13:41	nšdr brh dʔnšʔ mlʔkwhy wngbwn mn mlkwth klhwn mkšwlʔ wklhwn ʕbdy ʕwlʔ
13:42	wnrmwn ʔnwn bʔtwnʔ dnwrʔ tmn nhwʔ bkyʔ wḥwrq šnʔ
13:43	hydyn zdyqʔ nnhrwn ʔyk šmšʔ bmlkwth dʔbwhwn mn dʔyt lh ʔdnʔ dnšmʕ nšmʕ 
13:44	twb dmyʔ mlkwtʔ dšmyʔ lsymtʔ dmṭšyʔ bqrytʔ hy dʔškḥh gbrʔ wṭšyh wmn ḥdwth ʔzl zbn kl dʔyt lh wzbnh lqrytʔ hy
13:45	twb dmyʔ mlkwtʔ dšmyʔ lgbrʔ tgrʔ dbʕʔ hwʔ mrgnytʔ ṭbtʔ
13:46	kd dyn ʔškḥ mrgnytʔ ḥdʔ yqyrt dmyʔ ʔzl zbn kl mʔ dʔyt lh wzbnh
13:47	twb dmyʔ mlkwtʔ dšmyʔ lmṣydtʔ dnplt bymʔ wmn kl gns knšt
13:48	wkd mlt ʔsqwh lspry ymʔ wytbw gbyw wṭbʔ ʔrmyw bmʔnʔ wbyšʔ šdw lbr
13:49	hknʔ nhwʔ bšwlmh dʕlmʔ npqwn mlʔkʔ wnpršwn byšʔ mn byny zdyqʔ
13:50	wnrmwn ʔnwn bʔtwnʔ dnwrʔ tmn nhwʔ bkyʔ wḥwrq šnʔ
13:51	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔstkltwn klhyn hlyn ʔmryn lh ʔyn mrn
13:52	ʔmr lhwn mṭl hnʔ kl sprʔ dmttlmd lmlkwt šmyʔ dmʔ lgbrʔ mrʔ bytʔ dmpq mn symth ḥdttʔ wʕtyqtʔ
13:53	whwʔ dkd šlm yšwʕ mtlʔ hlyn šny mn tmn
13:54	wʔtʔ lmdynth wmlp hwʔ lhwn bknwšthwn ʔyknʔ dnthrwn wnʔmrwn ʔymkʔ lh lhnʔ ḥkmtʔ hdʔ wḥylʔ
13:55	lʔ hwʔ hnʔ brh dngrʔ lʔ ʔmh mtqryʔ mrym wʔḥwhy yʕqwb wywsʔ wšmʕwn wyhwdʔ
13:56	wʔḥwth klhyn lʔ hʔ lwtn ʔnyn ʔymkʔ lh hkyl lhnʔ hlyn klhyn
13:57	wmtkšlyn hww bh hw dyn yšwʕ ʔmr lhwn lyt nbyʔ dṣʕyr ʔlʔ bmdynth wbbyth
13:58	wlʔ ʕbd tmn ḥylʔ sgyʔʔ mṭl lʔ hymnwthwn
14:01	bhw dyn zbnʔ šmʕ hrwds ṭṭrrkʔ šmʕh dyšwʕ
14:02	wʔmr lʕbdwhy hnw ywḥnn mʕmdnʔ hw qm mn byt mytʔ mṭl hnʔ ḥylʔ mstʕryn bh
14:03	hw gyr hrwds ʔḥd hwʔ lywḥnn wʔsrh wʔrmyh byt ʔsyrʔ mṭl hrwdyʔ ʔntt pylypws ʔḥwhy
14:04	ʔmr hwʔ lh gyr ywḥnn dlʔ šlyṭ dthwʔ lk ʔnttʔ
14:05	wṣbʔ hwʔ lmqṭlh wdḥl hwʔ mn ʕmʔ dʔyk dlnbyʔ ʔḥydyn hww lh
14:06	kd hwʔ dyn byt yldh dhrwds rqdt brth dhrwdyʔ qdm smykʔ wšprt lh lhrwds
14:07	mṭl hnʔ bmwmtʔ ymʔ lh dntl lh klmdm dtšʔl
14:08	hy dyn mṭl dmlpʔ hwt lʔmh ʔmrt hb ly hrkʔ bpynkʔ ršh dywḥnn mʕmdnʔ
14:09	wkryt lh lmlkʔ mṭl dyn mwmtʔ wsmykʔ pqd dntyhb lh
14:10	wšdr psqh ršh dywḥnn byt ʔsyrʔ
14:11	wʔyty ršh bpynkʔ wʔtyhb lṭlytʔ wʔytyth lʔmh
14:12	wqrbw tlmydwhy šqlw šldh qbrw wʔtw ḥwyw lyšwʕ 
14:13	yšwʕ dyn kd šmʕ šny mn tmn bʔlpʔ lʔtrʔ ḥwrbʔ blḥwdwhy wkd šmʕw knšʔ ʔzlw btrh bybšʔ mn mdyntʔ
14:14	wnpq yšwʕ ḥzʔ knšʔ sgyʔʔ wʔtrḥm ʕlyhwn wʔsy kryhyhwn
14:15	kd hwʔ dyn rmšʔ qrbw lwth tlmydwhy wʔmrw lh ʔtrʔ ḥwrbʔ hw wʕdnʔ ʕbr lh šry knšʔ dʔnšʔ dnʔzlwn lqwryʔ wnzbnwn lhwn sybrtʔ
14:16	hw dyn ʔmr lhwn lʔ mtbʕʔ lhwn lmʔzl hbw lhwn ʔntwn lmʔkl
14:17	hnwn dyn ʔmrw lh lyt ln tnn ʔlʔ ḥmš gryṣn wtryn nwnyn
14:18	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔytw ʔnwn ly lhrkʔ
14:19	wpqd lknšʔ lmstmkw ʕl ʔrʕʔ wšql hnwn ḥmšʔ lḥmyn wtryn nwnyn wḥr bšmyʔ wbrk wqṣʔ wyhb ltlmydwhy whnwn tlmydʔ smw lknšʔ
14:20	wʔklw klhwn wsbʕw wšqlw twtrʔ dqṣyʔ trʕsr qwpynyn kd mlyn
14:21	hnwn dyn ʔnšʔ dʔklw hwyn hww ʔlpʔ ḥmšʔ sṭr mn nšʔ wṭlyʔ
14:22	wmḥdʔ ʔlṣ ltlmydwhy dnsqwn lspyntʔ wnʔzlwn qdmwhy lʕbrʔ ʕd šrʔ hw lknšʔ
14:23	wkd šrʔ lknšʔ slq lṭwrʔ blḥwdwhy lmṣlyw wkd ḥškt blḥwdwhy hwʔ tmn
14:24	wʔlpʔ rḥyqʔ hwt mn ʔrʕʔ ʔsṭdwtʔ sgyʔʔ kd mštgšʔ sgy mn gllʔ rwḥʔ gyr lqwblh hwt
14:25	bmṭrtʔ dyn rbyʕytʔ dllyʔ ʔtʔ lwthwn yšwʕ kd mhlk ʕl myʔ
14:26	wḥzʔwhy tlmydwhy dmhlk ʕl myʔ wʔttzyʕw wʔmryn hww dḥzwʔ hw dglʔ wmn dḥlthwn qʕw
14:27	hw dyn yšwʕ bršʕth mll ʕmhwn wʔmr ʔtlbbw ʔnʔ ʔnʔ lʔ tdḥlwn
14:28	wʕnʔ kʔpʔ wʔmr lh mry ʔn ʔnt hw pqwd ly ʔtʔ lwtk ʕl myʔ
14:29	yšwʕ dyn ʔmr lh tʔ wnḥt kʔpʔ mn ʔlpʔ whlk ʕl myʔ dnʔtʔ lwt yšwʕ
14:30	wkd ḥzʔ rwḥʔ dqšyʔ dḥl wšry lmṭbʕ wʔrym qlh wʔmr mry prwqyny
14:31	wbr šʕth pšṭ ʔydh mrn wʔḥdh wʔmr lh zʕwr hymnwtʔ lmnʔ ʔtplgt
14:32	wkd slqw lʔlpʔ šlyt rwḥʔ
14:33	wʔtw hnwn dbʔlpʔ sgdw lh wʔmrw šryrʔyt brh ʔnt dʔlhʔ
14:34	wrdw wʔtw lʔrʕʔ dgnsr
14:35	wʔštwdʕwhy ʔnšʔ dʔtrʔ hw wšdrw lklhyn qwryʔ dḥdryhwn wqrbw lh klhwn ʔylyn dbyš byš ʕbydyn
14:36	wbʕyn hww mnh dnqrbwn ʔpn lknpʔ blḥwd dlbwšh wʔylyn dqrbw ʔtʔsyw
15:01	hydyn qrbw lwt yšwʕ pryšʔ wsprʔ dmn ʔwršlm wʔmryn
15:02	lmnʔ tlmydyk ʕbryn ʕl mšlmnwtʔ dqšyšʔ wlʔ mšygyn ʔydyhwn mʔ dʔklyn lḥmʔ
15:03	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn lmnʔ ʔp ʔntwn ʕbryn ʔntwn ʕl pwqdnʔ dʔlhʔ mṭl mšlmnwtkwn
15:04	ʔlhʔ gyr ʔmr yqr lʔbwk wlʔmk wmn dmṣḥʔ lʔbwhyw lʔmh mmt nmwt
15:05	ʔntwn dyn ʔmryn ʔntwn kl mn dnʔmr lʔbʔ ʔw lʔmʔ qwrbny mdm dtthnʔ mny wlʔ nyqr lʔbwhy ʔw lʔmh
15:06	wbṭltwn mltʔ dʔlhʔ mṭl mšlmnwtʔ dylkwn
15:07	nsby bʔpʔ špyr ʔtnby ʕlykwn ʔšʕyʔ wʔmr
15:08	ʕmʔ hnʔ bspwth hw myqr ly lbhwn dyn sgy rḥyq mny
15:09	wsryqʔyt dḥlyn ly kd mlpyn ywlpnʔ dpwqdnʔ dbnynšʔ
15:10	wqrʔ lknšʔ wʔmr lhwn šmʕw wʔstklw
15:11	lʔ hwʔ mdm dʕʔl lpwmʔ msyb lbrnšʔ ʔlʔ mdm dnpq mn pwmʔ hw hw msyb lbrnšʔ
15:12	hydyn qrbw tlmydwhy wʔmryn lh ydʕ ʔnt dpryšʔ dšmʕw mltʔ hdʔ ʔtkšlw
15:13	hw dyn ʕnʔ wʔmr lhwn kl nṣbtʔ ʔydʔ dlʔ nṣbh ʔby dbšmyʔ ttʕqr
15:14	šbwqw lhwn smyʔ ʔnwn ngwdʔ dsmyʔ smyʔ dyn lsmyʔ ʔn ndbr tryhwn bgwmṣʔ nplyn
15:15	wʕnʔ šmʕwn kʔpʔ wʔmr lh mry pšq ln mtlʔ hnʔ
15:16	hw dyn ʔmr lhwn ʕdmʔ lhšʔ ʔp ʔntwn lʔ mstklyn ʔntwn
15:17	lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn dmdm dʕʔl lpwmʔ lkrsʔ hw ʔzl wmn tmn btdkytʔ mštdʔ lbr
15:18	mdm dyn dmn pwmʔ npq mn lbʔ npq whwyw msyb lh lbrnšʔ
15:19	mn lbʔ hw gyr npqn mḥšbtʔ byštʔ gwrʔ qṭlʔ znywtʔ gnbwtʔ shdwt šwqrʔ gwdpʔ
15:20	hlyn ʔnyn dmsybn lbrnšʔ ʔn ʔnš dyn nlʕs kd lʔ mšgn ʔydwhy lʔ mstyb
15:21	wnpq mn tmn yšwʕ wʔtʔ ltḥwmʔ dṣwr wdṣydn
15:22	whʔ ʔnttʔ knʕnytʔ mn tḥwmʔ hnwn npqt kd qʕyʔ wʔmrʔ ʔtrḥm ʕly mry brh ddwyd brty byšʔyt mtdbrʔ mn šʔdʔ
15:23	hw dyn lʔ pnyh ptgmʔ wqrbw tlmydwhy bʕw mnh wʔmryn šryh dqʕyʔ btrn
15:24	hw dyn ʕnʔ wʔmr lhwn lʔ ʔštdrt ʔlʔ lwt ʕrbʔ dṭʕw mn byt ʔysryl
15:25	hy dyn ʔtt sgdt lh wʔmrt mry ʕdryny
15:26	ʔmr lh lʔ špyr lmsb lḥmʔ dbnyʔ wlmrmyw lklbʔ
15:27	hy dyn ʔmrt ʔyn mry ʔp klbʔ ʔklyn mn prtwtʔ dnplyn mn ptwrʔ dmryhwn wḥʔyn
15:28	hydyn ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔw ʔnttʔ rbʔ hy hymnwtky nhwʔ lky ʔyk dṣbyʔ ʔnty wʔtʔsyt brth mn hy šʕtʔ 
15:29	wšny mn tmn yšwʕ wʔtʔ ʕl gnb ymʔ dglylʔ wslq lṭwrʔ wytb tmn
15:30	wqrbw lwth knšʔ sgyʔʔ dʔyt hww ʕmhwn ḥgyrʔ wsmyʔ wḥršʔ wpšygʔ wʔḥrnʔ sgyʔʔ wʔrmyw ʔnwn lwt rglwhy dyšwʕ wʔsy ʔnwn
15:31	ʔyk dntdmrwn knšʔ hnwn dḥzyn ḥršʔ dmmllyn wpšygʔ dmtḥlmyn wḥgyrʔ dmhlkyn wsmyʔ dḥzyn wšbḥw lʔlhʔ dysryl
15:32	hw dyn yšwʕ qrʔ ltlmydwhy wʔmr lhwn mtrḥm ʔnʔ ʕl knšʔ hnʔ dhʔ tltʔ ywmyn qwyw lwty wlyt lhwn mʔ dnʔklwn wdʔšrʔ ʔnwn kd ṣymyn lʔ ṣbʔ ʔnʔ dlmʔ nʕwpwn bʔwrḥʔ
15:33	ʔmryn lh tlmydwhy ʔymkʔ ln bḥwrbʔ lḥmʔ dnsbʕ knšʔ hnʔ klh
15:34	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ kmʔ lḥmyn ʔyt lkwn ʔmryn lh šbʕʔ wqlyl nwnʔ dqdqʔ
15:35	wpqd lknšʔ dnstmkwn ʕl ʔrʕʔ
15:36	wšql lhlyn šbʕʔ lḥmyn wlnwnʔ wšbḥ wqṣʔ wyhb ltlmydwhy wtlmydʔ yhbw lknšʔ
15:37	wʔklw klhwn wsbʕw wšqlw twtrʔ dqṣyʔ mlʔ šbʕʔ ʔsprydyn
15:38	hnwn dyn dʔklw hwyn hww ʔrbʕʔ ʔlpyn gbrʔ sṭr mn nšʔ wṭlyʔ
15:39	wkd šrʔ lknšʔ slq lʔlpʔ wʔtʔ ltḥwmʔ dmgdw
16:01	wqrbw pryšʔ wzdwqyʔ mnsyn lh wšʔlyn lh ʔtʔ mn šmyʔ dnḥwʔ ʔnwn
16:02	hw dyn ʕnʔ wʔmr lhwn mʔ dhwʔ rmšʔ ʔmryn ʔntwn ṣḥwʔ hw smqt gyr šmyʔ
16:03	wbṣprʔ ʔmryn ʔntwn ywmnʔ stwʔ hw smqt gyr šmyʔ kmyrʔyt nsby bʔpʔ prṣwpʔ dšmyʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn dtbqwn ʔtwtʔ dzbnʔ hnʔ lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn dtpršwn
16:04	šrbtʔ byštʔ wgyrtʔ ʔtʔ bʕyʔ wʔtʔ lʔ mtyhbʔ lh ʔlʔ ʔth dywnn nbyʔ wšbq ʔnwn wʔzl
16:05	wkd ʔtw tlmydwhy lʕbrʔ ṭʕw dnsbwn ʕmhwn lḥmʔ
16:06	hw dyn ʔmr lhwn ḥzw ʔzdhrw mn ḥmyrʔ dpryšʔ wdzdwqyʔ
16:07	hnwn dyn mtrʕyn hww bnpšhwn wʔmryn dlḥmʔ lʔ nsbw
16:08	yšwʕ dyn ydʕ wʔmr lhwn mnʔ mtḥšbyn ʔntwn bnpškwn zʕwry hymnwtʔ dlḥmʔ lʔ šqltwn
16:09	lʔ ʕdmʔ lhšʔ ʔstkltwn lʔ ʕhdyn ʔntwn lhnwn ḥmšʔ lḥmyn dḥmšʔ ʔlpyn wkmʔ qwpynyn šqltwn
16:10	wlʔ lhnwn šbʕʔ lḥmyn dʔrbʕʔ ʔlpyn wkmʔ ʔsprydyn šqltwn
16:11	ʔykn lʔ ʔstkltwn dlʔ hwʔ ʕl lḥmʔ ʔmrt lkwn ʔlʔ dtzdhrwn mn ḥmyrʔ dpryšʔ wdzdwqyʔ
16:12	hydyn ʔstklw dlʔ ʔmr dnzdhrwn mn ḥmyrʔ dlḥmʔ ʔlʔ mn ywlpnʔ dpryšʔ wdzdwqyʔ
16:13	kd dyn ʔtʔ yšwʕ lʔtrʔ dqsryʔ dpylypws mšʔl hwʔ ltlmydwhy wʔmr mnw ʔmryn ʕly ʔnšʔ dʔyty brh dʔnšʔ
16:14	hnwn dyn ʔmrw ʔyt dʔmryn ywḥnn mʕmdnʔ ʔḥrnʔ dyn ʔlyʔ wʔḥrnʔ ʔrmyʔ ʔw ḥd mn nbyʔ
16:15	ʔmr lhwn ʔntwn dyn mnw ʔmryn ʔntwn dʔyty
16:16	ʕnʔ šmʕwn kʔpʔ wʔmr ʔnt hw mšyḥʔ brh dʔlhʔ ḥyʔ
16:17	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lh ṭwbyk šmʕwn brh dywnʔ dbsrʔ wdmʔ lʔ glʔ lk ʔlʔ ʔby dbšmyʔ
16:18	ʔp ʔnʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lk dʔnt hw kʔpʔ wʕl hdʔ kʔpʔ ʔbnyh lʕdty wtrʕʔ dšywl lʔ nḥsnwnh
16:19	lk ʔtl qlydʔ dmlkwtʔ dšmyʔ wkl mdm dtʔswr bʔrʕʔ nhwʔ ʔsyr bšmyʔ wmdm dtšrʔ bʔrʕʔ nhwʔ šrʔ bšmyʔ
16:20	hydyn pqd ltlmydwhy dlʔnš lʔ nʔmrwn dhwyw mšyḥʔ
16:21	wmn hydyn šry yšwʕ lmḥwyw ltlmydwhy dʕtyd hw dnʔzl lʔwršlm wsgy nḥš mn qšyšʔ wmn rby khnʔ wsprʔ wntqṭl wlywmʔ dtltʔ nqwm
16:22	wdbrh kʔpʔ wšry lmkʔʔ bh wʔmr ḥs lk mry dthwʔ lk hdʔ
16:23	hw dyn ʔtpny wʔmr lkʔpʔ zl lk lbstry sṭnʔ twqltʔ ʔnt ly dlʔ mtrʕʔ ʔnt dʔlhʔ ʔlʔ dbny ʔnšʔ
16:24	hydyn ʔmr yšwʕ ltlmydwhy mn dṣbʔ dnʔtʔ btry nkpwr bnpšh wnšqwl zqyph wnʔtʔ btry
16:25	mn dṣbʔ gyr dnḥʔ npšh nwbdyh wmn dnwbd npšh mṭlty nškḥyh
16:26	mnʔ gyr mthnʔ brnšʔ ʔn klh ʕlmʔ nqnʔ wnpšh nḥsr ʔw mnʔ ntl brnšʔ tḥlwpʔ dnpšh
16:27	ʕtyd hw gyr brh dʔnšʔ dnʔtʔ btšbwḥtʔ dʔbwhy ʕm mlʔkwhy qdyšʔ whydyn nprwʕ lʔnš ʔnš ʔyk ʕbdwhy
16:28	ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dʔyt ʔnšʔ dqymyn tnn dlʔ nṭʕmwn mwtʔ ʕdmʔ dnḥzwn lbrh dʔnšʔ dʔtʔ bmlkwth
17:01	wbtr štʔ ywmyn dbr yšwʕ lkʔpʔ wlyʕqwb wlywḥnn ʔḥwhy wʔsq ʔnwn lṭwrʔ rmʔ blḥwdyhwn
17:02	wʔštḥlp yšwʕ qdmyhwn wnhr prṣwph ʔyk šmšʔ nḥtwhy dyn ḥwrw ʔyk nwhrʔ
17:03	wʔtḥzyw lhwn mwšʔ wʔlyʔ kd mmllyn ʕmh
17:04	ʕnʔ dyn kʔpʔ wʔmr lyšwʕ mry špyr hw ln dtnn nhwʔ wʔn ṣbʔ ʔnt nʕbd tnn tlt mṭlyn ḥdʔ lk wḥdʔ lmwšʔ wḥdʔ lʔlyʔ
17:05	wʕd hw mmll hʔ ʕnnʔ nhyrtʔ ʔṭlt ʕlyhwn wqlʔ hwʔ mn ʕnnʔ dʔmr hnw bry ḥbybʔ dbh ʔṣṭbyt lh šmʕw 
17:06	wkd šmʕw tlmydʔ nplw ʕl ʔpyhwn wdḥlw ṭb
17:07	wʔtqrb lwthwn yšwʕ wqrb lhwn wʔmr qwmw lʔ tdḥlwn
17:08	wʔrymw ʕynyhwn wlʔnš lʔ ḥzw ʔlʔ ʔn lyšwʕ blḥwdwhy
17:09	wkd nḥtyn mn ṭwrʔ pqd ʔnwn yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn lʕyn ʔnš lʔ tʔmrwn ḥzwʔ hnʔ ʕdmʔ dnqwm brh dʔnšʔ mn mytʔ
17:10	wšʔlwhy tlmydwhy wʔmryn lh mnʔ hkyl sprʔ ʔmryn dʔlyʔ wlʔ dnʔtʔ lwqdm
17:11	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr ʔlyʔ ʔtʔ lwqdm dkl mdm nšlm
17:12	ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dyn dhʔ ʔlyʔ ʔtʔ wlʔ ydʕwhy wʕbdw bh kl mʔ dṣbw hknʔ ʔp brh dʔnšʔ ʕtyd dnḥš mnhwn
17:13	hydyn ʔstklw tlmydʔ dʕl ywḥnn mʕmdnʔ ʔmr lhwn
17:14	wkd ʔtw lwt knšʔ qrb lh gbrʔ wbrk ʕl bwrkwhy
17:15	wʔmr lh mry ʔtrḥm ʕly bry dʔyt lh br ʔgrʔ wbyšʔ ytʕbyd kmʔ gyr zbnyn bnwrʔ npl wkmʔ zbnyn bmyʔ
17:16	wqrbth ltlmydyk wlʔ ʔškḥw lmʔsywth
17:17	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr ʔwn šrbtʔ dlʔ mhymnʔ wmʕqltʔ ʕdmʔ lʔmty ʔhwʔ ʕmkwn wʕdmʔ lʔmty ʔsybrkwn ʔytyhy ly lkʔ
17:18	wkʔʔ bh yšwʕ wnpq mnh šʔdʔ wʔtʔsy ṭlyʔ mn hy šʕtʔ
17:19	hydyn qrbw tlmydʔ lwt yšwʕ blḥwdwhy wʔmrw lh lmnʔ ḥnn lʔ ʔškḥn lmʔsywth
17:20	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ mṭl lʔ hymnwtkwn ʔmyn gyr ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dʔn thwʔ bkwn hymnwtʔ ʔyk prdtʔ dḥrdlʔ tʔmrwn lṭwrʔ hnʔ dšnʔ mkʔ wnšnʔ wmdm lʔ nḥsnkwn
17:21	hnʔ dyn gnsʔ lʔ npq ʔlʔ bṣwmʔ wbṣlwtʔ
17:22	kd mthpkyn dyn bglylʔ ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʕtyd hw brh dʔnšʔ dnštlm bʔydy bny ʔnšʔ
17:23	wnqṭlwnyhy wlywmʔ dtltʔ nqwm wkryt lhwn ṭb
17:24	wkd ʔtw lkprnḥwm qrbw hnwn dnsbyn tryn tryn zwzyn dksp ršʔ lwt kʔpʔ wʔmrw lh rbkwn lʔ yhb tryn zwzwhy
17:25	ʔmr lhwn ʔyn wkd ʕl kʔpʔ lbytʔ qdmh yšwʕ wʔmr lh mnʔ mtḥzʔ lk šmʕwn mlkyh dʔrʕʔ mn mn nsbyn mksʔ wksp ršʔ mn bnyhwn ʔw mn nwkryʔ
17:26	ʔmr lh šmʕwn mn nwkryʔ ʔmr lh yšwʕ mdyn bny ḥʔrʔ ʔnwn bnyʔ
17:27	dlʔ dyn nkšl ʔnwn zl lymʔ wʔrmʔ blwʕʔ wnwnʔ qdmyʔ dslq ptḥ pwmh wtškḥ ʔstrʔ hy sb whb ḥlpy wḥlpyk
18:01	bhy šʕtʔ qrbw tlmydʔ lwt yšwʕ wʔmryn mnw ky rb bmlkwtʔ dšmyʔ
18:02	wqrʔ yšwʕ ṭlyʔ wʔqymh bynthwn
18:03	wʔmr ʔmyn ʔmrnʔ lkwn dʔlʔ tthpkwn wthwwn ʔyk ṭlyʔ lʔ tʕlwn lmlkwtʔ dšmyʔ
18:04	mn hkyl dmmkk npšh ʔyk hnʔ ṭlyʔ hw nhwʔ rb bmlkwtʔ dšmyʔ
18:05	wmn dnqbl ʔyk ṭlyʔ hnʔ bšmy ly mqbl
18:06	wkl dnkšl lḥd mn hlyn zʕwrʔ dmhymnyn by pqḥ hwʔ lh dthwʔ tlyʔ rḥyʔ dḥmrʔ bṣwrh wmṭbʕ bʕwmqwhy dymʔ
18:07	wy lʕlmʔ mn mkšwlʔ ʔnnqʔ gyr dnʔtwn mkšwlʔ wy dyn lgbrʔ dbʔydh nʔtwn mkšwlʔ
18:08	ʔn dyn ʔydk ʔw rglk mkšlʔ lk pswqyh wšdyh mnk ṭb hw lk dtʕwl lḥyʔ kd ḥgys ʔnt ʔw kd pšyg wlʔ kd ʔyt lk trtyn ʔydyn ʔw trtyn rglyn tpl bnwrʔ dlʕlm
18:09	wʔn hw dʕynk mkšlʔ lk ḥṣyh wšdyh mnk ṭb hw lk dbḥdʔ ʕynʔ tʕwl lḥyʔ wlʔ kd ʔyt lk trtyn ʕynyn tpl bghnʔ dnwrʔ
18:10	ḥzw lʔ tbswn ʕl ḥd mn hlyn zʕwrʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn gyr dmlʔkyhwn bšmyʔ bklzbn ḥzyn prṣwph dʔby dbšmyʔ
18:11	ʔtʔ gyr brh dʔnšʔ dnḥʔ mdm dʔbyd hwʔ
18:12	mnʔ mtḥzʔ lkwn ʔn nhwwn lʔnš mʔʔ ʕrbyn wnṭʕʔ ḥd mnhwn lʔ šbq tšʕyn wtšʕʔ bṭwrʔ wʔzl bʕʔ lhw dṭʕʔ
18:13	wʔn nškḥh ʔmyn ʔmrnʔ lkwn dḥdʔ bh ytyr mn tšʕyn wtšʕʔ dlʔ ṭʕw
18:14	hknʔ lyt ṣbynʔ qdm ʔbwkwn dbšmyʔ dnʔbd ḥd mn zʕwrʔ hlyn
18:15	ʔn dyn ʔskl bk ʔḥwk zl ʔksyhy bynyk wlh blḥwd ʔn šmʕk ytrt ʔḥwk
18:16	wʔlʔ šmʕk dbr ʕmk ḥd ʔw tryn dʕl pwm tryn ʔw tltʔ shdyn tqwm kl mlʔ
18:17	ʔn dyn ʔp lʔ lhnwn nšmʕ ʔmr lʕdtʔ ʔn dyn ʔp lʔ lʕdtʔ nšmʕ nhwʔ lk ʔyk mksʔ wʔyk ḥnpʔ
18:18	wʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dkl mʔ dtʔsrwn bʔrʕʔ nhwʔ ʔsyr bšmyʔ wmdm dtšrwn bʔrʕʔ nhwʔ šrʔ bšmyʔ
18:19	twb ʔmrnʔ lkwn dʔn tryn mnkwn nštwwn bʔrʕʔ ʕl kl ṣbw dnšʔlwn nhwʔ lhwn mn lwt ʔby dbšmyʔ
18:20	ʔykʔ gyr dtryn ʔw tltʔ knyšyn bšmy tmn ʔnʔ bynthwn
18:21	hydyn qrb lwth kʔpʔ wʔmr mry kmʔ zbnyn ʔn nskl by ʔḥy ʔšbwq lh ʕdmʔ lšbʕ zbnyn
18:22	ʔmr lh yšwʕ lʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lk ʕdmʔ lšbʕ ʔlʔ ʕdmʔ lšbʕyn zbnyn šbʕ šbʕ 
18:23	mṭl hnʔ ʔtdmyt mlkwtʔ dšmyʔ lgbrʔ mlkʔ dṣbʔ dnsb ḥwšbnʔ mn ʕbdwhy
18:24	wkd šry lmsb qrbw lh ḥd dḥyb rbw kkryn
18:25	wkd lyt lh lmprʕ pqd mrh dnzdbn hw wʔntth wbnwhy wkl mdm dʔyt lh wnprwʕ
18:26	wnpl hw ʕbdʔ sgd lh wʔmr mry ʔgr ʕly rwḥʔ wkl mdm prʕ ʔnʔ lk
18:27	wʔtrḥm mrh dʕbdʔ hw wšryhy wḥwbth šbq lh
18:28	npq dyn ʕbdʔ hw wʔškḥ lḥd mn knwth dḥyb hwʔ lh dynrʔ mʔʔ wʔḥdh wḥnq hwʔ lh wʔmr lh hbly mdm dḥyb ʔnt ly
18:29	wnpl hw knth ʕl rglwhy bʕʔ mnh wʔmr lh ʔgr ʕly rwḥʔ wprʕ ʔnʔ lk
18:30	hw dyn lʔ ṣbʔ ʔlʔ ʔzl ʔrmyh byt ʔsyrʔ ʕdmʔ dntl lh mʔ dḥyb lh
18:31	kd ḥzw dyn knwthwn mdm dhwʔ kryt lhwn ṭb wʔtw ʔwdʕw lmrhwn kl dhwʔ
18:32	hydyn qryhy mrh wʔmr lh ʕbdʔ byšʔ hy klh ḥwbtʔ šbqt lk dbʕyt mny
18:33	lʔ wlʔ hwʔ lk ʔp ʔnt dtḥwn lkntk ʔyknʔ dʔnʔ ḥntk
18:34	wrgz mrh wʔšlmh lmngdnʔ ʕdmʔ dnprwʕ kl mdm dḥyb lh
18:35	hknʔ nʕbd lkwn ʔby dbšmyʔ ʔlʔ tšbqwn ʔnš lʔḥwhy mn lbkwn sklwth
19:01	whwʔ dkd šlm yšwʕ mlʔ hlyn šql mn glylʔ wʔtʔ ltḥwmʔ dyhwd lʕbrʔ dywrdnn
19:02	wʔtw btrh knšʔ sgyʔʔ wʔsy ʔnwn tmn
19:03	wqrbw lwth pryšʔ wmnsyn hww lh wʔmryn ʔn šlyṭ lʔnš dnšrʔ ʔntth bkl ʕlʔ
19:04	hw dyn ʕnʔ wʔmr lhwn lʔ qrytwn dhw dʕbd mn bršyt dkrʔ wnqbtʔ ʕbd ʔnwn
19:05	wʔmr mṭl hnʔ nšbwq gbrʔ lʔbwhy wlʔmh wnqp lʔntth wnhwwn tryhwn ḥd bsr
19:06	mdyn lʔ hww tryn ʔlʔ ḥd pgr mdm hkyl dʔlhʔ zwg brnšʔ lʔ nprš
19:07	ʔmryn lh lmnʔ hkyl mwšʔ pqd dntl ktbʔ dšwbqnʔ wnšryh
19:08	ʔmr lhwn mwšʔ lwqbl qšywt lbkwn ʔps lkwn dtšrwn nšykwn mn bršyt dyn lʔ hwʔ hknʔ
19:09	ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dyn dmn dšbq ʔntth dlʔ gwrʔ wnsb ʔḥrtʔ gʔr wmn dnsb šbyqtʔ gʔr
19:10	ʔmryn lh tlmydwhy ʔn hknʔ ʔyt ʕdlyʔ byny gbrʔ lʔnttʔ lʔ pqḥ lmsb ʔnttʔ
19:11	hw dyn ʔmr lhwn lʔ klnš spq lh lmltʔ hdʔ ʔlʔ mn dyhyb lh
19:12	ʔyt gyr mhymnʔ dmn krsʔ dʔmhwn ʔtyldw hknʔ wʔyt mhymnʔ dmn bnynšʔ hww mhymnʔ wʔyt mhymnʔ dhnwn ʕbdw npšhwn mhymnʔ mṭl mlkwtʔ dšmyʔ mn dmškḥ dnspq nspq
19:13	hydyn qrbw lh ṭlyʔ dnsym ʔydh ʕlyhwn wnṣlʔ wkʔw bhwn tlmydwhy
19:14	hw dyn yšwʕ ʔmr lhwn šbwqw ṭlyʔ ʔtyn lwty wlʔ tklwn ʔnwn ddʔylyn gyr dʔyk hlyn ʔnwn ʔytyh mlkwtʔ dšmyʔ
19:15	wsm ʔydh ʕlyhwn wʔzl mn tmn
19:16	wʔtʔ ḥd qrb wʔmr lh mlpnʔ ṭbʔ mnʔ dṭb ʔʕbd dnhwwn ly ḥyʔ dlʕlm
19:17	hw dyn ʔmr lh mnʔ qrʔ ʔnt ly ṭbʔ lyt ṭbʔ ʔlʔ ʔn ḥd ʔlhʔ ʔn dyn ṣbʔ ʔnt dtʕwl lḥyʔ ṭr pwqdnʔ
19:18	ʔmr lh ʔylyn hw dyn yšwʕ ʔmr lh dlʔ tqṭwl wlʔ tgwr wlʔ tgnwb wlʔ tshd shdwt šwqrʔ
19:19	wyqr lʔbwk wlʔmk wtḥb lqrybk ʔyk npšk
19:20	ʔmr lh hw ʕlymʔ hlyn klhyn nṭrt ʔnyn mn ṭlywty mnʔ ḥsyr ʔnʔ
19:21	ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔn ṣbʔ ʔnt gmyrʔ lmhwʔ zl zbn qnynk whb lmsknʔ wthwʔ lk symtʔ bšmyʔ wtʔ btry
19:22	šmʕ dyn hw ʕlymʔ mltʔ hdʔ wʔzl kd kryʔ lh ʔyt hwʔ lh gyr qnynʔ sgyʔʔ
19:23	yšwʕ dyn ʔmr ltlmydwhy ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dʕṭlʔ hy lʕtyrʔ dnʕwl lmlkwt šmyʔ
19:24	twb dyn ʔmrnʔ lkwn ddlyl hw lgmlʔ lmʕl bḥrwrʔ dmḥṭʔ ʔw ʕtyrʔ dnʕwl lmlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ
19:25	tlmydʔ dyn kd šmʕw thyryn hww ṭb wʔmryn mnw ky mškḥ dnḥʔ
19:26	ḥr bhwn yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn lwt bnynšʔ hdʔ lʔ mškḥʔ lwt ʔlhʔ dyn klmdm mškḥʔ
19:27	hydyn ʕnʔ kʔpʔ wʔmr lh hʔ ʔnḥnn šbqn klmdm wʔtyn btrk mnʔ ky nhwʔ ln
19:28	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dʔntwn dʔtytwn btry bʕlmʔ ḥdtʔ mʔ dytb brh dʔnšʔ ʕl trnws dšwbḥh ttbwn ʔp ʔntwn ʕl trʕsr kwrswn wtdwnwn trʕsr šbṭʔ dʔysrʔyl
19:29	wklnš dšbq btʔ ʔw ʔḥʔ ʔw ʔḥwtʔ ʔw ʔbʔ ʔw ʔmʔ ʔw ʔnttʔ ʔw bnyʔ ʔw qwryʔ mṭl šmy ḥd bmʔʔ nqbl wḥyʔ dlʕlm nʔrt
19:30	sgyʔʔ dyn qdmyʔ dnhwwn ʔḥryʔ wʔḥryʔ qdmyʔ
20:01	dmyʔ gyr mlkwtʔ dšmyʔ lgbrʔ mrʔ bytʔ dnpq bṣprʔ dnʔgwr pʕlʔ lkrmh
20:02	qṣ dyn ʕm pʕlʔ mn dynrʔ bywmʔ wšdr ʔnwn lkrmh
20:03	wnpq btlt šʕyn wḥzʔ ʔḥrnʔ dqymyn bšwqʔ wbṭylyn
20:04	wʔmr lhwn zlw ʔp ʔntwn lkrmʔ wmdm dwlʔ yhb ʔnʔ lkwn
20:05	hnwn dyn ʔzlw wnpq twb bšt wbtšʕ šʕyn wʕbd hkwt
20:06	wlʔpy ḥdʕsrʔ šʕyn npq wʔškḥ ʔḥrnʔ dqymyn wbṭylyn wʔmr lhwn mnʔ qymyn ʔntwn ywmʔ klh wbṭlyn
20:07	ʔmryn lh dlʔ ʔnš ʔgrn ʔmr lhwn zlw ʔp ʔntwn lkrmʔ wmdm dwlʔ nsbyn ʔntwn
20:08	kd hwʔ dyn rmšʔ ʔmr mrʔ krmʔ lrbyth qry pʕlʔ whb lhwn ʔgrhwn wšrʔ mn ʔḥryʔ wʕdmʔ lqdmyʔ
20:09	wʔtw hnwn dḥdʕsrʔ šʕyn nsbw dynr dynr
20:10	wkd ʔtw qdmyʔ sbrw dytyr šqlyn wšqlw dynr dynr ʔp hnwn
20:11	wkd šqlw rṭnw ʕl mrʔ bytʔ
20:12	wʔmryn hlyn ʔḥryʔ ḥdʔ šʕʔ ʕbdw wʔšwyt ʔnwn ʕmn dšqln ywqrh dywmʔ wḥwmh
20:13	hw dyn ʕnʔ wʔmr lḥd mnhwn ḥbry lʔ mʕwl ʔnʔ bk lʔ hwʔ bdynr qṣt ʕmy
20:14	sb dylk wzl ṣbʔ ʔnʔ dyn dlhnʔ ʔḥryʔ ʔtl ʔyk dlk
20:15	ʔw lʔ šlyṭ ly dmdm dṣbʔ ʔnʔ ʔʕbd bdyly ʔw ʕynk byšʔ dʔnʔ ṭb ʔnʔ
20:16	hknʔ nhwwn ʔḥryʔ qdmyʔ wqdmyʔ ʔḥryʔ sgyʔyn ʔnwn gyr qryʔ wzʕwryn gbyʔ 
20:17	ʕtyd hwʔ dyn yšwʕ dnsq lʔwršlm wdbr ltrʕsr tlmydwhy bynwhy wlhwn bʔwrḥʔ wʔmr lhwn
20:18	hʔ slqyn ḥnn lʔwršlm wbrh dʔnšʔ mštlm lrby khnʔ wlsprʔ wnḥybwnyhy lmwtʔ
20:19	wnšlmwnyhy lʕmmʔ wnbzḥwn bh wnngdwnyhy wnzqpwnyhy wlywmʔ dtltʔ nqwm
20:20	hydyn qrbt lh ʔmhwn dbny zbdy hy wbnyh wsgdt lh wšʔlʔ hwt lh mdm
20:21	hw dyn ʔmr lh mnʔ ṣbyʔ ʔnty ʔmrʔ lh ʔmr dntbwn hlyn tryn bny ḥd mn ymynk wḥd mn smlk bmlkwtk
20:22	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn mnʔ šʔlyn ʔntwn mškḥyn ʔntwn lmštʔ ksʔ dʔnʔ ʕtyd lmštʔ ʔw mʕmwdytʔ dʔnʔ ʕmd ʔnʔ tʕmdwn ʔmryn lh mškḥyn ḥnn
20:23	ʔmr lhwn ksy tštwn wmʕmwdytʔ dʔnʔ ʕmd ʔnʔ tʕmdwn dttbwn dyn mn ymyny wmn smly lʔ hwt dyly dʔtl ʔlʔ lʔylyn dʔtṭybt mn ʔby
20:24	kd dyn šmʕw ʕsrʔ rgzw ʕl hnwn tryn ʔḥyn
20:25	wqrʔ ʔnwn yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn ydʕyn ʔntwn dršyhwn dʕmmʔ mryhwn ʔnwn wrwrbnyhwn šlyṭyn ʕlyhwn
20:26	lʔ hknʔ nhwʔ byntkwn ʔlʔ mn dṣbʔ bkwn dnhwʔ rbʔ nhwʔ lkwn mšmšnʔ
20:27	wmn dṣbʔ bkwn dnhwʔ qdmyʔ nhwʔ lkwn ʕbdʔ
20:28	ʔyknʔ dbrh dʔnšʔ lʔ ʔtʔ dnštmš ʔlʔ dnšmš wdntl npšh pwrqnʔ ḥlp sgyʔʔ
20:29	wkd npq yšwʕ mn ʔyryḥw ʔtʔ hwʔ btrh knšʔ sgyʔʔ
20:30	whʔ smyʔ tryn ytbyn hww ʕl yd ʔwrḥʔ wkd šmʕw dyšwʕ ʕbr yhbw qlʔ wʔmryn ʔtrḥm ʕlyn mry brh ddwyd
20:31	knšʔ dyn kʔyn hww bhwn dnštqwn whnwn ytyrʔyt ʔrymw qlhwn wʔmryn mrn ʔtrḥm ʕlyn brh ddwyd
20:32	wqm yšwʕ wqrʔ ʔnwn wʔmr mnʔ ṣbyn ʔntwn dʔʕbd lkwn
20:33	ʔmryn lh mrn dntptḥn ʕynyn
20:34	wʔtrḥm ʕlyhwn yšwʕ wqrb lʕynyhwn wbr šʕth ʔtptḥ ʕynyhwn wʔzlw btrh
21:01	wkd qrb lʔwršlm wʔtʔ lbyt pgʔ ʕl gnb ṭwrʔ dzytʔ šdr yšwʕ tryn mn tlmydwhy
21:02	wʔmr lhwn zlw lqrytʔ hdʔ dlqwblkwn wmḥdʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn ḥmrʔ dʔsyrʔ wʕylʔ ʕmh šrw ʔytw ly
21:03	wʔn ʔnš ʔmr lkwn mdm ʔmrw lh dlmrn mtbʕyn wmḥdʔ mšdr lhwn lkʔ
21:04	hdʔ dyn dhwt dntmlʔ mdm dʔtʔmr byd nbyʔ dʔmr
21:05	ʔmrw lbrt ṣhywn hʔ mlkky ʔtʔ lky mkyk wrkyb ʕl ḥmrʔ wʕl ʕylʔ br ʔtnʔ
21:06	wʔzlw tlmydʔ wʕbdw ʔyknʔ dpqd lhwn yšwʕ
21:07	wʔytyw lḥmrʔ wlʕylʔ wsmw ʕl ʕylʔ nḥtyhwn wrkb ʕlwhy yšwʕ
21:08	wswgʔʔ dknšʔ mšwyn hww mʔnyhwn bʔwrḥʔ ʔḥrnʔ dyn psqyn hww swkʔ mn ʔylnʔ wrmyn bʔwrḥʔ
21:09	knšʔ dyn ʔylyn dʔzlyn hww qdmwhy wʔtyn btrh qʕyn hww wʔmryn ʔwšʕnʔ lbrh ddwyd bryk hw dʔtʔ bšmh dmryʔ ʔwšʕnʔ bmrwmʔ
21:10	wkd ʕl lʔwršlm ʔttzyʕt klh mdyntʔ wʔmryn hww mnw hnʔ
21:11	knšʔ dyn ʔmryn hww hnw yšwʕ nbyʔ dmn nṣrt dglylʔ
21:12	wʕl yšwʕ lhyklʔ dʔlhʔ wʔpq lklhwn dzbnyn wmzbnyn bhyklʔ wsḥp ptwrʔ dmʕrpnʔ wkwrswtʔ dhnwn dmzbnyn ywnʔ
21:13	wʔmr lhwn ktyb hw dbyty byt ṣlwtʔ ntqrʔ ʔntwn dyn ʕbdtwnyhy mʕrtʔ dlsṭyʔ
21:14	wqrbw lh bhyklʔ smyʔ wḥgysʔ wʔsy ʔnwn
21:15	kd ḥzw dyn rby khnʔ wpryšʔ tdmrtʔ dʕbd wṭlyʔ dqʕyn bhyklʔ wʔmryn ʔwšʕnʔ lbrh ddwyd ʔtbʔš lhwn
21:16	wʔmryn lh šmʕ ʔnt mnʔ ʔmryn hlyn ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔyn mn mtwm lʔ qrytwn dmn pwmʔ dṭlyʔ wdylwdʔ tqnt tšbwḥtʔ
21:17	wšbq ʔnwn wnpq lbr mn mdyntʔ lbyt ʕnyʔ wbt tmn
21:18	bṣprʔ dyn kd hpk lmdyntʔ kpn
21:19	wḥzʔ ttʔ ḥdʔ bʔwrḥʔ wʔtʔ lwth wlʔ ʔškḥ bh mdm ʔlʔ ʔn ṭrpʔ blḥwd wʔmr lh lʔ nhwwn bky twb pʔrʔ lʕlm wmḥdʔ ybšt ttʔ hy
21:20	wḥzw tlmydʔ wthrw wʔmryn ʔyknʔ br šʕth ybšt ttʔ
21:21	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dʔn thwʔ bkwn hymnwtʔ wlʔ ttplgwn lʔ blḥwd hdʔ dttʔ tʕbdwn ʔlʔ ʔpn lṭwrʔ hnʔ tʔmrwn dʔštql wpl bymʔ thwʔ
21:22	wkl mdm dtšʔlwn bṣlwtʔ wthymnwn tsbwn 
21:23	wkd ʔtʔ yšwʕ lhyklʔ qrbw lh rby khnʔ wqšyšʔ dʕmʔ kd mlp wʔmryn lh bʔynʔ šwlṭn hlyn ʕbd ʔnt wmnw yhb lk šwlṭnʔ hnʔ
21:24	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn ʔšʔlkwn ʔp ʔnʔ mltʔ ḥdʔ wʔn tʔmrwn ly wʔp ʔnʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn bʔynʔ šwlṭnʔ hlyn ʕbd ʔnʔ
21:25	mʕmwdyth dywḥnn ʔymkʔ ʔytyh mn šmyʔ hy ʔw mn bnynšʔ hnwn dyn mtrʕyn hww bnpšhwn wʔmryn dʔn nʔmr mn šmyʔ ʔmr ln wʕl mnʔ lʔ hymntwnyhy
21:26	wdnʔmr mn bnynšʔ dḥlyn ʔnḥnn mn knšʔ klhwn gyr ʔyk nbyʔ ʔḥydyn hww lh lywḥnn
21:27	ʕnw wʔmryn lh lʔ ydʕynn ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔp lʔ ʔnʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn bʔynʔ šwlṭnʔ hlyn ʕbd ʔnʔ
21:28	mnʔ dyn mtḥzʔ lkwn gbrʔ ḥd ʔyt hww lh bnyʔ tryn wqrb lwt qdmyʔ wʔmr lh bry zl ywmnʔ plwḥ bkrmʔ
21:29	hw dyn ʕnʔ wʔmr lʔ ṣbʔ ʔnʔ bḥrtʔ dyn ʔttwy wʔzl
21:30	wqrb lwt ʔḥrnʔ wʔmr lh hkwt hw dyn ʕnʔ wʔmr ʔnʔ mry wlʔ ʔzl
21:31	mnw mn hlyn tryhwn ʕbd ṣbynʔ dʔbwhy ʔmryn lh hw qdmyʔ ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dmksʔ wznytʔ qdmyn lkwn lmlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ
21:32	ʔtʔ gyr lwtkwn ywḥnn bʔwrḥʔ dkʔnwtʔ wlʔ hymntwnyhy mksʔ dyn wznytʔ hymnwhy ʔntwn dyn ʔp lʔ kd ḥzytwn ʔttwytwn bḥrtʔ dthymnwn bh
21:33	šmʕw ʔḥrnʔ mtlʔ gbrʔ ḥd ʔyt hwʔ mrʔ bytʔ wnṣb krmʔ wʔḥdrh sygʔ wḥpr bh mʕṣrtʔ wbnʔ bh mgdlʔ wʔwḥdh lplḥʔ wḥzq
21:34	kd dyn mṭʔ zbnʔ dpʔrʔ šdr lʕbdwhy lwt plḥʔ dnšdrwn lh mn pʔrʔ dkrmh
21:35	wʔḥdw plḥʔ lʕbdwhy wʔyt dmḥʔwhy wʔyt drgmwhy wʔyt dqṭlwhy
21:36	wtwb šdr ʔḥrnʔ ʕbdʔ dsgyʔyn mn qdmyʔ whkwt ʕbdw lhwn
21:37	ʔḥryt dyn šdr lwthwn lbrh kd ʔmr kbr nbhtwn mn bry
21:38	plḥʔ dyn kd ḥzʔwhy lbrʔ ʔmrw bynthwn hnw yrtʔ tw nqṭlywhy wnʔḥwd yrtwth
21:39	wʔḥdw ʔpqwhy lbr mn krmʔ wqṭlwhy
21:40	mʔ dʔtʔ hkyl mrh dkrmʔ mnʔ nʕbd lplḥʔ hnwn
21:41	ʔmryn lh dbyš byš nwbd ʔnwn wkrmʔ nwḥd lʔḥrnʔ plḥʔ ʔylyn dyhbyn lh pʔrʔ bzbnhwn
21:42	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ lʔ mmtwm qrytwn bktbʔ dkʔpʔ dʔslyw bnyʔ hy hwt lršʔ dzwytʔ mn lwt mryʔ hwt hdʔ wʔytyh tdmwrtʔ bʕynyn
21:43	mṭl hnʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dtštql mnkwn mlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ wttyhb lʕmʔ dʕbd pʔrʔ
21:44	wmn dnpl ʕl kʔpʔ hdʔ ntrʕʕ wkl mn dhy tpl ʕlwhy tdrywhy
21:45	wkd šmʕw rby khnʔ wpryšʔ mtlwhy ydʕw dʕlyhwn ʔmr
21:46	wbʕw lmʔḥdh wdḥlw mn knšʔ mṭl dʔyk dlnbyʔ ʔḥydyn hww lh
22:01	wʕnʔ twb yšwʕ bmtlʔ wʔmr
22:02	ʔtdmyt mlkwtʔ dšmyʔ lgbrʔ mlkʔ dʕbd mštwtʔ lbrh
22:03	wšdr lʕbdwhy dnqrwn lmzmnʔ lmštwtʔ wlʔ ṣbw lmʔtʔ
22:04	twb šdr ʕbdʔ ʔḥrnʔ wʔmr ʔmrw lmzmnʔ dhʔ šrwty mṭybʔ wtwry wmpṭmy qṭylyn wkl mdm mṭyb tw lmštwtʔ
22:05	hnwn dyn bsw wʔzlw ʔyt dlqryth wʔyt dltʔgwrth
22:06	šrkʔ dyn ʔḥdw lʕbdwhy wṣʕrw wqṭlw
22:07	kd šmʕ dyn mlkʔ rgz wšdr ḥylwth ʔwbd lqṭwlʔ hnwn wlmdynthwn ʔwqd
22:08	hydyn ʔmr lʕbdwhy mštwtʔ mṭybʔ whnwn dmzmnyn hww lʔ šwyn hww
22:09	zlw hkyl lmpqnʔ dʔwrḥtʔ wkl mn dmškḥyn ʔntwn qrw lmštwtʔ
22:10	wnpqw ʕbdʔ hnwn lʔwrḥtʔ wknšw kl dʔškḥw byšʔ wṭbʔ wʔtmly byt mštwtʔ smykʔ
22:11	wʕl mlkʔ dnḥzʔ smykʔ wḥzʔ tmn gbrʔ dlʔ lbyš lbwšʔ dmštwtʔ
22:12	wʔmr lh ḥbry ʔyknʔ ʕlt lkʔ kd nḥtʔ dmštwtʔ lyt lk hw dyn ʔšttq
22:13	hydyn ʔmr mlkʔ lmšmšnʔ ʔswrw ʔydwhy wrglwhy wʔpqwhy lḥšwkʔ bryʔ tmn nhwʔ bkyʔ wḥwrq šnʔ
22:14	sgyʔyn ʔnwn gyr qryʔ wzʕwryn gbyʔ
22:15	hydyn ʔzlw pryšʔ nsbw mlkʔ dʔyknʔ nṣwdwnyhy bmltʔ
22:16	wšdrw lwth tlmydyhwn ʕm dbyt hrwds wʔmryn lh mlpnʔ ydʕynn dšryr ʔnt wʔwrḥʔ dʔlhʔ bqwštʔ mlp ʔnt wlʔ šqyl ʔnt ṣptʔ dʔnš lʔ gyr nsb ʔnt bʔpʔ dʔnšʔ
22:17	ʔmr ln hkyl ʔyknʔ mtḥzʔ lk šlyṭ lmtl ksp ršʔ lqsr ʔw lʔ
22:18	yšwʕ dyn ydʕ byšwthwn wʔmr mnʔ mnsyn ʔntwn ly nsby bʔpʔ
22:19	ḥwʔwny dynrʔ dksp ršʔ hnwn dyn qrbw lh dynrʔ
22:20	wʔmr lhwn yšwʕ dmnw ṣlmʔ hnʔ wktbʔ
22:21	ʔmryn dqsr ʔmr lhwn hbw hkyl dqsr lqsr wdʔlhʔ lʔlhʔ
22:22	wkd šmʕw ʔtdmrw wšbqwhy wʔzlw 
22:23	bhw ywmʔ qrbw zdwqyʔ wʔmryn lh lyt ḥyt mytʔ wšʔlwhy
22:24	wʔmryn lh mlpnʔ mwšʔ ʔmr ln dʔn ʔnš nmwt kd lyt lh bnyʔ nsb ʔḥwhy ʔntth wnqym zrʕʔ lʔḥwhy
22:25	ʔyt hww dyn lwtn ʔḥʔ šbʕʔ qdmyʔ šql ʔnttʔ wmyt wdlyt hwʔ lh bnyʔ šbqh ʔntth lʔḥwhy
22:26	hkwt ʔp hw dtryn wʔp hw dtltʔ wʕdmʔ lšbʕtyhwn
22:27	bḥrtʔ dyn dklhwn mytt ʔp ʔnttʔ
22:28	bqymtʔ hkyl lʔynʔ mn hlyn šbʕʔ thwʔ ʔnttʔ klhwn gyr nsbwh
22:29	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn ṭʕyn ʔntwn dlʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn ktbʔ wlʔ ḥylh dʔlhʔ
22:30	bqymtʔ gyr dmytʔ lʔ nsbyn nšʔ ʔplʔ nšʔ hwyn lgbrʔ ʔlʔ ʔyk mlʔkʔ dʔlhʔ bšmyʔ ʔytyhwn
22:31	ʕl qymtʔ dyn dmytʔ lʔ qrytwn mdm dʔtʔmr lkwn mn ʔlhʔ dʔmr
22:32	dʔnʔ ʔnʔ ʔlhh dʔbrhm ʔlhh dʔysḥq ʔlhh dyʕqwb wʔlhʔ lʔ hwʔ dmytʔ ʔlʔ dḥyʔ
22:33	wkd šmʕw knšʔ mttmhyn hww bywlpnh
22:34	pryšʔ dyn kd šmʕw dštq lzdwqyʔ ʔtknšw ʔkḥdʔ
22:35	wšʔlh ḥd mnhwn dydʕ nmwsʔ kd mnsʔ lh
22:36	mlpnʔ ʔynʔ pwqdnʔ rb bnmwsʔ
22:37	yšwʕ dyn ʔmr lh dtrḥm lmryʔ ʔlhk mn klh lbk wmn klh npšk wmn klh ḥylk wmn klh rʕynk
22:38	hnw pwqdnʔ rbʔ wqdmyʔ
22:39	wdtryn ddmʔ lh dtrḥm lqrybk ʔyk npšk
22:40	bhlyn tryn pwqdnyn tlyʔ ʔwrytʔ wnbyʔ
22:41	kd knyšyn dyn pryšʔ šʔl ʔnwn yšwʕ
22:42	wʔmr mnʔ ʔmryn ʔntwn ʕl mšyḥʔ br mnw ʔmryn lh br dwyd
22:43	ʔmr lhwn wʔyknʔ dwyd brwḥ qrʔ lh mryʔ ʔmr gyr
22:44	dʔmr mryʔ lmry tb lk mn ymyny ʕdmʔ dʔsym bʕldbbyk tḥyt rglyk
22:45	ʔn hkyl dwyd qrʔ lh mryʔ ʔyknʔ brh hw
22:46	wlʔ ʔnš ʔškḥ dntl lh ptgmʔ wlʔ ʔnš ʔmrḥ twb mn hw ywmʔ lmšʔlwth
23:01	hydyn yšwʕ mll ʕm knšʔ wʕm tlmydwhy
23:02	wʔmr lhwn ʕl kwrsyʔ dmwšʔ ytbw sprʔ wpryšʔ
23:03	kl mdm hkyl dnʔmrwn lkwn dtṭrwn ṭrw wʕbdw ʔyk ʕbdyhwn dyn lʔ tʕbdwn ʔmryn gyr wlʔ ʕbdyn
23:04	wʔsryn mwblʔ yqyrtʔ wsymyn ʕl ktptʔ dbny ʔnšʔ hnwn dyn bṣbʕhwn lʔ ṣbyn dnqrbwn lhyn
23:05	wklhwn ʕbdyhwn ʕbdyn dntḥzwn lbny ʔnšʔ mptyn gyr tplyhwn wmwrkyn tkltʔ dmrṭwṭyhwn
23:06	wrḥmyn rš smkʔ bḥšmytʔ wrš mwtbʔ bknwštʔ
23:07	wšlmʔ bšwqʔ wdnhwwn mtqryn mn ʔnšʔ rby
23:08	ʔntwn dyn lʔ ttqrwn rby ḥd hw gyr rbkwn ʔntwn dyn klkwn ʔḥʔ ʔntwn
23:09	wʔbʔ lʔ tqrwn lkwn bʔrʕʔ ḥd hw gyr ʔbwkwn dbšmyʔ
23:10	wlʔ ttqrwn mdbrnʔ mṭl dḥd hw mdbrnkwn mšyḥʔ
23:11	hw dyn drb bkwn nhwʔ lkwn mšmšnʔ
23:12	mn gyr dnrym npšh ntmkk wmn dnmk npšh nttrym
23:13	wy lkwn sprʔ wpryšʔ nsby bʔpʔ dʔklyn ʔntwn btʔ dʔrmltʔ bʕltʔ dmwrkyn ʔntwn ṣlwtkwn mṭl hnʔ tqblwn dynʔ ytyrʔ
23:14	wy lkwn sprʔ wpryšʔ nsby bʔpʔ dʔḥydyn ʔntwn mlkwtʔ dšmyʔ qdm bny ʔnšʔ ʔntwn gyr lʔ ʕʔlyn ʔntwn wlʔylyn dʕʔlyn lʔ šbqyn ʔntwn lmʕl
23:15	wy lkwn sprʔ wpryšʔ nsby bʔpʔ dmtkrkyn ʔntwn ymʔ wybšʔ dtʕbdwn ḥd gywrʔ wmʔ dhwʔ ʕbdyn ʔntwn lh brh dghnʔ ʔʕpʔ ʕlykwn
23:16	wy lkwn ngwdʔ smyʔ dʔmryn ʔntwn dmn dymʔ bhyklʔ lʔ hwʔ mdm mn dyn dymʔ bdhbʔ dbhyklʔ ḥʔb
23:17	sklʔ wsmyʔ mnʔ gyr rb dhbʔ ʔw hyklʔ dhw mqdš lh ldhbʔ
23:18	wmn dymʔ bmdbḥʔ lʔ hwʔ mdm mn dyn dymʔ bqwrbnʔ dlʕl mnh ḥʔb
23:19	sklʔ wʕwyrʔ mnʔ rb qwrbnʔ ʔw mdbḥʔ dmqdš lqwrbnʔ
23:20	mn dymʔ hkyl bmdbḥʔ ymʔ bh wbkl mʔ dʔyt lʕl mnh
23:21	wmn dymʔ bhyklʔ ymʔ bh wbmn dʕmr bh
23:22	wmn dymʔ bšmyʔ ymʔ bkwrsyh dʔlhʔ wbmn dytb lʕl mnh
23:23	wy lkwn sprʔ wpryšʔ nsby bʔpʔ dmʕsryn ʔntwn nnʕʔ wšbtʔ wkmwnʔ wšbqtwn yqyrth dnmwsʔ dynʔ wḥnnʔ whymnwtʔ hlyn dyn wlʔ hwʔ dtʕbdwn whlyn lʔ tšbqwn
23:24	ngwdʔ smyʔ dmṣllyn bqʔ wblʕyn gmlʔ
23:25	wy lkwn sprʔ wpryšʔ nsby bʔpʔ dmdkyn ʔntwn brh dksʔ wdzbwrʔ lgw dyn mlyn ḥṭwpyʔ wʕwlʔ
23:26	pryšʔ ʕwyrʔ dkw lwqdm gwh dksʔ wdzbwrʔ dhwʔ ʔp brhwn dkʔ
23:27	wy lkwn sprʔ wpryšʔ nsby bʔpʔ ddmyn ʔntwn lqbrʔ mklšʔ dmn lbr mtḥzyn špyrʔ mn lgw dyn mlyn grmʔ dmytʔ wklh ṭnpwtʔ
23:28	hknʔ ʔp ʔntwn mn lbr mtḥzyn ʔntwn lbny ʔnšʔ ʔyk zdyqʔ wmn lgw mlyn ʔntwn ʕwlʔ wmsb bʔpʔ
23:29	wy lkwn sprʔ wpryšʔ nsby bʔpʔ dbnyn ʔntwn qbrʔ dnbyʔ wmṣbtyn ʔntwn byt qbwrʔ dzdyqʔ
23:30	wʔmryn ʔntwn dʔlw hwyn bywmy ʔbhyn lʔ hwyn hwyn lhwn šwtpʔ bdmʔ dnbyʔ
23:31	mdyn mshdyn ʔntwn ʕl npškwn dbnyʔ ʔntwn dhnwn dqṭlw lnbyʔ
23:32	wʔp ʔntwn mlw mšwḥtʔ dʔbhykwn
23:33	ḥwwtʔ yldʔ dʔkdnʔ ʔyknʔ tʕrqwn mn dynʔ dghnʔ 
23:34	mṭl hnʔ hʔ ʔnʔ mšdr ʔnʔ lwtkwn nbyʔ wḥkymʔ wsprʔ mnhwn qṭlyn ʔntwn wzqpyn ʔntwn wmnhwn mngdyn ʔntwn bknwštkwn wtrdpwn ʔnwn mn mdynʔ lmdynʔ
23:35	ʔyknʔ dnʔtʔ ʕlykwn klh dmʔ dzdyqʔ dʔtʔšd ʕl ʔrʕʔ mn dmh dhbyl zdyqʔ wʕdmʔ ldmh dzkryʔ br brkyʔ hw dqṭltwn byny hyklʔ lmdbḥʔ
23:36	ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dnʔtyn hlyn klhyn ʕl šrbtʔ hdʔ
23:37	ʔwršlm ʔwršlm qṭlt nbyʔ wrgmt lʔylyn dšlyḥyn lwth kmʔ zbnyn ṣbyt dʔknš bnyky ʔyk dknšʔ trngwltʔ prwgyh tḥyt gpyh wlʔ ṣbytwn
23:38	hʔ mštbq lkwn bytkwn ḥrbʔ
23:39	ʔmrnʔ lkwn gyr dlʔ tḥzwnny mn hšʔ ʕdmʔ dtʔmrwn bryk hw dʔtʔ bšmh dmryʔ
24:01	wnpq yšwʕ mn hyklʔ lmʔzl wqrbw tlmydwhy mḥwyn hww lh bnynh dhyklʔ
24:02	hw dyn ʔmr lhwn lʔ hʔ ḥzyn ʔntwn hlyn klhyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dlʔ tštbq hrkʔ kʔp ʕl kʔp dlʔ tsttr
24:03	wkd ytb yšwʕ ʕl ṭwrʔ dzytʔ qrbw tlmydwhy wʔmryn bynyhwn wlh ʔmr ln ʔmty hlyn nhwyn wmnʔ hy ʔtʔ dmʔtytk wdšwlmh dʕlmʔ
24:04	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn ʔzdhrw lʔ ʔnš nṭʕykwn
24:05	sgyʔʔ gyr nʔtwn bšmy wnʔmrwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mšyḥʔ wsgyʔʔ nṭʕwn
24:06	ʕtydyn ʔntwn dyn lmšmʕ qʔrsʔ wšmʕʔ dqrbʔ ḥzw lʔ ttdwdwn wlʔ gyr dklhyn nhwyn ʔlʔ lʔ ʕdkyl šwlmʔ
24:07	nqwm gyr ʕmʔ ʕl ʕmʔ wmlkwtʔ ʕl mlkwtʔ wnhwwn kpnʔ wmwtnʔ wzwʕʔ bdwkʔ dwkʔ
24:08	hlyn dyn klhyn ršʔ ʔnyn dḥblʔ
24:09	hydyn nšlmwnkwn lʔwlṣnʔ wnqṭlwnkwn wthwwn snyʔyn mn klhwn ʕmmʔ mṭl šmy
24:10	hydyn ntkšlwn sgyʔʔ wnsnwn ḥd lḥd wnšlmwn ḥd lḥd
24:11	wsgyʔʔ nbyʔ dglʔ nqwmwn wnṭʕwn lsgyʔʔ
24:12	wmṭl sgyʔwt ʕwlʔ npwg ḥwbʔ dsgyʔʔ
24:13	mn dnsybr dyn ʕdmʔ lḥrtʔ hw nḥʔ
24:14	wttkrz hdʔ sbrtʔ dmlkwtʔ bklh ʕlmʔ lshdwtʔ dklhwn ʕmmʔ whydyn nʔtʔ šwlmʔ
24:15	mʔ dyn dḥzytwn ʔtʔ ṭnptʔ dḥwrbʔ dʔtʔmr bdnyʔyl nbyʔ dqymʔ bdwktʔ qdyštʔ hw dqrʔ nstkl
24:16	hydyn ʔylyn dbyhwd ʔnwn nʕrqwn lṭwrʔ
24:17	whw dbʔgrʔ hw lʔ nḥwt lmsb dbbyth
24:18	wʔynʔ dbḥqlʔ hw lʔ nthpk lbstrh lmsb lbšh
24:19	wy dyn lbṭntʔ wlʔylyn dmynqn bhnwn ywmtʔ
24:20	ṣlw dyn dlʔ nhwʔ ʕrwqykwn bstwʔ wlʔ bšbtʔ
24:21	nhwʔ gyr hydyn ʔwlṣnʔ rbʔ ʔynʔ dlʔ hwʔ mn ršyth dʕlmʔ wʕdmʔ lhšʔ wlʔ nhwʔ
24:22	wʔlw lʔ ʔtkryw ywmtʔ hnwn lʔ ḥyʔ hwʔ kl bsr mṭl gbyʔ dyn ntkrwn ywmtʔ hnwn
24:23	hydyn ʔn ʔnš nʔmr lkwn hʔ hrkʔ hw mšyḥʔ ʔw hrkʔ lʔ thymnwn
24:24	nqwmwn gyr mšyḥʔ dglʔ wnbyʔ dkdbwtʔ wntlwn ʔtwtʔ rwrbtʔ ʔyk dnṭʕwn ʔn mškḥʔ ʔp lgbyʔ
24:25	hʔ qdmt ʔmrt lkwn
24:26	ʔn hkyl nʔmrwn lkwn hʔ bḥwrbʔ hw lʔ tpqwn ʔw dhʔ btwnʔ hw lʔ thymnwn
24:27	ʔyknʔ gyr dbrqʔ npq mn mdnḥʔ wmtḥzʔ ʕdmʔ lmʕrbʔ hknʔ thwʔ mʔtyth dbrh dʔnšʔ
24:28	ʔykʔ dʔn nhwʔ pgrʔ tmn ntknšwn nšrʔ
24:29	mḥdʔ dyn btr ʔwlṣnʔ dywmtʔ hnwn šmšʔ nḥšk wshrʔ lʔ nḥwʔ nwhrh wkwkbʔ nplwn mn šmyʔ wḥylʔ dšmyʔ nttzyʕwn
24:30	whydyn ntḥzʔ nyšh dbrh dʔnšʔ bšmyʔ whydyn nrqdn klhyn šrbtʔ dʔrʕʔ wnḥzwn lbrh dʔnšʔ dʔtʔ ʕl ʕnny šmyʔ ʕm ḥylʔ wšwbḥʔ sgyʔʔ
24:31	wnšdr mlʔkwhy ʕm šypwrʔ rbʔ wnknšwn lgbyʔ dylh mn ʔrbʕt rwḥʔ mn ršhwn dšmyʔ wʕdmʔ lršhwn
24:32	mn ttʔ dyn ylpw plʔtʔ dmḥdʔ dswkyh rkn wprʕyn ṭrpyh ydʕyn ʔntwn dmṭʔ qyṭʔ
24:33	hknʔ ʔp ʔntwn mʔ dḥzytwn hlyn klhyn dʕw dmṭt lh ltrʕʔ
24:34	ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dlʔ tʕbr šrbtʔ hdʔ ʕdmʔ dhlyn klhyn nhwyn
24:35	šmyʔ wʔrʕʔ nʕbrwn wmly lʔ nʕbrn
24:36	ʕl ywmʔ dyn hw wʕl šʕtʔ hy ʔnš lʔ ydʕ ʔplʔ mlʔkʔ dšmyʔ ʔlʔ ʔbʔ blḥwd
24:37	ʔyknʔ dyn dywmy nwḥ hknʔ thwʔ mʔtyth dbrh dʔnšʔ
24:38	ʔyknʔ gyr dʔytyhwn hww qdm ṭwpnʔ ʔklyn wštyn wnsbyn nšʔ wyhbyn lgbrʔ ʕdmʔ lywmʔ dʕl nwḥ lkwylʔ
24:39	wlʔ ydʕw ʕdmʔ dʔtʔ ṭwpnʔ wšql lklhwn hknʔ thwʔ mʔtyth dbrh dʔnšʔ
24:40	hydyn tryn nhwwn bqrytʔ ḥd ntdbr wḥd nštbq
24:41	wtrtyn nhwyn ṭḥnn brḥyʔ ḥdʔ mtdbrʔ wḥdʔ mštbqʔ
24:42	ʔttʕyrw hkyl dlʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn bʔydʔ šʕtʔ ʔtʔ mrkwn
24:43	hdʔ dyn dʕw dʔlw ydʕ hwʔ mrʔ bytʔ bʔydʔ mṭrtʔ ʔtʔ gnbʔ mttʕyr hwʔ wlʔ šbq hwʔ dntplš byth
24:44	mṭl hnʔ ʔp ʔntwn hww mṭybyn dbšʕtʔ dlʔ sbryn ʔntwn nʔtʔ brh dʔnšʔ 
24:45	mnw ky ʔytwhy ʕbdʔ mhymnʔ wḥkymʔ dʔqymh mrh ʕl bny byth dntl lhwn sybrtʔ bzbnh
24:46	ṭwbwhy lʕbdʔ hw dnʔtʔ mrh nškḥywhy dʕbd hknʔ
24:47	ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dnqymywhy ʕl kl dʔyt lh
24:48	ʔn dyn nʔmr ʕbdʔ hw byšʔ blbh dmry mwḥr lmʔtʔ
24:49	wnšrʔ lmmḥʔ knwth wnhwʔ ʔkl wštʔ ʕm rwyʔ
24:50	nʔtʔ mrh dʕbdʔ hw bywmʔ dlʔ sbr wbšʕtʔ dlʔ ydʕ
24:51	wnplgywhy wnsym mnth ʕm nsby bʔpʔ tmn nhwʔ bkyʔ wḥwrq šnʔ
25:01	hydyn tdmʔ mlkwtʔ dšmyʔ lʕsr btwln hnyn dnsb lmpdyhyn wnpq lʔwrʕ ḥtnʔ wkltʔ
25:02	ḥmš dyn mnhyn ḥkymn hwy wḥmš skln
25:03	whnyn skltʔ nsb lmpdyhyn wlʔ nsb ʕmhyn mšḥʔ
25:04	hnyn dyn ḥkymtʔ nsb mšḥʔ bmʔnʔ ʕm lmpdyhyn
25:05	kd ʔwḥr dyn ḥtnʔ nm klhyn wdmk
25:06	wbplgh dllyʔ hwt qʕtʔ hʔ ḥtnʔ ʔtʔ pwqw lʔwrʕh
25:07	hydyn qm klhyn btwltʔ hlyn wtqn lmpdyhyn
25:08	ʔmrn dyn hnyn skltʔ lḥkymtʔ hbyn ln mn mšḥkyn dhʔ dʕkw lhwn lmpdyn
25:09	ʕny hlyn ḥkymtʔ wʔmrn lmʔ lʔ nspq ln wlkyn ʔlʔ zlyn lwt ʔylyn dmzbnyn wzbnyn lkyn
25:10	wkd ʔzl lmzbn ʔtʔ ḥtnʔ wʔylyn dmṭybn hwy ʕl ʕmh lbyt ḥlwlʔ wʔttḥd trʕʔ
25:11	bḥrtʔ dyn ʔty ʔp hnyn btwltʔ ʔḥrnytʔ wʔmrn mrn mrn ptḥ ln
25:12	hw dyn ʕnʔ wʔmr lhyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkyn dlʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ lkyn
25:13	ʔttʕyrw hkyl dlʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn lywmʔ hw wlʔ lšʕtʔ
25:14	ʔyk gbrʔ gyr dḥzq qrʔ lʕbdwhy wʔšlm lhwn qnynh
25:15	ʔyt dyhb lh ḥmš kkryn wʔyt dtrtyn wʔyt dḥdʔ ʔnš ʔnš ʔyk ḥylh wḥzq mḥdʔ
25:16	ʔzl dyn hw dnsb ḥmš kkryn ʔttgr bhyn wytr ḥmš ʔḥrnyn
25:17	whkwt ʔp hw dtrtyn ʔttgr trtyn ʔḥrnyn
25:18	hw dyn dnsb ḥdʔ ʔzl ḥpr bʔrʕʔ wṭšy kspʔ dmrh
25:19	btr dyn zbnʔ sgyʔʔ ʔtʔ mrhwn dʕbdʔ hnwn wnsb mnhwn ḥwšbnʔ
25:20	wqrb hw dnsb hwʔ ḥmš kkryn wqrb ḥmš ʔḥrnyn wʔmr mry ḥmš kkryn yhbt ly hʔ ḥmš ʔḥrnyn ʔttgrt ʕlyhyn
25:21	ʔmr lh mrh ʔyw ʕbdʔ ṭbʔ wmhymnʔ ʕl qlyl mhymn hwyt ʕl sgy ʔqymk ʕwl lḥdwth dmrk
25:22	wqrb hw dtrtyn kkrwhy wʔmr mry trtyn kkryn yhbt ly hʔ trtyn ʔḥrnyn ʔttgrt ʕlyhyn
25:23	ʔmr lh mrh ʔyw ʕbdʔ ṭbʔ wmhymnʔ ʕl qlyl mhymn hwyt ʕl sgy ʔqymk ʕwl lḥdwth dmrk
25:24	qrb dyn ʔp hw dnsb ḥdʔ kkrʔ wʔmr mry ydʕ hwyt lk dgbrʔ ʔnt qšyʔ wḥṣd ʔnt ʔykʔ dlʔ zrʕt wmknš ʔnt mn ʔykʔ dlʔ bdrt
25:25	wdḥlt wʔzlt ṭšyth kkrk bʔrʕʔ hʔ ʔyt lk dylk
25:26	ʕnʔ mrh wʔmr lh ʕbdʔ byšʔ wḥbnnʔ ydʕ hwyt dḥṣd ʔnʔ ʔykʔ dlʔ zrʕt wmknš ʔnʔ mn ʔykʔ dlʔ bdrt
25:27	wlʔ hwʔ lk dtrmʔ kspy ʕl ptwrʔ wʔtʔ hwyt ʔnʔ wtbʕ hwyt dyly ʕm rbyth
25:28	sbw hkyl mnh kkrʔ whbwh lhw dʔyt lh ʕsr kkryn
25:29	lmn gyr dʔyt lh ntyhb lh wnttwsp lh whw dyn dlyt lh wʔp hw dʔyt lh nštql mnh
25:30	wlʕbdʔ bṭylʔ ʔpqwhy lḥšwkʔ bryʔ tmn nhwʔ bkyʔ wḥwrq šnʔ
25:31	mʔ dʔtʔ dyn brh dʔnšʔ bšwbḥh wklhwn mlʔkwhy qdyšʔ ʕmh hydyn ntb ʕl trnws dšwbḥh
25:32	wntknšwn qdmwhy klhwn ʕmmʔ wnprš ʔnwn ḥd mn ḥd ʔyk rʕyʔ dmprš ʕrbʔ mn gdyʔ
25:33	wnqym ʕrbʔ mn ymynh wgdyʔ mn smlh
25:34	hydyn nʔmr mlkʔ lhnwn dmn ymynh tw brykwhy dʔby yrtw mlkwtʔ dʕtydʔ hwt lkwn mn trmyth dʕlmʔ
25:35	kpnt gyr wyhbtwn ly lmʔkl wṣhyt wʔšqytwnny ʔksnyʔ hwyt wknštwnny
25:36	ʕrṭlyʔ hwyt wksytwnny kryh hwyt wsʕrtwnny wbyt ʔsyrʔ hwyt wʔtytwn lwty
25:37	hydyn nʔmrwn lh hnwn zdyqʔ mrn ʔmty ḥzynk dkpn ʔnt wtrsynk ʔw dṣhʔ ʔnt wʔšqynk
25:38	wʔmty ḥzynk dʔksnyʔ ʔnt wknšnk ʔw dʕrṭly ʔnt wksynk
25:39	wʔmty ḥzynk kryhʔ ʔw byt ʔsyrʔ wʔtyn lwtk
25:40	wʕnʔ mlkʔ wʔmr lhwn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dkmʔ dʕbdtwn lḥd mn hlyn ʔḥy zʕwrʔ ly hw ʕbdtwn
25:41	hydyn nʔmr ʔp lhnwn dmn smlh zlw lkwn mny lyṭʔ lnwrʔ dlʕlm hy dmṭybʔ lʔklqrṣʔ wlmlʔkwhy
25:42	kpnt gyr wlʔ yhbtwn ly lmʔkl wṣhyt wlʔ ʔšqytwnny
25:43	wʔksnyʔ hwyt wlʔ knštwnny wʕrṭlyʔ hwyt wlʔ ksytwnny wkryhʔ hwyt wbyt ʔsyrʔ hwyt wlʔ sʕrtwnny
25:44	hydyn nʕnwn ʔp hnwn wnʔmrwn mrn ʔmty ḥzynk kpnʔ ʔw ṣhyʔ ʔw ʔksnyʔ ʔw ʕrṭlyʔ ʔw kryhʔ ʔw byt ʔsyrʔ wlʔ šmšnk
25:45	hydyn nʕnʔ wnʔmr lhwn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dkmʔ dlʔ ʕbdtwn lḥd mn hlyn zʕwrʔ ʔp lʔ ly ʕbdtwn
25:46	wnʔzlwn hlyn ltšnyqʔ dlʕlm wzdyqʔ lḥyʔ dlʕlm
26:01	whwʔ dkd šlm yšwʕ klhyn mlʔ hlyn ʔmr ltlmydwhy
26:02	ydʕyn ʔntwn dbtr tryn ywmyn hwʔ pṣḥʔ wbrh dʔnšʔ mštlm dnzdqp
26:03	hydyn ʔtknšw rby khnʔ wsprʔ wqšyšʔ dʕmʔ ldrth drb khnʔ dmtqrʔ qypʔ
26:04	wʔtmlkw ʕl yšwʕ dbnklʔ nʔḥdwnyhy wnqṭlwnyhy
26:05	wʔmryn hww lʔ bʕdʕdʔ dlʔ nhwʔ šgwšyʔ bʕmʔ 
26:06	wkd hwʔ yšwʕ bbyt ʕnyʔ bbyth dšmʕwn grbʔ
26:07	qrbt lh ʔnttʔ dʔyt ʕlyh šṭyptʔ dmšḥʔ dbsmʔ sgy dmyʔ wʔšpʕth ʕl ršh dyšwʕ kd smyk
26:08	ḥzw dyn tlmydwhy wʔtbʔš lhwn wʔmrw lmnʔ ʔbdnʔ hnʔ
26:09	mškḥ hwʔ gyr dnzdbn hnʔ bsgy wntyhb lmsknʔ
26:10	yšwʕ dyn ydʕ wʔmr lhwn mnʔ mlʔyn ʔntwn lh lʔnttʔ ʕbdʔ špyrʔ ʕbdt lwty
26:11	bklzbn gyr msknʔ ʔyt lkwn ʕmkwn ly dyn lʔ bklzbn ʔyt lkwn
26:12	hdʔ dyn dʔrmyt bsmʔ hnʔ ʕl gwšmy ʔyk dlmqbrny ʕbdt
26:13	wʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dʔykʔ dttkrz sbrty hdʔ bklh ʕlmʔ ntmll ʔp mdm dʕbdt hdʔ ldwkrnh
26:14	hydyn ʔzl ḥd mn trʕsr dmtqrʔ yhwdʔ skrywṭʔ lwt rby khnʔ
26:15	wʔmr lhwn mnʔ ṣbyn ʔntwn lmtl ly wʔnʔ mšlm ʔnʔ lh lkwn hnwn dyn ʔqymw lh tltyn dkspʔ
26:16	wmn hydyn bʕʔ hwʔ lh plʕʔ dnšlmywhy
26:17	bywmʔ dyn qdmyʔ dpṭyrʔ qrbw tlmydʔ lwt yšwʕ wʔmrw lh ʔykʔ ṣbʔ ʔnt dnṭyb lk dtlʕs pṣḥʔ
26:18	hw dyn ʔmr lhwn zlw lmdyntʔ lwt pln wʔmrw lh rbn ʔmr zbny mṭʔ lh lwtk ʕbd ʔnʔ pṣḥʔ ʕm tlmydy
26:19	wtlmydwhy ʕbdw ʔyknʔ dpqd lhwn yšwʕ wṭyb wpṣḥʔ
26:20	wkd hwʔ rmšʔ smyk hwʔ ʕm trʕsr tlmydwhy
26:21	wkd lʕsyn ʔmr ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dḥd mnkwn mšlm ly
26:22	wkryt lhwn ṭb wšryw lmʔmr lh ḥd ḥd mnhwn lmʔ ʔnʔ mry
26:23	hw dyn ʕnʔ wʔmr mn dṣbʕ ʔydh ʕmy blgtʔ hw nšlmny
26:24	wbrh dʔnšʔ ʔzl ʔyknʔ dktyb ʕlwhy wy lh dyn lgbrʔ hw dbʔydh brh dʔnšʔ mštlm pqḥ hwʔ lh lgbrʔ hw ʔlw lʔ ʔtyld
26:25	ʕnʔ yhwdʔ mšlmnʔ wʔmr dlmʔ ʔnʔ hw rby ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔnt ʔmrt
26:26	kd dyn lʕsyn šql yšwʕ lḥmʔ wbrk wqṣʔ wyhb ltlmydwhy wʔmr sbw ʔkwlw hnw pgry
26:27	wšql ksʔ wʔwdy wyhb lhwn wʔmr sbw ʔštw mnh klkwn
26:28	hnw dmy ddytqʔ ḥdtʔ dḥlp sgyʔʔ mtʔšd lšwbqnʔ dḥṭhʔ
26:29	ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dyn dlʔ ʔštʔ mn hšʔ mn hnʔ yldʔ dgptʔ ʕdmʔ lywmʔ dbh ʔštywhy ʕmkwn ḥdtʔ bmlkwth dʔby
26:30	wšbḥw wnpqw lṭwr zytʔ
26:31	hydyn ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔntwn klkwn ttkšlwn by bhnʔ llyʔ ktyb gyr dʔmḥʔ lrʕyʔ wntbdrwn ʕrbʔ dʕnh
26:32	mn btr dqʔm ʔnʔ dyn qdm ʔnʔ lkwn lglylʔ
26:33	ʕnʔ kʔpʔ wʔmr lh ʔpn klnš ntkšl bk ʔnʔ mtwm lʔ ʔtkšl bk
26:34	ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lk dbhnʔ llyʔ qdm dnqrʔ trnglʔ tlt zbnyn tkpwr by
26:35	ʔmr lh kʔpʔ ʔn nhwʔ ly lmmt ʕmk lʔ ʔkpwr bk whkwt ʔp klhwn tlmydʔ ʔmrw
26:36	hydyn ʔtʔ ʕmhwn yšwʕ ldwktʔ dmtqryʔ gdsmn wʔmr ltlmydwhy tbw hrkʔ ʕd ʔzl ʔṣlʔ
26:37	wdbr lkʔpʔ wltryhwn bny zbdy wšry lmtkmrw wlmtʕqw
26:38	wʔmr lhwn kryʔ hy lh lnpšy ʕdmʔ lmwtʔ qww ly hrkʔ wšhrw ʕmy
26:39	wprq qlyl wnpl ʕl ʔpwhy wmṣlʔ hwʔ wʔmr ʔby ʔn mškḥʔ nʕbrny ksʔ hnʔ brm lʔ ʔyk dʔnʔ ṣbʔ ʔnʔ ʔlʔ ʔyk dʔnt
26:40	wʔtʔ lwt tlmydwhy wʔškḥ ʔnwn kd dmkyn wʔmr lkʔpʔ hknʔ lʔ ʔškḥtwn ḥdʔ šʕʔ dtšhrwn ʕmy
26:41	ʔttʕyrw wṣlw dlʔ tʕlwn lnsywnʔ rwḥʔ mṭybʔ pgrʔ dyn kryh
26:42	twb ʔzl dtrtyn zbnyn ṣly wʔmr ʔby ʔn lʔ mškḥ hnʔ ksʔ dnʕbr ʔlʔ ʔn ʔštyth nhwʔ ṣbynk
26:43	wʔtʔ twb ʔškḥ ʔnwn kd dmkyn ʕynyhwn gyr yqyrn hwy
26:44	wšbq ʔnwn wʔzl twb ṣly dtlt zbnyn wlh lmltʔ ʔmr
26:45	hydyn ʔtʔ lwt tlmydwhy wʔmr lhwn dmkw mkyl wʔttnyḥw hʔ mṭt šʕtʔ wbrh dʔnšʔ mštlm bʔydyhwn dḥṭyʔ
26:46	qwmw nʔzl hʔ mṭʔ hw dmšlm ly
26:47	wʕd hw mmll hʔ yhwdʔ mšlmnʔ ḥd mn trʕsrtʔ ʔtʔ wknšʔ ʕmh sgyʔʔ ʕm spsrʔ wḥwṭrʔ mn lwt rby khnʔ wqšyšʔ dʕmʔ
26:48	wyhb hwʔ lhwn ʔtʔ yhwdʔ mšlmnʔ wʔmr lhw dnšq ʔnʔ hwyw lh ʔḥwdw
26:49	wmḥdʔ qrb lwt yšwʕ wʔmr šlm rby wnšqh
26:50	hw dyn yšwʕ ʔmr lh ʕl hy dʔtyt ḥbry hydyn ʔtqrbw wʔrmyw ʔydyhwn ʕl yšwʕ wʔḥdwhy
26:51	whʔ ḥd mn hnwn dʕm yšwʕ ʔwšṭ ʔydh wšmṭ spsrʔ wmḥyhy lʕbdh drb khnʔ wšqlh ʔdnh
26:52	hydyn ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔhpk spsrʔ ldwkth klhwn gyr hnwn dnsbw sypʔ bsypʔ nmwtwn
26:53	ʔw sbr ʔnt dlʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ dʔbʕʔ mn ʔby wnqym ly hšʔ ytyr mn trtʕsrʔ lgywnyn dmlʔkʔ
26:54	ʔyknʔ hkyl ntmlwn ktbʔ dhknʔ wlʔ dnhwʔ
26:55	bhy šʕtʔ ʔmr yšwʕ lknšʔ ʔyk dʕl gysʔ npqtwn bspsrʔ wbḥwṭrʔ dtʔḥdwnny klywm lwtkwn bhyklʔ ytb hwyt wmlp wlʔ ʔḥdtwnny
26:56	hdʔ dyn dhwt dntmlwn ktbʔ dnbyʔ hydyn tlmydʔ klhwn šbqwhy wʕrqw 
26:57	whnwn dʔḥdwhy lyšwʕ ʔwblwhy lwt qypʔ rb khnʔ ʔykʔ dsprʔ wqšyšʔ knyšyn hww
26:58	šmʕwn dyn kʔpʔ ʔzl hwʔ btrh mn rwḥqʔ ʕdmʔ ldrth drb khnʔ wʕl ytb lgw ʕm dḥšʔ dnḥzʔ ḥrtʔ 
26:59	rby khnʔ dyn wqšyšʔ wknwštʔ klh bʕyn hww ʕl yšwʕ shdʔ ʔyk dnmytwnyhy
26:60	wlʔ ʔškḥw wʔtw sgyʔʔ shdʔ dšwqrʔ ʔḥryt dyn qrbw tryn
26:61	wʔmryn hnʔ ʔmr dmškḥ ʔnʔ dʔšrʔ hyklʔ dʔlhʔ wltltʔ ywmyn ʔbnywhy
26:62	wqm rb khnʔ wʔmr lh lʔ mdm mpnʔ ʔnt ptgmʔ mnʔ mshdyn ʕlyk hlyn
26:63	yšwʕ dyn štyq hwʔ wʕnʔ rb khnʔ wʔmr lh mwmʔ ʔnʔ lk bʔlhʔ ḥyʔ dtʔmr ln ʔn ʔnt hw mšyḥʔ brh dʔlhʔ
26:64	ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔnt ʔmrt ʔmrnʔ lkwn dyn dmn hšʔ tḥzwnyhy lbrh dʔnšʔ dytb mn ymynʔ dḥylʔ wʔtʔ ʕl ʕnny šmyʔ
26:65	hydyn rb khnʔ ṣry mʔnwhy wʔmr hʔ gdp mnʔ mkyl mtbʕyn ln shdʔ hʔ hšʔ šmʕtwn gwdph
26:66	mnʔ ṣbyn ʔntwn ʕnw wʔmryn ḥyb hw mwtʔ
26:67	hydyn rqw bʔpwhy wmqpḥyn hww lh ʔḥrnʔ dyn mḥyn hww lh
26:68	wʔmryn ʔtnbʔ ln mšyḥʔ mnw hw dmḥk
26:69	kʔpʔ dyn ytb hwʔ lbr bdrtʔ wqrbt lwth ʔmtʔ ḥdʔ wʔmrʔ lh ʔp ʔnt ʕm yšwʕ hwyt nṣryʔ
26:70	hw dyn kpr qdm klhwn wʔmr lʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ mnʔ ʔmrʔ ʔnty
26:71	wkd npq lspʔ ḥzth ʔḥrtʔ wʔmrʔ lhwn dtmn hwʔ ʔp hnʔ ʕm yšwʕ nṣryʔ
26:72	wtwb kpr bmwmtʔ dlʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ lh lgbrʔ
26:73	mn btr qlyl dyn qrbw hnwn dqymyn wʔmrw lkʔpʔ šryrʔyt ʔp ʔnt mnhwn ʔnt ʔp mmllk gyr mwdʕ lk
26:74	hydyn šry lmḥrmw wlmʔmʔ dlʔ ydʕnʔ lh lgbrʔ wbh bšʕtʔ qrʔ trnglʔ
26:75	wʔtdkr kʔpʔ mltʔ dyšwʕ dʔmr lh dqdm dnqrʔ trnglʔ tlt zbnyn tkpwr by wnpq lbr bkʔ mryrʔyt
27:01	kd dyn hwʔ ṣprʔ mlkʔ nsbw ʕl yšwʕ klhwn rby khnʔ wqšyšʔ dʕmʔ ʔyk dnmytwnyhy
27:02	wʔsrwhy wʔwblwhy wʔšlmwhy lpylṭws hgmwnʔ
27:03	hydyn yhwdʔ mšlmnʔ kd ḥzʔ dʔtḥyb yšwʕ ʔttwy wʔzl ʔhpk hlyn tltyn dkspʔ lrby khnʔ wlqšyšʔ
27:04	wʔmr ḥṭyt dʔšlmt dmʔ zkyʔ hnwn dyn ʔmrw lh ln mʔ ln ʔnt ydʕ ʔnt
27:05	wšdyhy kspʔ bhyklʔ wšny wʔzl ḥnq npšh
27:06	rby khnʔ dyn šqlwhy lkspʔ wʔmrw lʔ šlyṭ dnrmywhy byt qwrbnʔ mṭl dṭymy dmʔ hw
27:07	wnsbw mlkʔ wzbnw bh ʔgwrsh dpḥrʔ lbyt qbwrʔ dʔksnyʔ
27:08	mṭl hnʔ ʔtqry ʔgwrsʔ hw qrytʔ ddmʔ ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
27:09	hydyn ʔtmly mdm dʔtʔmr byd nbyʔ dʔmr dnsbt tltyn dkspʔ dmwhy dyqyrʔ dqṣw mn bny ʔysryl
27:10	wyhbt ʔnwn lʔgwrsh dpḥrʔ ʔyk dpqd ly mryʔ
27:11	hw dyn yšwʕ qm qdm hgmwnʔ wšʔlh hgmwnʔ wʔmr lh ʔnt hw mlkʔ dyhwdyʔ ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔnt ʔmrt
27:12	wkd ʔklyn hww qrṣwhy rby khnʔ wqšyšʔ mdm ptgmʔ hw lʔ pny
27:13	hydyn ʔmr lh pylṭws lʔ šmʕ ʔnt kmʔ mshdyn ʕlyk
27:14	wlʔ yhb lh ptgmʔ wlʔ bḥdʔ mlʔ wʕl hdʔ ʔtdmr ṭb
27:15	bkl ʕʔdʔ dyn mʕd hwʔ hgmwnʔ dnšrʔ ʔsyrʔ ḥd lʕmʔ ʔynʔ dhnwn ṣbyn hww
27:16	ʔsyr hwʔ lhwn dyn ʔsyrʔ ydyʕʔ dmtqrʔ br ʔbʔ
27:17	wkd knyšyn ʔmr lhwn pylṭws lmn ṣbyn ʔntwn dʔšrʔ lkwn lbr ʔbʔ ʔw lyšwʕ dmtqrʔ mšyḥʔ
27:18	ydʕ hwʔ gyr pylṭws dmn ḥsmʔ ʔšlmwhy
27:19	kd ytb dyn hgmwnʔ ʕl bym dylh šlḥt lh ʔntth wʔmrʔ lh lʔ lk wlhw zdyqʔ sgy gyr ḥšt bḥlmy ywmnʔ mṭlth
27:20	rby khnʔ dyn wqšyšʔ ʔpysw lknšʔ dnšʔlwn lbr ʔbʔ lyšwʕ dyn dnwbdwn
27:21	wʕnʔ hgmwnʔ wʔmr lhwn lmn ṣbyn ʔntwn dʔšrʔ lkwn mn tryhwn hnwn dyn ʔmrw lbr ʔbʔ
27:22	ʔmr lhwn pylṭws wlyšwʕ dmtqrʔ mšyḥʔ mnʔ ʔʕbd lh ʔmryn klhwn nzdqp
27:23	ʔmr lhwn hgmwnʔ mnʔ gyr dbyš ʕbd hnwn dyn ytyrʔyt qʕw wʔmrw nzdqp
27:24	pylṭws dyn kd ḥzʔ dmdm lʔ mwtr ʔlʔ ytyrʔyt rwbʔ hwʔ šql myʔ ʔšyg ʔydwhy lʕyn knšʔ wʔmr mḥsy ʔnʔ mn dmh dhnʔ zdyqʔ ʔntwn tdʕwn
27:25	wʕnw klh ʕmʔ wʔmrw dmh ʕlyn wʕl bnyn
27:26	hydyn šrʔ lhwn lbr ʔbʔ wngd bprglʔ lyšwʕ wʔšlmh dnzdqp
27:27	hydyn ʔsṭrṭywṭʔ dhgmwnʔ dbrwhy lyšwʕ lprṭwryn wknšw ʕlwhy lklh ʔspyr
27:28	wʔšlḥwhy wʔlbšwhy klmys dzḥwrytʔ
27:29	wgdlw klylʔ dʕwznyʔ wsmw bršh wqnyʔ bymynh wbrk wʕl bwrkyhwn qdmwhy wmbzḥyn hww bh wʔmryn šlm mlkʔ dyhwdyʔ
27:30	wrqw bprṣwph wšqlw qnyʔ wmḥyn hww lh ʕl ršh
27:31	wkd bzḥw bh ʔšlḥwhy klmys wʔlbšwhy nḥtwhy wʔwblwhy dnzdqp
27:32	wkd npqyn ʔškḥw gbrʔ qwrynyʔ dšmh šmʕwn lhnʔ šḥrw dnšqwl zqyph
27:33	wʔtw ldwktʔ dmtqryʔ ggwltʔ hy dmtpšqʔ qrqptʔ
27:34	wyhbw lh dnštʔ ḥlʔ dḥlyṭ bmrrtʔ wṭʕm wlʔ ṣbʔ lmštʔ 
27:35	wkd zqpwhy plgw nḥtwhy bpsʔ
27:36	wytbyn hww wnṭryn lh tmn
27:37	wsmw lʕl mn ršh ʕltʔ dmwth bktbʔ hnw yšwʕ mlkʔ dyhwdyʔ
27:38	wʔzdqpw ʕmh tryn lsṭyʔ ḥd mn ymynh wḥd mn smlh
27:39	ʔylyn dyn dʕbryn hww mgdpyn hww ʕlwhy wmnydyn ršyhwn
27:40	wʔmryn str hyklʔ wbnʔ lh ltltʔ ywmyn pṣʔ npšk ʔn brh ʔnt dʔlhʔ wḥwt mn zqypʔ
27:41	hkwt ʔp rby khnʔ mbzḥyn hww ʕm sprʔ wqšyšʔ wpryšʔ
27:42	wʔmryn lʔḥrnʔ ʔḥy npšh lʔ mškḥ lmḥyw ʔn mlkh hw dʔysryl nḥwt hšʔ mn zqypʔ wnhymn bh
27:43	tkyl ʕl ʔlhʔ nprqywhy hšʔ ʔn ṣbʔ bh ʔmr gyr dbrh ʔnʔ dʔlhʔ
27:44	hkwt ʔp gysʔ hnwn dʔzdqpw ʕmh mḥsdyn hww lh
27:45	mn št šʕyn dyn hwʔ ḥšwkʔ ʕl klh ʔrʕʔ ʕdmʔ lšʕʔ tšʕ
27:46	wlʔpy tšʕ šʕyn qʕʔ yšwʕ bqlʔ rmʔ wʔmr ʔyl ʔyl lmnʔ šbqtny
27:47	ʔnšyn dyn mn hnwn dqymyn hww tmn kd šmʕw ʔmryn hww hnʔ lʔlyʔ qrʔ
27:48	wbh bšʕtʔ rhṭ ḥd mnhwn wšql ʔspwgʔ wmlh ḥlʔ wsmh bqnyʔ wmšqʔ hwʔ lh
27:49	šrkʔ dyn ʔmryn hww šbwqw nḥzʔ ʔn ʔtʔ ʔlyʔ lmprqh
27:50	hw dyn yšwʕ twb qʕʔ bqlʔ rmʔ wšbq rwḥh
27:51	wmḥdʔ ʔpy trʕʔ dhyklʔ ʔṣṭry ltryn mn lʕl ʕdmʔ ltḥt wʔrʕʔ ʔttzyʕt wkʔpʔ ʔṣṭry
27:52	wbyt qbwrʔ ʔtptḥw wpgrʔ sgyʔʔ dqdyšʔ dškybyn hww qmw
27:53	wnpqw wbtr qymth ʕlw lmdyntʔ qdyštʔ wʔtḥzyw lsgyʔʔ
27:54	qnṭrwnʔ dyn wdʕmh dnṭryn hww lyšwʕ kd ḥzw zwʕʔ wʔylyn dhwy dḥlw ṭb wʔmrw šryrʔyt hnʔ brh hwʔ dʔlhʔ
27:55	ʔyt hwy dyn ʔp tmn nšʔ sgyʔtʔ dḥzyn hwy mn rwḥqʔ hnyn dʔty hwy btrh dyšwʕ mn glylʔ wmšmšn hwy lh
27:56	dḥdʔ mnhyn mrym mgdlytʔ wmrym ʔmh dyʕqwb wdywsʔ wʔmhwn dbny zbdy
27:57	kd hwʔ dyn rmšʔ ʔtʔ gbrʔ ʕtyrʔ mn rmtʔ dšmh ywsp dʔp hw ʔttlmd hwʔ lyšwʕ
27:58	hnʔ qrb lwt pylṭws wšʔl pgrh dyšwʕ wpqd pylṭws dntyhb lh pgrʔ
27:59	wšqlh ywsp lpgrʔ wkrkh bḥyṣʔ dktnʔ nqdʔ
27:60	wsmh bbyt qbwrʔ ḥdtʔ dylh dnqyr bkʔpʔ wʕgl wkʔpʔ rbtʔ ʔrmyw ʕl trʕʔ dbyt qbwrʔ wʔzlw
27:61	ʔyt hwy dyn tmn mrym mgdlytʔ wmrym ʔḥrtʔ dytbn hwy lqwblh dqbrʔ
27:62	lywmʔ dyn dmḥr dʔytwhy btr ʕrwbtʔ ʔtknšw rby khnʔ wpryšʔ lwt pylṭws
27:63	wʔmryn lh mrn ʔtdkrn dhw mṭʕynʔ ʔmr hwʔ kd ḥy dmn btr tltʔ ywmyn qʔm ʔnʔ
27:64	pqwd hkyl mzdhryn bqbrʔ ʕdmʔ ltltʔ ywmyn dlmʔ nʔtwn tlmydwhy ngnbwnyhy bllyʔ wnʔmrwn lʕmʔ dmn byt mytʔ qm wthwʔ ṭwʕyy ʔḥrytʔ byšʔ mn qdmytʔ
27:65	ʔmr lhwn pylṭws ʔyt lkwn qsṭwnrʔ zlw ʔzdhrw ʔyknʔ dydʕyn ʔntwn
27:66	hnwn dyn ʔzlw ʔzdhrw bqbrʔ wḥtmw kʔpʔ hy ʕm qsṭwnrʔ
28:01	brmšʔ dyn bšbtʔ dngh ḥd bšbʔ ʔtt mrym mgdlytʔ wmrym ʔḥrtʔ dnḥzyn qbrʔ
28:02	whʔ zwʕʔ rbʔ hwʔ mlʔkʔ gyr dmryʔ nḥt mn šmyʔ wqrb ʕgl kʔpʔ mn trʕʔ wytb hwʔ ʕlyh
28:03	ʔytwhy hwʔ dyn ḥzwh ʔyk brqʔ wlbwšh ḥwr hwʔ ʔyk tlgʔ
28:04	wmn dḥlth ʔttzyʕw ʔylyn dnṭryn hww whww ʔyk mytʔ
28:05	ʕnʔ dyn mlʔkʔ wʔmr lnšʔ ʔntyn lʔ tdḥln ydʕ ʔnʔ gyr dlyšwʕ dʔzdqp bʕyn ʔntyn
28:06	lʔ hwʔ tnn qm lh gyr ʔyknʔ dʔmr tʔyyn ḥzyyn dwktʔ dsym hwʔ bh mrn
28:07	wzlyn bʕgl ʔmryn ltlmydwhy dqm mn byt mytʔ whʔ qdm lkwn lglylʔ tmn tḥzwnyhy hʔ ʔmrt lkyn
28:08	wʔzl ʕgl mn qbrʔ bdḥltʔ wbḥdwtʔ rbtʔ wrhṭn dnʔmrn ltlmydwhy
28:09	whʔ yšwʕ pgʕ bhyn wʔmr lhyn šlm lkyn hnyn dyn qrb ʔḥd rglwhy wsgdyn lh
28:10	hydyn ʔmr lhyn yšwʕ lʔ tdḥln ʔlʔ zlyn ʔmryn lʔḥy dnʔzlwn lglylʔ wtmn nḥzwnny
28:11	kd ʔzlyn dyn ʔtw ʔnšʔ mn qsṭwnrʔ hnwn lmdyntʔ wʔmrw lrby khnʔ kl mdm dhwʔ
28:12	wʔtknšw ʕm qšyšʔ wnsbw mlkʔ wyhbw kspʔ lʔ zʕwr lqsṭwnrʔ
28:13	wʔmryn lhwn ʔmrw dtlmydwhy ʔtw gnbwhy bllyʔ kd dmkyn ḥnn
28:14	wʔn ʔštmʕt hdʔ qdm hgmwnʔ ḥnn mpysyn ḥnn lh wlkwn dlʔ ṣptʔ ʕbdyn ḥnn
28:15	hnwn dyn kd nsbw kspʔ ʕbdw ʔyk dʔlpw ʔnwn wnpqt mltʔ hdʔ byt yhwdyʔ ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
28:16	tlmydʔ dyn ḥdʕsr ʔzlw lglylʔ lṭwrʔ ʔykʔ dwʕd ʔnwn yšwʕ
28:17	wkd ḥzʔwhy sgdw lh mnhwn dyn ʔtplgw hww
28:18	wqrb yšwʕ mll ʕmhwn wʔmr lhwn ʔtyhb ly kl šwlṭn bšmyʔ wbʔrʕʔ wʔyknʔ dšdrny ʔby mšdr ʔnʔ lkwn
28:19	zlw hkyl tlmdw klhwn ʕmmʔ wʔʕmdw ʔnwn bšm ʔbʔ wbrʔ wrwḥʔ dqwdšʔ
28:20	wʔlpw ʔnwn dnṭrwn kl mʔ dpqdtkwn whʔ ʔnʔ ʕmkwn ʔnʔ klhwn ywmtʔ ʕdmʔ lšwlmh dʕlmʔ ʔmyn
01:01	ršʔ dʔwnglywn dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ brh dʔlhʔ 
01:02	ʔyk dktyb bʔšʕyʔ nbyʔ hʔ mšdr ʔnʔ mlʔky qdm prṣwpk dntqn ʔwrḥk
01:03	qlʔ dqrʔ bmdbrʔ ṭybw ʔwrḥh dmryʔ wʔšww šbylwhy
01:04	hwʔ ywḥnn bmdbrʔ mʕmd wmkrz mʕmwdytʔ dtybwtʔ lšwbqnʔ dḥṭhʔ
01:05	wnpqʔ hwt lwth klh kwr dyhwd wklhwn bny ʔwršlm wmʕmd hwʔ lhwn bywrdnn kd mwdyn bḥṭhyhwn
01:06	hw dyn ywḥnn lbyš hwʔ lbwšʔ dsʕrʔ dgmlʔ wʔsyr hwʔ ʕrqtʔ dmškʔ bḥṣwhy wmʔkwlth ʔytyh hwt qmṣʔ wdbšʔ dbrʔ
01:07	wmkrz hwʔ wʔmr hʔ ʔtʔ btry dḥyltn mny hw dlʔ šwʔ ʔnʔ dʔghn ʔšrʔ ʕrqʔ dmsnwhy
01:08	ʔnʔ ʔʕmdtkwn bmyʔ hw dyn nʕmdkwn brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ
01:09	whwʔ bywmtʔ hnwn ʔtʔ yšwʕ mn nṣrt dglylʔ wʔtʕmd bywrdnn mn ywḥnn
01:10	wmḥdʔ dslq mn myʔ ḥzʔ dʔstdqw šmyʔ wrwḥʔ ʔyk ywnʔ dnḥtt ʕlwhy
01:11	wqlʔ hwʔ mn šmyʔ ʔnt hw bry ḥbybʔ bk ʔṣṭbyt
01:12	wmḥdʔ ʔpqth rwḥʔ lmdbrʔ
01:13	whwʔ tmn bmdbrʔ ywmtʔ ʔrbʕyn kd mtnsʔ mn sṭnʔ wʔytwhy hwʔ ʕm ḥywtʔ wmšmšyn hww lh mlʔkʔ
01:14	btr dʔštlm dyn ywḥnn ʔtʔ lh yšwʕ lglylʔ wmkrz hwʔ sbrtʔ dmlkwth dʔlhʔ
01:15	wʔmr šlm lh zbnʔ wmṭt mlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ twbw whymnw bsbrtʔ
01:16	wkd mhlk ḥdry ymʔ dglylʔ ḥzʔ lšmʕwn wlʔndrʔws ʔḥwhy drmyn mṣydtʔ bymʔ ʔytyhwn hww gyr ṣydʔ
01:17	wʔmr lhwn yšwʕ tw btry wʔʕbdkwn ṣydʔ dbnyʔnšʔ
01:18	wmḥdʔ šbqw mṣydthwn wʔzlw btrh
01:19	wkd ʕbr qlyl ḥzʔ lyʕqwb br zbdy wlywḥnn ʔḥwhy wʔp lhwn bspyntʔ dmtqnyn mṣydthwn
01:20	wqrʔ ʔnwn wmḥdʔ šbqw lzbdy ʔbwhwn bspyntʔ ʕm ʔgyrʔ wʔzlw btrh
01:21	wkd ʕlw lkprnḥwm mḥdʔ mlp hwʔ bšbʔ bknwšthwn
01:22	wtmyhyn hww bywlpnh mlp hwʔ lhwn gyr ʔyk mšlṭʔ wlʔ ʔyk spryhwn
01:23	wʔyt hwʔ bknwšthwn gbrʔ dʔyt bh rwḥʔ ṭmʔtʔ wqʕʔ
01:24	wʔmr mʔ ln wlk yšwʕ nṣryʔ ʔtyt lmwbdwtn ydʕ ʔnʔ lk mn ʔnt qdyšh dʔlhʔ
01:25	wkʔʔ bh yšwʕ wʔmr skwr pwmk wpwq mnh
01:26	wšdth rwḥʔ ṭnptʔ wqʕt bqlʔ rmʔ wnpqt mnh
01:27	wʔtdmrw klhwn wbʕyn hww ḥd ʕm ḥd wʔmryn dmnʔ hy hdʔ wmnw ywlpnʔ hnʔ ḥdtʔ dbšwlṭnʔ wʔp lrwḥʔ ṭnptʔ pqd wmštmʕn lh
01:28	wmḥdʔ npq ṭbh bklh ʔtrʔ dglylʔ
01:29	wnpqw mn knwštʔ wʔtw lbyth dšmʕwn wdʔndrʔws ʕm yʕqwb wywḥnn
01:30	wḥmth dšmʕwn rmyʔ hwt bʔštʔ wʔmrw lh ʕlyh
01:31	wqrb ʔḥdh bʔydh wʔqymh wmḥdʔ šbqth ʔšth wmšmšʔ hwt lhwn
01:32	brmšʔ dyn bmʕrby šmšʔ ʔytyw lwth klhwn ʔylyn dbyšʔyt ʕbydyn wdywnʔ
01:33	wmdyntʔ klh knyšʔ hwt ʕl trʕʔ
01:34	wʔsy lsgyʔʔ dbyšʔyt ʕbydyn hww bkwrhnʔ mšḥlpʔ wdywʔ sgyʔʔ ʔpq wlʔ šbq hwʔ lhwn ldywʔ dnmllwn mṭl dydʕyn hww lh
01:35	wbṣprʔ qdm qm ṭb wʔzl lʔtrʔ ḥwrbʔ wtmn mṣlʔ hwʔ
01:36	wbʕyn hww lh šmʕwn wdʕmh
01:37	wkd ʔškḥwhy ʔmryn lh klhwn ʔnšʔ bʕyn lk
01:38	ʔmr lhwn hlkw lqwryʔ wlmdyntʔ dqrybn dʔp tmn ʔkrz lhdʔ gyr ʔtyt
01:39	wmkrz hwʔ bklhyn knwšthwn bklh glylʔ wmpq
01:40	wʔtʔ lwth grbʔ wnpl ʕl rglwhy wbʕʔ hwʔ mnh wʔmr lh ʔn ṣbʔ ʔnt mškḥ ʔnt lmdkywty
01:41	hw dyn yšwʕ ʔtrḥm ʕlwhy wpšṭ ʔydh qrb lh wʔmr ṣbʔ ʔnʔ ʔtdkʔ
01:42	wbh bšʕtʔ ʔzl grbh mnh wʔtdky
01:43	wkʔʔ bh wʔpqh
01:44	wʔmr lh ḥzy lmʔ lʔnš ʔmr ʔnt ʔlʔ zl ḥwʔ npšk lkhnʔ wqrb qwrbnʔ ḥlp tdkytk ʔyknʔ dpqd mwšʔ lshdwthwn
01:45	hw dyn kd npq šry hwʔ mkrz sgy wʔṭbh lmltʔ ʔyknʔ dlʔ nškḥ hwʔ yšwʕ glyʔyt dnʕwl lmdyntʔ ʔlʔ lbr hwʔ bʔtrʔ ḥwrbʔ wʔtyn hww lwth mn kl dwkʔ
02:01	wʕl twb yšwʕ lkprnḥwm lywmtʔ wkd šmʕw dbbytʔ hw
02:02	ʔtknšw sgyʔʔ ʔyknʔ dlʔ ʔškḥ ʔḥd ʔnwn ʔplʔ qdm trʕʔ wmmll hwʔ ʕmhwn mltʔ
02:03	wʔtw lwth wʔytyw lh mšryʔ kd šqylyn lh byt ʔrbʕʔ
02:04	wdlʔ ʔškḥw lmtqrbw lwth mṭl knšʔ slqw lhwn lʔgrʔ wʔrymw tṭlylʔ dʔtr dʔytwhy hwʔ yšwʕ wšbwh ʕrsʔ drmʔ hwʔ bh mšryʔ
02:05	kd ḥzʔ dyn yšwʕ hymnwthwn ʔmr lhw mšryʔ bry šbyqyn lk ḥṭhyk
02:06	ʔyt hww dyn tmn mn sprʔ wpryšʔ dytbyn wmtrʕyn hww blbhwn
02:07	dmnʔ hnʔ mmll gwdpʔ mnw mškḥ lmšbq ḥṭhʔ ʔlʔ ʔn ḥd ʔlhʔ
02:08	yšwʕ dyn ydʕ brwḥh dhlyn mtrʕyn bnpšhwn wʔmr lhwn mnʔ mtrʕyn ʔntwn hlyn blbkwn
02:09	ʔydʔ pšyqʔ lmʔmr lmšryʔ dšbyqyn lk ḥṭhyk ʔw lmʔmr dqwm šqwl ʕrsk whlk
02:10	dtdʕwn dyn dšlyṭ hw brh dʔnšʔ bʔrʕʔ lmšbq ḥṭhʔ ʔmr lmšryʔ
02:11	lk ʔmr ʔnʔ qwm šqwl ʕrsk wzl lbytk
02:12	wqm br šʕth wšql ʕrsh wnpq lʕyn klhwn ʔyknʔ dntdmrwn klhwn wnšbḥwn lʔlhʔ kd ʔmryn dlʔ mmtwm ḥzyn hknʔ 
02:13	wnpq twb lwt ymʔ wklh knšʔ ʔtyn hww lwth wmlp hwʔ lhwn
02:14	wkd ʕbr ḥzʔ llwy br ḥlpy dytb byt mksʔ wʔmr lh tʔ btry wqm ʔzl btrh
02:15	whwʔ dkd smyk bbyth sgyʔʔ mksʔ wḥṭyʔ smykyn hww ʕm yšwʕ wʕm tlmydwhy ʔytyhwn hww gyr sgyʔʔ wʔtw btrh
02:16	wsprʔ wpryšʔ kd ḥzʔwhy dlʕs ʕm mksʔ wʕm ḥṭyʔ ʔmrw ltlmydwhy mnw ʕm mksʔ wḥṭyʔ ʔkl wštʔ
02:17	kd šmʕ dyn yšwʕ ʔmr lhwn lʔ snyqyn ḥlymʔ ʕl ʔsyʔ ʔlʔ ʔylyn dbyš byš ʕbydyn lʔ ʔtyt dʔqrʔ lzdyqʔ ʔlʔ lḥṭyʔ
02:18	tlmydwhy dyn dywḥnn wpryšʔ ṣymyn hww wʔtw wʔmryn lh lmnʔ tlmydwhy dywḥnn wdpryšʔ ṣymyn wtlmydyk dylk lʔ ṣymyn
02:19	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ lmʔ mškḥyn bnwhy dgnwnʔ kmʔ dḥtnʔ ʕmhwn hw dnṣwmwn lʔ
02:20	nʔtwn dyn ywmtʔ dmʔ dʔštql mnhwn ḥtnʔ hydyn nṣwmwn bhw ywmʔ
02:21	lʔ ʔnš rmʔ ʔwrqʕtʔ ḥdtʔ wḥʔṭ ʕl mʔnʔ blyʔ dlʔ nsbʔ mlywth hy ḥdtʔ mn blyʔ whwʔ sdqʔ ytyrʔ
02:22	wlʔ ʔnš rmʔ ḥmrʔ ḥdtʔ bzqʔ blytʔ dlʔ ḥmrʔ mṣrʔ lzqʔ wzqʔ ʔbdn wḥmrʔ mtʔšd ʔlʔ rmyn ḥmrʔ ḥdtʔ bzqʔ ḥdttʔ
02:23	whwʔ dkd ʔzl yšwʕ bšbtʔ byt zrʕʔ tlmydwhy mhlkyn hww wmlgyn šblʔ
02:24	wʔmryn lh pryšʔ ḥzy mnʔ ʕbdyn bšbtʔ mdm dlʔ šlyṭ
02:25	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ lʔ mmtwm qrytwn mnʔ ʕbd dwyd kd ʔstnq wkpn hw wdʕmh
02:26	ʔyknʔ ʕl lbyth dʔlhʔ kd ʔbytr rb khnʔ wlḥmʔ dptwrh dmryʔ ʔkl hw dlʔ šlyṭ lmʔkl ʔlʔ ʔn lkhnʔ wyhb ʔp lʔylyn dʕmh hww
02:27	wʔmr lhwn dšbtʔ mṭl brnšʔ ʔtbryt wlʔ hwʔ brnšʔ mṭl šbtʔ
02:28	mrh hw hkyl wʔp dšbtʔ brh dʔnšʔ
03:01	wʕl twb yšwʕ lknwštʔ wʔyt hwʔ tmn gbrʔ ḥd dybyšʔ ʔydh
03:02	wnṭryn hww lh dʔn mʔsʔ lh bšbtʔ nqṭrgwnyhy
03:03	wʔmr lhw gbrʔ dybyšʔ ʔydh qwm bmṣʕtʔ
03:04	ʔmr dyn ʔp lhwn šlyṭ bšbtʔ lmʕbd dṭb ʔw dbyš npšʔ lmḥyw ʔw lmwbdw hnwn dyn štyqyn hww
03:05	wḥr bhwn bḥmtʔ kd kryʔ lh ʕl qšywt lbhwn wʔmr lhw gbrʔ pšwṭ ʔydk wpšṭ wtqnt ʔydh
03:06	wnpqw pryšʔ br šʕth ʕm dbyt hrwds wmlkʔ nsbw ʕlwhy ʔyknʔ dnwbdwnyhy
03:07	wyšwʕ ʕm tlmydwhy ʔzl lh lwt ymʔ wʕmʔ sgyʔʔ mn glylʔ nqph hwʔ wmn yhwd
03:08	wmn ʔwršlm wmn ʔdwm wmn ʕbrʔ dywrdnn wmn ṣwr wmn ṣydn knšʔ sgyʔʔ dšmʕw hww kl dʕbd ʔtw lwth
03:09	wʔmr ltlmydwhy dnqrbwn lh spyntʔ mṭl knšʔ dlʔ nḥbṣwnyhy
03:10	sgyʔʔ gyr mʔsʔ hwʔ ʕdmʔ dnhwwn nplyn ʕlwhy mṭl dntqrbwn lh
03:11	wʔylyn dʔyt hwy lhwn mḥwtʔ drwḥʔ ṭnptʔ mʔ dḥzʔwhy nplyn hww wqʕyn wʔmryn ʔnt hw brh dʔlhʔ
03:12	wsgy kʔʔ hwʔ bhwn dlʔ nglwnyhy
03:13	wslq lṭwrʔ wqrʔ lʔylyn dṣbʔ wʔtw lwth
03:14	wgbʔ trʕsr dnhwwn ʕmh wdnšdr ʔnwn dnkrzwn
03:15	wdnhwwn šlyṭyn dnʔswn kryhʔ wnpqwn dywʔ
03:16	wšmy lšmʕwn šmʔ kʔpʔ
03:17	wlyʕqwb br zbdy wlywḥnn ʔḥwhy dyʕqwb sm lhwn šmʔ bny rgšy dʔytwhy bny rʕmʔ
03:18	wʔndrʔws wpylypws wbr twlmy wmty wtʔwmʔ wyʕqwb br ḥlpy wtdy wšmʕwn qnnyʔ
03:19	wyhwdʔ skrywṭʔ hw dʔšlmh wʔtw lbytʔ
03:20	wʔtknšw knšʔ twb ʔyknʔ dlʔ nškḥwn hww lḥmʔ lmʔkl
03:21	wšmʕw ʔḥynwhy wnpqw lmʔḥdh ʔmryn hww gyr dmn hwnh npq
03:22	wsprʔ ʔylyn dmn ʔwršlm nḥtw ʔmryn hww bʕlzbwb ʔyt bh wbršʔ ddywʔ mpq dywʔ
03:23	wqrʔ ʔnwn yšwʕ wbmtlʔ ʔmr lhwn ʔyknʔ mškḥ sṭnʔ lsṭnʔ lmpqw
03:24	ʔn mlkwtʔ gyr ʕl npšh ttplg lʔ mškḥʔ lmqm mlkwtʔ hy
03:25	wʔn bytʔ ʕl npšh ntplg lʔ mškḥ bytʔ hw lmqm
03:26	wʔn hw dsṭnʔ qm ʕl npšh wʔtplg lʔ mškḥ lmqm ʔlʔ ḥrth hy
03:27	lʔ ʔnš mškḥ dnʕwl lbyt ḥsynʔ wnḥṭwp mʔnwhy ʔlʔ ʔn lwqdm lḥsynʔ nʔswr whydyn byth nbwz
03:28	ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dklhwn ḥṭhʔ wgwdpʔ dngdpwn bnyʔnšʔ nštbqwn lhwn
03:29	mn dyn dngdp ʕl rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ lyt lh šwbqnʔ lʕlm ʔlʔ mḥyb hw ldynʔ dlʕlm
03:30	mṭl dʔmryn hww drwḥʔ ṭnptʔ ʔyt bh
03:31	wʔtw ʔmh wʔḥwhy qymyn lbr wšdrw dnqrwnyhy lhwn
03:32	ytb hwʔ dyn ḥdrwhy knšʔ wʔmrw lh hʔ ʔmk wʔḥyk lbr bʕyn lk
03:33	wʕnʔ wʔmr lhwn mn hy ʔmy wmn ʔnwn ʔḥy
03:34	wḥr bʔylyn dytbyn lwth wʔmr hʔ ʔmy whʔ ʔḥy
03:35	mn dnʕbd gyr ṣbynh dʔlhʔ hwyw ʔḥy wḥty wʔmy 
04:01	twb dyn šry hwʔ mlp ʕl yd ymʔ wʔtknšw lwth knšʔ sgyʔʔ ʔyk dnsq ntb lh bspyntʔ bymʔ wklh knšʔ qʔm hwʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ ʕl yd ymʔ
04:02	wmlp hwʔ lhwn bmtlʔ sgy wʔmr hwʔ bywlpnh
04:03	šmʕw hʔ npq zrwʕʔ lmzrʕ
04:04	wkd zrʕ ʔyt dnpl ʕl yd ʔwrḥʔ wʔtt prḥtʔ wʔklth
04:05	ʔḥrnʔ dyn npl ʕl šwʕʔ ʔykʔ dlyt ʔrʕʔ sgy wbr šʕth blṣ mṭl dlyt hwʔ ʕwmqʔ dʔrʕʔ
04:06	kd dnḥ dyn šmšʔ ḥmʔ wmṭl dlyt hwʔ lh ʕqrʔ ybš
04:07	wʔḥrnʔ npl byt kwbʔ wslqw kwbʔ wḥnqwhy wpʔrʔ lʔ yhb
04:08	ʔḥrnʔ dyn npl ʕl ʔrʕʔ ṭbtʔ wslq wrbʔ wyhb pʔrʔ ʔyt dtltyn wʔyt dštyn wʔyt dmʔʔ
04:09	wʔmr hwʔ mn dʔyt lh ʔdnʔ dnšmʕ nšmʕ
04:10	kd hww dyn blḥwdyhwn šʔlwhy hnwn dʕmh ʕm trʕsrth mtlʔ hw
04:11	wʔmr lhwn yšwʕ lkwn yhyb lmdʕ ʔrzʔ dmlkwth dʔlhʔ lbryʔ dyn kl mdm bmtlʔ hwʔ
04:12	dkd ḥzyn nḥzwn wlʔ nḥzwn wkd šmʕyn nšmʕwn wlʔ nstklwn dlmʔ ntpnwn wnštbqwn lhwn ḥṭhyhwn
04:13	wʔmr lhwn lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn lh lmtlʔ hnʔ wʔyknʔ klhwn mtlʔ tdʕwn
04:14	zrwʕʔ dzrʕ mltʔ zrʕ
04:15	hlyn dyn dʕl yd ʔwrḥʔ hlyn ʔnwn dmzdrʕʔ bhwn mltʔ wmʔ dšmʕw mḥdʔ ʔtʔ sṭnʔ wšql lh lmltʔ dzryʕʔ blbhwn
04:16	whnwn dʕl šwʕʔ ʔzdrʕw hlyn ʔnwn dmʔ dšmʕw mltʔ mḥdʔ bḥdwtʔ mqblyn lh
04:17	wlyt lhwn ʕqrʔ bnpšhwn ʔlʔ dzbnʔ ʔnwn wmʔ dhwʔ ʔwlṣnʔ ʔw rdwpyʔ mṭl mltʔ ʕgl mtkšlyn
04:18	whnwn dbyt kwbʔ mzdrʕyn hlyn ʔnwn hnwn dšmʕw mltʔ
04:19	wrnyʔ dʕlmʔ hnʔ wṭwʕyy dʕwtrʔ wšrkʔ drgygtʔ ʔḥrnytʔ ʕʔln ḥnqn lh lmltʔ wdlʔ pʔrʔ hwyʔ
04:20	whnwn dbʔrʕʔ ṭbtʔ ʔzdrʕw hlyn ʔnwn dšmʕyn mltʔ wmqblyn wyhbyn pʔrʔ btltyn wbštyn wbmʔʔ
04:21	wʔmr lhwn dlmʔ ʔtʔ šrgʔ dtḥyt sʔtʔ nttsym ʔw tḥyt ʕrsʔ lʔ hwʔ dʕl mnrtʔ nttsym
04:22	lyt gyr mdm dṭšʔ dlʔ ntglʔ wlʔ hwʔ bṭwšyʔ wlʔ mtglʔ
04:23	ʔn ʔnš ʔyt lh ʔdnʔ dnšmʕ nšmʕ
04:24	wʔmr lhwn ḥzw mnʔ šmʕyn ʔntwn bhy kyltʔ dmkylyn ʔntwn mttkyl lkwn wmttwsp lkwn lʔylyn dšmʕyn
04:25	mn dʔyt lh gyr ntyhb lh wmn dlyt lh ʔp hw dʔyt lh nštql mnh
04:26	wʔmr hwʔ hknʔ hy mlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ ʔyk ʔnš dnrmʔ zrʕʔ bʔrʕʔ
04:27	wndmk wnqwm bllyʔ wbʔymmʔ wzrʕʔ nrbʔ wnʔrk kd hw lʔ ydʕ
04:28	ʔrʕʔ gyr mytyʔ lh lpʔrʔ wlwqdm hwʔ ʕsbʔ wbtrh šblʔ ʔḥryt dyn ḥṭtʔ mšmlytʔ bšblʔ
04:29	mʔ dšmn dyn pʔrʔ mḥdʔ ʔtyʔ mglʔ dmṭy ḥṣdʔ
04:30	wʔmr lmnʔ ndmyh lmlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ wbʔynʔ mtlʔ nmtlyh
04:31	ʔyk prdtʔ hy dḥrdlʔ hy dmʔ dʔzdrʕt bʔrʕʔ zʕwryʔ hy mn klhwn zrʕwnʔ dʕl ʔrʕʔ
04:32	wmʔ dʔzdrʕt slqʔ whwyʔ rbʔ mn klhwn yrqwnʔ wʕbdʔ swkʔ rwrbtʔ ʔyk dtškḥ dbṭllh prḥtʔ tškn
04:33	bmtlʔ dʔyk hlyn mmll hwʔ yšwʕ ʕmhwn mtlʔ ʔyk dmškḥyn hww lmšmʕ
04:34	wdlʔ mtlʔ lʔ mmll hwʔ ʕmhwn ltlmydwhy dyn bynwhy wlhwn mpšq hwʔ klmdm
04:35	wʔmr lhwn bhw ywmʔ brmšʔ nʕbr ln lʕbrʔ
04:36	wšbqw lknšʔ wdbrwhy kd bspyntʔ hw wspynʔ ʔḥrnytʔ ʔyt hwy ʕmhwn
04:37	whwt ʕlʕlʔ rbtʔ wrwḥʔ wgllʔ nplyn hww bspyntʔ wqrybʔ hwt dttmlʔ
04:38	hw dyn yšwʕ ʕl bsdyʔ dmk hwʔ bḥrth dspyntʔ wʔtw ʔqymwhy wʔmryn lh rbn lʔ bṭyl lk dʔbdyn ḥnn
04:39	wqm wkʔʔ brwḥʔ wʔmr lymʔ šly zgyr ʔnt wšlyt rwḥʔ whwʔ nwḥʔ rbʔ
04:40	wʔmr lhwn lmnʔ dḥwltnyn ʔntwn hkn wlmnʔ lyt bkwn hymnwtʔ
04:41	wdḥlw dḥltʔ rbtʔ wʔmryn hww ḥd lḥd mnw ky hnʔ drwḥʔ wymʔ mštmʕyn lh
05:01	wʔtʔ lʕbrʔ dymʔ lʔtrʔ dgdryʔ
05:02	wkd npq mn spyntʔ pgʕ bh mn byt qbwrʔ gbrʔ dʔyt bh rwḥʔ ṭnptʔ
05:03	wʕmr hwʔ byt qbwrʔ wbššltʔ ʔnš lʔ mškḥ hwʔ lmʔsrh
05:04	mṭl dkl ʔmty dbswṭmʔ wbššltʔ mtʔsr hwʔ ššltʔ mtbr hwʔ wswṭmʔ mpsq hwʔ wlʔ ʔnš mškḥ hwʔ lmkbšh
05:05	wbkl zbn bllyʔ wbʔymmʔ bbyt qbwrʔ wbṭwrʔ ʔytwhy hwʔ wqʕʔ hwʔ wmṣlp npšh bkʔpʔ
05:06	kd ḥzʔ dyn lyšwʕ mn rwḥqʔ rhṭ sgd lh
05:07	wqʕʔ bqlʔ rmʔ wʔmr mʔ ly wlk yšwʕ brh dʔlhʔ mrymʔ mwmʔ ʔnʔ lk bʔlhʔ dlʔ tšnqny
05:08	ʔmr hwʔ lh gyr pwq mn brnšʔ rwḥʔ ṭnpʔ
05:09	wšʔlh ʔyknʔ šmk ʔmr lh lgywn šmn mṭl dsgyʔʔ ḥnn
05:10	wbʕʔ hwʔ mnh sgy dlʔ nšdrywhy lbr mn ʔtrʔ
05:11	ʔyt hwʔ dyn tmn lwt ṭwrʔ bqrʔ rbtʔ dḥzyrʔ drʕyʔ
05:12	wbʕyn hww mnh hnwn šʔdʔ wʔmryn šdryn ʕl hnwn ḥzyrʔ dbhwn nʕwl
05:13	wʔps lhwn wnpq rwḥʔ hlyn ṭnptʔ wʕl bḥzyrʔ wrhṭt hy bqrʔ lšqypʔ wnplt bymʔ ʔyk tryn ʔlpyn wʔtḥnqw bmyʔ 
05:14	whnwn drʕyn hww lhwn ʕrqw wʔmrw bmdyntʔ wʔp bqwryʔ wnpqw lmḥzʔ mdm dhwʔ
05:15	wʔtw lwt yšwʕ wḥzʔwhy lhw dšʔdwhy kd lbyš wmnkp wytb hw dʔyt hwʔ bh lgywn wdḥlw
05:16	wʔštʕyw lhwn hnwn dḥzw dʔyknʔ hwʔ lhw dšʔdwhy wʔp ʕl hnwn ḥzyrʔ
05:17	wšryw bʕyn mnh dnʔzl lh mn tḥwmhwn
05:18	wkd slq lspyntʔ bʕʔ hwʔ mnh hw dšʔdwhy dʕmh nhwʔ
05:19	wlʔ šbqh ʔlʔ ʔmr lh zl lbytk lwt ʔnšyk wʔštʕʔ lhwn mdm dʕbd lk mryʔ wdʔtrḥm ʕlyk
05:20	wʔzl wšry mkrz bʕsrt mdyntʔ mdm dʕbd lh yšwʕ wklhwn tmyhyn hww
05:21	wkd ʕbr yšwʕ bspyntʔ lhw ʕbrʔ twb ʔtknšw ʕlwhy knšʔ sgyʔʔ kd ʔytwhy ʕl yd ymʔ
05:22	wʔtʔ ḥd dšmh ywʔrš mn rby knwštʔ wkd ḥzyhy npl lwt rglwhy
05:23	wbʕʔ hwʔ mnh sgy wʔmr lh brty byšʔyt ʕbydʔ tʔ sym ʔydk ʕlyh wttḥlm wtḥʔ
05:24	wʔzl ʕmh yšwʕ wdbyq hwʔ lh knšʔ sgyʔʔ wḥbṣyn hww lh
05:25	ʔnttʔ dyn ḥdʔ dʔytyh hwt bmrdytʔ ddmʔ šnyn trtʕsrʔ
05:26	ʔydʔ dsgy sblt mn ʔswtʔ sgyʔʔ wʔpqt kl mdm dʔyt lh wmdm lʔ ʔtʕdrt ʔlʔ ʔp ytyrʔyt ʔtʔlṣt
05:27	kd šmʕt ʕl yšwʕ ʔtt bḥbṣʔ dknšʔ mn bstrh qrbt llbwšh
05:28	ʔmrʔ hwt gyr dʔpn llbwšh qrbʔ ʔnʔ ḥyʔ ʔnʔ
05:29	wmḥdʔ ybšt mʕynʔ ddmh wʔrgšt bpgrh dʔtʔsyt mn mḥwth
05:30	yšwʕ dyn mḥdʔ ydʕ bnpšh dḥylʔ npq mnh wʔtpny lwt knšʔ wʔmr mnw qrb lmʔny
05:31	wʔmryn lh tlmydwhy ḥzʔ ʔnt lknšʔ dḥbṣyn lk wʔmr ʔnt mnw qrb ly
05:32	wḥʔr hwʔ dnḥzʔ mnw hdʔ ʕbd
05:33	hy dyn ʔnttʔ kd dḥylʔ wrtytʔ dydʕt mʔ dhwʔ lh ʔtt nplt qdmwhy wʔmrt lh klh šrrʔ
05:34	hw dyn ʔmr lh brty hymnwtky ʔḥytky zly bšlmʔ whwyty ḥlymʔ mn mḥwtky
05:35	wʕd hw mmll ʔtw mn dbyt rb knwštʔ wʔmryn dbrtk mytt lmnʔ mkyl mʕml ʔnt lmlpnʔ
05:36	yšwʕ dyn šmʕ lmltʔ dʔmrw wʔmr lhw rb knwštʔ lʔ tdḥl blḥwd hymn
05:37	wlʔ šbq lʔnš dnʔzl ʕmh ʔlʔ lšmʕwn kʔpʔ wlyʕqwb wlywḥnn ʔḥwhy dyʕqwb
05:38	wʔtw lbytʔ dhw rb knwštʔ wḥzʔ drhybyn wbkyn wmyllyn
05:39	wʕl wʔmr lhwn mnʔ rhybyn ʔntwn wbkyn ṭlytʔ lʔ mytt ʔlʔ dmkʔ hy
05:40	wgḥkyn hww ʕlwhy hw dyn ʔpq lklhwn wdbr lʔbwh dṭlytʔ wlʔmh wlhnwn dʕmh wʕl lʔykʔ drmyʔ hwt ṭlytʔ
05:41	wʔḥd bʔydh dṭlytʔ wʔmr lh ṭlytʔ qwmy
05:42	wbr šʕth qmt ṭlytʔ wmhlkʔ hwt ʔytyh hwt gyr brt šnyn trtʕsrʔ wmtdmryn hww dwmrʔ rbʔ
05:43	wpqd ʔnwn sgy dlʔ ʔnš ndʕ hdʔ wʔmr dntlwn lh lmlʕs
06:01	wnpq mn tmn wʔtʔ lmdynth wdbyqyn hww lh tlmydwhy
06:02	wkd hwt šbtʔ šry lmlpw bknwštʔ wsgyʔʔ dšmʕw ʔtdmrw wʔmryn hww ʔymkʔ lh hlyn lhnʔ wʔydʔ hy ḥkmtʔ dʔtyhbt lh dḥylʔ dʔyk hlyn bʔydwhy nhwwn
06:03	lʔ hwʔ hnʔ ngrʔ brh dmrym wʔḥwhy dyʕqwb wdywsʔ wdšmʕwn wlʔ hʔ ʔḥwth tnn lwtn wmtkšlyn hww bh
06:04	wʔmr lhwn yšwʕ lyt nbyʔ dṣʕyr ʔlʔ ʔn bmdynth wbyt ʔḥynwhy wbbyth
06:05	wlʔ mškḥ hwʔ dnʕbd tmn ʔp lʔ ḥd ḥylʔ ʔlʔ ʔn dʕl kryhʔ qlyl sm ʔydh wʔsy
06:06	wmtdmr hwʔ bḥsyrwt hymnwthwn wmtkrk hwʔ bqwryʔ kd mlp
06:07	wqrʔ ltrʕsrth wšry dnšdr ʔnwn tryn tryn wyhb lhwn šwlṭnʔ ʕl rwḥʔ ṭnptʔ dnpqwn
06:08	wpqd ʔnwn dlʔ nšqlwn mdm lʔwrḥʔ ʔlʔ ʔn šbṭʔ blḥwd lʔ trmlʔ wlʔ lḥmʔ wlʔ nḥšʔ bkysyhwn
06:09	ʔlʔ nsʔnwn ṭlrʔ wlʔ nlbšwn trtyn kwtynyn
06:10	wʔmr lhwn dlʔynʔ bytʔ dʕʔlyn ʔntwn tmn hww ʕdmʔ dnpqyn ʔntwn mn tmn
06:11	wkl mn dlʔ nqblwnkwn wlʔ nšmʕwnkwn mʔ dnpqyn ʔntwn mn tmn pṣw ḥlʔ dbtḥtyʔ drglykwn lshdwthwn wʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dnhwʔ nyḥ lsdwm wlʕmwrʔ bywmʔ ddynʔ ʔw lmdyntʔ hy
06:12	wnpqw hww wʔkrzw dntwbwn
06:13	wšʔdʔ sgyʔʔ mpqyn hww wmšḥyn hww bmšḥʔ kryhʔ sgyʔʔ wmʔsyn hww
06:14	wšmʕ hrwds mlkʔ ʕl yšwʕ ʔtydʕ hwʔ lh gyr šmh wʔmr hwʔ ywḥnn mʕmdnʔ qm mn byt mytʔ mṭl hnʔ ḥylʔ mstʕryn bh
06:15	ʔḥrnʔ ʔmryn hww dʔlyʔ hw wʔḥrnʔ dnbyʔ hw ʔyk ḥd mn nbyʔ
06:16	kd šmʕ dyn hrwds ʔmr ywḥnn hw dʔnʔ psqt ršh hw qm mn byt mytʔ
06:17	hw gyr hrwds šdr hwʔ ʔḥdh lywḥnn wʔsrh byt ʔsyrʔ mṭl hrwdyʔ ʔntt pylypws ʔḥwhy hy dnsb
06:18	ʔmr hwʔ gyr ywḥnn lhrwds dlʔ šlyṭ lk dtsb ʔntt ʔḥwk
06:19	hy dyn hrwdyʔ lḥymʔ hwt lh wṣbyn hwt lmqṭlh wlʔ mškḥʔ hwt
06:20	hrwds gyr dḥl hwʔ mn ywḥnn ʕl dydʕ hwʔ dgbrʔ hw zdyqʔ wqdyšʔ wmnṭr hwʔ lh wsgyʔtʔ šmʕ hwʔ lh wʕbd wbsymʔyt šmʕ hwʔ lh 
06:21	whwʔ ywmʔ ydyʕʔ kd hrwds bbyt yldh ḥšmytʔ ʕbd hwʔ lrwrbnwhy wlkylyrkʔ wlršʔ dglylʔ
06:22	wʕlt brth dhrwdyʔ rqdt wšprt lh lhrwds wlʔylyn dsmykyn ʕmh wʔmr mlkʔ lṭlytʔ šʔly mny mdm dṣbyʔ ʔnty wʔtl lky
06:23	wymʔ lh dmdm dtšʔlyn ʔtl lky ʕdmʔ lplgh dmlkwty
06:24	hy dyn npqt wʔmrʔ lʔmh mnʔ ʔšʔlywhy ʔmrʔ lh ršh dywḥnn mʕmdnʔ
06:25	wmḥdʔ ʕlt bbṭylwtʔ lwt mlkʔ wʔmrʔ lh ṣbyʔ ʔnʔ bhdʔ šʕtʔ dttl ly ʕl pynkʔ ršh dywḥnn mʕmdnʔ
06:26	wkryt lh sgy lmlkʔ mṭl dyn mwmtʔ wmṭl smykʔ lʔ ṣbʔ dnglzyh
06:27	ʔlʔ mḥdʔ šdr mlkʔ ʔspwqlṭrʔ wpqd dnytʔ ršh dywḥnn wʔzl psqh ršh dywḥnn byt ʔsyrʔ
06:28	wʔyty bpynkʔ wyhb lṭlytʔ why ṭlytʔ yhbt lʔmh
06:29	wšmʕw tlmydwhy wʔtw šqlw šldh wsmw bbyt qbwrʔ
06:30	wʔtknšw šlyḥʔ lwt yšwʕ wʔmrw lh kl mʔ dʕbdw wkl mʔ dʔlpw
06:31	wʔmr lhwn tw lkwn nʔzl ldbrʔ blḥwdyn wʔttnyḥw qlyl ʔyt hww gyr sgyʔʔ dʔzlyn wʔtyn wlyt hwʔ lhwn ʔtrʔ ʔp lʔ lmʔkl
06:32	wʔzlw lʔtrʔ ḥwrbʔ bspyntʔ blḥwdyhwn
06:33	wḥzw ʔnwn sgyʔʔ kd ʔzlyn wʔštwdʕw ʔnwn wbybšʔ rhṭw mn klhyn mdyntʔ qdmwhy ltmn
06:34	wnpq yšwʕ ḥzʔ knšʔ sgyʔʔ wʔtrḥm ʕlyhwn ddmyn hww lʕrbʔ dlyt lhwn rʕyʔ wšry hwʔ lmlpw ʔnwn sgyʔtʔ
06:35	wkd hwʔ ʕdnʔ sgyʔʔ qrbw lwth tlmydwhy wʔmryn lh dhnʔ ʔtrʔ ḥwrbʔ hw wʕdnʔ sgy
06:36	šry ʔnwn dnʔzlwn lʔgwrsʔ dḥdryn wlqwryʔ wnzbnwn lhwn lḥmʔ lyt lhwn gyr mdm lmʔkl
06:37	hw dyn ʔmr lhwn hbw lhwn ʔntwn lmlʕs ʔmryn lh nʔzl nzbn dmʔtyn dynryn lḥmʔ wntl lhwn lʕsyn
06:38	hw dyn ʔmr lhwn zlw ḥzw kmʔ lḥmyn ʔyt lkwn hrkʔ wkd ḥzw ʔmryn lh ḥmšʔ lḥmyn wtryn nwnyn
06:39	wpqd lhwn dnsmkwn lklnš smkyn smkyn ʕl ʕsbʔ
06:40	wʔstmkw smkyn smkyn dmʔʔ mʔʔ wdḥmšyn ḥmšyn
06:41	wnsb hnwn ḥmšʔ lḥmyn wtryn nwnyn wḥr bšmyʔ wbrk wqṣʔ lḥmʔ wyhb ltlmydwhy dnsymwn lhwn whnwn tryn nwnyn plgw lklhwn
06:42	wʔklw klhwn wsbʕw
06:43	wšqlw qṣyʔ trʕsr qwpynyn kd mlyn wmn nwnʔ
06:44	ʔytyhwn hww dyn dʔklw lḥmʔ ḥmšʔ ʔlpyn gbryn
06:45	wmḥdʔ ʔlṣ ltlmydwhy dnsqwn lspyntʔ wnʔzlwn qdmwhy lʕbrʔ lbyt ṣydʔ ʕd šrʔ hw lknšʔ
06:46	wkd šrʔ ʔnwn ʔzl lṭwrʔ lmṣlyw
