06:47	kd hwʔ dyn rmšʔ spyntʔ ʔytyh hwt mṣʕt ymʔ whw blḥwdwhy ʕl ʔrʕʔ
06:48	wḥzʔ ʔnwn dmštnqyn kd rdyn rwḥʔ gyr lwqblhwn hwt wbmṭrtʔ rbyʕytʔ dllyʔ ʔtʔ lwthwn yšwʕ kd mhlk ʕl myʔ wṣbʔ hwʔ dnʕbr ʔnwn
06:49	hnwn dyn ḥzʔwhy dmhlk ʕl myʔ wsbrw lhwn dḥzwʔ hw dglʔ wqʕw
06:50	klhwn gyr ḥzʔwhy wdḥlw wbr šʕth mll ʕmhwn wʔmr lhwn ʔtlbbw ʔnʔ ʔnʔ lʔ tdḥlwn
06:51	wslq lwthwn lspyntʔ wšlyt rwḥʔ wṭb mtdmryn hww wthyryn bnpšhwn
06:52	lʔ gyr ʔstklw hww mn lḥmʔ hw mṭl dlbhwn mʕby hwʔ
06:53	wkd ʕbrw ʕbrʔ ʔtw lʔrʕʔ dgnsr
06:54	wkd npqw mn spyntʔ br šʕth ʔstklwhy ʔnšy ʔtrʔ
06:55	wrhṭw bklh ʔrʕʔ hy wšryw lmytyw lʔylyn dbyšʔyt ʕbydyn kd šqylyn lhwn bʕrstʔ lʔykʔ dšmʕyn hww dʔytwhy
06:56	wʔykʔ dʕʔl hwʔ lqwryʔ wlmdyntʔ bšwqʔ symyn hww kryhʔ wbʕyn hww mnh dʔpn lknpʔ dlbwšh nqrbwn wklhwn ʔylyn dqrbyn hww lh mtʔsyn hww
07:01	wknšw lwth pryšʔ wsprʔ dʔtw mn ʔwršlm
07:02	wḥzw ʔnšyn mn tlmydwhy dʔklyn lḥmʔ kd lʔ mšgn ʔydyhwn wʔtʕdlw
07:03	klhwn gyr yhwdyʔ wpryšʔ ʔn hw dbṭylʔyt lʔ mšygyn ʔydyhwn lʔ lʕsyn mṭl dʔḥydyn mšlmnwtʔ dqšyšʔ
07:04	wmn šwqʔ ʔlʔ ʕmdyn lʔ lʕsyn wsgyʔtʔ ʔḥrnytʔ ʔyt ʔylyn dqblw dnṭrwn mʕmwdytʔ dksʔ wdqsṭʔ wdmʔny nḥšʔ wdʕrstʔ
07:05	wšʔlwhy sprʔ wpryšʔ lmnʔ tlmydyk lʔ mhlkyn ʔyk mšlmnwtʔ dqšyšʔ ʔlʔ kd lʔ mšgn ʔydyhwn ʔklyn lḥmʔ
07:06	hw dyn ʔmr lhwn špyr ʔtnby ʕlykwn ʔšʕyʔ nbyʔ nsby bʔpʔ ʔyk dktyb dʕmʔ hnʔ bspwth hw myqr ly lbhwn dyn sgy rḥyq mny
07:07	wsryqʔyt dḥlyn ly kd mlpyn ywlpnʔ dpwqdnʔ dbny ʔnšʔ
07:08	šbqtwn gyr pwqdnʔ dʔlhʔ wʔḥydyn ʔntwn mšlmnwtʔ dbny ʔnšʔ mʕmwdytʔ dksʔ wdqsṭʔ wsgyʔtʔ ʔylyn dlhlyn dmyn
07:09	ʔmr lhwn špyr ṭlmyn ʔntwn pwqdnʔ dʔlhʔ dtqymwn mšlmnwtkwn
07:10	mwšʔ gyr ʔmr dyqr lʔbwk wlʔmk wmn dmṣḥʔ lʔbʔ wlʔmʔ mwtʔ nmwt
07:11	ʔntwn dyn ʔmryn ʔntwn ʔn nʔmr gbrʔ lʔbwhy ʔw lʔmh qwrbny mdm dmny tʔtr
07:12	wlʔ šbqyn ʔntwn lh dnʕbd mdm lʔbwhy ʔw lʔmh
07:13	wmslyn ʔntwn mltʔ dʔlhʔ mṭl mšlmnwtʔ dʔšlmtwn wddmyn lhlyn sgyʔtʔ ʕbdyn ʔntwn
07:14	wqrʔ yšwʕ lknšʔ klh wʔmr lhwn šwmʕwny klkwn wʔstklw
07:15	lyt mdm dlbr mn brnšʔ hw wʕʔl lh dmškḥ msyb lh ʔlʔ mdm dnpq mnh hw hw msyb lbr ʔnšʔ
07:16	mn dʔyt lh ʔdnʔ dnšmʕ nšmʕ 
07:17	kd dyn ʕl yšwʕ lbytʔ mn knšʔ šʔlwhy tlmydwhy ʕl mtlʔ hw
07:18	ʔmr lhwn hknʔ ʔp ʔntwn ʕṭlyn ʔntwn lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn dkl mdm dmn lbr ʕʔl lbr ʔnšʔ lʔ mškḥ msyb lh
07:19	dlʔ hwʔ llbh ʕʔl ʔlʔ lkrsh wmštdʔ btdkytʔ dmdkyʔ klh mʔkwltʔ
07:20	mdm dyn dnpq mn brnšʔ hw hw msyb lbr ʔnšʔ
07:21	mn lgw gyr mn lbʔ dbny ʔnšʔ npqn mḥšbtʔ byštʔ gwrʔ znywtʔ gnbwtʔ qṭlʔ
07:22	ʕlwbwtʔ byšwtʔ nklʔ ṣḥnwtʔ ʕynʔ byštʔ gwdpʔ šbhrnwtʔ šṭywtʔ
07:23	hlyn klhyn byštʔ mn lgw hw npqn wmsybn lh lbrnšʔ
07:24	mn tmn qm yšwʕ wʔtʔ ltḥwmʔ dṣwr wdṣydn wʕl lbytʔ ḥd wlʔ ṣbʔ hwʔ dʔnš ndʕ bh wlʔ ʔškḥ dnṭšʔ
07:25	mḥdʔ gyr šmʕt ʔnttʔ ḥdʔ mṭlth dʔyt hwt lbrth rwḥʔ ṭnptʔ wʔtt nplt qdm rglwhy
07:26	hy dyn ʔnttʔ ʔytyh hwt ḥnptʔ mn pwnyqʔ dswryʔ wbʕyʔ hwt mnh dnpq šʔdʔ mn brth
07:27	wʔmr lh yšwʕ šbwqy lwqdm dnsbʕwn bnyʔ lʔ hwt gyr špyrʔ dnsb lḥmʔ dbnyʔ wnrmʔ lklbʔ
07:28	hy dyn ʕnt wʔmrʔ lh ʔyn mry ʔp klbʔ mn tḥyt ptwrʔ ʔklyn prtwtʔ dbnyʔ
07:29	ʔmr lh yšwʕ zly mṭl hdʔ mltʔ npq lh šʔdʔ mn brtky
07:30	wʔzlt lbyth wʔškḥt brth kd rmyʔ bʕrsʔ wnpyq mnh šʔdh
07:31	twb npq yšwʕ mn tḥwmʔ dṣwr wdṣydn wʔtʔ lymʔ dglylʔ btḥwmʔ dʕsrt mdyntʔ
07:32	wʔytyw lh ḥršʔ ḥd pʔqʔ wbʕʔ hww mnh dnsym ʕlwhy ʔydʔ
07:33	wngdh mn knšʔ blḥwdwhy wʔrmy ṣbʕth bʔdnwhy wrq wqrb llšnh
07:34	wḥr bšmyʔ wʔttnḥ wʔmr lh ʔtptḥ
07:35	wbh bšʕtʔ ʔtptḥ ʔdnwhy wʔštry ʔsrʔ dlšnh wmll pšyqʔyt
07:36	wzhr ʔnwn dlʔnš lʔ nʔmrwn wkmʔ dhw mzhr hwʔ lhwn hnwn ytyr mkrzyn hww
07:37	wytyrʔyt mtdmryn hww wʔmryn dkl mdm špyr ʕbd lḥršʔ ʕbd dnšmʕwn wdlʔ mmllyn dnmllwn
08:01	bhnwn dyn ywmtʔ kd knšʔ sgyʔʔ ʔyt hwʔ wlʔ ʔyt hwʔ mdm dnʔklwn qrʔ ltlmydwhy wʔmr lhwn
08:02	mtrḥm ʔnʔ ʕl knšʔ hnʔ dhʔ tltʔ ywmyn qwyw lwty wlyt lhwn mnʔ nʔklwn
08:03	wʔn hw dšrʔ ʔnʔ lhwn kd ṣymyn lbtyhwn ʕypyn bʔwrḥʔ ʔnšʔ gyr mnhwn mn rwḥqʔ ʔtyʔyn
08:04	ʔmryn lh tlmydwhy ʔymkʔ mškḥ ʔnš hrkʔ bḥwrbʔ dnsbʕ lḥmʔ lhlyn klhwn
08:05	wšʔl ʔnwn hw kmʔ lḥmyn ʔyt lkwn ʔmryn lh šbʕʔ
08:06	wpqd lknšʔ dnstmkwn ʕl ʔrʕʔ wnsb hnwn šbʕʔ lḥmyn wbrk wqṣʔ wyhb ltlmydwhy dnsymwn wsmw lknšʔ
08:07	wʔyt hww nwnʔ qlyl wʔp ʕlyhwn brk wʔmr dnsymwn ʔnwn
08:08	wʔklw wsbʕw wšqlw twtrʔ dqṣyʔ šbʕʔ ʔsprydyn
08:09	ʔytyhwn hww dyn ʔnšʔ dʔklw ʔyk ʔrbʕʔ ʔlpyn
08:10	wšrʔ ʔnwn wslq mḥdʔ lspyntʔ ʕm tlmydwhy wʔtʔ lʔtrʔ ddlmnwtʔ
08:11	wnpqw pryšʔ wšryw lmbʕʔ ʕmh wšʔlyn hww lh ʔtʔ mn šmyʔ kd mnsyn lh
08:12	wʔttnḥ brwḥh wʔmr mnʔ bʕyʔ ʔtʔ šrbtʔ hdʔ ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dlʔ ttyhb lh ʔtʔ lšrbtʔ hdʔ
08:13	wšbq ʔnwn wslq lspyntʔ wʔzlw lhw ʕbrʔ
08:14	wṭʕw dnsbwn lḥmʔ wʔlʔ ḥdʔ gryṣtʔ lyt hwʔ ʕmhwn bspyntʔ
08:15	wpqd ʔnwn wʔmr lhwn ḥzw ʔzdhrw mn ḥmyrʔ dpryšʔ wmn ḥmyrh dhrwds
08:16	wmtḥšbyn hww ḥd ʕm ḥd wʔmryn dlḥmʔ lyt ln
08:17	yšwʕ dyn ydʕ wʔmr lhwn mnʔ rnyn ʔntwn dlḥmʔ lyt lkwn lʔ ʕdmʔ lhšʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn wlʔ mstklyn ʔntwn ʕdkyl lbʔ qšyʔ ʔyt lkwn
08:18	wʕynʔ ʔyt lkwn wlʔ ḥzyn ʔntwn wʔdnʔ ʔyt lkwn wlʔ šmʕyn ʔntwn wlʔ ʕhdyn ʔntwn
08:19	kd hlyn ḥmšʔ lḥmyn qṣyt lḥmšʔ ʔlpyn kmʔ qwpynyn dqṣyʔ kd mlyn šqltwn ʔmryn lh trʕsr
08:20	ʔmr lhwn wkd šbʕʔ lʔrbʕʔ ʔlpyn kmʔ ʔsprydyn dqṣyʔ kd mlyn šqltwn ʔmryn šbʕʔ
08:21	ʔmr lhwn ʔykw lʔ ʕdmʔ lhšʔ mstklyn ʔntwn
08:22	wʔtʔ lbyt ṣydʔ wʔytyw lh smyʔ wbʕyn hww mnh dnqrwb lh
08:23	wʔḥd bʔydh dsmyʔ wʔpqh lbr mn qrytʔ wrq bʕynwhy wsm ʔydh wšʔlh dmnʔ ḥzʔ
08:24	ḥr wʔmr ḥzʔ ʔnʔ bny ʔnšʔ ʔyk ʔylnʔ dmhlkyn
08:25	twb sm ʔydh ʕl ʕynwhy wtqn wḥzʔ hwʔ kl mdm nhyrʔyt
08:26	wšdrh lbyth wʔmr ʔp lʔ lqrytʔ tʕwl wlʔ tʔmr lʔnš bqrytʔ
08:27	wnpq yšwʕ wtlmydwhy lqwryʔ dqsryʔ dpylypws wmšʔl hwʔ ltlmydwhy bʔwrḥʔ wʔmr lhwn mnw ʔmryn ʕly ʔnšʔ dʔyty
08:28	hnwn dyn ʔmrw dywḥnn mʕmdnʔ wʔḥrnʔ dʔlyʔ wʔḥrnʔ ḥd mn nbyʔ
08:29	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔntwn dyn mnw ʔmryn ʔntwn ʕly dʔyty ʕnʔ šmʕwn wʔmr lh ʔnt hw mšyḥʔ brh dʔlhʔ ḥyʔ
08:30	wkʔʔ bhwn dlʔnš lʔ nʔmrwn ʕlwhy
08:31	wšry hwʔ lmlpw ʔnwn dʕtyd hw brh dʔnšʔ dnḥš sgy wdnstlʔ mn qšyšʔ wmn rby khnʔ wmn sprʔ wntqṭl wltltʔ ywmyn nqwm
08:32	wʕyn bglʔ mltʔ mmll hwʔ wdbrh kʔpʔ wšry lmkʔʔ bh
08:33	hw dyn ʔtpny wḥr btlmydwhy wkʔʔ bšmʕwn wʔmr zl lk lbstry sṭnʔ dlʔ rnʔ ʔnt dʔlhʔ ʔlʔ dbny ʔnšʔ 
08:34	wqrʔ yšwʕ lknšʔ ʕm tlmydwhy wʔmr lhwn mn dṣbʔ dnʔtʔ btry nkpwr bnpšh wnšqwl zqyph wnʔtʔ btry
08:35	kl mn dṣbʔ gyr dnḥʔ npšh nwbdyh wkl dnwbd npšh mṭlty wmṭl sbrty nḥyh
08:36	mnʔ gyr ntʕdr brnšʔ ʔn ʕlmʔ klh nʔtr wnpšh nḥsr
08:37	ʔw mnʔ ntl brnšʔ tḥlwpʔ dnpšh
08:38	kl gyr dnbht by wbmly bšrbtʔ hdʔ ḥṭytʔ wgyrtʔ wʔp brh dʔnšʔ nbht bh mʔ dʔtʔ bšwbḥʔ dʔbwhy ʕm mlʔkwhy qdyšʔ
09:01	wʔmr hwʔ lhwn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dʔyt ʔnšʔ dqymyn tnn dlʔ nṭʕmwn mwtʔ ʕdmʔ dnḥzwn mlkwth dʔlhʔ dʔtt bḥylʔ
09:02	wbtr štʔ ywmyn dbr yšwʕ lkʔpʔ wlyʕqwb wlywḥnn wʔsq ʔnwn lṭwrʔ rmʔ blḥwdyhwn wʔtḥlp lʕnyhwn
09:03	wmzhr hwʔ lbwšh wmḥwr ṭb ʔyk tlgʔ ʔyknʔ dbny ʔnšʔ lmḥwrw bʔrʕʔ lʔ mškḥyn
09:04	wʔtḥzyw lhwn ʔlyʔ wmwšʔ kd mmllyn ʕm yšwʕ
09:05	wʔmr lh kʔpʔ rby špyr hw ln dhrkʔ nhwʔ wnʕbd tlt mṭlyn lk ḥdʔ wlmwšʔ ḥdʔ wlʔlyʔ ḥdʔ
09:06	lʔ dyn ydʕ hwʔ mnʔ ʔmr ʔytyhwn hww gyr bdḥltʔ
09:07	whwt ʕnnʔ wmṭlʔ hwt ʕlyhwn wqlʔ mn ʕnnʔ dʔmr hnw bry ḥbybʔ lh šmʕw
09:08	wmn šlyʔ kd ḥrw tlmydʔ lʔnš lʔ ḥzw ʔlʔ lyšwʕ blḥwdwhy ʕmhwn
09:09	wkd nḥtyn mn ṭwrʔ mpqd hwʔ lhwn dlʔnš lʔ nʔmrwn mdm dḥzw ʔlʔ ʔn mʔ dqm brh dʔnšʔ mn mytʔ
09:10	wʔḥdwh lmltʔ bnpšhwn wbʕyn hww dmnʔ hy hdʔ mltʔ dmʔ dqm mn byt mytʔ
09:11	wmšʔlyn hww lh wʔmryn mnʔ hkyl ʔmryn sprʔ dʔlyʔ wlʔ dnʔtʔ lwqdm
09:12	ʔmr lhwn ʔlyʔ ʔtʔ lwqdm dklmdm ntqn wʔyknʔ ktyb ʕl brh dʔnšʔ dsgy nḥš wnstlʔ
09:13	ʔlʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dʔp ʔlyʔ ʔtʔ wʕbdw bh klmʔ dṣbw ʔyknʔ dktyb ʕlwhy
09:14	wkd ʔtʔ lwt tlmydʔ ḥzʔ lwthwn knšʔ sgyʔʔ wsprʔ kd dršyn ʕmhwn
09:15	wbr šʕth klh knšʔ ḥzʔwhy wtwhw wrhṭw šʔlw bšlmh
09:16	wmšʔl hwʔ lsprʔ mnʔ dršyn ʔntwn ʕmhwn
09:17	wʕnʔ ḥd mn knšʔ wʔmr mlpnʔ ʔytyt bry lwtk dʔyt lh rwḥʔ dlʔ mmllʔ
09:18	wʔykʔ dmdrkʔ lh ḥbṭʔ lh wmrʕt wmḥrq šnwhy wybš wʔmrt ltlmydyk dnpqwnyhy wlʔ ʔškḥw
09:19	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lh ʔwn šrbtʔ dlʔ mhymnʔ ʕdmʔ lʔmty ʔhwʔ lwtkwn wʕdmʔ lʔmty ʔsybrkwn ʔytʔwhy lwty
09:20	wʔytywhy lwth wkd ḥzth rwḥʔ br šʕth ḥbṭth wnpl ʕl ʔrʕʔ wmtbʕq hwʔ wmrʕt
09:21	wšʔl yšwʕ lʔbwhy dkmʔ lh zbnʔ hʔ mn dhknʔ hw ʔmr lh hʔ mn ṭlywth
09:22	wzbnyn sgyʔn ʔrmyth bnwrʔ wbmyʔ dtwbdywhy ʔlʔ mdm dmškḥ ʔnt ʕdryny wʔtrḥm ʕly
09:23	ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔn mškḥ ʔnt dthymn kl mdm mškḥ dnhwʔ lmn dmhymn
09:24	wbr šʕth qʕʔ ʔbwhy dṭlyʔ kd bkʔ wʔmr mhymn ʔnʔ mry ʕdr lḥsyrwt hymnwty
09:25	kd ḥzʔ dyn yšwʕ drhṭ ʕmʔ wmtknš lwth kʔʔ bhy rwḥʔ ṭnptʔ wʔmr lh rwḥʔ ḥrštʔ dlʔ mmllʔ ʔnʔ pqd ʔnʔ lky pwqy mnh wtwb lʔ tʕlyn lh
09:26	wqʕʔ šʔdʔ hw sgy wšḥqh wnpq whwʔ ʔyk mytʔ ʔyk dsgyʔʔ nʔmrwn dmyt lh
09:27	hw dyn yšwʕ ʔḥdh bʔydh wʔqymh
09:28	kd ʕl dyn lbytʔ yšwʕ šʔlwhy tlmydwhy blḥwdyhwn lmnʔ ḥnn lʔ ʔškḥn lmpqwth
09:29	ʔmr lhwn hnʔ gnsʔ bmdm lʔ mškḥ lmpq ʔlʔ bṣwmʔ wbṣlwtʔ
09:30	wkd npq mn tmn ʕbryn hww bglylʔ wlʔ ṣbʔ hwʔ dʔnš ndʕ bh
09:31	mlp hwʔ gyr ltlmydwhy wʔmr lhwn dbrh dʔnšʔ mštlm bʔydy ʔnšʔ wnqṭlwnyhy wmʔ dʔtqṭl bywmʔ dtltʔ nqwm
09:32	hnwn dyn lʔ ydʕyn hww lh lmltʔ wdḥlyn hww dnšʔlwnyhy
09:33	wʔtw lkprnḥwm wkd ʕlw lbytʔ mšʔl hwʔ lhwn dmnʔ mtḥšbyn hwytwn bʔwrḥʔ byntkwn
09:34	hnwn dyn štyqyn hww ʔtḥryw hww gyr bʔwrḥʔ ḥd ʕm ḥd dmnw rb bhwn
09:35	wytb yšwʕ wqrʔ ltrʕsr wʔmr lhwn mn dṣbʔ dnhwʔ qdmyʔ nhwʔ ʔḥryʔ dkl ʔnš wmšmšnʔ dkl ʔnš
09:36	wnsb ṭlyʔ ḥd wʔqymh bmṣʕtʔ wšqlh ʕl drʕwhy wʔmr lhwn
09:37	kl mn dnqbl ʔyk hnʔ ṭlyʔ bšmy ly hw mqbl wmn dly mqbl lʔ hwʔ ly mqbl ʔlʔ lmn dšdrny
09:38	ʔmr lh ywḥnn rby ḥzyn ʔnš dmpq šʔdʔ bšmk wklynyhy ʕl dlʔ nqp ln
09:39	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ lʔ tklwnyhy lyt gyr ʔnš dʕbd ḥylʔ bšmy wmškḥ ʕgl ʔmr ʕly dbyš
09:40	mn dlʔ hwʔ hkyl lwqblkwn ḥlpykwn hw
09:41	kl dyn dnšqykwn ksʔ dmyʔ blḥwd bšmʔ ddmšyḥʔ ʔntwn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dlʔ nwbd ʔgrh
09:42	wkl mn dnkšl lḥd mn hlyn zʕwrʔ dmhymnyn by pqḥ hw lh ʔlw rmyʔ hwt rḥyʔ dḥmrʔ bṣwrh wšdʔ bymʔ
09:43	ʔn dyn mkšlʔ lk ʔydk pswqyh pqḥ hw lk pšygʔ dtʕwl lḥyʔ ʔw kd ʔyt lk trtyn ʔydyn tʔzl lghnʔ
09:44	ʔykʔ dtwlʕhwn lʔ mytʔ wnwrhwn lʔ dʕkʔ
09:45	wʔn rglk mkšlʔ lk pswqyh pqḥ hw lk dtʕwl lḥyʔ ḥgysʔ ʔw kd ʔyt lk trtyn rglyn tpl bghnʔ
09:46	ʔykʔ dtwlʕhwn lʔ mytʔ wnwrhwn lʔ dʕkʔ
09:47	wʔn ʕynk mkšlʔ lk ḥṣyh pqḥ hw lk dbḥdʔ ʕynk tʕwl lmlkwth dʔlhʔ ʔw kd ʔyt lk trtyn ʕynyn tpl bghnʔ dnwrʔ
09:48	ʔykʔ dtwlʕhwn lʔ mytʔ wnwrhwn lʔ dʕkʔ
09:49	kl gyr bnwrʔ ntmlḥ wkl dbḥtʔ bmlḥʔ ttmlḥ
09:50	špyrʔ hy mlḥʔ ʔn dyn mlḥʔ tpkh bmnʔ ttmlḥ thwʔ bkwn mlḥʔ wbšynʔ hww ḥd ʕm ḥd
10:01	wqm mn tmn wʔtʔ ltḥwmʔ dyhwd lʕbrʔ dywrdnn wʔzlw ltmn lwth knšʔ sgyʔʔ wmlp hwʔ lhwn twb ʔyk dmʕd hwʔ
10:02	wqrbw pryšʔ mnsyn lh wmšʔlyn dʔn šlyṭ lgbrʔ dnšbwq ʔntth
10:03	ʔmr lhwn mnʔ pqdkwn mwšʔ
10:04	hnwn dyn ʔmryn mwšʔ ʔps ln dnktwb ktbʔ dšwbqnʔ wnšrʔ
10:05	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn lwqbl qšywt lbkwn ktb lkwn pwqdnʔ hnʔ
10:06	mn bršyt dyn dkrʔ wnqbtʔ ʕbd ʔnwn ʔlhʔ
10:07	mṭl hnʔ nšbwq gbrʔ lʔbwhy wlʔmh wnqp lʔntth
10:08	wnhwwn tryhwn ḥd bsr mkyl lʔ hww tryn ʔlʔ ḥd bsr
10:09	mdm dʔlhʔ hkyl zwg brnšʔ lʔ nprš
10:10	wšʔlwhy twb tlmydwhy bbytʔ ʕl hdʔ
10:11	wʔmr lhwn kl mn dnšrʔ ʔntth wnsb ʔḥrtʔ gʔr
10:12	wʔn ʔnttʔ tšrʔ bʕlh wthwʔ lʔḥrnʔ gyrʔ
10:13	wmqrbyn hww lh ṭlyʔ dnqrwb lhwn tlmydwhy dyn kʔyn hww bhlyn dmqrbyn lhwn
10:14	yšwʕ dyn ḥzʔ wʔtbʔš lh wʔmr lhwn šbwqw ṭlyʔ ʔtyn lwty wlʔ tklwn ʔnwn ddʔylyn gyr dʔyk hlyn ʔnwn ʔytyh mlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ
10:15	ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dkl dlʔ nqbl mlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ ʔyk ṭlyʔ lʔ nʕwl lh
10:16	wšql ʔnwn ʕl drʕwhy wsm ʔydh ʕlyhwn wbrk ʔnwn
10:17	wkd rdʔ bʔwrḥʔ rhṭ ḥd npl ʕl bwrkwhy wmšʔl hwʔ lh wʔmr mlpnʔ ṭbʔ mnʔ ʔʕbd dʔtr ḥyʔ dlʕlm
10:18	ʔmr lh yšwʕ mnʔ qrʔ ʔnt ly ṭbʔ lyt ṭbʔ ʔlʔ ʔn ḥd ʔlhʔ
10:19	pwqdnʔ ydʕ ʔnt lʔ tgwr lʔ tgnwb lʔ tqṭwl wlʔ tshd shdwtʔ dgltʔ lʔ tṭlwm yqr lʔbwk wlʔmk
10:20	hw dyn ʕnʔ wʔmr lh mlpnʔ hlyn klhyn nṭrt ʔnyn mn ṭlywty
10:21	yšwʕ dyn ḥr bh wʔḥbh wʔmr lh ḥdʔ ḥsyrʔ lk zl zbn kl mdm dʔyt lk whb lmsknʔ wthwʔ lk symtʔ bšmyʔ wsb ṣlybʔ wtʔ btry
10:22	hw dyn ʔtkmr bmltʔ hdʔ wʔzl kd ʕyyqʔ lh ʔyt hwʔ lh gyr nksʔ sgyʔʔ
10:23	ḥr dyn yšwʕ btlmydwhy wʔmr lhwn kmʔ ʕṭlʔ lʔylyn dʔyt lhwn nksʔ dnʕlwn lmlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ
10:24	tlmydʔ dyn mtdmryn hww ʕl mlwhy wʕnʔ twb yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn bny kmʔ ʕṭlʔ lʔylyn dtkylyn ʕl nksyhwn dnʕlwn lmlkwth dʔlhʔ
10:25	pšyq hw lgmlʔ dnʕwl bḥrwrʔ dmḥṭʔ ʔw ʕtyrʔ lmlkwth dʔlhʔ lmʕl
10:26	hnwn dyn ytyrʔyt mtdmryn hww wʔmryn bynyhwn mnw mškḥ lmḥʔ
10:27	ḥr dyn bhwn yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn lwt bny ʔnšʔ hdʔ lʔ mškḥʔ ʔlʔ lwt ʔlhʔ kl mdm gyr mškḥʔ lwt ʔlhʔ
10:28	wšry kʔpʔ lmʔmr hʔ ḥnn šbqn kl mdm wnqpnk
10:29	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dlyt ʔnš dšbq btʔ ʔw ʔḥʔ ʔw ʔḥwtʔ ʔw ʔbʔ ʔw ʔmʔ ʔw ʔnttʔ ʔw bnyʔ ʔw qwryʔ mṭlty wmṭl sbrty
10:30	wlʔ nqbl ḥd bmʔʔ hšʔ bzbnʔ hnʔ btʔ wʔḥʔ wʔḥwtʔ wʔmhtʔ wbnyʔ wqwryʔ ʕm rdwpyʔ wbʕlmʔ dʔtʔ ḥyʔ dlʕlm
10:31	sgyʔʔ dyn qdmyʔ dnhwwn ʔḥryʔ wʔḥryʔ qdmyʔ
10:32	kd slqyn hww dyn bʔwrḥʔ lʔwršlm hw yšwʕ qdym hwʔ lhwn wmttmhyn hww wʔzlyn hww btrh kd dḥylyn wdbr ltrʕsrth wšry dnʔmr lhwn mdm dʕtyd dnhwʔ lh
10:33	dhʔ slqyn ḥnn lʔwršlm wbrh dʔnšʔ mštlm lrby khnʔ wlsprʔ wnḥybwnyhy lmwtʔ wnšlmwnyhy lʕmmʔ
10:34	wnbzḥwn bh wnngdwnyhy wnrqwn bʔpwhy wnqṭlwnyhy wlywmʔ dtltʔ nqwm
10:35	wqrbw lwth yʕqwb wywḥnn bny zbdy wʔmryn lh mlpnʔ ṣbyn ḥnn dkl dnšʔl tʕbd ln
10:36	ʔmr lhwn mnʔ ṣbyn ʔntwn ʔʕbd lkwn
10:37	ʔmryn lh hb ln dḥd ntb mn ymynk wḥd mn smlk bšwbḥk
10:38	hw dyn ʔmr lhwn lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn mnʔ šʔlyn ʔntwn mškḥyn ʔntwn dtštwn ksʔ dʔnʔ štʔ ʔnʔ wmʕmwdytʔ dʔnʔ ʕmd ʔnʔ tʕmdwn
10:39	ʔmryn lh mškḥynn ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ksʔ dštʔ ʔnʔ tštwn wmʕmwdytʔ dʕmd ʔnʔ tʕmdwn
10:40	dttbwn dyn mn ymyny wmn smly lʔ hwt dyly lmtl ʔlʔ lʔylyn dmṭybʔ
10:41	wkd šmʕw ʕsrʔ šryw rṭnyn ʕl yʕqwb wywḥnn
10:42	wqrʔ ʔnwn yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn ydʕyn ʔntwn dʔylyn dmstbryn ršʔ dʕmmʔ mryhwn ʔnwn wrwrbnyhwn šlyṭyn ʕlyhwn
10:43	lʔ dyn hknʔ nhwʔ byntkwn ʔlʔ mn dṣbʔ bkwn dnhwʔ rbʔ nhwʔ lkwn mšmšnʔ
10:44	wʔynʔ mnkwn dṣbʔ dnhwʔ qdmyʔ nhwʔ ʕbdʔ dklnš
10:45	ʔp brh gyr dʔnšʔ lʔ ʔtʔ dnštmš ʔlʔ dnšmš wdntl npšh pwrqnʔ ḥlp sgyʔʔ
10:46	wʔtw lʔyryḥw wkd npq yšwʕ mn ʔyryḥw hw wtlmydwhy wknšʔ sgyʔʔ ṭymy br ṭymy smyʔ ytb hwʔ ʕl yd ʔwrḥʔ wḥdr
10:47	wšmʕ dyšwʕ hw nṣryʔ wšry lmqʕʔ wlmʔmr brh ddwyd ʔtrḥm ʕly
10:48	wkʔyn hww bh sgyʔʔ dnštwq hw dyn ytyrʔyt qʕʔ hwʔ wʔmr brh ddwyd ʔtrḥm ʕly
10:49	wqm yšwʕ wpqd dnqrwnyhy wqrʔwhy lsmyʔ wʔmryn lh ʔtlbb qwm qrʔ lk
10:50	hw dyn smyʔ šdʔ lbšh wqm ʔtʔ lwt yšwʕ
10:51	ʔmr lh yšwʕ mnʔ ṣbʔ ʔnt ʔʕbd lk hw dyn smyʔ ʔmr lh rby dʔḥzʔ
10:52	wyšwʕ ʔmr lh ḥzy hymnwtk ʔḥytk wmḥdʔ ʔtḥzy lh wʔzl hwʔ bʔwrḥʔ
11:01	wkd qrb lʔwršlm ʕl gnb byt pgʔ wbyt ʕnyʔ lwt ṭwrʔ dzytʔ šdr tryn mn tlmydwhy
11:02	wʔmr lhwn zlw lqrytʔ hy dlqwbln wbr šʕth dʕʔlyn ʔntwn lh mškḥyn ʔntwn ʕylʔ dʔsyr dʔnš mn bnynšʔ lʔ rkbh šrw ʔytʔwhy
11:03	wʔn ʔnš nʔmr lkwn mnʔ ʕbdyn ʔntwn hdʔ ʔmrw lh dlmrn mtbʕʔ wmḥdʔ mšdr lh lkʔ
11:04	wʔzlw ʔškḥw ʕylʔ dʔsyr ʕl trʕʔ lbr bšwqʔ wkd šryn lh
11:05	ʔnšyn mn ʔylyn dqymyn ʔmrw lhwn mnʔ ʕbdyn ʔntwn dšryn ʔntwn ʕylʔ
11:06	hnwn dyn ʔmrw lhwn ʔyk dpqd ʔnwn yšwʕ wšbqw ʔnwn
11:07	wʔytywhy lʕylʔ lwt yšwʕ wʔrmyw ʕlwhy mʔnyhwn wrkb ʕlwhy yšwʕ
11:08	sgyʔʔ dyn mšwyn hww nḥtyhwn bʔwrḥʔ wʔḥrnʔ psqyn hww swkʔ mn ʔylnʔ wmšwyn bʔwrḥʔ
11:09	whnwn dqdmwhy whnwn dbtrh qʕyn hww wʔmryn ʔwšʕnʔ bryk hw dʔtʔ bšmh dmryʔ
11:10	wbrykʔ hy mlkwtʔ dʔtyʔ dʔbwn dwyd ʔwšʕnʔ bmrwmʔ
11:11	wʕl yšwʕ lʔwršlm lhyklʔ wḥzʔ klmdm kd hwʔ dyn ʕdnʔ drmšʔ npq lbyt ʕnyʔ ʕm trʕsr
11:12	wlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ kd npq mn byt ʕnyʔ kpn
11:13	wḥzʔ ttʔ ḥdʔ mn rwḥqʔ dʔyt bh ṭrpʔ wʔtʔ lwth dʔn nškḥ bh mdm wkd ʔtʔ lʔ ʔškḥ bh ʔlʔ ʔn ṭrpʔ zbnʔ gyr lʔ hwʔ hwʔ dtʔnʔ
11:14	wʔmr lh mkyl wlʕlm ʔnš mnky pʔrʔ lʔ nʔkwl wšmʕw tlmydwhy wʔtw lʔwršlm
11:15	wʕl yšwʕ lhyklʔ dʔlhʔ wšry dnpq lʔylyn dzbnyn wmzbnyn bhyklʔ whpk ptwrʔ dmʕrpnʔ wkwrswtʔ dhnwn dmzbnyn ywnʔ
11:16	wlʔ šbq hwʔ dʔnš nʕbr mʔnʔ bgw hyklʔ
11:17	wmlp hwʔ wʔmr lhwn lʔ ktyb dbyty byt ṣlwtʔ ntqrʔ lklhwn ʕmmʔ ʔntwn dyn ʕbdtwnyhy mʕrtʔ dlsṭyʔ
11:18	wšmʕw rby khnʔ wsprʔ wbʕyn hww dʔyknʔ nwbdwnyhy dḥlyn hww gyr mnh mṭl dklh ʕmʔ tmyhyn hww bywlpnh
11:19	wkd hwʔ rmšʔ npqw lbr mn mdyntʔ
11:20	wbṣprʔ kd ʕbryn ḥzw ttʔ hy kd ybyšʔ mn ʕqrh
11:21	wʔtdkr šmʕwn wʔmr lh rby hʔ ttʔ hy dlṭt ybšt
11:22	wʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn thwʔ bkwn hymnwtʔ dʔlhʔ
11:23	ʔmyn gyr ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dmn dnʔmr lṭwrʔ hnʔ dʔštql wpl bymʔ wlʔ ntplg blbh ʔlʔ nhymn dhwʔ hw mdm dʔmr nhwʔ lh mdm dʔmr
11:24	mṭl hnʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dkl mdm dmṣlyn ʔntwn wšʔlyn ʔntwn hymnw dnsbyn ʔntwn wnhwʔ lkwn
11:25	wmʔ dqymyn ʔntwn lmṣlyw šbwqw mdm dʔyt lkwn ʕl ʔnš dʔp ʔbwkwn dbšmyʔ nšbwq lkwn sklwtkwn
11:26	ʔn dyn ʔntwn lʔ šbqyn ʔntwn ʔplʔ ʔbwkwn dbšmyʔ nšbwq lkwn sklwtkwn
11:27	wʔtw twb lʔwršlm wkd mhlk hwʔ bhyklʔ ʔtw lwth rbykhnʔ wsprʔ wqšyšʔ
11:28	wʔmryn lh bʔynʔ šwlṭnʔ hlyn ʕbd ʔnt wmnw yhb lk šwlṭnʔ hnʔ dhlyn tʕbd
11:29	hw dyn yšwʕ ʔmr lhwn ʔšʔlkwn ʔp ʔnʔ mltʔ ḥdʔ dtʔmrwn ly wʔnʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn bʔynʔ šwlṭnʔ hlyn ʕbd ʔnʔ
11:30	mʕmwdyth dywḥnn mn ʔymkʔ hy mn šmyʔ ʔw mn bny ʔnšʔ ʔmrw ly
11:31	wʔtḥšbw bnpšhwn wʔmrw dʔn nʔmr lh dmn šmyʔ ʔmr ln wlmnʔ lʔ hymntwnyhy
11:32	wdnʔmr mn bny ʔnšʔ dḥltʔ hy mn ʕmʔ klhwn gyr ʔḥydyn hww lh lywḥnn dšryrʔyt nbyʔ hw
11:33	wʕnw wʔmryn lh lyšwʕ lʔ ydʕynn ʔmr lhwn ʔplʔ ʔnʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn bʔynʔ šwlṭnʔ hlyn ʕbd ʔnʔ
12:01	wšry dnmll ʕmhwn bmtlʔ gbrʔ ḥd nṣb krmʔ wʔḥdrh sygʔ wḥpr bh mʕṣrtʔ wbnʔ bh mgdlʔ wʔwḥdh lplḥʔ wḥzq
12:02	wšdr lwt plḥʔ ʕbdh bzbnʔ dmn pʔrʔ dkrmʔ nsb
12:03	hnwn dyn mḥʔwhy wšdrwhy kd spyq
12:04	wšdr twb lwthwn ʕbdʔ ʔḥrnʔ wʔp lhw rgmwhy wṣlpwhy wšdrwhy bṣʕrʔ
12:05	wšdr twb ʔḥrnʔ ʔp lhw qṭlwhy wlsgyʔʔ ʕbdʔ ʔḥrnʔ šdr wmnhwn mḥw mnhwn dyn qṭlw
12:06	ḥrtʔ dyn ḥd brʔ ḥbybʔ ʔyt hwʔ lh wšdrh lwthwn ʔḥryt ʔmr gyr kbr nbhtwn mn bry
12:07	hnwn dyn plḥʔ ʔmrw bnpšhwn hnw yrtʔ tw nqṭlywhy wthwʔ dyln yrtwtʔ
12:08	wnsbw qṭlwhy wʔpqwhy lbr mn krmʔ
12:09	mnʔ hkyl nʕbd mrʔ krmʔ nʔtʔ nwbd lhnwn plḥʔ wntlywhy krmʔ lʔḥrnʔ
12:10	wʔplʔ ktbʔ hnʔ qrytwn dkʔpʔ dʔslyw bnyʔ hy hwt lršʔ dzwytʔ
12:11	mn lwt mryʔ hwt hdʔ wʔytyh tdmwrtʔ bʕynyn
12:12	wbʕyn hww lmʔḥdh wdḥlw mn ʕmʔ ydʕw gyr dʕlyhwn ʔmr mtlʔ hnʔ wšbqwhy wʔzlw 
12:13	wšdrw lwth ʔnšʔ mn sprʔ wmn dbyt hrwds dnṣwdwnyhy bmltʔ
12:14	hnwn dyn ʔtw wšʔlwhy mlpnʔ ydʕyn ḥnn dšryr ʔnt šqyl ʔnt ṣptʔ lʔnš lʔ gyr ḥʔr ʔnt bprṣwpʔ dbnyʔnšʔ ʔlʔ bšrrʔ ʔwrḥʔ dʔlhʔ mlp ʔnt šlyṭ lmtl ksp ršʔ lqsr ʔw lʔ ntl ʔw lʔ ntl
12:15	hw dyn ydʕ nklhwn wʔmr lhwn mnʔ mnsyn ʔntwn ly ʔytw ly dynrʔ ʔḥzʔ
12:16	wʔytyw lh ʔmr lhwn dmnw ṣlmʔ hnʔ wktbʔ hnwn dyn ʔmrw dqsr
12:17	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ dqsr hbw lqsr wdʔlhʔ lʔlhʔ wtmhw hww bh
12:18	wʔtw zdwqyʔ lwth hnwn dʔmryn dqymtʔ lyt wmšʔlyn hww lh wʔmryn
12:19	mlpnʔ mwšʔ ktb ln dʔn mʔt ʔḥwhy dʔnš wšbq ʔnttʔ wbnyʔ lʔ šbq nsb ʔḥwhy ʔntth wnqym zrʕʔ lʔḥwhy
12:20	šbʕʔ ʔḥyn ʔyt hww qdmyʔ nsb ʔnttʔ wmyt wlʔ šbq zrʕʔ
12:21	wdtryn nsbh wmyt kd ʔp lʔ hw šbq zrʕʔ wdtltʔ hkwt
12:22	wšbʕtyhwn nsbwh wlʔ šbqw zrʕʔ ʔḥryt klhwn mytt ʔp hy ʔnttʔ
12:23	bqymtʔ hkyl dʔynʔ mnhwn thwʔ ʔnttʔ šbʕtyhwn gyr nsbwh
12:24	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ lʔ hwʔ mṭl hdʔ ṭʕyn ʔntwn dlʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn ktbʔ wlʔ ḥylh dʔlhʔ
12:25	mʔ gyr dqmw mn mytʔ lʔ nsbyn nšʔ ʔp lʔ nšʔ hwyn lgbrʔ ʔlʔ ʔytyhwn ʔyk mlʔkʔ dbšmyʔ
12:26	ʕl mytʔ dyn dqymyn lʔ qrytwn bktbʔ dmwšʔ ʔyknʔ mn snyʔ ʔmr lh ʔlhʔ ʔnʔ ʔnʔ ʔlhh dʔbrhm wʔlhh dʔysḥq wʔlhh dyʕqwb
12:27	wlʔ hwʔ ʔlhʔ dmytʔ ʔlʔ dḥyʔ ʔntwn hkyl sgy ṭʕyn ʔntwn
12:28	wqrb ḥd mn sprʔ wšmʕ ʔnwn ddršyn wḥzʔ dšpyr ʔtyb lhwn ptgmʔ wšʔlh ʔynw pwqdnʔ qdmyʔ dklhwn
12:29	ʔmr lh yšwʕ qdmy mn klhwn pwqdnʔ šmʕ ʔysryl mryʔ ʔlhn mryʔ ḥd hw
12:30	wdtrḥm lmryʔ ʔlhk mn klh lbk wmn klh npšk wmn klh rʕynk wmn klh ḥylk hnw pwqdnʔ qdmyʔ
12:31	wdtryn ddmʔ lh dtḥb lqrybk ʔyk npšk pwqdnʔ ʔḥrnʔ drb mn hlyn lyt
12:32	ʔmr lh hw sprʔ špyr rby bšrrʔ ʔmrt dḥd hw wlyt ʔḥryn lbr mnh
12:33	wdnrḥmywhy ʔnš mn klh lbʔ wmn klh rʕynʔ wmn klh npšʔ wmn klh ḥylʔ wdnrḥm qrybh ʔyk npšh ytyrʔ hy mn klhwn yqdʔ wdbḥʔ
12:34	yšwʕ dyn ḥzyhy dḥkymʔyt mpnʔ ptgmʔ ʕnʔ wʔmr lh lʔ hwyt rḥyq mn mlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ wlʔ ʔnš twb ʔmrḥ dnšʔlywhy
12:35	wʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr kd mlp bhyklʔ ʔyknʔ ʔmryn sprʔ dmšyḥʔ brh hw ddwyd
12:36	hw gyr dwyd ʔmr brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ dʔmr mryʔ lmry tb lk mn ymyny ʕdmʔ dʔsym bʕldbbyk kwbšʔ tḥyt rglyk
12:37	hw hkyl dwyd qrʔ lh mry wʔyknʔ brh ʔytwhy wklh knšʔ šmʕ hwʔ lh bsymʔyt
12:38	wbywlpnh ʔmr hwʔ lhwn ʔzdhrw mn sprʔ dṣbyn dbʔsṭlʔ nhlkwn wrḥmyn šlmʔ bšwqʔ
12:39	wryš mwtbʔ bknwštʔ wryš smkʔ bḥšmytʔ
12:40	hnwn dʔklyn btʔ dʔrmltʔ bʕltʔ dmwrkyn ṣlwthwn hnwn nqblwn dynʔ ytyrʔ
12:41	wkd ytb yšwʕ lwqbl byt gzʔ ḥʔr hwʔ ʔyknʔ knšʔ rmyn ʕwrpnʔ byt gzʔ wsgyʔʔ ʕtyrʔ rmyn hww sgy
12:42	wʔtt ʔrmltʔ ḥdʔ mskntʔ ʔrmyt tryn mnyn dʔytyhwn šmwnʔ
12:43	wqrʔ yšwʕ ltlmydwhy wʔmr lhwn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dhdʔ ʔrmltʔ mskntʔ ytyr mn klhwn ʔnšʔ drmyn ʔrmyt byt gzʔ
12:44	klhwn gyr mn mdm dytyr lhwn ʔrmyw hdʔ dyn mn ḥsyrwth kl mdm dʔyt hwʔ lh ʔrmyth klh qnynh
13:01	wkd npq yšwʕ mn hyklʔ ʔmr lh ḥd mn tlmydwhy mlpnʔ hʔ ḥzy ʔylyn kʔpʔ wʔylyn bnynʔ
13:02	yšwʕ dyn ʔmr lh ḥzʔ ʔnt hlyn bnynʔ rwrbʔ lʔ mštbqʔ hrkʔ kʔp ʕl kʔp dlʔ msttrʔ
13:03	wkd ytb yšwʕ bṭwrʔ dzytʔ lwqbl hyklʔ šʔlwhy kʔpʔ wyʕqwb wywḥnn wʔndrʔws blḥwdyhwn
13:04	ʔmr ln ʔmty hlyn nhwyn wmnʔ ʔtʔ mʔ dqrybn hlyn klhyn lmštlmw
13:05	hw dyn yšwʕ šry lmʔmr lhwn ḥzw dlmʔ ʔnš nṭʕykwn
13:06	sgyʔʔ gyr nʔtwn bšmy wnʔmrwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ wlsgyʔʔ nṭʕwn
13:07	mʔ dyn dšmʕtwn qrbʔ wṭbʔ dqʔrsʔ lʔ tdḥlwn ʕtyd hw dnhwʔ ʔlʔ lʔ ʕdkyl ḥrtʔ
13:08	nqwm gyr ʕmʔ ʕl ʕmʔ wmlkw ʕl mlkw wnhwwn zwʕʔ bdwkʔ dwkʔ wnhwwn kpnʔ wšgwšyʔ hlyn ršʔ ʔnyn dḥblʔ
13:09	ḥzw dyn ʔntwn npškwn nšlmwnkwn gyr ldynʔ wbknwšthwn ttngdwn wqdm mlkʔ whgmwnʔ tqwmwn mṭlty lshdwthwn
13:10	lwqdm dyn ʕtydʔ dttkrz sbrty bklhwn ʕmmʔ
13:11	mʔ dmqrbyn lkwn dyn dnšlmwnkwn lʔ tqdmwn tʔṣpwn mnʔ tmllwn wlʔ trnwn ʔlʔ mdm dmtyhb lkwn bhy šʕtʔ hw mllw lʔ hwʔ gyr ʔntwn mmllyn ʔlʔ rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ
13:12	nšlm dyn ʔḥʔ lʔḥwhy lmwtʔ wʔbʔ lbrh wnqwmwn bnyʔ ʕl ʔbhyhwn wnmytwn ʔnwn
13:13	wthwwn snyʔyn mn klnš mṭl šmy mn dyn dnsybr ʕdmʔ lḥrtʔ hw nḥʔ 
13:14	mʔ dyn dḥzytwn ʔtʔ ṭnptʔ dḥwrbʔ hy dʔmyrʔ bdnyʔyl nbyʔ dqymʔ ʔykʔ dlʔ wlʔ hw dqrʔ nstkl hydyn ʔylyn dbyhwd ʔnwn nʕrqwn lṭwrʔ
13:15	wmn dbʔgrʔ hw lʔ nḥwt wlʔ nʕwl lmšql mdm mn byth
13:16	wmn dbḥqlʔ hw lʔ nthpk lbstrh dnšqwl lbšh
13:17	wy dyn lbṭntʔ wlʔylyn dmynqn bhnwn ywmtʔ
13:18	ṣlw dyn dlʔ nhwʔ ʕrwqykwn bstwʔ
13:19	nhwʔ gyr bywmtʔ hnwn ʔwlṣnʔ dlʔ hwʔ ʔkwth mn ryš brytʔ dbrʔ ʔlhʔ ʕdmʔ lhšʔ wlʔ nhwʔ
13:20	wʔlw lʔ mryʔ dkry ywmtʔ hnwn lʔ ḥyʔ hwʔ kl bsr ʔlʔ mṭl gbyʔ dgbʔ kry ywmtʔ hnwn
13:21	hydyn ʔn ʔnš nʔmr lkwn dhʔ hrkʔ hw mšyḥʔ whʔ hrtmn lʔ thymnwn
13:22	nqwmwn gyr mšyḥʔ ddglwtʔ wnbyʔ dkdbwtʔ wntlwn ʔtwtʔ wtdmrtʔ wnṭʕwn ʔn mškḥʔ ʔp lgbyʔ
13:23	ʔntwn dyn ʔzdhrw hʔ qdmt ʔmrt lkwn klmdm
13:24	bhnwn dyn ywmtʔ btr ʔwlṣnʔ hw šmšʔ nḥšk wshrʔ lʔ ntl nwhrh
13:25	wkwkbʔ nplwn mn šmyʔ wḥylwtʔ dšmyʔ nttzyʕwn
13:26	whydyn nḥzwnyhy lbrh dʔnšʔ kd ʔtʔ bʕnnʔ ʕm ḥylʔ rbʔ wʕm šwbḥʔ
13:27	hydyn nšdr mlʔkwhy wnknš lgbwhy mn ʔrbʕtyhyn rwḥʔ mn ršh dʔrʕʔ wʕdmʔ lršh dšmyʔ
13:28	mn ttʔ dyn ylpw plʔtʔ dmʔ drk swkyh wprʕw ṭrpyh ydʕyn ʔntwn dmṭʔ qyṭʔ
13:29	hknʔ ʔp ʔntwn mʔ dḥzytwn hlyn dhwyn dʕw dqrybʔ hy ʕl trʕʔ
13:30	ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dlʔ tʕbr šrbtʔ hdʔ ʕdmʔ dhlyn klhyn nhwyn
13:31	šmyʔ wʔrʕʔ nʕbrwn wmly lʔ nʕbrn
13:32	ʕl dyn ywmʔ hw wʕl šʕtʔ hy ʔnš lʔ ydʕ ʔplʔ mlʔkʔ dšmyʔ wlʔ brʔ ʔlʔ ʔn ʔbʔ
13:33	ḥzw ʔttʕyrw wṣlw lʔ gyr ydʕyn ʔntwn ʔmty hw zbnʔ
13:34	ʔyk gbrʔ hw gyr dḥzq wšbq byth wyhb šwlṭnʔ lʕbdwhy wlʔnš ʔnš ʕbdh wltrʕʔ pqd dnhwʔ ʕyr
13:35	ʔttʕyrw hkyl dlʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn ʔmty ʔtʔ mrh dbytʔ brmšʔ ʔw bplgh dllyʔ ʔw bmqrʔ trnglʔ ʔw bṣprʔ
13:36	dlmʔ nʔtʔ mn šlyʔ wnškḥkwn kd dmkyn ʔntwn
13:37	mdm dlkwn dyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lklkwn hw ʔmr ʔnʔ hwytwn ʕyryn
14:01	btr dyn tryn ywmyn hwʔ hwʔ pṣḥʔ dpṭyrʔ wbʕyn hww rby khnʔ wsprʔ ʔyknʔ bnklʔ nʔḥdwn wnqṭlwnyhy
14:02	wʔmryn hww lʔ bʕdʕdʔ dlmʔ nhwʔ šgwšyʔ bʕmʔ
14:03	wkd hw ʔytwhy bbyt ʕnyʔ bbyth dšmʕwn grbʔ kd smyk ʔtt ʔnttʔ dʔyt ʕlyh šṭyptʔ dbsmʔ dnrdyn ršyʔ sgy dmyʔ wptḥth wʔšpʕth ʕl ršh dyšwʕ
14:04	ʔyt hww dyn ʔnšʔ mn tlmydʔ dʔtbʔš lhwn bnpšhwn wʔmrw dlmnʔ hwʔ ʔbdnʔ dhnʔ bsmʔ
14:05	mškḥ hwʔ gyr lmzdbnw ytyr mn tltmʔʔ dynryn wlmtyhbw lmsknʔ wmzdʕpyn hww bh
14:06	hw dyn yšwʕ ʔmr šwbqwh mnʔ mhryn ʔntwn lh ʕbdʔ špyrʔ ʕbdt lwty
14:07	bklzbn gyr msknʔ ʔyt lkwn ʕmkwn wʔmty dṣbyn ʔntwn mškḥyn ʔntwn dtʕbdwn lhwn dšpyr ʔnʔ dyn lʔ bklzbn ʔyty lwtkwn
14:08	hw dʔyt hwʔ lh lhdʔ ʕbdt wqdmt ʔyk dlqbwrtʔ bsmt gwšmy
14:09	wʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dkl ʔykʔ dttkrz sbrty hdʔ bklh ʕlmʔ wʔp mdm dʕbdt hdʔ ntmll ldwkrnh
14:10	yhwdʔ dyn skrywṭʔ ḥd mn trʕsr ʔzl lwt rby khnʔ ʔyk dnšlmywhy lhwn lyšwʕ
14:11	hnwn dyn kd šmʕw ḥdyw wʔštwdyw kspʔ dntlwn lh wbʕʔ hwʔ lh plʕʔ dnšlmywhy
14:12	wbywmʔ qdmyʔ dpṭyrʔ dbh dbḥyn yhwdyʔ pṣḥʔ ʔmryn lh tlmydwhy ʔykʔ ṣbʔ ʔnt dnʔzl nṭyb lk dtʔkwl pṣḥʔ
14:13	wšdr tryn mn tlmydwhy wʔmr lhwn zlw lmdyntʔ whʔ pgʕ bkwn gbrʔ dšqyl mʔnʔ dmyʔ zlw btrh
14:14	wlʔykʔ dʕʔl ʔmrw lmrʔ bytʔ rbn ʔmr ʔykw byt mšryʔ ʔykʔ dʔkwl ʕm tlmydy pṣḥʔ
14:15	whʔ mḥwʔ lkwn ʕlytʔ rbtʔ dmšwyʔ wmṭybʔ tmn tqnw ln
14:16	wnpqw tlmydwhy wʔtw lmdyntʔ wʔškḥw ʔyknʔ dʔmr lhwn wṭybw pṣḥʔ
14:17	wkd hwʔ rmšʔ ʔtʔ ʕm trʕsrth
14:18	wkd smykyn wlʕsyn ʔmr yšwʕ ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dḥd mnkwn dʔkl ʕmy hw nšlmny
14:19	hnwn dyn šryw mttʕyqyn wʔmryn lh ḥd ḥd lmʔ ʔnʔ
14:20	hw dyn ʔmr lhwn ḥd mn trʕsr dṣbʕ ʕmy blgtʔ
14:21	wbrh dʔnšʔ ʔzl ʔyknʔ dktyb ʕlwhy wy dyn lgbrʔ hw dbʔydh mštlm brh dʔnšʔ pqḥ hwʔ lh lgbrʔ hw ʔlw lʔ ʔtyld
14:22	wkd hnwn lʕsyn nsb yšwʕ lḥmʔ wbrk wqṣʔ wyhb lhwn wʔmr lhwn sbw hnʔ ʔytwhy pgry
14:23	wnsb ksʔ wʔwdy wbrk wyhb lhwn wʔštyw mnh klhwn
14:24	wʔmr lhwn hnw dmy ddytqʔ ḥdtʔ dḥlp sgyʔʔ mtʔšd
14:25	ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dtwb lʔ ʔštʔ mn yldʔ dgptʔ ʕdmʔ lywmʔ hw dbh ʔštywhy ḥdtʔyt bmlkwth dʔlhʔ
14:26	wšbḥw wnpqw lṭwr zytʔ 
14:27	wʔmr lhwn yšwʕ dklkwn ttkšlwn by bhnʔ llyʔ ktyb gyr dʔmḥʔ lrʕyʔ wntbdrwn ʔmrwhy
14:28	ʔlʔ mʔ dqmt qdm ʔnʔ lkwn lglylʔ
14:29	ʔmr lh kʔpʔ ʔn klhwn ntkšlwn ʔlʔ lʔ ʔnʔ
14:30	ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lk dʔnt ywmnʔ bllyʔ hnʔ qdm dnqrʔ trnglʔ trtyn zbnyn tlt tkpwr by
14:31	hw dyn ytyrʔyt ʔmr hwʔ dʔn nhwʔ ly lmmt ʕmk lʔ ʔkpwr bk mry wʔkwth ʔp klhwn ʔmrw
14:32	wʔtw ldwktʔ ʔydʔ dmtqryʔ gdsmn wʔmr ltlmydwhy tbw hrkʔ ʕd mṣlʔ ʔnʔ
14:33	wdbr ʕmh lkʔpʔ wlyʕqwb wlywḥnn wšry lmtkmrw wlmttʕqw
14:34	wʔmr lhwn kryʔ hy lh lnpšy ʕdmʔ lmwtʔ qww hrkʔ wʔttʕyrw
14:35	wqrb qlyl wnpl ʕl ʔrʕʔ wmṣlʔ hwʔ dʔn mškḥʔ tʕbr mnh šʕtʔ
14:36	wʔmr ʔbʔ ʔby kl mdm mškḥ ʔnt ʔʕbr mny ksʔ hnʔ ʔlʔ lʔ ṣbyny dyly ʔlʔ dylk
14:37	wʔtʔ ʔškḥ ʔnwn kd dmkyn wʔmr lkʔpʔ šmʕwn dmkt lk lʔ ʔškḥt ḥdʔ šʕʔ lmttʕrw
14:38	ʔttʕyrw wṣlw dlʔ tʕlwn lnsywnʔ rwḥʔ ṣbyʔ wmṭybʔ ʔlʔ pgrʔ kryh
14:39	wʔzl twb ṣly why mltʔ ʔmr
14:40	whpk ʔtʔ twb ʔškḥ ʔnwn kd dmkyn mṭl dʕynyhwn yqyrn hwy wlʔ ydʕyn hww mnʔ nʔmrwn lh
14:41	wʔtʔ dtlt zbnyn wʔmr lhwn dmkw mkyl wʔttnyḥw mṭt ḥrtʔ wʔtt šʕtʔ whʔ mštlm brh dʔnšʔ bʔydyhwn dḥṭyʔ
14:42	qwmw nʔzl hʔ qrb hw dmšlm ly
14:43	wʕd hw mmll ʔtʔ yhwdʔ skrywṭʔ ḥd mn trʕsr wʕmʔ sgyʔʔ ʕm spsrʔ wḥwṭrʔ mn lwt rby khnʔ wsprʔ wqšyšʔ
14:44	wyhb lhwn ʔtʔ mšlmnʔ hw dmšlm wʔmr hw dnšq ʔnʔ hwyw ʔwḥdwhy zhyrʔyt wʔwblwhy
14:45	wbr šʕth qrb wʔmr lh rby rby wnšqh
14:46	hnwn dyn ʔrmyw ʕlwhy ʔydyʔ wʔḥdwhy
14:47	ḥd dyn mn hnwn dqymyn šmṭ sypʔ wmḥyhy lʕbdh drb khnʔ wšqlh ʔdnh
14:48	hw dyn yšwʕ ʕnʔ wʔmr lhwn ʔyk dʕl gysʔ npqtwn bsypʔ wbḥwṭrʔ dtʔḥdwnny
14:49	klywm lwtkwn hwyt kd mlp ʔnʔ bhyklʔ wlʔ ʔḥdtwnny ʔlʔ dnšlmwn ktbʔ hwt hdʔ
14:50	hydyn šbqwhy tlmydwhy wʕrqw
14:51	wʕlymʔ ḥd ʔtʔ hwʔ btrh wʕṭyp sdwnʔ ʕrṭl wʔḥdwhy
14:52	hw dyn šbq sdwnʔ wʕrq ʕrṭl
14:53	wʔwblwhy lyšwʕ lwt qypʔ rb khnʔ wʔtknšw lwth klhwn rby khnʔ wsprʔ wqšyšʔ
14:54	šmʕwn dyn mn rwḥqʔ ʔtʔ hwʔ btrh ʕdmʔ lgw drtʔ drb khnʔ wytb hwʔ ʕm mšmšnʔ wšḥn lwqbl nwrʔ
14:55	rby khnʔ dyn wklh knšhwn bʕyn hww ʕl yšwʕ shdwtʔ dnmytwnyhy wlʔ ʔškḥw
14:56	kd sgyʔʔ gyr mshdyn hww ʕlwhy lʔ šwyn hwy shdwthwn
14:57	ʔnšyn dyn qmw ʕlwhy shdʔ dšwqrʔ wʔmrw
14:58	dḥnn šmʕnyhy dʔmr dʔnʔ šrʔ ʔnʔ hyklʔ hnʔ dʕbyd bʔydyʔ wltltʔ ywmyn bnʔ ʔnʔ ʔḥrnʔ dlʔ ʕbyd bʔydyʔ
14:59	wʔplʔ dyn hknʔ šwyʔ hwt shdwthwn
14:60	wqm rb khnʔ bmṣʕtʔ wšʔlh lyšwʕ wʔmr lʔ mpnʔ ʔnt ptgmʔ mnʔ mshdyn ʕlyk hlyn
14:61	hw dyn štyq hwʔ wmdm lʔ ʕnyhy wtwb šʔlh rb khnʔ wʔmr ʔnt hw mšyḥʔ brh dmbrkʔ
14:62	hw dyn yšwʕ ʔmr lh ʔnʔ ʔnʔ wtḥzwn lbrh dʔnšʔ dytb mn ymynʔ dḥylʔ wʔtʔ ʕl ʕnny šmyʔ
14:63	rb khnʔ dyn ṣrʔ kwtynh wʔmr mnʔ mkyl mtbʕyn ln shdʔ
14:64	hʔ mn pwmh šmʕtwn gwdpʔ mnʔ mtḥzʔ lkwn hnwn dyn klhwn dnw dḥyb hw mwtʔ
14:65	wšryw ʔnšyn rqyn bprṣwph wmḥpyn ʔpwhy wmqpḥyn lh wʔmryn ʔtnbʔ wdḥšʔ mḥyn hww lh ʕl pkwhy
14:66	wkd šmʕwn ltḥt bdrtʔ ʔtt ʕlymtʔ ḥdʔ drb khnʔ
14:67	ḥzth dšḥn wḥrt bh wʔmrʔ lh wʔp ʔnt ʕm yšwʕ hwyt nṣryʔ
14:68	hw dyn kpr wʔmr lʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ mnʔ ʔmrʔ ʔnty wnpq lbr lspʔ wqrʔ trnglʔ
14:69	wḥzth twb ʕlymtʔ hy wšryt dtʔmr lʔylyn dqymyn dʔp hnʔ mnhwn hw
14:70	hw dyn twb kpr wbtr qlyl twb hnwn dqymyn ʔmrw lkʔpʔ šryrʔyt mnhwn ʔnt ʔp gyr glylyʔ ʔnt wmmllk dmʔ
14:71	hw dyn šry hwʔ mḥrm wymʔ dlʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ lgbrʔ hnʔ dʔmryn ʔntwn
14:72	wbh bšʕtʔ qrʔ trnglʔ dtrtyn zbnyn wʔtdkr šmʕwn mlth dyšwʕ dʔmr hwʔ lh dqdm dnqrʔ trnglʔ trtyn zbnyn tlt tkpwr by wšry dnbkʔ
15:01	wmḥdʔ bṣprʔ ʕbdw mlkʔ rby khnʔ ʕm qšyšʔ wʕm sprʔ wʕm klh knwštʔ wʔsrw lyšwʕ wʔwblwhy wʔšlmwhy lpylṭws
15:02	wšʔlh pylṭws ʔnt hw mlkʔ dyhwdyʔ hw dyn ʕnʔ wʔmr lh ʔnt ʔmrt
15:03	wʔklyn hww qrṣwhy rby khnʔ bsgyʔtʔ
15:04	hw dyn pylṭws twb šʔlh wʔmr lh lʔ mpnʔ ʔnt ptgmʔ ḥzy kmʔ mshdyn ʕlyk
15:05	hw dyn yšwʕ mdm ptgmʔ lʔ yhb ʔyknʔ dntdmr pylṭws
15:06	mʕd hwʔ dyn bkl ʕʔdʔ lmšrʔ lhwn ʔsyrʔ ḥd ʔynʔ dšʔlyn
15:07	wʔyt hwʔ ḥd dmtqrʔ br ʔbʔ dʔsyr hwʔ ʕm ʕbdy ʔsṭsyn hnwn dqṭlʔ bʔsṭsyn ʕbdw
15:08	wqʕw ʕmʔ wšryw lmšʔl ʔyk dmʕd hwʔ ʕbd lhwn
15:09	hw dyn pylṭws ʕnʔ wʔmr ṣbyn ʔntwn ʔšrʔ lkwn mlkʔ dyhwdyʔ
15:10	ydʕ hwʔ gyr pylṭws dmn ḥsmʔ ʔšlmwhy rby khnʔ 
15:11	rby khnʔ dyn ytyrʔyt ḥpṭw lknšʔ dlbr ʔbʔ nšrʔ lhwn
15:12	hw dyn pylṭws ʔmr lhwn mnʔ hkyl ṣbyn ʔntwn ʔʕbd lhnʔ dqryn ʔntwn mlkʔ dyhwdyʔ
15:13	hnwn dyn twb qʕw zqwpyhy
15:14	hw dyn pylṭws ʔmr lhwn mnʔ gyr dbyš ʕbd whnwn ytyrʔyt qʕyn hww zqwpyhy
15:15	pylṭws dyn ṣbʔ dnʕbd ṣbynʔ lknšʔ wšrʔ lhwn lbr ʔbʔ wʔšlm lhwn lyšwʕ kd mngd dnzdqp
15:16	ʔsṭrṭywṭʔ dyn ʔwblwhy lgw drtʔ dʔytyh prṭwryn wqrw lklh ʔspyr
15:17	wʔlbšwhy ʔrgwnʔ wgdlw smw lh klylʔ dkwbʔ
15:18	wšryw lmšʔl bšlmh šlm mlkʔ dyhwdyʔ
15:19	wmḥyn hww lh ʕl ršh bqnyʔ wrqyn hww bʔpwhy wbrkyn hww ʕl bwrkyhwn wsgdyn lh
15:20	wkd bzḥw bh ʔšlḥwhy ʔrgwnʔ wʔlbšwhy mʔnwhy wʔpqwhy dnzqpwnyhy
15:21	wšḥrw ḥd dʕbr hwʔ šmʕwn qwrynyʔ dʔtʔ hwʔ mn qrytʔ ʔbwhy dʔlksndrws wdrwpws dnšqwl zqyph
15:22	wʔytywhy lggwltʔ dwktʔ dmtpšqʔ qrqptʔ
15:23	wyhbw lh lmštʔ ḥmrʔ dḥlyṭ bh mwrʔ hw dyn lʔ nsb
15:24	wkd zqpwhy plgw mʔnwhy wʔrmyw ʕlyhwn psʔ mnw mnʔ nsb
15:25	ʔyt hwʔ dyn šʕʔ tlt kd zqpwhy
15:26	wktybʔ hwt ʕltʔ dmwth bktbʔ hnʔ hw mlkʔ dyhwdyʔ
15:27	wzqpw ʕmh tryn lsṭyʔ ḥd mn ymynh wḥd mn smlh
15:28	wšlm ktbʔ dʔmr dʕm ʕwlʔ ʔtḥšb
15:29	wʔp ʔylyn dyn dʕbryn hww mgdpyn hww ʕlwhy wmnydyn ršyhwn wʔmryn ʔwn šrʔ hyklʔ wbnʔ lh ltltʔ ywmyn
15:30	pṣʔ npšk wḥwt mn zqypʔ
15:31	whknʔ ʔp rby khnʔ gḥkyn hww ḥd ʕm ḥd wsprʔ wʔmryn ʔḥrnʔ ʔḥy npšh lʔ mškḥ lmḥyw
15:32	mšyḥʔ mlkh dʔysryl nḥwt hšʔ mn zqypʔ dnḥzʔ wnhymn bh wʔp hnwn dyn dzqypyn hww ʕmh mḥsdyn hww lh
15:33	wkd hwy št šʕyn hwʔ ḥšwkʔ ʕl klh ʔrʕʔ ʕdmʔ lšʕʔ tšʕ
15:34	wbtšʕ šʕyn qʕʔ yšwʕ bqlʔ rmʔ wʔmr ʔyl ʔyl lmnʔ šbqtny dʔytyh ʔlhy ʔlhy lmnʔ šbqtny
15:35	wʔnšyn dšmʕw mn hnwn dqymyn ʔmryn hww lʔlyʔ qrʔ
15:36	rhṭ dyn ḥd wmlʔ ʔspwgʔ ḥlʔ wʔsr bqnyʔ dnšqywhy wʔmrw šbwqw nḥzʔ ʔn ʔtʔ ʔlyʔ mḥt lh
15:37	hw dyn yšwʕ qʕʔ bqlʔ rmʔ wšlm
15:38	wʔpy trʕʔ dhyklʔ ʔṣṭry ltryn mn lʕl ʕdmʔ ltḥt
15:39	kd ḥzʔ dyn qnṭrwnʔ hw dqʔm hwʔ lwth dhknʔ qʕʔ wšlm ʔmr šryrʔyt hnʔ gbrʔ brh hwʔ dʔlhʔ
15:40	ʔyt hwy dyn ʔp nšʔ mn rwḥqʔ dḥzyn hwy mrym mgdlytʔ wmrym ʔmh dyʕqwb zʕwrʔ wdywsʔ wšlwm
15:41	hnyn dkd hw bglylʔ nqypn hwy lh wmšmšn lh wʔḥrnytʔ sgyʔtʔ dslq hwy ʕmh lʔwršlm
15:42	wkd hwʔ rmšʔ dʕrwbtʔ dʔytyh qdm šbtʔ
15:43	ʔtʔ ywsp hw dmn rmtʔ myqrʔ bwlwṭʔ ʔynʔ dʔp hw mskʔ hwʔ lmlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ wʔmrḥ wʕl lwt pylṭws wšʔl pgrh dyšwʕ
15:44	pylṭws dyn tmh dʔn mn kdw myt wqrʔ lqnṭrwnʔ wšʔlh dʔn mn qdm ʕdnʔ myt
15:45	wkd ylp yhb pgrh lywsp
15:46	wzbn ywsp ktnʔ wʔḥth wkrkh bh wsmh bqbrʔ dnqyr hwʔ bšwʕʔ wʕgl kʔpʔ ʕl trʕh dqbrʔ
15:47	mrym dyn mgdlytʔ wmrym hy dywsʔ ḥzy ʔykʔ dʔttsym
16:01	wkd ʕbrt šbtʔ mrym mgdlytʔ wmrym dyʕqwb wšlwm zbn hrwmʔ dnʔtyn nmšḥnyhy
16:02	bšprʔ dyn bḥd bšbʔ ʔty lbyt qbwrʔ kd dnḥ šmšʔ
16:03	wʔmrn hwy bnpšhyn mn dyn ʕgl ln kʔpʔ mn trʕʔ dbyt qbwrʔ
16:04	wḥr ḥzy dmʕglʔ hy kʔpʔ rbʔ hwt gyr ṭb
16:05	wʕlyn lbyt qbwrʔ wḥzy ʕlymʔ dytb mn ymynʔ wʕṭyp ʔsṭlʔ ḥwrtʔ wtmh
16:06	hw dyn ʔmr lhyn lʔ tdḥln lyšwʕ nṣryʔ bʕyn ʔntyn hw dʔzdqp qm lh lʔ hwʔ tnn hʔ dwktʔ ʔykʔ dsym hwʔ
16:07	ʔlʔ zlyn ʔmryn ltlmydwhy wlkʔpʔ dhʔ qdm lkwn lglylʔ tmn tḥzwnyhy ʔyknʔ dʔmr lkwn
16:08	wkd šmʕ ʕrq wnpq mn qbrʔ ʔḥyd hwʔ lhyn gyr thrʔ wrtytʔ wlʔnš mdm lʔ ʔmryn dḥyln hwy gyr
16:09	bšprʔ dyn bḥd bšbʔ qm wʔtḥzy lwqdm lmrym mgdlytʔ hy dšbʕʔ šʔdyn ʔpq hwʔ mnh
16:10	why ʔzlt sbrt lhnwn dʕmh hww dʔbylyn hww wbkyn
16:11	whnwn kd šmʕw dʔmrn dḥy wʔtḥzy lhyn lʔ hymnw ʔnyn
16:12	btr hlyn ʔtḥzy ltryn mnhwn bdmwtʔ ʔḥrtʔ kd mhlkyn wʔzlyn lqrytʔ
16:13	whnwn ʔzlw ʔmrw lšrkʔ ʔp lʔ lhnwn hymnw
16:14	ʔḥryt dyn ʔtḥzy lḥdʕsr kd smykyn wḥsd lḥsyrwt hymnwthwn wlqšywt lbhwn dlhnwn dḥzʔwhy dqm lʔ hymnw
16:15	wʔmr lhwn zlw lʕlmʔ klh wʔkrzw sbrty bklh brytʔ
16:16	ʔynʔ dmhymn wʕmd ḥyʔ wʔynʔ dlʔ mhymn mtḥyb
16:17	ʔtwtʔ dyn lʔylyn dmhymnyn hlyn nqpn bšmy šʔdʔ npqwn wblšnʔ ḥdtʔ nmllwn
16:18	wḥwwtʔ nšqlwn wʔn smʔ dmwtʔ nštwn lʔ nhr ʔnwn wʔydyhwn nsymwn ʕl kryhʔ wntḥlmwn
16:19	yšwʕ dyn mrn mn btr dmll ʕmhwn lšmyʔ slq wytb mn ymynʔ dʔlhʔ
16:20	hnwn dyn npqw wʔkrzw bkl dwkʔ wmrn mʕdr hwʔ lhwn wmšr mlyhwn bʔtwtʔ dʕbdyn hww 
01:01	mṭl dsgyʔʔ ṣbw dnktbwn tšʕytʔ dswʕrnʔ ʔylyn dḥnn mpsyn ḥnn bhwn
01:02	ʔyk mdm dʔšlmw ln hnwn dmn qdym hww ḥzyʔ wmšmšnʔ dylh dmltʔ
01:03	ʔtḥzy ʔp ly mṭl dqryb hwyt yṣypʔyt lklhwn dkl mdm bṭksh ʔktwb lk nṣyḥʔ tʔwpylʔ
01:04	dtdʕ šrrʔ dmlʔ dʔttlmdt lhyn
01:05	hwʔ bywmth dhrwds mlkʔ dyhwdʔ khnʔ ḥd dšmh hwʔ zkryʔ mn tšmštʔ dbyt ʔbyʔ wʔntth mn bnth dʔhrwn šmh hwʔ ʔlyšbʕ
01:06	tryhwn dyn zdyqyn hww qdm ʔlhʔ wmhlkyn bklhwn pwqdnwhy wbkʔnwth dmryʔ dlʔ ʕdly
01:07	brʔ dyn lyt hwʔ lhwn mṭl dʔlyšbʕ ʕqrtʔ hwt wtryhwn sgyʔy bywmthwn hww
01:08	hwʔ hwʔ dyn kd mkhn hwʔ bṭksʔ dtšmšth qdm ʔlhʔ
01:09	bʕydʔ dkhnwtʔ mṭyhy dnsym bsmʔ wʕl lhyklh dmryʔ
01:10	wklh knšʔ dʕmʔ mṣlʔ hwʔ lbr bʕdnʔ dbsmʔ
01:11	wʔtḥzy lh lzkryʔ mlʔkʔ dmryʔ dqʔm mn ymynʔ dmdbḥʔ dbsmʔ
01:12	wʔštgš zkryʔ kd ḥzyhy wdḥltʔ nplt ʕlwhy
01:13	wʔmr lh mlʔkʔ lʔ tdḥl zkryʔ mṭl dʔštmʕt ṣlwtk wʔnttk ʔlyšbʕ tʔld lk brʔ wtqrʔ šmh ywḥnn
01:14	wthwʔ lk ḥdwtʔ wʔrwzʔ wsgyʔʔ nḥdwn bmwldh
01:15	nhwʔ gyr rb qdm mryʔ wḥmrʔ wškrʔ lʔ nštʔ wrwḥʔ dqwdšʔ ntmlʔ ʕd hw bkrsʔ dʔmh
01:16	wsgyʔʔ mn bny ʔysryl npnʔ lwt mryʔ ʔlhhwn
01:17	whw nʔzl qdmwhy brwḥʔ wbḥylʔ dʔlyʔ nbyʔ dnpnʔ lbʔ dʔbhʔ ʕl bnyʔ wlʔylyn dlʔ mtṭpysyn lydʕtʔ dkʔnʔ wnṭyb lmryʔ ʕmʔ gmyrʔ
01:18	wʔmr zkryʔ lmlʔkʔ ʔyknʔ ʔdʕ hdʔ ʔnʔ gyr ʔyty sbʔ wʔntty sgyʔt bywmth hy
01:19	wʕnʔ mlʔkʔ wʔmr lh ʔnʔ ʔnʔ gbryʔyl dqʔm ʔnʔ qdm ʔlhʔ wʔštlḥt dʔmll ʕmk wʔsbrk hlyn
01:20	mkyl thwʔ štyq wlʔ tškḥ lmmllw ʕdmʔ lywmʔ dhlyn nhwyn ʕl dlʔ hymnt lmly hlyn dmtmlyn bzbnhyn
01:21	ʕmʔ dyn qʔm hwʔ wmskʔ lzkryʔ wtmyhyn hww ʕl twḥrth dbhyklʔ
01:22	kd npq dyn zkryʔ lʔ mškḥ hwʔ dnmll ʕmhwn wʔstkl wdḥzwʔ ḥzʔ bhyklʔ whw mrmz rmz hwʔ lhwn wqwy kd ḥrš
01:23	wkd ʔtmlyw ywmtʔ dtšmšth ʔzl lbyth
01:24	whwʔ mn btr ywmtʔ hnwn bṭnt ʔlyšbʕ ʔntth wmṭšyʔ hwt npšh yrḥʔ ḥmšʔ wʔmrʔ hwt
01:25	dhlyn ʕbd ly mryʔ bywmtʔ dḥr by lmsb ḥsdy dbyt bny ʔnšʔ
01:26	byrḥʔ dyn dštʔ ʔštlḥ gbryʔyl mlʔkʔ mn lwt ʔlhʔ lglylʔ lmdyntʔ dšmh nṣrt
01:27	lwt btwltʔ dmkyrʔ lgbrʔ dšmh ywsp mn byth ddwyd wšmh lbtwltʔ mrym
01:28	wʕl lwth mlʔkʔ wʔmr lh šlm lky mlyt ṭybwtʔ mrn ʕmky brykt bnšʔ
01:29	hy dyn kd ḥzt ʔtrhbt bmlth wmtḥšbʔ hwt dmnʔ hw šlmʔ hnʔ
01:30	wʔmr lh mlʔkʔ lʔ tdḥlyn mrym ʔškḥty gyr ṭybwtʔ lwt ʔlhʔ
01:31	hʔ gyr tqblyn bṭnʔ wtʔldyn brʔ wtqryn šmh yšwʕ
01:32	hnʔ nhwʔ rb wbrh dʕlyʔ ntqrʔ wntl lh mryʔ ʔlhʔ kwrsyh ddwyd ʔbwhy
01:33	wnmlk ʕl byth dyʕqwb lʕlm wlmlkwth swp lʔ nhwʔ
01:34	ʔmrʔ mrym lmlʔkʔ ʔyknʔ thwʔ hdʔ dgbrʔ lʔ ḥkym ly
01:35	ʕnʔ mlʔkʔ wʔmr lh rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ tʔtʔ wḥylh dʕlyʔ ngn ʕlyky mṭl hnʔ hw dmtyld bky qdyšʔ hw wbrh dʔlhʔ ntqrʔ
01:36	whʔ ʔlyšbʕ ʔḥyntky ʔp hy bṭnʔ brʔ bsybwth whnʔ yrḥʔ dštʔ lh lhy dmtqryʔ ʕqrtʔ
01:37	mṭl dlʔ ʕṭl lʔlhʔ mdm
01:38	ʔmrʔ mrym hʔ ʔnʔ ʔmth dmryʔ nhwʔ ly ʔyk mltk wʔzl mlʔkʔ mn lwth
01:39	qmt dyn mrym bhwn bywmtʔ hnwn wʔzlt bṭylʔyt lṭwrʔ lmdyntʔ dyhwd
01:40	wʕlt lbyth dzkryʔ wšʔlt šlmh dʔlyšbʕ
01:41	whwʔ dkd šmʕt ʔlyšbʕ šlmh dmrym dṣ ʕwlʔ bkrsh wʔtmlyt ʔlyšbʕ rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ
01:42	wqʕt bqlʔ rmʔ wʔmrt lmrym mbrktʔ ʔnty bnšʔ wmbrk hw pʔrʔ dbkrsky
01:43	ʔymkʔ ly hdʔ dʔmh dmry tʔtʔ lwty
01:44	hʔ gyr kd npl qlʔ dšlmky bʔdny bḥdwtʔ rbtʔ dṣ ʕwlʔ bkrsy
01:45	wṭwbyh lʔydʔ dhymnt dhwʔ šwlmʔ lʔylyn dʔtmll ʕmh mn lwt mryʔ
01:46	wʔmrt mrym mwrbʔ npšy lmryʔ
01:47	wḥdyt rwḥy bʔlhʔ mḥyny
01:48	dḥr bmwkkʔ dʔmth hʔ gyr mn hšʔ ṭwbʔ ntln ly šrbtʔ klhyn
01:49	dʕbd lwty rwrbtʔ hw dḥyltn wqdyš šmh
01:50	wḥnnh ldrʔ wšrbtʔ ʕl ʔylyn ddḥlyn lh
01:51	ʕbd zkwtʔ bdrʕh wbdr ḥtyry btrʕytʔ dlbhwn
01:52	sḥp tqypʔ mn kwrswtʔ wʔrym mkykʔ
01:53	kpnʔ sbʕ ṭbtʔ wʕtyrʔ šrʔ spyqʔyt
01:54	ʕdr lʔysryl ʕbdh wʔtdkr ḥnnh
01:55	ʔyk dmll ʕm ʔbhyn ʕm ʔbrhm wʕm zrʕh lʕlm
01:56	qwyt dyn mrym lwt ʔlyšbʕ ʔyk yrḥʔ tltʔ whpkt lbyth 
01:57	ʔlyšbʕ dyn hwʔ hwʔ lh zbnʔ dtʔld wyldt brʔ
01:58	wšmʕw šbbyh wbny ṭwhmh dʔsgy ʔlhʔ ḥnnh lwth wḥdyn hww ʕmh
01:59	whwʔ lywmʔ dtmnyʔ wʔtw lmgzrh lṭlyʔ wqryn hww lh bšmʔ dʔbwhy zkryʔ
01:60	wʕnt ʔmh wʔmrʔ lhwn lʔ hknʔ ʔlʔ ntqrʔ ywḥnn
01:61	wʔmrw lh dlyt ʔnš bšrbtky dmtqrʔ bšmʔ hnʔ
01:62	wrmzw lʔbwhy dʔyknʔ ṣbʔ dnšmywhy
01:63	wšʔl pnqytʔ wktb wʔmr ywḥnn hw šmh wʔtdmrw klnš
01:64	wmḥdʔ ʔtptḥ pwmh wlšnh wmll wbrk lʔlhʔ
01:65	whwt dḥltʔ ʕl klhwn šbbyhwn wbklh ṭwrʔ dyhwd hlyn mtmlln hwy
01:66	wklhwn dšmʕw mtḥšbyn hww blbhwn wʔmryn mnʔ ky nhwʔ ṭlyʔ hnʔ wʔydh dmryʔ ʔyt hwt ʕmh
01:67	wʔtmly zkryʔ ʔbwhy rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ wʔtnby wʔmr
01:68	mbrk hw mryʔ ʔlhh dʔysryl dsʕr ʕmh wʕbd lh pwrqnʔ
01:69	wʔqym ln qrnʔ dpwrqnʔ bbyth ddwyd ʕbdh
01:70	ʔyk dmll bpwmʔ dnbywhy qdyšʔ dmn ʕlm
01:71	dnprqn mn bʕldbbyn wmn ʔydʔ dklhwn snʔyn
01:72	wʕbd ḥnnh ʕm ʔbhyn wʕhd ldytqwhy qdyštʔ
01:73	wmwmtʔ dymʔ lʔbrhm ʔbwn dntl ln
01:74	dntprq mn ʔydʔ dbʕldbbyn wdlʔ dḥlʔ nplwḥ qdmwhy
01:75	klhwn ywmtn bkʔnwtʔ wbzdyqwtʔ
01:76	wʔnt ṭlyʔ nbyh dʕlyʔ ttqrʔ tʔzl gyr qdm prṣwph dmryʔ dtṭyb ʔwrḥh
01:77	dntl mdʕʔ dḥyʔ lʕmh bšwbqnʔ dḥṭhyhwn
01:78	brḥmʔ dḥnnʔ dʔlhn dbhwn nsʕrn dnḥʔ mn rwmʔ
01:79	lmnhrw lʔylyn dbḥšwkʔ wbṭllʔ dmwtʔ ytbyn dntrwṣ rglyn bʔwrḥʔ dšlmʔ
01:80	ṭlyʔ dyn rbʔ hwʔ wmtḥyl brwḥʔ wbḥwrbʔ ʔytwhy hwʔ ʕdmʔ lywmʔ dtḥwyth dlwt ʔysryl
02:01	hwʔ dyn bywmtʔ hnwn wnpq pwqdnʔ mn ʔgwsṭws qsr dntktb klh ʕmʔ dʔwḥdnh
02:02	hdʔ mktbnwtʔ qdmytʔ hwt bhgmnwtʔ dqwrynws bswryʔ
02:03	wʔzl hwʔ klnš dntktb bmdynth
02:04	slq hwʔ dyn ʔp ywsp mn nṣrt mdyntʔ dglylʔ lyhwd lmdynth ddwyd dmtqryʔ byt lḥm mṭl dʔytwhy hwʔ mn byth wmn šrbth ddwyd
02:05	ʕm mrym mkyrth kd bṭnʔ dtmn ntktb
02:06	whwʔ dkd tmn ʔnwn ʔtmlyw ywmth dtʔld
02:07	wyldt brh bwkrʔ wkrkth bʕzrwrʔ wʔrmyth bʔwryʔ mṭl dlyt hwʔ lhwn dwktʔ ʔykʔ dšryn hww
02:08	rʕwtʔ dyn ʔyt hww bh bʔtrʔ dšryn hww tmn wnṭryn mṭrtʔ dllyʔ ʕl mrʕythwn
02:09	whʔ mlʔkʔ dʔlhʔ ʔtʔ lwthwn wtšbwḥth dmryʔ ʔnhrt ʕlyhwn wdḥlw dḥltʔ rbtʔ
02:10	wʔmr lhwn mlʔkʔ lʔ tdḥlwn hʔ gyr msbr ʔnʔ lkwn ḥdwtʔ rbtʔ dthwʔ lklh ʕlmʔ
02:11	ʔtyld lkwn gyr ywmnʔ prwqʔ dʔytwhy mryʔ mšyḥʔ bmdynth ddwyd
02:12	whdʔ lkwn ʔtʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn ʕwlʔ dkryk bʕzrwrʔ wsym bʔwryʔ
02:13	wmn šly ʔtḥzyw ʕm mlʔkʔ ḥylwtʔ sgyʔʔ dšmyʔ kd mšbḥyn lʔlhʔ wʔmryn
02:14	tšbwḥtʔ lʔlhʔ bmrwmʔ wʕl ʔrʕʔ šlmʔ wsbrʔ ṭbʔ lbny ʔnšʔ
02:15	whwʔ dkd ʔzlw mn lwthwn mlʔkʔ lšmyʔ mllw rʕwtʔ ḥd ʕm ḥd wʔmryn nrdʔ ʕdmʔ lbyt lḥm wnḥzʔ lmltʔ hdʔ dhwt ʔyk dmryʔ ʔwdʕ ln
02:16	wʔtw msrhbʔyt wʔškḥw lmrym wlywsp wlʕwlʔ dsym bʔwryʔ
02:17	wkd ḥzw ʔwdʕw lmltʔ dʔtmllt ʕmhwn ʕlwhy ʕl ṭlyʔ
02:18	wklhwn dšmʕw ʔtdmrw ʕl ʔylyn dʔtmll lhwn mn rʕwtʔ
02:19	mrym dyn nṭrʔ hwt klhyn mlʔ hlyn wmpḥmʔ blbh
02:20	whpkw rʕwtʔ hnwn kd mšbḥyn wmhllyn lʔlhʔ ʕl kl dḥzw wšmʕw ʔyknʔ dʔtmll ʕmhwn
02:21	wkd mlw tmnyʔ ywmyn dntgzr ṭlyʔ ʔtqry šmh yšwʕ dʔtqry mn mlʔkʔ qdm dntbṭn bkrsʔ
02:22	wkd ʔtmlyw ywmtʔ dtdkythwn ʔyk nmwsʔ dmwšʔ ʔsqwhy lʔwršlm dnqymwnyhy qdm mryʔ
02:23	ʔyk dktyb bnmwsʔ dmryʔ dkl dkrʔ ptḥ mrbʕʔ qdyšʔ dmryʔ ntqrʔ
02:24	wdntlwn dbḥtʔ ʔyknʔ dʔmyr bnmwsʔ dmryʔ zwgʔ dšwpnynʔ ʔw tryn prwgʔ dywnʔ
02:25	gbrʔ dyn ḥd ʔyt hwʔ bʔwršlm šmh hwʔ šmʕwn wgbrʔ hnʔ kʔyn hwʔ wzdyq wmskʔ hwʔ lbwyʔh dʔysryl wrwḥʔ dqwdšʔ ʔyt hwt ʕlwhy
02:26	wʔmyr hwʔ lh mn rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ dlʔ nḥzʔ mwtʔ ʕdmʔ dnḥzʔ lmšyḥh dmryʔ
02:27	hw hnʔ ʔtʔ hwʔ brwḥʔ lhyklʔ wkd mʕlyn lh ʔbhwhy lyšw ṭlyʔ dnʕbdwn ḥlpwhy ʔyknʔ dpqyd bnmwsʔ
02:28	qblh ʕl drʕwhy wbrk lʔlhʔ wʔmr
02:29	mkyl šrʔ ʔnt lh lʕbdk mry ʔyk mltk bšlmʔ
02:30	dhʔ ḥzy ʕyny ḥnnk
02:31	hw dṭybt bprṣwpʔ dklhyn ʔmwtʔ
02:32	nwhrʔ lglynʔ dʕmmʔ wšwbḥʔ lʕmk ʔysryl
02:33	ywsp dyn wʔmh tmyhyn hww ʕl ʔylyn dmtmlln hwy ʕlwhy
02:34	wbrk ʔnwn šmʕwn wʔmr lmrym ʔmh hʔ hnʔ sym lmpwltʔ wlqymʔ dsgyʔʔ bʔysryl wlʔtʔ dḥrynʔ
02:35	wbnpšky dyn dylky tʕbr rwmḥʔ ʔyk dntglyn mḥšbtʔ dlbwtʔ dsgyʔʔ 
02:36	wḥnʔ dyn nbytʔ brth dpnwʔyl mn šbṭʔ dʔšyr ʔp hy qšyšt bywmth hwt wšbʕ šnyn ʕm bʕlh ḥyt mn btwlwth
02:37	whwt ʔrmltʔ ʔyk šnyn tmnʔyn wʔrbʕ wlʔ prqʔ hwt mn hyklʔ wbṣwmʔ wbṣlwtʔ plḥʔ hwt bʔymmʔ wbllyʔ
02:38	wʔp hy qmt bh bšʕtʔ wʔwdyt lmryʔ wmmllʔ hwt ʕlwhy ʕm klnš dmskʔ hwʔ lpwrqnh dʔwršlm
02:39	wkd šlmw kl mdm ʔyk dbnmwsʔ dmryʔ hpkw lglylʔ lnṣrt mdynthwn
02:40	ṭlyʔ dyn rbʔ hwʔ wmtḥyl brwḥʔ wmtmlʔ ḥkmtʔ wṭybwtʔ dʔlhʔ ʔyt hwt ʕlwhy
02:41	wʔnšwhy bkl šnʔ ʔzlyn hww lʔwršlm bʕdʕdʔ dpṣḥʔ
02:42	wkd hwʔ br šnyn trtʕsrʔ slqw ʔyknʔ dmʕdyn hww lʕdʕdʔ
02:43	wkd šlmw ywmtʔ hpkw lhwn yšwʕ dyn ṭlyʔ pš lh bʔwršlm wywsp wʔmh lʔ ydʕw
02:44	sbryn hww gyr dʕm bny lwythwn hw wkd ʔtw mrdʔ ywmʔ ḥd bʕʔwhy lwt ʔnšwthwn wlwt mn dydʕ lhwn
02:45	wlʔ ʔškḥwhy whpkw lhwn twb lʔwršlm wbʕyn hww lh
02:46	wmn btr tltʔ ywmyn ʔškḥwhy bhyklʔ kd ytb mṣʕt mlpnʔ wšmʕ mnhwn wmšʔl lhwn
02:47	wtmyhyn hww klhwn ʔylyn dšmʕyn hww lh bḥkmth wbptgmwhy
02:48	wkd ḥzʔwhy tmhw wʔmrt lh ʔmh bry lmnʔ ʕbdt ln hknʔ dhʔ ʔbwk wʔnʔ bṭwrpʔ sgyʔʔ bʕyn hwyn lk
02:49	ʔmr lhwn mnʔ bʕyn hwytwn ly lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn dbyt ʔby wlʔ ly dʔhwʔ
02:50	hnwn dyn lʔ ʔštwdʕw lmltʔ dʔmr lhwn
02:51	wnḥt ʕmhwn wʔtʔ lnṣrt wmštʕbd hwʔ lhwn ʔmh dyn nṭrʔ hwt klhyn mlʔ blbh
02:52	yšwʕ dyn rbʔ hwʔ bqwmth wbḥkmth wbṭybwtʔ lwt ʔlhʔ wbnynšʔ
03:01	bšnt ḥmšʕsrʔ dyn dmlkwth dṭybryws qsr bhgmnwtʔ dpnṭyws pylṭws byhwd kd ršʔ rbyʕyʔ hrwds bglylʔ wpylypws ʔḥwhy ršʔ rbyʕyʔ bʔyṭwryʔ wbʔtrʔ dṭrkwnʔ wlwsnyʔ ršʔ rbyʕyʔ dʔbylynʔ
03:02	brbwt khnwtʔ dḥnn wdqypʔ hwt mltʔ dʔlhʔ ʕl ywḥnn br zkryʔ bḥwrbʔ
03:03	wʔtʔ bklh ʔtrʔ dḥdry ywrdnn kd mkrz mʕmwdytʔ dtybwtʔ lšwbqnʔ dḥṭhʔ
03:04	ʔyknʔ dktyb bktbʔ dmlʔ dʔšʕyʔ nbyʔ dʔmr qlʔ dqrʔ bḥwrbʔ ṭybw ʔwrḥh dmryʔ wtrwṣw bpqʕtʔ šbylʔ lʔlhn
03:05	klhwn nḥlʔ ntmlwn wklhwn ṭwrʔ wrmtʔ ntmkkwn wnhwʔ ʕrmʔ lšpyʔ wʔtrʔ ʕsqʔ lpqʕtʔ
03:06	wnḥzʔ kl bsr ḥyʔ dʔlhʔ
03:07	wʔmr hwʔ lknšʔ ʔylyn dʔtyn hww lwth lmʕmd yldʔ dʔkdnʔ mnw ḥwykwn lmʕrq mn rwgzʔ dʕtyd
03:08	ʕbdw hkyl pʔrʔ dšwyn ltybwtʔ wlʔ tšrwn lmʔmr bnpškwn dʔbʔ ʔyt ln ʔbrhm ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn gyr dmn hlyn kʔpʔ mškḥ ʔlhʔ lmqmw bnyʔ lʔbrhm
03:09	hʔ dyn nrgʔ sym ʕl ʕqrʔ dʔylnʔ kl ʔylnʔ hkyl dpʔrʔ ṭbʔ lʔ ʕbd mtpsq wbnwrʔ npl
03:10	wmšʔlyn hww lh knšʔ wʔmryn mnʔ hkyl nʕbd
03:11	ʕnʔ wʔmr lhwn mn dʔyt lh trtyn kwtynyn ntl lmn dlyt lh wmn dʔyt lh sybrtʔ hknʔ nʕbd
03:12	wʔtw ʔp mksʔ lmʕmd wʔmryn lh mlpnʔ mnʔ nʕbd
03:13	hw dyn ʔmr lhwn lʔ ttbʕwn mdm ytyr ʕl mʔ dpqyd lkwn lmtbʕ
03:14	wmšʔlyn hww lh plḥy ʔsṭrṭyʔ wʔmryn mnʔ nʕbd ʔp ḥnn ʔmr lhwn lʔ bʔnš ttṭgrwn wlʔnš lʔ tʕšqwn wnspqn lkwn ʔpswnytkwn
03:15	kd dyn msbr hwʔ ʕmʔ ʕl ywḥnn wklhwn mtḥšbyn hww blbhwn ddlmʔ hwyw mšyḥʔ
03:16	ʕnʔ ywḥnn wʔmr lhwn ʔnʔ hʔ mʕmd ʔnʔ lkwn bmyʔ ʔtʔ dyn hw dḥyltn mny hw dlʔ šwʔ ʔnʔ dʔšrʔ ʕrqʔ dmsnwhy hw nʕmdkwn brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ wbnwrʔ
03:17	hw dʔḥyd rpšʔ bʔydh wmdkʔ ʔdrwhy wḥṭʔ knš lʔwṣrwhy wtbnʔ nwqd bnwrʔ dlʔ dʕkʔ
03:18	ʔp ʔḥrnytʔ dyn sgyʔtʔ mlp hwʔ wmsbr lʕmʔ
03:19	hrwds dyn ṭṭrrkʔ mṭl dmtkss hwʔ mn ywḥnn ʕl hrwdyʔ ʔntt pylypws ʔḥwhy wʕl klhyn byštʔ dʕbd hwʔ
03:20	ʔwsp ʔp hdʔ ʕl klhyn wḥbšh lywḥnn byt ʔsyrʔ
03:21	hwʔ dyn kd ʕmd klh ʕmʔ wʔp yšwʕ ʕmd wkd mṣlʔ ʔtptḥw šmyʔ
03:22	wnḥtt rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ ʕlwhy bdmwt gwšmʔ dywnʔ wqlʔ hwʔ mn šmyʔ dʔmr ʔnt hw bry ḥbybʔ dbk ʔṣṭbyt
03:23	hw dyn yšwʕ ʔytwhy hwʔ ʔyk br šnyn tltyn wmstbr hwʔ br ywsp br hly
03:24	br mṭtt br lwy br mlky br yʔny br ywsp
03:25	br mttʔ br ʕmwṣ br nḥwm br ḥsly br ngy
03:26	br mʔt br mṭt br šmʕy br ywsp br yhwdʔ
03:27	br ywḥnn br rsʔ br zwrbbl br šltʔyl br nry
03:28	br mlky br ʔdy br qwsm br ʔlmwdd br ʕyr
03:29	br ywsʔ br ʔlyʕzr br ywrm br mtytʔ br lwy
03:30	br šmʕwn br yhwdʔ br ywsp br ywnm br ʔlyqym
03:31	br mlyʔ br mʔny br mṭtʔ br ntn br dwyd
03:32	br ʔyšy br ʕwbyd br bʕz br slmwn br nḥšwn
03:33	br ʕmyndb br ʔrm br ḥṣrwn br prṣ br yhwdʔ
03:34	br yʕqwb br ʔysḥq br ʔbrhm br trḥ br nḥwr
03:35	br srwg br ʔrʕw br plg br ʕbr br šlḥ

03:37	br mtwšlḥ br ḥnwk br yrd br mhllʔyl br qynn
03:38	br ʔnwš br šyt br ʔdm dmn ʔlhʔ 
04:01	yšwʕ dyn kd mlʔ rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ hpk mn ywrdnn wdbrth rwḥʔ lḥwrbʔ
04:02	ywmtʔ ʔrbʕyn dntnsʔ mn ʔklqrṣʔ wlʔ lʕs mdm bhnwn ywmtʔ wkd šlm ʔnwn lḥrtʔ kpn
04:03	wʔmr lh ʔklqrṣʔ ʔn brh ʔnt dʔlhʔ ʔmr lkʔpʔ hdʔ dthwʔ lḥmʔ
04:04	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lh ktyb hw dlʔ hwʔ blḥmʔ blḥwd ḥyʔ brnšʔ ʔlʔ bkl ptgm dʔlhʔ
04:05	wʔsqh sṭnʔ lṭwrʔ rmʔ wḥwyh klhyn mlkwtʔ dʔrʕʔ bʕdnʔ zʕwrʔ
04:06	wʔmr lh ʔklqrṣʔ lk ʔtl šwlṭnʔ hnʔ klh wšwbḥh dly mšlm wlmn dʔṣbʔ yhb ʔnʔ lh
04:07	ʔn hkyl tsgwd qdmy dylk nhwʔ klh
04:08	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lh ktyb hw dlmryʔ ʔlhk tsgwd wlh blḥwdwhy tplwḥ
04:09	wʔytyh lʔwršlm wʔqymh ʕl knpʔ dhyklʔ wʔmr lh ʔn brh ʔnt dʔlhʔ ʔrmʔ npšk mkʔ ltḥt
04:10	ktyb gyr dlmlʔkwhy npqd ʕlyk dnnṭrwnk
04:11	wʕl drʕyhwn nšqlwnk dlʔ ttql rglk bkʔpʔ
04:12	ʕnʔ dyn yšwʕ wʔmr lh ʔmyr hw dlʔ tnsʔ lmryʔ ʔlhk
04:13	wkd šlm ʔklqrṣʔ klhwn nsywnwhy prq mn lwth ʕd zbnʔ
04:14	whpk yšwʕ bḥylʔ drwḥʔ lglylʔ wnpq ʕlwhy ṭbʔ bklh ʔtrʔ dḥdryhwn
04:15	whw mlp hwʔ bknwšthwn wmštbḥ hwʔ mn kl ʔnš
04:16	wʔtʔ lnṣrt ʔykʔ dʔtrby wʕl ʔyknʔ dmʕd hwʔ lknwštʔ bywmʔ dšbtʔ wqm lmqrʔ
04:17	wʔtyhb lh sprʔ dʔšʕyʔ nbyʔ wptḥ yšwʕ sprʔ wʔškḥ dwktʔ ʔykʔ dktyb
04:18	rwḥh dmryʔ ʕly wmṭl hdʔ mšḥny lmsbrw lmsknʔ wšlḥny lmʔsyw ltbyry lbʔ wlmkrzw lšbyʔ šwbqnʔ wlʕwyrʔ ḥzyʔ wlmšrrw ltbyrʔ bšwbqnʔ
04:19	wlmkrzw šntʔ mqbltʔ lmryʔ
04:20	wkrk sprʔ wyhbh lmšmšnʔ wʔzl ytb klhwn dyn dbknwštʔ ʕynyhwn ḥyrn hwy bh
04:21	wšry lmʔmr lwthwn dywmnʔ ʔštlm ktbʔ hnʔ bʔdnykwn
04:22	wshdyn hww lh klhwn wmtdmryn hww bmlʔ dṭybwtʔ dnpqn hwy mn pwmh wʔmryn hww lʔ hwʔ hnʔ br ywsp 
04:23	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ kbr tʔmrwn ly mtlʔ hnʔ ʔsyʔ ʔsʔ npšk wkl dšmʕn dʕbdt bkprnḥwm ʕbd ʔp hrkʔ bmdyntk
04:24	hw dyn ʔmr ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dlyt nbyʔ dmtqbl bmdynth
04:25	šrrʔ gyr ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dsgy ʔrmltʔ ʔyt hwy bʔysryl bywmy ʔlyʔ nbyʔ kd ʔttḥdw šmyʔ šnyn tlt wyrḥʔ štʔ whwʔ kpnʔ rbʔ bklh ʔrʕʔ
04:26	wlwt ḥdʔ mnhyn lʔ ʔštdr ʔlyʔ ʔlʔ lṣrpt dṣydn lwt ʔnttʔ ʔrmltʔ
04:27	wsgyʔʔ grbʔ ʔyt hww byt ʔysryl bywmy ʔlyšʕ nbyʔ wḥd mnhwn lʔ ʔtdky ʔlʔ ʔn nʕmn ʔrmyʔ
04:28	wkd šmʕw hlyn hnwn dbknwštʔ ʔtmlyw ḥmtʔ klhwn
04:29	wqmw ʔpqwhy lbr mn mdyntʔ wʔytywhy ʕdmʔ lgbynʔ dṭwrʔ hw dmdynthwn bnyʔ hwt ʕlwhy dnšdwnyhy mn šqypʔ
04:30	hw dyn ʕbr bynthwn wʔzl
04:31	wnḥt lkprnḥwm mdyntʔ dglylʔ wmlp hwʔ lhwn bšbʔ
04:32	wtmyhyn hww bywlpnh dmšlṭʔ hwt mlth
04:33	wʔyt hwʔ bknwštʔ gbrʔ dʔyt hwʔ bh rwḥʔ dšʔdʔ ṭnpʔ wzʕq bqlʔ rmʔ
04:34	wʔmr šbwqyny mʔ ln wlk yšwʕ nṣryʔ ʔtyt lmwbdwtn ydʕ ʔnʔ lk mn ʔnt qdyšh dʔlhʔ
04:35	wkʔʔ bh yšwʕ wʔmr skwr pwmk wpwq mnh wšdyhy šʔdʔ bmṣʕtʔ wnpq mnh kd lʔ srḥ bh mdm
04:36	wtmhʔ rbʔ ʔḥd lklnš wmmllyn hww ʕm ḥddʔ wʔmryn mnʔ hy ky mltʔ hdʔ dbšwlṭnʔ wbḥylʔ pqdʔ lrwḥʔ ṭnptʔ wnpqn
04:37	wnpq ʕlwhy ṭbʔ bklh ʔtrʔ dḥdryhwn
04:38	wkd npq yšwʕ mn knwštʔ ʕl lbyth dšmʕwn wḥmth dšmʕwn ʔlyṣʔ hwt bʔštʔ rbtʔ wbʕw mnh mṭlth
04:39	wqm lʕl mnh wkʔʔ bʔšth wšbqth wmḥdʔ qmt wmšmšʔ hwt lhwn
04:40	mʕrby šmšʔ dyn klhwn ʔylyn dʔyt hwʔ lhwn kryhʔ dkryhyn bkwrhnʔ mšḥlpʔ ʔytyw ʔnwn lwth hw dyn ʕl ḥd ḥd mnhwn ʔydh sʔm hwʔ wmʔsʔ hwʔ lhwn
04:41	wnpqyn hww ʔp šʔdʔ mn sgyʔʔ kd mzʕqyn wʔmryn dʔnt hw mšyḥʔ brh dʔlhʔ wkʔʔ hwʔ bhwn wlʔ šbq hwʔ lhwn dnʔmrwn dydʕyn dhwyw mšyḥʔ
04:42	wlṣprh dywmʔ npq ʔzl lh lʔtrʔ ḥwrbʔ wknšʔ bʕyn hww lh wʔtw ʕdmʔ lwth wʔḥdwhy dlʔ nʔzl lh mn lwthwn
04:43	hw dyn yšwʕ ʔmr lhwn dʔp lmdyntʔ ʔḥrnytʔ wlʔ ly lmsbrw mlkwth dʔlhʔ dʕl hdʔ hw ʔštdrt
04:44	whw mkrz hwʔ bknwštʔ dglylʔ
05:01	hwʔ dyn kd knš ʕlwhy knšʔ lmšmʕ mltʔ dʔlhʔ whw qʔm hwʔ ʕl yd ymtʔ dgnsr
05:02	ḥzʔ spynʔ trtyn dqymn ʕl gnb ymtʔ wṣydʔ dslqw mnhyn wmšygyn mṣydthwn
05:03	wḥdʔ mnhyn dšmʕwn hwt kʔpʔ wslq yšwʕ ytb bh wʔmr dndbrwnh qlyl mn ybšʔ lmyʔ wytb hwʔ wmlp mn spyntʔ lknšʔ
05:04	wkd štq mn mmllh ʔmr lšmʕwn dbrw lʕwmqʔ wʔrmw mṣydtkwn lṣydʔ
05:05	ʕnʔ šmʕwn wʔmr lh rby llyʔ klh lʔyn wmdm lʔ ʔḥdn ʕl mltk dyn rmʔ ʔnʔ mṣydtʔ 
05:06	wkd hdʔ ʕbdw ḥbšw nwnʔ sgyʔʔ dṭb wmṣṭryʔ hwt mṣydthwn
05:07	wrmzw lḥbryhwn dbspyntʔ ʔḥrtʔ dnʔtwn nʕdrwn ʔnwn wkd ʔtw mlw ʔnyn spynʔ trtyhyn ʔyk dqrybn hwy lmṭbʕ
05:08	kd ḥzʔ dyn šmʕwn kʔpʔ npl qdm rglwhy dyšwʕ wʔmr lh bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnk mry prwq lk mny dgbrʔ ʔnʔ ḥṭyʔ
05:09	tmhʔ gyr ʔḥdh hwʔ wlklhwn dʕmh ʕl ṣydʔ hw dnwnʔ dṣdw
05:10	hkwt dyn ʔp lyʕqwb wlywḥnn bny zbdy dʔytyhwn hww šwtpʔ dšmʕwn ʔmr dyn yšwʕ lšmʕwn lʔ tdḥl mn hšʔ bny ʔnšʔ thwʔ ṣʔd lḥyʔ
05:11	wqrbw ʔnyn spynʔ lʔrʕʔ wšbqw kl mdm wʔtw btrh
05:12	wkd hwʔ yšwʕ bḥdʔ mn mdyntʔ ʔtʔ gbrʔ dmlʔ klh grbʔ ḥzʔ lyšwʕ wnpl ʕl ʔpwhy wbʕʔ hwʔ mnh wʔmr lh mry ʔn ṣbʔ ʔnt mškḥ ʔnt lmdkywty
05:13	wpšṭ ʔydh yšwʕ qrb lh wʔmr lh ṣbʔ ʔnʔ ʔtdkʔ wbr šʕth ʔzl mnh grbh wʔtdky
05:14	wpqdh dlʔnš lʔ tʔmr ʔlʔ zl ḥwʔ npšk lkhnʔ wqrb ḥlp tdkytk ʔyknʔ dpqd mwšʔ lshdwthwn
05:15	wnpq ʕlwhy ṭbʔ ytyrʔyt wmtknš hwʔ ʕmʔ sgyʔʔ lmšmʕ mnh wlmtʔsyw mn kwrhnyhwn
05:16	hw dyn mšnʔ hwʔ ldbrʔ wmṣlʔ
05:17	whwʔ bḥd mn ywmtʔ kd mlp hwʔ yšwʕ ytbyn hww pryšʔ wmlpy nmwsʔ dʔtw hww mn kl qwryʔ dglylʔ wdyhwd wdʔwršlm wḥylʔ dmryʔ ʔytwhy hwʔ lmʔsywthwn
05:18	wʔnšʔ ʔytyw bʕrsʔ gbrʔ ḥd mšryʔ wbʕyn hww dnʕlwn nsymwnyhy qdmwhy
05:19	wkd lʔ ʔškḥw dʔyknʔ nʕlwnyhy mṭl swgʔʔ dʕmʔ slqw lhwn lʔgrʔ wšbwhy ʕm ʕrsh mn tṭlylʔ lmṣʕtʔ qdmwhy dyšwʕ
05:20	kd ḥzʔ dyn yšwʕ hymnwthwn ʔmr lhw mšryʔ gbrʔ šbyqyn lk ḥṭhyk
05:21	wšryw sprʔ wpryšʔ mtḥšbyn wʔmryn mnw hnʔ dmmll gwdpʔ mnw mškḥ lmšbq ḥṭhʔ ʔlʔ ʔn ʔlhʔ blḥwd
05:22	yšwʕ dyn ydʕ mḥšbthwn wʕnʔ wʔmr lhwn mnʔ mtḥšbyn ʔntwn blbkwn
05:23	ʔydʔ pšyqʔ lmʔmr dšbyqyn lk ḥṭhyk ʔw lmʔmr qwm hlk
05:24	dtdʕwn dyn dšlyṭ hw brh dʔnšʔ bʔrʕʔ dnšbwq ḥṭhʔ ʔmr lmšryʔ lk ʔmr ʔnʔ qwm šqwl ʕrsk wzl lbytk
05:25	wmḥdʔ qm lʕnyhwn wšql ʕrsh wʔzl lbyth kd mšbḥ lʔlhʔ
05:26	wtmhʔ ʔḥd lklnš wmšbḥyn hww lʔlhʔ wʔtmlyw dḥltʔ wʔmryn dḥzyn ywmnʔ tdmrtʔ
05:27	btr hlyn npq yšwʕ wḥzʔ mksʔ dšmh lwy dytb byt mksʔ wʔmr lh tʔ btry
05:28	wšbq kl mdm wqm ʔzl btrh
05:29	wʕbd lh lwy bbyth qwblʔ rbʔ wʔyt hwʔ knšʔ sgyʔʔ dmksʔ wdʔḥrnʔ dsmykyn hww ʕmhwn
05:30	wrṭnyn hww sprʔ wpryšʔ wʔmryn ltlmydwhy lmnʔ ʕm mksʔ wḥṭyʔ ʔklyn ʔntwn wštyn
05:31	wʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn lʔ mtbʕʔ ʔsyʔ lḥlymʔ ʔlʔ lʔylyn dbyš byš ʕbydyn
05:32	lʔ ʔtyt dʔqrʔ lzdyqʔ ʔlʔ lḥṭyʔ ltybwtʔ
05:33	hnwn dyn ʔmryn lh lmnʔ tlmydwhy dywḥnn ṣymyn ʔmynʔyt wmṣlyn ʔp dpryšʔ dylk dyn ʔklyn wštyn
05:34	hw dyn ʔmr lhwn lʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn lbnwhy dgnwnʔ kmʔ dḥtnʔ ʕmhwn dtʕbdwn dnṣwmwn
05:35	nʔtwn dyn ywmtʔ kd nttrym ḥtnʔ mnhwn hydyn nṣwmwn bhnwn ywmtʔ
05:36	wʔmr lhwn mtlʔ dlʔ ʔnš qʔd ʔwrqʕtʔ mn mʔnʔ ḥdtʔ wrmʔ ʕl mʔnʔ blyʔ dlʔ lḥdtʔ qʔd wlblyʔ lʔ šlmʔ ʔwrqʕtʔ dmn ḥdtʔ
05:37	wlʔ ʔnš rmʔ ḥmrʔ ḥdtʔ bzqʔ blytʔ wʔn dyn lʔ mbzʕ ḥmrʔ ḥdtʔ lzqʔ whw ḥmrʔ mtʔšd wzqʔ ʔbdn
05:38	ʔlʔ ḥmrʔ ḥdtʔ bzqʔ ḥdttʔ rmyn wtryhwn mtnṭryn
05:39	wlʔ ʔnš štʔ ḥmrʔ ʕtyqʔ wmḥdʔ bʕʔ ḥdtʔ ʔmr gyr ʕtyqʔ bsym
06:01	hwʔ dyn bšbtʔ kd mhlk yšwʕ byt zrʕʔ tlmydwhy mlgyn hww šblʔ wprkyn bʔydyhwn wʔklyn
06:02	ʔnšyn dyn mn pryšʔ ʔmryn lhwn mnʔ ʕbdyn ʔntwn mdm dlʔ šlyṭ lmʕbd bšbtʔ
06:03	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn wlʔ hdʔ qrytwn mdm dʕbd dwyd kd kpn hw wʔylyn dʕmh
06:04	dʕl lbyth dʔlhʔ wlḥmʔ dptwrh dmryʔ nsb ʔkl wyhb lʔylyn dʕmh hw dlʔ šlyṭ hwʔ lmʔkl ʔlʔ lkhnʔ blḥwd
06:05	wʔmr lhwn dmrh hw dšbtʔ brh dʔnšʔ
06:06	hwʔ dyn lšbtʔ ʔḥrtʔ ʕl lknwštʔ wmlp hwʔ wʔyt hwʔ tmn gbrʔ dʔydh dymynʔ ybyšʔ hwt
06:07	wsprʔ wpryšʔ nṭryn hww lh dʔn hw dmʔsʔ bšbtʔ dnškḥwn nʔklwn qrṣwhy
06:08	hw dyn ydʕ mḥšbthwn wʔmr lhw gbrʔ dybyšʔ ʔydh qwm tʔ lk lmṣʕt knwštʔ wkd ʔtʔ wqm
06:09	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔšʔlkwn mnʔ šlyṭ bšbtʔ dṭb lmʕbd ʔw dbyš npšʔ lmḥyw ʔw lmwbdw
06:10	wḥr bhwn bklhwn wʔmr lh pšwṭ ʔydk wpšṭ wtqnt ʔydh ʔyk ḥbrth
06:11	hnwn dyn ʔtmlyw ḥsmʔ wmmllyn hww ḥd ʕm ḥd dmnʔ nʕbdwn lh lyšwʕ 
06:12	hwʔ dyn bywmtʔ hnwn npq yšwʕ lṭwrʔ lmṣlyw wtmn ʔgh hwʔ bṣlwth dʔlhʔ
06:13	wkd nght qrʔ ltlmydwhy wgbʔ mnhwn trʕsr hnwn dšlyḥʔ šmy ʔnwn
06:14	šmʕwn hw dšmy kʔpʔ wʔndrʔws ʔḥwhy wyʕqwb wywḥnn wpylypws wbr twlmy
06:15	wmty wtʔwmʔ wyʕqwb br ḥlpy wšmʕwn dmtqrʔ ṭnnʔ
06:16	wyhwdʔ br yʕqwb wyhwdʔ skrywṭʔ hw dhwʔ mšlmnʔ
06:17	wnḥt ʕmhwn yšwʕ wqm bpqʕtʔ wknšʔ sgyʔʔ dtlmydwhy wswgʔʔ dknšʔ dʕmʔ mn klh yhwd wmn ʔwršlm wmn spr ymʔ dṣwr wdṣydn
06:18	dʔtw dnšmʕwn mlth wdntʔswn mn kwrhnyhwn wʔylyn dmtʔlṣyn mn rwḥʔ ṭnptʔ wmtʔsyn hww
06:19	wklh knšʔ bʕyn hww lmtqrbw lh ḥylʔ gyr npq hwʔ mnh wlklhwn mʔsʔ hwʔ
06:20	wʔrym ʕynwhy ʕl tlmydwhy wʔmr ṭwbykwn msknʔ ddylkwn hy mlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ
06:21	ṭwbykwn ʔylyn dkpnyn hšʔ dtsbʕwn ṭwbykwn ldbkyn hšʔ dtgḥkwn
06:22	ṭwbykwn mʔ dsnyn lkwn bnynšʔ wmpršyn lkwn wmḥsdyn lkwn wmpqyn šmkwn ʔyk byšʔ ḥlp brh dʔnšʔ
06:23	ḥdw bhw ywmʔ wdwṣw dʔgrkwn sgy bšmyʔ hknʔ gyr ʕbdyn hww ʔbhthwn lnbyʔ
06:24	brm wy lkwn ʕtyrʔ dqbltwn bwyʔkwn
06:25	wy lkwn sbʕʔ dtkpnwn wy lkwn ldgḥkyn hšʔ dtbkwn wttʔblwn
06:26	wy lkwn kd nhwwn ʔmryn ʕlykwn bny ʔnšʔ dšpyr hknʔ gyr ʕbdyn hww lnbyʔ ddglwtʔ ʔbhthwn
06:27	lkwn dyn ʔmr ʔnʔ ldšmʕyn ʔḥbw lbʕldbbykwn wʕbdw dšpyr lʔylyn dsnyn lkwn
06:28	wbrkw lʔylyn dlyṭyn lkwn wṣlw ʕl ʔylyn ddbryn lkwn bqṭyrʔ
06:29	wldmḥʔ lk ʕl pkk qrb lh ʔḥrnʔ wmn mn dšql mrṭwṭk lʔ tklʔ ʔp kwtynk
06:30	lkl dšʔl lk hb lh wmn mn dšql dylk lʔ ttbʕ
06:31	wʔyknʔ dṣbyn ʔntwn dnʕbdwn lkwn bny ʔnšʔ hkwt ʕbdw lhwn ʔp ʔntwn
06:32	ʔn gyr mḥbyn ʔntwn lʔylyn dmḥbyn lkwn ʔydʔ hy ṭybwtkwn ʔp gyr ḥṭyʔ lʔylyn dmḥbyn lhwn rḥmyn
06:33	wʔn ʕbdyn ʔntwn dṭb lʔylyn dmṭʔbyn lkwn ʔydʔ hy ṭybwtkwn ʔp ḥṭyʔ gyr hknʔ ʕbdyn
06:34	wʔn mwzpyn ʔntwn lmn dsbryn ʔntwn dttprʕwn mnh ʔydʔ hy ṭybwtkwn ʔp ḥṭyʔ gyr lḥṭyʔ mwzpyn dhkwt ntprʕwn
06:35	brm ʔḥbw lbʕldbbykwn wʔṭʔbw lhwn wʔwzpw wlʔ tpsqwn sbrʔ dʔnš wnhwʔ sgy ʔgrkwn wthwwn bnwhy drmʔ dhw bsym hw ʕl byšʔ wʕl kpwrʔ
06:36	hww hkyl mrḥmnʔ ʔyknʔ dʔp ʔbwkwn mrḥmnʔ hw
06:37	lʔ tdwnwn wlʔ mttdynyn ʔntwn lʔ tḥybwn wlʔ mtḥybyn ʔntwn šrw wtštrwn
06:38	hbw wmtyhb lkwn bkyltʔ ṭbtʔ wrqyʕtʔ wmšpʕtʔ nrmwn bʕwbykwn bhy gyr kyltʔ dmkylyn ʔntwn mttkyl lkwn
06:39	wʔmr hwʔ lhwn mtlʔ lmʔ mškḥ smyʔ lsmyʔ lmdbrw lʔ tryhwn bgwmṣʔ nplyn
06:40	lyt tlmydʔ dytyr mn rbh klnš gyr dgmyr nhwʔ ʔyk rbh
06:41	mnʔ dyn ḥzʔ ʔnt glʔ dbʕynh dʔḥwk qrytʔ dyn dbʕynk lʔ mtḥzyʔ lk
06:42	ʔw ʔyknʔ mškḥ ʔnt lmʔmr lʔḥwk ʔḥy šbwq ʔpq glʔ mn ʕynk dhʔ qrytʔ dbʕynk dylk lʔ mtḥzyʔ lk nsb bʔpʔ ʔpq lwqdm qrytʔ mn ʕynk whydyn ntḥzʔ lk lmpqw glʔ mn ʕynh dʔḥwk
06:43	lʔ ʔyt ʔylnʔ ṭbʔ dʕbd pʔrʔ byšʔ ʔp lʔ ʔylnʔ byšʔ dʕbd pʔrʔ ṭbʔ
06:44	kl ʔylnʔ gyr mn pʔrwhy hw mtydʕ lʔ gyr lqṭyn mn kwbʔ tʔnʔ ʔp lʔ mn snyʔ qṭpyn ʕnbʔ
06:45	gbrʔ ṭbʔ mn symtʔ ṭbtʔ dblbh mpq ṭbtʔ wgbrʔ byšʔ mn symtʔ byštʔ dblbh mpq byštʔ mn twtry lbʔ gyr mmlln spwtʔ
06:46	mnʔ qryn ʔntwn ly mry mry wmdm dʔmr ʔnʔ lʔ ʕbdyn ʔntwn
06:47	kl ʔnš dʔtʔ lwty wšmʕ mly wʕbd lhyn ʔḥwykwn lmnʔ dmʔ
06:48	dmʔ lgbrʔ dbnʔ bytʔ wḥpr wʕmq wsm štʔsʔ ʕl šwʕʔ kd hwʔ dyn mlʔʔ ʔtṭry mlʔʔ bbytʔ hw wlʔ ʔškḥ dnzyʕywhy symʔ hwt gyr štʔsth ʕl šwʕʔ
06:49	whw dšmʕ wlʔ ʕbd dmʔ lgbrʔ dbnʔ byth ʕl ʕprʔ dlʔ štʔstʔ wkd ʔtṭry bh nhrʔ br šʕth npl whwt mpwlth rbʔ dbytʔ hw
07:01	wkd šlm mlʔ klhyn lmšmʕth dʕmʔ ʕl yšwʕ lkprnḥwm
07:02	ʕbdh dyn dqnṭrwnʔ ḥd ʕbyd hwʔ byšʔyt ʔynʔ dyqyr hwʔ ʕlwhy wqryb hwʔ lmmt
07:03	wšmʕ ʕl yšwʕ wšdr lwth qšyšʔ dyhwdyʔ wbʕʔ hwʔ mnh ʔyk dnʔtʔ nḥʔ lʕbdh
07:04	hnwn dyn kd ʔtw lwt yšwʕ bʕyn hww mnh bṭylʔyt wʔmryn šwʔ hw dtʕbd lh hdʔ
07:05	rḥm gyr lʕmn wʔp byt knwštʔ hw bnʔ ln
07:06	yšwʕ dyn ʔzl hwʔ ʕmhwn kd dyn lʔ sgy rḥyq mn bytʔ šdr lwth qnṭrwnʔ rḥmwhy wʔmr lh mry lʔ tʕml lʔ gyr šwʔ ʔnʔ dtʕwl tḥyt mṭlly
07:07	mṭl hw ʔnʔ lʔ šwyt dlwtk ʔtʔ ʔlʔ ʔmr bmltʔ wntʔsʔ ṭlyy 
07:08	ʔp ʔnʔ gyr gbrʔ ʔnʔ dmšʕbd ʔnʔ tḥyt šwlṭnʔ wʔyt tḥyt ʔydy ʔsṭrṭywṭʔ wʔmr ʔnʔ lhnʔ dzl wʔzl wlʔḥrnʔ dtʔ wʔtʔ wlʕbdy ʕbd hdʔ wʕbd
07:09	kd šmʕ dyn yšwʕ hlyn ʔtdmr bh wʔtpny wʔmr lknšʔ dʔtʔ btrh ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dʔp lʔ byt ʔysryl ʔškḥt ʔyk hdʔ hymnwtʔ
07:10	whpkw hnwn dʔštdrw lbytʔ wʔškḥw lʕbdʔ hw dkryh hwʔ kd ḥlym
07:11	whwʔ lywmʔ dbtrh ʔzl hwʔ lmdyntʔ dšmh nʔyn wtlmydwhy ʕmh wknšʔ sgyʔʔ
07:12	wkd qrb ltrʕʔ dmdyntʔ ḥzʔ kd mlwyn mytʔ dyḥydyʔ hwʔ lʔmh why ʔmh ʔrmltʔ hwt wknšʔ sgyʔʔ dbny mdyntʔ ʕmh
07:13	ḥzh dyn yšwʕ wʔtrḥm ʕlyh wʔmr lh lʔ tbkyn
07:14	wʔzl qrb lʕrsʔ whnwn dšqylyn hww lh qmw wʔmr ʕlymʔ lk ʔmr ʔnʔ qwm
07:15	wytb hw mytʔ wšry lmmllw wyhbh lʔmh
07:16	wʔḥdt dḥltʔ lʔnšʔ klhwn wmšbḥyn hww lʔlhʔ wʔmryn dnbyʔ rbʔ qm bn wsʕr ʔlhʔ lʕmh
07:17	wnpqt ʕlwhy mltʔ hdʔ bklh yhwd wbklh ʔtrʔ dḥdryhwn
07:18	wʔštʕyw lywḥnn tlmydwhy hlyn klhyn
07:19	wqrʔ ywḥnn ltryn mn tlmydwhy wšdr ʔnwn lwt yšwʕ wʔmr ʔnt hw hw dʔtʔ ʔw lʔḥryn hw mskyn ḥnn
07:20	wʔtw lwt yšwʕ wʔmryn lh ywḥnn mʕmdnʔ šdrn lwtk wʔmr ʔnt hw hw dʔtʔ ʔw lʔḥryn hw mskyn ḥnn
07:21	bh dyn bhy šʕtʔ sgyʔʔ ʔsy mn kwrhnʔ wmn mḥwtʔ wmn rwḥʔ byštʔ wlsgyʔʔ smyʔ yhb hwʔ lmḥzʔ
07:22	wʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn zlw ʔmrw lywḥnn kl mdm dḥzytwn wšmʕtwn dsmyʔ ḥzyn wḥgyrʔ mhlkyn wgrbʔ mtdkyn wḥršʔ šmʕyn wmytʔ qymyn wmsknʔ mstbryn
07:23	wṭwbwhy lmn dlʔ ntkšl by
07:24	kd dyn ʔzlw tlmydwhy dywḥnn šry lmʔmr lknšʔ ʕl ywḥnn mnʔ npqtwn lḥwrbʔ lmḥzʔ qnyʔ dmn rwḥʔ mttzyʕ
07:25	wʔlʔ mnʔ npqtwn lmḥzʔ gbrʔ dnḥtʔ rkykʔ lbyš hʔ ʔylyn dblbwšʔ mšbḥʔ wbpwnqʔ ʔytyhwn byt mlkʔ ʔnwn
07:26	wʔlʔ mnʔ npqtwn lmḥzʔ nbyʔ ʔyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn wytyr mn nbyʔ
07:27	hnw dʕlwhy ktyb dhʔ ʔnʔ mšdr ʔnʔ mlʔky qdm prṣwpk dntqn ʔwrḥʔ qdmyk
07:28	ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dlyt nbyʔ bylydy nšʔ drb mn ywḥnn mʕmdnʔ zʕwrʔ dyn bmlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ rb hw mnh
07:29	wklh ʕmʔ dšmʕw ʔp mksʔ zdqw lʔlhʔ dʕmdw mʕmwdyth dywḥnn
07:30	pryšʔ dyn wsprʔ ṭlmw bnpšhwn ṣbynʔ dʔlhʔ dlʔ ʔtʕmdw mnh
07:31	lmn hkyl ʔdmʔ lʔnšʔ dšrbtʔ hdʔ wlmn dmyn
07:32	dmyn lṭlyʔ dytbyn bšwqʔ wqʕyn lḥbryhwn wʔmryn zmrn lkwn wlʔ rqdtwn wʔlyn lkwn wlʔ bkytwn
07:33	ʔtʔ gyr ywḥnn mʕmdnʔ lʔ ʔkl lḥmʔ wlʔ štʔ ḥmrʔ wʔmryn ʔntwn šʔdʔ ʔyt bh
07:34	ʔtʔ brh dʔnšʔ ʔkl wštʔ wʔmryn ʔntwn hʔ gbrʔ ʔkwlʔ wštʔ ḥmrʔ wrḥmʔ dmksʔ wdḥṭyʔ
07:35	wʔzddqt ḥkmtʔ mn klhwn bnyh
07:36	ʔtʔ dyn bʕʔ mnh ḥd mn pryšʔ dnlʕs ʕmh wʕl lbyth dpryšʔ hw wʔstmk
07:37	wʔnttʔ ḥṭytʔ ʔyt hwt bmdyntʔ hy wkd ydʕt dbbyth dpryšʔ hw smyk nsbt šṭyptʔ dbsmʔ
07:38	wqmt bstrh lwt rglwhy wbkyʔ hwt wšryt bdmʕyh mṣbʕʔ rglwhy wbsʕrʔ dršh mšwyn lhyn wmnšqʔ hwt rglwhy wmšḥʔ bsmʔ
07:39	kd ḥzʔ dyn pryšʔ hw dqryhy ʔtḥšb bnpšh wʔmr hnʔ ʔlw nbyʔ hwʔ ydʕ hwʔ mn hy wmʔ ṭbh dḥṭytʔ hy ʔnttʔ hy dqrbt lh
07:40	ʕnʔ dyn yšwʕ wʔmr lh šmʕwn mdm ʔyt ly dʔmr lk hw dyn ʔmr lh ʔmr rby ʔmr lh yšwʕ
07:41	tryn ḥybʔ ʔyt hww lḥd mrʔ ḥwbʔ ḥd ḥyb hwʔ dynrʔ ḥmšmʔʔ wʔḥrnʔ dynrʔ ḥmšyn
07:42	wdlyt hwʔ lhwn lmprʕ ltryhwn šbq ʔynʔ hkyl mnhwn ytyr nḥbywhy
07:43	ʕnʔ šmʕwn wʔmr sbr ʔnʔ dhw dʔštbq lh sgy ʔmr lh yšwʕ tryṣʔyt dnt
07:44	wʔtpny lwt hy ʔnttʔ wʔmr lšmʕwn ḥzʔ ʔnt ʔnttʔ hdʔ lbytk ʕlt myʔ lrgly lʔ yhbt hdʔ dyn bdmʕyh rgly ṣbʕt wbsʕrh šwyt ʔnyn
07:45	ʔnt lʔ nšqtny hdʔ dyn hʔ mn dʕlt lʔ šlyt rgly lmnšqw
07:46	ʔnt mšḥʔ lršy lʔ mšḥt hdʔ dyn bmšḥʔ dbsmʔ rgly mšḥt
07:47	ḥlp hdʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lk dšbyqyn lh ḥṭhyh sgyʔʔ mṭl dʔḥbt sgy hw dyn dqlyl mštbq lh qlyl mḥb
07:48	wʔmr lhy ʔnttʔ šbyqyn lky ḥṭhyky
07:49	šryw dyn hnwn dsmykyn ʔmryn bnpšhwn mnw hnʔ dʔp ḥṭhʔ šbq
07:50	yšwʕ dyn ʔmr lhy ʔnttʔ hymnwtky ʔḥytky zly bšlmʔ
08:01	whwʔ mn btr hlyn mtkrk hwʔ yšwʕ bmdyntʔ wbqwryʔ wmkrz hwʔ wmsbr mlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ wtrʕsrth ʕmh
08:02	wnšʔ hlyn dʔtʔsy mn kwrhnʔ wmn rwḥʔ byštʔ mrym dmtqryʔ mgdlytʔ hy dšbʕʔ šʔdyn npqw mnh
08:03	wywḥn ʔntt kwzʔ rbyth dhrwds wšwšn wʔḥrnytʔ sgyʔtʔ ʔylyn dmšmšn hwy lhwn mn qnynyhyn 
08:04	wkd knšʔ sgyʔʔ knš hwʔ wmn kl mdynn ʔtyn hww lwth ʔmr bmtlʔ
08:05	npq zrwʕʔ lmzrʕ zrʕh wkd zrʕ ʔyt dnpl ʕl yd ʔwrḥʔ wʔtdyš wʔklth prḥtʔ
08:06	wʔḥrnʔ npl ʕl šwʕʔ wbr šʕth yʕʔ wdlyt hwʔ lh tlylwtʔ ybš
08:07	wʔḥrnʔ npl byt kwbʔ wyʕw ʕmh kwbʔ wḥnqwhy
08:08	wʔḥrnʔ npl bʔrʕʔ ṭbtʔ wšpyrtʔ wyʕʔ wʕbd pʔrʔ ḥd bmʔʔ hlyn kd ʔmr qʕʔ hwʔ dmn dʔyt lh ʔdnʔ dnšmʕ nšmʕ
08:09	wšʔlwhy tlmydwhy dmnw mtlʔ hnʔ
08:10	hw dyn ʔmr lhwn lkwn hw yhyb lmdʕ ʔrzʔ dmlkwth dʔlhʔ lhnwn dyn šrkʔ bplʔtʔ mtʔmr dkd ḥzyn lʔ nḥzwn wkd šmʕyn lʔ nstklwn
08:11	hnw dyn mtlʔ zrʕʔ ʔytwhy mltʔ dʔlhʔ
08:12	hnwn dyn dʕl yd ʔwrḥʔ ʔytyhwn hnwn dšmʕyn mltʔ wʔtʔ bʕldbbʔ šql mltʔ mn lbhwn dlʔ nhymnwn wnḥwn
08:13	hlyn dyn dʕl šwʕʔ hlyn ʔnwn dmʔ dšmʕw bḥdwtʔ mqblyn lh lmltʔ wʕqrʔ lyt lhwn ʔlʔ dzbnʔ hy hymnwthwn wbzbn nsywnʔ mtkšlyn
08:14	hw dyn dnpl byt kwbʔ hlyn ʔnwn ʔylyn dšmʕyn mltʔ wbṣptʔ wbʕwtrʔ wbrgygth dʕlmʔ mtḥnqyn wpʔrʔ lʔ yhbyn
08:15	hw dyn dbʔrʕʔ ṭbtʔ hlyn ʔnwn ʔylyn dblbʔ špyʔ wṭbʔ šmʕyn mltʔ wʔḥdyn wyhbyn pʔrʔ bmsybrnwtʔ
08:16	lʔ ʔnš mnhr šrgʔ wmḥpʔ lh bmʔnʔ ʔw sʔm lh tḥyt ʕrsʔ ʔlʔ sʔm lh lʕl mn mnrtʔ dkl dʕʔl nḥzʔ nwhrh
08:17	lyt gyr mdm dksʔ dlʔ ntglʔ wlʔ dmṭšy dlʔ ntydʕ wnʔtʔ lglyʔ
08:18	ḥzw ʔyknʔ šmʕtwn mn dʔyt lh gyr ntyhb lh wmn dlyt lh ʔp hw dsbr dʔyt lh nštql mnh
08:19	ʔtw dyn lwth ʔmh wʔḥwhy wlʔ mškḥyn hww dnmllwn ʕmh mṭl knšʔ
08:20	wʔmrw lh ʔmk wʔḥyk qymyn lbr wṣbyn lmḥzyk
08:21	hw dyn ʕnʔ wʔmr lhwn hlyn ʔnwn ʔmy wʔḥy ʔylyn dšmʕyn mltʔ dʔlhʔ wʕbdyn lh
08:22	hwʔ dyn bḥd mn ywmtʔ slq yšwʕ ytb bspyntʔ hw wtlmydwhy wʔmr lhwn nʕbr lhw ʕbrʔ dymtʔ
08:23	wkd rdyn dmk lh hw yšwʕ whwt ʕlʕlʔ drwḥʔ bymtʔ wqrybʔ hwt spyntʔ lmṭbʕ
08:24	wqrbw ʔʕyrwhy wʔmryn lh rbn rbn ʔbdynn hw dyn qm wkʔʔ brwḥʔ wbmḥšwlʔ dymʔ wnḥw whwʔ šlyʔ
08:25	wʔmr lhwn ʔykʔ hy hymnwtkwn hnwn dyn kd dḥylyn mtdmryn hww wʔmryn ḥd lḥd mnw ky hnʔ dʔp lrwḥʔ pqd wlmḥšwlʔ wlymʔ wmštmʕyn lh
08:26	wrdw wʔtw lʔtrʔ dgdryʔ dʔytwhy bʕbrʔ lwqbl glylʔ
08:27	wkd npq lʔrʕʔ pgʕ bh gbrʔ ḥd mn mdyntʔ dʔyt bh dywʔ mn zbnʔ sgyʔʔ wmʔnʔ lʔ lbš hwʔ wbbytʔ lʔ ʕmr hwʔ ʔlʔ bbyt qbwrʔ
08:28	kd ḥzʔ dyn lyšwʕ qʕʔ wnpl qdmwhy wbqlʔ rmʔ ʔmr mʔ ln wlk yšwʕ brh dʔlhʔ mrymʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnk lʔ tšnqny
08:29	pqd hwʔ lh gyr yšwʕ lrwḥʔ ṭnpʔ lmpq mn brnšʔ sgy hwʔ gyr zbnʔ mn dšbʔ hwʔ lh wmtʔsr hwʔ bššltʔ wbkblʔ mtnṭr hwʔ wmpsq hwʔ ʔswrwhy wmtdbr hwʔ mn šʔdʔ lḥwrbʔ
08:30	šʔlh dyn yšwʕ mn šmk ʔmr lh lgywn mṭl ddywʔ sgyʔʔ ʕlylyn hww bh
08:31	wbʕyn hww mnh dlʔ npqwd lhwn lmʔzl lthwmʔ
08:32	ʔyt hwʔ dyn tmn bqrʔ dḥzyrʔ sgyʔʔ drʕyʔ bṭwrʔ wbʕyn hww mnh dnps lhwn dbḥzyrʔ nʕlwn wʔps lhwn
08:33	wnpqw šʔdʔ mn gbrʔ wʕlw bḥzyrʔ wtrṣt bqrʔ hy klh lšqypʔ wnplw bymtʔ wʔtḥnqw
08:34	kd ḥzw dyn rʕwtʔ mdm dhwʔ ʕrqw wʔštʕyw bmdyntʔ wbqwryʔ
08:35	wnpqw ʔnšʔ dnḥzwn mdm dhwʔ wʔtw lwt yšwʕ wʔškḥwhy lgbrʔ hw dnpqw šʔdwhy kd lbyš wmnkp wytb lwt rglwhy dyšwʕ wdḥlw
08:36	wʔštʕyw lhwn ʔylyn dḥzw ʔyknʔ ʔtʔsy gbrʔ hw dywnʔ
08:37	wbʕyn hww mnh klh knšʔ dgdryʔ dnʔzl lh mn lwthwn mṭl ddḥltʔ rbtʔ ʔḥdt ʔnwn hw dyn yšwʕ slq lspyntʔ whpk mn lwthwn
08:38	hw dyn gbrʔ dnpqw mnh šʔdʔ bʕʔ hwʔ mnh dlwth nhwʔ wšryhy yšwʕ wʔmr lh
08:39	hpwk lbytk wʔštʕʔ mdm dʕbd lk ʔlhʔ wʔzl wmkrz hwʔ bklh mdyntʔ mdm dʕbd lh yšwʕ
08:40	kd hpk dyn yšwʕ qblh knšʔ sgyʔʔ klhwn gyr lh ḥyryn hww
08:41	wgbrʔ ḥd dšmh ywʔrš ryš knwštʔ npl qdm rglwhy dyšwʕ wbʕʔ hwʔ mnh dnʕwl lbyth
08:42	brtʔ gyr yḥydytʔ ʔyt hwt lh ʔyk brt šnyn trtʕsrʔ wqrybʔ hwt lmmt wkd ʔzl ʕmh hw yšwʕ knšʔ sgyʔʔ ḥbṣ hwʔ lh
08:43	ʔnttʔ dyn ḥdʔ dtryʕ hwʔ dmh šnyn trtʕsrʔ hy dbyt ʔswtʔ klh qnynh ʔpqt wlʔ ʔškḥt dmn ʔnš ttʔsʔ
08:44	ʔtqrbt mn bstrh wqrbt lknpʔ dmʔnh wmḥdʔ qmt mrdytʔ ddmh
08:45	wʔmr yšwʕ mnw qrb ly wkd klhwn kpryn ʔmr lh šmʕwn kʔpʔ wdʕmh rbn knšʔ ʔlṣyn lk wḥbṣyn wʔmr ʔnt mnw qrb ly
08:46	hw dyn ʔmr ʔnš qrb ly ʔnʔ gyr ydʕt dḥylʔ npq mny
08:47	hy dyn ʔnttʔ kd ḥzt dlʔ ṭʕth ʔtt kd rtytʔ wnplt sgdt lh wʔmrt lʕyn ʕmʔ klh mṭl ʔydʔ ʕltʔ qrbt wʔyknʔ mḥdʔ ʔtʔsyt
08:48	hw dyn yšwʕ ʔmr lh ʔtlbby brty hymnwtky ʔḥytky zly bšlmʔ 
08:49	wʕd hw mmll ʔtʔ ʔnš mn dbyt rb knwštʔ wʔmr lh mytt lh brtk lʔ tʕml lmlpnʔ
08:50	yšwʕ dyn šmʕ wʔmr lʔbwh dṭlytʔ lʔ tdḥl blḥwd hymn wḥyʔ
08:51	ʔtʔ dyn yšwʕ lbytʔ wlʔ šbq lʔnš dnʕwl ʕmh ʔlʔ lšmʕwn wlyʕqwb wlywḥnn wlʔbwh dṭlytʔ wlʔmh
08:52	klhwn dyn bkyn hww wmrqdyn ʕlyh yšwʕ dyn ʔmr lʔ tbkwn lʔ gyr mytt ʔlʔ dmkʔ hy
08:53	wgḥkyn hww ʕlwhy dydʕyn dmytt lh
08:54	hw dyn ʔpq lklnš lbr wʔḥdh bʔydh wqrh wʔmr ṭlytʔ qwmy
08:55	whpkt rwḥh wmḥdʔ qmt wpqd dntlwn lh lmʔkl
08:56	wtmhw ʔbhyh hw dyn zhr ʔnwn dlʔnš lʔ nʔmrwn mʔ dhwʔ
09:01	wqrʔ yšwʕ ltrʕsrth wyhb lhwn ḥylʔ wšwlṭnʔ ʕl klhwn šʔdʔ wkwrhnʔ lmʔsyw
09:02	wšdr ʔnwn lmkrzw mlkwth dʔlhʔ wlmʔsyw kryhʔ
09:03	wʔmr lhwn mdm lʔ tšqlwn lʔwrḥʔ lʔ šbṭʔ wlʔ trmlʔ wlʔ lḥmʔ wlʔ kspʔ wlʔ trtyn kwtynyn nhwyn lkwn
09:04	wlʔynʔ bytʔ dʕʔlyn ʔntwn lh tmn hww wmn tmn pwqw
09:05	wlmn dlʔ mqblyn lkwn mʔ dnpqyn ʔntwn mn mdyntʔ hy ʔp ḥlʔ mn rglykwn pṣw ʕlyhwn lshdwtʔ
09:06	wnpqw šlyḥʔ wmtkrkyn hww bqwryʔ wbmdyntʔ wmsbryn hww wmʔsyn bkl dwk
09:07	šmʕ dyn hrwds ṭṭrrkʔ klhyn dhwyn hwy bʔydh wmtdmr hwʔ mṭl dʔmryn hww ʔnšyn dywḥnn qm mn byt mytʔ
09:08	ʔḥrnʔ dyn ʔmryn hww dʔlyʔ ʔtḥzy wʔḥrnʔ dnbyʔ mn nbyʔ qdmyʔ qm
09:09	wʔmr hrwds ršh dywḥnn ʔnʔ psqt mnw dyn hnʔ dhlyn šmʕ ʔnʔ ʕlwhy wṣbʔ hwʔ dnḥzywhy
09:10	wkd hpkw šlyḥʔ ʔštʕyw lyšwʕ klmdm dʕbdw wdbr ʔnwn blḥwdyhwn lʔtrʔ ḥwrbʔ dbyt ṣydʔ
09:11	knšʔ dyn kd ydʕw ʔzlw btrh wqbl ʔnwn wmmll hwʔ ʕmhwn ʕl mlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ wlʔylyn dsnyqyn hww ʕl ʔsywtʔ mʔsʔ hwʔ
09:12	kd dyn šry ywmʔ lmṣlʔ qrbw tlmydwhy wʔmryn lh šry lknšʔ dnʔzlwn lqwryʔ dḥdryn wlkprwnʔ dnšrwn bhwn wnškḥwn lhwn sybrtʔ mṭl dbʔtrʔ ḥwrbʔ ʔytyn
09:13	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ hbw lhwn ʔntwn lmʔkl hnwn dyn ʔmryn lyt ln ytyr mn ḥmšʔ lḥmyn wtryn nwnyn ʔlʔ ʔn ʔzlnn wzbnn sybrtʔ lhnʔ klh ʕmʔ
09:14	hwyn hww gyr ʔyk ḥmšʔ ʔlpyn gbryn ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔsmkw ʔnwn smkʔ ḥmšyn ʔnšyn bsmkʔ
09:15	wʕbdw hkwt tlmydʔ wʔsmkw lklhwn
09:16	wnsb yšwʕ hnwn ḥmšʔ lḥmyn wtryn nwnyn wḥr bšmyʔ wbrk wqṣʔ wyhb ltlmydwhy dnsymwn lknšʔ
09:17	wʔklw klhwn wsbʕw wšqlw qṣyʔ mdm dʔwtrw trʕsr qwpynyn
09:18	wkd mṣlʔ blḥwdwhy wtlmydwhy ʕmh šʔl ʔnwn wʔmr mnw ʔmryn ʕly knšʔ dʔyty
09:19	ʕnw wʔmryn lh dywḥnn mʕmdnʔ wʔḥrnʔ dʔlyʔ ʔḥrnʔ dyn dnbyʔ ḥd mn nbyʔ qdmyʔ qm
09:20	ʔmr lhwn ʔntwn dyn mnw ʔmryn ʔntwn dʔyty ʕnʔ šmʕwn wʔmr mšyḥh dʔlhʔ
09:21	hw dyn kʔʔ bhwn wzhr ʔnwn dhdʔ lʔnš lʔ nʔmrwn
09:22	wʔmr lhwn dʕtyd hw brh dʔnšʔ dsgyʔtʔ nḥš wdnstlʔ mn qšyšʔ wrby khnʔ wsprʔ wnqṭlwnyhy wlywmʔ dtltʔ nqwm
09:23	wʔmr hwʔ qdm klnš mn dṣbʔ dnʔtʔ btry nkpwr bnpšh wnšqwl zqyph klywm wnʔtʔ btry
09:24	mn gyr dṣbʔ dnpšh nḥʔ mwbd lh mn dyn dnwbd npšh mṭlty hnʔ mḥʔ lh
09:25	mnʔ gyr ntʕdr br ʔnšʔ dnʔtr ʕlmʔ klh npšh dyn nwbd ʔw nḥsr
09:26	mn dnbht by dyn wbmly nbht bh brh dʔnšʔ mʔ dʔtʔ bšwbḥʔ dʔbwhy ʕm mlʔkwhy qdyšʔ
09:27	šrrʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dʔyt ʔnšʔ dqymyn hrkʔ dlʔ nṭʕmwn mwtʔ ʕdmʔ dnḥzwn mlkwth dʔlhʔ
09:28	hwʔ dyn btr mlʔ hlyn ʔyk tmnyʔ ywmyn dbr yšwʕ lšmʕwn wlyʕqwb wlywḥnn wslq lṭwrʔ lmṣlyw
09:29	wkd hw mṣlʔ ʔtḥlp ḥzwʔ dʔpwhy wnḥtwhy ḥwrw wmbrqyn hww
09:30	whʔ tryn gbryn mmllyn hww ʕmh dʔytyhwn mwšʔ wʔlyʔ
09:31	dʔtḥzyw btšbwḥtʔ ʔmryn hww dyn ʕl mpqnh dʕtyd hwʔ dnštlm bʔwršlm
09:32	wyqrw hww lhwn bšntʔ šmʕwn whnwn dʕmh wlmḥsn ʔttʕyrw wḥzw šwbḥh wlhnwn tryn ʔnšyn dqymyn hww lwth 
09:33	wkd šryw lmprš mnh ʔmr šmʕwn lyšwʕ rby špyr hw ln dhrkʔ nhwʔ wnʕbd tlt mṭlyn lk ḥdʔ wlmwšʔ ḥdʔ wlʔlyʔ ḥdʔ wlʔ ydʕ hwʔ mnʔ ʔmr
09:34	wkd ʔmr hlyn hwt ʕnnʔ wʔṭlt ʕlyhwn wdḥlw kd ḥzw lmwšʔ wlʔlyʔ dʕlw bʕnnʔ
09:35	wqlʔ hwʔ mn ʕnnʔ dʔmr hnw bry ḥbybʔ lh šmʕw
09:36	wkd hwʔ qlʔ ʔštkḥ yšwʕ blḥwdwhy whnwn štqw wlʔnš lʔ ʔmrw bhnwn ywmtʔ mdm dḥzw
09:37	whwʔ lywmʔ dbtrh kd nḥtyn mn ṭwrʔ pgʕ bhwn knšʔ sgyʔʔ
09:38	wgbrʔ ḥd mn knšʔ hw qʕʔ wʔmr mlpnʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnk ʔtpny ʕly bry dyḥydyʔ hw ly
09:39	wrwḥʔ ʕdyʔ ʕlwhy wmn šlyʔ qʕʔ wmḥrq šnwhy wmrʕt wlmḥsn prqʔ mnh mʔ dšḥqth
09:40	wbʕyt mn tlmydyk dnpqwnyhy wlʔ ʔškḥw
09:41	ʕnʔ dyn yšwʕ wʔmr ʔwn šrbtʔ dlʔ mhymnʔ wmʕqltʔ ʕdmʔ lʔmty ʔhwʔ lwtkwn wʔsybrkwn qrbyhy lkʔ lbrk
09:42	wkd mqrb lh ʔrmyh dywʔ hw wmʕsh wkʔʔ yšwʕ brwḥʔ hy ṭnptʔ wʔsyh lṭlyʔ wyhbh lʔbwhy
09:43	wʔtdmrw klhwn brbwth dʔlhʔ wkd klnš mtdmr hwʔ ʕlkl kl dʕbd yšwʕ ʔmr ltlmydwhy
09:44	symw ʔntwn mlʔ hlyn bʔdnykwn brh gyr dʔnšʔ ʕtyd dnštlm bʔydy bny ʔnšʔ
09:45	hnwn dyn lʔ ʔštwdʕwh lmltʔ hdʔ mṭl dmksyʔ hwt mnhwn dlʔ ndʕwnh wdḥlyn hww dnšʔlwnyhy ʕlyh ʕl mltʔ hdʔ
09:46	wʕlt bhwn mḥšbtʔ dmnw ky rb bhwn
09:47	yšwʕ dyn ydʕ mḥšbtʔ dlbhwn wnsb ṭlyʔ wʔqymh lwth
09:48	wʔmr lhwn mn dmqbl ṭlyʔ ʔyk hnʔ bšmy ly hw mqbl wmn dly mqbl mqbl lmn dšdrny ʔynʔ gyr dzʕwr bklkwn hnʔ nhwʔ rb
09:49	wʕnʔ ywḥnn wʔmr rbn ḥzyn ʔnš dmpq dywʔ bšmk wklynyhy ʕl dlʔ ʔtʔ ʕmn btrk
09:50	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ lʔ tklwn mn gyr dlʔ hwʔ lwqblkwn ḥlpykwn hw
09:51	whwʔ dkd mtmlyn ywmtʔ dswlqh ʔtqn prṣwph dnʔzl lʔwršlm
09:52	wšdr mlʔkʔ qdm prṣwph wʔzlw ʕlw lqrytʔ dšmryʔ ʔyk dntqnwn lh
09:53	wlʔ qblwhy mṭl dprṣwph lʔwršlm sym hwʔ lmʔzl
09:54	wkd ḥzw yʕqwb wywḥnn tlmydwhy ʔmryn lh mrn ṣbʔ ʔnt dnʔmr wtḥwt nwrʔ mn šmyʔ wtsyp ʔnwn ʔyk dʔp ʔlyʔ ʕbd
09:55	wʔtpny wkʔʔ bhwn wʔmr lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn dʔydʔ ʔntwn rwḥʔ
09:56	brh gyr dʔnšʔ lʔ ʔtʔ lmwbdw npštʔ ʔlʔ lmḥyw wʔzlw lhwn lqrytʔ ʔḥrtʔ
09:57	wkd ʔzlyn bʔwrḥʔ ʔmr lh ʔnš ʔtʔ btrk lʔtr dʔzl ʔnt mry
09:58	ʔmr lh yšwʕ ltʕlʔ nqʕʔ ʔyt lhwn wlprḥtʔ dšmyʔ mṭllʔ lbrh dyn dʔnšʔ lyt lh ʔykʔ dnsmwk ršh
09:59	wʔmr lʔḥrnʔ tʔ btry hw dyn ʔmr lh mry ʔps ly lwqdm ʔzl ʔqbwr ʔby
09:60	ʔmr lh yšwʕ šbwq mytʔ qbryn mytyhwn wʔnt zl sbr mlkwth dʔlhʔ
09:61	ʔmr lh ʔḥrnʔ ʔtʔ btrk mry lwqdm dyn ʔps ly ʔzl ʔšlm lbny byty wʔtʔ
09:62	ʔmr lh yšwʕ lʔ ʔnš rmʔ ʔydh ʕl ḥrbʔ dpdnʔ wḥʔr lbstrh wḥšḥ lmlkwth dʔlhʔ
10:01	btr hlyn prš yšwʕ mn tlmydwhy ʔḥrnʔ šbʕyn wšdr ʔnwn tryn tryn qdm prṣwph lkl ʔtr wmdynʔ dʕtyd hwʔ lmʔzl
10:02	wʔmr lhwn ḥṣdʔ sgy wpʕlʔ zʕwryn bʕw hkyl mn mrʔ ḥṣdʔ dnpq pʕlʔ lḥṣdh
10:03	zlw hʔ ʔnʔ mšdr ʔnʔ lkwn ʔyk ʔmrʔ byny dʔbʔ
10:04	lʔ tšqlwn lkwn kysʔ wlʔ trmlʔ wlʔ msnʔ wbšlmʔ dʔnš bʔwrḥʔ lʔ tšʔlwn
10:05	wlʔynʔ bytʔ dʕʔlyn ʔntwn lwqdm ʔmrw šlmʔ lbytʔ hnʔ
10:06	wʔn ʔyt tmn br šlmʔ nttnyḥ ʕlwhy šlmkwn ʔn dyn lʔ ʕlykwn nhpwk
10:07	bh dyn bbytʔ hww kd lʕsyn ʔntwn wštyn mn dylhwn šwʔ hw gyr pʕlʔ ʔgrh wlʔ tšnwn mn bytʔ lbytʔ
10:08	wlʔydʔ mdyntʔ dʕʔlyn ʔntwn wmqblyn lkwn lʕsw mdm dmttsym lkwn
10:09	wʔsw lʔylyn dkryhyn bh wʔmrw lhwn qrbt ʕlykwn mlkwth dʔlhʔ
10:10	lʔydʔ mdyntʔ dyn dʕʔlyn ʔntwn wlʔ nqblwnkwn pwqw lkwn lšwqʔ wʔmrw
10:11	wʔp ḥlʔ ddbq ln brglyn mn mdyntkwn npṣyn ḥnn lkwn brm hdʔ dʕw dqrbt lh ʕlykwn mlkwth dʔlhʔ
10:12	ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dlsdwm nhwʔ nyḥ bywmʔ hw ʔw lmdyntʔ hy
10:13	wy lky kwrzyn wy lky byt ṣydʔ dʔlw bṣwr wbṣydn hww ḥylʔ dhww bkyn kbr dyn bsqʔ wbqṭmʔ tbw
10:14	brm lṣwr wlṣydn nhwʔ nyḥ bdynʔ ʔw lkyn
10:15	wʔnty kprnḥwm hy dʕdmʔ lšmyʔ ʔttrymty ʕdmʔ lšywl ttḥtyn
10:16	mn dlkwn šmʕ ly šmʕ wmn dlkwn ṭlm ly hw ṭlm wmn dly ṭlm ṭlm lmn dšlḥny 
10:17	whpkw hnwn šbʕyn dšdr bḥdwtʔ rbtʔ wʔmryn lh mrn ʔp šʔdʔ mštʕbdyn ln bšmk
10:18	hw dyn ʔmr lhwn ḥzʔ hwyt lh lsṭnʔ dnpl ʔyk brqʔ mn šmyʔ
10:19	hʔ yhb ʔnʔ lkwn šwlṭnʔ dhwytwn dyšyn ḥwwtʔ wʕqrbʔ wklh ḥylh dbʕldbbʔ wmdm lʔ nhrkwn
10:20	brm bhdʔ lʔ tḥdwn dšʔdʔ mštʕbdyn lkwn ʔlʔ ḥdw dšmhykwn ʔtktbw bšmyʔ
10:21	bh bšʕtʔ rwz yšwʕ brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ wʔmr mwdʔ ʔnʔ lk ʔby mrʔ dšmyʔ wdʔrʕʔ dksyt hlyn mn ḥkymʔ wskwltnʔ wglyt ʔnyn lylwdʔ ʔyn ʔby dhknʔ hwʔ ṣbynʔ qdmyk
10:22	wʔtpny lwt tlmydwhy wʔmr lhwn kl mdm ʔštlm ly mn ʔby wlʔ ʔnš ydʕ mnw brʔ ʔlʔ ʔn ʔbʔ wmnw ʔbʔ ʔlʔ ʔn brʔ wlmn dʔn nṣbʔ brʔ dnglʔ
10:23	wʔtpny lwt tlmydwhy blḥwdyhwn wʔmr ṭwbyhyn lʕynʔ dḥzyn mdm dʔntwn ḥzyn
10:24	ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn gyr dnbyʔ sgyʔʔ wmlkʔ ṣbw dnḥzwn mdm dḥzyn ʔntwn wlʔ ḥzw wlmšmʕ mdm dʔntwn šmʕyn wlʔ šmʕw
10:25	whʔ sprʔ ḥd qm dnnsywhy wʔmr mlpnʔ mnʔ ʔʕbd dʔrt ḥyʔ dlʕlm
10:26	hw dyn yšwʕ ʔmr lh bnmwsʔ ʔyknʔ ktyb ʔyknʔ qrʔ ʔnt
10:27	ʕnʔ wʔmr lh dtrḥm lmryʔ ʔlhk mn klh lbk wmn klh npšk wmn klh ḥylk wmn klh rʕynk wlqrybk ʔyk npšk
10:28	ʔmr lh yšwʕ tryṣʔyt ʔmrt hdʔ ʕbd wtḥʔ
10:29	hw dyn kd ṣbʔ lmzdqw npšh ʔmr lh wmnw qryby
10:30	ʔmr lh yšwʕ gbrʔ ḥd nḥt hwʔ mn ʔwršlm lʔyryḥw wnplw ʕlwhy lsṭyʔ wšlḥwhy wmḥʔwhy wšbqwhy kd qlyl qymʔ bh npšʔ wʔzlw
10:31	wgdš khnʔ ḥd nḥt hwʔ bʔwrḥʔ hy wḥzyhy wʕbr
10:32	whknʔ ʔp lwyʔ ʔtʔ mṭʔ lhy dwktʔ wḥzyhy wʕbr
10:33	ʔnš dyn šmryʔ kd rdʔ hwʔ ʔtʔ ʔykʔ dʔytwhy hwʔ wḥzyhy wʔtrḥm ʕlwhy
10:34	wʔtqrb wʕṣb mḥwth wnṣl ʕlyhyn ḥmrʔ wmšḥʔ wsmh ʕl ḥmrh wʔytyh lpwtqʔ wʔtbṭl lh ʕlwhy
10:35	wlṣprh dywmʔ ʔpq tryn dynryn yhb lpwtqyʔ wʔmr lh yṣp dylh wʔn mdm ytyr tpq mʔ dhpk ʔnʔ yhb ʔnʔ lk
10:36	mnw hkyl mn hlyn tltʔ mtḥzʔ lk dhwʔ qrybʔ lhw dnpl bʔydy gysʔ
10:37	hw dyn ʔmr hw dʔtrḥm ʕlwhy ʔmr lh yšwʕ zl ʔp ʔnt hknʔ hwyt ʕbd
10:38	whwʔ dkd hnwn rdyn bʔwrḥʔ ʕl lqrytʔ ḥdʔ wʔnttʔ dšmh mrtʔ qblth bbyth
10:39	wʔyt hwt lh ḥtʔ dšmh mrym wʔtt ytbt lh lwt rglwhy dmrn wšmʕʔ hwt mlwhy
10:40	mrtʔ dyn ʕnyʔ hwt btšmštʔ sgyʔtʔ wʔtt ʔmrʔ lh mry lʔ bṭyl lk dḥty šbqtny blḥwdy lmšmšw ʔmr lh mʕdrʔ ly
10:41	ʕnʔ dyn yšwʕ wʔmr lh mrtʔ mrtʔ yṣpty wrhybty ʕl sgyʔtʔ
10:42	ḥdʔ hy dyn dmtbʕyʔ mrym dyn mntʔ ṭbtʔ gbt lh hy dlʔ ttnsb mnh
11:01	whwʔ dkd hw mṣlʔ bdwktʔ ḥdʔ kd šlm ʔmr lh ḥd mn tlmydwhy mrn ʔlpyn lmṣlyw ʔyknʔ dʔp ywḥnn ʔlp ltlmydwhy
11:02	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔmty dmṣlyn ʔntwn hknʔ hwytwn ʔmryn ʔbwn dbšmyʔ ntqdš šmk tʔtʔ mlkwtk nhwʔ ṣbynk ʔyk dbšmyʔ ʔp bʔrʕʔ
11:03	hb ln lḥmʔ dswnqnn klywm
11:04	wšbwq ln ḥṭhyn ʔp ʔnḥnn gyr šbqn lkl dḥybyn ln wlʔ tʕln lnsywnʔ ʔlʔ prwqyn mn byšʔ
11:05	wʔmr lhwn mnw mnkwn dʔyt lh rḥmʔ wnʔzl lwth bplgwt llyʔ wnʔmr lh rḥmy ʔšʔlyny tlt gryṣn
11:06	mṭl drḥmʔ ʔtʔ lwty mn ʔwrḥʔ wlyt ly mdm dʔsym lh
11:07	whw rḥmh mn lgw nʕnʔ wnʔmr lh lʔ thryny dhʔ trʕʔ ʔḥyd hw wbny ʕmy bʕrsʔ lʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ dʔqwm wʔtl lk
11:08	ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dʔn mṭl rḥmwtʔ lʔ ntl lh mṭl ḥṣypwth nqwm wntl lh kmʔ dmtbʕʔ lh
11:09	ʔp ʔnʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn šʔlw wntyhb lkwn bʕw wtškḥwn qwšw wntptḥ lkwn
11:10	kl gyr dšʔl nsb wdbʕʔ mškḥ wdnqš mtptḥ lh
11:11	ʔynʔ gyr mnkwn ʔbʔ dnšʔlywhy brh lḥmʔ lmʔ kʔpʔ mwšṭ lh wʔn nwnʔ nšʔlywhy lmʔ ḥlp nwnʔ ḥwyʔ mwšṭ lh
11:12	wʔn brtʔ nšʔlywhy lmʔ hw ʕqrbʔ mwšṭ lh
11:13	wʔn ʔntwn dbyšʔ ʔytykwn ydʕyn ʔntwn mwhbtʔ ṭbtʔ lmtl lbnykwn kmʔ ytyrʔyt ʔbwkwn mn šmyʔ ntl rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ lʔylyn dšʔlyn lh
11:14	wkd mpq šʔdʔ dʔytwhy ḥršʔ hwʔ dkd npq hw šʔdʔ mll hw ḥršʔ wʔtdmrw knšʔ
11:15	ʔnšʔ dyn mnhwn ʔmrw bbʕlzbwb ršʔ ddywʔ mpq hnʔ dywʔ
11:16	ʔḥrnʔ dyn kd mnsyn lh ʔtʔ mn šmyʔ šʔlyn hww lh
11:17	yšwʕ dyn dydʕ hwʔ mḥšbthwn ʔmr lhwn kl mlkw dttplg ʕl npšh tḥrb wbytʔ dʕl qnwmh mtplg npl
11:18	wʔn sṭnʔ ʕl npšh ʔtplg ʔyknʔ tqwm mlkwth dʔmryn ʔntwn dbbʕlzbwb mpq ʔnʔ dywʔ
11:19	wʔn ʔnʔ bbʕlzbwb mpq ʔnʔ dywʔ bnykwn bmnʔ mpqyn mṭl hnʔ hnwn nhwwn lkwn dynʔ
11:20	ʔn dyn bṣbʕʔ dʔlhʔ mpq ʔnʔ dywʔ qrbt lh ʕlykwn mlkwth dʔlhʔ
11:21	ʔmty dḥsynʔ kd mzyn nṭr drth bšynʔ hw qnynh
11:22	ʔn dyn nʔtʔ mn dḥsyn mnh nzkywhy klh zynh šql hw dtkyl hwʔ ʕlwhy wbzth mplg 
11:23	mn dlʔ hwʔ ʕmy lwqbly hw wmn dlʔ knš ʕmy mbdrw mbdr
11:24	rwḥʔ ṭnptʔ mʔ dnpqt mn br ʔnšʔ ʔzlʔ mtkrkʔ bʔtrwtʔ dmyʔ lyt bhwn dtbʕʔ lh nyḥʔ wmʔ dlʔ ʔškḥt ʔmrʔ ʔhpwk lbyty ʔymkʔ dnpqt
11:25	wʔn ʔtt ʔškḥth dḥmym wmṣbt
11:26	hydyn ʔzlʔ dbrʔ šbʕ rwḥyn ʔḥrnyn dbyšn mnh wʕʔln wʕmrn tmn whwyʔ ḥrth dbrnšʔ hw byšʔ mn qdmyth
11:27	wkd hlyn mmll hwʔ ʔrymt ʔnttʔ ḥdʔ qlh mn knšʔ wʔmrt lh ṭwbyh lkrsʔ dṭʕntk wltdyʔ dʔynqwk
11:28	ʔmr lh hw ṭwbyhwn lʔylyn dšmʕw mlth dʔlhʔ wnṭryn lh
11:29	wkd mtknšyn hww knšʔ šry lmʔmr šrbtʔ hdʔ byštʔ ʔtʔ bʕyʔ wʔtʔ lʔ ttyhb lh ʔlʔ ʔth dywnn nbyʔ
11:30	ʔyknʔ gyr dhwʔ ywnn ʔtʔ lnynwyʔ hknʔ nhwʔ ʔp brh dʔnšʔ lšrbtʔ hdʔ
11:31	mlktʔ dtymnʔ tqwm bdynʔ ʕm ʔnšʔ dšrbtʔ hdʔ wtḥyb ʔnwn dʔtt mn ʕbryh dʔrʕʔ dtšmʕ ḥkmth dšlymwn whʔ dytyr mn šlymwn hrkʔ
11:32	gbrʔ nynwyʔ nqwmwn bdynʔ ʕm šrbtʔ hdʔ wnḥybwnh dtbw bkrwzwth dywnn whʔ dytyr mn ywnn hrkʔ
11:33	lʔ ʔnš mnhr šrgʔ wsʔm lh bksyʔ ʔw tḥyt sʔtʔ ʔlʔ lʕl mn mnrtʔ dʔylyn dʕʔlyn nḥzwn nwhrh
11:34	šrgh dpgrk ʔytyh ʕynk ʔmty hkyl dʕynk pšyṭʔ ʔp klh pgrk nhwʔ nhyr ʔn dyn thwʔ byšʔ wʔp pgrk nhwʔ ḥšwk
11:35	ʔzdhr hkyl dlmʔ nwhrʔ dbk ḥšwkʔ hw
11:36	ʔn dyn pgrk klh nhyr wlyt bh mntʔ mdm ḥšwkʔ nhwʔ mnhr klh ʔyk dšrgʔ bdlqh mnhr lk
11:37	kd dyn mmll bʕʔ mnh pryšʔ ḥd dnštrʔ lwth wʕl ʔstmk
11:38	hw dyn pryšʔ kd ḥzyhy ʔtdmr dlʔ lwqdm ʕmd mn qdm šrwth
11:39	ʔmr lh dyn yšwʕ hšʔ ʔntwn pryšʔ brh dksʔ wdpynkʔ mdkyn ʔntwn lgw mnkwn dyn mlʔ ḥṭwpyʔ wbyštʔ
11:40	ḥsyry rʕynʔ lʔ hwʔ mn dʕbd dlbr wdlgw hw ʕbd
11:41	brm mdm dʔyt hbwhy bzdqtʔ whʔ klmdm dkʔ hw lkwn
11:42	ʔlʔ wy lkwn pryšʔ dmʕsryn ʔntwn nnʕʔ wpgnʔ wkl ywrq wʕbryn ʔntwn ʕl dynʔ wʕl ḥwbʔ dʔlhʔ hlyn dyn wlʔ hwʔ dtʕbdwn whlyn lʔ tšbqwn
11:43	wy lkwn pryšʔ drḥmyn ʔntwn ryš mwtbʔ bknwštʔ wšlmʔ bšwqʔ
11:44	wy lkwn sprʔ wpryšʔ nsby bʔpʔ dʔytykwn ʔyk qbrʔ dlʔ ydyʕyn wbny ʔnšʔ mhlkyn ʕlyhwn wlʔ ydʕyn
11:45	wʕnʔ ḥd mn sprʔ wʔmr lh mlpnʔ kd hlyn ʔmr ʔnt ʔp ln mṣʕr ʔnt
11:46	hw dyn ʔmr ʔp lkwn sprʔ wy dmṭʕnyn ʔntwn lbny ʔnšʔ mwblʔ yqyrtʔ wʔntwn bḥdʔ mn ṣbʕtkwn lʔ qrbyn ʔntwn lhyn lmwblʔ
11:47	wy lkwn dbnyn ʔntwn qbrʔ dnbyʔ dʔbhykwn qṭlw ʔnwn
11:48	shdyn ʔntwn hkyl wṣbyn ʔntwn bʕbdʔ dʔbhykwn dhnwn qṭlw ʔnwn wʔntwn bnyn ʔntwn qbryhwn
11:49	mṭl hnʔ ʔp ḥkmtʔ dʔlhʔ ʔmrt dhʔ ʔnʔ ʔšdr lhwn nbyʔ wšlyḥʔ mnhwn nrdpwn wnqṭlwn
11:50	dnttbʕ dmʔ dklhwn nbyʔ dʔtʔšd mn dʔtbry ʕlmʔ mn šrbtʔ hdʔ
11:51	mn dmh dhbyl ʕdmʔ ldmh dzkryʔ hw dʔtqṭl byny hyklʔ lmdbḥʔ ʔyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dmttbʕ mn šrbtʔ hdʔ
11:52	wy lkwn sprʔ dšqltwn qlydʔ dydʕtʔ ʔntwn lʔ ʕltwn wlʔylyn dʕʔlyn klytwn
11:53	wkd hlyn ʔmr hwʔ lhwn šryw sprʔ wpryšʔ mtbʔš lhwn wmtḥmtyn wmtksyn mlwhy
11:54	wnklyn lh bsgyʔtʔ kd bʕyn lmʔḥd mdm mn pwmh dnškḥwn nʔklwn qrṣwhy
12:01	wkd ʔtknšw rbwtʔ dknšʔ sgyʔʔ ʔyknʔ dndyšwn ḥd lḥd šry yšwʕ lmʔmr ltlmydwhy lwqdm ʔzdhrw bnpškwn mn ḥmyrʔ dpryšʔ dʔytwhy msb bʔpʔ
12:02	lyt dyn mdm dksʔ dlʔ ntglʔ wlʔ dmṭšy dlʔ ntydʕ
12:03	kl gyr dbḥšwkʔ ʔmrtwn bnhyrʔ nštmʕ wmdm dbtwnʔ bʔdnʔ lḥštwn ʕl ʔgrʔ ntkrz
12:04	ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dyn lrḥmy lʔ tdḥlwn mn ʔylyn dqṭlyn pgrʔ wmn btrkn lyt lhwn mdm ytyr lmʕbd
12:05	ʔḥwykwn dyn mn mn tdḥlwn mn hw dmn btr dqṭl šlyṭ lmrmyw bghnʔ ʔyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dmn hnʔ dḥlw
12:06	lʔ ḥmš ṣpryn mzdbnn btryn ʔsryn wḥdʔ mnhyn lʔ ṭʕyʔ qdm ʔlhʔ
12:07	dylkwn dyn ʔp mnʔ dsʕrʔ drškwn klhyn mnyn ʔnyn lʔ hkyl tdḥlwn dmn swgʔʔ dṣprʔ mytryn ʔntwn
12:08	ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dyn dkl dnwdʔ by qdm bnynšʔ ʔp brh dʔnšʔ nwdʔ bh qdm mlʔkwhy dʔlhʔ
12:09	ʔynʔ dyn dkpr by qdm bnynšʔ ntkpr bh qdm mlʔkwhy dʔlhʔ
12:10	wkl dnʔmr mltʔ ʕl brh dʔnšʔ nštbq lh mn dʕl rwḥʔ dyn dqwdšʔ ngdp lʔ nštbq lh
12:11	mʔ dmqrbyn lkwn dyn lknwštʔ qdm ršʔ wšlyṭnʔ lʔ tʔṣpwn ʔyknʔ tpqwn rwḥʔ ʔw mnʔ tʔmrwn
12:12	rwḥʔ gyr dqwdšʔ nlpkwn bhy šʕtʔ mdm dwlʔ dtʔmrwn
12:13	ʔmr lh dyn ʔnš mn hw knšʔ mlpnʔ ʔmr lʔḥy plg ʕmy yrtwtʔ
12:14	yšwʕ dyn ʔmr lh gbrʔ mnw ʔqymny ʕlykwn dynʔ wmplgnʔ
12:15	wʔmr ltlmydwhy ʔzdhrw mn klh yʕnwtʔ mṭl dlʔ hwʔ bytyrwtʔ dnksʔ ʔyt ḥyʔ 
12:16	wʔmr mtlʔ lwthwn gbrʔ ḥd ʕtyrʔ ʔʕlt lh ʔrʕh ʕlltʔ sgyʔtʔ
12:17	wmtḥšb hwʔ bnpšh wʔmr mnʔ ʔʕbd dlyt ly ʔykʔ dʔḥmwl ʕllty
12:18	wʔmr hdʔ ʔʕbd ʔstwr byt qpsy wʔbnʔ wʔwrb ʔnwn wʔḥmwl tmn klh ʕbwry wṭbty
12:19	wʔmr lnpšy npšy ʔyt lky ṭbtʔ sgyʔtʔ dsymn lšnyʔ sgyʔtʔ ʔttnyḥy ʔkwly ʔšty ʔtbsmy
12:20	ʔmr lh dyn ʔlhʔ ḥsyr rʕynʔ bhnʔ llyʔ npšk tbʕyn lh mnk whlyn dṭybt lmn nhwyn
12:21	hknʔ hw mn dsʔm lh symtʔ wbʔlhʔ lʔ ʕtyr
12:22	wʔmr ltlmydwhy mṭl hnʔ lkwn ʔmr ʔnʔ lʔ tʔṣpwn lnpškwn mnʔ tʔklwn wlʔ lpgrkwn mnʔ tlbšwn
12:23	npšʔ gyr ytyrʔ mn sybrtʔ wpgrʔ mn lbwšʔ
12:24	ʔtbqw bnʕbʔ dlʔ zrʕyn wlʔ ḥṣdyn wlyt lhwn twnʔ wbytqpsʔ wʔlhʔ mtrsʔ lhwn kmʔ hkyl ʔntwn ytyryn ʔntwn mn prḥtʔ
12:25	ʔynʔ dyn mnkwn kd yṣp mškḥ lmwspw ʕl qwmth ʔmtʔ ḥdʔ
12:26	ʔn dyn ʔp lʔ zʕwrtʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn mnʔ ʕl šrkʔ yṣpyn ʔntwn
12:27	ʔtbqw bšwšnʔ ʔyknʔ rbyn dlʔ lʔyn wlʔ ʕzln ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dyn dʔp lʔ šlymwn bklh šwbḥh ʔtksy ʔyk ḥdʔ mn hlyn
12:28	ʔn dyn lʕmyrʔ dywmnʔ ʔytwhy bḥqlʔ wmḥr npl btnwrʔ ʔlhʔ hknʔ mlbš kmʔ ytyr lkwn zʕwry hymnwtʔ
12:29	wʔntwn lʔ tbʕwn mnʔ tʔklwn wmnʔ tštwn wlʔ nphʔ rʕynkwn bhlyn
12:30	hlyn gyr klhyn ʕmmʔ hw dʕlmʔ bʕyn ʔp lkwn dyn ʔbwkwn ydʕ dmtbʕyn lkwn hlyn
12:31	brm bʕw mlkwth dʔlhʔ whlyn klhyn mttwspn lkwn
12:32	lʔ tdḥl gzrʔ zʕwrʔ dṣbʔ ʔbwkwn dntl lkwn mlkwtʔ
12:33	zbnw qnynkwn whbw zdqtʔ ʕbdw lkwn kysʔ dlʔ blyn wsymtʔ dlʔ gyzʔ bšmyʔ ʔykʔ dgnbʔ lʔ qrb wssʔ lʔ mḥbl
12:34	ʔykʔ gyr dʔytyh symtkwn tmn nhwʔ ʔp lbkwn
12:35	nhwwn ʔsyryn ḥṣykwn wmnhryn šrgykwn
12:36	whww dmyn lʔnšʔ dmskyn lmrhwn dʔmty npnʔ mn byt mštwtʔ dmʔ dʔtʔ wnqš mḥdʔ nptḥwn lh
12:37	ṭwbyhwn lʕbdʔ hnwn ʔylyn dnʔtʔ mrhwn wnškḥ ʔnwn kd ʕyryn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dnʔswr ḥṣwhy wnsmk ʔnwn wnʕbr nšmš ʔnwn
12:38	wʔn bmṭrtʔ dtrtyn ʔw dtlt nʔtʔ wnškḥ hknʔ ṭwbyhwn lʕbdʔ hnwn
12:39	hdʔ dyn dʕw dʔlw ydʕ hwʔ mrʔ bytʔ bʔydʔ mṭrtʔ ʔtʔ gnbʔ mttʕyr hwʔ wlʔ šbq hwʔ dntplš byth
12:40	ʔp ʔntwn hkyl hww mṭybʔ dbhy šʕtʔ dlʔ sbryn ʔntwn ʔtʔ brh dʔnšʔ
12:41	ʔmr lh šmʕwn kʔpʔ mrn lwtn ʔmr ʔnt lh lmtlʔ hnʔ ʔw ʔp lwt klnš
12:42	ʔmr lh yšwʕ mnw ky ʔyt rbytʔ mhymnʔ wḥkymʔ dnqymywhy mrh ʕl tšmšth dntl prsʔ bzbnh
12:43	ṭwbwhy lhw ʕbdʔ dnʔtʔ mrh nškḥywhy dʕbd hknʔ
12:44	šryrʔyt ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dnqymywhy ʕl klh qnynh
12:45	ʔn dyn nʔmr ʕbdʔ hw blbh dmry mwḥr lmʔtʔ wnšrʔ lmmḥʔ lʕbdʔ wlʔmhtʔ dmrh wnšrʔ lmlʕs wlmštʔ wlmrwʔ
12:46	nʔtʔ mrh dʕbdʔ hw bywmʔ dlʔ sbr wbšʕtʔ dlʔ ydʕ wnplgywhy wnsym mnth ʕm hnwn dlʔ mhymnyn
12:47	ʕbdʔ dyn ʔynʔ dydʕ ṣbynʔ dmrh wlʔ ṭyb lh ʔyk ṣbynh nblʕ sgyʔtʔ
12:48	hw dyn dlʔ ydʕ wʕbd mdm dšwʔ lmḥwtʔ nblʕ mḥwtʔ zʕwrytʔ kl gyr dʔtyhb lh sgy sgy nttbʕ mnh wlhw dʔgʕlw lh sgy ytyrʔyt ntbʕwn bʔydh
12:49	nwrʔ ʔtyt dʔrmʔ bʔrʕʔ wṣbʔ ʔnʔ ʔlw mn kdw ḥbt
12:50	wmʕmwdytʔ ʔyt ly dʔʕmd wsgy ʔlyṣ ʔnʔ ʕdmʔ dtštmlʔ
12:51	sbryn ʔntwn dšynʔ ʔtyt dʔrmʔ bʔrʕʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dlʔ ʔlʔ plgwtʔ
12:52	mn hšʔ gyr nhwwn ḥmšʔ bbytʔ ḥd dplygyn tltʔ ʕl tryn wtryn ʕl tltʔ
12:53	ntplg gyr ʔbʔ ʕl brh wbrʔ ʕl ʔbwhy ʔmʔ ʕl brth wbrtʔ ʕl ʔmh ḥmtʔ ʕl klth wkltʔ ʕl ḥmth
12:54	wʔmr lknšʔ mʔ dḥzytwn ʕnnʔ ddnḥʔ mn mʕrbʔ mḥdʔ ʔmryn ʔntwn mṭrʔ ʔtʔ whwʔ hknʔ
12:55	wmʔ dnšbʔ tymnʔ ʔmryn ʔntwn ḥwmʔ hwʔ whwʔ
12:56	nsby bʔpʔ prṣwpʔ dʔrʕʔ wdšmyʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn dtpršwn zbnʔ dyn hnʔ ʔyknʔ lʔ pršyn ʔntwn
12:57	lmnʔ dyn mn npškwn lʔ dynyn ʔntwn qwštʔ
12:58	mʔ gyr dʔzl ʔnt ʕm bʕldynk lwt ʔrkwnʔ ʕd bʔwrḥʔ ʔnt hb tʔgwrtʔ wttprq mnh dlmʔ nwblk lwt dynʔ wdynʔ nšlmk lgbyʔ wgbyʔ nrmyk byt ʔsyrʔ
12:59	wʔmr ʔnʔ lk dlʔ tpwq mn tmn ʕdmʔ dttl šmwnʔ ʔḥryʔ
13:01	bhw dyn zbnʔ ʔtw ʔnšyn ʔmrw lh ʕl glylyʔ hnwn dpylṭws ḥlṭ dmhwn ʕm dbḥyhwn
