13:02	wʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn sbryn ʔntwn dhlyn glylyʔ ḥṭyyn hww ytyr mn klhwn glylyʔ dhknʔ hwʔ ʔnwn
13:03	lʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dyn dʔp klkwn ʔlʔ ttwbwn hknʔ tʔbdwn
13:04	ʔw hnwn tmntʕsr dnpl ʕlyhwn mgdlʔ bšylwḥʔ wqṭl ʔnwn sbryn ʔntwn dḥṭyyn hww ytyr mn klhwn bnynšʔ dʕmryn bʔwršlm
13:05	lʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dyn dʔlʔ ttwbwn klkwn ʔkwthwn tʔbdwn
13:06	wʔmr mtlʔ hnʔ ttʔ ʔyt hwt lʔnš dnṣybʔ bkrmh wʔtʔ bʕʔ bh pʔrʔ wlʔ ʔškḥ
13:07	wʔmr lplḥʔ hʔ tlt šnyn ʔtʔ ʔnʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ pʔrʔ bttʔ hdʔ wlʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ pswqyh lmnʔ mbṭlʔ ʔrʕʔ
13:08	ʔmr lh plḥʔ mry šbwqyh ʔp hdʔ šntʔ ʕd ʔplḥyh wʔzblh
13:09	wʔn ʕbdt pʔrʔ wʔlʔ lmnḥy tpsqyh 
13:10	kd dyn mlp yšwʕ bšbtʔ bḥdʔ mn knwštʔ
13:11	ʔyt hwt tmn ʔnttʔ dʔyt hwt lh rwḥʔ dkwrhnʔ šnyn tmnʕsrʔ wkpypʔ hwt wlʔ mškḥʔ hwt dttpšṭ lgmr
13:12	ḥzh dyn yšwʕ wqrh wʔmr lh ʔnttʔ šryty mn kwrhnky
13:13	wsm ʔydh ʕlyh wmḥdʔ ʔtpšṭt wšbḥt lʔlhʔ
13:14	ʕnʔ dyn rb knwštʔ kd mtḥmt ʕl dʔsy bšbtʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lknšʔ štʔ ʔnwn ywmyn dbhwn wlʔ lmplḥ bhwn hwytwn ʔtyn mtʔsyn wlʔ bywmʔ dšbtʔ
13:15	yšwʕ dyn ʕnʔ wʔmr lh nsb bʔpʔ ḥd ḥd mnkwn bšbtʔ lʔ šrʔ twrh ʔw ḥmrh mn ʔwryʔ wʔzl mšqʔ
13:16	hdʔ dyn dbrth hy dʔbrhm wʔsrh ʔklqrṣʔ hʔ tmnʕsrʔ šnyn lʔ wlʔ hwʔ dtštrʔ mn hnʔ ʔswryʔ bywmʔ dšbtʔ
13:17	wkd hlyn ʔmr hwʔ bhtyn hww klhwn ʔylyn dqymyn hww lqwblh wklh ʕmʔ ḥdʔ hwʔ bklhyn tmyhtʔ dhwyn hwy bʔydh
13:18	ʔmr hwʔ dyn yšwʕ lmnʔ dmyʔ mlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ wlmnʔ ʔdmyh
13:19	dmyʔ lprdtʔ dḥrdlʔ hy dnsb gbrʔ ʔrmyh bgnth wrbt whwt ʔylnʔ rbʔ wprḥtʔ dšmyʔ ʔqnt bswkyh
13:20	twb ʔmr yšwʕ lmnʔ ʔdmyh lmlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ
13:21	dmyʔ lḥmyrʔ dnsbt ʔnttʔ ṭmrt bqmḥʔ dtlt sʔyn ʕdmʔ dklh ḥmʕ
13:22	wrdʔ hwʔ bqwryʔ wbmdyntʔ kd mlp wʔzl lʔwršlm
13:23	šʔlh dyn ʔnš dʔn zʕwryn ʔnwn ʔylyn dḥʔyn
13:24	yšwʕ dyn ʔmr lhwn ʔtktšw lmʕl btrʕʔ ʔlyṣʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn gyr dsgyʔʔ nbʕwn lmʕl wlʔ nškḥwn
13:25	mn šʕtʔ dnqwm mrʔ bytʔ wnʔḥwd trʕʔ wthwwn qymyn lbr wnqšyn btrʕʔ wtšrwn lmʔmr mrn mrn ptḥ ln wnʕnʔ hw wnʔmr ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dlʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ lkwn ʔymkʔ ʔntwn
13:26	wtšrwn lmʔmr qdmyk ʔkln wʔštyn wbšwqyn ʔlpt
13:27	wnʔmr lkwn dlʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ lkwn ʔymkʔ ʔntwn prwqw lkwn mny plḥy šwqrʔ
13:28	tmn nhwʔ bkyʔ wḥwrq šnʔ kd tḥzwn lʔbrhm wlʔysḥq wlyʕqwb wlklhwn nbyʔ bmlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ ʔntwn dyn thwwn mpqyn lbr
13:29	wnʔtwn mn mdnḥʔ wmn mʕrbʔ wmn tymnʔ wmn grbyʔ wnstmkwn bmlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ
13:30	whʔ ʔyt ʔḥryʔ dnhwwn qdmyʔ wʔyt qdmyʔ dnhwwn ʔḥryʔ
13:31	bh bhw ywmʔ qrbw ʔnšʔ mn pryšʔ wʔmryn lh pwq zl lk mkʔ mṭl dhrwds ṣbʔ lmqṭlk
13:32	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ zlw ʔmrw ltʕlʔ hnʔ dhʔ mpq ʔnʔ šʔdʔ wʔswtʔ ʕbd ʔnʔ ywmnʔ wmḥr wlywmʔ dtltʔ mštmlʔ ʔnʔ
13:33	brm wlʔ ly dywmnʔ wmḥr ʔsʕwr wlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔzl mṭl dlʔ mškḥʔ dnbyʔ nʔbd lbr mn ʔwršlm
13:34	ʔwršlm ʔwršlm qṭlt nbyʔ wrgmt lʔylyn dšlyḥyn lwth kmʔ zbnyn ṣbyt lmknšw bnyky ʔyk trngwltʔ dknšʔ prwgyh tḥyt gpyh wlʔ ṣbytwn
13:35	hʔ mštbq lkwn bytkwn ḥrbʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn gyr dlʔ tḥzwnny ʕdmʔ dtʔmrwn bryk hw dʔtʔ bšmh dmryʔ
14:01	whwʔ dkd ʕl lbytʔ dḥd mn ršʔ dpryšʔ dnʔkwl lḥmʔ bywmʔ dšbtʔ whnwn nṭryn hww lh
14:02	whʔ gbrʔ ḥd dknyš hwʔ myʔ ʔyt hwʔ qdmwhy
14:03	wʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lsprʔ wlpryšʔ dʔn šlyṭ bšbtʔ lmʔsyw
14:04	hnwn dyn štqw wʔḥdh hw wʔsyh wšryhy
14:05	wʔmr lhwn mnw mnkwn dnpl brh ʔw twrh bbrʔ bywmʔ dšbtʔ wlʔ mḥdʔ dlʔ msq lh
14:06	wlʔ ʔškḥw lmtl lh ptgmʔ ʕl hdʔ
14:07	wʔmr hwʔ mtlʔ lwt hnwn dmzmnyn tmn ʕl dḥzʔ hwʔ lhwn dmgbyn dwkytʔ dryš smkʔ
14:08	ʔmty dmzdmn ʔnt mn ʔnš lbyt mštwtʔ lʔ tʔzl tstmk lk bryš smkʔ dlmʔ nhwʔ mzmn tmn ʔnš dmyqr mnk
14:09	wnʔtʔ hw mn dlk wlh qrʔ wnʔmr lk dhb dwktʔ lhnʔ wtbht kd qʔm ʔnt wʔḥd ʔnt dwktʔ ʔḥrytʔ
14:10	ʔlʔ mʔ dʔzdmnt zl ʔstmk lk bḥrtʔ dmʔ dʔtʔ hw dqrk nʔmr lk rḥmy ʔtʕlʔ lʕl wʔstmk wthwʔ lk tšbwḥtʔ qdm klhwn dsmykyn ʕmk
14:11	mṭl dkl dnrym npšh ntmkk wkl dnmk npšh nttrym
14:12	ʔmr dyn ʔp lhw dqryhy mʔ dʕbd ʔnt šrwtʔ ʔw ʔḥšmytʔ lʔ thwʔ qrʔ rḥmyk ʔplʔ ʔḥyk ʔw ʔḥynyk wlʔ šbbyk ʕtyrʔ dlmʔ wʔp hnwn nqrwnk wnhwʔ lk pwrʕnʔ hnʔ
14:13	ʔlʔ mʔ dʕbd ʔnt qwblʔ qry lmsknʔ sgypʔ ḥgysʔ smyʔ
14:14	wṭwbyk dlyt lhwn dnprʕwnk nhwʔ gyr pwrʕnk bqymʔ dzdyqʔ
14:15	kd šmʕ dyn ḥd mn hnwn dsmykyn hlyn ʔmr lh ṭwbwhy lmn dnʔkwl lḥmʔ bmlkwth dʔlhʔ
14:16	ʔmr lh yšwʕ gbrʔ ḥd ʕbd ʔḥšmytʔ rbtʔ wqrʔ lsgyʔʔ
14:17	wšdr ʕbdh bʕdnʔ dʔḥšmytʔ dnʔmr lʔylyn dqryn hʔ klmdm mṭyb lkwn tw
14:18	wšryw mn ḥd klhwn lmštʔlw ʔmr lh qdmyʔ qrytʔ zbnt wʔlyṣ ʔnʔ dʔpwq ʔḥzyh bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnk šbwqyny dmštʔl ʔnʔ
14:19	ʔḥrnʔ ʔmr ḥmšʔ zwgyn twrʔ zbnt wʔzl ʔnʔ dʔbqʔ ʔnwn bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnk šbwqyny dmštʔl ʔnʔ 
14:20	wʔḥrnʔ ʔmr ʔnttʔ nsbt wmṭl hdʔ lʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ dʔtʔ
14:21	wʔtʔ hw ʕbdʔ wʔmr lmrh hlyn hydyn rgz mrʔ bytʔ wʔmr lʕbdh pwq bʕgl lšwqʔ wlbrytʔ dmdyntʔ wʔʕl lkʔ lmsknʔ wlmkʔbʔ wlmḥgrʔ wlʕwyrʔ
14:22	wʔmr ʕbdʔ mry hwʔ ʔyk dpqdt wtwb ʔyt ʔtrʔ
14:23	wʔmr mrʔ lʕbdh pwq lʔwrḥtʔ wlbyt sygʔ wʔlwṣ dnʕlwn dntmlʔ byty
14:24	ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn gyr dḥd mn hnwn ʔnšʔ dqryn hww lʔ nṭʕmwn mn ʔḥšmyty
14:25	wkd ʔzlyn hww ʕmh knšʔ sgyʔʔ ʔtpny wʔmr lhwn
14:26	mn dʔtʔ lwty wlʔ snʔ lʔbwhy wlʔmh wlʔḥwhy wlʔḥwth wlʔntth wlbnwhy wʔp lnpšh tlmydʔ lʔ mškḥ dnhwʔ ly
14:27	wmn dlʔ šql ṣlybh wʔtʔ btry tlmydʔ lʔ mškḥ dnhwʔ ly
14:28	mnw gyr mnkwn dṣbʔ dnbnʔ mgdlʔ wlʔ lwqdm ytb ḥšb npqth ʔn ʔyt lh lmšlmwth
14:29	dlʔ kd nsym štʔstʔ wlʔ nškḥ lmšlmw kl dḥzyn nhwwn mbzḥyn bh
14:30	wʔmryn dhnʔ gbrʔ šry lmbnʔ wlʔ ʔškḥ lmšlmw
14:31	ʔw mnw mlkʔ dʔzl lqrbʔ lmtktšw ʕm mlkʔ ḥbrh wlʔ lwqdm mtrʕʔ dʔn mškḥ bʕsrʔ ʔlpyn lmʔrʕ lhw dʔtʔ ʕlwhy bʕsryn ʔlpyn
14:32	wʔn dyn lʔ ʕd hw rḥyq mnh mšdr ʔyzgdʔ wbʕʔ ʕl šlmʔ
14:33	hknʔ klnš mnkwn dlʔ šbq klh qnynh lʔ mškḥ dnhwʔ ly tlmydʔ
14:34	špyrʔ hy mlḥʔ ʔn dyn ʔp mlḥʔ tpkh bmnʔ ttmlḥ
14:35	lʔ lʔrʕʔ wlʔ lzblʔ ʔzlʔ lbr šdyn lh mn dʔyt lh ʔdnʔ dnšmʕ nšmʕ
15:01	mtqrbyn hww dyn lwth mksʔ wḥṭyʔ dnšmʕwnyhy
15:02	wsprʔ wpryšʔ rṭnyn hww wʔmryn hnʔ lḥṭyʔ mqbl wʔkl ʕmhwn
15:03	wʔmr lhwn yšwʕ mtlʔ hnʔ
15:04	mnw mnkwn gbrʔ dʔyt lh mʔʔ ʕrbyn wʔn nʔbd ḥd mnhwn lʔ šbq tšʕyn wtšʕʔ bdbrʔ wʔzl bʕʔ lhw dʔbd ʕdmʔ dnškḥywhy
15:05	wmʔ dʔškḥh ḥdʔ wšql lh ʕl ktpth
15:06	wʔtʔ lbyth wqrʔ lrḥmwhy wlšbbwhy wʔmr lhwn ḥdw ʕmy dʔškḥt ʕrby dʔbyd hwʔ
15:07	ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dhknʔ thwʔ ḥdwtʔ bšmyʔ ʕl ḥd ḥṭyʔ dtʔb ʔw ʕl tšʕyn wtšʕʔ zdyqyn dlʔ mtbʕyʔ lhwn tybwtʔ
15:08	ʔw ʔydʔ hy ʔnttʔ dʔyt lh ʕsrʔ zwzyn wtwbd ḥd mnhwn wlʔ mnhrʔ šrgʔ wḥmʔ bytʔ wbʕyʔ lh bṭylʔyt ʕdmʔ dtškḥywhy
15:09	wmʔ dʔškḥth qryʔ lrḥmth wlšbbth wʔmrʔ lhyn ḥdyyn ʕmy dʔškḥt zwzy dʔbyd hwʔ
15:10	ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dhknʔ thwʔ ḥdwtʔ qdm mlʔkwhy dʔlhʔ ʕl ḥd ḥṭyʔ dtʔb
15:11	wʔmr hwʔ lhwn twb yšwʕ lgbrʔ ḥd ʔyt hwʔ lh bnyʔ tryn
15:12	wʔmr lh brh zʕwrʔ ʔby hb ly plgwtʔ dmṭyʔ ly mn bytk wplg lhwn qnynh
15:13	wmn btr ywmtʔ qlyl knš hw brh zʕwrʔ kl mdm dmṭyhy wʔzl lʔtrʔ rḥyqʔ wtmn bdr qnynh kd ḥyʔ prḥʔyt
15:14	wkd gmr kl mdm dʔyt hwʔ lh hwʔ kpnʔ rbʔ bʔtrʔ hw wšry ḥsr lh
15:15	wʔzl nqp lh lḥd mn bny mdyntʔ dʔtrʔ hw whw šdrh lqrytʔ lmrʕʔ ḥzyrʔ
15:16	wmtrgrg hwʔ lmmlʔ krsh mn ḥrwbʔ hnwn dʔklyn hww ḥzyrʔ wlʔ ʔnš yhb hwʔ lh
15:17	wkd ʔtʔ lwt npšh ʔmr kmʔ hšʔ ʔgyrʔ ʔyt byt ʔby dytyr lhwn lḥmʔ wʔnʔ hrkʔ lkpny ʔbd ʔnʔ
15:18	ʔqwm ʔzl lwt ʔby wʔmr lh ʔby ḥṭyt bšmyʔ wqdmyk
15:19	wlʔ mkyl šwʔ ʔnʔ dbrk ʔtqrʔ ʕbdyny ʔyk ḥd mn ʔgyryk
15:20	wqm ʔtʔ lwt ʔbwhy wʕd hw rḥyq ḥzyhy ʔbwhy wʔtrḥm ʕlwhy wrhṭ npl ʕl ṣwrh wnšqh
15:21	wʔmr lh brh ʔby ḥṭyt bšmyʔ wqdmyk wlʔ šwʔ ʔnʔ dbrk ʔtqrʔ
15:22	ʔmr dyn ʔbwhy lʕbdwhy ʔpqw ʔsṭlʔ ršytʔ ʔlbšwhy wsymw ʕzqtʔ bʔydh wʔsʔnwhy msnʔ
15:23	wʔytw qṭwlw twrʔ dpṭmʔ wnʔkwl wntbsm
15:24	dhnʔ bry mytʔ hwʔ wḥyʔ wʔbydʔ hwʔ wʔštkḥ wšryw lmtbsmw
15:25	hw dyn brh qšyšʔ bqrytʔ hwʔ wkd ʔtʔ wqrb lwt bytʔ šmʕ ql zmrʔ dsgyʔʔ
15:26	wqrʔ lḥd mn ṭlyʔ wšʔlh mnw hnʔ
15:27	ʔmr lh ʔḥwk ʔtʔ wqṭl ʔbwk twrʔ dpṭmʔ dkd ḥlym ʔqblh
15:28	wrgz wlʔ ṣbʔ hwʔ lmʕl wnpq ʔbwhy bʕʔ mnh
15:29	hw dyn ʔmr lʔbwhy hʔ kmʔ šnyn plḥ ʔnʔ lk ʕbdwtʔ wlʔ mmtwm ʕbrt pwqdnk wmn mtwm gdyʔ lʔ yhbt ly dʔtbsm ʕm rḥmy
15:30	lhnʔ dyn brk kd prḥ qnynk ʕm znytʔ wʔtʔ nkst lh twrʔ dpṭmʔ
15:31	ʔmr lh ʔbwhy bry ʔnt bklzbn ʕmy ʔnt wklmdm dyly dylk hw
15:32	lmbsm dyn wlʔ hwʔ ln wlmḥdʔ dhnʔ ʔḥwk mytʔ hwʔ wḥyʔ wʔbydʔ hwʔ wʔštkḥ 
16:01	wʔmr mtlʔ lwt tlmydwhy gbrʔ ḥd ʔyt hwʔ ʕtyrʔ wʔyt hwʔ lh rbytʔ wʔtʔklw lh qrṣwhy dqnynh mprḥ
16:02	wqryhy mrh wʔmr lh mnw hnʔ dšmʕ ʔnʔ ʕlyk hb ly ḥwšbnʔ drbt bytwtk lʔ gyr mškḥ ʔnt mkyl rbytʔ dthwʔ ly
16:03	ʔmr hw rbytʔ bnpšh mnʔ ʔʕbd dmry šql lh mny rbt bytwtʔ dʔḥpwr lʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ wlmḥdr bht ʔnʔ
16:04	ydʕt mnʔ ʔʕbd dmʔ dnpqt mn rbt bytwtʔ nqblwnny bbtyhwn
16:05	wqrʔ ḥd ḥd mn ḥybʔ dmrh wʔmr lqdmyʔ kmʔ ḥyb ʔnt lmry
16:06	ʔmr lh mʔʔ mtryn mšḥʔ ʔmr lh sb ktbk wtb bʕgl ktwb ḥmšyn mtryn
16:07	wʔmr lʔḥrnʔ wʔnt mnʔ ḥyb ʔnt lmry ʔmr lh mʔʔ kwryn ḥṭʔ ʔmr lh qbl ktbk wtb ktwb tmnʔyn kwryn
16:08	wšbḥ mrn lrbytʔ dʕwlʔ dḥkymʔyt ʕbd bnwhy gyr dʕlmʔ hnʔ ḥkymyn ʔnwn mn bnwhy dnwhrʔ bšrbthwn hdʔ
16:09	wʔp ʔnʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dʕbdw lkwn rḥmʔ mn mmwnʔ hnʔ dʕwlʔ dmʔ dgmr nqblwnkwn bmṭlyhwn dlʕlm
16:10	mn dbqlyl mhymn ʔp bsgy mhymn hw wmn dbqlyl ʕwl ʔp bsgy ʕwl hw
16:11	ʔn hkyl bmmwnʔ dʕwlʔ mhymnʔ lʔ hwytwn šrrʔ lkwn mnw mhymn
16:12	wʔn bdlʔ dylkwn lʔ ʔštkḥtwn mhymnʔ dylkwn mnw ntl lkwn
16:13	lyt ʕbdʔ dmškḥ ltryn mrwn lmplḥ ʔw gyr lḥd nsnʔ wlʔḥrnʔ nrḥm ʔw lḥd nyqr wlʔḥrnʔ nšwṭ lʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn lmplḥ lʔlhʔ wlmmwnʔ
16:14	pryšʔ dyn kd šmʕw hlyn klhyn mṭl drḥmyn hww kspʔ mmyqyn hww bh
16:15	yšwʕ dyn ʔmr lhwn ʔntwn ʔnwn dmzdqyn npšhwn qdm bny ʔnšʔ ʔlhʔ dyn ydʕ lbwtkwn dmdm drm byt bny nšʔ qdm ʔlhʔ ndyd hw
16:16	nmwsʔ wnbyʔ ʕdmʔ lywḥnn mn hydyn mlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ mstbrʔ wkl lh ḥbṣ dnʕwl
16:17	pšyq hw dyn dšmyʔ wʔrʕʔ nʕbrwn ʔw ʔtwtʔ ḥdʔ mn nmwsʔ tʕbr
16:18	kl mn dšrʔ ʔntth wnsb ʔḥrtʔ gʔr wkl mn dnsb šbyqtʔ gʔr
16:19	gbrʔ dyn ḥd ʕtyrʔ ʔyt hwʔ wlbš hwʔ bwṣʔ wʔrgwnʔ wklywm mtbsmyn hwʔ gʔyʔyt
16:20	wmsknʔ ḥd ʔyt hwʔ dšmh lʕzr wrmʔ hwʔ lwt trʕh dhw ʕtyrʔ kd mmḥy bšwḥnʔ
16:21	wmtyʔb hwʔ dnmlʔ krsh mn prtwtʔ dnplyn mn ptwrh dhw ʕtyrʔ ʔlʔ ʔp klbʔ ʔtyn hww mlḥkyn šwḥnwhy
16:22	hwʔ dyn wmyt hw msknʔ wʔwblwhy mlʔkʔ lʕwbh dʔbrhm ʔp hw dyn ʕtyrʔ myt wʔtqbr
16:23	wkd mštnq bšywl ʔrym ʕynwhy mn rwḥqʔ wḥzʔ lʔbrhm wllʕzr bʕwbh
16:24	wqrʔ bqlʔ rmʔ wʔmr ʔby ʔbrhm ʔtrḥm ʕly wšdr llʕzr dnṣbwʕ ryš ṣbʕh bmyʔ wnrṭb ly lšny dhʔ mštnq ʔnʔ bšlhbytʔ hdʔ
16:25	ʔmr lh ʔbrhm bry ʔtdkr dqblt ṭbtk bḥyyk wlʕzr byšth whšʔ hʔ mttnyḥ hrkʔ wʔnt mštnq
16:26	wʕm hlyn klhyn hwtʔ rbtʔ symʔ bynyn wlkwn dʔylyn dṣbyn mkʔ dnʕbrwn lwtkwn lʔ nškḥwn wʔplʔ dmn tmn nʕbrwn lwtn
16:27	ʔmr lh mdyn bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnk ʔby dtšdrywhy lbyt ʔby
16:28	ḥmšʔ gyr ʔḥyn ʔyt ly nʔzl nshd ʔnwn dlʔ ʔp hnwn nʔtwn ldwktʔ hdʔ dtšnyqʔ
16:29	ʔmr lh ʔbrhm ʔyt lhwn mwšʔ wnbyʔ nšmʕwn ʔnwn
16:30	hw dyn ʔmr lh lʔ ʔby ʔbrhm ʔlʔ ʔn ʔnš mn mytʔ nʔzl lwthwn tybyn
16:31	ʔmr lh ʔbrhm ʔn lmwšʔ wlnbyʔ lʔ šmʕyn ʔp lʔ ʔn ʔnš mn mytʔ nqwm mhymnyn lh
17:01	wʔmr hwʔ yšwʕ ltlmydwhy lʔ mškḥʔ dlʔ nʔtwn mkšwlʔ wy dyn lhw dbʔydh nʔtwn
17:02	pqḥ hwʔ lh ʔlw rḥyʔ dḥmrʔ tlyʔ bṣwrh wšdʔ bymʔ ʔw dnkšl lḥd mn hlyn zʕwrʔ
17:03	ʔzdhrw bnpškwn ʔn nḥṭʔ ʔḥwk kʔy bh wʔn tʔb šbwq lh
17:04	wʔn šbʕ zbnyn bywmʔ nskl bk wšbʕ zbnyn bywmʔ ntpnʔ lwtk wnʔmr dtʔb ʔnʔ šbwq lh
17:05	wʔmrw šlyḥʔ lmrn ʔwsp ln hymnwtʔ
17:06	ʔmr lhwn ʔn ʔyt hwt lkwn hymnwtʔ ʔyk prdtʔ dḥrdlʔ ʔmryn hwytwn ltwtʔ hnʔ dʔtʕqr wʔtnṣb bymʔ wmštmʕ hwʔ lkwn
17:07	mnw dyn mnkwn dʔyt lh ʕbdʔ ddbr pdnʔ ʔw drʕʔ ʕnʔ wʔn nʔtʔ mn ḥqlʔ ʔmr lh mḥdʔ ʕbr ʔstmk
17:08	ʔlʔ ʔmr lh ṭyb ly mdm dʔḥšm wʔswr ḥṣyk šmšyny ʕdmʔ dʔlʕs wʔštʔ wbtrkn ʔp ʔnt tlʕs wtštʔ
17:09	lmʔ ṭybwth mqbl dhw ʕbdʔ dʕbd mdm dʔtpqd lh lʔ sbr ʔnʔ
17:10	hknʔ ʔp ʔntwn mʔ dʕbdtwn klhyn ʔylyn dpqydn lkwn ʔmrw dʕbdʔ ḥnn bṭylʔ dmdm dḥybyn hwyn lmʕbd ʕbdn
17:11	whwʔ dkd ʔzl yšwʕ lʔwršlm ʕbr hwʔ byt šmryʔ lglylʔ
17:12	wkd qryb lmʕl lqrytʔ ḥdʔ ʔrʕwhy ʕsrʔ ʔnšyn grbʔ wqmw mn rwḥqʔ
17:13	wʔrymw qlhwn wʔmryn rbn yšwʕ ʔtrḥm ʕlyn
17:14	wkd ḥzʔ ʔnwn ʔmr lhwn zlw ḥww npškwn lkhnʔ wkd ʔzlyn ʔtdkyw
17:15	ḥd dyn mnhwn kd ḥzʔ dʔtdky hpk lh wbqlʔ rmʔ mšbḥ hwʔ lʔlhʔ
17:16	wnpl ʕl ʔpwhy qdm rglwhy dyšwʕ kd mwdʔ lh whw hnʔ šmryʔ hwʔ
17:17	ʕnʔ dyn yšwʕ wʔmr lʔ hwʔ ʕsrʔ hwyn hlyn dʔtdkyw ʔykʔ ʔnwn tšʕʔ
17:18	lmʔ pršw dnʔtwn ntlwn tšbwḥtʔ lʔlhʔ ʔlʔ hnʔ dmn ʕmʔ hw nwkryʔ
17:19	wʔmr lh qwm zl hymnwtk ʔḥytk 
17:20	wkd šʔlwhy lyšwʕ mn pryšʔ ʔmty ʔtyʔ mlkwth dʔlhʔ ʕnʔ wʔmr lhwn lʔ ʔtyʔ mlkwth dʔlhʔ bnṭwrtʔ
17:21	wlʔ ʔmryn hʔ hrkʔ hy whʔ hr tmn hy hʔ gyr mlkwth dʔlhʔ lgw mnkwn hy
17:22	wʔmr ltlmydwhy nʔtwn ywmtʔ dttrgrgwn lmḥzʔ ḥd mn ywmtʔ dbrh dʔnšʔ wlʔ tḥzwn
17:23	wʔn nʔmrwn lkwn hʔ hrkʔ hw whʔ hr tmn hw lʔ tʔzlwn
17:24	ʔyknʔ gyr dbrqʔ brq mn šmyʔ wklh tḥyt šmyʔ mnhr hknʔ nhwʔ brh dʔnšʔ bywmh
17:25	lwqdm dyn ʕtyd hw dnḥš sgyʔtʔ wnstlʔ mn šrbtʔ hdʔ
17:26	wʔyknʔ dhwʔ bywmth dnwḥ hknʔ nhwʔ bywmth dbrh dʔnšʔ
17:27	dʔklyn hww wštyn wnsbyn nšʔ wyhbyn lgbrʔ ʕdmʔ lywmʔ dʕl nwḥ lkwylʔ wʔtʔ ṭwpnʔ wʔwbd lkl ʔnš
17:28	wʔyknʔ twb dhwʔ bywmth dlwṭ dʔklyn hww wštyn wzbnyn wmzbnyn wnṣbyn hww wbnyn
17:29	bywmʔ dyn dnpq lwṭ mn sdwm ʔmṭr mryʔ nwrʔ wkbrytʔ mn šmyʔ wʔwbd lklhwn
17:30	hknʔ nhwʔ bywmʔ dmtglʔ brh dʔnšʔ
17:31	bhw ywmʔ mn dbʔgrʔ hw wmʔnwhy bbytʔ lʔ nḥwt dnšqwl ʔnwn wmn dbḥqlʔ hw lʔ nthpk lbstrh
17:32	ʔtdkrw lʔntth dlwṭ
17:33	mn dṣbʔ dnḥʔ npšh nwbdyh wmn dnwbd npšh nḥyh
17:34	ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dbhw llyʔ tryn nhwwn bḥdʔ ʕrsʔ ḥd ntdbr wʔḥrnʔ nštbq
17:35	trtyn nhwyn ṭḥnn ʔkḥdʔ ḥdʔ ttdbr wʔḥrtʔ tštbq
17:36	tryn nhwwn bḥqlʔ ḥd ntdbr wʔḥrnʔ nštbq
17:37	ʕnw wʔmryn lh lʔykʔ mrn ʔmr lhwn ʔykʔ dpgrʔ tmn ntknšwn nšrʔ
18:01	ʔmr lhwn dyn ʔp mtlʔ dbkl ʕdn nṣlwn wlʔ tmʔn lhwn
18:02	dynʔ ḥd ʔyt hwʔ bmdyntʔ ḥdʔ dmn ʔlhʔ lʔ dḥl hwʔ wmn bnynšʔ lʔ mtkḥd hwʔ
18:03	ʔrmltʔ dyn ḥdʔ ʔyt hwt bmdyntʔ hy wʔtyʔ hwt lwth wʔmrʔ tbʕyny mn bʕl dyny
18:04	wlʔ ṣbʔ hwʔ zbnʔ sgyʔʔ btrkn dyn ʔmr bnpšh ʔn mn ʔlhʔ lʔ dḥl ʔnʔ wmn bnynšʔ lʔ mtkḥd ʔnʔ
18:05	ʔpn mṭl dmlʔyʔ ly hdʔ ʔrmltʔ ʔtbʕyh dlʔ bkl ʕdn thwʔ ʔtyʔ mhrʔ ly
18:06	wʔmr mrn šmʕw mnʔ ʔmr dynʔ dʕwlʔ
18:07	ʔlhʔ dyn lʔ ytyrʔyt nʕbd tbʕtʔ lgbwhy dqryn lh bʔymmʔ wbllyʔ wmgr rwḥh ʕlyhwn
18:08	ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dnʕbd tbʕthwn bʕgl brm nʔtʔ brh dʔnšʔ wnškḥ ky hymnwtʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ
18:09	wʔmr hwʔ mtlʔ hnʔ lwqbl ʔnšʔ ʔylyn dtkylyn ʕl npšhwn dʔytyhwn zdyqʔ wbsyn ʕl klnš
18:10	tryn gbryn slqw lhyklʔ lmṣlyw ḥd pryšʔ wʔḥrnʔ mksʔ
18:11	whw pryšʔ qʔm hwʔ bynwhy lnpšh whlyn mṣlʔ hwʔ ʔlhʔ mwdʔ ʔnʔ lk dlʔ hwyt ʔyk šrkʔ dʔnšʔ ḥṭwpʔ wʕlwbʔ wgyrʔ wlʔ ʔyk hnʔ mksʔ
18:12	ʔlʔ ṣʔm ʔnʔ tryn bšbtʔ wmʕsr ʔnʔ kl mdm dqnʔ ʔnʔ
18:13	hw dyn mksʔ qʔm hwʔ mn rwḥqʔ wlʔ ṣbʔ hwʔ ʔp lʔ ʕynwhy nrym lšmyʔ ʔlʔ ṭrp hwʔ ʕl ḥdyh wʔmr ʔlhʔ ḥwnyny lḥṭyʔ
18:14	ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dnḥt hnʔ mzdq lbyth ytyr mn hw pryšʔ kl ʔnš gyr dnrym npšh ntmkk wkl dnmk npšh nttrym
18:15	qrbw hww lh dyn ʔp ylwdʔ dnqrwb lhwn wḥzw ʔnwn tlmydwhy wkʔw bhwn
18:16	hw dyn yšwʕ qrʔ ʔnwn wʔmr lhwn šbwqw ṭlyʔ ʔtyn lwty wlʔ tklwn ʔnwn ddʔylyn gyr dʔyk hlyn ʔnwn dylhwn hy mlkwtʔ dšmyʔ
18:17	ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dmn dlʔ nqbl mlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ ʔyk ṭlyʔ lʔ nʕwl lh
18:18	wšʔlh ḥd mn ršnʔ wʔmr lh mlpnʔ ṭbʔ mnʔ ʔʕbd dʔrt ḥyʔ dlʕlm
18:19	ʔmr lh yšwʕ mnʔ qrʔ ʔnt ly ṭbʔ lyt ṭbʔ ʔlʔ ʔn ḥd ʔlhʔ
18:20	pwqdnʔ ydʕ ʔnt lʔ tqṭwl wlʔ tgwr wlʔ tgnwb wlʔ tshd shdwtʔ dšwqrʔ yqr lʔbwk wlʔmk
18:21	ʔmr lh hlyn klhyn nṭrt ʔnyn mn ṭlywty
18:22	kd šmʕ dyn hlyn yšwʕ ʔmr lh ḥdʔ ḥsyrʔ lk zl zbn kl mdm dʔyt lk whb lmsknʔ wthwʔ lk symtʔ bšmyʔ wtʔ btry
18:23	hw dyn kd šmʕ hlyn kryt lh ʕtyr hwʔ gyr ṭb
18:24	wkd ḥzʔ yšwʕ dkryt lh ʔmr ʔyknʔ ʕṭlʔ lʔylyn dʔyt lhwn nksʔ dnʕlwn lmlkwth dʔlhʔ
18:25	dlylʔ hy lgmlʔ dbḥrwrʔ dmḥṭʔ nʕwl ʔw ʕtyrʔ lmlkwth dʔlhʔ
18:26	ʔmryn lh ʔylyn dšmʕw wmnw mškḥ lmḥʔ
18:27	yšwʕ dyn ʔmr ʔylyn dlwt bny ʔnšʔ lʔ mškḥn lwt ʔlhʔ mškḥn lmhwʔ
18:28	ʔmr lh šmʕwn kʔpʔ hʔ ḥnn šbqn kl mdm wʔtyn btrk
18:29	ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dlyt ʔnš dšbq btʔ ʔw ʔbhʔ ʔw ʔḥʔ ʔw ʔnttʔ ʔw bnyʔ mṭl mlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ
18:30	wlʔ nqbl bʔʕpʔ sgyʔʔ bhnʔ zbnʔ wbʕlmʔ dʔtʔ ḥyʔ dlʕlm
18:31	wdbr yšwʕ ltrʕsrth wʔmr lhwn hʔ slqynn lʔwršlm wmštlmn klhyn dktybn bnbyʔ ʕl brh dʔnšʔ
18:32	nštlm gyr lʕmmʔ wnbzḥwn bh wnrqwn bʔpwhy
18:33	wnngdwnyhy wnṣʕrwnyhy wnqṭlwnyhy wlywmʔ dtltʔ nqwm
18:34	hnwn dyn ḥdʔ mn hlyn lʔ ʔstklw ʔlʔ mksyʔ hwt mnhwn mltʔ hdʔ wlʔ ydʕyn hww hlyn dmtmlln ʕmhwn 
18:35	wkd qryb lʔyryḥw smyʔ ḥd ytb hwʔ ʕl yd ʔwrḥʔ wḥdr
18:36	wšmʕ ql knšʔ dʕbr wmšʔl hwʔ dmnw hnʔ
18:37	ʔmryn lh yšwʕ nṣryʔ ʕbr
18:38	wqʕʔ wʔmr yšwʕ brh ddwyd ʔtrḥm ʕly
18:39	wʔylyn dʔzlyn hww qdmwhy dyšwʕ kʔyn hww bh dnštwq hw dyn ytyrʔyt qʕʔ hwʔ brh ddwyd ʔtrḥm ʕly
18:40	wqm yšwʕ wpqd dnytwnyhy lwth wkd qrb lwth šʔlh
18:41	wʔmr lh mnʔ ṣbʔ ʔnt ʔʕbd lk hw dyn ʔmr mry dʔḥzʔ
18:42	wyšwʕ ʔmr lh ḥzy hymnwtk ʔḥytk
18:43	wbr šʕth ḥzʔ wʔtʔ hwʔ btrh wmšbḥ lʔlhʔ wklh ʕmʔ dḥzʔ yhb hwʔ šwbḥʔ lʔlhʔ
19:01	wkd ʕl yšwʕ wʕbr bʔyryḥw
19:02	gbrʔ ḥd dšmh zky ʕtyrʔ hwʔ wrb mksʔ
19:03	wṣbʔ hwʔ dnḥzʔ lyšwʕ dmnw wlʔ mškḥ hwʔ mn knšʔ mṭl dbqwmth zʕwr hwʔ zky
19:04	wrhṭ qdmh lyšwʕ wslq lh lttʔ pkyhtʔ dnḥzywhy mṭl dhkwt ʕtyd hwʔ dnʕbr
19:05	wkd ʔtʔ lhy dwktʔ yšwʕ ḥzyhy wʔmr lh ʔstrhb ḥwt zky ywmnʔ gyr wlʔ dbbytk ʔhwʔ
19:06	wʔstrhb nḥt wqblh kd ḥdʔ
19:07	kd ḥzw dyn klhwn rṭnyn hww wʔmryn dlwt gbrʔ ḥṭyʔ ʕl šrʔ
19:08	qm dyn zky wʔmr lyšwʕ hʔ mry plgwt nksy yhb ʔnʔ lmsknʔ wlklnš mdm dglzt ḥd bʔrbʕʔ prʕ ʔnʔ
19:09	ʔmr lh yšwʕ ywmnʔ hww ḥyʔ lbytʔ hnʔ mṭl dʔp hnʔ brh hw dʔbrhm
19:10	ʔtʔ gyr brh dʔnšʔ dnbʕʔ wnḥʔ hw mdm dʔbyd hwʔ
19:11	wkd šmʕyn hww hlyn ʔwsp lmʔmr mtlʔ mṭl dqryb hwʔ lʔwršlm wsbryn hww dbhy šʕtʔ ʕtydʔ dttglʔ mlkwth dʔlhʔ
19:12	wʔmr gbrʔ ḥd br ṭwhmʔ rbʔ ʔzl lʔtrʔ rḥyqʔ dnsb lh mlkwtʔ wnhpwk
19:13	wqrʔ ʕsrʔ ʕbdwhy wyhb lhwn ʕsrʔ mnyn wʔmr lhwn ʔttgrw ʕd ʔtʔ ʔnʔ
19:14	bny mdynth dyn snyn hww lh wšdrw ʔyzgdʔ btrh wʔmryn lʔ ṣbyn ḥnn dnmlk ʕlyn hnʔ
19:15	wkd nsb mlkwtʔ whpk ʔmr dnqrwn lh hnwn ʕbdwhy dyhb lhwn kspʔ dndʕ mnʔ kl ḥd ḥd mnhwn ʔttgr
19:16	wʔtʔ qdmyʔ wʔmr mry mnyk ʕsrʔ mnyn ʔwtr
19:17	ʔmr lh ʔyw ʕbdʔ ṭbʔ dbqlyl ʔštkḥt mhymn thwʔ šlyṭ ʕl ʕsrʔ krkyn
19:18	wʔtʔ dtryn wʔmr mry mnyk ḥmšʔ mnyn ʕbd
19:19	ʔmr ʔp lhnʔ ʔp ʔnt thwʔ šlyṭ ʕl ḥmšʔ krkyn
19:20	wʔtʔ ʔḥrnʔ wʔmr mry hʔ mnyk hw dʔyt hwʔ lwty kd sym bsdwnʔ
19:21	dḥlt gyr mnk dgbrʔ ʔnt qšyʔ wšql ʔnt mdm dlʔ smt wḥṣd ʔnt mdm dlʔ zrʕt
19:22	ʔmr lh mn pwmk ʔdwnk ʕbdʔ byšʔ ydʕ hwyt ly dgbrʔ ʔnʔ qšyʔ wšql ʔnʔ mdm dlʔ smt wḥṣd ʔnʔ mdm dlʔ zrʕt
19:23	lmnʔ lʔ yhbt kspy ʕl ptwrʔ wʔnʔ ʔtʔ hwyt tbʕ lh ʕm rbyth
19:24	wlhnwn dqymyn qdmwhy ʔmr sbw mnh mnyʔ whbw lhw dʔyt lwth ʕsrʔ mnyn
19:25	ʔmryn lh mrn ʔyt lwth ʕsrʔ mnyn
19:26	ʔmr lhwn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dlkl mn dʔyt lh ntyhb lh wmn hw dlyt lh ʔp hw dʔyt lh ntnsb mnh
19:27	brm lhnwn bʕldbby ʔylyn dlʔ ṣbw dʔmlk ʕlyhwn ʔytw ʔnwn wqṭlw ʔnwn qdmy
19:28	wkd ʔmr hlyn yšwʕ npq lqdmwhy dnʔzl lʔwršlm
19:29	wkd mṭy lbyt pgʔ wbyt ʕnyʔ ʕl gnb ṭwrʔ dmtqrʔ dbyt zytʔ šdr tryn mn tlmydwhy
19:30	wʔmr lhwn zlw lqrytʔ hy dlqwbln wkd ʕʔlyn ʔntwn lh hʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn ʕylʔ dʔsyr dʔnš mmtwm lʔ rkb ʕlwhy šrw ʔytʔwhy
19:31	wʔn ʔnš mšʔl lkwn lmnʔ šryn ʔntwn lh hknʔ ʔmrw lh lmrn mtbʕʔ
19:32	wʔzlw hnwn dʔštdrw wʔškḥw ʔyknʔ dʔmr lhwn
19:33	wkd šryn lh lʕylʔ ʔmryn lhwn mrwhy mnʔ šryn ʔntwn ʕylʔ hw
19:34	wʔmrw lhwn dlmrn mtbʕʔ
19:35	wʔytywhy lwt yšwʕ wʔrmyw ʕl ʕylʔ mʔnyhwn wʔrkbwhy lyšwʕ ʕlwhy
19:36	kd dyn ʔzl prsyn hww mʔnyhwn bʔwrḥʔ
19:37	wkd qrb lmḥttʔ dṭwrʔ dbyt zytʔ šryw klh knšʔ dtlmydʔ ḥdyn wmšbḥyn lʔlhʔ bqlʔ rmʔ ʕl kl ḥylʔ dḥzw
19:38	wʔmryn hww bryk hw mlkʔ dʔtʔ bšmh dmryʔ šlmʔ bšmyʔ wšwbḥʔ bmrwmʔ
19:39	ʔnšʔ dyn mn pryšʔ mn byny knšʔ ʔmryn lh rby kʔy btlmydyk
19:40	ʔmr lhwn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dʔn hlyn nštqwn kʔpʔ nqʕyn
19:41	wkd qrb wḥzh lmdyntʔ bkʔ ʕlyh
19:42	wʔmr ʔlw ky ydʕty ʔylyn dʔytyhyn dšlmky ʔpn bhnʔ ywmky hšʔ dyn ʔtksy lhyn mn ʕynyky
19:43	nʔtwn lky dyn ywmtʔ dnḥdrwnky bʕldbbyky wnʔlṣwnky mn kl dwkʔ
19:44	wnsḥpwnky wlbnyky bgwky wlʔ nšbqwn bky kʔp ʕl kʔp ḥlp dlʔ ydʕty zbnʔ dswʕrnky
19:45	wkd ʕl lhyklʔ šry lmpqw lʔylyn dzbnyn bh wmzbnyn
19:46	wʔmr lhwn ktyb dbyty byt ṣlwtʔ ʔytwhy ʔntwn dyn ʕbdtwnyhy mʕrtʔ dlsṭyʔ
19:47	whw mlp hwʔ kl ywm bhyklʔ rby khnʔ dyn wsprʔ wqšyšʔ dʕmʔ bʕyn hww lmwbdwth
19:48	wlʔ mškḥyn hww mnʔ nʕbdwn lh klh gyr ʕmʔ tlʔ hwʔ bh lmšmʕh 
20:01	whwʔ bḥd mn ywmtʔ kd mlp bhyklʔ lʕmʔ wmsbr qmw ʕlwhy rby khnʔ wsprʔ ʕm qšyšʔ
20:02	wʔmryn lh ʔmr ln bʔynʔ šwlṭnʔ hlyn ʕbd ʔnt wmnw hw dyhb lk šwlṭnʔ hnʔ
20:03	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn ʔšʔlkwn ʔp ʔnʔ mltʔ wʔmrw ly
20:04	mʕmwdyth dywḥnn mn šmyʔ hwt ʔw mn bny ʔnšʔ
20:05	hnwn dyn mtḥšbyn hww bnpšhwn wʔmryn dʔn nʔmr mn šmyʔ ʔmr ln wmṭl mnʔ lʔ hymntwnyhy
20:06	ʔn dyn nʔmr mn bny ʔnšʔ rgm ln ʕmʔ klh mpsyn gyr dywḥnn nbyʔ hw
20:07	wʔmrw lh dlʔ ydʕynn mn ʔymkʔ hy
20:08	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ wlʔ ʔnʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn bʔynʔ šwlṭnʔ hlyn ʕbd ʔnʔ
20:09	wšry dnʔmr lʕmʔ mtlʔ hnʔ gbrʔ ḥd nṣb krmʔ wʔwḥdh lplḥʔ wʔbʕd zbnʔ sgyʔʔ
20:10	wbzbnʔ šdr ʕbdh lwt plḥʔ dntlwn lh mn pʔrʔ dkrmʔ plḥʔ dyn mḥʔwhy wšdrwhy kd sryq
20:11	wʔwsp wšdr lʕbdh ʔḥrnʔ hnwn dyn ʔp lhw mḥʔwhyw ṣʕrwhy wšdrwhy kd sryq
20:12	wʔwsp wšdr dtltʔ hnwn dyn wʔp lhw ṣlpwhy wʔpqwhy
20:13	ʔmr mrʔ krmʔ mnʔ ʔʕbd ʔšdr bry ḥbybʔ kbr nḥzwnyhy wntkḥdwn
20:14	kd ḥzʔwhy dyn plḥʔ mtḥšbyn hww bnpšhwn wʔmryn hnw yrtʔ tw nqṭlywhy wthwʔ yrtwtʔ dyln
20:15	wʔpqwhy lbr mn krmʔ wqṭlwhy mnʔ hkyl nʕbd lhwn mrʔ krmʔ
20:16	nʔtʔ wnwbd lplḥʔ hnwn wntl krmʔ lʔḥrnʔ kd šmʕw dyn ʔmrw lʔ thwʔ hdʔ
20:17	hw dyn ḥr bhwn wʔmr wmnʔ hy hy dktybʔ dkʔpʔ dʔslyw bnyʔ hy hwt lryš qrnʔ dzwytʔ
20:18	wkl dnpl ʕl hy kʔpʔ ntrʕʕ wkl mn dhy tpl ʕlwhy tdrywhy
20:19	bʕw hww dyn rby khnʔ wsprʔ dnrmwn ʕlwhy ʔydyʔ bhy šʕtʔ wdḥlw mn ʕmʔ ydʕw gyr dʕlyhwn ʔmr mtlʔ hnʔ
20:20	wšdrw lwth gšwšʔ dmtdmyn bzdyqʔ dnʔḥdwnyhy bmltʔ wnšlmwnyhy ldynʔ wlšwlṭnh dhgmwnʔ
20:21	wšʔlwhy wʔmryn lh mlpnʔ ydʕynn dtryṣʔyt mmll ʔnt wmlp wlʔ nsb ʔnt bʔpʔ ʔlʔ bqwštʔ ʔwrḥʔ dʔlhʔ mlp ʔnt
20:22	šlyṭ ln dntl ksp ršʔ lqsr ʔw lʔ
20:23	hw dyn ʔstkl ḥrʕwthwn wʔmr mnʔ mnsyn ʔntwn ly
20:24	ḥwʔwny dynrʔ dmn ʔyt bh ṣlmʔ wktybtʔ hnwn dyn ʔmrw dqsr
20:25	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ hbw hkyl dqsr lqsr wdʔlhʔ lʔlhʔ
20:26	wlʔ ʔškḥw lmʔḥd mnh mltʔ qdm ʕmʔ wʔtdmrw ʕl ptgmh wštqw
20:27	qrbw dyn ʔnšyn mn zdwqyʔ hnwn dʔmryn dqymtʔ lyt wšʔlwhy
20:28	wʔmryn lh mlpnʔ mwšʔ ktb ln dʔn ʔnš nmwt ʔḥwhy dʔyt lh ʔnttʔ dlʔ bnyʔ nsb ʔḥwhy ʔntth wnqym zrʕʔ lʔḥwhy
20:29	šbʕʔ dyn ʔḥyn ʔyt hww qdmyʔ nsb ʔnttʔ wmyt dlʔ bnyʔ
20:30	wnsbh dtryn lʔntth whnʔ myt dlʔ bnyʔ
20:31	wdtltʔ twb nsbh whkwt wʔp šbʕtyhwn wmytw wlʔ šbqw bnyʔ
20:32	wmytt bḥrtʔ ʔp ʔnttʔ
20:33	bqymtʔ hkyl dʔynʔ mnhwn thwʔ ʔnttʔ šbʕtyhwn gyr nsbwh
20:34	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ bnwhy dʕlmʔ hnʔ nsbyn nšʔ wnšʔ hwyn lgbrʔ
20:35	hnwn dyn dlhw ʕlmʔ šww wlqymtʔ dmn byt mytʔ lʔ nsbyn nšʔ wʔp lʔ nšʔ hwyn lgbrʔ
20:36	ʔplʔ gyr twb lmmt mškḥyn ʔyk mlʔkʔ ʔnwn gyr wbnyʔ ʔytyhwn dʔlhʔ mṭl dhww bnyʔ dqymtʔ
20:37	dqymyn dyn mytʔ ʔp mwšʔ bdq ʔdkr gyr bsnyʔ kd ʔmr mryʔ ʔlhh dʔbrhm wʔlhh dʔysḥq wʔlhh dyʕqwb
20:38	ʔlhʔ dyn lʔ hwʔ dmytʔ ʔlʔ dḥyʔ klhwn gyr ḥyyn ʔnwn lh
20:39	wʕnw ʔnšyn mn sprʔ wʔmryn lh mlpnʔ špyr ʔmr ʔnt
20:40	wlʔ twb ʔmrḥw lmšʔlwth ʕl mdm
20:41	wʔmr hwʔ lhwn ʔyknʔ ʔmryn sprʔ ʕl mšyḥʔ dbrh hw ddwyd
20:42	whw dwyd ʔmr bktbʔ dmzmwrʔ dʔmr mryʔ lmry tb lk mn ymyny
20:43	ʕdmʔ dʔsym bʕldbbyk tḥyt rglyk
20:44	ʔn hkyl dwyd mry qrʔ lh ʔyknʔ brh hw
20:45	wkd klh ʕmʔ šmʕ hwʔ ʔmr ltlmydwhy
20:46	ʔzdhrw mn sprʔ dṣbyn lmhlkw bʔsṭlʔ wrḥmyn šlmʔ bšwqʔ wryš mwtbʔ bknwštʔ wryš smkʔ bʔḥšmytʔ
20:47	hnwn dʔklyn btʔ dʔrmltʔ bʕltʔ dmwrkyn ṣlwthwn hnwn nqblwn dynʔ ytyrʔ
21:01	ḥr dyn yšwʕ bʕtyrʔ ʔylyn drmyn hww byt gzʔ qwrbnyhwn
21:02	wḥzʔ ʔp ʔrmltʔ ḥdʔ mskntʔ dʔrmyt šmwnʔ tryn
21:03	wʔmr šrrʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dhdʔ ʔrmltʔ mskntʔ ʔrmyt ytyr mn klnš
21:04	klhwn gyr hlyn mn mʔ dytyr hwʔ lhwn ʔrmyw byt qwrbnʔ dʔlhʔ hdʔ dyn mn ḥsyrwth kl dqnyʔ hwt ʔrmyth 
21:05	wkd ʔmryn hww ʔnšyn ʕl hyklʔ dbkʔpʔ špyrtʔ wbqwrbnʔ mṣbt ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ
21:06	hlyn dḥzyn ʔntwn nʔtwn ywmtʔ dbhwn lʔ tštbq kʔp ʕl kʔp dlʔ tsttr
21:07	wmšʔlyn hww lh wʔmryn mlpnʔ ʔmty hlyn nhwyn wmnʔ hy ʔtʔ mʔ dqrybn hlyn dnhwyn
21:08	hw dyn ʔmr lhwn ḥzw lmʔ tṭʕwn sgyʔʔ gyr nʔtwn bšmy wnʔmrwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ mšyḥʔ wzbnʔ qrb lʔ dyn tʔzlwn btrhwn
21:09	wmʔ dšmʕyn ʔntwn qrbʔ wšgwšyʔ lʔ tdḥlwn ʕtydn ʔnyn gyr hlyn lwqdm lmhwʔ ʔlʔ lʔ ʕdkyl mṭt ḥrtʔ
21:10	nqwm gyr ʕmʔ ʕl ʕmʔ wmlkw ʕl mlkw
21:11	wzwʕʔ rwrbʔ nhwwn bdwkʔ dwkʔ wkpnʔ wmwtnʔ wnhwyn dḥltʔ wswrdʔ wʔtwtʔ rwrbtʔ mn šmyʔ ntḥzyn wstwʔ rwrbʔ nhwwn
21:12	qdm dyn hlyn klhyn nrmwn ʕlykwn ʔydyʔ wnrdpwnkwn wnšlmwnkwn lknwštʔ wlbyt ʔsyrʔ wnqrbwnkwn qdm mlkʔ whgmwnʔ mṭl šmy
21:13	hwyʔ lkwn dyn lshdwtʔ
21:14	symw dyn blbkwn dlʔ thwwn mtylpyn lmpq rwḥʔ
21:15	ʔnʔ gyr ʔtl lkwn pwmʔ wḥkmtʔ ʔydʔ dlʔ nškḥwn lmqm lqwblh klhwn bʕldbbykwn
21:16	nšlmwnkwn dyn ʔbhykwn wʔḥykwn wʔḥynykwn wrḥmykwn wnmytwn mnkwn
21:17	wthwwn snyʔyn mn kl ʔnš mṭl šmy
21:18	wmntʔ mn rškwn lʔ tʔbd
21:19	bmsybrnwtkwn dyn tqnwn npškwn
21:20	mʔ dyn dḥzytwn lʔwršlm dḥdyryn lh ḥylʔ hydyn dʕw dqrb lh ḥwrbh
21:21	hydyn ʔylyn dbyhwd ʔnwn nʕrqwn lṭwrʔ wʔylyn dbgwh ʔnwn nʕrqwn wdbqwryʔ lʔ nʕlwn lh
21:22	dywmtʔ ʔnwn hlyn dtbʕtʔ dnšlm kl mʔ dktyb
21:23	wy dyn lʔylyn dbṭnn wlʔylyn dmynqn bhnwn ywmtʔ nhwʔ gyr ʔwlṣnʔ rbʔ bʔrʕʔ wrwgzʔ ʕl ʕmʔ hnʔ
21:24	wnplwn bpwmʔ dḥrbʔ wnštbwn lkl ʔtr wʔwršlm thwʔ mtdyšʔ mn ʕmmʔ ʕdmʔ dnšlmwn zbnʔ dʕmmʔ
21:25	wnhwyn ʔtwtʔ bšmšʔ wbshrʔ wbkwkbʔ wbʔrʕʔ ʔwlṣnʔ dʕmmʔ wpwšk ʔydyʔ mn twhtʔ dqlʔ dymʔ
21:26	wzwʕʔ dmpq npštʔ dbnynšʔ mn dḥltʔ dmdm dʕtyd lmʔtʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ wnttzyʕwn ḥylʔ dšmyʔ
21:27	whydyn nḥzwnyhy lbrh dʔnšʔ dʔtʔ bʕnnʔ ʕm ḥylʔ sgyʔʔ wšwbḥʔ rbʔ
21:28	mʔ dyn dšry hlyn dnhwyn ʔtlbbw wʔrymw ršykwn mṭl dqrb lh pwrqnkwn
21:29	wʔmr hwʔ lhwn mtlʔ ḥzw lttʔ wlklhwn ʔylnʔ
21:30	dmʔ dmprʕyn mḥdʔ mnhwn mstklyn ʔntwn dqrb lh qyṭʔ
21:31	hknʔ ʔp ʔntwn mʔ dḥzytwn hlyn dhwyn dʕw dqrybʔ hy mlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ
21:32	ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dlʔ tʕbr šrbtʔ hdʔ ʕdmʔ dhlyn klhyn nhwyn
21:33	šmyʔ wʔrʕʔ nʕbrwn wmly lʔ nʕbrn
21:34	ʔzdhrw dyn bnpškwn dlʔ mtwm nʔqrwn lbwtkwn bʔswṭwtʔ wbrwywtʔ wbṣptʔ dʕlmʔ wmn šlyʔ nʔtʔ ʕlykwn ywmʔ hw
21:35	ʔyk ṣpḥtʔ gyr nṣpḥ ʕl klhwn ʔylyn dytbyn ʕl ʔpyh dklh ʔrʕʔ
21:36	hww hkyl šhryn bklzbn wmṣlyn dtšwwn lmʕrq mn hlyn dʕtydn lmhwʔ wtqwmwn qdm brh dʔnšʔ
21:37	bʔymmʔ dyn mlp hwʔ bhyklʔ wbllyʔ npq hwʔ bʔt bṭwrʔ dmtqrʔ dbyt zytʔ
21:38	wklh ʕmʔ mqdmyn hww lwth lhyklʔ lmšmʕ mlth
22:01	qryb hwʔ dyn ʕdʕdʔ dpṭyrʔ dmtqrʔ pṣḥʔ
22:02	wbʕyn hww rby khnʔ wsprʔ dʔyknʔ nqṭlwnyhy dḥlyn hww gyr mn ʕmʔ
22:03	ʕl hwʔ dyn sṭnʔ byhwdʔ dmtqrʔ skrywṭʔ dʔytwhy hwʔ mn mnynʔ dtrʕsr
22:04	wʔzl mll ʕm rby khnʔ wsprʔ wrby ḥylʔ dhyklʔ ʔyk dnšlmywhy lhwn
22:05	wḥdyw wʔqymw dntlwn lh kspʔ
22:06	wʔštwdy lhwn wbʕʔ hwʔ plʕʔ dnšlmywhy lhwn blʕd mn knšʔ
22:07	wmṭy ywmʔ dpṭyrʔ dbh ʔyt hwʔ ʕydʔ dntnks pṣḥʔ
22:08	wšdr yšwʕ lkʔpʔ wlywḥnn wʔmr lhwn zlw ṭybw ln pṣḥʔ dnlʕs
22:09	hnwn dyn ʔmrw lh ʔykʔ ṣbʔ ʔnt dnṭyb
22:10	ʔmr lhwn hʔ mʔ dʕʔlyn ʔntwn lmdyntʔ pgʕ bkwn gbrʔ dšqyl grbʔ dmyʔ zlw btrh
22:11	wʔykʔ dʕʔl ʔmrw lmrh dbytʔ rbn ʔmr ʔynw byt mšryʔ ʔykʔ dʔkwl pṣḥʔ ʕm tlmydy
22:12	whʔ hw mḥwʔ lkwn ʕlytʔ ḥdʔ rbtʔ dmšwyʔ tmn ṭybw
22:13	wʔzlw ʔškḥw ʔyk dʔmr lhwn wṭybw pṣḥʔ
22:14	wkd hwʔ ʕdnʔ ʔtʔ yšwʕ ʔstmk wtrʕsr šlyḥʔ ʕmh
22:15	wʔmr lhwn rgtʔ rgtny dhnʔ pṣḥʔ ʔkwl ʕmkwn qdm dʔḥš
22:16	ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn gyr dmkyl lʔ ʔklywhy ʕdmʔ dnšlm bmlkwth dʔlhʔ
22:17	wnsb ksʔ wʔwdy wʔmr sbw hnʔ wplgw byntkwn
22:18	ʔmr ʔnʔ gyr lkwn dlʔ ʔštʔ mn yldʔ dgptʔ ʕdmʔ dtʔtʔ mlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ
22:19	wnsb lḥmʔ wʔwdy wqṣʔ wyhb lhwn wʔmr hnw pgry dʕl ʔpykwn mtyhb hdʔ hwytwn ʕbdyn ldwkrny
22:20	whkwt ʔp ʕl ksʔ mn btr dʔḥšmw ʔmr hnʔ ksʔ dytqʔ ḥdtʔ bdmy dḥlpykwn mtʔšd
22:21	brm hʔ ʔydh dmšlmny ʕl ptwrʔ
22:22	wbrh dʔnšʔ ʔzl ʔyknʔ dʔtprš brm wy lhw gbrʔ dbʔydh mštlm
22:23	wšryw dnʕqbwn bynthwn dmnw ky mnhwn hw dhdʔ ʕtyd lmsʕr 
22:24	hwʔ dyn ʔp ḥrynʔ bynthwn dmn ʔyt bhwn drb
22:25	hw dyn yšwʕ ʔmr lhwn mlkyhwn dʕmmʔ mryhwn ʔnwn wdšlyṭyn ʕlyhwn ʕbdy ṭbtʔ mtqryn
22:26	ʔntwn dyn lʔ hknʔ ʔlʔ ʔynʔ drb bkwn nhwʔ ʔyk zʕwrʔ wʔynʔ dršʔ hw ʔyk mšmšnʔ
22:27	mnw gyr rb hw dsmyk ʔw hw dmšmš lʔ hwʔ hw dsmyk ʔnʔ dyn ʔyty byntkwn ʔyk hw dmšmš
22:28	ʔntwn ʔnwn dyn dktrtwn lwty bnsywny
22:29	wʔnʔ mštwdʔ ʔnʔ lkwn ʔyk dʔštwdy ly ʔby mlkwtʔ
22:30	dtʔklwn wtštwn ʕl ptwrʔ dmlkwtʔ dyly wttbwn ʕl kwrswtʔ wtdwnwn trʕsr šbṭʔ dʔysryl
22:31	wʔmr yšwʕ lšmʕwn šmʕwn hʔ sṭnʔ šʔl dnʕrwbkwn ʔyk dlḥṭʔ
22:32	wʔnʔ bʕyt ʕlyk dlʔ tḥsr hymnwtk ʔp ʔnt bzbn ʔtpny wšrr ʔḥyk
22:33	šmʕwn dyn ʔmr lh mry ʕmk mṭyb ʔnʔ wlbyt ʔsyrʔ wlmwtʔ
22:34	ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔmr ʔnʔ lk šmʕwn dlʔ nqrʔ trnglʔ ywmnʔ ʕdmʔ dtlt zbnyn tkpwr dlʔ ydʕ ʔnt ly
22:35	wʔmr lhwn kd šdrtkwn dlʔ kysʔ wdlʔ trmlʔ wmsnʔ lmʔ ḥsr lkwn mdm ʔmryn lh wlʔ mdm
22:36	ʔmr lhwn mn hšʔ mn dʔyt lh kysʔ nsb whknʔ ʔp trmlʔ wmn dlyt lh sypʔ nzbn nḥth wnzbn lh sypʔ
22:37	ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn gyr dʔp hdʔ dktybʔ wlʔ dttmlʔ by dʕm ʕwlʔ ʔtmnʔ klhyn gyr dʕly ʔštlm
22:38	whnwn ʔmryn lh mrn hʔ hrkʔ ʔyt tryn sypyn ʔmr lhwn spqyn
22:39	wnpq wʔzl ʔyk dmʕd hwʔ lṭwrʔ dbyt zytʔ wʔzlw btrh ʔp tlmydwhy
22:40	wkd mṭy ldwktʔ ʔmr lhwn ṣlw dlʔ tʕlwn lnsywnʔ
22:41	whw prq mnhwn ʔyk mšdʔ kʔpʔ wsm bwrkwhy wmṣlʔ hwʔ
22:42	wʔmr ʔbʔ ʔn ṣbʔ ʔnt nʕbrny ksʔ hnʔ brm lʔ ṣbyny ʔlʔ dylk nhwʔ
22:43	wʔtḥzy lh mlʔkʔ mn šmyʔ dmḥyl lh
22:44	wkd hwʔ bdḥltʔ tkybʔyt mṣlʔ hwʔ whwt dwʕth ʔyk šltʔ ddmʔ wnpl ʕl ʔrʕʔ
22:45	wqm mn ṣlwth wʔtʔ lwt tlmydwhy wʔškḥ ʔnwn kd dmkyn mn ʕqtʔ
22:46	wʔmr lhwn mnʔ dmkyn ʔntwn qwmw ṣlw dlʔ tʕlwn lnsywnʔ
22:47	wʕd hw mmll hʔ knšʔ whw dmtqrʔ yhwdʔ ḥd mn trʕsr ʔtʔ qdmyhwn wqrb lwt yšwʕ wnšqh hdʔ gyr ʔtʔ yhb hwʔ lhwn dʔynʔ dnšq ʔnʔ hwyw
22:48	ʔmr lh yšwʕ yhwdʔ bnwšqtʔ mšlm ʔnt lh lbrh dʔnšʔ
22:49	kd ḥzw dyn ʔylyn dʕmh mdm dhwʔ ʔmryn lh mrn nmḥʔ ʔnwn bsypʔ
22:50	wmḥʔ ḥd mnhwn lʕbdh drb khnʔ wnsbh ʔdnh dymynʔ
22:51	ʕnʔ dyn yšwʕ wʔmr kdw ʕdmʔ lhdʔ wqrb lʔdnh dhw dblʕ wʔsyh
22:52	wʔmr yšwʕ lhnwn dʔtw ʕlwhy rby khnʔ wqšyšʔ wrby ḥylʔ dhyklʔ ʔyk dʕl lsṭyʔ npqtwn ʕly bsypʔ wbḥwṭrʔ dtʔḥdwnny
22:53	klywm ʕmkwn hwyt bhyklʔ wlʔ ʔwšṭtwn ʕly ʔydyʔ ʔlʔ hdʔ hy šʕtkwn wšwlṭnʔ dḥšwkʔ
22:54	wʔḥdw ʔytywhy lbyth drb khnʔ wšmʕwn ʔtʔ hwʔ btrh mn rwḥqʔ
22:55	ʔwḥdw dyn nwrʔ mṣʕt drtʔ wytbyn hww ḥdryh wytb hwʔ ʔp hw šmʕwn bynthwn
22:56	wḥzth ʕlymtʔ ḥdʔ dytb lwt nwrʔ wḥrt bh wʔmrʔ ʔp hnʔ ʕmh hwʔ
22:57	hw dyn kpr wʔmr ʔnttʔ lʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ lh
22:58	wbtr qlyl ḥzyhy ʔḥrnʔ wʔmr lh ʔp ʔnt mnhwn ʔnt kʔpʔ dyn ʔmr lʔ hwyt
22:59	wbtr šʕʔ ḥdʔ ʔḥrnʔ mtḥrʔ hwʔ wʔmr šryrʔyt ʔp hnʔ ʕmh hwʔ ʔp glylyʔ hw gyr
22:60	ʔmr kʔpʔ gbrʔ lʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ mnʔ ʔmr ʔnt wmḥdʔ kd hw mmll qrʔ trnglʔ
22:61	wʔtpny yšwʕ wḥr bkʔpʔ wʔtdkr šmʕwn mlth dmrn dʔmr hwʔ lh dqdm dnqrʔ trnglʔ tkpwr by tlt zbnyn
22:62	wnpq lbr šmʕwn bkʔ mryrʔyt
22:63	wgbrʔ dʔḥydyn hww lyšwʕ mbzḥyn hww bh wmḥpyn hww lh
22:64	wmḥyn hww lh ʕl ʔpwhy wʔmryn ʔtnbʔ mnw mḥk
22:65	wʔḥrnytʔ sgyʔtʔ mgdpyn hww wʔmryn ʕlwhy
22:66	wkd nght ʔtknšw qšyšʔ wrby khnʔ wsprʔ wʔsqwhy lbyt knwšthwn
22:67	wʔmryn lh ʔn ʔnt hw mšyḥʔ ʔmr ln ʔmr lhwn ʔn ʔmr lkwn lʔ thymnwnny
22:68	wʔn ʔšʔlkwn lʔ mpnyn ʔntwn ly ptgmʔ ʔw šryn ʔntwn ly
22:69	mn hšʔ nhwʔ brh dʔnšʔ ytb mn ymynʔ dḥylʔ dʔlhʔ
22:70	ʔmryn dyn klhwn ʔnt hw hkyl brh dʔlhʔ ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔntwn ʔmryn ʔntwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ
22:71	ʔmryn mnʔ twb mtbʕyn ln shdʔ ḥnn gyr šmʕn mn pwmh
23:01	wqmw klh knšhwn wʔytywhy lwt pylṭws
23:02	wšryw ʔklyn qrṣwhy wʔmryn lhnʔ ʔškḥn dmṭʕʔ ʕmn wklʔ dksp ršʔ lqsr lʔ ntl wʔmr ʕl npšh dmlkʔ hw mšyḥʔ
23:03	pylṭws dyn šʔlh wʔmr lh ʔnt hw mlkʔ dyhwdyʔ ʔmr lh ʔnt ʔmrt
23:04	wʔmr pylṭws lrby khnʔ wlknšʔ ʔnʔ mdm ʕltʔ lʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ ʕl gbrʔ hnʔ
23:05	hnwn dyn mzʕqyn hww wʔmryn dšgšh lʕmn kd mlp bklh yhwd wšry mn glylʔ wʕdmʔ lhrkʔ 
23:06	pylṭws dyn kd šmʕ šmʔ dglylʔ šʔl dʔn gbrʔ hw glylyʔ
23:07	wkd ydʕ dmn tḥyt šwlṭnʔ hw dhrwds šdrh lwth dhrwds mṭl dbʔwršlm hwʔ bhnwn ywmtʔ
23:08	hrwds dyn kd ḥzyhy lyšwʕ ḥdy ṭb ṣbʔ hwʔ gyr lmḥzyh mn zbnʔ sgyʔʔ mṭl dšmʕ hwʔ ʕlwhy sgyʔtʔ wmsbr hwʔ dmdm ʔtʔ nḥzʔ mnh
23:09	wmlʔ sgyʔtʔ mšʔl hwʔ lh yšwʕ dyn mdm ptgmʔ lʔ ʔtybh
23:10	qymyn hww dyn rby khnʔ wsprʔ wʕzyzʔyt ʔklyn hww qrṣwhy
23:11	hrwds dyn šṭh hw wplḥwhy wkd mbzḥ ʔlbšh nḥtʔ dzḥwrytʔ wšdrh lwt pylṭws
23:12	wbhw ywmʔ hww rḥmʔ pylṭws whrwds ʕm ḥddʔ bʕldbbwtʔ hwt gyr mn qdym bynthwn
23:13	qrʔ dyn pylṭws lrby khnʔ wlʔrkwnʔ wlʕmʔ
23:14	wʔmr lhwn qrbtwn ly gbrʔ hnʔ ʔyk mhpk ʕmkwn whʔ ʔnʔ ʕqbth lʕnykwn wʕltʔ mdm lʔ ʔškḥt bgbrʔ hnʔ mn kl dmršyn ʔntwn bh
23:15	ʔlʔ ʔplʔ hrwds šdrth gyr lwth whʔ lʔ mdm dšwʔ lmwtʔ sʕyr lh
23:16	ʔrdywhy hkyl wʔšbqywhy
23:17	ʕydʔ gyr ʔyt hwʔ dnšrʔ lhwn ḥd bʕdʕdʔ
23:18	qʕw dyn klh knšʔ wʔmryn šqwlyhy lhnʔ wšry ln lbr ʔbʔ
23:19	hw ʔynʔ dmṭl ʔsṭsys dhwt bmdyntʔ wqṭlʔ rmʔ hwʔ byt ʔsyrʔ
23:20	twb dyn mll ʕmhwn pylṭws kd ṣbʔ dnšrʔ lyšwʕ
23:21	hnwn dyn qʕyn hww wʔmryn zqwpyhy zqwpyhy
23:22	hw dyn dtlt zbnyn ʔmr lhwn mnʔ gyr dbyš ʕbd hnʔ mdm ʕltʔ dšwyʔ lmwtʔ lʔ ʔškḥt bh ʔrdywhy hkyl wʔšbqywhy
23:23	hnwn dyn tkbyn hww bqlʔ rmʔ wšʔlyn hww lh dnzqpwnyhy wʕšn hwʔ qlhwn dylhwn wdrby khnʔ
23:24	pylṭws dyn pqd dthwʔ šʔlthwn
23:25	wšrʔ lhwn lhw dmṭl ʔsṭsys wqṭlʔ rmʔ hwʔ byt ʔsyrʔ hw dšʔlw lyšwʕ dyn ʔšlm lṣbynhwn
23:26	wkd mwblyn lh ʔḥdw lšmʕwn qwrynyʔ dʔtʔ mn qrytʔ wsmw ʕlwhy zqypʔ dnṭʕn btrh dyšwʕ
23:27	wʔtʔ hwʔ btrh swgʔʔ dʕmʔ wnšʔ ʔylyn dmrqdn hwy wʔlyn ʕlwhy
23:28	wʔtpny yšwʕ lwthyn wʔmr bnt ʔwršlm lʔ tbkyn ʕly brm ʕl npškyn bkyyn wʕl bnykyn
23:29	dhʔ ʔtyn ywmtʔ dbhwn nʔmrwn ṭwbyhyn lʕqrtʔ wlkrstʔ dlʔ yld wltdyʔ dlʔ ʔynqw
23:30	hydyn tšrwn lmʔmr lṭwrʔ dplw ʕlyn wlrmtʔ dksynn
23:31	dʔn bqysʔ rṭybʔ hlyn ʕbdyn bybyšʔ mnʔ nhwʔ
23:32	wʔtyn hww ʕmh tryn ḥrnyn ʕbdy byštʔ dntqṭlwn
23:33	wkd ʔtw ldwktʔ ḥdʔ dmtqryʔ qrqptʔ zqpwhy tmn wlhnwn ʕbdy byštʔ ḥd mn ymynh wḥd mn smlh
23:34	hw dyn yšwʕ ʔmr hwʔ ʔbʔ šbwq lhwn lʔ gyr ydʕyn mnʔ ʕbdyn wplgw nḥtwhy wʔrmyw ʕlyhwn psʔ
23:35	qʔm hwʔ dyn ʕmʔ wḥzʔ wmmyqyn hww bh ʔp ʔrkwnʔ wʔmryn lʔḥrnʔ ʔḥy nḥʔ npšh ʔn hwyw mšyḥʔ gbyh dʔlhʔ
23:36	wmbzḥyn hww bh ʔp ʔsṭrṭywṭʔ kd qrbyn lwth wmqrbyn lh ḥlʔ
23:37	wʔmryn lh ʔn ʔnt hw mlkʔ dyhwdyʔ ʔḥʔ npšk
23:38	ʔyt hwʔ dyn ʔp ktbʔ dktyb lʕl mnh ywnʔyt wrhwmʔyt wʕbrʔyt hnw mlkʔ dyhwdyʔ
23:39	ḥd dyn mn hnwn ʕbdy byštʔ dṣlybyn hww ʕmh mgdp hwʔ ʕlwhy wʔmr ʔn ʔnt hw mšyḥʔ pṣʔ npšk wpṣʔ ʔp ln
23:40	wkʔʔ bh ḥbrh wʔmr lh ʔp lʔ mn ʔlhʔ dḥl ʔnt dʔp ʔnt bh ʔnt bdynʔ
23:41	wḥnn kʔnʔyt ʔyk dšwyn hwyn gyr wʔyk dʕbdn ʔtprʕn hnʔ dyn mdm dsnʔ lʔ ʕbyd lh
23:42	wʔmr lyšwʕ ʔtdkryny mry mʔ dʔtʔ ʔnt bmlkwtk
23:43	ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lk dywmnʔ ʕmy thwʔ bprdysʔ
23:44	ʔyt hwy dyn ʔyk šʕʔ št whwʔ ḥšwkʔ ʕl klh ʔrʕʔ ʕdmʔ ltšʕ šʕyn
23:45	wšmšʔ ḥšk wʔṣṭry ʔpy trʕʔ dhyklʔ mn mṣʕth
23:46	wqʕʔ yšwʕ bqlʔ rmʔ wʔmr ʔby bʔydyk sʔm ʔnʔ rwḥy hdʔ ʔmr wšlm
23:47	kd ḥzʔ dyn qnṭrwnʔ mdm dhwʔ šbḥ lʔlhʔ wʔmr šryrʔyt hnʔ gbrʔ zdyqʔ hwʔ
23:48	wklhwn knšʔ ʔylyn dknyšyn hww lḥztʔ hdʔ kd ḥzw mdm dhwʔ hpkw kd ṭrpyn ʕl ḥdyhwn
23:49	wqymyn hww mn rwḥqʔ klhwn ydwʕwhy dyšwʕ wnšʔ ʔylyn dʔty hwy ʕmh mn glylʔ wḥzyn hww hlyn
23:50	gbrʔ dyn ḥd dšmh ywsp bwlwṭʔ mn rmtʔ mdyntʔ dyhwd gbrʔ hwʔ ṭbʔ wzdyqʔ
23:51	hnʔ lʔ šlm hwʔ lṣbynhwn wlswʕrnhwn wmskʔ hwʔ lmlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ
23:52	hnʔ qrb lwt pylṭws wšʔl pgrh dyšwʕ
23:53	wʔḥth wkrkh bḥyṣʔ dktnʔ wsmh bbyt qbwrʔ nqyrʔ hw dlʔ ʔnš ʕdkyl ʔttsym hwʔ bh
23:54	wywmʔ ʕrwbtʔ hwt wšbtʔ nghʔ hwt
23:55	qrybn hwy dyn nšʔ hlyn dʔty ʕmh mn glylʔ wḥzyyhy lqbrʔ wʔyknʔ ʔttsym pgrh
23:56	whpk ṭyb hrwmʔ wbsmʔ wbšbtʔ šly ʔyk dpqyd 
24:01	bḥd bšbʔ dyn bšprʔ ʕd ḥšwk ʔty lbyt qbwrʔ wʔyty hrwmʔ hlyn dṭyb hwy wʔyt hwy ʕmhyn nšʔ ʔḥrnytʔ
24:02	wʔškḥ kʔpʔ dmʕglʔ mn byt qbwrʔ
24:03	wʕlyn wlʔ ʔškḥyhy lpgrʔ dyšwʕ
24:04	whwʔ dkd hnyn tmyhn ʕl hdʔ hʔ tryn gbryn qmw lʕl mnhyn wmbrq hwʔ lbwšhwn
24:05	whwy bdḥltʔ wkpy ʔpyhyn bʔrʕʔ wʔmryn lhyn mnʔ bʕyn ʔntyn ḥyʔ ʕm mytʔ
24:06	lytwhy tnn qm lh ʕhdyn dmll ʕmkyn kd hw bglylʔ
24:07	wʔmr hwʔ dʕtyd hw brh dʔnšʔ dnštlm bʔydy ʔnšʔ ḥṭyʔ wnṣṭlb wltltʔ ywmyn nqwm
24:08	whnyn ʔtdkryn lmlwhy
24:09	whpk mn qbrʔ wʔmryn hlyn klhyn lḥdʕsr wlšrkʔ
24:10	ʔytyhyn hwy dyn mrym mgdlytʔ wywḥn wmrym ʔmh dyʕqwb wšrkʔ dʕmhyn hlyn dʔmr hwy lšlyḥʔ
24:11	wʔtḥzy bʕynyhwn mlʔ hlyn ʔyk šnytʔ wlʔ hymnw ʔnyn
24:12	šmʕwn dyn qm wrhṭ lqbrʔ wʔdyq ḥzʔ ktnʔ dsymyn blḥwd wʔzl kd mtdmr bnpšh ʕl mdm dhwʔ
24:13	whʔ tryn mnhwn bh bywmʔ ʔzlyn hww lqrytʔ dšmh ʕmʔws wpryqʔ mn ʔwršlm ʔsṭdwtʔ štyn
24:14	whnwn mmllyn hww ḥd ʕm ḥd ʕl hlyn klhyn dgdš
24:15	wkd hnwn mmllyn wbʕyn ḥd ʕm ḥd ʔtʔ hw yšwʕ wmṭy ʔnwn wmhlk hwʔ ʕmhwn
24:16	wʕynyhwn ʔḥydn hwy dlʔ nstklwnyhy
24:17	wʔmr lhwn mnʔ ʔnyn mlʔ hlyn dmmllyn ʔntwn ḥd ʕm ḥd kd mhlkyn ʔntwn wkmyryn ʔntwn
24:18	ʕnʔ ḥd mnhwn dšmh qlywpʔ wʔmr lh ʔnt hw ky blḥwdyk nwkryʔ mn ʔwršlm dlʔ ydʕ ʔnt mdm dhwʔ bh bhnwn ywmtʔ
24:19	ʔmr lhwn mnʔ ʔmryn lh ʕl yšwʕ hw dmn nṣrt gbrʔ dhwʔ nbyʔ wḥyltn hwʔ bmltʔ wbʕbdʔ qdm ʔlhʔ wqdm kwlh ʕmʔ
24:20	wʔšlmwhy rby khnʔ wqšyšʔ ldynʔ dmwtʔ wzqpwhy
24:21	ḥnn dyn sbryn hwyn dhwyw ʕtyd hwʔ dnprqywhy lʔysryl whʔ tltʔ ywmyn hʔ mn dhlyn klhyn hwy
24:22	ʔlʔ ʔp nšʔ mnn ʔtmhn qdm hwy gyr lbyt qbwrʔ
24:23	wkd lʔ ʔškḥ pgrh ʔty ʔmrn ln dmlʔkʔ ḥzyn tmn wʔmryn ʕlwhy dḥy hw
24:24	wʔp ʔnšʔ mnn ʔzlw lbyt qbwrʔ wʔškḥw hknʔ ʔyk mʔ dʔmr nšʔ lh dyn lʔ ḥzw
24:25	hydyn ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔw ḥsyry rʕynʔ wyqyry lbʔ lmhymnw bklhyn ʔylyn dmllw nbyʔ
24:26	lʔ hwʔ hlyn ʕtyd hwʔ dnsybr mšyḥʔ wdnʕwl ltšbwḥth
24:27	wšry hwʔ mn mwšʔ wmn klhwn nbyʔ wmpšq hwʔ lhwn ʕl npšh mn klhwn ktbʔ
24:28	wqrbw hww lqrytʔ hy dʔzlyn hww lh whw msbr hwʔ lhwn dʔyk dldwkʔ rḥyqʔ ʔzl hwʔ
24:29	wʔlṣwhy wʔmryn lh pwš lwtn mṭl dywmʔ hšʔ rkn lh lmḥšk wʕl dnqwʔ lwthwn
24:30	whwʔ dkd ʔstmk ʕmhwn nsb lḥmʔ wbrk wqṣʔ wyhb lhwn
24:31	wmḥdʔ ʔtptḥ ʕynyhwn wʔštwdʕwhy whw ʔštql lh mnhwn
24:32	wʔmryn hww ḥd lḥd lʔ hwʔ lbn yqyr hwʔ bgwn kd mmll ʕmn bʔwrḥʔ wmpšq ln ktbʔ
24:33	wqmw bh bšʕtʔ whpkw lʔwršlm wʔškḥw lḥdʕsr dknyšyn wlʔylyn dʕmhwn
24:34	kd ʔmryn dšryrʔyt qm mrn wʔtḥzy lšmʕwn
24:35	wʔp hnwn ʔštʕyw ʔylyn dhwy bʔwrḥʔ wʔyknʔ ʔtydʕ lhwn kd qṣʔ lḥmʔ
24:36	wkd hlyn mmllyn hww yšwʕ qm bynthwn wʔmr lhwn šlmʔ ʕmkwn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ lʔ tdḥlwn
24:37	whnwn ʔtrhbw whww bdḥltʔ sbryn hww gyr drwḥʔ ḥzyn
24:38	wʔmr lhwn yšwʕ mnʔ mtzyʕyn ʔntwn wmnʔ slqn mḥšbtʔ ʕl lbwtkwn
24:39	ḥzw ʔydy wrgly dʔnʔ ʔnʔ gwšwnny wdʕw dlrwḥʔ bsrʔ wgrmʔ lyt lh ʔyk dḥzyn ʔntwn dʔyt ly
24:40	wkd hlyn ʔmr ḥwy ʔnwn ʔydwhy wrglwhy
24:41	wkd ʕdmʔ lhšʔ lʔ mhymnyn hww mn ḥdwthwn wmttmhyn hww ʔmr lhwn ʔyt lkwn tnn mdm lmʔkl
24:42	hnwn dyn yhbw lh mntʔ mn nwnʔ dṭwyʔ wmn kkrytʔ ddbšʔ
24:43	wnsb ʔkl lʕnyhwn
24:44	wʔmr lhwn hlyn ʔnyn mlʔ dmllt ʕmkwn kd lwtkwn hwyt dwlʔ hw dnštlm kl mdm dktyb bnmwsʔ dmwšʔ wbnbyʔ wbmzmwrʔ ʕly
24:45	hydyn ptḥ rʕynhwn lmstklw ktbʔ
24:46	wʔmr lhwn dhknʔ ktyb whknʔ zdq hwʔ dnḥš mšyḥʔ wdnqwm mn byt mytʔ ltltʔ ywmyn
24:47	wdntkrz bšmh tybwtʔ lšwbqnʔ dḥṭhʔ bklhwn ʕmmʔ wšwryʔ nhwʔ mn ʔwršlm
24:48	wʔntwn ʔnwn shdʔ dhlyn
24:49	wʔnʔ ʔšdr ʕlykwn mwlknʔ dʔby ʔntwn dyn qww bʔwršlm mdyntʔ ʕdmʔ dtlbšwn ḥylʔ mn rwmʔ
24:50	wʔpq ʔnwn ʕdmʔ lbyt ʕnyʔ wʔrym ʔydwhy wbrk ʔnwn
24:51	whwʔ dkd mbrk lhwn ʔtprš mnhwn wslq lšmyʔ
24:52	hnwn dyn sgdw lh whpkw lʔwršlm bḥdwtʔ rbtʔ
24:53	wbklzbn ʔytyhwn hww bhyklʔ kd mšbḥyn wmbrkyn lʔlhʔ ʔmyn 
01:01	bršyt ʔytwhy hwʔ mltʔ whw mltʔ ʔytwhy hwʔ lwt ʔlhʔ wʔlhʔ ʔytwhy hwʔ hw mltʔ
01:02	hnʔ ʔytwhy hwʔ bršyt lwt ʔlhʔ
01:03	kl bʔydh hwʔ wblʕdwhy ʔplʔ ḥdʔ hwt mdm dhwʔ
01:04	bh ḥyʔ hwʔ wḥyʔ ʔytyhwn nwhrʔ dbnynšʔ
01:05	whw nwhrʔ bḥšwkʔ mnhr wḥšwkʔ lʔ ʔdrkh
01:06	hwʔ brnšʔ dʔštdr mn ʔlhʔ šmh ywḥnn
01:07	hnʔ ʔtʔ lshdwtʔ dnshd ʕl nwhrʔ dklnš nhymn bʔydh
01:08	lʔ hw hwʔ nwhrʔ ʔlʔ dnshd ʕl nwhrʔ
01:09	ʔytwhy hwʔ gyr nwhrʔ dšrrʔ dmnhr lklnš dʔtʔ lʕlmʔ
01:10	bʕlmʔ hwʔ wʕlmʔ bʔydh hwʔ wʕlmʔ lʔ ydʕh
01:11	ldylh ʔtʔ wdylh lʔ qblwhy
01:12	ʔylyn dyn dqblwhy yhb lhwn šwlṭnʔ dbnyʔ dʔlhʔ nhwwn lʔylyn dmhymnyn bšmh
01:13	ʔylyn dlw mn dmʔ wlʔ mn ṣbynʔ dbsrʔ wlʔ mn ṣbynʔ dgbrʔ ʔlʔ mn ʔlhʔ ʔtyldw
01:14	wmltʔ bsrʔ hwʔ wʔgn bn wḥzyn šwbḥh šwbḥʔ ʔyk dyḥydyʔ dmn ʔbʔ dmlʔ ṭybwtʔ wqwštʔ
01:15	ywḥnn shd ʕlwhy wqʕʔ wʔmr hnw hw dʔmrt dbtry ʔtʔ whwʔ lh qdmy mṭl dqdmy hw mny
01:16	wmn mlywth ḥnn kln nsbn wṭybwtʔ ḥlp ṭybwtʔ
01:17	mṭl dnmwsʔ byd mwšʔ ʔtyhb šrrʔ dyn wṭybwtʔ byd yšwʕ mšyḥʔ hwʔ
01:18	ʔlhʔ lʔ ḥzʔ ʔnš mmtwm yḥydyʔ ʔlhʔ hw dʔytwhy bʕwbʔ dʔbwhy hw ʔštʕy
01:19	whdʔ hy shdwth dywḥnn kd šdrw lwth yhwdyʔ mn ʔwršlm khnʔ wlwyʔ dnšʔlwnyhy ʔnt mn ʔnt
01:20	wʔwdy wlʔ kpr wʔwdy dlw ʔnʔ ʔnʔ mšyḥʔ
01:21	wšʔlwhy twb mnʔ hkyl ʔlyʔ ʔnt wʔmr lʔ ʔyty nbyʔ ʔnt wʔmr lʔ
01:22	wʔmrw lh wmnw ʔnt dntl ptgmʔ lʔylyn dšdrwn mnʔ ʔmr ʔnt ʕl npšk
01:23	ʔmr ʔnʔ qlʔ dqrʔ bmdbrʔ dʔšww ʔwrḥh dmryʔ ʔyknʔ dʔmr ʔšʕyʔ nbyʔ
01:24	hnwn dyn dʔštdrw mn pryšʔ hww
01:25	wšʔlwhy wʔmrw lh mnʔ hkyl mʕmd ʔnt ʔn ʔnt lʔ ʔytyk mšyḥʔ wlʔ ʔlyʔ wlʔ nbyʔ
01:26	ʕnʔ ywḥnn wʔmr lhwn ʔnʔ mʕmd ʔnʔ bmyʔ byntkwn dyn qʔm hw dʔntwn lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn lh
01:27	hnw hw dbtry ʔtʔ whwʔ lh qdmy hw dʔnʔ lʔ šwʔ ʔnʔ dʔšrʔ ʕrqʔ dmsnwhy
01:28	hlyn bbyt ʕnyʔ hwy bʕbrʔ dywrdnn ʔykʔ dmʕmd hwʔ ywḥnn
01:29	wlywmʔ dbtrh ḥzʔ ywḥnn lyšwʕ dʔtʔ lwth wʔmr hʔ ʔmrh dʔlhʔ hw dšql ḥṭyth dʕlmʔ
01:30	hnw dʔnʔ ʔmrt ʕlwhy dbtry ʔtʔ gbrʔ whwʔ lh qdmy mṭl dqdmy hw mny
01:31	wʔnʔ lʔ ydʕ hwyt lh ʔlʔ dntydʕ lʔysryl mṭl hnʔ ʔtyt ʔnʔ dbmyʔ ʔʕmd
01:32	wʔshd ywḥnn wʔmr dḥzyt lrwḥʔ dnḥtʔ mn šmyʔ ʔyk ywnʔ wqwyt ʕlwhy
01:33	wʔnʔ lʔ ydʕ hwyt lh ʔlʔ mn dšdrny dʔʕmd bmyʔ hw ʔmr ly dʔynʔ dḥzʔ ʔnt dnḥtʔ rwḥʔ wmqwyʔ ʕlwhy hnw mʕmd brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ
01:34	wʔnʔ ḥzyt wʔshdt dhnw brh dʔlhʔ
01:35	wlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ qʔm hwʔ ywḥnn wtryn mn tlmydwhy
01:36	wḥr byšwʕ kd mhlk wʔmr hʔ ʔmrh dʔlhʔ
01:37	wšmʕw tryhwn tlmydwhy kd ʔmr wʔzlw lhwn btrh dyšwʕ
01:38	wʔtpny yšwʕ wḥzʔ ʔnwn dʔtyn btrh wʔmr lhwn mnʔ bʕyn ʔntwn ʔmryn lh rbn ʔykʔ hwʔ ʔnt
01:39	ʔmr lhwn tw wtḥzwn hnwn dyn ʔtw wḥzw ʔykʔ dhwʔ wlwth hww ywmʔ hw wʔyt hwy ʔyk šʕʔ ʕsr
01:40	ḥd dyn mn hnwn dšmʕw mn ywḥnn wʔzlw btrh dyšwʕ ʔytwhy hwʔ ʔndrʔws ʔḥwhy dšmʕwn
01:41	hnʔ ḥzʔ lwqdm lšmʕwn ʔḥwhy wʔmr lh ʔškḥnyhy lmšyḥʔ
01:42	wʔytyh lwt yšwʕ wḥr bh yšwʕ wʔmr ʔnt hw šmʕwn brh dywnʔ ʔnt ttqrʔ kʔpʔ
01:43	wlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ ṣbʔ yšwʕ lmpq lglylʔ wʔškḥ lpylypws wʔmr lh tʔ btry
01:44	hw dyn pylypws ʔytwhy hwʔ mn byt ṣydʔ mn mdynth dʔndrʔws wdšmʕwn
01:45	wpylypws ʔškḥ lntnyʔyl wʔmr lh hw dktb ʕlwhy mwšʔ bnmwsʔ wbnbyʔ ʔškḥnyhy dyšwʕ hw br ywsp mn nṣrt
01:46	ʔmr lh ntnyʔyl mn nṣrt mškḥ mdm dṭb nhwʔ ʔmr lh pylypws tʔ wtḥzʔ
01:47	wḥzyhy yšwʕ lntnyʔyl kd ʔtʔ lwth wʔmr ʕlwhy hʔ šryrʔyt br ʔysryl dnklʔ lyt bh
01:48	ʔmr lh ntnyʔyl mn ʔymkʔ ydʕ ʔnt ly ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʕdlʔ nqryk pylypws kd tḥyt ttʔ ʔnt ḥzytk
01:49	ʕnʔ ntnyʔyl wʔmr lh rby ʔnt hw brh dʔlhʔ ʔnt hw mlkh dʔysryl
01:50	ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʕl dʔmrt lk dḥzytk tḥyt ttʔ mhymn ʔnt drwrbn mn hlyn tḥzʔ
01:51	ʔmr lh ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dmn hšʔ tḥzwn šmyʔ dptyḥyn wmlʔkwhy dʔlhʔ kd slqyn wnḥtyn lwt brh dʔnšʔ 
02:01	wlywmʔ dtltʔ hwt mštwtʔ bqṭnʔ mdyntʔ dglylʔ wʔmh dyšwʕ tmn hwt
02:02	wʔp hw yšwʕ wtlmydwhy ʔtqryw lh lmštwtʔ
02:03	wḥsr hwʔ ḥmrʔ wʔmrʔ lh ʔmh lyšwʕ ḥmrʔ lyt lhwn
02:04	ʔmr lh yšwʕ mʔ ly wlky ʔnttʔ lʔ ʕdkyl ʔtt šʕty
02:05	ʔmrʔ ʔmh lmšmšnʔ mdm dʔmr lkwn ʕbdw
02:06	ʔyt hwy dyn tmn ʔgnʔ dkʔpʔ št dsymn ltdkytʔ dyhwdyʔ dʔḥdn tryn tryn rbʕyn ʔw tltʔ
02:07	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ mlw ʔnyn myʔ lʔgnʔ wmlw ʔnyn ʕdmʔ lʕl
02:08	ʔmr lhwn zlwʕw mkyl wʔytw lryš smkʔ wʔytyw
02:09	wkd ṭʕm hw ryš smkʔ myʔ hnwn dhww ḥmrʔ wlʔ ydʕ hwʔ mn ʔymkʔ hwʔ mšmšnʔ dyn ydʕyn hww dhnwn mlw ʔnwn lmyʔ qrʔ ryš smkʔ lḥtnʔ
02:10	wʔmr lh kl ʔnš lwqdm ḥmrʔ ṭbʔ mytʔ wmʔ drwyw hydyn ʔynʔ dbṣyr ʔnt dyn nṭrtyhy lḥmrʔ ṭbʔ ʕdmʔ lhšʔ
02:11	hdʔ hy ʔtʔ qdmytʔ dʕbd yšwʕ bqṭnʔ dglylʔ wʔwdʕ šwbḥh whymnw bh tlmydwhy
02:12	btr hdʔ nḥt lkprnḥwm hw wʔmh wʔḥwhy wtlmydwhy wtmn hww qlyl ywmtʔ
02:13	wqryb hwʔ pṣḥʔ dyhwdyʔ wslq lʔwršlm yšwʕ
02:14	wʔškḥ bhyklʔ lhlyn dmzbnyn twrʔ wʕrbʔ wywnʔ wlmʕrpnʔ dytbyn
02:15	wʕbd lh prglʔ mn ḥblʔ wlklhwn ʔpq mn hyklʔ wlʕrbʔ wltwrʔ wlmʕrpnʔ wʔšd ʕwrpnhwn wptwryhwn hpk
02:16	wlhnwn dmzbnyn ywnʔ ʔmr šqwlw hlyn mkʔ wlʔ tʕbdwnh lbyth dʔby byt tʔgwrtʔ
02:17	wʔtdkrw tlmydwhy dktyb dṭnnh dbytk ʔklny
02:18	ʕnw dyn yhwdyʔ wʔmrw lh mnʔ ʔtʔ mḥwʔ ʔnt ln dhlyn ʕbd ʔnt
02:19	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn stwrw hyklʔ hnʔ wltltʔ ywmyn ʔnʔ mqym ʔnʔ lh
02:20	ʔmryn lh yhwdyʔ lʔrbʕyn wšt šnyn ʔtbny hyklʔ hnʔ wʔnt ltltʔ ywmyn mqym ʔnt lh
02:21	hw dyn ʔmr hwʔ ʕl hyklʔ dpgrh
02:22	kd qm dyn mn byt mytʔ ʔtdkrw tlmydwhy dhdʔ ʔmr hwʔ whymnw lktbʔ wlmltʔ dʔmr yšwʕ
02:23	kd ʔytwhy hwʔ dyn yšwʕ bʔwršlm bpṣḥʔ bʕdʕdʔ sgyʔʔ hymnw bh dḥzw ʔtwtʔ dʕbd
02:24	hw dyn yšwʕ lʔ mhymn hwʔ lhwn npšh mṭl dhw ydʕ hwʔ lklnš
02:25	wlʔ snyq hwʔ dʔnš nshd lh ʕl kl brnš hw gyr ydʕ hwʔ mnʔ ʔyt bbrnšʔ
03:01	ʔyt hwʔ dyn tmn ḥd gbrʔ mn pryšʔ nyqdmws šmh hwʔ ʔrkwnʔ dyhwdyʔ
03:02	hnʔ ʔtʔ lwt yšwʕ bllyʔ wʔmr lh rby ydʕynn dmn ʔlhʔ ʔštdrt mlpnʔ lʔ gyr ʔnš mškḥ hlyn ʔtwtʔ lmʕbd dʔnt ʕbd ʔnt ʔlʔ mn dʔlhʔ ʕmh
03:03	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lh ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lk dʔn ʔnš lʔ mtyld mn dryš lʔ mškḥ dnḥzʔ mlkwth dʔlhʔ
03:04	ʔmr lh nyqdmws ʔyknʔ mškḥ dntyld gbrʔ sbʔ dlmʔ mškḥ twb lkrsʔ dʔmh dtrtyn zbnyn lmʕl wntyld
03:05	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lh ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lk dʔn ʔnš lʔ mtyld mn myʔ wrwḥʔ lʔ mškḥ dnʕwl lmlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ
03:06	mdm dylyd mn bsrʔ bsrʔ hw wmdm dylyd mn rwḥʔ rwḥʔ hw
03:07	lʔ ttdmr dʔmrt lk dwlʔ lkwn lmtyldw mn dryš
03:08	rwḥʔ ʔtr dṣbyʔ nšbʔ wqlh šmʕ ʔnt ʔlʔ lʔ ydʕ ʔnt ʔymkʔ ʔtyʔ wlʔykʔ ʔzlʔ hknʔ ʔytwhy klnš dylyd mn rwḥʔ
03:09	ʕnʔ nyqdmws wʔmr lh ʔyknʔ mškḥn hlyn lmhwʔ
03:10	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lh ʔnt hw mlpnh dʔysryl whlyn lʔ ydʕ ʔnt
03:11	ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lk dmdm dydʕyn ḥnn mmllyn ḥnn wmdm dḥzyn mshdyn ʔnḥnn wshdwtn lʔ mqblyn ʔntwn
03:12	ʔn dbʔrʕʔ ʔmrt lkwn wlʔ mhymnyn ʔntwn ʔyknʔ ʔn ʔmr lkwn dbšmyʔ thymnwnny
03:13	wlʔ ʔnš slq lšmyʔ ʔlʔ hw dnḥt mn šmyʔ brh dʔnšʔ hw dʔytwhy bšmyʔ
03:14	wʔyknʔ dʔrym mwšʔ ḥwyʔ bmdbrʔ hknʔ ʕtyd lmttrmw brh dʔnšʔ
03:15	dkl ʔnš dmhymn bh lʔ nʔbd ʔlʔ nhwwn lh ḥyʔ dlʕlm
03:16	hknʔ gyr ʔḥb ʔlhʔ lʕlmʔ ʔyknʔ dlbrh yḥydyʔ ntl dklmn dmhymn bh lʔ nʔbd ʔlʔ nhwwn lh ḥyʔ dlʕlm
03:17	lʔ gyr šdr ʔlhʔ lbrh lʕlmʔ dndwnywhy lʕlmʔ ʔlʔ dnḥʔ lʕlmʔ bʔydh
03:18	mn dmhymn bh lʔ mttdyn wmn dlʔ mhymn mn kdw dyn hw dlʔ hymn bšmh dyḥydyʔ brh dʔlhʔ
03:19	hnw dyn dynʔ dnwhrʔ ʔtʔ lʕlmʔ wʔḥbw bnynšʔ lḥšwkʔ ytyr mn dlnwhrʔ ʔytyhwn hww gyr ʕbdyhwn byšʔ
03:20	kl gyr dsnytʔ ʕbd snʔ lnwhrʔ wlʔ ʔtʔ lnwhrʔ dlʔ ntksswn ʕbdwhy
03:21	hw dyn dʕbd šrrʔ ʔtʔ lwt nwhrʔ dntydʕwn ʕbdwhy dbʔlhʔ ʕbydyn 
03:22	btr hlyn ʔtʔ yšwʕ wtlmydwhy lʔrʕʔ dyhwd wtmn mthpk hwʔ ʕmhwn wmʕmd
03:23	ʔp ywḥnn dyn mʕmd hwʔ bʕyn ywn dʕl gnb šlym mṭl dmyʔ ʔyt hww tmn sgyʔʔ wʔtyn hww wʕmdyn
03:24	lʔ gyr ʕdkyl npl hwʔ ywḥnn byt ʔsyrʔ
03:25	hwt hwt dyn bʕtʔ lḥd mn tlmydwhy dywḥnn ʕm yhwdyʔ ḥd ʕl tdkytʔ
03:26	wʔtw lwt ywḥnn wʔmrw lh rbn hw dʕmk hwʔ bʕbrʔ dywrdnn dʔnt shdt ʕlwhy hʔ ʔp hw mʕmd wsgyʔʔ ʔtyn lwth
03:27	ʕnʔ ywḥnn wʔmr lhwn lʔ mškḥ brnšʔ lmsb mn ṣbwt npšh mdm ʔlʔ ʔn ʔtyhb lh mn šmyʔ
03:28	ʔntwn shdyn ʔntwn ly dʔmrt dʔnʔ lʔ hwyt mšyḥʔ ʔlʔ šlyḥʔ ʔnʔ dqdmwhy
03:29	mn dʔyt lh kltʔ ḥtnʔ hw rḥmh dyn dḥtnʔ hw dqʔm wṣʔt lh ḥdwtʔ rbtʔ ḥdʔ mṭl qlh dḥtnʔ hdʔ hkyl ḥdwtʔ dyly hʔ mmlyʔ
03:30	lhw hw wlʔ lmrbʔ wly lmbṣr
03:31	hw gyr dmn lʕl ʔtʔ lʕl mn kl hw whw dmn ʔrʕʔ mn ʔrʕʔ hw wmn ʔrʕʔ mmll hw dmn šmyʔ ʔtʔ lʕl mn kl hw
03:32	wmdm dḥzʔ wšmʕ mshd wshdwth lʔ ʔnš mqbl
03:33	hw dyn dqbl shdwth ḥtm dʔlhʔ šryrʔ hw
03:34	ʔynʔ gyr dʔlhʔ šdrh mlʔ hw dʔlhʔ mmll lʔ hwʔ gyr bkylʔ yhb ʔlhʔ rwḥʔ
03:35	ʔbʔ mḥb lbrʔ wkl mdm yhb bʔydwhy
03:36	mn dmhymn bbrʔ ʔyt lh ḥyʔ dlʕlm wmn dlʔ mtṭpys lbrʔ lʔ nḥzʔ ḥyʔ ʔlʔ rwgzh dʔlhʔ nqwʔ ʕlwhy
04:01	ydʕ dyn yšwʕ dšmʕw pryšʔ dtlmydʔ sgyʔʔ ʕbd wmʕmd ytyr mn ywḥnn
04:02	kd lʔ hwʔ hw yšwʕ mʕmd hwʔ ʔlʔ tlmydwhy
04:03	wšbqh lyhwd wʔzl lh twb lglylʔ
04:04	mʕbdʔ hwt lh dyn dnʔtʔ nʕbr ʕl byt šmryʔ
04:05	wʔtʔ lmdyntʔ dšmryʔ dmtqryʔ škr ʕl gnb qrytʔ dyhb hwʔ yʕqwb lywsp brh
04:06	wʔyt hwʔ tmn mʕynʔ dmyʔ dyʕqwb hw dyn yšwʕ lʔʔ hwʔ mn ʕmlʔ dʔwrḥʔ wytb hwʔ lh ʕl mʕynʔ wʔyt hwy št šʕyn
04:07	wʔtt ʔnttʔ mn šmryn dtmlʔ myʔ wʔmr lh yšwʕ hb ly myʔ ʔštʔ
04:08	tlmydwhy gyr ʕlw hww lmdyntʔ dnzbnwn lhwn sybrtʔ
04:09	ʔmrʔ lh hy ʔnttʔ šmrytʔ ʔyknʔ ʔnt yhwdyʔ ʔnt wmny šʔl ʔnt lmštʔ dʔyty ʔnttʔ šmrytʔ lʔ gyr mtḥšḥyn yhwdyʔ ʕm šmryʔ
04:10	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lh ʔlw ydʕʔ hwyty mwhbtʔ dʔlhʔ wmnw hnʔ dʔmr lky hb ly ʔštʔ ʔnty šʔlʔ hwyty lh wyhb hwʔ lky myʔ ḥyʔ
04:11	ʔmrʔ lh ʔnttʔ hy mry lʔ dwlʔ ʔyt lk wbrʔ ʕmyqʔ ʔymkʔ lk myʔ ḥyʔ
04:12	lmʔ ʔnt rb ʔnt mn ʔbwn yʕqwb hw dhw yhb ln brʔ hdʔ whw mnh ʔšty wbnwhy wʕnh
04:13	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lh kl dnštʔ mn hlyn myʔ twb nṣhʔ
04:14	kl dyn dnštʔ mn myʔ dʔnʔ ʔtl lh lʔ nṣhʔ lʕlm ʔlʔ myʔ hnwn dyhb ʔnʔ lh nhwwn bh mʕynʔ dmyʔ dnbʕyn lḥyʔ dlʕlm
04:15	ʔmrʔ lh ʔnttʔ hy mry hb ly mn hlyn myʔ dlʔ twb ʔṣhʔ wlʔ hwyt ʔtyʔ dlyʔ mn hrkʔ
04:16	ʔmr lh yšwʕ zly qry lbʕlky wty lhrkʔ
04:17	ʔmrʔ lh lyt ly bʕlʔ ʔmr lh yšwʕ špyr ʔmrty dlyt ly bʕlʔ
04:18	ḥmšʔ gyr bʕlyn hww lky whnʔ dʔyt lky hšʔ lʔ hwʔ bʕlky hdʔ šryrtʔ ʔmrty
04:19	ʔmrʔ lh hy ʔnttʔ mry ḥzyʔ ʔnʔ dnbyʔ ʔnt
04:20	ʔbhyn bhnʔ ṭwrʔ sgdw wʔntwn ʔmryn ʔntwn dbʔwršlm hw ʔtr dwlʔ lmsgd
04:21	ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔnttʔ hymnyny dʔtyʔ šʕtʔ dlʔ bhnʔ ṭwrʔ wʔp lʔ bʔwršlm tsgdwn lʔbʔ
04:22	ʔntwn sgdyn ʔntwn lmdm dlʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn ḥnn dyn sgdyn ḥnn lmʔ dydʕyn ḥnn dḥyʔ mn yhwdyʔ ʔnwn
04:23	ʔlʔ ʔtyʔ šʕtʔ whšʔ ʔytyh ʔmty dsgwdʔ šryrʔ nsgdwn lʔbʔ brwḥʔ wbšrrʔ ʔp ʔbʔ gyr dʔyk hlyn hw sgwdʔ bʕʔ
04:24	rwḥʔ hw gyr ʔlhʔ wʔylyn dsgdyn lh brwḥʔ wbšrrʔ wlʔ dnsgdwn
04:25	ʔmrʔ lh ʔnttʔ hy ydʕʔ ʔnʔ dmšyḥʔ ʔtʔ wmʔ dʔtʔ hw mlp ln klmdm
04:26	ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔnʔ ʔnʔ dmmll ʔnʔ ʕmky
04:27	wkd mmll ʔtw tlmydwhy wmtdmryn hww dʕm ʔnttʔ mmll lʔ dyn ʔnš ʔmr mnʔ bʕʔ ʔnt ʔw mnʔ mmll ʔnt ʕmh
04:28	wšbqt qwlth ʔnttʔ wʔzlt lmdyntʔ wʔmrʔ lʔnšʔ
04:29	tw ḥzw gbrʔ dʔmr ly kl mdm dʕbdt lmʔ hwyw mšyḥʔ
04:30	wnpqw ʔnšʔ mn mdyntʔ wʔtyn hww lwth 
04:31	wbynt hlyn bʕyn hww mnh tlmydwhy wʔmryn lh rbn lʕs
04:32	hw dyn ʔmr lhwn ʔyt ly mʔkwltʔ dʔkwl ʔydʔ dʔntwn lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn
04:33	ʔmryn tlmydʔ bynyhwn lmʔ ʔnš ʔyty lh mdm lmʔkl
04:34	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ mʔkwlty dyly ʔytyh dʔʕbd ṣbynh dmn dšdrny wʔšlmywhy lʕbdh
04:35	lʔ ʔntwn ʔmryn dbtr ʔrbʕʔ yrḥyn ʔtʔ ḥṣdʔ hʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dʔrymw ʕynykwn wḥzw ʔrʕtʔ dḥwr wmṭy lḥṣdʔ mn kdw
04:36	wʔynʔ dḥṣd ʔgrʔ nsb wknš pʔrʔ lḥyʔ dlʕlm wzrwʕʔ wḥṣwdʔ ʔkḥdʔ nḥdwn
04:37	bhdʔ gyr ʔytyh mltʔ dšrrʔ dʔḥryn hw zrʕ wʔḥryn ḥṣd
04:38	ʔnʔ šdrtkwn lmḥṣd mdm dlʔ hwʔ ʔntwn lʔytwn bh ʔḥrnʔ gyr lʔyw wʔntwn ʕltwn ʕl ʕmlhwn dhnwn
04:39	mn hy mdyntʔ dyn sgyʔʔ hymnw bh šmryʔ mṭl mlth dʔnttʔ hy dmshdʔ hwt dʔmr ly klmdm dʕbdt
04:40	wkd ʔtw lwth hnwn šmryʔ bʕw mnh dnhwʔ lwthwn whwʔ lwthwn tryn ywmyn
04:41	wsgyʔʔ hymnw bh mṭl mlth
04:42	wʔmryn hww lʔnttʔ hy dmkyl lʔ hwʔ mṭl mltky mhymnyn ḥnn bh ḥnn gyr šmʕn wydʕn dhnw šryrʔyt mšyḥʔ mḥynh dʕlmʔ
04:43	wbtr tryn ywmyn npq yšwʕ mn tmn wʔzl lglylʔ
04:44	hw gyr yšwʕ shd dnbyʔ bmdynth lʔ mtyqr
04:45	kd dyn ʔtʔ lglylʔ qblwhy glylyʔ dḥzw ʔtwtʔ kl dʕbd bʔwršlm bʕdʕdʔ ʔtw hww gyr wʔp hnwn lʕdʕdʔ
04:46	ʔtʔ dyn twb yšwʕ lqṭnʔ dglylʔ ʔykʔ dʕbd myʔ ḥmrʔ wʔyt hwʔ bkprnḥwm ʕbd mlkʔ ḥd dbrh kryh hwʔ
04:47	hnʔ šmʕ dʔtʔ yšwʕ mn yhwd lglylʔ wʔzl lwth wbʕʔ hwʔ mnh dnḥwt wnʔsʔ lbrh qryb hwʔ gyr lmmt
04:48	ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔn ʔtwtʔ wtdmrtʔ lʔ tḥzwn lʔ thymnwn
04:49	ʔmr lh hw ʕbd mlkʔ mry ḥwt ʕdlʔ mʔt lh ṭlyʔ
04:50	ʔmr lh yšwʕ zl brk ḥy hw whymn hw gbrʔ bmltʔ dʔmr lh yšwʕ wʔzl
04:51	kd dyn nḥt hwʔ ʔrʕwhy ʕbdwhy wsbrwhy wʔmryn lh brk ḥyʔ
04:52	wšʔl ʔnwn bʔynʔ ʕdnʔ ʔtḥlm ʔmryn lh ʔtmly bšbʕ šʕyn šbqth ʔštʔ
04:53	wydʕ ʔbwhy dbhy šʕtʔ dbh ʔmr lh yšwʕ dbrk ḥyʔ whymn hw wbyth klh
04:54	hdʔ twb ʔtʔ dtrtyn ʕbd yšwʕ kd ʔtʔ mn yhwd lglylʔ
05:01	btr hlyn hwʔ ʕdʕdʔ dyhwdyʔ wslq yšwʕ lʔwršlm
05:02	ʔyt hwʔ dyn tmn bʔwršlm dwktʔ ḥdʔ dmʕmwdytʔ dmtqryʔ ʕbrʔyt byt ḥsdʔ wʔyt hwʔ bh ḥmšʔ ʔsṭwyn
05:03	wbhlyn rmyn hww ʕmʔ sgyʔʔ dkryhʔ wsmyʔ wḥgysʔ wybyšʔ wmskyn hww lzwʕʔ dmyʔ
05:04	mlʔkʔ gyr bzbn zbn nḥt hwʔ lh lmʕmwdytʔ wmzyʕ hwʔ lhwn lmyʔ wʔynʔ dqdmyʔ nḥt hwʔ mn btr zwʕʔ dmyʔ mtḥlm hwʔ kl kʔbʔ ʔynʔ dʔyt hwʔ lh
05:05	ʔyt hwʔ dyn tmn gbrʔ ḥd dtltyn wtmnʔ šnyn ʔytwhy hwʔ bkwrhnʔ
05:06	lhnʔ ḥzʔ yšwʕ drmʔ wydʕ dzbnʔ sgyʔʔ ʔyt lh wʔmr lh ṣbʔ ʔnt dttḥlm
05:07	ʕnʔ hw kryhʔ wʔmr ʔyn mry lyt ly dyn ʔnš dmʔ dʔttzyʕw myʔ nrmyny bmʕmwdytʔ ʔlʔ ʕd ʔnʔ ʔtʔ ʔnʔ ʔḥryn mn qdmy nḥt
05:08	ʔmr lh yšwʕ qwm šqwl ʕrsk whlk
05:09	wbr šʕth ʔtḥlm gbrʔ hw wqm šql ʕrsh whlk whw hw ywmʔ šbtʔ hwt
05:10	wʔmryn lh yhwdyʔ lhw dʔtʔsy šbtʔ hy lʔ šlyṭ lk dtšqwl ʕrsk
05:11	hw dyn ʕnʔ wʔmr lhwn hw dʕbdny ḥlymʔ hw ʔmr ly dšqwl ʕrsk whlk
05:12	wšʔlwhy mnw hnʔ gbrʔ dʔmr lk dšqwl ʕrsk whlk
05:13	hw dyn dʔtʔsy lʔ ydʕ hwʔ mnw yšwʕ gyr ʔtgny hwʔ lh bknšʔ sgyʔʔ dʔyt hwʔ bdwktʔ hy
05:14	btr zbn ʔškḥh yšwʕ bhyklʔ wʔmr lh hʔ ḥlym ʔnt twb lʔ tḥṭʔ dlmʔ nhwʔ lk mdm dbyš mn qdmyʔ
05:15	wʔzl hw gbrʔ wʔmr lyhwdyʔ dyšwʕ hw hw dʔḥlmh
05:16	wmṭl hdʔ rdpyn hww yhwdyʔ lyšwʕ wbʕyn hww lmqṭlh dhlyn ʕbd hwʔ bšbtʔ
05:17	hw dyn yšwʕ ʔmr lhwn ʔby ʕdmʔ lhšʔ ʕbd ʔp ʔnʔ ʕbd ʔnʔ
05:18	wmṭl hdʔ ytyrʔyt bʕyn hww yhwdyʔ lmqṭlh lʔ blḥwd dšrʔ hwʔ šbtʔ ʔlʔ ʔp dʕl ʔlhʔ dʔbwhy ʔytwhy ʔmr hwʔ wmšwʔ hwʔ npšh ʕm ʔlhʔ 
05:19	ʕnʔ dyn yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dlʔ mškḥ brʔ ʕbd mdm mn ṣbwt npšh ʔlʔ mdm dḥzʔ lʔbʔ dʕbd ʔylyn gyr dʔbʔ ʕbd hlyn ʔp brʔ ʔkwth ʕbd
05:20	ʔbʔ gyr rḥm lbrh wklmdm dʕbd mḥwʔ lh wdytyryn mn hlyn ʕbdʔ mḥwʔ lh dʔntwn ttdmrwn
05:21	ʔyknʔ gyr dʔbʔ mqym mytʔ wmḥʔ lhwn hknʔ ʔp brʔ lʔylyn dṣbʔ mḥʔ
05:22	lʔ hwʔ gyr ʔbʔ dʔn lʔnš ʔlʔ klh dynʔ yhbh lbrʔ
05:23	dklnš nyqr lbrʔ ʔyk dmyqr lʔbʔ hw dlʔ myqr lbrʔ lʔ myqr lʔbʔ dšdrh
05:24	ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dmn dšmʕ mlty wmhymn lmn dšdrny ʔyt lh ḥyʔ dlʕlm wldynʔ lʔ ʔtʔ ʔlʔ šny lh mn mwtʔ lḥyʔ
05:25	ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dʔtyʔ šʕtʔ ʔp hšʔ ʔytyh ʔmty dmytʔ nšmʕwn qlh dbrh dʔlhʔ whnwn dšmʕyn nḥwn
05:26	ʔyknʔ gyr dlʔbʔ ʔyt ḥyʔ bqnwmh hknʔ yhb ʔp lbrʔ dnhwwn ḥyʔ bqnwmh
05:27	wʔšlṭh dnhwʔ ʕbd ʔp dynʔ
05:28	dbrh hw dyn dʔnšʔ lʔ ttdmrwn bhdʔ dʔtyʔ šʕtʔ ʔmty dklhwn ʔylyn dbqbrʔ ʔnwn nšmʕwn qlh
05:29	wnpqwn ʔylyn dʕbdw ṭbtʔ lqymtʔ dḥyʔ wʔylyn dʕbdw byštʔ lqymtʔ ddynʔ
05:30	lʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ mdm mn ṣbwt npšy lmʕbd ʔlʔ ʔyknʔ dšmʕ ʔnʔ dʔn ʔnʔ wdyny kʔyn hw lʔ gyr bʕʔ ʔnʔ ṣbyny ʔlʔ ṣbynh dmn dšdrny
05:31	ʔn ʔnʔ mshd ʔnʔ ʕl npšy shdwty lʔ hwt šryrʔ
05:32	ʔḥryn hw hw dmshd ʕly wydʕ ʔnʔ dšryrʔ hy shdwth dmshd ʕly
05:33	ʔntwn šdrtwn lwt ywḥnn wʔshd ʕl šrrʔ
05:34	ʔnʔ dyn lʔ hwʔ mn brnšʔ nsb ʔnʔ shdwtʔ ʔlʔ hlyn ʔmr ʔnʔ dʔntwn tḥwn
05:35	hw šrgʔ hwʔ ddlq wmnhr wʔntwn ṣbytwn dtštbhrwn dšʕtʔ bnwhrh
05:36	ly dyn ʔyt ly shdwtʔ drbʔ mn dywḥnn ʕbdʔ gyr dyhb ly ʔby dʔšlm ʔnwn hnwn ʕbdʔ dʕbd ʔnʔ shdyn ʕly dʔbʔ šlḥny
05:37	wʔbʔ dšlḥny hw shd ʕly lʔ qlh mmtwm šmʕtwn wlʔ ḥzwh ḥzytwn
05:38	wmlth lʔ mqwyʔ bkwn mṭl dbhw dhw šdr ʔntwn lʔ mhymnyn ʔntwn
05:39	bṣw ktbʔ dbhwn msbryn ʔntwn dḥyʔ dlʕlm ʔyt lkwn whnwn shdyn ʕly
05:40	wlʔ ṣbyn ʔntwn dtʔtwn lwty dḥyʔ dlʕlm nhwwn lkwn
05:41	šwbḥʔ mn bny ʔnšʔ lʔ nsb ʔnʔ
05:42	ʔlʔ ydʕtkwn dḥwbh dʔlhʔ lyt bkwn
05:43	ʔnʔ ʔtyt bšmh dʔby wlʔ mqblyn ʔntwn ly wʔn ʔḥryn nʔtʔ bšm npšh lhw tqblwn
05:44	ʔyknʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn lmhymnw dšwbḥʔ ḥd mn ḥd mqblyn ʔntwn wšwbḥʔ dmn ḥd ʔlhʔ lʔ bʕyn ʔntwn
05:45	lmʔ sbryn ʔntwn dʔnʔ ʔkl ʔnʔ qrṣykwn qdm ʔbʔ ʔytwhy mn dʔkl qrṣykwn mwšʔ hw dbh sbrtwn
05:46	ʔlw gyr bmwšʔ hymntwn ʔp by mhymnyn hwytwn mwšʔ gyr ʕly ktb
05:47	wʔn lktbwhy dhw lʔ mhymnyn ʔntwn ʔyknʔ lmly dyly thymnwn
06:01	btr hlyn ʔzl yšwʕ lʕbrʔ dymʔ dglylʔ dṭbryws
06:02	wʔzlw btrh knšʔ sgyʔʔ mṭl dḥzyn hww ʔtwtʔ dʕbd bkryhʔ
06:03	wslq yšwʕ lṭwrʔ wtmn ytb hwʔ ʕm tlmydwhy
06:04	qryb hwʔ dyn ʕdʕdʔ dpṣḥʔ dyhwdyʔ
06:05	wʔrym ʕynwhy yšwʕ wḥzʔ knšʔ sgyʔʔ dʔtʔ lwth wʔmr lpylypws ʔymkʔ nzbn lḥmʔ dnʔklwn hlyn
06:06	hdʔ dyn ʔmr kd mnsʔ lh hw gyr ydʕ hwʔ mnʔ ʕtyd lmʕbd
06:07	ʔmr lh pylypws dmʔtyn dynryn lḥmʔ lʔ spq lhwn kd qlyl qlyl ḥd ḥd mnhwn nsb
06:08	ʔmr lh ḥd mn tlmydwhy ʔndrʔws ʔḥwhy dšmʕwn kʔpʔ
06:09	ʔyt tnn ṭlyʔ ḥd dʔyt ʕlwhy ḥmš gryṣn dsʕrʔ wtryn nwnyn ʔlʔ hlyn mnʔ ʔnwn lhlyn klhwn
06:10	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʕbdw ʔnšʔ klhwn dnstmkwn ʕsbʔ dyn sgy hwʔ bh bdwktʔ hy wʔstmkw gbrʔ bmnynʔ ḥmšʔ ʔlpyn
06:11	wšql yšwʕ lḥmʔ wbrk wplg lhnwn dsmykyn whknʔ ʔp mn nwnʔ kmʔ dṣbw
06:12	wkd sbʕw ʔmr ltlmydwhy knšw qṣyʔ dytrw dlʔ nʔbd mdm
06:13	wknšw wmlw trʕsr qwpynyn qṣyʔ ʔylyn dytrw lhnwn dʔklw mn ḥmšʔ lḥmyn dsʕrʔ
06:14	hnwn dyn ʔnšʔ dḥzw ʔtʔ dʕbd yšwʕ ʔmryn hww šryrʔyt hnw nbyʔ dʔtʔ lʕlmʔ
06:15	yšwʕ dyn ydʕ dʕtydyn dnʔtwn nḥṭpwnyhy wnʕbdwnyhy mlkʔ wšny lh lṭwrʔ hw blḥwdwhy 
06:16	wkd hwʔ rmšʔ nḥtw tlmydwhy lymʔ
06:17	wytbw bspyntʔ wʔtyn hww lʕbrʔ lkprnḥwm wḥškt hwt lh wlʔ ʔty hwʔ lwthwn yšwʕ
06:18	ymʔ dyn ʔzdqp hwʔ ʕlyhwn mṭl drwḥʔ rbtʔ nšbt hwt
06:19	wdbrw ʔyk ʔsṭdwtʔ ʕsryn wḥmšʔ ʔw tltyn wḥzw lyšwʕ kd mhlk ʕl ymtʔ wkd qrb lwt spynthwn dḥlw
06:20	hw dyn yšwʕ ʔmr lhwn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ lʔ tdḥlwn
06:21	wṣbw hww dnqblwnyhy bspyntʔ wbh bšʕtʔ spyntʔ hy hwt lwt ʔrʕʔ hy dʔzlyn hww lh
06:22	wlywmʔ dbtrh hw knšʔ dqʔm hwʔ bʕbrʔ dymʔ ḥzw dspyntʔ ʔḥrtʔ lyt hwʔ tmn ʔlʔ ʔn hy dslqw lh tlmydʔ wdlʔ ʕl hwʔ ʕmhwn yšwʕ ʕm tlmydwhy lspyntʔ
06:23	ʔty hwy dyn ʔlpʔ ʔḥrnytʔ mn ṭbryws ʕl gnb dwktʔ hy dʔklw bh lḥmʔ kd brk yšwʕ
06:24	wkd ḥzʔ hw knšʔ dlʔ hwʔ tmn yšwʕ ʔplʔ tlmydwhy slqw lhlyn ʔlpʔ wʔtw lkprnḥwm wbʕyn hww lh lyšwʕ
06:25	wkd ʔškḥwhy bʕbrʔ dymʔ ʔmryn lh rbn ʔmty ʔtyt lhrkʔ
06:26	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dbʕyn ʔntwn ly lʔ hwʔ mṭl dḥzytwn ʔtwtʔ ʔlʔ dʔkltwn lḥmʔ wsbʕtwn
06:27	lʔ tplḥwn mʔkwltʔ dʔbdʔ ʔlʔ mʔkwltʔ dmqwyʔ lḥyʔ dlʕlm ʔydʔ dbrh dʔnšʔ ntl lkwn lhnʔ gyr ʔbʔ ḥtm ʔlhʔ
06:28	ʔmryn lh mnʔ nʕbd dnplwḥ ʕbdʔ dʔlhʔ
06:29	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn hnw ʕbdʔ dʔlhʔ dthymnwn bmn dhw šdr
06:30	ʔmryn lh mnʔ ʔtʔ ʕbd ʔnt dnḥzʔ wnhymn bk mnʔ sʕr ʔnt
06:31	ʔbhyn mnnʔ ʔklw bmdbrʔ ʔyknʔ dktyb dlḥmʔ mn šmyʔ yhb lhwn lmʔkl
06:32	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dlʔ hwʔ mwšʔ yhb lkwn lḥmʔ mn šmyʔ ʔlʔ ʔby yhb lkwn lḥmʔ dqwštʔ mn šmyʔ
06:33	lḥmh gyr dʔlhʔ ʔytwhy hw dnḥt mn šmyʔ wyhb ḥyʔ lʕlmʔ
06:34	ʔmryn lh mrn bklzbn hb ln lḥmʔ hnʔ
06:35	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔnʔ ʔnʔ lḥmʔ dḥyʔ mn dʔtʔ lwty lʔ nkpn wmn dmhymn by lʔ nṣhʔ lʕlm
06:36	ʔlʔ ʔmrt lkwn dḥzytwnny wlʔ mhymnyn ʔntwn
06:37	kl dyhb ly ʔby lwty nʔtʔ wmn dlwty nʔtʔ lʔ ʔpqh lbr
06:38	dnḥtt mn šmyʔ lʔ hwʔ dʔʕbd ṣbyny ʔlʔ dʔʕbd
06:39	hnw dyn ṣbynh dmn dšdrny dkl dyhb ly lʔ ʔwbd mnh ʔlʔ ʔqymywhy bywmʔ ʔḥryʔ
06:40	hnw gyr ṣbynh dʔby dkl dḥzʔ lbrʔ wmhymn bh nhwwn lh ḥyʔ dlʕlm wʔnʔ ʔqymywhy bywmʔ ʔḥryʔ
06:41	yhwdyʔ dyn rṭnyn hww ʕlwhy dʔmr dʔnʔ ʔnʔ lḥmʔ dnḥtt mn šmyʔ
06:42	wʔmryn hww lʔ hwʔ hnʔ yšwʕ brh dywsp hw dḥnn ydʕyn lʔbwhy wlʔmh wʔyknʔ ʔmr hnʔ dmn šmyʔ nḥtt
06:43	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn lʔ trṭnwn ḥd ʕm ḥd
06:44	lʔ ʔnš mškḥ dnʔtʔ lwty ʔlʔ ʔn ngdh ʔbʔ dšdrny wʔnʔ ʔqymywhy bywmʔ ʔḥryʔ
06:45	ktyb gyr bnbyʔ dnhwwn klhwn mlpʔ dʔlhʔ kl mn dšmʕ hkyl mn ʔbʔ wylp mnh ʔtʔ lwty
06:46	lʔ hwʔ dḥzʔ ʔnš lʔbʔ ʔlʔ mn dmn ʔlhʔ ʔytwhy hw hw ḥzʔ lʔbʔ
06:47	ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dmn dmhymn by ʔyt lh ḥyʔ dlʕlm
06:48	ʔnʔ ʔnʔ lḥmʔ dḥyʔ
06:49	ʔbhykwn ʔklw mnnʔ bmdbrʔ wmytw
06:50	hnw dyn lḥmʔ dnḥt mn šmyʔ dnʔkwl ʔnš mnh wlʔ nmwt
06:51	ʔnʔ ʔnʔ lḥmʔ ḥyʔ dmn šmyʔ nḥtt wʔn ʔnš nʔkwl mn hnʔ lḥmʔ nḥʔ lʕlm wlḥmʔ ʔynʔ dʔnʔ ʔtl pgry hw dʕl ʔpy ḥywhy dʕlmʔ yhb ʔnʔ
06:52	nṣyn hww dyn yhwdyʔ ḥd ʕm ḥd wʔmryn ʔyknʔ mškḥ hnʔ pgrh dntl ln lmʔkl
06:53	wʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dʔlʔ tʔklwn pgrh dbrh dʔnšʔ wtštwn dmh lyt lkwn ḥyʔ bqnwmkwn
06:54	mn dʔkl dyn mn pgry wštʔ mn dmy ʔyt lh ḥyʔ dlʕlm wʔnʔ ʔqymywhy bywmʔ ʔḥryʔ
06:55	pgry gyr šryrʔyt ʔytwhy mʔkwltʔ wdmy šryrʔyt ʔytwhy mštyʔ
06:56	mn dʔkl pgry wštʔ dmy by mqwʔ wʔnʔ bh
06:57	ʔyknʔ dšdrny ʔbʔ ḥyʔ wʔnʔ ḥy ʔnʔ mṭl ʔbʔ wmn dnʔklny ʔp hw nḥʔ mṭlty
06:58	hnw lḥmʔ dnḥt mn šmyʔ lʔ hwʔ ʔyk dʔklw ʔbhykwn mnnʔ wmytw mn dʔkl hnʔ lḥmʔ nḥʔ lʕlm
06:59	hlyn ʔmr bknwštʔ kd mlp bkprnḥwm
06:60	wsgyʔʔ dšmʕw mn tlmydwhy ʔmryn qšyʔ hy mltʔ hdʔ mnw mškḥ lmšmʕh 
06:61	yšwʕ dyn ydʕ bnpšh drṭnyn ʕl hdʔ tlmydwhy wʔmr lhwn hdʔ mkšlʔ lkwn
06:62	ʔn tḥzwn hkyl lbrh dʔnšʔ dslq lʔtr dʔytwhy hwʔ mn qdym
06:63	rwḥʔ hy dmḥyʔ pgrʔ lʔ mhnʔ mdm mlʔ dʔnʔ mllt ʕmkwn rwḥʔ ʔnyn wḥyʔ ʔnyn
06:64	ʔlʔ ʔyt ʔnšʔ mnkwn dlʔ mhymnyn ydʕ hwʔ gyr yšwʕ mn qdym mn ʔnwn ʔylyn dlʔ mhymnyn wmnw hw dmšlm lh
06:65	wʔmr hwʔ lhwn mṭl hnʔ ʔmrt lkwn dlʔ ʔnš mškḥ dnʔtʔ lwty ʔlʔ yhyb lh mn ʔby
06:66	mṭl hdʔ mltʔ sgyʔʔ mn tlmydwhy ʔzlw lbstrhwn wlʔ mhlkyn hww ʕmh
06:67	wʔmr yšwʕ ltrʕsrth lmʔ ʔp ʔntwn ṣbyn ʔntwn lmʔzl
06:68	ʕnʔ šmʕwn kʔpʔ wʔmr mry lwt mn nʔzl mlʔ dḥyʔ dlʕlm ʔyt lk
06:69	wḥnn hymnn wydʕn dʔnt hw mšyḥʔ brh dʔlhʔ ḥyʔ
06:70	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ lʔ hwʔ ʔnʔ gbytkwn ltrʕsr wmnkwn ḥd sṭnʔ hw
06:71	ʔmr hwʔ dyn ʕl yhwdʔ br šmʕwn skrywṭʔ hw gyr ʕtyd hwʔ dnšlmywhy ḥd mn trʕsr
07:01	btr hlyn mhlk hwʔ yšwʕ bglylʔ lʔ gyr ṣbʔ hwʔ lm hlkw byhwd mṭl dyhwdyʔ bʕyn hww lmqṭlh
07:02	wqryb hwʔ ʕdʕdʔ dmṭlʔ dyhwdyʔ
07:03	wʔmrw lh ʔḥwhy lyšwʕ šnʔ lk mkʔ wzl lyhwd dnḥzwn tlmydyk ʕbdʔ dʕbd ʔnt
07:04	lyt gyr ʔnš dʕbd mdm bṭwšyʔ wṣbʔ hw dbglyʔ nhwʔ ʔn hlyn ʕbd ʔnt ḥwʔ npšk lʕlmʔ
07:05	ʔp lʔ gyr ʔḥwhy hymnw hww bh byšwʕ
07:06	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ zbny dyly ʕdmʔ lhšʔ lʔ mṭʔ zbnkwn dyn dylkwn bkl ʕdn mṭyb
07:07	lʔ mškḥ ʕlmʔ lmsnkwn ly dyn snʔ mṭl dʔnʔ mshd ʔnʔ ʕlwhy dʕbdwhy byšyn ʔnwn
07:08	ʔntwn sqw lʕdʕdʔ hnʔ ʔnʔ lʔ slq ʔnʔ hšʔ lʕdʕdʔ hnʔ mṭl dzbnʔ dyly lʔ ʕdkyl šlm
07:09	hlyn ʔmr wpš lh bglylʔ
07:10	kd dyn slqw ʔḥwhy lʕdʕdʔ hydyn ʔp hw slq lʔ bglyʔ ʔlʔ ʔyk dbṭwšyʔ
07:11	yhwdyʔ dyn bʕyn hww lh bʕdʕdʔ wʔmryn hww ʔykw hw
07:12	wrṭnʔ sgyʔʔ mṭlth ʔyt hwʔ bknšʔ ʔyt hww gyr dʔmryn dṭb hw wʔḥrnʔ ʔmryn hww lʔ ʔlʔ mṭʕʔ lʕmʔ
07:13	lʔ dyn ʔnš glyʔyt mmll hwʔ ʕlwhy mṭl dḥltʔ dyhwdyʔ
07:14	kd dyn plgw ywmtʔ dʕdʕdʔ slq yšwʕ lhyklʔ wmlp hwʔ
07:15	wmtdmryn hww yhwdyʔ wʔmryn ʔyknʔ ydʕ hnʔ sprʔ kd lʔ ylp
07:16	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr ywlpny lʔ hwʔ dyly ʔlʔ dhw dšdrny
07:17	mn dṣbʔ dnʕbd ṣbynh mstkl ywlpny ʔn mn ʔlhʔ hw ʔw ʔnʔ mn ṣbwt npšy mmll ʔnʔ
07:18	mn dmn ṣbwt rʕynh mmll šwbḥʔ lnpšh bʕʔ hw dyn dšwbḥʔ dmn dšdrh bʕʔ šryr hw wʕwlʔ blbh lʔ ʔyt
07:19	lʔ hwʔ mwšʔ yhb lkwn nmwsʔ wlʔ ʔnš mnkwn nṭr nmwsʔ
07:20	mnʔ bʕyn ʔntwn lmqṭlny ʕnʔ knšʔ wʔmryn dywʔ ʔyt lk mnw bʕʔ lmqṭlk
07:21	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn ḥd ʕbdʔ ʕbdt wklkwn mtdmryn ʔntwn
07:22	mṭl hnʔ mwšʔ yhb lkwn gzwrtʔ lʔ hwʔ mṭl dmnh hy mn mwšʔ ʔlʔ dmn ʔbhtʔ hy wbšbtʔ gzryn ʔntwn brnšʔ
07:23	ʔn brnšʔ mtgzr bywmʔ dšbtʔ mṭl dlʔ nštrʔ nmwsʔ dmwšʔ ʕly rṭnyn ʔntwn dklh brnšʔ ʔḥlmt bywmʔ dšbtʔ
07:24	lʔ thwwn dynyn bmsb bʔpʔ ʔlʔ dynʔ kʔnʔ dwnw
07:25	wʔmryn hww ʔnšʔ mn ʔwršlm lw hnw hw dbʕyn lmqṭl
07:26	whʔ glyʔyt mmll wmdm lʔ ʔmryn lh dlmʔ ydʕw qšyšyn dhnw šryrʔyt mšyḥʔ
07:27	ʔlʔ lhnʔ ydʕyn ḥnn mn ʔymkʔ hw mšyḥʔ dyn ʔmty dʔtʔ lʔ ʔnš ydʕ mn ʔymkʔ hw
07:28	wʔrym yšwʕ qlh kd mlp bhyklʔ wʔmr wly ydʕyn ʔntwn wmn ʔymkʔ ʔnʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn wmn ṣbwt npšy lʔ ʔtyt ʔlʔ šryr hw mn dšdrny hw dʔntwn lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn lh
07:29	ʔnʔ dyn ydʕ ʔnʔ lh dmn lwth ʔnʔ whw šdrny
07:30	wbʕw lmʔḥdh wlʔ ʔnš ʔrmy ʕlwhy ʔydyʔ mṭl dlʔ ʕdkyl ʔtt hwt šʕth
07:31	sgyʔʔ dyn mn knšʔ hymnw bh wʔmryn mšyḥʔ mʔ dʔtʔ lmʔ dytyrn mn hlyn ʔtwtʔ dʕbd hnʔ ʕbd
07:32	wšmʕw pryšʔ lknšʔ dmmllyn ʕlwhy hlyn wšdrw hnwn wrby khnʔ dḥšʔ dnʔḥdwnyhy
07:33	wʔmr yšwʕ qlyl twb zbnʔ ʕmkwn ʔnʔ wʔzl ʔnʔ lwt mn dšdrny
07:34	wtbʕwnny wlʔ tškḥwnny wʔykʔ dʔnʔ ʔyty lʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn lmʔtʔ
07:35	ʔmryn yhwdyʔ bnpšhwn lʔykʔ ʕtyd hnʔ lmʔzl dḥnn lʔ mškḥyn ḥnn lh lmʔ ky lʔtrwtʔ dʕmmʔ ʕtyd dnʔzl wnlp lḥnpʔ
07:36	mnʔ hy hdʔ mltʔ dʔmr dtbʕwnny wlʔ tškḥwnny wʔykʔ dʔnʔ ʔyty ʔntwn lʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn lmʔtʔ 
07:37	bywmʔ dyn rbʔ dʔytwhy ʔḥryʔ dʕdʕdʔ qʔm hwʔ yšwʕ wqʕʔ wʔmr ʔn ʔnš ṣhʔ nʔtʔ lwty wnštʔ
07:38	kl mn dmhymn by ʔyknʔ dʔmrw ktbʔ nhrwtʔ dmyʔ ḥyʔ nrdwn mn krsh
07:39	hdʔ dyn ʔmr ʕl rwḥʔ dʕtydyn hww lmqblw ʔylyn dmhymnyn bh lʔ gyr ʕdkyl ʔtyhbt hwt rwḥʔ mṭl dlʔ ʕdkyl ʔštbḥ hwʔ yšwʕ
07:40	sgyʔʔ dyn mn knšʔ dšmʕw mlwhy ʔmryn hww hnw šryrʔyt nbyʔ
07:41	ʔḥrnʔ ʔmryn hww hnw mšyḥʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔmryn dlmʔ mn glylʔ ʔtʔ mšyḥʔ
07:42	lʔ hwʔ ktbʔ ʔmr dmn zrʕh ddwyd wmn byt lḥm qrytʔ dylh ddwyd ʔtʔ mšyḥʔ
07:43	whwt hwt plgwtʔ bknšʔ mṭlth
07:44	wʔyt hww ʔnšyn mnhwn dṣbyn hww dnʔḥdwnyhy ʔlʔ lʔ ʔnš ʔrmy ʕlwhy ʔydyʔ
07:45	wʔtw dḥšʔ hnwn lwt rby khnʔ wpryšʔ wʔmrw lhwn khnʔ lmnʔ lʔ ʔytytwnyhy
07:46	ʔmryn lhwn dḥšʔ lʔ mmtwm hknʔ mll brnšʔ ʔyk dmmll gbrʔ hnʔ
07:47	ʔmryn lhwn pryšʔ lmʔ ʔp ʔntwn ṭʕytwn
07:48	lmʔ ʔnš mn ršʔ ʔw mn pryšʔ hymnw bh
07:49	ʔlʔ ʔn ʕmʔ hnʔ dlʔ ydʕ nmwsʔ lyṭyn ʔnwn
07:50	ʔmr lhwn nyqdmws ḥd mnhwn hw dʔtʔ hwʔ lwt yšwʕ bllyʔ
07:51	dlmʔ nmwsʔ dyln mḥyb lbrnšʔ ʔlʔ ʔn nšmʕ mnh lwqdm wndʕ mnʔ ʕbd
07:52	ʕnw wʔmryn lh lmʔ ʔp ʔnt mn glylʔ ʔnt bṣy wḥzy dnbyʔ mn glylʔ lʔ qʔm
07:53	ʔzl hkyl klḥd lbyth
08:01	yšwʕ dyn ʔzl lṭwrʔ dzytʔ
08:02	bṣprʔ dyn twb ʔtʔ lhyklʔ wklh ʕmʔ ʔtʔ hwʔ lwth wkd ytb mlp hwʔ lhwn
08:03	ʔytyw dyn sprʔ wpryšʔ lʔnttʔ dʔttḥdt bgwrʔ wkd ʔqymwh bmṣʕtʔ
08:04	ʔmryn lh mlpnʔ hdʔ ʔnttʔ ʔttḥdt glyʔyt bh bswʕrnʔ dgwrʔ
08:05	wbnmwsʔ dyn dmwšʔ pqd dldʔyk hlyn nrgwm ʔnt hkyl mnʔ ʔmr ʔnt
08:06	hdʔ ʔmrw kd mnsyn lh ʔyknʔ dthwʔ lhwn dnqṭrgwnyhy yšwʕ dyn kd ltḥt ʔtghn mktb hwʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ
08:07	kd dyn ktrw kd mšʔlyn lh ʔtpšṭ wʔmr lhwn ʔynʔ mnkwn dʔytwhy dlʔ ḥṭh qdmyʔ nšdʔ ʕlyh kʔpʔ
08:08	wtwb kd ʔtghn ktb hwʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ
08:09	hnwn dyn kd šmʕw npqyn hww ḥd ḥd kd šryw mn qšyšʔ wʔštbqt ʔnttʔ lḥwdyh kd ʔytyh bmṣʕtʔ
08:10	kd dyn ʔtpšṭ yšwʕ ʔmr lh lʔnttʔ ʔykʔ ʔytyhwn lʔ ʔnš ḥybky
08:11	hy dyn ʔmrt wlʔ ʔnš mryʔ ʔmr dyn yšwʕ ʔplʔ ʔnʔ mḥyb ʔnʔ lky zly wmn hšʔ twb lʔ tḥṭyn
08:12	twb dyn mll ʕmhwn yšwʕ wʔmr ʔnʔ ʔnʔ nwhrh dʕlmʔ mn dbtry ʔtʔ lʔ nhlk bḥšwkʔ ʔlʔ nškḥ lh nwhrʔ dḥyʔ
08:13	ʔmryn lh pryšʔ ʔnt ʕl npšk mshd ʔnt shdwtk lʔ hwt šryrʔ
08:14	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn ʔpn ʔnʔ mshd ʔnʔ ʕl npšy šryrʔ hy shdwty mṭl dydʕ ʔnʔ mn ʔymkʔ ʔtyt wlʔykʔ ʔzl ʔnʔ ʔntwn dyn lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn mn ʔymkʔ ʔtyt wlʔ lʔykʔ ʔzl ʔnʔ
08:15	ʔntwn pgrnʔyt dynyn ʔntwn ʔnʔ lʔnš lʔ dʔn ʔnʔ
08:16	wʔn dʔn ʔnʔ dyn dyny šryr hw mṭl dlʔ hwyt blḥwdy ʔlʔ ʔnʔ wʔby dšdrny
08:17	wbnmwskwn dyn ktyb dshdwtʔ dtryn gbryn šryrʔ hy
08:18	ʔnʔ ʔnʔ dshd ʔnʔ ʕl npšy wʔby dšdrny shd ʕly
08:19	ʔmryn lh ʔykw ʔbwk ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn wlʔ ly ydʕyn ʔntwn wlʔ lʔby ʔlw ly ydʕyn hwytwn ʔplʔ by ydʕyn hwytwn
08:20	hlyn mlʔ mll byt gzʔ kd mlp bhyklʔ wlʔ ʔnš ʔḥdh lʔ gyr ʕdkyl ʔtt hwt šʕth
08:21	ʔmr lhwn twb yšwʕ ʔnʔ ʔzl ʔnʔ wtbʕwnny wtmwtwn bḥṭhykwn wʔykʔ dʔnʔ ʔzl ʔnʔ ʔntwn lʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn lmʔtʔ
08:22	ʔmryn yhwdyʔ lmʔ ky npšh qṭl dʔmr dʔykʔ dʔnʔ ʔzl ʔnʔ ʔntwn lʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn lmʔtʔ
08:23	wʔmr lhwn ʔntwn mn dltḥt ʔntwn wʔnʔ mn dlʕl ʔnʔ ʔntwn mn hnʔ ʔntwn ʕlmʔ ʔnʔ lʔ hwyt mn hnʔ ʕlmʔ
08:24	ʔmrt lkwn dtmwtwn bḥṭhykwn ʔlʔ gyr thymnwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ tmwtwn bḥṭhykwn
08:25	ʔmryn yhwdyʔ ʔnt mn ʔnt ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔpn dšryt dʔmll ʕmkwn
08:26	sgy ʔyt ly ʕlykwn lmʔmr wlmdn ʔlʔ mn dšdrny šryr hw wʔnʔ ʔylyn dšmʕt mnh hlyn hw mmll ʔnʔ bʕlmʔ
08:27	wlʔ ydʕw dʕl ʔbʔ ʔmr lhwn
08:28	ʔmr lhwn twb yšwʕ ʔmty dtrymwnh lbrh dʔnšʔ hydyn tdʕwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ wmdm mn ṣbwt npšy lʔ ʕbd ʔnʔ ʔlʔ ʔyknʔ dʔlpny ʔby hkwt hw mmll ʔnʔ
08:29	wmn dšdrny ʕmy ʔytwhy wlʔ šbqny blḥwdy ʔby mṭl dʔnʔ mdm dšpr lh ʕbd ʔnʔ bklzbn
08:30	kd hlyn mmll hwʔ sgyʔʔ hymnw bh
08:31	wʔmr yšwʕ lhnwn yhwdyʔ dhymnw bh ʔn ʔntwn tktrwn bmlty šryrʔyt tlmydy ʔntwn
08:32	wtdʕwn šrrʔ whw šrrʔ nḥrrkwn
08:33	ʔmryn lh zrʕh ḥnn dʔbrhm wmn mtwm ʕbdwtʔ lʔnš lʔ plyḥʔ ln ʔyknʔ ʔmr ʔnt dthwwn bny ḥʔrʔ
08:34	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmrnʔ lkwn dklmn dʕbd ḥṭytʔ ʕbdh hw dḥṭytʔ
08:35	wʕbdʔ lʔ mqwʔ lʕlm bbytʔ brʔ dyn lʕlm mqwʔ
08:36	ʔn hw hkyl dbrʔ nḥrrkwn šryrʔyt thwwn bny ḥʔrʔ
08:37	ydʕ ʔnʔ dzrʕh ʔntwn dʔbrhm ʔlʔ bʕyn ʔntwn lmqṭlny mṭl dlmlty lʔ spqyn ʔntwn
08:38	ʔnʔ mdm dḥzyt lwt ʔby mmll ʔnʔ wʔntwn mdm dḥzytwn lwt ʔbwkwn ʕbdyn ʔntwn
08:39	ʕnw wʔmryn lh ʔbwn dyln ʔbrhm hw ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔlw bnwhy hwytwn dʔbrhm ʕbdwhy dʔbrhm ʕbdyn hwytwn
08:40	hšʔ dyn hʔ bʕyn ʔntwn lmqṭlny lgbrʔ dšryrtʔ mllt ʕmkwn ʔydʔ dšmʕt mn ʔlhʔ hdʔ ʔbrhm lʔ ʕbd
08:41	ʔntwn dyn ʕbdyn ʔntwn ʕbdʔ dʔbwkwn ʔmryn lh ḥnn mn znywtʔ lʔ hwyn ḥd ʔbʔ ʔyt ln ʔlhʔ
08:42	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔlw ʔlhʔ hwʔ ʔbwkwn mḥbyn hwytwn ly ʔnʔ gyr mn ʔlhʔ npqt wʔtyt wlʔ hwʔ mn ṣbwt npšy ʔtyt ʔlʔ hw šdrny
08:43	mṭl mnʔ mlty lʔ mštwdʕyn ʔntwn ʕl dlʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn šmʕyn mlty
08:44	ʔntwn mn ʔbʔ ʔklqrṣʔ ʔytykwn wrgth dʔbwkwn ṣbyn ʔntwn lmʕbd hw dmn bršyt qṭl ʔnšʔ hw wbšrrʔ lʔ qʔm mṭl dšrrʔ lyt bh ʔmty dmmll kdbwtʔ mn dylh hw mmll mṭl ddglʔ hw ʔp ʔbwh
08:45	ʔnʔ dyn dšrrʔ mmll ʔnʔ lʔ mhymnyn ʔntwn ly
08:46	mnw mnkwn mks ly ʕl ḥṭytʔ wʔn šrrʔ mmll ʔnʔ ʔntwn lmnʔ lʔ mhymnyn ʔntwn ly
08:47	mn dmn ʔlhʔ ʔytwhy mlʔ dʔlhʔ šmʕ mṭl hnʔ ʔntwn lʔ šmʕyn ʔntwn mṭl dlʔ hwytwn mn ʔlhʔ
08:48	ʕnw yhwdyʔ wʔmryn lh lʔ špyr ʔmryn ʔnḥnn dšmryʔ ʔnt wdywʔ ʔyt lk
08:49	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ly dywʔ lʔ ʔyt ʔlʔ lʔby myqr ʔnʔ wʔntwn mṣʕryn ly
08:50	ʔnʔ dyn lʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ šwbḥy ʔyt hw dbʕʔ wdʔn
08:51	ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dmn dmlty nṭr mwtʔ lʔ nḥzʔ lʕlm
08:52	ʔmryn lh yhwdyʔ hšʔ ydʕn ddywʔ ʔyt lk ʔbrhm myt wnbyʔ wʔnt ʔmr ʔnt dmn dmlty nṭr mwtʔ lʔ nṭʕm lʕlm
08:53	lmʔ ʔnt rb ʔnt mn ʔbwn ʔbrhm dmyt wmn nbyʔ dmytw mnw ʕbd ʔnt npšk
08:54	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔn ʔnʔ mšbḥ ʔnʔ npšy šwbḥy lʔ hwʔ mdm ʔytwhy ʔby dmšbḥ ly hw dʔmryn ʔntwn dʔlhn hw
08:55	wlʔ ydʕtwnyhy ʔnʔ dyn ydʕ ʔnʔ lh wʔn ʔmr ʔnʔ dlʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ lh hwʔ ʔnʔ ly kdbʔ ʔkwtkwn ʔlʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ lh wmlth nṭr ʔnʔ
08:56	ʔbrhm ʔbwkwn mswḥ hwʔ dnḥzʔ ywmy wḥzʔ wḥdy
08:57	ʔmryn lh yhwdyʔ ʕdkyl br ḥmšyn šnyn lʔ hwyt wlʔbrhm ḥzyt
08:58	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dʕdlʔ nhwʔ ʔbrhm ʔnʔ ʔyty
08:59	wšqlw kʔpʔ dnrgmwnyhy wyšwʕ ʔtṭšy wnpq mn hyklʔ wʕbr bynthwn wʔzl
09:01	wkd ʕbr ḥzʔ gbrʔ smyʔ dmn krs ʔmh
09:02	wšʔlwhy tlmydwhy wʔmryn rbn mnw ḥṭʔ hnʔ ʔw ʔbhwhy dkd smʔ ntyld
09:03	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ lʔ hw ḥṭʔ wlʔ ʔbhwhy ʔlʔ dntḥzwn bh ʕbdwhy dʔlhʔ
09:04	ly wlʔ lmʕbd ʕbdʔ dmn dšdrny ʕd ʔymmʔ hw ʔtʔ llyʔ dʔnš lʔ mškḥ lmplḥ
09:05	kmʔ dbʕlmʔ ʔnʔ nwhrh ʔnʔ dʕlmʔ
09:06	wkd ʔmr hlyn rq ʕl ʔrʕʔ wgbl ṭynʔ mn rwqh wṭš ʕl ʕynwhy dhw smyʔ
09:07	wʔmr lh zl ʔšyg bmʕmwdytʔ dšylwḥʔ wʔzl ʔšyg wʔtʔ kd ḥzʔ
09:08	šbbwhy dyn wʔylyn dḥzʔ hwʔ lhwn mn qdym dḥdr hwʔ ʔmryn hww lʔ hwʔ hnw hw dytb hwʔ wḥdr
09:09	ʔyt dʔmryn hww dhwyw wʔyt dʔmryn hww lʔ ʔlʔ mdmʔ dmʔ lh hw dyn ʔmr hwʔ dʔnʔ ʔnʔ
09:10	ʔmryn lh ʔyknʔ ʔtptḥ ʕynyk
09:11	ʕnʔ wʔmr lhwn gbrʔ dšmh yšwʕ ʕbd ṭynʔ wṭš ly ʕl ʕyny wʔmr ly zl ʔšyg bmyʔ dšylwḥʔ wʔzlt ʔšygt wʔtḥzy ly
09:12	ʔmryn lh ʔykw ʔmr lhwn lʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ
09:13	wʔytywhy lhw dmn qdym smyʔ hwʔ lwt pryšʔ
09:14	ʔytyh hwt dyn šbtʔ kd ʕbd ṭynʔ yšwʕ wptḥ lh ʕynwhy
09:15	wtwb šʔlwhy pryšʔ ʔyknʔ ʔtḥzy lk hw dyn ʔmr lhwn ṭynʔ sm ʕl ʕyny wʔšygt wʔtḥzy ly
09:16	wʔmryn hww ʔnšʔ mn pryšʔ hnʔ gbrʔ lʔ hwʔ mn ʔlhʔ hw dšbtʔ lʔ nṭr ʔḥrnʔ dyn ʔmryn hww ʔyknʔ mškḥ gbrʔ ḥṭyʔ hlyn ʔtwtʔ lmʕbd wplgwtʔ ʔyt hwt bynthwn
09:17	ʔmryn twb lhw smyʔ ʔnt mnʔ ʔmr ʔnt ʕlwhy dptḥ lk ʕynyk ʔmr lhwn ʔnʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ dnbyʔ hw
09:18	lʔ dyn hymnw hww ʕlwhy yhwdyʔ dsmyʔ hwʔ wḥzʔ ʕdmʔ dqrw lʔbhwhy dhw dḥzʔ
09:19	wšʔlw ʔnwn ʔn hnw brkwn hw dʔntwn ʔmryn ʔntwn dkd smʔ ʔtyld ʔyknʔ hšʔ ḥzʔ
09:20	ʕnw dyn ʔbhwhy wʔmrw ydʕynn dhnw brn wdkd smʔ ʔtyld
09:21	ʔyknʔ dyn hšʔ ḥzʔ ʔw mnw ptḥ lh ʕynwhy lʔ ydʕynn ʔp hw ʕl lh lšnwhy lh šʔlw hw ḥlp npšh nmll
09:22	hlyn ʔmrw ʔbhwhy mṭl ddḥlyn hww mn yhwdyʔ psqw hww gyr yhwdyʔ dʔn ʔnš nwdʔ bh dmšyḥʔ hw npqwnyhy mn knwštʔ
09:23	mṭl hnʔ ʔmrw ʔbhwhy dʕl lh lšnwhy lh šʔlw
09:24	wqrʔwhy lgbrʔ dtrtyn zbnyn lhw dʔytwhy hwʔ smyʔ wʔmryn lh šbḥ lʔlhʔ ḥnn gyr ydʕynn dhnʔ gbrʔ ḥṭyʔ hw
09:25	ʕnʔ hw wʔmr lhwn ʔn ḥṭyʔ hw lʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ ḥdʔ dyn ydʕ ʔnʔ dsmyʔ hwyt whšʔ hʔ ḥzʔ ʔnʔ
09:26	ʔmryn lh twb mnʔ ʕbd lk ʔyknʔ ptḥ lk ʕynyk
09:27	ʔmr lhwn ʔmrt lkwn wlʔ šmʕtwn mnʔ twb ṣbyn ʔntwn lmšmʕ lmʔ ʔp ʔntwn tlmydʔ ṣbyn ʔntwn lmhwʔ lh
09:28	hnwn dyn ṣḥywhy wʔmryn lh ʔnt hw tlmydh dhw ḥnn gyr tlmydʔ ḥnn dmwšʔ
09:29	wydʕynn dʕm mwšʔ ʔlhʔ mll lhnʔ dyn lʔ ydʕynn mn ʔymkʔ hw
09:30	ʕnʔ hw gbrʔ wʔmr lhwn bhdʔ hw hkyl lmtdmrw dʔntwn lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn mn ʔymkʔ hw wʕyny dyly ptḥ
09:31	ydʕyn ḥnn dyn dʔlhʔ bqlʔ dḥṭyʔ lʔ šmʕ ʔlʔ lmn ddḥl mnh wʕbd ṣbynh lhw hw šmʕ
09:32	mn ʕlm lʔ ʔštmʕt dptḥ ʔnš ʕynʔ dsmyʔ dʔtyld
09:33	ʔlw lʔ mn ʔlhʔ hwʔ hnʔ lʔ mškḥ hwʔ hdʔ lmʕbd
09:34	ʕnw wʔmryn lh ʔnt klk bḥṭhʔ ʔtyldt wʔnt mlp ʔnt ln wʔpqwhy lbr
09:35	wšmʕ yšwʕ dʔpqwhy lbr wʔškḥh wʔmr lh ʔnt mhymn ʔnt bbrh dʔlhʔ
09:36	ʕnʔ hw dʔtʔsy wʔmr mnw mry dʔhymn bh
09:37	ʔmr lh yšwʕ ḥzytyhy whw dmmll ʕmk hwyw
09:38	hw dyn ʔmr mhymn ʔnʔ mry wnpl sgd lh
09:39	wʔmr yšwʕ ldynh dʕlmʔ hnʔ ʔtyt dʔylyn dlʔ ḥzyn nḥzwn wʔylyn dḥzyn nsmwn
09:40	wšmʕw mn pryšʔ ʔylyn dʕmh hww hlyn wʔmrw lh lmʔ ʔp ḥnn smyʔ ḥnn
09:41	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔlw smyʔ hwytwn lyt hwt lkwn ḥṭytʔ hšʔ dyn ʔmryn ʔntwn dḥzynn mṭl hnʔ ḥṭytkwn qymʔ hy
10:01	ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dmn dlʔ ʕʔl mn trʕʔ lṭyrʔ dʕnʔ ʔlʔ slq mn dwkʔ ʔḥrnyʔ hw gnbʔ hw wgysʔ
10:02	hw dyn dʕʔl mn trʕʔ rʕyʔ hw dʕnʔ
10:03	wlhnʔ nṭr trʕʔ ptḥ lh trʕʔ wʕnʔ šmʕʔ qlh wʕrbwhy qrʔ bšmhyhwn wmpq lhwn
10:04	wmʔ dʔpq ʕnh qdmyh ʔzl wʕrbwhy dylh ʔzlyn btrh mṭl dydʕyn qlh
10:05	btr nwkryʔ dyn lʔ ʔzlʔ ʕnʔ ʔlʔ ʕrqʔ mnh dlʔ ydʕʔ qlh dnwkryʔ
10:06	hdʔ plʔtʔ ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ hnwn dyn lʔ ydʕw mnʔ mll ʕmhwn
10:07	ʔmr lhwn dyn twb yšwʕ ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ trʕh dʕnʔ
10:08	wklhwn ʔylyn dʔtw gnbʔ ʔnwn wgysʔ ʔlʔ lʔ šmʕt ʔnwn ʕnʔ
10:09	ʔnʔ ʔnʔ trʕʔ wby ʔn ʔnš nʕwl nḥʔ wnʕwl wnpwq wrʕyʔ nškḥ
10:10	gnbʔ lʔ ʔtʔ ʔlʔ dngnwb wdnqṭwl wdnwbd ʔnʔ ʔtyt dḥyʔ nhwwn lhwn wmdm dytyr nhwʔ lhwn
10:11	ʔnʔ ʔnʔ rʕyʔ ṭbʔ rʕyʔ ṭbʔ npšh sʔm ḥlp ʕnh
10:12	ʔgyrʔ dyn dlʔ hwʔ rʕyʔ wlw dylh ʔnwn ʕrbʔ mʔ dḥzʔ dʔbʔ dʔtʔ šbq ʕnʔ wʕrq wʔtʔ dʔbʔ ḥṭp wmbdr lh lʕnʔ
10:13	ʔgyrʔ dyn ʕrq mṭl dʔgyrʔ hw wlʔ bṭyl lh ʕl ʕnʔ
10:14	ʔnʔ ʔnʔ rʕyʔ ṭbʔ wydʕ ʔnʔ ldyly wmtydʕ ʔnʔ mn dyly
10:15	ʔyknʔ dydʕ ly ʔby wʔnʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ lʔby wnpšy sʔm ʔnʔ ḥlp ʕnʔ
10:16	ʔyt ly dyn ʔp ʕrbʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔylyn dlʔ hww mn ṭyrʔ hnʔ wʔp lhwn wlʔ ly lmytyw ʔnwn wnšmʕwn qly wthwʔ ʕnʔ klh ḥdʔ wḥd rʕyʔ
10:17	mṭl hnʔ ʔby rḥm ly dʔnʔ sʔm ʔnʔ npšy dtwb ʔsbyh
10:18	lʔ hwʔ ʔnš šql lh mny ʔlʔ ʔnʔ sʔm ʔnʔ lh mn ṣbyny šlyṭ ʔnʔ gyr dʔsymyh wšlyṭ ʔnʔ dtwb ʔsbyh dhnʔ pwqdnʔ qblt mn ʔby
10:19	whwt twb plgwtʔ byny yhwdyʔ mṭl mlʔ hlyn
10:20	wʔmryn hww sgyʔʔ mnhwn ddywʔ ʔyt lh wmšnʔ šnʔ mnʔ šmʕyn ʔntwn lh
10:21	ʔḥrnʔ dyn ʔmryn hww hlyn mlʔ lʔ hwy ddywnʔ lmʔ dywʔ mškḥ ʕynʔ dsmyʔ lmptḥw
10:22	hwʔ dyn ʕʔdʔ dḥwdtʔ bʔwršlm wstwʔ hwʔ
10:23	wmhlk hwʔ yšwʕ bhyklʔ bʔsṭwʔ dšlymwn
10:24	wḥdrwhy yhwdyʔ wʔmryn lh ʕdmʔ lʔmty nsb ʔnt npšn ʔn ʔnt hw mšyḥʔ ʔmr ln glyʔyt
10:25	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn ʔmrt lkwn wlʔ mhymnyn ʔntwn wʕbdʔ dʔnʔ ʕbd ʔnʔ bšmh dʔby hnwn shdyn ʕly
10:26	ʔlʔ ʔntwn lʔ mhymnyn ʔntwn mṭl dlʔ hwytwn mn ʕrby ʔyknʔ dʔmrt lkwn
10:27	ʕrbʔ dyly qly šmʕyn wʔnʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ lhwn whnwn ʔtyn btry
10:28	wʔnʔ yhb ʔnʔ lhwn ḥyʔ dlʕlm wlʔ nʔbdwn lʕlm wlʔ ʔnš nḥṭwp ʔnwn mn ʔydy
10:29	ʔby gyr dyhb ly mn kl rb hw wlʔ ʔnš mškḥ dmn ʔydh dʔby nḥṭwp
10:30	ʔnʔ wʔby ḥd ḥnn
10:31	wšqlw twb yhwdyʔ kʔpʔ lmrgmh 
10:32	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ sgyʔʔ ʕbdʔ špyrʔ mn lwt ʔby ḥwytkwn mṭl ʔynʔ ʕbdʔ mnhwn rgmyn ʔntwn ly
10:33	ʔmryn lh yhwdyʔ lʔ hwʔ mṭl ʕbdʔ špyrʔ rgmyn ḥnn lk ʔlʔ mṭl dmgdp ʔnt wkd ʔytyk br ʔnšʔ ʕbd ʔnt npšk ʔlhʔ
10:34	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ lʔ hwʔ hknʔ ktyb bnmwskwn dʔnʔ ʔmrt dʔlhʔ ʔntwn
10:35	ʔn lhnwn ʔmr ʔlhʔ mṭl dlwthwn hwt mltʔ dʔlhʔ wlʔ mškḥ ktbʔ dnštrʔ
10:36	lʔynʔ dʔbʔ qdšh wšdrh lʕlmʔ ʔntwn ʔmryn ʔntwn dmgdp ʔnt ʕl dʔmrt lkwn dbrh ʔnʔ dʔlhʔ
10:37	ʔlʔ ʕbd ʔnʔ ʕbdʔ dʔby lʔ thymnwnny
10:38	ʔn dyn ʕbd ʔnʔ ʔpn ly lʔ mhymnyn ʔntwn lhwn lʕbdʔ hymnw dtdʕwn wthymnwn dʔby by wʔnʔ bʔby
10:39	wbʕw hww twb dnʔḥdwnyhy wnpq lh mn byt ʔydyhwn
10:40	wʔzl lh lʕbrʔ dywrdnn ldwktʔ ʔykʔ dʔytwhy hwʔ ywḥnn mn qdym kd mʕmd hwʔ whwʔ tmn
10:41	wʔtw ʔnšʔ sgyʔʔ lwth wʔmryn hww dywḥnn ʔplʔ ḥdʔ ʔtʔ ʕbd klmdm dyn dʔmr ywḥnn ʕl gbrʔ hnʔ šryr hw
10:42	wsgyʔʔ hymnw bh
11:01	ʔyt hwʔ dyn ḥd dkryh lʕzr mn byt ʕnyʔ qrytʔ ʔḥwh dmrym wdmrtʔ
11:02	mrym dyn hdʔ ʔytyh hy dmšḥt bbsmʔ rglwhy dyšwʕ wšwyt bsʕrh ʔḥwh hwʔ dhdʔ lʕzr dkryh hwʔ
11:03	wšdryn trtyhyn ʔḥwth lwt yšwʕ wʔmrn mrn hʔ hw drḥm ʔnt kryh
11:04	yšwʕ dyn ʔmr hnʔ kwrhnʔ lʔ hwʔ dmwtʔ ʔlʔ ḥlp tšbwḥtʔ dʔlhʔ dnštbḥ brh dʔlhʔ mṭlth
11:05	mḥb hwʔ dyn hw yšwʕ lmrtʔ wlmrym wllʕzr
11:06	wkd šmʕ dkryh ktr bdwktʔ dʔytwhy hwʔ tryn ywmyn
11:07	wbtrkn ʔmr ltlmydwhy tw nʔzl twb lyhwd
11:08	ʔmryn lh tlmydwhy rbn hšʔ yhwdyʔ bʕyn hww lmrgmk wtwb ʔzl ʔnt ltmn
11:09	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ lʔ trtʕsrʔ šʕyn ʔyt bywmʔ wʔn ʔnš mhlk bʔymmʔ lʔ mttql mṭl dḥzʔ nwhrh dʕlmʔ hnʔ
11:10	ʔn ʔnš dyn bllyʔ nhlk mttql mṭl dnhyrʔ lyt bh
11:11	hlyn ʔmr yšwʕ wbtrkn ʔmr lhwn lʕzr rḥmn škb ʔlʔ ʔzl ʔnʔ dʔʕyrywhy
11:12	ʔmryn lh tlmydwhy mrn ʔn dmk mtḥlm
11:13	hw dyn yšwʕ ʔmr ʕl mwth whnwn sbrw dʕl mdmkʔ hw dšntʔ ʔmr
11:14	hydyn ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ pšyqʔyt lʕzr myt lh
11:15	wḥdʔ ʔnʔ dlʔ hwyt tmn mṭltkwn dthymnwn ʔlʔ hlkw ltmn
11:16	ʔmr tʔwmʔ dmtʔmr tʔmʔ ltlmydʔ ḥbrwhy nʔzl ʔp ḥnn nmwt ʕmh
11:17	wʔtʔ yšwʕ lbyt ʕnyʔ wʔškḥ dʔrbʕʔ lh ywmyn dʔytwhy bbyt qbwrʔ
11:18	ʔytyh hwt dyn byt ʕnyʔ ʕl gnb ʔwršlm kd pryqʔ mnh ʔyk ʔsṭdwtʔ ḥmštʕsr
11:19	wsgyʔʔ mn yhwdyʔ ʔtyʔyn hww lwt mrtʔ wmrym dnmlwn blbhyn mṭl ʔḥwhyn
11:20	mrtʔ dyn kd šmʕt dyšwʕ ʔtʔ npqt lʔwrʕh mrym dyn bbytʔ ytbʔ hwt
11:21	wʔmrt mrtʔ lyšwʕ mry ʔlw tnn hwyt lʔ mʔt hwʔ ʔḥy
11:22	ʔlʔ ʔp hšʔ ydʕʔ ʔnʔ dkmʔ dtšʔl lʔlhʔ yhb lk
11:23	ʔmr lh yšwʕ qʔm ʔḥwky
11:24	ʔmrʔ lh mrtʔ ydʕʔnʔ dqʔm bnwḥmʔ bywmʔ ʔḥryʔ
11:25	ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔnʔ ʔnʔ nwḥmʔ wḥyʔ mn dmhymn by ʔpn nmwt nḥʔ
11:26	wkl dḥy wmhymn by lʕlm lʔ nmwt mhymnty hdʔ
11:27	ʔmrʔ lh ʔyn mry ʔnʔ mhymnʔ ʔnʔ dʔnt hw mšyḥʔ brh dʔlhʔ dʔtʔ lʕlmʔ
11:28	wkd ʔmrt hlyn ʔzlt qrt lmrym ḥth ksyʔyt wʔmrʔ lh rbn ʔtʔ wqrʔ lky
11:29	wmrym kd šmʕt qmt ʕgl wʔtyʔ hwt lwth
11:30	hw dyn yšwʕ lʔ ʕdkyl ʔtʔ hwʔ lqrytʔ ʔlʔ bh hwʔ bhy dwktʔ dʔrʕth mrtʔ
11:31	ʔp hnwn dyn yhwdyʔ dʔyt hww ʕmh bbytʔ dmbyʔyn hww lh dḥzw lmrym dʕgl qmt npqt ʔzlw lhwn btrh sbrw gyr dlqbrʔ ʔzlʔ lmbkʔ
11:32	hy dyn mrym kd ʔtt ʔykʔ dʔytwhy hwʔ yšwʕ wḥzth nplt ʕl rglwhy wʔmrʔ lh ʔlw tnn hwyt mry lʔ mʔt hwʔ ʔḥy
11:33	yšwʕ dyn kd ḥzh dbkyʔ wlyhwdyʔ hnwn dʔtw ʕmh dbkyn ʔtʕzz brwḥh wʔzyʕ npšh
11:34	wʔmr ʔykʔ smtwnyhy wʔmryn lh mrn tʔ ḥzy
11:35	wʔtyn hwy dmʕwhy dyšwʕ
11:36	wʔmryn hww yhwdyʔ ḥzw kmʔ rḥm hwʔ lh
11:37	ʔnšyn dyn mnhwn ʔmrw lʔ mškḥ hwʔ hnʔ dptḥ ʕynwhy dhw smyʔ nʕbd dʔp hnʔ lʔ nmwt
11:38	yšwʕ dyn kd mtʕzz bynwhy wlh ʔtʔ lbyt qbwrʔ whw byt qbwrʔ ʔytwhy hwʔ mʕrtʔ wkʔpʔ symʔ hwt ʕl trʕh 
11:39	wʔmr yšwʕ šqwlw kʔpʔ hdʔ ʔmrʔ lh mrtʔ ḥth dhw mytʔ mry mn kdw sry lh ʔrbʕʔ lh gyr ywmyn
11:40	ʔmr lh yšwʕ lʔ ʔmrt lky dʔn thymnyn tḥzyn šwbḥh dʔlhʔ
11:41	wšqlw kʔpʔ hy whw yšwʕ ʔrym ʕynwhy lʕl wʔmr ʔbʔ mwdʔ ʔnʔ lk dšmʕtny
11:42	wʔnʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ dbklzbn šmʕ ʔnt ly ʔlʔ mṭl knšʔ hnʔ dqʔm ʔmr ʔnʔ hlyn dnhymnwn dʔnt šdrtny
11:43	wkd ʔmr hlyn qʕʔ bqlʔ rmʔ lʕzr tʔ lbr
11:44	wnpq hw mytʔ kd ʔsyrn ʔydwhy wrglwhy bpsqytʔ wʔpwhy ʔsyrn bswdrʔ ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ šrʔwhy wšbwqw ʔzl
11:45	wsgyʔʔ mn yhwdyʔ dʔtw lwt mrym kd ḥzw mdm dʕbd yšwʕ hymnw bh
11:46	wʔnšyn mnhwn ʔzlw lwt pryšʔ wʔmrw lhwn mdm dʕbd yšwʕ
11:47	wʔtknšw rby khnʔ wpryšʔ wʔmryn hww mnʔ nʕbd dhnʔ gbrʔ ʔtwtʔ sgyʔtʔ ʕbd
11:48	wʔn šbqyn ḥnn lh hknʔ klhwn ʔnšʔ mhymnyn bh wʔtyn rhwmyʔ šqlyn ʔtrn wʕmn
11:49	ḥd dyn mnhwn dšmh qypʔ rb khnʔ hwʔ dhy šntʔ wʔmr lhwn ʔntwn lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn mdm
11:50	wlʔ mtḥšbyn ʔntwn dpqḥ ln dḥd gbrʔ nmwt ḥlp ʕmʔ wlʔ klh ʕmʔ nʔbd
11:51	hdʔ dyn mn ṣbwt npšh lʔ ʔmr ʔlʔ mṭl drb khnʔ hwʔ dhy šntʔ ʔtnby dʕtyd hwʔ yšwʕ dnmwt ḥlp ʕmʔ
11:52	wlʔ blḥwd ḥlp ʕmʔ ʔlʔ dʔp bnyʔ dʔlhʔ dmbdryn nknš lḥdʔ
11:53	wmn hw ywmʔ ʔtḥšbw hww dnqṭlwnyhy
11:54	hw dyn yšwʕ lʔ mhlk hwʔ glyʔyt byt yhwdyʔ ʔlʔ ʔzl lh mn tmn lʔtrʔ dqryb lḥwrbʔ lkrkʔ dmtqrʔ ʔprym wtmn mthpk hwʔ ʕm tlmydwhy
11:55	qryb hwʔ dyn pṣḥʔ dyhwdyʔ wslqw sgyʔʔ mn qwryʔ lʔwršlm qdm ʕdʕdʔ dndkwn npšhwn
11:56	wbʕyn hww lh lyšwʕ wʔmryn hww ḥd lḥd bhyklʔ mnʔ sbryn ʔntwn dlʔ ʔtʔ lʕdʕdʔ
11:57	rby khnʔ dyn wpryšʔ pqdw hww dʔn ʔnš ndʕ ʔykw nbdq lhwn ʔyk dnʔḥdwnyhy
12:01	yšwʕ dyn qdm štʔ ywmyn dpṣḥʔ ʔtʔ lbyt ʕnyʔ ʔykʔ dʔytwhy hwʔ lʕzr hw dʔqym mn byt mytʔ hw yšwʕ
12:02	wʕbdw lh tmn ḥšmytʔ wmrtʔ mšmšʔ hwt wlʕzr ḥd mn smykʔ hwʔ dʕmh
12:03	mrym dyn šqlt šṭyptʔ dbsmʔ dnrdyn ršyʔ sgy dmyʔ wmšḥt rglwhy dyšwʕ wšwyt bsʕrh rglwhy wʔtmly bytʔ mn ryḥh dbsmʔ
12:04	wʔmr yhwdʔ skrywṭʔ ḥd mn tlmydwhy hw dʕtyd hwʔ dnšlmywhy
12:05	lmnʔ lʔ ʔzdbn mšḥʔ hnʔ btlt mʔʔ dynryn wʔtyhb lmsknʔ
12:06	hdʔ dyn ʔmr lʔ hwʔ mṭl dʕl msknʔ bṭyl hwʔ lh ʔlʔ mṭl dgnbʔ hwʔ wglwsqmʔ lwth hwʔ wmdm dnpl hwʔ bh hw ṭʕyn hwʔ
12:07	ʔmr dyn yšwʕ šbwqyh lywmʔ dqbwry nṭrth
12:08	bklzbn gyr msknʔ ʔyt lkwn ʕmkwn ly dyn lʔ bklzbn ʔyt lkwn
12:09	wšmʕw knšʔ sgyʔʔ mn yhwdyʔ dtmn hw yšwʕ wʔtw lʔ mṭl yšwʕ blḥwd ʔlʔ ʔp dnḥzwn llʕzr hw dʔqym mn byt mytʔ
12:10	wʔtrʕyw hww rby khnʔ dʔp llʕzr nqṭlwnyhy
12:11	mṭl dsgyʔʔ mn yhwdyʔ mṭlth ʔzlyn hww wmhymnyn byšwʕ
12:12	wlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ knšʔ sgyʔʔ ʔynʔ dʔtʔ hwʔ lʕdʕdʔ kd šmʕw dyšwʕ ʔtʔ lʔwršlm
12:13	šqlw swkʔ ddqlʔ wnpqw lʔwrʕh wqʕyn hww wʔmryn ʔwšʕnʔ bryk hw dʔtʔ bšmh dmryʔ mlkʔ dʔysryl
12:14	ʔškḥ dyn yšwʕ ḥmrʔ wytb ʕlwhy ʔyknʔ dktyb
12:15	lʔ tdḥlyn brt ṣhywn hʔ mlkky ʔtʔ lky wrkyb ʕl ʕylʔ br ʔtnʔ
12:16	hlyn dyn lʔ ydʕw tlmydwhy bhw zbnʔ ʔlʔ kd ʔštbḥ yšwʕ ʔtdkrw tlmydwhy dhlyn ktybn hwy ʕlwhy whlyn ʕbdw lh
12:17	wshd hwʔ knšʔ hw dʕmh hwʔ dqrʔ llʕzr mn qbrʔ wʔqymh mn byt mytʔ
12:18	wmṭl hdʔ npqw lqwblh knšʔ sgyʔʔ dšmʕw dʔtʔ hdʔ ʕbd
12:19	pryšʔ dyn ʔmryn hww ḥd lḥd ḥzyn ʔntwn dlʔ mwtryn ʔntwn mdm dhʔ ʕlmʔ klh ʔzl lh btrh
12:20	ʔyt hww dyn ʔp mn ʕmmʔ ʔnšʔ bhwn dslqw lmsgd bʕdʕdʔ
12:21	hlyn ʔtw qrbw lwt pylypws hw dmn byt ṣydʔ dglylʔ wšʔlwhy wʔmryn lh mry ṣbyn ḥnn nḥzʔ lyšwʕ
12:22	wʔtʔ hw pylypws wʔmr lʔndrʔws wʔndrʔws wpylypws ʔmrw lyšwʕ 
12:23	yšwʕ dyn ʕnʔ wʔmr lhwn ʔtt šʕtʔ dnštbḥ brh dʔnšʔ
12:24	ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dprdtʔ dḥṭtʔ ʔlʔ nplʔ wmytʔ bʔrʕʔ blḥwdyh pyšʔ ʔn dyn mytʔ pʔrʔ sgyʔʔ mytyʔ
12:25	mn drḥm npšh nwbdyh wmn dsnʔ npšh bʕlmʔ hnʔ nṭryh lḥyʔ dlʕlm
12:26	ʔn ly ʔnš mšmš nʔtʔ btry wʔykʔ dʔnʔ ʔyty tmn nhwʔ ʔp mšmšny mn dly mšmš nyqrywhy ʔbʔ
12:27	hšʔ npšy hʔ šgyšʔ wmnʔ ʔmr ʔby pṣny mn hdʔ šʕtʔ ʔlʔ mṭl hnʔ ʔtyt lhdʔ šʕtʔ
12:28	ʔbʔ šbḥ šmk wqlʔ ʔštmʕ mn šmyʔ šbḥt wtwb mšbḥ ʔnʔ
12:29	wknšʔ dqʔm hwʔ šmʕw wʔmryn rʕmʔ hwʔ ʔḥrnʔ dyn ʔmryn mlʔkʔ mll ʕmh
12:30	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lhwn lʔ hwʔ mṭlty hwʔ qlʔ hnʔ ʔlʔ mṭltkwn
12:31	hšʔ dynh hw dʕlmʔ hnʔ hšʔ ʔrkwnʔ dʕlmʔ hnʔ mštdʔ lbr
12:32	wʔnʔ mʔ dʔttrymt mn ʔrʕʔ ʔgd klnš lwty
12:33	hdʔ dyn ʔmr dnḥwʔ bʔynʔ mwtʔ mʔt
12:34	ʔmryn lh knšʔ ḥnn šmʕn mn nmwsʔ dmšyḥʔ lʕlm mqwʔ ʔyknʔ ʔmr ʔnt dʕtyd hw dnttrym brh dʔnšʔ mnw hnʔ brh dʔnšʔ
12:35	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ qlyl ʔḥryn zbnʔ nwhrʔ ʕmkwn hw hlkw ʕd ʔyt lkwn nwhrʔ dlʔ ḥšwkʔ ndrkkwn wmn dmhlk bḥšwkʔ lʔ ydʕ lʔykʔ ʔzl
12:36	ʕd ʔyt lkwn nwhrʔ hymnw bnwhrʔ dbnwhy dnwhrʔ thwwn hlyn mll yšwʕ wʔzl ʔtṭšy mnhwn
12:37	wkd hlyn klhyn ʔtwtʔ ʕbd qdmyhwn lʔ hymnw bh
12:38	dttmlʔ mltʔ dʔšʕyʔ nbyʔ dʔmr mry mnw hymn lšmʕn wdrʕh dmryʔ lmn ʔtgly
12:39	mṭl hnʔ lʔ mškḥyn hww dnhymnwn mṭl dtwb ʔmr ʔšʕyʔ
12:40	dʕwrw ʕynyhwn wʔḥškw lbhwn dlʔ nḥzwn bʕynyhwn wnstklwn blbhwn wntpnwn wʔsʔ ʔnwn
12:41	hlyn ʔmr ʔšʕyʔ kd ḥzʔ šwbḥh wmll ʕlwhy
12:42	ʔp mn ršʔ dyn sgyʔʔ hymnw bh ʔlʔ mṭl pryšʔ lʔ mwdyn hww dlʔ nhwwn lbr mn knwštʔ
12:43	rḥmw gyr šwbḥʔ dbnynšʔ ytyr mn šwbḥh dʔlhʔ
12:44	yšwʕ dyn qʕʔ wʔmr mn dmhymn by lʔ hwʔ by mhymn ʔlʔ bmn dšdrny
12:45	wmn dly ḥzʔ ḥzʔ lmn dšdrny
12:46	ʔnʔ nwhrʔ ʔtyt lʕlmʔ dkl mn dmhymn by lʔ nqwʔ bḥšwkʔ
12:47	wmn dšmʕ mly wlʔ nṭr lhyn ʔnʔ lʔ dʔn ʔnʔ lh lʔ gyr ʔtyt dʔdwn lʕlmʔ ʔlʔ dʔḥʔ lʕlmʔ
12:48	mn dṭlm ly wlʔ mqbl mly ʔyt mn ddʔn lh mltʔ dmllt hy dynʔ lh bywmʔ ʔḥryʔ
12:49	dʔnʔ mn npšy lʔ mllt ʔlʔ ʔbʔ dšdrny hw yhb ly pwqdnʔ mnʔ ʔmr wmnʔ ʔmll
12:50	wydʕ ʔnʔ dpwqdnh ḥyʔ ʔnwn dlʕlm ʔylyn hkyl dmmll ʔnʔ ʔyknʔ dʔmr ly ʔby hknʔ mmll ʔnʔ
