13:01	qdm dyn ʕʔdʔ dpṣḥʔ ydʕ hwʔ yšwʕ dmṭt šʕtʔ dnšnʔ mn hnʔ ʕlmʔ lwt ʔbwhy wʔḥb ldylh dbhnʔ ʕlmʔ wʕdmʔ lḥrtʔ ʔḥb ʔnwn
13:02	wkd hwt ḥšmytʔ rmʔ hwʔ lh lsṭnʔ blbh dyhwdʔ br šmʕwn skrywṭʔ dnšlmywhy
13:03	hw dyn yšwʕ mṭl dydʕ hwʔ dkl mdm yhb ʔbʔ bʔydwhy wdmn ʔlhʔ npq wlwt ʔlhʔ ʔzl
13:04	qm mn ḥšmytʔ wsm nḥtwhy wšql sdwnʔ mḥʔ bḥṣwhy
13:05	wʔrmy myʔ bmšgtʔ wšry lmšgw rglʔ dtlmydwhy wmšwʔ hwʔ bsdwnʔ dmḥʔ bḥṣwhy
13:06	kd dyn ʔtʔ lwt šmʕwn kʔpʔ ʔmr lh šmʕwn ʔnt mry rgly mšyg ʔnt ly
13:07	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lh mdm dʕbd ʔnʔ ʔnt lʔ ydʕ ʔnt hšʔ btrkn dyn tdʕ
13:08	ʔmr lh šmʕwn kʔpʔ lʕlm lʔ mšyg ʔnt ly rgly ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔn lʔ mšyg ʔnʔ lk lyt lk ʕmy mntʔ
13:09	ʔmr lh šmʕwn kʔpʔ mdyn mry lʔ blḥwd rgly tšyg ly ʔlʔ ʔp ʔydy ʔp ršy
13:10	ʔmr lh yšwʕ hw dsḥʔ lʔ snyq ʔlʔ rglwhy blḥwd nšyg klh gyr dkʔ hw ʔp ʔntwn klkwn dkyʔ ʔntwn ʔlʔ lʔ klkwn
13:11	ydʕ hwʔ gyr yšwʕ lhw dmšlm lh mṭl hnʔ ʔmr dlʔ hwʔ klkwn dkyʔ ʔntwn
13:12	kd dyn ʔšyg rglyhwn šql nḥtwhy wʔstmk wʔmr lhwn ydʕyn ʔntwn mnʔ ʕbdt lkwn
13:13	ʔntwn qryn ʔntwn ly rbn wmrn wšpyr ʔmryn ʔntwn ʔyty gyr
13:14	ʔn ʔnʔ hkyl mrkwn wrbkwn ʔšygt lkwn rglykwn kmʔ ʔntwn ḥybyn ʔntwn dtšygwn rglʔ ḥd dḥd
13:15	hnʔ gyr ṭwpsʔ yhbt lkwn dʔyknʔ dʔnʔ ʕbdt lkwn ʔp ʔntwn tʕbdwn 
13:16	ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dlyt ʕbdʔ drb mn mrh wlʔ šlyḥʔ drb mn mn dšdrh
13:17	ʔn hlyn tdʕwn ṭwbnʔ ʔntwn ʔn tʕbdwn ʔnyn
13:18	lʔ hwʔ ʕl klkwn ʔmr ʔnʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ gyr lʔylyn dgbyt ʔlʔ dktbʔ nšlm dhw dʔkl ʕmy lḥmʔ ʔrym ʕly ʕqbh
13:19	mn hšʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn mn qdm dnhwʔ dmʔ dhwʔ thymnwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ
13:20	ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dmn dmqbl lmn dmšdr ʔnʔ ly mqbl wmn dly mqbl mqbl lmn dšdrny
13:21	hlyn ʔmr yšwʕ wʔtʕzz brwḥh wʔshd wʔmr ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dḥd mnkwn nšlmny
13:22	ḥrw dyn tlmydʔ ḥd bḥd mṭl dlʔ ydʕyn hww dʕl mnw ʔmr
13:23	ʔyt hwʔ dyn mn tlmydwhy ḥd dsmyk hwʔ bʕwbh hw drḥm hwʔ lh yšwʕ
13:24	lhnʔ rmz šmʕwn kʔpʔ dnšʔlywhy dmnw hw dʔmr ʕlwhy
13:25	wnpl hw tlmydʔ ʕl ḥdyh dyšwʕ wʔmr lh mry mnw hnʔ
13:26	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr hw hw dṣbʕ ʔnʔ lḥmʔ yhb ʔnʔ lh wṣbʕ yšwʕ lḥmʔ wyhb lyhwdʔ br šmʕwn skrywṭʔ
13:27	wbtr lḥmʔ hydyn ʔtʕll bh sṭnʔ wʔmr lh yšwʕ mdm dʕbd ʔnt ʕbd bʕgl
13:28	hdʔ dyn lʔ ʔnš ydʕ mn hnwn smykʔ dʕl mnʔ ʔmr lh
13:29	ʔnšyn gyr sbrw mṭl dglwsqmʔ ṣʔdwhy hwʔ dyhwdʔ dmpqd pqd lh dnzbn mdm dmtbʕʔ lʕdʕdʔ ʔw dntl mdm lmsknʔ
13:30	hw dyn yhwdʔ nsb lḥmʔ br šʕth wnpq lh lbr llyʔ hwʔ dyn kd npq
13:31	wʔmr yšwʕ hšʔ ʔštbḥ brh dʔnšʔ wʔlhʔ ʔštbḥ bh
13:32	wʔn ʔlhʔ ʔštbḥ bh wʔp ʔlhʔ mšbḥ lh bh wmḥdʔ mšbḥ lh
13:33	bny qlyl ʔḥryn ʕmkwn ʔnʔ wtbʕwnny wʔyknʔ dʔmrt lyhwdyʔ dlʔykʔ dʔnʔ ʔzl ʔnʔ ʔntwn lʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn lmʔtʔ wʔp lkwn ʔmr ʔnʔ hšʔ
13:34	pwqdnʔ ḥdtʔ yhb ʔnʔ lkwn dhwytwn mḥbyn ḥd lḥd ʔyknʔ dʔnʔ ʔḥbtkwn ʔp ʔntwn tḥbwn ḥd lḥd
13:35	bhdʔ ndʕ kl ʔnš dtlmydy ʔntwn ʔn ḥwbʔ nhwʔ bkwn ḥd lwt ḥd
13:36	ʔmr lh šmʕwn kʔpʔ mrn lʔykʔ ʔzl ʔnt ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lh lʔykʔ dʔzl ʔnʔ lʔ mškḥ ʔnt hšʔ dtʔtʔ btry lḥrtʔ dyn tʔtʔ
13:37	ʔmr lh šmʕwn kʔpʔ mry lmnʔ lʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ dʔtʔ btrk hšʔ npšy ḥlpyk sʔm ʔnʔ
13:38	ʔmr lh yšwʕ npšk ḥlpy sʔm ʔnt ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lk dlʔ nqrʔ trnglʔ ʕdmʔ dtkpwr by tlt zbnyn
14:01	lʔ ntdwd lbkwn hymnw bʔlhʔ wby hymnw
14:02	sgyʔyn ʔnwn ʔwnʔ byt ʔby wʔlʔ ʔmr hwyt lkwn dʔzl ʔnʔ dʔṭyb lkwn ʔtrʔ
14:03	wʔn ʔzl ʔṭyb lkwn ʔtrʔ twb ʔtʔ wʔdbrkwn lwty dʔykʔ dʔnʔ ʔyty ʔp ʔntwn thwwn
14:04	wlʔykʔ dʔzl ʔnʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn wʔwrḥʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn
14:05	ʔmr lh tʔwmʔ mrn lʔ ydʕynn lʔykʔ ʔzl ʔnt wʔyknʔ mškḥyn ḥnn ʔwrḥʔ lmdʕ
14:06	ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔnʔ ʔnʔ ʔwrḥʔ wšrrʔ wḥyʔ lʔ ʔnš ʔtʔ lwt ʔby ʔlʔ ʔn by
14:07	ʔlw ly ydʕyn hwytwn ʔp lʔby ydʕyn hwytwn wmn hšʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn lh wḥzytwnyhy
14:08	ʔmr lh pylypws mrn ḥwn ʔbʔ wkdw ln
14:09	ʔmr lh yšwʕ hnʔ klh zbnʔ ʕmkwn ʔnʔ wlʔ ydʕtny pylypʔ mn dly ḥzʔ ḥzʔ lʔbʔ wʔyknʔ ʔnt ʔmr ʔnt ḥwn ʔbʔ
14:10	lʔ mhymn ʔnt dʔnʔ bʔby wʔby by mlʔ ʔylyn dʔnʔ mmll ʔnʔ mn npšy lʔ mmll ʔnʔ ʔby dyn dby ʕmr hw ʕbd ʕbdʔ hlyn
14:11	hymnw dʔnʔ bʔby wʔby by wʔlʔ ʔpn mṭl ʕbdʔ hymnw
14:12	ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dmn dmhymn by ʕbdʔ ʔylyn dʔnʔ ʕbd ʔnʔ ʔp hw nʕbd wdytyryn mn hlyn nʕbd dʔnʔ lwt ʔbʔ ʔzl ʔnʔ
14:13	wmdm dtšʔlwn bšmy ʔʕbd lkwn dnštbḥ ʔbʔ bbrh
14:14	wʔn tšʔlwnny bšmy ʔnʔ ʕbdnʔ
14:15	ʔn rḥmyn ʔntwn ly pwqdny ṭrw
14:16	wʔnʔ ʔbʕʔ mn ʔby wʔḥrnʔ prqlṭʔ ntl lkwn dnhwʔ ʕmkwn lʕlm
14:17	rwḥʔ dšrrʔ hw dʕlmʔ lʔ mškḥ lmqblwth mṭl dlʔ ḥzyhy wlʔ ydʕh ʔntwn dyn ydʕyn ʔntwn lh dlwtkwn ʕmr wbkwn hw
14:18	lʔ šbq ʔnʔ lkwn ytmʔ ʔtʔ ʔnʔ gyr lwtkwn qlyl ʔḥryn
14:19	wʕlmʔ lʔ ḥzʔ ly ʔntwn dyn tḥzwnny dʔnʔ ḥy ʔp ʔntwn tḥwn
14:20	bhw ywmʔ tdʕwn dʔnʔ bʔby wʔntwn by ʔntwn wʔnʔ bkwn ʔnʔ 
14:21	mn dʔyt lwth pwqdny wnṭr lhwn hw hw mḥb ly hw dyn drḥm ly ntrḥm mn ʔby wʔnʔ ʔrḥmywhy wʔḥwywhy npšy
14:22	ʔmr lh yhwdʔ lʔ hwʔ skrywṭʔ mry mnw ln ʕtyd ʔnt lmḥwyw npšk wlʔ hwʔ lʕlmʔ
14:23	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lh mn drḥm ly mlty nṭr wʔby nrḥmywhy wlwth ʔtyn ḥnn wʔwnʔ lwth ʕbdyn ḥnn
14:24	hw dyn dlʔ rḥm ly mlty lʔ nṭr wmltʔ hdʔ dšmʕyn ʔntwn lʔ hwt dyly ʔlʔ dʔbʔ dšdrny
14:25	hlyn mllt ʕmkwn kd lwtkwn ʔyty
14:26	hw dyn prqlṭʔ rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ hw dmšdr ʔby bšmy hw nlpkwn kl mdm whw nʕhdkwn kl mʔ dʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn
14:27	šlmʔ šbq ʔnʔ lkwn šlmʔ dyly yhb ʔnʔ lkwn lʔ hwʔ ʔyknʔ dyhb ʕlmʔ ʔnʔ yhb ʔnʔ lkwn lʔ ntdwd lbkwn wlʔ ndḥl
14:28	šmʕtwn dʔnʔ ʔmrt lkwn dʔzl ʔnʔ wʔtʔ ʔnʔ lwtkwn ʔlw rḥmyn hwytwn ly ḥdyn hwytwn dʔzl ʔnʔ lwt ʔby dʔby rb hw mny
14:29	whšʔ hʔ ʔmrt lkwn ʕdlʔ nhwʔ dmʔ dhwʔ thymnwn
14:30	mkyl lʔ ʔmll ʕmkwn sgyʔtʔ ʔtʔ gyr ʔrkwnh dʕlmʔ wby lyt lh mdm
14:31	ʔlʔ dndʕ ʕlmʔ drḥm ʔnʔ lʔby wʔyknʔ dpqdny ʔby hkwt ʕbd ʔnʔ qwmw nʔzl mkʔ
15:01	ʔnʔ ʔnʔ gptʔ dšrrʔ wʔby hw plḥʔ
15:02	kl šbštʔ dby pʔrʔ lʔ yhbʔ šql lh wʔydʔ dyhbʔ pʔrʔ mdkʔ lh dpʔrʔ sgyʔʔ tytʔ
15:03	ʔntwn mn kdw dkyn ʔntwn mṭl mltʔ dmllt ʕmkwn
15:04	qww by wʔnʔ bkwn ʔyknʔ dšbštʔ lʔ mškḥʔ dttl pʔrʔ mn npšh ʔlʔ mqwyʔ bgptʔ hknʔ ʔp lʔ ʔntwn ʔlʔ tqwwn by
15:05	ʔnʔ ʔnʔ gptʔ wʔntwn šbštʔ mn dmqwʔ by wʔnʔ bh hnʔ mytʔ pʔrʔ sgyʔʔ mṭl ddlʔ ʔnʔ lʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn lmʕbd mdm
15:06	ʔlʔ dyn ʔnš mqwʔ by mštdʔ lbr ʔyk šbštʔ dybšʔ wlqṭyn rmyn lh bnwrʔ dtʔqd
15:07	ʔn dyn tqwwn by wmly nqwyn bkwn kl mʔ dtṣbwn lmšʔl nhwʔ lkwn
15:08	bhdʔ mštbḥ ʔbʔ dpʔrʔ sgyʔʔ tytwn wthwwn tlmydy
15:09	ʔyknʔ dʔḥbny ʔby ʔp ʔnʔ ʔḥbtkwn qww brḥmty dyly
15:10	ʔn pwqdny tṭrwn tqwwn bḥwbʔ dyly ʔyknʔ dʔnʔ nṭrt pwqdnwhy dʔby wmqwʔ ʔnʔ bḥwbh
15:11	hlyn mllt ʕmkwn dḥdwty thwʔ bkwn wtštmlʔ ḥdwtkwn
15:12	hnw pwqdny dtḥbwn ḥd lḥd ʔyknʔ dʔnʔ ʔḥbtkwn
15:13	ḥwbʔ drb mn hnʔ lyt dʔnš npšh nsym ḥlp rḥmwhy
15:14	ʔntwn rḥmy ʔntwn ʔn tʕbdwn kl dmpqd ʔnʔ lkwn
15:15	lʔ mkyl qrʔ ʔnʔ lkwn ʕbdʔ mṭl dʕbdʔ lʔ ydʕ mnʔ ʕbd mrh rḥmy dyn qrytkwn mṭl dkl dšmʕt mn ʔby ʔwdʕtkwn
15:16	lʔ hwʔ ʔntwn gbytwnny ʔlʔ ʔnʔ hw gbytkwn wsmtkwn dʔp ʔntwn tʔzlwn tytwn pʔrʔ wpʔrykwn nqwwn dkl dtšʔlwn lʔby bšmy ntl lkwn
15:17	hlyn mpqd ʔnʔ lkwn dtḥbwn ḥd lḥd
15:18	wʔn ʕlmʔ snʔ lkwn dʕw dqdmykwn ly snʔ
15:19	wʔlw mn ʕlmʔ hwytwn ʕlmʔ ldylh rḥm hwʔ ʔlʔ lʔ hwytwn mn ʕlmʔ ʔnʔ gyr gbytkwn mn ʕlmʔ mṭl hnʔ snʔ lkwn ʕlmʔ
15:20	ʕhdw mltʔ dʔnʔ ʔmrt lkwn dlyt ʕbdʔ drb mn mrh ʔn ly rdpw ʔp lkwn nrdpwn wʔn mlty nṭrw ʔp dylkwn nṭrwn
15:21	ʔlʔ hlyn klhyn nʕbdwn bkwn mṭl šmy dyly dlʔ ydʕyn lmn dšdrny
15:22	ʔlw ʔnʔ lʔ ʔtyt mllt ʕmhwn lyt hwt lhwn ḥṭytʔ hšʔ dyn lyt lhwn ʕltʔ ʕl ʔpy ḥṭythwn
15:23	mn dly snʔ wʔp lʔby snʔ
15:24	wʔlw ʕbdʔ lʔ ʕbdt lʕnyhwn ʔylyn dʔnš ʔḥryn lʔ ʕbd lyt hwʔ lhwn ḥṭytʔ hšʔ dyn wḥzw wsnw ʔp ly wʔp lʔby
15:25	dttmlʔ mltʔ dktybʔ bnmwshwn dsnʔwny mgn
15:26	mʔ dyn dʔtʔ prqlṭʔ hw dʔnʔ mšdr ʔnʔ lkwn mn lwt ʔby rwḥʔ dšrrʔ hw dmn lwt ʔby npq hw nshd ʕly
15:27	ʔp ʔntwn shdyn ʔntwn dmn šwryʔ ʕmy ʔntwn
16:01	hlyn mllt ʕmkwn dlʔ ttkšlwn
16:02	npqwnkwn gyr mn knwšthwn wtʔtʔ šʕtʔ dkl dnqṭwlkwn nsbr dqwrbnʔ mqrb lʔlhʔ
16:03	whlyn nʕbdwn mṭl dlʔ ydʕw wlʔ lʔby wlʔ ly 
16:04	hlyn mllt ʕmkwn dmʔ dʔtʔ ʕdnhyn tʕhdwn ʔnyn dʔnʔ ʔmrt lkwn hlyn dyn mn qdym lʔ ʔmrt lkwn dʕmkwn hwyt
16:05	hšʔ dyn ʔzl ʔnʔ lwt mn dšdrny wlʔ ʔnš mnkwn mšʔl ly lʔykʔ ʔzl ʔnt
16:06	ʔmrt lkwn gyr hlyn wʔtt krywtʔ wmlt lbwtkwn
16:07	ʔlʔ ʔnʔ šrrʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dpqḥ lkwn dʔnʔ ʔzl ʔngyr ʔnʔ lʔ ʔzl ʔnʔ prqlṭʔ lʔ ʔtʔ lwtkwn ʔn dyn ʔzl ʔšdrywhy lwtkwn
16:08	wmʔ dʔtʔ hw nksywhy lʕlmʔ ʕl ḥṭytʔ wʕl zdyqwtʔ wʕl dynʔ
16:09	ʕl ḥṭytʔ dlʔ mhymnyn by
16:10	ʕl zdyqwtʔ dyn dlwt ʔby ʔzl ʔnʔ wlʔ twb ḥzyn ʔntwn ly
16:11	ʕl dynʔ dyn dʔrkwnʔ dʕlmʔ hnʔ dyn hw
16:12	twb sgy ʔyt ly lmʔmr lkwn ʔlʔ lʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn lmʔḥd hšʔ
16:13	mʔ dʔtʔ dyn rwḥʔ dšrrʔ hw ndbrkwn bklh šrrʔ lʔ gyr nmll mn rʕyn npšh ʔlʔ kl dnšmʕ hw nmll wʕtydtʔ nwdʕkwn
16:14	whw nšbḥny mṭl dmn dyly nsb wnḥwykwn
16:15	kl mdm dʔyt lʔby dyly hw mṭl hnʔ ʔmrt lkwn dmn dyly nsb wnḥwykwn
16:16	qlyl wlʔ tḥzwnny wtwb qlyl wtḥzwnny dʔzl ʔnʔ lwt ʔbʔ
16:17	wʔmrw hww tlmydwhy ḥd lḥd mnʔ hy hdʔ dʔmr ln dqlyl wlʔ tḥzwnny wtwb qlyl wtḥzwnny wdʔzl ʔnʔ lwt ʔby
16:18	wʔmryn hww mnʔ hy hdʔ qlyl dʔmr lʔ ydʕynn mnʔ mmll
16:19	yšwʕ dyn ydʕ dbʕyn hww lmšʔlwth wʔmr lhwn ʕl hdʔ bʕyn ʔntwn ʕm ḥddʔ dʔmrt lkwn dqlyl wlʔ tḥzwnny wtwb qlyl wtḥzwnny
16:20	ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dtbkwn ʔntwn wtʔlwn wʕlmʔ nḥdʔ wlkwn tkrʔ ʔlʔ krywtkwn lḥdwtʔ thwʔ
16:21	ʔnttʔ mʔ dyldʔ kryʔ lh dmṭʔ ywmʔ dmwldh mʔ dyldt dyn brʔ lʔ ʕhdʔ ʔwlṣnh mṭl ḥdwtʔ dʔtyld brnšʔ bʕlmʔ
16:22	ʔp ʔntwn hšʔ kryʔ lkwn twb dyn ʔḥzykwn wnḥdʔ lbkwn wḥdwtkwn lʔ ʔnš nsb mnkwn
16:23	wbhw ywmʔ ly lʔ tšʔlwn mdm ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dkl mdm dtšʔlwn lʔby bšmy ntl lkwn
16:24	ʕdmʔ lhšʔ lʔ šʔltwn mdm bšmy šʔlw wtsbwn dthwʔ ḥdwtkwn mšmlyʔ
16:25	hlyn bplʔtʔ mllt ʕmkwn ʔtyʔ dyn šʕtʔ ʔmty dlʔ ʔmll ʕmkwn bplʔtʔ ʔlʔ ʕyn bglʔ ʔbdq lkwn ʕl ʔbʔ
16:26	bhw ywmʔ dtšʔlwn bšmy wlʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dʔnʔ ʔbʕʔ mn ʔbʔ ʕlykwn
16:27	hw gyr ʔbʔ rḥm lkwn dʔntwn rḥmtwnny whymntwn dʔnʔ mn lwt ʔlhʔ npqt
16:28	npqt mn lwt ʔbʔ wʔtyt lʕlmʔ wtwb šbq ʔnʔ lʕlmʔ wʔzl ʔnʔ ly lwt ʔbʔ
16:29	ʔmryn lh tlmydwhy hʔ hšʔ glyʔyt mmll ʔnt wplʔtʔ wlʔ ḥdʔ ʔmr ʔnt
16:30	hšʔ ydʕyn ḥnn dkl mdm ydʕ ʔnt wlʔ snyq ʔnt dʔnš nšʔlk bhdʔ mhymnyn ḥnn dmn ʔlhʔ npqt
16:31	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ hymnw
16:32	dhʔ ʔtyʔ šʕtʔ whšʔ ʔtt dttbdrwn ʔnš lʔtrh wtšbqwnny blḥwdy wlʔ hwyt blḥwdy dʔbʔ ʕmy hw
16:33	hlyn ʔmrt lkwn dby nhwʔ lkwn šlmʔ bʕlmʔ hwʔ lkwn ʔwlṣnʔ ʔlʔ ʔtlbbw ʔnʔ zkyth lʕlmʔ
17:01	hlyn mll yšwʕ wʔrym ʕynwhy lšmyʔ wʔmr ʔby ʔtt šʕtʔ šbḥ brk dbrk nšbḥk
17:02	ʔyknʔ dyhbt lh šwlṭnʔ ʕl kl bsr dkl mʔ dyhbt lh ntl lh ḥyʔ dlʕlm
17:03	hlyn ʔnwn dyn ḥyʔ dlʕlm dndʕwnk dʔnt ʔnt ʔlhʔ dšrrʔ blḥwdyk wmn dšdrt yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
17:04	ʔnʔ šbḥtk bʔrʕʔ ʕbdʔ hw dyhbt ly dʔʕbd šlmth
17:05	whšʔ šbḥyny ʔnt ʔby lwtk bhw šwbḥʔ dʔyt hwʔ ly lwtk mn qdm dnhwʔ ʕlmʔ
17:06	ʔwdʕt šmk lbny ʔnšʔ hnwn dyhbt ly mn ʕlmʔ dylk hww wly yhbt ʔnwn wnṭrw mltk
17:07	hšʔ ydʕt dkl mʔ dyhbt ly mn lwtk hw
17:08	dmlʔ dyhbt ly yhbt lhwn whnwn qblw wydʕw šryrʔyt dmn lwtk npqt whymnw dʔnt šdrtny
17:09	wʔnʔ ʕlyhwn bʕʔ ʔnʔ lʔ hwʔ ʕl ʕlmʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ ʔlʔ ʕl hnwn dyhbt ly ddylk ʔnwn
17:10	wkl mdm ddyly hw dylk hw wdylk dyly hw wmšbḥ ʔnʔ bhwn
17:11	mkyl lʔ hwyt bʕlmʔ whlyn bʕlmʔ ʔnwn wʔnʔ lwtk ʔtʔ ʔnʔ ʔbʔ qdyšʔ ṭr ʔnwn bšmk hw dyhbt ly dnhwwn ḥd ʔyknʔ dḥnn 
17:12	kd ʕmhwn hwyt bʕlmʔ ʔnʔ nṭr hwyt lhwn bšmk lʔylyn dyhbt ly nṭrt wʔnš mnhwn lʔ ʔbd ʔlʔ brh dʔbdnʔ dntmlʔ ktbʔ
17:13	hšʔ dyn lwtk ʔtʔ ʔnʔ whlyn mmll ʔnʔ bʕlmʔ dthwʔ ḥdwty mšmlyʔ bhwn
17:14	ʔnʔ yhbt lhwn mltk wʕlmʔ snʔ ʔnwn dlʔ hww mn ʕlmʔ ʔyknʔ dʔnʔ lʔ hwyt mn ʕlmʔ
17:15	lʔ hwʔ dtšqwl ʔnwn mn ʕlmʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ ʔlʔ dtṭr ʔnwn mn byšʔ
17:16	lʔ hww gyr mn ʕlmʔ ʔyknʔ dʔnʔ lʔ hwyt mn ʕlmʔ
17:17	ʔbʔ qdš ʔnwn bšrrk dmltk dylk šrrʔ hy
17:18	ʔyknʔ dly šdrt lʕlmʔ ʔp ʔnʔ šdrt ʔnwn lʕlmʔ
17:19	wʕl ʔpyhwn ʔnʔ mqdš ʔnʔ npšy dnhwwn ʔp hnwn mqdšyn bšrrʔ
17:20	wlʔ hwʔ ʕl ʔpy hlyn bʕʔ ʔnʔ blḥwd ʔlʔ ʔp ʕl ʔpy ʔylyn dmhymnyn by bmlthwn
17:21	dklhwn nhwwn ḥd ʔyknʔ dʔnt ʔby by wʔnʔ bk dʔp hnwn bn ḥd nhwwn dnhymn ʕlmʔ dʔnt šdrtny
17:22	wʔnʔ šwbḥʔ dyhbt ly yhbt lhwn dnhwwn ḥd ʔyknʔ dḥnn ḥd ḥnn
17:23	ʔnʔ bhwn wʔnt by dnhwwn gmyryn lḥd wdndʕ ʕlmʔ dʔnt šdrtny wdʔḥbt ʔnwn ʔyknʔ dʔp ly ʔḥbt
17:24	ʔbʔ hnwn dyhbt ly ṣbʔ ʔnʔ dʔtr dʔnʔ ʔp hnwn nhwwn ʕmy dnhwwn ḥzyn šwbḥʔ dyly hw dyhbt ly dʔḥbtny mn qdm trmyth dʕlmʔ
17:25	ʔby kʔnʔ wʕlmʔ lʔ ydʕk ʔnʔ dyn ydʕtk whnwn ydʕw dʔnt šdrtny
17:26	wʔwdʕt ʔnwn šmk wmwdʕ ʔnʔ dḥwbʔ hw dʔḥbtny nhwʔ bhwn wʔnʔ ʔhwʔ bhwn
18:01	hlyn ʔmr yšwʕ wnpq ʕm tlmydwhy lʕbrʔ drgltʔ dqdrwn ʔtr dʔyt hwt gntʔ ʔykʔ dʕl hw wtlmydwhy
18:02	ydʕ hwʔ dyn ʔp yhwdʔ mšlmnʔ ldwktʔ hy mṭl dsgy zbnʔ knš hwʔ tmn yšwʕ ʕm tlmydwhy
18:03	hw hkyl yhwdʔ dbr ʔspyr wmn lwt rby khnʔ wpryšʔ dbr dḥšʔ wʔtʔ ltmn ʕm npṭrʔ wlmpydʔ wzynʔ
18:04	yšwʕ dyn dydʕ hwʔ kl mdm dʔtʔ ʕlwhy npq wʔmr lhwn lmn bʕyn ʔntwn
18:05	ʔmryn lh lyšwʕ nṣryʔ ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔnʔ ʔnʔ qʔm hwʔ dyn ʔp yhwdʔ mšlmnʔ ʕmhwn
18:06	wkd ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ dʔnʔ ʔnʔ ʔzlw lbstrhwn wnplw ʕl ʔrʕʔ
18:07	twb šʔl ʔnwn yšwʕ lmn bʕyn ʔntwn hnwn dyn ʔmrw lyšwʕ nṣryʔ
18:08	ʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔmrt lkwn dʔnʔ ʔnʔ wʔn ly bʕyn ʔntwn šbwqw lhlyn ʔzlyn
18:09	dtšlm mltʔ dʔmr dʔylyn dyhbt ly lʔ ʔwbdt mnhwn ʔplʔ ḥd
18:10	šmʕwn dyn kʔpʔ ʔyt hwʔ ʕlwhy spsrʔ wšmṭh wmḥyhy lʕbdh drb khnʔ wšqlh ʔdnh dymynʔ šmh dyn dʕbdʔ mlk
18:11	wʔmr yšwʕ lkʔpʔ sym spsrʔ bḥlth ksʔ dyhb ly ʔby lʔ ʔštywhy
18:12	hydyn ʔspyr wklyrkʔ wdḥšʔ dyhwdyʔ ʔḥdwhy lyšwʕ wʔsrwhy
18:13	wʔytywhy lwt ḥnn lwqdm mṭl dḥmwhy hwʔ dqypʔ hw dʔytwhy hwʔ rb khnʔ dšntʔ hy
18:14	ʔytwhy hwʔ dyn qypʔ hw dmlk lyhwdyʔ dpqḥ dḥd gbrʔ nmwt ḥlp ʕmʔ
18:15	šmʕwn dyn kʔpʔ wḥd mn tlmydʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔtyn hww btrh dyšwʕ lhw dyn tlmydʔ ydʕ hwʔ lh rb khnʔ wʕl ʕm yšwʕ ldrtʔ
18:16	šmʕwn dyn qʔm hwʔ lbr lwt trʕʔ wnpq hw tlmydʔ ʔḥrnʔ dydʕ hwʔ lh rb khnʔ wʔmr lnṭrt trʕʔ wʔʕlh lšmʕwn
18:17	ʔmrt dyn ʕlymtʔ nṭrt trʕʔ lšmʕwn lmʔ ʔp ʔnt mn tlmydwhy ʔnt dhnʔ gbrʔ ʔmr lh lʔ
18:18	wqymyn hww ʕbdʔ wdḥšʔ wsymyn hww nwrʔ dnšḥnwn mṭl dqryš hwʔ qʔm hwʔ dyn ʔp šmʕwn ʕmhwn wšḥn
18:19	rb khnʔ dyn šʔlh lyšwʕ ʕl tlmydwhy wʕl ywlpnh
18:20	wʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔnʔ ʕyn bglʔ mllt ʕm ʕmʔ wbklzbn ʔlpt bknwštʔ wbhyklʔ ʔykʔ dklhwn yhwdyʔ mtknšyn wmdm bṭwšyʔ lʔ mllt
18:21	mnʔ mšʔl ʔnt ly šʔl lhnwn dšmʕw mnʔ mllt ʕmhwn hʔ hnwn ydʕyn kl mdm dʔmrt
18:22	wkd hlyn ʔmr ḥd mn dḥšʔ dqʔm hwʔ mḥyhy ʕl pkh lyšwʕ wʔmr lh hknʔ yhb ʔnt ptgmʔ lrb khnʔ
18:23	ʕnʔ yšwʕ wʔmr lh ʔn byšʔyt mllt ʔshd ʕl byštʔ wʔn dyn špyr lmnʔ mḥytny 
18:24	ḥnn dyn šdr lyšwʕ kd ʔsyr lwt qypʔ rb khnʔ
18:25	wšmʕwn kʔpʔ qʔm hwʔ wšḥn wʔmryn lh lmʔ ʔp ʔnt ḥd mn tlmydwhy ʔnt whw kpr wʔmr lʔ hwyt
18:26	ʔmr lh ḥd mn ʕbdʔ drb khnʔ ʔḥynh dhw dpsq hwʔ šmʕwn ʔdnh lʔ ʔnʔ ḥzytk ʕmh bgntʔ
18:27	wtwb kpr šmʕwn wbh bšʕtʔ qrʔ trnglʔ
18:28	ʔytywhy dyn lyšwʕ mn lwt qypʔ lprṭwryn wʔytwhy hwʔ ṣprʔ whnwn lʔ ʕlw lprṭwryn dlʔ ntṭwšwn ʕd ʔklyn pṣḥʔ
18:29	npq dyn pylṭws lbr lwthwn wʔmr lhwn mnʔ mʔkl qrṣʔ ʔyt lkwn ʕl gbrʔ hnʔ
18:30	ʕnw wʔmryn lh ʔlw lʔ ʕbd byštʔ hwʔ ʔplʔ lk mšlmyn hwyn lh
18:31	ʔmr lhwn pylṭws dwbrwhy ʔntwn wdwnwhy ʔyk nmwskwn ʔmryn lh yhwdyʔ lʔ šlyṭ ln lmqṭl lʔnš
18:32	dtšlm mltʔ dʔmr yšwʕ kd mwdʕ bʔynʔ mwtʔ ʕtyd dnmwt
18:33	ʕl dyn pylṭws lprṭwryn wqrʔ lyšwʕ wʔmr lh ʔnt hw mlkhwn dyhwdyʔ
18:34	ʔmr lh yšwʕ mn npšk ʔmrt hdʔ ʔw ʔḥrnʔ ʔmrw lk ʕly
18:35	ʔmr lh pylṭws lmʔ ʔnʔ yhwdyʔ ʔnʔ bny ʕmk hw wrby khnʔ ʔšlmwk ly mnʔ ʕbdt
18:36	ʔmr lh yšwʕ mlkwty dyly lʔ hwt mn hnʔ ʕlmʔ ʔlw mn ʕlmʔ hwt hnʔ mlkwty mtktšyn hww mšmšny dlʔ ʔštlm lyhwdyʔ hšʔ dyn mlkwty dyly lʔ hwt mkʔ
18:37	ʔmr lh pylṭws mdyn mlkʔ ʔnt ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔnt ʔmrt dmlkʔ ʔnʔ ʔnʔ lhdʔ ylyd ʔnʔ wlhdʔ ʔtyt lʕlmʔ dʔshd ʕl šrrʔ kl mn dʔytwhy mn šrrʔ šmʕ qly
18:38	ʔmr lh pylṭws mnw šrrʔ wkd ʔmr hdʔ npq lh twb lwt yhwdyʔ wʔmr lhwn ʔnʔ ʔplʔ ḥdʔ ʕltʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ bh
18:39	ʕydʔ dyn ʔyt lkwn dḥd ʔšrʔ lkwn bpṣḥʔ ṣbyn ʔntwn hkyl ʔšrʔ lkwn lhnʔ mlkʔ dyhwdyʔ
18:40	wqʕw klhwn wʔmryn lʔ lhnʔ ʔlʔ lbr ʔbʔ ʔytwhy hwʔ dyn hnʔ br ʔbʔ gysʔ
19:01	hydyn pylṭws ngdh lyšwʕ
19:02	wʔsṭrṭywṭʔ gdlw klylʔ mn kwbʔ wsmw lh bršh wksywhy nḥtʔ dʔrgwnʔ
19:03	wʔmryn hww šlm lk mlkʔ dyhwdyʔ wmḥyn hww lh ʕl pkwhy
19:04	wnpq pylṭws twb lbr wʔmr lhwn hʔ mpq ʔnʔ lh lkwn lbr dtdʕwn dlʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ btrh ʔplʔ ḥdʔ ʕltʔ
19:05	wnpq yšwʕ lbr kd ʔyt ʕlwhy klylʔ dkwbʔ wnḥtʔ dʔrgwnʔ wʔmr lhwn pylṭws hʔ gbrʔ
19:06	kd dyn ḥzʔwhy rby khnʔ wdḥšʔ qʕw wʔmryn ṣlwbyhy ṣlwbyhy ʔmr lhwn pylṭws dbrw ʔntwn wzwqpwhy ʔnʔ gyr lʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ bh ʕltʔ
19:07	ʔmryn lh yhwdyʔ ln nmwsʔ ʔyt ln wʔyk dbnmwsn ḥyb hw mwtʔ dʕbd npšh brh dʔlhʔ
19:08	kd šmʕ dyn pylṭws hdʔ mltʔ ytyrʔyt dḥl
19:09	wʕl twb lprṭwryn wʔmr lyšwʕ ʔymkʔ ʔnt yšwʕ dyn ptgmʔ lʔ yhb lh
19:10	ʔmr lh pylṭws ʕmy lʔ mmll ʔnt lʔ ydʕ ʔnt dšlyṭ ʔnʔ dʔšryk wšlyṭ ʔnʔ dʔzqpk
19:11	ʔmr lh yšwʕ lyt hwʔ lk ʕly šwlṭnʔ ʔp lʔ ḥd ʔlw lʔ yhyb hwʔ lk mn lʕl mṭl hnʔ hw mn dʔšlmny lk rbʔ hy ḥṭyth mn dylk
19:12	wmṭl hdʔ ṣbʔ hwʔ pylṭws dnšrywhy yhwdyʔ dyn qʕyn hww dʔn lhnʔ šrʔ ʔnt lʔ hwyt rḥmh dqsr kl mn gyr dnpšh mlkʔ ʕbd sqwblʔ hw dqsr
19:13	kd šmʕ dyn pylṭws hdʔ mltʔ ʔpqh lyšwʕ lbr wytb ʕl bym bdwktʔ dmtqryʔ rṣyptʔ dkʔpʔ ʕbrʔyt dyn mtʔmrʔ gpyptʔ
19:14	wʕrwbtʔ hwt dpṣḥʔ wʔyt hwy ʔyk šʕʔ št wʔmr lyhwdyʔ hʔ mlkkwn
19:15	hnwn dyn qʕyn hww šqwlyhy šqwlyhy ṣlwbyhy ṣlwbyhy ʔmr lhwn pylṭws lmlkkwn ʔzqwp ʔmryn rby khnʔ lyt ln mlkʔ ʔlʔ ʔn qsr
19:16	hydyn ʔšlmh lhwn dnzqpwnyhy wdbrwhy lyšwʕ wʔpqwhy
19:17	kd šqyl zqyph ldwktʔ dmtqryʔ qrqptʔ ʕbrʔyt dyn mtʔmrʔ ggwltʔ
19:18	ʔtr dzqpwhy wʕmh tryn ʔḥrnyn ḥd mkʔ wḥd mkʔ wlyšwʕ bmṣʕtʔ
19:19	wktb ʔp lwḥʔ pylṭws wsm ʕl zqyph ktyb hwʔ dyn hknʔ hnʔ yšwʕ nṣryʔ mlkʔ dyhwdyʔ
19:20	wlhnʔ dpʔ sgyʔʔ mn yhwdyʔ qrʔwhy mṭl dqrybʔ hwt lmdyntʔ dwktʔ dʔzdqp bh yšwʕ wktybʔ hwʔ ʕbrʔyt wywnʔyt wrhwmʔyt
19:21	wʔmrw rby khnʔ lpylṭws lʔ tktwb dmlkʔ hw dyhwdyʔ ʔlʔ dhw ʔmr dmlkʔ ʔnʔ dyhwdyʔ
19:22	ʔmr pylṭws mdm dktbt ktbt 
19:23	ʔsṭrṭywṭʔ dyn kd zqpwhy lyšwʕ šqlw nḥtwhy wʕbdw lʔrbʕ mnwn mntʔ lḥd mn ʔsṭrṭywṭʔ kwtynh dyn ʔytyh hwt dlʔ ḥyṭʔ mn lʕl zqyrtʔ klh
19:24	wʔmrw ḥd lḥd lʔ nsdqyh ʔlʔ nps ʕlyh mps dmnw thwʔ wšlm ktbʔ dʔmr dplgw nḥty bynthwn wʕl lbwšy ʔrmyw psʔ hlyn ʕbdw ʔsṭrṭywṭʔ
19:25	qymn hwy dyn lwt zqyph dyšwʕ ʔmh wḥth dʔmh wmrym hy dqlywpʔ wmrym mgdlytʔ
19:26	yšwʕ dyn ḥzʔ lʔmh wltlmydʔ hw drḥm hwʔ dqʔm wʔmr lʔmh ʔnttʔ hʔ brky
19:27	wʔmr ltlmydʔ hw hʔ ʔmk wmn hy šʕtʔ dbrh tlmydʔ hw lwth
19:28	btr hlyn ydʕ yšwʕ dklmdm ʔštlm wdntmlʔ ktbʔ ʔmr ṣhʔ ʔnʔ
19:29	wmʔnʔ sym hwʔ dmlʔ ḥlʔ hnwn dyn mlw ʔspwgʔ mn ḥlʔ wsmw ʕl zwpʔ wqrbw lwt pwmh
19:30	kd dyn šql hw ḥlʔ yšwʕ ʔmr hʔ mšlm wʔrkn ršh wʔšlm rwḥh
19:31	yhwdyʔ dyn mṭl dʕrwbtʔ hwt ʔmryn lʔ nbwtwn pgrʔ hlyn ʕl zqypyhwn mṭl dšbtʔ nghʔ ywmʔ hwʔ gyr rbʔ ywmʔ dšbtʔ hy wbʕw mn pylṭws dntbrwn šqyhwn dhnwn zqypʔ wnḥtwn ʔnwn
19:32	wʔtw ʔsṭrṭywṭʔ wtbrw šqwhy dqdmyʔ wdhw ʔḥrnʔ dʔzdqp ʕmh
19:33	wkd ʔtw lwt yšwʕ ḥzw dmyt lh mn kdw wlʔ tbrw šqwhy
19:34	ʔlʔ ḥd mn ʔsṭrṭywṭʔ mḥyhy bdpnh blwkytʔ wmḥdʔ npq dmʔ wmyʔ
19:35	wmn dḥzʔ ʔshd wšryrʔ hy shdwth whw ydʕ dšrrʔ ʔmr dʔp ʔntwn thymnwn
19:36	hlyn gyr hwy dntmlʔ ktbʔ dʔmr dgrmʔ lʔ nttbr bh
19:37	wtwb ktbʔ ʔḥrnʔ dʔmr dnḥwrwn bmn ddqrw
19:38	btr hlyn ywsp hw dmn rmtʔ bʕʔ mn pylṭws mṭl dtlmydʔ hwʔ dyšwʕ wmṭšʔ hwʔ mn dḥltʔ dyhwdyʔ dnšqwl pgrh dyšwʕ wʔps pylṭws wʔtʔ wšql pgrh dyšwʕ
19:39	wʔtʔ ʔp nyqdmws hw dʔtʔ hwʔ mn qdym lwt yšwʕ bllyʔ wʔyty ʕmh ḥwnṭtʔ dmwrʔ wdʕlwy ʔyk mʔʔ lyṭryn
19:40	wšqlwhy lpgrh dyšwʕ wkrkwhy bktnʔ wbbsmʔ ʔyknʔ dʔyt ʕydʔ lyhwdyʔ dnqbrwn
19:41	ʔyt hwt dyn bhy dwktʔ dʔzdqp bh yšwʕ gntʔ wbh bgntʔ byt qbwrʔ ḥdtʔ dʔnš ʕdkyl lʔ ʔttsym hwʔ bh
19:42	wsmwhy tmn lyšwʕ mṭl dšbtʔ ʕʔlʔ hwt wmṭl dqryb hwʔ qbrʔ
20:01	bḥd bšbʔ dyn ʔtt mrym mgdlytʔ bṣprʔ ʕd ḥšwk lbyt qbwrʔ wḥzt lkʔpʔ dšqylʔ mn qbrʔ
20:02	wrhṭt ʔtt lwt šmʕwn kʔpʔ wlwt hw tlmydʔ ʔḥrnʔ drḥm hwʔ yšwʕ wʔmrʔ lhwn dšqlwhy lmrn mn hw byt qbwrʔ wlʔ ydʕʔ ʔnʔ ʔykʔ smwhy
20:03	wnpq šmʕwn whw tlmydʔ ʔḥrnʔ wʔtyn hww lbyt qbwrʔ
20:04	wrhṭyn hww tryhwn ʔkḥdʔ hw dyn tlmydʔ rhṭ qdmh lšmʕwn wʔtʔ qdmyʔ lbyt qbwrʔ
20:05	wʔdyq ḥzʔ ktnʔ kd symyn mʕl dyn lʔ ʕl
20:06	ʔtʔ dyn šmʕwn btrh wʕl lbyt qbwrʔ wḥzʔ ktnʔ kd symyn
20:07	wswdrʔ hw dḥzyq hwʔ bršh lʔ ʕm ktnʔ ʔlʔ kd kryk wsym lsṭr bḥdʔ dwkʔ
20:08	hydyn ʕl ʔp hw tlmydʔ dʔtʔ qdmyʔ lbyt qbwrʔ wḥzʔ whymn
20:09	lʔ gyr ʕdkyl ydʕyn hww mn ktbʔ dʕtyd hwʔ lmqm mn mytʔ
20:10	wʔzlw hnwn tlmydʔ twb ldwkthwn
20:11	mrym dyn qymʔ hwt lwt qbrʔ wbkyʔ wkd bkyʔ ʔdyqt bqbrʔ
20:12	wḥzt tryn mlʔkʔ bḥwrʔ dytbyn ḥd mn ʔsdwhy wḥd mn rglwhy ʔykʔ dsym hwʔ pgrh dyšwʕ
20:13	wʔmryn lh ʔnttʔ mnʔ bkyʔ ʔnty ʔmrʔ lhwn dšqlwhy lmry wlʔ ydʕʔ ʔnʔ ʔykʔ smwhy
20:14	hdʔ ʔmrt wʔtpnyt lbstrh wḥzt lyšwʕ dqʔm wlʔ ydʕʔ hwt dyšwʕ hw
20:15	ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔnttʔ mnʔ bkyʔ ʔnty wlmn bʕyʔ ʔnty hy dyn sbrt dgnnʔ hw wʔmrʔ lh mry ʔn ʔnt šqltyhy ʔmr ly ʔykʔ smtyhy ʔzl ʔšqlywhy
20:16	ʔmr lh yšwʕ mrym wʔtpnyt wʔmrʔ lh ʕbrʔyt rbwly dmtʔmr mlpnʔ
20:17	ʔmr lh yšwʕ lʔ ttqrbyn ly lʔ gyr ʕdkyl slqt lwt ʔby zly dyn lwt ʔḥy wʔmry lhwn slq ʔnʔ lwt ʔby wʔbwkwn wʔlhy wʔlhkwn
20:18	hydyn ʔtt mrym mgdlytʔ wsbrt ltlmydʔ dḥzt lmrn wdhlyn ʔmr lh 
20:19	kd hwʔ dyn rmšʔ dywmʔ hw dḥd bšbʔ wtrʕʔ ʔḥydyn hww dʔykʔ dʔytyhwn hww tlmydʔ mṭl dḥltʔ dyhwdyʔ ʔtʔ yšwʕ qm bynthwn wʔmr lhwn šlmʔ ʕmkwn
20:20	hdʔ ʔmr wḥwy ʔnwn ʔydwhy wsṭrh wḥdyw tlmydʔ dḥzw lmrn
20:21	ʔmr lhwn dyn twb yšwʕ šlmʔ ʕmkwn ʔyknʔ dšdrny ʔby ʔp ʔnʔ mšdr ʔnʔ lkwn
20:22	wkd ʔmr hlyn npḥ bhwn wʔmr lhwn qblw rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ
20:23	ʔn tšbqwn ḥṭhʔ lʔnš nštbqwn lh wʔn tʔḥdwn dʔnš ʔḥydyn
20:24	tʔwmʔ dyn ḥd mn trʕsrtʔ hw dmtʔmr tʔmʔ lʔ hwʔ tmn hwʔ ʕmhwn kd ʔtʔ yšwʕ
20:25	wʔmryn lh tlmydʔ ḥzyn lmrn hw dyn ʔmr lhwn ʔlʔ ḥzʔ ʔnʔ bʔydwhy dwkytʔ dṣṣʔ wrmʔ ʔnʔ bhyn ṣbʕty wmwšṭ ʔnʔ ʔydy bdpnh lʔ mhymn ʔnʔ
20:26	wbtr tmnyʔ ywmyn twb lgw hww tlmydʔ wtʔwmʔ ʕmhwn wʔtʔ yšwʕ kd ʔḥydyn trʕʔ qm bmṣʕtʔ wʔmr lhwn šlmʔ ʕmkwn
20:27	wʔmr ltʔwmʔ ʔytʔ ṣbʕk lhrkʔ wḥzy ʔydy wʔytʔ ʔydk wʔwšṭ bgby wlʔ thwʔ lʔ mhymnʔ ʔlʔ mhymnʔ
20:28	wʕnʔ tʔwmʔ wʔmr lh mry wʔlhy
20:29	ʔmr lh yšwʕ hšʔ dḥzytny hymnt ṭwbyhwn lʔylyn dlʔ ḥzʔwny whymnw
20:30	sgyʔtʔ dyn ʔtwtʔ ʔḥrnytʔ ʕbd yšwʕ qdm tlmydwhy ʔylyn dlʔ ktybn bktbʔ hnʔ
20:31	ʔp hlyn dyn dktybn dthymnwn dyšwʕ hw mšyḥʔ brh dʔlhʔ wmʔ dhymntwn nhwwn lkwn bšmh ḥyʔ dlʕlm
21:01	btr hlyn ḥwy twb npšh yšwʕ ltlmydwhy ʕl ymʔ dṭybryws ḥwy dyn hknʔ
21:02	ʔytyhwn hww ʔkḥdʔ šmʕwn kʔpʔ wtʔwmʔ dmtʔmr tʔmʔ wntnyʔyl hw dmn qṭnʔ dglylʔ wbny zbdy wtryn ʔḥrnyn mn tlmydʔ
21:03	ʔmr lhwn šmʕwn kʔpʔ ʔzl ʔnʔ ʔṣwd nwnʔ ʔmryn lh ʔp ḥnn ʔtynn ʕmk wnpqw wslqw lspyntʔ wbhw llyʔ mdm lʔ ṣdw
21:04	kd dyn hwʔ ṣprʔ qm yšwʕ ʕl yd ymʔ wlʔ ydʕw tlmydʔ dyšwʕ hw
21:05	wʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ṭlyʔ lmʔ ʔyt lkwn mdm lmlʕs ʔmryn lh lʔ
21:06	ʔmr lhwn ʔrmw mṣydtkwn mn gbʔ dymynʔ dspyntʔ wmškḥyn ʔntwn wʔrmyw wlʔ ʔškḥw lmgdh lmṣydtʔ mn swgʔʔ dnwnʔ dʔḥdt
21:07	wʔmr tlmydʔ hw drḥm hwʔ lh yšwʕ lkʔpʔ hnʔ mrn hw šmʕwn dyn kd šmʕ dmrn hw nsb kwtynh mḥʔ bḥṣwhy mṭl dʕrṭlyʔ hwʔ wšdʔ npšh bymʔ dnʔtʔ lwt yšwʕ
21:08	ʔḥrnʔ dyn tlmydʔ bspyntʔ ʔtw lʔ gyr rḥyqyn hww sgy mn ʔrʕʔ ʔlʔ ʔyk mʔtyn ʔmyn wngdyn hww lh lmṣydtʔ hy dnwnʔ
21:09	kd dyn slqw lʔrʕʔ ḥzw gwmrʔ kd symn wnwnʔ kd sym ʕlyhyn wlḥmʔ
21:10	wʔmr lhwn yšwʕ ʔytw mn hnwn nwnʔ dṣdtwn hšʔ
21:11	wslq šmʕwn kʔpʔ wngdh lmṣydtʔ lʔrʕʔ kd mlyʔ nwnʔ rwrbʔ mʔʔ wḥmšyn wtltʔ wbhnʔ klh ywqrʔ lʔ ʔṣṭryt mṣydtʔ hy
21:12	wʔmr lhwn yšwʕ tw ʔštrw ʔnš dyn mn tlmydʔ lʔ mmrḥ hwʔ dnšʔlywhy dmnw dydʕyn hww dmrn hw
21:13	qrb dyn yšwʕ wšql lḥmʔ wnwnʔ wyhb lhwn
21:14	hdʔ dtlt zbnyn ʔtḥzy yšwʕ ltlmydwhy kd qm mn byt mytʔ
21:15	kd dyn ʔštryw ʔmr yšwʕ lšmʕwn kʔpʔ šmʕwn br ywnʔ rḥm ʔnt ly ytyr mn hlyn ʔmr lh ʔyn mry ʔnt ydʕ ʔnt drḥm ʔnʔ lk ʔmr lh rʕy ly ʔmry
21:16	ʔmr lh twb dtrtyn zbnyn šmʕwn br ywnʔ rḥm ʔnt ly ʔmr lh ʔyn mry ʔnt ydʕ ʔnt drḥm ʔnʔ lk ʔmr lh yšwʕ rʕy ly ʕrby
21:17	ʔmr lh dtlt zbnyn šmʕwn br ywnʔ rḥm ʔnt ly wkryt lh lkʔpʔ dʔmr lh dtlt zbnyn drḥm ʔnt ly wʔmr lh mry kl mdm ʔnt ḥkm ʔnt ʔnt ydʕ ʔnt drḥm ʔnʔ lk ʔmr lh yšwʕ rʕy ly nqwty
21:18	ʔmyn ʔmyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lk dkd ṭlʔ hwyt ʔnt lnpšk ʔsr hwyt ḥṣyk wmhlk hwyt lʔykʔ dṣbʔ ʔnt mʔ dyn dsʔbt tpšwṭ ʔydyk wʔḥryn nʔswr lk ḥṣyk wnwblk lʔykʔ dlʔ ṣbʔ ʔnt
21:19	hdʔ dyn ʔmr dnḥwʔ bʔynʔ mwtʔ ʕtyd dnšbḥ lʔlhʔ wkd ʔmr hlyn ʔmr lh tʔ btry
21:20	wʔtpny šmʕwn kʔpʔ wḥzʔ ltlmydʔ hw drḥm hwʔ yšwʕ dʔtʔ btrh hw dnpl hwʔ bḥšmytʔ ʕl ḥdyh dyšwʕ wʔmr mry mnw mšlm lk
21:21	lhnʔ kd ḥzʔ kʔpʔ ʔmr lyšwʕ mry whnʔ mnʔ
21:22	ʔmr lh yšwʕ ʔn ṣbʔ ʔnʔ dnqwʔ hnʔ ʕdmʔ dʔtʔ ʔnʔ lkmʔ lk ʔnt tʔ btry
21:23	wnpqt hdʔ mltʔ byt ʔḥʔ dhw tlmydʔ lʔ mʔt yšwʕ dyn lʔ hwʔ dlʔ mʔt ʔmr ʔlʔ dʔn ṣbʔ ʔnʔ dnqwʔ hnʔ ʕdmʔ dʔtʔ ʔnʔ lk mʔ lk
21:24	hnw tlmydʔ dʔshd ʕl hlyn klhyn wʔp ktb ʔnyn wydʕyn ḥnn dšryrʔ hy shdwth
21:25	ʔyt dyn ʔp ʔḥrnytʔ sgyʔtʔ dʕbd yšwʕ ʔylyn dʔlw ḥdʔ ḥdʔ mtktbn hwy ʔp lʔ hw ʕlmʔ ʔyk dsbr ʔnʔ spq hwʔ lktbʔ dmtktbyn hww
01:01	ktbʔ qdmyʔ ktbt ʔw tʔwpylʔ ʕl klhyn ʔylyn dšry mrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ lmʕbd wlmlpw
01:02	ʕdmʔ lywmʔ hw dbh ʔstlq mn btr dpqd hwʔ ʔnwn lšlyḥʔ ʔylyn dgbʔ brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ
01:03	hnwn dʔp ḥwy lhwn npšh kd ḥy mn btr dḥš bʔtwtʔ sgyʔtʔ bywmyn ʔrbʕyn kd mtḥzʔ hwʔ lhwn wʔmr ʕl mlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ
01:04	wkd ʔkl ʕmhwn lḥmʔ pqd ʔnwn dmn ʔwršlm lʔ nprqwn ʔlʔ dnqwwn lšwwdyh dʔbʔ hw dšmʕtwn mny
01:05	dywḥnn ʔʕmd bmyʔ wʔntwn tʕmdwn brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ lʔ btr ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ
01:06	hnwn dyn kd knyšyn šʔlwhy wʔmryn lh mrn ʔn bhnʔ zbnʔ mpnʔ ʔnt mlkwtʔ lʔysryl
01:07	ʔmr lhwn hw lʔ hwt dylkwn hdʔ lmdʕ zbnʔ ʔw zbnʔ ʔylyn dʔbʔ sm ʔnwn bšwlṭnʔ dnpšh
01:08	ʔlʔ kd tʔtʔ rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ ʕlykwn tqblwn ḥylʔ wthwwn ly shdʔ bʔwršlm wbklh yhwd wʔp byt šmryʔ wʕdmʔ lswpyh dʔrʕʔ
01:09	wkd hlyn ʔmr kd ḥzyn lh ʔstlq wʕnnʔ qblth wʔtksy mn ʕynyhwn
01:10	wkd ḥyryn hww bšmyʔ kd hw ʔzl hwʔ ʔštkḥw tryn gbryn qymyn lwthwn blbwšʔ ḥwrʔ
01:11	wʔmryn lhwn gbrʔ glylyʔ mnʔ qymyn ʔntwn wḥyryn bšmyʔ hnʔ yšwʕ dʔstlq mnkwn lšmyʔ hknʔ nʔtʔ ʔyk mʔ dḥzytwnyhy dslq lšmyʔ
01:12	wmn btrkn hpkw lhwn lʔwršlm mn ṭwrʔ dmtqrʔ dbyt zytʔ dʔytwhy ʕl gnb ʔwršlm wpryq mnh ʔyk šbʕʔ ʔsṭdwn
01:13	wmn btr dʕlw slqw lhwn lʕlytʔ hy dhwyn hww bh pṭrws wywḥnn wyʕqwb wʔndrʔws wpylypws wtʔwmʔ wmtyw br twlmy wyʕqwb br ḥlpy wšmʕwn ṭnnʔ wyhwdʔ br yʕqwb
01:14	hlyn klhwn ʔkḥdʔ ʔmynyn hww bṣlwtʔ bḥdʔ npš ʕm nšʔ wʕm mrym ʔmh dyšwʕ wʕm ʔḥwhy
01:15	wbhwn bywmtʔ hnwn qm šmʕwn kʔpʔ mṣʕt tlmydʔ ʔyt hwʔ dyn tmn knšʔ dʔnšʔ ʔyk mʔʔ wʕsryn wʔmr
01:16	gbrʔ ʔḥyn zdq hwʔ dntmlʔ ktbʔ ʔynʔ dqdm ʔmr rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ bpwmh ddwyd ʕl yhwdʔ hw dhwʔ mdbrnʔ lhnwn dʔḥdw lyšwʕ
01:17	mṭl dmnʔ hwʔ ʕmn wʔyt hwʔ lh psʔ btšmštʔ hdʔ
01:18	hnw dqnʔ lh qrytʔ mn ʔgrʔ dḥṭytʔ wnpl ʕl ʔpwhy ʕl ʔrʕʔ wʔtprt mn mṣʕth wʔtʔšd klh gwyh
01:19	why hdʔ ʔtydʕt lklhwn dʕmryn bʔwršlm whknʔ ʔtqryt qrytʔ hy blšnh dʔtrʔ ḥql dmʔ dʔytwhy twrgmh qwryt dm
01:20	ktyb gyr bsprʔ dmzmwrʔ ddyrh thwʔ ḥrbʔ wʕmwr lʔ nhwʔ bh wtšmšth nsb ʔḥryn
01:21	wlyʔ hy hkyl lḥd mn hlyn gbrʔ dhww ʕmn bhnʔ zbnʔ klh dbh ʕl wnpq ʕlyn mrn yšwʕ
01:22	dʔqp mn mʕmwdyth dywḥnn ʕdmʔ lywmʔ dʔstlq mn lwtn dhw nhwʔ ʕmn shdʔ dqymth
01:23	wʔqymw tryn lywsp dmtqrʔ bršbʔ dʔštmy ywsṭws wlmtyʔ
01:24	wkd ṣlyw ʔmrw ʔnt mryʔ ydʕ dblbwtʔ dkl ḥwʔ ḥd ʔynʔ dgbʔ ʔnt mn hlyn tryhwn
01:25	dhw nqbl psʔ dtšmštʔ wšlyḥwtʔ dmnh prq yhwdʔ dnʔzl lh lʔtrh
01:26	wʔrmyw pṣʔ wslqt lmtyʔ wʔtmny ʕm ḥdʕsr šlyḥʔ
02:01	wkd ʔtmlyw ywmtʔ dpnṭqwsṭʔ kd knyšyn
02:02	hwʔ mn šlyʔ mn šmyʔ qlʔ ʔyk rwḥʔ ʕzyztʔ wʔtmly hwʔ mnh klh bytʔ hw dbh ytbyn hww
02:03	wʔtḥzyw lhwn lšnʔ dmtplgyn hww ʔyk nwrʔ wytbw ʕl ḥd ḥd mnhwn
02:04	wʔtmlyw klhwn brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ wʔqpw hww lmmllw blšn lšn ʔyk mʔ drwḥʔ yhb hwʔ lhwn lmmllw
02:05	ʔyt hww dyn gbrʔ dʕmryn bʔwršlm ddḥlyn mn ʔlhʔ yhwdyʔ mn kl ʕmmʔ dtḥyt šmyʔ
02:06	wkd hwʔ qlʔ hw knš klh ʕmʔ wʔštgš mṭl dšmʕ hwʔ ʔnš ʔnš mnhwn dmmllyn hww blšnyhwn
02:07	thyryn hww dyn klhwn wmtdmryn kd ʔmryn hww ḥd lḥd hlyn klhwn dmmllyn lʔ hʔ glylyʔ ʔnwn
02:08	ʔyknʔ ḥnn šmʕyn ḥnn ʔnš ʔnš lšnh dbh ylydyn ḥnn
02:09	prtwyʔ wmdyʔ wʔlnyʔ wʔylyn dʕmryn byt nhryn yhwdyʔ wqpwdqyʔ wdmn ʔtrʔ dpnṭws wdʔsyʔ
02:10	wdmn ʔtrʔ dprwgyʔ wdpmpwlyʔ wdmṣryn wdʔtrwtʔ dlwbʔ dqrybyn lqwrynʔ wʔylyn dʔtw mn rhwmʔ yhwdyʔ wgywrʔ
02:11	wdmn qrṭʔ wʕrbyʔ hʔ šmʕyn ḥnn mnhwn dmmllyn blšnyn dyln tdmrth dʔlhʔ
02:12	mtdmryn hww dyn klhwn wtwyryn kd ʔmryn ḥd lḥd dmnʔ hy hdʔ ṣbwtʔ
02:13	ʔḥrnʔ dyn mmyqyn hww bhwn kd ʔmryn hlyn mʔrytʔ ʔštyw wrwyw 
02:14	btrkn qm šmʕwn kʔpʔ ʕm ḥdʕsr šlyḥyn wʔrym qlh wʔmr lhwn gbrʔ yhwdyʔ wklhwn dʕmryn bʔwršlm hdʔ ttydʕ lkwn wṣwtw mly
02:15	lʔ gyr ʔyknʔ dʔntwn sbryn hlyn rwyn dhʔ ʕdmʔ lhšʔ tlt ʔnyn šʕyn
02:16	ʔlʔ hdʔ hy dʔmyrʔ bywʔyl nbyʔ
02:17	nhwʔ bywmtʔ ʔḥryʔ ʔmr ʔlhʔ ʔšwd rwḥy ʕl kl bsr wntnbwn bnykwn wbntkwn wgdwdykwn ḥzwnʔ nḥzwn wqšyšykwn ḥlmʔ nḥlmwn
02:18	wʕl ʕbdy wʕl ʔmhty ʔšwd rwḥy bywmtʔ hnwn wntnbwn
02:19	wʔtl ʔtwtʔ bšmyʔ wgbrwtʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ dmʔ wnwrʔ wʕṭrʔ dtnnʔ
02:20	šmšʔ ntḥlp bʕmṭnʔ wshrʔ bdmʔ ʕdlʔ nʔtʔ ywmh dmryʔ rbʔ wdḥylʔ
02:21	wnhwʔ kl dnqrʔ šmh dmryʔ nḥʔ
02:22	gbrʔ bny ʔysryl šmʕw mlʔ hlyn yšwʕ nṣryʔ gbrʔ dmn ʔlhʔ ʔtḥzy lwtkwn bḥylʔ wbʔtwtʔ wbgbrwtʔ ʔylyn dʔlhʔ ʕbd byntkwn bʔydh ʔyk dʔntwn ydʕyn ʔntwn
02:23	lhnʔ dpryš hwʔ lh lhdʔ bmqdmwt ydʕth wbṣbynh dʔlhʔ ʔšlmtwnyhy bʔydy ršyʕʔ wzqptwn wqṭltwn
02:24	ʔlhʔ dyn ʔqymh wšrʔ ḥblyh dšywl mṭl dlʔ mškḥʔ hwt dnttḥd bh bšywl
02:25	dwyd gyr ʔmr ʕlwhy mqdm hwyt ḥzʔ lmry bklzbn dʕl ymyny hw dlʔ ʔzwʕ
02:26	mṭl hnʔ ʔtbsm lby wrwzt tšbwḥty wʔp pgry ngn ʕl sbrʔ
02:27	mṭl dlʔ šbq ʔnt lnpšy bšywl wlʔ yhb ʔnt lḥsyk dnḥzʔ ḥblʔ
02:28	glyt ly ʔwrḥʔ dḥyʔ tmlyny bsymwtʔ ʕm prṣwpk
02:29	gbrʔ ʔḥyn mps lmʔmr ʕyn bglʔ lwtkwn ʕl ryš ʔbhtʔ dwyd dmyt wʔp ʔtqbr wbyt qbwrh ʔytwhy lwtn ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
02:30	nbyʔ hwʔ gyr wydʕ hwʔ dmwmtʔ ymʔ lh ʔlhʔ dmn pʔrʔ dkrsk ʔwtb ʕl kwrsyk
02:31	wqdm ḥzʔ wmll ʕl qymth dmšyḥʔ dlʔ ʔštbq bšywl ʔp lʔ pgrh ḥzʔ ḥblʔ
02:32	lhnʔ yšwʕ ʔqym ʔlhʔ wḥnn kln shdwhy
02:33	whwyw dbymynh dʔlhʔ ʔttrym wnsb mn ʔbʔ šwwdyʔ dʕl rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ wʔšd mwhbtʔ hdʔ dhʔ ḥzyn ʔntwn wšmʕyn ʔntwn
02:34	lʔ hwʔ gyr dwyd slq lšmyʔ mṭl dhw ʔmr dʔmr mryʔ lmry tb lk mn ymyny
02:35	ʕdmʔ dʔsym bʕldbbyk kwbšʔ lrglyk
02:36	šryrʔyt hkyl ndʕ klh byt ʔysryl dmryʔ wmšyḥʔ ʕbdh ʔlhʔ lhnʔ yšwʕ dʔntwn zqptwn
02:37	wkd šmʕw hlyn ʔtgnḥw blbhwn wʔmrw lšmʕwn wlšrkʔ dšlyḥʔ mnʔ nʕbd ʔḥyn
02:38	ʔmr lhwn šmʕwn twbw wʕmdw ʔnš ʔnš mnkwn bšmh dmryʔ yšwʕ lšwbqn ḥṭhʔ dtqblwn mwhbtʔ drwḥʔ dqwdšʔ
02:39	lkwn gyr hwʔ šwwdyʔ wlbnykwn wlklhwn ʔylyn drḥyqyn ʔylyn dhw ʔlhʔ nqrʔ ʔnwn
02:40	wbmlʔ ʔḥrnytʔ sgyʔtʔ mshd hwʔ lhwn wbʕʔ hwʔ mnhwn kd ʔmr ḥyw mn šrbtʔ hdʔ mʕqmtʔ
02:41	wʔnšyn mnhwn ʕtydʔyt qblw mlth whymnw wʕmdw wʔttwspw bhw ywmʔ ʔyk tltʔ ʔlpyn npšn
02:42	wʔmynyn hww bywlpnʔ dšlyḥʔ wmštwtpyn hww bṣlwtʔ wbqṣyʔ dʔwkrsṭyʔ
02:43	whwyʔ hwt dḥltʔ lkl npš wʔtwtʔ sgyʔtʔ wgbrwtʔ hwyn hwy byd šlyḥʔ bʔwršlm
02:44	wklhwn ʔylyn dhymnw hww ʔkḥdʔ hww wklmdm dʔyt hwʔ lhwn dgwʔ hwʔ
02:45	wʔylyn dʔyt hwʔ lhwn qnynʔ mzbnyn hww lh wmplgyn hww lʔnš ʔnš ʔyk mdm dsnyq hwʔ
02:46	wklywm ʔmynyn hww bhyklʔ bḥdʔ npš wbbytʔ qṣyn hww prystʔ wmqblyn hww sybrtʔ kd rwzyn wbbryrwtʔ dlbhwn
02:47	mšbḥyn hww lʔlhʔ kd yhybyn brḥmʔ qdm klh ʕmʔ wmrn mwsp hwʔ klywm lʔylyn dḥʔyn bʕdtʔ
03:01	whwʔ dkd slqyn šmʕwn kʔpʔ wywḥnn ʔkḥdʔ lhyklʔ bʕdnʔ dṣlwtʔ dtšʕ šʕyn
03:02	whʔ gbrʔ ḥd ḥgyrʔ dmn krs ʔmh šqylyn hww ʔnšʔ ʔylyn dmʕdyn hww mytyn wsymyn lh btrʕʔ dhyklʔ dmtqrʔ špyrʔ dnhwʔ šʔl zdqtʔ mn hnwn dʕʔlyn lhyklʔ
03:03	hnʔ kd ḥzʔ lšmʕwn wlywḥnn dʕʔlyn lhyklʔ bʕʔ hwʔ mnhwn dntlwn lh zdqtʔ
03:04	wḥrw bh šmʕwn wywḥnn wʔmrw lh ḥwr bn
03:05	hw dyn ḥr bhwn kd sbr hwʔ lmsb mnhwn mdm
03:06	ʔmr lh šmʕwn dhbʔ wsʔmʔ lyt ly ʔlʔ mdm dʔyt ly yhbʔnʔ lk bšmh dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ nṣryʔ qwm hlk
03:07	wʔḥdh bʔydh dymynʔ wʔqymh wbh bšʕtʔ šr rglwhy wʕqbwhy
03:08	wšwr qm whlk wʕl ʕmhwn lhyklʔ kd mhlk wmšwr wmšbḥ lʔlhʔ
03:09	wḥzʔwhy klh ʕmʔ kd mhlk wmšbḥ lʔlhʔ
03:10	wʔštwdʕw dhwyw hw ḥdwrʔ dytb hwʔ klywm wšʔl zdqtʔ ʕl trʕʔ dmtqrʔ špyrʔ wʔtmlyw tmhʔ wdwmrʔ ʕl mdm dhwʔ 
03:11	wkd ʔḥyd hwʔ lšmʕwn wlywḥnn rhṭ klh ʕmʔ kd thyr lwthwn lʔsṭwʔ dmtqrʔ dšlymwn
03:12	wkd ḥzʔ šmʕwn ʕnʔ wʔmr lhwn gbrʔ bny ʔysryl mnʔ mtdmryn ʔntwn bhnʔ ʔw bn mnʔ ḥyryn ʔntwn ʔyk hw dbḥylʔ dyln ʔw bšwlṭnn ʕbdn hdʔ dnhlk hnʔ
03:13	ʔlhh hw dʔbrhm wdʔysḥq wdyʕqwb ʔlhʔ dʔbhtn šbḥ lbrh yšwʕ hw dʔntwn ʔšlmtwn wkprtwn bh qdm ʔpwhy dpylṭws kd hw zdq hwʔ dnšrywhy
03:14	ʔntwn dyn bqdyšʔ wzdyqʔ kprtwn wšʔltwn lkwn lgbrʔ qṭwlʔ dntyhb lkwn
03:15	wlhw ršʔ dḥyʔ qṭltwn dlh ʔqym ʔlhʔ mn byt mytʔ wḥnn kln shdwhy
03:16	wbhymnwtʔ dšmh lhnʔ dḥzyn ʔntwn wydʕyn ʔntwn hw wʔsy whymnwtʔ dbh yhbt lh hdʔ ḥlymwtʔ qdm klkwn
03:17	brm hšʔ ʔḥy ydʕ ʔnʔ dbṭwʕyy ʕbdtwn hdʔ ʔyk dʕbdw ršykwn
03:18	wʔlhʔ ʔyk mdm dqdm ʔkrz bpwm klhwn nbyʔ dnḥš mšyḥh mly hknʔ
03:19	twbw hkyl wʔtpnw ʔyknʔ dntʕṭwn ḥṭhykwn wnʔtwn lkwn zbnʔ dnyḥtʔ mn qdm prṣwph dmryʔ
03:20	wnšdr lkwn lʔynʔ dmṭyb hwʔ lkwn lyšwʕ mšyḥʔ
03:21	dlh wlʔ lšmyʔ dnqblwn ʕdmʔ lmwlyʔ dzbnʔ dklhyn ʔylyn dmll ʔlhʔ bpwmʔ dnbywhy qdyšʔ dmn ʕlm
03:22	mwšʔ gyr ʔmr dnbyʔ nqym lkwn mryʔ mn ʔḥykwn ʔkwty lh šmʕw bkl mʔ dnmll ʕmkwn
03:23	wthwʔ kl npšʔ ʔydʔ dlʔ tšmʕ lnbyʔ hw tʔbd npšʔ hy mn ʕmh
03:24	wnbyʔ klhwn mn šmwʔyl wʔylyn dmn btrh hww mllw wʔkrzw ʕl ywmtʔ hnwn
03:25	ʔntwn ʔnwn bnyhwn dnbyʔ wddytqʔ ʔydʔ dsm ʔlhʔ lʔbhtn kd ʔmr lʔbrhm dbzrʕk ntbrkn klhyn šrbtʔ dʔrʕʔ
03:26	lkwn mn qdym ʔqym wšdr ʔlhʔ lbrh kd mbrk lkwn ʔn ttpnwn wttwbwn mn byštkwn
04:01	wkd hlyn mlʔ mmllyn hww lʕmʔ qmw ʕlyhwn khnʔ wzdwqyʔ wʔrkwnʔ dhyklʔ
04:02	kd mtḥmtyn hww ʕlyhwn dmlpyn lʕmʔ wmkrzyn bmšyḥʔ ʕl qymtʔ dmn byt mytʔ
04:03	wʔrmyw ʕlyhwn ʔydyʔ wnṭrw ʔnwn lywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ mṭl dqrb hwʔ lh rmšʔ
04:04	wsgyʔʔ dšmʕw hww mltʔ hymnw hww wʔytyhwn hww bmnynʔ ʔyk ḥmšʔ ʔlpyn gbryn
04:05	wlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔtknšw ʔrkwnʔ wqšyšʔ wsprʔ
04:06	wʔp ḥnn rb khnʔ wqypʔ wywḥnn wʔlksndrws wʔylyn dʔytyhwn hww mn šrbtʔ drby khnʔ
04:07	wkd ʔqymw ʔnwn bmṣʕtʔ mšʔlyn hww lhwn dbʔynʔ ḥyl ʔw bʔynʔ šm ʕbdtwn hdʔ
04:08	hydyn šmʕwn kʔpʔ ʔtmly rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ wʔmr lhwn ʔrkwnwhy dʕmʔ wqšyšʔ dbyt ʔysryl šmʕw
04:09	ʔn ḥnn ywmnʔ mtdynyn ḥnn mnkwn ʕl špyrtʔ dhwt lbrnšʔ kryhʔ dbmnʔ hnʔ ʔtʔsy
04:10	hdʔ ttydʕ lkwn wlklh ʕmʔ dʔysryl dbšmh dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ nṣryʔ hw dʔntwn zqptwnyhy hw dʔqym ʔlhʔ mn bytmytʔ bh bhw hʔ qʔm hnʔ qdmykwn kd ḥlym
04:11	hnw kʔpʔ dʔslytwn ʔntwn bnyʔ whw hwʔ lryš qrnʔ
04:12	wlyt bʔnš ʔḥryn pwrqnʔ lʔ gyr ʔyt šmʔ ʔḥrnʔ tḥyt šmyʔ dʔtyhb lbnynšʔ dbh wlʔ lmḥʔ
04:13	wkd šmʕw mlth dšmʕwn wdywḥnn dʕyn bglʔ ʔmrwh ʔstkl wdlʔ ydʕyn sprʔ whdywṭʔ ʔnwn wthrw bhwn wʔštwdʕw ʔnwn dʕm yšwʕ mthpkyn hww
04:14	wḥzyn hww dqʔm hwʔ ʕmhwn ḥgyrʔ hw dʔtʔsy wlʔ mškḥyn hww mdm lmʔmr lwqblhwn
04:15	hydyn pqdw dnpqwn ʔnwn mn knšhwn wʔmryn hww ḥd lḥd
04:16	mnʔ nʕbd lhwn lgbrʔ hlyn hʔ gyr ʔtʔ glytʔ dhwt bʔydyhwn lklhwn ʕmwryh dʔwršlm ʔtydʕt wlʔ mškḥynn dnkpwr
04:17	ʔlʔ dlʔ ytyrʔyt npwq bʕmʔ ṭbʔ hnʔ ntlḥm lhwn dtwb lʔ nmllwn bšmʔ hnʔ lʔnš mn bnynšʔ
04:18	wqrw ʔnwn wpqdw ʔnwn dlgmr lʔ nmllwn wlʔ nlpwn bšm yšwʕ
04:19	ʕnw šmʕwn kʔpʔ wywḥnn wʔmrw lhwn ʔn kʔnʔ qdm ʔlhʔ dlkwn nšmʕ ytyr mn ʔlhʔ dwnw
04:20	lʔ gyr mškḥyn ḥnn dmʔ dḥzyn wšmʕn dlʔ nmllywhy
04:21	wʔtlḥmw lhwn wšrw ʔnwn lʔ gyr ʔškḥw lhwn ʕltʔ dnsymwn bršhwn mṭl ʕmʔ klnš gyr mšbḥ hwʔ lʔlhʔ ʕl mdm dhwʔ
04:22	ytyr gyr mn br ʔrbʕyn šnyn ʔytwhy hwʔ gbrʔ hw dhwt bh hdʔ ʔtʔ dʔsywtʔ
04:23	wkd ʔštryw ʔtw lwt ʔḥyhwn wʔštʕyw lhwn kl mʔ dʔmrw khnʔ wqšyšʔ 
04:24	whnwn kd šmʕw ʔkḥd ʔrymw qlhwn lwt ʔlhʔ wʔmrw mryʔ ʔnt hw ʔlhʔ dʕbdt šmyʔ wʔrʕʔ wymmʔ wkl dʔyt bhwn
04:25	wʔnt hw dmllt byd rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ bpwm dwyd ʕbdk lmnʔ rgšw ʕmmʔ wʔmwtʔ rny sryqwtʔ
04:26	qmw mlkʔ dʔrʕʔ wšlyṭnʔ wʔtmlkw ʔkḥdʔ ʕl mryʔ wʕl mšyḥh
04:27	ʔtknšw gyr šryrʔyt bmdyntʔ hdʔ ʕl qdyšʔ brk yšwʕ ʔynʔ dʔnt mšḥt hrwds wpylṭws ʕm ʕmmʔ wknšʔ dʔysryl
04:28	lmʕbd kl mʔ dʔydk wṣbynk qdm ršm dnhwʔ
04:29	wʔp hšʔ mryʔ ḥwr wḥzy llwḥmyhwn whb lʕbdyk dʕyn bglʔ nhwwn mkrzyn mltk
04:30	kd ʔydk mwšṭ ʔnt lʔswtʔ wlgbrwtʔ wlʔtwtʔ dnhwyn bšmh dbrk qdyšʔ yšwʕ
04:31	wkd bʕw wʔtkšpw ʔttzyʕ ʔtrʔ dbh knyšyn hww wʔtmlyw klhwn brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ wmmllyn hww ʕyn bglʔ mltʔ dʔlhʔ
04:32	ʔyt hwʔ dyn lknšʔ dʔnšʔ ʔylyn dhymnw hww ḥdʔ npš wḥd rʕyn wlʔ ʔnš mnhwn ʔmr hwʔ ʕl nksʔ dqnʔ hwʔ ddylh ʔnwn ʔlʔ kl mdm dʔyt hwʔ lhwn dgwʔ hwʔ
04:33	wbḥylʔ rbʔ mshdyn hww hnwn šlyḥʔ ʕl qymth dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ wṭybwtʔ rbtʔ ʔyt hwt ʕm klhwn
04:34	wʔnš lyt hwʔ bhwn dṣryk ʔylyn gyr dqnyn hww qwryʔ wbtʔ mzbnyn hww wmytyn dmyʔ dmdm dmzdbn
04:35	wsymyn lwt rglyhwn dšlyḥʔ wmtyhb hwʔ lʔnš ʔnš ʔyk mdm dsnyq hwʔ
04:36	ywsp dyn hw dʔtkny brnbʔ mn šlyḥʔ dmttrgm brʔ dbwyʔʔ lwyʔ mn ʔtrʔ dqwprs
04:37	ʔyt hwʔ lh qrytʔ wzbnh wʔyty dmyh wsm qdm rglyhwn dšlyḥʔ
05:01	wgbrʔ ḥd dšmh hwʔ ḥnnyʔ ʕm ʔntth dšmh hwʔ špyrʔ zbn hwʔ qryth
05:02	wšql mn ṭymyh wṭšy kd rgyšʔ hwt bh ʔntth wʔyty mnh mn kspʔ wsm qdm rglyhwn dšlyḥʔ
05:03	wʔmr lh šmʕwn ḥnnyʔ mnw dhknʔ mlʔ sṭnʔ lbk dtdgl brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ wtṭšʔ mn kspʔ ddmyh dqrytʔ
05:04	lʔ hwʔ dylk hwt ʕdlʔ tzdbn wmn dʔzdbnt twb ʔnt šlyṭ hwyt ʕl dmyh lmnʔ smt blbk dtʕbd ṣbwtʔ hdʔ lʔ dglt bbny ʔnšʔ ʔlʔ bʔlhʔ
05:05	wkd šmʕ ḥnnyʔ hlyn mlʔ npl wmyt whwt dḥltʔ rbtʔ bklhwn hlyn dšmʕw
05:06	wqmw ʔylyn dʕlymyn bhwn wknšwhy wʔpqw qbrwhy
05:07	wmn btr dhwy tlt šʕyn ʔp ʔntth ʕlt kd lʔ ydʕʔ hwt mnʔ hwʔ
05:08	ʔmr lh šmʕwn ʔmr ly ʔn bhlyn dmyʔ zbntwn qrytʔ hy dyn ʔmrt ʔyn bhlyn dmyʔ
05:09	ʔmr lh šmʕwn mṭl dʔštwytwn lmnsyw rwḥh dmryʔ hʔ rglyhwn dqbwrwhy dbʕlky btrʕʔ whnwn npqwnky
05:10	wbh bšʕtʔ nplt qdm rglyhwn wmytt wʕlw ʕlymʔ hnwn wʔškḥwh kd mytʔ wqpsw ʔwblw qbrwh ʕl gnb bʕlh
05:11	whwt dḥltʔ rbtʔ bklh ʕdtʔ wbklhwn hnwn dšmʕw 
05:12	whwyn hwy byd šlyḥʔ ʔtwtʔ wgbrwtʔ sgyʔtʔ bʕmʔ wklhwn knyšyn hww ʔkḥdʔ bʔsṭwʔ dšlymwn
05:13	wmn ʔnšʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔnš lʔ mmrḥ hwʔ dntqrb lwthwn ʔlʔ mwrb hwʔ lhwn ʕmʔ
05:14	wytyr mttwspn hww ʔylyn dmhymnyn hww bmryʔ knšʔ dgbrʔ wdnšʔ
05:15	ʔyknʔ dbšwqʔ mpqyn hww lkryhʔ kd rmyn hww bʕrstʔ dʔmty dnhwʔ ʔtʔ šmʕwn ʔpn ṭlnyth tgn ʕlyhwn
05:16	ʔtyn hww dyn sgyʔʔ lwthwn mn mdyntʔ ʔḥrnytʔ dḥdry ʔwršlm kd mytyn hww kryhʔ wʔylyn dhwyn hwy lhwn rwḥʔ ṭnptʔ wmtḥlmyn hww klhwn
05:17	wʔtmly hwʔ ḥsmʔ rb khnʔ wklhwn dʕmh dʔytyhwn hww mn ywlpnʔ dzdwqyʔ
05:18	wʔrmyw ʔydyʔ ʕl šlyḥʔ wʔḥdw ʔsrw ʔnwn byt ʔsyrʔ
05:19	hydyn bllyʔ mlʔkʔ dmryʔ ptḥ trʕʔ dbyt ʔsyrʔ wʔpqʔnwn wʔmr lhwn
05:20	zlw qwmw bhyklʔ wmllw lʕmʔ klhyn mlʔ hlyn dḥyʔ
05:21	wnpqw ʕdn šprʔ wʕlw lhyklʔ wmlpyn hww rbkhnʔ dyn wʔylyn dʕmh qrw lḥbryhwn wlqšyšʔ dʔysryl wšdrw lbyt ʔsyrʔ dnytwn ʔnwn lšlyḥʔ
05:22	wkd ʔzlw ʔylyn dʔštdrw mnhwn lʔ ʔškḥw ʔnwn bytʔsyrʔ whpkw ʔtw
05:23	ʔmryn ʔškḥn byt ʔsyrʔ dʔḥyd zhyrʔyt wʔp lnṭwrʔ dqymyn ʕl trʕʔ wptḥn wʔnš lʔ ʔškḥn tmn
05:24	wkd šmʕw hlyn mlʔ rby khnʔ wʔrkwnʔ dhyklʔ twyryn hww ʕlyhwn wmtḥšbyn hww dmnʔ hy hdʔ
05:25	wʔtʔ ʔnš ʔwdʕ ʔnwn dhnwn gbrʔ dḥbštwn byt ʔsyrʔ hʔ qymyn bhyklʔ wmlpyn lʕmʔ
05:26	hydyn ʔzlw ʔrkwnʔ ʕm dḥšʔ dnytwn ʔnwn lʔ bqṭyrʔ dḥlyn hww gyr dlmʔ nrgwm ʔnwn ʕmʔ
05:27	wkd ʔytyw ʔnwn ʔqymw ʔnwn qdm klh knšʔ wʔqp hwʔ rbkhnʔ lmʔmr lhwn
05:28	lʔ hwʔ mpqd pqdn hwyn lkwn dlʔnš lʔ tlpwn bšmʔ hnʔ ʔntwn dyn hʔ mlytwnh lʔwršlm mn ywlpnkwn wṣbyn ʔntwn dtytwn ʕlyn dmh dgbrʔ hnʔ 
05:29	ʕnʔ šmʕwn ʕm šlyḥʔ wʔmr lhwn lʔlhʔ wlʔ lmtṭpsw ytyr mn dlbnynšʔ
05:30	ʔlhʔ dʔbhtn ʔqym lyšwʕ ʔynʔ dʔntwn qṭltwn tlytwnyhy tlytwnyhy ʕl qysʔ
05:31	lh lhnʔ ʔqym ʔlhʔ ršʔ wmḥynʔ wʔrymh bymynh ʔyk dntl wšwbqn ḥṭhʔ lʔysryl
05:32	wḥnn shdʔ ḥnn dmlʔ hlyn wrwḥʔ dqwdšʔ hw dyhb ʔlhʔ lʔylyn dmhymnyn bh
05:33	wkd šmʕw hww hlyn mlʔ mtgwzlyn hww brwgzʔ wmtḥšbyn hww lmqṭl ʔnwn
05:34	wqm hwʔ ḥd mn pryšʔ dšmh hwʔ gmlyʔyl mlp nmwsʔ wmyqr mn klh ʕmʔ wpqd dnpqwn ʔnwn lšlyḥʔ lbr ʕdnʔ zʕwrʔ
05:35	wʔmr lhwn gbrʔ bny ʔysryl ʔzdhrw bnpškwn wḥzw mnʔ wlʔ lkwn lmʕbd ʕl hlyn ʔnšʔ
05:36	mn qdm gyr hnʔ zbnʔ qm hwʔ twdʔ wʔmr ʕl npšh dmdm hw rb wʔzlw btrh ʔyk ʔrbʕmʔʔ gbryn whw ʔtqṭl wʔylyn dʔzlyn hww btrh ʔtbdrw whww ʔyk lʔ mdm
05:37	wqm mn btrh yhwdʔ glylyʔ bywmtʔ dmtktbyn hww ʔnšʔ bkspršʔ wʔsṭy ʕmʔ sgyʔʔ btrh whw myt wklhwn ʔylyn dʔzlyn hww btrh ʔtbdrw
05:38	whšʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn prwqw lkwn mn hlyn ʔnšʔ wšbwqw lhwn dʔn hw dmn bnynšʔ ʔytyh hdʔ mḥšbtʔ whnʔ ʕbdʔ mštryn wʕbryn
05:39	ʔn dyn mn ʔlhʔ hw lʔ mṭyʔ bʔydykwn dtbṭlwnyhy dlmʔ tštkḥwn lkwn dlwqbl ʔlhʔ qymyn ʔntwn
05:40	wʔtṭpysw lh wqrw ʔnwn lšlyḥʔ wngdw ʔnwn wpqdw ʔnwn dlʔ nhwwn mmllyn bšmʔ dyšwʕ wšrw ʔnwn
05:41	wnpqw mn qdmyhwn kd ḥdyn dšww hww mṭl šmʔ dnṣṭʕrwn
05:42	wlʔ šlyn hww klywm lmlpw bhyklʔ wbbytʔ wlmsbrw ʕl mrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
06:01	wbhwn bywmtʔ hnwn kd sgyw tlmydʔ rṭnw hww ywnyʔ tlmydʔ ʕl ʕbryʔ dmtbsyn hwy ʔrmlthwn btšmštʔ dklywm
06:02	wqrw trʕsr šlyḥʔ lklh knšʔ dtlmydʔ wʔmrw lhwn lʔ špyr dnšbwq mltʔ dʔlhʔ wnšmš ptwrʔ
06:03	bṣw hkyl ʔḥy wgbw šbʕʔ gbryn mnkwn dʔyt ʕlyhwn shdwtʔ wmlyn rwḥh dmryʔ wḥkmtʔ wnqym ʔnwn ʕl hdʔ ṣbwtʔ
06:04	wḥnn nhwʔ ʔmynyn bṣlwtʔ wbtšmštʔ dmltʔ
06:05	wšprt hdʔ mltʔ qdm klh ʕmʔ wgbw lʔsṭpnws gbrʔ dmlʔ hwʔ hymnwtʔ wrwḥʔ dqwdšʔ wlpylypws wlprkrws wlnyqnwr wlṭymwn wlprmnʔ wlnyqlʔws gywrʔ ʔnṭywkyʔ
06:06	hlyn qmw qdmyhwn dšlyḥʔ wkd ṣlyw smw ʕlyhwn ʔydʔ
06:07	wmlth dʔlhʔ rbyʔ hwt wsgʔ hwʔ mnynʔ dtlmydʔ bʔwršlm ṭb wʕmʔ sgyʔʔ mn yhwdyʔ mštmʕ hwʔ lhymnwtʔ
06:08	ʔsṭpnws dyn mlʔ hwʔ ṭybwtʔ wḥylʔ wʕbd hwʔ ʔtwtʔ wtdmrtʔ bʕmʔ
06:09	wqmw hww ʔnšʔ mn knwštʔ dmtqryʔ dlybrṭynw wqwrynyʔ wʔlksndryʔ wdmn qylyqyʔ wmn ʔsyʔ wdršyn hww ʕm ʔsṭpnws
06:10	wlʔ mškḥyn hww lmqm lwqbl ḥkmtʔ wrwḥʔ dmmllʔ hwt bh
06:11	hydyn šdrw lgbrʔ wʔlpw ʔnwn dnʔmrwn dḥnn šmʕnyhy dʔmr mlʔ dgwdpʔ ʕl mwšʔ wʕl ʔlhʔ
06:12	wšgšw lʕmʔ wlqšyšʔ wlsprʔ wʔtw wqmw ʕlwhy wḥṭpw ʔytywhy lmṣʕt knšʔ
06:13	wʔqymw shdʔ dglʔ dʔmryn hnʔ gbrʔ lʔ šlʔ lmmllw mlʔ lwqbl nmwsʔ wʕl ʔtrʔ hnʔ qdyšʔ
06:14	ḥnn gyr šmʕnyhy dʔmr dyšwʕ hnʔ nṣryʔ hw nšrywhy lʔtrʔ hnʔ wnḥlp ʕydʔ dʔšlm lkwn mwšʔ
06:15	wḥrw bh klhwn hnwn dytbyn hww bknwštʔ wḥzw prṣwph ʔyk prṣwpʔ dmlʔkʔ
07:01	wšʔlh rb khnʔ dʔn hw dhlyn hknʔ ʔnyn
07:02	hw dyn ʔmr gbrʔ ʔḥyn wʔbhtn šmʕw ʔlhʔ dtšbwḥtʔ ʔtḥzy lʔbwn ʔbrhm kd ʔytwhy hwʔ byt nhryn ʕd lʔ nʔtʔ nʕmr bḥrn
07:03	wʔmr hwʔ lh dpwq mn ʔrʕk wmn lwt bny ṭwhmk wtʔ lʔrʕʔ ʔydʔ dʔḥwyk
07:04	whydyn npq ʔbrhm mn ʔrʕʔ dkldyʔ wʔtʔ ʕmr bḥrn wmn tmn kd myt ʔbwhy šnyh ʔlhʔ lʔrʕʔ hdʔ dbh ʕmryn ʔntwn ywmnʔ
07:05	wlʔ yhb lh yrtwtʔ bh ʔp lʔ dwrktʔ drglʔ wʔštw dyhwʔ dntlyh lh ʔyk dlmʔrth lh wlzrʕh kd lyt hwʔ lh brʔ
07:06	wmll hwʔ ʕmh ʔlhʔ kd ʔmr lh dnhwʔ zrʕk twtbʔ bʔrʕʔ nwkrytʔ wnšʕbdwnyhy wnbʔšwn lh ʔrbʕmʔʔ šnyn
07:07	wlʕmʔ dnplḥwn ʕbdwtʔ ʔdwnywhy ʔnʔ ʔmr ʔlhʔ wmn btr hlyn npqwn wnplḥwn ly bʔtrʔ hnʔ
07:08	wyhb lh dytqʔ dgzwrtʔ whydyn ʔwld lʔysḥq wgzrh bywmʔ tmynyʔ wʔysḥq ʔwld lyʕqwb wyʕqwb ʔwld ltrʕsr ʔbhtn
07:09	whnwn ʔbhtn ṭnw bywsp wzbnwhy lmṣryn wʔlhʔ ʕmh hwʔ
07:10	wprqh hwʔ mn klhwn ʔwlṣnwhy wyhb lh ṭybwtʔ wḥkmtʔ qdm prʕwn mlkʔ dmṣryn wʔqymh ršʔ ʕl mṣryn wʕl byth klh 
07:11	whwʔ kpnʔ wʔwlṣnʔ rbʔ bklh mṣryn wbʔrʕʔ dknʕn wlyt hwʔ lhwn lmsbʕ lʔbhtn
07:12	wkd šmʕ yʕqwb dʔyt ʕbwrʔ bmṣryn šdr hwʔ lʔbhtn lwqdm
07:13	wkd ʔzlw dtrtyn zbnyn ʔwdʕ ywsp npšh lʔḥwhy wʔtydʕ lprʕwn ṭwhmh dywsp
07:14	wšdr hwʔ ywsp wʔytyh lʔbwhy yʕqwb wlklh ṭwhmh whwyn hww bmnynʔ šbʕyn wḥmš npšn
07:15	wnḥt yʕqwb lmṣryn wmyt tmn hw wʔbhtn
07:16	wʔštny lškym wʔttsym bqbrʔ dzbn hwʔ ʔbrhm bkspʔ mn bny ḥmwr
07:17	wkd mṭy hwʔ zbnʔ dmdm dʔštwdy hwʔ bmwmtʔ ʔlhʔ lʔbrhm sgy hwʔ ʕmʔ wtqp bmṣryn
07:18	ʕdmʔ dqm mlkʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʕl mṣryn ʔynʔ dlʔ ydʕ hwʔ lh lywsp
07:19	wʔṣṭnʕ ʕl ṭwhmn wʔbʔš lʔbhtn wpqd dnhwwn mštdyn ylwdyhwn dlʔ nḥwn
07:20	bh bzbnʔ hw ʔtyld mwšʔ wrḥym hwʔ lʔlhʔ wʔtrby yrḥʔ tltʔ byt ʔbwhy
07:21	wkd ʔštdy mn ʔmh ʔškḥth brt prʕwn wrbyth lh lbrʔ
07:22	wʔtrdy mwšʔ bklh ḥkmtʔ dmṣryʔ wʕtyd hwʔ bmlwhy wʔp bʕbdwhy
07:23	wkd hwʔ br ʔrbʕyn šnyn slq hwʔ ʕl lbh dnsʕwr lʔḥwhy bny ʔysryl
07:24	wḥzʔ lḥd mn bny šrbth dmtdbr bqṭyrʔ wtbʕh wʕbd lh wqṭlh lmṣryʔ hw dmskl hwʔ bh
07:25	wsbr dmstklyn ʔḥwhy bny ʔysryl dʔlhʔ bʔydh yhb lhwn pwrqnʔ wlʔ ʔstklw
07:26	wlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔtḥzy lhwn kd nṣyn hnwn ḥd ʕm ḥd wmpys hwʔ lhwn dnštynwn kd ʔmr gbrʔ ʔḥʔ ʔntwn mṭl mnʔ msklyn ʔntwn ḥd bḥd
07:27	hw dyn dmskl hwʔ bḥbrh dḥqh mn lwth wʔmr lh mnw ʔqymk ʕlyn ršʔ wdynʔ
07:28	dlmʔ lmqṭlny bʕʔ ʔnt ʔyk dqṭlt ʔtmly lmṣryʔ
07:29	wʕrq mwšʔ bmltʔ hdʔ whwʔ twtbʔ bʔrʕʔ dmdyn whww lh tryn bnyn
07:30	wkd mly lh tmn ʔrbʕyn šnyn ʔtḥzy lh bmdbrʔ dṭwr syny mlʔkh dmryʔ bnwrʔ dyqdʔ bsnyʔ
07:31	wkd ḥzʔ mwšʔ ʔtdmr bḥzwʔ wkd ʔtqrb dnḥzʔ ʔmr lh mryʔ bqlʔ
07:32	ʔnʔ ʔnʔ ʔlhʔ dʔbhyk ʔlhh dʔbrhm wdʔysḥq wdyʕqwb wkd rtyt hwʔ mwšʔ lʔ mmrḥ hwʔ dnḥwr bḥzwʔ
07:33	wʔmr lh mryʔ šry msnyk mn rglyk ʔrʕʔ gyr dqʔm ʔnt bh qdyšʔ hy
07:34	mḥzʔ ḥzyt ʔwlṣnh dʕmy dbmṣryn wtnḥth šmʕt wnḥtt dʔprwqʔnwn whšʔ tʔ ʔšdrk lmṣryn
07:35	lhnʔ mwšʔ dkprw bh kd ʔmryn dmnw ʔqymk ʕlyn ršʔ wdynʔ lh lhnʔ ʔlhʔ ršʔ wprwqʔ šdr lhwn bʔydy mlʔkʔ hw dʔtḥzy lh bsnyʔ
07:36	hnw dʔpq ʔnwn kd ʕbd ʔtwtʔ wtdmrtʔ wgbrwtʔ bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wbymʔ dswp wbmdbrʔ šnyn ʔrbʕyn
07:37	hnw mwšʔ hw dʔmr lbny ʔysryl dnbyʔ nqym lkwn mryʔ ʔlhʔ mn ʔḥykwn ʔkwty lh tšmʕwn
07:38	hnw dhwʔ bknwštʔ bmdbrʔ ʕm mlʔkʔ hw dmll hwʔ ʕmh wʕm ʔbhtn bṭwrʔ dsyny whwyw dqbl mlʔ ḥytʔ dln ntl
07:39	wlʔ ṣbw lmtdnyw lh ʔbhtn ʔlʔ šbqwhy wblbwthwn hpkw lhwn lmṣryn
07:40	kd ʔmryn lʔhrwn ʕbd ln ʔlhʔ dnʔzlwn qdmyn mṭl dhnʔ mwšʔ dʔpqn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn lʔ ydʕyn ḥnn mnʔ hwyhy
07:41	wʕbdw lhwn ʕglʔ bywmtʔ hnwn wdbḥw dbḥʔ lptkrʔ wmtbsmyn hww bʕbd ʔydyhwn
07:42	whpk ʔlhʔ wʔšlm ʔnwn dnhwwn plḥyn lḥylwtʔ dšmyʔ ʔyk dktyb bktbʔ dnbyʔ lmʔ ʔrbʕyn šnyn bmdbrʔ nkstʔ ʔw dbḥtʔ qrbtwn ly bny ʔysryl
07:43	ʔlʔ šqltwn mšknh dmlkwm wkwkbh dʔlhʔ drpn dmwtʔ dʕbdtwn dthwwn sgdyn lhyn ʔšnykwn lhl mn bbl
07:44	hʔ mšknʔ dshdwtʔ dʔbhtn bmdbrʔ ʔytwhy hwʔ ʔyk mʔ dpqd hw dmll ʕm mwšʔ lmʕbdh bdmwtʔ dḥwyh
07:45	wlh lhnʔ mšknʔ ʔp mʕlw ʔʕlwhy ʔbhtn ʕm yšwʕ lʔrʕʔ dyhb lhwn ʔlhʔ ywrtnʔ mn ʕmmʔ hnwn dšdʔ mn qdmyhwn wʔtybl ʕdmʔ lywmwhy ddwyd
07:46	hw dʔškḥ rḥmʔ qdmwhy dʔlhʔ wšʔl dnškḥ mšknʔ lʔlhh dyʕqwb
07:47	šlymwn dyn bnʔ lh bytʔ
07:48	wmrymʔ lʔ šrʔ bʕbd ʔydyʔ ʔyk dʔmr nbyʔ
07:49	dšmyʔ kwrsy wʔrʕʔ kwbšʔ dtḥyt rgly ʔynw bytʔ dtbnwn ly ʔmr mryʔ ʔw ʔynw ʔtrʔ dnyḥty
07:50	lʔ hʔ ʔydʔ dyly ʕbdt hlyn klhyn
07:51	ʔw qšyy qdlʔ wdlʔ gzyryn blbhwn wbmšmʕthwn ʔntwn bklzbn lwqbl rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ qymyn ʔntwn ʔyk ʔbhykwn ʔp ʔntwn
07:52	lʔynʔ gyr mn nbyʔ dlʔ rdpw wqṭlw ʔbhykwn lʔylyn dqdmw bdqw ʕl mʔtyth dzdyqʔ hw dʔntwn ʔšlmtwn wqṭltwnyhy
07:53	wqbltwn nmwsʔ byd pwqdnʔ dmlʔkʔ wlʔ nṭrtwnyhy 
07:54	wkd šmʕw hww hlyn ʔtmlyw ḥmtʔ bnpšhwn wmḥrqyn šnyhwn ʕlwhy
07:55	whw kd mlʔ hwʔ hymnwtʔ wrwḥʔ dqwdšʔ ḥr bšmyʔ wḥzʔ tšbwḥtʔ dʔlhʔ wlyšwʕ kd qʔm mn ymynʔ dʔlhʔ
07:56	wʔmr hʔ ḥzʔ ʔnʔ šmyʔ kd ptyḥyn wlbrh dʔnšʔ kd qʔm mn ymynʔ dʔlhʔ
07:57	wqʕw bqlʔ rmʔ wskrw ʔdnyhwn wgzmw ʕlwhy klhwn
07:58	wʔḥdw ʔpqwhy lbr mn mdyntʔ wrgmyn hww lh wʔylyn dʔshdw ʕlwhy smw nḥtyhwn lwt rglwhy dʕlymʔ ḥd dmtqrʔ šʔwl
07:59	wrgmyn hww lh lʔsṭpnws kd mṣlʔ wʔmr mrn yšwʕ qbl rwḥy
07:60	wkd sm bwrkʔ qʕʔ bqlʔ rmʔ wʔmr mrn lʔ tqym lhwn hdʔ ḥṭytʔ wkd hdʔ ʔmr škb
08:01	šʔwl dyn ṣbʔ hwʔ wmšwtp hwʔ bqṭlh whwʔ hwʔ bhw ywmʔ rdwpyʔ rbʔ lʕdtʔ dbʔwršlm wʔtbdrw klhwn bqwryʔ dyhwd wʔp byt šmryʔ lbr mn šlyḥʔ blḥwd
08:02	wqpsw qbrwhy lʔsṭpnws gbrʔ mhymnʔ wʔtʔblw ʕlwhy rwrbʔyt
08:03	šʔwl dyn rdp hwʔ lʕdth dʔlhʔ kd ʕʔl hwʔ lbtʔ wmgrgr lgbrʔ wlnšʔ wmšlmyn hwʔ lbyt ʔsyrʔ
08:04	whnwn dʔtbdrw mtkrkyn hww wmkrzyn mltʔ dʔlhʔ
08:05	pylypws dyn nḥt lh lmdyntʔ dšmryʔ wmkrz hwʔ lhwn ʕl mšyḥʔ
08:06	wkd šmʕyn hww mlth bnynšʔ dtmn ṣytyn hww lh wmtṭpysyn hww lkl dʔmr hwʔ dḥzyn hww ʔtwtʔ dʕbd hwʔ
08:07	sgyʔʔ gyr dʔḥydn hwy lhwn rwḥʔ ṭnptʔ qʕyn hww bqlʔ rmʔ wnpqn hwy mnhwn wʔḥrnʔ mšryʔ wmḥgrʔ ʔtʔsyw
08:08	wḥdwtʔ rbtʔ hwt bhy mdyntʔ
08:09	ʔyt hwʔ dyn tmn gbrʔ ḥd dšmh symwn dʕmyr hwʔ lh bh bmdyntʔ zbnʔ sgyʔʔ wbḥršwhy mṭʕʔ hwʔ lʕmʔ dšmryʔ kd mwrb hwʔ npšh wʔmr dʔnʔ ʔnʔ rbʔ
08:10	wṣlyn hww lwth klhwn rwrbʔ wdqdqʔ wʔmryn hww hnw ḥylh rbʔ dʔlhʔ
08:11	wmtṭpysyn hww lh klhwn mṭl dzbnʔ sgyʔʔ bḥršwhy ʔtmh hwʔ ʔnwn
08:12	kd dyn hymnw lpylypws dmsbr hwʔ mlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ bšmh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʕmdyn hww gbrʔ wnšʔ
08:13	wʔp hw symwn hymn hwʔ wʕmd wnqyp hwʔ lh lpylypws wkd ḥzʔ hwʔ ʔtwtʔ wḥylʔ rwrbʔ dhwyn hww bʔydh tmh hwʔ wmtdmr
08:14	wkd šmʕw šlyḥʔ dbʔwršlm dqblw ʕmʔ dšmryʔ mltʔ dʔlhʔ šdrw lwthwn lšmʕwn kʔpʔ wlywḥnn
08:15	wnḥtw wṣlyw ʕlyhwn ʔyk dnqblwn rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ
08:16	lyt hwʔ gyr ʕl ḥd mnhwn ʕdkyl blḥwd dyn ʕmdyn hww bšmh dmrn yšwʕ
08:17	hydyn symyn hww ʕlyhwn ʔydʔ wmqblyn hww rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ
08:18	wkd ḥzʔ symwn dbsym ʔydʔ dšlyḥʔ mtyhbʔ rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ qrb lhwn kspʔ
08:19	kd ʔmr hbw ʔp ly šwlṭnʔ hnʔ dʔynʔ dʔsym ʕlwhy ʔydʔ nhwʔ mqbl rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ
08:20	ʔmr lh šmʕwn kʔpʔ kspk ʕmk nʔzl lʔbdnʔ mṭl dsbrt dmwhbth bqnyn ʕlmʔ mtqnyʔ
08:21	lyt lk mntʔ ʔplʔ psʔ bhymnwtʔ hdʔ mṭl dlbk lʔ hwʔ tryṣ qdm ʔlhʔ
08:22	brm twb mn byšwtk hdʔ wbʕy mn ʔlhʔ dlmʔ nštbq lk nklʔ dlbk
08:23	bkbdʔ gyr mryrtʔ wbqṭrʔ dʕwlʔ ḥzʔ ʔnʔ dʔytyk
08:24	ʕnʔ symwn wʔmr bʕw ʔntwn ḥlpy mn ʔlhʔ dlʔ nʔtʔ ʕly mdm mn hlyn dʔmrtwn
08:25	šmʕwn dyn wywḥnn kd shdw ʔnwn wʔlpw mltʔ dʔlhʔ hpkw lhwn lʔwršlm wbqwryʔ sgyʔtʔ dšmryʔ sbrw
08:26	wmll mlʔkʔ dmryʔ ʕm pylypws wʔmr lh qwm zl ltymnʔ bʔwrḥʔ mdbrytʔ dnḥtʔ mn ʔwršlm lgzʔ
08:27	wqm ʔzl wʔrʕh mhymnʔ ḥd dʔtʔ hwʔ mn kwš šlyṭʔ dqndq mlktʔ dkwšyʔ whw šlyṭ hwʔ ʕl klh gzh wʔtʔ hwʔ dnsgwd bʔwršlm
08:28	wkd hpk dnʔzl ytb hwʔ ʕl mrkbtʔ wqrʔ hwʔ bʔšʕyʔ nbyʔ
08:29	wʔmrt rwḥʔ lpylypws ʔtqrb wqp lmrkbtʔ
08:30	wkd ʔtqrb šmʕ dqrʔ bʔšʕyʔ nbyʔ wʔmr lh dʔnmstkl ʔnt mnʔ qrʔ ʔnt
08:31	whw ʔmr ʔyknʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ dʔstkl ʔlʔ ʔn ʔnš nrtyny wbʕʔ mnh mn pylypws dnsq wntb ʕmh
08:32	pswqʔ dyn dktbʔ dqrʔ hwʔ bh ʔytwhy hwʔ hnʔ ʔyk ʔmrʔ lnkstʔ ʔtdbr wʔyk nqyʔ qdm gzwzʔ štyq hwʔ whknʔ lʔ ptḥ pwmh
08:33	bmwkkh mn ḥbwšyʔ wmn dynʔ ʔtdbr wdrh mnw nštʕʔ dmštqlyn ḥywhy mn ʔrʕʔ
08:34	wʔmr hw mhymnʔ lpylypws bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnk ʕl mnw ʔmrh hdʔ nbyʔ ʕl npšh ʔw ʕl ʔnš ʔḥryn 
08:35	hydyn pylypws ptḥ pwmh wšry mnh mn hnʔ ktbʔ msbr lh ʕl mrn yšwʕ
08:36	wkd hnwn ʔzlyn bʔwrḥʔ mṭyw hww ldwktʔ ḥdʔ dʔyt bh myʔ wʔmr hw mhymnʔ hʔ myʔ mnʔ hy klytʔ dʔʕmd
08:37	wʔmr pylypws ʔn mhymn ʔnt mn klh lbʔ šlyṭ wʕnʔ wʔmr ʔnʔ mhymn ʔnʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ brh dʔlhʔ hw
08:38	wpqd hwʔ dtqwm mrkbtʔ wnḥtw tryhwn lmyʔ wʔʕmdh pylypws lmhymnʔ hw
08:39	wkd slqw mn myʔ rwḥh dmryʔ ḥṭpt lpylypws wtwb lʔ ḥzyhy mhymnʔ hw ʔlʔ ʔzl hwʔ bʔwrḥh kd ḥdʔ
08:40	pylypws dyn ʔštkḥ bʔzwṭws wmn tmn mtkrk hwʔ wmsbr bmdyntʔ klhyn ʕdmʔ dʔtʔ lqsryʔ
09:01	šʔwl dyn ʕdkyl mlʔ hwʔ lwḥmʔ wḥmtʔ dqṭlʔ ʕl tlmydwhy dmrn
09:02	wšʔl lh ʔgrtʔ mn rb khnʔ dntl lh ldrmswq lknwštʔ dʔnhw dnškḥ drdyn bhdʔ ʔwrḥʔ gbrʔ ʔw nšʔ nʔswr nytʔ ʔnwn lʔwršlm
09:03	wkd ʔzl hwʔ wšry mmṭʔ ldrmswq mn tḥyt šlyʔ ʔzlg hwʔ ʕlwhy nwhrʔ mn šmyʔ
09:04	wnpl ʕl ʔrʕʔ wšmʕ qlʔ dʔmr lh šʔwl šʔwl mnʔ rdp ʔnt ly qšʔ hw lk lmbʕṭw lʕwqsʔ
09:05	ʕnʔ hw wʔmr mn ʔnt mry wmrn ʔmr ʔnʔ ʔnʔ yšwʕ nṣryʔ hw dʔnt rdp ʔnt
09:06	ʔlʔ qwm ʕwl lmdyntʔ wtmn ntmll ʕmk ʕl mʔ dwlʔ lk lmʕbd
09:07	wgbrʔ dʔzlyn hww ʕmh bʔwrḥʔ qymyn hww kd tmyhyn mṭl dqlʔ blḥwd šmʕyn hww ʔnš dyn lʔ mtḥzʔ hwʔ lhwn
09:08	wqm šʔwl mn ʔrʕʔ wlʔ mtḥzʔ hwʔ lh mdm kd ʕynwhy ptyḥn hwy wkd ʔḥydyn bʔydwhy ʔʕlwhy ldrmswq
09:09	wlʔ mtḥzʔ hwʔ lh tltʔ ywmyn wlʔ ʔkl wlʔ ʔšty
09:10	ʔyt hwʔ dyn bh bdrmswq tlmydʔ ḥd dšmh hwʔ ḥnnyʔ wmryʔ ʔmr lh bḥzwʔ ḥnnyʔ wʔmr hʔ ʔnʔ mry
09:11	wmrn ʔmr lh qwm zl lšwqʔ dmtqrʔ tryṣʔ wbʕy bbytʔ dyhwdʔ lšʔwl dʔytwhy mn ṭrsws mdyntʔ hʔ gyr kd hw mṣlʔ
09:12	ḥzʔ bḥzwʔ lgbrʔ dšmh ḥnnyʔ dʕl wsm ʕlwhy ʔydʔ ʔyk dntptḥn ʕynwhy
09:13	wʔmr ḥnnyʔ mry šmʕt mn sgyʔʔ ʕl gbrʔ hnʔ dkmʔ byštʔ ʔsbl lqdyšyk bʔwršlm
09:14	whʔ ʔp hrkʔ ʔyt lh šwlṭnʔ mn rby khnʔ dnʔswr lklhwn ʔylyn dqryn šmk
09:15	wʔmr lh mryʔ qwm zl mṭl dmʔnʔ hw ly gbyʔ dnšqwl šmy bʕmmʔ wbmlkʔ wbyt bny ʔysryl
09:16	ʔnʔ gyr ʔḥwywhy kmʔ ʕtyd lmḥš mṭl šmy
09:17	hydyn ḥnnyʔ ʔzl lbytʔ lwth wsm ʕlwhy ʔydʔ wʔmr lh šʔwl ʔḥy mrn yšwʕ šdrny hw dʔtḥzy lk bʔwrḥʔ kd ʔtʔ ʔnt ʔyk dntptḥn ʕynyk wttmlʔ rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ
09:18	wbr šʕth npl mn ʕynwhy mdm ddmʔ lqlpʔ wʔtptḥ ʕynwhy wqm ʕmd
09:19	wqbl sybrtʔ wʔtḥyl whwʔ ywmtʔ lwt tlmydʔ hnwn dʔyt hww bdrmswq
09:20	wbr šʕth mkrz hwʔ bknwštʔ dyhwdyʔ ʕl yšwʕ dhwyw brh dʔlhʔ
09:21	wtmyhyn hww klhwn ʔylyn dšmʕyn hww lh wʔmryn hww lʔ hwʔ hnʔ hw drdp hwʔ lklhwn ʔylyn dqryn hww lšmʔ hnʔ bʔwršlm ʔp lhrkʔ ʕlyh ʕl hdʔ mšdr hwʔ ʔyk dnʔswr nwbl ʔnwn lrby khnʔ
09:22	šʔwl dyn ytyr mtḥyl hwʔ wmzyʕ hwʔ lhwn lyhwdyʔ hnwn dʕmryn hww bdrmswq kd mḥwʔ hwʔ dhnw mšyḥʔ
09:23	wkd sgyw lh tmn ywmtʔ ʕbdw ʕlwhy nklʔ yhwdyʔ dnqṭlwnyhy
09:24	ʔtbdq lh dyn lšʔwl ʔprsnʔ dbʕyn hww lmʕbd lh wnṭryn hww trʕʔ dmdyntʔ ʔymmʔ wllyʔ dnqṭlwnyhy
09:25	hydyn smwhy tlmydʔ bʔsprydʔ wšbwhy mn šwrʔ bllyʔ
09:26	wʔzl lh lʔwršlm wṣbʔ hwʔ lmtnqpw ltlmydʔ wklhwn dḥlyn hww mnh wlʔ mhymnyn hww dtlmydʔ hw
09:27	brnbʔ dyn ʔḥdh wʔytyh lwt šlyḥʔ wʔštʕy lhwn ʔyknʔ bʔwrḥʔ ḥzʔ lmryʔ wdʔyknʔ mll ʕmh wʔyknʔ bdrmswq ʕyn bglʔ mll bšmh dyšwʕ
09:28	wʕʔl hwʔ ʕmhwn wnpq bʔwršlm
09:29	wmmll hwʔ bšmh dyšwʕ ʕyn bglʔ wdrš hwʔ ʕm yhwdyʔ ʔylyn dydʕyn hww ywnʔyt hnwn dyn ṣbyn hww lmqṭlh
09:30	wkd ydʕw ʔḥʔ ʔytywhy bllyʔ lqsryʔ wmn tmn šdrwhy lṭrsws
09:31	brm dyn ʕdtʔ dbklh yhwd wbglylʔ wbšmryn ʔyt hwʔ bh šlmʔ kd mtbnyʔ hwt wrdyʔ bdḥlt ʔlhʔ wbbwyʔʔ drwḥʔ dqwdšʔ sgyʔ hwt 
09:32	whwʔ dkd mtkrk hwʔ šmʕwn bmdyntʔ nḥt ʔp lwt qdyšʔ dʕmryn blwd mdyntʔ
09:33	wʔškḥ gbrʔ ḥd dšmh ʔnys drmʔ hwʔ bʕrsʔ wmšry šnyn tmnʔ
09:34	wʔmr lh šmʕwn ʔnyʔ mʔsʔ lk yšwʕ mšyḥʔ qwm wšwʔ ʕrsk wbr šʕth qm
09:35	wḥzʔwhy klhwn dʕmryn blwd wbsrwnʔ wʔtpnyw lwt ʔlhʔ
09:36	ʔyt hwʔ dyn tlmydtʔ ḥdʔ bywpʔ mdyntʔ dšmh hwʔ ṭbytʔ hdʔ ʕtyrʔ hwt bʕbdʔ ṭbʔ wbzdqtʔ dʕbdʔ hwt
09:37	ʔtkrht dyn bhwn bhnwn ywmtʔ wmytt wʔsḥywh wsmwh bʕlytʔ
09:38	wšmʕw hww tlmydʔ dšmʕwn blwd hw mdyntʔ hy dʔytyh ʕlgnb ywpʔ wšdrw hww lwth gbrʔ tryn dnbʕwn mnh dlʔ tmʔn lh dnʔtʔ ṣʔdyhwn
09:39	wqm šmʕwn ʔzl ʕmhwn wkd ʔtʔ ʔsqwhy lʕlytʔ wknš wknšqm lhyn ḥdrwhy klhyn ʔrmltʔ kd bkyn wmḥwyn lh kwtynytʔ wmrṭwṭʔ hlyn dyhbʔ hwt lhyn ṭbytʔ kd ḥyʔ
09:40	šmʕwn dyn ʔpq lklhwn ʔnšʔ lbr wqʕd ʕl bwrkwhy wṣly wʔtpny lwt šldʔ wʔmr ṭbytʔ qwmy hy dyn ptḥt ʕynyh wkd ḥzth lšmʕwn ytbt
09:41	wʔwšṭ lh ʔydh wʔqymh wqrʔ lqdyšʔ wlʔrmltʔ wyhbh lhwn kd ḥyʔ
09:42	wʔtydʕt hdʔ bklh mdyntʔ wsgyʔʔ hymnw bmrn
09:43	hwʔ dyn bh bywpʔ ywmtʔ lʔ zʕwryn kd šrʔ hwʔ byt šmʕwn bwrsyʔ
10:01	bqsryʔ dyn ʔyt hwʔ gbrʔ ḥd qnṭrwnʔ dšmh hwʔ qwrnlyws mn spyrʔ hy dmtqryʔ ʔyṭlyqʔ
10:02	wzdyq hwʔ wdḥl hwʔ mn ʔlhʔ hw wbyth klh wʕbd hwʔ zdqtʔ sgyʔtʔ bʕmʔ wbklzbn bʕʔ hwʔ mn ʔlhʔ
10:03	hnʔ ḥzʔ mlʔkʔ dʔlhʔ bḥzwʔ glyʔyt lʔpy tšʕ šʕyn bʔymmʔ dʕl lwth wʔmr lh qwrnlyʔ
10:04	whw ḥr bh wdḥl wʔmr mnʔ mry wʔmr lh mlʔkʔ ṣlwtk wzdqtk slq ldwkrnʔ qdm ʔlhʔ
10:05	whšʔ šdr gbrʔ lywpʔ mdyntʔ wʔytʔ lšmʕwn dmtqrʔ kʔpʔ
10:06	hʔ šrʔ bbyth dšmʕwn bwrsyʔ hw dʔytwhy ʕl yd ymʔ
10:07	wkd ʔzl lh mlʔkʔ dmll ʕmh qrʔ tryn mn bny byth wplḥʔ ḥd ddḥl lʔlhʔ ʔynʔ dmtdnʔ hwʔ lh
10:08	wʔštʕy lhwn klmdm dḥzʔ wšdr ʔnwn lywpʔ
10:09	wlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ kd hnwn rdyn bʔwrḥʔ wqrybyn lmdyntʔ slq šmʕwn lʔgrʔ dnṣlʔ bšt šʕyn
10:10	wkpn wṣbʔ hwʔ dnlʕs wkd hnwn mtqnyn lh npl ʕlwhy tmhʔ
10:11	wḥzʔ šmyʔ kd ptyḥyn wmʔnʔ ḥd kd ʔsyr bʔrbʕ qrnn wdmʔ hwʔ lktnʔ rbʔ wšʔb hwʔ mn šmyʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ
10:12	wʔyt hwʔ bh klhyn ḥywtʔ dʔrbʕt rglʔ wrḥšʔ dʔrʕʔ wprḥtʔ dšmyʔ
10:13	wqlʔ ʔtʔ lh dʔmr šmʕwn qwm kws wʔkwl
10:14	wšmʕwn ʔmr ḥs mry dmmtwm lʔ ʔklt kl dmsyb wṭmʔ
10:15	wtwb dtrtyn zbnyn qlʔ hwʔ lwth ʔylyn dʔlhʔ dky ʔnt lʔ tsyb
10:16	hdʔ dyn hwt tlt zbnyn wʔtʕly lh mʔnʔ lšmyʔ
10:17	wkd mtdmr šmʕwn bnpšh dmnw ḥzwʔ dḥzʔ mṭyw gbrʔ hnwn dʔštdrw hww mn qwrnlyws wšʔlw ʕl bytʔ dšrʔ bh šmʕwn wʔtw wqmw ʕl trʕʔ ddrtʔ
10:18	wqryn hww tmn wmšʔlyn dʔn šmʕwn dmtqrʔ kʔpʔ hrkʔ šrʔ
10:19	wkd šmʕwn rnʔ hwʔ bḥzwʔ ʔmr lh rwḥʔ hʔ gbrʔ tltʔ bʕyn lk
10:20	qwm ḥwt wzl ʕmhwn kd lʔ mtplg rʕynk mṭl dʔnʔ hw šdrt ʔnwn
10:21	hydyn nḥt šmʕwn lwt gbrʔ hnwn wʔmr lhwn ʔnʔ hw dbʕyn ʔntwn ʔydʔ hy ʕltʔ dmṭlth ʔtytwn
10:22	ʔmryn lh gbrʔ ḥd dšmh qwrnlyws qnṭrwnʔ kʔnʔ ddḥl mn ʔlhʔ wmshd ʕlwhy klh ʕmʔ dyhwdyʔ ʔtʔmr lh bḥzwʔ mn mlʔkʔ qdyšʔ dnšdr nʕlk lbyth wnšmʕ mltʔ mnk
10:23	wʔʕl ʔnwn šmʕwn wqbl ʔnwn kr dšrʔ hwʔ wqm lbtrh dywmʔ wnpq ʔzl ʕmhwn wʔzlw ʕmh ʔnš ʔnš mn ʔḥʔ dywpʔ
10:24	wlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʕl lqsryʔ qwrnlyws dyn mqwʔ hwʔ lhwn kd mknšyn lh klhwn bny ṭwhmh wʔp rḥmʔ ḥbybʔ dʔyt hww lh
10:25	wkd ʕʔl šmʕwn ʔrʕh qwrnlyws wnpl sgd lrglwhy
10:26	wšmʕwn ʔqymh wʔmr lh qwm lk wʔp ʔnʔ brnšʔ ʔnʔ
10:27	wkd mmll ʕmh ʕl wʔškḥ sgyʔʔ dʔtw hww ltmn
10:28	wʔmr lhwn ʔntwn ydʕyn ʔntwn dlʔ mps lgbrʔ yhwdyʔ dnqp lʔnšʔ nwkryʔ dlʔ hwʔ br šrbth wly ʔlhʔ ḥwyny dlʔ ʔmr ʕl ʔnš dṭmʔ ʔw msyb
10:29	mṭl hnʔ ʕtydʔyt ʔtyt kd šdrtwn btry brm mšʔl ʔnʔ lkwn mṭl mnʔ šdrtwn btry 
10:30	ʔmr lh qwrnlyws ʔrbʕʔ ywmyn ʔyt ʕdmʔ lhšʔ hʔ mn dṣʔm ʔnʔ wbtšʕ šʕyn kd mṣlʔ ʔnʔ bbyty qm gbrʔ ḥd qdmy kd lbyš ḥwrʔ
10:31	wʔmr ly qwrnlyʔ ʔštmʕt ṣlwtk wlzdqtk dwkrnʔ hwʔ qdm ʔlhʔ
10:32	brm šdr lywpʔ mdyntʔ wʔytʔ lšmʕwn dmtqrʔ kʔpʔ hʔ hʔšrʔ bbyth dšmʕwn bwrsyʔ dʕl yd ymʔ whw nʔtʔ nmll ʕmk
10:33	wbr šʕth šdrt lwtk wʔnt špyr ʕbdt dʔtyt whʔ ḥnn kln qdmyk wṣbynn dnšmʕ kl mʔ dʔtpqd lk mn lwt ʔlhʔ
10:34	ptḥ dyn šmʕwn pwmh wʔmr bšrrʔ ʔdrkt dʔlhʔ lʔ hwʔ nsb bʔpʔ
10:35	ʔlʔ bklhwn ʕmmʔ ʔynʔ ddḥl mnh wplḥ kʔnwtʔ mqbl hw lwth
10:36	mltʔ gyr dšdr lbny ʔysryl wsbr ʔnwn šlmʔ wšynʔ byd yšwʕ mšyḥʔ hnw mryʔ dkl
10:37	wʔp ʔntwn ydʕyn ʔntwn bmltʔ dhwt bklh yhwd dʔqpt mn glylʔ btr mʕmwdytʔ dʔkrz ywḥnn
10:38	ʕl yšwʕ dmn nṣrt dʔlhʔ mšḥh brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ wbḥylʔ whwyw dmtkrk hwʔ wmʔsʔ lhnwn dʔtnkyw mn byšʔ mṭl dʔlhʔ hwʔ ʕmh
10:39	wḥnn shdwhy ʕl kl mʔ dʕbd bklh ʔrʕʔ dyhwd wdʔwršlm lh lhnʔ tlʔwhy yhwdyʔ ʕl qysʔ wqṭlwhy
10:40	wlh ʔqym ʔlhʔ ltltʔ ywmyn wyhbh dntḥzʔ ʕyn bglʔ
10:41	lʔ dyn lklh ʕmʔ ʔlʔ ln ʔylyn dmn ʔlhʔ ʔtgbyn dnhwʔ lh shdʔ dʔkln ʕmh wʔštyn mn btr qymth dmn byt mytʔ
10:42	wpqdn dnkrz wnshd lʕmʔ dhnw dʔtprš mn ʔlhʔ dynʔ dḥyʔ wdmytʔ
10:43	wʕlwhy ʔshdw klhwn nbyʔ dklmn dmhymn bšmh nqbl šwbqn ḥṭhʔ
10:44	wkd hw šmʕwn mmll hwʔ hlyn mlʔ ʔgnt rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ ʕl klhwn dšmʕyn hww mltʔ
10:45	wtmhw wthrw ʔḥʔ gzyrʔ hnwn dʔtw ʕmh dʔp ʕl ʕmmʔ mwhbtʔ drwḥʔ dqwdšʔ ʔštpʕt
10:46	šmʕyn hww lhwn gyr kd mmllyn blšn lšn wmwrbyn hww lʔlhʔ wʔmr hwʔ šmʕwn
10:47	dlmʔ myʔ mškḥ ʔnš klʔ dlʔ nʕmdwn hnwn dhʔ qbl wrwḥʔ dqwdšʔ ʔyk mʔ dḥnn
10:48	hydyn pqd lhwn dnʕmdwn bšmh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ wbʕw mnh ʔyk dnqwʔ lwthwn ywmtʔ
11:01	wʔštmʕt hwt lšlyḥʔ wlʔḥʔ dbyhwd dʔp ʕmmʔ qblw mltʔ dʔlhʔ
11:02	wkd slq šmʕwn lʔwršlm dynyn hww ʕmh hnwn dmn gzwrtʔ
11:03	kd ʔmryn dlwt ʔnšʔ ʕwrlʔ ʕl wlʕs ʕmhwn
11:04	wʔqp hwʔ šmʕwn btr btr lmʔmr lhwn
11:05	dkd mṣlʔ hwyt bywpʔ ḥzyt bḥzwʔ dnḥt hwʔ mʔnʔ ḥd ʔynʔ ddmʔ hwʔ lktnʔ wʔsyr hwʔ bʔrbʕ qrnth wšʔb hwʔ mn šmyʔ wʔtʔ ʕdmʔ lwty
11:06	wḥrt bh wḥzʔ hwyt dʔyt bh ḥywtʔ dʔrbʕt rglyhyn wrḥšʔ dʔrʕʔ wʔp prḥtʔ dšmyʔ
11:07	wšmʕt hwyt qlʔ dʔmr hwʔ ly šmʕwn qwm kws wʔkwl
11:08	wʔmrt ḥs mry dmmtwm lʔ ʕl lpwmy dṭmʔ wdmsyb
11:09	wtwb qlʔ ʔmr ly mn šmyʔ dmdm dʔlhʔ dky ʔnt lʔ tsyb
11:10	hdʔ hwt tlt zbnyn wʔstlq lh klmdm lšmyʔ
11:11	wbh bšʕtʔ tltʔ gbryn dʔštdrw lwty mn qwrnlyws mn qsryʔ ʔtw wqmw ʕl trʕʔ ddrtʔ dšrʔ hwyt bh
11:12	wʔmr ly rwḥʔ dzl ʕmhwn dlʔ pwlgʔ wʔtw ʕmy ʔp hlyn štʔ ʔḥyn wʕln lbyth dgbrʔ
11:13	wʔštʕy ln ʔyknʔ ḥzʔ bbyth mlʔkʔ dqm wʔmr lh dšdr lywpʔ mdyntʔ wʔytʔ lšmʕwn dmtqrʔ kʔpʔ
11:14	whw nmll ʕmk mlʔ dbhyn tḥʔ ʔnt wklh bytk
11:15	wkd ʔqpt hwyt tmn lmmllw ʔgnt rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ ʕlyhwn ʔyk mʔ dʕlyn mn qdym
11:16	wʔtdkrt mlth dmrn dʔmr hwʔ dywḥnn ʔʕmd bmyʔ ʔntwn dyn tʕmdwn brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ
11:17	ʔn hkyl ʔlhʔ šwyʔyt yhbh mwhbtʔ lʕmmʔ ʔylyn dhymnw bmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʔyk dʔp ln ʔnʔ mn hwyt dʔspq hwyt dʔklʔ lʔlhʔ
11:18	wkd hlyn mlʔ šmʕw šlyw lhwn wšbḥw lʔlhʔ wʔmryn hww dkbr ʔp lʕmmʔ ʔlhʔ yhb tybwtʔ lḥyʔ
11:19	hnwn dyn dʔtbdrw hww mn ʔwlṣnʔ dhwʔ hwʔ ʕl ʔsṭpnws mṭyw hww ʕdmʔ lpwnyqʔ wʔp lʔtrʔ dqwprws wlʔnṭykyʔ kd ʕm ʔnš lʔ mmllyn hww mltʔ ʔlʔ blḥwd ʕm yhwdyʔ
11:20	ʔyt hww dyn ʔnšʔ mnhwn mn qwprws wmn qwrynʔ hlyn ʕlw hww lʔnṭywky wmmllyn hww ʕm ywnyʔ wmsbryn hww ʕl mrn yšwʕ
11:21	wʔyt hwt ʕmhwn ʔydh dmryʔ wsgyʔʔ hymnw wʔtpnyw lwt mryʔ 
11:22	wʔštmʕt hwt hy hdʔ lʔdnyhwn dbny ʕdtʔ dbʔwršlm wšdrw lbrnbʔ lʔnṭywky
11:23	wkd ʔtʔ ltmn wḥzʔ ṭybwth dʔlhʔ ḥdy wbʕʔ hwʔ mnhwn dbklh lbhwn nhwwn nqypyn lmrn
11:24	mṭl dgbrʔ hwʔ ṭbʔ wmšmly hwʔ brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ wbhymnwtʔ wʔttwsp hwʔ ʕmʔ sgyʔʔ lmrn
11:25	whw npq hwʔ lṭrsws lmbʕʔ lšʔwl
11:26	wkd ʔškḥh ʔytyh ʕmh lʔnṭykyʔ wšntʔ klh ʔkḥdʔ knyšyn hww bʕdtʔ wʔlpw ʕmʔ sgyʔʔ mn hydyn qdmyt ʔtqryw bʔnṭywky tlmydʔ krsṭynʔ
11:27	wbywmtʔ hnwn ʔtw mn ʔwršlm ltmn nbyʔ
11:28	wqm ḥd mnhwn dšmh hwʔ ʔgbws wʔwdʕ ʔnwn brwḥ dkpnʔ rbʔ hwʔ bklh ʔrʕʔ whwʔ kpnʔ hnʔ bywmy qlwdyws qsr
11:29	brm dyn tlmydʔ ʔyk mʔ dʔyt hwʔ lʔnš ʔnš mnhwn pršw dnšdrwn ltšmštʔ dʔḥʔ ʔylyn dʕmryn byhwd
11:30	wšdrw byd brnbʔ wšʔwl lqšyšʔ dtmn
12:01	bhw dyn zbnʔ ʔrmy hwʔ ʔydyʔ ʕl ʔnšyn dbʕdtʔ ʔyk dnbʔš lhwn hrwds mlkʔ hw dmtknʔ hwʔ ʔgrpws
12:02	wqṭl bsypʔ lyʕqwb ʔḥwhy dywḥnn
12:03	wkd ḥzʔ dšprt hdʔ lyhwdyʔ ʔwsp hwʔ lmʔḥd ʔp lšmʕwn kʔpʔ wʔytyhwn hww ywmtʔ dpṭyrʔ
12:04	wʔḥdh wʔrmyh byt ʔsyrʔ wʔšlm lh šttʕsr sṭrṭwṭyn dnṭrwnh dmn btr pṣḥʔ nšlmywhy lʕmʔ dyhwdyʔ
12:05	wkd hw šmʕwn mtnṭr hwʔ byt ʔsyrʔ ṣlwtʔ ʔmyntʔ mtqrbʔ hwt mn ʕdtʔ ḥlpwhy lʔlhʔ
12:06	wbh bhw llyʔ dlṣprʔ ʕtyd hwʔ dnšlmywhy kd dmk hwʔ šmʕwn byt tryn ʔsṭrṭywṭyn wʔsyr hwʔ btrtyn ššln wʔḥrnʔ nṭryn hww trʕʔ dbyt ʔsyrʔ
12:07	mlʔkʔ dmryʔ qm lʕl mnh wnwhrʔ ʔzlg bklh bytʔ wdqrh bgbh wʔqymh wʔmr lh qwm ʕgl wnpl ššltʔ mn ʔydwhy
12:08	wʔmr lh mlʔkʔ ʔswr ḥṣyk wsʔn ṭlryk wʕbd hknʔ wtwb lh ʔtʕṭp tksytk wtʔ btry
12:09	wnpq wʔzl hwʔ btrh kd lʔ ydʕ hwʔ dšryrʔ hwt hy dhwyʔ hwt byd mlʔkʔ sbr hwʔ gyr dḥzwʔ ḥzʔ hwʔ
12:10	wkd ʕbrw mṭrtʔ qdmytʔ wdtrtyn ʔtw ʕdmʔ ltrʕʔ dprzlʔ wʔtptḥ lhwn mn ṣbwt npšh wkd npqw wʕbrw šwqʔ ḥd prq mn lwth mlʔkʔ
12:11	hydyn ʔštwdʕ šmʕwn wʔmr hšʔ ydʕt bqwštʔ dmryʔ šdr mlʔkh wplṭny mn ʔydh dhrwds mlkʔ wmn mdm dmtḥšbyn hww ʕly yhwdyʔ
12:12	wkd ʔstkl ʔtʔ lh lbytʔ dmrym ʔmh dywḥnn hw dʔtkny mrqws mṭl dʔḥʔ sgyʔʔ tmn knyšyn hww wmṣlyn
12:13	wnqš btrʕʔ ddrtʔ wnpqt dtʕnywhy ṭlytʔ dšmh rwdʔ
12:14	wʔštwdʕt qlh dšmʕwn wbḥdwth lʔ ptḥt lh trʕʔ ʔlʔ hpkt brhṭʔ wʔmrʔ lhwn šmʕwn hʔ qʔm ʕl trʕʔ ddrtʔ
12:15	ʔmryn lh mzʕ zʕty lky why mtḥryʔ hwt dhdʔ hknʔ hy ʔmryn lh kbr mlʔkh hw
12:16	wšmʕwn nqš hwʔ btrʕʔ wnpqw ḥzʔwhy wtmhw lhwn
12:17	wmnyp hwʔ lhwn ʔydh ʔyk dnštqwn lhwn wʕl wʔštʕy lhwn ʔyknʔ mryʔ ʔpqh mn byt ʔsyrʔ wʔmr lhwn ʔštʕw hlyn lyʕqwb wlʔḥyn wnpq ʔzl lh lʔtr ʔḥryn
12:18	wkd hwʔ ṣprʔ hwʔ hwʔ rwbʔ sgyʔʔ byt ʔsṭrṭywṭʔ ʕl šmʕwn dmnʔ hwʔ lh
12:19	hrwds dyn kd bʕyhy wlʔ ʔškḥh dn ʔnwn lnṭwrʔ wpqd dnmwtwn wnpq lh mn yhwd wʔytwhy hwʔ bqsryʔ
12:20	wmṭl drgyz hwʔ ʕl ṣwryʔ wʕl ṣydnyʔ ʔtknšw wʔtw lwth ʔkḥdʔ wʔpysw lblsṭws qyṭwnqnh dmlkʔ wšʔlw mnh dnhwʔ lhwn šynʔ mṭl dpwrnsʔ dʔtrhwn mn mlkwth hwʔ dhrwds
12:21	bywmʔ dyn ydyʕʔ lbš hwʔ hrwds lbwšʔ dmlkwtʔ wytb ʕl bym wmmll hwʔ ʕm knšʔ
12:22	ʕmʔ dyn klh qʕʔ hwʔ wʔmr hlyn bnt qlʔ dʔlhʔ ʔnyn wlʔ hwy dbnynšʔ
12:23	wḥlp dlʔ yhb tšbwḥtʔ lʔlhʔ bh bšʕtʔ mḥyhy mlʔkh dmryʔ wrpt btwlʕʔ wmyt
12:24	wsbrtʔ dʔlhʔ mtkrzʔ hwt wrbyʔ
12:25	brnbʔ dyn wšʔwl pnw mn ʔwršlm lʔnṭywky mn btr dšlmw tšmšthwn wdbrw ʕmhwn lywḥnn hw dʔtkny mrqws
13:01	ʔyt hwʔ dyn bʕdtʔ dʔnṭykyʔ nbyʔ wmlpnʔ brnbʔ wšmʕwn dmtqrʔ nygr wlwqys dmn qwrynʔ mdyntʔ wmnʔyl br mrbynwhy dhrwds ṭṭrrkʔ wšʔwl
13:02	wkd hnwn ṣymyn hww wmtkšpyn lʔlhʔ ʔmrt lhwn rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ prwšw ly lšʔwl wlbrnbʔ lʕbdʔ ʔynʔ dʔnʔ qryt ʔnwn
13:03	wbtr dṣmw wṣlyw smw ʕlyhwn ʔydʔ wšdrw ʔnwn 
13:04	whnwn kd ʔštlḥw mn rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ nḥtw lhwn lslwqyʔ wmn tmn rdw bymʔ ʕdmʔ lqwprws
13:05	wkd ʕlw lslmnʔ mdyntʔ msbryn hww mlth dmrn bknwštʔ dyhwdyʔ wywḥnn mšmš hwʔ lhwn
13:06	wkd ʔtkrkwh lklh gzrtʔ ʕdmʔ lppws mdyntʔ ʔškḥw gbrʔ ḥd ḥršʔ yhwdyʔ dʔytwhy hwʔ nbyʔ dglʔ dšmh hwʔ bršwmʔ
13:07	hnʔ dbyq hwʔ lgbrʔ ḥkymʔ dʔytwhy hwʔ ʔntwpṭws wmtqrʔ hwʔ srgyws pwlws wqrʔ hwʔ ʔntwpṭws lšʔwl wlbrnbʔ wbʕʔ hwʔ dnšmʕ mnhwn mltʔ dʔlhʔ
13:08	qʔm hwʔ dyn lwqblhwn hw hnʔ ḥršʔ bršwmʔ dmttrgm šmh ʔlwms mṭl dṣbʔ hwʔ dnʕqmywhy lʔntwpṭws mn hymnwtʔ
13:09	šʔwl dyn hw dʔtqry pwlws ʔtmly hwʔ brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ wḥr
13:10	wʔmr ʔw dmlʔ kl nklyn wklhyn byštʔ brh dʔkl qrṣʔ wbʕldbbʔ dklh kʔnwtʔ lʔ šlʔ ʔnt lmʕqmw ʔwrḥth tryṣtʔ dmryʔ
13:11	whšʔ ʔydh dmryʔ ʕlyk wthwʔ smʔ wlʔ tḥzʔ šmšʔ ʕdmʔ lzbnʔ wbh bšʕtʔ npl ʕlwhy ʕmṭnʔ wḥšwkʔ wmtkrk hwʔ wbʕʔ dmnw nʔḥwd bʔydh
13:12	wkd ḥzʔ ʔntwpṭws mdm dhwʔ ʔtdmr whymn bywlpnh dmryʔ
13:13	pwlws dyn wbrnbʔ rdw bymʔ mn ppws mdyntʔ wʔtw lhwn lprgʔ mdyntʔ dpmpwlyʔ wprš mnhwn ywḥnn wʔzl lh lʔwršlm
13:14	hnwn dyn npqw mn prgʔ wʔtw lʔnṭykyʔ mdyntʔ dpysydyʔ wʕlw lknwštʔ wytbw bywmʔ wšbtʔ
13:15	wbtr dʔtqry nmwsʔ wnbyʔ šlḥw lhwn qšyšʔ dknwštʔ wʔmrw gbrʔ ʔḥyn ʔn hw dʔyt lkwn mltʔ dbwyʔʔ mllw ʕm ʕmʔ
13:16	wqm pwlws wʔnyp ʔydh wʔmr gbrʔ bny ʔysryl wʔylyn ddḥlyn mn ʔlhʔ šmʕw
13:17	ʔlhh dʕmʔ hnʔ gbʔ lʔbhtn wʔrym wʔwrb ʔnwn kd hww twtbʔ bʔrʕʔ dmṣryn wbdrʕʔ rmʔ ʔpq ʔnwn mnh
13:18	wtrsy ʔnwn bmdbrʔ ʔrbʕyn šnyn
13:19	whgm šbʕʔ ʕmmyn bʔrʕʔ dknʕn wyhb lhwn ʔrʕhwn lywrtnʔ
13:20	wʔrbʕ mʔʔ wḥmšyn šnyn yhb lhwn dynʔ ʕdmʔ lšmwʔyl nbyʔ
13:21	whydyn šʔlw lhwn mlkʔ wyhb lhwn ʔlhʔ lšʔwl br qyš gbrʔ mn šrbtʔ dbnymyn šnyn ʔrbʕyn
13:22	wnsbh wʔqym lhwn ldwyd mlkʔ wʔshd ʕlwhy wʔmr dʔškḥt ldwyd brh dʔyšy gbrʔ ʔyk lby hw nʕbd klhwn ṣbyny
13:23	mn zrʕh dhnʔ ʔqym ʔlhʔ lʔysryl ʔyk mʔ dʔštwdy lyšwʕ prwqʔ
13:24	wšdr lywḥnn dnkrz qdm mʔtyth mʕmwdytʔ dtybwtʔ lklh ʕmʔ dʔysryl
13:25	wkd mšlm hwʔ ywḥnn tšmšth ʔmr hwʔ mnw sbryn ʔntwn dʔyty lʔ hwyt ʔnʔ ʔlʔ hʔ ʔtʔ btry hw dlʔ šwʔ ʔnʔ dʔšrʔ ʕrqʔ dmsnwhy
13:26	gbrʔ ʔḥyn bny šrbth dʔbrhm wʔylyn ddḥlyn ʕmkwn lʔlhʔ lkwn hw ʔštdrt mltʔ dḥyʔ
13:27	hlyn gyr ʕmwrʔ dʔwršlm wršnyhwn lʔ ʔrgšw bh ʔplʔ bktbʔ dnbyʔ dmtqryn bkl šbʔ ʔlʔ dnwhy wšlmw hlyn dktybn
13:28	wkd lʔ ʔškḥw ʕltʔ dmwtʔ mdm šʔlw mn pylṭws dnqṭlwnyhy
13:29	wkd šlmw klmdm dktyb hwʔ ʕlwhy ʔḥtwhy mn ṣlybʔ wsmwhy byt qbwrʔ
13:30	ʔlhʔ dyn ʔqymh mn byt mytʔ
13:31	wʔtḥzy ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ lʔylyn dslqw ʕmh mn glylʔ lʔwršlm whnwn ʔnwn hšʔ shdwhy lwt ʕmʔ
13:32	wʔp ḥnn hʔ msbrynn lkwn dšwwdyʔ hw dhwʔ lwt ʔbhtn
13:33	hʔ šmlyh ʔlhʔ ln lbnyhwn dʔqym lyšwʕ ʔyk dktyb bmzmwrʔ dtryn dbry ʔnt ʔnʔ ywmnʔ yldtk
13:34	whknʔ ʔqymh ʔlhʔ mn byt mytʔ dtwb lʔ nhpwk nḥzʔ ḥblʔ ʔyk dʔmr dʔtl lkwn ṭybwth ddwyd mhymntʔ
13:35	wtwb ʔmr bdwktʔ ʔḥrtʔ dlʔ yhbt lḥsyk dnḥzʔ ḥblʔ
13:36	dwyd gyr bšrbth šmš ṣbynh dʔlhʔ wškb wʔttwsp ʕl ʔbhwhy wḥzʔ ḥblʔ
13:37	hnʔ dyn dʔqym ʔlhʔ lʔ ḥzʔ ḥblʔ
13:38	dʕw hkyl ʔḥy dbh bhnʔ mtkrz lkwn šwbqn ḥṭhʔ
13:39	wmn kl dlʔ ʔškḥtwn bnmwsʔ dmwšʔ dtzddqwn bhnʔ kl dmhymn mzddq
13:40	ʔzdhrw hkyl dlmʔ nʔtʔ ʕlykwn mdm dktyb bnbyʔ
13:41	dḥzw mbsrnʔ wttmhwn wttḥblwn dʕbdʔ ʕbd ʔnʔ bywmykwn ʔynʔ dlʔ thymnwn ʔn ʔnš mštʕʔ lkwn
13:42	wkd npqyn hww mn ṣʔdyhwn bʕw mnhwn dlšbtʔ ʔḥrtʔ nmllwn ʕmhwn mlʔ hlyn
13:43	wmn dʔštryt knwštʔ sgyʔʔ yhwdyʔ ʔzlw btrhwn wʔp gywrʔ ddḥlyn hww mn ʔlhʔ whnwn mmllyn hww wmpysyn lhwn dnhwwn nqypyn lṭybwth dʔlhʔ 
13:44	wlšbtʔ ʔḥrtʔ knšt klh mdyntʔ lmšmʕ mlth dʔlhʔ
13:45	wkd ḥzw yhwdyʔ knšʔ sgyʔʔ ʔtmlyw ḥsmʔ wqymyn hww lwqbl mlʔ dʔmr hwʔ pwlws wmgdpyn hww
13:46	ʔmr dyn pwlws wbrnbʔ ʕyn bglʔ lkwn hw wlʔ hwʔ qdmyt dttʔmr mlth dʔlhʔ ʔlʔ mṭl ddḥyn ʔntwn lh mnkwn wpsqtwn ʕl npškwn dlʔ šwyn ʔntwn lḥyʔ dlʕlm hʔ ln lwt ʕmmʔ
13:47	hknʔ gyr pqdn mrn ʔyk dktyb dsmtk nwhrʔ lʕmmʔ dthwʔ lḥyʔ ʕdmʔ lswpyh dʔrʕʔ
13:48	wkd šmʕyn hww ʕmmʔ ḥdyn hww wmšbḥyn lʔlhʔ whymnw ʔylyn dsymyn hww lḥyʔ dlʕlm
13:49	wmlth dmryʔ mtmllʔ hwt bklh hw ʔtrʔ
13:50	yhwdyʔ dyn grgw lršʔ dmdyntʔ wlnšʔ ʕtyrtʔ ʔylyn ddḥln hwy ʕmhwn lʔlhʔ wʔqymw rdwpyʔ ʕl pwlws wʕl brnbʔ wʔpqw ʔnwn mn tḥwmyhwn
13:51	wkd npqw npṣw ʕlyhwn ḥlʔ drglyhwn wʔtw lhwn lʔyqnwn mdyntʔ
13:52	wtlmydʔ mtmlyn hww ḥdwtʔ wrwḥʔ dqwdšʔ
14:01	wʔtw wʕlw lhwn lknwštʔ dyhwdyʔ whknʔ mllw ʕmhwn ʔyk dnhymnwn sgyʔʔ mn yhwdyʔ wmn ywnyʔ
14:02	yhwdyʔ dyn ʔylyn dlʔ mtṭpysyn hww grgw lʕmmʔ dnbʔšwn lhwn lʔḥʔ
14:03	whnwn zbnʔ sgyʔʔ hww tmn wʕyn bglʔ mmllyn hww ʕl mryʔ whw mshd hwʔ ʕl mltʔ dṭybwth bʔtwtʔ wbtdmrtʔ dʕbd hwʔ bʔydyhwn
14:04	wklh knšʔ dmdyntʔ plyg hwʔ mnhwn ʔyt hww ʕm yhwdyʔ wmnhwn nqypyn hww lšlyḥʔ
14:05	hwʔ dyn ʕlyhwn gzmʔ mn ʕmmʔ wmn yhwdyʔ wršnyhwn dnṣʕrwn ʔnwn wnrgmwn ʔnwn bkʔpʔ
14:06	wkd ydʕw šnyw wʔtgwsw bmdyntʔ dlwqnyʔ lwsṭrʔ wdrbʔwqwryʔ dḥdryhyn
14:07	wtmn msbryn hww
14:08	wgbrʔ ḥd ytb hwʔ blwsṭrʔ mdyntʔ dsgyp hwʔ brglwhy ḥgyrʔ dmn krs ʔmh dmmtwm lʔ hlk hwʔ
14:09	hnʔ šmʕ lpwlws dmmll wkd ḥzyhy pwlws wʔštwdʕ dʔyt bh hymnwtʔ dnḥʔ
14:10	ʔmr lh bqlʔ rmʔ lk ʔmr ʔnʔ bšmh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ qwm ʕl rglyk wšwr qm whlk
14:11	wknšʔ dʕmʔ kd ḥzw mdm dʕbd pwlws ʔrymw qlhwn blšnh dʔtrʔ wʔmryn ʔlhʔ ʔtdmyw bbny ʔnšʔ wnḥtw lwtn
14:12	wšmyw hww lbrnbʔ mrʔ ʔlhʔ wlpwlws hrmys mṭl dhw mšrʔ hwʔ bmltʔ
14:13	wkwmrʔ dmrʔ ʔlhʔ hw dʔyt hwʔ lbr mn mdyntʔ ʔyty twrʔ wklylʔ ltrʕʔ ddrtʔ ʔtr dšryn hww wṣbʔ hwʔ dndbḥ lhwn
14:14	brnbʔ dyn wpwlws kd šmʕw sdqw nḥtyhwn wšwrw wnpqw lhwn lwt ʔklws wqʕyn hww
14:15	wʔmryn gbrʔ mnʔ ʕbdyn ʔntwn ʔp ḥnn bnynšʔ ḥnn ḥšwšʔ ʔkwtkwn dmsbrynn lkwn dmn hlyn bṭltʔ ttpnwn lwt ʔlhʔ ḥyʔ hw dʕbd šmyʔ wʔrʕʔ wymmʔ wkl dʔyt bhwn
14:16	hw dbdrʔ qdmyʔ šbq hwʔ ʔnwn lklhwn ʕmmʔ dnʔzlwn bʔwrḥtʔ dnpšhwn
14:17	kd lʔ šbq npšh dlʔ shdw bdʕbd hwʔ lhwn ṭbtʔ mn šmyʔ wmḥt hwʔ lhwn mṭrʔ wmrbʔ hwʔ pʔrʔ bzbnyhwn wmlʔ hwʔ twrsyʔ wbsymwtʔ lbwthwn
14:18	wkd hlyn ʔmryn hww mn mḥsn klw lʕmʔ dʔnš lʔ ndbḥ lhwn
14:19	ʔtw dyn ltmn yhwdyʔ mn ʔyqnwn wmn ʔnṭykyʔ wšgšw ʕlyhwn lʕmʔ wrgmwhy lpwlws wgrwhy lbr mn mdyntʔ mṭl dsbryn hww dmyt lh
14:20	wknšw ʕlwhy tlmydʔ wqm ʕl lmdyntʔ wlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ npq lh mn tmn ʕm brnbʔ wʔtw ldrbʔ mdyntʔ
14:21	wkd msbryn hww lbny mdyntʔ hy tlmdw hww lsgyʔʔ whpkw ʔtw lhwn llwsṭrʔ mdyntʔ wlʔyqnwn wlʔnṭykyʔ
14:22	kd mšrryn hww npšthwn dtlmydʔ wbʕyn hww mnhwn dnqwwn bhymnwtʔ wʔmryn hww lhwn dbʔwlṣnʔ sgyʔʔ wlʔ lmʕl lmlkwth dʔlhʔ
14:23	wʔqymw lhwn bkl ʕdtʔ qšyšʔ kd ṣymyn hww ʕmhwn wmṣlyn wmgʕlyn hww lhwn lmrn hw dhymnw bh
14:24	wkd ʔtkrkw bʔtrʔ dpysydyʔ ʔtw lhwn lpmpwlyʔ
14:25	wkd mllw bprgʔ mdyntʔ mltʔ dmryʔ nḥtw lhwn lʔyṭlyʔ
14:26	wmn tmn rdw bymʔ wʔtw lhwn lʔnṭykyʔ mṭl dmn tmn mgʕlyn hww lṭybwth dmryʔ lʕbdʔ hw dšlmw
14:27	wkd knšw klh ʕdtʔ mštʕyn hww klmdm dʕbd ʕmhwn ʔlhʔ wdptḥ trʕʔ dhymnwtʔ lʕmmʔ
14:28	wzbnʔ sgyʔʔ hww tmn lwt tlmydʔ
15:01	nḥtw hww dyn ʔnšʔ mn yhwd wmlpyn hww lhwn lʔḥʔ dʔnhw dlʔ gzryn ʔntwn bʕydʔ dnmwsʔ lʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn lmḥʔ
15:02	whwʔ šgwšyʔ sgyʔʔ wbʕtʔ lpwlws wlbrnbʔ ʕmhwn whwt dnsqwn pwlws wbrnbʔ wʔḥrnʔ ʕmhwn lwt šlyḥʔ wqšyšʔ dbʔwršlm mṭl hdʔ bʕtʔ
15:03	wlwyt šdrt ʔnwn ʕdtʔ wrdyn hww bklh pwnyqʔ wʔp byt šmryʔ kd mštʕyn hww ʕl pwnyʔ dʕmmʔ wʕbdyn hww ḥdwtʔ rbtʔ lklhwn ʔḥʔ 
15:04	wkd ʔtw lʔwršlm ʔtqblw mn ʕdtʔ wmn šlyḥʔ wmn qšyšʔ wʔštʕyw lhwn kl mʔ dʕbd ʕmhwn ʔlhʔ
15:05	qmw hww dyn ʔnšʔ ʔylyn dhymnw hww mn ywlpnʔ dpryšʔ wʔmryn dwlʔ hw lkwn lmgzr ʔnwn wtpqdwn ʔnwn dnṭrwn nmwsʔ dmwšʔ
15:06	ʔtknšw dyn šlyḥʔ wqšyšʔ dnḥzwn ʕl mltʔ hdʔ
15:07	wkd hwt bʕtʔ sgyʔtʔ qm šmʕwn wʔmr lhwn gbrʔ ʔḥyn ʔntwn ydʕyn ʔntwn dmn ywmtʔ qdmyʔ mn pwmy dyly gbʔ ʔlhʔ dnšmʕwn ʕmmʔ mltʔ dsbrtʔ wnhymnwn
15:08	wʔlhʔ dydʕ dblbwtʔ ʔshd ʕlyhwn wyhb lhwn rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ ʔyk dln
15:09	wmdm lʔ prš bynyn wlhwn mṭl ddky bhymnwtʔ lbwthwn
15:10	whšʔ ʔntwn mnʔ mnsyn ʔntwn lʔlhʔ ʔyk dtsymwn nyrʔ ʕl ṣwryhwn dtlmydʔ ʔynʔ dʔplʔ ʔbhtn ʔplʔ ḥnn ʔškḥn lmṭʕn
15:11	ʔlʔ bṭybwth dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ mhymnynn dnḥʔ ʔkwthwn
15:12	wštqw klh knšʔ wšmʕyn hww lpwlws wlbrnbʔ dmštʕyn hww kl mʔ dʕbd ʔlhʔ bʔydyhwn ʔtwtʔ wgbrwtʔ bʕmmʔ
15:13	wbtr dštqw qm yʕqwb wʔmr gbrʔ ʔḥyn šwmʕwny
15:14	šmʕwn ʔštʕy lkwn ʔyknʔ šry ʔlhʔ lmgbʔ mn ʕmmʔ ʕmʔ lšmh
15:15	wlhdʔ šlmn mlyhwn dnbyʔ ʔyk mʔ dktyb
15:16	dmn btr hlyn ʔhpwk wʔqym mšknh ddwyd ʔynʔ dnpl wʔbnʔ mdm dnpl mnh wʔqymywhy
15:17	ʔyk dnbʕwn šrkhwn dbnynšʔ lmryʔ wklhwn ʕmmʔ ʔylyn dʔtqry šmy ʕlyhwn ʔmr mryʔ dʕbd hlyn klhyn
15:18	ydyʕyn mn ʕlm ʕbdwhy dʔlhʔ
15:19	mṭl hdʔ ʔnʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ dlʔ nhwwn šḥqyn lʔylyn dmn ʕmmʔ mtpnyn lwt ʔlhʔ
15:20	ʔlʔ nštlḥ lhwn dnhwwn pryqyn mn ṭmʔwtʔ ddbyḥʔ wmn znywtʔ wmn dḥnyqʔ wmn dmʔ
15:21	mwšʔ gyr mn drʔ qdmyʔ bkl mdynʔ ʔyt hwʔ lh krwzʔ bknwštʔ dbkl šbyn qryn lh
15:22	hydyn šlyḥʔ wqšyšʔ ʕm klh ʕdtʔ gbw gbrʔ mnhwn wšdrw lʔnṭywky ʕm pwlws wbrnbʔ lyhwdʔ dmtqrʔ br šbʔ wlšylʔ gbrʔ dršʔ hww bhwn bʔḥʔ
15:23	wktbw ʔgrtʔ bʔydyhwn hknʔ šlyḥʔ wqšyšʔ wʔḥʔ lʔylyn dʔyt bʔnṭywky wbswryʔ wbqylyqyʔ ʔḥʔ dmn ʕmmʔ šlm
15:24	šmyʕ ln dʔnšyn mnn npqw wdlḥkwn bmlʔ wʔhpkw npštkwn kd ʔmryn dthwwn gzryn wnṭryn nmwsʔ ʔylyn dḥnn lʔ pqdn ʔnwn
15:25	mṭl hnʔ ʔtḥšbn kln kd knyšynn wgbyn gbrʔ wšdrn lwtkwn ʕm pwlws wbrnbʔ ḥbybyn
15:26	ʔnšʔ dʔšlmw npšthwn ḥlp šmh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
15:27	wšdrn ʕmhwn lyhwdʔ wlšylʔ dhnwn bmltʔ nʔmrwn lkwn hnyn hlyn
15:28	hwʔ gyr ṣbynʔ lrwḥʔ dqwdšʔ wʔp ln dlʔ nttsym ʕlykwn ywqrʔ ytyrʔ lbr mn hlyn dʔlṣn
15:29	dttrḥqwn mn ddbyḥʔ wmn dmʔ wmn ḥnyqʔ wmn znywtʔ dkd tṭrwn npškwn mn hlyn špyr thwwn hww šryryn bmrn
15:30	hnwn dyn dʔštlḥw ʔtw lʔnṭykyʔ wknšw klh ʕmʔ wyhbw ʔgrtʔ
15:31	wkd qrw ḥdyw wʔtbyʔw
15:32	wbmltʔ ʕtyrtʔ ḥylw lʔḥʔ wqymw ʔnwn dbyt yhwdʔ wšylʔ mṭl dʔp hnwn nbyʔ hww
15:33	wkd hww tmn zbnʔ šrw ʔnwn ʔḥʔ bšlmʔ lwt šlyḥʔ
15:34	brm hwʔ ṣbynh dšylʔ dnqwʔ tmn
15:35	pwlws dyn wbrnbʔ qwyw hww bʔnṭywky wmlpyn hww wmsbryn ʕm ʔḥrnʔ sgyʔʔ mlth dʔlhʔ
15:36	wbtr ywmtʔ ʔmr pwlws lbrnbʔ ntpnʔ wnsʕwr lʔḥʔ dbkl mdynʔ dʔkrzn bh mltʔ dʔlhʔ wnḥzʔ mnʔ ʕbydyn
15:37	brnbʔ dyn ṣbʔ hwʔ dndbr lywḥnn hw dʔtkny mrqws
15:38	pwlws dyn lʔ ṣbʔ hwʔ dndbrh ʕmhwn mṭl dšbq hwʔ ʔnwn kd hnwn bpmpwlyʔ wlʔ ʔzl ʕmhwn
15:39	mṭl hnʔ ḥrynʔ pršw ḥd mn ḥd wbrnbʔ dbr lmrqws wrdw bymʔ wʔzlw lhwn lqwprws
15:40	pwlws dyn gbʔ lh lšylʔ wnpq kd mgʕl mn ʔḥʔ lṭybwtʔ dʔlhʔ
15:41	wrdʔ hwʔ bswryʔ wbqylyqyʔ wmqym ʕdtʔ
16:01	wmṭy hwʔ ldrbʔ mdyntʔ wllwsṭrʔ ʔyt hwʔ dyn tmn tlmydʔ ḥd dšmh ṭymtʔws brh dyhwdytʔ ḥdʔ mhymntʔ wʔbwhy ʔrmyʔ hwʔ
16:02	wklhwn tlmydʔ dmn lwsṭrʔ wmn ʔyqnwn mshdyn hww ʕlwhy
16:03	lhnʔ ṣbʔ hwʔ pwlws dndbrywhy ʕmh wnsb gzrh mṭl yhwdyʔ dʔyt hww bʔtrʔ ydʕyn hww gyr klhwn lʔbwhy dʔrmyʔ hwʔ
16:04	wkd ʔzlyn hww bmdyntʔ mkrzyn hww wmlpyn lhwn dnhwwn nṭryn pwqdnʔ ʔylyn dktbw šlyḥʔ wqšyšʔ dbʔwršlm
16:05	brm ʕdtʔ mtqymn hwy bhymnwtʔ wsgyn hwy bmnynʔ klywm
16:06	hlkw dyn bprwgyʔ wbglṭyʔ ʔtrwtʔ wklt ʔnwn rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ dlʔ nmllwn mltʔ dʔlhʔ bʔsyʔ
16:07	wkd ʔtw lmwsyʔ ʔtrʔ ṣbyn hww dnʔzlwn mn tmn lbytwnyʔ wlʔ ʔpst lhwn rwḥh dyšwʕ
16:08	wkd npqw mn mwsyʔ nḥtw lhwn lṭrwʔs ʔtrʔ
16:09	wbḥzwʔ dllyʔ ʔtḥzy lpwlws ʔyk gbrʔ ḥd mqdwnyʔ dqʔm wbʕʔ mnh kd ʔmr dtʔ lmqdwnyʔ wʕdryny 
16:10	kd dyn ḥzʔ pwlws hnʔ ḥzwʔ mḥdʔ ṣbyn lmpq lmqdwnyʔ mṭl dʔstkln dmrn qrn dnsbr ʔnwn
16:11	wrdyn mn ṭrwʔs wtrṣn lsmtrqʔ wmn tmn lywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔtyn lnʔpwlys mdyntʔ
16:12	wmn tmn lpylypws dhy hy ršʔ dmqdwnyʔ wʔytyh qwlwnyʔ hwyn dyn bh bhdʔ mdyntʔ ywmtʔ ydyʕʔ
16:13	wnpqn bywmʔ dšbtʔ lbr mn trʕʔ dmdyntʔ ʕl yd nhrʔ mṭl dtmn mtḥzʔ hwʔ byt ṣlwtʔ wkd ytbn mmllyn hwyn ʕm nšʔ dknyšn hwy tmn
16:14	wʔnttʔ ḥdʔ mzbnt ʔrgwnʔ ddḥlʔ hwt mn ʔlhʔ šmh hwʔ lwdyʔ mn tʔwṭyrʔ mdyntʔ dhdʔ ptḥ lbh mrn wšmʕʔ hwt mdm dʔmr pwlws
16:15	wʕmdt hwt hy wbny byth wbʕyʔ hwt mnn wʔmrʔ dʔn hw dšryrʔyt tkylyn ʔntwn dhymnt bmrn tw šrw lkwn bbyty wsgy ʔlṣtn
16:16	whwʔ dkd ʔzlynn lbyt ṣlwtʔ pgʕt bn ʕlymtʔ ḥdʔ dʔyt hwʔ lh rwḥʔ dqṣmʔ wʕbdʔ hwt lmryh tʔgwrtʔ sgyʔtʔ bqṣmʔ dqṣmʔ hwt
16:17	wʔtyʔ hwt btr pwlws wbtrn wqʕyʔ hwt wʔmrʔ hlyn ʔnšʔ ʕbdwhy ʔnwn dʔlhʔ mrymʔ wmsbryn lkwn ʔwrḥʔ dḥyʔ
16:18	whknʔ ʕbdʔ hwt ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ wʔttpyr pwlws wʔmr lh lrwḥʔ hy pqd ʔnʔ lky bšmh dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ dtpqyn mnh wbh bšʕtʔ npqt
16:19	wkd ḥzw mryh dnpq lh mnh sbrʔ dtʔgwrthwn ʔḥdwhy lpwlws wlšylʔ wngdw ʔytyw ʔnwn lšwqʔ
16:20	wqrbw ʔnwn lʔsṭrṭgʔ wlršʔ dmdyntʔ wʔmryn hww dhlyn ʔnšʔ mdlḥyn lh lmdyntn mṭl dyhwdyʔ ʔnwn
16:21	wmkrzyn ln ʕydʔ ʔylyn dlʔ mps ln lmqblw wlmʕbd mṭl drhwmyʔ ḥnn
16:22	wknšʔ sgyʔʔ ʔtknšw ʕlyhwn hydyn ʔsṭrṭgʔ sdqw nḥtyhwn wpqdw dnngdwn ʔnwn
16:23	wkd ngdw ʔnwn sgy ʔrmyw ʔnwn byt ʔsyrʔ wpqdw lnṭr byt ʔsyrʔ dnṭr ʔnwn zhyrʔyt
16:24	hw dyn kd qbl hnʔ pwqdnʔ ʔʕl ḥbš ʔnwn bbytʔ gwyʔ dbyt ʔsyrʔ wʔsr rglyhwn bsdʔ
16:25	wbplgh dllyʔ pwlws wšylʔ mṣlyn hww wmšbḥyn hww lʔlhʔ wšmʕyn hww lhwn ʔsyrʔ
16:26	wmn šlyʔ zwʕʔ rbʔ hwʔ wʔttzyʕ štʔsʔ dbyt ʔsyrʔ wʔtptḥw mḥdʔ trʕʔ klhwn wʔswryhwn dklhwn ʔštryw
16:27	wkd ʔttʕyr nṭr byt ʔsyrʔ wḥzʔ dptyḥyn trʕʔ dbyt ʔsyrʔ nsb spsrʔ wbʕʔ dnqṭwl npšh mṭl dsbr hwʔ dʕrqw lhwn ʔsyrʔ
16:28	wqryhy pwlws bqlʔ rmʔ wʔmr lh lʔ tʕbd lnpšk mdm dbyš mṭl dkln hrkʔ ḥnn
16:29	wʔnhr lh šrgʔ wšwr wʕl kd rʔt wnpl ʕl rglyhwn dpwlws wdšylʔ
16:30	wʔpq ʔnwn lbr wʔmr hwʔ lhwn mry mnʔ wlʔ ly lmʕbd ʔyk dʔḥʔ
16:31	whnwn ʔmryn hww lh hymn bmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ wtḥʔ ʔnt wbytk
16:32	wmllw ʕmh mltʔ dmryʔ wʕm klhwn bny byth
16:33	wbh bšʕtʔ bh bllyʔ dbr ʔsḥy ʔnwn mn ngdhwn wbršʕth ʕmd hw wbny byth klhwn
16:34	wdbr ʔsq ʔnwn lbyth wsm lhwn ptwrʔ wrwz hwʔ hw wbny byth bhymnwtʔ dʔlhʔ
16:35	wkd hwʔ ṣprʔ šdrw ʔsṭrṭgʔ lšqly šbṭʔ dnʔmrwn lrb ʔsyrʔ šry lhlyn ʔnšʔ
16:36	wkd šmʕ rb byt ʔsyrʔ ʕl ʔmr lh hy hdʔ mltʔ lpwlws dšdrw ʔsṭrṭgʔ ʔyk dtštrwn whšʔ pwqw zlw bšlmʔ
16:37	ʔmr lh pwlws dlʔ sklw ngdwn lʕyn ʕlmʔ klh lʔnšʔ rhwmyʔ wʔrmywn byt ʔsyrʔ whšʔ mṭšyʔyt mpqyn ln lʔ gyr ʔlʔ hnwn nʔtwn npqwnn
16:38	wʔzlw šqly šbṭʔ wʔmrw lʔsṭrṭgʔ mlʔ hlyn dʔtʔmr lhwn wkd šmʕw drhwmyʔ ʔnwn dḥlw
16:39	wʔtw lwthwn wbʕw mnhwn dnpqwn wnšnwn lhwn mn mdyntʔ
16:40	wkd npqw mn byt ʔsyrʔ ʕlw lwt lwdyʔ wḥzw tmn lʔḥʔ wbyʔw ʔnwn wnpqw
17:01	wʕbrw ʕl ʔmpypwlys wʔplwnyʔ mdyntʔ wʔtw ltslwnyqʔ ʔykʔ dʔyt hwʔ knwštʔ dyhwdyʔ
17:02	wʕl pwlws ʔyknʔ dmʕd hwʔ lwthwn wšbʔ tlt mll ʕmhwn mn ktbʔ
17:03	kd mpšq hwʔ wmḥwʔ dʕtyd hwʔ mšyḥʔ dnḥš wdnqwm mn byt mytʔ whwyw yšwʕ mšyḥʔ hnʔ dmsbr ʔnʔ lkwn
17:04	wʔnšyn mnhwn hymnw wnqpw lpwlws wlšylʔ wsgyʔʔ mn ywnyʔ ʔylyn ddḥlyn hww mn ʔlhʔ wʔp nšʔ ydyʕtʔ lʔ ʕtʔlʔzʕwryn
17:05	wḥsmw hww yhwdyʔ wʔqpw lhwn ʔnšʔ byšʔ mn šwqʔ dmdyntʔ wʕbdw ʔklws sgyʔʔ wdlḥw hww lmdyntʔ wʔtw wqmw wʔtw wqmw lhwn ʕl byth dʔyswn wbʕyn hww dnpqwn ʔnwn mn tmn wnšlmwn ʔnwn lʔklws
17:06	wkd lʔ ʔškḥw ʔnwn tmn grwhy hww lʔyswn wlʔḥʔ dʔyt hww tmn wʔytyw ʔnwn lwt ršʔ dmdyntʔ kd qʕyn hww dhlyn ʔnwn dlklh ʔrʕʔ dlḥw whʔ twb lhrkʔ ʔtw
17:07	wmqblnhwn hnw ʔyswn wklhwn hlyn lwqbl pwqdnwhy dqsr qymyn kd ʔmryn dʔyt mlkʔ ʔḥrnʔ yšwʕ
17:08	ʔtdlḥw dyn ršʔ dmdyntʔ wklh ʕmʔ kd šmʕw hlyn
17:09	wnsbw ʕrbʔ mn ʔyswn wʔp mn ʔḥʔ whydyn šrw ʔnwn 
17:10	ʔḥʔ dyn br šʕth bh bllyʔ šrw lpwlws wlšylʔ lbrwʔʔ mdyntʔ wkd ʔtw ltmn ʕʔlyn hww lknwštʔ dyhwdyʔ
17:11	ḥʔryyn hww gyr hnwn yhwdyʔ dtmn mn yhwdyʔ hnwn dʔyt hww btslwnyqʔ wšmʕyn hww mnhwn mltʔ klywm ḥdyʔyt kd mpršyn hww mn ktbʔ dʔn hlyn hknʔ ʔytyhyn
17:12	wsgyʔʔ mnhwn hymnw whknʔ ʔp mn ywnyʔ gbrʔ sgyʔʔ wnšʔ ydyʕtʔ
17:13	wkd ydʕw hnwn yhwdyʔ dmn tslwnyqʔ dmlth dʔlhʔ ʔtkrzt mn pwlws bbrwʔʔ mdyntʔ ʔtw ʔp ltmn wlʔ šlyw lmzʕw wlmdlḥw lʔnšwtʔ
17:14	wlpwlws šrʔwhy ʔḥʔ dnḥwt lh lymʔ wqwy hwʔ bh bmdyntʔ hy šylʔ wṭymtʔws
17:15	whnwn dʔtlwyw lh lpwlws ʔtw ʕmh ʕdmʔ lʔtnws mdyntʔ wkd npqyn mn ṣʔdwhy qblw mnh ʔgrtʔ lwt šylʔ wṭymtʔws dbʕgl nʔzlwn lwth
17:16	hw dyn pwlws kd mqwʔ hwʔ bʔtnws mtmrmr hwʔ brwḥh kd ḥzʔ hwʔ dmdyntʔ klh mlyʔ ptkrʔ
17:17	wmmll hwʔ bknwštʔ ʕm yhwdyʔ wʕm ʔylyn ddḥlyn mn ʔlhʔ wbšwqʔ ʕm ʔylyn dmstqblyn hww klywm
17:18	wʔp pylswpʔ dmn ywlpnh dʔpyqwrs wʔḥrnʔ dmtqryn sṭwʔyqw dršyn hww ʕmh wʔnš ʔnš mnhwn ʔmryn hww mnʔ ṣbʔ hnʔ mlqṭ mlʔ wʔḥrnʔ ʔmryn hww dʔlhʔ nwkryʔ mkrz mṭl dlyšwʕ wlqymth mkrz hwʔ lhwn
17:19	wʔḥdwhy wʔytywhy lbyt dynʔ dmtqrʔ ʔryws pgws kd ʔmryn lh mškḥynn lmdʕ mnw hnʔ ywlpnʔ ḥdtʔ dmkrz ʔnt
17:20	mlʔ gyr nwkrytʔ zrʕ ʔnt bmšmʕtn wṣbynn lmdʕ mnʔ ʔnyn hlyn
17:21	ʔtnyʔ dyn klhwn wʔylyn dʔtyn ltmn nwkryʔ ʕl mdm ʔḥryn lʔ bṭyl lhwn ʔlʔ lmʔmr wlmšmʕ mdm ḥdt
17:22	wkd qm pwlws bʔryws pgws ʔmr gbrʔ ʔtnyʔ ḥzʔ ʔnʔ lkwn dbklhyn ytyryn ʔntwn bdḥlt šʔdʔ
17:23	kd gyr mtkrk hwyt wḥzʔ hwyt byt dḥltkwn ʔškḥt ʕltʔ ḥdʔ dktyb hwʔ ʕlyh dʔlhʔ gnyzʔ hw hkyl dkd lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn dḥlyn ʔntwn lh lh lhnʔ ʔnʔ msbr ʔnʔ lkwn
17:24	ʔlhʔ gyr dʕbd ʕlmʔ wkl mʔ dʔyt bh whwyw mrʔ dšmyʔ wdʔrʕʔ bhyklʔ dʕbd ʔydyʔ lʔ šrʔ
17:25	wlʔ mštmš mn ʔydy bnynšʔ wʕl mdm lʔ snyq mṭl dhw yhb lklnš ḥyʔ wnpšʔ
17:26	wmn ḥd dm ʕbd ʕlmʔ klh dbnynšʔ dnhwwn ʕmryn ʕl ʔpy ʔrʕʔ klh wprš zbnʔ bpwqdnh wsm tḥwmʔ dʕwmrʔ dbnynšʔ
17:27	dnhwwn bʕyn lʔlhʔ wmʕqbyn wmn bryth mškḥyn lh mṭl lʔ hwʔ rḥyq mn kl mnn
17:28	bh hw gyr ḥyynn wmttzyʕynn wʔytyn ʔyk dʔp ʔnšʔ mn ḥkymʔ dlwtkwn ʔmrw dmnh hw ṭwhmn
17:29	ʔnšʔ hkyl dṭwhmn mn ʔlhʔ hw lʔ ḥybynn lmsbr dldhbʔ ʔw lsʔmʔ ʔw lkʔpʔ dglypʔ bʔwmnwtʔ wbydʕtʔ dbrnšʔ dmyʔ ʔlhwtʔ
17:30	zbnʔ gyr dṭʕywtʔ ʔʕbr ʔlhʔ wbzbnʔ hnʔ mpqd lklhwn bnynšʔ dkl ʔnš bkl dwkʔ ntwb
17:31	mṭl dʔqym ywmʔ dbh ʕtyd dndwn ʔrʕʔ klh bkʔnwtʔ byd gbrʔ ʔynʔ dprš wʔpny lkl ʔnš lhymnwth bdʔqymh mn byt mytʔ
17:32	wkd šmʕw qymtʔ dmn byt mytʔ mnhwn mmyqyn hww wmnhwn ʔmryn hww bzbn ʔḥryn šmʕynn lk ʕl hdʔ
17:33	whknʔ npq pwlws mn bynthwn
17:34	wʔnšyn mnhwn nqpwhy whymnw ḥd dyn mnhwn ʔytwhy hwʔ dynwsyws mn dynʔ dʔryws pgws wʔnttʔ ḥdʔ dšmh hwʔ dmrys wʔḥrnʔ ʕmhwn
18:01	wkd npq pwlws mn ʔtnws ʔtʔ lh lqwrntws
18:02	wʔškḥ tmn gbrʔ ḥd yhwdyʔ dšmh hwʔ ʔqlws dʔytwhy hwʔ mn pnṭws ʔtrʔ dbh bhw zbnʔ ʔtʔ hwʔ mn ʔtrʔ dʔyṭlyʔ hw wprysqlʔ ʔntth mṭl dpqd hwʔ qlwdyws qsr dnpqwn klhwn yhwdyʔ mn rhwmʔ wʔtqrb lwthwn
18:03	wmṭl dbr ʔwmnwthwn hwʔ šrʔ lh lwthwn wplḥ hwʔ ʕmhwn bʔwmnwthwn dyn lwlrʔ hww
18:04	wmmll hwʔ bknwštʔ bkl šbʔ wmpys hwʔ lyhwdyʔ wlḥnpʔ
18:05	wkd ʔtw hww mn mqdwnyʔ šylʔ wṭymtʔws ʔlyṣ hwʔ bmltʔ hw pwlws mṭl dqymyn hww lqwblh yhwdyʔ wmgdpyn hww kd mshd hwʔ lhwn dyšwʕ hwyw mšyḥʔ
18:06	wnpṣ mʔnwhy wʔmr lhwn mn hšʔ ʔnʔ dkʔ ʔnʔ ʔzl ʔnʔ ly lwt ʕmmʔ
18:07	wnpq mn tmn wʕl lbyth dgbrʔ dšmh ṭṭws ʔynʔ ddḥl hwʔ mn ʔlhʔ wbyth nqyp hwʔ lknwštʔ
18:08	wkryspws rb knwštʔ hymn hwʔ bmrn hw wbny byth klhwn wsgyʔʔ qwrntyʔ šmʕyn hww wmhymnyn bʔlhʔ wʕmdyn
18:09	wʔmr mryʔ bḥzwʔ lpwlws lʔ tdḥl ʔlʔ mll wlʔ tštwq
18:10	mṭl dʔnʔ ʕmk ʔnʔ wʔnš lʔ mškḥ lmhrwtk wʕmʔ sgyʔʔ ʔyt ly bmdyntʔ hdʔ
18:11	ytb hwʔ dyn šntʔ ḥdʔ wyrḥʔ štʔ bqwrntws wmlp hwʔ lhwn mltʔ dʔlhʔ 
18:12	wkd ʔytwhy hwʔ gʔlywn ʔntwpṭws dʔkʔyʔ ʔtknšw ʔkḥdʔ yhwdyʔ ʕl pwlws wʔytywhy qdm bym
18:13	kd ʔmryn dhnʔ lbr mn nmwsʔ mpys lbnynšʔ dnhwwn dḥlyn lʔlhʔ
18:14	wkd bʕʔ hwʔ pwlws dnptḥ pwmh wnmll ʔmr gʔlywn lyhwdyʔ ʔlw ʕl mdm dbyš ʔw dnkyl ʔw dsnʔ mqṭrgyn hwytwn ʔw yhwdyʔ bwlytʔ mqbl hwyt lkwn
18:15	ʔn dyn zṭmʔ ʔnwn ʕl mltʔ wʕl šmhʔ wʕl nmwsʔ dylkwn ʔntwn ydʕyn ʔntwn byntkwn ʔnʔ gyr lʔ ṣbʔ ʔnʔ dʔhwʔ dynʔ dhlyn ṣbwtʔ
18:16	wṭrd ʔnwn mn bym dylh
18:17	wʔḥdw hww klhwn ḥnpʔ lswstnys qšyšʔ dknwštʔ wmḥyn hww lh qdm bym wgʔlywn mhmʔ hwʔ bhlyn
18:18	wkd hwʔ pwlws tmn ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ yhb šlmʔ lʔḥʔ wrdʔ bymʔ dnʔzl lswryʔ wʔtw ʕmh prysqlʔ wʔqlws kd ršh bqnkrʔs mṭl dndrʔ ndyr hwʔ lh
18:19	wmṭyw lʔpsws wʕl pwlws lknwštʔ wmmll hwʔ ʕm yhwdyʔ
18:20	wbʕyn hww mnh dngr lwthwn wlʔ ʔtṭpys
18:21	kd ʔmr dwlʔ ly ʔmynʔyt dʕʔdʔ dʔtʔ bʔwršlm ʔʕbdywhy wʔn ʔlhʔ nṣbʔ ʔpnʔ twb lwtkwn wlʔqlws wlprysqlʔ šbq ʔnwn bʔpsws
18:22	whw rdʔ bymʔ wʔtʔ lqsryʔ wslq wšʔl bšlmʔ dbny ʕdtʔ wʔzl lh lʔnṭywky
18:23	wkd hwʔ tmn ywmtʔ ydyʕʔ npq wʔtkrk btr btr bʔtrʔ dglṭyʔ wdprwgyʔ kd mqym hwʔ lklhwn tlmydʔ
18:24	wgbrʔ ḥd dšmh hwʔ ʔplw yhwdyʔ dʔytwhy hwʔ ṭwhmh mn ʔlksndryʔ wrdʔ hwʔ bmltʔ wmdq hwʔ bktbʔ ʔtʔ lʔpsws
18:25	hnʔ mtlmd hwʔ lʔwrḥh dmryʔ wrtḥ hwʔ brwḥ wmmll hwʔ wmlp mlyʔyt ʕl yšwʕ kd mdm lʔ ydʕ hwʔ ʔlʔ ʔn mʕmwdytʔ dywḥnn
18:26	wšry ʕyn bglʔ mmll bknwštʔ wkd šmʕwhy ʔqlws wprysqlʔ ʔytywhy lbythwn wmlyʔyt ḥwywhy ʔwrḥh dmryʔ
18:27	wkd ṣbʔ dnʔzl lʔkʔyʔ ḥpṭwhy ʔḥʔ wktbw ltlmydʔ dnqblwnyhy wkd ʔzl ʕdr sgy byd ṭybwtʔ lklhwn mhymnʔ
18:28	tqypʔyt gyr drš hwʔ lwqbl yhwdyʔ qdm knšʔ kd mḥwʔ hwʔ mn ktbʔ ʕl yšwʕ dmšyḥʔ hw
19:01	wkd ʔytwhy hwʔ ʔplw bqwrntws ʔtkrk pwlws bʔtrwtʔ ʕlyʔ wʔtʔ lʔpsws wmšʔl hwʔ ltlmydʔ ʔylyn dʔškḥ tmn
19:02	dʔn qbltwn rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ mn dhymntwn ʕnw wʔmryn lh wʔplʔ ʔn ʔyt rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ šmyʕ ln
19:03	ʔmr lhwn wbmnʔ ʕmdtwn ʔmryn bmʕmwdyth dywḥnn
