19:04	ʔmr lhwn pwlws ywḥnn ʔʕmd mʕmwdytʔ dtybwtʔ lʕmʔ kd ʔmr hwʔ dnhymnwn bʔynʔ dʔtʔ btrh dʔytwhy yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
19:05	wkd hlyn šmʕw ʕmdw bšmh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
19:06	wsm ʕlyhwn ʔydʔ pwlws wʔtʔ rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ ʕlyhwn wmmllyn hww blšn lšn wmtnbyn hww
19:07	hwyn hww dyn klhwn ʔnšʔ trʕsr
19:08	wʕl hwʔ pwlws lknwštʔ wmmll hwʔ ʕyn bglʔ yrḥʔ tltʔ wmpys hwʔ ʕl mlkwth dʔlhʔ
19:09	wʔnšyn mnhwn mtqšyn hww wmtḥryn wmṣḥyn lʔwrḥʔ dʔlhʔ qdm knšʔ dʕmmʔ hydyn ʔrḥq pwlws wprš mnhwn ltlmydʔ wklywm mmll hwʔ ʕmhwn bʔskwlʔ dgbrʔ dšmh ṭwrnws
19:10	whdʔ hwt šnyn trtyn ʕdmʔ dšmʕw mltʔ dmryʔ klhwn dʕmryn bʔsyʔ yhwdyʔ wʔrmyʔ
19:11	wḥylʔ rwrbʔ ʕbd hwʔ ʔlhʔ bʔydh dpwlws
19:12	hknʔ dʔp mn nḥtʔ dʕl gwšmh swdrʔ ʔw rwqʕʔ mytyn hww wsymyn ʕl kryhʔ wprqyn hww mnhwn kwrhnʔ wʔp šʔdʔ npqyn hww
19:13	ṣbw hww dyn ʔp ʔnšʔ yhwdyʔ ʔylyn dmtkrkyn hww wmwmyn ʕl šʔdʔ dnwmwn bšmh dmrn yšwʕ ʕl ʔylyn dʔyt hwy lhwn rwḥʔ ṭnptʔ kd ʔmryn hww mwmynn lkwn bšmh dyšwʕ ʔynʔ dmkrz pwlws
19:14	ʔyt hwʔ dyn šbʕʔ bnwhy dgbrʔ ḥd yhwdyʔ rb khnʔ dšmh hwʔ sqwʔ dʕbdyn hww hdʔ
19:15	wʕnʔ šʔdʔ hw byšʔ wʔmr lhwn lyšwʕ mštwdʕ ʔnʔ wlpwlws ydʕ ʔnʔ ʔntwn dyn mn ʔntwn
19:16	wšwr ʕlyhwn gbrʔ hw dʔyt hwʔ bh rwḥʔ byštʔ wʔtḥyl ʕlyhwn wšpl ʔnwn wkd šlyḥyn wpʕyʕyn ʕrqw mn bytʔ hw
19:17	whdʔ ʔtydʕt hwt lklhwn yhwdyʔ wʔrmyʔ dʕmryn bʔpsws wnplt dḥltʔ ʕl klhwn wmtrmrm hwʔ šmh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
19:18	wsgyʔʔ mn ʔylyn dhymnw ʔtyn hww wmštʕyn sklwthwn wmwdyn bmdm dʕbdyn hww
19:19	sgyʔʔ dyn ʔp ḥršʔ knšw ktbyhwn wʔytyw ʔwqdw ʔnwn qdm klnš wḥšbw dmyhwn wslq kspʔ rbwtʔ ḥmš
19:20	whknʔ bḥylʔ rbʔ tqpʔ hwt wsgyʔ hymnwth dʔlhʔ
19:21	kd dyn ʔštlm hlyn sm pwlws brʕynh dntkrk bklh mqdwnyʔ wbʔkʔyʔ wnʔzl lʔwršlm wʔmr dmʔ dʔzlt ltmn wlʔ ly dʔp rhwmy ʔḥzʔ
19:22	wšdr hwʔ tryn ʔnšyn mn hnwn dmšmšyn hww lh lmqdwnyʔ lṭymtʔws wlʔrsṭws hw dyn qwy zbnʔ bʔsyʔ 
19:23	hwʔ hwʔ dyn bhw zbnʔ šgwšyʔ sgyʔʔ ʕl ʔwrḥh dʔlhʔ
19:24	ʔyt hwʔ dyn tmn ʕbd sʔmʔ ḥd dšmh hwʔ dmṭryws dʕbd hwʔ nwsʔ dsʔmʔ lʔrṭmys wmwtr hwʔ lbny ʔwmnwth ywtrnʔ rbʔ
19:25	hnʔ knš ʔnwn lbny ʔwmnwth klhwn wlʔylyn dplḥyn ʕmhwn wʔmr lhwn gbrʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn dtʔgwrtn klh mn hnʔ hy pwlḥnʔ
19:26	wʔp ʔntwn šmʕyn ʔntwn wḥzyn ʔntwn dlʔ hwʔ blḥwd lbny ʔpsws ʔlʔ ʔp lswgʔʔ dklh ʔsyʔ ʔpys hnʔ pwlws wʔhpk kd ʔmr dlw ʔlhʔ ʔnwn hnwn dbʔydy bnynšʔ mtʕbdyn
19:27	wlw hdʔ ṣbwtʔ blḥwd mtprsyʔ wbṭlʔ ʔlʔ ʔp hw hyklʔ dʔrṭmys ʔlhtʔ rbtʔ mtḥšb lh ʔyk lʔ mdm wʔp hy ʔlhtʔ dklh ʔsyʔ wklhwn ʕmmʔ sgdyn lh mtšyṭʔ
19:28	wkd šmʕw hlyn ʔtmlyw ḥmtʔ wqʕyn hww wʔmryn rbʔ hy ʔrṭmys dʔpsyʔ
19:29	wʔštgšt klh mdyntʔ wrhṭw ʔkḥdʔ wʔzlw ltʔṭrwn wḥṭp wʔwblw ʕmhwn lgʔyws wlʔrsṭrkws gbrʔ mqdwnyʔ bny lwyth dpwlws
19:30	wpwlws ṣbʔ hwʔ dnʕwl ltʔṭrwn wklʔwhy tlmydʔ
19:31	wʔp ršʔ dʔsyʔ mṭl drḥmwhy hww šdrw bʕw mnh dlʔ ntl npšh dnʕwl ltʔṭrwn
19:32	knšʔ dyn dʔyt hww btʔṭrwn ṭb šgyšyn hww wʔḥrnʔ ʔḥrnytʔ qʕyn hww sgyʔʔ gyr mnhwn lʔ ydʕyn hww mṭl mnʔ ʔtknšw
19:33	ʕmʔ dyn dyhwdyʔ dʔyt hww tmn ʔqymw mnhwn lgbrʔ yhwdyʔ dšmh ʔlksndrws wkd qm ʔnyp ʔydh wṣbʔ hwʔ dnpwq rwḥʔ lʕmʔ
19:34	wkd ydʕw dyhwdyʔ hw qʕw klhwn bḥd qlʔ ʔyk šʕyn trtyn drbʔ hy ʔrṭmys dʔpsyʔ
19:35	wšly ʔnwn ršʔ dmdyntʔ kd ʔmr gbrʔ ʔpsyʔ mnw gyr mn bnynšʔ dlʔ ydʕ lmdyntʔ dʔpsyʔ dkwmrtʔ hy dʔrṭmys rbtʔ wlṣlmh dmn šmyʔ nḥt
19:36	mṭl hkyl dlwqbl hdʔ ʔnš lʔ mškḥ lmʔmr wlʔ lkwn dthwwn šlyn wlʔ tʕbdwn mdm bswrhbʔ
19:37	ʔytytwn gyr lgbrʔ hlyn kd lʔ hyklʔ ḥlṣw wlʔ ṣḥyw lʔlhtn
19:38	ʔn dyn hnʔ dmṭryws wbny ʔwmnwth ʔyt lhwn dynʔ ʕm ʔnš hʔ ʔntwpṭws bmdyntʔ ʔwmnʔ ʔnwn nqrbwn wndwnwn ḥd ʕm ḥd
19:39	wʔn hw dmdm ʔḥryn bʕyn ʔntwn bdwktʔ dyhybʔ mn nmwsʔ lknwšyʔ mštrʔ
19:40	mṭl dʔp hšʔ bqndynws qymynn dntršʔ ʔyk šgwšʔ dlʔ mškḥynn dnpwq rwḥʔ ʕl knšʔ dywmʔ hnʔ dʔtknšn bṭlʔyt wʔštgšn dlʔ ʕltʔ
19:41	wkd hlyn ʔmr šrʔ lknšʔ
20:01	wbtr dšly šgwšyʔ qrʔ pwlws ltlmydʔ wbyʔ ʔnwn wnšq ʔnwn wnpq ʔzl lh lmqdwnyʔ
20:02	wkd ʔtkrk ʔnwn lʔtrwtʔ hlyn wbyʔ ʔnwn bmlʔ sgyʔtʔ ʔtʔ lh lhls ʔtrʔ
20:03	whwʔ tmn tltʔ yrḥyn ʕbdw dyn ʕlwhy nklʔ yhwdyʔ kd ʕtyd hwʔ lmʔzl lswryʔ wʔtḥšb dnhpwk lh lmqdwnyʔ
20:04	wnpqw ʕmh ʕdmʔ lʔsyʔ swpṭrws dmn brwʔʔ mdyntʔ wʔrsṭrkws wsqwndws dmn tslwnyqʔ wgʔyws dmn drbʔ mdyntʔ wṭymtʔws dmn lwsṭrʔ wmn ʔsyʔ ṭwkyqws wṭrwpymws
20:05	hlyn ʔzlw qdmyn wqwyw ln bṭrwʔs
20:06	ḥnn dyn npqn mn pylypws mdyntʔ dmqdwnyʔ btr ywmtʔ dpṭyrʔ wrdyn bymʔ wʔtyn lṭrwʔs lywmtʔ ḥmšʔ whwyn tmn ywmtʔ šbʕʔ
20:07	wbywmʔ dḥd bšbʔ kd knyšynn dnqṣʔ ʔwkrsṭyʔ mmll hwʔ ʕmhwn pwlws mṭl dlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʕtyd hwʔ dnpwq lh wʔgr hwʔ lmmllw ʕdmʔ lplgh dllyʔ
20:08	wʔyt hwʔ tmn lmpʔdʔ dnwrʔ sgyʔʔ bʕlytʔ hy dknyšyn hwyn bh
20:09	wytb hwʔ ʕlymʔ ḥd dšmh hwʔ ʔwṭkws bkwtʔ wšmʕ wṭbʕ bšntʔ yqyrtʔ kd ʔgr hwʔ bmltʔ pwlws wbšnth npl hwʔ mn tltʔ mdyryn wʔštql kd myt
20:10	wnḥt pwlws npl lʕl mnh wʕpqh wʔmr lʔ ttzyʕwn mṭl dnpšh bh hy
20:11	kd slq dyn qṣʔ lḥmʔ wṭʕm whwʔ mmll ʕdmʔ dslq ṣprʔ whydyn npq dnʔzl bybšʔ
20:12	wdbrwhy lʕlymʔ kd ḥy wḥdyw bh rwrbʔyt
20:13	ḥnn dyn nḥtn lʔlpʔ wrdyn lwʕdʔ dtsws mṭl dmn tmn ʕtydyn hwyn dnqblywhy lpwlws hknʔ gyr pqd hwʔ ln kd ʔzl hwʔ hw bybšʔ
20:14	kd dyn qblnyhy mn tsws šqlnyhy bʔlpʔ wʔtyn lmyṭwlynʔ
20:15	wmn tmn lywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ rdyn lwqbl kyws gzrtʔ wtwb lywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔtyn lsmws wqwyn bṭrwglywn wlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔtyn lmylyṭws
20:16	psyq hwʔ lh gyr lpwlws dnʕbryh lʔpsws dlmʔ nštwḥr lh tmn mṭl dmsrhb hwʔ dʔn mškḥʔ ywmʔ dpnṭqwsṭʔ bʔwršlm nʕbdywhy
20:17	wmnh mn mylyṭws šdr ʔyty lqšyšʔ dʕdtʔ dʔpsws
20:18	wkd ʔtw lwth ʔmr lhwn ʔntwn ydʕyn ʔntwn dmn ywmʔ qdmyʔ dʕlt lʔsyʔ ʔyknʔ hwyt ʕmkwn klh zbnʔ
20:19	kd plḥ ʔnʔ lʔlhʔ bmkykwtʔ sgyʔtʔ wbdmʕʔ wbnsywnʔ ʔylyn dʕdyn hww ʕly bnklyhwn dyhwdyʔ
20:20	wlʔ bsyt bmdm dpqḥ hwʔ lnpštkwn dʔkrz lkwn wʔlp bšwqʔ wbbtʔ
20:21	kd mshd hwyt lyhwdyʔ wlʔrmyʔ ʕl tybwtʔ dlwt ʔlhʔ whymnwtʔ dbmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ 
20:22	whšʔ ʔnʔ ʔsyr ʔnʔ brwḥʔ wʔzl ʔnʔ lʔwršlm wlʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ mnʔ ʔrʕ ly bh
20:23	brm rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ bkl mdynʔ mshd ly wʔmr dʔswrʔ wʔwlṣnʔ ʕtydyn lk
20:24	ʔlʔ ly lʔ ḥšybʔ npšy mdm ʔyk dʔšlm rhṭy wtšmštʔ dqblt mn mrn yšwʕ dʔshd ʕl sbrtʔ dṭybwth dʔlhʔ
20:25	whšʔ ʔnʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ dtwb prṣwpy lʔ ḥzyn ʔntwn klkwn ʔylyn dʔtkrkt ʔkrzt lkwn mlkwtʔ
20:26	wmṭl hnʔ mshd ʔnʔ lkwn ywmʔ dywmnʔ ddkʔ ʔnʔ mn dmʔ dklkwn
20:27	lʔ gyr ʔštʔlt dʔwdʕkwn klh ṣbynh dʔlhʔ
20:28	ʔzdhrw hkyl bnpškwn wbklh mrʕytʔ hy dʔqymkwn bh rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ ʔpsqwpʔ dtrʕwn lʕdth dʔlhʔ hy dqnh bdmh
20:29	ʔnʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ dmn btr dʔzl ʔnʔ nʕlwn ʕmkwn dʔbʔ tqypʔ dlʔ ḥysyn ʕl mrʕytʔ
20:30	wʔp mnkwn dylkwn nqwmwn gbrʔ mmlly mʕqmtʔ ʔyk dnhpkwn ltlmydʔ dnʔzlwn btrhwn
20:31	mṭl hnʔ hwytwn ʕyryn wʕhydyn dšnyʔ tlt lʔ šlyt bllyʔ wbʔymmʔ kd bdmʕʔ mrtʔ ʔnʔ lʔnš ʔnš mnkwn
20:32	whšʔ mgʕl ʔnʔ lkwn lʔlhʔ wlmltʔ dṭybwth dhy mškḥʔ bnyʔ lkwn wyhbʔ lkwn ywrtnʔ ʕm klhwn qdyšʔ
20:33	kspʔ ʔw dhbʔ ʔw nḥtʔ lʔ rgt
20:34	wʔntwn ydʕyn ʔntwn dlsnyqwty wlʔylyn dʔyt ʕmy šmš hlyn ʔydy
20:35	wklmdm ḥwytkwn dhknʔ wlʔ lmlʔʔ wlmʔṣp dʔylyn dkryhyn wlmʕhdw mlwhy dmrn yšwʕ mṭl dhw ʔmr dṭwbwhy lʔynʔ dyhb ytyr mn ʔynʔ dnsb
20:36	wkd hlyn ʔmr qʕd ʕl bwrkwhy wṣly wklhwn ʔnšʔ ʕmh
20:37	whwt bktʔ rbtʔ bklhwn wʕpqwhy wmnšqyn hww lh
20:38	ytyrʔyt dyn mštnqyn hww ʕl hy mltʔ dʔmr dlʔ twb ʕtydyn dnḥzwn prṣwph wlwywhy ʕdmʔ lʔlpʔ
21:01	wpršn mnhwn wrdyn tryṣʔyt lqw gzrtʔ wlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔtyn lrwdws wmn tmn lpʔṭrʔ
21:02	wʔškḥn tmn ʔlpʔ dʔzlʔ lpwnyqʔ wslqn lh wrdyn
21:03	wmṭyn ʕdmʔ lwt qwprws gzrtʔ wšbqnh lsmlʔ wʔtyn lswryʔ wmn tmn mṭyn lṣwr tmn gyr ʔyt hwʔ lh lʔlpʔ lmnḥw ṭʕnh
21:04	wkd ʔškḥn tmn tlmydʔ qwyn lwthwn ywmtʔ šbʕʔ whlyn ʔmryn hww klywm lpwlws brwḥ dlʔ nʔzl lʔwršlm
21:05	wmn btr hlyn ywmtʔ npqn dnʔzl bʔwrḥʔ wmlwyn hww ln klhwn hnwn wnšyhwn wbnyhwn ʕdmʔ lbr mn mdyntʔ wqʕdw ʕl bwrkyhwn ʕl yd ymʔ wṣlyw
21:06	wnšqn lḥddʔ wslqn lʔlpʔ whpkw hnwn lbtyhwn
21:07	ḥnn dyn rdyn mn ṣwr wʔtyn lʕkw mdyntʔ wyhbn šlmʔ lʔḥʔ dtmn wšryn ṣʔdyhwn ywmʔ ḥd
21:08	wlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ npqn wʔtyn lqsryʔ wʕln šryn bbyth dpylypws msbrnʔ ʔynʔ dʔytwhy hwʔ mn šbʕʔ
21:09	wʔyt hwy lh bntʔ btwltʔ ʔrbʕ dmtnbyn hwy
21:10	wkd ʔytyn tmn ywmtʔ sgyʔʔ nḥt hwʔ mn yhwd nbyʔ ḥd dšmh hwʔ ʔgbws
21:11	wʕl lwtn wšql ʕrqtʔ dḥṣwhy dpwlws wʔsr rglʔ dnpšh wʔydwhy wʔmr hknʔ ʔmr rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ dgbrʔ mrh hdʔ hknʔ nʔsrwnh yhwdyʔ bʔwršlm wnšlmwnh bʔydy ʕmmʔ
21:12	wkd hlyn mlʔ šmʕn bʕyn mnh ḥnn wbny ʔtrʔ dlʔ nʔzl lʔwršlm
21:13	hydyn ʕnʔ wʔmr pwlws mnʔ ʕbdyn ʔntwn dbkyn ʔntwn wšḥqyn ʔntwn lh llby ʔnʔ gyr lʔ hwʔ dʔtʔsr blḥwd mṭyb ʔnʔ ʔlʔ ʔp dʔmwt bʔwršlm ḥlp šmh dmrn yšwʕ
21:14	wkd lʔ ʔtṭpys ln bhln ln wʔmrn dṣbynh dmrn nhwʔ
21:15	wbtr ywmtʔ hlyn ʔtṭybn wslqn ln lʔwršlm
21:16	wʔtw hww ʕmn ʔnšʔ tlmydʔ mn qsryʔ kd dbyryn ʕmhwn ʔḥʔ ḥd mn tlmydʔ qdmyʔ dšmh hwʔ mnswn wʔytwhy hwʔ mn qwprws dnqbln bbyth
21:17	wkd ʔtyn lʔwršlm qblwn ʔḥʔ ḥdyʔyt
21:18	wlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʕln ʕm pwlws lwt yʕqwb kd ʔyt hwʔ lwth klhwn qšyšʔ
21:19	wyhbn lhwn šlmʔ wmštʕʔ hwʔ lhwn pwlws btr btr klmʔ dʕbd ʔlhʔ bʕmmʔ btšmšth
21:20	wkd šmʕw šbḥw lʔlhʔ wʔmrw lh ḥzʔ ʔnt ʔḥwn kmʔ rbwn ʔyt byhwd ʔylyn dhymnw wklhwn hlyn ṭnnʔ ʔnwn dnmwsʔ
21:21	ʔtʔmr lhwn dyn ʕlyk dmlp ʔnt dnprqwn mn mwšʔ klhwn yhwdyʔ dbʕmmʔ kd ʔmr ʔnt dlʔ nhwwn gzryn bnyhwn wlʔ bʕydʔ dnmwsʔ nhwwn mhlkyn
21:22	mṭl hkyl dmštmʕʔ hy lhwn dʔtyt lkʔ
21:23	ʕbd mdm dʔmrynn lk ʔyt ln gbrʔ ʔrbʕʔ dndyr lhwn dntdkwn
21:24	dbr ʔnwn wzl ʔtdkʔ ʕmhwn wʔpq ʕlyhwn npqtʔ ʔyk dngrʕwn ršyhwn wmtydʕʔ lklnš dmdm dʔtʔmr ʕlyk dgl hw wʔnt lnmwsʔ šlm ʔnt wnṭr
21:25	ʕl ʔylyn dyn dhymnw mn ʕmmʔ ḥnn ktbn dnhwwn nṭryn npšhwn mn ddbyḥʔ wmn znywtʔ wmn ḥnyqʔ wmn dmʔ
21:26	hydyn pwlws dbr ʔnwn lgbrʔ hlyn lywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ wʔtdky ʕmhwn wʕl ʔzl lhyklʔ kd mwdʕ lhwn mwlyʔ dywmtʔ dtdkytʔ ʕdmʔ dʔtqrb qwrbnʔ dʔnš ʔnš mnhwn 
21:27	wkd mṭy ywmʔ dšbʕʔ yhwdyʔ dmn ʔsyʔ ḥzʔwhy bhyklʔ wgryw ʕlwhy ʕmʔ klh wʔrmyw ʕlwhy ʔydyʔ
21:28	kd mbgnyn wʔmryn gbrʔ bny ʔysryl ʕdrw hnʔ hw gbrʔ dlwqbl ʕmʔ dyln mlp bkl dwkʔ wlwqbl nmwsʔ wlwqbl ʔtrʔ hnʔ wʔp lʔrmyʔ ʔʕl lhyklʔ wsybh lʔtrʔ hnʔ qdyšʔ
21:29	qdmw hww gyr ḥzw ʕmh lṭrwpyms ʔpsyʔ bmdyntʔ wsbryn hww dʕm pwlws ʕl lhyklʔ
21:30	wʔštgšt klh mdyntʔ wʔtknšw klh ʕmʔ wʔḥdwhy lpwlws wgrwhy lbr mn hyklʔ wbr šʕth ʔttḥdw trʕʔ
21:31	wkd bʕʔ hwʔ knšʔ lmqṭlh ʔštmʕt lklyrkʔ dʔspyr dklh mdyntʔ ʔttzyʕt lh
21:32	wbr šʕth dbr lqnṭrwnʔ wlʔsṭrṭywṭʔ sgyʔʔ wrhṭw ʕlyhwn wkd ḥzw lklyrkʔ wlʔsṭrṭywṭʔ bhlw mn dmḥyn hww lh lpwlws
21:33	wqrb lwth klyrkʔ wʔḥdh wpqd dnʔsrwnh btrtyn ššln wmšʔl hwʔ ʕlwhy dmnw wmnʔ ʕbd
21:34	wqʕyn hww ʕlwhy ʔnšʔ mn ʔklws mdm mdm wmṭl qʕthwn lʔ mškḥ hwʔ lmdʕ ʔydʔ hy šryrtʔ wpqd hwʔ dnwblwnh lmšrytʔ
21:35	wkd mṭy pwlws ldrgʔ ṭʕnwhy ʔsṭrṭywṭʔ mṭl qṭyrʔ dʕmʔ
21:36	ʔtʔ hwʔ gyr btrh ʕmʔ sgyʔʔ wqʕyn hww wʔmryn šqwlyhy
21:37	wkd mṭy lmʕl lmšrytʔ hw pwlws ʔmr lklyrkʔ ʔn mps ʔnt ly ʔmll ʕmk hw dyn ʔmr lh ywnʔyt ydʕ ʔnt
21:38	lʔ hwyt ʔnt hw mṣryʔ dqdm ywmtʔ hlyn ʔzyʕt wʔpqt lmdbrʔ ʔrbʕʔ ʔlpyn gbrʔ ʕbdy byštʔ
21:39	ʔmr lh pwlws ʔnʔ gbrʔ ʔnʔ yhwdyʔ mn ṭrsws dqylyqyʔ mdyntʔ ydyʕtʔ dbh ylyd ʔnʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnk ʔps ly lmmllw lʕmʔ
21:40	wkd ʔps lh qm pwlws ʕl drgʔ wʔzyʕ hwʔ lhwn ʔydh wkd bhlw mll ʕmhwn ʕbrʔyt wʔmr lhwn
22:01	ʔḥʔ wʔbhtʔ šmʕw mpq brwḥ dlwtkwn
22:02	wkd šmʕw dʕbrʔyt mmll hwʔ ʕmhwn ytyrʔyt bhlw wʔmr lhwn
22:03	ʔnʔ gbrʔ ʔnʔ yhwdyʔ wylyd ʔnʔ bṭrsws dqylyqyʔ ʔtrbyt dyn bhdʔ mdyntʔ ʕl gnb rglwhy dgmlyʔyl wʔtrdyt gmyrʔyt bnmwsʔ dʔbhtn wʔyty hwyt ṭnnʔ dʔlhʔ ʔyk mʔ dʔp ʔntwn klkwn ʔytykwn
22:04	wlhdʔ ʔwrḥʔ rdpt ʕdmʔ lmwtʔ kd ʔsr hwyt wmšlm hwyt lbyt ʔsyrʔ gbrʔ wnšʔ
22:05	ʔyk mʔ dshd ʕly rb khnʔ wklhwn qšyšʔ dmnhwn qblt ʔgrtʔ dʔzl lwt ʔḥʔ dbdrmswq dʔp lhnwn dʔyt hww tmn ʔytʔ ʔnwn lʔwršlm kd ʔsyryn wnqblwn msm bršʔ
22:06	wkd ʔzl hwyt wšryt mmṭʔ ʔnʔ ldrmswq bplgh dywmʔ mn tḥyt šlyʔ mn šmyʔ ʔzlg ʕly nwhrʔ sgyʔʔ
22:07	wnplt ʕl ʔrʕʔ wšmʕt qlʔ dʔmr hwʔ ly šʔwl šʔwl mnʔ rdp ʔnt ly
22:08	ʔnʔ dyn ʕnyt wʔmrt mn ʔnt mry whw ʔmr ly ʔnʔ hw yšwʕ nṣryʔ dʔnt rdp ʔnt
22:09	wʔnšʔ dʔyt hww ʕmy ḥzw nwhrʔ qlʔ dyn lʔ šmʕw dhw dmmll hwʔ ʕmy
22:10	wʔmrt mnʔ ʔʕbd mry wmrn ʔmr ly qwm zl ldrmswq wtmn ntmll ʕmk ʕl kl mdm dmtpqd lk dtʕbd
22:11	wkd lʔ mtḥzʔ hwʔ ly mṭl tšbwḥth dnwhrʔ hw ʔḥdwny bʔydy hnwn dʕmy hww wʕlt ldrmswq
22:12	wgbrʔ ḥd ḥnnyʔ kʔnʔ bnmwsʔ ʔyk dshdyn hww ʕlwhy klhwn yhwdyʔ dtmn
22:13	ʔtʔ lwty wʔmr ly šʔwl ʔḥy ptḥ ʕynyk wbh bšʕtʔ ʔtptḥ ʕyny wḥrt bh
22:14	wʔmr ly ʔlhʔ dʔbhtn ʔqymk lmdʕ ṣbynh wtḥzʔ lzdyqʔ wtšmʕ qlʔ mn pwmh
22:15	wthwʔ lh shdʔ lwt klhwn bnynšʔ ʕl kwl mʔ dḥzyt wšmʕt
22:16	whšʔ mnʔ mštwḥr ʔnt qwm ʕmd wʔtdkʔ mn ḥṭhyk kd qrʔ ʔnt šmh
22:17	whpkt ʔtyt lkʔ lʔwršlm wṣlyt bhyklʔ
22:18	wḥzyth bḥzwʔ kd ʔmr ly ʔstrhb wpwq lk mn ʔwršlm mṭl dlʔ mqblyn shdwtk dʕly
22:19	wʔnʔ ʔmrt mry ʔp hnwn ydʕyn dʔnʔ mšlm hwyt lbyt ʔsyrʔ wmḥʔ hwyt bkl knwšn lʔylyn dmhymnyn hww bk
22:20	wkd mtʔšd hwʔ dmh dʔsṭpns shdk wʔp ʔnʔ ʕmhwn qʔm hwyt wšlm hwyt lṣbynhwn dqṭwlwhy wnṭr hwyt mʔnʔ dʔylyn drgmyn hww lh
22:21	wʔmr ly zl dʔnʔ mšdr ʔnʔ lk lrwḥqʔ lmkrzw lʕmmʔ
22:22	wkd šmʕwhy lpwlws ʕdmʔ lhdʔ mltʔ ʔrymw qlhwn wqʕw nštql mn ʔrʕʔ ʔynʔ dhknʔ hw lʔ gyr wlʔ lh lmḥʔ
22:23	wkd mbgnyn hww wmšdyn hww mʔnyhwn wmsqyn hww ḥlʔ lšmyʔ
22:24	pqd klyrkʔ dnʕlwnh lmšrytʔ wpqd dbngdʔ nštʔl ʔyk dndʕ mṭl ʔydʔ ʕltʔ qʕyn hww ʕlwhy
22:25	wkd mtḥwhy bʕrqʔ ʔmr hw pwlws lqnṭrwnʔ dqʔm hwʔ ʕlwhy mps lkwn dlgbrʔ rhwmyʔ dlʔ mḥyb dtngdwn
22:26	wkd šmʕ qnṭrwnʔ qrb lwt klyrkʔ wʔmr lh mnʔ ʕbd ʔnt hnʔ gyr gbrʔ rhwmyʔ hw
22:27	wqrb lwth klyrkʔ wʔmr lh ʔmr ly ʔnt rhwmyʔ ʔnt wʔmr lh ʔyn
22:28	wʕnʔ klyrkʔ wʔmr ʔnʔ bkspʔ sgyʔʔ qnyth lrhwmywtʔ ʔmr lh pwlws ʔnʔ dyn ʔp bh ʔtyldt
22:29	wmḥdʔ prqw lhwn mnh hnwn dbʕyn hww lmngdwth wdḥl klyrkʔ kd ylp drhwmyʔ hw ʕl dpkrh hwʔ 
22:30	wlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ ṣbʔ hwʔ lmdʕ šryrʔyt dmnʔ hy qṭgrnwtʔ dmytyn hww ʕlwhy yhwdyʔ wšryhy wpqd dnʔtwn rby khnʔ wklh knšʔ dršyhwn wdbr lpwlws wʔḥt ʔqymh bynthwn
23:01	wkd ḥr pwlws bknšhwn ʔmr gbrʔ ʔḥy ʔnʔ bkl tʔrtʔ ṭbtʔ ʔtdbrt qdm ʔlhʔ ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
23:02	wḥnnyʔ khnʔ pqd lhnwn dqymyn ʕl gbh dnmḥwnh lpwlws ʕl pwmh
23:03	wpwlws ʔmr lh ʕtyd hw ʔlhʔ dnmḥyk ʔstʔ mḥwrtʔ wʔnt ytb ʔnt dʔn ʔnt ly ʔyk dbnmwsʔ kd ʕbr ʔnt ʕl nmwsʔ wpqd ʔnt dnmḥwnny
23:04	wʔylyn dqymyn hww tmn ʔmryn lh lkhnʔ dʔlhʔ mṣḥʔ ʔnt
23:05	ʔmr lhwn pwlws lʔ ydʕ hwyt ʔḥy dkhnʔ hw ktyb hw gyr dlršʔ dʕmk lʔ tlwṭ
23:06	wkd ydʕ pwlws dmnh dʕmʔ ʔytwhy dzdwqyʔ wmnh dpryšʔ qʕʔ hwʔ bknšʔ gbrʔ ʔḥy ʔnʔ pryšʔ ʔnʔ br pryšʔ wʕl sbrʔ dqymtʔ dmytʔ mtdyn ʔnʔ
23:07	wkd hdʔ ʔmr nplw ḥd bḥd pryšʔ wzdwqyʔ wʔtplg ʕmʔ
23:08	zdwqyʔ gyr ʔmryn dlyt qymtʔ wlʔ mlʔkʔ wlʔ rwḥʔ pryšʔ dyn mwdyn bklhyn
23:09	whwʔ qlʔ rbʔ wqmw ʔnšʔ sprʔ mn gbʔ dpryšʔ wnṣyn hww ʕmhwn wʔmryn lʔ mškḥynn mdm dbyš bhnʔ gbrʔ ʔn dyn rwḥʔ ʔw mlʔkʔ mll ʕmh mnʔ ʔyt bh bhdʔ
23:10	wkd hwʔ šgwšyʔ rbʔ bynthwn dḥl hwʔ klyrkʔ dlmʔ npšḥwnh lpwlws wšlḥ lrhwmyʔ dnʔtwn nḥṭpwnh mn mṣʕthwn wnʕlwnh lmšrytʔ
23:11	wkd hwʔ llyʔ ʔtḥzy lh mrn lpwlws wʔmr lh ʔtḥyl mṭl dʔyk dʔshdt ʕly bʔwršlm hknʔ ʕtyd ʔnt dʔp brhwmʔ tshd
23:12	wkd hwʔ ṣprʔ ʔtknšw hww ʔnšyn mn yhwdyʔ wʔḥrmw ʕlyhwn dlʔ nʔklwn wlʔ nštwn ʕdmʔ dnqṭlwnh lpwlws
23:13	hwyn hww dyn hnwn dʔqymw bmwmtʔ hnʔ qymʔ ytyr mn ʔrbʕyn gbryn
23:14	wʔtqrbw lwt khnʔ wlwt qšyšʔ wʔmryn hww dḥrmʔ ʔḥrmn ʕlyn dmdm lʔ nṭʕm ʕdmʔ dnqṭwl lpwlws
23:15	whšʔ bʕw ʔntwn wršʔ dknwštʔ mn klyrkʔ dnytywhy lwtkwn ʔyk bʕyn ʔntwn dtbṣwn šryrʔyt swʕrnh wḥnn mṭybynn dnqṭlywhy ʕdlʔ nmṭʔ lwtkwn
23:16	wšmʕ hwʔ br ḥth dpwlws ʔprsnʔ hnʔ wʕl lmšrytʔ wbdq lpwlws
23:17	wšdr pwlws qrʔ lḥd mn qnṭrwnʔ wʔmr lh ʔwbl lʕlymʔ hnʔ lwt klyrkʔ ʔyt lh gyr mdm dnʔmr lh
23:18	wdbrh qnṭrwnʔ lʕlymʔ wʔʕlh lwt klyrkʔ wʔmr pwlws ʔsyrʔ qrny wbʕʔ mny dʔytʔ hnʔ ʕlymʔ lwtk dʔyt lh mdm dnʔmr lk
23:19	wʔḥdh bʔydh klyrkʔ lʕlymʔ wngdh lḥd gbʔ wmšʔl hwʔ lh dmnʔ ʔyt lk dtʔmr ly
23:20	wʔmr lh ʕlymʔ yhwdyʔ ʔtḥšbw dnbʕwn mnk dtḥt lpwlws mḥr lknšhwn ʔyk ṣbyn mdm ytyr dnʔlpwn mnh
23:21	ʔnt hkyl lʔ ttṭpys lhwn hʔ gyr ytyr mn ʔrbʕyn gbryn mnhwn nṭryn lh bkmʔnʔ wʔḥrmw ʕl npšhwn dlʔ nʔklwn wlʔ nštwn ʕdmʔ dnqṭlwnh whʔ mṭybyn wmqwyn lšwwdyk
23:22	wšryhy klyrkʔ lʕlymʔ kd pqdh dʔnš lʔ ndʕ dhlyn bdqt ly
23:23	wqrʔ ltryn qnṭrwnyn wʔmr lhwn zlw ʕtdw rhwmyʔ mʔtyn dnʔzlwn lqsryʔ wpršʔ šbʕyn wšdyy bymynʔ mʔtyn dnpqwn mn tlt šʕyn bllyʔ
23:24	ṭybw dyn ʔp bʕyrʔ ʔyk dnrkbwn lpwlws wnplṭwnh lwt pylks hgmwnʔ
23:25	wktb ʔgrtʔ yhb lhwn dʔyt bh hknʔ
23:26	qlwdyws lwsyws lpylks hgmwnʔ nṣyḥʔ šlm
23:27	lgbrʔ hnʔ ʔḥdw yhwdyʔ ʔyk dnqṭlwnh wqmt ʔnʔ ʕm rhwmyʔ wprqth kd ylpt drhwmyʔ hw
23:28	wkd bʕʔ hwyt lmdʕ ʕltʔ dmṭlth ršyn hww lh ʔḥtth lknšhwn
23:29	wʔškḥt dʕl zṭmʔ dnmwshwn ršyn hww lh wʕltʔ dšwyʔ lʔswrʔ ʔw lmwtʔ lyt hwʔ lwth
23:30	wkd ʔtbdq ly nklʔ bkmʔnʔ dʕbdw ʕlwhy yhwdyʔ mḥdʔ šdrth lwtk wpqdt lqṭgrnwhy dnʔtwn wnʔmrwn ʕmh qdmyk hwy ḥlym
23:31	hydyn rhwmyʔ ʔyk dʔtpqdw dbrwhy lpwlws bllyʔ wʔytywhy lʔnṭypṭrs mdyntʔ
23:32	wlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ šrw pršʔ lrglʔ ḥbryhwn dnhpkwn lmšrytʔ
23:33	wʔytywhy lqsryʔ wyhbw ʔgrtʔ lhgmwnʔ wʔqymwhy qdmwhy lpwlws
23:34	wkd qrʔ ʔgrtʔ mšʔl hwʔ lh dmn ʔydʔ hwprkyʔ ʔytwhy wkd ylp dmn qylyqyʔ
23:35	ʔmr lh šmʕ ʔnʔ lk mʔ dʔtw qṭgrnyk wpqd dnṭrwnh bprṭwryn dhrwds 
24:01	wmn btr ywmtʔ ḥmšʔ nḥt ḥnnyʔ rb khnʔ ʕm qšyšʔ wʕm ṭrṭlws rhṭrʔ wʔwdʕw lhgmwnʔ ʕl pwlws
24:02	wkd ʔtqry ʔqp hwʔ ṭrṭlws mqṭrg lh wʔmr bswgʔʔ dšynʔ ʕmrynn mṭltk wtqntʔ sgyʔtʔ hwy lʕmʔ hnʔ bšqlṭʕnk
24:03	wkln bkl dwk mqblynn ṭybwtk nṣyḥʔ pylks
24:04	dlʔ dyn nlʔyk bsgyʔtʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnk dtšmʕ lmkykwtn bpsyqtʔ
24:05	ʔškḥn gyr lgbrʔ hnʔ dʔytwhy mšḥṭnʔ wmʕyr šgwšyʔ lklhwn yhwdyʔ dbklh ʔrʕʔ ršʔ hw gyr dywlpnʔ dnṣryʔ
24:06	wlhykln ṣbʔ lmsybw wkd ʔḥdnyhy bʕyn dndwnywhy ʔyk
24:07	ʔtʔ dyn lwsyws klyrkʔ wbqṭyrʔ sgyʔʔ mn ʔydyn ʔʕdyh wlk šdrh
24:08	wpqd lqṭrgnwhy dnʔtwn lwtk wmškḥ ʔnt kd mšʔl ʔnt lh dtʔlp mnh ʕl klhyn hlyn dmqṭrgynn lh
24:09	ʔrybw dyn ʕlwhy ʔp hnwn yhwdyʔ kd ʔmryn dhlyn hknʔ ʔnyn
24:10	wrmz hgmwnʔ lpwlws dnmll wʕnʔ pwlws wʔmr mn šnyʔ sgyʔtʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ dʔytyk dynʔ dʕmʔ hnʔ wmṭl hnʔ ḥdyʔyt npq ʔnʔ rwḥʔ ʕl ʔpy npšy
24:11	kd mškḥ ʔnt lmdʕ dlyt ly ytyr mn trʕsr ywmyn dslqt lʔwršlm lmsgd
24:12	wlʔ ʔškḥwny dmmll ʔnʔ ʕm ʔnš bhyklʔ wʔplʔ knšʔ dknš ʔnʔ lʔ bknwšthwn wlʔ bmdyntʔ
24:13	wlʔ dnḥwwn mṭyʔ bʔydyhwn qdmyk ʕl mdm dhšʔ mqṭrgyn ly
24:14	brm dyn hdʔ mwdʔ ʔnʔ dbh bhnʔ ywlpnʔ dʔmryn bh plḥ ʔnʔ lʔlhʔ dʔbhy kd mhymn ʔnʔ lklhyn dktybn bnmwsʔ wbnbyʔ
24:15	wkd ʔyt ly sbrʔ ʕl ʔlhʔ ʔynʔ dʔp hnwn hlyn msbryn dʕtydʔ dthwʔ qymtʔ dmn byt mytʔ dkʔnʔ wdʕwlʔ
24:16	mṭl hnʔ ʔp ʕml ʔnʔ dtʔrtʔ dkytʔ thwʔ ly qdm ʔlhʔ wqdm bny ʔnšʔ ʔmynʔyt
24:17	lšnyn dyn sgyʔn ʔtyt lwt bny ʕmʔ dyly dʔtl zdqtʔ wʔqrb qwrbnʔ
24:18	wʔškḥwny hlyn bhyklʔ kd mdky ʔnʔ lʔ ʕm knšʔ ʔplʔ bšgwšyʔ
24:19	ʔlʔ ʔn dšgšw ʔnšyn yhwdyʔ dʔtw mn ʔsyʔ ʔylyn dwlʔ hwʔ dnqwmwn ʕmy qdmyk wnqṭrgwn mdm dʔyt lhwn
24:20	ʔw hnwn hlyn nʔmrwn mnʔ ʔškḥw by sklwtʔ kd qmt qdm knšhwn
24:21	ʔlʔ ʔn hdʔ ḥdʔ mltʔ dqʕyt kd qʔm ʔnʔ bynthwn dʕl qymtʔ dmytʔ mtdyn ʔnʔ ywmnʔ qdmykwn
24:22	pylks dyn mṭl dydʕ hwʔ lh lʔwrḥʔ hdʔ mlyʔyt thy ʔnwn kd ʔmr dmʔ dʔtʔ klyrkʔ šmʕ ʔnʔ byntkwn
24:23	wpqd lqnṭrwnʔ dnṭrywhy lpwlws bnyḥʔ wdlʔ ʔnš mn ydwʕwhy ntklʔ dnhwʔ mšmš lh
24:24	wmn btr qlyl ywmtʔ šdr pylks wdwrslʔ ʔntth dʔytyh hwt yhwdytʔ wqrw lh lpwlws wšmʕw mnh ʕl hymnwtʔ dmšyḥʔ
24:25	wkd mmll ʕmhwn ʕl zdyqwtʔ wʕl qdyšwtʔ wʕl dynʔ dʕtyd ʔtmly dḥltʔ pylks wʔmr dhšʔ zl wʔmty dnhwʔ ly ʔtrʔ ʔšdr btrk
24:26	sbr hwʔ gyr dšwḥdʔ mtyhb hwʔ lh mn pwlws mṭl hdʔ ʔp ʔmynʔyt mšdr hwʔ mytʔ lh wmmll ʕmh
24:27	wkd mly lh trtyn šnyn ʔḥrnʔ hgmwnʔ ʔtʔ hwʔ ldwkth dmtqrʔ hwʔ prqyws phsṭws pylks dyn ʔyk dnʕbd ṭybwtʔ byhwdyʔ šbqh lpwlws kd ʔsyr
25:01	wkd ʔtʔ phsṭws lqsryʔ btr tltʔ ywmyn slq lʔwršlm
25:02	wʔwdʕwhy rby khnʔ wršʔ dyhwdyʔ ʕl pwlws wbʕyn hww mnh
25:03	kd šʔlyn lh hdʔ ṭybwtʔ dnšdr nytywhy lʔwršlm kd ʕbdyn hww kmʔnʔ bʔwrḥʔ dnqṭlwnyhy
25:04	wphsṭws pny ptgmʔ dpwlws mtnṭr bqsryʔ wʔnʔ msrhb ʔnʔ dʔḥzwq
25:05	ʔylyn hkyl dʔyt bkwn dmṭyʔ bʔydyhwn nḥtwn ʕmn wʕl kl sklw dʔyt bh bgbrʔ nqṭrgwn
25:06	wkd hwʔ tmn ywmtʔ tmnyʔ ʔw ʕsrʔ nḥt lh lqsryʔ wlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ ytb ʕl bym wpqd dnytwn lpwlws
25:07	wkd ʔtʔ ḥdrwhy yhwdyʔ dnḥtw mn ʔwršlm wršʔ sgyʔʔ wqšyʔ mytyn hww btrh ʔylyn dlʔ mškḥyn hww dnḥwwn
25:08	wkd pwlws npq hwʔ rwḥʔ dlʔ ʔskl mdm lʔ bnmwsʔ dyhwdyʔ wlʔ bhyklʔ wlʔ bqsr
25:09	phsṭws dyn mṭl dṣbʔ hwʔ dnršʔ ṭybwtʔ byhwdyʔ ʔmr lh lpwlws ṣbʔ ʔnt dtsq lʔwršlm wtmn ʕl hlyn ttdyn qdmy
25:10	ʕnʔ pwlws wʔmr ʕl bym dqsr qʔm ʔnʔ hrkʔ hw zdq ly lmtdnw lʔ mdm ḥṭyt lyhwdyʔ ʔyk dʔp ʔnt ydʕ ʔnt
25:11	wʔn sklwtʔ ʕbydʔ ly ʔw mdm dšwʔ lmwtʔ lʔ mštʔl ʔnʔ mn mwtʔ ʔn dyn lyt mdm ṣʔdy mn hlyn dmqṭrgyn ly lʔ ʔnš yhb ly lhwn mwhbt bgnwhy dqsr qrʔ ʔnʔ
25:12	hydyn phsṭws mll ʕm bny mlkh wʔmr bgn qsr qryt lwt qsr ʔzl ʔnt 
25:13	wkd hww ywmtʔ nḥt ʔgrpws mlkʔ wbrnyqʔ lqsryʔ dnšʔlwn šlmh dphsṭws
25:14	wkd hww lwth ywmtʔ ʔštʕy phsṭws lmlkʔ dynh dpwlws kd ʔmr gbrʔ ḥd ʔsyrʔ ʔštbq mn ʔydy pylks
25:15	wkd hwyt bʔwršlm ʔwdʕw ly ʕlwhy rby khnʔ wqšyšʔ dyhwdyʔ wbʕw dʔʕbd lhwn dynʔ mnh
25:16	wʔmrt lhwn dlyt ʕydʔ lrhwmyʔ dntlwn brnšʔ mwhbt lqṭlʔ ʕdmʔ dnʔtʔ bʕl dynh wnksywhy bʔpwhy wntyhb lh ʔtrʔ lmpq brwḥʔ ʕl mʔ dmtršʔ
25:17	wkd ʔtyt lkʔ dlʔ twhyʔ lywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ ytbt ʕl bym wpqdt dnytwnyhy ly lgbrʔ
25:18	wqmw ʕmh qṭrgnwhy wlʔ ʔškḥw mdm ršynʔ byšʔ dnḥwwn ʕlwhy ʔyk mʔ dsbr hwyt
25:19	zṭmʔ dyn mdm mdm ʕl dḥlthwn ʔyt hwʔ lhwn lwth wʕl yšwʕ dmyt hw dʔmr hwʔ pwlws dḥy hw
25:20	wmṭl dlʔ qʔm hwyt ʔnʔ ʕl bʕtʔ dhlyn ʔmrt hwyt lpwlws dʔn bʕʔ ʔnt dtʔzl lʔwršlm wtmn ttdyn ʕl hlyn
25:21	hw dyn bʕʔ dntnṭr ldynh dqsr wpqdt dntnṭr ʕdmʔ dʔšdrywhy lwt qsr
25:22	wʔmr ʔgrpws ṣbʔ hwyt dʔšmʕywhy lgbrʔ hnʔ wphsṭws ʔmr dlmḥr šmʕ ʔnt lh
25:23	wlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔtʔ ʔgrpws wbrnyqʔ bzwḥʔ sgyʔʔ wʕl lbytdynʔ ʕm klyrkʔ wršʔ dmdyntʔ wpqd phsṭws wʔtʔ pwlws
25:24	wʔmr phsṭws ʔgrpws mlkʔ wklkwn gbrʔ dʔytykwn ʕmn ʕl hnʔ gbrʔ dḥzyn ʔntwn klh ʕmʔ dyhwdyʔ qblny bʔwršlm whrkʔ kd qʕyn dlʔ twb wlʔ lhnʔ dnḥʔ
25:25	ʔnʔ dyn ʔdrkt dmdm dšwʔ lmwtʔ lʔ sʕyr lh wmṭl dhw bʕʔ dntnṭr ldynh dqsr pqdt dnštdr
25:26	wlʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ mnʔ ʔktwb ʕlwhy lqsr mṭl hnʔ ṣbyt lmytywth qdmykwn wytyrʔyt qdmyk mlkʔ ʔgrpʔ dmʔ dʔštʔl dynh ʔškḥ mnʔ ʔktwb
25:27	lʔ gyr wlʔ dkd mšdrynn gbrʔ ʔsyrʔ dlʔ nktwb sklwth
26:01	wʔmr ʔgrpws lpwlws mps lk lmmllw ʕl ʔpy npšk hydyn pwlws pšṭ ʔydh wnpq hwʔ rwḥʔ wʔmr
26:02	ʕl kl mʔ dmtršʔ ʔnʔ mn yhwdyʔ mlkʔ ʔgrpʔ sbr ʔnʔ ʕl npšy dṭwbnʔ ʔnʔ dqdmyk ywmnʔ npq ʔnʔ rwḥʔ
26:03	ytyrʔyt dydʕ ʔnʔ dmps ʔnt bklhwn zṭmʔ wnmwsʔ dyhwdyʔ mṭl hnʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnk dbmgrt rwḥʔ tšmʕny
26:04	ydʕyn ʔnwn gyr ʔp hnwn yhwdyʔ ʔn ṣbyn dnshdwn dwbry dmn ṭlywty dhww ly mn šwryʔ bʕmy wbʔwršlm
26:05	mṭl dmn nwgrʔ mpsyn by wydʕyn dbywlpnʔ ršyʔ dpryšʔ ḥyyt
26:06	whšʔ ʕl sbrʔ dšwwdyʔ dhwʔ hwʔ lʔbhtn mn ʔlhʔ qʔm ʔnʔ wmtdyn ʔnʔ
26:07	dʕl hnʔ sbrʔ trtʕsrʔ šrbn msbrn dnmnʕn bṣlwtʔ ḥpyṭtʔ dʔymmʔ wdllyʔ wʕlwhy ʕl hnʔ sbrʔ mtršʔ ʔnʔ mn ʔydy yhwdyʔ mlkʔ ʔgrpʔ
26:08	mnʔ dynyn ʔntwn lʔ wlʔ dnhymn dmqym ʔlhʔ mytʔ
26:09	ʔnʔ gyr mn qdym smt brʕyny dsqwblʔ sgyʔʔ ʔsʕwr lwqbl šmh dyšwʕ nṣryʔ
26:10	hdʔ dʕbdt ʔp bʔwršlm wqdyšʔ sgyʔʔ ʔrmyt byt ʔsyrʔ bšwlṭnʔ dqblt mn rby khnʔ wkd mtqṭlyn hww mnhwn ʔštwtpt lʔylyn dḥybw ʔnwn
26:11	wbkl knwšʔ mštnd hwyt bhwn kd ʔlṣ hwyt dnhwwn mgdpyn bšmh dyšwʕ wbrwgzʔ sgyʔʔ dmlʔ hwyt ʕlyhwn ʔp lmdyntʔ ʔḥrnytʔ npq hwyt lmrdp ʔnwn
26:12	wkd ʔzl hwyt mṭl hdʔ ldrmswq bšwlṭnʔ wbmpsnwtʔ drbykhnʔ
26:13	bplgh dywmʔ bʔwrḥʔ ḥzyt mn šmyʔ ʔw mlkʔ dʔzlg ʕly wʕl kl dʕmy hww nwhrʔ dmytr mn dšmšʔ
26:14	wnpln kln ʕl ʔrʕʔ wšmʕt qlʔ kd ʔmr ly ʕbrʔyt šʔwl šʔwl mnʔ rdp ʔnt ly qšʔ hw lk lmbʕṭw lʕwqsʔ
26:15	wʔnʔ ʔmrt mn ʔnt mry wmrn ʔmr ly ʔnʔ hw yšwʕ nṣryʔ dʔnt rdp ʔnt
26:16	wʔmr ly qwm ʕl rglyk mṭl hdʔ gyr ʔtḥzyt lk dʔqymk mšmšnʔ wshdʔ dmdm dḥzytny wdʕtyd ʔnt dtḥzyny
26:17	wʔpṣyk mn ʕmʔ dyhwdyʔ wmn ʕmmʔ ʔḥrnʔ dlwthwn mšdr ʔnʔ lk
26:18	dtptḥ ʕynyhwn ʔyk dnhpkwn mn ḥšwkʔ lnhyrʔ wmn šwlṭnh dsṭnʔ lwt ʔlhʔ wnqblwn šwbqn ḥṭhʔ wpsʔ ʕm qdyšʔ bhymnwtʔ dby
26:19	mṭl hdʔ mlkʔ ʔgrpʔ lʔ qmt bḥrynʔ lwqbl ḥzwʔ šmynʔ
26:20	ʔlʔ ʔkrzt mn lqwdmyn lhnwn dbdrmswq wlhnwn dbʔwršlm wdbklhyn qwryʔ dyhwd wʔp lʕmmʔ ʔkrzt dntwbwn wntpnwn lwt ʔlhʔ wnʕbdwn ʕbdʔ dšwyn ltybwtʔ
26:21	wʕl ʔpy hlyn ʔḥdwny yhwdyʔ bhyklʔ wṣbyn hww lmqṭlny
26:22	ʕdrny dyn ʔlhʔ ʕdmʔ lywmʔ hnʔ whʔ qʔm ʔnʔ wmshd ʔnʔ lzʕwrʔ wlrbʔ kd mdm lbr mn mwšʔ wnbyʔ lʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ ʔlʔ ʔylyn dhnwn ʔmrw dʕtydn dnhwyn
26:23	dnḥš mšyḥʔ wnhwʔ ršytʔ dqymtʔ dmn byt mytʔ wdʕtyd dnkrz nwhrʔ lʕmʔ wlʕmmʔ 
26:24	wkd hknʔ npq hwʔ pwlws rwḥʔ qʕʔ phsṭws bqlʔ rmʔ šnyt lk pwlʔ sprʔ sgyʔʔ ʕbdk dtšnʔ
26:25	ʔmr pwlws lʔ šnyt nṣyḥʔ phsṭws ʔlʔ mly šrrʔ wtqnwtʔ mmll ʔnʔ
26:26	wʔp mlkʔ ʔgrpws ytyrʔyt ydʕ ʕlyhyn dhlyn wmṭl hnʔ ʕyn bglʔ mmll ʔnʔ qdmwhy mṭl dḥdʔ mn hlyn mlʔ lʔ sbrʔnʔ dṭʕyn lh dlʔ hwʔ bṭwšyʔ sʕyrn
26:27	mhymn ʔnt mlkʔ ʔgrpʔ lnbyʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ dmhymn ʔnt
26:28	ʔmr lh ʔgrpws bqlyl mdm mpys ʔnt ly dʔhwʔ krsṭynʔ
26:29	wpwlws ʔmr bʕʔ hwyt mn ʔlhʔ bqlyl wbsgy lʔ hwʔ lk blḥwd ʔlʔ ʔp lklhwn ʔylyn dšmʕyn ly ywmnʔ dnhwwn ʔkwty lbrmn ʔswrʔ hlyn
26:30	wqm lh mlkʔ whgmwnʔ wbrnyqʔ wʔylyn dytbyn hww ʕmhwn
26:31	wkd prqw mn tmn mmllyn hww ḥd ʕm ḥd wʔmryn dmdm dšwʔ lmwtʔ ʔw lʔswrʔ lʔ ʕbd gbrʔ hnʔ
26:32	wʔmr ʔgrpws lphsṭws mškḥ hwʔ gbrʔ hnʔ dnštrʔ ʔlw bgn qsr lʔ qrʔ
27:01	wpqd ʕlwhy phsṭs dnštdr lwt qsr lʔyṭlyʔ wʔšlmh lpwlws wlʔsyrʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʕmh lgbrʔ ḥd qnṭrwnʔ mn ʔspyr dšmh hwʔ ywlyws
27:02	wkd hwt dnrdʔ nḥtn lʔlpʔ dʔytyh hwt mn ʔdrmnṭws mdyntʔ wʔzlʔ hwt lʔtrʔ dʔsyʔ wʕl hwʔ ʕmn lʔlpʔ ʔrsṭrkws mqdwnyʔ dmn tslwnyqʔ mdyntʔ
27:03	wlywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ mṭyn lṣydn wʔtḥšḥ qnṭrwnʔ bmrḥmnwtʔ ʔlwt pwlws wʔps lh dnʔzl lwt rḥmwhy wnttnyḥ
27:04	wmn tmn rdyn wmṭl drwḥʔ sqwbln hwy ʔtkrkn ʕl qwprws
27:05	wʕbrn ymʔ dqylyqyʔ wdpmpwlyʔ wmṭyn lmwrʔ mdyntʔ dlwqyʔ
27:06	wʔškḥ tmn qnṭrwnʔ ʔlpʔ mn ʔlksndryʔ dʔzlʔ hwt lʔyṭlyʔ wʔwtbn bh
27:07	wmṭl dyqyrʔyt rdyʔ hwt lywmtʔ sgyʔʔ lmḥsn mṭyn lwqbl qnydws gzrtʔ wmṭl dlʔ šbqʔ hwt rwḥʔ dnʔzl tryṣʔyt ʔtkrkn ʕl qrṭʔ lwqbl slmwnʔ mdyntʔ
27:08	wlmḥsn kd rdynn ḥdryh mṭyn ldwktʔ dmtqryʔ lmʔnʔ špyrʔ wqrybʔ hwt lh mdyntʔ dšmh lʔsʔʔ
27:09	whwyn tmn zbnʔ sgyʔʔ ʕdmʔ dʕbr ʔp ywmʔ dṣwmʔ dyhwdyʔ whwʔ lh qnṭʔ dnrdʔ ʔnš bymʔ wmlk hwʔ lhwn pwlws
27:10	wʔmr gbrʔ ḥzʔ ʔnʔ dbʔwlṣnʔ wbḥwsrnʔ sgyʔʔ hwyʔ mrdytn lw blḥwd dmwblh dʔlpn ʔlʔ ʔp dnpštn dyln
27:11	qnṭrwnʔ dyn lqwbrnṭʔ wlmrh dʔlpʔ šmʕ hwʔ ytyr mn mlwhy dpwlws
27:12	wmṭl dlʔ ʕhn hwʔ hw lmʔnʔ lmstyw bh stwʔ sgyʔʔ mnn ṣbyn hww dnrdʔ mn tmn wʔnhw dmškḥyn dnmnʕwn wnstwn blmʔnʔ ḥd dʔytwhy hwʔ bqrṭʔ wmtqrʔ hwʔ pwnks wḥʔr hwʔ ltymnʔ
27:13	wkd nšbt rwḥʔ dtymnʔ wsbrw dmmṭyn ʔyk ṣbynhwn rdyn hww ḥdry qrṭʔ
27:14	wmn btr qlyl npq ʕlyn mšbʔ dʕlʕlʔ dmtqrʔ ṭwpnyqws ʔwrqlydwn
27:15	wʔtḥṭpt ʔlpʔ wlʔ ʔškḥt dtqwm lwqbl rwḥʔ wyhbn lʔydʔ dhy
27:16	wkd ʕbrn gzrtʔ ḥdʔ dmtqryʔ qwdʔ lmḥsn ʔškḥn ʔḥdn lqrqwrʔ
27:17	wkd šqlnh mḥyṣyn hwyn wmtqnyn lh lʔlpʔ wmṭl ddḥlyn hwyn ddlmʔ npl bmḥtth dymʔ ʔḥtnyhy lʔrmnwn whkwt rdyn hwyn
27:18	wkd qm lh ʕlyn kymwnʔ qšyʔ lywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ šdyn mʔnyn bymʔ
27:19	wlywmʔ dtltʔ mʔnʔ dylh dʔlpʔ bʔydyn šdyn
27:20	wkd ʔḥd lh stwʔ ywmtʔ ytyrʔ wlʔ šmšʔ mtḥzʔ hwʔ wlʔ shrʔ wlʔ kwkbʔ sbrʔ dḥyyn kl klh ʔtpsq hwʔ lh
27:21	wkd ʔnš mdm lʔ mstybr hwʔ hydyn qm pwlws bynthwn wʔmr ʔlw ʔtṭpystwn ly gbrʔ lʔ rdyn hwyn mn qrṭʔ wmtḥskyn hwyn mn ḥwsrnʔ wmn ʔwlṣnʔ hnʔ
27:22	whšʔ mlk ʔnʔ dthwwn dlʔ ʕqʔ npšʔ gyr mnkwn ḥdʔ lʔ ʔbdʔ ʔlʔ ʔn ʔlpʔ
27:23	ʔtḥzy ly gyr bllyʔ hnʔ mlʔkh dʔlhʔ hw ddylh ʔnʔ wlh plḥ ʔnʔ
27:24	wʔmr ly lʔ tdḥl pwlʔ ʕtyd hw lk lmqm qdm qsr whʔ yhb lk ʔlhʔ mwhbtʔ lkl drdyn ʕmk
27:25	mṭl hnʔ ʔtlbbw gbrʔ mhymn ʔnʔ gyr bʔlhʔ dhknʔ ʔyk mʔ dʔtmll ʕmy
27:26	brm lgzrtʔ ḥdʔ ʔyt ln dnštdʔ
27:27	wmn btr ʔrbtʕsr ywmyn dṭʕyn wʔtṭrpn bhdryws ymʔ bplgh dllyʔ sbrw mlḥʔ dlʔrʕʔ mtqrbyn hww
27:28	wʔrmyw ʔwqyns wʔškḥw qwmyn ʕsryn wtwb qlyl rdw wʔškḥw qwmyn ḥmšʕsrʔ
27:29	wkd dḥylyn hwyn dlmʔ nštkḥ ln bdwkytʔ dʔyt bhyn šwʕʔ ʔrmyw mn ḥrth dʔlpʔ ʔwqyns ʔrbʕ wmṣlyn hww dnhwʔ ywmʔ
27:30	mlḥʔ dyn bʕw lmʕrq mnh mn ʔlpʔ wʔḥtw mnh lqrqwrʔ lymʔ bʕltʔ dnʔzlwn bh wnʔsrwnh lʔlpʔ bʔrʕʔ
27:31	wkd ḥzʔ pwlws ʔmr lqnṭrwnʔ wlʔsṭrṭywṭʔ dʔn hlyn bʔlpʔ lʔ mktryn ʔntwn lʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn dtḥwn
27:32	hydyn psqw ʔsṭrṭywṭʔ lḥblyh dqrqwrʔ mn ʔlpʔ wšbqwh ṭʕyʔ 
27:33	hw dyn pwlws ʕdmʔ dhwʔ ṣprʔ mpys hwʔ lklhwn dnqblwn sybrtʔ kd ʔmr lhwn ywmnʔ hʔ ʔrbtʕsr ywmyn mn qnṭʔ mdm lʔ ṭʕym lkwn
27:34	mṭl hdʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnkwn dtqblwn mʔkwltʔ lqwymʔ dḥyykwn mntʔ gyr mn ršʔ dḥd mnkwn lʔ ʔbdʔ
27:35	wkd hlyn ʔmr nsb lḥmʔ wšbḥ lʔlhʔ qdm klhwn wqṣʔ wʔqp lmʔkl
27:36	wʔtbyʔw klhwn wqblw twrsyʔ
27:37	ʔytyn hwyn dyn bʔlpʔ mʔtyn wšbʕyn wšt npšn
27:38	wkd sbʕw mʔkwltʔ ʔqlw mn ʔlpʔ wšqlw ḥṭʔ wšdw bymʔ
27:39	wkd hwʔ ywmʔ spnʔ ʔydʔ hy ʔrʕʔ lʔ ʔštwdʕw ʔlʔ ḥrw ʕl gnb ybšʔ knpʔ ḥdʔ dymʔ ʔykʔ drnyn hww dʔn mškḥʔ ndḥwnh lʔlpʔ
27:40	wpsqw ʔwqyns mn ʔlpʔ wʔrpyw ʔnyn bymʔ wšrw rkbʔ dswknʔ wtlw ʔrmnwn zʕwrʔ lrwḥʔ dnšbʔ wrdyn hww lʔpy ybšʔ
27:41	wgšt ʔlpʔ bdwktʔ drmʔ bynt tryn ʕwmqyn dymʔ wʔtḥryt bh wqm ʕlyh gbh qdmyʔ wlʔ mttzyʕ hwʔ gbh dyn ʔḥryʔ ʔštry mn qṭyrʔ dgllʔ
27:42	wṣbw hww ʔsṭrṭywṭʔ dnqṭlwn ʔnwn lʔsyrʔ dlʔ nrmwn sḥwʔ wnʕrqwn lhwn mnhwn
27:43	wqnṭrwnʔ klʔ ʔnwn mn hdʔ mṭl dṣbʔ hwʔ dnḥʔ lpwlws wlʔylyn dmškḥyn hww lmrmyw sḥwʔ pqd lhwn dbqdmyʔ nsḥwn wnʕbrwn lʔrʕʔ
27:44	wlšrkʔ ʕl dpʔ wʕl qysʔ ʔḥrnʔ dʔlpʔ ʔʕbrw ʔnwn whknʔ klhwn ʔštwzbw lʔrʕʔ
28:01	wmn btrkn ylpn dmlyṭʔ mtqryʔ hy gzrtʔ
28:02	wbrbryʔ dʕmryn hww bh rḥmʔ sgyʔʔ ḥwyw lwtn wʔwḥdw wnwrʔ wqrʔwn lkln dnšḥn mṭl mṭrʔ sgyʔʔ wqwršʔ dʔyt hwʔ
28:03	wpwlws šql swgʔʔ dḥbwbʔ wsm ʕl nwrʔ wnpqt mnhwn ʔkdnʔ mn dnwrʔ wnktt bʔydh
28:04	wkd ḥzʔwh brbryʔ dtlyʔ bʔydh ʔmryn hww kbr hnʔ gbrʔ qṭwlʔ hw dkd ʔštwzb mn ymʔ kʔnwtʔ lʔ šbqth
28:05	hw dyn pwlws ʔnyp ʔydh wšdh lʔkdnʔ bnwrʔ wmdm dsnʔ lʔ hwyhy
28:06	sbryn hww dyn brbryʔ dbr šʕth mtmsʔ wnpl kd myt ʕl ʔrʕʔ wkd ʕdnʔ sgyʔʔ skyw wḥzw dmdm dsnʔ lʔ hwyhy šḥlpw mlyhwn wʔmrw dʔlhʔ hw
28:07	ʔyt hwʔ dyn qwryʔ bh bhw ʔtrʔ lgbrʔ ḥd dšmh hwʔ pwplyws dhw hwʔ ršh dgzrtʔ wqbln bbyth tltʔ ywmyn ḥdyʔyt
28:08	ʔbwhy dyn dpwplyws bʔštʔ wbkʔb mʕyʔ kryh hwʔ wʕl lwth pwlws wṣly wsm ʕlwhy ʔydh wʔḥlmh
28:09	wkd hwt hdʔ ʔp šrkʔ ʔylyn dʔyt hww bh bgzrtʔ kryhʔ qrbyn hww lwth wmtʔsyn hww
28:10	wʔyqrʔ rwrbʔ yqrwn wkd npqyn hwyn mn tmn zwdwn
28:11	npqn dyn btr yrḥʔ tltʔ wrdyn bʔlpʔ ʔlksndrytʔ dʔstyt hwt bh bgzrtʔ wʔyt hwt ʕlyh ʔtʔ dtʔmʔ
28:12	wʔtyn lsrqwsʔ mdyntʔ wqwyn tmn ywmtʔ tltʔ
28:13	wmn tmn ʔtkrkn wmnʕn lrgywn mdyntʔ wbtr ywmʔ ḥd nšbt ln rwḥʔ dtymnʔ wltryn ywmyn ʔtyn lpwṭyʔls mdyntʔ dʔyṭlyʔ
28:14	wʔškḥn tmn ʔḥʔ wbʕw mnn whwyn lwthwn ywmtʔ šbʕʔ whydyn ʔzln lrhwmʔ
28:15	wkd šmʕw ʔḥʔ dtmn npqw lʔwrʕn ʕdmʔ lšwqʔ dmtqrʔ wʕdmʔ ltlt ḥnwn wkd ḥzʔ ʔnwn pwlws ʔwdy lʔlhʔ wʔtḥyl
28:16	wʕln lrhwmʔ wʔps qnṭrwnʔ lpwlws dnšrʔ ʔykʔ dṣbʔ ʕm ʔsṭrṭywṭʔ hw dnṭr hwʔ lh
28:17	wmn btr tltʔ ywmyn šdr pwlws qrʔ lršnyhwn dyhwdyʔ wkd ʔtknšw ʔmr lhwn gbrʔ ʔḥy ʔnʔ kd bmdm lʔ qmt lwqbl ʕmʔ wnmwsʔ dʔbhy bʔswrʔ ʔštlmt mn ʔwršlm bʔydʔ drhwmyʔ
28:18	whnwn kd šʔlwny ṣbw dnšrwnny mṭl dlʔ ʔškḥw btry ršynʔ mdm dšwʔ lmwtʔ
28:19	wkd qymyn hww lwqbly yhwdyʔ ʔtʔlṣt dʔqʕʔ bgn qsr lʔ ʔyk ʔyt ly dʔqṭrg bmdm lbny ʕmy
28:20	mṭl hnʔ bʕyt mnkwn dtʔtwn wʔḥzykwn wʔštʕʔ lkwn hlyn mṭl sbrʔ gyr dʔysryl ʔsyr ʔnʔ bššltʔ hdʔ
28:21	ʔmryn lh hnwn ḥnn ʔgrtʔ ʕlyk lʔ qbln mn yhwd wlʔ ʔnš mn ʔḥʔ dʔtw mn ʔwršlm ʔmrw ln mdm dbyš ʕlyk
28:22	ṣbynn dyn dnšmʕ mnk mdm dmtrʕʔ ʔnt mṭl dywlpnʔ hnʔ ydʕynn dʕl ʔnš lʔ mqbl
28:23	wʔqymw lh ywmʔ wknšw wʔtw lwth sgyʔʔ kr dšrʔ hwʔ wglʔ lhwn ʕl mlkwtʔ dʔlhʔ kd mshd wmpys lhwn ʕl yšwʕ mn nmwsʔ dmwšʔ wmn nbyʔ mn ṣprʔ wʕdmʔ lrmšʔ
28:24	wʔnšyn mnhwn mtṭpysyn hww lmlwhy wʔḥrnʔ lʔ mtṭpysyn hww
28:25	wʔštryw mn lwth kd lʔ šlmyn lḥddʔ wʔmr lhwn hw pwlws mltʔ hdʔ mll rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ bpwm ʔšʕyʔ nbyʔ lwqbl ʔbhtkwn
28:26	kd ʔmr dzl lwt ʕmʔ hnʔ wʔmr lhwn dšmʕʔ tšmʕwn wlʔ tstklwn wtḥzwn wlʔ tbḥrwn
28:27	ʔtʕby lh gyr lbh dʕmʔ hnʔ wmšmʕthwn ʔwqrw wʕynyhwn ʕmṣw dlʔ nḥzwn bʕynyhwn wnšmʕwn bʔdnyhwn wnstklwn blbhwn wntwbwn lwty wʔšbwq lhwn
28:28	ttydʕ lkwn hkyl hdʔ dlʕmmʔ hw ʔštdr hnʔ pwrqnʔ dʔlhʔ hnwn gyr ʔp šmʕyn lh
28:29	wkd hlyn ʔmr npqw yhwdyʔ wsgy dršyn hww bynthwn
28:30	wʔgr lh pwlws mn dylh bytʔ whwʔ bh trtyn šnyn wmqbl hwʔ tmn lklhwn ʔylyn dʔtyn hww lwth
28:31	wmkrz hwʔ ʕl mlkwth dʔlhʔ wmlp hwʔ ʕyn bglʔ ʕl mrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ dlʔ klyn 
01:01	pwlws ʕbdʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ qryʔ wšlyḥʔ dʔtprš lʔwnglywn dʔlhʔ
01:02	dmn qdym mlk byd nbywhy bktbʔ qdyšʔ
01:03	ʕl brh hw dʔtyld bbsr mn zrʕʔ dbyt dwyd
01:04	wʔtydʕ brʔ dʔlhʔ bḥyl wbrwḥ qdwš dqm mn byt mytʔ yšwʕ mšyḥʔ mrn
01:05	dbh nsbn ṭybwtʔ wšlyḥwtʔ bklhwn ʕmmʔ ʔyk dnštmʕwn lhymnwtʔ dšmh
01:06	dʔp ʔntwn mnhwn ʔntwn qryʔ byšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:07	lklhwn dbrhwmy ḥbybwhy dʔlhʔ qryʔ wqdyšʔ šlmʔ wṭybwtʔ ʕmkwn mn ʔlhʔ ʔbwn wmn mrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:08	lwqdm mwdʔ ʔnʔ lʔlhy byšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʕl klkwn dhymnwtkwn ʔštmʕt bklh ʕlmʔ
01:09	shd hw ly gyr ʔlhʔ dlh mšmš ʔnʔ brwḥ bʔwnglywn dbrh ddlʔ šlwʔ bklzbn mtdkr ʔnʔ lkwn bṣlwty
01:10	wmtḥnn ʔnʔ dʔn mn kdw ttptḥ ly ʔwrḥʔ bṣbynh dʔlhʔ dʔtʔ lwtkwn
01:11	mṭl dṭb swʔ ʔnʔ dʔḥzkwn wʔtl lkwn mwhbtʔ drwḥ dbh tštrrwn
01:12	wʔkḥdʔ ntbyʔ bhymnwtʔ dylkwn wdyly
01:13	ṣbʔ ʔnʔ dyn ʔḥy dtdʕwn dzbnyn sgyʔn ṣbyt dʔtʔ lwtkwn wʔtklyt ʕdmʔ lhšʔ dʔp bkwn nhwʔ ly ʔdšʔ ʔyk dbšrkʔ dʕmmʔ
01:14	ywnyʔ wbrbryʔ ḥkymʔ wsklʔ dlklnš ḥyb ʔnʔ dʔkrz
01:15	whknʔ mtḥpṭ ʔnʔ dʔp lkwn dbrhwmy ʔsbr
01:16	lʔ gyr bht ʔnʔ bh bʔwnglywn mṭl dḥylʔ hw dʔlhʔ lḥyʔ dkl dmhymnyn bh ʔn mn yhwdyʔ lwqdm wʔn mn ʔrmyʔ
01:17	kʔnwth gyr dʔlhʔ bh mtglyʔ mn hymnwtʔ lhymnwtʔ ʔyk dktyb dkʔnʔ mn hymnwtʔ nḥʔ
01:18	mtglʔ hw gyr rwgzh dʔlhʔ mn šmyʔ ʕl klh ʕwlhwn wrwšʕhwn dbnynšʔ hnwn dqwštʔ bʕwlʔ ʔḥydyn
01:19	mṭl dydyʕwth dʔlhʔ glyʔ hy bhwn ʔlhʔ gyr glh bhwn
01:20	ksyth gyr dʔlhʔ mn trmyth dʕlmʔ lbryth bswklʔ mtḥzyn wḥylh wʔlhwth dlʕlm dnhwwn dlʔ mpq brwḥ
01:21	mṭl dydʕw lʔlhʔ wlʔ ʔyk dlʔlhʔ šbḥwhy wʔwdyw lh ʔlʔ ʔstrqw bmḥšbthwn wʔtḥšk lbhwn dlʔ mstkl
01:22	wkd sbryn bnpšhwn dḥkymyn ʔnwn šṭw lhwn
01:23	wḥlpw tšbwḥth dʔlhʔ dlʔ mtḥbl bdmwtʔ dṣlmʔ dbrnšʔ wbdmwtʔ dprḥtʔ wdʔrbʕt rglyh wdrḥšʔ dʔrʕʔ
01:24	mṭl hnʔ ʔšlm ʔnwn ʔlhʔ lrgygtʔ ṭmʔtʔ dlbhwn dnṣʕrwn pgryhwn bhwn
01:25	wḥlpw šrrh dʔlhʔ bkdbwtʔ wdḥlw wšmšw lbrytʔ ṭb mn dlbrwyhyn dlh tšbḥn wbwrkn lʕlm ʕlmyn ʔmyn
01:26	mṭl hnʔ ʔšlm ʔnwn ʔlhʔ lkʔbʔ dṣʕrʔ nqbthwn gyr ḥlp ḥšḥtʔ dkynhyn wbmdm dlʔ mkn ʔtḥšḥ
01:27	wtwb ʔp dkryhwn hknʔ šbqw ḥšḥtʔ dkynʔ dnqbtʔ wʔštrḥw brgtʔ ḥd ʕl ḥd wdkrʔ ʕl dkrʔ bhttʔ ʕbdw wpwrʕnʔ dzdq hwʔ lṭʕywthwn bqnwmhwn qblwhy
01:28	wʔyk dlʔ dnw bnpšhwn dndʕwn lʔlhʔ ʔšlm ʔnwn ʔlhʔ lmdʕʔ dsryqwtʔ dnhwwn ʕbdyn mdm dlʔ wlʔ
01:29	kd mlyn kl ʕwlwtʔ wznywtʔ wmryrwtʔ wbyšwtʔ wʕlwbwtʔ wḥsmʔ wqṭlʔ wḥrynʔ wnklʔ wmḥšbtʔ byštʔ
01:30	wrṭnʔ wmʔklqrṣʔ wsnyʔyn lʔlhʔ mṣʕrnʔ ḥtyrʔ šbhrnʔ mškḥy byštʔ ḥsyry rʕynʔ dlʔbhyhwn lʔ mtṭpysyn
01:31	wdqymʔ lyt lhwn wlʔ ḥwbʔ wlʔ šynʔ wlʔ rḥmʔ ʔyt bhwn
01:32	ʔylyn dkd ydʕyn dynh dʔlhʔ dlʔylyn dʔyk hlyn sʕryn lmwtʔ mḥyb lʔ hwʔ blḥwd ʕbdyn lhyn ʔlʔ ʔp mštwtpyn lʔylyn dhlyn ʕbdyn
02:01	mṭl hnʔ lyt lk mpq brwḥʔ ʔw brnšʔ dʔn ḥbrh bhw gyr ddʔn ʔnt ḥbrk npšk hw mḥyb ʔnt ʔp ʔnt gyr ddʔn ʔnt bhyn hw mthpk ʔnt
02:02	wydʕynn dʔytwhy dynh dʔlhʔ bqwštʔ ʕl ʔylyn dbhlyn mthpkyn
02:03	mnʔ dyn mtḥšb ʔnt ʔw brnšʔ ddʔn ʔnt lʔylyn dbhlyn mthpkyn kd ʔp ʔnt bhyn mthpk ʔnt dʔnt tʕrwq mn dynh dʔlhʔ
02:04	ʔw ʕl ʕwtrʔ dbsymwth wʕl mgrt rwḥh wʕl ʔtrʔ dyhb lk mmrḥ ʔnt wlʔ ydʕ ʔnt dbsymwth dʔlhʔ ltybwtʔ hw mytyʔ lk
02:05	ʔlʔ mṭl qšywt lbk dlʔ tʔb sʔm ʔnt lk symtʔ drwgzʔ lywmʔ drwgzʔ wlglynʔ ddynʔ kʔnʔ dʔlhʔ
02:06	hw dprʕ lklnš ʔyk ʕbdwhy 
02:07	lʔylyn dbmsybrnwtʔ dʕbdʔ ṭbʔ tšbwḥtʔ wʔyqrʔ wlʔ mtḥblnwtʔ bʕyn yhb lhwn ḥyʔ dlʕlm
02:08	ʔylyn dyn dʕṣyn wlʔ mtṭpysyn lšrrʔ ʔlʔ lʕwlʔ mtṭpysyn nprwʕ ʔnwn rwgzʔ wḥmtʔ
02:09	wʔwlṣnʔ wṭwrpʔ lkl brnš dplḥ byštʔ lyhwdyʔ lwqdm wlʔrmyʔ
02:10	tšbwḥtʔ dyn wʔyqrʔ wšlmʔ lkl dplḥ ṭbtʔ lyhwdyʔ lwqdm wlʔrmyʔ
02:11	lʔ gyr ʔyt msb bʔpʔ lwt ʔlhʔ
02:12	ʔylyn gyr ddlʔ nmwsʔ ḥṭw ʔp dlʔ nmwsʔ nʔbdwn wʔylyn dbnmwsʔ ḥṭw mn nmwsʔ ntdynwn
02:13	lʔ hwʔ gyr šmwʕwhy dnmwsʔ kʔnyn qdm ʔlhʔ ʔlʔ ʕbwdwhy dnmwsʔ mzddqyn
02:14	ʔn gyr ʕmmʔ dnmwsʔ lyt lhwn mn kynhwn nʕbdwn dnmwsʔ hnwn dkd nmwsʔ lyt hwʔ lhwn lnpšhwn hww nmwsʔ
02:15	whnwn mḥwyn ʕbdh dnmwsʔ kd ktyb ʕl lbhwn wmshdʔ ʕlyhwn tʔrthwn kd mḥšbthwn mkwnn ʔw npqn rwḥʔ lḥddʔ
02:16	bywmʔ ddʔn ʔlhʔ ksytʔ dbnynšʔ ʔyk ʔwnglywn dyly byd yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
02:17	ʔn ʔnt dyn dyhwdyʔ mtqrʔ ʔnt wmttnyḥ ʔnt ʕl nmwsʔ wmštbhr ʔnt bʔlhʔ
02:18	dydʕ ʔnt ṣbynh wprš ʔnt wlytʔ dylyp ʔnt mn nmwsʔ
02:19	wʔttklt ʕl npšk dmdbrnʔ ʔnt dʕwyrʔ wnwhrʔ dʔylyn dʔytyhwn bḥšwkʔ
02:20	wrdwyʔ dḥsyry rʕynʔ wmlpnʔ dṭlyʔ wʔyt lk dwmyʔ dydʕtʔ wdšrrʔ bnmwsʔ
02:21	ʔnt hkyl dmlp ʔnt lʔḥrnʔ lnpšk lʔ mlp ʔnt wdmkrz ʔnt dlʔ ngnbwn ʔnt gnb ʔnt
02:22	wdʔmr ʔnt dlʔ ngwrwn ʔnt gʔr ʔnt wʔnt dšʔṭ ʔnt ptkrʔ mḥlṣ ʔnt byt mqdšʔ
02:23	wʔnt dmštbhr ʔnt bnmwsʔ bhw dʕbr ʔnt ʕl nmwsʔ lʔlhʔ hw mṣʕr ʔnt
02:24	šmh gyr dʔlhʔ mṭltkwn hw mtgdp byt ʕmmʔ ʔyk dktyb
02:25	gzwrtʔ gyr mhnyʔ ʔn nmwsʔ tgmwr ʔn tʕbr lk dyn mn nmwsʔ gzwrtk hwt lh ʕwrlwtʔ
02:26	ʔn hw dyn dʕwrlwtʔ tṭr pwqdnh dnmwsʔ lʔ hʔ mtḥšbʔ lh gzwrtʔ
02:27	wtdwn ʕwrlwtʔ dmn kynh gmrʔ nmwsʔ lk dbktbʔ wbgzwrtʔ ʕbr ʔnt ʕl nmwsʔ
02:28	lʔ hwʔ gyr mn dbglyʔ hw hw yhwdyʔ ʔplʔ ʔydʔ dmtḥzyʔ bbsrʔ gzwrtʔ
02:29	ʔlʔ hw hw yhwdyʔ ʔynʔ dbksyʔ hw wgzwrtʔ ʔydʔ ddlbʔ hy brwḥ wlʔ bktbʔ ʔydʔ dtšbwḥth lʔ hwt mn bny ʔnšʔ ʔlʔ mn ʔlhʔ
03:01	mnʔ hy hkyl ytyrwth dyhwdyʔ ʔw mnʔ ywtrnh dgzwrtʔ
03:02	sgy bkl mdm lwqdm dʔthymn mlwhy dʔlhʔ
03:03	ʔn mnhwn gyr lʔ hymnw dlmʔ bdlʔ hymnw hymnwth dʔlhʔ bṭlw
03:04	ḥs ʔytwhy gyr ʔlhʔ šryrʔ wkl brnš dgl ʔyknʔ dktyb dthwʔ kʔyn bmlyk wtzkʔ kd dynyn lk
03:05	ʔn dyn ʕwln kʔnwth dʔlhʔ mqym mnʔ nʔmr lmʔ ʕwl hw ʔlhʔ dmytʔ rwgzh ʔyk brnšʔ hw mmll ʔnʔ
03:06	ḥs wʔn lʔ ʔyknʔ ndwn ʔlhʔ lʕlmʔ
03:07	ʔn gyr šrrh dʔlhʔ ʔtytr bdglwty ltšbwḥth dylh lmnʔ hkyl ʔnʔ ʔyk ḥṭyʔ mttdyn ʔnʔ
03:08	ʔw dlmʔ ʔyk dmgdpyn ʕlyn wʔmryn dʔmrynn dnʕbd byštʔ dnʔtyn ṭbtʔ hnwn ddynhwn nṭyr hw lkʔnwtʔ
03:09	mnʔ hkyl ʔḥydynn ytyrʔ dqdmn psqn ʕl yhwdyʔ wʕl ʔrmyʔ dtḥyt ḥṭytʔ ʔnwn klhwn
03:10	ʔyk dktyb dlyt kʔnʔ ʔplʔ ḥd
03:11	wlʔ dmstkl wlʔ dbʕʔ lʔlhʔ
03:12	klhwn sṭw ʔkḥdʔ wʔstlyw wlyt dʕbd ṭbtʔ ʔplʔ ḥd
03:13	qbrʔ ptyḥʔ ggrthwn wlšnyhwn nkwltnyn wḥmtʔ dʔsps tḥyt spwthwn
03:14	pwmhwn mlʔ lwṭtʔ wmrtʔ
03:15	wrglyhwn qlyln lmʔšd dmʔ
03:16	šḥqʔ wdwwnʔ bʔwrḥthwn
03:17	wʔwrḥʔ dšlmʔ lʔ ydʕw
03:18	wdḥlth dʔlhʔ lyt qdm ʕynyhwn
03:19	ydʕynn dyn dmdm dʔmr nmwsʔ lʔylyn dbnmwsʔ ʔnwn ʔmr dkl pwm nstkr wʕlmʔ klh ntḥyb lʔlhʔ
03:20	mṭl dmn ʕbdwhy dnmwsʔ lʔ mzddq kl bsr qdmwhy mn nmwsʔ gyr ʔtydʕt ḥṭytʔ
03:21	hšʔ dyn dlʔ nmwsʔ kʔnwth dʔlhʔ ʔtglyt wmshd ʕlyh hw nmwsʔ wnbyʔ
03:22	kʔnwth dyn dʔlhʔ byd hymnwtʔ hy dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ lklnš ʔp ʕl klnš dmhymn bh lyt gyr pwršnʔ
03:23	mṭl dklhwn ḥṭw wḥsyryn mn tšbwḥth dʔlhʔ
03:24	wmzddqyn bṭybwtʔ mgn wbpwrqnʔ dʔytwhy byšwʕ mšyḥʔ
03:25	hnʔ dqdm smh ʔlhʔ ḥwsyʔ bhymnwtʔ ddmh mṭl ḥṭhyn dmn qdym ḥṭyn
03:26	bʔtrʔ dyhb ln ʔlhʔ bmgrt rwḥh ltḥwytʔ dkʔnwth dbzbnʔ hnʔ dhw nhwʔ kʔnʔ wnzdq bkʔnwtʔ lmn dbhymnwtʔ hw dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ 
03:27	ʔykw hkyl šwbhrʔ ʔtbṭl lh bʔynʔ nmwsʔ dʕbdʔ lʔ ʔlʔ bnmwsʔ dhymnwtʔ
03:28	mtrʕynn hkyl dbhymnwtʔ hw mzddq brnšʔ wlʔ bʕbdʔ dnmwsʔ
03:29	lmʔ gyr ʔlhʔ dyhwdyʔ hw blḥwd wdʕmmʔ lʔ ʔyn ʔp dʕmmʔ
03:30	mṭl dḥd hw ʔlhʔ dmzdq gzwrtʔ bhymnwtʔ ʔp ʕwrlwtʔ bh bhymnwtʔ
03:31	lmʔ hkyl nmwsʔ hw mbṭlynn bhymnwtʔ ḥs ʔlʔ nmwsʔ hw mqymynn
04:01	mnʔ hkyl ʔmrynn ʕl ʔbrhm ršʔ dʔbhtʔ dʔškḥ bbsr
04:02	ʔlw gyr ʔbrhm mn ʕbdʔ ʔzddq hwʔ ʔyt hwʔ lh šwbhrʔ ʔlʔ lʔ lwt ʔlhʔ
04:03	mnʔ gyr ʔmr ktbʔ dhymn ʔbrhm lʔlhʔ wʔtḥšbt lh lzdyqw
04:04	lmn dplḥ dyn lʔ mtḥšb lh ʔgrh ʔyk dbṭybw ʔlʔ ʔyk mn dmttḥyb lh
04:05	lhw dyn dlʔ plḥ ʔlʔ hymn blḥwd bmn dmzdq lḥṭyʔ mtḥšbʔ lh hymnwth lkʔnw
04:06	ʔyknʔ dʔp dwyd ʔmr ʕl ṭwbh dgbrʔ ʔynʔ dʔlhʔ ḥšb lh zdyqwtʔ dlʔ ʕbdʔ kd ʔmr
04:07	dṭwbyhwn lʔylyn dʔštbq lhwn ʕwlhwn wʔtksyw ḥṭhyhwn
04:08	wṭwbwhy lgbrʔ dlʔ nḥšwb lh ʔlhʔ ḥṭyth
04:09	hnʔ hkyl ṭwbʔ ʕl gzwrtʔ hw ʔw ʕl ʕwrlwtʔ ʔmrynn dʔtḥšbt lʔbrhm hymnwth lkʔnw
04:10	ʔyknʔ hkyl ʔtḥšbt lh bgzwrtʔ ʔw bʕwrlwtʔ lʔ hwʔ bgzwrtʔ ʔlʔ bʕwrlwtʔ
04:11	ʔtʔ hw gyr šqlh lgzwrtʔ wḥtmʔ dkʔnwtʔ dhymnwth dbʕwrlwtʔ dnhwʔ ʔbʔ lklhwn ʔylyn dmhymnyn mn ʕwrlwtʔ dttḥšb ʔp lhwn lkʔnw
04:12	wʔbʔ lgzwrtʔ lʔ hwʔ lʔylyn dmn gzwrtʔ ʔnwn blḥwd ʔlʔ ʔp lʔylyn dšlmyn lʕqbtʔ dhymnwtʔ dʕwrlwtʔ dʔbwn ʔbrhm
04:13	lʔ hwʔ gyr bnmwsʔ hwʔ mwlknʔ lʔbrhm wlzrʕh dnhwʔ yrtʔ lʕlmʔ ʔlʔ bkʔnwtʔ dhymnwth
04:14	ʔlw gyr hlyn dmn nmwsʔ hww yrtʔ sryqʔ hwt hymnwtʔ wmbṭl hwʔ mwlknʔ
04:15	nmwsʔ gyr mʕbdnʔ hw drwgzʔ kr dlyt gyr nmwsʔ ʔplʔ ʕbr nmwsʔ
04:16	mṭl hnʔ bhymnwtʔ dbṭybwtʔ nzddq wnhwʔ šryr mwlknʔ lklh zrʕh lʔ lʔynʔ dmn nmwsʔ hw blḥwd ʔlʔ ʔp lʔynʔ dmn hymnwtʔ hw dʔbrhm dʔytwhy ʔbʔ dkln
04:17	ʔyknʔ dktyb dsmtk ʔbʔ lswgʔʔ dʕmmʔ qdm ʔlhʔ hw dhymnt bh dmḥʔ mytʔ wqrʔ lʔylyn dlʔ ʔytyhwn ʔyk ʔytyhwn
04:18	wdlʔ sbrʔ lsbrʔ hymn dnhwʔ ʔbʔ lswgʔʔ dʕmmʔ ʔyk dktyb dhknʔ nhwʔ zrʕk
04:19	wlʔ ʔtkrh bhymnwth kd mtbqʔ bpgrh mytʔ dhwʔ br mʔʔ šnyn wbmrbʕʔ mytʔ dsrʔ
04:20	wbmwlknʔ dʔlhʔ lʔ ʔtplg ʔyk ḥsyr hymnwtʔ ʔlʔ ʔtḥyl bhymnwtʔ wyhb tšbwḥtʔ lʔlhʔ
04:21	wʔšr dmdm dmlk lh ʔlhʔ mškḥ lmgmr
04:22	mṭl hnʔ ʔtḥšbt lh lkʔnw
04:23	wlʔ hwʔ mṭlth blḥwd ʔtktbt hdʔ dʔtḥšbt hymnwth lkʔnw
04:24	ʔlʔ ʔp mṭltn dʔpln ʕtyd hw dnḥšwb ʔylyn dhymnn bmn dʔqym lmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ mn byt mytʔ
04:25	dhw ʔštlm mṭl ḥṭhyn wqm mṭl dnzdqn
05:01	mṭl dʔzddqn hkyl bhymnwtʔ nhwʔ ln šlmʔ lwt ʔlhʔ bmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
05:02	dbh ʔtqrbn bhymnwtʔ lṭybwtʔ hdʔ dbh qymynn wmštbhrynn bsbrʔ dtšbwḥth dʔlhʔ
05:03	wlʔ hknʔ blḥwd ʔlʔ ʔp bʔwlṣnyn mštbhrynn dydʕynn dʔwlṣnʔ msybrnwtʔ gmr bn
05:04	wmsybrnwtʔ bwqyʔ wbwqyʔ sbrʔ
05:05	sbrʔ dyn lʔ mbht mṭl dḥwbh dʔlhʔ mšpʕ ʕl lbwtn brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ dʔtyhbt ln
05:06	ʔn dyn mšyḥʔ mṭl kryhwtn bzbnʔ hnʔ ḥlp ršyʕʔ myt
05:07	lmḥsn gyr ʔnš ḥlp ršyʕʔ mʔt ḥlp ṭbʔ gyr ṭk mmrḥ ʔnš lmmt
05:08	hrkʔ mḥwʔ ʔlhʔ ḥwbh dlwtn dʔn kd ḥṭyʔ ʔytyn hwyn mšyḥʔ ḥlpyn myt
05:09	kmʔ hkyl ytyrʔyt nzddq hšʔ bdmh wbh ntpṣʔ mn rwgzʔ
05:10	ʔn gyr kd ʔytyn bʕldbbʔ ʔtrʕy ʕmn ʔlhʔ bmwtʔ dbrh hkyl ytyrʔyt btrʕwth nḥʔ bḥywhy
05:11	wlʔ hknʔ blḥwd ʔlʔ ʔp nštbhr bʔlhʔ byd mrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ dbh hw hšʔ qbln trʕwtʔ 
05:12	ʔyknʔ gyr dbyd ḥd brnšʔ ʕlt ḥṭytʔ lʕlmʔ wbyd ḥṭytʔ mwtʔ whknʔ bklhwn bny ʔnšʔ ʕbr mwtʔ bhy dklhwn ḥṭw
05:13	ʕdmʔ gyr lnmwsʔ ḥṭytʔ kd ʔytyh hwt bʕlmʔ lʔ ḥšybʔ hwt ḥṭytʔ mṭl dlyt hwʔ nmwsʔ
05:14	ʔlʔ ʔmlk mwtʔ mn ʔdm wʕdmʔ lmwšʔ ʔp ʕl ʔylyn dlʔ ḥṭw bdmwtʔ dʕbr nmwsh dʔdm hw dʔytwhy dmwtʔ dhw dʕtyd
05:15	ʔlʔ lʔ hwʔ ʔyk šwrʕtʔ hknʔ mwhbtʔ ʔn gyr mṭl šwrʕth dḥd sgyʔʔ mytw kmʔ hkyl ytyrʔyt ṭybwth dʔlhʔ wmwhbth mṭl ḥd brnšʔ yšwʕ mšyḥʔ bsgyʔʔ ttytr
05:16	wlʔ ʔyk sklwtʔ dḥd hknʔ mwhbtʔ dynʔ gyr dhwʔ mn ḥd lḥwybʔ hwʔ mwhbtʔ dyn mn ḥṭhʔ sgyʔʔ hwt lkʔnw
05:17	ʔn gyr mṭl sklwtʔ dḥd ʔmlk mwtʔ ytyrʔyt ʔylyn dnsb wswgʔʔ dṭybwtʔ wdmwhbtʔ wdkʔnwtʔ bḥyʔ nmlkwn byd ḥd yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
05:18	ʔkznʔ hkyl dmṭl sklwtʔ dḥd hwʔ ḥwybʔ lklhwn bnynšʔ hknʔ mṭl kʔnwtʔ dḥd thwʔ zkwtʔ lḥyʔ lklhwn bnynšʔ
05:19	ʔyknʔ gyr dmṭl lʔ mštmʕnwth dḥd brnšʔ ḥṭyʔ sgyʔʔ hww hknʔ ʔp mṭl mštmʕnwth dḥd sgyʔʔ kʔnʔ hwyn
05:20	mʕlnʔ dyn dhwʔ lnmwsʔ dtsgʔ ḥṭytʔ wkr dsgyt ḥṭytʔ tmn ʔtytrt ṭybwtʔ
05:21	dʔyk dʔmlkt ḥṭytʔ bmwtʔ hknʔ tmlk ṭybwtʔ bkʔnwtʔ lḥyʔ dlʕlm byd mrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
06:01	mnʔ hkyl nʔmr nqwʔ bh bḥṭytʔ dṭybwtʔ ttytr
06:02	ḥs ʔylyn gyr dmytn lḥṭytʔ ʔyknʔ nḥʔ bh twb
06:03	ʔw lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn dʔylyn dʕmdn byšwʕ mšyḥʔ bmwth hw ʕmdn
06:04	ʔtqbrn ʕmh bmʕmwdytʔ lmwtʔ dʔyknʔ dqm yšwʕ mšyḥʔ mn byt mytʔ btšbwḥtʔ dʔbwhy hknʔ ʔp ḥnn bḥyʔ ḥdtʔ nhlk
06:05	ʔn gyr ʔkḥd ʔtnṣbn ʕmh bdmwtʔ dmwth hknʔ ʔp bqymth nhwʔ
06:06	ydʕynn gyr dbrnšn ʕtyqʔ ʔzdqp ʕmh dntbṭl pgrʔ dḥṭytʔ dtwb lʔ nšmš lḥṭytʔ
06:07	ʔynʔ dmyt gyr ʔtḥrr lh mn ḥṭytʔ
06:08	ʔn hkyl mytn ʕm mšyḥʔ nhymn dʕmh ʕm mšyḥʔ nḥʔ
06:09	ydʕynn gyr dmšyḥʔ qm mn byt mytʔ wtwb lʔ mʔt wmwtʔ lʔ mštlṭ bh
06:10	dmyt gyr lḥṭytʔ hw myt ḥdʔ zbn wdḥy ḥy hw lʔlhʔ
06:11	hknʔ ʔp ʔntwn ḥšwbw npškwn dmytʔ ʔntwn lḥṭytʔ wḥyʔ ʔntwn lʔlhʔ bmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
06:12	lʔ hkyl tmlk ḥṭytʔ bpgrkwn mytʔ ʔyk dtštmʕwn lrgygth
06:13	wʔp lʔ tṭybwn hdmykwn zynʔ dʕwlʔ lḥṭytʔ ʔlʔ ṭybw npškwn lʔlhʔ ʔyk ʔnšʔ dmn mytʔ ḥyytwn whdmykwn zynʔ nhwwn lkʔnwth dʔlhʔ
06:14	wḥṭytʔ lʔ mštlṭʔ ʕlykwn lʔ gyr ʔytykwn tḥyt nmwsʔ ʔlʔ tḥyt ṭybwtʔ
06:15	mnʔ hkyl nḥṭʔ dlʔ hwyn tḥyt nmwsʔ ʔlʔ tḥyt ṭybwtʔ ḥs
06:16	lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn dlmn dmṭybyn ʔntwn npškwn dtštmʕwn lh lʕbdwtʔ dylh ʔntwn ʕbdʔ dhw dmštmʕyn ʔntwn lh ʔn lḥṭytʔ wʔn lmšmʕ ʔdnʔ dkʔnwtʔ
06:17	ṭybw dyn lʔlhʔ dʕbdʔ hwytwn dḥṭytʔ wʔštmʕtwn mn lbʔ ldmwtʔ dywlpnʔ dʔštlmtwn lh
06:18	wkd ʔtḥrrtwn mn ḥṭytʔ ʔštʕbdtwn lkʔnwtʔ
06:19	ʔyk dbyt bnynšʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ mṭl kryhwtʔ dbsrkwn dʔyknʔ dṭybtwn hdmykwn lʕbdwtʔ dṭnpwtʔ wdʕwlʔ hknʔ ʔp hšʔ ṭybw hdmykwn lʕbdwtʔ dkʔnwtʔ wdqdyšwtʔ
06:20	kd ʕbdʔ hwytwn gyr dḥṭytʔ mḥrrʔ hwytwn lkʔnwtʔ
06:21	wmnʔ ʔdšʔ ʔyt hwʔ lkwn hydyn ʔynʔ dywmnʔ bhtyn ʔntwn bh ḥrth gyr ʔytyh mwtʔ
06:22	whšʔ dʔtḥrrtwn mn ḥṭytʔ whwytwn ʕbdʔ lʔlhʔ ʔyt lkwn pʔrʔ qdyšʔ dḥrthwn ḥyʔ dlʕlm
06:23	tʔgwrtʔ dyn dḥṭytʔ mwtʔ hw wmwhbth dʔlhʔ ḥyʔ dlʕlm bmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
07:01	ʔw lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn ʔḥy lydʕy nmwsʔ gyr mmll ʔnʔ dnmwsʔ šlyṭ hw ʕl gbrʔ kmʔ dḥy
07:02	ʔyk ʔnttʔ dʔsyrʔ hy bbʕlh kmʔ dḥy bnmwsʔ ʔn dyn myt bʕlh ʔtḥrrt mn nmwsʔ dbʕlh
07:03	ʔn dyn kd ḥy bʕlh tqp lgbr ʔḥryn hwt lh gyrtʔ ʔndyn nmwt bʕlh ʔtḥrrt mn nmwsʔ wlʔ ʔytyh gyrtʔ ʔn thwʔ lgbrʔ ʔḥrnʔ
07:04	whšʔ ʔḥy ʔp ʔntwn myttwn lnmwsʔ bpgrh dmšyḥʔ dthwwn lʔḥryn ʔynʔ dqm mn byt mytʔ dttlwn pʔrʔ lʔlhʔ
07:05	kd bbsrʔ hwyn gyr kʔbʔ dḥṭhʔ dbnmwsʔ mtḥpṭyn hww bhdmyn dpʔrʔ ntl lmwtʔ
07:06	hšʔ dyn ʔtbṭln mn nmwsʔ wmytn lhw dʔḥyd hwʔ ln dnšmš mkyl bḥdtwtʔ drwḥʔ wlʔ bʕtyqwt ktbʔ 
07:07	mnʔ hkyl ʔmrynn nmwsʔ ḥṭytʔ hw ḥs ʔlʔ lḥṭytʔ lʔ ylpt ʔlʔ byd nmwsʔ lʔ gyr rgtʔ ydʕ hwyt ʔlwlʔ nmwsʔ dʔmr dlʔ trg
07:08	wbhnʔ pwqdnʔ ʔškḥt lh ḥṭytʔ ʕltʔ wgmrt by kl rgʔ blʕd nmwsʔ gyr ḥṭytʔ mytʔ hwt
07:09	ʔnʔ dyn ḥy hwyt dlʔ nmwsʔ mn qdym kd ʔtʔ dyn pwqdnʔ ḥṭytʔ ḥyt wʔnʔ mytt
07:10	wʔštkḥ ly pwqdnʔ hw dḥyʔ lmwtʔ
07:11	ḥṭytʔ gyr bʕltʔ dʔškḥt lh byd pwqdnʔ ʔṭʕytny wbh qṭltny
07:12	nmwsʔ mdyn qdyš hw wpwqdnʔ qdyš hw wkʔyn wṭb
07:13	ṭbtʔ hkyl ly lmwtʔ hw hwt ḥs ʔlʔ ḥṭytʔ dttḥzʔ dḥṭytʔ hy dbṭbtʔ gmrt by mwtʔ dytyrʔyt ttḥyb ḥṭytʔ bpwqdnʔ
07:14	ydʕynn gyr dnmwsʔ drwḥ hw ʔnʔ dyn dbsr ʔnʔ wmzbn ʔnʔ lḥṭytʔ
07:15	mdm dsʕr ʔnʔ gyr lʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ wlʔ hwʔ mdm dṣbʔ ʔnʔ ʕbd ʔnʔ ʔlʔ mdm dsnʔ ʔnʔ hw hw ʕbd ʔnʔ
07:16	wʔn mdm dlʔ ṣbʔ ʔnʔ ʕbd ʔnʔ shd ʔnʔ ʕl nmwsʔ dšpyr hw
07:17	hšʔ dyn lʔ hwʔ ʔnʔ sʕr ʔnʔ hdʔ ʔlʔ ḥṭytʔ dʕmrʔ by
07:18	ydʕ ʔnʔ hw gyr dlʔ ʕmrʔ by hnw dyn bbsry ṭbtʔ dʔṣbʔ gyr bṭbtʔ pšyq ly dʔsʕryh dyn lʔ mškḥ ʔnʔ
07:19	lʔ hwʔ gyr lṭbtʔ dṣbʔ ʔnʔ dʔʕbd ʕbd ʔnʔ ʔlʔ byštʔ dlʔ ṣbʔ ʔnʔ dʔʕbd lh ʕbd ʔnʔ
07:20	wʔn mdm dlʔ ṣbʔ ʔnʔ ʕbd ʔnʔ lʔ hwʔ ʔnʔ ʕbd ʔnʔ ʔlʔ ḥṭytʔ dʕmrʔ by
07:21	mškḥ ʔnʔ hkyl lnmwsʔ dšlm lrʕyny hw dṣbʔ dnʕbd ṭbtʔ mṭl dbyštʔ qrybʔ hy ly
07:22	ḥdʔ ʔnʔ gyr bnmwsh dʔlhʔ bbrnšʔ dlgw
07:23	ḥzʔ ʔnʔ dyn nmwsʔ ʔḥrnʔ bhdmy dmqrb lwqbl nmwsʔ drʕyny wšbʔ ly lnmwsʔ dḥṭytʔ dʔyt bhdmy
07:24	dwyʔ ʔnʔ brnšʔ mnw npṣyny mn pgrʔ hnʔ dmwtʔ
07:25	mwdʔ ʔnʔ lʔlhʔ byd mrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ hšʔ hkyl ʔnʔ brʕyny ʕbdʔ ʔnʔ dnmwsʔ dʔlhʔ bbsry dyn ʔyty ʕbdʔ dnmwsʔ dḥṭytʔ
08:01	mkyl lyt ḥybwtʔ lʔylyn dlʔ mhlkyn bbsr byšwʕ mšyḥʔ
08:02	nmwsʔ gyr drwḥʔ dḥyʔ dbyšwʕ mšyḥʔ ḥrrk mn nmwsʔ dḥṭytʔ wdmwtʔ
08:03	mṭl dmḥyl hwʔ gyr nmwsʔ byd kryhwth dbsrʔ šdr ʔlhʔ lbrh bdmwtʔ dbsrʔ dḥṭytʔ mṭlth dḥṭytʔ dnḥybyh lḥṭytʔ bbsrh
08:04	dkʔnwtʔ dnmwsʔ bn ttmlʔ dlʔ hwʔ bbsr mhlkynn ʔlʔ brwḥ
08:05	ʔylyn gyr dbbsr ʔnwn dbsr hw mtrʕyn wʔylyn ddrwḥ ʔnwn drwḥ hw mtrʕyn
08:06	trʕytʔ gyr dbsrʔ mwtʔ hw wtrʕytʔ drwḥʔ ḥyʔ wšlmʔ
08:07	mṭl dtrʕytʔ dbsrʔ bʕldbbwtʔ hy lwt ʔlhʔ lnmwsʔ gyr dʔlhʔ lʔ mštʕbdʔ mṭl dlʔ mškḥʔ
08:08	wʔylyn dbbsr ʔnwn lmšpr lʔlhʔ lʔ mškḥyn
08:09	ʔntwn dyn lʔ hwytwn bbsr ʔlʔ brwḥ ʔn šryrʔyt rwḥh dʔlhʔ ʕmrʔ bkwn ʔn dyn ʔnš lyt bh rwḥh dmšyḥʔ hnʔ lʔ hwʔ dylh
08:10	wʔn dyn mšyḥʔ bkwn pgrʔ myt hw mṭl ḥṭytʔ rwḥʔ dyn ḥyʔ hy mṭl kʔnwtʔ
08:11	wʔn rwḥh dhw mn dʔqym lmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ mn byt mytʔ ʕmrʔ bkwn hw mn dʔqymh lyšwʕ mšyḥʔ mn byt mytʔ ʔp lpgrykwn mytʔ nḥʔ mṭl rwḥh dʕmrʔ bkwn
08:12	hšʔ ʔḥy ḥybynn lw lbsrʔ dbbsr nhlk
08:13	ʔn gyr bbsr ḥʔyn ʔntwn ʕtydyn ʔntwn hw lmmt wʔn brwḥ hwpky pgrʔ mmytyn ʔntwn ḥʔyn ʔntwn
08:14	ʔylyn gyr dbrwḥʔ dʔlhʔ mtdbryn hlyn bnyʔ ʔnwn dʔlhʔ
08:15	lʔ gyr nsbtwn rwḥʔ dʕbdwtʔ twb ldḥltʔ ʔlʔ nsbtwn rwḥʔ dsymt bnyʔ dbh qrynn ʔbʔ ʔbwn
08:16	why rwḥʔ mshdʔ lrwḥn dʔytyn bnyʔ dʔlhʔ
08:17	wʔn bnyʔ ʔp yrtʔ yrtʔ dʔlhʔ wbny yrtwth dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ dʔn nḥš ʕmh ʔp ʕmh nštbḥ
08:18	mtrʕʔ ʔnʔ gyr dlʔ šwyn ḥšwhy dzbnʔ hnʔ ltšbwḥtʔ ʔydʔ dʕtydʔ dttglʔ bn
08:19	klh gyr brytʔ msbrʔ wmskyʔ lglynʔ dbnwhy dʔlhʔ
08:20	brytʔ gyr ʔštʕbdt lsryqwtʔ lʔ bṣbynh ʔlʔ mṭl mn dšʕbdh ʕl sbrʔ
08:21	dʔp hy brytʔ ttḥrr mn ʕbdwtʔ dḥblʔ bḥrwrʔ dtšbwḥtʔ dbnyʔ dʔlhʔ 
08:22	ydʕynn gyr dklhyn brytʔ mttnḥn wmḥbln ʕdmʔ lywmnʔ
08:23	wlʔ blḥwd hnyn ʔlʔ ʔp ḥnn dʔyt bn ršytʔ drwḥʔ mttnḥynn bnpšn wmskynn lsymt bnyʔ wlpwrqnʔ dpgryn
08:24	mṭl dbsbrʔ hw ḥyyn sbrʔ dyn dmtḥzʔ lʔ hwʔ sbrʔ ʔn gyr ḥzynn lh mnʔ mskynn lh
08:25	ʔn dyn lmdm dlʔ mtḥzʔ msbrynn bmsybrnwtʔ mqwynn
08:26	hknʔ ʔp hy rwḥʔ mʕdrʔ lkryhwtn mnʔ gyr nṣlʔ ʔyk mʔ dwlʔ lʔ ydʕynn ʔlʔ hy rwḥʔ mṣlyʔ ḥlpyn btnḥtʔ dlʔ mtmlln
08:27	dmʔš dyn lbwtʔ hw ydʕ mnʔ hy trʕytʔ drwḥʔ dʔyk ṣbynh hw dʔlhʔ mṣlyʔ ḥlp qdyšʔ
08:28	ydʕynn dyn dʔylyn dmḥbyn lʔlhʔ bkl mdm mʕdr lhwn lṭbtʔ lʔylyn dqdm sm dnhwwn qryʔ
08:29	wmn lwqdm ydʕ ʔnwn wršm ʔnwn bdmwtʔ dṣwrtʔ dbrh dhw nhwʔ bwkrʔ dʔḥʔ sgyʔʔ
08:30	lʔylyn dyn dqdm ršm lhwn qrʔ wlʔylyn dqrʔ lhwn zdq wlʔylyn dzdq lhwn šbḥ
08:31	mnʔ hkyl nʔmr ʕl hlyn ʔn ʔlhʔ ḥlpyn mnw dlqwbln
08:32	wʔn ʕl brh lʔ ḥs ʔlʔ ḥlp kln ʔšlmh ʔyknʔ lʔ kl mdm ʕmh ntl ln
08:33	mnw nqbwl ʕl gbyʔ dʔlhʔ ʔlhʔ mzdq
08:34	mnw mḥyb mšyḥʔ myt wqm wʔytwhy ʕl ymynʔ dʔlhʔ wbʕʔ ḥlpyn
08:35	mnw npršny mn ḥwbh dmšyḥʔ ʔwlṣnʔ ʔw ḥbwšyʔ ʔw rdwpyʔ ʔw kpnʔ ʔw ʕrṭlywtʔ ʔw qndynws ʔw sypʔ
08:36	ʔyk dktyb dmṭltk klywm mytynn wʔtḥšbn ʔyk ʔmrʔ lnkstʔ
08:37	ʔlʔ bhlyn klhyn zkyynn byd mn dʔḥbn
08:38	mps ʔnʔ gyr dlʔ mwtʔ wlʔ ḥyʔ wlʔ mlʔkʔ wlʔ šwlṭnʔ wlʔ ḥylʔ wlʔ dqymn wlʔ dʕtydn
08:39	wlʔ rwmʔ wlʔ ʕwmqʔ ʔplʔ brytʔ ʔḥrtʔ tškḥ tpršny ḥwbh dʔlhʔ dbmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
09:01	qwštʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ bmšyḥʔ wlʔ mdgl ʔnʔ wrʕyny mshd ʕly brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ
09:02	dkrywtʔ hy ly rbtʔ wkʔbʔ dmn lby lʔ šlʔ
09:03	mṣlʔ hwyt gyr dʔnʔ qnwmy ḥrmʔ ʔhwʔ mn mšyḥʔ ḥlp ʔḥy wʔḥyny dbbsr
09:04	dʔytyhwn bny ʔysryl ddylhwn hwt symt bnyʔ wtšbwḥtʔ wqymʔ wnmwsʔ wtšmštʔ dbh wmwlknʔ
09:05	wʔbhtʔ wmnhwn ʔtḥzy mšyḥʔ bbsr dʔytwhy ʔlhʔ dʕl kl dlh tšbḥn wbwrkn lʕlm ʕlmyn ʔmyn
09:06	lʔ hwʔ dyn mpl nplt mlth dʔlhʔ lʔ hwʔ gyr klhwn dmn ʔysryl ʔytyhwn ʔysryl
09:07	ʔplʔ mṭl dmn zrʕh ʔnwn dʔbrhm klhwn bnyʔ mṭl dʔtʔmr dbʔysḥq ntqrʔ lk zrʕʔ
09:08	hnw dyn lʔ hwʔ bnyʔ dbsrʔ ʔytyhwn bnyʔ dʔlhʔ ʔlʔ bnyʔ dmwlknʔ mtḥšbyn lzrʕʔ
09:09	dmwlknʔ gyr ʔytyh mltʔ hdʔ dbzbnʔ hnʔ ʔtʔ wnhwʔ brʔ lsrʔ
09:10	wlw hdʔ blḥwd ʔlʔ ʔp rpqʔ kd ʕm ḥd ʔbwn ʔysḥq ʔyt hwʔ lh šwtpwtʔ
09:11	ʕdlʔ ntyldwn bnyh wlʔ nsʕrwn ṭbtʔ ʔw byštʔ qdmt ʔtydʕt gbywth dʔlhʔ dhy tqwʔ lʔ bʕbdʔ ʔlʔ byd mn dqrʔ
09:12	ʔtʔmr gyr dqšyšʔ nhwʔ ʕbdʔ lzʕwrʔ
09:13	ʔyk dktyb dlyʕqwb rḥmt wlʕsw snyt
09:14	mnʔ hkyl nʔmr dlmʔ ʕwlʔ ʔyt lwt ʔlhʔ ḥs
09:15	hʔ ʔp lmwšʔ ʔmr ʔrḥm ʕl ʔynʔ dmrḥm ʔnʔ wʔḥwn lʔynʔ dḥʔn ʔnʔ
09:16	lʔ hkyl bʔydy mn dṣbʔ wlʔ bʔydy mn drhṭ ʔlʔ bʔydy ʔlhʔ mrḥmnʔ
09:17	ʔmr gyr bktbʔ lprʕwn dlh lhdʔ ʔqymtk dʔḥwʔ bk ḥyly wdntkrz šmy bʔrʕʔ klh
09:18	mdyn ʕl mn dṣbʔ hw mrḥm wʕl mn dṣbʔ mqšʔ
09:19	wkbr tʔmr dlmnʔ ršʔ mnw gyr dnqwm lwqbl ṣbynh
09:20	ʔnt hkyl mn ʔnt ʔw brnšʔ dptgmʔ lʔlhʔ yhb ʔnt dlmʔ ʔmrʔ gbyltʔ lmn dgblh dlmnʔ hknʔ gbltny
09:21	ʔw lʔ šlyṭ pḥrʔ ʕl ṭynh dmnh mn gbyltʔ nʕbd mʔnʔ ḥd lʔyqrʔ wḥd lṣʕrʔ
09:22	ʔn dyn ṣbʔ ʔlhʔ dnḥwʔ rwgzh wnwdʕ ḥylh ʔyty bswgʔʔ dmgrt rwḥh rwgzʔ ʕl mʔnʔ drwgzʔ dgmyryn lʔbdnʔ
09:23	wʔšpʕ rḥmwhy ʕl mʔnʔ drḥmʔ dmṭybyn hww lʔlhʔ ltšbwḥtʔ
09:24	dʔytyn ḥnn qryʔ lʔ hwʔ blḥwd mn yhwdyʔ ʔlʔ ʔp mn ʕmmʔ
09:25	ʔyknʔ dʔp bhwšʕ ʔmr dʔqrʔ lʔylyn dlʔ hww ʕmy ʕmʔ dyly wllʔ ʔtrḥmt ʔtrḥmt
09:26	nhwʔ gyr bdwktʔ kr dmtqryn hww lʔ ʕmy tmn ntqrwn bnyʔ lʔlhʔ ḥyʔ
09:27	ʔšʕyʔ dyn ʔkrz ʕl bny ʔysryl dʔn nhwʔ mnynʔ dbny ʔysryl ʔyk ḥlʔ dbymʔ šrknʔ dmnhwn nḥʔ
09:28	mltʔ grm wpsq wnʕbdyh mryʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ
09:29	wʔyk mdm dqdm ʔmr hw ʔšʕyʔ dʔlw lʔ mryʔ ṣbʔwt ʔwtr ln srydʔ ʔyk sdwm hwyn hwyn wlʕmwrʔ mtdmyn hwyn 
09:30	mnʔ hkyl nʔmr dʕmmʔ dlʔ rhṭyn hww btr kʔnwtʔ ʔdrkw kʔnwtʔ kʔnwtʔ dyn ʔydʔ dmn hymnwtʔ hy
09:31	ʔysryl dyn drhṭ hwʔ btr nmwsʔ dkʔnwtʔ lnmwsʔ dkʔnwtʔ lʔ ʔdrk
09:32	mṭl mnʔ mṭl dlʔ hwʔ mn hymnwtʔ ʔlʔ mn ʕbdwhy dnmwsʔ ʔttqlw gyr bkʔpʔ dtwqltʔ
09:33	ʔyk dktyb dhʔ sʔm ʔnʔ bṣhywn kʔpʔ dtwqltʔ wkʔpʔ dmkšwlʔ wmn dbh nhymn lʔ nbht
10:01	ʔḥy ṣbynʔ dlby wbʕwty dlwt ʔlhʔ ḥlpyhwn dnḥwn
10:02	mshd ʔnʔ gyr ʕlyhwn dṭnnʔ dʔlhʔ ʔyt bhwn ʔlʔ lw bydʕtʔ
10:03	kʔnwth gyr dʔlhʔ lʔ ydʕw ʔlʔ bʕw dkʔnwtʔ dnpšhwn nqymwn wmṭl hnʔ lkʔnwth dʔlhʔ lʔ ʔštʕbdw
10:04	skh gyr dnmwsʔ mšyḥʔ hw lkʔnwtʔ lkl dmhymn
10:05	mwšʔ gyr hknʔ ktb kʔnwtʔ dbnmwsʔ dmn dnʕbd hlyn nḥʔ bhyn
10:06	kʔnwtʔ dyn dbhymnwtʔ hknʔ ʔmrʔ dlʔ tʔmr blbk dmnw slq lšmyʔ wʔḥt lmšyḥʔ
10:07	wmnw nḥt lthwmʔ dšywl wʔsq lmšyḥʔ mn byt mytʔ
10:08	ʔlʔ mnʔ ʔmr qryb hw lk ptgmʔ lpwmk wllbk hdʔ hy mltʔ dhymnwtʔ dmkrzynn
10:09	wʔn twdʔ bpwmk bmrn yšwʕ wthymn blbk dʔlhʔ ʔqymh mn byt mytʔ tḥʔ
10:10	lbʔ gyr dmhymn bh mzddq wpwmʔ dmwdʔ bh ḥyʔ
10:11	ʔmr gyr ktbʔ dkl dmhymn bh lʔ nbht
10:12	wbhdʔ lʔ prš lʔ lyhwdyʔ wlʔ lʔrmyʔ ḥd hw gyr mryʔ dklhwn dʕtyr bkl dqrʔ lh
10:13	kl gyr dnqrʔ šmh dmryʔ nḥʔ
10:14	ʔyknʔ hkyl nqrwn lʔynʔ dlʔ hymnw bh ʔw ʔyknʔ nhymnwn lhw dlʔ šmʕwhy ʔw ʔyknʔ nšmʕwn dlʔ mkrznʔ
10:15	ʔw ʔyknʔ nkrzwn ʔn lʔ nštlḥwn ʔyk dktyb dmʔ yʔyn rglyhwn dmsbry šlmʔ wdmsbry ṭbtʔ
10:16	ʔlʔ lʔ hwʔ klhwn ʔštmʕw lsbrtʔ dʔwnglywn ʔšʕyʔ gyr ʔmr mry mnw hymn lbrt qln
10:17	mkyl hymnwtʔ mn mšmʕ ʔdnʔ hy wmšmʕ ʔdnʔ mn mltʔ dʔlhʔ
10:18	ʔlʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ dlmʔ lʔ šmʕw whʔ bklh ʔrʕʔ npqt brt qlhwn wbswpyh dtbyl mlyhwn
10:19	ʔlʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ dlmʔ lʔ ydʕ ʔysryl qdmyʔ mwšʔ hknʔ ʔmr ʔṭnkwn bʕm dlʔ ʕm wbʕmʔ dlʔ mtṭpys ʔrgzkwn
10:20	ʔšʕyʔ dyn ʔmrḥ wʔmr dʔtḥzyt lʔylyn dlʔ bʕʔwny wʔštkḥt lʔylyn dʕly lʔ šʔlw
10:21	lʔysryl dyn ʔmr dpšṭt ʔydy ywmʔ klh lwt ʕmʔ dmtḥrʔ wlʔ mtṭpys
11:01	ʔlʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ dlmʔ dḥqh ʔlhʔ lʕmh ḥs ʔp ʔnʔ gyr mn ʔysryl ʔnʔ mn zrʕh dʔbrhm mn šrbtʔ dbnymyn
11:02	lʔ dḥq ʔlhʔ lʕmh ʔynʔ dmn qdym ydyʕ hwʔ lh ʔw lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn bktbʔ dʔlyʔ mnʔ ʔmr kd qbl hwʔ lʔlhʔ ʕl ʔysryl wʔmr
11:03	mry lnbyyk qṭlw wlmdbḥyk sḥpw wʔnʔ hw blḥwdy ʔštḥrt wbʕyn lnpšy
11:04	wʔtʔmr lh bglynʔ dhʔ šbqt lnpšy šbʕʔ ʔlpyn gbryn ʔylyn dʕl bwrkyhwn lʔ brkw wlʔ sgdw lbʕlʔ
11:05	hknʔ ʔp bhnʔ zbnʔ šrknʔ hw ʔštḥr bgbytʔ dṭybwtʔ
11:06	ʔn dyn bṭybwtʔ lʔ hwʔ mn ʕbdʔ wʔn lʔ ṭybwtʔ lʔ ʔytyh ṭybwtʔ ʔn dyn bʕbdʔ lʔ hwʔ mn ṭybwtʔ wʔn lʔ ʕbdʔ lʔ ʔytwhy ʕbdʔ
11:07	mnʔ hkyl hy dbʕʔ hwʔ ʔysryl lʔ ʔškḥ gbytʔ dyn ʔškḥt šrkhwn dyn ʔtʕwrw blbhwn
11:08	ʔyknʔ dktyb dyhb lhwn ʔlhʔ rwḥʔ mdʕrnytʔ wʕynʔ dlʔ nbḥrwn bhyn wʔdnʔ dlʔ nšmʕwn ʕdmʔ lywmʔ dywmnʔ
11:09	wdwyd twb ʔmr nhwʔ ptwrhwn qdmyhwn lpḥʔ wpwrʕnhwn ltwqltʔ
11:10	nḥškn ʕynyhwn dlʔ nḥzwn wḥṣhwn bklzbn nhwʔ kpyp
11:11	ʔmr ʔnʔ dyn dlmʔ ʔttqlw ʔyk dnplwn ḥs ʔlʔ btwqlthwn dylhwn hww ḥyʔ lʕmmʔ lṭnnhwn
11:12	wʔn twqlthwn hwt ʕwtrʔ lʕlmʔ wḥybwthwn ʕwtrʔ lʕmmʔ kmʔ hkyl šwmlyhwn
11:13	lkwn dyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lʕmmʔ ʔnʔ dʔyty šlyḥʔ dʕmmʔ ltšmšty mšbḥ ʔnʔ
11:14	dlmʔ ʔṭn lbny bsry wʔḥʔ ʔnšyn mnhwn
11:15	ʔn gyr mstlynwthwn trʕwtʔ lʕlmʔ hwt kmʔ hkyl pwnyhwn ʔlʔ ḥyʔ dmn byt mytʔ
11:16	wʔn dyn ršytʔ qdyšʔ ʔp gbyltʔ wʔn ʕqrʔ qdyš hw ʔp swkʔ
11:17	wʔn mn swkʔ ʔtpšḥ wʔnt dzytʔ ʔnt dbrʔ ʔtṭʕmt bdwkythyn whwyt šwtpʔ lʕqrh wlšwmnh dzytʔ
11:18	lʔ tštbhr ʕl swkʔ ʔn dyn mštbhr ʔnt lʔ hwʔ ʔnt šqyl lh lʕqrʔ ʔlʔ hw ʕqrʔ šqyl lk
11:19	wkbr tʔmr dswkʔ dʔtpšḥ dʔnʔ bdwkythyn ʔtṭʕm
11:20	špyr hlyn mṭl dlʔ hymn ʔtpšḥ ʔnt dyn bhymnwtʔ qmt lʔ ttrym brʕynk ʔlʔ dḥl
11:21	ʔn ʔlhʔ gyr ʕl swkʔ dmn kynhyn lʔ ḥs dlmʔ ʔplʔ ʕlyk nḥws
11:22	ḥzy hkyl bsymwth wqšywth dʔlhʔ ʕl ʔylyn dnplw qšywtʔ ʕlyk dyn bsymwtʔ ʔn tqwʔ bh bbsymwtʔ wʔn lʔ ʔp ʔnt ttpšḥ
11:23	whnwn ʔn lʔ nqwwn bḥsyrwt hymnwthwn ʔp hnwn ntṭʕmwn mškḥ gyr ʔlhʔ dtwb nṭʕm ʔnwn
11:24	ʔn gyr ʔnt dmn zytʔ ʔnt dbrʔ hw dbkynk ʔtpšḥt wdlʔ bkynk ʔtṭʕmt bzytʔ ṭbʔ kmʔ hkyl hnwn ʔn ntṭʕmwn bzytʔ dkynhwn 
11:25	ṣbʔ ʔnʔ gyr dtdʕwn ʔḥy ʔrzʔ hnʔ dlʔ thwwn ḥkymyn brʕyn npškwn dʕwyrwt lbʔ mn ʔtr qlyl hwt lʔysryl ʕdmʔ dnʕwl mwlyʔ dʕmmʔ
11:26	whydyn klh ʔysryl nḥʔ ʔyknʔ dktyb dnʔtʔ mn ṣhywn prwqʔ wnhpk ʕwlʔ mn yʕqwb
11:27	whydyn thwʔ lhwn dytqʔ hy dmn lwty mʔ dšbqt lhwn ḥṭhyhwn
11:28	bʔwnglywn dyn bʕldbbʔ ʔnwn mṭltkwn wbgbywtʔ ḥbybyn ʔnwn mṭl ʔbhtʔ
11:29	lʔ gyr hpkʔ ʔlhʔ bmwhbth wbqrynh
11:30	ʔyknʔ gyr dʔp ʔntwn lʔ mtṭpysyn hwytwn lʔlhʔ mn qdym whšʔ ʔtḥnntwn mṭl lʔ mtṭpysnwthwn dhnwn
11:31	hknʔ ʔp hlyn lʔ ʔtṭpysw hšʔ lrḥmʔ dʕlykwn dʔp ʕlyhwn nhwwn rḥmʔ
11:32	ḥbš gyr ʔlhʔ lklnš blʔ mtṭpysnwtʔ dʕl kl ʔnš nrḥm
11:33	ʔw ʕwmqʔ dʕwtrʔ wḥkmtʔ wmdʕʔ dʔlhʔ dʔnš lʔ mš dynwhy wʔwrḥth lʔ mtʕqbn
11:34	mnw gyr ydʕ rʕynh dmryʔ ʔw mnw hwʔ lh bʕl mlkʔ
11:35	wmnw qdm yhb lh wkn nsb mnh
11:36	mṭl dkl mnh wkl bh wkl bʔydh dlh tšbḥn wbwrkn lʕlm ʕlmyn ʔmyn
12:01	bʕnʔ hkyl mnkwn ʔḥy brḥmwhy dʔlhʔ dtqymwn pgrykwn dbḥtʔ ḥytʔ wqdyštʔ wmqbltʔ lʔlhʔ btšmštʔ mlyltʔ
12:02	wlʔ ttdmwn lʕlmʔ hnʔ ʔlʔ ʔštḥlpw bḥwdtʔ drʕynykwn whwytwn pršyn ʔynʔ hw ṣbynʔ dʔlhʔ ṭbʔ wmqblʔ wgmyrʔ
12:03	ʔmr ʔnʔ dyn bṭybwtʔ dʔtyhbt ly lklkwn dlʔ thwwn mtrʕyn lbr mn mʔ dwlʔ dttrʕwn ʔlʔ thwwn mtrʕyn bnkpwtʔ klnš ʔyk dplg lh ʔlhʔ hymnwtʔ bmšwḥtʔ
12:04	ʔyknʔ gyr dbḥd pgrʔ hdmʔ sgyʔʔ ʔyt ln wklhwn hdmʔ lʔ hwʔ ḥd swʕrnʔ ʔyt lhwn
12:05	hknʔ ʔp ḥnn dsgyʔʔ ḥnn ḥd ḥnn pgr bmšyḥʔ ḥd ḥd mnn dyn hdmʔ ḥnn dḥddʔ
12:06	ʔlʔ ʔyt ln mwhbtʔ mšḥlptʔ ʔyk ṭybwtʔ dʔtyhbt ln ʔyt dnbywtʔ ʔyk mšwḥtʔ dhymnwth
12:07	wʔyt dtšmštʔ ʔyt lh btšmšth wʔyt dmlpnʔ hw bywlpnh
12:08	wʔyt dmbyʔnʔ hw bbwyʔh wdyhb bpšyṭwtʔ wdqʔm bršʔ bḥpyṭwtʔ wdmrḥm bpṣyḥwtʔ
12:09	wlʔ nhwʔ nkyl ḥwbkwn ʔlʔ hwytwn snyn lbyštʔ wmtnqpyn lṭbtʔ
12:10	hwytwn rḥmyn lʔḥykwn wmḥbyn ḥd lḥd hwytwn mqdmyn myqryn ḥd lḥd
12:11	hwytwn ḥpyṭyn wlʔ ḥbnnyn hwytwn rtḥyn brwḥ hwytwn plḥyn lmrkwn
12:12	hwytwn ḥdyn bsbrkwn hwytwn msybryn ʔwlṣnykwn hwytwn ʔmynyn bṣlwtʔ
12:13	hwytwn mštwtpyn lsnyqwtʔ dqdyšʔ hwytwn rḥmyn ʔksnyʔ
12:14	brkw lrdwpykwn brkw wlʔ tlwṭwn
12:15	ḥdw ʕm dḥdyn wbkw ʕm dbkyn
12:16	wmdm dmtrʕyn ʔntwn ʕl npškwn ʔp ʕl ʔḥykwn wlʔ ttrʕwn rʕynʔ rmʔ ʔlʔ qpw lʔylyn dmkykyn wlʔ hwytwn ḥkymyn brʕyn npškwn
12:17	wlʔ tprʕwn lʔnš byštʔ ḥlp byštʔ ʔlʔ ntbṭl lkwn dtʕbdwn ṭbtʔ qdm bnynšʔ klhwn
12:18	wʔn mškḥʔ ʔyk dmn lwtkwn ʕm klbrnš šlmʔ ʕbdw
12:19	wlʔ hwytwn tbʕyn npškwn ḥbyby ʔlʔ hbw ʔtrʔ lrwgzʔ ktyb hw gyr dʔn lʔ tʕbd dynʔ lnpšk ʔnʔ ʔʕbd dynk ʔmr ʔlhʔ
12:20	wʔn kpn bʕldbbk ʔwklyhy wʔn ṣhʔ ʔšqyhy wʔn hlyn tʕbd lh gwmrʔ dnwrʔ tqbr ʕl qrqpth
12:21	lʔ tzkykwn byštʔ ʔlʔ zkʔwh lbyštʔ bṭbtʔ
13:01	kl npš lšwlṭnʔ drbwtʔ tštʕbd lyt gyr šwlṭnʔ dlʔ hwʔ mn ʔlhʔ hw wʔylyn šwlṭnʔ dʔytyhwn mn ʔlhʔ hw pqydyn
13:02	mn dqʔm hkyl lwqbl šwlṭnʔ lwqbl pwqdnʔ dʔlhʔ qʔm whlyn dqymyn lwqblhwn dynʔ nsbwn
13:03	dynʔ gyr lʔ hww dḥltʔ lʕbdʔ ṭbʔ ʔlʔ lbyšʔ ṣbʔ ʔnt hkyl dlʔ tdḥl mn šwlṭnʔ ʕbd ṭbtʔ wtšbwḥtʔ thwʔ lk mnh
13:04	mšmšnʔ hw gyr dʔlhʔ ʔlʔ lk lṭbtʔ wʔn byštʔ ʕbd ʔnt dḥl lʔ hwʔ gyr sryqʔyt ʔsyr lspsrʔ mšmšnʔ hw gyr dʔlhʔ wtbwʕʔ drwgzʔ lʔylyn dʕbdyn byštʔ
13:05	wmṭl hnʔ ʔlṣʔ ln dnštʕbd lʔ mṭl rwgzʔ blḥwd ʔlʔ ʔp mṭl tʔrtn
13:06	mṭl hnʔ ʔp ksp ršʔ yhbyn ʔntwn mšmšnʔ ʔnwn gyr dʔlhʔ dʕlyhyn dhlyn qymyn
13:07	prwʕw hkyl lklnš ʔyk dmtḥyb lh lmn dksp ršʔ ksp ršʔ wlmn dmksʔ mksʔ wlmn ddḥltʔ dḥltʔ wlmn dʔyqrʔ ʔyqrʔ
13:08	wlʔnš mdm lʔ tḥwbwn ʔlʔ ḥd lḥd lmḥbw mn dmḥb gyr ḥbrh nmwsʔ mly
13:09	wʔp hy gyr dʔmr dlʔ tgwr wlʔ tqṭwl wlʔ tgnwb wlʔ trg wʔn ʔyt pwqdnʔ ʔḥrnʔ bhdʔ mltʔ mštlm dtrḥm lqrybk ʔyk npšk
13:10	ḥwbʔ lqrybh byštʔ lʔ sʕr mṭl dḥwbʔ mwlyh hw dnmwsʔ
13:11	wʔp hdʔ dʕw dzbnʔ hw wšʕtʔ hy mkyl dntʕyr mn šntn hšʔ hw gyr ʔtqrbw ln ḥyyn ytyr mn dkd hymnn
13:12	llyʔ mkyl ʕbr wʔymmʔ qrb nnyḥ mnn hkyl ʕbdʔ dḥšwkʔ wnlbš zynh dnwhrʔ
13:13	wʔyk dbʔymmʔ bʔskmʔ nhlk lʔ bzmrʔ wlʔ brwywtʔ wlʔ bmdmkʔ ṭnpʔ wlʔ bḥsmʔ wbḥrynʔ
13:14	ʔlʔ lwbšwhy lmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ wlʔ tʔṣpwn dbsrkwn lrgygtʔ
14:01	lʔynʔ dyn dkryh bhymnwtʔ hbw lh ʔydʔ wlʔ thwwn mtplgyn bmḥšbtkwn
14:02	ʔyt gyr dmhymn dklmdm nʔkwl wdkryh yrqʔ hw ʔkl
14:03	hw dyn dʔkl lhw mn dlʔ ʔkl lʔ nšwṭ whw mn dlʔ ʔkl lhw mn dʔkl lʔ ndwn ʔlhʔ gyr qrbh
14:04	ʔnt mn ʔnt ddʔn ʔnt lʕbdʔ dlʔ dylk dʔn qʔm lmrh qʔm wʔn npl lmrh npl mqm hw dyn qʔm mṭʔ gyr bʔydy mrh dnqymywhy
14:05	ʔyt ddʔn ywmʔ mn ywmʔ wʔyt ddʔn klhwn ywmtʔ klnš dyn bmdʕʔ dnpšh nštrr
14:06	mn dmtrʕʔ dywmʔ lmrh mtrʕʔ wkl dlʔ mtrʕʔ dywmʔ lmrh lʔ mtrʕʔ wdʔkl lmrh ʔkl wlʔlhʔ mwdʔ wdlʔ ʔkl lmrh lʔ ʔkl wmwdʔ lʔlhʔ
14:07	lyt gyr ʔnš mnn dlnpšh ḥy wlyt ʔnš dlnpšh mʔt
14:08	mṭl dʔn ḥʔynn lmrn ḥʔynn wʔn mytynn lmrn hw mytynn wʔn ḥyynn hkyl wʔn mytynn dmrn ḥnn
14:09	mṭl hnʔ ʔp mšyḥʔ myt wḥyʔ wqm dhw nhwʔ mryʔ lmytʔ wlḥyʔ
14:10	ʔnt dyn mnʔ dʔn ʔnt lʔḥwk ʔw ʔp ʔnt lmnʔ šʔṭ ʔnt lʔḥwk kln gyr ʕtydynn lmqm qdm bym dmšyḥʔ
14:11	ʔyk dktyb dḥy ʔnʔ ʔmr mryʔ dly tkwp kl brwk wly nwdʔ kl lšn
14:12	mdyn kl ʔnš mnn ptgmʔ ḥlp npšh yhb lʔlhʔ
14:13	lʔ mkyl ndwn ḥd lḥd ʔlʔ hdʔ dwnw ytyrʔyt dtwqltʔ lʔḥwk lʔ tsym
14:14	ydʕ ʔnʔ gyr wmps ʔnʔ bmryʔ yšwʕ dmdm dmsyb mn lwth lyt ʔlʔ lʔynʔ drnʔ ʕl mdm dṭmʔ lhw hw blḥwd ṭmʔ
14:15	ʔn dyn mṭl mʔkwltʔ mʕyq ʔnt lʔḥwk lʔ hwʔ bḥwbʔ mhlk ʔnt lʔ twbd bmʔkwltk lhw dmṭlth myt mšyḥʔ
14:16	wlʔ ttgdp ṭbtn
14:17	mlkwth gyr dʔlhʔ lʔ hwt mʔklʔ wmštyʔ ʔlʔ kʔnwtʔ wšlmʔ wḥdwtʔ brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ
14:18	mn dbhlyn gyr mšmš lmšyḥʔ špr lʔlhʔ wqdm bnynšʔ bqʔ
14:19	hšʔ btr šlmʔ nrhṭ wbtr bnynʔ ḥd dḥd
14:20	wlʔ mṭl mʔkwltʔ nšrʔ ʕbdʔ dʔlhʔ klmdm gyr dkʔ hw ʔlʔ byš hw lbrnšʔ dbtwqltʔ ʔkl
14:21	špyr hw dlʔ nʔkwl bsrʔ wlʔ nštʔ ḥmrʔ wlʔ mdm dmttql bh ʔḥwn
14:22	ʔnt dʔyt bk hymnwtʔ bnpšk ʔḥwdyh qdm ʔlhʔ ṭwbwhy lmn dlʔ dn npšh bmdm dprš
14:23	ʔynʔ gyr dmtplg wʔkl ʔtḥyb lh mṭl dlw bhymnwtʔ kl mdm gyr dlʔ hwʔ mn hymnwtʔ ḥṭytʔ hw
15:01	ḥybynn hkyl ḥnn ḥyltnʔ dkwrhnʔ dmḥylʔ nšqwl wlʔ lnpšn nšpr
15:02	ʔlʔ ʔnš mnn lqrybh nšpr bṭbtʔ ʔyk dlbnynʔ
15:03	mṭl dʔp mšyḥʔ lʔ hwʔ lnpšh špr ʔlʔ ʔyk dktyb dḥsdʔ dmḥsdnyk npl ʕly
15:04	kl mdm gyr dmn qdym ʔtktb lywlpnʔ hw dyln ʔtktb dbmsybrnwtʔ wbbwyʔʔ dktbʔ sbrʔ nhwʔ ln
15:05	ʔlhʔ dyn dmsybrnwtʔ wdbwyʔʔ ntl lkwn dšwywtʔ ttḥšbwn ḥd ʕl ḥd byšwʕ mšyḥʔ
15:06	dbḥd rʕyn wbḥd pwm tšbḥwn lʔlhʔ ʔbwhy dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
15:07	mṭl hdʔ hww mqrbyn wṭʕnyn lḥddʔ ʔyknʔ dʔp mšyḥʔ qrbkwn ltšbwḥth dʔlhʔ
15:08	ʔmr ʔnʔ dyn dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ šmš gzwrtʔ ḥlp šrrh dʔlhʔ ʔyknʔ dnšr mwlknʔ dʔbhtʔ
15:09	wʕmmʔ nšbḥwn lʔlhʔ ḥlp rḥmʔ dhww ʕlyhwn ʔyk dktyb dʔwdʔ lk bʕmmʔ wlšmk ʔzmr
15:10	wtwb ʔmr ʔtbsmw ʕmmʔ ʕm ʕmh
15:11	wtwb ʔmr šbḥw lmryʔ klkwn ʕmmʔ šbḥyhy klhyn ʔmwtʔ
15:12	wtwb ʔšʕyʔ ʔmr dnhwʔ ʕqrʔ lʔyšy wmn dnqwm nhwʔ ršʔ lʕmmʔ wʕlwhy nsbrwn ʕmmʔ
15:13	ʔlhʔ dyn dsbrʔ nmlykwn klh ḥdwtʔ wšlmʔ bhymnwtʔ dttytrwn bsbrh bḥylʔ drwḥʔ dqwdšʔ 
15:14	mps ʔnʔ dyn ʔp ʔnʔ ʕlykwn ʔḥy dʔp ʔntwn mlyn ʔntwn hw ṭbtʔ wmšmlytwn bklh ydʕtʔ wmškḥyn ʔntwn ʔp lʔḥrnʔ lmrtyw
15:15	qlyl dyn mrḥʔyt ktbt lkwn ʔḥy ʔyknʔ dʔʕhdkwn bṭybwtʔ dʔtyhbt ly mn ʔlhʔ
15:16	dʔhwʔ mšmšnʔ lyšwʕ mšyḥʔ bʕmmʔ wʔplwḥ lʔwnglywn dʔlhʔ dnhwʔ qwrbnʔ dʕmmʔ mqbl wmqdš brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ
15:17	ʔyt ly hkyl šwbhrʔ byšwʕ mšyḥʔ lwt ʔlhʔ
15:18	lʔ gyr mmrḥ ʔnʔ dʔmr mdm dlʔ sʕr bʔydy mšyḥʔ lmšmʕʔ dʕmmʔ bmltʔ wbʕbdʔ
15:19	bḥylʔ dʔtwtʔ wdtdmrtʔ wbḥylʔ drwḥh dʔlhʔ ʔyknʔ dmn ʔwršlm ʔtkrk ʕdmʔ lʔlwryqwn wʔmlʔ sbrth dmšyḥʔ
15:20	kd mtḥpṭ ʔnʔ ʔsbr lʔ kr dʔtqry šmh dmšyḥʔ dlʔ ʔbnʔ ʕl štʔstʔ nwkrytʔ
15:21	ʔlʔ ʔyknʔ dktyb dʔylyn dlʔ ʔtʔmr lhwn ʕlwhy nḥzwnh wʔylyn dlʔ šmʕw ntṭpyswn
15:22	mṭl hnʔ ʔttkst zbnyn sgyʔn dʔtʔ lwtkwn
15:23	hšʔ dyn mṭl ddwkʔ lyt ly bhlyn ʔtrwtʔ wswʔ hwyt mn qdm šnyʔ sgyʔtʔ dʔtʔ lwtkwn
15:24	mʔ dʔzl ʔnʔ lʔspnyʔ msbr ʔnʔ dʔtʔ wʔḥzykwn wʔntwn tlwwnny ltmn mʔ dqlyl mn sgy ʔtbsmt bḥztkwn
15:25	hšʔ dyn ʔzl ʔnʔ lʔwršlm dʔšmš lqdyšʔ
15:26	ṣbw gyr hlyn dbmqdwnyʔ wbʔkʔyʔ dšwtpwtʔ thwʔ lhwn ʕm msknʔ qdyšʔ dʔyt bʔwršlm
15:27	ṣbw mṭl dʔp ḥybyn lhwn ʔn gyr bdrwḥ ʔštwtpw ʕmhwn ʕmmʔ ḥybyn ʔnwn dʔp bdbsr nšmšwn ʔnwn
15:28	hdʔ hkyl mʔ dgmrt wḥtmt lhwn ʔdšʔ hnʔ ʕbr ʔnʔ ʕlykwn lʔspnyʔ
15:29	ydʕ ʔnʔ dyn dʔmty dʔtʔ ʔnʔ lwtkwn bmwlyʔ hw dbwrktʔ dʔwnglywn dmšyḥʔ ʔtʔ ʔnʔ
15:30	bʕʔ ʔnʔ dyn mnkwn ʔḥy bmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ wbḥwbʔ drwḥʔ dtʕmlwn ʕmy bṣlwtʔ dḥlpy lwt ʔlhʔ
15:31	dʔtpṣʔ mn ʔylyn dlʔ mtṭpysyn dbyhwd wtšmštʔ dmwbl ʔnʔ lqdyšʔ dbʔwršlm ttqbl špyr
15:32	wʔtʔ lwtkwn bḥdwtʔ bṣbynh dʔlhʔ wʔttnyḥ ʕmkwn
15:33	ʔlhʔ dyn dšlmʔ nhwʔ ʕm klkwn ʔmyn
16:01	mgʕl ʔnʔ lkwn dyn lpwbʔ ḥtn dʔytyh mšmšnytʔ dʕdtʔ dqnkrʔws
16:02	dtqblwnh bmrn ʔyk dzdq lqdyšʔ wbkl ṣbw dbʕyʔ mnkwn tqwmwn lh mṭl dʔp hy qywmtʔ hwt lsgyʔʔ ʔp ly
16:03	šʔlw bšlmʔ dprysqlʔ wdʔqls plḥʔ dʕmy byšwʕ mšyḥʔ
16:04	dhnwn hlyn ḥlp npšy ṣwryhwn yhbw wlʔ hwʔ ʔnʔ blḥwdy mwdʔ ʔnʔ lhwn ʔlʔ ʔp klhyn ʕdtʔ dʕmmʔ
16:05	whbw šlmʔ lʕdtʔ dʔyt bbythwn šʔlw bšlmʔ dʔpnṭws ḥbyby ʔynʔ dʔytwhy ršytʔ dʔkʔyʔ bmšyḥʔ
16:06	šʔlw bšlmʔ dmryʔ ʔydʔ dsgy lʔyt bkwn
16:07	šʔlw bšlmʔ dʔndrwnyqws wdywnyʔ ʔḥyny dhww šbyʔ ʕmy wydyʕyn ʔnwn bšlyḥʔ wbmšyḥʔ qdmy hww
16:08	šʔlw bšlmʔ dʔmplyws ḥbyby bmrn
16:09	šʔlw bšlmʔ dʔwrbnws plḥʔ dʕmn bmšyḥʔ wdʔsṭkws ḥbyby
16:10	šʔlw bšlmʔ dʔplʔ gbyʔ bmrn šʔlw bšlmʔ dbny byth dʔrsṭbwlws
16:11	šʔlw bšlmʔ dhrwdywn ʔḥyny šʔlw bšlmʔ dbny byth dnrqsws ʔylyn dʔytyhwn bmrn
16:12	šʔlw bšlmʔ dṭrwpnʔ wdṭrwpsʔ dlʔyyn bmrn šʔlw bšlmʔ dprss ḥbybty ʔydʔ dsgy lʔyt bmrn
16:13	šʔlw bšlmʔ drwps gbyʔ bmrn wdʔmh dylh wdyly
16:14	šʔlw bšlmʔ dʔswnqrṭws wdplgwn wdhrmʔ wdpṭrbʔ wdhrmʔ wdʔḥʔ dʕmhwn
16:15	šʔlw bšlmʔ dpyllgws wdywlyʔ wdnʔrws wdḥth wdʔlwmpʔ wdklhwn qdyšʔ dʕmhwn
16:16	šʔlw bšlmʔ ḥd dḥd bnwšqtʔ qdyštʔ šʔln bšlmkwn klhyn ʕdth dmšyḥʔ
16:17	bʕnʔ dyn mnkwn ʔḥy dtzdhrwn mn ʔylyn dplgwtʔ wmkšwlʔ ʕbdyn lbr mn ywlpnʔ dʔntwn ylptwn dttrḥqwn lkwn mnhwn
16:18	ʔylyn gyr dhknʔ ʔnwn lʔ mšmšyn lmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʔlʔ lkrshwn wbmlʔ bsymtʔ wbbwrktʔ mṭʕyn lbwtʔ dpšyṭʔ
16:19	mštmʕnwtkwn dyn dylkwn lkl brnš ʔtydʕt ḥdʔ ʔnʔ hkyl bkwn wṣbʔ ʔnʔ dthwwn ḥkymyn lṭbtʔ wtmymyn lbyštʔ
16:20	ʔlhʔ dyn dšlmʔ nšḥqywhy bʕgl lsṭnʔ tḥyt rglykwn ṭybwth dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ thwʔ ʕmkwn
16:21	šʔlyn bšlmkwn ṭymtʔws plḥʔ dʕmy wlwqyws wʔyswnw swsypṭrws ʔḥyny
16:22	šʔl ʔnʔ bšlmkwn ʔnʔ ṭrṭyws dktbt ʔgrtʔ bmrn
16:23	šʔl bšlmkwn gʔyws mqblny wdklh ʕdtʔ šʔl bšlmkwn ʔrsṭws rbytʔ dmdyntʔ wqwʔrṭws ʔḥʔ
16:24	lʔlhʔ dyn hw dmškḥ dnšrrkwn bʔwnglywn dyly hw dʔtkrz ʕl yšwʕ mšyḥʔ bglynʔ dʔrzʔ dmn zbny ʕlmʔ mksy hwʔ
16:25	ʔtgly dyn bzbnʔ hnʔ byd ktbʔ dnbyʔ wbpwqdnh dʔlhʔ dlʕlm ʔtydʕ lklhwn ʕmmʔ lmšmʕʔ dhymnwtʔ
16:26	dhwyw ḥkymʔ blḥwdwhy šwbḥʔ byd yšwʕ mšyḥʔ lʕlm ʕlmyn ʔmyn
16:27	ṭybwth dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʕm klkwn ʔmyn 
01:01	pwlws qryʔ wšlyḥʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ bṣbynh dʔlhʔ wswstns ʔḥʔ
01:02	lʕdtʔ dʔlhʔ dbqwrntws qryʔ wqdyšʔ dbyšwʕ mšyḥʔ mqdšyn wlklhwn ʔylyn dqryn šmh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ bkl ʔtr dylhwn wdyln
01:03	ṭybwtʔ ʕmkwn wšlmʔ mn ʔlhʔ ʔbwn wmn mrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:04	mwdʔ ʔnʔ lʔlhy bklzbn ḥlpykwn ʕl ṭybwtʔ dʔlhʔ dʔtyhbt lkwn byšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:05	dbkl mdm ʕtrtwn bh bkl mlʔ wbkl ydʕtʔ
01:06	ʔyk dshdwth dmšyḥʔ ʔštrrt bkwn
01:07	dlʔ ʔtbṣrtwn bḥdʔ mn mwhbth ʔlʔ mskyn ʔntwn lglynh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:08	dhw nšrrkwn ʕdmʔ lʔḥrytʔ ddlʔ ršyn thwwn bywmh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:09	mhymn hw ʔlhʔ dbʔydh ʔtqrytwn lšwtpwtʔ dbrh yšwʕ mšyḥʔ mrn
01:10	bʕʔ ʔnʔ dyn mnkwn ʔḥy bšmh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ dthwʔ ḥdʔ mltʔ lklkwn wlʔ nhwyn bkwn plgwtʔ ʔlʔ thwwn gmyryn bḥdʔ trʕytʔ wbḥd rʕynʔ
01:11	šlḥw ly gyr ʕlykwn ʔḥy mn byt klʔʔ dḥrynʔ ʔyt byntkwn
01:12	hdʔ dyn ʔmr ʔnʔ dʔyt mnkwn dʔmr ʔnʔ dpwlws ʔnʔ wʔyt dʔmr ʔnʔ dʔplw ʔnʔ wʔyt dʔmr ʔnʔ dkʔpʔ ʔnʔ wʔyt dʔmr ʔnʔ dmšyḥʔ ʔnʔ
01:13	dlmʔ ʔtplg lh mšyḥʔ ʔw lmʔ pwlws ʔzdqp ʕl ʔpykwn ʔw bšmh dpwlws ʕmdtwn
01:14	mwdʔ ʔnʔ lʔlhy dlʔnš mnkwn lʔ ʔʕmdt ʔlʔ lkryspws wlgʔyws
01:15	dlʔ ʔnš nʔmr dbšmy ʔʕmdt
01:16	ʔʕmdt dyn ʔp lbyth dʔsṭpnʔ twb dyn lʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ ʔn lʔnš ʔḥryn ʔʕmdt
01:17	lʔ gyr šdrny mšyḥʔ lmʕmdw ʔlʔ lmsbrw lʔ bḥkmt mlʔ dlʔ nstrq zqyph dmšyḥʔ
01:18	mltʔ gyr dzqypʔ lʔbydʔ šṭywtʔ hy ln dyn lʔylyn dḥyynn ḥylʔ hy dʔlhʔ
01:19	ktyb gyr dʔwbd ḥkmtʔ dḥkymʔ wʔglwz trʕytʔ dskwltnʔ
01:20	ʔykʔ hw ḥkymʔ ʔw ʔykʔ hw sprʔ ʔw ʔykʔ hw drwšʔ dʕlmʔ hnʔ lʔ hʔ ʔšṭyh ʔlhʔ ḥkmth dʕlmʔ hnʔ
01:21	mṭl gyr dbḥkmth dʔlhʔ lʔ ydʕ ʕlmʔ bḥkmtʔ lʔlhʔ ṣbʔ ʔlhʔ dbšṭywtʔ dkrwzwtʔ nḥʔ lʔylyn dmhymnyn
01:22	mṭl dyhwdyʔ ʔtwtʔ šʔlyn wʔrmyʔ ḥkmtʔ bʕyn
01:23	ḥnn dyn mkrzynn mšyḥʔ kd zqyp twqltʔ lyhwdyʔ wlʔrmyʔ šṭywtʔ
01:24	lhnwn dyn dqryn yhwdyʔ wʔrmyʔ mšyḥʔ ḥylʔ dʔlhʔ wḥkmtʔ dʔlhʔ
01:25	mṭl dšṭywth dʔlhʔ ḥkymʔ hy mn bnynšʔ wkryhwth dʔlhʔ ḥyltnyʔ hy mn bny ʔnšʔ
01:26	ḥzw gyr ʔp qrytkwn ʔḥy dlʔ sgyʔyn bkwn ḥkymʔ bbsr wlʔ sgyʔyn bkwn ḥyltnʔ wlʔ sgyʔyn bkwn bny ṭwhmʔ rbʔ
01:27	ʔlʔ gbʔ ʔlhʔ lsklwhy dʕlmʔ dnbht lḥkymʔ wgbʔ kryhwhy dʕlmʔ dnbht lḥyltnʔ
01:28	wgbʔ lʔylyn dbṣyr ṭwhmhwn bʕlmʔ wlmslyʔ wlʔylyn dlyt ʔnwn dnbṭl lʔylyn dʔytyhwn
01:29	dlʔ nštbhr kl bsr qdmwhy
01:30	ʔp ʔntwn dyn mnh ʔntwn byšwʕ mšyḥʔ hw dhwʔ ln ḥkmtʔ mn ʔlhʔ wzdyqwtʔ wqdyšwtʔ wpwrqnʔ
01:31	ʔyk dktyb dmn dmštbhr bmryʔ nštbhr
02:01	wʔnʔ ʔḥy kd ʔtyt lwtkwn lʔ bmmllʔ rwrbʔ ʔplʔ bḥkmtʔ sbrtkwn ʔrzh dʔlhʔ
02:02	wlʔ dnt npšy byntkwn ʔyk dmdm ydʕ ʔnʔ ʔlʔ ʔn lyšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʔp lh kd zqyp
02:03	wʔnʔ bdḥltʔ sgyʔtʔ wbrtytʔ hwyt lwtkwn
02:04	wmlty wkrwzwty lʔ hwt bmpysnwtʔ dmlʔ dḥkmtʔ ʔlʔ btḥwytʔ drwḥʔ wdḥylʔ
02:05	dlʔ thwʔ hymnwtkwn bḥkmtʔ dbnynšʔ ʔlʔ bḥylʔ dʔlhʔ
02:06	ḥkmtʔ dyn mmllynn bgmyrʔ ḥkmtʔ lʔ dhnʔ ʕlmʔ ʔplʔ dšlyṭnwhy dʕlmʔ hnʔ dmtbṭlyn
02:07	ʔlʔ mmllynn ḥkmtʔ dʔlhʔ bʔrz hy dmksyʔ hwt wqdm hwʔ pršh ʔlhʔ mn qdm ʕlmʔ lšwbḥʔ dyln
02:08	hy dḥd mn šlyṭnʔ dʕlmʔ hnʔ lʔ ydʕh ʔlw gyr ydʕwh lw lmrh dtšbwḥtʔ zqpyn hww
02:09	ʔlʔ ʔyk dktyb dʕynʔ lʔ ḥzt wʔdnʔ lʔ šmʕt wʕl lbʔ dbrnšʔ lʔ slq mdm dṭyb ʔlhʔ lʔylyn drḥmyn lh
02:10	ln dyn glʔ ʔlhʔ brwḥh rwḥʔ gyr klmdm bṣyʔ ʔp ʕwmqwhy dʔlhʔ
02:11	ʔynʔ hw gyr brnšʔ dydʕ dbbrnšʔ ʔlʔ ʔn rwḥʔ dbr ʔnšʔ dbh hknʔ ʔp dbʔlhʔ ʔnš lʔ ydʕ ʔlʔ ʔn rwḥh dʔlhʔ
02:12	ḥnn dyn lʔ hwʔ rwḥʔ dʕlmʔ nsbn ʔlʔ rwḥʔ dmn ʔlhʔ dndʕ mwhbtʔ dmn ʔlhʔ ʔtyhb ln 
02:13	ʔylyn dʔp mmllynn lʔ hwʔ bywlpnʔ dmlʔ dḥkmtʔ dbnynšʔ ʔlʔ bywlpnʔ drwḥʔ wlrwḥnʔ rwḥnytʔ mpḥmynn
02:14	brnšʔ gyr dbnpš hw lʔ mqbl rwḥnytʔ šṭywtʔ ʔnyn gyr lh wlʔ mškḥ dndʕ dbrwḥ mtdyn
02:15	rwḥnʔ dyn kl mdm dʔn whw mn ʔnš lʔ mtdyn
02:16	mnw gyr ydʕ rʕynh dmryʔ dnlpywhy ln dyn rʕynʔ dmšyḥʔ ʔyt ln
03:01	wʔnʔ ʔḥy lʔ ʔškḥt dʔmll ʕmkwn ʔyk dʕm rwḥnʔ ʔlʔ ʔyk dʕm pgrnʔ wʔyk dlylwdʔ bmšyḥʔ
03:02	ḥlbʔ ʔšqytkwn wlʔ yhbt lkwn mʔkwltʔ lʔ gyr ʕdkyl mškḥyn hwytwn ʔlʔ ʔplʔ hšʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn
03:03	ʕdkyl gyr bbsr ʔntwn ʔykʔ gyr dʔyt bkwn ḥsmʔ wḥrynʔ wplgwtʔ lʔ hʔ pgrnʔ ʔntwn wbbsr mhlkyn ʔntwn
03:04	mʔ dʔmr gyr ʔnš ʔnš mnkwn ʔnʔ dpwlws ʔnʔ wʔḥrnʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ dʔplw ʔnʔ lʔ hʔ pgrnʔ ʔntwn
03:05	mnw gyr pwlws ʔw mnw ʔplw ʔlʔ mšmšnʔ dbʔydyhwn hymntwn wʔnš ʔnš ʔyk dyhb lh mryʔ
03:06	ʔnʔ nṣbt wʔplw ʔšqy ʔlʔ ʔlhʔ rby
03:07	lʔ hkyl hw dnṣb ʔytwhy mdm wlʔ hw dmšqʔ ʔlʔ ʔlhʔ dmrbʔ
03:08	mn dnṣb dyn wmn dmšqʔ ḥd ʔnwn wʔnš ʔyk ʕmlh ʔgrh mqbl
03:09	ʕm ʔlhʔ gyr plḥynn wpwlḥnʔ dʔlhʔ wbnynʔ dʔlhʔ ʔntwn ʔnwn
03:10	wʔyk ṭybwtʔ dʔlhʔ dʔtyhbt ly smt štʔstʔ ʔyk ʔrdklʔ ḥkymʔ ʔḥrnʔ dyn ʕlyh bnʔ klnš dyn nḥzʔ ʔykn bnʔ ʕlyh
03:11	štʔstʔ gyr ʔḥrtʔ sṭr mn hdʔ dsymʔ ʔnš lʔ mškḥ lmsm dʔytyh yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
03:12	wʔn ʔnš dyn bnʔ ʕl hdʔ štʔstʔ dhbʔ ʔw sʔmʔ ʔw kʔpʔ yqyrtʔ ʔw qysʔ ʔw ʕmyrʔ ʔw ḥbtʔ
03:13	ʕbdʔ dklnš mtglʔ ywmʔ gyr hw glʔ lh mṭl dbnwrʔ mtglʔ wʕbdh dklnš ʔyknʔ ʔytwhy nwrʔ tpršywhy
03:14	wʔynʔ dnqwʔ ʕbdh hw dbnʔ ʔgrh nqbl
03:15	wʔynʔ dʕbdh nʔqd nḥsr hw dyn nštwzb hknʔ dyn ʔyk dmn nwrʔ
03:16	lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn dhyklh ʔntwn dʔlhʔ wrwḥh dʔlhʔ ʕmrʔ bkwn
03:17	wmn dmḥbl hyklh dʔlhʔ mḥbl lh ʔlhʔ hyklh gyr dʔlhʔ qdyš hw dʔntwn ʔnwn
03:18	ʔnš lʔ nṭʕʔ npšh mn dsbr bkwn dḥkym hw bʕlmʔ hnʔ nhwʔ lh sklʔ dnhwʔ ḥkymʔ
03:19	ḥkmth gyr dʕlmʔ hnʔ llwtʔ hy lwt ʔlhʔ ktyb hw gyr dʔḥd ḥkymʔ bḥrʕwthwn
03:20	wtwb mryʔ ydʕ mḥšbthwn dḥkymʔ dsryqn ʔnyn
03:21	mṭl hnʔ lʔ ʔnš nštbhr bbnynšʔ klmdm gyr dylkwn hw
03:22	ʔn pwlws wʔn ʔplw wʔn kʔpʔ wʔn ʕlmʔ wʔn ḥyʔ wʔn mwtʔ wʔn dqymn wʔn dʕtydn kl mdm dylkwn hw
03:23	wʔntwn dmšyḥʔ wmšyḥʔ dʔlhʔ
04:01	hknʔ hwyn ḥšybyn lkwn ʔyk mšmšnʔ dmšyḥʔ wrby btʔ dʔrzwhy dʔlhʔ
04:02	hrkʔ mkyl mtbʕʔ brby btʔ dʔnš kd mhymn nštkḥ
04:03	ly dyn hdʔ bṣyrwtʔ hy ly dmnkwn ʔtdyn ʔw mn kl br ʔnš ʔlʔ ʔplʔ ʔnʔ npšy dʔn ʔnʔ
04:04	lʔ gyr mdm bnpšy ḥšyš ʔnʔ ʔlʔ lw bhdʔ ʔzddqt dyny gyr mryʔ hw
04:05	mṭl hnʔ lʔ mn qdm zbnʔ thwwn dynyn ʕdmʔ dnʔtʔ mryʔ hw dmnhr ksyth dḥšwkʔ wglʔ mḥšbthwn dlbwtʔ whydyn nhwʔ šwbḥʔ lʔnš ʔnš mn ʔlhʔ
04:06	hlyn dyn ʔḥy mṭltkwn hw smt ʕl prṣwpʔ dyly wdʔplw dbn tʔlpwn dlʔ ttrʕwn ytyr mn mʔ dktyb wʔnš ʕl ḥbrh lʔ ntrym mṭl ʔnš
04:07	mnw gyr bṣk ʔw mnʔ ʔyt lk dlʔ nsbt wʔn nsbt lmnʔ mštbhr ʔnt ʔyk hw dlʔ nsbt
04:08	mn kdw sbʕtwn lkwn wʕtrtwn wblʕdyn ʔmlktwn ʔštwp dyn ʔmlktwn dʔp ḥnn nmlk ʕmkwn
04:09	sbr ʔnʔ gyr dln lšlyḥʔ ʔḥryʔ hw smn ʔlhʔ ʔyk dlmwtʔ dhwyn tʔṭrwn lʕlmʔ wlmlʔkʔ wlbnynšʔ
04:10	ḥnn šṭyʔ mṭl mšyḥʔ ʔntwn dyn ḥkymʔ bmšyḥʔ ḥnn kryhʔ wʔntwn ḥyltnʔ ʔntwn mštbḥyn wḥnn mṣṭʕryn
04:11	ʕdmʔ lhdʔ šʕtʔ kpnynn wṣhynn wʕrṭlyynn wmtqpḥynn wbyt qymʔ lyt ln
04:12	wlʔynn kd plḥynn bʔydyn mṣʕryn ln wmbrkynn rdpyn ln wmsybrynn
04:13	mṣḥyn ln wbʕynn mnhwn ʔyk nptʔ dʕlmʔ hwyn wkwprʔ dklnš ʕdmʔ lhšʔ
04:14	lʔ hwʔ ʔyk dʔbhtkwn ktb ʔnʔ hlyn ʔlʔ ʔyk dlbnyʔ ḥbybʔ mrtʔ ʔnʔ
04:15	ʔn gyr rbw trʔʔ nhwwn lkwn bmšyḥʔ ʔlʔ lʔ sgyʔʔ ʔbhʔ byšwʕ gyr mšyḥʔ ʔnʔ hw ʔwldtkwn bsbrtʔ
04:16	bʕʔ ʔnʔ hkyl mnkwn dby ttdmwn 
04:17	mṭl hnʔ šdrt lwtkwn lṭymtʔws dʔytwhy bry ḥbybʔ wmhymnʔ bmryʔ dhw nʕhdkwn ʔwrḥty dbmšyḥʔ ʔyk mdm dmlp ʔnʔ bklhyn ʕdtʔ
04:18	ʔyk hw dyn dlʔ ʔtʔ ʔnʔ lwtkwn ʔtḥtrw ʔnšʔ mnkwn
04:19	ʔlʔ ʔn mryʔ ṣbʔ bʕgl ʔtʔ ʔnʔ lwtkwn wʔdʕ lʔ mlthwn dhlyn dmrymyn npšhwn ʔlʔ ḥylhwn
04:20	mlkwth gyr dʔlhʔ lʔ hwt bmltʔ ʔlʔ bḥylʔ
04:21	ʔyknʔ ṣbyn ʔntwn bḥwṭrʔ ʔtʔ lwtkwn ʔw bḥwbʔ wbrwḥʔ mkyktʔ
05:01	skʔ mštmʕʔ byntkwn znywtʔ wdʔyk hdʔ znywtʔ ʔydʔ dʔplʔ byt ḥnpʔ mštmhʔ ʕdmʔ dnsb brʔ ʔntt ʔbwhy
05:02	wʔntwn ḥtyryn ʔntwn wlʔ dyn ytyrʔyt ytbtwn bʔblʔ dnštql mn byntkwn hw mn dhnʔ swʕrnʔ sʕr
05:03	ʔnʔ gyr kd rḥyq ʔnʔ mnkwn bpgr wqryb ʔnʔ lkwn brwḥ mn kdw dnt ʔyk qrybʔ lhw mn dhdʔ sʕr
05:04	dbšmh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ ttknšwn klkwn wʔnʔ ʕmkwn brwḥ ʕm ḥylh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
05:05	wtšlmwnh lhnʔ lsṭnʔ lʔbdnʔ dpgrh dbrwḥ nḥʔ bywmh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
05:06	lʔ špyr šwbhrkwn lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn dḥmyrʔ qlyl klh gbyltʔ mḥmʕ
05:07	dkw mnkwn ḥmyrʔ ʕtyqʔ dthwwn gbyltʔ ḥdtʔ ʔyknʔ dʔytykwn pṭyrʔ pṣḥʔ gyr dyln mšyḥʔ hw dʔtnks ḥlpyn
05:08	mṭl hnʔ nʕbd ʕdʕdʔ lʔ bḥmyrʔ ʕtyqʔ wlʔ bḥmyrʔ dbyšwtʔ wdmryrwtʔ ʔlʔ bḥmyrʔ ddkywtʔ wdqdyšwtʔ
05:09	ktbt lkwn bʔgrtʔ dlʔ ttḥlṭwn ʕm znyʔ
05:10	lʔ dyn ʔmr ʔnʔ ʕl znyʔ dbʕlmʔ hnʔ ʔw ʕl ʕlwbʔ ʔw ʕl ḥṭwpʔ ʔw ʕl plḥy ptkrʔ wʔn lʔ ḥybyn hwytwn ʔp mn ʕlmʔ lmpq
05:11	hdʔ dyn dktbt lkwn dlʔ ttḥlṭwn ʔn ʔyt dmtqrʔ ʔḥʔ wʔytwhy znyʔ ʔw ʕlwbʔ ʔw plḥ ptkrʔ ʔw mṣʕrn ʔw rwy ʔw ḥṭwp ʕm ʔynʔ dhknʔ hw ʔplʔ lḥmʔ lmʔkl
05:12	mʔ ly gyr lmdn lbryʔ ʔntwn ldlgw dwnw
05:13	lbryʔ dyn ʔlhʔ dʔn wšwqlwhy lbyšʔ mn byntkwn
06:01	mmrḥ ʔnš mnkwn kd ʔyt lh dynʔ ʕm ʔḥwhy dndwn qdm ʕwlʔ wlʔ qdm qdyšʔ
06:02	ʔw lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn dqdyšʔ lʕlmʔ ndwnwn wʔn ʕlmʔ bkwn mtdyn lʔ šwyn ʔntwn lmdn dynʔ dqdqʔ
06:03	lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn dlmlʔkʔ dynynn ḥd kmʔ ʔylyn ddʕlmʔ ʔnyn hnʔ
06:04	ʔlʔ ʔn ʔyt lkwn dynʔ ʕl dʕlmʔ lʔylyn dbsyn bʕdtʔ ʔwtbw lkwn bdynʔ
06:05	lkwʔrʔ hw dyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn hknʔ lyt bkwn ʔplʔ ḥd ḥkymʔ dnškḥ nšwʔ byt ʔḥʔ lʔḥwhy
06:06	ʔlʔ ʔḥʔ ʕm ʔḥwhy mtdyn wtwb qdm ʔylyn dlʔ mhymnyn
06:07	mn kdw hkyl qnwmkwn ḥbtwn lkwn ddynʔ ḥd ʕm ḥd ʔyt lkwn mṭl mnʔ gyr lʔ mtʕlbyn ʔntwn wmṭl mnʔ lʔ mtglzyn ʔntwn
06:08	ʔlʔ ʔntwn ʕlbyn ʔntwn wglzyn ʔntwn ʔp lʔḥykwn
06:09	ʔw lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn dʕwlʔ mlkwth dʔlhʔ lʔ yrtyn lʔ tṭʕwn lʔ znyʔ wlʔ plḥy ptkrʔ wlʔ gyrʔ wlʔ mḥblʔ wlʔ škby ʕm dkrʔ
06:10	wlʔ ʕlwbʔ wlʔ gnbʔ wlʔ rwyʔ wlʔ mṣʕrnʔ wlʔ ḥṭwpʔ hlyn mlkwth dʔlhʔ lʔ yrtyn
06:11	whlyn ʔyt hwy bʔnš ʔnš mnkwn ʔlʔ sḥytwn wʔtqdštwn wʔzddqtwn bšmh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ wbrwḥh dʔlhn
06:12	kl šlyṭ ly ʔlʔ lʔ kl pqḥ ly kl šlyṭ ly ʔlʔ ʕly ʔnš lʔ nštlṭ
06:13	mʔkwltʔ dkrsʔ wkrsʔ dmʔkwltʔ ʔlhʔ dyn ltrtyhyn mbṭl pgrʔ dyn lʔ lznywtʔ ʔlʔ lmrn wmrn lpgrʔ
06:14	ʔlhʔ dyn wlmrn ʔqym wln mqym bḥylh
06:15	lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn dpgrykwn hdmʔ ʔnwn dmšyḥʔ nsb hdmʔ dmšyḥʔ nʕbdywhy hdmʔ dznytʔ ḥs
06:16	ʔw lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn dmn dnqp lznytʔ ḥd hw pgr ʔmyr gyr dnhwwn tryhwn ḥd pgr
06:17	mn dnqp dyn lmrn hwʔ ʕmh ḥdʔ rwḥ
06:18	ʕrwqw mn znywtʔ kl ḥṭytʔ dnʕbd brnšʔ lbr mn pgrh hy mn dmznʔ dyn bpgrh hw ḥṭʔ
06:19	ʔw lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn dpgrkwn hyklʔ hw drwḥʔ dqwdšʔ dʕmrʔ bkwn hy dqbltwn mn ʔlhʔ wlʔ hwytwn dnpškwn
06:20	ʔzdbntwn gyr bdmyʔ hwytwn hkyl mšbḥyn lʔlhʔ bpgrkwn wbrwḥkwn hnwn dʔytyhwn dʔlhʔ 
07:01	ʕl ʔylyn dktbtwn ly dyn špyr hw lgbrʔ dlʔnttʔ lʔ ntqrb
07:02	ʔlʔ mṭl znywtʔ ʔnš ʔntth nʔḥwd wʔnttʔ lbʕlh tʔḥwd
07:03	gbrʔ lʔntth ḥwbʔ dmttḥyb nprwʕ hknʔ ʔp hy ʔnttʔ lbʕlh
07:04	ʔnttʔ lʔ šlyṭʔ ʕl pgrh ʔlʔ bʕlh hknʔ ʔp gbrʔ lʔ šlyṭ ʕl pgrh ʔlʔ ʔntth
07:05	lʔ hkyl tglzwn ḥd lḥd ʔlʔ ʔmty dtrykwn tštwwn bzbn dttʕnwn lṣwmʔ wlṣlwtʔ wtwb lh lṣbwtʔ ttpnwn dlʔ nnsykwn sṭnʔ mṭl rgtʔ dpgrkwn
07:06	hdʔ dyn ʔmr ʔnʔ ʔyk dlmḥylʔ lw mn pwqdnʔ
07:07	ʔnʔ gyr ṣbʔ ʔnʔ dklhwn bnynšʔ ʔkwty nhwwn bdkywtʔ ʔlʔ klnš mwhbtʔ yhybʔ lh mn ʔlhʔ ʔyt dhknʔ wʔyt dhknʔ
07:08	ʔmr ʔnʔ dyn lʔylyn dlyt lhwn nšʔ wlʔrmltʔ dpqḥ lhwn ʔn nqwwn ʔkwty
07:09	ʔn lʔ dyn msybryn nzdwgwn pqḥ gyr lmsb ʔnttʔ ṭb mn dlmʔqd brgtʔ
07:10	lʔylyn dyn dʔyt lhwn nšʔ mpqd ʔnʔ lʔ ʔnʔ ʔlʔ mry dʔnttʔ mn bʕlh lʔ tprwš
07:11	wʔn tprwš tqwʔ dlʔ gbrʔ ʔw lbʕlh ttrʕʔ wgbrʔ lʔntth lʔ nšbwq
07:12	lšrkʔ dyn ʔmr ʔnʔ ʔnʔ lʔ mry ʔn ʔyt ʔḥʔ dʔyt lh ʔnttʔ dlʔ mhymnʔ why ṣbyʔ dtʕmr ʕmh lʔ nšbqyh
07:13	wʔnttʔ ʔydʔ dʔyt lh bʕlʔ dlʔ mhymn whw ṣbʔ dnʕmr ʕmh lʔ tšbwq bʕlh
07:14	mqdš hw gyr gbrʔ ʔynʔ dlʔ mhymn bʔnttʔ dmhymnʔ wmqdšʔ hy ʔnttʔ ʔydʔ dlʔ mhymnʔ bgbrʔ dmhymn wʔn lʔ bnyhwn ṭmʔyn ʔnwn hšʔ dyn dkyn ʔnwn
07:15	ʔn dyn hw dlʔ mhymn prš nprwš lʔ mšʕbd ʔḥʔ ʔw ḥtʔ bhlyn lšlmʔ hw qrn ʔlhʔ
07:16	mnʔ gyr ydʕʔ ʔnty ʔnttʔ ʔn lbʕlky tḥyn ʔw ʔnt gbrʔ ydʕ ʔnt ʔn lʔnttk tḥʔ
07:17	ʔlʔ ʔnš ʔnš ʔyk dplg lh mryʔ wʔnš ʔyk dqryhy ʔlhʔ hknʔ nhlk wʔp lklhyn ʕdtʔ hknʔ mpqd ʔnʔ
07:18	ʔn kd gzyr ʔnš ʔtqry lʔ nhpwk lh lʕwrlwtʔ wʔn bʕwrlwtʔ ʔtqry lʔ ngzwr
07:19	gzwrtʔ gyr lʔ hwt mdm ʔp lʔ ʕwrlwtʔ ʔlʔ nṭwrtʔ dpwqdnwhy dʔlhʔ
07:20	klnš bqrynʔ dʔtqry bh nqwʔ
07:21	ʔn ʕbdʔ ʔtqryt lʔ ntbṭl lk ʔlʔ ʔpn mškḥ ʔnt lmtḥrrw gby lk dtplwḥ
07:22	ʔynʔ gyr dʕbdʔ ʔtqry bmrn mḥrrʔ hw dʔlhʔ hknʔ ʔp ʔynʔ dbr ḥʔrʔ ʔtqry ʕbdʔ hw dmšyḥʔ
07:23	bdmyʔ ʔzdbntwn lʔ thwwn ʕbdʔ dbnynšʔ
07:24	klnš bmdm dʔtqry ʔḥy bh nqwʔ lwt ʔlhʔ
07:25	ʕl btwlwtʔ dyn pwqdnʔ mn ʔlhʔ lʔ ʔḥyd ʔnʔ mlkʔ dyn yhb ʔnʔ ʔyk gbrʔ dʔtḥnnt mn ʔlhʔ dʔhwʔ mhymn
07:26	wsbr ʔnʔ dhdʔ špyrʔ mṭl ʔnnqʔ dzbnʔ dpqḥ lh lbrnšʔ dhknʔ nhwʔ
07:27	ʔsyr ʔnt bʔnttʔ lʔ tbʕʔ šryʔ šrʔ ʔnt mn ʔnttʔ lʔ tbʕʔ ʔnttʔ
07:28	wʔn tsb ʔnttʔ lʔ ḥṭʔ ʔnt wʔn btwltʔ thwʔ lgbrʔ lʔ ḥṭyʔ ʔwlṣnʔ dyn bpgr hwʔ lʔylyn dhknʔ ʔnwn ʔnʔ dyn ʕlykwn ḥʔs ʔnʔ
07:29	whdʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ ʔḥy dzbnʔ mkyl ʔzdlhz lh dʔylyn dʔyt lhwn nšʔ nhwwn ʔyk dlyt lhwn
07:30	wʔylyn dbkyn ʔyk lʔ bkyn wʔylyn dḥdyn ʔyk lʔ ḥdyn wʔylyn dzbnyn ʔyk lʔ mqdyn
07:31	wʔylyn dmtḥšḥyn bʕlmʔ hnʔ lʔ lbr mn zdqʔ dḥšḥtʔ ʕbr lh gyr ʔskmh dʕlmʔ hnʔ
07:32	mṭl hnʔ ṣbʔ ʔnʔ ddlʔ ṣptʔ thwwn ʔynʔ gyr dlyt lh ʔnttʔ rnʔ bdmrh dʔyknʔ nšpr lmrh
07:33	wʔynʔ dʔyt lh ʔnttʔ yṣp dʕlmʔ dʔyknʔ nšpr lʔntth
07:34	pwršnʔ dyn ʔyt ʔp bynt ʔnttʔ lbtwltʔ ʔydʔ dlgbrʔ lʔ hwt rnyʔ bmrh dthwʔ qdyšʔ bpgrh wbrwḥh wʔydʔ dʔyt lh bʕlʔ rnyʔ dʕlmʔ dʔyknʔ tšpr lbʕlh
07:35	hdʔ dyn lʕwdrnkwn hw dylkwn ʔmr ʔnʔ lʔ hwʔ mḥnwqytʔ rmʔ ʔnʔ lkwn ʔlʔ dthwwn ʔmynyn lwt mrkwn bʔskmʔ špyrʔ kd lʔ rnyn ʔntwn bʕlmʔ
07:36	ʔn ʔnš dyn sbr dmtbzḥ bbtwlth dʕbr zbnh wlʔ yhbh lgbrʔ wwlyʔ dntlyh ʔyk dṣbʔ nʕbd lʔ ḥṭʔ tzdwg
07:37	ʔynʔ dyn dšryrʔyt psq brʕynh wlʔ ʔlṣʔ lh ṣbwtʔ wšlyṭ ʕl ṣbynh whknʔ dn blbh dnṭr btwlth špyr ʕbd
07:38	wʔynʔ hkyl dyhb btwlth špyr ʕbd wʔynʔ dlʔ yhb btwlth ytyrʔyt špyr ʕbd
07:39	ʔnttʔ kmʔ dḥy bʕlh ʔsyrʔ hy bnmwsʔ ʔn dyn ndmk bʕlh mḥrrʔ hy dthwʔ lmn dṣbyʔ blḥwd bmrn
07:40	ṭwbyh dyn ʔn hknʔ tqwʔ ʔyk rʕyny dyly sbr ʔnʔ dyn ʔp ʔnʔ drwḥʔ dʔlhʔ ʔyt by 
08:01	ʕl dbḥʔ dyn dptkrʔ ydʕynn dbkln ʔyt ydʕtʔ wydʕtʔ mḥtrʔ ḥwbʔ dyn bnʔ
08:02	ʔn ʔnš dyn sbr dydʕ mdm lʔ ʕdkyl mdm ydʕ ʔyk mʔ dwlʔ lh lmdʕ
08:03	ʔn ʔnš dyn mḥb lʔlhʔ hnʔ ʔtydʕ mnh
08:04	ʕl mʔkwltʔ hkyl ddbḥʔ dptkrʔ ydʕynn dlʔ hwʔ mdm hw ptkrʔ bʕlmʔ wdlyt ʔlh ʔḥryn ʔlʔ ʔn ḥd
08:05	ʔpn gyr ʔyt dmtqryn ʔlhʔ ʔw bšmyʔ ʔw bʔrʕʔ ʔyknʔ dʔyt ʔlhʔ sgyʔʔ wmrwtʔ sgyʔʔ
08:06	ʔlʔ ln dyln ḥd hw ʔlhʔ ʔbʔ dkl mnh wḥnn bh wḥd mryʔ yšwʕ mšyḥʔ dkl bʔydh wʔp ḥnn bʔydh
08:07	ʔlʔ lʔ hwʔ bklnš ydʕtʔ ʔyt gyr ʔnšʔ dbtʔrthwn ʕdmʔ lhšʔ dʕl ptkrʔ ʔyk ddbyḥʔ ʔklyn wmṭl dkryhʔ tʔrthwn mtṭwšʔ
08:08	mʔkwltʔ dyn lʔ mqrbʔ ln lʔlhʔ lʔ gyr ʔn ʔklynn mtytrynn wlʔ ʔn lʔ nʔkwl mtbṣrynn
08:09	ḥzw dyn dlmʔ šwlṭnkwn hnʔ nhwʔ twqltʔ lkryhʔ
08:10	ʔn ʔnš gyr nḥzyk lk dʔyt bk ydʕtʔ dsmyk ʔnt byt ptkrʔ lʔ hʔ tʔrth mṭl dkryh hw mštrrʔ lmʔkl ddbyḥʔ
08:11	wʔbd lh bydʕtk dylk hw ʔynʔ dmrʕ dmṭlth myt mšyḥʔ
08:12	wʔn hknʔ msklyn ʔntwn bʔḥykwn wmqpḥyn ʔntwn tʔrthwn mrʕtʔ bmšyḥʔ hw msklyn ʔntwn
08:13	mṭl hnʔ ʔn mʔkwltʔ mkšlʔ lʔḥy lʕlm bsrʔ lʔ ʔkwl dlʔ ʔkšl lʔḥy
09:01	lmʔ lʔ hwyt br ḥʔrʔ ʔw lʔ hwyt šlyḥʔ ʔw lyšwʕ mšyḥʔ mrn lʔ ḥzyt ʔw lʔ hwytwn ʕbdy bmry
09:02	wʔn lʔḥrnʔ lʔ hwyt šlyḥʔ ʔlʔ lkwn ʔyty wḥtmʔ dšlyḥwty ʔntwn ʔnwn
09:03	wmpq brwḥy lʔylyn ddynyn ly hnw
09:04	lmʔ lʔ šlyṭ ln lmʔkl wlmštʔ
09:05	wlmʔ lʔ šlyṭ ln ḥtʔ ʔnttʔ lmkrkw ʕmn ʔyk šrkʔ dšlyḥʔ wʔyk ʔḥwhy dmrn wʔyk kʔpʔ
09:06	ʔw ʔnʔ blḥwd wbrnbʔ lyt ln šwlṭnʔ dlʔ nplwḥ
09:07	mnw dmplḥ bplḥwtʔ bnpqtʔ dnpšh ʔw mnw dnṣb krmʔ wmn pʔrwhy lʔ ʔkl ʔw mnw drʕʔ ʕnʔ wmn ḥlbʔ dmrʕyth lʔ ʔkl
09:08	dlmʔ ʔyk brnšʔ hlyn ʔmr ʔnʔ hʔ ʔp nmwsʔ hlyn ʔmr
09:09	ktyb gyr bh bnmwsʔ dmwšʔ dlʔ tblwm twrʔ dmdrk lmʔ ʕl twrʔ bṭyl lh lʔlhʔ
09:10	ʔlʔ ydyʕʔ dmṭltn hw ʔmr wmṭltn gyr ʔtktbt mṭl dʕl sbrʔ hw wlʔ lh lkrwbʔ dnkrwb wʔynʔ dmdrk ʕl sbrʔ dʕlltʔ
09:11	ʔn ḥnn drwḥʔ zrʕn bkwn rbʔ hy ʔn ḥnn mnkwn dpgrʔ nḥṣwd
09:12	wʔn lʔḥrnʔ ʔyt lhwn šwlṭnʔ ʕlykwn lʔ ln wlʔ ytyrʔyt ʔlʔ lʔ ʔtḥšḥn bšwlṭnʔ hnʔ ʔlʔ klmdm msybrynn dbmdm lʔ ntks sbrth dmšyḥʔ
09:13	lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn dʔylyn dbyt qwdšʔ plḥyn mn byt qwdšʔ mstybryn wʔylyn dlmdbḥʔ plḥyn ʕm mdbḥʔ plgyn
09:14	hknʔ ʔp mrn pqd dʔylyn dsbrth mkrzyn mn sbrth nḥwn
09:15	ʔnʔ dyn lʔ ʔtḥšḥt bḥdʔ mn hlyn wlw mṭl hdʔ ktbt dhknʔ nhwʔ ly pqḥ ly gyr dmmt ʔmwt wlʔ dʔnš šwbhry nsrq
09:16	ʔp dmsbr ʔnʔ gyr lyt ly šwbhrʔ qṭyrʔ gyr sym ʕly wy ly dyn ʔlʔ ʔsbr
09:17	ʔn gyr bṣbyny hdʔ sʕr ʔnʔ ʔgrʔ ʔyt ly ʔn dyn dlʔ bṣbyny rbt bytwtʔ hw mhymn ʔnʔ
09:18	ʔynʔ hw hkyl ʔgry dkd msbr ʔnʔ dlʔ npqtʔ ʔʕbdyh lsbrth dmšyḥʔ wlʔ ʔtḥšḥ bšwlṭnʔ dyhb ly bʔwnglywn
09:19	kd mḥrr ʔnʔ gyr mn klhyn lklnš šʕbdt npšy dlsgyʔʔ ʔtr
09:20	whwyt ʕm yhwdyʔ ʔyk yhwdyʔ dlyhwdyʔ ʔtr wʕm dtḥyt nmwsʔ ʔnwn hwyt ʔyk dtḥyt nmwsʔ dlʔylyn dtḥyt nmwsʔ ʔnwn ʔtr
09:21	wlʔylyn dnmwsʔ lyt lhwn hwyt ʔyk dlʔ nmws kd lʔ ʔyty lʔlhʔ dlʔ nmws ʔlʔ bnmwsh dmšyḥʔ dʔp lhnwn ddlʔ nmws ʔnwn ʔtr
09:22	hwyt ʕm kryhʔ ʔyk kryhʔ dlkryhʔ ʔtr lklnš kl hwyt dlklnš ʔḥʔ
09:23	hdʔ dyn ʕbd ʔnʔ mṭl dʔhwʔ šwtpʔ lsbrtʔ
09:24	lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn dʔylyn dbʔsṭdywn rhṭyn klhwn hw rhṭyn ʔlʔ ḥd hw nsb lh zkwtʔ hknʔ hrṭw ʔyk dtdrkwn
09:25	kl ʔnš dyn dʔgwnʔ ʕbd mn kl mdm ʔḥd rʕynh whlyn rhṭyn dnsbwn klylʔ dmtḥbl ḥnn dyn dlʔ mtḥbl
09:26	ʔnʔ hkyl hknʔ rhṭ ʔnʔ lʔ hwʔ ʔyk dʕl mdm dlʔ ydyʕ whknʔ mtktš ʔnʔ lʔ ʔyk hw dlʔʔr ktš
