09:27	ʔlʔ pgry hw kbš ʔnʔ wmšʕbd ʔnʔ ddlmʔ ʔnʔ dlʔḥrnʔ ʔkrzt ʔnʔ qnwmy ʔstlʔ ly 
10:01	ṣbʔ ʔnʔ dyn dtdʕwn ʔḥy dʔbhyn klhwn tḥyt ʕnnʔ hww wklhwn bymʔ ʕbrw
10:02	wklhwn byd mwšʔ ʕmdw bʕnnʔ wbymʔ
10:03	wklhwn ḥdʔ mʔkwltʔ drwḥʔ ʔklw
10:04	wklhwn ḥd mštyʔ drwḥʔ ʔštyw štyn hww gyr mn kʔpʔ drwḥʔ dʔtyʔ hwt ʕmhwn kʔpʔ dyn hy hw hwʔ mšyḥʔ
10:05	ʔlʔ lʔ hwʔ bswgʔhwn ʔṣṭby ʔlhʔ nplw gyr bmdbrʔ
10:06	hlyn dyn ṭwpsʔ ln hw hww dlʔ hwyn rgyn byštʔ ʔyknʔ dhnwn rgw
10:07	wʔplʔ nhwʔ plḥy ptkrʔ ʔyknʔ dʔp mnhwn plḥw ʔyk dktyb dytb ʕmʔ lmʔkl wlmštʔ wqmw lmštʕyw
10:08	wʔplʔ nznʔ ʔyknʔ dmnhwn znyw wnplw bḥd ywmʔ ʕsryn wtltʔ ʔlpyn
10:09	wlʔ nnsʔ lmšyḥʔ ʔyknʔ dmnhwn nsyw wʔwbdw ʔnwn ḥwwtʔ
10:10	wʔplʔ trṭnwn ʔyknʔ dmnhwn rṭnw wʔbdw bʔydy mḥblnʔ
10:11	hlyn dyn klhyn dgdš lhwn lṭwpsn hwy wʔtktb mṭl mrdwtʔ dyln dḥrthwn dʕlmʔ ʕlyn mṭyt
10:12	mkyl mn dsbr dqm nzdhr dlʔ npl
10:13	nsywnʔ lʔ mṭykwn ʔlʔ dbnynšʔ mhymn hw dyn ʔlhʔ dlʔ nrpykwn dttnswn ytyr mn mdm dmṣyn ʔntwn ʔlʔ nʕbd lnsywnkwn mpqnʔ ʔyknʔ dtškḥwn lmsybrw
10:14	mṭl hnʔ ḥbyby ʕrwqw mn pwlḥnʔ dptkrʔ
10:15	ʔyk dlḥkymʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ dwnw ʔntwn mdm dʔmr ʔnʔ
10:16	ksʔ hw dtwdytʔ dmbrkynn lʔ hwʔ šwtpwtʔ ʔytwhy ddmh dmšyḥʔ wlḥmʔ hw dqṣynn lʔ hwʔ šwtpwtʔ ʔytwhy dpgrh dmšyḥʔ
10:17	ʔyknʔ dḥd hw lḥmʔ hw hknʔ kln ḥd ḥnn pgr kln gyr mn hw hw ḥd lḥmʔ nsbynn
10:18	ḥzw lʔysryl dbbsr lʔ hwʔ ʔylyn dʔklyn dbḥʔ hwyn šwtpʔ lmdbḥʔ
10:19	mnʔ hkyl ʔmr ʔnʔ dptkrʔ mdm ʔytwhy ʔw dbḥʔ dptkrʔ mdm hw lʔ
10:20	ʔlʔ hw mdm ddbḥyn ḥnpʔ lšʔdʔ hw dbḥyn wlʔ lʔlhʔ lʔ dyn ṣbʔ ʔnʔ dthwwn šwtpʔ lšʔdʔ
10:21	lʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn dtštwn ksʔ dmrn wksʔ dšʔdʔ wlʔ mškḥyn ʔntwn dtštwtpwn bptwrʔ dmrn wbptwrʔ dšʔdʔ
10:22	ʔw dlmʔ mṭnw mṭnynn lmrn dlmʔ ḥsynynn mnh
10:23	kl mdm šlyṭ ly ʔlʔ lʔ kl mdm pqḥ kl mdm šlyṭ ly ʔlʔ lʔ kl mdm mbnʔ
10:24	lʔ ʔnš dnpšh nhwʔ bʕʔ ʔlʔ klnš ʔp dḥbrh
10:25	klmdm dmzdbn bmqlwn hwytwn ʔklyn dlʔ ʕwqbʔ mṭl tʔrtʔ
10:26	dmryʔ hy gyr ʔrʕʔ bmlʔh
10:27	ʔn ʔnš dyn mn ḥnpʔ qrʔ lkwn wṣbyn ʔntwn lmʔzl klmdm dmtsym qdmykwn ʔkwlw dlʔ ʕwqbʔ mṭl tʔrtʔ
10:28	ʔn ʔnš dyn nʔmr lkwn dhnʔ ddbyḥʔ hw lʔ tʔklwn mṭl hw dʔmr lkwn wmṭl tʔrtʔ
10:29	tʔrtʔ dyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lʔ hwʔ dylkwn ʔlʔ dhw dʔmr lmnʔ gyr ḥʔrwty mtdynʔ mn tʔrtʔ dʔḥrnʔ
10:30	ʔn ʔnʔ bṭybwtʔ mtḥšḥ ʔnʔ mnʔ mtgdp ʔnʔ ʕl mdm dʔnʔ mwdʔnʔ
10:31	ʔn ʔklyn ʔntwn hkyl wʔn štyn ʔntwn wʔn mdm ʕbdyn ʔntwn klmdm ltšbwḥtʔ dʔlhʔ hwytwn ʕbdyn
10:32	dlʔ twqlʔ hww lyhwdyʔ wlʔrmyʔ wlʕdth dʔlhʔ
10:33	ʔyk dʔp ʔnʔ bkl mdm lklnš špr ʔnʔ wlʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ mdm dly pqḥ ʔlʔ mdm dlsgyʔʔ pqḥ dnḥwn
11:01	ʔtdmw by ʔyknʔ dʔp ʔnʔ bmšyḥʔ
11:02	mšbḥ ʔnʔ lkwn dyn ʔḥy dbkl mdm mʕhd ʔntwn ly wʔyknʔ dʔšlmt lkwn pwqdnʔ ʔḥydyn ʔntwn
11:03	ṣbʔ ʔnʔ dyn dtdʕwn dkl gbr ršh mšyḥʔ hw wršh dʔnttʔ gbrʔ hw wršh dmšyḥʔ ʔlhʔ hw
11:04	kl gbrʔ dmṣlʔ ʔw mtnbʔ kd mksy ršh mbht ršh
11:05	wkl ʔnttʔ dmṣlyʔ ʔw mtnbyʔ kd glʔ ršh mbhtʔ ršh šwyʔ hy gyr ʕm hy dgryʕ ršh
11:06	ʔn gyr lʔ mtksyʔ ʔnttʔ ʔp tstpr ʔn dyn mškr hw lʔnttʔ lmstprw ʔw lmgrʕ ttksʔ
11:07	gbrʔ gyr lʔ ḥyb dnksʔ ršh mṭl ddmwtʔ hw wtšbwḥtʔ dʔlhʔ ʔnttʔ dyn tšbwḥtʔ hy dgbrʔ
11:08	lʔ gyr ʔytwhy gbrʔ mn ʔnttʔ ʔlʔ ʔnttʔ mn gbrʔ
11:09	wʔplʔ gyr gbrʔ ʔtbry mṭl ʔnttʔ ʔlʔ ʔnttʔ mṭl gbrʔ
11:10	mṭl hnʔ ḥybʔ ʔnttʔ dšwlṭnʔ nhwʔ ʕl ršh mṭl mlʔkʔ
11:11	brm dyn lʔ gbrʔ lbr mn ʔnttʔ ʔplʔ ʔnttʔ lbr mn gbrʔ bmrn
11:12	ʔyknʔ gyr dʔnttʔ mn gbrʔ hknʔ ʔp gbrʔ byd ʔnttʔ klmdm dyn mn ʔlhʔ hw
11:13	dwnw bynykwn lnpškwn yʔʔ lʔnttʔ dkd glʔ ršh tṣlʔ lʔlhʔ
11:14	ʔplʔ hw kynʔ mlp lkwn dgbrʔ mʔ dqʔm sʕrh ṣʕrʔ hw lh
11:15	wʔnttʔ mʔ dmrby sʕrh tšbwḥtʔ hy lh mṭl dsʕrh ḥlp tksytʔ hw ʔtyhb lh
11:16	ʔn ʔnš dyn mtḥrʔ ʕl hlyn ln lyt ʕydʔ ʔyk hnʔ wlʔ lʕdth dʔlhʔ 
11:17	hdʔ dyn dmpqd ʔnʔ lʔ ʔyk mšbḥ ʔnʔ lkwn mṭl dlʔ hwʔ lqdmykwn ʔtytwn ʔlʔ lbṣyrwtʔ hw nḥttwn
11:18	lwqdm gyr mʔ dmtknšyn ʔntwn bʕdtʔ plgwtʔ šmʕ ʔnʔ dʔyt byntkwn wmdm mdm mhymn ʔnʔ
11:19	ʕtydyn ʔnwn gyr ʔp ḥrynʔ dnhwwn byntkwn dʔylyn dbqyn bkwn ntydʕwn
11:20	mʔ hkyl dmtknšyn ʔntwn lw ʔyk dzdq lywmh dmrn ʔklyn ʔntwn wštyn
11:21	ʔlʔ ʔnš ʔnš ḥšmyth qdm ʔkl lh whwʔ ḥd kpn wḥd rwʔ
11:22	dlmʔ btʔ lyt lkwn dtʔklwn wtštwn ʔw bʕdth dʔlhʔ bsyn ʔntwn wmbhtyn ʔntwn lʔylyn dlyt lhwn mnʔ ʔmr lkwn ʔšbḥkwn bhdʔ lʔ mšbḥ ʔnʔ
11:23	ʔnʔ gyr qblt mn mrn hw mdm dʔšlmt lkwn dmrn yšwʕ bhw llyʔ dmštlm hwʔ nsb hwʔ lḥmʔ
11:24	wbrk wqṣʔ wʔmr sbw ʔkwlw hnw pgry dʕl ʔpykwn mtqṣʔ hknʔ hwytwn ʕbdyn ldwkrny
11:25	hknʔ mn btr dʔḥšmw ʔp ksʔ yhb wʔmr hnʔ ksʔ ʔytwhy dytqʔ ḥdtʔ bdmy hknʔ hwytwn ʕbdyn kl ʔmty dštyn ʔntwn ldwkrny
11:26	kl ʔmty gyr dʔklyn ʔntwn lḥmʔ hnʔ wštyn ʔntwn ksʔ hnʔ mwth hw dmrn mʕhdyn ʔntwn ʕdmʔ lmʔtyth
11:27	ʔynʔ hkyl dʔkl mn lḥmh dmryʔ wštʔ mn ksh wlʔ šwʔ lh mḥyb hw ldmh dmryʔ wlpgrh
11:28	mṭl hnʔ nhwʔ ʔnš bqʔ npšh whydyn ʔkl mn lḥmʔ hnʔ wštʔ mn ksʔ hnʔ
11:29	mn dʔkl gyr wštʔ mnh kd lʔ šwʔ ḥwybʔ hw lnpšh ʔkl wštʔ dlʔ prš pgrh dmryʔ
11:30	mṭl hnʔ sgyʔyn bkwn mrʕʔ wkryhʔ wsgyʔʔ ddmkyn
11:31	ʔlw gyr npšn dynyn hwyn lʔ mtdynyn hwyn
11:32	kd mtdynynn dyn mn mrn mtrdyw mtrdynn dlʔ ʕm ʕlmʔ ntḥyb
11:33	mkyl ʔḥy ʔmty dmtknšyn ʔntwn lmʔkl hwytwn mqwyn ḥd lḥd
11:34	mn dyn dkpn bbyth nlʕs dlʔ lḥybwtʔ thwwn mtknšyn ʕl šrkʔ dyn mʔ dʔtyt ʔpqdkwn
12:01	ʕl rwḥnytʔ dyn ʔḥy ṣbʔ ʔnʔ dtdʕwn
12:02	dḥnpʔ hwytwn wlptkrʔ ʔylyn dlyt lhwn qlʔ dlʔ pwršn mtdbryn hwytwn
12:03	mṭl hnʔ mwdʕ ʔnʔ lkwn dlyt ʔnš dbrwḥʔ dʔlhʔ mmll wʔmr dḥrm hw yšwʕ wʔplʔ ʔnš mškḥ lmʔmr dmryʔ hw yšwʕ ʔlʔ ʔn brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ
12:04	pwlgʔ dyn dmwhbtʔ ʔytyhwn ʔlʔ ḥdʔ hy rwḥʔ
12:05	wpwlgʔ dtšmštʔ ʔytyhwn ʔlʔ ḥd hw mryʔ
12:06	wpwlgʔ dḥylwtʔ ʔyt ʔlʔ ḥd hw ʔlhʔ dmʕbd kl bklnš
12:07	lʔnš ʔnš dyn mtyhb lh glynʔ drwḥʔ ʔyk dʕdrʔ lh
12:08	ʔyt dyhybʔ lh brwḥʔ mltʔ dḥkmtʔ lʔḥrnʔ dyn mltʔ dydʕtʔ bh brwḥʔ
12:09	lʔḥrnʔ hymnwtʔ bh brwḥʔ lʔḥrnʔ mwhbtʔ dʔsywtʔ bh brwḥʔ
12:10	lʔḥrnʔ dyn ḥylʔ lʔḥrnʔ dyn nbywtʔ lʔḥrnʔ dyn prwšwtʔ drwḥʔ lʔḥrnʔ dyn znyʔ dlšnʔ lʔḥrnʔ dyn pwšqʔ dlšnʔ
12:11	klhyn dyn hlyn ḥdʔ hy rwḥʔ sʕrʔ wmplgʔ lklnš ʔyk dhy ṣbyʔ
12:12	ʔkznʔ gyr dpgrʔ ḥd hw wʔyt bh hdmʔ sgyʔʔ klhwn dyn hdmʔ dpgrʔ kd sgyʔʔ ʔytyhwn ḥd ʔnwn pgr hknʔ ʔp mšyḥʔ
12:13	ʔp ḥnn gyr kln bḥdʔ rwḥ lḥd pgr ʕmdn ʔn yhwdyʔ wʔn ʔrmyʔ wʔn ʕbdʔ wʔn bny ḥʔrʔ wkln ḥdʔ rwḥʔ ʔštyn
12:14	ʔp pgrʔ gyr lʔ hwʔ ḥd hdm ʔlʔ sgyʔʔ
12:15	ʔn tʔmr gyr rglʔ dmṭl dlʔ hwyt ʔydʔ lʔ hwyt mnh mn pgrʔ lw mṭl hdʔ lytyh mnh mn pgrʔ
12:16	wʔn tʔmr ʔdnʔ ʕl dlʔ hwyt ʕynʔ lʔ hwyt mnh mn pgrʔ lw mṭl hdʔ lytyh mnh mn pgrʔ
12:17	ʔlw gyr klh pgrʔ ʕynʔ hwʔ ʔykʔ hwt mšmʕtʔ wʔlw klh mšmʕtʔ hwʔ ʔyknʔ mryḥ hwʔ
12:18	hšʔ dyn ʔlhʔ sm kl ḥd ḥd mn hdmʔ bpgrʔ ʔyknʔ dhw ṣbʔ
12:19	ʔlw dyn klhwn ḥd hww hdmʔ ʔykʔ hwʔ pgrʔ
12:20	hšʔ dyn hdmʔ ʔytyhwn sgyʔʔ ḥd hw dyn pgrʔ
12:21	lʔ mškḥʔ ʕynʔ dtʔmr lʔydʔ dlʔ mtbʕyʔ ʔnty ly ʔplʔ ršʔ mškḥ dnʔmr lrglʔ dlʔ mtbʕyn ʔntyn ly
12:22	ʔlʔ ytyrʔyt ʔylyn hdmʔ dmstbryn dmḥylyn ʕlyhwn hw swnqnʔ
12:23	wʔylyn dsbrynn dmṣʕryn ʔnwn bpgrʔ lhlyn ʔyqrʔ ytyrʔ msgynn wʔylyn ddnwkpʔ ʔnwn ʔskmʔ ytyrʔ ʕbdynn lhwn
12:24	ʔylyn dyn hdmʔ dʔyt bn dmyqryn lʔ mtbʕʔ lhwn ʔyqrʔ ʔlhʔ gyr mzgh lpgrʔ wyhb ʔyqrʔ ytyrʔ lhdmʔ ʔynʔ dzʕwr
12:25	dlʔ thwʔ plgwtʔ bpgrʔ ʔlʔ klhwn hdmʔ šwyʔyt ḥd ʕl ḥd nhwwn yṣpyn
12:26	dʔmty dḥd hdm nhwʔ kʔb klhwn nhwwn ḥšyn wʔn mštbḥ ḥd hdm klhwn hdmʔ nhwwn mštbḥyn
12:27	ʔntwn dyn pgrh ʔntwn dmšyḥʔ whdmʔ bdwktkwn 
12:28	sm gyr ʔlhʔ bʕdth lwqdm šlyḥʔ btrhwn nbyʔ btrhwn mlpnʔ btrhwn ʕbdy ḥylʔ btrhwn mwhbtʔ dʔsywtʔ wmʕdrnʔ wmdbrnʔ wznyʔ dlšnʔ
12:29	dlmʔ klhwn šlyḥʔ dlmʔ klhwn nbyʔ lmʔ klhwn mlpnʔ lmʔ klhwn sʕry ḥylʔ
12:30	lmʔ lklhwn ʔyt lhwn mwhbtʔ dʔsywtʔ lmʔ klhwn blšnʔ mmllyn ʔw dlmʔ klhwn mpšqyn
12:31	ʔn dyn ṭnyn ʔntwn bmwhbtʔ rwrbtʔ ʔnʔ twb ʔḥwykwn ʔwrḥʔ dmytrʔ
13:01	ʔn bkl lšn dbnynšʔ ʔmll wbdmlʔkʔ wḥwbʔ lʔ nhwʔ by hwyt ly nḥšʔ dzʔm ʔw ṣṣlʔ dyhb qlʔ
13:02	wʔn thwʔ by nbywtʔ wʔdʕ ʔrzʔ klhwn wklh ydʕtʔ wʔn thwʔ by klh hymnwtʔ ʔyknʔ dṭwrʔ ʔšnʔ wḥwbʔ lyt by lʔ hwyt mdm
13:03	wʔn ʔwkl kl dʔyt ly lmsknʔ wʔn ʔšlm pgry dnʔqd wḥwbʔ lʔ nhwʔ by mdm lʔ ytr ʔnʔ
13:04	ḥwbʔ ngyrʔ hy rwḥh wbsym ḥwbʔ lʔ ḥsm ḥwbʔ lʔ mštgš wlʔ mtḥtr
13:05	wlʔ sʕr dbhttʔ wlʔ bʕʔ dylh wlʔ mttpyr wlʔ mtrʕʔ dbyš
13:06	lʔ ḥdʔ bʕwlʔ ʔlʔ ḥdʔ bqwštʔ
13:07	kl mdm msybr klmdm mhymn kl msbr kl sbl
13:08	ḥwbʔ mmtwm lʔ npl nbywtʔ gyr ntbṭln wlšnʔ nšttqwn wydʕtʔ ttbṭl
13:09	qlyl hw gyr mn sgy ydʕynn wqlyl mn sgy mtnbynn
13:10	ʔmty dyn dtʔtʔ gmyrwtʔ hydyn ntbṭl hw mdm dqlyl hwʔ
13:11	kd ylwdʔ hwyt ʔyk ylwdʔ mmll hwyt wʔyk ylwdʔ mtrʕʔ hwyt wʔyk ylwdʔ mtḥšb hwyt kd hwyt dyn gbrʔ bṭlt hlyn dṭlywtʔ
13:12	hšʔ ʔyk dbmḥzytʔ ḥzynn bplʔtʔ hydyn dyn ʔpyn lwqbl ʔpyn hšʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ qlyl mn sgy hydyn dyn ʔdʕ ʔyk mʔ dʔtydʕt
13:13	hlyn ʔnyn gyr tlt dmktrn hymnwtʔ wsbrʔ wḥwbʔ drb dyn mnhyn ḥwbʔ
14:01	hrṭw btr ḥwbʔ wṭnw bmwhbtʔ drwḥʔ ytyrʔyt dyn dttnbwn
14:02	mn dmmll gyr blšnʔ lʔ hwʔ lbnynšʔ mmll ʔlʔ lʔlhʔ lʔ gyr ʔnš šmʕ mdm dmmll ʔlʔ brwḥ ʔrzʔ mmll
14:03	ʔynʔ dyn dmtnbʔ lbnynšʔ mmll bnynʔ wlwbbʔ wbwyʔʔ
14:04	dmmll blšnʔ npšh hw bnʔ wdmtnbʔ ʕdtʔ bnʔ
14:05	ṣbʔ ʔnʔ dyn dklkwn tmllwn blšnʔ ytyrʔyt dyn dttnbwn rb hw gyr ʔynʔ dmtnbʔ mn hw dmmll blšnʔ ʔn lʔ mpšq ʔn dyn mpšq ʕdtʔ bnʔ
14:06	whšʔ ʔḥy ʔn ʔtʔ lwtkwn wʔmll ʕmkwn blšnʔ mnʔ mwtr ʔnʔ lkwn ʔlʔ ʔn ʔmll ʕmkwn ʔw bglynʔ ʔw bydʕtʔ ʔw bnbywtʔ ʔw bywlpnʔ
14:07	ʔp ṣbwtʔ gyr ʔylyn dlyt bhyn npšʔ wyhbn qlʔ ʔn ʔbwbʔ wʔn qytrʔ ʔn pwršnʔ lʔ ʕbdn byt qyntʔ lḥbrth ʔyknʔ mtydʕ mdm dmzdmr ʔw mdm dmtnqš
14:08	wʔn qrnʔ tqrʔ qlʔ dlʔ pryš mnw ntṭyb lqrbʔ
14:09	hknʔ ʔp ʔntwn ʔn tʔmrwn mltʔ blšnʔ wlʔ thwʔ mpšqʔ ʔyknʔ mtydʕ mdm dʔmryn ʔntwn hwytwn lkwn ʔyk hw dʕm ʔʔr mmllyn ʔntwn
14:10	hʔ gyr gnsʔ dlšnʔ sgyʔʔ ʔyt bʕlmʔ wlyt ḥd mnhwn dlʔ qlʔ
14:11	wʔn lʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ ḥylh dqlʔ hwʔ ʔnʔ ly brbryʔ lhw dmmll wʔp hw dmmll hwʔ lh ly brbryʔ
14:12	hknʔ ʔp ʔntwn mṭl dṭnnʔ ʔntwn dmwhbtʔ drwḥʔ lbnynʔ dʕdtʔ bʕw dttytrwn
14:13	whw dmmll blšnʔ nṣlʔ dnpšq
14:14	ʔn hw gyr dhwyt mṣlʔ blšnʔ rwḥy hw mṣlyʔ mdʕy dyn dlʔ pʔryn hw
14:15	mnʔ hkyl ʔʕbd ʔṣlʔ brwḥy wʔṣlʔ ʔp bmdʕy wʔzmr brwḥy wʔzmr ʔp bmdʕy
14:16	wʔn lʔ ʔn mbrk ʔnt brwḥ hw dmmlʔ dwkth dhdywṭʔ ʔyknʔ nʔmr ʔmyn ʕl twdytk dylk mṭl dmnʔ ʔmr ʔnt lʔ ydʕ
14:17	ʔnt gyr špyr mbrk ʔnt ʔlʔ ḥbrk lʔ mtbnʔ
14:18	mwdʔ ʔnʔ lʔlhʔ dytyr mn klkwn mmll ʔnʔ blšnʔ
14:19	ʔlʔ bʕdtʔ ṣbʔ ʔnʔ dḥmš mlyn bmdʕy ʔmll dʔp ʔḥrnʔ ʔlp ytyr mn rbw mlyn blšnʔ
14:20	ʔḥy lʔ hwytwn ṭlyn brʕynykwn ʔlʔ lbyštʔ hww ylwdʔ wbrʕynykwn hww gmyryn
14:21	bnmwsʔ ktyb dbmmllʔ nwkryʔ wblšnʔ ʔḥrnʔ ʔmll ʕmh ʕm ʕmʔ hnʔ ʔplʔ hknʔ nšmʕwnny ʔmr mryʔ
14:22	mdyn lšnʔ lʔtʔ hw symyn lʔ lmhymnʔ ʔlʔ lʔylyn dlʔ mhymnyn nbywtʔ dyn lʔ hwʔ lʔylyn dlʔ mhymnyn ʔlʔ lʔylyn dmhymnyn
14:23	ʔn hw hkyl dttknš klh ʕdtʔ wklhwn blšnʔ nmllwn wnʕlwn hdywṭʔ ʔw ʔylyn dlʔ mhymnyn lʔ ʔmryn dhlyn šnw lhwn
14:24	wʔn klkwn thwwn mtnbyn wnʕwl lwtkwn hdywṭʔ ʔw mn dlʔ mhymn mtbṣʔ mn klkwn wmtkwn mn klkwn
14:25	wksytʔ dlbh mtglyn whydyn npl ʕl ʔpwhy wnsgwd lʔlhʔ wnʔmr šryrʔyt ʔlhʔ ʔyt bkwn 
14:26	ʔmr ʔnʔ hkyl ʔḥy dʔmty dmtknšyn ʔntwn lʔynʔ mnkwn dʔyt lh mzmwrʔ nʔmr wʔynʔ dʔyt lh ywlpnʔ wʔynʔ dʔyt lh glynʔ wʔynʔ dʔyt lh lšnʔ wʔynʔ dʔyt lh pwšqʔ klhyn lbnynʔ nhwyn
14:27	wʔn blšnʔ ʔnš nmll tryn nmllwn wkd sgy tltʔ wḥd ḥd nmllwn wḥd npšq
14:28	wʔn lyt dmpšq nštwq lh bʕdtʔ hw dmmll blšnʔ wbynwhy lnpšh wlʔlhʔ nmll
14:29	nbyʔ dyn tryn ʔw tltʔ nmllwn wšrkʔ npršwn
14:30	wʔn lʔḥrnʔ ntglʔ kd ytb qdmyʔ nštwq lh
14:31	mškḥyn ʔntwn gyr klkwn dḥd ḥd ttnbwn dklnš nʔlp wklnš ntbyʔ
14:32	rwḥʔ gyr dnbyʔ lnbyʔ mštʕbdʔ
14:33	mṭl dʔlhʔ lʔ hwʔ dšgwšyʔ ʔlʔ dšlmʔ ʔyk dbklhyn ʕdtʔ dqdyšʔ
14:34	nšykwn bʕdtʔ nhwyn štyqn lʔ gyr mps lhyn dnmlln ʔlʔ dnštʕbdn ʔyknʔ dʔp nmwsʔ ʔmr
14:35	wʔn mdm ṣbyn dnʔlpn bbtyhyn nšʔln lbʕlyhyn bhttʔ hy gyr dnšʔ bʕdtʔ nmlln
14:36	ʔw dlmʔ mnkwn hw npqt mlth dʔlhʔ ʔw lwtkwn hw blḥwd mṭt
14:37	ʔn ʔnš dyn mnkwn sbr dnbyʔ hw ʔw drwḥʔ hw ndʕ hlyn dktb ʔnʔ lkwn dpwqdnʔ ʔnwn dmrn
14:38	ʔn ʔnš dyn lʔ ydʕ lʔ ndʕ
14:39	ṭnw hkyl ʔḥy lmtnbyw wlmmllw blšnʔ lʔ tklwn
14:40	klmdm dyn bʔskmʔ wbṭksʔ nhwʔ
15:01	mwdʕ ʔnʔ lkwn dyn ʔḥy ʔwnglywn dsbrtkwn wqbltwnyhy wqmtwn bh
15:02	wbh ḥʔyn ʔntwn bʔydʔ mltʔ sbrtkwn ʔn ʕhdyn ʔntwn ʔn lʔ hwʔ sryqʔyt hymntwn
15:03	ʔšlmt lkwn gyr mn lwqdm ʔyk mdm dqblt dmšyḥʔ myt ʕl ʔpy ḥṭhyn ʔyknʔ dktyb
15:04	wdʔtqbr wqm ltltʔ ywmyn ʔyk dktyb
15:05	wʔtḥzy lkʔpʔ wbtrh ltrʕsr
15:06	wbtrkn ʔtḥzy lytyr mn ḥmšmʔʔ ʔḥyn ʔkḥdʔ dsgyʔʔ mnhwn qymyn ʔnwn ʕdmʔ lhšʔ wmnhwn dmkw
15:07	wmn btr hlyn ʔtḥzy lyʕqwb wbtrh lšlyḥʔ klhwn
15:08	lḥrtʔ dyn dklhwn ʔyk dlyḥṭʔ ʔtḥzy ʔp ly
15:09	ʔnʔ ʔnʔ gyr zʕwrhwn dšlyḥʔ wlʔ šwʔ ʔnʔ dʔtqrʔ šlyḥʔ mṭl drdpt ʕdth dʔlhʔ
15:10	bṭybwth dyn dʔlhʔ ʔyty mdm dʔyty wṭybwth dby lʔ hwt sryqʔ ʔlʔ ytyr mn klhwn lʔyt lʔ ʔnʔ ʔlʔ ṭybwth dʕmy
15:11	ʔn ʔnʔ hkyl wʔn hnwn hknʔ mkrzynn whknʔ hymntwn
15:12	ʔn dyn mšyḥʔ mtkrz dqm mn byt mytʔ ʔyknʔ ʔyt bkwn ʔnšʔ dʔmryn lyt ḥyt mytʔ
15:13	wʔn ḥyt mytʔ lyt ʔplʔ mšyḥʔ qm
15:14	wʔn mšyḥʔ lʔ qm sryqʔ hy krwzwtn sryqʔ ʔp hymnwtkwn
15:15	mštkḥyn ḥnn dyn ʔp shdʔ dglʔ dʔlhʔ dʔshdn ʕl ʔlhʔ dʔqym lmšyḥʔ kd lʔ ʔqym
15:16	ʔn mytʔ gyr lʔ qymyn ʔplʔ mšyḥʔ qm
15:17	wʔn mšyḥʔ lʔ qm bṭlʔ hy hymnwtkwn wʕdkyl bḥṭhykwn ʔntwn
15:18	wkbr ʔp ʔylyn ddmkw bmšyḥʔ ʔbdw lhwn
15:19	wʔn bhlyn hw ḥyʔ blḥwd msbrynn bmšyḥʔ dwynn hw mn klhwn bnynšʔ
15:20	hšʔ dyn mšyḥʔ qm mn byt mytʔ whwʔ ršytʔ ddmkʔ
15:21	wʔyknʔ dbyd brnšʔ hwʔ mwtʔ hknʔ ʔp byd brnšʔ hwyʔ ḥyt mytʔ
15:22	ʔyknʔ gyr dbʔdm klhwn bnynšʔ mytyn hknʔ ʔp bmšyḥʔ klhwn ḥʔyn
15:23	ʔnš ʔnš bṭksh ršytʔ hwʔ mšyḥʔ btrkn ʔylyn ddmšyḥʔ ʔnwn bmʔtyth
15:24	whydyn thwʔ ḥrtʔ mʔ dmšlm mlkwtʔ lʔlhʔ ʔbʔ mʔ dbṭl kl ryš wkl šwlṭn wkl ḥylyn
15:25	ʕtyd hw gyr dnmlk ʕdmʔ dnsym bʕldbbwhy klhwn tḥyt rglwhy
15:26	wʔḥryʔ bʕldbbʔ mtbṭl mwtʔ
15:27	kl gyr šʕbd tḥyt rglwhy mʔ dʔmr dyn dklmdm mštʕbd lh ydyʕʔ dsṭr mn hw dšʕbd lh kl
15:28	wmʔ dʔštʕbd lh kl hydyn hw brʔ nštʕbd lhw dšʕbd lh kl dnhwʔ ʔlhʔ kl bkl
15:29	wʔlʔ mnʔ nʕbdwn hnwn dʕmdyn ḥlp mytʔ ʔn mytʔ lʔ qymyn mnʔ ʕmdyn ḥlp mytʔ
15:30	wlmnʔ ʔp ḥnn bkl šʕʔ bqndynws qymynn
15:31	ymʔ ʔnʔ bšwbhrkwn ʔḥy dʔyt ly bmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ dklywm mʔt ʔnʔ
15:32	ʔn ʔyk dbyt bnynšʔ ʔštdyt lḥywtʔ bʔpsws mnʔ ʔthnyt ʔn mytʔ lʔ qymyn nʔkwl wnštʔ mḥr gyr mytynn
15:33	lʔ tṭʕwn mḥbln rʕynʔ bsymʔ šwʕytʔ byštʔ 
15:34	ʔʕyrw lbkwn zdyqʔyt wlʔ tḥṭwn ʔyt gyr ʔnšʔ dydʕtʔ dʔlhʔ lyt bhwn lbhttkwn hw ʔmr ʔnʔ
15:35	nʔmr ʔnš mnkwn dʔyknʔ qymyn mytʔ wbʔynʔ pgrʔ ʔtyn
15:36	sklʔ zrʕʔ dzrʕ ʔnt ʔn lʔ mʔt lʔ ḥyʔ
15:37	whw mdm dzrʕ ʔnt lʔ hwʔ hw pgrʔ dʕtyd lmhwʔ zrʕ ʔnt ʔlʔ prdtʔ ʕrṭlytʔ dḥṭʔ ʔw dsʕrʔ ʔw dšrkʔ dzrʕwnʔ
15:38	ʔlhʔ dyn yhb lh pgrʔ ʔyknʔ dṣbʔ wlḥd ḥd mn zrʕwnʔ pgrʔ dkynh
15:39	lʔ hwʔ dyn kl pgr šwʔ ʔḥryn hw gyr pgrʔ dbr ʔnšʔ wʔḥryn dbʕyrʔ wʔḥryn dprḥtʔ wʔḥryn dnwnʔ
15:40	wʔyt pgrʔ šmynʔ wʔyt pgrʔ ʔrʕnyʔ ʔlʔ ʔḥryn hw šwbḥʔ dšmynʔ wʔḥryn dʔrʕnyʔ
15:41	wʔḥryn hw šwbḥʔ dšmšʔ wʔḥryn šwbḥʔ dshrʔ wʔḥryn šwbḥʔ dkwkbʔ wkwkbʔ mn kwkbʔ mytr hw bšwbḥʔ
15:42	hknʔ ʔp ḥyt mytʔ mzdrʕyn bḥblʔ qymyn dlʔ ḥblʔ
15:43	mzdrʕyn bṣʕrʔ qymyn bšwbḥʔ mzdrʕyn bkryhwtʔ qymyn bḥylʔ
15:44	mzdrʕyn pgrʔ npšnyʔ qʔm pgrʔ rwḥnyʔ ʔyt gyr pgrʔ dnpš wʔyt pgrʔ drwḥ
15:45	hknʔ ʔp ktyb hwʔ ʔdm brnšʔ qdmyʔ lnpš ḥyʔ wʔdm ʔḥryʔ lrwḥʔ mḥynytʔ
15:46	ʔlʔ lʔ hwʔ lwqdm rwḥnyʔ ʔlʔ npšnyʔ whydyn rwḥnyʔ
15:47	brnšʔ qdmyʔ ʕprnʔ dmn ʔrʕʔ brnšʔ dtryn mryʔ mn šmyʔ
15:48	ʔyknʔ dʔytwhy hw ʕprnʔ hknʔ ʔp ʕprnʔ wʔyknʔ dʔytwhy hw dmn šmyʔ hknʔ ʔp šmynʔ
15:49	wʔyk dlbšn dmwtʔ dhw dmn ʕprʔ hknʔ nlbš dmwtʔ dhw dmn šmyʔ
15:50	hdʔ dyn ʔmr ʔnʔ ʔḥy dbsrʔ wdmʔ mlkwtʔ dšmyʔ lmʔrt lʔ mškḥyn wlʔ ḥblʔ yrt lʔ mtḥblnwtʔ
15:51	hʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn ʔrzʔ lw kln ndmk kln dyn ntḥlp
15:52	ḥrypʔyt ʔyk rpp ʕynʔ bqrnʔ ʔḥrytʔ kd tqrʔ wnqwmwn mytʔ dlʔ ḥblʔ wḥnn ntḥlp
15:53	ʕtyd hw gyr hnʔ dmtḥbl dnlbš lʔ mtḥblnwtʔ whnʔ dmʔt dnlbš lʔ mywtwtʔ
15:54	mʔ dlbš dyn hnʔ dmtḥbl lʔ mtḥblnwtʔ whnʔ dmʔt lʔ mywtwtʔ hydyn thwʔ mltʔ hy dktybʔ dʔtblʕ mwtʔ bzkwtʔ
15:55	ʔykw ʕwqsk mwtʔ ʔw ʔykʔ hy zkwtky šywl
15:56	ʕwqsh dyn dmwtʔ ḥṭytʔ hy wḥylʔ dḥṭytʔ nmwsʔ hw
15:57	ṭybw dyn lʔlhʔ dyhb ln zkwtʔ byd mrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
15:58	mkyl ʔḥy wḥbyby hww mšrryn wlʔ thwwn mtzyʕyn ʔlʔ hww mtytryn bklzbn bʕbdh dmryʔ kd ydʕyn ʔntwn dʕmlkwn lʔ hwʔ sryq bmryʔ
16:01	ʕl mdm dyn dmtknš lqdyšʔ ʔyknʔ dpqdt lʕdtʔ dglṭyʔ hknʔ ʔp ʔntwn ʕbdw
16:02	bkl ḥd bšbʔ ʔnš ʔnš mnkwn bbyth nhwʔ sʔm wnṭr hw mdm dmṭʔ bʔydwhy dlʔ mʔ dʔtyt hydyn nhwyn gbytʔ
16:03	wmʔ dʔtyt lʔylyn dgbyn ʔntwn lhwn ʔšdr bʔgrtʔ dnwblwn ṭybwtkwn lʔwršlm
16:04	ʔn dyn šwʔ hw swʕrnʔ dʔp ʔnʔ ʔzl ʕmy nʔzlwn
16:05	ʔtʔ ʔnʔ dyn lwtkwn mʔ dʕbrt mn mqdwnyʔ ʕbr ʔnʔ lh gyr lmqdwnyʔ
16:06	wkbr ʔp lwtkwn ʔqwʔ ʔw ʔstʔ lwtkwn dʔntwn tlwwnny lʔtr dʔzl ʔnʔ
16:07	lʔ gyr ṣbʔ ʔnʔ dhšʔ ʔyk ʕbr ʔwrḥʔ ʔḥzykwn msbr ʔnʔ gyr dʔwḥr zbnʔ lwtkwn ʔn mry mps ly
16:08	mqwʔ ʔnʔ dyn bʔpsws ʕdmʔ lpnṭqwsṭʔ
16:09	trʕʔ gyr rbʔ ʔtptḥ ly dmlʔ swʕrnʔ wsqwblʔ sgyʔyn
16:10	ʔn dyn nʔtʔ ṣʔdykwn ṭymtʔws ḥzw ddlʔ dḥlʔ nhwʔ lwtkwn ʕbdʔ gyr dmryʔ plḥ ʔkwty
16:11	lmʔ hkyl ʔnš nšwṭywhy ʔlʔ lwʔwhy bšlmʔ dnʔtʔ lwty mqwʔ ʔnʔ lh gyr ʕm ʔḥʔ
16:12	mn ʔplw dyn ʔḥy sgy bʕyt mnh dnʔtʔ lwtkwn ʕm ʔḥʔ wkbr lʔ hwʔ ṣbynʔ dnʔtʔ lwtkwn ʔmty dyn dnhwʔ lh ʔtrʔ ʔtʔ lwtkwn
16:13	ʔttʕyrw wqwmw bhymnwtʔ ʔtgbrw ʔtḥsnw
16:14	wklhyn ṣbwtkwn bḥwbʔ nhwyn
16:15	bʕʔ ʔnʔ dyn mnkwn ʔḥy ʕl bytʔ dʔsṭpnʔ mṭl dydʕyn ʔntwn dhnwn ʔnwn ršytʔ dʔkʔyʔ wsmw npšhwn ltšmštʔ dqdyšʔ
16:16	dʔp ʔntwn thwwn mštmʕyn lʔylyn dhknʔ ʔnwn wlklnš dlʔʔ ʕmn wmʕdr
16:17	ḥdʔ ʔnʔ dyn bmʔtyth dʔsṭpnʔ wdprṭwnṭws wdʔkʔyqws dmdm dbṣrtwn lwty hnwn mlyw
16:18	ʔnyḥw gyr rwḥy dyly wdylkwn hwytwn hkyl mštwdʕyn lʔylyn dhknʔ ʔnwn
16:19	šʔln bšlmkwn ʕdtʔ klhyn dbʔsyʔ šʔlyn bšlmkwn sgy bmrn ʔqlws wprysqlʔ ʕm ʕdtʔ dbbythwn
16:20	šʔlyn bšlmkwn ʔḥyn klhwn šʔlw bšlmʔ ḥd dḥd bnwšqtʔ qdyštʔ
16:21	šlmʔ bktbt ʔydʔ dyly dpwlws
16:22	mn dlʔ rḥm lmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ nhwʔ ḥrm mrn ʔtʔ
16:23	ṭybwth dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʕmkwn
16:24	wḥwby ʕm klkwn bmšyḥʔ yšwʕ 
01:01	pwlws šlyḥʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ bṣbynh dʔlhʔ wṭymtʔws ʔḥʔ lʕdtʔ dʔlhʔ dʔyt bqwrntws wlklhwn qdyšʔ dʔyt bʔkʔyʔ klh
01:02	ṭybwtʔ ʕmkwn wšlmʔ mn ʔlhʔ ʔbwn wmn mrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:03	mbrk hw ʔlhʔ ʔbwhy dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʔbʔ drḥmʔ wʔlhʔ dkl bwyʔ
01:04	hw dmbyʔ ln bklhwn ʔwlṣnyn dʔp ḥnn nškḥ nbyʔ lʔylyn dbkl ʔwlṣnyn ʔnwn bhw bwyʔʔ dḥnn mtbyʔynn mn ʔlhʔ
01:05	ʔyknʔ gyr dmtytryn bn ḥšwhy dmšyḥʔ hknʔ byd mšyḥʔ mtytr ʔp bwyʔn
01:06	ʔpn dyn mtʔlṣynn ʕl ʔpy bwyʔkwn hw wʕl ʔpy ḥyykwn mtʔlṣynn wʔn mtbyʔynn mṭl dʔntwn ttbyʔwn wthwʔ bkwn ḥpyṭwtʔ dtsybrwn ʔnwn lḥšʔ hnwn dʔp ḥnn ḥšynn lhwn
01:07	wsbrn dʕlykwn šryr hw ydʕynn gyr dʔn šwtpyn ʔntwn bḥšʔ šwtpyn ʔntwn ʔp bbwyʔʔ
01:08	ṣbynn dyn dtdʕwn ʔḥyn ʕl ʔwlṣnʔ dhwʔ ln bʔsyʔ drwrbʔyt ʔtʔlṣn ytyr mn ḥyln ʕdmʔ dqrybyn hww ḥyyn lmtṭlqw
01:09	wʕl npšn psqn mwtʔ dlʔ nhwʔ ln twklnʔ ʕl npšn ʔlʔ ʕl ʔlhʔ hw dmqym mytʔ
01:10	hw dmn mwtʔ ḥsynʔ prqn wtwb msbrynn dprq ln
01:11	bmʕdrnwtʔ dbʕwtkwn dʕl ʔpyn dthwʔ mwhbth dlwtn ṭybwtʔ dʕbydʔ bʔpy sgyʔʔ wsgyʔʔ nwdwn lh ʕl ʔpyn
01:12	šwbhrn gyr hnw shdwtʔ drʕynn dbpšyṭwtʔ wbdkywtʔ wbṭybwtʔ dʔlhʔ ʔthpkn bʕlmʔ wlʔ bḥkmtʔ dpgrʔ wytyrʔyt lwtkwn dylkwn
01:13	lʔ hwʔ ʔḥrnyn ktbynn lkwn ʔlʔ ʔylyn dydʕyn ʔntwn ʔp mštwdʕyn ʔntwn tkyl ʔnʔ dyn dʕdmʔ lʔḥrytʔ tštwdʕwn
01:14	ʔyknʔ dʔp ʔštwdʕtwn qlyl mn sgy dšwbhrkwn ḥnn ʔyk dʔp ʔntwn dyln bywmh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:15	wbhnʔ twklnʔ ṣbʔ hwyt mn qdym dʔtʔ lwtkwn dʔʕypʔyt tqblwn ṭybwtʔ
01:16	wʔʕbr ʕlykwn lmqdwnyʔ wtwb mn mqdwnyʔ ʔtʔ ʔtʔ wʔntwn tlwwnny lyhwd
01:17	hdʔ hkyl dʔtrʕyt lmʔ ʔyk msrhbʔ ʔtrʕyt ʔw dlmʔ dbsr ʔnyn ʔylyn dmtrʕʔ ʔnʔ mṭl dwlʔ hwʔ dnhwʔ bhyn ʔyn ʔyn wlʔ lʔ
01:18	mhymn hw ʔlhʔ dlʔ hwt mltn dlwtkwn ʔyn wlʔ
01:19	brh gyr dʔlhʔ yšwʕ mšyḥʔ hw dbʔydn ʔtkrz lkwn by wbslwnws wbṭymtʔws lʔ hwʔ ʔyn wlʔ ʔlʔ ʔyn hwʔ bh
01:20	klhwn gyr mwlknwhy dʔlhʔ bh hw bmšyḥʔ ʔyn hww mṭl hnʔ bʔydh yhbynn ʔmyn ltšbwḥth dʔlhʔ
01:21	ʔlhʔ hw dyn mšrr ln ʕmkwn bmšyḥʔ hw dhw mšḥn
01:22	wḥtmn wyhb rhbwnʔ drwḥh blbwtn
01:23	ʔnʔ dyn lʔlhʔ mshd ʔnʔ ʕl npšy dmṭl dḥʔs ʔnʔ ʕlykwn lʔ ʔtyt lqwrntws
01:24	lʔ hwʔ mṭl dmry hymnwtkwn ḥnn ʔlʔ mʕdrnʔ ḥnn dḥdwtkwn bhymnwtʔ hw gyr qymyn ʔntwn
02:01	dnt dyn hdʔ bnpšy dlʔ twb bkrywtʔ ʔtʔ lwtkwn
02:02	ʔn ʔnʔ gyr mkrʔ ʔnʔ lkwn mnw nḥdyny ʔlʔ hw dʔnʔ ʔkryt lh
02:03	wdktbt lkwn hy hdʔ dlʔ kd ʔtʔ nkrwn ly hnwn ʔylyn dwlʔ hwʔ lhwn dhnwn nḥdwnny tkyl ʔnʔ dyn ʕl klkwn dḥdwty dklkwn hy
02:04	wmn ʔwlṣnʔ rbʔ wmn ʔnwsyʔ dlbʔ ktbt lkwn hlyn bdmʕʔ sgyʔtʔ lʔ mṭl dtkrʔ lkwn ʔlʔ mṭl dtdʕwn ḥwbʔ ytyrʔ dʔyt ly lwtkwn
02:05	ʔn dyn ʔnš ʔkry lʔ hwʔ ly ʔkry ʔlʔ bṣyrʔ qlyl lklkwn dlʔ tʔqr mltʔ ʕlykwn
02:06	kdw lh dyn lhnʔ kʔtʔ dmn sgyʔʔ
02:07	wmkyl ʔḥrnyʔyt wlʔ dtšbqwn lh wtbyʔwnh dlmʔ bkrywtʔ ytyrtʔ ntblʕ lh hw mn dhknʔ hw
02:08	mṭl hnʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnkwn dtšrrwn bh ḥwbkwn
02:09	mṭl hnʔ gyr ktbt ʔp dʔdʕ bnsynʔ ʔn bklmdm mštmʕyn ʔntwn
02:10	lmn dʔntwn dyn šbqyn ʔntwn ʔp ʔnʔ ʔp ʔnʔ gyr mdm dšbqt lmn dšbqt mṭltkwn hw šbqt bprṣwph dmšyḥʔ
02:11	dlʔ nʕlbn sṭnʔ ydʕynn gyr mḥšbth 
02:12	kd ʔtyt dyn lṭrwʔs bsbrth dmšyḥʔ wʔtptḥ ly trʕʔ bmryʔ
02:13	lʔ hwʔ ly nyḥʔ brwḥy dlʔ ʔškḥt lṭṭws ʔḥy ʔlʔ šryt ʔnwn wnpqt ly lmqdwnyʔ
02:14	ṭybw dyn lʔlhʔ dbkl zbn ḥztʔ ʕbd ln bmšyḥʔ wglʔ bn ryḥʔ dydʕth bkl ʔtr
02:15	ryḥʔ ḥnn gyr bsymʔ bmšyḥʔ lʔlhʔ bʔylyn dḥʔyn wbʔylyn dʔbdyn
02:16	lʔylyn dryḥʔ dmwtʔ lmwtʔ wlʔylyn dryḥʔ dḥyʔ lḥyʔ wlhlyn mnw nšwʔ
02:17	lʔ hwyn gyr ʔyk šrkʔ dmmzgyn mlwhy dʔlhʔ ʔlʔ ʔyk dbšrrʔ wʔyk dmn ʔlhʔ qdm ʔlhʔ bmšyḥʔ mmllynn
03:01	mšrynn ln twb mn dryš dnḥwykwn mnʔ ḥnn ʔw dlmʔ snyqynn ʔyk ʔḥrnʔ dʔgrtʔ dpwqdʔ ntktbn lkwn ʕlyn ʔw dʔntwn tktbwn tpqdwn ʕlyn
03:02	ʔgrtn dyn dyln ʔntwn ʔnwn dktybʔ blbn wydyʕʔ wmtqryʔ mn klnš
03:03	ydʕytwn gyr dʔgrth ʔntwn dmšyḥʔ dʔštmšt mnn dktybʔ lʔ bdywtʔ ʔlʔ brwḥʔ dʔlhʔ ḥyʔ lʔ blwḥʔ dkʔpʔ ʔlʔ blwḥʔ dlbʔ dbsrʔ
03:04	twklnʔ dyn hknʔ ʔyt ln bmšyḥʔ lwt ʔlhʔ
03:05	lw dḥnn spqynn dntrʕʔ mdm ʔyk dmn npšn ʔlʔ ḥyln mn ʔlhʔ hw
03:06	hw dʔšwyn dnhwʔ mšmšnʔ ddytqʔ ḥdtʔ lʔ bktbʔ ʔlʔ brwḥʔ ktbʔ gyr qṭl rwḥʔ dyn mḥyʔ
03:07	ʔn dyn tšmštʔ dmwtʔ bktbʔ ʔtršmt bkʔpʔ whwt btšbwḥtʔ ʔyknʔ dlʔ nškḥwn bny ʔysryl lmḥr bprṣwph dmwšʔ mṭl šwbḥʔ dprṣwph hw dʔtbṭl
03:08	ʔyknʔ hkyl tšmštʔ drwḥʔ lʔ ytyrʔyt thwʔ bšwbḥʔ
03:09	ʔn gyr ltšmštʔ dḥwybʔ hwʔ šwbḥʔ ḥd kmʔ ttytr tšmštʔ dzdyqwtʔ bšwbḥʔ
03:10	ʔyk hw gyr dʔplʔ mšbḥʔ hy dʔštbḥt bpwḥmʔ dhnʔ šwbḥʔ mytrʔ
03:11	ʔn gyr mdm dʔtbṭl bšwbḥʔ hwʔ ytyrʔyt ʔynʔ dmqwʔ bšwbḥʔ nhwʔ
03:12	mṭl dʔyt ln hkyl hnʔ sbrʔ ytyrʔyt bglʔ ʕyn mtdbrynn
03:13	wlʔ ʔyk mwšʔ drmʔ hwʔ tḥpytʔ ʕl ʔpwhy dlʔ nḥwrwn bny ʔysryl bšwlmh dhw dmtbṭl
03:14	ʔlʔ ʔtʕwrw bmdʕyhwn ʕdmʔ gyr lywmnʔ ʔmty ddytqʔ ʕtyqtʔ mtqryʔ hy hy tḥpytʔ qymʔ ʕlyhwn wlʔ mtglyʔ dbmšyḥʔ hw mtbṭlʔ
03:15	wʕdmʔ lywmnʔ ʔmty dmtqrʔ mwšʔ tḥpytʔ ʕl lbhwn rmyʔ
03:16	wʔmty dʔnš mnhwn ntpnʔ lwt mryʔ mštqlʔ mnh tḥpytʔ
03:17	mryʔ dyn hwyw rwḥʔ wʔtr drwḥh dmryʔ ḥʔrwtʔ hy
03:18	ḥnn dyn kln bʔpʔ glytʔ tšbwḥth dmryʔ ʔyk dbmḥzytʔ ḥzynn wlh ldmwtʔ mštḥlpynn mn šwbḥʔ lšwbḥʔ ʔyk dmn mryʔ rwḥʔ
04:01	mṭl hnʔ lʔ mʔnʔ ln btšmštʔ hdʔ dʔḥydynn ʔyk rḥmʔ dhww ʕlyn
04:02	ʔlʔ ʔslynn ksyth dbhttʔ wlʔ mhlkynn bḥrʕwtʔ wlʔ nklynn mlth dʔlhʔ ʔlʔ bglywtʔ dšrrʔ mḥwynn npšn lklhwn rʕynʔ dbnynšʔ qdm ʔlhʔ
04:03	wʔn dyn mksy hw ʔwnglywn dyln lʔylyn dʔbdyn hw mksy
04:04	ʔylyn dʔlhh dʕlmʔ hnʔ ʕwr mdʕyhwn ʕl dlʔ mhymnyn dlʔ ndnḥ lhwn nwhrh dʔwnglywn dšwbḥh dmšyḥʔ dhwyw dmwth dʔlhʔ
04:05	lʔ hwʔ gyr npšn mkrzynn ʔlʔ lmšyḥʔ yšwʕ mrn lnpšn dyn dʕbdykwn ḥnn mṭl yšwʕ
04:06	mṭl dʔlhʔ hw dʔmr dmn ḥšwkʔ nwhrʔ ndnḥ hw dnḥ blbwtn dntnhr bydʕtʔ dšwbḥh dʔlhʔ bprṣwph dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ
04:07	ʔyt ln dyn symtʔ hdʔ bmʔnʔ dḥṣpʔ drbwtʔ dḥylʔ mn ʔlhʔ thwʔ wlʔ mnn
04:08	bklmdm gyr mtʔlṣynn ʔlʔ lʔ mtḥnqynn mtṭrpynn ʔlʔ lʔ ḥybyn ḥnn
04:09	mtrdpynn ʔlʔ lʔ mštbqynn mstḥpynn ʔlʔ lʔ ʔbdynn
04:10	bklzbn mytwth dyšwʕ bpgryn šqylynn dʔp ḥywhy dyšwʕ bpgryn ntglwn
04:11	ʔn ḥnn gyr ḥyʔ lmwtʔ mštlmynn mṭl yšwʕ hknʔ ʔp ḥywhy dyšwʕ ntglwn bpgrn hnʔ dmʔt
04:12	hšʔ mwtʔ bn mtḥpṭ wḥyʔ bkwn
04:13	ʔp ḥnn hkyl dḥdʔ hy rwḥʔ dhymnwtʔ ʔyt ln ʔyk dktyb dhymnt mṭl hnʔ ʔp mllt mhymnynn mṭl hnʔ ʔp mmllynn
04:14	wydʕynn dhw mn dʔqym lmrn yšwʕ ʔp ln byd yšwʕ nqym wnqrbn ʕmkwn lwth
04:15	klmdm gyr mṭltkwn hw dkd mtytrʔ ṭybwtʔ byd sgyʔʔ tsgʔ twdytʔ lšwbḥh dʔlhʔ 
04:16	mṭl hnʔ lʔ mʔnʔ ln ʔp ʔn brnšn gyr bryʔ mtḥbl ʔlʔ dmn lgw mtḥdt ywm mn ywm
04:17	ʔwlṣnh gyr dzbnʔ hnʔ kd ṭb zʕwr wqlyl šwbḥʔ rbʔ dlʔ skʔ lʕlm ʕlmyn mṭyb ln
04:18	dlʔ ḥdynn bhlyn dmtḥzyn ʔlʔ bhlyn dlʔ mtḥzyn dmtḥzyn gyr dzbnʔ ʔnyn dlʔ mtḥzyn dyn dlʕlm ʔnyn
05:01	ydʕynn gyr dʔn bytn dbʔrʕʔ hnʔ dpgrʔ nštrʔ ʔlʔ ʔyt ln bnynʔ dmn ʔlhʔ bytʔ dlʔ bʕbd ʔydyʔ bšmyʔ lʕlm
05:02	ʔp ʕl hdʔ gyr mttnḥynn wswynn dnlbš bytn dmn šmyʔ
05:03	ʔlʔ ʔp mʔ dlbšn nštkḥ ln ʕrṭl
05:04	kd ʔytyn gyr hšʔ bhnʔ bytʔ mttnḥynn mn ywqrh wlʔ ṣbynn lmšlḥh ʔlʔ dnlbš lʕl mnh dttblʕ mytwth bḥyʔ
05:05	wdmʕtd ln lh lhdʔ ʔlhʔ hw hw dyhb ln rhbwnʔ drwḥh
05:06	mṭl dydʕynn hkyl wmpsynn dkmʔ dbpgrʔ šrynn ʕnydynn mn mrn
05:07	bhymnwtʔ hw gyr mhlkynn wlʔ bḥzyʔ
05:08	mṭl hnʔ tkylynn wmswḥynn dnʕnd mn pgrʔ wnhwʔ lwt mrn
05:09	wmtḥpṭynn dʔn ʕnwdʔ ḥnn wʔn ʕmwrʔ lh hwyn špryn
05:10	kln gyr ʕtydynn lmqm qdm bym dmšyḥʔ dntprʕ ʔnš ʔnš bpgrh mdm dʕbyd lh ʔn dṭb wʔn dbyš
05:11	mṭl dydʕynn hkyl dḥlth dmrn lbnynšʔ hw mpysynn lʔlhʔ dyn glynn sbr ʔnʔ dyn dʔp lmdʕykwn dylkwn glynn
05:12	lʔ hwʔ twb npšn mšbḥynn lkwn ʔlʔ ʕltʔ hw yhbynn lkwn dhwytwn mštbhryn bn lwt hnwn dbʔpʔ hw mštbhryn wlʔ blbʔ
05:13	ʔn gyr šṭynn lʔlhʔ wʔn tqnynn lkwn
05:14	ḥwbh gyr dmšyḥʔ ʔlṣ ln drnynn hdʔ dḥd ḥlp klnš myt mdyn klnš myt lh
05:15	wḥlp klnš hw myt dʔylyn dḥyyn lʔ lnpšhwn nḥwn ʔlʔ lhw ʔynʔ dʕl ʔpyhwn myt wqm
05:16	wmkyl ḥnn lʔnš bpgr lʔ ydʕynn wʔn ydʕn bpgr lmšyḥʔ ʔlʔ mn hšʔ lʔ ydʕynn
05:17	kl mn dbmšyḥʔ hw hkyl brytʔ hw ḥdtʔ ʕtyqtʔ ʕbr lhyn
05:18	wkl mdm hwʔ ḥdtʔ mn ʔlhʔ hw drʕyn lh bmšyḥʔ wyhb ln tšmštʔ dtrʕwtʔ
05:19	ʔlhʔ hwʔ gyr bmšyḥʔ hw drʕy lʕlmʔ ʕm rbwth wlʔ ḥšb lhwn ḥṭhyhwn wsm bn dyln mltʔ dtrʕwtʔ
05:20	ʔyzgdʔ ḥnn hkyl ḥlp mšyḥʔ wʔyk hw dʔlhʔ bʕʔ mnkwn bʔydn ḥlp mšyḥʔ hkyl bʕynn ʔtrʕw lʔlhʔ
05:21	hw gyr dlʔ ydʕ hwʔ ḥṭytʔ mṭltkwn ḥṭytʔ ʕbdh dḥnn nhwʔ bh zdyqwtʔ dʔlhʔ
06:01	wʔyk mʕdrnʔ bʕynn mnkwn dlʔ tstrq bkwn ṭybwtʔ dʔlhʔ dqbltwn
06:02	ʔmr gyr dbzbnʔ mqblʔ ʕnytk wbywmʔ dḥyʔ ʕdrtk hʔ hšʔ zbnʔ mqblʔ whʔ hšʔ ywmʔ dḥyʔ
06:03	lmʔ bmdm ttlwn lʔnš ʕltʔ dtwqltʔ dlʔ nhwʔ mwmʔ btšmštn
06:04	ʔlʔ bkl mdm nḥwʔ npšn dmšmšnʔ ḥnn dʔlhʔ bmsybrnwtʔ sgyʔtʔ bʔwlṣnʔ bʔnnqs bḥbwšyʔ
06:05	bngdʔ bʔswrʔ bšgwšyʔ blʔwtʔ bšhrʔ bṣwmʔ
06:06	bdkywtʔ bydʕtʔ bngyrwt rwḥʔ bbsymwtʔ brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ bḥwbʔ dlʔ nklʔ
06:07	bmltʔ dqwštʔ bḥylʔ dʔlhʔ bzynʔ dzdyqwtʔ dbymynʔ wbsmlʔ
06:08	bšwbḥʔ wbṣʕrʔ bqwlsʔ wbgwnyʔ ʔyk mṭʕynʔ wšryrʔ
06:09	ʔyk lʔ ydyʕʔ wydyʕynn ʔyk mytynn whʔ ḥyyn ḥnn ʔyk dmtrdynn wlʔ mytynn
06:10	ʔyk dkryʔ ln wbklzbn ḥdynn ʔyk msknʔ wlsgyʔʔ mʕtrynn ʔyk dmdm lyt ln wkl mdm ʔḥydynn
06:11	pwmn ptyḥ hw lwtkwn qwrntyʔ wlbn rwyḥ
06:12	lʔ ʔlyṣytwn bn ʔlyṣytwn dyn brḥmykwn
06:13	ʔyk dlbnyʔ dyn ʔmr ʔnʔ pwrʕwny ḥwbly dlwtkwn wrwḥw ḥwbkwn lwty
06:14	wlʔ thwwn bny zwgʔ lʔylyn dlʔ mhymnyn ʔydʔ gyr šwtpwtʔ ʔyt lzdyqwtʔ ʕm ʕwlʔ ʔw ʔynʔ ḥwlṭnʔ ʔyt lnhyrʔ ʕm ḥšwkʔ
06:15	ʔw ʔydʔ šlmwtʔ ʔyt lmšyḥʔ ʕm sṭnʔ ʔw ʔydʔ mntʔ ʔyt ldmhymn ʕm dlʔ mhymn
06:16	ʔydʔ dyn ʔwywtʔ ʔyt lhyklh dʔlhʔ ʕm dšʔdʔ ʔntwn dyn hyklh ʔntwn dʔlhʔ ḥyʔ ʔyknʔ dʔmyr dʔʕmr bhwn wʔhlk bhwn wʔhwʔ ʔlhhwn whnwn nhwwn ly ʕmʔ
06:17	mṭl hnʔ pwqw mn bynthwn wʔtpršw mnhwn ʔmr mryʔ wlṭmʔʔ lʔ ttqrbwn wʔnʔ ʔqblkwn
06:18	wʔhwʔ lkwn lʔbʔ wʔntwn thwwn ly lbnyʔ wlbntʔ ʔmr mryʔ dkl ʔḥyd 
07:01	mṭl dʔyt ln hkyl hlyn mwlknʔ ḥbyby ndkʔ npšn mn klh ṭmʔwtʔ dbsrʔ wdrwḥʔ wnplwḥ qdyšwtʔ bdḥltʔ dʔlhʔ
07:02	sybrwn ʔḥyn bʔnš lʔ ʔʕwln lʔnš lʔ ḥbln lʔnš lʔ ʕlbn
07:03	lʔ hwʔ lmḥybwtkwn ʔmr ʔnʔ qdmt gyr ʔmrt dblbn ʔntwn lmmt ʔkḥdʔ wlmḥʔ
07:04	prhsyʔ sgyʔtʔ ʔyt ly lwtkwn wsgy ʔyt ly bkwn šwbhrʔ wmlʔ ʔnʔ bwyʔʔ wswgʔʔ mtytrʔ by ḥdwtʔ bklhwn ʔwlṣny
07:05	ʔp mn dʔtyn gyr lmqdwnyʔ ʔplʔ ḥd nyḥ hwʔ lpgrn ʔlʔ bkl mdm ʔtʔlṣn mn lbr qrbʔ wmn lgw dḥltʔ
07:06	ʔlʔ ʔlhʔ hw dmbyʔ lmkykʔ byʔn bmʔtyth dṭṭws
07:07	wlʔ blḥwd bmʔtyth ʔlʔ ʔp bnyḥh hw dʔtnyḥ bkwn sbrn gyr ʕl ḥwbkwn dlwtn wʕl ʔblkwn wṭnnkwn dʕl ʔpyn wkd šmʕt ḥdwtʔ sgyʔtʔ hwt ly
07:08	dʔpn ʔkryt lkwn bʔgrtʔ lʔ twyʔ ly npšy ʔpn twyʔ hwt ḥzʔ ʔnʔ gyr dhy ʔgrtʔ ʔpn dšʕtʔ ʔkryt lkwn
07:09	ʔlʔ ḥdwtʔ sgyʔtʔ ʕbdt ly lʔ ʕl dkryt lkwn ʔlʔ mṭl dkrywtkwn ltybwtʔ ʔytytkwn kryt lkwn gyr bdʔlhʔ ʔyknʔ dbmdm lʔ tḥsrwn mnn
07:10	krywtʔ gyr dmṭl ʔlhʔ twt npšʔ ʕbdʔ dlʔ hpkʔ wmpnyʔ lḥyʔ krywtʔ dyn dʕlmʔ mwtʔ hw ʕbdʔ
07:11	hʔ gyr hy hdʔ dʔttʕyqtwn mṭl ʔlhʔ kmʔ ʔʕbdt bkwn ḥpyṭwtʔ wmpq brwḥʔ wrwgzʔ wdḥltʔ wḥwbʔ wṭnnʔ wtbʕtʔ wbklmdm ḥwytwn npškwn ddkyn ʔntwn bh bṣbwtʔ
07:12	thwʔ dyn hdʔ dktbt lkwn dlʔ hwʔ mṭl msklnʔ ʔplʔ mṭl hw mn dmskl bh ʔlʔ mṭl dttydʕ qdm ʔlhʔ ḥpyṭwtkwn dmṭltn
07:13	mṭl hnʔ ʔtbyʔn wʕm bwyʔn ytyrʔyt ḥdyn bḥdwth dṭṭws dʔtnyḥt rwḥh ʕm klkwn
07:14	dbmdm dʔštbhrt lh ʕl ʔpykwn lʔ bhtt ʔlʔ ʔyk dklmdm qwštʔ mlln ʕmkwn hknʔ ʔp šwbhrn dlwt ṭṭws bqwštʔ ʔštkḥ
07:15	ʔp rḥmwhy ytyrʔyt sgyw ʕlykwn kd mtdkr mštmʕnwtʔ dklkwn dbdḥltʔ wbrtytʔ qbltwnyhy
07:16	ḥdʔ ʔnʔ dbkl mdm tkyl ʔnʔ ʕlykwn
08:01	mwdʕynn lkwn dyn ʔḥyn ṭybwth dʔlhʔ dʔtyhbt bʕdtʔ dmqdwnyʔ
08:02	dbbwqyʔ sgyʔʔ dʔwlṣnhwn ytyrwtʔ hwt lḥdwthwn wʕwmqʔ dmsknwthwn ʔtytr bʕwtrʔ dpšyṭwthwn
08:03	shd ʔnʔ gyr dʔyk ḥylhwn wytyr mn ḥylhwn bṣbyn npšhwn
08:04	bʕw mnn bbʕwtʔ sgyʔtʔ dnštwtpwn bṭybwtʔ dtšmštʔ dqdyšʔ
08:05	wlʔ ʔyk mʔ dsbryn hwyn ʔlʔ npšhwn ʔšlmw lwqdm lmrn wʔp ln bṣbynh dʔlhʔ
08:06	dḥnn nbʕʔ mn ṭṭws dʔyk dšry hknʔ nšlm bkwn ʔp ṭybwtʔ hdʔ
08:07	ʔlʔ ʔyknʔ dbklmdm mtytryn ʔntwn bhymnwtʔ wbmltʔ wbydʕtʔ wbkl ḥpyṭw wbḥwbn dlwtkwn hknʔ ʔp bhdʔ ṭybwtʔ ttytrwn
08:08	lʔ hwʔ mpqd pqd ʔnʔ lkwn ʔlʔ bḥpyṭwtʔ dḥbrykwn šrrʔ dḥwbkwn mnsʔ ʔnʔ
08:09	ydʕyn ʔntwn gyr ṭybwth dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ dmṭltkwn ʔtmskn kd ʔytwhy ʕtyrʔ dʔntwn bmsknwth tʕtrwn
08:10	mmlk dyn mlk ʔnʔ lkwn hdʔ dmʕdrʔ lkwn mṭl dmn ʔštqdy šrytwn lw lmṣbʔ blḥwd ʔlʔ ʔp lmʕbd
08:11	hšʔ dyn šlmw bʕbdʔ hw mdm dṣbytwn dʔyknʔ dhwʔ lkwn swwḥʔ lmṣbʔ hknʔ bʕbdʔ tšlmwn mn mʔ dʔyt lkwn
08:12	ʔn gyr ṣbynʔ ʔytwhy ʔyk mʔ dʔyt lh hkwt mtqbl lʔ hwʔ ʔyk mʔ dlyt lh
08:13	lʔ hwʔ gyr dlʔḥrnʔ thwʔ rwḥtʔ wlkwn ʔwlṣnʔ
08:14	ʔlʔ bšwywtʔ hww bzbnʔ hnʔ dytyrwtkwn dylkwn thwʔ lḥsyrwthwn dhlyn dʔp ytyrwthwn dhnwn thwʔ lḥsyrwtkwn dylkwn dthwʔ šwywtʔ
08:15	ʔyk dktyb dhw dʔsgy šql lʔ ʔtytr lh whw dqlyl šql lʔ ʔtbṣr lh
08:16	ṭybw dyn lʔlhʔ dyhbh ḥpyṭwtʔ hdʔ ḥlpykwn blbh dṭṭws
08:17	bʕwtn gyr qbl wmṭl dṭb bṭyl lh mn ṣbynh npq ṣʔdykwn
08:18	šdrn dyn ʕmh lʔḥwn ʔynʔ dtšbwḥth bʔwnglywn bklhyn ʕdtʔ
08:19	hknʔ dʔp mgbʔ gbʔ mn ʕdtʔ dnpwq ʕmn bṭybwtʔ hdʔ dmštmšʔ mnn lšwbḥh dylh dʔlhʔ wllwbbn dyln
08:20	qnyṭynn dyn bhdʔ dlʔ ʔnš nsym bn mwmʔ bhdʔ rbwtʔ dmštmšʔ mnn
08:21	yṣypynn gyr dšpyrtʔ lʔ qdm ʔlhʔ blḥwd ʔlʔ ʔp qdm bnynšʔ
08:22	šdrn dyn ʕmhwn ʔp lʔḥwn ʔynʔ dln bqʔ bklzbn bsgyʔtʔ dḥpyṭʔ hw hšʔ dyn ytyrʔyt ḥpyṭ btwklnʔ sgyʔʔ dʕlykwn
08:23	ʔn hkyl ṭṭws šwtpʔ hw dyly wmʕdrnʔ bkwn wʔn ʔḥyn ʔḥrnʔ šlyḥʔ ʔnwn dʕdtʔ dšwbḥh dmšyḥʔ
08:24	mkyl tḥwytʔ dḥwbkwn wšwbhrn dbkwn bhwn ḥww bprṣwp ʕdtʔ klhyn 
09:01	ʕl tšmštʔ dyn dqdyšʔ ytyrtʔ ʕbd ʔnʔ ʔn ktb ʔnʔ lkwn
09:02	ydʕ ʔnʔ gyr ṭwybh drʕynkwn wmṭl hnʔ ʔštbhrt bkwn lmqdwnyʔ dʔkʔyʔ ʕtydʔ hy mn ʔštqdy wṭnnʔ dylkwn lsgyʔʔ grg
09:03	šdrt dyn lʔḥʔ dlʔ nstrq šwbhrn dʔštbhrn bkwn ʕl hdʔ ṣbwtʔ dʔyknʔ dʔmrt thwwn mṭybyn
09:04	dlmʔ nʔtwn ʕmy mqdwnyʔ wnškḥwnkwn kd lʔ ʕtydyn ʔntwn wnbht ḥnn dlʔ nʔmr dʔntwn tbhtwn bšwbhrʔ hw dʔštbhrn
09:05	mṭl hnʔ ʔtbṭl ly dʔbʕʔ mn ʔḥy hlyn dnʔtwn qdmy lwtkwn wnʕtdwn bwrktʔ hy dmn qdym ʔštmʕtwn dthwʔ mṭybʔ hknʔ ʔyk bwrktʔ lʔ hwʔ ʔyk yʕnwtʔ
09:06	hdʔ dyn mn dzrʕ bḥwsnʔ ʔp bḥwsnʔ ḥṣd wmn dzrʕ bbwrktʔ bbwrktʔ nḥṣwd
09:07	kl ʔnš ʔyk dʔyt brʕynh lʔ ʔyk dmn krywtʔ ʔw ʔyk dmn qṭyrʔ lyhwbʔ hw gyr ḥdyʔ rḥm ʔlhʔ
09:08	mṭyʔ hy dyn bʔydy ʔlhʔ kl ṭybw dnytr bkwn dbklzbn bklmdm hw mʔ dspq lkwn nhwʔ lkwn wttytrwn bkl ʕbd ṭb
09:09	ʔyk dktyb dbdr wyhb lmsknʔ wzdyqwth qymʔ lʕlm
09:10	hw dyn dyhb zrʕʔ lzrwʕʔ wlḥmʔ lmʔkwltʔ hw ntl wnsgʔ zrʕkwn wnrbʔ pʔrʔ dzdyqwtkwn
09:11	dbkl mdm tʕtrwn bklh pšyṭwtʔ dhy gmrʔ bʔydn twdytʔ lʔlhʔ
09:12	mṭl dpwlḥnʔ dtšmštʔ hdʔ lʔ hwʔ blḥwd ḥsyrwtʔ dqdyšʔ mmlʔ ʔlʔ ʔp mytr btwdytʔ sgyʔtʔ lʔlhʔ
09:13	mṭl bwqyʔ gyr dtšmštʔ hdʔ lʔlhʔ mšbḥyn dʔštʕbdtwn ltwdytʔ dsbrth dmšyḥʔ wʔštwtptwn bpšyṭwtkwn ʕmhwn wʕm klnš
09:14	wṣlwtʔ mqrbyn ḥlpykwn bḥwbʔ sgyʔʔ mṭl swgʔʔ dṭybwth dʔlhʔ dʕlykwn
09:15	ṭybw dyn lʔlhʔ ʕl mwhbth dlʔ mtmllʔ
10:01	ʔnʔ dyn pwlws bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnkwn bnyḥwth wbmkykwth dmšyḥʔ dʔpn bʔpyn mkyk ʔnʔ lwtkwn ʔlʔ kd rḥyq ʔnʔ tkyl ʔnʔ ʕlykwn
10:02	bʕʔ ʔnʔ dyn mnkwn dlʔ mʔ dʔtyt ʔtʔlṣ btwklnʔ dʔyt ly dʔšyḥ ʔyk dmtrʕʔ ʔnʔ ʕl ʔnšʔ ʔylyn dḥšbyn ln dʔyk dbbsr mhlkynn
10:03	ʔpn bbsr gyr mhlkyn ḥnn ʔlʔ lʔ hwʔ dbsrʔ plḥynn
10:04	zynʔ gyr dplḥwtn lʔ hwʔ dbsrʔ ʔlʔ dḥylʔ dʔlhʔ wbh kbšynn ḥsnʔ mrydʔ
10:05	wstrynn mḥšbtʔ wkl rwmʔ dmttrym lwqbl ydʕth dʔlhʔ wšbynn kl trʕyn lmšmʕth dmšyḥʔ
10:06	wmṭybynn lmʕbd tbʕtʔ mn ʔylyn dlʔ mštmʕyn mʔ dʔtmlyt mštmʕnwtkwn
10:07	bprṣwpʔ ḥyryn ʔntwn ʔn ʔnš tkyl ʕl npšh ddmšyḥʔ hw hnʔ ndʕ mn npšh dʔyk dhw dmšyḥʔ hknʔ ʔp ḥnn
10:08	ʔn gyr ʔp mdm ytyr ʔštbhr ʕl šwlṭnʔ dyhb ly mrn lʔ bht ʔnʔ mṭl dlbnynʔ hw dylkwn yhb ln wlʔ lswḥpkwn
10:09	mhmʔ ʔnʔ dyn dlʔ ʔstbr ʔyk hw dmdḥlw mdḥl ʔnʔ lkwn bʔgrty
10:10	mṭl dʔyt ʔnšʔ dʔmryn dʔgrtʔ yqyrn wḥsynn mʔtyh dyn dgwšmʔ kryh wmlth šyṭʔ
10:11	ʔlʔ hdʔ ntrʕʔ mn dhknʔ ʔmr dʔyknʔ dʔytyn bmltʔ dʔgrtn kd rḥyqynn hknʔ ʔytyn ʔp mʔ dqrybynn bʕbdʔ
10:12	lʔ gyr mmrḥynn dnḥšwb ʔw dnpḥm npšn ʕm hnwn dmšbhryn npšhwn ʔlʔ mṭl dhnwn bhwn lhwn mpḥmyn lʔ mstklyn
10:13	ḥnn dyn lʔ mštbhrynn ytyr mn mšwḥtn ʔlʔ bmšwḥtʔ dtḥwmʔ dplg ln ʔlhʔ dnmṭʔ ʔp ʕdmʔ lwtkwn
10:14	lʔ hwʔ gyr ʔyk dlʔ mtmṭynn lwtkwn mtḥynn npšn ʕdmʔ gyr lwtkwn mṭyn bsbrth dmšyḥʔ
10:15	wlʔ mštbhrynn lbr mn mšwḥtn bʕmlʔ dʔḥrnʔ ʔlʔ ʔyt ln sbrʔ dkd rbyʔ hymnwtkwn bkwn ntrwrb ʔyk mšwḥtn wntytr
10:16	ʔp lhl mnkwn lmsbrw lʔ bmšwḥtʔ dʔḥrnʔ bʔylyn dmtqnn nštbhr
10:17	hw dyn dmštbhr bmryʔ nštbhr
10:18	lʔ hwʔ gyr mn dnpšh mšbḥ hw hw bqʔ ʔlʔ mn dmryʔ nšbḥywhy 
11:01	ʔštwp dyn msybryn hwytwn ly qlyl dʔmll pkyhʔyt ʔlʔ ʔp msybryn ʔntwn hw ly
11:02	ṭʔn ʔnʔ gyr bkwn bṭnnʔ dʔlhʔ mkrtkwn gyr lgbrʔ ḥd btwltʔ dkytʔ dʔqrb lmšyḥʔ
11:03	dḥl ʔnʔ dyn dlmʔ ʔyk dʔṭʕy ḥwyʔ lḥwʔ bnkylwth hknʔ ntḥblwn rʕynykwn mn pšyṭwtʔ dlwt mšyḥʔ
11:04	ʔn gyr hw dʔtʔ lwtkwn ʔḥrnʔ yšwʕ ʔkrz lkwn ʔynʔ dḥnn lʔ ʔkrzn ʔw rwḥʔ ʔḥrtʔ nsbtwn ʔydʔ dlʔ nsbtwn ʔw sbrtʔ ʔḥrtʔ ʔydʔ dlʔ qbltwn špyr mtṭpysyn hwytwn
11:05	rnʔ ʔnʔ gyr dmdm lʔ bṣrt mn šlyḥʔ ʔylyn dṭb mytryn
11:06	ʔpn gyr bwrʔ ʔnʔ bmlty ʔlʔ lʔ bydʕty ʔlʔ bklmdm ʔtglyn lwtkwn
11:07	ʔw dlmʔ msklw ʔsklt dmkkt npšy dʔntwn ttrymwn wmgn ʔkrzt lkwn sbrth dʔlhʔ
11:08	wʕdtʔ ʔḥrnytʔ ḥlṣt wnsbt npqtʔ ltšmštʔ dylkwn
11:09	wkd ʔtyt ṣʔdykwn wḥsr ly lʔ yqrt ʕl ʔnš mnkwn snyqwty gyr mlyw ʔḥʔ dʔtw mn mqdwnyʔ wbkl mdm nṭrt npšy wnṭr ʔnʔ dlʔ ʔqr ʕlykwn
11:10	ʔytwhy by šrrh dmšyḥʔ dhnʔ šwbhrʔ lʔ ntbṭl by bʔtrwtʔ dʔkʔyʔ
11:11	lmnʔ mṭl dlʔ mḥb ʔnʔ lkwn ʔlhʔ hw ydʕ
11:12	ʔlʔ hdʔ dʕbd ʔnʔ ʔp ʔʕbd dʔpswq hw ʕlthwn dʔylyn dbʕyn ʕltʔ dbhw mdm dmštbhryn nštkḥwn ʔkwtn
11:13	ʔytyhwn gyr hlyn šlyḥʔ dglʔ wpʕlʔ nkylʔ wmdmyn npšhwn lšlyḥʔ dmšyḥʔ
11:14	wlyt lmtdmrw bhdʔ ʔn hw gyr dsṭnʔ mtdmʔ bmlʔkʔ dnwhrʔ
11:15	lʔ hwt rbʔ ṣbwtʔ ʔn ʔp mšmšnwhy mtdmyn bmšmšnʔ dzdyqwtʔ hnwn dḥrthwn thwʔ ʔyk ʕbdyhwn
11:16	twb dyn ʔmr ʔnʔ lmʔ ʔnš nsbr ʕly ʔyk dsklʔ ʔnʔ wʔn lʔ ʔpn ʔyk sklʔ qblwny dʔp ʔnʔ qlyl ʔštbhr
11:17	mdm dmmll ʔnʔ lʔ hwʔ bmrn mmll ʔnʔ ʔlʔ ʔyk dbpkyhwtʔ bhdʔ dwktʔ dšwbhrʔ
11:18	mṭl dsgyʔʔ mštbhryn bbsrʔ ʔp ʔnʔ ʔštbhr
11:19	mnḥyn ʔntwn hw gyr lmštmʕw lḥsyry rʕynʔ kd ʔntwn ḥkymʔ ʔntwn
11:20	wmtdnyn ʔntwn lmn dmšʕbd lkwn wlmn dʔkl lkwn wlmn dnsb mnkwn wlmn dmtrym ʕlykwn wlmn dmḥʔ lkwn ʕl ʔpykwn
11:21	ʔyk dbṣʕrʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ ʔyk hw dḥnn mḥylynn hw bḥsyrwt rʕynʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ dbklmdm dmmrḥ ʔnš ʔp ʔnʔ mmrḥ ʔnʔ
11:22	ʔn ʕbryʔ ʔnwn ʔp ʔnʔ ʔn ʔysrlyʔ ʔnwn ʔp ʔnʔ ʔn zrʕh ʔnwn dʔbrhm ʔp ʔnʔ
11:23	ʔn mšmšnʔ ʔnwn dmšyḥʔ bḥsyrwt rʕynʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ dytyr mnhwn ʔnʔ blʔwtʔ ytyr mnhwn bmḥwtʔ ytyr mnhwn bʔswrʔ ytyr mnhwn bmwtʔ zbnyn sgyʔn
11:24	mn yhwdyʔ ḥmš zbnyn ʔrbʕyn ʔrbʕyn ḥsyr ḥdʔ blʕt
11:25	tlt zbnyn bšbṭʔ ʔtngdt ḥdʔ zbn ʔtrgmt tlt zbnyn hwyt nwwgʔ ʔymmʔ wllyʔ dlʔ spyntʔ bymʔ hwyt
11:26	bʔwrḥtʔ sgyʔtʔ bqndynws dnhrwtʔ bqndynws dgysʔ bqndynws dmn ṭwhmy bqndynws dmn ʕmmʔ bqndynws hwyt bmdyntʔ bqndynws hwyt bḥwrbʔ bqndynws bymʔ bqndynws dmn ʔḥʔ dglʔ
11:27	bʕmlʔ wblʔwtʔ bšhrʔ sgyʔʔ bkpnʔ wbṣhyʔ bṣwmʔ sgyʔʔ bʕryʔ wbʕrṭlywtʔ
11:28	sṭr mn ytyrtʔ wknwšyʔ dʕly dklywm wṣpty dʕl ʔpy klhyn ʕdtʔ
11:29	mnw mtkrh wlʔ ʔnʔ mtkrh ʔnʔ mnw mtkšl wlʔ ʔnʔ yqd ʔnʔ
11:30	ʔn lmštbhrw wlʔ bkwrhny ʔštbhr
11:31	ydʕ hw ʔlhʔ ʔbwhy dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ mbrkʔ dlʕlm ʕlmyn dlʔ mkdb ʔnʔ
11:32	bdrmswq rb ḥylʔ dʔrṭws mlkʔ nṭr hwʔ mdyntʔ ddrmwsqyʔ lmʔḥdny
11:33	wmn kwtʔ bsrygtʔ šbwny mn šwrʔ wʔtplṭt mn ʔydwhy 
12:01	lmštbhrw wlʔ ʔlʔ lʔ pqḥ ʔtʔ ʔnʔ ly gyr lḥzwnʔ wlglynwhy dmrn
12:02	ydʕnʔ gbrʔ bmšyḥʔ mn qdm ʔrbʕsrʔ šnyn ʔn bpgr dyn wʔn dlʔ pgr lʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ ʔlhʔ hw ydʕ dʔtḥṭp hw hnʔ ʕdmʔ šmyʔ dtltʔ
12:03	wydʕ ʔnʔ lh lhnʔ brnšʔ ʔn bpgr dyn wʔn dlʔ pgr lʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ ʔlhʔ hw ydʕ
12:04	dʔtḥṭp lprdysʔ wšmʕ mlʔ dlʔ mtmlln ʔylyn dlʔ šlyṭ lbrnšʔ lmmllw ʔnyn
12:05	ʕl hnʔ ʔštbhr ʕl npšy dyn lʔ ʔštbhr ʔlʔ ʔn bkwrhnʔ
12:06	ʔn ʔṣbʔ gyr dʔštbhr lʔ hwʔ ʔnʔ šṭyʔ šrrʔ hw gyr ʔmr ʔnʔ ḥʔsnʔ dyn dlmʔ ʔnš ntrʕʔ ʕly ytyr mn mʔ dḥzʔ ly wdšmʕ mny
12:07	wdlʔ ʔtrym bytyrwtʔ dglynʔ ʔštlm ly špyʔ lbsry mlʔkh dsṭnʔ dnhwʔ mqpḥ ly dlʔ ʔtrym
12:08	wʕl hnʔ tlt zbnyn bʕyt mn mry dnprq mny
12:09	wʔmr ly spqʔ lk ṭybwty ḥyly gyr bkryhwtʔ hw mtgmr ḥdyʔyt hkyl ʔštbhr bkwrhny dngn ʕly ḥylh dmšyḥʔ
12:10	mṭl hnʔ ṣbʔ ʔnʔ bkwrhnʔ bṣʕrʔ bʔwlṣnʔ brdwpyʔ bḥbwšyʔ dʕl ʔpy mšyḥʔ ʔmty dkryh ʔnʔ gyr hy dyn hw ḥyltn ʔnʔ
12:11	hʔ hwyt ḥsyr rʕynʔ bšwbhry dʔntwn ʔlṣtwnny ḥybyn hwytwn gyr dʔntwn tshdwn ʕly mṭl dlʔ bṣrt mdm mn šlyḥʔ ʔylyn dṭb mytryn wʔpn lʔ hwyt mdm
12:12	ʔtwtʔ dšlyḥʔ ʕbdt byntkwn bkl msybrnw wbgbrwtʔ wbtdmrtʔ wbḥylʔ
12:13	bmnʔ gyr ʔtbṣrtwn mn ʕdtʔ ʔḥrnytʔ ʔlʔ ʔn bhdʔ dʔnʔ lʔ yqrt ʕlykwn šbwqw ly hdʔ sklwtʔ
12:14	hʔ hdʔ dtlt hy zbnyn dmṭyb ʔnʔ dʔtʔ lwtkwn wlʔ ʔqr ʕlykwn mṭl dlʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ dylkwn ʔlʔ lkwn lʔ gyr ḥybyn bnyʔ lmsm symtʔ lʔbhʔ ʔlʔ ʔbhʔ lbnyhwn
12:15	ʔnʔ dyn ḥdyʔyt wnpqtʔ ʔpq wʔp qnwmy ʔtl ʕl ʔpy npštkwn ʔpn kd ytyrʔyt mḥb ʔnʔ lkwn ʔntwn bṣyrʔyt mḥbyn ʔntwn ly
12:16	wkbr ʔnʔ lʔ yqrt ʕlykwn ʔlʔ ʔyk gbrʔ ḥrʕʔ bnklʔ gnbtkwn
12:17	lmʔ byd ʔnš ʔḥryn dšdrt lwtkwn ʔtyʕnt ʕlykwn
12:18	mn ṭṭws bʕyt wšdrt ʕmh lʔḥʔ lmʔ mdm ʔtyʕn ʕlykwn ṭṭws lw bḥdʔ rwḥʔ hlkn wbhyn bʕqbtʔ
12:19	lmʔ twb sbryn ʔntwn dlkwn npqynn rwḥʔ qdm ʔlhʔ bmšyḥʔ mmllynn wklhyn ḥbyby mṭl bnynʔ hw dylkwn
12:20	dḥl ʔnʔ gyr dlmʔ ʔtʔ lwtkwn wlʔ ʔškḥkwn ʔyk dṣbʔ ʔnʔ wʔštkḥ lkwn ʔp ʔnʔ ʔyk mʔ dlʔ ṣbytwn dlmʔ ḥrynʔ wḥsmʔ wḥmtʔ wʕṣynʔ wmʔkl qrṣʔ wrṭnʔ wḥtyrwtʔ wšgwšyʔ
12:21	dlmʔ kd ʔtʔ lwtkwn nmkkny ʔlhy wʔtʔbl ʕl sgyʔʔ ʔylyn dḥṭw wlʔ tbw mn ṭnpwtʔ wmn znywtʔ wmn pḥzwtʔ dʕbdw
13:01	hdʔ dtlt hy zbnyn dʔtʔ ʔnʔ lwtkwn dʕl pwm tryn wtltʔ shdyn tqwm kl mlʔ
13:02	mn qdym ʔmrt hwyt lkwn wtwb mqdm ʔnʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn ʔyk dʔp trtyn zbnyn dhwyt lwtkwn ʔmrt lkwn wʔp hšʔ kd rḥyq ʔnʔ ktbnʔ lhlyn dḥṭw wlšrkʔ dʔḥrnʔ dʔn ʔtʔ twb lʔ ʔḥws
13:03	mṭl dbwqyʔ bʕytwn dmšyḥʔ dmmll by hw dlʔ hwʔ mḥyl bkwn ʔlʔ ḥyltn hw bkwn
13:04	ʔpn ʔzdqp gyr bmḥylwtʔ ʔlʔ ḥy hw bḥylʔ dʔlhʔ wʔp ḥnn mḥylynn ʕmh ʔlʔ ḥyyn ḥnn ʕmh bḥylʔ dʔlhʔ dbkwn
13:05	npškwn bqw ʔn bh bhymnwtʔ qymyn ʔntwn npškwn ʔsw ʔw lʔ mštwdʕytwn dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ bkwn hw wʔn lʔ mslyʔ ʔntwn
13:06	msbr ʔnʔ dyn dtdʕwn dḥnn lʔ hwyn mslyn
13:07	bʕʔ ʔnʔ dyn mn ʔlhʔ dlʔ nhwʔ bkwn mdm dbyš ʔyk dbwqyn dyln ntḥzʔ ʔlʔ dʔntwn thwwn sʕryn ṭbtʔ wḥnn nhwʔ ʔyk mslyʔ
13:08	lʔ gyr mškḥynn dnʕbd mdm lwqbl qwštʔ ʔlʔ ḥlp qwštʔ
13:09	ḥdynn dyn mʔ dḥnn kryhyn wʔntwn ḥyltnyn hdʔ gyr ʔp mṣlynn dʔntwn ttgmrwn
13:10	mṭl hnʔ kd rḥyq ʔnʔ hlyn ktb ʔnʔ dlʔ mʔ dʔtyt qšyʔyt ʔsʕwr ʔyk šwlṭnʔ dyhb ly mry lbnynkwn wlʔ lswḥpkwn
13:11	mkyl ʔḥy ḥdw wʔtgmrw wʔtbyʔw wʔwywtʔ wšynʔ nhwʔ bkwn wʔlhʔ dḥwbʔ wdšlmwtʔ nhwʔ ʕmkwn
13:12	šʔlw bšlmʔ ḥd dḥd bnwšqtʔ qdyštʔ
13:13	šʔlyn bšlmkwn klhwn qdyšʔ
13:14	šlmh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ wḥwbh dʔlhʔ wšwtpwtʔ drwḥʔ dqwdšʔ ʕm klkwn ʔmyn 
01:01	pwlws šlyḥʔ lʔ mn bnynšʔ wlʔ byd brnšʔ ʔlʔ byd yšwʕ mšyḥʔ wʔlhʔ ʔbwhy hw dʔqymh mn byt mytʔ
01:02	wklhwn ʔḥʔ dʕmy lʕdtʔ dʔyt bglṭyʔ
01:03	ṭybwtʔ ʕmkwn wšlmʔ mn ʔlhʔ ʔbʔ wmn mrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:04	hw dyhb npšh ḥlp ḥṭhyn dnpṣyn mn ʕlmʔ hnʔ byšʔ ʔyk ṣbynh dʔlhʔ ʔbwn
01:05	dlh šwbḥʔ lʕlm ʕlmyn ʔmyn
01:06	mtdmr ʔnʔ ʔyknʔ bʕgl mthpkyn ʔntwn mn mšyḥʔ hw dqrkwn bṭybwth lʔḥrtʔ sbrtʔ
01:07	ʔydʔ dlʔ ʔytyh ʔlʔ ʔnšʔ hw ʔyt ddlḥyn lkwn wṣbyn dnšḥlpwn sbrth dmšyḥʔ
01:08	ʔp ʔn ḥnn dyn ʔw mlʔkʔ mn šmyʔ nsbrkwn lbr mn mʔ dsbrnkwn nhwʔ ḥrm
01:09	ʔyknʔ dmn lwqdm ʔmrt whšʔ twb ʔmr ʔnʔ dʔn ʔnš msbr lkwn lbr mn mʔ dqbltwn nhwʔ ḥrm
01:10	hšʔ gyr lbnynšʔ hw mpys ʔnʔ ʔw lʔlhʔ ʔw lbnynšʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ dʔšpr ʔlw gyr ʕdmʔ lhšʔ lbnynšʔ špr hwyt ʕbdʔ dmšyḥʔ lʔ hwʔ hwyt
01:11	mwdʕ ʔnʔ lkwn dyn ʔḥy dsbrtʔ dʔstbrt mny lʔ hwt mn brnšʔ
01:12	ʔplʔ gyr ʔnʔ mn brnšʔ qblth wylpth ʔlʔ bglynʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:13	šmʕtwn gyr hwpky dmn qdym dbyhwdywtʔ dytyrʔyt rdp hwyt ʕdth dʔlhʔ wḥrb hwyt lh
01:14	wmtytr hwyt byhwdywtʔ ṭb mn sgyʔʔ bny šny dʔyt hwʔ bṭwhmy wytyrʔyt ṭʔn hwyt bywlpnʔ dʔbhy
01:15	kd ṣbʔ dyn hw mn dpršny mn krs ʔmy wqrny bṭybwth
01:16	dnglʔ brh by dʔsbrywhy bʕmmʔ br šʕth lʔ glyt lbsrʔ wldmʔ
01:17	wlʔ ʔzlt lʔwršlm lwt šlyḥʔ dmn qdmy ʔlʔ ʔzlt lʔrbyʔ wtwb hpkt ldrmswq
01:18	wmn btr tlt šnyn ʔzlt lʔwršlm dʔḥzʔ lkʔpʔ wqwyt lwth ywmtʔ ḥmštʕsr
01:19	lʔḥryn dyn mn šlyḥʔ lʔ ḥzyt ʔlʔ ʔn lyʕqwb ʔḥwhy dmrn
01:20	hlyn dyn dktb ʔnʔ lkwn hʔ qdm ʔlhʔ dlʔ mkdb ʔnʔ
01:21	mn btr hlyn ʔtyt lʔtrwtʔ dswryʔ wdqylyqyʔ
01:22	wlʔ ydʕn hwy ly bʔpyn ʕdtʔ dbyhwd hlyn dbmšyḥʔ
01:23	ʔlʔ hdʔ blḥwd šmʕyn hww dhw dmn qdym rdp hwʔ ln hšʔ hʔ msbr hymnwtʔ hy dmn qdm zbnʔ msḥp hwʔ
01:24	wmšbḥyn hww by lʔlhʔ
02:01	twb dyn mn btr ʔrbʕsrʔ šnyn slqt lʔwršlm ʕm brnbʔ wdbrt ʕmy lṭṭws
02:02	slqt dyn bglynʔ wglyt lhwn sbrtʔ dmkrz ʔnʔ bʕmmʔ wḥwyth lʔylyn dmstbryn hww dmdm ʔytyhwn byny wlhwn dm sryqʔyt rhṭt ʔw rhṭ ʔnʔ
02:03	ʔp ṭṭws dʕmy dʔrmyʔ hwʔ lʔ ʔtʔns dngzwr
02:04	mṭl dyn ʔḥʔ dglʔ dʕlw ʕlyn dngšwn ḥʔrwtʔ dʔyt ln byšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʔyknʔ dnšʕbdwnny
02:05	ʔplʔ mlʔ šʕʔ ʔtrmyn lšwʕbdhwn dšrrh dsbrtʔ nqwʔ lwtkwn
02:06	hnwn dyn dmstbryn dʔytyhwn mdm mn dyn ʔytyhwn lʔ bṭyl ly ʔlhʔ gyr bʔpy bnynšʔ lʔ nsb hnwn dyn hlyn mdm lʔ ʔwspw ly
02:07	ʔlʔ ʔḥrnyʔyt ḥzw gyr dʔthymnt sbrtʔ dʕwrlwtʔ ʔyk dʔthymn kʔpʔ bgzwrtʔ
02:08	hw gyr dḥpṭ lkʔpʔ bšlyḥwtʔ dgzwrtʔ ḥpṭ ʔp ly bšlyḥwtʔ dʕmmʔ
02:09	wkd ydʕw ṭybwtʔ dʔtyhbt ly yʕqwb wkʔpʔ wywḥnn hnwn dmstbryn hww dʔytyhwn ʕmwdʔ ymynʔ dšwtpwtʔ yhbw ly wlbrnbʔ dḥnn bʕmmʔ whnwn bgzwrtʔ
02:10	blḥwd dlmsknʔ hwyn ʕhdynn wʔtbṭl ly dhy hdʔ ʔʕbdyh
02:11	kd ʔtʔ dyn kʔpʔ lʔnṭywky bʔpwhy ʔksth mṭl dmttqlyn hww bh
02:12	dʕdlʔ nʔtwn ʔnšʔ mn lwt yʕqwb ʕm ʕmmʔ ʔkl hwʔ kd ʔtw dyn ngd hwʔ npšh wprš mṭl ddḥl hwʔ mn hnwn dmn gzwrtʔ
02:13	wʔtrmyw hww ʕmh lhdʔ ʔp šrkʔ dyhwdyʔ hknʔ dʔp brnbʔ ʔtdbr hwʔ lmsb bʔpyhwn 
02:14	wkd ḥzyt dlʔ ʔzlyn tryṣʔyt bšrrh dʔwnglywn ʔmrt lkʔpʔ lʕyn klhwn ʔn ʔnt dyhwdyʔ ʔnt ʔrmʔyt ḥyʔ ʔnt wlʔ yhwdʔyt ʔyknʔ ʔlṣ ʔnt lʕmmʔ dyhwdʔyt nḥwn
02:15	ḥnn gyr dmn kynn yhwdyʔ ḥnn wlʔ hwyn mn ʕmmʔ ḥṭyʔ
02:16	mṭl dydʕynn dlʔ mzddq brnšʔ mn ʕbdʔ dnmwsʔ ʔlʔ bhymnwtʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʔp ḥnn bh byšwʕ mšyḥʔ hymnn dmn hymnwth dmšyḥʔ nzddq wlʔ mn ʕbdʔ dnmwsʔ mṭl dmn ʕbdʔ dnmwsʔ lʔ mzddq kl bsr
02:17	ʔn dyn kd bʕynn dnzddq bmšyḥʔ ʔštkḥn ln ʔp ḥnn ḥṭyʔ mdyn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ mšmšnʔ hw dḥṭytʔ ḥs
02:18	ʔn gyr lʔylyn dstrt twb lhyn bnʔ ʔnʔ ḥwyt ʕl npšy dʕbr ʕl pwqdnʔ ʔnʔ
02:19	ʔnʔ gyr bnmwsʔ lnmwsʔ mytt dlʔlhʔ ʔḥʔ
02:20	wʕm mšyḥʔ zqyp ʔnʔ wmkyl lʔ hwʔ ʔnʔ ḥy ʔnʔ ʔlʔ ḥy by mšyḥʔ whnʔ dhšʔ ḥy ʔnʔ bbsr bhymnwtʔ hw dbrh dʔlhʔ ḥy ʔnʔ hw dʔḥbn wyhb npšh ḥlpyn
02:21	lʔ ṭlm ʔnʔ ṭybwth dʔlhʔ ʔn gyr byd nmwsʔ hy zdyqwtʔ mšyḥʔ mgn myt
03:01	ʔw ḥsyry rʕynʔ glṭyʔ mnw ḥsm bkwn dhʔ ʔyk hw dmṣr ṣyr hwʔ qdm ʕynykwn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ kd ṣlyb
03:02	hdʔ blḥwd ṣbʔ ʔnʔ dʔdʕ mnkwn mn ʕbdʔ dnmwsʔ nsbtwn rwḥʔ ʔw mn šmʕʔ dhymnwtʔ
03:03	hknʔ sklyn ʔntwn dšrytwn brwḥʔ whšʔ bbsr mšlmyn ʔntwn
03:04	hlyn klhyn ʔyqʔ sybrtwn wʔštwp dyn ʔyqʔ
03:05	hw hkyl dyhb bkwn rwḥʔ wsʕr bkwn ḥylʔ mn ʕbdʔ dnmwsʔ ʔw mn šmʕʔ dhymnwtʔ
03:06	ʔyknʔ dhymn ʔbrhm lʔlhʔ wʔtḥšbt lh lzdyqw
03:07	dʕw hkyl dʔylyn dmn hymnwtʔ ʔnwn hnwn ʔnwn bnyʔ dʔbrhm
03:08	mṭl gyr dqdm ydʕ ʔlhʔ dbhymnwtʔ hw mzddqyn ʕmmʔ qdm sbr lʔbrhm ʔyk dʔmr ktbʔ qdyšʔ dbk ntbrkwn klhwn ʕmmʔ
03:09	mdyn mhymnʔ hw mtbrkyn bʔbrhm mhymnʔ
03:10	ʔylyn gyr dmn ʕbdʔ ʔnwn dnmwsʔ tḥyt lwṭtʔ ʔnwn ktyb gyr dlyṭ hw klmn dlʔ nʕbd kl dktyb bnmwsʔ hnʔ
03:11	dlʔ dyn mzddq ʔnš bnmwsʔ lwt ʔlhʔ hdʔ glyʔ hy mṭl dktyb dzdyqʔ bhymnwtʔ nḥʔ
03:12	nmwsʔ dyn lʔ hwʔ mn hymnwtʔ ʔlʔ mn dnʕbd ʔylyn dktybn bh nḥʔ bhyn
03:13	ln dyn mšyḥʔ zbnn mn lwṭtʔ dnmwsʔ whw hwʔ ḥlpyn lwṭtʔ ktyb gyr dlyṭ hw klmn dmttlʔ bqysʔ
03:14	dbʕmmʔ thwʔ bwrkth dʔbrhm byšwʕ mšyḥʔ wḥnn nsb šwwdyʔ drwḥʔ bhymnwtʔ
03:15	ʔḥy ʔyk dbyt bnynšʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ ddytqʔ dbrnšʔ dʔštrrt ʔnš lʔ mslʔ ʔw mšḥlp bh mdm
03:16	lʔbrhm dyn ʔtmlk mwlknʔ wlzrʕh wlʔ ʔmr lh dlzrʕyk ʔyk dlsgyʔʔ ʔlʔ lzrʕk ʔyk dlḥd hw dʔytwhy mšyḥʔ
03:17	hdʔ dyn ʔmr ʔnʔ ddytqʔ dmn qdym ʔštrrt mn ʔlhʔ bmšyḥʔ nmwsʔ hw dhwʔ mn btr ʔrbʕ mʔʔ wtltyn šnyn lʔ mškḥ dnslyh wnbṭl mwlknʔ
03:18	ʔn dyn mn nmwsʔ hy yrtwtʔ mkyl lʔ hwt mn mwlknʔ lʔbrhm dyn bmwlknʔ hw yhb lh ʔlhʔ
03:19	mnʔ hkyl nmwsʔ mṭl msṭynwtʔ ʔttwsp ʕdmʔ dnʔtʔ zrʕʔ hw dlh hwʔ šwwdyʔ wʔtyhb hw nmwsʔ byd mlʔkʔ bʔydʔ dmṣʕyʔ
03:20	mṣʕyʔ dyn lʔ hwʔ dḥd ʔlhʔ dyn ḥd hw
03:21	nmwsʔ hkyl sqwblʔ hw dmwlknʔ dʔlhʔ ḥs ʔlw gyr ʔtyhb hwʔ nmwsʔ ʔynʔ dmškḥ hwʔ lmḥyw šryrʔyt mn nmwsʔ hwyʔ hwt zdyqwtʔ
03:22	ʔlʔ ḥbš ktbʔ klmdm tḥyt ḥṭytʔ dmwlknʔ bhymnwtʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ ntyhb lʔylyn dmhymnyn 
03:23	ʕdlʔ dyn tʔtʔ hymnwtʔ nmwsʔ nṭr hwʔ ln kd ḥbyšynn lhymnwtʔ dʕtydʔ hwt lmtglyw
03:24	nmwsʔ hkyl trʔʔ hwʔ ln lwt mšyḥʔ dmn hymnwtʔ nzddq
03:25	kd ʔtt dyn hymnwtʔ lʔ hwyn tḥyt trʔʔ
03:26	klkwn gyr bnyʔ ʔntwn dʔlhʔ bhymnwtʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ
03:27	ʔylyn gyr dbmšyḥʔ ʕmdtwn lmšyḥʔ lbštwn
03:28	lyt yhwdyʔ wlʔ ʔrmyʔ lyt ʕbdʔ wlʔ br ḥʔrʔ lyt dkrʔ wlʔ nqbtʔ klkwn gyr ḥd ʔntwn byšwʕ mšyḥʔ
03:29	wʔn dmšyḥʔ ʔntwn mkyl zrʕh ʔntwn dʔbrhm wyrtʔ bmwlknʔ
04:01	ʔmr ʔnʔ dyn dkmʔ zbnʔ dyrtʔ ṭlʔ lʔ pryš mn ʕbdʔ kd mrʔ hw dklhwn
04:02	ʔlʔ tḥyt ʔpṭrwpʔ ʔytwhy wrby btʔ ʕdmʔ lzbnʔ dsm ʔbwhy
04:03	hknʔ ʔp ḥnn kd ylwdʔ hwyn tḥyt ʔsṭwkswhy dʕlmʔ mšʕbdyn hwyn
04:04	kd mṭʔ dyn šwlmh dzbnʔ šdr ʔlhʔ lbrh whwʔ mn ʔnttʔ whwʔ tḥyt nmwsʔ
04:05	dlʔylyn dtḥyt nmwsʔ ʔnwn nzbn wnqbl symt bnyʔ
04:06	wdʔytykwn dyn bnyʔ šdr ʔlhʔ rwḥʔ dbrh llbwtkwn hy dqryʔ ʔbʔ ʔbwn
04:07	mkyl lʔ hwytwn ʕbdʔ ʔlʔ bnyʔ wʔn bnyʔ ʔp yrtʔ dʔlhʔ byd yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
04:08	hydyn gyr kd lʔ ydʕyn hwytwn lʔlhʔ plḥtwn lhnwn dmn kynhwn lʔ hww ʔlhʔ
04:09	hšʔ dyn dydʕtwn lʔlhʔ wytyrʔyt dʔtydʕtwn mn ʔlhʔ twb hpktwn lkwn ʕl hnwn ʔsṭwksʔ mrʕʔ wmsknʔ wmn dryš ṣbytwn lmštʕbdw lhwn
04:10	ywmʔ wyrḥʔ wzbnʔ wšnyʔ nṭrytwn
04:11	dḥl ʔnʔ dlmʔ sryqʔyt lʔyt bkwn
04:12	hww ʔkwty mṭl dʔp ʔnʔ ʔkwtkwn hwyt ʔḥy bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnkwn lʔ mdm ʔskltwn by
04:13	ydʕyn ʔntwn gyr dbkryhwt bsry sbrtkwn hwyt mn qdym
04:14	wnsywnʔ dbsry lʔ šṭtwn wlʔ ndtwn ʔlʔ ʔyk dlmlʔkʔ dʔlhʔ qbltwnny wʔyk dlyšwʕ mšyḥʔ
04:15	ʔykw hkyl ṭwbkwn shd ʔnʔ gyr ʕlykwn dʔlw mškḥʔ hwt ʕynykwn ḥṣyn hwytwn wyhbyn ly
04:16	dlmʔ bʕldbbʔ hwyt lkwn dʔkrzt lkwn šrrʔ
04:17	ḥsmyn bkwn lʔ hwʔ lšpyrtʔ ʔlʔ lmḥbškwn hw ṣbyn dʔntwn thwwn ḥsmyn bhwn
04:18	špyr hw dyn dttḥsmwn bšpyrtʔ bklzbn wlʔ ʔmty dlwtkwn ʔnʔ blḥwd
04:19	bny ʔylyn dmn dryš mḥbl ʔnʔ ʕdmʔ dnttṣyr bkwn mšyḥʔ
04:20	ṣbʔ hwyt dyn dʔhwʔ lwtkwn hšʔ wʔšḥlp brt qly mṭl dtmyh ʔnʔ bkwn
04:21	ʔmrw ly ʔntwn ʔylyn dṣbyn dnhwwn tḥyt nmwsʔ lh lnmwsʔ lʔ šmʕyn ʔntwn
04:22	ktyb gyr dlʔbrhm tryn bnyn hww lh ḥd mn ʔmtʔ wḥd mn ḥʔrtʔ
04:23	ʔlʔ hw dmn ʔmtʔ bbsr ʔtyld hw dyn dmn ḥʔrtʔ bmwlknʔ hwʔ
04:24	hlyn dyn ʔytyhyn plʔtʔ dtrtyn dytqs ḥdʔ dmn ṭwr syny yldʔ lʕbdwtʔ dʔytyh hgr
04:25	hgr gyr ṭwrʔ hw dsyny dbʔrbyʔ wšlmʔ lhdʔ ʔwršlm wplḥʔ ʕbdwtʔ hy wbnyh
04:26	hy dyn ʔwršlm ʕlytʔ ḥʔrtʔ hy dʔytyh ʔmn
04:27	ktyb gyr dʔtbsmy ʕqrtʔ hy dlʔ yldʔ wʔtpṣḥy wgʕy hy dlʔ mḥblʔ mṭl dsgyw bnyh dṣdytʔ ytyr mn bnyh dbʕyltʔ
04:28	ḥnn dyn ʔḥy ʔyk ʔysḥq bny mwlknʔ ḥnn
04:29	wʔyk dhydyn hw dylyd hwʔ bbsrʔ rdp hwʔ lhw dbrwḥʔ hknʔ ʔp hšʔ
04:30	ʔlʔ mnʔ ʔmr ktbʔ ʔpqyh lʔmtʔ wlbrh mṭl dlʔ nʔrt brh dʔmtʔ ʕm brh dḥʔrtʔ
04:31	ḥnn hkyl ʔḥy lʔ hwyn bny ʔmtʔ ʔlʔ bny ḥʔrtʔ
05:01	qwmw hkyl bḥʔrwtʔ hy dmšyḥʔ ḥrrn wlʔ ttkdnwn twb bnyrʔ dʕbdwtʔ 
05:02	hʔ ʔnʔ pwlws ʔmr ʔnʔ lkwn dʔn ttgzrwn mšyḥʔ mdm lʔ mhnʔ lkwn
05:03	mshd ʔnʔ dyn twb lkl brnš dmtgzr dḥyb hw dklh nmwsʔ nʕbd
05:04	ʔtbṭltwn lkwn mn mšyḥʔ ʔylyn dbnmwsʔ mzddqytwn wmn ṭybwtʔ npltwn
05:05	ḥnn gyr brwḥʔ dmn hymnwtʔ lsbrʔ dzdyqwtʔ mqwynn
05:06	bmšyḥʔ gyr yšwʕ lʔ gzwrtʔ mdm ʔytyh wlʔ ʕwrlwtʔ ʔlʔ hymnwtʔ dmtgmrʔ bḥwbʔ
05:07	špyr rhṭyn hwytwn mnw dwdkwn dlšrrʔ lʔ ttṭpyswn
05:08	pyskwn lʔ hwʔ mn hw dqrkwn
05:09	ḥmyrʔ qlyl klh gbyltʔ mḥmʕ
05:10	ʔnʔ tkyl ʔnʔ ʕlykwn bmrn dmdm ʔḥryn lʔ mtrʕytwn wʔynʔ ddlḥ lkwn hw nsybrywhy ldynʔ mn dʔytwhy
05:11	ʔnʔ dyn ʔḥy ʔlw ʕdkyl gzwrtʔ mkrz hwyt lmnʔ mtrdp hwyt dlmʔ ʔtbṭl lh kšlh dzqypʔ
05:12	ʔštwp dyn ʔp mpsq npsqwn hnwn ddlḥyn lkwn
05:13	ʔntwn dyn lḥʔrwtʔ hw ʔtqrytwn ʔḥy blḥwd lʔ thwʔ ḥʔrwtkwn lʕlt bsrʔ ʔlʔ bḥwbʔ hwytwn mštʕbdyn ḥd lḥd
05:14	klh gyr nmwsʔ bḥdʔ mltʔ mtmlʔ bhy dtḥb lqrybk ʔyk npšk
05:15	ʔn dyn ḥd lḥd mnktytwn wʔklytwn ḥzw dlmʔ ḥd mn ḥd tswpwn
05:16	ʔmr ʔnʔ dyn dbrwḥʔ hwytwn mhlkyn wrgtʔ dbsrʔ lʔ mn mtwm tʕbdwn
05:17	bsrʔ gyr rʔg mdm dnkʔ lrwḥʔ wrwḥʔ rgʔ mdm dnkʔ lbsrʔ wtryhwn sqwblʔ ʔnwn ḥd dḥd dlʔ mdm dṣbytwn thwwn ʕbdyn
05:18	ʔn dyn brwḥʔ mtdbryn ʔntwn lʔ hwytwn tḥyt nmwsʔ
05:19	ydyʕyn ʔnwn gyr ʕbdwhy dbsrʔ dʔytyhwn znywtʔ ṭnpwtʔ ṣḥnwtʔ
05:20	pwlḥnʔ dptkrʔ ḥršwtʔ bʕldbbwtʔ ḥrynʔ ṭnnʔ ḥmtʔ ʕṣynʔ plgwtʔ sdqʔ
05:21	ḥsmʔ qṭlʔ rwywtʔ zmrʔ wkl dlhlyn dmyn wʔylyn dhlyn sʕryn ʔyk dmn lwqdm ʔmrt lkwn ʔp hšʔ ʔmrʔnʔ dmlkwth dʔlhʔ lʔ yrtyn
05:22	pʔrʔ dyn drwḥʔ ʔytyhwn ḥwbʔ ḥdwtʔ šlmʔ mgrt rwḥʔ bsymwtʔ ṭbwtʔ hymnwtʔ
05:23	mkykwtʔ msybrnwtʔ ʕl hlyn nmwsʔ lʔ sym
05:24	ʔylyn dyn ddmšyḥʔ ʔnwn bsrhwn zqpw ʕm klhwn kʔbwhy wrgygth
05:25	nḥʔ hkyl brwḥʔ wlrwḥʔ nšlm
05:26	wlʔ nhwʔ sryqy šwbḥʔ dmqlyn ḥd ʕl ḥd wḥsmyn ḥd bḥd
06:01	ʔḥy ʔn ʔnš mnkwn ntqdm bsklwtʔ ʔntwn ʔylyn dbrwḥ ʔntwn ʔtqnwhy brwḥʔ mkyktʔ whwytwn zhyryn ddlmʔ ʔp ʔntwn ttnswn
06:02	wṭʕnw ywqrʔ dḥddʔ dhknʔ mmlytwn nmwsh dmšyḥʔ
06:03	ʔn gyr ʔnš sbr dʔytwhy mdm kd lʔ ʔytwhy npšh mṭʕʔ
06:04	ʔlʔ ʔnš ʕbdh nhwʔ bqʔ whydyn bynwhy lnpšh nhwʔ šwbhrh wlʔ bʔḥrnʔ
06:05	klnš gyr mwblʔ dnpšh nšqwl
06:06	nštwtp dyn hw dšmʕ mltʔ lhw mn dmšmʕ lh bklhyn ṭbtʔ
06:07	lʔ tṭʕwn ʔlhʔ lʔ mtbzḥ mdm dzrʕ gyr br ʔnšʔ hw hw ḥṣd
06:08	mn dbbsr zrʕ mn bsrʔ ḥblʔ hw ḥṣd wmn dbrwḥ zrʕ mn rwḥʔ ḥyʔ dlʕlm nḥṣwd
06:09	wkd ʕbdynn dṭb lʔ hwt mʔnʔ ln nhwʔ gyr zbnʔ dnḥṣwd wlʔ tmʔn ln
06:10	hšʔ hkyl ʕd zbnʔ ʔyt ln nplwḥ ṭbtʔ lwt klnš ytyrʔyt lwt bny bytʔ dhymnwtʔ
06:11	ḥzw ʔylyn ktybn ktbt lkwn bʔydy
06:12	ʔylyn dṣbyn dnštbhrwn bbsrʔ hnwn ʔlṣyn lkwn dttgzrwn dblḥwd bzqyph dmšyḥʔ lʔ ntrdpwn
06:13	ʔplʔ gyr hnwn hlyn dgzryn nṭryn nmwsʔ ʔlʔ ṣbyn dttgzrwn dbbsrkwn dylkwn nštbhrwn
06:14	ly dyn lʔ nhwʔ ly dʔštbhr ʔlʔ bzqyph dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ dbh ʕlmʔ zqyp ly wʔnʔ zqyp ʔnʔ lʕlmʔ
06:15	lʔ gyr gzwrtʔ ʔytyh mdm wlʔ ʕwrlwtʔ ʔlʔ brytʔ ḥdtʔ
06:16	wʔylyn dlhnʔ šbylʔ šlmyn šlmʔ nhwʔ ʕlyhwn wrḥmʔ wʕl ʔysryl dʔlhʔ
06:17	mkyl ly ʔnš ʕmlʔ lʔ nrmʔ ʔnʔ gyr kwtmth dmrn yšwʕ bpgry šqyl ʔnʔ
06:18	ṭybwth dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʕm rwḥkwn ʔḥy ʔmyn
01:01	pwlws šlyḥʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ bṣbynh dʔlhʔ lʔylyn dʔytyhwn bʔpsws qdyšʔ wmhymnʔ byšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:02	šlmʔ ʕmkwn wṭybwtʔ mn ʔlhʔ ʔbwn wmn mrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:03	mbrk hw ʔlhʔ ʔbwhy dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ hw dbrkn bkl bwrkn drwḥ bšmyʔ bmšyḥʔ
01:04	ʔyknʔ dqdm gbn bh mn qdm trmyth dʕlmʔ dnhwʔ qdyšʔ wdlʔ mwm qdmwhy wbḥwbʔ qdm ršmn lh
01:05	wsmn lbnyʔ byšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʔyk dšpr lṣbynh
01:06	dnštbḥ šwbḥʔ dṭybwth hw dʔšpʕ ʕlyn byd ḥbybh
01:07	dbh ʔyt ln pwrqnʔ wbdmh šwbqnʔ dḥṭhʔ ʔyk ʕwtrʔ dṭybwth
01:08	hy dʔtytrt bn bkl ḥkmʔ wbkl swkl
01:09	wʔwdʕn ʔrzʔ dṣbynh hw dqdm hwʔ sm dnsʕwr bh
01:10	lmdbrnwtʔ dmwlyhwn dzbnʔ dklmdm mn dryš ntḥdt bmšyḥʔ dbšmyʔ wbʔrʕʔ
01:11	wbh ḥnn ʔtgbyn ʔyk dqdm ršmn wṣbʔ hw dkl sʕr ʔyk trʕytʔ dṣbynh
01:12	dnhwʔ ḥnn ʔylyn dqdmn sbrn bmšyḥʔ lhdrʔ dtšbwḥth
01:13	dʔp ʔntwn bh šmʕtwn mltʔ dqwštʔ dʔytyh sbrtʔ dḥyykwn wbh hymntwn wʔtḥtmtwn brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ dmlykʔ hwt
01:14	hy dʔytyh rhbwnʔ dyrtwtn lpwrqnʔ dʔylyn dḥʔyn wlšwbḥʔ dʔyqrh
01:15	mṭl hnʔ ʔp ʔnʔ hʔ mn dšmʕt hymnwtkwn dbmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ wḥwbkwn dlwt qdyšʔ
01:16	lʔ mštlʔ ʔnʔ lmwdyw ʕl ʔpykwn wlmʕhdkwn bṣlwty
01:17	dʔlhh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʔbʔ dtšbwḥtʔ ntl lkwn rwḥʔ dḥkmtʔ wdglynʔ bydʕth
01:18	wnnhrn ʕynʔ dlbwtkwn dtdʕwn mnw sbrʔ dqrynh wmnw ʕwtrʔ dšwbḥʔ dyrtwth bqdyšʔ
01:19	wmnʔ hy ytyrwtʔ drbwtʔ dḥylh bn bʔylyn dmhymnynn ʔyk mʕbdnwtʔ dtwqpʔ dḥylh
01:20	dʕbd bmšyḥʔ wʔqymh mn byt mytʔ wʔwtbh mn ymynh bšmyʔ
01:21	lʕl mn klhyn ʔrkws wšwlṭnʔ wḥylʔ wmrwtʔ wlʕl mn kl šm dmštmh lʔ blḥwd bʕlmʔ hnʔ ʔlʔ ʔp bdʕtyd
01:22	wšʕbd klmdm tḥyt rglwhy wlh dʔytwhy lʕl mn kl yhbh ršʔ lʕdtʔ
01:23	dʔytyh gwšmh wšwmlyʔ dhw dkl bkl mšmlʔ
02:01	wʔp lkwn dmytyn hwytwn bḥṭhykwn wbsklwtkwn
02:02	bhlyn dmn qdym hlktwn hwytwn bhyn ʔyk ʕlmywth dʕlmʔ hnʔ wʔyk ṣbynh dryš šwlṭnʔ dʔʔr wdrwḥʔ hdʔ dmtḥpṭʔ bbnyʔ dlʔ mtṭpysnwtʔ
02:03	bhnwn ʕbdʔ dʔp ḥnn ʔthpkn bhwn mn qdym brgygtʔ dbsrn wʕbdyn hwyn ṣbynʔ dbsrn wdtrʕytn wbnyʔ hwyn drwgzʔ mlyʔyt ʔyk šrkʔ
02:04	ʔlhʔ dyn dʕtyr brḥmwhy mṭl ḥwbh sgyʔʔ dʔḥbn
02:05	kd mytyn hwyn bḥṭhyn ʔḥyn ʕm mšyḥʔ wbṭybwth prqn
02:06	wʔqymn ʕmh wʔwtbn ʕmh bšmyʔ byšwʕ mšyḥʔ
02:07	dnḥwʔ lʕlmʔ dʔtyn rbwtʔ dʕwtrʔ dṭybwth wbsymwth dhwt ʕlyn byšwʕ mšyḥʔ
02:08	bṭybwth hw gyr ʔtprqn bhymnwtʔ whdʔ lʔ hwt mnkwn ʔlʔ mwhbtʔ hy dʔlhʔ
02:09	lʔ mn ʕbdʔ dlʔ ʔnš nštbhr
02:10	brytʔ ḥnn gyr dylh dʔtbryn byšwʕ mšyḥʔ lʕbdʔ ṭbʔ hnwn dmn qdym ṭyb ʔlhʔ dbhwn nhlk
02:11	mṭl hdʔ hwytwn ʕhdyn dʔntwn ʕmmʔ mn qdym dbsr hwytwn wmtqryn hwytwn ʕwrlwtʔ mn hy dmtqryʔ gzwrtʔ wʔytyh ʕbd ʔydyʔ bbsrʔ
02:12	wʔytykwn hwytwn bhw zbnʔ dlʔ mšyḥʔ wnwkryyn hwytwn mn dwbrʔ dʔysryl wʔksnyʔ hw ldytqʔ dmwlknʔ wdlʔ sbr hwytwn wdlʔ ʔlh bʕlmʔ
02:13	hšʔ dyn byšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʔntwn dmn qdym rḥyqyn hwytwn qrybʔ hwytwn bdmh dmšyḥʔ
02:14	hwyw gyr šynn hw dʕbd trtyhyn ḥdʔ wšrʔ sygʔ dqʔm hwʔ bmṣʕtʔ
02:15	wbʕldbbwtʔ bbsrh wnmwsʔ dpwqdʔ bpwqdnwhy bṭl dltryhwn nbrʔ bqnwmh lḥd brnšʔ ḥdtʔ wʕbd šynʔ
02:16	wrʕy ltryhwn bḥd pgr ʕm ʔlhʔ wbzqyph qṭl bʕldbbwtʔ
02:17	wʔtʔ sbr šlmʔ lkwn lrḥyqʔ wlqrybʔ
02:18	mṭl dbh hw hwʔ ln qwrbʔ ltryn bḥdʔ rwḥ lwt ʔbʔ
02:19	mkyl lʔ hwytwn ʔksnyʔ wlʔ twtbʔ ʔlʔ bny mdyntʔ dqdyšʔ wbny byth dʔlhʔ
02:20	wʔtbnytwn ʕl štʔstʔ dšlyḥʔ wdnbyʔ whw hwʔ ryš qrnʔ dbnynʔ yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
02:21	wbh mtrkb klh bnynʔ wrbʔ lhyklʔ qdyšʔ bmryʔ
02:22	kd ʔp ʔntwn bh mtbnyn ʔntwn lmʕmrʔ dʔlhʔ brwḥ 
03:01	mṭl hnʔ ʔnʔ pwlws ʔsyrʔ ʔnʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʕl ʔpykwn ʕmmʔ
03:02	ʔn šmʕtwn mdbrnwtʔ dṭybwth dʔlhʔ dʔtyhbt ly bkwn
03:03	dbglynʔ ʔtydʕ ly ʔrzʔ ʔyknʔ dktbt lkwn bzʕwrytʔ
03:04	ʔyk mʔ dmškḥytwn kd qryn ʔntwn lmstklw ydʕty dbʔrzh dmšyḥʔ
03:05	hw dbdrʔ ʔḥrnʔ lʔ ʔtydʕ lbnynšʔ ʔyk dhšʔ ʔtgly lšlyḥwhy qdyšʔ wlnbywhy brwḥ
03:06	dnhwwn ʕmmʔ bny yrtwth wšwtpʔ dpgrh wdmwlknʔ dʔtyhb bh byd ʔwnglywn
03:07	hw dʔnʔ hwyt mšmšnh ʔyk mwhbtʔ dṭybwth dʔlhʔ dʔtyhbt ly mn mʕbdnwtʔ dḥylh
03:08	ly dzʕwrʔ ʔnʔ dklhwn qdyšʔ ʔtyhbt ṭybwtʔ hdʔ dʔsbr bʕmmʔ ʕwtrh dmšyḥʔ hw dlʔ mtʕqb
03:09	wʔnhr lklnš ʔydʔ hy mdbrnwtʔ dʔrzʔ hw dksʔ hwʔ mn ʕlmʔ bʔlhʔ dkl brʔ
03:10	dbyd ʕdtʔ ttydʕ ḥkmth dʔlhʔ mlyt pwršnʔ lʔrkws wlšwlṭnʔ dbšmyʔ
03:11	hy dʕtd hwʔ mn ʕlmʔ wʕbdh byšwʕ mšyḥʔ mrn
03:12	hw dbh ʔyt ln prhsyʔ wqrybwtʔ btwklnʔ dhymnwth
03:13	mṭl hnʔ šʔlnʔ dlʔ tmʔn ly bʔwlṣny dʕl ʔpykwn dhdʔ hy tšbwḥtkwn
03:14	wkʔpnʔ bwrky lwt ʔbwhy dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
03:15	hw dmnh mštmhʔ kl ʔbhwtʔ dbšmyʔ wbʔrʕʔ
03:16	dntl lkwn ʔyk ʕwtrʔ dtšbwḥth dbḥylʔ tštrrwn brwḥh dbbrnškwn dlgw
03:17	nʕmr mšyḥʔ bhymnwtʔ wblbwtkwn bḥwbʔ kd nhwʔ šryr ʕqrkwn wštʔstkwn
03:18	dtškḥwn lmdrkw ʕm klhwn qdyšʔ mnw rwmʔ wʕwmqʔ wʔwrkʔ wptyʔ
03:19	wtdʕwn rbwtʔ dydʕtʔ dḥwbh dmšyḥʔ wttmlwn bklh mwlyʔ dʔlhʔ
03:20	lhw dyn dmṣʔ bḥylʔ ytyr mn kl lmʕbd ln wytyr mn mʔ dšʔlynn wrnynn ʔyk ḥylh dmstʕr bn
03:21	lh tšbwḥtʔ bʕdth byšwʕ mšyḥʔ bklhwn drʔ dʕlmy ʕlmyn ʔmyn
04:01	bʕʔ ʔnʔ hkyl mnkwn ʔnʔ ʔsyrʔ bmrn dthlkwn ʔyknʔ dyʔʔ lqrynʔ dʔtqrytwn
04:02	bklh mkykwt rʕynʔ wnyḥwtʔ wngyrwt rwḥʔ whwytwn msybryn ḥd lḥd bḥwbʔ
04:03	whwytwn ḥpyṭyn lmṭr ʔwywtʔ drwḥʔ bḥzqʔ dšlmʔ
04:04	dthwwn bḥd pgrʔ wbḥdʔ rwḥʔ ʔyk mʔ dʔtqrytwn bḥd sbrʔ dqrynkwn
04:05	ḥd hw gyr mryʔ wḥdʔ hymnwtʔ wḥdʔ mʕmwdytʔ
04:06	wḥd ʔlhʔ ʔbʔ dkl wʕl kl wbyd kl wbkln
04:07	lḥd ḥd mnn dyn ʔtyhbt ṭybwtʔ ʔyk mšwḥtʔ dmwhbth dmšyḥʔ
04:08	mṭl hnʔ ʔmyr dslq lmrwmʔ wšbʔ šbytʔ wyhb mwhbtʔ lbnynšʔ
04:09	dslq dyn mnʔ hy ʔlʔ ʔn dʔp nḥt lwqdm ltḥtyth dʔrʕʔ
04:10	hw dnḥt hwyw hw dʔp slq lʕl mn klhwn šmyʔ dnšlm kl
04:11	whw yhb ʔyt dšlyḥʔ wʔyt dnbyʔ wʔyt dmsbrnʔ wʔyt drʕwtʔ wʔyt dmlpnʔ
04:12	lgmrʔ dqdyšʔ lʕbdʔ dtšmštʔ lbnynʔ dpgrʔ dmšyḥʔ
04:13	ʕdmʔ dkln nhwʔ ḥd mdm bhymnwtʔ wbydʕtʔ dbrh dʔlhʔ wḥd gbrʔ gmyrʔ bmšwḥtʔ dqwmtʔ dšwmlyh dmšyḥʔ
04:14	wlʔ nhwʔ ylwdʔ dmzdʕzʕyn wmštnyn lkl rwḥ dywlpnʔ nkylʔ dbnynšʔ hnwn dbḥrʕwthwn mṣṭnʕyn dnṭʕwn
04:15	ʔlʔ hwyn šryryn bḥwbn dkwl mdm dyln nrbʔ bmšyḥʔ dhwyw ršʔ
04:16	wmnh klh pgrʔ mtrkb wmtqṭr bkl šryn ʔyk mwhbtʔ dmtyhbʔ bmšwḥtʔ lkl hdm ltrbytʔ dylh dpgrʔ dbḥwbʔ nštlm bnynh
04:17	hdʔ dyn ʔmr ʔnʔ wmshd ʔnʔ bmryʔ dmn hšʔ lʔ thwwn mhlkyn ʔyk šrkʔ dʕmmʔ dmhlkyn bsryqwt rʕynhwn
04:18	wḥšwkyn bmdʕyhwn wnwkryyn ʔnwn mn ḥywhy dʔlhʔ mṭl dlyt bhwn ydʕtʔ wmṭl ʕwyrwt lbhwn
04:19	hnwn dpsqw sbrhwn wʔšlmw npšhwn lpḥzwtʔ wlpwlḥnʔ dklh ṭnpwtʔ byʕnwthwn
04:20	ʔntwn dyn lʔ hwʔ hknʔ ylptwnyhy lmšyḥʔ
04:21	ʔn šryrʔyt šmʕtwnyhy wbh ylptwn ʔyk mʔ dʔytwhy qwštʔ byšwʕ
04:22	ʔlʔ dtnyḥwn mnkwn hwpkykwn qdmyʔ lbrnšʔ hw ʕtyqʔ dmtḥbl brgygtʔ dṭwʕyy
04:23	wttḥdtwn brwḥʔ dmdʕykwn
04:24	wtlbšwn lbrnšʔ ḥdtʔ hw dbʔlhʔ ʔtbry bzdyqwtʔ wbḥsywtʔ dqwštʔ
04:25	mṭl hnʔ ʔnyḥw mnkwn kdbwtʔ wmllw qwštʔ ʔnš ʕm qrybh hdmʔ ḥnn gyr ḥd dḥd
04:26	rgzw wlʔ tḥṭwn wšmšʔ ʕl rwgzkwn lʔ nʕrb
04:27	wlʔ ttlwn ʔtrʔ lʔkl qrṣʔ
04:28	wʔynʔ dgnb hwʔ mkyl lʔ ngnwb ʔlʔ nlʔʔ bʔydwhy wnplwḥ ṭbtʔ dnhwʔ lh lmtl lmn dsnyq 
04:29	kl mlʔ snyʔ mn pwmkwn lʔ tpwq ʔlʔ ʔydʔ dšpyrʔ wḥšḥʔ lbnynʔ dttl ṭybwtʔ lʔylyn dšmʕyn
04:30	wlʔ thwwn mʕyqyn lrwḥʔ qdyštʔ dʔlhʔ dʔtḥtmtwn bh lywmʔ dpwrqnʔ
04:31	klh mryrwtʔ wḥmtʔ wrwgzʔ wrwbʔ wgwdpʔ nštqln mnkwn ʕm klh byšwtʔ
04:32	whwytwn bsymyn ḥd lwt ḥd wmrḥmnyn whwytwn šbqyn ḥd lḥd ʔyknʔ dʔlhʔ bmšyḥʔ šbq ln
05:01	hwytwn hkyl mtdmyn bʔlhʔ ʔyk bnyʔ ḥbybʔ
05:02	whlkw bḥwbʔ ʔyk dʔp mšyḥʔ ʔḥbn wʔšlm npšh ʕl ʔpyn qwrbnʔ wdbḥʔ lʔlhʔ lryḥʔ bsymʔ
05:03	znywtʔ dyn wklh ṭnpwtʔ wʕlwbwtʔ ʔplʔ mštmhw tštmh byntkwn ʔyk dyʔʔ lqdyšʔ
05:04	wlʔ ṣwḥytʔ wlʔ mlʔ dšṭywtʔ ʔw dbzḥʔ ʔw dšʕyʔ hlyn dlʔ mtbʕyn ʔlʔ ḥlp hlyn twdytʔ
05:05	hdʔ dyn hwytwn ydʕyn dklnš dʔytwhy znyʔ ʔw ṭnpʔ ʔw ʕlwbʔ dʔytwhy plḥ ptkrʔ lyt lh yrtwtʔ bmlkwth dmšyḥʔ wdʔlhʔ
05:06	dlmʔ ʔnš nṭʕykwn bmlʔ sryqtʔ mṭl hlyn hw gyr ʔtʔ rwgzh dʔlhʔ ʕl bnyʔ dlʔ mtṭpysnwtʔ
05:07	lʔ hkyl thwwn lhwn šwtpʔ
05:08	ʔytykwn hwytwn gyr mn lwqdm ḥšwkʔ hšʔ dyn nwhrʔ ʔntwn bmrn ʔyk bny nwhrʔ hkyl hknʔ hlkw
05:09	pʔrwhy gyr dnwhrʔ bklh ʔnwn ṭbwtʔ wzdyqwtʔ wqwštʔ
05:10	whwytwn pršyn mnʔ špyr qdm mrn
05:11	wlʔ hwytwn mštwtpyn lwt ʕbdʔ dḥšwkʔ dpʔrʔ lyt bhwn ʔlʔ hwytwn mkwnyn lhwn
05:12	mdm gyr dbṭwšyy ʕbdyn ndyd hw ʔp lmmllwth
05:13	kl mdm gyr mtkwn mn nwhrʔ wmtglʔ wklmdm dglʔ nwhrʔ hw
05:14	mṭl hnʔ ʔmyr dʔttʕyr dmkʔ wqwm mn byt mytʔ wnnhr lk mšyḥʔ
05:15	ḥzw hkyl ʔyknʔ thlkwn zhyʔyt lʔ ʔyk sklʔ ʔlʔ ʔyk ḥkymʔ
05:16	dzbnyn qʔrshwn mṭl dywmtʔ byšʔ ʔnwn
05:17	mṭl hnʔ lʔ thwwn ḥsyry rʕynʔ ʔlʔ ʔstklw mnw ṣbynh dʔlhʔ
05:18	wlʔ hwytwn rwyn bḥmrʔ dbh ʔyt ʔswṭwtʔ ʔlʔ ʔtmlw brwḥʔ
05:19	wmllw ʕm npškwn bmzmwrʔ wbtšbḥtʔ wbzmyrtʔ drwḥʔ hwytwn zmryn blbwtkwn lmryʔ
05:20	whwytwn mwdyn bklzbn ʕl ʔpy klnš bšmh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ lʔlhʔ ʔbʔ
05:21	whwytwn mštʕbdyn ḥd lḥd bḥwbh dmšyḥʔ
05:22	nšʔ hwytyn mštʕbdn lbʕlykyn ʔyk dlmrn
05:23	mṭl dgbrʔ ršh hw dʔnttʔ ʔyknʔ dʔp mšyḥʔ ršʔ hw dʕdtʔ whwyw mḥynʔ dpgrʔ
05:24	ʔlʔ ʔyknʔ dʕdtʔ mštʕbdʔ lmšyḥʔ hknʔ ʔp nšʔ lbʕlyhyn bklmdm
05:25	gbrʔ ʔḥbw nšykwn ʔyk dʔp mšyḥʔ ʔḥb lʕdth wnpšh ʔšlm ʕl ʔpyh
05:26	dnqdšyh wndkyh bsḥyʔ dmyʔ wbmltʔ
05:27	wnqymyh ʕdtʔ lnpšh kd mšbḥʔ wlyt bh ṭwlšʔ wlʔ qmṭʔ wlʔ mdm dlhlyn dmʔ ʔlʔ thwʔ qdyšʔ dlʔ mwm
05:28	hknʔ wlʔ lgbrʔ dnḥbwn nšyhwn ʔyk dlpgryhwn mn dlʔntth gyr mḥb npšh hw mḥb
05:29	lʔ gyr ʔnš mmtwm snʔ pgrh ʔlʔ mtrsʔ lh wyṣp dylh ʔyknʔ dʔp mšyḥʔ dʕdth
05:30	mṭl dhdmʔ ḥnn dpgrh wmn bsrh ḥnn wmn grmwhy
05:31	mṭl hnʔ nšbwq gbrʔ lʔbwhy wlʔmh wnqp lʔntth wnhwwn tryhwn ḥd bsr
05:32	hnʔ ʔrzʔ rb hw ʔnʔ dyn ʔmr ʔnʔ ʕl mšyḥʔ wʕl ʕdth
05:33	brm ʔp ʔntwn kl ḥd ḥd mnkwn hknʔ nrḥm ʔntth ʔyk dlnpšh ʔnttʔ dyn thwʔ dḥlʔ mn bʕlh
06:01	bnyʔ ʔštmʕw lʔbhykwn bmrn hdʔ gyr kʔnʔ
06:02	whnw pwqdnʔ qdmyʔ dmlyk yqr lʔbwk wlʔmk
06:03	dnhwʔ lk dšpyr wnʔrkwn ḥyyk ʕl ʔrʕʔ
06:04	ʔbhʔ lʔ trgzwn bnykwn ʔlʔ rbw ʔnwn bmrdwtʔ wbywlpnʔ dmrn
06:05	ʕbdʔ ʔštmʕw lmrykwn dbbsr bdḥltʔ wbrtytʔ wbpšyṭwt lbʔ ʔyk dlmšyḥʔ
06:06	lʔ bmḥzʔ ʕynʔ ʔyk hw dlbnynšʔ špryn ʔntwn ʔlʔ ʔyk ʕbdʔ dmšyḥʔ dʕbdyn ṣbynʔ dʔlhʔ
06:07	wšmšw ʔnwn mn klh npškwn bḥwbʔ ʔyk dlmrn wlʔ ʔyk dlbnynšʔ
06:08	kd ydʕytwn dhw mdm dʕbd ʔnš dšpyr hw mtprʕ mn mrn ʔn ʕbdʔ hw wʔn br ḥʔrʔ
06:09	ʔp ʔntwn mryʔ hknʔ hwytwn ʕbdyn lʕbdykwn hwytwn šbqyn lhwn sklwtʔ mṭl dydʕyn ʔntwn dʔp mrkwn dylkwn ʔytwhy bšmyʔ wmsb bʔpʔ lyt lwth 
06:10	mkyl ʔḥy ʔtḥylw bmrn wbtwqpʔ dḥylh
06:11	wlbšw klh zynʔ dʔlhʔ ʔyknʔ dtškḥwn lmqm lwqbl ṣnʕth dʔklqrṣʔ
06:12	mṭl dtktwškwn lʔ hwʔ ʕm bsrʔ wdmʔ ʔlʔ ʕm ʔrkws wʕm šlyṭnʔ wʕm ʔḥydy ʕlmʔ dhnʔ ḥšwkʔ wʕm rwḥʔ byštʔ dtḥyt šmyʔ
06:13	mṭl hnʔ lbšw klh zynʔ dʔlhʔ dtškḥwn tʔrʕwn byšʔ wkd mʕtdyn ʔntwn bklmdm tqwmwn
06:14	qwmw hkyl wḥzwqw ḥṣykwn bqwštʔ wlbšw šrynʔ dzdyqwtʔ
06:15	wsʔnw brglykwn ṭwybh dʔwnglywn dšlmʔ
06:16	wʕm hlyn sbw lkwn skrʔ dhymnwtʔ dbh ttmṣwn ḥylʔ lmdʕkw klhwn gʔrwhy yqdʔ dbyšʔ
06:17	wsymw snwrtʔ dpwrqnʔ wʔḥwdw sypʔ drwḥʔ dʔytwhy mltʔ dʔlhʔ
06:18	wbkl ṣlwn wbkl bʕwn ṣlw bklzbn brwḥ wbh bṣlwtʔ hwytwn šhryn bkl ʕdn kd mṣlytwn ʔmynʔyt wmtkšpyn ʕl ʔpy klhwn qdyšʔ
06:19	ʔp ʕly dttyhb ly mltʔ bmptḥ pwmy dʕyn bglʔ ʔkrz ʔrzʔ dsbrtʔ
06:20	hw dʔnʔ ʔyzgdh bššltʔ dbprhsyʔ ʔmllywhy ʔyk dwlʔ ly lmmllwth
06:21	dtdʕwn dyn ʔp ʔntwn mdm dlwty wmdm dsʕr ʔnʔ hʔ mwdʕ lkwn ṭwkyqws ʔḥʔ ḥbybʔ wmšmšnʔ mhymnʔ bmrn
06:22	dlh šdrt lwtkwn ʕlyh ʕl hdʔ dtdʕwn mʔ dlwty wnbyʔ lbwtkwn
06:23	šlmʔ ʕm ʔḥyn wḥwbʔ ʕm hymnwtʔ mn ʔlhʔ ʔbʔ wmn mrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
06:24	ṭybwtʔ ʕm klhwn ʔylyn dmḥbyn lmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ dlʔ ḥbl ʔmyn
01:01	pwlws wṭymtʔws ʕbdʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ lklhwn qdyšʔ dbyšwʕ mšyḥʔ dʔyt bpylypws ʕm qšyšʔ wmšmšnʔ
01:02	ṭybwtʔ ʕmkwn wšlmʔ mn ʔlhʔ ʔbwn wmn mrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:03	mwdʔ ʔnʔ lʔlhy ʕl ʕwhdnkwn ʔmynʔ
01:04	dbkl bʕwty dʕl ʔpykwn wkd ḥdʔ ʔnʔ mtkšp ʔnʔ
01:05	ʕl šwtpwtkwn dbʔwnglywn mn ywmʔ qdmyʔ wʕdmʔ lhšʔ
01:06	mṭl dtkyl ʔnʔ ʕl hdʔ dhw mn dšry bkwn ʕbdʔ ṭbʔ hw nšlm ʕdmʔ lywmh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:07	hknʔ gyr zdq ly lmtrʕyw ʕl klkwn mṭl dblby symyn ʔntwn wbʔswry wbmpq brwḥy dʕl šrrh dʔwnglywn dšwtpy ʔntwn bṭybwtʔ
01:08	shd hw ly gyr ʔlhʔ dʔyknʔ mḥb ʔnʔ lkwn brḥmwhy dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:09	whdʔ mṣlʔ ʔnʔ dtwb nsgʔ wntytr ḥwbkwn bydʕtʔ wbkl swkl drwḥ
01:10	dthwwn pršyn ʔylyn dʕhnn wthwwn dkyn dlʔ twqlʔ bywmh dmšyḥʔ
01:11	wmlyn pʔrʔ dzdyqwtʔ dbyšwʕ mšyḥʔ lšwbḥʔ wlʔyqrʔ dʔlhʔ
01:12	ṣbʔ ʔnʔ dyn dtdʕwn ʔḥy dswʕrny dyly ytyrʔyt ʔtʔ lqdmwhy bʔwnglywn
01:13	hknʔ dʔp ʔswry ʔtglyw bmšyḥʔ bprṭwryn klh wlšrkʔ dklnš
01:14	wswgʔʔ dʔḥʔ dbmrn ʔttklw ʕl ʔswry wʔšyḥw ytyrʔyt dlʔ dḥlʔ lmmllw mltʔ dʔlhʔ
01:15	wʔnš ʔnš mn ḥsmʔ wḥrynʔ ʔnš ʔnš dyn bṣbynʔ ṭbʔ wbḥwbʔ lmšyḥʔ mkrzyn
01:16	mṭl dydʕyn dlmpq brwḥʔ dʔwnglywn sym ʔnʔ
01:17	hnwn dyn dbḥrynʔ lmšyḥʔ mkrzyn lʔ hwʔ dkyʔyt ʔlʔ dsbryn dmwspyn ʔwlṣnʔ lʔswry
01:18	wbhdʔ ḥdyt wḥdʔ ʔnʔ dbkl prws ʔn bʕltʔ wʔn bqwštʔ mšyḥʔ ntkrz
01:19	ydʕ ʔnʔ gyr dhlyn lḥyʔ mštkḥn ly bbʕwtkwn wbmwhbtʔ drwḥʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:20	ʔyknʔ dmsbr ʔnʔ wmskʔ ʔnʔ dbmdm lʔ ʔbht ʔlʔ bglywt ʔpʔ ʔyk dbklzbn ʔp hšʔ ntrwrb mšyḥʔ bpgry ʔn bḥyʔ wʔn bmwtʔ
01:21	ḥyy gyr dyly mšyḥʔ hw wʔn ʔmwt ywtrnʔ hw ly
01:22	ʔn dyn ʔp bhlyn ḥyʔ dbsrʔ pʔrʔ ʔyt ly bʕbdy lʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ mnʔ ʔgbʔ ly
01:23	ʔlṣn ly gyr trtyhyn lmpṭr rgyg ʔnʔ dʕm mšyḥʔ ʔhwʔ whdʔ ṭb pqḥʔ hwt ly
01:24	ʔlʔ ʔp dʔqwʔ bpgry ʔlṣʔ ly ṣbwtʔ mṭltkwn
01:25	whdʔ tkylʔyt ydʕ ʔnʔ dpʔš ʔnʔ wmqwʔ ʔnʔ lḥdwtʔ dylkwn wltrbytʔ dhymnwtkwn
01:26	dkd ʔtʔ twb lwtkwn ntytr by šwbhrkwn dbyšwʕ mšyḥʔ blḥwd
01:27	ʔyknʔ dyʔʔ lsbrth dmšyḥʔ hwytwn mtdbryn dʔn ʔtʔ ʔḥzykwn wʔn pryq ʔnʔ ʔšmʕ ʕlykwn dqymyn ʔntwn bḥdʔ rwḥ wbḥdʔ npš wmtnṣḥytwn ʔkḥd bhymnwtʔ dʔwnglywn
01:28	wbmdm lʔ mttzyʕyn ʔntwn mn hnwn dqymyn lqwbln ltḥwytʔ dʔbdnhwn wlḥyʔ dylkwn
01:29	whdʔ mn ʔlhʔ hw ʔtyhbt lkwn dlʔ blḥwd mhymnw thymnwn bh bmšyḥʔ ʔlʔ ʔp dʕl ʔpwhy tḥšwn
01:30	wtsybrwn ʔgwnʔ ʔyk hw dḥzytwn by whšʔ šmʕytwn ʕly 
02:01	ʔn ʔyt lkwn hkyl bwyʔʔ bmšyḥʔ wʔn mmlʔ blbʔ bḥwbʔ wʔn šwtpwtʔ drwḥʔ wʔn rwḥpʔ wrḥmʔ
02:02	šlmw ḥdwty dḥd rʕynʔ nhwʔ lkwn wḥd ḥwbʔ wḥdʔ npš wḥdʔ trʕytʔ
02:03	wmdm bḥrynʔ ʔw btšbwḥtʔ sryqtʔ lʔ tʕbdwn ʔlʔ bmkykwt rʕynʔ klnš lḥbrh ʔyk dmytr mnh
02:04	wlʔ ʔnš dnpšh nʔṣp ʔlʔ klnš ʔp dḥbrh
02:05	whdʔ ʔtrʕw bnpškwn hy dʔp yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
02:06	hw dkd ʔytwhy bdmwtʔ dʔlhʔ lʔ hwʔ ḥṭwpyʔ ḥšbh hdʔ dʔytwhy pḥmʔ dʔlhʔ
02:07	ʔlʔ npšh srq wdmwtʔ dʕbdʔ nsb whwʔ bdmwtʔ dbnynšʔ wbʔskmʔ ʔštkḥ ʔyk brnšʔ
02:08	wmkk npšh wʔštmʕ ʕdmʔ lmwtʔ mwtʔ dyn dzqypʔ
02:09	mṭl hnʔ ʔp ʔlhʔ ʔsgy rmrmh wyhb lh šmʔ dmytr mn kl šmhyn
02:10	dbšmh dyšwʕ kl brwk tkwp dbšmyʔ wbʔrʕʔ wdltḥt mn ʔrʕʔ
02:11	wkl lšn nwdʔ dmryʔ hw yšwʕ mšyḥʔ lšwbḥʔ dʔlhʔ ʔbwhy
02:12	mkyl ḥbyby ʔyknʔ dbklzbn ʔštmʕtwn lʔ kd qryb ʔnʔ lkwn blḥwd ʔlʔ hšʔ drḥyq ʔnʔ mnkwn ytyrʔyt bdḥltʔ wbrtytʔ plwḥw pwlḥnʔ dḥyykwn
02:13	ʔlhʔ hw gyr mḥpṭ bkwn ʔp lmṣbʔ ʔp lmsʕr hw dṣbyn ʔntwn
02:14	klmdm hwytwn ʕbdyn dlʔ rṭnʔ wdlʔ pwlg
02:15	dthwwn tmymʔ wdlʔ mwm ʔyk bnyʔ dkyʔ dʔlhʔ dʕmryn bdrʔ ʕsqʔ wmʕqmʔ wʔtḥzw bynthwn ʔyk nhyrʔ bʕlmʔ
02:16	dʔytykwn lhwn bdwkt ḥyʔ lšwbhry dyly bywmh dmšyḥʔ dlʔ hwʔ ʔyqʔ rhṭt wlʔ sryqʔyt ʕmlt
02:17	ʔlʔ ʔpn mtnqʔ ʔnʔ ʕl dbḥtʔ wtšmštʔ dhymnwtkwn ḥdʔ ʔnʔ wrwz ʔnʔ ʕm klkwn
02:18	hknʔ ʔp ʔntwn ḥdw wrwzw ʕmy
02:19	msbr ʔnʔ dyn bmrn yšwʕ dʔšdr lwtkwn lṭymtʔws bʕgl dʔp ly nhwʔ ly nyḥʔ kd ʔlp mṭltkwn
02:20	lyt ly gyr ʔḥryn hrkʔ dʔyk npšy hw dʔkypʔyt yṣp dylkwn
02:21	klhwn gyr dnpšhwn hw bʕyn wlʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ
02:22	bwqyh dyn dhnʔ ydʕytwn dʔyk brʔ ʕm ʔbwhy hknʔ plḥ ʕmy bsbrtʔ
02:23	lhnʔ msbr ʔnʔ dʔšdr lwtkwn bʕgl mʔ dḥzyt mʔ dlwty
02:24	wtkyl ʔnʔ ʕl mry dʔp ʔnʔ bʕgl ʔtʔ ʔnʔ lwtkwn
02:25	hšʔ dyn ʔlṣtny ṣbwtʔ dʔšdr lwtkwn lʔpprwdyṭs ʔḥʔ dʔytwhy mʕdrnʔ wplḥʔ dʕmy dylkwn dyn šlyḥʔ wmšmšnʔ dḥšḥty
02:26	mṭl dswʔ hwʔ lmḥzʔ lklkwn wmʕq hwʔ dydʕ dšmʕtwn dʔtkrh
02:27	ʔp ʔtkrh gyr ʕdmʔ lmwtʔ ʔlʔ ʔlhʔ rḥm ʕlwhy lʔ hwʔ dyn ʕlwhy blḥwd ʔlʔ ʔp ʕly dlʔ thwʔ ly ʕqʔ ʕl ʕqʔ
02:28	ḥpyṭʔyt hkyl šdrth lwtkwn dkd tḥzwnyhy twb tḥdwn wly qlyl nhwʔ npʔšʔ
02:29	qblwhy hkyl bmryʔ bkl ḥdwʔ wlʔylyn dhknʔ ʔnwn bʔyqrʔ ʔḥwdw ʔnwn
02:30	mṭl ʕbdʔ gyr dmšyḥʔ ʕdmʔ lmwtʔ mṭy wbsr ʕl npšh dnmlʔ mdm dbṣrtwn hwytwn btšmštʔ dlwty
03:01	mkyl ʔḥy ḥdw bmrn hnyn kd hnyn dʔktwb lkwn lʔ mʔnʔ ly mṭl dlkwn mzhrn
03:02	ʔzdhrw mn klbʔ ʔzdhrw mn pʕlʔ byšʔ ʔzdhrw mn psq bsrʔ
03:03	gzwrtʔ gyr ḥnn ʔytyn ʔylyn dplḥynn lʔlhʔ brwḥʔ wmštbhrynn byšwʕ mšyḥʔ wlʔ tkylynn ʕl bsrʔ
03:04	kd ly ʔyt hwʔ ly twklnʔ ʔp ʕl bsrʔ ʔn gyr ʔnš sbr dtwklnh bbsrʔ hw ytyr mnh ʔnʔ
03:05	gzyrʔ br tmnyʔ ywmyn mn ṭwhmʔ dʔysryl mn šbṭʔ dbnymynʕbryʔ br ʕbryʔ bnmwsʔ pryšyʔ
03:06	bṭnnʔ rdwpʔ dʕdtʔ wbzdyqwtʔ dnmwsʔ dlʔ ršyn hwyt
03:07	ʔlʔ hlyn dywtrnʔ hwy ly ḥwsrnʔ ḥšbt ʔnyn mṭl mšyḥʔ
03:08	ʔp ḥšb ʔnʔ lhyn klhyn ḥwsrnʔ mṭl rbwtʔ dydʕth dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ mry hw dmṭlth klmdm ḥsrt wʔyk zblʔ ḥšbt dlmšyḥʔ ʔtr
03:09	wʔštkḥ bh kd lyt ly zdyqwtʔ dnpšy hy dmn nmwsʔ ʔlʔ hy dmn hymnwtʔ dmšyḥʔ dʔytyh zdyqwtʔ dmn ʔlhʔ
03:10	dbh ʔštwdʕ lyšwʕ wlḥylʔ dqymth wʔštwtp bḥšwhy wʔtdmʔ bmwth
03:11	dlmʔ ʔškḥ ʔmṭʔ lqymtʔ dmn byt mytʔ
03:12	lʔ hwʔ mn kdw nsbt ʔw mn kdw ʔtgmrt ʔlʔ rhṭ ʔnʔ dlmʔ ʔdrk lmdm dmṭlth ʔdrkny yšwʕ mšyḥʔ 
03:13	ʔḥy ʔnʔ ʕl npšy lʔ rnʔ ʔnʔ dʔdrkt ḥdʔ dyn ydʕ ʔnʔ ddbstry ṭʕʔ ʔnʔ wlqdmy mštwšṭ ʔnʔ
03:14	wrhṭ ʔnʔ lwqbl nyšʔ dʔsb zkwtʔ dqrynʔ dlʕl dʔlhʔ byšwʕ mšyḥʔ
03:15	ʔylyn dgmyryn hkyl hlyn ntrʕwn wʔn mdm ʔḥrnyʔyt mtrʕyn ʔntwn ʔp hdʔ ʔlhʔ nglʔ lkwn
03:16	brm lhdʔ dmṭyn bḥd šbylʔ nšlm wbḥdʔ ʔwywtʔ
03:17	ʔtdmw by ʔḥy whwytwn mtbqyn bʔylyn dhknʔ mhlkyn ʔyk dmwtʔ dbn ḥzytwn
03:18	ʔyt gyr sgyʔʔ dʔḥrnyʔyt mhlkyn hnwn dzbnyn sgyʔn ʔmrt lkwn ʕlyhwn hšʔ dyn kd bkʔ ʔnʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ hnwn dbʕldbbʔ dzqyph dmšyḥʔ
03:19	dḥrthwn ʔbdnʔ hy hnwn dʔlhhwn krshwn wtšbwḥthwn bhtthwn hlyn dtrʕythwn bʔrʕʔ hy
03:20	dyln dyn pwlḥnn bšmyʔ hw wmn tmn mskynn lmḥynʔ lmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
03:21	dhw nḥlp pgrʔ dmwkkn dnhwʔ bdmwtʔ dpgrʔ dšwbḥh ʔyk ḥylh rbʔ hw dbh kl ʔštʕbd lh
04:01	mkyl ʔḥy ḥbybʔ wrḥymʔ wḥdwty wklyly hknʔ qwmw bmrn ḥbyby
04:02	mn ʔwhdyʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ wmn swnṭykʔ dḥd rʕynʔ nhwʔ lhyn bmrn
04:03	ʔp mnk bʕʔ ʔnʔ br zwgy šryrʔ dthwʔ mʕdr lhyn dhnyn lʔy ʕmy bʔwnglywn ʕm qlmys wʕm šrkʔ dmʕdrny hnwn dšmhyhwn ktybyn bktbʔ dḥyʔ
04:04	ḥdw bmrn bklzbn wtwb ʔmr ʔnʔ ḥdw
04:05	wmkykwtkwn ttydʕ lwt klnš mrn qryb hw
04:06	dmdm lʔ tʔṣpwn ʔlʔ bklzbn bṣlwtʔ wbbʕwtʔ wbtwdytʔ šʔltkwn ntydʕn qdm ʔlhʔ
04:07	wšlmh dʔlhʔ hw drb mn kl mdʕ nnṭr lbwtkwn wmdʕykwn byšwʕ mšyḥʔ
04:08	mkyl ʔḥy ʔylyn dšryrn wʔylyn dnkpn wʔylyn dkʔnn wʔylyn ddkyn wʔylyn drḥymn wʔylyn dšbyḥn wʔylyn ʕbdʔ dšwbḥʔ wdqwlsʔ hlyn ʔtrʕw
04:09	hlyn dylptwn wqbltwn wšmʕtwn wḥzytwn by hlyn sʕwrw wʔlhʔ dšlmʔ nhwʔ ʕmkwn
04:10	rwrbʔyt dyn ḥdyt bmrn dʔqptwn lmʔṣp dyly ʔyknʔ dʔp yṣpyn hwytwn ʔlʔ lʔ spyqyn hwytwn
04:11	lʔ hwʔ dyn mṭl dḥsr ly ʔmr ʔnʔ ʔnʔ gyr ylpt dnhwʔ spq ly hw mdm dʔyt ly
04:12	ydʕ ʔnʔ dʔtmkk ydʕ ʔnʔ hw ʔp dʔtytr bkl wbkl mdm mdrš ʔnʔ ʔp bsbʕʔ ʔp bkpnʔ bmšrtḥwtʔ wbḥsyrwtʔ
04:13	dkl mdm mṣʔ ʔnʔ ḥylʔ bmšyḥʔ dmḥyl ly
04:14	brm špyr ʕbdtwn dʔštwtptwn lʔwlṣny
04:15	ydʕyn ʔntwn dyn ʔp ʔntwn pylypsyʔ dbšwryʔ dsbrtʔ kd npqt mn mqdwnyʔ ʔplʔ ḥdʔ mn ʕdtʔ ʔštwtp ly bḥwšbn msbʔ wmtlʔ ʔlʔ ʔntwn blḥwd
04:16	dʔp ltslwnyqʔ ḥdʔ zbn wtrtyn ḥšḥty šdrtwn ly
04:17	lw dmwhbtʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ ʔlʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ dpʔrʔ nsgwn lkwn
04:18	klmdm qblt wytyr ly wmlʔ ʔnʔ wnsbt kl dšdrtwn ly byd ʔpprwdyṭs ryḥʔ bsymʔ wdbḥʔ mqblʔ dšpr lʔlhʔ
04:19	wʔlhy nmlʔ klh snyqwtkwn ʔyk ʕwtrh bšwbḥʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ
04:20	lʔlhʔ dyn ʔbwn šwbḥʔ wʔyqrʔ lʕlm ʕlmyn ʔmyn
04:21	šʔlw bšlmʔ dklhwn qdyšʔ dbyšwʕ mšyḥʔ šʔlyn bšlmkwn ʔḥʔ dʕmy
04:22	šʔlyn bšlmkwn klhwn qdyšʔ ytyrʔyt hlyn dmn byth dqsr
04:23	ṭybwth dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʕm klkwn ʔmyn
01:01	pwlws šlyḥʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ bṣbynh dʔlhʔ wṭymtʔws ʔḥʔ
01:02	lʔylyn dʔyt bqwlsws ʔḥʔ qdyšʔ wmhymnʔ byšwʕ mšyḥʔ šlmʔ ʕmkwn wṭybwtʔ mn ʔlhʔ ʔbwn
01:03	mwdynn lʔlhʔ ʔbwhy dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ bklzbn wmṣlynn ʕlykwn
01:04	hʔ mn dšmʕn hymnwtkwn dbyšwʕ mšyḥʔ wḥwbkwn dlwt klhwn qdyšʔ
01:05	mṭl sbrʔ hw dnṭyr lkwn bšmyʔ hw dmn qdym šmʕtwn bmltʔ dqwštʔ dsbrtʔ
01:06	hy dʔtkrzt lkwn ʔyk dʔp lklh ʕlmʔ wrbyʔ wyhbʔ pʔrʔ ʔyknʔ dʔp bkwn mn ywmʔ dšmʕtwn wʔštwdʕtwn ṭybwth dʔlhʔ bqwštʔ
01:07	ʔyk mʔ dylptwn mn ʔpprʔ kntn ḥbybʔ dhw ʔytwhy ḥlpykwn mšmšnʔ mhymnʔ dmšyḥʔ
01:08	whw ʔwdʕn ḥwbkwn dbrwḥʔ 
01:09	mṭlhnʔ ʔp ḥnn mn ywmʔ dšmʕn lʔ šlynn lmṣlyw ʕlykwn wlmšʔl dttmlwn ydʕtʔ dṣbynh dʔlhʔ bkl ḥkmʔ wbkl swkl drwḥ
01:10	dthlkwn ʔyk dzdq wtšprwn lʔlhʔ bkl ʕbdyn ṭbyn wttlwn pʔrʔ wtrbwn bydʕtʔ dʔlhʔ
01:11	wbkl ḥyl ttḥylwn ʔyk rbwtʔ dšwbḥh bkl msybrnw wbmgrt rwḥ wbḥdwtʔ
01:12	twdwn lʔlhʔ ʔbʔ dʔšwyn lmntʔ dyrtwtʔ dqdyšʔ bnwhrʔ
01:13	wprqn mn šwlṭnh dḥšwkʔ wʔytyn lmlkwtʔ dbrh ḥbybʔ
01:14	hw dbh ʔyt ln pwrqnʔ wšwbqnʔ dḥṭhʔ
01:15	hw dhwyw dmwtʔ dʔlhʔ dlʔ mtḥzʔ wbwkrʔ dklhyn brytʔ
01:16	wbh ʔtbry klmdm dbšmyʔ wbʔrʕʔ kl dmtḥzʔ wkl dlʔ mtḥzʔ ʔn mwtbʔ wʔn mrwtʔ wʔn ʔrkws wʔn šwlṭnʔ klmdm bʔydh wbh ʔtbry
01:17	whwyw dmn qdm kl wklmdm bh qʔm
01:18	whwyw ršʔ dpgrʔ dʕdtʔ dʔytwhy ršʔ wbwkrʔ dmn byt mytʔ dnhwʔ qdmy bkl
01:19	dbh hw ṣbʔ klh mwlyʔ lmʕmr
01:20	wbʔydh lmrʕyw lh klmdm wšyn bdmʔ dzqyph bʔydwhy ʔn dbʔrʕʔ wʔn dbšmyʔ
01:21	ʔp lkwn dmn qdym nwkryʔ hwytwn wbʕldbbʔ brʕynykwn mṭl ʕbdykwn byšʔ šynkwn hšʔ
01:22	bpgrʔ dbsrh wbmwth dnqymkwn qdmwhy qdyšyn dlʔ mwm wdlʔ ršyn
01:23	ʔn tqwwn bhymnwtkwn kd šryrʔ štʔstkwn wlʔ mttzyʕytwn mn sbrʔ dʔwnglywn hw dšmʕtwn dʔtkrz bklh brytʔ dtḥyt šmyʔ hw dʔnʔ pwlws hwyt mšmšnh
01:24	wḥdʔ ʔnʔ bḥšʔ dʕl ʔpykwn wmmlʔ ʔnʔ ḥsyrwtʔ dʔwlṣnwhy dmšyḥʔ bbsry ḥlp pgrh dʔytwhy ʕdtʔ
01:25	hy dʔnʔ hwyt mšmšnh ʔyk mdbrnwtʔ dʔlhʔ dʔtyhbt ly bkwn dʔšmlʔ mlth dʔlhʔ
01:26	ʔrzʔ hw dmksy hwʔ mn ʕlmʔ wmn drʔ hšʔ dyn ʔtgly lqdyšwhy
01:27	lʔylyn dṣbʔ ʔlhʔ dnwdʕ mnw ʕwtrʔ dšwbḥh dʔrzʔ hnʔ bʕmmʔ dhwyw mšyḥʔ dbkwn sbrʔ dšwbḥn
01:28	hw dḥnn mkrzynn wmlpynn wmsklynn lkl brnš bkl ḥkmʔ dnqym lkl brnš kd gmyr byšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:29	bhdʔ hw gyr ʔp ʕml ʔnʔ wmtktš ʔnʔ bmʕdrnwtʔ dḥylʔ dmtyhb ly
02:01	ṣbʔ ʔnʔ dyn dtdʕwn ʔynʔ ʔgwnʔ ʔyt ly ḥlpykwn wḥlp hnwn dbldyqyʔ wḥlp šrkʔ ʔylyn dprṣwpy lʔ ḥzw bbsr
02:02	dntbyʔwn lbwthwn wntqrbwn bḥwbʔ lklh ʕwtrʔ dpysʔ wlswklʔ dydʕth dʔrzʔ dʔlhʔ ʔbʔ wdmšyḥʔ
02:03	hw dbh ksyn klhyn symtʔ dḥkmtʔ wdydʕtʔ
02:04	hdʔ dyn ʔmr ʔnʔ dlʔ ʔnš nhwʔ mṭʕʔ lkwn bpysʔ dmlʔ
02:05	ʔpn bbsr gyr pryq ʔnʔ mnkwn ʔlʔ brwḥ ʕmkwn ʔnʔ wḥdʔ ʔnʔ dḥzʔ ʔnʔ mṭkswtkwn wšryrwtʔ dhymnwtkwn dbmšyḥʔ
02:06	ʔyknʔ hkyl dqbltwn lyšwʕ mšyḥʔ mrn bh hlkw
02:07	kd mšrryn ʕqrykwn wmtbnyn ʔntwn bh wmtqymyn ʔntwn bhymnwtʔ hy dylptwn dbh ttytrwn btwdytʔ
02:08	ʔzdhrw dlmʔ ʔnš nḥlṣkwn bpylspwtʔ wbṭʕywtʔ sryqtʔ ʔyk ywlpnʔ dbnynšʔ wʔyk ʔsṭwkswhy dʕlmʔ wlʔ ʔyk mšyḥʔ
02:09	dbh ʕmr klh mwlyʔ dʔlhwtʔ gwšmnʔyt
02:10	wbh ʔp ʔntwn mštmlytwn dhw ʔytwhy ršʔ dklhyn ʔrkws wšwlṭnʔ
02:11	wbh ʔtgzrtwn gzwrtʔ dlʔ bʔydyn bšlḥ bsrʔ dḥṭhʔ bgzwrth dmšyḥʔ
02:12	wʔtqbrtwn ʕmh bmʕmwdytʔ wbh qmtwn ʕmh dhymntwn bḥylʔ dʔlhʔ dʔqymh mn byt mytʔ
02:13	wlkwn dmytyn hwytwn bḥṭhykwn wbʕwrlwt bsrkwn ʔḥykwn ʕmh wšbq ln klhwn ḥṭhyn
02:14	wʕṭʔ bpwqdnwhy šṭr ḥwbyn hw dʔytwhy hwʔ sqwbln wšqlh mn mṣʕtʔ wqbʕh bzqyph
02:15	wbšlḥ pgrh prsy lʔrkws wlšlyṭnʔ wʔbht ʔnwn glyʔyt bqnwmh
02:16	lʔ hkyl ʔnš ndwdkwn bmʔklʔ wbmštyʔ ʔw bpwlgʔ dʕʔdʔ wdryš yrḥʔ wdšbʔ
02:17	hlyn dʔytyhyn ṭlnytʔ dʔylyn dʕtydn pgrʔ dyn mšyḥʔ hw
02:18	wlmʔ ʔnš nṣbʔ bmkykwt rʕynʔ lmḥybwtkwn dtštʕbdwn lpwlḥnʔ dmlʔkʔ bdsʕʔ ʕl mdm dlʔ ḥzʔ wsryqʔyt mtḥtr brʕynʔ dbsrh
02:19	wlʔ ʔḥd ršʔ dmnh klh pgrʔ mtrkb wmtqym bšrynʔ wbhdmʔ wrbʔ trbytʔ dʔlhʔ
02:20	ʔn gyr myttwn ʕm mšyḥʔ mn ʔsṭwkswhy dʕlmʔ lmnʔ ʔyk hw dḥyyn ʔntwn bʕlmʔ mtdynyn ʔntwn
02:21	lʔ lm tqrwb wlʔ tṭʕm wlʔ tqp
02:22	dʔytyhyn hlyn ḥšḥtʔ dmtḥblʔ wpwqdʔ ʔnyn wywlpnʔ dbnynšʔ
02:23	wmtḥzyn dʔyt bhyn mltʔ dḥkmtʔ bprṣwp mkykwtʔ wdḥlt ʔlhʔ wdlʔ ḥysyn ʕl pgrʔ lw bmdm dmyqr ʔlʔ bʔylyn dḥšḥtʔ ʔnyn dbsrʔ 
03:01	ʔn hkyl qmtwn ʕm mšyḥʔ dlʕl bʕw ʔtr dmšyḥʔ ytb ʕl ymynʔ dʔlhʔ
03:02	dlʕl ʔtrʕw wlʔ dbʔrʕʔ
03:03	myttwn lkwn gyr wḥyykwn ksyn ʕm mšyḥʔ bʔlhʔ
03:04	wʔmty dmšyḥʔ mtglʔ dhwyw ḥyyn hydyn ʔp ʔntwn ttglwn ʕmh bšwbḥʔ
03:05	ʔmytw hkyl hdmykwn dbʔrʕʔ znywtʔ wṭnpwtʔ wkʔbʔ wrgtʔ byštʔ wʕlwbwtʔ dhy hy dḥlt ptkrʔ
03:06	mṭl hlyn gyr ʔtʔ rwgzh dʔlhʔ ʕl bnyh dlʔ mtṭpysnwtʔ
03:07	wbhlyn ʔp ʔntwn hlktwn mn qdym kd mthpkyn hwytwn bhyn
03:08	hšʔ dyn ʔnyḥw mnkwn klhyn hlyn rwgzʔ ḥmtʔ byšwtʔ gwdpʔ mmllʔ ṭnpʔ
03:09	wlʔ thwwn mdglyn ḥd bḥd ʔlʔ šwlḥwhy lbrnšʔ ʕtyqʔ ʕm klhwn hwpkwhy
03:10	wlbšw ḥdtʔ dmtḥdt bydʕtʔ bdmwtʔ dbryh
03:11	kr dlyt yhwdyʔ wʔrmyʔ wlʔ gzwrtʔ wʕwrlwtʔ wlʔ ywnyʔ wbrbryʔ wlʔ ʕbdʔ wbrḥʔrʔ ʔlʔ kl wbklnš mšyḥʔ hw
03:12	lbšw hkyl ʔyk gbyʔ dʔlhʔ qdyšʔ wḥbybʔ rḥmʔ wrwḥpʔ wbsymwtʔ wmkykwt rʕynʔ wnyḥwtʔ wngyrwt rwḥʔ
03:13	whwytwn msybryn ḥd lḥd wšbqyn ḥd lḥd wʔn ʔyt lʔnš ʕl ḥbrh rwʕmʔ ʔyknʔ dmšyḥʔ šbq lkwn hknʔ ʔp ʔntwn šbwqw
03:14	wʕm hlyn klhyn ḥwbʔ dhwyw ḥzqʔ dgmyrwtʔ
03:15	wšlmh dmšyḥʔ ndbr lbwtkwn dlh ʔtqrytwn bḥd pgr whwytwn mwdyn lmšyḥʔ
03:16	dmlth tʕmr bkwn ʕtyrʔyt bkl ḥkmʔ whwytwn mlpyn wrdyn npškwn bmzmwrʔ wbtšbḥtʔ wbzmyrtʔ drwḥʔ wbṭybwtʔ hwytwn zmryn blbwtkwn lʔlhʔ
03:17	wkl mdm dsʕryn ʔntwn bmltʔ wbʕbdʔ bšmh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ hwytwn ʕbdyn whwytwn mwdyn bʔydh lʔlhʔ ʔbʔ
03:18	nšʔ ʔštʕbdyn lbʕlykyn ʔyk dzdq bmšyḥʔ
03:19	gbrʔ ʔḥbw nšykwn wlʔ thwwn mryryn ʕlyhyn
03:20	bnyʔ ʔštmʕw lʔbhykwn bklmdm hknʔ gyr špyr qdm mrn
03:21	ʔbhʔ lʔ trgzwn bnykwn dlʔ nttʕyqwn
03:22	ʕbdʔ ʔštmʕw bklmdm lmrykwn dpgrʔ lʔ bmḥzʔ ʕynʔ ʔyk hnwn dšpryn lbnynšʔ ʔlʔ blbʔ pšyṭʔ wbdḥlth dmryʔ
03:23	wkl dʕbdyn ʔntwn mn klh npškwn ʕbdw ʔyk dlmrn wlʔ ʔyk dlbnynšʔ
03:24	wdʕw dmn mrn mqblytwn pwrʕnʔ byrtwtʔ lmryʔ gyr mšyḥʔ plḥytwn
03:25	msklnʔ dyn mtprʕ ʔyk mdm dʔskl wlyt msb bʔpʔ
04:01	mryʔ ʕbdw šwywtʔ wkʔnwtʔ lwt ʕbdykwn whwytwn ydʕyn dʔp lkwn ʔyt hw mrʔ bšmyʔ
04:02	bṣlwtʔ ʔtʔmnw whwytwn ʕyryn ʔntwn bh wmwdyn
04:03	wmṣlyn ʔp ʕlyn dʔlhʔ nptḥ ln trʕʔ dmltʔ lmmllw ʔrzʔ dmšyḥʔ dmṭlth ʔsyr ʔnʔ
04:04	dʔglywhy wʔmllywhy ʔyknʔ dwlʔ ly
04:05	bḥkmtʔ hlkw lwt bryʔ wzbnw qʔrskwn
04:06	wmltkwn bklzbn bṭybwtʔ ʔyk dbmlḥʔ thwʔ mmdkʔ whwytwn ydʕyn lʔnš ʔnš ʔyknʔ wlʔ lkwn lmtbw ptgmʔ
04:07	mdm dlwty dyn nwdʕkwn ṭwkyqws ʔḥʔ ḥbybʔ wmšmšnʔ mhymnʔ wkntn bmryʔ
04:08	hnʔ dšdrt lwtkwn ʕlyh ʕl hdʔ dndʕ mʔ dlwtkwn wnbyʔ lbwtkwn
04:09	ʕm ʔnsymws ʔḥʔ mhymnʔ wḥbybʔ hw dʔytwhy mnkwn hnwn nwdʕwnkwn mdm dlwtn
04:10	šʔl bšlmkwn ʔrsṭrkws šbyʔ dʕmy wmrqws br ddh dbrnbʔ hw dʔtpqdtwn ʕlwhy dʔn ʔtʔ lwtkwn tqblwnyhy
04:11	wyšwʕ hw dmtqrʔ ywsṭws hlyn dʔytyhwn mn gzwrtʔ whnwn blḥwd ʕdrwny bmlkwth dʔlhʔ whnwn hww ly bwyʔʔ
04:12	šʔl bšlmkwn ʔpprʔ hw dmnkwn ʕbdʔ dmšyḥʔ kd bklzbn ʕml ḥlpykwn bṣlwtʔ dtqwmwn gmyrʔ wmšmlyʔ bklh ṣbynh dʔlhʔ
04:13	shd ʔnʔ gyr ʕlwhy dṭnnʔ sgyʔʔ ʔyt lh ḥlpykwn wḥlp hnwn dbldyqyʔ wdbʔyrpwlys
04:14	šʔl bšlmkwn lwqʔ ʔsyʔ ḥbybn wdmʔ
04:15	šʔlw bšlmʔ dʔḥʔ dbldyqyʔ wdnwmpʔ wdʕdtʔ dbbyth
04:16	wmʔ dʔtqryt ʔgrtʔ hdʔ lwtkwn ʕbdw dʔp bʕdtʔ dldyqyʔ ttqrʔ why dʔtktbt mn ldyqyʔ qrʔwh ʔntwn
04:17	wʔmrw lʔrkypws dʔzdhr btšmštʔ hy dqblt bmrn dthwʔ mšmlʔ lh
04:18	šlmʔ hnʔ bʔydʔ dyly dpwlws hwytwn ʕhdyn lʔswry ṭybwtʔ ʕmkwn ʔmyn 
01:01	pwlws wslwnws wṭymtʔs lʕdtʔ dtslwnyqyʔ dbʔlhʔ ʔbʔ wbmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ ṭybwtʔ ʕmkwn wšlmʔ
01:02	mwdynn lʔlhʔ bklzbn ʕl klkwn wmtdkrynn lkwn bṣlwtn ʔmynʔyt
01:03	wʕhdynn qdm ʔlhʔ ʔbʔ ʕbdʔ dhymnwtkwn wʕmlʔ dḥwbkwn wmsybrnwtʔ dsbrkwn dbmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:04	ydʕynn gyr gbywtkwn ʔḥy ḥbybwhy dʔlhʔ
01:05	mṭl dmsbrnwtn lʔ hwʔ bmlʔ blḥwd hwt lwtkwn ʔlʔ ʔp bḥylʔ wbrwḥʔ dqwdšʔ wbpysʔ šryrʔ ʔp ʔntwn ydʕyn ʔntwn ʔyknʔ hwyn byntkwn mṭltkwn
01:06	wʔntwn bn ʔtdmytwn wbmrn dqbltwn mltʔ bʔwlṣnʔ rbʔ wbḥdwtʔ drwḥʔ dqwdšʔ
01:07	whwytwn dmwtʔ lklhwn mhymnʔ dʔyt bmqdwnyʔ wbʔkʔyʔ
01:08	mnkwn gyr ʔštmʕt mlth dmrn lʔ blḥwd bmqdwnyʔ wbʔkʔyʔ ʔlʔ bkl ʔtr hymnwtkwn dbʔlhʔ ʔštmʕt ʔyknʔ dlʔ nstnq dnʔmr ʕlykwn mdm
01:09	hnwn gyr mštʕyn ʔynʔ mʕlnʔ hwʔ ln lwtkwn wʔyknʔ ʔtpnytwn lwt ʔlhʔ mn dḥlt ptkrʔ dtplḥwn lʔlhʔ ḥyʔ wšryrʔ
01:10	kd mskytwn lbrh mn šmyʔ lyšwʕ hw dʔqym mn byt mytʔ dhw mpṣʔ ln mn rwgzʔ dʔtʔ
02:01	wʔntwn ydʕyn ʔntwn ʔḥy dmʕlnn dlwtkwn lʔ hwʔ sryqʔyt hwʔ
02:02	ʔlʔ lwqdm ḥšnn wʔṣṭʕrnn ʔyk dydʕytwn bpylypws whydyn bʔgwnʔ rbʔ mlln ʕmkwn bprhsyʔ dʔlhn sbrth dmšyḥʔ
02:03	bwyʔn gyr lʔ hwʔ mn ṭʕywtʔ ʔplʔ mn ṭnpwtʔ ʔplʔ bnklʔ
02:04	ʔlʔ ʔyk mʔ dbqynn lʔlhʔ dtthymn sbrth hknʔ mmllynn lʔ ʔyk dlbny ʔnšʔ nšpr ʔlʔ lʔlhʔ hw dbqʔ lbwtn
02:05	ʔplʔ gyr mmtwm ʔtḥšḥn bmmllʔ šdlʔ ʔyk dydʕyn ʔntwn wlʔ bʕltʔ dyʕnwtʔ ʔlhʔ shd
02:06	wlʔ bʕyn šwbḥʔ mn bnynšʔ lʔ mnkwn wlʔ mn ʔḥrnʔ kd mškḥyn hwyn yqyrʔ lmhwʔ ʔyk šlyḥʔ dmšyḥʔ
02:07	ʔlʔ hwyn byntkwn mkykʔ wʔyk mrbynytʔ dmḥbbʔ bnyh
02:08	hknʔ ʔp ḥnn mḥbbynn wmswḥynn lmtl lkwn lʔ blḥwd sbrth dʔlhʔ ʔlʔ ʔp npšn mṭl dḥbybyn ʔntwn
02:09	ʕhdyn ʔntwn gyr ʔḥyn dlʔyn hwyn wʕmlyn bʕbd ʔydyn bllyʔ wbʔymmʔ dʕl ḥd mnkwn lʔ nʔqr
02:10	ʔntwn shdyn wʔlhʔ ʔyknʔ ʔkrzn lkwn sbrth dʔlhʔ dkyʔyt wkʔnʔyt wdlʔ ršyn hwyn lwt klhwn mhymnʔ
02:11	ʔyknʔ dydʕyn ʔntwn dmn ḥd ḥd mnkwn ʔyk ʔbʔ mn bnwhy bʕyn hwyn wmlyn hwyn blbkwn wmshdynn lkwn
02:12	dthlkwn ʔyk dyʔʔ lʔlhʔ hw dqrkwn lmlkwth wlšwbḥh
02:13	mṭl hnʔ ʔp ḥnn mwdynn ʔmynʔyt lʔlhʔ dmltʔ dʔlhʔ dqbltwn mnn lʔ hwʔ ʔyk mltʔ dbnynšʔ qbltwnh ʔlʔ ʔyknʔ dʔytyh šryrʔyt mltʔ dʔlhʔ why bʕbdʔ mstʕrʔ bkwn bʔylyn dmhymnyn
02:14	ʔntwn dyn ʔḥy ʔtdmytwn lʕdtʔ dʔlhʔ dbyhwd hlyn dbyšwʕ mšyḥʔ dhkn sybrtwn ʔp ʔntwn mn bny šrbtkwn ʔyknʔ dʔp hnwn mn yhwdyʔ
02:15	hnwn dlmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ qṭlw wlnbyʔ dmnhwn wln rdpw wlʔlhʔ lʔ špryn wʕbydyn sqwblʔ lklhwn bny ʔnšʔ
02:16	dklyn ln dnmll ʕm ʕmmʔ dnḥwn lmšlmw ḥṭhyhwn bklzbn mṭy dyn ʕlyhwn rwgzʔ ʕdmʔ lḥrtʔ
02:17	ḥnn dyn ʔḥyn hwyn ytmʔ mnkwn zbnʔ dšʕtʔ bʔpyn wlʔ blbn wytyrʔyt ʔtḥpṭn lmḥzʔ ʔpykwn bḥwbʔ sgyʔʔ
02:18	wṣbyn dnʔtʔ lwtkwn ʔnʔ pwlws ḥdʔ zbn wtrtyn wʕwkny sṭnʔ
02:19	ʔynw gyr sbrn wḥdwtn wklylʔ dšwbhrn ʔlʔ ʔn ʔntwn qdm mrn yšwʕ bmʔtyth
02:20	ʔntwn ʔnwn gyr tšbwḥtn wḥdwtn
03:01	wmṭl dlʔ ḥmsnn ṣbyn lmpš bʔtnws blḥwdyn
03:02	wnšdr lwtkwn lṭymtʔws ʔḥwn wmšmšnʔ dʔlhʔ wmʕdrnn bsbrth dmšyḥʔ dnšrrkwn wnbʕʔ mnkwn ʕl hymnwtkwn
03:03	dlʔ ʔnš mnkwn ttqṭʕ lh bʔwlṣnʔ hlyn ʔntwn gyr ydʕyn ʔntwn dlhdʔ hw symynn
03:04	ʔp kd lwtkwn hwyn gyr qdmn ʔmrn lkwn dʕtydynn lmtʔlṣw ʔyknʔ dydʕyn ʔntwn dhwʔ
03:05	mṭl hnʔ ʔp ʔnʔ lʔ ḥmsnt ʕdmʔ dšdrt dʔdʕ hymnwtkwn ddlmʔ nnsykwn mnsynʔ wnhwʔ ʕmln sryqʔ 
03:06	hšʔ dyn mn dʔtʔ lwtn ṭymtʔws mn ṣʔdykwn wsbrn ʕl hymnwtkwn wʕl ḥwbkwn wdʔyt lwtkwn ʕwhdnn ṭbʔ bkl ʕdn wswyn ʔntwn lmḥzyn ʔyknʔ dʔp ḥnn lkwn
03:07	mṭl hnʔ ʔtbyʔn bkwn ʔḥyn ʕl klhyn ʕqtn wʔwlṣnyn mṭl hymnwtkwn
03:08	whšʔ hw ḥyynn ʔn ʔntwn ttqymwn bmrn
03:09	ʔydʔ gyr twdytʔ mškḥynn lmprʕ ḥlpykwn lʔlhʔ ʕl kl ḥdwtʔ dḥdynn mṭltkwn
03:10	ʔlʔ dqdm ʔlhʔ ytyrʔyt ntkšp bllyʔ wbʔymmʔ dnḥzʔ ʔpykwn wngmwr mʔ dḥsyrʔ hymnwtkwn
03:11	hw dyn ʔlhʔ ʔbwn wmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ ntrwṣ ʔwrḥn lwtkwn
03:12	wnsgʔ wnytr ḥwbkwn dḥd lwt ḥd wdlwt klnš ʔyknʔ dḥnn mḥbynn lkwn
03:13	wnqym lbwtkwn dlʔ ršyn bqdyšwtʔ qdm ʔlhʔ ʔbwn bmʔtyth dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ dʕm klhwn qdyšwhy
04:01	mkyl ʔḥy bʕynn mnkwn wmtkšpynn lkwn bmrn yšwʕ dʔyk dqbltwn mnn ʔykn wlʔ lkwn dthlkwn wtšprwn lʔlhʔ dytyrʔyt twspwn
04:02	ydʕyn ʔntwn gyr ʔylyn pwqdnʔ yhbn lkwn bmrn yšwʕ
04:03	hnw gyr ṣbynh dʔlhʔ qdyšwtkwn wdthwwn pryqyn mn kl znywtʔ
04:04	wnhwʔ ydʕ ʔnš ʔnš mnkwn lmqnʔ mʔnh bqdyšwtʔ wbʔyqrʔ
04:05	wlʔ bḥšʔ drgtʔ ʔyk šrkʔ dʕmmʔ hnwn dlʔ ydʕyn lʔlhʔ
04:06	wlʔ thwwn mšyḥyn lmʕbr wlmʕlb ʔnš lʔḥwhy bhdʔ ṣbwtʔ mṭl dmrn hw tbwʕʔ ʕl hlyn klhyn ʔyknʔ dʔp mn qdm zbnʔ ʔmrn lkwn wshdn
04:07	lʔ gyr qrkwn ʔlhʔ lṭnpwtʔ ʔlʔ lqdyšwtʔ
04:08	mkyl mn dṭlm lʔ hwʔ lbrnšʔ ṭlm ʔlʔ lʔlhʔ hw dyhb bkwn rwḥh qdyštʔ
04:09	ʕl ḥwbʔ dyn dʔḥʔ lʔ snyqytwn lmktb lkwn ʔntwn gyr qnwmkwn mlpʔ ʔntwn dʔlhʔ dtḥbwn ḥd lḥd
04:10	ʔp ʕbdyn ʔntwn hknʔ lklhwn ʔḥʔ dbklh mqdwnyʔ bʕʔ ʔnʔ dyn mnkwn ʔḥy dttytrwn
04:11	wttḥpṭwn dthwwn šlyn wʕnyn bswʕrnykwn whwytwn plḥyn bʔydykwn ʔyknʔ dpqdnkwn
04:12	dthwwn mhlkyn bʔskmʔ lwt bryʔ wʕl ʔnš lʔ tstnqwn
04:13	ṣbʔ ʔnʔ dyn dtdʕwn ʔḥy dʕl ʔylyn ddmkyn lʔ thwʔ kryʔ lkwn ʔyk šrkʔ dʔnšʔ dsbrʔ lyt lhwn
04:14	ʔn gyr mhymnynn dyšwʕ myt wqm hknʔ ʔp ʔlhʔ lʔylyn ddmkw byšwʕ mytʔ ʕmh
04:15	hdʔ dyn ʔmrynn lkwn bmlth dmrn dḥnn ʔylyn dmštḥrynn bmʔtyth dmrn dḥyynn lʔ ndrk lʔylyn ddmkw
