04:16	mṭl dhw mrn bpwqdnʔ wbqlʔ dryš mlʔkʔ wbqrnʔ dʔlhʔ nḥt mn šmyʔ wmytʔ dbmšyḥʔ nqwmwn lwqdm
04:17	whydyn ḥnn ʔylyn dmštḥrynn dḥyynn ntḥṭp ʕmhwn ʔkḥdʔ bʕnnʔ lʔwrʕh dmrn bʔʔr whknʔ bklzbn ʕm mrn nhwʔ
04:18	hww hkyl mbyʔyn ḥd lḥd bmlʔ hlyn
05:01	ʕl zbnʔ dyn wʕdnʔ ʔḥy lʔ snyqytwn lmktb lkwn
05:02	ʔntwn gyr šryrʔyt ydʕyn ʔntwn dywmh dmrn ʔyk gnbʔ bllyʔ hknʔ ʔtʔ
05:03	kd nʔmrwn dšlmʔ hw wšynʔ whydyn mn šlyʔ nqwm ʕlyhwn ʔbdnʔ ʔyk ḥblʔ ʕl bṭntʔ wlʔ nmdwn
05:04	ʔntwn dyn ʔḥy lʔ hwytwn bḥšwkʔ dhw ywmʔ ʔyk gnbʔ ndrkkwn
05:05	klkwn gyr bny nwhrʔ ʔntwn wbny ʔymmʔ wlʔ hwytwn bny llyʔ wlʔ bny ḥšwkʔ
05:06	lʔ ndmk hkyl ʔyk šrkʔ ʔlʔ hwyn ʕyryn wmhwnyn
05:07	ʔylyn gyr ddmkyn bllyʔ hw dmkyn wʔylyn drwyn bllyʔ hw rwyn
05:08	ḥnn dyn dbny ʔymmʔ ḥnn hwyn ʕyryn brʕynn wlbyšyn šrynʔ dhymnwtʔ wdḥwbʔ wnsym snwrtʔ dsbrʔ dḥyʔ
05:09	mṭl dlʔ smn ʔlhʔ lrwgzʔ ʔlʔ lqnynʔ dḥyʔ bmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
05:10	hw dmyt ʕl ʔpyn dʔn ʕyrynn wʔn dmkynn ʔkḥdʔ ʕmh nḥʔ
05:11	mṭl hnʔ byʔw ḥd lḥd wbnw ḥd lḥd ʔyknʔ dʔp ʕbdytwn
05:12	bʕynn dyn mnkwn ʔḥy dhwytwn ydʕyn lʔylyn dlʔyn bkwn wqymyn bʔpykwn bmrn wmlpyn lkwn
05:13	dhww ḥšybyn lkwn bḥwbʔ ytyrʔ wmṭl ʕbdhwn ʔštynw ʕmhwn
05:14	bʕynn dyn mnkwn ʔḥy rdw lmsklnʔ wlbbw lzʕwry npšʔ wsbw ṭʕnʔ dmḥylʔ wʔgrw rwḥkwn lwt klnš
05:15	wʔzdhrw dlmʔ ʔnš mnkwn byštʔ ḥlp byštʔ nprwʕ ʔlʔ bklzbn hrṭw btr ṭbtʔ lwt ḥddʔ wlwt klnš
05:16	hww ḥdyn bklzbn
05:17	wmṣlyn dlʔ šlwʔ
05:18	wbkl mdm hww mwdyn hnw gyr ṣbynh dʔlhʔ byšwʕ mšyḥʔ bkwn
05:19	rwḥʔ lʔ tdʕkwn
05:20	nbywtʔ lʔ tslwn
05:21	klmdm bqw wdšpyr ʔḥwdw
05:22	wmn kl ṣbw byšʔ ʕrwqw
05:23	hw dyn ʔlhʔ dšlmʔ nqdškwn gmyrʔyt lklkwn wklh rwḥkwn wnpškwn wpgrkwn nnṭr dlʔ ršyn lmʔtyth dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
05:24	mhymn hw mn dqrkwn dhw nʕbd
05:25	ʔḥy ṣlw ʕlyn
05:26	šʔlw bšlmʔ dʔḥyn klhwn bnwšqtʔ qdyštʔ
05:27	mwmʔ ʔnʔ lkwn bmrn dttqrʔ ʔgrtʔ hdʔ lklhwn ʔḥʔ qdyšʔ
05:28	ṭybwth dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʕmkwn ʔmyn
01:01	pwlws wslwnws wṭymtʔws lʕdtʔ dtslwnyqyʔ dbʔlhʔ ʔbwn wmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:02	ṭybwtʔ ʕmkwn wšlmʔ mn ʔlhʔ ʔbwn wmn mrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:03	lmwdyw lʔlhʔ bklzbn ḥybynn ʕlykwn ʔḥy ʔyk mʔ dwlʔ dytyrʔyt rbyʔ hymnwtkwn wsgʔ ḥwbʔ dklkwn dklnš lwt ḥbrh
01:04	ʔyk dʔp ḥnn bkwn nhwʔ mštbhryn ḥnn bʕdtʔ dʔlhʔ ʕl hymnwtkwn wʕl msybrnwtkwn dbklh rdypwtkwn wʔwlṣnykwn dmsybryn ʔntwn
01:05	ltḥwytʔ ddynʔ kʔnʔ dʔlhʔ dtšwwn lmlkwth hy dʕl ʔpyh ḥšytwn
01:06	wʔn kʔnʔ qdm ʔlhʔ dnprwʕ ʔwlṣnʔ lʔlwṣykwn
01:07	wlkwn dmtʔlṣytwn nḥʔ ʕmn bglynh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ dmn šmyʔ ʕm ḥylʔ dmlʔkwhy
01:08	mʔ dʕbd tbʕtʔ bgwzlʔ dnwrʔ mn hnwn dlʔ ydʕw lʔlhʔ wmn hnwn dlʔ ʔštwdʕw lsbrth dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:09	dhnwn bdynʔ ntprʕwn ʔbdnʔ dlʕlm mn prṣwph dmrn wmn šwbḥʔ dḥylh
01:10	mʔ dʔtʔ dnštbḥ bqdyšwhy wnḥwʔ tdmrth bmhymnwhy dtthymn shdwtn dʕlykwn bhw ywmʔ
01:11	mṭl hnʔ bklzbn mṣlynn ʕlykwn dnšwykwn ʔlhʔ lqrynkwn wnmlykwn klh ṣbynʔ dṭbtʔ wʕbdʔ dhymnwtʔ bḥylʔ
01:12	dnštbḥ bkwn šmh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʔp ʔntwn bh ʔyk ṭybwth dʔlhn wmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
02:01	bʕynn dyn mnkwn ʔḥy ʕl mʔtyth dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ wʕl knwšyʔ dyln dlwth
02:02	dlʔ ʕgl ttzyʕwn brʕynykwn wlʔ ttwhwn lʔ mn mltʔ wlʔ mn rwḥʔ wlʔ mn ʔgrtʔ dʔyk dmn lwtn hy dhʔ lm mṭy ywmh dmrn
02:03	lmʔ ʔnš nṭʕykwn bḥd mn ʔskmyn mṭl dʔn lʔ tʔtʔ lwqdm mrwdwtʔ wntglʔ brnšʔ dḥṭytʔ brh dʔbdnʔ
02:04	hw dlqwblʔ hw wmštʕlʔ ʕl kl mn dmtqrʔ ʔlh wdḥlʔ ʔyknʔ dʔp bhyklʔ dʔlhʔ ʔyk ʔlhʔ ntb wnḥwʔ ʕl npšh ʔyk dʔlhʔ hw
02:05	lʔ ʕhdytwn dkd lwtkwn hwyt hlyn ʔmrt hwyt lkwn
02:06	whšʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn mʔ dʔḥyd dntglʔ hw bzbnh
02:07	ʔrzʔ gyr dʕwlʔ mn kdw šry lmtḥpṭw blḥwd ʔn hw mʔ dhšʔ ʔḥyd nštql mn mṣʕtʔ
02:08	whydyn ntglʔ ʕwlʔ hw dmrn yšwʕ nsypywhy brwḥ pwmh wnbṭlywhy bglynʔ dmʔtyth
02:09	mʔtyth gyr dhw bmʕbdnwtʔ hy dsṭnʔ bkl ḥyl wʔtwtʔ wtdmrtʔ dgltʔ
02:10	wbklh ṭwʕyy dʕwlʔ dhwyʔ bʔbydʔ ʕl dlʔ qblw ḥwbʔ dqwštʔ dbh nḥwn
02:11	mṭlhnʔ nšdr lhwn ʔlhʔ mʕbdnwtʔ dṭwʕyy dnhymnwn lšwqrʔ
02:12	wntdynwn klhwn ʔylyn dlʔ hymnw bqwštʔ ʔlʔ ʔṣṭbyw bʕwlʔ
02:13	ḥnn dyn ḥybynn lmwdyw lʔlhʔ bklzbn ʕl ʔpykwn ʔḥyn ḥbybwhy dmrn dgbkwn ʔlhʔ mn ršytʔ lḥyʔ bqdyšwtʔ drwḥʔ wbhymnwtʔ dšrrʔ
02:14	lhlyn hw gyr qrkwn bmsbrnwtʔ dyln dthwwn tšbwḥtʔ lmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
02:15	mkyl ʔḥy ʔtqymw wḥmsnw bpwqdnʔ dylptwn ʔn bmltʔ wʔn bʔgrtʔ dyln
02:16	hw dyn mrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ wʔlhʔ ʔbwn hw dʔḥbn wyhb ln bwyʔʔ dlʕlm wsbrʔ ṭbʔ bṭybwth
02:17	nbyʔ lbwtkwn wnqym bkl mlʔ wbkl ʕbd ṭb
03:01	mn hšʔ ʔḥyn ṣlw ʕlyn dmlth dmrn thwʔ rhṭʔ wmštbḥʔ bkl dwkʔ ʔyk dlwtkwn
03:02	wdntpṣʔ mn bnynšʔ byšʔ wʕntʔ lw gyr dklnš hy hymnwtʔ
03:03	mhymn hw dyn mryʔ dhw nnṭrkwn wnšwzbkwn mn byšʔ
03:04	tkylynn dyn ʕlykwn bmrn dmdm dmpqdynn lkwn ʕbdtwn ʔp ʕbdytwn
03:05	wmrn ntrwṣ lbwtkwn lḥwbh dʔlhʔ wlms<y>brnwth dmšyḥʔ
03:06	mpqdynn lkwn dyn ʔḥy bšmh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ dhwytwn pryqyn mn kl ʔḥʔ ʔynʔ dbyš byš mhlk wlʔ ʔyk pwqdnʔ dqblw mnn
03:07	ʔntwn gyr ydʕyn ʔntwn ʔyknʔ wlʔ lmtdmyw bn dlʔ hlkn byš byš byntkwn
03:08	ʔplʔ lḥmʔ dmgn ʔkln mn ʔnš mnkwn ʔlʔ bʕmlʔ wblʔwtʔ bllyʔ wbʔymmʔ plḥyn hwyn dʕl ʔnš mnkwn lʔ nʔqr
03:09	lʔ hwʔ mṭl dlʔ šlyṭ ln ʔlʔ dbnpšn ntl lkwn ṭwpsʔ dbn ttdmwn
03:10	ʔp kd lwtkwn hwyn gyr hdʔ mpqdyn hwyn lkwn dkl dlʔ ṣbʔ dnplwḥ ʔplʔ nlʕs
03:11	šmʕynn gyr dʔyt bkwn ʔnšʔ dbyš byš mhlkyn wmdm lʔ plḥyn ʔlʔ ʔn sryqtʔ
03:12	lhwn dyn lhlyn mpqdynn wbʕynn mnhwn bmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ dbšlyʔ nhwwn plḥyn wʔklyn lḥmhwn
03:13	ʔntwn dyn ʔḥy lʔ tmʔn lkwn lmʕbd dšpyr
03:14	wʔn ʔnš lʔ mštmʕ lmlyn hlyn dbʔgrtʔ ntprš lkwn hnʔ wlʔ hwytwn mtḥlṭyn ʕmh dnbht
03:15	wlʔ ʔyk bʕldbbʔ tʔḥdwnh ʔlʔ hwytwn mrtyn lh ʔyk dlʔḥʔ
03:16	hw dyn mrh dšlmʔ ntl lkwn šlmʔ bklzbn bklmdm mrn ʕm klkwn
03:17	šlmʔ bktbt ʔydy ʔnʔ pwlws ktbt dʔytwhy ʔtʔ dbklhyn ʔgrty hknʔ ktb ʔnʔ
03:18	ṭybwth dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʕm klkwn ʔmyn 
01:01	pwlws šlyḥʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ bpwqdnʔ dʔlhʔ mḥynn wdmšyḥʔ yšwʕ sbrn
01:02	lṭymtʔws brʔ šryrʔ bhymnwtʔ ṭybwtʔ wrḥmʔ wšlmʔ mn ʔlhʔ ʔbwn wmšyḥʔ yšwʕ mrn
01:03	bʕyt hwyt mnk kd ʔzl ʔnʔ lmqdwnyʔ dtqwʔ bʔpsws wtpqd lʔnš ʔnš dlʔ nlpwn ywlpnʔ mšḥlpʔ
01:04	wlʔ ntrmwn lšwʕytʔ wltšʕytʔ dšrbtʔ dskʔ lyt lhwn hlyn dḥrynʔ hw ʕbdn ytyrʔyt wlʔ bnynʔ bhymnwtʔ dʔlhʔ
01:05	skh dyn dpwqdnʔ ʔytwhy ḥwbʔ dmn lbʔ dkyʔ wmn tʔrtʔ ṭbtʔ wmn hymnwtʔ šryrtʔ
01:06	wmnhyn mn hlyn ṭʕw ʔnšʔ wsṭw lmlʔ sryqtʔ
01:07	bdbʕw lmhwʔ mlpnʔ dnmwsʔ kd lʔ mstklyn mdm dmmllyn wlʔ mdm dʕlwhy mtḥryn
01:08	ydʕynn dyn dnmwsʔ špyr hw ʔn ʔnš ʔkwth dnmwsʔ ntdbr bh
01:09	kd ydʕ dlkʔnʔ nmwsʔ lʔ sym ʔlʔ lʕwlʔ wlmrwdʔ wlršyʕʔ wlḥṭyʔ wlʕntʔ wlʔylyn dlʔ dkyn wlʔylyn dmḥyn lʔbhyhwn wlʔylyn dmḥyn lʔmhthwn wlqṭwlʔ
01:10	wlznyʔ wlškby ʕm dkrʔ wlgnby bny ḥʔrʔ wldglʔ wlʕbry ʕl mwmtʔ wlklmdm dʔytwhy sqwblʔ lywlpnʔ ḥlymʔ
01:11	dʔwnglywn dtšbwḥth dʔlhʔ mbrkʔ hw dʔnʔ ʔthymnt
01:12	wmwdʔ ʔnʔ lh dḥylny lmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ dḥšbny mhymnʔ wsmny ltšmšth
01:13	ly dmn qdym mgdpn hwyt wrdwp wmṣʕrn ʔlʔ ʔtḥnnt mṭl dkd lʔ ydʕ hwyt ʕbdt dlʔ hymnwtʔ
01:14	sgyt by dyn ṭybwth dmrn whymnwtʔ wḥwbʔ dbyšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:15	mhymnʔ hy mltʔ wšwyʔ hy lmqblwth dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʔtʔ lʕlmʔ lmḥyw lḥṭyʔ dqdmyhwn ʔnʔ ʔnʔ
01:16	ʔlʔ mṭl hnʔ rḥm ʕly dby qdmʔ nḥwʔ yšwʕ mšyḥʔ klh mgrtrwḥh ltḥwytʔ dʔylyn dʕtydyn dnhymnwn bh lḥyʔ dlʕlm
01:17	lmlkʔ dyn dʕlmʔ lhw dlʔ mtḥbl wlʔ mtḥzʔ dhwyw ḥd ʔlhʔ ʔyqrʔ wtšbwḥtʔ lʕlm ʕlmyn ʔmyn
01:18	hnʔ pwqdnʔ mgʕl ʔnʔ lk bry ṭymtʔws ʔyk nbywtʔ qdmytʔ dhwy ʕlyk dtplwḥ bhyn plḥwtʔ hdʔ špyrtʔ
01:19	bhymnwtʔ wbtʔrtʔ ṭbtʔ ʔylyn gyr dlhdʔ dḥqw mnhwn mn hymnwtʔ ʔstrqw
01:20	ʔyk hwmnʔws wʔlksndrws hlyn dʔšlmt lsṭnʔ dntrdwn dlʔ nhwwn mgdpyn
02:01	bʕʔ ʔnʔ hkyl mnk dmn qdm klmdm bʕwtʔ thwʔ mqrb lʔlhʔ wṣlwtʔ wtḥnntʔ wtwdytʔ ḥlp klhwn bnynšʔ
02:02	ḥlp mlkʔ wrwrbnʔ dʕwmrʔ šlyʔ wnyḥʔ nʕmr bklh dḥlt ʔlhʔ wdkywtʔ
02:03	hdʔ gyr špyrʔ wmqblʔ qdm ʔlhʔ mḥynn
02:04	hw dṣbʔ dklhwn bnynšʔ nḥwn wntpnwn lydʕtʔ dšrrʔ
02:05	ḥd hw gyr ʔlhʔ wḥd hw mṣʕyʔ dʔlhʔ wdbnynšʔ brnšʔ yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
02:06	hw dyhb npšh pwrqnʔ ḥlp kl ʔnš shdwtʔ dʔtt bzbnh
02:07	hy dʔnʔ ʔtsymt krwzh wšlyḥh qwštʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ wlʔ mdgl ʔnʔ dhwyt mlpnʔ dʕmmʔ bhymnwtʔ dšrrʔ
02:08	ṣbʔ ʔnʔ hkyl dhww mṣlyn gbrʔ bkl dwkʔ kd mrymyn ʔydyhwn dkyʔyt dlʔ rwgzʔ wdlʔ mḥšbtʔ
02:09	hknʔ ʔp nšʔ bʔskmʔ nkpʔ dlbwšʔ btḥmṣtʔ wbnkpwtʔ nhwʔ tṣbythyn lʔ bgdwlʔ wbdhbʔ ʔw bmrgnytʔ ʔw bnḥtʔ špyrʔ
02:10	ʔlʔ bʕbdʔ ṭbʔ ʔyknʔ dyʔʔ lnšʔ dmštwdyn dḥlt ʔlhʔ
02:11	ʔnttʔ bšlyʔ hwt ylpʔ bkl šwʕbd
02:12	lʔnttʔ gyr lmlpw lʔ mps ʔnʔ wlʔ lmmrḥw ʕl gbrʔ ʔlʔ thwʔ bšlyʔ
02:13	ʔdm gyr ʔtgbl lwqdm whydyn ḥwʔ
02:14	wʔdm lʔ ṭʕʔ ʔnttʔ dyn ṭʕt wʕbrt ʕl pwqdnʔ
02:15	ḥyʔ dyn byd yldyh ʔn nqwwn bhymnwtʔ wbḥwbʔ wbqdyšwtʔ wbnkpwtʔ
03:01	mhymnʔ hy mltʔ dʔn ʔnš rʔg qšyšwtʔ ʕbdʔ ṭbʔ rʔg
03:02	wlʔ dyn dnhwʔ qšyšʔ ʔynʔ dmwmʔ lʔ mštkḥ bh whwʔ bʕlʔ dḥdʔ ʔnttʔ ʔynʔ dʕyr rʕynh wnkp wmṭks wrḥm ʔksnyʔ wmlpn
03:03	wlʔ ʕbr ʕl ḥmrʔ wlʔ rhṭʔ ʔydh lmmḥʔ ʔlʔ nhwʔ mkyk wlʔ nṣy wlʔ rḥm kspʔ
03:04	wmdbr byth špyr wʔḥyd bnwhy bšwʕbdʔ bklh dkywtʔ
03:05	ʔn gyr bytʔ dnpšh lʔ ydʕ dndbr špyr ʔyknʔ mškḥ ʕdth dʔlhʔ dndbr
03:06	wlʔ nhwʔ ṭlʔ twlmdh dlʔ ntrym wnpl bdynh dsṭnʔ
03:07	wlʔ dyn dʔp shdwtʔ špyrtʔ ʔyt lh mn bryʔ dlʔ npl bḥsdʔ wbpḥʔ dsṭnʔ
03:08	wʔp mšmšnʔ hknʔ nhwwn dkyn wlʔ nmllwn trtyn wlʔ nhwwn ṣlyn lḥmrʔ sgyʔʔ wlʔ nrḥmwn ywtrnʔ ṭnpʔ
03:09	ʔlʔ nʔḥdwn ʔrzʔ dhymnwtʔ btʔrtʔ dkytʔ
03:10	whnwn hlyn ntbqwn lwqdm whydyn nšmšwn kd ʔytyhwn dlʔ ršyn 
03:11	hknʔ ʔp nšʔ nhwyn nkpn wnhwʔ ʕyr rʕynhyn wnhwyn mhymnn bkl mdm wlʔ nhwyn ʔkln qrṣʔ
03:12	mšmšnʔ nhwwn ʔynʔ dḥdʔ ʔnttʔ hwt lh wdbr bnwhy wbyth špyr
03:13	ʔylyn gyr dšmšw špyr drgʔ ṭbʔ qnyn lnpšhwn wmglʔ ʔpʔ sgyʔʔ bhymnwtʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ
03:14	hlyn ktb ʔnʔ lk kd msbr ʔnʔ dbʕgl ʔtʔ ʔnʔ lwtk
03:15	wʔn hw dyn dmwḥr ʔnʔ dtdʕ ʔyknʔ wlʔ lmthpkw bbyth dʔlhʔ dʔytyh ʕdtʔ dʔlhʔ ḥyʔ ʕmwdʔ wštʔstʔ dšrrʔ
03:16	wšryrʔyt rb hw ʔrzʔ hnʔ dkʔnwtʔ dʔtgly bbsr wʔzddq brwḥ wʔtḥzy lmlʔkʔ wʔtkrz byt ʕmmʔ wʔthymn bʕlmʔ wʔstlq bšwbḥʔ
04:01	rwḥʔ dyn pšyqʔyt ʔmrʔ dbzbnʔ ʔḥryʔ nprqwn ʔnš ʔnš mn hymnwtʔ wnʔzlwn btr rwḥʔ ṭʕytʔ wbtr ywlpnʔ dšʔdʔ
04:02	hlyn dbʔskmʔ dglʔ mṭʕyn wmmllyn kdbwtʔ wkwyn btʔrthwn
04:03	wklyn lmzdwgw wmprqyn mn mʔkltʔ ʔylyn dʔlhʔ brʔ ʔnyn lḥwšḥʔ wltwdytʔ lʔylyn dmhymnyn wydʕyn šrrʔ
04:04	mṭl dkl dbrʔ lʔlhʔ špyr hw wlyt mdm dmsly ʔn btwdytʔ ntnsb
04:05	mtqdš gyr bmltʔ dʔlhʔ wbṣlwtʔ
04:06	hlyn ʔn thwʔ mlp lʔḥyk mšmšnʔ ṭbʔ thwʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ kd mtrbʔ ʔnt bmlʔ dhymnwtʔ wbywlpnʔ ṭbʔ dylyp ʔnt
04:07	mn šwʕytʔ dyn pkyhtʔ dsbtʔ ʔštʔl wdrš npšk bkʔnwtʔ
04:08	dwršʔ gyr dpgrʔ zbnʔ hw zʕwrʔ mwtr kʔnwtʔ dyn bklmdm mwtrʔ wʔyt lh šwwdyʔ dḥyʔ dzbnʔ hnʔ wdʕtyd
04:09	mhymnʔ hy mltʔ wšwyʔ hy lmqblwth
04:10	mṭl hdʔ hw gyr lʔynn wmtḥsdynn dmsbrynn bʔlhʔ ḥyʔ dʔytwhy mḥynʔ dbnynšʔ klhwn ytyrʔyt dmhymnʔ
04:11	hlyn ʔlp wpqd
04:12	wlʔ ʔnš nbsʔ ʕl ṭlywtk ʔlʔ hwy dmwtʔ lmhymnʔ bmltʔ wbhwpkʔ wbḥwbʔ wbhymnwtʔ wbdkywtʔ
04:13	ʕd ʔtʔ ʔnʔ ʔtḥpṭ bqrynʔ wbbʕwtʔ wbywlpnʔ
04:14	wlʔ tbsʔ bmwhbtʔ dʔyt bk hy dʔtyhbt lk bnbywtʔ wbsym ʔydʔ dqšyšwtʔ
04:15	bhlyn ʔthgʔ wbhyn hwy dttydʕ lklnš dlqdmyk ʔtʔ ʔnt
04:16	wʔzdhr bnpšk wbywlpnk wḥmsn bhwn kd hlyn gyr tʕbd npšk tḥʔ wlʔylyn dšmʕyn lk
05:01	bqšyšʔ lʔ tgʕwr ʔlʔ ʔpysyhy ʔyk dlʔbʔ wlʔylyn dṭlyn ʔyk dlʔḥyk
05:02	wlqšyštʔ ʔyk ʔmhtʔ wlʔylyn dṭlyn ʔyk dlʔḥwtk bklh dkywtʔ
05:03	lʔrmltʔ yqr lʔylyn dʔrmltʔ ʔnyn bšrrʔ
05:04	wʔn ʔyt ʔrmltʔ dʔyt lh bnyʔ ʔw bny bnyʔ nʔlpwn lwqdm dbbny bythwn nzddqwn wnprʕwn ḥwblʔ lʔbhyhwn hdʔ gyr mqblʔ qdm ʔlhʔ
05:05	ʔydʔ dyn dšryrʔyt ʔrmltʔ hy wmšwḥdtʔ hdʔ sbrh ʕl ʔlhʔ hw wʔmynʔ bṣlwtʔ wbbʕwtʔ bllyʔ wbʔymmʔ
05:06	ʔydʔ dyn dplḥʔ ʔsṭrnyʔ mytʔ hy kd ḥyʔ
05:07	hlyn hwyt mpqd lhyn ddlʔ ršyn nhwyn
05:08	ʔn ʔnš gyr dʔylyn ddylh ʔnwn wytyrʔyt dʔylyn dʔytyhwn bny bytʔ dhymnwtʔ lʔ yṣp hnʔ kpr lh bhymnwtʔ wbyš hw mn ʔylyn dlʔ mhymnyn
05:09	hwyt hkyl gbʔ ʔrmltʔ ʔydʔ dlʔ bṣyrʔ mn štyn šnyn ʔydʔ dlḥd hw gbrʔ hwt
05:10	wʔyt lh shdwtʔ dʕbdʔ špyrʔ ʔn rbyt bnyʔ ʔn qblt ʔksnyʔ ʔn ʔšygt rglyhwn dqdyšʔ ʔn ʔrwḥt lʔlyṣʔ ʔn hlkt bkl ʕbd ṭb
05:11	mn ʔrmltʔ dyn ʔylyn dṭlyn ʔštʔl mṣṭryn lhyn gyr ʕl mšyḥʔ wbʕyn lmhwʔ lgbrʔ
05:12	wdynhyn qym hw dṭlm hymnwthyn qdmytʔ
05:13	ylpn dyn ʔp ḥbnnwtʔ kd mtkrkn byt btʔ wlʔ blḥwd ḥbnnwtʔ ʔlʔ ʔp dnsgyn mmllʔ wnprqn sryqtʔ wnmlln mdm dlʔ wlʔ
05:14	ṣbʔ ʔnʔ hkyl dʔylyn dṭlyn nzdwgn wnʔldn bnyʔ wndbrn btyhyn wlʔ ntln lbʕldbbʔ ʔplʔ ḥdʔ ʕltʔ dṣwḥytʔ
05:15	ʕl dhšʔ gyr šryw ʔnš ʔnš msṭʔ btr sṭnʔ
05:16	ʔn ʔnš mhymnʔ ʔw mhymntʔ ʔyt lhwn ʔrmltʔ ntrswn ʔnyn wlʔ nʔqrn ʕl ʕdtʔ dlʔylyn dʔrmltʔ ʔnyn dšrrʔ tspq
05:17	qšyšʔ ʔylyn dšpyr mtdbryn lʔyqrʔ ʕpypʔ nšwwn ytyrʔyt ʔylyn dlʔyn bmltʔ wbywlpnʔ
05:18	ʔmr gyr ktbʔ dlʔ tblwm twrʔ bdrktʔ wšwʔ hw pʕlʔ ʔgrh
05:19	ʕl qšyšʔ qṭgrnwtʔ lʔ tqbl ʔlʔ ʕl pwm tryn wtltʔ shdyn
05:20	lʔylyn dḥṭyn qdm klnš kwn dʔp šrkʔ dʔnšʔ ndḥlwn
05:21	mshd ʔnʔ lk qdm ʔlhʔ wmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ wmlʔkwhy gbyʔ dhlyn tṭr wlʔ ntqdm rʕynk lmdm wlʔ tsʕwr mdm bmsb bʔpʔ 
05:22	ʔydʔ bʕgl ʕl ʔnš lʔ tsym wlʔ tštwtp bḥṭhʔ nwkryʔ npšk ṭr bdkywtʔ
05:23	wmkyl myʔ lʔ tštʔ ʔlʔ ḥmrʔ qlyl hwyt štʔ mṭl ʔsṭwmkk wmṭl kwrhnyk ʔmynʔ
05:24	ʔyt bnynšʔ dḥṭhyhwn ydyʕyn ʔnwn wmqdmyn lhwn lbyt dynʔ wʔyt dbtrhwn ʔzlyn
05:25	hknʔ ʔp ʕbdʔ ṭbʔ ydyʕyn ʔnwn wʔylyn dʔḥrnyʔyt ʔnwn lmṭšʔ lʔ mškḥyn
06:01	ʔylyn dʔytyhwn tḥyt nyrʔ dʕbdwtʔ lmryhwn bkl ʔyqr nʔḥdwn dlʔ nhwʔ šmh dʔlhʔ wywlpnh mtgdp
06:02	ʔylyn dyn dʔyt lhwn mryʔ mhymnʔ lʔ nbswn bhwn ʕl dʔḥyhwn ʔnwn ʔlʔ ytyrʔyt nšmšwn ʔnwn ʕl dmhymnʔ ʔnwn wḥbybʔ hlyn dmttnyḥyn btšmšthwn hlyn ʔlp wbʕy mnhwn
06:03	ʔn dyn ʔyt ʔnš dmlp ywlpnʔ ʔḥrnʔ wlʔ mtqrb lmlʔ ḥlymtʔ dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ wlywlpnʔ ddḥlt ʔlhʔ
06:04	hnʔ mtrym kd mdm lʔ ydʕ ʔlʔ kryh bdršʔ wbbʕtʔ dmlʔ dmnhyn hwʔ ḥsmʔ wḥrynʔ wgwdpʔ wmsm brʕynʔ byšʔ
06:05	wšḥqʔ dbnynšʔ ʔylyn dmḥbl rʕynhwn wglyzyn mn qwštʔ wsbryn dtgwrtʔ hy dḥlt ʔlhʔ ʔnt dyn ʔtrḥq mn hlyn
06:06	tʔgwrtn gyr dyln rbʔ hy dʔytyh dḥlt ʔlhʔ bḥšḥtʔ dmstn
06:07	mdm gyr lʔ ʔʕln lʕlmʔ wydyʕʔ dʔplʔ dnpq mnh mškḥynn
06:08	mṭl hnʔ spqʔ ln mʔkwltʔ wtksytʔ
06:09	ʔylyn dyn dṣbyn lmʕtr nplyn bnsywnʔ wbpḥʔ wbrgygtʔ sgyʔtʔ dskln wmsgpn wmṭbʕn
06:10	ʕqrʔ dyn dkwlhyn byštʔ ʔytyh rḥmt kspʔ wʔyt ʔnšʔ dʔtrgrgw lh wmn hymnwtʔ ṭʕw wnpšhwn ʔʕlw ldʔwnʔ sgyʔʔ
06:11	ʔnt dyn ʔw brnšʔ dʔlhʔ mn hlyn ʕrwq whrṭ btr zdyqwtʔ wbtr kʔnwtʔ wbtr hymnwtʔ wbtr ḥwbʔ wbtr msybrnwtʔ wbtr mkykwtʔ
06:12	wʔtktš bʔgwnʔ ṭbʔ dhymnwtʔ wʔdrk ḥyʔ dlʕlm dlhwn ʔtqryt wʔwdyt twdytʔ ṭbtʔ qdm shdʔ sgyʔʔ
06:13	mshd ʔnʔ lk qdm ʔlhʔ hw dmḥʔ kl wyšwʕ mšyḥʔ hw dʔshd qdm pnṭyws pylṭws shdwtʔ špyrtʔ
06:14	dtṭrywhy pwqdnʔ dlʔ ṭwlšʔ wdlʔ mwmʔ ʕdmʔ lglynh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
06:15	hw dʕtyd bzbnh nḥwywhy ʔlhʔ mbrkʔ wḥyltnʔ blḥwdwhy mlkʔ dmlkʔ wmrʔ dmrwtʔ
06:16	hw dhw blḥwdwhy lʔ mtḥbl wʕmr bnwhrʔ dʔnš lʔmškḥ dntqrb lh wʔnš mn bnynšʔ lʔ ḥzyhy wʔplʔ mṣʔ lmḥzyh hw dlh ʔyqrʔ wšwlṭnʔ lʕlm ʕlmyn ʔmyn
06:17	lʕtyrʔ dʕlmʔ hnʔ pqd dlʔ ntrymwn brʕynyhwn wlʔ nttklwn ʕl ʕwtrʔ dlyt ʕlwhy twklnʔ ʔlʔ ʕl ʔlhʔ ḥyʔ hw dyhb ln kl ʕtyrʔyt lnyḥn
06:18	wnʕbdwn ʕbdʔ ṭbʔ wnʕtrwn bswʕrnʔ špyrʔ wnhwwn dlylyn lmtl wlmštwtpw
06:19	wnsymwn lnpšhwn štʔstʔ ṭbtʔ lmdm dʕtyd dndrkwn ḥyʔ šryrʔ
06:20	ʔw ṭymtʔʔ ʔzdhr bmdm dʔtgʕl lk wʕrwq mn bnt qlʔ sryqtʔ wmn hpktʔ dydʕtʔ dgltʔ
06:21	ʔylyn gyr dmštwdyn lh ṭʕw lhwn mn hymnwtʔ ṭybwtʔ ʕmk ʔmyn
01:01	pwlws šlyḥʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ bṣbynh dʔlhʔ wbmwlknʔ dḥyʔ dbyšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:02	lṭymtʔws brʔ ḥbybʔ ṭybwtʔ wrḥmʔ wšlmʔ mn ʔlhʔ ʔbʔ wmn mrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:03	mwdʔ ʔnʔ lʔlhʔ hw dlh mšmš ʔnʔ mn ʔbhty btʔrtʔ dkytʔ dʔmynʔyt mtdkr ʔnʔ lk bṣlwty dllyʔ wdʔymmʔ
01:04	wswʔ ʔnʔ lmḥzyk wmtdkr ʔnʔ dmʕyk dʔtmlʔ ḥdwtʔ
01:05	bʕwhdnʔ dhwʔ ly bhymnwtk šryrtʔ hy dšrt lwqdm bʔmʔ dʔmk lwʔys wbʔmk ʔwnyqʔ mps ʔnʔ dyn dʔp bk
01:06	mṭl hnʔ mʕhd ʔnʔ lk dtʕyr mwhbtʔ dʔlhʔ hy dʔyt bk bsym ʔydy
01:07	lʔ gyr yhb ln ʔlhʔ rwḥʔ ddḥltʔ ʔlʔ dḥylʔ wdḥwbʔ wdmrtynwtʔ
01:08	lʔ hkyl tbht bshdwth dmrn ʔplʔ by bʔsyrh ʔlʔ šqwl byštʔ ʕm ʔwnglywn bḥylʔ dʔlhʔ
01:09	hw dʔḥyn wqrn bqrynʔ qdyšʔ lw ʔyk ʕbdyn ʔlʔ ʔyk ṣbynh wṭybwth hy dʔtyhbt ln byšwʕ mšyḥʔ mn qdm zbnʔ dʕlmʔ
01:10	wʔtglyt hšʔ bglynh dmḥynn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ dbṭl lmwtʔ wḥwy ḥyʔ wlʔ mtḥblnwtʔ bʔwnglywn
01:11	hw dʔttsymt bh ʔnʔ krwzʔ wšlyḥʔ wmlpnʔ dʕmmʔ
01:12	mṭl hdʔ msybr ʔnʔ hlyn wlʔ bht ʔnʔ ydʕ ʔnʔ gyr bmn hymnt wmps ʔnʔ dmṭyʔ bʔydwhy gwʕlny lmṭr ly lywmʔ hw
01:13	nhwyn lk ḥwrʔ mlʔ ḥlymtʔ dšmʕt mny bhymnwtʔ wbḥwbʔ dbyšwʕ mšyḥʔ 
01:14	gwʕlnʔ ṭbʔ ṭr brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ hy dʕmrt bn
01:15	ydʕ ʔnt hdʔ dhpkw mny klhwn hlyn dbʔsyʔ dʔytyhwn mnhwn pwglws whrmgnws
01:16	ntl mrn rḥmʔ lbyth dʔnsypwrws dzbnyn sgyʔn ʔnyḥny wbššltʔ dʔswry lʔ bht
01:17	ʔlʔ ʔp kd ʔtʔ lrhwmy bḥpyṭwtʔ bʕny wʔškḥny
01:18	ntl lh mrn dnškḥ rḥmʔ lwt mrn bywmʔ hw wkmʔ dšmšny bʔpsws ytyrʔyt ydʕ ʔnt
02:01	ʔnt hkyl bry ʔtḥyl bṭybwtʔ dbyšwʕ mšyḥʔ
02:02	wʔylyn dšmʕt mny byd shdʔ sgyʔʔ hnyn ʔgʕl lʔnšʔ mhymnʔ ʔylyn dmṭyʔ bʔydyhwn ʔp lʔḥrnʔ lmlpw
02:03	wsybr byštʔ ʔyk plḥʔ ṭbʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ
02:04	lʔ ʔnš plḥ wmtpkr bṣbwtʔ dʕlmʔ dnšpr lhw mn dgbyhy
02:05	wʔn mtktš ʔnš lʔ mtkll ʔn bnmwsh lʔ mtktš
02:06	lʔkrʔ dlʔʔ wlʔ lh dqdmʔ mn pʔrwhy nstybr
02:07	ʔstkl mdm dʔmr ʔnʔ ntl lk mrn ḥkmtʔ bkl mdm
02:08	ʔtdkr lyšwʕ mšyḥʔ dqm mn byt mytʔ hw dʔytwhy mn zrʕʔ ddwyd ʔyk ʔwnglywn dyly
02:09	dbh sbl ʔnʔ byštʔ ʕdmʔ lʔswrʔ ʔyk ʕbd byštʔ ʔlʔ mlth dʔlhʔ lʔ ʔsyrʔ
02:10	mṭl hnʔ klmdm msybr ʔnʔ mṭl gbyʔ dʔp hnwn nškḥwn ḥyʔ dbyšwʕ dbyšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʕm šwbḥʔ dlʕlm
02:11	mhymnʔ hy mltʔ ʔn gyr mytn ʕmh ʔp ʕmh nḥʔ
02:12	wʔn nsybr ʔp nmlk ʕmh ʔn dyn nkpwr bh ʔp hw nkpwr bn
02:13	wʔn lʔ nhymn bh hw bhymnwth mqwʔ dnkpwr gyr bnpšh lʔ mškḥ
02:14	hlyn hwyt mʕhd lhwn wmshd qdm mrn dlʔ nhwwn mtḥryn bmlʔ dlʔ ywtrn lswḥpʔ dʔylyn dšmʕyn lhyn
02:15	wntbṭl lk dtqym npšk gmyrʔyt qdm ʔlhʔ plḥʔ dlʔ bhttʔ dmkrz tryṣʔyt mltʔ dšrrʔ
02:16	wmn mlʔ sryqtʔ dlyt bhyn ḥšḥw ʔštʔl ytyrʔyt gyr nwspwn ʕl rwšʕhwn hnwn dʕnyn bhyn
02:17	wmlthwn ʔyk ḥldytʔ nwmʔ tʔḥwd bsgyʔʔ ʔytwhy dyn ḥd mnhwn hwmnʔws wʔḥrnʔ pylṭws
02:18	hlyn dṭʕw mn šrrʔ kd ʔmryn dqymtʔ dmytʔ hwt lh whymnwtʔ dʔnš ʔnš mhpkyn
02:19	štʔstʔ dyn šryrtʔ dʔlhʔ qymʔ hy wʔyt lh ḥtmʔ hnʔ wydʕ mryʔ lʔylyn ddylh ʔnwn wnprwq mn ʕwlʔ kl dqrʔ lšmh dmryʔ
02:20	bbytʔ dyn rbʔ lʔ hwʔ mʔnʔ ddhbʔ blḥwd ʔw dsʔmʔ ʔyt bh ʔlʔ ʔp dqysʔ ʔp dpḥrʔ mnhwn lʔyqrʔ wmnhwn lṣʕrʔ
02:21	ʔn ʔnš hkyl ndkʔ npšh mn hlyn hwʔ mʔnʔ dkyʔ lʔyqrʔ dʕhn lḥwšḥʔ dmrh wmṭyb lkl ʕbd ṭb
02:22	mn klhyn rgygtʔ dṭlywtʔ ʕrwq whrṭ btr kʔnwtʔ whymnwtʔ wḥwbʔ wšlmʔ ʕm ʔylyn dqryn lmrn blbʔ dkyʔ
02:23	ḥrynʔ sklʔ ʔylyn ddlʔ mrdw ʔnwn ʔštʔl mnhwn ydʕ ʔnt gyr dtktwšʔ mwldyn
02:24	ʕbdh dyn dmrn lʔ ḥyb lmtktšw ʔlʔ dnhwʔ mkyk lwt kl nš wmlpn wngyrʔ rwḥh
02:25	dnhwʔ rdʔ lʔylyn dmtḥryn lqwblh bmkykwtʔ dlmʔ ntl lhwn ʔlhʔ tybwtʔ wndʕwn šrrʔ
02:26	wnʕhdwn npšhwn wnprqwn mn pḥh dsṭnʔ dbh ʔttṣydw lṣbynh
03:01	hdʔ dyn hwyt ydʕ dbywmtʔ ʔḥryʔ nʔtwn zbnʔ qšyʔ
03:02	wnhwwn bnynšʔ rḥmy npšhwn wrḥmy kspʔ šbhrnʔ rmʔ mgdpnʔ dlʔnšyhwn lʔ mtṭpysyn kpry bṭybwtʔ ršyʕʔ
03:03	ʔkly qrṣʔ mšʕbdy lrgtʔ bʕryryʔ snyy ṭbtʔ
03:04	mšlmnʔ msrhbʔ ḥtyrʔ rḥmy rgygtʔ ṭb mn ḥwbh dʔlhʔ
03:05	dʔyt lhwn ʔskmʔ ddḥlt ʔlhʔ wmn ḥylh rḥyqyn ʔylyn dhknʔ ʔnwn dḥwq ʔnwn mnk
03:06	mnhwn ʔnwn gyr hlyn dmḥldyn byt btʔ wšbyn nšʔ dṭmyrn bḥṭhʔ wmtdbrn lrgygtʔ mšḥlptʔ
03:07	dbklzbn ylpn wmmtwm lydʕtʔ dšrrʔ lmʔtʔ lʔ mškḥyn
03:08	ʔyknʔ dyn dyns wymbrys qmw lwqbl mwšʔ hknʔ ʔp hnwn qymyn lwqbl šrrʔ ʔnšʔ dmḥbl rʕynhwn wslyn mn hymnwtʔ
03:09	ʔlʔ lʔ nʔtwn lqdmyhwn šṭywthwn gyr mtydʕʔ hy lklnš ʔyknʔ dʔp dhnwn ʔtydʕt
03:10	ʔnt dyn ʔtyt btr ywlpny wbtr dwbry wbtr ṣbyny wbtr hymnwty wbtr ngyrwt rwḥy wbtr ḥwby wbtr msybrnwty
03:11	wbtr rdypwty wbtr ḥšy wydʕ ʔnt ʔylyn sybrt bʔnṭykyʔ wbʔyqnwn wblwsṭrʔ ʔydʔ rdypwtʔ sybrt wmn klhyn pṣyny mry
03:12	wklhwn dyn ʔylyn dṣbyn bdḥlt ʔlhʔ dnḥwn byšwʕ mšyḥʔ mtrdpyn
03:13	bnynšʔ dyn byšʔ wmṭʕynʔ nwspwn ʕl byšwthwn kd ṭʕyn wmṭʕyn
03:14	ʔnt dyn qwʔ bʔylyn dylpt wʔštrrt ydʕ ʔnt gyr mn mnw ylpt
03:15	wdmn ṭlywtk sprʔ qdyšʔ ylyp ʔnt dmškḥyn dnḥkmwnk lḥyʔ bhymnwtʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ
03:16	kl ktb dbrwḥʔ ʔtktb mwtrnʔ hw lywlpnʔ wlkwwnʔ wltwrṣʔ wlmrdwtʔ dbkʔnwtʔ
03:17	dnhwʔ gmyr brnšʔ dʔlhʔ wlkl ʕbd ṭb mšlmn 
04:01	mshd ʔnʔ lk qdm ʔlhʔ wmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ hw dʕtyd lmdn ḥyʔ wmytʔ bglynʔ dmlkwth
04:02	ʔkrz mltʔ wqwm bḥpyṭwtʔ bzbnʔ wdlʔ zbnʔ ʔks wkwn bklh mgrt rwḥʔ wywlpnʔ
04:03	nhwʔ gyr zbnʔ dlywlpnʔ ḥlymʔ lʔ nštmʕwn ʔlʔ ʔyk rgygthwn nsgwn lnpšhwn mlpnʔ bḥwtḥtʔ dmšmʕthwn
04:04	wmn šrrʔ nhpkwn ʔdnhwn lšwʕytʔ dyn nsṭwn
04:05	ʔnt dyn hwyt ʕyr bklmdm wsybr byštʔ wʕbdʔ ʕbd dmsbrnʔ wtšmštk šlm
04:06	ʔnʔ gyr mkyl mtnqʔ ʔnʔ wzbnʔ dʔštrʔ mṭʔ
04:07	ʔgwnʔ špyrʔ ʔtktšt wrhṭy šlmt whymnwty nṭrt
04:08	wmn hšʔ nṭyr ly klylʔ dkʔnwtʔ dnprʕywhy ly mry bywmʔ hw dhwyw dynʔ kʔnʔ lʔ dyn blḥwd ly ʔlʔ ʔp lʔylyn dʔḥbw lglynh
04:09	ntbṭl lk dtʔtʔ lwty bʕgl
04:10	dmʔ gyr šbqny wʔḥb ʕlmʔ hnʔ wʔzl lh ltslwnyqʔ qrsqws lglṭyʔ ṭṭws ldlmṭyʔ
04:11	lwqʔ hw blḥwdwhy ʕmy lmrqws dbr wʔytyhy ʕmk ʕhn ly gyr ltšmštʔ
04:12	lṭwkyqws dyn šdrt lʔpsws
04:13	byt ktbʔ dyn dšbqt bṭrwʔws lwt qrpws mʔ dʔtʔ ʔnt ʔytyhy wktbʔ ytyrʔyt krkʔ dmglʔ
04:14	ʔlksndrs qynyʔ byštʔ sgyʔtʔ ḥwyny prʕ lh mrn ʔyk ʕbdwhy
04:15	ʔp ʔnt dyn ʔzdhr mnh ṭb gyr zqyp lwqbl mlyn
04:16	bmpq brwḥy qdmyʔ lʔ ʔnš hwʔ ʕmy ʔlʔ klhwn šbqwny lʔ ttḥšb lhwn hdʔ
04:17	mry dyn qm ly wḥylny dby krwzwtʔ tštlm wnšmʕwn ʕmmʔ klhwn dʔtpṣyt mn pwmʔ dʔryʔ
04:18	wnpṣyny mry mn kl ʕbd byš wnḥyny bmlkwth dbšmyʔ dlh šwbḥʔ lʕlm ʕlmyn ʔmyn
04:19	hb šlmʔ lprysqlʔ wlʔqlws wlbytʔ dʔnsypwrws
04:20	ʔrsṭws pš lh bqwrntws ṭrwpymws dyn šbqth kd kryh bmylyṭws mdyntʔ
04:21	ntbṭl lk dqdm stwʔ tʔtʔ šʔl bšlmk ʔwbwlws wpwdswlynws wqlwdyʔ wʔḥʔ klhwn
04:22	mrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʕm rwḥk ṭybwtʔ ʕmk ʔmyn
0101	pwlws ʕbdh dʔlhʔ wšlyḥh dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ bhymnwtʔ dgbyʔ dʔlhʔ wydʕtʔ dšrrʔ dbdḥlt ʔlhʔ
0102	ʕl sbrʔ dḥyʔ dlʕlm dmlk ʔlhʔ šryrʔ qdm zbnwhy dʕlmʔ
0103	wglʔ mlth bzbnh byd krwzwtn hy dʔthymnt ʔnʔ bpwqdnʔ dʔlhʔ mḥynn
0104	lṭṭws brʔ šryrʔ bhymnwtʔ dgwʔ ṭybwtʔ wšlmʔ mn ʔlhʔ ʔbʔ wmn mrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ mḥynn
0105	mṭlhnʔ hw šbqtk hwyt bqrṭʔ dʔylyn dḥsyrn ttqn wtqym qšyšʔ bmdynʔ mdynʔ ʔyknʔ dpqdtk
0106	ʔynʔ ddlʔ ršyn hw whwʔ bʕlʔ dḥdʔ ʔnttʔ wʔyt lh bnyʔ mhymnʔ dlʔ mṣḥyn wlʔ ʔytyhwn dlʔ šwʕbd bʔswṭwtʔ
0107	ḥyb hw gyr qšyšʔ dnhwʔ dlʔ ršyn ʔyk rbytʔ dʔlhʔ wlʔ nhwʔ mtdbr brʕyn npšh wlʔ nhwʔ ḥmtn wlʔ nhwʔ ʕbr ʕl ḥmrʔ wlʔ thwʔ rhṭʔ ʔydh lmmḥʔ wlʔ nhwʔ rḥm ywtrnʔ ṭnpʔ
0108	ʔlʔ nhwʔ rḥm ʔksnyʔ wnhwʔ rḥm ṭbtʔ wnhwʔ nkp wnhwʔ kʔyn wnhwʔ ḥsyʔ wlbyk npšh mn rgygtʔ
0109	wbṭyl lh ʕl ywlpnʔ dmltʔ dhymnwtʔ dnškḥ ʔp lmbyʔw bywlpnh ḥlymʔ wlmksw lʔylyn dmtḥryn
0110	ʔyt gyr sgyʔʔ dlʔ mštʕbdyn wsryqn mlyhwn wmṭʕyn rʕynʔ dbnynšʔ ytyrʔyt ʔylyn dmn gzwrtʔ ʔnwn
0111	hnwn dwlʔ lmskrw pwmhwn btʔ gyr sgyʔʔ mḥblyn wmlpyn mdm dlʔ wlʔ mṭl ywtrnʔ ṭnpʔ
0112	ʔmr ʔnš mnhwn nbyʔ dylhwn dbny qrṭʔ bklzbn dglyn ʔnwn ḥywtʔ byštʔ wkrstʔ bṭyltʔ
0113	wšryrʔyt ʔytyh shdwtʔ hdʔ mṭl hnʔ qšyʔyt hwyt mks lhwn dnhwwn ḥlymyn bhymnwtʔ
0114	wlʔ ntrmwn lšwʕytʔ dyhwdyʔ wlpwqdʔ dbnynšʔ dsnyn šrrʔ
0115	klmdm gyr dkʔ hw ldkyʔ lʔylyn dyn dmsybyn wlʔ mhymnyn mdm ddkʔ lyt lhwn ʔlʔ msyb hw rʕynhwn wtʔrthwn
0116	wmwdyn dydʕyn lʔlhʔ bʕbdyhwn dyn kpryn bh wʔytyhwn snyʔʔ wdlʔ pys wmslyʔ lkl ʕbd ṭb
0201	ʔnt dyn mll mdm dyʔʔ lywlpnʔ ḥlymʔ
0202	wʔlp dnhwwn qšyšʔ ʕyryn brʕynyhwn wnhwwn nkpyn wnhwwn dkyn wnhwwn ḥlymyn bhymnwtʔ wbḥwbʔ wbmsybrnwtʔ
0203	wʔp qšyštʔ hknʔ dnhwyn bʔskmʔ dyʔʔ ldḥlt ʔlhʔ wlʔ nhwyn ʔkln qrṣʔ wlʔ nhwyn mšʕbdn lḥmrʔ sgyʔʔ wnhwyn mlpn špyrtʔ
0204	wmnkpn lʔylyn dṭlyn dnrḥmn bʕlyhyn wbnyhyn
0205	wnhwyn nkpn wqdyšn wnhwyn yṣpn špyr dbtyhyn wmštʕbdn lbʕlyhyn dlʔ ʔnš ngdp ʕl mlth dʔlhʔ
0206	wmn ʔylyn dṭlyn hknʔ bʕy dnhwwn nkpyn
0207	bklmdm dyn dmwtʔ bnpšk ḥwʔ bkl ʕbdʔ ṭbʔ wbmlpnwtk thwʔ lk mltʔ ḥlymtʔ
0208	dnkpʔ wlʔ mḥblʔ wlʔ ʔnš bsr lh dʔynʔ dqʔm lqwbln nbht kd lʔ nškḥ dnʔmr ʕlyn mdm dsnʔ 
0209	ʕbdʔ lmryhwn nštʕbdwn bklmdm wnštprwn wlʔ hww mʕṣyn
0210	wlʔ hww gnbyn ʔlʔ nḥwwn šrrhwn ṭbʔ bklmdm dnṣbtwn bkl mdm ywlpnh dʔlhʔ mḥynn
0211	ʔtglyt gyr ṭybwth dʔlhʔ mḥyt kl lbnynšʔ klhwn
0212	wrdyʔ ln dnkpwr brwšʕʔ wbrgygtʔ dʕlmʔ wnḥʔ bʕlmʔ hnʔ bnkpwtʔ wbkʔnwtʔ wbdḥlt ʔlhʔ
0213	kd mskynn lsbrʔ brykʔ wlglynʔ dtšbwḥth dʔlhʔ rbʔ wmḥynn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
0214	dhw yhb npšh ḥlpyn dnprqn mn kl ʕwlʔ wndkyn lnpšh ʕmʔ ḥdtʔ dḥsm bʕbdʔ ṭbʔ
0215	hlyn mll wbʕy wkwn bkl pwqdn wlʔ ʔnš nbsʔ bk
0301	whwyt mʕhd lhwn dlršʔ wlšlyṭnʔ nštmʕwn wnštʕbdwn wdnhwwn ʕtydyn lkl ʕbd ṭb
0302	wʕl ʔnš lʔ ngdpwn wlʔ nhwwn mtktšyn ʔlʔ nhwwn mkykyn wbkl mdm nḥwwn bsymwthwn lwt klhwn bnynšʔ
0303	ʔp ḥnn gyr mn qdym dlʔ rʕynʔ hwyn wdlʔ pysʔ wṭʕyn hwyn wmšʕbdyn hwyn lʔrgygtʔ mšḥlptʔ wbbyšwtʔ wbḥsmʔ mthpkyn hwyn wsnyʔyn hwyn ʔp ḥd lḥd snyn hwyn
0304	kd dyn ʔtglyt bsymwth wmrḥmnwth dʔlhʔ mḥynn
0305	lʔ bʕbdʔ dzdyqwtʔ dʕbdn ʔlʔ brḥmwhy dylh ʔḥyn bsḥtʔ dmwldʔ dmn dryš wbḥwdtʔ drwḥʔ dqwdšʔ
0306	hy dʔšd ʕlyn ʕtyrʔyt byd yšwʕ mšyḥʔ mḥynn
0307	dbṭybwth nzddq wnhwʔ yrtʔ bsbrʔ bḥyʔ dlʕlm
0308	mhymnʔ hy mltʔ wbhlyn ṣbʔ ʔnʔ dʔp ʔnt hwyt mšrr lhwn dntbṭl lhwn lmplḥ ʕbdʔ ṭbʔ ʔylyn dhymnw bʔlhʔ hlyn ʔnyn ṭbn wmwtrn lbnynšʔ
0309	mn bʕtʔ dyn skltʔ wmn tšʕytʔ dšrbtʔ wmn ḥrynʔ wmn tktwšʔ dsprʔ ʔštʔl ywtrn gyr lyt bhyn wsryqn ʔnyn
0310	mn gbrʔ hrsywṭʔ mn btr ḥdʔ zbn wtrtyn dmrtʔ ʔnt lh ʔštʔl
0311	whwyt ydʕ dmn dhknʔ hw mʕqm hw wḥṭʔ whw ḥyb npšh
0312	mʔ dšdrt lwtk lʔrṭmʔ ʔw lṭwkyqws ntbṭl lk dtʔtʔ lwt lnyqpwlys tmn gyr smt brʕyny dʔstʔ
0313	ʕl znʔ dyn sprʔ wʕl ʔplw ntbṭl lk dtlwʔ ʔnwn špyr dmdm lʔ nḥsr lhwn
0314	wnʔlpwn ʔp ʔylyn ddyln ʔnwn dnhwwn plḥyn ʕbdʔ ṭbʔ bṣbwtʔ dʔlṣn dlʔ nhwwn dlʔ pʔrʔ
0315	šʔlyn bšlmk klhwn ʔylyn dʕmy ʔnwn šʔl bšlmʔ dklhwn ʔylyn drḥmyn ln bhymnwtʔ ṭybwtʔ ʕm klkwn ʔmyn
01	pwlws ʔsyrh dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ wṭymtʔws ʔḥʔ lpylmwn ḥbybʔ wplḥʔ dʕmn
02	wlʔpyʔ ḥbybtn wlʔrkypws plḥʔ dʕmn wlʕdtʔ dbbytk
03	ṭybwtʔ ʕmkwn wšlmʔ mn ʔlhʔ ʔbwn wmn mrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
04	mwdʔ ʔnʔ lʔlhy bklzbn wmtdkr ʔnʔ lk bṣlwty
05	hʔ mn dšmʕt hymnwtk wḥwbʔ dʔyt lk lwt mrn yšwʕ wlwt klhwn qdyšʔ
06	dthwʔ šwtpwtʔ dhymnwtk yhbʔ pʔrʔ bʕbdʔ wbydʕtʔ dkl ṭbn dʔyt lkwn byšwʕ mšyḥʔ
07	ḥdwtʔ gyr sgyʔtʔ ʔyt ln wbwyʔʔ dbyd ḥwbk ʔttnyḥ wrḥmʔ dqdyšʔ
08	mṭl hdʔ prhsyʔ sgyʔtʔ ʔyt ly bmšyḥʔ dʔpqwd lk ʔylyn dzdqn
09	mṭl ḥwbʔ dyn mbʕʔ hw bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnk ʔnʔ pwlws dʔyty sbʔ ʔyk dydʕ ʔnt hšʔ dyn ʔp ʔsyrʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ
10	wbʕʔ ʔnʔ mnk ʕl bry ʔynʔ dyldt bʔswry ʔnsymws
11	hw dbzbn lyt hwʔ lk bh ḥšḥw hšʔ dyn ʔp lk ʔp ly ṭb ḥšḥ
12	wšdrth lk ʔnt dyn ʔyk dlyldʔ dyly hknʔ qblyhy
13	ṣbʔ hwyt gyr dlwty ʔḥdywhy dnhwʔ mšmš ly ḥlpyk bʔswrʔ dʔwnglywn
14	blʕd mlkk dyn lʔ ṣbyt mdm lmʕbd dlʔ ʔyk dbqṭyrʔ thwʔ ṭbtk ʔlʔ bṣbynk
15	kbr dyn ʔp mṭl hdʔ šny dšʕtʔ dlʕlm tʔḥdywhy
16	lʔ mkyl ʔyk ʕbdʔ ʔlʔ ytyr mn ʕbdʔ ʔḥʔ ḥbybʔ dyly ḥd kmʔ dylk wbbsr wbmrn
17	ʔn hkyl ʔytyk ly šwtpʔ qblyhy ʔyk dly
18	wʔn mdm ḥsrk ʔw ḥyb hdʔ ʕly ḥšwb
19	ʔnʔ pwlws ktbt bʔydy ʔnʔ prʕ ʔnʔ dlʔ ʔmr lk dʔp npšk ḥyb ʔnt ly
20	ʔyn ʔḥy ʔnʔ ʔttnyḥ bk bmrn ʔnyḥ rḥmy bmšyḥʔ
21	mṭl dtkyl ʔnʔ dšmʕ ʔnt ly ktbt lk wydʕ ʔnʔ dytyr mn mʔ dʔmr ʔnʔ ʕbd ʔnt
22	bḥdʔ dyn ʔp ṭyb ly byt mšryʔ msbr ʔnʔ gyr dbṣlwtkwn mtyhb ʔnʔ lkwn
23	šʔl bšlmk ʔpprʔ šbyʔ dʕmy byšwʕ mšyḥʔ
24	wmrqws wʔrsṭrkws wdmʔ wlwqʔ mʕdrny
25	ṭybwth dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʕm rwḥkwn ʔmyn 
01:01	bkl mnwn wbkl dmwn mll ʔlhʔ ʕm ʔbhyn bnbyʔ mn qdym
01:02	wbhlyn ywmtʔ ʔḥryʔ mll ʕmn bbrh dlh sm yrtʔ dklmdm wbh ʕbd lʕlmʔ
01:03	dhwyw ṣmḥʔ dšwbḥh wṣlmʔ dʔytwth wʔḥyd kl bḥylʔ dmlth whw bqnwmh ʕbd dwkyʔ dḥṭhyn wytb ʕl ymynʔ drbwtʔ bmrwmʔ
01:04	whnʔ klh yrb mn mlʔkʔ ʔyk mʔ dmytr šmʔ dyrt mn dylhwn
01:05	lʔynʔ gyr mn mlʔkʔ mmtwm ʔmr ʔlhʔ dbry ʔnt ʔnʔ ywmnʔ yldtk wtwb dʔnʔ ʔhwʔ lh lʔbʔ whw nhwʔ ly lbrʔ
01:06	twb dyn ʔmty dmʕl bwkrʔ lʕlmʔ ʔmr dlh nsgdwn klhwn mlʔkʔ dʔlhʔ
01:07	ʕl mlʔkʔ dyn hknʔ ʔmr dʕbd mlʔkwhy rwḥ wmšmšnwhy nwr yqdʔ
01:08	ʕl brʔ dyn ʔmr dkwrsyk dylk ʔlhʔ lʕlm ʕlmyn šbṭʔ pšyṭʔ šbṭʔ dmlkwtk
01:09	rḥmt kʔnwtʔ wsnyt ʕwlʔ mṭl hnʔ mšḥk ʔlhʔ ʔlhk mšḥʔ dḥdwtʔ ytyr mn ḥbryk
01:10	wtwb ʔnt mn bryšyt smt štʔsyh dʔrʕʔ wšmyʔ ʕbd ʔydyk ʔnwn
01:11	hnwn nʕbrwn wʔnt qym ʔnt wklhwn ʔyk nḥtʔ nblwn
01:12	wʔyk tksytʔ tʕwp ʔnwn hnwn ntḥlpwn wʔnt ʔyk dʔytyk ʔnt wšnyk lʔ ngmrn
01:13	lmn dyn mn mlʔkʔ mmtwm ʔmr dtb mn ymyny ʕdmʔ dʔsym bʕldbbyk kwbšʔ tḥyt rglyk
01:14	lʔ hʔ klhwn ʔytyhwn rwḥʔ dtšmštʔ dmštdryn btšmštʔ mṭl ʔylyn dʕtydyn lmʔrt ḥyʔ
02:01	mṭl hnʔ ḥybynn dytyrʔyt nhwʔ zhyryn bmdm dšmʕn dlʔ npl
02:02	ʔn gyr mltʔ dʔtmllt byd mlʔkʔ ʔštrrt wkl dšmʕh wʕbr ʕlyh qbl pwrʕnʔ bkʔnwtʔ
02:03	ʔyknʔ ḥnn nʕrwq ʔn nbsʔ ʕl ʔylyn dhnwn ʔnwn ḥyyn hnwn dšryw mn mrn lmtmllw wmn ʔylyn dmnh šmʕw bn ʔštrrw
02:04	kd shd ʕlyhwn ʔlhʔ bʔtwtʔ wbtdmrtʔ wbḥylʔ mšḥlpʔ wbpwlgʔ drwḥʔ dqwdšʔ dʔtyhbw ʔyk ṣbynh
02:05	lʔ hwʔ gyr lmlʔkʔ šʕbd ʕlmʔ dʕtyd dʕlwhy mmllynn
02:06	ʔlʔ ʔyk dmshd ktbʔ wʔmr mnw gbrʔ dʕhdtyhy wbrh dʔnšʔ dsʕrtyhy
02:07	ʔmktyhy qlyl mn mlʔkʔ tšbwḥtʔ wʔyqrʔ smt bryšh wʔšlṭtyhy bʕbdʔ dʔydyk
02:08	wkl mdm šʕbdt tḥyt rglwhy bhy dyn dkl mdm šʕbd lh lʔ šbq mdm dlʔ mšʕbd hšʔ dyn lʔ ʕdkyl ḥzynn dklmdm mšʕbd lh
02:09	hw dyn dmk qlyl mn mlʔkʔ ḥzynn dhwyw yšwʕ mṭl ḥšʔ dmwth wtšbwḥtʔ wʔyqrʔ sym bryšh hw gyr bṭybwth ʔlhʔ ḥlp klnš ṭʕm mwtʔ
02:10	yʔʔ hwʔ gyr lhw dkl bʔydh wkl mṭlth wbnyʔ sgyʔʔ ʔʕl ltšbwḥtʔ dlryšʔ dḥyyhwn bḥšh ngmrywhy
02:11	hw gyr dqdš whnwn dʔtqdšw mn ḥd ʔnwn klhwn mṭl hnʔ lʔ bht dnqrʔ ʔnwn ʔḥwhy
02:12	kd ʔmr ʔsbr šmk lʔḥy wbgwh dʕdtʔ ʔšbḥk
02:13	wtwb dʔnʔ ʔhwʔ tkyl ʕlwhy wtwb hʔ ʔnʔ wbnyʔ dyhb ly ʔlhʔ
02:14	mṭl gyr dbnyʔ ʔštwtpw bbsrʔ wdmʔ ʔp hw bh bdmwtʔ ʔštwtp bhyn bhlyn dbmwth nbṭl lmn dʔḥyd šwlṭnʔ dmwtʔ dʔytwhy sṭnʔ
02:15	wnšrʔ lhnwn ʔylyn dbdḥltʔ dmwtʔ bklhwn ḥyyhwn mšʕbdyn hww lʕbdwtʔ
02:16	lʔ hwʔ gyr ʕl mlʔkʔ mšlṭ hwʔ mwtʔ ʔlʔ ʕl zrʕh dʔbrhm mšlṭ hwʔ
02:17	mṭl hnʔ zdq hwʔ dbkl mdm ntdmʔ lʔḥwhy dnhwʔ mrḥmnʔ wrb kwmrʔ mhymnʔ bdʔlhʔ wnhwʔ mḥsʔ ʕl ḥṭhwhy dʕmʔ
02:18	bhy gyr dhw ḥš wʔtnsy mškḥ dnʕdr lʔylyn dmtnsyn
03:01	mkyl ʔḥy qdyšʔ dʔtqrytwn bqrynʔ dmn šmyʔ ḥzʔwhy lhnʔ šlyḥʔ wrb kwmrʔ dtwdytn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
03:02	dmhymn lmn dʕbdh ʔyk mwšʔ bklh byth
03:03	sgyʔʔ hy gyr tšbwḥth dhnʔ ṭb mn dmwšʔ ʔyknʔ dsgy ʔyqrʔ dbnyh dbytʔ ṭb mn bnynh
03:04	kl bytʔ gyr mn ʔnš hw mtbnʔ hw dyn dbnʔ kl ʔlhʔ hw
03:05	wmwšʔ ʔyk ʕbdʔ ʔthymn bbytʔ klh lshdwtʔ dʔylyn dʕtydn hwy lmtmllw bʔydh
03:06	mšyḥʔ dyn ʔyk brʔ ʕl byth wʔytwhy byth ḥnn ʔn ʕdmʔ lḥrtʔ nʔḥwd glywt ʔpʔ wšwbhrʔ dsbrh
03:07	mṭl dʔmrt rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ dywmnʔ ʔn bqlh tšmʕwn
03:08	lʔ tqšwn lbwtkwn lmrgzwth ʔyk mmrmrnʔ wʔyk ywmʔ dnsywnʔ dbmdbrʔ
03:09	dnsywny ʔbhykwn wbqw ḥzw ʕbdy ʔrbʕyn šnyn
03:10	mṭl hnʔ mʔnt ly bdrʔ hw wʔmrt dʕmʔ hw dṭʕʔ lbhwn whnwn lʔ ydʕw ʔwrḥty
03:11	wʔyk dymyt brwgzy dlʔ nʕlwn lnyḥty
03:12	ʔzdhrw hkyl ʔḥy dlmʔ nhwʔ bʔnš mnkwn lbʔ byšʔ dlʔ mhymn wtprqwn mn ʔlhʔ ḥyʔ
03:13	ʔlʔ bʕw mn npškwn klhwn ywmtʔ ʕdmʔ lywmʔ dmtqrʔ ywmnʔ dlʔ ntqšʔ ʔnš mnkwn bṭʕywtʔ dḥṭytʔ 
03:14	ʔtḥlṭn gyr ʕm mšyḥʔ ʔn mn ryšytʔ wʕdmʔ lʔḥrytʔ bh bqymʔ hnʔ šryrʔ nḥmsn
03:15	ʔyknʔ dʔmyr dywmnʔ ʔn brt qlh tšmʕwn lʔ tqšwn lbwtkwn lmrgzwth
03:16	mn ʔnwn gyr hnwn dšmʕw wʔrgzwhy lʔ klhwn hlyn dnpqw mn mṣryn byd mwšʔ
03:17	wbʔylyn mʔnt lh ʔrbʕyn šnyn ʔlʔ bhnwn dḥṭw wgrmyhwn nplw bmdbrʔ
03:18	wʕl ʔylyn ymʔ dlʔ nʕlwn lnyḥth ʔlʔ ʕl hnwn dlʔ ʔtṭpysw
03:19	wḥzynn dlʔ ʔškḥw lmʕl mṭl dlʔ hymnw
04:01	ndḥl hkyl dlmʔ kd qym mwlknʔ dmʕltʔ dlnyḥth nštkḥ ʔnš mnkwn dpʔš mn dlmʕl
04:02	ʔp ḥnn gyr ʔstbrn ʔyk dʔp hnwn ʔlʔ lʔ ʔwtrt ʔnwn lhnwn mltʔ dšmʕw mṭl dlʔ mmzgʔ hwt bhymnwtʔ lhnwn dšmʕwh
04:03	ʕʔlynn dyn lnyḥtʔ ḥnn ʔylyn dhymnn ʔyknʔ dyn ʔmr ʔyk dymyt brwgzy dlʔ nʕlwn lnyḥty dhʔ ʕbdwhy dʔlhʔ mn šwryh dʕlmʔ hww
04:04	ʔyk dʔmr ʕl šbtʔ dʔtnyḥ ʔlhʔ bywmʔ šbyʕyʔ mn ʕbdwhy klhwn
04:05	whrkʔ twb ʔmr dlʔ nʕlwn lnyḥty
04:06	mṭl hkyl dʔyt hwʔ ʔtrʔ dʔnš ʔnš nʕwl lh whnwn dʔstbr wqdmyʔ lʔ ʕlw bdlʔ ʔtṭpysw
04:07	twb ywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ sʔm mn btr zbnʔ sgyʔʔ ʔyknʔ dmn lʕl ktyb dʔmr dwyd dywmnʔ ʔn bqlh tšmʕwn lʔ tqšwn lbwtkwn
04:08	ʔlw gyr yšwʕ br nwn ʔnyḥ hwʔ ʔnwn lʔ ʔmr hwʔ mn btrkn ʕl ywmʔ ʔḥrnʔ
04:09	mdyn qym hw lmšbtw lʕmh dʔlhʔ
04:10	ʔynʔ gyr dʕl lnyḥth ʔttnyḥ ʔp hw mn ʕbdwhy ʔyk dʔlhʔ mn dylh
04:11	ntḥpṭ hkyl dnʕwl lhy nyḥtʔ dlʔ npl bdmwtʔ dhnwn dlʔ ʔtṭpysw
04:12	ḥyʔ hy gyr mlth dʔlhʔ wkl sʕrʔ wḥrypʔ ṭb mn spsrʔ dtryn pwmyh wʕʔlʔ ʕdmʔ lpwršnʔ dnpšʔ wdrwḥʔ wdšrytʔ wdmwḥʔ wdgrmʔ wdynʔ mḥšbtʔ wtrʕytʔ dlbʔ
04:13	wlyt brytʔ dṭšyʔ mn qdmyh ʔlʔ kl mdm ʕrṭl wglʔ qdm ʕynwhy dlh yhbynn ptgmʔ
04:14	mṭl dʔyt ln hkyl rb kwmrʔ rbʔ yšwʕ mšyḥʔ brh dʔlhʔ dslq lšmyʔ nḥmsn btwdyth
04:15	lʔ gyr ʔyt ln rbkwmrʔ dlʔ mṣʔ dnḥš ʕm kryhwtn ʔlʔ dmnsy bklmdm ʔkwtn sṭr mn ḥṭytʔ
04:16	ntqrb hkyl bglʔ ʕyn lkwrsyʔ dṭybwth dnsb rḥmʔ wnškḥ ṭybwtʔ lʕwdrnʔ bzbnʔ dʔwlṣnʔ
05:01	kl rb kwmrʔ gyr dmn bnynšʔ hwʔ ḥlp bnynšʔ qʔm ʕl ʔylyn ddʔlhʔ ʔnyn dnqrb qwrbnʔ wdbḥʔ ḥlp ḥṭhʔ
05:02	ʔynʔ dmškḥ dnmk npšh wnḥš ʕm ʔylyn dlʔ ydʕyn wṭʕyn mṭl dʔp hw kryhwtʔ lbyš
05:03	wmṭlth ḥyb hw dʔyknʔ dḥlp ʕmʔ hknʔ ʔp ḥlp npšh nqrb ʕl ḥṭhwhy
05:04	wlʔ hwʔ lnpšh ʔnš nsb ʔyqrʔ ʔlʔ ʔynʔ dmtqrʔ mn ʔlhʔ ʔyknʔ dʔhrwn
05:05	hknʔ ʔp mšyḥʔ lʔ hwʔ npšh šbḥ dnhwʔ rb kwmrʔ ʔlʔ hw dʔmr lh dbry ʔnt ʔnʔ ywmnʔ yldtk
05:06	ʔyk dʔp bdwktʔ ʔḥrtʔ ʔmr dʔnt hw kwmrʔ lʕlm bdmwth dmlkyzdq
05:07	ʔp kd bsrʔ lbyš hwʔ bʕwtʔ wtkšptʔ bgʕtʔ ḥyltnytʔ wbdmʕʔ qrb hwʔ lmn dmškḥ hwʔ mn mwtʔ dnḥywhy wʔštmʕ
05:08	wkd ṭb brʔ ʔytwhy mn dḥltʔ wḥšʔ dsbl ylph lmštmʕnwtʔ
05:09	whknʔ ʔtgmr whwʔ lklhwn ʔylyn dmštmʕyn lh ʕltʔ dḥyʔ dlʕlm
05:10	wʔštmh mn ʔlhʔ rb kwmrʔ bdmwth dmlkyzdq
05:11	ʕlwhy dyn ʕl hnʔ mlkyzdq sgyʔʔ hy ln mltʔ lmʔmrh wʕsqʔ lmpšqwth mṭl dhwytwn lkwn kryhʔ bmšmʕtkwn
05:12	ḥybyn hwytwn gyr mlpnʔ lmhwʔ mṭl dzbnʔ lkwn bywlpnʔ hšʔ dyn twb snyqyn ʔntwn dtʔlpwn ʔylyn ʔnyn ktybtʔ qdmytʔ dryš mlwhy dʔlhʔ whwytwn lkwn snyqʔ ʕl ḥlbʔ wlʔ ʕl mʔkwltʔ šryrtʔ
05:13	klnš dyn dmʔkwlth ḥlbʔ hw lʔ mps bmltʔ dkʔnwtʔ mṭl dšbrʔ hw
05:14	dgmyrʔ hy dyn mʔkwltʔ šryrtʔ ʔylyn dmṭl dmdršyn ʔtnpqw rgšyhwn lmprš ṭbtʔ wbyštʔ
06:01	mṭl hnʔ nšbwq šwryʔ dmlth dmšyḥʔ wnʔtʔ lgmyrwtʔ ʔw lmʔ twb štʔstʔ ʔḥrtʔ mrmytwn ltybwtʔ mn ʕbdʔ mytʔ wlhymnwtʔ dbʔlhʔ
06:02	wlywlpnʔ dmʕmwdytʔ wdsym ʔydʔ wlqymtʔ dmn byt mytʔ wldynʔ dlʕlm
06:03	ʔn mryʔ mps nʕbd hdʔ
06:04	ʔlʔ lʔ mškḥyn hnwn dḥdʔ zbn lmʕmwdytʔ nḥtw wṭʕmw mwhbtʔ dmn šmyʔ wnsbw rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ
06:05	wṭʕmw mltʔ ṭbtʔ dʔlhʔ wḥylʔ dʕlmʔ dʕtyd
06:06	dtwb nḥṭwn dmn dryš ntḥdtwn ltybwtʔ wmn dryš nzqpwn lbrh dʔlhʔ wnṣʕrwn
06:07	ʔrʕʔ gyr dʔštyt mṭrʔ dʔtʔ lh zbnyn sgyʔn wʔwʕyt ʕsbʔ dḥšḥ lhnwn dmṭlthwn mtplḥʔ mqblʔ bwrktʔ mn ʔlhʔ
06:08	ʔn hw dyn dtpq qwrṭbʔ wdrdrʔ hwyʔ lh mslytʔ wlʔ rḥyqʔ mn lwṭtʔ ʔlʔ ḥrth yqdnʔ hw 
06:09	mpysynn dyn ʕlykwn ʔḥy ʔylyn dšpyrn wqrybn lḥyʔ ʔpn hknʔ mmllynn
06:10	lʔ hwʔ gyr ʕwl ʔlhʔ dnṭʕʔ ʕbdykwn wḥwbkwn hw dḥwytwn bšmh dšmštwn lqdyšʔ wmšmšytwn
06:11	ṣbynn dyn dʔnš ʔnš mnkwn hy hdʔ ḥpyṭwtʔ nḥwʔ lšwmlyʔ dsbrkwn ʕdmʔ lḥrtʔ
06:12	wdlʔ ttqṭʕ lkwn ʔlʔ dthwwn mmrynʔ lhnwn dbhymnwtʔ wbngyrwt rwḥʔ hww yrtʔ dmwlknʔ
06:13	lʔbrhm gyr kd mlk lh ʔlhʔ mṭl dlyt hwʔ lh drb mnh dnʔmʔ bh ymʔ bnpšh
06:14	wʔmr dmbrkw ʔbrkk wmsgyw ʔsgyk
06:15	whknʔ ʔgr rwḥh wqbl mwlknʔ
06:16	bnynšʔ gyr bdrb mnhwn ymyn wʕl kl ḥryn dhwʔ bynthwn šwlmʔ šryrʔ bmwmtʔ hwʔ lh
06:17	mṭl hnʔ ytyrʔyt ṣbʔ ʔlhʔ dnḥwʔ lyrtʔ dmwlknʔ dšwwdyh lʔ mštḥlp wḥbšh bmwmtʔ
06:18	dbtrtyn ṣbwn dlʔ mštḥlpn dlʔ mškḥ ʔlhʔ dndgl bhyn bwyʔʔ rbʔ nhwʔ ln dʔtgwsn bh wnʔḥwd sbrʔ dmlyk ln
06:19	hw dʔytwhy ln ʔyk ʔwqynʔ dlbyk bnpšn dlʔ ttzyʕ wʕʔl lgw mn ʔpy trʕʔ
06:20	kr dqdm ʕl ḥlpyn yšwʕ whwʔ kwmrʔ lʕlm bdmwth dmlkyzdq
07:01	hnʔ dyn mlkyzdq ʔytwhy mlk šlym kwmrʔ dʔlhʔ mrymʔ whw ʔrʕh lʔbrhm kd hpk mn ḥrbʔ dmlkʔ wbrkh
07:02	wlh prš ʔbrhm mʕsrʔ mn klmdm dʔyt hwʔ ʕmh mtpšq dyn šmh mlkʔ dkʔnwtʔ wtwb mlk šlym dʔytwhy mlkʔ dšlmʔ
07:03	dlʔ ʔbwhy wlʔ ʔmh ʔtktbw bšrbtʔ wlʔ ryšytʔ dywmwhy wlʔ šwlmʔ dḥywhy ʔlʔ bdmwtʔ dbrh dʔlhʔ mqwyʔ kwmrwth lʕlm
07:04	ḥzw dyn kmʔ rb hnʔ dʔbrhm ryš ʔbhtʔ lh yhb mʕsrʔ dršytʔ
07:05	ʔylyn gyr mn bny lwy dmqblyn hww kwmrwtʔ pwqdnʔ ʔyt hwʔ lhwn dnmwsʔ dnsbwn mʕsrʔ mn ʕmʔ hnwn mn ʔḥyhwn kd ʔp hnwn mn ḥṣh dʔbrhm npqw
07:06	hnʔ dyn dlʔ ktyb bšrbthwn mʕsrʔ šql mn ʔbrhm wbrkh lhw dqbl mwlknʔ
07:07	dlʔ ḥrynʔ dyn hw dbṣyr mtbrk mn hw dmytr mnh
07:08	whrkʔ bnynšʔ dmytyn nsbyn mʕsrʔ lhl dyn hw dʔshd ʕlwhy ktbʔ dḥy hw
07:09	wʔyk ʔnš nʔmr byd ʔbrhm ʔp lwy hw dmʕsrʔ nsb hwʔ ʔp hw ʔtʕsr
07:10	ʕdkyl gyr bḥṣh hwʔ dʔbwhy kd ʔrʕh lmlkyzdq
07:11	ʔlw hkyl gmyrwtʔ byd kwmrwtʔ dlwyʔ ʔytyh hwt dbh sym nmwsʔ lʕmʔ lmnʔ mtbʕʔ hwʔ kwmrʔ ʔḥrnʔ dnqwm bdmwth dmlkyzdq ʔmr dyn dbdmwth dʔhrwn nhwʔ
07:12	ʔlʔ ʔyknʔ dhwʔ šwḥlpʔ bkwmrwtʔ hknʔ hwʔ šwḥlpʔ ʔp bnmwsʔ
07:13	hw gyr dʔtʔmr ʕlwhy hlyn mn šrbtʔ hw ʔḥrtʔ ʔtyld dʔnš mmtwm mnh lʔ šmš bmdbḥʔ
07:14	glyʔ hy gyr dmn yhwdʔ dnḥ mrn mn šrbtʔ dlʔ ʔmr ʕlyh mwšʔ mdm ʕl kwmrwtʔ
07:15	wytyrʔyt twb ydyʕʔ bhy dʔmr dbdmwth dmlkyzdq qʔm kwmrʔ ʔḥrnʔ
07:16	hw dlʔ hwʔ bnmwsʔ dpwqdnʔ pgrnyʔ hwʔ ʔlʔ bḥylʔ dḥyʔ dlʔ mštryn
07:17	mshd gyr ʕlwhy dʔnt hw kwmrʔ lʕlm bdmwth dmlkyzdq
07:18	šwḥlpʔ dyn dhwʔ lpwqdnʔ qdmyʔ mṭl mḥylwth wdywtrn lyt hwʔ bh
07:19	mdm gyr lʔ gmr nmwsʔ ʕl dyn ḥlpwhy sbrʔ dmytr mnh dbh mtqrbynn lʔlhʔ
07:20	wšrrh ln bmwmtʔ
07:21	hnwn gyr dlʔ mwmtʔ hww kwmrʔ hnʔ dyn bmwmtʔ ʔyk dʔmr lh byd dwyd dymʔ mryʔ wlʔ ndgl dʔnt hw kwmrʔ lʕlm bdmwth dmlkyzdq
07:22	hnʔ klh mytrʔ dytqʔ hdʔ dhwʔ bh ʕrbʔ yšwʕ
07:23	whnwn hww kwmrʔ sgyʔʔ mṭl dmytyn hww wlʔ mštbqyn hww dnqwwn
07:24	hnʔ dyn mṭl dlʕlm qym lʔ ʕbrʔ kwmrwth
07:25	wmškḥ lmḥyw lʕlm lʔylyn dmtqrbyn bʔydh lʔlhʔ ḥy hw gyr bklzbn wmsq ṣlwtʔ ḥlpyhwn
07:26	dʔyk hnʔ gyr kwmrʔ ʔp zdq hwʔ ln dkyʔ dlʔ byšw wdlʔ ṭwlšʔ dpryq mn ḥṭhʔ wmrym lʕl mn šmyʔ
07:27	wlyt lh ʔwlṣnʔ klywm ʔyk rby kwmrʔ dlwqdm ḥlp ḥṭhwhy nqrb dbḥʔ whydyn ḥlp ʕmʔ hdʔ gyr ʕbdh ḥdʔ zbn bnpšh dqrb
07:28	nmwsʔ gyr bnynšʔ hw kryhʔ mqym kwmrʔ mltʔ dyn dmwmtʔ dhwt btr nmwsʔ brʔ gmyrʔ lʕlm 
08:01	ryšʔ dyn dklhyn ʔyt ln rb kwmrʔ ʔynʔ dytb mn ymynʔ dkwrsyʔ drbwtʔ bšmyʔ
08:02	whwʔ mšmšnʔ dbyt qwdšʔ wdmšknʔ dšrrʔ hw dqbʕ ʔlhʔ wlʔ brnšʔ
08:03	kl rb kwmrʔ gyr dqʔm dnqrb qwrbnʔ wdbḥʔ mṭl hnʔ zdqʔ hwt ʔp lhnʔ dnhwʔ ʔyt lh mdm dnqrb
08:04	wʔlw bʔrʕʔ hwʔ ʔplʔ kwmrʔ hwʔ hwʔ mṭl dʔytyhwn hww kwmrʔ dmqrbyn hww qwrbnʔ ʔyk dbnmwsʔ
08:05	hnwn dmšmšyn ldmwtʔ wlṭlnytʔ dhlyn dbšmyʔ ʔyk dʔtʔmr lmwšʔ kd ʕbd hwʔ mšknʔ dḥzy wʕbd klmdm bdmwtʔ hy dʔtḥzyt lk bṭwrʔ
08:06	hšʔ dyn tšmštʔ dmytrʔ mn hy qbl yšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʔkmʔ dmytrʔ ʔp dytyqʔ hy dʕbyd bh mṣʕyʔ wbšwwdyʔ dmytryn mn dhy ʔtyhbt
08:07	ʔlw gyr ʔytyh hwt qdmytʔ dlʔ ršyn lyt hwʔ ʔtrʔ lhdʔ dtrtyn
08:08	ršʔ lhwn gyr wʔmr dhʔ ywmtʔ ʔtyn ʔmr mryʔ wʔgmwr ʕl bytʔ dbyt ʔysryl wʕl bytʔ dbyt yhwdʔ dytqʔ ḥdtʔ
08:09	lʔ ʔyk hy dytqʔ dyhbt lʔbhyhwn bywmʔ dʔḥdt bʔydhwn wʔpqt ʔnwn mn ʔrʕʔ dmṣryn mṭl dhnwn lʔ qwyw bdytqʔ dyly ʔp ʔnʔ bsyt bhwn ʔmr mryʔ
08:10	hdʔ dyn dytqʔ dʔtl lbytʔ dbyt ʔysryl btr ywmtʔ hnwn ʔmr mryʔ ʔtlywhy lnmwsy bmdʕyhwn wʕl lbwthwn ʔktbywhy wʔhwʔ lhwn ʔnʔ ʔlhʔ whnwn nhwwn ly ʕmʔ
08:11	wlʔ nlp ʔnš lbr mdynth ʔplʔ lʔḥwhy wnʔmr ddʕ lmryʔ mṭl dklhwn ndʕwnny mn zʕwrhwn wʕdmʔ lqšyšhwn
08:12	wʔḥsʔ ʔnwn mn ʕwlhwn wḥṭhyhwn twb lʔ ʔtdkr lhwn
08:13	bhy dʔmr ḥdtʔ lqdmytʔ ʔʕtqh wʔynʔ dʕtq wsʔb qryb hw lḥblʔ
09:01	bqdmytʔ dyn ʔyt hwʔ bh pwqdʔ dtšmštʔ wbyt qwdšʔ ʕlmnyʔ
09:02	mšknʔ gyr qdmyʔ dʔtʕbd ʔyt hwʔ bh mnrtʔ wptwrʔ wlḥm ʔpʔ wmtqrʔ hwʔ byt qwdšʔ
09:03	mšknʔ dyn gwyʔ dlgw mn ʔpy trʕʔ dtryn mtqrʔ hwʔ qdwš qwdšʔ
09:04	wʔyt hwʔ bh byt bsmʔ ddhbʔ wqbwtʔ ddytqʔ dqrymʔ klh bdhbʔ wʔyt bh qsṭʔ ddhbʔ hy dʔyt hwʔ bh mnnʔ wšbṭʔ dʔhrwn hw dʔprʕ wlwḥʔ ddytqʔ
09:05	wlʕl mnh krwbʔ dšwbḥʔ dmṭlyn ʕl ḥwsyʔ lʔ hwʔ dyn zbnʔ hw dnʔmr ʕl ḥdʔ ḥdʔ mn hlyn dhknʔ mtqnn hwy
09:06	wlmšknʔ bryʔ bklzbn ʕʔlyn hww kwmrʔ wmšlmyn hww tšmšthwn
09:07	lmšknʔ dyn dlgw mnh ḥdʔ hw bšntʔ blḥwdwhy ʕʔl hwʔ rb kwmrʔ bdmʔ hw dmqrb hwʔ ḥlp npšh wḥlp sklwth dʕmʔ
09:08	bhdʔ dyn mwdʕʔ hwt rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ dlʔ ʔtglyt ʕdkyl ʔwrḥʔ dqdyšʔ kmʔ zbnʔ dʔyt hwʔ qymʔ lmšknʔ qdmyʔ
09:09	wʔytwhy hwʔ mtlʔ hnʔ lzbnʔ hw dbh qwrbnʔ wdbḥʔ mtqrbyn hww ʔylyn dlʔ mškḥyn hww lmgmr tʔrth dmn dmqrb lhwn
09:10	ʔlʔ bmʔklʔ wbmštyʔ blḥwd wbmʕmwdytʔ dznyn znyn dʔytyhyn pwqdʔ dbsrʔ dsymyn ʕdmʔ lzbnʔ dtwrṣʔ
09:11	mšyḥʔ dyn dʔtʔ hwʔ rbkwmrʔ dṭbtʔ dsʕr wʕl lmšknʔ rbʔ wmšlmnʔ dlʔ ʕbyd bʔydyʔ wlʔ hwʔ mn hlyn brytʔ
09:12	wlʔ ʕl bdmʔ dṣpryʔ wdʕglʔ ʔlʔ bdmʔ dnpšh ʕl ḥdʔ zbn lbyt mqdšʔ wʔškḥ pwrqnʔ dlʕlm
09:13	ʔn gyr dmʔ dṣpryʔ wdʕglʔ wqṭmʔ dʕgltʔ mtrss hwʔ ʕl ʔylyn dmtṭmʔyn hww wmqdš lhwn ldwkyʔ dbsrhwn
09:14	kmʔ hkyl ytyrʔyt dmh dmšyḥʔ dbrwḥʔ dlʕlm npšh qrb dlʔ mwm lʔlhʔ ndkʔ tʔrtn mn ʕbdʔ mytʔ dnšmš lʔlhʔ ḥyʔ
09:15	mṭl hnʔ hw hwʔ mṣʕyʔ ddytqʔ ḥdtʔ dbmwth hw hwʔ pwrqnʔ lʔylyn dʕbrw ʕl dytqʔ qdmytʔ dnsbwn mwlknʔ ʔylyn dʔtqryw lyrtwtʔ dlʕlm
09:16	ʔykʔ gyr dʔyt dytqʔ mwtʔ hw mḥwyʔ dhw dʕbdh
09:17	ʕl mytʔ dyn blḥwd mštrrʔ mṭl dkmʔ dḥy hw dʕbdh lyt bh ḥšḥw
09:18	mṭl hnʔ ʔplʔ qdmytʔ dlʔ dmʔ ʔštrrt
09:19	kd ʔtpqd gyr klh pwqdnʔ mn mwšʔ lʕmʔ klh bnmwsʔ nsb hwʔ mwšʔ dmʔ dʕgltʔ wmyʔ bʕmrʔ dzḥwrytʔ wzwpʔ wrs ʕl sprʔ wʕl ʕmʔ klh
09:20	wʔmr lhwn hnʔ hw dmʔ ddytqʔ hy dʔtpqdt lkwn mn ʔlhʔ
09:21	ʔp ʕl mšknʔ wʕl klhwn mʔnʔ dtšmštʔ mnh mn dmʔ rs
09:22	mṭl dklmdm bdmʔ hw mtdkʔ bnmwsʔ wdlʔ šwpʕ dmʔ lyt šwbqnʔ
09:23	ʔnnqʔ hy gyr dhlyn ddmwtʔ ʔnyn dšmynytʔ bhlyn mtdkyn hlyn dyn šmynytʔ bdbḥʔ dmytryn mn hlyn 
09:24	lʔ hwʔ gyr lbyt mqdšʔ dʕbyd bʔydyʔ ʕl mšyḥʔ dʔytwhy dmwtʔ dhw šryrʔ ʔlʔ lh lšmyʔ ʕl dntḥzʔ qdm prṣwph dʔlhʔ ḥlpyn
09:25	ʔplʔ dnqrb npšh zbntʔ sgyʔtʔ ʔyk dʕbd hwʔ rb kwmrʔ wʕʔl bkl šnʔ lbyt mqdšʔ bdmʔ dlʔ dylh
09:26	wʔn lʔ ḥyb hwʔ dzbntʔ sgyʔtʔ nḥš mn šwryh dʕlmʔ hšʔ dyn bḥrth dʕlmʔ ḥdʔ hw zbn qrb npšh bdbyḥwth dnbṭlyh lḥṭytʔ
09:27	wʔyknʔ dsym lbnynšʔ dḥdʔ zbn nmwtwn wmn btr mwthwn dynʔ
09:28	hknʔ ʔp mšyḥʔ ḥdʔ zbn ʔtqrb wbqnwmh dbḥ ḥṭhʔ dsgyʔʔ dtrtyn dyn zbnyn dlʔ ḥṭhyn mtḥzʔ lḥyyhwn dʔylyn dmskyn lh
10:01	nmwsʔ gyr ṭlnytʔ ʔyt hwʔ bh dṭbtʔ dʕtydn lʔ hwʔ qnwmʔ dylhyn dṣbwtʔ mṭl hnʔ kd bkl šnʔ hnwn kd hnwn dbḥʔ mtqrbyn hww lʔ mmtwm ʔškḥw dngmrwn lʔylyn dmqrbyn lhwn
10:02	ʔlw gyr gmryn hww kbr dyn ʔttnyḥw mn qwrbnyhwn mṭl dlʔ mkyl ṭryʔ hwt lhwn tʔrthwn bḥṭhʔ lʔylyn dḥdʔ zbn ʔtdkyw lhwn
10:03	ʔlʔ bhwn bdbḥʔ mdkryn ḥṭhyhwn bkl šnʔ
10:04	lʔ gyr mškḥ dmʔ dtwrʔ wdṣpryʔ lmdkyw ḥṭhʔ
10:05	mṭl hnʔ kd ʕʔl lʕlmʔ ʔmr bdbḥʔ wqwrbnʔ lʔ ṣbyt pgrʔ dyn ʔlbštny
10:06	wyqdʔ šlmʔ dḥlp ḥṭhʔ lʔ šʔlt
10:07	hydyn ʔmrt dhʔ ʔnʔ ʔtʔ ʔnʔ dbryš ktbʔ ktyb ʕly dʔʕbd ṣbynk ʔlhʔ
10:08	mn lʕl ʔmr ddbḥʔ wqwrbnʔ wyqdʔ šlmʔ dḥlp ḥṭhʔ lʔ ṣbyt hnwn dmtqrbyn hww bnmwsʔ
10:09	wbtrh ʔmr dhʔ ʔtʔ ʔnʔ dʔʕbd ṣbynk ʔlhʔ bhdʔ bṭl lqdmytʔ dnqym ldtrtyn
10:10	bhnʔ gyr ṣbynh ʔtqdšn bqwrbnʔ dpgrh dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ dḥdʔ zbn
10:11	kl rb kwmrʔ gyr dqʔm hwʔ wmšmš klywm hnwn bhnwn dbḥʔ mqrb hwʔ ʔylyn dmn mtwm lʔ mškḥyn hww lmdkyw ḥṭhʔ
10:12	hnʔ dyn ḥd dbḥʔ qrb ḥlp ḥṭhʔ wytb ʕl ymynʔ dʔlhʔ lʕlm
10:13	wmqwʔ mkyl ʕdmʔ dnttsymwn bʕldbbwhy kwbšʔ tḥyt rglwhy
10:14	bḥd gyr qwrbnʔ gmr lʔylyn dmtqdšyn bh lʕlm
10:15	shdʔ ln dyn ʔp rwḥʔ dqwdšʔ dʔmrt
10:16	hdʔ hy dytqʔ dʔtl lhwn mn btr ywmtʔ hnwn ʔmr mryʔ ʔtlywhy lnmwsy bmdʕyhwn wʕl lbwthwn ʔktbywhy
10:17	wʕwlhwn wḥṭhyhwn lʔ ʔtdkr lhwn
10:18	ʔykʔ dyn dʔyt šwbqnʔ dḥṭhʔ lʔ mtbʕʔ qwrbnʔ dḥlp ḥṭhʔ
10:19	ʔyt ln hkyl ʔḥy glywt ʔpʔ bmʕlnʔ dbyt qwdšʔ bdmh dyšwʕ
10:20	wʔwrḥʔ dḥyʔ dḥdt ln hšʔ bʔpy trʕʔ dʔytwhy bsrh
10:21	wʔyt ln kwmrʔ rbʔ ʕl byth dʔlhʔ
10:22	nqrwb hkyl blbʔ šryrʔ wbtwklnʔ dhymnwtʔ kd rsysyn lbwtn wdkyn mn tʔrtʔ byštʔ wmsḥy pgrn bmyʔ dkyʔ
10:23	wnḥmsn btwdytʔ dsbrn wlʔ nṣṭlʔ mhymn hw gyr mn dmlk ln
10:24	wnḥwr ḥd bḥd bgwrgʔ dḥwbʔ wdʕbdʔ ṭbʔ
10:25	wlʔ nhwʔ šbqyn knwšyn ʔyk dʔyt ʕydʔ lʔnš ʔnš ʔlʔ bʕw ḥd mn ḥd ytyrʔyt kmʔ dḥzytwn dqrb ywmʔ hw
10:26	ʔn gyr bṣbynh nḥṭʔ ʔnš mn btr dqbl ydʕtʔ dšrrʔ lyt mkyl dbḥtʔ dttqrb ḥlp ḥṭhʔ
10:27	ʔlʔ ʕtyd hw dynʔ dḥylʔ wṭnnʔ dnwrʔ dʔkl lbʕldbbʔ
10:28	ʔn gyr ʔynʔ dʕbr ʕl nmwsʔ dmwšʔ ʕl pwm tryn wtltʔ shdyn dlʔ rḥmyn mʔt
10:29	kmʔ sbryn ʔntwn ytyrʔyt msm bršʔ nqbl ʔynʔ ddšh lbrh dʔlhʔ wḥšb dmʔ ddytqʔ dylh ʔyk dklnš dbh ʔtqdš wṣʕr lrwḥʔ dṭybwtʔ
10:30	ydʕynn lhw dʔmr ddyly hy tbʕtʔ wʔnʔ ʔprwʕ wtwb dndwn mryʔ lʕmh
10:31	dḥltʔ hy rbtʔ lmpl bʔydwhy dʔlhʔ ḥyʔ
10:32	ʔtdkrw hkyl lywmtʔ qdmyʔ hnwn dbhwn qbltwn mʕmwdytʔ wʔgwnʔ rbʔ sybrtwn dḥšʔ bḥsdʔ wbʔwlṣnʔ
10:33	wdhwytwn ḥzwnʔ wʔp ʔštwtptwn lʔnšʔ dhlyn sybrw
10:34	wkʔb lkwn ʕl ʔylyn dʔsyryn wḥṭwpyʔ dnksykwn bḥdwtʔ sybrtwn mṭl dydʕyn ʔntwn dʔyt lkwn qnynʔ bšmyʔ dmytr hw wlʔ ʕbr
10:35	lʔ hkyl twbdwn glywt ʔpʔ dʔyt lkwn dʕtyd lh ʔgrʔ sgyʔʔ
10:36	msybrnwtʔ hw gyr mtbʕyʔ lkwn dtʕbdwn ṣbynʔ dʔlhʔ wtsbwn mwlknʔ
10:37	mṭl dqlyl hw zbnʔ wṭb zʕwr dnʔtʔ hw dʔtʔ wlʔ nwḥr
10:38	kʔnʔ dyn mn hymnwtʔ dyly nḥʔ wʔn mtqṭʕʔ lh lʔ ṣbyʔ bh npšy
10:39	ḥnn dyn lʔ hwyn dqwṭʕʔ dmwblʔ lʔbdnʔ ʔlʔ dhymnwtʔ dmqnyʔ ln npšn
11:01	ʔytyh dyn hymnwtʔ pysʔ ʕl ʔylyn dʔytyhyn bsbrʔ ʔyk hw dhwy lhyn bswʕrnʔ wglynʔ dʔylyn dlʔ mtḥzyn
11:02	wbhdʔ hwt shdwtʔ ʕl qšyšʔ 
11:03	bhymnwtʔ gyr mstklynn dʔttqnw ʕlmʔ bmltʔ dʔlhʔ whlyn dmtḥzyn hwy mn ʔylyn dlʔ mtḥzyn
11:04	bhymnwtʔ qrb hbyl dbḥtʔ dmytrʔ ṭb mn dqʔyn lʔlhʔ wmṭlth hwt ʕlwhy shdwtʔ dkʔnʔ hw wshd ʕl qwrbnh ʔlhʔ wmṭlth ʔp kd myyt mmll
11:05	bhymnwtʔ ʔštny ḥnwk wmwtʔ lʔ ṭʕm wlʔ ʔštkḥ mṭl dšnyh ʔlhʔ mn qdm dnšnywhy gyr hwt ʕlwhy shdwtʔ dšpr lʔlhʔ
11:06	dlʔ hymnwtʔ dyn lʔ ʔnš mškḥ dnšpr lʔlhʔ ḥyb hw gyr mn dmtqrb lwt ʔlhʔ dnhymn dʔytwhy wlʔylyn dbʕyn lh hwʔ prwʕʔ
11:07	bhymnwtʔ nwḥ kd ʔtmll ʕmh ʕl ʔylyn dlʔ mtḥzyn hwy dḥl wʕbd lh qbwtʔ lḥyʔ dbny byth dbh ḥybh lʕlmʔ whwʔ yrtʔ dkʔnwtʔ dbhymnwtʔ
11:08	bhymnwtʔ ʔbrhm kd ʔtqry ʔštmʕ dnpwq lʔtrʔ hw dʕtyd hwʔ dnsb lyrtwtʔ wnpq kd lʔ ydʕ hwʔ lʔykʔ ʔzl
11:09	bhymnwtʔ hwʔ twtbʔ bʔrʕʔ hy dʔtmlkt lh ʔyk dbnwkrytʔ wbmšknʔ ʕmr ʕm ʔysḥq wyʕqwb bny yrtwtʔ dylh dmwlknʔ
11:10	mskʔ hwʔ gyr lmdyntʔ dštʔstʔ ʔyt lh dʔwmnh wʕbwdh ʔlhʔ hw
11:11	bhymnwtʔ ʔp srʔ dʕqrtʔ hwt nsbt ḥylʔ dtqbl zrʕʔ wdlʔ bzbnʔ dšnyh yldt ʕl dʔšrt dmhymn hw hw dmlk lh
11:12	mṭl hnʔ mn ḥd dbṭl bsybwtʔ ʔtyldw sgyʔʔ ʔyk kwkbʔ dbšmyʔ wʔyk ḥlʔ dʕl spth dymʔ dmnyn lyt lh
11:13	bhymnwtʔ mytw hlyn klhwn wlʔ nsbw mwlknhwn ʔlʔ mn rwḥqʔ ḥzʔwhy wḥdyw bh wʔwdyw dʔksnyʔ ʔnwn wtwtbʔ bʔrʕʔ
11:14	ʔylyn dyn dhlyn ʔmryn mḥwyn dlmdynthwn bʕyn
11:15	wʔlw lmdyntʔ hy dnpqw mnh bʕyn hww ʔyt hwʔ lhwn zbnʔ dtwb nhpkwn nʔzlwn lh
11:16	hšʔ dyn ydyʕʔ dldṭbʔ mnh rgyn hww lhy dʔytyh bšmyʔ mṭl hnʔ lʔ nkp ʔlhʔ dʔlhhwn ntqrʔ ṭyb lhwn gyr mdyntʔ
11:17	bhymnwtʔ qrb ʔbrhm lʔysḥq bnsywnh wlyḥydh ʔsq lmdbḥʔ lhw dqbl hwʔ bmwlknʔ
11:18	ʔtʔmr hwʔ lh gyr dbʔysḥq ntqrʔ lk zrʕʔ
11:19	wʔtrʕy hwʔ bnpšh dmṭyʔ bʔydwhy dʔlhʔ ʔp mn mytʔ lmqmw wmṭl hnʔ bmtlʔ ʔtyhb lh
11:20	bhymnwtʔ dmdm dʕtyd hwʔ brk ʔysḥq lyʕqwb wlʕsw
11:21	bhymnwtʔ kd mʔt yʕqwb brk lkl ḥd ḥd mn bnwhy dywsp wsgd ʕl ryš ḥwṭrh
11:22	bhymnwtʔ ywsp kd mʔt ʕhd lmpqtʔ dbny ʔysryl wpqd ʕl grmwhy
11:23	bhymnwtʔ ʔbhwhy dmwšʔ ṭšywhy kd ʔtyld yrḥʔ tltʔ dḥzw dšpyr hwʔ ṭlyʔ wlʔ dḥlw mn pwqdnʔ dmlkʔ
11:24	bhymnwtʔ mwšʔ kd hwʔ gbrʔ kpr dlʔ ntqrʔ brʔ lbrth dprʕwn
11:25	wgbʔ lh dbʔwlṣnʔ ʕm ʕmh dʔlhʔ nhwʔ wlʔ dzbn zʕwr ntbsm bḥṭytʔ
11:26	wʔtrʕy dmytr hw ʕwtrʔ dḥsdh dmšyḥʔ ṭb mn symth dmṣryn ḥʔr hwʔ gyr bpwrʕn ʔgrʔ
11:27	bhymnwtʔ šbqh lmṣryn wlʔ dḥl mn ḥmth dmlkʔ wsybr ʔyk hw dḥzʔ hwʔ lʔlhʔ dlʔ mtḥzʔ
11:28	bhymnwtʔ ʕbd pṣḥʔ wrss dmʔ dlʔ ntqrb lhwn hw dmḥbl hwʔ bwkrʔ
11:29	bhymnwtʔ ʕbrw ymʔ dswp ʔyk dʕl ʔrʕʔ ybyštʔ wbh ʔtblʕw mṣryʔ kd ʔmrḥw ʕlwhy
11:30	bhymnwtʔ šwryh dʔyryḥw nplw mn dʔtkrkw šbʕʔ ywmyn
11:31	bhymnwtʔ rḥb znytʔ lʔ ʔbdt ʕm hnwn dlʔ ʔštmʕw dqblt lgšwšʔ bšlmʔ
11:32	wmnʔ twb ʔmr zʕwr hw ly gyr zbnʔ dʔštʕʔ ʕl gdʕwn wʕl brq wʕl šmšwn wʕl nptḥ wʕl dwyd wʕl šmwʔyl wʕl šrkʔ dnbyʔ
11:33	ʔylyn dbhymnwtʔ zkw lmlkwtʔ wplḥw kʔnwtʔ wqblw mwlknʔ wskrw pwmʔ dʔrywtʔ
11:34	wdʕkw ḥylʔ dnwrʔ wʔtpṣyw mn pwmʔ dsypʔ wʔtḥylw mn kwrhnʔ whww ḥyltnʔ bqrbʔ wsḥpw mšrytʔ dbʕldbbʔ
11:35	wyhbw lnšʔ bnyhyn mn qymtʔ dmytʔ wʔḥrnʔ bšndʔ mytw wlʔ skyw lmtpṣyw dqymtʔ mytrtʔ thwʔ lhwn
11:36	ʔḥrnʔ dyn lbzḥʔ wlngdʔ ʕlw ʔḥrnʔ lʔswrʔ wlḥbwšyʔ ʔštlmw
11:37	ʔḥrnʔ ʔtrgmw ʔḥrnʔ ʔtnsrw ʔḥrnʔ bpwmʔ dsypʔ mytw ʔḥrnʔ ʔtkrkw kd lbyšyn mškʔ dʔmrʔ wdʕzʔ wsnyqyn wʔlyṣyn wmṭrpyn
11:38	ʔnšʔ dlʔ šwʔ hwʔ lhwn ʕlmʔ whww ʔyk ṭʕyʔ bḥwrbʔ wbṭwrʔ wbmʕrʔ wbpʕryh dʔrʕʔ
11:39	whlyn klhwn dhwt ʕlyhwn shdwtʔ bhymnwthwn lʔ qblw mwlknʔ
11:40	mṭl dʔlhʔ qdm ḥr bʕwdrnn dyln dlʔ blʕdyn ntgmrwn
12:01	mṭl hnʔ ʔp ḥnn dʔyt ln hlyn klhwn shdʔ dʔyk ʕnnʔ ḥdyryn ln nšdʔ mnn kl ywqryn ʔp ḥṭytʔ dbklzbn mṭybʔ hy ln wbmsybrnwtʔ nrhṭywhy lʔgwnʔ hnʔ dsym ln
12:02	wnḥwr byšwʕ dhw hwʔ ryšʔ wgmwrʔ lhymnwtn dḥlp ḥdwtʔ dʔyt hwʔ lh sybr ṣlybʔ wʕl bhttʔ ʔmsr wʕl ymynʔ dkwrsyh dʔlhʔ ytb 
12:03	ḥzw hkyl kmʔ sybr mn ḥṭyʔ hnwn dhnwn hww sqwblʔ lnpšhwn dlʔ tmʔn lkwn wlʔ ttrpʔ npškwn
12:04	lʔ ʕdkyl mṭytwn ʕdmʔ ldmʔ bʔgwnʔ dlwqbl ḥṭytʔ
12:05	wṭʕytwnyhy lywlpnʔ ʔynʔ dʔyk dlbnyʔ ʔmr lkwn bry lʔ thmʔ mn mrdwth dmryʔ wlʔ trpʔ npšk ʔmty dmnh mtkwn ʔnt
12:06	lmn drḥm gyr mryʔ rdʔ lh wmngd lbnyʔ ʔylyn dhw ṣbʔ bhwn
12:07	sybrw hkyl mrdwtʔ mṭl dʔyk dlwt bnyʔ sʕr ṣʔdykwn ʔlhʔ ʔynw gyr brʔ dlʔ rdʔ lh ʔbwhy
12:08	wʔn dlʔ mrdwtʔ ʔntwn hy dbh mtrdʔ klnš hwytwn lkwn nwkryʔ wlʔ bnyʔ
12:09	wʔn ʔbhyn dbsrʔ rdyn hww ln wbhtyn hwyn mnhwn kmʔ hkyl ḥybynn dnštʕbd lʔbwhyn drwḥtʔ wnḥʔ
12:10	hnwn gyr lzbn hw zʕwr ʔyk dṣbyn hww rdyn hww ln ʔlhʔ dyn lʕwdrnn dnštwtp lqdyšwth
12:11	kl mrdwtʔ dyn bzbnh lʔ mstbrʔ ddḥdwtʔ hy ʔlʔ dkrywtʔ lḥrtʔ dyn pʔrʔ dšlmʔ wdzdyqwtʔ yhbʔ lʔylyn dbh ʔtdršw
12:12	mṭl hnʔ ʔydykwn mšrytʔ wbwrkykwn rʕltʔ šrrw
12:13	wšbylʔ tryṣʔ ʕbdw lrglykwn dhdmʔ dḥgyr lʔ nṭʕš ʔlʔ ntʔsʔ
12:14	hrṭw btr šlmʔ ʕm kl ʔnš wbtr qdyšwtʔ dblʕdyh ʔnš lmrn lʔ ḥzʔ
12:15	whwytwn zhyryn dlmʔ ʔnš nštkḥ bkwn dḥsyr mn ṭybwtʔ dʔlhʔ ʔw dlmʔ ʕqrʔ dmrrʔ npq ʕwpyʔ wnhrkwn wbh sgyʔʔ nstybwn
12:16	ʔw lmʔ ʔnš nštkḥ bkwn dzny wrpʔ ʔyk ʕsw dbḥdʔ mʔkwltʔ zbn bwkrwth
12:17	ydʕyn ʔntwn gyr dʔp mn btrkn ṣbʔ hwʔ dnʔrt bwrktʔ wʔstly ʔtrʔ gyr ltybwtʔ lʔ ʔškḥ kd bdmʕʔ bʕh
12:18	lʔ gyr ʔtqrbtwn lnwrʔ dyqdʔ wmtgšʔ ʔplʔ lḥšwkʔ wlʕrplʔ wlʕrwrʔ
12:19	wlʔ lqlʔ dqrnʔ wlqlʔ dmlʔ hw dhnwn dšmʕwhy ʔštʔlw dlʔ nttwsp ntmll ʕmhwn
12:20	lʔ gyr mškḥyn hww lmsybrw mdm dʔtpqdw dʔpn ḥywtʔ ttqrb lwt ṭwrʔ ttrgm
12:21	whknʔ dḥyl hwʔ ḥzwʔ dmwšʔ ʔmr ddḥyl ʔnʔ wrtyt ʔnʔ
12:22	ʔntwn dyn ʔtqrbtwn lṭwrʔ dṣhywn wlmdyntʔ dʔlhʔ ḥyʔ lʔwršlm dbšmyʔ wlknšʔ drbwtʔ dmlʔkʔ
12:23	wlʕdtʔ dbwkrʔ dmtktbyn bšmyʔ wlʔlhʔ dynʔ dkl wlrwḥtʔ dkʔnʔ dʔtgmrw
12:24	wlyšwʕ mṣʕyʔ ddytqʔ ḥdtʔ wlrss dmh dmmll ṭb mn hw dhbyl
12:25	ʔzdhrw hkyl dlmʔ tštʔlwn mn mn dmll ʕmkwn ʔngyr hnwn lʔ ʔtpṣyw dʔštʔlw mn dmll ʕmhwn bʔrʕʔ ḥd kmʔ ḥnn ʔn nštʔl mn mn dmll ʕmn mn šmyʔ
12:26	ʔynʔ dqlh ʔrʕʔ ʔzyʕ hšʔ dyn mlk wʔmr dtwb ḥdʔ zbn ʔnʔ ʔzyʕ lʔ blḥwd ʔrʕʔ ʔlʔ ʔp šmyʔ
12:27	hdʔ dyn dʔmr ḥdʔ zbn mḥwyʔ šwḥlpʔ dhnwn dmtzyʕyn mṭl dʕbydʔ ʔnwn dnqwwn hnwn dlʔ mtzyʕyn
12:28	mṭl hkyl dqbln mlkwtʔ dlʔ mtzyʕʔ nʔḥwd ṭybwtʔ dbh nšmš wnšpr lʔlhʔ btḥmṣtʔ wbdḥltʔ
12:29	ʔlhn gyr nwrʔ hw ʔkltʔ
13:01	ḥwbʔ dʔḥʔ nktr bkwn
13:02	wrḥmtʔ dʔksnyʔ lʔ tṭʕwn bhdʔ gyr šww ʔnšʔ dkd lʔ rgyšyn nqblwn mlʔkʔ
13:03	ʕhdw lʔylyn dʔsyryn ʔyk hw dʕmhwn ʔsyryn ʔntwn ʔtdkrw lʔylyn dʔlyṣyn ʔyk ʔnšʔ dbsrʔ lbyšyn ʔntwn
13:04	myqr hw zwwgʔ bkl wʕrshwn dkyʔ hy lznyʔ dyn wlgyrʔ dʔn ʔlhʔ
13:05	lʔ hwʔ rḥm kspʔ rʕynkwn ʔlʔ nspq lkwn mdm dʔyt lkwn hw gyr mryʔ ʔmr dlʔ ʔšbqk wlʔ ʔrpʔ bk ʔydyʔ
13:06	wʔyt ln dnʔmr tkylʔyt mry mʕdrny lʔ ʔdḥl mnʔ ʕbd ly brnšʔ
13:07	hwytwn ʕhdyn lmdbrnykwn ʔylyn dmllw ʕmkwn mltʔ dʔlhʔ ʔtbqw bšwlmʔ ddwbryhwn wmrw bhymnwthwn
13:08	yšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʔtmly wywmnʔ hwyw wlʕlm
13:09	lywlpnʔ nwkryʔ wmšḥlpʔ lʔ ttdbrwn špyr hw gyr dbṭybwtʔ nšrr lbwtn wlʔ bmʔkltʔ mṭl dlʔ ʔtʕdrw ʔylyn dhlkw bhyn
13:10	ʔyt ln dyn mdbḥʔ dlʔ šlyṭ lmʔkl mnh lhnwn dbmšknʔ mšmšyn
13:11	ḥywtʔ gyr hlyn dmʕl hwʔ dmhyn rb kwmrʔ lbyt mqdšʔ ḥlp ḥṭhʔ bsrhyn yqd hwʔ lbr mn mšrytʔ
13:12	mṭl hnʔ ʔp yšwʕ dnqdš lʕmh bdmh lbr mn mdyntʔ ḥš
13:13	wʔp ḥnn hkyl npwq lwth lbr mn mšrytʔ kd šqylynn ḥsdh
13:14	lyt ln gyr mdyntʔ dmqwyʔ hrkʔ ʔlʔ lʔydʔ dʕtydʔ mskynn
13:15	wbʔydh nsq dbḥʔ dtšbwḥtʔ bklzbn lʔlhʔ dʔytyh pʔrʔ dspwtʔ dmwdyn lšmh
13:16	wlʔ tṭʕwn mrḥmnwtʔ wšwtpwtʔ dmsknʔ bhlyn gyr dbḥʔ špr ʔnš lʔlhʔ
13:17	ʔtṭpysw lmdbrnykwn wʔštmʕw lhwn hnwn gyr šhryn ḥlp npštkwn ʔyk ʔnšʔ dyhbyn ḥwšbnkwn dbḥdwtʔ nhwwn ʕbdyn hdʔ wlʔ btnḥtʔ mṭl dlʔ pqḥʔ lkwn
13:18	ṣlw ʕlyn tkylynn gyr dtʔrtʔ ṭbtʔ ʔyt ln dbklmdm ṣbynn dšpyr ntdbr
13:19	ytyrʔyt bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnkwn dtʕbdwn hdʔ dbʕgl ʔtpnʔ lkwn
13:20	ʔlhʔ dyn dšlmʔ hw dʔsq mn byt mytʔ lrʕyʔ rbʔ dmrʕytʔ bdmʔ ddytqʔ dlʕlm dʔytwhy yšwʕ mšyḥʔ mrn
13:21	hw ngmwrkwn bkl ʕbd ṭb dtʕbdwn ṣbynh whw nsʕwr bn mdm dšpyr qdmwhy byd yšwʕ mšyḥʔ dlh šwbḥʔ lʕlm ʕlmyn ʔmyn
13:22	bʕʔ ʔnʔ dyn mnkwn ʔḥy dtgrwn rwḥkwn bmltʔ dbwyʔʔ mṭl dbzʕwrytʔ hw ktbt lkwn
13:23	dʕw dyn lʔḥwn ṭymtʔws dʔštry wʔn bʕgl nʔtʔ ʕmh ʔḥzykwn
13:24	šʔlw bšlmʔ dklhwn mdbrnykwn wdklhwn qdyšʔ šʔlyn bšlmkwn klhwn dmn ʔyṭlyʔ
13:25	ṭybwtʔ ʕm klkwn ʔmyn 
01:01	yʕqwb ʕbdh dʔlhʔ wdmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ ltrtʕsrʔ šrbn dzryʕn bʕmmʔ šlm
01:02	kl ḥdwʔ thwʔ lkwn ʔḥy kd tʕlwn lnsywnʔ mšḥlpʔ wsgyʔʔ
01:03	ydʕyn ʔntwn gyr dbwqyʔ dhymnwtʔ mqnʔ lkwn msybrnwtʔ
01:04	lh dyn lmsybrnwtʔ nhwʔ lh ʕbdʔ mšmlyʔ dthwwn gmyryn wmšlmnyn wbmdm lʔ hwytwn ḥsyryn
01:05	ʔn ʔnš dyn mnkwn ḥsyr mn ḥkmtʔ nšʔl mn ʔlhʔ dyhb lkl pšyṭʔyt wlʔ mḥsd wmtyhbʔ lh
01:06	nšʔl dyn bhymnwtʔ kd lʔ mtplg hw gyr dmtplg dmʔ lgllʔ dymʔ dšgšʔ lhwn rwḥʔ
01:07	wlʔ nsbr hw brnšʔ dnsb mdm mn mryʔ
01:08	ʔynʔ dplyg brʕynh wšgyš bklhyn ʔwrḥth
01:09	nštbhr dyn ʔḥʔ mkykʔ brwmrmh
01:10	wʕtyrʔ bmwkkh mṭl dʔyk hbbʔ dʕsbʔ hknʔ ʕbr
01:11	dnḥ gyr šmšʔ bḥwmh wmwbš lh lʕsbʔ whbbh npl wšwprʔ dḥzwh ʔbd hknʔ ʔp ʕtyrʔ ḥmʔ bhwpkwhy
01:12	ṭwbwhy lgbrʔ dmsybr nsywnʔ dmʔ dʔtbḥr nsb klylʔ dḥyʔ hw dmlk ʔlhʔ lʔylyn drḥmyn lh
01:13	lʔ nʔmr ʔnš kd mtnsʔ dmn ʔlhʔ mtnsʔ ʔnʔ ʔlhʔ gyr lʔ mnsy bbyštʔ whw lʔnš lʔ mnsʔ
01:14	ʔlʔ ʔnš ʔnš mn rgth hw mtnsʔ wmtrgrg wmtngd
01:15	whdʔ rgtʔ bṭnʔ wyldʔ ḥṭytʔ ḥṭytʔ dyn mʔ dʔtgmrt yldʔ mwtʔ
01:16	lʔ tṭʕwn ʔḥy ḥbybʔ
01:17	kl mwhbtʔ ṭbtʔ wmšmlytʔ mn lʕl nḥtʔ mn ʔbʔ dnhyrʔ hw dlyt lwth šwḥlpʔ mdm ʔplʔ ṭlnytʔ dšwgnyʔ
01:18	hwyw ṣbʔ wyldn bmltʔ dqwštʔ dnhwʔ ršytʔ dbryth
01:19	wʔntwn ʔḥy ḥbybʔ klnš mnkwn nhwʔ msrhb lmšmʕ wmwḥr lmmllw wmwḥr lmrgz
01:20	rwgzh gyr dgbrʔ zdyqwtʔ dʔlhʔ lʔ ʕbd
01:21	mṭl hnʔ ʔrḥqw mnkwn klh ṭnpwtʔ wswgʔʔ dbyšwtʔ wbmkykwtʔ qblw mltʔ dnṣybʔ bkynn dhy mškḥʔ dtḥʔ ʔnyn npštkwn
01:22	hww dyn ʕbwdʔ dmltʔ wlʔ šmwʕʔ blḥwd wlʔ tṭʕwn npštkwn
01:23	ʔn ʔnš gyr nhwʔ šmwʕh dmltʔ wlʔ ʕbwdh hnʔ dmʔ lhw dḥzʔ ʔpwhy bmḥzytʔ
01:24	ḥzʔ gyr npšh wʕbr wṭʕʔ dʔyknʔ hwʔ
01:25	kl dyn dḥr bnmwsʔ mšlmnʔ dḥʔrwtʔ wqwy bh lʔ hwʔ šmwʕʔ dšmʕʔ dmtṭʕʔ ʔlʔ ʕbwdʔ dʕbdʔ whnʔ ṭwbnʔ nhwʔ bʕbdh
01:26	wʔn ʔnš sbr dmšmš lʔlhʔ wlʔ ʔḥd lšnh ʔlʔ mṭʕʔ lh lbh dhnʔ sryqʔ hy tšmšth
01:27	tšmštʔ gyr dkytʔ wqdyštʔ qdm ʔlhʔ ʔbʔ hdʔ hy lmsʕr ytmʔ wʔrmltʔ bʔwlṣnyhwn wlmṭr ʔnš npšh mn ʕlmʔ dlʔ ṭwlšʔ
02:01	ʔḥy lʔ bmsb bʔpʔ thwwn ʔḥydyn lhymnwtʔ dtšbwḥth dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
02:02	ʔn gyr nʕwl lknwštkwn ʔnš dʕzqth ddhbʔ ʔw dmʔnwhy špyrʔ wnʕwl msknʔ bmʔnʔ ṣʔʔ
02:03	wtḥwrwn bhw dlbyš mʔnʔ špyrʔ wtʔmrwn lh ʔnt hrkʔ tb špyr wlmsknʔ tʔmrwn lh ʔnt qwm lhl ʔw tb lk hrkʔ qdm kwbšʔ drglyn
02:04	lʔ hʔ ʔtplgtwn lkwn bnpškwn whwytwn mpršnʔ dmḥšbtʔ byštʔ
02:05	šmʕw ʔḥy ḥbybʔ lʔ hwʔ lmsknʔ dʕlmʔ ʕtyrʔ dyn bhymnwtʔ gbʔ ʔlhʔ dnhwwn yrtʔ bmlkwtʔ hy dmlk ʔlhʔ lʔylyn drḥmyn lh
02:06	ʔntwn dyn šṭtwnyhy lmsknʔ lʔ hʔ ʕtyrʔ mštʕlyn ʕlykwn whnwn ngdyn lkwn lbyt dynʔ
02:07	lʔ hʔ hnwn mgdpyn ʕl šmʔ ṭbʔ dʔtqry ʕlykwn
02:08	wʔn nmwsʔ dʔlhʔ bhdʔ mšlmytwn ʔyk dktyb dtrḥm lqrybk ʔyk npšk špyr ʕbdyn ʔntwn
02:09	ʔn dyn bʔpʔ nsbyn ʔntwn ḥṭytʔ ʕbdyn ʔntwn wmtkwnyn ʔntwn mn nmwsʔ ʔyk ʕbry ʕl nmwsʔ
02:10	ʔynʔ gyr dklh nmwsʔ nṭr wbḥdʔ šrʕ lklh nmwsʔ ʔtḥyb
02:11	hw gyr dʔmr dlʔ tgwr hw ʔmr dlʔ tqṭwl ʔn dyn lʔ gʔr ʔnt ʔlʔ qṭl ʔnt hwyt lk ʕbr ʕl nmwsʔ
02:12	hknʔ hwytwn mmllyn whknʔ hwytwn sʕryn ʔyk ʔnšʔ dbnmwsʔ dḥʔrwtʔ ʕtydyn ʔntwn lmtdnw
02:13	dynʔ gyr hwʔ dlʔ rḥmʔ ʕl hw dlʔ ʕbd rḥmʔ mštʕlyn ʔntwn brḥmʔ ʕl dynʔ
02:14	mnʔ hnynʔ ʔḥy ʔn ʔnš ʔmr dʔyt ly hymnwtʔ wʕbdʔ lyt lh dlmʔ mškḥʔ hymnwth dtḥywhy
02:15	wʔn ʔḥʔ ʔw ḥtʔ nhwwn ʕrṭlyyn wḥsyryn sybrtʔ dywmʔ
02:16	wnʔmr lhwn ʔnš mnkwn zlw bšlmʔ šḥnw wsbʕw wlʔ ttlwn lhwn snyqwth dpgrʔ mnʔ hnynʔ
02:17	hknʔ ʔp hymnwtʔ dlʔ ʕbdʔ mytʔ hy blḥwdyh
02:18	ʔmr gyr ʔnš lk ʔyt lk hymnwtʔ wly ʔyt ly ʕbdʔ ḥwny hymnwtk dlʔ ʕbdʔ wʔnʔ mḥwʔ ʔnʔ lk hymnwty mn ʕbdy
02:19	mhymn ʔnt dḥd hw ʔlhʔ špyr ʕbd ʔnt ʔp šʔdʔ mhymnyn wrʕlyn 
02:20	ṣbʔ ʔnt dyn dtdʕ ʔw brnšʔ ḥlšʔ dhymnwtʔ dlʔ ʕbdʔ mytʔ hy
02:21	ʔbwn ʔbrhm lʔ hwʔ mn ʕbdʔ ʔzddq dʔsq lʔysḥq brh ʕl mdbḥʔ
02:22	ḥzʔ ʔnt dhymnwth syʕt lʕbdwhy wmn ʕbdʔ hymnwth ʔtgmrt
02:23	wšlm ktbʔ dʔmr dhymn ʔbrhm bʔlhʔ wʔtḥšbt lh lzdyqw wrḥmʔ dʔlhʔ ʔtqry
02:24	ḥzʔ ʔnt dmn ʕbdʔ mzddq brnšʔ wlʔ hwʔ mn hymnwtʔ blḥwd
02:25	hknʔ ʔp rḥb znytʔ lʔ hwʔ mn ʕbdʔ ʔzddqt dqblt lgšwšʔ wbʔwrḥʔ ʔḥrtʔ ʔpqt ʔnwn
02:26	ʔyknʔ dpgrʔ dlʔ rwḥʔ myt hw hknʔ ʔp hymnwtʔ dlʔ ʕbdʔ mytʔ hy
03:01	lʔ sgyʔʔ mlpnʔ nhwwn bkwn ʔḥy ʔlʔ hwytwn ydʕyn ddynʔ ytyrʔ ḥybynn
03:02	sgyʔtʔ gyr mštrʕynn kln kl dbmltʔ lʔ šrʕ hnʔ ʔytwhy gbrʔ gmyrʔ dmškḥ nšʕbd ʔp klh pgrh
03:03	hʔ gyr pgwdʔ bpwmʔ drkšʔ rmynn ʔyk dnštʕbdwn ln wklh gwšmhwn mhpkynn
03:04	ʔp ʔlpʔ ʕšyntʔ kd dbyrn lhyn rwḥʔ qšytʔ mn qysʔ zʕwrʔ mtntpn lʔtr dḥʔr ṣbynh dhw dmdbr
03:05	hknʔ ʔp lšnʔ hdmʔ hw zʕwrʔ wmštʕlʔ ʔp nwrʔ zʕwrtʔ ʕbʔ sgyʔʔ mwqdʔ
03:06	wlšnʔ nwrʔ hw wʕlmʔ dḥṭytʔ ʔyk ʕbʔ hw whw lšnʔ kd ʔytwhy bhdmyn mktm lh lklh pgrn wmwqd ywblʔ dšrbtn drhṭyn ʔyk gyglʔ wyqd ʔp hw bnwrʔ
03:07	klhwn gyr kynʔ dḥywtʔ wdprḥtʔ wrḥšʔ dymʔ wdybšʔ mštʕbdyn lkynʔ dʔnšwtʔ
03:08	lšnʔ dyn ʔnš lʔ ʔškḥ dnkbšywhy byštʔ hdʔ dlʔ mttksʔ mlʔ hw smʔ dmwtʔ
03:09	bh mbrkynn lmryʔ wʔbʔ wbh lyṭynn lbnynšʔ dbdmwtʔ dʔlhʔ ʕbydyn
03:10	wmnh mn pwmʔ npqn bwrktʔ wlwṭtʔ lʔ wlʔ ʔḥy dhlyn hknʔ nstʕrn
03:11	dlmʔ mškḥʔ dmn ḥd mbwʕʔ npqwn myʔ ḥlyʔ wmryrʔ
03:12	ʔw dlmʔ mškḥʔ ttʔ ʔḥy dzytʔ tʕbd ʔw gptʔ tʔnʔ hknʔ ʔp lʔ myʔ mlyḥʔ mškḥyn dntʕbdwn ḥlyʔ
03:13	mnw mnkwn dḥkym wrdʔ nḥwʔ ʕbdwhy bhwpkʔ špyrʔ bḥkmtʔ mkyktʔ
03:14	ʔn dyn ḥsmʔ mryrʔ ʔyt bkwn ʔw ḥrynʔ blbykwn lʔ ttḥtrwn ʕl qwštʔ wtdglwn
03:15	mṭl dhdʔ ḥkmtʔ mn lʕl lʔ nḥtt ʔlʔ ʔytyh ʔrʕnytʔ mn ḥwšbʔ dnpšʔ wmn šʔdʔ
03:16	ʔykʔ gyr dʔyt ḥsmʔ wḥrynʔ tmn ʔp dlwḥyʔ wklmdm dbyš
03:17	ḥkmtʔ dyn dmn lʕl dkyʔ hy wmlyʔ šlmʔ wmkykʔ wmštmʕnyʔ wmlyʔ rḥmʔ wpʔrʔ ṭbʔ wdlʔ plgwtʔ hy wbʔpʔ lʔ nsbʔ
03:18	pʔrʔ dyn dzdyqwtʔ bšynʔ mzdrʕyn lʔylyn dʕbdyn šlmʔ
04:01	mn ʔykʔ ʔyt bkwn qrbʔ wmṣwtʔ lʔ hwʔ mn rgygtʔ dmqrbn bhdmykwn
04:02	mtrgrgyn ʔntwn wlyt lkwn wqṭlyn ʔntwn wṭnyn ʔntwn wlʔ ʔtyʔ bʔydykwn wnṣyn ʔntwn wqrbʔ ʕbdyn ʔntwn wlyt lkwn mṭl dlʔ šʔlyn ʔntwn
04:03	šʔlyn ʔntwn wlʔ nsbyn ʔntwn mṭl dbyšʔyt šʔlyn ʔntwn ʔyk dttrswn rgygtkwn
04:04	gyrʔ lʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn drḥmth dʕlmʔ hnʔ bʕldbbwtʔ hy dʔlhʔ ʔynʔ hkyl dṣbʔ dnhwʔ rḥmʔ dʕlmʔ hnʔ bʕldbbʔ hwʔ lʔlhʔ
04:05	ʔw dlmʔ sryqʔyt sbryn ʔntwn dʔmr ktbʔ dbṭnnʔ rgʔ rwḥʔ dʕmrʔ bn
04:06	ṭybwtʔ dyn ytyrtʔ yhb ln mrn mṭl hdʔ ʔmr dʔlhʔ mmkk lrmʔ wlmkykʔ yhb ṭybwtʔ
04:07	ʔštʕbdw hkyl lʔlhʔ wqwmw lwqbl sṭnʔ wʕrq mnkwn
04:08	wqrwbw lwt ʔlhʔ wntqrb lkwn dkw ʔydykwn ḥṭyʔ qdšw lbwtkwn plygy npšʔ
04:09	ʔtmkkw wʔtʔblw wgwḥkkwn lʔblʔ nthpk wḥdwtkwn lʕqtʔ
04:10	ʔtmkkw qdm mryʔ wnrmrmkwn
04:11	lʔ thwwn mmllyn ʕl ḥddʔ ʔḥy hw gyr dmmll ʕl ʔḥwhy ʔw dʔn lʔḥwhy mmll ʕl nmwsʔ wdʔn lnmwsʔ wʔn lnmwsʔ dʔn ʔnt lʔ hwyt ʕbwdh dnmwsʔ ʔlʔ dynh
04:12	ḥd hw sʔm nmwsʔ wdynʔ dhw mškḥ dnḥʔ wnwbd ʔnt dyn mn ʔnt ddʔn ʔnt lh lqrybk
04:13	mnʔ dyn nʔmr ʔp ʕl ʔylyn dʔmryn dywmnʔ ʔw mḥr ʔzlynn lmdyntʔ ʔydʔ dhy wʕbdynn tmn šntʔ ḥdʔ wmttgrynn wytrynn
04:14	wlʔ ydʕyn mnʔ hwʔ mḥr mnʔ ʔnwn gyr ḥyyn ʔlʔ ʔn lhgʔ dqlyl mtḥzʔ wṭlq wmwpʔ
04:15	ḥlp dnʔmrwn dʔn mryʔ nṣbʔ wnḥʔ ʕbdynn hdʔ ʔw hy
04:16	mštbhryn bḥtyrwthwn kl šwbhrʔ dʔyk hnʔ byšʔ hw
04:17	wʔynʔ dydʕ ṭbtʔ wlʔ ʕbd lh ḥṭhʔ hwʔ lh
05:01	ʔw ʕtyrʔ ʔyllw wbkw ʕl dwwnʔ dʔtyn ʕlykwn
05:02	ʕwtrkwn gyr ʔtḥbl wsry wmʔnykwn ʔtʔklw mn ssʔ
05:03	wdhbkwn wsʔmkwn ʔšḥt lh wšwḥthwn hwyʔ lshdwtʔ ʕlykwn why ʕtydʔ dtʔkwl bsrkwn nwrʔ knštwn lkwn lywmtʔ ʔḥryʔ
05:04	hʔ ʔgrʔ dpʕlʔ dḥṣdw ʔrʕtkwn hw dṭlmtwn qʕʔ wgʕtʔ dḥṣwdʔ lʔdnwhy dmryʔ ṣbʔwt ʕlt
05:05	bsmtwn gyr ʕl ʔrʕʔ wʔtlʕbtwn wtrsytwn pgrykwn ʔyk dlywmʔ dnkstʔ
05:06	ḥybtwn wqṭltwn lzdyqʔ wlʔ qm lwqblkwn 
05:07	ʔntwn dyn ʔḥy ʔgrw rwḥkwn ʕdmʔ lmʔtyth dmryʔ ʔyk ʔkrʔ dmskʔ lpʔrʔ yqyrʔ dʔrʕh wmgr rwḥh ʕlyhwn ʕdmʔ dnsb mṭrʔ bkyryʔ wlqyšyʔ
05:08	hknʔ ʔp ʔntwn ʔgrw rwḥkwn wlbwtkwn šrrw qrbt lh gyr mʔtyth dmrn
05:09	lʔ ttnḥwn ḥd ʕl ḥd ʔḥy dlʔ ttdynwn hʔ gyr dynʔ qdm trʕʔ qʔm
05:10	dmwtʔ lnbyʔ sbw lkwn ʔḥy lmgrt rwḥʔ dʔwlṣnykwn hnwn dmllw bšmh dmryʔ
05:11	hʔ gyr yhbynn ṭwbʔ lʔylyn dsybrw šmʕtwn msybrnwth dʔywb wḥrtʔ dʕbd lh mryʔ ḥzytwn mṭl dmrḥmn hw mryʔ wmrḥpn
05:12	qdm kl mdm dyn ʔḥy lʔ hwytwn ymyn lʔ bšmyʔ wlʔ bʔrʕʔ ʔplʔ bmwmtʔ ʔḥrtʔ ʔlʔ thwʔ mltkwn ʔyn ʔyn wlʔ lʔ dlʔ ttḥybwn tḥyt dynʔ
05:13	wʔn ʔnš mnkwn nhwʔ bʔwlṣnʔ nhwʔ mṣlʔ wʔn ḥdʔ nhwʔ mzmr
05:14	wʔn kryh nqrʔ lqšyšʔ dʕdtʔ wnṣlwn ʕlwhy wnmšḥwnh mšḥʔ bšmh dmrn
05:15	wṣlwtʔ dhymnwtʔ mḥlmʔ lh lhw dkryh wmqym lh mrn wʔn ḥṭhʔ ʕbydyn lh mštbqyn lh
05:16	hwytwn dyn mwdyn sklwtkwn ḥd lḥd whwytwn mṣlyn ḥd ʕl ḥd dttʔswn rb hw gyr ḥylh dṣlwtʔ ʔydʔ dzdyqʔ mṣlʔ lh
05:17	ʔp ʔlyʔ brnšʔ hwʔ ḥšwšʔ ʔkwtn wṣly dlʔ nḥwt mṭrʔ ʕl ʔrʕʔ wlʔ nḥt tlt šnyn wštʔ yrḥyn
05:18	wtwb ṣly wšmyʔ yhbw mṭrʔ wʔrʕʔ yhbt pʔryh
05:19	ʔḥy ʔn ʔnš mnkwn nṭʕʔ mn ʔwrḥʔ dqwštʔ wnpnywhy ʔnš mn ṭʕywth
05:20	ndʕ dhw dmhpk lḥṭyʔ mn ṭʕywtʔ dʔwrḥh mḥʔ npšh mn mwtʔ wʕṭʔ swgʔʔ dḥṭhwhy
01:01	pṭrws šlyḥʔ dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ lgbyʔ wtwtbʔ dzryʕyn bpnṭws wbglṭyʔ wbqpwdqyʔ wbʔsyʔ wbbytwnyʔ
01:02	ʔylyn dʔtgbyw bmqdmwt ydʕth dʔlhʔ ʔbʔ bqdyšwtʔ drwḥʔ dnhwwn lmšmʕtʔ wlrss dmh dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ ṭybwtʔ wšlmʔ nsgʔ lwtkwn
01:03	mbrk hw ʔlhʔ ʔbwhy dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ hw dbḥnnh sgyʔʔ ʔwldn mn dryš bqymth dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ lsbrʔ dḥyʔ
01:04	wlyrtwtʔ dlʔ mtḥblʔ wlʔ mtṭnpʔ wlʔ ḥmyʔ hy dmṭybʔ lkwn bšmyʔ
01:05	kd nṭyryn ʔntwn bḥylʔ dʔlhʔ wbhymnwtʔ lḥyʔ dmṭybyn dntglwn lzbnʔ ʔḥryʔ
01:06	dbhwn tḥdwn lʕlm ʔpn bhnʔ zbnʔ qlyl mttʕyqyn ʔntwn bnsywnʔ mšḥlpʔ dʕdyn ʕlykwn
01:07	ʔyknʔ dbwḥrnʔ dhymnwtkwn ntḥzʔ dmytr mn dhbʔ snynʔ dʔtbqy bnwrʔ ltšbwḥtʔ wlʔyqrʔ wlqwlsʔ bglynh dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:08	hw dlʔ ḥzytwnyhy wmḥbyn ʔntwn lh wbhymnwth rwzyn ʔntwn bḥdwtʔ mšbḥtʔ dlʔ mtmllʔ
01:09	dtqblwn pwrʕnʔ dhymnwtkwn ḥyʔ dnpštkwn
01:10	hnwn ḥyʔ dʕqbw hww ʕlyhwn nbyʔ kd ʔtnbyw ʕl ṭybwtʔ dʕtydʔ hwt dttyhb lkwn
01:11	wbṣw dbʔynʔ zbnʔ mḥwyʔ wmshdʔ rwḥh dmšyḥʔ dʕmrʔ bhwn dʕtydyn ḥšwhy dmšyḥʔ wtšbwḥth dmn btrkn
01:12	wʔtgly lhwn kl dbṣyn hww mṭl dlw lnpšhwn bʕyn hww ʔlʔ ln dyln mtnbyn hww ʔylyn dhšʔ ʔtgly lkwn byd ʔylyn dsbrnkwn brwḥʔ dqwdšʔ dʔštdr mn šmyʔ dbhyn bhlyn mtrgrgyn ʔp mlʔkʔ dndyqwn
01:13	mṭl hnʔ ḥzwqw ḥṣʔ dtrʕytkwn wʔttʕyrw gmyrʔyt wsbrw ʕl ḥdwtʔ dʔtyʔ lkwn bglynh dmrn yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:14	ʔyk bnyʔ mštmʕnʔ wlʔ tštwtpwn twb lrgygtkwn qdmytʔ ʔylyn drgyn hwytwn dlʔ bydʕtʔ
01:15	ʔlʔ hww qdyšyn bklhwn hwpkykwn ʔyk dqdyš hw mn dqrkwn
01:16	mṭl dktyb dhwytwn qdyšyn ʔyknʔ dʔp ʔnʔ qdyš ʔnʔ
01:17	wʔn hw dʔbʔ qryn ʔntwn hw dlyt qdmwhy msb bʔpʔ wdʔn lklnš ʔyk ʕbdwhy bdḥltʔ ʔtdbrw bzbnʔ hnʔ dtwtbwtkwn
01:18	kd ydʕyn ʔntwn dlʔ bkspʔ dblʔ wlʔ bdhbʔ ʔtprqtwn mn ʕbdykwn sryqʔ hnwn dqbltwn mn ʔbhykwn
01:19	ʔlʔ bdmʔ yqyrʔ dʔmrʔ dmwmʔ wṭwlšʔ lyt bh dʔytwhy mšyḥʔ
01:20	hw dmqdm hwʔ pryš lhdʔ mn qdm trmyth dʕlmʔ wʔtgly bʔḥrythwn dzbnʔ mṭltkwn
01:21	ʔylyn dbʔydh hymntwn bʔlhʔ hw dʔqymh mn byt mytʔ wyhb lh šwbḥʔ dhymnwtkwn wsbrkwn nhwʔ ʕl ʔlhʔ
01:22	kd nhwyn qdyšn npštkwn bmštmʕnwth dšrrʔ wnhwyn mlyn ḥwbʔ dlʔ msb bʔpʔ dmn lbʔ dkyʔ wgmyrʔ thwwn mḥbyn ḥd lḥd
01:23	ʔyk ʔnšʔ dmn dryš ʔtyldtwn lʔ mn zrʕʔ dblʔ ʔlʔ mn ʔynʔ dlʔ blʔ bmltʔ ḥytʔ dʔlhʔ dqymʔ lʕlm
01:24	mṭl dkl bsr ʕmyrʔ wklh yʔywth ʔyk ʕwpyʔ dḥqlʔ ybš ʕmyrʔ wḥmʔ ʕwpyʔ
01:25	wmlth dʔlhn qymʔ lʕlmyn whdʔ hy mltʔ hy dʔstbrtwn
02:01	ʔnyḥw hkyl mnkwn klh byšwtʔ wklh nklʔ wmsb bʔpʔ wḥsmʔ wmʔkl qrṣʔ
02:02	whww ʔyk ylwdʔ šbrʔ wʔtrgrgw lh lmltʔ ʔyk dlḥlbʔ nqdʔ wrwḥnʔ dbh ttrbwn lḥyʔ
02:03	ʔn ṭʕmtwn wḥzytwn dṭb hw mryʔ
02:04	hw dlh mtqrbyn ʔntwn dʔytwhy kʔpʔ ḥyʔ dʔslywhy bny ʔnšʔ wgbʔ wmyqr lwt ʔlhʔ
02:05	wʔp ʔntwn ʔyk kʔpʔ ḥytʔ ʔtbnw whww hyklʔ rwḥnʔ wkhnʔ qdyšʔ lmsqw dbḥʔ rwḥnʔ dmqblyn qdm ʔlhʔ byd yšwʕ mšyḥʔ 
02:06	ʔmyr hw gyr bktbʔ dhʔ sʔm ʔnʔ bṣhywn kʔpʔ bḥyrtʔ wyqyrtʔ bryš zwytʔ wmn dmhymn bh lʔ nbht
02:07	lkwn hkyl ʔtyhb hnʔ ʔyqrʔ lʔylyn dmhymnyn lhnwn dyn dlʔ mtṭpysyn
02:08	kʔpʔ hw dtwqltʔ wʔbnʔ dkšlʔ wmttqlyn bh bdlʔ mtṭpysyn lmltʔ dlhdʔ symyn
02:09	ʔntwn dyn šrbtʔ ʔntwn gbytʔ dmkhnʔ lmlkwtʔ ʕmʔ qdyšʔ knšʔ pryqʔ tsbrwn tšbḥth dhw dqrkwn mn ḥšwkʔ lnwhrh mytrʔ
02:10	ʔylyn dmn qdym lʔ ḥšybyn hwytwn ʕmʔ hšʔ dyn ʕmʔ dʔlhʔ ʔplʔ rḥmʔ ʔyt hww ʕlykwn hšʔ dyn ʔštpʕw ʕlykwn rḥmʔ
02:11	ḥbyby bʕʔ ʔnʔ mnkwn ʔyk ʕrṣʔ wʔyk twtbʔ ʔtprqw mn klhyn rgygth dpgrʔ hlyn dʕbdn qrbʔ lwqbl npšʔ
02:12	wnhwwn špyryn hwpkykwn qdm klhwn bny ʔnšʔ ʔylyn dmmllyn ʕlykwn mlʔ byštʔ nḥzwn ʕbdykwn špyrʔ wnšbḥwn lʔlhʔ bywmʔ dbwḥrnʔ
02:13	whwytwn mštʕbdyn lklhwn bny ʔnšʔ mṭl ʔlhʔ lmlkʔ mṭl šwlṭnhwn
02:14	wldynʔ mṭl dmnh mštdryn ltbʕtʔ dmsklnʔ wltšbwḥtʔ dʕbdy ṭbtʔ
02:15	dhknʔ hw ṣbynʔ dʔlhʔ dbʕbdykwn špyrʔ tskrwn pwmʔ dsklʔ hnwn dlʔ ydʕyn lʔlhʔ
02:16	ʔyk bny ḥʔrʔ wlʔ ʔyk ʔnšʔ dʕbydʔ lhwn ḥʔrwthwn tḥpytʔ lbyšwthwn ʔlʔ ʔyk ʕbdwhy dʔlhʔ
02:17	lklnš yqrw lʔḥykwn ʔḥbw wmn ʔlhʔ dḥlw wlmlkʔ yqrw
02:18	wʔylyn ʕbdʔ dʔyt bkwn ʔštʕbdw lmrykwn bdḥltʔ lʔ blḥwd lṭbʔ wlmkykʔ ʔlʔ ʔp lqšyʔ wlʕsqʔ
02:19	lhlyn gyr ʔyt lhwn ṭybwtʔ qdm ʔlhʔ lʔylyn dmṭl tʔrtʔ špyrtʔ msybryn ʕqtʔ dʔtyn ʕlyhwn bʕwlʔ
02:20	ʔylyn dyn dmṭl sklwthwn msybryn ʔwlṣnʔ ʔydʔ tšbwḥtʔ hwyʔ lhwn ʔlʔ mʔ dʕbdyn ʔntwn dšpyr wʔlṣyn lkwn wmsybryn ʔntwn hydyn yrbʔ tšbwḥtkwn lwt ʔlhʔ
02:21	lhdʔ gyr ʔtqrytwn dʔp mšyḥʔ myt ḥlpyn wšbq ln hnʔ ṭwpsʔ dʔntwn bʕqbth thlkwn
02:22	hw dlʔ ʕbd ḥṭytʔ ʔplʔ nklʔ ʔštkḥ bpwmh
02:23	hw dmṣṭḥʔ hwʔ wlʔ mṣḥʔ wḥʔš hwʔ wlʔ mtlḥm ʔlʔ mšlm hwʔ0 ldynʔ dkʔnwtʔ
02:24	wšql ḥṭhyn klhwn wʔsq ʔnwn bpgrh lṣlybʔ dkd mytynn lḥṭytʔ bzdyqwtʔ dylh nḥʔ bšwmth gyr ʔtʔsytwn
02:25	dṭʕyn hwytwn ʔyk ʕrbʔ wʔtpnytwn hšʔ lwt rʕyʔ wsʕwrʔ dnpštkwn
03:01	hknʔ ʔp ʔntyn nšʔ ʔštʕbdyn lbʕlykyn dʔylyn dlʔ mtṭpysyn lmltʔ bdwbrykyn špyrʔ dlʔ ʕmlʔ tqnyn ʔnwn
03:02	kd ḥzyn dbdḥltʔ wbnkpwtʔ mtdbrn ʔntyn
03:03	wlʔ tṣṭbtn bṣbtʔ bryʔ dgdwlʔ dsʕrykyn ʔw dḥšltʔ ddhbʔ ʔw dlbwšʔ mytrʔ
03:04	ʔlʔ ʔṣṭbtyn bbrnšʔ ksyʔ dlbʔ brwḥʔ mkyktʔ dlʔ mtḥblʔ ṣbtʔ dmytr qdm ʔlhʔ
03:05	hknʔ gyr ʔp mn qdym nšʔ qdyštʔ ʔylyn dmsbrn hwy bʔlhʔ mṣbtn hwy npšthyn wmštʕbdn hwy lbʕlyhyn
03:06	ʔyknʔ dsrʔ mštʕbdʔ hwt lʔbrhm wqryʔ hwt lh mry hy dhwyn ʔntyn lh bntʔ bʕbdʔ ṭbʔ kd lʔ mttzyʕn ʔntyn mn kl dḥlʔ
03:07	wʔntwn gbrʔ hknʔ ʕmrw ʕm nšykwn bydʕtʔ wʔyk dlmʔnʔ mḥylʔ bʔyqrʔ ʔḥwdw ʔnyn mṭl dʔp hnyn ʕmkwn yrtn mwhbtʔ dḥyʔ dlʕlm dlʔ thwwn mttqlyn bṣlwtkwn
03:08	šwlmʔ dyn dthwwn klkwn bʔwywtʔ whwytwn ḥšyn ʕm ʔylyn dḥšyn wrḥmyn ḥd lḥd whwytwn rḥmtnyn wmkykyn
03:09	wlʔnš byštʔ ḥlp byštʔ lʔ tprʕwn wʔplʔ ṣwḥytʔ ḥlp ṣwḥytʔ ʔlʔ dlqwblʔ dhlyn hwytwn mbrkyn lhdʔ gyr ʔtqrytwn dbwrktʔ tʔrtwn
03:10	mn dṣbʔ hkyl ḥyʔ wrḥm ywmtʔ ṭbʔ lmḥzʔ nṭr lšnh mn byštʔ wspwth lʔ nmlln nklʔ
03:11	nʕbr mn byštʔ wnʕbd ṭbtʔ wnbʕʔ šlmʔ wnrhṭ btrh
03:12	mṭl dʕynwhy dmryʔ ʕl zdyqʔ wʔdnwhy lmšmʕ ʔnwn wʔpwhy dmryʔ ʕl byšʔ
03:13	wmnw dnʕbd lkwn byštʔ ʔn thwwn ṭnnʔ dṭbtʔ
03:14	wʔn hw dtḥšwn ʕl ʔpy kʔnwtʔ ṭwbykwn wlʔ tdḥlwn mn ʔylyn dmdḥlyn lkwn wlʔ tštgšwn
03:15	ʔlʔ qdšw blbwtkwn lmryʔ mšyḥʔ whwytwn mṭybyn lmpq brwḥʔ lkl dtbʕ lkwn mltʔ ʕl sbrʔ dhymnwtkwn bmkykwtʔ wbdḥltʔ
03:16	kd ʔyt lkwn tʔrtʔ ṭbtʔ ʔyknʔ dhnwn dmmllyn ʕlykwn ʔyk dʕl ʔnšʔ byšʔ nbhtwn ʔyk ʔnšʔ dṭlmyn ldwbrykwn špyrʔ dbmšyḥʔ
03:17	ʕdrʔ hy lkwn gyr dkd ʕbdyn ʔntwn ʕbdʔ ṭbʔ tsblwn byštʔ ʔn hknʔ hw ṣbynʔ dʔlhʔ wlʔ kd ʕbdyn ʔntwn byštʔ
03:18	mṭl dʔp mšyḥʔ ḥdʔ zbn myt ḥlp ḥṭhyn zdyqʔ ḥlp ḥṭyʔ dnqrbkwn lʔlhʔ wmyt bpgr wḥyʔ brwḥ
03:19	wʔkrz lnpštʔ ʔylyn dʔḥydn hwy bšywl
03:20	hlyn dmn qdym lʔ ʔtṭpys hwy bywmth dnwḥ kd mgrt rwḥh dʔlhʔ pqdt dthwʔ qbwtʔ ʕl sbrʔ dtybwthwn wtmnʔ blḥwd npšn ʕlyn lh wḥyy bmyʔ
03:21	dʔp ʔntwn bh bhw ṭwpsʔ ḥyyn ʔntwn bmʕmwdytʔ lw kd pgrʔ mšygyn ʔntwn mn ṣʔtʔ ʔlʔ kd mwdyn ʔntwn bʔlhʔ btʔrtʔ dkytʔ wbqymth dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ
03:22	hw dʔtʕly lšmyʔ wʔytwhy ʕl ymynʔ dʔlhʔ wʔštʕbdw lh mlʔkʔ wšlyṭnʔ wḥylwtʔ 
04:01	ʔn mšyḥʔ hkyl ḥš ḥlpykwn bbsr wʔp ʔntwn bh bhnʔ rʕynʔ ʔzdynw klmn dmʔt gyr bpgrh šly lh mn klhwn ḥṭhʔ
04:02	dlʔ mkyl lrgygtʔ dbnynšʔ nḥʔ kmʔ zbnʔ dʔytwhy bpgrʔ ʔlʔ lṣbynʔ dʔlhʔ
04:03	spq gyr zbnʔ hw dʕbr dplḥtwn bh ṣbynʔ dḥnpʔ bʔswṭwtʔ wbrwywtʔ wbṣḥnwtʔ wbzmrʔ wbpwlḥnʔ dšʔdʔ
04:04	whʔ hšʔ mtdmryn wmgdpyn ʕlykwn bdlʔ mštrḥytwn ʕmhwn bhy ʔswṭwtʔ qdmytʔ
04:05	hnwn dyhbyn ptgmʔ lʔlhʔ hw dʕtyd lmdn mytʔ wḥyʔ
04:06	mṭl hnʔ gyr ʔstbr ʔp lmytʔ dntdynwn ʔyk bnynšʔ bbsr wnḥwn bʔlhʔ brwḥ
04:07	mṭyt lh dyn ḥrtʔ dkl mṭl hnʔ ʔtnkpw wʔttʕyrw lṣlwtʔ
04:08	wqdm kl mdm ḥwbʔ ḥrypʔ lwt ḥddʔ nhwʔ lkwn ḥwbʔ gyr mḥpʔ swgʔʔ dḥṭhʔ
04:09	whwytwn rḥmyn ʔksnyʔ dlʔ rṭnʔ
04:10	wklnš mnkwn mwhbtʔ dqbl mn ʔlhʔ nšmš bh lḥbrwhy ʔyk rby btʔ ṭbʔ dṭybwtʔ mprštʔ dʔlhʔ
04:11	klmn dmmll ʔyk mltʔ dʔlhʔ nmll wklmn dmšmš ʔyk dmn ḥylʔ hw dʔlhʔ yhb lh dbkl dʕbdyn ʔntwn nštbḥ ʔlhʔ byd yšwʕ mšyḥʔ hw ddylh hy tšbwḥtʔ wʔyqrʔ lʕlm ʕlmyn ʔmyn
04:12	ḥbyby lʔ ttdmrwn bnsywnʔ dhwyn lkwn ʔyk dmdm nwkry gdš lkwn mṭl dlbwḥrnkwn hw hwyn
04:13	ʔlʔ ḥdw dmštwtpyn ʔntwn lḥšwhy dmšyḥʔ dhknʔ ʔp bglynʔ dtšbwḥth tḥdwn wtrwzwn
04:14	wʔn mtḥsdyn ʔntwn ʕl ʔpy šmh dmšyḥʔ ṭwbykwn drwḥʔ mšbḥtʔ dʔlhʔ mttnyḥʔ ʕlykwn
04:15	blḥwd lʔ ʔnš mnkwn ʔyk qṭwlʔ ʔw ʔyk gnbʔ ʔw ʔyk ʕbd byštʔ nhwʔ ḥʔš
04:16	ʔn dyn ḥʔš ʔyk krsṭynʔ lʔ nbht ʔlʔ nšbḥ lʔlhʔ bh bhnʔ šmʔ
04:17	mṭl dzbnʔ hw dnšrʔ dynʔ mn byth dʔlhʔ ʔn dyn mnn mšrʔ ʔydʔ hy ḥrtʔ dʔylyn dlʔ mtṭpysyn lsbrth dʔlhʔ
04:18	wʔn zdyqʔ lmḥsn ḥyʔ ršyʕʔ wḥṭyʔ ʔykʔ mštkḥ
04:19	mṭl hnʔ ʔylyn dḥšyn ʔyk ṣbynh dʔlhʔ ngʕlwn lh npšthwn bʕbdʔ špyrʔ ʔyk dlbrwyʔ mhymnʔ
05:01	bʕʔ ʔnʔ dyn mn qšyšʔ dʔyt bkwn ʔnʔ qšyšʔ ḥbrkwn wshdʔ dḥšwhy dmšyḥʔ wšwtpʔ dšwbḥh hw dʕtyd dntglʔ
05:02	rʕw mrʕytʔ dʔlhʔ dmšlmʔ lkwn wsʕwrw rwḥnʔyt lʔ bqṭyrʔ ʔlʔ bṣbynʔ lʔ bywtrnʔ ṭnpʔ ʔlʔ mn klh lbkwn
05:03	lʔ ʔyk mryʔ dmrʕytʔ ʔlʔ ʔyk dthwwn lhwn dmwtʔ špyrtʔ
05:04	dkd ntglʔ rb rʕwtʔ tqblwn mnh klylʔ dšwbḥʔ dlʔ ḥmʔ
05:05	wʔntwn ʕlymʔ ʔštʕbdw lqšyšykwn wʔtʕṭpw ḥyṣʔyt mkykwt rʕynʔ lwt ḥddʔ mṭl dʔlhʔ sqwblʔ hw dʔylyn dmttrymyn wlmkykʔ yhb ṭybwtʔ
05:06	ʔtmkkw hkyl tḥyt ʔydh tqyptʔ dʔlhʔ dhy trymkwn bzbnʔ dzdq
05:07	wṣptkwn klh šdw ʕl ʔlhʔ dlh bṭyl ʕlykwn
05:08	ʔttʕyrw wʕhdw mṭl dbʕldbbkwn sṭnʔ ʔyk ʔryʔ nhm wmhlk wbʕʔ dlmnw nblʕ
05:09	qwmw hkyl lqwblh kd mšrryn ʔntwn bhymnwtʔ wdʕw dʔp ʕl ʔḥykwn dbʕlmʔ hnwn hlyn ḥšʔ ʕrṣyn
05:10	ʔlhʔ dyn dṭybwtʔ hw dqrn lšwbḥh dlʕlm byd yšwʕ mšyḥʔ hw dyhb ln dkd nsybr hlyn ʔwlṣnʔ zʕwrʔ dntḥylw nštrr wntqym bh lʕlm
05:11	dlh šwbḥʔ wʔwḥdnʔ wʔyqrʔ lʕlm ʕlmyn ʔmyn
05:12	hlyn zʕwrytʔ ʔyk dsbr ʔnʔ ktbt lkwn byd slwnws ʔḥʔ mhymnʔ wmps ʔnʔ wshd ʔnʔ dhdʔ hy ṭybwtʔ šryrtʔ dʔlhʔ hdʔ dqymyn ʔntwn bh
05:13	šʔlʔ šlmkwn ʕdtʔ gbytʔ dbbbl wmrqws bry
05:14	šʔlw bšlmʔ ḥd dḥd bnwšqtʔ qdyštʔ šlmʔ ʕm klhwn ʔylyn dbmšyḥʔ ʔnwn ʔmyn
01:01	msbrynn lkwn lhw dʔytwhy hwʔ mn bršyt hw dšmʕn wḥzynyhy bʕynyn ḥzyn wgšn bʔydyn hw dʔytwhy mltʔ dḥyʔ
01:02	wḥyʔ ʔtglyw wḥzyn wshdynn wmkrzynn lkwn ḥyʔ dlʕlm hnwn dʔytyhwn hww lwt ʔbʔ wʔtglyw ln
01:03	wmdm dḥzyn wšmʕn mwdʕynn ʔp lkwn dthwʔ lkwn šwtpwtʔ ʕmn wšwtpwtn dyn dyln ʔytyh ʕm ʔbʔ wʕm brh yšwʕ mšyḥʔ
01:04	whlyn ktbynn lkwn dḥdwtn dbkwn thwʔ mšmlyʔ
01:05	whdʔ hy sbrtʔ dšmʕn mnh wmsbrynn lkwn dʔlhʔ nwhrʔ hw wḥšwkʔ kl klh lyt bh
01:06	wʔn ʔmrynn dšwtpwtʔ ʔyt ln ʕmh wmhlkynn bḥšwkʔ dglʔ ḥnn wlw bšrrʔ rdynn
01:07	ʔn dyn bnwhrʔ mhlkynn ʔyk dhw ʔytwhy bnwhrʔ ʔyt ln šwtpwtʔ ʕm ḥddʔ wdmʔ dyšwʕ brh mdkʔ ln mn klhwn ḥṭhyn
01:08	wʔn nʔmr dlyt ln ḥṭytʔ npšn mṭʕynn wšrrʔ lyt bn
01:09	ʔn dyn mwdynn bḥṭhyn mhymn hw wzdyq dnšbwq ln ḥṭhyn wndkyn mn klh ʕwln
01:10	wʔn ʔmrynn dlʔ ḥṭyn ʕbdynn lh dglʔ wmlth lyt lwtn
02:01	bny hlyn ktb ʔnʔ lkwn dlʔ tḥṭwn wʔn ʔnš nḥṭʔ ʔyt ln prqlṭʔ lwt ʔbʔ yšwʕ mšyḥʔ zdyqʔ
02:02	hwyw gyr ḥwsyʔ dʕl ʔpy ḥṭhyn wlw ḥlpyn dyln blḥwd ʔlʔ ʔp ḥlp klh ʕlmʔ
02:03	wbhdʔ mrgšynn dydʕnyhy ʔn nṭrynn pwqdnwhy
02:04	hw gyr dʔmr dydʕth wpwqdnwhy lʔ nṭr dglʔ hw wšrrʔ lyt bh
02:05	hw dyn dnṭr mlth bhnʔ mšlm šryrʔyt ḥwbh dʔlhʔ bhdʔ gyr ydʕynn dbh ḥnn
02:06	hw dʔmr dbh ʔyty wlʔ lh dʔyk hlkth dylh nhlk 
02:07	ḥbyby lw pwqdnʔ ḥdtʔ ktb ʔnʔ lkwn ʔlʔ pwqdnʔ ʕtyqʔ hw dʔyt hwʔ lkwn mn bršyt pwqdnʔ dyn ʕtyqʔ ʔytwhy mltʔ hy dšmʕtwn
02:08	twb pwqdnʔ ḥdtʔ ktb ʔnʔ lkwn hw dʔytwhy šryrʔ bh wbkwn dḥšwkʔ ʕbr lh wnwhrʔ šryrʔ šry mtḥzʔ
02:09	mn dʔmr hkyl dʔytwhy bnwhrʔ wsnʔ lʔḥwhy bḥšwkʔ ʔytwhy ʕdmʔ lhšʔ
02:10	hw dyn dmḥb lʔḥwhy bnwhrʔ mktr wkšlʔ lyt bh
02:11	hw dyn dsnʔ lʔḥwhy bḥšwkʔ ʔytwhy wbḥšwkʔ mhlk wlʔ ydʕ lʔykʔ ʔzl mṭl dḥšwkʔ smy ʔnyn ʕynwhy
02:12	ktb ʔnʔ lkwn bnyʔ dʔštbqw lkwn ḥṭhykwn mṭl šmh
02:13	ktb ʔnʔ lkwn ʔbhʔ dydʕtwnyhy lhw dʔytwhy hwʔ mn bršyt ktb ʔnʔ lkwn ʕlymʔ dzkytwnyhy lbyšʔ ktbt lkwn ṭlyʔ dydʕtwn lʔbʔ
02:14	ktbt lkwn ʔbhʔ dydʕtwn lhw dmn bršyt ktbt lkwn ʕlymʔ dḥyltnʔ ʔntwn wmlth dʔlhʔ šryʔ bkwn wzkytwnyhy lbyšʔ
02:15	lʔ trḥmwn lʕlmʔ wlʔ lmdm dʔyt bh mn gyr drḥm lʕlmʔ ḥwbh dʔbʔ lyt bh
02:16	kl mdm gyr dʔyt bh bʕlmʔ rgtʔ hw dpgrʔ wrgtʔ dʕynʔ wšwbhrʔ dʕlmʔ hlyn dlʔ hwy mn ʔbʔ ʔlʔ mnh ʔnyn mn ʕlmʔ
02:17	wʕbr ʕlmʔ hw wrgth hw dyn dʕbd ṣbynh dʔlhʔ mqwʔ lʕlm
02:18	bny zbnʔ hw ʔḥryʔ wʔyk mdm dšmʕtwn dʔtʔ mšyḥʔ dglʔ whšʔ hww lhwn sgyʔʔ mšyḥʔ dglʔ wmn hdʔ ydʕynn dzbnʔ hw ʔḥryʔ
02:19	mnn npqw ʔlʔ lw mnn hww ʔlw gyr mnn hww lwtn mktryn hww ʔlʔ npqw mnn dttydʕ dlw mnn hww
02:20	wʔntwn mšyḥwtʔ ʔyt lkwn mn qdyšʔ wpršyn ʔntwn hw lkl ʔnš
02:21	lʔ ktbt lkwn dlʔ ydʕyn ʔntwn lh lšrrʔ ʔlʔ dydʕyn ʔntwn lh wdklh dglwtʔ lʔ hwt mnh mn šrrʔ
02:22	mnw dglʔ ʔlʔ ʔn ʔynʔ dkpr dyšwʕ lʔ hwʔ mšyḥʔ hnʔ hw mšyḥʔ dglʔ hw dkpr bʔbʔ kpr ʔp bbrʔ
02:23	whw dkpr bbrʔ ʔplʔ bʔbʔ mhymn mn dmwdʔ bbrʔ ʔp bʔbʔ mwdʔ
02:24	wʔntwn mdm dšmʕtwn mn qdym nqwʔ lwtkwn ʔn gyr mqwʔ lwtkwn mdm dšmʕtwn mn qdym ʔp ʔntwn mqwyn ʔntwn bʔbʔ wbbrʔ
02:25	whnw šwwdyʔ dʔštwdy ln ḥyʔ dlʕlm
02:26	hlyn dyn ktbt lkwn mṭl ʔylyn dmṭʕyn lkwn
02:27	wʔp ʔntwn ʔn tqwʔ lwtkwn mšyḥwtʔ dqbltwn mnh lʔ snyqyn ʔntwn dʔnš nlpkwn ʔlʔ ʔyk mšyḥwtʔ dʔytyh mn ʔlhʔ hy mlpʔ lkwn ʕl klmdm wšryrʔ hy wlyt bh dglwtʔ wʔyk dʔlpkwn qww bh
02:28	whšʔ bny qww bh dmʔ dmtglʔ lʔ nbht mnh ʔlʔ thwʔ ln glywt ʔpʔ bmʔtyth
02:29	ʔn ydʕtwn dzdyq hw dʕw dʔp kl dʕbd zdyqwtʔ mnh ʔytwhy
03:01	wḥzw dkmʔ sgy ḥwbh dʔbʔ lwtn dbnyʔ qrn ʔp ʕbdn mṭl hnʔ ʕlmʔ lʔ ydʕ ln mṭl dʔplʔ lh ydʕ
03:02	ḥbyby hšʔ bnwhy ḥnn dʔlhʔ wlʔ ʔtgly ʕdmʔ lhšʔ mnʔ ʕtydynn dnhwʔ ydʕynn dyn dmʔ dʔtgly bdmwth hwynn wḥzynn lh ʔyk mdm dʔytwhy
03:03	wkl ʔynʔ dʔyt lh ʕlwhy hnʔ sbrʔ mdkʔ npšh ʔyk dhw dkʔ hw
03:04	mn dyn dʕbd ḥṭytʔ ʕwlʔ sʕr ḥṭytʔ gyr klh ʕwlʔ hy
03:05	wydʕyn ʔntwn dhw dʔtgly dnsb ḥṭhyn wḥṭytʔ bh lyt
03:06	wkl dbh mqwʔ lʔ ḥṭʔ wkl dḥṭʔ lʔ ḥzyhy wlʔ ydʕh
03:07	bny lʔ ʔnš nṭʕykwn hw dʕbd zdyqwtʔ zdyqʔ hw ʔyk dʔp hw mšyḥʔ ʔytwhy zdyqʔ
03:08	hw dsʕr ḥṭytʔ mn sṭnʔ hw mṭl dmn ršytʔ hw sṭnʔ ḥṭyʔ hw wmṭl hnʔ ʔtḥzy brh dʔlhʔ dnšrʔ ʕbdwhy dsṭnʔ
03:09	kl dʔtyld mn ʔlhʔ ḥṭytʔ lʔ ʕbd mṭl dzrʕh bh ʔytwhy wlʔ mškḥ lmḥṭʔ dmn ʔlhʔ ʔtyld
03:10	bhdʔ mtpršyn bnwhy dʔlhʔ mn bnwhy dsṭnʔ kl dlʔ ʕbd zdyqwtʔ wlʔ mḥb lʔḥwhy lytwhy mn ʔlhʔ
03:11	dhnw pwqdnʔ dšmʕtwn mn qdym dtḥbwn ḥd lḥd
03:12	lw ʔyk qʔyn hw dʔytwhy hwʔ mn byšʔ wqṭl lʔḥwhy wmṭl mnʔ qṭlh ʔlʔ mṭl dbyšyn hww ʕbdwhy wdʔḥwhy zdyqyn
03:13	wlʔ ttdmrwn ʔḥy ʔn snʔ lkwn ʕlmʔ
03:14	ḥnn ydʕynn dšnynn mn mwtʔ lḥyʔ bhdʔ dmḥbynn lʔḥyn hw dlʔ mḥb lʔḥwhy mqwʔ bmwtʔ
03:15	kl gyr dsnʔ lʔḥwhy qṭl ʔnšʔ hw wydʕyn ʔntwn dkl dqṭl ʔnšʔ lʔ mškḥyn mqwyn bh ḥyʔ dlʕlm
03:16	bhdʔ ydʕynn ḥwbh dlwtn dhw yhb npšh ḥlpyn wʔp ḥnn zdq ln dʕl ʔpy ʔḥyn ntl npštn
03:17	wʔynʔ dʔyt lh qnynʔ dʕlmʔ wnḥzʔ lʔḥwhy dsnyq wnʔḥwd rḥmwhy mnh ʔyknʔ ʔyt bh ḥwbh dʔlhʔ
03:18	bny lʔ nḥb ḥd lḥd bmlʔ wblšnʔ ʔlʔ bʕbdʔ wbšrrʔ
03:19	wbhdʔ mštwdʕynn dmn šrrʔ ʔytyn wqdm dnʔtʔ hw mpysynn lbn
03:20	dʔn hw lbn bsr ln kmʔ ʔlhʔ drb mn lbn wydʕ klmdm 
03:21	ḥbyby ʔn lbn lʔ bsr ln glyn ʔnyn ʔpyn qdm ʔlhʔ
03:22	wklmdm dšʔlynn nsbynn mnh mṭl dnṭrynn pwqdnwhy wšpyrtʔ sʕrynn qdmwhy
03:23	whnʔ hw pwqdnh dnhymn bšmʔ dbrh yšwʕ mšyḥʔ wnḥb ḥd lḥd ʔyk dpqdn
03:24	wʔynʔ dnṭr pwqdnwhy bh mtnṭr whw šrʔ bh wbhdʔ mstklynn dšrʔ bn mn rwḥh hy dyhb ln
04:01	ḥbyby lʔ lkl rwḥyn thymnwn ʔlʔ hwytwn pršyn rwḥʔ ʔn mn ʔlhʔ ʔytyhyn mṭl dsgyʔʔ nbyʔ dglʔ npqw bh bʕlmʔ
04:02	bhdʔ mtydʕʔ rwḥh dʔlhʔ kl rwḥʔ dmwdyn dyšwʕ mšyḥʔ ʔtʔ bbsr mn ʔlhʔ hy
04:03	wkl rwḥʔ dlʔ mwdyʔ dyšwʕ ʔtʔ bbsr lytyh mn ʔlhʔ ʔlʔ hdʔ mn mšyḥʔ hy dglʔ hw dšmʕtwn dʔtʔ whšʔ bʕlmʔ ʔytwhy mn kdw
04:04	ʔntwn dyn mn ʔlhʔ ʔytykwn bnyʔ wzkytwn ʔnwn mṭl drb hw dbkwn mn hw dbʕlmʔ
04:05	whlyn mn ʕlmʔ ʔnwn mṭl hnʔ mn ʕlmʔ mmllyn wʕlmʔ lhwn šmʕ
04:06	ḥnn dyn mn ʔlhʔ ḥnn whw dydʕ lʔlhʔ šmʕ ln whw dlʔ ʔytwhy mn ʔlhʔ lʔ šmʕ ln bh bhdʔ mstklynn lrwḥʔ dšrrʔ wlrwḥʔ dmṭʕynwtʔ
04:07	ḥbyby nḥb ḥd lḥd mṭl dḥwbʔ mn ʔlhʔ hw wkl mn dmḥb mn ʔlhʔ ylyd wydʕ lʔlhʔ
04:08	mṭl dʔlhʔ ḥwbʔ hw wkl dlʔ mḥb lʔ ydʕ lʔlhʔ
04:09	bhdʔ ʔtydʕ ḥwbh dʔlhʔ dlwtn dlbrh yḥydyʔ šdr ʔlhʔ lʕlmʔ dnḥʔ bʔydh
04:10	bhnʔ ʔytwhy ḥwbʔ lʔ hwʔ dḥnn ʔḥbn lʔlhʔ ʔlʔ hw ʔḥbn wšdr lbrh ḥwsyʔ ʕl ʔpy ḥṭhyn
04:11	ḥbyby ʔn hknʔ ʔḥbn ʔlhʔ ʔp ḥnn ḥybynn ḥd lḥd lmḥbw
04:12	lʔlhʔ mmtwm ʔnš lʔ ḥzyhy ʔn dyn nḥb ḥd lḥd ʔlhʔ bn mqwʔ wḥwbh mštmlʔ bn
04:13	wbhdʔ ydʕynn dbh mqwynn whw mqwʔ bn dmn rwḥh yhb ln
04:14	wḥnn ḥzyn wmshdynn dʔbʔ šdr lbrh prwqʔ lʕlmʔ
04:15	kl dmwdʔ byšwʕ dhwyw brh dʔlhʔ ʔlhʔ bh mqwʔ whw mqwʔ bʔlhʔ
04:16	wḥnn hymnn wydʕn ḥwbʔ dʔyt lh lʔlhʔ ṣʔdyn ʔlhʔ gyr ḥwbʔ hw wkl dmqwʔ bḥwbʔ bʔlhʔ mqwʔ
04:17	wbhdʔ mštlm ḥwbh ʕmn dglywt ʔpʔ thwʔ ln bywmʔ ddynʔ mṭl dʔyk dhwʔ hw hknʔ ʔp ḥnn ʔytyn bhnʔ ʕlmʔ
04:18	dḥltʔ bḥwbʔ lyt ʔlʔ ḥwbʔ mšmlyʔ lbr šdʔ lh ldḥltʔ mṭl ddḥltʔ bqnṭʔ ʔytyh hw dyn ddḥl lʔ mšmly bḥwbʔ
04:19	ḥnn hkyl nḥb lʔlhʔ mṭl dhw qdmyt ʔḥbn
04:20	ʔn dyn ʔnš nʔmr dmḥb ʔnʔ lʔlhʔ wlʔḥwhy snʔ dglʔ hw hw gyr dlʔḥwhy dmtḥzʔ lʔ mḥb lʔlhʔ hw dlʔ mtḥzʔ ʔyknʔ mškḥ dnḥb
04:21	whnʔ pwqdnʔ qbln mnh dkl dmḥb lʔlhʔ nḥb ʔp lʔḥwhy
05:01	kl dmhymn dyšwʕ ʔytwhy mšyḥʔ mn ʔlhʔ ylyd wkl dmḥb lylwdʔ mḥb ʔp lhw dʔtyld mnh
05:02	wbhdʔ ydʕynn dmḥbynn lbnwhy dʔlhʔ mʔ dlʔlhʔ mḥbynn wʕbdynn pwqdnwhy
05:03	hnʔ hw gyr ḥwbh dʔlhʔ dnṭr pwqdnwhy wpwqdnwhy lʔ yqyryn
05:04	mṭl dkl dylyd mn ʔlhʔ zkʔ lh lʕlmʔ whdʔ hy zkwtʔ dzkth lʕlmʔ hymnwtn
05:05	mnw gyr dzkʔ lh lʕlmʔ ʔlʔ hw dmhymn dyšwʕ brh hw dʔlhʔ
05:06	hnw dʔtʔ byd myʔ wdmʔ yšwʕ mšyḥʔ lʔ hwʔ bmyʔ blḥwd ʔlʔ bmyʔ wdmʔ
05:07	wrwḥʔ mshdʔ dhy rwḥʔ ʔytyh šrrʔ
05:08	wʔytyhwn tltʔ shdyn rwḥʔ wmyʔ wdmʔ wtltyhwn bḥd ʔnwn
05:09	ʔn shdwtʔ dbnynšʔ mqblynn ḥd kmʔ shdwth dʔlhʔ drbʔ hy whdʔ hy shdwth dʔlhʔ dʔshd ʕl brh
05:10	klmn dmhymn bbrh dʔlhʔ ʔyt lh hdʔ shdwtʔ bnpšh kl dlʔ mhymn lʔlhʔ dglʔ ʕbdh bdlʔ hymn lshdwtʔ dʔshd ʔlhʔ ʕl brh
05:11	whdʔ hy shdwtʔ dḥyʔ dlʕlm yhb ln ʔlhʔ whnwn ḥyʔ bbrh ʔytyhwn
05:12	kl dʔḥyd lbrʔ ʔḥyd ʔp lḥyʔ wkl dlʔ ʔḥyd lbrh dʔlhʔ lyt lh ḥyʔ
05:13	hlyn ktbt lkwn dtdʕwn dḥyʔ dlʕlm ʔyt lkwn lʔylyn dhymntwn bšmh dbrh dʔlhʔ
05:14	whdʔ prhsyʔ ʔyt ln lwth dkl dšʔlynn lh ʔyk ṣbynh šmʕ ln
05:15	wʔn mpsynn dšmʕ ln ʕl mdm dšʔlynn mnh tkylynn dqbln mn kdw šʔltn dšʔln mnh
05:16	ʔn ʔnš nḥzʔ lʔḥwhy dḥṭʔ ḥṭhʔ dlʔ mḥyb lmwtʔ nšʔl wmtyhbyn lh ḥyʔ lʔylyn dlʔ hwʔ ʔyk dlmwtʔ ḥṭyn ʔyt gyr ḥṭhʔ dmwtʔ lʔ hwʔ ʕl hnʔ ʔmr ʔnʔ dnbʕʔ ʔnš
05:17	kl ʕwlʔ gyr ḥṭytʔ hw wʔyt ḥṭhʔ dlʔ hwʔ dmwtʔ hw
05:18	wydʕynn dkl dylyd mn ʔlhʔ lʔ ḥṭʔ hw gyr dylyd mn ʔlhʔ nṭr npšh wbyšʔ lʔ mtqrb lh
05:19	ydʕynn dmn ʔlhʔ ḥnn wʕlmʔ klh bbyšʔ hw sym
05:20	wydʕynn dbrh dʔlhʔ ʔtʔ wyhb ln mdʕʔ dndʕ lšryrʔ wnhwʔ bh bšryrʔ bbrh yšwʕ mšyḥʔ hnʔ hw ʔlhʔ šryrʔ wḥyʔ dlʕlm
05:21	bny ṭrw npškwn mn dḥlt ptkrʔ
